 kǁʰɔsa ɛkukǃalɛkɛni utʰikǁɔ wad̤ala amaz̤ulu nɛɬaɓatʰi kɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini kwakusɛɲaɲɛni kusɛluɓala kwakumɲama pʰɛz̤u kwamanz̤i ɛnz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓila umɔja katʰikǁɔ pʰɛz̤u kwamanz̤i lawɔ watʰi utʰikǁɔ makuɓɛkʰɔ ukukʰaɲa kwaɓakʰɔ kɛ ukukʰaɲa wakuɓɔna kɛ utʰikǁɔ ukukʰaɲa ukuɓa kulunɡ̤ilɛ waɬula utʰikǁɔ pʰakatʰi kɔkukʰaɲa nɔɓumɲama watʰi utʰikǁɔ ukukʰaɲa jimini watʰi uɓumɲama ɓuɓusuku kwaɬwa janɡ̤um̤la wɔkukǃala watʰi utʰikǁɔ makuɓɛkʰɔ isib̤akab̤aka pʰakatʰi kwawɔ amanz̤i siɓɛ nɡ̤umaɬulɔ wɔkwaɬula amanz̤i kumanz̤i wasɛnz̤a utʰikǁɔ isib̤akab̤aka wawaɬula amanz̤i anɡ̤apʰant͡si kwɛsib̤akab̤aka kuwɔ amanz̤i anɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛsib̤akab̤aka kwaɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ watʰi utʰikǁɔ isib̤akab̤aka nɡ̤amaz̤ulu kwaɬwa janɡ̤um̤la wɛsiɓini watʰi utʰikǁɔ amanz̤i anɡ̤apʰant͡si kwamaz̤ulu makaɬanɡ̤anisɛlwɛ nd̤awɛniɲɛ kuɓɔnakalɛ ɔkɔmilɛjɔ kwaɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ watʰi utʰikǁɔ ɔkɔmilɛjɔ nɡ̤um̤laɓa watʰi intlanɡ̤anisɛla jamanz̤i z̤iilwanɮɛ waɓɔna utʰikǁɔ ukuɓa kulunɡ̤ilɛ watʰi utʰikǁɔ um̤laɓa mawupʰumɛ uɬaz̤a imifunɔ ɛv̤ɛlisa imɓɛwu imitʰi jɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ ɛjɛnz̤a iz̤ikǃʰamɔ nɡ̤ɔɬɔɓɔ lwajɔ ɛmɓɛwu ikujɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni kwaɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ um̤laɓa wapʰuma uɬaz̤a nɛmifunɔ ɛv̤ɛlisa imɓɛwu nɡ̤ɔɬɔɓɔ lwajɔ nɛmitʰi ɛjɛnz̤a iz̤ikǃʰamɔ ɛmɓɛwu ikujɔ nɡ̤ɔɬɔɓɔ lwajɔ waɓɔna utʰikǁɔ ukuɓa kulunɡ̤ilɛ kwaɬwa janɡ̤um̤la wɛsitʰatʰu watʰi utʰikǁɔ makuɓɛkʰɔ iz̤ikʰaɲisɔ ɛsib̤akab̤akɛni samaz̤ulu z̤iɓɛ nɡ̤umaɬulɔ wɔkwaɬula kuɓusuku z̤iɓɛ z̤ɛz̤ɛmikǃɔnd̤isɔ z̤iɓɛ z̤ɛz̤amakǁɛʃa amisiwɛjɔ z̤iɓɛ z̤ɛz̤ɛmiɬa nɛmiɲaka maz̤iɓɛ z̤iz̤ikʰaɲisɔ ɛsib̤akab̤akɛni samaz̤ulu z̤ikʰaɲisɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini kwaɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ wɛnz̤a utʰikǁɔ iz̤ikʰaɲisɔ ɛz̤ikʰulu z̤az̤iɓini ɛsɔna sikʰulu isikʰaɲisɔ ukuɓa silawulɛ ɛsɔna siŋǀinanɛ isikʰaɲisɔ ukuɓa silawulɛ uɓusuku wɛnz̤a nɛɛnkwɛnkwɛz̤i waz̤iɓɛka utʰikǁɔ ɛsib̤akab̤akɛni samaz̤ulu ukuɓa z̤ikʰaɲisɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini z̤ilawulɛ nɔɓusuku z̤aɬulɛ ukukʰaɲa kuɓumɲama waɓɔna utʰikǁɔ ukuɓa kulunɡ̤ilɛ kwaɬwa janɡ̤um̤la wɛsinɛ watʰi utʰikǁɔ amanz̤i makaɲakaz̤ɛlɛ iɲakaɲaka imipʰɛfumlɔ ɛpʰililɛjɔ z̤itʰi nɛɛntaka z̤ipʰapʰaz̤ɛlɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini ɛsib̤akab̤akɛni sɛz̤ulu wad̤ala utʰikǁɔ ɔɔminɛnɡ̤a mikʰulu najɔ jɔnkɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ ɛpʰililɛjɔ ɛnamɓuz̤ɛlajɔ awaɲakaz̤ɛla nɡ̤ajɔ amanz̤i nɡ̤ɔɬɔɓɔ lwajɔ nɛɛntaka z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤inamapʰikɔ nɡ̤ɔɬɔɓɔ lwaz̤ɔ waɓɔna utʰikǁɔ ukuɓa kulunɡ̤ilɛ waz̤isikɛlɛla utʰikǁɔ ɛsitʰi kǃʰamani nand̤ɛ niwaz̤alisɛ amanz̤i asɛlwanɮɛ z̤itʰi z̤and̤ɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini kwaɬwa janɡ̤um̤la wɛsiɬanu watʰi utʰikǁɔ um̤laɓa mawupʰumɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ ɛpʰililɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔɬɔɓɔ lwajɔ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iz̤itʰɔ z̤inɛ nɛz̤inamɓuz̤anɛ nɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ z̤ɔm̤laɓa nɡ̤ɔɬɔɓɔ lwaz̤ɔ kwaɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ wɛnz̤a utʰikǁɔ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ z̤ɔm̤laɓa nɡ̤ɔɬɔɓɔ lwaz̤ɔ nɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤iz̤itʰɔ z̤inɛ nɡ̤ɔɬɔɓɔ lwaz̤ɔ naz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤inamɓuz̤anɛ z̤ɔm̤laɓa nɡ̤ɔɬɔɓɔ lwaz̤ɔ waɓɔna utʰikǁɔ ukuɓa kulunɡ̤ilɛ watʰi utʰikǁɔ masɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔmfanɛkisɛlɔ wɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkufana natʰi maɓaɓɛ nɔɓukʰɔsi ɛz̤intlanz̤ini z̤ɔlwanɮɛ nasɛz̤intakɛni z̤ɛz̤ulu nasɛz̤intwɛni ɛz̤iz̤itʰɔ z̤inɛ nasɛm̤laɓɛni wɔnkɛ nasɛz̤inamɓuz̤anɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤inamɓuz̤ɛla ɛm̤laɓɛni wamd̤ala kɛ utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔmfanɛkisɛlɔ wakʰɛ wamd̤ala nɡ̤ɔkɔmfanɛkisɛlɔ katʰikǁɔ wad̤ala ind̤ɔd̤a nɛnkaz̤ana waɓasikɛlɛla utʰikǁɔ watʰi kuɓɔ utʰikǁɔ kǃʰamani nand̤ɛ niwuz̤alisɛ um̤laɓa niwɛjisɛ niɓɛ nɔɓukʰɔsi ɛz̤intlanz̤ini z̤ɔlwanɮɛ nasɛz̤intakɛni z̤ɛz̤ulu nasɛz̤intwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ ɛz̤inamɓuz̤ɛlajɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni watʰi utʰikǁɔ jaɓɔnani nd̤ininikilɛ jɔnkɛ imifunɔ ɛv̤ɛlisa imɓɛwu ɛsɛm̤laɓɛni wɔnkɛ najɔ jɔnkɛ imitʰi ɛnɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ɛmitʰi ɛv̤ɛlisa imɓɛwu jɔɓa kukuɮa nɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ z̤ɔm̤laɓa nɛɛntaka z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛz̤ulu nɛz̤inamɓuz̤anɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤isɛm̤laɓɛni ɛz̤inɔmpʰɛfumlɔ ɔpʰililɛjɔ nd̤iz̤inikɛ jɔnkɛ imifunɔ ɛluɬaz̤a ukuɓa iɓɛ kukuɮa kwaɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ wakuɓɔna utʰikǁɔ kɔnkɛ akwɛnz̤ilɛjɔ nankɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛ kunɛnɛ kwaɬwa janɡ̤um̤la wɛsitʰand̤atʰu aɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwa kɛ amaz̤ulu nɛɬaɓatʰi nawɔ wɔnkɛ umkʰɔsi wɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ wawuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa kɛ utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i wakʰɛ awawɛnz̤ajɔ wapʰumla nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kuwɔ wɔnkɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i wakʰɛ awawɛnz̤ajɔ wawusikɛlɛla utʰikǁɔ um̤la wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wawuŋ̤ǀ̤walisa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wapʰumla nɡ̤awɔ kuwɔ wɔnkɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i wakʰɛ awawud̤alajɔ utʰikǁɔ wawɛnz̤a jijɔ lɛ kɛ inz̤ala jamaz̤ulu nɛɬaɓatʰi ɛkud̤alwɛni kwɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ wɛnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ iɬaɓatʰi namaz̤ulu ɔnkɛ amatʰʲɔlɔ asɛnɮɛ ɛnɡ̤ɛkav̤ɛli ɛm̤laɓɛni najɔ jɔnkɛ imifunɔ jasɛnɮɛ inɡ̤ɛkant͡ʃuli kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ ɛɓɛnɡ̤ɛkanisi mv̤ula ɛm̤laɓɛni kwajɛ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ wɔkuwusɛɓɛnz̤a um̤laɓa kwajɛ kuɲuka inkunɡ̤u ipʰuma ɛɬaɓatʰini jawuɲakamisa wɔnkɛ um̤laɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wamɓumɓa nɡ̤ɔtʰuli lwasɛm̤laɓɛni wapʰɛfumlɛla ɛmatʰatʰɛni akʰɛ impɛfumlɔ jɔɓɔmi kɛ waɓa nɡ̤umpʰɛfumlɔ ɔpʰililɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ watʲala umjɛz̤ɔ ɛɛd̤ɛn nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a wamɓɛka kʰɔna aɓɛmɓumɓilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ want͡ʃulisa ɛm̤laɓɛni jɔnkɛ imitʰi ɛŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ nɡ̤ɔkukʰanɡ̤ɛlɛka nɛlunɡ̤ɛlɛ ukuɮiwa nɔmtʰi wɔɓɔmi ɛmjɛz̤wɛni pʰakatʰi nɔmtʰi wɔkwaz̤i ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɔkuɓi kwapʰuma umlamɓɔ ɛɛd̤ɛn wɔkuwuɲakamisa umjɛz̤ɔ waɬuka apʰɔ waɓa z̤iimɓakǁa ɛz̤inɛ iɡ̤ama lɔwɔkukǃala jipiʃɔn nɡ̤uwɔ lɔwɔ ud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ɛ lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lasɛhav̤ila apʰɔ ikʰɔna iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ jɛlɔ liz̤wɛ intlɛ ikʰɔna ib̤ɛd̤ɔlaki nɛlitʲɛ lɛb̤ɛrilɔ iɡ̤ama lɔwɛsiɓini umlamɓɔ jiɡ̤ihɔn nɡ̤uwɔ lɔwɔ ud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ɛ lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lakwakuʃi iɡ̤ama lɔwɛsitʰatʰu umlamɓɔ jihid̤ɛkɛlɛ nɡ̤uwɔ lɔwɔ uja pʰamɓi kwɛlakwaasirija ɔwɛsinɛ umlamɓɔ nɡ̤umɛfrati ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wamtʰaɓatʰa wamɓɛka ɛmjɛz̤wɛni wɛɛd̤ɛn ukuɓa awusɛɓɛnz̤ɛ awuɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ ɛsitʰi jɔnkɛ imitʰi jɔmjɛz̤ɔ unɡ̤ajiɮa ujiɮɛ kɛ wɔna umtʰi wɔkwaz̤i ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɔkuɓi uz̤ɛ unɡ̤awuɮi kuɓa m̤lana utʰɛ wawuɮa uja watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ akulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuɓa aɓɛ jɛd̤wa nd̤ija kumɛnz̤ɛla umŋǀɛd̤i ɔnɡ̤uwaɓɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓumɓa nɡ̤ɔm̤laɓa z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ z̤asɛnɮɛ naz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛz̤ulu waz̤isa kujɛ uad̤am ukuɓɔna ukuɓa wɔtʰini ukuz̤iɓiz̤a ukuz̤ɛ ɔkɔ az̤iɓiz̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ uad̤am z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ iɓɛ liɡ̤ama laz̤ɔ ɛlɔ waz̤itʰija amaɡ̤ama uad̤am z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iz̤itʰɔ z̤inɛ nɛɛntaka z̤asɛz̤ulwini naz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ z̤asɛnɮɛ kɛ uad̤am akafuɲanɛlwanɡ̤a mŋǀɛd̤i unɡ̤uwaɓɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ uɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ ɔɓukʰulu pʰɛz̤u kɔad̤am watʰaɓatʰa lwaluɲɛ ɛz̤imɓand͡ʒ̤ɛni z̤akʰɛ wav̤iŋ̤ǀ̤a nɡ̤ɛɲama ɛsikʰunɮɛni salɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ walwakʰa uɓamɓɔ aɓɛlutʰaɓatʰɛ kuad̤am lwaɓa nɡ̤umfaz̤i wamz̤isa kuad̤am watʰi uad̤am ɛli kɛ nɡ̤ɔku litʰamɓɔ lasɛmatʰand͡ʒ̤ɛni jiɲama jasɛɲamɛni jam lɔ jɛna ukuɓiz̤wa kɔtʰiwa nɡ̤umfaz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛtʰatʲatʰwɛ ɛnd̤ɔd̤ɛni nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ind̤ɔd̤a jɔmʃija ujisɛ nɔnina inamatʰɛlɛ kumkajɔ ɓaɓɛ ɲamaɲɛ kɛ ɓajɛ ɓɔɓaɓini ɓɛhamɓa z̤ɛ lɔwɔ nɔmkakʰɛ ɓɛnɡ̤ɛnaz̤intlɔni kɛ kalɔku iɲɔka jajɛ inɔɓukǃʰɔpʰɔlɔlɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ z̤asɛnɮɛ aɓɛz̤ɛnz̤ilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ jatʰi kumfaz̤i ut͡ʃilɔ ɔkunɛnɛ utʰikǁɔ ukutʰi z̤ɛ ninɡ̤aɮi kujɔ jɔnkɛ imitʰi jɔmjɛz̤ɔ watʰi umfaz̤i kwiɲɔka ɛz̤ikǃʰamɛni z̤ɛmitʰi jɔmjɛz̤ɔ sinɡ̤aɮa kɛ ɛz̤ikǃʰamɛni z̤ɔmtʰi ɔsɛmjɛz̤wɛni pʰakatʰi utʰɛ utʰikǁɔ z̤ɛ ninɡ̤aɮi kuz̤ɔ z̤ɛ ninɡ̤az̤ikǀʰukumisi ɬɛz̤ɛ nifɛ jatʰi iɲɔka kumfaz̤i anisaji kuɓa ɛsaz̤i utʰikǁɔ ukuɓa m̤lana nitʰɛ naɮa kuz̤ɔ ɔkǃaɓuka amɛɬɔ ɛnu niɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ naz̤i ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɔkuɓi waɓɔna umfaz̤i ukuɓa umtʰi ulunɡ̤ɛlɛ ukuɮiwa nɔkuɓa ujakʰanukɛka ɛmɛɬwɛni inɡ̤umtʰi ɔŋǃwɛnɛlɛkɛla ukukǃikǃisa watʰaɓatʰa ɛz̤ikǃʰamɛni z̤awɔ waɮa nɛnd̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ inajɛ jaɮa akǃaɓuka amɛɬɔ aɓɔ ɓɔɓaɓini ɓaz̤i ukuɓa ɓahamɓa z̤ɛ ɓatʰunɡ̤a amaɡ̤ǃ̤aɓi ɔmkʰiwanɛ ɓaz̤ɛnz̤ɛla imib̤iŋǃɔ ɓasiv̤a isand̤i sikajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ ɛhamɓa ɛmjɛz̤wɛni ɛmpɛpʰɛni jasɛmini ɓasuka ɓaz̤imɛla uad̤am nɔmkakʰɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓukajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛmitʰi jɔmjɛz̤ɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wamɓiz̤a uad̤am watʰi kujɛ upʰi watʰi jɛna nd̤iv̤ɛ isand̤i sakʰɔ ɛmjɛz̤wɛni nd̤asuka nd̤ɔjika nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ihamɓa z̤ɛ nd̤az̤imɛla watʰi ukǁɛlɛlwɛ nɡ̤uɓani ukuɓa uhamɓa z̤ɛ uɮilɛ kuwɔ umtʰi ɛnd̤akuwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤awɔ nd̤atʰi uz̤ɛ unɡ̤aɮi kuwɔ watʰi uad̤am umfaz̤i ɔwand̤inikajɔ ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤ujɛ ɔnd̤inikilɛjɔ kuwɔ umtʰi nd̤aɮa kɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kumfaz̤i jintɔni lɛ ntɔ ujɛnz̤ilɛjɔ watʰi umfaz̤i iɲɔka ind̤ilukuɬilɛ nd̤aɮa kɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kwiɲɔka nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛnz̤ilɛ lɛ ntɔ ukǃalɛkisiwɛ wɛna nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iz̤itʰɔ z̤inɛ nɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ z̤asɛnɮɛ uja kuhamɓa nɡ̤ɛsisu uɮɛ utʰuli jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɔɓɔmi ɓakʰɔ nd̤ija uɓut͡ʃaɓa pʰakatʰi kwakʰɔ nɔmfaz̤i napʰakatʰi kwɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ nɛmɓɛwu jakʰɛ jɔna ija kukutʲumz̤a intlɔkɔ wɛna uja kujitʲumz̤a isitʰɛnd̤ɛ watʰi kumfaz̤i nd̤ija kukwand̤isa kakʰulu ukuɓulalɛka kwakʰɔ ɛkumitʰɛni uz̤alɛ aɓantwana unɛmɓulalɛkɔ inkanukɔ jakʰɔ iɓɛ sɛnd̤ɔd̤ɛni jakʰɔ ikulawulɛ jɔna kuad̤am watʰi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa upʰulapʰulɛ iz̤wi lɔmkakʰɔ waɮa kuwɔ umtʰi ɛnd̤akuwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤awɔ nd̤atʰi uz̤ɛ unɡ̤aɮi kuwɔ ukǃalɛkisiwɛ um̤laɓa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɔ uja kuɮa kuwɔ uɓulalɛka jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɔɓɔmi ɓakʰɔ uja kukunt͡ʃulɛla imitʰana ɛnamɛv̤a nɛɛnkunz̤anɛ uɮɛ umfunɔ wasɛnɮɛ uja kuɮa ukuɮa kɔkuɓila kɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ ud̤ɛ uɓujɛlɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni kɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ ud̤ɛ uɓujɛlɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni kuɓa utʰatʲatʰwɛ kuwɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ulutʰuli uja kuɓujɛla kwasɛlutʰulini uad̤am waliɓiz̤a iɡ̤ama lɔmkakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkutʰi nɡ̤uɛv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jɛna ɛnɡ̤unina waɓapʰililɛjɔ ɓɔnkɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɛnz̤ɛla iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɛz̤int͡su uad̤am nɔmkakʰɛ waɓamɓatʰisa watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ jaɓɔnani usukɛ waɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɲɛ wɛtʰu ukwaz̤i ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɔkuɓi ɬɛz̤ɛ kɛ ɔlulɛ isanɮa sakʰɛ atʰaɓatʰɛ nakuwɔ umtʰi wɔɓɔmi aɮɛ apʰilɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wamnd̤ulula ɛmjɛz̤wɛni wɛɛd̤ɛn ukuɓa asɛɓɛnz̤ɛ um̤laɓa aɓɛtʰatʲatʰwɛ kuwɔ wamɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa kɛ nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a kuwɔ umjɛz̤ɔ wɛɛd̤ɛn iikɛrub̤i nɛlanɡ̤atʲɛ lɛk͡xɛlɛ ɛlid͡ʒ̤ikad͡ʒ̤ikajɔ lɔkuɡ̤ǀ̤ina inɮɛla ɛja ɛmtʰini wɔɓɔmi kɛ kalɔku uad̤am wamaz̤i uɛv̤a umkakʰɛ wamitʰa waz̤ala ukajin watʰi nd̤iz̤uz̤ɛ ind̤ɔd̤a nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a wapʰind̤a waz̤ala wakʰɛ uab̤ɛli uab̤ɛli waɓa nɡ̤umalusi wɛz̤imv̤u ukajin waɓa nɡ̤umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɔm̤laɓa kwatʰi ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwamiɬa itʰilɛ ukajin watʰaɓatʰa ɛz̤ikǃʰamɛni z̤ɔm̤laɓa waz̤isa umnikɛlɔ kujɛhɔv̤a uab̤ɛli waz̤isa najɛ ɛtʰaɓatʰɛ kumaz̤iɓulɔ ɛz̤imv̤u z̤akʰɛ kwɛz̤inamaŋǃatʰa waz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a wamb̤ɛka uab̤ɛli nɔmnikɛlɔ wakʰɛ akamb̤ɛka ukajin nɔmnikɛlɔ wakʰɛ wakǃumɓa kunɛnɛ ukajin ɓasanɡ̤ana uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kukajin jini ukuɓa ukǃumɓɛ jini ukuɓa ɓusanɡ̤anɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ walunɡ̤isa aɓuji kuswaɓuluka uɓusɔ jini ukuɓa utʰɛ akwalunɡ̤isa isɔnɔ siɓutʰumilɛ nɡ̤asɛsanɡ̤wɛni siŋ̤ǁ̤amɛlɛ wɛna kɛ wɛna silawulɛ watʰɛtʰa ukajin nɔab̤ɛli wakʰɛ kwatʰi ɓɛsɛnɮɛ wɛsuka ukajin wamv̤unukɛla uab̤ɛli wakʰɛ wamɓulala watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kukajin upʰi uab̤ɛli wakʰɔ watʰi jɛna and̤az̤i nd̤inɡ̤umɡ̤ǀ̤ini wɔmninawa jini watʰi wɛnz̤ɛ ntɔni iz̤wi lɛɡ̤az̤i lɔmninawa wakʰɔ lijakʰala ɛm̤laɓɛni nɡ̤ɔkɔ ukǃalɛkisiwɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni ɔwakʰamisɛ umlɔmɔ wawɔ ukuɓa ulitʰaɓatʰɛ iɡ̤az̤i lɔmninawa wakʰɔ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ kǁɛnikwɛni uwusɛɓɛnz̤ajɔ um̤laɓa awusaji kupʰind̤a ukunikɛ amanɮa awɔ uja kub̤ad̤ula upʰalapʰalɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini watʰi ukajin kujɛhɔv̤a itʲala likʰulu nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤ɛnakutʰwalwa jaɓɔna und̤iɡ̤ǁ̤d̤ɔtʰilɛ nam̤la pʰɛz̤u kɔm̤laɓa nd̤ija kusitʰɛla nasɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɔ nd̤ib̤ad̤ulɛ nd̤ipʰalapʰalɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini ɓatʰi ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓand̤ifumanajɔ ɓand̤iɓulalɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɛ kǁa kund͡ʒ̤alɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓulala ukajin kɔpʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlwa kuɓɔ kasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wammisɛla ukajin umkǃɔnd̤isɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓamfumanajɔ ɓanɡ̤amsiki wapʰuma ukajin wɛmka ɛɓuswɛni ɓukajɛhɔv̤a waɬala ɛz̤wɛni lakwakupʰalapʰala pʰamɓi kwɛɛd̤ɛn ukajin wamaz̤i umkakʰɛ wamitʰa waz̤ala uɛnɔki wakʰa umz̤i wawutʰija lɔɔ mz̤i nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama lɔɲana wakʰɛ uɛnɔki uɛnɔki waz̤alɛlwa uirad̤i uirad̤i waz̤ala umɛhujahɛli umɛhujahɛli waz̤ala umɛtusahɛli umɛtusahɛli waz̤ala ulamɛki ulamɛki waz̤ɛka aɓafaz̤i aɓaɓini iɡ̤ama lɔmɲɛ ɓɛlinɡ̤uad̤a iɡ̤ama lɔwɛsiɓini ɓɛlinɡ̤uz̤ila uad̤a waz̤ala ujab̤ali jɛna waɓa nɡ̤ujisɛ waɓaɬala ɛz̤intɛntɛni naɓafujilɛjɔ iɡ̤ama lɔmninawa wakʰɛ ɓɛlinɡ̤ujub̤ali jɛna waɓa nɡ̤ujisɛ waɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓapʰatʰa uhad̤i nɔɡ̤wali uz̤ila utʰɛ najɛ waz̤ala utub̤alɛkajin ɔɓɛkʰand̤a jɔnkɛ impaɬa ɛnɔɓukʰali jɔb̤ɛd̤u nɛsiɲitʰi ud̤ad̤ɛ wɔtub̤alɛkajin ɛɓɛnɡ̤unahama watʰi ulamɛki kuɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɛ ad̤a nɔz̤ila liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi ɓafaz̤i ɓakalamɛki pʰulapʰulani intɛtʰɔ jam sɛnd̤iɓulɛlɛ ind̤ɔd̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛŋǁɛɓa nɛnd̤ɔd̤ana nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmv̤umɓɔ kǁa ukajin aja kupʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlwa kasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ jɛna ulamɛki uja kupʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlwa kamaʃumi ɔsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ uad̤am waɓuja wamaz̤i umkakʰɛ waz̤ala uɲana watʰi iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ nɡ̤usɛtɛ kuɓa watʰi utʰikǁɔ und̤imisɛlɛ ɛɲɛ imɓɛwu ɛsikʰunɮɛni sikaab̤ɛli ɔwaɓulawa nɡ̤ukajin usɛtɛ najɛ waz̤alɛlwa uɲana watʰi iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ nɡ̤uɛnɔʃɛ kwakǃalwa ɔkɔ ukuŋǃulwa iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a jijɔ lɛ iŋǀwad̤i jɛnz̤ala kaad̤am m̤lana utʰikǁɔ wamd̤ala wamɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkufana nɔtʰikǁɔ wad̤ala ind̤ɔd̤a nɛnkaz̤ana waɓasikɛlɛla waɓatʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤uad̤am m̤lana waɓad̤ala uad̤am waɬala imiɲaka ɛlikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi matʰatʰu waz̤ala uɲana nɡ̤ɔkufana najɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔmfanɛkisɔ wakʰɛ wamtʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤usɛtɛ imiɬa kaad̤am ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuz̤ala kwakʰɛ usɛtɛ jaɓa jimiɲaka ɛmakʰulu asib̤ɔz̤ɔ waz̤ala ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi ijɔnkɛ imiɬa kaad̤am awaɬala nɡ̤ajɔ jaɓa jimiɲaka ɛmakʰulu asitʰɔɓa anamaŋǀi matʰatʰu kɛ usɛtɛ waɬala imiɲaka ɛlikʰulu ɛlinamiɲaka miɬanu waz̤ala uɛnɔʃɛ usɛtɛ waɬala ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuz̤ala kwakʰɛ uɛnɔʃɛ imiɲaka ɛmakʰulu asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anɛmiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ waz̤ala ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi ijɔnkɛ imiɬa kasɛtɛ jaɓa jimiɲaka ɛmakʰulu asitʰɔɓa anaʃumiɲɛ linamiɓini kɛ uɛnɔʃɛ waɬala imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi asitʰɔɓa waz̤ala ukɛnan uɛnɔʃɛ waɬala ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuz̤ala kwakʰɛ ukɛnan imiɲaka ɛmakʰulu asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anaʃumiɲɛ linamiɬanu waz̤ala ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi ijɔnkɛ imiɬa kaɛnɔʃɛ jaɓa jimiɲaka ɛmakʰulu asitʰɔɓa anamiɬanu kɛ ukɛnan waɬala imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ waz̤ala umahalalɛli ukɛnan waɬala ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuz̤ala kwakʰɛ umahalalɛli imiɲaka ɛmakʰulu asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anamaŋǀi manɛ waz̤ala ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi ijɔnkɛ imiɬa kakɛnan jaɓa jimiɲaka ɛmakʰulu asitʰɔɓa anɛmiɲaka ɛliʃumi kɛ umahalalɛli waɬala imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi matʰand̤atʰu anamiɬanu waz̤ala ujɛrɛd̤ɛ umahalalɛli waɬala ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuz̤ala kwakʰɛ ujɛrɛd̤ɛ imiɲaka ɛmakʰulu asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anamaŋǀi matʰatʰu waz̤ala ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi ijɔnkɛ imiɬa kamahalalɛli jaɓa jimiɲaka ɛmakʰulu asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anamaŋǀi asitʰɔɓa anamiɬanu kɛ ujɛrɛd̤ɛ waɬala imiɲaka ɛlikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi matʰand̤atʰu anamiɓini waz̤ala uɛnɔki ujɛrɛd̤ɛ waɬala ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuz̤ala kwakʰɛ uɛnɔki imiɲaka ɛmakʰulu asib̤ɔz̤ɔ waz̤ala ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi ijɔnkɛ imiɬa kajɛrɛd̤ɛ jaɓa jimiɲaka ɛmakʰulu asitʰɔɓa anamaŋǀi matʰand̤atʰu anamiɬanu anamiɓini kɛ uɛnɔki waɬala imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi matʰand̤atʰu anamiɬanu waz̤ala umɛtʰusɛla uɛnɔki wahamɓa nɔtʰikǁɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuz̤ala kwakʰɛ umɛtʰusɛla imiɲaka ɛmakʰulu matʰatʰu waz̤ala ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi ijɔnkɛ imiɬa kaɛnɔki jaɓa jimiɲaka ɛmakʰulu matʰatʰu anamaŋǀi matʰand̤atʰu anamiɬanu uɛnɔki wahamɓa nɔtʰikǁɔ akaɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰikǁɔ wamtʰaɓatʰa umɛtʰusɛla waɬala imiɲaka ɛlikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ waz̤ala ulamɛki umɛtʰusɛla waɬala ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuz̤ala kwakʰɛ ulamɛki imiɲaka ɛmakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamaŋǀi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anamiɓini waz̤ala ɔɔɲana ɛnɛɛntɔmɓi ijɔnkɛ imiɬa kamɛtʰusɛla jaɓa jimiɲaka ɛmakʰulu asitʰɔɓa anamaŋǀi matʰand̤atʰu anɛsitʰɔɓa kɛ ulamɛki waɬala imiɲaka ɛlikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anamiɓini waz̤ala uɲana wamtʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤unɔwa ɛsitʰi lɔ uja kusitʰutʰuz̤ɛla ɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini wɛtʰu nasɛkuɓulalɛkɛni kwɛz̤anɮa z̤ɛtʰu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔm̤laɓa awawukǃalɛkisajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ulamɛki waɬala ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuz̤ala kwakʰɛ unɔwa imiɲaka ɛmakulu maɬanu anamaŋǀi asitʰɔɓa anamiɬanu waz̤ala ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi ijɔnkɛ imiɬa kalamɛki jaɓa jimiɲaka ɛmakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kɛ kɛ unɔwa ɛɓɛmiɲaka imakʰulu maɬanu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ unɔwa waz̤ala ɔɔʃɛm nɔham nɔjafɛtɛ kutʰɛ ɓakukǃala ukwand̤a aɓantu ɛɬaɓatʰini ɓakuz̤alɛlwa iintɔmɓi ɓaz̤iɓɔna ɔɔɲana ɓakatʰikǁɔ iintɔmɓi z̤aɓantu ukuɓa z̤intlɛ ɓaz̤ɛka aɓafaz̤i kuz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ aɓaz̤iɲulajɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a umɔja akaji ɛɓantwini nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ ɛkulaɬɛkɛni kwaɓɔ ɓajiɲama imiɬa jaɓɔ ija kuɓa jimiɲaka ɛlikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɓini kwakukʰɔ iiŋ̤ǁ̤ilimɓɛla ɛɬaɓatʰini nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ kǁɛʃikwɛni ɔɔɲana ɓakatʰikǁɔ ɓanɡ̤ɛnajɔ kuz̤ɔ iintɔmɓi z̤aɓantu z̤aɓaz̤alɛla aɓantwana aɓa ɓaɓa nɡ̤amaɡ̤ɔxa aɓaɓɛkʰɔ kwasɛpʰakad̤ɛni amad̤ɔd̤a ad̤umilɛjɔ waɓɔna utʰikǁɔ ukuɓa uɓuɓi ɓaɓantu ɓand̤ilɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini kɔnkɛ ukujila kwɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ kuɓuɓuɓi ɓɔd̤wa imiɬa jɔnkɛ waz̤ɔɬwaja ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛmɛnz̤ilɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini kwaɓa ɓuɬunɡ̤u kujɛ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kumkǀima ɛnd̤imd̤alilɛjɔ anɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ɛɬaɓatʰini kutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛmntwini kusɛ ɛz̤inkɔmɛni kusɛ ɛz̤inamɓuz̤anɛni kusɛ ɛz̤intakɛni z̤ɛz̤ulu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iz̤ɔɬwaja nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iz̤ɛnz̤ilɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ unɔwa jɛna waɓaɓalwa nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a jijɔ lɛ kɛ inz̤ala kanɔwa unɔwa wajɛ ɛjind̤ɔd̤a ɛlilunɡ̤isa ɛɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ ɛz̤iz̤ukulwanɛni z̤akʰɛ unɔwa wahamɓa nɔtʰikǁɔ unɔwa waz̤ala ɔɔɲana aɓatʰatʰu uʃɛm nɔham nɔjafɛtɛ iɬaɓatʰi lalɔnakɛlɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓukatʰikǁɔ iɬaɓatʰi laliz̤ɛlɛ luɡ̤ɔɲamɛlɔ utʰikǁɔ walikʰanɡ̤ɛla iɬaɓatʰi nalɔ lɔnakɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jɔnkɛ iɲama iɓijɔnakalisilɛ inɮɛla jajɔ ɛɬaɓatʰini watʰi utʰikǁɔ kunɔwa isipʰɛlɔ sɛɲama jɔnkɛ sifikilɛ pʰamɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iɬaɓatʰi liz̤ɛlɛ luɡ̤ɔɲamɛlɔ ɔlupʰuma kuɓɔ jaɓɔna kɛ nd̤ija kuɓɔnakalisa ɓɔna nd̤awɔɲɛ nɛɬaɓatʰi z̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ kɛ umkʰɔmɓɛ nɡ̤ɛmitʰi jɛɡ̤ɔfɛrɛ uwɛnz̤ɛ iz̤inɮu umkʰɔmɓɛ uwukǃaɓɛ nɡ̤apʰakatʰi nanɡ̤apʰanɮɛ nɡ̤ɛb̤itumɛnɛ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuwɛnz̤a ɓuɓɛ nɡ̤amakʰulu ɔmatʰatʰu ɛɛkub̤itɛ uɓud̤ɛ ɓɔmkʰɔmɓɛ namaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu ɛɛkub̤itɛ uɓuɓanz̤i ɓawɔ namaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu ɛɛkub̤itɛ ukupʰakama kwawɔ wɛnz̤ɛ ik͡xɔɓa ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni ukuliɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa kwakʰɔ kuɓɛ jikub̤itɛ ɛɲɛ itʰaɓatʰɛla pʰɛz̤ulu umɲanɡ̤ɔ wɔmkʰɔmɓɛ uwumisɛ ɛkǀalɛni lawɔ wɛnz̤ɛ iz̤inɮu z̤ɔd̤id̤i lwapʰant͡si nɔlwɛsiɓini nɔlwɛsitʰatʰu mna kɛ ujaɓɔna nd̤iɬisa unɔɡ̤umɓɛ wamanz̤i ɛɬaɓatʰini wɔkɔnakalisa jɔnkɛ iɲama ɛnɔmɔja wɔkupʰila kujɔ ɛpʰant͡si kwamaz̤ulu kɔnkɛ ɔkusɛɬaɓatʰini kuja kupʰuma umpʰɛfumlɔ nd̤iwumisɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nawɛ unɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni wɛna nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nɔmkakʰɔ naɓafaz̤i ɓɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nd̤awɔɲɛ nawɛ kwiz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ kwiɲama jɔnkɛ uz̤ɛ unɡ̤ɛnisɛ ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni nɡ̤amɓini kuz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ukuz̤ɛ z̤isind̤iswɛ nawɛ iɓɛ jinkunz̤i nɛmaz̤i nɡ̤ɔɬɔɓɔ lwaz̤ɔ kwiinkɔmɔ nɡ̤ɔɬɔɓɔ lwaz̤ɔ kuz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤inamɓuz̤anɛ z̤ɔm̤laɓa nɡ̤ɔɬɔɓɔ lwaz̤ɔ z̤iɓɛ nɡ̤amɓini kuz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ija kunɡ̤ɛna kuwɛ ukuɓa z̤isind̤iswɛ wɛna kɛ utʰaɓatʰɛlɛ kuwɛ ɛkuɮɛni kɔnkɛ ɔkuɮiwajɔ uɬanɡ̤anisɛlɛ kuwɛ kuɓɛ kukuɮa kuwɛ nakuz̤ɔ wɛnz̤a unɔwa kɔnkɛ utʰikǁɔ aɓɛmwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ wɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kunɔwa nɡ̤ɛna wɛna nɛnɮu jakʰɔ jɔnkɛ ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iɓɔna wɛna ilunɡ̤isa pʰamɓi kwɛsi siz̤ukulwana kwiz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iz̤itʰɔ z̤inɛ ɛz̤iɬamɓulukilɛjɔ tʰaɓatʰɛla kuwɛ nɡ̤asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ inkunz̤i nɛmaz̤i jajɔ kwiz̤intɔ ɛz̤iz̤itʰɔ z̤inɛ ɛz̤iz̤iiŋǃamɓi tʰaɓatʰa nɡ̤amɓini inkunz̤i nɛmaz̤i jajɔ z̤ɛz̤ulu nɡ̤asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ inkunz̤i nɛmaz̤i ukuz̤ɛ imɓɛwu iɡ̤ǀ̤inakalɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini lɔnkɛ kuɓa z̤isɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ iint͡suku nd̤iz̤ɛ nd̤inisɛ imv̤ula ɛɬaɓatʰini z̤iɓɛ maʃumi manɛ nɔɓusuku ɔɓumaʃumi manɛ nd̤ijikǀimɛ intɔ jɔnkɛ ɛmijɔ ɛnd̤ajɛnz̤ajɔ inɡ̤aɓikʰɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɬaɓatʰi wɛnz̤a unɔwa kɔnkɛ ujɛhɔv̤a awamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ unɔwa wajɛ ɛmiɲaka imakʰulu matʰand̤atʰu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ waɓakʰɔ unɔɡ̤umɓɛ wamanz̤i ɛɬaɓatʰini wanɡ̤ɛna unɔwa ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni ɛnɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nɔmkakʰɛ naɓafaz̤i ɓɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ najɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamanz̤i ɔnɔɡ̤umɓɛ kuz̤ɔ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iz̤itʰɔ z̤inɛ ɛz̤iɬamɓulukilɛjɔ nakuz̤ɔ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iz̤itʰɔ z̤inɛ ɛz̤iz̤iiŋǃamɓi nakuz̤ɔ nakuz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inamɓuz̤ɛlajɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni kwanɡ̤ɛna nɡ̤amɓini nɡ̤amɓini kunɔwa ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni inkunz̤i nɛmaz̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ utʰikǁɔ aɓɛmwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ unɔwa kwatʰi ɛmv̤a kwɛɛnt͡suku ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ amanz̤i ɔnɔɡ̤umɓɛ aɓakʰɔ ɛɬaɓatʰini nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamakʰulu ɔmatʰand̤atʰu wɔkuɮa uɓɔmi kukanɔwa nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsiɓini nɡ̤ɔsuku lwɛʃumi ɛlinɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ kaɲɛ nɡ̤ajɔ lɔɔ jaɡ̤ǃ̤ab̤uka jɔnkɛ imitʰɔmɓɔ jamanz̤i ɛnz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓila ɛnkulu iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤ɛz̤ulu z̤av̤ulɛka waɓakʰɔ umv̤umɓi wɛmv̤ula ɛɬaɓatʰini ɛz̤imaʃumi manɛ nɔɓusuku ɔɓumaʃumi wanɡ̤ɛna ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni kwanɡ̤alɔɔ unɔwa nɔʃɛm nɔham nɔjafɛtɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakanɔwa nɔmkanɔwa naɓafaz̤i ɓɔɓatʰatʰu ɓɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ najɛ ɓɔna nɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔɬɔɓɔ lwaz̤ɔ nɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iz̤itʰɔ z̤inɛ nɡ̤ɔɬɔɓɔ lwaz̤ɔ nɛz̤inamɓuz̤anɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤inamɓuz̤ɛlajɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni nɡ̤ɔɬɔɓɔ lwaz̤ɔ nɛɛntaka z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔɬɔɓɔ lwaz̤ɔ iintɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ipʰapʰaz̤ɛlajɔ ɛz̤inamapʰikɔ z̤anɡ̤ɛna kunɔwa ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni nɡ̤amɓini nɡ̤amɓini kwiɲama jɔnkɛ ɛnɔmɔja wɔkupʰila kujɔ z̤anɡ̤ɛna iinkunz̤i nɛɛmaz̤i kwiɲama jɔnkɛ z̤anɡ̤ɛna nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ utʰikǁɔ aɓɛmwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wamv̤alɛla nɡ̤apʰakatʰi jaɓa nɡ̤unɔɡ̤umɓɛ imiɬa ɛmaʃumi manɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini ɛɲuka amanz̤i umkʰɔmɓɛ wafuŋǃulɛka ɛm̤laɓɛni aɓa namanɮa amanz̤i ɛɲuka kunɛnɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini wahamɓa umkʰɔmɓɛ pʰɛz̤u kwamanz̤i aɓa namanɮa amanz̤i kunɛnɛ kakʰulu ɛɬaɓatʰini z̤aɡ̤utʲunɡ̤ɛlwa z̤ɔnkɛ iintaɓa ɛz̤ipʰakamilɛjɔ kakʰulu ɛz̤ipʰant͡si kwamaz̤ulu ɔnkɛ aɓa namanɮa amanz̤i ad̤a aɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛlinantlanu ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla pʰɛz̤ulu z̤aɡ̤utʲunɡ̤ɛlwa kɛ iintaɓa japʰuma umpʰɛfumlɔ jɔnkɛ iɲama ɛnamɓuz̤ɛlajɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni nakwiz̤intɔ ɛz̤iz̤itʰɔ z̤inɛ nakwiz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ nakwiɲakaɲaka jɔnkɛ ɛɲakaz̤ɛlajɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ iintɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ikupʰɛfumla kɔmɔja wɔkupʰila kusɛmatʰatʰɛni az̤ɔ kwiintɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤isɛm̤laɓɛni ɔwɔmilɛjɔ z̤afa z̤ab̤ud͡ʒ̤iswa kɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤imijɔ ɛz̤ipʰɛz̤u kɔm̤laɓa kwatʰaɓatʰɛla ɛmntwini kwɛsa ɛz̤intwɛni ɛz̤iz̤itʰɔ z̤inɛ nasɛz̤inamɓuz̤anɛni nasɛz̤intakɛni z̤ɛz̤ulu z̤ab̤ud͡ʒ̤iswa az̤aɓakʰɔ ɛɬaɓatʰini unɔwa jɛd̤wa naɓaɓɛnajɛ ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni aɓa namanɮa amanz̤i ɛɬaɓatʰini imiɬa ɛlikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɬanu utʰikǁɔ wamkʰumɓula unɔwa nɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ nɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iz̤itʰɔ z̤inɛ ɛz̤az̤inajɛ ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni utʰikǁɔ wahamɓisa umɔja ɛɬaɓatʰini awutʰa amanz̤i jav̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wa imitʰɔmɓɔ jamanz̤i ɛnz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓila nɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤ɛz̤ulu watʰintɛlwa umv̤umɓi wɛz̤ulu aɓuja amanz̤i ɛm̤laɓɛni ɛɓuja awutʰa amanz̤i ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɬa ɛlikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɬanu umkʰɔmɓɛ waz̤imisa nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤ɔsuku lwɛʃumi ɛlinɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntaɓa z̤asɛararati amanz̤i ɛwutʰa kwad̤a kwajiɲanɡ̤a jɛʃumi nɡ̤ɛjɛʃumi kɛ nɡ̤ɔsuku lɔkukǃala ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ z̤aɓɔnakala iiŋǀɔpʰɔ z̤ɛɛntaɓa kwatʰi ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɬa ɛmaʃumi manɛ wajiv̤ula unɔwa ifɛstilɛ jɔmkʰɔmɓɛ aɓɛjɛnz̤ilɛ watʰuma iɬunɡ̤ulu lapʰuma liz̤ulaz̤ula ad̤a at͡ʃa amanz̤i ɛɬaɓatʰini wasusa ihɔɓɛ ukuz̤ɛ aɓɔnɛ ukuɓa amanz̤i awutʰilɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɬaɓatʰi ihɔɓɛ alifumananɡ̤a nd̤awɔ jakupʰumz̤a nɛntɛnd̤ɛ jɛtʰupʰa lalɔ laɓujɛla kujɛ ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa amanz̤i aɓɛpʰɛz̤u kwɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ wɔlula isanɮa sakʰɛ walitʰaɓatʰa walinɡ̤ɛnisa kujɛ ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni walind̤a ɛmiɲɛ imiɬa ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wapʰind̤a ihɔɓɛ ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni lɛz̤a kujɛ ihɔɓɛ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lanɡ̤ɔkuɬwa nankɔ kukʰɔ iɡ̤ǃ̤aɓi lɔmŋǃuma ɛlisand̤ula ukukʰiwa ɛmlɔɲɛni walɔ waz̤i unɔwa ukuɓa ɛɬilɛ amanz̤i ɛɬaɓatʰini walind̤a ɛmiɲɛ imiɬa ɛkwasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ihɔɓɛ alipʰind̤anɡ̤a liɓujɛlɛ kujɛ kand͡ʒ̤alɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamakʰulu ɔmatʰand̤atʰu anamɲɛ nɡ̤ɔlɔkukǃala ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni jɔkukǃala amanz̤i at͡ʃa ɛɬaɓatʰini unɔwa upʰaɬa lɔmkʰɔmɓɛ wakʰanɡ̤ɛla nanɡ̤ɔ um̤laɓa wɔmilɛ nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsiɓini nɡ̤ɔsuku lwamaʃumi ɔmaɓini anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ wɔma kwapʰɛla um̤laɓa watʰɛtʰa utʰikǁɔ kunɔwa ɛsitʰi pʰuma ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni wɛna nɔmkakʰɔ nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ naɓafaz̤i ɓɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nd̤awɔɲɛ nawɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ ɛz̤ikuwɛ kwiɲama jɔnkɛ ɛz̤intakɛni nasɛz̤intwɛni ɛz̤iz̤itʰɔ z̤inɛ nasɛz̤inamɓuz̤anɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤inamɓuz̤ɛlajɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni pʰuma naz̤ɔ z̤iz̤alisɛ iɬaɓatʰi z̤ikǃʰamɛ z̤and̤ɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini wapʰuma kɛ unɔwa nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nɔmkakʰɛ naɓafaz̤i ɓɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ najɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤inamɓuz̤anɛ nɛɛntaka z̤ɔnkɛ iintɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤inamɓuz̤ɛlajɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni nɡ̤ɛɛntlɔɓɔ z̤az̤ɔ z̤apʰuma ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni unɔwa wamakʰɛla ujɛhɔv̤a isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ watʰaɓatʰa kwiz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iz̤itʰɔ z̤inɛ ɛz̤iɬamɓulukilɛjɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iɬamɓulukilɛjɔ waɲusa amad̤ini aɲukajɔ ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni ɛsɔ utʰikǁɔ wɛv̤a iv̤umɓa ɛlitʰɔz̤amisajɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɛ and̤isaji kupʰind̤a nd̤ilit͡ʃab̤isɛ iɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmntu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukujila kwɛntliz̤ijɔ jɔmntu kuɓi kwasɛɓut͡ʃɛni ɓakʰɛ and̤isaji kupʰind̤a nd̤iz̤ib̤ub̤isɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ kutʰaɓatʰɛla apʰa nɡ̤ajɔ jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɛɬaɓatʰi akuji kupʰɛla ukuɬwajɛla nɔkuv̤una ukuɓand̤a nɔɓuʃuʃu iɬɔɓɔ nɔɓusika nɔɓusuku utʰikǁɔ wamsikɛlɛla unɔwa nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ watʰi kuɓɔ kǃʰamani nand̤ɛ niz̤alisɛ iɬaɓatʰi ukɔjikɛka kwɛnu nɔkukǃʰipʰula kwɛnu umɓilini makuɓɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ z̤ɔm̤laɓa napʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntaka z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛz̤ulu nakwiintɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤inamɓuz̤ɛlajɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni nakwiintlanz̤i z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɔlwanɮɛ z̤ɔna z̤inikɛlwɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɛnu z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤inamɓuz̤anɛ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ maz̤iɓɛ kukuɮa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmfunɔ ɔluɬaz̤a nd̤ininikilɛ ɔkɔ kɔnkɛ jiɲama jɔd̤wa ɛnɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wajɔ ɛnɛɡ̤az̤i lajɔ ɛninɡ̤asaji kujiɮa liɡ̤az̤i lɛnu lɔd̤wa imipʰɛfumlɔ jɛnu kɛ ɛnd̤ija kuliɓiz̤a ɛsanɮɛni sɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ nd̤ija kuliɓiz̤a nasɛsanɮɛni sɔmntu ɛsanɮɛni salɔwɔ unɡ̤umz̤alwana wakʰɛ nd̤ija kuwuɓiz̤a umpʰɛfumlɔ wɔmntu ɔpʰalaz̤a iɡ̤az̤i lɔmntu iɡ̤az̤i lakʰɛ lɔpʰalaz̤wa nɡ̤umntu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛnz̤iwa nɡ̤ɔkɔmfanɛkisɛlɔ katʰikǁɔ nina kɛ kǃʰamani nand̤ɛ niliz̤alisɛ iɬaɓatʰi nand̤ɛ kulɔ wat͡ʃɔ utʰikǁɔ kunɔwa nakɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ najɛ ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤ijawumisa umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nɛmɓɛwu jɛnu ɛmv̤a kwɛnu najɔ jɔnkɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ ɛpʰililɛjɔ ɛkuni nakwiz̤intɔ ɛz̤iz̤itʰɔ z̤inɛ nakwiz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi ɛz̤ikuni kwiintɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ipʰumɛ ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni ɛz̤iz̤iz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi nd̤iwumisɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ukuɓa inɡ̤aɓi saŋǃuɲulwa jɔnkɛ iɲama nɡ̤amanz̤i ɔnɔɡ̤umɓɛ kunɡ̤aɓi saɓakʰɔ nɔɡ̤umɓɛ wɔkulɔnakalisa iɬaɓatʰi watʰi utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤uwɔ lɔ umkǃɔnd̤isɔ wɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɛnd̤iwuɓɛkajɔ pʰakatʰi najɔ jɔnkɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ ɛpʰililɛjɔ ɛkuni kusɛ kwiz̤iz̤ukulwana z̤asɛpʰakad̤ɛni umɲama nd̤iwuɓɛkɛ ɛfini ukuɓa uɓɛ nɡ̤umkǃɔnd̤isɔ wɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɔpʰakatʰi nɛɬaɓatʰi kɔtʰi nd̤akuwusiɓɛkɛlisa nɡ̤ɛlifu um̤laɓa uɓɔnakalɛ umɲama lɔwɔ ɛfini nd̤iwukʰumɓulɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɔpʰakatʰi najɔ jɔnkɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ ɛpʰililɛjɔ ɛɲamɛni jɔnkɛ anɡ̤aɓi saɓakʰɔ amanz̤i ɔnɔɡ̤umɓɛ ɔkɔnakalisa iɲama jɔnkɛ umɲama wɔɓa sɛmafini kɛ nd̤iwukʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ nd̤ikʰumɓulɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ pʰakatʰi kɔtʰikǁɔ najɔ jɔnkɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ ɛpʰililɛjɔ ɛɲamɛni jɔnkɛ ɛsɛɬaɓatʰini watʰi utʰikǁɔ kunɔwa nɡ̤uwɔ lɔwɔ umkǃɔnd̤isɔ wɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɛnd̤iwumisilɛjɔ pʰakatʰi najɔ jɔnkɛ iɲama ɛsɛɬaɓatʰini kɛ kalɔku ɔɔɲana ɓakanɔwa aɓapʰuma ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɔɔʃɛm nɔham nɔjafɛtɛ uham kɛ nɡ̤ujisɛ kakanan aɓa ɓatʰatʰu nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakanɔwa ɓaliz̤az̤a iɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ unɔwa watʰi ɛnɡ̤umlimi wɔm̤laɓa wakǃala watʲala isid̤ilija wasɛla iwajini waŋǁila waz̤iɬuɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛntɛntɛ jakʰɛ uham ujisɛ kakanan waɓuɓɔna uɓuz̤ɛ ɓukajisɛ wakǁɛlɛla aɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ ɓɔɓaɓini nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ uʃɛm nɔjafɛtɛ ɓatʰaɓatʰa inɡ̤uɓɔ ɓajiɓɛka ɛmaɡ̤ǁ̤ɛni aɓɔ ɓɔɓaɓini ɓaja nɡ̤ɔmv̤a ɓaɓuɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla uɓuz̤ɛ ɓukajisɛ wav̤uka unɔwa ɛwajinini jakʰɛ wakwaz̤i akwɛnz̤ilɛjɔ uɲana wakʰɛ ɔmŋǀi kujɛ watʰi makakǃalɛkiswɛ ukanan aɓɛ sisikǀaka sɛz̤ikǀaka kuɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ watʰi makaɓɔnɡ̤wɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kaʃɛm ukanan aɓɛ sisikǀaka kuɓɔ utʰikǁɔ makamv̤ulɛlɛ ujafɛtɛ aɬalɛ ɛz̤intɛntɛni z̤ikaʃɛm ukanan aɓɛ sisikǀaka kuɓɔ waɬala unɔwa ɛmv̤ɛni kɔnɔɡ̤umɓɛ imiɲaka ɛmakʰulu mtʰatʰu anamaŋǀi maɬanu jɔnkɛ imiɬa kanɔwa jaɓa jimiɲaka ɛmakʰulu asitʰɔɓa anamaŋǀi maɬanu kɛ jijɔ lɛ kɛ inz̤ala jɔɔɲana ɓakanɔwa uʃɛm nɔham nɔjafɛtɛ ɓaz̤alɛlwa ɔɔɲana ɛmv̤ɛni kɔnɔɡ̤umɓɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakajafɛtɛ nɡ̤uɡ̤ɔmɛrɛ nɔmaɡ̤ɔɡ̤i nɔmad̤aji nɔjav̤an nɔtub̤ali nɔmɛʃɛki nɔtirasi ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ɔmɛrɛ nɡ̤uaʃɛkɛnaz̤i nɔrifati nɔtɔɡ̤arma ɔɔɲana ɓakajav̤an nɡ̤uɛliʃa nɔtarʃiʃɛ nɡ̤amakiti namad̤ɔd̤an z̤ad̤aɓuka kuɓɔ aɓɔ iz̤ikǃitʰi z̤ɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛmaz̤wɛni lwaɔlɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔlwimi lwalɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛsiz̤wɛ salɔ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni z̤az̤ɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaham nɡ̤ukuʃi nɔmit͡sɛrajim nɔputi nɔkanan ɔɔɲana ɓakakuʃi nɡ̤usɛb̤a nɔhav̤ila nɔsɛb̤ɛta nɔrama nɔsab̤ɛtɛka ɔɔɲana ɓakarama nɡ̤uʃɛb̤a nɔd̤ɛd̤an ukuʃi waz̤ala unimrɔd̤i jɛna wakǃala waɓa liɡ̤ɔxa ɛɬaɓatʰini jɛna waɓa liɡ̤ɔxa lɛz̤inɡ̤ɛla pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ kwatʰiwa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔnimrɔd̤i iɡ̤ɔxa lɛz̤inɡ̤ɛla pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ukukǃala kɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ jib̤ab̤ɛli nɛɛrɛki nɛakad̤i nɛkalɛnɛ ɛz̤wɛni lɛʃinarɛ kulɔ ɛlɔ z̤wɛ wapʰuma waja kwɛlasɛasirija wikʰa ininɛv̤ɛ nɛrɛhɔb̤ɔtirɛ nɔmz̤i wɛkala nɛrɛz̤ɛn pʰakatʰi kwɛninɛv̤ɛ nɛkala nɡ̤ulɔɔ mz̤i mkʰulu kɛ lɔwɔ umitz̤ɛrajim waz̤ala amalud̤i namaanam namalɛhab̤i namanafɛtuji namapatrusi namakasɛluji apʰɔ kwapʰuma kʰɔna amafilisti namakafɛtɔri ukanan waz̤ala ut͡sid̤ɔn ɔwamaz̤i ɓulɔ wakʰɛ nɔhɛti namajɛb̤usi namaamɔri namaɡ̤irɡ̤aʃi namahiv̤i namaarɛki namasin namaarv̤ad̤i namat͡sɛmari namahamati ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ z̤apʰanɡ̤alala iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤amakanan umd̤a wamakanan watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛt͡sid̤ɔn wasinɡ̤a ɛɡ̤ɛrarɛ ɛɡ̤az̤a wasinɡ̤a ɛsɔd̤ɔm nɛɡ̤ɔmɔra nɛad̤ama nɛt͡sɛb̤ɔjim ɛlaʃa nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaham nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛlwimi z̤aɓɔ ɛmaz̤wɛni aɓɔ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni z̤aɓɔ uʃɛm waz̤alɛlwa najɛ unɡ̤ujisɛ waɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛb̤ɛrɛ unɡ̤umz̤alwana ɔmkʰulu kajafɛtɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃɛm nɡ̤uɛlam nɔasuri nɔarpakiʃad̤i nɔlud̤i nɔaram ɔɔɲana ɓakaaram nɡ̤uut͡sɛ nɔhuli nɔɡ̤ɛtɛrɛ nɔmaʃi uarpakiʃad̤i waz̤ala uʃɛla uʃɛla waz̤ala uɛb̤ɛrɛ uɛb̤ɛrɛ waz̤alɛlwa ɔɔɲana ɓaɓaɓini iɡ̤ama lɔmɲɛ ɓɛlinɡ̤upɛlɛɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jakʰɛ ɓaɬukaɬuka aɓɛmi ɓɛɬaɓatʰi iɡ̤ama lɔmninawa wakʰɛ ɓɛlinɡ̤ujɔkɛtan ujɔkɛtan waz̤ala ualɛmɔd̤ad̤i nɔʃɛlɛfɛ nɔhat͡sarɛmav̤ɛtɛ nɔjɛra nɔhad̤ɔram nɔuz̤ali nɔd̤ikɛla nɔɔb̤ali nɔab̤imajɛli nɔʃɛb̤a nɔɔfirɛ nɔhav̤ila nɔjɔb̤ab̤i ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ ɓanɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakajɔkɛtan ukuma kwaɓɔ kwatʰaɓatʰɛla ɛmɛʃa kwasinɡ̤a ɛz̤ɛfara intaɓa jasɛmpumalanɡ̤a nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃɛm nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛlwimi z̤aɓɔ ɛmaz̤wɛni aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛntlanɡ̤a z̤aɓɔ z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakanɔwa nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛnz̤alɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni z̤aɓɔ z̤ad̤aɓuka kuɓɔ aɓɔ iintlanɡ̤a ɛɬaɓatʰini ɛmv̤ɛni kɔnɔɡ̤umɓɛ kɛ kalɔku lɔnkɛ iɬaɓatʰi liɓɛ lintɛtʰɔɲɛ limaz̤wi maɲɛ kwatʰi ɛkund̤ulukɛni kwaɓɔ ɓɛsinɡ̤a ɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɓafumana itʰafa ɛz̤wɛni lasɛʃinarɛ ɓaɬala kʰɔna ɓatʰi aɓaɲɛ kwaɓaɲɛ jiz̤ani sɛnz̤ɛ iz̤itɛna siz̤it͡ʃisɛ kunɛnɛ ɓaɓa nɛz̤itɛna ɛnd̤awɛni jamatʲɛ nɛb̤itumɛnɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jɔd̤aka ɓatʰi jiz̤ani siz̤akʰɛlɛ umz̤i nɛpɔma lɛŋǃaɓa ɛliŋǀɔpʰɔ isɛmaz̤ulwini siz̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ iɡ̤ama ɬɛz̤ɛ sikǀʰitʰakalɛlɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini lɔnkɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛɬa ɛz̤a kukʰanɡ̤ɛla umz̤i lɔwɔ nɛŋǃaɓa lɛjɔ ind̤ɛ ɓajakʰajɔ ɔɔɲana ɓɔluntu watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a jaɓɔna aɓantu ɓaɲɛ ɓantɛtʰɔɲɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla jiŋ̤ǃ̤alɔ kɛ lɛ jɔkwɛnz̤a kwaɓɔ kalɔku aɓaji kuŋǃatʲɛlwa ntɔ ɓajiŋ̰ǃ̰anɡ̤ijɛlɛjɔ ukujɛnz̤a jiz̤ani siɬɛ sid̤uɓɛ kʰɔna apʰɔ intɛtʰɔ jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔkuz̤ɛ ɓanɡ̤ɛv̤ani nɡ̤ɛntɛtʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓakǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰa kwalapʰɔ ɛɬaɓatʰini lɔnkɛ ɓajɛka ukuwakʰa lɔɔ mz̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ kwatʰiwa iɡ̤ama lawɔ jib̤ab̤ɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a wajid̤uɓa kʰɔna apʰɔ intɛtʰɔ jɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ waɓakǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰa kwalapʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɬaɓatʰini lɔnkɛ jijɔ lɛ kɛ inz̤ala kaʃɛm uʃɛm uɓɛmiɲaka ilikʰulu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ waz̤ala uarpakiʃad̤i imiɲaka ɛmiɓini ɛmv̤ɛni kɔnɔɡ̤umɓɛ uʃɛm waɬala ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuz̤ala kwakʰɛ uarpakiʃad̤i imiɲaka ɛmakʰulu maɬanu waz̤ala ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi uarpakiʃad̤i waɬala imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi matʰatʰu anamiɬanu waz̤ala uʃɛla uarpakiʃad̤i waɬala ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuz̤ala kwakʰɛ uʃɛla imiɲaka ɛmakʰulu manɛ anamatʰatʰu waz̤ala ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi uʃɛla waɬala imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi matʰatʰu waz̤ala uɛb̤ɛrɛ uʃɛla waɬala ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuz̤ala kwakʰɛ uɛb̤ɛrɛ imiɲaka ɛmakʰulu manɛ anamitʰatʰu waz̤ala ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi uɛb̤ɛrɛ waɬala imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi matʰatʰu anaminɛ waz̤ala upɛlɛɡ̤ɛ uɛb̤ɛrɛ waɬala ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuz̤ala kwakʰɛ upɛlɛɡ̤ɛ imiɲaka ɛmakʰulu manɛ anamaŋǀi matʰatʰu waz̤ala ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi upɛlɛɡ̤ɛ waɬala imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi matʰatʰu waz̤ala urɛhu upɛlɛɡ̤ɛ waɬala ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuz̤ala kwakʰɛ urɛhu imiɲaka ɛmakʰulu maɓini anɛsitʰɔɓa waz̤ala ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi urɛhu waɬala imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi matʰatʰu anamiɓini waz̤ala usɛruɡ̤i urɛhu waɬala ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuz̤ala kwakʰɛ usɛruɡ̤i imiɲaka ɛmakʰulu maɓini anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ waz̤ala ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi usɛruɡ̤i waɬala imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi matʰatʰu waz̤ala unahɔrɛ usɛruɡ̤i waɬala ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuz̤ala kwakʰɛ unahɔrɛ imiɲaka ɛmakʰulu maɓini waz̤ala ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi unahɔrɛ waɬala imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi maɓini anɛsitʰɔɓa waz̤ala utɛra unahɔrɛ waɬala ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuz̤ala kwakʰɛ utɛra imiɲaka ɛlikʰulu ɛlinaʃumiɲɛ linɛsitʰɔɓa waz̤ala ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi utɛra waɬala imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ waz̤ala uaɓram nɔnahɔrɛ nɔharan jijɔ lɛ kɛ inz̤ala katɛra utɛra waz̤ala uaɓram nɔnahɔrɛ nɔharan uharan waz̤ala ulɔtɛ wafa uharan ɛsɛkʰɔ utɛra ujisɛ ɛz̤wɛni lɔkuz̤alwa kwakʰɛ ɛurɛ jamakalɛd̤i uaɓram nɔnahɔrɛ ɓaz̤ɛka aɓafaz̤i iɡ̤ama lɔmkaaɓram lalinɡ̤usaraji iɡ̤ama lɔmkanahɔrɛ lalinɡ̤umilka intɔmɓi kaharan usɔmilka usɔjiska usaraji ɛɓɛnɡ̤az̤ali ɛnɡ̤ɛnamntwana utɛra wamtʰaɓatʰa uaɓram uɲana wakʰɛ nɔlɔtɛ uɲana kaharan uɲana wɔɲana wakʰɛ nɔsaraji umɔlɔkaz̤ana wakʰɛ umkaaɓram uɲana wakʰɛ ɓapʰuma naɓɔ ɛurɛ jamakalɛd̤i ɓɛsija ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan ɓafika kwɛlakwaharan ɓaɬala kʰɔna imiɬa katɛra jaɓa jimiɲaka ɛmakʰulu maɓini anamiɬanu utɛra kwɛlakwaharan kɛ kalɔku ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi kuaɓram hamɓa umkɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakɔwɛnu kwɛlɔkuz̤alwa kwakʰɔ nasɛnɮwini kajiɬɔ ujɛ ɛz̤wɛni ɛnd̤ɔkuɓɔnisa lɔna nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ uɬanɡ̤a ɔlukʰulu nd̤ikusikɛlɛlɛ nd̤ilikʰulisɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ uɓɛ jint͡sikɛlɛlɔ nd̤iɓasikɛlɛlɛ aɓakusikɛlɛlajɔ nd̤imt͡ʃab̤isɛ ɔkukǃalɛkisajɔ z̤isikɛlɛlɛkɛ nɡ̤awɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi wahamɓa uaɓram nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ watʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kujɛ wahamɓa najɛ ulɔtɛ uaɓram uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamiɬanti ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukupʰuma kwakʰɛ kwɛlakwaharan uaɓram watʰaɓatʰa usaraji umkakʰɛ nɔlɔtɛ uɲana wɔmninawa wakʰɛ nɛŋ̤ǃ̤wɛɓɔ jaɓɔ jɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛjikǃwɛɓilɛ naɓantu aɓaɓɛɓafumɛnɛ kwɛlakwaharan ɓapʰuma kɛ ɓɛsija ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan ɓafika kɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan uaɓram wakǀand̤a iliz̤wɛ wad̤a waja kwind̤awɔ ɛnɔʃɛkɛm wad̤a waja ɛmɔkini kamɔrɛ amakanan aɓɛkʰɔ nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa kulɔ iliz̤wɛ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓɔnakala kuaɓram watʰi imɓɛwu jakʰɔ nd̤ija kujinika ɛli liz̤wɛ wamakʰɛla kʰɔna isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔwaɓɔnakalajɔ kujɛ wɛsuka kʰɔna waja ɛntaɓɛni nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɛb̤ɛtɛli wajitwaɓulula intɛntɛ jakʰɛ ib̤ɛtɛli inɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a iaji inɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a wamakʰɛla kʰɔna isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ujɛhɔv̤a waŋǃula iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a wand̤uluka uaɓram ɛhamɓa ɛŋǀɔtʰula ɛsinɡ̤a kwɛlasɛz̤ant͡si kwaɓakʰɔ inɮala ɛz̤wɛni wɛɬa uaɓraham waja ɛjiputa ukuz̤ɛ apʰamɓukɛlɛ kʰɔna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɮala iɓinz̤ima ɛliz̤wɛni kwatʰi akusɔnd̤ɛla ukuɓa anɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛjiputa watʰi kusaraji umkakʰɛ ujaɓɔna kɛ nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa unɡ̤umfaz̤i ɔm̤lɛ imɓɔnakalɔ kɔtʰi kɛ akukuɓɔna amajiputa atʰi nɡ̤umkakʰɛ lɔ and̤iɓulalɛ akujɛkɛ wɛna uɮɛ uɓɔmi uz̤ɛ utʰi unɡ̤ud̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu wɛna ukuz̤ɛ kulunɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ uɮɛ uɓɔmi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnawɛ kwatʰi uaɓram ɛjiputa amɓɔna amajiputa umfaz̤i ukuɓa ujinz̤wakaz̤i ɓamɓɔna aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakafarɔ ɓamd̤umisa kufarɔ umfaz̤i ɛnɮwini kafarɔ wampʰatʰa nɡ̤ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ uaɓram nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɛ wanɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ namaɛsilɛ naɓakʰɔnz̤i naɓakʰɔnz̤az̤ana nɛɛmaz̤i z̤amaɛsilɛ nɛɛnkamɛla ujɛhɔv̤a wamɓɛtʰa ufarɔ nɛnɮu jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤iɓɛtʰɔ ɛz̤ikʰulu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kasaraji umkaaɓram ufarɔ wamɓiz̤a uaɓram watʰi jintɔni lɛ ujɛnz̤ilɛjɔ jini ukuɓa unɡ̤and̤ikǁɛlɛli ukuɓa nɡ̤umkakʰɔ jini ukuɓa utʰi nɡ̤ud̤ad̤ɛ wɛnu nd̤amtʰaɓatʰa ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤umfaz̤i nɡ̤ɔku kɛ nankɔ unikakʰɔ mtʰaɓatʰɛ uhamɓɛ ufarɔ wawawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ amad̤ɔd̤a nɡ̤ajɛ amkʰapʰa jɛna nɔmkakʰɛ nɛz̤intɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ wɛɲuka uaɓram ɛpʰuma ɛjiputa jɛna nɔmkakʰɛ nɛɛntɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛnɔlɔtɛ ɛsinɡ̤a kwɛlasɛz̤ant͡si uaɓram wajɛ ɛsisitʲɛɓi kunɛnɛ nɡ̤ɛmfujɔ nanɡ̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nanɡ̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ wahamɓa ɛŋǀɔtʰula ɛsuka kwɛlasɛz̤ant͡si ɛb̤ɛtɛli kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ jajikʰɔna intɛntɛ jakʰɛ mataŋǀi pʰakatʰi kwɛb̤ɛtɛli nɛaji ɛnd̤awɛni jɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ awasɛnz̤ajɔ kʰɔna ɛkukǃalɛni uaɓram waliŋǃula kʰɔna iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a najɛ ulɔtɛ ɔɓɛhamɓa nɔaɓram wajɛ ɛnɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ nɛɛntɛntɛ iliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ alaɓa nakuɓatʰwala ukuɓa ɓaɬalɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa impaɬa jaɓɔ jajininz̤i aɓaɓa nakuɬala nd̤awɔɲɛ kwaɓakʰɔ ukuɓamɓana pʰakatʰi kwaɓalusi ɓɛmfujɔ kaaɓram naɓalusi ɓɛmfujɔ kalɔtɛ nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa iliz̤wɛ lalimiwɛ nɡ̤amakanan namapɛriz̤i uaɓram watʰi kulɔtɛ makunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ mɓamɓanɔ kalɔku pʰakatʰi nawɛ napʰakatʰi kwaɓalusi ɓam naɓalusi ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sinɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a az̤alanajɔ alipʰamɓi kwakʰɔ iliz̤wɛ lɔnkɛ kʰawaɬukɛ ukuɓa uja ɛkʰɔɬɔ nd̤ɔja ɛkunɛnɛ ukuɓa uja ɛkunɛnɛ nd̤ɔja ɛkʰɔɬɔ ulɔtɛ wapʰakamisa amɛɬɔ akʰɛ wawukʰanɡ̤ɛla wɔnkɛ ummanɮa wasɛjɔrd̤an nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓunamanz̤i wɔnkɛ ɛnɡ̤ɛkajɔnakalisi ujɛhɔv̤a isɔd̤ɔm nɛɡ̤ɔmɔra und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmjɛz̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa usinɡ̤isɛ ɛt͡sɔharɛ ulɔtɛ wawuɲula wɔnkɛ ummanɮa wasɛjɔrd̤an wand̤uluka ulɔtɛ waja nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɓaɬukana kɛ uaɓram waɬala ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan ulɔtɛ waɬala ɛmiz̤ini jalɔɔ mmanɮa wajisɔnd̤ɛz̤ɛla ɛsɔd̤ɔm intɛntɛ jakʰɛ kɛ kalɔku amad̤ɔd̤a asɛsɔd̤ɔm ajɛnɡ̤aɓɛnz̤i ɓɔɓuɓi ɛnɡ̤aɓɔni aɓakʰulu kujɛhɔv̤a watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kuaɓram ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa ulɔtɛ aɬukanɛ najɛ kʰawuwapʰakamisɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɔ ukulɔɔ nd̤awɔ ukujɔ ub̤ɛkisɛ ɛntla nasɛz̤ant͡si nasɛmpumalanɡ̤a nasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ ɔliɓɔnajɔ nd̤ija wɛna nɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni nd̤ijɛnz̤ɛ imɓɛwu jakʰɔ iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔtʰuli lɔm̤laɓa anɡ̤atʰi uɓani ɛnakɔ ukuluɓala utʰuli lɔm̤laɓa ajiɓalɛ nɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ suka ulihamɓɛ iliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔɓud̤ɛ ɓalɔ nanɡ̤ɔɓuɓanz̤i ɓalɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija wɛna waŋǀɔtʰula uaɓram intɛntɛ jakʰɛ waja waɬala nɡ̤asɛmiɔkini kamamrɛ ɛsɛhɛɓrɔn wakʰɛla kʰɔna ujɛhɔv̤a isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kaamrafɛlɛ wasɛʃinarɛ nɔarijɔki wasɛɛlaz̤arɛ nɔkɛd̤ɔrlahɔmɛrɛ wakwaɛlam nɔtid̤ali wamaɡ̤ɔji ɓɛnz̤a imfaz̤wɛ nɔb̤ɛra wasɛsɔd̤ɔm nɔb̤irʃa wasɛɡ̤ɔmɔra nɔʃinab̤i wasɛad̤ama nɔʃɛmɛb̤ɛrɛ wasɛt͡sɛb̤ɔjim nɔkumkani wasɛb̤ɛla ɛjit͡sɔharɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ ɓakǃukana ɛntilini jasɛsid̤im ɛlulwanɮɛ lwɛtʲuwa imiɲaka ɛliʃumi ɛlinamiɓini ɓakʰɔnz̤a ukɛd̤ɔrlahɔmɛrɛ ɓatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinantatʰu ɓaɡ̤wilika nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinaminɛ wɛz̤a ukɛd̤ɔrlahɔmɛrɛ nɔɔkumkani aɓaɓanajɛ ɓawat͡ʃaɓalalisa amarafa ɛaʃtarɔtikarnajim namaz̤uz̤i ɛham namaɛma ɛtʰafɛni lasɛkirijatajim namahɔri ɛntaɓɛni jawɔ jakwasɛhirɛ kwiɛlparan ɛnɡ̤asɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɓad͡ʒ̤ika ɓɛz̤a ɛɛnmiʃpati ɛjikad̤ɛʃɛ ɓalit͡ʃaɓalalisa lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lakwaamalɛki namaamɔri aɓɛɬɛli ɛhat͡sɛt͡sɔntamarɛ wapʰuma wasɛsɔd̤ɔm nɔkumkani wasɛɡ̤ɔmɔra nɔkumkani wasɛad̤ama nɔkumkani wasɛt͡sɛb̤ɔjim nɔkumkani wasɛb̤ɛla ɛjit͡sɔharɛ ɓakʰa uluɬu lɔkulwa naɓɔ ɛntilini jasɛsid̤im nɔkɛd̤ɔrlahɔmɛrɛ wakwaɛlam nɔtid̤ali wamaɡ̤ɔji nɔamrafɛlɛ wasɛʃinarɛ nɔarijɔki wasɛɛlaz̤arɛ ɔɔkumkani aɓaɬanu ɓalwa naɓanɛ kɛ jasɛsid̤im jajɛ ijimiŋ̤ǁ̤uma jɔd̤wa jɛb̤itumɛnɛ ɓasaɓa ɔɔkumkani ɔwasɛsɔd̤ɔm nɔwasɛɡ̤ɔmɔra ɓɛjɛla kʰɔna amasalɛla asaɓɛla ɛntaɓɛni ɓajitʰaɓatʰa jɔnkɛ impaɬa jasɛsɔd̤ɔm nɛɡ̤ɔmɔra nakɔ kɔnkɛ ukuɮa kwaɓɔ ɓɛmka ɓamtʰaɓatʰa nɔlɔtɛ nɛmpaɬa jakʰɛ uɲana wɔmninawa kaaɓram ɓɛmka kuɓa wajɛɬɛli ɛsɔd̤ɔm wafika ɔsind̤ilɛjɔ wakǁɛlɛla uaɓram um̤ɛb̤ɛrɛ jɛna ɛɓɛɬɛli ɛmiɔkini kamamrɛ umamɔri umz̤alwana kaɛʃkɔli nɔmz̤alwana kaanɛrɛ ɓɔna kɛ ɓɛɓɛnɡ̤amaŋǃɔpʰisana nɔaɓram wɛv̤a kɛ uaɓram ukuɓa utʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛ umz̤alwana wakʰɛ wawapʰalaz̤a amad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ akǃɛkǃɛʃiwɛjɔ az̤alɛlwɛ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ anɡ̤amakʰulu matʰatʰu anɛʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ wasukɛla waja kwad̤an wawaɬulaɬula waɓawɛla ɛɓusuku jɛna naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ waɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa waɓasukɛla ɛhɔb̤a ɛnɡ̤asɛkʰɔɬɔ kwɛd̤amaskɔ waz̤iɓujisa z̤ɔnkɛ iimpaɬa kwanɔlɔtɛ uniz̤alwana wakʰɛ waz̤iɓujisa nɛɛmpaɬa z̤akʰɛ kwanaɓafaz̤i naɓantu wapʰuma wasɛsɔd̤ɔm ɛsija kumkʰawulɛla ɛkuɓujɛni kwakʰɛ ɛkut͡ʃaɓalalisɛni ukɛd̤ɔrlahɔmɛrɛ nɔɔkumkani ɛɓaɓɛnajɛ ɛntilini jɛʃav̤ɛ ɛjintili jɔɔkumkani umɛlkit͡sɛd̤ɛkɛ wasɛsalɛm wapʰuma ɛnɛsɔnka nɛwajini uɓɛnɡ̤umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli katʰikǁɔ ɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni wamsikɛlɛla watʰi makasikɛlɛlwɛ uaɓram nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni umninimaz̤ulu nɛɬaɓatʰi makaɓɔnɡ̤wɛ utʰikǁɔ ɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni ɔɓanikɛlɛjɔ aɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓakʰɔ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ uaɓram isiʃumi sɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ watʰi wasɛsɔd̤ɔm kuaɓram nd̤inikɛ aɓantu utʰaɓatʰɛ impaɬa watʰi uaɓram wasɛsɔd̤ɔm isanɮa nd̤isipʰakamisɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ ɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni umninimaz̤ulu nɛɬaɓatʰi ukuɓa and̤iji kutʰaɓatʰa nɔsinɡ̤a nɔkuɓa nɡ̤umtʲa wɛmɓad̤ad̤a ukuɓa and̤iji kutʰaɓatʰa kukɔ kɔnkɛ ɔkwakʰɔ ukuz̤ɛ unɡ̤at͡ʃɔ ukutʰi mna nid̤imtʲɛɓisilɛ uaɓram makunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ntɔ ijɛjam kupʰɛla iɓɛ jilɛ ntɔ iɮiwɛjɔ nɡ̤aɓafana nɛsaɓɛlɔ samad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛhamɓa uanɛrɛ nɔɛʃkɔli nɔmamrɛ wɔna makasitʰaɓatʰɛ isaɓɛlɔ sawɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kwɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ iliz̤wɛ likajɛhɔv̤a kuaɓram nɡ̤ɔmɓɔnɔ lisitʰi musa ukɔjika aɓram nd̤ijinɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ jakʰɔ umv̤uz̤ɔ wakʰɔ ɔmkʰulu kunɛnɛ watʰi uaɓram nkɔsi jam jɛhɔv̤a wɔnd̤inika ntɔni nd̤ihamɓa nd̤inɡ̤ɛnamntwana inɮamafa jɛnɮu jam nɡ̤ulɔ ɛlijɛz̤ɛrɛ wasɛd̤amaskɔ watʰi uaɓram jaɓɔna akund̤inikanɡ̤a mɓɛwu jaɓɔna ɔnɡ̤ɔwɛnɮu jam uja kuɓa jinɮamafa jam nalɔ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɛ lisitʰi akaji kuɓa jinɮamafa jakʰɔ lɔ nɡ̤ɔja kupʰuma ɛz̤iɓilini z̤akʰɛ jɛna ɔja kuɓa jinɮamafa jakʰɔ wamsa pʰanɮɛ watʰi kʰawub̤ɛkɛ pʰɛz̤ulu ɛz̤ulwini uz̤iɓalɛ iinkwɛnkwɛz̤i ukuɓa unɔkuz̤iɓala watʰi kujɛ ija kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ imɓɛwu jakʰɔ wakʰɔlwa kujɛhɔv̤a ɔkɔ wakuɓalɛla ɛɓulunɡ̤isɛni kujɛ watʰi kujɛ nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɔwakukʰupʰajɔ ɛurɛ jamakalɛd̤i ukuɓa nd̤ikunikɛ ɛli liz̤wɛ uliɮɛ watʰi jɛna nkɔsi jɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kwaz̤i nɡ̤antɔni ukuɓa nd̤ija kuliɮa watʰi kujɛ nd̤itʰaɓatʰɛlɛ itʰɔkaz̤i ɛlimiɲaka mitʰatʰu nɛmaz̤i jɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛmiɲaka mitʰatʰu nɛnkunz̤i jɛmv̤u ɛmiɲaka mitʰatʰu nɛhɔɓɛ nɛɡ̤ɔɓɔ lɛv̤ukutʰu wamtʰaɓatʰɛla kɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ waz̤ikǀand̤a kuɓini waz̤iɓɛka iz̤aɬulɔ ɛsiɲɛ sakʰanɡ̤ɛlana nɛsiɲɛ kɛ z̤ɔna akaz̤ikǀand̤a ɛɬa amakǁʰalanɡ̤a pʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤id̤umɓu wawapʰɛkuz̤a uaɓram kwatʰi kǁa lit͡ʃɔnajɔ ilanɡ̤a ɛfikɛlwɛ uaɓram ɓuɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ ɔɓukʰulu waɓɔ ɛfikɛlwa kukɔtʰuka naɓuɓumɲama ɔɓukʰulu watʰi kuaɓram jaz̤i kɛ ukuɓa imɓɛwu jakʰɔ ija kuɓa nɡ̤umpʰamɓukɛli ɛz̤wɛni ɛlinɡ̤ɛlajɔ iɓakʰɔnz̤ɛ aɓɔ ɓajikǀinɛz̤ɛlɛ imiɲaka ɛmakʰulu manɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ uɬanɡ̤a ɛja kulukʰɔnz̤a nd̤ija kuluɡ̤wɛɓa ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ ija kupʰuma inɛɛmpaɬa ɛz̤ininz̤i kɛ wɛna uja kuja kɔɔjiɬɔ unɔkǁɔlɔ uŋ̤ǀ̤watʲwɛ ujinɡ̤wɛv̤u ɛnkulu kwɛsɛsinɛ isiz̤ukulwana ija kuɓujɛla apʰa kuɓa uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓamaamɔri aɓukaz̤alisɛki kwatʰi lakuɓa lit͡ʃɔnilɛ ilanɡ̤a kwakuɓa sitʰɔkɔtʰɔkɔ waɓɔna kukʰɔ iz̤ikɔ ɛlikǃʰumajɔ ɛlinɛlanɡ̤atʲɛ ɛlid̤anɡ̤az̤ɛlajɔ ɛlakǀand̤a pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤ɔ z̤aɬulɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛnz̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nɔaɓram watʰi imɓɛwu jakʰɔ nd̤ijinikɛ ɛli liz̤wɛ litʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni wasɛjiputa lisɛ ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔmkʰulu ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔnɡ̤umɛfrati amakɛni namakinaz̤i namakad̤imɔn namahɛti namapɛriz̤i namarafa namaamɔri namakanan namaɡ̤iriɡ̤aʃi namajɛb̤usi kɛ kalɔku usaraji umkaaɓram uɓɛnɡ̤amz̤alɛli wajɛ ɛnɔmkʰɔnz̤az̤ana ɔnɡ̤umjiputaz̤ana ɔɡ̤ama ɓɛlinɡ̤uhaɡ̤arɛ watʰi usaraji kuaɓram jaɓɔna ujɛhɔv̤a und̤iv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ilɛ ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤az̤ali kʰawunɡ̤ɛnɛ kumkʰɔnz̤az̤ana lɔ m̤lawumɓi nd̤inɡ̤akʰɛka nɡ̤ajɛ walipʰulapʰula uaɓram iz̤wi likasaraji watʰi usaraji umkaaɓram wamtʰaɓatʰa uhaɡ̤arɛ umjiputaz̤ana umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɛ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa uaɓram wajɛɬɛli imiɲaka ɛliʃumi ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan uaɓram ind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤umkakʰɛ wamnɡ̤ɛna kɛ uhaɡ̤arɛ wamitʰa akuɓɔna ukuɓa umitʰi inkɔsikaz̤i jakʰɛ jakǀukukǀɛz̤ɛka ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ watʰi usaraji kuaɓram ukɔniwa makuɓɛ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana nd̤imnikɛ ɛsifuɓɛni sakʰɔ utʰɛ akuɓɔna ukuɓa umitʰi nd̤akǀukukǀɛz̤ɛka ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a makaɡ̤wɛɓɛ pʰakatʰi nawɛ watʰi uaɓram kusaraji jaɓɔna umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ asɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ jɛnz̤a kujɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ usaraji wamkǀinɛz̤ɛla waɓalɛka wɛmka ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ kɛ kalɔku isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤asɛmtʰɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛni wamanz̤i ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤asɛmtʰɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔsɛnɮɛlɛni ɛja ɛʃurɛ satʰi haɡ̤arɛ mkʰɔnz̤az̤ana kasaraji uv̤ɛla pʰi usija pʰi watʰi nd̤iɓalɛkɛ nd̤ɛmka ɛɓuswɛni ɓukasaraji inkɔsikaz̤i jam satʰi isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a kujɛ ɓujɛla kwinkɔsikaz̤i jakʰɔ uz̤itʰɔɓɛ pʰant͡si kwɛsanɮa sajɔ satʰi isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a kujɛ nd̤ija kujand̤isa kakʰulu imɓɛwu jakʰɔ inɡ̤aɓalwa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuninz̤i satʰi isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a kujɛ jaɓɔna umitʰi uja kuz̤ala uɲana umtʰijɛ iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤uiʃmajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uz̤iv̤ilɛ iint͡siz̤i z̤akʰɔ jɛna uja kuɓa nɡ̤umntu ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛsilɛ lasɛnɮɛ ukund̤wɛɓa isanɮa sakʰɛ sija kukǀʰasana naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ isanɮa saɓantu ɓɔnkɛ sikǀʰasanɛ najɛ aɬalɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓaɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ waliɓiz̤a iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a ɔɓɛtʰɛtʰa najɛ watʰi unɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ɔz̤iɓɔnakalisajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa watʰi nd̤isaɓɔna nalapʰa ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa nd̤imɓɔnilɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ walitʰija ɛlɔ kǃula iɡ̤ama lɔkutʰi likǃula likapʰilaɛɓɔnilɛ nalɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛkad̤ɛʃɛ nɛb̤ɛrɛd̤ɛ uhaɡ̤arɛ wamz̤alɛla uaɓram uɲana uaɓram ukumtʰija iɡ̤ama uɲana wakʰɛ lɔwɔ aɓɛmz̤alɛlɛ jɛna uhaɡ̤arɛ watʰi nɡ̤uiʃmajɛli uaɓram uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anamitʰand̤atʰu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ɔkɔ uhaɡ̤arɛ wamz̤alɛlajɔ uaɓram uiʃmajɛli kwatʰi uaɓram akuɓa miɲaka imaʃumi asitʰɔɓa anɛsitʰɔɓa ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓɔnakala kuaɓram watʰi kujɛ nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ usɔmanɮa hamɓa pʰamɓi uɓɛ nɡ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ nd̤ija kuwuɓɛka umŋǃɔpʰisɔ pʰakatʰi nawɛ nd̤ikwand̤isɛ kakʰulu kunɛnɛ wawa uaɓram nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ utʰikǁɔ watʰɛtʰa najɛ ɛsitʰi mna jaɓɔna umŋǃɔpʰisɔ unawɛ uja kuɓa nɡ̤ujisɛ wɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jɛɛntlanɡ̤a kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ akusaji kutʰiwa iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ nɡ̤uaɓram iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ lija kuɓa nɡ̤uaɓraham nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ ujisɛ wɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jɛɛntlanɡ̤a nd̤ija kukukǃʰa kakʰulu kunɛnɛ nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ iintlanɡ̤a kupʰumɛ ɔɔkumkani kuwɛ nd̤iwumisɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ pʰakatʰi nawɛ napʰakatʰi kwɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɔ kwiz̤iz̤ukulwana z̤ajɔ uɓɛ nɡ̤umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ wɔkuɓa nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ kuwɛ nakwimɓɛwu jakʰɔ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɔ nd̤ilinikɛ wɛna nɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɔ iliz̤wɛ lɔkupʰamɓukɛla kwakʰɔ lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ ɛli lakwakanan ukuɓa liɓɛ jintɔ jɛnu nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ watʰi utʰikǁɔ kuaɓraham wɛna kɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɔwuɡ̤ǀ̤ina nɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɔ kwiz̤iz̤ukulwana z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤uwɔ lɔ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɛnija kuwuɡ̤ǀ̤ina pʰakatʰi nɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɔ wɔkuɓa jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛjind̤ɔd̤a jaluswɛ naluswɛ iɲama jɔkwaluswa ɔkɔ kuɓɛ nɡ̤umkǃɔnd̤isɔ wɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɔpʰakatʰi uɲana ɔmiɬa isib̤ɔz̤ɔ makaluswɛ jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛjind̤ɔd̤a kwiz̤iz̤ukulwana z̤ɛnu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ɛnɮwini nɛz̤uz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛmali kuɓani wɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a ɔnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔwɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ jɛna makaluswɛ ɔz̤ɛlwɛ ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ nɔz̤uz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛmali jakʰɔ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɛɲamɛni jɛnu uja kuɓa nɡ̤umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ intɔ ɛjind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤alukilɛjɔ ɛɲama jɔkwaluswa inɡ̤aluswanɡ̤a lɔɔ mpʰɛfumlɔ mawuŋǃaɲulwɛ unɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ɛɓantwini ɓakɔwawɔ uwapʰulɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ watʰi utʰikǁɔ kuaɓraham usaraji umkakʰɔ akuji kumɓiz̤a nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama lɔkuɓa nɡ̤usaraji iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ lɔɓa nɡ̤usara nd̤ija kumsikɛlɛla kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤ikunikɛ uɲana nɡ̤ajɛ nd̤imsikɛlɛlɛ aɓɛ z̤iintlanɡ̤a kupʰumɛ ɔɔkumkani ɓɛz̤iz̤wɛ kujɛ uaɓraham nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ waɬɛka watʰi ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɛ az̤i ɔmiɲaka ilikʰulu wɔz̤alɛlwa az̤i usara intɔkaz̤i ɛmiɲaka imaʃumi asitʰɔɓa anɡ̤az̤ala watʰi uaɓraham kutʰikǁɔ wanɡ̤a uiʃmajɛli anɡ̤aɮa uɓɔmi pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ watʰi utʰikǁɔ ɛwɛ usara umkakʰɔ uja kukuz̤alɛla uɲana umɓiz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama lɔkuɓa nɡ̤uisakɛ nd̤iwumisɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ najɛ uɓɛ nɡ̤umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ kwimɓɛwu jakʰɛ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kuiʃmajɛli nd̤ikuv̤ilɛ ujaɓɔna nd̤imsikɛlɛlɛ nd̤imkǃʰamisilɛ nd̤imand̤isilɛ kakʰulu kunɛnɛ uja kuz̤ala iz̤ikʰulu ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛlinaz̤iɓini nd̤imɛnz̤ɛ uɬanɡ̤a ɔlukʰulu umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɔna nd̤ɔwumisa nɔisakɛ ɔja kumz̤alɛlwa nɡ̤usara nɡ̤ɛli kǁɛʃa ɲakɛɲɛ waɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa ukutʰɛtʰa najɛ wɛɲuka utʰikǁɔ ɛsuka kuaɓraham uaɓraham wamtʰaɓatʰa uiʃmajɛli uɲana wakʰɛ naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaz̤alɛlwɛ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaz̤uz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛmali jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛjind̤ɔd̤a pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu ɓɛnɮu kaaɓraham wajalusa iɲama jɔkwaluswa kwanɡ̤alɔɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ aɓɛtʰɛtʰilɛ utʰikǁɔ kujɛ uaɓraham ɛɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi asitʰɔɓa anɛsitʰɔɓa ɛz̤ɛlwɛ kwɛɲama jɔkwaluswa uiʃmajɛli uɲana wakʰɛ ɛɓɛmiɲaka iliʃumi ɛlinamitʰatʰu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ kwɛɲama jɔkwaluswa kwanɡ̤alɔɔ uaɓraham nɔiʃmajɛli uɲana wakʰɛ nawɔ ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a ɛnɮu jakʰɛ az̤alɛlwɛ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ naz̤uz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛmali kuɓani wɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a kuɲɛ najɛ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓɔnakala kujɛ ɛmiɔkini kamamrɛ ɛɬɛli ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛntɛntɛ ɛkufud̤umalɛni kwɛmini wawapʰakamisa amɛɬɔ akʰɛ waɓɔna nanɡ̤ɔ amad̤ɔd̤a amatʰatʰu ɛmi nɡ̤akujɛ waɓɔna waɡ̤id̤ima ɛja kʰawulɛla ɛsuka ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛntɛntɛ wakǃuɓud̤a ɛm̤laɓɛni watʰi nkɔsi jam ukuɓa kalɔku nd̤iɓaɓalwɛ nɡ̤uwɛ ukuɮula umkɛ kumkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ makʰɛ kutʰatʲatʰwɛ jamanz̤i niɬamɓɛ iiɲawɔ z̤ɛnu niŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛ pʰant͡si kɔmtʰi lɔ nd̤itʰaɓatʰɛ ikǃʰɛkɛz̤a lɛsɔnka nikǁʰasɛ iintliz̤ijɔ z̤ɛnu kamv̤a nɔɮula kuɓa niz̤ɛ kuɮula nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ kumkʰɔnz̤i wɛnu atʰi jɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔ utʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤akɔ wakʰawulɛz̤a uaɓraham waja ɛntɛntɛni kusara watʰi kʰawulɛz̤a ukǁɔv̤ulɛ iisɛha ɛz̤intatʰu z̤ɔmɡ̤uɓɔ ɔkǀɔliwɛjɔ wɛnz̤ɛ amakǃɛɓɛnɡ̤wana ɛz̤ɔnka waɡ̤id̤ima waja ɛz̤inkɔmɛni uaɓraham watʰaɓatʰa itʰɔlɛ lɛnkɔmɔ litʰamɓilɛ lilunɡ̤ilɛ wakʰawulɛz̤a ukulilunɡ̤isa watʰaɓatʰa nɔɓisi nɛtʰɔlɛ lɛnkɔmɔ aɓɛlilunɡ̤isilɛ waɓɛka pʰamɓi kwawɔ wɛma nɡ̤akuwɔ pʰant͡si kɔmtʰi lɔwɔ aɮa atʰi kujɛ upʰi usara umkakʰɔ watʰi nankɔ ɛntɛntɛni jatʰi nd̤ija kuɓujɛla kuwɛ lakuɓuja ɛli kǁɛʃa jaɓɔna usara umkakʰɔ uja kuɓa nɔɲana wɛv̤a usara ɛsɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛntɛntɛ wɔna ɛsɛmv̤a kwajɔ kɛ kalɔku uaɓraham nɔsara ɓaɓɛsɛɓalupʰɛlɛ sɛɓɛkʰulilɛ kusɛkuŋǃamkilɛ kusara ɔkwɛnɮɛla jaɓafaz̤i usara waɬɛka nɡ̤apʰakatʰi kwakʰɛ ɛsitʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa nd̤ihaɡ̤ɛlɛ nd̤isaja kujɔlɛlwa nɛnkɔsi jam jalupʰɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kuaɓraham jini ukuɓa usara aɬɛkɛ ɛsitʰi kuɬɛliwɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤ija kuz̤ala nd̤alupʰɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ kukʰɔ ntɔ inɡ̤amŋǃaɓɛlajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛlimisiwɛjɔ nd̤ija kuɓujɛla kuwɛ lakuɓuja ɛli kǁɛʃa usara aɓɛ nɔɲana wakʰaɲɛla usara ɛsitʰi and̤iɬɛkanɡ̤a kuɓa ɛɓɛsɔjika watʰi jɛna haji uɬɛkilɛ asuka kɛ amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ ɔnd̤ɛla ɛsɔd̤ɔm uaɓraham ɛhamɓa nawɔ ɛwapʰɛlɛkɛlɛla watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ɔmfiɬɛla uaɓraham intɔ ɛnd̤iz̤a kujɛnz̤a kanti uaɓraham uja kutʰi aɓɛ luɬanɡ̤a ɔlukʰulu ɔlunamanɮa z̤isikɛlɛlɛkɛ nɡ̤ajɛ iintlanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi kuɓa nd̤az̤ɛ jɛna ukuz̤ɛ aɓawisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ aɓantwana ɓakʰɛ nɛnɮu jakʰɛ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ ɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ inɮɛla kajɛhɔv̤a ɓɛnz̤ɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa nɔkusɛsikwɛni ukuz̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a amɛnz̤ɛlɛ uaɓraham intɔ ajitʰɛtʰilɛjɔ kujɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a isikʰalɔ sasɛsɔd̤ɔm nɛɡ̤ɔmɔra sisikʰulu nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nɛsɔnɔ sajɔ sinz̤ima kunɛnɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤ija kukʰa nd̤iɬɛ nd̤ikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ukuɓa ɓapʰɛlɛlisilɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikʰalɔ sajɔ ɛsifikilɛjɔ ukuɓa akund͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤az̤i ad͡ʒ̤ika apʰɔ amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ asinɡ̤a ɛsɔd̤ɔm kɛ jɛna uaɓraham wajɛsɛmi pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a wasɔnd̤ɛla uaɓraham watʰi unɡ̤ad̤ɛ ub̤ɛb̤ɛtʰɛ ɔlilunɡ̤isa kuɲɛ nɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ jini hi kwakʰɔ amaʃumi amaɬanu amalunɡ̤isa pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i unɡ̤ad̤ɛ ujib̤ɛb̤ɛtʰɛ unɡ̤ajikǁɔlɛli lɔɔ nd̤awɔ jini nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamalunɡ̤isa amaʃumi maɬanu akujɔ makuɓɛ lɛɛ kuwɛ ukwɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛnd̤awɔ ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuɓulala ɔlilunɡ̤isa kuɲɛ nɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ilunɡ̤isa liɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ makuɓɛ lɛɛ kuwɛ umɡ̤wɛɓi wɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ akaji kwɛnz̤a ɔkusɛsikwɛni jini watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤afumana ɛsɔd̤ɔm amalunɡ̤isa amaʃumi maɬanu pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i nd̤ɔjikǁɔlɛla jɔnkɛ lɔɔ nd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jawɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula uaɓraham watʰi kʰawuɓɔnɛ sɛnd̤id̤ɛ nd̤atʰɛtʰa ɛnkɔsini nd̤ilutʰuli nɔtʰutʰu hi kɛ kwaswɛlɛka isiɬanu kumalunɡ̤isa amaʃumi maɬanu wɔwɔnakalisa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛsiɬanu jini wɔnkɛ umz̤i jatʰi and̤iji kuwɔnakalisa ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤afumana kʰɔna amaʃumi ɔmanɛ anɛsiɬanu wapʰind̤a kand͡ʒ̤alɔ watʰɛtʰa kujɛ watʰi hi kɛ kwafuɲanwa kʰɔna amaʃumi ɔmanɛ jatʰi and̤iji kukwɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamaʃumi ɔmanɛ watʰi majinɡ̤aɓi namsind̤ɔ inkɔsi kʰɛ nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ hi kɛ kwafuɲanwa kʰɔna amaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu jatʰi and̤iji kukwɛnz̤a ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤afumana kʰɔna amaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu watʰi kʰawuɓɔnɛ sɛnd̤id̤ɛ nd̤atʰɛtʰa ɛnkɔsini hi kɛ kwafuɲanwa kʰɔna amaʃumi ɔmaɓini jatʰi and̤iji kuwɔnakalisa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamaʃumi ɔmaɓini watʰi majinɡ̤aɓi namsind̤ɔ inkɔsi kʰɛnd̤itʰɛtʰɛ ɛsi siɬanɮɔ sɔd̤wa hi kɛ kwafuɲanwa kʰɔna iʃumi ɛliɲɛ jatʰi and̤iji kuwɔnakalisa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛʃumi ɛliɲɛ wɛmka ujɛhɔv̤a akuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa ukutʰɛtʰa kuaɓraham uaɓraham waɓujɛla ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ z̤afika iz̤itʰuɲwa ɛz̤ɔ z̤ɔz̤iɓini ɛsɔd̤ɔm nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa ulɔtɛ ɛɬɛli ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɛsɔd̤ɔm ulɔtɛ waz̤iɓɔna wɛsuka waja kuz̤ikʰawulɛla wakǃuɓud̤a nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni watʰi kʰaniɓɔnɛ z̤inkɔsi z̤am kʰanipʰamɓukɛlɛ ɛnɮwini jɔmkʰɔnz̤i wɛnu nilalɛ niɬamɓɛ iiɲawɔ z̤ɛnu niv̤ukɛ nihamɓɛ inɮɛla jɛnu z̤atʰi haji sɔlala ɛsitratwɛni waz̤id͡ʒ̤ɔka kunɛnɛ z̤apʰamɓukɛla kujɛ z̤anɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ waz̤ɛnz̤ɛla isiɮɔ wɔd͡ʒ̤a nɛz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ z̤aɮa kɛ kalɔku z̤inɡ̤ɛkalali amad̤ɔd̤a alɔɔ mz̤i amad̤ɔd̤a asɛsɔd̤ɔm ajixawula inɮu ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛsa kwikǁʰɛɡ̤ɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓɛv̤ɛla nasɛkupʰɛlɛni kwawɔ ɓamɓiz̤a ulɔtɛ ɓatʰi kujɛ apʰi amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤ɛnɛ kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔɓu ɓusuku wakʰupʰɛlɛ kutʰi siwaz̤i wapʰuma ulɔtɛ waja kuɓɔ ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ waluv̤ala ukǀanɡ̤ɔ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ watʰi musani ukwɛnz̤a intɔ ɛmɓi ɓaz̤alwana kʰaniɓɔnɛ nd̤inɛɛntɔmɓi ɛz̤imɓini ɛz̤inɡ̤az̤ani nand̤ɔd̤a mand̤ikʰupʰɛlɛ z̤ɔna nɛnz̤ɛ kuz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛnu kɛ mad̤ɔd̤a ukwɛnz̤a ntɔ kuɓa anɡ̤ɛnɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ɛmtʰunz̤ini wɔpʰaɬa ɓatʰi kʰwɛlɛla ɓat͡ʃɔ ɓatʰi lɔ wɛz̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɔkupʰamɓukɛla uɬala ɛɡ̤wɛɓa nɡ̤ɔku sɔkupʰatʰa kakuɓi wɛna kunawɔ ɓɛsuka ind̤ulumɓanɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛnd̤ɔd̤a ulɔtɛ ɓasɔnd̤ɛla ɓɛz̤a kulukǃʰɛkɛz̤a ukǀanɡ̤ɔ amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ asɔlula isanɮa sawɔ amnɡ̤ɛnisa ulɔtɛ kuwɔ ɛnɮwini aluv̤ala ukǀanɡ̤ɔ awaɓɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔɓumfama amad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛsɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛnɮu ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kwɛŋǀinanɛ ɛsa kwɛnkulu az̤id̤inisa kɛ umɲanɡ̤ɔ atʰi amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ kulɔtɛ usɛnaɓani apʰa umjɛni nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɔ naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔnaɓɔ kulɔ mz̤i ɓakʰupʰɛ kulɛ nd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sija kujɔnakalisa lɛ nd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sikʰulu isikʰalɔ saɓɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a usitʰumɛ ukuɓa sijɔnakalisɛ wapʰuma ulɔtɛ watʰɛtʰa kuɓajɛni ɓɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ aɓaja kuz̤ɛka iintɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ watʰi sukani nipʰumɛ kulɛ nd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uja kuwɔnakalisa lɔ mz̤i usukɛ waɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɬɛkisajɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓajɛni ɓɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ iz̤itʰuɲwa z̤amŋ̤ǁ̤amisa ulɔtɛ nɡ̤ɛsifinɡ̤ɔ z̤atʰi v̤uka tʰaɓatʰa umkakʰɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔmɓini aɓa ɓanɔkufumanɛka ɬɛz̤ɛ ub̤ɛb̤ɛtʰwɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓalɔ mz̤i waz̤ilaz̤ila amad̤ɔd̤a aɓamɓa isanɮa sakʰɛ nɛsanɮa sɔmkakʰɛ nɛsanɮa sɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔmɓini ujɛhɔv̤a ɛmv̤ɛla amkʰupʰa amjɛka nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kɔmz̤i akuɓa ɛmkʰupʰɛlɛ pʰanɮɛ atʰi z̤isind̤isɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ musa ukub̤ɛka ɛmv̤a kwakʰɔ kuwɔ wɔnkɛ lɔ mmanɮa z̤isind̤isɛ nɡ̤ɔkuja ɛntaɓɛni ɬɛz̤ɛ ub̤ɛb̤ɛtʰwɛ watʰi kuwɔ ulɔtɛ haji nkɔsi jam kʰawuɓɔnɛ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ umɓaɓalɛ ujikʰulisilɛ iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɔ ɔnd̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛjɔ ukuɓa uwusind̤isɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ kɛ and̤inakɔ ukuz̤isind̤isa nɡ̤ɔkuja ɛntaɓɛni ɬɛz̤ɛ nd̤inaɲatʰɛlwɛ ɓuɓuɓi nd̤ifɛ kʰawuɓɔnɛ lɔ mz̤i ukufupʰi ukuɓa kuɓalɛkɛlwɛ kuwɔ mŋǀinanɛ nd̤anɡ̤a nd̤inɡ̤az̤isind̤isa nɡ̤ɔkuja kuwɔ awumŋǀinanɛ usind̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ watʰi kujɛ jaɓɔna nd̤ikunɔnɛlɛlɛ nanɡ̤alɛ ntɔ ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤awub̤ukukǃi lɔ mz̤i utʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤awɔ kʰawulɛz̤a z̤isind̤isɛ nɡ̤ɔkuja kʰɔna kuɓa and̤inakwɛnz̤a ntɔ ud̤ɛ ufikɛ kʰɔna nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ mz̤i kwatʰiwa jit͡sɔharɛ ilanɡ̤a lalisɛ lipʰumilɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɬaɓatʰi kukalɔtɛ ɛt͡sɔharɛ wanisa kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a pʰɛz̤u kwɛsɔd̤ɔm nɛɡ̤ɔmɔra isulfurɛ nɔmlilɔ ɔpʰuma kujɛhɔv̤a ɛmaz̤ulwini wajib̤ukukǃa lɔɔ miz̤i nawɔ wɔnkɛ lɔɔ mmanɮa naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmi ɓalɔɔ miz̤i nɛsiɬumɔ sɔm̤laɓa kɔd̤wa umkakʰɛ ɛsɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ wakʰanɡ̤ɛla nɡ̤asɛmv̤a waɓa jint͡sika jɛtʲuwa uaɓraham wav̤uka waja kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ wajɛmi kujɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓukajɛhɔv̤a wɔnd̤ɛla ɛsɔd̤ɔm nɛɡ̤ɔmɔra nakulɔ lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lalɔɔ mmanɮa wakʰanɡ̤ɛla nanɡ̤ɔ uɲuka wɛlɔ z̤wɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsi wɛz̤ikɔ lɛmfutʰɔ kwatʰi kǁɛnikwɛni utʰikǁɔ wajɔnakalisajɔ imiz̤i jalɔɔ mmanɮa utʰikǁɔ wamkʰumɓula uaɓraham wamkʰupʰa ulɔtɛ pʰakatʰi kɔb̤ukukǃɔ ɔlɔ ɛkujib̤ukukǃɛni imiz̤i lɛjɔ aɓɛɬɛli kujɔ ulɔtɛ wɛɲuka ulɔtɛ ɛpʰuma ɛt͡sɔharɛ waɬala ɛntaɓɛni ɛnɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔmɓini kuɓa ɛɓɛsɔjika ukuɬala ɛt͡sɔharɛ waɬala ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni jɛna nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔmɓini jatʰi ɛjamaz̤iɓulɔ kwɛŋǀinanɛ uɓawɔ walupʰɛlɛ akukʰɔ nd̤ɔd̤a ɛz̤wɛni apʰa jɔkusinɡ̤ɛna nɡ̤ɔkwɛnɮɛla jɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ jiz̤a simsɛz̤ɛ uɓawɔ iwajini silalɛ najɛ siɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ imɓɛwu nɡ̤ɔɓawɔ z̤amsɛz̤a kɛ ujisɛ iwajini nɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku janɡ̤ɛna ɛjamaz̤iɓulɔ jalala nɔjisɛ akajaz̤anɡ̤a jɛna kwajɔ nɔkuv̤uka kwajɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ jatʰi ɛjamaz̤iɓulɔ kwɛŋǀinanɛ jaɓɔna nd̤ilɛlɛ nɔɓawɔ pʰɛz̤ɔlɔ masimsɛz̤ɛ iwajini nanɡ̤ɔɓu ɓusuku unɡ̤ɛnɛ ulalɛ najɛ ukuɓa siɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ imɓɛwu nɡ̤ɔɓawɔ z̤amsɛz̤a kɛ ujisɛ iwajini nanɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku jasuka ɛŋǀinanɛ jalala najɛ akajaz̤anɡ̤a jɛna kwajɔ nɔkuv̤uka kwajɔ z̤amitʰa z̤ɔmɓini iintɔmɓi z̤ikalɔtɛ nɡ̤ɔjisɛ ɛjamaz̤iɓulɔ jaz̤ala uɲana jamɓiz̤a nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤umɔwab̤i jɛna nɡ̤ujisɛ wamamɔwab̤i unanam̤la nɛŋǀinanɛ jaz̤ala uɲana jamɓiz̤a nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤ub̤ɛnami jɛna nɡ̤ujisɛ wɔɲana ɓakaamɔn unanam̤la kɛ kalɔku uaɓraham wand̤uluka apʰɔ waja ɛz̤wɛni lasɛz̤ant͡si waɬala pʰakatʰi kwɛkad̤ɛʃɛ nɛʃurɛ wapʰamɓukɛla ɛɡ̤ɛrarɛ watʰi uaɓraham nɡ̤ɔsara umkakʰɛ nɡ̤ud̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu uab̤imɛlɛki wasɛɡ̤ɛrarɛ watʰuma wamtʰaɓatʰa usara wɛz̤a utʰikǁɔ kuab̤imɛlɛki nɡ̤ɛpʰupʰa ɛɓusuku watʰi kujɛ ujaɓɔna ufilɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmfaz̤i ɔmtʰaɓatʰilɛjɔ nɡ̤umkamntu kɛ uab̤imɛlɛki uɓɛnɡ̤asɔnd̤ɛlanɡ̤a kujɛ watʰi nkɔsi nɔlunɔɓulunɡ̤isa uɬanɡ̤a wɔluɓulala jini akat͡ʃɔnɡ̤ɔ jɛna ukutʰi nɡ̤ud̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu najɛ nɡ̤ɔkwakʰɛ watʰi nɡ̤umnakwɛtʰu lɛ ntɔ nd̤ijɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jam iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛ nanɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤am z̤imsulwa watʰi utʰikǁɔ kujɛ nɡ̤ɛpʰupʰa nam nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa ujɛnz̤ɛ lɛ ntɔ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛ nd̤akuŋǃand̤a ukuɓa unɡ̤ɔni nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ and̤ikuv̤umɛlanɡ̤a ukuɓa umkǀʰukumisɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ mɓujisɛ umfaz̤i walɛ nd̤ɔd̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɡ̤umprɔfɛti jɔkutʰand̤az̤ɛla ukuɓa upʰilɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ akwamɓujisa jaz̤i ukuɓa uja wɛna naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔnaɓɔ wav̤uka uab̤imɛlɛki waɓaɓiz̤a ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ wawatʰɛtʰa ɔnkɛ maz̤wi ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤aɓɔ ɔjika kakʰulu lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a uab̤imɛlɛki wamɓiz̤a uaɓraham watʰi kujɛ jintɔni lɛ ntɔ ujɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kutʰi nd̤ikɔnɛ nɡ̤antɔni ukuɓa nɔɓukumkani ɓam isɔnɔ ɛsinɡ̤aka wɛnz̤ɛ iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛz̤akwɛnz̤iwa watʰi uab̤imɛlɛki kuaɓraham uɓɔnɛ ntɔni ukuɓa ujɛnz̤ɛ lɛ ntɔ watʰi uaɓraham nd̤itʰɛ akukʰɔ kaɲɛ ukɔjika utʰikǁɔ kulɛ nd̤awɔ ɓaja kund̤iɓulala nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmkam ɔkwɛnɛnɛ nɡ̤ud̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu jintɔmɓi kaɓawɔ kɔd̤wa akantɔmɓi waɓa nɡ̤umkam kɛ kwatʰi utʰikǁɔ akund̤ipʰamɓukisa and̤ikʰupʰɛ ɛnɮwini kaɓawɔ nd̤atʰi kujɛ nant͡si iŋǀɛɓa ɔwɔnd̤ɛnz̤ɛla jɔna ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɛsɔfika kuz̤ɔ uz̤ɛ utʰi nɡ̤am nɡ̤umnakwɛtʰu uab̤imɛlɛki watʰaɓatʰa impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ naɓakʰɔnz̤i naɓakʰɔnz̤az̤ana uaɓraham wamɓujisɛla usara umkakʰɛ kujɛ watʰi uab̤imɛlɛki nali iliz̤wɛ lipʰamɓi kwakʰɔ ɬala apʰɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ watʰi kusara jaɓɔna umnakwɛnu nd̤imnikɛ lɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ jaɓɔna sisiɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɔ samɛɬɔ kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓa nawɛ napʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ uɡ̤wɛtʲɛlwɛ watʰand̤az̤a uaɓraham kutʰikǁɔ utʰikǁɔ wampʰilisa uab̤imɛlɛki nɔmkakʰɛ naɓakʰɔnz̤az̤ana ɓakʰɛ ɓaz̤ala nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uɓɛz̤iv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ilɛ kaɲɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤iz̤alɔ ɛnɮwini kaab̤imɛlɛki nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kasara umkaaɓraham kɛ kalɔku ujɛhɔv̤a wamv̤ɛlɛla usara nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɛɓɛt͡ʃilɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wamɛnz̤ɛla usara nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ aɓɛkutʰɛtʰilɛ wamitʰa kɛ usara wamz̤alɛla uaɓraham uɲana ɛkwalupʰalɛni kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛlimisiwɛjɔ aɓɛlitʰɛtʰilɛ utʰikǁɔ kujɛ uaɓraham wamtʰija lɔɔ ɲana wakʰɔ aɓɛmz̤alɛlwɛ awamz̤alajɔ usara iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤uisakɛ uaɓraham uisakɛ uɲana wakʰɛ akuɓa nt͡suku z̤isib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ utʰikǁɔ aɓɛmwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ uaɓraham uɓɛ ɛmiɲaka ilikʰulu ukuz̤alɛlwa kwakʰɛ uisakɛ uɲana wakʰɛ watʰi usara und̤iɬɛkisilɛ utʰikǁɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓakuv̤ajɔ ɔku ɓaja kuɬɛka watʰi nɡ̤uɓani ɔɓɛnɡ̤at͡ʃɔlɔ kuaɓraham ukutʰi usara waɲisa aɓantwana nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤imz̤alɛlɛ uɲana ɛkwalupʰalɛni kwakʰɛ wakʰula waluɲulwa uaɓraham wɛnz̤a isiɮɔ ɛsikʰulu m̤lana waluɲulwajɔ uisakɛ usara wamɓɔna uɲana kahaɡ̤arɛ umjiputaz̤ana awamz̤alɛla uaɓraham ɛɬɛkisa watʰi kuaɓraham mɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛ umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana nɔɲana wakʰɛ kuɓa uɲana walɔ mkʰɔnz̤az̤ana akaji kuliɮa nd̤awɔɲɛ nɔɲana uisakɛ laliɓi kunɛnɛ ɛlɔ z̤wi ɛmɛɬwɛni kaaɓraham nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɲana wakʰɛ watʰi utʰikǁɔ kuaɓraham malinɡ̤aɓi liɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnkwɛnkwɛ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ ɛntwɛni jɔnkɛ ajitʰɛtʰilɛjɔ usara kuwɛ pʰulapʰula iz̤wi lakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ija kuɓa nɡ̤ɔisakɛ lɔ imɓɛwu kuwɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ uɲana wɔmkʰɔnz̤az̤ana nd̤ija kumɛnz̤a uɬanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛjimɓɛwu jakʰɔ wav̤uka uaɓraham watʰaɓatʰa isɔnka nɛnt͡suɓa jamanz̤i uhaɡ̤arɛ ɛɓɛka ɛmaɡ̤ǁ̤ɛni akʰɛ nɛnkwɛnkwɛ wamnd̤ulula wɛmka kɛ wand̤wɛnd̤wɛla ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a apʰɛla amanz̤i ɛnt͡suɓɛni wajipʰɔsa inkwɛnkwɛ pʰant͡si kwɛtʰʲɔlɔ waja waɬala pʰant͡si malunɡ̤a najɔ umɡ̤ama ɔnɡ̤anɡ̤ɔwɔkutɔla nɡ̤ɔtɔlɔ kuɓa watʰi mand̤inɡ̤akuɓɔni kwɛnkwɛnkwɛ waɬala pʰant͡si malunɡ̤a najɔ kɛ wapʰakamisa iz̤wi lakʰɛ waliv̤a utʰikǁɔ iliz̤wi lɛnkwɛnkwɛ samɛmɛz̤a isitʰuɲwa sikatʰikǁɔ kuhaɡ̤arɛ sisɛmaz̤ulwini satʰi kujɛ unantɔni haɡ̤arɛ musa ukɔjika nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰikǁɔ uliv̤ilɛ iliz̤wi lɛnkwɛnkwɛ apʰɔ ikʰɔna suka umɛ ujitʰaɓatʰɛ inkwɛnkwɛ ujiɓamɓɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa kuɓa nd̤ija kujɛnz̤a uɬanɡ̤a ɔlukʰulu utʰikǁɔ wawav̤ula amɛɬɔ akʰɛ waɓɔna ikǃula lamanz̤i waja wajiz̤alisa int͡suɓa nɡ̤amanz̤i wajisɛz̤a inkwɛnkwɛ utʰikǁɔ waɓa nɛnkwɛnkwɛ lɛjɔ jakʰula jaɬala ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jaɓa jintɔli jakukʰula jaɬala ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛparan wajitʰaɓatʰɛla umfaz̤i ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa watʰɛtʰa uab̤imɛlɛki nɔfikɔlɔ umtʰɛtʰɛli wɔmkʰɔsi wakʰɛ kuaɓraham ɛsitʰi utʰikǁɔ unawɛ ɛntwɛni jɔnkɛ ɔsukuɓa ujɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤ifunɡ̤ɛlɛ utʰikǁɔ apʰa ukuɓa akuji kund̤ikǁɔkisa nɔɔɲana ɓam nɛnz̤alɔ jam wɔtʰi nɡ̤ɔkwɛŋǀɛɓa ɛnd̤ijɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kuwɛ wɛnz̤ɛ nakwiliz̤wɛ ɔpʰamɓukɛlɛ kulɔ watʰi uaɓraham mna nd̤ɔfunɡ̤a uaɓraham wamɔɬwaja uab̤imɛlɛki nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛkǃula lamanz̤i ɛlaliɬutʰwɛ nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakaab̤imɛlɛki watʰi uab̤imɛlɛki ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤az̤i ukuɓa jɛnz̤iwɛ nɡ̤uɓani lɛ ntɔ nawɛ uɓɛ unɡ̤and̤ikǁɛlɛlanɡ̤a ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤ajiv̤anɡ̤a nd̤ijiv̤a nam̤la uaɓraham watʰaɓatʰa impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ uab̤imɛlɛki ɓɛnz̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɓɔɓaɓini uaɓraham amatʰɔkaz̤i ɛz̤imv̤u asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɔm̤lamɓi aɓa wɔd̤wa watʰi uab̤imɛlɛki kuaɓraham ajintɔni matʰɔkaz̤i ɛz̤imv̤u asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ uwamisilɛjɔ ɔd̤wa watʰi la matʰɔkaz̤i ɛz̤imv̤u asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wɔwatʰaɓatʰa ɛsanɮɛni aɓɛ ɓuɓuŋ̤ǃ̤ina ɓam ɓɔkuɓa nd̤ilimɓilɛ ɛli kǃula nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ kwatʰiwa lɔɔ nd̤awɔ jib̤ɛrʃɛb̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kulapʰɔ ɓafunɡ̤ajɔ ɓɔɓaɓini ɓɛnz̤a kɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a wɛsuka uab̤imɛlɛki nɔfikɔlɔ umtʰɛtʰɛli wɔmkʰɔsi wakʰɛ ɓaɓujɛla ɛz̤wɛni lamafilisti uaɓraham watʲala umtamariskɛ ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a waliŋǃula kʰɔna iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ uaɓraham wajɛ ɛnɡ̤umpʰamɓukɛli ɛz̤wɛni lamafilisti imiɬa ɛmininz̤i kwatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kwɛz̤ɔ ntɔ utʰikǁɔ wamv̤av̤aɲa uaɓraham watʰi kujɛ aɓraham watʰi jɛna nd̤ilapʰa watʰi kʰawutʰaɓatʰɛ uɲana wakʰɔ ɛmɲɛ kuwɛ ɔmtʰand̤ajɔ uisakɛ uhamɓɛ ujɛ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛmɔrija umɲusɛ kʰɔna aɓɛ lid̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛntaɓa ɛnd̤ɔkukǁɛlɛla jɔna wav̤uka uaɓraham waliɓɔpʰa iɛsilɛ lakʰɛ watʰaɓatʰa amaɓini kumad̤ɔd̤ana akʰɛ nɔisakɛ uɲana wakʰɛ wakǀand̤a z̤ɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ wɛsuka waja ɛnd̤awɛni aɓɛmkǁɛlɛlɛ jɔna utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰatʰu uaɓraham wawapʰakamisa amɛɬɔ akʰɛ wajiɓɔna lɔɔ nd̤awɔ ikud̤ɛ watʰi uaɓraham kumad̤ɔd̤ana akʰɛ ɬalani apʰa nɛɛsilɛ nɔmfana lɔ sɔja pʰaja siŋǃulɛ siɓujɛ siz̤ɛ waz̤itʰaɓatʰa uaɓraham z̤ɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ waz̤iɓɛka pʰɛz̤u kɔisakɛ uɲana wakʰɛ wapʰatʰa umlilɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa nɛsit͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ ɓahamɓa ɓɔɓaɓini nd̤awɔɲɛ wat͡ʃɔ uisakɛ kuaɓraham ujisɛ ukutʰi ɓawɔ watʰi jɛna nd̤ilapʰa ɲana watʰi nanɡ̤u umlilɔ nɛɛnkuni ipʰi kɛ imv̤u jɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ watʰi uaɓraham utʰikǁɔ wɔz̤iɓɔnɛla imv̤u jɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ ɲana ɓahamɓa ɓɔɓaɓini nd̤awɔɲɛ ɓafika ɛnd̤awɛni aɓɛmkǁɛlɛlɛ jɔna utʰikǁɔ wakʰa kʰɔna uaɓraham isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ waz̤ikǀwaŋ̤ǀ̤isa wamɓɔpʰa uisakɛ uɲana wakʰɛ wamɓɛka ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnkuni wasɔlula uaɓraham isanɮa sakʰɛ watʰaɓatʰa isit͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ ukuɓa amsikɛ uɲana wakʰɛ samɛmɛz̤a kujɛ isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a sisɛmaz̤ulwini satʰi aɓraham aɓraham watʰi nd̤ilapʰa satʰi musa isanɮa sakʰɔ ukumɛnz̤a ntɔ kuɓa nd̤ijaz̤i nɡ̤ɔku ukuɓa ujamɔjika utʰikǁɔ akuŋǃaɓanɡ̤a nɔɲana akʰɔ ɛmɲɛ kuwɛ uaɓraham wapʰakamisa amɛɬɔ akʰɛ wakʰanɡ̤ɛla nant͡sɔ inkunz̤i jɛɡ̤uʃa nɡ̤asɛmv̤a iɓamɓɛkɛ nɡ̤ɛɛmpɔnd̤ɔ ɛtʰʲɔlwɛni waja uaɓraham wajitʰaɓatʰa inkunz̤i jɛɡ̤uʃa wajiɲusa ukuɓa iɓɛ lid̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɔɲana wakʰɛ uaɓraham watʰi iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ nd̤awɔ linɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɔz̤iɓɔnɛlajɔ ɛkutʰiwa nanam̤la ɛntaɓɛni aɓɔnakala kujɔ ujɛhɔv̤a samɛmɛz̤a isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a kuaɓraham ɔkwɛsiɓini sisɛmaz̤ulwini satʰi nd̤iz̤ifunɡ̤ilɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ujɛnz̤ilɛ lɛ ntɔ akwaŋǃaɓa nɔɲana wakʰɔ ɛmɲɛ kuwɛ ukuɓa nd̤ija kukusikɛlɛla nd̤ikusikɛlɛlɛ nd̤ija kujand̤isa nd̤ijand̤isɛ imɓɛwu jakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnkwɛnkwɛz̤i z̤ɛz̤ulu nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntlaɓatʰi ɛsɛluŋǁwɛmɛni lɔlwanɮɛ imɓɛwu jakʰɔ iliɮɛ isanɡ̤ɔ lɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤ajɔ z̤isikɛlɛlwɛ nɡ̤ɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ untlanɡ̤a z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ulipʰulapʰulɛ iliz̤wi waɓujɛla uaɓraham kumad̤ɔd̤ana akʰɛ ɓɛsuka ɓaja ɓɛnd̤awɔɲɛ ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a waɬala uaɓraham ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a kwatʰi ɛmv̤a kwɛz̤i z̤intɔ kwakǁɛlwa kuaɓraham kwatʰiwa jaɓɔna umilka ukwaz̤ɛlɛ najɛ kunahɔrɛ wakʰɔ aɓantwana uut͡sɛ ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ akʰɛ nɔb̤uz̤i wakʰɛ nɔkɛmuwɛli ujisɛ kaaram nɔkɛsɛd̤ɛ nɔhaz̤ɔ nɔpild̤aʃɛ nɔjid̤ɛlafu nɔb̤ɛtuwɛli ub̤ɛtuwɛli kɛ waz̤ala urɛb̤ɛka aɓɔ ɓɔsib̤ɔz̤ɔ umilka wamz̤alɛla unahɔrɛ kaaɓraham iʃwɛʃwɛ lakʰɛ ɛliɡ̤ama linɡ̤urɛhuma laz̤ala nalɔ utɛb̤a nɔɡ̤aham nɔtahaʃɛ nɔmahaka kɛ kalɔku ukuɮa uɓɔmi kukasara kwaɓa jimiɲaka ɛlikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɓini anɛmiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ jijɔ imiɲaka jɔkuɮa uɓɔmi kukasara wafa kɛ usara ɛkirijati kaarb̤a ɛjihɛɓrɔn ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan uaɓraham waja kumɓamɓaz̤ɛlɛla usara nɔkumlilɛla wɛsuka uaɓraham ɛɓuswɛni ɓɔmfikaz̤i lɔwɔ watʰɛtʰa kɔɔɲana ɓakahɛti ɛsitʰi nd̤inɡ̤umpʰamɓukɛli nd̤ilund̤wɛnd̤wɛ nd̤inikɛni nd̤iɓɛ nɛnd̤awɔ jam jɔkuŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛnu ukuz̤ɛ nd̤imŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛ umfikaz̤i anɡ̤aɓikʰɔ pʰamɓi ɓampʰɛnd̤ula uaɓraham ɔɔɲana ɓakahɛti ɓatʰi kujɛ siv̤ɛ nkɔsi jam usisikʰulu sakwatʰikǁɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu kwɛlɔna liɲulɛkajɔ kumaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ɛtʰu mŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛ umfikaz̤i lɔwɔ akukʰɔ ɓani kutʰi uja nɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa lakʰɛ ukuɓa unɡ̤amŋ̤ǀ̤waɓi umfikaz̤i lɔwɔ wɛsuka uaɓraham wakǃuɓud̤a kuɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakahɛti aɓɔ watʰɛtʰa naɓɔ ɛsitʰi ukuɓa kusɛmpʰɛfumlwɛni wɛnu ukuɓa nd̤imŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛ umfikaz̤i anɡ̤aɓikʰɔ pʰamɓi nd̤iv̤ɛni nind̤iɓɔnɡ̤ɔz̤ɛlɛ kuɛfrɔn uɲana kat͡sɔharɛ ukuɓa and̤inikɛ umkǃɔlɔmɓa wasɛmakapɛla lɔwɔ anawɔ ɔsɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛnt͡simi jakʰɛ and̤inikɛ wɔna nɡ̤ɛmali ɛz̤alisɛkilɛjɔ uɓɛ jind̤awɔ jam jɔkuŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛnu uɛfrɔn wajɛɬɛli pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakahɛti uɛfrɔn um̤ɛti wampʰɛnd̤ula uaɓraham ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakahɛti z̤aɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓanɡ̤ɛnajɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɔmz̤i wakʰɛ ɛsitʰi haji nkɔsi jam nd̤iv̤ɛ int͡simi lɛjɔ nd̤ijakunika nɔmkǃɔlɔmɓa ɔkujɔ nd̤ijakunika ɛmɛɬwɛni ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu nd̤ijakunika ŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa umfikiz̤i lɔɔ wakǃuɓud̤a uaɓraham pʰamɓi kwaɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ watʰɛtʰa kuɛfrɔn ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ watʰi wanɡ̤a unɡ̤and̤iv̤a nd̤ikunika nɡ̤ɛnt͡simi jitʰaɓatʰɛ nd̤iŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛ umfikaz̤i kʰɔna uɛfrɔn wampʰɛnd̤ula uaɓraham watʰi kujɛ nkɔsi jam nd̤iv̤ɛ um̤laɓa nɡ̤ɔwɛɛʃɛkɛlɛ z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛz̤imakʰulu manɛ jintɔni lɔɔ ntɔ pʰakatʰi nawɛ ŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa kɛ umfikaz̤i lɔwɔ uaɓraham wampʰulapʰula uɛfrɔn uaɓraham wamlinɡ̤anisɛla uɛfrɔn isiliv̤ɛrɛ lɛjɔ aɓɛtʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ajɔ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakahɛti amakʰulu ɔmanɛ ɛɛʃɛkɛlɛ z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛv̤uɲwajɔ nɡ̤umxwɛɓi jakǃinisɛka kɛ int͡simi kaɛfrɔn ɛsɛmakapɛla ɛpʰamɓi kɔwakwamamrɛ int͡simi lɛjɔ nɔmkǃɔlɔmɓa ɔkujɔ nɛmitʰi jɔnkɛ ɛsɛnt͡simini ɛkujɔ jɔnkɛ imilimanɮɛla nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ jaɓa jinz̤uz̤ɔ kuaɓraham ɛmɛɬwɛni ɔɔɲana ɓakahɛti kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓanɡ̤ɛnajɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɔmz̤i wakʰɛ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ uaɓraham wamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa usara umkakʰɛ ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni wɛnt͡simi jasɛmakapɛla pʰamɓi kɔwakwamamrɛ kɔwasɛhɛɓrɔn lɛjɔ ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan jakǃinisɛka kɛ int͡simi lɛjɔ nɔmkǃɔlɔmɓa ɔkujɔ kuaɓraham ukuz̤ɛ aɓɛ nɛnd̤awɔ jakʰɛ jɔkuŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakahɛti kɛ kalɔku uaɓraham ɛɓalupʰɛlɛ ɛsɛlɛkʰulilɛ ɛɓud̤alɛni ujɛhɔv̤a wajɛ ɛmsikɛlɛlɛ kɛ uaɓraham ɛz̤intwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ watʰi uaɓraham kumkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɛ ɔjɛna mkʰulu ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ ɔɓɛlawula z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ aɓɛnaz̤ɔ kʰawuɓɛkɛ isanɮa sakʰɔ pʰant͡si kwɛtʰanɡ̤a nd̤ikufunɡ̤isɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu utʰikǁɔ wɛɬaɓatʰi ukuɓa akuji kumz̤ɛkɛla uɲana umfaz̤i ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤amakanan ɛnd̤iɬɛli pʰakatʰi kwawɔ ukuɓa wɔja ɛz̤wɛni lakɔwɛtʰu nakwɛlɔkuz̤alwa umz̤ɛkɛlɛ uɲana uisakɛ umfaz̤i watʰi umkʰɔnz̤i kujɛ hi kɛ ajav̤uma inkaz̤ana ukund̤iland̤ɛla ukuz̤a kwɛli liz̤wɛ nd̤ɔmɓujisɛla uɲana wakʰɔ kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ wapʰuma kulɔ wɛna watʰi uaɓraham kujɛ z̤ilumkɛlɛ unɡ̤amɓujisɛli uɲana kʰɔna ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu ɔwand̤itʰaɓatʰajɔ ɛnɮwini kaɓawɔ ɛz̤wɛni lɔkuz̤alwa ɔwatʰɛtʰajɔ ɔwand̤ifunɡ̤ɛlajɔ ɛsitʰi imɓɛwu jakʰɔ nd̤ija kujinika ɛli liz̤wɛ jɛna wɔsitʰuma isitʰuɲwa sakʰɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ umz̤ɛkɛlɛ umfaz̤i uɲana kʰɔna ukuɓa kɛ inkaz̤ana lɛjɔ itʰɛ ajav̤uma ukukuland̤ɛla wɔɓa ukʰululɛkilɛ kwɛsi sifunɡ̤ɔ kɔd̤wa uz̤ɛ unɡ̤amɓujisɛli uɲana kʰɔna wasiɓɛka umkʰɔnz̤i isanɮa sakʰɛ nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwɛtʰanɡ̤a likaaɓraham inkɔsi jakʰɛ wamfunɡ̤ɛla lɔɔ ntɔ umkʰɔnz̤i watʰaɓatʰa unkamɛla ɛz̤iliʃumi kwunkamɛla z̤ɛnkɔsi jakʰɛ wɛmka ɛnɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ z̤ɛnkɔsi jakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ wɛsuka waja kwaaram pʰakatʰi kwɛmilamɓɔ ɛmz̤ini kanahɔrɛ waz̤iɡ̤ukǃisa iinkamɛla nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kɔmz̤i nɡ̤asɛkǃulɛni lamanz̤i nɡ̤ɛkǁa lanɡ̤ɔkuɬwa nɡ̤ɛkǁa lɔkupʰuma kwaɓakʰi ɓamanz̤i watʰi jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ wɛnkɔsi jam uaɓraham mawund̤itʰamsaŋǃɛlɛ nam̤la ujɛnz̤ɛlɛ inkɔsi jam uaɓraham iŋǀɛɓa jaɓɔna nd̤imi nɡ̤asɛmtʰɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛni wamanz̤i untɔmɓi z̤aɓantu ɓalɔ mz̤i z̤ijapʰuma z̤iz̤a kukʰa amanz̤i kɛ intɔmɓi ɛnd̤ɔtʰi kujɔ kʰawutʰɔɓɛ umpʰand̤a wakʰɔ nd̤isɛlɛ iz̤ɛ itʰi sɛla nɛɛnkamɛla z̤akʰɔ nd̤ɔz̤isɛz̤a naz̤ɔ majiɓɛ jijɔ ɔjimisɛlɛ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ uisakɛ nd̤az̤i nɡ̤ɔkɔ ukuɓa ujɛnz̤ɛlɛ inkɔsi jam iŋǀɛɓa kwatʰi inɡ̤ɛkaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓi ukutʰɛtʰa ɡ̤ǃ̤i urɛb̤ɛka ɛsiz̤a lɔwɔ waz̤alwajɔ nɡ̤ub̤ɛtuwɛli uɲana kamilka umkanahɔrɛ kaaɓraham ɛnɔmpʰand̤a wakʰɛ ɛɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓɛni lakʰɛ intɔmɓi lɛjɔ iɓɛ intlɛ kunɛnɛ imɓɔnakalɔ intɔmɓi ɛjintɔmɓi ɛnɡ̤az̤iwanɡ̤a nd̤ɔd̤a jɛɬa jɛz̤a ɛmtʰɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛni jawuz̤alisa umpʰand̤a wajɔ jɛɲuka waɡ̤id̤ima umkʰɔnz̤i waja kujikʰawulɛla watʰi nd̤ipʰɛ nd̤isɛlɛ jamanz̤i ɛmpʰand̤ɛni wakʰɔ jatʰi sɛla nkɔsi jam jakʰawulɛz̤a jawuɬisɛla ɛsanɮɛni umpʰand̤a wajɔ jamsɛz̤a jakuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa ukumsɛz̤a jatʰi nɛɛnkamɛla z̤akʰɔ nd̤ija kuz̤ikʰɛlɛla z̤id̤ɛ z̤iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ ukusɛla jakʰawulɛz̤a jawuɡ̤alɛla umpʰand̤a wajɔ ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni wɔkusɛz̤a jaɡ̤id̤ima jaja kukʰa futʰi ɛkǃulɛni jaz̤ikʰɛlɛla z̤ɔnkɛ unkamɛla z̤akʰɛ ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ jɛɛ ŋǃa jijɔ itʰɛ kǀwaka ukuz̤ɛ jaz̤i ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ujipʰumɛlɛlisilɛ inɮɛla jajɔ akajipʰumɛlɛlisanɡ̤a kwatʰi iinkamɛla z̤iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓilɛ ukusɛla ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ jatʰaɓatʰa id͡ʒ̤ikaz̤i lɛmpumlɔ lɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛlisisikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛʃɛkɛlɛ uɓunz̤ima ɓalɔ nɛz̤akǀʰɔlɔ z̤ɔz̤iɓini z̤ɔkufakwa ɛz̤anɮɛni ɛz̤iz̤iiʃɛkɛlɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ uɓunz̤ima ɓaz̤ɔ jatʰi ujintɔmɓi kaɓani wɛna kʰawund̤ikǁɛlɛlɛ kukʰɔ nd̤awɔ jɔkulala ɛnɮwini kajiɬɔ jatʰi kujɛ nd̤ijintɔmɓi kab̤ɛtuwɛli uɲana kamika awamz̤alɛla unahɔrɛ jatʰi kujɛ sinawɔ umkǃukǃu kwanɛɛnd̤iz̤a ɛz̤anɛlɛjɔ nɛnd̤awɔ jɔkulala jatʰɔɓa ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ jakǃuɓud̤a kujɛhɔv̤a jatʰi makaɓɔnɡ̤wɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnkɔsi jam uaɓraham ɔnɡ̤ajijɛkɛlɛlanɡ̤a iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɛ nɛɲanisɔ jakʰɛ imkɛ ɛnkɔsini jam utʰɛ nd̤isɛnɮɛlɛni ujɛhɔv̤a wand̤ikʰɔkɛlɛla ɛnɮwini jaɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnkɔsi jam jakʰawulɛz̤a intɔmɓi lɛjɔ jakǁɛlɛla inɮu nɡ̤ɔkwala maz̤wi urɛb̤ɛka wajɛ ɛnɔmnakwaɓɔ ɔɡ̤ama linɡ̤ulab̤an waja ɛnd̤ɔd̤ɛni lɛjɔ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ ɛmtʰɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛni kɛ kwatʰi akuliɓɔna id͡ʒ̤ikaz̤i lɛmpumlɔ nɛz̤akǀʰɔlɔ ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤ɔd̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ watʰi akuwɛv̤a amaz̤wi karɛb̤ɛka ud̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ ɛsitʰi jɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ind̤ɔd̤a lɛ ukutʰɛtʰa waja kujɔ ind̤ɔd̤a nant͡sɔ nɡ̤asɛz̤inkamɛlɛni nɡ̤asɛmtʰɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛni watʰi jiz̤a wɛna usikɛlɛlwɛjɔ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a umɛlɛni nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ mna nd̤ijilunɡ̤isilɛ inɮu nɛnd̤awɔ jɛɛnkamɛla janɡ̤ɛna ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ ɛnɮwini waz̤ikʰulula iinkamɛla z̤ajɔ iinkamɛla waz̤inika umkǃukǃu nɛɛnd̤iz̤a wajinika amanz̤i ɔkuɬamɓa iiɲawɔ z̤ajɔ nɛɛɲawɔ z̤amad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛnajɔ kwaɓɛkwa ukuɮa pʰamɓi kwajɔ jatʰi jɔna and̤iji kuɮa nd̤id̤ɛ nd̤ilitʰɛtʰɛ iliz̤wi watʰi tʰɛtʰa jatʰi nd̤inɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤i kaaɓraham ujɛhɔv̤a ujisikɛlɛlɛ kunɛnɛ inkɔsi jam wajikʰulisa wajinika impʰaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ naɓakʰɔnz̤i naɓakʰɔnz̤az̤ana nɛɛnkamɛla namaɛsilɛ kɛ usara umfaz̤i wankɔsi jam wajiz̤alɛla inkɔsi jam uɲana ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa isɛjalupʰɛlɛ imnikɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛnaz̤ɔ jand̤ifunɡ̤isa kɛ inkɔsi jam isitʰi uɲana uz̤ɛ unɡ̤amz̤ɛkɛli umfaz̤i ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤amakanan ɛnd̤iɬɛli ɛz̤wɛni lawɔ suka ujɛ ɛnɮwini kaɓawɔ ɛmiz̤alwanɛni jakɔwɛtʰu umz̤ɛkɛlɛ uɲana umfaz̤i nd̤atʰi ɛnkɔsini jam hi kɛ ajand̤iland̤ɛla inkaz̤ana lɛjɔ jatʰi ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnd̤ihamɓa pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ wɔsitʰuma isitʰuɲwa sakʰɛ sijɛ nawɛ ajɛnz̤ɛ iɓɛ nɛmpumɛlɛlɔ inɮɛla jakʰɔ umz̤ɛkɛlɛ uɲana umfaz̤i ɛmiz̤alwanɛni jakɔwɛtʰu nasɛnɮwini kaɓawɔ wand̤ulɛ ukuɓa ɛsifunɡ̤wɛni kǁa ufikilɛjɔ ɛmiz̤alwanɛni jakɔwɛtʰu ukuɓa aɓatʰanɡ̤a ɓakunikɛ wɔɓa ɛsifunɡ̤wɛni nd̤ifikilɛ kɛ nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ ɛmtʰɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛni nd̤atʰi jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ wɛnkɔsi jam uaɓraham ukuɓa kalɔku ujɛnz̤ɛ janɛmpumɛlɛlɔ inɮɛla jam ɛnd̤ihamɓa nɡ̤ajɔ jaɓɔna nd̤imi nɡ̤asɛmtʰɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛni wamanz̤i kɛ intɔmɓi ɛpʰuma isiz̤a kukʰa nd̤itʰi kujɔ kʰawund̤ipʰɛ nd̤isɛlɛ jamanz̤i ɛmpʰand̤ɛni wakʰɔ itʰi sɛla wɛna nɛɛnkamɛla z̤akʰɔ nd̤ɔz̤ikʰɛlɛla naz̤ɔ majiɓɛ jijɔ ɛnɡ̤umfaz̤i ujɛhɔv̤a ammisɛlɛjɔ uɲana wɛnkɔsi jam nd̤inɡ̤ɛkaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓi ukutʰɛtʰa ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam ɡ̤ǃ̤i urɛb̤ɛka ɛsiz̤a ɛnɔmpʰand̤a ɛɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓɛni lakʰɛ wɛɬa waja ɛmtʰɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛni wakʰa nd̤atʰi kujɛ kʰawund̤ipʰɛ nd̤isɛlɛ wakʰawulɛz̤a wawuɬisa umpʰand̤a wakʰɛ kujɛ watʰi sɛla nɛɛnkamɛla z̤akʰɔ nd̤ɔz̤isɛz̤a nd̤asɛla kɛ waz̤isɛz̤a nɛɛnkamɛla nd̤amɓuz̤a nd̤atʰi ujintɔmɓi kaɓani watʰi nd̤ijintɔmɓi kab̤ɛtuwɛli uɲana kanahɔrɛ lɔwɔ wamz̤alɛlwa nɡ̤umilka nd̤amfaka kɛ id͡ʒ̤ikaz̤i lɛmpumlɔ ɛtʰatʰɛni lakʰɛ nɛz̤akǀʰɔlɔ ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤akʰɛ nd̤atʰɔɓa nd̤amŋǃula ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤amɓɔnɡ̤a ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnkɔsi jam uaɓraham ɔnd̤ikʰɔkɛlɛjɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni ɛjiɲanisɔ ukuɓa nd̤imz̤ɛkɛlɛ uɲana wakʰɛ intɔmɓi jɔmz̤alwana wɛnkɔsi jam nɡ̤ɔku kɛ ukuɓa nijajɛnz̤ɛla iŋǀɛɓa nɛɲanisɔ inkɔsi jam nd̤ikǁɛlɛlɛni ukuɓa anɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤ikǁɛlɛlɛni ukuz̤ɛ nd̤ib̤ɛkɛ ɛkunɛnɛ nɔkuɓa kusɛkʰɔɬɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula ulab̤an nɔb̤ɛtuwɛli ɓatʰi lɛ ntɔ ipʰuma kujɛhɔv̤a asinakutʰɛtʰa ntɔ kuwɛ nɔkuɓa jɛmɓi nɔkuɓa jɛlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nankɔ urɛb̤ɛka pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ mtʰaɓatʰɛ uhamɓɛ aɓɛ nɡ̤umfaz̤i wɔɲana wɛnkɔsi jakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ akutʰɛtʰilɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kwatʰi akuwɛv̤a umkʰɔnz̤i kaaɓraham amaz̤wi aɓɔ wakǃuɓud̤a ɛm̤laɓɛni kujɛhɔv̤a umkʰɔnz̤i wav̤ɛlisa impaɬa jɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛmpaɬa jɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛz̤amɓatʰɔ urɛb̤ɛka umnakwaɓɔ nɔnina iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋǀɔɲwajɔ ɓaɮa ɓasɛla jɛna namad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛnajɛ ɓalala ɓav̤uka watʰi nd̤ind̤ululɛni nd̤ijɛ ɛnkɔsini jam watʰi umnakwaɓɔ nɔnina makʰɛ iɬalɛ intɔmɓi natʰi iint͡suku nɔkuɓa z̤iliʃumi ihamɓɛ kɛ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ watʰi kuɓɔ musani ukund̤iɓamɓɛz̤ɛla ujɛhɔv̤a ujɛnz̤ɛ janɛmpumɛlɛlɔ inɮɛla jam nd̤ind̤ululɛni nd̤ijɛ ɛnkɔsini jam ɓatʰi masijiɓiz̤ɛ intɔmɓi siv̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ wajɔ ɓamɓiz̤a urɛb̤ɛka ɓatʰi kujɛ uja kuhamɓa nalɛ nd̤ɔd̤a watʰi nd̤ɔhamɓa ɓamnd̤ulula kɛ urɛb̤ɛka ud̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ nɔmaɲisikaz̤i wakʰɛ nɔmkʰɔnz̤i kaaɓraham namad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛnajɛ ɓamsikɛlɛla urɛb̤ɛka ɓatʰi kujɛ unɡ̤ud̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu jiɓa nɡ̤amawakawaka imɓɛwu jakʰɔ iliɮɛ isanɡ̤ɔ laɓɔ ɓajitʰijajɔ wɛsuka urɛb̤ɛka nɔmtʰind͡ʒ̤ana wakʰɛ ɓakʰwɛla ɛz̤inkamɛlɛni ɓaland̤ɛla ɛmv̤a kwɛnd̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wamtʰaɓatʰa kɛ urɛb̤ɛka wɛmka kɛ kalɔku uisakɛ wɛz̤a nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɛv̤ɛla ɛkǃulɛni likapʰilaɛɓɔnilɛ kuɓa ɛɓɛmi ɛz̤wɛni lasɛz̤ant͡si wapʰuma uisakɛ waja kukǀamŋ̤ǀ̤a ɛnt͡simini kǁa kuɬwajɔ wawapʰakamisa amɛɬɔ akʰɛ waɓɔna nanz̤ɔ iinkamɛla z̤isiz̤a urɛb̤ɛka wawapʰakamisa amɛɬɔ akʰɛ wamɓɔna uisakɛ waz̤ipʰɔsa pʰant͡si wɛɬa ɛnkamɛlɛni watʰi kumkʰɔnz̤i nɡ̤uɓani mfɔ uhamɓajɔ ɛnt͡simini ɛsiz̤a kusikʰawulɛla watʰi umkʰɔnz̤i jinkɔsi jam watʰaɓatʰa kɛ isiɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɔ waz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛla umkʰɔnz̤i wamkǁɛlɛla uisakɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ aɓɛz̤ɛnz̤ilɛ uisakɛ ɛntɛntɛni kasara wamz̤ɛka urɛb̤ɛka waɓa nɡ̤umkakʰɛ wamtʰand̤a uisakɛ watʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛka kɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔnina waɓuja uaɓraham waz̤ɛka umfaz̤i iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ lalinɡ̤ukɛtura wamz̤alɛla uz̤imran nɔjɔkɛʃan nɔmɛd̤an nɔmid̤ijan nɔiʃib̤aki nɔʃuwa ujɔkɛʃan waz̤ala uʃɛb̤a nɔd̤ɛd̤an ɔɔɲana ɓakad̤ɛd̤an ɓɛɓɛnɡ̤amaasirija namalɛtuʃi namalɛhum ɔɔɲana ɓakamid̤ijan nɡ̤uɛfa nɔɛfɛrɛ nɔɛnɔki nɔab̤id̤a nɔɛlid̤aha ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakakɛtura uaɓraham waz̤inika uisakɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ aɓɛnaz̤ɔ kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓamaʃwɛʃwɛ aɓɛnawɔ uaɓraham waɓanika iz̤ipʰɔ uaɓraham waɓand̤ulula ɓɛmka kuisakɛ uɲana wakʰɛ ɛsɛkʰɔ ɓasinɡ̤a ɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɛz̤wɛni lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a jijɔ lɛ imiɬa jɛmiɲaka jɔkuɮa uɓɔmi kukaaɓraham awajiɮajɔ jimiɲaka ɛlikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anɛmiɲaka ɛmiɬanu uaɓraham wapʰuma umpʰɛfumlɔ ɛjinɡ̤wɛv̤u ɛnkulu alupʰɛlɛ ɛpʰɛlɛ ɛɓud̤alɛni waɬanɡ̤anisɛlwa kwaɓakɔwaɓɔ ɔɔisakɛ nɔiʃmajɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni wasɛmakapɛla ɛnt͡simini kaɛfrɔn uɲana kat͡sɔharɛ um̤ɛti pʰamɓi kɔwakwamamrɛ ɛnt͡simini lɛjɔ wajitʰɛnɡ̤ajɔ uaɓraham kɔɔjana ɓakahɛti uŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwɛ kʰɔna uaɓraham nɔsara umkakʰɛ kwatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkufa kukaaɓraham utʰikǁɔ wamsikɛlɛla uisakɛ uɲana wakʰɛ uisakɛ waɬala nɡ̤asɛkǃulɛni likapʰilaɛɓɔnilɛ jijɔ lɛ kɛ inz̤ala kaiʃmajɛli uɲana kaaɓraham awatʰi uhaɡ̤arɛ umjiputaz̤ana umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana kasara wamz̤alɛla uaɓraham nɡ̤awɔ amaɡ̤ama ɔɔɲana ɓakaiʃmajɛli nɡ̤amaɡ̤ama aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnz̤ala jaɓɔ ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ kaiʃmajɛli nɡ̤unɛb̤ajɔti nɔkɛd̤arɛ nɔad̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ nɔmib̤ɛsam nɔmiʃma nɔd̤uma nɔmasa uhad̤ad̤ɛ nɔtɛma nɔjɛturɛ nɔnafiʃi nɔkɛd̤ɛma nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaiʃmajɛli nɡ̤awɔ lawɔ amaɡ̤ama aɓɔ nɡ̤ɛmiz̤i jaɓɔ nanɡ̤ɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤ili z̤aɓɔ iz̤ikulu ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛlinaz̤iɓini nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤az̤ɔ jijɔ lɛ imiɲaka jɔkuɮa uɓɔmi kukaiʃmajɛli imiɲaka ɛlikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi matʰatʰu anɛmiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wapʰuma umpʰɛfumlɔ waɬanɡ̤anisɛlwa kwaɓakɔwaɓɔ ɓɛma ɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛhav̤ila ɓɛsa ɛʃurɛ pʰamɓi kwɛjiputa ukusinɡ̤a kwɛlakwaasirija waz̤iɬalisa ɛɓuswɛni ɓaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ jijɔ lɛ kɛ inz̤ala kaisakɛ uɲana kaaɓraham uaɓraham waz̤ala uisakɛ uisakɛ wajɛ ɛmiɲaka inɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmanɛ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuz̤ɛka kwakʰɛ urɛb̤ɛka intɔmɓi kab̤ɛtuwɛli umaram wasɛpad̤anaram ud̤ad̤ɛ ɓɔlab̤an umaram ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤umkakʰɛ watʰand̤az̤a uisakɛ kujɛhɔv̤a majɛla nɔmkakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛnɡ̤az̤ali watʰand̤az̤ɛka ujɛhɔv̤a wamitʰa urɛb̤ɛka umkakʰɛ ɓatʲahalana aɓantwana ɛmɓilini wakʰɛ watʰi ukuɓa und͡ʒ̤alɔ jini ukuɓa nd̤iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ waja kuɓuz̤a kujɛhɔv̤a watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɛ z̤imɓini iintlanɡ̤a ɛsiz̤alwɛni sakʰɔ kuja kwaɬuka z̤iz̤wɛ z̤iɓini ɛsiswini sakʰɔ ɛsiɲɛ sɔmɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛsiɲɛ ɔmkʰulu uja kukʰɔnz̤a ɔmŋǀi jaz̤alisɛka kɛ imiɬa jakʰɛ jɔkuz̤ala nankɔ inɡ̤amawɛlɛ ɛsiz̤alwɛni sakʰɛ lapʰuma ɛlɔkukǃala liŋ̤ǃ̤ɔmɓɛla lɔnkɛ lipʰɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛkǁʰɔnti ɓalitʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤uɛsawu ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ kwapʰuma walɔ isanɮa sakʰɛ siɓamɓɛ isitʰɛnd̤ɛ sikaɛsawu wamtʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤ujakɔɓi uisakɛ wajɛmiɲaka imaʃumi matʰand̤atʰu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuz̤alwa kwaɓɔ akʰula kɛ amakʰwɛnkwɛ uɛsawu waɓa liz̤inɡ̤ɛla ind̤ɔd̤a jasɛnɮɛ ujakɔɓi waɓa jind̤ɔd̤a ɛɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ iɬɛli ɛz̤intɛntɛni uisakɛ watʰand̤a uɛsawu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iɲamakaz̤i iɓimnand̤i ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɛ kɛ jɛna urɛb̤ɛka watʰand̤a ujakɔɓi ujakɔɓi wajɛpʰɛkɛ ukuɮa uɛsawu ɛv̤ɛla ɛz̤inɮɛ ɛtʰʲafilɛ watʰi uɛsawu kujakɔɓi kʰawund̤ipʰɛ nd̤iɡ̤iɲɛ kwintɔ ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔmɓɛla lɔɔ ntɔ iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔmɓɛla kuɓa nd̤itʰʲafilɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ kwatʰiwa iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ nɡ̤uɛd̤ɔm watʰi ujakɔɓi tʰɛnɡ̤isa nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuz̤iɓulɔ ɓakʰɔ watʰi uɛsawu jaɓɔna nd̤iz̤a ɓujintɔni uɓuz̤iɓulɔ watʰi ujakɔɓi nd̤ifunɡ̤ɛlɛ nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ wamfunɡ̤ɛla watʰɛnɡ̤isa kɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuz̤iɓulɔ ɓakʰɛ kujakɔɓi ujakɔɓi uɛsawu isɔnka nɛɛntlumajɔ ɛz̤ipʰɛkiwɛjɔ waɮa wasɛla wɛsuka wɛmka waɓud̤ɛla kɛ uɛsawu uɓuz̤iɓulɔ ɓakʰɛ kwaɓakʰɔ inɮala ɛz̤wɛni nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛjɔkukǃala inɮala ɛjajikʰɔ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kaaɓraham waja uisakɛ kuab̤imɛlɛki wamafilisti ɛɡ̤ɛrarɛ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓɔnakala kujɛ watʰi musa ukuɬa ujɛ ɛjiputa ɛz̤wɛni ɛnd̤ija kukukǁɛlɛla lɔna pʰamɓukɛla kwɛli z̤wɛ nd̤ɔɓa nawɛ nd̤ikusikɛlɛlɛ kuɓa nd̤ija wɛna nɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ ɔnkɛ maz̤wɛ nd̤isimisɛ isifunɡ̤ɔ ɛnd̤asifunɡ̤ajɔ kuaɓraham ujiɬɔ nd̤ijand̤isɛ imɓɛwu jakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnkwɛnkwɛz̤i z̤ɛz̤ulu nd̤ijinikɛ imɓɛwu jakʰɔ ɔnkɛ maz̤wɛ z̤isikɛlɛlwɛ nɡ̤ɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa uaɓraham walipʰulapʰulajɔ iz̤wi wasiɡ̤ǀ̤ina isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina nɛmitʰɛtʰɔ jam nɛmimisɛlɔ jam nɛmijalɛlɔ jam waɬala uisakɛ ɛɡ̤ɛrarɛ aɓuz̤a amad̤ɔd̤a alɔɔ nd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔmkakʰɛ watʰi nɡ̤ud̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu kuɓa ɛɓɛsɔjika ukutʰi nɡ̤umkam ɬɛz̤ɛ amɓulalɛ amad̤ɔd̤a alɛ nd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa karɛb̤ɛka nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛm̤lɛ imɓɔnakalɔ kwatʰi akuɓɔn ukuɓa uliɓɛlɛ umz̤uz̤u kʰɔna wɔnd̤ɛla uab̤imɛlɛki wamafilisti nɡ̤ɛfɛstilɛ wakʰanɡ̤ɛla nankɔ uisakɛ ɛɮala nɔrɛb̤ɛka umkakʰɛ uab̤imɛlɛki wamɓiz̤a uisakɛ watʰi jaɓɔna inɛnɛ nɡ̤umkakʰɔ lɔ unɡ̤atʰini ukutʰi nɡ̤ud̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu watʰi uisakɛ kujɛ ɓɛnd̤isitʰi ɬɛz̤ɛ nd̤ifɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɛ watʰi uab̤imɛlɛki jini ukuɓa wɛnz̤ɛ lɛ ntɔ kutʰi ɔtʰilɛ ɛɓantwini ɛɓɛnɡ̤atʰi alalɛ nɔmkakʰɔ uɓɛ usiz̤isɛlɛ itʲala uab̤imɛlɛki wawisɛla ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkutʰi lɔwɔ ujikǀʰukumisajɔ lɛ nd̤ɔd̤a nɔmkajɔ wɔɓulawa afɛ uisakɛ waɬwajɛla kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ waz̤uz̤a nɡ̤alɔɔ mɲaka imilinɡ̤anisɔ ɛlikʰulu ujɛhɔv̤a wamsikɛlɛla jaɓa ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ jaja ikʰula nɡ̤ɔkukʰula jad̤a jaɓa kunɛnɛ jaɓa nɛmfujɔ jɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛmfujɔ jɛɛnkɔmɔ naɓakʰɔnz̤i aɓaninz̤i ajimɔnɛla amafilisti ɔnkɛ amakǃula aɓaɓɛwamɓilɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakajisɛ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kaaɓraham ujisɛ awav̤iŋ̤ǀ̤a amafilisti awad̤iɓɛlɛla nɡ̤ɔm̤laɓa watʰi uab̤imɛlɛki kuisakɛ mka kutʰi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa usukɛ waɓa namanɮa amakʰulu kunatʰi uisakɛ wɛmka kɛ apʰɔ iintɛntɛ ɛsiɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni sasɛɡ̤ɛrarɛ waɬala kʰɔna waɓuja uisakɛ wawamɓa amakǃula amanz̤i aɓaɓɛwamɓilɛ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kaaɓraham ujisɛ aɓɛv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤iwɛ nɡ̤amafilisti ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkufa kukaaɓraham wawaɓiz̤a nɡ̤amaɡ̤ama aɓɛwaɓiz̤ɛ nɡ̤awɔ ujisɛ ɓɛmɓa aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakaisakɛ ɛsiɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni ɛsɔ ɓafumana kʰɔna ikǃula lamanz̤i apʰililɛjɔ aɓalusi ɓasɛɡ̤ɛrarɛ ɓaɓamɓana naɓalusi ɓakaisakɛ ɓɛsitʰi nɡ̤awɛtʰu manz̤i watʰi iɡ̤ama lɛkǃula ɛlɔ jiɛsɛkɛ kuɓa ɓaɓɛz̤amana najɛ ɓɛmɓa ɛliɲɛ ikǃula ɓaɓamɓana nanɡ̤alɔ watʰi iɡ̤ama lalɔ jisitɛna wɛsuka kʰɔna wɛmɓa ɛliɲɛ ikǃula aɓaɓamɓananɡ̤a nɡ̤alɔ watʰi iɡ̤ama lalɔ jirɛhɔb̤ɔti watʰi inɛnɛ nɡ̤ɔku ujɛhɔv̤a usɛnz̤ɛlɛ ind̤awɔ ɛɓanz̤i ukuz̤ɛ sikǃʰamɛ ɛz̤wɛni apʰa wɛɲuka wɛmka kʰɔna waja ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a ujɛhɔv̤a waɓɔnakala kujɛ nɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku watʰi
