nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ kaaɓraham ujiɬɔ musa ukɔjika kuɓa nd̤inawɛ nd̤ija kukusikɛlɛla nd̤ijand̤isɛ imɓɛwu jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kaaɓraham umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰa kʰɔna isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ waŋǃula iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a wajimisa kʰɔna intɛntɛ jakʰɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakaisakɛ ɓɛmɓa kʰɔna ikǃula kɛ kalɔku uab̤imɛlɛki wɛz̤a kujɛ ɛpʰuma ɛɡ̤ɛrarɛ nɔahuz̤ati isiɬɔɓɔ sakʰɛ nɔfikɔlɔ umtʰɛtʰɛli wɔmkʰɔsi wakʰɛ watʰi uisakɛ kuɓɔ niz̤ɛlɛni nand̤itʰijajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nand̤ind̤ulula ɓatʰi siɓɔnɛ kakuɬɛ ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a unawɛ satʰi makuɓɛkʰɔ isifunɡ̤ɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu nawɛ sɛnz̤ɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nawɛ wɔkuɓa unɡ̤asɛnz̤ɛli ɓuɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa sinɡ̤akusund̤uz̤anɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa sikwɛnz̤ɛlɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kɔd̤wa sakund̤ulula unɔkǁɔlɔ nɡ̤ɔku usikɛlɛlwɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a waɓɛnz̤ɛla isiɮɔ ɓaɮa ɓasɛla ɓav̤uka ɓafunɡ̤ɛlana uisakɛ waɓand̤ulula ɓɛmka kujɛ ɓɛnɔkǁɔlɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤alɔɔ ɓafika aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakaisakɛ ɓamkǁɛlɛla ind̤awɔ jɛkǃula aɓaɓɛlimɓilɛ ɓatʰi kujɛ siwafumɛnɛ amanz̤i watʰi lijiʃib̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ mz̤i lijib̤ɛrʃɛb̤a unanam̤la kɛ kalɔku uɛsawu akuɓa miɲaka imaʃumi manɛ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ waz̤ɛka umfaz̤i ujud̤iti intɔmɓi kab̤ɛri um̤ɛti nɔb̤asɛmati intɔmɓi kaɛlɔn um̤ɛti ɓaɓakǀapʰukisa ɔɔisakɛ nɔrɛb̤ɛka kwatʰi akwalupʰala uisakɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɛ ɛnɔxatʲaz̤ɔ ukuɓa anɡ̤aɓɔni wamɓiz̤a uɛsawu uɲana wakʰɛ ɔmkʰulu watʰi kujɛ ɲana watʰi jɛna kujɛ nd̤ilapʰa watʰi kʰawuɓɔnɛ nd̤alupʰɛlɛ and̤ijaz̤i jɔkufa kʰawutʰaɓatʰɛ nɡ̤ɔku iintɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɔ umpʰɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ wakʰɔ nɛsapʰɛtʰa sakʰɔ ujɛ ɛz̤inɮɛ und̤iz̤inɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ iɲamakaz̤i und̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ ukuɮa ɔkunɛŋǀasa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤ikutʰand̤ajɔ ukuz̤isɛ nd̤iɮɛ ukuz̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ ukusikɛlɛlɛ nd̤inɡ̤ɛkafi kɛ kalɔku urɛb̤ɛka wajɛsiv̤a ukuɓa uisakɛ utʰɛtʰa kuɛsawu uɲana wakʰɛ uɛsawu waja kuz̤inɡ̤ɛla iɲamakaz̤i ɛz̤inɮɛ ukuɓa ajiz̤isɛ urɛb̤ɛka watʰɛtʰa kujakɔɓi uɲana wakʰɛ watʰi jaɓɔna nd̤iv̤ɛ ujiɬɔ ɛtʰɛtʰa kuɛsawu umkʰuluwa wakʰɔ ɛsitʰi nd̤iz̤isɛlɛ iɲamakaz̤i und̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ ukuɮa ɔkunɛŋǀasa nd̤iɮɛ nd̤ikusikɛlɛlɛ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a nd̤inɡ̤ɛkafi nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ ɲana lipʰulapʰulɛ iz̤wi nɡ̤ɛntɔ ɛnd̤ikuwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ajɔ kʰawuhamɓɛ ujɛ ɛm̤lamɓini und̤itʰaɓatʰɛlɛ kʰɔna amatakanɛ amaɓini ɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ alunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nd̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ ujiɬɔ ukuɮa ɔkunɛŋǀasa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ akutʰand̤ajɔ ukusɛ kujiɬɔ aɮɛ ukuz̤ɛ akusikɛlɛlɛ ɛnɡ̤ɛkafi watʰi ujakɔɓi kurɛb̤ɛka jaɓɔna uɛsawu umkʰuluwa jind̤ɔd̤a ɛkǁʰɔnti nd̤ijind̤ɔd̤a ɛɡ̤ud̤ilɛjɔ m̤lawumɓi uɓawɔ wɔnd̤iv̤a nd̤iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛli ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ nd̤iz̤iz̤isɛlɛ int͡ʃwaɓulɛlɔ nd̤inɡ̤az̤iz̤isɛli int͡sikɛlɛlɔ watʰi kujɛ makuɓɛ pʰɛz̤u ukuʃwatʲulɛlwa kwakʰɔ ɲana pʰulapʰula iz̤wi wɛna ujɛ und̤itʰaɓatʰɛlɛ waja wawatʰaɓatʰa wawaz̤isa wɛnz̤a ukuɮa ɔkunɛŋǀasa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ akutʰand̤ajɔ ujisɛ urɛb̤ɛka watʰaɓatʰa iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ikaɛsawu uɲana wakʰɛ ɔmkʰulu ɛz̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤ikujɛ ɛnɮwini wamamɓatʰisa ujakɔɓi uɲana wakʰɛ ɔmŋǀi iz̤int͡su z̤amatakanɛ lawɔ ɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ wamɓatʰisa nɡ̤az̤ɔ iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ nɛnd̤awɔ ɛɡ̤ud̤ilɛjɔ jɛntamɔ jakʰɛ waɓɛka ɛsanɮɛni sikajakɔɓi uɲana wakʰɛ ukuɮa ɔkunɛŋǀasa nɛsɔnka aɓɛsɛnz̤ilɛ wɛz̤a kujisɛ watʰi ɓawɔ watʰi jɛna nd̤ilapʰa unɡ̤uɓani ɲana watʰi ujakɔɓi kujisɛ nd̤inɡ̤uɛsawu amaz̤iɓulɔ akʰɔ nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ watʰɛtʰa nɡ̤akɔ kʰawuv̤ukɛ kɛ uɬalɛ uɮɛ iɲamakaz̤i jam ukuz̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ und̤isikɛlɛlɛ watʰi uisakɛ kuɲana wakʰɛ kutʰɛni lɛ ntɔ ukʰawulɛz̤ilɛjɔ ukujifumana ɲana watʰi jɛna ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ und̤itʰamsaŋǃɛlisilɛ watʰi uisakɛ kujakɔɓi kʰawusɔnd̤ɛlɛ nd̤ikuv̤ɛ ɲana ukuɓa unɡ̤ujɛ kaɲɛ uɲana uɛsawu akunɡ̤ujɛ wasɔnd̤ɛla ujakɔɓi kuisakɛ ujisɛ wamv̤a watʰi iliz̤wi lɔna liliz̤wi likajakɔɓi kɔd̤wa iz̤anɮa z̤iz̤anɮa z̤ikaɛsawu akamnakana kɛ kuɓa iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ z̤aɓa nɔɓɔja nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤ikaɛsawu umkʰuluwa wakʰɛ wamsikɛlɛla kɛ watʰi wɛna lɔ unɡ̤uɲana uɛsawu watʰi jɛna nd̤inɡ̤ujɛ watʰi sɔnd̤ɛz̤a nd̤iɮɛ iɲamakaz̤i jɔɲana ukuz̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ ukusikɛlɛlɛ wajisɔnd̤ɛz̤a kujɛ waɮa wamz̤isɛla nɛwajini wasɛla watʰi ujisɛ uisakɛ kujɛ kʰawusɔnd̤ɛlɛ und̤anɡ̤ɛ ɲana wasɔnd̤ɛla wamanɡ̤a waliv̤a iv̤umɓa lɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ wamsikɛlɛla watʰi jaɓɔna iv̤umɓa lɔɲana lind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛv̤umɓa lɛliz̤wɛ ɛlisikɛlɛlwɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤amana utʰikǁɔ kuwɔ umɓɛtʰɛ wɛz̤ulu nakukɔ ukukǀʰuma kɔm̤laɓa nɛntaɓalala jɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛwajini ɛnt͡ʃa iz̤iz̤wɛ maz̤ikukʰɔnz̤ɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ikǃuɓud̤ɛ kuwɛ jiɓa jinkɔsi kuɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɔ ɓakǃuɓud̤ɛ kuwɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaɲɔkɔ ukǃalɛkisiwɛ ɔkukǃalɛkisajɔ usikɛlɛlwɛ ɔkusikɛlɛlajɔ kwatʰi akuɓɔn ukuɓa uɡ̤ǃ̤iɓilɛ uisakɛ ukumsikɛlɛla ujakɔɓi ɛɓuswɛni ɓukaisakɛ ujisɛ wanɡ̤ɛna uɛsawu umkʰuluwa wakʰɛ ɛv̤ɛla ɛkuz̤inɡ̤ɛlɛni kwakʰɛ najɛ wɛnz̤a ukuɮa ɔkunɛŋǀasa waz̤isa kujisɛ watʰi kujisɛ makav̤ukɛ uɓawɔ aɮɛ iɲamakaz̤i jɔɲana wakʰɛ ukuz̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ und̤isikɛlɛlɛ watʰi uisakɛ ujisɛ kujɛ unɡ̤uɓani watʰi nd̤inɡ̤uɲana wakʰɔ uɛsawu amaz̤iɓulɔ akʰɔ uisakɛ waɡ̤ub̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɡ̤ub̤a ɔkukʰulu kunɛnɛ watʰi nɡ̤uɓani lɔ pʰɔfu uz̤inɡ̤ɛlɛ iɲamakaz̤i wajiz̤isa nd̤aɮa ɛntwɛni jɔnkɛ unɡ̤ɛkafiki wɛna nd̤amsikɛlɛla wɔsikɛlɛlɛka kɛ akuwɛv̤a uɛsawu amaz̤wi kajisɛ wakʰala nɡ̤ɛsikʰalɔ ɛsikʰulu ɛsik͡xak͡xa kunɛnɛ watʰi kujisɛ nd̤isikɛlɛlɛ ɓawɔ watʰi jɛna kufikɛ wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛnkɔɬisɔ wajitʰaɓatʰa int͡sikɛlɛlɔ jakʰɔ watʰi kunɡ̤ɔkuɓa iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ kusitʰiwa nɡ̤ujakɔɓi lɛ ntɔ and̤iɡ̤wɛkǃɛ ɛz̤i z̤iɬanɮɔ z̤ɔz̤iɓini watʰaɓatʰa uɓuz̤iɓulɔ ɓam nɡ̤ɔku ɛtʰaɓatʰɛ nɛnt͡sikɛlɛlɔ jam watʰi akund̤iɓɛkɛlanɡ̤a nt͡sikɛlɛlɔ jam watʰi akund̤iɓɛkɛlanɡ̤a nt͡sikɛlɛlɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula uisakɛ watʰi kuɛsawu jaɓɔna nd̤immisilɛ waɓa jinkɔsi jakʰɔ naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ nd̤iɓanikɛ jɛna ɓaɓa nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i nd̤amkǁʰasa nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nanɡ̤ɛwajini ɛnt͡ʃa jintɔni kalɔku ɛnd̤inɡ̤akwɛnz̤ɛla jɔna ɲana watʰi uɛsawu kujisɛ iɲɛ lɛ nt͡sikɛlɛlɔ unajɔ ɓawɔ nd̤isikɛlɛlɛ ɓawɔ walipʰakamisa uɛsawu iz̤wi lakʰɛ wapʰɛnd̤ula uisakɛ ujisɛ watʰi kujɛ jaɓɔna ikʰaja lakʰɔ lija kuɓa lɛɛ nɔkukǀʰuma kɔm̤laɓa lɛɛ nɔmɓɛtʰɛ wɛz̤ulu ɔv̤ɛla pʰɛz̤ulu uja kupʰila nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ lakʰɔ umkʰɔnz̤ɛ wakʰɔ kutʰi wakuɮɔkɔv̤a ujapʰulɛ idʲɔkʰwɛ jakʰɛ isukɛ ɛntaɲɛni jakʰɔ uɛsawu wamz̤ɔnd̤a ujakɔɓi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnt͡sikɛlɛlɔ awamsikɛlɛla nɡ̤ajɔ ujisɛ uɛsawu watʰi ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɛ ija kusɔnd̤ɛla imiɬa jɛsid͡ʒ̤wili sikaɓawɔ nd̤imɓulalɛ kɛ ujakɔɓi wawakǁɛlɛlwa urɛb̤ɛka amaz̤wi kaɛsawu uɲana wakʰɛ ɔmkʰulu watʰumɛla wamɓiz̤a ujakɔɓi uɲana wakʰɛ ɔmŋǀi watʰi kujɛ jaɓɔna uɛsawu umkʰuluwa wakʰɔ uz̤itʰutʰuz̤ɛla nɡ̤awɛ nɡ̤ɔkukuɓulala nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ ɲana pʰulapʰula iz̤wi usukɛ uɓalɛkɛlɛ kulab̤an umnakwɛtʰu kwaharan uɬalɛ najɛ iint͡suku ɛz̤itʰilɛ ɓud̤ɛ ɓuɓujɛ uɓuʃuʃu ɓɔmkʰuluwa wakʰɔ ud̤ɛ umsind̤ɔ wɔmkʰuluwa wakʰɔ uɓujɛ kuwɛ ajiliɓalɛ intɔ ɔjɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kujɛ nd̤itʰumɛlɛ kɛ nd̤ikupʰutʰumɛ kʰɔna jini ukuɓa nd̤iɬutʰwɛ nɔɓaɓini nɡ̤aminiɲɛ kɛ kalɔku urɛb̤ɛka watʰi kuisakɛ nd̤ik͡xukǃukilɛ ɓuɓɔmi ɓam nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akwahɛti ukuɓa ujakɔɓi utʰɛ waz̤ɛka umfaz̤i ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤akwahɛti ɛz̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤i ntɔmɓi z̤ɛli liz̤wɛ ɓɔɓa jintɔni ɔɓu ɓɔmi uisakɛ wamɓiz̤a ujakɔɓi wamsikɛlɛla wamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ watʰi kujɛ uz̤ɛ unɡ̤az̤ɛki mfaz̤i ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤akwakanan suka ujɛ ɛpad̤anaram ɛnɮwini kab̤ɛtuwɛli uɲɔkɔkʰulu uz̤ɛkɛ kʰɔna umfaz̤i ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤ikalab̤an uɲɔkɔlumɛ nɡ̤amana utʰikǁɔ usɔmanɮa wakusikɛlɛla wakukǃʰamisa wakwand̤isa ukuz̤ɛ uɓɛ sisikʰunɡ̤u sɛz̤iz̤wɛ akunikɛ int͡sikɛlɛlɔ kaaɓraham wɛna nɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ nd̤awɔɲɛ nawɛ ukuz̤ɛ uliɮɛ iliz̤wɛ lɔkupʰamɓukɛla kwakʰɔ ɛlɔ utʰikǁɔ uaɓraham uisakɛ wamnd̤ulula kɛ ujakɔɓi waja ɛpad̤anaram kulab̤an uɲana kab̤ɛtuwɛli umaram umnakwaɓɔ ɓɔrɛb̤ɛka ɓɔɔjakɔɓi nɔɛsawu uɛsawu waɓɔna ukuɓa uisakɛ umsikɛlɛlɛ ujakɔɓi wamnd̤ulula ukuɓa ajɛ ɛpad̤anaram az̤ɛkɛ kʰɔna umfaz̤i ɛkumsikɛlɛlɛni kwakʰɛ wamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkutʰi uz̤ɛ unɡ̤az̤ɛki mfaz̤i ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤akwakanan nɔjakɔɓi umpʰulapʰulɛ ujisɛ nɔnina waja ɛpad̤anaram waɓɔna uɛsawu ukuɓa iintɔmɓi z̤akwakanan az̤ifunwa nɡ̤uisakɛ ujisɛ waja uɛsawu kuiʃmajɛli waz̤ɛka umahalati intɔmɓi kaiʃmajɛli uɲana kaaɓraham ud̤ad̤ɛ ɓɔnɛb̤ajɔti pʰɛz̤u kwaɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɛ wanɡ̤umkakʰɛ wapʰuma kɛ ujakɔɓi ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a waja kwaharan watʰi kǃatʰa nd̤awɛni itʰilɛ kʰɔna kuɓa ɓɛlit͡ʃʰɔnilɛ ilanɡ̤a watʰaɓatʰa kumatʲɛ alɔɔ nd̤awɔ waɓɛka pʰant͡si kwɛntlɔkɔ jakʰɛ kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ wapʰupʰa ɛɓɔna ilɛli imisiwɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni intlɔkɔ jajɔ ijɛ jafika ɛmaz̤ulwini nanz̤ɔ iz̤itʰuɲwa z̤ikatʰikǁɔ z̤iɲuka z̤isiɬa nɡ̤ajɔ nankɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛmi pʰɛz̤u kwajɔ watʰi nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kaaɓraham ujiɬɔ utʰikǁɔ kaisakɛ iliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ ulɛlɛ kulɔ nd̤ija wɛna nɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ imɓɛwu jakʰɔ iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔtʰuli lɔm̤laɓa upʰanɡ̤alalɛ usinɡ̤ɛ ɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a nasɛmpumalanɡ̤a nasɛntla nasɛz̤ant͡si z̤isikɛlɛlwɛ nɡ̤awɛ nanɡ̤ɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi jaɓɔna nd̤inawɛ nd̤ija kukuɡ̤ǀ̤ina napʰi apʰɔ uja kʰɔna nd̤ikuɓujisɛlɛ kulɔ m̤laɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa and̤iji kukuʃija nid̤id̤ɛ nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ ɔkɔ nd̤ikutʰɛtʰilɛjɔ kuwɛ wav̤uka ujakɔɓi ɛɓutʰɔnɡ̤wɛni ɓakʰɛ watʰi kund͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ukʰɔ kulɛ nd̤awɔ ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤az̤i wɔjika watʰi asikukɔ nɔkuɓa ijɔjikɛka lɛ nd̤awɔ jinɮu katʰikǁɔ lɛ ajintɔ jimɓi lisanɡ̤ɔ lamaz̤ulu ɛli wav̤uka ujakɔɓi walitʰaɓatʰa ilitʲɛ aɓɛliɓɛkɛ pʰant͡si kwɛntlɔkɔ jakʰɛ lasisimisɔ watʰulula iɔli pʰɛz̤u kwalɔ watʰi iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ nd̤awɔ jib̤ɛtɛli nanɡ̤ɔna ɓɛlijiluz̤i iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ mz̤i ɛkukǃalɛni wab̤amɓatʰisa nɡ̤ɛsib̤amɓatʰisɔ ujakɔɓi ɛsitʰi ukuɓa utʰikǁɔ utʰɛ waɓa wand̤iɡ̤ǀ̤ina kujɔ lɛ nɮɛla nd̤ijihamɓajɔ wand̤inika isɔnka nd̤aɮa nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ nd̤amɓatʰa nd̤aɓujɛla ɛnɮwini kaɓawɔ nd̤inɔkǁɔlɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɔɓa nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ nɛli litʲɛ nd̤ilimisilɛjɔ lasisimisɔ lɔɓa jinɮu katʰikǁɔ nɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɔtʰɛ wand̤inika nd̤ɔkunika isiʃumi saz̤ɔ wɛsuka ujakɔɓi waja ɛz̤wɛni laɓasɛmpumalanɡ̤a wakʰanɡ̤ɛla waɓɔna ikǃula ɛz̤wɛni nant͡sɔ ikʰɔna imiɬamɓi ɛmitʰatʰu jɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ iɓutʰilɛ nɡ̤akulɔ kuɓa imiɬamɓi jajisɛz̤wa kwɛlɔ kǃula kukʰɔ ilitʲɛ ɛlikʰulu ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛkǃula jaɓɛ iɬanɡ̤anisɛlwa kʰɔna jɔnkɛ imiɬamɓi ɓalikǃɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛ ilitʲɛ ɓalisusɛ ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛkǃula ɓajisɛz̤ɛ impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ ɓaliɓujisɛlɛ ilitʲɛ ɛlɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛkǃula ɛnd̤awɛni jalɔ ujakɔɓi watʰi kuɓɔ ɓaz̤alwana ɓam niv̤ɛla pʰi ɓatʰi ɓɔna siv̤ɛla kwaharan watʰi kuɓɔ nijamaz̤i ulab̤an uɲana kanahɔrɛ ɓatʰi sijamaz̤i watʰi kuɓɔ usapʰililɛ ɓatʰi usapʰililɛ nɔrakɛli intɔmɓi jakʰɛ ɛsiz̤a nɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ watʰi jaɓɔnani kusɛsɛmini ɛnkulu asilikǁa lakuɬanɡ̤anisa impaɬa jisɛz̤ɛni impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nijɛ ɓatʰi asinakɔ id̤ɛ iɬanɡ̤aniswɛ jɔnkɛ imiɬamɓi likǃɛŋ̤ǃ̤wɛ ilitʲɛ lisukɛ ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛkǃula sijisɛz̤ɛ kɛ impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ kɛ kalɔku ɛsatʰɛtʰa naɓɔ urakɛli nɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ kajisɛ kuɓa uɓɛjalusa kwatʰi ujakɔɓi akumɓɔna urakɛli intɔmɓi kalab̤an uninalumɛ nɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ kalab̤an uninalumɛ wasɔnd̤ɛla ujakɔɓi walikǃɛŋ̤ǃ̤a ilitʲɛ lɛsuka ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛkǃula wajisɛz̤a impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ kalab̤an uninalumɛ ujakɔɓi wamanɡ̤a urakɛli walipʰakamisa iz̤wi lakʰɛ wasit͡ʃɔ isililɔ ujakɔɓi wamkǁɛlɛla urakɛli ukuɓa unɡ̤umz̤alwana kajisɛ nɔkuɓa unɡ̤uɲana karɛb̤ɛka waɡ̤id̤ima jɛna wakǁɛlɛla ujisɛ kwatʰi ulab̤an akuluv̤a ud̤aɓa lukajakɔɓi uɲana wɔd̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ waɡ̤id̤ima waja kumkʰawulɛla wamwɔla wamanɡ̤a wamnɡ̤ɛnisa ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ jɛna wamɓalisɛla ulab̤an nɡ̤ɛz̤ɔ nd̤awɔ z̤ɔnkɛ watʰi ulab̤an kujɛ ɔkunɛnɛ ulitʰamɓɔ ujiɲama jam waɬala najɛ iɲanɡ̤a ipʰɛla watʰi ulab̤an kujakɔɓi kunɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɡ̤umz̤alwana lɛ ntɔ und̤ikʰɔnz̤a nɛɡ̤ɛliz̤ɛ nd̤ikǁɛlɛlɛ umv̤uz̤ɔ wakʰɔ kɛ kalɔku ulab̤an wajɛ ɛnɛɛntɔmɓi ɛz̤imɓini iɡ̤ama lɛnkulu lalinɡ̤ulɛja iɡ̤ama lɛŋǀi lalinɡ̤urakɛli kɛ ulɛja wajɛnɛkǀʰapʰɔtʰi urakɛli wajɛm̤lɛ isikǃu ɛm̤lɛ imɓɔnakalɔ ujakɔɓi uɓɛmtʰand̤a urakɛli watʰi nd̤ɔkukʰɔnz̤a imiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛɡ̤ɛŋǁa karakɛli intɔmɓi jakʰɔ ɛŋǀi watʰi ulab̤an kulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuɓa nd̤imnikɛ wɛna kunɔkuɓa nd̤imnikɛ ɛɲɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɬala kɛ ujakɔɓi wakʰɔnz̤a kɛ imiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa karakɛli janɡ̤a jimiɬa ɛmɓalwa ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkumtʰand̤a kwakʰɛ watʰi ujakɔɓi kulab̤an nd̤inikɛ kuɓa iz̤alisɛkilɛ imiɬa jam ukuɓa nd̤imnɡ̤ɛnɛ wawaɬanɡ̤anisa ulab̤an ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a alɔɔ nd̤awɔ wɛnz̤a umsitʰɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa watʰaɓatʰa ulɛja intɔmɓi jakʰɛ wamnɡ̤ɛnisa kujɛ wamnɡ̤ɛna kɛ jɛna intɔmɓi jakʰɛ ulɛja ulab̤an wajinika uz̤ilipa umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɛ ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wajɔ kwatʰi kwaɓɔnakala inɡ̤ulɛja watʰi kulab̤an jintɔni lɛ ntɔ ujɛnz̤ilɛjɔ and̤ikukʰɔnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa und̤ikʰɔɬisɛ watʰi ulab̤an akwɛnd͡ʒ̤iwa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ kɔwɛtʰu ukutʰi kwɛnd̤iswɛ ɛŋǀi pʰamɓi kwɛjamaz̤iɓulɔ z̤alisa iv̤ɛki jalɛ walɛkɛ ɛmiɲɛ imiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ sɔkunika nalɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛnkɔnz̤ɔ ɔja kund̤ikʰɔnz̤a nɡ̤ajɔ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ujakɔɓi wajiz̤alisa iv̤ɛki jalɛ wamnika kɛ urakɛli intɔmɓi jakʰɛ janɡ̤umkakʰɛ intɔmɓi jakʰɛ urakɛli ulab̤an wajinika ub̤iliha umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɛ ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wajɔ wamnɡ̤ɛna urakɛli wamtʰand̤a urakɛli pʰɛz̤u kɔlɛja wakʰɔnz̤a kɛ walɛka ɛmiɲɛ imiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓɔna ukuɓa ulɛja utʰijiwɛ wasiv̤ula isiz̤alɔ sakʰɛ kɛ urakɛli ɛɓɛnɡ̤az̤ali wamitʰa kɛ ulɛja waz̤ala uɲana wamtʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤urub̤ɛn nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛsitʰi ujɛhɔv̤a uz̤iɓɔnilɛ iint͡siz̤i z̤am inɛnɛ ija kund̤itʰand̤a nɡ̤ɔku ind̤ɔd̤a jam waɓuja wamitʰa waz̤ala uɲana watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a uv̤ilɛ ukuɓa nd̤itʰijiwɛ wand̤inika nalɔ wamtʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤usimɔn waɓuja wamitʰa waz̤ala uɲana watʰi kʰɔna nɡ̤ɔku ija kunamatʰɛla ind̤ɔd̤a jam kuɓa nd̤ijiz̤alɛlɛ ɔɔɲana aɓatʰatʰu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ wamtʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤ulɛv̤i waɓuja wamitʰa waz̤ala uɲana watʰi ɔkwɛsi siɬanɮɔ nd̤ija kumd̤umisa ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔnkɛ wamtʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤ujud̤a waŋǃamka ukuz̤ala kɛ kalɔku akuɓɔna urakɛli ukuɓa akamz̤alɛli ujakɔɓi urakɛli wammɔnɛla ud̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ watʰi kujakɔɓi nd̤inikɛ aɓantwana ukuɓa akund̤iniki nd̤ɔfa wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ kajakɔɓi nɡ̤akurakɛli watʰi nd̤isɛsikʰunɮɛni sikatʰikǁɔ ɔkuv̤imɓilɛjɔ isikǃʰamɔ sɛsiz̤alɔ watʰi jɛna nant͡sɔ impɛlɛsi jam ub̤iliha jinɡ̤ɛnɛ iz̤alɛlɛ ɛmad̤ɔlwɛni nd̤akʰɛkɛ nɡ̤ajɔ wamnika kɛ ub̤iliha umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɛ ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤umfaz̤i ujakɔɓi wamnɡ̤ɛna wamitʰa ub̤iliha wamz̤alɛla ujakɔɓi uɲana watʰi uxakɛli utʰikǁɔ und̤iɡ̤wɛɓɛlɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ulipʰulapʰulɛ iz̤wi wand̤inika uɲana nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ wamtʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤ud̤an waɓuja wamitʰa ub̤iliha umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana karakɛli wamz̤alɛla ujakɔɓi uɲana wɛsiɓini watʰi urakɛli nd̤iz̤amɛnɛ nɔd̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu imiz̤amɔ katʰikǁɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤ɛjisa wamtʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤unafɛtali kɛ kalɔku waɓɔna ulɛja ukuɓa uŋǃamkilɛ ukuz̤ala watʰaɓatʰa uz̤ilipa umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɛ ujakɔɓi ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤umfaz̤i uz̤ilipa umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana kalɛja wamz̤alɛla ujakɔɓi uɲana watʰi ulɛja litʰamsaŋǃa wamtʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤uɡ̤ad̤i uz̤ilipa umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana kalɛja wamz̤alɛla ujakɔɓi uɲana wɛsiɓini watʰi ulɛja nd̤iv̤a ujɔlɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iintɔmɓi z̤ija kutʰi nd̤inɔjɔlɔ wamtʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤uaʃɛrɛ waja urub̤ɛn nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔv̤unɔ lwɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa amatʰuma ɛnɮɛ wawaz̤isa kulɛja watʰi urakɛli kulɛja kʰawund̤ipʰɛ ɛmatʰumɛni ɔɲana wakʰɔ lawɔ watʰi kujɛ jintɔ ɛŋǀinanɛ ukujitʰaɓatʰa ind̤ɔd̤a jam uɓujɛ utʰaɓatʰɛ namatʰuma ɔɲana watʰi urakɛli nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ majilalɛ nawɛ nɡ̤ɔɓu ɓusuku nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamatʰuma ɔɲana wakʰɔ lawɔ wafika ujakɔɓi ɛv̤ɛla ɛz̤inɮɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa wapʰuma ulɛja ɛsija kumkʰawulɛla watʰi uz̤ɛ und̤inɡ̤ɛnɛ kuɓa nd̤ikukǃɛʃilɛ nɡ̤amatʰuma ɔɲana walala kɛ najɛ nɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku utʰikǁɔ wampʰulapʰula ulɛja wamitʰa wamz̤alɛla ujakɔɓi uɲana wɛsiɬanu watʰi ulɛja utʰikǁɔ und̤inikilɛ umv̤uz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa ind̤ɔd̤a jam nd̤ijinikɛ umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wamtʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤uisakarɛ waɓuja wamitʰa ulɛja wamz̤alɛla ujakɔɓi uɲana wɛsitʰand̤atʰu watʰi ulɛja utʰikǁɔ und̤ipʰɛ isipʰɔ ɛsilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɔkwɛsi siɬanɮɔ ind̤ɔd̤a jam ija kuɬala kuɓa nd̤ijiz̤alɛlɛ ɔɔɲana aɓatʰand̤atʰu wamtʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤uz̤ɛb̤ulɔn ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ waz̤ala intɔmɓi wajitʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤ud̤ina kɛ kalɔku utʰikǁɔ wamkʰumɓula urakɛli utʰikǁɔ wampʰulapʰula wasiv̤ula isiz̤alɔ sakʰɛ wamitʰa waz̤ala uɲana watʰi utʰikǁɔ ukususilɛ ukuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤wa wamtʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤ujɔsɛfu watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a makɔnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛlɛlɛ ɔmɲɛ uɲana kwatʰi kǁa urakɛli ɛɓɛmz̤ɛlɛ ujɔsɛfu watʰi ujakɔɓi kulab̤an nd̤ind̤ululɛ nd̤ijɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jakɔwɛtʰu ɛz̤wɛni lakɔwɛtʰu nd̤inikɛ aɓafaz̤i ɓam naɓantwana ɓam ɛnd̤ikukʰɔnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓɔ nd̤ihamɓɛ kuɓa wɛna ujajaz̤i inkɔnz̤ɔ jam ɛnd̤ikukʰɔnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ajɔ watʰi ulab̤an kujɛ ukuɓa kalɔku nd̤iɓaɓalwɛ nɡ̤uwɛ ɬala nd̤iɬaɓɛ ukutʰi ujɛhɔv̤a und̤isikɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɔ watʰi nd̤imisɛlɛ kakuɬɛ umv̤uz̤ɔ wakʰɔ ɔnd̤ifanɛlɛjɔ nd̤ikunikɛ watʰi kujɛ ujalwaz̤i nawɛ uɬɔɓɔ lɔkukukʰɔnz̤a nɔɬɔɓɔ lɔkuɬala kwɛmpaɬa jakʰɔ kuɓa ɔɓunajɔ nd̤inɡ̤ɛkafiki jaɓɛ imɓalwa nɡ̤ɔku iz̤az̤ɛkilɛ janinz̤i ujɛhɔv̤a ukusikɛlɛlɛ apʰɔ uɲawɔ lutʰɛ lwaɲatʰɛla kalɔku nd̤ija kujisɛɓɛnz̤ɛla ɛjam inɮu watʰi nd̤ikunikɛ ntɔni watʰi ujakɔɓi akuji kund̤inika nɛntɔ lɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ wand̤ɛnz̤ɛla lɛ nd̤awɔ nd̤ɔɓuja nd̤ijalusɛ impaɬa jakʰɔ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nd̤ijiɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ nd̤ija kukǀand̤a pʰakatʰi kwajɔ jɔnkɛ impaɬa jakʰɔ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤ihamɓɛ nd̤ikʰɛtʰa kujɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iinɡ̤uʃa ɛz̤inala nɛz̤ixwɛkǁu nɛɛɡ̤uʃa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤imɲama pʰakatʰi kwamatakanɛ naz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁu nɛz̤inala pʰakatʰi kwɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ z̤iɓɛ nɡ̤umv̤uz̤ɔ ɓund̤iŋ̤ǃ̤inɛlɛ kɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓam nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛliz̤ajɔ kǁa utʰɛ wɛz̤a kumv̤uz̤ɔ ɔpʰamɓi kwakʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnala nɛz̤inɡ̤ɛxwɛkǁu pʰakatʰi kwɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ nɛz̤inɡ̤ɛmɲama pʰakatʰi kwɛɛɡ̤uʃa z̤ɔɓa z̤ɛz̤iɓiwɛjɔ ɛz̤ɔ kǁa z̤itʰɛ z̤akum watʰi ulab̤an jaɓɔna makuɓɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi lakʰɔ ɛlɔ waz̤ikʰɛtʰa nɡ̤alɔɔ m̤la iinkunz̤i z̤ɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛz̤inɛmiz̤ila nɛz̤ixwɛkǁu naz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iimaz̤i z̤ɛɛb̤ɔkwɛ ɛz̤inakaz̤i nɛz̤ixwɛkǁukaz̤i z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤inɔɓum̤lɔpʰɛ naz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤imɲama pʰakatʰi kwamatakanɛ waz̤inikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ wamisa uhamɓɔ lwɛɛmini ɛz̤intatʰu pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ nɔjakɔɓi ujakɔɓi ɛsɛlɛjɔ kɛ impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ kalab̤an kɛ kalɔku ujakɔɓi watʰaɓatʰa iintɔnɡ̤a z̤ɔmpɔpulari ɔm̤lɔpʰɛ ɛz̤imanz̤i nɛz̤ɔmamanɡ̤ilɛ nɛz̤ɔmplɛjini wakǀʰuɓa iind̤awɔ ɛz̤im̤lɔpʰɛ kuz̤ɔ ɛkǁwɛɓula ɓuv̤ɛlɛ uɓum̤lɔpʰɛ ɔɓusɛz̤intɔnɡ̤ɛni ɛz̤ɔ waz̤imisa iintɔnɡ̤a aɓɛz̤ikǀʰuɓilɛ ɛmid͡ʒ̤ɛlwɛni ɛmikʰumɓini jamanz̤i apʰɔ impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ iɓiz̤a kusɛla kʰɔna pʰamɓi kwɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ ukuɓa ipʰatʰanɛ kǁa iz̤a kusɛla japʰatʰana kɛ impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ pʰamɓi kwɛɛntɔnɡ̤a ɛz̤ɔ jaz̤ala impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ ɛnɛmiz̤ila nɛxwɛkǁu nɛnala wawaɬula ujakɔɓi amatakanɛ lawɔ waɓukʰanɡ̤ɛlisa uɓusɔ ɓɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ malunɡ̤a nɛnɛmiz̤ila nɛmɲama jɔnkɛ ɛmpaɬɛni ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ kalab̤an wajiɓɛka jɔd̤wa ɛjakʰɛ imiɬamɓi akajiɓɛka ɛmpaɬɛni ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ kalab̤an kwatʰi kǁa ipʰatʰanajɔ ɛjɔmɛlɛlɛjɔ ɛmpaɬɛni ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ ujakɔɓi waz̤iɓɛka iintɔnɡ̤a pʰamɓi kwɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ ɛmid͡ʒ̤ɛlwɛni ukuz̤ɛ ipʰatʰanɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntɔnɡ̤a kǁa itʰʲafilɛjɔ impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ akaz̤iɓɛkanɡ̤a jatʰi kɛ ɛtʰʲafilɛjɔ jaɓa jɛkalab̤an ɛjɔmɛlɛlɛjɔ jaɓa jɛkajakɔɓi jand̤a ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ kakʰulu kunɛnɛ jand̤a ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ kakʰulu kunɛnɛ jaɓa nɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ ɛniz̤i naɓakʰɔnz̤az̤ana naɓakʰɔnz̤i nɛɛnkamɛla namaɛsilɛ kɛ kalɔku wawɛv̤a amaz̤wi ɔɔɲana ɓakalab̤an ɓɛsitʰi ujakɔɓi uz̤itʰaɓatʰilɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ aɓɛnaz̤ɔ uɓawɔ uɓɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤intɔ z̤ikaɓawɔ ɔɓu ɓutʲɛɓi ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ waɓuɓɔna ujakɔɓi uɓusɔ ɓukalab̤an naɓɔ ɓunɡ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɔlɔ nɛz̤ɔlɔ ɛliɲɛ kujɛ ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi kujakɔɓi ɓujɛla ɛz̤wɛni likajiɬɔ kwɛlɔkuz̤alwa kwakʰɔ nd̤ɔɓa nawɛ ujakɔɓi watʰumɛla waɓiz̤a urakɛli nɔlɛja ukuɓa ɓɛz̤ɛ ɛnɮɛ ɛmpaɬɛni jakʰɛ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ watʰi kuɓɔ nd̤ijaɓuɓɔna uɓusɔ ɓukajiɬɔ ukuɓa aɓund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɔlɔ nɛz̤ɔlɔ ɛliɲɛ kɛ utʰikǁɔ kaɓawɔ uɓɛnam nijaz̤i ukuɓa ujiɬɔ nd̤imkʰɔnz̤ɛ nɡ̤amanɮa ɔnkɛ kɛ ujiɬɔ und̤id̤ɛpʰisɛlɛ wawuɡ̤ukǃula umv̤uz̤ɔ kaliʃumi kɔd̤wa utʰikǁɔ akamv̤umɛlanɡ̤a ukuɓa and̤ɛnz̤ɛ intɔ ɛmɓi kǁa atʰɛ ɛnala jɔɓa nɡ̤umv̤uz̤ɔ wakʰɔ isukɛ jɔnkɛ impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ jaz̤ala ɛnala kǁa atʰɛ ɛnɛmiz̤ila jɔɓa nɡ̤umv̤uz̤ɔ wakʰɔ isukɛ jɔnkɛ impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ jaz̤ala ɛnɛmiz̤ila wajiɬutʰa utʰikǁɔ imfujɔ kajiɬɔ wand̤inika kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkupʰatʰana kwɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nd̤awapʰakamisa amɛɬɔ nd̤aɓɔna ɛpʰupʰɛni nanz̤ɔ iinkunz̤i ɛz̤ikʰwɛlajɔ ɛmpaɬɛni ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ z̤inɛmiz̤ila z̤inala z̤inɔmkǀʰɔkɔsɛ satʰi isitʰuɲwa sikatʰikǁɔ ɛpʰupʰɛni jakɔɓi nd̤atʰi nd̤ilapʰa satʰi kʰawupʰakamisɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɔ uɓɔnɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iinkunz̤i ɛz̤ikʰwɛlajɔ ɛmpaɬɛni ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ z̤inɛmiz̤ila z̤inala z̤inɔmkǀʰɔkɔsɛ kuɓa nd̤iz̤iɓɔnilɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ az̤ɛnz̤ajɔ ulab̤an kuwɛ nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wasɛb̤ɛtɛli apʰɔ wasitʰamɓisa kʰɔna isimisɔ apʰɔ wab̤amɓatʰisa nɡ̤ɛsib̤amɓatʰisɔ suka nɡ̤ɔkɔ upʰumɛ kwɛli liz̤wɛ uɓujɛlɛ ɛz̤wɛni lɔkuz̤alwa kwakʰɔ ɓapʰɛnd̤ula urakɛli nɔlɛja ɓatʰi kujɛ sisɛnasaɓɛlɔ ɛnɮwini kaɓawɔ akutʰiwa sinɡ̤aɓasɛmz̤ini kujɛ jini kuɓa utʰɛnɡ̤isɛ nɡ̤atʰi ɛjiɮa nɛmali jɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkɔ kuz̤ɛ ɓɔnkɛ uɓutʲɛɓi aɓuɬutʰilɛjɔ utʰikǁɔ kuɓawɔ ɓuɓɛ ɓɔɓɛtʰu nɔɓɔɔɲana ɓɛtʰu kalɔku kɛ kɔnkɛ akutʰɛtʰilɛjɔ utʰikǁɔ kuwɛ kwɛnz̤ɛ wɛsuka ujakɔɓi waɓakʰwɛlisa ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ naɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɛz̤inkamɛlɛni wakǃʰuɓa jɔnkɛ impaɬa jakʰɛ najɔ jɔnkɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤wɛɓɔ jakʰɛ aɓɛjikǃwɛɓilɛ impaɬa aɓɛjifujilɛ aɓɛjikǃwɛɓilɛ ɛpad̤anaram ukuz̤ɛ ajɛ kuisakɛ ujisɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan ulab̤an uɓɛjɛ kukǀʰɛɓa impaɬa jakʰɛ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ urakɛli wajiɓa imilɔnd̤ɛkʰaja ɛɓijɛkajisɛ ujakɔɓi ulab̤an umaram ɛkuɓɛni ɛnɡ̤amkǁɛlɛlanɡ̤a ukuɓa ujaɓalɛka waɓalɛkɛ kɛ jɛna nakɔ kɔnkɛ aɓɛnakɔ wɛsuka wawuwɛla umlamɓɔ waɓub̤ɛkisa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ ɛntaɓɛni jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i wakǁɛlɛlwa ulab̤an nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰatʰu ukuɓa ujakɔɓi uɓalɛkilɛ watʰaɓatʰa aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ wampʰutʰuma uhamɓɔ lwɛmiɬa ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓafumanana ɛntaɓɛni jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i wɛz̤a utʰikǁɔ kulab̤an umaram ɛpʰupʰɛni ɛɓusuku watʰi kujɛ z̤ilumkɛlɛ unɡ̤atʰɛtʰi ntɔ kujakɔɓi nɔkuɓa jɛlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɔkuɓa jɛmɓi ulab̤an kujakɔɓi kɛ kalɔku ujakɔɓi uɓɛjiɡ̤ǁ̤umɛkilɛ intɛntɛ jakʰɛ ɛntaɓɛni ulab̤an naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ɓaɡ̤ǁ̤umɛka ɛntaɓɛni jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i watʰi ulab̤an kujakɔɓi wɛnz̤a ntɔni ukund̤ilalanisa uz̤ikǃʰuɓɛ iintɔmɓi z̤am nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ jini ukuɓa uz̤imɛlɛ uɓalɛkɛ und̤ilalanisɛ unɡ̤and̤ikǁɛlɛli nɡ̤ɛnd̤iɓa nd̤ɔkund̤ululɛ nɡ̤ɛmiv̤ujɔ nanɡ̤ɛɛnɡ̤ɔma nanɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔ nanɡ̤ɔhad̤i jini ukuɓa unɡ̤and̤iv̤umɛli nd̤iɓanɡ̤ɛ ɔɔɲana ɓam nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤am kalɔku wɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ kusɛmanɮɛni ɛsanɮa ukunɛnz̤a uɓuɓi kɛ utʰikǁɔ kajiɬɔ utʰɛtʰɛ pʰɛz̤ɔlɔ ɛsitʰi z̤ilumkɛlɛ unɡ̤atʰɛtʰi ntɔ nɔjakɔɓi nɔkuɓa jɛlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɔkuɓa jɛmɓi nɡ̤ɔku umkilɛjɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa walanɡ̤az̤ɛlɛla kakʰulu inɮu kajiɬɔ uz̤iɓɛlɛni z̤ɔna iz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤am wapʰɛnd̤ula ujakɔɓi watʰi kulab̤an ɓɛnd̤isɔjika kuɓa ɓɛnd̤isitʰi ɬɛz̤ɛ uz̤ikǁʰakamfulɛ iintɔmɓi z̤akʰɔ ɔsukuɓa uz̤ifumana kujɛ iz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤akʰɔ makanɡ̤aɮi ɓɔmi pʰamɓi kwaɓaz̤alwana ɓɛtʰu intɔ jakʰɔ ɛnam ujitʰaɓatʰɛ wajɛnɡ̤az̤i ujakɔɓi ukuɓa urakɛli uz̤iɓilɛ wanɡ̤ɛna ulab̤an ɛntɛntɛni kajakɔɓi nasɛntɛntɛni kalɛja nasɛntɛntɛni jɛɛmpɛlɛsi z̤ɔmɓini akaz̤ifumana wapʰuma ɛntɛntɛni kalɛja wanɡ̤ɛna ɛntɛntɛni karakɛli kɛ kalɔku urakɛli ɛɓɛjitʰaɓatʰilɛ imilɔnd̤ɛkʰaja wajifaka pʰakatʰi kwɛsali jɛnkamɛla waɬala pʰɛz̤u kwajɔ ulab̤an wajipʰutʰapʰutʰa jɔnkɛ intɛntɛ akajifumana watʰi kujisɛ mawunɡ̤aɓi namsind̤ɔ nkɔsi jam kuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ɛnakɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iɬɛli pʰɛz̤u kwɛŋ̤ǀ̤a waɡ̤ǃ̤utʰaɡ̤ǃ̤utʰa akajifumana imilɔnd̤ɛkʰaja wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ kajakɔɓi waɓamɓana nɔlab̤an wapʰɛnd̤ula ujakɔɓi watʰi kulab̤an lujintɔni uk͡xɛkǃɔ sijintɔni isɔnɔ ukuɓa und̤isukɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuʃuʃu nd͡ʒ̤ɛ uz̤ipʰutʰapʰutʰilɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iimpaɬa z̤am ufumɛnɛ ntɔni jaz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iimpaɬa z̤ɛnɮu jakʰɔ jiɓɛkɛ apʰa pʰamɓi kwaɓaz̤alwana ɓam naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɔ ɓaɬulɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu sɔɓaɓini lɛ miɲaka imaʃumi maɓini ɓɛnd̤inawɛ iimaz̤i z̤akʰɔ z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa nɛɛmaz̤i z̤ɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ az̤ipʰunz̤anɡ̤a nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛmpaɬa jakʰɔ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ and̤iz̤iɮanɡ̤a intɔ ɛkǃwɛnɡ̤iwɛjɔ and̤ijiz̤isanɡ̤a kuwɛ nd̤ajimisɛla nɡ̤ɔkwam wajiɓiz̤a ɛsanɮɛni nɔkuɓa iɓiwɛ ɛmini nɔkuɓa iɓiwɛ ɛɓusuku ɛmini nd̤aɮiwa ɓuɓuʃuʃu ɛɓusuku jiŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlɛ uɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ ɓam ɓɛmka ɛmɛɬwɛni kwaɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ lɛ miɲaka imaʃumi maɓini ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ nd̤akukʰɔnz̤a imiɲaka ɛliʃumi ɛlinaminɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔmɓini imiɲaka ɛmitʰand̤atʰu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛmpaɬa jakʰɔ ɛmfut͡sʰanɛ uwuɡ̤ukǃulɛ kaliʃumi umv̤uz̤ɔ kɔkɔ utʰikǁɔ kaɓawɔ utʰikǁɔ kaaɓraham ɔɬɔnɛlwa nɡ̤uisakɛ waɓa inɛnɛ unɡ̤ɛ und̤ind̤ululɛ nd̤ilamɓatʰa nɡ̤ɔku utʰikǁɔ uz̤iɓɔnilɛ iint͡siz̤i z̤am nɔkukǁɛlɛnɡ̤a kwɛz̤anɮa z̤am wakɔɬwaja pʰɛz̤ɔlɔ ulab̤an wapʰɛnd̤ula watʰi kujakɔɓi iintɔmɓi z̤iintɔmɓi z̤am ɔɔɲana nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓam impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ jimpaɬa jam nɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɔz̤iɓɔnajɔ z̤ɛz̤am nd̤inakwɛnz̤a ntɔni nam̤la ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤am ɛz̤i nakɔɔɲana az̤ɔ ɛz̤iɓaz̤ɛlɛjɔ jiz̤a nɡ̤ɔku sɛnz̤ɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nawɛ uɓɛ liŋ̤ǃ̤ina pʰakatʰi nawɛ ujakɔɓi watʰaɓatʰa ilitʲɛ walipʰakamisa lasisimisɔ watʰi ujakɔɓi kuɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ kǀʰɔlani amatʲɛ ɓatʰaɓatʰa amatʲɛ ɓɛnz̤a imfumɓa ɓaɮa kʰɔna pʰɛz̤u kwalɔɔ mfumɓa watʰi ukujiɓiz̤a ulab̤an jijɛɡ̤arsahad̤uta ujakɔɓi watʰi ukujiɓiz̤a jiɡ̤alɛd̤i watʰi ulab̤an lɛ mfumɓa iliŋ̤ǃ̤ina pʰakatʰi nawɛ nam̤la nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ jatʰijwa iɡ̤ama ɛlijiɡ̤alɛd̤i nɛlijimiz̤pa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa watʰi makɔɓɔnisɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a pʰakatʰi nawɛ sakuɓa sisitʰɛlɛnɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ waz̤ikǀinɛz̤ɛla iintɔmɓi z̤am nɔkuɓa utʰɛ waz̤ɛka aɓafaz̤i pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntɔmɓi z̤am akukʰɔ ɓani unatʰi kʰanɡ̤ɛla utʰikǁɔ uliŋ̤ǃ̤ina pʰakatʰi nawɛ ulab̤an watʰi kujakɔɓi jaɓɔna lɛ mfumɓa jaɓɔna ɛsi simisɔ nd̤isipʰakamisilɛjɔ pʰakatʰi nawɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤ina jilɛ mfumɓa iŋ̤ǃ̤ina sɛsi simisɔ ukuɓa and̤iji kuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa kulɛ mfumɓa nd̤ijɛ kuwɛ ukuɓa akuji kuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa wɛna kulɛ mfumɓa nakwɛsi simisɔ uz̤ɛ sɛnz̤anɛ uɓuɓi utʰikǁɔ kaaɓraham utʰikǁɔ kanahɔrɛ utʰikǁɔ wɔjisɛ waɓɔ makaɡ̤wɛɓɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu ujakɔɓi wafunɡ̤a ɔɬɔmɛlwa nɡ̤ujisɛ uisakɛ ujakɔɓi waɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛntaɓɛni apʰɔ waɓiz̤a aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ukuɓa ɓaɮɛ isɔnka ɓaɮa kɛ isɔnka ɓalala ɛntaɓɛni apʰɔ wav̤uka ulab̤an waɓanɡ̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ waɓasikɛlɛla wɛmka kɛ ulab̤an waɓujɛla ɛkʰajɛni lakʰɛ ujakɔɓi wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jakʰɛ z̤akǃuɓisana najɛ iz̤itʰuɲwa z̤ikatʰikǁɔ watʰi ujakɔɓi akuz̤iɓɔna nɡ̤umkʰɔsi katʰikǁɔ lɔ watʰi iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ nd̤awɔ jimahanajim kɛ kalɔku ujakɔɓi watʰuma aɓatʰuɲwa pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ ɓaja kuɛsawu umkʰuluwa wakʰɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakwasɛhirɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni wakwaɛd̤ɔm waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ ɛsitʰi nɔtʰi ukutʰɛtʰa ɛnkɔsini jam uɛsawu ut͡ʃɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ujakɔɓi ukutʰi ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤umpʰamɓukɛli kulab̤an nd̤aliɓala kʰɔna kwad̤a kwanɡ̤ɔku nd̤inɛɛnkɔmɔ namaɛsilɛ nɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ naɓakʰɔnz̤i naɓakʰɔnz̤az̤ana nd̤itʰumɛlɛ ukukǁɛlɛla inkɔsi jam ukuz̤ɛ ind̤iɓaɓalɛ aɓatʰuɲwa ɓaɓujɛla kujakɔɓi ɓɛsitʰi sifikilɛ kumkʰuluwa wakʰɔ uɛsawu najɛ ujɛz̤a kukukʰawulɛla ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amakʰulu ɔmanɛ wɔjika kunɛnɛ ujakɔɓi waɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛka waɓaɬula aɓantu aɓaɓɛnajɛ nɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ nɛɛnkamɛla iimfud̤uka z̤amɓini watʰi ukuɓa uɛsawu utʰɛ kwɛɲɛ imfud̤uka wajikǀʰitʰa jɔsind̤a imfud̤uka ɛsɛlɛjɔ watʰi ujakɔɓi tʰikǁɔ kaɓawɔ uaɓraham tʰikǁɔ kaɓawɔ uisakɛ jɛhɔv̤a utʰɛ ɓujɛla ɛz̤wɛni lakɔwɛnu kwɛlɔkuz̤alwa kwakʰɔ nd̤ɔkupʰatʰa kakuɬɛ and̤ijilinɡ̤ɛnɛ iŋǀɛɓa jɔnkɛ nɛɲanisɔ jɔnkɛ ɔjɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kumkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ kuɓa nd̤ajiwɛla lɛ jɔrd̤an nd̤inɛntɔnɡ̤a jam jɔd̤wa kɔd̤wa nɡ̤ɔku nd̤imfud̤uka mɓini kʰawund̤iɬanɡ̤ulɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɔmkʰuluwa ɛsanɮɛni sikaɛsawu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ijamɔjika ɬɛz̤ɛ afikɛ and̤iɓulalɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ naɓantwana wawutʰɛ wɛna inɛnɛ nd̤ija kukupʰatʰa kakuɬɛ imɓɛwu jakʰɔ nidʲɛnz̤ɛ iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntlaɓatʰi jɔlwanɮɛ ɛnɡ̤ɛnakuɓalwa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuninz̤i kɛ kalɔku jɛna kʰɔna nɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku watʰaɓatʰa ɛntwɛni ɛsifikɛ kujɔ isanɮa sakʰɛ janɡ̤umnikɛlɔ kuɛsawu umkʰuluwa wakʰɛ iimaz̤i z̤ɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛz̤imakʰulu maɓini nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini nɛɛmaz̤i nɛɛɡ̤uʃa ɛz̤imakʰulu maɓini nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini nɛɛnkamɛla ɛz̤isɛnɡ̤wajɔ ɛz̤imaʃumi matʰatʰu ɛz̤inamatʰɔlɛ az̤ɔ nɛɛmaz̤i z̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ ɛz̤imaʃumi manɛ nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ ɛz̤iliʃumi nɛɛmaz̤i z̤amaɛsilɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini namakǁʰamkǁwa aliʃumi waz̤inikɛla ɛsanɮɛni saɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ walɔwɔ um̤lamɓi wawɔd̤wa watʰi kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ wɛlani pʰamɓi niɓɛkɛ isitʰuɓa pʰakatʰi kɔm̤lamɓi nɔm̤lamɓi ɔwɔkukǃala wamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ watʰi kǁa atʰɛ uɛsawu umkʰuluwa wakǃuɓisana nawɛ wakuɓuz̤a nɡ̤ɔkutʰi unɡ̤ɔkaɓani uja pʰi z̤ɛz̤ikaɓani ɛz̤i z̤intɔ z̤ipʰamɓi kwakʰɔ wɔtʰi z̤ɛz̤ɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ujakɔɓi nɡ̤umnikɛlɔ ɔtʰuɲɛlwɛ inkɔsi jam uɛsawu kɛ najɛ nɡ̤asɛmv̤a kwɛtʰu nɔwɛsiɓini nɔwɛsitʰatʰu wamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛjiland̤ɛla imiɬamɓi ɛsitʰi nɔtʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔlɔ ɬɔɓɔ kuɛsawu najɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nɔtʰi nankɔ mkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ujakɔɓi ɛnɡ̤asɛmv̤a kwɛtʰu kuɓa watʰi mand̤iɓukǀamaɡ̤uʃɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔmnikɛlɔ ɔhamɓa pʰamɓi ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ nd̤iɓuɓɔnɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ m̤lawumɓi wɔnd̤iɓuka umnikɛlɔ lɔwɔ wahamɓa pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ kɛ jɛna nɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku ɛmfud̤ukɛni wav̤uka nɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku watʰaɓatʰa aɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓɔɓaɓini naɓakʰɔnz̤anz̤ana ɓakʰɛ ɓɔɓaɓini nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ aɓaliʃumi ɛlinamɲɛ waliwɛla iz̤iɓukɔ lɛ jab̤ɔki waɓatʰaɓatʰa kɛ waɓawɛz̤a ɛmfulɛni lɔwɔ waz̤iwɛz̤a z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ aɓɛnaz̤ɔ ujakɔɓi jɛd̤wa kwaz̤amana ind̤ɔd̤a najɛ kwad̤a kwatʰi kǃʰipʰu jakuɓɔna ukuɓa ajimɛjisi jakǀʰukumisa usik͡xɔɓana wɔmlɛnz̤ɛ wakʰɛ waŋǀɔtʰuka usik͡xɔɓana wɔmlɛnz̤ɛ kajakɔɓi nɡ̤ɔkuz̤amana najɔ jatʰi nd̤ind̤ululɛ nd̤ihamɓɛ kuɓa kujasa watʰi jɛna and̤iji kukund̤ulula umkɛ ukuɓa akutʰanɡ̤a und̤isikɛlɛlɛ jatʰi kujɛ nɡ̤uɓani iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ watʰi nd̤inɡ̤ujakɔɓi jatʰi iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ akusaji kuɓa satʰiwa nɡ̤ujakɔɓi kuja kutʰiwa unɡ̤usirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ulwɛ nɔtʰikǁɔ naɓantu wɛjisa waɓuz̤a ujakɔɓi watʰi nd̤ikǁɛlɛlɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ jatʰi uliɓuz̤ɛlani iɡ̤ama jamsikɛlɛla kʰɔna ujakɔɓi wajitʰija lɔɔ nd̤awɔ iɡ̤ama ɛlijipɛnijɛli kuɓa watʰi nd̤iɓɔnɛnɛ nɔtʰikǁɔ waɬanɡ̤ulwa umpʰɛfumlɔ latʰi kǀʰapʰa ilanɡ̤a akuɮula ɛpɛniwɛli ɛd͡ʒ̤iŋ̤ǁ̤ɛla nɡ̤ɔmlɛnz̤ɛ wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓawuɮi umsipʰa kasik͡xɔɓana ɔpʰɛz̤u kɔsik͡xɔɓana wɔmlɛnz̤ɛ nanam̤la nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jakǀʰukumisa usik͡xɔɓana wɔmlɛnz̤ɛ kajakɔɓi ɛmsipʰɛni kasik͡xɔɓana wawapʰakamisa ujakɔɓi amɛɬɔ akʰɛ waɓɔna nankɔ uɛsawu ɛsiz̤a ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu manɛ aɓantwana waɓaɬulaɬula ɓaɓa kulɛja nakurakɛli nakuɓakʰɔnz̤az̤ana ɓɔɓaɓini waɓaɓɛka aɓakʰɔnz̤az̤ana naɓantwana ɓaɓɔ pʰamɓili ulɛja naɓantwana ɓakʰɛ ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ urakɛli nɔjɔsɛfu ɛmv̤a kaɲɛ kɛ jɛna waɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛla pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ wakǃuɓud̤a ɛm̤laɓɛni kasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wad̤a wasɔnd̤ɛla kumkʰuluwa wakʰɛ waɡ̤id̤ima uɛsawu ɛmkʰawulɛla wamwɔla ɛntaɲɛni jakʰɛ wamanɡ̤a ɓasit͡ʃɔ isililɔ wawapʰakamisa amɛɬɔ akʰɛ waɓaɓɔna aɓafaz̤i naɓantwana watʰi nɡ̤ɔɔɓani aɓa ɓanawɛ watʰi jɛna nɡ̤aɓantwana atʰɛ utʰikǁɔ waɓaɓaɓala umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ɓasɔnd̤ɛla aɓakʰɔnz̤az̤ana ɓɔna naɓantwana ɓaɓɔ ɓakǃuɓud̤a wasɔnd̤ɛla nɔlɛja naɓantwana ɓakʰɛ ɓakǃuɓud̤a ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ wasɔnd̤ɛla ujɔsɛfu nɔrakɛli ɓakǃuɓud̤a watʰi ijintɔni jɔnkɛ lɛ mfud̤uka jakʰɔ ɛnd̤ikǃuɓisɛnɛ najɔ watʰi jɛjɔkuɓa nd̤iɓaɓalwɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛnkɔsi jam watʰi uɛsawu nd̤anɛlɛ makuɓɛ kɔkwakʰɔ ɔkwakʰɔ watʰi ujakɔɓi haji makunɡ̤aɓi nd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuɓa kalɔku nd̤iɓaɓalwɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ tʰaɓatʰa umnikɛlɔ lɔ ɛsanɮɛni kuɓa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nd̤iɓuɓɔnilɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ nd̤anɡ̤a nd̤iɓɔna uɓusɔ ɓukatʰikǁɔ nd̤alikʰɔlɔ kuwɛ kʰawujitʰaɓatʰɛ int͡sikɛlɛlɔ jam ɛz̤isiwɛjɔ kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰikǁɔ und̤iɓaɓalɛ kuɓa nd̤inɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ wamd͡ʒ̤ɔka wajitʰaɓatʰa watʰi uɛsawu masind̤ulukɛ sihamɓɛ nd̤ɔhamɓa pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ watʰi kujɛ inkɔsi jam ijaz̤i ukuɓa aɓantwana ɓatʰamɓilɛ nɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ ɛz̤aɲisajɔ z̤ipʰɛz̤u jɔtʰi ikǃʰutʲwɛ kakʰulu ɛɲɛ ifɛ jɔnkɛ impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ inkɔsi jam majikʰɛ iɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛlɛ pʰamɓi kɔmkʰɔnz̤i wajɔ nd̤ihamɓisɛ kuɬɛ nɡ̤ɔkuhamɓa kwɛmpaɬa ɛpʰamɓi nanɡ̤ɔkuhamɓa kwaɓantwana nd̤id̤ɛ nd̤ifikɛ ɛnkɔsini jam kwasɛhirɛ watʰi uɛsawu makʰɛ nd̤ijiʃijɛ kuwɛ iŋǁɛɲɛ jaɓantu aɓanam watʰi jɛna nɡ̤ani mand̤iɓaɓalwɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛnkɔsi jam waɓuja nɡ̤alɔɔ m̤la uɛsawu nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jakʰɛ ɛsija kwasɛhirɛ ujakɔɓi wand̤uluka waja ɛsukɔti waz̤akʰɛla inɮu iinkɔmɔ z̤akʰɛ waz̤iɓijɛla iintlant͡si nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ kwatʰiwa iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ nd̤awɔ jisukɔti wafika ujakɔɓi ɛnɔkǁɔlɔ ɛmz̤ini kaʃɛkɛm ɔsɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan ɛkuv̤ɛlɛni kwakʰɛ ɛpad̤anaram iintɛntɛ pʰamɓi kɔmz̤i watʰɛnɡ̤a isiz̤iɓa sɔm̤laɓa apʰɔ wajitwaɓulula kʰɔna intɛntɛ jakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɔɔɲana ɓakahamɔrɛ usɔʃɛkɛm nɡ̤ɛkʰulu lɛmali wamisa kʰɔna isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ watʰi ukusitʰija nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli kɛ kalɔku ud̤ina intɔmɓi kalɛja lɛjɔ wajiz̤alɛla ujakɔɓi wapʰuma waja kuɓɔna iintɔmɓi z̤ɛlɔ z̤wɛ uʃɛkɛm uɲana kahamɔrɛ um̤iv̤i isikʰulu sɛliz̤wɛ samɓɔna samtʰaɓatʰa najɛ samɔna umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ wanamatʰɛla kud̤ina intɔmɓi kajakɔɓi wajitʰand̤a intɔmɓi lɛjɔ watʰɛtʰa kakuɬɛ nɛntɔmɓi uʃɛkɛm watʰɛtʰa kuhamɔrɛ ujisɛ watʰi nd̤iz̤ɛkɛlɛ lɛ ntɔmɓi iɓɛ nɡ̤umfaz̤i wɛv̤a ujakɔɓi ukuɓa umɛnz̤ɛ iŋǃamɓi ud̤ina intɔmɓi jakʰɛ kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓajɛ ɓɛsɛmpaɬɛni jakʰɛ ɛnɮɛ watʰi kɛ ujakɔɓi ɓad̤a ɓafika wapʰuma uhamɔrɛ ujisɛ kaʃɛkɛm ɛz̤a kutʰɛtʰa nɔjakɔɓi ɓafika ɔɔɲana akajakɔɓi ɛv̤ɛla ɓakujiv̤a lɛ ntɔ aɓa ɓaɬunɡ̤u amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ av̤utʰa kunɛnɛ nɡ̤umsind̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛnz̤a uɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ kwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkulala nɛntɔmɓi kajakɔɓi intɔ lɛjɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛjakwɛnz̤iwa watʰɛtʰa uhamɔrɛ naɓɔ ɛsitʰi uʃɛkɛm uɲana umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ utʰɛnɛ ŋǀa nɛntɔmɓi jakɔwɛnu kʰanimnikɛ iɓɛ nɡ̤umkakʰɛ nɛnd̤isɛlanɛ natʰi nisinikɛ iintɔmɓi z̤ɛnu niz̤ɛkɛ iintɔmɓi z̤ɛtʰu naɬalɛ natʰi iliz̤wɛ liɓɛ pʰamɓi kwɛnu ɬalani nixwɛɓɛ kulɔ nikǃinisɛkɛ kulɔ watʰi uʃɛkɛm kujisɛ wajɔ nakuɓanakwajɔ mand̤iɓaɓalwɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛnu nɛntɔ ɛnijitʰɛtʰajɔ nd̤ɔninika jand̤isani kunɛnɛ ikʰaz̤i pʰɛz̤u nɛsipʰɔ nd̤ɔninika nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nitʰɛtʰajɔ nd̤inikɛni kɛ intɔmɓi lɛjɔ iɓɛ nɡ̤umfaz̤i ɔɔɲana ɓakajakɔɓi ɓaɓapʰɛnɮa ɔɔʃɛkɛm nɔhamɔrɛ ujisɛ nɡ̤ɛnkɔɬisɔ ɓatʰɛtʰa naɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛmɛnz̤ɛ iŋǃamɓi ud̤ina ud̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ ɓatʰi kuɓɔ asinakujɛnz̤a lɛ ntɔ jɔkuɓa ud̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu simnikɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤alukanɡ̤a kuɓa lɔɔ ntɔ iɓɛ inɡ̤aɓa sisiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ kutʰi sɔv̤umɛlana nɡ̤alɛ nd̤awɔ jɔd̤wa ukuɓa nitʰɛ naɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤atʰi nɡ̤ɔkutʰi jalukɛ jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛjind̤ɔd̤a sɔninika kɛ iintɔmɓi z̤ɛtʰu siz̤ɛkɛ iintɔmɓi z̤ɛnu siɬalɛ siɓɛ ɓantu ɓaɲɛ ukuɓa nitʰɛ anasipʰulapʰula nɡ̤ɔkutʰi nalukɛ sɔjitʰaɓatʰa intɔmɓi jɛtʰu simkɛ alunɡ̤a amaz̤wi aɓɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni kahamɔrɛ nasɛmɛɬwɛni kaʃɛkɛm uɲana kahamɔrɛ akaliɓala ukujɛnz̤a lɔɔ ntɔ uɓa uɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛkilɛ jintɔmɓi kajakɔɓi uɓɛz̤ukilɛ jɛna nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwajɔ jɔnkɛ inɮu kajisɛ wɛz̤a uhamɔrɛ nɔʃɛkɛm uɲana wakʰɛ ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔmz̤i waɓɔ ɓatʰɛtʰa kumad̤ɔd̤a ɔmz̤i ɓatʰi la mad̤ɔd̤a ajav̤ana natʰi makaɬalɛ ɛz̤wɛni apʰa axwɛɓɛ kulɔ iliz̤wɛ ɛli jaɓɔnani liɓanz̤i nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔmɓini pʰamɓi kwawɔ sɔz̤iz̤ɛka iintɔmɓi z̤awɔ z̤iɓɛ nɡ̤aɓafaz̤i siwanikɛ iintɔmɓi z̤ɛtʰu kɛ ɔv̤umɛlana natʰi nɡ̤alɛ nd̤awɔ jɔd̤wa amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ ukuɬala natʰi siɓɛ ɓantu ɓaɲɛ jakwaluka kutʰi jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛjinɔd̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa alukilɛ wɔna imfujɔ jawɔ nɛŋ̤ǃ̤wɛɓɔ jawɔ nawɔ ɔnkɛ amakǃɛɡ̤u awɔ akasaji kuɓa nɡ̤awɛtʰu sija kutʰi kɔd̤wa siv̤umɛlanɛ nawɔ ukuɓa aɬalɛ natʰi ɓampʰulapʰula kɛ uhamɔrɛ nɔʃɛkɛm uɲana wakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓapʰuma nɡ̤ɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɔmz̤i waɓɔ jaluswa jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛjind̤ɔd̤a ɓɔnkɛ aɓapʰuma nɡ̤ɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɔmz̤i waɓɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰatʰu ɓakuɓa ɓuɬunɡ̤u ɓɛsuka ɔɔɲana aɓaɓini ɓakajakɔɓi usimɔn nɔlɛv̤i aɓanakwaɓɔ ɓɔd̤ina ɓatʰaɓatʰa walɔwɔ ik͡xɛlɛ lakʰɛ ɓawufikɛla lɔɔ mz̤i unɡ̤akʰumɓulɛlɛ ntɔ ɓaɓulala jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛjind̤ɔd̤a ɓaɓulala nɔhamɔrɛ nɔʃɛkɛm uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ ɓamtʰaɓatʰa ud̤ina ɛnɮwini kaʃɛkɛm ɓapʰuma ɔɔɲana ɓakajakɔɓi ɓaɓafikɛla aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ ɓawupʰanɡ̤a umz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛɓɛmɛnz̤ɛ iŋǃamɓi ud̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ impaɬa jaɓɔ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤aɓɔ namaɛsilɛ aɓɔ nɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤ipʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i nɛz̤iɓɛ z̤isɛnɮɛ ɓaz̤itʰaɓatʰa nɔɓutʲɛɓi ɓaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ naɓantwana ɓaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ naɓafaz̤i ɓaɓɔ ɓaɓatʰimɓa ɓapʰanɡ̤a nɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛɓɛ z̤isɛnɮwini ujakɔɓi watʰi kusimɔn nakulɛv̤i nind̤iɬisɛlɛ iʃwanɡ̤uʃa ukuz̤ɛ nd̤inukɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓɛmi ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛli pʰakatʰi kwamakanan napʰakatʰi kwamapɛriz̤i nd̤iɓantu ɓamɓalwa nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɓaja kund̤iɬanɡ̤aɲɛla ɓand̤iɓulalɛ nd̤it͡ʃatʲalaliswɛ nɛnɮu jam ɓatʰi ɓɔna ud̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu anɡ̤apʰatʰwa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛhɛɲukaz̤i jini kɛ kalɔku watʰi utʰikǁɔ kujakɔɓi suka ujɛ ɛb̤ɛtɛli uɬalɛ kʰɔna wɛnz̤ɛ kʰɔna isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ kutʰikǁɔ ɔwaɓɔnakalajɔ kuwɛ ɛkuɓalɛkɛni kwakʰɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓukaɛsawu umkʰuluwa wakʰɔ watʰi kɛ ujakɔɓi kwinɮu jakʰɛ nakuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛnajɛ susani iz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤asɛmz̤ini ɛz̤ipʰakatʰi kwɛnu niz̤iɬamɓululɛ niŋǁiɓɛ nɡ̤uɓɔ z̤imɓi sisukɛ siɲukɛ sijɛ ɛb̤ɛtɛli sɛnz̤ɛ kʰɔna isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ kutʰikǁɔ ɔwand̤ipʰɛnd̤ula nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɔkuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛka ɔɓɛ ɛnɮɛlɛni ɛnd̤and̤ihamɓa nɡ̤ajɔ ɓaz̤inika ujakɔɓi z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤asɛmz̤ini ɛɓɛz̤isɛsanɮɛni saɓɔ namad͡ʒ̤ikaz̤i aɓɛsɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤aɓɔ ujakɔɓi waz̤imɓɛla pʰant͡si kɔmɔki ɔɓunɡ̤akwaʃɛkɛm ɓand̤uluka ukǃʰipʰulɔmɓilini nɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ lwaɓa pʰɛz̤u kwɛmiz̤i nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kuɓɔ ajaɓasukɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakajakɔɓi wafika ujakɔɓi ɛluz̤i ɛsɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan ɛkwajib̤ɛtɛli jɛna naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓaɓɛnajɛ wakʰa kʰɔna isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ watʰi lɔɔ nd̤awɔ ukujiɓiz̤a nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wasɛb̤ɛtɛli kuɓa kulapʰɔ utʰikǁɔ waz̤itʰʲilajɔ kujɛ ɛkuɓalɛkɛni kwakʰɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓɔmkʰuluwa wakʰɛ wafa ud̤ɛb̤ɔra umaɲisikaz̤i karɛb̤ɛka aŋ̤ǀ̤watʲwa nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si kwɛb̤ɛtɛli pʰant͡si kɔmɔki kwatʰiwa iɡ̤ama lajɔ nɡ̤umɔki wɔkulila utʰikǁɔ waɓuja waɓɔnakala kujakɔɓi ɛkuv̤ɛlɛni kwakʰɛ ɛpad̤anaram wamsikɛlɛla watʰi utʰikǁɔ kujɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ nɡ̤ujakɔɓi akuji kuɓa satʰiwa iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ nɡ̤ujakɔɓi kuja kutʰiwa iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ nɡ̤usirajɛli wamtʰija kɛ iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤usirajɛli watʰi utʰikǁɔ kujɛ nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ usɔmanɮa kǃʰama wand̤ɛ uɬanɡ̤a nɛsikʰunɡ̤u sɛɛntlanɡ̤a sija kuv̤ɛla kuwɛ nɔɔkumkani ɓapʰumɛ ɛsiŋǃɛni sakʰɔ iliz̤wɛ ɛnd̤alinika uaɓraham nɔisakɛ nd̤ilinikɛ wɛna nd̤ilinikɛ imɓɛwu jakʰɔ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɔ iliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ wɛɲuka utʰikǁɔ wɛmka kujɛ kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ aɓɛtʰɛtʰɛ najɛ kujɔ ujakɔɓi isimisɔ kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ aɓɛtʰɛtʰɛ najɛ kujɔ isimisɔ samatʲɛ watʰulula pʰɛz̤u kwasɔ umnikɛlɔ ɔtʰululwajɔ waɡ̤alɛla nɛɔli pʰɛz̤u kwasɔ ujakɔɓi watʰi iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ nd̤awɔ utʰikǁɔ aɓɛtʰɛtʰɛ najɛ kujɔ jib̤ɛtɛli ɓand̤uluka ɛb̤ɛtɛli kwatʰi kusɛmɡ̤aɲana ukuɓa kufikwɛ ɛɛfrata waz̤ala urakɛli kwaɓa nz̤ima ukuz̤ala kwakʰɛ kwatʰi kwakuɓa nz̤ima ukuz̤ala kwakʰɛ watʰi umz̤alisikaz̤i kujɛ musa ukɔjika kuɓa nalɔ nɡ̤uɲana wakʰɔ kwatʰi ɛkupumɛni kɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ kuɓa wafajɔ watʰi nɡ̤ub̤ɛnɔni iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ kɛ jɛna ujisɛ watʰi nɡ̤ub̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin wafa kɛ urakɛli waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa ɛnɮɛlɛni jasɛɛfrata ɛjib̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm ujakɔɓi isimisɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa lakʰɛ sisimisɔ sɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa likarakɛli nanam̤la usirajɛli wajiŋǀɔtʰula intɛntɛ jakʰɛ waja wajitwaɓulula nɡ̤apʰaja kwɛmiɡ̤d̤ɔliɛd̤ɛrɛ kwatʰi ɛkuɬalɛni kukasirajɛli kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ waja urub̤ɛn ub̤iliha iʃwɛʃwɛ likajisɛ wɛv̤a kɛ usirajɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakajakɔɓi ɓaɓɛliʃumi ɛlinaɓaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓakalɛja nɡ̤urub̤ɛn ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ kujakɔɓi nɔsimɔn nɔlɛv̤i nɔjud̤a nɔisakarɛ nɔz̤ɛb̤ulɔn ɔɔɲana ɓakarakɛli nɡ̤ujɔsɛfu nɔb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤iliha umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana karakɛli nɡ̤ud̤an nɔnafɛtali ɔɔɲana ɓakaz̤ilipa umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana kalɛja nɡ̤uɡ̤ad̤i nɔaʃɛrɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakajakɔɓi awaɓaz̤alɛlwa ɛpad̤anaram ujakɔɓi waja kuisakɛ ujisɛ kwamamrɛ ɛkirijati kaarb̤a ɛhɛɓrɔn apʰɔ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓapʰamɓukɛli kʰɔna uaɓraham nɔisakɛ imiɬa kaisakɛ jaɓa jimiɲaka ɛlikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ uisakɛ wapʰuma umpʰɛfumlɔ waɬanɡ̤anisɛlwa kwaɓakɔwaɓɔ alupʰɛlɛ ɛpʰɛlɛlɛ ɛɓud̤alɛni ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ɔɔɛsawu nɔjakɔɓi ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ jijɔ lɛ kɛ inz̤ala kaɛsawu ɔnɡ̤uɛd̤ɔm uɛsawu waɓaz̤ɛka aɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤akwakanan uad̤a intɔmɓi kaɛlɔn um̤ɛti ɔahɔlib̤ama intɔmɓi kaana intɔmɓi kat͡sib̤ɛjɔn um̤iv̤i waz̤ɛka nɔb̤asɛmati intɔmɓi kaiʃmajɛli ud̤ad̤ɛ ɓɔnɛb̤ajɔti uad̤a wamz̤alɛla uɛsawu uɛlifaz̤i ub̤asɛmati waz̤ala urɛhuwɛli uahɔlib̤ama waz̤ala ujɛhuʃɛ nɔjalam nɔkɔra nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛsawu awaɓaz̤alɛlwajɔ ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan uɛsawu waɓatʰaɓatʰa aɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ naɓɛnɮu jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ nɛmfujɔ jakʰɛ namakǃɛɡ̤u akʰɛ ɔnkɛ nɛŋ̤ǃ̤wɛɓɔ jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ aɓɛjikǃɛɓilɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan waja kwɛliɲɛ iliz̤wɛ ɛmka nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kajakɔɓi wakʰɛ kuɓa iŋ̤ǃ̤wɛɓɔ jaɓɔ iɓininz̤i ukuz̤ɛ ɓanɡ̤aɓi nakuɬala nd̤awɔɲɛ nɛliz̤wɛ lɔkupʰamɓukɛla kwaɓɔ liɓɛ linɡ̤ɛnakuɓatʰwala nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛmfujɔ jaɓɔ waɬala uɛsawu ɛntaɓɛni jakwasɛhirɛ uɛsawu kɛ lɔwɔ nɡ̤uɛd̤ɔm jijɔ lɛ kɛ inz̤ala kaɛsawu ujisɛ wamaɛd̤ɔm ɛntaɓɛni jakwasɛhirɛ nɡ̤awɔ kɛ amaɡ̤ama ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛsawu nɡ̤uɛlifaz̤i uɲana kaad̤a umkaɛsawu nɡ̤urɛhuwɛli uɲana kab̤asɛmati umkaɛsawu ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛlifaz̤i nɡ̤utɛman nɔɔmarɛ nɔt͡sɛfɔ nɔɡ̤atam nɔkɛnaz̤i utimna ɛɓɛliʃwɛʃwɛ likaɛlifaz̤i uɲana kaɛsawu wamz̤alɛla uɛlifaz̤i uamalɛki nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaad̤a umkaɛsawu nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakarɛhuwɛli unahati nɔz̤ɛra nɔʃama nɔmiz̤a nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤asɛmati umkaɛsawu nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakaahɔlib̤ama intɔmɓi kaana intɔmɓi kat͡sib̤ɛjɔn umkaɛsawu wamz̤alɛla uɛsawu ujɛhuʃɛ nɔjalam nɔkɔra z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤i iz̤ikʰulu z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛsawu ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛlifaz̤i ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ kuɛsawu sisikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤utɛman isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤ɛɔmarɛ isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤ut͡sɛfɔ isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤ukɛnaz̤i isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤ukɔra isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤uɡ̤atam isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤uamalɛki z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ iz̤ikʰulu z̤akwaɛlifaz̤i ɛz̤wɛni lakwaɛd̤ɔm nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaad̤a nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakarɛhuwɛli uɲana kaɛsawu sisikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤unahati isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤uz̤ɛra isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤uʃama isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤umiz̤a z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ iz̤ikʰulu z̤akwarɛhuwɛli ɛz̤wɛni lakwaɛd̤ɔm nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤asɛmati umkaɛsawu nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakaahɔlib̤ama umkaɛsawu sisikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤ujɛhuʃɛ isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤ujalam isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤ukɔra z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ iz̤ikʰulu z̤akwaahɔlib̤ama intɔmɓi kaana umkaɛsawu nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛsawu z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ iz̤ikʰulu nɡ̤uɛd̤ɔm kɛ lɔwɔ nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasɛhirɛ um̤ɔri aɓaɓɛmi kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ ulɔtan nɔʃɔb̤ali nɔt͡sib̤ɛjɔn ɔana nɔd̤iʃɔn nɔɛt͡sɛrɛ nɔd̤iʃan z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ iz̤ikʰulu z̤amahɔri ɔɔɲana ɓakasɛhirɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakwaɛd̤ɔm ɔɔɲana ɓakalɔtan ɓaɓɛnɡ̤amahɔri nɔhɛmam ud̤ad̤ɛ ɓɔlɔtan nɡ̤utimna nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃɔb̤ali nɡ̤ualɛv̤an nɔmanahati nɔɛb̤ali nɔʃɛfɔ nɔɔnam nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakat͡sib̤ɛjɔn nɡ̤uaja nɔana nɡ̤ulɔ ana wajifumanajɔ imitʰɔmɓɔ ɛʃuʃu ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛsalusa amaɛsilɛ kat͡sib̤ɛjɔn ujisɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakaana nɡ̤ud̤iʃɔn uahɔlib̤ama wajɛjintɔmɓi kaana nɡ̤ud̤iʃɔn uahɔlib̤ama wajɛjintɔmɓi kaana nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakad̤iʃɔn nɡ̤uhɛmd̤an nɔɛʃb̤an nɔitran nɔkɛran nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛt͡sɛrɛ nɡ̤ub̤ilɛhan nɔz̤av̤an nɔakan nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakad̤iʃan nɡ̤uut͡sɛ nɔaran z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤i iz̤ikʰulu z̤amahɔri isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤ulɔtan isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤uʃɔb̤ali isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤ut͡sib̤ɛjɔn isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤uana isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤ud̤iʃɔn isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤uɛt͡sɛrɛ isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤ud̤iʃan z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ iz̤ikʰulu z̤amahɔri nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤ikʰulu z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤wɛni lakwasɛhirɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa ɔɔkumkani aɓaɓɛlawula ɛz̤wɛni lakwaɛd̤ɔm kunɡ̤ɛkaɓikʰɔ unɔɓukumkani kuɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ub̤ɛla uɲana kab̤ɛhɔrɛ kwaɛd̤ɔm iɡ̤ama lɔmz̤i wakʰɛ jid̤inab̤a wafa ub̤ɛla watʰi ujɔb̤ab̤i uɲana kaz̤ɛra wasɛb̤ɔt͡sɛra ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ wafa ujɔb̤ab̤i watʰi uhuʃam wasɛz̤wɛni lamatɛman ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ wafa uhuʃam watʰi uhad̤ad̤i uɲana kab̤ɛd̤ad̤i ɔwawat͡ʃaɓalalisajɔ amamid̤ijan ɛm̤laɓɛni wamamɔwab̤i ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ iɡ̤ama lɔmz̤i wakʰɛ jiav̤iti wafa uhad̤ad̤i watʰi usamla wasɛmasɛrɛka ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ wafa usamla watʰi usawulɛ wasɛrɛhɔb̤ɔti jɔmlamɓɔ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ wafa usawulɛ watʰi ub̤ahalihanan uɲana kaakɛb̤ɔrɛ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ wafa ub̤ahalihanan uɲana kaakɛb̤ɔrɛ watʰi uhad̤arɛ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ iɡ̤ama lɔmz̤i wakʰɛ jipawu iɡ̤ama lɔmkakʰɛ nɡ̤umɛhɛtab̤ɛli intɔmɓi kamatrɛd̤ɛ intɔmɓi kamɛz̤ahab̤i nɡ̤awɔ amaɡ̤ama ɛz̤ikʰulu z̤akwaɛsawu nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤az̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛnd̤awɔ z̤az̤ɔ nɡ̤amaɡ̤ama az̤ɔ isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤utimna isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤ualɛv̤a isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤ujɛtɛtɛ isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤uahɔlib̤ama isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤uɛla isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤upinɔn isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤ukɛnaz̤i isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤utɛman isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤umib̤ɛt͡sarɛ isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤umaɡ̤ɛd̤ijɛli isikʰulu ɛsinɡ̤uiram z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ iz̤ikʰulu z̤akwaɛd̤ɔm nɡ̤ɔkwamakʰaja az̤ɔ ɛz̤wɛni lɔkuma kwaz̤ɔ nɡ̤uɛsawu kɛ lɔwɔ ujisɛ wamaɛd̤ɔm kɛ kalɔku ujakɔɓi waɬala ɛz̤wɛni lɔkupʰamɓukɛla kukajisɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan jijɔ lɛ kɛ inz̤ala kajakɔɓi ujɔsɛfu ɛnɡ̤ɔmiɲaka iliʃumi linɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ wajɛsalusa impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ naɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ jɛna kɛ ɛnɡ̤umfana wajɛnɔɔɲana ɓakab̤iliha nɔɔɲana ɓakaz̤ilipa aɓafaz̤i ɓakajisɛ ujɔsɛfu waz̤isa ud̤aɓa lwaɓɔ ɔluɓi kujisɛ usirajɛli wajɛmtʰand̤a ujɔsɛfu nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛnɡ̤uɲana wɔkwalupʰala kwakʰɛ jɛna wamɛnz̤ɛla kɛ inɡ̤uɓɔ ɛnd̤ɛ ɛnɛmikʰɔnɔ aɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ ɓaɓɔna ukuɓa ujisɛ umtʰand̤a nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓamtʰija aɓaɓa nakutʰɛtʰa najɛ ɓɛkǁɔlilɛ ujɔsɛfu wapʰupʰa ipʰupʰa waɓakǁɛlɛla aɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ kwaɓa kukʰɔna ɓamtʰijajɔ watʰi kuɓɔ kʰaniliv̤ɛ ɛli pʰupʰa nd̤ilipʰupʰilɛjɔ jaɓɔnani ɓɛsiɓɔpʰa iz̤itʰunɡ̤u ɛnt͡simini pʰakatʰi saz̤a isitʰunɡ̤u sɛsuka sɛma z̤az̤a iz̤itʰunɡ̤u z̤ɛnu z̤asiŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤akǃuɓud̤a kwisitʰunɡ̤u aɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ ɓatʰi kujɛ jinɛnɛ ukuɓa uja kuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu jinɛnɛ ukuɓa uja kwaɓa kukʰɔna ɓamtijajɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamapʰupʰa akʰɛ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamaz̤wi akʰɛ waɓuja wapʰupʰa ɛliɲɛ ipʰupʰa walikǁɛla kuɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ watʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤iɓujɛ nd̤apʰupʰa ipʰupʰa nd̤ipʰupʰɛ ilanɡ̤a nɛɲanɡ̤a nɛɛnkwɛnkwɛz̤i ɛz̤iluʃumi ɛlinaɲɛ z̤ikǃuɓud̤a wakukǁɛla kujisɛ nakuɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ ujisɛ wamkʰalimɛla watʰi kujɛ lipʰupʰa ɛli ulipʰupʰilɛjɔ mna nɔɲɔkɔ naɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɔ sɔz̤a siz̤ɛ kukǃuɓud̤a kuwɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni aɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ ɓammɔnɛla kɛ jɛna ujisɛ waliɡ̤ǀ̤ina ɛli liz̤wi kɛ kalɔku aɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ ɓaja impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ kajisɛ kwaʃɛkɛm usirajɛli watʰi kujɔsɛfu aɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɔ aɓalusi ɛʃɛkɛm jiz̤a nd̤ikutʰumɛ kuɓɔ watʰi jɛna kujɛ nd̤ilapʰa watʰi kujɛ kʰawujɛ kukʰanɡ̤ɛla ukupʰila kwaɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɔ nɔkupʰila kwɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ uɓujɛ uz̤ɛ kund̤ikǁɛlɛla wamtʰuma kɛ ɛmsusa ɛntilini jasɛhɛɓrɔn waja ɛʃɛkɛm wafuɲanwa nɡ̤umfɔ ɛb̤ad̤ula ɛnɮɛ umfɔ lɔwɔ wamɓuz̤a watʰi ufuna ntɔni watʰi nd̤ifuna aɓakʰuluwa ɓam kʰawund̤ikǁɛlɛlɛ apʰɔ ɓalusa kʰɔna watʰi umfɔ ɓand̤ulukilɛ apʰa kuɓa kʰɛnd̤ɛv̤a ɓɛsitʰi masijɛ ɛd̤ɔtan ujɔsɛfu waɓaland̤ɛla aɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ waɓafumana ɛd̤ɔtan ɓamɓɔna kɛ ɛsɛkud̤ɛ ɛnɡ̤ɛkasɔnd̤ɛli kuɓɔ ɓɛnz̤a ijɛlɛŋǃɛ lɔkumɓulala ɓatʰɛtʰa ɔmɲɛ kɔmɲɛ ɓɛsitʰi nankɔ lɔ mpʰupʰi ɛsiz̤a jiz̤ani kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ simɓulalɛ simpʰɔsɛ kɔmɲɛ wɛmihad̤i sitʰi uɮiwɛ lixamŋǀwa siz̤ɛ siɓɔnɛ ukuɓa amapʰupʰa akʰɛ ɔɓa jintɔni wɛv̤a urub̤ɛn wam̤lanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni saɓɔ watʰi masinɡ̤amɓulali afɛ watʰi uxub̤ɛn kuɓɔ musani ukupʰalaz̤a ɡ̤az̤i mpʰɔsɛni kulɔ m̤ad̤i usɛntlanɡ̤ɔ sanɮa wat͡ʃɔ ukuz̤ɛ am̤lanɡ̤ulɛ ɛsanɮɛni saɓɔ amɓujisɛlɛ kujisɛ kwatʰi ujɔsɛfu kuɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ ɓam̤luɓa ujɔsɛfu inɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ inɡ̤uɓɔ ɛnd̤ɛ ɛnɛmikʰɔnɔ aɓɛnajɔ ɓamtʰaɓatʰa ɓampʰɔsa ɛm̤ad̤ini um̤ad̤i lɔwɔ uɓɛ uz̤ɛ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ manz̤i kuwɔ ɓaɬala pʰant͡si ɓaɮa isɔnka ɓapʰakamisa amɛɬɔ aɓɔ ɓakʰanɡ̤ɛla nanɡ̤ɔ umkʰɔkɔ wamaiʃmajɛli uv̤ɛla ɛɡ̤ilijad̤i unɛɛnkamɛla z̤itʰwɛlɛ ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ namafutʰa akǃʰɔliwɛjɔ nɛntlaka ɛmnand̤i ɓɛsiɬa naz̤ɔ ɓɛsija ɛjiputa ujud̤a watʰi kuɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ jinz̤uz̤ɔni ukutʰi simɓulalɛ wɛtʰu sifiɬɛ iɡ̤az̤i lakʰɛ jiz̤ani sitʰɛnɡ̤isɛ nɡ̤ajɛ kumaiʃmajɛli isanɮa sɛtʰu masinɡ̤aɓi pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤umz̤alwana wɛtʰu jiɲama jɛtʰu ɓampʰulapʰula aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ aɮula amamid̤ijan lawɔ anɡ̤aɓaxwɛɓi ɓamxɔla ɓamkʰupʰa ujɔsɛfu ɛm̤ad̤ini ɓatʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɔjɔsɛfu kumaiʃmajɛli nɡ̤ɛɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini ujɔsɛfu ɛjiputa waɓujɛla urub̤ɛn ɛm̤ad̤ini jini ujɔsɛfu akakʰɔ ɛm̤ad̤ini waz̤id̤raz̤ula iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ waɓujɛla kuɓaninawa ɓakʰɛ watʰi umfana akakʰɔ kɛ nd̤ɔsuka nd̤ijɛ nɡ̤apʰi ɓajitʰaɓatʰa inɡ̤uɓɔ kajɔsɛfu ɓakǁʰɛla inkunz̤i jɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛkǁʰɔnti ɓajitʰi ŋ̰ǁ̰u inɡ̤uɓɔ ɛɡ̤az̤ini ɓajitʰumɛla inɡ̤uɓɔ ɛnd̤ɛ ɛnɛmikʰɔnɔ ɛkʰaja ɓajisa kujisɛ ɓatʰi sijikǀʰɔlɛ kʰawufanisɛ ukuɓa jinɡ̤uɓɔ jɔɲana wakʰɔ asijijɔ wajifanisa watʰi jinɡ̤uɓɔ jɔɲana uɮiwɛ lixamŋǀwa inɛnɛ ukǃwɛnɡ̤iwɛ ujɔsɛfu ujakɔɓi waz̤ik͡xaz̤ula iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ waɓɛka ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ ɛsiŋǃɛni sakʰɛ wamɛnz̤ɛla isid͡ʒ̤wili uɲana wakʰɛ imiɬa ɛmininz̤i ɓɛsuka ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ naz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iintɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ ɓɛz̤a kumtʰutʰuz̤ɛla akav̤uma kutʰutʰuz̤ɛlwa watʰi nd̤ija kuɬa nd̤ijɛ kuɲana kwɛlaɓafilɛjɔ nd̤isɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili ujisɛ wamlilɛla kɛ amamid̤ijan aja atʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤aja ɛjiputa kupɔtifarɛ umɓusi wakwafarɔ umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa wɛɬa ujud̤a ɛsuka kuɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ waja wajimisa intɛntɛ jakʰɛ nɡ̤akwind̤ɔd̤a jasɛad̤ulam ɛɡ̤ama linɡ̤uhira ujud̤a waɓɔna kʰɔna intɔmɓi jɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤umkanan ɛɡ̤ama linɡ̤uʃuwa wajiz̤ɛka wajinɡ̤ɛna jamitʰa jaz̤ala uɲana watʰi iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ nɡ̤uɛrɛ jaɓuja jamitʰa jaz̤ala uɲana jatʰi iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ nɡ̤uɔnan jaɓuja japʰind̤a jamitʰa jaz̤ala uɲana jatʰi iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ nɡ̤uʃɛla wajɛsɛkɛz̤ib̤i ukumz̤ala kwakʰɛ ujud̤a wamz̤ɛkɛla uɛrɛ amaz̤iɓulɔ akʰɛ umfaz̤i ɔɡ̤ama linɡ̤utamarɛ kɛ uɛrɛ amaz̤iɓulɔ kajud̤a uɓɛnɛɛntlɔnd̤i ɛz̤imɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a waz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a wamɓulala ujud̤a watʰi kuɔnan jija kumfaz̤i wɔmkʰuluwa wakʰɔ umnɡ̤ɛnɛ umv̤ɛlisɛlɛ imɓɛwu umkʰuluwa wakʰɔ wajɛsaz̤i uɔnan ukuɓa imɓɛwu ajiji kuɓa jɛjakʰɛ watʰi kǁa sukuɓa ɛsija kumfaz̤i wɔmkʰuluwa wakʰɛ wajipʰalaz̤ɛla ɛm̤laɓɛni ukuz̤ɛ anɡ̤amniki mɓɛwu umkʰuluwa wakʰɛ kwaɓa kuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ɔkɔ wakwɛnz̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔ wamɓulala najɛ watʰi ujud̤a kutamarɛ umɔlɔkaz̤ana wakʰɛ ɬala unɡ̤um̤lɔlɔkaz̤i ɛnɮwini kajiɬɔ ad̤ɛ akʰulɛ uʃɛla uɲana kuɓa watʰi ɬɛz̤ɛ afɛ najɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ wɛmka utamarɛ waja kuɬala ɛnɮwini kajisɛ z̤akuɓa ninz̤i iint͡suku jafa intɔmɓi kaʃuwa umkajud̤a akutʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛka ujud̤a wɛɲuka waja kuɓakǀʰɛɓi ɓɛmpaɬa jakʰɛ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ jɛna nɔhira isiɬɔɓɔ sakʰɛ sasɛad̤ulam kwatimna wakǁɛlɛlwa utamarɛ kwatʰiwa nankɔ ujiɬɔz̤ala ɛɲuka ɛsija kukǀʰɛɓa impaɬa jakʰɛ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ kwatimna waz̤isusa iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɔɓuɬɔlɔkaz̤i ɓakʰɛ waz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛla nɡ̤ɛsiɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɔ waz̤itʰi wamɓu waɬala pʰant͡si ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɛɛnajim ɛnɡ̤asɛnɮɛlɛni ɛja kwatimna kuɓa uɓɛɓɔna ukuɓa ukʰulilɛ uʃɛla nɔkɔ kujɛ ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤umkakʰɛ ujud̤a wamɓɔna waɓa ulihɛɲukaz̤i kuɓa ɛɓɛɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɛ uɓusɔ watʰi ɡ̤u ɓukǀala waja kujɛ ɛnɮɛlɛni watʰi kʰawuz̤ɛ nd̤ikunɡ̤ɛnɛ kuɓa uɓɛnɡ̤az̤i ukuɓa nɡ̤umɔlɔkaz̤ana wakʰɛ watʰi wɔnd̤inika ntɔni ukuz̤ɛ nd̤ikuv̤umɛlɛ ukuɓa und̤inɡ̤ɛnɛ watʰi mna nd̤ɔtʰumɛla nd̤itʰaɓatʰɛ itakanɛ lɛb̤ɔkwɛ ɛlisɛmpaɬɛni ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ watʰi ɛwɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ wand̤inika isiɓamɓisɔ ud̤ɛ ulitʰumɛlɛ watʰi nd̤ikunikɛ siɓamɓisɔ watʰi jɛna umsɛsanɛ wakʰɔ nɛsid̤anɡ̤a sakʰɔ nɔmsimɛlɛlɔ wakʰɔ ɔsɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ wamnika kɛ wamnɡ̤ɛna wamitʰa jɛna nɡ̤ajɛ wɛsuka wɛmka isiɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɔ sakʰɛ wamɓatʰa iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɔɓuɬɔlɔkaz̤i ɓakʰɛ ujud̤a walitʰumɛla itakanɛ lɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sɛsiɬɔɓɔ sakʰɛ sasɛad̤ulam ukuz̤ɛ samkɛlɛ isiɓamɓisɔ ɛsanɮɛni sɛnkaz̤ana lɛjɔ asijifumananɡ̤a kɛ saɓuz̤a kuɓantu ɓalɔɔ nd̤awɔ satʰi lipʰi inɡ̤awukaz̤i ɛɓɛ lisɛɛnajim nɡ̤asɛnɮɛlɛni ɓatʰi akuɓanɡ̤akʰɔ nɡ̤awukaz̤i apʰa saɓujɛla kujud̤a satʰi and̤ilifumananɡ̤a naɓɔ aɓantu ɓalɔɔ nd̤awɔ ɓatʰɛ akuɓanɡ̤akʰɔ nɡ̤awukaz̤i apʰa watʰi ujud̤a maliz̤itʰaɓatʰɛ ɬɛz̤ɛ sid̤ɛlwɛ jaɓɔna nd̤itʰumɛlɛ ɛli takanɛ kɛ wɛna akulifumananɡ̤a kwatʰi ɛmv̤a kwɛɛɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤intatʰu wakǁɛlɛlwa ujud̤a kwatʰiwa utamarɛ umɔlɔkaz̤ana wakʰɔ uhɛɲuz̤ilɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ jaɓɔna umitʰi nɡ̤ɔkuhɛɲuz̤a ɔkɔ ujud̤a watʰi mkʰupʰɛni at͡ʃiswɛ akukʰut͡ʃwa watʰumɛla jɛna kujisɛz̤ala watʰi nd̤imitʰiswɛ jind̤ɔd̤a ɛz̤iz̤ɛz̤ajɔ ɛz̤i z̤intɔ watʰi kʰawufanisɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ɔkaɓani lɔ msɛsanɛ nɛsi sid̤anɡ̤a nalɔ msimɛlɛlɔ waz̤ifanisa ujud̤a watʰi ulilunɡ̤isa wɛnz̤ɛ kuɓa nd̤inɡ̤amnikanɡ̤a uʃɛla uɲana akaɓanɡ̤a saɓuja amaz̤i kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkuz̤ala kwakʰɛ inɡ̤amawɛlɛ ɛsiz̤alwɛni sakʰɛ kwatʰi ɛkuz̤alɛni kwakʰɛ kwav̤ɛla isanɮa watʰaɓatʰa umz̤alisikaz̤i waɓɔpʰa ɛsanɮɛni salɔ usinɡ̤a ɔluɓɔmv̤u ɛsitʰi ɛli lapʰuma kukǃala kutʰɛ kɛ lakusiɓujisa isanɮa salɔ nankɔ kupʰuma umz̤alwana walɔ watʰi jini ukuɓa uz̤itʰʲɔɓɔz̤ɛlɛ watʰijwa kɛ iɡ̤ama lɔkuɓa nɡ̤upɛrɛt͡sɛ kwatʰi ɛmv̤a kɔkɔ kwapʰuma umz̤alwana walɔ ɔɓɛnɔsinɡ̤a ɔluɓɔmv̤u ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ watʰijwa iɡ̤ama lɔkuɓa nɡ̤uz̤ɛra kɛ kalɔku ujɔsɛfu waɬiswa ɛjiputa upɔtifarɛ umɓusi wakwafarɔ umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki umjiputa wamtʰɛnɡ̤a kumaiʃmajɛli aɓɛm̤lisɛlɛ kʰɔna ujɛhɔv̤a waɓa najɛ ujɔsɛfu waɓa jind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɛmpumɛlɛlɔ waɓa sɛnɮwini jɛnkɔsi jakʰɛ umjiputa lɔwɔ jaɓɔna inkɔsi jakʰɛ ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a unajɛ ukuɓa z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ aɓɛz̤ɛnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a uɓɛz̤ɛnz̤a z̤iɓɛ nɛmpumɛlɛlɔ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ ujɔsɛfu waɓaɓalwa ɛmɛɬwɛni ajɔ wajilunɡ̤isɛlɛla jamɛnz̤a umv̤ɛlɛli wɛnɮu jajɔ nɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛɓinaz̤ɔ jaz̤inikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ kwatʰi ukususɛla ɛkuɓɛni jamɛnz̤a umv̤ɛlɛli wɛnɮu jajɔ nɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛɓinaz̤ɔ wajisikɛlɛla ujɛhɔv̤a inɮu jɔmjiputa lɔwɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kajɔsɛfu jaɓakʰɔ int͡sikɛlɛlɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɛz̤intwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɛɓinaz̤ɔ ɛnɮwini nasɛz̤inɮɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛɓinaz̤ɔ jaz̤ijɛkɛla ɛsanɮɛni sikajɔsɛfu ajakʰatʰalɛla naɲɛ intɔ ɛɓikujɛ inɡ̤ɛsisɔ isɔnka ɛsiɮajɔ kɛ ujɔsɛfu ɛɓɛm̤lɛ isikǃu ɛm̤lɛ imɓɔnakalɔ kwatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kwɛz̤i z̤intɔ umfaz̤i wɛnkɔsi jakʰɛ wapʰɔsa amɛɬɔ akʰɛ kujɔsɛfu watʰi nd̤ilalɛ wamanɡ̤ala watʰi kumkankɔsi jakʰɛ jaɓɔna inkɔsi jam ajikʰatʰalɛlɛ ntɔ isɛnɮwini nɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛnaz̤ɔ iz̤inikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni akukʰɔ ɓani mkʰulu kulɛ nɮu ajiŋǃaɓisanɡ̤a nɛntɔ lɛ nɡ̤uwɛ wɛd̤wa nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa unɡ̤umkajɔ nd̤inɡ̤atʰini kɛ ukwɛnz̤a ɔɓu ɓuɓi ɓukʰulu kanɡ̤aka nd̤ɔnɛ kutʰikǁɔ kwatʰi nakuɓa ɛɓɛtʰɛtʰa kujɔsɛfu imiɬa nɡ̤ɛmiɬa akampʰulapʰula jɛna ukuɓa alalɛ ɛkǀalɛni lakʰɛ nɔkutʰi aɓɛ najɛ kwatʰi kulɔɔ miɬa wanɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini ɛja kusɛɓɛnz̤a umsɛɓɛnz̤i wakʰɛ kwajɛ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ naɲɛ jakumad̤ɔd̤a ɛnɮu ɛnɮwini apʰɔ wamɓamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ watʰi nd̤ilalɛ wajiʃija inɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ waɓalɛka wapʰumɛla pʰanɮɛ kwatʰi akuɓɔna ukuɓa ujiʃijilɛ inɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ uɓalɛkɛlɛ pʰanɮɛ waɓiz̤a amad̤ɔd̤a ɛnɮu jakʰɛ watʰɛtʰa kuwɔ ɛsitʰi kʰanɡ̤ɛlani usiz̤isɛlɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤um̤ɛb̤ɛrɛ ukuɓa iɮalɛ nɡ̤atʰi iz̤ilɛ isiz̤a kund̤ilala nd̤akʰala nɡ̤ɛz̤wi ɛlikʰulu jatʰi jakuv̤a nd̤ipʰakamisa iz̤wi nd̤ikʰala jajiʃija inɡ̤uɓɔ jajɔ ɛkǀalɛni jaɓalɛka japʰumɛla pʰanɮɛ wajiɓɛka pʰant͡si inɡ̤uɓɔ jajɔ ɛkǀalɛni lakʰɛ jad̤a jafika inkɔsi jakʰɛ ɛnɮwini jajɔ watʰɛtʰa kujɔ nɡ̤ɔkwalɔɔ maz̤wi ɛsitʰi siz̤ɛ isikǀaka ɛsinɡ̤um̤ɛb̤ɛrɛ ɛsi usiz̤isɛlɛ sɔna ukuɓa siɮalɛ nɡ̤am kutʰɛ nd̤akulipʰakamisa iz̤wi nd̤ikʰala sajiʃija inɡ̤uɓɔ jasɔ ɛkǀalɛni saɓalɛkɛla pʰanɮɛ itʰɛ jakuwɛv̤a inkɔsi jakʰɛ amaz̤wi ɔmkajɔ awawatʰɛtʰajɔ kujɔ ɛsitʰi sɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ isikǀaka sakʰɔ wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ wajɔ inkɔsi kajɔsɛfu jamtʰaɓatʰa jamfaka ɛntɔlɔnɡ̤wɛni kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ apʰɔ amakʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰wa ɔkumkani aɓɛkʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰wa kʰɔna waɓa sɛntɔlɔnɡ̤wɛni apʰɔ kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uɓɛnɔjɔsɛfu wamtʰɔɓɛla iŋǀɛɓa wɛnz̤a ukuɓa atʰand̤wɛ nɡ̤umpʰatʰi wɛntɔlɔnɡ̤ɔ umpʰatʰi wɛntɔlɔnɡ̤ɔ wawanikɛla kujɔsɛfu ɔnkɛ amakʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰wa asɛntɔlɔnɡ̤wɛni ukuz̤ɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤isukuɓa z̤isɛnz̤iwa kʰɔna aɓɛ nɡ̤ujɛ ɔz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ umpʰatʰi wɛntɔlɔnɡ̤ɔ akakʰatʰalɛlanɡ̤a ntɔ isɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uɓɛnajɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛɓɛsakuz̤ɛnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a uɓɛz̤ipʰumɛlɛlisa kwatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kwɛz̤i z̤intɔ umŋ̤ǀ̤amli wɔkumkani wasɛjiputa nɔmɔd͡ʒ̤i wɛz̤ɔnka z̤akʰɛ ɓajɔna inkɔsi jaɓɔ wasɛjiputa ufarɔ waɓa nɔɓuxalaxumɛ kuɓɔ aɓaɓusi ɓakʰɛ ɓɔɓaɓini umpʰatʰi waɓaŋ̤ǀ̤amli nɔmpʰatʰi waɓɔd͡ʒ̤i ɓɛz̤ɔnka waɓanikɛla ɛluɡ̤ǀ̤inwɛni ɛnɮwini jɔmtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki ɛntɔlɔnɡ̤wɛni ɛnd̤awɛni aɓɛkʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰ɛlwɛ kujɔ ujɔsɛfu umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki wamɛnz̤a ujɔsɛfu umv̤ɛlɛli waɓɔ waɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛla ɓaɓa nɔmz̤uz̤u ɓɛsɛluɡ̤ǀ̤inwɛni ɓapʰupʰa ipʰupʰa ɓɔɓaɓini ɛlɔwɔ wapʰupʰa ipʰupʰa lakʰɛ nɡ̤aɓusuku ɓuɲɛ ɛlɔwɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔkutʰʲilwa kwɛpʰupʰa lakʰɛ umŋ̤ǀ̤amli nɔmɔd͡ʒ̤i wɛz̤ɔnka ɓɔkumkani wasɛjiputa aɓaɓɛkʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰iwɛ ɛntɔlɔnɡ̤wɛni ujɔsɛfu wanɡ̤ɛna kuɓɔ waɓakʰanɡ̤ɛla ɓɛmat͡ʃɛkilɛ waɓaɓuz̤a aɓaɓusi ɓakwafarɔ aɓaɓɛnajɛ ɛluɡ̤ǀ̤inwɛni ɛnɮwini jɛnkɔsi jakʰɛ ɛsitʰi kutʰɛni ukuɓa uɓusɔ ɓɛnu ɓuɓɛ ɓuɓi nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ ɓatʰi kujɛ sipʰupʰɛ ipʰupʰa akukʰɔ ulitʰʲilajɔ ujɔsɛfu watʰi kuɓɔ iz̤itʰʲilɔ asiz̤ɛz̤ikatʰikǁɔ kʰanind̤ikǁɛlɛlɛ ipʰupʰa ɛlɔ umpʰatʰi waɓaŋ̤ǀ̤amli wamkǁɛlɛla ujɔsɛfu ipʰupʰa lakʰɛ watʰi kujɛ ɛpʰupʰɛni nd̤iɓɔnɛ umd̤ilija upʰamɓi ɛmd̤ilijɛni apʰɔ amasɛɓɛ ɛmatʰatʰu wanɡ̤atʰi wɔna upʰuma amatʰupʰa wad̤uɓula iintʲantʲamɓɔ z̤awɔ iz̤iɬɔkɔ z̤awɔ z̤av̤utʰwa z̤az̤iid̤ilija ind̤ɛɓɛ kafarɔ isɛsanɮɛni nd̤iz̤itʰaɓatʰɛ iid̤ilija nd̤iz̤ifakǁanɡ̤ɛ ɛnd̤ɛɓɛni kafarɔ nd̤ijinikɛlɛ ind̤ɛɓɛ ɛsanɮɛni sikafarɔ ujɔsɛfu watʰi kujɛ sisɔ ɛsi isitʰʲilɔ salɔ amasɛɓɛ amatʰatʰu lawɔ jimiɬa ɛmitʰatʰu kusɛlɛ imiɬa ɛmitʰatʰu az̤ɛ ufarɔ ajipʰakamisɛ intlɔkɔ jakʰɔ akuɓujisɛlɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɔ ujinikɛlɛ ind̤ɛɓɛ kafarɔ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ lanɡ̤apʰamɓili ɔkɔ uɓunɡ̤umŋ̤ǀ̤amli wakʰɛ uz̤ɛ und̤ikʰumɓulɛ kɛ wakulunɡ̤ɛlwa und̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ iŋǀɛɓa und̤ikʰankaɲɛ kufarɔ und̤ikʰupʰɛ kulɛ nɮu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɛnɛ nd̤aɓiwa ɛz̤wɛni lamahɛb̤ɛrɛ nalapʰa and̤ɛnz̤anɡ̤a ntɔ ukuɓa ɓand̤ifakɛ ɛm̤ad̤ini lɔ umpʰatʰi waɓɔd͡ʒ̤iz̤ɔnka waɓɔna ukuɓa isitʰʲilɔ ɛsɔ silunɡ̤ilɛ watʰi kujɔsɛfu nam nd̤ipʰupʰilɛ nd̤iɓɔnɛ iinɡ̤ɔɓɔz̤i ɛz̤intatʰu z̤ɛz̤ɔnka ɛz̤im̤lɔpʰɛ ɛz̤isɛntlɔkwɛni jam ɛnɡ̤ɔɓɔz̤ini ɛpʰɛz̤ulu kukʰɔ iz̤iɮɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤iɮɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ikafarɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɔmɔd͡ʒ̤iz̤ɔnka z̤isiɮa kwɛjɔna nɡ̤ɔɓɔz̤i ipʰɛz̤ulu ɛntlɔkwɛni jam wapʰɛnd̤ula ujɔsɛfu watʰi sisɔ ɛsi isitʰʲilɔ salɔ iinɡ̤ɔɓɔz̤i ɛz̤intatʰu ɛz̤ɔ jimiɬa ɛmitʰatʰu kusɛlɛ imiɬa ɛmitʰatʰu az̤ɛ ufarɔ ajipʰakamisɛ intlɔkɔ jakʰɔ isukɛ kuwɛ akukǁʰɔmɛ ɛmtʰini z̤ijiɮɛ iɲama jakʰɔ ipʰɛlɛ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔm̤la wasitʰatʰu um̤la wɔkuz̤alwa kukafarɔ waɓɛnz̤ɛla isiɮɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ wajipʰakamisa intlɔkɔ jɔmpʰatʰi waɓaŋ̤ǀ̤amli nɛntlɔkɔ jɔmpʰatʰi waɓɔd͡ʒ̤i ɓɛz̤ɔnka pʰakatʰi kwaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ wamɓujisɛla umpʰatʰi waɓaŋ̤ǀ̤amli kuɓuŋ̤ǀ̤amli ɓakʰɛ wajinikɛla ind̤ɛɓɛ ɛsanɮɛni sikafarɔ kɛ jɛna umpʰatʰi waɓɔd͡ʒ̤i ɓɛz̤ɔnka wamkǁʰɔma nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɔsɛfu waɓatʰʲilɛlajɔ umpʰatʰi waɓaŋ̤ǀ̤amli akamkʰumɓulanɡ̤a ujɔsɛfu wamliɓala kwatʰi ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɲaka ɛmiɓini ɛz̤ɛlɛjɔ ufarɔ wapʰupʰa ɛmi pʰɛz̤u kɔmlamɓɔ nankɔ kuɲuka kupʰuma ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni amatʰɔkaz̤i asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ amaɬɛ ɛtʲɛɓilɛ ɛsiɮa ɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔtʲɛni nankɔ kuɲuka kupʰuma ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni amaɲɛ amatʰɔkaz̤i asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛmv̤a kwawɔ ɛmaɓi ɛŋǃinilɛ ɛma ɛkǀalɛni lamaɲɛ amatʰɔkaz̤i lawɔ ɛluŋǁwɛmɛni lɔmlamɓɔ amatʰɔkaz̤i amaɓi aŋǃinilɛjɔ awaɮa amatʰɔkaz̤i asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ amaɬɛ atʲɛɓilɛjɔ wapʰapʰama ufarɔ walala wapʰupʰa ɔkwɛsiɓini waɓɔna iz̤ikʰwɛɓu ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ z̤ipʰuma mkǀinɡ̤ɛni mɲɛ z̤itʲɛɓilɛ z̤ilunɡ̤ilɛ nanz̤ɔ iz̤ikʰwɛɓu ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤akakǀilɛjɔ ɛz̤it͡ʃilɛjɔ lulɔpʰu lwasɛmpumalanɡ̤a z̤ipʰuma ɛmv̤a kwaz̤ɔ z̤ɛsuka iz̤ikʰwɛɓu ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤akakǀilɛjɔ z̤az̤iɡ̤iɲa iz̤ikʰwɛɓu z̤ɔsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛz̤itʲɛɓilɛjɔ ɛz̤ikǀʰumilɛjɔ wav̤uka ufarɔ ɔ lipʰupʰa kwatʰi umɔja wakʰɛ waŋ̤ǃ̤unɡ̤a watʰumɛla waz̤iɓiz̤a z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤az̤i z̤asɛjiputa iz̤ilumkɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akʰɔna ufarɔ waz̤ikǁɛlɛla ipʰupʰa lakʰɛ akwaɓakʰɔ ɓani kuz̤ɔ unɔkuwatʰʲila kufarɔ watʰɛtʰa umpʰatʰi waɓaŋ̤ǀ̤amli kufarɔ ɛsitʰi nd̤ijasikʰumɓula nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ isɔnɔ ufarɔ wajɛnɔɓuxalaxumɛ kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ wand̤inikɛla ɛluɡ̤ǀ̤inwɛni ɛnɮwini jɔmtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki lɔ nɔmpʰatʰi waɓɔd͡ʒ̤i ɓɛz̤ɔnka sapʰupʰa ipʰupʰa nɡ̤aɓusuku ɓuɲɛ najɛ walɔwɔ wapʰupʰa nɡ̤ɔkutʰʲilwa kwɛpʰupʰa lakʰɛ kwakukʰɔ kutʰi ɔnɡ̤um̤ɛb̤ɛrɛ isikǀaka sɔmtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki sasikǁɛlɛla sasitʰʲilɛla amapʰupʰa ɛtʰu samtʰʲilɛla ɛlɔwɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛpʰupʰa lakʰɛ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔkɔkɔ sisitʰʲilɛlɛjɔ kwaɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ wand̤iɓujisɛla ɛnd̤awɛni jam ɔmɲɛ lɔwɔ wamkǁʰɔma ufarɔ watʰumɛla wamɓiz̤a ujɔsɛfu ɓamɡ̤id̤imisa ukumkʰupʰa ɛm̤ad̤ini waz̤ikǀʰɛɓa waŋǁiɓa nɡ̤uɓɔ z̤imɓi wɛz̤a kufarɔ watʰi ufarɔ kujɔsɛfu nd̤ipʰupʰɛ ipʰupʰa akukʰɔ ɓani unɔkulitʰʲila nd̤iv̤ɛ kusitʰiwa nɡ̤awɛ ujaliv̤a ipʰupʰa ulitʰʲilɛ ujɔsɛfu wampʰɛnd̤ula ufarɔ ɛsitʰi akunam utʰikǁɔ uja kupʰɛnd̤ula intɔ jɔkumsind̤isa ufarɔ ufarɔ watʰɛtʰa kujɔsɛfu watʰi ɛpʰupʰɛni jaɓɔna ɓɛnd̤imi ɛluŋǁwɛmɛni lɔmlamɓɔ nankɔ kuɲuka kupʰuma ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni amatʰɔkaz̤i asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛtʲɛɓilɛ ɛmaɬɛ ɛsiɮa ɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔtʲɛni nankɔ kuɲuka kupʰuma amaɲɛ amatʰɔkaz̤i asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛmv̤a kwawɔ ɛb̤itʲilɛ ɛmaɓi kakʰulu ɛnɡ̤amaxɔkǃɔxɔkǃɔ ɛnd̤inɡ̤az̤anɡ̤a nd̤iɓɔnɛ and͡ʒ̤alɔ kulɔ lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa ukuɓa maɓi kwawɔ amatʰɔkaz̤i anɡ̤amaxɔkǃɔxɔkǃɔ amaɓi awaɮa awɔkukǃala amatʰɔkaz̤i asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ atʲɛɓilɛjɔ anɡ̤ɛna ɛmɓilinini wawɔ akwaz̤ɛka ukuɓa anɡ̤ɛnilɛ ɛmɓilinini wawɔ imɓɔnakalɔ jawɔ jamɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤asɛkukǃalɛni nd̤apʰapʰama nd̤aɓɔna ɛpʰupʰɛni iz̤ikʰwɛɓu ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ z̤ipʰuma mikǀinɡ̤ɛni mɲɛ z̤ikǀʰumilɛ z̤ilunɡ̤ilɛ nanz̤ɔ iz̤ikʰwɛɓu ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ z̤iʃwaɓɛnɛ z̤iŋ̤ǀ̤akakǀilɛ z̤it͡ʃilɛ lulɔpʰu lwasɛmpumalanɡ̤a z̤iɬuma ɛmv̤a kwaz̤ɔ z̤ɛsuka iz̤ikʰwɛɓu ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤akakǀilɛjɔ z̤az̤iɡ̤iɲa iz̤ikʰwɛɓu ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nd̤atʰɛtʰa nɛz̤az̤i akukʰɔ ɓani kuz̤ɔ und̤ikǁɛlɛlajɔ ujɔsɛfu watʰi ufarɔ ipʰupʰa likafarɔ liɲɛ utʰikǁɔ umkǁɛlɛlɛ ufarɔ ɔkɔ aja kukwɛnz̤a amatʰɔkaz̤i asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ alunɡ̤ilɛjɔ jimiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ iz̤ikʰwɛɓu ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ jimiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ipʰupʰa ɛli liɲɛ amatʰɔkaz̤i asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anɡ̤amaxɔkǃɔxɔkǃɔ amaɓi aɲukilɛjɔ apʰuma ɛmv̤a kwalawɔ jimiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɛz̤ikʰwɛɓu ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛz̤iŋǃinilɛjɔ ɛz̤it͡ʃilɛjɔ lulɔpʰu lwasɛmpumalanɡ̤a z̤ija kuɓa jimiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ jɛnɮala lɛlɔ liz̤wi nd̤ilitʰɛtʰilɛjɔ kufarɔ lɔkutʰi ɔkɔ aja kukwɛnz̤a utʰikǁɔ ukuɓɔnisilɛ kufarɔ jaɓɔna kuz̤a imiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ jɛndʲɛɓɔ ɛnkulu ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lasɛjiputa z̤ɛ kuv̤ɛlɛ imiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ jɛnɮala ɛmv̤a kwalɛjɔ ilitʲalwɛ jɔnkɛ indʲɛɓɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa inɮala iliɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ iliz̤wɛ inɡ̤az̤iwa indʲɛɓɔ ɛliz̤wɛni nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jalɔɔ ija kuɓakʰɔ ɛmv̤a kwajɔ kuɓa ija kuɓa nz̤ima kunɛnɛ ukupʰind̤wa kaɓini kwɛpʰupʰa ɛlɔ kufarɔ kukukǃiniswa kwajɔ lɛ nd̤awɔ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ uja kukʰawulɛz̤a utʰikǁɔ ukujɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔ ufarɔ makakʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛjiŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤i ɛsisilumkɔ ajimisɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa makɛnz̤ɛ lɛ ntɔ ufarɔ alimisɛlɛ aɓav̤ɛlɛli iliz̤wɛ atʰaɓatʰɛ isiɬanu sɛliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa nɡ̤ɛmiɲaka jɔsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ jɛndʲɛɓɔ maɓaɓutʰɛ kɔnkɛ ukuɮa kwalɔɔ miɲaka ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ iz̤ajɔ ɓafumɓɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa pʰant͡si kwɛsanɮa sikafarɔ iɓɛ kukuɮa ɛmiz̤ini ɓajiɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ ɔkɔ kuɮa kuɓɛ jintɔ ɛɓɛkɛlwɛ iliz̤wɛ imiɲaka jɔsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ jɛnɮala ɛja kuɓakʰɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa linɡ̤at͡ʃaɓalali iliz̤wɛ jinɮala lalunɡ̤a ɛlɔ z̤wi ɛmɛɬwɛni kafarɔ nasɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ufarɔ watʰi kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ sinɔkumfumana ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɔnɔmɔja katʰikǁɔ ufarɔ watʰi kujɔsɛfu ɛkuɓɛni utʰikǁɔ ɛkwaz̤isilɛ kɔnkɛ ɔku akukʰɔ ɓani ujiŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤i usisilumkɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɛ uja kuɓa pʰɛz̤u kwɛnɮu jam wɛna ɓawutʰɔɓɛlɛ umlɔmɔ wakʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓam kusɛtrɔnɛni jɔd̤wa ɛnd̤ija kuɓa mkʰulu kuwɛ ufarɔ watʰi kujɔsɛfu kʰanɡ̤ɛla nd̤ikumisɛ pʰɛz̤u kwalɔ lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa wawukʰulula ufarɔ umsɛsanɛ wakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni sikajɔsɛfu wamamɓatʰisa iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɛlinɛn ɛkǀikiz̤ɛkilɛjɔ waŋǁiɓa umkǁɔkɛlɛlwanɛ wɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛntaɲɛni jakʰɛ wamkʰwɛlisa ɛŋǃwɛlwɛni jɛsiɓini aɓɛnajɔ kwamɛɲɛz̤wa pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ kwatʰiwa ɡ̤ukǃani wammisa pʰɛz̤u kwalɔ lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa watʰi ufarɔ kujɔsɛfu nd̤inɡ̤ufarɔ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwakʰɔ akukʰɔ ɓani uja kupʰakamisa sanɮa sakʰɛ naluɲawɔ lwakʰɛ ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lasɛjiputa ufarɔ wamtʰija ujɔsɛfu iɡ̤ama lɔkuɓa nɡ̤ut͡safɛnatipanɛha uaz̤ɛnati intɔmɓi kapɔtifɛra umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wasɛɔn ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤umkakʰɛ wapʰuma ujɔsɛfu walihamɓa iliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa ujɔsɛfu wajɛmiɲaka imaʃumi matʰatʰu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ kwakʰɛ pʰamɓi kɔfarɔ wasɛjiputa wapʰuma ujɔsɛfu ɛɓuswɛni ɓukafarɔ walikǀand̤a lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa um̤laɓa wav̤ɛlisa nɡ̤ɛnd̤ipʰanɛ nɡ̤ɛmiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ jɛndʲɛɓɔ wakuɓutʰa kɔnkɛ ukuɮa kwɛmiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛɓikʰɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa wakuɓɛka ukuɮa kujɔ imiz̤i ukuɮa aɓɛwuŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnɡ̤ilɛ umz̤i wakuɓɛka pʰakatʰi kwawɔ ujɔsɛfu wajifumɓa iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa jand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntlaɓatʰi jɔlwanɮɛ janinz̤i kunɛnɛ wad̤a wajɛka ukuɓala kuɓa iɓinɡ̤ɛnakuɓalwa ujɔsɛfu waz̤ala ɔɔɲana ɓaɓaɓini waɓaz̤alɛlwa nɡ̤uaz̤ɛnati intɔmɓi kapɔtifɛra umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wasɛɔn inɡ̤ɛkafiki imiɲaka jɛnɮala ujɔsɛfu wamtʰija ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤umanasɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa watʰi utʰikǁɔ und̤ɛnz̤ɛ nd̤akuliɓala kɔnkɛ ukwapʰuka najɔ jɔnkɛ inɮu kaɓawɔ ɔwɛsiɓini wamtʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤uɛfrajim nɡ̤ɔkuɓa watʰi utʰikǁɔ und̤ikǃʰamisilɛ ɛz̤wɛni lɛɛnt͡siz̤i z̤am japʰɛla kɛ imiɲaka jɔsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ jɛndʲɛɓɔ ɛɓisɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa jakǃala imiɲaka jɔsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ jɛnɮala nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wajɛkutʰɛtʰilɛ ujɔsɛfu jaɓakʰɔ inɮala kumaz̤wɛ ɔnkɛ kɛ ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lasɛjiputa kwakukʰɔ isɔnka lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa laɓa nɛnɮala aɓantu ɓakʰalɛla isɔnka kufarɔ watʰi ufarɔ kuwɔ ɔnkɛ amajiputa jijani kujɔsɛfu atʰɛ wakutʰɛtʰa niz̤ɛ nikwɛnz̤ɛ inɮala jaɓa sɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ ujɔsɛfu waz̤iv̤ula z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤inɮu ɛz̤inɔkuɮa watʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa kumajiputa kuɓa inɮala jaɓa namanɮa ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa lɛsuka iliz̤wɛ lipʰɛla lɛz̤a kutʰɛnɡ̤a iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa kujɔsɛfu ɛjiputa kuɓa inɮala iɓinamanɮa kulɔ lɔnkɛ waɓɔna ujakɔɓi ukuɓa kukʰɔ iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa ɛjiputa watʰi ujakɔɓi kɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ jini ukuɓa nikʰanɡ̤ɛlanɛ watʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤iv̤ilɛ ukuɓa kukʰɔ iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa ɛjiputa jiɬani nijɛ kʰɔna nisitʰɛnɡ̤ɛlɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa sipʰilɛ sinɡ̤afi ɓɛɬa aɓakʰuluwa ɓakajɔsɛfu aɓaliʃumi ɓɛja kutʰɛnɡ̤a iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa ɛjiputa kɔd̤wa ub̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin kajɔsɛfu ujakɔɓi akamtʰumanɡ̤a naɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ kuɓa watʰi ɬɛz̤ɛ aɬɛlwɛ jinɡ̤ɔz̤i ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛz̤a kutʰɛnɡ̤a iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ɓɛz̤ajɔ kuɓa inɮala iɓikʰɔ ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan ujɔsɛfu wajɛnɡ̤umlawuli wɛliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ jɛna wajɛtʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ ɓafika kɛ aɓakʰuluwa ɓakajɔsɛfu ɓakǃuɓud̤a kujɛ nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni ujɔsɛfu waɓaɓɔna aɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ waɓaz̤i waz̤ɛnz̤a ɔnɡ̤aɓaz̤ijɔ watʰɛtʰa naɓɔ kalukʰuni watʰi kuɓɔ niv̤ɛla pʰi ɓatʰi siv̤ɛla ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan siz̤ɛ kutʰɛnɡ̤a ukuɮa ujɔsɛfu waɓaz̤i aɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ kɛ ɓɔna aɓamnakananɡ̤a wawakʰumɓula ujɔsɛfu amapʰupʰa aɓɛwapʰupʰilɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ watʰi kuɓɔ niz̤iintlɔla niz̤ɛ kuɓɔna uɓuz̤ɛ ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛli ɓatʰi kujɛ haji nkɔsi aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ɓaz̤ɛ kutʰɛnɡ̤a ukuɮa sɔnkɛ sipʰɛla sinɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓamfɔ mɲɛ sijalunɡ̤isa aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ aɓaz̤iz̤ɔ iintlɔla watʰi kuɓɔ haji niz̤ɛ kuɓɔna uɓuz̤ɛ ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛli ɓatʰi aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ɓaliʃumi ɛlinaɓaɓini sijaz̤alana sinɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓamfɔ mɲɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan ujaɓɔna ɔmŋǀinanɛ ukuɓawɔ nam̤la ɔmɲɛ akakʰɔ watʰi ujɔsɛfu kuɓɔ jilɛ ntɔ ɓɛnd̤ijitʰɛtʰa nd̤isitʰi niz̤iintlɔla nija kukǀikid̤wa nɡ̤alɛ nd̤awɔ ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ufarɔ anisaji kupʰuma apʰa ukuɓa akatʰanɡ̤a ɛz̤ɛ apʰa wɛnu ɔmŋǀinanɛ tʰumani ɔmɲɛ apʰa apʰutʰumɛ wɛnu nikʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰wɛ akǀikid̤wɛ amaz̤wi ɛnu ukuɓa ninɛɲanisɔ ukuɓa akuɓanɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤alɔ ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ufarɔ inɛnɛ nɔɓa niz̤iintlɔla waɓanikɛla ɓɔnkɛ ɛluɡ̤ǀ̤inwɛni imiɬa jamitʰatʰu ujɔsɛfu watʰi kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰatʰu jɛnz̤ani ɔku nipʰilɛ kuɓa nd̤ijamɔjika utʰikǁɔ ukuɓa niɲanisilɛ ɔmɲɛ umz̤alwana apʰa makakʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰wɛ ɛnɮwini jɔkuɡ̤ǀ̤inwa kwɛnu nihamɓɛ nijisɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnɮala jɛz̤inɮu z̤ɛnu umninawa wɛnu ɔmŋǀinanɛ nimz̤isɛ ɔkʰɔlɛka kɛ amaz̤wi ɛnu ninɡ̤afi ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ ɓatʰɛtʰa ɔmɲɛ kɔmɲɛ ɓɛsitʰi iɲanisɔ sinɛtʲala nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmninawa wɛtʰu saɓɛ sikuɓɔna nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛka kɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ɔkɔ aɓɛtaxuz̤isa kutʰi asampʰulapʰula kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ lɛ ntɔ kusifikɛlɛjɔ ɔku kuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛka waɓapʰɛnd̤ulu urub̤ɛn ɛsitʰi nd̤aɓɛ nd̤inɡ̤at͡ʃɔ ukutʰi musani ukumɔna anapʰulapʰula jaɓɔnani kɛ iɡ̤az̤i lakʰɛ lijaɓiz̤wa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤az̤i ɓɔna ukuɓa ujɔsɛfu ujɛv̤a kuɓa umkʰumʃi pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ watʰi ɡ̤ukǃukǃu waɓuja wɛz̤a kuɓɔ watʰɛtʰa naɓɔ wamtʰaɓatʰa usimɔn kuɓɔ wamkʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰a ɓɛkʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ wawisa umtʰɛtʰɔ ujɔsɛfu wɔkuɓa z̤iz̤aliswɛ iiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwa z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa jaɓɔ iɓujisɛlwɛ kulɔwɔ nalɔwɔ ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwɛni jakʰɛ ɓanikwɛ nɔmpʰakɔ wɛnɮɛla kwɛnd͡ʒ̤iwa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ kuɓɔ ɓawaɓɔpʰa iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa amaɛsilɛ aɓɔ ɓɛmka kɛ apʰɔ utʰɛ kɛ ɔmɲɛ akujiv̤ula iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwa jakʰɛ ukuɓa apʰɛ iɛsilɛ lakʰɛ iind̤iz̤a apʰɔ ɓalalisa kʰɔna wajiɓɔna jakʰɛ ɛsɛmlɔɲɛni wɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwa jakʰɛ watʰi kuɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ iɓujisiwɛ jam nant͡si ikʰɔ nɔkuɓakʰɔ ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwɛni jam ɓapʰɛla amanɮa ɓakʰanɡ̤ɛlana ɓɛɡ̤ub̤a ɓatʰi jintɔni lɛ ajɛnz̤ilɛjɔ utʰikǁɔ kutʰi ɓafika kujakɔɓi ujisɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan ɓamkǁɛlɛla jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛɓaɬɛlɛjɔ ɓɛsitʰi ind̤ɔd̤a inkɔsi jɛlɔ z̤wɛ jatʰɛtʰa natʰi kalukʰuni jatʰi siz̤iintlɔla z̤ɛlɔ z̤wɛ satʰi kujɔ siɲanisilɛ asiz̤iz̤ɔ iintlɔla sinɡ̤aɓaz̤alwana aɓaliʃumi ɛlinaɓaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓakaɓawɔ ɔmɲɛ akakʰɔ ɔmŋǀinanɛ ukuɓawɔ nam̤la ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ inkɔsi jɛlɔ z̤wɛ jatʰi kutʰi nd̤ija kwaz̤i nɡ̤alɛ nd̤awɔ ukuɓa niɲanisilɛ ʃijani aɓɛ mɲɛ umz̤alwana wɛnu apʰa nipʰatʰɛlɛ iz̤inɮu z̤ɛnu ukuɮa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnɮala nihamɓɛ nimz̤isɛ wɛnu ɔmŋǀinanɛ nd̤iz̤ɛ nd̤az̤i ukuɓa niɲanisilɛ aniz̤iz̤ɔ iintlɔla nd̤imnikɛlɛ umz̤alwana wɛnu nixwɛɓɛ ɛz̤wɛni apʰa kwatʰi ɓakukʰupʰɛla iiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwa z̤aɓɔ ɓaɓɔna isikǃʰuma sɛmali salɔwɔ nalɔwɔ ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwɛni jakʰɛ ɓakuz̤iɓɔna iz̤ikǃʰuma z̤aɓɔ z̤ɛmali ɓɔjika ɓɔna nɔjisɛ watʰi kuɓɔ ujakɔɓi ujisɛ nind̤iɬutʰɛ aɓantwana ujɔsɛfu akakʰɔ usimɔn akakʰɔ niz̤a kutʰaɓatʰa nɔb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin z̤ikʰwɛlɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ watʰi urub̤ɛn kujisɛ ɓaɓulalɛ ɓɔɓaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓam ukuɓa and̤itʰanɡ̤a nd̤imz̤isɛ kuwɛ mnikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni nd̤ɔmɓujisɛla kuwɛ watʰi jɛna uɲana akasaji kuɬa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ufilɛ umkʰuluwa wakʰɛ jɛna usɛlɛ jɛd̤wa ukuɓa utʰɛ waɬɛlwa jinɡ̤ɔz̤i ɛnɮɛlɛni ɛnijihamɓajɔ iz̤imv̤i z̤am nɔz̤itʰɔɓɛla kwɛlaɓafilɛjɔ nd̤inɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤ala inɮala jajinz̤ima kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ kwatʰi ɓakuɓa ɓɛɡ̤ǃ̤iɓilɛ ukujiɮa iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa aɓaɓɛz̤ɛ najɔ ɓɛv̤ɛla ɛjiputa watʰi ujisɛ kuɓɔ ɓujani nijɛ kusitʰɛnɡ̤ɛla jɔkuɮa watʰi ujud̤a kujɛ ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ jakǃɔnɔnɔnd̤isa kutʰi jatʰi aniji kuɓuɓɔna uɓusɔ ɓam ɛnɡ̤aɓanɡ̤akʰɔ wɛnu ukuɓa utʰɛ wamtʰuma wɛtʰu natʰi sɔɬa sijɛ kukutʰɛnɡ̤ɛla ukuɮa ukuɓa akutʰanɡ̤a umtʰumɛ asiji kuɬa kuɓa ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ jatʰi kutʰi aniji kuɓuɓɔna uɓusɔ ɓam ɛnɡ̤aɓanɡ̤akʰɔ wɛnu usirajɛli watʰi jini ukuɓa nind̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ uɓuɓi nijikǁɛlɛlɛ ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ ukutʰi nisɛnɔmninawa ɓatʰi ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ jaɓuz̤a kunɛnɛ nɡ̤atʰi nanɡ̤ɛmiz̤alwana jɛtʰu isitʰi usapʰililɛ ujiɬɔ nisɛnɔmninawa sajikǁɛlɛla nɡ̤ɔkwalɔɔ maz̤wi ɓɛsisaz̤i jini ukuɓa iɓija kutʰi jiɬani nɔmninawa wɛnu ujud̤a watʰi kusirajɛli ujisɛ mtʰumɛ sisukɛ sihamɓɛ sipʰilɛ sinɡ̤afi tʰina nawɛ naɓantwana ɓɛtʰu mna nd̤ija kummɛla wɔmɓiz̤a ɛsanɮɛni ukuɓa and̤itʰanɡ̤a nd̤imz̤isɛ kuwɛ nd̤imɓɛkɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ mand̤iɓɛ nɛtʲala kuwɛ jɔnkɛ imiɬa jam kuɓa ukuɓa ɓɛsinɡ̤az̤ilaz̤ilanɡ̤a inɛnɛ nɡ̤ɛsiɓa nɡ̤ɔku sɛsiɓujɛ ɔkwɛsiɓini usirajɛli ujisɛ watʰi kuɓɔ ukuɓa kund͡ʒ̤alɔ ɔkunɛnɛ jɛnz̤ani kɛ ɔku tʰaɓatʰani kwɛz̤iŋǀɔɲwajɔ iz̤intɔ z̤ɛliz̤wɛ ɛli niz̤ifakɛ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwɛni z̤ɛnu niɬɛ nijisɛlɛ ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ umnikɛlɔ jamafutʰa akǃʰɔliwɛjɔ nɛntwana jɛŋǀind̤i jɔɓusi nɛntlaka ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ nɛntlaka ɛmnand̤i nɛɛnkɔz̤ɔ z̤ɛpistasi nɛɛamanɡ̤ilɛ pʰatʰani ɛɲɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɛnu nalɔɔ jaɓujiswajɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwa z̤ɛnu ɓujani najɔ ɛsanɮɛni sɛnu m̤lawumɓi sisipʰɔsisɔ nɔmninawa wɛnu mtʰaɓatʰɛni nind̤ulukɛ niɓujɛlɛ kwind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ nɡ̤amana utʰikǁɔ usɔmanɮa wanipʰatʰa nɡ̤ɛmfɛsanɛ pʰamɓi kwɛnd̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ ukuɓa inikʰululɛlɛ ɔmɲɛ umz̤alwana wɛnu lɔwɔ nɔb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin mna ukuɓa nd̤iɬutʰiwɛ aɓantwana nd̤iɬutʰiwɛ amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ awutʰaɓatʰa lɔɔ mnikɛlɔ nɛɛmali z̤ɔmɓini az̤ipʰatʰa ɛsanɮɛni sawɔ nɔb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɛɬa aja ɛjiputa ɛma pʰamɓi kɔjɔsɛfu ujɔsɛfu wamɓɔna ub̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɛnaɓɔ watʰi kumpʰatʰi wɛnɮu jakʰɛ wanɡ̤ɛnisɛ lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a ɛnɮwini ukǁʰɛlɛ ulunɡ̤isɛ kuɓa mad̤ɔd̤a aja kuɮa ɛmini ɛnkulu ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ jɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wat͡ʃɔjɔ ujɔsɛfu ind̤ɔd̤a jawanɡ̤ɛnisa amad̤ɔd̤a ɛnɮwini kajɔsɛfu amad̤ɔd̤a ɔjika nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛnɡ̤ɛniswɛ ɛnɮwini kajɔsɛfu atʰi kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛmali ɛjajiɓujisɛlwɛ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwɛni z̤ɛtʰu ɛkukǃalɛni lɛ ntɔ sinɡ̤ɛniswɛ apʰa ukuz̤ɛ aɡ̤alɛlɛkɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu asiwɛlɛ asitʰaɓatʰɛ siɓɛ nɡ̤amakʰɔɓɔka kwanamaɛsilɛ ɛtʰu asɔnd̤ɛla kulɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤a ipʰɛtʰɛ inɮu kajɔsɛfu atʰɛtʰa najɔ ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛnɮu atʰi taxu nkɔsi sɛɬa ɔkunɛnɛ ɛkukǃalɛni sisiz̤a kutʰɛnɡ̤a ukuɮa kwatʰi ɛnd̤awɛni jɔkulalisa saz̤iv̤ula iiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwa z̤ɛtʰu kwav̤ɛla jalɔwɔ nalɔwɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwa jakʰɛ jɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔmlinɡ̤anisɔ wajɔ siɓujɛ najɔ kɛ sijipʰɛtʰɛ nɛɲɛ siɬɛ sɛz̤a najɔ ɛsanɮɛni sɛtʰu ukuɓa sitʰɛnɡ̤ɛ ukuɮa asimaz̤i ɔjifakilɛjɔ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwɛni z̤ɛtʰu jatʰi kǁɔlani ukɔjika utʰikǁɔ wɛnu utʰikǁɔ kajiɬɔ uninikilɛ uɓutʲɛɓi ɛz̤iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwɛni z̤ɛnu jɛnu nd̤ajamkɛla jaɓakʰupʰɛla usimɔn ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ jawanɡ̤ɛnisa amad̤ɔd̤a ɛnɮwini kajɔsɛfu jawanika amanz̤i aɬamɓa iiɲawɔ z̤awɔ jawapʰa iind̤iz̤a amaɛsilɛ awɔ umnikɛlɔ lɔwɔ awulunɡ̤isɛla kukajɔsɛfu ɛmini ɛnkulu kuɓa ɛɓɛv̤ɛ kusitʰiwa aja kuɮa isɔnka kʰɔna wanɡ̤ɛna ujɔsɛfu ɛnɮwini amz̤isɛla ɛnɮwini umnikɛlɔ ɔɓusɛsanɮɛni sawɔ akǃuɓud̤a kujɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni wawaɓuz̤a ukupʰila kwawɔ watʰi ujiɬɔ usapʰililɛ ikǁʰɛɡ̤ɔ ɛnanitʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤alɔ usaɮa uɓɔmi atʰi usapʰililɛ uɓawɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ usaɮa uɓɔmi ɓatʰɔɓa ɓakǃuɓud̤a wawapʰakamisa amɛɬɔ akʰɛ wamɓɔna ub̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin wakʰɛ watʰi nɡ̤ujɛ lɔ wɛnu ɔmŋǀinanɛ ɛniɓɛ nitʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ajɛ watʰi nɡ̤amana utʰikǁɔ wakuɓaɓala ɲana wakʰawulɛz̤a ujɔsɛfu kuɓa jimfɛsanɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmninawa wakʰɛ ind̤awɔ anɡ̤alilɛla kujɔ wanɡ̤ɛna ɛnɡ̤ɔnt͡sini kʰɔna waz̤a waɬamɓa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ wapʰuma ɛz̤iɓamɓilɛ watʰi ɓɛkani isɔnka ɓamɓɛkɛla jɛd̤wa ɓaɓaɓɛkɛla ɓɔd̤wa ɓɔna ɓawaɓɛkɛla ɔd̤wa amajiputa aɓɛsiɮa najɛ kuɓa amajiputa akanakuɮa sɔnka namahɛb̤ɛrɛ kuɓa lisikiz̤i ɛlɔ kumajiputa b̤alala pʰant͡si pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔɓuz̤iɓulɔ ɓakʰɛ ɔmŋǀinanɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔɓuŋǀinanɛ ɓakʰɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akʰanɡ̤ɛlana ɛtʰɛ manɡ̤a asɛlwa iz̤aɓɛlɔ ɛz̤isuka pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ kɛ isaɓɛlɔ sikab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin saɓa sikʰulu kaɬanu kwiz̤aɓɛlɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓasɛla ɓaɓa mnand̤i ɓɛnajɛ wamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ umpʰatʰi wɛnɮu ɛsitʰi z̤iz̤alisɛ iiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwa z̤ala mad̤ɔd̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɮa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ z̤inakɔ ukukʰɔnɡ̤ɔz̤ɛla ujiɓɛkɛ jalɔwɔ nalɔwɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwa jakʰɛ ujiɓɛkɛ ind̤ɛɓɛ jam ind̤ɛɓɛ jɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwa jɔmŋǀinanɛ nɛmali jɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa jakʰɛ wɛnz̤a kɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likajɔsɛfu aɓɛlitʰɛtʰilɛ kwakutʰi kǃʰipʰu and̤ululwa lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a wɔna namaɛsilɛ awɔ akuɓɔna ukuɓa apʰumilɛ ɛmz̤ini ɛnɡ̤ɛkaji kud̤ɛ watʰi ujɔsɛfu kumpʰatʰi wɛnɮu jakʰɛ suka uwasukɛlɛ mad̤ɔd̤a uz̤ɛ utʰi kuwɔ jini ukuɓa nipʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓi lɛ ntɔ asijilɛ inkɔsi jam isɛla nɡ̤ajɔ iɬaɓɛ nɛz̤iɬaɓɔ nɡ̤ajɔ jintɔ ɛmɓi lɛ ntɔ nijɛnz̤ilɛjɔ wawafumana watʰɛtʰa kuwɔ lɔɔ maz̤wi atʰi kujɛ jini ukuɓa inkɔsi jam itʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkwalɔɔ maz̤wi makuɓɛ lɛɛ kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ukwɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛlɔ liz̤wi ujaɓɔna ɛsajifumanajɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwa z̤ɛtʰu sajiɓujisɛla kuwɛ siv̤ɛla ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan sinɡ̤atʰini kɛ ukuɓa ɛnɮwini jɛnkɔsi jakʰɔ isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɔkuɓa jiɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɔsukuɓa ifuɲɛnwɛ kujɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ makafɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ tʰina siɓɛ nɡ̤amakʰɔɓɔka ɛnkɔsini jam watʰi makuɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwamaz̤wi ɛnu kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ ɔsukuɓa ifuɲɛnwɛ kujɛ wɔɓa sisikǀaka kɛ nɔɓa ɓakʰawulɛz̤a ɓatʰula ɛlɔwɔ iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwa jakʰɛ ɓajiɓɛka ɛm̤laɓɛni ɓav̤ula ɛlɔwɔ iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwa jakʰɛ waɡ̤ǃ̤utʰaɡ̤ǃ̤utʰa ɛkǃalɛla kɔmkʰulu ɛɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla kɔmŋǀinanɛ jafuɲanwa ind̤ɛɓɛ ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwɛni kab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɓaz̤ik͡xaz̤ula iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓaɓɔpʰa ɛlɔwɔ iɛsilɛ lakʰɛ ɓaɓujɛla kulɔɔ mz̤i wafika ujud̤a naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ɛnɮwini kajɔsɛfu uɓɛsɛkʰɔna jɛna ɓawa pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni ujɔsɛfu watʰi kuɓɔ sisɛnz̤ɔ ɛsi nisɛnz̤ilɛjɔ ɓɛninɡ̤az̤i ukuɓa ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤am nd͡ʒ̤ɛ iɓinɡ̤aɬaɓa iz̤iɬaɓɔ ujud̤a watʰi sija kutʰini ɛnkɔsini jam sija kutʰɛtʰa ntɔni sija kuz̤iɬamɓa nd͡ʒ̤ani utʰikǁɔ uɓufumɛnɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ jaɓɔna sinɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛnkɔsi jam tʰina aɓa nalɔwa ind̤ɛɓɛ ifuɲɛnwɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ watʰi makuɓɛ lɛɛ ukwɛnz̤a lɔɔ ntɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛfuɲɛnwɛ ɛsanɮɛni sajɔ ind̤ɛɓɛ jijɔ ɛja kuɓa sisikǀaka kɛ ɲukani nikǁɔlilɛ nijɛ kujiɬɔ ujud̤a wasɔnd̤ɛla kujɛ watʰi taxu nkɔsi jam makʰɛ atʰɛtʰɛ iliz̤wi umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤inkɔsi jam mawunɡ̤av̤utʰi umsind̤ɔ wakʰɔ nɡ̤akumkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɡ̤anɡ̤ɔfarɔ wɛna jaɓaɓuz̤a inkɔsi jam aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓajɔ isitʰi ninɔjiɬɔ ninɔmninawa satʰi tʰina ɛnkɔsini jam sinɔɓawɔ ikǁʰɛɡ̤ɔ nɔmntwana wɔɓukǁʰɛɡ̤ɔ ɓakʰɛ ɔmŋǀinanɛ umkʰuluwa wakʰɛ jɛna usɛlɛ jɛd̤wa ujisɛ ujamtʰand̤a watʰi kɛ wɛna kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ jiɬani najɛ ɛz̤ɛ nd̤iwamisɛ amɛɬɔ kujɛ satʰi tʰina kwinkɔsi jam umfana lɔwɔ akanakɔ ukumʃija ujisɛ ɛmʃijilɛ ujisɛ anɡ̤afa watʰi wɛna kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ukuɓa wɛnu ɔmŋǀinanɛ akatʰanɡ̤a ɛɬɛ aniji kuɓuja niɓuɓɔnɛ uɓusɔ ɓam kwatʰi kǁɛnikwɛni sɛɲukajɔ saja kumkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ɔnɡ̤uɓawɔ samkǁɛlɛla amaz̤wi ɛnkɔsi jam watʰi uɓawɔ ɓujani nijɛ kusitʰɛnɡ̤ɛla jɔkuɮa satʰi asinakuɬa ukuɓa wɛtʰu ɔmŋǀinanɛ unatʰi sɔɬa kuɓa asinakuɓuɓɔna uɓusɔ ɓɛnd̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛnatʰi wɛtʰu ɔmŋǀinanɛ watʰi uɓawɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ kutʰi nijaz̤i ukuɓa wand̤iz̤alɛla ɔɔɲana aɓaɓini ɔmɲɛ wapʰuma nd̤atʰi inɛnɛ ukǃwɛnɡ̤iwɛ and̤imɓɔnanɡ̤a unanɡ̤ɔku nimtʰaɓatʰa nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nalɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓam ɛtʰɛ waɬɛlwa jinɡ̤ɔz̤i nɔz̤iɬisɛla iz̤imv̤i z̤am z̤inɔɓuɓi kwɛlaɓafilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤afikɛ kuɓawɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛnatʰi umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ uɓɔt͡ʃwɛ nɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ kɔtʰi akuɓɔna ukuɓa akakʰɔ afɛ naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ɓaɬisɛ iz̤imv̤i z̤ɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ uɓawɔ ɛnɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤ala z̤ijɛ kwɛlaɓafilɛjɔ kuɓa umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ wammɛla lɔwɔ kuɓawɔ nd̤isitʰi ukuɓa and̤itʰanɡ̤a nd̤imz̤isɛ kuwɛ nd̤ɔɓa nɛtʲala kuɓawɔ jɔnkɛ imiɬa jam nɡ̤ɔkɔ makaɬalɛ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɔmfana nd̤iɓɛ likʰɔɓɔka ɛnkɔsini jam aɲukɛ naɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ kuɓa nd̤inɡ̤atʰini ukuɲuka nd̤ijɛ kuɓawɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛnam ɬɛz̤ɛ nd̤iɓuɓɔnɛ uɓuɓi ɔɓɔmfumana uɓawɔ ujɔsɛfu akaɓanɡ̤a nakuz̤iɓamɓa pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛmi nɡ̤akujɛ wad̤and̤uluka watʰi kʰupʰani ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓɛmkɛ akwaɓakʰɔ nɡ̤akujɛ ɛkuz̤az̤isɛni kukajɔsɛfu kuɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ wasiɓɛka isililɔ ɛv̤a amajiputa jɛv̤a nɛnɮu kafarɔ watʰi ujɔsɛfu kuɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ nd̤inɡ̤ujɔsɛfu usapʰililɛ uɓawɔ aɓaɓa nakɔ ukumpʰɛnd̤ula aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ kuɓa ɓakʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰iswa pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ watʰi ujɔsɛfu kuɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ kʰanisɔnd̤ɛlɛ apʰa ɓasɔnd̤ɛla watʰi nd̤inɡ̤ujɔsɛfu umz̤alwana wɛnu ɛnatʰɛnɡ̤isajɔ nɡ̤ajɛ ɛjiputa nɡ̤ɔkɔ ukuɓa ɓuɬunɡ̤u ninɡ̤az̤ikǃumɓɛli ukuɓa natʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤am apʰa kuɓa utʰikǁɔ wand̤itʰuma pʰamɓi kwɛnu ukuz̤ɛ nd̤isind̤isɛ aɓantu kuɓa nɡ̤ɔku imiɲaka miɓini inɮala ikʰɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛliz̤wɛ isɛmiɬanu imiɲaka ɛz̤ajɔ ɛkunɡ̤aji kuɓakʰɔ nakuv̤una nɡ̤ajɔ utʰikǁɔ und̤itʰumɛ pʰamɓi kwɛnu ukuɓa nd̤inimisɛlɛ amasalɛla ɛz̤wɛni ukuɓa nd̤isind̤isɛ uɓɔmi ɓɛnu iɓɛ kukusind̤a ɔkukʰulu nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ aɓand̤itʰumɛ apʰa nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wand̤ɛnz̤a ujisɛ kufarɔ nɛnkɔsi pʰɛz̤u kwajɔ jɔnkɛ inɮu jakʰɛ nɔmlawuli ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lasɛjiputa kʰawulɛz̤ani niɲukɛ nijɛ kuɓawɔ nitʰi kujɛ ut͡ʃɔ uɲana wakʰɔ ujɔsɛfu ukutʰi utʰikǁɔ und̤ɛnz̤ɛ inkɔsi kujɔ jɔnkɛ ijiputa jiɬa uz̤ɛ ukuliɓala wɔɬala ɛz̤wɛni lasɛɡ̤ɔʃɛn uɓɛ kufupʰi wɛna nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nɔɔɲana ɓɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nɛmpaɬa jakʰɔ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤akʰɔ nɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɔnaz̤ɔ nd̤ikɔnɮɛ kʰɔna kuɓa isaja kuɓa miɬanu imiɲaka jɛnɮala ɬɛz̤ɛ uɬwɛmpuz̤ɛkɛ wɛna nɛnɮu jakʰɔ nɛntɔ jɔnkɛ ɔnajɔ jaɓɔnani amɛɬɔ ɛnu ajaɓɔna namɛɬɔ ɔmninawa ub̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ukuɓa nɡ̤umlɔmɔ lɔ utʰɛtʰajɔ niz̤ɛ nimkǁɛlɛlɛ uɓawɔ lɔnkɛ uz̤ukɔ ɛjiputa nɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛniz̤iɓɔnilɛjɔ nikʰawulɛz̤ɛ niɬɛ nɔɓawɔ ɛz̤ɛ apʰa wawa ɛntaɲɛni kab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin wakʰɛ ub̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɛntaɲɛni jakʰɛ waɓanɡ̤a ɓɔnkɛ aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ɓatʰɛtʰa najɛ lav̤akala iz̤wi ɛnɮwini kafarɔ lisitʰi ɓafikɛlɛ aɓaz̤alwana ɓakajɔsɛfu kwalunɡ̤a ɔkɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni kafarɔ nasɛmɛɬwɛni aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ watʰi ufarɔ kujɔsɛfu jitʰi kuɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɔ jɛnz̤ani ɔku ɓɔpʰani amakǃɛɡ̤u ɛnu nihamɓɛ nijɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan nitʰaɓatʰɛ ujiɬɔ nɛz̤inɮu z̤ɛnu nisɛ apʰa nd̤ɔninika iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ z̤ɛliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa niɮɛ ukutʲɛɓa kwɛliz̤wɛ wɛna kɛ uwisɛlwɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ jɛnz̤ani ɔku ɓatʰaɓatʰɛlɛni aɓantwana ɓɛnu naɓafaz̤i ɓɛnu iiŋǃwɛlɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nitʰwalɛ ujiɬɔ niz̤ɛ ilisɔ lɛnu malinɡ̤aɓi naŋǀɛɓa ɛmpaɬɛni jɛnu kuɓa z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ z̤ɛliz̤wɛ lɔnkɛ lasɛjiputa z̤ɛz̤ɛnu ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ujɔsɛfu waɓanika iiŋǃwɛlɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔmtʰɛtʰɔ kafarɔ waɓanika nɔmpʰakɔ wɛnɮɛla waɓanika ɓɔnkɛ ɛlɔwɔ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɔkukʰululana wamnika ub̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin iisiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛz̤imakʰulu matʰatʰu nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤intlanu z̤ɔkukʰululana kujisɛ watʰumɛla ɛz̤ilɔlu ɬɔɓɔ amaɛsilɛ aliʃumi ɛtʰwɛlɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ z̤asɛjiputa nɛɛmaz̤i z̤amaɛsilɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi z̤itʰwɛlɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛsɔnka nɔmpʰakɔ kajisɛ wɛnɮɛla waɓand̤ulula kɛ aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ɓahamɓa watʰi kuɓɔ iz̤ɛ ninɡ̤akǁaɓani ɛnɮɛlɛni ɓɛɲuka ɓɛmkɛ kɛ ɛjiputa ɓafika ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan kujakɔɓi ujisɛ ɓamkǁɛlɛla ɓɛsitʰi ujɔsɛfu usaɬɛli ɛwɛ unɡ̤umpʰatʰi wɛliz̤wɛ lɔnkɛ lasɛjiputa jakǃɔɓa intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ kuɓa ɛɓɛnɡ̤akʰɔlwa nɡ̤aɓɔ ɓawatʰɛtʰa kujɛ ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi kajɔsɛfu aɓɛwatʰɛtʰilɛ kuɓɔ waz̤iɓɔna iiŋǃwɛlɔ aɓɛz̤itʰumɛlɛ ujɔsɛfu ukuɓa z̤imtʰwalɛ waz̤a wapʰila umɔja kajakɔɓi ujisɛ watʰi usirajɛli kwanɛlɛ ujɔsɛfu uɲana usaɬɛli nd̤ija kuja nd̤imɓɔnɛ nd̤inɡ̤ɛkafi wand̤uluka kɛ usirajɛli nɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ aɓɛnaz̤ɔ ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a waɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ kutʰikǁɔ kajisɛ uisakɛ watʰɛtʰa utʰikǁɔ kusirajɛli ɛmiɓɔnwɛni jɔɓusuku watʰi jakɔɓi jakɔɓi watʰi jɛna nd̤ilapʰa watʰi nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjiɬɔ ukɔjika ukuɬa ujɛ ɛjiputa kuɓa nd̤ija kukwɛnz̤a uɬanɡ̤a ɔlukʰulu kʰɔna mna nd̤ija kuɬa nd̤ijɛ nawɛ ɛjiputa nd̤iɲukɛ nɔkuɲuka nawɛ ujɔsɛfu asiɓɛkɛ isanɮa sakʰɛ pʰɛz̤u kwamɛɬɔ akʰɔ wɛsuka ujakɔɓi ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓamtʰwala ujakɔɓi ujisɛ naɓantwana ɓaɓɔ naɓafaz̤i ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ ɛɓɛz̤itʰuɲɛlwɛ nɡ̤ufarɔ ukuɓa z̤imtʰwalɛ ɓajitʰaɓatʰa imfujɔ jaɓɔ nɛŋ̤ǃ̤wɛɓɔ jaɓɔ aɓaɓɛjikǃwɛɓilɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan ɓafika ɛjiputa ujakɔɓi nɛmɓɛwu jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ najɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nɔɔɲana ɓɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ najɛ iintɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nɛmɓɛwu jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ wɛz̤a najɔ ɛjiputa nɡ̤awɔ amaɡ̤ama ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓafikajɔ ɛjiputa ujakɔɓi nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ amaz̤iɓulɔ kajakɔɓi nɡ̤urub̤ɛn ɔɔɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn nɡ̤uhanɔki nɔfalu nɔhɛt͡sɛrɔn nɔkarmi ɔɔɲana ɓakasimɔn nɡ̤ujɛmuwɛli nɔjamin nɔɔhad̤i nɔjakin nɔt͡sɔharɛ nɔsawulɛ uɲana wɔmkananɛkaz̤i ɔɔɲana ɓakalɛv̤i nɡ̤uɡ̤ɛrʃɔn nɔkɛhati nɔmɛrari ɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a nɡ̤uɛrɛ nɔɔnan nɔʃɛla nɔpɛrɛt͡sɛ nɔz̤ɛra kɛ ɔɔɛrɛ nɔɔnan ɓafɛla ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan ɔɔɲana ɓakapɛrɛt͡sɛ nɡ̤uhɛt͡sɛrɔn nɔhamuli ɔɔɲana ɓakaisakarɛ nɡ̤utɔla nɔpuwa nɔjɔb̤i nɔʃimrɔn ɔɔɲana ɓakaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn nɡ̤uz̤ɛrɛd̤ɛ nɔɛlɔni nɔjalɛli nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakalɛja awaɓaz̤alɛla ujakɔɓi ɛpad̤anaram nɔd̤ina intɔmɓi jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ jɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nɛjɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ inɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu anamitʰatʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ad̤i nɡ̤ut͡sifijɔn nɔhaɡ̤i nɔʃuni nɔɛt͡sɛb̤ɔn nɔɛri nɔarɔd̤i nɔarɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakaaʃɛrɛ nɡ̤uimna nɔiʃwa nɔiʃv̤i nɔb̤ɛrija nɔsɛra ud̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛrija nɡ̤uɛb̤ɛrɛ nɔmalɛkijɛli nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaz̤ilipa awatʰi ulab̤an ulɛja intɔmɓi jakʰɛ aɓɔ waɓaz̤alɛla ujakɔɓi imipʰɛfumlɔ ɛliʃumi ɛlinamitʰand̤atʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakarakɛli umkajakɔɓi nɡ̤ujɔsɛfu nɔb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin waz̤ala kɛ ujɔsɛfu ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa umanasɛ nɔɛfrajim awamz̤alɛla ɓɔna uaz̤ɛnati intɔmɓi kapɔtifɛra umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wasɛɔn ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤ub̤ɛla nɔb̤ɛkɛrɛ nɔaʃb̤ɛlɛ nɔɡ̤ɛra nɔnahaman nɔɛhi nɔrɔʃɛ nɔmupim nɔhupim nɔard̤i nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakarakɛli aɓaz̤alɛlwa ujakɔɓi ijɔnkɛ jimipʰɛfumlɔ ɛliʃumi ɛlinaminɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakad̤an nɡ̤uhuʃim ɔɔɲana ɓakanafɛtali nɡ̤ujat͡sɛli nɔɡ̤uni nɔjɛt͡sɛrɛ nɔʃilɛm nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤iliha awatʰi ulab̤an urakɛli intɔmɓi jakʰɛ aɓɔ waɓaz̤alɛla ujakɔɓi ijɔnkɛ jimipʰɛfumlɔ ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ijɔnkɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ ɛjaja nɔjakɔɓi ɛjiputa ɛjapʰuma ɛsiŋǃɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwaɓafaz̤i ɓɔɔɲana ɓakajakɔɓi ijɔnkɛ jimipʰɛfumlɔ ɛmaʃumi matʰand̤atʰu anamitʰand̤atʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakajɔsɛfu awaɓaz̤alɛlwa ɛjiputa jimipʰɛfumlɔ ɛmiɓini ijɔnkɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ jɛnɮu kajakɔɓi ɛjaja ɛjiputa iɓimaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wasusa ujud̤a ukuɓa amand̤ulɛlɛ ajɛ kujɔsɛfu amɓɔnisɛ inɮɛla ɛja ɛɡ̤ɔʃɛn ɓafika kɛ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛɡ̤ɔʃɛn ujɔsɛfu wajiɓɔpʰa iŋǃwɛlɔ jakʰɛ wɛɲuka waja kumkʰawulɛla usirajɛli ujisɛ ɛɡ̤ɔʃɛn ɓatʰɛ ɓakuɓɔnana ɛntaɲɛni jakʰɛ
