umz̤uz̤u ɔmkʰulu ɛntaɲɛni jakʰɛ watʰi usirajɛli kujɔsɛfu nd̤iɓuɓɔnilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ ukuɓa usaɬɛli mand̤ifɛ nɡ̤ɔku watʰi ujɔsɛfu kuɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ nakwinɮu kajisɛ nd̤ija kuɲuka nd̤ijɛ kuɓika kufarɔ nd̤itʰi kujɛ aɓaz̤alwana ɓam nɛnɮu kaɓawɔ aɓaɓɛsɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan ɓafikilɛ kund͡ʒ̤alɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ mad̤ɔd̤a nɡ̤aɓalusi ɓɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ kuɓa nɡ̤aɓafuji impaɬa jawɔ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤awɔ nɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ananz̤ɔ az̤ɛ naz̤ɔ kǁa atʰɛ waniɓiz̤a ufarɔ watʰi ujintɔni umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛnu nɔtʰi aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤aɓafuji ɓɛmpaɬa kwasɛɓuŋǀinanɛni ɓɛtʰu unanɡ̤ɔku tʰina aɓa nɔɔɓawɔ ɓɛtʰu ukuz̤ɛ nimɛ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛɡ̤ɔʃɛn kuɓa ɓɔnkɛ aɓalusi ɓɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ ɓalisikiz̤i kumajiputa ujɔsɛfu waja kumɓikɛla ufarɔ watʰi ufikilɛ uɓawɔ naɓaz̤alwana ɓam nɛmpaɬa jaɓɔ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤aɓɔ nɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ aɓanaz̤ɔ ɓɛv̤ɛla ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan naɓɔ ɓɛsɛz̤wɛni lasɛɡ̤ɔʃɛn wakʰɛtʰa kuɓɔ aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amaɬanu pʰamɓi kɔfarɔ watʰi ufarɔ kuɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ujintɔni umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛnu ɓatʰi kufarɔ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤aɓafuji ɓɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ tʰina aɓa kwanɔɔɓawɔ ɓɛtʰu ɓaɓuja ɓatʰi kufarɔ sipʰamɓukɛlɛ kwɛli liz̤wɛ kuɓa akukʰɔ tʲani ɓampaɬa imfut͡ʃanɛ aɓanajɔ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ kuɓa inz̤ima inɮala ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ maɓakʰɛ ɓaɬalɛ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛɡ̤ɔʃɛn aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ watʰɛtʰa ufarɔ kujɔsɛfu watʰi ujiɬɔ naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɔ ɓafikilɛ kuwɛ iliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa lipʰamɓi kwakʰɔ ujiɬɔ naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɔ ɓaɬalisɛ kwɛjɔna nd̤awɔ intlɛ jɛliz̤wɛ maɓaɬalɛ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛɡ̤ɔʃɛn ukuɓa ujaz̤i ukuɓa kukʰɔ kuwɔ amad̤ɔd̤a az̤iinkuŋ̰ǃ̰ɛlɛ ɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini wamisɛ aɓɛ nɡ̤aɓapʰatʰi ɓɛmfujɔ ɛnd̤inajɔ ujɔsɛfu wamnɡ̤ɛnisa ujakɔɓi ujisɛ pʰamɓi kɔfarɔ ujakɔɓi wamsikɛlɛla ufarɔ ufarɔ watʰi kujakɔɓi minɡ̤apʰi imiɲaka jɔɓud̤ala ɓakʰɔ watʰi ujakɔɓi kufarɔ imiɬa jɛmiɲaka jɔkuɓa lund̤wɛnd̤wɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni jimiɲaka ɛlikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi matʰatʰu imɓalwa imiɓi imiɬa jɛmiɲaka jɔɓud̤ala ɓam ajifikanɡ̤a ɛmiɬɛni jɛmiɲaka jɔɓud̤ala ɓɔɔɓawɔ ɛmiɬɛni jɔkuɓa lund̤wɛnd̤wɛ kwaɓɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni ujakɔɓi wamsikɛla kɛ ufarɔ wapʰuma wɛmka ɛɓuswɛni ɓukafarɔ ujɔsɛfu wamɓɛka ujisɛ naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa waɓanika ind̤awɔ jɔkuma kwɛjɔna nd̤awɔ intlɛ jɛliz̤wɛ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛramɛsɛs nɡ̤ɔkɔmtʰɛtʰɔ kafarɔ ujɔsɛfu wamɔnɮa ujisɛ naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ nɛnɮu jɔnkɛ kajisɛ nɡ̤ɛsɔnka nɡ̤anɡ̤ɔkuswɛla kɔsapʰɔ lwaɓɔ ɓɛkunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ kuɮa kulɔ lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ kuɓa iɓinz̤ima kunɛnɛ inɮala iliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa nɛliz̤wɛ lakwakanan lapʰɛlɛlwa nɡ̤amanɮa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnɮala wajiɬanɡ̤anisa ujɔsɛfu jɔnkɛ ɛjafuɲanwajɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nasɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan jɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa aɓaɓɛjitʰɛnɡ̤a wajinɡ̤ɛnisa ujɔsɛfu ɛnɮwini kafarɔ japʰɛla ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nasɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan ɔnkɛ amajiputa ɛz̤a kujɔsɛfu ɛsitʰi sinikɛ ukuɮa jini ukuɓa sifɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ kuɓa ipʰɛlilɛ watʰi ujɔsɛfu xɔlani imfujɔ jɛnu nd̤ɔninika nɡ̤ɛmfujɔ jɛnu ukuɓa ipʰɛlilɛ ajiz̤isa imfujɔ jawɔ kujɔsɛfu ujɔsɛfu ukuɮa nɡ̤amahaʃɛ nanɡ̤ɛmfujɔ ɛjimpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nanɡ̤ɛmfujɔ ɛz̤iinkɔmɔ nanɡ̤amaɛsilɛ wawapʰa ukuɮa ɛnd̤awɛni jajɔ jɔnkɛ imfujɔ jawɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ mɲaka wapʰɛla kɛ lɔɔ mɲaka ɛz̤a kujɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsiɓini atʰi kujɛ asinakukufiɬa ɛnkɔsini jam ukuɓa nɛmfujɔ ɛz̤iinkɔmɔ ipʰɛlɛlɛ ɛnkɔsini jam akusalanɡ̤a ntɔ kutʰi pʰamɓi kwɛnkɔsi jam jimiz̤imɓa jɛtʰu nimiɬaɓa jɛtʰu jɔd̤wa kupʰɛla jini ukuɓa sifɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ tʰina aɓa nɔm̤laɓa wɛtʰu sitʰɛnɡ̤ɛ tʰina nɔm̤laɓa wɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɮa ukuz̤ɛ tʰina nɔm̤laɓa wɛtʰu siɓɛ nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakafarɔ sinikɛ imɓɛwu ukuz̤ɛ sipʰilɛ sinɡ̤afi kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala ujɔsɛfu wawutʰɛnɡ̤ɛla ufarɔ wɔnkɛ um̤laɓa wasɛjiputa kuɓa amajiputa atʰɛnɡ̤isa ɛlɔwɔ nɡ̤ɛnt͡simi jakʰɛ kuɓa inɮala jaɓɛ inz̤ima pʰɛz̤u kwawɔ um̤laɓa kɛ waɓa nɡ̤ɔkafarɔ aɓantu waɓafud̤usɛla ɛmiz̤ini kwatʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkupʰɛlɛni kɔmɲɛ umd̤a wasɛjiputa kwɛsa ɛkupʰɛlɛni kɔmɲɛ nɡ̤um̤laɓa waɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wɔd̤wa anɡ̤awutʰɛnɡ̤anɡ̤a kuɓa aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓaɓɛnɛsaɓɛlɔ aɓasimisɛlwɛjɔ ɛsiv̤ɛla kufarɔ ɓɛsiɮa isaɓɛlɔ ɛsɔ simisɛlwɛjɔ ɓaɓɛsinikwɛ nɡ̤ufarɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ɓɔna aɓatʰɛnɡ̤isanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔm̤laɓa waɓɔ watʰi ujɔsɛfu ɛɓantwini jaɓɔnani nam̤la nɔm̤laɓa wɛnu nd̤initʰɛnɡ̤ɛlɛ ufarɔ nant͡si kɛ imɓɛwu jɛnu ɬwajɛlani um̤laɓa nɔtʰi kwintɔ ɛnijiz̤uz̤ilɛjɔ nimnikɛ ufarɔ ɛsɛsiɬanu isaɬulɔ ɛz̤inɛ iz̤aɬulɔ z̤iɓɛ z̤ɛz̤ɛnu z̤iɓɛ jimɓɛwu jɛnt͡simi nɛz̤ɔkuɮiwa nanɡ̤aɓasɛz̤inɮwini z̤ɛnu nɛz̤ɔkuɮiwa lusapʰɔ lwɛnu ɓatʰi usisind̤isilɛ majisiɓaɓalɛ inkɔsi jam sɔɓa nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i kufarɔ ujɔsɛfu wajimisa lɔɔ ntɔ jaɓa nɡ̤ummisɛlɔ unanam̤la pʰɛz̤u kɔm̤laɓa wasɛjiputa ukuɓa ɛsɛsiɬanu isaɬulɔ siɓɛ sɛsikafarɔ nɡ̤um̤laɓa waɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wɔd̤wa ɔnɡ̤aɓanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkafarɔ waɬala usirajɛli ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa ɛz̤wɛni lasɛɡ̤ɔʃɛn ɓakǃinisɛka kʰɔna ɓakǃʰama ɓand̤a kunɛnɛ ujakɔɓi waɮa uɓɔmi ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa imiɲaka ɛliʃumi ɛlinɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ imiɬa kajakɔɓi imiɲaka jɔɓud̤ala ɓakʰɛ jaɓa jimiɲaka ɛlikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi amanɛ anɛmiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ jasɔnd̤ɛla imiɬa kasirajɛli jɔkuɓa afɛ waɓiz̤a uɲana wakʰɛ ujɔsɛfu watʰi kujɛ ukuɓa kalɔku nd̤iɓaɓalwɛ nɡ̤uwɛ kʰawuɓɛkɛ isanɮa sakʰɔ pʰant͡si kwɛtʰanɡ̤a und̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ iŋǀɛɓa nɛɲanisɔ uz̤ɛ unɡ̤akʰɛ und̤iŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛ ɛjiputa kɛ nd̤ija kɔɔɓawɔ uz̤ɛ und̤isusɛ ɛjiputa und̤iŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni laɓɔ watʰi kɛ jɛna nd̤ija kwɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi lakʰɔ watʰi funɡ̤a wafunɡ̤a kɛ wakǃuɓud̤a usirajɛli pʰɛz̤u kwɛntlɔkɔ jɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlɔ kwatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kwɛz̤i z̤intɔ kwatʰiwa kujɔsɛfu ujaɓɔna ujiɬɔ ujafa watʰaɓatʰa ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓɔɓaɓini umanasɛ nɔɛfrajim ɓahamɓa najɛ wakǁɛlɛlwa ujakɔɓi kwatʰiwa nanku uɲana wakʰɔ ujɔsɛfu ɛsiz̤a kuwɛ waz̤ɔmɛlɛz̤a usirajɛli wav̤uka waɬala ɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlwɛni ujakɔɓi watʰi ujɔsɛfu utʰikǁɔ usɔmanɮa waɓɔnakala nd̤isɛluz̤i ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan wand̤isikɛlɛla watʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ija kukukǃʰamisa nd̤ikwand̤isɛ nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ isikʰunɡ̤u sɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɛli liz̤wɛ nd̤ilinikɛ imɓɛwu jakʰɔ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɔ liɓɛ lɛlakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ aɓaɓini ɔwaɓaz̤alɛlwajɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nd̤inɡ̤ɛkafiki kuwɛ ɛjiputa nɡ̤aɓam uɛfrajim nɔmanasɛ ɓaja kuɓa nɡ̤aɓam nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔrub̤ɛn nɔsimɔn kɛ ɔtʰɛ waɓaz̤ala ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ ɓaja kuɓa nɡ̤aɓakʰɔ ɓaja kuɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɔkwɛɡ̤ama laɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ ɛlifɛni laɓɔ ɛkumkɛni ɛpad̤an nd̤afɛlwa nɡ̤urakɛli ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan ɛnɮɛlɛni nd̤akuɓɔna ukuɓa nd̤imɡ̤aɲana ukuz̤ɛ kufikwɛ ɛɛfrata nd̤amŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla kʰɔna ɛnɮɛlɛni jasɛɛfrata ɛjib̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm usirajɛli waɓaɓɔna ɔɔɲana ɓakajɔsɛfu watʰi nɡ̤ɔɔɓani aɓa watʰi ujɔsɛfu kujisɛ nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓam ɛnd̤iɓapʰiwɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ apʰa watʰi jɛna kʰawuɓasɔnd̤ɛz̤ɛ nd̤iɓasikɛlɛlɛ kɛ amɛɬɔ kasirajɛli ajɛsɛlɛnɔxatʲaz̤ɔ kukwalupʰala ɛnɡ̤asaɓɔni waɓasɔnd̤ɛz̤a kɛ kujɛ waɓanɡ̤a waɓawɔla usirajɛli watʰi ujɔsɛfu ukuɓɔna uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤asakukǀinɡ̤i utʰikǁɔ ɛnd̤iɓɔnisɛ nɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ ujɔsɛfu waɓakʰupʰa pʰakatʰi kwamad̤ɔlɔ akʰɛ wakǃuɓud̤a nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni ujɔsɛfu waɓatʰaɓatʰa ɓɔɓaɓini uɛfrajim nɡ̤ɛsɔkunɛnɛ kwɛsasɛkʰɔɬɔ sikasirajɛli nɔmanasɛ nɡ̤ɛsɔkʰɔɬɔ kwɛsɔkunɛnɛ sikasirajɛli waɓasɔnd̤ɛz̤a kujɛ usirajɛli wasɔlula ɛsɔkunɛnɛ sakʰɛ wasiɓɛka ɛntlɔkɔ kuɛfrajim ɛnɡ̤ɔmŋǀinanɛ nɛsɔkʰɔɬɔ sakʰɛ ɛntlɔkɔ kumanasɛ ɛz̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umanasɛ ɛɓɛnɡ̤ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ wamsikɛlɛla ujɔsɛfu watʰi nɡ̤amana utʰikǁɔ aɓahamɓa pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ ɔɔɓawɔ uaɓraham nɔisakɛ ɔwand̤ɔnɮa kwasɛkuv̤ɛlɛni kwad̤a kwanam̤la ɔsisitʰuɲwa ɛsind̤ikʰululɛjɔ ɛɓuɓini ɓɔnkɛ anɡ̤aɓasikɛlɛla aɓafana litʰi iɡ̤ama nɛɡ̤ama lɔɔɓawɔ liɓiz̤wɛ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ uaɓraham nɔisakɛ ɓand̤ɛ ɓaɓɛ ɓaninz̤i ɛɬaɓatʰini waɓɔna ujɔsɛfu ukuɓa ujisɛ usiɓɛkɛ isanɮa sakʰɛ sɔkunɛnɛ ɛntlɔkɔ kuɛfrajim kwakuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ wasiɓamɓa isanɮa sikajisɛ wasiʃɛŋǁisa ɛntlɔkwɛni kaɛfrajim ɛsisa ɛntlɔkwɛni kamanasɛ watʰi ujɔsɛfu kujisɛ makunɡ̤aɓi nd͡ʒ̤alɔ ɓawɔ kuɓa nɡ̤ulɔ ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ ɓɛka ɛsɔkunɛnɛ ɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɛ akav̤uma ujisɛ watʰi nd̤ijaz̤i ɲana nd̤ijaz̤i najɛ uja kuɓa sisiz̤wɛ najɛ uja kuɓa mkʰulu kɔd̤wa wakʰɛ uja kuɓa mkʰulu kujɛ nɛmɓɛwu jakʰɛ iɓɛ z̤iintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤ininz̤i waɓasikɛlɛla nɡ̤alɔɔ ɛsitʰi nɡ̤awɛ uja kusikɛlɛla usirajɛli ɛsitʰi nɡ̤amana utʰikǁɔ wakwɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɛfrajim nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmanasɛ wamɓɛka kɛ uɛfrajim pʰamɓi kɔmanasɛ usirajɛli watʰi kujɔsɛfu jaɓɔna nd̤iz̤a utʰikǁɔ uja kuɓa aniɓujisɛlɛ ɛz̤wɛni lɔɔjiɬɔ mna nd̤ikunikɛ isikǃwɛnɡ̤a sɔm̤laɓa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɔ ɛsɔ nd̤asitʰimɓajɔ ɛsanɮɛni samaamɔri nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nanɡ̤ɛsapʰɛtʰa waɓaɓiz̤a kɛ ujakɔɓi ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ watʰi z̤iɬanɡ̤anisɛni nd̤inikǁɛlɛlɛ ɔkuja kuniɬɛla nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla kǃukanani nipʰulapʰulɛ ɲana ɓakajakɔɓi nipʰulapʰulɛ usirajɛli ujiɬɔ rub̤ɛn wɛna maz̤iɓulɔ manɮa ŋ̤ǃ̤alɔ jɔkukǃina ŋǀamisa jɔkupʰakama ŋǀamisa jɛɡ̤uɲa ukǁʰapʰaz̤ɛlajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amanz̤i akusaji kuɓa ŋǀamisa kund͡ʒ̤ɛ kuɓa wɛɲukajɔ waja ɛsililini sikajiɬɔ waŋ̤ǀ̤ɔlisa ɔkɔ wɛɲuka waja ɛmanɮalwɛni usimɔn nɔlɛv̤i nɡ̤aɓaz̤alwana z̤iintɔnɡ̤a z̤ɔkuɡ̤ɔɲamɛla iz̤ikʰali z̤aɓɔ ɛɡ̤ǃ̤uɡ̤ulɛni laɓɔ uz̤ɛ unɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni umpʰɛfumlɔ nɛsikʰunɡ̤u saɓɔ lunɡ̤az̤iɓand̤akaɲi uz̤ukɔ kuɓa nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ waɓɔ ɓaɓulala amad̤ɔd̤a nɡ̤ɔkuz̤itʰand̤ɛla kwaɓɔ ɓaz̤iŋǃumla imisipʰa iinkɔmɔ ukǃalɛkisiwɛ umsind̤ɔ waɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɔɓuŋ̤ǀ̤wanɡ̤u ukupʰupʰuma kwaɓɔ umsind̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unz̤ima nd̤ija kuɓakǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰa kwajakɔɓi nd̤iɓapʰanɡ̤alalisɛ kwasirajɛli jud̤a aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɔ ɓaja kukud̤umisa isanɮa sakʰɔ siɓɛ sɛntaɲɛni jɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ ɓaja kukǃuɓud̤a kuwɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakajiɬɔ litʰɔlɛ lɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ujud̤a usukɛ ɛkukǃwɛnɡ̤ɛni ɲana waɡ̤ukǃa waɓutʰuma nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲama nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲamakaz̤i nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kumv̤usa intɔnɡ̤a ajiji kujud̤a intɔnɡ̤a jɔmmisimtʰɛtʰɔ ajiji pʰakatʰi kwɛɛɲawɔ z̤akʰɛ ad̤ɛ afikɛ uʃilɔ z̤imlulamɛlɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ nɡ̤ukʰulɛka ɛmd̤ilijɛni imaz̤i jakʰɛ jɛɛsilɛ ukʰulɛka kɔwɔɬɔɓɔ inkɔɲana jakʰɛ jɛɛsilɛ uɬamɓa nɡ̤ɛwajini isamɓatʰɔ sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤az̤i lɛd̤ilija inɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ umɛɬɔ aɓɔmv̤u jiwajini umaz̤iɲɔ am̤lɔpʰɛ nɡ̤amasi uz̤ɛb̤ulɔn uja nɡ̤asɛz̤iɓukwɛni lɔlwanɮɛ ɛwɛ nɡ̤asɛz̤iɓukwɛni lɛɛŋǃanawa ikǀala lakʰɛ lisinɡ̤isɛ ɛt͡sid̤ɔn uisakarɛ jiɲatʰi jɛɛsilɛ ulala pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntlanti wakuɓɔna ukupʰumla ukuɓa kulunɡ̤ilɛ nɛliz̤wɛ ukuɓa limnand̤i iɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓa lakʰɛ walitʰɔɓɛla ukutʰwala waɓa nɡ̤umsɛɓɛnz̤i ɔfakwa uv̤ikɔ ud̤an uja kuɡ̤wɛɓa pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu ɓakɔwaɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤akwasirajɛli ud̤an makaɓɛ jiɲɔka nɡ̤asɛnɮɛlɛni ixamɓa nɡ̤asɛmɛnd̤wɛni ɛliluma iz̤itʰɛnd̤ɛ z̤ɛhaʃɛ awɛ nɡ̤ɔmv̤a ɔlikʰwɛlɛjɔ usind̤isɔ lwakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a nd̤ilutʰɛmɓilɛ uɡ̤ad̤i unɡ̤ɛnɛlwa nɡ̤amatutu kɛ jɛna uwanɡ̤ɛnɛla ɛz̤itʰɛnd̤ɛni kuaʃɛrɛ kupʰuma amafutʰa isɔnka sakʰɛ ɛsɔ jɛna iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ijɔlisa ɔɔkumkani unafɛtali jimaz̤i jɛkǁʰama ɛkʰululwɛjɔ ukʰupʰa amaz̤wi amaɬɛ nɡ̤uɡ̤atʲa lɔmtʰi ɔkǃʰamajɔ ujɔsɛfu uɡ̤atʲa lɔmtʰi ɔkǃʰamajɔ nɡ̤asɛmtʰɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔmasɛɓɛ akǃaɓɛlɛ ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni uɓamkǀuɓunɡ̤a ɓamtɔla ɓamkǀʰasa aɓatɔli usiɬala sitʰɛ ŋ̰ǃ̰i isapʰɛtʰa sakʰɛ umikʰɔnɔ jɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ inɔkusitʲɛd̤a nɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤ɛmɓalasanɛ kajakɔɓi kʰɔna apʰɔ akʰɔjɔ ilitʲɛ likasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ wɔɔjiɬɔakuŋǀɛd̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔsɔmanɮaakusikɛlɛlɛ iɓɛ z̤iint͡sikɛlɛlɔ z̤amaz̤ulu ɛz̤iv̤ɛla pʰɛz̤ulu iint͡sikɛlɛlɔ z̤amanz̤i ɛnz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓila alɛlɛ ɛz̤ant͡si iint͡sikɛlɛlɔ z̤amaɓɛlɛ nɛz̤ɛsiz̤alɔ iint͡sikɛlɛlɔ z̤ikajiɬɔ z̤iz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤itʰilɛ iint͡sikɛlɛlɔ z̤ɔmawɔkʰulu z̤asa nasɛmd̤ɛni wɛɛntaɓa z̤anini maz̤iɓɛ sɛntlɔkɔ kujɔsɛfu ɛɓukǀʰɔt͡ʃɛni ɓɔɓalulwɛjɔ kuɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ub̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin jiŋ̤ǀ̤uka ɛkǃwɛnɡ̤ajɔ kusasa uja kuɮa ɔkupʰanɡ̤iwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa uja kwaɓa ɔkutʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛjɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓa z̤iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤akwasirajɛli ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛlinaz̤iɓini jijɔ lɛjɔ intɔ awajitʰɛtʰajɔ kuɓɔ ujisɛ waɓasikɛlɛla ɛlɔwɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnt͡sikɛlɛlɔ jakʰɛ waɓasikɛlɛla waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ watʰi kuɓɔ nd̤iz̤a kuɬanɡ̤anisɛlwa kwaɓakɔwɛtʰu nd̤iŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni nɔɔɓawɔ ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni ɔsɛnt͡simini kaɛfrɔn um̤iti ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni ɔsɛnt͡simini jasɛmakapɛla ɔpʰamɓi kɔwakwamamrɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan awawutʰɛnɡ̤ajɔ uaɓraham nd̤awɔɲɛ nɛnt͡simi kuɛfrɔn um̤iti ukuɓa aɓɛ nɛnd̤awɔ ɛjijɛjakʰɛ jɔkuŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa kʰɔna apʰɔ uaɓraham nɔsara umkakʰɛ ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa kʰɔna apʰɔ uisakɛ nɔrɛb̤ɛka umkakʰɛ nd̤amŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa kʰɔna apʰɔ ulɛja jatʰɛnɡ̤wa int͡simi lɛjɔ nɔmkǃɔlɔmɓa ɔkujɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakahɛti waɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa kɛ ujakɔɓi ukujɔlɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ waz̤ifiɲɛz̤ɛla ɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlwɛni iiɲawɔ z̤akʰɛ wapʰuma umpʰɛfumlɔ waɬanɡ̤anisɛlwa kwaɓakɔwaɓɔ wawa ujɔsɛfu pʰɛz̤u kɔɓusɔ ɓukajisɛ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ wamanɡ̤a ujɔsɛfu waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ amaɡ̤ǃ̤ixa ukuɓa amkǃʰɔlɛ ujisɛ amaɡ̤ǃ̤ixa amkǃʰɔla kɛ usirajɛli ɓamz̤alisɛla imiɬa ɛmaʃumi manɛ kuɓa ɓɛɓɛsɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukujiz̤alisa imiɬa jaɓakǃʰɔliwɛjɔ amajiputa amlilɛla imiɬa ɛmaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ jaɮula kɛ imiɬa jɔkulilɛlwa kwakʰɛ ujɔsɛfu watʰɛtʰa kwinɮu kafarɔ watʰi ukuɓa kalɔku nijand̤iɓaɓala kʰanitʰɛtʰɛ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤ikafarɔ nitʰi uɓawɔ wand̤ifunɡ̤isa ɛsitʰi jaɓɔna nd̤iz̤a ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni ɛnd̤iz̤imɓɛlɛjɔ ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan wɔnd̤iŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla kʰɔna apʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔ makʰɛ nd̤iɲukɛ nd̤ijɛ kumŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa uɓawɔ nd̤ɔɓuja nd̤iɓujɛ watʰi ufarɔ ɲuka ujɛ kumŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ujiɬɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔ akufunɡ̤isɛ nɡ̤akɔ wɛɲuka kɛ ujɔsɛfu waja kumŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ujisɛ ɓɛɲuka najɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakafarɔ amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ɛnɮu jakʰɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ɔnkɛ ɛz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa nɛnɮu kajɔsɛfu jɔnkɛ naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ nɛnɮu kajisɛ kwasala iint͡sapʰɔ z̤aɓɔ z̤ɔd̤wa nɛmpaɬa jaɓɔ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛɡ̤ɔʃɛn kwɛɲuka najɛ iiŋǃwɛlɔ naɓamahaʃɛ jaɓa nɡ̤umkʰɔsi ɔmkʰulu kunɛnɛ ɓafika ɛsand̤ɛni sikaatad̤i ɛsipʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an ɓamɓamɓaz̤ɛla iz̤ifuɓa ɓat͡ʃɔ kʰɔna nɡ̤ɛsililɔ ɛsikʰulu ɛsinz̤ima kunɛnɛ ɓamɛnz̤ɛla ujisɛ isid͡ʒ̤wili imiɬa ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓasiɓɔna aɓɛmi ɓɛlɔ z̤wɛ amakanan isid͡ʒ̤wili ɛsand̤ɛni sikaatad̤i ɓatʰi sikʰulu ɛsi sid͡ʒ̤wili kumajiputa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ kwatʰiwa iɡ̤ama lasɔ jiab̤ɛlɛmit͡sɛrajim ɛpʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓɛnz̤a kɛ kujɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkujɔlɛla kwakʰɛ ɓamtʰwala ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓamsa ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni wɛnt͡simi jasɛmakapɛla awawutʰɛnɡ̤ajɔ uaɓraham nd̤awɔɲɛ nɛnt͡simi ukuɓa uɓɛ jind̤awɔ ɛjijɛjakʰɛ jɔkuŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa kuɛfrɔn um̤iti pʰamɓi kɔwakwamamrɛ ujɔsɛfu waɓujɛla ɛjiputa kɛ jɛna naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛɲuka najɛ ɓɛja kumŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ujisɛ ɛmv̤a kɔkuŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa kwakʰɛ ujisɛ kɛ kalɔku aɓakʰuluwa ɓakajɔsɛfu ɓaɓɔna ukuɓa ujisɛ waɓɔ ufilɛ ɓatʰi az̤i ujɔsɛfu uja kusit͡ʃut͡ʃisa aɓuɓujisɛlɛ kaɲɛ kutʰi ɓɔnkɛ uɓuɓi ɛsimɛnz̤ɛlɛ ɓɔna ɓatʰumɛla kujɔsɛfu ɓɛsitʰi ujiɬɔ wajɔlɛla pʰamɓi kɔkufa kwakʰɛ watʰi nɔt͡ʃɔ kujɔsɛfu ukutʰi kʰawulukǁɔlɛlɛ uk͡xɛkǃɔ lwaɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɔ nɛsɔnɔ saɓɔ sɔkuɓa ɓɛkwɛnz̤ɛ intɔ ɛmɓi nɡ̤ɔkɔ kʰawulukǁɔlɛlɛ uk͡xɛkǃɔ lwaɓakʰɔz̤i ɓɔtʰikǁɔ wɔɔjiɬɔ walila ujɔsɛfu ɛkutʰɛtʰɛni kwaɓɔ kujɛ ɓaja naɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ ɓaz̤ipʰɔsa pʰant͡si pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ ɓatʰi jaɓɔna sinɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ watʰi ujɔsɛfu kuɓɔ musani ukɔjika nd̤isɛsikʰunɮɛni sikatʰikǁɔ jini nina nakǀinɡ̤a uɓuɓi nɡ̤am kɛ jɛna utʰikǁɔ wakǀinɡ̤a ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ukuz̤ɛ kutʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kwɛnz̤ɛkilɛjɔ nam̤la kusind̤ɛ aɓantu aɓaninz̤i nɡ̤ɔkɔ ukɔjika nd̤ɔnɔnɮa nɛnt͡sapʰɔ jɛnu waɓatʰutʰuz̤ɛla kɛ watʰɛtʰa kakuɬɛ naɓɔ ujɔsɛfu wɛna ɛjiputa jɛna nɛnɮu kajisɛ ujɔsɛfu waɬala imiɲaka ɛlikʰulu ɛlinaʃumiɲɛ ujɔsɛfu waɓɔna ɔɔɲana ɓɛsɛsitʰatʰu isiz̤ukulwana sikaɛfrajim kwanɔɔɲana ɓakamakirɛ uɲana kamanasɛ aɓaɓɛz̤alɛlwɛ ɛmad̤ɔlwɛni kajɔsɛfu watʰi ujɔsɛfu kuɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ nd̤iz̤a utʰikǁɔ ɔkunɛnɛ uja kuniv̤ɛlɛla aniɲusɛ nipʰumɛ kwɛli liz̤wɛ nijɛ ɛz̤wɛni aɓɛlifunɡ̤ɛlɛ uaɓraham nɔisakɛ nɔjakɔɓi ujɔsɛfu waɓafunɡ̤isa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛsitʰi utʰikǁɔ ɔkunɛnɛ ɛja kuniv̤ɛlɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nɔwaɲusa amatʰamɓɔ ɛmkɛ apʰa wafa kɛ ujɔsɛfu ɛnɡ̤ɔmiɲaka ilikʰulu linaʃumiɲɛ ɓamkǃʰɔla ɛtʲɛjɛni ɛjiputa nɡ̤awɔ kɛ amaɡ̤ama ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓaɓɛfikɛ ɛjiputa nɔjakɔɓi ɓɛz̤a ɛlɔwɔ nɛnɮu jakʰɛ urub̤ɛn usimɔn ulɛv̤i nɔjud̤a uisakarɛ uz̤ɛb̤ulɔn nɔb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ud̤an nɔnafɛtali uɡ̤ad̤i nɔaʃɛrɛ ijɔnkɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ ɛjapʰumajɔ ɛsiŋǃɛni sikajakɔɓi jajijimipʰɛfumlɔ ɛmaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ujɔsɛfu jɛna uɓɛsɛlɛsɛjiputa wafa kɛ ujɔsɛfu naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ nɛsɔ siz̤ukulwana sɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓakǃʰama ɓaɲakaz̤ɛla ɓand̤a ɓaɓa namanɮa kakʰulu kunɛnɛ laz̤ala iliz̤wɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ kwav̤ɛla ɔmt͡ʃa pʰɛz̤u kwɛjiputa ɔwajɛnɡ̤amaz̤i ujɔsɛfu watʰi ɛɓantwini ɓakʰɛ jaɓɔnani aɓantu ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaninz̤i ɓanamanɮa kunatʰi jiz̤ani siɓalumkisɛ ɬɛz̤ɛ ɓand̤ɛ ɓatʰi kǁɛnikwɛni kutʰɛ kwɛɬa imfaz̤wɛ ɓatʰɛlɛlɛ naɓɔ kwiint͡ʃaɓa z̤ɛtʰu ɓalwɛ natʰi ɓaɲukɛ ɓapʰumɛ ɛz̤wɛni ɓamisa kɛ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔkuɓafaka uv̤ikɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓaɓakǀinɛz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛmitʰwalɔ jaɓɔ ɓamakʰɛla kɛ ufarɔ imiz̤i ɛnɔɔv̤imɓa ipitɔm nɛramɛsɛs ɔkukʰɔna ɓaɓakǀinɛz̤ɛlajɔ kɔkukʰɔna ɓand̤ajɔ kɔkukʰɔna ɓapʰanɡ̤alalajɔ ɓak͡xukǃuka nɡ̤aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli amajiputa kɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤isa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkutʲumz̤ajɔ aɓɛnz̤a ɓak͡xak͡xa uɓɔmi ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i ɔlukʰuni nɡ̤ɔd̤aka nanɡ̤ɛz̤itɛna nanɡ̤ɛɛntlɔɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i wasɛnɮɛ jɔnkɛ imisɛɓɛnz̤i aɓasɛtʲɛnz̤iswa jɔna jajijɛtʲumz̤ajɔ kɛ kalɔku wasɛjiputa watʰɛtʰa kuɓaz̤alisikaz̤i aɓanɡ̤amahɛb̤ɛrɛkaz̤i iɡ̤ama lɔmɲɛ linɡ̤uʃifra iɡ̤ama lɔmɲɛ linɡ̤upuwa watʰi ɛkuz̤alisɛni kwɛnu amahɛb̤ɛrɛkaz̤i kʰanɡ̤ɛlani kǁa az̤alajɔ ukuɓa itʰɛ jajinkwɛnkwɛ nɔjiɓulala ukuɓa itʰɛ jajintɔmɓi jɔɮa uɓɔmi aɓaz̤alisikaz̤i ɓɔjika utʰikǁɔ aɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔ watʰɛtʰa nɡ̤akɔ kuɓɔ wasɛjiputa ɓawasind̤isa amakʰwɛnkwɛ waɓaɓiz̤a wasɛjiputa aɓaz̤alisikaz̤i watʰi kuɓɔ kunɡ̤ani ukuɓa nɛnz̤ɛ lɛ ntɔ jɔkuwasind̤isa amakʰwɛnkwɛ ɓatʰi aɓaz̤alisikaz̤i kufarɔ amahɛb̤ɛrɛkaz̤i akand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓafaz̤i ɓamajiputa kuɓa ɔmɛlɛlɛ az̤ala ɛnɡ̤ɛkanɡ̤ɛni kuwɔ umz̤alisikaz̤i nɡ̤ɔkɔ utʰikǁɔ waɓɛnz̤ɛla ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ aɓaz̤alisikaz̤i ɓand̤a aɓantu ɓanamanɮa kakʰulu kwatʰi kuɓa aɓaz̤alisikaz̤i ɓaɓɛmɔjika utʰikǁɔ waz̤isikɛlɛla iz̤inɮu z̤aɓɔ ufarɔ waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ aɓantu ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ watʰi ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana aɓatʰɛ ɓaz̤alwa ɓapʰɔsɛni ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni kɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iintɔmɓi z̤isind̤isɛni kwapʰuma umfɔ wɛnɮu kalɛv̤i waz̤ɛka intɔmɓi jakwalɛv̤i wamitʰa umfaz̤i lɔwɔ waz̤ala uɲana wamɓɔna ukuɓa m̤lɛ wamfiɬa iiɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤intatʰu watʰi akuɓa ɛnɡ̤asɛnakɔ ukumfiɬa wamtʰaɓatʰɛla umkʰɔmɓɛ wɛmikʰanz̤i wawutʲaɓɛka nɡ̤ɛb̤itumɛnɛ nɛtʲwina kuwɔ wawuɓɛka ɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔtʲɛni ɛluŋǁwɛmɛni lɔmlamɓɔ ud̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ wɛma mɡ̤ama ukuz̤ɛ ajaz̤i intɔ ɛja kwɛnz̤ɛka kujɛ jɛɬa kɛ intɔmɓi kafarɔ isija kukǃub̤a ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɓajɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤az̤ana ɓajɔ ɓɛhamɓa nɡ̤asɛkǀalɛni lɔmlamɓɔ jaɓɔna umkʰɔmɓɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔtʲɛni pʰakatʰi jatʰuma umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wajɔ ukuɓa ajɛ kuwutʰaɓatʰa jawuŋǃika jamɓɔna nant͡sɔ inkwɛnkwana jaɓa nɔfɛfɛ nɡ̤ajɔ jatʰi nɡ̤umntwana wamahɛb̤ɛrɛ lɔ watʰi ud̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ kwintɔmɓi kafarɔ nd̤ijɛ kukuɓiz̤ɛla umfaz̤i wamahɛb̤ɛrɛ ɔnɔkwaɲisa akwaɲisɛlɛ jatʰi intɔmɓi kafarɔ kujɛ jija jaja kɛ intɔmɓi lɛjɔ jaɓiz̤a wɔmntwana jatʰi intɔmɓi kafarɔ kujɛ tʰaɓatʰa lɔ umaɲisɛ nd̤ɔkunika umv̤uz̤ɔ wakʰɔ umfaz̤i lɔwɔ wamtʰaɓatʰa wamaɲisa wakʰula kɛ kwintɔmɓi kafarɔ waɓa nɡ̤uɲana wajɔ jamtʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤umɔsɛs jatʰi nd̤amxɔla ɛmanz̤ini kwatʰi kɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa akukʰula umɔsɛs wapʰuma waja kuɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ɛkʰanɡ̤ɛla imitʰwalɔ jaɓɔ waɓɔna umjiputa ɛɓɛtʰa um̤ɛb̤ɛrɛ wakuɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ wab̤ɛkab̤ɛka watʰi akuɓa ɛnɡ̤aɓɔni wamtʰi kǃwaka umjiputa wamsɛlɛla ɛntlaɓatʰini wapʰuma nɡ̤ɛmini jɛsiɓini waɓɔna amahɛb̤ɛrɛ ɛmaɓini ɛntlalana watʰi kɔwɔnɛ ɔmɲɛ jini ukuɓa umɓɛtʰɛ ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɔ watʰi jɛna umiswɛ nɡ̤uɓani ukuɓa uɓɛ nɡ̤umtʰɛtʰɛli nɔmɡ̤wɛɓi pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu uz̤a kund̤iɓulala usit͡ʃɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa umɓulɛlɛ umjiputa wɔjika umɔsɛs watʰi majiɓɛ lɛ ntɔ ijaz̤iwa ufarɔ wajiv̤a lɛ ntɔ ukumɓulala umɔsɛs waɓalɛka umɔsɛs wɛmka kwafarɔ waja ɛz̤wɛni lakwamid̤ijan waɬala pʰant͡si nɡ̤asɛkǃulɛni kɛ kalɔku umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wakwamid̤ijan wajɛnɛɛntɔmɓi ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ z̤ɛz̤a kukʰa amanz̤i z̤ajiz̤alisa imikʰumɓi ukuɓa z̤isɛz̤ɛ impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ kajisɛ ɓafika aɓalusi ɓaz̤iɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa wɛsuka umɔsɛs waz̤iŋǀɛd̤a wajisɛz̤a impaɬa jaz̤ɔ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ z̤akufika kurɛhuwɛli ujisɛ watʰi nitʰɛni nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɬɛ nifikɛ z̤atʰi siɬanɡ̤ulwɛ nɡ̤umjiputa ɛsanɮɛni saɓalusi kund͡ʒ̤alɔ wasikʰɛlɛla amanz̤i wajisɛz̤a impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ watʰi ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤akʰɛ upʰi nimʃijɛlɛni lɔwɔ mɓiz̤ɛni aɮɛ isɔnka wakʰɔlwa umɔsɛs kukuɬala nalɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤a jamnika umɔsɛs ut͡sipɔra intɔmɓi jajɔ jaz̤ala uɲana wamtʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤uɡ̤ɛrʃɔm kuɓa uɓɛsitʰi nd̤inɡ̤umpʰamɓukɛli ɛz̤wɛni lɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a kwatʰi ɛmv̤a kwalɔɔ miɬa mininz̤i wasɛjiputa ɓaŋǀwina ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i ɓakʰala kwɛɲuka ukuz̤iɓika kwaɓɔ kwaja kutʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i wakuv̤a utʰikǁɔ ukuɡ̤ula kwaɓɔ wawukʰumɓula utʰikǁɔ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wakʰɛ nɔaɓraham nɔisakɛ nɔjakɔɓi utʰikǁɔ waɓaɓɔna ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli waɓaz̤i utʰikǁɔ kɛ kalɔku umɔsɛs wajɛsalusa impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ kajitrɔ ujisɛ wɔmkakʰɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wakwamid̤ijan wajikǃʰuɓɛla ɛlɛ kwɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛntaɓɛni katʰikǁɔ ɛhɔrɛb̤ɛ kwaɓɔnakala isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a kujɛ sisɛlanɡ̤atʲɛni lɔmlilɔ ɛtʰʲɔlwɛni pʰakatʰi wakʰanɡ̤ɛla waɓɔna itʰʲɔlɔ lisit͡ʃa nɡ̤umlilɔ nɔkɔ linɡ̤ad̤ɛ lit͡ʃɛ lipʰɛlɛ watʰi umɔsɛs makʰɛ nd̤itʲɛkɛ nd̤ijɛ kuɓɔna lɔ mɓɔnɔ mkʰulu ukuɓa kutʰɛni ukuɓa itʰʲɔlɔ linɡ̤at͡ʃi lipʰɛlɛ waɓɔna ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa utʲɛkilɛ ɛsiz̤a kuɓɔna utʰikǁɔ waɓiz̤a ɛsɛtʰʲɔlwɛni pʰakatʰi watʰi kujɛ mɔsɛs mɔsɛs watʰi jɛna nd̤ilapʰa watʰi musa ukusɔnd̤ɛla apʰa kʰulula iimɓad̤ad̤a z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤ɔ ɛz̤iɲawɛni z̤akʰɔ kuɓa lɔɔ nd̤awɔ kujɔ inɡ̤um̤laɓa ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ watʰi nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ kajiɬɔ utʰikǁɔ kaaɓraham utʰikǁɔ kaisakɛ utʰikǁɔ kajakɔɓi waɓusitʰɛlisa umɔsɛs uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ kuɓa ɛɓɛsɔjika ukukʰanɡ̤ɛla kutʰikǁɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤iz̤iɓɔnilɛ ɔkunɛnɛ iint͡siz̤i z̤aɓantu ɓam aɓasɛjiputa nɔkukʰala kwaɓɔ nd̤ikuv̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓɔ ɓaɓakǃʰuɓa kalukʰuni kuɓa nd̤ijawaz̤i umv̤and̤ɛd̤wa waɓɔ nd̤iɬilɛ kɛ nd̤iz̤ɛ kuɓaɬanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni samajiputa nd̤iɓaɲusɛ ɓapʰumɛ kwɛlɔ liz̤wɛ ɓajɛ ɛz̤wɛni ɛlilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛliɓanz̤i ɛz̤wɛni ɛliɓalɛka nɔɓusi ɛnd̤awɛni jamakanan namahiti namaamɔri namapɛriz̤i namahiv̤i namajɛb̤usi nɡ̤ɔku kɛ ukukʰala kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kufikilɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤ikuɓɔnilɛ ukukǁina aɓakǁinɛ nɡ̤akɔ amajiputa hamɓa nɡ̤ɔku nd̤ikutʰumɛ kufarɔ uɓakʰupʰɛ ɛjiputa aɓantu ɓam ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli watʰi umɔsɛs kutʰikǁɔ nd̤inɡ̤uɓani ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ad̤ɛ nd̤ijɛ kufarɔ ukuɓa nd̤iɓakʰupʰɛ ɛjiputa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli watʰi nd̤ija kuɓa nawɛ nanɡ̤u umkǃɔnd̤isɔ wɔkuɓa nd̤ikutʰumilɛ ɛkuɓakʰupʰɛni kwakʰɔ aɓantu ɛjiputa nija kumkʰɔnz̤a utʰikǁɔ kulɛ ntaɓa watʰi umɔsɛs kutʰikǁɔ ujaɓɔna ukuɓa nd̤ija kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nd̤itʰi kuɓɔ utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjiɬɔ und̤itʰumilɛ ɓaz̤ɛ ɓatʰi nɡ̤uɓani iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ nd̤ɔtʰini kuɓɔ watʰi utʰikǁɔ kumɔsɛs nd̤inɡ̤ujɛ ɛnd̤inɡ̤ujɛ watʰi wɔt͡ʃɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ukutʰi und̤inɡ̤ujɛ und̤itʰumilɛ wapʰind̤a watʰi utʰikǁɔ kumɔsɛs wɔtʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjiɬɔ utʰikǁɔ kaaɓraham utʰikǁɔ kaisakɛ utʰikǁɔ kajakɔɓi und̤itʰumilɛ liɡ̤ama ɛlɔ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ sisikʰumɓuz̤ɔ ɛsɔ kwiz̤iz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana jija uɬanɡ̤anisɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwasirajɛli utʰi kuwɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjiɬɔ utʰikǁɔ kaaɓraham kaisakɛ kajakɔɓi uɓɔnakɛlɛ watʰi nd̤iniv̤ɛlɛlɛ nalɔɔ ntɔ nijɛnz̤iwɛjɔ ɛjiputa nd̤atʰi nd̤ija kuniɲusa nipʰumɛ ɛz̤int͡siz̤ini z̤asɛjiputa nijɛ ɛz̤wɛni lamakanan namahiti namaamɔri namapɛriz̤i namahiv̤i namajɛb̤usi ɛz̤wɛni ɛliɓalɛka nɔɓusi ɓɔlipʰulapʰula iliz̤wi lakʰɔ uz̤ɛ ujɛ kɛ wɛna namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwasirajɛli wasɛjiputa nitʰi kujɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wamahɛb̤ɛrɛ uɬanɡ̤ɛnɛ natʰi nɡ̤ɔku makʰɛ sihamɓɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ uhamɓɔ lwɛɛnt͡suku ɛz̤intatʰu siɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu kɛ nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa wasɛjiputa akaji kuniv̤umɛla ukuɓa nihamɓɛ nɔkuɓa sɛkunɡ̤ɛsanɮa ɛsitʰɛ ŋ̰ǃ̰i nd̤ija kusɔlula isanɮa nd̤ijiɓɛtʰɛ ijiputa nɡ̤ɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i jam jɔnkɛ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ ɛnd̤ija kujɛnz̤a pʰakatʰi kwajɔ and̤ulɛ kɛ ukunind̤ulula aɓa ɓantu nd̤ija kuɓaɓaɓala pʰamɓi kwamajiputa kutʰi kǁa nitʰɛ nɛmka ninɡ̤ɛmki niz̤ɛ intɔkaz̤i ija kukǀɛla kwɛnɡ̤ummɛlwanɛ wajɔ nakwɛnɡ̤umpʰamɓukɛli ɛnɮwini jajɔ impaɬa jɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛmpaɬa jɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ niz̤iŋǁiɓɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤ɛnu niwapʰanɡ̤ɛ amajiputa wapʰɛnd̤ula umɔsɛs watʰi ujaɓɔna aɓaji kukʰɔlwa nd̤im aɓaji kulipʰulapʰula iz̤wi kuɓa ɓaja kutʰi ujɛhɔv̤a akaɓɔnakalanɡ̤a kuwɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɛ jintɔni lɔɔ ntɔ isɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ watʰi jintɔnɡ̤a watʰi jipʰɔsɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni wajipʰɔsa ɛm̤laɓɛni jasuka jaɓa jiɲɔka wajiɓalɛka umɔsɛs watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs sɔlulɛ isanɮa sakʰɔ ujiɓamɓɛ nɡ̤ɔmsila wasɔlula isanɮa sakʰɛ wajiɓamɓa jasuka jaɓa jintɔnɡ̤a ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ ukuz̤ɛ ɓakʰɔlwɛ ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ utʰikǁɔ kaaɓraham utʰikǁɔ kaisakɛ utʰikǁɔ kajakɔɓi uɓɔnakɛlɛ kuwɛ wapʰind̤a ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi kujɛ kʰawusifakɛ isanɮa sakʰɔ ɛsifuɓɛni sakʰɔ wasifaka isanɮa sakʰɛ ɛsifuɓɛni sakʰɛ akusixɔla isanɮa sakʰɛ nasɔ sinɛkǃʰɛŋǃa sim̤lɔpʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkʰɛpʰu watʰi siɓujisɛlɛ isanɮa sakʰɔ ɛsifuɓɛni sakʰɔ wasiɓujisɛla isanɮa sakʰɛ ɛsifuɓɛni wasixɔla ɛsifuɓɛni sakʰɛ nasɔ siɓujɛ saɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɲama jakʰɛ kɔtʰi ukuɓa aɓatʰanɡ̤a ɓakʰɔlwɛ nɡ̤uwɛ aɓalipʰulapʰula iz̤wi lɔwɔkukǃala umkǃɔnd̤isɔ ɓakʰɔlwɛ liliz̤wi lɔmkǃɔnd̤isɔ wamv̤a kɔtʰi ukuɓa aɓatʰanɡ̤a ɓakʰɔlwɛ najilɛ mikǃɔnd̤isɔ miɓini aɓalipʰulapʰula nɛz̤wi lakʰɔ utʰaɓatʰɛ amanz̤i ɔmlamɓɔ uwapʰalaz̤ɛlɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni ɔwɔmilɛjɔ ɔsuka amanz̤i ɔwatʰaɓatʰilɛjɔ ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni aɓɛ liɡ̤az̤i ɛm̤laɓɛni ɔwɔmilɛjɔ watʰi umɔsɛs kujɛhɔv̤a kǀamaɡ̤u nkɔsi jam and̤ind̤ɔd̤a imaz̤wi maninz̤i ɔkɔ watʰɛtʰajɔ kumkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ kuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ɔkutʰɛtʰa kunz̤ima nd̤ikwanz̤ima nɔlwimi watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔɓɛkɛ umlɔmɔ ɛmntwini nɡ̤uɓani ɔwɛnz̤ɛ isid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ nɛsitʰulu nɔɓɔnajɔ nɛmfama asind̤im jɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ hamɓa nd̤ɔɓa nɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɔ nd̤ikuɓɔnisɛ intɔ ɔja kujitʰɛtʰa watʰi jɛna kǀamaɡ̤u nkɔsi jam kʰawutʰumɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa salɔwɔ wɔmtʰuma wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs watʰi akanɡ̤ujɛ umkʰuluwa wakʰɔ uarɔn umlɛv̤i nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa jɛna ujakwaz̤i ukutʰɛtʰa kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nankɔ jɛna ɛpʰuma ɛz̤a kukukʰawulɛla wɔkuɓɔna av̤ujɛ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɛ wɔtʰɛtʰa kujɛ uɓɛkɛ amaz̤wi ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɛ nd̤ɔɓa nɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɔ nɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɛ nd̤iniɓɔnisɛ intɔ ɛnija kujɛnz̤a jɛna wɔkutʰɛtʰɛla ɛɓantwini atʰi jɛna aɓɛ nɡ̤umlɔmɔ kuwɛ utʰi wɛna uɓɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ kujɛ kɛ lɛ ntɔnɡ̤a jipʰatʰɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɔ uja kwɛnz̤a nɡ̤ajɔ imikǃɔnd̤isɔ lɛjɔ wahamɓa kɛ umɔsɛs waɓujɛla kujitrɔ ujisɛ wɔmkakʰɛ watʰi kujɛ makʰɛ nd̤ihamɓɛ nd̤iɓujɛlɛ kuɓaz̤alwana ɓam aɓasɛjiputa nd̤iɓɔnɛ ukuɓa ɓasaɬɛli watʰi ujitrɔ kumɔsɛs hamɓa nɡ̤ɔkǁɔlɔ ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi kumɔsɛs kwamid̤ijan hamɓa uɓujɛlɛ ɛjiputa kuɓa afilɛ ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛz̤ɔnd̤a uɓɔmi ɓakʰɔ umɔsɛs watʰaɓatʰa umkakʰɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ waɓakʰwɛlisa ɛɛsilɛni waɓujɛla ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa wajipʰatʰa umɔsɛs intɔnɡ̤a katʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɛkuhamɓɛni kwakʰɔ uɓujɛla ɛjiputa uz̤ɛ ukʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ukuɓa uz̤ɛnz̤ɛ pʰamɓi kɔfarɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤imanɡ̤a ɛnd̤iz̤iɓɛkɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ kɛ nd̤ija kujɛnz̤a lukʰuni intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ anɡ̤aɓand̤ululi aɓantu wɔtʰi kufarɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi uɲana wamaz̤iɓulɔ nɡ̤usirajɛli nd̤itʰi kuwɛ mnd̤ululɛ uɲana lɔwɔ and̤ikʰɔnz̤ɛ walilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukumnd̤ulula ujaɓɔna nd̤ɔmɓulala uɲana wakʰɔ amaz̤iɓulɔ akʰɔ kwatʰi ɛnɮɛlɛni apʰɔ ɓalalisa kʰɔna ujɛhɔv̤a wam̤lanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a ukumɓulala ut͡sipɔra watʰaɓatʰa int͡ʃɛnɡ̤ɛkǀɛ waŋǃumla iɲama jɔkwaluswa jɔɲana wakʰɛ wajipʰɔsa ɛz̤iɲawɛni z̤akʰɛ watʰi unɡ̤umjɛni wamaɡ̤az̤i wamjɛka kɛ wat͡ʃɔ ɔkɔ ukutʰi unɡ̤umjɛni wamaɡ̤az̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔlwalukɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kuarɔn hamɓa ujɛ kukʰawulɛla umɔsɛs ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ waja kɛ wam̤lanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a ɛntaɓɛni katʰikǁɔ wamanɡ̤a umɔsɛs wamkǁɛlɛla uarɔn ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi kajɛhɔv̤a aɓɛmtʰumɛ wɔna nɛmikǃɔnd̤isɔ jɔnkɛ aɓɛmwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ajɔ wahamɓa umɔsɛs nɔarɔn ɓawaɬanɡ̤anisa ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli wawatʰɛtʰa uarɔn ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi aɓɛwatʰɛtʰilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs wajɛnz̤a nɛmikǃɔnd̤isɔ pʰamɓi kwaɓantu ɓakʰɔlwa aɓantu ɓɛv̤a ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uɓav̤ɛlɛlɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli waz̤iɓɔna iint͡siz̤i z̤aɓɔ ɓatʰɔɓa ɓakǃuɓud̤a ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ ɓɛz̤a ɔɔmɔsɛs nɔarɔn ɓatʰi kufarɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi ɓand̤ululɛ aɓantu ɓam ɓand̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ umtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ watʰi ufarɔ nɡ̤uɓani ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa nd̤ipʰulapʰulɛ iz̤wi lakʰɛ lɔkuɓa nd̤ind̤ululɛ usirajɛli and̤imaz̤i ujɛhɔv̤a kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ and̤iji kumnd̤ulula usirajɛli ɓatʰi kɛ utʰikǁɔ wamahɛb̤ɛrɛ uɬanɡ̤ɛnɛ natʰi makʰɛ sihamɓɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ uhamɓɔ lwɛɛnt͡suku ɛz̤intatʰu siɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ɬɛz̤ɛ asikǃwɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛndʲikitʲa jɔkufa nanɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ watʰi wasɛjiputa kuɓɔ jini mɔsɛs nɔarɔn ukuɓa niɓakʰululɛ aɓantu ɛmisɛɓɛnz̤ini jaɓɔ jijani ɛmitʰwalwɛni jɛnu watʰi ufarɔ jaɓɔnani ɓaninz̤i aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔku kɛ nijaɓapʰumz̤a ɛmitʰwalwɛni jaɓɔ ufarɔ waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ aɓapʰatʰi naɓakǃʰuɓikalukʰuni ɓaɓantu nɡ̤alɔɔ ɛsitʰi iz̤ɛ ninɡ̤aɓi saɓanika aɓantu umkǃukǃu wɔkwɛnz̤a iz̤itɛna nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwanɡ̤apʰamɓili maɓajɛ nɡ̤ɔkwaɓɔ ɓaz̤iɓutʰɛlɛ umkǃukǃu nɛnani aɓaɓɛlɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwanɡ̤apʰamɓili ɓamisɛlɛni lɔna iz̤ɛ ninɡ̤aliŋǀipʰisi kuɓa ɓajahiliz̤a kukɔ lɛ ntɔ ɓakʰalajɔ ɓɛsitʰi masijɛ kuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla kutʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu mawuɓɛ nz̤ima umsɛɓɛnz̤i pʰɛz̤u kwamad̤ɔd̤a asɛɓɛnz̤ɛ wɔna anɡ̤apʰulapʰuli amaz̤wi ɔɓukǁɔki ɓapʰuma kɛ aɓapʰatʰi naɓakǃʰuɓikalukʰuni ɓaɓantu ɓatʰɛtʰa ɛɓantwini ɓatʰi ut͡ʃɔ ufarɔ ukutʰi and̤iji mkǃukǃu jijani niz̤itʰaɓatʰɛlɛ umkǃukǃu apʰɔ ninɡ̤awufumana kʰɔna kuɓa akuji kuŋǀit͡ʃiswa ntɔ ɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini wɛnu ɓapʰalaz̤ɛka aɓantu ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lasɛjiputa ɓaɓutʰa iind̤iz̤a ɛnd̤awɛni jɔmkǃukǃu aɓakǃʰuɓikalukʰuni ɓaɓantu ɓaɓaŋ̤ǁ̤amisa ɓɛsitʰi jisɛɓɛnz̤ɛni imisɛɓɛnz̤i jɛnu intɔ jɛmini nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛmini jajɔ nɡ̤anɡ̤ɔkuja naninɔmkǃukǃu ɓaɓɛtʰwa kɛ aɓapʰatʰi ɓɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓaɓɛmiswɛ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ nɡ̤aɓakǃʰuɓikalukʰuni ɓaɓantu ɓakafarɔ kusitʰiwa kunɡ̤atʰuɓa ukuɓa ninɡ̤aɡ̤ǃ̤iɓi ukwɛnz̤a iz̤itɛna ɛniz̤imisɛlwɛjɔ iz̤ɔlɔ nanam̤la nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwanɡ̤apʰamɓili ɓaja aɓapʰatʰi ɓɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓakʰala kufarɔ ɓɛsitʰi jini ukuɓa wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ aɓa aɓanikwa mkǃukǃu kutʰiwa kɛ kutʰi jɛnz̤ani iz̤itɛna jaɓɔna aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ aɓa ɓajaɓɛtʰwa kɔna aɓantu ɓakʰɔ aɓɔ watʰi kuhiliz̤a nijahiliz̤a kukɔ lɛ ntɔ nitʰi masijɛ siɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a jijani kɛ nɡ̤ɔku nisɛɓɛnz̤ɛ aniji mkǃukǃu kɛ lɔna lɛz̤itɛna nija kulixɔla ɓaɓɔna aɓapʰatʰi ɓɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ukuɓa ɓasɛɓuɓini kusitʰiwa nd͡ʒ̤ɛ aniji kuŋǀipʰisa ntɔ ɛz̤itɛnɛni z̤ɛnu kwintɔ jɛmini nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛmini jajɔ ɓakǃuɓisana nɔmɔsɛs nɔarɔn ɓɛz̤a kuɓɔ ɛkupʰumɛni kwaɓɔ kufarɔ ɓatʰi kuɓɔ ujɛhɔv̤a makanikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ aɡ̤wɛɓɛ ɛkuɓɛni nilinukisilɛ iv̤umɓa lɛtʰu pʰamɓi kɔfarɔ napʰamɓi kwaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ukuɓa kuɓɛkwɛ ik͡xɛlɛ lɔkusiɓulala ɛsanɮɛni saɓɔ waɓujɛla kujɛhɔv̤a umɔsɛs ɛsitʰi nkɔsi jam jini ukuɓa uɓapʰatʰɛ kakuɓi aɓa ɓantu jini lɛ ntɔ utʰumɛ kususɛla kɔkɔ nd̤anɡ̤ɛnajɔ kufarɔ nd̤itʰɛtʰa ɛɡ̤amɛni lakʰɔ jɛna uɓapʰɛtʰɛ kakuɓi aɓa ɓantu akuɓaɬanɡ̤ulanɡ̤a nɔkuɓaɬanɡ̤ula aɓantu ɓakʰɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs uja kukuɓɔna nɡ̤ɔku ɛnd̤ija kukwɛnz̤a kufarɔ kuɓa uja kuɓand̤ulula aɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa ɛsitʰɛ ŋ̰ǃ̰i watʰɛtʰa utʰikǁɔ kumɔsɛs watʰi kujɛ nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤aɓɔnakala kuaɓraham nakuisakɛ nakujakɔɓi nɡ̤ɛlɔkuɓa nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ usɔmanɮa kɛ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama lɔkuɓa nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a and̤az̤ɛkanɡ̤a kuɓɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤awumisa naɓɔ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɔkuɓa nd̤iɓanikɛ iliz̤wɛ lakwakanan iliz̤wɛ lɔkupʰamɓukɛla kwaɓɔ aɓapʰamɓukɛla kulɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤ikuv̤ilɛ ukuɡ̤ula kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓakʰɔnz̤iswajɔ nɡ̤amajiputa nd̤awukʰumɓula umŋǃɔpʰisɔ jitʰi nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kunikʰupʰa pʰant͡si kwɛmitʰwalɔ jamajiputa nd̤iniɬanɡ̤ulɛ ɛnkɔnz̤wɛni jawɔ nd̤iniɬawulɛlɛ nd̤inikʰululɛ nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤alɔ ɛjɔlukilɛjɔ nanɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɔ ɛz̤ikʰulu nd̤initʰaɓatʰɛ niɓɛ nɡ̤aɓantu ɓam nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɛnu naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu ɔnikʰupʰajɔ pʰant͡si kwɛmitʰwalɔ jamajiputa nd̤ininɡ̤ɛnisɛ ɛz̤wɛni ɛnd̤apʰakamisa isanɮa nɡ̤alɔ ukuɓa nd̤ilinikɛ uaɓraham nɔisakɛ nɔjakɔɓi nd̤ija liɓɛ nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wat͡ʃɔ kɛ umɔsɛs kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓampʰulapʰulanɡ̤a umɔsɛs nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkukʰatʰaz̤ɛka nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i ɔnz̤ima watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs watʰi jija utʰɛtʰɛ kufarɔ wasɛjiputa aɓand̤ululɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓapʰumɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɛ umɔsɛs watʰɛtʰa pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a watʰi jaɓɔna ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓand̤ipʰulapʰulanɡ̤a wɔtʰini kɛ ufarɔ ukund̤ipʰulapʰula nd̤inɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ unɡ̤alukanɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛ watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs nakuarɔn waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nakufarɔ wasɛjiputa ukuɓa ɓaɓakʰupʰɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤i iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn amaz̤iɓulɔ kasirajɛli nɡ̤uhanɔki nɔfalu nɡ̤uhɛt͡sɛrɔn nɔkarmi jijɔ lɛjɔ imiz̤alwanɛ jakwarub̤ɛn ɔɔɲana ɓakasimɔn nɡ̤ujɛmuwɛli nɔjamin nɔɔhad̤i nɔjakin nɔt͡sɔharɛ nɔsawulɛ uɲana wɔmkananɛkaz̤i jijɔ lɛjɔ imiz̤alwanɛ jakwasimɔn nɡ̤awɔ amaɡ̤ama ɔɔɲana ɓakalɛv̤i nɡ̤ɛnz̤ala jaɓɔ uɡ̤ɛrʃɔn nɔkɛhati nɔmɛrari imiɲaka jɔɓud̤ala ɓukalɛv̤i jajijimiɲaka ɛlikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi matʰatʰu anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ɛrʃɔn nɡ̤ulib̤ɛni nɔʃimɛhi nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakakɛhati nɡ̤uamram nɔit͡sarɛ nɔhɛɓrɔn nɔuz̤ijɛli imiɲaka jɔɓud̤ala ɓukakɛhati jajijimiɲaka ɛlikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi matʰatʰu anamitʰatʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakamɛrari nɡ̤umahɛli nɔmuʃi jijɔ lɛjɔ imiz̤alwanɛ jakwalɛv̤i nɡ̤ɛnz̤ala jaɓɔ uamram waz̤ɛka ujɔkɛb̤ɛd̤ɛ ud̤ad̤ɛ ɓɔjisɛ wanɡ̤umkakʰɛ wamz̤alɛla uarɔn nɔmɔsɛs imiɲaka jɔɓud̤ala ɓukaamram jajijimiɲaka ɛlikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi matʰatʰu anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakait͡sarɛ nɡ̤ukɔra nɔnɛfɛɡ̤ɛ nɔz̤ik͡xi ɔɔɲana ɓakauz̤ijɛli nɡ̤umiʃahɛli nɔɛlit͡safan nɔz̤itri uarɔn waz̤ɛka uɛliʃɛb̤a intɔmɓi kaaminad̤ab̤i ud̤ad̤ɛ ɓɔnaʃɔn wanɡ̤umkakʰɛ wamz̤alɛla unad̤ab̤i nɔab̤ihu nɔɛlaz̤arɛ nɔitamarɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakakɔra nɡ̤uaz̤irɛ nɔɛlikana nɔab̤ijaz̤afu jijɔ lɛjɔ imiz̤alwanɛ jamakɔra uɛlaz̤arɛ uɲana kaarɔn waz̤ɛka umfaz̤i ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤ikaputijɛli wamz̤alɛla upinɛhasi z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ z̤aɓalɛv̤i nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ nɡ̤ulaa arɔn nɔmɔsɛs watʰi kuɓɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓakʰupʰɛni ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nɡ̤ɔkwɛmikʰɔsi jaɓɔ nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɓatʰɛtʰajɔ kufarɔ wasɛjiputa ukuɓa aɓakʰupʰɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛjiputa nɡ̤aɓɔ mɔsɛs nɔarɔn kwatʰi m̤lana watʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs watʰi nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a tʰɛtʰa kufarɔ wasɛjiputa z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛnd̤iz̤itʰɛtʰajɔ kuwɛ watʰi umɔsɛs pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a jaɓɔna nd̤inɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ unɡ̤alukanɡ̤a wɔtʰini ufarɔ ukund̤ipʰulapʰula watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs kʰanɡ̤ɛla nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ utʰikǁɔ kufarɔ kɛ uarɔn umkʰuluwa wakʰɔ wɔɓa nɡ̤umprɔfɛti wakʰɔ wɛna wɔtʰɛtʰa z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛnd̤ikuwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤az̤ɔ kɛ uarɔn umkʰuluwa wakʰɔ wɔtʰɛtʰa kufarɔ az̤ɛ aɓand̤ululɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɛ kɛ nd̤ija kujikǃakǃad̤ɛkisa intliz̤ijɔ kafarɔ nd̤ijand̤isɛ imikǃɔnd̤isɔ jam nɛz̤imanɡ̤a z̤am ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa akaji kunipʰulapʰula ufarɔ kɛ ijiputa nd̤ija kujisa isanɮa nd̤ijikʰupʰɛ imikʰɔsi jam aɓantu ɓam ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɔ ɛz̤ikʰulu az̤i amajiputa ɛkusɔlulɛni isanɮa pʰɛz̤u kwɛjiputa ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤iɓakʰupʰɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli pʰakatʰi kwawɔ wɛnz̤a kɛ umɔsɛs nɔarɔn nɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ umɔsɛs uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ nɔarɔn uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anamitʰatʰu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukutʰɛtʰa kwaɓɔ kufarɔ watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs nakuarɔn watʰi kǁa atʰɛ ufarɔ watʰɛtʰa ɛsitʰi nd̤iɓɔnisɛni isimanɡ̤a wɔtʰi wɛna kuarɔn tʰaɓatʰa intɔnɡ̤a jakʰɔ ujipʰɔsɛ pʰamɓi kɔfarɔ jɔɓa jiɲɔka wanɡ̤ɛna umɔsɛs nɔarɔn kufarɔ ɓɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ uarɔn wajipʰɔsa intɔnɡ̤a jakʰɛ pʰamɓi kɔfarɔ napʰamɓi kwaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ jaɓa jiɲɔka najɛ ufarɔ waz̤iɓiz̤a iz̤ilumkɔ naɓakʰafuli z̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ nɛz̤az̤i ɛz̤ɔ z̤asɛjiputa nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤i ɓaz̤ɔ ɛlɔwɔ wapʰɔsa pʰant͡si intɔnɡ̤a jakʰɛ jaɓa jiɲɔka jasuka intɔnɡ̤a kaarɔn jaz̤iɡ̤iɲa iintɔnɡ̤a z̤aɓɔ jaɓa lukʰuni intliz̤ijɔ kafarɔ akaɓapʰulapʰula nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wajɛt͡ʃilɔ ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs intliz̤ijɔ kafarɔ ikǃakǃad̤ɛkilɛ akav̤umi ukuɓand̤ulula aɓantu jija kufarɔ nankɔ ɛpʰuma ɛsija ɛmanz̤ini uz̤ɛ umɛ ɛluŋǁwɛmɛni lɔmlamɓɔ malunɡ̤a najɛ intɔnɡ̤a ɛjaɡ̤ukǃukajɔ jaɓa jiɲɔka jipʰatʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni uz̤ɛ utʰi kujɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wamahɛb̤ɛrɛ und̤itʰumɛ kuwɛ ɛsitʰi ɓand̤ululɛ aɓantu ɓam ɓajɛ kund̤ikʰɔnz̤a ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jaɓɔna kɛ akupʰulapʰulanɡ̤a unanɡ̤ɔku ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi uja kwaz̤i nɡ̤alɛ ntɔ kɛ ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a jaɓɔna nd̤ija kuɓɛtʰa nɡ̤ɛntɔnɡ̤a ɛsɛsanɮɛni ɛmanz̤ini ɔmlamɓɔ aɡ̤ukǃulwɛ aɓɛ liɡ̤az̤i z̤ifɛ iintlanz̤i ɛz̤isɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni unukɛ umlamɓɔ amajiputa aɓɛ nɛsikǀapʰukǀapʰu akuwasɛla amanz̤i ɔmlamɓɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs jitʰi kuarɔn tʰaɓatʰa intɔnɡ̤a jakʰɔ wɔlulɛ isanɮa sakʰɔ pʰɛz̤u kwamanz̤i asɛjiputa pʰɛz̤u kwɛmilamɓɔ jaɓɔ napʰɛz̤u kwɛmid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ jaɓɔ napʰɛz̤u kwamakǀʰiɓi aɓɔ napʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntlanɡ̤anɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤amanz̤i aɓɔ aɓɛ liɡ̤az̤i iɓɛ liɡ̤az̤i ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lasɛjiputa nasɛmipʰand̤ɛni jɛmitʰi nɛjamatʲɛ ɔɔmɔsɛs nɔarɔn ɓɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ wajipʰakamisa intɔnɡ̤a wawaɓɛtʰa amanz̤i ɔmlamɓɔ pʰamɓi kɔfarɔ napʰamɓi kwaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ az̤a aɡ̤ukǃuka ɔnkɛ amanz̤i ɔmlamɓɔ aɓa liɡ̤az̤i z̤afa iintlanz̤i ɛz̤isɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni umlamɓɔ akaɓa nakɔ amajiputa ukuwasɛla amanz̤i ɔmlamɓɔ laɓa liɡ̤az̤i ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lasɛjiputa z̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ nɛz̤az̤i z̤asɛjiputa nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤i ɓaz̤ɔ jaɓa lukʰuni intliz̤ijɔ kafarɔ akaɓapʰulapʰula nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wajɛt͡ʃilɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wad͡ʒ̤ika ufarɔ waja ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ akajiɓɛkɛla ntliz̤ijɔ nalɛ ntɔ ɔnkɛ amajiputa ɛmɓa amanz̤i ɔkusɛla nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni kuɓa ɛɓɛnɡ̤ɛnakuwasɛla amanz̤i ɔmlamɓɔ kwaz̤alisɛka isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ sɛɛnt͡suku ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuwuɓɛtʰa kwakʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a umlamɓɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs jija kufarɔ utʰi kujɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɓand̤ululɛ aɓantu ɓam ɓajɛ kund̤ikʰɔnz̤a kɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ akwav̤uma ukuɓand̤ulula ujaɓɔna nd̤ɔjiɓɛtʰa jɔnkɛ imid̤a jakʰɔ nɡ̤amasɛlɛ umlamɓɔ uɲakaz̤ɛlɛ amasɛlɛ aɲukɛ anɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ nasɛsililini sakʰɔ napʰɛz̤u kwɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlɔ sakʰɔ nasɛnɮwini jaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ nasɛɓantwini ɓakʰɔ nasɛz̤imɓiz̤ɛni z̤akʰɔ nasɛmikʰumɓini jakʰɔ jɛntlama aɲukɛ amasɛlɛ lawɔ ɛz̤ɛ nakuwɛ nakuɓantu ɓakʰɔ nakuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs jitʰi kuarɔn jɔlula isanɮa sakʰɔ ɛsɔ sinɛntɔnɡ̤a jakʰɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛmilamɓɔ napʰɛz̤u kwɛmid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ napʰɛz̤u kwamakǀʰiɓi uɲusɛ amasɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa wasɔlula kɛ uarɔn isanɮa sakʰɛ pʰɛz̤u kwamanz̤i asɛjiputa ɛɲuka amasɛlɛ aliɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla iliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa z̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ nɛz̤az̤i nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤i ɓaz̤ɔ z̤awaɲusa amasɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa ufarɔ waɓiz̤a umɔsɛs nɔarɔn watʰi mtʰand̤az̤ɛni ujɛhɔv̤a awasusɛ amasɛlɛ nasɛɓantwini ɓam nd̤ɔɓand̤ulula aɓantu ɓajɛ kuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla kujɛhɔv̤a watʰi umɔsɛs kufarɔ z̤iz̤ukisɛ nɡ̤ɔkund̤imisɛla ikǁɛʃa lɔkuɓa nd̤ikutʰand̤az̤ɛlɛ wɛna naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ naɓantu ɓakʰɔ aŋǃuɲulwɛ amasɛlɛ kuwɛ nakwinɮu jakʰɔ asalɛ ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni wɔd̤wa watʰi jɛna nɡ̤ɔmsɔ watʰi kɛ makuɓɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi lakʰɔ ukuz̤ɛ waz̤i ukuɓa akukʰɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu asukɛ amasɛlɛ kuwɛ nakwiz̤inɮu z̤akʰɔ nakuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ nakuɓantu ɓakʰɔ asalɛ ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni wɔd̤wa ɓapʰuma kɛ ɔɔmɔsɛs nɔarɔn kufarɔ wad̤and̤uluka umɔsɛs kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ jamasɛlɛ aɓɛwaɓɛkɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔfarɔ wɛnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likamɔsɛs afa amasɛlɛ ɛz̤inɮwini nasɛz̤intɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni nasɛmasimini ɓawaɬanɡ̤anisa az̤iimfumɓa nɡ̤ɛɛmfumɓa iliz̤wɛ utʰɛ kɛ ufarɔ akuɓa nɛtʰuɓa lɔkupʰɛfumla wajɛnz̤a lukʰuni intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ akaɓapʰulapʰula nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wat͡ʃɔjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs jitʰi kuarɔn jɔlula intɔnɡ̤a jakʰɔ uluɓɛtʰɛ utʰuli lwɛliz̤wɛ luɓɛ z̤iiŋ̤ǀ̤ɔŋ̤ǀ̤ɔni ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lasɛjiputa ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ wasɔlula uarɔn isanɮa sakʰɛ ɛsɔ sinɛntɔnɡ̤a jakʰɛ waluɓɛtʰa utʰuli lwɛliz̤wɛ lwaɓa z̤iiŋ̤ǀ̤ɔŋ̤ǀ̤ɔni ɛɓantwini nasɛz̤inkɔmɛni lɔnkɛ utʰuli lwɛliz̤wɛ lwaɓa z̤iiŋ̤ǀ̤ɔŋ̤ǀ̤ɔni ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lasɛjiputa z̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ nɛz̤az̤i nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤i ɓaz̤ɔ ukuɓa z̤iv̤ɛlisɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤ɔŋ̤ǀ̤ɔni az̤aɓa nakɔ kwakʰɔ iiŋ̤ǀ̤ɔŋ̤ǀ̤ɔni ɛɓantwini nasɛz̤inkɔmɛni z̤atʰi iz̤az̤i kufarɔ nɡ̤umnwɛ katʰikǁɔ jaɓa lukʰuni intliz̤ijɔ kafarɔ akaɓapʰulapʰula nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wat͡ʃɔjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs v̤uka nɡ̤ɔmsɔ umɛ pʰamɓi kɔfarɔ nankɔ ɛpʰuma ɛsija ɛmanz̤ini utʰi kujɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɓand̤ululɛ aɓantu ɓam ɓajɛ kund̤ikʰɔnz̤a ɔkaɲɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ akwaɓand̤ulula aɓantu ɓam jaɓɔna nd̤itʰuma iz̤iɓawu kuwɛ nakuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ nakuɓantu ɓakʰɔ nasɛz̤inɮwini z̤akʰɔ z̤iz̤alɛ iz̤inɮu z̤amajiputa z̤iz̤iɓawu nɔm̤laɓa akuwɔ nd̤iliɓalulɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ lɔna iliz̤wɛ lasɛɡ̤ɔʃɛn aɓɛmi kulɔ aɓantu ɓam kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ z̤iɓawu kʰɔna ukuz̤ɛ waz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a pʰakatʰi kwɛliz̤wɛ nd̤imisɛ inkululɔ pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu ɓam naɓantu ɓakʰɔ lɔ mkǃɔnd̤isɔ uja kuɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔmsɔ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kwɛz̤a iz̤iɓawu ɛz̤ininz̤i ɛnɮwini kafarɔ nasɛz̤inɮwini z̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ nasɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lasɛjiputa lɔnakala iliz̤wɛ z̤iz̤iɓawu ufarɔ waɓiz̤a umɔsɛs naarɔn watʰi jijani niɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ kutʰikǁɔ wɛnu kwɛli liz̤wɛ watʰi umɔsɛs akulunɡ̤isilɛ ukwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kuɓa sɔɓa siɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla amasikiz̤i amajiputa kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ukuɓa sitʰɛ saɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla intɔ ɛnɡ̤amasikiz̤i kumajiputa pʰamɓi kwawɔ ɔsikǁuluɓa nɡ̤amatʲɛ sija kuhamɓa uhamɓɔ lwɛɛnt͡suku ɛz̤intatʰu ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ siɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wɔtʰi asijalɛlɛ watʰi ufarɔ nd̤ija kunind̤ulula nijɛ kuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ kɔd̤wa iz̤ɛ ninɡ̤ahamɓi nijɛ kud̤ɛ nd̤itʰand̤az̤ɛlɛni watʰi umɔsɛs jaɓɔna nd̤ija kupʰuma kuwɛ nd̤itʰand̤az̤ɛ kujɛhɔv̤a z̤imkɛ iz̤iɓawu kufarɔ nakuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ nakuɓantu ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔmsɔ kɔd̤wa makanɡ̤apʰind̤i ufarɔ akʰɔɬisɛ nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤aɓand̤ululi aɓantu ɓajɛ kuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla kujɛhɔv̤a wɛmka umɔsɛs watʰand̤az̤a kujɛhɔv̤a wɛnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likamɔsɛs waz̤isusa iz̤iɓawu kufarɔ nakuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ nakuɓantu ɓakʰɛ nasiɲɛ ufarɔ wajikǃakǃad̤ɛkisa intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ nanɡ̤ɛsi siɬanɮɔ akaɓand̤ulula aɓantu watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs jija kufarɔ utʰɛtʰɛ najɛ utʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wamahɛb̤ɛrɛ ukutʰi ɓand̤ululɛ aɓantu ɓam ɓajɛ kund̤ikʰɔnz̤a ɔkaɲɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ akwav̤uma ukuɓand̤ulula waɓa usaɓaɓamɓilɛ jaɓɔna isanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a sɔɓa sɛmfujwɛni jakʰɔ ɛsɛnɮɛ ɛmahaʃɛni ɛmaɛsilɛni ɛz̤inkamɛlɛni ɛz̤inkɔmɛni nasɛmpaɬɛni ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ sɛnz̤ɛ indʲikitʲa jɔkufa ɛnz̤ima kunɛnɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ajiɓalulɛ imfujɔ jamasirajɛli kwimfujɔ jamajiputa akuji ntɔ kujɔ jɔnkɛ ɛjɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ujɛhɔv̤a umisɛ ikǁɛʃa ɛlitʰilɛ watʰi nɡ̤ɔmsɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uja kujɛnz̤a lɛ ntɔ kwɛli liz̤wɛ wajɛnz̤a kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a lɛ ntɔ nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ jafa jɔnkɛ imfujɔ jamajiputa kɛ kwɛjɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli imfujɔ akufanɡ̤a naɲɛ ufarɔ ɔ kwɛjamasirajɛli imfujɔ akufanɡ̤a nɔkuɓa iɓɛ ɲɛ jakǃakǃad̤ɛka intliz̤ijɔ kafarɔ akaɓand̤ulula aɓantu watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs nakuarɔn tʰaɓatʰani utʰutʰu lwɛz̤ikɔ niz̤alisɛ iz̤anɮa z̤ɔz̤iɓini umɔsɛs alupʰɔsɛ pʰɛz̤ulu ɛsib̤akab̤akɛni pʰamɓi kɔfarɔ luɓɛ lutʰuli ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lasɛjiputa luɓɛ nɡ̤amatʰumɓa atʰɛ kǃwɛlɛ nɡ̤amakǃʰakuv̤a ɛɓantwini nasɛz̤inkɔmɛni ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lasɛjiputa ɓalutʰaɓatʰa kɛ utʰutʰu lwɛz̤ikɔ ɓɛma pʰamɓi kɔfarɔ umɔsɛs walupʰɔsa pʰɛz̤ulu ɛsib̤akab̤akɛni lwaɓa nɡ̤amatʰumɓa atʰɛ kǃwɛlɛ nɡ̤amakǃʰakuv̤a ɛɓantwini nasɛz̤inkɔmɛni az̤aɓa nakɔ iz̤az̤i pʰamɓi kɔmɔsɛs nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamatʰumɓa kuɓa amatʰumɓa aɓakʰɔ kwiz̤az̤i nakumajiputa ɔnkɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wajɛnz̤a lukʰuni intliz̤ijɔ kafarɔ akaɓapʰulapʰula nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wat͡ʃɔjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs v̤uka umɛ pʰamɓi kɔfarɔ utʰi kujɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wamahɛb̤ɛrɛ ukutʰi ɓand̤ululɛ aɓantu ɓam ɓajɛ kund̤ikʰɔnz̤a kuɓa nɡ̤ɛsi siɬanɮɔ nd̤itʰuma z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤iɓɛtʰɔ z̤am ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɔ nakuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ nakuɓantu ɓakʰɔ ukuz̤ɛ waz̤i ukuɓa akukʰɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤am ɛɬaɓatʰini lɔnkɛ kuɓa nɡ̤ɔku ukuɓa ɓɛnd̤itʰɛ nd̤asɔlula isanɮa nd̤akuɓɛtʰa wɛna naɓantu ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛndʲikitʲa jɔkufa nɡ̤ɛwutʰɛ ʃwaka akwaɓakʰɔ ɛɬaɓatʰini nɔkɔ kɛ nd̤ikumisɛlɛ ɛli tʰuɓa lɔkuɓa nd̤iwaɓɔnakalalisɛ amanɮa kuwɛ laz̤iswɛ iɡ̤ama ɛɬaɓatʰini lɔnkɛ unanɡ̤ɔku usaz̤ɛnz̤a ud̤ɔnɡ̤a kuɓantu ɓam akuɓand̤ululi jaɓɔna ɛli kǁa nɡ̤ɔmsɔ nd̤ija isikǀʰɔtʰɔ ɛsinz̤ima kunɛnɛ ɛkunɡ̤az̤anɡ̤a kuɓɛkʰɔ sinɡ̤anɡ̤asɔ ɛjiputa kususɛla ɛjasɛkwajɔ kud̤ɛ kuɓɛ nɡ̤ɔku tʰumɛla nɡ̤ɔku ukʰawulɛz̤ɛ uɬanɡ̤anisɛ imfujɔ jakʰɔ nɛɛntɔ z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɔnaz̤ɔ ɛz̤inɮɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu nɛɛnkɔmɔ ɛz̤ifuɲɛnwɛ ɛnɮɛ z̤inɡ̤aɬanɡ̤anisɛlwanɡ̤a ɛkʰaja z̤ɔɬɛlwa sisikǀʰɔtʰɔ z̤ifɛ ɔwalɔjikajɔ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakafarɔ waɓasaɓisɛla ɛz̤inɮwini aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ nɛmfujɔ jakʰɛ ɔnɡ̤aliɓɛkɛlanɡ̤a ntliz̤ijɔ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a waɓajɛka aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ nɛmfujɔ jakʰɛ ɛnɮɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs jɔlulɛla isanɮa sakʰɔ ɛz̤ulwini kuɓɛkʰɔ isikǀʰɔtʰɔ ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lasɛjiputa pʰɛz̤u kwaɓantu napʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnkɔmɔ napʰɛz̤u kwɛmifunɔ jɔnkɛ jasɛnɮɛ ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lasɛjiputa umɔsɛs wajɔlulɛla intɔnɡ̤a jakʰɛ ɛz̤ulwini ujɛhɔv̤a watʰɔɓa ind̤ud̤umɔ nɛsikǀʰɔtʰɔ nɔmlilɔ wɛɬa wɛz̤a ɛm̤laɓɛni ujɛhɔv̤a walinisɛla isikǀʰɔtʰɔ iliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa kwaɓakʰɔ kɛ isikǀʰɔtʰɔ nɔmlilɔ ɔɓɔpʰɛnɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛsikǀʰɔtʰɔ sinz̤ima kunɛnɛ ɛkunɡ̤az̤anɡ̤a kuɓɛkʰɔ sinɡ̤anɡ̤asɔ ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lamajiputa kususɛla ɔkɔ aɓa luɬanɡ̤a isikǀʰɔtʰɔ sajiɓɛtʰa jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛsɛnɮɛ ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lasɛjiputa kwatʰaɓatʰɛla ɛmntwini kwɛsa ɛnkɔmɛni sajiɓɛtʰa isikǀʰɔtʰɔ jɔnkɛ imifunɔ jasɛnɮɛ sajapʰula jɔnkɛ imitʰi jasɛnɮɛ kɔd̤wa ɛz̤wɛni lasɛɡ̤ɔʃɛn apʰɔ ɓaɓɛkʰɔna ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli akuɓanɡ̤akʰɔ sikǀʰɔtʰɔ watʰuma ufarɔ waɓiz̤a umɔsɛs nɔarɔn watʰi kuɓɔ nd̤ɔnilɛ ɔkwɛsi siɬanɮɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ulilunɡ̤isa kɛ naɓantu ɓam asind̤awɔ tʰand̤az̤ani kujɛhɔv̤a kwanɛlɛ ukuɓakʰɔ kwɛɛnd̤ud̤umɔ z̤ikatʰikǁɔ nɛsikǀʰɔtʰɔ nd̤ɔnind̤ulula ninɡ̤aɓi saɬala umɔsɛs watʰi kujɛ ɛkupʰumɛni pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i nd̤ɔz̤ɔlulɛla kujɛhɔv̤a iz̤anɮa z̤am z̤ijɛkɛ iind̤ud̤umɔ nɛsikǀʰɔtʰɔ sinɡ̤aɓi saɓakʰɔ ukuz̤ɛ waz̤i ukuɓa um̤laɓa lɔ nɡ̤ɔkajɛhɔv̤a kɛ wɛna naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa aniji kwand̤ula nimɔjikɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ jab̤ukǃwa nɛxasi kuɓa ixasi iɓisɛlid̤uɓulɛ nɛflakisi iɓisɛlitʲatʲamɓilɛ kɛ jɔna iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛspɛlɛtɛ ajib̤ukǃwanɡ̤a kuɓa iɓisɛŋǀinanɛ wapʰuma umɔsɛs pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i wɛmka kufarɔ waz̤ɔlulɛla iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ kujɛhɔv̤a z̤ajɛka iind̤ud̤umɔ nɛsikǀʰɔtʰɔ jatʰula imv̤ula ɛm̤laɓɛni waɓɔna ufarɔ ukuɓa ipʰɛlilɛ imv̤ula nɛsikǀʰɔtʰɔ nɛɛnd̤ud̤umɔ wapʰind̤a wɔna wajikǃakǃad̤ɛkisa intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ jɛna naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ jaɓa lukʰuni kɛ intliz̤ijɔ kafarɔ akaɓand̤ulula ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wat͡ʃɔjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔmɔsɛs watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs jija kufarɔ kuɓa nd̤ijikǃakǃad̤ɛkisilɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ nɛntliz̤ijɔ jaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤iɓɔnakalalisɛ lɛ mikǃɔnd̤isɔ jam pʰakatʰi kwalɔ iliz̤wɛ ukuz̤ɛ uɓalisɛ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤ɔɲana wakʰɔ nɛz̤ɔɲana wɔɲana wakʰɔ iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ ɛz̤iŋǀamisilɛjɔ ɛnd̤iz̤ɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kumajiputa nɛmikǃɔnd̤isɔ jam ɛnd̤ijiɓɔnakalalisilɛjɔ pʰakatʰi kwawɔ ukuz̤ɛ naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a waja umɔsɛs nɔarɔn kufarɔ ɓatʰi kujɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wamahɛb̤ɛrɛ ukutʰi kunini unɡ̤av̤umi ukuz̤itʰɔɓa pʰamɓi ɓand̤ululɛ aɓantu ɓam ɓajɛ kund̤ikʰɔnz̤a ɔkaɲɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ akwav̤uma ukuɓand̤ulula aɓantu ɓam ujaɓɔna nɡ̤ɔmsɔ nd̤ɔz̤isa iinkumɓi ɛmid̤ɛni jakʰɔ z̤iɓuɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɛ uɓusɔ ɓɛliz̤wɛ linɡ̤aɓi nakuɓɔnwa iliz̤wɛ z̤iɮɛ int͡salɛla ɛsind̤ilɛjɔ ɛnisalɛlɛ ɛsikǀʰɔtʰwɛni z̤iɮɛ jɔnkɛ imitʰi ɛniɬumɛlajɔ ɛnɮɛ z̤iz̤alisɛ iz̤inɮu z̤akʰɔ nɛz̤inɮu z̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ nɛz̤inɮu z̤amajiputa ɔnkɛ iinkumɓi ɛz̤inɡ̤aɓɔnwanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔɔjiɬɔ nɔɔɲɔkɔkʰulu kususɛla aɓaɓɛkʰɔ nɡ̤az̤ɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni unanam̤la wad͡ʒ̤ika wapʰuma kufarɔ ɓatʰi aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakafarɔ kujɛ kɔd̤a kuɓɛ lɔ ɛnɡ̤umɡ̤iɓɛ kutʰi ɓand̤ululɛ aɓantu ɓajɛ kukʰɔnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ akukaz̤i kuɬɛliwɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓa ijiputa iz̤a kut͡ʃaɓalala ɓaz̤a ɔɔmɔsɛs nɔarɔn ɓaɓujisɛlwa kwakufarɔ watʰi kuɓɔ hamɓani nijɛ kukʰɔnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu kuhamɓa ɔɔɓani nɔɔɓani kɛ watʰi umɔsɛs sija kuhamɓa nɔlut͡ʃa nɛɛnɡ̤wɛv̤u z̤akɔwɛtʰu sihamɓɛ nɔɔɲana ɓɛtʰu nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤ɛtʰu nɛmpaɬa jɛtʰu ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤ɛtʰu kuɓa kutʰi nɡ̤umtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ kajɛhɔv̤a watʰi kuɓɔ makuɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤alɔ kamɓɛ ujɛhɔv̤a makaɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inind̤ulula nɛnt͡sapʰɔ jɛnu kʰanɡ̤ɛlani kukʰɔ uɓuɓi pʰamɓi kwɛnu makunɡ̤aɓi nd͡ʒ̤alɔ makuhamɓɛ ɓanɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a nijɛ kukʰɔnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a kuɓa niɓɛ ɔkɔ ɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰwa ɓapʰuma ɛɓuswɛni ɓukafarɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs jɔlula isanɮa sakʰɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa kuz̤ɛ iinkumɓi z̤iɲukɛ kulɔ iliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa z̤ijiɮɛ jɔnkɛ imifunɔ jɛliz̤wɛ ɛli jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛʃijwɛ sisikǀʰɔtʰɔ wajɔlula umɔsɛs intɔnɡ̤a jakʰɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa ujɛhɔv̤a wakǃʰuɓa umɔja wasɛmpumalanɡ̤a kwɛlɔ liz̤wɛ jɔnkɛ lɔɔ nɔɓusuku ɓɔnkɛ umɔja wasɛmpumalanɡ̤a waz̤itʰwala iinkumɓi z̤ɛɲuka iinkumɓi kulɔ lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa z̤ɛz̤a z̤aɬala ɛmid̤ɛni jɔnkɛ jasɛjiputa z̤ininz̤i kunɛnɛ ɛkunɡ̤az̤anɡ̤a pʰamɓi kwaz̤ɔ kuɓɛkʰɔ z̤inkumɓi z̤inɡ̤akɔ kwaɓɛ ɛmv̤a kwaz̤ɔ kunɡ̤asaji kuɓakʰɔ z̤ind͡ʒ̤alɔ z̤aɓuɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla uɓusɔ ɓɛliz̤wɛ lɔnkɛ laɓa mɲama iliz̤wɛ z̤ajiɮa jɔnkɛ imifunɔ jɛliz̤wɛ nɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛmitʰi ɛz̤az̤iʃijwɛ sisikǀʰɔtʰɔ naɲɛ intɔ ɛluɬaz̤a ɛmtʰini nasɛmifunwɛni jasɛnɮɛ ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lasɛjiputa wakʰawulɛz̤a ufarɔ waɓiz̤a umɔsɛs nɔarɔn watʰi nd̤ɔnilɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu kalɔku kʰanisikǁɔlɛlɛ isɔnɔ ɔkwɛsi siɬanɮɔ sɔd̤wa nitʰand̤az̤ɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu akususɛ ɔku kɔd̤wa wapʰuma kufarɔ watʰand̤az̤a kujɛhɔv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a wawuɡ̤ukǃula umɔja waɓa nɡ̤ɔwasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a ɔnamanɮa kunɛnɛ waz̤itʰwala iinkumɓi waz̤id̤iɓa ɛlwanɮɛ ɔluɓɔmv̤u naɲɛ inkumɓi ɛmid̤ɛni jɔnkɛ jasɛjiputa wajɛnz̤a lukʰuni ujɛhɔv̤a intliz̤ijɔ kafarɔ akaɓand̤ulula ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs jɔlulɛla isanɮa sakʰɔ ɛz̤ulwini kuɓɛkʰɔ uɓumɲama ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa uɓumɲama ɔɓuŋ̤ǃ̤iŋ̤ǃ̤wa wasɔlulɛla umɔsɛs isanɮa sakʰɛ ɛz̤ulwini kwaɓakʰɔ uɓumɲama ɔɓusitʰɔkɔtʰɔkɔ ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lasɛjiputa imiɬa ɛmitʰatʰu aɓaɓɔnana ɓani ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ imiɬa ɛmitʰatʰu kɛ kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kwaɓakʰɔ ukukʰaɲa ɛmakʰajɛni aɓɔ ufarɔ waɓiz̤a umɔsɛs watʰi hamɓani nijɛ kukʰɔnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a kɔd̤wa impaɬa jɛnu ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤ɛnu maz̤isalɛ najɔ int͡sapʰɔ jɛnu jɔhamɓa watʰi umɔsɛs wɛna uz̤ɛ usinikɛ imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ namad̤ini aɲukajɔ ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤ɛtʰu siɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nɛmfujɔ jɛtʰu ihamɓɛ natʰi akuji nɔpʰupʰu ɔluɲɛ kuɓa sɔtʰaɓatʰa kujɔ ukukʰɔnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu kuɓa tʰina asaz̤i ukuɓa sɔmkʰɔnz̤a nɡ̤antɔni ujɛhɔv̤a sid̤ɛ sifikɛ kʰɔna ujɛhɔv̤a wajɛnz̤a lukʰuni intliz̤ijɔ kafarɔ akav̤uma ukuɓand̤ulula watʰi ufarɔ kujɛ hamɓa umkɛ uz̤ɛ uz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ unɡ̤apʰind̤i uɓuɓɔnɛ uɓusɔ ɓam kuɓa m̤lana uɓuɓɔnilɛjɔ uɓusɔ ɓam uja watʰi umɔsɛs utʲapʰilɛ ut͡ʃɔ and̤isaji kupʰind̤a nd̤iɓuɓɔnɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi kumɔsɛs nd̤isaja siɓɛtʰɔ siɲɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔfarɔ napʰɛz̤u kwɛjiputa ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ wɔnind̤ulula nimkɛ apʰa kǁa anind̤ulula kupʰɛlɛ uja kuniɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa kaɲɛ nimkɛ apʰa kʰawutʰɛtʰɛ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤aɓantu itʰi inkaz̤ana ikǀɛlɛ kummɛlwanɛ wajɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ikǀɛlɛ kummɛlwanɛ wajɔ iimpaɬa z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓaɓaɓala aɓantu ɛmɛɬwɛni amajiputa kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ inɡ̤umɔsɛs jajinkulu kunɛnɛ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakafarɔ nasɛɓantwini watʰi umɔsɛs ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi kǁa kupʰakatʰi kɔɓusuku nd̤ija kupʰuma nd̤ihamɓɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛjiputa afɛ ɔnkɛ amaz̤iɓulɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kumaz̤iɓulɔ kafarɔ ɔɬɛlijɔ ɛtrɔnɛni jakʰɛ ɛsɛ kumaz̤iɓulɔ ɔmkʰɔnz̤az̤ana ɔsɛmv̤a kwamatʲɛ ɔkusila namaz̤iɓulɔ ɔnkɛ ɛɛnkɔmɔ kuɓɛkʰɔ isikʰalɔ ɛsikʰulu ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lasɛjiputa ɛkunɡ̤az̤anɡ̤a kuɓɛkʰɔ sind͡ʒ̤alɔ kwajɛ kunɡ̤aji kupʰind̤a kuɓɛkʰɔ sind͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli akukʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤a ija kuɓav̤unɡ̤amɛla kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛmntwini kusɛ ɛz̤inkɔmɛni ukuz̤ɛ naz̤i ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ujawaɬula amajiputa kumasirajɛli ɓɛɬɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ aɓɔ ɓɛz̤ɛ ɓakǃuɓud̤ɛ ɓɛsitʰi pʰuma wɛna naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓakuland̤ɛlajɔ nd̤ipʰumɛ kɛ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ waz̤a wapʰuma kufarɔ ɛv̤utʰa nɡ̤umsind̤ɔ ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi kumɔsɛs akaji kunipʰulapʰula ufarɔ ukuz̤ɛ z̤and̤ɛ iz̤imanɡ̤a z̤am ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa umɔsɛs nɔarɔn ɓaz̤ɛnz̤a kɛ ɛz̤i z̤imanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ pʰamɓi kɔfarɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wajɛnz̤a lukʰuni intliz̤ijɔ kafarɔ akaɓand̤ulula ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɛ watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs nakuarɔn ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa watʰi lɛ ɲanɡ̤a ijintlɔkɔ jɛɛɲanɡ̤a jɛjɔkukǃala ɛz̤iɲanɡ̤ɛni z̤ɔmɲaka tʰɛtʰani kwiɓanɮa lɔnkɛ lakwasirajɛli nitʰi nɡ̤ɔlwɛʃumi kulɛ ɲanɡ̤a ɛlɔwɔ makaz̤itʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ikǁʰwanɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ ikǁʰwanɛ nɡ̤ɛnɮu ukuɓa itʰɛ inɮu jaŋǀinanɛ ɛkǁʰwanɛni makatʰaɓatʰɛ ikǁʰwanɛ jɛna ɛnɔmmɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ ɔkufupʰi nɛnɮu jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnani laɓantu ɛlɔwɔ nɡ̤anɡ̤ɔkɔkuɮa kwakʰɛ nɔmɓalɛla ɛkǁʰwanɛni ikǁʰwanɛ lɛnu maliɓɛ lid̤una ɛliɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ ɛlimɲaka mɲɛ nɔlitʰaɓatʰa ɛz̤iɡ̤uʃɛni nɔkuɓa kusɛz̤ib̤ɔkʰwɛni niz̤ɛ niliɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ kud̤ɛ kuɓɛ lwɛʃumi ɛlinɛsinɛ lwalɛ ɲanɡ̤a silikǁʰɛlɛ kɛ sɔnkɛ isikʰunɡ̤u sɛɓanɮa lakwasirajɛli lakut͡ʃɔna ilanɡ̤a ɓakǀapʰulɛ ɛɡ̤az̤ini ɓalikǃaɓɛ ɛmiɡ̤uɓasini jɔmiɓini nasɛmkǃad̤ini wɛz̤inɮu ɛlija kuɮɛlwa kuz̤ɔ nɡ̤aɓɔ ɓajiɮɛ iɲama nɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku jɔsiwɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ inɛz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ ɓajiɮɛ nɛmitʰana ɛk͡xak͡xa musani ukuɮa nd̤awɔ ik͡xwad̤a kujɔ nand̤awɔ ikupʰɛkwa ipʰɛkwɛ nɡ̤amanz̤i majɔsiwɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ intlɔkɔ jalɔ namaŋǃina alɔ nɛz̤iɓilini z̤alɔ niz̤ɛ ninɡ̤asalisi nd̤awɔ jalɔ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɔkusɛlɛjɔ kulɔ kwad̤a nɔkut͡ʃisa nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ niz̤ɛ nɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuliɮa nɔɮa nib̤iŋǃilɛ ninɛɛmɓad̤ad̤a ɛz̤iɲawɛni z̤ɛnu ninɛntɔnɡ̤a ɛsanɮɛni sɛnu niliɮɛ ɓupʰutʰupʰutʰu lɛjɔ jipasika kujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kukǀand̤a ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nɡ̤ɔɓu ɓusuku nd̤iɓɛtʰɛ ɔnkɛ amaz̤iɓulɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nd̤itʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛmntwini nd̤isɛ ɛnkɔmɛni nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ iz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɔ kɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓasɛjiputa jɛhɔv̤a iɡ̤az̤i ɛlɔ lɔɓa nɡ̤umkǃɔnd̤isɔ ɛz̤inɮwini ɛnikuz̤ɔ nd̤ɔliɓɔna iɡ̤az̤i nd̤iɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛ sinɡ̤aɓikʰɔ isiɓɛtʰɔ ɛsɔnakalisajɔ ɛkuliɓɛtʰɛni iliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa lɛ jɔɓa sisikʰumɓuz̤ɔ nijɛnz̤ɛ umtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ kujɛhɔv̤a ɛz̤iz̤ukulwanɛni z̤ɛnu nijɛnz̤ɛ ummisɛlɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ nɔɮa iz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ iint͡suku z̤iɓɛ sikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kwanɡ̤ɔsuku lɔkukǃala nɔlisusa iɡ̤wɛlɛ ɛz̤inɮwini z̤ɛnu kuɓa ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɮa isɔnka ɛsinɛɡ̤wɛlɛ kususɛla kɔlɔkukǃala kud̤ɛ kuɓɛ lwɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓɔŋǃaɲulwa ɓanɡ̤aɓikʰɔ kwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɔkukǃala kɔɓakʰɔ intlanɡ̤anisɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nanɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kɔɓakʰɔ intlanɡ̤anisɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ akuji kwɛnz̤iwa msɛɓɛnz̤i nɡ̤awɔ inɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ulɔwɔ wɔkuɮa kɔmntu nɡ̤uwɔ wɔd̤wa ɛninɡ̤az̤ɛnz̤ɛlajɔ niz̤ɛ niɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ umtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ wɛz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ kuɓa kaɲɛ nɡ̤ajɔ lɔɔ nd̤ajikʰupʰa imikʰɔsi jɛnu ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa niwuɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ lɔɔ m̤la kwiz̤iz̤ukulwana z̤ɛnu uɓɛ nɡ̤ummisɛlɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛjɔkukǃala iɲanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔsuku lwɛʃumi ɛlinɛsinɛ ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa nɔɮa iz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ kud̤ɛ kusɛ lwamaʃumi ɔmaɓini analuɲɛ lwɛɲanɡ̤a lɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa z̤ɛ kunɡ̤afuɲanwa ɡ̤wɛlɛ ɛz̤inɮwini z̤ɛnu iint͡suku ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kuɓa ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɮa intɔ ɛnɛɡ̤wɛlɛ ɓɔŋǃaɲulwa ɓanɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ɛɓanɮɛni lakwasirajɛli nɔkuɓa nɡ̤umpʰamɓukɛli nɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔz̤alɛlwɛ kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛnɛɡ̤wɛlɛ niz̤ɛ ninɡ̤ajiɮi ɛmakʰajɛni ɛnu ɔnkɛ nɔɮa iz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ wawaɓiz̤a umɔsɛs ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwasirajɛli watʰi kuwɔ hamɓani nijɛ niz̤itʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ikǁʰwanɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jɛnu nikǁʰɛlɛ nitʰaɓatʰɛ isipʰa sɛhisɔpɛ nisitʰi ŋ̰ǁ̰u ɛɡ̤az̤ini ɛlisɛŋ̤ǃ̤ajini nikǃaɓɛ ɛmkǃad̤ini nasɛmiɡ̤uɓasini jɔmiɓini nɡ̤ɛɡ̤az̤i ɛlisɛŋ̤ǃ̤ajini kɛ z̤ɛ kunɡ̤apʰumi ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛnɮu jakʰɛ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uja kukǀand̤a awaɓulalɛ amajiputa akuliɓɔna iɡ̤az̤i ɛmkǃad̤ini nasɛmiɡ̤uɓasini jɔmiɓini wɔɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ anɡ̤amv̤umɛli umɔnakalisi ukuɓa anɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛz̤inɮwini z̤ɛnu aɓulalɛ wɔliɡ̤ǀ̤ina ɛlɔ z̤wi liɓɛ nɡ̤ummisɛlɔ kuwɛ nakɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni nɔtʰi ɛz̤wɛni aja ujɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wat͡ʃɔjɔ nijiɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ lɛ nkɔnz̤ɔ kɔtʰi kǁa ɓatʰɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu ijintɔni lɛ nkɔnz̤ɔ nitʰi kɛ nɡ̤umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɛpasika kujɛhɔv̤a ɔwaɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa ɛz̤inɮwini z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛjiputa ɛkuɓulalɛni kwakʰɛ amajiputa waz̤iɬanɡ̤ula iz̤inɮu z̤ɛtʰu ɓatʰɔɓa aɓantu ɓakǃuɓud̤a ɓahamɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaja kwɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ umɔsɛs nɔarɔn ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kwatʰi kɛ pʰakatʰi kɔɓusuku ujɛhɔv̤a wawaɓulala ɔnkɛ amaz̤iɓulɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa kwatʰaɓatʰɛla kɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ kafarɔ ɔɬɛlijɔ ɛtrɔnɛni jakʰɛ kɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ ɔmtʰind͡ʒ̤wa ɔsɛntɔlɔnɡ̤wɛni ɛnɡ̤um̤ad̤i namaz̤iɓulɔ ɔnkɛ ɛɛnkɔmɔ wav̤uka ufarɔ ɛɓusuku jɛna naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ namajiputa ɔnkɛ kwaɓakʰɔ isikʰalɔ ɛsikʰulu ɛjiputa kuɓa akuɓanɡ̤akʰɔ nɮu inɡ̤ɛnamntu ufilɛjɔ waɓiz̤a umɔsɛs nɔarɔn ɛɓusuku watʰi sukani nipʰumɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu ɓam aɓa nɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nihamɓɛ nijɛ kumkʰɔnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkut͡ʃɔ kwɛnu nɛmpaɬa jɛnu ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤ɛnu z̤itʰaɓatʰɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nat͡ʃɔjɔ nihamɓɛ nind̤isikɛlɛlɛ amajiputa ad͡ʒ̤ɔkisa ukuɓand̤ulula aɓantu nɡ̤ɔɓuŋ̤ǁ̤amɔ kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ kuɓa aɓɛsitʰi sɔnkɛ sɛsifilɛ aɓantu ɓajitʰaɓatʰa jaɓɔ inɡ̤ɛkaɓi naɡ̤wɛlɛ imikʰumɓi jaɓɔ jɔkukǁɔv̤ulɛla isɔnɡ̤ɛlwɛ ɛz̤inɡ̤utʲɛni z̤aɓɔ iɓɔt͡ʃɛlɛlwɛ ɛmaɡ̤ǁ̤ɛni aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likamɔsɛs ɓakǀɛla kumajiputa iimpaɬa z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓaɓaɓala aɓantu pʰamɓi kwamajiputa aɓɛnz̤a ukuɓa ɓakǀɛlɛ ɓawapʰanɡ̤a kɛ amajiputa ɓand̤uluka kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛramɛsɛs ɓaja ɛsukɔti amad̤ɔd̤a ɛɛɲawɔ ɛnɡ̤atʰi akumakʰulu ɔmatʰand̤atʰu nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kɔsapʰɔ kwɛɲuka kɛ naɓɔ inkitʰa ɛnɡ̤umkǁuɓɛ nɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ imfujɔ ɛninz̤i kunɛnɛ ɓɔsa amakǃɛɓɛnɡ̤wana anɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ ɛntlama aɓaɓɛpʰumɛ najɔ ɛjiputa kuɓa iɓinɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ kuɓa ɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰwa ɛjiputa aɓaɓa nakuliɓala kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤az̤ɛnz̤ɛlanɡ̤a mpʰakɔ kɛ ukuɬala kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓakuɬalajɔ ɛjiputa jimiɲaka ɛmakʰulu manɛ anɛmiɲaka ɛmaŋǀi matʰatʰu ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɲaka ɛmakʰulu manɛ anɛmiɲaka ɛmaŋǀi matʰatʰu kwatʰi kaɲɛ nɡ̤ajɔ lɔɔ japʰuma jɔnkɛ imikʰɔsi kajɛhɔv̤a ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa ɓuɓusuku ɔɓɔ ɓɔkuɡ̤ǀ̤ina kukajɛhɔv̤a kuɓa waɓakʰupʰa ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa ɓuɓusuku ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɔɓɔ ɓɔkuɡ̤ǀ̤inwa nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɔnkɛ ɛz̤iz̤ukulwanɛni z̤aɓɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs nakuarɔn ummisɛlɔ wɛpasika nɡ̤ulɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a aɓasaji kuɮa kujɔ ɔnkɛ amakʰɔɓɔka aɓantu aɓaz̤uz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛmali uz̤ɛ uwalusɛ and̤ulɛ kɛ ukuɮa kujɔ ɔlund̤wɛnd̤wɛ nɔnɡ̤umkǃɛʃwa akasaji kuɮa kujɔ jɔɮɛlwa nɮwiniɲɛ akusaji ntɔ jalɔɔ ɲama nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛnɮu anisaji kwapʰula tʰamɓɔ lajɔ lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa lakwasirajɛli lɔjɛnz̤a lɔɔ ntɔ kǁa atʰɛ ɔwasɛmz̤ini wapʰamɓukɛla kuwɛ wɛnz̤a kujɛhɔv̤a majaluswɛ jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛjind̤ɔd̤a kujɛ and̤ulɛ kɛ ukusɔnd̤ɛla ajɛnz̤ɛ aɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔz̤alɛlwɛ kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓanɡ̤aluswanɡ̤a aɓasaji kuɮa kujɔ wɔɓa mɲɛ umjalɛlɔ kɔz̤alɛlwɛ kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ nakɔwasɛmz̤ini ɔpʰamɓukɛlɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛnu ɓɛnz̤a kɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ umɔsɛs nɔarɔn ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤ajɔ kaɲɛ lɔɔ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓakʰupʰa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nɡ̤ɔkwɛmikʰɔsi jaɓɔ ujɛhɔv̤a watʰɛtʰa kumɔsɛs watʰi nd̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛlɛ ɔnkɛ amaz̤iɓulɔ jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛv̤ula isiz̤alɔ pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nakwinkɔmɔ jɛjam watʰi umɔsɛs ɛɓantwini jikʰumɓulɛni lɛ nipʰumɛ nɡ̤ajɔ ɛjiputa ɛnɮwini jɔɓukʰɔɓɔka kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a unikʰupʰɛ kulɛ nd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɛsitʰɛ ŋ̰ǃ̰i isanɮa iz̤ɛ kɛ kunɡ̤aɮiwa ntɔ inɛɡ̤wɛlɛ lɔ nɡ̤um̤la ɛnipʰumɛ nɡ̤awɔ nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤uab̤ib̤i kɔtʰi kǁa ujɛhɔv̤a anifikisilɛjɔ ɛz̤wɛni lamakanan lamahiti lamaamɔri lamahiv̤i lamajɛb̤usi awalifunɡ̤ɛla ɔɔjiɬɔ ukuɓanika iz̤wɛ ɛliɓalɛka nɔɓusi ukʰɔnz̤ɛ nɡ̤alɛ nkɔnz̤ɔ kulɛ ɲanɡ̤a niɮɛ iz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ iint͡suku ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kɛ lwɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ lunɡ̤umtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ kujɛhɔv̤a iz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ z̤ɔɮiwa iint͡suku ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kunɡ̤aɓɔnwa kuwɛ ntɔ inɛɡ̤wɛlɛ kunɡ̤aɓɔnwa ɡ̤wɛlɛ kuwɛ ɛmid̤ɛni jakʰɔ jɔnkɛ uz̤ɛ umkǁɛlɛlɛ uɲana wakʰɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ utʰi nd̤ikwɛnz̤a ɔku nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wakwɛnz̤ajɔ ɛkupʰumɛni ɛjiputa kuz̤ɛ kuɓɛ nɡ̤umkǃɔnd̤isɔ kuwɛ ɔsɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ uɓɛ sisikʰumɓuz̤ɔ pʰakatʰi kwamɛɬɔ akʰɔ ukuz̤ɛ umjalɛlɔ kajɛhɔv̤a uɓɛ sɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɔ kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ukukʰupʰɛ ɛjiputa nɡ̤ɛsitʰɛ ŋ̰ǃ̰i isanɮa uz̤ɛ uwuɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ lɔ mmisɛlɔ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lawɔ ɛlimisiwɛjɔ imiɬa kamiɬa kɔtʰi kǁa akufikisilɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛz̤wɛni lamakanan nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wafunɡ̤ajɔ kuwɛ nakɔɔjiɬɔ lɔna ujiɮulisɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛv̤ula isiz̤alɔ intɔ jɔnkɛ ɛliz̤iɓulɔ lɛnkɔmɔ ɔja kuɓa najɔ amad̤una ɔɓa nɡ̤akajɛhɔv̤a intɔ jɔnkɛ ɛliz̤iɓulɔ lɛɛsilɛ wɔjikʰulula nɡ̤ɔkujimisɛla nɡ̤ɛkǁʰwanɛ kɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ akwajikʰulula nɡ̤ɔkujimisɛla wɔjapʰula ilunɡ̤u lɛntamɔ jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛliz̤iɓulɔ lɔmntu kɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ najɔ wɔjikʰulula nɡ̤ɔkujimisɛla kɔtʰi kǁa uɲana wakʰɔ akuɓuz̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛliz̤ajɔ ɛsitʰi jintɔni lɛ ntɔ uz̤ɛ utʰi kujɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wasikʰupʰa ɛjiputa ɛnɮwini jɔɓukʰɔɓɔka nɡ̤ɛsitʰɛ ŋ̰ǃ̰i isanɮa kwatʰi kǁa ufarɔ wajɛlukʰuni ukusind̤ulula ujɛhɔv̤a wawaɓulala ɔnkɛ amaz̤iɓulɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kwiz̤iɓulɔ lɔmntu wɛsa kwiz̤iɓulɔ lɛnkɔmɔ kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ lɛ ntɔ nd̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla kujɛhɔv̤a jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛv̤ula isiz̤alɔ ɛlid̤una nd̤ijikʰululɛ nɡ̤ɔkujimisɛla jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛliz̤iɓulɔ kɔɔɲana ɓam iɓɛ nɡ̤umkǃɔnd̤isɔ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ iɓɛ sisikʰumɓuz̤ɔ pʰakatʰi kwamɛɬɔ akʰɔ kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a wasikʰupʰa ɛjiputa nɡ̤ɛsitʰɛ ŋ̰ǃ̰i isanɮa kwatʰi akuɓand̤ulula ufarɔ aɓantu utʰikǁɔ akaɓakʰɔkɛla nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛliz̤wɛ lamafilisti nakuɓa iɓimfut͡ʃanɛ jɔna kuɓa watʰi utʰikǁɔ ɬɛz̤ɛ aɓantu ɓaz̤ɔɬwajɛ ɓakuɓɔna imfaz̤wɛ ɓaɓujɛlɛ ɛjiputa utʰikǁɔ waɓaz̤unɡ̤ulɛz̤isa aɓantu nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jɔlwanɮɛ ɔluɓɔmv̤u ɓaɲuka ɓɛkǁʰɔɓilɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛv̤ɛla ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa umɔsɛs wawatʰaɓatʰa wahamɓa nawɔ amatʰamɓɔ kajɔsɛfu kuɓa wajɛɓafunɡ̤isilɛ nɔkuɓafunɡ̤isa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛsitʰi utʰikǁɔ uja kuniv̤ɛlɛla ɔkunɛnɛ niz̤ɛ niwaɲusɛ amatʰamɓɔ ɛmkɛ kulɛ nd̤awɔ ɓand̤uluka ɛsukɔti ɓalalisa ɛɛtam ɛɲɛlɛni jɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wahamɓa pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔmkǃulu wɛlifu ɛmini ɛɓakʰɔkɛla nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla nɡ̤ɔmkǃulu wɔmlilɔ ɛɓusuku ɛɓakʰaɲisɛla ukuz̤ɛ ɓahamɓɛ nɔɓusuku awusukanɡ̤a umkǃulu wɛlifu ɛmini nɔmkǃulu wɔmlilɔ ɛɓusuku pʰamɓi kwaɓantu watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs watʰi tʰɛtʰa kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ukuɓa ɓad͡ʒ̤ikɛ ɓamisɛ iintɛntɛ pʰamɓi kwɛpihahirɔti pʰakatʰi kwɛmiɡ̤d̤ɔli nɔlwanɮɛ pʰamɓi kwɛb̤ahalit͡sɛfɔn malunɡ̤a najɔ nimisɛ nɡ̤asɛlwanɮɛ uja kutʰi ufarɔ nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓad̤id̤ɛkilɛ ɛz̤wɛni intlanɡ̤ɔ iɓav̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ɛlɛ nd̤ɔjɛnz̤a lukʰuni intliz̤ijɔ kafarɔ aɓasukɛlɛ nd̤iz̤ukisɛkɛ nɡ̤ɔfarɔ nanɡ̤ɛmpi jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ az̤i amajiputa ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ wakǁɛlɛlwa wasɛjiputa ukuɓa aɓantu ɓaɓalɛkilɛ jaɓa jɛjimɓi intliz̤ijɔ kafarɔ nɛjaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ kuɓantu ɓatʰi sijɛnz̤ɛlɛ ntɔni lɛ ntɔ jɔkusuka simnd̤ululɛ usirajɛli ɛkusikʰɔnz̤ɛni wajiɓɔpʰa iŋǃwɛlɔ jakʰɛ jɔkulwa waɓatʰaɓatʰa aɓantu ɓakʰɛ ɓahamɓa najɛ watʰaɓatʰa amakʰulu ɔmatʰand̤atʰu ɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa ɛz̤ikʰɛtʰiwɛjɔ nɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɔkulwa z̤asɛjiputa naɓapʰatʰimikʰɔsi pʰɛz̤u kwaz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ipʰɛla ujɛhɔv̤a wajɛnz̤a lukʰuni kɛ intliz̤ijɔ kafarɔ wasɛjiputa waɓasukɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓajɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛpʰumɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa ɛsipʰakamilɛjɔ amajiputa aɓasukɛla ɛnamahaʃɛ ɔnkɛ ɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa kafarɔ nakʰwɛlwajɔ akʰɛ nɛmpi jakʰɛ kuɓɔ ɓɛmisɛ iintɛntɛ nɡ̤asɛlwanɮɛ nɡ̤asɛpihahirɔti pʰamɓi kwɛb̤ahalit͡sɛfɔn wasɔnd̤ɛla ufarɔ ɓawapʰakamisa amɛɬɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nanɡ̤ɔ amajiputa ɛfakɛ ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ ɓɔjika kunɛnɛ ɓakʰala ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kujɛhɔv̤a ɓatʰi kumɔsɛs kunɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛkunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ maŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ɛjiputa lɛ ntɔ usitʰaɓatʰilɛjɔ ukuɓa sifɛlɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ apʰa jini ukuɓa usɛnz̤ɛ intɔ ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ usikʰupʰɛ ɛjiputa asililɔ ɛli iliz̤wi ɛɓɛsilitʰɛtʰa kuwɛ ɛjiputa sisitʰi sijɛkɛ siwakʰɔnz̤ɛ amajiputa kuɓa kuɓɛ kusilunɡ̤ɛlɛ kaɲɛ ukuɓa sikʰɔnz̤ɛ amajiputa kunɔkuɓa sifɛlɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ apʰa watʰi umɔsɛs ɛɓantwini musani ukɔjika niluɓɔnɛ usind̤isɔ lukajɛhɔv̤a aja kunɛnz̤ɛla lɔna nam̤la kuɓa amajiputa lawɔ niwaɓɔnilɛjɔ nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ anisaji kupʰind̤a niwaɓɔnɛ napʰakad̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uja kunilwɛla kɛ nija kutʰi kǀwaka watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs jini ukuɓa ukʰalɛ tʰɛtʰa kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓand̤ulukɛ kɛ wɛna pʰakamisa intɔnɡ̤a jakʰɔ wɔlulɛ isanɮa sakʰɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔlwanɮɛ ulwaɬulɛ ɓahamɓɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli pʰakatʰi kɔlwanɮɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni ɔwɔmilɛjɔ mna kɛ jaɓɔna nd̤ija kuz̤ɛnz̤a lukʰuni iintliz̤ijɔ z̤amajiputa anɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ nd̤iz̤ukisɛkɛ nɡ̤ɔfarɔ nanɡ̤ɛmpi jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔkulwa nanɡ̤aɓamahaʃɛ ɓakʰɛ az̤i amajiputa ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɛkuz̤ukisɛkɛni nɡ̤ɔfarɔ nanɡ̤ɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔkulwa nanɡ̤aɓamahaʃɛ ɓakʰɛ sɛsuka isitʰuɲwa sikatʰikǁɔ ɛsiɓɛ sihamɓa pʰamɓi kwɛmfud̤uka jamasirajɛli sahamɓa ɛmv̤a kwajɔ wɛsuka umkǃulu wɛlifu pʰamɓi kwajɔ wɛma ɛmv̤a kwajɔ watʰi z̤inz̤i pʰakatʰi kwɛmpi jamajiputa nɛmfud̤uka jamasirajɛli kwaɓakʰɔ nɔɓumɲama kumajiputa laɓukʰaɲisɛla uɓusuku kumasirajɛli akasɔnd̤ɛlana uɓusuku ɓɔnkɛ umɔsɛs wasɔlula isanɮa sakʰɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔlwanɮɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ulwanɮɛ nɡ̤ɔmɔja wasɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɔnamanɮa ɓɔnkɛ ɔɓɔ ɓusuku walwɛnz̤a um̤laɓa ɔwɔmilɛjɔ ulwanɮɛ aɬulɛlana amanz̤i ɓanɡ̤ɛna ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛlwanɮɛ pʰakatʰi kɔwɔmilɛjɔ amanz̤i aɓa lud̤ɔnɡ̤a nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ nanɡ̤asɛkʰɔɬɔ asukɛla amajiputa anɡ̤ɛna ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ ɛlwanɮɛ pʰakatʰi ɛnamahaʃɛ ɔnkɛ kafarɔ nɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔkulwa naɓamahaʃɛ ɓakʰɛ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmlind̤ɔ wɔkusa ujɛhɔv̤a wakǃɔnd̤ɛla ɛmpini jamajiputa ɛsɛmkǃulwini wɔmlilɔ nɛlifu wajid̤uɓad̤uɓa jamajiputa wajid̤ɔɲula imilɛnz̤ɛ jɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤awɔ z̤ɔkulwa az̤ikǃʰuɓa nz̤ima atʰi amajiputa masisaɓɛ pʰamɓi kwamasirajɛli kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ujawalwɛla ɛsilwa namajiputa watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs jɔlula isanɮa sakʰɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔlwanɮɛ amanz̤i aɓujɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kwamajiputa pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤awɔ z̤ɔkulwa napʰɛz̤u kwaɓamahaʃɛ ɓawɔ wasɔlula umɔsɛs isanɮa sakʰɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔlwanɮɛ ulwanɮɛ lwaɓujɛla ɛɓumɛni ɓalɔ ukutʰi kǃʰipʰu kɔkusa asaɓa amajiputa asinɡ̤a kulɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wawav̤utʰululɛla amajiputa pʰakatʰi ɛlwanɮɛ aɓuja amanz̤i az̤iɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla iiŋ̤ǃ̤wɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa naɓamahaʃɛ nɛmpi jɔnkɛ kafarɔ ɛjajinɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛmv̤a kwawɔ ɛlwanɮɛ nɔkɔ amɲɛ kuwɔ ɓɔna ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓahamɓa ɛm̤laɓɛni ɔwɔmilɛjɔ pʰakatʰi ɛlwanɮɛ amanz̤i aɓa lud̤ɔnɡ̤a nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ nanɡ̤asɛkʰɔɬɔ wawasind̤isa ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤alɔɔ amasirajɛli ɛsanɮɛni samajiputa amasirajɛli awaɓɔna amajiputa ɛfilɛ ɛluŋǁwɛmɛni lɔlwanɮɛ asiɓɔna amasirajɛli isanɮa ɛsikʰulu asiɓɔnakalalisilɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kumajiputa ɓamɔjika aɓantu ujɛhɔv̤a ɓakʰɔlwa nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nanɡ̤umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɛ waz̤a umɔsɛs waɬaɓɛla lɛ nɡ̤ɔma kujɛhɔv̤a ɛnɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓat͡ʃɔ ukutʰi nd̤ija kuɬaɓɛla kujɛhɔv̤a kuɓa ɛnɔɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa ɔɓukʰulu ihaʃɛ nɔmkʰwɛli walɔ uliz̤ulumɓɛlɛ ɛlwanɮɛ ukǃʰajija unɡ̤ɔma jam nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a waɓa lusind̤isɔ ulɔtʰikǁɔ ɛnd̤imz̤ukisajɔ utʰikǁɔ kaɓawɔ ɛnd̤impʰakamisajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a jind̤ɔd̤a ɛlwajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a liɡ̤ama lakʰɛ iiŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa z̤ikafarɔ nɛmpi jakʰɛ waz̤ipʰɔsa ɛlwanɮɛ aɓaɬɛliwɛjɔ kuɓapʰatʰimikʰɔsi ɓakʰɛ ɓat͡ʃɔniswɛ ɛlwanɮɛ ɔluɓɔmv̤u amanz̤i ɛnz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓila aɓaɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɛ ɓɛɬɛla ɛz̤inz̤ulwini nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlitʲɛ isanɮa sakʰɔ sɔkunɛnɛ jɛhɔv̤a siv̤ɛtʰɛ amanɮa isanɮa sakʰɔ sɔkunɛnɛ jɛhɔv̤a siv̤ikiv̤a ut͡ʃaɓa nɡ̤ɔɓukʰulu ɓɔɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa ɓakʰɔ uɓaɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ulɛ aɓakǀʰasi ɓakʰɔ ukʰupʰa ukuv̤utʰa kwakʰɔ kuɓaɮɛ ɓɔna nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnd̤iz̤a nɡ̤ɔkufutʰa kwamatʰatʰa akʰɔ afund͡ʒ̤wa amanz̤i jɛma nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmfumɓa imikǃukukǃɛla ad͡ʒ̤ija amanz̤i ɛnz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓila ɛmɓilinini jɔlwanɮɛ lwatʰi ut͡ʃaɓa nd̤ijasukɛla nd̤ijafumana nd̤aɓa ikǁʰɔɓa umkǁʰɛlɔ ujaz̤anɛlisa kuɓɔ nd̤ixɔla ik͡xɛlɛ sija kuɓaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤a isanɮa wafutʰa nɡ̤ɔmɔja wakʰɔ lwaɓaɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla ulwanɮɛ ɓaz̤ulumɓɛka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlɔtʰɛ ɛmanz̤ini anɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa nɡ̤uɓani ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɛ pʰakatʰi kɔɔtʰikǁɔ jɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤uɓani ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɛ wɛna uv̤ɛtʰɛ uɓuŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ wɔjikɛkajɔ ɛz̤ind̤umiswɛni wɛnz̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓalulɛkilɛjɔ wɔlula isanɮa sakʰɔ sɔkunɛnɛ um̤laɓa ujaɓaɡ̤iɲa ujaɓakʰɔkɛla nɡ̤ɛŋǀɛɓa jakʰɔ aɓantu aɓa uɓaɬawulɛlɛjɔ uɓakʰululɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkǃilima lwakʰɔ uɓatʰund̤ɛz̤ɛla ɛkʰajɛni lakʰɔ ɛliŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤iv̤ilɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ijaŋ̤ǃ̤unɡ̤a aɓɛmi ɓasɛfilisti ɓaɓand͡ʒ̤wɛ kukuz̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤a z̤az̤a z̤akʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰a iz̤ikʰulu z̤akwaɛd̤ɔm iind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlɛ z̤akwamɔwab̤i z̤aɓand͡ʒ̤wa kukutʰutʰumɛla ɓatʰa amanɮa ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmi ɓɛlakwakanan ɓawɛlwa kukud̤ɛnɡ̤a nakukunkwantʲa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓukʰulu ɓɛnɡ̤alɔ jakʰɔ ɓatʰi kǀwaka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlitʲɛ ɓad̤ɛ ɓaɮulɛ aɓantu ɓakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a ɓad̤ɛ ɓaɮulɛ aɓɔ ɓantu uɓaz̤uz̤ilɛjɔ uja kuɓanɡ̤ɛnisa uɓatʲalɛ ɛntaɓɛni jɛlifa lakʰɔ ɛnd̤awɛni ɔjɛnz̤ɛlɛ ukuɓa uɬalɛ kujɔ jɛhɔv̤a ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni ɛz̤ijilunɡ̤isilɛjɔ iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uja kuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ kanapʰakad̤ɛ kuɓa lanɡ̤ɛna ɛlwanɮɛ ihaʃɛ likafarɔ nɛŋǃwɛlɔ jakʰɛ jɔkulwa naɓamahaʃɛ ɓakʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wawaɓujisɛla pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ amanz̤i ɔlwanɮɛ kɛ ɓɔna ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓahamɓa kɔwɔmilɛjɔ pʰakatʰi ɛlwanɮɛ umirijam umprɔfɛtikaz̤i ud̤ad̤ɛ ɓɔarɔn watʰaɓatʰa iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɛ apʰuma ɔnkɛ amankaz̤ana ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ ɛnɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔ ɛŋ̤ǃ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤a wawapʰɛnd̤ula umirijam watʰi v̤umani kujɛhɔv̤a kuɓa ɛnɔɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa ɔɓukʰulu ihaʃɛ nɔmkʰwɛli walɔ uliz̤ulumɓɛlɛ ɛlwanɮɛ umɔsɛs wawand̤ulula amasirajɛli ɛmka ɛlwanɮɛ ɔluɓɔmv̤u apʰuma aja ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛʃurɛ ahamɓa iint͡suku z̤antatʰu ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ manz̤i afika ɛmara akaɓa nakuwasɛla amanz̤i asɛmara kuɓa ajɛk͡xak͡xa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ nd̤awɔ kwatʰiwa jimara aɓantu ɓamk͡xɔk͡xɛla umɔsɛs ɓɛsitʰi sija kusɛla ntɔni wad̤and̤uluka kujɛhɔv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a wamɓɔnisa umtʰi wawupʰɔsa ɛmanz̤ini aɓa mnand̤i amanz̤i kʰɔna apʰɔ waɓamisɛla ummisɛlɔ nɛsikɔ kʰɔna apʰɔ waɓav̤av̤aɲa watʰi ukuɓa utʰɛ walipʰulapʰula iz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ wɛnz̤a ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ wajiɓɛkɛla inɮɛɓɛ imitʰɛtʰɔ jakʰɛ wajiɡ̤ǀ̤ina jɔnkɛ imimisɛlɔ jakʰɛ and̤iji kuɓɛka nasiɲɛ isifɔ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ ɛnd̤isiɓɛkilɛjɔ pʰɛz̤u kwamajiputa kuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a iɡ̤ǃ̤ixa lakʰɔ ɓafika ɛɛlim apʰɔ kwajɛ kukʰɔ imitʰɔmɓɔ jamanz̤i ɛliʃumi ɛlinamiɓini nɛmitʰi jɛsund̤u ɛnɡ̤amaʃumi ɔsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓaz̤imisa iintɛntɛ kʰɔna nɡ̤asɛmanz̤ini lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa lɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli land̤uluka ɛɛlim ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛsin ɛpʰakatʰi kwɛɛlim nɛsinaji nɡ̤ɔsuku lwɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɬanu lwɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsiɓini jɔkupʰuma kwaɓɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa laɓak͡xɔk͡xɛla ɔɔmɔsɛs nɔarɔn lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa lɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ apʰɔ ɓatʰi ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kuɓɔ akwaɓa ɓɛsifɛ sisanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa kǁa sasiɬɛli nɡ̤asɛz̤imɓiz̤ɛni z̤ɛɲama sisiɮa isɔnka sad̤a saɬutʰa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nisikʰupʰɛlɛ kulɛ ntlanɡ̤ɔ ukuz̤ɛ nisib̤ub̤isɛ sɔnkɛ ɛsi sikʰunɡ̤u nɡ̤ɛnɮala watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ujaɓɔna nd̤ija kuninisɛla isɔnka siv̤ɛla ɛz̤ulwini ɓapʰumɛ aɓantu ɓaɓutʰɛ isaɓɛlɔ sɛmini ɛsilinɡ̤ɛnɛ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤iɓalinɡ̤ɛ ukuɓa ɓɔhamɓa nɡ̤ɔmjalɛlɔ aɓaji kuhamɓa nɡ̤awɔ kɔtʰi nɡ̤ɛmini jɛsitʰand̤atʰu ɓalunɡ̤isɛ ɔkɔ ɓakuz̤isilɛjɔ kɔɓa nɡ̤umlinɡ̤anisɛlɔ ɔpʰind̤wɛ kaɓini kunɔkɔ ɓatʰɛ ɓakuɓutʰa imiɬa nɡ̤ɛmiɬa watʰi umɔsɛs nɔarɔn kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa nija kwaz̤i ukuɓa nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɔwanikʰupʰajɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nija kuɓuɓɔna uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɛkuɓɛni ɛkuv̤ilɛ ukumk͡xɔk͡xɛla kwɛnu ujɛhɔv̤a tʰina ɓɛsinɡ̤ɔɔɓani ukuɓa nisik͡xɔk͡xɛlɛ watʰi umɔsɛs nija kuɓuɓɔna ɛkutʰini ujɛhɔv̤a aninikɛ iɲama nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa niɮɛ isɔnka niɬutʰɛ ɛkuɓɛni ujɛhɔv̤a ɛkuv̤ilɛ ukuk͡xɔk͡xa kwɛnu ɛnimk͡xɔk͡xɛla nɡ̤akɔ kɛ tʰina sinɡ̤ɔɔɓani anik͡xɔk͡xɛli tʰina nik͡xɔk͡xɛla ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi umɔsɛs kuarɔn jitʰi kwiɓanɮa lɔnkɛ lɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli sɔnd̤ɛlani pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a kuɓa ukuv̤ilɛ ukuk͡xɔk͡xa kwɛnu kɛ kalɔku kǁa wajɛtʰɛtʰa uarɔn kwiɓanɮa lɔnkɛ lɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓakʰanɡ̤ɛla ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ naɓɔ uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɓuɓɔnakala ɛfini watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs watʰi nd̤ikuv̤ilɛ ukuk͡xɔk͡xa kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli tʰɛtʰa naɓɔ utʰi lakut͡ʃɔna ilanɡ̤a nɔɮa iɲama nɔɬutʰa sisɔnka naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa z̤ɛɲuka iz̤aɡ̤witʲi z̤ajiɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla imiŋǃuɓa jɔnkɛ kwaɓakʰɔ umɓɛtʰɛ ɔlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni wɛɲuka umɓɛtʰɛ ɔɓulɛlɛ nankɔ kukʰɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔm̤laɓa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ apʰa ɛkǀɔlɛkilɛjɔ ɛd͡ʒ̤ijilɛjɔ ɛŋǀinanana nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkǃaɓaka ɛm̤laɓɛni ɓajiɓɔna ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓatʰi ɔmɲɛ kɔmɲɛ jintɔni kuɓa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤az̤i ukuɓa jintɔni watʰi umɔsɛs kuɓɔ sɛsi sɔnka sɔna ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa siɓɛ kukuɮa lɛ jilɔɔ ntɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi ɓutʰani jɔna ɛlɔwɔ nɡ̤anɡ̤ɔkuɮa kwakʰɛ ihɔmɛrɛ nɡ̤ɛntlɔkɔ jɔmntu nɡ̤ɔkwɛnani laɓantu ɛlɔwɔ atʰaɓatʰɛlɛ aɓasɛntɛntɛni jakʰɛ ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaɓutʰa ɔmɲɛ kakʰulu ɔmɲɛ kaŋǀinanɛ ɓalinɡ̤anisɛla nɡ̤ɛhɔmɛrɛ akaɡ̤ǃ̤itʰisa ɔɓutʰɛ kakʰulu akasilɛla ɔɓutʰɛ kaŋǀinanɛ ɓaɓutʰa ɛlɔwɔ nɡ̤anɡ̤ɔkuɮa kwakʰɛ watʰi kuɓɔ umɔsɛs umntu makanɡ̤aɓɛki mɓɛkɔ aɓampʰulapʰulanɡ̤a umɔsɛs iŋǁɛɲɛ jajiɓɛka umɓɛkɔ jaɓɔla jaɓa nɛɛmpɛtʰu januka umɔsɛs waɓa nɔɓuxalaxumɛ kuɓɔ ɓajiɓutʰa imisɔ nɡ̤ɛmisɔ ɛlɔwɔ nɡ̤anɡ̤ɔkuɮa kwakʰɛ latʰi lakufud̤umala ilanɡ̤a jaɲiɓilika kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛmini jɛsitʰand̤atʰu ɓaɓutʰa isɔnka sɛmiɬa ɛmiɓini iihɔmɛrɛ ɛz̤imɓini mɲɛ z̤anɡ̤ɛna z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ikʰulu z̤ɛɓanɮa z̤amkǁɛlɛla umɔsɛs watʰi kuz̤ɔ jijɔ lɔɔ ntɔ ajitʰɛtʰilɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔmsɔ lupʰumlɔ jisaɓatʰa ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a jɔsani ɛnikɔsajɔ pʰɛkani ɛnikupʰɛkajɔ z̤iɓɛkɛlɛni jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛsɛlɛjɔ iɡ̤ǀ̤inwɛ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɓajiɓɛka kɛ kwad̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ umɔsɛs waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ ajanuka akwaɓakʰɔ mpɛtʰu kujɔ watʰi umɔsɛs jiɮɛni nam̤la kuɓa nam̤la jisaɓatʰa kujɛhɔv̤a nam̤la aniji kujifumana ɛnɮɛ nɔjiɓutʰa imiɬa ɛmitʰand̤atʰu nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ jisaɓatʰa aji kuɓakʰɔ nɡ̤awɔ kutʰɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kwapʰuma iŋǁɛɲɛ jaɓantu jaja kuɓutʰa ajafumana ntɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs kuja kud̤a kuɓɛ ninɡ̤av̤umi ukujiɡ̤ǀ̤ina imitʰɛtʰɔ jam nɛmijalɛlɔ jam nijaɓɔna kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uninikɛ isaɓatʰa kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ atʰɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰand̤atʰu isɔnka sɛmiɬa ɛmiɓini ɬalani ɛlɔwɔ ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ makunɡ̤apʰumi ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓajɛ ɓɛpʰumla kɛ aɓantu nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ inɮu kasirajɛli jatʰi iɡ̤ama lalɛ ntɔ jimana jajind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmɓɛwu jɛkɔrijand̤irɛ im̤lɔpʰɛ isɔnɡ̤ɔ sajɔ sind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɔnkana ɛz̤inɔɓusi watʰi umɔsɛs nant͡si intɔ awisɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a z̤alisani ihɔmɛrɛ nɡ̤ajɔ iɡ̤ǀ̤inɛlwɛ iz̤iz̤ukulwana z̤ɛnu ukuz̤ɛ z̤isiɓɔnɛ isɔnka ɛnd̤iniɮisɛ sɔna ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛkunikʰupʰɛni ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa watʰi umɔsɛs kuarɔn tʰaɓatʰa isitʲa siɓɛ siɲɛ uɡ̤alɛlɛ ihɔmɛrɛ kusɔ siz̤alɛ jimana ujiɓɛkɛ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a iɡ̤ǀ̤inɛlwɛ iz̤iz̤ukulwana z̤ɛnu iɡ̤ǀ̤inwɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wamwisɛla umɔsɛs umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ wajiɓɛka uarɔn pʰamɓi kwɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤inɔ ukuɓa iɡ̤ǀ̤inwɛ ɓajiɮa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi manɛ ɓad̤a ɓafika ɛz̤wɛni ɛlimiwɛjɔ ɓajiɮa ɓad̤a ɓafika ɛmd̤ɛni wɛliz̤wɛ lakwakanan kɛ ihɔmɛrɛ isisaɬulɔ sɛʃumi sɛɛfa land̤uluka lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa lɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛsin nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛhamɓɔ z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɓaz̤imisa iintɛntɛ ɛrɛfid̤im akwaɓakʰɔ manz̤i ɔkusɛlwa nɡ̤aɓantu ɓaɓamɓana aɓantu nɔmɔsɛs ɓatʰi sinikɛ amanz̤i sisɛlɛ watʰi umɔsɛs kuɓɔ jini ukuɓa niɓamɓanɛ jini ukuɓa nimlinɡ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓaŋǁanɛlwa amanz̤i apʰɔ aɓantu aɓantu ɓamk͡xɔk͡xɛla umɔsɛs ɓatʰi jini ukuɓa usiɲusɛ sipʰumɛ ɛjiputa nɔsapʰɔ lwɛtʰu nɛmfujɔ jɛtʰu uz̤ɛ kusib̤ub̤isa nɡ̤ɛŋǁanɔ umɔsɛs wad̤and̤uluka kujɛhɔv̤a ɛsitʰi nd̤ija kuɓatʰini aɓa ɓantu sɛkukaŋǀinanɛ ukuɓa ɓand̤ikǁuluɓɛ nɡ̤amatʲɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛla pʰamɓi kwaɓantu utʰaɓatʰɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwasirajɛli aɓɛ nawɛ utʰi nɛntɔnɡ̤a jakʰɔ ɔwawuɓɛtʰa nɡ̤ajɔ umlamɓɔ ujipʰatʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ uhamɓɛ jaɓɔna nd̤ija pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ kʰɔna pʰɛz̤u kwɛliwa ɛhɔrɛb̤ɛ uz̤ɛ uliɓɛtʰɛ kɔpʰuma amanz̤i kulɔ ɓasɛlɛ aɓantu wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ umɔsɛs pʰamɓi kwawɔ amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwasirajɛli watʰi iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ nd̤awɔ jimasa nɛmɛrib̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓamɓana kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkumlinɡ̤a kwaɓɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓɛsitʰi ujɛhɔv̤a ukʰɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu akakʰɔ uamalɛki wɛz̤a nɔsirajɛli ɛrɛfid̤im watʰi umɔsɛs kujɔʃuwa siɬɛlɛlɛ amad̤ɔd̤a uz̤ɛ wɛna upʰumɛ ulwɛ nɔamalɛki nɡ̤ɔmsɔ nd̤ija ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛnd̤uli intɔnɡ̤a katʰikǁɔ isɛsanɮɛni wɛnz̤a ujɔʃuwa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ watʰɛtʰajɔ umɔsɛs kujɛ nɔamalɛki ɓɔna ɔɔmɔsɛs naarɔn nɔhurɛ ɓɛɲuka ɓaja ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛnd̤uli kwatʰi kǁa az̤ipʰakamisilɛjɔ umɔsɛs iz̤anɮa kwɛjisa usirajɛli kwatʰi kǁa az̤iɬisilɛjɔ iz̤anɮa kwɛjisa uamalɛki iz̤anɮa z̤ikamɔsɛs z̤ad̤inwa ɓatʰaɓatʰa ilitʲɛ ɓaliɓɛka pʰant͡si kwakʰɛ waɬala kulɔ ɓatʰi ɔɔarɔn nɔhurɛ ɓaz̤ikǁʰasa iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ ɔmɲɛ ɛnɡ̤apʰa nɔmɲɛ ɛnɡ̤apʰaja z̤az̤imasɛka iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ lad̤a ilanɡ̤a lat͡ʃɔna ujɔʃuwa wamkǀʰitʰa uamalɛki naɓantu ɓakɔwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs kub̤alɛ ɔku kuɓɛ sisikʰumɓuz̤ɔ ɛŋǀwad̤ini ukutʰɛtʰɛ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤ikajɔʃuwa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija kusikǀima impɛla isikʰumɓuz̤ɔ sikaamalɛki pʰant͡si kwamaz̤ulu umɔsɛs wakʰa isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ watʰi iɡ̤ama lasɔ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤aib̤anilɛjam watʰi isanɮa sipʰakaɲisɛlwɛ ɛtrɔnɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uja imfaz̤wɛ nɔamalɛki isiz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛsiz̤ukulwana ujitrɔ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wakwamid̤ijan ujisɛ wɔmkamɔsɛs wajiv̤a jɔnkɛ intɔ utʰikǁɔ aɓɛjɛnz̤ɛlɛ umɔsɛs namasirajɛli aɓantu ɓakʰɛ ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uwakʰupʰilɛ amasirajɛli ɛjiputa ujitrɔ ujisɛ wɔmkamɔsɛs wamtʰaɓatʰa ut͡sipɔra umkamɔsɛs ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa ɛɓɛmnd̤ululɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓɔɓaɓini iɡ̤ama lɔmɲɛ lalinɡ̤uɡ̤ɛrʃɔm kuɓa watʰi ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤umpʰamɓukɛli ɛz̤wɛni lɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a iɡ̤ama lɔmɲɛ lalinɡ̤uɛlijɛz̤ɛrɛ kuɓa watʰi utʰikǁɔ kaɓawɔ uɓɛnɡ̤umŋǀɛd̤i wand̤iɬanɡ̤ula ɛk͡xɛlɛni likafarɔ ujitrɔ ujisɛ wɔmkamɔsɛs wɛz̤a kɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nɔmkakʰɛ kumɔsɛs ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ apʰɔ wajɛmisɛ kʰɔna intɛntɛ ɛntaɓɛni katʰikǁɔ watʰi kumɔsɛs mna jitrɔ unɡ̤ujiɬɔ nd̤iz̤ɛ kuwɛ nd̤inɔmkakʰɔ ɛnɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓɔɓaɓini wapʰuma umɔsɛs waja kumkʰawulɛla ujisɛ wɔmkakʰɛ wakǃuɓud̤a wamanɡ̤a ɓaɓuz̤ana impilɔ ɓanɡ̤ɛna ɛntɛntɛni umɔsɛs wamɓalisɛla ujisɛ wɔmkakʰɛ jɔnkɛ intɔ ujɛhɔv̤a aɓɛjɛnz̤ilɛ kufarɔ nakumajiputa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kasirajɛli nɛŋ̰ǁ̰amlɛkɔ jɔnkɛ aɓajifumanajɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni nɔkuɬanɡ̤ulwa kwaɓɔ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wav̤uja ujitrɔ akukuv̤a kɔnkɛ ukulunɡ̤a aɓɛkwɛnz̤ilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a kusirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkum̤lanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni samajiputa watʰi ujitrɔ makaɓɔnɡ̤wɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔwaniɬanɡ̤ulajɔ ɛsanɮɛni samajiputa nasɛsanɮɛni sikad̤arɔ ɔwaɓaɬanɡ̤ulajɔ aɓantu ɓapʰuma pʰant͡si kwɛsanɮa samajiputa nɡ̤ɔku nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a mkʰulu kɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɛwɛ kwakulɔɔ ntɔ amajiputa aɓɛwakʰukʰumalɛlɛ nɡ̤ajɔ amasirajɛli ujitrɔ ujisɛ wɔmkamɔsɛs wamtʰaɓatʰɛla utʰikǁɔ id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɛz̤a uarɔn namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ɔnkɛ akwasirajɛli ɛsiz̤a kuɮa isɔnka nɔjisɛ wɔmkamɔsɛs pʰamɓi kɔtʰikǁɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ umɔsɛs waɬala watʰɛtʰa amatʲala aɓantu aɓantu ɓakǁʰɔntɛla kumɔsɛs kususɛla kwad̤a kwanɡ̤ɔkuɬwa wajiɓɔna ujisɛ wɔmkamɔsɛs jɔnkɛ intɔ aɓɛjɛnz̤a ɛɓantwini watʰi ijintɔni lɛ ntɔ ujɛnz̤ajɔ ɛɓantwini kunɡ̤ani lɛ ntɔ uɬala wɛd̤wa ɓatʰi ɓɔna ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓakǁʰɔntɛlɛ kuwɛ kususɛla kud̤ɛ kuɬwɛ watʰi umɔsɛs kujisɛ wɔmkakʰɛ kunɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓantu ɓɛsiz̤a ukuɓa nd̤iɓakǀɛlɛlɛ ikǀɛɓɔ kutʰikǁɔ kǁa ɓanɛnd̤awɔ ɓɛz̤a ukuɓa nd̤iɡ̤wɛɓɛ pʰakatʰi kɔmntu nɔmmɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ nd̤iɓaz̤isɛ imimisɛlɔ katʰikǁɔ nɛmijalɛlɔ jakʰɛ watʰi ujisɛ wɔmkamɔsɛs kujɛ ajilunɡ̤ilɛ lɛ ntɔ ujɛnz̤ajɔ uja kuz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa upʰɛlɛ amanɮa naɓa ɓantu unaɓɔ kuɓa lɔ msɛɓɛnz̤i unz̤ima kuwɛ akunakuwɛnz̤a wɛd̤wa pʰulapʰula nɡ̤ɔkɔ iz̤wi nd̤ikupʰɛ ikǃʰinɡ̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɓa nawɛ wɛna jiɓa nɡ̤umlɔmɔ waɓantu kutʰikǁɔ uz̤isɛ iz̤intɔ z̤aɓɔ kutʰikǁɔ uɓafund̤isɛ imimisɛlɔ nɛmijalɛlɔ uɓaz̤isɛ inɮɛla aɓaja kuhamɓa nɡ̤ajɔ nɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i aɓaja kuwɛnz̤a uz̤ɛ uz̤ikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ ɛɓantwini ɓɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a anɔɓunkuŋ̰ǃ̰ɛlɛ ɛkutʰɛtʰɛni amatʲala amɔjikajɔ utʰikǁɔ amad̤ɔd̤a aɲanisilɛjɔ ajitʰijilɛjɔ inz̤uz̤ɔ ɛmɓi uwamisɛ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ aɓɛ nɡ̤aɓatʰɛtʰɛliwaka naɓatʰɛtʰɛlikʰulu naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamaʃumi nɡ̤amaɬanu naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamaʃumi nɡ̤amaɲɛ ɓatʰɛtʰɛ amatʲala aɓantu nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ z̤itʰi iz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤inkulu ɓaz̤iz̤isɛ kuwɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iŋǀinanɛ ɓaz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɛ ɓɔna ukuz̤ɛ kuɓɛ kuwɛ ɓakutʰwalisɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ wajɛnz̤a lɔɔ ntɔ waz̤a wakuwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ utʰikǁɔ wɔɓa nakɔ ɓatʰi naɓa ɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓafikɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jaɓɔ ɓɛnɔkǁɔlɔ umɔsɛs walipʰulapʰula iz̤wi lɔjisɛ wɔmkakʰɛ wajɛnz̤a intɔ jɔnkɛ aɓɛjitʰɛtʰilɛ umɔsɛs waɲula amad̤ɔd̤a anɔɓunkuŋ̰ǃ̰ɛlɛ ɛkutʰɛtʰɛni amatʲala kuwɔ ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli wawɛnz̤a iintlɔkɔ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓantu aɓa nɡ̤aɓatʰɛtʰɛliwaka naɓatʰɛtʰɛlikʰulu naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamaʃumi nɡ̤amaɬanu naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamaʃumi nɡ̤amaɲɛ ɓatʰɛtʰa amatʲala aɓantu nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋǃaɓilɛjɔ ɓaz̤iz̤isa kumɔsɛs z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iŋǀinanɛ ɓaz̤iɡ̤wɛɓa ɓɔna umɔsɛs wamnd̤ulula ujisɛ wɔmkakʰɛ waja ɛliz̤wɛni lakɔwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsitʰatʰu ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkupʰuma kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nɡ̤ajɔ lɔɔ ɓafika ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛsinaji ɓand̤uluka ɛrɛfid̤im ɓafika ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛsinaji ɓalalisa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ iintɛntɛ apʰɔ amasirajɛli malunɡ̤a nɛntaɓa umɔsɛs wɛɲuka waja kutʰikǁɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wad̤and̤uluka kujɛ ɛsɛntaɓɛni apʰɔ watʰi jit͡ʃɔ kwinɮu kajakɔɓi ukǁɛlɛlɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ukutʰi nina nijiɓɔnilɛ intɔ ɛnd̤ijɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kumajiputa ukuɓa nd̤anitʰwala nɡ̤amapʰikɔ ɔkʰɔz̤i nd̤aniz̤isa nɡ̤ɔku kɛ ukuɓa nitʰɛ nalipʰulapʰula ɔkunɛnɛ iz̤wi nawuɡ̤ǀ̤ina umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nɔɓa jiŋǃɔɓɔ kwiz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɔnkɛ kuɓa iɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ lɛlam niɓɛ ɓuɓukumkani ɓaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɔɬanɡ̤a ɔluŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤awɔ lawɔ amaz̤wi ɔja kuwatʰɛtʰa kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli wɛz̤a umɔsɛs wawaɓiz̤a amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu aɓantu waɓɛka pʰamɓi kwawɔ ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi ujɛhɔv̤a awamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤awɔ ɓapʰɛnd̤ula ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu nɡ̤amkǁʰɛlɔ mɲɛ ɓatʰi kɔnkɛ akutʰɛtʰilɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a sɔkwɛnz̤a umɔsɛs wajikǁɛlɛla ujɛhɔv̤a intɛtʰɔ jaɓantu watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs jaɓɔna nd̤ijɛz̤a kuwɛ nd̤isɛlifini ɛliŋ̤ǃ̤iŋ̤ǃ̤wa ukuz̤ɛ ɓɛv̤ɛ aɓantu ɛkutʰɛtʰɛni nawɛ ɓakʰɔlwɛ kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ wawakǁɛla kɛ umɔsɛs amaz̤wi aɓantu kujɛhɔv̤a watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs jija ɛɓantwini uɓaŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛ nam̤la nanɡ̤ɔmsɔ ɓaz̤iɬamɓɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓalunɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰatʰu kuɓa nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰatʰu uja kuɬa ujɛhɔv̤a pʰɛz̤u kwɛntaɓa jɛsinaji ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ uɓamisɛlɛ aɓantu imid̤a nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ utʰi kuɓɔ z̤iɡ̤ǀ̤inɛni ninɡ̤ɛɲukɛli ɛntaɓɛni ninɡ̤awakǀʰukumisi amaz̤ant͡si ajɔ ɔsukuɓa ɛjikǀʰukumisa intaɓa wɔɓulawa afɛ makunɡ̤afiki sanɮa kujɛ makakǁulutʲwɛ nɡ̤amatʲɛ mpɛla atʰi m̤lawumɓi atɔlwɛ nɔkutɔlwa nɔkuɓa jintɔ ɛz̤iz̤itʰɔ z̤inɛ nɔkuɓa nɡ̤umntu akaji kupʰila sakɔlula isand̤i sɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ ukuɬɔkɔma ɓanɡ̤aɲuka ɛntaɓɛni ɓɔna wɛɬa umɔsɛs ɛntaɓɛni waja ɛɓantwini waɓaŋ̤ǀ̤walisa aɓantu ɓaz̤iɬamɓa iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤aɓɔ watʰi ɛɓantwini iz̤ɛ niz̤ilunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ um̤la wɛsitʰatʰu ninɡ̤asɔnd̤ɛli ɛɓafaz̤ini kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰatʰu kwaɓakʰɔ iind̤ud̤umɔ nɛmiɓanɛ nɛlifu ɛlinz̤ima pʰɛz̤u kwɛntaɓa nɛsand̤i sɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɛsɔmɛlɛlɛjɔ kunɛnɛ ɓaɡ̤ub̤a ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓasɛmiŋǃuɓɛni umɔsɛs waɓakʰupʰa aɓantu ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni ɓaja kumkʰawulɛla utʰikǁɔ ɓɛma ɛmaz̤ant͡si ɛntaɓa intaɓa jɛsinaji jaɓa nɡ̤umsi jɔnkɛ ipʰɛla kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a wɛɬa pʰɛz̤u kwajɔ ɛsɛmlilwɛni umsi wajɔ wɛɲuka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsi wɛz̤ikɔ lɛmfutʰɔ jaɲikima kunɛnɛ jɔnkɛ intaɓa kwaɓakʰɔ isand̤i sɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɛsaja sisɔmɛlɛla kakʰulu watʰɛtʰa umɔsɛs utʰikǁɔ wampʰɛnd̤ula nɡ̤ɛsand̤i wɛɬa kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a pʰɛz̤u kwɛntaɓa jɛsinaji ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛntaɓa ujɛhɔv̤a wamɓiz̤ɛla umɔsɛs ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛntaɓa lɛjɔ wɛɲuka kɛ umɔsɛs watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs jiɬa uɓakǃɔnɔnɔnd̤isɛ aɓantu ɬɛz̤ɛ ɓatʰʲɔɓɔz̤ɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a ɓakʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ kwɛnz̤akalɛ intɔ ɛninz̤i kuɓɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɛli aɓasɔnd̤ɛlajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a maɓaz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛ ɬɛz̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a aɓab̤ub̤isɛ watʰi umɔsɛs kujɛhɔv̤a aɓantu aɓanakuɲuka ɓajɛ ɛntaɓɛni jɛsinaji kuɓa wɛna wasikǃɔnɔnɔnd̤isa watʰi jimisɛlɛ imid̤a intaɓa ujiŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɛ hamɓa uɬɛ uz̤ɛ uɲukɛ wɛna ninɔarɔn kɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓantu maɓanɡ̤atʰʲɔɓɔz̤i ɓɛɲukɛ ɓɛz̤ɛ kujɛhɔv̤a ɬɛz̤ɛ aɓab̤ub̤isɛ wɛɬa kɛ umɔsɛs waja ɛɓantwini wat͡ʃɔ kuɓɔ utʰikǁɔ wawatʰɛtʰa kɛ ɔnkɛ maz̤wi watʰi nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ
