ɔkǀɔliwɛjɔ wɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa uɡ̤alɛlwɛ iɔli lwaluɲɛ ukʰamɓa lwɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɔluz̤iiʃɛkɛlɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi luz̤ɛlɛ sisikǃʰumisɔ jaɲɛ inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa itʰɔlɛ lɛnkɔmɔ jaɲɛ inkunz̤i jɛmv̤u jaɲɛ imv̤ana ɛmɲaka mɲɛ z̤iz̤ɛz̤ɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ kɛ ɛz̤ɔ jaɲɛ inkunz̤i jɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛkǁʰɔnti jɛd̤ini lɛsɔnɔ ɛz̤ɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɔkǁɔlɔ z̤amɓini iinkɔmɔ z̤antlanu iinkunz̤i z̤ɛz̤imv̤u z̤antlanu iib̤ɔkʰwɛ z̤antlanu iimv̤ana ɛz̤imɲaka mɲɛ nɡ̤uwɔ lɔwɔ umsɔnd̤ɛz̤ɔ kaab̤id̤an uɲana kaɡ̤id̤ijɔni nɡ̤ɛmini jɛʃumi kwasɔnd̤ɛz̤a jɔɔɲana ɓakad̤an uahijɛz̤ɛrɛ uɲana kaamiʃad̤aji umsɔnd̤ɛz̤ɔ wakʰɛ waɓa sisitʲa ɛsiɲɛ sɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɓulikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi matʰatʰu ɛɛʃɛkɛlɛ uɓunz̤ima ɓasɔ sasiɲɛ isitʲa sɔkut͡ʃiz̤a sɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛsiz̤iiʃɛkɛlɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛʃɛkɛlɛ jɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤ɔz̤iɓini z̤iz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤umɡ̤uɓɔ ɔkǀɔliwɛjɔ wɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa uɡ̤alɛlwɛ iɔli lwaluɲɛ ukʰamɓa lwɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɔluz̤iiʃɛkɛlɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi luz̤ɛlɛ sisikǃʰumisɔ jaɲɛ inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa itʰɔlɛ lɛnkɔmɔ jaɲɛ inkunz̤i jɛmv̤u jaɲɛ imv̤ana ɛmɲaka mɲɛ z̤iz̤ɛz̤ɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ kɛ ɛz̤ɔ jaɲɛ inkunz̤i jɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛkǁʰɔnti jɛd̤ini lɛsɔnɔ ɛz̤ɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɔkǁɔlɔ z̤amɓini iinkɔmɔ z̤antlanu iinkunz̤i z̤ɛz̤imv̤u z̤antlanu iib̤ɔkʰwɛ z̤antlanu iimv̤ana ɛz̤imɲaka mɲɛ nɡ̤uwɔ lɔwɔ umsɔnd̤ɛz̤ɔ kaahijɛz̤ɛrɛ uɲana kaamiʃad̤aji nɡ̤ɛmini jɛʃumi ɛlinaɲɛ kwasɔnd̤ɛz̤a jɔɔɲana ɓakaaʃɛrɛ upaɡ̤ijɛli uɲana kaɔk͡xan umsɔnd̤ɛz̤ɔ wakʰɛ waɓa sisitʲa ɛsiɲɛ sɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɓulikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi matʰatʰu ɛɛʃɛkɛlɛ uɓunz̤ima ɓasɔ sasiɲɛ isitʲa sɔkut͡ʃiz̤a sɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛsiz̤iiʃɛkɛlɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛʃɛkɛlɛ jɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤ɔz̤iɓini z̤iz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤umɡ̤uɓɔ ɔkǀɔliwɛjɔ wɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa uɡ̤alɛlwɛ iɔli lwaluɲɛ ukʰamɓa lwɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɔluz̤iiʃɛkɛlɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi luz̤ɛlɛ sisikǃʰumisɔ jaɲɛ inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa itʰɔlɛ lɛnkɔmɔ jaɲɛ inkunz̤i jɛmv̤u jaɲɛ imv̤ana ɛmɲaka mɲɛ z̤iz̤ɛz̤ɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ kɛ ɛz̤ɔ jaɲɛ inkunz̤i jɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛkǁʰɔnti jɛd̤ini lɛsɔnɔ ɛz̤ɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɔkǁɔlɔ z̤amɓini iinkɔmɔ z̤antlanu iinkunz̤i z̤ɛz̤imv̤u z̤antlanu iib̤ɔkʰwɛ z̤antlanu iimv̤ana ɛz̤imɲaka mɲɛ nɡ̤uwɔ lɔwɔ umsɔnd̤ɛz̤ɔ kapaɡ̤ijɛli uɲana kaɔk͡xan nɡ̤ɛmini jɛʃumi ɛlinamɓini kwasɔnd̤ɛz̤a jɔɔɲana ɓakanafɛtali uahira uɲana kaɛnana umsɔnd̤ɛz̤ɔ wakʰɛ waɓa sisitʲa ɛsiɲɛ sɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɓulikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi matʰatʰu ɛɛʃɛkɛlɛ uɓunz̤ima ɓasɔ sasiɲɛ isitʲa sɔkut͡ʃiz̤a sɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛsiz̤iiʃɛkɛlɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛʃɛkɛlɛ jɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤ɔz̤iɓini z̤iz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤umɡ̤uɓɔ ɔkǀɔliwɛjɔ wɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa uɡ̤alɛlwɛ iɔli lwaluɲɛ ukʰamɓa lwɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɔluz̤iiʃɛkɛlɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi luz̤ɛlɛ sisikǃʰumisɔ jaɲɛ inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa itʰɔlɛ lɛnkɔmɔ jaɲɛ inkunz̤i jɛmv̤u jaɲɛ imv̤ana ɛmɲaka mɲɛ z̤iz̤ɛz̤ɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ kɛ ɛz̤ɔ jaɲɛ inkunz̤i jɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛkǁʰɔnti jɛd̤ini lɛsɔnɔ ɛz̤ɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɔkǁɔlɔ z̤amɓini iinkɔmɔ z̤antlanu iinkunz̤i z̤ɛz̤imv̤u z̤antlanu iib̤ɔkʰwɛ z̤antlanu iimv̤ana ɛz̤imɲaka mɲɛ nɡ̤uwɔ lɔwɔ umsɔnd̤ɛz̤ɔ kaahira uɲana kaɛnan kukɔ ɔkɔ ukusunɡ̤ulwa kwɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ satʰand͡ʒ̤iswa z̤iz̤ikʰulu z̤akwasirajɛli z̤aɓa liʃumi ɛlinaz̤iɓini iz̤itʲa z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ z̤aliʃumi ɛlinaz̤iɓini iz̤itʲa z̤ɔkut͡ʃiz̤a z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ z̤aliʃumi ɛlinamɓini iinkamɓa z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ salikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi matʰatʰu ɛɛʃɛkɛlɛ isitʲa sɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ sisiɲɛ sanɡ̤amaʃumi ɔsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛɛʃɛkɛlɛ isitʲa sɔkut͡ʃiz̤a sisiɲɛ ijɔnkɛ isiliv̤ɛrɛ jɛz̤ɔ mpaɬa jaɓa nɡ̤amawaka amaɓini anamakʰulu manɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛʃɛkɛlɛ jɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤aɓa liʃumi ɛlinamɓini iinkamɓa z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ z̤iz̤ɛlɛ sisikǃʰumisɔ z̤aliʃumi iiʃɛkɛlɛ kukʰamɓa luluɲɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛʃɛkɛlɛ jɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ijɔnkɛ iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ jɛɛnkamɓa jaɓa likʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɓini z̤iz̤ɔnkɛ iinkɔmɔ z̤ɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ z̤aɓa z̤iinkunz̤i ɛz̤int͡ʃa ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛlinamɓini nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛz̤imv̤u z̤aɓaliʃumi ɛlinamɓini nɛɛmv̤ana ɛz̤imɲaka mɲɛ z̤aɓa liʃumi ɛlinamɓini nɛminikɛlɔ jaz̤ɔ jɔkuɮa nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛz̤ikǁʰɔnti z̤ɛd̤ini lɛsɔnɔ z̤aɓa liʃumi ɛlinamɓini z̤ɔnkɛ iinkɔmɔ z̤ɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɔkǁɔlɔ z̤ajɛ z̤inɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmaɓini ananɛ iinkunz̤i ɛz̤int͡ʃa nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛz̤imv̤u z̤aɓa nɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmatʰand̤atʰu nɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ z̤aɓa nɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmatʰand̤atʰu nɛɛmv̤ana ɛz̤imɲaka mɲɛ z̤aɓa nɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmatʰand̤atʰu kukɔ ɔkɔ ukusunɡ̤ulwa kwɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkutʰand͡ʒ̤iswa kwasɔ kɛ ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kukamɔsɛs ɛntɛntɛni jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana ukuɓa atʰɛtʰɛ najɛ wɛv̤a iz̤wi litʰɛtʰa kujɛ liv̤ɛla ɛsiɬalwɛni sɔkukǀamaɡ̤uʃa ɛsipʰɛz̤u kwɛtʲɛja jɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤inɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛɛkɛrub̤i z̤ɔmɓini watʰɛtʰa kɛ jɛna kujɛ watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɛsitʰi tʰɛtʰa kuarɔn utʰi kujɛ ɛkuz̤imisɛni kwakʰɔ iz̤iɓanɛ maz̤ikʰaɲisɛ z̤ib̤ɛkisɛ pʰamɓili pʰamɓi kwɛsipʰatʰɔ sɛz̤iɓanɛ iz̤iɓanɛ z̤ɔsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ uarɔn waz̤imisa iz̤iɓanɛ z̤asɔ z̤ab̤ɛkisa pʰamɓili pʰamɓi kwɛsipʰatʰɔ sɛz̤iɓanɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wamwisɛlajɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ umɔsɛs kukɔ ɔku ukusɛtʲɛnz̤wa kwɛsipʰatʰɔ saɓa jiɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛkʰand̤iwɛjɔ ɛsikʰɔnd̤wɛni sasɔ ɛz̤intʲantʲamɓɛni z̤asɔ inɡ̤umkʰand̤ɔ wɔna nɡ̤ɔkɔmfuz̤isɛlɔ ujɛhɔv̤a awamɓɔnisa wɔna umɔsɛs wasɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ isipʰatʰɔ watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɛsitʰi tʰaɓatʰa aɓalɛv̤i pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli uɓaɬamɓululɛ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ kɛ ukuɓaɬamɓulula ɓafɛfɛ nɡ̤amanz̤i ɛsɔnɔ ɓahamɓisɛ isit͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ sɔkuŋǃutʰula ɛɲamɛni jaɓɔ jɔnkɛ ɓaɬamɓɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓaɬamɓulukɛ ɓaz̤ɛ ɓatʰaɓatʰɛ inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa itʰɔlɛ lɛnkɔmɔ nɔmnikɛlɔ wajɔ wɔkuɮa umɡ̤uɓɔ ɔkǀɔliwɛjɔ uɡ̤alɛlwɛ iɔli utʰaɓatʰɛ ɛjɛsiɓini inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa itʰɔlɛ lɛnkɔmɔ jɛd̤ini lɛsɔnɔ wɔɓasɔnd̤ɛz̤a aɓalɛv̤i pʰamɓi kwɛntɛntɛ jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana uɓiz̤ɛlɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa lɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli uɓasɔnd̤ɛz̤ɛ aɓalɛv̤i pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɓakǀinɛz̤ɛlɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔpʰɛz̤u kwaɓalɛv̤i aɓat͡ʃanɡ̤at͡ʃanɡ̤isɛ uarɔn aɓalɛv̤i ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤umt͡ʃanɡ̤at͡ʃanɡ̤isɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɔv̤ɛla kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓɔkusɛɓɛnz̤a umsɛɓɛnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a aɓalɛv̤i ɓɔkǀinɛz̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤ɛɛnkunz̤i ɛz̤int͡ʃa ɛz̤ɔ ɛɲɛ ujɛnz̤ɛ id̤ini lɛsɔnɔ ɛɲɛ id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a ukukǀamaɡ̤uʃɛla aɓalɛv̤i uz̤ɛ uɓamisɛ kɛ aɓalɛv̤i pʰamɓi kɔarɔn napʰamɓi kɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ uɓat͡ʃanɡ̤at͡ʃanɡ̤isɛ ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤umt͡ʃanɡ̤at͡ʃanɡ̤isɔ kujɛhɔv̤a uɓaɬulɛ aɓalɛv̤i kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓam aɓalɛv̤i ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ ɓɔnɡ̤ɛna aɓalɛv̤i ɓasɛɓɛnz̤ɛ ɛntɛntɛni jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana uɓaɬamɓululɛ kɛ uɓat͡ʃanɡ̤at͡ʃanɡ̤isɛ ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤umt͡ʃanɡ̤at͡ʃanɡ̤isɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iɓanikiwɛ nd̤aɓanikwa pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nd̤aɓatʰaɓatʰɛla ɛsikʰunɮɛni saɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓav̤ula isiz̤alɔ amaz̤iɓulɔ ɔnkɛ kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤awam ɔnkɛ amaz̤iɓulɔ pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛɓantwini nasɛz̤inkɔmɛni nd̤awaɓɛtʰa ɔnkɛ amaz̤iɓulɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nd̤awaŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛla nd̤atʰaɓatʰa aɓalɛv̤i ɛsikʰunɮɛni samaz̤iɓulɔ ɔnkɛ pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓalɛv̤i kɛ nd̤iɓanikɛ nd̤aɓanika uarɔn nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ukuɓa ɓasɛɓɛnz̤ɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛntɛntɛni jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana ɓaɓakǀamaɡ̤uʃɛlɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ukuz̤ɛkunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ siɓɛtʰɔ pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛkusɔnd̤ɛlɛni kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni ɓɛnz̤a kɛ ɔɔmɔsɛs nɔarɔn nɛɓanɮa lɔnkɛ lɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kuɓalɛv̤i nɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ ujɛhɔv̤a awamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ umɔsɛs nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓalɛv̤i ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kuɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaz̤iɬamɓulula isɔnɔ aɓalɛv̤i ɓaɬamɓa iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤aɓɔ uarɔn waɓat͡ʃanɡ̤at͡ʃanɡ̤isa ɓaɓa nɡ̤umt͡ʃanɡ̤at͡ʃanɡ̤isɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a uarɔn waɓakǀamaɡ̤uʃɛla ukuɓa ɓaɬamɓulukɛ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ ɓanɡ̤ɛna aɓalɛv̤i ukuɓa ɓasɛɓɛnz̤ɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i waɓɔ ɛntɛntɛni jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana pʰamɓi kɔarɔn napʰamɓi kɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ umɔsɛs nɡ̤aɓalɛv̤i ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kuɓɔ watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɛsitʰi nant͡si ind̤awɔ ɛjɛjaɓalɛv̤i ɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kɔmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini anɛsiɬanu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ɓaɲusɛ maɓɛz̤ɛ kupʰuma umkʰɔsi wɔkusɛɓɛnz̤a ɛntɛntɛni jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana ɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kɔmiɲaka imaʃumi maɬanu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ɓɔɓuja ɛkupʰumɛni umkʰɔsi wɔkusɛɓɛnz̤a ɓanɡ̤aɓi sasɛɓɛnz̤a kɛ maɓasɛɓɛlunɡ̤isɛlɛla aɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ ɛntɛntɛni jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana nɡ̤ɔkutʰi ɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina ɓanɡ̤asɛɓɛnz̤i msɛɓɛnz̤i uja kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kuɓalɛv̤i ɛz̤iɡ̤ǁ̤inɛni z̤aɓɔ watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛsinaji nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsiɓini wɔkupʰuma kwaɓɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɔkukǃala ɛsitʰi ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli maɓajɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lajɔ ɛlimisiwɛjɔ nɔjɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsinɛ kulɔɔ ɲanɡ̤a lakut͡ʃɔna ilanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lajɔ ɛlimisiwɛjɔ nɔjɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛmimisɛlɔ jajɔ jɔnkɛ nanɡ̤ɔkwamasikɔ ajɔ ɔnkɛ watʰɛtʰa kɛ umɔsɛs kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ukuɓa ɓajɛnz̤ɛ ɓajɛnz̤a kɛ nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɔkukǃala nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsinɛ lakut͡ʃɔna ilanɡ̤a ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛsinaji nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ ujɛhɔv̤a aɓɛmwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ umɔsɛs ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kɛ kwakukʰɔ amad̤ɔd̤a awajɛtʰɛ az̤ɛnz̤a iiŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɔmntu ɔfilɛjɔ akaɓa nakɔ ukujɛnz̤a nɡ̤alɔɔ m̤la asɔnd̤ɛla pʰamɓi kɔmɔsɛs napʰamɓi kɔarɔn nɡ̤alɔɔ m̤la atʰi lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a kujɛ siz̤iiŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɔmntu ɔfilɛjɔ siv̤alɛlwa nɡ̤ani ukuɓa sinɡ̤asɔnd̤ɛz̤i umsɔnd̤ɛz̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lawɔ ɛlimisiwɛjɔ pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli watʰi umɔsɛs kuwɔ jimani kʰɛ nd̤iv̤ɛ ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a wɔwisa mtɛtʰɔ nanɡ̤ani watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɛsitʰi tʰɛtʰa kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli utʰi umntu nɡ̤ɔmntu kǁa atʰɛ wajiŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɔfilɛjɔ m̤lawumɓi wasɛluhamɓɛni ɛhamɓɛlɛ kud̤ɛ ɛnɡ̤ɔwakuni nɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔwɛz̤iz̤ukulwana z̤ɛnu wɔjɛnz̤a kujɛhɔv̤a ɓɔjɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsiɓini nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsinɛ lakut͡ʃɔna ilanɡ̤a kuɲɛ nɛz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ ɓajiɮɛ inɛmitʰana ɛk͡xak͡xa ɓanɡ̤asalisi ntɔ kujɔ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɓanɡ̤apʰuli tʰamɓɔ lajɔ ɓɔjɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔmmisɛlɔ wɔnkɛ wɛpasika kɛ lɔwɔ uɬamɓulukilɛjɔ jɛna unɡ̤ɛkʰɔna ɛluhamɓɛni ɛtʰɛ wajɛka ukujɛnz̤a lɔɔ mpʰɛfumlɔ wɔŋǃaɲulwa unɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ɛɓantwini ɓakɔwawɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akawusɔnd̤ɛz̤anɡ̤a umsɔnd̤ɛz̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lawɔ ɛlimisiwɛjɔ lɔɔ wɔsitʰwala isɔnɔ sakʰɛ umpʰamɓukɛli kǁa atʰɛ wapʰamɓukɛla wɔjɛnz̤a kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔmmisɛlɔ wɛpasika nanɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ lajɔ wɔjɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ummisɛlɔ wɔɓa mɲɛ nakumpʰamɓukɛli nakɔz̤alɛlwɛ kulɔ iliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɔkumiswa kɔmŋǃuɓa lawusiɓɛkɛla umŋǃuɓa wɛntɛntɛ jɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤inɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa land͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmɓɔnakalɔ jɔmlilɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔmŋǃuɓa kwad̤a kwaɬala kund͡ʒ̤alɔ lawusiɓɛkɛla ɛmini laɓa jimɓɔnakalɔ jɔmlilɔ ɛɓusuku kuɓɛ kusitʰi linɡ̤aɲuka lisukɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛntɛntɛ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ ɓand̤ulukɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kutʰi ɛnd̤awɛni ɛlitʰɛ z̤inz̤i kujɔ ɓamisɛ iintɛntɛ kʰɔna ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkɔmlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɓand̤uluka ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkɔmlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɓamisa jɔnkɛ imiɬa ɛlatʰi z̤inz̤i nɡ̤ajɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔmŋǃuɓa ɓamisa lakɔlula imiɬa ɛmininz̤i liɬɛli pʰɛz̤u kɔmŋǃuɓa ɓasiɡ̤ǀ̤ina isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina sikajɛhɔv̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓand̤uluka kwatʰi lakuɓakʰɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔmŋǃuɓa nɔkuɓa jimiɬa ɛmɓalwa ɓasiɡ̤ǀ̤ina isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina sikajɛhɔv̤a aɓand̤uluka nɡ̤ɔkɔmlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɓamisa nɡ̤ɔkɔmlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɓand̤uluka kuɓɛ kusitʰi lakuɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa kud̤ɛ kusɛ lakuɲuswa kɛ ɓand̤ulukɛ nɔkuɓaɓɛkusɛmini nɔkuɓa ɓɛkusɛɓusuku lakuɲuswa ɓand̤uluka nɔkuɓa jimiɬa ɛmiɓini nɔkuɓa jiɲanɡ̤a nɔkuɓa jimiɬa ɛtʰilɛ ukɔlula kwɛlifu pʰɛz̤u kɔmŋǃuɓa ukutʰi z̤inz̤i kwalɔ pʰɛz̤u kwawɔ ɓamisa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓand̤uluka ɛkuɲukɛni kwalɔ kɛ ɓand̤uluka nɡ̤ɔkɔmlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɓamisa nɡ̤ɔkɔmlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɓand̤uluka ɓasiɡ̤ǀ̤ina isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina sikajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔmlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikamɔsɛs watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɛsitʰi z̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ amakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛkʰand̤iwɛjɔ aɓɛ maɓini aɓɛ nɡ̤awɔkuɓiz̤a iɓanɮa nɔkund̤ulula imiŋǃuɓa kwakuv̤utʰɛlwa ikǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ kukǃut͡ʃwa lɔz̤iɬanɡ̤anisɛla kuwɛ lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛntɛntɛ jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana ukuɓa kutʰɛ kwav̤utʰɛlwa ikǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ kwakǃut͡ʃwa nɡ̤akaɲɛ z̤ɔz̤iɬanɡ̤anisɛla kuwɛ iz̤ikʰulu iintlɔkɔ z̤amawaka akwasirajɛli nakuv̤utʰɛla nɔlulɛ jɔnd̤uluka imiŋǃuɓa ɛmisɛ iintɛntɛ nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a nakuv̤utʰɛla nɔlulɛ ɔkwɛsiɓini jɔnd̤uluka imiŋǃuɓa ɛmisɛ nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si ɓɔv̤utʰɛla ɓɔlulɛ ukuɓa ind̤ulukɛ ɛkusiɓiz̤ɛlɛni nd̤awɔɲɛ isikʰunɡ̤u nɔv̤utʰɛla nikǃupʰɛ ninɡ̤av̤utʰɛli nɔlulɛ ɓɔv̤utʰɛla nɡ̤amakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaarɔn aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli iɓɛ nɡ̤ummisɛlɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ z̤iz̤ukulwana z̤ɛnu kǁa nitʰɛ naja ɛz̤wɛni lɛnu nɔmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɔniɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlajɔ nav̤utʰɛla nɡ̤amakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ nɔlula nɔkʰund͡ʒ̤ulwa pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nisind̤iswɛ ɛz̤int͡ʃaɓɛni z̤ɛnu nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɔv̤ujɔ lwɛnu nanɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ɛnu amisiwɛjɔ nasɛkutʰwasɛni kwɛɛɲanɡ̤a z̤ɛnu nɔv̤utʰɛla nikǃupʰɛ nɡ̤amakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ pʰɛz̤u kwamad̤ini ɛnu aɲukajɔ napʰɛz̤u kwɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɛnu jɔkǁɔlɔ iɓɛ sisikʰumɓuz̤ɔ sɛnu pʰamɓi kɔtʰikǁɔ wɛnu nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsiɓini nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsiɓini nɡ̤ɔlwamaʃumi ɔmaɓini ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ lɛɲuswa lɛmka pʰɛz̤u kɔmŋǃuɓa wɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤inɔ ɓand̤uluka kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛhamɓɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛsinaji latʰi z̤inz̤i ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛparan ɓand̤uluka ɛkukǃalɛni nɡ̤ɔkɔmlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikamɔsɛs kukǃala kɛ kwand̤uluka ib̤anilɛ jɛmiŋǃuɓa jɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛmikʰɔsi jaɓɔ inɡ̤unaʃɔn uɲana kaaminad̤ab̤i pʰɛz̤u kɔmkʰɔsi wakʰɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔmkʰɔsi wɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakaisakarɛ inɡ̤unatanijɛli uɲana kat͡suharɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔmkʰɔsi wɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn inɡ̤uɛlijab̤i uɲana kaɛlɔn wawiswa umŋǃuɓa ɓand̤uluka kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ɛrʃɔn nɔɔɲana ɓakamɛrari ɓɛwutʰwɛlɛ umŋǃuɓa jand̤uluka ib̤anilɛ jɛmiŋǃuɓa jɔɔɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn nɡ̤ɔkwɛmikʰɔsi jaɓɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔmkʰɔsi wakʰɛ inɡ̤uɛlit͡surɛ uɲana kaʃɛd̤ɛjurɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔmkʰɔsi wɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakasimɔn inɡ̤uʃɛlumijɛli uɲana kat͡suriʃad̤aji pʰɛz̤u kɔmkʰɔsi wɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ad̤i inɡ̤uɛlijasafu uɲana kad̤ɛhuwɛli and̤uluka amakɛhati ɛtʰwɛlɛ iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓaɓɛsitʰi kɛ aɓaja ɓawumisɛ umŋǃuɓa ɛnɡ̤ɛkafiki wɔna jand̤uluka ib̤anilɛ jɛmiŋǃuɓa jɔɔɲana ɓakaɛfrajim nɡ̤ɔkwɛmikʰɔsi jaɓɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔmkʰɔsi wakʰɛ inɡ̤uɛliʃama uɲana kaamihud̤ɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔmkʰɔsi wɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakamanasɛ inɡ̤uɡ̤amalijɛli uɲana kapɛd̤at͡surɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔmkʰɔsi wɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin inɡ̤uab̤id̤an uɲana kaɡ̤id̤ijɔni jand̤uluka ib̤anilɛ jɛmiŋǃuɓa jɔɲana ɓakad̤an umkǃɔʃɛlisi wɛmiŋǃuɓa jɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmikʰɔsi jajɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔmkʰɔsi wakʰɛ inɡ̤uahijɛz̤ɛrɛ uɲana kaamiʃad̤aji pʰɛz̤u kɔmkʰɔsi wɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakaaʃɛrɛ inɡ̤upaɡ̤ijɛli uɲana kaɔk͡xan pʰɛz̤u kɔmkʰɔsi wɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakanafɛtali inɡ̤uahira uɲana kaɛnana kukɔ ɔkɔ ukund̤uluka kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓand̤uluka kɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmikʰɔsi jaɓɔ watʰi umɔsɛs kuhɔb̤ab̤i uɲana karɛhuwɛli ummid̤ijan ujisɛ wɔmkamɔsɛs tʰina sijand̤uluka sija ɛnd̤awɛni atʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija jɔna hamɓa natʰi sɔkwɛnz̤ɛla ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰɛtʰɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔsirajɛli watʰi jɛna kujɛ and̤iji kuhamɓa nd̤ija kuja ɛz̤wɛni lakɔwɛtʰu kwɛlɔkuz̤alwa watʰi musa ukusiʃija kalɔku nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa nɡ̤uwɛ ɔwaz̤ijɔ apʰɔ sinɡ̤alalisa kʰɔna ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jiɓanɡ̤amɛɬɔ ɛtʰu kɔtʰi kǁa utʰɛ wahamɓa natʰi kɔtʰi ɔkɔ kulunɡ̤a ujɛhɔv̤a asɛnz̤ɛla kɔna sikwɛnz̤ɛlɛ kɔna nawɛ ɓand̤uluka kɛ ɛntaɓɛni kajɛhɔv̤a uhamɓɔ lwɛmiɬa ɛmitʰatʰu itʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ihamɓa pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ uhamɓɔ lwɛmiɬa ɛmitʰatʰu ukuɓaɬɔlɛla ind̤awɔ aɓanɡ̤alalisa kujɔ ilifu likajɛhɔv̤a laɓa pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ɛmini ɛkund̤ulukɛni kwaɓɔ ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni kuɓɛ kusakutʰi ɛkund̤ulukɛni kwɛtʲɛja atʰi umɔsɛs v̤uka jɛhɔv̤a z̤ikǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ ɓasaɓɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ aɓakutʰijajɔ kutʰi ɛkulalisɛni kwawɔ atʰi ɓujɛla jɛhɔv̤a akwasirajɛli aɓantu ɓaɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓakʰalaz̤ɛla uɓuɓi ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a wɛv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ wat͡ʃa umlilɔ kajɛhɔv̤a pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ waɮa ɛsipʰɛlwɛni sɛmiŋǃuɓa ɓakʰala aɓantu kumɔsɛs watʰand̤az̤a umɔsɛs kujɛhɔv̤a wad̤amɓa umlilɔ watʰi iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ nd̤awɔ jitab̤ɛra nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wat͡ʃa umlilɔ kajɛhɔv̤a pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ind̤iɓand̤iɓa ɛpʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ jakʰanuka ikʰanukilɛ ɓaɓuja ɓalila ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓatʰi nɡ̤uɓanina ɔja iɲama siɮɛ sikʰumɓula iintlanz̤i ɛsiɓɛ siz̤iɮa ɛjiputa nɡ̤ɛliz̤ɛ kwanɛɛkɔmkɔmɛrɛ nɛɛv̤atala nɛɛlikɛ namat͡swɛlɛ nɛkinɔfilɛ kunɡ̤ɔku umpʰɛfumlɔ wɛtʰu wɔmilɛ akukʰɔ nɛntɔ jilɛ jɔd̤wa ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛtʰu imana lɛjɔ iɓind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnkɔz̤ɔ z̤ɛkɔrijand̤irɛ ukuɓɔnakala kwajɔ ɓɛkund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓɔnakala kwɛb̤ɛd̤ɔlaki ɓaɓɛsitʰi aɓantu ɓajiɓutʰɛ ɓajisilɛ ɛmatʲɛni ɔkuɲɛ ɓajiŋ̤ǃ̤uʃɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤iŋ̤ǃ̤uʃɔ ɓajipʰɛkɛ nɡ̤ɛɛmɓiz̤a ɓɛnz̤ɛ amakǃɛɓɛnɡ̤wana nɡ̤ajɔ isɔnɡ̤ɔ sajɔ sajɛ sind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsɔnɡ̤ɔ sɛsɔnkana ɛsiɡ̤alɛlwɛ iɔli ukuɬa kɔmɓɛtʰɛ ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni ɛɓusuku iɓisitʰi iɬɛ najɔ kujɔ waɓɛv̤a umɔsɛs aɓantu ɓɛlila nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ ɛlɔwɔ ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛntɛntɛ jakʰɛ wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a kunɛnɛ kwakuɓi nasɛmɛɬwɛni kamɔsɛs watʰi umɔsɛs kujɛhɔv̤a jinina ukuɓa umpʰatʰɛ kakuɓi umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ jini ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤aɓaɓalwa nɡ̤uwɛ usukɛ uwuɓɛkɛ umtʰwalɔ waɓa ɓantu ɓɔnkɛ pʰɛz̤u nd̤im ɔɓakʰawulɛjɔ aɓa ɓantu ɓɔnkɛ nd̤im ɔɓaz̤ɛlɛjɔ ukuɓa utʰi ɓatʰwalɛ nɡ̤ɛsifuɓa sakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɔnɮi ɛtʰwɛlɛ ɔwaɲajɔ nd̤iɓasɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni ɔwawufunɡ̤ɛla ɔɔjisɛ nd̤ɔjiz̤uz̤a pʰi iɲama nd̤iɓanikɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓa ɓantu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓalila ɓɛsitʰi sinikɛ iɲama siɮɛ and̤inakɔ ukuɓatʰwala aɓa ɓantu nd̤ɛd̤wa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kunz̤ima ɔkɔ ukuɓa und̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ sɛwund̤iɓulala kaɲɛ ukuɓa und̤iɓaɓalɛ mand̤inɡ̤aɓuɓɔni uɓuɓi ɓam watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɬanɡ̤anisɛla kumamad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛ nɡ̤amaʃumi ɔsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwasirajɛli ɔwaz̤ijɔ ukuɓa nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu aɓantu aɓab̤ali ɓaɓɔ uwaz̤isɛ ɛntɛntɛni jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana ɛmɛ kʰɔna nawɛ nd̤ija kuɬa nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ nawɛ kʰɔna nd̤ikǀapʰulɛ kumɔja ɔkuwɛ nd̤iɓɛkɛ kuwɔ awutʰwalɛ nawɛ umtʰwalɔ waɓantu aɓa unɡ̤awutʰwali wɛd̤wa wɛna jitʰi ɛɓantwini z̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛlɛni inɡ̤ɔmsɔ nɔɮa iɲama kuɓa nilililɛ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a nisitʰi nɡ̤uɓani ɔja iɲama siɮɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kwakumnand̤i kutʰi ɛjiputa ujɛhɔv̤a uja kɛ iɲama niɮɛ aniji kujiɮa m̤la mɲɛ namiɬa miɓini namiɬa miɬanu namiɬa iliʃumi namiɬa imaʃumi maɓini nɔɮa iɲanɡ̤a ipʰɛla id̤ɛ ipʰumɛ nɡ̤ɛɛmpumlɔ z̤ɛnu iɓɛ lub̤ɔk͡xa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa nimkǀɛkisilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔpʰakatʰi kwɛnu pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ nisitʰi sapʰumɛlani ɛjiputa watʰi umɔsɛs nɡ̤umkǃikɛla ɔnɡ̤amakʰulu ɔmatʰand̤atʰu aɓantu ɛnd̤ipʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ kɛ utʰi wɛna nd̤ija kuɓanika iɲama ɓaɮɛ iɲanɡ̤a ipʰɛla impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤ija kukǁʰɛlɛlwa ɓɔna z̤iɓalinɡ̤anɛ z̤ija kuɬanɡ̤anisɛlwa ɓɔna naz̤ɔnkɛ iintlanz̤i z̤ɔlwanɮɛ z̤iɓalinɡ̤anɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs isanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a sifut͡ʃanɛ nɡ̤ɔku uja kuɓɔna ukuɓa iliz̤wi lija kwɛnz̤ɛka aliji kwɛnz̤ɛka wapʰuma umɔsɛs wawatʰɛtʰa ɛɓantwini amaz̤wi kajɛhɔv̤a wawaɬanɡ̤anisa amad̤ɔd̤a amaʃumi ɔsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu aɓantu aɓa sisaŋ̤ǃ̤a ɛntɛntɛni wɛɬa ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛlifu watʰɛtʰa kujɛ wakǀapʰula kumɔja ɔkujɛ wawuɓɛka kumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu anɡ̤amaʃumi ɔsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kwatʰi kǁa waɬalajɔ umɔja pʰɛz̤u kwawɔ aprɔfɛta akapʰind̤a kɔd̤wa kɛ kalɔku amad̤ɔd̤a amaɓini ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni iɡ̤ama lɛɲɛ linɡ̤uɛlid̤ad̤ɛ iɡ̤ama lɛjɛsiɓini linɡ̤umɛd̤ad̤ɛ waɬala umɔja pʰɛz̤u kwawɔ aɓa kwaɓab̤alwajɔ wɔna kɔd̤wa akapʰumanɡ̤a ajɛ ɛntɛntɛni aprɔfɛta ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni kwaɡ̤id̤ima wakǁɛlɛla umɔsɛs watʰi ɔɔɛlid̤ad̤ɛ nɔmɛd̤ad̤ɛ ɓajaprɔfɛta ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni pʰaja wapʰɛnd̤ula ujɔʃuwa uɲana kanun umlunɡ̤isɛlɛli kamɔsɛs wakwaɓaɲuliwɛjɔ ɓakʰɛ watʰi nkɔsi jam mɔsɛs ɓatʰintɛlɛ watʰi umɔsɛs kujɛ unɛkʰwɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam akwaɓa ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓakajɛhɔv̤a ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓaprɔfɛti waɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uɓɛkɛ umɔja wakʰɛ kuɓɔ waɓuja umɔsɛs waja ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni jɛna namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwasirajɛli kwɛsuka umɔja kujɛhɔv̤a waɡ̤ukǃula iz̤aɡ̤witʲi ɛlwanɮɛ waz̤itʰi ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni z̤aɓa nɡ̤anɡ̤ɔhamɓɔ lwɛmini nɡ̤apʰa z̤aɓa nɡ̤anɡ̤ɔhamɓɔ lwɛmini nɡ̤apʰa z̤ad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a imiŋǃuɓa z̤anɡ̤anɡ̤ɛɛkub̤itɛ z̤ɔmɓini ukupʰakama pʰɛz̤u kɔm̤laɓa ɓɛsuka kɛ aɓantu jɔnkɛ lɔɔ ɓɔnkɛ uɓusuku jɔnkɛ jɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ ɓaz̤iɓutʰa iz̤aɡ̤witʲi ɔwaɓutʰa kaŋǀinanɛ waɓutʰa iihɔmɛrɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi ɓamana ukuz̤anɛka ɓad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤isa ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni jatʰi iɲama lɛjɔ isɛsɛmaz̤iɲwɛni aɓɔ inɡ̤ɛkaɬafunwa wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a kuɓɔ aɓantu waɓaɓɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a aɓantu nɡ̤ɛsiɓɛtʰɔ ɛsikʰulu kunɛnɛ kwatʰiwa iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ nd̤awɔ jikiɓrɔtihatahav̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa kʰɔna aɓantu aɓakʰanukajɔ ɓand̤uluka aɓantu ɛkiɓrɔtihatahav̤a ɓaja ɛhat͡sɛrɔti ɓaɓa sɛhat͡sɛrɔti ɓatʰɛtʰa ɔɔmirijam nɔarɔn nɡ̤ɔmɔsɛs nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnd̤awɔ jɛnkaz̤ana ɛnɡ̤umkuʃikaz̤i aɓɛjiz̤ɛkilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wajɛz̤ɛkɛ inkaz̤ana ɛnɡ̤umkuʃikaz̤i ɓatʰi ujɛhɔv̤a utʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ɔmɔsɛs jɛd̤wa jini akatʰɛtʰanɡ̤a nanɡ̤atʰi wɛv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ ind̤ɔd̤a lɛ inɡ̤umɔsɛs iɓilulamilɛ kunɛnɛ kunaɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓasɛm̤laɓɛni watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛsikǃupʰɛ kumɔsɛs nakuarɔn nakumirijam ɛsitʰi pʰumani nɔɓatʰatʰu niz̤ɛ ɛntɛntɛni jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana ɓapʰuma ɓɔɓatʰatʰu wɛɬa ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔmkǃulu wɛlifu wɛma ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛntɛntɛ waɓiz̤a ɔɔarɔn nɔmirijam ɓapʰuma ɓɔɓaɓini watʰi kʰaniv̤ɛ amaz̤wi ukuɓa nitʰɛ nanɔmprɔfɛti kajɛhɔv̤a nd̤ɔz̤az̤isa kujɛ nɡ̤ɔmɓɔnɔ nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ kujɛ ɛpʰupʰɛni akand͡ʒ̤alɔ umkʰɔnz̤i umɔsɛs uɲanisɛkilɛ jɛna ɛnɮwini jam jɔnkɛ nd̤ija kutʰɛtʰa najɛ umlɔmɔ kumlɔmɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓɔnakalajɔ kunɡ̤aɓi nɡ̤ant͡sɔnkɔtʰa asikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ jɛna isimilɔ sikajɛhɔv̤a jini ukuɓa ninɡ̤ɔjiki ukutʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔmkʰɔnz̤i umɔsɛs wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a kuɓɔ wɛmka jɛna lɛmka ɛntɛntɛni jini lɛ umirijam unɛkǃʰɛŋǃa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkʰɛpʰu wab̤ɛka uarɔn kumirijam jini unɛkǃʰɛŋǃa watʰi uarɔn kumɔsɛs taxu nkɔsi jam ukusiɓɛka tʲala nɡ̤ɛsɔnɔ ɛsisɛnz̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkumatʰa sɔnanɡ̤asɔ makanɡ̤asɛlɛɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔfilɛjɔ ɔtʰi ɛkupʰumɛni kwakʰɛ ɛsiz̤alwɛni sɔnina aɓɛ sɛlɛɮɛkilɛ isikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛɲama jakʰɛ wakʰala umɔsɛs kujɛhɔv̤a ɛsitʰi tʰikǁɔ nd̤ijakukʰunɡ̤a kʰawumpʰilisɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ukuɓa ujisɛ uɓɛt͡ʃikǀɛ ukut͡ʃikǀa ɔku ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ uɓɛnɡ̤aji kuv̤a iɬaz̤ɔ iint͡suku ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ makav̤alɛlwɛ imiɬa iɓɛ sikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛmiŋǃuɓa ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ amkɛlwɛ wav̤alɛlwa kɛ umirijam nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛmiŋǃuɓa imiɬa ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ aɓand̤uluka aɓantu wad̤a wamkɛlwa umirijam ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ ɓand̤uluka aɓantu ɛhat͡sɛrɔti ɓamisa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛparan watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɛsitʰi tʰumɛla amad̤ɔd̤a ajɛ kuɬɔla iliz̤wɛ lakwakanan ɛnd̤iɓanikɛ lɔna ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli wɔtʰumɛla ind̤ɔd̤a iɓɛ ɲɛ kwisiz̤wɛ sɔɔjisɛ ijilɛjɔ iɓɛ jɛjinkulu kusɔ wawatʰuma kɛ umɔsɛs ɛsɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛparan nɡ̤ɔkɔmlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɔnkɛ lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a ɛz̤iintlɔkɔ z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤awɔ amaɡ̤ama awɔ kwisiz̤wɛ sakwarub̤ɛn iɓinɡ̤uʃamuwa uɲana kaz̤akurɛ kwisiz̤wɛ sakwasimɔn iɓinɡ̤uʃafati uɲana kahɔri kwisiz̤wɛ sakwajud̤a iɓinɡ̤ukalɛb̤i uɲana kajɛfunɛ kwisiz̤wɛ sakwaisakarɛ iɓinɡ̤uiɡ̤ali uɲana kajɔsɛfu kwisiz̤wɛ sakwaɛfrajim iɓinɡ̤uhɔʃɛja uɲana kanun kwisiz̤wɛ sakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin iɓinɡ̤upalti uɲana karafu kwisiz̤wɛ sakwaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn iɓinɡ̤uɡ̤ad̤ijɛli uɲana kasɔd̤i kwisiz̤wɛ sakwajɔsɛfu ɛsisisiz̤wɛ sakwamanasɛ iɓinɡ̤uɡ̤ad̤i uɲana kasusi kwisiz̤wɛ sakwad̤an iɓinɡ̤uamijɛli uɲana kaɡ̤ɛmali kwisiz̤wɛ sakwaaʃɛrɛ iɓinɡ̤usɛturɛ uɲana kamikajɛli kwisiz̤wɛ sakwanafɛtali iɓinɡ̤unab̤i uɲana kav̤ɔfɛsi kwisiz̤wɛ sakwaɡ̤ad̤i iɓinɡ̤uɡ̤ɛhuwɛli uɲana kamaki nɡ̤awɔ lawɔ amaɡ̤ama amad̤ɔd̤a awawatʰumajɔ umɔsɛs ukuɓa ajɛ kuɬɔla iliz̤wɛ umɔsɛs watʰi uhɔʃɛja uɲana kanun nɡ̤ujɔʃuwa wawatʰuma kɛ umɔsɛs ukuɓa ajɛ kuɬɔla iliz̤wɛ lakwakanan watʰi kuwɔ ɲukani nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si nɡ̤alɛ nɮɛla ɲukani nijɛ ɛntaɓɛni nilikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ iliz̤wɛ ukuɓa lind͡ʒ̤ani naɓantu aɓɛmi kulɔ ukuɓaɓɔmɛlɛlɛ ɓanɡ̤amapʰakupʰaku ɓamɓalwa ɓaninz̤i ukuɓa lind͡ʒ̤ani iliz̤wɛ aɓɛmi kulɔ liɬɛ liɓi ukuɓa ind͡ʒ̤ani imiz̤i aɓɛmi kujɔ ɓasɛmiŋǃuɓɛni ɓasɛz̤iŋǃaɓɛni ukuɓa lind͡ʒ̤ani iliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ lijakǀʰuma alikǀʰumi linɛmitʰi alinajɔ jɔmɛlɛlani niz̤ɛ nɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ɛlɔ z̤wɛ lɔɔ miɬa jaɓɛ ijimiɬa jɛntlaɬɛla jɛɛd̤ilija ɛɲuka kɛ aliɬɔla iliz̤wɛ ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛt͡sin ɛsa ɛrɛhɔb̤i ɛkujɛni ɛhamati ɛɲuka nɡ̤ɛz̤ant͡si afikɛ ɛhɛɓrɔn ɓaɓɛkʰɔna ɔɔahiman nɔʃɛʃaji nɔtalɛmaji aɓɛnz̤alɔ kaanaki kɛ ɔwasɛhɛɓrɔn wawusɛwakʰiwɛ imiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ inɡ̤ɛkakʰiwa it͡sɔhan ɛjiputa afika ɛsiɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni sakwaɛʃɛkɔli aŋǃumla kʰɔna isɛɓɛ linɛsiɬɔkɔ sɛɛd̤ilija sisiɲɛ asitʰwala nɡ̤ɛsiɓɔnd̤a ɛmaɓini nakwiixarnatɛ nakumakʰiwanɛ ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ lɔɔ nd̤awɔ kwatʰiwa sisiɬamɓɔ sakwaɛʃɛkɔli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛsiɬɔkɔ ɛsɔ ɓasiŋǃumla kʰɔna ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓuja ɛkuliɬɔlɛni iliz̤wɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛɛnt͡suku ɛz̤imaʃumi manɛ ɛz̤a kumɔsɛs nakuarɔn nakwiɓanɮa lɔnkɛ lɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛparan ɛkad̤ɛʃɛ az̤isa iliz̤wi kuɓɔ nakwiɓanɮa lɔnkɛ aɓaɓɔnisa nɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ɛliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ aɓakǁɛlɛla atʰi safika kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ wasitʰuma kulɔ inɛnɛ liɓalɛka nɔɓusi naz̤i nɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤alɔ kɔd̤wa ɓanamanɮa aɓantu aɓɛmi kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ imiz̤i iŋǃatʲisiwɛ imikʰulu kunɛnɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ siɓɔnɛ aɓɛnz̤alɔ kaanaki kʰɔna kumi amaamalɛki ɛz̤wɛni lasɛz̤ant͡si amahɛti namajɛb̤usi namaamɔri ɛmi ɛz̤intaɓɛni amakanan ɛminɡ̤asɛlwanɮɛ nanɡ̤ɛkǀala lasɛjɔrd̤an waɓaz̤ɔlisa ukalɛb̤i aɓantu pʰamɓi kɔmɔsɛs watʰi masiɲukɛ kwanɡ̤ɔku siliɬutʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sijakulɛjisa kakad̤ɛ kɛ amad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛɲukɛ najɛ atʰi asinakɔ ukuɲuka sijɛ kwaɓɔ ɓantu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɔmɛlɛlɛ kunatʰi ahamɓisa ud̤aɓa ɔluɓi nɡ̤ɛlɔ z̤wɛ aɓɛliɬɔlilɛ kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛsitʰi iliz̤wɛ ɛsakǀand̤a kulɔ siliɬɔla liliz̤wɛ ɛliɓaɮajɔ aɓɛmi ɓalɔ aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɛsaɓaɓɔnajɔ kulɔ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓafɔ aɓad̤ɛ saz̤iɓɔna kʰɔna iiŋ̤ǁ̤ilimɓɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakaanaki ɓasɛz̤iŋ̤ǁ̤ilimɓɛlɛni sɛsuka ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛtʰu saɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmikǀikwanɛ sand͡ʒ̤alɔ nasɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa lalipʰakamisa lalikʰupʰa iliz̤wi lalɔ ɓalila aɓantu unɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaɓak͡xɔk͡xɛla ɔɔmɔsɛs nɔarɔn latʰi kuɓɔ lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa akwaɓa ɓɛsifɛlɛ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa akwaɓa ɓɛsifɛlɛ nakulɛ ntlanɡ̤ɔ jini ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a asiz̤isɛ kwɛli liz̤wɛ ukuz̤ɛ siwɛlik͡xɛlɛ aɓafaz̤i naɓantwana ɓɛtʰu ɓaɓɛ likǁʰɔɓa akusilunɡ̤ɛlɛ kaɲɛ ukuɓa siɓujɛlɛ ɛjiputa ɓat͡ʃɔnɔ ukutʰi masiz̤imisɛlɛ umpʰatʰi siɓujɛlɛ ɛjiputa ɓawa ɔɔmɔsɛs nɔarɔn nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɓaɓɔ pʰamɓi kwɛsikʰunɡ̤u sɔnkɛ sɛɓanɮa lɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ujɔʃuwa uɲana kanun nɔkalɛb̤i uɲana kajɛfunɛ aɓaɓɛkwaɓaɓɛliɬɔlilɛ iliz̤wɛ ɓaz̤ik͡xaz̤ula iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓatʰi kwiɓanɮa lɔnkɛ lɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli iliz̤wɛ ɛsakǀand̤a kulɔ siliɬɔla liliz̤wɛ ɛliɬɛ kakʰulu kunɛnɛ ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a usinɔnɛlɛlɛ wɔsisa kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ asinikɛ liliz̤wɛ ɛliɓalɛka nɔɓusi kɔd̤wa ukuɡ̤wilika kujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓɔjika aɓantu ɓɛlɔ z̤wɛ kuɓa ɓakukuɮa kwɛtʰu umkilɛ umtʰunz̤i waɓɔ kuɓɔ ujɛhɔv̤a unatʰi ukɔjika kɛ latʰi lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa maɓakǁulutʲwɛ nɡ̤amatʲɛ ɓaɓɔnakala uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɛntɛntɛni jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs kuja kud̤a kuɓɛ ɓɛnd̤iɡ̤iɓa aɓa ɓantu kuja kud̤a kuɓɛ naɓɛnɡ̤akʰɔlwa kwimikǃɔnd̤isɔ jɔnkɛ ɛnd̤ijɛnz̤ilɛjɔ pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ nd̤ija kuɓaɓɛtʰa nɡ̤ɛndʲikitʲa jɔkufa nd̤iɓaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤ɛ wɛna nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ uɬanɡ̤a ɔlukʰulu ɔlunamanɮa kunaɓɔ watʰi umɔsɛs kujɛhɔv̤a amajiputa av̤ilɛ ukuɓa uɓaɲusilɛ nɡ̤amanɮa akʰɔ aɓa ɓantu pʰakatʰi kwawɔ aɓakǁɛlɛlɛ nɔkuɓakǁɛlɛla aɓɛmi ɓɛli liz̤wɛ ɓav̤ilɛ naɓɔ ukuɓa wɛna jɛhɔv̤a upʰakatʰi kwaɓa ɓantu uɓɔnakala ilisɔ kwilisɔ wɛna jɛhɔv̤a nɛlifu lakʰɔ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ uhamɓa pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ ɛmkǃulwini wɛlifu ɛmini ɛmkǃulwini wɔmlilɔ ɛɓusuku ukuɓa utʰɛ waɓaɓulala aɓa ɓantu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤and̤ɔd̤aɲɛ z̤ɔt͡ʃɔ iintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤iluv̤ilɛjɔ ud̤aɓa lwakʰɔ ukutʰi kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɓɛnɡ̤ɛnakɔ ukuɓasa aɓɔɓantu ɛz̤wɛni aɓɛɓafunɡ̤ɛlɛ lɔna lɛ ntɔ aɓasikilɛjɔ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ kalɔku amanɮa ɛnkɔsi makaɓɛ makʰulu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ watʰɛtʰajɔ wɛna watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a uz̤ɛka kad̤ɛ umsind̤ɔ mkʰulu nɡ̤ɛŋǀɛɓa ukǁɔlɛla uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa nɛsik͡xɛkǃɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛ amɛnz̤ɛ ɔnɛtʲala uv̤ɛlɛla uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɔɔjisɛ kɔɔɲana kwɛsɛsitʰatʰu nakwɛsɛsinɛ isiz̤ukulwana ɓukǁɔlɛlɛ nd̤ijakukʰunɡ̤a uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓa ɓantu nɡ̤ɔkɔɓukʰulu ɓɛŋǀɛɓa jakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ uɓukǁɔlɛlɛjɔ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓa ɓantu utʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛjiputa wɛz̤isa apʰa watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤iɓakǁɔlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi lakʰɔ nɔkɔ nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɓuja kuliz̤alisa iɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a amad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ aɓuɓɔnilɛjɔ uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓam nɛmikǃɔnd̤isɔ jam ɛnd̤ajɛnz̤ajɔ ɛjiputa nasɛntlanɡ̤ɔ and̤ilinɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛz̤i z̤iɬanɮɔ z̤iliʃumi akalipʰulapʰula iz̤wi wɔna akasaji kuliɓɔna iliz̤wɛ ɛnd̤alifunɡ̤ɛla ɔɔjisɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓand̤iɡ̤iɓilɛjɔ aɓasaji kuliɓɔna kɛ jɛna umkʰɔnz̤i ukalɛb̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɛɓɛnamɔja wumɓi wakʰɔlisa ukund̤iland̤ɛla nd̤ijakumfikisa ɛz̤wɛni ɛɓɛjɛ kulɔ liɬutʰwɛ jimɓɛwu jakʰɛ kɛ amaamalɛki namakanan ɛmi ɛntilini d͡ʒ̤ikani nɡ̤ɔmsɔ nind̤ulukɛ nisinɡ̤ɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɛja ɛlwanɮɛ ɔluɓɔmv̤u watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs nakuarɔn ɛsitʰi kuja kud̤a kuɓɛ nd̤ilitʰwɛlɛ ɛli ɓanɮa linɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ lɔna ɛlilind̤ik͡xɔk͡xɛlajɔ iz̤ik͡xɔk͡xɔ z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓand̤ik͡xɔk͡xɛla nɡ̤az̤ɔ nd̤iz̤iv̤ilɛ jitʰi kuɓɔ nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a inɛnɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nitʰɛtʰilɛjɔ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤am nd̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ iz̤id̤umɓu z̤ɛnu z̤ija kulɛ ntlanɡ̤ɔ naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓalwajɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnani lɛnu lɔnkɛ ɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kɔmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ɓaɲusɛ nind̤ik͡xɔk͡xɛlɛjɔ aniji kunɡ̤ɛna ɛz̤wɛni ɛnd̤alipʰakamisɛla isanɮa ukuɓa nd̤iniɬalisɛ kulɔ inɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ukalɛb̤i uɲana kajɛfunɛ nɔjɔʃuwa uɲana kanun kɛ usapʰɔ lwɛnu ɛɓɛ nisitʰi luja kuɓa likǁʰɔɓa nd̤ija kulunɡ̤ɛnisa lɔna lulaz̤i iliz̤wɛ ɛnilikǀɛkisilɛjɔ nina iz̤id̤umɓu z̤ɛnu z̤ija kulɛ ntlanɡ̤ɔ ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓalusi ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi manɛ ɓatʰwalɛ ukuhɛɲuz̤a kwɛnu z̤id̤ɛ z̤ipʰɛlɛ iz̤id̤umɓu z̤ɛnu ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnani lɛmiɬa ɛnaliɬɔla nɡ̤ajɔ iliz̤wɛ imiɬa ɛmaʃumi manɛ um̤la uɓɛ nɡ̤umɲaka nijakuɓutʰwala uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛnu imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi manɛ nikwaz̤i ukuniʃija mna jɛhɔv̤a nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ inɛnɛ lɛ ntɔ nd̤ija kujɛnz̤a kwɛli ɓanɮa lɔnkɛ linɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kwaɓa ɓaɬanɡ̤ɛnɛ nɡ̤am ɓaja kupʰɛla kulɛ ntlanɡ̤ɔ ɓafɛlɛ kujɔ kɛ amad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛwatʰumilɛ umɔsɛs ukuɓa aliɬɔlɛ iliz̤wɛ az̤a aɓuja ak͡xɔk͡xisa lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa nɡ̤ajɛ nɡ̤ɔkuhamɓisa ud̤aɓa ɔluɓi nɡ̤alɔ iliz̤wɛ wɔna lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛhamɓisɛ ud̤aɓa ɔluɓi nɡ̤ɛliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ sisiɓɛtʰɔ ɛsɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a kwasala ujɔʃuwa uɲana kanun nɔkalɛb̤i uɲana kajɛfunɛ kulɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛjɛ kuliɬɔla iliz̤wɛ wawatʰɛtʰa umɔsɛs maz̤wi kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili ɛsikʰulu aɓantu ɓav̤uka ɓaja ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛntaɓa ɓɛsitʰi sikʰɔ sijakuɲuka sijɛkulɔɔ nd̤awɔ ajitʰɛtʰilɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sɔnilɛ watʰi umɔsɛs jini lɛ ntɔ niwuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰajɔ umlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a lɛ ntɔ ajiji kupʰumɛlɛla musani ukuɲuka kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a akakʰɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛnu ninɡ̤aɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰwa z̤iint͡ʃaɓa z̤ɛnu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa amaamalɛki namakanan akʰɔna pʰamɓi kwɛnu nija lik͡xɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa niɓujilɛ ɛkumland̤ɛlɛni ujɛhɔv̤a akaji kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɓaɡ̤ǁ̤alatʰɛlana ɓɛɲuka ɓaja ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛntaɓa kɛ jɔna itʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ kajɛhɔv̤a nɔmɔsɛs ajipʰumanɡ̤a pʰakatʰi kwɛmiŋǃuɓa ɛɬa amaamalɛki namakanan aɓɛɬɛli kulɔɔ ntaɓa aɓakǁaɓɛla aɓakǃɔɓa ɛhɔrma watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɛsitʰi tʰɛtʰa kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli utʰi kuɓɔ kǁa nitʰɛ ɛz̤wɛni lɔkuɬala kwɛnu ɛnd̤ininika lɔna nɛnz̤a ukuɮa kwasɛmlilwɛni kujɛhɔv̤a id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nɔkuɓa nɡ̤umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɛsib̤amɓatʰisɔ ɛsiɓalulɛkilɛjɔ nɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔwɔkukǃʰutʲwa jintliz̤ijɔ nɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔwamakǁɛʃa ɛnu amisiwɛjɔ nisɛnz̤a iv̤umɓa ɛlitʰɔz̤amisajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a nitʰaɓatʰa kwiinkɔmɔ nɔkuɓa nitʰaɓatʰa kwimpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ lɔwɔ uwusɔnd̤ɛz̤ajɔ umsɔnd̤ɛz̤ɔ wakʰɛ kujɛhɔv̤a wɔsɔnd̤ɛz̤a umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa ɔsisaɬulɔ sɛʃumi sɛɛfa jɔmɡ̤uɓɔ ɔkǀɔliwɛjɔ uɡ̤alɛlwɛ isaɬulɔ sɛsinɛ sɛhin jɛɔli nɛsaɬulɔ sɛsinɛ sɛhin jɛwajini jɔmnikɛlɔ ɔtʰululwajɔ usɛnz̤ɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ nɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nɔkuɓa nɡ̤umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ uɓɛ nɡ̤ɔwamv̤anaɲɛ nɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔwɛnkunz̤i jɛɡ̤uʃa wɔwɛnz̤a umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa uɓɛ z̤iz̤aɬulɔ ɛz̤iɓini z̤ɛsiʃumi sɛɛfa jɔmɡ̤uɓɔ ɔkǀɔliwɛjɔ uɡ̤alɛlwɛ iɔli ɛsisaɬulɔ sɛsitʰatʰu sɛhin nɛwajini jɔmnikɛlɔ ɔtʰululwajɔ isaɬulɔ sɛsitʰatʰu sɛhin ujisɔnd̤ɛz̤ɛ iɓɛ liv̤umɓa ɛlitʰɔz̤amisajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a kǁa utʰɛ wɛnz̤a itʰɔlɛ lɛnkɔmɔ id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nɔkuɓa nɡ̤umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɛsib̤amɓatʰisɔ ɛsiɓalulɛkilɛjɔ nɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔwɔkǁɔlɔ kujɛhɔv̤a wɔsɔnd̤ɛz̤a nd̤awɔɲɛ nɛtʰɔlɛ lɛnkɔmɔ umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa uɓɛ z̤iz̤aɬulɔ ɛz̤itʰatʰu z̤ɛsiʃumi sɛɛfa jɔmɡ̤uɓɔ ɔkǀɔliwɛjɔ uɡ̤alɛlwɛ iɔli ɛsisikǃiŋǃatʰa sɛhin wɔjisɔnd̤ɛz̤a nɛwajini iɓɛ jɛjɔmnikɛlɔ ɔtʰululwajɔ ɛsisikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛhin ukuɮa kwasɛmlilwɛni iv̤umɓa ɛlitʰɔz̤amisajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a kwɛnd͡ʒ̤iwɛ nd͡ʒ̤alɔ kwinkɔmɔ ɛɲɛ nɔkuɓa kukwinkunz̤i jɛmv̤u ɛɲɛ nɔkuɓa kukwitakanɛ lɛɡ̤uʃa ɛliɲɛ nɛlɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛliɲɛ nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛnani ɛnitʰɛ nalɛnz̤a nija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kujɔ iɲɛ kuɓɛ nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛnani laz̤ɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ ɓaz̤alɛlwɛ kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ ɓaja kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kwɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ ɛkusɔnd̤ɛz̤ɛni kwaɓɔ ukuɮa kwasɛmlilwɛni iv̤umɓa ɛlitʰɔz̤amisajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a kǁa atʰɛ wapʰamɓukɛla umpʰamɓukɛli nɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔpʰakatʰi kwɛnu ɛz̤iz̤ukulwanɛni z̤ɛnu wɛnz̤a ukuɮa kwasɛmlilwɛni iv̤umɓa ɛlitʰɔz̤amisajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ uja kwɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔnajɛ nɡ̤ɔkub̤ɛkisɛlɛ kusɔ isikʰunɡ̤u wɔɓa mɲɛ ummisɛlɔ nakumpʰamɓukɛli ɔpʰamɓukɛlɛ ummisɛlɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ kwiz̤iz̤ukulwana z̤ɛnu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nind͡ʒ̤alɔ wɔɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ umpʰamɓukɛli pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a umjalɛlɔ wɔɓa mɲɛ nɛsikɔ lɔɓa liɲɛ nakumpʰamɓukɛli ɔpʰamɓukɛlɛ watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɛsitʰi tʰɛtʰa kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli utʰi kuɓɔ ɛkufikɛni kwɛnu ɛz̤wɛni ɛlɔnd̤inisa kulɔ kɔtʰi ɛkuɮɛni kwɛnu isɔnka sɛliz̤wɛ nixumɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a umxumɔ nɔxuma umxumɔ wɔmɣ̤ajɔ wɛnu wɔkukǃala wɛnz̤iwɛ umkǃʰatʰanɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmxumɔ wɛsand̤a nɔwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuwuxuma kuwɔ umɣ̤ajɔ wɛnu wɔkukǃala nɔmnika ujɛhɔv̤a umxumɔ ɛz̤iz̤ukulwanɛni z̤ɛnu kǁa nitʰɛ nalaɬɛka anajɛnz̤a lɛ mitʰɛtʰɔ jɔnkɛ ajitʰɛtʰilɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ujɛhɔv̤a aniwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤az̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikamɔsɛs kususɛla kum̤la ujɛhɔv̤a umtʰɛtʰɔ nasɛmv̤a kɔkɔ ɛz̤iz̤ukulwanɛni z̤ɛnu kɔtʰi ukuɓa kutʰɛ kwɛnz̤ɛka intɔ nɡ̤ɔkulaɬɛka inɡ̤aɓɔnwa liɓanɮa iɓanɮa lɔnkɛ lɛnz̤ɛ inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa itʰɔlɛ lɛnkɔmɔ liɓɛ liɲɛ iɓɛ lid̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ iɓɛ liv̤umɓa ɛlitʰɔz̤amisajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a nd̤awɔɲɛ nɔmnikɛlɔ walɔ wɔkuɮa nɔmnikɛlɔ walɔ ɔtʰululwajɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ nɛnkunz̤i jɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛkǁʰɔnti iɓɛ ɲɛ iɓɛ lid̤ini lɛsɔnɔ alikǀamaɡ̤uʃɛlɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa lɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɔkǁɔlɛlwa kɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iɓikukulaɬɛka ɔku ɓawuz̤isilɛ ɓɔna umsɔnd̤ɛz̤ɔ waɓɔ ukuɮa kwasɛmlilwɛni kujɛhɔv̤a nɛd̤ini laɓɔ lɛsɔnɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkulaɬɛka kwaɓɔ lɔkǁɔlɛlwa kɛ lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa lɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɔmpʰamɓukɛli ɔpʰamɓukɛlɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛnu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kuɓaɬɛlɛ ɔku aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkulaɬɛka ukuɓa uɓani utʰɛ wɔna nɡ̤ɔkulaɬɛka wɔsɔnd̤ɛz̤a ib̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛlitʰɔkaz̤i ɛlimɲaka mɲɛ iɓɛ lid̤ini lɛsɔnɔ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli akǀamaɡ̤uʃɛlɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ ɔlaɬɛkajɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔna kwawɔ nɡ̤ɔkulaɬɛka kwawɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a akuwukǀamaɡ̤uʃɛla wɔkǁɔlɛlwa kɛ kɔz̤alwajɔ pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nakumpʰamɓukɛli ɔpʰamɓukɛlɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛnu wɔɓa mɲɛ umjalɛlɔ nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kɔwɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkulaɬɛka kɛ jɛna ɔwɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛsanɮa ɛsipʰakamilɛjɔ kwaɓaz̤alɛlwɛ kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ nakuɓapʰamɓukɛli jɛna ujamɲɛlisa ujɛhɔv̤a lɔɔ mpʰɛfumlɔ kɛ wɔŋǃaɲulwa unɡ̤aɓikʰɔ pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu ɓakɔwawɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ulid̤ɛlilɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a uwapʰulɛ nɔmjalɛlɔ wakʰɛ lɔɔ mpʰɛfumlɔ wɔŋǃaɲulwa kaɲɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓupʰɛz̤u kwawɔ kwatʰi ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛsɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɓafumana ɛtʰɛz̤a nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsaɓatʰa aɓɔ ɓamfumanajɔ ɛtʰɛz̤a ɓamsɔnd̤ɛz̤a kumɔsɛs nakuarɔn nakwiɓanɮa lɔnkɛ ɓamfaka ɛluɡ̤ǀ̤inwɛni kuɓa ɓɛkunɡ̤ɛkamiswa ɔkuja kwɛnz̤iwa kujɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs makaɓulawɛ afɛ lɔɔ limkǁuluɓɛ iɓanɮa lɔnkɛ nɡ̤amatʲɛ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛmiŋǃuɓa lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa lamkʰupʰɛla nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛmiŋǃuɓa lamkǁuluɓa kɛ nɡ̤amatʲɛ wafa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wamwisɛlajɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ umɔsɛs watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs tʰɛtʰa kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli utʰi kuɓɔ maɓɛnz̤ɛ iint͡ʃinɡ̤a ɛmasɔnd̤wɛni ɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ z̤aɓɔ kwiz̤iz̤ukulwana z̤aɓɔ ɓafakɛ ɛnt͡ʃinɡ̤ɛni jɛsɔnd̤ɔ int͡sɔntɛlɔ ɛɓala majiɓɛ jint͡ʃinɡ̤a nitʰi nakujiɓɔna nijikʰumɓulɛ jɔnkɛ imitʰɛtʰɔ kajɛhɔv̤a nijɛnz̤ɛ ninɡ̤ab̤ad̤uli niland̤ɛlɛ intliz̤ijɔ jɛnu namɛɬɔ ɛnu ɛniɓɛ nihɛɲuz̤a nɡ̤ɔkuland̤ɛla wɔna ukuz̤ɛ nijikʰumɓulɛ nijɛnz̤ɛ jɔnkɛ imitʰɛtʰɔ jam niɓɛ ŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kutʰikǁɔ wɛnu nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu ɔnikʰupʰilɛjɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa ukuɓa nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu kɛ kalɔku ukɔra uɲana kait͡sarɛ uɲana kakɛhati uɲana kalɛv̤i nɔd̤atan nɔab̤iram ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛlijab̤i nɔɔn uɲana kapɛlɛtɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn ɓatʰaɓatʰa amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi maɬanu akɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli iz̤ikʰulu z̤ɛɓanɮa ɛz̤aɲulwa jintlanɡ̤anisɔ amad̤ɔd̤a anɔd̤umɔ ɓav̤ukɛlana nɔmɔsɛs ɓaɓiz̤ɛlana nd̤awɔɲɛ nɡ̤ɔmɔsɛs nanɡ̤ɔarɔn ɓatʰi kuɓɔ nisɛnanɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa liŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ujɛhɔv̤a upʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ jini ukuɓa niz̤ipʰakamisɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛsikʰunɡ̤u sikajɛhɔv̤a wɛv̤a umɔsɛs nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ watʰɛtʰa kukɔra nakwiɓanɮa lakʰɛ lɔnkɛ ɛsitʰi nɡ̤ɔmsɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uja kwaz̤isa ɔnɡ̤ɔwakʰɛ ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ amsɔnd̤ɛz̤ɛ kujɛ lɔwɔ amɲulilɛjɔ wɔmsɔnd̤ɛz̤a kujɛ jɛnz̤ani ɔku z̤itʰaɓatʰɛlɛni iiŋ̤ǀ̤ɛd̤ɛv̤u wɛna kɔra nɛɓanɮa lakʰɔ lɔnkɛ niɓɛkɛ umlilɔ kuz̤ɔ niɓɛkɛ isikǃʰumisɔ pʰɛz̤u kwaz̤ɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔmsɔ kɔtʰi atʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wamɲula aɓɛ ŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jɛna sɛnanɛlɛ ɲana ɓakalɛv̤i watʰi umɔsɛs kukɔra kʰaniv̤ɛ ɲana ɓakalɛv̤i jintɔ ɛŋǀinanɛ ukuɓa utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli anaɬulɛ kwiɓanɮa lakwasirajɛli anisɔnd̤ɛz̤ɛ kujɛ ukuɓanisɛɓɛnz̤ɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɔmŋǃuɓa kajɛhɔv̤a nimɛ pʰamɓi kwɛɓanɮa nilunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ kuɓɔ ɛkusɔnd̤ɛz̤ilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ wɛna naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakalɛv̤i nd̤awɔɲɛ nawɛ nifuna kwanɔɓuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ninani wɛna nɛɓanɮa lakʰɔ lɔnkɛ lɛ ntɔ niɬanɡ̤ana nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a kɛ uarɔn ujintɔni jɛna ukuɓa nimk͡xɔk͡xɛlɛ watʰuma umɔsɛs waɓiz̤a ud̤atan nɔab̤iram ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛlijab̤i ɓatʰi asiji kuɲuka siz̤ɛ jintɔ ɛŋǀinanɛ lɛ jɔkuɓa usiɲusɛ ɛz̤wɛni ɛliɓalɛka nɔɓusi uz̤ɛ kusiɓulala apʰa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ lɛ ntɔ uɬala uz̤ɛnz̤ɛ umpʰatʰi pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ akusinɡ̤ɛnisanɡ̤a ɛz̤wɛni ɛliɓalɛka nɔɓusi akusinikanɡ̤a naz̤id̤ilija uja kuwak͡xuk͡xa amɛɬɔ mad̤ɔd̤a asiji kuɲuka siz̤ɛ wav̤utʰa kunɛnɛ umsind̤ɔ kamɔsɛs watʰi kujɛhɔv̤a musa ukuwub̤ɛka umnikɛlɔ waɓɔ wɔkuɮa and̤itʰaɓatʰanɡ̤a nɛɛsilɛ ɛliɲɛ kuɓɔ and̤ipʰatʰanɡ̤a kakuɓi namɲɛ waɓɔ watʰi umɔsɛs kukɔra wɛna nɛɓanɮa lakʰɔ lɔnkɛ z̤ɛ niɓɛ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a wɛna naɓɔ nɔarɔn nɡ̤ɔmsɔ nitʰaɓatʰɛ ɛlɔwɔ uɡ̤ǀ̤ɛd̤ɛv̤u lwakʰɛ niɓɛkɛ isikǃʰumisɔ pʰɛz̤u kwaz̤ɔ nisɔnd̤ɛz̤ɛ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɛlɔwɔ aɓɛ nɔɡ̤ǀ̤ɛd̤ɛv̤u lwakʰɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤ɛd̤ɛv̤u ɛz̤imakʰulu maɓini anamaŋǀi maɬanu nawɛ nɔarɔn ɛlɔwɔ aɓɛnɔɡ̤ǀ̤ɛd̤ɛv̤u lwakʰɛ ɓatʰaɓatʰa kɛ ɛlɔwɔ uɡ̤ǀ̤ɛd̤ɛv̤u lwakʰɛ ɓaɓɛka umlilɔ kuz̤ɔ ɓaɓɛka isikǃʰumisɔ pʰɛz̤u kwaz̤ɔ ɓɛma ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛntɛntɛ jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana nɔmɔsɛs nɔarɔn ukɔra waliɓiz̤ɛla nd̤awɔɲɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ iɓanɮa lɔnkɛ ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛntɛntɛ jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana ɓaɓɔnakala uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a kwiɓanɮa lɔnkɛ watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs nakuarɔn ɛsitʰi z̤aɬulɛni kwɛli ɓanɮa nd̤ija kuɓaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla nɡ̤ɛpʰaɲaz̤ɔ ɓawa nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɓatʰi tʰikǁɔ tʰikǁɔ wɔɔmɔja ɓɛɲama jɔnkɛ kɔnɛ wamɲɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ unɔɓuxalaxumɛ kwiɓanɮa lɔnkɛ watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɛsitʰi tʰɛtʰa kwiɓanɮa utʰi sukani nimkɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛmz̤ini kakɔra nɔd̤atan nɔab̤iram wɛsuka umɔsɛs waja kud̤atan nɔab̤iram amland̤ɛla amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwasirajɛli watʰɛtʰa kwiɓanɮa ɛsitʰi mkani ɛz̤intɛntɛni z̤ala mad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ninɡ̤akǀʰukumisi ntɔ ijɛjawɔ ɬɛz̤ɛ nipʰɛt͡ʃɛtʰwɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤awɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɓɛɲuka kɛ ɓɛmka ɛmz̤ini kakɔra nɔd̤atan nɔab̤iram nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɔɔd̤atan nɔab̤iram ɓɛma ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛɛntɛntɛ z̤aɓɔ naɓafaz̤i ɓaɓɔ nɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ nɛɛnt͡sat͡ʃana z̤aɓɔ watʰi umɔsɛs nija kwaz̤i nɡ̤alɛ ntɔ ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a und̤itʰumɛlɛ ukwɛnz̤a jɔnkɛ lɛ misɛɓɛnz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa asijantliz̤ijɔ jam ukuɓa aɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓafa nɡ̤ɔkufa kwaɓantu ɓɔnkɛ nɔkuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓav̤ɛlɛlwa nɡ̤ɔkuv̤ɛlɛlwa kwaɓantu ɓɔnkɛ wɔɓa ujɛhɔv̤a akand̤itʰumanɡ̤a kɛ ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰɛ wɛnz̤a isimanɡ̤a um̤laɓa wakʰamisa umlɔmɔ wawɔ waɓaɡ̤iɲa nɛntɔ jɔnkɛ aɓanajɔ ɓɛɬa ɓɛsapʰililɛ ɓaja kwɛlaɓafilɛjɔ nɔkǃɔnd̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔ ukuɓa mad̤ɔd̤a amɡ̤iɓilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a kwatʰi ukuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa kwakʰɛ ukuwatʰɛtʰa ɔnkɛ maz̤wi wakǀand̤ɛka um̤laɓa ɔɓupʰant͡si kwaɓɔ um̤laɓa wawuv̤ula umlɔmɔ wawɔ waɓaɡ̤iɲa nɛz̤inɮu z̤aɓɔ naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓakakɔra nɛmpaɬa jaɓɔ jɔnkɛ ɓɛɬa ɓɔna ɓɛsapʰililɛ nɛntɔ jɔnkɛ aɓanajɔ ɓaja kwɛlaɓafilɛjɔ um̤laɓa waɓasɛlɛla ɓat͡ʃaɓalala aɓaɓakʰɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛsikʰunɡ̤u ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli aɓɛɓaŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnɡ̤ilɛ aɓalɛkiswa sisitʰɔnɡ̤a sɛsikʰalɔ saɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓɛsitʰi ɬɛz̤ɛ um̤laɓa usiɡ̤iɲɛ natʰi kwapʰuma umlilɔ kujɛhɔv̤a wawaɮa amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi maɬanu asɔnd̤ɛz̤a isikǃʰumisɔ watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɛsitʰi jit͡ʃɔ kuɛlaz̤arɛ uɲana kaarɔn umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli az̤ikǀʰɔlɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤ɛd̤ɛv̤u ɛluv̤und̤wini wɛna uwukǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰɛlɛ kud̤ɛ umlilɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa z̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤ɛd̤ɛv̤u z̤aɓɔ ɓɔnajɔ nɡ̤akwimipʰɛfumlɔ jaɓɔ iz̤ɛ niz̤ɛnz̤ɛ iz̤ikǁwɛkǁwɛ ɛz̤ikǀɛkɛtʰɛkilɛjɔ z̤ɔkwalɛka isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaz̤isɔnd̤ɛz̤a pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a z̤aŋ̤ǀ̤waliswa z̤ɔɓa nɡ̤umkǃɔnd̤isɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli waz̤itʰaɓatʰa kɛ uɛlaz̤arɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli iiŋ̤ǀ̤ɛd̤ɛv̤u z̤ɔb̤ɛd̤u aɓaɓɛz̤isɔnd̤ɛz̤ilɛ aɓɔ ɓat͡ʃiswajɔ z̤akʰand̤wa z̤aɓa z̤ɛz̤ɔkwalɛka isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jaɓa sisikʰumɓuz̤ɔ ɛsɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ukuz̤ɛ kunɡ̤asɔnd̤ɛli nd̤ɔd̤a jasɛmz̤ini inɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔwɛmɓɛwu kaarɔn ikǃʰumisɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛsikǃʰumisɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ukuz̤ɛ inɡ̤aɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔra nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɓanɮa lakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a watʰɛtʰajɔ kujɛ nɡ̤ɔmɔsɛs lamk͡xɔk͡xɛla umɔsɛs nɔarɔn nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa lɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli lisitʰi nina niɓaɓulɛlɛ aɓantu ɓakajɛhɔv̤a kwatʰi ɛkuɓiz̤ɛlwɛni nd̤awɔɲɛ kwɛɓanɮa nɡ̤ɔmɔsɛs nanɡ̤ɔarɔn ɓab̤ɛka ɛntɛntɛni jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana nalɔ lijisiɓɛkɛlɛ ɓaɓɔnakala uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɓɛz̤a ɔɔmɔsɛs nɔarɔn pʰamɓi kwɛntɛntɛ jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɛsitʰi sukani pʰakatʰi kwɛli ɓanɮa nd̤iliɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛpʰaɲaz̤ɔ ɓawa nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ watʰi umɔsɛs kuarɔn lutʰaɓatʰɛ uɡ̤ǀ̤ɛd̤ɛv̤u uɓɛkɛ umlilɔ pʰɛz̤u kwalɔ ɔv̤ɛla ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni uɓɛkɛ isikǃʰumisɔ ukʰawulɛz̤ɛ ujɛ ɛɓanɮɛni uɓakǀamaɡ̤uʃɛlɛ kuɓa kupʰumɛ uɓuxalaxumɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓukajɛhɔv̤a sikǃalilɛ isiɓɛtʰɔ watʰaɓatʰa kɛ uarɔn nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ umɔsɛs watʰɛtʰajɔ waɓalɛkɛla pʰakatʰi kwɛsikʰunɡ̤u nasɔ isiɓɛtʰɔ sikǃalilɛ ɛɓantwini waɓɛka isikǃʰumisɔ waɓakǀamaɡ̤uʃɛla aɓantu wɛma pʰakatʰi kwaɓafilɛjɔ naɓaɬɛlijɔ satʰintɛlwa kɛ isiɓɛtʰɔ aɓɔ ɓafajɔ sisiɓɛtʰɔ ɓaɓa liʃumi ɛlinɛsinɛ anamakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwaɓafajɔ nɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ jakwakɔra waɓujɛla uarɔn kumɔsɛs ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛntɛntɛ jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana isiɓɛtʰɔ satʰintɛlwa kɛ watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɛsitʰi tʰɛtʰa kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli utʰaɓatʰɛ kuɓɔ iintɔnɡ̤a intɔnɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛnɮu jɔɔjisɛ z̤aɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ iintɔnɡ̤a ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛlinamɓini ub̤alɛ iɡ̤ama lalɔwɔ nalɔwɔ ɛntɔnɡ̤ɛni jakʰɛ wɔb̤ala iɡ̤ama likaarɔn ɛntɔnɡ̤ɛni jakwalɛv̤i kuɓa jɔɓa ɲɛ intɔnɡ̤a jɛntlɔkɔ jɛnɮu jɔɔjisɛ uz̤ɛ uz̤iɓɛkɛ ɛntɛntɛni jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana pʰamɓi kwɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤inɔ apʰɔ nd̤iɬanɡ̤ana kʰɔna kɔtʰi ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnd̤iɲulɛ jɔna intɔnɡ̤a jajɔ id̤uɓulɛ nd̤ikupʰɛlisɛ pʰamɓi ukuk͡xɔk͡xa kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓaɓɛnik͡xɔk͡xɛla nɡ̤akɔ watʰɛtʰa kɛ umɔsɛs kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli z̤ɔnkɛ z̤aɓɔ z̤amnika iintɔnɡ̤a nɡ̤aɲɛ intɔnɡ̤a jaɲɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ z̤aliʃumi ɛlinamɓini iintɔnɡ̤a intɔnɡ̤a kaarɔn jaɓɛ ipʰakatʰi kwɛɛntɔnɡ̤a z̤az̤ɔ waz̤iɓɛka umɔsɛs iintɔnɡ̤a pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɛntɛntɛni jɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤inɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ wanɡ̤ɛna umɔsɛs ɛntɛntɛni jɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤inɔ nant͡sɔ intɔnɡ̤a kaarɔn wɛnɮu kalɛv̤i id̤uɓulɛ japʰuma amatʰupʰa jatʲatʲamɓa iintʲantʲamɓɔ z̤av̤utʰwa iiamanɡ̤ilɛ wapʰuma umɔsɛs nɛɛntɔnɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ ɛv̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a wɛz̤a naz̤ɔ kɔɔɲana ɓɔnkɛ ɓakasirajɛli ɓakʰanɡ̤ɛla ɓatʰaɓatʰa ɛlɔwɔ intɔnɡ̤a jakʰɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs jiɓujisɛlɛ intɔnɡ̤a kaarɔn pʰamɓi kwɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤inɔ iɡ̤ǀ̤inwɛ ukuɓa iɓɛ nɡ̤umkǃɔnd̤isɔ kwaɓanɛɛnkani ukupʰɛlisɛ ukuk͡xɔk͡xa kwaɓɔ pʰamɓi ɓanɡ̤afi wɛnz̤a kɛ umɔsɛs nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a aɓɛmwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ɓatʰɛtʰa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kumɔsɛs ɓatʰi jaɓɔna sijab̤ub̤a sijapʰɛla sijapʰɛla sɔnkɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓasɔnd̤ɛlajɔ aɓasɔnd̤ɛla ɛmŋǃuɓɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ɓaja sija kub̤ub̤a siɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kuarɔn wɛna nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nɛnɮu kajiɬɔ nd̤awɔɲɛnawɛ nɔɓutʰwala uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɔɓɛnz̤iwɛ kwind̤awɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ wɛna nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nd̤awɔɲɛ nawɛ nɔɓutʰwala uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɔɓuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛnu kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɔ isiz̤wɛ sakwalɛv̤i isiz̤wɛ sikajiɬɔ wɔɓasɔnd̤ɛz̤a nawɛ ɓanamatʰɛlɛ kuwɛ ɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ wɛna wɛna kɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nd̤awɔɲɛ nawɛ pʰamɓi kwɛntɛntɛ jɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤inɔ ɓɔɡ̤ǀ̤ina isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina sakʰɔ nɛsiɡ̤ǁ̤ina sɛntɛntɛ jɔnkɛ kɔd̤wa ɛmpaɬɛni jɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nasɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni maɓanɡ̤asɔnd̤ɛli ukuz̤ɛ ɓanɡ̤afi ɓɔna aɓa ɓɔnamatʰɛla kuwɛ ɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina sɛntɛntɛ jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana ɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini wɔnkɛ wajɔ intɛntɛ kɛ ɔwasɛ unz̤ini az̤ɛ anɡ̤asɔnd̤ɛli niz̤ɛ niɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina sɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɛsiɡ̤ǁ̤ina sɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɔ kunɡ̤aɓuji kub̤ɛkʰɔ ɓuxalaxumɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli mna kɛ jaɓɔna nd̤iɓatʰaɓatʰilɛ aɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu aɓalɛv̤i pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli niɓanikiwɛ ɓanɡ̤umnikɛlɔ kujɛhɔv̤a wɔkusɛɓɛnz̤a umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛntɛntɛ jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana kɛ wɛna nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nd̤awɔɲɛ nawɛ nɔɓuɡ̤ǀ̤ina uɓuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛnu ɛz̤intwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nanɡ̤apʰaja kɔmkʰusanɛ nisɛɓɛnz̤ɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i nd̤ininika uɓuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ukuɓa ɓuɓɛ nɡ̤umsɛɓɛnz̤i ɛniwunikiwɛjɔ ɔwasɛmz̤ini ɔsɔnd̤ɛlajɔ uja kuɓulawa watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kuarɔn ɛsitʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ikunika isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina sɛmixumɔ jam ɛz̤intwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nd̤isinika wɛna nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ siɓɛ nɡ̤umkǁʰɛʃɔ siɓɛ nɡ̤ummisɛlɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ jilɛ intɔ ɛjɔɓa jɛjakʰɔ ɛz̤intwɛni ɛz̤ijiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛkuɮɛni kwasɛmlilwɛni jɔnkɛ imisɔnd̤ɛz̤ɔ jaɓɔ ɛminikɛlwɛni jaɓɔ jɔkuɮa nasɛmad̤inini aɓɔ ɔnkɛ ɛsɔnɔ nasɛmad̤inini aɓɔ ɔnkɛ ɛtʲala aɓajiɓujisɛla jɔɓa z̤iintɔ ɛz̤ijiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kuwɛ nakɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nɔz̤iɮa ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni kaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛjind̤ɔd̤a jɔz̤iɮa z̤ɔɓa ŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kuwɛ jilɛ intɔ ɛjɔɓa jɛjakʰɔ umxumɔ wɛsipʰɔ saɓɔ ɛmit͡ʃanɡ̤at͡ʃanɡ̤iswɛni jɔnkɛ jɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nd̤iwunika wɛna nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɔ nd̤awɔɲɛ nawɛ uɓɛ nɡ̤ummisɛlɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɬamɓulukilɛjɔ ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ ɓɔwuɮa kɔnkɛ ukutʲɛɓa kwɛɔli kɔnkɛ ukutʲɛɓa kwɛwajini ɛnt͡ʃa nɔkwɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa uliɓɔ lwɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ ɓaja kuz̤inika ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ikunika lɔna iintlaɬɛla z̤ɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤isɛz̤wɛni laɓɔ aɓaz̤iz̤isa kujɛhɔv̤a z̤ɔɓa z̤ɛz̤akʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɬamɓulukilɛjɔ ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ ɓɔz̤iɮa z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤isinɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰant͡si kwasirajɛli z̤ɔɓa z̤ɛz̤akʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iv̤ula isiz̤alɔ kwiɲama jɔnkɛ aɓaja kuz̤isɔnd̤ɛz̤a kujɛhɔv̤a ɛɓantwini nasɛz̤inkɔmɛni z̤ɔɓa z̤ɛz̤akʰɔ kɔd̤wa wɔna amaz̤iɓulɔ aɓantu wɔwakʰulula nɡ̤ɔkuwamisɛla amaz̤iɓulɔ ɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤iz̤itʰɔ z̤inɛ ɛz̤iz̤iiŋǃamɓi wɔwakʰulula nɡ̤ɔkuwamisɛla ukukʰululwa kɔmntu kɛ wɔmkʰulula nɡ̤ɔkummisɛla utʰaɓatʰɛla ɔɲanɡ̤aɲɛ nɡ̤ɔkulinɡ̤anisɛla kwakʰɔ isiliv̤ɛrɛ jɛɛʃɛkɛlɛ ɛz̤intlanu nɡ̤ɔkwɛʃɛkɛlɛ jɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛz̤iiɡ̤ɛra ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini kɔd̤wa amaz̤iɓulɔ ɛɛnkɔmɔ namaz̤iɓulɔ ɛz̤imv̤u namaz̤iɓulɔ ɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ akuji kuwakʰulula nɡ̤ɔkuwamisɛla aŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ wɔna iɡ̤az̤i lawɔ wɔlit͡ʃiz̤a ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni ukǃʰumisɛlɛ nɡ̤amaŋǃatʰa awɔ kukuɮa kwasɛmlilwɛni kɛ ɔkɔ liv̤umɓa ɛlitʰɔz̤amisajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a iɲama jawɔ jɔɓa jɛjakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛŋǀum jɔmt͡ʃanɡ̤at͡ʃanɡ̤isɔ nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmlɛnz̤ɛ wasɛkunɛnɛ jɔɓa jɛjakʰɔ jɔnkɛ imixumɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ aɓajixumɛla ujɛhɔv̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nd̤ijinika wɛna nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɔ nd̤awɔɲɛ nawɛ iɓɛ nɡ̤ummisɛlɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ inɡ̤umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɛtʲuwa ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a kuwɛ nakwimɓɛwu jakʰɔ nd̤awɔɲɛ nawɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kuarɔn ɛz̤wɛni laɓɔ akuji kuɓa akuji kuɓa nasaɓɛlɔ pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ nd̤isisaɓɛlɔ sakʰɔ nɛlifa lakʰɔ pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ujaɓɔna ɔɔɲana ɓakalɛv̤i nd̤iɓanika z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤iʃumi kwasirajɛli ukuɓa z̤iɓɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i waɓɔ aɓasɛɓɛnz̤a wɔna umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛntɛntɛ jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana ɓanɡ̤apʰind̤i ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓasɔnd̤ɛlɛ ɛntɛntɛni jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana ɬɛz̤ɛ ɓatʰwalɛ isɔnɔ ɓafɛ kɛ ɓɔna aɓalɛv̤i ɓɔsɛɓɛnz̤a umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛntɛntɛ jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana ɓaɓutʰwalɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤ummisɛlɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ɛz̤iz̤ukulwanɛni z̤ɛnu aɓaji kuɓa pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa isiʃumi sɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓasixumɛla ujɛhɔv̤a umxumɔ nd̤isinika aɓalɛv̤i siɓɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nd̤itʰɛ kuɓɔ maɓanɡ̤aɓi pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɛsitʰi tʰɛtʰa kuɓalɛv̤i utʰi kuɓɔ kǁa nitʰɛ nasitʰaɓatʰa kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli isiʃumi ɛnd̤ininika sɔna ɛsipʰuma kuɓɔ lɛnu nɔxuma nɡ̤asɔ umxumɔ kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛsiʃumi sɛsiʃumi wɔtʰi umxumɔ wɛnu uɓalɛlwɛ ujiŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa jasɛsand̤ɛni ujinz̤alisɛkɔ jasɛsikǁɔv̤ulɛlwɛni nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ nɔxuma umxumɔ kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛz̤iʃumi z̤ɛnu z̤ɔnkɛ ɛniz̤itʰaɓatʰajɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli uarɔn umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kuz̤ɔ umxumɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɛminikɛlwɛni jɔnkɛ ɛnijinikiwɛjɔ nɔxuma imixumɔ jɔnkɛ kajɛhɔv̤a ɛkutʲɛɓɛni kwajɔ kɔnkɛ nɔxuma intɔ jakʰɛ ɛjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ iv̤ɛla kujɔ uz̤ɛ utʰi kɛ kuɓɔ ɛkuxumɛni kwɛnu ukutʲɛɓa kwajɔ kɔɓalɛlwa kuɓalɛv̤i ilunɡ̤ɛnisɛlɔ lwɛsand̤a ilunɡ̤ɛnisɛlɔ lwɛsikǁɔv̤ulɛlɔ nɔkuɮa ɔkɔ ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ nɛz̤inɮu z̤ɛnu kuɓa nɡ̤umv̤uz̤ɔ wɛnu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛnu ɛntɛntɛni jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana anisaji kuz̤itʰwalisa z̤ɔnɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ɛkuxumɛni kwɛnu ukutʲɛɓa kwajɔ ɔkukujɔ anisaji kuz̤iɬamɓɛla iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli anisaji watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs nakuarɔn ɛsitʰi nɡ̤uwɔ lɔ ummisɛlɔ wɔmjalɛlɔ awumisilɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛsitʰi tʰɛtʰa kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓakuz̤isɛlɛ itʰɔkaz̤i ɛliɓɔmv̤u ɛliɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ ɛlinɡ̤ɛnasipʰakɔ ɛkunɡ̤aɓɛkwanɡ̤a dʲɔkʰwɛ kulɔ nilinikɛ uɛlaz̤arɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli alisɛ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛmiŋǃuɓa likǁʰɛlɛlwɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ wɔkǀapʰula kɛ uɛlaz̤arɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛɡ̤az̤ini lalɔ nɡ̤ɔmnwɛ wakʰɛ alifɛfɛ nɡ̤apʰamɓili ɛntɛntɛni jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana iz̤iɬanɮɔ ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ lit͡ʃiswɛ itʰɔkaz̤i pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ sit͡ʃiswɛ isikʰumɓa salɔ nɛɲama jalɔ nɛɡ̤az̤i lalɔ nd̤awɔɲɛ nɔmswanɛ walɔ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wɔtʰaɓatʰa kɛ umsɛd̤arɛ nɛhisɔpɛ nɔsinɡ̤a ɔluɓɔmv̤u az̤ipʰɔsɛ ɛz̤ɔ ntɔ pʰakatʰi kɔkut͡ʃa kwɛtʰɔkaz̤i aɬamɓɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɬamɓɛ umz̤imɓa wakʰɛ nɡ̤amanz̤i anɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni aɓɛ jiŋǃamɓi umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kud̤ɛ kuɬwɛ lɔwɔ ulit͡ʃisilɛjɔ makaz̤iɬamɓɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ nɡ̤amanz̤i aɬamɓɛ umz̤imɓa nɡ̤amanz̤i aɓɛ jiŋǃamɓi kud̤ɛ kuɬwɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛɬamɓulukilɛjɔ jɔluwɔla utʰutʰu lwɛtʰɔkaz̤i iluɓɛkɛ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛmiŋǃuɓa ɛnd̤awɛni ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ luɡ̤ǀ̤inɛlwɛ iɓanɮa lɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli luɓɛ lɔlwamanz̤i ɔkuɬamɓa ukuŋ̤ǀ̤ɔla lid̤ini lɛsɔnɔ ɛli ɔluwɔlajɔ utʰutʰu lwɛtʰɔkaz̤i waz̤iɬamɓa iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ aɓɛ jiŋǃamɓi kud̤ɛ kuɬwɛ kuɓɛ nɡ̤ummisɛlɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nakɔwɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a ɔlupʰamɓukɛlɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ɔkǀʰukumisa ɔfilɛjɔ kuz̤ɔ iz̤id̤umɓu z̤aɓantu wɔɓa jiŋǃamɓi iint͡suku ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wɔtʰi nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰatʰu nanɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ az̤iɬamɓululɛ isɔnɔ aɬamɓululɛkɛ kɛ ukuɓa kɛ akatʰanɡ̤a az̤iɬamɓululɛ isɔnɔ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰatʰu nanɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ akaji kuɓa uɬamɓulukilɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ ɓakǀʰukumisa ɔfilɛjɔ isid̤umɓu sɔmntu ɓanɡ̤az̤iɬamɓululi isɔnɔ ɓawɛnz̤a iŋǃamɓi umŋǃuɓa kajɛhɔv̤a wɔŋǃuɲulwa unɡ̤aɓikʰɔ kwasirajɛli lɔɔ mpʰɛfumlɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛnɡ̤at͡ʃiz̤wanɡ̤a nɡ̤amanz̤i ɔkuɬamɓa ukuŋ̤ǀ̤ɔla pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ wɔɓa jiŋǃamɓi uɓuŋǃamɓi ɓakʰɛ ɓusɛkujɛ nɡ̤uwɔ lɔ umjalɛlɔ kǁa atʰɛ wafɛla ɛntɛntɛni ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ ɓanɡ̤ɛna ɛntɛntɛni naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓasukuɓa ɓɛsɛsɛntɛntɛni ɓɔɓa z̤iiŋǃamɓi iint͡suku ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤itʲa ɛz̤iv̤ulɛkilɛjɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnasikǀikɔ siɓɔt͡ʃiwɛjɔ z̤iz̤iiŋǃamɓi ɓɔnkɛ aɓasukuɓa ɓɛmkǀʰukumisa ɛmapʰanɮɛni ɔɓulɛwɛ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔfɛlɛ kʰɔna nɔkuɓa litʰamɓɔ lɔmntu nɔkuɓa liŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ɓɔna ɓɔɓa z̤iiŋǃamɓi iint͡suku ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓɔmkǀapʰulɛla ɔjiŋǃamɓi ɛlutʰutʰwini lɔkut͡ʃa kwɛd̤ini lɛsɔnɔ kuɓɛkwɛ pʰɛz̤u kwalɔ amanz̤i apʰililɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛsitʲa ind̤ɔd̤a ɛɬamɓulukilɛjɔ itʰaɓatʰɛ ihisɔpɛ ijitʰi ŋ̰ǁ̰u ɛmanz̤ini ifɛfɛ intɛntɛ nɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɔnkɛ naɓantu aɓaɓɛkujɔ nalɔwɔ ukǀʰukumisɛ itʰamɓɔ nɔɓulɛwɛjɔ nɔfilɛjɔ nɔkuɓa kɛ kusɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni wɔfɛfa ɔɬamɓulukilɛjɔ kɔjiŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰatʰu nanɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ am̤lamɓululɛ kɛ isɔnɔ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ az̤iɬamɓɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ aɬamɓɛ umz̤imɓa nɡ̤amanz̤i wɔɬamɓuluka kɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa kɛ ɔsukuɓa ɛjiŋǃamɓi anɡ̤az̤iɬamɓululi isɔnɔ lɔɔ mpʰɛfumlɔ mawuŋǃuɲulwɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛsikʰunɡ̤u nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛnz̤ɛ iŋǃamɓi iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kajɛhɔv̤a akat͡ʃiz̤wa nɡ̤amanz̤i ɔkuɬamɓa ukuŋ̤ǀ̤ɔla ujiŋǃamɓi wɔɓa nɡ̤ummisɛlɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ kuɓɔ ɔkɔkuɓa ɔfɛfa nɡ̤amanz̤i ɔkuɬamɓa ukuŋ̤ǀ̤ɔla makaz̤iɬamɓɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ nalɔwɔ ukǀʰukumisa amanz̤i ɔkuɬamɓa ukuŋ̤ǀ̤ɔla wɔɓa jiŋǃamɓi kud̤ɛ kuɬwɛ jɔnkɛ intɔ asukuɓa ɛjikǀʰukumisa ɔjiŋǃamɓi jɔɓa jiŋǃamɓi nɔmpʰɛfumlɔ ɔmkǀʰukumisajɔ wɔɓa jiŋǃamɓi kud̤ɛ kuɬwɛ ɓafika ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛt͡sin nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɔkukǃala ɓaɬala aɓantu ɛkad̤ɛʃɛ wafɛla kʰɔna umirijam waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa kʰɔna lalinɡ̤ɛnamanz̤i iɓanɮa ɓaɓiz̤ɛlana nd̤awɔɲɛ nɡ̤ɔmɔsɛs nanɡ̤ɔarɔn ɓaɓamɓana aɓantu nɔmɔsɛs ɓatʰi akwaɓa siɓɛ sipʰumɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ ɔkɔ aɓaz̤alwana ɓɛtʰu ɓapʰuma umpʰɛfumlɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a jini ukuɓa nisinɡ̤ɛnisɛ isikʰunɡ̤u sikajɛhɔv̤a kulɛ ntlanɡ̤ɔ sifɛlɛ kujɔ tʰina nɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤ɛtʰu jini ukuɓa nisiɲusɛ ɛjiputa nisiz̤isɛ kulɛ nd̤awɔ imɓi kanɡ̤aka asind̤awɔ jamɓɛwu namakʰiwanɛ namid̤ilija naz̤ixarnatɛ namanz̤i ɔkusɛla ɓɛsuka ɔɔmɔsɛs nɔarɔn ɛɓuswɛni ɓɛsikʰunɡ̤u ɓaja ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛntɛntɛ jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana ɓawa nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɓaɓɔnakala uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a kuɓɔ watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɛsitʰi jitʰaɓatʰɛ intɔnɡ̤a uliɓiz̤ɛlɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ iɓanɮa wɛna nɔarɔn umkʰuluwa wakʰɔ nitʰɛtʰɛ ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxɛni pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ inikɛ amanz̤i ajɔ uɓakʰupʰɛlɛ amanz̤i ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxɛni apʰɔ ulisɛz̤ɛ iɓanɮa nɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤alɔ wajitʰaɓatʰa kɛ umɔsɛs intɔnɡ̤a ɛɓuswɛni ɓukajɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wawiswajɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ wasiɓiz̤ɛla nd̤awɔɲɛ umɔsɛs nɔarɔn isikʰunɡ̤u pʰamɓi kwɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa lɛjɔ watʰi kuɓɔ kʰaniv̤ɛ ɓanɛɛnkani sinikʰupʰɛlɛ amanz̤i kulɛ ŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa wasipʰakamisa umɔsɛs isanɮa sakʰɛ wajiɓɛtʰa iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa nɡ̤ɛntɔnɡ̤a jakʰɛ iz̤iɬanɮɔ z̤az̤iɓini apʰuma amanz̤i amaninz̤i lasɛla iɓanɮa nɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤alɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs nakuarɔn nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa ninɡ̤akʰɔlwanɡ̤a ukuɓa nind̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkɔ aniji kusinɡ̤ɛnisa ɛsi sikʰunɡ̤u ɛz̤wɛni ɛnd̤iɓanika lɔna nɡ̤awɔ lawɔ amanz̤i asɛmɛrib̤a aɓaɓamɓana nɡ̤awɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɔjɛhɔv̤a waz̤a waz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛla ɓɔna umɔsɛs iz̤iɡ̤id̤imi ɛkad̤ɛʃɛ z̤aja kutʰi wakwaɛd̤ɔm ut͡ʃɔ umz̤alwana wakʰɔ usirajɛli ukutʰi wɛna ujakwaz̤i kɔnkɛ ukukǁʰamlɛka ɛsafumanana nakɔ ɓɛɬa ɔɔɓawɔ ɓaja ɛjiputa saɬala ɛjiputa imiɬa ɛmininz̤i asipʰatʰa kakuɓi amajiputa tʰina nɔɔɓawɔ ɓɛtʰu sakʰala kujɛhɔv̤a waliv̤a iliz̤wi lɛtʰu watʰuma isitʰuɲwa sasikʰupʰa ɛjiputa nanku kɛ sisɛkad̤ɛʃɛ umz̤i ɔsɛkupʰɛlɛni kɔmd̤a wakʰɔ makʰɛ sikǀand̤ɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɔ asiji kukǀand̤a nasɛz̤id̤ilijɛni asiji kusɛla manz̤i amakǃula sɔhamɓa nɡ̤ɔmɛnd̤ɔ wɛnkɔsi asiji kutʰi ɡ̤u ɓukǀala sijɛ ɛkunɛnɛ nasɛkʰɔɬɔ sid̤ɛ sikǀand̤ɛ ɛmd̤ɛni wakʰɔ watʰi uɛd̤ɔm kujɛ uz̤ɛ unɡ̤akǀand̤i ɬɛz̤ɛ nd̤ipʰumɛ nd̤inɛk͡xɛlɛ nd̤ikuɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤ɛ ɓatʰi ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kujɛ sɔɲuka nɡ̤ɔmɛnd̤ɔ ukuɓa sitʰɛ sasɛla amanz̤i akʰɔ nɛmfujɔ jam nd̤ɔkuɬawulɛla akukʰɔ ntɔ nd̤ɔkǀand̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛ kɔd̤wa nd̤ihamɓa nɡ̤ɛɛɲawɔ watʰi uz̤ɛ unɡ̤akǀand̤i wat͡ʃɔ wapʰuma uɛd̤ɔm wam̤lanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a ɛnɛntɔ ɛninz̤i jaɓantu ɛnɛsanɮa ɛsitʰɛ ŋ̰ǃ̰i wala uɛd̤ɔm ukumv̤umɛla usirajɛli ukuɓa akǀand̤ɛ ɛmd̤ɛni wakʰɛ wad͡ʒ̤ika kɛ usirajɛli wɛmka kujɛ ɓand̤uluka ɛkad̤ɛʃɛ ɓɛz̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli iɓanɮa lɔnkɛ ɛntaɓɛni jɛhɔrɛ watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs nakuarɔn ɛntaɓɛni jɛhɔrɛ ɛmd̤ɛni wɛliz̤wɛ lakwaɛd̤ɔm watʰi uarɔn makaɬanɡ̤anisɛlwɛ kwaɓakɔwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akaji kunɡ̤ɛna ɛz̤wɛni ɛnd̤ilinika ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa nawupʰikisajɔ umlɔmɔ ɛmanz̤ini ɛmɓamɓanɔ tʰaɓatʰa uarɔn nɔɛlaz̤arɛ uɲana wakʰɛ uɓaɲusɛ ɛntaɓɛni jɛhɔrɛ um̤luɓɛ uarɔn iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ uz̤amɓatʰisɛ uɛlaz̤arɛ uɲana wakʰɛ uarɔn wɔɬanɡ̤anisɛlwa kwaɓakɔwaɓɔ afɛlɛ kʰɔna wɛnz̤a umɔsɛs nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wamwisɛlajɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ ɓɛɲuka ɛntaɓɛni jɛhɔrɛ pʰamɓi kwɛɓanɮa lɔnkɛ umɔsɛs wam̤luɓa uarɔn iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ waz̤amɓatʰisa uɛlaz̤arɛ uɲana wakʰɛ wafɛla kʰɔna uarɔn ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛntaɓa wɛɬa umɔsɛs nɔɛlaz̤arɛ ɛntaɓɛni lakuɓɔna lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa ukuɓa uarɔn upʰumɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ ɓamlilɛla uarɔn imiɬa ɛmaʃumi matʰatʰu jɔnkɛ inɮu jakwasirajɛli wɛv̤a umkanan wasɛarad̤i ɔɓɛɬɛli kwɛlasɛz̤ant͡si ukuɓa ajɛz̤a amasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛɛntlɔla namasirajɛli watʰimɓa aɓantu kuwɔ ab̤amɓatʰisa amasirajɛli isib̤amɓatʰisɔ kujɛhɔv̤a atʰi ukuɓa utʰɛ waɓanikɛla inɛnɛ aɓa ɓantu ɛsanɮɛni nd̤ɔjisinɡ̤ɛla pʰant͡si imiz̤i jaɓɔ waliv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a iliz̤wi lamasirajɛli wamnikɛla umkanan lɔwɔ kuwɔ wasinɡ̤ɛlwa pʰant͡si nɛmiz̤i jakʰɛ kwatʰiwa iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ nd̤awɔ jihɔrma ɓand̤uluka ɛntaɓɛni jɛhɔrɛ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɔlwanɮɛ ɔluɓɔmv̤u ukuɓa ɓad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛ iliz̤wɛ lakwaɛd̤ɔm ɓakʰatʰaz̤ɛka aɓantu ɛnɮɛlɛni ɓatʰɛtʰa aɓantu nɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ nanɡ̤ɔmɔsɛs ɓatʰi jini ukuɓa nisiɲusɛ ɛjiputa siz̤ɛ kufɛla ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa isɔnka namanz̤i umpʰɛfumlɔ wɛtʰu uk͡xukǃukilɛ sɛsi sɔnka sinkat͡ʃunkat͡ʃu ujɛhɔv̤a watʰuma iiɲɔka ɛz̤inɔɓuɬunɡ̤u ɛɓantwini z̤aɓaluma aɓantu aɓantu aɓaninz̤i ɓakwasirajɛli ɓɛz̤a aɓantu kumɔsɛs ɓatʰi sɔnilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sitʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a nanɡ̤awɛ tʰand̤az̤a kujɛhɔv̤a az̤isusɛ kutʰi iiɲɔka ɛz̤ɔ waɓatʰand̤az̤ɛla kɛ umɔsɛs aɓantu watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs z̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ iɲɔka ɛnɔɓuɬunɡ̤u ujikǁʰɔmɛ ɛsiɓɔnd̤ɛni ɛsid̤ɛ kɔtʰi ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔɓaluɲiwɛjɔ ɓakukʰanɡ̤ɛla kujɔ ɓapʰilɛ wɛnz̤a kɛ umɔsɛs iɲɔka jɔb̤ɛd̤u wajikǁʰɔma ɛsiɓɔnd̤ɛni ɛsid̤ɛ kwatʰi jakuɓa itʰɛ iɲɔka jamluma waz̤a wab̤ɛka ɛɲɔkɛni jɔb̤ɛd̤u wapʰila ɓand̤uluka ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaja ɓamisa iintɛntɛ ɛɔb̤ɔti ɓand̤uluka ɛɔb̤ɔti ɓaja ɓamisa ɛijɛab̤arim ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛpʰamɓi kwɛlakwamɔwab̤i nɡ̤asɛkupʰumɛni kwɛlanɡ̤a ɓand̤uluka kʰɔna ɓaja ɓamisa ɛsiɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni sasɛz̤ɛrɛd̤ɛ ɓand̤uluka kʰɔna ɓaja ɓamisa pʰɛʃɛja kwɛarnɔn ɛsɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛpʰuma ɛmd̤ɛni wamaamɔri kuɓa iarnɔn nɡ̤umd̤a wakwamɔwab̤i ɔpʰakatʰi kwamamɔwab̤i namaamɔri nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ kutʰiwa ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛɛmfaz̤wɛ z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a iv̤ahɛb̤i wajitʰaɓatʰa ɛsiz̤a nɡ̤ɛsakǃʰwitʰi nɛz̤ib̤akǁa z̤asɛarnɔn namatʰamɓɛka ɛz̤ib̤akǁa ɔlukɛla ɛkʰajɛni lasɛari ajamɛ umd̤a wakwamɔwab̤i ɓand̤uluka kʰɔna ɓajɛ ɛb̤ɛrɛ ɛlɔ lɛlɔ kǃula watʰi nɡ̤alɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɬanɡ̤anisa aɓantu nd̤iɓanikɛ amanz̤i ɔkɔ aɬaɓa amasirajɛli lɛ nɡ̤ɔma ɲuka kǃula v̤umani kulɔ kwikǃula ɛlamɓiwa nɡ̤aɓatʰɛtʰɛli laɡ̤ɔnd͡ʒ̤wa nɡ̤amanɛnɛ aɓantu nɡ̤ɛntɔnɡ̤a jɔmmisimtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ɛmisimɛlɛlɔ jawɔ ɓand̤uluka ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɓaja ɛmatana ɓand̤uluka ɛmatana ɓaja ɛnahalijɛli ɓand̤uluka ɛnahalijɛli ɓaja ɛb̤amɔti ɓand̤uluka ɛb̤amɔti ɓaja ɛsiɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni ɛsisɛm̤laɓɛni wakwamɔwab̤i ɓaja ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛpisɡ̤a ɛkʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ɛnkanɡ̤ala amasirajɛli atʰuma iz̤iɡ̤id̤imi kusihɔn wamaamɔri ɛsitʰi mand̤ikǀand̤ɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɔ asiji kutʰi ɡ̤u ɓukǀala sijɛ ɛmasimini nasɛz̤id̤ilijɛni asiji kusɛla manz̤i ɛkǃula sija kuɓamɓa nɡ̤ɔmɛnd̤ɔ wɛnkɔsi sid̤ɛ sikǀand̤ɛ ɛmd̤ɛni wakʰɔ akawav̤umɛla usihɔn amasirajɛli ukuɓa akǀand̤ɛ ɛmd̤ɛni wakʰɛ usihɔn waɬanɡ̤anisa ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓakʰɛ wapʰuma waja kuwaɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a amasirajɛli ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛjat͡sa namasirajɛli amasirajɛli amkǁaɓɛla nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ aliɬutʰa iliz̤wɛ lakʰɛ atʰaɓatʰɛla ɛarnɔn ɛsa ɛjab̤ɔki ɛsa kɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umd̤a wɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn uɓulikǃɛlɛ amasirajɛli ajitʰaɓatʰa jɔnkɛ lɛ miz̤i aɬala amasirajɛli ɛmiz̤ini jɔnkɛ jamaamɔri ɛhɛʃb̤ɔn nasɛmaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsini ajɔ kuɓa ihɛʃb̤ɔn nɡ̤umz̤i wakwasihɔn wamaamɔri ɔwalwa nɔkumkani wakwamɔwab̤i wanɡ̤apʰamɓili waliɬutʰa lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lakʰɛ kujɛ kwɛsa ɛarnɔn nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ɓaɓɛsitʰi aɓɛnz̤i ɓɛmiz̤ɛkɛlisɔ jiz̤ani ɛhɛʃb̤ɔn mawakʰiwɛ uz̤inz̤iswɛ umz̤i wakwasihɔn nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kupʰumɛ umlilɔ ɛhɛʃb̤ɔn ilanɡ̤atʲɛ ɛmz̤ini wakwasihɔn wajiɮa iari jakwamɔwab̤i aɓaninimimanɡ̤ɔ ɓasɛarnɔn jɛha wɛna mɔwab̤i nid̤akilɛ ɓantu ɓakwakɛmɔʃɛ uɓanikɛlɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓaɓa nɡ̤aɓasaɓi lintɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ uz̤inikɛlɛ ɛkutʰind͡ʒ̤wɛni kusihɔn wamaamɔri siɓatɔlilɛ id̤akilɛ ihɛʃb̤ɔn kwɛsa ɛd̤ib̤ɔn saɓab̤anɡ̤az̤isa kwɛsa ɛnɔfa janɡ̤umlilɔ kwɛsa ɛmɛd̤ɛb̤a aɬala amasirajɛli ɛz̤wɛni lamaamɔri watʰuma umɔsɛs ukuɓa ijɛ kuɬɔlwa ijaz̤ɛrɛ ɓawatʰimɓa amaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ ɓawaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤a amaamɔri aɓɛkʰɔna ɓad͡ʒ̤ika ɓɛɲuka nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jasɛb̤aʃan wapʰuma uɔɡ̤i wasɛb̤aʃan waja kuɓaɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a jɛna naɓantu ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ ukuɓa kuliwɛɛɛd̤rɛji watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs musa ukumɔjika nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤imnikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ naɓantu ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ nɛliz̤wɛ lakʰɛ ukuɓa wɛnz̤ɛ kujɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wɛnz̤ajɔ kusihɔn wamaamɔri ɔwajɛɬɛli ɛhɛʃb̤ɔn ɓamɓulala jɛna nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ naɓantu ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ kwad̤a usind̤ilɛjɔ ɓaliɬutʰa iliz̤wɛ lakʰɛ ɓand̤uluka ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaja ɓamisa ɛz̤iŋ̰ǃ̰ant͡sɔni z̤akwamɔwab̤i pʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an malunɡ̤a nɛjɛrikɔ wakuɓɔna ub̤alaki uɲana kat͡sipɔrɛ kɔnkɛ aɓɛkwɛnz̤ilɛ usirajɛli kumaamɔri umɔwab̤i waŋǁunɡ̤upʰala kakʰulu nɡ̤aɓantu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛɓaninz̤i wak͡xukǃuka umɔwab̤i nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli watʰi umɔwab̤i kumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwamid̤ijan nɡ̤ɔku ɛsi sikʰunɡ̤u sija kukukʰɔtʰa kɔnkɛ ɔkunɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kutʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ inkɔmɔ ilukʰɔtʰajɔ uɬaz̤a lwasɛnɮɛ kɛ ub̤alaki uɲana kat͡sipɔrɛ uɓɛnɡ̤ukumkani wamamɔwab̤i nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa watʰuma aɓatʰuɲwa kub̤ilɛham uɲana kab̤ɛhɔrɛ ɛpɛhɔrɛ ɛsɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni wɛliz̤wɛ lɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ɓakɔwaɓɔ ukuɓa ɓamɓiz̤ɛ ɓatʰi jaɓɔna kupʰumɛ aɓantu ɛjiputa naɓɔ ɓɛɓuɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɛ uɓusɔ ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɓɛɬɛli malunɡ̤ana kʰawuz̤ɛ kɛ und̤ikǃalɛkisɛlɛ aɓa ɓantu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓanamanɮa m̤lawumɓi nd̤inɡ̤aɓa nakɔ ukuɓaɓulala nd̤iɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛ kwɛli liz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa ɔmsikɛlɛlajɔ usikɛlɛlwɛ ɔmkǃalɛkisajɔ ukǃalɛkisiwɛ ahamɓa kɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwamɔwab̤i namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwamid̤ijan ɛnɛɛnkɔz̤ɔ z̤ɔkuv̤umisa ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤awɔ aja kub̤ilɛham atʰɛtʰa kujɛ amaz̤wi kab̤alaki watʰi kuwɔ lalani apʰa nɡ̤ɔɓu ɓusuku nd̤ɔninika iliz̤wi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a aja kutʰɛtʰa ɓaɬala kɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli aɓɔ ɓakwamɔwab̤i nɔb̤ilɛham wafika utʰikǁɔ kub̤ilɛham watʰi anɡ̤ɔɔɓani mad̤ɔd̤a anawɛ apʰa watʰi ub̤ilɛham kutʰikǁɔ ub̤alaki uɲana kat͡sipɔrɛ wamamɔwab̤i utʰumɛlɛ ɛsitʰi jaɓɔna kupʰumɛ aɓantu ɛjiputa ɓaɓuɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla uɓusɔ ɓɛliz̤wɛ jiz̤a kɛ und̤ikǃalɛkisɛlɛ ɓɔna m̤lawumɓi nd̤inɡ̤aɓa nakɔ ukulwanaɓɔ nd̤iɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛ watʰi utʰikǁɔ kub̤ilɛham uz̤ɛ unɡ̤ahamɓi nawɔ unɡ̤aɓakǃalɛkisi aɓɔ ɓantu kuɓa ɓasikɛlɛlwɛ wav̤uka ub̤ilɛham watʰi kuɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakab̤alaki jijani ɛz̤wɛni lɛnu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ujala ukund̤iv̤umɛla nd̤ihamɓɛ ɓɛsuka kɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakwamɔwab̤i ɓaja kub̤alaki ɓatʰi walilɛ ub̤ilɛham ukuz̤a natʰi wapʰind̤a ub̤alaki watʰuma aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛɓaninz̤i ɓɛɓɛkɛkilɛ kunaɓɔ ɓafika kɛ kub̤ilɛham ɓatʰi kujɛ ut͡ʃɔ ub̤alaki uɲana kat͡sipɔrɛ ukutʰi musa ukukʰa uŋǃand̤wɛ ntɔ ukuz̤a kuɓa ukukuz̤ukisa kɔna nd̤ija kukuz̤ukisa kunɛnɛ nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ kɔnkɛ ɔnd̤ikǁɛlɛla kɔna kʰawuz̤ɛ und̤ikǃalɛkisɛlɛ aɓa ɓantu wapʰɛnd̤ula ub̤ilɛham watʰi kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakab̤alaki anɡ̤afanɛlana ub̤alaki ɛnd̤inika inɮu jakʰɛ iz̤ɛlɛ jisiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ and̤inakɔ ukuwuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa umlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ ɔkuŋǀinanɛ nɔkuɓa kɔkukʰulu kʰaniɬalɛ apʰa kɛ nɡ̤ɔɓu ɓusuku ud̤id̤ɛ nd̤ijaz̤i intɔ aja kujɔnɡ̤ɛz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a ajitʰɛtʰɛ wafika utʰikǁɔ kub̤ilɛham ɛɓusuku watʰi kujɛ ukuɓa mad̤ɔd̤a afikɛ kuwɛ ɛz̤a kukuɓiz̤a uhamɓɛ nawɔ kɛ iliz̤wi ɛnd̤ɔlitʰɛtʰa kuwɛ uz̤ɛ wɛnz̤ɛ lɔna lɔd̤wa wav̤uka ub̤ilɛham wajiɓɔpʰa imaz̤i jakʰɛ jɛɛsilɛ wahamɓa naɓatʰɛtʰɛli aɓɔ ɓakwamɔwab̤i wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ katʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wahamɓajɔ sɛma isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a ɛnɮɛlɛni ukuɓa simkǀʰasɛ wajɛkʰwɛlɛ ɛɛsilɛni lakʰɛ ɛnamad̤ɔd̤ana akwakʰɛ ɔmaɓini iɛsilɛ lasiɓɔna isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a ɛnɮɛlɛni sixɔlɛ ik͡xɛlɛ lasɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sasɔ latʰi ɡ̤u ɓukǀala iɛsilɛ ɛnɮɛlɛni laja ɛnt͡simini ub̤ilɛham waliɓɛtʰa iɛsilɛ ɛlisɔnɡ̤ɛla ɛnɮɛlɛni sɛma isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a ɛŋ̤ǁ̤inɡ̤wɛni jɛz̤id̤ilija ilud̤ɔnɡ̤a nɡ̤apʰa ilud̤ɔnɡ̤a nɡ̤apʰa iɛsilɛ lasiɓɔna isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a laɡ̤uɮa ud̤ɔnɡ̤a laluɡ̤uɮa uɲawɔ lukab̤ilɛham nɡ̤ɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a wapʰind̤a waliɓɛtʰa sapʰind̤a saɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a sɛma ɛnd̤awɛni ɛkǁinɛnɛjɔ apʰɔ ɓɛkunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ nɮɛla jakukǀɛz̤ɛla ɛkunɛnɛ nasɛkʰɔɬɔ iɛsilɛ lasiɓɔna isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a lasad̤alala pʰant͡si kɔb̤ilɛham wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ kab̤ilɛham waliɓɛtʰa iɛsilɛ nɡ̤ɛntɔnɡ̤a wawuv̤ula kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a umlɔmɔ wɛɛsilɛ latʰi kub̤ilɛham nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ ntɔni ukuɓa und̤iɓɛtʰɛ lamakǁɛʃa matʰatʰu watʰi ub̤ilɛham kwiɛsilɛ kunɡ̤ɔkuɓa ufɛkɛtʰɛ nɡ̤am akwaɓa ɓɛnd̤ipʰɛtʰɛ ik͡xɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa inɛnɛ nɡ̤ɛnd̤ikuɓulɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔku latʰi iɛsilɛ kub̤ilɛham and̤ililɔ iɛsilɛ lakʰɔ ɔkʰwɛla kulɔ kusɛlɔkɔ waɓakʰɔjɔ unanam̤la nd̤ikǃʰɛlilɛ ukwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ kuwɛ watʰi haji wawav̤ula ujɛhɔv̤a amɛɬɔ kab̤ilɛham wasiɓɔna isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a ɛnɮɛlɛni sixɔlɛ ik͡xɛlɛ lasɔnɡ̤ɛsanɮa sasɔ watʰɔɓa wakǃuɓud̤a nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ satʰi kujɛ isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a uliɓɛtʰɛlɛ ntɔni iɛsilɛ lakʰɔ makǁɛʃa matʰatʰu jaɓɔna kupʰumɛ ukuz̤a kukukǀʰasa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛkuɓɔnɛni lɛ nɮɛla isɛjɛlisɛla land̤iɓɔna iɛsilɛ lakǀɛz̤ɛla pʰaja makǁɛʃa ɔmatʰatʰu kɔkɔ lakǀɛz̤ɛla pʰaja nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam ɔkaɲɛ nɡ̤ɛnd̤ikuɓulɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔku wɛna nd̤alisind̤isa lɔna watʰi ub̤ilɛham kwisitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a nd̤ɔnilɛ kuɓa ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤az̤i ukuɓa wɛna uz̤ɛ kund̤imɛla ɛnɮɛlɛni nɡ̤ɔku ukuɓa kuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ nd̤ɔɓuja satʰi isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a kub̤ilɛham hamɓa namad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ kɛ iliz̤wi ɛnd̤ɔlitʰɛtʰa kuwɛ uz̤ɛ utʰɛtʰɛ lɔna lɔd̤wa wahamɓa kɛ ub̤ilɛham naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakab̤alaki wɛv̤a ub̤alaki ukuɓa ub̤ilɛham ujɛz̤a wapʰuma waja kum̤lanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a ɛmz̤ini wakwamɔwab̤i ɔsɛmd̤ɛni wasɛarnɔn ɛkupʰɛlɛni kɔmd̤a watʰi ub̤alaki kub̤ilɛham and̤ikutʰumɛlanɡ̤a nd̤ikǃinisilɛ ukuɓa nd̤ikuɓiz̤ɛ jini ukuɓa unɡ̤ɛz̤i nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ and̤inakɔ ukukuz̤ukisa watʰi ub̤ilɛham kub̤alaki ujaɓɔna nd̤ifikilɛ kuwɛ nd̤inakɔ kɛ nɡ̤ɔku ukutʰɛtʰa intɔ ɛjijɔ iliz̤wi aliɓɛkajɔ utʰikǁɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni nd̤ija kutʰɛtʰa lɔna wahamɓa ub̤ilɛham nɔb̤alaki ɓafika ɛkirijatihut͡sɔti waɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla ub̤alaki iinkɔmɔ nɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ watʰumɛla kub̤ilɛham nakuɓatʰɛtʰɛli aɓaɓɛnajɛ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmsɔ ub̤alaki wamtʰaɓatʰa ub̤ilɛham wamɲusa ɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni z̤ikab̤ahali waɓɔna kʰɔna wad̤a wɛsa ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwaɓantu watʰi ub̤ilɛham kub̤alaki nd̤akʰɛlɛ apʰa iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤iɓɛ sikǁʰɛŋǁɛ und̤imisɛlɛ apʰa iinkunz̤i ɛz̤int͡ʃa z̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤iɓɛ sikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛz̤imv̤u z̤iɓɛ sikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wɛnz̤a kɛ ub̤alaki nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ watʰɛtʰajɔ ub̤ilɛham ɓatʰi ɔɔb̤alaki nɔb̤ilɛham ɓɛɲusa kwisiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɡ̤ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa jɛnkɔmɔ nɛnkunz̤i jɛmv̤u watʰi ub̤ilɛham kub̤alaki jima wɛna nɡ̤asɛd̤inini lakʰɔ ɛliɲukajɔ nd̤ihamɓɛ m̤lawumɓi ujɛhɔv̤a wɔz̤a kund̤iɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a nɛliz̤wi asukuɓa ɛnd̤iɓɔnisa lɔna nd̤ɔkukǁɛlɛla kɛ waja ɛlukǃʰajini utʰikǁɔ wakǃuɓisana nɔb̤ilɛham watʰi jɛna kujɛ nd̤ilunɡ̤isɛ iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nd̤aɲusa inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa jɛnkɔmɔ nɛnkunz̤i jɛmv̤u kwisiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɡ̤ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓɛka iliz̤wi ɛmlɔɲɛni kab̤ilɛham watʰi ɓuja ujɛ kub̤alaki wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukutʰɛtʰa waɓuja waja kɛ kujɛ nankɔ ɛmi nɡ̤asɛd̤inini lakʰɛ ɛliɲukajɔ jɛna naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔnkɛ ɓakwamɔwab̤i wasusɛla nɡ̤ɔmz̤ɛkɛlisɔ wakʰɛ watʰi ub̤alaki wamamɔwab̤i und̤itʰaɓatʰɛ kwaaram ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɛsitʰi jiz̤a und̤ikǃalɛkisɛlɛ ujakɔɓi jiz̤a ub̤av̤umɛlɛ usirajɛli nd̤ɔtʰini ukukǃalɛkisa anɡ̤amkǃalɛkisijɔ utʰikǁɔ nd̤ɔtʰini ukub̤av̤umɛla anɡ̤amb̤av̤umɛlijɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤isɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jamawa nd̤ijamɓɔna nd̤isɛz̤ind̤ulini nd̤iɓɔnisɛla jɛna jaɓɔna nɡ̤aɓantu aɓaɬala ɓɔd̤wa aɓaɓalɛlwa pʰakatʰi kwaz̤ɔ iintlanɡ̤a nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤aluɓalajɔ utʰuli lwakwajakɔɓi nɛsaɬulɔ sɛsinɛ sakwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkwɛnani umpʰɛfumlɔ mawufɛ kwaɓatʰɛ tʲɛ ukupʰɛla kuɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwaɓɔ watʰi ub̤alaki kub̤ilɛham jintɔni lɛ ntɔ und̤ɛnz̤ɛ jɔna nd̤ikutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ukuɓa uz̤ikǃalɛkisɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤am ukuz̤isikɛlɛla wapʰɛnd̤ula jɛna watʰi ɔkɔ akuɓɛkilɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛmlɔɲɛni mand̤inɡ̤akuɡ̤ǀ̤ini nd̤ikutʰɛtʰɛ watʰi ub̤alaki kujɛ kʰawuz̤ɛ sijɛ nd̤awɛni jimɓi apʰɔ uja kuɓaɓɔna wɔɓɔna isipʰɛlɔ saɓɔ sɔd̤wa unɡ̤aɓaɓɔni ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla und̤ikǃalɛkisɛlɛkɛ ɓɔna apʰɔ wamsa ɛm̤laɓɛni waɓaɓɔnisɛli ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛpisɡ̤a wakʰa iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wɛɲusa inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa jɛnkɔmɔ nɛnkunz̤i jɛmv̤u kwisiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɡ̤ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ watʰi kub̤alaki jɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ nɡ̤asɛd̤inini lakʰɔ ɛliɲukajɔ nd̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a wakǃuɓisana nɔb̤ilɛham waɓɛka iliz̤wi ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɛ watʰi ɓuja ujɛ kub̤alaki wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukutʰɛtʰa wafika kɛ kujɛ nankɔ ɛmi nɡ̤asɛd̤inini lakʰɛ ɛliɲukajɔ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakwamɔwab̤i ɓɛnajɛ watʰi ub̤alaki kujɛ utʰɛtʰɛ ntɔni ujɛhɔv̤a wasusɛla nɡ̤ɔmz̤ɛkɛlisɔ wakʰɛ watʰi suka umɛ b̤alaki uv̤ɛ nd̤iɓɛkɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ ɲana kat͡sipɔrɛ utʰikǁɔ ukuɓa atʰɛtʰɛ amanɡ̤a akaɲana ukuɓa az̤ɔɬwajɛ ɛt͡ʃilɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ jɛna akaji kwɛnz̤a ɛtʰɛtʰilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ akaji kufɛz̤a jaɓɔna nd̤amkɛlɛ ukusikɛlɛla usikɛlɛlɛ kɛ and̤inakukuɓujisa akaɓɔni ɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a kujakɔɓi akaɓɔni ɓuɓi kusirajɛli ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ unajɛ ukud̤uma kɔkumkani kupʰakatʰi kwakʰɛ utʰikǁɔ umkʰupʰa ɛjiputa amɛnd̤u akʰɛ and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɛŋǃu akukʰɔ z̤iɬaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔjakɔɓi akukʰɔ kuv̤umisa nɡ̤ɔsirajɛli nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛlililɔ kutʰɛtʰwa kujakɔɓi nakusirajɛli intɔ ajɛnz̤ajɔ utʰikǁɔ jaɓɔna aɓantu ɓɛsuka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲamakaz̤i ɓaz̤ipʰakamisa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲam ind̤una aɓalali pʰant͡si ɓad̤ɛ ɓaɮɛ ɔkukǃwɛnɡ̤iwɛjɔ ɓasɛlɛ iɡ̤az̤i laɓaɬatʲiwɛjɔ watʰi ub̤alaki kub̤ilɛham uz̤ɛ unɡ̤aɓi saɓakǃalɛkisa uz̤ɛ unɡ̤aɓi saɓasikɛlɛla wapʰɛnd̤ula ub̤ilɛham watʰi kub̤alaki ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤atʰɛtʰanɡ̤a kuwɛ nd̤atʰi kɔnkɛ akutʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kwɛnz̤a kɔna watʰi ub̤alaki kub̤ilɛham kʰawuz̤ɛ nd̤ikusɛ nd̤awɛni jimɓi m̤lawumɓi kɔlunɡ̤a ɛmɛɬwɛni katʰikǁɔ ukuɓa und̤ikǃalɛkisɛlɛ kɛ ɓɔna kʰɔna ub̤alaki kɛ ub̤ilɛham ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛpɛhɔrɛ ɛkʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ɛnkanɡ̤ala watʰi ub̤ilɛham kub̤alaki nd̤akʰɛlɛ apʰa iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤iɓɛ sikǁʰɛŋǁɛ und̤imisɛlɛ apʰa iinkunz̤i ɛz̤int͡ʃa z̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤iɓɛ sikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛz̤imv̤u z̤iɓɛ sikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wɛnz̤a kɛ ub̤alaki nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ watʰɛtʰajɔ ub̤ilɛham wɛɲusa kwisiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɡ̤ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa jɛnkɔmɔ nɛnkunz̤i jɛmv̤u waɓɔna ub̤ilɛham ukuɓa kuɬɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ukumsikɛlɛla usirajɛli akaja kuɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a z̤iɬaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤iɬanɮɔ waɓub̤ɛkisa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ wapʰakamisa amɛɬɔ akʰɛ ub̤ilɛham wawaɓɔna amasirajɛli ɛɬɛli nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤awɔ umɔja katʰikǁɔ wamfikɛla wasusɛla nɡ̤ɔmz̤ɛkɛlisɔ wakʰɛ watʰi ut͡ʃɔ ub̤ilɛham uɲana kab̤ɛhɔrɛ it͡ʃɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛkǀiɲwɛ amɛɬɔ ut͡ʃɔ ɔv̤a ukutʰɛtʰa kukatʰikǁɔ ɔwuɓɔnajɔ umɓɔnɔ wɔsɔmanɮa ɛsiwa pʰant͡si ɛtʰʲilwɛ amɛɬɔ az̤iz̤intlɛ nɡ̤akɔ iintɛntɛ z̤akʰɔ jakɔɓi nɛmiŋǃuɓa jakʰɔ sirajɛli z̤itwaɓulukilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤iɬamɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amasimi apʰɛz̤u kɔmlamɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmiɬaɓa ɛtʲɛlwɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmisɛd̤arɛ ɛpʰɛz̤u kwamanz̤i aja kumpɔmpɔz̤a amanz̤i ɛmipʰand̤ɛni jakʰɛ imɓɛwu jakʰɛ inɡ̤asɛmanz̤ini amaninz̤i ukumkani wakʰɛ makaɓɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤ulu kɔaɡ̤aɡ̤i ɓuz̤ipʰakamisɛ uɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ utʰikǁɔ umkʰupʰa ɛjiputa amɛnd̤u akʰɛ and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɛŋǃu uja kuz̤iɮa iintlanɡ̤a aɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓakʰɛ awakʰukʰuz̤ɛ amatʰamɓɔ aɓɔ aɓapʰalusɛ nɡ̤ɛɛntɔlɔ z̤akʰɛ waɡ̤ukǃa waɓutʰuma nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲama nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲamakaz̤i nɡ̤uɓani ɔwɔmv̤usa maɓasikɛlɛlwɛ aɓakusikɛlɛlajɔ ɓakǃalɛkiswɛ aɓakukǃalɛkisajɔ wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ kab̤alaki kub̤ilɛham waz̤itʰʲwak͡xaz̤a iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ watʰi ub̤alaki kub̤ilɛham nd̤ikuɓiz̤ɛlɛ ukuɓa uz̤ikǃalɛkisɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤am ukuz̤isikɛlɛla ɛz̤i z̤iɬanɮɔ z̤ɔz̤itʰatʰu kʰwɛlɛla nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɔ ɓɛnd̤itʰɛ nd̤ɔkuz̤ukisa kakʰulu jaɓɔna ujɛhɔv̤a ukuv̤imɓilɛ uz̤ukɔ watʰi ub̤ilɛham kub̤alaki ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤atʰɛtʰanɡ̤a nakuɓatʰuɲwa ɓakʰɔ ɔwaɓatʰumɛla nd̤isitʰi anɡ̤afanɛlana ub̤alaki ɛnd̤inika inɮu jakʰɛ iz̤ɛlɛ jisiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ and̤inɡ̤ɛkʰɛ nd̤iwuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛ umlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɔkuɓa kɔkuɓi ɔkupʰuma ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam ɔkɔ akutʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kwɛnz̤a kɔna kalɔku jaɓɔna nd̤ijahamɓa nd̤ija ɛɓantwini ɓakɔwɛtʰu jiz̤a nd̤ikutʲɛlɛ intɔ aɓaja kujɛnz̤a aɓa ɓantu kuɓantu ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla wasusɛla nɡ̤ɔmz̤ɛkɛlisɔ wakʰɛ watʰi ut͡ʃɔ ub̤ilɛham uɲana kab̤ɛhɔrɛ it͡ʃɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛkǀiɲwɛ amɛɬɔ ut͡ʃɔ ɔv̤a ukutʰɛtʰa kukatʰikǁɔ wakwaz̤i ukwaz̤i kɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni ɔɓɔna umɓɔnɔ wɔsɔmanɮa ɛsiwapʰant͡si ɛtʰʲilwɛ amɛɬɔ nd̤ijajiɓɔna kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔna nɡ̤ɔku nd̤ijikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ inɡ̤ɛkufupʰi inkwɛnkwɛz̤i ipʰuma kwajakɔɓi intɔnɡ̤a iv̤ɛla kwasirajɛli iwapʰalusɛ amamɔwab̤i ɛmakǀalɛni ɔmaɓini iɓaɡ̤ɔmɓɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔlɔ uɛd̤ɔm aɓɛ aɓɛ usɛhirɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɛ usirajɛli jɛna av̤ɛlisɛ amanɮa makɛɬɛ ɔpʰuma kwajakɔɓi at͡ʃaɓalalisɛ aɓasɛlɛjɔ ɛmiz̤ini wawaɓɔna amaamalɛki wasusɛla nɡ̤ɔmz̤ɛkɛlisɔ wakʰɛ watʰi iŋ̤ǃ̤alɔ jɛɛntlanɡ̤a nɡ̤uamalɛki isipʰɛlɔ sakʰɛ sikukut͡ʃaɓalala wawaɓɔna amakɛni wasusɛla nɡ̤ɔmz̤ɛkɛlisɔ wakʰɛ watʰi likǃinilɛ ikʰaja lakʰɔ inɮu jakʰɔ imiswɛ ɛwɛni kuɓa ukajin anɡ̤at͡ʃajɛlwa jini ad̤ɛ uasirija akutʰimɓɛ wasusɛla nɡ̤ɔmz̤ɛkɛlisɔ wakʰɛ watʰi jɛha az̤i nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kuɓuɮa uɓɔmi ɔkɔ utʰikǁɔ iiŋǃanawa z̤iv̤ɛla ɛluŋǁwɛmɛni lwamakiti z̤ijamkǀinɛz̤ɛla uasirija z̤ijamkǀinɛz̤ɛla uɛb̤ɛrɛ najɛ wɔd̤a at͡ʃaɓalalɛ wɛsuka kɛ ub̤ilɛham wahamɓa waɓujɛla ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ najɛ ub̤alaki wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jakʰɛ amasirajɛli aɬala ɛʃitim ɓakǃala aɓantu ɓahɛɲuz̤a nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akwamɔwab̤i z̤aɓaɓiz̤ɛla aɓantu ɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni jɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓaz̤ɔ ɓaɮa aɓantu ɓaŋǃula ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓaz̤ɔ amasirajɛli az̤iɓand̤akaɲa kɛ nɔb̤ahalipɛhɔrɛ wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a kumasirajɛli watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs tʰaɓatʰa ɓɔnkɛ aɓaz̤iintlɔkɔ z̤aɓantu uɓaɓɛtʰɛlɛlɛ aɓanɛtʲala ɛmŋǃamlɛz̤wɛni kujɛhɔv̤a pʰamɓi kwɛlanɡ̤a kuɓujiswɛ ukuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a kumasirajɛli watʰi umɔsɛs kuɓaɡ̤wɛɓi ɓakwasirajɛli ɓulalani ɛlɔwɔ aɓantu ɓakʰɛ aɓaz̤iɓand̤akaɲilɛjɔ nɔb̤ahalipɛhɔrɛ kwaɓɔnakala kɛ ind̤ɔd̤a jakɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli isɔnd̤ɛz̤a kuɓaz̤alwana ɓajɔ ummid̤ijanɛkaz̤i ɛmɛɬwɛni kamɔsɛs nasɛmɛɬwɛni ɛɓanɮa lɔnkɛ lɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓaɓɛlila ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛntɛntɛ jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana waɓɔna upinɛhasi uɲana kaɛlaz̤arɛ uɲana kaarɔn umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wɛsuka pʰakatʰi kwɛɓanɮa watʰaɓatʰa umkʰɔntɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɛ wajiland̤ɛla ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤umsirajɛli waja ɛɡ̤umɓini waɓaɬaɓa amaɬanz̤a ɓɔɓaɓini ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤umsirajɛli nɛnkaz̤ana lɛjɔ ɛsiswini sajɔ satʰintɛlwa kɛ isiɓɛtʰɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓafajɔ nɡ̤ɛsiɓɛtʰɔ ɓaɓa nɡ̤amawaka amaʃumi amaɓini anamanɛ watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɛsitʰi upinɛhasi uɲana kaɛlaz̤arɛ uɲana kaarɔn umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli uɓuɓujisilɛ uɓuʃuʃu ɓam kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛkukʰwɛlɛtɛni kwakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkʰwɛlɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤inɡ̤aɓaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓi ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛkʰwɛlɛ jitʰi nɡ̤ɔkɔ jaɓɔna nd̤imnika umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɔkǁɔlɔ uɓɛ nɡ̤umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɔɓuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔɓunɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ kujɛ nakwimɓɛwu jakʰɛ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɛɓɛnɛkʰwɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ waɓakǀamaɡ̤uʃɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli iɡ̤ama lɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤umsirajɛli lɛjɔ jaɬatʲwajɔ jaɬatʲwa nɔmmid̤ijanɛkaz̤i iɓinɡ̤uz̤imri uɲana kasalu jɛnɮu jɔɔjisɛ kwasimɔn iɡ̤ama lɛnkaz̤ana lɛjɔ jaɬatʲwajɔ inɡ̤ummid̤ijanɛkaz̤i ɓɛlinɡ̤ukɔz̤ib̤i intɔmɓi kat͡surɛ ɔɓɛjintlɔkɔ jɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɛnɮu jɔɔjisɛ kwamid̤ijan watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɛsitʰi waɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛni amamid̤ijan niwakǁaɓɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɔna aniɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤amajɛlɛŋǃɛ awɔ aɓɛwɛnz̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnd̤awɔ kapɛhɔrɛ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnd̤awɔ kakɔz̤ib̤i intɔmɓi jɛnkulu jakwamid̤ijan ud̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ ɔwaɬatʲwa nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsiɓɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnd̤awɔ kapɛhɔrɛ kwatʰi ɛmv̤a kwɛsiɓɛtʰɔ ɛsɔ watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs nakuɛlaz̤arɛ uɲana kaarɔn umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli watʰi ɓalani lɛɓanɮa lɔnkɛ lɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nitʰaɓatʰɛlɛ kɔmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini ɛz̤ɛlwɛ niɲusɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓapʰuma umkʰɔsi kwasirajɛli umɔsɛs nɔɛlaz̤arɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓatʰɛtʰa naɓɔ ɛz̤iŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsini z̤akwamɔwab̤i nɡ̤asɛjɔrd̤an malunɡ̤a nɛjɛrikɔ ɓɛsitʰi tʰaɓatʰɛlani kɔmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini ɛz̤ɛlwɛ niɲusɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ umɔsɛs ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓapʰumajɔ ɛz̤wɛni lamajiputa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓa kwarub̤ɛn amaz̤iɓulɔ kasirajɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn nɡ̤uhanɔki ɔz̤ala amahanɔki nɡ̤upalu ɔz̤ala amapalu nɡ̤uhɛt͡sɛrɔn ɔz̤ala amahɛt͡sɛrɔn nɡ̤ukarmi ɔz̤ala amakarmi jijɔ lɛjɔ imiz̤alwanɛ jamarub̤ɛn aɓaɓalwajɔ kujɔ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤amaʃumi amanɛ anamatʰatʰu anamakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamaŋǀi matʰatʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakapalu nɡ̤uɛlijab̤i ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛlijab̤i nɡ̤unɛmuwɛli nɔd̤atan nɔab̤iram nɡ̤ulɔɔ d̤atan nɔab̤iram ɓaɓiz̤wajɔ liɓanɮa ɓapʰikisana nɔmɔsɛs nɔarɔn ɛɓanɮɛni likakɔra ɛkupʰikisanɛni kwaɓɔ nɔjɛhɔv̤a waz̤a um̤laɓa wawuv̤ula umlɔmɔ wawɔ waɓaɡ̤iɲa nɔkɔra ɛkufɛnikwɛlɔ ɓanɮa ɛkuɮɛni kɔmlilɔ amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amakʰulu ɔmaɓini anamaŋǀi maɬanu aɓa nɡ̤umkǃɔnd̤isɔ kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakakɔra aɓafanɡ̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakasimɔn nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ nɡ̤unɛmuwɛli ɔz̤ala amanɛmuwɛli nɡ̤ujamin ɔz̤ala amajamin nɡ̤ujakin ɔz̤ala amajakin nɡ̤uz̤ɛra ɔz̤ala amaz̤ɛra nɡ̤usawulɛ ɔz̤ala amasawulɛ jijɔ lɛjɔ imiz̤alwanɛ jamasimɔn amaʃumi amaɓini anamaɓini anamakʰulu maɓini ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ad̤i nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ nɡ̤ut͡sɛfɔn ɔz̤ala amat͡sɛfɔn nɡ̤uhaɡ̤i ɔz̤ala amahaɡ̤i nɡ̤uʃuni ɔz̤ala amaʃuni nɡ̤uɔz̤ɛni ɔz̤ala amaɔz̤ɛni nɡ̤uɛri ɔz̤ala amaɛri nɡ̤uarɔd̤i ɔz̤ala amaarɔd̤i nɡ̤uarɛli ɔz̤ala amaarɛli jijɔ lɛjɔ imiz̤alwanɛ jɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ad̤i nɡ̤ɔkwaɓaɓalwajɔ kuɓɔ amaʃumi ɔmanɛ anamakʰulu maɬanu ɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a nɡ̤uɛrɛ nɔɔnan ɓafa ɔɔɛrɛ nɔɔnan ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan ɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓa nɡ̤uʃɛla ɔz̤ala amaʃɛla nɡ̤upɛrɛt͡sɛ ɔz̤ala amapɛrɛt͡sɛ nɡ̤uz̤ɛra ɔz̤ala amaz̤ɛra ɔɔɲana ɓakapɛrɛt͡sɛ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓa nɡ̤uhɛt͡sɛrɔn ɔz̤ala amahɛt͡sɛrɔn nɡ̤uhamuli ɔz̤ala amahamuli jijɔ lɛjɔ imiz̤alwanɛ jakwajud̤a nɡ̤ɔkwaɓaɓalwajɔ kuɓɔ amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamatʰand̤atʰu anamakʰulu maɬanu ɔɔɲana ɓakaisakarɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ nɡ̤utɔla ɔz̤ala amatɔla nɡ̤upuwa ɔz̤ala amapuwa nɡ̤ujaʃub̤i ɔz̤ala amajaʃub̤i nɡ̤uʃimrɔn ɔz̤ala amaʃimrɔn jijɔ lɛjɔ imiz̤alwanɛ jakwaisakarɛ nɡ̤ɔkwaɓaɓalwajɔ kuɓɔ anaʃumi amatʰand̤atʰu anamanɛ anamakʰulu matʰatʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ nɡ̤usɛrɛd̤ɛ ɔz̤ala amasɛrɛd̤ɛ nɡ̤uɛlɔn ɔz̤ala amaɛlɔn nɡ̤ujalɛli ɔz̤ala amajalɛli jijɔ lɛjɔ imiz̤alwanɛ jamaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn nɡ̤ɔkwaɓaɓalwajɔ kuɓɔ amaʃumi amatʰand̤atʰu anamakʰulu maɬanu ɔɔɲana ɓakajɔsɛfu nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ nɡ̤umanasɛ nɔɛfrajim ɔɔɲana ɓakamanasɛ nɡ̤umakirɛ ɔz̤ala amamakirɛ umakirɛ waz̤ala uɡ̤ilijad̤i nɡ̤uɡ̤ilijad̤i ɔz̤ala amaɡ̤ilijad̤i nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ilijad̤i nɡ̤uijɛz̤ɛrɛ ɔz̤ala amaijɛz̤ɛrɛ nɡ̤uhɛlɛki ɔz̤ala amahɛlɛki nɡ̤uasɛrijɛli ɔz̤ala amaasɛrijɛli nɡ̤uʃɛkɛm ɔz̤ala amaʃɛkɛm nɡ̤uʃɛmid̤a ɔz̤ala amaʃɛmid̤a nɡ̤uhɛfɛrɛ ɔz̤ala amahɛfɛrɛ kɛ ut͡sɛlɔfɛhad̤i uɲana kahɛfɛrɛ ɛɓɛnɡ̤ɛnaɲana wajɛ ɛnɛɛntɔmɓi z̤ɔd̤wa amaɡ̤ama ɛɛntɔmɓi z̤ikat͡sɛlɔfɛhad̤i nɡ̤umala nɔnɔha nɔhɔɡ̤ɛla nɔmilka nɔtirt͡sa jijɔ lɛjɔ imiz̤alwanɛ jakwamanasɛ nɡ̤ɔkwaɓaɓalwajɔ kuɓɔ amaʃumi amaɬanu anamaɓini anamakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛfrajim nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ nɡ̤uʃutɛla ɔz̤ala amaʃutɛla nɡ̤ub̤ɛkɛrɛ ɔz̤ala amab̤ɛkɛrɛ nɡ̤utahan ɔz̤ala amatahan nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃutɛla nɡ̤uɛran ɔz̤ala amaɛran jijɔ lɛjɔ imiz̤alwanɛ jɔɔɲana ɓakaɛfrajim nɡ̤ɔkwaɓaɓalwajɔ kuɓɔ amaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu anamaɓini anamakʰulu maɬanu nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakajɔsɛfu nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ nɡ̤ub̤ɛla ɔz̤ala amab̤ɛla nɡ̤uaʃɛb̤ɛlɛ ɔz̤ala amaaʃɛb̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤uahiram ɔz̤ala amaahiram nɡ̤uʃɛfufam ɔz̤ala amaʃɛfufam nɡ̤uhufam ɔz̤ala amahufam ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛla nɡ̤uard̤i nɔnahaman nɡ̤uard̤i ɔz̤ala amaard̤i nɡ̤unahaman ɔz̤ala amanahaman nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ aɓaɓalwajɔ kuɓɔ nɡ̤amaʃumi amanɛ anamaɬanu anamakʰulu matʰand̤atʰu nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakad̤an nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ nɡ̤uʃuham ɔz̤ala amaʃuham jijɔ lɛjɔ imiz̤alwanɛ jakwad̤an nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ jɔnkɛ imiz̤alwanɛ jamaʃuham nɡ̤ɔkwaɓaɓalwajɔ kuɓɔ nɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmatʰand̤atʰu anamanɛ anamakʰulu manɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaaʃɛrɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ nɡ̤uimna ɔz̤aa amaimna nɡ̤uiʃwi ɔz̤ala amaiʃwi nɡ̤ub̤ɛrija ɔz̤ala amab̤ɛrija kɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛrija nɡ̤uhɛb̤ɛrɛ ɔz̤ala amahɛb̤ɛrɛ nɡ̤umalɛkijɛli ɔz̤aa amamalɛkijɛli iɡ̤ama lɛntɔmɓi kaaʃɛrɛ nɡ̤usara jijɔ lɛjɔ imiz̤alwanɛ jɔɔɲana ɓakaaʃɛrɛ nɡ̤ɔkwaɓaɓalwajɔ kuɓɔ nɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmaɬanu anamatʰatʰu anamakʰulu manɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakanafɛtali nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ nɡ̤uɡ̤at͡sɛli ɔz̤ala amaɡ̤at͡sɛli nɡ̤uɡ̤uni ɔz̤ala amaɡ̤uni nɡ̤ujɛt͡sɛrɛ ɔz̤ala amajɛt͡sɛrɛ nɡ̤uʃilɛm ɔz̤ala amaʃilɛm jijɔ lɛjɔ imiz̤alwanɛ jakwanafɛtali nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ aɓaɓaliwɛjɔ kuɓɔ nɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmanɛ anamaɬanu anamakʰulu manɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ aɓaɓalwajɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤amakʰulu ɔmatʰand̤atʰu anawakaɲɛ anamakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamaŋǀi matʰatʰu watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɛsitʰi malaɓɛlwɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤iz̤wɛ iliz̤wɛ liɓɛ laz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛnani lamaɡ̤ama ɛsininz̤i wɔlɛnz̤a lininz̤i lasɔ ɛsiŋǀinanɛ wɔlɛnz̤a liŋǀinanɛ lasɔ ɛsɔ sinikwɛ nɡ̤ɔkwaɓaɓalwajɔ kusɔ kɔd̤wa iliz̤wɛ malaɓiwɛ nɡ̤ɛkǃaʃisɔ ɓaliɮɛ nɡ̤ɔkwamaɡ̤ama ɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɔɔjisɛ laɓiwɛ laz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛkǃaʃisɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛsininz̤i nɛsiŋǀinanɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa aɓaɓalwajɔ kuɓalɛv̤i nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ nɡ̤uɡ̤ɛrʃɔn ɔz̤ala amaɡ̤ɛrʃɔn nɡ̤ukɛhati ɔz̤ala amakɛhati nɡ̤umɛrari ɔz̤ala amamɛrari jijɔ lɛ imiz̤alwanɛ jaɓalɛv̤i nɡ̤umz̤alwanɛ wamalib̤ɛni nɡ̤umz̤alwanɛ wamahɛɓrɔn nɡ̤umz̤alwanɛ wamamahɛli nɡ̤umz̤alwanɛ wamamuʃi nɡ̤umz̤alwanɛ wamakɔra ukɛhati waz̤ala uamram iɡ̤ama lɔmkaamram nɡ̤ujɔkɛb̤ɛd̤ɛ intɔmɓi kalɛv̤i ɛjaz̤alɛlwa ulɛv̤i ɛjiputa jamz̤alɛla uamram ɔɔarɔn nɔmɔsɛs nɔmirijam ud̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ uarɔn waz̤alɛlwa unad̤ab̤i nɔab̤ihu nɔɛlaz̤arɛ nɔitamarɛ ɓafa ɔɔnad̤ab̤i nɔab̤ihu ɛkusɔnd̤ɛz̤ɛni kwaɓɔ umlilɔ ɔnɡ̤ɛsɛsikwɛni pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a aɓaɓalwajɔ kuɓɔ ɓaɓa nɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmaɓini anamatʰatʰu jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛjind̤ɔd̤a ɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɔɲanɡ̤aɲɛ ɓɛɲusa kuɓa ɓɛɓɛnɡ̤aɓalwanɡ̤a pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛɓɛnɡ̤ɛnalifa pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɓaɓalwajɔ nɡ̤umɔsɛs nɔɛlaz̤arɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓaɓɛɓaɓala ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛz̤iŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsini z̤akwamɔwab̤i nɡ̤asɛjɔrd̤an malunɡ̤a nɛjɛrikɔ kɛ kwaɓɔ kuɓɛ kunɡ̤asɛkʰɔ waɓaɓɛɓalwɛ nɡ̤ɔɔmɔsɛs nɔarɔn umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓaɓaɓalajɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jɛsinaji nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɓɛtʰɛ kuɓɔ maɓafɛlɛ ɓɔna ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ kaɲɛ akwasala namɲɛ kɛ kuɓɔ inɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ukalɛb̤i uɲana kajɛfunɛ nɔjɔʃuwa uɲana kanun z̤asɔnd̤ɛla iintɔmɓi z̤ikat͡sɛlɔfɛhad̤i uɲana kahɛfɛrɛ uɲana kaɡ̤ilijad̤i uɲana kamakirɛ uɲana kamanasɛ z̤ɔmz̤alwanɛ kamanasɛ uɲana kajɔsɛfu nɡ̤awɔ kɛ amaɡ̤ama ɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤ɔ umala nɔnɔha nɔhɔɡ̤ɛla nɔmilka nɔtirt͡sa z̤ɛma pʰamɓi kɔmɔsɛs napʰamɓi kɔɛlaz̤arɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli napʰamɓi kwɛz̤ikʰulu z̤ɛɓanɮa lɔnkɛ ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛntɛntɛ jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana z̤atʰi uɓawɔ wafɛla ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jɛna wajɛnɡ̤ɛkʰɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛɓanɮa laɓaɬanɡ̤anajɔ nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a ɛɓanɮɛni likakɔra nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɛsakʰɛ isɔnɔ ɛnɡ̤aɓanɡ̤a naɲana jini kɛ ukuɓa iɡ̤ama likaɓawɔ likǀiɲwɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jakʰɛ kuɓa ɛnɡ̤ɛnaɲana sinikɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓaz̤alwana ɓakaɓawɔ umɔsɛs wasiɓɛka isimanɡ̤alɔ saz̤ɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs watʰi iintɔmɓi z̤ikat͡sɛlɔfɛhad̤i z̤ilunɡ̤isilɛ ukutʰɛtʰa wɔz̤inika pʰakatʰi kwaɓaz̤alwana ɓakajisɛ ulihamɓisɛlɛ kuz̤ɔ likajisɛ utʰɛtʰɛ kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli utʰi kǁa itʰɛ jafa ind̤ɔd̤a inɡ̤ɛnaɲana nɔlihamɓisɛla lajɔ kwintɔmɓi jajɔ kɛ ukuɓa itʰɛ ajaɓa nantɔmɓi nɔlinika aɓaz̤alwana ɓajɔ lajɔ ukuɓa itʰɛ ajaɓa naɓaz̤alwana nɔlinika aɓaz̤alwana ɓakajisɛ lajɔ ukuɓa ujisɛ utʰɛ akaɓa naɓaz̤alwana lajɔ nɔlinika umz̤alwana wajɔ ɔkufupʰi kujɔ ɛmiz̤alwanɛni jajɔ aliɮɛ wɔɓa nɡ̤ummisɛlɔ kɛ wɔkuɡ̤wɛɓa lɔwɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wamwisɛlajɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ umɔsɛs watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ɲuka ujɛ kulɛ ntaɓa jɛab̤arim ulikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ iliz̤wɛ ɛnd̤ilinikɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ulikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ uɬanɡ̤anisɛlwɛ kwaɓakɔwɛnu nawɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa waɬanɡ̤anisɛlwajɔ kuɓɔ uarɔn umkʰuluwa wakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa nawupʰikisajɔ umlɔmɔ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jɛt͡sin ɛmɓamɓanwɛni jɛɓanɮa ɛnd̤awɛni jɔkund̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisa ɛmanz̤ini ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ lawɔ nɡ̤amanz̤i ɛmɓamɓanɔ asɛkad̤ɛʃɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jɛt͡sin watʰɛtʰa umɔsɛs kujɛhɔv̤a ɛsitʰi ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔmɔja ɓɛɲama jɔnkɛ makamisɛ ind̤ɔd̤a jɔkuv̤ɛlɛla iɓanɮa ɛja kupʰuma pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ inɡ̤ɛnɛ pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ iɓakʰupʰɛ iɓanɡ̤ɛnisɛ linɡ̤aɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤imv̤u ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnamalusi iɓanɮa likajɛhɔv̤a watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs z̤itʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ujɔʃuwa uɲana kanun ind̤ɔd̤a ɔkujɔ umɔja
