wɛna kuɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓakʰɛ watʰi nɡ̤ɔlɛv̤i iitumim z̤akʰɔ nɛɛurim z̤akʰɔ z̤ɛz̤ɔmntu wakʰɔ wɛŋǀɛɓa ɔwamlinɡ̤ajɔ ɛmasa waɓamɓana najɛ ɛmanz̤ini asɛmɛrib̤a lɔwɔ utʰi kujisɛ and̤ikuɓɔni akatʰɛni naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ akaɓaz̤i nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ intɛtʰɔ jakʰɔ waɓamɓa umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wakʰɔ ɓaja kumjala ujakɔɓi nɡ̤amasikɔ akʰɔ ɓamjalɛ usirajɛli nɡ̤ɔmjalɛlɔ wakʰɔ ɓaɓɛkɛ isikǃʰumisɔ ɛz̤impumlwɛni z̤akʰɔ namad̤ini apʰɛlɛlɛjɔ ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni sakʰɔ sikɛlɛla jɛhɔv̤a amanɮa akʰɛ ukʰɔlɛkɛ kuwɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ ɓapʰaluswɛ ɛmaŋǃɛni aɓav̤ukɛlana najɛ naɓamtʰijilɛjɔ ɓanɡ̤aɓi nakuv̤uka nɡ̤ɔb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin watʰi intand̤a kajɛhɔv̤a ija kuɬala kujɛ ikʰɔlɔsilɛ ujikʰusɛlɛ jɔnkɛ iɬala pʰakatʰi kwamaɡ̤ǁ̤a akʰɛ nɡ̤ɔjɔsɛfu watʰi malisikɛlɛlwɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a iliz̤wɛ lakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋǀɔɲwajɔ z̤ɛz̤ulu nɡ̤ɔmɓɛtʰɛ nanɡ̤amanz̤i ɛnz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓila ɛlɛlɛ ɛz̤ant͡si nanɡ̤ɛz̤iŋǀɔɲwajɔ ɛz̤iv̤ɛliswa lilanɡ̤a nanɡ̤ɛz̤iŋǀɔɲwajɔ ɛz̤iɬuɲiswa z̤iiɲanɡ̤a nanɡ̤ɛɛŋǀɔpʰɔ z̤ɛɛntaɓa z̤amand̤ulɔ nanɡ̤ɛz̤iŋǀɔɲwajɔ z̤ɛɛnd̤uli ɛz̤inɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ nanɡ̤ɛz̤iŋǀɔɲwajɔ z̤ɔm̤laɓa nɛnz̤alisɛkɔ jawɔ nɛkʰɔlɔ lɔwaɬala ɛtʰʲɔlwɛni malifikɛ ɛntlɔkwɛni kajɔsɛfu nasɛlukakajini lwalɔwɔ uɓalulɛkilɛjɔ kuɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ɛjamaz̤iɓulɔ inkunz̤i jakʰɛ haji uɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa ɓajɔ z̤iimpɔnd̤ɔ z̤ɛŋǃu iimpɔnd̤ɔ z̤ajɔ nɡ̤az̤ɔ iɬaɓa iz̤iz̤wɛ nɡ̤akǁaɲɛ iz̤ipʰɛlɔ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤amawaka aliʃumi akwaɛfrajim kɛ lawɔ nɡ̤amawaka akwamanasɛ kɛ lawɔ nɡ̤ɔz̤ɛb̤ulɔn watʰi v̤uja z̤ɛb̤ulɔn nɡ̤ɔkupʰuma kwakʰɔ v̤uja isakarɛ nɡ̤ɛɛntɛntɛ z̤akʰɔ ɓaja kumɛma iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤iz̤ɛ ɛntaɓɛni ɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ kʰɔna imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔɓulunɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛsaɲa uɓutʲɛɓi ɓɛɛlwanɮɛ nɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤isɛlɛlwɛ ɛntlaɓatʰini nɡ̤ɔɡ̤ad̤i watʰi makaɓɔnɡ̤wɛ ɔwand̤isa uɡ̤ad̤i uɓutʰuma nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲamakaz̤i aɮav̤ulɛ umkʰɔnɔ ɛwɛ nɔkakaji waz̤iɓɔnɛla isaɬulɔ ɛsijiŋ̤ǃ̤alɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛsiɓɛkwɛ kʰɔna isaɓɛlɔ sɔmmisimtʰɛtʰɔ wɛz̤a kwiintlɔkɔ z̤aɓantu wɛnz̤a uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓukajɛhɔv̤a namasikɔ akʰɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ namasirajɛli watʰi nɡ̤ɔd̤an ud̤an litʰɔlɛ lɛnɡ̤ɔɲama usuka umt͡si ɛb̤aʃan nɡ̤ɔnafɛtali watʰi nafɛtali ukʰɔlisiwɛjɔ kaɲɛ uz̤ɛlɛjɔ jint͡sikɛlɛlɔ kajɛhɔv̤a wɔluɬutʰa ulwanɮɛ nɔmz̤ant͡si nɡ̤ɔaʃɛrɛ watʰi usikɛlɛlwɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔɔɲana uaʃɛrɛ makaɓɛ likʰɔlɔ pʰakatʰi kwaɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ atʰi ŋ̰ǁ̰u uɲawɔ lwakʰɛ ɛɔlini imiv̤alɔ jakʰɔ jɔɓa sisiɲitʰi nɔb̤ɛd̤u kuɓɛ nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛɛmini z̤akʰɔ ukɔnwaɓa kwakʰɔ akukʰɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ jɛʃurun ulɔkʰwɛla ɛmaz̤ulwini ɛluŋǀɛd̤ɔ lwakʰɔ ulɔkʰwɛla ɛsib̤akab̤akɛni ɛnɔɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa ɓakʰɛ likʰaja utʰikǁɔ wamand̤ulɔ nɡ̤apʰant͡si z̤iinɡ̤alɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ uɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa ut͡ʃaɓa ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɔ utʰi t͡ʃaɓalalisa usirajɛli uɬala ɛkʰɔlɔsilɛ uwɔd̤wa umtʰɔmɓɔ kajakɔɓi usinɡ̤a ɛz̤wɛni lɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛwajini ɛnt͡ʃa inɛnɛ iz̤ulu lalɔ likǃʰɔkǃʰɔz̤a umɓɛtʰɛ unɔjɔlɔ sirajɛli nɡ̤uɓani ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɛ ɓantu ɓasind̤iswɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ikʰaka lɔŋǀɛd̤ɔ lwakʰɔ ik͡xɛlɛ lɔɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa ɓakʰɔ z̤ija kuwɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ uɲatʰɛlɛ kɛ wɛna ɛmimanɡ̤wɛni jaz̤ɔ wɛɲuka kɛ umɔsɛs ɛsuka ɛz̤i ŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsini z̤akwamɔwab̤i waja ɛntaɓɛni jɛnɛb̤ɔ ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛpisɡ̤a ɛkʰanɡ̤ɛlɛnɛ nɛjɛrikɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wamɓɔnisa lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i kwad̤an nɛlakwanafɛtali lɔnkɛ nɛliz̤wɛ lakwaɛfrajim nɔmanasɛ nɛliz̤wɛ lɔnkɛ lakwajud̤a ɛlwanɮɛ lwasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a nɛlasɛz̤ant͡si nɔmmanɮa wɛsiɬamɓɔ sɛjɛrikɔ umz̤i wamasund̤u ɛt͡sɔharɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɛ lilɔ ɛli iliz̤wɛ ɛnd̤afunɡ̤a nɡ̤alɔ kɔɔaɓraham nɔisakɛ nɔjakɔɓi nd̤isitʰi nd̤ija imɓɛwu jakʰɔ nd̤ikukʰanɡ̤ɛlisilɛ nɡ̤amɛɬɔ kɛ akuji kuwɛla ujɛ kulɔ wafɛla kʰɔna umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a ɛz̤wɛni lakwamɔwab̤i nɡ̤ɔkɔmlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a wamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla ɛmfulɛni ɛz̤wɛni lakwamɔwab̤i malunɡ̤ana nɛb̤ɛtɛpɛhɔrɛ akukʰɔ ɓani ulaz̤ijɔ iŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa lakʰɛ unanam̤la umɔsɛs ɛɓɛmiɲaka ilikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɓini ɛz̤ɛlwɛ linɡ̤ɛnaluxatʲaz̤ɔ ilisɔ lakʰɛ ɛsɔmɛlɛlɛ nɔkɔmɛlɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓamlilɛla umɔsɛs ɛz̤iŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsini z̤akwamɔwab̤i ɛmaʃumi matʰatʰu japʰɛla kɛ imiɬa jɔkumlilɛla nɔkumɛnz̤ɛla isid͡ʒ̤wili umɔsɛs waz̤a ujɔʃuwa uɲana kanun waz̤ala nɡ̤umɔja wɔɓulumkɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umɔsɛs wajɛkǀinɛz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ umɔsɛs wamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ akuɓanɡ̤a sav̤ɛla kwasirajɛli mprɔfɛti und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɔsɛs awatʰi ujɛhɔv̤a wamaz̤i ɓakʰanɡ̤ɛlana ɛɓuswɛni nɡ̤ɛmikǃɔnd̤isɔ jɔnkɛ nɛz̤imanɡ̤a awamtʰumajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa az̤ɛnz̤ɛ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa kufarɔ nakuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ nakwiliz̤wɛ lakʰɛ lɔnkɛ nanɡ̤asɔ sɔnkɛ isanɮa ɛsitʰɛ ŋ̰ǃ̰i nanɡ̤ɔkɔjikɛka kɔnkɛ ɔkukʰulu awakwɛnz̤ajɔ umɔsɛs ɛmɛɬwɛni amasirajɛli ɔnkɛ kwatʰi ɛmv̤a kɔkufa kukamɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kujɔʃuwa uɲana kanun umlunɡ̤isɛlɛli kamɔsɛs watʰi umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i ufilɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ ujiwɛlɛ ijɔrd̤an lɛ wɛna naɓa ɓantu ɓɔnkɛ nijɛ kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ nd̤iɓanika lɔna ɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli iind̤awɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ija kuɲatʰɛlwa jintɛnd̤ɛ jɔɲawɔ lwɛnu nd̤ininikilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤atʰɛtʰajɔ kumɔsɛs kutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nakwilɛb̤anɔn lɛ kusɛ ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔmkʰulu ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔnɡ̤umɛfrati lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lamahɛti kusɛ ɛlwanɮɛ ɔlukʰulu nɡ̤asɛkut͡ʃɔnɛni kwɛlanɡ̤a wɔɓa nɡ̤umd̤a wɛnu akuji pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɔkuɮa kwakʰɔ uɓɔmi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤and̤inɔmɔsɛs nd̤ɔɓa nawɛ and̤iji kukujɛkɛla and̤iji kukuʃija jɔmɛlɛla ukʰalipʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛna uja kulaɓɛla ɓɔna aɓa ɓantu ɛlɔ liz̤wɛ nd̤aɓafunɡ̤ɛla lɔna ɔjisɛ ukuɓa nd̤ija kuɓanika kɔd̤wa kɛ jɔmɛlɛla ukʰalipʰɛ kunɛnɛ ukuz̤ɛ uɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ ukwɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔmjalɛlɔ wɔnkɛ awakuwisɛla wɔna umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i musa ukutʲɛkɛla ɛkunɛnɛ nasɛkʰɔɬɔ kuwɔ ukuz̤ɛ wɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ apʰɔ sukuɓa usija kʰɔna iz̤ɛ inɡ̤ɛsuki iŋǀwad̤i jalɔ mjalɛlɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɔ uz̤ɛ ukǀinɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ajɔ nɔɓusuku ukuz̤ɛ uɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ ukwɛnz̤ɛ kɔnkɛ ɔkub̤aliwɛjɔ kujɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɔɓa nɔkupʰumɛlɛla nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jakʰɔ ɔkɔ ukwɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ ɔkɔ jaɓɔna nd̤ikuwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkuɓa wɔmɛlɛlɛ ukʰalipʰɛ musa ukunkwantʲa unɡ̤akǃʰipʰuki umɓilini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ unawɛ apʰɔ sukuɓa usija kʰɔna waz̤a ujɔʃuwa waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ aɓab̤ali ɓaɓantu watʰi kǀand̤ani pʰakatʰi kwɛmiŋǃuɓa niɓawisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ aɓantu nitʰi z̤ilunɡ̤isɛlɛni umpʰakɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kusɛlɛ imiɬa ɛmitʰatʰu ukuz̤ɛ nijiwɛlɛ ijɔrd̤an lɛ ninɡ̤ɛnɛ niliɬutʰɛ iliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ aninikajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu ukuɓa limiwɛ nakumarub̤ɛn nakumaɡ̤ad̤i nakwisikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsiz̤wɛ sakwamanasɛ watʰi ujɔʃuwa likʰumɓulɛni iliz̤wi awaniwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤alɔ umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a ɛsitʰi ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu unipʰumz̤ilɛ ɛli liz̤wɛ aɓafaz̤i ɓɛnu naɓantwana ɓɛnu nɛmfujɔ jɛnu jɔɬala kwɛli liz̤wɛ lɔna umɔsɛs nɡ̤anɛnɔ kwɛjɔrd̤an niwɛlɛ kɛ nikǁʰɔɓilɛ pʰamɓi kwaɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu nɔnkɛ maɡ̤ɔxa anɔɓuk͡xɔti niɓaŋǀɛd̤ɛ ad̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a aɓapʰumz̤ɛ aɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ani ɓaliɬutʰɛ naɓɔ ɛlɔ liz̤wɛ aɓanikajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu niɓujɛlɛ kɛ ɛz̤wɛni ɛniliɬutʰilɛjɔ nimɛ kulɔ ɛlɔ waninikajɔ umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤anɛnɔ kwɛjɔrd̤an nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɓampʰɛnd̤ula kɛ ujɔʃuwa ɓɛsitʰi iz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɔsiwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤az̤ɔ sɔz̤ɛnz̤a nalapʰɔ sukuɓa usitʰumɛ kʰɔna sɔja nɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ ɛsampʰulapʰula nɡ̤akɔ umɔsɛs sija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukukupʰulapʰula nawɛ kɔd̤wa kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ unɡ̤a anɡ̤aɓa nawɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa wajɛnɔmɔsɛs ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓapʰikisa umlɔmɔ wakʰɔ ɓanɡ̤awapʰulapʰuli amaz̤wi akʰɔ ɛntwɛni jɔnkɛ ɔsiwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ajɔ maɓaɓulawɛ kɔd̤wa kɛ jɔmɛlɛla ukʰalipʰɛ wɛna jɔʃuwa uɲana kanun wɛsusa amad̤ɔd̤a amaɓini az̤iintlɔla ɛsitʰi nɡ̤asɛsɛ hamɓani nijɛ kulikʰanɡ̤ɛla iliz̤wɛ nɛjɛrikɔ ahamɓa kɛ aja ɛnɮwini jɛnkaz̤ana ɛlihɛɲukaz̤i ɛɡ̤ama linɡ̤urahab̤i kʰɔna kwatʰiwa wasɛjɛrikɔ jaɓɔna kufikɛ apʰa ɛɓusukund͡ʒ̤ɛ amad̤ɔd̤a av̤ɛla kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛz̤ɛ kuɬɔla ɛli liz̤wɛ watʰumɛla wasɛjɛrikɔ kurahab̤i ɛsitʰi wakʰupʰɛ amad̤ɔd̤a afikilɛjɔ kuwɛ anɡ̤ɛnilɛjɔ ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ kuɓa az̤ɛ kuliɬɔla lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ jawatʰaɓatʰa lɔɔ nkaz̤ana lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a ɔmaɓini jawafiɬa jatʰi ɔkunɛnɛ afikilɛ amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ and̤az̤i ukuɓa av̤ɛla nɡ̤apʰi kwatʰi ukuv̤alwa kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ kwakuɓa mɲama amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ apʰuma and̤az̤i ukuɓa ajɛ nɡ̤apʰi amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ wasukɛlɛni kamsiɲa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɔwafumana kɛ jɔna jajiwaɲusɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛnɮu jawakǃʰuʃɛka ɛz̤ind̤iz̤ɛni z̤ɛflakisi ɛjaɓɛ iz̤ikǀwaŋ̤ǀ̤isɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛnɮu amad̤ɔd̤a awasukɛla nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jasɛjɔrd̤an ɛja ɛmaz̤iɓukwɛni lav̤alwa isanɡ̤ɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa ɓɛpʰumilɛ aɓɔ ɓasukɛlajɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛkalali amad̤ɔd̤a jɛɲuka jɔna jaja kuwɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛnɮu jatʰi kulɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uninikilɛ ɛli liz̤wɛ nɔkuɓa siwɛlwɛ lukǃʰipʰukɔmɓilini nɡ̤ani nɔkuɓa ɓatʰɛ amanɮa ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmi ɓɛli liz̤wɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓɛnu kuɓa siv̤ilɛ ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a wawɔmisa amanz̤i ɔlwanɮɛ ɔluɓɔmv̤u pʰamɓi kwɛnu ɛkupʰumɛni kwɛnu pʰamɓi kwɛnu ɛkupʰumɛni kwɛnu ɛjiputa nɔkɔ nakwɛnz̤ajɔ kɔɔkumkani ɓɔɓaɓini ɓamaamɔri aɓaɓɛpʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an ɔsihɔn nɔɔɡ̤i ɛnaɓasinɡ̤ɛla pʰant͡si siv̤ilɛ kɛ z̤aɲiɓilika iintliz̤ijɔ z̤ɛtʰu akwaɓa saɓakʰɔ kukǃina kwamkǁʰɛlɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nɡ̤ujɛ utʰikǁɔ ɛmaz̤ulwini pʰɛz̤ulu nasɛɬaɓatʰini pʰant͡si apʰa kalɔku kʰanind̤ifunɡ̤ɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nitʰi kuɓa nd̤inɛnz̤ɛlɛ iŋǀɛɓa nijɛnz̤ɛlɛ iŋǀɛɓa inɮu kaɓawɔ nind̤inikɛ umkǃɔnd̤isɔ wɛɲanisɔ nimsind̤isɛ uɓawɔ nɔma naɓanakwɛtʰu nɔɔd̤ad̤ɛ ɓɛtʰu nɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ aɓanaz̤ɔ nijiɬanɡ̤ulɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ jɛtʰu ɛkufɛni atʰi kujɔ amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wɛtʰu wɔfa ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɔwɛnu ukuɓa anijikǁɛlanɡ̤a lɛ ntɔ jɛtʰu kɔtʰi ɛkunikwɛni kwɛtʰu ɛli liz̤wɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a sikwɛnz̤ɛlɛ iŋǀɛɓa nɛɲanisɔ jawaɬisa kɛ nɡ̤ɛnt͡sɔntɛlɔ nɡ̤ɛfɛstilɛ kuɓa inɮu jajɔ jaɓɛ isɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni lɔmz̤i jajiɬɛli ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni jatʰi kuwɔ jijani ɛntaɓɛni ɬɛz̤ɛ ɓakǃuɓisanɛ aɓɔ ɓanisukɛlajɔ z̤imɛlani kʰɔna iint͡suku z̤iɓɛ ntatʰu ɓad̤ɛ ɓaɓujɛ aɓɔ ɓanisukɛlajɔ nand̤ulɛ kɛ ukuhamɓa inɮɛla jɛnu atʰi kujɔ amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ sɔɓa kwɛsi sifunɡ̤ɔ sakʰɔ usifunɡ̤isɛ sɔna ujaɓɔna kwɛli liz̤wɛ wɔɓɔpʰa int͡sɔntɛlɔ jɔsinɡ̤a ɔlu luɓɔmv̤u ɛfɛstilɛni lɛ usiɬisɛ nɡ̤ajɔ uɬanɡ̤anisɛlɛ kuwɛ ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ ujiɬɔ nɔɲɔkɔ naɓanakwɛnu nɛnɮu jɔnkɛ kajiɬɔ kɔtʰi ɓɔnkɛ aɓasukuɓa ɓɛpʰuma ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ ɓɛsija pʰanɮɛ iɡ̤az̤i laɓɔ liɓɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛntlɔkɔ jaɓɔ siɓɛ tʰina kɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓasukuɓa ɓɛkuwɛ ɛnɮwini iɡ̤az̤i laɓɔ lɔɓa pʰɛz̤u kwɛntlɔkɔ jɛtʰu ukuɓa kutʰɛ sanɮa kuɓɔ ukuɓa kɛ utʰɛ wajikǁɛla lɛ ntɔ jɛtʰu sɔɓa ɛsifunɡ̤wɛni sakʰɔ ɔsifunɡ̤isɛ sɔna jatʰi kɛ makuɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amaz̤wi ɛnu kuɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤alɔ jawand̤ulula ahamɓa kɛ jajiɓɔpʰa int͡sɔntɛlɔ ɛɓɔmv̤u ɛfɛstilɛni ahamɓa kɛ aja ɛntaɓɛni aɬala kʰɔna iint͡suku z̤antatʰu ɓad̤a ɓaɓuja aɓɔ ɓawasukɛlajɔ ɓafuna aɓɔ ɓawasukɛlajɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni jɔnkɛ aɓawafumana aɓuja amad̤ɔd̤a ɔmaɓini ɛɬa ɛntaɓɛni awɛla kujɔʃuwa uɲana kanun amɓikɛla z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ afumɛnɛnɛ naz̤ɔ atʰi kujɔʃuwa ujɛhɔv̤a ulinikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɛtʰu lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɓatʰɛ amanɮa ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmi ɓɛliz̤wɛ pʰamɓi kwɛtʰu wav̤uka ujɔʃuwa nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ ɓand̤uluka ɛʃitim ɓafika ɛjɔrd̤an jɛna nɔɔɲana ɓɔnkɛ ɓamasirajɛli ɓalalisa kʰɔna ɓɛnɡ̤ɛkawɛli kwatʰi ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɬa ɛmitʰatʰu ɓakǀand̤a aɓab̤ali pʰakatʰi kwɛmiŋǃuɓa ɓaɓawisɛla aɓantu umtʰɛtʰɔ ɓɛsitʰi kǁa nitʰɛ najiɓɔna itʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓanɡ̤aɓalɛv̤i ɓɛjitʰwɛlɛ nɔnd̤uluka ɛnd̤awɛni jɛnu nijiland̤ɛlɛ kɔd̤wa makuɓɛkʰɔ itʰuɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛnu najɔ ɛlinɡ̤atʰi nɡ̤ɔkulinɡ̤anisa liɓɛ nɡ̤amawaka amaɓini ɛɛkub̤itɛ iz̤ɛ ninɡ̤asɔnd̤ɛli kujɔ ukuz̤ɛ nijaz̤i inɮɛla ɛnɔhamɓa nɡ̤ajɔ kuɓa anihamɓanɡ̤a nɡ̤alɛ nɮɛla nɡ̤apʰamɓili watʰi ujɔʃuwa ɛɓantwini z̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uja kwɛnz̤a imisɛɓɛnz̤i ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛnu watʰi ujɔʃuwa kuɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli tʰwalani itʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ niwɛlɛ pʰamɓi kwaɓantu ɓajitʰwala kɛ itʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɓahamɓa pʰamɓi kwaɓantu watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɔʃuwa nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤ija kukǃala ukukwɛnz̤a mkʰulu imiɬwɛni amasirajɛli ɔnkɛ ukuz̤ɛ az̤i ukuɓa nd̤ija kuɓa nawɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iɓɛ nd̤inɔmɔsɛs uz̤ɛ uɓawisɛlɛ wɛna umtʰɛtʰɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓatʰwɛlɛ itʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ utʰi kǁa nitʰɛ ɛluŋǁwɛmɛni lwamanz̤i asɛjɔrd̤an z̤ɛnimɛ ɛjɔrd̤an watʰi ujɔʃuwa kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli sɔnd̤ɛlani apʰa niv̤ɛ amaz̤wi kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu watʰi kɛ ujɔʃuwa nija kwaz̤i nɡ̤alɛ ntɔ ukuɓa utʰikǁɔ ɔpʰililɛjɔ upʰakatʰi kwɛnu ɛja kuwaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤a kupʰɛlɛ pʰamɓi kwɛnu amakanan namahɛti namahiv̤i namapɛriz̤i namaɡ̤irɡ̤aʃi namaamɔri namajɛb̤usi nant͡sɔ itʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɛnkɔsi jɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ inɡ̤ɛna pʰamɓi kwɛnu ɛjɔrd̤an z̤itʰaɓatʰɛlɛni nɡ̤ɔkɔ amad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛ liʃumi ɛlinamaɓini kuz̤ɔ iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤akwasirajɛli ind̤ɔd̤a iɓɛ ɲɛ ind̤ɔd̤a iɓɛ ɲɛ ɛsiz̤wɛni kɔtʰi kɛ kǁa z̤itʰɛ z̤amisa ɛmanz̤ini asɛjɔrd̤an iintɛnd̤ɛ z̤ɛɛɲawɔ z̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓatʰwɛlɛ itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a inkɔsi jɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ asukɛ amanz̤i asɛjɔrd̤an aŋǃamkɛ amanz̤i av̤ɛla nɡ̤asintla ɛmɛ aɓɛ mfumɓaɲɛ kwatʰi kɛ ɛkund̤ulukɛni kwaɓantu ɛz̤intɛntɛni z̤aɓɔ ukuɓa ɓawɛlɛ ijɔrd̤an naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛtʰwɛlɛ itʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ pʰamɓi kwaɓantu kǁa ɓafikajɔ ɛjɔrd̤an aɓatʰwɛlɛ itʲɛja kǁa z̤itʰi kǁumɓu ɛluŋǁwɛmɛni lwamanz̤i iiɲawɔ z̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓatʰwɛlɛ itʲɛja ijɔrd̤an iz̤ala ihamɓa nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛɛnd̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤ajɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔnkɛ lɔkuv̤una ɛma amanz̤i av̤ɛla nɡ̤asɛntla apʰakama aɓa mfumɓaɲɛ kud̤ɛ kakʰulu ɛad̤am umz̤i ɔnɡ̤asɛkǀalɛni lɛt͡sarɛtan atʰi aɬajɔ aja ɛlwanɮɛ lwɛarab̤a ɛlwanɮɛ lwɛtʲuwa aŋǃamka apʰɛla ɓawɛla kɛ aɓantu malunɡ̤a nɛjɛrikɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓatʰwɛlɛ itʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɓɛma ɓɛɛ b̤ukǁɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni ɔwɔmilɛjɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛjɔrd̤an awɛla ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli kɔwɔmilɛjɔ lwad̤a lwaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla lɔnkɛ uɬanɡ̤a ukuwɛla ijɔrd̤an kwatʰi kɛ kǁa lwaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlajɔ uɬanɡ̤a lɔnkɛ ukujiwɛla ijɔrd̤an watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kujɔʃuwa ɛsitʰi z̤itʰaɓatʰɛlɛni ɛɓantwini amad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛ liʃumi ɛlinamaɓini ind̤ɔd̤a iɓɛ ɲɛ ind̤ɔd̤a iɓɛ ɲɛ ɛsiz̤wɛni niwawisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nitʰi tʰaɓatʰani apʰa pʰakatʰi kwɛjɔrd̤an kulɛ nd̤awɔ z̤imi kujɔ iiɲawɔ z̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli amatʲɛ ɔkumiswa aɓɛ liʃumi ɛlinamaɓini niwɛlɛ nawɔ niwaɓɛlɛ kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ jɔkulalisa nija kujɔ nɡ̤ɔɓu ɓusuku wawaɓiz̤a kɛ ujɔʃuwa amad̤id̤a aliʃumi ɛlinamaɓini aɓɛwamisilɛ kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ind̤ɔd̤a jaɲɛ ind̤ɔd̤a jaɲɛ ɛsiz̤wɛni watʰi ujɔʃuwa kuwɔ ɡ̤ǃ̤itʰani pʰamɓi kwɛtʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nijɛ ɛjɔrd̤an pʰakatʰi nitʰaɓatʰɛ ijilɛjɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ilitʲɛ liɓɛ liɲɛ iliɓɛkɛ ɛɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓɛni lajɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnani lɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ukuz̤ɛ ɔku kuɓɛ nɡ̤umkǃɔnd̤isɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛnu kǁa ɓatʰɛ ɓaniɓuz̤a ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛliz̤ajɔ ɓɛsitʰi ajintɔni matʲɛ nɔtʰi kuɓɔ amanz̤i ɛjɔrd̤an aŋǃamka pʰamɓi kwɛtʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɛkuwɛlɛni kwajɔ ɛjɔrd̤an aŋǃamka amanz̤i ɛjɔrd̤an matʲɛ ɔɓa sisikʰumɓuz̤ɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɔʃuwa wajɛɓawisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ ɓantaɓatʰa amatʲɛ aliʃumi ɛlinamaɓini ɛjɔrd̤an pʰakatʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ watʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kujɔʃuwa nɡ̤ɔkwɛnani lɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓawɛla nawɔ ɓaja nawɔ kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ ɓalalisa kujɔ ɓawaɓɛka kʰɔna ujɔʃuwa amatʲɛ aliʃumi ɛlinamaɓini ɛjɔrd̤an pʰakatʰi kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ z̤az̤imi kujɔ iiɲawɔ z̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓatʰwɛlɛ itʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ akʰɔna unanam̤la kɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓaɓɛtʰwɛlɛ itʲɛja ɓɛma ɛjɔrd̤an pʰakatʰi ad̤a aɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwa ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi ujɛhɔv̤a awamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ ujɔʃuwa ukuɓa awatʰɛtʰɛ ɛɓantwini nɡ̤ɔkwɛntɔ jɔnkɛ umɔsɛs aɓɛmwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ajɔ ujɔʃuwa ɓakʰawulɛz̤a aɓantu ɓawɛla kwatʰi ɓakuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ukuwɛla jɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli pʰamɓi kwaɓantu ɓawɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn nɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ad̤i nɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsiz̤wɛ sakwamanasɛ ɓɛkǁʰɔɓilɛ pʰamɓi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ watʰɛtʰajɔ umɔsɛs kuɓɔ nɡ̤atʰi ɓaɓɛnɡ̤amaʃumi amanɛ akǁʰɔɓɛlɛ ukupʰuma umkʰɔsi aɓawɛlajɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɓɛsija ɛmfaz̤wɛni ɛz̤iŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsini z̤asɛjɛrikɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ m̤la ujɛhɔv̤a wamɛnz̤a mkʰulu ujɔʃuwa ɛmɛɬwɛni amasirajɛli ɔnkɛ amɔjika nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ aɓɛmɔjika umɔsɛs jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɔɓɔmi ɓakʰɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɔʃuwa ɓawisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓatʰwɛlɛ itʲɛja jɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤inɔ ukuɓa ɓɛɲukɛ ɓapʰumɛ ɛjɔrd̤an ujɔʃuwa waɓawisɛla kɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛsitʰi ɲukani nipʰumɛ ɛjɔrd̤an kwatʰi ɛkuɲukɛni kwaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓatʰwɛlɛ sitʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ kajɛhɔv̤a pʰakatʰi kwɛjɔrd̤an ɛkuŋǀɔtʰukɛni kwɛɛntɛnd̤ɛ z̤ɛɛɲawɔ z̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli z̤afika kɔwɔmilɛjɔ aɓujɛla ɛnd̤awɛni jawɔ amanz̤i asɛjɔrd̤an ahamɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwanɡ̤apʰamɓili nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛɛnd̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤ajɔ z̤ɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓɛɲuka ɓapʰuma ɛjɔrd̤an nɡ̤ɔlwɛʃumi ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni jɔkukǃala ɓamisa ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali nɡ̤ɛkǀala lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɛjɛrikɔ kɛ lɔɔ matʲɛ aliʃumi ɛlinamaɓini aɓawatʰaɓatʰajɔ ɛjɔrd̤an ujɔʃuwa ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali watʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kǁa ɓatʰɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu ɓaɓuz̤a kɔɔjisɛ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛliz̤ajɔ ɓɛsitʰi ajintɔni matʲɛ nɔɓaz̤isa ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu nitʰi amasirajɛli ajiwɛla lɛ jɔrd̤an ɛhamɓa ɛm̤laɓɛni ɔwɔmilɛjɔ kuɓa ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu wɛnz̤a ukuɓa at͡ʃɛ amanz̤i asɛjɔrd̤an pʰamɓi kwɛnu nad̤a nawɛla wakǁɛlisa ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu wakwɛnz̤ajɔ kulwanɮɛ ɔluɓɔmv̤u lɔna wɛnz̤a ukuɓa lut͡ʃɛ pʰamɓi kwɛtʰu sad̤a sawɛla ukuz̤ɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi z̤isaz̤i isanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa sɔmɛlɛlɛ ukuz̤ɛ nimɔjikɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu imiɬa jɔnkɛ kwatʰi kǁɛnikwɛni ɓɛv̤ajɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔkumkani ɓamaamɔri aɓaɓɛpʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a nɔɔkumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɓamakanan aɓaɓɛnɡ̤asɛlwanɮɛ ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a wɛnz̤ɛ ukuɓa at͡ʃɛ amanz̤i ɛjɔrd̤an pʰamɓi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓad̤a ɓawɛla z̤asuka z̤aɲiɓilika iintliz̤ijɔ z̤aɓɔ akwaɓa saɓakʰɔ kukǃina kwamkǁʰɛlɔ kuɓɔ pʰamɓi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi kujɔʃuwa z̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ iint͡ʃɛnɡ̤ɛkǀɛ upʰind̤ɛ ɔkwɛsiɓini ukuɓalusa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli waz̤ɛnz̤ɛla kɛ ujɔʃuwa iint͡ʃɛnɡ̤ɛkǀɛ waɓalusa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛnd̤ulini jɛɲama jɔkwaluswa nasi isiz̤atʰu sɔkuɓa ujɔʃuwa aɓalusɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓaɓɛpʰumɛ ɛjiputa ɓɛnɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a ɔkulwa afɛla ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni ɛkupʰumɛni kwawɔ ɛjiputa kuɓa ɓajɛ ɓalukilɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓɔ ɓapʰumajɔ kɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓaɓɛz̤alɛlwɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni ɛkupʰumɛni kwaɓɔ ɛjiputa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤alukanɡ̤a kuɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓahamɓa imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi manɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ lwad̤a lwapʰɛla lɔnkɛ uɬanɡ̤a ɔlunɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a ɔkulwa awapʰumajɔ ɛjiputa anɡ̤alipʰulapʰulanɡ̤a iz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a awawafunɡ̤ɛlajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa akaji kuwaɓɔnisa ɛlɔ z̤wɛ walifunɡ̤ɛla ɔɔjisɛ ukuɓa uja iliz̤wɛ ɛliɓalɛka nɔɓusi kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ awaɓav̤ɛlisajɔ ɛsikʰunɮɛni saɓɔ waɓalusa ɓɔna ujɔʃuwa kuɓa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤alukilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓalusanɡ̤a ɛnɮɛlɛni kwatʰi ɓakuɓa ɓɛluɡ̤ǃ̤iɓilɛ lɔnkɛ uɬanɡ̤a ɓaɬala ɛnd̤awɛni jaɓɔ ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni ɓad̤a ɓapʰɔla watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɔʃuwa nam̤la iŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ jɛjiputa nd̤ijikǃɛŋ̤ǃ̤ilɛ jɛsuka kwatʰiwa iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ nd̤awɔ jiɡ̤iliɡ̤ali unanam̤la ɓamisa iintɛntɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali ɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔsuku lwɛʃumi ɛlinɛsinɛ lwɛɲanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa ɛz̤iŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsini z̤asɛjɛrikɔ ɓaɮa iz̤iv̤ɛlisɔ z̤ɛlɔ z̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ lɛpasika iz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ namakʰwɛɓa nɡ̤ɛŋ̰ǃ̰u jajɔ lɔɔ japʰɛla nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ ɛmv̤a kɔkuɮa kwaɓɔ iz̤iv̤ɛlisɔ z̤ɛlɔ z̤wɛ aɓaɓa saɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaɮa unɡ̤ɛnisɛlɔ lwɛlɔ z̤wɛ lakwakanan nɡ̤alɔɔ mɲaka kwatʰi kǁa ɛɓɛsɛjɛrikɔ ujɔʃuwa wawapʰakamisa amɛɬɔ akʰɛ wakʰanɡ̤ɛla waɓɔna ind̤ɔd̤a malunɡ̤a najɛ itʰɛ xutʰu ik͡xɛlɛ lajɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa waja ujɔʃuwa kujɔ watʰi kujɔ unɡ̤akutʰi unɡ̤akwiint͡ʃaɓa z̤ɛtʰu jatʰi haji nd̤inɡ̤umtʰɛtʰɛli wɔmkʰɔsi kajɛhɔv̤a nd̤ifikilɛ nɡ̤ɔku wawa ujɔʃuwa nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni wakǃuɓud̤a watʰi kujɔ itʰɛtʰa ntɔni kɛ inkɔsi jam kumkʰɔnz̤i wajɔ watʰi umtʰɛtʰɛli wɔmkʰɔsi kajɛhɔv̤a kujɔʃuwa kʰulula iimɓad̤ad̤a z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤iɲawɛni z̤akʰɔ kuɓa lɔɔ nd̤awɔ kujɔ iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ujɔʃuwa kɛ ijɛrikɔ iɓiɬɛli iv̤aliwɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli akwaɓakʰɔ upʰumajɔ akwaɓakʰɔ unɡ̤ɛnajɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɔʃuwa kʰanɡ̤ɛla nd̤ijinikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ ijɛrikɔ nɔkumkani wajɔ namaɡ̤ɔxa anɔɓuk͡xɔti nɔwud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a umz̤i nɔnkɛ mad̤ɔd̤a ɔkulwa niwuz̤unɡ̤ulɛz̤ɛ umz̤i isiɬanɮɔ siɓɛ siɲɛ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ imiɬa ɛmitʰand̤atʰu kɛ isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ saɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli sɔpʰatʰa iz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ z̤ɔkuɬaɓa umkʰɔsi pʰamɓi kwɛtʲɛja nɔwud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a umz̤i nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ iz̤iɬanɮɔ z̤iɓɛ sikǁʰɛŋǁɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓakǃupʰɛ ukuv̤utʰɛla nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ kɔtʰi kɛ ɛkɔlulɛni ukuv̤utʰɛla nɡ̤ɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ sɔkuɬaɓa umkʰɔsi ɛkusiv̤ɛni kwɛnu isand̤i sɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɓad̤umɛ nɡ̤ɔkud̤uma ɔkukʰulu ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu luwɛ ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lɔmz̤i lutʰi b̤uma ɓɛɲukɛ kɛ aɓantu ɛlɔwɔ atʰi ŋ̤ǃ̤ɔ malunɡ̤a najɛ ujɔʃuwa uɲana kanun waɓaɓiz̤a aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli watʰi kuɓɔ tʰwalani itʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓapʰatʰɛ iz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ z̤ɔkuɬaɓa umkʰɔsi pʰamɓi kwɛtʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a ɓatʰi ɛɓantwini ɮulani niwud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ɛ umz̤i aɓakǁʰɔɓilɛjɔ ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛlɛ pʰamɓi kwɛtʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a kwatʰi kǁɛnikwɛni ujɔʃuwa aɓɛt͡ʃilɔ ɛɓantwini aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ aɓapʰɛtʰɛ iz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ z̤ɔkuɬaɓa umkʰɔsi pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa ɓakǃupʰa ukuv̤utʰɛla nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ itʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ kajɛhɔv̤a iɓaland̤ɛla aɓakǁʰɔɓilɛjɔ ɓahamɓa pʰamɓi kwaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓakǃupʰajɔ ukuv̤utʰɛla nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ aɓasɛmv̤a ɓɛland̤ɛla itʲɛja kuhand͡ʒ̤wa kukǃut͡ʃwa ukuv̤utʰɛla nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ ujɔʃuwa waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ aɓantu watʰi iz̤ɛ ninɡ̤ad̤umi ninɡ̤aliv̤akalisi iliz̤wi lɛnu kunɡ̤apʰumi ntɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛnu kud̤ɛ kuɓɛ jimini ɛnd̤ɔtʰi d̤umani nid̤umɛ kɛ itʲɛja kɛ kajɛhɔv̤a jawud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a umz̤i jawuz̤unɡ̤ulɛz̤a isiɬanɮɔ sasiɲɛ ɓanɡ̤ɛna ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni ɓalala ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni ujɔʃuwa wav̤uka nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ ɓajitʰwala aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ aɓapʰɛtʰɛ iz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ z̤ɔkuɬaɓa umkʰɔsi pʰamɓi kwɛtʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a ɓamana ɓɛhamɓa ɓɛv̤utʰɛla nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɓɛkǃupʰa naɓakǁʰɔɓilɛjɔ ɓɛhamɓa pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ naɓasɛmv̤a ɓɛland̤ɛla itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a kuhand͡ʒ̤wa kuv̤utʰɛlwa nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ kukǃut͡ʃwa ɓawud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a muz̤i nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsiɓini isiɬanɮɔ sasiɲɛ ɓaɓujɛla ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ imiɬa jamitʰand̤atʰu kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓav̤uka nɡ̤ɛsifinɡ̤ɔ ɓawud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a umz̤i kwanɡ̤ɔlɔ ɬɔɓɔ iz̤iɬanɮɔ z̤asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kunɡ̤alɔɔ jɔd̤wa aɓawud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ajɔ umz̤i iz̤iɬanɮɔ z̤asikǁʰɛŋǁi kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛsiɬanɮɔ sɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ukuv̤utʰɛla nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɓakǃupʰa watʰi kɛ ujɔʃuwa ɛɓantwini d̤umani kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uninikilɛ lɔ mz̤i lɔ mz̤i wɔɓa jintɔ ɛsinɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰant͡si kujɛhɔv̤a wɔna nɛntɔ jɔnkɛ ɛkuwɔ kupʰɛla nɡ̤urahab̤i ihɛɲukaz̤i jɛd̤wa ɔwɔɮa uɓɔmi jɛna nɛntɔ jɔnkɛ ɛkujɛ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa waɓaz̤imɛz̤a aɓatʰuɲwa ɛsaɓatʰumajɔ kɔd̤wa kɛ z̤iɡ̤ǀ̤inɛni ɛntwɛni ɛsinɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰant͡si ɬɛz̤ɛ niz̤isinɡ̤ɛlɛ pʰant͡si nɡ̤ɔkutʰaɓatʰa ɛntwɛni ɛntwɛni ɛsinɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰant͡si niwɛnz̤ɛ umz̤i wakwasirajɛli uɓɛ jintɔ ɛsinɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰant͡si niwuɬisɛlɛ iʃwanɡ̤uʃa kɛ jɔna jɔnkɛ isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛmpaɬa jɔb̤ɛd̤u nɛjɛsiɲitʰi ijiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a jɔnɡ̤ɛna ɛɓuŋǀwanɛni ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɓad̤uma kɛ aɓantu ukuv̤utʰɛla nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɓɛkǃupʰa kwatʰi ɓakusiv̤a aɓantu isand̤i sɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɓad̤uma aɓantu nɡ̤ɔd̤ud̤uma ɔkukʰulu ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lwatʰi b̤uma ɓɛɲuka aɓantu kuwɔ umz̤i ɛlɔwɔ watʰi ŋ̤ǃ̤ɔ ɓawutʰimɓa umz̤i ɓaz̤isinɡ̤ɛla pʰant͡si nɡ̤ɛɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ikulɔɔ mz̤i ɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kwind̤ɔd̤a ɓɛsa kumfaz̤i ɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kwind̤ɔd̤a ɓɛsa kwikǁʰɛɡ̤ɔ ɓɛsa nakwinkɔmɔ nakwimpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nakwiɛsilɛ ujɔʃuwa wajɛsɛlɛtʰɛ kumad̤ɔd̤a amaɓini aɓɛliɬɔlilɛ iliz̤wɛ jijani kwinɮu jɛnkaz̤ana lɛja ilihɛɲukaz̤i nijikʰupʰɛ kʰɔna lɔɔ nkaz̤ana nɛntɔ jɔnkɛ ɛnajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ najifunɡ̤ɛlajɔ aɓɛnɡ̤ɛnilɛ kɛ amad̤ɔd̤ana az̤iintlɔla amkʰupʰa urahab̤i nɔjisɛ nɔnina naɓanakwaɓɔ naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛnaɓɔ nɛmiz̤alwanɛ jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ ɓajikʰupʰa ɓajiɓɛka nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛmiŋǃuɓa jakwasirajɛli ɓawut͡ʃisa umz̤i nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ nɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iluwɔ kɔd̤wa isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛmpaɬa jɔb̤ɛd̤u nɛjɛsiɲitʰi ɓajiɓɛka ɛɓuŋǀwanɛni ɓɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a kɛ urahab̤i ihɛɲukaz̤i nɛnɮu kajisɛ naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛnaɓɔ ujɔʃuwa wamsind̤isa waɬala pʰakatʰi kwamasirajɛli unanam̤la nɡ̤ɔkuɓa waɓaz̤imɛz̤ajɔ aɓatʰuɲwa aɓɛɓatʰumilɛ ujɔʃuwa ukuɓa ɓajiɬɔlɛ ijɛrikɔ wafunɡ̤a ujɔʃuwa nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa ɛsitʰi ukǃalɛkisiwɛ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɔja awakʰɛ lɔ mz̤i ijɛrikɔ lɛ wɔwusɛka nɡ̤ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ akʰɛ az̤imisɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔwamatʰumɓu akʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓa nɔjɔʃuwa ud̤umɔ lwakʰɛ lwaɓa sɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ kɛ kalɔku ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛnz̤a uɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ ɛntwɛni ɛsinɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰant͡si uakan uɲana kakarmi uɲana kaz̤ab̤ɛd̤i uɲana kaz̤ɛra wɛsiz̤wɛ sakwajud̤a watʰaɓatʰa ɛntwɛni ɛsinɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰant͡si wav̤utʰa kɛ umsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a kɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ujɔʃuwa amad̤ɔd̤a ɛjɛrikɔ ukuɓa aja ɛaji ɛnɡ̤asɛb̤ɛtav̤ɛn nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɛb̤ɛtɛli watʰi kuwɔ ɲukani niliɬɔlɛ iliz̤wɛ aɲuka kɛ amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ ajiɬɔla iaji aɓujɛla kujɔʃuwa atʰi kujɛ maɓanɡ̤ɛɲuki ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu makuɲukɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amajɛla amaɓini nɔkuɓa nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a amajɛla amatʰatʰu ajikǀʰitʰɛ iaji musa ukuɓad̤inisa ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu nɡ̤ɔkuɓasa kʰɔna kuɓa aɓaa ɓantu ɓamɓalwa kwɛɲuka kɛ kwaja kʰɔna kuɓantu amad̤ɔd̤a amajɛla amatʰatʰu ɛsuka asaɓa pʰamɓi kwamad̤ɔd̤a asɛaji amad̤ɔd̤a asɛaji aɓulala kuwɔ amad̤ɔd̤a amajɛla kumaʃumi amatʰatʰu anamatʰand̤atʰu awasukɛla pʰamɓi kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ kwɛsa ɛʃɛb̤arim awaɓulala ɛtʰamɓɛkɛni jaɲiɓilika intliz̤ijɔ jaɓantu jaɓa nɡ̤amanz̤i waz̤ik͡xaz̤ula kɛ ujɔʃuwa iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni pʰamɓi kwɛtʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a kwad̤a kwaɬwa jɛna namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwasirajɛli ɓaɡ̤alɛla utʰuli pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntlɔkɔ watʰi ujɔʃuwa awu nkɔsi jɛhɔv̤a jini ukuɓa aɓa ɓantu uɓawɛz̤ɛ ijɔrd̤an usinikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni samaamɔri ukuɓa asib̤ub̤isɛ akwaɓa kaɲɛ ɓɛkukʰɔlɛkilɛ kutʰi ukuɬala pʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an kǀamaɡ̤u nkɔsi jam nd̤ija kutʰini ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa amasirajɛli ɛz̤inikɛlɛ ikʰɔsi iint͡ʃaɓa z̤awɔ aja kuv̤a amakanan naɓɛmi ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛliz̤wɛ asixawulɛ alikǀimɛ iɡ̤ama lɛtʰu ɛɬaɓatʰini wɛnz̤ɛ ntɔni kɛ kwiɡ̤ama lakʰɔ ɛlikʰulu watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɔʃuwa v̤uka uwɛlɛni nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɔnilɛ amasirajɛli ɛwɛ awuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰilɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɛnd̤awawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤awɔ ɛwɛ atʰaɓatʰilɛ ɛntwɛni ɛsinɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰant͡si ɛɓilɛ akʰaɲɛlɛ ɛwɛ ajiɓɛkɛ ɛz̤impaɬɛni z̤awɔ aɓaɓa nakɔ kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli pʰamɓi kwɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ ɓaz̤inikɛla ikʰɔsi iint͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛɓɛjintɔ ɛsinɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰant͡si and̤iji kupʰind̤a nd̤iɓɛ ukuɓa ajitʰanɡ̤ɛ it͡ʃatʲalaliswɛ intɔ ɛsinɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰant͡si pʰakatʰi kwɛnu v̤uka uɓaŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛ aɓantu utʰi z̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛlɛni inɡ̤ɔmsɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi kukʰɔ ntɔ isinɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰant͡si pʰakatʰi kwakʰɔ sirajɛli akunakɔ pʰamɓi kwɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ nid̤ɛ nijisusɛ intɔ ɛsinɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰant͡si pʰakatʰi kwɛnu iz̤ɛ nisind̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɛnu isiz̤wɛ atʰɛ wakǀiʃa sɔna ujɛhɔv̤a sisɔnd̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤inɮu z̤asɔ inɮu atʰɛ wakǀiʃa jɔna ujɛhɔv̤a isɔnd̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkwamad̤ɔd̤a ajɔ itʰi lɛjɔ kukǀiʃwɛ jɔna inɛntɔ ɛsinɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰant͡si it͡ʃiswɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ nɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛnaz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iwuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰilɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ kajɛhɔv̤a nanɡ̤ɔkuɓa jɛnz̤ɛ uɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ kwasirajɛli wav̤uka ujɔʃuwa nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ wawasɔnd̤ɛz̤a amasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤awɔ kwakǀiʃwa isiz̤wɛ sakwajud̤a wajisɔnd̤ɛz̤a imiz̤alwanɛ jakwajud̤a kwakǀiʃwa umz̤alwanɛ wakwaz̤ɛra wawusɔnd̤ɛz̤a umz̤alwanɛ wakwaz̤ɛra nɡ̤ɔkwamad̤ɔd̤a awɔ kwakǀiʃwa uz̤ab̤ɛd̤i wajisɔnd̤ɛz̤a inɮu jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkwamad̤ɔd̤a ajɔ kwakǀiʃwa uakan uɲana kakarmi uɲana kaz̤ab̤ɛd̤i uɲana kaz̤ɛra wɛsiz̤wɛ sakwajud̤a watʰi ujɔʃuwa kuakan ɲana mz̤ukisi ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli umd̤umisɛ kʰawund̤ikǁɛlɛlɛ intɔ ɔjɛnz̤ilɛjɔ ukukʰaɲɛla uakan wampʰɛnd̤ula ujɔʃuwa watʰi ɔkunɛnɛ nd̤ɔnilɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli nd̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤aɓɔna ɛmakǁʰɔɓɛni inɡ̤uɓɔ ɛnkulu ɛntlɛ jasɛʃinarɛ jaɲɛ nɛɛʃɛkɛlɛ z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ z̤aɓa makʰulu maɓini nɛsiŋǃumka sɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ sasiɲɛ ɛsiz̤iiʃɛkɛlɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɬanu uɓunz̤ima ɓasɔ nd̤az̤iŋǃwɛnɛla nd̤az̤itʰaɓatʰa nanz̤ɔ z̤imɓɛlwɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni pʰakatʰi kwɛntɛntɛ jam isiliv̤ɛrɛ inɡ̤apʰant͡si watʰuma ujɔʃuwa aɓatʰuɲwa ɓaɡ̤id̤ima ɓaja ɛntɛntɛni nanz̤ɔ z̤imɓɛlwɛ ɛntɛntɛni jakʰɛ isiliv̤ɛrɛ inɡ̤apʰant͡si ɓaz̤itʰaɓatʰa pʰant͡si kwɛntɛntɛ ɓaz̤isa kujɔʃuwa nakɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɔnkɛ ɓaz̤ikʰupʰɛla pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ujɔʃuwa ɛnamasirajɛli ɔnkɛ wamtʰaɓatʰa uakan uɲana kaz̤ɛra nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛnkulu nɛsiŋǃumka sɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤akʰɛ namaɛsilɛ akʰɛ nɛmpaɬa jakʰɛ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛntɛntɛ jakʰɛ nɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ anaz̤ɔ ɓaz̤isa ɛntilini jɛakɔrɛ watʰi ujɔʃuwa az̤i usiɬisɛlɛ iʃwanɡ̤uʃa nam̤la ujɛhɔv̤a uja kukuɬisɛla iʃwanɡ̤uʃa ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli amkǁuluɓa kɛ nɡ̤amatʲɛ az̤it͡ʃisa ɛz̤ɔ ntɔ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ apʰɔsa amatʲɛ pʰɛz̤u kwaz̤ɔ amisa pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ imfumɓa ɛnkulu jamatʲɛ ɛkʰɔjɔ unanam̤la waɓuja kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛkuv̤utʰɛni kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ kunɡ̤ɔkɔ kwatʰiwa iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ nd̤awɔ jintili jɛakɔrɛ unanam̤la watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɔʃuwa musa ukɔjika unɡ̤akǃʰipʰuki umɓilini tʰaɓatʰa ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓɔkulwa usukɛ uɲukɛ ujɛ ɛaji jaɓɔna nd̤imnikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ wasɛaji naɓantu ɓakʰɛ nɔmz̤i wakʰɛ nɛliz̤wɛ lakʰɛ wɛnz̤ɛ kwiaji nɔkumkani wajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ kwijɛrikɔ nɔkumkani wajɔ kɔd̤wa nɔz̤itʰimɓɛla amakǁʰɔɓa ajɔ nɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤ajɔ wɔɓɛka kulɔɔ mz̤i aɓalalɛli ɛmv̤a kwawɔ wɛsuka ujɔʃuwa naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɔkulwa wɛɲuka waja ɛaji ujɔʃuwa waɲula amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amaɡ̤ɔxa anɔɓuk͡xɔti anɡ̤amaʃumi amatʰatʰu nɡ̤ɔɓusuku wawawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ ɛsitʰi jaɓɔnani ninɡ̤aɓalalɛli kuwɔ umz̤i ɛmv̤a kɔmz̤i ukuɓa kud̤ɛ kakʰulu kuwɔ umz̤i lunɡ̤ani nɔnkɛ nipʰɛla mna kɛ naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓanam sija kusɔnd̤ɛla kuwɔ umz̤i kɔtʰi ɓakupʰuma ɓasiɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuja kɔkukǃala sisukɛ sixɔlɛ pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ ɓɔpʰuma kɛ ɓasiland̤ɛlɛ sid̤ɛ siɓaxɔlɛ kuwɔ umz̤i kuɓa ɓaja kutʰi ɓajasaɓa pʰamɓi kwɛtʰu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuja kɔkukǃala sija kuxɔla kɛ tʰina pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ nisukɛ kɛ ɛkulalɛlɛni kwɛnu niwuɬutʰɛ umz̤i ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu uwunikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɛnu kɔtʰi kǁɛnikwɛni nitʰɛ nawutʰaɓatʰa umz̤i niwufakɛ isikʰuni nɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a jaɓɔnani nd̤iniwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ wawasusa kɛ ujɔʃuwa aja kulalɛla aɬala pʰakatʰi kwɛb̤ɛtɛli nɛaji nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a ɛaji ujɔʃuwa pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu nɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku wav̤uka nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ ujɔʃuwa waɓaɬɛla aɓantu wɛɲuka jɛna namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwasirajɛli pʰamɓi kwaɓantu waja ɛaji ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓɔkulwa aɓaɓɛnajɛ ɓɛɲuka ɓasɔnd̤ɛla ɓɛz̤a pʰamɓi kɔmz̤i ɓamisa nɡ̤asɛntla kwɛaji kwaɓakʰɔ pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ nɛaji watʰaɓatʰa amad̤ɔd̤a amajɛla amaɬanu wawaɓɛka ɛkulalɛlɛni pʰakatʰi kwɛb̤ɛtɛli nɛaji nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a kɔmz̤i aɓantu ɓaɓɛjimisilɛ jɔnkɛ ɛɓinɡ̤asɛntla kɔmz̤i naɓalalɛli ɓajɔ nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a kɔmz̤i ujɔʃuwa wakǀand̤a pʰakatʰi kɔmfula nɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku kwatʰi akuɓɔna wasɛaji amad̤ɔd̤a alɔɔ mz̤i aŋ̤ǁ̤ama av̤uka apʰuma ɛja kuɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a amasirajɛli ukuɓa kuliwɛ jɛna naɓantu ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɛnd̤awɛni ɛmisiwɛjɔ pʰamɓi kwɛarab̤a ɛɓɛnɡ̤az̤i kɛ jɛna ukuɓa kulalɛlwɛ ɛmv̤a kɔmz̤i ujɔʃuwa namasirajɛli ɔnkɛ ɓaz̤ɛnz̤a aɓɔjisiwɛjɔ pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ ɓaxɔla nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jasɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɓaɬatʲɛlwa umkʰɔsi ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓakulɔɔ mz̤i ukuɓa ɓaɓasukɛlɛ ɓamsukɛla kɛ ujɔʃuwa ɓakǃʰiwukana nɔmz̤i waɓɔ akwasala naɲɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛaji nasɛb̤ɛtɛli inɡ̤apʰumanɡ̤a iwaland̤ɛlɛ amasirajɛli ɓawuʃija umz̤i uv̤ulɛkilɛ ɓawasukɛla amasirajɛli watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɔʃuwa wɔlulɛ umkʰɔntɔ ɔsɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ nɡ̤akwiaji kuɓa nd̤ija kujinikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ wawɔlula kɛ ujɔʃuwa umkʰɔntɔ ɔsɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤akuwɔ umz̤i ɓɛsuka aɓalalɛli nɡ̤ɔkukʰawulɛz̤a ɛnd̤awɛni jaɓɔ ɓaɡ̤id̤ima akusɔlula isanɮa sakʰɛ ɓanɡ̤ɛna kulɔɔ mz̤i ɓawutʰimɓa ɓaŋ̤ǁ̤ama ɓawufaka isikʰuni ab̤ɛka ɛmv̤a kwawɔ amad̤ɔd̤a asɛaji aɓɔna nanɡ̤ɔ wɔmz̤i uɲuka usija ɛz̤ulwini akaɓa namanɮa ɔkusaɓɛla nɡ̤apʰa nanɡ̤apʰa ɓatʰi aɓantu aɓaɓɛsaɓɛlɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɓaɓaɡ̤ukǃukɛla aɓaɓasukɛlajɔ ujɔʃuwa namasirajɛli ɔnkɛ aɓɔna ukuɓa aɓalalɛli ɓawutʰimɓilɛ umz̤i nɔkuɓa wɔmz̤i ujɛɲuka ɓaɓuja kɛ ɓawaɓulala amad̤ɔd̤a asɛaji ɓapʰuma aɓaja kulɔɔ mz̤i ɓɛz̤a kuɓakʰawulɛla aɓa pʰakatʰi kwaɓakwasirajɛli aɓaɲɛ aɓanɡ̤apʰa aɓaɲɛ ɓanɡ̤apʰa ɓawaɓulala kɛ kwad̤a usaɓilɛjɔ nɔsind̤ilɛjɔ ɓamɓamɓa ɛɬɛli wasɛaji ɓamsɔnd̤ɛz̤a kujɔʃuwa kwatʰi kǁa amasirajɛli aɓɛɡ̤ǃ̤iɓilɛ ukuɓaɓulala ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmi ɓasɛaji ɛz̤wɛni ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ apʰɔ aɓɛɓasukɛlɛ kʰɔna nakǁa ɓaɓɛwilɛ ɓɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ ɓad̤a ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwa amasirajɛli ɔnkɛ aɓujɛla ɛaji ajiɓulala nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ kwatʰi ɓɔnkɛ aɓawajɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ ɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kwind̤ɔd̤a ɓɛsisa kumfaz̤i ɓanɡ̤amawaka aliʃumi ɛlinamaɓini ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓasɛaji akasiɓujisanɡ̤a ujɔʃuwa isanɮa sakʰɛ awɔlulɛ umkʰɔntɔ nɡ̤asɔ ɓad̤a ɓat͡ʃatʲalaliswa ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmi ɓasɛaji kɔd̤wa iinkɔmɔ namakǁʰɔɓa alɔɔ mz̤i az̤itʰimɓɛla amasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a aɓɛmwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤alɔ ujɔʃuwa wajit͡ʃisa kɛ ujɔʃuwa iaji wajɛnz̤a umwɛwɛ inɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ iŋǁɔwa unanam̤la wamkǁʰɔma ɛmtʰini wasɛaji kwad̤a kwalikǁɛʃa lanɡ̤ɔkuɬwa lakut͡ʃɔna ilanɡ̤a umtʰɛtʰɔ ujɔʃuwa ukuɓa ɓasitʰulɛ isid̤umɓu sakʰɛ ɛmtʰini ɓasipʰɔsa ɛsitʰuɓɛni sɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɔmz̤i ɓamisa pʰɛz̤u kwasɔ imfumɓa ɛnkulu jamatʲɛ ikʰɔna unanam̤la waz̤a ujɔʃuwa wamakʰɛla ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛntaɓɛni jɛɛb̤ali nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔlɔ umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a waɓawisɛlajɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli umtʰɛtʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kuɓaɬiwɛjɔ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɔmjalɛlɔ kamɔsɛs isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ samatʲɛ awɔnkɛ ɛsinɡ̤asɛtʲɛnz̤wanɡ̤a nɡ̤ant͡simɓi ɓaɲusa pʰɛz̤u kwasɔ amad̤ini aɲukajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a ɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔkǁɔlɔ wab̤ala kʰɔna ɛmatʲɛni wawupʰind̤a ukuwub̤ala umjalɛlɔ kamɔsɛs awawub̤alajɔ pʰamɓi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli namad̤ɔd̤a awɔ amakʰulu naɓab̤ali naɓaɡ̤wɛɓi ɓawɔ ɛma nɡ̤apʰa nanɡ̤apʰa kwɛtʲɛja pʰamɓi kwaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓanɡ̤aɓalɛv̤i aɓatʰwɛlɛ itʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɔwasɛmz̤ini ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔz̤alwajɔ ɛsiɲɛ isikǃinɡ̤atʰa saɓɔ simalunɡ̤a nɛntaɓa jɛɡ̤ɛriz̤im ɛsiɲɛ isikǃinɡ̤atʰa saɓɔ simalunɡ̤a nɛntaɓa jɛɛb̤ali nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ umɔsɛs umkʰɔmz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a wawisajɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɡ̤apʰamɓili ukuɓa ɓasikɛlɛlwɛ aɓantu ɓakwasirajɛli ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ wawalɛsa ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi ɔmjalɛlɔ iint͡sikɛlɛlɔ nɛz̤ikǃalɛkisɔ nɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ ɔkub̤aliwɛjɔ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɔmjalɛlɔ akwaɓakʰɔ naliɲɛ iliz̤wi kuwɔ ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi aɓɛwisɛ umɔsɛs umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤awɔ anɡ̤alilɛsanɡ̤a ujɔʃuwa pʰamɓi kwɛɓanɮa lɔnkɛ lamasirajɛli naɓafaz̤i naɓantwana nɔwasɛmz̤ini ɔhamɓa pʰakatʰi kwawɔ kwatʰi ɓakuv̤a ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔkumkani aɓanɡ̤anɛnɔ kwɛjɔrd̤an ɛz̤intaɓɛni nasɛz̤iɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni nanɡ̤asɛlwanɮɛ lɔnkɛ ɔlukʰulu kwasinɡ̤isa ɛlɛb̤anɔn amahɛti namaamɔri namakanan namapɛriz̤i namahiv̤i namajɛb̤usi ɓaɓutʰɛlana nd̤awɔɲɛ ukuɓa ɓalwɛ nɡ̤amkǁʰɛlɔ mɲɛ nɔjɔʃuwa namasirajɛli kɛ aɓɛmi ɓasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn ɓɛv̤a ɔkɔ akwɛnz̤ilɛjɔ ujɔʃuwa kwijɛrikɔ nakwiaji ɓɛnz̤a naɓɔ nɡ̤ɔɓukǃʰɔpʰɔlɔlɔ ɓaja ɓaz̤ɛnz̤a iz̤iɡ̤id̤imi ɓaɓɛka iiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwa ɛz̤ɔnakɛlɛjɔ ɛmaɛsilɛni aɓɔ nɛɛnt͡suɓa z̤ɛwajini ɛz̤ɔnakɛlɛjɔ ɛz̤ik͡xaz̤ukilɛjɔ ɛz̤iɓɔt͡ʃiwɛjɔ nɛɛmɓad̤ad̤a ɛz̤ɔnakɛlɛjɔ ɛz̤ikǁɔliwɛjɔ ɛz̤iɲawɛni z̤aɓɔ ɓamɓatʰa nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤ɔnakɛlɛjɔ nɛsɔnka sɔnkɛ sɔmpʰakɔ waɓɔ ɓɛsɔmilɛ ɓɛsinɡ̤und̤ilɛ kunɛnɛ ɓɛz̤a kujɔʃuwa ɛmkʰɔsini ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali ɓatʰi kujɛ nakumad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli siv̤ɛla ɛz̤wɛni ɛlikud̤ɛ simisɛlɛni nɡ̤ɔkɔ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ atʰi amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli kumahiv̤i lawɔ hi nikwaɬɛli pʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu sɔtʰini ukunimisɛla umŋǃɔpʰisi ɓatʰi kujɔʃuwa sinɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ watʰi ujɔʃuwa kuɓɔ ninɡ̤ɔɔɓani niv̤ɛla pʰi ɓatʰi kujɛ ɓav̤ɛla kwɛlikud̤ɛ kakʰulu iliz̤wɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ kuɓa siluv̤ilɛ ud̤umɔ lwakʰɛ nɛntɔ jɔnkɛ awajɛnz̤ajɔ ɛjiputa nɛntɔ jɔnkɛ awajɛnz̤ajɔ kɔɔkumkani ɓɔɓaɓini ɓamaamɔri aɓaɓɛpʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an kusihɔn wasɛhɛʃb̤ɔn nakuɔɡ̤i wasɛb̤aʃan ɔɓɛsɛaʃtarɔti at͡ʃɔ kutʰi amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu naɓɛmi ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛliz̤wɛ lakɔwɛtʰu ukutʰi pʰatʰani ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤ɛnu umpʰakɔ wɛnɮɛla nijɛ kuwakʰawulɛla nitʰi kuwɔ sinɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛnu simisɛlɛni nɡ̤ɔkɔ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɛsi sisɔnka sɛtʰu sasɛnz̤a umpʰakɔ wɛtʰu siʃuʃu ɛz̤inɮwini z̤ɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɔkupʰuma kwɛtʰu ɛkʰaja ukuz̤a nɡ̤ɔku sɔmilɛ sinɡ̤und̤ilɛ iint͡suɓa ɛz̤i z̤ɛwajini saz̤iz̤alisa z̤isɛnt͡ʃa nanz̤i z̤ik͡xaz̤ukilɛ nanz̤i nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɛtʰu nɛɛmɓad̤ad̤a z̤ɛtʰu z̤ɔnakɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔɓud̤ɛ ɓɛnɮɛla akǀapʰula kɛ amad̤ɔd̤a ɛmpʰakwɛni waɓɔ akaɓuz̤a kǀɛɓɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni kajɛhɔv̤a wɛnz̤a ukǁɔlɔ naɓɔ ujɔʃuwa waɓamisɛla umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɔkuɓasind̤isa z̤aɓafunɡ̤ɛla nɛz̤ikʰulu z̤alɔ iɓanɮa kwatʰi ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɬa ɛmitʰatʰu ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa ɓɛɓamisɛlɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɓɛv̤a ukuɓa ɓakufupʰi kuɓɔ nɔkuɓa ɓaɬɛli kwapʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ɓand̤uluka ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓafika ɛmiz̤ini jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰatʰu imiz̤i jaɓɔ jiɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn nɛkɛfira nɛb̤ɛrɔti nɛkirijatijɛharim ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓaɓaɓulala nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iz̤ikʰulu z̤ɛɓanɮa z̤iɓɛ z̤ifunɡ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli kuɓɔ laz̤ik͡xɔk͡xɛla iz̤ikʰulu lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa z̤atʰi z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ikʰulu kwiɓanɮa lɔnkɛ tʰina sifunɡ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli kuɓɔ kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ asinakuɓakǀʰukumisa masɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ kuɓɔ masiɓasind̤isɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ɓuxalaxumɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛsifunɡ̤ɔ ɛsaɓafunɡ̤ɛla sɔna z̤atʰi iz̤ikʰulu kuɓɔ maɓaɮɛ uɓɔmi maɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓatʰɛz̤i ɓɛɛnkuni naɓakʰi ɓamanz̤i ɓɛɓanɮa lɔnkɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ z̤atʰɛtʰajɔ iz̤ikʰulu kuɓɔ waɓaɓiz̤a kɛ ujɔʃuwa watʰɛtʰa kuɓɔ ɛsitʰi nisikʰɔɬisɛlɛni nisitʰi simɡ̤ama kakʰulu niɬɛli kwapʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu nikǃalɛkisiwɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ akuji kuŋǃumka ɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓatʰɛz̤i ɓɛɛnkuni ɓakʰi ɓamanz̤i ɓɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ ɓapʰɛnd̤ula ɓatʰi kujɔʃuwa ɓakǁɛlɛlwa nɡ̤ɔkukǃinisɛkilɛjɔ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ɔkɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ wamwisɛla umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ ukuɓa uja lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ nɔkuɓa uja kuɓat͡ʃaɓalalisa ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmi ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓɛnu sajɔjikɛla kunɛnɛ kɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ jɛtʰu ɛɓuswɛni ɓɛnu sɛnz̤a lɛ ntɔ kɛ kalɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ sisɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ jɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ ukwɛnz̤a kutʰi wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ kuɓɔ waɓaɬanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni sɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓaɓaɓulala ujɔʃuwa waɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤alɔɔ aɓatʰɛz̤i ɓɛɛnkuni naɓakʰi ɓamanz̤i ɛɓanɮɛni nasɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni sikajɛhɔv̤a unanam̤la kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ atʰɛ wajiɲula kwatʰi akuv̤a uad̤ɔnit͡sɛd̤ɛki wasijɛrusalɛm ukuɓa ujɔʃuwa ujitʰimɓilɛ iaji wajit͡ʃaɓalalisa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ kwijɛrikɔ nɔkumkani wajɔ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kwiaji nɔkumkani wajɔ nɔkuɓa aɓɛmi ɓasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn ɓɛnz̤ɛ ukǁɔlɔ namasirajɛli ɓaɓa pʰakatʰi kwawɔ ɓɔjika kunɛnɛ kuɓa nɡ̤umz̤i ɔmkʰulu iɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɲɛ wɛmiz̤i jɔɓukumkani nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kunɛaji namad̤ɔd̤a ajɔ ɔnkɛ anɡ̤amaɡ̤ɔxa wɛsuka uad̤ɔnit͡sɛd̤ɛki wasɛjɛrusalɛm watʰumɛla kuhɔham wasɛhɛɓrɔn nakupiram wasɛjarmuti nakujafija wasɛlakiʃɛ nakud̤ɛb̤iri wasɛɛɡ̤lɔn ɛsitʰi ɲukani niz̤ɛ nind̤iŋǀɛd̤ɛ sijikǁaɓɛlɛ iɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn kuɓa jɛnz̤ɛ ukǁɔlɔ nɔjɔʃuwa nɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaɬanɡ̤ana kɛ ɓɛɲuka ɔɔkumkani aɓɔ ɓamaamɔri ɓɔɓaɬanu wasɛjɛrusalɛm nɔkumkani wasɛhɛɓrɔn nɔkumkani wasɛjarmuti nɔkumkani wasɛlakiʃɛ nɔkumkani wasɛɛɡ̤lɔn ɓɔna nɛmikʰɔsi jaɓɔ jɔnkɛ ɓajiŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a iɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn ɓalwa najɔ atʰumɛla kɛ amad̤ɔd̤a asɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn kujɔʃuwa ɛmkʰɔsini ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali ɛsitʰi musa ukusijɛkɛlɛla isanɮa sakʰɔ kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ɲuka uz̤ɛ kutʰi nɡ̤ɔkukʰawulɛz̤a usisind̤isɛ usiŋǀɛd̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛɓutʰɛlɛnɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔkumkani ɓamaamɔri aɓɛmijɔ ɛz̤intaɓɛni wɛɲuka kɛ ujɔʃuwa ɛsuka ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali jɛna naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɔkulwa ɓɛnd̤awɔɲɛ najɛ namaɡ̤ɔxa ɔnkɛ anɔɓuk͡xɔti watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɔʃuwa musa ukuɓɔjika kuɓa nd̤iɓanikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ akuji nd̤ɔd̤a kuɓɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ wafika ujɔʃuwa kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɛb̤akǃɔ wɛɲuka ɓɔnkɛ uɓusuku ɛv̤ɛla ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali ujɛhɔv̤a waɓad̤uɓad̤uɓa pʰamɓi kwamasirajɛli aɓaɓulala nɡ̤ɔɓulawɔ ɔlukʰulu ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn aɓasukɛla nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɛɲuka ijɛ ɛb̤ɛtɛhɔrɔn aɓaɓulala kwad̤a kwɛsa ɛaz̤ɛka kwad̤a kwɛsa nasɛmakɛd̤a kwatʰi ɛkusaɓɛni kwaɓɔ pʰamɓi kwamasirajɛli ɓɛsɛtʰamɓɛkɛni lasɛb̤ɛtɛhɔrɔn ujɛhɔv̤a waɓatʰɔɓɛla amatʲɛ amakʰulu ɛz̤ulwini kwad̤a kwɛsa ɛaz̤ɛka ɓafa ɓaɓaninz̤i aɓafa nɡ̤amatʲɛ ɛsikǀʰɔtʰɔ kunaɓaɓulawajɔ nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ waz̤a watʰɛtʰa ujɔʃuwa kujɛhɔv̤a m̤lana ujɛhɔv̤a wawanikɛla amaamɔri kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli watʰi ɛmɛɬwɛni amasirajɛli lanɡ̤a ŋǃumama ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn nawɛ ɲanɡ̤a ɛntilini jɛajalɔn latʰi ŋǃumama kɛ ilanɡ̤a jɛma iɲanɡ̤a lwad̤a uɬanɡ̤a lwaz̤ipʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlɛla ɛz̤int͡ʃaɓɛni z̤alɔ ɔku akub̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɔtʰɛ tʲɛ lɛma kɛ ilanɡ̤a ɛsaz̤ulwini sɛz̤ulu alaŋ̤ǁ̤ama ukut͡ʃɔna janɡ̤atʰi jimini ipʰɛla akuz̤anɡ̤a kuɓɛkʰɔ ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤alɛjɔ pʰamɓi kwajɔ nanɡ̤asɛmv̤a kwajɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔkud̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a alipʰulapʰulɛ iz̤wi lɔmntu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a wawalwɛla amasirajɛli waɓuja ujɔʃuwa ɛnamasirajɛli ɔnkɛ waja ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali ɓasaɓa aɓɔ ɓaɬanu ɓaz̤imɛla ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni ɛmakɛd̤a kwakǁɛlwa kujɔʃuwa kwatʰiwa siɓafumɛnɛ ɔɔkumkani ɓɔɓaɬanu ɓɛz̤imɛlɛ ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni ɛmakɛd̤a watʰi ujɔʃuwa kǃɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlani amatʲɛ amakʰulu ɛmlɔɲɛni wɔmkǃɔlɔmɓa nimisɛ amad̤ɔd̤a pʰɛz̤u kwawɔ ukuɓa aɓalind̤ɛ kɛ z̤isukɛlɛni iint͡ʃaɓa z̤ɛnu niwuɓɛtʰɛ umkǃɔʃɛlisɔ waz̤ɔ musani ukuwuv̤umɛla unɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛmiz̤ini jawɔ kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu uwunikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɛnu kwatʰi akuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa ujɔʃuwa nɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ukuz̤iɓulala kakʰulu kunɛnɛ z̤ad̤a z̤aɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwa z̤atʰi ɛz̤isɛlɛjɔ kuz̤ɔ z̤aja kunɡ̤ɛna ɛmiz̤ini ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ ɓaɓujɛ kɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓaja ɛmkʰɔsini kujɔʃuwa ɛmakɛd̤a nɡ̤ɔkǁɔlɔ akwaɓakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤a iɓav̤unɡ̤amɛlajɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kwanaɓani watʰi ujɔʃuwa v̤ulani umlɔmɔ wɔmkǃɔlɔmɓa niɓakʰupʰɛ ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni aɓaa ɓɔɓaɬanu ɓɛz̤ɛ ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ ɓaɓakʰupʰa ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni ɓɛz̤a kujɛ aɓɔ ɓɔɓaɬanu wasɛjɛrusalɛm nɔkumkani wasɛhɛɓrɔn nɔkumkani wasɛjarmuti nɔkumkani wasɛlakiʃɛ nɔkumkani nɔkumkani wasɛɛɡ̤lɔn kwatʰi ɓakuɓakʰupʰa ɓaɓasa kujɔʃuwa aɓɔ wawaɓiz̤a ujɔʃuwa ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli watʰi kuɓapʰatʰi ɓamad̤ɔd̤a ɔkulwa aɓaɓɛhamɓɛ najɛ sɔnd̤ɛlani niɓaɲatʰɛlɛ ɛntaɲɛni aɓa ɓasɔnd̤ɛla kɛ ɓaɓaɲatʰɛla ɛz̤intaɲɛni z̤aɓɔ watʰi ujɔʃuwa kuɓɔ musani ukɔjika ukukǃʰipʰuka umɓilini jɔmɛlɛlani nikʰalipʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uja kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kwiint͡ʃaɓa z̤ɛnu z̤ɔnkɛ ɛnilwa naz̤ɔ waɓakǁaɓɛla kɛ ujɔʃuwa ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ waɓaɓulala waɓakǁʰɔma ɛmitʰini ɛmiɬanu ɓakǁʰɔɲwa ɛmitʰini apʰɔ kwad̤a kwaɬwa kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkut͡ʃɔna kwɛlanɡ̤a ujɔʃuwa umtʰɛtʰɔ ɓaɓatʰula ɛmitʰini ɓaɓapʰɔsa ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni aɓaɓɛz̤imɛlɛ kuwɔ ɓaɓɛka amatʲɛ amakʰulu ɛmlɔɲɛni wɔmkǃɔlɔmɓa asɛkʰɔjɔ nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɔʃuwa wajitʰimɓa nɛmakɛd̤a nɡ̤alɔɔ wajikǁaɓɛla nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛkɛ nɔkumkani wajɔ waɓat͡ʃaɓalalisa kwanaɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓakujɔ namɲɛ usind̤ilɛjɔ wɛnz̤a wasɛmakɛd̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ wasɛjɛrikɔ waɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa ujɔʃuwa ɛnamasirajɛli ɔnkɛ ɛmakɛd̤a waja ɛlib̤ɛna nɛlib̤ɛna wajinikɛla kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛsanɮɛni samasirajɛli nɔkumkani wajɔ wajikǁaɓɛla nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ kwanaɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓakujɔ kujɔ namɲɛ usind̤ilɛjɔ wɛnz̤a wajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ wasɛjɛrikɔ waɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa ujɔʃuwa ɛlib̤ɛna ɛnamasirajɛli ɔnkɛ waja ɛlakiʃɛ wajiŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a najɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wajinikɛla ilakiʃɛ ɛsanɮɛni samasirajɛli ajitʰimɓa nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsiɓini ajikǁaɓɛla nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ kwanaɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓakujɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ kwilib̤ɛna waz̤a wɛɲuka uhɔram wasɛɡ̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ waja kujiŋǀɛd̤a ilakiʃɛ ujɔʃuwa wamɓulala jɛna naɓantu ɓakʰɛ kwad̤a namɲɛ kujɛ usind̤ilɛjɔ wɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa ujɔʃuwa ɛlakiʃɛ ɛnamasirajɛli ɔnkɛ aja ɛɛɡ̤lɔn ajiŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a najɔ ajitʰimɓa nɡ̤alɔɔ m̤la ajikǁaɓɛla nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ kwanaɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓakujɔ wajit͡ʃaɓalalisa nɡ̤alɔɔ m̤la nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ kwilakiʃɛ wɛɲuka ujɔʃuwa ɛsuka ɛɛɡ̤lɔn waja ɛhɛɓrɔn ɛnamasirajɛli ɔnkɛ najɔ ajitʰimɓa ajikǁaɓɛla nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ nɔkumkani wajɔ nɛmiz̤i jajɔ jɔnkɛ naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓakujɔ namɲɛ usind̤ilɛjɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ kwiɛɡ̤lɔn wat͡ʃaɓalalisa kwanaɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓakujɔ waɓuja kɛ ujɔʃuwa ɛnamasirajɛli ɔnkɛ wɛz̤a ɛd̤ɛb̤iri najɔ wajitʰimɓa nɔkumkani wajɔ nɛmiz̤i jajɔ jɔnkɛ ajikǁaɓɛla nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ ajit͡ʃaɓalalisa kwanaɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓakujɔ namɲɛ usind̤ilɛjɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wakwɛnz̤ajɔ kwihɛɓrɔn wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kwɛd̤ɛb̤iri wajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wakwɛnz̤ajɔ kwilib̤ɛna wajɔ waliɓulala kɛ ujɔʃuwa lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lɛɛntaɓa nɛlasɛz̤ant͡si nɛlɛz̤iɬamɓɔ nɛlamakǁand̤ɛka naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔkumkani ɓalɔ namɲɛ usind̤ilɛjɔ wat͡ʃaɓalalisa kɔnkɛ ɔkupʰɛfumlajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli waɓaɓulala ujɔʃuwa watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkad̤ɛʃɛb̤arnɛha wɛsa ɛɡ̤az̤a nɛliz̤wɛ lɔnkɛ lasɛɡ̤ɔʃɛn wɛsa ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn waɓatʰimɓa ujɔʃuwa ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ nɛliz̤wɛ laɓɔ nɡ̤asiɬanɮɔ siɲɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɛɓɛwalwɛla amasirajɛli waɓuja ujɔʃuwa ɛnamasirajɛli ɔnkɛ wɛz̤a ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali kwatʰi akukuv̤a ɔkɔ ujab̤in wasɛhat͡sɔrɛ watʰuma kujɔb̤ab̤i wasɛmad̤ɔn wasɛʃimrɔn wasɛakɛʃafi nakɔɔkumkani aɓanɡ̤asɛntla ɛz̤intaɓɛni nasɛarab̤a nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si kwɛkinɛrɔti nasɛz̤iɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni nasɛz̤ind̤ulini z̤asɛd̤ɔrɛ ɛnɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a kumakanan ɛmpumalanɡ̤a nasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a nakumaamɔri nakumahɛti nakumapɛriz̤i nakumajɛb̤usi ɛz̤intaɓɛni nakumahiv̤i apʰant͡si kwɛhɛrmɔn ɛz̤wɛni lɛmiz̤pa ɓapʰuma kɛ ɓɔna ɓɛnɛmikʰɔsi jaɓɔ jɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓaninz̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntlaɓatʰi ɛsɛluŋǁwɛmɛni lɔlwanɮɛ ukuɓa ɓaninz̤i namahaʃɛ nɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa intɔ ɛninz̤i kunɛnɛ ɓav̤umɛlana kɛ aɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛz̤a ɓamisa nd̤awɔɲɛ ɛmanz̤ini asɛmɛrɔm ukuɓa ɓalwɛ namasirajɛli watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɔʃuwa musa ukɔjika nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔmsɔ ɛli kǁa nd̤ija kuɓanikɛla ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓɛɬatʲiwɛ ɛmanɮɛni amasirajɛli uwaŋǃumlɛ imisipʰa amahaʃɛ aɓɔ uz̤it͡ʃisɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ iiŋǃwɛlɔ z̤aɓɔ z̤ɔkulwa waja kɛ ujɔʃuwa ɛnaɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɔkulwa waɓafikɛla nɡ̤ɛb̤akǃɔ ɛmanz̤ini asɛmɛrɔm ɓaɓawɛla ujɛhɔv̤a waɓanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni samasirajɛli aɓaɓulala aɓasukɛla kwɛsa ɛt͡sid̤ɔn ɛnkulu kwɛsa ɛmisɛrɛfɔtimajim kwɛsa ɛtʰafɛni lasɛmiz̤pa ɛmpumalanɡ̤a aɓaɓulala kwad̤a namɲɛ kuɓɔ usind̤ilijɔ wɛnz̤a kɛ ujɔʃuwa kuɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ watʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kujɛ amahaʃɛ aɓɔ wawaŋǃumla imisipʰa iiŋǃwɛlɔ z̤aɓɔ z̤ɔkulwa waz̤it͡ʃisa nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ waɓuja ujɔʃuwa nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa wajitʰimɓa ihat͡sɔrɛ wamɓulala wajɔ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ kuɓa ihat͡sɔrɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɡ̤apʰamɓili iɓɛ ijintlɔkɔ jɛz̤ɔ z̤ikumkani z̤ɔnkɛ aɓaɓulala ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓakujɔ nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ ajit͡ʃaɓalalisa namɲɛ upʰɛfumlajɔ ajit͡ʃisa ihat͡sɔrɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ jɔnkɛ imiz̤i jaɓɔ naɓɔ ɓajɔ ɓɔnkɛ waɓatʰimɓa ujɔʃuwa waɓaɓulala nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ waɓat͡ʃaɓalalisa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a wawisajɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ kɔd̤wa jɔnkɛ imiz̤i ɛmi ɛmimanɡ̤wɛni jajɔ amasirajɛli akajit͡ʃisanɡ̤a jaɓa jihat͡sɔrɛ jɔd̤wa awajit͡ʃisajɔ ujɔʃuwa ɔnkɛ amakǁʰɔɓa alɔɔ miz̤i nɛɛnkɔmɔ ɓaz̤itʰimɓɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kɔd̤wa ɓaɓaɓulala ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ ɓad̤a ɓaɓat͡ʃaɓalalisa aɓasalisa namɲɛ upʰɛfumlajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wamwisɛlajɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɛ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ umɔsɛs ukumwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ ujɔʃuwa wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ ujɔʃuwa naliɲɛ iliz̤wi kukɔ kɔnkɛ ujɛhɔv̤a awamwisɛla umɔsɛs umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ walitʰaɓatʰa kɛ ujɔʃuwa lɔnkɛ ɛlɔ z̤wɛ lɛɛntaɓa nɛlasɛz̤ant͡si lɔnkɛ nɛliz̤wɛ lasɛɡ̤ɔʃɛn lɔnkɛ nɛlɛz̤iɬamɓɔ nɛlɛarab̤a nɛɛntaɓa z̤akwasirajɛli nɛz̤iɬamɓɔ z̤az̤ɔ ɛlitʰaɓatʰɛla ɛz̤intaɓɛni ɛz̤imkʰutʰuka ɛz̤iɲuka z̤ijɛ kwasɛhirɛ lɛsa ɛb̤ahaliɡ̤ad̤i ɛtʰafɛni lasɛlɛb̤anɔn pʰant͡si kwɛntaɓa jɛhɛrmɔn ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔkumkani ɓawɔ waɓatʰimɓa waɓakǁaɓɛla waɓaɓulala jaɓa mininz̤i kɛ imiɬa ɛsɛnz̤a imfaz̤wɛ ujɔʃuwa naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ akuɓanɡ̤akʰɔ mz̤i waz̤inikɛlajɔ nɡ̤ɔkǁɔlɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli inɡ̤ɛnɡ̤amahiv̤i aɓɛmi ɓasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn jɔnkɛ ɓajitʰaɓatʰa nɡ̤ɔkulwa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kwav̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a ukuz̤ikǃinisa iintliz̤ijɔ z̤aɓɔ ukuɓa ɓawaɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤ɛ amasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛmfaz̤wɛ ukuz̤ɛ aɓat͡ʃaɓalalisɛ ukuz̤ɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ kuɓaɓalwa kwaɓɔ ukuz̤ɛ kɛ aɓat͡ʃaɓalalisɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wamwisɛlajɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ umɔsɛs wafika ujɔʃuwa nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa wawaŋǃumla amaanaki ɛz̤intaɓɛni ɛhɛɓrɔn ɛd̤ɛb̤iri ɛanab̤i ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwajud̤a ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwasirajɛli ujɔʃuwa wawat͡ʃaɓalalisa kuɲɛ nɛmiz̤i jawɔ akwasala maanaki ɛz̤wɛni lɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kupʰɛla ɛɡ̤az̤a nasɛɡ̤ati nasɛaʃɔd̤ɛ walitʰaɓatʰa kɛ ujɔʃuwa lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awakutʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs ujɔʃuwa lamasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛntlantlu z̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤awɔ laz̤ɔla kɛ iliz̤wɛ akwaɓakʰɔ mfaz̤wɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ kɛ aɓa ɔɔkumkani ɓɛliz̤wɛ aɓaɓulawajɔ nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaliɬutʰa iliz̤wɛ laɓɔ pʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni ɔjiarnɔn ɓɛsa ɛntaɓɛni jɛhɛrmɔn nɛarab̤a jɔnkɛ nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a nɡ̤usihɔn wamaamɔri ɔɓɛɬɛli ɛhɛʃb̤ɔn ɛlawula ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛarɔhɛrɛ ɛnɡ̤asɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni ɔjiarnɔn napʰakatʰi kwɛsiɬamɓɔ nasɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰɛni sɛɡ̤ilijad̤i wɛsa ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni ɔjijab̤ɔki ɛnɡ̤umd̤a wɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn nɛarab̤a wɛsa ɛlwanɮɛ lwasɛkid̤nɛrɔti nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a wɛsa ɛlwanɮɛ lwɛarab̤a ulwanɮɛ lwɛtʲuwa nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛb̤ɛtɛjɛʃimɔti nasɛz̤ant͡si pʰant͡si kwamakǁand̤ɛka asɛpisɡ̤a ɓaɬutʰa nɛkǀala likaɔɡ̤i wasɛb̤aʃan ɔwajɛsɛlɛ kumarafa ɔɓɛɬɛli ɛaʃtarɔti nasɛɛd̤rɛji ɛlawula ɛntaɓɛni jɛhɛrmɔn nasɛsalɛka nakwib̤aʃan jɔnkɛ wɛsa ɛmd̤ɛni wamaɡ̤ɛʃuri namamahakati nɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛɡ̤ilijad̤i umd̤a kasihɔn wasɛhɛʃb̤ɔn umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a nɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaɓaɓulala aɓɔ umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤amarub̤ɛn nanɡ̤amaɡ̤ad̤i nɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsiwɛ sakwamanasɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa ɔɔkumkani ɓɛliz̤wɛ awaɓaɓulalajɔ ujɔʃuwa nɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤anɛnɔ kwajɔrd̤an nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛb̤ahaliɡ̤ad̤i ɛntilini jɛlɛb̤anɔn wɛsa ɛz̤intaɓɛni ɛz̤imkʰutʰuka ɛz̤iɲukajɔ z̤ijɛ kwasɛhirɛ ujɔʃuwa iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤akwasirajɛli z̤ɛma kulɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛntlantlu z̤az̤ɔ ɛz̤intaɓɛni nasɛz̤iɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni nasɛarab̤a nasɛmakǁand̤ɛkɛni nasɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nakwɛlasɛz̤ant͡si amahɛti namaamɔri namakanan namapɛriz̤i namahiv̤i namajɛb̤usi nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛjɛrikɔ ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛaji ɛnɡ̤ɛkǀala lɛb̤ɛtɛli ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛjɛrusalɛm ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ɛkumkani wasɛhɛɓrɔn ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛjarmuti ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛlakiʃɛ ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛɛɡ̤lɔn ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛɡ̤ɛz̤ɛra ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛd̤ɛb̤iri ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛɡ̤ɛd̤ɛrɛ ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛhɔrma ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛarad̤ɛ ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛlib̤ɛna ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛad̤ulam ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛmakɛd̤a ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛb̤ɛtɛli ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛtapuwa ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wawɛhɛfɛrɛ ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛafɛki ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ɛkumkani wasɛlaʃarɔn ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛmad̤ɔn ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛhat͡sɔrɛ ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛʃimrɔnmɛrɔm ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛakɛʃafi ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛtahanaki ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛmɛɡ̤id̤ɔ ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛkɛd̤ɛʃɛ ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛjɔkɛnɛham ɛkarmɛlɛ ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛd̤ɔrɛ ɛz̤ind̤ulini z̤ɛd̤ɔrɛ ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wamaɡ̤ɔji ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali ɛmɲɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛtirt͡sa ɛmɲɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔkumkani aɓɔ nɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu anamɲɛ kɛ kalɔku ujɔʃuwa wajɛsɛlɛjinɔd̤a ɛnkulu ɛsɛlɛkʰulilɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɛ wɛna usɛlujind̤ɔd̤a ɛnkulu usɛlukʰulilɛ kɛ iliz̤wi ɛlisasɛlɛjɔ lɔkuɬutʰwa lisɛlininz̤i kunɛnɛ lilɔ ɛli iliz̤wɛ ɛlisasɛlɛjɔ jɔnkɛ imimanɮa jamafilisti nɛjamaɡ̤ɛʃuri ɔnkɛ itʰaɓatʰɛla ɛʃihɔrɛ ɛpʰamɓi kwɛjiputa isɛ ɛmd̤ɛni wasɛɛk͡xɔn nɡ̤asɛntla ɛɓalɛlwa kwakumakanan ɛjɛz̤ikʰulu z̤ɔz̤iɬanu z̤amafilisti ɛjaɓasɛɡ̤az̤a nɛjaɓasɛaʃd̤ɔd̤ɛ nɛjaɓasɛaʃkɛlɔn nɛjaɓasɛɡ̤ati nɛjaɓasɛɛk͡xɔn nɛjaɓasɛav̤i nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lamakanan nɔmkǃɔlɔmɓa ɔnɡ̤ɔwamat͡sid̤ɔn lisɛ ɛafɛka lisɛ ɛmd̤ɛni wamaamɔri nɛliz̤wɛ lamaɡ̤ɛb̤ali nɛlɛb̤anɔn jɔnkɛ nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a litʰaɓatʰɛla ɛb̤ahaliɡ̤ad̤i pʰant͡si kwɛntaɓa jɛhɛrmɔn ud̤ɛ ujɛ ɛhamati ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmi ɓɛɛntaɓa kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛlɛb̤anɔn kusɛ ɛmisrɛfɔtimajim ɔnkɛ amat͡sid̤ɔn ɛnd̤ija kuɓaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤a pʰamɓi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli wɔtʰi kɛ wɛna ulaɓɛlɛ amasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛkǃaʃisɔ ukuɓa liɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤akuwisɛlajɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ laɓɛ ɛli liz̤wɛ liɓɛ kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤isitʰɔɓa nakwɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsiz̤wɛ sakwamanasɛ ɛsilifa iŋǁɛɲɛ jasɔ saliz̤uz̤a kuɲɛ namarub̤ɛn namaɡ̤ad̤i awawanikajɔ umɔsɛs pʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ aɓɛmnikilɛ umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a litʰaɓatʰɛla ɛarɔhɛrɛ ɛnɡ̤asɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔjiarnɔn nɔmz̤i ɔpʰakatʰi kwɛsiɬamɓɔ ɛsɔ nɛhɛwu lɔnkɛ lasɛmɛd̤ɛb̤a lisɛ ɛd̤ib̤ɔn nɛmiz̤i jɔnkɛ kasihɔn wamaamɔri ɔɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ uɓukumkani ɛhɛʃb̤ɔn lisɛ ɛmd̤ɛni wɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn nɛlasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i nɔmd̤a wamaɡ̤ɛʃuri namamahakati nɛntaɓa jɔnkɛ jɛhɛrmɔn nɛb̤aʃan jɔnkɛ kusɛ ɛsalɛka ɓɔnkɛ uɓukukumkani ɓukaɔɡ̤i ɛb̤aʃan ɔɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ uɓukumkani ɛaʃtarɔti nasɛɛd̤rɛji nɡ̤ɔwajɛsɛlɛ kumasalɛla amarafa wawaɓɛtʰa umɔsɛs wawaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤a nɔkɔ kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓawaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤anɡ̤a amaɡ̤ɛʃuri namamahakati aɬɛli amaɡ̤ɛʃuri namamahakati pʰakatʰi kwamasirajɛli unanam̤la sisiz̤wɛ sakwalɛv̤i sɔd̤wa anɡ̤asinikanɡ̤a ukuɮa kwasɛmlilwɛni kukajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wamasirajɛli lasɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ watʰɛtʰajɔ kusɔ umɔsɛs isiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ umd̤a waɓɔ watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛarɔhɛrɛ nɡ̤asɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni ɔjiarnɔn nɔmz̤i ɔpʰakatʰi kwɛsiɬamɓɔ nɛhɛwu lɔnkɛ ɛlinɡ̤asɛmɛd̤ɛb̤a ihɛʃb̤ɔn nɛmiz̤i jajɔ jɔnkɛ ɛsɛhɛwu id̤ib̤ɔn nɛb̤amɔtib̤ahali nɛb̤ɛtɛb̤ahalimɛhɔn nɛjat͡sa nɛkɛd̤ɛmɔti nɛmafahati nɛkirijatajim nɛsib̤ɛma nɛt͡sɛrɛtɛʃaharɛ ɛntaɓɛni jɛntili nɛb̤ɛtɛpɛhɔrɛ namakǁand̤ɛka asɛpisɡ̤a nɛb̤ɛtɛjɛʃimɔti nɛmiz̤i jɔnkɛ jɛhɛwu nɔɓukumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɓukasihɔn wamaamɔri ɔɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ uɓukumkani ɛhɛʃb̤ɔn ɔwaɓulawajɔ nɡ̤umɔsɛs kuɲɛ nɛz̤ikʰulu z̤akwamid̤ijan ɔɔɛv̤i nɔrɛkɛm nɔt͡surɛ nɔhurɛ nɔrɛb̤a iinkɔsana z̤ikasihɔn ɛz̤iɬɛli kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ nɔb̤ilɛham uɲana kab̤ɛhɔrɛ itɔla ɓamɓulala ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓaɬatʲiwɛjɔ nɡ̤aɓɔ umd̤a wɔɔɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn waɓa jijɔrd̤an nɔmmanɮa wajɔ lilɔ ɛlɔ lɔɔɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ imiz̤i jaɓɔ nɛmiz̤ana jaɓɔ umɔsɛs isiz̤wɛ sakwaɡ̤ad̤i ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ad̤i waɓanika nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ umd̤a waɓɔ waɓa jijaz̤ɛrɛ nɛmiz̤i jɔnkɛ jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i nɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛliz̤wɛ lɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn wɛsa ɛarɔhɛrɛ ɛpʰamɓi kwɛrab̤a watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛhɛʃb̤ɔn wɛsa ɛramatimit͡sɛpɛ nɛb̤ɛtɔnim watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛmahanajim wɛsa ɛmd̤ɛni wɛlid̤ɛb̤iri nasɛntilini ib̤ɛtɛharam nɛb̤ɛtɛnimra nɛsulɔti nɛt͡safɔn amasalɛla ɔɓukumkani ɓukasihɔn wɛhɛʃb̤ɔn ijɔrd̤an nɔmmanɮa wajɔ wɛsa ɛkupʰɛlɛni kɔlwanɮɛ lwasɛkinɛrɛtɛ pʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a lilɔ ɛlɔ lɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ad̤i nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ imiz̤i jaɓɔ nɛmiz̤ana jaɓɔ umɔsɛs isikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsiz̤wɛ sakwamanasɛ laɓa lɛlɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakamanasɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ umd̤a waɓɔ watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛmahanajim ib̤aʃan jɔnkɛ ɓɔnkɛ uɓukumkani ɓukaɔɡ̤i wasɛb̤aʃan nɛmiz̤ana jɔnkɛ jakwajahirɛ ɛsɛb̤aʃan imiz̤i ɛmaʃumi matʰand̤atʰu nɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i nɛaʃtarɔti nɛɛd̤rɛji imiz̤i jɔɓukumkani ɓakamakirɛ uɲana kamanasɛ isikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɔɔɲana ɓakamakirɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ nɡ̤awɔ lawɔ awawaɓajɔ umɔsɛs ɛz̤iŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsini z̤akwamɔwab̤i pʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an malunɡ̤a nɛjɛrikɔ nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a kɛ isiz̤wɛ sakwalɛv̤i umɔsɛs asasinikanɡ̤a nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli lasɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ watʰɛtʰajɔ kusɔ nɡ̤awɔ kɛ aɓawaɓɛlwajɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan aɓawaɓɛlwa nɡ̤uɛlaz̤arɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɔjɔʃuwa uɲana kanun nɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ z̤ɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛkǃaʃisɔ lɛlifa laɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikamɔsɛs ɛlɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤isitʰɔɓa ɛz̤inɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsiz̤wɛ kuɓa umɔsɛs ɛɓɛz̤inikilɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤iɓini nɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsiz̤wɛ pʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an kɛ aɓalɛv̤i akaɓanikanɡ̤a pʰakatʰi kwaz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakajɔsɛfu ɓaɓɛz̤iz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤iɓini umanasɛ nɔɛfrajim kɛ aɓalɛv̤i aɓaɓanikanɡ̤a saɓɛlɔ ɛz̤wɛni ɛlɔ ɓaɓanika kupʰɛla imiz̤i jɔkuɬala namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ ɛmfujɔ jaɓɔ nɛmpaɬa jaɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wamwisɛlajɔ umɔsɛs umtʰɛtʰɔ ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓalaɓa iliz̤wɛ ɓasɔnd̤ɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a kujɔʃuwa ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali watʰi ukalɛb̤i uɲana kajɛfunɛ umkɛnaz̤i kujɛ ujalaz̤i wɛna iliz̤wi awalitʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kumɔsɛs katʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɔ ɛkad̤ɛʃɛb̤arnɛha nd̤and̤imiɲaka imaʃumi manɛ nd̤iz̤ɛlwɛ ɛkususwɛni nɡ̤umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a ɛkad̤ɛʃɛb̤arnɛha ukuɓa nd̤ɛjɛ kuliɬɔla iliz̤wɛ nd̤amɓujisɛla iliz̤wi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓɛkusɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam aɓaz̤alwana ɓam aɓaɲukajɔ ɓajiɲiɓilikisa intliz̤ijɔ jaɓantu kɛ nd̤akuz̤alisa ukumland̤ɛla ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wafunɡ̤a kɛ umɔsɛs nɡ̤alɔɔ ɛsitʰi inɛnɛ iliz̤wɛ ɛliɲatʰɛlwɛ luɲawɔ lwakʰɔ lɔɓa lakʰɔ nɛlɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukuz̤alisilɛ ukumland̤ɛla ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kʰanɡ̤ɛla kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a und̤isind̤isilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wat͡ʃɔjɔ lɛ miɲaka imaʃumi manɛ anamiɬanu kususɛla kɔkɔ walitʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛlɔ liz̤wi kumɔsɛs ɔkɔ amasirajɛli aɓɛhamɓa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jaɓɔna kɛ nɡ̤ɔku nam̤la nd̤imiɲaka imaʃumi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anamiɬanu nd̤iz̤ɛlwɛ nd̤isɔmɛlɛlɛ nanam̤la kwand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amini wand̤itʰumajɔ umɔsɛs nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ajɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ amanɮa ɔkɔ asɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ nanɡ̤ɔku amanɮa ɔkulwa kwaawɔkupʰuma nawɔkuɓuja kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤inikɛ ɛz̤ɔ ntaɓa watʰɛtʰa z̤ɔna ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤alɔɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛv̤a wɛna nɡ̤alɔɔ ukuɓa amaanaki akʰɔna imiz̤i jawɔ mikʰulu iŋǃatʲisiwɛ m̤lawumɓi ujɛhɔv̤a wɔɓa nd̤iwaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤ɛ kɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wat͡ʃɔjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ujɔʃuwa wamsikɛlɛla ihɛɓrɔn ukalɛb̤i uɲana kajɛfunɛ ukuɓa iɓɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ihɛɓrɔn jaɓa likakalɛb̤i uɲana kajɛfunɛ umkɛnaz̤i unanam̤la nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa waz̤alisajɔ ukumland̤ɛla ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli iɡ̤ama lasɛhɛɓrɔn nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɡ̤apʰamɓili lalijikirijati kaarb̤a ɔmkʰulu pʰakatʰi kwamaanaki kɛ laz̤ɔla iliz̤wɛ akwaɓakʰɔ mfaz̤wɛ kɛ kalɔku ikǃaʃisɔ lwɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ lasinɡ̤a ɛmd̤ɛni wakwaɛd̤ɔm ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jɛt͡sin nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si ɛkupʰɛlɛni kɔmz̤ant͡si umd̤a waɓɔ wasɛz̤ant͡si watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkupʰɛlɛni kɔlwanɮɛ lwɛtʲuwa ɛŋǀamini ɛb̤ɛka ɛz̤ant͡si wapʰuma wasinɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛz̤ant͡si ɛkuɲukɛni kwɛak͡xab̤im wɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa waja ɛt͡sin wɛɲuka waja nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si kwɛkad̤ɛʃɛb̤arnɛha wɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa waja ɛhɛt͡sɛrɔn wɛɲuka waja ɛad̤arɛ wad͡ʒ̤ika waja ɛkarka wɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa waja ɛat͡sɛmɔn wɛma nɡ̤ɔmland͡ʒ̤ana wasɛjiputa kɔmd̤a wɛma nɡ̤ɔlwanɮɛ nɡ̤uwɔ lɔwɔ umd̤a wɛnu wanɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si umd̤a wasɛmpumalanɡ̤a lulwanɮɛ lwɛtʲuwa usɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛjɔrd̤an umd̤a wɛkǀala lanɡ̤asɛntla watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛŋǀamini jɔlwanɮɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛjɔrd̤an wɛɲuka umd̤a waja ɛb̤ɛtɛhɔɡ̤ɛla wɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa waja ɛmantla ɛb̤ɛtɛarab̤a wad͡ʒ̤ika umd̤a waja ɛtʲɛni likab̤ɔhan uɲana karub̤ɛn wɛɲuka umd̤a waja ɛd̤ɛb̤iri uv̤ɛla ɛntilini jɛakɔrɛ wab̤ɛka ɛntla ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali malunɡ̤a nɔkuɲuka kwɛad̤umin nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si kɔmland͡ʒ̤ana wɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa apʰɔ waja ɛmanz̤ini asɛɛnʃɛmɛʃɛ kwawɔ wɛma nɡ̤ɛɛnrɔɡ̤ɛlɛ wɛɲuka umd̤a nɡ̤ɔmfula wɔɔɲana ɓakahinɔm waja ɛɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓɛni lɔwamajɛb̤usi nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si jijɛrusalɛm kɛ lɛjɔ wɛɲuka umd̤a waja ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛntaɓa ɛpʰamɓi kɔmfula wakwahinɔm nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a ɔsɛkupʰɛkɛni kwɛntili jamarafa nɡ̤asɛntla waɬaɓa umd̤a watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛntaɓa waja ɛmtʰɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛni wamanz̤i asɛnɛfɛtɔwa wapʰuma waja ɛmiz̤ini jasɛntaɓɛni kaɛfrɔn waɬaɓa waja ɛb̤ahala jikirijatijɛharim kɛ lɛjɔ wad͡ʒ̤ika umd̤a ɛb̤ahala nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a waja ɛntaɓɛni jakwasɛhirɛ wɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa waja ɛɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓɛni lɛharjɛharim nɡ̤asɛntla jikɛsalɔn kɛ lɛjɔ wɛɬa waja ɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ wɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa waja ɛtimna wapʰuma umd̤a waja ɛɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓɛni lɛɛk͡xɔn nɡ̤asɛntla waɬaɓa umd̤a waja ɛʃik͡xɔn wɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa waja ɛntaɓɛni jɛb̤ahala wɛma nɡ̤ɛjab̤ɛnɛli umd̤a waja wɛma nɡ̤ɔlwanɮɛ umd̤a wasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a lulwanɮɛ ɔlukʰulu nɔmmanɮa walɔ nɡ̤uwɔ lɔwɔ umd̤a wɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ ukalɛb̤i uɲana kajɛfunɛ isaɓɛlɔ pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a nɡ̤ɔkut͡ʃɔ kukajɛhɔv̤a kujɔʃuwa umz̤i kaarb̤a ujisɛ kaanaki nɡ̤ɔwasɛhɛɓrɔn kɛ lɔwɔ waɓaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤a apʰɔ ukalɛb̤i ɔɔɲana ɓɔɓatʰatʰu ɓakaanaki uʃɛʃaji nɔahiman nɔtalɛmaji inz̤alɔ kaanaki wɛɲuka kʰɔna waja kuɓɛmi ɓasɛd̤ɛb̤iri iɡ̤ama lɛd̤ɛb̤iri lalijikirijatisɛfɛrɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɡ̤apʰamɓili watʰi ukalɛb̤i ɔtʰɛ wajiɓulala ikirijatisɛfɛrɛ wajitʰimɓa nd̤ɔmnika intɔmɓi jam uakɛsa iɓɛ nɡ̤umkakʰɛ wajitʰimɓa uɔtɛnijɛli uɲana kakɛnaz̤i umz̤alwana kakalɛb̤i kɛ intɔmɓi jakʰɛ uakɛsa janɡ̤umkakʰɛ kwatʰi ɛkuz̤ɛni kwajɔ jamv̤usɛlɛla ukuɓa akǀɛlɛ um̤laɓa kujisɛ wajɔ jɛɬa ɛɛsilɛni lajɔ watʰi ukalɛb̤i kujɔ jintɔni jatʰi nd̤inikɛ intɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa und̤inikɛ um̤laɓa ɔnɡ̤ɛnamanz̤i nd̤inikɛ nɛmitʰɔmɓɔ jamanz̤i wajinika kɛ imitʰɔmɓɔ jasɛntla nɛmitʰɔmɓɔ jasɛz̤ant͡si lilɔ ɛlɔ lɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ imiz̤i ɛtʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a jɛsa ɛmd̤ɛni wakwaɛd̤ɔm ɛz̤ant͡si jaɓɛ ijikab̤ɛt͡sɛli nɛɛd̤ɛrɛ nɛjaɡ̤urɛ nɛkina nɛd̤imɔna nɛad̤ad̤a nɛkɛd̤ɛʃɛ nɛhat͡sɔrɛ nɛitɛnan iz̤ifi nɛtɛlɛm nɛb̤ɛhalɔti nɛhat͡sɔrɛhad̤ata nɛkɛrijɔtihɛt͡sɛrɔn jihat͡sɔrɛ kɛ lɛjɔ iamam nɛʃɛma nɛmɔlad̤a nɛhat͡sarɛɡ̤ad̤a nɛhɛʃmɔn nɛb̤ɛtɛpalɛtɛ nɛhat͡sarɛʃuwalɛ nɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a nɛb̤iz̤ijɔtɛja ib̤ahala nɛijim nɛɛt͡sɛm nɛɛlitɔlad̤i nɛkɛz̤ili nɛhɔrma nɛt͡sikɛlaɡ̤ɛ nɛmad̤ɛmana nɛsanɛsana nɛlɛb̤awɔti nɛʃilɛhim nɛajin nɛrimɔn jɔnkɛ lɔɔ miz̤i imaʃumi maɓini anɛsitʰɔɓa nɛmiz̤ana jajɔ ɛsiɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni jiɛʃtawɔli nɛt͡sɔra nɛaʃna nɛz̤anɔwa nɛɛnɡ̤anim itapuwa nɛɛnam ijarmuti nɛad̤ulam isɔkɔ nɛaz̤ɛka nɛʃaharim nɛad̤itajim nɛɡ̤ɛd̤ɛra nɛɡ̤ɛd̤ɛrɔtajim imiz̤i ɛliʃumi ɛlinaminɛ inɛmiz̤ana jajɔ it͡sɛnan nɛhad̤aʃa nɛmiɡ̤ɛd̤ali jakwaɡ̤ad̤i nɛd̤ilan nɛmiz̤pa nɛjɔkɛtɛli ilakiʃɛ nɛb̤it͡sɛkati nɛɛɡ̤lɔn nɛkab̤ɔn nɛlamasi nɛkitiliʃɛ nɛɡ̤ɛd̤ɛrɔti ib̤ɛtɛd̤aɡ̤ɔn nɛnahama nɛmakɛd̤a imiz̤i ɛliʃumi ɛlinamitʰand̤atʰu inɛmiz̤ana jajɔ ilib̤ɛna nɛɛtɛrɛ nɛaʃan nɛifɛta nɛaʃna nɛnɛt͡sib̤i nɛkɛhila nɛakɛz̤ib̤i nɛmarɛʃa imiz̤i ɛsitʰɔɓa inɛmiz̤ana jajɔ iɛk͡xɔn namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ nɛmiz̤ana jajɔ kwatʰaɓatʰɛla ɛɛk͡xɔn nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnaɡ̤anɡ̤a jɔnkɛ ɛsɛkǀalɛni lɛaʃd̤ɔd̤ɛ nɛmiz̤ana jajɔ iaʃd̤ɔd̤ɛ namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ nɛmiz̤ana jajɔ iɡ̤az̤a namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ nɛmiz̤ana jajɔ kwɛsa kumland͡ʒ̤ana wɛjiputa nɔlwanɮɛ ɔlukʰulu nɔmmanɮa walɔ ɛsɛz̤intaɓɛni jiʃamirɛ nɛjatirɛ nɛsɔkɔ nɛd̤ana nɛkirijatisana jid̤ɛb̤iri kɛ lɛjɔ nɛanab̤i nɛɛʃtɛmɔ nɛanim nɛɡ̤ɔʃɛn nɛhɔlɔn nɛɡ̤ilɔ imiz̤i ɛliʃumi ɛlinamɲɛ inɛmiz̤ana jajɔ iarab̤i nɛd̤uma nɛɛʃan nɛjanim nɛb̤ɛtɛtapuwa nɛafɛka nɛhumta nɛkirijati kaarb̤a jihɛɓrɔn kɛ lɛjɔ nɛt͡sihɔrɛ imiz̤i ɛsitʰɔɓa inɛmiz̤ana jajɔ imahɔn ikarmɛlɛ nɛz̤ifi nɛjuta nɛjiz̤ɛrɛli nɛjɔkɛd̤am nɛz̤anɔwa ikajin iɡ̤ib̤ɛha nɛtimna imiz̤i ɛliʃumi inɛmiz̤ana jajɔ ihalɛhulɛ ib̤ɛtɛt͡surɛ nɛɡ̤ɛd̤ɔrɛ nɛmaharati nɛb̤ɛtɛanɔti nɛɛlitɛkɔn imiz̤i ɛmitʰand̤atʰu inɛmiz̤ana jajɔ ikirijatib̤ahali jikirijatijɛharim kɛ lɛjɔ nɛrab̤a imiz̤i ɛmiɓini inɛmiz̤ana jajɔ ɛsɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jib̤ɛtɛarab̤a imid̤in nɛsɛkaka nɛnib̤ɛʃan nɔmz̤i wɛtʲuwa nɛɛnɡ̤ɛd̤i imiz̤i ɛmitʰand̤atʰu inɛmiz̤ana jajɔ kɛ amajɛb̤usi aɓɛnɡ̤aɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm aɓaɓanɡ̤a nakɔ ukuwaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a aɬala amajɛb̤usi nɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm nanam̤la lapʰuma ikǃaʃisɔ nɔɔɲana ɓakajɔsɛfu latʰaɓatʰɛla ɛjɔrd̤an malunɡ̤a nɛjɛrikɔ nɡ̤asɛmanz̤ini asɛjɛrikɔ nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a kwintlanɡ̤ɔ ɛɲuka ɛjɛrikɔ ɛja ɛz̤intaɓɛni nɡ̤asɛb̤ɛtɛli wapʰuma umd̤a ɛb̤ɛtɛli wasinɡ̤a ɛluz̤i wɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa waja ɛmd̤ɛni wamaarki ɛatarɔti wɛɬa waja ɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a ɛmd̤ɛni wamajafɛlɛli wɛsa ɛmd̤ɛni wɛb̤ɛtɛhɔrɔn jasɛz̤ant͡si wɛsa ɛɡ̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ kwawɔ waja wɛma nɡ̤ɔlwanɮɛ ɓalaɓɛlwa kɛ laɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakajɔsɛfu umanasɛ nɔɛfrajim umd̤a wɔɔɲana ɓakaɛfrajim wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ umd̤a wɛlifa laɓɔ nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a wajiatarɔtiad̤arɛ wɛsa ɛb̤ɛtɛhɔrɔn ɛnɡ̤asɛntla wapʰuma umd̤a waja ɛlwanɮɛ ɛmikɛmɛtati nɡ̤asɛntla wad͡ʒ̤ika umd̤a waja ɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɛtahanatiʃilɔ wɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa kʰɔna nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɛjanɔwa wɛɬa ɛjanɔwa waja ɛatarɔti nasɛnaharati wɛz̤a ɛjɛrikɔ wɛma nɡ̤ɛjɔrd̤an umd̤a wɛsuka ɛtapuwa waja ɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni wɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ nɔkuma kwawɔ waja wɛma nɡ̤ɔlwanɮɛ lilɔ ɛlɔ lɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakaɛfrajim nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ nɛmiz̤i lɛjɔ jaɬulɛlwa ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛfrajim jajipʰakatʰi kwɛlifa lɔɔɲana ɓakamanasɛ jɔnkɛ imiz̤i jajinɛmiz̤ana jajɔ aɓawaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤anɡ̤a amakanan aɓɛmi ɛɡ̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ ɛma amakanan pʰakatʰi kwamaɛfrajim unanam̤la akʰɔnz̤a ɛfakwa uv̤ikɔ saɓa nɛkǃaʃisɔ nasɔ isiz̤wɛ sakwamanasɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ kujɔsɛfu laɓa nɔmakirɛ ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ kumanasɛ laɓa nɔjisɛ kaɡ̤ilijad̤i laɓa najɛ ɛlasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i nɛlasɛb̤aʃan kuɓa ɛɓɛjind̤ɔd̤a jɔkulwa laɓa naɓaɲɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakamanasɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ laɓa nɔɔɲana ɓakaab̤ihɛz̤ɛrɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakahɛlɛki nɔɔɲana ɓakaasɛrijɛli nɔɔɲana ɓakaʃɛkɛm nɔɔɲana ɓakahɛfɛrɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakaʃɛmid̤a nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ aɓantwana aɓanɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a ɓakamanasɛ uɲana kajɔsɛfu nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ kɛ ut͡sɛlɔfɛhad̤ɛ uɲana kahɛfɛrɛ uɲana kaɡ̤ilijad̤i uɲana kamakirɛ uɲana kamanasɛ ɛɓɛnɡ̤ɛnaɲana ɛɓɛnɛɛntɔmɓi z̤ɔd̤wa nɡ̤awɔ amaɡ̤ama ɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ umala nɔnɔha nɔhɔɡ̤ɛla nɛmilka nɔtirt͡sa z̤asɔnd̤ɛla pʰamɓi kɔɛlaz̤arɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli napʰamɓi kɔjɔʃuwa uɲana kanun napʰamɓi kwɛz̤ikʰulu z̤atʰi ujɛhɔv̤a wamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ umɔsɛs ukuɓa asinikɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓaz̤alwana ɓɛtʰu waz̤inika kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔmlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a pʰakatʰi kwaɓaz̤alwana ɓakajisɛ z̤aɓa liʃumi kɛ iz̤aɓɛlɔ kumanasɛ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛliz̤wɛ lasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i nɛb̤aʃan ɛpʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iintɔmɓi z̤ikamanasɛ z̤aɓɛlwa pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ latʰi nɛliz̤wɛ lasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i laɓa lɛlaɓaɲɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakamanasɛ umd̤a kamanasɛ watʰaɓatʰɛla kwaaʃɛrɛ waja ɛmikɛmɛtati ɛpʰamɓi kɔwakwaʃɛkɛm wahamɓa umd̤a nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ waja kuɓɛmi ɓasɛɛntapuwa umanasɛ waɓa nɛliz̤wɛ lasɛtapuwa kɛ itapuwa nɡ̤asɛmd̤ɛni wakwamanasɛ jaɓa jɛjɔɲana ɓakaɛfrajim wɛɬa umd̤a waja ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni wɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ ɛz̤ant͡si kɔmland͡ʒ̤ana lɛ miz̤i ilunɡ̤ɛ kuɛfrajim jaɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛmiz̤i kamanasɛ nɔmmanɮa wakwamanasɛ wawunɡ̤asɛntla kɔmland͡ʒ̤ana kwawɔ waja wɛma nɡ̤ɔlwanɮɛ nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si laɓa lɛlikaɛfrajim nɡ̤asɛntla laɓa lɛlikamanasɛ ulwanɮɛ lwaɓa nɡ̤umd̤a wakʰɛ ɓakǃuɓisana nɔaʃɛrɛ nɡ̤asɛntla ɓakǃuɓisana nɔisakarɛ nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a kwaisakarɛ nakwaaʃɛrɛ umanasɛ waɓa nɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛhan namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ nɛiɓlɛjam namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ naɓɛmi ɓasɛd̤ɔrɛ namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ naɓɛmi ɓasɛɛnd̤ɔrɛ namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ naɓɛmi ɓasɛtahanaki namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ naɓɛmi ɓasɛmɛɡ̤id̤ɔ namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ ummanɮa ɔnd̤uli z̤intatʰu ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɛnakɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakamanasɛ akujiɬutʰa lɔɔ miz̤i amakanan akupʰikɛla lwɛlɔ z̤wɛ kwatʰi ɓakɔmɛlɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓawafaka uv̤ikɔ amakanan aɓawaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤a kupʰɛlɛ ɓatʰɛtʰa ɔɔɲana ɓakajɔsɛfu nɔjɔʃuwa ɓɛsitʰi jini ukuɓa usinikɛ lakǃaʃisɔ liɲɛ nasaɓɛlɔ siɲɛ sinɡ̤aɓantu aɓaninz̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɛsisikɛlɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a kanɡ̤akanana unanɡ̤ɔku watʰi ujɔʃuwa kuɓɔ ukuɓa ninɡ̤aɓantu aɓaninz̤i ɲukani nijɛ ɛmaɬatʰini niz̤iɬaɬɛlɛ ɛz̤wɛni lamapɛriz̤i nɛlamarafa kǁa kukǁinɛnɛjɔ ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwaɛfrajim ɓatʰi ɔɔɲana ɓakajɔsɛfu iliz̤wɛ ɛli lɛɛntaɓa alisilinɡ̤ɛnɛ kɛ z̤iiŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɛsiɲitʰi kumakanan ɔnkɛ amijɔ ɛz̤wɛni lamatʰafa asɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛhan namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ kwanasɛmatʰafɛni asɛjiz̤ɛrɛli watʰi ujɔʃuwa kwinɮu kajɔsɛfu kuɛfrajim nakumanasɛ ninɡ̤aɓantu aɓaninz̤i ninamanɮa amakʰulu aliji kuɓa liɲɛ ikǃaʃisɔ lɛnu kuɓa ɛlɛɛntaɓa lija kuɓa lɛlɛnu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa linɡ̤amaɬatʰi nɔwa ɬaɬa iiɲɛlɛ z̤awɔ z̤iɓɛ z̤ɛz̤ɛnu kuɓa nija kuwaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤a amakanan nakuɓa ɛnɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɛsiɲitʰi nakuɓa ɔmɛlɛlɛ laɓiz̤ɛlwa nd̤awɔɲɛ lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa lakwasirajɛli ɛʃilɔ ɓajimisa kʰɔna intɛntɛ jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana lɛjisɛka iliz̤wɛ pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ kwasala pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli iz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛz̤inɡ̤aɓɛlwanɡ̤a laz̤ɔ watʰi ujɔʃuwa kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kɔd̤a kuɓɛ nikuŋǃɛna ukuja kuliɬutʰa ɛlɔ z̤wɛ aninikɛ lɔna ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjiɬɔ kʰupʰani amad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛ matʰatʰu ɛsiz̤wɛni nɡ̤ɛsiz̤wɛ nd̤iwatʰumɛ asukɛ akǀand̤ɛ ɛz̤wɛni alib̤alɛ nɡ̤ɔkwamafa az̤ɔ az̤ɛ aɓujɛlɛ alaɓɛ liɓɛ z̤iz̤aɓɛlɔ ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ujud̤a ɛmɛ ɛmd̤ɛni wakʰɛ nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si inɮu kajɔsɛfu imɛ ɛmd̤ɛni wajɔ nɡ̤asɛntla nina kɛ nilib̤alɛ iliz̤wɛ lɛz̤aɓɛlɔ ɛz̤ɔ z̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nijiz̤isɛ iŋ̤ǁ̤ɛlɔ apʰa nd̤iniwisɛlɛ amakǃaʃisɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu apʰa kuɓa aɓalɛv̤i aɓanasaɓɛlɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛnu kuɓa laɓɔ ɓuɓuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a kɛ uɡ̤ad̤i nɔrub̤ɛn nɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsiz̤wɛ sikamanasɛ ɓasɛɓɛlitʰaɓatʰilɛ laɓɔ awaɓanika lɔna umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a pʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a asuka kɛ amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ ahamɓa ujɔʃuwa waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ aɓɔ ɓahamɓajɔ ɓɛja kulib̤ala iliz̤wɛ ɛsitʰi jijani nilihamɓɛ iliz̤wɛ nilib̤alɛ niz̤ɛ niɓujɛlɛ nd̤iniwisɛlɛ amakǃaʃisɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɛʃilɔ apʰa aja kɛ amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ akǀand̤a ɛz̤wɛni apʰɔ alib̤ala nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤i nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤aɓɛlɔ ɛz̤i sikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini ɛz̤a kɛ kujɔʃuwa ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni ɛʃilɔ waz̤a ujɔʃuwa wawawisɛla amakǃaʃisɔ ɛʃilɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ujɔʃuwa waɓaɓɛla iliz̤wɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kʰɔna nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛntlantlu z̤aɓɔ kwav̤ɛla ikǃaʃisɔ lɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ umd̤a wɛkǃaʃisɔ laɓɔ wapʰuma pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a nɔɔɲana ɓakajɔsɛfu umd̤a waɓɔ nɡ̤asɛkǀalɛni lasɛntla watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛjɔrd̤an wɛɲuka waja ɛɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓɛni lasɛjɛrikɔ nɡ̤asɛntla wɛɲuka waja ɛz̤intaɓɛni nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a kwawɔ waja wɛma nɡ̤ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛb̤ɛtav̤ɛn wɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa umd̤a kʰɔna waja ɛluz̤i ɛɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓɛni lɛluz̤i nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si jib̤ɛtɛli kɛ lɛjɔ wɛɬa umd̤a waja ɛatarɔtiad̤arɛ nɡ̤asɛz̤intaɓɛni ɛz̤inɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si kwɛb̤ɛtɛhɔrɔn jasɛz̤ant͡si waɬaɓa umd̤a wad͡ʒ̤ika waja ɛkǀalɛni lasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si ɛntaɓɛni ɛpʰamɓi kwɛb̤ɛtɛhɔrɔn nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si kwawɔ waja wɛma nɡ̤ɛkirijatib̤ahali jikirijatijɛharim kɛ lɛjɔ umz̤i wɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a lilɔ ɛlɔ ikǀala lasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a ikǀala lasɛz̤ant͡si latʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛkirijatijɛharim wapʰuma umd̤a ɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a wapʰuma waja ɛmtʰɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛni wamanz̤i asɛnɛfɛtɔwa wɛɬa umd̤a waja ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛntaɓa ɛpʰamɓi kɔmfula wɔɔɲana kahinɔm ɔsɛntilini jamarafa nɡ̤asɛntla wɛɬa nɡ̤ɔmfula wakwahinɔm waja ɛɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓɛni lamajɛb̤usi nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si wɛɬa waja ɛɛnrɔɡ̤ɛlɛ waɬaɓa uv̤ɛla ɛntla wapʰuma waja ɛɛnʃɛmɛʃɛ wapʰuma waja ɛɡ̤ɛlilɔti ɛmalunɡ̤a nɔkuɲuka kwɛad̤umim wɛɬa waja ɛtʲɛni likab̤ɔhan uɲana karub̤ɛn wɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa waja ɛɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓɛni ɛlimalunɡ̤a nɛarab̤a ɛntla wɛɬa waja ɛarab̤a wɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa umd̤a waja ɛɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓɛni lasɛb̤ɛtɛhɔɡ̤ɛla ɛntla kɔmd̤a waja wɛma nɡ̤ɛkǀʰwɛɓa lɔlwanɮɛ lwɛtʲuwa ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛjɔrd̤an nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si nɡ̤uwɔ lɔwɔ umd̤a wasɛz̤ant͡si ijɔrd̤an iɓɛ inɡ̤umd̤a walɔ nɡ̤ɛkǀala lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a lilɔ ɛlɔ lɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤ɔkwɛmid̤a jalɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ kɛ imiz̤i jɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ iɓɛ ijijɛrikɔ nɛb̤ɛtɛhɔɡ̤ɛla nɛntili jasɛkɛt͡sit͡sɛ nɛb̤ɛtɛarab̤a nɛt͡sɛmarajim nɛb̤ɛtɛli nɛav̤im nɛpara nɛɔfra nɛkɛfaramɔni nɛɔfɛni nɛɡ̤ab̤a imiz̤i ɛliʃumi ɛlinamiɓini inɛmiz̤ana jajɔ iɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn nɛrama nɛb̤ɛhɛrɔti nɛmiz̤pa nɛkɛfira nɛmɔt͡sa nɛrɛkɛm nɛirpɛli nɛtarala nɛt͡sɛla nɛɛlɛfɛ nɔwamajɛb̤usi jijɛrusalɛm kɛ lɛjɔ nɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha nɛkirijati imiz̤i ɛliʃumi ɛlinamiɓini inɛmiz̤ana jajɔ lilɔ kɛ ɛlɔ lɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ lav̤ɛla ikǃaʃisɔ lɛsiɓini nɔsimɔn nɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakasimɔn nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ ilifa laɓɔ laɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛlifa lɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a ɛlifɛni laɓɔ ɓaɓa nɛb̤ɛrʃɛɓa nɛʃɛb̤a nɛmulad̤a nɛhat͡sɛrɛʃuwali nɛb̤ala nɛat͡sɛm nɛɛlɛtɔlad̤i nɛb̤ɛtuli nɛhɔrma nɛt͡sikɛlaɡ̤ɛ nɛb̤ɛtɛmarkab̤ɔti nɛhat͡sarsusa nɛb̤ɛtɛlɛb̤awɔti nɛʃaruhɛn imiz̤i ɛliʃumi ɛlinamitʰatʰu inɛmiz̤ana jajɔ iajin nɛrimɔn nɛɛtɛrɛ nɛaʃan imiz̤i ɛminɛ inɛmiz̤ana jajɔ nɛmiz̤ana jɔnkɛ ɛd͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ɛ lɔɔ miz̤i kwɛsa ɛb̤ahalatib̤ɛrɛ jirama jɛlasɛz̤ant͡si kɛ lɛjɔ lilɔ ɛlɔ lɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakasimɔn nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ laɓa sɛsaɓɛlwɛni sɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a lɔɔɲana ɓakasimɔn nɡ̤ɔkuɓa isaɓɛlɔ sɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a saɓaɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa ɔɔɲana ɓakasimɔn ɓaɓɛlwa pʰakatʰi kwɛlifa laɓɔ lav̤ɛla ikǃaʃisɔ lɛsitʰatʰu nɔɔɲana ɓakaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ umd̤a wɛlifa laɓɔ wɛsa ɛsarid̤i wɛɲuka umd̤a waɓɔ wasinɡ̤a ɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a wɛsa ɛmarala wafikɛlɛla ɛd̤ab̤ɛʃɛti waɬanɡ̤ana nɔmland͡ʒ̤ana ɔkʰanɡ̤ɛlɛnɛ nɛjɔkɛnɛham waɓuja ɛsarid̤i wasinɡ̤a ɛmpumalanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛkǀala ɛlipʰuma ilanɡ̤a waja ɛmd̤ɛni wɛkisɛlɔtitab̤ɔrɛ wapʰuma waja ɛd̤ab̤ɛrati wɛɲuka waja ɛjafija wɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa kʰɔna wasinɡ̤a ɛmpumalanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛkǀala ɛlipʰuma ilanɡ̤a waja ɛɡ̤atihɛfɛrɛ ɛɛtikat͡sin wapʰuma waja ɛrimɔn ɛɬaɓa ijɛ ɛnɛha umd̤a wajiz̤unɡ̤ulɛz̤a nɡ̤asɛntla waja ɛhanatɔn kwawɔ wɛma nɡ̤ɔmfula wasɛifɛtaɛli nɛkatati nɛnahalali nɛʃimrɔn nɛid̤ala nɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm imiz̤i ɛliʃumi ɛlinamiɓini inɛmiz̤ana jajɔ lilɔ ɛlɔ lɔɔɲana ɓakaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ lɔɔ miz̤i nɛmiz̤ana jajɔ ikǃaʃisɔ lɛsinɛ lav̤ɛla nɔisakarɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakaisakarɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ umd̤a waɓɔ wasinɡ̤a kwijiz̤ɛrɛli nɛkɛsulɔti nɛʃunɛm nɛhafarajim nɛʃihɔn nɛanaharati nɛrab̤iti nɛkiʃijɔn nɛab̤ɛt͡sɛ nɛrɛmɛti nɛɛnɡ̤anim nɛɛn̤ad̤a nɛb̤ɛtɛpat͡sɛt͡sɛ umd̤a wafikɛlɛla ɛtab̤ɔrɛ nasɛʃahat͡sima nasɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ kɔmd̤a waɓɔ waja wɛma nɡ̤ɛjɔrd̤an imiz̤i ɛliʃumi ɛlinamitʰand̤atʰu ɛnimiz̤ana jajɔ lilɔ ɛlɔ lɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakaisakarɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ lɔɔ miz̤i nɛmiz̤ana jajɔ lav̤ɛla ikǃaʃisɔ lɛsiɬanu nɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakaaʃɛrɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ umd̤a waɓɔ waɓa jihɛlɛkati nɛhali nɛb̤ɛtɛn nɛakɛʃafi nɛalamɛlɛki nɛamad̤i nɛmiʃali wafikɛlɛla ɛkarmɛlɛ nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a nɛʃihɔrɛlib̤ɛnati waɓuja wasinɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛkǀala ɛlipʰuma ilanɡ̤a ɛb̤ɛtɛd̤aɡ̤ɔn wafikɛlɛla kwɛlakwaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn wasɛifɛtaɛli nɡ̤asɛntla kwɛb̤ɛtɛɛmɛki nɛnɛhijɛli wapʰuma waja ɛkab̤uli nɡ̤asɛkʰɔɬɔ nɛhɛɓrɔn nɛrɛhɔb̤i nɛhamɔn nɛkana wɛsa ɛt͡sid̤ɔn ɛnkulu waɓuja umd̤a waja ɛrama wɛsa ɛmz̤ini ɔŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ ɔjitirɛ waɓuja umd̤a waja ɛhɔsa kwawɔ waja wɛma nɡ̤ɔlwanɮɛ nɡ̤asɛsaɓɛlwɛni sikaakɛz̤ib̤ɛ nɛuma nɛafɛki nɛrɛhɔb̤i imiz̤i ɛmaʃumi maɓini anamiɓini inɛmiz̤ana jajɔ lilɔ ɛlɔ lɔɔɲana ɓakaaʃɛrɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ lɔɔ miz̤i nɛmiz̤ana jajɔ lav̤ɛla ikǃaʃisɔ lɛsitʰand̤atʰu nɔɔɲana ɓakanafɛtali ilɛlɔɔɲana ɓakanafɛtali nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ umd̤a waɓɔ watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛhɛlɛfɛ ɛmiɔkini jasɛt͡sahanajim nɛad̤aminɛkɛb̤ɛ nɛjab̤ɛnɛli wɛsa ɛlakum nɔkuma kwawɔ wɛma nɡ̤ɛjɔrd̤an waɓuja umd̤a wasinɡ̤a ɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a ɛaz̤ɛnɔtitab̤ɔrɛ wapʰuma kʰɔna waja ɛhukɔki wafikɛlɛla kwɛlakwaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si wafikɛlɛla kwɛlakwaaʃɛrɛ nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a nɛlakwajud̤a ɛjɔrd̤an nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a imiz̤i ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ jaɓa jit͡sid̤im nɛt͡sɛrɛ nɛhamati nɛrakati nɛkinɛrɛtɛ nɛad̤ama nɛrama nɛhat͡sɔrɛ nɛkɛd̤ɛʃɛ nɛɛd̤rɛji nɛɛn̤at͡sɔrɛ nɛirɔn nɛmiɡ̤d̤aliɛli nɛhɔrɛm nɛb̤ɛtɛanati nɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ imiz̤i ɛliʃumi ɛlinɛsitʰɔɓa inɛmiz̤ana jajɔ lilɔ ɛlɔ lɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakanafɛtali nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ lɔɔ miz̤i nɛmiz̤ana jajɔ lav̤ɛla ikǃaʃisɔ lɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakad̤an nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ umd̤a wɛlifa laɓɔ waɓa jit͡sɔra nɛɛʃtawɔli nɛirɛʃɛmɛʃɛ nɛʃahalab̤in nɛajalɔn nɛitɛla nɛɛlɔn nɛtimnata nɛɛk͡xɔn nɛɛlɛtɛkɛ nɛɡ̤ib̤ɛtɔn nɛb̤ahalata nɛjɛhud̤i nɛb̤ɛnɛb̤ɛraki nɛɡ̤atirimɔn nɛmɛjarkɔn nɛrakɔn kuɲɛ nɔmd̤a ɔmalunɡ̤a nɛjafɔ umd̤a wɔɔɲana ɓakad̤an wɛma nɡ̤ajɔ ɓɛɲuka kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakad̤an ɓaja nɛlɛʃɛm ɓajitʰimɓa ɓajiɓulala nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ ɓajiɬutʰa ɓɛma kujɔ ɓatʰi ukujiɓiz̤a ilɛʃɛm kukwad̤an nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama likad̤an ujisɛ lilɔ ɛlɔ lɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakad̤an nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ lɔɔ miz̤i inɛmiz̤ana jajɔ ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa kɛ ukulaɓa iliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmid̤a jaɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓamnika ujɔʃuwa uɲana kanun pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔmlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɓamnika umz̤i awawuɓiz̤ajɔ itimnatisɛra ɛkwɛlɛɛntaɓa lakwaɛfrajim wawakʰa lɔɔ mz̤i waɬala kuwɔ nɡ̤awɔ lawɔ aɓawaɓajɔ ɔɔɛlaz̤arɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɔjɔʃuwa uɲana kanun nɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤amakǃaʃisɔ ɛʃilɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛntɛntɛ jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa kɛ ukulaɓa iliz̤wɛ watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kujɔʃuwa ɛsitʰi tʰɛtʰa kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli utʰi z̤imisɛlɛni imiz̤i jɔkusaɓɛla ɛnd̤atʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɔmɔsɛs ukuɓa aɓalɛkɛlɛ kujɔ umɓulali ɔɓulɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔz̤i ɛnɡ̤az̤i iɓɛ z̤iind̤awɔ z̤ɛnu ɛnɔɓalɛkɛla kuz̤ɔ ukusaɓa umpʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlɛli wɛɡ̤az̤i aɓalɛkɛlɛ kɔmɲɛ walɔɔ miz̤i ɛmɛ ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɔmz̤i awatʰɛtʰɛ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu alɔɔ mz̤i amaz̤wi akʰɛ amamkɛlɛlɛ kulɔɔ mz̤i aɓɛ kuwɔ amnikɛ ind̤awɔ ukuɓa aɬalɛ nawɔ ɔtʰi kǁɛnikwɛni umpʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlɛli wɛɡ̤az̤i amsukɛlajɔ anɡ̤amnikɛli umɓulali ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wamɓulala ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ ɛnɡ̤az̤i ɛɓɛnɡ̤amtʰijilɛ nɡ̤apʰamɓili wɔɬala kulɔɔ mz̤i ad̤ɛ ɛmɛ pʰamɓi kwɛɓanɮa litʰɛtʰwɛ itʲala lakʰɛ ad̤ɛ afɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔmkʰulu ɔja kuɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤ɔ and̤ulɛ umɓulali ukuɓujɛla ɛmz̤ini wakɔwaɓɔ nasɛnɮwini jakʰɛ ɛmz̤ini aɓɛɓalɛkɛ ɛkuwɔ ɓaŋ̤ǀ̤walisa kɛ ikɛd̤ɛʃɛ ɛɡ̤alili ɛkwɛlɛɛntaɓa lakwanafɛtali nɛlakwaʃɛkɛm kwɛlɛɛntaɓa lakwaɛfrajim nɛkirijati kaarb̤a nɡ̤ɔwasɛhɛɓrɔn kɛ lɔwɔ kwɛlɛɛntaɓa lakwajud̤a napʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an malunɡ̤a nɛjɛrikɔ nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɓamisa ib̤ɛt͡sɛrɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛtʰafɛni ɛsiz̤wɛni sakwarub̤ɛn nɛramɔti kwɛlasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i ɛsiz̤wɛni sakwaɡ̤ad̤i nɛɡ̤ɔlan ɛb̤aʃan ɛsiz̤wɛni sakwamanasɛ jijɔ lɛjɔ imiz̤i ɛjamisɛlwa ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɔwasɛmz̤ini ɔpʰamɓukɛlɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ukuɓa ɓaɓalɛkɛlɛ kujɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓaɓulɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔz̤i ukuɓa ɓanɡ̤afi sisanɮa sɔmpʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlɛli wɛɡ̤az̤i ɓad̤ɛ ɓɛmɛ pʰamɓi kwɛɓanɮa z̤asɔnd̤ɛla iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ z̤akwalɛv̤i kuɛlaz̤arɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nakujɔʃuwa uɲana kanun nakwiintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ z̤ɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli z̤atʰɛtʰa kuɓɔ ɛʃilɔ ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan z̤isitʰi ujɛhɔv̤a umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikamɔsɛs ukuɓa sinikwɛ imiz̤i jɔkuɬala namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ ɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤ɛtʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaɓanika aɓalɛv̤i ɛlifɛni laɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔmlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a lɛ miz̤i namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ lapʰuma ikǃaʃisɔ nɛmiz̤alwanɛ jamakɛhati jaɓa jɛjɔɔɲana ɓakaarɔn umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓanɡ̤aɓalɛv̤i ɛsiz̤wɛni sakwajud̤a nasɛsiz̤wɛni sakwasimɔn nasɛsiz̤wɛni sakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin imiz̤i ɛliʃumi ɛlinamitʰatʰu nɡ̤ɛkǃaʃisɔ ɛlɔ aɓaɲɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakakɛhati ɓafumana nɡ̤ɛkǃaʃisɔ imiz̤i ɛliʃumi ɛmiz̤alwanɛni jɛsiz̤wɛ sakwaɛfrajim nasɛsiz̤wɛni sakwad̤an nasɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰɛni sɛsiz̤wɛ sakwamanasɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ɛrʃɔn ɓafumana nɡ̤ɛkǃaʃisɔ imiz̤i ɛliʃumi ɛlinamitʰatʰu ɛmiz̤alwanɛni jɛsiz̤wɛ sakwaisakarɛ nasɛsiz̤wɛni sakwaaʃɛrɛ nasɛsiz̤wɛni sakwanafɛtali nasɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰɛni sɛsiz̤wɛ sakwamanasɛ ɛb̤aʃan ɔɔɲana ɓakamɛrari nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ ɓafumana imiz̤i ɛliʃumi ɛlinamiɓini ɛsiz̤wɛni sakwarub̤ɛn nasɛsiz̤wɛni sakwaɡ̤ad̤i nasɛsiz̤wɛni sakwaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaɓanika aɓalɛv̤i nɡ̤ɛkǃaʃisɔ lɔɔ miz̤i namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wawisajɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikamɔsɛs ɓaɓanika ɛsiz̤wɛni sɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a nasɛsiz̤wɛni sɔɔɲana ɓakasimɔn jɔna lɛ miz̤i iɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama lajɔ jaɓa jɛjɔɔɲana ɓakaarɔn ɛmiz̤alwanɛni jamakɛhati kɔɔɲana ɓakalɛv̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa laɓa lɛlaɓɔ ikǃaʃisɔ lɔkukǃala ɓaɓanika umz̤i kaarb̤a ujisɛ kaanaki nɡ̤ɔwasɛhɛɓrɔn kɛ lɔwɔ ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwajud̤a namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kɛ alɔɔ mz̤i nɛmiz̤ana jawɔ ɓawanika ukalɛb̤i uɲana kajɛfunɛ ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤awakʰɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaarɔn umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓaɓanika ɔwasɛhɛɓrɔn nɛɮɛlɔ lawɔ umz̤i kɛ wɔkusaɓɛla umɓulali nɛlib̤ɛna nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛjatirɛ nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛɛʃtɛmɔwa nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛhɔlɔn nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛd̤ɛb̤iri nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛajin nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛjuta nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ imiz̤i ɛsitʰɔɓa kwɛz̤ɔ z̤iz̤wɛ z̤iɓini nasɛsiz̤wɛni sakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin iɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛɡ̤ɛb̤a nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛanatɔti nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛalɛmɔn nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ imiz̤i ɛminɛ ijɔnkɛ imiz̤i jɔɔɲana ɓakaarɔn aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli jaɓajimiz̤i ɛliʃumi ɛlinamitʰatʰu inamaɮɛlɔ ajɔ imiz̤alwanɛ jɔɔɲana ɓakakɛhati jaɓalɛv̤i aɓasɛlɛjɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakakɛhati jafumana imiz̤i jɛkǃaʃisɔ lajɔ ɛsiz̤wɛni sakwaɛfrajim ɓaɓanika ɔwakwaʃɛkɛm nɛɮɛlɔ lawɔ ɔkwɛlɛɛntaɓa lakwaɛfrajim umz̤i kɛ wɔkusaɓɛla umɓulali nɛɡ̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛkib̤ɛt͡sajim nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛb̤ɛtɛhɔrɔn nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ imiz̤i ɛminɛ ɛsiz̤wɛni sakwad̤an iɛlɛtɛkɛ nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛɡ̤ib̤ɛtɔn nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛajalɔn nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛɡ̤atirimɔn nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ imiz̤i ɛminɛ ɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰɛni sɛsiz̤wɛ sakwamanasɛ itahanaki nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛɡ̤atirimɔn nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ imiz̤i ɛmiɓini ijɔnkɛ imiz̤i jaɓa liʃumi namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jɔɔɲana ɓakakɛhati aɓasɛlɛjɔ ɓaɓanika ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ɛrʃɔn ɛmiz̤alwanɛni jaɓalɛv̤i ɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰɛni sɛsiz̤wɛ sakwamanasɛ iɡ̤ɔlan ɛb̤aʃan nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ umz̤i kɛ wɔkusaɓɛla umɓulali nɛb̤ɛhɛʃtɛra nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ imiz̤i ɛmiɓini ɛsiz̤wɛni sakwaisakarɛ ikiʃɔn nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛd̤ab̤ɛrati nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛjarmuti nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛɛnɡ̤anim nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ imiz̤i ɛminɛ ɛsiz̤wɛni sakwaaʃɛrɛ imiʃali nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛab̤ɛd̤ɔn nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛhɛlɛkati nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛrɛhɔb̤i nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ imiz̤i ɛminɛ ɛsiz̤wɛni sakwanafɛtali ikɛd̤ɛʃɛ kwɛlasɛɡ̤alili nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ umz̤i kɛ wɔkusaɓɛla umɓulali ihamɔtid̤ɔrɛ nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ ikartan nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ imiz̤i ɛmitʰatʰu ijɔnkɛ imiz̤i jamaɡ̤ɛrʃɔn nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jakʰɛ jaɓa jimiz̤i ɛliʃumi ɛlinamitʰatʰu inamaɮɛlɔ ajɔ ɓajinika imiz̤alwanɛ jɔɔɲana ɓakamɛrari jaɓalɛv̤i aɓasɛlɛjɔ ɛsiz̤wɛni sakwaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn ijɔkɛnɛham nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛkarta nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛd̤imna nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛnahalali nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ imiz̤i ɛminɛ ɛsiz̤wɛni sakwarub̤ɛn ib̤ɛt͡sɛrɛ nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛjahat͡sa nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛkɛd̤ɛmɔti nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛmɛfahati nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ imiz̤i ɛminɛ ɛsiz̤wɛni sakwaɡ̤ad̤i iramɔti kwɛlasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ umz̤i kɛ wɔkusaɓɛla umɓulali nɛmahanajim nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛhɛʃb̤ɔn nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɛjaz̤ɛrɛ nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ ijɔnkɛ lɔɔ miz̤i minɛ ijɔnkɛ imiz̤i jɔɔɲana ɓakamɛrari nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ ɛsɛlɛjɔ ɛmiz̤alwanɛni jaɓalɛv̤i ikǃaʃisɔ laɓɔ laɓa jimiz̤i ɛliʃumi ɛlinamiɓini ijɔnkɛ imiz̤i jaɓalɛv̤i pʰakatʰi kwɛlifa lɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli jaɓa jimiz̤i ɛnɡ̤amaʃumi manɛ anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ inamaɮɛlɔ ajɔ jɔnkɛ lɔɔ miz̤i nɡ̤amiɲɛ jaɓa nɛɮɛlɔ lajɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kwaɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ kulɔɔ miz̤i jɔnkɛ ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ amasirajɛli lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ aɓɛlifunɡ̤ɛlɛ ɔɔjisɛ ukuɓa wɔɓanika aliɬutʰa aɬala kulɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wawapʰumz̤a nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awaɓafunɡ̤ɛlajɔ ɔɔjisɛ akwaɓakʰɔ ɛz̤int͡ʃaɓɛni z̤awɔ z̤ɔnkɛ umajɔ pʰamɓi kwawɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤awɔ ujɛhɔv̤a waz̤inikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sawɔ akuwanɡ̤a z̤wi pʰant͡si ɛmaz̤wini ɔnkɛ alunɡ̤ilɛjɔ awawatʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kwinɮu kasirajɛli ɛnz̤ɛka ɔnkɛ wand̤ula ujɔʃuwa ukuwaɓiz̤a amarub̤ɛn namaɡ̤ad̤i nɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsiz̤wɛ sakwamanasɛ watʰi kuwɔ nikuɡ̤ǀ̤inilɛ kɔnkɛ umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a aɓɛniwisɛlɛ nɡ̤akɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ nalipʰulapʰula iz̤wi ɛz̤intwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɛnd̤iniwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤az̤ɔ aniɓaʃijanɡ̤a aɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu ɛz̤i z̤ininz̤i unanam̤la kɛ nisiɡ̤ǀ̤inilɛ isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina sɔmtʰɛtʰɔ kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu kalɔku ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu uɓapʰumz̤ilɛ aɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ watʰɛtʰajɔ kuɓɔ kalɔku kɛ d͡ʒ̤ikani nijɛ ɛz̤intɛntɛni z̤ɛnu ɛz̤wɛni lɛlifa lɛnu aɓɛninikɛ lɔna umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a pʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an kɔd̤wa ɡ̤ǀ̤inani kunɛnɛ ukuɓa niwɛnz̤ɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɔmjalɛlɔ awaniwisɛlajɔ umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a wɔkuɓa nimtʰand̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nihamɓɛ nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛla z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ nijiɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ imitʰɛtʰɔ jakʰɛ ninamatʰɛlɛ kujɛ nimkʰɔnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jɛnu jɔnkɛ nanɡ̤ɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wɛnu wɔnkɛ waɓasikɛlɛla ujɔʃuwa waɓand̤ulula ɓaja ɛz̤intɛntɛni z̤aɓɔ umɔsɛs ɛɓɛsinikilɛ isikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsiz̤wɛ sakwamanasɛ ɛb̤aʃan ɛsiɲɛ isikǃinɡ̤atʰa sasɔ ujɔʃuwa kuɲɛ naɓaz̤alwana ɓasɔ nɡ̤anɛnɔ kwɛjɔrd̤an nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ kǁɛnikwɛni ujɔʃuwa wasind̤ululɛla ɛz̤intɛntɛni z̤asɔ wasisikɛlɛla nasɔ watʰi kusɔ ɓujɛlani ɛz̤intɛntɛni z̤ɛnu ninɔɓutʲɛɓi ɔɓukʰulu ninɛŋ̤ǃ̤wɛɓɔ ɛninz̤i kunɛnɛ nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɔb̤ɛd̤u nɛsiɲiti nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤ininz̤i kunɛnɛ jaɓɛlanani naɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu nɡ̤amakǁʰɔɓa ɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤ɛnu ɓaɓuja kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn nɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ad̤i nɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakamanasɛ ɓɛsuka kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛʃilɔ ɛsɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan ukuɓa ɓajɛ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i ɛz̤wɛni lɛlifa laɓɔ aɓaɓɛliz̤uz̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔmlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikamɔsɛs ɓafika ɛmimanɮɛni jasɛjɔrd̤an ɛsɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan ɔɔɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn nɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ad̤i nɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsiz̤wɛ sakwamanasɛ ɓakʰa kʰɔna isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɡ̤asɛjɔrd̤an isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛsikʰulu ɛsiɓɔnakalajɔ ɓɛv̤a kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kusitʰiwa jaɓɔnani ɔɔɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn nɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ad̤i nɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsiz̤wɛ sakwamanasɛ ɓakʰɛ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ malunɡ̤a nɛliz̤wɛ lakwakanan ɛmimanɮɛni jasɛjɔrd̤an nɡ̤ɛkǀala
