ɛlinɡ̤apʰɛʃɛja kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛv̤a kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaliɓiz̤ɛla nd̤awɔɲɛ lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa lɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛʃilɔ ukuɓa kuɲukwɛ kujiwɛ kuɓɔ kuliwɛ naɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓatʰuma upinɛhasi uɲana kaɛlaz̤arɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kɔɔɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn nakɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ad̤i nakwisikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsiz̤wɛ sakwamanasɛ ɛliz̤wɛni lasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i ɛnɛz̤ikʰulu ɛz̤iliʃumi sasiɲɛ isikʰulu sasiɲɛ isikʰulu ɛnɮwini jɔɔjisɛ ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwasirajɛli z̤inɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a az̤iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ ɛmawakɛni akwasirajɛli ɓaja kɛ kɔɔɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn nakɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ad̤i nakwisikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsiz̤wɛ sakwamanasɛ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i ɓatʰɛtʰa kuɓɔ ɓɛsitʰi lit͡ʃɔ lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa likajɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɓuɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ ɓuni ɔɓu nimɛnɛz̤a nɡ̤aɓɔ kutʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli niɓuja nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nam̤la ɛkumland̤ɛlɛni ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuz̤akʰɛla isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ukuɓa niɡ̤wilikɛ kujɛhɔv̤a nam̤la jintɔ ɛŋǀinanɛ kutʰi uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓukapɛhɔrɛ ɛsinɡ̤ɛkaz̤iɬamɓululi kuɓɔ unanam̤la saz̤a isiɓɛtʰɔ saɓa sɛɓanɮɛni likajɛhɔv̤a niɓuja nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nam̤la ɛkumland̤ɛlɛni ujɛhɔv̤a kɔtʰi niɡ̤wilikɛ kujɛhɔv̤a nam̤la nɡ̤ɔmsɔ aɓɛ nɔɓuxalaxumɛ jɛna kwiɓanɮa lɔnkɛ lakwasirajɛli inɛnɛ ukuɓa nitʰi lijiŋǃamɓi iliz̤wɛ lɛlifa lɛnu wɛlani niz̤ɛ ɛz̤wɛni lɛlifa likajɛhɔv̤a apʰɔ umŋǃuɓa kajɛhɔv̤a ukʰɔna nimɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu kɛ ukuɡ̤wilika kujɛhɔv̤a ukuɡ̤wilika kutʰi nɡ̤ɔkuz̤akʰɛla isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛsinɡ̤ɛsisɔ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sikajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu akamɛnɛz̤anɡ̤a jini uakan uɲana kaz̤ɛra nɡ̤ɔɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ ɛntwɛni ɛsinɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰant͡si kwaz̤a kwaɓakʰɔ uɓuxalaxumɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɓanɮa lɔnkɛ lamasirajɛli lɔɔ mɲɛ akat͡ʃaɓalalanɡ̤a jɛd̤wa nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɛ ɓapʰɛnd̤ula ɔɔɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn nɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ad̤i nɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsiz̤wɛ sɔɔɲana ɓakamanasɛ ɓatʰɛtʰa nɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤amawaka akwasirajɛli ɓatʰi utʰikǁɔ utʰikǁɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ utʰikǁɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ujaz̤i amasirajɛli ajakwaz̤i ukuɓa ɔkɔ kwɛnz̤iwɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɡ̤wilika nanɡ̤ɔkumɛnɛz̤a kujɛhɔv̤a uz̤ɛ unɡ̤asisind̤isi nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓa siz̤akʰɛlɛ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sɔkusiɓujisa ɛkuland̤ɛlɛni ujɛhɔv̤a nɔkuɓa siɲusa pʰɛz̤u kwasɔ id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa nɔkuɓa sɛnz̤ɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kwasɔ imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔkǁɔlɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkwakʰɛ makakuɓuz̤ɛ ɔkɔ inɛnɛ sijɛnz̤ɛ lɛ ntɔ nɡ̤ɛsitʰukutʰɛz̤i nɡ̤ɛtʰuɓa lɔkutʰi nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛliz̤ajɔ ɓɔtʰi ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu kɔɔɲana ɓɛtʰu jintɔni ɛnani nɔjɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ujɛhɔv̤a umisɛ umd̤a ɔjijɔrd̤an pʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu ɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn ɲana ɓakaɡ̤ad̤i aninasaɓɛlɔ kujɛhɔv̤a ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu ɓɛnz̤ɛ ukuɓa ɔɔɲana ɓɛtʰu ɓajɛkɛ ukumɔjika ujɛhɔv̤a sitʰɛ kɛ makʰɛ siz̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ siz̤akʰɛlɛ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sinɡ̤ɛsad̤ini liɲukajɔ sinɡ̤ɛsamɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ siɓɛ liŋ̤ǃ̤ina pʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu napʰakatʰi kwɛz̤iz̤ukulwana z̤ɛtʰu ɛmv̤a kwɛtʰu ukuɓa sisɛɓɛnz̤ɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ nɡ̤amad̤ini ɛtʰu aɲukajɔ nanɡ̤ɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɛtʰu nanɡ̤ɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɛtʰu jɔkǁɔlɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓanɡ̤at͡ʃɔ ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛliz̤ajɔ kɔɔɲana ɓɛtʰu ukutʰi aninasaɓɛlɔ kujɛhɔv̤a satʰi kɛ kɔtʰi kǁa ɓatʰɛ ɓat͡ʃɔ kutʰi nakwiz̤iz̤ukulwana z̤ɛtʰu nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛliz̤ajɔ siɓɛ nakɔ ukutʰi kʰanɡ̤ɛlani imfanɔ jɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sikajɛhɔv̤a aɓajɛnz̤ajɔ ɔɔɓawɔ inɡ̤ɛjad̤ini liɲukajɔ inɡ̤ɛjamɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ iliŋ̤ǃ̤ina pʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu makuɓɛ lɛ kutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɛ ukuɓa siɡ̤wilikɛ kujɛhɔv̤a siɓujɛ nam̤la ɛkumland̤ɛlɛni ujɛhɔv̤a silakʰɛlɛ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa nɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛsinɡ̤ɛsisɔ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sikajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ɛsipʰamɓi kɔmŋǃuɓa wakʰɛ amaz̤wi aɓawatʰɛtʰajɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn nɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ad̤i nɔɔɲana ɓakamanasɛ wawɛv̤a upinɛhasi umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɛz̤ikʰulu z̤ɛɓanɮa nɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤amawaka akwasirajɛli ɛz̤az̤inajɛ alunɡ̤a ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ watʰi kɛ upinɛhasi uɲana kaɛlaz̤arɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kɔɔɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn nakɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ad̤i nakɔɔɲana ɓakamanasɛ nam̤la sijaz̤i ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a upʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ninɡ̤aɓɛnz̤anɡ̤a ɔɓɔ ɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤alɛ ntɔ niɓaɬanɡ̤ulɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛsanɮɛni sikajɛhɔv̤a waɓuja kɛ upinɛhasi uɲana kaɛlaz̤arɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɛz̤ikʰulu ɛz̤ɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn nakɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ad̤i ɛz̤wɛni lasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i ɓɛz̤a ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛɓaɓujisɛla iliz̤wi iliz̤wi ɛlɔ lalunɡ̤a ɛmɛɬwɛni ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓamɓɔnɡ̤a utʰikǁɔ aɓaɓa satʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔkuɲuka ɓajɛ kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɔɓumpi ɓalit͡ʃaɓalalisɛ iliz̤wɛ aɓaɬɛli kulɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn nɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ad̤i ɔɔɲana ɓakarub̤ɛn nɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ad̤i ɓasiɓiz̤a isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɡ̤ɔkutʰi liŋ̤ǃ̤ina pʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤ujɛ utʰikǁɔ kwatʰi kwakuɓa jimiɬa ɛmininz̤i ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛwapʰumz̤ilɛ amasirajɛli ɛz̤int͡ʃaɓɛni z̤awɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ujɔʃuwa ɛsɛlɛjind̤ɔd̤a ɛnkulu ɛkʰulilɛ wawaɓiz̤a ujɔʃuwa ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli amad̤ɔd̤a awɔ amakʰulu nɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤awɔ naɓaɡ̤wɛɓi ɓawɔ naɓab̤ali ɓawɔ watʰi kuɓɔ mna nd̤isɛnd̤imd̤ala nd̤ikʰulilɛ nina nikuɓɔnilɛ kɔnkɛ aɓɛkwɛnz̤ilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu kwɛz̤ɔ ntlanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nɡ̤ujɛ ɔnilwɛlɛjɔ kʰanɡ̤ɛlani nd̤inaɓɛlɛ nɡ̤amakǃaʃisɔ nɛz̤i ntlanɡ̤a z̤isasɛlɛjɔ ukuɓa z̤iɓɛ lɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɛnu z̤itʰaɓatʰɛla ɛjɔrd̤an kuɲɛ nɛɛntlanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ ɛnd̤iz̤iŋǃumlɛjɔ z̤ɛsa kulwanɮɛ ɔlukʰulu nɡ̤asɛkut͡ʃɔnɛni kwɛlanɡ̤a nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu ɔja kuz̤iɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa ɛɓuswɛni ɓɛnu az̤iɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤ɛ pʰamɓi kwɛnu niliɬutʰɛ iliz̤wɛ laz̤ɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ watʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu jɔmɛlɛlani kunɛnɛ ukuz̤ɛ niɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ nɛnz̤ɛ kɔnkɛ ɔkub̤aliwɛjɔ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɔmjalɛlɔ kamɔsɛs ukuz̤ɛ ninɡ̤asuki kuwɔ nitʲɛkɛlɛ ɛkunɛnɛ nasɛkʰɔɬɔ ukuz̤ɛ ninɡ̤ad̤iɓani nɛz̤i ntlanɡ̤a z̤isɛlɛjɔ ɛz̤i kɛ z̤inani ninɡ̤alikʰankaɲi iɡ̤ama lɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓaz̤ɔ ninɡ̤aɓafunɡ̤i ninɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ninɡ̤aɓaŋǃuli iz̤ɛ ninamatʰɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nikwɛnz̤ilɛjɔ unanam̤la ujɛhɔv̤a waz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤a ɛɓuswɛni ɓɛnu iintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤inkulu ɛz̤inamanɮa kɛ akumanɡ̤a pʰamɓi kwɛnu unanam̤la ind̤ɔd̤a iɲɛ isukɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nɡ̤ujɛ ɔnilwɛlajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wakutʰɛtʰajɔ z̤iɡ̤ǀ̤inɛni kunɛnɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛmipʰɛfumlɔ jɛnu ukuɓa nimtʰand̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu kuɓa ukuɓa nitʰɛ naɓuja naɓuja nanamatʰɛla kumakǃɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔ ɛz̤i ntlanɡ̤a z̤isɛlɛjɔ ɛz̤i kɛ z̤inani nɛnd̤isɛlana naz̤ɔ nad̤iɓana naz̤ɔ z̤ad̤iɓana jaz̤ini kakuɬɛ ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu akaji kupʰind̤a az̤iɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤ɛ ɛz̤i ntlanɡ̤a pʰamɓi kwɛnu z̤ɔɓa z̤iz̤iɓatʰa nɛmiɡ̤iɓɛ nɛz̤inija ɛmakǀalɛni ɛnu nɔv̤ikɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛnu nid̤ɛ nikǀiɲwɛ kulɔ m̤laɓa ulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ aninikilɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nam̤la nd̤ihamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɔluntu lɔnkɛ nijaz̤i nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jɛnu jɔnkɛ nanɡ̤ɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wɛnu wɔnkɛ ukuɓa akuwanɡ̤a pʰant͡si naliɲɛ iliz̤wi ɛmaz̤wini ɔnkɛ alunɡ̤ilɛjɔ aɓɛwatʰɛtʰilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nɡ̤ani ɔnkɛ ɛnz̤ɛkilɛ akuwanɡ̤a pʰant͡si naliɲɛ iliz̤wi kuwɔ kɔtʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ lɛnz̤ɛkajɔ lɔnkɛ iliz̤wi ɛlilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ aɓɛlitʰɛtʰilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukulɛnz̤a lɔnkɛ iliz̤wi ɛliɓi ad̤ɛ anit͡ʃaɓalalisɛ kulɔ m̤laɓa ulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ aninikilɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu ɛkuwuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛni umŋǃɔpʰisɔ kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu aniwisɛlɛ wɔna naja nakʰɔnz̤a tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi naɓaŋǃula wɔv̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a nikǀiɲwɛ kamsiɲa ɛm̤laɓɛni ɔlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ aninikilɛjɔ waz̤iɬanɡ̤anisa ujɔʃuwa z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤akwasirajɛli kwaʃɛkɛm wawaɓiz̤a amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu amasirajɛli nɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤awɔ naɓaɡ̤wɛɓi ɓawɔ naɓab̤ali ɓawɔ ɓaz̤imisa pʰamɓi kɔtʰikǁɔ watʰi ujɔʃuwa kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi ɔɔjiɬɔ ɓaɓɛɬɛli pʰɛʃɛja kɔmlamɓɔ kususɛla kwapʰakad̤ɛ ɔɔtɛra ujisɛ kaaɓraham ujisɛ kanahɔrɛ ɓaɓɛkʰɔnz̤a tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi nd̤amtʰaɓatʰa ujiɬɔ uaɓraham pʰɛʃɛja kɔmlamɓɔ nd̤am̤amɓisa ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lakwakanan nd̤ajand̤isa imɓɛwu jakʰɛ nd̤amnika uisakɛ uisakɛ nd̤amnika ujakɔɓi nɔɛsawu uɛsawu nd̤amnika iintaɓa z̤akwasɛhirɛ ukuɓa az̤imɛ kɛ ujakɔɓi nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓɛɬa ɓaja ɛjiputa nd̤atʰuma umɔsɛs nɔarɔn nd̤ajiɬisɛla iz̤iɓɛtʰɔ ijiputa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤ɛnz̤ajɔ pʰakatʰi kwajɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ nd̤anikʰupʰa nd̤aɓakʰupʰa ɔɔjiɬɔ ɛjiputa ɛlwanɮɛ amajiputa aɓasukɛla ɔɔjiɬɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa nanɡ̤aɓamahaʃɛ ɓɛz̤a kulwanɮɛ ɔluɓɔmv̤u ɓakʰala kujɛhɔv̤a waɓɛka isitʰɔkɔtʰɔkɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛnu namajiputa wawaz̤isɛla ulwanɮɛ wawaɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla amɛɬɔ ɛnu akuɓɔna ɔkɔ nd̤akwɛnz̤ajɔ ɛjiputa naɬala ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ imiɬa ɛmininz̤i nd̤aninɡ̤ɛnisa ɛz̤wɛni lamaamɔri aɓɛɬɛli pʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an nd̤awanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sɛnu naliɬutʰa iliz̤wɛ lawɔ nd̤awat͡ʃaɓalalisa pʰamɓi kwɛnu wɛsuka ub̤alaki uɲana kat͡sipɔrɛ wakwamɔwab̤i namasirajɛli watʰuma waɓiz̤a ub̤ilɛham uɲana kab̤ɛhɔrɛ ukuɓa anikǃalɛkisɛ and̤av̤uma ukumpʰulapʰula ub̤ilɛham wanisikɛlɛla akajɛka nd̤aniɬanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ najiwɛla ijɔrd̤an ɛjɛrikɔ ɓalwa aɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrikɔ amaamɔri namapɛriz̤i namakanan namahɛti namaɡ̤irɡ̤aʃi namahiv̤i namajɛb̤usi nd̤aɓanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sɛnu nd̤atʰuma ɔɔnɔmɛv̤a pʰamɓi kwɛnu ɓaɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa pʰamɓi kwɛnu ɔɔkumkani aɓaɓini ɓamaamɔri kunɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ak͡xɛlɛ lakʰɔ kunɡ̤ɛnɡ̤asapʰɛtʰa sakʰɔ nd̤aninika iliz̤wɛ ɛninɡ̤akǁʰamlɛkanɡ̤a nɡ̤alɔ nɛmiz̤i ɛninɡ̤ajakʰanɡ̤a naɬala kɛ kujɔ nɛz̤id̤ilija nɛz̤iŋǃuma ɛninɡ̤az̤itʲalanɡ̤a nijaz̤iɮa kɛ mɔjikɛni kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nimkʰɔnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ nanɡ̤ɛɲanisɔ susani ɔɔtʰikǁɔ aɓaɓɛkʰɔnz̤a ɓɔna ɔɔjiɬɔ pʰɛʃɛja kɔmlamɓɔ nasɛjiputa nimkʰɔnz̤ɛ kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ ukuɓa kuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛnu ukumkʰɔnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a z̤iɲulɛlɛni nam̤la ɔjɛna nija kumkʰɔnz̤a nɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔɔtʰikǁɔ aɓaɓɛkʰɔnz̤a ɓɔna ɔɔjiɬɔ aɓaɓɛpʰɛʃɛja kɔmlamɓɔ nɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓamaamɔri ɛniɬɛli ɛz̤wɛni lawɔ kɛ nɛnɮu jam sija kukʰɔnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a ɓapʰɛnd̤ula aɓantu ɓatʰi makuɓɛ lɛ kutʰi ukumʃija ujɛhɔv̤a sikʰɔnz̤ɛ tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nɡ̤ujɛ ɔsiɲusilɛjɔ tʰina nɔɔɓawɔ ɓɛtʰu ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa ɛnɮwini jɔɓukʰɔɓɔka ɔwajɛnz̤ɛla ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛtʰu lɔɔ mikǃɔnd̤isɔ mikʰulu wasiɡ̤ǀ̤ina ɛnɮɛlɛni jɔnkɛ ɛsahamɓa nɡ̤ajɔ nasɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɛsakǀand̤a pʰakatʰi kwaz̤ɔ waz̤a waz̤iɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ namaamɔri aɓɛɬɛli kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ pʰamɓi kwɛtʰu natʰi sija kukʰɔnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a kuɓa nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu watʰi ujɔʃuwa kuɓɔ aɓantu aninakumkʰɔnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ɔnɛkʰwɛlɛ akaji kuz̤itʰwala iz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤ɛnu nɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤ɛnu kǁa nitʰɛ namʃija ujɛhɔv̤a nakʰɔnz̤a ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a wɔd͡ʒ̤ika anɛnz̤ɛlɛ uɓuɓi aniɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa ɛnɛnz̤ɛlɛ ɔkuɬɛ ɓatʰi aɓantu kujɔʃuwa haji sija kukʰɔnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a tʰina watʰi ujɔʃuwa kuɓɔ aɓantu ninɡ̤amaŋ̤ǃ̤ina nɡ̤akuni ukuɓa niz̤iɲulɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa nimkʰɔnz̤ɛ ɓatʰi sinɡ̤amaŋ̤ǃ̤ina watʰi ɓasusɛni nɡ̤ɔkɔ ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a aɓapʰakatʰi kwɛnu nimtʰɔɓɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛɛntliz̤ijɔ z̤ɛnu ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɓatʰi aɓantu kujɔʃuwa sija kukʰɔnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu silipʰulapʰulɛ iliz̤wi lakʰɛ ujɔʃuwa wɛnz̤a kɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ naɓantu nɡ̤alɔɔ m̤la waɓamisɛla imimisɛlɔ namasikɔ kwaʃɛkɛm wawab̤ala ujɔʃuwa maz̤wi ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɔmjalɛlɔ katʰikǁɔ watʰaɓatʰa ilitʲɛ ɛlikʰulu kʰɔna pʰant͡si kɔmɔki ɔsɛnd̤awɛni ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kajɛhɔv̤a watʰi ujɔʃuwa kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu jaɓɔnani ɛli litʲɛ lija kuɓa liŋ̤ǃ̤ina nɡ̤atʰi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa liwav̤ilɛ lɔna ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi kajɛhɔv̤a awatʰɛtʰilɛjɔ natʰi liɓɛ liŋ̤ǃ̤ina nɡ̤ani ɬɛz̤ɛ nimkʰaɲɛlɛ utʰikǁɔ wɛnu waɓand̤ulula kɛ ujɔʃuwa aɓantu ɛlɔwɔ waja ɛlifɛni lakʰɛ kwatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ ujɔʃuwa uɲana kanun umkʰɔnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a ɛmiɲaka ilikʰulu ɛlinaʃumiɲɛ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla ɛmd̤ɛni wɛlifa lakʰɛ ɛtimnatisɛra kwɛlɛɛntaɓa lakwaɛfrajim ɛntla kwɛntaɓa jasɛɡ̤ahaʃɛ amasirajɛli amkʰɔnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a jɔnkɛ imiɬa kajɔʃuwa nɛmiɬa jɔnkɛ jamad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu awasalajɔ kujɔʃuwa aɓɛwaz̤i wɔnkɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a aɓɛwɛnz̤ɛlɛ amasirajɛli amatʰamɓɔ kajɔsɛfu aɓaɓɛɲukɛ nawɔ ɛjiputa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓawaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla kwaʃɛkɛm kwisiz̤iɓa sɔm̤laɓa awasitʰɛnɡ̤ajɔ ujakɔɓi kɔɔɲana ɓakahamɔrɛ usɔʃɛkɛm nɡ̤ɛkʰulu lɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ saɓa lɔɔɲana ɓakajɔsɛfu nɔɛlaz̤arɛ uɲana kaarɔn ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla ɛnd̤ulini kapinɛhasi uɲana wakʰɛ awajinikwajɔ kwɛlɛɛntaɓa lakwaɛfrajim kwatʰi ɛmv̤a kɔkufa kukajɔʃuwa ɓaɓuz̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kujɛhɔv̤a ɓɛsitʰi nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kusikǃalɛla ukuɲuka ajɛ kumakanan alwɛ nawɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kɔɲuka ujud̤a jaɓɔnani nd̤ilinikɛlɛ iliz̤wɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ watʰi ujud̤a kusimɔn umkʰuluwa wakʰɛ ɲuka sijɛ ɛkǃaʃiswɛni silwɛ namakanan nd̤ɔja nawɛ ɛkǃaʃiswɛni lakʰɔ usimɔn wahamɓa najɛ kɛ wɛɲuka kɛ ujud̤a ujɛhɔv̤a wawanikɛla amakanan namapɛriz̤i ɛsanɮɛni saɓɔ ɓawaɓulala ɛb̤ɛz̤ɛki amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amawaka aliʃumi uad̤ɔni wasɛb̤ɛz̤ɛki ɓamfumana ɛb̤ɛz̤ɛki ɓalwa najɛ ɓawaɓulala amakanan namapɛriz̤i wasaɓa uad̤ɔni wasɛb̤ɛz̤ɛki ɓamsukɛla ɓamɓamɓa ɓamŋǃumla ɔɔz̤itʰupʰa nɔɔb̤ɔnt͡si watʰi uad̤ɔni wasɛb̤ɛz̤ɛki ɔɔkumkani aɓamaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓaɓɛkǀʰɔla pʰant͡si kwɛtafilɛ jam ɓɛŋǃuɲulwɛ ɔɔz̤itʰupʰa nɔɔb̤ɔnt͡si nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤ɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ utʰikǁɔ ukuɓujɛkɛz̤a ɓamsa ɛjɛrusalɛm wafɛla kʰɔna kɛ kalɔku ɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a ɓalwa nɛjɛrusalɛm ɓajitʰimɓa ɓajiɓulala nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ ɓatʰi umz̤i ɓawufaka umlilɔ ɓɛɬa ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a ɓaja namakanan aɓɛɬɛli kwɛlɛɛntaɓa nakwɛlasɛz̤ant͡si nakwɛlɛɛntlamɓɔ waja ujud̤a kumakanan aɓɛɬɛli ɛhɛɓrɔn iɡ̤ama lɛhɛɓrɔn nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɡ̤apʰamɓili ɓɛlijikirijati kaarb̤a ɓaɓulala uʃɛʃaji nɔahiman nɔtalɛmaji wɛsuka kʰɔna waja kuɓɛmi ɓasɛd̤ɛb̤iri iɡ̤ama lɛd̤ɛb̤iri nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɡ̤apʰamɓili ɓɛlijikirijatisɛfɛrɛ watʰi ukalɛb̤i ɔtʰɛ wajinɡ̤ɛnɛla ikirijatisɛfɛrɛ wajitʰimɓa nd̤ɔmnika intɔmɓi jam uakɛsa iɓɛ nɡ̤umkakʰɛ wajitʰimɓa uɔtɛnijɛli uɲana kakɛnaz̤i kakalɛb̤i kɛ intɔmɓi jakʰɛ uakɛsa janɡ̤umkakʰɛ kwatʰi ɛkuz̤ɛni kwajɔ jamv̤usɛlɛla ukuɓa akǀɛlɛ um̤laɓa kujisɛ wajɔ jɛɬa ɛɛsilɛni lajɔ watʰi ukalɛb̤i kujɔ jintɔni jatʰi kujɛ nd̤inikɛ intɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa und̤inikɛ um̤laɓa ɔnɡ̤ɛnamanz̤i nd̤inikɛ nɛmitʰɔmɓɔ jamanz̤i ukalɛb̤i wajinika kɛ imitʰɔmɓɔ jasɛntla nɛmitʰɔmɓɔ jasɛz̤ant͡si ɔɔɲana ɓɔmkɛni ujisɛ wɔmkamɔsɛs ɓɛɲuka ɛmz̤ini wamasund̤u nɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a ɓaja kwintlanɡ̤ɔ jakwajud̤a ɛnɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si kwɛarad̤ɛ ɓaja ɓaɬala naɓantu aɓɔ waja ujud̤a nɔsimɔn umkʰuluwa wakʰɛ ɓawaɓulala amakanan aɓɛɬɛli ɛt͡sɛfati ɓajit͡ʃaɓalalisa kwatʰiwa iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ mz̤i jihɔrma ujud̤a wajitʰimɓa iɡ̤az̤a nɔmmanɮa wajɔ nɛaʃkɛlɔn nɔmmanɮa wajɔ nɛɛk͡xɔn nɔmmanɮa wajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wajɛ ɛnɔjud̤a waɓaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤a aɓɛɛntaɓa kɔd̤wa ɛɓɛnɡ̤ɛnakɔ ukuɓaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤a aɓɛmi ɓɛntili nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓajɛ ɓɛnɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɛsiɲitʰi ɓamnika ukalɛb̤i umz̤i wasɛhɛɓrɔn nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ watʰɛtʰajɔ umɔsɛs waɓaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤a apʰɔ ɔɔɲana ɓɔɓatʰatʰu ɓakaanaki kɛ amajɛb̤usi aɓɛɬɛli ɛjɛrusalɛm aɓawaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤anɡ̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin aɬɛli amajɛb̤usi nɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɛjɛrusalɛm unanam̤la inɮu kajɔsɛfu jɛɲuka najɔ jaja kujinɡ̤ɛnɛla ib̤ɛtɛli ujɛhɔv̤a wajɛ ɛnajɔ inɮu kajɔsɛfu jajiɬɔla ib̤ɛtɛli kɛ iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ mz̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɡ̤apʰamɓili ɓɛlijiluz̤i iintlɔla ɛz̤ɔ z̤amɓɔna ɛpʰuma kulɔɔ mz̤i z̤atʰi kujɛ kʰawusiɓɔnisɛ itʰuɓa lɔkunɡ̤ɛna kulɔ mz̤i sɔkwɛnz̤ɛla iŋǀɛɓa waz̤iɓɔnisa itʰuɓa lɔkunɡ̤ɛna kulɔɔ mz̤i z̤awuɓulala umz̤i nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ ɓamnd̤ulula lɔɔ nɛmiz̤alwanɛ jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ waja lɔɔ ɛz̤wɛni lamahɛti wakʰa umz̤i watʰi iɡ̤ama lawɔ jiluz̤i liɡ̤ama lawɔ unanam̤la umanasɛ akajiɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤anɡ̤a ib̤ɛtɛʃɛhan namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ nɛtahanaki namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ naɓɛmi ɓasɛd̤ɔrɛ namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ naɓɛmi ɓasɛiɬam namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ naɓɛmi ɓasɛmɛɡ̤id̤ɔ namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ kɛ amakanan apʰikɛla ukuɬala kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ kwatʰi akɔmɛlɛla amasirajɛli uv̤ikɔ amakanan akawaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤a awaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ uɛfrajim akawaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤anɡ̤a amakanan aɓɛmi ɛɡ̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ aɬala amakanan pʰakatʰi kwakʰɛ ɛɡ̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ uz̤ɛb̤ulɔn akaɓaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤anɡ̤a aɓɛmi ɓasɛkitrɔn naɓɛmi ɓasɛnahalɔli aɬala amakanan pʰakatʰi kwakʰɛ uv̤ikɔ uaʃɛrɛ akaɓaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤anɡ̤a aɓɛmi ɓasɛakɔ naɓɛmi ɓasɛt͡sid̤ɔn nɛahalab̤i nɛakɛz̤ib̤i nɛhɛlɛb̤a nɛafiki nɛrɛhɔb̤i amaaʃɛrɛ aɬala pʰakatʰi kwamakanan aɓɛmi kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akawaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤anɡ̤a unafɛtali akaɓaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤anɡ̤a aɓɛmi ɓasɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ naɓɛmi ɓasɛb̤ɛtɛanati waɬala pʰakatʰi kwamakanan aɓɛmi kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ aɓɛmi ɓasɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ naɓasɛb̤ɛtɛanati ɓafakwa uv̤ikɔ nɡ̤ujɛ amaamɔri aɓakǁinɛla kwɛlɛɛntaɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakad̤an nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akaɓav̤umɛlanɡ̤a ukuɓa ɓɛɬɛ ɓɛz̤ɛ ɛntilini amaamɔri apʰikɛla ukuɬala ɛhaxɛrɛs nasɛajalɔn nasɛʃahalɛb̤im isanɮa sɛnɮu kajɔsɛfu saɓa nz̤ima uv̤ikɔ umd̤a wamaamɔri watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkǃʰinɛni lɛak͡xab̤im ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxɛni wɛɲusa kwɛɲuka isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali saja ɛb̤ɔkim satʰi nd̤aniɲusa ɛjiputa nd̤aniz̤isa kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ nd̤afunɡ̤a kɔɔjiɬɔ nɡ̤alɔ nd̤atʰi and̤iji kuwapʰula umŋǃɔpʰisɔ napʰakad̤ɛ kɛ niz̤ɛ ninɡ̤ɛnz̤i mŋǃɔpʰisɔ naɓɛmi ɓɛli liz̤wɛ niz̤ɛ niz̤id̤iliz̤ɛ iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤aɓɔ anilipʰulapʰulanɡ̤a kɛ iz̤wi jintɔni lɛ nijɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤atʰi and̤iji kuɓaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤a pʰamɓi kwɛnu ukuz̤ɛ ɓaɓɛ z̤iimv̤ikɔ ɛmakǀalɛni ɛnu ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓaɓɔ ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤umɡ̤iɓɛ kwatʰi sakuwatʰɛtʰa isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a maz̤wi kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓasuka aɓantu ɓalipʰakamisa iz̤wi laɓɔ ɓalila ɓajiɓiz̤a lɔɔ nd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔkutʰi jib̤ɔkim ɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla apʰɔ kujɛhɔv̤a kɛ kalɔku ɔkuja ujɔʃuwa waɓand̤ululajɔ aɓantu ɓaja ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛlɔwɔ ɛlifɛni lakʰɛ ukuɓa ɓalimɛ iliz̤wɛ aɓantu ɓamkʰɔnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a jɔnkɛ imiɬa kajɔʃuwa nɛmiɬa jɔnkɛ jamad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu awasalɛlajɔ kujɔʃuwa aɓɛwuɓɔnilɛ wɔnkɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i ɔmkʰulu kajɛhɔv̤a aɓɛwɛnz̤ɛlɛ amasirajɛli wafa kɛ ujɔʃuwa uɲana kanun umkʰɔnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a ɛmiɲaka ilikʰulu ɛlinaʃumiɲɛ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla ɛmd̤ɛni wɛlifa lakʰɛ ɛtimnatahɛrɛs kwɛlɛɛntaɓa lakwaɛfrajim ɛntla kwɛntaɓa jasɛɡ̤ahaʃɛ sakuɓa nɛsɔ siz̤ukulwana sɔnkɛ siɬanɡ̤anisɛlwɛ kɔɔjisɛ kwav̤ɛla siz̤ukulwana simɓi ɛmv̤a kwasɔ ɛsiɓɛ sinɡ̤amaz̤i ujɛhɔv̤a kwanɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i aɓɛwɛnz̤ɛlɛ amasirajɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛnz̤a uɓuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ɓakʰɔnz̤a ɔɔb̤ahali ɓamlaɬa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ ɔwaɓakʰupʰajɔ ɛz̤wɛni lamajiputa ɓaland̤ɛla tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi kɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤iɓad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛjɔ ɓaɓaŋǃula ɓamkǃumɓisa ujɛhɔv̤a ɓamlaɬa kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓakʰɔnz̤a ub̤ahali nɔaʃtarɔti wav̤utʰa kɛ umsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a kumasirajɛli wawanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni saɓapʰanɡ̤i ɓawapʰanɡ̤a watʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤awɔ wawanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤awɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ akaɓa saɓa pʰamɓi kwɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤awɔ atʰi akupʰuma ɛsija napʰi isanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a sawakǀʰasa nɡ̤ɔɓuɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wakutʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wawafunɡ̤ɛlajɔ aɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛka kunɛnɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wav̤ɛlisa aɓaɡ̤wɛɓi ɓawasind̤isa ɛsanɮɛni saɓapʰanɡ̤i ɓawɔ akaɓapʰulapʰula naɓaɡ̤wɛɓi ɓawɔ ahɛɲuz̤a nɡ̤ɔkuland̤ɛla tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi aɓaŋǃula atʲɛka kamsiɲa ɛnɮɛlɛni aɓaɓɛhamɓa nɡ̤ajɔ ɔɔjisɛ jɔkupʰulapʰula imitʰɛtʰɔ kajɛhɔv̤a akɛnd͡ʒ̤anɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ wɔna nakǁa ujɛhɔv̤a wawav̤ɛlisɛla aɓaɡ̤wɛɓi ujɛhɔv̤a waɓa nɔmɡ̤wɛɓi lɔwɔ wawasind̤isa ɛsanɮɛni sɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤awɔ jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɔmɡ̤wɛɓi lɔwɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a waz̤ɔɬwaja nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuŋǀwina kwawɔ pʰamɓi kwaɓakǁini ɓawɔ aɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓawɔ kwatʰi umɡ̤wɛɓi lɔwɔ aɓuja ɔnakalisa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔɔjisɛ aland̤ɛla tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓakʰɔnz̤a nanɡ̤ɔkuɓaŋǃula akaz̤ijɛka iintlɔnd̤i z̤awɔ nɛnɮɛla jɔkuɓa lukʰuni kwawɔ wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a kumasirajɛli watʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɔlu ɬanɡ̤a luwuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰilɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɛnd̤awumisɛla ɔɔjisɛ alwalipʰulapʰula iliz̤wi and̤iji kupʰind̤a nd̤itʰi pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ nd̤iɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤ɛ wɛz̤i ntlanɡ̤a waz̤iʃijajɔ ujɔʃuwa ɛkufɛni kwakʰɛ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤iwalinɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤az̤ɔ amasirajɛli ukuɓa ɔjiɡ̤ǀ̤ina inɮɛla kajɛhɔv̤a ahamɓɛ nɡ̤ajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓajiɡ̤ǀ̤inajɔ ɔɔjisɛ akaji kujiɡ̤ǀ̤ina waz̤ijɛka kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛz̤ɔ ntlanɡ̤a akaz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤a kamsiɲa akaz̤inikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sikajɔʃuwa z̤iz̤ɔ kɛ ɛz̤i iintlanɡ̤a awaz̤ijɛkajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukuz̤ɛ awalinɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤az̤ɔ amasirajɛli lawɔ anɡ̤az̤az̤anɡ̤a iimfaz̤wɛ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwakanan ukuz̤ɛ kɔd̤wa az̤az̤i iz̤iz̤ukulwana z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuz̤ifund̤isa imfaz̤wɛ z̤ɔna ɛz̤ɔ z̤anɡ̤a pʰamɓili z̤az̤inɡ̤az̤az̤i iz̤ikʰulu z̤ɔz̤iɬanu z̤amafilisti namakanan ɔnkɛ namat͡sid̤ɔn namahiv̤i aɬɛli ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤ɛlɛb̤anɔn ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤ɛb̤ahalihɛrmɔn ɛsɛ ɛkujɛni ɛhamati aɓɔ kɛ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓɔkulinɡ̤a amasirajɛli ukuz̤ɛ kwaz̤ɛkɛ ukuɓa ɔjipʰulapʰula imitʰɛtʰɔ kajɛhɔv̤a awajiwisɛla ɔɔjisɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikamɔsɛs ɓaɬala kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli pʰakatʰi kwamakanan namahɛti namaamɔri namapɛriz̤i namahiv̤i namajɛb̤usi ɓaz̤iz̤ɛka iintɔmɓi z̤awɔ z̤aɓa nɡ̤aɓafaz̤i ɓaɓɔ ɓɛnd̤isa iintɔmɓi z̤aɓɔ kɔɔɲana ɓawɔ ɓakʰɔnz̤a ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓawɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛnz̤a uɓuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ɓamliɓala ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɓakʰɔnz̤a ɔɔb̤ahali nɔɔaʃɛra wav̤utʰa kɛ umsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a kumasirajɛli watʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤awɔ wawanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sikakuʃanriʃatajim wakwaaram pʰakatʰi kwɛmilamɓɔ ɓamkʰɔnz̤a kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ukuʃanriʃatajim imiɲaka ɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɓakʰala ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kujɛhɔv̤a waɓav̤ɛlisɛla ujɛhɔv̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli umsind̤isi ɔwaɓasind̤isajɔ ɔnɡ̤uɔtɛnijɛli uɲana kakɛnaz̤i kakalɛb̤i wafikɛlwa nɡ̤umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a amasirajɛli wapʰuma waja ujɛhɔv̤a wamnikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ ukuʃanriʃatajim wakwaaram isanɮa sakʰɛ saɓa namanɮa pʰɛz̤u kɔkuʃanriʃatajim laz̤ɔla kɛ iliz̤wɛ imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi manɛ wafa uɔtɛnijɛli uɲana kakɛnaz̤i kɛ kalɔku ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓapʰind̤a ɓɛnz̤a uɓuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a wamɔmɛlɛz̤a uɛɡ̤lɔn wakwamɔwab̤i ukuɓa awakǀʰasɛ amasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa ɛnz̤ɛ uɓuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a waɓaɬanɡ̤anisɛla kujɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn namaamalɛki waja wawaɓulala amasirajɛli wawuɬutʰa umz̤i wamasund̤u ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓamkʰɔnz̤a uɛɡ̤lɔn wakwamɔwab̤i imiɲaka ɛliʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɓakʰala ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kujɛhɔv̤a waɓav̤ɛlisɛla umsind̤isi ɔnɡ̤uɛhud̤ɛ uɲana kaɡ̤ɛra umb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin umfɔ ɔliŋǁɛlɛ ɓatʰumɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɛ umnikɛlɔ kuɛɡ̤lɔn wakwamɔwab̤i uɛhud̤ɛ waz̤ɛnz̤ɛla ik͡xɛlɛ ɛlintlanɡ̤ɔtʰi mɓini lijikub̤itɛ uɓud̤ɛ ɓalɔ waliŋǁiɓa pʰant͡si kwɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ ɛtʰanɡ̤ɛni lakʰɛ lɔkunɛnɛ wawusɔnd̤ɛz̤a umnikɛlɔ kuɛɡ̤lɔn wamamɔwab̤i kɛ uɛɡ̤lɔn ɛɓɛnɡ̤umfɔ ɔnɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɛɓa kwatʰi akuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa ukuwusɔnd̤ɛz̤a umnikɛlɔ waɓand̤ulula aɓantu aɓaɓɛwutʰwɛlɛ umnikɛlɔ lɔwɔ waɓuja jɛna ɛmifanɛkiswɛni ɛkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ ɛsɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali watʰi nd̤inɛliz̤wi lasɛnt͡sitʰɛlwɛni nawɛ watʰi jitʰini ɓapʰuma ɓɛmka kujɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛmi nɡ̤akujɛ wɛz̤a uɛhud̤ɛ kujɛ ɛɬɛli ɛɡ̤umɓini ɛlipʰɛz̤ulu ɛlinɛmpɛpʰɔ ɛliɓɛ lilɛlakʰɛ jɛd̤wa watʰi uɛhud̤ɛ nd̤inɛliz̤wi likatʰikǁɔ ɛliz̤a kuwɛ wɛsuka ɛsiɬalwɛni uɛhud̤ɛ wasɔlula isanɮa sakʰɛ sɔkʰɔɬɔ walitʰaɓatʰa ik͡xɛlɛ ɛtʰanɡ̤ɛni lakʰɛ lɔkunɛnɛ ɛsiswini sakʰɛ wat͡ʃɔ sanɡ̤ɛna nɛsipʰatʰɔ saland̤ɛla int͡simɓi iŋǃatʰa lajiv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ɛla int͡simɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akalixɔlanɡ̤a ik͡xɛlɛ ɛsiswini sakʰɛ lapʰuma pʰakatʰi kwɛɛmpund̤u wapʰuma uɛhud̤ɛ waja ɛv̤arand̤ɛni waz̤iv̤ala iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤ɛɡ̤umɓi ɛlɔ lipʰɛz̤ulu wamv̤alɛla waz̤it͡ʃikǁa ɛpʰumilɛ kɛ jɛna ɓanɡ̤ɛna aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓaɓɔna iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤ɛɡ̤umɓi ɛlipʰɛz̤ulu z̤iv̤aliwɛ ɓatʰi fanɛl ukuɓa uɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla iiɲawɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛɡ̤umɓini lɛmpɛpʰɔ ɓapʰɔnɡ̤ɔma ɓad̤a ɓanɛɛntlɔni nankɔ kunɡ̤av̤uli ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤wɛni z̤ɛɡ̤umɓi ɛlipʰɛz̤ulu ɓatʰaɓatʰa isit͡ʃikǁɔ ɓav̤ula nant͡si inkɔsi jaɓɔ iwɛ pʰant͡si ifilɛ uɛhud̤ɛ wasaɓa ɓɛsaz̤ilaz̤ila ɓɔna waɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa ɛmifanɛkiswɛni ɛkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ wasaɓa waja ɛsɛhira kwatʰi kwakʰɛ wav̤utʰɛla nɡ̤ɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɛkwɛlɛɛntaɓa lakwaɛfrajim ɓɛɬa najɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kwɛlɛɛntaɓa ɛpʰamɓi kwaɓɔ jɛna watʰi kuɓɔ nd̤iland̤ɛlɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uz̤inikɛlɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤ɛnu amamɔwab̤i ɛsanɮɛni sɛnu ɓamland̤ɛla kɛ ɓawav̤iŋ̤ǀ̤a amaz̤iɓukɔ asɛjɔrd̤an anɡ̤akwamɔwab̤i aɓav̤uma ukuɓa kuwɛlɛ ɓaɓulala amamɔwab̤i nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤atʰi anɡ̤amawaka aliʃumi ɔnkɛ ɛtʲɛɓilɛ ɔnkɛ ɛnɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a anɔɓuk͡xɔti akwasind̤a naɲɛ ind̤ɔd̤a atʰɔtʲwa kɛ amamɔwab̤i lɔɔ aɓa pʰant͡si kwɛsanɮa samasirajɛli laz̤ɔla iliz̤wɛ imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kwakʰɛ jaɓa nɡ̤uʃamɡ̤arɛ uɲana kaanati ɔwaɓulala kumafilisti amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu nɡ̤ɔv̤ikɔ lwɛɛnkɔmɔ wawasind̤isa najɛ amasirajɛli ɓapʰind̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛnz̤a uɓuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a akuɓa ɛfilɛ uɛhud̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a watʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤aɓɔ waɓanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sikajab̤in wakwakanan ɔɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ uɓukumkani ɛhat͡sɔrɛ ɔmtʰɛtʰɛlimkʰɔsi ɛɓɛnɡ̤usisɛra ɔɬɛli ɛharɔʃɛti jɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɓakʰala ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛnɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɛsiɲitʰi ɛz̤inɡ̤amakʰulu asitʰɔɓa waɓakǁina kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤amanɮa imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi maɓini kɛ kalɔku ud̤ɛb̤ɔra umprɔfɛtikaz̤i umkalapid̤ɔti ɛɓɛwalawula amasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa wajɛɬɛli pʰant͡si kɔmtʰi wɛsund̤u kad̤ɛb̤ɔra pʰakatʰi kwɛrama nɛb̤ɛtɛli kwɛlɛɛntaɓa lakwaɛfrajim ɓɛɲuka ɓaja kujɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ukuɓa atʰɛtʰɛ amatʲala watʰumɛla kɛ waɓiz̤a ub̤araki uɲana kaab̤inɔwam ɛkɛd̤ɛʃɛ jakwanafɛtali watʰi kujɛ akakuwisɛlanɡ̤a mtʰɛtʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɛsitʰi hamɓa ut͡salɛlɛ ɛntaɓɛni jɛtab̤ɔrɛ utʰaɓatʰɛ nawɛ amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amawaka aliʃumi kɔɔɲana ɓakanafɛtali nakɔɔɲana ɓakaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn nd̤ɔmt͡salɛla kuwɛ ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni wasɛkiʃɔn usisɛra umtʰɛtʰɛli wɔmkʰɔsi kajab̤in nɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔkulwa nɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jakʰɛ nd̤imnikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ watʰi ub̤araki kujɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ wahamɓa nd̤ɔhamɓa ukuɓa akutʰanɡ̤a uɓamɓɛ and̤iji kuhamɓa watʰi kɛ ukuhamɓa nd̤ija kuhamɓa nawɛ kɔd̤wa akuji kuɓa nalud̤umɔ kulɛ nɮɛla ujihamɓajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uja kutʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɔsisɛra amnikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɛnkaz̤ana wɛsuka kɛ ud̤ɛb̤ɔra waja nɔb̤araki ɛkɛd̤ɛʃɛ ub̤araki wawaɬaɓɛla umkʰɔsi amaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn namanafɛtali ɛkɛd̤ɛʃɛ kwɛɲuka amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amawaka aliʃumi amland̤ɛla wɛɲuka najɛ ud̤ɛb̤ɔra kɛ kalɔku uhɛb̤ɛrɛ umkɛni wajɛz̤aɬulɛ kumakɛni kɔɔɲana ɓakahɔb̤ab̤i ujisɛ wɔmkamɔsɛs waz̤imisa iintɛntɛ z̤akʰɛ z̤aja nɡ̤ɔmɔki wasɛt͡sahanajim nɡ̤asɛkɛd̤ɛʃɛ wakǁɛlɛlwa usisɛra ukuɓa ub̤araki uɲana kaab̤inɔwam uɲukɛ wɛz̤a ɛntaɓɛni jɛtab̤ɔrɛ usisɛra waz̤iɬanɡ̤anisa z̤ɔnkɛ iiŋǃwɛlɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔkulwa iiŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɛsiɲitʰi ɛz̤inɡ̤amakʰulu asitʰɔɓa naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓanajɛ ɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛharɔʃɛti jɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɓɛsa ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni wasɛkiʃɔn watʰi ud̤ɛb̤ɔra kub̤araki suk umɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jijɔ lɛ ujɛhɔv̤a amnikɛlɛ nɡ̤ajɔ usisɛra ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ akapʰumi jini ujɛhɔv̤a pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ wɛɬa ub̤araki ɛntaɓɛni jɛtab̤ɔrɛ ɛland̤ɛlwa nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amawaka aliʃumi ujɛhɔv̤a wamd̤uɓad̤uɓa usisɛra nɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɔkulwa nɔmkʰɔsi wakʰɛ wɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ pʰamɓi kɔb̤araki wɛɬa usisɛra ɛŋǃwɛlwɛni wasaɓa nɡ̤ɛɛɲawɔ ub̤araki waz̤isukɛla iiŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa wawusukɛla nɔmkʰɔsi wɛsa ɛharɔʃɛti jɛɛntlanɡ̤a wɔnkɛ umkʰɔsi kasisɛra nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ nɔkɔ amɲɛ usisɛra wasaɓa nɡ̤ɛɛɲawɔ waja ɛntɛntɛni kajahɛli umkahɛb̤ɛrɛ umkɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛlikǁɔlilɛ pʰakatʰi kɔjab̤in wasɛhat͡sɔrɛ nɛnɮu kahɛb̤ɛrɛ umkɛni wapʰuma kɛ ujahɛli waja wamkʰawulɛla usisɛra watʰi kujɛ pʰamɓuka nkɔsi jam pʰamɓukɛla ukɔjika wapʰamɓukɛla kɛ kujɛ ɛntɛntɛni wamɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ watʰi kujɛ kʰawund̤ipʰɛ jamanz̤i nd̤isɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iŋǁaniwɛ wamtʰululɛla ɛmv̤aɓɛni wasɛla wamɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla watʰi kujɛ jima ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ ɛntɛntɛni kɔtʰi ukuɓa kuz̤ɛ waɓuz̤a watʰi kukʰɔ apʰa utʰi haji ujahɛli umkahɛb̤ɛrɛ watʰaɓatʰa isikʰɔnkwanɛ sɛntɛntɛ wapʰatʰa isand̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa waja kujɛ ɛkǀɔtʰa wasiɓɛtʰɛla isikʰɔnkwanɛ ɛz̤intlafunwɛni z̤akʰɛ sapʰumɛla sanɡ̤ɛna ɛm̤laɓɛni kuɓa wajɛsɛɓutʰɔnɡ̤wɛni ɔɓukʰulu ɛd̤iniwɛ kɛ kwatʰi tʰapʰu ub̤araki ɛsukɛla usisɛra wapʰuma ujahɛli waja kumkʰawulɛla watʰi kujɛ jiz̤a nd̤ikuɓɔnisɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɔjifunajɔ waja kujɛ nankɔ usisɛra ɛlud̤wamɓa ɛfilɛ ɛnɛsikʰɔnkwanɛ ɛz̤intlafunwɛni utʰikǁɔ wamtʰɔɓa lɔɔ ujab̤in wamakanan pʰamɓi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli saja isanɮa sɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli siɓa nz̤ima nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nz̤ima pʰɛz̤u kɔjab̤in wamakanan ɓad̤a ɓamkǀʰitʰa ujab̤in wamakanan ɓaz̤a ɓav̤uma ɔɔd̤ɛb̤ɔra nɔb̤araki uɲana kaab̤inɔwam nɡ̤alɔɔ ɓɛsitʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkukʰɔkɛla kwɛɛnkɔkɛli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkukǃʰutʲwa kwaɓantu z̤iintliz̤ijɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓɔnɡ̤ani ujɛhɔv̤a jiv̤ani ɓɔkumkani ɓɛkani iinɮɛɓɛ z̤id̤wanɡ̤uɓɛ mna lɔ nd̤ija kuv̤uma kujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kumɓɛtʰɛla uhad̤i ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli jɛhɔv̤a ɛkupʰumɛni kwakʰɔ kwasɛhirɛ ɛkuɲalasɛni kwakʰɔ uv̤ɛla ɛm̤laɓɛni wakwaɛd̤ɔm laɲikima iɬaɓatʰi lav̤uz̤a nalɔ iz̤ulu ɛwɛ av̤uz̤a amanz̤i iintaɓa z̤az̤amaz̤ama pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a isinaji lɛja pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kaʃamɡ̤arɛ umfɔ kaanati nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kajahɛli ɓɛz̤inɡ̤ahand͡ʒ̤wa iinɮɛla aɓaɓɛhamɓa nɡ̤ɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤uʃu ɓahamɓa nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛla ɛz̤iz̤ipʰamɓusa ɛɓɛnɡ̤amiwa amapʰanɮɛ kwasirajɛli ɛɓɛnɡ̤amiwa nd̤ad̤a nd̤ɛsuka d̤ɛb̤ɔra nd̤ɛsuka nd̤aɓa nɡ̤unina kwasirajɛli kwakuɲulwɛ ɔɔtʰikǁɔ aɓat͡ʃa kwaz̤a kwajimfaz̤wɛ ɛmasanɡ̤wɛni inɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ nɔmkʰɔntɔ wawuɓɔnwa jini pʰakatʰi amaʃumi manɛ akwasirajɛli intliz̤ijɔ jam inɡ̤akuɓamisimtʰɛtʰɔ ɓakwasirajɛli inɡ̤akwaɓɔ ɓakǃʰutʲwa jintliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu ɓɔnɡ̤ani ujɛhɔv̤a nina ɓakʰwɛlɛ ɛz̤imaz̤ini ɛz̤im̤lɔpʰɛ z̤amaɛsilɛ nina ɓaɬala ɛz̤inkukwɛni nani ɓahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla kǀamŋ̤ǀ̤ani kud̤ɛ nɛz̤wi laɓaɓi ɓamakǁʰɔɓa apʰɔ kukʰiwa kʰɔna amanz̤i kʰɔna apʰɔ ɓɔɓɔnɡ̤a imisɛɓɛnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a jɔɓulunɡ̤isa imisɛɓɛnz̤i jɔɓulunɡ̤isa awajɛnz̤a ɛmapʰanɮɛni akʰɛ kwasirajɛli ɔkɔ ɓɛɬa aɓantu ɓakajɛhɔv̤a ɓaja ɛmasanɡ̤wɛni v̤uka v̤uka d̤ɛb̤ɔra v̤uka v̤uka ɬaɓa inɡ̤ɔma suk umɛ b̤araki tʰimɓa aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa ɓakʰɔ ɲana kaab̤inɔwam jiɬani kɛ makǃɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔ az̤iinɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa ninɡ̤aɓantu jɛhɔv̤a nd̤iɬɛlɛ pʰakatʰi kwamaɡ̤ɔxa av̤ɛla kwaɛfrajim aŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu ikwaamalɛki ɛmv̤a kwakʰɔ b̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤akɔwɛnu kwɛɬa kwamakirɛ aɓamisimtʰɛtʰɔ kwaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn umkǃikɛla unɔmŋǃaji wɔmb̤ali wɛmpi kwaisakarɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli kuɲɛ nɔd̤ɛb̤ɔra nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔisakarɛ ukwand͡ʒ̤alɔ ub̤araki ɓaɡ̤alɛlɛka ɛntilini ɓamland̤ɛla ɛmid͡ʒ̤ɛlwɛni jakwarub̤ɛn jaɓa kukusɔnɡ̤ɛla ɔkukʰulu kwɛntliz̤ijɔ uɓuɬalɛlɛni pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤iɓaja upʰulapʰula amakʰwɛlɔ ɛmiɬamɓini ɛmid͡ʒ̤ɛlwɛni jakwarub̤ɛn jaɓa kukuɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀa ɔkukʰulu kwɛntliz̤ijɔ uɡ̤ilijad̤i pʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an ud̤an kɛ jɛna waliɓala jini nɡ̤asɛz̤iŋǃanawɛni uaʃɛrɛ waɬala nɡ̤asɛluŋǁwɛmɛni lɔlwanɮɛ walala pʰant͡si nɡ̤asɛmakǀʰwɛɓɛni alɔ amaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn nɡ̤aɓantu aɓaɓɛnz̤a isikǀʰɛnɡ̤ɛ uɓɔmi ɓaɓɔ ɛkufɛni namanafɛtali ɛz̤ind̤awɛni ɛz̤ipʰakamilɛjɔ z̤ɛliz̤wɛ kwafika ɔɔkumkani ɓalwa ɓaz̤a ɔɔkumkani ɓakwakanan ɓalwa ɛtahanaki nɡ̤asɛmanz̤ini asɛmɛɡ̤id̤ɔ aɓatʰimɓa nɛkǃʰɔʃa lɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ z̤alwa ɛz̤ulwini z̤alwa iinkwɛnkwɛz̤i ɛmɛnd̤wɛni jaz̤ɔ nɔsisɛra umland͡ʒ̤ana wasɛkiʃɔn waɓakʰukulisa umland͡ʒ̤ana wamaɲanɡ̤ɛ umland͡ʒ̤ana wasɛkiʃɔn ɲatʰɛla nɡ̤amanɮa mpʰɛfumlɔ az̤a aŋ̤ǃ̤iʃa kɛ nɡ̤amaŋǃina amahaʃɛ nɡ̤ɔkupʰala nɡ̤ɔkupʰala anamanɮa kuwɔ kǃalɛkisani imɛrɔz̤i sat͡ʃɔ isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a kǃalɛkisani kǃalɛkisani aɓɛmi ɓakʰɔna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛnɡ̤ɛz̤anɡ̤a kuŋǀɛd̤a ujɛhɔv̤a kuŋǀɛd̤a ujɛhɔv̤a pʰakatʰi kwamaɡ̤ɔxa makasikɛlɛlwɛ kunɛz̤iɲɛ iintɔkaz̤i ujahɛli umkahɛb̤ɛrɛ umkɛni makasikɛlɛlwɛ kunɛɛntɔkaz̤i ɛz̤isɛz̤intɛntɛni wakǀɛla amanz̤i nɡ̤ɛsitʲa sɛz̤in̤an̤a wasɔnd̤ɛz̤a iŋ̤ǃ̤aka wasa isanɮa sakʰɛ ɛsikʰɔnkwanɛni wasa ɛsɔkunɛnɛ ɛsand̤wɛni saɓasɛɓɛnz̤a kanz̤ima wamkʰand̤a usisɛra wam̤lɛkɛz̤a intlɔkɔ wam̤laɓa wamb̤ɔɮɔz̤a ɛz̤intlafunwɛni waɡ̤ukǃa ɛz̤iɲawɛni z̤akʰɛ pʰant͡si waɡ̤ukǃa ɛz̤iɲawɛni z̤akʰɛ apʰɔ waɡ̤ukǃa kʰɔna ɛpʰɛlilɛ walunɡ̤uz̤a nɡ̤ɛfɛstilɛ wamɛmɛz̤a nɡ̤ɛsitʰuɓa kasisɛra watʰi iliɓɛlɛ jini iŋǃwɛlɔ jakʰɛ jɔkulwa inɡ̤afiki nd͡ʒ̤ɛ z̤iɬalɛlɛni iiŋǃwɛlɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔmkʰɔsi z̤inɡ̤aɬɔkɔmi nd͡ʒ̤ɛ apʰɛnd̤ulɛ alumkilɛjɔ amakʰɔsaz̤ana akʰɛkɛ jɛna apʰind̤ɛ kwaɛlakʰɛ ɛtʰɛtʰa jɛd̤wa atʰi aɓafumɛnɛ aɓaɓi amakǁʰɔɓa jintɔmɓi z̤iintɔmɓi nɡ̤amɓini kwintlɔkɔ jɛnd̤ɔd̤a nɡ̤amakǁʰɔɓa ɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤imfakamfɛlɛ kusisɛra nɡ̤amakǁʰɔɓa ɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤imfakamfɛlɛ ɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤ilukwɛ z̤amfakamfɛlɛ jinɡ̤uɓɔ ɛmfakamfɛlɛ z̤iinɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤imɓini ɛz̤ilukwɛ z̤amfakamfɛlɛ ɛz̤intaɲɛni z̤amakǁʰɔɓa makuɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukub̤ub̤a kwɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ jɛhɔv̤a kɛ aɓamtʰand̤ajɔ maɓaɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkupʰuma kwɛlanɡ̤a linamanɮa laz̤ɔla kɛ iliz̤wɛ imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi manɛ kɛ kalɔku ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛnz̤a uɓuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a waɓanikɛla ujɛhɔv̤a ɛsanɮɛni samamid̤ijan imiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ isanɮa samamid̤ijan saɓa namanɮa pʰɛz̤u kwamasirajɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaz̤ilunɡ̤isɛla imiɡ̤ɔŋ̤ǁ̤ɔ ɛsɛz̤intaɓɛni nɛmikǃɔlɔmɓa nɛɛmɓɔnisɛlɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamamid̤ijan kwatʰi kǁa aɓɛɬwajɛlɛ amasirajɛli ɛɲuka amamid̤ijan namaamalɛki naɓasɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɓɛɲuka ɓawafikɛla ɓawaŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a ɓajɔnakalisa indʲɛɓɔ jɛliz̤wɛ kwad̤a kwaja ɛɡ̤az̤a aɓaʃija ntɔ iɮiwajɔ kwasirajɛli naɡ̤uʃa nankɔmɔ naɛsilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛɓɛɲuka ɓɔna nɛmfujɔ jaɓɔ nɛɛntɛntɛ z̤aɓɔ ɓɛz̤a ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnkumɓi ukuɓa ɓaninz̤i aɓaɓa nakuɓalwa ɓɔna nɛɛnkamɛla z̤aɓɔ ɓalinɡ̤ɛna iliz̤wɛ ukuɓa ɓalɔnakalisɛ ab̤itʲa kunɛnɛ amasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamamid̤ijan ɓakʰala ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kujɛhɔv̤a kwatʰi ɓakukʰala ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamamid̤ijan ujɛhɔv̤a watʰuma ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤umprɔfɛti kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli jatʰi kuɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi nd̤aniɲusa ɛjiputa nd̤anikʰupʰa ɛnɮwini jɔɓukʰɔɓɔka nd̤aniɬanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni samajiputa nasɛsanɮɛni saɓakǁini ɓɛnu ɓɔnkɛ nd̤aɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa pʰamɓi kwɛnu nd̤aninika iliz̤wɛ laɓɔ nd̤atʰi nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu ninɡ̤aɓɔjiki ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓamaamɔri ɛniɬɛli ɛz̤wɛni lawɔ analipʰulapʰula iz̤wi kwɛz̤a isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a saɬala pʰant͡si kɔmɔki ɔɓusɛɔfra kajɔwaʃɛ umab̤ihɛz̤ɛrɛ kɛ uɡ̤id̤ijɔn uɲana wakʰɛ wajɛb̤ula iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa ɛsikǁɔv̤ulɛlwɛni ukuz̤ɛ ajifiɬɛ kumamid̤ijan kwaɓɔnakala isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a kujɛ satʰi kujɛ ujɛhɔv̤a unawɛ ɡ̤ɔxand̤ini linɔɓuk͡xɔti watʰi uɡ̤id̤ijɔn kusɔ kǀamaɡ̤u nkɔsi jam ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a unatʰi jini ukuɓa kusiɬɛlɛ kɔnkɛ ɔku ipʰi jɔnkɛ imisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɛ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ aɓaɓɛsiɓalisɛla nɡ̤ajɔ ɔɔɓawɔ ɓɛsitʰi sasinɡ̤aɲuswanɡ̤a nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɛjiputa kunɡ̤ɔku ujɛhɔv̤a usilaɬilɛ wasinikɛla ɛsanɮɛni samamid̤ijan wab̤ɛka kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a kujɛ watʰi hamɓa nɡ̤ala manɮa akʰɔ uwasind̤isɛ amasirajɛli ɛsanɮɛni samamid̤ijan akutʰuɲwɛ nd̤im jini watʰi jɛna kujɛ kǀamaɡ̤u nkɔsi jam nd̤ɔwasind̤isa nɡ̤antɔni amasirajɛli kʰanɡ̤ɛla umz̤i wakɔwɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔwɔna upʰant͡si kwamanasɛ nd̤inɡ̤ujɛna mŋǀinanɛ ɛnɮwini kaɓawɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɛ nd̤ija kuɓa nawɛ uwaɓulalɛ amamid̤ijan nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤and̤ɔd̤aɲɛ watʰi kujɛ ukuɓa nd̤iɓaɓalwɛ nɡ̤uwɛ kʰawund̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ umkǃɔnd̤isɔ wɔkuɓa nɡ̤uwɛ ɔtʰɛtʰa musa apʰa nd̤id̤ɛ nd̤iz̤ɛ kuwɛ nd̤ixɔlɛ umnikɛlɔ nd̤iwuɓɛkɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ watʰi nd̤ɔɬala ud̤ɛ uɓujɛ uɡ̤id̤ijɔn waja walunɡ̤isa itakanɛ lɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ nɛz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ z̤ɛɛfa jɔmɡ̤uɓɔ ɔkǀɔliwɛjɔ iɲama wajiɓɛka ɛnɡ̤ɔɓɔz̤ini um̤luz̤i wawuɡ̤alɛla ɛmɓiz̤ɛni waz̤isa kujɛ pʰant͡si kɔmɔki wasɔnd̤ɛz̤a satʰi kujɛ isitʰuɲwa sikatʰikǁɔ tʰaɓatʰa iɲama nɛz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ uz̤iɓɛkɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛli litʲɛ uwupʰalaz̤ɛlɛ kulɔ um̤luz̤i wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ saz̤a isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a sɛsa iŋǀam jɛntɔnɡ̤a ɛsɛsanɮɛni sasɔ sakǀʰukumisa iɲama nɛz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ wɛɲuka umlilɔ ɛlitʲɛni wajiɮa iɲama nɛz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ saz̤a isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a sɛmka kɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ waɓɔna uɡ̤id̤ijɔn ukuɓa sisitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a watʰi uɡ̤id̤ijɔn jɔɔ nkɔsi jɛhɔv̤a nd̤it͡ʃɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iɓɔnɛnɛ nɛsitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi kujɛ ukǁɔlɔ maluɓɛ kuwɛ ukɔjika akuji uɡ̤id̤ijɔn wakʰa kʰɔna isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ kujɛhɔv̤a watʰi iɡ̤ama lasɔ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤aulukǁɔlɔ sisɛkʰɔ nanam̤la ɛɔfra jamaab̤ihɛz̤ɛrɛ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɛ tʰaɓatʰa inkunz̤i jɛnkɔmɔ ɛjɛkajiɬɔ ɛjɛsiɓini inkunz̤i ɛmiɲaka isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ usid̤iliz̤ɛ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sikab̤ahali sikajiɬɔ umɡ̤awulɛ uaʃɛra ɔnɡ̤akusɔ wakʰɛ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jalɛ ŋǃaɓa usilunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ utʰaɓatʰɛ ɛjɛsiɓini inkunz̤i uɲusɛ id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nɡ̤ɛɛnkuni z̤ikaaʃɛra ɔmɡ̤awulɛjɔ uɡ̤id̤ijɔn watʰaɓatʰa amad̤ɔd̤a aliʃumi kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ wɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ watʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kujɛ kwatʰi kuɓa ɛsɔjika inɮu kajisɛ namad̤ɔd̤a alɔɔ mz̤i akɛnz̤a ɛmini wɛnz̤a ɛɓusuku av̤uka nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ amad̤ɔd̤a alɔɔ mz̤i nasɔ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sikab̤ahali sid̤iliz̤iwɛ ɛɡ̤awulwɛ nɔaʃɛra ɔɓɛnɡ̤akusɔ nɛjɛsiɓini inkunz̤i iɲusiwɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛsiɓɛ sakʰiwɛ jatʰi ɛɲɛ kwɛɲɛ nɡ̤uɓani lɔ wɛnz̤ɛ lɛ ntɔ aɓuz̤a ɓatʰi nɡ̤uɡ̤id̤ijɔn uɲana kajɔwaʃɛ lɔ wɛnz̤ɛ lɛ ntɔ atʰi amad̤ɔd̤a alɔɔ mz̤i kujɔwaʃɛ kʰupʰa uɲana wakʰɔ afɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa usid̤iliz̤ilɛ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sikab̤ahali wamɡ̤awula uaʃɛra ɔɓɛnɡ̤akusɔ watʰi ujɔwaʃɛ kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛmmɛlɛ nija kummɛla ub̤ahali aɓa nija kumsind̤isa aɓa lɔwɔ ummɛlajɔ ub̤ahali makaɓulawɛ makʰɛ kusɛ ukuɓa unɡ̤utʰikǁɔ makaz̤itʰɛtʰɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sid̤iliz̤iwɛ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sakʰɛ kwatʰiwa lɔɔ unɡ̤ujɛrub̤ahali kusitʰiwa ub̤ahali makapʰikisanɛ najɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛsid̤iliz̤ilɛ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sakʰɛ aɬanɡ̤ana nd̤awɔɲɛ ɔnkɛ amamid̤ijan namaamalɛki naɓasɛmpumalanɡ̤a awɛla ɛmatʰafɛni asɛjiz̤ɛrɛli umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a wanɡ̤ɛna kuɡ̤id̤ijɔn wav̤utʰɛla nɡ̤ɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ aɬatʲɛlwa umkʰɔsi ɛz̤a amaab̤ihɛz̤ɛrɛ amland̤ɛla watʰuma aɓatʰuɲwa kumamanasɛ ɔnkɛ aɬatʲɛlwa ɛz̤a nawɔ amland̤ɛla watʰuma aɓatʰuɲwa kumaaʃɛrɛ nakumaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn nakumanafɛtali ɛɲuka awakʰawulɛla watʰi uɡ̤id̤ijɔn kutʰikǁɔ ukuɓa ujawasind̤isa amasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛsanɮa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ utʰɛtʰilɛjɔ nd̤iɓɛkɛ uɓɔja ɔɓukǀʰɛtʲiwɛjɔ ɛsand̤ɛni ukuɓa umɓɛtʰɛ utʰɛ waɓa sɛɓɔjɛni ɓɔd̤wa wɔnkɛ um̤laɓa wawɔmilɛ nd̤ija kwaz̤i kɛ ukuɓa uja kuwasind̤isa amasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛsanɮa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ utʰɛtʰilɛjɔ kwaɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ wav̤uka nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ waɓukʰamanɡ̤a uɓɔja wawukʰama umɓɛtʰɛ ɛɓɔjɛni kwaz̤ala ind̤ɛɓɛ nɡ̤amanz̤i watʰi uɡ̤id̤ijɔn kutʰikǁɔ mawunɡ̤av̤utʰi umsind̤ɔ wakʰɔ nd̤akutʰɛtʰa ɔkwɛsi siɬanɮɔ sɔd̤wa makʰɛ nd̤ilinɡ̤ɛ ɔkwɛsi siɬanɮɔ sɔd̤wa nɡ̤ɔɓɔja kɔmɛ uɓɔja ɓɔd̤wa umɓɛtʰɛ uɓɛ sɛm̤laɓɛni wɔnkɛ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku kɔma uɓɔja ɓɔd̤wa umɓɛtʰɛ waɓa sɛm̤laɓɛni wɔnkɛ wav̤uka ujɛrub̤ahali nɡ̤uɡ̤id̤ijɔn kɛ lɔwɔ naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ najɛ ɓamisa ɛmantlɔkɔ ɔmtʰɔmɓɔ wɛharɔd̤i kɛ umkʰɔsi wamamid̤ijan wawunɡ̤akujɛ nɡ̤asɛntla kwɛnd̤uli jakwamɔrɛ ɛntilini watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kuɡ̤id̤ijɔn ɓaninz̤i aɓantu aɓanawɛ kunɔkuɓa nd̤iwanikɛlɛ amamid̤ijan ɛsanɮɛni saɓɔ ɬɛz̤ɛ amasirajɛli akǃʰajisɛ atʰi sisind̤iswɛ sisanɮa sɛtʰu kʰawud̤and̤ulukɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤aɓantu utʰi ɔwɔjikajɔ nɔɡ̤ub̤ajɔ makaɓujɛ makaɲɛɓɛlɛz̤ɛ ɛmkɛ ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤ɛɡ̤ilijad̤i kwaɓuja kɛ kuɓɔ aɓantu aɓanɡ̤amawaka anɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmaɓini anamaɓini aliʃumi watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kuɡ̤id̤ijɔn aɓantu ɓasɛɓaninz̤i jiɬa naɓɔ ujɛ ɛmanz̤ini nd̤ikukʰɛtʰɛlɛ ɓɔna apʰɔ kɔtʰi ɛnd̤itʰɛ kuwɛ lɔ uja kuhamɓa nawɛ maz̤ɛ ahamɓɛ nawɛ jɛna ɓɔnkɛ ɛnd̤isukuɓa nd̤itʰi kuwɛ lɔ akaji kuhamɓa nawɛ iz̤ɛ anɡ̤aɓamɓi nawɛ jɛna wɛɬa naɓantu waja ɛmanz̤ini watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kuɡ̤id̤ijɔn ɓɔnkɛ aɓasukuɓa ɓɛk͡xamŋǀɛla amanz̤i nɡ̤ɔlwimi lwaɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ikǁʰapʰajɔ ind͡ʒ̤a uz̤ɛ uɓamisɛ ɓɔd̤wa ɓɔnkɛ aɓasukuɓa ɓɛɡ̤ukǃa nɡ̤amad̤ɔlɔ aɓɔ ukuɓa ɓasɛlɛ uz̤ɛ uɓamisɛ ɓɔd̤wa inani laɓasɛlajɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa salɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni laɓa nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu matʰatʰu ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɲɛ aɓantu ɓaɡ̤ukǃa nɡ̤amad̤ɔlɔ aɓɔ ukuɓa ɓasɛlɛ amanz̤i watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kuɡ̤id̤ijɔn nd̤ija kunisind̤isa nɡ̤ala mad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu matʰatʰu ak͡xamŋǀɛlɛjɔ nd̤iwanikɛlɛ amamid̤ijan ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɲɛ aɓantu maɓaɡ̤ɔd̤ukɛ ɛlɔwɔ ajɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ ɓawupʰatʰa aɓantu aɓɔ umpʰakɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa saɓɔ nɛz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ z̤aɓɔ wawand̤ulula ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli ukuɓa ilɛjɔ ijɛ ɛntɛntɛni jajɔ waɡ̤ǀ̤ina amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ amakʰulu matʰatʰu umkʰɔsi wamamid̤ijan waɓa nɡ̤ɛz̤ant͡si kwakʰɛ ɛntilini kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi kujɛ v̤uka uɬɛ ujɛ ɛmpini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ijinikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ ukuɓa ujɔjika ukuɬa jiɬa nɔmfana wakwakʰɔ ufura ujɛ ɛmpini uv̤ɛ intɔ aɓajitʰɛtʰajɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ sija kɔmɛlɛla isanɮa sakʰɔ jiɬa kɛ ujɛ ɛmpini wɛɬa kɛ jɛna nɔfura wakwakʰɛ ɓaja ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwaɓakǁʰɔɓilɛjɔ aɓasɛmpini amamid̤ijan namaamalɛki naɓasɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɓɔnkɛ ɓaɓɛlɛlɛ ɛntilini ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnkumɓi ukuɓa ɓaninz̤i nɛɛnkamɛla z̤awɔ z̤iɓɛ z̤inɡ̤ɛnakuɓalwa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntlaɓatʰi jɔŋǁwɛmɛ lɔlwanɮɛ ukuɓa z̤ininz̤i wafika uɡ̤id̤ijɔn nant͡sɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ikǁɛlɛla ummɛlwanɛ wajɔ ipʰupʰa isitʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ipʰupʰɛ ipʰupʰa nd̤iɓɔnɛ kukǃɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlɛka isɔnka sɛxasi sisiz̤a ɛmkʰɔsini wamamid̤ijan sifikɛ ɛntɛntɛni siɓɛtʰɛ iwɛ itʰi b̤ukukǃu intɛntɛ itʰi b̤uma wapʰɛnd̤ula ummɛlwanɛ wajɔ watʰi lɔɔ ntɔ kund͡ʒ̤ɛ lik͡xɛlɛ likaɡ̤id̤ijɔn uɲana kajɔwaʃɛ ind̤ɔd̤a jakwasirajɛli utʰikǁɔ uwanikɛlɛ amamid̤ijan nɔmkʰɔsi wɔnkɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ kwatʰi akukuv̤a uɡ̤id̤ijɔn ukukǁɛlwa kwɛpʰupʰa nɔkutʰʲilwa kwalɔ waŋǃula waɓujɛla ɛmkʰɔsini wamasirajɛli watʰi v̤ukani nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ujinikɛlɛ jamamid̤ijan ɛsanɮɛni sɛnu wawaɬula aɓa nɡ̤amakǃɛla ɔmatʰatʰu amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ amakʰulu matʰatʰu waɓɛka iz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɛsanɮɛni sawɔ ɔnkɛ nɛmipʰand̤a ɛnɡ̤ɛnantɔ nɛz̤ikʰuni ɛz̤iv̤utʰajɔ nɡ̤apʰakatʰi kwɛmipʰand̤a lɛjɔ watʰi kuwɔ kʰanɡ̤ɛlani nɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ jaɓɔnani nd̤akufika ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmpi nɔtʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤ɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ nɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤ɔv̤utʰɛla nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓanam niv̤utʰɛlɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛmkʰɔsini nitʰi ha ha ik͡xɛlɛ likajɛhɔv̤a likaɡ̤id̤ijɔn wafika kɛ uɡ̤id̤ijɔn nɛkʰulu lamad̤ɔd̤a ɛlinajɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmpi ɛkukǃalɛkɛni kɔmlind̤ɔ ɔpʰakatʰi kɔɓusuku ɓakutʰ ukutʰi aɓalind̤i lav̤utʰɛla nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ lijikǃʰɛkɛz̤a imipʰand̤a ɛsɛz̤anɮɛni z̤alɔ av̤utʰɛla kɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ amakǃɛla ɔmatʰatʰu ajikǃʰɛkɛz̤a imipʰand̤a az̤ipʰatʰa iz̤iɓanɛ ɛz̤iv̤utʰajɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤awɔ z̤ɔkʰɔɬɔ awapʰatʰa amakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤awɔ z̤ɔkunɛnɛ ukuɓa av̤utʰɛlɛ ad̤and̤uluka ɛsitʰi ha ha ik͡xɛlɛ likajɛhɔv̤a likaɡ̤id̤ijɔn ɛma ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤awɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛmpini jasaɓa jɔnkɛ jakʰala jasaɓisa amakʰulu ɔmatʰatʰu av̤utʰɛla nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ ujɛhɔv̤a walib̤ɛkisa ik͡xɛlɛ lɛnd̤ɔd̤a kummɛlwanɛ wajɔ jɔnkɛ jasaɓa jasinɡ̤a ɛb̤ɛtɛʃita nɡ̤asɛt͡sɛrɛra jasinɡ̤a ɛmd̤ɛni wɛab̤ɛlɛmɛhɔla nɡ̤apʰaja kwɛtab̤ata waɬatʲɛlwa umkʰɔsi wɛz̤a wakwasirajɛli ɛpʰuma kwanafɛtali nakwaaʃɛrɛ nakumanasɛ wɔnkɛ wawasukɛla amamid̤ijan uɡ̤id̤ijɔn watʰuma aɓatʰuɲwa kwɛlɛɛntaɓa lɔnkɛ lakwaɛfrajim ɛsitʰi jiɬani niwaɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤ɛ amamid̤ijan niwapʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ukutʰaɓatʰa amanz̤i nisɛ ɛb̤ɛtɛb̤ara nɛjɔrd̤an waɬatʲwa umkʰɔsi ɓɛz̤a aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓakwaɛfrajim ɓapʰanɡ̤ɛla ukuwatʰaɓatʰa amanz̤i lawɔ ɓɛsa ɛb̤ɛtɛb̤ara nɛjɔrd̤an ɓaɓaɓamɓa aɓatʰɛtʰɛli aɓaɓini ɓamamid̤ijan uɔrɛb̤ɛ nɔz̤ɛb̤ɛ ɓamɓulalɛla uɔrɛb̤ɛ ɛwɛni likaɔrɛb̤ɛ uz̤ɛb̤ɛ ɓamɓulalɛla ɛsikǁɔv̤ulɛlwɛni sikaz̤ɛb̤ɛ ɓawasukɛla amamid̤ijan ɓɛz̤a nɛntlɔkɔ kaɔrɛb̤ɛ nɛkaz̤ɛb̤ɛ kuɡ̤id̤ijɔn pʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an atʰi amad̤ɔd̤a akwaɛfrajim kujɛ jintɔni lɛ ntɔ ujɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kutʰi jɔkuɓa unɡ̤asiɓiz̤i ukuja kwakʰɔ namamid̤ijan ɓaɓamɓana najɛ kaɓukʰali watʰi kuwɔ nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ ntɔni nɡ̤ɔku nɡ̤anɡ̤ani ukub̤ikikǀa kwamaɛfrajim akukuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰilɛ nɡ̤ɔkulunɡ̤a ukuv̤una iid̤ilija kɔmab̤ihɛz̤ɛrɛ utʰikǁɔ uɓanikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɛnu aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakwamid̤ijan uɔrɛb̤ɛ nɔz̤ɛb̤ɛ jintɔni ɛnd̤inɔkujɛnz̤a nɡ̤anɡ̤ani jaz̤a iŋ̤ǃ̤umɓɔ jawɔ nɡ̤akujɛ jad̤amɓa ɛkulitʰɛtʰɛni kwakʰɛ ɛlɔliz̤wi akufika uɡ̤id̤ijɔn ɛjɔrd̤an ɛwɛla ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu matʰatʰu ɛtʰʲafilɛ ɛsasukɛla nɔkɔ watʰi kumad̤ɔd̤a asɛsukɔti kʰaniɓapʰɛ aɓantu aɓa ɓand̤iland̤ɛlajɔ iintɛnd̤ana z̤ɛz̤ɔnka nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓatʰʲafilɛ nd̤isukɛla uz̤ɛb̤a nɔt͡salimuna ɔɔkumkani ɓamamid̤ijan ɓatʰi aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓasɛsukɔti isanɮa sikaz̤ɛb̤a nɔt͡salimuna sɛsisɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ jini ukuɓa siwunikɛ umkʰɔsi wakʰɔ isɔnka watʰi uɡ̤id̤ijɔn kǁa kund͡ʒ̤alɔ akuɓanikɛla ujɛhɔv̤a ɔɔz̤ɛb̤a nɔt͡salimuna ɛsanɮɛni nd̤ɔjib̤alula iɲama jɛnu nɡ̤ɛmitʰana ɛnamɛv̤a jasɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nanɡ̤amakʰakakʰaka wɛɲuka kʰɔna waja ɛpɛnuwɛli watʰɛtʰa kuɓɔ kwanɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ ɓampʰɛnd̤ula aɓantu ɓasɛpɛnuwɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓampʰɛnd̤ula nɡ̤akɔ aɓantu ɓasɛsukɔti wat͡ʃɔ nakuɓantu ɓasɛpɛnuwɛli ukutʰi ɛkuɓujɛni nɡ̤ɔkǁɔlɔ nd̤ɔjid̤iliz̤a lɛ ŋǃaɓa ind̤ɛ kɛ kalɔku uz̤ɛb̤a nɔt͡salimuna ɓɛɓɛsɛkarkɔrɛ ɓɛnɛmikʰɔsi jaɓɔ nɡ̤atʰi nɡ̤amawaka aliʃumi ɛlinamaɬanu ɛwɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛsɛlɛ kwimikʰɔsi jɔnkɛ jaɓasɛmpumalanɡ̤a kwakuwɛ amad̤ɔd̤a alikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɓini axɔla ik͡xɛlɛ wɛɲuka uɡ̤id̤ijɔn nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jaɓaɬala ɛz̤intɛntɛni nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a kwɛnɔb̤a nɛjɔɡ̤ɛb̤ɛha wajiɓulala lɛjɔ iɓinɡ̤akǁʰalɛlɛ ntɔ ɓasaɓa ɔɔz̤ɛb̤a nɔt͡salimuna waɓasukɛla waɓaɓamɓa ɔɔkumkani ɓɔɓaɓini ɓamamid̤ijan ɔɔz̤ɛb̤a nɔt͡salimuna wajɔtʰusa jɔnkɛ waɓuja uɡ̤id̤ijɔn uɲana kajɔwaʃɛ ɛmfaz̤wɛni ɛv̤ɛla ɛkǃʰinɛni lɛhɛhɛrɛs waɓamɓa ind̤ɔd̤ana jaɓantu ɓasɛsukɔti wajiɓuz̤a jamɓalɛla aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓasɛsukɔti namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akʰɔna amad̤ɔd̤a amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wɛz̤a ɛɓantwini ɓasɛsukɔti watʰi naɓa ɔɔz̤ɛb̤a nɔt͡salimuna ɛniɓɛ nind̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a nɡ̤aɓɔ nisitʰi isanɮa sikaz̤ɛb̤a nɔt͡salimuna sɛsisɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ jini ukuɓa siwanikɛ isɔnka amad̤ɔd̤a akʰɔ atʰʲafilɛjɔ wawatʰaɓatʰa amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu alɔɔ mz̤i nɛmitʰana ɛnamɛv̤a jasɛntlanɡ̤ɔ namakʰakakʰaka wawakǃɔnd̤isa nɡ̤ajɔ amad̤ɔd̤a asɛsukɔti wajid̤iliz̤a nɛŋǃaɓa ɛnd̤ɛ jasɛpɛnuwɛli waɓaɓulala aɓantu ɓalɔɔ mz̤i watʰi kuz̤ɛb̤a nɔt͡salimuna ɛɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ani amad̤ɔd̤a ɛnawaɓulalajɔ ɛtab̤ɔrɛ ɓatʰi aɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɛ ɛlɔwɔ ɛnɛsitʰɔmɔ sɔɲana wɔkumkani watʰi ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓaz̤alwana ɓam aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakama ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa ɓɛniɓasind̤isilɛ nɡ̤ɛnd̤inɡ̤aniɓulali watʰi kujɛtɛrɛ ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ kujɛ suk umɛ uɓaɓulalɛ kɛ ind̤ɔd̤ana lɛjɔ ajilixɔlanɡ̤a ik͡xɛlɛ lajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iɓisɔjika kuɓa iɓisɛnɡ̤umfana ɓatʰi ɔɔz̤ɛb̤a nɔt͡salimuna suk umɛ wɛna usitʰi kǃwɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ind͡ʒ̤alɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɓund͡ʒ̤alɔ nɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓajɔ wɛsuka kɛ uɡ̤id̤ijɔn waɓaɓulala ɔɔz̤ɛb̤a nɔt͡salimuna waz̤itʰaɓatʰa iint͡simɓi ɛz̤isɛz̤intaɲɛni z̤ɛɛnkamɛla z̤aɓɔ atʰi amasirajɛli kuɡ̤id̤ijɔn silawulɛ wɛna kwanɔɲana wakʰɔ nɔɲana wɔɲana wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa usisind̤isilɛ ɛsanɮɛni samamid̤ijan watʰi uɡ̤id̤ijɔn kuwɔ and̤iji akaji nɔɲana nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɔja watʰi uɡ̤id̤ijɔn kuwɔ nd̤ija kukǀɛla ŋ̤ǀ̤ɛlɔɲɛ nd̤inikɛni ɛlɔwɔ id͡ʒ̤ikaz̤i lɛkǁʰɔɓa lakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛnamad͡ʒ̤ikaz̤i ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ kuɓa ɛɓɛnɡ̤amaiʃmajɛli atʰi sɔkunika nɡ̤ɛmv̤umɛ az̤anɮala iinɡ̤uɓɔ apʰɔsa kʰɔna ɛlɔwɔ id͡ʒ̤ikaz̤i lɛkǁʰɔɓa lakʰɛ uɓunz̤ima ɓamad͡ʒ̤ikaz̤i ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ awawakǀɛlajɔ ɓaɓa ɛlinamakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛɛʃɛkɛlɛ z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛz̤aa nt͡simɓi namakǀikǀi nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤imfusa ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤ikɔɔkumkani ɓamamid̤ijan nanɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛz̤id̤anɡ̤a ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤isɛz̤intaɲɛni z̤ɛɛnkamɛla z̤aɓɔ uɡ̤id̤ijɔn wɛnz̤a nɡ̤az̤ɔ iɛfɔd̤i wajiɓɛka ɛmz̤ini wakʰɛ ɛɔfra atʰi ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli ahɛɲuz̤a nɡ̤ɔkujiland̤ɛla kʰɔna janɡ̤umɡ̤iɓɛ kuɡ̤id̤ijɔn nakwinɮu jakʰɛ atʰɔtʲwa amamid̤ijan pʰamɓi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli akapʰind̤a az̤ipʰakamisɛ iintlɔkɔ z̤awɔ laz̤ɔla kɛ iliz̤wɛ imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi manɛ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kaɡ̤id̤ijɔn waja ujɛrub̤ahali uɲana kajɔwaʃɛ waɬala ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ uɡ̤id̤ijɔn ɛɓɛnɔɔɲana aɓanɡ̤amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ aɓapʰumajɔ ɛsiŋǃɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛnaɓafaz̤i aɓaninz̤i nɛʃwɛʃwɛ lakʰɛ ɛliɓɛ likwaʃɛkɛm lamz̤alɛla uɲana nalɔ awamtʰija iɡ̤ama lɔkuɓa nɡ̤uab̤imɛlɛki wafa uɡ̤id̤ijɔn uɲana kajɔwaʃɛ ɛjinɡ̤wɛv̤u ɛnkulu waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni likajɔwaʃɛ ujisɛ ɛɔfra jamaab̤ihɛz̤ɛrɛ kwatʰi uɡ̤id̤ijɔn ɓaɓuja ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓahɛɲuz̤a nɡ̤ɔkuland̤ɛla ub̤ahali ɓaz̤imisɛla ub̤ahalib̤ɛriti waɓa nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓamkʰumɓulanɡ̤a ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɔwaɓaɬanɡ̤ulajɔ ɛsanɮɛni sɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ aɓajɛnz̤ɛla ŋǀɛɓa inɮu kajɛrub̤ahali kaɡ̤id̤ijɔn nɡ̤ɔkɔkulunɡ̤a kɔnkɛ awawɛnz̤ɛlajɔ amasirajɛli waja uab̤imɛlɛki kajɛrub̤ahali kwaʃɛkɛm kuɓaz̤alwana ɓɔnina watʰɛtʰa kuɓɔ nakwimiz̤alwanɛ jɔnkɛ jɛnɮu kajisɛ jɔnina watʰi kʰanitʰɛtʰɛ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤aɓɛmi ɓakwaʃɛkɛm ɓɔnkɛ nitʰi ɔkɔna kulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kukutʰi nilawulwɛ nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɔnkɛ ɓakajɛrub̤ahali kukutʰi nilawulwɛ jind̤ɔd̤a iɓɛ ɲɛ kʰumɓulani ukuɓa nd̤ilitʰamɓɔ lɛnu nd̤ijiɲama jɛnu ɓatʰɛtʰa aɓaz̤alwana ɓɔnina nɡ̤ajɛ ɛz̤ind̤ɛɓɛni z̤aɓɛmi ɓakwaʃɛkɛm ɓɔnkɛ lɔɔ maz̤wi ɔnkɛ intliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ jakutʰɔɓɛla ukumland̤ɛla uab̤imɛlɛki nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓatʰi nɡ̤umz̤alwana wɛtʰu ɓamnika iisiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛz̤iv̤ɛla ɛnɮwini kab̤ahalib̤ɛriti uab̤imɛlɛki wakǃɛʃa nɡ̤az̤ɔ amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤ɛnaɓuntu aɡ̤asilɛjɔ amland̤ɛla kɛ wɛz̤a ɛnɮwini kajisɛ ɛɔfra waɓaɓulala aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakajɛrub̤ahali amad̤ɔd̤a amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ tʲɛni liɲɛ ujɔtam uɲana ɔmŋǀinanɛ kajɛrub̤ahali nɡ̤ɔkuɓa waz̤imɛla ɓaɬanɡ̤ana ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmi ɓakwaʃɛkɛm nɛnɮu jɔnkɛ jɛmilɔ ɓaja ɓamɛnz̤a uab̤imɛlɛki nɡ̤asɛmɔkini wɛsikʰumɓuz̤ɔ ɔkwaʃɛkɛm wakǁɛlɛlwa ujɔtam waja wɛma ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛntaɓa jɛɡ̤ɛriz̤im walipʰakamisa iz̤wi lakʰɛ wad̤and̤uluka watʰi kuɓɔ nd̤iv̤ɛni ɓɛmi ɓakwaʃɛkɛm az̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a aniv̤ɛ jaja imitʰi ukuja kutʰamɓisa ukuɓa aɓɛ pʰɛz̤u kwajɔ jatʰi kumŋǃuma jiɓa nɡ̤ukumkani wɛtʰu watʰi umŋǃuma kujɔ nd̤inɡ̤ad̤ɛ nd̤ikuŋǀamɛ ukutʲɛɓa aɓakuz̤ukisajɔ ɔɔtʰikǁɔ naɓantu nd̤ijɛ kud͡ʒ̤inɡ̤ad͡ʒ̤inɡ̤a pʰɛz̤u kwɛmitʰi jatʰi imitʰi kumkʰiwanɛ jiz̤a wɛna uɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wɛtʰu watʰi umkʰiwanɛ kujɔ nd̤inɡ̤ad̤ɛ nd̤ijiŋǀamɛ iŋǀasa jam nɛz̤iv̤ɛlisɔ z̤am ɛz̤iɬɛ nd̤ijɛ kud͡ʒ̤inɡ̤ad͡ʒ̤inɡ̤a pʰɛz̤u kwɛmitʰi jatʰi imitʰi kumd̤ilija jiz̤a wɛna uɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wɛtʰu watʰi umd̤ilija kujɔ nd̤inɡ̤ad̤ɛ nd̤ijiŋǀamɛ iwajini jam ɛv̤ujisa ɔɔtʰikǁɔ naɓantu nd̤ijɛ kud͡ʒ̤inɡ̤ad͡ʒ̤inɡ̤a pʰɛz̤u kwɛmitʰi jatʰi jɔnkɛ imitʰi kwikǃunuɓɛ jiz̤a wɛna uɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wɛtʰu latʰi ikǃunuɓɛ kujɔ imitʰi ukuɓa ɔkunɛnɛ nijand̤itʰamɓisa nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wɛnu jiz̤ani niz̤imɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔmtʰunz̤i ukuɓa akund͡ʒ̤alɔ makupʰumɛ umlilɔ ɛkǃunuɓɛni ujiɮɛ imisɛd̤arɛ jasɛlɛb̤anɔn ukuɓa kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ nɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛɲanisɔ nanɡ̤ɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ uab̤imɛlɛki nimɛnz̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓa nɛnz̤ɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kujɛrub̤ahali nakwinɮu jakʰɛ ukuɓa nimɛnz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmpatʰɔ jɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ ɛkuɓɛni uɓawɔ wanilwɛlajɔ wawulaɬajɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ waniɬaɡ̤ulajɔ ɛsanɮɛni samamid̤ijan kɛ nisukɛ najiv̤unukɛla inɮu kaɓawɔ nam̤la naɓaɓulala ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ tʲɛni liɲɛ namɛnz̤a waɓɛmi ɓakwaʃɛkɛm uab̤imɛlɛki uɲana wɔmkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛnɡ̤umz̤alwana wɛnu ukuɓa kɛ nɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛɲanisɔ nanɡ̤ɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ nam̤la kujɛrub̤ahali nakwinɮu jakʰɛ v̤ujani kɛ nɡ̤ɔab̤imɛlɛki av̤ujɛ najɛ nɡ̤ani ukuɓa akund͡ʒ̤alɔ makupʰumɛ umlilɔ kuab̤imɛlɛki uɓaɮɛ aɓɛmi ɓakwaʃɛkɛm nɛnɮu jɛmilɔ upʰumɛ umlilɔ kuɓɛmi ɓakwaʃɛkɛm nakwinɮu jɛmilɔ umɮɛ uab̤imɛlɛki waɓalɛka kɛ ujɔtam wasaɓa waja ɛb̤ɛrɛ waɬala kʰɔna nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kaab̤imɛlɛki umz̤alwana wakʰɛ uab̤imɛlɛki waɓa nɡ̤umtʰɛtʰɛli wamasirajɛli imiɲaka ɛmitʰatʰu utʰikǁɔ watʰuma umɔja ɔmɓi pʰakatʰi kɔab̤imɛlɛki naɓɛmi ɓakwaʃɛkɛm ɓamkʰɔɬisa uab̤imɛlɛki aɓɛmi ɓakwaʃɛkɛm ukuz̤ɛ ukunɡ̤ɔɲaɲɛlwa kɔɔɲana aɓanɡ̤amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓakajɛrub̤ahali kufikɛ iɡ̤az̤i laɓɔ liɓɛkwɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔab̤imɛlɛki umz̤alwana waɓɔ ɔwaɓaɓulalajɔ napʰɛz̤u kwaɓɛmi ɓakwaʃɛkɛm aɓasɔmɛlɛz̤ajɔ isanɮa sakʰɛ waɓaɓulala aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ aɓɛmi ɓakwaʃɛkɛm ɓammisɛla aɓalalɛli ɛz̤iŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni z̤ɛɛntaɓa ɓakǁʰakamfula ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɮula kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla wakǁɛlɛlwa kɛ uab̤imɛlɛki waja uɡ̤ahali uɲana kaɛb̤ɛd̤ɛ naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ɓaɮula ɓɛsija kwaʃɛkɛm aɓɛmi ɓakwaʃɛkɛm ɓakʰɔlɔsa nɡ̤ajɛ ɓapʰuma ɓaja ɛmasimini ɓav̤una iz̤id̤ilija z̤aɓɔ ɓaz̤ikǁɔv̤ula ɓɛnz̤a iminikɛlɔ jɛnd̤umisɔ ɓaja ɛnɮwini jɔtʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɓaɮa ɓasɛla ɓamkǃalɛkisa uab̤imɛlɛki watʰi uɡ̤ahali uɲana kaɛb̤ɛd̤ɛ nɡ̤uɓani jɛna uab̤imɛlɛki ɛnɡ̤uɓani jɛna uʃɛkɛm ukuɓa simkʰɔnz̤ɛ akaɲana kajɛrub̤ahali wajɛ uz̤ɛb̤ulɛ ɛnɡ̤ɛmv̤ɛlɛli wakʰɛ kʰɔnz̤ani amad̤ɔd̤a akwahamɔrɛ usɔʃɛkɛm kunɡ̤ani ukuɓa simkʰɔnz̤ɛ jɛna aɓaɓa aɓa ɓantu ɓaɓɛsɛsanɮɛni kukʰɔna ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤amsusajɔ uab̤imɛlɛki watʰi ɛsinɡ̤isa kuab̤imɛlɛki wand̤isɛ umkʰɔsi wakʰɔ upʰumɛ wawɛv̤a uz̤ɛb̤ulɛ umpʰatʰi walɔɔ mz̤i amaz̤wi kaɡ̤ahali uɲana kaɛb̤ɛd̤ɛ wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ watʰuma aɓatʰuɲwa kuab̤imɛlɛki nɡ̤ɛnkɔɬisɔ ɛsitʰi nanku uɡ̤ahali uɲana kaɛb̤ɛd̤ɛ naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ɓɛfikɛ kwaʃɛkɛm jaɓɔna ɓajawuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛla umz̤i ukuɓa ukǀʰasanɛ nawɛ v̤uka kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ ɛɓusuku wɛna naɓantu ɔnaɓɔ ulalɛlɛ ɛmasimini kɔtʰi ukupʰuma kwɛlanɡ̤a uv̤ukɛ wakʰɛ uluɬu ujɛ kulɔɔ mz̤i nankɔ jɛna naɓantu anaɓɔ ɓɛpʰuma ɓɛsiz̤a kuwɛ wɛnz̤ɛ kujɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ sitʰɛ nɡ̤akɔ isanɮa sakʰɔ wav̤uka kɛ ɛɓusuku uab̤imɛlɛki naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ anaɓɔ ɓawulalɛla ɔwakwaʃɛkɛm ɓɛmakǃɛla manɛ wapʰuma uɡ̤ahali uɲana kaɛb̤ɛd̤ɛ wɛma ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɔmz̤i wɛsuka uab̤imɛlɛki naɓantu anaɓɔ ɛkulalɛlɛni uɡ̤ahali waɓaɓɔna aɓantu watʰi kuz̤ɛb̤ulɛ naɓa aɓantu ɓɛsiɬa ɛz̤iŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni z̤ɛɛntaɓa watʰi uz̤ɛb̤ulɛ kujɛ uɓɔna amatʰunz̤i ɛɛntaɓa nɡ̤atʰi nɡ̤aɓantu wapʰind̤a wakǃɔkɛla uɡ̤ahali watʰi ukutʰɛtʰa naɓa aɓantu ɓɛsiɬa ɛmɲɛlɛni wɛliz̤wɛ ɛliɲɛ ikǃɛla lisiz̤a nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɔmɔki wamatɔla watʰi uz̤ɛb̤ulɛ kujɛ upʰi kalɔku umlɔmɔ wakʰɔ ɔwatʰi nɡ̤awɔ nɡ̤uɓani uab̤imɛlɛki ukuɓa simkʰɔnz̤ɛ asinɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɓantu waɓakǀɛkisajɔ kʰawupʰumɛ kalɔku ulwɛ naɓɔ wapʰuma uɡ̤ahali pʰamɓi kwaɓɛmi ɓakwaʃɛkɛm nɔab̤imɛlɛki uab̤imɛlɛki wamsukɛla wasaɓa jɛna pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ kwawa aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ ɓaɓa ɓaninz̤i kwad̤a kwɛsa ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ uab̤imɛlɛki waɬala ɛaruma uz̤ɛb̤ulɛ wamɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa uɡ̤ahali naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ukuɓa ɓanɡ̤aɬali kwaʃɛkɛm kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ ɓapʰuma aɓantu ɓaja ɛmasimini wakǁɛlɛwa uab̤imɛlɛki waɓatʰaɓatʰa aɓantu waɓaɬula ɓaɓa makǃɛla matʰatʰu walalɛla ɛmasimini wakʰanɡ̤ɛla waɓɔna aɓantu ɓɛpʰuma kulɔɔ mz̤i waɓav̤unukɛla waɓakǁaɓɛla uab̤imɛlɛki namakǃɛla aɓɛnawɔ ɓad̤wɛla ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɔmz̤i az̤a amakǃɛla amaɓini akʰa uluɬu kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛsɛmasimini aɓakǁaɓɛla kɛ uab̤imɛlɛki nalɔɔ mz̤i jɔnkɛ wawutʰimɓa umz̤i naɓantu aɓakuwɔ waɓaɓulala wawud̤iliz̤a umz̤i wawuɬwajɛla itʲuwa ɓɛv̤a kɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓasɛŋǃaɓɛni ɛnd̤ɛ jakwaʃɛkɛm ɓanɡ̤ɛna ɛnɡ̤ɔnt͡sini jɛnɮu jɔɛlɛb̤ɛriti wakǁɛlɛlwa uab̤imɛlɛki ukuɓa ɓaɓutʰɛlɛnɛ kʰɔna ɓɔnkɛ aɓasɛŋǃaɓɛni ɛnd̤ɛ jakwaʃɛkɛm wajiɲuka uab̤imɛlɛki intaɓa jasɛt͡salimɔn jɛna naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛnaɓɔ uab̤imɛlɛki wapʰatʰa amaz̤ɛmɓɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa waɡ̤awula isɛɓɛ ɛmitʰini walifuŋǃula waliɓɛka ɛɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓɛni lakʰɛ watʰi ɛɓantwini aɓɛnaɓɔ intɔ ɛniɓɔnɛ nd̤ijɛnz̤a ŋ̤ǁ̤amani nɛnz̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤am ɓaɡ̤awula kɛ naɓɔ aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɛlɔwɔ isɛɓɛ lakʰɛ ɓamland̤ɛla uab̤imɛlɛki ɓawaɓɛka ɛnɡ̤ɔnt͡sini lɛjɔ ɓajifaka isikʰuni inɡ̤ɔnt͡si ɓɛkujɔ aɓasɛŋǃaɓɛni naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛŋǃaɓa ɛnd̤ɛ jakwaʃɛkɛm nɡ̤atʰi lamad̤ɔd̤a naɓafaz̤i uab̤imɛlɛki waja ɛtɛb̤ɛt͡sɛ wajiŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a itɛb̤ɛt͡sɛ wajitʰimɓa kwakukʰɔ iŋǃaɓa ɛnd̤ɛ ɛlikǃɛlɛ pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i aɓalɛkɛla kʰɔna ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a naɓafaz̤i naɓɛmi ɓɔnkɛ ɓɔmz̤i ɓaz̤iv̤alɛla ɓakʰwɛla pʰɛz̤u kwɛntunɡ̤ɔ jɛŋǃaɓa lɛjɔ ind̤ɛ wafika kɛ uab̤imɛlɛki ɛŋǃaɓɛni ɛnd̤ɛ najɔ wasɔnd̤ɛla ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛŋǃaɓa ɛnd̤ɛ ukuz̤ɛ ajit͡ʃisɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ jasuka inkaz̤ana ɛtʰilɛ japʰɔsa ilitʲɛ lɔkusila lanɡ̤apʰɛz̤ulu ɛntlɔkwɛni kaab̤imɛlɛki jamtʲumz̤a ukakaji waɓiz̤a kamsiɲa wakwakʰɛ ɔɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ iintɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ watʰi kujɛ xɔla ik͡xɛlɛ lakʰɔ und̤iɓulalɛ ɬɛz̤ɛ kutʰiwɛ nɡ̤am uɓulɛwɛ jinkaz̤ana umfana wakwakʰɛ wam̤laɓa amaɬanz̤a kɛ aɓɔna amasirajɛli ukuɓa ufilɛ uab̤imɛlɛki aja ɛlɔwɔ ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ utʰikǁɔ waɓuɓujisɛla ɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɛ uɓuɓi ɓukaab̤imɛlɛki aɓɛɓɛnz̤ilɛ kujisɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓulala aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ aɓamaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɔɓuɓi ɓɔnkɛ ɓamad̤ɔd̤a akwaʃɛkɛm utʰikǁɔ waɓuɓujisɛla ɛz̤intlɔkwɛni z̤awɔ afikɛlwa sisikǃalɛkisɔ sikajɔtam uɲana kajɛrub̤ahali ɛmv̤a kɔab̤imɛlɛki kwav̤ɛla utɔla uɲana kapuwa uɲana kad̤ɔd̤ɔ umisakarɛ ɔɬɛli ɛʃamirɛ ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwaɛfrajim wawasind̤isa amasirajɛli wawalawula amasirajɛli imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi maɓini anamitʰatʰu waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa ɛʃamirɛ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ kwav̤ɛla ujahirɛ umɡ̤ilijad̤i amasirajɛli imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi maɓini anamiɓini wajɛnɔɔɲana aɓamaʃumi matʰatʰu aɓakʰwɛla ɛmaɛsilɛni amat͡ʃa amaʃumi matʰatʰu ɓɛnɛmiz̤i ɛmaʃumi matʰatʰu ɛkutʰiwa jihav̤ɔtijahirɛ jɔna unanam̤la ɛsɛz̤wɛni lasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i wafa ujahirɛ waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa ɛkamɔn ɓapʰind̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛnz̤a uɓuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ɓakʰɔnz̤a ɔɔb̤ahali nɔɔaʃtarɔti nɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓakwaaram nɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓasɛt͡sid̤ɔn nɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓakwamɔwab̤i nɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn nɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓamafilisti ɓamlaɬa ujɛhɔv̤a aɓamkʰɔnz̤a wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a kumasirajɛli watʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤awɔ wawanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni samafilisti nasɛsanɮɛni sɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ɓaɓaɡ̤uɓa ɓaɓakǀɔla ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kwanɡ̤alɔɔ mɲaka ɓaɓakǀɔla imiɲaka ɛliʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓaɓɛpʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an ɛz̤wɛni lamaamɔri ɛlisɛɡ̤ilijad̤i ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ɓajiwɛla ijɔrd̤an ukuz̤ɛ ɓalwɛ namajud̤a namab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɛnɮu jakwaɛfrajim amasirajɛli aɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛka kunɛnɛ ɓakʰala ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kujɛhɔv̤a ɓatʰi sikɔnilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa simlaɬilɛ utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu sakʰɔnz̤a ɔɔb̤ahali watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nd̤iɓɛ nd̤inɡ̤anisind̤isanɡ̤a kumajiputa nakumaamɔri nakɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn nakumafilisti nakumat͡sid̤ɔn nakumaamalɛki nakumamahɔn aɓɛnikǁina nakʰala nd̤anisind̤isa ɛsanɮɛni sawɔ nind̤ilaɬilɛ nakʰɔnz̤a tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ and̤iji kupʰind̤a nd̤inisind̤isɛ hamɓani nijɛ kukʰala kɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɛniɓaɲulilɛjɔ maɓanisind̤isɛ ɓɔna nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwa kwɛnu ɓatʰi ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kujɛhɔv̤a sɔnilɛ jɛnz̤a wɛna kutʰi nɡ̤ɔkuɓɔna kwakʰɔ kɔd̤wa kʰawusiɬanɡ̤ulɛ ɔkwanam̤la ɓaɓasusa ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ɓakʰɔnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a wakʰatʰaz̤ɛka umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkwapʰuka kwamasirajɛli ɓaɓiz̤ɛlɛka nd̤awɔɲɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ɓamisa ɛɡ̤ilijad̤i ɓaɬanɡ̤anisana ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓamisa ɛmiz̤pa ɓatʰi aɓantu aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i ɔmɲɛ kɔmɲɛ nɡ̤uɓani ind̤ɔd̤a ɛja kukǃala nɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn jɔɓa jintlɔkɔ jaɓɛmi ɓɔnkɛ ɓasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i kɛ kalɔku ujifɛta umɡ̤ilijad̤i ɛɓɛliɡ̤ɔxa ɛlinɔɓuk͡xɔti kɛ uɓɛnɡ̤uɲana wɛnkaz̤ana ɛlihɛɲukaz̤i uɡ̤ilijad̤i waz̤ala ujifɛta umkaɡ̤ilijad̤i wamz̤alɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakʰula ɔɔɲana ɓɔmkakʰɛ ɓamɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa ujifɛta ɓatʰi kujɛ akuji kuɮa ɛnɮwini kaɓawɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɡ̤uɲana wankaz̤ana jimɓi wɛna waɓalɛka ujifɛta pʰamɓi kwaɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ waɬala ɛz̤wɛni lasɛtɔb̤i kwatʰutʰɛlana kujifɛta amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤ɛnaɓuntu apʰuma najɛ kwatʰi kwakuɓa nt͡suku ɓalwa ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn nɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kwatʰi ɓakuɓa ɓɛsilwa ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn namasirajɛli amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu asɛɡ̤ilijad̤i aja kumtʰaɓatʰa ujifɛta ɛz̤wɛni lasɛtɔb̤i atʰi kujifɛta jiz̤a uɓɛ nɡ̤umpʰatʰi wɛtʰu silwɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn watʰi ujifɛta kumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu asɛɡ̤ilijad̤i asinini jini aɓand̤itʰijajɔ ɓand̤iɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa ɛnɮwini kaɓawɔ kunɡ̤ani ukuɓa niz̤ɛ kalɔku nakuɓa niɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛkilɛ atʰi amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu asɛɡ̤ilijad̤i kujifɛta kukʰɔ kalɔku lɛ ntɔ siɓujɛla kuwɛ ukuɓa uhamɓɛ natʰi ulwɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn uɓɛ jintlɔkɔ kutʰi kuɓɛmi ɓɔnkɛ ɓasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i watʰi ujifɛta kumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu asɛɡ̤ilijad̤i ukuɓa nitʰɛ nand̤iɓujisa ukuz̤ɛ nd̤ilwɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ujɛhɔv̤a waɓanikɛla nd̤ɔɓa jintlɔkɔ atʰi amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu asɛɡ̤ilijad̤i kujifɛta ujɛhɔv̤a makaɓɛ liŋ̤ǃ̤ina pʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu inɛnɛ sija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi lakʰɔ wahamɓa kɛ ujifɛta namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu asɛɡ̤ilijad̤i aɓantu ɓammisa pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ waɓa jintlɔkɔ nɔmpʰatʰi wawatʰɛtʰa ujifɛta ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi akʰɛ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɛmiz̤pa ujifɛta aɓatʰuɲwa ɓaja wɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn watʰi jintɔni ɛnam nawɛ uz̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓa ulwɛ nɛliz̤wɛ watʰi wɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn kuɓatʰuɲwa ɓakajifɛta kunɡ̤ɔkuɓa amasirajɛli alitʰaɓatʰajɔ iliz̤wɛ ukuɲuka kwawɔ ɛjiputa atʰaɓatʰɛla ɛarnɔn ɛsa ɛjab̤ɔki ɛsa ɛjɔrd̤an liɓujisɛ nɡ̤ɔkǁɔlɔ kalɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ ujifɛta wapʰind̤a watʰuma aɓatʰuɲwa wɔɔɲaka ɓakaamɔn watʰi kujɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujifɛta ukutʰi amasirajɛli akalitʰaɓatʰanɡ̤a iliz̤wɛ lakwamɔwab̤i nɛliz̤wɛ lɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛkuɲukɛni kwawɔ ɛjiputa amasirajɛli ahamɓa nɡ̤ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛz̤a ɛlwanɮɛ ɔluɓɔmv̤u ɛz̤a ɛkad̤ɛʃɛ amasirajɛli atʰuma aɓatʰuɲwa wakwaɛd̤ɔm ɛsitʰi makʰɛ nd̤ikǀand̤ɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɔ kɛ wakwaɛd̤ɔm akapʰulapʰulanɡ̤a atʰuma wakwamɔwab̤i najɛ akav̤umanɡ̤a aɬala amasirajɛli ɛkad̤ɛʃɛ ahamɓa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ alid͡ʒ̤ikɛla iliz̤wɛ lakwaɛd̤ɔm nɛliz̤wɛ lakwamɔwab̤i ɛv̤ɛla ɛkupʰumɛni kwɛlanɡ̤a aja ɛz̤wɛni lakwamɔwab̤i nɡ̤apʰɛʃɛja kwɛarnɔn akanɡ̤ɛna ɛmd̤ɛni wakwamɔwab̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iarnɔn nɡ̤umd̤a wakwamɔwab̤i amasirajɛli atʰuma aɓatʰuɲwa kusihɔn wamaamɔri wasɛhɛʃb̤ɔn atʰi amasirajɛli kujɛ makʰɛ nd̤ikǀand̤ɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɔ nd̤ijɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jam kɛ usihɔn akakʰɔlwa nɡ̤amasirajɛli ukuɓa akǀand̤ɛ ɛmd̤ɛni wakʰɛ waɓaɬanɡ̤anisa usihɔn ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓakʰɛ ɓamisa ɛjat͡sa namasirajɛli ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli wamnikɛla usihɔn naɓantu ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɛsanɮɛni samasirajɛli aɓaɓulala aliɬutʰa amasirajɛli lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lamaamɔri aɓɛɬɛli kwɛli liz̤wɛ awuɬutʰa wɔnkɛ umd̤a wamaamɔri atʰaɓatʰɛla ɛarnɔn ɛsa ɛjab̤ɔki atʰaɓatʰɛla ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛsa ɛjɔrd̤an kalɔku ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli uwaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤ilɛ amaamɔri pʰamɓi kwaɓantu ɓakʰɛ amasirajɛli uja kuliɬutʰa kɛ wɛna akuɬutʰi ɛlɔ akuɬutʰɛlɛ lɔna ukɛmɔʃɛ utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ natʰi siɬutʰɛ lɔnkɛ asiɬutʰɛlɛ lɔna ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ɛɓuswɛni ɓɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔku wɛna ulunɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔb̤alaki uɲana kat͡sipɔrɛ wakwamɔwab̤i jini wakʰa waɓamɓana nɔkuɓamɓana jɛna namasirajɛli wakʰa nɔkulwa jɛna nawɔ ɛkuɬalɛni kwamasirajɛli ɛhɛʃb̤ɔn nasɛmaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsini ajɔ nasɛarɔhɛrɛ nasɛmaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsini ajɔ nasɛmiz̤ini jɔnkɛ ɛsɛmakǀalɛni ɛarnɔn imiɲaka ɛmakʰulu matʰatʰu iɓijini ukuɓa ninɡ̤ajiɬanɡ̤uli nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa mna and̤ikɔnanɡ̤a nɡ̤uwɛ ɔnd̤ɛnz̤a intɔ ɛmɓi nɡ̤ɔkulwa ujɛhɔv̤a umɡ̤wɛɓi makaɡ̤wɛɓɛ nam̤la pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ukumkani wɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn akawapʰulapʰula amaz̤wi kajifɛta awawatʰumɛla kujɛ umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a wamfikɛla ujifɛta wakǀand̤a ɛɡ̤ilijad̤i nakwamanasɛ wakǀand̤a nasɛmiz̤pa jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i wɛsuka ɛmiz̤pa jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i waɓanɡ̤ɛnɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ujifɛta wab̤amɓatʰisa kujɛhɔv̤a isib̤amɓatʰisɔ watʰi ukuɓa utʰɛ waɓanikɛla kaɲɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ɛsanɮɛni wɔtʰi ɔsukuɓa ɛpʰuma ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛnɮu jam ɛz̤a kund̤ikʰawulɛla ɛkuɓujɛni nɡ̤ɔkǁɔlɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn aɓɛ nɡ̤ɔkajɛhɔv̤a nd̤imɲusɛ aɓɛ lid̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ waɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa kɛ ujifɛta waja kɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ukuɓa alwɛ naɓɔ waɓanikɛla ujɛhɔv̤a ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ waɓaɓulala kakʰulu kunɛnɛ kwatʰaɓatʰɛla ɛarɔhɛrɛ kwad̤a kwaja ɛminiti imiz̤i ɛmaʃumi maɓini kwɛsa ɛab̤ɛlɛkɛramim ɓatʰɔtʲwa ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn pʰamɓi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli wafika ujifɛta ɛmiz̤pa ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ nant͡sɔ intɔmɓi jakʰɛ ipʰuma iz̤a kumkʰawulɛla inɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔ iŋ̤ǃ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤a jajɛ ikupʰɛla kɔmntwana wakʰɛ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwajɔ wajɛnɡ̤ɛnaɲana nantɔmɓi kwatʰi akujiɓɔna waz̤ik͡xaz̤ulu iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ watʰi jini lɛ ntɔmɓi jam und̤itʰɔɓilɛ kakʰulu wɛna unɡ̤ɔwaɓand̤iɬisɛlɛ intlɛkɛlɛ mna nd̤iwuv̤ulilɛ umlɔmɔ kujɛhɔv̤a and̤inakuɓuja umv̤a jatʰi kujɛ ɓawɔ uwuv̤ulilɛ umlɔmɔ wakʰɔ kujɛhɔv̤a jɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kupʰumɛ ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɔ ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a akwɛnz̤ɛlɛ impind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ ɛz̤int͡ʃaɓɛni z̤akʰɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn jatʰi kujisɛ mand̤ɛnz̤ɛlwɛ lɛ nd̤awɔ nd̤ijɛkɛ iiɲanɡ̤a z̤iɓɛ mɓini nd̤ihamɓɛ nd̤iɬɛ nd̤ijɛ ɛz̤intaɓɛni nd̤ililɛlɛ uɓuntɔmɓi ɓam naɓalinɡ̤anɛ ɓam watʰi jija wajind̤ulula jaja iiɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤imɓini jaja jɔna naɓalinɡ̤anɛ ɓajɔ jaɓulilɛla uɓuntɔmɓi ɓajɔ ɛz̤intaɓɛni kwatʰi ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛɛɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤imɓini jaɓuja jɛz̤a kujisɛ wasɛnz̤ɛla kujɔ isib̤amɓatʰisɔ sakʰɛ awajɛsib̤amɓatʰisilɛ kɛ jɔna jajinɡ̤az̤ani nand̤ɔd̤a jaɓa lisikɔ kwasirajɛli ukutʰi imiɬa kamiɬa iintɔmɓi z̤akwasirajɛli z̤ijɛ z̤ijiɓɔnɡ̤ɛ intɔmɓi kajifɛta umɡ̤ilijad̤i imiɬa ɛminɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka aɬatʲɛlwa umkʰɔsi ɛz̤a amad̤ɔd̤a akwaɛfrajim awɛla aja ɛntla atʰi kujifɛta iɓijini ukuɓa uɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛ ujɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn unɡ̤asiɓiz̤anɡ̤a sihamɓɛ nawɛ sija kujit͡ʃisa nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ inɮu jakʰɔ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ watʰi ujifɛta kuwɔ mna ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤umfɔ wɛmɓamɓanɔ naɓantu ɓam ɓɛsiɓamɓɛnɛ kunɛnɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn nd̤aniɬaɓɛla umkʰɔsi anand̤isind̤isa ɛsanɮɛni saɓɔ nd̤itʰɛ nd̤akuɓɔna ukuɓa anind̤isind̤isi nd̤awɛnz̤a isikǀʰɛnɡ̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ nd̤awɛla nd̤aja kɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ujɛhɔv̤a waɓanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni kunɡ̤ani ukuɓa niɲukɛ nam̤la niz̤ɛ wawaɓutʰa ujifɛta ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a asɛɡ̤ilijad̤i namaɛfrajim amad̤ɔd̤a asɛɡ̤ilijad̤i awaɓulala amaɛfrajim nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛsitʰi ninɡ̤aɓasaɓilɛjɔ kumaɛfrajim maɡ̤ilijad̤i pʰakatʰi kwamaɛfrajim namamanasɛ amaɡ̤ilijad̤i awapʰanɡ̤ɛla amaɛfrajim nɡ̤ɔkuv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤a amaz̤iɓukɔ ɛjɔrd̤an ɓaɓɛsitʰi aɓasaɓilɛjɔ ɓakwaɛfrajim ɓakutʰi mand̤iwɛlɛ atʰi kujɛ amad̤ɔd̤a asɛɡ̤ilijad̤i unɡ̤umɛfrajim uɓɛsitʰi akutʰi haji atʰi kujɛ kʰawutʰi ʃib̤ɔlɛtɛ watʰi jɛna sib̤ɔlɛtɛ ɛnɡ̤alunɡ̤isi ukuliɓiz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ asukɛ amɓamɓɛ amsikɛ ɛmaz̤iɓukwɛni ɛjɔrd̤an kwawa kɛ nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa kumaɛfrajim anɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmanɛ anamaɓini ujifɛta amasirajɛli imiɲaka jamitʰand̤atʰu wafa kɛ ujifɛta umɡ̤ilijad̤i waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa kɔmɲɛ wɛmiz̤i jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i ɛmv̤ɛni kwakʰɛ amasirajɛli uib̤ɛt͡san wasɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm wajɛnɔɔɲana aɓamaʃumi matʰatʰu waja kwɛnd̤isa nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ iintɔmɓi ɛz̤imaʃumi matʰatʰu waz̤ɛkɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ iintɔmɓi ɛz̤imaʃumi matʰatʰu ɛz̤iv̤ɛla nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ wawalawula amasirajɛli imiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wafa kɛ uib̤ɛt͡san waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa ɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm ɛmv̤ɛni kwakʰɛ amasirajɛli uɛlɔn umz̤ɛb̤ulɔn amasirajɛli imiɲaka ɛliʃumi wafa kɛ uɛlɔn umz̤ɛb̤ulɔn waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa ɛajalɔn ɛz̤wɛni lakwaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn ɛmv̤ɛni kwakʰɛ amasirajɛli uab̤ɛd̤ɔn uɲana kahilɛli wasɛpiratɔn wajɛ ɛnɔɔɲana aɓamaʃumi manɛ nɔɔɲana ɓɔɔɲana aɓamaʃumi matʰatʰu aɓakʰwɛla kumaɛsilɛ amat͡ʃa amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wawalawula amasirajɛli imiɲaka ɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ wafa kɛ uab̤ɛd̤ɔn uɲana kahilɛli wasɛpiratɔn waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa ɛpiratɔn ɛz̤wɛni lakwaɛfrajim kwɛlɛɛntaɓa lamaamalɛki ɓapʰind̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛnz̤a uɓuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a waɓanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni samafilisti imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi manɛ kɛ kalɔku kwaɓakʰɔ nd̤ɔd̤a itʰilɛ jasɛt͡sɔra jɔmliɓɔ wamad̤an ɛɡ̤ama linɡ̤umanɔwa umkajɔ ɛluɮɔlɔ ɛnɡ̤az̤ali kwaɓɔnakala isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a kumfaz̤i lɔwɔ satʰi kujɛ jaɓɔna uluɮɔlɔ wɛna akuz̤ali kɛ uja kumitʰa uz̤alɛ uɲana kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ kʰawuz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ uz̤ɛ unɡ̤asɛli wajini nasisɛlɔ siŋǁilisajɔ unɡ̤aɮi naɲɛ intɔ ɛjiŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujaɓɔna uja kumitʰa uz̤alɛ uɲana isit͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ sɔkukǀʰɛɓa asiji kusɔnd̤ɛz̤wa ɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lɛ nkwɛnkwɛ ija kuɓa nɡ̤umaɬulwa katʰikǁɔ kwasɛsiz̤alwɛni jijɔ kɛ ɛja kukǃala ukuwasind̤isa amasirajɛli ɛsanɮɛni samafilisti wɛz̤a lɔ mfaz̤i watʰi kwind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ kufikɛ katʰikǁɔ imɓɔnakalɔ jakʰɛ ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmɓɔnakalɔ jɛsitʰuɲwa sikatʰikǁɔ isɔjikɛka kunɛnɛ kɔd̤wa and̤imɓuz̤anɡ̤a apʰɔ av̤ɛla kʰɔna najɛ akand̤ikǁɛlɛlanɡ̤a iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ watʰi ujaɓɔna uja kumitʰa uz̤alɛ uɲana kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ uz̤ɛ unɡ̤asɛli wajini nasisɛlɔ siŋǁilisajɔ unɡ̤aɮi naɲɛ intɔ ɛjiŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lɛ nkwɛnkwɛ ija kuɓa nɡ̤umaɬulwa katʰikǁɔ kwasɛsiz̤alwɛni kud̤ɛ kuɓɛ nɡ̤um̤la wɔkufa kwajɔ watʰand̤az̤a kɛ umanɔwa kujɛhɔv̤a watʰi kǀamaɡ̤u nkɔsi jam katʰikǁɔ ɔwamtʰumajɔ makakʰɛ aɓujɛ ɛz̤ɛ kutʰi asifund̤isɛ ukuɓa simtʰini ɔja kuz̤alwa walipʰulapʰula utʰikǁɔ iz̤wi likamanɔwa saɓuja sɛz̤a kɛ isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a kumfaz̤i lɔwɔ ɛɬɛli ɛnt͡simini umanɔwa ind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ inɡ̤ɛnajɛ wakʰawulɛz̤a umfaz̤i waɡ̤id̤ima wajikǁɛlɛla ind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ watʰi kujɔ jaɓɔna uɓɔnakɛlɛ uɓɛz̤ɛ m̤la wɛsuka kɛ umanɔwa wamland̤ɛla umkakʰɛ waja kulɔɔ watʰi kujɛ unɡ̤ulaa uɓɛtʰɛtʰa nɔmfaz̤i watʰi nd̤inɡ̤ujɛ watʰi umanɔwa ukuɓa litʰɛ lɛnz̤ɛka kalɔku iliz̤wi lakʰɔ lɔɓa jintɔni isikɔ lalɛ nkwɛnkwɛ nɔkwɛnz̤a kwajɔ satʰi isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a kumanɔwa kɔnkɛ ɛnd̤ikutʰɛtʰilɛjɔ kumfaz̤i makaz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ kukɔ maz̤ɛ anɡ̤aɮi ntɔ ipʰuma ɛmd̤ilijɛni anɡ̤asɛli wajini nasisɛlɔ siŋǁilisajɔ anɡ̤aɮi naɲɛ intɔ ɛjiŋǃamɓi kɔnkɛ ɛnd̤imwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ makakuɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ watʰi umanɔwa kwisitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a makʰɛ sikuɓamɓɛz̤ɛlɛ sikwɛnz̤ɛlɛ itakanɛ lɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ satʰi isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a kumanɔwa nɔkuɓa und̤iɓamɓɛz̤ɛlɛ and̤iji kuɮa ɛkuɮɛni kwakʰɔ kɛ ukuɓa wɛnz̤a id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a liɲusɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umanɔwa ɛɓɛnɡ̤az̤i ukuɓa sisitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a watʰi umanɔwa kwisitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤uɓani iɡ̤ama sikuz̤ukisɛ lakwɛnz̤ɛka iliz̤wi lakʰɔ satʰi kujɛ isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a jini lɛ ntɔ uliɓuz̤ajɔ iɡ̤ama liɓalulɛkilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ watʰaɓatʰa umanɔwa itakanɛ lɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ nɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa waz̤iɲusa kujɛhɔv̤a ɛwɛni sɔna sisɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkumanɡ̤alisajɔ ɓɛɓɔnɛla umanɔwa nɔmkakʰɛ kwatʰi ɛkuɲukɛni kwɛlanɡ̤atʲɛ ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni lisinɡ̤a ɛz̤ulwini sɛɲuka isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛlanɡ̤atʲɛ lɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ umanɔwa nɔmkakʰɛ ɓɛɓɔna ɓawa nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni asaɓa sapʰind̤a siɓɔnakalɛ isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a kumanɔwa nɔmkakʰɛ wand̤ula ukwaz̤i umanɔwa ukuɓa sisitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a ɛsi watʰi umanɔwa kumkakʰɛ sija nɡ̤ɛnɛnɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa simɓɔnilɛ utʰikǁɔ watʰi umkakʰɛ kujɛ ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uɓɛfuna ukusiɓulala anɡ̤ɛ ɛnɡ̤alamkɛlanɡ̤a ɛsanɮɛni sɛtʰu id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa anɡ̤ɛ ɛnɡ̤asiɓɔnisanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤i z̤intɔ anɡ̤ɛ ɛnɡ̤asiv̤isanɡ̤a ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛlind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛli waz̤ala uɲana umfaz̤i lɔwɔ watʰi iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ nɡ̤usamsɔn jakʰula kɛ inkwɛnkwɛ lɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wajisikɛlɛla wakǃala umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a wamkǃʰuɓa ɛsɛmahanɛd̤an pʰakatʰi kwɛt͡sɔra nɛɛʃtawɔli wɛɬa usamsɔn waja ɛtimnata waɓɔna inkaz̤ana ɛtimnata ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤amafilisti wɛɲuka wakǁɛlɛla ujisɛ nɔnina watʰi nd̤iɓɔnɛ inkaz̤ana ɛtimnata ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤amafilisti kalɔku kɛ nd̤iz̤ɛkɛlɛni iɓɛ nɡ̤umfaz̤i ɓatʰi kujɛ ujisɛ nɔnina akukʰɔ nkaz̤ana ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɔ nasɛɓantwini ɓakɔwɛtʰu ɓɔnkɛ ukuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ud̤ɛ ujɛ kuz̤ɛka umfaz̤i kumafilisti anɡ̤alukilɛjɔ watʰi usamsɔn kujisɛ nd̤iz̤ɛkɛlɛ jɔna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ikʰɔliwɛ jijɔ ujisɛ nɔnina ɓaɓɛnɡ̤az̤i ukuɓa iv̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a lɛ ntɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛfuna itʰuɓa lɔkuɓamɓana namafilisti nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa amafilisti ɛɓɛlawula kwasirajɛli wɛɬa usamsɔn nɔjisɛ nɔnina ɓaja ɛtimnata ɓafika ɛz̤id̤ilijɛni z̤asɛtimnata nant͡sɔ inɡ̤ɔɲama ɛnt͡ʃa imkʰawulɛla iɡ̤ǃ̤uma wamfikɛla nɡ̤amanɮa umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a wajikǃwɛnɡ̤a wanɡ̤a ukǃwɛnɡ̤a itakanɛ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ ntɔ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ akakukǁɛla kujisɛ akwɛnz̤ilɛjɔ wɛɬa watʰɛtʰa nɛnkaz̤ana lɛjɔ jamkʰɔlisa kunɛnɛ usamsɔn waɓuja kwakuɓa nt͡suku ɛsija kujiz̤ɛka watʲɛka wakʰanɡ̤ɛla isid̤umɓu sɛnɡ̤ɔɲama lɛja nalɔ iɓuɓu lɛɛɲɔsi lisɛsid̤umɓini sɛnɡ̤ɔɲama kukʰɔ nɔɓusi waɓutʰaɓatʰa wapʰatʰa nɡ̤ɛsanɮa wahamɓa wahamɓa ɛsiɮa waja kujisɛ nɔnina waɓanika ɓaɮa akaɓakǁɛlɛla ukuɓa uɓusi uɓutʰaɓatʰɛ ɛsid̤umɓini sɛnɡ̤ɔɲama wɛɬa kɛ ujisɛ waja kulɔɔ nkaz̤ana usamsɔn wɛnz̤a umsitʰɔ kʰɔna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓɛsɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ amad̤ɔd̤ana kwatʰi ɓakumɓɔna ɓaz̤isa aɓalinɡ̤anɛ aɓanɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu ɓaɓa najɛ watʰi usamsɔn kuɓɔ nd̤ɔnid͡ʒ̤ikɛla ikǃʰina ukuɓa nitʰɛ nand̤ikǀɔmɓululɛla nɡ̤ɛɛnt͡suku ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ z̤ɔmsitʰɔ nd̤ɔninika iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɛlinɛn ɛntlɛ ɛz̤inɡ̤amaʃumi amatʰatʰu nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɔkukʰululana ɛz̤inɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu kɛ ukuɓa anitʰanɡ̤a niɓɛ nakɔ ukund̤ikǀɔmɓululɛla nɔnd̤inika iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɛlinɛn ɛntlɛ ɛz̤inɡ̤amaʃumi amatʰatʰu nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɔkukʰululana ɛz̤inɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu ɓatʰi kujɛ lid͡ʒ̤ikɛ ikǃʰina lakʰɔ siliv̤ɛ ɓatʰi kujɛ lid͡ʒ̤ikɛ ikǃʰina lakʰɔ siliv̤ɛ watʰi kuɓɔ kɔɮajɔ kwapʰuma ukuɮa kɔnamanɮa kwapʰuma iŋǀasa aɓaɓa nakɔ ukulikǀɔmɓulula ikǃʰina imiɬa ɛmitʰatʰu kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔsuku lwɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓatʰi kumkasamsɔn jixwɛɓɛʃɛ ind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɔ isikǀɔmɓululɛlɛ ikǃʰina ɬɛz̤ɛ sikut͡ʃisɛ wɛna nɛnɮu kajiɬɔ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ nisimɛmɛlɛ ukuɓa nisiɬwɛmpuz̤isɛ akund͡ʒ̤alɔ umkasamsɔn wamlilɛla watʰi kɔd̤wa und̤itʰijilɛ akund̤itʰand̤i uɓad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛ ikǃʰina ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu akwand̤ikǀɔmɓululɛla watʰi kujɛ jaɓɔna and̤iɓakǀɔmɓululɛlanɡ̤a uɓawɔ nɔma nd̤ikǀɔmɓululɛlɛ wɛna kɛ wamlilɛla iint͡suku z̤ɔsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ aɓaɓɛsɛmsitʰwɛni nɡ̤az̤ɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔlwɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wamkǀɔmɓululɛla kuɓa ɛɓɛmkǁinilɛ waz̤a jɛna waɓakǁɛla ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ɓakɔwaɓɔ atʰi kujɛ amad̤ɔd̤a alɔɔ mz̤i nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ linɡ̤ɛkat͡ʃɔni ilanɡ̤a jintɔni ɛnɛŋǀasa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔɓusi jintɔni ɛnamanɮa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛnɡ̤ɔɲama watʰi kuwɔ ukuɓa ɓɛninɡ̤alimanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛtʰɔkaz̤i nɡ̤ɛninɡ̤alifumananɡ̤a ikǃʰina wamfikɛla nɡ̤amanɮa umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a wɛɬa waja ɛaʃkɛlɔn waɓulala kuɓɔ apʰɔ amaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu amad̤ɔd̤a wawaɬuɓa iinɡ̤uɓɔ aɓakǀɔmɓululi ɓɛkǃʰina ɛlɔ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɔkukʰululana wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ wɛɲuka waja ɛnɮwini kajisɛ kɛ umkasamsɔn waɓa nɡ̤ɔwɔmlinɡ̤anɛ wakʰɛ aɓɛmɛnz̤ɛ isiɬɔɓɔ sakʰɛ kwatʰi kwakuɓa nt͡suku nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔkuv̤una iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa usamsɔn wamv̤ɛlɛla umkakʰɛ ɛnɛtakanɛ lɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ watʰi nd̤ija kunɡ̤ɛna ɛɡ̤umɓini kɛ ujisɛ wɔmfaz̤i ɛɓɛnɡ̤amv̤umɛli ukuɓa anɡ̤ɛnɛ watʰi ujisɛ wɔmfaz̤i ɓɛnd̤iɓa umtʰijilɛ nɡ̤ɛnɛnɛ nd̤amnika umlinɡ̤anɛ wakʰɔ akam̤lɛ umsakwaɓɔ kunajɛ makaɓɛ nɡ̤ɔwakʰɔ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ watʰi usamsɔn kuɓɔ nd̤imsulwa ɔkwɛsi siɬanɮɔ kumafilisti kǁa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤ɛnz̤a uɓuɓi kuwɔ waja usamsɔn waɓamɓa amakʰulu ɔmatʰatʰu ɛɛmpunɡ̤utʲɛ watʰaɓatʰa iz̤ikʰuni ɛz̤iv̤utʰajɔ waz̤ikǃʰaɡ̤amʃɛla nɡ̤ɛmisila isikʰuni sasiɲɛ pʰakatʰi kwajɔ walumɛka nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ ɛz̤ikʰunini waz̤ind̤ulula z̤aja ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwɛni jamafilisti ɛnɡ̤ɛkav̤unwa wat͡ʃisa ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛz̤itʰɛni wɛsa ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwɛni ɛnɡ̤ɛkav̤unwa wɛsa ɛmijɛz̤wɛni jɛmiŋǃuma atʰi amafilisti nɡ̤uɓani lɔ wɛnz̤ɛ ɔku ɓatʰi nɡ̤usamsɔn umjɛni wɔmtimnata nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛmtʰaɓatʰilɛ umkakʰɛ umlinɡ̤anɛ wakʰɛ ɛɲuka amafilisti amt͡ʃisa jɛna nɔjisɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ watʰi usamsɔn kuwɔ ukuɓa nɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ inɛnɛ nd̤ija kuz̤ipʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlɛla nd̤and̤ulɛ ukupʰɛz̤a wawakǁaɓɛla kakʰulu iɬɛz̤a nɛtʰanɡ̤a wɛɬa kɛ waɬala ɛmkǃʰɔk͡xwɛni wɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa jasɛɛtam ɛɲuka amafilisti kwajud̤a akʰa uluɬu ɛlɛhi atʰi amad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a jini ukuɓa niɲukɛ niz̤ɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu atʰi wɔna siɲukɛ sɛz̤a kukʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰a usamsɔn sɛnz̤ɛ kujɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ kutʰi ɛɬa amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amawaka amatʰatʰu ɛv̤ɛla kwajud̤a aja ɛmkǃʰɔk͡xwɛni wɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa jasɛɛtam atʰi kusamsɔn akwaz̤i ukuɓa amafilisti ajasilawula jintɔni lɛ usɛnz̤ɛ jɔna watʰi kuwɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ kuwɔ atʰi kujɛ siɬɛ siz̤ɛ kukukʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰a ukuɓa sikunikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni samafilisti watʰi usamsɔn kuwɔ nd̤ifunɡ̤ɛlɛni ukuɓa aniji kund̤iɓulala nɡ̤ɔkwɛnu atʰi kujɛ sija kukukʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰a sikukǃinisɛ sikunikɛlɛ ɛsa nɮɛni sawɔ ukukuɓulala asiji kukuɓulala amkʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰a nɡ̤ɛz̤intʲa ɛz̤int͡ʃa ɛz̤imɓini amɲusa ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxɛni wɛz̤a ɛlɛhi amafilisti amkʰawulɛla ɛd̤uma wamfikɛla nɡ̤amanɮa umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a iz̤intʲa ɛɓɛz̤isɛmikʰɔnwɛni jakʰɛ z̤aɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛflakisi nɡ̤umlilɔ amakʰamand̤ɛla akʰɛ akǀɔmɓuluka ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤akʰɛ wafumanana nɔm̤latʰi ɔmt͡ʃa wɛɛsilɛ wasɔlula isanɮa wawutʰaɓatʰa waɓulala nɡ̤awɔ lamad̤ɔd̤a watʰi usamsɔn nɡ̤ɔm̤latʰi wɛɛsilɛ z̤iz̤iɡ̤iɡ̤aɓa nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤iɡ̤aɓa nɡ̤ɔm̤latʰi wɛɛsilɛ nd̤isikɛ lamad̤ɔd̤a kwatʰi akuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa ukutʰɛtʰa wawulaɬa um̤latʰi ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ watʰi lɔɔ nd̤awɔ jiramatilɛhi waŋǁanwa kakʰulu waŋǃula ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi wɛna unikɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ usind̤isɔ ɔlunɡ̤aka nd̤ija liŋǁanɔ nd̤ɛjɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni saɓanɡ̤alukanɡ̤a wawukǀand̤a utʰikǁɔ umɡ̤ɔŋ̤ǁ̤ɔ ɔsɛlɛhi kwapʰuma amanz̤i kuwɔ wasɛla waɓuja umɔja wakʰɛ wapʰila kɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ watʰi iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ nd̤awɔ nɡ̤umtʰɔmɓɔ wɔmŋǃuli ɔsɛlɛhi unanam̤la wawalawula amasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jamafilisti imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi maɓini usamsɔn waja ɛɡ̤az̤a waɓɔna kʰɔna inkaz̤ana ɛlihɛɲukaz̤i wajilala kwatʰiwa kwaɓasɛɡ̤az̤a usamsɔn unɡ̤ɛnɛ apʰa ɓamxawula ɓamlalɛla uɓusuku ɓɔnkɛ ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔmz̤i ɓatʰi kǀwaka uɓusuku ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛsitʰi kwakusa nɡ̤ɔmsɔ sɔmɓulala walala usamsɔn kwad̤a kwaɓa pʰakatʰi kɔɓusuku wav̤uka pʰakatʰi kɔɓusuku waɓamɓɛlɛla ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤wɛni z̤ɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɔmz̤i nasɛmiɡ̤uɓasini jɔmiɓini wajiŋǀɔtʰula inɔmv̤alɔ wajiɓɛka ɛmaɡ̤ǁ̤ɛni akʰɛ wajitʰwalɛla ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛntaɓa pʰamɓi kwɛhɛɓrɔn kwatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ watʰand̤a inkaz̤ana ɛsiɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni sasɛsɔrɛki iɡ̤ama lajɔ linɡ̤ud̤ɛlila z̤ɛɲuka z̤aja kujɔ iz̤ikʰulu z̤amafilisti z̤atʰi kujɔ mxwɛɓɛʃɛ uɓɔnɛ ukuɓa asɛnini manɮa akʰɛ anɡ̤aka nɔkuɓa sinɡ̤amɛjisa nɡ̤antɔni simkʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰ɛ ukuz̤ɛ simtʰɔɓɛ sɔkunika tʰina ɛlɔwɔ ɛlinɛkʰulu lɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ watʰi ud̤ɛlila kusamsɔn kʰawund̤ikǁɛlɛlɛ ukuɓa asɛnini manɮa akʰɔ anɡ̤aka nɔkuɓa unɡ̤akʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰wa nɡ̤antɔni ukuz̤ɛ ukǃɔtʲwɛ watʰi usamsɔn kujɛ ukuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓand̤iɓɔpʰa nɡ̤ɛɛntamɓɔ ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛz̤int͡ʃa ɛz̤inɡ̤ɔmanɡ̤a nd̤ɔtʰi fɛɬɛ nd̤iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɲɛ iz̤ikʰulu z̤amafilisti z̤ɛɲuka z̤amz̤isɛla iintamɓɔ ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛz̤int͡ʃa ɛz̤inɡ̤ɔmanɡ̤a wamkʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰a nɡ̤az̤ɔ kɛ aɓalalɛli ɓaɓɛɬɛli najɛ ɛɡ̤umɓini watʰi umkakʰɛ kujɛ amafilisti apʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ samsɔn waz̤id͡ʒ̤akǀa iintamɓɔ kwanɡ̤a kukud͡ʒ̤akǀɛka kwɛnt͡sɔntɛlɔ jɛflakisi jakuv̤a umlilɔ akaz̤iwa kɛ amanɮa akʰɛ watʰi ud̤ɛlila kusamsɔn jaɓɔna uɮalɛ nɡ̤am wand̤ikǁɔkisa kʰawund̤ikǁɛlɛlɛ kalɔku ukuɓa unɡ̤akʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰wa nɡ̤antɔni watʰi kujɛ ukuɓa ɓatʰɛ ukund̤ikʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰a ɓand̤ikʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰a nɡ̤ɛɛnt͡sɔntɛlɔ ɛz̤int͡ʃa ɛkunɡ̤asɛtʲɛnz̤wanɡ̤a msɛɓɛnz̤i nɡ̤az̤ɔ nd̤ɔtʰi fɛɬɛ nd̤iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɲɛ ud̤ɛlila watʰaɓatʰa iint͡sɔntɛlɔ ɛz̤int͡ʃa wamkʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰a nɡ̤az̤ɔ watʰi kujɛ amafilisti apʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ samsɔn kɛ aɓalalɛli ɓaɓɛɬɛli ɛɡ̤umɓini waz̤id͡ʒ̤akǀa ɛmikʰɔnwɛni jakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔntɔ watʰi ud̤ɛlila kusamsɔn uɮalɛ nɡ̤am unanɡ̤ɔku und̤ikǁɔkisa nd̤ikǁɛlɛlɛ unɡ̤akʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰wa nɡ̤antɔni watʰi kujɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ iz̤iɬwitʰa ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ z̤ɛntlɔkɔ jam nɡ̤ɛmisɔntɔ jɔkuluka waz̤ikǃinisa nɡ̤ɛsikʰɔnkwanɛ watʰi kujɛ amafilisti apʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ samsɔn wav̤uka ɛɓutʰɔnɡ̤wɛni ɓakʰɛ wasiŋǀɔtʰula isikʰɔnkwanɛ sɔkuluka kwanɛmisɔntɔ jasɔ watʰi kujɛ unɡ̤atʰini ukutʰi ujand̤itʰand̤a intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ ajinam und̤ikʰɔɬisilɛ ɛz̤i z̤iɬanɮɔ z̤ɔz̤itʰatʰu akwand̤ikǁɛlɛla ukuɓa asɛnini manɮa akʰɔ anɡ̤aka kwatʰi akumkǁina nɡ̤amaz̤wi akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛmmɛlɛ wakʰatʰaz̤ɛka umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ wasinɡ̤isa ɛkufɛni wamkǁɛlɛla intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ watʰi kujɛ isit͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ sɔkukǀʰɛɓa asiz̤anɡ̤a sisɔnd̤ɛlɛ ɛntlɔkwɛni jam nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inɡ̤umaɬulwa katʰikǁɔ kwasɛsiz̤alwɛni ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤akǀʰɛtʲwa ɔsuka amanɮa nd̤itʰi fɛɬɛ nd̤iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ waɓɔna ud̤ɛlila ukuɓa umkǁɛlɛlɛ jɔnkɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ watʰumɛla waɓiz̤a iz̤ikʰulu z̤amafilisti ɛsitʰi ɲukani ɛsi siɬanɮɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa und̤ikǁɛlɛlɛ jɔnkɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ z̤ɛɲuka kɛ z̤aja kujɛ iz̤ikʰulu z̤amafilisti z̤ɛɲuka z̤inɛmali ɛsanɮɛni saz̤ɔ wamlalisa ɛmatʰanɡ̤ɛni akʰɛ waɓiz̤a waz̤ikǀʰɛɓa iz̤iɬwitʰa z̤ɔsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ z̤ɛntlɔkɔ jakʰɛ wakǃala kɛ ukumkǃɔɓa ɛmka kɛ amanɮa akʰɛ kujɛ watʰi amafilisti apʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ samsɔn wav̤uka ɛɓutʰɔnɡ̤wɛni watʰi nd̤ija kupʰuma ɛsi siɬanɮɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤iɬanɮɔ nd̤iz̤iv̤utʰululɛ wajɛnɡ̤az̤i jɛna ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a umkilɛ kujɛ amɓamɓa amafilisti amk͡xuk͡xa amɛɬɔ ɛɬa najɛ aja ɛɡ̤az̤a amkʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰a nɡ̤amakʰamand̤ɛla ɔb̤ɛd̤u amaɓini waɓa nɡ̤umsili ɛnɮwini jamakʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰wa z̤akǃala iinwɛlɛ z̤ɛntlɔkɔ jakʰɛ z̤aɬuma ɛmv̤a kɔkuɓa wajɛkǀʰɛtʲiwɛ iz̤ikʰulu z̤amafilisti z̤aɬanɡ̤anisɛlwa ukuɓa z̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɔmkʰulu kud̤aɡ̤ɔn utʰikǁɔ waz̤ɔ z̤iv̤ujɛ z̤atʰi utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu umnikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɛtʰu usamsɔn ut͡ʃaɓa lwɛtʰu ɓamɓɔna aɓantu ɓad̤umisa utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛɓɛsitʰi utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ulunikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɛtʰu ut͡ʃaɓa lwɛtʰu umt͡ʃaɓalalisi wɛliz̤wɛ lɛtʰu ɔɓɛnz̤ɛ ɓaɓaninz̤i aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ kutʰi kwatʰi kǁa intliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ ikǀʰwajitʰilɛjɔ ɓatʰi ɓiz̤ani usamsɔn asiɬɛkisɛ ɓamɓiz̤a kɛ usamsɔn ɛnɮwini jamakʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰wa wapʰuma waɬɛkisa pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ ɓammisa pʰakatʰi kwɛɛnt͡sika watʰi usamsɔn ɔmɓamɓɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa nd̤ijɛkɛ nd̤iz̤iv̤ɛ iint͡sika ɛmi nɡ̤az̤ɔ inɮu nd̤ajamɛ nɡ̤az̤ɔ kɛ inɮu iɓiz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a naɓafaz̤i z̤iɓɛ z̤ikʰɔna z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ikʰulu z̤amafilisti pʰɛz̤u kɔpʰaɬa kwakuɬɛli ɔmatʰatʰu amad̤ɔd̤a naɓafaz̤i ɓɛɓɔnɛla ukuɬɛkisa kukasamsɔn usamsɔn waŋǃula ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi nkɔsi jam jɛhɔv̤a kʰawund̤ikʰumɓulɛ kʰawund̤ɔmɛlɛz̤ɛ ɔkwɛsi siɬanɮɔ sɔd̤wa tʰikǁɔ nd̤ipʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlɛ kumafilisti impind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ nɔkuɓa iɲɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamɛɬɔ ɔmaɓini waz̤iwɔla usamsɔn z̤ɔmɓini iint͡sika ɛz̤ipʰakatʰi ɛmi nɡ̤az̤ɔ inɮu lɛjɔ wakǀinɛz̤ɛla kuz̤ɔ ɛɲɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sɔkunɛnɛ ɛɲɛ nɡ̤ɛsɔkʰɔɬɔ watʰi usamsɔn mand̤ifɛ namafilisti watʰɔɓa nɡ̤amanɮa jawa inɮu pʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤ikʰulu napʰɛz̤u kwaɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛkujɔ ɓatʰi aɓafi awaɓaɓulala ɛkufɛni kwakʰɛ ɓaɓa ɓaninz̤i kunaɓafi awaɓaɓulala ɛsapʰililɛ ɓɛɬa aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ nɛnɮu kajisɛ jɔnkɛ ɓamtʰaɓatʰa ɓamɲusa ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla pʰakatʰi kwɛt͡sɔra nɛɛʃtawɔli ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni likamanɔwa ujisɛ wawalawula jɛna amasirajɛli imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi maɓini kwajɛ kukʰɔ ind̤ɔd̤a jɛlasɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwaɛfrajim ɛɡ̤ama linɡ̤umika jatʰi iwaka lɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛlinakʰuluɲɛ ɛlalitʰatʲatʰwɛ kuwɛ ɔwaʃwaɓula nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jalɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ watʰɛtʰa nɡ̤alɔ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤am jaɓɔna isiliv̤ɛrɛ lɛjɔ jatʰatʲatʰwa nd̤im watʰi usikɛlɛlwɛ ɲana nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a waliɓujisɛla lɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛlinakʰuluɲɛ watʰi nd̤ijiŋ̤ǀ̤walisilɛ jɔnkɛ isiliv̤ɛrɛ lɛjɔ kujɛhɔv̤a ipʰuma ɛsanɮɛni ukuɓa iɓɛ jɛjɔɲana ɛnz̤ɛ umfanɛkisɔ ɔkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ nɔmtʰʲid̤ɔ nd̤ijiɓujisɛla kuwɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ wajiɓujisɛla kɛ isiliv̤ɛrɛ wawatʰaɓatʰa amakʰulu ɔmaɓini ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ umɲiɓilikisi wɛnz̤a nɡ̤awɔ umfanɛkisɔ ɔkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ nɔmtʰʲid̤ɔ waɓa sɛnɮwini kamika ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ inɡ̤umika iɓinɛnɮu jɔɔtʰikǁɔ jajɛnz̤ɛ iɛfɔd̤i nɛmilɔnd̤ɛkʰaja jajimisɛlɛ ɔmɲɛ kɔɔɲana ɓajɔ waɓa nɡ̤umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wajɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa ɓɛkunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ kwasirajɛli ɛlɔwɔ wɛnz̤a ɔkɔ kutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ kɛ kalɔku kwakukʰɔ wasɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm jakwajud̤a wasɛmliɓɛni wakwajud̤a ɔnɡ̤umlɛv̤i ɛnɡ̤umpʰamɓukɛli kʰɔna jahamɓa ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ kulɔɔ mz̤i ɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm jakwajud̤a jaja kupʰamɓukɛla apʰɔ inɡ̤afumana ind̤awɔ jafika kwɛlɛɛntaɓa lakwaɛfrajim ɛnɮwini kamika ihamɓa uhamɓɔ lwajɔ watʰi umika kujɔ uv̤ɛla pʰi jatʰi kujɛ nd̤inɡ̤umlɛv̤i wasɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm jakwajud̤a nd̤ija kupʰamɓukɛla apʰɔ nd̤inɡ̤afumana ind̤awɔ watʰi umika kujɔ ɬala uɓɛ nɡ̤uɓawɔ nɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nd̤ɔkunika iʃumi lɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka nd̤ikukǁʰasɛ nɡ̤ɛntɔ ɛz̤iinɡ̤uɓɔ nɛkukuɮa waja kɛ umlɛv̤i lɔwɔ kwakʰɔlɛka kumlɛv̤i ukuɬala nalɛ nd̤ɔd̤a lɔɔ waɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɲɛ wɔɔɲana ɓajɔ kujɔ wammisɛla umika umlɛv̤i lɔwɔ waɓa nɡ̤umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kujɛ lɔwɔ waɓa sɛnɮwini kamika watʰi umika kalɔku nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uja kund̤ɛnz̤ɛla ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔnɡ̤umlɛv̤i nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa kuɓɛ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ kwasirajɛli nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa isiz̤wɛ sakwad̤an ɓɛsiz̤ifunɛla lɛnd̤awɔ jɔkuɬala nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kwad̤a kwanɡ̤ulɔɔ m̤la siɓɛ sɔna sinɡ̤aɓɛlwanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛkǃaʃisɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛsiz̤wɛ sakwasirajɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakad̤an ɓɛsusa kumliɓɔ wakɔwaɓɔ amad̤ɔd̤a amaɬanu ɛv̤ɛla lawɔ lɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a anɔɓuk͡xɔti asɛt͡sɔra nasɛɛʃtawɔli ukuɓa aliɬɔlɛ iliz̤wɛ aliɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀɛ ɓatʰi kuwɔ hamɓani niliɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀɛ iliz̤wɛ afika kwɛlɛɛntaɓa lakwaɛfrajim ɛnɮwini kamika kʰɔna akuɓɔna ukuɓa anɡ̤asɛnɮwini kamika iliz̤wi lɛnd̤ɔd̤ana ɛnɡ̤umlɛv̤i apʰamɓukɛla kʰɔna atʰi kujɛ uz̤iswɛ nɡ̤uɓani apʰa wɛnz̤a ntɔni kulɛ nd̤awɔ unɡ̤antɔni apʰa jatʰi kuwɔ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ umika wand̤ikǃɛʃa nd̤aɓa nɡ̤umɓinɡ̤ɛ lɛli kujɛ atʰi kujɔ kʰawuɓuz̤ɛ kutʰikǁɔ saz̤i ukuɓa ija kuɓa nɛmpumɛlɛlɔ inɮɛla jɛtʰu ɛsihamɓɛla jɔna watʰi umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kuwɔ ha mɓani ninɔkǁɔlɔ ipʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a inɮɛla jɛnu ɛnija kuhamɓa nɡ̤ajɔ ahamɓa kɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amaɬanu ɛlajiʃɛ aɓaɓɔna aɓantu aɓapʰakatʰi kwajɔ ɓɛɬɛli ɓɔnwaɓilɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ lamat͡sid̤ɔn ɓɛz̤ɔlilɛ ɓɔnwaɓilɛ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ uwɔna nɡ̤antɔ kuɓapʰatʰi ɓɛlɔ z̤wɛ ɓaɓɛkud̤ɛ kumat͡sid̤ɔn ɓɛnɡ̤atʰɛni naɓani afika kuɓaz̤alwana ɓawɔ ɛt͡sɔra nasɛɛʃtawɔli ɓatʰi aɓaz̤alwana ɓawɔ kuwɔ nitʰɛni atʰi sukani siɲukɛ sijɛ kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa siliɓɔnilɛ iliz̤wɛ nalɔ liliɬɛ kunɛnɛ kɛ nitʰɛ kǃutʰu musani ukuŋǃɛna ukuhamɓa nijɛ kuliɬutʰa iliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ kǁa nitʰɛ nɔfika kuɓantu aɓɔnwaɓilɛjɔ kwiliz̤wɛ ɛlipʰanɡ̤alɛlɛjɔ nɡ̤amakǀala ɔmaɓini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰikǁɔ ulinikɛlɛ ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤ɛnu ind̤awɔ apʰɔ kunɡ̤aswɛlɛkɛ naɲɛ intɔ ɛsɛɬaɓatʰini kwand̤uluka kɛ kumliɓɔ wakwad̤an ɛt͡sɔra nasɛɛʃtawɔli amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amakʰulu ɔmatʰand̤atʰu ɛkǁʰɔɓɛ iimpaɬa z̤ɛmfaz̤wɛ ɛɲuka kɛ ɛkirijatijɛharim jakwajud̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ɓatʰi lɔɔ nd̤awɔ jimahanɛ jakwad̤an unanam̤la nant͡sɔ isɛmv̤a kwɛkirijatijɛharim aɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa aja kwɛlɛɛntaɓa lakwaɛfrajim ɛnɮwini kamika kɛ kalɔku apʰɛnd̤ula amad̤ɔd̤a amaɬanu aɓɛz̤ɛ kuliɬɔla iliz̤wɛ lasɛlajiʃɛ atʰi kuɓaz̤alwana ɓawɔ nijaz̤i ukuɓa kwɛz̤i z̤inɮu kukʰɔ iɛfɔd̤i nɛmilɔnd̤ɛkʰaja nɔmfanɛkisɔ ɔkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ nɔmtʰʲid̤ɔ kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ kukǃɔnd̤ɛni ɛniz̤a kukwɛnz̤a apʰamɓukɛla kʰɔna anɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini jɛnd̤ɔd̤ana ɛnɡ̤umlɛv̤i ɛnɮwini kamika ajiɓuz̤a ukupʰila kwajɔ atʰi amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu akǁʰɔɓɛ iimpaɬa z̤ɛmfaz̤wɛ akɔɔɲana ɓakwad̤an ɛma ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ aɲuka mad̤ɔd̤a maɬanu aɓɛjɛ kuliɬɔla iliz̤wɛ aja kʰɔna awutʰaɓatʰa umfanɛkisɔ ɔkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ nɛɛfɔd̤i nɛmilɔnd̤ɛkʰaja nɔmtʰʲid̤ɔ wajɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli lɔwɔ ɛmi ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ namad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu akǁʰɔɓɛ iimpaɬa z̤ɛmfaz̤wɛ akuɓa ɛnɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛnɮwini kamika ɛwutʰaɓatʰilɛ umfanɛkisɔ ɔkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ iɛfɔd̤i nɛmilɔnd̤ɛkʰaja nɔmtʰʲid̤ɔ utʰɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kuwɔ nɛnz̤ani atʰi kujɛ
