jitʰi ɓɛka isanɮa sakʰɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɔ uhamɓɛ natʰi uɓɛ nɡ̤uɓawɔ nɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kutʰi kulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuɓa uɓɛ nɡ̤umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wɛnɮu jamntu mɲɛ kunɔkuɓa uɓɛ nɡ̤umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wɛsiz̤wɛ nɔmz̤alwana kwasirajɛli jakǀʰwajitʰa intliz̤ijɔ jɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wajitʰaɓatʰa iɛfɔd̤i nɛmilɔnd̤ɛkʰaja nɔmfanɛkisɔ ɔkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ wɛz̤a pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu aɓɔ ad͡ʒ̤ika kɛ ahamɓa az̤iɓɛka iint͡sapʰɔ nɛɛmfujɔ nɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤iz̤ukilɛjɔ pʰamɓi kwawɔ akuɓa kud̤ɛ nɛnɮu kamika wɔna atʰi amad̤ɔd̤a asɛz̤inɮwini ɛz̤inɡ̤akwɛkamika inɮu aɬaɓɛlana umkʰɔsi ɛz̤a nɔɔɲana ɓakad̤an amɛmɛz̤a kɔɔɲana ɓakad̤an ɓaɡ̤ukǃuka nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɓatʰi kumika ukʰatʰaz̤wa jini uɬaɓa umkʰɔsi nd͡ʒ̤ɛ watʰi jɛna ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓam ɛnd̤aɓɛnz̤ajɔ niɓatʰaɓatʰilɛ nɛmka najɛ nɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nd̤isɛnantɔni nit͡ʃɔ nɡ̤ani kɛ ukutʰi ukʰatʰaz̤wa jini ɓatʰi kujɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakad̤an musa ukuliv̤akalisa iliz̤wi lakʰɔ kutʰi ɬɛz̤ɛ akuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛ amad̤ɔd̤a ampʰɛfumlɔ uluɡ̤ǀ̤alaɡ̤ǀ̤ala asusɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ nɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wɛnɮu jakʰɔ ɓahamɓa kɛ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jaɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakad̤an waɓɔna umika ukuɓa ɓɔmɛlɛlɛ kunajɛ wad͡ʒ̤ika waɓujɛla ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ ɓajitʰaɓatʰa kɛ ɓɔna intɔ aɓɛjɛnz̤ilɛ umika nɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli lɔwɔ aɓɛnajɛ ɓafika ɛlajiʃɛ kuɓantu aɓaz̤ɔlilɛjɔ aɓɔnwaɓilɛjɔ ɓaɓaɓulala nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ ɓawut͡ʃisa umz̤i nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ ɓɛkunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ m̤lanɡ̤uli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛkud̤ɛ nɔwasɛt͡sid̤ɔn ɓɛnɡ̤atʰɛni naɓani ɓɛsɛntilini ɛsinɡ̤isɛ ɛb̤ɛtɛrɛhɔb̤i ɓakʰa umz̤i ɓaɬala kʰɔna ɓatʰi iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ mz̤i nɡ̤ɔwakwad̤an nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama likad̤an ujisɛ ɔwaz̤alɛlwa usirajɛli kɔd̤wa iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ mz̤i liɓɛ lijilajiʃɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɡ̤apʰamɓili ɓaz̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakad̤an ɓaz̤imisɛla umfanɛkisɔ ɔkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ lɔwɔ ujɔnatan uɲana kaɡ̤ɛrʃɔm uɲana kamanasɛ jɛna nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓaɓa nɡ̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛsiz̤wɛni sakwad̤an kwad̤a kwajimini jɔkutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kwɛliz̤wɛ ɓaz̤imisɛla kɛ umfanɛkisɔ ɔkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ kamika aɓɛwɛnz̤ilɛ jɔnkɛ imiɬa ɛɓisɛsɛʃilɔ inɮu katʰikǁɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ kwasirajɛli kwaɓakʰɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤umlɛv̤i ɛpʰamɓukɛlɛ ɛmatʰamɓɛkɛni akwaɛfrajim jaz̤ɛka umfaz̤i ɔliʃwɛʃwɛ ɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm jakwajud̤a lahɛɲuz̤a likujɔ iʃwɛʃwɛ lajɔ lɛmka kujɔ laja ɛnɮwini jɔjisɛ walɔ ɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm jakwajud̤a laɓa kʰɔna imiɬa ɛz̤iiɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤inɛ jɛsuka ind̤ɔd̤a jalɔ jalipʰutʰuma ukuɓa itʰɛtʰɛ kakuɬɛ nalɔ iliɓujisɛ inɔmfana namaɛsilɛ amaɓini lajinɡ̤ɛnisa ɛnɮwini jɔjisɛ walɔ wajiɓɔna ujisɛ wɛntɔmɓaz̤ana lɛjɔ wakuv̤ujɛla ukuɬanɡ̤ana najɔ wajiɡ̤ǀ̤ina ujisɛ wɔmfaz̤i ujisɛ wɛntɔmɓaz̤ana lɛjɔ jaɬala najɛ imiɬa jamitʰatʰu ɓaɮa ɓasɛla ɓalala kʰɔna kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsinɛ ɓav̤uka jɛsuka jɔna ukuɓa imkɛ watʰi ujisɛ wɛntɔmɓaz̤ana kumjɛni wajɔ kʰawukǁʰasɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛkǃʰɛkɛz̤a lɛsɔnka nand̤ulɛ ukuhamɓa ɓaɬala kɛ ɓaɮa ɓɔɓaɓini nd̤awɔɲɛ ɓasɛla watʰi ujisɛ wɛntɔmɓaz̤ana kwind̤ɔd̤a makʰɛ kukʰɔlɛkɛ kuwɛ ulalɛ ikǀʰwajitʰɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ jɛsuka ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ ukuɓa ihamɓɛ wajid͡ʒ̤ɔka ujisɛ wɔmkajɔ jaɓuja jalala kʰɔna jav̤uka nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsiɬanu ukuɓa ihamɓɛ watʰi ujisɛ wɛntɔmɓaz̤ana kʰawukǁʰasɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ niz̤ilaz̤ilɛ id̤ɛ id͡ʒ̤ikɛ ɓaɮa kɛ ɓɔɓaɓini jɛsuka ind̤ɔd̤a ukuɓa imkɛ jɔna nɛʃwɛʃwɛ lajɔ nɔmfana wakujɔ watʰi kujɔ ujisɛ wɔmkajɔ ujisɛ wɛntɔmɓaz̤ana kʰawukʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ijɛmka kujaɬwa kʰanilalɛ jaɓɔna isanɡ̤ɛnɛ apʰa ikǀʰwajitʰɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ niv̤ukɛ nɡ̤ɔmsɔ nihamɓɛ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛnu ujɛ ɛntɛntɛni jakʰɔ ajav̤uma ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ jɛsuka jɛmka jafika malunɡ̤ana nɛjɛb̤usi jijɛrusalɛm kɛ lɛjɔ inamaɛsilɛ amaɓini ɛɓɔt͡ʃiwɛ inɛʃwɛʃwɛ lajɔ kǁa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤asɛjɛb̤usi jajisɛ itʰamɓamilɛ kakʰulu watʰi kwinkɔsi jakʰɛ kʰawuz̤ɛ sipʰamɓukɛlɛ kulɔ mz̤i wamajɛb̤usi silalɛ kuwɔ jatʰi kujɛ inkɔsi jakʰɛ asiji kupʰamɓukɛla apʰa kumz̤i wɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a ɔnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔwɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli sɔɮula sijɛ ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha jatʰi wakujɔ jiz̤a sisɔnd̤ɛlɛ kwɛɲɛ ind̤awɔ silalɛ nɔkuɓa kusɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha nɔkuɓa kusɛrama ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa ɓahamɓa ɓat͡ʃɔnɛlwa lilanɡ̤a ɛkǀalɛni lasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha jakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɓapʰamɓukɛla apʰɔ ɓaja ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha jafika jaɬala ɛnd̤awɛni jɔkuɓutʰa kwamad̤ɔd̤a ɔmz̤i akwaɓakʰɔ uɓamkɛlɛla ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ ukuɓa ɓalalɛ kwatʰi tʰu ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnkulu iv̤ɛla ɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini wajɔ ɛmasimini nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa ijind̤ɔd̤a jɛlasɛz̤intaɓɛni lakwaɛfrajim inɡ̤umpʰamɓukɛli ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha kɛ amad̤ɔd̤a alɔɔ mz̤i aɓɛnɡ̤amab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin jawapʰakamisa amɛɬɔ ajɔ jaɓɔna nd̤ɔd̤a inɡ̤um̤amɓi ɛnd̤awɛni jɔkuɓutʰa kwamad̤ɔd̤a ɔmz̤i jatʰi ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnkulu lɛjɔ uja nɡ̤apʰi uv̤ɛla pʰi jatʰi kujɔ sijaɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa siv̤ɛla ɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm jakwajud̤a sija ɛmatʰamɓɛkɛni akwaɛfrajim ɛnd̤inɡ̤ɔwakʰɔna nd̤iɓɛ nd̤ihamɓɛlɛ ɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm jakwajud̤a nɡ̤ɔku nd̤ihamɓɛla ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a akukʰɔ ɓani kɛ und̤amkɛlɛla ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ apʰa kɛ sinɔmkǃukǃu kwanɛɛnd̤iz̤a z̤amaɛsilɛ ɛtʰu nɛsɔnka nɛwajini ɛjijɛjam nɔmkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ nɔmfana ɔkuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ akuswɛlɛkɛ ntɔ jatʰi ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnkulu ukǁɔlɔ maluɓɛ nawɛ kɛ ukuswɛla kwakʰɔ kɔnkɛ makuɓɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔd̤wa ɛnd̤awɛni jɔkuɓutʰa kwamad̤ɔd̤a ɔmz̤i jajinɡ̤ɛnisa ɛnɮwini jajɔ jawanika iind̤iz̤a amaɛsilɛ ɓaz̤iɬamɓa iiɲawɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓaɮa ɓasɛla ɓakuɓɔn ukuɓa ɓajaz̤ikǀʰwajitʰisa iintliz̤ijɔ z̤aɓɔ nanɡ̤ɔ amad̤ɔd̤a alɔɔ mz̤i amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amat͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔ ɛjixawula inɮu lɛjɔ ɛmana ɛŋ̰ǃ̰ɔŋ̰ǃ̰ɔz̤a ɛlukǀanɡ̤wɛni at͡ʃɔ kwind̤ɔd̤a ɛnkulu ɛnɡ̤umnininɮu ukutʰi jikʰupʰɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ sijaz̤i japʰuma ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤umnininɮu jaja kuwɔ jatʰi kuwɔ haji ɓaz̤alwana ɓam haji ukukʰa nɛnz̤ɛ intɔ ɛmɓi ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa lɛ nd̤ɔd̤a inɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛnɮwini jam ukwɛnz̤a ɔɓu ɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ nant͡si intɔmɓi jam ɛjintɔmɓi nɛʃwɛʃwɛ lalɛ nd̤ɔd̤a makʰɛ nd̤ikʰupʰɛ ɓɔna niɓɔnɛ nɛnz̤ɛ kuɓɔ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛnu kɛ kulɛ nd̤ɔd̤a z̤ɛ ninɡ̤ɛnz̤i ntɔ jɔɓu ɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ akav̤uma lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a ukumpʰulapʰula jaliɓamɓa ind̤ɔd̤a iʃwɛʃwɛ lajɔ jalikʰupʰɛla pʰanɮɛ kuwɔ alaz̤i afɛkɛtʰa nɡ̤alɔ ɓɔnkɛ uɓusuku kwad̤a alind̤ulula nɡ̤ɛsifinɡ̤ɔ jafika inkaz̤ana lɛjɔ kǁa kusajɔ jawa ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛnɮu jɛnd̤ɔd̤a apʰɔ jajikʰɔna inkɔsi jajɔ kwad̤a kwam̤lɔpʰɛ jav̤uka inkɔsi jajɔ jaz̤iv̤ula iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤ɛnɮu japʰuma ukuɓa ihamɓɛ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jajɔ nant͡sɔ lɛ nkaz̤ana iliʃwɛʃwɛ lajɔ iwilɛ ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ walɔɔ nɮu nɛz̤anɮa z̤ajɔ z̤isɛmɓund̤wini wawɔ jatʰi kujɔ v̤uka sihamɓɛ ajapʰɛnd̤ula jajitʰaɓatʰa jajiɓɛka pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛsilɛ jɛsuka lɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤a jasinɡ̤a ɛnd̤awɛni jajɔ jafika ɛnɮwini jajɔ jatʰaɓatʰa isit͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ jaliɓamɓa iʃwɛʃwɛ lajɔ jalitʲatʲa nɡ̤ɔkwamatʰamɓɔ alɔ laz̤iiɲama ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛlinamɓini jalitʰumɛla kujɔ jɔnkɛ imid̤a jakwasirajɛli ukuz̤ɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɔna ɔkɔ ɓatʰi ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ akuz̤anɡ̤a kuɓɛkʰɔ akuz̤anɡ̤a kuɓɔnwɛ kususɛla kum̤la aɓaɲuka nɡ̤awɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa unanam̤la kuɓɛkɛlɛni iintliz̤ijɔ z̤ɛnu ɔku nikǀɛɓɛ nitʰɛtʰɛ ɓapʰuma kɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli laɓiz̤ɛlwa nd̤awɔɲɛ lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤and̤ɔd̤aɲɛ latʰaɓatʰɛla kwad̤an lɛsa ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a nɛliz̤wɛ lasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i laja kujɛhɔv̤a ɛmiz̤pa z̤ɛma iz̤iɓɔnd̤a z̤aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ z̤ɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwasirajɛli ɛɓanɮɛni laɓantu ɓakatʰikǁɔ aɓanɡ̤amawaka anɡ̤amakʰulu amanɛ amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤umkǃikɛla axɔla ik͡xɛlɛ ɓɛv̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ukuɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛɲukilɛ ɓɛz̤a ɛmiz̤pa ɓatʰi ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli tʰɛtʰani itʰɛni ukuɓakʰɔ lɛ ntɔ ind͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓa mɓi japʰɛnd̤ula ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ inɡ̤umlɛv̤i ind̤ɔd̤a jalɔɔ nkaz̤ana iŋǀinitʰiwɛjɔ jatʰi nd̤afika ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha ɛkwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɛʃwɛʃwɛ kʰɔna aɓɛmi ɓasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha ɓand̤iv̤unukɛla ɓajixawula inɮu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam ɛɓusuku ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa kwɛlɔkund̤iɓulala ɓaliɮwɛnɡ̤ula iʃwɛʃwɛ nd̤aliɓamɓa iʃwɛʃwɛ nd̤alitʲatʲa nd̤alitʰumɛla kwiliz̤wɛ lɔnkɛ lɛlifa lakwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛnz̤ɛ amaɲala nɔɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ kwasirajɛli nankɔ kɛ nɔnkɛ ɲana ɓakasirajɛli kʰupʰani iliz̤wi nɛkǀɛɓɔ apʰa ɓɛsuka ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤and̤ɔd̤aɲɛ ɓatʰi asiji kuja ɛlɔwɔ ɛntɛntɛni jakʰɛ asiji kupʰamɓukɛla ɛlɔwɔ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ nant͡si intɔ ɛsija kwɛnz̤a jɔna kwiɡ̤ib̤ɛha sija kwɛnz̤a kujɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛkǃaʃisɔ sitʰaɓatʰɛ iʃumi lamad̤ɔd̤a ɛkʰulwini ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwasirajɛli ikʰulu ɛwakɛni ɛmawakɛni aliʃumi ukuja kutʰaɓatʰɛla aɓantu umpʰakɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɛkufikɛni kwaɓɔ ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha jakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɓɔɬwajwɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kwasirajɛli aɬanɡ̤anisana kɛ ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli kulɔɔ mz̤i ɛɓand̤akaɲiwɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤and̤ɔd̤aɲɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤akwasirajɛli z̤atʰuma amad̤ɔd̤a kwimiz̤alwanɛ jɔnkɛ jakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin z̤isitʰi ɓuɓuɓi ɓuni ɔɓu ɓɛnz̤iwɛjɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛnu sinikɛlɛni kalɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amat͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔ asɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha siwaɓulalɛ siɓut͡ʃajɛlɛ uɓuɓi ɓunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ kwasirajɛli aɓav̤uma kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ukulipʰulapʰula iz̤wi laɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɓaɬanɡ̤anisana ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha ɓɛpʰuma ɛmiz̤ini ɓɛsija nɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaɓalwa ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤alɔɔ m̤la ɓɛpʰuma ɛmiz̤ini ɓaɓa nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini anamatʰand̤atʰu axɔla ik͡xɛlɛ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwaɓɛmi ɓasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha aɓaɓalwajɔ ɓaɓa nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a aɬɛliwɛjɔ anɡ̤amakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kwaɓa ɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛkukʰɔ amakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ amad̤ɔd̤a aɬɛliwɛjɔ anɡ̤amaŋǁɛlɛ ɔnkɛ ɛnɔkusawula nɡ̤ɛlitʲɛ akǀʰanɛ anɡ̤apʰɔsi kɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwamab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin aɓɛɓalwɛ aɓa nɡ̤amawaka anɡ̤amakʰulu amanɛ amad̤ɔd̤a axɔla ik͡xɛlɛ ɔnkɛ lawɔ inɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a ɔkulwa ɓɛsuka ɓɛɲuka ɓaja ɛb̤ɛtɛli ɓaɓuz̤a kutʰikǁɔ ɓatʰi ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli makuɲukɛ ɓani kutʰi akǃalɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a makukǃalɛ ujud̤a ɓɛsuka ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓajiŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a iɡ̤ib̤ɛha apʰuma amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli aja namab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli akʰa uluɬu lɔkulwa nawɔ nɡ̤asɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha ɓapʰuma ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha ɓav̤unɛla pʰant͡si nɡ̤alɔɔ kumasirajɛli amaʃumi amaɓini anamaɓini amad̤ɔd̤a ɓaz̤ɔmɛlɛz̤a aɓantu amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli ɓapʰind̤a ɓakʰa uluɬu lɔkulwa kwasɛnd̤awɛni aɓaɓakʰɛ uluɬu kujɔ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɔkukǃala ɓɛɲuka ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓalila pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a kwad̤a kwaɬwa ɓaɓuz̤a kujɛhɔv̤a ɓatʰi nd̤ipʰind̤ɛ nd̤isɔnd̤ɛlɛ ɛkulwɛni nɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin umz̤alwana watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a ɲukani nijɛ kuɓɔ ɓasɔnd̤ɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsiɓini apʰuma amab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha aja kuɓaɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsiɓini aɓuja av̤unɛla pʰant͡si kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli iʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ amad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ lawɔ axɔla ik͡xɛlɛ ɓɛɲuka ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓaja ɛb̤ɛtɛli ɓalila ɓaɬala kʰɔna pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɓaz̤ila ukuɮa lɔɔ kwad̤a kwaɬwa ɓaɲusa amad̤ini aɲukajɔ nɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔkǁɔlɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɓaɓuz̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kujɛhɔv̤a jajikʰɔna itʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa upinɛhasi uɲana kaɛlaz̤arɛ uɲana kaarɔn ɛmi pʰamɓi kwajɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa ɓɛsitʰi nd̤iɓujɛ nd̤ipʰind̤ɛ nd̤ipʰumɛ nd̤ijɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin umz̤alwana wɛtʰu nd̤ijɛkɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a ɲukani nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔmsɔ nd̤ija kumnikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sɛnu amasirajɛli aɓɛka aɓalalɛli ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɓɛɲuka ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaja kɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰatʰu ɓakʰa uluɬu lɔkulwa ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwɛmiɲɛ imiɬa ɓapʰuma ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɓaja kuɓaɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a aɓantu ɓɛkǃʰawukɛnɛ nɔmz̤i ɓakǃala ukuɓulala ɛɓantwini nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwɛmiɲɛ imiɬa ɛmɛnd̤wɛni ɔtʰi ɔmɲɛ uɲukɛ ujɛ ɛb̤ɛtɛli utʰi ɔmɲɛ uja ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha ɛmapʰanɮɛni ɓaɬaɓa amad̤ɔd̤a kwasirajɛli akumaʃumi amatʰatʰu ɓatʰi ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɓaɓulɛwɛ pʰamɓi kwɛtʰu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤asɛkukǃalɛni kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaɓɛsitʰi masixɔlɛ siɓakǃʰawulɛ kuwɔ umz̤i ɓɛz̤ɛ ɛmɛnd̤wɛni asuka ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli ɛnd̤awɛni jawɔ akʰa uluɬu ɛb̤ahalitamarɛ aɓalalɛli ɓamasirajɛli ɓatʰi kǀʰitʰitʰi ɛnd̤awɛni jaɓɔ ɛtʰafɛni lasɛɡ̤ɛb̤a kwav̤ɛla malunɡ̤ana nɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha iʃumi amad̤ɔd̤a aɬɛliwɛjɔ kumasirajɛli ɔnkɛ kwaʃuʃu ɓaɓɛnɡ̤az̤i ɓɔna ukuɓa uɓuɓi ɓuɓafikɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wawaɓulala amab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin pʰamɓi kwamasirajɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓat͡ʃaɓalalisa kwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤alɔɔ amaʃumi amaɓini anɛsiɬanu anɛkʰulu lamad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ ɔnkɛ nɡ̤axɔla ik͡xɛlɛ kɛ kalɔku ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɓaɓɔna ukuɓa ɓɔjisiwɛ ukuɓa amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli ajɛɬɛɬa pʰamɓi kwamab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓɛkʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤aɓalalɛli aɓaɓɛɓaɓɛkɛ ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha aɓalalɛli ɓakʰawulɛz̤a ɓaɡ̤alɛlɛka ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha ɓat͡salɛla kujɔ aɓalalɛli ɓawuɓulala wɔnkɛ umz̤i nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ kɛ kalɔku ib̤unɡ̤a lamad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli naɓalalɛli lajɛ liɓɛ lɛlɔkutʰi kǃʰumisani kakʰulu uɲukɛ kulɔɔ mz̤i ad͡ʒ̤ika kɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli ɛkulwɛni akuɓa ɛɓɛkǃalilɛ amab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ukuɓulala iiŋ̤ǁ̤wɛlɛxa pʰakatʰi kwamad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli amɔd̤ad̤a akumaʃumi amatʰatʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓɛsitʰi aɓɛtʰiwɛ nɡ̤ɛnɛnɛ wɔna pʰamɓi kwɛtʰu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkulwa kɔkukǃala wakuɓa ukǃalilɛ ukuɲuka ɛmz̤ini unɡ̤umkǃulu wɔmsi amab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ab̤ɛka ɛmv̤a kwawɔ nanɡ̤ɔ umz̤i wɔnkɛ uɲuka usija ɛz̤ulwini unɡ̤umsi apʰɛtʰula amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli akʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰iswa amad̤ɔd̤a akwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓɔna ukuɓa afikɛlwɛ ɓuɓuɓi ad͡ʒ̤ika kɛ pʰamɓi kwamad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli ab̤ɛka ɛnɮɛlɛni jɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ukulwa kwatʰana mɓɛnd̤ɛ nawɔ ɓɛsuka naɓɛmi ɓɛmiz̤i ɓawat͡ʃaɓalalisa kujɔ ɓawaxawula amab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɓawasukɛla ɓawaɲatʰɛlɛla pʰant͡si ɛnd̤awɛni jɔkupʰumla ɓɛsa malunɡ̤a nɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha nɡ̤ɛkǀala ɛlipʰuma ilanɡ̤a kwawa kumab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin iʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ amad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ kɛ lawɔ inɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a anɔɓuk͡xɔti ad͡ʒ̤ika kɛ asaɓɛla ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxɛni jɛrimɔn ɓakǀʰɔlakǀʰɔla kɛ kuwɔ ɛmɛnd̤wɛni amaɬanu amad̤ɔd̤a ɓatʰana mɓɛnd̤ɛ nawɔ ɓad̤a ɓɛsa ɛɡ̤id̤ijɔm ɓaɓulala kuwɔ amaɓini amad̤ɔd̤a atʰi kɛ ɔnkɛ awawajɔ kumab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤alɔɔ aɓa nɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini anɛsiɬanu inɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a axɔla ik͡xɛlɛ ɔnkɛ kɛ lawɔ ajɛnɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a anɔɓuk͡xɔti kɛ ad͡ʒ̤ika asaɓɛla ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxɛni ɛrimɔn ɛnɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu amad̤ɔd̤a aɬala ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxɛni jɛrimɔn apʰɔ iiɲanɡ̤a z̤anɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli aɓujɛla kɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin aɓulala nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kumz̤i kumad̤ɔd̤a kɛ kwanɛɛnkɔmɔ ɛsa kwintɔ jɔnkɛ ɛfumanɛkajɔ napʰi kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ imiz̤i jɔnkɛ ɛfuɲɛnwɛjɔ ajifaka umlilɔ kɛ kalɔku amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli aɓɛfunɡ̤ilɛ ɛmiz̤pa ɛsitʰi akukʰɔ kutʰi uja umb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin intɔmɓi jakʰɛ iɓɛ nɡ̤umfaz̤i ɓaja aɓantu ɛb̤ɛtɛli ɓaɬala kʰɔna kwad̤a kwaɬwa pʰamɓi kɔtʰikǁɔ ɓalipʰakamisa iz̤wi laɓɔ ɓat͡ʃɔ nɡ̤ɛsililɔ ɛsikʰulu ɓatʰi kunɡ̤ani jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi kuɬɛ ɔku kwasirajɛli ukuɓa ɛsiɲɛ isiz̤wɛ sinɡ̤aɓikʰɔ nam̤la kwasirajɛli kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ ɓav̤uka aɓantu ɓakʰa isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ kʰɔna ɓɛɲusa amad̤ini aɲukajɔ nɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔkǁɔlɔ ɓatʰi ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤uɓani ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwasirajɛli ɔnɡ̤aɲukanɡ̤a ɛz̤ɛ ɛɓanɮɛni kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓɛfunɡ̤ɛlwɛ kakʰulu ɔnɡ̤aɲukanɡ̤a ɛz̤ɛ kujɛhɔv̤a ɛmiz̤pa nɡ̤ɔkutʰi makaɓulawɛ afɛ ɓaɓɛz̤ɔɬwaja ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin waɓɔ ɓɛsitʰi nam̤la siŋǃaɲulwɛ ɛsiɲɛ isiz̤wɛ kwasirajɛli sija kuɓatʰini aɓasɛlɛjɔ nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓafaz̤i sifunɡ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛ tʰina ukuɓa asiji kuɓanika ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤ɛtʰu z̤iɓɛ nɡ̤aɓafaz̤i ɓatʰi kɛ sisipʰi isiz̤wɛ sakwasirajɛli ɛsinɡ̤aɲukanɡ̤a siz̤ɛ kujɛhɔv̤a ɛmiz̤pa nankɔ kɛ ɛjab̤ɛʃɛ jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i kunɡ̤ɛz̤anɡ̤a nd̤ɔd̤a ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni ɛɓanɮɛni ɓaɓalwa aɓantu nankɔ kunɡ̤aɓanɡ̤akʰɔ naɲɛ ind̤ɔd̤a jaɓɛmi ɓɛjab̤ɛʃɛ jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i kʰɔna iɓanɮa latʰumɛla kʰɔna iʃumi ɛlinamaɓini amad̤ɔd̤a kuɓafɔ aɓanɔɓuk͡xɔti lawawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ lisitʰi hamɓani nijɛ kuɓulala aɓɛmi ɓasɛjab̤ɛʃɛ jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ aɓafaz̤i naɓantwana nant͡si intɔ ɛnɔjɛnz̤a jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛjind̤ɔd̤a nɛntɔ jɔnkɛ ɛjinkaz̤ana ɛjaz̤ɛnɛ nɛnd̤ɔd̤a nɡ̤ɔkulalwa jijɔ nɔjisinɡ̤ɛla pʰant͡si afumana kuɓɛmi ɓasɛjab̤ɛʃɛ jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i amankaz̤ana anɡ̤amakʰulu amanɛ az̤iintɔmɓi anɡ̤az̤ani nand̤ɔd̤a nɡ̤ɔkulala najɔ awaz̤isa ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni ɛʃilɔ ɛsɛliz̤wɛni lamakanan latʰumɛla lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa latʰɛtʰa nɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin aɓaɓɛsɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxɛni jɛrimɔn lamɛmɛz̤a kuɓɔ latʰi likǁɔlilɛ aɓuja kɛ amab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa amankaz̤ana ɛɓɛliwasind̤isilɛ kumankaz̤ana asɛjab̤ɛʃɛ jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i akawalinɡ̤ana nɔkɔ anɡ̤akɔ aɓantu ɓaz̤ɔɬwaja nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɓɛnz̤ɛ utʰand̤a ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤akwasirajɛli atʰi amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ɛɓanɮa sija kuɓatʰini aɓasɛlɛjɔ nɡ̤aɓafaz̤i ɛt͡ʃaɓalɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ amankaz̤ana kwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin atʰi ilifa laɓasind̤ilɛjɔ maliɓɛ lɛlakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin kunɡ̤akǀiɲwa siz̤wɛ kwasirajɛli kɛ tʰina asinakuɓanika ɓafaz̤i ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤ɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓafunɡ̤ilɛ ɓɛsitʰi ukǃalɛkisiwɛ ɔnika umb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin umfaz̤i atʰi nijaɓɔna kukʰɔ umtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ kajɛhɔv̤a imiɲaka nɡ̤ɛmiɲaka ɛʃilɔ ɛnɡ̤asɛntla jɛb̤ɛtɛli nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a kɔmɛnd̤ɔ ɔv̤ɛla ɛb̤ɛtɛli ɔɲuka ujɛ kwaʃɛkɛm nanɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si kwɛlɛb̤ɔna aɓawisɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin umtʰɛtʰɔ ɛsitʰi hamɓani nijɛ kulalɛla ɛz̤id̤ilijɛni jaɓɔnani nikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ukuɓa z̤itʰɛ z̤apʰuma iintɔmɓi z̤asɛʃilɔ z̤iŋ̤ǃ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤a z̤iɓɛtʰa iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔ z̤ɛ nipʰumɛ ɛz̤id̤ilijɛni niz̤itʰɛlɛ ɬasi ɛlɔwɔ umkakʰɛ ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤asɛʃilɔ nijɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin kɔtʰi kǁa ɔɔjisɛ naɓanakwaz̤ɔ ɓaz̤ɛ kuɓamɓana natʰi sitʰi kuɓɔ siɓaɓalɛni nɡ̤az̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sinɡ̤aɓatʰaɓatʰɛlanɡ̤a ɛlɔwɔ umkakʰɛ ɛkulwɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aniɓanikanɡ̤a ɔkaɲɛ ɓɛnija kuɓa nɛtʲala ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɓaz̤ɛka aɓafaz̤i nɡ̤ɔkwɛnani laɓɔ kwɛz̤ɔ z̤az̤iŋ̤ǃ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤a ɓaz̤ikǁʰakamfulajɔ ɓahamɓa ɓaɓujɛla ɛlifɛni laɓɔ ɓakʰa imiz̤i ɓaɬala kujɔ ɓɛmka apʰɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa ɛlɔwɔ waja ɛsiz̤wɛni sakɔwaɓɔ nasɛmz̤alwanɛni wakɔwaɓɔ ɓapʰuma kɛ apʰɔ waja ɛlɔwɔ ɛlifɛni lakʰɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa kwakunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ kwasirajɛli ɛlɔwɔ wɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓɔna kwakʰɛ kɛ kalɔku kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔkulawula kwaɓaɡ̤wɛɓi kwaɓakʰɔ inɮala ɛliz̤wɛni jahamɓa ind̤ɔd̤a jasɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm jakwajud̤a jaz̤a japʰamɓukɛla ɛliz̤wɛni lakwamɔwab̤i jɔna nɔmkajɔ nɔɔɲana ɓajɔ ɓɔɓaɓini kɛ iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤a lalinɡ̤uɛlimɛlɛki iɡ̤ama lɔmkajɔ linɡ̤unahɔmi amaɡ̤ama ɔɔɲana ɓajɔ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɔɔmalɔn nɔkilijɔn ɓɛnɡ̤amaɛfrata asɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm jakwajud̤a ɓaja kɛ ɛliz̤wɛni lakwamɔwab̤i ɓaɓa kʰɔna wafa uɛlimɛlɛki ind̤ɔd̤a kanahɔmi waʃijwa kɛ jɛna nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓɔɓaɓini ɓaz̤ɛka aɓafaz̤i aɓanɡ̤amamɔwab̤ikaz̤i iɡ̤ama lɔmɲɛ lalinɡ̤uɔrpa iɡ̤ama lɔmɲɛ lalinɡ̤urutɛ ɓaɬala kʰɔna imiɲaka ɛsɛʃumini ɓafa kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɓɔɓaɓini ɔɔmalɔn nɔkilijɔn waʃijwa kɛ lɔɔ mfaz̤i nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓɔɓaɓini najind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ wɛsuka jɛna nɔɔmɔlɔkaz̤ana ɓakʰɛ ɛɓuja ɛliz̤wɛni lakwamɔwab̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛv̤a ɛsɛliz̤wɛni lakwamɔwab̤i ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uɓav̤ɛlɛlɛ aɓantu ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓanika isɔnka wapʰuma kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ aɓɛkujɔ ɛnɔɔmɔlɔkaz̤ana ɓakʰɛ ɓɔɓaɓini wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɛɓujɛla ɛz̤wɛni lakwajud̤a watʰi unahɔmi kɔɔmɔlɔkaz̤ana ɓakʰɛ ɓɔɓaɓini hamɓani niɓujɛlɛ ɛlɔwɔ ɛnɮwini jɔnina ujɛhɔv̤a makanɛnz̤ɛlɛ iŋǀɛɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ kuɓafi ujɛhɔv̤a makaninikɛ nifumanɛ ind̤awɔ jɔkupʰumla ɛlɔwɔ ɛnɮwini jɛnd̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ waɓanɡ̤a ɓalipʰakamisa iliz̤wi laɓɔ ɓalila ɓatʰi kujɛ haji sija kuɓujɛla nawɛ kuɓantu ɓakɔwɛnu watʰi unahɔmi ɓujani z̤intɔmɓi z̤am kunɡ̤ani ukuɓa nihamɓɛ nd̤isɛnɔɔɲana jini ɛmɓilinini ukuz̤ɛ ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a ɓujani z̤intɔmɓi z̤am hamɓani nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sɛnd̤ikwalupʰalɛlɛ ukuɓa nɛnd̤ɔd̤a kʰɔna ukuɓa nd̤iɓɛ nd̤isitʰi nd̤isɛnɛtʰɛmɓa nɔkuɓa ɓɛnd̤itʰɛ nd̤aɓa nɡ̤ɔnɛnd̤ɔd̤a nɡ̤ɔɓu ɓusuku nɔkuɓa ɓɛnd̤itʰɛ nd̤az̤ala ɔɔɲana ɓɛnija kutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nilind̤ɛ ɓad̤ɛ ɓakʰulɛ jini ɓɛnija kutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ niz̤iɓamɓɛ ninɡ̤aɓi namad̤ɔd̤a jini haji z̤intɔmɓi z̤am nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kuk͡xak͡xa kunɛnɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnu kuɓa isanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a sipʰumɛlɛnɛ ɓalipʰakamisa iliz̤wi laɓɔ ɓaɓuja ɓalila uɔrpa wamanɡ̤a uninaz̤ala kɛ jɛna urutɛ wanamatʰɛla kujɛ watʰi jɛna ujaɓɔna umkʰuluwakaz̤i wakʰɔ uɓujɛlɛ kuɓantu ɓakɔwaɓɔ nakɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓakɔwaɓɔ ɓuja nawɛ uland̤ɛlɛ umkʰuluwakaz̤i wakʰɔ watʰi urutɛ musa akund̤iɓɔnɡ̤ɔz̤a nɡ̤ɔkutʰi mand̤ikuʃijɛ nd̤iɓujɛ nd̤inɡ̤akuland̤ɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa apʰɔ uja kʰɔna nd̤ija kuja apʰɔ uja kutʰi v̤u kʰɔna nd̤ija kutʰi v̤u kʰɔna aɓantu ɓakɔwɛnu ɓaja kuɓa nɡ̤aɓantu ɓam utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ aɓɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ apʰɔ ufɛla kʰɔna nd̤ija kufɛla kʰɔna nd̤iŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwɛ kʰɔna makɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a apʰind̤ɛ ukwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ kɔd̤wa ɔkuja kund̤aɬula nawɛ waɓɔna ukuɓa uz̤imisɛlɛ ukuhamɓa najɛ wajɛka ukutʰɛtʰa kujɛ ɓahamɓa kɛ ɓɔɓaɓini ɓad̤a ɓafika ɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm kwatʰi kǁa ɓanɡ̤ɛnajɔ ɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm waz̤amaz̤ama wɔnkɛ umz̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓɔ ɓatʰi nɡ̤unahɔmi lɔ watʰi kuɓɔ musani ukutʰi nd̤inɡ̤unahɔmi jitʰini nd̤inɡ̤umara nɡ̤ɔkuɓa usɔmanɮa und̤ɛnz̤ɛ nd̤ak͡xak͡xa kunɛnɛ nd̤ɛmka nd̤iz̤ɛlɛ kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a und̤iɓujisa nd̤ilamɓatʰa jini ukuɓa nitʰi nd̤inɡ̤unahɔmi ujɛhɔv̤a ɛŋ̤ǃ̤inilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nɡ̤am usɔmanɮa ɛnd̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ uɓuɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛ waɓuja kɛ unahɔmi ɛnɔrutɛ ummɔwab̤ikaz̤i umɔlɔkaz̤ana wakʰɛ ɔwaɓuja ɛliz̤wɛni lakwamɔwab̤i ɓafika ɓɔna ɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm ɛkukǃalɛkɛni kɔkuv̤unwa kwɛxasi kɛ kalɔku unahɔmi ɛɓɛnɛsiɬɔɓɔ sɛnd̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛsisitʲɛɓi ɛmz̤alwanɛni kaɛlimɛlɛki iɡ̤ama lajɔ liɓɛ linɡ̤ub̤ɔhaz̤i watʰi urutɛ ummɔwab̤ikaz̤i kunahɔmi makʰɛ nd̤ijɛ ɛnt͡simini nd̤ib̤ikikǀɛ iz̤ikʰwɛɓu ɛmv̤a kwalɔwɔ nd̤ija kuɓaɓalwa nɡ̤ujɛ watʰi kujɛ hamɓa ntɔmɓi jam wahamɓa waja wab̤ikikǀa ɛnt͡simini ɛmv̤a kwaɓav̤uni itʰamsaŋǃa lakʰɛ lawɛla pʰɛz̤u kwɛsaɬulɔ sɛnt͡simi kab̤ɔhaz̤i ɔɓɛnɡ̤ɔwɔmz̤alwanɛ kaɛlimɛlɛki watʰi ɡ̤ǃ̤i ub̤ɔhaz̤i ɛv̤ɛla ɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm watʰi kuɓav̤uni ujɛhɔv̤a makaɓɛ ɓatʰi kujɛ ujɛhɔv̤a makakusikɛlɛlɛ watʰi ub̤ɔhaz̤i kwind̤ɔd̤ana jakʰɛ ɛpʰɛtʰɛ aɓav̤uni jɛkaɓani lɛ nkaz̤ana japʰɛnd̤ula ind̤ɔd̤ana ɛpʰɛtʰɛ aɓav̤uni jatʰi jinkaz̤ana ɛnɡ̤ummɔwab̤ikaz̤i ɛfikɛ nɔnahɔmi ɓɛv̤ɛla ɛliz̤wɛni lakwamɔwab̤i jatʰi kɛ makʰɛ nd̤ib̤ikikǀɛ nd̤iɓutʰɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤itʰunɡ̤u ɛmv̤a kwaɓav̤uni jɛz̤a kɛ jɛma kwad̤a kwanɡ̤ɔku ukuɬala kwajɔ ɛnɮwini kukaŋǀinanɛ watʰi ub̤ɔhaz̤i kurutɛ ujɛv̤a ntɔmɓi jam musa ukuja kub̤ikikǀa nt͡simini jimɓi kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ uz̤ɛ unɡ̤aɮuli apʰa namatʰɛla wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ kumtʰind͡ʒ̤ana lɔ amɛɬɔ akʰɔ makaɓɛ sɛnt͡simini ɔjiv̤unajɔ wɔna uwuland̤ɛlɛ jaɓɔna aɓafana ɓakwam nd̤iɓawisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkuɓa ɓanɡ̤akukǀʰukumisi kǁa uŋǁaniwɛjɔ jija ɛz̤itʲɛni usɛlɛ intɔ ɛkʰiwɛ nɡ̤aɓafana wawa nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ wakǃuɓud̤a ɛm̤laɓɛni watʰi kujɛ kutʰɛni ukuɓa nd̤iɓaɓalwɛ nɡ̤uwɛ und̤iɓukɛ nd̤ijinkaz̤ana jɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛ wapʰɛnd̤ula ub̤ɔhaz̤i watʰi kujɛ nd̤ijikǁɛlɛlwɛ kakuɬɛ jɔnkɛ intɔ ɔjɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kuɲɔkɔz̤ala ɛmv̤a kɔkufa kwɛnd̤ɔd̤a jakʰɔ ukuɓa uʃijɛ ujiɬɔ nɔɲɔkɔ nɛliz̤wɛ ɔwaz̤alɛlwa kulɔ wɛz̤a ɛɓantwini ɔɓunɡ̤aɓaz̤i nɡ̤apʰamɓili ujɛhɔv̤a makakuɓujɛkɛz̤ɛ ukwɛnz̤a kwakʰɔ uz̤alisɛkɛ umv̤uz̤ɔ wakʰɔ ɔv̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɔz̤ɛ waz̤imɛla pʰant͡si kwamapʰikɔ akʰɛ wɛna watʰi jɛna mand̤iɓaɓalwɛ nɡ̤uwɛ nkɔsi jam nɡ̤ɔkuɓa und̤itʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰɛtʰɛ kakuɬɛ nɔmkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ nd̤inɡ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɲɛ waɓakʰɔnz̤az̤ana ɓakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ watʰi ub̤ɔhaz̤i kujɛ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkuɮa sɔnd̤ɛla apʰa uɮɛ isɔnka uŋǀind̤ɛ iv̤iniɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛkǃʰɛkɛz̤a lakʰɔ waɬala pʰant͡si nɡ̤asɛkǀalɛni laɓav̤uni wamnika ikʰwɛɓa waɮa waɬutʰa waʃija wɛsuka kɛ waja kub̤ikikǀa ub̤ɔhaz̤i waluwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ ulut͡ʃa ɔlulɔlwakʰɛ watʰi makab̤ikikǀɛ napʰakatʰi kwɛz̤itʰunɡ̤u ninɡ̤amd̤anisi nimxɔlɛlɛ nɔkumxɔlɛla iŋǁɛɲɛ ɛz̤itʰunɡ̤wini niʃijɛ ab̤ikikǀɛ ninɡ̤amkʰalimɛli wab̤ikikǀa ɛnt͡simini lɛjɔ kwad̤a kwaɬwa wajib̤ula intɔ aɓɛjib̤ikikǀilɛ janɡ̤a jiɛfa jɛxasi watʰwala waja ɛkʰaja wajiɓɔna uninaz̤ala intɔ ajib̤ikikǀilɛjɔ wakuxɔla aɓɛkuʃijilɛ akuɓa ɛɬutʰi watʰi uninaz̤ala kujɛ ub̤ikikǀɛ pʰi nam̤la uɓusɛɓɛnz̤a pʰi makasikɛlɛlwɛ ɔkuɓukilɛjɔ wɛna wamkǁɛlɛla uninaz̤ala aɓɛsɛɓɛnz̤a kujɛ watʰi iɡ̤ama lɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛnd̤isɛɓɛnz̤ɛ kujɔ nam̤la nɡ̤ub̤ɔhaz̤i watʰi unahɔmi kumɔlɔkaz̤ana wakʰɛ makasikɛlɛlwɛ jɛna nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɔnɡ̤ajɛkɛlɛlanɡ̤a ukwɛnz̤a iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɛ kwaɓapʰililɛjɔ nakwaɓafilɛjɔ watʰi unahɔmi kujɛ ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ ijalamana natʰi inɡ̤ɔwaɓakʰululi ɓɛtʰu watʰi urutɛ ummɔwab̤ikaz̤i kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ itʰɛ jɔna uz̤ɛ unamatʰɛlɛ kulut͡ʃa ɔlulɔlwam lud̤ɛ luluɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ lɔnkɛ uv̤unɔ ɔlulɔlwam watʰi unahɔmi kurutɛ umɔlɔkaz̤ana wakʰɛ kulunɡ̤ilɛ ntɔmɓi jam ukuɓa upʰumɛ nɔmtʰind͡ʒ̤ana wakʰɛ ukuz̤ɛ unɡ̤afikɛlwa ukwɛɲɛ int͡simi wanamatʰɛla kumtʰind͡ʒ̤ana kab̤ɔhaz̤i wab̤ikikǀa kwad̤a kwaɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwa ukuv̤unwa kwɛxasi nɔkuv̤unwa kwɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa waɬala nɔninaz̤ala watʰi unahɔmi uninaz̤ala kujɛ ntɔmɓi jam nd̤inɡ̤akufunɛli ukupʰumla ɔkɔkulunɡ̤ɛla kalɔku akasiɬɔɓɔ sɛtʰu ub̤ɔhaz̤i lɔwɔ umtʰind͡ʒ̤ana uɓunawɔ nankɔ ɛsɛla ixasi nɡ̤ɔɓu ɓusuku ɛsand̤ɛni z̤iɬamɓɛ utʰamɓisɛ uŋǁiɓɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɔ uɬɛ ujɛ ɛsand̤ɛni uz̤ɛ unɡ̤az̤az̤isi ɛnd̤ɔd̤ɛni lɛjɔ id̤ɛ iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ ukuɮa nɔkusɛla wɔtʰi kwajɔ pʰant͡si ukǃɔnd̤ɛ ind̤awɔ ɛjɛ kujɔ ujɛ ujitʰʲilɛ inɡ̤uɓɔ nɡ̤asɛz̤iɲawɛni z̤ajɔ ulalɛ pʰant͡si jɔkukǁɛlɛla kɛ jɔna intɔ ɔwɔjɛnz̤a watʰi kujɛ jɔnkɛ intɔ ɔjitʰɛtʰajɔ nd̤ɔjɛnz̤a wɛɬa kɛ waja ɛsand̤ɛni wɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ aɓɛmwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ uninaz̤ala waɮa ub̤ɔhaz̤i wasɛla jakǀʰwajitʰa intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ waja pʰant͡si ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛntlaɓa waja kɛ ɛkǀɔtʰa wamtʰʲila inɡ̤uɓɔ nɡ̤asɛz̤iɲawɛni z̤akʰɛ pʰant͡si kwatʰi pʰakatʰi kɔɓusuku jɔtʰuka ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ jaɡ̤ukǃuka jaɓɔna kulɛlɛ inkaz̤ana nɡ̤asɛz̤iɲawɛni z̤ajɔ jatʰi unɡ̤uɓani watʰi nd̤inɡ̤urutɛ umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ twaɓulula isɔnd̤ɔ lɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔmkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɡ̤umkʰululi wɛna jatʰi usikɛlɛlwɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ntɔmɓi jam iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɔ jamv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛ inɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛjɔkukǃala unɡ̤aland̤ɛlanɡ̤a mad̤ɔd̤ana nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nɔkuɓa nɡ̤aswɛlɛjɔ nɔkuɓa nɡ̤anɔɓutʲɛɓi kalɔku kɛ ntɔmɓi jam ukɔjika kɔnkɛ ɔkutʰɛtʰilɛjɔ nd̤ɔkwɛnz̤ɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓɔmz̤i wakɔwɛtʰu ɓajaz̤i ukuɓa ujinkaz̤ana ɛnɛsid̤ima ɛwɛ kujinɛnɛ nd̤inɡ̤umkʰululi iɲanisɔ kɛ kukʰɔ umkʰululi ɔsɔnd̤ɛlɛjɔ kuwɛ lala nɡ̤ɔɓu ɓusuku kɔtʰi ukuɓa utʰɛ wakukʰulula nɡ̤ɛntlawulɛlɔ kulunɡ̤ɛ makakukʰululɛ nɡ̤ɛntlawulɛlɔ kɛ ukuɓa akatʰanɡ̤a akunanz̤ɛ ukukukʰulula nɡ̤ɛntlawulɛlɔ nd̤ɔkukʰulula nɡ̤ɛntlawulɛlɔ ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a lala kud̤ɛ kusɛ walala kɛ nɡ̤asɛz̤iɲawɛni z̤akʰɛ kwad̤a wav̤uka ɓɛnɡ̤ɛkanakanani aɓantu jatʰi makunɡ̤az̤iwa ukuɓa ɓɛkuz̤ɛ inkaz̤ana ɛsand̤ɛni jatʰi ɛtʰɛ inɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɔ jɔkwalɛka ukʰɔnɡ̤ɔz̤ɛlɛ wakʰɔnɡ̤ɔz̤ɛla kɛ nɡ̤ajɔ jalinɡ̤anisa iz̤ilinɡ̤anisɔ z̤ɛxasi ɛz̤itʰand̤atʰu jamtʰwalisa waɡ̤ɔd̤uka waja kuninaz̤ala watʰi jɛna utʰɛni ntɔmɓi jam wamkǁɛlɛla kɔnkɛ ɛmɛnz̤ɛlɛ kʰɔna ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ watʰi ind̤inikɛ ɛz̤i z̤ilinɡ̤anisɔ z̤ɛxasi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jajisitʰi musa ukuja kuɲɔkɔz̤ala ulamɓatʰa watʰi ɬala ntɔmɓi jam ud̤ɛ waz̤i ɔkuja kuɬa kuɓa ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ ajiji kupʰumla inɡ̤akupʰɛlisanɡ̤a ɔku nam̤la kɛ kalɔku wɛɲuka ub̤ɔhaz̤i waja ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔmz̤i waɬala kʰɔna nankɔ ɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa umkʰululi lɔwa aɓɛtʰɛtʰa jɛna ub̤ɔhaz̤i watʰi wa nant͡si kʰawupʰamɓukɛlɛ apʰa uɬalɛ pʰant͡si wapʰamɓuka waɬala watʰaɓatʰa iʃumi lamad̤ɔd̤a kumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ɔmz̤i watʰi ɬalani apʰa aɬala kɛ watʰi kumkʰululi lɔwɔ isaɬulɔ sɔm̤laɓa ɔɓunɡ̤ɔwɔmz̤alwana wɛtʰu uɛlimɛlɛki utʰɛnɡ̤isɛ nɡ̤asɔ unahɔmi ɔɓujɛ ɛliz̤wɛni lakwamɔwab̤i nd̤atʰi kɛ mand̤iv̤ulɛ inɮɛɓɛ jakʰɔ nd̤itʰi wutʰɛnɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤apʰamɓi kwaɓa ɓaɬɛlijɔ apʰa pʰamɓi kwamad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu aɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu ukuɓa ujawukʰulula nɡ̤ɛntlawulɛlɔ wukʰululɛ nɡ̤ɛntlawulɛlɔ ukuɓa akuwukʰululi nɡ̤ɛntlawulɛlɔ nd̤ikǁɛlɛlɛ nd̤az̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akukʰɔ ɓani unɔkuwukʰulula nɡ̤ɛntlawulɛlɔ inɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uwɛ nd̤isɛmv̤a kwakʰɔ watʰi nd̤ɔwukʰulula nɡ̤ɛntlawulɛlɔ watʰi ub̤ɔhaz̤i m̤lɛnikwɛni uwuz̤uz̤ajɔ um̤laɓa ɛsanɮɛni sikanahɔmi uwuz̤uz̤a nakurutɛ ummɔwab̤ikaz̤i ukuɓa uv̤usɛ iɡ̤ama lɔmfi ɛlifɛni lakʰɛ watʰi umkʰululi lɔwɔ and̤inakuz̤ikʰululɛla nɡ̤ɛntlawulɛlɔ nɡ̤ɔkwam ɬɛz̤ɛ nd̤ilɔnakalisɛ ɛlam z̤ikʰululɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛntlawulɛlɔ isilunɡ̤a ɛsɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa and̤inakɔ ukuwukʰulula nɡ̤ɛntlawulɛlɔ kɛ kalɔku kwakusitʰiwa kud̤ala kwasirajɛli ukukʰulula nɡ̤ɛntlawulɛlɔ nɔkwanana ukuz̤ɛ jɔnkɛ intɔ iɓɛ ikǃinisɛlwɛ uɓani aɲɔtʰulɛ imɓad̤ad̤a jakʰɛ ajinikɛ ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ ɔkɔ kwajɛ kuɓuɓuŋ̤ǃ̤ina kwasirajɛli watʰi umkʰululi lɔwɔ kub̤ɔhaz̤i z̤itʰɛnɡ̤ɛlɛ waɲɔtʰula imɓad̤ad̤a jakʰɛ watʰi kɛ ub̤ɔhaz̤i kumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu nakuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ninɡ̤amaŋ̤ǃ̤ina nam̤la ukuɓa nd̤ikutʰɛnɡ̤ilɛ kɔnkɛ ɔkukaɛlimɛlɛki nakɔ kɔnkɛ ɔkukakilijɔn nɔmalɔn ɛsanɮɛni sikanahɔmi nɔrutɛ ummɔwab̤ikaz̤i umkamalɔn nd̤imz̤uz̤ilɛ ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤umkam ukuz̤ɛ kuv̤uswɛ iɡ̤ama lɔmfi ɛlifɛni lakʰɛ linɡ̤aŋǃaɲulwa iɡ̤ama lɔmfi ɛɓaz̤alwanɛni ɓakʰɛ nasɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɛnd̤awɔ jakʰɛ ninɡ̤amaŋ̤ǃ̤ina nam̤la ɓatʰi ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓasɛsanɡ̤wɛni namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu sinɡ̤amaŋ̤ǃ̤ina ujɛhɔv̤a makamɛnz̤ɛ lɔ mfaz̤i unɡ̤ɛnajɔ ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ aɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔrakɛli nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔlɛja aɓajakʰajɔ inɮu kasirajɛli ɓɔɓaɓini av̤ɛlisɛ amanɮa ɛɛfrata akwɛnz̤ɛlɛ ud̤umɔ ɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm inɮu jakʰɔ iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɮu kapɛrɛt͡sɛ awamz̤alajɔ utamarɛ kujud̤a nɡ̤ɛmɓɛwu lɛjɔ aja ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤alɛ ntɔmɓaz̤ana ub̤ɔhaz̤i wamz̤ɛka kɛ urutɛ waɓa nɡ̤umkakʰɛ wamnɡ̤ɛna waz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a ukuz̤ala waz̤ala uɲana ɓatʰi aɓafaz̤i kunahɔmi makaɓɔnɡ̤wɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔnɡ̤akujɛkɛlanɡ̤a uswɛlɛ umkʰululi nam̤la iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ maliv̤akalɛ kwasirajɛli aɓɛ nɡ̤umɓujisi wɔmpʰɛfumlɔ kuwɛ nɔmŋǃaki wɛz̤imv̤i z̤akʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umɔlɔkaz̤ana wakʰɔ ɔkutʰand̤ajɔ lɔwɔ ulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kuwɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔɔɲana aɓasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ umz̤ɛlɛ unahɔmi wamtʰaɓatʰa lɔwɔ wamɓɛka ɛsifuɓɛni sakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤umɔnɮi wakʰɛ lwamtʰija iɡ̤ama ummɛlwanɛkaz̤i lwatʰi unahɔmi uz̤alɛlwɛ uɲana lwatʰi iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ nɡ̤uɔb̤ɛd̤i jɛna nɡ̤ujisɛ kajɛsɛ ujisɛ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ jijɔ lɛ kɛ inz̤ala kapɛrɛt͡sɛ upɛrɛt͡sɛ waz̤ala uhɛt͡sɛrɔn uhɛt͡sɛrɔn waz̤ala uram uram waz̤ala uaminad̤ab̤i uaminad̤ab̤i waz̤ala unaʃɔn unaʃɔn waz̤ala usalɛmɔn usalɛmɔn waz̤ala ub̤ɔhaz̤i ub̤ɔhaz̤i waz̤ala uɔb̤ɛd̤i uɔb̤ɛd̤i waz̤ala ujɛsɛ ujɛsɛ waz̤ala ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kɛ kalɔku kwakukʰɔ nd̤ɔd̤a itʰilɛ jasɛrama umt͡sɔfi jakwɛlɛɛntaɓa lakwaɛfrajim ɛɡ̤ama ɓɛlinɡ̤uɛlikana uɲana kajɛrɔham uɲana kaɛlihu uɲana katɔhu uɲana kat͡sufi wakwaɛfrajim jajinaɓafaz̤i aɓaɓini iɡ̤ama lɔmɲɛ lalinɡ̤uhana iɡ̤ama lɔwɛsiɓini linɡ̤upɛnina upɛnina kɛ wajɛnaɓantwana uhana jɛna ɛnɡ̤ɛnaɓantwana ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ iɓiɲuka iv̤ɛla ɛmz̤ini wajɔ imiɲaka nɡ̤ɛmiɲaka ijɛ kuŋǃula iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ɛʃilɔ ɓaɓɛkʰɔna kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛli aɓaɓini ɔɔhɔfɛni nɔpinɛhasi aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓakajɛhɔv̤a kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛmini awaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla nɡ̤ajɔ uɛlikana upɛnina umkakʰɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ iz̤aɓɛlɔ kɛ uhana isaɓɛlɔ saɓantu aɓaɓini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛmtʰand̤a uhana kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɓɛsiv̤alilɛ isiz̤alɔ sakʰɛ waz̤a umkʰwɛlɛtɛli wakʰɛ ɛmkǀʰunuɓa ukuz̤ɛ ad̤ɛ akǀunukɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɓɛsiv̤alilɛ isiz̤alɔ sakʰɛ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ uɛlikana imiɲaka nɡ̤ɛmiɲaka kǁa wɛɲukajɔ ukuja ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ upɛnina ukumkǃumɓisa uhana akaɮa watʰi uɛlikana umjɛni wakʰɛ kujɛ hana ulilɛlani jini ukuɓa unɡ̤aɮi jini ukuɓa iɓɛ mɓi intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ and̤ilunɡ̤ilɛ kuwɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔɔɲana aɓaliʃumi wɛsuka uhana ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa ɓɛɮilɛ ɛʃilɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa ɓɛsɛlɛ kɛ kalɔku uɛli umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wajɛlɛli ɛsilalwɛni nɡ̤asɛmɡ̤uɓasini wɛb̤ɔtwɛ likajɛhɔv̤a wawuk͡xak͡xa umpʰɛfumlɔ kahana watʰand̤az̤a kujɛhɔv̤a wasit͡ʃɔ isililɔ wab̤amɓatʰisa nɡ̤ɛsib̤amɓatʰisɔ watʰi jɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukuɓa utʰɛ waz̤ikʰanɡ̤ɛla ukuz̤ikʰanɡ̤ɛla ɔku iint͡siz̤i z̤ɔmkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ wand̤ikʰumɓula akwamliɓala umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ ɔjind̤ɔd̤a nd̤ɔmnika ujɛhɔv̤a jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɔɓɔmi ɓakʰɛ isit͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ sɔkukǀʰɛɓa asiji kusɔnd̤ɛz̤wa ɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɛ kwatʰi ɛkutʰand̤az̤ɛni kwakʰɛ uz̤unɡ̤u pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a uɛli wawuɡ̤ǃ̤ala umlɔmɔ wakʰɛ kɛ jɛna uhana wajɛtʰɛtʰɛla ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɛ kuɓɛɓɛz̤ɛla imilɛɓɛ jɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɛ jɔd̤wa iliz̤wi lakʰɛ linɡ̤av̤akali uɛli waɓa ujaŋǁila watʰi uɛli kujɛ kɔd̤a kuɓɛ uŋǁila jisusɛ iwajini jakʰɔ kuwɛ wapʰɛnd̤ula uhana watʰi haji nkɔsi jam nd̤inɡ̤umfaz̤i ɔmɔja unɔɓunz̤ima and̤isɛlanɡ̤a wajini nasisɛlɔ siŋǁilisajɔ nd̤ipʰalaz̤a umpʰɛfumlɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a musa ukumɓalɛla umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ ɛkutʰini jintɔmɓi jɛt͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unanɡ̤ɔku nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuninz̤i ɓɔkukʰalaz̤a nɔkukǃund͡ʒ̤iswa wapʰɛnd̤ula uɛli watʰi hamɓa unɔkǁɔlɔ utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli makakunikɛ isikǀɛlɔ sakʰɔ ɔsikǀɛlilɛjɔ kujɛ watʰi kɛ jɛna umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ lɔ makaɓaɓalwɛ nɡ̤uwɛ wahamɓa inɮɛla jakʰɛ umfaz̤i lɔwɔ waɮa aɓaɓa samat͡ʃa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ ɓav̤uka nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ ɓakǃuɓud̤a pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɓaɓuja ɓanɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini jaɓɔ ɛrama uɛlikana wamaz̤i uhana umkakʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wamkʰumɓula kwatʰi ukufɛz̤ɛka kwɛmila wamitʰa uhana waz̤ala uɲana wamtʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤usamuwɛli ɛsitʰi kunɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤amkǀɛlajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a jɛɲuka ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ inɡ̤uɛlikana nɛnɮu jajɔ jɔnkɛ ukuɓa iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɔmɲaka inɛsib̤amɓatʰisɔ sajɔ kɛ jɛna uhana akaɲukanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa watʰi kwind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ kɔkʰa kuluɲulwɛ nd̤and̤ulɛ kɛ ukumz̤isa aɓɔnakalɛ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a alalɛ kʰɔna kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni watʰi uɛlikana ind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ kujɛ jɛnz̤a ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛlwɛni akʰɔ ud̤ɛ umlumlɛ kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a makalimisɛ iliz̤wi lakʰɛ walala kɛ umfaz̤i waɲisa uɲana wakʰɛ wad̤a wɛɲuka najɛ akuɓa ɛmlumlɛ ɛnɛɛnkunz̤i ɛz̤intatʰu ɛz̤int͡ʃa nɛɛfa jɔmɡ̤uɓɔ nɛnt͡suɓa jɛwajini ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɛʃilɔ lɔwɔ ɛsɛmŋǀinanɛ ɓajikǁʰɛla inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa ɓamsa kuɛli watʰi kǀamaɡ̤u nkɔsi jam ulɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ nkɔsi jam nd̤inɡ̤ulaa mfaz̤i wajɛmi kuwɛ apʰa ɛtʰand̤az̤a kujɛhɔv̤a nd̤and̤itʰand̤az̤ɛla lɔ und̤inikilɛ kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a isikǀɛlɔ ɛnd̤and̤isikǀɛla kujɛ nd̤ija kumɛnz̤a ɔkǀɛliwɛjɔ kujɛhɔv̤a jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɔkuɓakʰɔ kwakʰɛ wɔɓa nɡ̤ɔkǀɛliwɛjɔ kujɛhɔv̤a wamŋǃula kʰɔna ujɛhɔv̤a watʰand̤az̤a uhana watʰi intliz̤ijɔ jam iɮamkilɛ nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a upʰɔnd̤ɔ lupʰakaɲisiwɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a uv̤ulɛkilɛ umlɔmɔ kakʰulu nɡ̤az̤ɔ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤am nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iv̤ujɛlɛ usind̤isɔ lwakʰɔ akukʰɔ ujiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akukʰɔ namɲɛ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwakʰɔ akukʰɔ lind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu musani ukukwand̤isa ukutʰɛtʰa iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰakamilɛjɔ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰakamilɛjɔ kunɡ̤apʰumi ntɛtʰɔ jakuɬakanipʰa ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛnu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ɔwaz̤i kɔnkɛ jɛna nɡ̤umlinɡ̤anisi wɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ ɛz̤ijiŋǀamisa iz̤apʰɛtʰa z̤amaɡ̤ɔxa z̤apʰukilɛ aɓakʰuɓɛki ɓab̤iŋǃiswɛ amanɮa aɓaɬutʰijɔ ɓaz̤ikǃɛʃisɛla isɔnka aɓalamɓilɛjɔ ɓaz̤a kupʰɛla ukulamɓa ad̤ɛ nɔnɡ̤az̤alijɔ az̤alɛ isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɔnaɓantwana aɓaninz̤i ant͡ʃwɛɲɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ujaɓulala aɮisɛ uɓɔmi uɬisɛla kwɛlaɓafilɛjɔ aɓujɛ aɲusɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ujaɬwɛmpuz̤a atʲɛɓisɛ utʰɔɓa aɓujɛ apʰakamisɛ uv̤usa ɛlutʰulini aɓaswɛlɛjɔ apʰakamisɛ amaɬwɛmpu ɛz̤alɛni ukuɓa awaɬalisɛ namanɛnɛ uwaɓɛla ɛlisiɬalɔ sɔz̤ukɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa z̤ɛz̤ikajɛhɔv̤a iint͡sika z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi walimisa pʰɛz̤u kwaz̤ɔ ɛlimiwɛjɔ iiɲawɔ z̤aɓakʰɛ ɓɛŋǀɛɓa uja kuz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤ina aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɓad̤akɛ ɛɓumɲamɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ind̤ɔd̤a ajɛjisi nɡ̤amanɮa ujɛhɔv̤a jɛnaɓaja kukǃʰipʰuka umɓilini aɓaɓamɓana najɛ uja kud̤ud̤umisa pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ɛmaz̤ulwini ujɛhɔv̤a uja kuz̤iɡ̤wɛɓa iz̤ipʰɛlɔ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi amnikɛ wakʰɛ amanɮa alupʰakamisɛ upʰɔnd̤ɔ lɔmtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa wakʰɛ wɛsuka uɛlikana waja ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ kɛ ɛɓɛlunɡ̤isɛlɛla kujɛhɔv̤a pʰamɓi kukaɛli umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kɛ kalɔku ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛli ɓaɓɛnɡ̤amat͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔ ɓɛnɡ̤amaz̤i ujɛhɔv̤a kwanɛsilunɡ̤a saɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛsipʰuma ɛɓantwini akuɓɔn ukuɓa uɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ kwaz̤a kwɛz̤a wakwamɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kǁa ipʰɛkiwɛjɔ iɲama ɛnɛfɔlɔkʰwɛ ɛmaz̤iɲɔ matʰatʰu ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ waɬaɓa nɔkuɓa kusɛlukʰamɓɛni nɔkuɓa kusɛkɛtilɛni nɔkuɓa kukuŋ̤ǁ̤awu nɔkuɓa kusɛmɓiz̤ɛni iɓisitʰi jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛpʰumɛ nɛfɔlɔkʰwɛ az̤itʰaɓatʰɛlɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kwanɡ̤ajɔ ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kumasirajɛli ɔnkɛ aɓɛsiz̤a ɛʃilɔ apʰɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ kunɡ̤ɛkakǃʰuɲisɛlwa nɡ̤amaŋǃatʰa uɓɛsitʰi wakwamɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛz̤ɛ ɔɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlajɔ atʰi ɛtʰɛ iɲama jɔsɛlwɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kuɓa akaji kwamkɛla ɲama ipʰɛkiwɛjɔ kuwɛ majiɓɛ jɛk͡xwad̤a atʰi lɔwɔ akutʰi kujɛ kuja kukǃʰuɲisɛlwa inɛnɛ nɡ̤amaŋǃatʰa kwanɡ̤ɔku wand̤ulɛ kɛ uz̤itʰaɓatʰɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ uŋǃwɛnɛla nɡ̤akɔ atʰi jɛna haji nd̤inikɛ nɡ̤ɔku ukuɓa akund̤iniki nd̤ɔjitʰaɓatʰa nɡ̤amanɮa saɓa sikʰulu kunɛnɛ isɔnɔ samad̤ɔd̤ana pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓantu ɓawud̤ɛla umnikɛlɔ kajɛhɔv̤a wajɛ usamuwɛli ɛlunɡ̤isɛlɛla pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɛjinkwɛnkwɛ ɛb̤iŋǃɛ iɛfɔd̤i jɛlinɛn ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ unina uɓɛmɛnz̤ɛla inɡ̤uɓɔ jɔkwalɛka aɲukɛ najɔ ajisɛ kujɛ imiɲaka nɡ̤ɛmiɲaka ɛkuɲukɛni kwakʰɛ nɛnd̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ ukuz̤a kuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɔmɲaka uɛli wamsikɛlɛla uɛlikana nɔmkakʰɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a makakunikɛ imɓɛwu nɡ̤alɔ mfaz̤i ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɔkǀɛliwɛjɔ ɔwakǀɛlwa kujɛhɔv̤a ɓahamɓa ɓaɡ̤ɔd̤uka ujɛhɔv̤a wamv̤ɛlɛla uhana wamitʰa waz̤ala ɔɔɲana aɓatʰatʰu nɛɛntɔmɓi ɛz̤imɓini jakʰula inkwɛnkwɛ ɛnɡ̤usamuwɛli ikujɛhɔv̤a kɛ kalɔku uɛli uɓɛsɛlɛmd̤ala kakʰulu wajiv̤a jɔnkɛ intɔ aɓaɓɛjɛnz̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ kumasirajɛli ɔnkɛ kwanɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛlala naɓafaz̤i aɓaɓɛkʰɔnz̤a ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛntɛntɛ jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana watʰi kuɓɔ jini ukuɓa nɛnz̤ɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤i kuɓa iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɛnu ɛz̤iɓi nd̤iz̤iv̤a nɡ̤aɓa ɓantu ɓɔnkɛ haji ɲana ɓam nɡ̤ɔkuɓa asilud̤aɓa luɬɛ ɔlu nd̤iluv̤ajɔ niɓanɡ̤a ukuɓa aɓantu ɓakajɛhɔv̤a ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤itʰisɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ wɔna utʰikǁɔ ujamlamlɛla kɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ wɔna kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kumlamlɛla aɓalipʰulapʰula iz̤wi likajisɛ kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uɓɛfuna ukuɓaɓulala kɛ inkwɛnkwɛ usamuwɛli jaja ikʰula nɡ̤ɔkukʰula itʰand̤ɛka kujɛhɔv̤a nakuɓantu kwɛz̤a katʰikǁɔ kuɛli watʰi kujɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi kanɛnɛ nd̤az̤itʰʲila kwinɮu kajiɬɔ ɓɛsɛjiputa ɛnɮwini kafarɔ nd̤amɲula ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwasirajɛli ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɲukɛ ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni akǃʰumisɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤ikǃʰumisɔ aŋǁiɓɛ iɛfɔd̤i pʰamɓi nd̤ajinika jɔnkɛ inɮu kajiɬɔ kɔnkɛ ukuɮa kwasɛmlilwɛni kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli jini kɛ ukuɓa niwuɲatʰɛlɛlɛ pʰant͡si umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa ɛnd̤iwisɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤awɔ ɛkʰajɛni usukɛ uɓaz̤ukisɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u ukuz̤ɛ niz̤itʲɛɓisɛ nɡ̤ɛlɔna ŋǃatʰa lɛminikɛlɔ jɔnkɛ jamasirajɛli aɓantu ɓam nɡ̤ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi nd̤at͡ʃɔ ɔkunɛnɛ ukutʰi inɮu jakʰɔ nɛnɮu kajiɬɔ jɔhamɓa pʰamɓi kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni kunɡ̤ɔku ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɔkɔ makuɓɛ lɛɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔnd̤iz̤ukisajɔ nd̤ija kumz̤ukisa aɓand̤id̤ɛlajɔ ɓakǀukukǀɛz̤wɛ jaɓɔna imiɬa ijɛz̤a ɛnd̤ija kujiŋǃumla inɡ̤alɔ jakʰɔ nɛnɡ̤alɔ jɛnɮu kajiɬɔ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ nɡ̤wɛv̤u ɛnɮwini kajiɬɔ ukuɓɔnɛ ukuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwa kwɛkʰaja ɛz̤intwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ utʰikǁɔ aja kuwɛnz̤ɛla ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤az̤ɔ amasirajɛli kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ nɡ̤wɛv̤u ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ imiɬa jɔnkɛ kɛ and̤iji kuŋǃumla wɔnkɛ wakwakʰɔ ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni ukuz̤ɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɔ apʰɛlɛ nɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ utʰɛ kufɛ kunɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a kɔnkɛ ukwand̤a kwɛnɮu jakʰɔ nɡ̤uwɔ lɔ umkǃɔnd̤isɔ kuwɛ ɔja kuɓafikɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ ɓɔɓaɓini uhɔfɛni nɔpinɛhasi ɓaja ɓɔɓaɓini nɡ̤am̤la mɲɛ nd̤ija kuz̤iv̤ɛlisɛla umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔtʰɛmɓɛkilɛjɔ ɔja kwɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kusɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam nasɛmpʰɛfumlwɛni nd̤imakʰɛlɛ inɮu ɛkǃinilɛjɔ ahamɓɛ pʰamɓi kɔmtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa jɔnkɛ imiɬa kɔtʰi lɔwɔ usɛlɛjɔ ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ ɛz̤ɛ az̤iɡ̤ɔɓɛ kujɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛkǃʰɔʃa lɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛsunt͡swana lɛsɔnka atʰi kʰawund̤ifakɛ kɔmɲɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɔɓuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ukuz̤ɛ nd̤iɮɛ ikǃʰɛkɛz̤a lɛsɔnka kɛ kalɔku usamuwɛli wajɛlunɡ̤isɛlɛla kujɛhɔv̤a pʰamɓi kɔɛli iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a laliswɛlɛkilɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa kwakunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ mɓɔnɔ utʰʲilɛkilɛjɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤alɔɔ m̤la ɛlɛlɛ uɛli ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɛ ɛkǃalɛ ukuɓa nɔxatʲaz̤ɔ ukuɓa anɡ̤aɓi nakuɓɔna sinɡ̤ɛkakǀiɲwa isiɓanɛ sikatʰikǁɔ usamuwɛli ɛlɛlɛ ɛb̤ɔtwɛni likajɛhɔv̤a apʰɔ iɓikʰɔna itʲɛja katʰikǁɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wamɓiz̤a usamuwɛli watʰi jɛna nd̤ilapʰa waɓalɛkɛla kuɛli watʰi nd̤ilapʰa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa und̤iɓiz̤ilɛ watʰi jɛna and̤ikuɓiz̤anɡ̤a ɓuja ujɛ waja wakǃɔkɛla ujɛhɔv̤a wamɓiz̤a usamuwɛli wav̤uka usamuwɛli waja kuɛli watʰi nd̤ilapʰa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa und̤iɓiz̤ilɛ watʰi jɛna and̤ikuɓiz̤anɡ̤a ɲana ɓuja ujɛ kɛ usamuwɛli ɛɓɛnɡ̤ɛkamaz̤i ujɛhɔv̤a liɓɛ linɡ̤ɛkatʰʲilɛki kujɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a wakǃɔkɛla ujɛhɔv̤a wamɓiz̤a usamuwɛli ɔkwɛsitʰatʰu wav̤uka wɛz̤a kuɛli watʰi kujɛ nd̤ilapʰa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa und̤iɓiz̤ilɛ wakǃɔnd̤a uɛli ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a umɓiz̤ilɛ watʰi uɛli kusamuwɛli hamɓa ujɛ kɔtʰi ukuɓa utʰɛ wakuɓiz̤a utʰi tʰɛtʰa jɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛsiv̤a umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ waja usamuwɛli ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ wɛz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a wɛma waɓiz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤iɬanɮɔ watʰi samuwɛli samuwɛli watʰi usamuwɛli tʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛsiv̤a umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kusamuwɛli ujaɓɔna nd̤ɛnz̤a intɔ kwasirajɛli ɛja kuɓɛtʰa z̤itʰi nz̤wi iinɮɛɓɛ z̤ɔmɓini z̤aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓaja kujiv̤a nɡ̤alɔɔ nd̤ijakumv̤ɛlisɛla uɛli jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛnd̤ijitʰɛtʰilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kwinɮu jakʰɛ nd̤ikǃalilɛ nd̤ija kuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa nd̤imkǁɛlɛlɛ ukuɓa nd̤ijajiɡ̤wɛɓa inɮu jakʰɛ kud̤ɛkusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa aɓaz̤ijɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaz̤ikǃalɛkisa ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ akaɓaŋ̤ǁ̤ɔlisa nɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤ijifunɡ̤ɛlɛ inɮu kaɛli nd̤atʰi inɛnɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛnɮu kaɛli aɓuji kukǀaɲaɡ̤uʃɛlwa nɡ̤amɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nanɡ̤amnikɛlɔ wakuɮa napʰakad̤ɛ walala usamuwɛli kwad̤a waz̤iv̤ula kɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤ɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a usamuwɛli wɔjika ukumkǁɛlɛla uɛli umɓɔnɔ lɔwɔ uɛli wamɓiz̤a usamuwɛli watʰi samuwɛli ɲana watʰi jɛna nd̤ilapʰa watʰi lijintɔni iliz̤wi ɛlɔ alitʰɛtʰilɛjɔ kuwɛ musa ukukʰa und̤ifiɬɛlɛ makɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ utʰikǁɔ kuwɛ akǃɔkɛlɛ ukwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ wand̤ifiɬɛla liz̤wi ɛmaz̤wini ɔnkɛ awatʰɛtʰilɛjɔ kuwɛ usamuwɛli wamkǁɛlɛla amaz̤wi ɔnkɛ akamfiɬɛla ntɔ watʰi kɛ jɛna nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a makɛnz̤ɛ ɔkɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ wakʰula usamuwɛli ujɛhɔv̤a waɓa najɛ pʰant͡si naliɲɛ iliz̤wi ɛmaz̤wini akʰɛ ɔnkɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli ɛtʰaɓatʰɛlɛ kwad̤an ɛsa ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a az̤i ukuɓa usamuwɛli nɡ̤umprɔfɛti ɔtʰɛmɓɛkilɛjɔ kajɛhɔv̤a wakǃɔkɛla ujɛhɔv̤a waɓɔnakala ɛʃilɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a waz̤itʰʲila kusamuwɛli ɛʃilɔ nɡ̤ɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a iliz̤wi likasamuwɛli laja kumasirajɛli ɔnkɛ apʰuma amasirajɛli ɛja kuwaɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a amafilisti alwɛ nawɔ iintɛntɛ nɡ̤asɛɛb̤ɛnɛz̤ɛrɛ amafilisti ɛafɛki az̤a amafilisti akʰa uluɬu lɔkulwa namasirajɛli id̤aɓi lanwɛnwɛz̤ɛla aɓulawa amasirajɛli pʰamɓi kwamafilisti kwaɓulawa ɛluɬwini ɛtʰafɛni apʰɔ amad̤ɔd̤a amanɛ ɓɛz̤a aɓantu ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni atʰi amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwasirajɛli jini ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a asiɓulalɛ nam̤la pʰamɓi kwamafilisti masijɛ kutʰaɓatʰa itʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɛʃilɔ iɓɛ kutʰi iz̤ɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu isisind̤isɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤ɛtʰu ɓatʰumɛla kɛ aɓantu ɛʃilɔ ɓajitʰaɓatʰa kʰɔna itʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ kajɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ɔɬɛli pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛkɛrub̤i ɓaɓɛkʰɔna ɓɔɓaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛli uhɔfɛni nɔpinɛhasi ɓɛnɛtʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ katʰikǁɔ kwatʰi kǁa ifikajɔ itʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni ad̤uma kakʰulu ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli um̤laɓa watʰi nd̤i asiv̤a amafilisti isand̤i sɔkud̤uma kwawɔ atʰi sɛsani ɛsi sand̤i sɔkud̤uma kunɡ̤aka ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni jamahɛb̤ɛrɛ az̤i kɛ ukuɓa itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a ifikilɛ ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni ɔjika amafilisti kuɓa ɛɓɛsitʰi utʰikǁɔ ufikilɛ ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni atʰi jɛha kɛ tʰina nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akuz̤anɡ̤a kuɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nɡ̤apʰamɓili jɛha kɛ tʰina nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kusiɬanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni saɓa tʰikǁɔ ɓaɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa ɓunɡ̤aka nɡ̤aɓa tʰikǁɔ aɓa ɓaɓulala amajiputa nɡ̤ɛz̤iɓɛtʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jɔmɛlɛlani niɓɛ nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a mafilisti ɬɛz̤ɛ nikʰɔnz̤ɛ kumahɛb̤ɛrɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛkʰɔnz̤ɛ wɔna jiɓani nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a nilwɛ alwa kɛ amafilisti awaɓulala amasirajɛli asaɓa kɛ wɔna waja ɛlɔwɔ ɛntɛntɛni jakʰɛ aɓulawa kakʰulu kunɛnɛ kwawa kumasirajɛli anɡ̤amaʃumi amatʰatʰu anɡ̤umkǃikɛla kwatʰind͡ʒ̤wa nɛtʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ katʰikǁɔ ɓafa ɔɔɲana ɓɔɓaɓini ɓakaɛli uhɔfɛni nɔpinɛhasi kwaɓalɛka ind̤ɔd̤a jakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin iv̤ɛla ɛmkʰɔsini jafika ɛʃilɔ kwanɡ̤alɔɔ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ajɔ z̤ik͡xaz̤ukilɛ inɔm̤laɓa ɛntlɔkɔ jafika nankɔ uɛli ɛɬɛli ɛsiɬalwɛni ɛkǀalɛni kwɛnɮɛla ɛɓɔnisɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iɓiɡ̤ub̤a intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛtʲɛja katʰikǁɔ jafika ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ jawukǁɛlɛla umz̤i wasit͡ʃɔ isililɔ wɔnkɛ umz̤i waliv̤a uɛli iz̤wi lɛsililɔ watʰi lɛlani ɛli liz̤wi lalɛ ntlɔkɔma ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ jakʰawulɛz̤a jɛz̤a jamkǁɛlɛla uɛli kɛ kalɔku uɛli ɛɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi asitʰɔɓa anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɛ ɛnɔxatʲaz̤ɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛnakuɓɔna jatʰi ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ kuɛli nd̤inɡ̤ulɔ uv̤ɛla ɛmkʰɔsini nd̤isaɓɛ ɛmkʰɔsini nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ watʰi jɛna kuɬɛ ntɔni ɲana wapʰɛnd̤ula umɓiki watʰi asaɓilɛ amasirajɛli pʰamɓi kwamafilisti kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɓaɓulɛwɛ kakʰulu aɓantu kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ ɓɔɓaɓini ɓafilɛ ɔɔhɔfɛni nɔpinɛhasi itʲɛja katʰikǁɔ itʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛ kwatʰi akukʰankaɲa itʲɛja katʰikǁɔ ɛsiɬalwɛni sakʰɛ ɛkǃɛtʰuka nɡ̤ɔmv̤a nɡ̤asɛkǀalɛni kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ wapʰuka ilunɡ̤u lɛntamɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ iɓisɛlilikǁʰɛɡ̤ɔ inz̤ima jajiwalawula amasirajɛli imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi manɛ kɛ kalɔku umɔlɔkaz̤ana wajɔ umkapinɛhasi ɛɓɛmitʰi ɛz̤a kuz̤ala watʰi akuz̤iv̤a iind̤aɓa z̤ɔkutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kwɛtʲɛja katʰikǁɔ nɛz̤ɔkufa kɔjisɛ wɛnd̤ɔd̤a nɔkwɛnd̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ waɡ̤ukǃa waz̤ala nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jamfikɛla inimɓa nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkufa kwakʰɛ aɓafaz̤i aɓaɓɛmi pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ ɓatʰɛtʰa ɓatʰi musa ukɔjika nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uz̤ɛlɛ uɲana akapʰɛnd̤ula akakʰatʰala kɔkɔ watʰi nɡ̤uikab̤ɔd̤ɛ ɛsitʰi uz̤ukɔ lumkilɛ kwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kwɛtʲɛja katʰikǁɔ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔjisɛ wɛnd̤ɔd̤a nɛnd̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ watʰi uz̤ukɔ lumkilɛ kwasirajɛli kuɓa itʲɛja katʰikǁɔ itʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛ amafilisti ajitʰaɓatʰa itʲɛja katʰikǁɔ ɛsuka najɔ ɛɛb̤ɛnɛz̤ɛrɛ aja najɔ ɛaʃd̤ɔd̤ɛ ajitʰaɓatʰa amafilisti itʲɛja katʰikǁɔ aja najɔ ɛnɮwini kad̤aɡ̤ɔn ajimisa ɛkǀalɛni kɔd̤aɡ̤ɔn ɓav̤uka nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ aɓasɛaʃd̤ɔd̤ɛ nankɔ ud̤aɡ̤ɔn ɛwilɛ nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni pʰamɓi kwɛtʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a ɓamtʰaɓatʰa ud̤aɡ̤ɔn ɓaɓuja ɓammisa ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ ɓav̤uka nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ nankɔ ud̤aɡ̤ɔn ɛwilɛ nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni pʰamɓi kwɛtʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a intlɔkɔ kad̤aɡ̤ɔn nɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔz̤iɓini z̤iŋǃumkilɛ z̤isɛmɓund̤wini wɔmɲanɡ̤ɔ kusɛlɛ isikʰɔnd̤ɔ sɔd̤wa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓakad̤aɡ̤ɔn naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓanɡ̤ɛnajɔ ɛnɮwini kad̤aɡ̤ɔn aɓaɲatʰɛli ɛmɓund̤wini wɔmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛnɮu kad̤aɡ̤ɔn ɛaʃd̤ɔd̤ɛ unanam̤la saɓa nz̤ima isanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a pʰɛz̤u kwaɓasɛaʃd̤ɔd̤ɛ saɓapʰanz̤isa saɓaɓɛtʰa nɡ̤amatʰumɓa iaʃd̤ɔd̤ɛ kɛ nɛmid̤a jajɔ akuɓɔna amad̤ɔd̤a asɛaʃd̤ɔd̤ɛ ukuɓa kund͡ʒ̤alɔ atʰi itʲɛja jɔtʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli majinɡ̤aɬali kutʰi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa isanɮa sakʰɛ sinz̤ima pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu napʰɛz̤u kɔd̤aɡ̤ɔn utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu atʰumɛla aɬanɡ̤anisɛla kuwɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ikʰulu z̤amafilisti atʰi sijitʰini itʲɛja jɔtʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli z̤atʰi majid͡ʒ̤ikɛ ijɛ ɛɡ̤ati ajid͡ʒ̤ika kɛ itʲɛja jɔtʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli kwatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkud͡ʒ̤ikwa kwajɔ isanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a saɓa pʰɛz̤u kwalɔɔ mz̤i sasisakǃunɡ̤ɛ ɛsikʰulu kunɛnɛ waɓaɓulala aɓantu ɓalɔɔ mz̤i kwatʰaɓatʰɛla kwaɓaŋǀinanɛ kwɛsa kwaɓakʰulu ɓatʰi ɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔ amatʰumɓa ɓajitʰumɛla itʲɛja katʰikǁɔ ɛɛk͡xɔn kwatʰi kǁa ifikajɔ itʲɛja katʰikǁɔ ɛɛk͡xɔn ɓakʰala aɓasɛɛk͡xɔn ɓɛsitʰi ɓajid͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛ kutʰi itʲɛja jɔtʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukuɓa isiɓulalɛ tʰina naɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu ɓatʰumɛla ɓaz̤iɬanɡ̤anisa z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ikʰulu z̤amafilisti ɓatʰi jimkisɛni itʲɛja jɔtʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli iɓujɛlɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jajɔ inɡ̤asiɓulali tʰina naɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukukǃunɡ̤akǃunɡ̤a kɔkufa ɓɛkukʰɔ kuwɔ wɔnkɛ umz̤i ɓɛsinz̤ima kunɛnɛ isanɮa sikatʰikǁɔ kʰɔna aɓantu aɓanɡ̤afanɡ̤a ɓaɓɛtʰwa nɡ̤amatʰumɓa kwɛɲuka kwaja ɛz̤ulwini ukuz̤iɓika kɔmz̤i itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a jaɓa sɛm̤laɓɛni wamafilisti iiɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ amafilisti aɓiz̤a aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓav̤umisi ɛsitʰi sijitʰini itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a saz̤isɛni intɔ ɛsinɡ̤ajiɡ̤ɔd̤usa najɔ ijɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jajɔ ɓatʰi ukuɓa ijaɡ̤ɔd̤uswa itʲɛja jɔtʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukujiɡ̤ɔd̤usa ilamɓatʰa ukujiɓujisɛla kujɛ nɔjiɓujisɛla inɛd̤ini lɛtʲala nija kupʰiliswa kuja kwand̤ula ukwaz̤ɛka ukuɓa ɓɛkunɡ̤ani ukuɓa isanɮa sakʰɛ sinɡ̤ɛsuki atʰi lijintɔni id̤ini lɛtʲala ɛsɔliɓujisɛla kujɛ ɓatʰi linɡ̤amatʰumɓa ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ amaɬanu nɛɛmpuku z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛz̤intlanu nɡ̤ɔkwɛnani lɛz̤ikʰulu z̤amafilisti nɡ̤ɔkuɓa siɲɛ isiɓɛtʰɔ nɔnkɛ nakwiz̤ikʰulu z̤ɛnu iz̤ɛ nijɛnz̤ɛ imifanɛkisɔ jamatʰumɓa ɛnu nɛmifanɛkisɔ jɛɛmpuku z̤ɛnu ɛz̤ilɔnakalisajɔ iliz̤wɛ nimz̤ukisɛ utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli m̤lawumɓi wɔsɛnz̤a isanɮa sakʰɛ nakɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɛnu nakwiliz̤wɛ lɛnu jini ukuɓa niz̤ikǃakǃad̤ɛkisɛ iintliz̤ijɔ z̤ɛnu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa az̤ikǃakǃad̤ɛkisajɔ iintliz̤ijɔ z̤awɔ amajiputa nɔfarɔ akutʰanɡ̤a akuz̤ɛnz̤a iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ ɛz̤iŋǀamisajɔ kuwɔ amajiputa awand̤ulula amasirajɛli ɛmka kɛ tʰaɓatʰani nɡ̤ɔkɔ nɛnz̤ɛ iŋǃwɛlɔ ɛnt͡ʃa nitʰaɓatʰɛ iimaz̤i ɛz̤imɓini ɛz̤int͡ʃa ɛz̤aɲisajɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤az̤anɡ̤a z̤iɓɛkwɛ dʲɔkʰwɛ niz̤iɓɔpʰɛ ɛŋǃwɛlwɛni niwaŋǃand̤ɛ amatʰɔlɛ az̤ɔ kuz̤ɔ ajɛ ɛkʰaja nɔjitʰaɓatʰa kɛ itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a nijiɓɛkɛ ɛŋǃwɛlwɛni nɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛniz̤iɓujisɛla kujɛ ɛz̤ilid̤ini lɛtʲala niz̤iɓɛkɛ ɛtʲɛjɛni ɛkǀalɛni lajɔ nijind̤ululɛ ihamɓɛ niz̤ɛ nikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ukuɓa itʰɛ jɛɲuka nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɔmd̤a wajɔ jaja ɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ wɔɓa nɡ̤ujɛ ɔsɛnz̤ɛlɛ ɔɓu ɓuɓi ɓukʰulu kɛ ukuɓa kutʰɛ akwaɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤alɔ sɔtʰi saz̤i ukuɓa asiɓɛtʰwɛ sisanɮa sakʰɛ siɬɛlwɛ sisiɬɔ ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ amad̤ɔd̤a atʰaɓatʰa iimaz̤i ɛz̤int͡ʃa ɛz̤aɲisajɔ z̤amɓini az̤iɓɔpʰa ɛŋǃwɛlwɛni awav̤alɛla amatʰɔlɛ az̤ɔ ɛkʰaja ajiɓɛka itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a ɛŋǃwɛlwɛni nɛtʲɛja inɛɛmpuku z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛmifanɛkisɔ jamatʰumɓa awɔ iimaz̤i ɛz̤int͡ʃa z̤atʰi ŋ̤ǃ̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jasɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ z̤ahamɓa nɡ̤ɔmɛnd̤ɔ z̤ihamɓa z̤iŋǁakama az̤aŋǁakǁʰɛla ɛkunɛnɛ nasɛkʰɔlɔ iz̤ikʰulu z̤amafilisti z̤iz̤iland̤ɛla z̤ad̤a z̤aja ɛmd̤ɛni wasɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ aɓasɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ ɓaɓɛv̤una iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa ɛntilini ɓawapʰakamisa amɛɬɔ aɓɔ ɓajiɓɔna itʲɛja ɓav̤uja ɓakujiɓɔna iŋǃwɛlɔ jafika ɛnt͡simini kajɔʃuwa wasɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ jɛma kʰɔna ɓɛkukʰɔ ilitʲɛ ɛlikʰulu kʰɔna ɓajikǀand̤a imitʰi jɛŋǃwɛlɔ ɓaz̤iɲusa iimaz̤i ɛz̤int͡ʃa ɛz̤ɔ z̤alid̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a aɓalɛv̤i ɓajitʰula itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a nɛtʲɛja ɛɓinajɔ inɛmpaɬa jɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɓaz̤iɓɛka ɛlitʲɛni ɛlɔ likʰulu amad̤ɔd̤a asɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ kɛ aɲusa amad̤ini aɲukajɔ aɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ kujɛhɔv̤a z̤aɓɔna iz̤ikʰulu ɛz̤iɬanu z̤amafilisti z̤aɓujɛla ɛɛk͡xɔn kwanɡ̤alɔɔ nɡ̤awɔ amatʰumɓa ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ awawaɓujisɛlajɔ amafilisti kujɛhɔv̤a alid̤ini lɛtʲala ɛlasɛaʃd̤ɔd̤ɛ laliliɲɛ ɛlasɛɡ̤az̤a laliliɲɛ ɛlasɛaʃkɛlɔn laliliɲɛ ɛlasɛɡ̤ati laliliɲɛ ɛlasɛɛk͡xɔn laliliɲɛ kuɲɛ nɛɛmpuku z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnani lɛmiz̤i jɔnkɛ jamafilisti jɛz̤ikʰulu ɛz̤iɬanu kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛmiz̤ini ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ kusɛ kwimiz̤ana jaɓasɛmapʰanɮɛni kusɛ ɛtʲɛni ɛlikʰulu aɓajimisa kulɔ itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a liliŋ̤ǃ̤ina unanam̤la ɛnt͡simini kajɔʃuwa wasɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ waɓɛtʰa ɛmad̤ɔd̤ɛni asɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ajikʰanɡ̤akʰanɡ̤ɛlajɔ itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a waɓulala ɛɓantwini aɓɔ amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛmad̤ɔd̤ɛni anɡ̤amawaka anɡ̤amaʃumi amaɬanu ɓɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili aɓantu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɓaɓulɛlɛ aɓantu nɡ̤ɔɓulalɔ ɔlukʰulu atʰi amad̤ɔd̤a asɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnakɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a lɔ tʰikǁɔ ujiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ uja kuɲuka ajɛ kuɓani kwakʰɛ kutʰi atʰuma aɓatʰuɲwa kuɓɛmi ɓasɛkirijatijɛharim ɛsitʰi amafilisti ajiɓujisilɛ itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a jiɬani niz̤ɛ kujiɲusɛla ɛz̤a amad̤ɔd̤a asɛkirijatijɛharim ajiɲusa itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a ajiz̤isa ɛnɮwini kaab̤inad̤ab̤i ɛnd̤ulini aŋ̤ǀ̤walisa uɛlaz̤arɛ uɲana wakʰɛ ukuɓa ajiɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a kwatʰi iɬɛli ɛkirijatijɛharim apʰɔ itʲɛja z̤and̤a iint͡suku z̤ajimiɲaka ɛmaʃumi maɓini jamland̤ɛla ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛsimɛma jɔnkɛ inɮu kasirajɛli watʰi kɛ usamuwɛli kwinɮu jɔnkɛ kasirajɛli ukuɓa niɓujɛla kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jɛnu jɔnkɛ ɓasusɛni kɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛnu ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a nɔɔaʃtarɔti niz̤imisɛ iintliz̤ijɔ z̤ɛnu kujɛhɔv̤a nikʰɔnz̤ɛ jɛna jɛd̤wa wɔniɬanɡ̤ula kɛ ɛsanɮɛni samafilisti ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaɓasusa kɛ ɔɔb̤ahali nɔɔaʃtarɔti ɓakʰɔnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a jɛd̤wa watʰi usamuwɛli waɬanɡ̤anisɛlɛni ɛmiz̤pa ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli nd̤initʰand̤az̤ɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a aɬanɡ̤anisɛlana ɛmiz̤pa akʰa amanz̤i awapʰalaz̤a pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a az̤ila ukuɮa nɡ̤alɔɔ atʰi kʰɔna sɔnilɛ kujɛhɔv̤a waɓalawula usamuwɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛmiz̤pa ɛv̤a amafilisti ukuɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaɬanɡ̤anisɛlɛnɛ ɛmiz̤pa z̤ɛɲuka iz̤ikʰulu z̤amafilisti z̤awapʰumɛla amasirajɛli ɓɛv̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓawɔjika amafilisti ɓatʰi ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kusamuwɛli musa ukujɛka ukusikʰalɛla kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu asisind̤isɛ ɛsanɮɛni samafilisti usamuwɛli watʰaɓatʰa itakanɛ ɛlaɲajɔ waliɲusa lalid̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ lɔnkɛ lipʰɔla kujɛhɔv̤a wakʰala usamuwɛli kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamasirajɛli ujɛhɔv̤a wampʰɛnd̤ula kwatʰi kǁa usamuwɛli aliɲusajɔ id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ amafilisti asɔnd̤ɛla ɛsiz̤a namasirajɛli ujɛhɔv̤a wad̤ud̤umisa nɡ̤ɛz̤wi ɛlikʰulu lɔɔ kumafilisti wawakǃunɡ̤akǃunɡ̤a aɓulawa pʰamɓi kwamasirajɛli apʰuma amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli ɛmiz̤pa awasukɛla amafilisti awaɓulala ɛsa pʰant͡si kwɛb̤ɛtɛkarɛ usamuwɛli watʰaɓatʰa ilitʲɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛmiz̤pa nɛʃɛn watʰi iɡ̤ama lalɔ jiɛb̤ɛnɛz̤ɛrɛ watʰi kud̤ɛ kwaɓa lapʰa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛsiŋǀɛd̤a atʰɔtʲwa kɛ amafilisti akaɓa sapʰind̤a ɛz̤ɛ ɛmd̤ɛni wakwasirajɛli sakǀʰasana namafilisti isanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a jɔnkɛ imiɬa kasamuwɛli jaɓujisɛlwa kumasirajɛli imiz̤i lɛjɔ aɓɛjitʰimɓilɛ amafilisti kumasirajɛli itʰaɓatʰɛla ɛɛk͡xɔn jɛsa ɛɡ̤ati nɛmid̤a jajɔ ajiɬa nɡ̤ula amasirajɛli ɛsanɮɛni samafilisti lakǁɔla kɛ pʰakatʰi kwamasirajɛli namaamɔri usamuwɛli wajɛ ɛnɡ̤umlawuli kumasirajɛli jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɔɓɔmi ɓakʰɛ ɛhamɓa imiɲaka nɡ̤ɛmiɲaka ɛd͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a ɛb̤ɛtɛli nasɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali nasɛmiz̤pa ɛwalawula amasirajɛli kwɛz̤ɔ nd̤awɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛɓujɛla ɛrama nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jajikʰɔna inɮu jakʰɛ wawalawula nakʰɔna amasirajɛli wakʰa isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ kujɛhɔv̤a kʰɔna kwatʰi kǁɛnikwɛni usamuwɛli alikǁʰɛɡ̤ɔ waɓamisa ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓaɓa nɡ̤aɓaɡ̤wɛɓi kumasirajɛli iɡ̤ama lɔɲana wakʰɛ wamaz̤iɓulɔ lalinɡ̤ujɔwɛli iɡ̤ama lɔwɛsiɓini lalinɡ̤uab̤ija ɓɛnɡ̤aɓaɡ̤wɛɓi ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ aɓahamɓanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jakʰɛ ɓanaɓɛla inz̤uz̤ɔ ɛmɓi ɓamkɛla iz̤ikǀɛnɡ̤ɔ ɓasid͡ʒ̤ika isiɡ̤wɛɓɔ az̤a aɬanɡ̤anisana ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwasirajɛli ɛz̤a kusamuwɛli ɛrama atʰi kujɛ ujaɓɔna walupʰɛlɛ wɛna ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ aɓahamɓi nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jakʰɔ simisɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ wɔkusilawula nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛz̤i z̤ɔnkɛ laɓa liɓi ɛlɔ z̤wi ɛmɛɬwɛni kasamuwɛli kǁa ɓatʰi sinikɛ wɔkusilawula watʰand̤az̤a usamuwɛli kujɛhɔv̤a watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kusamuwɛli lipʰulapʰulɛ iz̤wi laɓantu ɛntwɛni jɔnkɛ aɓajitʰɛtʰajɔ kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uwɛ aɓamɡ̤iɓilɛjɔ ɓaɡ̤iɓɛ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤inɡ̤aɓi nɡ̤ukumkani kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ aɓaz̤ɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kusɛlɔkwɛmini ɛnd̤aɓaɲusajɔ ɛjiputa kwad̤a kwaɓa nam̤la ɓand̤iʃija ɓakʰɔnz̤a tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ nam̤la nakuwɛ lipʰulapʰulɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ iz̤wi laɓɔ kɔd̤wa uz̤ɛ uɓakǃɔnɔnɔnd̤isɛ kakuɬɛ uɓakǁɛlɛlɛ isikɔ aja kupʰatʰa nɡ̤alɔ ɔja kuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani waɓɔ waɓakǁɛlɛla kɛ usamuwɛli aɓɔ ɓantu ɓaɓɛɓiz̤a kujɛ ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi kajɛhɔv̤a watʰi lilɔ ɛli isikɔ lɔkumkani ɔja kuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu uja kuɓatʰaɓatʰa aɓamisɛlɛ jɛna ɛz̤iŋǃwɛlwɛni z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔkulwa nasɛmahaʃɛni akʰɛ akʰwɛlwajɔ ɓaɓalɛkɛ pʰamɓi kwɛŋǃwɛlɔ jakʰɛ aɓamisɛlɛ jɛna ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamawaka naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamaʃumi nɡ̤amaɬanu ɓalimɛ akʰɛ ɓav̤unɛ ukutʲa kwakʰɛ ɓɛnz̤ɛ iimpaɬa z̤akʰɛ z̤ɛmfaz̤wɛ nɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɛŋǃwɛlɔ jakʰɛ iintɔmɓi z̤ɛnu wɔz̤itʰaɓatʰa z̤iɓɛ nɡ̤aɓakǃʰɔlikaz̤i naɓapʰɛki naɓɔsi ɓɛz̤ɔnka amasimi ɛnu wɔwatʰaɓatʰa nɛz̤id̤ilija z̤ɛnu nɛz̤iŋǃuma z̤ɛnu ɛz̤ɔna z̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ az̤inikɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ nɛsiʃumi sɛmɓɛwu jɛnu asiɓiz̤ɛ nɛsɛz̤id̤ilija z̤ɛnu asinikɛ aɓaɓusi ɓakʰɛ naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛnu uja kuɓatʰaɓatʰa naɓakʰɔnz̤az̤ana ɓɛnu namad̤ɔd̤ana ɛnu namaɛsilɛ ɛnu ɛnz̤ɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i wakʰɛ isiʃumi sɛmpaɬa jɛnu ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ asiɓiz̤ɛ niɓɛ nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ nija kukʰala nɡ̤alɔɔ nɡ̤ɔkumkani wɛnu ɛnaz̤iɲulɛlajɔ anɡ̤anipʰɛnd̤uli ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤alɔɔ aɓav̤uma aɓantu ukulipʰulapʰula iliz̤wi likasamuwɛli ɓatʰi haji inɛnɛ masiɓɛ nɔkumkani natʰi siɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛz̤i z̤ɔnkɛ asilawulɛ wɛtʰu apʰumɛ pʰamɓi kwɛtʰu alwɛ iimfaz̤wɛ z̤ɛtʰu wawɛv̤a usamuwɛli ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi aɓantu wawatʰɛtʰa ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kusamuwɛli lipʰulapʰulɛ iz̤wi laɓɔ uɓɛnz̤ɛlɛ watʰi usamuwɛli kumad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli hamɓani nijɛ ɛlɔwɔ ɛmz̤ini wakʰɛ kwakukʰɔ nd̤ɔd̤a jakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin iɡ̤ama lalinɡ̤ukiʃɛ uɲana kaab̤ijɛli uɲana kat͡sɛrɔrɛ uɲana kab̤ɛkɔrati uɲana kaafija uɲana wɔmb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ind̤ɔd̤a ɛsisitʲɛɓi jajinɔɲana ɔɡ̤ama linɡ̤usawulɛ umfɔ ɔmt͡ʃa ɔm̤lɛ ɛɓɛkunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ mfɔ pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli um̤lɛ kunajɛ ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛmaɡ̤ǁ̤ɛni akʰɛ aɲusɛ uɓɛmd̤ɛ kuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ kɛ kalɔku ukiʃɛ ujisɛ kasawulɛ walaɬɛkɛlwa z̤iimaz̤i z̤akʰɛ z̤amaɛsilɛ watʰi ukiʃɛ kusawulɛ uɲana wakʰɛ kʰawutʰaɓatʰɛ ɔmɲɛ kuɓafana ahamɓɛ nawɛ usukɛ ujɛ kuz̤ifuna iimaz̤i z̤amaɛsilɛ wakǀand̤a kwɛlɛɛntaɓa lakwaɛfrajim wakǀand̤a nasɛz̤wɛni lasɛʃaliʃa aɓaz̤ifumana wakǀand̤a nasɛz̤wɛni lasɛʃahalim az̤aɓakʰɔ wakǀand̤a nasɛz̤wɛni lakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin aɓaz̤ifumana ɓakufika ɛz̤wɛni lakwat͡sufi usawulɛ watʰi ɔɓɛnajɛ hamɓa siɓujɛ ɬɛz̤ɛ uɓawɔ az̤iŋǀamɛ iimaz̤i z̤amaɛsilɛ aɓɛ nɛsitʰukutʰɛz̤i nɡ̤atʰi watʰi kɛ jɛna kujɛ ujaɓɔna kɛ kulɔ mz̤i kukʰɔ katʰikǁɔ nɡ̤umntu ɔz̤ukilɛjɔ kɔnkɛ akutʰɛtʰajɔ kujɛnz̤ɛka nɡ̤ɛnɛnɛ makʰɛ sijɛ kʰɔna kɛ m̤lawumɓi anɡ̤asiɓɔnisa inɮɛla jɛtʰu ɛsɔhamɓa nɡ̤ajɔ watʰi usawulɛ lɔwɔ jaɓɔna sihamɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛ sija ntɔni lɔwɔ kuɓa isɔnka sipʰɛlilɛ ɛmpaɬɛni jɛtʰu akukʰɔ sipʰɔ sinɡ̤asisa katʰikǁɔ intɔ ɛsinajɔ jintɔni wapʰind̤a wampʰɛnd̤ula usawulɛ watʰi nanku kufumanɛkɛ ɛsanɮɛni isaɬulɔ sɛsinɛ sɛʃɛkɛlɛ jɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nd̤ɔsinika katʰikǁɔ asiɓɔnisɛ inɮɛla jɛtʰu nɡ̤apʰamɓili kwasirajɛli kǁa aja kuɓuz̤a kutʰikǁɔ uɓɛsitʰi hamɓa sijɛ kwimɓɔni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔnɡ̤uprɔfɛti nam̤la ɓɛkusitʰiwa jimɓɔni nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɡ̤apʰamɓili watʰi usawulɛ lɔwɔ liɬɛ iliz̤wi lakʰɔ hamɓa sijɛ ɓahamɓa ɓaja kulɔɔ mz̤i apʰɔ katʰikǁɔ wajɛkʰɔna ɓatʰi ɓɛɲuka ɛkǃʰinɛni lɔmz̤i ɓakǃuɓisana nɔmtʰind͡ʒ̤ana upʰuma usija kukʰa amanz̤i ɓatʰi kuwɔ ikʰɔ apʰa imɓɔni waɓapʰɛnd̤ula watʰi ikʰɔ nant͡sɔ pʰamɓi kwɛnu kʰawulɛz̤ani nɡ̤ɔku kuɓa ifikɛ nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ kulɔ mz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓantu ɓanɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nam̤la ɛsiɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni kǁa ninɡ̤ɛna kulɔ mz̤i nɔjifumana inɡ̤ɛkɛɲuki ijɛ kuɮa ɛsiɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni kuɓa aɓaji kuɮa aɓantu inɡ̤ɛkafiki nɡ̤ɔkuɓa usikɛlɛlwa jijɔ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɓaz̤ɛ ɓaɮɛ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ aɓamɛɲiwɛjɔ ɲukani nɡ̤ɔku nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɔjifumana nɡ̤ɔku ɓɛɲuka kɛ ɓaja kulɔɔ mz̤i ɓakuɓɔna ukuɓa ɓajanɡ̤ɛna kulɔɔ mz̤i nankɔ usamuwɛli ɛpʰuma ɛkǃuɓisana naɓɔ ɛz̤a kuɲuka ajɛ ɛsiɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni kɛ kalɔku ujɛhɔv̤a wajɛjitʰʲilɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ kasamuwɛli nɡ̤ɔsuku ɔlunɡ̤apʰamɓi kɔkuz̤a kukasawulɛ ɛsitʰi nɡ̤ɛli kǁɛʃa nɡ̤ɔmsɔ nd̤ija kutʰumɛla kuwɛ ind̤ɔd̤a jasɛz̤wɛni lakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ukuz̤ɛ ujitʰamɓisɛ iɓɛ jinɡ̤anɡ̤a jaɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli iɓasind̤isɛ aɓantu ɓam ɛsanɮɛni samafilisti nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iɓaɓɔnilɛ aɓantu ɓam kuɓa ukukʰala kwaɓɔ kufikilɛ usamuwɛli wamɓɔna usawulɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wampʰɛnd̤ula watʰi nant͡sɔ lɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤a nd̤iɓɛ nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ kuwɛ nɡ̤ajɔ jijɔ ɛja kupʰatʰa uɓukʰɔsi pʰɛz̤u kwaɓantu ɓam wasɔnd̤ɛla usawulɛ kusamuwɛli ɛsanɡ̤wɛni watʰi kʰawund̤ikǁɛlɛlɛ ipʰi apʰa inɮu jɛmɓɔni usamuwɛli wampʰɛnd̤ula usawulɛ watʰi nd̤im imɓɔni ɲuka pʰamɓi ujɛ ɛsiɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni niɮɛ nam̤la nd̤ikund̤ululɛ nɡ̤ɔmsɔ nd̤ikukǁɛlɛlɛ kɔnkɛ ɔkusɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɔ kɛ iimaz̤i z̤amaɛsilɛ ɛsɛkunt͡suku ntatʰu nam̤la z̤ikulaɬɛkilɛ ukujiɓɛkɛla kuz̤ɔ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa z̤ifuɲɛnwɛ kɔkukaɓani kɔnkɛ ɔkuŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ kwasirajɛli asikɔkwakʰɔ nɔkwɛnɮu jɔnkɛ kajiɬɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula usawulɛ watʰi and̤inɡ̤umb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin jini wɛsiz̤wɛ ɛsiŋǀinanana kwasirajɛli nɔmz̤alwanɛ wakɔwɛtʰu awupʰant͡si ɛmiz̤alwanɛni jɔnkɛ jɛsiz̤wɛ sakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin jini ukuɓa utʰɛtʰɛ iliz̤wi ɛlind͡ʒ̤ɛ usamuwɛli wamtʰaɓatʰa usawulɛ nɔmfana lɔwɔ waɓanɡ̤ɛnisa ɛɡ̤umɓini waɓanika ind̤awɔ jɔɓukʰulu pʰakatʰi kwaɓamɛɲiwɛjɔ aɓɔ ɓɛnɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a akumaʃumi amatʰatʰu watʰi usamuwɛli kumpʰɛki ɛtʰɛ isaɓɛlɔ ɛnd̤akunikajɔ nd̤atʰi kuwɛ siɓɛkɛ wawuz̤isa umlɛnz̤ɛ lɔwɔ nɛntɔ ɛpʰɛz̤u kwawɔ waɓɛka pʰamɓi kɔsawulɛ watʰi usamuwɛli nant͡sɔ intɔ ɛnd̤ikuɓɛkɛlɛjɔ iɓɛkiwɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ jiɮa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iɓiɡ̤ǀ̤inɛlwɛ wɛna ukuɓa iɓɛ jɛjɛli kǁɛʃa kususɛla kɔkɔ nd̤atʰi nd̤iɓamɛmilɛ aɓantu waɮa usawulɛ nɔsamuwɛli nɡ̤alɔɔ ɓɛɬa ɛsiɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni apʰɔ ɓɛz̤a pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i watʰɛtʰa nɔsawulɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛnɮu ɓav̤uka kwatʰi kǁa kuɲuka isifinɡ̤ɔ usamuwɛli wamɛmɛz̤a kusawulɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛnɮu ɛsitʰi v̤uka nd̤ikuɡ̤ɔd̤usɛ wav̤uka usawulɛ ɓapʰuma ɓaja pʰanɮɛ ɓɔɓaɓini jɛna nɔsamuwɛli ɓɛɬilɛ ɓaja ɛkupʰɛlɛni kɔmz̤i watʰi usamuwɛli kusawulɛ jit͡ʃɔ lɔ aɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛlɛ pʰamɓi kwɛtʰu waɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa kɛ kʰawumɛ wɛna nɡ̤ɔku nd̤ikuv̤isɛ iliz̤wi likatʰikǁɔ usamuwɛli watʰaɓatʰa iɡ̤utʲana lɛɔli wamɡ̤alɛla ɛntlɔkɔ wamanɡ̤a watʰi inɛnɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰamɓisilɛ ukuɓa uɓɛ jinɡ̤anɡ̤a jɛlifa lakʰɛ ɛkumkɛni kwakʰɔ nam̤la uja amad̤ɔd̤a amaɓini nɡ̤asɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni likarakɛli ɛmd̤ɛni wakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɛt͡sɛlɛt͡sa aja kutʰi kuwɛ z̤ifuɲɛnwɛ iimaz̤i z̤amaɛsilɛ ɔɓujɛ kuz̤ifuna jaɓɔna ukujɛkilɛ ujiɬɔ ukutʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɛɛmaz̤i z̤amaɛsilɛ ɛz̤ɔ unɛsitʰukutʰɛz̤i nɡ̤ani ɛsitʰi nd̤ija kutʰini nɡ̤ɔɲana uɡ̤ǃ̤itʰilɛ apʰɔ wɔkǃʰuɓɛla pʰamɓili ufikɛ kumɔki wɛtab̤ɔrɛ uɬanɡ̤anɛ kʰɔna namad̤ɔd̤a amatʰatʰu ɛɲuka ɛsija kutʰikǁɔ ɛb̤ɛtɛli ɛɲɛ itʰwɛlɛ amatakanɛ amatʰatʰu ɛɲɛ itʰwɛlɛ iintɛnd̤a z̤ɛz̤ɔnka ɛz̤itʰatʰu ɛɲɛ itʰwɛlɛ int͡suɓa jɛwajini ɔkuɓuz̤a ukupʰila kwakʰɔ akunikɛ iz̤ɔnka ɛz̤iɓini uz̤itʰaɓatʰɛ ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤awɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ uja ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha katʰikǁɔ apʰɔ kukʰɔjɔ jamafilisti kutʰi kǁa ufikilɛjɔ ɛmz̤ini apʰɔ utʰanɛ ŋǃipʰu nɛɡ̤ǃ̤iz̤a laɓaprɔfɛti lisiɬa liv̤ɛla ɛsiɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni pʰamɓi kwalɔ inɡ̤umxub̤ɛ nɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔ nɔɡ̤wali nɔhad̤i ɓɛprɔfɛta umɔja katʰikǁɔ wɔkufikɛla nɡ̤amanɮa uprɔfɛtɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ naɓɔ uɡ̤ukǃukɛ uɓɛ wumɓi kɔtʰi kǁa itʰɛ jafika kuwɛ lɔɔ mikǃɔnd̤isɔ uz̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ sija nɡ̤akɔ isanɮa sakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰikǁɔ unawɛ uɬɛ ujɛ pʰamɓi ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali jaɓɔna nd̤ijɛɬa nd̤iz̤a kuwɛ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤iɲusɛ amad̤ini aɲukajɔ nd̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔkǁɔlɔ wɔlind̤a imiɬa ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nd̤id̤ɛ nd̤iz̤ɛ kuwɛ nd̤ikwaz̤isɛ ɔkɔ uja kukwɛnz̤a watʰi usawulɛ akutʰi kʰwit͡ʃi ukuɓa ɛmkɛ kusamuwɛli utʰikǁɔ wamɡ̤ukǃula wanantliz̤ijɔ jimɓi jafika jɔnkɛ lɔɔ mikǃɔnd̤isɔ kwanɡ̤ajɔ lɔɔ ɓafika ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha apʰɔ nalɔ iɡ̤ǃ̤iz̤a laɓaprɔfɛti limkʰawulɛla wamfikɛla nɡ̤amanɮa umɔja katʰikǁɔ waprɔfɛta pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ kwatʰi ɓakumɓɔna ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛmaz̤i nɡ̤apʰamɓili ɛprɔfɛta nd̤awɔɲɛ naɓaprɔfɛti ɓatʰi aɓantu ɔmɲɛ kɔmɲɛ uɬiwɛ jintɔni uɲana kakiʃɛ ukuɓaprɔfɛti nɔsawulɛ wapʰɛnd̤ula wakʰɔna watʰi nɡ̤uɓani ujisɛ waɓɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ kwaɓakʰɔ umz̤ɛkɛlisɔ wɔkutʰi ukuɓaprɔfɛti nɔsawulɛ waɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa ukuprɔfɛta waja ɛsiɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni watʰi ujisɛkaz̤i kasawulɛ kujɛ lɔwɔ ɓɛnijɛ pʰi watʰi ɓɛsifuna iimaz̤i z̤amaɛsilɛ sakuɓɔna ukuɓa asiz̤ifumani saja kusamuwɛli watʰi ujisɛkaz̤i kasawulɛ kʰawund̤ikǁɛlɛlɛ ukuɓa utʰɛni usamuwɛli watʰi usawulɛ kujisɛkaz̤i usikǁɛlɛlɛ ukuɓa z̤ifuɲɛnwɛ iimaz̤i z̤amaɛsilɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɔɓukumkani aɓɛtʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ usamuwɛli akamkǁɛlɛlanɡ̤a ntɔ kɛ kalɔku usamuwɛli waɓaɬaɓɛla umkʰɔsi aɓantu ɓɛz̤a kujɛhɔv̤a ɛmiz̤pa watʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi nd̤awaɲusa amasirajɛli ɛjiputa nd̤aniɬanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni samajiputa nasɛsanɮɛni sɛz̤ikumkani z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤anikǁinajɔ nam̤la kɛ nimkǀɛkisilɛ utʰikǁɔ wɛnu ɔwanisind̤isajɔ ɛɓuɓini ɓɛnu ɓɔnkɛ nasɛkuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛni kɔnkɛ natʰi kujɛ simisɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu kalɔku kɛ z̤imisɛni pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɛnu nanɡ̤ɔkwamawaka ɛnu waz̤isɔnd̤ɛz̤a kɛ usamuwɛli z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤akwasirajɛli kwatʰatʲatʰwa isiz̤wɛ sakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin wasisɔnd̤ɛz̤a isiz̤wɛ sakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jasɔ kwatʰatʲatʰwa umz̤alwanɛ wakwamatri kwatʰatʲatʰwa kɛ usawulɛ uɲana kakiʃɛ ɓamfuna aɓamfumana ɓaɓuja ɓaɓuz̤a kujɛhɔv̤a ɓatʰi usɛlɛfikilɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a nankɔ ɛz̤imɛlɛ jɛna pʰant͡si kwɛmpaɬa ɓaɓalɛka ɓamtʰaɓatʰa apʰɔ wɛma pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu wamd̤ɛ kuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛmaɡ̤ǁ̤ɛni aɲusɛ watʰi usamuwɛli kuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ nijamɓɔna lɔ uɲuliwɛjɔ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa akukʰɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ajɛ ɛɓantwini ɓɔnkɛ ɓad̤uma ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓatʰi makaɮɛ uɓɔmi usamuwɛli walitʰɛtʰa ɛɓantwini isikɔ lɔɓukumkani walib̤ala ɛŋǀwad̤ini wajiɓɛka pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a usamuwɛli waɓand̤ulula aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓaja ɛlɔwɔ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ najɛ usawulɛ waja ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha lahamɓa najɛ ikǃɛla ɛlinɔɓuk͡xɔti ɛlintliz̤ijɔ z̤ikǀʰukuɲisiwɛjɔ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ kɛ ɓɔna aɓanɡ̤amat͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔ ɓatʰi wɔtʰini ukusisind̤isa lɔ ɓamd̤ɛla aɓamz̤isɛla mnikɛlɔ jɛna wanɡ̤a akɛv̤a kɛ kalɔku wɛɲuka unahaʃɛ umamɔn wajiŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a ijab̤ɛʃɛ jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i atʰi ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a asɛjab̤ɛʃɛ kunahaʃɛ simisɛlɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ sikukʰɔnz̤ɛ watʰi kuwɔ unahaʃɛ umamɔn nd̤ija kunimisɛla umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɔkutʰi nd̤inik͡xuk͡xɛ nɔnkɛ ilisɔ lasɛkunɛnɛ nd̤ikuɓɛkɛ ɔkɔ pʰɛz̤u kwamasirajɛli ɔnkɛ kuɓɛ sisiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ atʰi kujɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu asɛjab̤ɛʃɛ sijɛkɛ iint͡suku ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ sitʰumɛ aɓatʰuɲwa ɛmid̤ɛni jɔnkɛ jakwasirajɛli sitʰi ukuɓa akuɓanɡ̤akʰɔ usisind̤isajɔ sipʰumɛ siz̤ɛ kuwɛ ɓafika aɓatʰuɲwa ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha jakwasawulɛ ɓawatʰɛtʰa lɔɔ maz̤wi ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤aɓantu ɓalipʰakamisa ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu iz̤wi laɓɔ ɓalila nankɔ usawulɛ ɛhamɓa ɛmv̤a kwɛɛnkɔmɔ ɛv̤ɛla ɛz̤inɮɛ watʰi usawulɛ ɓanantɔni aɓantu ɓɛlila nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɓamkǁɛlɛla kɛ amaz̤wi amad̤ɔd̤a asɛjab̤ɛʃɛ umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a wamfikɛla nɡ̤amanɮa usawulɛ ɛkuwav̤ɛni kwakʰɛ maz̤wi wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ kunɛnɛ watʰaɓatʰa iinkɔmɔ z̤amɓini waz̤itʲatʲa watʰumɛla ɛmid̤ɛni jɔnkɛ jakwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛsanɮa saɓatʰuɲwa ɛsitʰi ɔnɡ̤atʰanɡ̤a apʰumɛ aland̤ɛlɛ usawulɛ aland̤ɛlɛ usamuwɛli z̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤iwa nd͡ʒ̤ɛ iinkɔmɔ z̤akʰɛ aɓantu ɓafikɛlwa kukunkwantʲa nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɓapʰuma nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤and̤ɔd̤aɲɛ waɓaɓala ɛb̤ɛz̤ɛki ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓanɡ̤amawaka anɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰatʰu namad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a anɡ̤amawaka anɡ̤amaʃumi amatʰatʰu ɓatʰi kuɓatʰuɲwa aɓafikilɛjɔ jit͡ʃɔni kumad̤ɔd̤a asɛjab̤ɛʃɛ jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i ukutʰi nɡ̤ɔmsɔ ukufud̤umala kwɛlanɡ̤a nija kukʰululwa ɓɛmka aɓatʰuɲwa ɓawakǁɛlɛla amad̤ɔd̤a asɛjab̤ɛʃɛ av̤uja kɛ atʰi amad̤ɔd̤a asɛjab̤ɛʃɛ nɡ̤ɔmsɔ sija kupʰuma siz̤ɛ nɛnz̤ɛ kutʰi nɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛnu kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ usawulɛ waɓamisa aɓantu ɓaz̤iz̤iɬwɛlɛ ɛz̤itʰatʰu ɓafika pʰakatʰi kwɛmpi nɡ̤ɔmlind̤ɔ wɔkusa ɓawaɓulala amaamɔn jad̤a jafud̤umala kwatʰi asɛlɛjɔ apʰanɡ̤alaliswa kuwɔ nɔkuɓa aɓɛ maɓini nd̤awɛniɲɛ ɓatʰi aɓantu kusamuwɛli nɡ̤ɔɔɓanina aɓɔ ɓaɓɛsitʰi usawulɛ uja kuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kutʰi waz̤isɛni lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a siwaɓulalɛ watʰi usawulɛ makunɡ̤aɓulawa nam̤la nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nam̤la ujɛhɔv̤a wɛnz̤ɛ usind̤isɔ kwasirajɛli watʰi usamuwɛli ɛɓantwini hamɓani sijɛ ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali siɓusunɡ̤ulɛ kʰɔna uɓukumkani ɓaja kɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali ɓamɛnz̤a usawulɛ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali apʰɔ waɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla apʰɔ imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔkǁɔlɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɓav̤uja kunɛnɛ apʰɔ ɔɔsawulɛ namad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ akwasirajɛli watʰi usamuwɛli kumasirajɛli ɔnkɛ jaɓɔnani nd̤ilipʰulapʰulɛ iz̤wi lɛnu nɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ ɛnakutʰɛtʰajɔ nd̤animisɛla kalɔku nankɔ ɛhamɓa pʰamɓi kwɛnu kɛ nd̤alupʰɛlɛ nd̤ijinɡ̤wɛv̤u naɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓam ɓɛnani mna nd̤iɓamɓɛ pʰamɓi kwɛnu kwasɛɓuŋǀinanɛni ɓam unanam̤la nanku nd̤ikʰɔ ŋ̤ǃ̤inani nɡ̤am pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a napʰamɓi kɔmtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa wakʰɛ nd̤atʰaɓatʰa nkɔmɔ kaɓani nd̤atʰaɓatʰa ɛsilɛ likaɓani nd̤akǀud̤isa ɓani nd̤av̤ikiv̤a ɓani nd̤atʰaɓatʰa ɛsanɮɛni sikaɓani ukǀamaɡ̤uʃɔ lɔkumfamɛkisa amɛɬɔ nd̤ɔniɓujisɛla atʰi akusikǀud̤isanɡ̤a akusiv̤ikiv̤anɡ̤a akutʰaɓatʰanɡ̤a ntɔ sanɮɛni watʰi kuɓɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uliŋ̤ǃ̤ina nɡ̤ani nɔmtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa wakʰɛ uliŋ̤ǃ̤ina nam̤la ukuɓa anifumananɡ̤a ntɔ sanɮɛni ɓatʰi uliŋ̤ǃ̤ina watʰi usamuwɛli ɛɓantwini nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɔwɛnz̤a ɔɔmɔsɛs nɔarɔn ɔwɛɲusa ɔɔjiɬɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa kalɔku kɛ jimani nd̤imanɡ̤alɛlanɛ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ajɔ jɔnkɛ imisɛɓɛnz̤i jɔɓulunɡ̤isa kajɛhɔv̤a ajɛnz̤ilɛjɔ nakɔɔjiɬɔ kǁɛnikwɛni ujakɔɓi waja ɛjiputa ɓakʰala ɔɔjiɬɔ kujɛhɔv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a watʰuma ɔɔmɔsɛs nɔarɔn ɓaɓakʰupʰa ɔɔjiɬɔ ɛjiputa ɓaɓaɓɛka kulɛ nd̤awɔ ɓamliɓala ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ watʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤aɓɔ ɛsanɮɛni sikasisɛra umtʰɛtʰɛlimkʰɔsi wasɛhat͡sɔrɛ nasɛsanɮɛni samafilisti nakwɛsɔkumkani wakwamɔwab̤i ɓalwa naɓɔ ɓakʰala kujɛhɔv̤a ɓatʰi sɔnilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa samlaɬajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a sakʰɔnz̤a ɔɔb̤ahali nɔɔaʃtarɔti kalɔku kɛ siɬanɡ̤ulɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤ɛtʰu sikukʰɔnz̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a watʰuma ɔɔjɛrub̤ahali nɔb̤ɛd̤an nɔjifɛta nɔsamuwɛli waniɬanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni sɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤ɛnu nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ naɬala nɔnwaɓilɛ kwatʰi nakuɓɔna unahaʃɛ wɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ɛsiz̤a natʰi haji masilawulwɛ nɡ̤ukumkani ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu ɛnɡ̤ukumkani wɛnu nankɔ kɛ ɛnimɲulilɛjɔ ɛnimɓiz̤ilɛjɔ jaɓɔnani ujɛhɔv̤a unimisɛlɛ anaɓa ɓɛnija kumɔjika ujɛhɔv̤a nimkʰɔnz̤ɛ nilipʰulapʰulɛ iliz̤wi lakʰɛ ninɡ̤awupʰikisi umlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a nitʰanɛ mɓɛnd̤ɛ nɔjɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nɔkumkani ɔnilawulajɔ ukuz̤ɛ kulunɡ̤ɛ kɛ ukuɓa anitʰanɡ̤a nilipʰulapʰulɛ iz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa nitʰɛ nawupʰikisa umlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a isanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a sɔnikǀʰasa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa sakǀʰasa ɔɔjiɬɔ nanɡ̤ɔku jimani nijiɓɔnɛ lɛ ntɔ ajɛnz̤ajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a pʰamɓi kwɛnu akuv̤unwa iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa jini nam̤la nd̤ija kuŋǃula ujɛhɔv̤a aɬisɛ iind̤ud̤umɔ nɛmv̤ula naz̤i niɓɔnɛ ukuɓa uɓuɓi ɓɛnu ɓukʰulu ɛniɓɛnz̤ilɛjɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓiz̤a usamuwɛli waŋǃula ujɛhɔv̤a waz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a waɬisa iind̤ud̤umɔ nɛmv̤ula nɡ̤alɔɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓamɔjika kunɛnɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nɔsamuwɛli ɓatʰi ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu kusamuwɛli ɓatʰand̤az̤ɛlɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ ukuz̤ɛ sinɡ̤afi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛz̤ɔnwɛni z̤ɛtʰu sɔnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛ uɓuɓi ɓɔkuɓiz̤a watʰi usamuwɛli ɛɓantwini musani ukɔjika nina niɓɛnz̤ilɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɓɔ ɓuɓi nɔkɔ kɛ ukutʲɛka ɛkumland̤ɛlɛni ujɛhɔv̤a mkʰɔnz̤ɛni ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jɛnu jɔnkɛ iz̤ɛ ninɡ̤atʲɛki nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ninɡ̤aɓa niland̤ɛla iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ililiz̤ɛ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnakuɲusa ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnakuɬanɡ̤ula nɡ̤ɔkuɓa z̤ililiz̤ɛ kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a akaji kuɓaʃija aɓantu ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤ama lakʰɛ ɛlikʰulu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kwakʰɔlɛka kujɛhɔv̤a ukunɛnz̤a aɓantu ɓakʰɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ makuɓɛ lɛɛ ukutʰi nd̤ɔnɛ kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkujɛka ukunitʰand̤az̤ɛla nd̤ɔnijalɛla inɮɛla ɛlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛtʰɛ tʲɛ kɔd̤wa mɔjikɛni ujɛhɔv̤a nimkʰɔnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛɲanisɔ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jɛnu jɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kuɓɔnɛni ɔkukʰulu anɛnz̤ɛlɛ kʰɔna kɛ ukuɓa nipʰikɛlɛ ukwɛnz̤a nitʰɛ nɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi nɔkǀiɲwa kwanɔkumkani wɛnu usawulɛ ɛɓɛnɛmiɲaka ɛz̤ɛlwɛ akuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kumasirajɛli imiɲaka ɛmiɓini usawulɛ waz̤iɲulɛla amatʰatʰu kumasirajɛli amaɓini ajɛnɔsawulɛ ɛmikmas nakwɛlɛɛntaɓa lasɛb̤ɛtɛli ɛliɲɛ lajɛ linɔjɔnatan ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha jakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin aɓantu aɓasɛlɛjɔ waɓand̤ulula ɓaja ɛlɔwɔ ɛntɛntɛni jakʰɛ ujɔnatan wajɔjisa jamafilisti ɛsɛɡ̤ɛb̤a ɛv̤a amafilisti usawulɛ wav̤utʰɛla nɡ̤ɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ ɛsitʰi makɛv̤ɛ amahɛb̤ɛrɛ amasirajɛli ɔnkɛ ɛv̤a kusitʰiwa usawulɛ ujɔjisilɛ jamafilisti kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ amasirajɛli az̤inukisilɛ kumafilisti aɓantu ɓaɬatʲɛlwa umkʰɔsi ɓɛz̤a ɓamland̤ɛla usawulɛ ɓaja ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali amafilisti az̤iɬanɡ̤anisɛla namasirajɛli iiŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa z̤aɓa nɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu naɓamahaʃɛ ɓanɡ̤amawaka amatʰand̤atʰu aɓantu ɓanɡ̤anɡ̤ɛntlaɓatʰi ɛsɛluŋǁwɛmɛni lɔlwanɮɛ ukuɓa ɓaninz̤i aɲuka kɛ iintɛntɛ ɛmikmas pʰamɓi kwɛb̤ɛtav̤ɛn aɓɔna amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli ukuɓa aɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛkilɛ kuɓa aɓantu ɓɛɓɛfinɡ̤iwɛ aɓantu ɓaz̤imɛla ɛmikǃɔlɔmɓɛni nasɛz̤imfantɛni nasɛz̤iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxɛni nasɛmiwɛwɛni nasɛmihad̤ini kɛ kalɔku kwawɛla amahɛb̤ɛrɛ ɛjɔrd̤an aja ɛz̤wɛni lakwaɡ̤ad̤i nɛlasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i kɛ jɛna usawulɛ ɛɓɛsɛsɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓamland̤ɛla ɓɛɡ̤ub̤a walind̤a iint͡suku z̤asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛkǁɛʃa ɛliɓɛ limisiwɛ nɡ̤usamuwɛli usamuwɛli ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali ɓampʰalala aɓantu ɓɛmka kujɛ watʰi usawulɛ z̤isani id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔkǁɔlɔ wɛɲusa id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ kwatʰi kǁa aɡ̤ǃ̤iɓilɛjɔ ukuliɲusa id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nankɔ usamuwɛli ɛfika wapʰuma usawulɛ waja kumkʰawulɛla ukuɓa amɓulisɛ watʰi usamuwɛli jintɔni lɛ ujɛnz̤ilɛjɔ watʰi usawulɛ kunɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛnd̤iɓɔna aɓantu ɓɛnd̤ipʰalala ɓɛsimka nawɛ unɡ̤afiki nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛliɓɛ limisiwɛ namafilisti ɛɬanɡ̤anisɛlana ɛmikmas nd̤atʰi kalɔku amafilisti aja kud̤a ɛɬɛ ɛz̤ɛ ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali nd̤inɡ̤amɓɔnɡ̤ɔz̤anɡ̤a ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤az̤iɲanz̤ɛla nd̤aliɲusa id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ watʰi usamuwɛli kusawulɛ wɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ akuwuɡ̤ǀ̤inanɡ̤a umtʰɛtʰɔ kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ awakuwisɛlajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a anɡ̤ɛ ɛɓuz̤inz̤isilɛ kalɔku uɓukumkani ɓakʰɔ kwasirajɛli kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ uɓukumkani ɓakʰɔ aɓusaji ujɛhɔv̤a uz̤ifunɛlɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤antliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ wajimisa ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa iɓɛ jinɡ̤anɡ̤a jaɓantu ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akukuɡ̤ǀ̤inanɡ̤a ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a akuwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ wɛsuka usamuwɛli wɛɲuka wɛmka ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali waja ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha jakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin usawulɛ waɓaɓala aɓantu aɓafuɲɛnwɛ ɓɛnajɛ ɓɛnɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a akumakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu usawulɛ nɔjɔnatan uɲana wakʰɛ naɓantu aɓafuɲɛnwɛ ɓɛnaɓɔ ɓaɬala ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha jakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin amafilisti iintɛntɛ ɛmikmas kwapʰuma ɛmkʰɔsini wamafilisti ɛnɡ̤amakǃɛla amatʰatʰu ɛliɲɛ ikǃɛla lab̤ɛka nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jasɛɔfra ɛz̤wɛni lakwaʃuwali ɛliɲɛ ikǃɛla lab̤ɛka ɛnɮɛlɛni jasɛb̤ɛtɛhɔrɔn ɛliɲɛ ikǃɛla lab̤ɛka ɛnɮɛlɛni jasɛmd̤ɛni ɔv̤ɛlɛla wɛt͡sɛb̤ɔjim ujɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ kɛ ɓɛkunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ mkʰand̤i ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lakwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa amafilisti ɛɓɛsitʰi aja kuz̤ɛ amahɛb̤ɛrɛ ɛnz̤ɛ amak͡xɛlɛ nɛɛnt͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ amasirajɛli ɔnkɛ aɓɛsiɬa ajɛ kumafilisti alɔlɛ ɛlɔwɔ isikʰali sakʰɛ nɛsit͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ sɛpuluwa jakʰɛ nɛz̤ɛmɓɛ lakʰɛ nɛɡ̤aɓa lakʰɛ z̤akuɓa nɛz̤ikʰɛwu iintlanɡ̤ɔtʰi z̤amaɡ̤aɓa nɛz̤ɛz̤it͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ z̤ɛɛpuluwa nɛz̤ɛɛfɔlɔkʰwɛ nɛz̤amaz̤ɛmɓɛ nɛz̤ɔkuɓaz̤a iimv̤ikɔ kwatʰi kɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɔkulwa akwafuɲanwa k͡xɛlɛ nant͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ ɛsanɮɛni saɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛnɔsawulɛ nɔjɔnatan kɛ kusawulɛ nɔjɔnatan uɲana wakʰɛ ɓɛz̤ikʰɔ kwapʰuma amafilisti ɛkampini aja ɛŋ̤ǁ̤inɡ̤wɛni jasɛmikmas kwatʰi nɡ̤am̤la utʰilɛ ujɔnatan uɲana kasawulɛ watʰi ɔpʰatʰa iintɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ hamɓa sipʰumɛlɛ sijɛ ɛkampini jamafilisti ɛpʰɛʃɛja pʰaja akamkǁɛlɛla ujisɛ usawulɛ kɛ wajɛɬɛli ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha pʰant͡si kɔmxarnatɛ ɔsɛmiɣ̤ɔn aɓantu aɓaɓɛnajɛ ɓaɓɛkumakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu amad̤ɔd̤a ɛnɔahija uɲana kaahitub̤i umkʰuluwa kaikab̤ɔd̤i uɲana kapinɛhasi uɲana kaɛli umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kajɛhɔv̤a ɛʃilɔ ɛŋǁiɓɛ iɛfɔd̤i ɓɛɓɛnɡ̤az̤i aɓantu ukuɓa ujɔnatan ujilɛ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǁ̤inɡ̤wɛni aɓɛfuna ukupʰumɛla kuz̤ɔ ujɔnatan ajɛ ɛkampini jamafilisti ɓɛkukʰɔ it͡sɔlɔ lɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa nɡ̤apʰa kukʰɔ it͡sɔlɔ lɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa nɡ̤apʰaja iɡ̤ama lɛliɲɛ liɓɛ linɡ̤ub̤ɔt͡sɛt͡sɛ iɡ̤ama lɛliɲɛ linɡ̤usɛnɛ ɔkuɲɛ ukut͡sɔla ɓɛkujint͡sika nɡ̤asɛntla malunɡ̤a nɛmikmas ɔkuɲɛ kunɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si malunɡ̤a nɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha watʰi kɛ ujɔnatan lɔwɔ upʰatʰa iintɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ hamɓa sipʰumɛlɛ sijɛ ɛkampini jaɓa ɓanɡ̤alukilɛjɔ m̤lawumɓi ujɛhɔv̤a wɔsisɛɓɛnz̤ɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akukʰɔ sitʰintɛlɔ kujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa asind̤isɛ nɡ̤aɓaninz̤i nanɡ̤aɓamɓalwa watʰi umpʰatʰi wɛɛntɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ kujɛ jɛnz̤a kɔnkɛ ɔkusɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɔ sinɡ̤a pʰaja jaɓɔna nd̤inawɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ watʰi ujɔnatan jaɓɔna sijapʰumɛla sija mad̤ɔd̤a sija kuz̤iɓɔnakalisa kuwɔ ukuɓa atʰɛ kutʰi ɬalani sid̤ɛ siz̤ɛ sija kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ jɛtʰu sinɡ̤ɛɲuki sijɛ kuwɔ ukuɓa atʰɛ ɲukani niz̤ɛ kutʰi sɔɲuka nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uwanikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɛtʰu lɔwɔ wɔɓa nɡ̤umkǃɔnd̤isɔ kutʰi ɓaz̤iɓɔnakalisa ɓɔɓaɓini ɛkampini jamafilisti atʰi amafilisti nanɡ̤a amahɛb̤ɛrɛ ɛpʰuma ɛmiŋ̤ǁ̤uɲɛni aɓɛz̤imɛlɛ kujɔ aɓapʰɛnd̤ula amad̤ɔd̤a asɛkampini ɔɔjɔnatan nɔmpʰatʰi wɛɛntɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ atʰi ɲukani niz̤ɛ kutʰi siniɓɔnisɛ watʰi ujɔnatan kumpʰatʰi wɛɛntɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ ɲuka ɛmv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uwanikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni samasirajɛli wɛɲuka ujɔnatan ɛkʰasa nɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa nɛɛɲawɔ umpʰatʰi wɛɛntɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ ɛsɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ awa pʰamɓi kɔjɔnatan nɔmpʰatʰi wɛɛntɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ ɛsɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ ɛɓulala kwatʰi ukukǁaɓɛla kɔkukǃala awakǁaɓɛla nɡ̤akɔ ujɔnatan nɔmpʰatʰi wɛɛntɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ kwakǁatʲɛlwa amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤atʰi amaʃumi maɓini ɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰɛni sɛnd̤ima ɛjiakilɛ jɛnt͡simi kwaɓakʰɔ umɔtʰukɔ ɛmkʰɔsini nasɛz̤inɮɛ nasɛɓantwini ɓɔnkɛ ɓɔtʰuka naɓɔ waɲikima um̤laɓa jaɓa sisɔtʰusɔ ɛsiv̤ɛla kutʰikǁɔ ɓakʰanɡ̤ɛla aɓaɓɔnisɛli ɓakasawulɛ ɓasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha jakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nant͡sɔ iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ iɲiɓilika jajɛ ikǀʰitʰana jɔd̤wa watʰi usawulɛ ɛɓantwini aɓaɓɛnajɛ kʰaniɓalɛ niɓɔnɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤ɛkʰɔjɔ kutʰi ɓaɓala jini akakʰɔ ujɔnatan nɔmpʰatʰi wɛɛntɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ watʰi usawulɛ kuahija z̤isa apʰa itʲɛja katʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa itʲɛja katʰikǁɔ iɓinɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤alɔɔ kwatʰi ɛsatʰɛtʰa usawulɛ kumɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔz̤ɛlɔ jɛmpi jamafilisti jaja ikʰula watʰi usawulɛ kumɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli siɓujisɛ umv̤a isanɮa sakʰɔ ɓaɬanɡ̤anisana usawulɛ naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛnajɛ ɓaja nalɔ ik͡xɛlɛ lɔmntu kummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ isisakǃunɡ̤ɛ ɛsikʰulu kɛ kalɔku atʰi namahɛb̤ɛrɛ aɓɛkumafilisti nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤apʰamɓili aɓɛɲukɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤a nawɔ ɛmkʰɔsini ɛsuka apʰamɓa nawɔ anɡ̤akumasirajɛli aɓɛnɔsawulɛ nɔjɔnatan kwanamad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ akwasirajɛli aɓɛz̤imɛlɛ kwɛlɛɛntaɓa lakwaɛfrajim ɛv̤a ukuɓa amafilisti asaɓilɛ awaland̤ɛla atʰana mɓɛnd̤ɛ nawɔ ɛkulwɛni ujɛhɔv̤a wawasind̤isa kɛ amasirajɛli nɡ̤alɔɔ ukulwa kwɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa ɛb̤ɛtav̤ɛn amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli ajɛmiɲɛkilɛ kukud̤inwa nɡ̤alɔɔ usawulɛ waɓafunɡ̤isa aɓantu ɛsitʰi ukǃalɛkisiwɛ ɔɮa isɔnka kunɡ̤ɛkaɬwi nd̤id̤ɛ nd̤iz̤ipʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlɛlɛ ɛz̤int͡ʃaɓɛni z̤am ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓaɮa nɛntɔ lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lɛz̤a ɛɬatʰini kwajɛ kukʰɔ uɓusi pʰɛz̤u kɔm̤laɓa ɓafika aɓantu ɛɬatʰini nankɔ kuv̤uz̤a uɓusi akwaɓakʰɔ isanɮa ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓantu ɓaɓɛsɔjika isifunɡ̤ɔ kɛ ujɔnatan uɓɛnɡ̤amv̤anɡ̤a ujisɛ ukuɓafunɡ̤isa kwakʰɛ aɓantu wɛsa iŋǀam jɛntɔnɡ̤a ɛɓisɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ wajifaka ɛŋǃatʰɛni lɔɓusi wasiɓujisɛla ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɛ isanɮa sakʰɛ akǃaɓuka amɛɬɔ akʰɛ japʰɛnd̤ula ind̤ɔd̤a jasɛɓantwini jatʰi ujiɬɔ uɓafunɡ̤isilɛ waɓafunɡ̤isa aɓantu ɛsitʰi ukǃalɛkisiwɛ ɔɮa isɔnka nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ ɓaɓɛtʰɛ ŋǀitʰi aɓantu lipʰanɡ̤ɔ watʰi ujɔnatan uɓawɔ uliɬisɛlɛ iʃwanɡ̤uʃa iliz̤wɛ kʰanikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ amɛɬɔ akǃaɓukilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iv̤ɛ lɛ jɔɓusi ukuɓa ɓaɓɛtʰɛ aɓantu ɓaɮa ɓɛsiɮa nam̤la ɛmakǁʰɔɓɛni ɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ aɓawafumɛnɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛluɓɛkɛ pʰi kɛ ukuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰisɛla ukuɓa lukʰulu nɡ̤ɔku ukǁaɓɛlɔ kumafilisti ɓawakǁaɓɛla nɡ̤alɔɔ amafilisti ɓatʰaɓatʰɛla ɛmikmas ɓɛsa ɛajalɔn ɓɛtʰʲafilɛ kunɛnɛ aɓantu ɓaz̤ipʰɔsa aɓantu ɛmakǁʰɔɓɛni ɓatʰaɓatʰa impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ namatʰɔlɛ ɛɛnkɔmɔ ɓakǁʰɛlɛla ɛm̤laɓɛni aɓantu ɓajiɮa inɛɡ̤az̤i wakǁɛlɛlwa usawulɛ kwatʰiwa ujaɓɔna aɓantu ɓajɔna kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkujiɮa inɛɡ̤az̤i watʰi nit͡ʃiniz̤ilɛ kǃɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlani ilitʲɛ ɛlikʰulu nɡ̤ɔku watʰi usawulɛ jitʰini pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu nitʰi kuɓɔ z̤isani ɛlɔwɔ inkɔmɔ jakʰɛ ɛlɔwɔ iɡ̤uʃa jakʰɛ nikǁʰɛlɛlɛ apʰa niɮɛ ninɡ̤ɔni kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkujiɮa inɛɡ̤az̤i ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓaz̤isa ɛlɔwɔ inkɔmɔ jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku ɓakǁʰɛlɛla kʰɔna usawulɛ wakʰa isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ kujɛhɔv̤a wakǃala nɡ̤asɔ ukwakʰa isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ kujɛhɔv̤a watʰi usawulɛ masiɬɛ siwapʰutʰumɛ amafilisti ɛɓusuku siwapʰanɡ̤ɛ kud̤ɛ kusɛ nɡ̤ɔmsɔ sinɡ̤aʃiji kuwɔ ɓatʰi jɛnz̤a kɔnkɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ watʰi umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli masisɔnd̤ɛlɛ kutʰikǁɔ apʰa usawulɛ waɓuz̤a kutʰikǁɔ ɛsitʰi nd̤iɬɛ nd̤iwaland̤ɛlɛ amafilisti wɔwanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni samasirajɛli akampʰɛnd̤ula lɔɔ watʰi usawulɛ jiz̤ani apʰa nɔnkɛ z̤iɓɔnd̤a z̤aɓantu naz̤i niɓɔnɛ ukuɓa ɛsi sɔnɔ nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔsind̤isɛ amasirajɛli nɔkuɓa siɓɛ sikujɔnatan uɲana uɓɛja akwaɓakʰɔ umpʰɛnd̤ulajɔ ɛɓantwini ɓɔnkɛ watʰi kumasirajɛli ɔnkɛ jiɓani nɡ̤ɛliɲɛ ikǀala nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤ɛliɲɛ ikǀala nɔjɔnatan uɲana ɓatʰi aɓantu kusawulɛ jɛnz̤a ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ watʰi usawulɛ kujɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli v̤ɛlisa iɲanisɔ kwatʰatʲatʰwa kɛ ujɔnatan nɔsawulɛ ɓasind̤a aɓantu watʰi usawulɛ jɛnz̤ani amakǃaʃisɔ nɔjɔnatan uɲana kwatʰatʲatʰwa kɛ ujɔnatan watʰi usawulɛ kujɔnatan nd̤ikǁɛlɛlɛ jintɔni lɛ ntɔ ujɛnz̤ilɛjɔ ujɔnatan wamkǁɛlɛla watʰi nd̤isukɛ nd̤ɛv̤a jɔɓusi nɡ̤ɛŋǀam jɛntɔnɡ̤a ɛɓisɛsanɮɛni nd̤ija watʰi usawulɛ utʰikǁɔ makɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ akǃɔkɛlɛ ukwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ inɛnɛ uja jɔnatan ɓatʰi aɓantu kusawulɛ afɛ ujɔnatan ɔwɛnz̤ɛ ɔlu lusind̤isɔ lukʰulu kwasirajɛli makuɓɛ lɛɛ ɔkɔ ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a akusaji nɔnwɛlɛ lwɛntlɔkɔ jakʰɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa usɛɓɛnz̤isɛnɛ nɔtʰikǁɔ nam̤la ɓamkʰulula kɛ aɓantu ujɔnatan wɛɲuka usawulɛ ɛkuwaland̤ɛlɛni amafilisti atʰi amafilisti aja kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ jawɔ waɓutʰaɓatʰa kɛ usawulɛ uɓukumkani ɓakwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ amamɔwab̤i nɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn namaɛd̤ɔm nɔɔkumkani ɓasɛt͡sɔb̤a namafilisti watʰi ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ab̤ɛka kuz̤ɔ wawatʲɛla wav̤ɛlisa amanɮa wawakǁaɓɛla amaamalɛki wawaɬanɡ̤ula amasirajɛli ɛsanɮɛni saɓɔ ɓaɓɛwapʰanɡ̤a kɛ kalɔku ɔɔɲana ɓakasawulɛ ɓɛɓɛnɡ̤ɔɔjɔnatan nɔiʃɛv̤i nɔmalɛkiʃuwa kɛ amaɡ̤ama ɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔmɓini nɡ̤awɔ iɡ̤ama lɛjamaz̤iɓulɔ nɡ̤umɛrab̤i iɡ̤ama lɛŋǀi nɡ̤umikali iɡ̤ama lɔmkasawulɛ ɓɛlinɡ̤uahinɔwam intɔmɓi kaahimahat͡sɛ iɡ̤ama lɔmtʰɛtʰɛli wɔmkʰɔsi wakʰɛ ɓɛlinɡ̤uab̤inɛrɛ uɲana kanɛrɛ ujisɛkaz̤i kasawulɛ ujisɛ kasawulɛ uɓɛnɡ̤ukiʃɛ unɛrɛ ujisɛ kaab̤inɛrɛ wajɛnɡ̤uɲana kaab̤ijɛli kwajɛ kunz̤ima namafilisti jɔnkɛ imiɬa kasawulɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ usawulɛ uɓɛsitʰi akuɓɔna ind̤ɔd̤a ɛliɡ̤ɔxa nɔkuɓa jijipʰi nɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛnɔɓuk͡xɔti nɔkuɓa jijipʰi ajitʰaɓatʰɛlɛ kujɛ watʰi usamuwɛli kusawulɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wand̤itʰuma ukuɓa nd̤ikutʰamɓisɛ uɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani kuɓantu ɓakʰɛ kumasirajɛli wapʰulapʰulɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ amaz̤wi kajɛhɔv̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi nd̤ikukʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ amaamalɛki kumasirajɛli ɔkɔkuɓa awatʰintɛlajɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni ɛkuɲukɛni kwawɔ ɛjiputa jija nɡ̤ɔkɔ uwakǁaɓɛlɛ amaamalɛki nikusinɡ̤ɛlɛ pʰant͡si kɔnkɛ anakɔ ninɡ̤awakǀɔnɡ̤i uz̤ɛ uɓulalɛ utʰaɓatʰɛla kwind̤ɔd̤a usɛ kwinkaz̤ana utʰaɓatʰɛla kɔluɲulwɛjɔ usɛ kɔwaɲajɔ utʰaɓatʰɛla kwinkɔmɔ usɛ kwimv̤u utʰaɓatʰɛla kwinkamɛla usɛ kwiɛsilɛ waɓaɓiz̤a kɛ aɓantu waɓaɓala ɛtɛlajim amaɓini amakʰulu ɔmkǃikɛla aliʃumi amad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a usawulɛ kumz̤i wamaamalɛki walalɛla ɛsiɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni watʰi usawulɛ kumakɛni hamɓani niɬɛ nimkɛ kumaamalɛki ɬɛz̤ɛ nd̤inikǃukɛ nawɔ naɓɛnz̤ɛla iŋǀɛɓa ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛkuɲukɛni kwaɓɔ ɛjiputa ɛmka kɛ amakɛni kumaamalɛki usawulɛ wawakǁaɓɛla amaamalɛki watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛhav̤ila wad̤a waja ɛʃurɛ ɛkʰanɡ̤ɛlɛnɛ nɛjiputa wamɓamɓa uaɡ̤aɡ̤i wamaamalɛki ɛɬɛli waɓasinɡ̤ɛla pʰant͡si ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ usawulɛ naɓantu ɓamsind̤isa uaɡ̤aɡ̤i nɛjɔna ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ nɛjalɛkɛlwajɔ nɛɛmv̤ana iz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ aɓav̤uma ukuz̤isinɡ̤ɛla pʰant͡si z̤ɔna kɛ jɔnkɛ impaɬa ɛd̤ɛlɛkilɛjɔ ɛɡ̤ǁ̤uɡ̤ǁ̤ilɛjɔ ɓajisinɡ̤ɛla pʰant͡si lafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kusamuwɛli lisitʰi nd̤ijaz̤ɔɬwaja nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa nd̤imɛnz̤ilɛ usawulɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓujilɛ ɛkund̤iland̤ɛlɛni akalifɛz̤a iliz̤wi wav̤utʰa nɡ̤umsind̤ɔ usamuwɛli wakʰala kujɛhɔv̤a uɓusuku ɓɔnkɛ wav̤uka usamuwɛli waja kukʰawulɛla usawulɛ wakǁɛlɛlwa usamuwɛli kwatʰiwa usawulɛ uz̤ɛɛkarmɛlɛ nankɔ ɛz̤imisɛlɛ isikʰumɓuz̤ɔ ɛd͡ʒ̤ikɛ wɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa wɛɬa waja ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali usamuwɛli waja kusawulɛ usawulɛ watʰi kujɛ mawusikɛlɛlwɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ilifɛz̤ilɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a watʰi usamuwɛli lijintɔni ɛli liz̤wi lɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ lisɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤am nɔku kukʰɔɲa kwɛɛnkɔmɔ nd̤ikuv̤ajɔ watʰi usawulɛ z̤ɛz̤i ɓav̤ɛla naz̤ɔ kumaamalɛki nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓantu ɓajisind̤isilɛ ɛjɔna ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ ɛz̤iɲɛ saz̤isinɡ̤ɛla pʰant͡si watʰi usamuwɛli kusawulɛ jɛka nd̤ikukǁɛlɛlɛ akutʰɛtʰilɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔɓu ɓusuku watʰi kujɛ tʰɛtʰa watʰi usamuwɛli akuɓanɡ̤a jintlɔkɔ jɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤akwasirajɛli jini uz̤ɛjilɛ wɛna wakutʰamɓisa ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kumasirajɛli ujɛhɔv̤a wakutʰuma nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla watʰi hamɓa ujɛ kut͡ʃaɓalalisa aɓɔni aɓɔ amaamalɛki ulwɛ nawɔ ud̤ɛ uwaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ jini kɛ ukuɓa unɡ̤alipʰulapʰuli iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a usukɛ uz̤ipʰɔsɛ ɛmakǁʰɔɓɛni wɛnz̤ɛ ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a watʰi usawulɛ kusamuwɛli haji nd̤ilipʰulapʰulɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nd̤ahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla aɓɛnd̤itʰumɛ nɡ̤ajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤amz̤isa uaɡ̤aɡ̤i wamaamalɛki nd̤awat͡ʃaɓalalisa amaamalɛki ɓɛsuka aɓantu ɓatʰaɓatʰa ɛmakǁʰɔɓɛni impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ nɛjɔna inɛntlaɬa kwiz̤intɔ ɛz̤isinɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰant͡si ukuz̤ɛ ɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali watʰi usamuwɛli ujɛhɔv̤a unɔnɛlɛlɛ amad̤ini aɲukajɔ nɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɡ̤anɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛnɔnɛlɛlɛ ukupʰulapʰulwa kwɛz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a jini jaɓɔna ukupʰulapʰula kulunɡ̤ilɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɔkuɓaz̤a iinɮɛɓɛ kulunɡ̤ilɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwamaŋǃatʰa ɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukuɓa nɛɛnkani kusisɔnɔ ɛsind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuv̤umisa uɓuŋ̤ǃ̤ɔla ɓund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnkɔnz̤ɔ jɛz̤itʰikǁɔ nɛmilɔnd̤ɛkʰaja nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa ulikǀɛkisilɛ iliz̤wi
