likajɛhɔv̤a najɛ ukukǀɛkisilɛ ukuɓa unɡ̤aɓi watʰi usawulɛ kusamuwɛli nd̤ɔnilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iɡ̤ǃ̤itʰilɛ ɛmtʰɛtʰwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nasɛliz̤wini lakʰɔ kuɓa ɓɛnd̤isɔjika aɓantu nd̤apʰulapʰula iz̤wi laɓɔ kʰawusikǁɔlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ isɔnɔ ɓuja nd̤ijɛ nd̤imŋǃulɛ ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi usamuwɛli kusawulɛ and̤iji kuɓuja nawɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ulikǀɛkisilɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a najɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ukukǀɛkisilɛ ukuɓa unɡ̤aɓi kumasirajɛli watʰi akutʰi ɡ̤ukǃukǃu usamuwɛli ukuɓa ɛmkɛ waɓamɓa isɔnd̤ɔ lɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ jɔkwalɛka lak͡xaz̤uka watʰi usamuwɛli kujɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ukuk͡xaz̤ulɛ kuwɛ nam̤la uɓukumkani ɓakwasirajɛli waɓunika ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɔ ɔlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kunawɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ukǃɛlɛlikasirajɛli akakǁɔki akaz̤ɔɬwaji nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akanɡ̤umntu ukuɓa az̤ɔɬwajɛ watʰi jɛna nd̤ɔnilɛ wɔsɛwund̤iz̤ukisa pʰamɓi kwamad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu aɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu napʰamɓi kwamasirajɛli uɓujɛ nd̤imŋǃulɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ waɓuja kɛ usamuwɛli waland̤ɛla usawulɛ usawulɛ wamŋǃula ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi usamuwɛli mz̤isɛni apʰa uaɡ̤aɡ̤i wamaamalɛki waja uaɡ̤aɡ̤i kujɛ ɛkǀʰwajitʰilɛ watʰi uaɡ̤aɡ̤i inɛnɛ ɓuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰilɛ uɓuk͡xak͡xa ɓɔkufa watʰi usamuwɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa ik͡xɛlɛ lakʰɔ laɓaɬutʰajɔ aɓafaz̤i aɓantwana ɓaɓɔ uja kwɛnd͡ʒ̤iwa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ uɲɔkɔ pʰakatʰi kwaɓafaz̤i ukuɬutʰwa aɓantwana usamuwɛli wamkǁʰakǁʰa uaɡ̤aɡ̤i pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali waja usamuwɛli ɛrama usawulɛ wɛɲuka waja ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha jakwasawulɛ usamuwɛli akaɓujanɡ̤a aɓɔnanɛ nɔsawulɛ kwad̤a kwajimini jɔkufa kwakʰɛ kuɓa usamuwɛli wamlilɛla usawulɛ waz̤ɔɬwaja ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa ɛɓɛmɛnz̤ɛ usawulɛ kwasirajɛli watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kusamuwɛli uja kumlilɛla kud̤ɛ kuɓɛ usawulɛ nd̤imkǀɛkisilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓa anɡ̤aɓi kumasirajɛli z̤alisa isiɡ̤ɔɮɔ sakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛɔli uhamɓɛ nd̤ija kukutʰumɛla kujɛsɛ wasɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iz̤iɓɔnɛlɛ kɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ watʰi usamuwɛli nd̤ɔtʰini ukuja usawulɛ uja kuv̤a and̤iɓulalɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a tʰaɓatʰa itʰɔkaz̤i lɛnkɔmɔ ujɛ nalɔ utʰi nd̤iz̤ɛ kuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla kujɛhɔv̤a ummɛmɛlɛ ɛmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni ujɛsɛ nd̤ɔkwaz̤isa intɔ ɔwɔjɛnz̤a und̤itʰamɓisɛlɛ ɛnd̤ija kutʰɛtʰa kuwɛ nɡ̤ajɛ wakwɛnz̤a usamuwɛli akutʰɛtʰilɛjɔ waja ɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm ɔtʰuka kɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ɔmz̤i ɛz̤a kumkʰawulɛla atʰi uz̤a ukǁɔlilɛ watʰi nd̤ikǁɔlilɛ nd̤iz̤ɛ kuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla kujɛhɔv̤a z̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛni niz̤ɛ ɛmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni wamŋ̤ǀ̤walisa ujɛsɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ waɓamɛmɛla ɛmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni kwatʰi ɛkuz̤ɛni kwaɓɔ waɓɔna uɛlijab̤i watʰi inɛnɛ upʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a umtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa wakʰɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kusamuwɛli musa ukukʰanɡ̤ɛla imɓɔnakalɔ jakʰɛ nɔkupʰakama kwɛsitʰɔmɔ sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤imkǀɛkisilɛ and̤ikʰanɡ̤ɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkukʰanɡ̤ɛla kɔmntu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukʰanɡ̤ɛla umpʰanɮɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ukʰanɡ̤ɛla intliz̤ijɔ ujɛsɛ waɓiz̤a uab̤inad̤ab̤i wamɡ̤ǃ̤itʰisa pʰamɓi kɔsamuwɛli watʰi nalɔ ujɛhɔv̤a akamɲulanɡ̤a ujɛsɛ waɡ̤ǃ̤itʰisa uʃama watʰi nalɔ ujɛhɔv̤a akamɲulanɡ̤a ujɛsɛ waɡ̤ǃ̤itʰisa kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ aɓasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ pʰamɓi kɔsamuwɛli watʰi usamuwɛli kujɛsɛ aɓa ujɛhɔv̤a akaɓaɲulanɡ̤a watʰi usamuwɛli kujɛsɛ awɔnkɛ amakʰwɛnkwɛ akʰɔ watʰi kusasɛlɛ ɛŋǀinanɛ nant͡sɔ impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ watʰi usamuwɛli kujɛsɛ tʰumɛla ijɛ kuɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa asiji kuɬala ɛsiɮwɛni id̤ɛ ifikɛ apʰa watʰumɛla wajiz̤isa jajɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔmɓɔ ɛmaɬɛ amɛɬɔ ajɔ intlɛ nɛmɓɔnakalɔ jajɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a suka umɛ umtʰamɓisɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ujɛ lɔ usamuwɛli watʰaɓatʰa isiɡ̤ɔɮɔ sɛɔli wamtʰamɓisa ɛsɛsaz̤ulwini saɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a wamfikɛla nɡ̤amanɮa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukususɛla kulɔɔ wɛsuka kɛ usamuwɛli waja ɛrama kɛ umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a wɛmka kusawulɛ wad̤and̤atʰɛkiswa nɡ̤umɔja ɔmɓi ɔpʰuma kujɛhɔv̤a ɓatʰi aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakasawulɛ kujɛ jaɓɔna ud̤and̤atʰɛkiswa nɡ̤umɔja ɔmɓi ɔpʰuma kutʰikǁɔ inkɔsi jɛtʰu majitʰɛtʰɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ aɓapʰamɓi kwakʰɔ ɓajɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛkwaz̤ijɔ ukuɓɛtʰa uhad̤i kutʰi wakuɓa pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ umɔja ɔmɓi ɔpʰuma kutʰikǁɔ iluɓɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sajɔ kulunɡ̤ɛ kuwɛ watʰi usawulɛ kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ kʰanind̤ikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛɓɛtʰa kamnand̤i nijiz̤isɛ wapʰɛnd̤ula ɔmɲɛ watʰi jaɓɔna nd̤iɓɔnɛ uɲana kajɛsɛ wasɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm ɔkwaz̤ijɔ ukuɓɛtʰa liɡ̤ɔxa ɛlinɔɓuk͡xɔti ind̤ɔd̤a jɔkulwa ikǀikɔ lɔkutʰɛtʰa umfɔ ɔm̤lɛ ujɛhɔv̤a unajɛ usawulɛ watʰuma aɓatʰuɲwa kujɛsɛ watʰi mtʰumɛlɛ ɛz̤ɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ uɲana wakʰɔ ɔsɛmpaɬɛni ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ ujɛsɛ watʰaɓatʰa iɛsilɛ kuɓɔt͡ʃɛlɛlwɛ iz̤ɔnka kulɔ nɛnt͡suɓa jɛwajini nɛtakanɛ laliɲɛ lɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ watʰumɛla nɡ̤ɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ uɲana wakʰɛ kusawulɛ wɛz̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kusawulɛ wɛma pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ wamtʰand̤a kakʰulu waɓa nɡ̤umpʰatʰi wɛɛntɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ watʰumɛla usawulɛ kujɛsɛ ɛsitʰi makɛmɛ pʰamɓi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuɓa uɓaɓalwɛ nd̤im kwatʰi umɔja ɔmɓi katʰikǁɔ kusawulɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰaɓatʰa uhad̤i waɓɛtʰa nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɛ kwɛɛ kǃaɓu kusawulɛ kwalunɡ̤a kujɛ wɛmka kujɛ umɔja ɔmɓi kɛ kalɔku amafilisti ajiɬanɡ̤anisa imikʰɔsi jawɔ ukuɓa alwɛ ajiɬanɡ̤anisɛla ɛsɔkɔ ɛkwajud̤a pʰakatʰi kwɛsɔkɔ nɛaz̤ɛka ɛɛfɛsɛd̤amim usawulɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli aɬanɡ̤anisana ɛntilini kaɛla akʰa uluɬu lɔkulwa ukuɓa awaɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤ɛ amafilisti amafilisti ɛma nɡ̤asɛntaɓɛni nɡ̤apʰa amasirajɛli ɛma nɡ̤asɛntaɓɛni nɡ̤apʰa upʰakatʰi kwawɔ kwapʰuma ɛmpini jamafilisti ind̤ɔd̤a ɛfuna und̤ikʰɔ ɛɡ̤ama linɡ̤uɡ̤ɔlijati wasɛɡ̤ati ɛɓud̤ɛ ɓuz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intand̤atʰu ɛz̤inɔmɔlulɔ wɛminwɛ ɛnɛsiɡ̤ǀ̤inantlɔkɔ sɔb̤ɛd̤u ɛntlɔkɔ jamɓɛtʰɛ inɡ̤uɓɔ jɛnt͡simɓi uɓunz̤ima ɓɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jɛnt͡simɓi ɓuz̤iiʃɛkɛlɛ z̤ɔb̤ɛd̤u ɛz̤imawaka maɬanu ɛnɛɛnt͡sɛkɛlɛz̤anɛ z̤ɔb̤ɛd̤u ɛmilɛnz̤ɛni nɔmkʰɔntɔ wɔb̤ɛd̤u pʰakatʰi kwamaɡ̤ǁ̤a ajɔ ulutʰi lwɛnt͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ jajɔ ɓɛlunɡ̤anɡ̤ɔmtʰi waɓaluki int͡simɓi jɛnt͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ jajɔ iɓiz̤iiʃɛkɛlɛ ɛz̤imakʰulu matʰand̤atʰu ɛsiɲitʰi kuhamɓa umpʰatʰi wɛkʰaka pʰamɓi kwajɔ jɛma jamɛmɛz̤a kwiz̤intlu z̤akwasirajɛli jatʰi kuz̤ɔ jini ukuɓa nipʰumɛ nakʰɛ uluɬu lɔkulwa and̤inɡ̤ujɛ umfilisti najɛ ninɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakasawulɛ z̤ikʰɛtʰɛlɛni ind̤ɔd̤a iɬɛ iz̤ɛ ukuɓa itʰɛ janakɔ jand̤iɓulala sɔɓa nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤ajɛjisa nd̤ajiɓulala nɔɓa nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i kutʰi nisikʰɔnz̤ɛ watʰi umfilisti mna nd̤ijaz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a nam̤la iz̤intlu z̤akwasirajɛli nd̤ikʰupʰɛlɛni ind̤ɔd̤a silwɛ sɔɓaɓini ɔɔsawulɛ namasirajɛli ɔnkɛ ɓawɛv̤a amaz̤wi alɔ mfilisti ɓatʰi kǃʰipʰu umɓilini ɓɔjika kunɛnɛ kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wajɛ ɛnɡ̤uɲana walɔɔ mɛfrata wasɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm jakwajud̤a uɡ̤ama linɡ̤ujɛsɛ uɲana ɓasib̤ɔz̤ɔ uɓɛjind̤ɔd̤a ɛjalupʰɛlɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kasawulɛ ɛmd̤ala kakʰulu pʰakatʰi kwamaɲɛ amad̤ɔd̤a ɓaɓɛjɛ ɛkulwɛni ɔɔɲana aɓatʰatʰu ɓakajɛsɛ aɓakʰulu ɓɛmland̤ɛla usawulɛ amaɡ̤ama ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ aɓatʰatʰu aɓaɓɛjɛ nɡ̤uɛlijab̤i ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ nɡ̤uab̤inad̤ab̤i ɔwɛsitʰatʰu nɡ̤uʃama ud̤av̤id̤ɛ uɓɛnɡ̤ɔmŋǀinanɛ aɓakʰulu ɓɔɓatʰatʰu ɓaɓɛland̤ɛlɛ usawulɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ uɓɛsija aɓujɛ kusawulɛ ukuɓa alusɛ impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ kajisɛ ɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm umfilisti lɔwɔ wɛz̤a nanɡ̤ɔkuɬwa wɛma imiɬa ɛmaʃumi manɛ watʰi ujɛsɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ uɲana wakʰɛ kʰawupʰatʰɛlɛ aɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɔ iɛfa jamakʰwɛɓa nɛz̤ɔnka ɛz̤i z̤iliʃumi uɡ̤id̤imɛ ujɛ ɛmkʰɔsini kuɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɔ usɛ nɛz̤ɔnka z̤amasi ɛz̤i z̤iliʃumi kumtʰɛtʰɛliwaka uɓav̤ɛlɛlɛ aɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɔ uɓuz̤ɛ ukupʰila kwaɓɔ utʰaɓatʰɛ isiɓamɓisɔ kuɓɔ usawulɛ kɛ kwanaɓɔ namad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ akwasirajɛli ajɛsɛntilini kaɛla ɛsilwa namafilisti wav̤uka ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ wajiʃija impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɔmɡ̤ǀ̤ini watʰaɓatʰa wahamɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wamwisɛlajɔ ujɛsɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ ɛlutʰanɡ̤wɛni lwɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa umkʰɔsi upʰuma usija ɛluɬwini uɬaɓa umkʰɔsi amasirajɛli namafilisti akʰa iz̤intlu uluɬu lukʰanɡ̤ɛlɛnɛ nɔluɬu ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wajiʃija impaɬa jakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɔmɡ̤ǀ̤ini wɛmpaɬa waɓalɛka waja ɛluɬwini waɓaɓuz̤a aɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ ukupʰila kwaɓɔ akuɓɔn ukuɓa ujatʰɛtʰa naɓɔ nant͡sɔ iɲuka ind̤ɔd̤a ɛfuna und̤ikʰɔ umfilisti wasɛɡ̤ati ɛɡ̤ama linɡ̤uɡ̤ɔlijati iv̤ɛla ɛz̤intlwini z̤amafilisti jatʰɛtʰa maz̤wi wɛv̤a kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli akujiɓɔna ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ asaɓa ɛɓuswɛni ɓajɔ ɔjika kunɛnɛ atʰi amasirajɛli nijiɓɔnilɛ lɛ nd̤ɔd̤a iɲukajɔ kuɓa iɲuka isiz̤a kuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a amasirajɛli jɔtʰi ind̤ɔd̤a ɛtʰɛ jajiɓulala itʲɛtʲiswɛ nɡ̤ukumkani nɡ̤ɔɓutʲɛɓi ɔɓukʰulu ajinikɛ intɔmɓi jakʰɛ ajɛnz̤ɛ inɮu kajisɛ ikʰululɛkɛ kwasirajɛli watʰɛtʰa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kumad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛmi nɡ̤akujɛ watʰi jɔtʰiwani ind̤ɔd̤a ɛmɓulɛlɛjɔ lɔ mfilisti jajisusa iŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ kwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɡ̤uɓani umfilisti lɛ ntɔ inɡ̤alukilɛjɔ ukuɓa ad̤ɛ aŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɛ iz̤intlu z̤ikatʰikǁɔ ɔpʰililɛjɔ ɓatʰɛtʰa aɓantu kujɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛlaa liz̤wi ɓatʰi uja kwɛnd͡ʒ̤iwa nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɔmɓulɛlɛjɔ wajɛkuv̤a uɛlijab̤i umkʰuluwa wakʰɛ ukutʰɛtʰa kwakʰɛ namad̤ɔd̤a wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ kaɛlijab̤i kud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi uɬɛlɛni ujiʃijɛ naɓani mpaɬa imfut͡ʃanɛ imɓalwa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nd̤ijakwaz̤i ukukʰukʰumala kwakʰɔ nɔɓuɓi ɓɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɬɛ uz̤ɛ kuɓɔnɛla watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nd̤ɛnz̤ɛni nɡ̤ɔku ɓɛnd̤iɓuz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛ kɔd̤wa wɛɛ ɡ̤ukǃukǃu wab̤ɛka kɔmɲɛ ɔɓɛmi nɡ̤akujɛ watʰɛtʰa kwaɛlaa liz̤wi aɓantu ɓaɓuja ɓampʰɛnd̤ula kwanɡ̤ɛlaa liz̤wi lɔkukǃala av̤iwa amaz̤wi awawatʰɛtʰajɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ akǁɛlwa pʰamɓi kɔsawulɛ wamtʰaɓatʰa watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kusawulɛ makunɡ̤atʰamɓi ntliz̤ijɔ jamntu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɛ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ uja kuja alwɛ nalɔ mfilisti watʰi usawulɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ akunakuja kulɔ mfilisti ulwɛ najɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa usɛmŋǀinanɛ aɓɛ jɛna ɛjind̤ɔd̤a ɛkǃʰɛlɛ kwasɛɓuŋǀinanɛni ɓakʰɛ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kusawulɛ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ ɛɓɛsalusa impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ kajisɛ inɡ̤ɔɲama nɛb̤ɛrɛ jatʰaɓatʰa ikǁʰwanɛ ɛm̤lamɓini nd̤apʰuma nd̤ajiland̤ɛla nd̤ajiɓɛtʰa nd̤aliɬanɡ̤ula ikǁʰwanɛ ɛmlɔɲɛni wajɔ jɛsuka pʰɛz̤u nd̤ajiɓamɓa nɡ̤ɔd̤ɛv̤u lwajɔ nd̤ajiɓɛtʰa nd̤ajiɓulala umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ wajiɓɛtʰa inɡ̤ɔɲama kwanɛb̤ɛrɛ lɔ mfilisti unɡ̤alukilɛjɔ uja kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɲɛ kuz̤ɔ kɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɛ iz̤intlu z̤ikatʰikǁɔ ɔpʰililɛjɔ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔwand̤iɬanɡ̤ulajɔ ɛtʰupʰɛni lɛnɡ̤ɔɲama nasɛtʰupʰɛni lɛb̤ɛrɛ nɡ̤ujɛ ɔja kund̤iɬanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni salɔ mfilisti watʰi usawulɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ hamɓa kɛ aɓɛ nawɛ ujɛhɔv̤a usawulɛ wamamɓatʰisa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤akʰɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ wamɓɛka isiɡ̤ǀ̤inantlɔkɔ sɔb̤ɛd̤u ɛntlɔkɔ inɡ̤uɓɔ jɛnt͡simɓi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ walib̤iŋǃa ik͡xɛlɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ waz̤ama ukuhamɓa nɡ̤az̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛnɡ̤ɛkaz̤ilinɡ̤i watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kusawulɛ and̤inakɔ ukuhamɓa nɛz̤i z̤intɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa and̤iz̤ilinɡ̤anɡ̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waz̤iɬuɓa watʰaɓatʰa intɔnɡ̤a jakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ waɲula amatʲɛ amaɬanu aɓutʰɛlɛz̤i ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni ɛmpaɬɛni jaɓalusi aɓɛnajɔ ɛjiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwa ɛpʰɛtʰɛ inkwit͡ʃi jakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ wɛz̤a kumfilisti lɔwɔ umfilisti wahamɓa waja ɛsɔnd̤ɛla kud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛpʰatʰa ikʰaka lakʰɛ ihamɓa pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ umfilisti wɔnd̤ɛla wamɓɔna ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wamd̤ɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛsɛnɡ̤umfana ɔjiŋ̤ǃ̤ɔmɓɔ ɛm̤lɛ imɓɔnakalɔ watʰi umfilisti kud̤av̤id̤ɛ nd̤ijind͡ʒ̤a ukuɓa uz̤ɛ unɛɛntɔnɡ̤a umfilisti wamt͡ʃab̤isa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓakʰɛ watʰi umfilisti kud̤av̤id̤ɛ jiz̤a apʰa nd̤ijinikɛ z̤ɛz̤ulu namaxamŋǀwa asɛnɮɛ iɲama jakʰɔ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kumfilisti wɛna uz̤a unɛk͡xɛlɛ nɛnt͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ nɔmkʰɔntɔ kɛ nd̤iz̤a kuwɛ ɛɡ̤amɛni likajɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ wɛz̤intlu z̤akwasirajɛli ɔmŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ilɛjɔ nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uja kukunikɛla ɛsanɮɛni nd̤ikuɓulalɛ nd̤ikuŋǃumlɛ intlɔkɔ nam̤la nd̤iz̤inikɛ z̤ɛz̤ulu namaxamŋǀwa ɔm̤laɓa iz̤id̤umɓu z̤ɔmkʰɔsi wamafilisti waz̤i wɔnkɛ um̤laɓa ukuɓa amasirajɛli anajɛ utʰikǁɔ laz̤i lɔnkɛ ɛli ɓanɮa ukuɓa akunɡ̤ak͡xɛlɛ akunɡ̤ant͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ ukusind̤isa kukajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa imfaz̤wɛ jɛkajɛhɔv̤a wɔninikɛla kɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɛtʰu kwatʰi kǁa asukajɔ umfilisti ɛhamɓa ɛsɔnd̤ɛla ɛsija kum̤lanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wakʰawulɛz̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓalɛkɛla ɛluɬwini ɛsija kum̤lanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a umfilisti ud̤av̤id̤ɛ isanɮa sakʰɛ ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwɛni waxɔla ilitʲɛ kʰɔna wat͡ʃɔ kumfilisti ɛɓunz̤i lat͡ʃɔna ilitʲɛ ɛɓunz̤ini lakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wamɛjisa kɛ umfilisti nɡ̤ɛnkwit͡ʃi nanɡ̤ɛlitʲɛ wat͡ʃɔ kumfilisti wamɓulala kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ k͡xɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sikad̤av̤id̤ɛ waɡ̤id̤ima ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waja wɛma pʰɛz̤u kɔmfilisti walitʰaɓatʰa ik͡xɛlɛ lakʰɛ walixɔla ɛsiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔɓɛni salɔ wamɓulala wamŋǃumla intlɔkɔ aɓɔna kɛ amafilisti ukuɓa lifilɛ iɡ̤ɔxa lawɔ asaɓa asuka amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli nawakwajud̤a ad̤uma awasukɛla amafilisti kwad̤a kwajiwa ɛmfulɛni kwɛsa ɛmasanɡ̤wɛni asɛɛk͡xɔn awa amafilisti aŋ̤ǁ̤wɛlɛxiwɛjɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni jasɛʃaharajim kwɛsa nasɛɡ̤ati kwɛsa nasɛɛk͡xɔn ɓaɓuja ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛkuwasukɛlɛni nɡ̤ɔkuʃuʃu amafilisti ɓaz̤ipʰanɡ̤a iintɛntɛ z̤awɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wajitʰaɓatʰa intlɔkɔ jɔmfilisti wajisa ɛjɛrusalɛm impaɬa jakʰɛ wajiɓɛka ɛntɛntɛni jakʰɛ kǁa usawulɛ ɛɓɛmɓɔna ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛpʰuma ɛsija kum̤lanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a umfilisti watʰi kuab̤inɛrɛ umtʰɛtʰɛlimkʰɔsi wa ab̤inɛrɛ nɡ̤uɲana kaɓani lɔmfana watʰi uab̤inɛrɛ uɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ and̤az̤i watʰi ɓuz̤a ukuɓa inɡ̤uɲana kaɓani lɛ nd̤ɔd̤ana kǁa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓujajɔ ɛkumɓulalɛni umfilisti uab̤inɛrɛ wamtʰaɓatʰa wamz̤isa pʰamɓi kɔsawulɛ ɛpʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa intlɔkɔ jɔmfilisti watʰi usawulɛ kujɛ unɡ̤uɲana kaɓani mfanand̤ini watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nd̤inɡ̤uɲana wɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ujɛsɛ wasɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm kwatʰi kǁa aɡ̤ǃ̤iɓilɛjɔ ukutʰɛtʰa kusawulɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ kajɔnatan waɓɔpʰana nɔmpʰɛfumlɔ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ujɔnatan wamtʰand̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ usawulɛ wamtʰaɓatʰa nɡ̤alɔɔ akamv̤umɛla ukuɓa aɓujɛlɛ ɛnɮwini kajisɛ ɓɛnz̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɔɔjɔnatan nɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkumtʰand̤a kwakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ujɔnatan waz̤iɬuɓa inɡ̤uɓɔ jɔkwalɛka aɓɛnajɔ wajinika ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔkulwa kwɛsa nakwik͡xɛlɛ lakʰɛ nakwisapʰɛtʰa sakʰɛ nakumb̤iŋǃɔ wakʰɛ wapʰuma ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waja apʰɔ watʰuɲwa kʰɔna nɡ̤usawulɛ wɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ usawulɛ pʰɛz̤u kwamad̤ɔd̤a ɔkulwa walunɡ̤a ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ nasɛmɛɬwɛni aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakasawulɛ kwatʰi ɛkufikɛni kwaɓɔ ɛkuɓujɛni kukad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛkumɓulalɛni umfilisti ɓapʰuma aɓafaz̤i ɛmiz̤ini jɔnkɛ jakwasirajɛli ɓɛv̤uma inɡ̤ɔma ɓɛŋ̤ǃ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤a ɓɛsiz̤a kumkʰawulɛla usawulɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔ nanɡ̤ɔv̤ujɔ nanɡ̤ɛɛtrijanɡ̤ilɛ ɓav̤uma aɓafaz̤i aɓakǃamɓajɔ ɓatʰi usawulɛ uɓulɛlɛ akʰɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ uɓulɛlɛ akʰɛ anɡ̤amaʃumi usawulɛ wav̤utʰa kunɛnɛ nɡ̤umsind̤ɔ laliɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ ɛlɔ liz̤wi watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɓamnikɛ aliʃumi ɓand̤inikɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ sɛkusɛlɛ ukutʰi uɓukumkani ɓuɓɛ ɓɔɓakʰɛ usawulɛ waɬala ɛmɡ̤ǁ̤ɛlɛʃilɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kususɛla kulɔɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ umɔja ɔmɓi katʰikǁɔ wamfikɛla nɡ̤amanɮa usawulɛ waɡ̤ɛz̤a ɛnɮwini ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛɓɛtʰa uhad̤i nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmiɬa int͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ isɛsanɮɛni sikasawulɛ usawulɛ waɓinz̤a nɡ̤ɛnt͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ watʰi nd̤ija kumkǃʰama nɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wapʰɛpʰa iz̤iɬanɮɔ z̤az̤iɓini pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ usawulɛ wamɔjika ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɓɛnajɛ ɛmkilɛ kusawulɛ usawulɛ kujɛ wanɡ̤umtʰɛtʰɛli wakʰɛ wɛwaka wapʰuma ɛnɡ̤ɛna pʰamɓi kwaɓantu ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ ɛz̤inɮɛlɛni z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wajɛ ɛnajɛ waɓɔna usawulɛ ukuɓa unɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ ɛnkulu waŋǁunɡ̤upʰala ɓuɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ kɛ ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli namajud̤a ɛɓɛmtʰand̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛpʰuma ɛnɡ̤ɛna pʰamɓi kwawɔ watʰi usawulɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ nant͡sɔ intɔmɓi jam ɛnkulu umɛrab̤i nd̤ija iɓɛ nɡ̤umkakʰɔ kɔd̤wa jiɓa nɡ̤umfɔ ɔnɔɓuk͡xɔti ulwɛ iimfaz̤wɛ z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a usawulɛ ɛɓɛsitʰi makunɡ̤afiki ɛsam isanɮa kujɛ makufikɛ ɛsamafilisti isanɮa kujɛ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kusawulɛ nd̤inɡ̤uɓani ajintɔni amakɔwɛtʰu ijini imiz̤alwanɛ kaɓawɔ kwasirajɛli ukuɓa nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤umjɛni kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkuɓa umɛrab̤i intɔmɓi kasawulɛ anikwɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ uad̤rijɛli wasɛmɛhɔla ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤umkakʰɛ umikali intɔmɓi kasawulɛ jamtʰand̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wakǁɛlɛlwa usawulɛ jalunɡ̤a lɔɔ ntɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ watʰi usawulɛ nd̤ija jɔna iɓɛ nɡ̤umɡ̤iɓɛ kujɛ siɓɛ kujɛ isanɮa samafilisti watʰi usawulɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ uja kuɓa nɡ̤umjɛni nam̤la nɡ̤anɮɛla mɓini usawulɛ waɓawisɛla aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ watʰi tʰɛtʰani nɡ̤asɛsɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ nitʰi jaɓɔna ukunanz̤ilɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓajakutʰand̤a kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ jiɓa nɡ̤umjɛni ɓawatʰɛtʰa aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakasawulɛ lɔɔ maz̤wi ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤ikad̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ jintɔ ɛlula ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛnu ukuɓa nɡ̤umjɛni nd̤ijind̤ɔd̤a ɛliɬwɛmpu nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤ilula nd͡ʒ̤ɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakasawulɛ ɓamkǁɛlɛla ɓɛsitʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ utʰɛtʰɛ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ watʰi usawulɛ jit͡ʃɔni kud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukutʰi ukumkani akananz̤ɛ kʰaz̤i linɡ̤aɓa likʰulu lɛɛɲama z̤ɔkwaluswa z̤amafilisti ukuɓa az̤ipʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlɛlɛ ɛz̤int͡ʃaɓɛni z̤ɔkumkani kɛ usawulɛ uɓɛkǀinɡ̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa samafilisti aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓamkǁɛlɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ lɔɔ maz̤wi jalunɡ̤a lɔɔ ntɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤umjɛni kɛ kalɔku imiɬa iɓinɡ̤ɛkaz̤alisɛki wɛsuka ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waja jɛna namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ waɓulala kumafilisti amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waz̤iz̤isa iiɲama z̤ɔkwaluswa z̤awɔ waz̤inika z̤inɡ̤anɡ̤ɔkɔ z̤inɡ̤akɔ ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤umjɛni usawulɛ kɛ umikali intɔmɓi jakʰɛ janɡ̤umkakʰɛ wakuɓɔna usawulɛ wakwaz̤i ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɓɛnɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ umikali intɔmɓi kasawulɛ uɓɛmtʰand̤a usawulɛ wamɔjika ɔkuɲɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ usawulɛ waɓa lut͡ʃaɓa kud̤av̤id̤ɛ imiɬa jɔnkɛ ɓapʰuma aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamafilisti kwatʰi ɓakupʰuma ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɔnkɛ ɓakasawulɛ laŋǀɔɲwa kunɛnɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ watʰɛtʰa usawulɛ kujɔnatan uɲana wakʰɛ nakuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ ukuɓa ɓamɓulalɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kɛ ujɔnatan uɲana kasawulɛ uɓɛ ɛmtʰand̤a kunɛnɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ujɔnatan wamkǁɛlɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛsitʰi usawulɛ uɓawɔ ukukuɓulala nɡ̤ɔkɔ uz̤ɛ ukʰɛ uz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ uɬalɛ ɛnd̤awɛni ɛsɛsɛ uz̤imɛlɛ mna nd̤ija kupʰuma nd̤imɛ nɡ̤asɛkǀalɛni likaɓawɔ ɛnɮɛ apʰɔ ukʰɔna nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ kuɓawɔ nɡ̤awɛ nd̤ikuɓɔnɛ ɔkɔ aja kukutʰɛtʰa nd̤ikukǁɛlɛlɛ ujɔnatan watʰɛtʰa ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ kusawulɛ ujisɛ watʰi kujɛ makanɡ̤ɔni kumkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akɔnanɡ̤a kuwɛ kuɓa iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤itʰɛ z̤alunɡ̤a kunɛnɛ kuwɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ wawɛnz̤a isikǀʰɛnɡ̤ɛ wamɓulala umfilisti ujɛhɔv̤a wawɛnz̤ɛla amasirajɛli ɔnkɛ usind̤isɔ ɔlukʰulu waɓɔna nawɛ wav̤uja jini kɛ ukuɓa wɔnɛ kwiɡ̤az̤i ɛlimsulwa umɓulalɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ siz̤atʰu walipʰulapʰula usawulɛ iz̤wi likajɔnatan wafunɡ̤a usawulɛ watʰi ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a akaji kuɓulawa ujɔnatan wamɓiz̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ujɔnatan wamkǁɛlɛla maz̤wi ɔnkɛ ujɔnatan wamz̤isa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kusawulɛ waɓa pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤anɡ̤apʰamɓili jaɓuja jaɓakʰɔ imfaz̤wɛ wapʰuma ud̤av̤id̤ɛ namafilisti wawaɓulala kakʰulu asaɓa pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ umɔja ɔmɓi kajɛhɔv̤a wamfikɛla usawulɛ ɛɬɛli ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ int͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ jakʰɛ isɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛɓɛtʰa uhad̤i nɡ̤ɛsanɮa usawulɛ ukumkǃʰama nɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛnt͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ watʰi ɲɛɓɛlɛlɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓukasawulɛ wat͡ʃɔ janɡ̤ɛna int͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni wasaɓa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wasind̤a nɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku usawulɛ watʰumɛla aɓatʰuɲwa ɛnɮwini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ukuɓa ɓamlind̤ɛ ɓamɓulalɛ umikali umkakʰɛ wamkǁɛlɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛsitʰi ukuɓa utʰɛ akwawusind̤isa umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ kwanɡ̤ɔɓu ɓusuku wɔɓulawa nɡ̤ɔmsɔ umikali wam̤lisa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛfɛstilɛ wahamɓa waɓalɛka wasind̤a umikali wajitʰaɓatʰa imilɔnd̤ɛkʰaja wajilalisa ɛlukʰukwɛni waɓɛka nɔmlukɔ wɔɓɔja ɓɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛntlɔkwɛni jajɔ wajiɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ usawulɛ aɓatʰuɲwa ukuɓa ɓamtʰaɓatʰɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi jɛna ujafa usawulɛ aɓatʰuɲwa ukuɓa ɓajɛ kumkʰanɡ̤ɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛsitʰi ɲukani niz̤ɛ najɛ nɡ̤ɔkʰukɔ nd̤imɓulalɛ ɓanɡ̤ɛna aɓatʰuɲwa ɔ jimilɔnd̤ɛkʰaja lɛ isɛlukʰukwɛni nɔmlukɔ wɔɓɔja ɓɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛntlɔkwɛni jajɔ watʰi usawulɛ kumikali jini ukuɓa wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukund̤ikʰɔɬisa ulund̤ululɛ ut͡sʰaɓa lusind̤ɛ watʰi umikali kusawulɛ watʰi jɛna nd̤ijɛkɛ nd̤imkɛ jini ukuɓa nd̤ikuɓulalɛ ɛɓalɛkilɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wasind̤a waja kusamuwɛli ɛrama wamkǁɛlɛla kɔnkɛ aɓɛkwɛnz̤ilɛ usawulɛ kujɛ wahamɓa jɛna nɔsamuwɛli ɓaɬala ɛnajɔti wakǁɛlɛlwa usawulɛ kusitʰiwa nankɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛnajɔti nɡ̤asɛrama usawulɛ aɓatʰuɲwa ɓɔkumɓamɓa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɓaɓɔna iɓanɮa laɓaprɔfɛti ɓɛprɔfɛta nɔsamuwɛli ɛmi ɛnɡ̤umɔnɡ̤amɛli waɓɔ umɔja katʰikǁɔ waɓafikɛla aɓatʰuɲwa ɓakasawulɛ ɓaprɔfɛta kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ naɓɔ wakǁɛlɛlwa usawulɛ aɓaɲɛ aɓatʰuɲwa ɓaprɔfɛta kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ naɓɔ wapʰind̤a usawulɛ aɓatʰuɲwa ɓɛnɡ̤aɓɛsitʰatʰu ɓaprɔfɛta kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ naɓɔ waja najɛ ɛrama kwikǃula ɛlikʰulu ɛlisɛsɛku waɓuz̤a watʰi ɓapʰi ɔɔsamuwɛli nɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ kwatʰiwa naɓaja ɛnajɔti nɡ̤asɛrama waja kʰɔna ɛnajɔti nɡ̤asɛrama umɔja katʰikǁɔ wamfikɛla najɛ wahamɓa ɛhamɓa ɛprɔfɛta wad̤a ɛnajɔti nɡ̤asɛrama waz̤iɬuɓa najɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ waprɔfɛta najɛ pʰamɓi kɔsamuwɛli pʰant͡si ɛz̤ɛ jɔnkɛ lɔɔ nɔɓɔ ɓusuku ɓɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ kwatʰiwa ukuɓaprɔfɛti nɔsawulɛ waɓalɛka ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛnajɔti nɡ̤asɛrama wɛz̤a watʰi pʰamɓi kɔjɔnatan nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ ntɔni ɓujini uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓam sijini isɔnɔ pʰamɓi kɔjiɬɔ ukuɓa aŋ̤ǁ̤amɛlɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ watʰi jɛna kujɛ makuɓɛ lɛɛ ɔkɔ akuji ujaɓɔna uɓawɔ akɛnz̤i nɛnkulu intɔ nɛŋǀinanɛ intɔ anɡ̤ajitʰʲilɛli inɮɛɓɛ jam uɓawɔ ujifiɬɛlɛni kɛ lɛ ntɔ akund͡ʒ̤alɔ wafunɡ̤a pʰɛz̤u kɔkɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi ujiɬɔ ujaz̤i kakuɬɛ ukuɓa und̤iɓaɓalɛ utʰi makanɡ̤akwaz̤i ɔku ujɔnatan ɬɛz̤ɛ aɓɛ ɓuɬunɡ̤u inɛnɛ ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ nɡ̤atʰi sisitʰuɓa ɛsiɲɛ sɔkuɲatʰɛla ɛsipʰakatʰi nɔkufa watʰi ujɔnatan kud̤av̤id̤ɛ intɔ ɔjitʰɛtʰajɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ nd̤ija kujɛnz̤a watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kujɔnatan ujaɓɔna ija kutʰwasa iɲanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔmsɔ nd̤ifanɛlɛ ukuɬala nɔkumkani nd̤iɮɛ nd̤ind̤ululɛ nd̤ijɛ kuz̤ifiɬa ɛnɮɛ kud̤ɛ kuɬwɛ nɡ̤ɔsuku lwɛsitʰatʰu ukuɓa ujiɬɔ utʰɛ wand̤ifuna wɔtʰi wɛna ukǀɛlɛ wand̤iɓɔnɡ̤ɔz̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukuɓa aɡ̤id̤imɛ ajɛ ɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm ɛmz̤ini wakɔwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kukʰɔ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɛmiɲaka nɡ̤ɛmiɲaka apʰɔ ɔwɛnz̤ɛlwa umz̤i wɔnkɛ wakɔwaɓɔ ukuɓa ujiɬɔ utʰɛ kulunɡ̤ilɛ kɔɓa kulukǁɔlɔ kumkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ kɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ wav̤utʰa kakʰulu nɡ̤umsind̤ɔ jaz̤i ukuɓa uɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ kwɛlɔɓuɓi nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ uz̤ɛ umɛnz̤ɛlɛ iŋǀɛɓa umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umnɡ̤ɛnisɛ ɛmŋǃɔpʰiswɛni kajɛhɔv̤a umkʰɔz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ nawɛ kɛ ukuɓa ɓutʰɛ ɓakʰɔ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa nd̤iɓulalɛ wɛna nɡ̤ɔkwakʰɔ jini ukuɓa und̤isɛ kujiɬɔ watʰi ujɔnatan makuɓɛ lɛɛ kuwɛ ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤az̤i kakuɬɛ ukuɓa uɓawɔ uɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ kwɛlɔkuɓa ufikɛlwɛ ɓuɓuɓi nd̤iɓɛ nd̤inɡ̤ɛkukǁɛlɛli watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kujɔnatan hi ukuɓa ujiɬɔ ukupʰɛnd̤ulɛ kalukʰuni nd̤ɔkǁɛlɛlwa nɡ̤uɓani watʰi ujɔnatan kud̤av̤id̤ɛ hamɓa sipʰumɛ sijɛ ɛz̤inɮɛ ɓapʰuma ɓɔɓaɓini ɓaja ɛz̤inɮɛ watʰi ujɔnatan kud̤av̤id̤ɛ jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli kǁa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤amɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀa uɓawɔ malunɡ̤a nɛli kǁɛʃa nɡ̤ɔmsɔ nanɡ̤ɔmsɔmɲɛ kwaɓɔnakala ukuɓa kulunɡ̤ilɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ nd̤az̤a and̤atʰumɛla kuwɛ nd̤ijitʰʲilɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ jakʰɔ makɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a kujɔnatan makakǃɔkɛlɛ ukwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ kǁa kutʰɛ kwalunɡ̤a kuɓawɔ ukuɓa akwɛnz̤ɛ uɓuɓi nd̤ɔjitʰʲilɛla inɮɛɓɛ jakʰɔ nd̤ikund̤ululɛ uhamɓɛ unɔkǁɔlɔ ujɛhɔv̤a makaɓɛ nawɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛnɔɓawɔ wanɡ̤a unɡ̤atʰi ukuɓa nd̤isapʰililɛ und̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ iŋǀɛɓa kajɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤atʰi nd̤akufa ujiŋǃumlɛ iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɔ ɛnɮwini jam unɡ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ nasɛkuz̤iŋǃamlɛni kukajɛhɔv̤a iint͡ʃaɓa z̤ikad̤av̤id̤ɛ z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤az̤iɲɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓɔm̤laɓa waŋǃɔpʰisana kɛ ujɔnatan nɛnɮu kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛsitʰi ujɛhɔv̤a makakuɓuz̤ɛ kɛ ɔku ɛsanɮɛni sɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤ikad̤av̤id̤ɛ wapʰind̤a ujɔnatan ukumfunɡ̤isa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkumtʰand̤a kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛmtʰand̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ujɔnatan watʰi kujɛ nɡ̤ɔmsɔ ija kutʰwasa iɲanɡ̤a uja kuɓuz̤wa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa isiɬalɔ sakʰɔ sija kuɓa sɔd̤wa nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰatʰu uz̤ɛ uɬɛ kamsiɲa ujɛ kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ wawuz̤ifiɬɛ kujɔ nɡ̤ɛmini jɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i lɔwa uɬalɛ ɛkǀalɛni lɛlitʲɛ lɛɛz̤ɛli nd̤iz̤itɔlɛlɛ ɛkǀalɛni lalɔ iintɔlɔ z̤ɔntatʰu nd̤inɡ̤ɛ nd̤iz̤ikǁunɛla ɛtɛkɛnini jaɓɔna nd̤ija kumtʰuma nd̤itʰi jija uz̤itʰaɓatʰɛ iintɔlɔ ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nanz̤i iintɔlɔ z̤inɡ̤anɛnɔ kwakʰɔ z̤itʰaɓatʰɛ wɔz̤a wɛna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kɔɓa kulukǁɔlɔ kuwɛ akukʰɔ ntɔ ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ kwind̤ɔd̤ana lɛjɔ nanz̤ɔ iintɔlɔ z̤inɡ̤apʰaja kwakʰɔ hamɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a wɔɓa ukund̤ululɛ kɛ iliz̤wi ɛlija silitʰɛtʰilɛjɔ nawɛ jaɓɔna ujɛhɔv̤a upʰakatʰi nawɛ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni waz̤imɛla kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛz̤inɮɛ jatʰwasa iɲanɡ̤a waɬala ɛsiɮwɛni ukuɓa aɮɛ waɬala ɛsiɬalwɛni sakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤iɬanɮɔ ɛsiɬalwɛni sasɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni wɛsuka wɛma ujɔnatan waɬala uab̤inɛrɛ ɛkǀalɛni likasawulɛ jajɔd̤wa ind̤awɔ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ akatʰɛtʰa ntɔ usawulɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛsitʰi uɬɛlwɛ jintɔ akaɬamɓulukilɛ inɛnɛ akaɬamɓulukilɛ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ isɛlitʰwasilɛ nɛɲanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔsuku lwɛsiɓini ajaɓa ind̤awɔ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi usawulɛ kujɔnatan uɲana wakʰɛ jini ukuɓa anɡ̤ɛz̤i kuɮa uɲana kajɛsɛ najiz̤ɔlɔ nanam̤la ujɔnatan wampʰɛnd̤ula usawulɛ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukǀɛlɛ wand̤iɓɔnɡ̤ɔz̤a ukuɓa ajɛ ɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm watʰi kʰawund̤ijɛkɛ nd̤ijɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kukʰɔ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɛmiz̤alwanɛ jakɔwɛtʰu ɛkʰaja kɛ jɛna umkʰuluwa und̤iwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ kalɔku ukuɓa und̤iɓaɓalɛ makʰɛ nd̤iɡ̤id̤imɛ nd̤iɓɔnɛ umkʰuluwa kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ anɡ̤ɛz̤anɡ̤a ɛtafilɛni jɔkumkani wav̤utʰa kɛ umsind̤ɔ kasawulɛ kujɔnatan watʰi kujɛ ɲana wɛɡ̤wɛŋǁakaz̤i ɛliɡ̤wilikilɛjɔ and̤az̤i jini ukuɓa uɲana kajɛsɛ umɲulɛlɛ ukuɓa aɓɛ liɬaz̤ɔ lakʰɔ nɛɬaz̤ɔ lɔɓuz̤ɛ ɓɔɲɔkɔ kuɓa jɔnkɛ imiɬa uɲana kajɛsɛ aja kuɮa uɓɔmi nɡ̤ajɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni akuji kukǃinisɛka wɛna nɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɔ tʰumɛla nɡ̤ɔkɔ umz̤isɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛnɡ̤umntwana wɔkufa ujɔnatan wampʰɛnd̤ula usawulɛ ujisɛ watʰi kujɛ jini ukuɓa aɓulawɛ nɡ̤ani usawulɛ waɓinz̤a nɡ̤ɛnt͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ ukuɓa at͡ʃɔ kujɛ waz̤i ujɔnatan ukuɓa ujisɛ uɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ kwɛlɔkuɓa amɓulalɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ujɔnatan wɛsuka kɛ ɛtafilɛni ɛv̤utʰa nɡ̤umsind̤ɔ akaɮa kuɮa nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsiɓini wɛɲanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓɛɓuɬunɡ̤u nɡ̤ɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ kuɓa ujisɛ uɓɛm̤laz̤isilɛ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ wapʰuma ujɔnatan waja ɛz̤inɮɛ ukuɓa aɬanɡ̤anɛ nɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛnɔmfana ɔmŋǀinanɛ watʰi kʰawuɓalɛkɛ uz̤itʰaɓatʰɛ iintɔlɔ ɛnd̤iz̤ikǁunajɔ umfana waɓalɛka kɛ jɛna waz̤ikǁuna iintɔlɔ ukuz̤ɛ z̤iɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛ kujɛ wafika kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ ɓɛlukujɔ utɔlɔ aɓɛlukǁunilɛ ujɔnatan wamɛmɛz̤a ujɔnatan watʰi nalɔ nɡ̤apʰaja kwakʰɔ utɔlɔ wamɛmɛz̤a ujɔnatan watʰi kʰawulɛz̤a ŋ̤ǁ̤ama umfana wakwajɔnatan walukǀʰɔla utɔlɔ waluz̤isa ɛnkɔsini jakʰɛ umfana uɓɛnɡ̤az̤i ntɔ nɡ̤ujɔnatan nɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ aɓaɓɛjaz̤i lɔɔ ntɔ ujɔnatan wajinikɛla impaɬa jakʰɛ lɔ aɓɛnajɛ watʰi kujɛ hamɓa ujisɛ ɛkʰaja waja lɔwɔ wɛsuka ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛv̤ɛla ɛkǀalɛni lanɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni wakǃuɓud̤a iz̤iɬanɮɔ z̤ɔz̤itʰatʰu ɓanɡ̤ana ɓalilɛlana wad̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wat͡ʃɔ kakʰulu watʰi ujɔnatan kud̤av̤id̤ɛ hamɓa unɔkǁɔlɔ makumɛ ɛsikufunɡ̤ɛlɛ iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a tʰina sɔɓaɓini sisitʰi ujɛhɔv̤a makaɓɛ pʰakatʰi nawɛ napʰakatʰi kwɛmɓɛwu jam nɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni wɛsuka kɛ wahamɓa kɛ ujɔnatan waja ɛkʰaja ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waja ɛnɔb̤i kuahimɛlɛki umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli uahimɛlɛki wamkʰawulɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛɡ̤ub̤a watʰi kujɛ jini ukuɓa uz̤ɛ wɛd̤wa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ nd̤ɔd̤a ihamɓa nawɛ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuahimɛlɛki umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ukumkani und̤iwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ɛntɔ watʰi makunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ waz̤i jani nɡ̤alɛ ntɔ nd̤ikutʰumajɔ nd̤ikuwisɛlɛjɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ajɔ kɛ aɓafana nd̤iɓajalɛlɛ ɛkutʰini nasɛkutʰini kalɔku kukʰɔ ntɔni pʰant͡si kwɛsanɮa sakʰɔ nd̤inikɛ ɛsanɮɛni iz̤ɔnka z̤iɓɛ z̤iɬanu nɔkuɓa jintɔni ɛfumanɛkajɔ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wampʰɛnd̤ula ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi kujɛ akukʰɔ sɔnka sisɛsaɓantu ɓɔnkɛ pʰant͡si kwɛsanɮa sɛsiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ sɔd̤wa isɔnka ɛsikʰɔjɔ ukuɓa aɓafana ɓatʰɛ kɔd̤wa ɓaz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤ina kuɓafaz̤i ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wampʰɛnd̤ula umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli watʰi kujɛ inɛnɛ aɓafaz̤i ɓatʰintɛlɛkilɛ ukuz̤a kutʰi ɛz̤i nt͡suku z̤ɔntatʰu ɛkupʰumɛni iɓiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ impaɬa jaɓafana nɔkuɓa iɓijinɮɛla jaɓantu ɓɔnkɛ jɔsuka iŋ̤ǀ̤waliswɛ jimpaɬa lɛ nam̤la umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kɛ ɛsiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛkunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ z̤ɔnka kʰɔna ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ɔ z̤ɔkuɓɔnisa ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤isuswɛ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa kumiswɛ iz̤ɔnka ɛz̤iʃuʃu nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkutʰatʲatʰwa kwaz̤ɔ kɛ kalɔku kwajɛ kuv̤alɛlwɛ kʰɔna ind̤ɔd̤a jakuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakasawulɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɛɡ̤ama ɓɛlinɡ̤ud̤ɔwɛɡ̤i umɛd̤ɔm inɡ̤anɡ̤a jaɓalusi ɓakasawulɛ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuahimɛlɛki akukʰɔ nt͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ nak͡xɛlɛ apʰa pʰant͡si kwɛsanɮa sakʰɔ kuɓa ik͡xɛlɛ kwanɛɛntɔnɡ̤a z̤am and̤iz̤ipʰatʰanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umkǀimɓi uŋ̤ǁ̤amisɛkilɛ watʰi umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ik͡xɛlɛ likaɡ̤ɔlijati umfilisti ɔwamɓulala ɛntilini kaɛla lisɔnɡ̤ɛlwɛ ɛnɡ̤utʲɛni ɛmv̤a kwɛɛfɔd̤i ukuɓa ujalitʰaɓatʰa litʰaɓatʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akukʰɔ limɓi watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ akukʰɔ lind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤alɔ nd̤inikɛ lɔna wɛsuka ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓalɛka nɡ̤alɔɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓukasawulɛ waja kuakiʃɛ wasɛɡ̤ati ɓatʰi aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakaakiʃɛ kujɛ asinɡ̤ujɛ lɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wɛliz̤wɛ asinɡ̤ujɛ lɔ ɓaɓɛv̤uma nɡ̤ajɛ ɛkuŋ̤ǃ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤ɛni ɓɛsitʰi usawulɛ uɓulɛlɛ akʰɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ uɓulɛlɛ akʰɛ anɡ̤amaʃumi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wawaɡ̤ǀ̤ina lɔɔ maz̤wi ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɛ wɔjika kunɛnɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓukaakiʃɛ wasɛɡ̤ati waz̤ipʰamɓanisa iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ waz̤iɡ̤ɛz̤isa ɛsanɮɛni saɓɔ wak͡xwɛla ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤wɛni z̤ɛsanɡ̤ɔ wav̤uz̤isa ulukǀʰwɛ ɛz̤ind̤ɛv̤ini z̤akʰɛ watʰi uakiʃɛ kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ kʰanɡ̤ɛlani nant͡si lɛ nd̤ɔd̤a isisihiɓa jini ukuɓa nijiz̤isɛ nd̤iswɛlɛ iz̤ihiɓa jini ukuɓa niz̤isɛ lɔ ab̤ud̤ɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u wɔnɡ̤ɛna jini lɔ ɛnɮwini jam wɛmka kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ apʰɔ waz̤isind̤isɛla ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni wasɛad̤ulam ɓɛv̤a aɓakʰuluwa ɓakʰɛ nɛnɮu kajisɛ jɔnkɛ ɓɛɬa ɓaja kujɛ kʰɔna aɓutʰɛlana kujɛ ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akǁinɛkilɛjɔ namad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ anamatʲala namad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ anɛz̤ik͡xɔk͡xɔ waɓa nɡ̤umtʰɛtʰɛli wawɔ aɓa kujɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akumakʰulu amanɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wɛmka kʰɔna waja ɛmiz̤pa kwamɔwab̤i watʰi wakwamɔwab̤i makʰɛ ɓapʰumɛ uɓawɔ nɔma ɓaɬalɛ nd̤id̤ɛ nd̤az̤i intɔ aja kund̤ɛnz̤ɛla jɔna utʰikǁɔ waɓaz̤isa pʰamɓi kɔkumkani wakwamɔwab̤i ɓaɬala najɛ jɔnkɛ imiɬa aɓɛsɛmɓɔnisɛlwɛni ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi uɡ̤ad̤i umprɔfɛti kud̤av̤id̤ɛ uz̤ɛ unɡ̤aɬali ɛmɓɔnisɛlwɛni hamɓa ujɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakwajud̤a wahamɓa kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waja ɛɬatʰini lɛhɛrɛtɛ wɛv̤a usawulɛ ukuɓa ujaz̤iwa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ namad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛnajɛ usawulɛ ɛɓɛɬɛli ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha pʰant͡si kɔmtamariskɛ ɔsɛmmanɡ̤wɛni int͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ jakʰɛ isɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛmi nɡ̤akujɛ watʰi usawulɛ kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ aɓaɓɛmi nɡ̤akujɛ kʰaniv̤ɛ ɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin uɲana kajɛsɛ wɔninika nɛz̤id̤ilija nɔnkɛ nipʰɛla jini anɛnz̤ɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛlimawaka naɓatʰɛtʰɛlimakʰulu nɔnkɛ nipʰɛla jini ukuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nɔnkɛ nipʰɛla nind̤ikǀɛɓɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ namɲɛ ujitʰʲilɛlajɔ inɮɛɓɛ jam ukuŋǃɔpʰisana kɔɲana nɔɲana kajɛsɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ namɲɛ uɓuɬunɡ̤u nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam ajitʰʲilɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ jam ukuɓa uɲana umv̤usilɛ umkʰɔnz̤i ukuɓa and̤ilalɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kund͡ʒ̤alɔ nam̤la wapʰɛnd̤ula ud̤ɔwɛɡ̤i umɛd̤ɔm ɔɓɛmiswɛ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakasawulɛ watʰi nd̤imɓɔnilɛ uɲana kajɛsɛ ɛfika ɛnɔb̤i kuahimɛlɛki uɲana kaahitub̤i waz̤a jɛna wamɓuz̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a umpʰakɔ nɛk͡xɛlɛ likaɡ̤ɔlijati umfilisti watʰumɛla wamɓiz̤a uahimɛlɛki uɲana kaahitub̤i umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɛnɮu jɔnkɛ kajisɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓaɓɛsɛnɔb̤i ɓɛz̤a ɓɔnkɛ watʰi usawulɛ kʰawuv̤ɛ ɲana kaahitub̤i watʰi jɛna nd̤ilapʰa nkɔsi jam watʰi usawulɛ kujɛ jini ukuɓa nind̤ikǀɛɓɛ wɛna nɔɲana kajɛsɛ umnikɛ isɔnka nɛk͡xɛlɛ umɓuz̤ɛlɛ kutʰikǁɔ ukuɓa asukɛ and̤ilalɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kund͡ʒ̤alɔ nam̤la uahimɛlɛki wampʰɛnd̤ula watʰi nɡ̤uɓani kɛ kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔtʰɛmɓɛkɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ umjɛni ɔnɔkunɡ̤ɛna ɛpʰakatʰini lakʰɔ ɔz̤ukilɛjɔ ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ nd̤ijakǃala jini nam̤la ukumɓuz̤ɛla kutʰikǁɔ makuɓɛ lɛɛ ɔkɔ makanɡ̤amtʰwalisi lutʰɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɛ lɔ nɛnɮu jɔnkɛ kaɓawɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ akaz̤i lutʰɔ kujɔ jɔnkɛ lɛ ntɔ nɔkuɓa lɔluŋǀinanɛ nɔkuɓa lɔlukʰulu watʰi uja ufɛ ahimɛlɛki wɛna nɛnɮu jɔnkɛ kajiɬɔ watʰi kwiz̤iɡ̤id̤imi z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤imi nɡ̤akujɛ d͡ʒ̤ikani niɓaɓulalɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓakajɛhɔv̤a kuɓa nɛsaɓɔ isanɮa sinɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ nanɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛsaz̤i ɔkɔ waɓalɛkajɔ jɛna aɓajitʰʲilɛla inɮɛɓɛ jam aɓav̤uma aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɔkumkani isanɮa saɓɔ ɓakǁaɓɛlɛ kuɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓakajɛhɔv̤a watʰi kud̤ɔwɛɡ̤i d͡ʒ̤ika wɛna ukǁaɓɛlɛ kuɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wad͡ʒ̤ika kɛ ud̤ɔwɛɡ̤i umɛd̤ɔm wakǁaɓɛla jɛna kuɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli waɓulala nɡ̤alɔɔ amaʃumi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anamaɬanu amad̤ɔd̤a ɛŋǁiɓɛ iɛfɔd̤i jɛlinɛn ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ nɛnɔb̤i umz̤i waɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wajit͡ʃaɓalalisa nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kwind̤ɔd̤a asɛ kumfaz̤i ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kwiint͡sapʰɔ asɛ kwiint͡sana nɛɛnkɔmɔ namaɛsilɛ nɛɛɡ̤uʃa nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ kwasind̤a uɲana wamɲɛ kaahimɛlɛki uɲana kaahitub̤i ɔɡ̤ama ɓɛlinɡ̤uab̤ijatarɛ ɔwaɓalɛka waland̤ɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ uab̤ijatarɛ wamkǁɛlɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukuɓa usawulɛ uɓaɓulɛlɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓakajɛhɔv̤a watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuab̤ijatarɛ ɓɛnd̤isaz̤i kwanɡ̤alɔɔ ukuɓa ɛkʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ud̤ɔwɛɡ̤i umɛd̤ɔm uja kumkǁɛlɛla kakad̤ɛ usawulɛ nd̤im ɔɓulalisɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ jɔnkɛ jɛnɮu kajiɬɔ ɬala ukɔjika nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔfuna umpʰɛfumlɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɡ̤ǀ̤inakɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ kwakǁɛlwa kud̤av̤id̤ɛ kwatʰiwa nanɡ̤a amafilisti ɛsilwa nɛkɛhila ajaz̤idʲwid̤a iz̤and̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓuz̤a kujɛhɔv̤a watʰi nd̤ijɛ nd̤iwakǀʰitʰɛ mafilisti watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kud̤av̤id̤ɛ jija uwakǀʰitʰɛ amafilisti ujisind̤isɛ ikɛhila atʰi amad̤ɔd̤a akwad̤av̤id̤ɛ kujɛ nanku tʰina sisɔjika sikwajud̤a apʰa sɔɓɛka pʰi kǁa sitʰɛ saja ɛkɛhila ɛz̤intlwini z̤amafilisti wapʰind̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓuz̤a kujɛhɔv̤a kand͡ʒ̤alɔ wampʰɛnd̤ula ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi suka uɬɛ ujɛ ɛkɛhila nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija kuwanikɛla amafilisti ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ waja kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akwakʰɛ ɛkɛhila namafilisti wajikǃʰuɓa imfujɔ jawɔ wawaɓulala kakʰulu waɓasind̤isa kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ aɓɛmi ɓɛkɛhila kwatʰi ɛkuɓalɛkɛni kukaab̤ijatarɛ uɲana kaahimɛlɛki kud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛkɛhila wɛɬa ɛnɛɛfɔd̤i ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ kwakǁɛlwa kusawulɛ ukuɓa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ufikilɛ ɛkɛhila watʰi usawulɛ utʰikǁɔ umlaɬɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uz̤iv̤alɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤ɛna ɛmz̤ini ɔnɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ nɛmiv̤alɔ usawulɛ waɓaɓiz̤ɛla nd̤awɔɲɛ ɛmfaz̤wɛni ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ukuɓa ɓɛɬɛ ɓajɛ ɛkɛhila ɓaŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤ɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ waz̤i ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukuɓa usawulɛ umɛnz̤ɛla uɓuɓi watʰi kuab̤ijatarɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli z̤isa iɛfɔd̤i lɛjɔ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli uv̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɛnɛnɛ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ukuɓa usawulɛ ukuz̤a ɛkɛhila ukuɓa awɔnakalisɛ lɔ mz̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam aɓɛmi ɓɛkɛhila ɓɔnd̤inikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ wɔɬa usawulɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ av̤ilɛjɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli kʰawumkǁɛlɛlɛ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a uja kuɬa watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ aɓɛmi ɓɛkɛhila ɓɔnd̤inikɛla namad̤ɔd̤a ɛsanɮɛni sikasawulɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a ɓɔkunikɛla wɛsuka ud̤av̤id̤ɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ ɓɛkumakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu amad̤ɔd̤a ɓapʰuma ɛkɛhila ɓahamɓa apʰɔ ɓanɡ̤ahamɓa kʰɔna wakǁɛlɛlwa usawulɛ ukuɓa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ usaɓilɛ ɛkɛhila wajɛka akapʰuma waɬala kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛz̤imɓɔnisɛlwɛni waɬala ɛz̤intaɓɛni ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jɛz̤ifi usawulɛ imiɬa jɔnkɛ utʰikǁɔ akamnikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ waɓɔna ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukuɓa usawulɛ upʰumɛ ɛz̤a umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛɓɛsɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jɛz̤ifi ɛnt͡ʃiɲɛlɛni jɛɬatʰi wɛsuka ujɔnatan uɲana kasawulɛ waja kud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛnt͡ʃiɲɛlɛni jɛɬatʰi wasɔmɛlɛz̤a isanɮa sakʰɛ kutʰikǁɔ watʰi kujɛ musa ukɔjika nɡ̤ɔkuɓa isanɮa sikasawulɛ uɓawɔ asiji wɛna uja kuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kumasirajɛli nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤anɛnɔ kwakʰɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ usawulɛ uɓawɔ ujakwaz̤i kakuɬɛ ɔku ɓɛnz̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɓɔɓaɓini pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɬala ɛnt͡ʃiɲɛlɛni jɛɬatʰi apʰɔ ujɔnatan waja ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ ɓɛɲuka aɓasɛz̤ifi ɓaja kusawulɛ ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha ɓɛsitʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ akaz̤iz̤imɛz̤ɛ kutʰi jini ɛz̤imɓɔnisɛlwɛni ɛnt͡ʃiɲɛlɛni jɛɬatʰi ɛnd̤ulini jɛhakila ɛsɛkunɛnɛ kwɛnkanɡ̤ala kalɔku jiɬa nɡ̤ɔkɔmŋǃwɛnɔ wɔnkɛ wɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ ukuɬa kunatʰi ukumnikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani watʰi usawulɛ nisikɛlɛlwɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ninɔfɛfɛ kʰanijɛ niɡ̤ǃ̤alɛ ɔkuɲɛ naz̤i niɓɔnɛ ind̤awɔ jakʰɛ apʰɔ uɲawɔ lwakʰɛ lukʰɔna nɔkuɓa nɡ̤uɓani ɔmɓɔnɛ kʰɔna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kutʰiwa asikukɔ nɔkuɓa unɔɓukǃʰɔpʰɔlɔlɔ niɓɔnɛ naz̤i iind̤awɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɔkuz̤imɛla aja kuz̤imɛla kuz̤ɔ niɓujɛlɛ nikǃikǃilɛ nd̤ɔhamɓa kɔtʰi ukuɓa ukʰɔ kwɛli liz̤wɛ nd̤imfunɛ nd̤imfumanɛ pʰakatʰi ɔnkɛ akwajud̤a ɓɛsuka kɛ ɓaja ɛz̤ifi pʰamɓi kɔsawulɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ wajɛsɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jɛmahɔn ɛarab̤a nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ kwɛnkanɡ̤ala wahamɓa usawulɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ ukuja ɓamkǁɛlɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wɛɬa kɛ waja ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxɛni waɬala ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jɛmahɔn wɛv̤a usawulɛ wamsukɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jɛmahɔn wahamɓa usawulɛ nɡ̤ɛli kǀala lɛntaɓa wahamɓa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ nɡ̤ɛlaa kǀala lɛntaɓa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wɛmka ɓupʰutʰupʰutʰu nɡ̤ɔkɔjika usawulɛ kɛ usawulɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ ɓaɓɛmxawula ud̤av̤id̤ɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ ukuɓa ɓaɓaɓamɓɛ kɛ kalɔku umtʰuɲwa kusawulɛ ɛsitʰi kʰawulɛz̤a uz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa amafilisti alinɡ̤ɛnɛlɛ iliz̤wɛ waɓuja kɛ usawulɛ ɛkumsukɛlɛni ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waja kuwaɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a amafilisti nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔkwatʰiwa lɔɔ nd̤awɔ jisɛlahamalɛkɔti wɛɲuka apʰɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɬala ɛz̤imɓɔnisɛlwɛni z̤asɛɛnɡ̤ɛd̤i kwatʰi kǁa usawulɛ waɓujajɔ ɛkuwasukɛlɛni amafilisti ɓamkǁɛlɛla ɓɛsitʰi nanku ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛɛnɡ̤ɛd̤i usawulɛ wawatʰaɓatʰa amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amawaka amatʰatʰu aɬɛliwɛjɔ kumasirajɛli ɔnkɛ wajakufuna ud̤av̤id̤ɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ ɛmawɛni amaɡ̤ɔɡ̤ɔ wafika ɛz̤iɓajɛni z̤ɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɡ̤asɛnɮɛlɛni kukʰɔ umkǃɔlɔmɓa apʰɔ wanɡ̤ɛna usawulɛ ukuɓa aɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɛ iiɲawɔ z̤akʰɛ kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ ɓaɓɛɬɛli ɛntla ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni atʰi amad̤ɔd̤a kad̤av̤id̤ɛ kujɛ nant͡si atʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a kuwɛ jaɓɔna nd̤ija kulunikɛla ut͡ʃaɓa lwakʰɔ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ wɛnz̤ɛ kulɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ wɛsuka ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waŋǃamla nɡ̤asɛsɛ isɔnd̤ɔ lɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jɔkwalɛka aɓɛnajɔ usawulɛ kwatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ intliz̤ijɔ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ jakʰatʰaz̤ɛka nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa ɛɓɛliŋǃamlɛ isɔnd̤ɔ lɛnɡ̤uɓɔ kasawulɛ watʰi kumad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ makuɓɛ lɛɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kajɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤ijɛnz̤ɛ lɔɔ ntɔ ɛnkɔsini jam umtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa kajɛhɔv̤a nd̤isisɛ isanɮa kujɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɡ̤umtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa kajɛhɔv̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wawad̤uɓula nɡ̤amaz̤wi amad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ akawav̤umɛla ukuɓa amwɛlɛ usawulɛ wɛsuka usawulɛ ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni wahamɓa inɮɛla jakʰɛ wɛsuka ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ wapʰuma ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni wamɛmɛz̤a kusawulɛ watʰi nkɔsi jam wab̤ɛka ɛmv̤a usawulɛ watʰɔɓa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni wakǃuɓud̤a watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kusawulɛ jini ukuɓa uv̤ɛ amaz̤wi aɓatʰɛ nanku ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛfuna ukuɓa uɬɛlwɛ ɓuɓuɓi jaɓɔna nam̤la aɓɔnilɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɔ ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɓɛkunikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni nam̤la ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni kwatʰiwa mawuɓulawɛ laɓa nɛŋǀɛɓa kuwɛ ilisɔ nd̤atʰi and̤iji sanɮa ɛnkɔsini jam nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɡ̤umtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa kajɛhɔv̤a kʰanɡ̤ɛla kɛ ɓawɔ isɔnd̤ɔ lɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɔ jɔkwalɛka lisɛsanɮɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inɡ̤akuɓulalanɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɛkuliŋǃumlɛni isɔnd̤ɔ lɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɔ jɔkwalɛka jaz̤i uɓɔnɛ ukuɓa ɛsanɮɛni akukʰɔ ɓuɓi naluk͡xɛkǃɔ and̤ɔnanɡ̤a kuwɛ uwuz̤inɡ̤ɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ ukuɓa uwutʰaɓatʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uja kuɡ̤wɛɓa pʰakatʰi nawɛ and̤ipʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a kuwɛ kɛ isanɮa asiji kukupʰatʰa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ lit͡ʃɔjɔ ikǃʰalɔ lamaɲanɡ̤ɛ ukutʰi ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kupʰuma kwaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kɛ isanɮa asiji kufikɛlɛla kuwɛ upʰumɛlɛnɛ naɓani kɔd̤wa wamasirajɛli usukɛla ɓani usukɛla ind͡ʒ̤a ɛfilɛjɔ usukɛla intakumɓa ɛmɓala ujɛhɔv̤a makaɓɛ nɡ̤umɡ̤wɛɓi aɡ̤wɛɓɛ pʰakatʰi nawɛ aɓɔnɛ aɓamɓanɛ nɡ̤ɔɓamɓanɔ and̤iɡ̤wɛɓɛlɛ nd̤isind̤ɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ kwatʰi akuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukuwatʰɛtʰa maz̤wi kusawulɛ watʰi usawulɛ liliz̤wi lakʰɔ ɛlɔ ɲana d̤av̤id̤ɛ usawulɛ walipʰakamisa iz̤wi lakʰɛ watʰi kud̤av̤id̤ɛ ilunɡ̤isa nɡ̤uwɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa und̤ɛnz̤ɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ wɛna nd̤akwɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi wɛna ukǁɛlilɛ nam̤la ukuɓa und̤ɛnz̤ɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɓɛnd̤inikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ akwand̤iɓulala kǁa alufumanajɔ ut͡ʃaɓa lwakʰɛ wɔlund̤ulula nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɛlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ jini ujɛhɔv̤a makaɓujɛkɛz̤ɛ kuwɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ und̤ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ nam̤la kalɔku jaɓɔna nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa uja kuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɔkunɛnɛ ɓumɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ uɓukumkani ɓakwasirajɛli nd̤ifunɡ̤ɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔ ukuɓa akuji kujiŋǃamla imɓɛwu jam ɛmv̤ɛni nɔkuɓa akuji kulit͡ʃaɓalalisa iɡ̤ama ɛnɮwini kaɓawɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wamfunɡ̤ɛla kɛ usawulɛ wɛmka usawulɛ waja ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ ɓɛɲuka ɓaja ɛmɓɔnisɛlwɛni wafa usamuwɛli aɓutʰɛlana ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli ammɓamɓaz̤ɛlɛla amŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ ɛrama wɛsuka ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wɛɬa waja ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jɛparan kɛ kalɔku ɓɛkukʰɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛmahɔn ɛmsɛɓɛnz̤i uɓusɛkarmɛlɛ lɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤a kɛ iɓisisitʲɛɓi kakʰulu jajinɛɛɡ̤uʃa ɛz̤inɡ̤amawaka amatʰatʰu nɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛz̤iliwaka jajisɛkukǀʰɛtʲwɛni kwɛɛɡ̤uʃa z̤ajɔ ɛkarmɛlɛ iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤a lalinɡ̤unab̤ali iɡ̤ama lɔmkajɔ linɡ̤uab̤iɡ̤ali umfaz̤i lɔwɔ wajɛnɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ ɛntlɛ ɛjinz̤wakaz̤i kɛ ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ jajijiŋ̤ǀ̤uka z̤imɓi iintlɔnd̤i z̤ajɔ inɡ̤umkalɛb̤i wɛv̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ukuɓa unab̤ali ukǀʰɛɓa iiɡ̤uʃa z̤akʰɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wɛsusa iʃumi lamad̤ɔd̤ana watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kumad̤ɔd̤ana lawɔ ɲukani ɛkarmɛlɛ nijɛ kunab̤ali niɓuz̤ɛ ukupʰila kwakʰɛ ɛɡ̤amɛni nit͡ʃɔ ukutʰi ɬala kakuɬɛ upʰilɛ wɛna ipʰilɛ nɛnɮu jakʰɔ kupʰilɛ kɔnkɛ ɔnakʰɔ nd̤iv̤ilɛ kalɔku ukuɓa unaɓakǀʰɛɓi kɛ kalɔku aɓalusi ɓakʰɔ ɓaɓɛnatʰi asiɓɛnz̤anɡ̤a ntɔ aɓalaɬɛkɛlwanɡ̤a ntɔ jɔnkɛ imiɬa aɓaɓɛsɛkarmɛlɛ ɓuz̤a kumad̤ɔd̤ana akʰɔ ɔkukǁɛlɛla makaɓaɓalwɛ nɡ̤uwɛ mad̤ɔd̤ana akɔwɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sifikɛ nɡ̤ɛmini ɛlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kʰawuɓanikɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ nɔɲana wakʰɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ intɔ ɛsitʰɛ sajifumana isanɮa sakʰɔ aja kɛ amad̤ɔd̤ana kad̤av̤id̤ɛ atʰɛtʰa kunab̤ali nɡ̤ɔkwalɔɔ maz̤wi ɔnkɛ ɛɡ̤amɛni likad̤av̤id̤ɛ aɬala pʰant͡si unab̤ali waɓapʰɛnd̤ula aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi nɡ̤uɓani jɛna ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤uɓani uɲana kajɛsɛ az̤i nam̤la ɓaninz̤i aɓakʰɔnz̤i aɓak͡xɛkǃajɔ ɛlɔwɔ ɛnkɔsini jakʰɛ nd̤inɡ̤atʰini ukutʰaɓatʰa isɔnka namanz̤i nɛntɔ jam ɛkǁʰɛliwɛjɔ ɛnd̤ijikǁʰɛlɛlɛ aɓakǀʰɛɓi ɓam nd̤ijinikɛ amad̤ɔd̤a ɛnd̤inɡ̤awaz̤ijɔ nɔkuɓa av̤ɛla pʰi ad͡ʒ̤ika kɛ amad̤ɔd̤ana akwad̤av̤id̤ɛ ahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jawɔ aɓuja ɛz̤a amkǁɛlɛla nɡ̤ɔkwalɔɔ maz̤wi ɔnkɛ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kumad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ ŋǁiɓani ɛlɔwɔ ik͡xɛlɛ lakʰɛ ɓaŋǁiɓa kɛ ɛlɔwɔ ik͡xɛlɛ lakʰɛ waliŋǁiɓa nɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ ik͡xɛlɛ lakʰɛ kwɛɲuka ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛland̤ɛlwa nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a akumakʰulu amanɛ kwaɬala amakʰulu amaɓini nɛmpaɬa kɛ kalɔku uab̤iɡ̤ali umkanab̤ali wakǁɛlɛlwa jind̤ɔd̤ana ɛtʰilɛ kumad̤ɔd̤ana akʰɛ isitʰi jaɓɔna ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ususɛ aɓatʰuɲwa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ukuɓa ɓɛz̤ɛ kusikɛlɛla inkɔsi jɛtʰu jɛsuka jaɓaɮakav̤ula kanti amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ ɛɓɛlunɡ̤ilɛ kunɛnɛ kutʰi akasɔnanɡ̤a asilaɬɛkɛlwanɡ̤a ntɔ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔnkɛ ɛsiɓɛ sihamɓa nawɔ ɔkɔ ɓɛsisɛz̤inɮɛ aɓa lud̤ɔnɡ̤a kutʰi nasɛɓusuku nasɛmini jɔnkɛ imiɬa ɛɓɛ sinawɔ impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ jaz̤i nɡ̤ɔkɔ ujiɓɔnɛ intɔ ɔjɛnz̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kuɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwɛ kwɛlɔɓuɓi nɡ̤akwinkɔsi jɛtʰu nanɡ̤akwinɮu jajɔ jɔnkɛ ilit͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔ akusɛnakutʰɛtʰwa najɔ wakʰawulɛz̤a kɛ uab̤iɡ̤ali watʰaɓatʰa amakʰulu amaɓini ɛz̤ɔnka nɛɛnt͡suɓa z̤amɓini z̤ɛwajini nɛɛɡ̤uʃa z̤antlanu sɛz̤iɬinz̤iwɛ nɛɛsɛha z̤antlanu z̤amakʰwɛɓa z̤alikʰulu iz̤ikǀumɓa z̤ɛɛrasintʲisi z̤amakʰulu maɓini iz̤ikǀumɓa z̤amakʰiwanɛ waz̤iɓɛka ɛmaɛsilɛni watʰi kumad̤ɔd̤ana akwakʰɛ ɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛlani pʰamɓi nijaɓɔna nd̤ijaniland̤ɛla akajikǁɛlɛla ind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ unab̤ali kwatʰi ɛkʰwɛlɛ ɛɛsilɛni ɛsiɬa ɛsitʰɛni lɛntaɓa naɓɔ ɔɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ ɓɛsiɬa ɓɛmkʰawulɛla wakǃuɓisana naɓɔ kɛ kalɔku ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛɓɛtʰɛ nd̤ifumanɛ nd̤az̤ikǁɔkisa nɡ̤ɔkwam nd̤az̤iɡ̤ǀ̤ina z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ z̤alɔ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ akwalaɬɛka ntɔ ɛntwɛni jɔnkɛ ɛjɛjakʰɛ wand̤iɓujisɛla uɓuɓi ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ utʰikǁɔ makɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ kwiint͡ʃaɓa z̤ikad̤av̤id̤ɛ akǃɔkɛlɛ ukwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓa kud̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔmsɔ nd̤isalisɛ kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ anaɓɔ intɔ ɛjind̤ɔd̤a uab̤iɡ̤ali wamɓɔna ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waŋ̤ǁ̤ama wɛɬa ɛɛsilɛni nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ pʰamɓi kɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ wakǃuɓud̤a ɛm̤laɓɛni wawa kɛ ɛz̤iɲawɛni z̤akʰɛ watʰi maɓuɓɛ lɔ nkɔsi jam uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɔɓu makʰɛ atʰɛtʰɛ umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤akʰɔ uwapʰulapʰulɛ amaz̤wi ɔmkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ inkɔsi jam majinɡ̤akʰɛ ikʰatʰalɛ nɡ̤ulɔ ulit͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔ unab̤ali nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ lind͡ʒ̤alɔ iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ und͡ʒ̤alɔ jɛna nɡ̤unab̤ali iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ unɔɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ kɛ mkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ and̤iwaɓɔnanɡ̤a amad̤ɔd̤ana ɛnkɔsi jam ɔwawatʰumajɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔ nkɔsi jam ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ inɛnɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ukuŋǃand̤ilɛ ukuɓa unɡ̤apʰalaz̤i ɡ̤az̤i unɡ̤az̤isind̤isi nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔ maz̤iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔnab̤ali iint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ naɓajifunɛla uɓuɓi inkɔsi jam nɡ̤ɔkɔ lɛ nt͡sikɛlɛlɔ ajiz̤isilɛjɔ umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ ɛnkɔsini jam majinikwɛ amad̤ɔd̤ana aland̤ɛla inkɔsi jam kʰawumkǁɔlɛlɛ umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ uk͡xɛkǃɔ lwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɛnɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uja kujɛnz̤ɛla inkɔsi jam inɮu ɛkǃinilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inkɔsi jam iimfaz̤wɛ z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a uɓuɓi aɓuji kufuɲanwa kuwɛ imiɬa jakʰɔ jɔnkɛ kǁa kutʰɛ kwɛsuka wakusukɛla umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ wɔɓɔt͡ʃwa umpʰɛfumlɔ wɛnkɔsi jam ɛsikǃʰumɛni saɓapʰililɛjɔ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ kɛ wɔna umpʰɛfumlɔ wɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ wɔwusawula ɛntɛnd̤ɛni jɛnkwit͡ʃi kutʰi kǁa ujɛhɔv̤a atʰɛ wɛnz̤a kwinkɔsi jam nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ akutʰɛtʰilɛjɔ nɡ̤awɛ wajinɡ̤anɡ̤a jamasirajɛli ɔkɔ kunɡ̤aɓi sisiwisɔ kuwɛ nɛsikʰuɓɛkisɔ sɛntliz̤ijɔ jɛnkɔsi jam nɔkupʰalaz̤a iɡ̤az̤i ɛlimsulwa nɔkuz̤isind̤isa kwɛnkɔsi jam ukuɓa utʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛnz̤a ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛnkɔsini jam wɔmkʰumɓula umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ watʰi kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuab̤iɡ̤ali makaɓɔnɡ̤wɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɔkutʰumilɛjɔ nam̤la wand̤ikʰawulɛla majiɓɔnɡ̤wɛ imv̤ɔ jakʰɔ uɓɔnɡ̤wɛ wɛna ɔnd̤alɛlɛjɔ nam̤la ukuɓa nd̤ipʰalaz̤ɛ iɡ̤az̤i nd̤iz̤isind̤isɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa nɔkɔ kɛ ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɔnd̤itʰintɛlɛjɔ and̤ɛnz̤a ntɔ imɓi ukuɓa uɓunɡ̤aŋ̤ǁ̤amanɡ̤a uz̤ɛ kund̤ikʰawulɛla inɛnɛ nɡ̤ɛkunɡ̤ad̤anɡ̤a kusɛ nɡ̤ɔmsɔ kusasɛlɛ kwanab̤ali intɔ ɛjind̤ɔd̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wakwamkɛla ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ ɔkɔ akuz̤isilɛjɔ kujɛ watʰi kujɛ ɲuka unɔkǁɔlɔ ujɛ ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ ujaɓɔna nd̤ilipʰulapʰulɛ iz̤wi lakʰɔ nd̤akunɔnɛlɛla waja kɛ uab̤iɡ̤ali kunab̤ali nankɔ ɛnɛsiɮɔ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsiɮɔ sɔkumkani intliz̤ijɔ kanab̤ali imnand̤i ɛŋǁila kunɛnɛ akamkǁɛlɛla ntɔ nɔkuɓa jɛŋǀinanɛ nɔkuɓa jɛnkulu kwad̤a nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ ukupʰuma kwɛwajini kunab̤ali umkakʰɛ wamkǁɛlɛla lɔɔ maz̤wi jafa intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ pʰakatʰi kwakʰɛ jaɓa lilitʲɛ kwatʰi z̤akuɓa sɛʃumini iint͡suku ujɛhɔv̤a wamɓɛtʰa unab̤ali wɛv̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukuɓa unab̤ali ufilɛ watʰi makaɓɔnɡ̤wɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔkutʰɛtʰɛlɛlɛjɔ ukuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤wa wand̤ikʰulula ɛsanɮɛni sikanab̤ali wamŋǃand̤a umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɛ ɛɓuɓini ujɛhɔv̤a waɓuɓujisɛla uɓuɓi ɓukanab̤ali ɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɛ watʰumɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰɛtʰa kuab̤iɡ̤ali ukuɓa amz̤ɛkɛ aɓɛ nɡ̤umkakʰɛ ɓaja aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ kuab̤iɡ̤ali ɛkarmɛlɛ ɓatʰɛtʰa kujɛ ɓɛsitʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ usitʰumɛ kuwɛ ukuɓa akuz̤ɛkɛ uɓɛ nɡ̤umkakʰɛ wɛsuka wakǃuɓud̤a nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni watʰi nanku umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ wɔkuɓa likʰɔɓɔkaz̤ana lɔkuɬamɓa iiɲawɔ z̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛnkɔsi jam waŋ̤ǁ̤ama kɛ uab̤iɡ̤ali wɛsuka wakʰwɛla ɛɛsilɛni ɛland̤ɛlwa sisiɬanu sɔmtʰind͡ʒ̤ana waɓaland̤ɛla aɓatʰuɲwa ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓa nɡ̤umkakʰɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓɛz̤ɛkɛ nɔahinɔwam wasɛjiz̤ɛrɛli ɓaɓa nɡ̤aɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓɔɓaɓini naɓɔ kɛ usawulɛ wajɛtʰɛ umikali intɔmɓi jakʰɛ umkad̤av̤id̤ɛ ufaliti uɲana kalajiʃɛ wasɛɡ̤alim ɓɛz̤a aɓasɛz̤ifi kusawulɛ ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛla ɓatʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ akaz̤ifiɬɛ ɛnd̤ulini jɛhakila ɛkʰanɡ̤ɛlɛnɛ nɛnkanɡ̤ala jini wɛsuka usawulɛ wɛɬa waja ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jɛz̤ifi ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amawaka amatʰatʰu aɬɛliwɛjɔ akwasirajɛli ɛja ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛz̤ifi usawulɛ ɛnd̤ulini jɛhakila ɛkʰanɡ̤ɛlɛnɛ nɛnkanɡ̤ala nɡ̤asɛnɮɛlɛni kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wajɛɬɛli ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ waɓɔna ukuɓa usawulɛ ujamland̤ɛla ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ iintlɔla waz̤i nɡ̤az̤ɔ ukuɓa usawulɛ uz̤ilɛ ɔkunɛnɛ wɛsuka ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waja kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ ɛɓɛmisɛ kujɔ usawulɛ wajiɓɔna ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ind̤awɔ alɛlɛ kujɔ usawulɛ nɔab̤inɛrɛ uɲana kanɛrɛ umtʰɛtʰɛli wɔmkʰɔsi wakʰɛ usawulɛ ɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤apʰakatʰi kɔtʰanɡ̤ɔ lwɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa aɓantu ɓɛmisɛ iintɛntɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kujɛ wapʰɛnd̤ula ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi kuahimɛlɛki um̤ɛti nakuab̤iʃaji uɲana kat͡sɛruja umz̤alwana kajɔwab̤i nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kuɬa ajɛ kusawulɛ ɛmpini watʰi uab̤iʃaji mna nd̤ɔɬa nawɛ waja ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɔab̤iʃaji ɛɓantwini ɛɓusuku nankɔ usawulɛ ɛlɛlɛ uɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤apʰakatʰi kɔtʰanɡ̤ɔ lwɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa iɡ̤ǁ̤uɲɛkiwɛ int͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ jakʰɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni nɡ̤asɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɛ kɛ uab̤inɛrɛ naɓantu ɓakʰɛ ɓɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kujɛ watʰi uab̤iʃaji kud̤av̤id̤ɛ utʰikǁɔ ulunikɛlɛ nam̤la ut͡ʃaɓa lwakʰɔ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ kalɔku makʰɛ nd̤imkǃʰamɛ nɔm̤laɓa nɡ̤ɛnt͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ nɡ̤asiɬanɮɔ siɲɛ nd̤inɡ̤ɛnz̤i z̤iɓɛ z̤iɓini kujɛ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuab̤iʃaji musa ukumɓulala nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤asa isanɮa kumtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa kajɛhɔv̤a az̤ɛ aɓɛ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa akatʰanɡ̤a ujɛhɔv̤a amɓulalɛ m̤lawumɓi jakʰɛ m̤lawumɓi wɛɬa waja ɛmfaz̤wɛni waɓulawa makuɓɛ lɛɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kajɛhɔv̤a ukukʰa nd̤isɛ isanɮa kumtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa kajɛhɔv̤a kʰawutʰaɓatʰɛ kalɔku int͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ ɛnɡ̤asɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɛ nɛsɛlwa lamanz̤i sihamɓɛ wajitʰaɓatʰa kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ int͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ nɛsɛlwa lamanz̤i ɛnɡ̤asɛntlɔkwɛni kasawulɛ ɓɛmka kunɡ̤aɓɔni kunɡ̤az̤i kunɡ̤av̤ukanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɔnkɛ ɓaɓɛlɛlɛ kuɓa ɓaɓɛwɛlwɛ ɓuɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ ɔɓukʰulu ɓukajɛhɔv̤a wawɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waja pʰɛʃɛja wɛma ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛntaɓa kud̤ɛ lilikʰulu itʰuɓa pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ wamɛmɛz̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛɓantwini nakuab̤inɛrɛ uɲana kanɛrɛ ɛsitʰi akupʰɛnd̤uli ab̤inɛrɛ wapʰɛnd̤ula uab̤inɛrɛ watʰi unɡ̤uɓani wɛna umɛmɛz̤ajɔ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuab̤inɛrɛ akujijɔ nd̤ɔd̤a jini nɡ̤uɓani ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɛ kwasirajɛli jini kɛ ukuɓa unɡ̤ajiɡ̤ǀ̤ini inkɔsi jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kufikɛ uɓani wasɛɓantwini ɛz̤a kɔnakalisa inkɔsi jakʰɔ asintɔ ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ lɛ ujɛnz̤ilɛjɔ ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ninɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓɔkufa ninɡ̤ajiɡ̤ǀ̤inanɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛ inkɔsi jɛnu umtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa kajɛhɔv̤a kʰanɡ̤ɛla kalɔku ipʰi int͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ jɔkumkani nɛsɛlwa lamanz̤i ɛliɓɛ linɡ̤asɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɛ walaz̤i usawulɛ iliz̤wi likad̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi liliz̤wi lakʰɔ ɛlɔ ɲana d̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ liliz̤wi nkɔsi jam watʰi jini lɛ ntɔ inkɔsi jam imsukɛlajɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wajɔ kuɓa nd̤ɛz̤ɛ ntɔni ɓuɓi ɓuni ɔɓusɛsanɮɛni nɡ̤ɔkɔ inkɔsi jam majikʰɛ iwapʰulapʰulɛ amaz̤wi ɔmkʰɔnz̤i wajɔ ukuɓa nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɔkukǁʰɔkɔŋǁilɛjɔ nɡ̤akum makasɛz̤ɛlɛ umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa ukuɓa nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu maɓakǃalɛkiswɛ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓand̤iɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰilɛ nam̤la ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤aɬanɡ̤ani nɛlifa likajɛhɔv̤a ɓatʰi hamɓa ukʰɔnz̤ɛ tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi nɡ̤ɔkɔ malinɡ̤apʰalali iɡ̤az̤i ɛm̤laɓɛni nd̤ikud̤ɛ nɔɓusɔ ɓukajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kupʰumɛ wamasirajɛli wɛz̤a intakumɓa ɛmɓala nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔsukɛla isikʰwat͡ʃa ɛz̤intaɓɛni watʰi usawulɛ nd̤ɔnilɛ ɓuja ɲana d̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa and̤isaji kuɓa sakwɛnz̤a ntɔ imɓi nɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ jɔkuɓa umpʰɛfumlɔ uɓuŋǃaɓilɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ nam̤la ujaɓɔna nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ nd̤alaɬɛka nɡ̤ɔkukʰulukaz̤i wapʰɛnd̤ula ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi nant͡si int͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ jɔkumkani makuwɛlɛ ɛɲɛ ind̤ɔd̤ana ijitʰaɓatʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uja kujiɓujisɛla uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓajɔ nɔkutʰɛmɓɛka kwajɔ ind̤ɔd̤a aɓɛkunikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nam̤la and̤iv̤umanɡ̤a isanɮa kumtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa kajɛhɔv̤a jaɓɔna nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ waɓa mkʰulu umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni nam̤la nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ uja kuɓa mkʰulu ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a and̤iɬanɡ̤ulɛ ɛkuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛni kɔnkɛ watʰi usawulɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ usikɛlɛlwɛ ɲana d̤av̤id̤ɛ uja kwɛnz̤a wɛjisɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ uja kufɛz̤a kufɛz̤ɛkɛ wahamɓa kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ inɮɛla jakʰɛ usawulɛ waɓujɛla ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɛ kalɔku nd̤ɔz̤a nd̤iɓulawɛ nɡ̤ɛɲɛ sisanɮa sikasawulɛ akukʰɔ ntɔ ind̤ilunɡ̤ɛlɛjɔ kɛ mand̤iz̤isind̤isɛ nd̤iz̤isind̤isɛlɛ ɛz̤wɛni lamafilisti and̤iŋǀamɛ usawulɛ anɡ̤aɓi sand̤ifuna ɛmid̤ɛni jɔnkɛ jamasirajɛli nd̤isind̤ɛ kɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ wɛsuka kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wawɛla jɛna namad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu aɓɛnawɔ waja kuakiʃɛ uɲana kamahɔki wasɛɡ̤ati ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɬala nɔakiʃɛ ɛɡ̤ati jɛna namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ jajilɛjɔ janɛnɮu jajɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛnaɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓɔɓaɓini uahinɔwam wasɛjiz̤ɛrɛli nɔab̤iɡ̤ali wasɛkarmɛlɛ umkanab̤ali wakǁɛlɛlwa usawulɛ ukuɓa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ uɓalɛkɛlɛ ɛɡ̤ati akaɓa sapʰind̤a amfunɛ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuakiʃɛ ukuɓa kɛ nɡ̤ɔku und̤iɓaɓalɛ nd̤inikɛ ind̤awɔ kɔmɲɛ umz̤i wasɛz̤wɛni nd̤iɬalɛ kʰɔna jini ukuɓa umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ aɬalɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ nawɛ ɛmz̤ini wakɔmkʰulu uakiʃɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ it͡sikɛlaɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡sikɛlaɡ̤ɛ jaɓa jɛjɔkumkani wakwajud̤a unanam̤la inani lɛmiɬa awaɬala nɡ̤ajɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛz̤wɛni lamafilisti laɓa nɡ̤umɲaka ɔnɛɛɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤inɛ kɛ kalɔku wɛɲuka ud̤av̤id̤ɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ ɓawanɡ̤ɛnɛla amaɡ̤ɛʃurɛ namaɡ̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ namaamalɛki nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓɔ ɓɛɓɛnɡ̤aɓɛmi ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ ɓɛkuhand͡ʒ̤wa kulɔ ukujiwa ɛʃurɛ kujiwɛ nasɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa kususɛla kwakud̤ala ud̤av̤id̤ɛ walit͡ʃaɓalalisa ɛlɔ z̤wɛ akasind̤isa nd̤ɔd̤a namfaz̤i watʰaɓatʰa impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ namaɛsilɛ nɛɛnkamɛla nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ waɓuja wɛz̤a kuakiʃɛ watʰi uakiʃɛ kʰɛ naɬasɛla pʰi nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ siɓɛ sinɡ̤ɛnɛlɛ ɛlasɛz̤ant͡si lakwajud̤a nɛlasɛz̤ant͡si lamajɛramɛli nɛlasɛz̤ant͡si lamakɛni ud̤av̤id̤ɛ akasind̤isanɡ̤a nd̤ɔd̤a namfaz̤i unɡ̤amsajɔ ɛɡ̤ati nɡ̤ɔkutʰi ɬɛz̤ɛ ɓasikǁɛlɛ ɓatʰi wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ lalind͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ isikɔ lakʰɛ jɔnkɛ imiɬa aɓɛɬɛli ɛz̤wɛni lamafilisti uakiʃɛ wakʰɔlwa nɡ̤ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi uɡ̤ǃ̤iɓilɛ ukuz̤inukisa ɛɓantwini ɓakɔwaɓɔ kwasirajɛli wɔɓa nɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤i kɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ kwatʰi nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa amafilisti ajiɬanɡ̤anisa jɔnkɛ imikʰɔsi jawɔ ukuz̤ɛ apʰumɛ umkʰɔsi ajɛ namasirajɛli watʰi uakiʃɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ jaz̤i nɡ̤ɔkukǃinisɛkilɛjɔ ukuɓa uja kupʰuma nɔmkʰɔsi wɛna namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɔ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuakiʃɛ kalɔku uja kujaz̤i intɔ ɛja kwɛnz̤iwa nɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ watʰi uakiʃɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ nd̤ɔkumisa uɓɛ nɡ̤umɡ̤ǀ̤ini wɛntlɔkɔ jam imiɬa jɔnkɛ kɛ kalɔku usamuwɛli uɓɛsɛlɛfilɛ aɓɛmmɓamɓaz̤ɛlɛlɛ ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli aɓɛmŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛlɛ ɛrama ɛmz̤ini wakʰɛ usawulɛ ɛɓɛɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰilɛ ɛz̤wɛni aɓanɛʃɔlɔɡ̤u nɔɔsijaz̤i aɬanɡ̤anisana kɛ amafilisti aja ɛʃunɛm wawaɬanɡ̤anisa usawulɛ amasirajɛli ɔnkɛ ɛɡ̤ilib̤ɔwa wajiɓɔna usawulɛ jamafilisti wɔjika jaɡ̤ub̤a intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ kunɛnɛ waɓuz̤a usawulɛ kujɛhɔv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a akampʰɛnd̤ula nanɡ̤amapʰupʰa nanɡ̤ɛɛurim nanɡ̤aɓaprɔfɛti watʰi usawulɛ kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ nd̤ifunɛlɛni inkaz̤ana ɛnɛʃɔlɔɡ̤u nd̤ijɛ kujɔ nd̤iɓuz̤ɛ kujɔ ɓatʰi kujɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ nant͡sija inkaz̤ana ɛnɛʃɔlɔɡ̤u ɛɛnd̤ɔrɛ usawulɛ waz̤ɛnz̤a wumɓi wamɓatʰa nɡ̤uɓɔ z̤imɓi waja ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a amaɓini ɓaja ɓafika kwinkaz̤ana lɛjɔ ɛɓusuku watʰi kʰawund̤iv̤umisɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛʃɔlɔɡ̤u lakʰɔ und̤iɲusɛlɛ lɔwɔ nd̤ija kutʰɛtʰa jɛna kuwɛ jatʰi inkaz̤ana lɛjɔ kujɛ jaɓɔna ujakwaz̤i nawɛ akwɛnz̤ilɛjɔ usawulɛ ukuɓa uɓaŋǃamlɛ ɛz̤wɛni aɓanɛʃɔlɔɡ̤u nɔɔsijaz̤i jini ukuɓa uwutʰijɛlɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤iɓulawɛ usawulɛ wajifunɡ̤ɛla ujɛhɔv̤a ɛsitʰi ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a inɛnɛ akuji kuɓa natʲala nɡ̤alɛ nd̤awɔ jatʰi inkaz̤ana nd̤ikuɲusɛlɛ ɓani watʰi nd̤iɲusɛlɛ usamuwɛli jamɓɔna inkaz̤ana usamuwɛli jakʰala nɡ̤ɛz̤wi ɛlikʰulu jat͡ʃɔ inkaz̤ana lɛjɔ kusawulɛ ukutʰi jini ukuɓa und̤ikʰɔɬisɛ unɡ̤usawulɛ wɛna watʰi kujɔ musa ukɔjika uɓɔnɛ ntɔni jatʰi inkaz̤ana kusawulɛ nd̤iɓɔna umɲaɲa uɲuka upʰuma ɛm̤laɓɛni watʰi kujɛ und͡ʒ̤ani kwawɔ jatʰi inkaz̤ana kuɲukɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnkulu itʰɛ wamɓu inɡ̤uɓɔ jɔkwalɛka waz̤i kɛ usawulɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤usamuwɛli lɔwɔ watʰɔɓa nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni wakǃuɓud̤a watʰi usamuwɛli kusawulɛ jini ukuɓa und̤iɡ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤isɛ und̤iɲusɛ watʰi usawulɛ nd̤iɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛkilɛ kakʰulu amafilisti utʰikǁɔ umkilɛ akasand̤ipʰɛnd̤uli nanɡ̤aɓaprɔfɛti nanɡ̤amapʰupʰa nd̤ikuɓiz̤ɛlɛ ukuɓa und̤az̤isɛ intɔ ɛnd̤inɡ̤ajɛnz̤ajɔ watʰi usamuwɛli jini ukuɓa und̤iɓuz̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛmkilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ kuwɛ waɓa lut͡ʃaɓa lwakʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uz̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wakutʰɛtʰajɔ nɡ̤am ujɛhɔv̤a uɓuk͡xaz̤ulɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ uɓukumkani waɓunika ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɡ̤alipʰulapʰulanɡ̤a iz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤ɛnz̤anɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ kumaamalɛki nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ujɛnz̤ilɛ lɛ ntɔ kuwɛ nam̤la uwanikɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a namasirajɛli kuɲɛ nawɛ ɛsanɮɛni samafilisti nɡ̤ɔmsɔ wɛna nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nija kuɓa nɔmkʰɔsi wamasirajɛli ujɛhɔv̤a uja kuwunikɛla ɛsanɮɛni samafilisti wawa kwaɔkɔ usawulɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni wakǃuŋ̤ǃ̤uluz̤a wɔjika kunɛnɛ nɡ̤amaz̤wi kasamuwɛli akwaɓakʰɔ namanɮa kujɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓɛnɡ̤aɮanɡ̤a kuɮa jɔnkɛ nɔɓusuku ɓɔnkɛ jɛz̤a inkaz̤ana lɛjɔkusawulɛ jaɓɔna ukuɓa ukʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰ɛ kunɛnɛ jatʰi kujɛ jaɓɔna umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ ulipʰulapʰulɛ iz̤wi lakʰɔ nd̤awɛnz̤a isikǀʰɛnɡ̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ nd̤awɛv̤a amaz̤wi akʰɔ ɔwatʰɛtʰajɔ kʰawulipʰulapʰulɛ nawɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ iz̤wi lɔmkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ makʰɛ nd̤iɓɛkɛ ikǃʰɛkɛz̤a lɛsɔnka pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ uɮɛ uɓɛ namanɮa kǁa uhamɓa inɮɛla akav̤uma kɛ watʰi and̤iji kuɮa ɓamz̤ama aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ kwanɛnkaz̤ana lɛjɔ walipʰulapʰula iz̤wi laɓɔ wav̤uka kɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni waɬala ɛlukʰukwɛni kɛ kalɔku inkaz̤ana lɛjɔ jajinɛtʰɔlɛ ɛlitʲɛtʲisiwɛjɔ ɛnɮwini jaŋ̤ǁ̤ama jalikǁʰɛla jatʰaɓatʰa umɡ̤uɓɔ ɔkǀɔliwɛjɔ jawukǁɔv̤ula jɔsa iz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤awɔ jaɓɛka pʰamɓi kɔsawulɛ napʰamɓi kwaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓaɮa ɓɛsuka kɛ ɓahamɓa nɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku ajiɬanɡ̤anisa kɛ amafilisti jɔnkɛ imikʰɔsi jawɔ ɛafɛki amasirajɛli nɡ̤asɛmtʰɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔsɛjiz̤ɛrɛli iz̤ikʰulu z̤amafilisti z̤aɮula z̤inamakʰulu z̤inamawaka ud̤av̤id̤ɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ ɓɛɮula nɡ̤asɛmv̤a nɔakiʃɛ ɓatʰi aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamafilisti ajini mahɛb̤ɛrɛ apʰa watʰi uakiʃɛ kuɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamafilisti lɔ asinɡ̤ujɛna ud̤av̤id̤ɛ umkʰɔnz̤i kasawulɛ wamasirajɛli ɔsɛlɛnɛɛmini nɛmiɲaka ɛnam and̤ifumananɡ̤a mpɔsisɔ kujɛ kutʰaɓatʰɛla kum̤la awapʰamɓa nɡ̤awɔ kwɛz̤isa kulɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamafilisti ɓaɓa nɔɓuxalaxumɛ nɡ̤akujɛ ɓatʰi kujɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamafilisti jiɓujisɛ lɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤a iɓujɛlɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jajɔ apʰɔ wajijalɛla kʰɔna inɡ̤ɛɬi natʰi ijɛ ɛkulwɛni ɬɛz̤ɛ isikǀʰasɛ ɛkulwɛni anɡ̤az̤ikʰɔlisisa nɡ̤antɔni lɔ ɛnkɔsini jakʰɛ akunɡ̤ɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤ala mad̤ɔd̤a jini lɔ asinɡ̤ujɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ aɓaɓɛv̤uma nɡ̤ajɛ ɛkuŋ̤ǃ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤ɛni ɓɛsitʰi usawulɛ uɓulɛlɛ akʰɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ uɓulɛlɛ akʰɛ anɡ̤amaʃumi uakiʃɛ wamɓiz̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi kujɛ ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰɛ tʲɛ wɛna kuɬɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni ukupʰuma kwakʰɔ nɔkunɡ̤ɛna kwakʰɔ ɛmkʰɔsini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa and̤ifumananɡ̤a ɓuɓi kuwɛ kutʰaɓatʰɛla kum̤la wɔkuz̤a kwakʰɔ kuz̤isɛ kulɛ kɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛz̤ikʰulu akum̤lɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓuja uhamɓɛ unɔkǁɔlɔ unɡ̤ɛnz̤i ɓuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛz̤ikʰulu z̤amafilisti watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuakiʃɛ nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ ntɔni ufumɛnɛ ntɔni kumkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ kutʰaɓatʰɛla kum̤la wɔkuɓakʰɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ kuz̤isɛ kulɛ ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤aji nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤ilwɛ nɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤ɛnkɔsi jam wapʰɛnd̤ula uakiʃɛ watʰi kud̤av̤id̤ɛ nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa ulunɡ̤ilɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsitʰuɲwa sikatʰikǁɔ kɔd̤wa aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamafilisti ɓatʰɛ makanɡ̤ɛɲuki natʰi ajɛ ɛkulwɛni nɡ̤ɔkɔ v̤uka nɡ̤ɔmsɔ naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛnkɔsi jakʰɔ aɓaz̤ɛ nawɛ niv̤ukɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɔmsɔ kwakusatʰi nwɛ nihamɓɛ ɓav̤uka kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ jɛna namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ ɓahamɓa ɓaɓujɛla ɛz̤wɛni lamafilisti amafilisti ɛɲuka kɛ aja ɛjiz̤ɛrɛli kwatʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ ɛt͡sikɛlaɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰatʰu amaamalɛki ɛlinɡ̤ɛnɛlɛ ɛlasɛz̤ant͡si nɛt͡sikɛlaɡ̤ɛ ajiɓɛtʰa it͡sikɛlaɡ̤ɛ ajit͡ʃisa nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ aɓatʰimɓa aɓafaz̤i aɓaɓɛkʰɔna kɔd̤wa akaɓulala ukutʰaɓatʰɛla kɔmŋǀinanɛ asɛ kɔmkʰulu akǃʰuɓa ahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jawɔ akufika kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ ɛkʰaja nalɔ lit͡ʃisiwɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ ɓɛtʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛ aɓafaz̤i ɓaɓɔ nɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤aɓɔ ɓalipʰakamisa ɔɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ naɓantu aɓaɓɛnajɛ iliz̤wi laɓɔ ɓalila kwad̤a akwaɓakʰɔ manɮa kuɓɔ ɔkulila naɓafaz̤i ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɓɔɓaɓini ɓaɓɛtʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛ uahinɔwam wasɛjiz̤ɛrɛli nɔab̤iɡ̤ali umkanab̤ali wasɛkarmɛlɛ waɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛka kunɛnɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓantu ɓaɓɛtʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔkumkǁuluɓa nɡ̤amatʲɛ kuɓa umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓantu ɓɔnkɛ uɓuk͡xak͡xa ɛlɔwɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waz̤ɔmɛlɛz̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuab̤ijatarɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli uɲana kaahimɛlɛki kʰawuz̤isɛ iɛfɔd̤i uab̤ijatarɛ wajiz̤isa iɛfɔd̤i kud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓuz̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kujɛhɔv̤a ɛsitʰi nd̤iwasukɛlɛ nd̤ɔwafumana watʰi kujɛ sukɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uja ɔkunɛnɛ uja kuɬanɡ̤ula kɔnkɛ wahamɓa kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ jɛna namad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu anawɔ ɓafika ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni ɔjib̤ɛsɔrɛ amaɲɛ kʰɔna wasukɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ jɛna namakʰulu amanɛ amad̤ɔd̤a kɛ amakʰulu amaɓini amad̤ɔd̤a apʰɛlɛlwɛjɔ anɡ̤ɛnakuwɛla ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni ɔjib̤ɛsɔrɛ kɛ kalɔku ɓafumana ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤umjiputa isɛnɮɛ ɓajiz̤isa kud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɓajinika isɔnka jaɮa ɓajisɛz̤a amanz̤i ɓajinika kɛ ikǀand̤ɛlɔ lɛsikǀumɓa samakʰiwanɛ namakǀand̤ɛlɔ amaɓini ɛsikǀumɓa sɛɛrasintʲisi jaɮa waɓujɛla kujɔ umɔja wajɔ kuɓa iɓinɡ̤aɮanɡ̤a kuɮa inɡ̤asɛlanɡ̤a manz̤i ɛz̤intatʰu nɔɓusuku ɔɓutʰatʰu watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kujɔ unɡ̤umni uv̤ɛla pʰi jatʰi nd̤inɡ̤umfana ɔnɡ̤umjiputa isikǀaka sɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤umamalɛki ind̤iʃijilɛ inkɔsi jam kuɓa nd̤int͡suku ntatʰu nam̤la nd̤isifa siɓɛ sitʰɛ sanɡ̤ɛnɛla ɛlasɛz̤ant͡si lamak͡xɛti nɛlakwajud̤a nɛlasɛz̤ant͡si lakwakalɛb̤i sajit͡ʃisa it͡sikɛlaɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kujɔ unɡ̤and̤isa kulɔɔ jatʰi nd̤ifunɡ̤ɛlɛ utʰikǁɔ ukuɓa akuji kund̤iɓulala akuji kund̤inikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sɛnkɔsi jam nd̤ɔkusa kulɔɔ jamsa kɛ nanɡ̤ɔ ɛz̤itʰɛ d̤wɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛliz̤wɛ lɔnkɛ ɛsiɮa ɛsɛla ɛd̤ud̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jalɔ lɔnkɛ ikǁʰɔɓa ɛlikʰulu aɓɛlitʰimɓilɛ ɛz̤wɛni lamafilisti nasɛz̤wɛni lakwajud̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wawaɓulala ɛkǃalɛ nɡ̤ɔkǀɔlɔtʰi kwad̤a kwaɬwa nɡ̤ɔm̤la ɔland̤ɛlajɔ akwasind̤a namɲɛ kuɓɔ jaɓa nɡ̤amakʰulu amanɛ amad̤ɔd̤ana ɔd̤wa aɓɛkʰwɛlɛ ɛz̤inkamɛlɛni asaɓa wajiɬanɡ̤ula ud̤av̤id̤ɛ jɔnkɛ intɔ aɓɛjitʰimɓilɛ amaamalɛki naɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓɔɓaɓini waɓaɬanɡ̤ula ud̤av̤id̤ɛ naɲɛ intɔ kuz̤ɔ kutʰaɓatʰɛla kwɛŋǀinanɛ kwɛsa kwɛnkulu kwɛsa kɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi kwatʰaɓatʰɛla kwikǁʰɔɓa kwɛsa kwintɔ jɔnkɛ aɓɛjitʰimɓilɛ kuɓɔ jɔnkɛ intɔ wajiɓujisa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wajitʰimɓa jɔnkɛ impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ ɓakǃʰuɓa pʰamɓi kwalɔɔ mfujɔ jakʰɛ ɓatʰi likǁʰɔɓa likad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛli wafika kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ mad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amakʰulu maɓini aɓɛpʰɛlɛlwɛ aɓɛnɡ̤ɛnakumland̤ɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ awajɛwaʃijɛ ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni ɔjib̤ɛsɔrɛ apʰuma aja kumkʰawulɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ aja kuɓakʰawulɛla aɓantu aɓaɓɛnajɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛɓantwini waɓaɓuz̤a ukupʰila kwaɓɔ apʰɛnd̤ula ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a ɔɓuɓi namat͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔ akumad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛhamɓɛ nɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ atʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɓɛnɡ̤ahamɓanɡ̤a natʰi asiji kuɓanika ntɔ ɛmakǁʰɔɓɛni ɛsiwaɬanɡ̤ulɛjɔ ɛlɔwɔ makakǃʰuɓɛ umkakʰɛ naɓantwana ɓakʰɛ ahamɓɛ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ninɡ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ɓaz̤alwana ɓam nɡ̤ɛntɔ asinikilɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wasiɡ̤ǀ̤ina wajinikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sɛtʰu lɛjɔ iɓisifikɛlɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kuniv̤a kwɛli liz̤wi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ sind͡ʒ̤alɔ isaɓɛlɔ sɔɬa ajɛ ɛkulwɛni sind͡ʒ̤alɔ isaɓɛlɔ sɔsɛlɛ nɛmpaɬa ɓaja kwaɓɛlana nɡ̤akuɲɛ kwaɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ kutʰaɓatʰɛla kulɔɔ kuɲusɛ kwaɓa nɡ̤ummisɛlɔ nɛsikɔ kwasirajɛli unanam̤la wɛz̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛt͡sikɛlaɡ̤ɛ watʰumɛla iŋǁɛɲɛ jamakǁʰɔɓa kumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwajud̤a kumakɔwaɓɔ ɛsitʰi nant͡sɔ int͡sikɛlɛlɔ jɛnu ɛmakǁʰɔɓɛni ɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a kwawasɛb̤ɛtɛli nakwawasɛramɔti ɛsɛz̤ant͡si nakwawasɛjatirɛ nakwawasɛarɔhɛrɛ nakwawasɛsifimɔti nakwawasɛɛʃtɛmɔwa nakwawasɛrakali nakwawasɛmiz̤ini jamajɛramɛli nakwawasɛmiz̤ini jamakɛni nakwawasɛhɔrma nakwawasɛkɔraʃan nakwawasɛataki nakwawasɛhɛɓrɔn nasɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ apʰɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ aɓɛhamɓahamɓa kʰɔna jɛna namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ amafilisti kɛ ajɛsilwa namasirajɛli asaɓa amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli pʰamɓi kwamafilisti aŋ̤ǁ̤wɛlɛxiwɛjɔ ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤ɛɡ̤ilib̤ɔwa amafilisti atʰana mɓɛnd̤ɛ nɔsawulɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ amafilisti amɓulala ujɔnatan nɔab̤inad̤ab̤i nɔmalɛkiʃuwa ɔɔɲana ɓakasawulɛ kwaɓa nz̤ima kusawulɛ ɓamfumana aɓatɔli amad̤ɔd̤a anɛsapʰɛtʰa watʰutʰumɛla kakʰulu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓatɔli watʰi usawulɛ kumpʰatʰi wɛɛntɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ xɔla ik͡xɛlɛ lakʰɔ und̤iɬaɓɛ nɡ̤alɔ ɬɛz̤ɛ aɓa ɓanɡ̤alukilɛjɔ ɓɛz̤ɛ ɓand̤iɬaɓɛ amaɬanz̤a ɓafɛkɛtʰɛ nɡ̤am kɛ umpʰatʰi wɛɛntɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ akav̤umanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛsɔjika kunɛnɛ walitʰaɓatʰa kɛ usawulɛ ik͡xɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kwalɔ waɓɔna umpʰatʰi wɛɛntɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ ukuɓa ufilɛ usawulɛ najɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛk͡xɛlɛ lakʰɛ kuɲɛ najɛ wafa kɛ usawulɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓɔɓatʰatʰu nɔmpʰatʰi wɛɛntɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ ɔnkɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ nd̤awɛniɲɛ aɓɔna amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli aɓɛnɡ̤apʰɛʃɛja kwɛntili naɓɛnɡ̤apʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an ukuɓa asaɓilɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli ufilɛ usawulɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ajiʃija imiz̤i lɛjɔ asaɓa ɛz̤a amafilisti aɬala kujɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ amafilisti ɛz̤a kub̤uɲula aɓaɓɛɓulɛwɛ amfumana usawulɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓɔɓatʰatʰu ɓɛwilɛ ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤ɛɡ̤ilib̤ɔwa amŋǃumla intlɔkɔ az̤ipʰanɡ̤a iintɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ atʰumɛla ɛliz̤wɛni lamafilisti nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ukuɓa kuʃuɲajɛlwɛ iind̤aɓa ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛz̤inɮwini z̤ɛz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤awɔ nasɛɓantwini az̤iɓɛka iintɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤inɮwini z̤ɔɔaʃtarɔti awuɓutʰɛlɛla umz̤imɓa wakʰɛ ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni lwasɛb̤ɛtɛʃan ɓɛv̤a aɓɛmi ɓasɛjab̤ɛʃɛ jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i akwɛnz̤ilɛjɔ amafilisti kusawulɛ ɛsuka ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a anɔɓuk͡xɔti ahamɓa uɓusuku ɓɔnkɛ awutʰaɓatʰa umz̤imɓa kasawulɛ nɛmiz̤imɓa jɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni lwasɛb̤ɛtɛʃan ɛz̤a ɛjab̤ɛʃɛ ajit͡ʃisa kʰɔna awatʰaɓatʰa amatʰamɓɔ aɓɔ awaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla pʰant͡si kɔmtamariskɛ ɛjab̤ɛʃɛ az̤ila ukuɮa iint͡suku z̤asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kwatʰi ɛmv̤a kɔkufa kukasawulɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛɓujilɛ ɛkuwaɓulalɛni amaamalɛki waɬala ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛt͡sikɛlaɡ̤ɛ imiɬa ɛmiɓini kwatʰi kɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰatʰu kwaɓɔnakala kuv̤ɛla ind̤ɔd̤a ɛmkʰɔsini kusawulɛ z̤ik͡xaz̤ukilɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ajɔ inɔm̤laɓa ɛntlɔkɔ kwatʰi ɛkuz̤ɛni kwajɔ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ jawa ɛm̤laɓɛni jakǃuɓud̤a watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kujɔ uv̤ɛla pʰi jatʰi kujɛ nd̤isaɓɛ ɛmkʰɔsini wamasirajɛli watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kujɔ kutʰɛkɛni kʰawund̤ikǁɛlɛlɛ jatʰi haji ɓaɓalɛkilɛ aɓantu ɛkulwɛni kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ kuwɛ intɔ ɛninz̤i jaɓantu jafa kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ usawulɛ nɔjɔnatan uɲana wakʰɛ ɓaɓulɛwɛ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kwind̤ɔd̤ana ɛɓimkǁɛlɛla waz̤i nɡ̤ani ukuɓa usawulɛ ufilɛ nɔjɔnatan uɲana wakʰɛ jatʰi ind̤ɔd̤ana ɛɓimkǁɛlɛla kutʰɛ ukutʰi ɡ̤akǁa nd̤afika ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤asɛɡ̤ilib̤ɔwa usawulɛ ajamɛ nɡ̤ɛnt͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ jakʰɛ naɓɔ aɓɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa naɓamahaʃɛ ɓɛtʰɛnɛ mɓɛnd̤ɛ najɛ utʰɛ akub̤ɛka wand̤iɓɔna wand̤iɓiz̤a nd̤atʰi sɛnd̤ikʰɔ watʰi unɡ̤uɓani nd̤atʰi kujɛ nd̤inɡ̤umamalɛki watʰi kʰawumɛ pʰɛz̤u und̤iɓulalɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ipʰɛlɛlwɛ kuɓa and̤ikafi kaɲɛ nd̤ɛma pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ nd̤amɓulala nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛnd̤isaz̤i ukuɓa akaji kuɓa sapʰila ɛmv̤a kɔkuwa kwakʰɛ nd̤atʰaɓatʰa isit͡sʰaɓa ɛsiɓɛ sisɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɛ nɛsakǀʰɔlɔ ɛsiɓɛ sisɛnɡ̤alwɛni jakʰɛ nd̤iz̤isɛ z̤ɔna apʰa kwinkɔsi jam waz̤iɓamɓa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ waz̤ik͡xaz̤ula kwanamad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ ɔnkɛ aɓɛnawɔ ɓammɓamɓaz̤ɛlɛla ɓalila ɓakuz̤ila ukuɮa kwad̤a kwaɬwa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kasawulɛ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa kajɔnatan uɲana wakʰɛ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓantu ɓakajɛhɔv̤a nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnɮu kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛwilɛ lik͡xɛlɛ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kwind̤ɔd̤ana ɛɓimkǁɛlɛla unɡ̤ɔwapʰi jatʰi nd̤inɡ̤uɲana wɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤um̤amɓi umamalɛki watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kujɔ utʰɛni ukuɓa unɡ̤ɔjiki isanɮa sakʰɔ umɓulalɛ umtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa kajɛhɔv̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓiz̤a ɛɲɛ jakumad̤ɔd̤ana watʰi sɔnd̤ɛla ujiɓulalɛ jajikǁaɓɛla kɛ jafa watʰi kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kujɔ iɡ̤az̤i lakʰɔ maliɓɛ sɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umlɔmɔ wakʰɔ uliŋ̤ǃ̤ina nɡ̤awɛ usitʰi mna nd̤imɓulɛlɛ umtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa kajɛhɔv̤a kɛ kalɔku ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wasɛnz̤a ɛsi simɓɔnɔnɔ nɡ̤ɔsawulɛ nanɡ̤ɔjɔnatan uɲana wakʰɛ watʰi maɓajifund̤iswɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a inɡ̤ɔma lɛjɔ jɛsapʰɛtʰa nant͡sɔ ib̤aliwɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɔtʰɛ tʲɛ imɓalaxa sirajɛli iɓulɛwɛ ɛmimanɡ̤wɛni jakʰɔ haji kwamaɡ̤ɔxa musani ukukǁɛla ɛɡ̤ati musani ukwɛnz̤a z̤ind̤aɓa ɛz̤itratwɛni z̤ɛaʃkɛlɔn ɬɛz̤ɛ z̤iv̤ujɛ iintɔmɓi z̤amafilisti ɬɛz̤ɛ z̤iv̤ujɛlɛlɛ iintɔmɓi z̤aɓanɡ̤alukilɛjɔ nina z̤intaɓa z̤asɛɡ̤ilib̤ɔwa makunɡ̤az̤ɛ kuɓɛkʰɔ mɓɛtʰɛ makunɡ̤az̤ɛ kuɓɛkʰɔ mv̤ula ɛmixumɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kʰɔna kwaŋ̤ǀ̤ɔla iinɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ z̤amaɡ̤ɔxa inɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ kasawulɛ wanɡ̤a wajɛ ɛnɡ̤atʰand͡ʒ̤iswanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛɔli ɛɡ̤az̤ini laɓaɬatʲiwɛjɔ ɛmaŋǃatʰɛni amaɡ̤ɔxa isapʰɛtʰa sikajɔnatan ɓɛsinɡ̤aɓuji umv̤a ik͡xɛlɛ likasawulɛ ɓɛlinɡ̤aɓuji lilamɓatʰa usawulɛ nɔjɔnatan ɓaɓɛz̤iinz̤wana ɓɛtʰand̤ɛka ɛkuɮɛni kwaɓɔ uɓɔmi nasɛkufɛni kwaɓɔ aɓaɬukananɡ̤a ɓaɓɛnamɛnd̤u nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwamakǁʰalanɡ̤a ɓaɓɛnamanɮa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnɡ̤ɔɲama z̤intɔmɓi z̤akwasirajɛli mlilɛlɛni usawulɛ ɔɓɛnamɓɛsa iinɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤iɓɔmv̤u ɛnijɔlisa ɔɓɛniŋǁiɓa iz̤ihɔmɓɔ z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛz̤amɓatʰwɛni z̤ɛnu haji kwamaɡ̤ɔxa pʰakatʰi kwɛmfaz̤wɛ ujɔnatan uɓulawɛlwɛ ɛmimanɡ̤wɛni jakʰɔ nd̤iɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛkilɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɔ mz̤alwana jɔnatan uɓumnand̤i kakʰulu kuɓalukɛkilɛ ukund̤itʰand̤a kwakʰɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔkutʰand̤a kɔmntu ɔjinkaz̤ana haji kwamaɡ̤ɔxa ad̤akilɛ amad̤ɔd̤a ɔkulwa kwatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ waɓuz̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kujɛhɔv̤a ɛsitʰi nd̤iɲukɛ nd̤ijɛ ɛmz̤ini wakwajud̤a watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɛ ɲuka watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nd̤iɲukɛ nd̤ijɛ pʰi watʰi jɛna ɛhɛɓrɔn wɛɲuka kɛ waja kʰɔna ud̤av̤id̤ɛ naɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓɔɓaɓini uahinɔwam wasɛjiz̤ɛrɛli nɔab̤iɡ̤ali umkanab̤ali wasɛkarmɛlɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ aɓɛnawɔ wawaɲusa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ jajilɛjɔ nɛnɮu jajɔ aɬala ɛmiz̤ini jasɛhɛɓrɔn ɛz̤a amad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a amtʰamɓisa kʰɔna apʰɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani kwinɮu jakwajud̤a kwakǁɛlwa kud̤av̤id̤ɛ kusitʰiwa amad̤ɔd̤a asɛjab̤ɛʃɛ jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i nɡ̤awɔ awamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓajɔ usawulɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰumɛla kɛ aɓatʰuɲwa kumad̤ɔd̤a asɛjab̤ɛʃɛ jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i watʰi kuwɔ manisikɛlɛlwɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a najɛnz̤ɛlajɔ inkɔsi jɛnu usawulɛ lɔɔ ŋǀɛɓa najiŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa nɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a makanɛnz̤ɛlɛ iŋǀɛɓa nɛɲanisɔ nd̤ija kunɛnz̤ɛla ɔkɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa najɛnz̤ajɔ lɔɔ ntɔ kɛ kalɔku maz̤ɔmɛlɛlɛ iz̤anɮa z̤ɛnu niɓɛ nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a anɔɓuk͡xɔti nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ifilɛ inkɔsi jɛnu usawulɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ind̤itʰamɓisilɛ inɮu jakwajud̤a ukuɓa nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wajɔ kɛ kalɔku uab̤inɛrɛ uɲana kanɛrɛ umtʰɛtʰɛli wɔmkʰɔsi ɔɓunɡ̤ɔkasawulɛ ɛɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛ uiʃb̤ɔʃɛtɛ uɲana kasawulɛ wamwɛz̤ɛla ɛmahanajim wamɛnz̤a ɛɡ̤ilijad̤i nakumaaskurɛ nasɛjiz̤ɛrɛli nakwaɛfrajim nakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nakumasirajɛli ɔnkɛ uiʃb̤ɔʃɛtɛ uɲana kasawulɛ ɛɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi manɛ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ɛkwɛnz̤iwɛni kwakʰɛ kumasirajɛli wanɡ̤ukumkani imiɲaka ɛmiɓini kɔd̤wa inɮu jakwajud̤a jaland̤ɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ inani lɛmiɬa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ aɓɛnɡ̤ukumkani kwinɮu jakwajud̤a ɛhɛɓrɔn liɓɛ lijimiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛnɛɛɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤intand̤atʰu wapʰuma uab̤inɛrɛ uɲana kanɛrɛ naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakaiʃb̤ɔʃɛtɛ uɲana kasawulɛ ɛmahanajim ɓaja ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn ɓapʰuma ujɔwab̤i uɲana kat͡sɛruja naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɓakǃuɓisana naɓɔ ɛkǀʰiɓini lasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn ɓaɬala aɓa ɛkǀʰiɓini nɡ̤apʰa ɓaɬala aɓaja ɛkǀʰiɓini nɡ̤apʰaja watʰi uab̤inɛrɛ kujɔwab̤i amad̤ɔd̤ana makakʰɛ asukɛ aɮalɛ pʰamɓi kwɛtʰu watʰi ujɔwab̤i makasukɛ kwɛsuka kwawɛla iʃumi ɛlinamaɓini lakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin lakwaiʃb̤ɔʃɛtɛ uɲana kasawulɛ nɛʃumi ɛlinamaɓini kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ jaɓa nɡ̤ulɔwɔ waɓamɓa ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛntlɔkɔ nɛk͡xɛlɛ lakʰɛ lɛla ɛkǀalɛni lɔwaɓɔ ɓawa kuɲɛ nd̤awɛniɲɛ kwatʰiwa kɛ lɛ nd̤awɔ jihɛlɛkatihat͡surim ɛsɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn kwaliwa kakʰulu nɡ̤alɔɔ waɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰwa uab̤inɛrɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli pʰamɓi kwaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɓaɓɛlapʰɔ ɓɔɓatʰatʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakat͡sɛruja ujɔwab̤i nɔab̤iʃaji nɔasahɛli kɛ uasahɛli wajɛ ɛnamɛnd̤u ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛb̤ad̤i lasɛnɮɛ uasahɛli wamsukɛla uab̤inɛrɛ akatʰi ɡ̤u ɓukǀala ajɛ nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ nanɡ̤asɛkʰɔɬɔ ɛmv̤a kɔab̤inɛrɛ wab̤ɛka uab̤inɛrɛ watʰi unɡ̤uasahɛli watʰi jɛna nd̤inɡ̤ujɛ watʰi uab̤inɛrɛ kujɛ tʲɛkɛla nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ kwakʰɔ nɔkuɓa kunɡ̤asɛkʰɔɬɔ kwakʰɔ uɓamɓɛ ɛɲɛ kumad̤ɔd̤ana uz̤itʰaɓatʰɛlɛ isik͡xwɛkǃɛ sajɔ kɛ uasahɛli akav̤uma ukutʲɛka ɛkumland̤ɛlɛni waɓuja wapʰind̤a watʰi uab̤inɛrɛ kuasahɛli tʲɛka ɛkund̤iland̤ɛlɛni jini ukuɓa nd̤id̤ɛ nd̤ikuɓɛtʰɛ uwɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni nd̤ɔtʰini ukuɓupʰakamisa uɓusɔ ɓam kujɔwab̤i umkʰuluwa wakʰɔ akav̤uma ukutʲɛka uab̤inɛrɛ wamt͡ʃɔ nɡ̤ɔlutʰi lwɛnt͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ ɛsiswini jaja kupʰuma int͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ nɡ̤asɛmv̤a wawa kʰɔna wafɛla kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ ɓatʰi ɓɔnkɛ aɓafika kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ wafɛla kujɔ uasahɛli ɓɛɛ ŋǃumama ɔɔjɔwab̤i nɔab̤iʃaji ɓamsukɛla ɓamland̤ɛla uab̤inɛrɛ lad̤a lat͡ʃɔna ilanɡ̤a ɓad̤a ɓafika ɛd̤ulini jɛama ɛkʰanɡ̤ɛlɛnɛ nɛɡ̤ija ɛnɮɛlɛni jɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn ɓaɬanɡ̤anisana ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɓamland̤ɛla uab̤inɛrɛ ɓamɓumɓaɲɛ ɓɛma ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jand̤uliɲɛ wamɛmɛz̤a uab̤inɛrɛ kujɔwab̤i watʰi lija ukuɮa ik͡xɛlɛ akwaz̤i ukuɓa kuja kuɓa k͡xak͡xa kamv̤a kuja kuɓa mz̤uz̤u unɡ̤akanani unɡ̤aɓakǁɛlɛli aɓantu ɓaɓujɛ ɛkusukɛlɛni aɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ watʰi ujɔwab̤i ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa ɓɛkunɡ̤atʰɛlɛkiswanɡ̤a nɡ̤uwɛ inɛnɛ nɡ̤ɛɓɛɲuswɛ ɓɛmka kwanɡ̤ɔkuja aɓantu ɛlɔwɔ akamsukɛla umz̤alwana wakʰɛ ujɔwab̤i wav̤utʰɛla isiɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɓɛma ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓaɓa sawasukɛla amasirajɛli aɓaɓa sapʰind̤a ɓalwɛ uab̤inɛrɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ ɓahamɓa ɛarab̤a ɓɔnkɛ ɔɓɔ ɓusuku ɓajiwɛla ijɔrd̤an ɓajihamɓa jɔnkɛ ib̤itrɔn ɓɛz̤a ɛmahanajim waɓuja kɛ ujɔwab̤i ɛkumsukɛlɛni uab̤inɛrɛ waɓaɬanɡ̤anisa aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ kwaswɛlɛka kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ iʃumi ɛlinɛsitʰɔɓa lamad̤ɔd̤a nɔasahɛli kɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɓaɓɛɓulɛlɛ kumab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin d̤ɔd̤a akwaab̤inɛrɛ amakʰulu amatʰatʰu anamaŋǀi amatʰand̤atʰu amad̤ɔd̤a ɓamtʰaɓatʰa uasahɛli ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni likajisɛ ɛlisɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm ɓahamɓa kɛ uɓusuku ɓɔnkɛ ujɔwab̤i namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ ɓɛsɛhɛɓrɔn kɛ kalɔku jɔluka imfaz̤wɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛnɮu kasawulɛ nɛnɮu kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waja ɛsɔmɛlɛla nɡ̤ɔkɔmɛlɛla inɮu kasawulɛ jaja iŋǀipʰa nɡ̤ɔkuŋǀipʰa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waz̤alɛlwa ɔɔɲana ɛhɛɓrɔn ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ waɓa nɡ̤uamnɔn nɡ̤ɔahinɔwam wasɛjiz̤ɛrɛli ɔwɛsiɓini waɓanɡ̤ukilijab̤i nɡ̤ɔab̤iɡ̤ali umkanab̤ali wasɛkarmɛlɛ ɔwɛsitʰatʰu waɓa nɡ̤uab̤isalɔm uɲana kamahaka intɔmɓi katalɛmaji wasɛɡ̤ɛʃuri ɔwɛsinɛ waɓa nɡ̤uad̤ɔnija uɲana kahaɡ̤iti ɔwɛsiɬanu waɓa nɡ̤uʃɛfatija uɲana kaab̤itali ɔwɛsitʰand̤atʰu waɓa nɡ̤uitram nɡ̤ɔɛɡ̤la umkad̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓaz̤alɛlwa aɓɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛhɛɓrɔn kwatʰi kwakuɓɔn ukuɓa kukʰɔ imfaz̤wɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛnɮu kasawulɛ nɛnɮu kad̤av̤id̤ɛ uab̤inɛrɛ ukuz̤ɔmɛlɛz̤ɛla inɮu kasawulɛ kɛ usawulɛ ɛɓɛnɛʃwɛʃwɛ ɛliɡ̤ama linɡ̤urit͡spa intɔmɓi kaaja watʰi kɛ uiʃb̤ɔʃɛtɛ kuab̤inɛrɛ jini ukuɓa ulinɡ̤ɛnɛ iʃwɛʃwɛ likaɓawɔ wav̤utʰa kakʰulu nɡ̤umsind̤ɔ uab̤inɛrɛ nɡ̤amaz̤wi kaiʃb̤ɔʃɛtɛ watʰi nd̤ijintlɔkɔ jɛnd͡ʒ̤a ɛlunɡ̤ɛ kwajud̤a jini nam̤la nd̤ijɛnz̤ɛla iŋǀɛɓa inɮu kasawulɛ ujiɬɔ kuɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ nakuɓaɬɔɓɔ ɓakʰɛ and̤ikujɛkɛlanɡ̤a ɛsanɮɛni sikad̤av̤id̤ɛ kɛ und̤iv̤ɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɛnd̤iɓɛnz̤ɛ kulɛ nkaz̤ana nam̤la utʰikǁɔ makɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ kuab̤inɛrɛ akǃɔkɛlɛ ukwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wamfunɡ̤ɛlajɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nd̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kujɛ ukuɓuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰisa uɓukumkani ɛnɮwini kasawulɛ kumiswɛ itrɔnɛ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ kwasirajɛli nakwajud̤a kutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ kwad̤an kusɛ ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a akaɓa saɓa nakɔ ukumpʰɛnd̤ula nɛz̤wi uab̤inɛrɛ nɡ̤ɔkumɔjika wɛsusa ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ uab̤inɛrɛ aɓatʰuɲwa ɓaja kud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛsitʰi lɛlikaɓani iliz̤wɛ ɛsitʰi jɛnz̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wakʰɔ ujaɓɔna isanɮa sinawɛ ukuɓa aɡ̤ukǃulɛlwɛ kuwɛ amasirajɛli ɔnkɛ watʰi kulunɡ̤ilɛ nd̤ɔwɛnz̤a nawɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ kɔd̤wa kukʰɔ ntɔɲɛ nd̤ijifunajɔ kuwɛ jilɛ akuji kuɓuɓɔna uɓusɔ ɓam unɡ̤amz̤isanɡ̤a umikali intɔmɓi kasawulɛ wakuz̤a kuɓuɓɔna uɓusɔ ɓam ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wɛsusa aɓatʰuɲwa ɓaja kuiʃb̤ɔʃɛtɛ uɲana kasawulɛ ɛsitʰi nd̤inikɛ umikali ɛnd̤amɡ̤ana nɡ̤ɛkʰulu lɛɛɲama z̤ɔkwaluswa z̤amafilisti watʰumɛla uiʃb̤ɔʃɛtɛ wamtʰaɓatʰa kwind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ kupaltijɛli uɲana kalajiʃɛ jahamɓa najɛ kɛ ind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ kwad̤a kwɛz̤isa ɛb̤ahurim watʰi uab̤inɛrɛ kujɔ hamɓa uɓujɛ jaɓuja kɛ kalɔku uab̤inɛrɛ wajɛnɛliz̤wi kumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwasirajɛli ɛlitʰi kwanɡ̤apʰamɓili niɓɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani jɛnz̤ani kalɔku nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ut͡ʃilɔ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukutʰi nd̤ija kuɓasind̤isa nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikad̤av̤id̤ɛ umkʰɔnz̤i aɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli ɛsanɮɛni samafilisti nasɛsanɮɛni sɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ uab̤inɛrɛ ɛɓɛtʰɛtʰilɛ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤amab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin kand͡ʒ̤alɔ uab̤inɛrɛ waja kutʰɛtʰa ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤ikad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛhɛɓrɔn kɔnkɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ pʰamɓi kwamasirajɛli napʰamɓi kwɛnɮu jɔnkɛ jakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin waja kɛ uab̤inɛrɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛhɛɓrɔn ɛnamaʃumi amaɓini amad̤ɔd̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wamɛnz̤ɛla kɛ isiɮɔ uab̤inɛrɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ aɓɛnawɔ watʰi uab̤inɛrɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ nd̤ija nd̤iwaɬanɡ̤anisɛlɛ ɛnkɔsini jam ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli ɛnz̤ɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nawɛ uɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani ɛntwɛni jɔnkɛ ɔjiŋǃwɛnɛlajɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wamnd̤ulula uab̤inɛrɛ wahamɓa ɛkǁɔlilɛ kwaɓɔnakala aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɓɛnɔjɔwab̤i ɓɛv̤ɛla ɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini wɔkututa ɓɛsiz̤a namakǁʰɔɓa amaninz̤i kɛ uab̤inɛrɛ ɛɓɛnɡ̤asɛkʰɔna kud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛhɛɓrɔn nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓɛmnd̤ululɛ wahamɓa ɛkǁɔlilɛ ɓafika ɔɔjɔwab̤i nɔmkʰɔsi wɔnkɛ anawɔ kwakǁɛlwa kujɔwab̤i kwatʰiwa uab̤inɛrɛ uɲana kanɛrɛ uɓɛz̤ilɛ wamnd̤ulula wahamɓa ɛkǁɔlilɛ waja ujɔwab̤i watʰi jintɔni lɛ ujɛnz̤ilɛjɔ ujaɓɔna uɓɛz̤ilɛ uab̤inɛrɛ kuwɛ jintɔni lɛ ntɔ umnd̤ululɛjɔ wahamɓa wɛmka ujamaz̤i uab̤inɛrɛ uɲana kanɛrɛ ukuɓa uɓɛz̤ɛ kukutʰɔmalalisa ukuz̤ɛ akwaz̤i ukupʰuma kwakʰɔ nɔkunɡ̤ɛna kwakʰɔ akwaz̤i kɔnkɛ ɔkwɛnz̤ajɔ wapʰuma ujɔwab̤i kud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰuma aɓatʰuɲwa ɓaland̤ɛla uab̤inɛrɛ ɓamɓujisa ɛkǃulɛni lasɛsira ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛnɡ̤az̤i waɓuja kɛ uab̤inɛrɛ wɛz̤a ɛhɛɓrɔn ujɔwab̤i wamtʰaɓatʰɛla ɓukǀala pʰakatʰi kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ ukuɓa atʰɛtʰɛ najɛ nɡ̤asɛsɛ wamɡ̤waz̤a ɛsiswini nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤az̤i likaasahɛli wakʰɛ wɛv̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa kund͡ʒ̤alɔ watʰi nd̤imsulwa nɔɓukumkani ɓam pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni nɡ̤amaɡ̤az̤i kaab̤inɛrɛ uɲana kanɛrɛ makaɓɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛntlɔkɔ kajɔwab̤i napʰɛz̤u kwɛnɮu jɔnkɛ kajisɛ makanɡ̤aŋǃuɲulwa anɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ɛnɮwini kajɔwab̤i ɔb̤ɔb̤ɔz̤ajɔ ɔnɛkǃʰɛŋǃa ɔsimɛlɛla nɡ̤ɛntɔnɡ̤a ɔwa nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ɔswɛlɛ ukuɮa ujɔwab̤i nɔab̤iʃaji wakʰɛ ɓamɓulala kɛ uab̤inɛrɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɛɓɛmɓulɛlɛ uasahɛli waɓɔ ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn ɛmfaz̤wɛni watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kujɔwab̤i nakuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ anaɓɔ k͡xaz̤ulani iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɛnu nib̤iŋǃɛ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ nimmɓamɓaz̤ɛlɛlɛ uab̤inɛrɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waliland̤ɛla itʰala ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla ɛhɛɓrɔn uab̤inɛrɛ walipʰakamisa iliz̤wi lakʰɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni likaab̤inɛrɛ ɓalila aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ukumkani wamɛnz̤ɛla isimɓɔnɔnɔ uab̤inɛrɛ watʰi anɡ̤afa nɡ̤ɔkufa kwɛsid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ uab̤inɛrɛ iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɔ ɓɛz̤inɡ̤akʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰wanɡ̤a iiɲawɔ z̤akʰɔ ɓɛz̤inɡ̤afakwanɡ̤a amakʰamand̤ɛla ɔb̤ɛd̤u uwɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔwa pʰamɓi kwamab̤ɛd̤ɛnɡ̤u ɓapʰind̤a ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓamlilɛla ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓɛz̤a kumɮisa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ isɔnka kusɛsɛmini wafunɡ̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛsitʰi utʰikǁɔ makɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ akǃɔkɛlɛ ukwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ linɡ̤ɛkat͡ʃɔni ilanɡ̤a nd̤ɛv̤a isɔnka nɔkuɓa jintɔ ɛjijimɓi ɓakuɡ̤ǃ̤ala ɔkɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu kwalunɡ̤a ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa kɔnkɛ aɓɛkwɛnz̤a ɓɛkulunɡ̤a ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓaz̤i kɛ aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ namasirajɛli ɔnkɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ ukuɓa ukuɓulawa kukaab̤inɛrɛ uɲana kanɛrɛ ɓɛkunɡ̤apʰumɛ watʰi kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ anaz̤i ukuɓa nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ kuwɛ umtʰɛtʰɛli ɔmkʰulu kwasirajɛli kɛ nd̤isɛɓutʰatʰaka nd̤isatʰand͡ʒ̤iswa nam̤la ukuɓa nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani mad̤ɔd̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakat͡sɛruja alukʰuni akwaɓa ujɛhɔv̤a anɡ̤amɓujɛkɛz̤a umɛnz̤i wɔɓuɓi kwanɡ̤ɔɓuɓi ɓakʰɛ wɛv̤a uɲana kasawulɛ ukuɓa ufilɛ uab̤inɛrɛ ɛhɛɓrɔn z̤awa iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli akʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰iswa jilɔɔ ntɔ uɲana kasawulɛ uɓɛnamad̤ɔd̤a amaɓini anɡ̤aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛmikʰɔsi iɡ̤ama lɛɲɛ lalinɡ̤ub̤ahana iɡ̤ama lɛjɛsiɓini lalinɡ̤urɛkab̤i ɓɛnɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakarimɔn wasɛb̤ɛrɔti kuɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɛb̤ɛrɔti iɓiɓalɛlwa kwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin aɓasɛb̤ɛrɔti ɓaɓɛɓalɛkɛlɛ ɛɡ̤itajim ɓaɓa nɡ̤aɓapʰamɓukɛli kʰɔna unanam̤la kɛ kalɔku ujɔnatan uɲana kasawulɛ uɓɛnɔɲana ɔfɛ iiɲawɔ ɛɓɛmiɲaka miɬanu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ kɔd̤aɓa lukasawulɛ nɔjɔnatan ɛjiz̤ɛrɛli umɔnɮikaz̤i wakʰɛ wɛsuka wamtʰaɓatʰa waɓalɛka kwatʰi ɛkuɓalɛkɛni kwakʰɛ ɓupʰutʰupʰutʰu waɓa sisikǃʰwala iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ ɓɛlinɡ̤umɛfib̤ɔʃɛtɛ ɓahamɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakarimɔn wasɛb̤ɛrɔti ɔɔrɛkab̤i nɔb̤ahana ɛkufud̤umalɛni kwɛmini ɓafika ɛnɮwini kaiʃb̤ɔʃɛtɛ ɛlɛlɛ ɛmini ɛnkulu ɓɔna ɓanɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini pʰakatʰi nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤atʰi ɓaz̤a kutʰaɓatʰa iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa ɓasuka ɓamt͡ʃɔ ɛsiswini ɓasaɓa urɛkab̤i nɔb̤ahana umz̤alwana wakʰɛ ɓanɡ̤ɛna kɛ ɛnɮwini ɛlɛlɛ ɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlwɛni sakʰɛ ɛɡ̤umɓini lakʰɛ lɔkulala ɓam̤laɓa ɓamɓulala ɓamŋǃumla intlɔkɔ ɓajitʰaɓatʰa intlɔkɔ jakʰɛ ɓahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛarab̤a ɓɔnkɛ uɓusuku ɓajisa intlɔkɔ kaiʃb̤ɔʃɛtɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛhɛɓrɔn ɓatʰi nant͡si intlɔkɔ kaiʃb̤ɔʃɛtɛ uɲana kasawulɛ ut͡ʃaɓa lwakʰɔ ɛluɓɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ujipʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlɛlɛ inkɔsi jam nam̤la kusawulɛ nakwimɓɛwu jakʰɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓapʰɛnd̤ula ɔɔrɛkab̤i nɔb̤ahana umz̤alwana wakʰɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakarimɔn wasɛb̤ɛrɔti watʰi kuɓɔ ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔwukʰululɛjɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ ɛkuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛkɛni kɔnkɛ nd̤atʰi ɔwand̤ikǁɛlɛlajɔ ukutʰi nanku usawulɛ ɛfilɛ ɛɓa uz̤isa iind̤aɓa ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nd̤amɓamɓa nd̤amɓulala ɛt͡sikɛlaɡ̤ɛ umv̤uz̤ɔ wɛɛnd̤aɓa z̤akʰɛ asikɔkukʰɔna nd̤ija kuliɓiz̤a iɡ̤az̤i lajɔ ɛsanɮɛni sɛnu nd̤init͡ʃajɛlɛ ɛliz̤wɛni kǁa amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ aɓulɛlɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛlilunɡ̤isa ɛnɮwini jajɔ ɛsililini sajɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wawawisɛla amad̤ɔd̤ana akwakʰɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ aɓaɓulala aɓaŋǃumla iz̤anɮa nɛɛɲawɔ az̤ikǁʰɔma ɛkǀʰiɓini ɛhɛɓrɔn kɛ intlɔkɔ kaiʃb̤ɔʃɛtɛ ajitʰaɓatʰa ajiŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni likaab̤inɛrɛ ɛhɛɓrɔn z̤ɛz̤a z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤akwasirajɛli kud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛhɛɓrɔn z̤at͡ʃɔ ukutʰi ujaɓɔna silitʰamɓɔ lakʰɔ nɛɲama jakʰɔ kwanɡ̤apʰamɓili ɔkɔ usawulɛ ɛɓɛnɡ̤ukumkani kutʰi iɓinɡ̤uwɛ ɔɓɛsakupʰuma unɡ̤ɛna namasirajɛli ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi kuwɛ wɛna uja kuɓalusa aɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli wɛna uja kuɓa jinɡ̤anɡ̤a jamasirajɛli aja kɛ ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwasirajɛli ɛhɛɓrɔn wɛnz̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nawɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛhɛɓrɔn pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a amtʰamɓisa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wamasirajɛli ud̤av̤id̤ɛ uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi matʰatʰu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukwɛnz̤iwa kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛmaʃumi manɛ ɛnɡ̤ukumkani waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani wakwajud̤a ɛhɛɓrɔn imiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɛɛɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤intand̤atʰu ɛjɛrusalɛm waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi matʰatʰu anamitʰatʰu kumasirajɛli ɔnkɛ namajud̤a ukumkani waja namad̤ɔd̤a akwakʰɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm kumajɛb̤usi aɓɛmi ɓɛlɔ z̤wɛ ɓatʰi kud̤av̤id̤ɛ akusaji kunɡ̤ɛna apʰa kuɓa nɛz̤ikǃʰwala z̤ɔkuɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa ɓat͡ʃɔ ɓɛɓa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ akasaji kunɡ̤ɛna apʰɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wajitʰimɓa imɓɔnisɛlɔ jɛz̤ijɔn nɡ̤umz̤i kad̤av̤id̤ɛ kɛ lɔwɔ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓakǁaɓɛla amajɛb̤usi maɓaz̤iwisɛ ɛŋ̤ǁ̤aŋ̤ǁ̤asini iz̤ikǃʰwala kwanɛɛmfama ɛz̤itʰijɛkilɛjɔ ɛmpʰɛfumlwɛni kad̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ɓatʰi iimfama nɛz̤ikǃʰwala az̤iji kunɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɬala ɛmɓɔnisɛlwɛni wajiɓiz̤a nɡ̤ɔkutʰi nɡ̤umz̤i kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wakʰa nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛmilɔ wɛsa pʰakatʰi waja ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛɓa mkʰulu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa mkʰulu ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi waɓa najɛ kɛ kalɔku uhiram wasɛtirɛ watʰumɛla aɓatʰuɲwa kud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɛmisɛd̤arɛ nɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi z̤ɛmitʰi nɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi z̤amatʲɛ ɛɛnd̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤amakʰɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ inɮu waz̤i ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a umkǃinisilɛ wanɡ̤ukumkani ukuɓa uɓupʰakamisilɛ uɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓantu ɓakʰɛ amasirajɛli ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓuja waz̤ɛka aɓafaz̤i namaʃwɛʃwɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkusuka kwakʰɛ ɛhɛɓrɔn waɓuja waz̤alɛlwa ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤awɔ amaɡ̤ama aɓɔ waɓaz̤alɛlwajɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤uʃamuwa nɔʃɔb̤ab̤i nɔnatan nɔsɔlɔmɔn nɔib̤ɛharɛ nɔɛliʃuwa nɔnɛfɛɡ̤ɛ nɔjafija nɔɛliʃama nɔɛlijad̤a nɔɛlifɛlɛtɛ kɛ kalɔku ɛv̤a amafilisti ukuɓa ɓamtʰamɓisilɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kumasirajɛli ɛɲuka kɛ ɔnkɛ amafilisti aja ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wɛv̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wɛɬa waja ɛmɓɔnisɛlwɛni amafilisti aɓɛz̤ilɛ atʰi d̤wɛ ɛntilini jamarafa waɓuz̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kujɛhɔv̤a watʰi nd̤iɲukɛ nd̤ijɛ kumafilisti wɔwanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɲuka nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iwanikɛlɛ mpɛla amafilisti ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wɛz̤a ɛb̤ahalipɛrat͡sim ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wawakǁaɓɛla kʰɔna watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a uz̤itʰʲɔɓɔz̤ɛlɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤am pʰamɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkutʰʲɔɓɔz̤a kwamanz̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ watʰi iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ nd̤awɔ jib̤ahalipɛrat͡sim az̤iʃija iz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤awɔ ɓaz̤itʰaɓatʰa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ aɓuja apʰind̤a ɛɲuka amafilisti atʰi d̤wɛ ɛntilini jamarafa waɓuz̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kujɛhɔv̤a watʰi jɛna uz̤ɛ unɡ̤ɛɲuki d͡ʒ̤ikɛla ɛmv̤a kwawɔ ufikɛ kuwɔ malunɡ̤a nɛmitʰi jɛmib̤aka kɔtʰi ɛkuv̤ɛni kwakʰɔ isand̤i sɔkuhamɓa ɛmantlɔkɔ ɛmitʰi jɛmib̤aka wand̤ulɛ uŋ̤ǁ̤amisɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɔɓa upʰumilɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛlakǁɛʃa ukuɓa ajikǁaɓɛlɛ jamafilisti wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a aɓɛmwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ wawakǁaɓɛla amafilisti watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛɡ̤ɛb̤a wad̤a waja ɛɡ̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ kɛ kalɔku waɓuja waɓaɬanɡ̤anisa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɬɛliwɛjɔ ɓakwasirajɛli amaʃumi amatʰatʰu wɛsuka kɛ wahamɓa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛnaɓɔ ɛsija ɛb̤ahali jakwajud̤a ɛsija kuɲusa kʰɔna itʲɛja
