katʰikǁɔ ɛɓiz̤wa nɡ̤alɔ iɡ̤ama iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ɔɬɛli pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛkɛrub̤i ɓajikʰwɛlisa ɛŋǃwɛlwɛni ɛnt͡ʃa itʲɛja katʰikǁɔ ɓajitʰaɓatʰa ɛnɮwini kaab̤inad̤ab̤i ɛɓisɛnd̤ulini uuz̤a nɔnɔahijɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaab̤inad̤ab̤i ɓɛjikǃʰuɓa iŋǃwɛlɔ ɛnt͡ʃa lɛjɔ ɓajitʰaɓatʰa ɛnɮwini kaab̤inad̤ab̤i ɛsɛnd̤ulini inɛtʲɛja katʰikǁɔ uahijɔ ɛhamɓa pʰamɓi kwɛtʲɛja ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɛnɮu jɔnkɛ kasirajɛli ɓakǃamɓa pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɓɛɓɛtʰa imitʰi jɔnkɛ jɛsiprɛs nɛɛhad̤i nɛmixub̤ɛ nɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔ namakʰɛŋ̰ǀ̰ɛkʰɛŋ̰ǀ̰ɛ namakǀaŋ̤ǀ̤i ɓafika ɛsand̤ɛni sikanakɔn wɛsa isanɮa sakʰɛ uuz̤a ɛtʲɛjɛni katʰikǁɔ wajiɓamɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iinkɔmɔ z̤iɓɛ z̤ijiɡ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤isa wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a kuuz̤a utʰikǁɔ wamɓɛtʰa kʰɔna nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛmasi ɛlɔ wafɛla kʰɔna nɡ̤asɛtʲɛjɛni katʰikǁɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wav̤utʰa nɡ̤umsind̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a wamtʰʲɔɓɔz̤ɛla nɡ̤ɔtʰʲɔɓɔz̤ɔ uuz̤a watʰi lɔɔ nd̤awɔ jipɛrɛt͡suz̤a unanam̤la ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wamɔjika ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤alɔɔ watʰi jɔtʰini ukuz̤a itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a akav̤uma kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukujisusa iz̤ɛ kujɛ ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wajisɔnɡ̤a wajipʰamɓukisɛla ɛnɮwini kaɔb̤ɛd̤iɛd̤ɔm wasɛɡ̤ati jaɬala itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a ɛnɮwini kaɔb̤ɛd̤iɛd̤ɔm wasɛɡ̤ati iiɲanɡ̤a z̤antatʰu ujɛhɔv̤a wamsikɛlɛla uɔb̤ɛd̤iɛd̤ɔm nɛnɮu jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ kwakǁɛlwa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kwatʰiwa ujisikɛlɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a inɮu kaɔb̤ɛd̤iɛd̤ɔm nɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ anaz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛtʲɛja katʰikǁɔ waja ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wajiɲusa itʲɛja katʰikǁɔ ɛnɮwini kaɔb̤ɛd̤iɛd̤ɔm wajiz̤isa ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛv̤uja kwatʰi ɓakuɲatʰɛla amaɓanɡ̤a amatʰand̤atʰu aɓatʰwali ɓɛtʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a waɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla inkɔmɔ nɛtʰɔlɛ ɛlitʲɛtʲisiwɛjɔ wajɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛsina nɡ̤amanɮa ɔnkɛ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛb̤iŋǃɛ iɛfɔd̤i jɛlinɛn ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ ɔɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ nɛnɮu jɔnkɛ kasirajɛli ɓaɓɛjiɲusa kɛ itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a ɓɛd̤uma ɓɛɬɔkɔmisa isiɡ̤ɔɮɔ kwatʰi jakufika itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ umikali intɔmɓi kasawulɛ wav̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛfɛstilɛ wamɓɔna ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛkǁʰuma ɛsina pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a wamkǀɛkisa ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɛ ɓajinɡ̤ɛnisa itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a ɓajimisa ɛnd̤awɛni jajɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛntɛntɛ aɓɛjitwaɓululɛlɛ jɔna ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wɛɲusa amad̤ini aɲukajɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a nɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔkǁɔlɔ waɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukuɲusa amad̤ini aɲukajɔ nɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔkǁɔlɔ waɓasikɛlɛla aɓantu ɛɡ̤amɛni likajɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi waɓaɓɛla ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu jɔnkɛ iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jamasirajɛli kwatʰaɓatʰɛla kwind̤ɔd̤a kwɛsa nakumfaz̤i ɛlɔwɔ umkǃʰatʰanɛ wɛsɔnka nɔmlinɡ̤anisɔ wɛwajini nɛsikǀumɓa sɛɛrasintʲisi ɓaja kɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɛlɔwɔ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ waɓuja ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛz̤a kusikɛlɛla inɮu jakʰɛ wapʰuma umikali intɔmɓi kasawulɛ ɛja kukʰawulɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi haji ukuz̤iz̤ukisa kɔkumkani wamasirajɛli nam̤la ɔz̤iɬuɓilɛjɔ nam̤la pʰamɓi kwaɓakʰɔnz̤az̤ana ɓaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ az̤iɬuɓajɔ ɔnɡ̤ɛnaɓuntu watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kumikali kuɓɛ kusɛɓuswɛni ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɔwand̤iɲulajɔ pʰamɓi kɔjiɬɔ napʰamɓi kwɛnɮu jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ ukuɓa and̤imisɛ nd̤iɓɛ jinɡ̤anɡ̤a jaɓantu ɓakajɛhɔv̤a amasirajɛli ɓɛkusɛɓuswɛni ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ukukǃamɓa nd̤isaja kud̤ɛlɛka kunɔkɔ nd̤itʰɔɓɛkɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni kɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤az̤ana ɔtʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ nd̤isaja kuz̤ukiswa nɡ̤aɓɔ kɛ umikali intɔmɓi kasawulɛ akaɓanɡ̤a kwad̤a kwanɡ̤um̤la wɔkufa kwakʰɛ kwatʰi kǁa aɬɛlijɔ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛmpʰumz̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤int͡ʃaɓɛni z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ watʰi kunatan umprɔfɛti kʰawukʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ nd̤iɬɛli ɛnɮwini jɛmisɛd̤arɛ kɛ jɔna itʲɛja katʰikǁɔ iɬɛli pʰakatʰi kwamalɛnɡ̤alɛnɡ̤a watʰi unatan kɔnkɛ ɔkusɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɔ hamɓa ujɛ ukwɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a unawɛ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kunatan lisitʰi hamɓa ujɛ kutʰi kumkʰɔnz̤i ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi wɛna uja kund̤akʰɛla inɮu jɔkuɓa nd̤iɬalɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa and̤iɬalanɡ̤a nɮwini kususɛla ɛnd̤aɓaɲusajɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛjiputa kud̤ɛ kuɓɛ nanam̤la nd̤aɓa nɡ̤ɔhamɓahamɓa nɡ̤ɛntɛntɛ ɛnɡ̤umŋǃuɓa lɔnkɛ ikǁɛʃa ɛnd̤ahamɓahamɓa nɡ̤alɔ pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓɔnkɛ ɓakasirajɛli nd̤akʰa nd̤alitʰɛtʰa iliz̤wi nakusiɲɛ isiz̤wɛ sakwasirajɛli ɛnd̤asiwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkuɓa siɓalusɛ aɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli nd̤isitʰi jini ukuɓa ninɡ̤and̤akʰɛli inɮu jɛmisɛd̤arɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ wɔt͡ʃɔ ukutʰi kumkʰɔnz̤i ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi nd̤akutʰaɓatʰa ɛɮɛlwɛni ɛkuland̤ɛlɛni impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ ukuɓa uɓɛ jinɡ̤anɡ̤a jaɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli nd̤aɓa nawɛ kukɔ kɔnkɛ ɔwahamɓa kukɔ nd̤az̤iŋǃumla z̤ɔnkɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ nd̤akwɛnz̤ɛla iɡ̤ama ɛlikʰulu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama laɓakʰulu aɓasɛɬaɓatʰini nd̤aɓamisɛla ind̤awɔ aɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli nd̤aɓatʲala ukuɓa ɓaɬalɛ ɛsikʰunɮɛni saɓɔ ɓanɡ̤aɓi saɡ̤uŋǃa ɔɔɲana ɓɔɓut͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔ ɓanɡ̤aɓuji ɓaɓakǀinɛz̤ɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤asɛkukǃalɛni kususɛla nd̤aɓamisɛla aɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli aɓaɡ̤wɛɓi nd̤ija kukupʰumz̤a ɛz̤int͡ʃaɓɛni z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ujakukǁɛlɛla ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uja kukwɛnz̤ɛla inɮu kǁa itʰɛ jaz̤alisɛka imiɬa jakʰɔ kɔɔjiɬɔ nd̤ɔjipʰakamisa ɛmv̤a kwakʰɔ imɓɛwu jakʰɔ ɛja kupʰuma ɛz̤iɓilini z̤akʰɔ nd̤iɓukǃinisɛ uɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ujɛ ɔja kulakʰɛla iɡ̤ama inɮu nd̤ijikǃinisɛ itrɔnɛ jɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni mna nd̤ija kuɓa nɡ̤ujisɛ wakʰɛ jɛna aɓɛ nɡ̤uɲana ɛnd̤ɔtʰi ɛɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁɛni ɓakʰɛ nd̤imɔɬwajɛ nɡ̤ɛntɔnɡ̤a jaɓantu nanɡ̤ɔɓɛtʰɔ lɔɔɲana ɓakaad̤am kɛ jɔna iŋǀɛɓa jam ajiji kujɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤ajisusajɔ kusawulɛ ɛnd̤imsusilɛjɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɔ ija kukǃina inɮu jakʰɔ nɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɔ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ itrɔnɛ jakʰɔ ija kukǃinisɛka kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤alɔɔ maz̤wi ɔnkɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤alɔɔ mɓɔnɔ wɔnkɛ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukutʰɛtʰa unatan kud̤av̤id̤ɛ waja ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɬala pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a watʰi nd̤inɡ̤uɓani nkɔsi jam jɛhɔv̤a ijintɔni inɮu jam ukuɓa ud̤ɛ und̤iz̤isɛ nalapʰa kusɛkuŋǀinanɛ ɔkɔ kɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ nkɔsi jam jɛhɔv̤a utʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔku nanɡ̤ɛnɮu jɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ usinɡ̤isɛ mɡ̤ama lɛ ntɔ kɛ lisikɔ lɔmntu unkɔsi jam jɛhɔv̤a anɡ̤aɓuja aɓɛ ɛsatʰɛtʰa ntɔni kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuwɛ wɛna ujamaz̤i umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ nkɔsi jam jɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛliz̤wi lakʰɔ nanɡ̤ɔkwɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ uɓɛnz̤ilɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɓɔ ɓukʰulu ukuɓa uɓaz̤isɛ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ umkʰulu jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akukʰɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɛ akukʰɔ tʰikǁɔ nɡ̤apʰaja kwakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kɔnkɛ sikuv̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛɓɛ z̤ɛtʰu lulupʰi uɬanɡ̤a ɛɬaɓatʰini apʰa ɔlund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓantu ɓakʰɔ ɔlund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amasirajɛli awaja kuz̤ikʰululɛla utʰikǁɔ ukuɓa luɓɛ nɡ̤aɓantu ukuɓa az̤imisɛlɛ iɡ̤ama nɡ̤alɔ anɛnz̤ɛlɛ iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ ɛz̤ikʰulu alɛnz̤ɛlɛ iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔjikɛkajɔ iliz̤wɛ lakʰɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓaɓantu ɓakʰɔ ɔwaz̤ikʰululɛlajɔ ɓɔna ɛjiputa ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni nakɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓaz̤ɔ uz̤ikǃinisɛlɛ aɓantu ɓakʰɔ amasirajɛli ukuɓa ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓantu kuwɛ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni wɛna jɛhɔv̤a waɓa nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ kuɓɔ kalɔku jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ iliz̤wi ɔlitʰɛtʰilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ nanɡ̤ɛnɮu jakʰɛ limisɛ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni wɛnz̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ukutʰɛtʰilɛjɔ likʰulɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni kusitʰiwa ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wamasirajɛli nɛnɮu jɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ iz̤inz̤ilɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛna jɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi tʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli utʰʲililɛ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤ɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ watʰi nd̤ija kukwakʰɛla inɮu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ujifumɛnɛ intliz̤ijɔ jɔkuz̤ɛ awutʰand̤az̤ɛ kuwɛ lɔ mtʰand̤az̤ɔ kalɔku nkɔsi jam jɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤ujɛ utʰikǁɔ namaz̤wi akʰɔ aja kuɓa jiɲanisɔ utʰɛtʰɛ ɔkɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kumkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ kalɔku makukʰɔlɛkɛ kuwɛ ukujisikɛlɛla inɮu jɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ukuɓa iɬalɛ iɬɛli pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛna nkɔsi jam jɛhɔv̤a utʰɛtʰilɛ nɡ̤ɛnt͡sikɛlɛlɔ jakʰɔ majisikɛlɛlwɛ inɮu jɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ kwatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wawakǁaɓɛla amafilisti wawɛjisa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓutʰaɓatʰa uɓukʰɔsi ɛsanɮɛni samafilisti wawakǁaɓɛla amamɔwab̤i wawalinɡ̤anisa nɡ̤ɔlutʲa ɛwalalisa ɛm̤laɓɛni walinɡ̤anisa iz̤intʲa z̤amɓini z̤ɔkuɓulala nɔlutʲa lwaluɲɛ ɔluz̤alisɛkilɛjɔ lɔkusind̤isa kɛ amamɔwab̤i aɓa nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i kud̤av̤id̤ɛ az̤isa iminikɛlɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wamkǁaɓɛla uhad̤ad̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ uɲana karɛhɔb̤i wɛt͡sɔb̤a ɛkujɛni kuwaɓujisa amanɮa akʰɛ ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔnɡ̤umɛfrati ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰimɓa lɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa namakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ aɓamahaʃɛ namaʃumi amaɓini anɡ̤umkǃikɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wawaŋǃumla imisipʰa ɔnkɛ amahaʃɛ ɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa waʃija kuwɔ awɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ alikʰulu amaaram asɛd̤amaskɔ ɛz̤a kumŋǀɛd̤a uhad̤ad̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ wɛt͡sɔb̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓulala kumaaram amaʃumi amaɓini anamaɓini amad̤ɔd̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kwaaram ɛd̤amaskɔ amaaram aɓa nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ az̤isa iminikɛlɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wamsind̤isa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ awahamɓa kuz̤ɔ wawatʰaɓatʰa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ amakʰaka ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ aɓɛkuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakahad̤ad̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ wawaz̤isa ɛjɛrusalɛm nasɛb̤ɛta nasɛb̤ɛrɔtaji imiz̤i kahad̤ad̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰaɓatʰa ub̤ɛd̤u ɔluninz̤i kunɛnɛ wɛv̤a utɔji wasɛhamati ukuɓa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ujikǁaɓɛlɛ jɔnkɛ kahad̤ad̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ utɔji wamtʰuma ujɔram uɲana wakʰɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukuɓa amɓuz̤ɛ ukupʰila kwakʰɛ amsikɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa ɛɓɛlwilɛ nɔhad̤ad̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ wamkǁaɓɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utɔji uɓɛnɡ̤umfɔ ɔɓɛsilwa nɔhad̤ad̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ wajɛ ujɔram lɔwɔ ɛnɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɔb̤ɛd̤u ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ ukumkani ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛla kujɛhɔv̤a kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɛz̤ɔ kuɲɛ nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ aɓɛjiŋ̤ǀ̤walisilɛ ɛjav̤ɛla ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni z̤ɔnkɛ awaz̤ɛjisajɔ kumaaram nakumamɔwab̤i nakɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn nakumafilisti nakumaamalɛki nakumakǁʰɔɓa kahad̤ad̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ uɲana karɛhɔb̤i wɛt͡sɔb̤a waz̤ɛnz̤ɛla iɡ̤ama ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛkuɓujɛni kwakʰɛ ɛkuwakǁaɓɛlɛni amaaram ɛsiɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni sɛtʲuwa ɛɓulɛlɛ iʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ wamisa kwɛlamaɛd̤ɔm kwɛlamaɛd̤ɔm lɔnkɛ aɓa nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i kud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɔnkɛ amaɛd̤ɔm ujɛhɔv̤a wamsind̤isa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ awahamɓa kuz̤ɔ wajɛ ɛnɡ̤ukumkani kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kumasirajɛli ɔnkɛ wajɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛsɛnz̤a ɔkusɛsikwɛni nɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɛɓantwini ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ kɛ ujɔwab̤i uɲana kat͡sɛruja wajɛpʰɛtʰɛ umkʰɔsi nɔjɛhɔʃafati uɲana kaahilud̤i wajɛnɡ̤umkʰumɓuz̤i wɛz̤intɔ z̤akɔmkʰulu ut͡sad̤ɔki uɲana kaahitub̤i nɔahimɛlɛki uɲana kaab̤ijatarɛ ɓajɛ ɓɛnɡ̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli usɛraja wajɛ ɛnɡ̤umb̤ali ub̤ɛnaja uɲana kajɛhɔjad̤a uɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ aɓaŋǀinitʰi nɛz̤iɡ̤id̤imi ɔɔɲana ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kusɛkʰɔ mpund̤ɛ kwinɮu kasawulɛ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤ijɛnz̤ɛlɛ iŋǀɛɓa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kajɔnatan kɛ inɮu kasawulɛ iɓinɔmkʰɔnz̤i ɔɡ̤ama linɡ̤ut͡sib̤a ɓamɓiz̤ɛla kud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi kujɛ unɡ̤ut͡sib̤a watʰi jɛna nd̤inɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ watʰi akusɛkʰɔ namɲɛ wɛnɮu kasawulɛ nd̤imɛnz̤ɛlɛ iŋǀɛɓa katʰikǁɔ watʰi kɛ ut͡sib̤a kusɛkʰɔ uɲana kajɔnatan ɔfɛ iiɲawɔ watʰi kujɛ upʰi watʰi ut͡sib̤a nankuja ɛnɮwini kamakirɛ uɲana kaamijɛli ɛlɔd̤ɛb̤arɛ watʰumɛla kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wamtʰaɓatʰa ɛnɮwini kamakirɛ uɲana kaamijɛli ɛlɔd̤ɛb̤arɛ wɛz̤a umɛfib̤ɔʃɛtɛ uɲana kajɔnatan uɲana kasawulɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ wakǃuɓud̤a watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ mɛfib̤ɔʃɛtɛ watʰi kɛ jɛna nanku lɔ mkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kujɛ musa ukɔjika nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija kukwɛnz̤ɛla iŋǀɛɓa nɡ̤ɛnɛnɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kajɔnatan ujiɬɔ nd̤ikuɓujisɛlɛ ɔnkɛ kasawulɛ ujiɬɔ wɛna uɮɛ isɔnka ɛtafilɛni jam nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ wakǃuɓud̤a watʰi umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ujintɔni ukuɓa ujib̤ɛkɛ ind͡ʒ̤a ɛfilɛjɔ ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤am nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukumkani waɓiz̤a ut͡sib̤a wakwasawulɛ watʰi kujɛ jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛɓijɛkasawulɛ nɛjɛnɮu jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ nd̤ijinikɛ uɲana wɛnkɔsi jakʰɔ uz̤ɛ umlimɛlɛ um̤laɓa wɛna nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ umz̤isɛlɛ aɓɛ nɔkuɮa uɲana wɛnkɔsi jakʰɔ aɮɛ kɛ umɛfib̤ɔʃɛtɛ uɲana wɛnkɔsi jakʰɔ uja kuɮa nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ ɛtafilɛni jam kɛ kalɔku ut͡sib̤a wajɛnɔɔɲana aɓaliʃumi ɛlinantlanu naɓakʰɔnz̤i aɓamaʃumi maɓini watʰi ut͡sib̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛntɔ jɔnkɛ ɛmwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ajɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wajɔ inkɔsi jam ujakwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ umɛfib̤ɔʃɛtɛ waɮa ɛtafilɛni jakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓaɲɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɔkumkani umɛfib̤ɔʃɛtɛ ɛɓɛnɔɲana ɔmŋǀinanɛ ɔɡ̤ama ɓɛlinɡ̤umika ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛɬɛli ɛnɮwini kat͡sib̤a ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakamɛfib̤ɔʃɛtɛ umɛfib̤ɔʃɛtɛ uɓɛɬala ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓɛsiɮa ɛtafilɛni jɔkumkani nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ uɓɛfɛ iiɲawɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔmɓini kwatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ wɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn wanɡ̤ukumkani uhanun uɲana wakʰɛ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ watʰi kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ mand̤imɛnz̤ɛlɛ iŋǀɛɓa uhanun uɲana kanahaʃɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɔjisɛ wand̤ɛnz̤ɛlajɔ iŋǀɛɓa watʰumɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa saɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ukumkʰuz̤a nɡ̤ajɛ ujisɛ ɓɛz̤a kɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛz̤wɛni lɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ɓatʰi aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn kuhanun inkɔsi jaɓɔ ukǀinɡ̤a ukuɓa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ uz̤ukisa ujiɬɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛtʰumɛ aɓakʰuz̤i kuwɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ akaɓatʰumɛlɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ kuwɛ ukuz̤ɛ awuɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀɛ umz̤i awuɬɔlɛ awub̤ukukǃɛ waɓatʰaɓatʰa kɛ uhanun aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓaɡ̤uja ɛliɲɛ ikǀala lɛɛnd̤ɛv̤u z̤aɓɔ waz̤ikǀand̤a pʰakatʰi iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ wad̤a waja nɡ̤ɛmisɛkɛla waɓand̤ulula kɛ wakǁɛlɛlwa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰuma iz̤iɡ̤id̤imi z̤ɔkuɓakʰawulɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ aɓɛɬaz̤iswɛ kunɛnɛ watʰi ɬalani ɛjɛrikɔ z̤id̤ɛ z̤iɬumɛ iind̤ɛv̤u z̤ɛnu nand̤ulɛ ukuɓuja ɓaɓɔna ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ukuɓa ɓaz̤inukisilɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɓatʰumɛla kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ɓakǃɛʃa kumaaram asɛb̤ɛtɛrɛhɔb̤i nakumaaram asɛt͡sɔb̤a amaʃumi amaɓini anɡ̤umkǃikɛla wasɛmahaka lamad̤ɔd̤a nakumad̤ɔd̤a asɛtɔb̤i iʃumi ɛlinamaɓini amad̤ɔd̤a wɛv̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰuma ujɔwab̤i ɛnɔmkʰɔsi wɔnkɛ wamaɡ̤ɔxa ɓapʰuma ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ɓakʰa iz̤intlu z̤ɔkulwa ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ amaaram asɛt͡sɔb̤a nawasɛrɛhɔb̤i namad̤ɔd̤a asɛtɔb̤i nawasɛmahaka aɓa wɔd̤wa ɛnɮɛ waɓɔna ujɔwab̤i ukuɓa imfaz̤wɛ ib̤ɛkɛ kujɛ nɡ̤apʰamɓili nanɡ̤asɛmv̤a waɲula ɛmad̤ɔd̤ɛni ɔnkɛ aɬɛliwɛjɔ kwasirajɛli wakʰa uluɬu malunɡ̤a namaaram aɓaɲɛ aɓantu waɓanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sikaab̤iʃaji wakʰɛ waɓakʰa ɓaluluɬu malunɡ̤a nɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn watʰi ukuɓa amaaram atʰɛ and̤ɛjisa wɔnd̤isiz̤a ukuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ɓakɔjisa nd̤ɔz̤a kukusiz̤a jɔmɛlɛla sɔmɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛmiz̤i jɔtʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnz̤ɛ ɔkɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ wɛz̤a ujɔwab̤i naɓantu aɓaɓɛnajɛ namaaram asaɓa ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ ɓaɓɔna ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ukuɓa asaɓilɛ amaaram ɓasaɓa naɓɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓukaab̤iʃaji ɓanɡ̤ɛna ɛkʰaja waɓuja kɛ ujɔwab̤i kɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn wɛz̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm aɓɔna amaaram ukuɓa aɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰiwɛ pʰamɓi kwamasirajɛli aɬanɡ̤anisana nd̤awɔɲɛ watʰumɛla uhad̤ad̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ wawaxɔla amaaram aɓɛpʰɛʃɛja kɔmlamɓɔ ɛz̤a ɛhɛlam uʃɔb̤aki umtʰɛtʰɛli wɔmkʰɔsi kahad̤ad̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ ɛpʰamɓi kwawɔ kwakǁɛlwa kud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɬanɡ̤anisa amasirajɛli ɔnkɛ wajiwɛla ijɔrd̤an waja ɛhɛlam akʰa iz̤intlu amaaram malunɡ̤a nɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ najɛ asaɓa amaaram ɛɓuswɛni ɓamasirajɛli ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓulala kumaaram amakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ aɓɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa namaʃumi amanɛ aɓamahaʃɛ wakǁaɓɛla nɔʃɔb̤aki umtʰɛtʰɛli wɔmkʰɔsi wawɔ wafɛla kʰɔna ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔkumkani aɓakʰɔnz̤a uhad̤ad̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ ɓaɓɔna ukuɓa ɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰiwɛ pʰamɓi kwamasirajɛli ɓakǁɔlɛlana namasirajɛli ɓawakʰɔnz̤a ɔjika kɛ amaaram ukuɓa saɓasiz̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn kwatʰi ukuv̤ɛla kɔmɲaka nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkupʰuma kɔɔkumkani ukuja ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wamtʰuma ujɔwab̤i naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ kuɲɛ najɛ namasirajɛli ɔnkɛ ɓat͡ʃaɓalalisa ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ɓajiŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a irab̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wajɛɬɛli ɛjɛrusalɛm kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lanɡ̤ɔkuɬwa wav̤uka ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛsililini sakʰɛ wahamɓahamɓa pʰɛz̤u kɔpʰaɬa lwɛnɮu jɔkumkani watʰi ɛsɛlupʰaɬɛni waɓɔna umfaz̤i ɛz̤iɬamɓa kɛ umfaz̤i lɔwɔ wajɛm̤lɛ kunɛnɛ nɡ̤ɛmɓɔnakalɔ watʰumɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓuz̤isa nɡ̤alɔɔ mfaz̤i kwatʰiwa asinɡ̤ujɛ ub̤at͡ʃɛb̤a lɔwɔ intɔmɓi kaɛliham umkaurija um̤ɛti ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰuma aɓatʰuɲwa wamtʰaɓatʰa wɛz̤a kɛ jɛna kujɛ najɛ akuɓa ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisilɛ ɛɓuŋǃamɓini ɓakʰɛ waɓujɛla ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ wamitʰa umfaz̤i lɔwɔ watʰumɛla wakǁɛlɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi nd̤imitʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰumɛla kujɔwab̤i ɛsitʰi tʰumɛla apʰa uurija um̤ɛti ujɔwab̤i wamtʰumɛla uurija kud̤av̤id̤ɛ waja uurija kujɛ waɓuz̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukuɓa und͡ʒ̤ani ujɔwab̤i ɓand͡ʒ̤ani aɓantu ind͡ʒ̤ani imfaz̤wɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi kuurija jiɬa ujɛ ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ uɬamɓɛ iiɲawɔ z̤akʰɔ wapʰuma uurija ɛnɮwini jɔkumkani kwapʰuma ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ isipʰɔ sɔkumkani uurija ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛnɮu jɔkumkani naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛnkɔsi jakʰɛ akɛɬa ajɛ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ kwakǁɛlwa kud̤av̤id̤ɛ kwatʰiwa uurija akɛɬanɡ̤a ajɛ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuurija akuv̤ɛli ɛluhamɓɛni jini ukuɓa unɡ̤ɛɬi ujɛ ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ watʰi uurija kud̤av̤id̤ɛ itʲɛja namasirajɛli namajud̤a aɬɛli ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni nɛnkɔsi jam ujɔwab̤i naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛnkɔsi jam ɓaɬɛli ɛnɮɛ nd̤ijɛ ɛnɮwini jam nd̤iɮɛ nd̤isɛlɛ nd̤ilalɛ nɔmkam uɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ wɛna uɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ and̤iji kujɛnz̤a lɔɔ ntɔ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuurija ɬala apʰa nanam̤la nd̤ɔkund̤ulula nɡ̤ɔmsɔ waɬala kɛ uurija ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤alɔɔ m̤la nanɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wammɛma waɮa wasɛla pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ wamŋǁilisa wapʰuma nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa waja ɛsililini sakʰɛ naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛnkɔsi jakʰɛ akɛɬa ajɛ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ kwatʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wab̤ala iŋǀwad̤i kujɔwab̤i wajitʰumɛla nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikaurija wab̤ala kɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini watʰi mɓɛkɛni uurija kwɛjɔna nd̤awɔ iʃuʃu anɡ̤asisikǀʰɛnɡ̤ɛ kujɔ ɛmfaz̤wɛni niɓujɛ umv̤a ukuz̤ɛ aɓinz̤wɛ afɛ kwatʰi ɛkuwuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤ɛni kukajɔwab̤i umz̤i lɔwɔ wamɓɛka uurija kwind̤awɔ aɓɛsaz̤i ukuɓa akujɔ amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amak͡xɔti apʰuma amad̤ɔd̤a alɔɔ mz̤i nɔjɔwab̤i aɓantu kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ nɔurija um̤ɛti watʰumɛla ujɔwab̤i kud̤av̤id̤ɛ wamkǁɛlɛla z̤ɔnkɛ iind̤aɓa z̤ɛmfaz̤wɛ wamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ umtʰuɲwa ɛsitʰi kǁa uɡ̤ǃ̤iɓilɛjɔ ukuz̤ɛnz̤a z̤ɔnkɛ iind̤aɓa z̤ɛmfaz̤wɛ wɔtʰi ukuɓa ɓutʰɛ ɓɛɲuka uɓuʃuʃu ɓɔkumkani watʰi kuwɛ iɓijini ukuɓa nisɔnd̤ɛlɛ kanɡ̤aka kulɔɔ mz̤i nɡ̤ɔkulwa ɓɛninɡ̤az̤i ukuɓa ɓɔtɔla ɓɛsɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni waɓɛtʰwa nɡ̤uɓani uab̤imɛlɛki uɲana kajɛrub̤ɛʃɛtɛ akaɡ̤itʲisɛlwanɡ̤a jinkaz̤ana nɡ̤ɛlitʲɛ lɔkusila ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni wafɛla ɛtɛb̤ɛt͡sɛ iɓijini ukuɓa nisɔnd̤ɛlɛ kanɡ̤aka ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni utʰi wɛna nɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ uurija um̤ɛti ufilɛ najɛ wahamɓa kɛ umtʰuɲwa waja wamkǁɛlɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kɔnkɛ ujɔwab̤i aɓɛmtʰumɛ kʰɔna watʰi umtʰuɲwa kud̤av̤id̤ɛ atʰi akusɛjisa tʰina amad̤ɔd̤a apʰuma ɛz̤a kutʰi pʰanɮɛ saɓa pʰɛz̤u kwawɔ kɛ sad̤a sɛsa ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɓatɔla aɓatɔli kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ɓɛsɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni iŋǁɛɲɛ kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɔkumkani umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ uurija um̤ɛti ufilɛ najɛ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kumtʰuɲwa lɔwɔ wɔt͡ʃɔ kujɔwab̤i ukutʰi majinɡ̤aɓi mɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ lɛ nd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ik͡xɛlɛ ɛli liɮa kulɔ nakulɔwa kɔmɛlɛz̤ɛ kwakʰɔ nɔmz̤i lɔwɔ uwukǀʰitʰɛ uz̤ɛ umɔmɛlɛz̤ɛ kɛ wɛv̤a umkaurija ukuɓa ufilɛ uurija ind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ wajimɓamɓaz̤ɛlɛla ind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ lakuɮula ikǁɛʃa lɛz̤ila lakʰɛ watʰumɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wamtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤umkakʰɛ wamz̤alɛla uɲana kɛ lɔɔ ntɔ wajɛnz̤ajɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ jaɓa mɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a watʰumɛla unatan kud̤av̤id̤ɛ waja kujɛ watʰi kujɛ kwakukʰɔ amad̤ɔd̤a amaɓini mz̤ini mɲɛ ɛɲɛ isisitʲɛɓi ɛɲɛ iliɬwɛmpu ɛsisitʲɛɓi jajinɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ ɛz̤ininz̤i kunɛnɛ ɛliɬwɛmpu jajinɡ̤ɛnantɔ kupʰɛla jajinɛmv̤a naz̤ana ɛŋǀinanɛ iɲɛ ɛɓijiz̤uz̤ilɛ jajiɡ̤ǀ̤ina jakʰulɛla kujɔ naɓantwana ɓajɔ nd̤awɛniɲɛ jaɮa ɛkǃʰɛkɛz̤ɛni lajɔ jasɛla ɛnd̤ɛɓɛni jajɔ jalala ɛsifuɓɛni sajɔ jand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔmɓi jajɔ kwafika um̤amɓi ɛnd̤ɔd̤ɛni ɛsisitʲɛɓi ɛsɔ saŋǃɛna ukutʰaɓatʰa ɛmpaɬɛni jasɔ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nasɛz̤inkɔmɛni z̤asɔ ukulunɡ̤isɛlɛla um̤amɓi lɔwɔ ufikilɛjɔ kusɔ sɛsuka satʰaɓatʰa imv̤anaz̤ana jɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛliɬwɛmpu salunɡ̤isɛlɛla ɔfikɛ kusɔ wav̤utʰa kunɛnɛ umsind̤ɔ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ kwind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ watʰi kunatan ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤umfɔ wɔkufa lɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤a jɛnz̤ɛ lɛ ntɔ ija kujimisɛla nɡ̤ɛsinɛ imv̤anaz̤ana lɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa jɛnz̤ɛ lɔɔ ntɔ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa inɡ̤aɓanɡ̤a nalufɛfɛ waz̤a watʰi unatan kud̤av̤id̤ɛ lɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤a nɡ̤uwɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi mna nd̤akutʰamɓisa ukuɓa uɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani kumasirajɛli nd̤akuɬanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni sikasawulɛ nd̤akunika inɮu jɛnkɔsi jakʰɔ naɓafaz̤i ɓɛnkɔsi jakʰɔ ɛsifuɓɛni sakʰɔ nd̤akunika inɮu jakwasirajɛli nɛjakwajud̤a kɛ ukuɓa ɓɛkukuŋǀinanɛ ɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛnd̤ikɔnɡ̤ɛz̤ilɛ nd̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ jini ukuɓa ulid̤ɛlɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a wɛnz̤ɛ uɓuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ umɓulalɛ uurija um̤ɛti nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nɔmkakʰɛ umz̤ɛkɛ aɓɛ nɡ̤umkakʰɔ umɓulalɛ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ lɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ ik͡xɛlɛ aliji ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ napʰakad̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa und̤id̤ɛlilɛ wamz̤ɛka umkaurija um̤ɛti wanɡ̤umkakʰɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤ikuv̤ɛlisɛla uɓuɓi ɔɓuja kupʰuma ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ nd̤iɓatʰaɓatʰɛ aɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ nd̤iɓanikɛ ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɔ alalɛ naɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɔ pʰamɓi kwɛlanɡ̤a ɛli ɛkuɓɛni wɛna ukwɛnz̤ɛ ɔku nɡ̤asɛsɛ kɛ nd̤ija kujɛnz̤a lɛ ntɔ pʰamɓi kwamasirajɛli ɔnkɛ napʰamɓi kwɛlanɡ̤a ɛli watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kunatan nd̤ɔnilɛ kujɛhɔv̤a watʰi unatan kud̤av̤id̤ɛ najɛ ujɛhɔv̤a usikʰwɛlɛlisilɛ isɔnɔ sakʰɔ akuji kɔd̤wa kɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa uz̤inikɛ itʰuɓa lɔkuɲɛlisa iint͡ʃaɓa z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤alɛ ntɔ kɛ uɲana ɔmz̤alɛlwɛjɔ nɡ̤ulɔ mfaz̤i uja nɡ̤ɛnɛnɛ waja unatan ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wam̤lisɛla isifɔ aɓɛmz̤alɛlwɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤umkaurija waɡ̤ula kakʰulu ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wamɓɔnɡ̤ɔz̤a utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnkwɛnkwɛ lɛjɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waz̤ila ukuɮa wakǃuŋ̤ǃ̤uluz̤a ɛm̤laɓɛni ɓɔnkɛ uɓusuku asuka ɛma amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ɛnɮu jakʰɛ ɛmv̤usa ɛm̤laɓɛni akav̤uma akaɮa sɔnka nawɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓɔjika aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ ukumkǁɛlɛla ukuɓa ufilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛsitʰi jaɓɔnani ɔkɔ ɛɓɛsaɬɛli satʰɛtʰa najɛ akalipʰulapʰula iliz̤wi lɛtʰu sɔtʰini ukutʰi kujɛ ufilɛ az̤ɛ ɛnz̤ɛ intɔ ɛmɓi waɓɔna ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukuɓa aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓajasɛɓɛz̤ɛlana wakǃɔnd̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukuɓa ufilɛ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ufilɛ ɓatʰi ufilɛ wɛsuka ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni waz̤iɬamɓa waz̤itʰamɓisa waŋǁiɓa nɡ̤uɓɔ z̤imɓi waja ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a wakǃuɓud̤a wɛz̤a ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ waɓiz̤a ukuɮa ɓaɓɛka pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ waɮa ɓatʰi aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ kujɛ jintɔni lɛ ntɔ ujɛnz̤ilɛjɔ ɔkɔ ɛɓɛsaɬɛli waz̤ila ukuɮa akuɓa ɛfilɛ uv̤ukilɛ waɮa ukuɮa watʰi jɛna kǁa ɛɓɛsaɬɛli nd̤az̤ila ukuɮa nd̤alila nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛnd̤isitʰi nɡ̤uɓani ɔwaz̤ijɔ m̤lawumɓi ujɛhɔv̤a anɡ̤and̤iɓaɓala apʰilɛ ɛfilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ kalɔku jini ukuɓa nd̤iɓɛ nd̤isaz̤ila ukuɮa nd̤isɛnakɔ jini ukumɓujisa nd̤ija kuja kujɛ jɛna akaji kuɓujɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wamtʰutʰuz̤ɛla ub̤at͡ʃɛb̤a umkakʰɛ wanɡ̤ɛna kujɛ najɛ waz̤ala uɲana watʰi iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ nɡ̤usɔlɔmɔn kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wamtʰand̤a watʰumɛla nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikanatan umprɔfɛti watʰi iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ nɡ̤ujɛd̤id̤ija nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kajɛhɔv̤a kɛ kalɔku ujɔwab̤i nɛrab̤a jɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn wawutʰimɓa umz̤i wakɔmkʰulu lɔwɔ ujɔwab̤i watʰuma aɓatʰuɲwa kud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛsitʰi nd̤ilwilɛ nɛrab̤a kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤iwutʰimɓilɛ umz̤i wamanz̤i ɬanɡ̤anisa nɡ̤ɔkɔ aɓantu aɓasɛlɛjɔ uwuxawulɛ umz̤i uwutʰimɓɛ ɬɛz̤ɛ nd̤iwutʰimɓɛ lɔ mz̤i uɓiz̤wɛ nɡ̤am waɓaɬanɡ̤anisa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu waja ɛrab̤a najɔ wajitʰimɓa wasitʰaɓatʰa isit͡sʰaɓa sɔkumkani waɓɔ ɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɛ uɓunz̤ima ɓasɔ ɓɛɓujitalɛntɛ jɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ sinamatʲɛ aŋǃaɓilɛjɔ saɓa sɛntlɔkwɛni kad̤av̤id̤ɛ wapʰuma namakǁʰɔɓa alɔɔ mz̤i aɓa maninz̤i kunɛnɛ kɛ aɓantu aɓaɓɛkʰɔna waɓaxɔla waɓatʰumɛla ɛz̤isaxɛni nasɛz̤isiz̤ilwɛni z̤ɛsiɲitʰi nasɛz̤iɛxɛni z̤ɛsiɲitʰi waɓasɛɓɛnz̤isa ɛmaz̤ikwɛni ɛz̤itɛna wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kwimiz̤i jɔnkɛ jɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn waɓujɛla ɛjɛrusalɛm ud̤av̤id̤ɛ naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ kwatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ uab̤isalɔm uɲana kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛnɔd̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ ɔjinz̤wakaz̤i ɔɡ̤ama ɓɛlinɡ̤utamarɛ wɛsuka uamnɔn uɲana kad̤av̤id̤ɛ wamtʰand̤a waɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛka uamnɔn nɡ̤ɔkɔkud̤ɛ az̤iɬisɛlɛ isifɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa katamarɛ ud̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛjintɔmɓi kwaŋǃaɓa ɛmɛɬwɛni kaamnɔn ukuɓa amɛnz̤ɛ intɔ kɛ kalɔku uamnɔn ɛɓɛnɔm̤lɔɓɔ ɔɡ̤ama ɓɛlinɡ̤ujɔnad̤ab̤i uɲana kaʃimɛha umkʰuluwa kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ujɔnad̤ab̤i ɛɓɛjind̤ɔd̤a ɛlumkɛ kunɛnɛ watʰi kujɛ jini ukuɓa uɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukub̤itʲa imisɔ nɡ̤ɛmisɔ ɲana wɔkumkani akund̤ikǁɛlɛli watʰi uamnɔn kujɛ nd̤itʰand̤a utamarɛ ud̤ad̤ɛ ɓɔab̤isalɔm ujɔnad̤ab̤i watʰi kujɛ lala ɛsililini sakʰɔ uz̤iɡ̤ulisɛ kɛ wɔtʰi akuz̤a kukuɓɔna ujiɬɔ utʰi kujɛ makʰɛ ɛz̤ɛ utamarɛ ud̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu and̤inikɛ intɔ ɛɮiwajɔ ajɛnz̤ɛ pʰamɓi ukuz̤ɛ nd̤ijiɓɔnɛ nd̤ijiɮɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ walala kɛ uamnɔn waz̤iɡ̤ulisa ukumkani waja kumɓɔna watʰi uamnɔn makʰɛ ɛz̤ɛ utamarɛ ud̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu ɛnz̤ɛ pʰamɓi iz̤ɔnkana ɛz̤ijɔlisa intliz̤ijɔ z̤iɓɛ z̤iɓini nd̤iz̤iɮɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ watʰumɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kutamarɛ ɛnɮwini ɛsitʰi kʰawujɛ ɛnɮwini kaamnɔn umnakwɛnu umɛnz̤ɛlɛ ukuɮa waja utamarɛ ɛnɮwini kaamnɔn umnakwaɓɔ jɛna ɛlɛlɛ pʰant͡si watʰaɓatʰa wakǁɔv̤ula wɛnz̤a iz̤ɔnkana ɛz̤ijɔlisa intliz̤ijɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ waz̤ɔsa iz̤ɔnkana ɛz̤ijɔlisa intliz̤ijɔ watʰaɓatʰa waz̤ikʰupʰɛla pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ akav̤uma ukuɮa watʰi uamnɔn maɓakʰut͡ʃwɛ aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓapʰumɛ ɓapʰuma ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu kujɛ watʰi uamnɔn kutamarɛ kuz̤isɛ ɛkʰusini apʰa ukuɮa nd̤iɮɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ waz̤itʰaɓatʰa utamarɛ iz̤ɔnkana ɛz̤ijɔlisa intliz̤ijɔ aɓɛz̤ɛnz̤ilɛ waz̤isa ɛkʰusini kuamnɔn umnakwaɓɔ waz̤isɔnd̤ɛz̤a kujɛ ukuɓa aɮɛ wɛsuka jɛna wamɓamɓa watʰi kujɛ jiz̤a ulalɛ d̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu watʰi kujɛ musa mnakwɛtʰu ukund̤iɮwɛnɡ̤ula nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akwɛnd͡ʒ̤iwa nd͡ʒ̤ɛ kwasirajɛli ukulɛnz̤a ɛli ɲala mna nd̤inɡ̤aja pʰi nɛɬaz̤ɔ kɛ wɛna unɡ̤aɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔwaɓanɔɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ kwasirajɛli kʰawutʰɛtʰɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ nɔkumkani nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akanɡ̤ɛmanɡ̤ali kuwɛ akav̤uma jɛna ukulipʰulapʰula iliz̤wi lakʰɛ wamɛjisa wamɮwɛnɡ̤ula najɛ waz̤a uamnɔn wamtʰija nɡ̤ɛntijɔ ɛnkulu kunɛnɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jaɓa intijɔ awamtʰija nɡ̤ajɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛntand̤ɔ aɓɛmtʰand̤ɛ nɡ̤ajɔ watʰi uamnɔn kujɛ suka umkɛ watʰi kujɛ musa ukuɓa jimɓanɡ̤i jɔɓu ɓuɓi ɓɔkund̤iɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa ɓukʰulu nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔɓuja uɓɛnz̤ilɛjɔ akav̤uma ukumpʰulapʰula waɓiz̤a umlunɡ̤isɛlɛli wakʰɛ watʰi kʰawuɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛ lɛ nkaz̤ana imkɛ ijɛ pʰanɮɛ ut͡ʃikǁɛ ukǀanɡ̤ɔ ɛmv̤a kwajɔ kɛ jajamɓɛtʰɛ inɡ̤uɓɔ ɛnd̤ɛ ɛnɛmikʰɔnɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛz̤isɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ iintɔmɓi z̤ɔkumkani ɛz̤isɛz̤iintɔmɓi ukwamɓatʰa inɡ̤uɓɔ jɔkwalɛka wajikʰupʰɛla nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kɛ umlunɡ̤isɛlɛli wakʰɛ walut͡ʃikǁa ukǀanɡ̤ɔ ɛmv̤a kwajɔ utamarɛ waz̤iɡ̤alɛla utʰutʰu ɛntlɔkɔ wajik͡xaz̤ula inɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ ɛnd̤ɛ ɛnɛmikʰɔnɔ aɓɛjamɓɛtʰɛ waɓɛka isanɮa ɛntlɔkɔ wɛmka ɛhamɓa ɛkʰala watʰi uab̤isalɔm umnakwaɓɔ kujɛ uɓɛnawɛ uamnɔn umnakwɛnu kalɔku d̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu ɬala utʰi nɡ̤umnakwɛnu musa ukujiɓɛkɛla ntliz̤ijɔ lɛ ntɔ waɬala kɛ utamarɛ wasisiʃwajimɓana ɛnɮwini kaab̤isalɔm umnakwaɓɔ waz̤iv̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɔ ntɔ wav̤utʰa nɡ̤umsind̤ɔ kunɛnɛ akatʰɛtʰa nɛliɓi nɛlilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ uab̤isalɔm kuamnɔn nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uab̤isalɔm wamtʰija uamnɔn nɡ̤alɛ ntɔ jɔkuɓa ɛmɮwɛnɡ̤ulɛ utamarɛ ud̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ kwatʰi ɛmv̤a kwɛmiɲaka ɛmiɓini kwaɓakʰɔ aɓakǀʰɛɓi kuab̤isalɔm ɛb̤ahalihat͡sɔrɛ kwaɛfrajim uab̤isalɔm wamɛma ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɔkumkani wɛz̤a uab̤isalɔm watʰi ujaɓɔna naɓa aɓakǀʰɛɓi kumkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ maɓahamɓɛ nɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ukumkani watʰi kuab̤isalɔm musa ɲana masinɡ̤aji sɔnkɛ siɓɛ nɡ̤umtʰwalɔ kuwɛ wamz̤ama akav̤uma ukuja kɔd̤wa wamsikɛlɛla watʰi uab̤isalɔm ukuɓa akuji wɛna makakʰɛ ahamɓɛ natʰi uamnɔn umkʰuluwa watʰi kujɛ ahamɓɛlɛni nawɛ uab̤isalɔm wamz̤ama wav̤uma ukuɓa uamnɔn ahamɓɛ najɛ nɔɔɲana ɓɔnkɛ ɓɔkumkani uab̤isalɔm wawawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ amad̤ɔd̤ana akwakʰɛ watʰi kʰanikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ kǁa itʰɛ intliz̤ijɔ kaamnɔn jamnand̤i jiwajini nd̤az̤a nd̤atʰi mɓɛtʰɛni uamnɔn nɔmɓulala musani ukɔjika aniwisɛlwɛ nd̤im umtʰɛtʰɔ jɔmɛlɛlani niɓɛ nɡ̤amak͡xɔti ɛnz̤a kɛ amad̤ɔd̤ana kaab̤isalɔm kuamnɔn nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ uab̤isalɔm aɓɛwawisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ ɓɛsuka kɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɔkumkani walɔwɔ wakʰwɛla kunɮɛɓɛnd̤ɛ wakʰɛ ɓasaɓa kwatʰi ɓɛsɛsɛnɮɛlɛni z̤afika iind̤aɓa kud̤av̤id̤ɛ z̤isitʰi uab̤isalɔm uɓaɓulɛlɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɔkumkani namɲɛ wɛsuka waz̤ik͡xaz̤ula iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ wakǃuŋ̤ǃ̤uluz̤a ɛm̤laɓɛni ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓɛmi nɡ̤akujɛ ɓɛz̤ik͡xaz̤ulɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤aɓɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula ujɔnad̤ab̤i uɲana kaʃimɛha umkʰuluwa kad̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi majinɡ̤atʰi inkɔsi jam aɓulɛwɛ ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤ana anɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓɔkumkani nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kufɛ uamnɔn jɛd̤wa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jaɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwa lɛ ntɔ nɡ̤umlɔmɔ kaab̤isalɔm kususɛla wamɮwɛnɡ̤ula nɡ̤ajɔ utamarɛ ud̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ nkɔsi jam unɡ̤aliɓɛkɛli ntliz̤ijɔ ɛli liz̤wi litʰi ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɔkumkani ɓafilɛ akund͡ʒ̤alɔ nɡ̤uamnɔn jɛd̤wa ɔfilɛjɔ waɓalɛka uab̤isalɔm kɛ kalɔku ɔnɡ̤umlind̤i wapʰakamisa amɛɬɔ akʰɛ wakʰanɡ̤ɛla nankɔ kusiz̤a intɔ ɛninz̤i jaɓantu nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɛsɛkǀalɛni lɛntaɓa ɓɛv̤ɛla nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a watʰi ujɔnad̤ab̤i naɓa ɔɔɲana ɓɔkumkani ɓɛsiz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓɛlind͡ʒ̤alɔ iliz̤wi lɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ kwɛnz̤ɛkɛ nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ kwatʰi akuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa ukutʰɛtʰa ɓaɓɔnakala ɓɛfika ɔɔɲana ɓɔkumkani ɓalipʰakamisa iliz̤wi laɓɔ ɓalila kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓat͡ʃɔ isililɔ ɛsikʰulu kunɛnɛ kɛ uab̤isalɔm waɓalɛkɛla kutalɛmaji uɲana kaamihud̤i wasɛɡ̤ɛʃuri ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili nɡ̤ɔɲana wakʰɛ jɔnkɛ imiɬa waɓalɛka kɛ uab̤isalɔm ɛɡ̤ɛʃuri waɓa miɲaka mitʰatʰu kʰɔna ud̤av̤id̤ɛ walanɡ̤az̤ɛlɛla ukupʰuma ajɛ kuab̤isalɔm kuɓa wajɛsɛlɛtʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛkilɛ nɡ̤ɔamnɔn kuɓa ɛfilɛ waz̤i ujɔwab̤i uɲana kat͡sɛruja ukuɓa intliz̤ijɔ jɔkumkani ib̤ɛkɛ kuab̤isalɔm ujɔwab̤i watʰumɛla kɛ ɛtɛkɔwa watʰaɓatʰa kʰɔna inkaz̤ana ɛlumkilɛjɔ watʰi kujɔ kʰawuz̤ɛnz̤ɛ ɔz̤ililɛjɔ kʰawuŋǁiɓɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɔkuz̤ila unɡ̤az̤itʰamɓisi nɡ̤ɛɔli jiɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnkaz̤ana lɛ imɛnz̤ɛla ɔfilɛjɔ iz̤ila imiɬa ɛmininz̤i ujɛ utʰɛtʰɛ kujɛ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɔwab̤i amaz̤wi ɛmlɔɲɛni wajɔ jatʰɛtʰa inkaz̤ana jasɛtɛkɔwa jawa nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni jakǃuɓud̤a jatʰi sind̤isa ukumkani watʰi kujɔ unand̤awɔni jatʰi haji nd̤inɡ̤um̤lɔlɔkaz̤i ind̤ɔd̤a jam ifilɛ umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ ɛɓɛnɔɔɲana aɓaɓini ɓalwa ɓɔɓaɓini ɛnɮɛ akwaɓakʰɔ m̤lanɡ̤uli pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ɔmɲɛ wat͡ʃɔ kɔmɲɛ wamɓulala kɛ kalɔku wɔnkɛ umz̤alwanɛ usukɛlɛ pʰɛz̤ulu kɔmkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ usitʰi sinikɛ umɓulali wɔmz̤alwana wakʰɛ simɓulalɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wɔmz̤alwana wakʰɛ amɓulɛlɛjɔ sit͡ʃaɓalalisɛ nɛnɮamafa ukuz̤ɛ ɓakǀimɛ ilaɬɛ ɛlisɛlɛjɔ ɓanɡ̤ajisalisɛli ind̤ɔd̤a jam iɡ̤ama nɛmpund̤ɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni watʰi kwinkaz̤ana lɛjɔ jija ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ nd̤ija umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɔ inkaz̤ana jasɛtɛkɔwa jatʰi nkɔsi jam maɓuɓɛ pʰɛz̤u napʰɛz̤u kwɛnɮu kaɓawɔ ɔɓɔ ɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa makaɓɛ jɛna nɛtrɔnɛ jakʰɛ watʰi ɔtʰɛtʰa intɔ kuwɛ mz̤isɛ akasaji kupʰind̤a akukǀʰukumisɛ jatʰi ukumkani makʰɛ amkʰumɓulɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ ukuz̤ɛ umpʰind̤ɛz̤ɛli wɛɡ̤az̤i anɡ̤akwand̤isi ukɔnakalisa ɓanɡ̤amt͡ʃaɓalalisi uɲana watʰi kɛ jɛna ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a akuji naluɲɛ unwɛlɛ lɔɲana wakʰɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni jatʰi inkaz̤ana makʰɛ atʰɛtʰɛ iliz̤wi umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ ɛnkɔsini jam watʰi jɛna tʰɛtʰa jatʰi inkaz̤ana lɛjɔ jini kɛ ukuɓa ukǀinɡ̤ɛ intɔ ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ nɡ̤aɓantu ɓakatʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkulitʰɛtʰa ɛli liz̤wi und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔnɛtʲala ɛnɡ̤amɓujisi nd͡ʒ̤ɛ umɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰwa wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa simɛlwɛ sind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amanz̤i apʰalɛlɛjɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni anɡ̤ɛnakuɬanɡ̤aniswa nɔtʰikǁɔ mpʰɛfumlɔ ikǀɛɓɔ ukuz̤ɛ anɡ̤amɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰi kujɛ umɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰwa lɛ ntɔ nd̤iz̤ɛ kulitʰɛtʰa inkɔsi jam ɛli liz̤wi nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ kuɓa aɓantu aɓa ɓɛnd̤ɔjikisilɛ watʰi kɛ umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ makʰɛ nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ m̤lawumɓi anɡ̤alɛnz̤a iliz̤wi lɔmkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɔv̤a am̤lanɡ̤ulɛ umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni salɛ nd̤ɔd̤a iz̤a kund̤it͡ʃaɓalalisa kuɲɛ nɔɲana ɛlifɛni likatʰikǁɔ watʰi kɛ umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ iliz̤wi lɛnkɔsi jam maliɓɛ lɛlɔkupʰumz̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ sind͡ʒ̤alɔ isitʰuɲwa sikatʰikǁɔ ind͡ʒ̤alɔ inkɔsi jam ukuv̤a ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɔkuɓi ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ makaɓɛ nawɛ wapʰɛnd̤ula kɛ watʰi kwinkaz̤ana musa ukukʰa ujikʰaɲɛlɛ intɔ ɛnd̤ikuɓuz̤ajɔ jatʰi inkaz̤ana majikʰɛ itʰɛtʰɛ inkɔsi jam watʰi kɛ isanɮa sikajɔwab̤i asinawɛ kulɛ ntɔ jɔnkɛ japʰɛnd̤ula inkaz̤ana jatʰi uɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ nkɔsi jam inɛnɛ akukʰɔ ntɔ inɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ nɛnɡ̤asɛkʰɔɬɔ kukɔ kɔnkɛ ɛkutʰɛtʰajɔ inkɔsi jam nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɔwab̤i umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ nɡ̤ujɛ lɔ und̤iwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ujɛ lɔ uwaɓɛkilɛjɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni wɔmkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ ɔnkɛ maz̤wi wɛnz̤ɛ lɛ ntɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ujɔwab̤i ukuz̤ɛ ɓuɡ̤ukǃulwɛ uɓusɔ ɓalɛ ntɔ kɛ inkɔsi jam ilumkɛ nɡ̤ɔkulumka kwɛsitʰuɲwa sikatʰikǁɔ ukuɓa jaz̤i kɔnkɛ ɔkusɛm̤laɓɛni watʰi kujɔwab̤i ujaɓɔna nd̤ijɛnz̤ilɛ kɛ lɔɔ ntɔ hamɓa ujɛ umɓujisɛ lɔwɔ uab̤isalɔm wawa kɛ ujɔwab̤i nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni wakǃuɓud̤a waɓulɛla watʰi nam̤la waz̤ilɛ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ukuɓa uɓaɓalwɛ nɡ̤uwɛ nkɔsi jam ɛsɛnz̤ilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ isikǀɛlɔ sɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɛ wɛsuka kɛ ujɔwab̤i waja ɛɡ̤ɛʃuri wamz̤isa uab̤isalɔm ɛjɛrusalɛm watʰi makad͡ʒ̤ikɛ ajɛ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ anɡ̤aɓuɓɔni uɓusɔ ɓam wad͡ʒ̤ika uab̤isalɔm waja ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ akaɓuɓɔna uɓusɔ ɓɔkumkani kɛ kumasirajɛli ɔnkɛ ɓɛkunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ nd̤ɔd̤a ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔab̤isalɔm ukuɓa jinz̤wana nɡ̤ɔkɔkuz̤ɛ ad̤uɲiswɛ kunɛnɛ kwatʰaɓatʰɛla ɛntɛnd̤ɛni jɔɲawɔ kwɛsa ɛlukakajini pʰɛz̤ulu kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ sipʰakɔ kujɛ uɓɛsitʰi akujikǀʰɛɓa intlɔkɔ jakʰɛ kuɓa ɓɛkusitʰi ɛkupʰɛlɛni kɔmɲaka imiɲaka jɔnkɛ ajikǀʰɛɓɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iɓinz̤ima pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ ajikǀʰɛɓɛ kɛ az̤ilinɡ̤anisɛ iinwɛlɛ z̤ɛntlɔkɔ jakʰɛ z̤isukɛ z̤iɓɛ z̤iiʃɛkɛlɛ ɛz̤imakʰulu maɓini nɡ̤ɔkwɛlitʲɛ lɔkumkani uab̤isalɔm waz̤alɛlwa ɔɔɲana aɓatʰatʰu nɛntɔmɓi jaɲɛ iɡ̤ama lajɔ ɓɛlinɡ̤utamarɛ iɓijinz̤wakaz̤i ukuɓɔnakala kwajɔ uab̤isalɔm waɬala ɛjɛrusalɛm imiɲaka ɛmiɓini akaɓuɓɔna uɓusɔ ɓɔkumkani uab̤isalɔm watʰumɛla kujɔwab̤i ukuɓa amtʰumɛlɛ akav̤uma ukuz̤a kujɛ waɓuja watʰumɛla ɔkwɛsiɓini akav̤uma ukuz̤a watʰi kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ kʰanɡ̤ɛlani int͡simi kajɔwab̤i inɡ̤akwɛjam unɛxasi kʰɔna jijani nijit͡ʃisɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ ɓajit͡ʃisa kɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakaab̤isalɔm int͡simi nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ wɛsuka ujɔwab̤i waja kuab̤isalɔm watʰi kujɛ jini ukuɓa aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ɓajit͡ʃisɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ int͡simi jam watʰi uab̤isalɔm kujɔwab̤i jaɓɔna nd̤itʰumɛlɛ kuwɛ nd̤isitʰi jiz̤a apʰa nd̤ikutʰumɛlɛ ujɛ kutʰi nd̤iɓujisɛlwɛni ɛɡ̤ɛʃuri ɓɛkund̤ilunɡ̤ɛlɛ kaɲɛ ukuɓa nd̤iɓɛ nd̤isɛkʰɔna kalɔku mand̤iɓuɓɔnɛ uɓusɔ ɓɔkumkani ukuɓa nd̤inɛtʲala makasɛlɛnd̤iɓulala waja kɛ ujɔwab̤i wamkǁɛlɛla wamɓiz̤a uab̤isalɔm waja wakǃuɓud̤a kujɛ nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni pʰamɓi kɔkumkani wamanɡ̤a kɛ uab̤isalɔm kwatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ uab̤isalɔm waz̤ilunɡ̤isɛla iiŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa namahaʃɛ namad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amaʃumi amaɬanu ukuɓa aɓɛ z̤iz̤iɡ̤id̤imi pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ uab̤isalɔm wav̤uka wɛma nɡ̤asɛkǀalɛni lɛnɮɛla jɛsanɡ̤ɔ uɓɛsakutʰi ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓanɛmɓamɓanɔ jɔkuɓa kujiwɛ nɡ̤ajɔ ukuɓa ajiɡ̤wɛɓɛ aɓaɓiz̤ɛlɛ kujɛ uab̤isalɔm aɓuz̤ɛ atʰi unɡ̤ɔwawupʰi umz̤i atʰi lɔwɔ unɡ̤ɔwɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤akwasirajɛli umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ uɓɛsakutʰi kɛ uab̤isalɔm kujɛ jaɓɔna iind̤awɔ z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤i z̤ilunɡ̤ilɛ z̤itʰɛ t͡sɛ kɔkɔ wɔkuz̤itʰɛtʰa atʰi uab̤isalɔm and̤aɓa ɓɛnd̤imisiwɛ nd̤aɓa nɡ̤umɡ̤wɛɓi ɛz̤wɛni apʰa ɓɛz̤ɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓanɛnd̤awɔ ɛkuɓand͡ʒ̤wɛnɛ nɡ̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɛnd̤iɓalunɡ̤isa uɓɛsitʰi akusɔnd̤ɛla ɛz̤a kukǃuɓud̤a kujɛ asukɛ amnikɛ isanɮa sakʰɛ amɓamɓɛ amanɡ̤ɛ wɛnz̤a kɛ uab̤isalɔm nɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kumasirajɛli ɔnkɛ aɓɛsiz̤a ɛkuɡ̤wɛɓɛni waz̤iɓa uab̤isalɔm iintliz̤ijɔ z̤amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli kwatʰi ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɲaka ɛmaʃumi manɛ watʰi uab̤isalɔm makʰɛ nd̤ijɛ nd̤isiz̤alisɛ isib̤amɓatʰisɔ ɛnd̤ab̤amɓatʰisa nɡ̤asɔ kujɛhɔv̤a ɛhɛɓrɔn nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ wab̤amɓatʰisa nɡ̤ɛsib̤amɓatʰisɔ ɛkuɬalɛni kwakʰɛ ɛɡ̤ɛʃuri kwaaram ɛsitʰi ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰɛ wand̤iɓujisɛla nɡ̤ɛnɛnɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm nd̤ɔmkʰɔnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi kujɛ hamɓa ukǁɔlilɛ wɛsuka kɛ waja ɛhɛɓrɔn uab̤isalɔm watʰumɛla iintlɔla ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwasirajɛli ɛsitʰi nakuliv̤a iz̤wi lɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ jitʰini uab̤isalɔm unɡ̤ukumkani ɛhɛɓrɔn kwapʰuma ɛjɛrusalɛm kwahamɓa nɔab̤isalɔm amakʰulu amaɓini amad̤ɔd̤a amɛɲiwɛjɔ ajɛhamɓa ɛjɛkɛ umz̤imɓa ɛnɡ̤az̤i ntɔ uab̤isalɔm watʰumɛla waɓiz̤a uahitɔfɛlɛ wasɛɡ̤ilɔ umpʰakatʰi kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛmz̤ini wakʰɛ ɛɡ̤ilɔ ɛɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ laɓa namanɮa ɛlɔ jɛlɛŋǃɛ kuɓa aɓantu ɓaja ɓɛsand̤a kuab̤isalɔm kwafika wamkǁɛlɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛsitʰi iintliz̤ijɔ z̤amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli z̤iland̤ɛlɛ uab̤isalɔm watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛnaɓɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm sukani siɓalɛkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa asiji kuɓa nakusind̤a ɛɓuswɛni ɓukaab̤isalɔm kʰawulɛz̤ani simkɛ ɬɛz̤ɛ akʰawulɛz̤ɛ asifikɛlɛ asiɬisɛlɛ uɓuɓi awukǁaɓɛlɛ umz̤i nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ ɓatʰi aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɔkumkani ɛntwɛni jɔnkɛ ɛja kujiɲula inkɔsi jɛtʰu naɓa ɓɛkʰɔ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ wapʰuma inɮu jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ imland̤ɛla ukumkani waʃija iʃumi lamaʃwɛʃwɛ ukuz̤ɛ ajiɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ inɮu wapʰuma kɛ ɓɛmland̤ɛla aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛma ɛb̤ɛtɛmɛraki ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓɛhamɓa ɛkǀalɛni lakʰɛ naɓaŋǀinitʰi ɓɔnkɛ nɛz̤iɡ̤id̤imi z̤ɔnkɛ naɓasɛɡ̤ati ɓɔnkɛ amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu amad̤ɔd̤a awajɛ ɛmland̤ɛla ɛv̤ɛla ɛɡ̤ati aɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa pʰamɓi kɔkumkani watʰi kuitaji wasɛɡ̤ati jini ukuɓa nawɛ uhamɓɛ natʰi ɓuja uɬalɛ nɔkumkani nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɡ̤ɔwasɛmz̤ini unɡ̤umfiki ɓujɛla ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɔ unɡ̤atʰi ufikɛ iz̤ɔlɔ ɛli nd̤ikub̤ad̤ulisɛ nanam̤la nd̤ikuhamɓisɛ natʰi nd̤isija apʰɔ nd̤inɡ̤aja kʰɔna nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɓuja uɓujisɛ aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɔ iŋǀɛɓa nɛɲanisɔ iɓɛ nawɛ uitaji wampʰɛnd̤ula watʰi ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ inkɔsi jam inɛnɛ ɛnd̤awɛni ɛja kuɓa kujɔ inkɔsi jam nɔkuɓa kusɛkufɛni nɔkuɓa kusɛɓɔmini uja kuɓa lapʰɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuitaji hamɓa uɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛ kɛ waɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa uitaji namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ ɔnkɛ nɔsapʰɔ lɔnkɛ aɓɛnalɔ lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lajɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤wi ɛlikʰulu ɓɛwɛla aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɛwɛla nɔkumkani ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni ɔjikid̤rɔn aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛwɛla ɓɛkʰanɡ̤ɛlɛnɛ nɛnɮɛla jɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nankɔ ut͡sad̤ɔki naɓalɛv̤i ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛnajɛ ɓɛtʰwɛlɛ itʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ katʰikǁɔ ɓajiɓɛka pʰant͡si itʲɛja katʰikǁɔ wɛɲuka uab̤ijatarɛ ɓad̤a ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛla ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ukuwɛla ɓɛpʰuma kuwɔ umz̤i watʰi kut͡sad̤ɔki jiɓujisɛlɛ kuwɔ umz̤i itʲɛja katʰikǁɔ ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤aɓaɓalwa nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɔnd̤iɓujisa and̤iɓɔnisɛ jɔna kwanɛkʰaja lakʰɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ and̤ikunanz̤ilɛ nd̤ikʰɔ makɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ watʰi kut͡sad̤ɔki umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wɛna mɓɔni ɓujɛla kuwɔ umz̤i unɔkǁɔlɔ nɔahimahat͡sɛ uɲana wakʰɔ nɔjɔnatan uɲana kaab̤ijatarɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu ɓɔɓaɓini kuɲɛ nawɛ jaɓɔnani nd̤ɔz̤ilaz̤ila ɛmaz̤iɓukwɛni ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ kud̤ɛ kufikɛ iliz̤wi ɛliv̤ɛla lɔkund̤ikǁɛlɛla ut͡sad̤ɔki nɔab̤ijatarɛ ɓajiɓujisɛla itʲɛja katʰikǁɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm ɓaɬala kʰɔna ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wɛɲuka ɛkǃʰinɛni lɛmiŋǃuma ɛɲuka ɛlila ɛɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɛ intlɔkɔ ɛhamɓa ɛnɡ̤ɛnaz̤imɓad̤ad̤a ɛz̤iɲawɛni z̤akʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓɛnaɓɔ ɓɛɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɛ ɛlɔwɔ intlɔkɔ jakʰɛ ɓɛɲuka ɓɛɲuka ɓɛlila kwakǁɛlwa kud̤av̤id̤ɛ kwatʰiwa uahitɔfɛlɛ ukuɓakǀɛɓisi ɓakaab̤isalɔm watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ jɛhɔv̤a kʰawulit͡ʃit͡ʃisɛ ikǀɛɓɔ likaahitɔfɛlɛ kwatʰi akuja ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni apʰɔ ɓɛkusakukǃutʲud̤wa kʰɔna kutʰikǁɔ nankɔ uhuʃaji umarki ɛmkʰawulɛla ɛk͡xaz̤ulɛ inɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ ɛnɔm̤laɓa ɛntlɔkɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi kujɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ waɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛla wɔɓa nɡ̤umtʰwalɔ kɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ waɓujɛla kuwɔ umz̤i watʰi kuab̤isalɔm nd̤ɔɓa nɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ nd̤iɓɛ nd̤ifud̤ula nd̤inɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤i kajiɬɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤inɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ wɔnd̤it͡ʃit͡ʃisɛla kɛ ikǀɛɓɔ likaahitɔfɛlɛ aɓanawɛ apʰɔ ut͡sad̤ɔki nɔab̤ijatarɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kɔtʰi kɛ jɔnkɛ intɔ ɔtʰɛ wajiv̤a ɛnɮwini jɔkumkani ujikǁɛlɛ kut͡sad̤ɔki nɔab̤ijatarɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli jaɓɔna ɓakʰɔ kʰɔna naɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ ɓɔɓaɓini uahimahat͡sɛ ɔkat͡sad̤ɔki nɔjɔnatan ɔkaab̤ijatarɛ nɔlitʰumɛla nɡ̤ɛsanɮa saɓɔ lɔnkɛ iliz̤wi ɛnitʰɛ naliv̤a waja kɛ uhuʃaji um̤lɔɓɔ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ kuwɔ umz̤i uab̤isalɔm wɛz̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰilɛ kaŋǀinanɛ ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛnd̤uli nankɔ ut͡sib̤a wakwamɛfib̤ɔʃɛtɛ ɛmkʰa wulɛla ɛnamaɛsilɛ amaɓini ɛɓɔt͡ʃiwɛ ɛɓɛkwɛ iz̤ɔnka ɛz̤imakʰulu maɓini nɛkʰulu lɛz̤ikǀumɓa z̤ɛɛrasintʲisi nɛkʰulu lɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤asɛɬɔtʲɛni nɛnt͡suɓa jɛwajini watʰi kut͡sib̤a utʰini nɡ̤ɛz̤i z̤intɔ watʰi ut͡sib̤a amaɛsilɛ nɡ̤awɔkukʰwɛla aɓɛnɮu jɔkumkani iz̤ɔnka nɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤asɛɬɔtʲɛni z̤ɛz̤ɔkuɮiwa nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤ana iwajini jɛjɔkuɓa ɓasɛlɛ aɓatʰʲafilɛjɔ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ watʰi upʰi uɲana wɛnkɔsi jakʰɔ watʰi ut͡sib̤a nankuja ɛɬɛli ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰi nam̤la inɮu jakwasirajɛli ija kuɓuɓujisɛla uɓukumkani ɓukaɓawɔ watʰi kut͡sib̤a nankɔ kukɔkwakʰɔ kɔnkɛ ɔkukamɛfib̤ɔʃɛtɛ watʰi ut͡sib̤a nd̤ijakǃuɓud̤a mand̤iɓaɓalwɛ nɡ̤uwɛ nkɔsi jam wafika ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛb̤ahurim nankɔ kupʰuma kʰɔna ind̤ɔd̤a jɔmz̤alwanɛ wɛnɮu kasawulɛ ɛɡ̤ama linɡ̤uʃimɛhi uɲana kaɡ̤ɛra japʰuma jahamɓa it͡ʃab̤isa jamkǁuluɓa nɡ̤amatʲɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɔnkɛ ɓɔkumkani ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu namaɡ̤ɔxa ɔnkɛ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ nanɡ̤asɛkʰɔɬɔ kujɛ watʰi uʃimɛhi ukut͡ʃab̤isa kwakʰɛ pʰuma pʰuma mfɔnd̤ini wamaɡ̤az̤i mfɔnd̤ini ulit͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uwaɓujisɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ ɔnkɛ amaɡ̤az̤i ɛnɮu kasawulɛ ɔtʰɛ wɛna wanɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uɓunikɛlɛ uɓukumkani ɛsanɮɛni sikaab̤isalɔm uɲana wakʰɔ jaɓɔna wɛjɛlɛ ɛɓuɓini ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɡ̤umfɔ wamaɡ̤az̤i watʰi kɛ uab̤iʃaji uɲana kat͡sɛruja kunɡ̤ani ukuɓa lɛ nd͡ʒ̤a ifilɛjɔ ijit͡ʃab̤isɛ inkɔsi jam makʰɛ nd̤iwɛlɛ nd̤ijiŋǃumlɛ intlɔkɔ watʰi jintɔni ɛnam ɲana ɓakat͡sɛruja mjɛkɛ at͡ʃab̤isɛ kǁa ujɛhɔv̤a atʰɛ kujɛ mt͡ʃab̤isɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kutʰi jini ukuɓa wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuab̤iʃaji nakuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ nijaɓɔna uɲana ɔpʰumɛ ɛz̤iɓilinini z̤am uŋ̤ǁ̤amɛlɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ anɡ̤aɓɛka pʰi kɛ nɡ̤ɔku lɔ mb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin mjɛkɛni at͡ʃab̤isɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃilɔ kujɛ ujɛhɔv̤a m̤lawumɓi ujɛhɔv̤a anɡ̤aɓukʰanɡ̤ɛla uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓam ujɛhɔv̤a and̤iɓujisɛlɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɔkut͡ʃab̤iswa nam̤la ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ uʃimɛhi ɛhamɓa ɛkǀalɛni lɛntaɓa ɛlilunɡ̤ɛ najɛ ɛnɡ̤apʰɛʃɛja wahamɓa ɛt͡ʃab̤isa wamkǁuluɓa nɡ̤amatʲɛ ɛmalunɡ̤a najɛ ɛmpʰɔsa nɔtʰuli ukumkani naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓanajɛ ɓɛz̤a ɛajɛfim ɓakʰa ɓapʰɛfumla kʰɔna kɛ kalɔku uab̤isalɔm naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli ɓɛz̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm ɓɛnɔahitɔfɛlɛ kwatʰi uhuʃaji wasɛarki um̤lɔɓɔ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ kuab̤isalɔm watʰi uhuʃaji kuab̤isalɔm makaɮɛ uɓɔmi makaɮɛ uɓɔmi watʰi uab̤isalɔm kuhuʃaji jiŋǀɛɓa jakʰɔ lɛ kum̤lɔɓɔ wakʰɔ jini ukuɓa unɡ̤aɓamɓi nɔm̤lɔɓɔ wakʰɔ watʰi uhuʃaji kuab̤isalɔm haji ɔɲulwɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nanɡ̤aɓa ɓantu nanɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ akwasirajɛli nd̤ɔɓa nɡ̤ɔwakʰɛ nd̤iɬalɛ najɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤iɓɛ nd̤ifanɛlɛ ukukʰɔnz̤a ɓani ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤afanɛlɛ kukʰɔnz̤a pʰamɓi kɔɲana wakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤akʰɔnz̤ajɔ pʰamɓi kɔjiɬɔ nd̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ watʰi uab̤isalɔm kuahitɔfɛlɛ kʰanɛnz̤ɛ ikǀɛɓɔ ukuɓa sija kwɛnz̤a ntɔni watʰi uahitɔfɛlɛ kuab̤isalɔm nɡ̤ɛna kumaʃwɛʃwɛ kajiɬɔ awaʃijilɛjɔ ukuɓa aɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ inɮu ɛv̤ɛ ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli ukuɓa uz̤inukisilɛ kujiɬɔ z̤ɔmɛlɛlɛ iz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓanawɛ ɓamtwaɓululɛla uab̤isalɔm intɛntɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛnɮu wanɡ̤ɛna uab̤isalɔm kumaʃwɛʃwɛ kajisɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni amasirajɛli ɔnkɛ kɛ kalɔku ikǀɛɓɔ likaahitɔfɛlɛ aɓɛkǀɛɓisa nɡ̤alɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa ɓɛlind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlɔɓuz̤ɛ kwiliz̤wi likatʰikǁɔ ɓɛlind͡ʒ̤alɔ lɔnkɛ ikǀɛɓɔ likaahitɔfɛlɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ nakuab̤isalɔm watʰi uahitɔfɛlɛ kuab̤isalɔm makʰɛ nd̤iɲulɛ iʃumi ɛlinamawaka amaɓini amad̤ɔd̤a nd̤isukɛ nd̤imsukɛlɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔɓu ɓusuku nd̤imfikɛlɛ ɛd̤iniwɛ ɛwɛ iz̤anɮa nd̤imɔtʰusɛ ɓasaɓɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu anaɓɔ nd̤iɓulalɛ jɛd̤wa nd̤iɓaɓujisɛlɛ kuwɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ jɔna ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤atʰi ɓaɓujɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɔkǁɔla ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu lalunɡ̤a ɛlɔ z̤wi ɛmɛɬwɛni kaab̤isalɔm nasɛmɛɬwɛni amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ɔnkɛ akwasirajɛli watʰi uab̤isalɔm kʰawuɓiz̤ɛ nɔhuʃaji wasɛarki siv̤ɛ intɔ ɛsɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɛ najɛ wɛz̤a uhuʃaji kuab̤isalɔm watʰi uab̤isalɔm kujɛ uahitɔfɛlɛ utʰɛtʰɛ ɛli liz̤wi wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ sɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛliz̤wi lakʰɛ sinɡ̤ɛnz̤i nɡ̤alɔ kʰawut͡ʃɔ wɛna watʰi uhuʃaji kuab̤isalɔm ikǀɛɓɔ uahitɔfɛlɛ akǀɛɓisa lɔna alilunɡ̤ilɛ ɔkwanɡ̤ɔku watʰi uhuʃaji wɛna ujamaz̤i ujiɬɔ namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤amaɡ̤ɔxa ampʰɛfumlɔ uluɡ̤ǀ̤alaɡ̤ǀ̤ala nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛb̤ɛrɛ ɛɬutʰwɛ amatʰɔlɛ ajɔ ɛz̤inɮɛ ujiɬɔ jind̤ɔd̤a ɛkǃʰɛlɛ ɛɓantwini jaɓɔna kunɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ uz̤imɛlɛ ɛmɡ̤ɔŋ̤ǁ̤wɛni nɔkuɓa kukwɛɲɛ ind̤awɔ kɔtʰi kɛ kǁa atʰɛ waɓawɛla ɛkukǃalɛni ɛv̤ɛ ɔv̤ajɔ atʰi kukʰɔ ukǁaɓɛlɔ ɛɓantwini aɓamland̤ɛlajɔ uab̤isalɔm atʰi nɔmfɔ ɔnɔɓuk͡xɔti ɔntliz̤ijɔ ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jɛnɡ̤ɔɲama aɲiɓilikɛ kupʰɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli ajaz̤i ukuɓa ujiɬɔ liɡ̤ɔxa aɓɔ ɓanajɛ nɡ̤amak͡xɔti nd̤itʰi ɛlam ikǀɛɓɔ makaɬanɡ̤aniswɛ aɬanɡ̤anisɛlwɛ kuwɛ ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli atʰaɓatʰɛlɛ kwad̤an ɛsɛ ɛb̤ɛrʃɛɓa aɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntlaɓatʰi ɛnɡ̤asɛlwanɮɛ uɓuninz̤i ujɛ ɛmfaz̤wɛni nɡ̤ɛsikǃu sɔfika kɛ kujɛ ɛnd̤awɛni apʰɔ afumanɛkɛ kʰɔna sitʰi kǃatʰa pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkulala kɔmɓɛtʰɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni kunɡ̤asali namɲɛ kujɛ nakumad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ anajɛ kɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ waxɔlɛla ɛmz̤ini ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli ɔz̤isa iz̤intʲa kulɔɔ mz̤i siwuk͡xwikǃiliz̤ɛlɛ ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛnɛni kud̤ɛ kunɡ̤afumanɛki nɛlitʲana kʰɔna watʰi uab̤isalɔm namad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ akwasirajɛli ikǀɛɓɔ likahuʃaji umarki lilunɡ̤ilɛ kunɛkǀɛɓɔ likaahitɔfɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wajɛmisɛ ukuɓa lit͡ʃit͡ʃiswɛ ikǀɛɓɔ ɛlilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ likaahitɔfɛlɛ ukuz̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a amz̤isɛlɛ uɓuɓi uab̤isalɔm watʰi uhuʃaji kut͡sad̤ɔki nakuab̤ijatarɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ uahitɔfɛlɛ ukumpʰa ikǀɛɓɔ uab̤isalɔm namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwasirajɛli kɛ nd̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓapʰa ikǀɛɓɔ tʰumɛlani kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ kamsiɲa nimkǁɛlɛlɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nitʰi musa nɡ̤ɔɓu ɓusuku ɛmaz̤iɓukwɛni ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ kʰawulɛz̤a uwɛlɛ ɬɛz̤ɛ aɡ̤iɲwɛ naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ anaɓɔ kɛ kalɔku ujɔnatan nɔahimahat͡sɛ ɓaɓɛmi ɛɛnrɔɡ̤ɛlɛ wajɛ umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana ɛmana ukuɓakǁɛlɛla ɓaja kɛ ɓɔna ɓakǁɛlɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɛnakuja ɓɛsiz̤a pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i ɛkuɬɛni umfana waɓaɓɔna wakǁɛlɛla uab̤isalɔm ɓɔɓaɓini kɛ ɓasaɓa nɡ̤ɔkukʰawulɛz̤a ɓafika ɛnɮwini jɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛb̤ahurim ɛɓinɛkǃula ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni jajɔ ɓɛɬa ɓɛɬɛla kʰɔna apʰɔ intɔkaz̤i jatʰaɓatʰa isiɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɔ jasitwaɓulula ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛkǃula ɛlɔ janɛka pʰɛz̤u kwasɔ ixasi ɛŋ̤ǃ̤uʃiwɛjɔ ajaz̤iwa kɛ lɔɔ ntɔ ɓafika aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakaab̤isalɔm kulɔɔ ntɔkaz̤i ɛnɮwini ɓatʰi ɓapʰi ɔɔahimahat͡sɛ nɔjɔnatan jatʰi lɔɔ ntɔkaz̤i kuɓɔ ɓawɛlɛ umland͡ʒ̤ana lɔ unamanz̤i ɓafuna kɛ aɓaɓafumana ɓaɓujɛla ɛjɛrusalɛm kwatʰi ɛmv̤a kɔkumka kwaɓɔ ɓapʰuma ɛkǃulɛni ɓaja ɓamkǁɛlɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɓatʰi kud̤av̤id̤ɛ sukani niwɛlɛ kamsiɲa ɛmanz̤ini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ uahitɔfɛlɛ ukuɓapʰa ikǀɛɓɔ nɡ̤ani wɛsuka kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ anaɓɔ ɓajiwɛla ijɔrd̤an kwatʰi kwaɓɛ kunɡ̤asɛkʰɔ namɲɛ unɡ̤ajiwɛlanɡ̤a ijɔrd̤an ɛɓɔnilɛ uahitɔfɛlɛ ukuɓa akwɛnz̤iwanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛlakʰɛ ikǀɛɓɔ waɓɔpʰa iɛsilɛ wɛsuka waɡ̤ɔd̤uka waja ɛmz̤ini wakʰɛ wajɔlɛla waz̤ik͡xwit͡ʃa waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni likajisɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛmahanajim uab̤isalɔm wajiwɛla ijɔrd̤an jɛna namad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ akwasirajɛli kuɲɛ najɛ uab̤isalɔm uamasa ɛsikʰunɮɛni sikajɔwab̤i pʰɛz̤u kɔmkʰɔsi kɛ uamasa ɛɓɛnɡ̤uɲana wɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛɡ̤ama linɡ̤uitra ɛnɡ̤umjiz̤ɛrɛli ɛjanɡ̤ɛna kuab̤iɡ̤ali intɔmɓi kanahaʃɛ ud̤ad̤ɛ ɓɔt͡sɛruja ɓɔjɔwab̤i amasirajɛli nɔab̤isalɔm ɓamisa ɛz̤wɛni lasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i kwatʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛmahanajim uʃɔb̤i uɲana kanahaʃɛ wasɛrab̤a jakɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn nɔmakirɛ uɲana kaamijɛli wasɛlɔd̤ɛb̤arɛ nɔb̤arz̤ilaji wasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i wasɛrɔɡ̤ɛlim ɓaz̤isa iinkukɔ nɛz̤itʲa nɛmipʰand̤a nɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛxasi nɔmɡ̤uɓɔ namakʰwɛɓa nɛɛmɓɔtʲi nɛɛntlumaja nɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤ad̤iwɛjɔ nɔɓusi nɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛz̤ɔnka z̤amasi ɛnkɔmɔ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ naɓantu aɓɛnaɓɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓaɮɛ kuɓa ɓaɓɛsitʰi aɓantu ɓalamɓilɛ ɓatʰʲafilɛ ɓaŋǁaniwɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓaɓala aɓantu aɓɛnaɓɔ aɓatʰɛtʰɛlimawaka naɓatʰɛtʰɛlimakʰulu pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wasinikɛla isaɬulɔ sɛsitʰatʰu saɓantu ɛsanɮɛni sikajɔwab̤i nɛsaɬulɔ sɛsitʰatʰu ɛsanɮɛni sikaab̤iʃaji uɲana kat͡sɛruja kajɔwab̤i nɛsaɬulɔ sɛsitʰatʰu ɛsanɮɛni sikaitaji wasɛɡ̤ati watʰi ɛɓantwini nam nd̤ija kupʰuma nd̤ipʰumɛ ɓatʰi aɓantu uz̤ɛ unɡ̤apʰumi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kǁa sitʰɛ sasaɓa sisaɓilɛ aɓaji kusiɓɛkɛla ntliz̤ijɔ tʰina nɔkuɓa kutʰɛ isikǃinɡ̤atʰa kutʰi aɓaji kusiɓɛkɛla ntliz̤ijɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɡ̤anɡ̤amawaka aliʃumi kutʰi kulunɡ̤ilɛ kaɲɛ ukuɓa usiŋǀɛd̤ɛ ukuwɔ umz̤i watʰi kuɓɔ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛnu nd̤ɔkwɛnz̤a ukumkani wɛma ɛkǀalɛni lɛsanɡ̤ɔ aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓapʰuma nɡ̤amakʰulu nanɡ̤amawaka ukumkani waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ ujɔwab̤i nɔab̤iʃaji nɔitaji watʰi mpʰatʰɛni kakuɬɛ uab̤isalɔm nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam ɓɛv̤a ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ukuɓawisɛla kɔkumkani umtʰɛtʰɔ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kaab̤isalɔm ɓapʰuma kɛ aɓantu ɓaja ɛz̤inɮɛ ɓawaɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a amasirajɛli ɛɬatʰini lakwaɛfrajim ɓaɓulawɛlwa kʰɔna aɓantu ɓakwasirajɛli pʰamɓi kwaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ kwaɓakʰɔ kʰɔna ukǁaɓɛlɔ ɔlukʰulu anɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmaɓini kwapʰanɡ̤alala kʰɔna pʰɛz̤u kwɛliz̤wɛ lɔnkɛ iɬatʰi laɮa ɛɓantwini intɔ ɛninz̤i nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔkuɮa kwɛk͡xɛlɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ uab̤isalɔm wakǃuɓisana naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ uab̤isalɔm wajɛ ɛkʰwɛlɛ kunɮɛɓɛnd̤ɛ unɮɛɓɛnd̤ɛ wanɡ̤ɛna pʰant͡si kwɛnt͡ʃiɲɛla jɔmtɛrɛb̤inti ɔmkʰulu jaɓamɓɛka ɛmtɛrɛb̤intini intlɔkɔ jakʰɛ wapʰakatʰi kwɛz̤ulu nɔm̤laɓa wɛmka unɮɛɓɛnd̤ɛ ɔɓɛpʰant͡si kwakʰɛ jaɓɔna ind̤ɔd̤a ɛtʰilɛ jamkǁɛlɛla ujɔwab̤i jatʰi kʰanɡ̤ɛla nd̤imɓɔnilɛ uab̤isalɔm ɛkǁʰɔmɛkilɛ ɛmtɛrɛb̤intini watʰi ujɔwab̤i kulɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤a imkǁɛlɛlɛjɔ kʰanɡ̤ɛla umɓɔnilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ iɓijini ukuɓa unɡ̤amɓɛtʰi awɛ kʰɔna ɛm̤laɓɛni nɡ̤ɛnd̤ikunikɛ iʃumi lɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɔmb̤iŋǃɔ jatʰi lɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤a kujɔwab̤i nd̤inɡ̤afanɛlana nd̤ilinɡ̤anisɛlwɛ ɛsanɮɛni lɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤ɛd̤ɛ nd̤isɛ isanɮa kuɲana wɔkumkani nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sisiv̤a wakuwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ wɛna nɔab̤iʃaji nɔitaji watʰi nɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔɔɓani iz̤ɛ ɓamɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ uab̤isalɔm ɔkaɲɛ ukuɓa ɓɛnd̤itʰɛ nd̤ɛnz̤a uɓukǁɔki ɛmpʰɛfumlwɛni wakʰɛ kuɓa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ ntɔ ikʰaɲɛlɛkajɔ kukumkaniwɛna uɓuja kund̤ikǀʰasa watʰi ujɔwab̤i and̤inakwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤iliɓalɛ nɡ̤uwɛ watʰaɓatʰa iz̤ikʰali z̤az̤itʰatʰu nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɛ wam̤laɓa uab̤isalɔm ɛntliz̤ijwɛni ɛsapʰililɛ ɛmtɛrɛb̤intini apʰɔ amxawula amad̤ɔd̤ana aliʃumi anɡ̤aɓapʰatʰi ɓɛmpaɬa kajɔwab̤i at͡ʃɔ kuab̤isalɔm amɓulala wav̤utʰɛla ujɔwab̤i isiɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɓaɓuja aɓantu ɛkuwasukɛlɛni amasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɔwab̤i waɓaŋǃand̤a aɓantu ɓamtʰaɓatʰa uab̤isalɔm ɓampʰɔsa ɛɬatʰini ɛmɡ̤ɔŋ̤ǁ̤wɛni ɔmkʰulu ɓafumɓa imfumɓa ɛnkulu kakʰulu jamatʲɛ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ asaɓa ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli ɛlɔwɔ waja ɛntɛntɛni jakʰɛ kɛ kalɔku uab̤isalɔm ɛkuɮɛni kwakʰɛ uɓɔmi wajɛtʰaɓatʰɛ waz̤imisɛla ilitʲɛ ɛlisɛntilini jɔkumkani nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓɛsitʰi and̤inaɲana wɔkulikʰumɓuz̤a iɡ̤ama waliɓiz̤a nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama lakʰɛ ɛlɔ litʲɛ laɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɔkutʰi sisikʰumɓuz̤ɔ sikaab̤isalɔm unanam̤la watʰi uahimahat͡sɛ uɲana kat͡sad̤ɔki mand̤iɡ̤id̤imɛ nd̤imʃumajɛz̤ɛ iind̤aɓa ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ z̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a umɡ̤wɛɓɛlɛ wamkʰulula ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤ɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɛ watʰi ujɔwab̤i kujɛ akunɡ̤ujɛ mfɔ wɛɛnd̤aɓa ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nam̤la wɔʃumajɛla iind̤aɓa ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛɲɛ kɔd̤wa nam̤la akusaji kuʃumajɛla z̤ind̤aɓa z̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɲana wɔkumkani ufilɛ watʰi ujɔwab̤i kukuʃi hamɓa ujɛ kumkǁɛlɛla ɔkuɓɔnilɛjɔ wakǃuɓud̤a ukuʃi kujɔwab̤i waɡ̤id̤ima kɛ waɓuja wapʰind̤a uahimahat͡sɛ uɲana kat͡sad̤ɔki watʰi kujɔwab̤i nɔkuɓa kutʰɛni makʰɛ nd̤imland̤ɛlɛ ukuʃi watʰi ujɔwab̤i jini ukuɓa uɡ̤id̤imɛ ɲana unɡ̤ɛnaz̤ind̤aɓa z̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ z̤inanz̤uz̤ɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ watʰi nɔkuɓa kutʰɛni mand̤iɡ̤id̤imɛ watʰi kujɛ ɡ̤id̤ima waɡ̤id̤ima kɛ uahimahat͡sɛ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jalɔɔ mmanɮa wɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa kukuʃi kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛɓɛɬɛli pʰakatʰi kwamasanɡ̤ɔ amaɓini umlind̤i waja ɛmpʰɛz̤ulwini wɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni wapʰakamisa amɛɬɔ akʰɛ wakʰanɡ̤ɛla nankɔ kusiz̤a ind̤ɔd̤a iɓalɛka ijɔd̤wa wamɛmɛz̤a umlind̤i wakǁɛlɛla watʰi ukuɓa ijɔd̤wa inɛɛnd̤aɓa ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni wajɔ jɛz̤a isiz̤a jasɔnd̤ɛla umlind̤i waɓɔna ɛɲɛ ind̤ɔd̤a iɓalɛka umlind̤i wamɛmɛz̤a ɛsanɡ̤wɛni watʰi nant͡sija ind̤ɔd̤a iɓalɛka ijɔd̤wa watʰi nalɛjɔ inɡ̤umʃumajɛli wɛɛnd̤aɓa ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ watʰi umlind̤i nd̤ikuɓɔna ukuɓalɛka kwɛpʰamɓili nɔkuɓalɛka kukaahimahat͡sɛ uɲana kat͡sad̤ɔki watʰi jind̤ɔd̤a ɛlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ lɛjɔ iz̤a nɛɛnd̤aɓa ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ wamɛmɛz̤a uahimahat͡sɛ watʰi ɬala kakuɬɛ wakǃuɓud̤a nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni watʰi makaɓɔnɡ̤wɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ ɔwanikɛlɛjɔ amad̤ɔd̤a asipʰakamisilɛjɔ isanɮa sawɔ ɛnkɔsini jam watʰi iɬɛli kakuɬɛ ind̤ɔd̤ana uab̤isalɔm watʰi uahimahat͡sɛ nd̤iɓɔnɛ iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ ɛnkulu ɛkumtʰumɛni kukajɔwab̤i umkʰɔnz̤i nɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ nd̤inɡ̤az̤i ukuɓa jintɔni watʰi ʃɛŋǁɛla ɛkǀalɛni umɛ apʰa waʃɛŋǁa wɛma nankɔ kɛ ukuʃi ɛfika watʰi ukuʃi majiʃuɲajɛz̤wɛ iind̤aɓa ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ inkɔsi jam nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɡ̤wɛɓɛlɛ nam̤la wakukʰulula ɛsanɮɛni saɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛsukɛlɛ pʰɛz̤ulu kuwɛ watʰi kukuʃi iɬɛli kakuɬɛ ind̤ɔd̤ana uab̤isalɔm watʰi ukuʃi iint͡ʃaɓa z̤ɛnkɔsi jam naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓasukɛlɛ pʰɛz̤ulu kuwɛ ukukwɛnz̤a intɔ ɛmɓi maɓaɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤alɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤ana waɡ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤a wɛɲuka waja ɛɡ̤umɓini ɛlipʰɛz̤u kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ watʰɛtʰa ɛkujɛni kwakʰɛ ɛsitʰi ɲana ab̤isalɔm ɲana ɲana ab̤isalɔm akwaɓa ɓɛkufɛ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɔ ab̤isalɔm ɲana ɲana kwakǁɛlwa kujɔwab̤i kwatʰiwa nankɔ ɛlila ɛsɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili nɡ̤ɔab̤isalɔm usind̤isɔ lwad͡ʒ̤ika lwaɓa sisid͡ʒ̤wili nɡ̤alɔɔ ɛɓantwini ɓɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓantu ɓɛv̤a nɡ̤alɔɔ kusitʰiwa ukumkani wɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili nɡ̤ɔɲana wakʰɛ aɓantu ɓaɲɛɓɛlɛz̤a nɡ̤alɔɔ ukunɡ̤ɛna kwaɓɔ pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɲɛɓɛlɛz̤a kwaɓantu aɓaz̤iɬaz̤isilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkusaɓa ɛkulwɛni kɛ waz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛla uɓusɔ waɬaɬamɓa nɡ̤ɛz̤wi ɛlikʰulu watʰi ɲana ab̤isalɔm ab̤isalɔm ɲana ɲana wɛz̤a ujɔwab̤i ɛnɮwini watʰi uɓud̤anisilɛ nam̤la uɓusɔ ɓaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓawusind̤isilɛjɔ nam̤la umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ nɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nɔwɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɔ nɔmpʰɛfumlɔ waɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɔ nɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wamaʃwɛʃwɛ akʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓatʰand̤a aɓakutʰijajɔ nanɡ̤ɔkuɓatʰija aɓakutʰand̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukǁɛlilɛ nam̤la ukuɓa aɓantɔ kuwɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli naɓakʰɔnz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤az̤ilɛ nam̤la ukuɓa nɡ̤ɛkulunɡ̤ilɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ ukuɓa uɓɛtʰɛ waɮa uɓɔmi uab̤isalɔm tʰina sɔnkɛ sipʰɛla v̤uka kalɔku upʰumɛ utʰɛtʰɛ kakuɬɛ naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ifunɡ̤a ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa akutʰanɡ̤a upʰumɛ inɛnɛ akuji kuɬala nawɛ nɡ̤ɔɓu ɓusuku kuɓɛ kuɓi kuwɛ ɔkɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔɓuɓi ɓɔnkɛ ɔɓukufikɛlɛjɔ kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛɓuŋǀinanɛni ɓakʰɔ kuz̤isɛ kwɛli kǁɛʃa wav̤uka kɛ waɬala ɛsanɡ̤wɛni kwakǁɛlwa ɛɓantwini ɓɔnkɛ kwatʰiwa nankɔ ɛɬɛli ɛsanɡ̤wɛni ɓɛz̤a kɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu pʰamɓi kɔkumkani kɛ amasirajɛli aɓɛsaɓilɛ ɛlɔwɔ waja ɛntɛntɛni jakʰɛ aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓaɓɛpʰikisana ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwasirajɛli ɓɛsitʰi ukumkani wasisiz̤a ɛsanɮɛni sɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤ɛtʰu wasisind̤isa ɛsanɮɛni samafilisti nɡ̤ɔku uɓalɛkilɛ kwɛli liz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kaab̤isalɔm kɛ uab̤isalɔm ɛsamtʰamɓisajɔ ukuɓa aɓɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu ufɛlɛ ɛmfaz̤wɛni kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ nitʰɛlɛ kǀwaka ukuɓa ninɡ̤amɓujisi nd͡ʒ̤ɛ kɛ kalɔku ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰumɛla kut͡sad̤ɔki nakuab̤ijatarɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli watʰi tʰɛtʰani kumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwajud̤a nitʰi jini ukuɓa niɓɛ nɡ̤aɓɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla ɛkumɓujisɛlɛni ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ intɛtʰɔ jamasirajɛli ɔnkɛ ifikilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ ninɡ̤aɓaz̤alwana ɓam nilitʰamɓɔ nɛɲama jam jini ukuɓa niɓɛ nɡ̤aɓɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla ɛkumɓujisɛni nitʰi kɛ kuamasa akulilɔ itʰamɓɔ nɛɲama jam utʰikǁɔ makɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ akǃɔkɛlɛ ukwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓa akutʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤umtʰɛtʰɛli wɔmkʰɔsi pʰamɓi jɔnkɛ imiɬa ɛsikʰunɮɛni sikajɔwab̤i wajit͡sala intliz̤ijɔ jamad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ akwajud̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤and̤ɔd̤aɲɛ atʰumɛla atʰi ɓuja wɛna naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ waɓuja kɛ ɛjɔrd̤an kɛ amajud̤a ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali ɛsija kumkʰawulɛla amwɛz̤ɛ ɛjɔrd̤an uʃimɛhi uɲana kaɡ̤ɛra umb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin wasɛb̤ahurim wakʰawulɛz̤a wɛɬa namad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a ɛsija kumkʰawulɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛnɛwaka lamad̤ɔd̤a akwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɔt͡sib̤a umkʰɔnz̤i wɛnɮu kasawulɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ aɓaliʃumi ɛlinaɓaɬanu naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ aɓanɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini kuɲɛ najɛ ɓapʰumɛla ɛjɔrd̤an pʰamɓi kɔkumkani kwawɛla umkʰɔmɓɛ wɔkuwɛz̤a ukuɓa ujiwɛz̤ɛ inɮu jɔkumkani wɛnz̤ɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ uʃimɛhi uɲana kaɡ̤ɛra pʰamɓi kɔkumkani ɛkuwɛlɛni kwakʰɛ ɛjɔrd̤an watʰi inkɔsi jam majinɡ̤aɓalɛli ɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa unɡ̤akukʰumɓuli ɔkɔ wakwɛnz̤ajɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa nɡ̤alaa japʰuma nɡ̤ajɔ inkɔsi jam ɛjɛrusalɛm ukuɓa akuɓɛkɛlɛ intliz̤ijɔ ɔkɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ ujaz̤i ukuɓa wɔna nɡ̤alaa ntɔ nd̤inɡ̤ɔwɔkukǃala ɔfikilɛjɔ nam̤la wasɛnɮwini jɔnkɛ kajɔsɛfu ukuɓa nd̤iɬɛ nd̤ijikʰawulɛlɛ inkɔsi jam wapʰɛnd̤ula uab̤iʃaji uɲana kat͡sɛruja watʰi uʃimɛhi akaji kuɓulawa nɡ̤alaa ntɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wamt͡ʃa b̤isajɔ umtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa kajɛhɔv̤a watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ jintɔni ɛnam ɲana ɓakat͡sɛruja nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ninɡ̤aɓakǀʰasi ɓam nam̤la kukʰɔ kwasirajɛli apʰa uja kuɓulawa nam̤la nɡ̤ɔkuɓa and̤az̤i jini ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ukumkani kwasirajɛli nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ watʰi kuʃimɛhi akuji ukumkani wamkǃinisisa nɡ̤ɛsifunɡ̤ɔ kɛ umɛfib̤ɔʃɛtɛ uɲana kasawulɛ wɛɬa waja kumkʰawulɛla ɛnɡ̤az̤iɬamɓanɡ̤a iiɲawɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛnɡ̤az̤ikǀʰaz̤anɡ̤a iind̤ɛv̤u z̤akʰɛ ɛnɡ̤az̤iɬamɓanɡ̤a nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ kususɛla jɔkumka kɔkumkani kwad̤a kwajimini jɔkufika kwakʰɛ ɛnɔkǁɔlɔ kwatʰi ɛkufikɛni kwakʰɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛz̤a kukʰawulɛla watʰi kujɛ iɓijini ukuɓa unɡ̤ahamɓi mɛfib̤ɔʃɛtɛ watʰi nkɔsi jam umkʰɔnz̤i lɔwa und̤ikʰɔɬisilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ und̤im uɓɛsitʰi nd̤ija kuz̤iɓɔpʰɛla iɛsilɛ nd̤ikʰwɛlɛ kulɔ nd̤ihamɓɛ nɔkumkani nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ und̤im usisikǃʰwala wɛsuka jɛna wam̤lɛɓa umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ und̤im ɛnkɔsini jam inkɔsi jam ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsitʰuɲwa sikatʰikǁɔ jɛnz̤a ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jɔnkɛ inɮu kaɓawɔ iɓinɡ̤ɛntɔ jimɓi ɛnkɔsini jam iɓinɡ̤aɓantu ɓɔkufa wɛna wamɓɛka umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ und̤im pʰakatʰi kwaɓaɮa ɛtafilɛni jakʰɔ nd̤isɛnaɓanɡ̤ɔ kɛ nd̤isɛnakukʰala nɡ̤antɔni watʰi kujɛ usatʰɛtʰɛla ntɔni nɡ̤ɛɛnd̤awɔ z̤akʰɔ nd̤itʰɛ jaɬulɛlanani nɡ̤ɔm̤laɓa lɔwɔ wɛna nɔt͡sib̤a watʰi umɛfib̤ɔʃɛtɛ makawutʰaɓatʰɛ wɔnkɛ isɛlifikilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ inkɔsi jam inɔkǁɔlɔ ɛnɮwini jajɔ ub̤arz̤ilaji wasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i wɛɬa ɛrɔɡ̤ɛlim wawɛla nɔkumkani ɛjɔrd̤an ukuɓa amkʰapʰɛlɛ pʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an kɛ ub̤arz̤ilaji ɛɓɛjinɡ̤wɛv̤u ɛnkulu ɛmiɲaka imaʃumi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ jɛna ɛɓɛmkǁʰasilɛ ɛkuɬalɛni kwakʰɛ ɛmahanajim nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛnɡ̤umntu ɔmkʰulu kunɛnɛ watʰi kub̤arz̤ilaji wɛla wɛna nd̤ikukǁʰasɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm watʰi ub̤arz̤ilaji minɡ̤apʰi imiɬa jɛmiɲaka jɔkuɮa uɓɔmi ukuɓa nd̤iɲukɛ nd̤ijɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm nɔkumkani nam̤la nd̤imiɲaka imaʃumi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ nd̤iz̤ɛlwɛ nd̤inakɔ ukwaz̤i ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kɔkuɓi unakɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ ukujiv̤a intɔ ajiɮajɔ najisɛlajɔ nd̤isɛnakɔ ukuv̤a iliz̤wi lɛɛmv̤umi nɛlɛɛmv̤umikaz̤i jini ukuɓa umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ aɓujɛ aɓɛ nɡ̤umtʰwalɔ kwinkɔsi jam umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ uja kujiwɛla kɛ ijɔrd̤an nɔkumkani umz̤uz̤wana jini ukuɓa and̤ipʰatʰɛ nɡ̤alɛ mpatʰɔ makʰɛ aɓujɛ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤ifɛlɛ ɛmz̤ini nɡ̤asɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni likaɓawɔ nɔma nankɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ukim̤am makuwɛlɛ jɛna nɛnkɔsi jam umɛnz̤ɛlɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ watʰi ukim̤am wɔwɛla nd̤imɛnz̤ɛlɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ nɛntɔ jɔnkɛ ɔtʰɛ wajiɲula wajiɓɛka pʰɛz̤u nd̤ɔkwɛnz̤ɛla ɓawɛla kɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɛjɔrd̤an ɛwɛlilɛ wamanɡ̤a ub̤arz̤ilaji wamsikɛlɛla waz̤a waɓujɛla ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ wawɛla kɛ waja ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali wawɛla kɛ najɛ ukim̤am ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓakwajud̤a ɓamwɛz̤a kwanɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa saɓantu ɓakwasirajɛli nankɔ kusiz̤a ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli atʰi jini ukuɓa aɓaz̤alwana ɓɛtʰu amad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a ɓamɓɛ ɓamwɛz̤ɛ nɛnɮu jakʰɛ ɛjɔrd̤an ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ apʰɛnd̤ula ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a kumad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli atʰi kunɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛsalamana natʰi jini ukuɓa niv̤utʰɛ nɡ̤umsind̤ɔ nɡ̤alɛ nd̤awɔ sikʰɛ saɮa ntɔ sikʰɛ sapʰiwa ntɔ apʰɛnd̤ula amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli kumad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a atʰi sinɛz̤aɬulɔ ɛz̤iliʃumi tʰina nakud̤av̤id̤ɛ sinɔkunɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛnu jini ukuɓa nisikǀukukǀɛz̤ɛ iliz̤wi lɛtʰu lɔkumɓujisa wɛtʰu ɓɛlinɡ̤akǃalɛ kutʰi jini laɓa lukʰuni iliz̤wi lamad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a kunɛliz̤wi lamad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli kwatʰi ɡ̤akǁa kʰɔna ind̤ɔd̤a ɛlit͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔ ɛɡ̤ama linɡ̤uʃɛb̤a uɲana kab̤ik͡xi umb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin jav̤utʰɛla isiɡ̤ɔɮɔ jatʰi asinasaɓɛlɔ tʰina kud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuɲana kajɛsɛ jijani ɛlɔwɔ ɛz̤intɛntɛni z̤ɛnu masirajɛli ɛɲuka kɛ ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli ɛmka ɛkumland̤ɛlɛni ud̤av̤id̤ɛ aland̤ɛla uʃɛb̤a uɲana kab̤ik͡xi kɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a anamatʰɛla wawɔ ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛjɔrd̤an ɛsa ɛjɛrusalɛm wɛz̤a ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm waɓatʰaɓatʰa aɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɛ aɓaliʃumi aɓanɡ̤amaʃwɛʃwɛ aɓɛɓaʃijilɛ ukuɓa ɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ inɮu waɓaɓɛka ɛnɮwini jɔɡ̤ǀ̤inɔ waɓakǁʰasa akanɡ̤ɛna kuɓɔ ɓav̤alɛlwa kɛ jad̤a jaɓa jimini jɔkufa kwaɓɔ ɓɛɬɛli ɓɛnɡ̤aɓaɬɔlɔkaz̤i watʰi kuamasa nd̤iɬaɓɛlɛ umkʰɔsi kumad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a nɡ̤ɛmiɬa ɛmitʰatʰu uɓɛkʰɔ nawɛ apʰa uamasa waja kuwaɬaɓɛla umkʰɔsi amajud̤a waliɓala nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛkǁɛʃa aɓɛmisɛlwɛ lɔna watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuab̤iʃaji kunɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ uʃɛb̤a uɲana kab̤ik͡xi uja kusɛnz̤ɛla uɓuɓi nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔab̤isalɔm ɓatʰaɓatʰɛ wɛna aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛnkɔsi jakʰɔ umsukɛlɛ ɬɛz̤ɛ afumanɛ imiz̤i ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ asiz̤imɛlɛ apʰuma amland̤ɛla amad̤ɔd̤a kajɔwab̤i naɓaŋǀinitʰi nɛz̤iɡ̤id̤imi namaɡ̤ɔxa ɔnkɛ ɓapʰuma kɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm ɓaja kumsukɛla uʃɛb̤a uɲana kab̤ik͡xi uamasa wɛz̤a kuɓɔ ɓɛsɛtʲɛni ɛlikʰulu ɛlisɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn kɛ ujɔwab̤i uɓɛjib̤iŋǃilɛ inɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ jɔkulwa umɓiŋǃɔ wɛk͡xɛlɛ uŋǁitʲwɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwajɔ ɛsiŋǃɛni sakʰɛ lisɛsiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔɓɛni salɔ saŋǀɔtʰuka kɛ ik͡xɛlɛ watʰi ujɔwab̤i kuamasa usaɬɛli kakuɬɛ mz̤alwana ujɔwab̤i wamɓamɓa uamasa nɡ̤ɛɛnd̤ɛv̤u nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sɔkunɛnɛ ukuɓa amanɡ̤ɛ kɛ uamasa uɓɛnɡ̤alilumkɛlɛ ik͡xɛlɛ ɛliɓɛ lisɛsanɮɛni sikajɔwab̤i wam̤laɓa nɡ̤alɔ ɛsiswini wampʰalaz̤a iz̤iɓilini ɛm̤laɓɛni akapʰind̤a am̤laɓɛ ujɔwab̤i nɔab̤iʃaji umz̤alwana wakʰɛ ɓamsukɛla uʃɛb̤a uɲana kab̤ik͡xi kwɛma ɛɲɛ kumad̤ɔd̤ana akwajɔwab̤i nɡ̤akujɛ jatʰi uɓani ɔnɔnɛlɛlɛ ujɔwab̤i nɔnɡ̤akud̤av̤id̤ɛ makaland̤ɛlɛ ujɔwab̤i uamasa watʲikatʲikɛka ɛɡ̤az̤ini ɛmɛnd̤wɛni jaɓɔna ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ ukuɓa aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓatʰɛ ŋǃumama jamsusa uamasa ɛmɛnd̤wɛni jamʃɛŋǁisɛla ɛkǀalɛni japʰɔsa inɡ̤uɓɔ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa iɓiɓɔna ɓɛmana ukutʰi ŋǃumama ɓɔnkɛ aɓafika kujɛ akususwa kɛ ɛmɛnd̤wɛni ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a ɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa aland̤ɛla ujɔwab̤i asukɛla uʃɛb̤a uɲana kab̤ik͡xi wakǀand̤a ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwasirajɛli waja ɛab̤ɛlɛ nasɛb̤ɛtɛmahaka namad̤ɔd̤ana ɔnkɛ aɓiz̤ɛlwa nd̤awɔɲɛ ɛz̤a amland̤ɛla nawɔ ɓafika ɓamŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a ɛab̤ɛlɛb̤ɛtɛmahaka ɓawufumɓɛla ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lɔkuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a umz̤i lɔwɔ lwɛma pʰɛz̤u kɔmsɛlɛ wɔŋ̤ǃ̤amɛkɔ ɓajɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓaɓɛnɔjɔwab̤i ɓɛlukǃʰukǃʰa ukuz̤ɛ ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lɔmz̤i luwɛ kwamɛmɛz̤a intɔkaz̤i ɛlumkilɛjɔ ikulɔɔ mz̤i jatʰi jiv̤ani jiv̤ani kʰanitʰi kujɔwab̤i sɔnd̤ɛla apʰa nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ nawɛ wasɔnd̤ɛla kɛ kujɔ jatʰi lɔɔ ntɔkaz̤i unɡ̤ujɔwab̤i watʰi nd̤inɡ̤ujɛ jatʰi kujɛ pʰulapʰula amaz̤wi ɔmkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ watʰi nd̤ijɛv̤a jat͡ʃɔ jatʰi kwakufud̤ula kusitʰiwa ukuɓuz̤a makuɓuz̤wɛ ɛab̤ɛlɛ ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukujifɛz̤a intɔ nd̤inɡ̤ɔwaɓakǁɔlilɛjɔ aɓatʰɛmɓɛkilɛjɔ kwasirajɛli kɛ ukuɓulala umz̤i ɔnɡ̤unɔz̤ala kwasirajɛli jini ukuɓa uliɡ̤iɲɛ likajɛhɔv̤a wapʰɛnd̤ula ujɔwab̤i watʰi makuɓɛ lɛɛ makuɓɛ lɛɛ ukuɓa nd̤iɡ̤iɲɛ nɔkuɓa nd̤ɔnakalisɛ haji akund͡ʒ̤alɔ kusukɛ ind̤ɔd̤a jasɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwaɛfrajim ɛnɡ̤uʃɛb̤a nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama uɲana kab̤ik͡xi jasipʰakamisa isanɮa sajɔ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ kʰupʰani jɔna jɔd̤wa nd̤ɔmka kulɔ mz̤i jatʰi lɔɔ ntɔkaz̤i kujɔwab̤i jaɓɔna intlɔkɔ jajɔ ija kuɡ̤itʲisɛlwa kuwɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a jaja lɔɔ ntɔkaz̤i kuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔɓulumkɔ ɓajɔ ɓajiŋǃumla kɛ intlɔkɔ kaʃɛb̤a uɲana kab̤ik͡xi ɓajiɡ̤iɓisɛla kujɔwab̤i wav̤utʰɛla isiɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɓapʰanɡ̤alala ɓɛmka kulɔɔ mz̤i ɛlɔwɔ waja ɛntɛntɛni jakʰɛ ujɔwab̤i waɓujɛla ɛjɛrusalɛm kɛ kalɔku ujɔwab̤i wawupʰatʰa wɔnkɛ umkʰɔsi wakwasirajɛli ub̤ɛnaja uɲana kajɛhɔjad̤a wapʰatʰa aɓaŋǀinitʰi nɛz̤iɡ̤id̤imi uad̤ɔram wapʰatʰa aɓafakwa uv̤ikɔ ujɛhɔʃafati uɲana kaahilud̤i uɓɛnɡ̤umkʰumɓuz̤i wɛz̤intɔ z̤akɔmkʰulu uʃɛv̤a uɓɛnɡ̤umb̤ali ut͡sad̤ɔki nɔab̤ijatarɛ ɓajɛ ɓɛnɡ̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ uira wasɛjahirɛ uɓɛnɡ̤umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kud̤av̤id̤ɛ kɛ kwaɓakʰɔ inɮala nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kad̤av̤id̤ɛ imiɲaka jamitʰatʰu umɲaka nɡ̤ɔmɲaka ud̤av̤id̤ɛ uɓusɔ ɓukajɛhɔv̤a watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa kasawulɛ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnɮu jamaɡ̤az̤i akʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa waɓulala aɓasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn ukumkani waɓaɓiz̤a kɛ aɓasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn watʰi kuɓɔ kɛ kalɔku aɓasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaɓɛnɡ̤amakǃɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔ amaamɔri ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaɓɛwakǃinisisɛ nɡ̤ɛsifunɡ̤ɔ usawulɛ ukuwaɓulala nɡ̤ɔkuz̤ɔnd̤ɛlɛla kwakʰɛ amasirajɛli namajud̤a watʰi kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kwaɓasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn nd̤inɛnz̤ɛlɛ ntɔni nd̤ikǀamaɡ̤uʃɛ nɡ̤antɔni ukuz̤ɛ nilisikɛlɛlɛ likajɛhɔv̤a ɓatʰi aɓasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn kujɛ akunatʰi ukuɓiz̤a isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ kusawulɛ nakwinɮu jakʰɛ akunatʰi ukuɓulala kwasirajɛli watʰi kuɓɔ nitʰi kɛ mand̤inɛnz̤ɛlɛ ntɔni ɓatʰi ind̤ɔd̤a ɛjasiɡ̤ǃ̤iɓajɔ ɛjaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa kwɛlɔkuɓa sit͡ʃatʲalaliswɛ sinɡ̤ɛmi ɛmd̤ɛni wɔnkɛ wakwasirajɛli makunikɛlwɛ kutʰi isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ samad̤ɔd̤a kɔɔɲana ɓajɔ siwaɓɛtʰɛlɛlɛ ɛmiŋǃamlɛz̤wɛni kujɛhɔv̤a ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha kasawulɛ umɲulwa kajɛhɔv̤a watʰi nd̤ɔwanikɛla kɛ wamsind̤isa umɛfib̤ɔʃɛtɛ uɲana kajɔnatan uɲana kasawulɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛsifunɡ̤ɔ sikajɛhɔv̤a ɛsiɓɛ sipʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ pʰakatʰi kɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ nɔjɔnatan uɲana kasawulɛ ukumkani watʰaɓatʰa ɔɔɲana aɓaɓini ɓakarit͡spa intɔmɓi kaaja awajiz̤alɛla usawulɛ uarmɔni nɔmɛfib̤ɔʃɛtɛ nɔɔɲana aɓaɬanu ɓakamɛrib̤a intɔmɓi kasawulɛ awaɓaz̤alɛla uad̤rijɛli uɲana kab̤arz̤ilaji wasɛmɛhɔla waɓanikɛla ɛsɛnɮɛni saɓasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn aɓaɓɛtʰɛlɛla ɛmiŋǃamlɛz̤wɛni ɛntaɓɛni pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a kuɲɛ isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛsɔ ɓaɓulawa ɓɔna nɡ̤ɛɛmini z̤ɔkukǃala z̤ɔkuv̤una ɛkukǃalɛni kɔkuv̤unwa kwɛxasi urit͡spa intɔmɓi kaaja watʰaɓatʰa inɡ̤uɓɔ ɛxwɛkǁajɔ waz̤anɛkɛla ɛwɛni ɛsusɛla ɛkukǃalɛni kɔkuv̤una wɛz̤isa ɛkutʰululwɛni kwamanz̤i ɛz̤ulwini pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ akav̤uma ukuɓa z̤ɛz̤ulu z̤itʰi v̤u pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ɛmini namaxamŋǀwa asɛnɮɛ ɛɓusuku wakǁɛlɛlwa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ urit͡spa intɔmɓi kaaja iʃwɛʃwɛ likasawulɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ waja wawatʰaɓatʰa amatʰamɓɔ kasawulɛ namatʰamɓɔ kajɔnatan uɲana wakʰɛ kuɓɛmi ɓasɛjab̤ɛʃɛ jɛɡ̤ilijad̤i aɓaɓɛwaɓilɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jɛmɓutʰɔ jasɛb̤ɛtɛʃan apʰɔ amafilisti aɓɛɓakǁʰɔmɛ kʰɔna amafilisti amɓulalajɔ usawulɛ ɛɡ̤ilib̤ɔwa wawaɲusa kʰɔna amatʰamɓɔ kasawulɛ namatʰamɓɔ kajɔnatan uɲana wakʰɛ ɓawaɓutʰa namatʰamɓɔ aɓɔ ɓaɓɛɓɛtʰɛlɛlwɛ ɛmiŋǃamlɛz̤wɛni amatʰamɓɔ kasawulɛ nɔjɔnatan uɲana wakʰɛ ɓawaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla ɛz̤wɛni lakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɛt͡sɛla ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni likakiʃɛ ujisɛ ɓakwɛnz̤a kɔnkɛ aɓɛwisɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ wand̤ula watʰand̤az̤ɛka kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛliz̤wɛ kwaɓuja kwaɓakʰɔ kwamafilisti namasirajɛli wɛɬa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛnaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓalwa namafilisti watʰʲafa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi uiʃb̤ib̤ɛnɔb̤i ɔɓɛnɡ̤ɔwɔɔɲana ɓakarafa ɔɓunz̤ima ɓɛnt͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ jakʰɛ ɓɛɓunɡ̤amakʰulu ɔmatʰatʰu ɔb̤ɛd̤u uɓunz̤ima ɓajɔ ɛŋǁiɓɛ ik͡xɛlɛ ɛlit͡ʃa waɓa wɔmkǁaɓɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ uab̤iʃaji uɲana kat͡sɛruja wamŋǀɛd̤a wamkǁaɓɛla umfilisti lɔwɔ wamɓulala az̤a amad̤ɔd̤a kad̤av̤id̤ɛ amfunɡ̤ɛla ɛsitʰi uz̤ɛ unɡ̤aɓuji upʰumɛ natʰi ujɛ ɛkulwɛni ukǀimɛ isiɓanɛ samasirajɛli kwatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ kwaɓuja kwaɓakʰɔ namafilisti ɛɡ̤ɔb̤i ɔkɔ usib̤ɛkaji um̤uʃa wamkǁaɓɛlajɔ usafu ɔɓɛnɡ̤ɔwɔɔɲana ɓakarafa kwaɓuja kwaɓakʰɔ namafilisti ɛɡ̤ɔb̤i apʰɔ uɛlihanan uɲana kajaharɛɔrɛɡ̤im wasɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm wamkǁaɓɛlajɔ ulami umz̤alwana kaɡ̤ɔlijati wasɛɡ̤ati ɔlutʰi lwɛnt͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ jakʰɛ lwalunɡ̤anɡ̤ɔmtʰi waɓaluki kwaɓuja kwaɓakʰɔ ɛɡ̤ati kwakʰɔ nd̤ɔd̤a ijiŋ̤ǁ̤ilimɓɛla iɓinɛminwɛ ɛmitʰand̤atʰu sanɮɛni siɲɛ namaz̤wanɛ amatʰand̤atʰu luɲawɛni luɲɛ amaʃumi amaɓini anamanɛ nɡ̤ɛnani najɔ iɓiz̤alwa nɡ̤urafa jawaŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a amasirajɛli wajikǁaɓɛla ujɔnatan uɲana kaʃimɛha umkʰuluwa kad̤av̤id̤ɛ aɓɔ ɓɔɓanɛ ɓaz̤alwa nɡ̤urafa ɛɡ̤ati ɓawa nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikad̤av̤id̤ɛ nanɡ̤ɛsanɮa saɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ watʰɛtʰa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kujɛhɔv̤a amaz̤wi alɛ nɡ̤ɔma ujɛhɔv̤a wam̤lanɡ̤ulajɔ ɛsanɮɛni sɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ nasɛsanɮɛni sikasawulɛ watʰi jɛhɔv̤a ŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa jam mɓɔnisɛlɔ jam msiz̤i lɔ tʰikǁɔ ɔliliwa ɛnd̤iz̤imɛla nɡ̤alɔ nɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ jam lupʰɔnd̤ɔ lɔsind̤isɔ ŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɛ jam nd̤awɔ jɔkusaɓɛla msind̤isi und̤isind̤isa ɛkuɡ̤ɔɲamɛlwɛni nd̤iŋǃula ujɛhɔv̤a ɔnɡ̤ɔwɔkud̤uɲiswa nd̤ijasind̤iswa kɛ ɛz̤int͡ʃaɓɛni z̤am akund̤id͡ʒ̤ikɛla amaz̤a alwajɔ ɔkufa jakund̤id̤and̤atʰɛkisa imilamɓɔ jɔɓut͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔ z̤akund̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ɛla iz̤intʲa z̤ɛlaɓafilɛjɔ z̤akund̤ixintʲɛla iz̤ixintʲɛlɔ z̤ɔkufa ɛkuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛkɛni nd̤aŋǃula ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤amŋǃula utʰikǁɔ waliv̤a ɛtɛmpilɛni jakʰɛ iz̤wi ukuz̤iɓika ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤akʰɛ lahɛkǁa kɛ laɲikima iɬaɓatʰi iz̤isɛkɔ z̤ɛz̤ulu z̤aɡ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤a z̤ahɛkǁa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛnɔmsind̤ɔ kwatʰi tʰapʰu ɛmatʰatʰɛni akʰɛ waɮa umlilɔ upʰuma ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɛ av̤utʰa amalaɬɛ ɛpʰuma kuwɔ wawatʰɔɓa amaz̤ulu wɛɬa janɡ̤amafu amɲama pʰant͡si kwɛɛɲawɔ z̤akʰɛ wakʰwɛla ɛkɛrub̤ini wapʰapʰaz̤ɛla waɓɔnakala ɛsɛmapʰikwɛni ɔmɔja wamisa uɓumɲama nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kujɛ ɓajimiŋǃuɓa intlanɡ̤anisɛla jamanz̤i nɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤imɓa z̤amafu ɛkukǃakǃamɓɛni ɔkupʰamɓi kwakʰɛ kwav̤utʰa amalaɬɛ ɔmlilɔ wad̤ud̤umisa ɛmaz̤ulwini ujɛhɔv̤a ɔsɛjanɡ̤wɛni walikʰupʰa iz̤wi lakʰɛ watʰuma iintɔlɔ waɓapʰanɡ̤alalisa umɓanɛ waɓad̤uɓad̤uɓa kwaɓɔnakala imipʰant͡si jɔlwanɮɛ kwatʰʲilɛka iz̤isɛkɔ z̤ɛlimiwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkukʰalima kukajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkufutʰa kɔmɔja wɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ wɔlula isanɮa ɛpʰɛz̤ulu wand̤iɓamɓa wand̤ixɔla ɛmanz̤ini amaninz̤i wand̤iɬanɡ̤ula ɛlut͡ʃaɓɛni ɔlunamanɮa kwaɓand̤itʰijilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛɓɔmɛlɛlɛ ɓand̤ifikɛla nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkusind̤ɛka waɓa sisikǁʰasɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wand̤ikʰupʰɛla ɛnd̤awɛni ɛɓanz̤i wand̤iɬanɡ̤ula nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛnd̤inɔnɛlɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wand̤ipʰatʰa kakuɬɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓam wand̤iɓujisɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɬamɓululɛka kwɛz̤anɮa z̤am nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤az̤iɡ̤ǀ̤ina iinɮɛla z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a and̤ɛmka nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kutʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔnkɛ amasikɔ akʰɛ apʰamɓi nɛmimisɛlɔ jakʰɛ and̤itʲɛkanɡ̤a kujɔ nd̤and̤inɡ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ kujɛ nd̤az̤iŋǃand̤a ɛɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁɛni ɓam wand̤iɓujisɛla kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓam nɡ̤ɔkɔɓuɲulu ɓam pʰamɓi kwamɛɬɔ akʰɛ kɔwɛŋǀɛɓa uz̤ɛnz̤a ɔwɛŋǀɛɓa kwiɡ̤ɔxa ɛliɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ uz̤ɛnz̤a ɔɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ kɔz̤ɛnz̤ɛ ɲulu uz̤ɛnz̤a ɔɲulu kɔd͡ʒ̤iɓiliz̤ajɔ uz̤ɛnz̤a ɔnɔɓukǃʰɔkɔlɔ aɓantu aɓaz̤iint͡siz̤ana ujaɓasind̤isa amɛɬɔ akʰɔ ad͡ʒ̤ɔnɡ̤ɛnɛ naɓakǃwajinɡ̤ilɛjɔ uɓatʰɔɓɛ kuɓa usisiɓanɛ wɛna jɛhɔv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a ukʰaɲisɛla uɓumɲama ɓam kuɓa nɡ̤awɛ nd̤iɡ̤ila nɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ nd̤it͡siɓa iind̤ɔnɡ̤a utʰikǁɔ jɛnaiɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛ inɮɛla jakʰɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a liɲiɓilikisiwɛ ujinɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaz̤imɛla nɡ̤ajɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤utʰikǁɔ inɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ujɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤uɓani ɔliliwa inɡ̤ɛnɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ulɔtʰikǁɔ uliɡ̤wiɓa ɛlinamanɮa umalatʰisajɔ ɔɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ inɮɛla jakʰɛ uz̤ifanisajɔ iiɲawɔ z̤am nɛz̤amakǁʰamakaz̤i und̤imisajɔ ɛmimanɡ̤wɛni jam uz̤ifund̤isajɔ iz̤anɮa z̤am z̤iɡ̤ɔɓɛ isapʰɛtʰa sɔb̤ɛd̤u iinɡ̤alɔ z̤am und̤inikɛ inɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ jɔsind̤isɔ lwakʰɔ ukund̤ipʰulapʰula kwakʰɔ kwand̤ikʰulisa uwɛnz̤ɛlɛ ind̤awɔ ɛɓanz̤i amaɲatʰɛla pʰant͡si amakǁʰwɛlɛ akahɛkǁa nd̤ija kuz̤isukɛla iint͡ʃaɓa z̤am nd̤iz̤it͡ʃaɓalalisɛ nd̤inɡ̤aɓuji z̤id̤ɛ z̤ipʰɛlɛ nd̤ija kuz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa nd̤iz̤ipʰalusɛ z̤inɡ̤av̤uki z̤iwɛ pʰant͡si kwɛɛɲawɔ z̤am und̤ib̤iŋǃisɛ ukukʰalipʰɛla imfaz̤wɛ uɓaɡ̤ukǃisa pʰant͡si aɓasukɛla pʰɛz̤ulu iint͡ʃaɓa z̤am uz̤ɛnz̤ɛ z̤and̤inikɛla ikʰɔsi aɓand̤itʰijajɔ nd̤aɓab̤anɡ̤isa ɓajab̤ɛkab̤ɛka kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ msind̤isi kujɛhɔv̤a anɡ̤aɓapʰɛnd̤uli nd̤iɓakǀɔla nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔtʰuli lɔm̤laɓa nd̤iɓakǀumz̤a nd̤iɓakǁɔv̤ula nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔd̤aka lwɛnɮɛla nd̤iɓasasaz̤ɛ und̤isiz̤a ɛkuɓamɓanɛni kwaɓantu ɓam und̤iɡ̤ǀ̤ina nd̤iɓɛ jintlɔkɔ jɛɛntlanɡ̤a aɓantu ɛɓɛnd̤iɡ̤aɓaz̤i ɓaja nd̤ikʰɔnz̤a ɔɔɲana ɓɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a ɓaja kund̤ilulamɛla ɓɛhanahanisa ɓand̤itʰɔɓɛlɛ ɓɛsav̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛɓɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɔluɲɛ uɬunɡ̤a ɓajant͡ʃwɛɲa ɓapʰuma ɓɛnɔv̤alɔ ɛkuv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ɛlwɛni kwaɓɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uɬɛli lɛlɔkuɓɔnɡ̤wa apʰakaɲiswɛ utʰikǁɔ lɔsind̤isɔ ulɔtʰikǁɔ und̤ipʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlajɔ uz̤iɬisɛlajɔ pʰant͡si iz̤iz̤wɛ und̤ikʰupʰajɔ ɛz̤int͡ʃaɓɛni z̤am und̤ipʰakamisajɔ kwaɓasukɛla pʰɛz̤ulu und̤iɬanɡ̤ulajɔ kumfɔ ɔɡ̤ɔɲamɛlajɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nd̤ija kuɓulɛla kuwɛ jɛhɔv̤a pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a nd̤iv̤umɛ kwiɡ̤ama lakʰɔ ulɔkʰulisa usind̤isɔ lɔkumkani wakʰɛ ɔwɛnz̤ajɔ iŋǀɛɓa kumtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa wakʰɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ nakwimɓɛwu jakʰɛ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni nɡ̤awɔ kɛ amaz̤wi ɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ut͡ʃɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ uɲana kajɛsɛ it͡ʃɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛjapʰakaɲisɛlwa pʰɛz̤ulu umtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa wɔtʰikǁɔ kajakɔɓi ɔmihɔɓɛ imnand̤i kwasirajɛli ukutʰi umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a utʰɛtʰa nɡ̤am ukukʰuluma kwakʰɛ kusɛlulwimini utʰi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli uliwa lakwasirajɛli utʰɛtʰa utʰi kuja kuv̤ɛla wɔluntu ɔlilunɡ̤isa ɛlawula nɡ̤ɔkɔjika utʰikǁɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkukʰaɲa kwɛnt͡sasa lakupʰuma ilanɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnt͡sasa ɛnɡ̤ɛnamafu lakusa iɓisina lwakupʰuma uɬaz̤a ɛnɮɛ kuɓa ajind͡ʒ̤alɔ jini inɮu jam kutʰikǁɔ kuɓa und̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ walunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤ɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ waɡ̤ǀ̤inwa kuɓa ukusind̤iswa kɔnkɛ nɔkuŋǃwɛna kɔnkɛ akaji kukuɬumisa jini kɛ amat͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔ ɔnkɛ ɛpʰɛla and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmitʰana ɛnamɛv̤a ɛkǀukulwajɔ kuɓa inɡ̤ɛnakutʰatʲatʰwa nɡ̤ɛsanɮa umntu ukujipʰatʰa uz̤alisa isanɮa nɡ̤ɛnt͡simɓi nɔlutʰi lwɛnt͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ it͡ʃiswɛ it͡ʃɛ nɡ̤umlilɔ kwalapʰɔ ikʰɔna nɡ̤awɔ amaɡ̤ama amaɡ̤ɔxa kad̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ujɔʃɛb̤ɛb̤aʃɛb̤ɛtɛ wasɛtakɛmɔn ɔɓɛjintlɔkɔ jaɓapʰatʰimikʰɔsi jɛna watʲitʲimɓisa int͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ jakʰɛ pʰɛz̤u kwamakʰulu asib̤ɔz̤ɔ awaɬatʲwa nɡ̤ɛsiɬanɮɔ ɛsiɲɛ nɡ̤anɛnɔ kwakʰɛ nɡ̤uɛlaz̤arɛ uɲana kad̤ɔd̤aji uɲana wɔmahɔwa ɔɓɛlɛliɲɛ kumaɡ̤ɔxa lawɔ matʰatʰu aɓɛnɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛkuwaŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɛni kwawɔ amafilisti aɓɛɓutʰɛlɛnɛ kʰɔna ɛmfaz̤wɛni akuɓɔn ukuɓa aɲukilɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwasirajɛli jɛna wɛsuka wawaɓulala amafilisti sad̤a sad̤inwa isanɮa sakʰɛ sɔmɛla ɛk͡xɛlɛni isanɮa sakʰɛ wɛnz̤a kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a usind̤isɔ ɔlukʰulu nɡ̤alɔɔ ɓaɓuja aɓantu ɓamland̤ɛla ɓanɛla ukutʰimɓa kupʰɛla nɡ̤anɛnɔ kwakʰɛ nɡ̤uʃama uɲana kaaɡ̤ɛ um̤arari amafilisti ajɛɬanɡ̤anisɛnɛ asisikǃʰu kwajɛ kukʰɔ apʰɔ isikǃwɛnɡ̤a sɔm̤laɓa siz̤ɛlɛ z̤iintlumaja ɓasaɓa aɓantu ɛɓuswɛni ɓamafilisti wɛsuka jɛna wɛma ɛsaz̤ulwini sɛsikǃwɛnɡ̤a ɛsɔ wasiɬutʰa wawaɓulala amafilisti ujɛhɔv̤a wɛnz̤a kɛ usind̤isɔ ɔlukʰulu kwɛɬa isitʰatʰu saɓaz̤iintlɔkɔ ɛmaʃumini amatʰatʰu aɓapʰatʰimikʰɔsi ɓɛz̤a kud̤av̤id̤ɛ kǁa kuv̤unwajɔ ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni wasɛad̤ulam sajɛ isikǃʰu samafilisti simisɛ iintɛntɛ ɛntilini jamarafa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɔkɔ uɓɛsɛmɓɔnisɛlwɛni jamafilisti ɔkɔ iɓisɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm waŋǃwɛna ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi akwaɓa ɓɛtʰu ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤asɛz̤wa amanz̤i ɛkǃula lasɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm ɛlisɛsanɡ̤wɛni atʰʲud̤isa lɔɔ maɡ̤ɔxa matʰatʰu ɛmpini jamafilisti akʰa amanz̤i ɛkǃulɛni lasɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm ɛlisɛsanɡ̤wɛni awatʰwala awaz̤isa kud̤av̤id̤ɛ akav̤uma ukuwasɛla wawatʰululɛla pʰant͡si pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a watʰi makuɓɛ lɛɛ jɛhɔv̤a ukwɛnz̤a ɔkɔ asiliɡ̤az̤i ɛli lamad̤ɔd̤a ahamɓɛ ɛŋǀamɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ jawɔ akav̤uma kɛ ukuwasɛla ɛnz̤a ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ amaɡ̤ɔxa lawɔ matʰatʰu kɛ uab̤iʃaji kajɔwab̤i uɲana kat͡sɛruja jɛna uɓɛ ɛjintlɔkɔ jaɓapʰatʰimikʰɔsi watʰi xutʰu int͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ jakʰɛ pʰɛz̤u kwamakʰulu amatʰatʰu aɓaɬatʲwajɔ wajɛnɛɡ̤ama kɛ kwaɓɔ ɓatʰatʰu wajɛz̤ukilɛ ɔkunɛnɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwamaʃumi amatʰatʰu lawɔ waɓa nɡ̤umtʰɛtʰɛli wawɔ kɔd̤wa akafikanɡ̤a kwaɓaja ɓatʰatʰu kɛ ub̤ɛnaja uɲana kajɛhɔjad̤a uɲana wɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛnɔɓuk͡xɔti ɔz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ininz̤i wasɛkab̤ɛt͡sɛli jɛna waɓulala iinɡ̤waɲalala ɛz̤imɓini z̤akwamɔwab̤i jɛna wɛɬa waɓulala inɡ̤ɔɲama ɛkǃulɛni pʰakatʰi nɡ̤ɛkʰɛpʰu jɛna waɓulala ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤umjiputa ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɛwɔnɡ̤a umjiputa lɔwɔ wajɛpʰɛtʰɛ int͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ wɛɬa waja kujɛ ɛnɛntɔnɡ̤a wajiɬutʰa int͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɔmjiputa lɔwɔ wamɓulala nɡ̤ɛnt͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ jakʰɛ wɛnz̤a ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ ub̤ɛnaja uɲana kajɛhɔjad̤a waɓa nɛɡ̤ama kɛ kumaɡ̤ɔxa lawɔ matʰatʰu uɓɛz̤ukilɛ kunamaʃumi amatʰatʰu lawɔ kɔd̤wa akafikanɡ̤a kwaɓaja ɓatʰatʰu ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛpʰakatʰini lakʰɛ uasahɛli kajɔwab̤i ɛɓɛnɡ̤ɔmɲɛ kumaʃumi amatʰatʰu lawɔ nɡ̤uɛlihanan uɲana kad̤ɔd̤aji wasɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm nɡ̤uʃama wasɛharɔd̤i nɡ̤uɛlika wasɛharɔd̤i nɡ̤uhɛlɛt͡sɛ wasɛpɛlɛti nɡ̤uira uɲana kaikɛʃɛ wasɛtɛkɔwa nɡ̤uab̤ijɛz̤ɛrɛ wasɛanatɔti nɡ̤umɛb̤unaji um̤uʃa nɡ̤ut͡salimɔn umahɔwa nɡ̤umaharaji wasɛnɛtɔfa nɡ̤uhɛlɛb̤ɛ uɲana kab̤ahana wasɛnɛtɔfa nɡ̤uitaji uɲana karib̤aji wasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha jɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤ub̤ɛnaja wasɛpiratɔn nɡ̤uhid̤aji wasɛz̤iɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni z̤asɛɡ̤ahaʃɛ nɡ̤uab̤ihalɛb̤ɔn wasɛarab̤a nɡ̤uaz̤ɛmav̤ɛtɛ wasɛb̤ahurim nɡ̤uɛlijab̤a wasɛʃahalɛb̤ɔn nɡ̤ub̤ɛnɛjaʃɛn nɡ̤ujɔnatan nɡ̤uʃama um̤arari nɡ̤uahijam uɲana kaʃararɛ umarari nɡ̤uɛlifɛlɛtɛ uɲana kaahasɛb̤aji uɲana wɔwasɛmahaka nɡ̤uɛlijam uɲana kaahitɔfɛlɛ wasɛɡ̤ilɔ nɡ̤uhɛt͡sɛrɔ wasɛkarmɛlɛ nɡ̤upaharaji wasɛarb̤i nɡ̤uiɡ̤ali uɲana kanatan wasɛt͡sɔb̤a nɡ̤ub̤ani wakwaɡ̤ad̤i nɡ̤ut͡sɛlɛkɛ umamɔn nɡ̤unaharaji wasɛb̤ɛrɔti umpʰatʰi wɛɛntɔnɡ̤a z̤ikajɔwab̤i uɲana kat͡sɛruja nɡ̤uira umitri nɡ̤uɡ̤arɛb̤ɛ umitri nɡ̤uurija um̤ɛti ɓɛɓɔnkɛ ɓanɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kɛ kalɔku waɓuja wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a kumasirajɛli wamkǁʰɔkɔŋǁɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuwɔ ɛsitʰi jija uwaɓalɛ amasirajɛli namajud̤a watʰi kɛ kujɔwab̤i umtʰɛtʰɛlimpi ɔɓɛnajɛ kʰawutʰʲutʰʲɛ ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwasirajɛli utʰaɓatʰɛla kwad̤an usɛ ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a niɓaɓalɛ aɓantu nd̤ilaz̤i laɓantu watʰi ujɔwab̤i makɔnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛ kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ ɛɓantwini iz̤iɬanɮɔ ɛz̤ilikʰulu ɓɛnɡ̤anɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓanɡ̤akɔ aɓɔnɛ namɛɬɔ ɛnkɔsi jam kɛ jini ukuɓa inkɔsi jam ijifunɛ lɛ ntɔ lakǃina iliz̤wi lɔkumkani kujɔwab̤i nakuɓatʰɛtʰɛlimpi wapʰuma kɛ ujɔwab̤i naɓatʰɛtʰɛlimpi pʰamɓi kɔkumkani ɓaja kuɓaɓala aɓantu ɓakwasirajɛli ɓawɛla ɛjɔrd̤an ɓamisa ɛarɔhɛrɛ nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ kɔmz̤i ɔpʰakatʰi kwɛsiɬamɓɔ sakwaɡ̤ad̤i nasɛjaz̤ɛrɛ ɓaja ɛɡ̤ilijad̤i nasɛz̤wɛni lasɛtatim̤ɔd̤ɛʃɛ ɓaja nakwad̤aɲahan ɓad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ɛla kɔwakwat͡sid̤ɔn ɓaja nasɛŋǃaɓɛni jasɛtirɛ nasɛmiz̤ini jɔnkɛ jamahiv̤i nɛjamakanan ɓaja ɓapʰuma kwɛlisɛz̤ant͡si lakwajud̤a ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a ɓalitʰʲutʰʲa kɛ lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ ɓɛz̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛɛɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤isitʰɔɓa ɛz̤inɛɛnt͡suku ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini ujɔwab̤i kɛ lɔkuɓalwa kwaɓantu az̤a amasirajɛli aɓa nɡ̤amakʰulu asib̤ɔz̤ɔ amad̤ɔd̤a anɔɓuk͡xɔti axɔla ik͡xɛlɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a aɓa nɡ̤amakʰulu amaɬanu amad̤ɔd̤a jakʰatʰaz̤ɛka intliz̤ijɔ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa ɛɓaɓalilɛ aɓantu watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ɔnilɛ kunɛnɛ nɡ̤alɛ ntɔ nd̤ijɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kalɔku kʰawuɓukʰwɛlɛlisɛ jɛhɔv̤a uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ ɔɓukʰulu wav̤uka ud̤av̤id̤ɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kuɡ̤ad̤i umprɔfɛti imɓɔni kad̤av̤id̤ɛ lisitʰi jija utʰɛtʰɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ utʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤ikumisɛla iz̤intɔ ɛz̤intatʰu z̤iɲulɛlɛ iɓɛ ɲɛ kuz̤ɔ nd̤ijɛnz̤ɛ kuwɛ waja kɛ uɡ̤ad̤i kud̤av̤id̤ɛ wamkǁɛlɛla watʰi kujɛ uz̤ɛlwɛ sisikǁʰɛŋǁɛ sɛmiɲaka jɛnɮala ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɔ usaɓɛ pʰamɓi kwɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ iiɲanɡ̤a z̤iɓɛ ntatʰu z̤ikusukɛla kuɓɛkʰɔ indʲikitʲa jɔkufa ɛz̤intatʰu ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɔ jaz̤i nɡ̤ɔku ulɛnz̤ɛ iliz̤wi ɛnd̤ɔmɓujisɛla lɔna ɔnd̤itʰumilɛjɔ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kuɡ̤ad̤i nd̤id̤id̤ɛkilɛ kunɛnɛ masɛsisiwa ɛsanɮɛni sikajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ininz̤i imfɛsanɛ jakʰɛ mand̤inɡ̤awɛli ɛsanɮɛni sɔmntu ujɛhɔv̤a watʰɔɓa kɛ indʲikitʲa jɔkufa kwasirajɛli jatʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkusɛni jɛsa kwikǁa lɛntlanɡ̤anisɔ ɛɓantwini ɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kwad̤an ɓɛsɛ ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ amad̤ɔd̤a saz̤a isitʰuɲwa sɛsa isanɮa sasɔ kwijɛrusalɛm ukuɓa sijit͡ʃaɓalalisɛ waz̤ɔɬwaja ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi ɔɓɔ watʰi kwisitʰuɲwa ɛsɔ sit͡ʃaɓalalisa aɓantu kwanɛlɛ sitʰɔɓɛ kalɔku isanɮa sakʰɔ kɛ kalɔku isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a ɓɛsisɛsand̤ɛni sikaarav̤ɛna umjɛb̤usi watʰɛtʰa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ kujɛhɔv̤a akusiɓɔna isitʰuɲwa ɛsɔ siɓɛtʰa ɛɓantwini watʰi ujaɓɔna nd̤ɔnilɛ nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa um̤lamɓi lɔ wɔna wɛnz̤ɛ ntɔni isanɮa sakʰɔ masiɓɛ pʰɛz̤u nɛnɮu kaɓawɔ waja kɛ uɡ̤ad̤i kud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ watʰi kujɛ ɲuka ujɛ ummisɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛsand̤ɛni sikaarav̤ɛna umjɛb̤usi wɛɲuka ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likaɡ̤ad̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a aɓɛmwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ walunɡ̤uz̤a uarav̤ɛna wamɓɔna naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓɛsiz̤a kujɛ wapʰuma uarav̤ɛna wakǃuɓud̤a nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni watʰi uarav̤ɛna iz̤ɛlani inkɔsi jam kumkʰɔnz̤i wajɔ watʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nd̤iz̤a kutʰɛnɡ̤a isand̤a kuwɛ ukuɓa nd̤akʰɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sitʰintɛlwɛ isiɓɛtʰɔ ɛɓantwini watʰi uarav̤ɛna kud̤av̤id̤ɛ majitʰaɓatʰɛ inkɔsi jam iɲusɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni ajɔ nanz̤i iinkɔmɔ z̤ɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɔkub̤ula nɛɛdʲɔkʰwɛ z̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤ɔkuɓa z̤iinkuni z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤i z̤intɔ uarav̤ɛna uz̤inika watʰi uarav̤ɛna ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ makakʰɔliswɛ nɡ̤uwɛ watʰi kuarav̤ɛna haji nd̤ija kusitʰɛnɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛkǁaɓisɔ kuwɛ and̤iji kuɲusa nd̤isɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ amad̤ini aɲukajɔ ɛnd̤iwaz̤uz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛliz̤ɛ wasitʰɛnɡ̤a kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ isand̤a nɛɛnkɔmɔ ɛz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛɛʃɛkɛlɛ z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɬanu wakʰɛla apʰɔ kɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ kujɛhɔv̤a waɲusa amad̤ini aɲukajɔ nɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔkǁɔlɔ watʰand̤az̤ɛka kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛliz̤wɛ satʰintɛlwa isiɓɛtʰɔ kumasirajɛli kɛ kalɔku ud̤av̤id̤ɛ uɓɛsɛlɛjind̤ɔd̤a ɛnkulu ɛhamɓisɛkilɛ ɛɓud̤alɛni ɓamɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ akaɓa nakufud̤umala nɔkɔ ɓatʰi aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ kujɛ inkɔsi jɛtʰu majifunɛlwɛ inkakaz̤ana ɛsɛjintɔmɓi imɛ pʰamɓi kɔkumkani imɔnɡ̤ɛ ilalɛ ɛsifuɓɛni sakʰɛ ifud̤umalɛ inkɔsi jɛtʰu ɓafuna kɛ intɔmɓi ɛjinz̤wakaz̤i ɛmid̤ɛni jɔnkɛ jakwasirajɛli ɓafumana uab̤iʃaɡ̤i wasɛʃunɛm ɓamz̤isa inkakaz̤ana lɛjɔ jajijinz̤wakaz̤i ɛŋǀamisilɛjɔ jamɔnɡ̤a jamlunɡ̤isɛlɛla akajaz̤i waz̤a uad̤ɔnija uɲana kahaɡ̤iti waz̤ipʰakamisa watʰi nd̤ija kuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani waz̤ɛnz̤ɛla iiŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa naɓamahaʃɛ namad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmaɬanu ɔkut͡ʃajɛlɛla pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ ujisɛ ɛɓɛnɡ̤amɛnz̤anɡ̤a ɓuɬunɡ̤u nɛmini ɛɲɛ nɡ̤ɔkutʰi jini ukuɓa wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ uɓɛnɡ̤umfɔ ɔsikǃu siɬɛ wamz̤ala ɛmv̤a kɔab̤isalɔm wakǀɛɓisana nɔjɔwab̤i uɲana kat͡sɛruja nɔab̤ijatarɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓaŋǀɛd̤isa ɓaland̤ɛla uad̤ɔnija kɛ ɓɔna ɔɔt͡sad̤ɔki umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɔb̤ɛnaja uɲana kajɛhɔjad̤a nɔnatan umprɔfɛti nɔʃimɛhi nɔrɛhi namaɡ̤ɔxa aɓɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ aɓaɓanɡ̤a nɡ̤akuad̤ɔnija uad̤ɔnija waɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ ɛz̤itʲɛtʲisiwɛjɔ nɡ̤asɛtʲɛni lasɛz̤ɔhɛlɛtɛ ɛlisɛkǀalɛni lɛɛnrɔɡ̤ɛlɛ wamɛma ɓɔnkɛ aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɔkumkani namad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ akwajud̤a aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɔkumkani kɛ ɓɔna ɔɔnatan umprɔfɛti nɔb̤ɛnaja namaɡ̤ɔxa nɔsɔlɔmɔn umkʰuluwa wakʰɛ akaɓamɛma watʰɛtʰa unatan kub̤at͡ʃɛb̤a kasɔlɔmɔn watʰi akuv̤anɡ̤a ukuɓa uad̤ɔnija uɲana kahaɡ̤iti unɡ̤ukumkani inkɔsi jɛtʰu ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ajijaz̤i lɔɔ ntɔ jiz̤a kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤ikupʰɛ ikǃʰinɡ̤a usiz̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ nɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wɔɲana wakʰɔ usɔlɔmɔn hamɓa ujɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ utʰi kujɛ wawunɡ̤amfunɡ̤ɛlanɡ̤a umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ wɛna nkɔsi jam watʰi usɔlɔmɔn uɲana wakʰɔ uja kuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛmv̤ɛni kuɬalɛ jɛna ɛtrɔnɛni jam kunɡ̤ani kɛ ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani uad̤ɔnija ujaɓɔna nd̤ɔtʰi usatʰɛtʰa apʰɔ nɔkumkani nd̤inɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɔ nd̤iwaz̤alisɛ amaz̤wi akʰɔ waja kɛ ub̤at͡ʃɛb̤a ɛɡ̤umɓini kɛ uɓɛsɛlɛjind̤ɔd̤a ɛnkulu kunɛnɛ uab̤iʃaɡ̤i wasɛʃunɛm uɓɛlunɡ̤isɛlɛla watʰɔɓa ub̤at͡ʃɛb̤a wakǃuɓud̤a watʰi unɡ̤a ntɔni watʰi jɛna kujɛ nkɔsi jam wɛna wamfunɡ̤ɛla ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ watʰi usɔlɔmɔn uɲana wakʰɔ uja kuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛmv̤ɛni kuɬalɛ jɛna ɛtrɔnɛni jam kalɔku inɡ̤uad̤ɔnija akwaz̤i wɛna nkɔsi jam uɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ iinkɔmɔ nɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤itʲɛtʲisiwɛjɔ nɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ janinz̤i wamɛma ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɔkumkani nɔab̤ijatarɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɔjɔwab̤i umtʰɛtʰɛlimkʰɔsi akammɛma kɛ jɛna usɔlɔmɔn umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ wɛna nkɔsi jam amɛɬɔ amasirajɛli ɔnkɛ akuwɛ ukuɓa uwakǁɛlɛlɛ ukuɓa kuɬalɛ ɓani ɛtrɔnɛni jɛnkɔsi jam ɛmv̤ɛni kwajɔ kɔtʰi kǁa itʰɛ jalala kɔɔjisɛ inkɔsi jam siɓɛ nɡ̤aɓɔni tʰina nɔsɔlɔmɔn uɲana utʰɛ ɛsatʰɛtʰa nɔkumkani nankɔ unatan umprɔfɛti wakǁɛlɛlwa kwatʰiwa nanku unatan umprɔfɛti wafika kɛ pʰamɓi kɔkumkani wakǃuɓud̤a nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni watʰi unatan nkɔsi jam ut͡ʃilɔ wɛna ukutʰi uad̤ɔnija uja kuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛmv̤ɛni kuɬalɛ jɛna ɛtrɔnɛni jam nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɬilɛ nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ waɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla iinkɔmɔ nɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤itʲɛtʲisiwɛjɔ nɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ janinz̤i wamɛma ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɔkumkani naɓatʰɛtʰɛlimkʰɔsi nɔab̤ijatarɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓɔ kɛ ɓɛsiɮa ɓɛsɛla pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ ɓɛsitʰi makaɮɛ uɓɔmi uad̤ɔnija kɛ akand̤imɛmanɡ̤a mkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ nɔt͡sad̤ɔki umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɔb̤ɛɲana uɲana kajɛhɔjad̤a nɔsɔlɔmɔn umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ inɡ̤aɓa iv̤ɛla kwinkɔsi jam lɛ ntɔ waz̤a akwaɓaz̤isa aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ɔja kuɬala ɛtrɔnɛni jɛnkɔsi jam ɛmv̤ɛni kwajɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula ud̤av̤id̤ɛ watʰi ɓiz̤ani ub̤at͡ʃɛb̤a ɛz̤ɛ wɛz̤a kɛ pʰamɓi kɔkumkani wɛma pʰamɓi kɔkumkani wafunɡ̤a watʰi ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔwawukʰululajɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ ɛkuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛkɛni kɔnkɛ inɛnɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤akufunɡ̤ɛla ujɛhɔv̤a
