amatʰatʰu anamɲɛ kaasa wakwajud̤a uɔmri waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani wamasirajɛli imiɲaka jaɓa liʃumi ɛlinamiɓini waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛtirt͡sa imiɲaka ɛmitʰand̤atʰu waz̤a watʰɛnɡ̤a intaɓa jakwasamari kusamari nɡ̤ɛɛtalɛntɛ ɛz̤imɓini z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ wakʰa kulɔɔ ntaɓa watʰi iɡ̤ama lalɔɔ mz̤i wawakʰajɔ jisamari nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama likasamari umninintaɓa uɔmri wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛnɡ̤apʰamɓi kwakʰɛ wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɔnkɛ kajarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kanɛb̤ati nanɡ̤ɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤akʰɛ awawɔnisa nɡ̤az̤ɔ amasirajɛli ukumkǃumɓisa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛz̤intɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛntɔ ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikaɔmri awaz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ nɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓakʰɛ awaɓɛnz̤ajɔ az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli uɔmri kɔɔjisɛ waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa kwasamari uahab̤i uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ uahab̤i uɲana kaɔmri waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kumasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ kaasa wakwajud̤a uahab̤i uɲana kaɔmri waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛmaʃumi maɓini anamiɓini ɛnɡ̤ukumkani kumasirajɛli kwasamari uahab̤i uɲana kaɔmri wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛnɡ̤apʰamɓi kwakʰɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤atʰi kujɛ ukuhamɓa nɡ̤ɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤ikajarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kanɛb̤ati wɛsuka waz̤ɛka uiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ intɔmɓi kaɛtɛb̤ahali wamat͡sid̤ɔn wanɡ̤umkakʰɛ waja wakʰɔnz̤a ub̤ahali wamŋǃula wammisɛla ub̤ahali isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛnɮwini kab̤ahali aɓɛmakʰɛlɛ jɔna kwasamari uahab̤i wɛnz̤a uaʃɛra uahab̤i wakǃɔkɛla ukumkǃumɓisa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakwasirajɛli nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli aɓaɓɛnɡ̤apʰamɓi kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛɛmini z̤akʰɛ wajakʰa uhijɛli wasɛb̤ɛtɛli ijɛrikɔ wajisɛka nɡ̤ɔab̤iram amaz̤iɓulɔ akʰɛ amasanɡ̤ɔ ajɔ nɡ̤ɔsɛɡ̤ub̤i ɔwamatʰumɓu akʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a awalitʰɛtʰajɔ nɡ̤ɔjɔʃuwa uɲana kanun watʰi uɛlija wasɛtiʃb̤i wasɛz̤ind̤wɛnd̤wɛni z̤asɛɡ̤ilijad̤i kuahab̤i ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakwasirajɛli ɛnd̤imi pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ akuji kukʰa kuɓɛkʰɔ mɓɛtʰɛ namv̤ula lɛ miɲaka kunɡ̤ɛnɡ̤alɔ iliz̤wi lafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɛ lisitʰi hamɓa umkɛ apʰa ub̤ɛkɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a uz̤imɛlɛ ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni ɔjikɛriti ɔkʰanɡ̤ɛlɛnɛ nɛjɔrd̤an wɔtʰi usɛlɛ ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni apʰɔ nd̤iwawisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ amaɬunɡ̤ulu ukuɓa akukǁʰasɛ kʰɔna wahamɓa kɛ wɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a waja waɬala ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni ɔjikɛriti ɔkʰanɡ̤ɛlɛnɛ nɛjɔrd̤an amaɬunɡ̤ulu amz̤isɛla isɔnka nɛɲama isɔnka nɛɲama nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa wasɛla ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni apʰɔ kutʰɛ kwakuhamɓa ikǁɛʃa wat͡ʃa umland͡ʒ̤ana nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛkunɡ̤aɓanɡ̤akʰɔ mv̤ula ɛz̤wɛni lafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɛ lisitʰi suka ujɛ ɛt͡sarfati jasɛt͡sid̤ɔn uɬalɛ kʰɔna ujaɓɔna nd̤imwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ kʰɔna umfaz̤i ɔnɡ̤um̤lɔlɔkaz̤i ukuɓa akukǁʰasɛ wɛsuka kɛ waja ɛt͡sarfati ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔmz̤i nankɔ kukʰɔ apʰɔ umfaz̤i ɔnɡ̤um̤lɔlɔkaz̤i ɛkǀʰɔla wamɓiz̤a watʰi kʰawund̤ikʰɛlɛlɛ jamanz̤i nɡ̤ɛsitʲa nd̤isɛlɛ waja kuwakʰa wamɓiz̤a watʰi kʰawund̤ipʰatʰɛlɛ nɛkǃʰɛkɛz̤a lɛsɔnka nɡ̤ɛsanɮa watʰi ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ and̤inasɔnka nɡ̤umɡ̤uɓɔ ɔnɡ̤az̤alisa isanɮa ɛmpʰand̤ɛni nɛntwana jɛɔli ɛsɛlwɛni ujaɓɔna kɛ nd̤ikǀʰɔla ɛz̤imɓini ukuɓa nd̤ijɛ nd̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ nɔɲana siɮɛ sifɛ watʰi uɛlija kujɛ musa ukɔjika jija wɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi lakʰɔ kɔd̤wa kɛ nd̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ isɔnkana nɡ̤awɔ ukukǃala und̤iz̤isɛlɛ uz̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ kɛ wɛna nɔɲana wakʰɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakwasirajɛli ukutʰi umpʰand̤a wɔmɡ̤uɓɔ awuji kupʰɛla nɛsɛlwa lɛɔli aliji kumiɲɛlɛlwa id̤ɛ ifikɛ aja kujinisa nɡ̤ajɔ imv̤ula ujɛhɔv̤a pʰɛz̤u kɔm̤laɓa waja kɛ wɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likaɛlija waɮa jɛna najɛ nɛnɮu jakʰɛ z̤az̤iint͡suku umpʰand̤a wɔmɡ̤uɓɔ awupʰɛlanɡ̤a isɛlwa lɛɔli alamiɲɛlɛlwa nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a awalitʰɛtʰajɔ nɡ̤ɔɛlija kwatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kwɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ waɬiwa sisifɔ uɲana walɔɔ mfaz̤i unɡ̤umnikaz̤inɮu satʰi isifɔ sakʰɛ saɓa nz̤ima kakʰulu kwad̤a akwaɓakʰɔ kupʰɛfumla kujɛ watʰi kuɛlija jintɔni ɛnam nawɛ mfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ uz̤ɛ ukuɓa und̤ikʰumɓuz̤ɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓam umɓulalɛ uɲana watʰi kujɛ nd̤inikɛ uɲana wakʰɔ wamtʰaɓatʰa kɛ ɛsifuɓɛni sakʰɛ wɛɲuka najɛ waja ɛɡ̤umɓini ɛlipʰɛz̤ulu aɓɛɬala kulɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlɔ sakʰɛ waŋǃula ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ umɛnz̤ɛlɛ uɓuɓi nɔm̤lɔlɔkaz̤i lɔ nd̤ipʰamɓukɛlɛ kujɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓulala uɲana wakʰɛ waz̤ɔlula pʰɛz̤u kɔmntwana iz̤iɬanɮɔ z̤az̤itʰatʰu waŋǃula ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ mawukʰɛ uɓujɛlɛ pʰakatʰi kwakʰɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ walɔ waliv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a iliz̤wi likaɛlija waɓujɛla pʰakatʰi kwakʰɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ walɔɔ wapʰila wamtʰaɓatʰa uɛlija wɛɬa najɛ ɛɡ̤umɓini ɛlipʰɛz̤ulu waja ɛnɮwini watʰi uɛlija ujaɓɔna upʰililɛ uɲana wakʰɔ watʰi lɔɔ mfaz̤i kuɛlija kalɔku kɛ nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa unɡ̤umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ wɛna nɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɛlisɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɔ lijiɲanisɔ kwatʰi kwakuɓa mz̤uz̤u iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kuɛlija nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsitʰatʰu latʰi hamɓa ujɛ kuɓɔnana nɔahab̤i nd̤inisɛ imv̤ula pʰɛz̤u kɔm̤laɓa wahamɓa waja kuɓɔnana uɛlija nɔahab̤i inɮala kɛ jajinz̤ima kwasamari uahab̤i wajɛɓiz̤ɛ uɔb̤ad̤ija ɔɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ inɮu jakʰɛ uɔb̤ad̤ija kɛ wajɛmɔjika ujɛhɔv̤a kunɛnɛ wajɛtʰɛ jɛna ɛkuɓaŋǃamlɛni kukaiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ aɓaprɔfɛti ɓakajɛhɔv̤a uɔb̤ad̤ija watʰaɓatʰa ikʰulu laɓaprɔfɛti waɓaz̤imɛz̤a nɡ̤amaʃumi nɡ̤amaɬanu nɡ̤amaʃumi nɡ̤amaɬanu ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni waɓɔnɮa nɡ̤ɛsɔnka namanz̤i watʰi kɛ uahab̤i kuɔb̤ad̤ija hamɓa ujɛ ɛz̤wɛni ɛmitʰɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛni jɔnkɛ jamanz̤i nasɛmiland͡ʒ̤anɛni jɔnkɛ m̤lawumɓi sɔfumana utʲani sipʰilisɛ amahaʃɛ nɔɔnɮɛɓɛnd̤ɛ z̤inɡ̤aɓutʰisi z̤ɔnkɛ iinkɔmɔ ɓalaɬula iliz̤wɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ukuɓa ɓakǀand̤ɛ kulɔ uahab̤i wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛɲɛ inɮɛla jɛd̤wa uɔb̤ad̤ija wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛɲɛ inɮɛla jɛd̤wa kwatʰi kɛ ɛsɛnɮɛlɛni uɔb̤ad̤ija waɓɔnakala uɛlija ɛmkʰawulɛla wamaz̤i nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ watʰi nɡ̤uwɛ lɔ nkɔsi jam ɛlija watʰi jɛna kujɛ nd̤im hamɓa ujɛ kutʰi ɛnkɔsini jakʰɔ nanku ɛlapʰa uɛlija watʰi nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ sɔnɔ ukuɓa umnikɛlɛ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ɛsanɮɛni sikaahab̤i ukuɓa and̤iɓulalɛ ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ akukʰɔ luɬanɡ̤a naɓukumkani apʰɔ inɡ̤atʰumɛlanɡ̤a kʰɔna inkɔsi jam ɓakutʰi akakʰɔ jaɓafunɡ̤isa uɓukumkani nɔɬanɡ̤a ɔlɔ ukutʰi akufumanɛkanɡ̤a kalɔku kɛ utʰi hamɓa ujɛ kutʰi ɛnkɔsini jakʰɔ nanku ɛlapʰa uɛlija kɔtʰi nd̤itʰɛ nd̤ɛmka kuwɛ umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a akutʰwalɛlɛ apʰɔ nd̤inɡ̤az̤ijɔ nd̤ijɛ nd̤ikǁɛlɛlɛ uahab̤i anɡ̤akufumani and̤iɓulalɛ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ umɔjikɛ ujɛhɔv̤a kwasɛɓuŋǀinanɛni ɓam ɓɛkunɡ̤akǁɛlwanɡ̤a ɛnkɔsini jam ɛnd̤akwɛnz̤ajɔ ɛkuɓaɓulalɛni kukaiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ aɓaprɔfɛti ɓakajɛhɔv̤a nd̤az̤imɛz̤a ikʰulu lamad̤ɔd̤a kuɓaprɔfɛti ɓakajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤amaʃumi nɡ̤amaɬanu nɡ̤amaʃumi nɡ̤amaɬanu ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni nd̤aɓɔnɮa nɡ̤ɛsɔnka nanɡ̤amanz̤i kalɔku kɛ utʰi hamɓa ujɛ kutʰi ɛnkɔsini jakʰɔ nanku ɛlapʰa uɛlija ukuz̤ɛ ind̤iɓulalɛ watʰi uɛlija ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ɛnd̤imijɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ inɛnɛ nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤ija kuɓɔnana najɛ uɔb̤ad̤ija waja kumkʰawulɛla kɛ uahab̤i wamkǁɛlɛla wahamɓa uahab̤i waja kumkʰawulɛla uɛlija kwatʰi uahab̤i akumɓɔna uɛlija watʰi uahab̤i kujɛ ulapʰa wɛna uwaɬisɛlɛ intlɛkɛlɛ amasirajɛli watʰi jɛna and̤iwaɬisɛlanɡ̤a ntlɛkɛlɛ amasirajɛli nɡ̤uwɛ nɛnɮu kajiɬɔ nɡ̤ɔkujiʃija kwɛnu imitʰɛtʰɔ kajɛhɔv̤a waland̤ɛla ɔɔb̤ahali kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ tʰumɛla uwaɬanɡ̤anisɛlɛ amasirajɛli ɔnkɛ ɛntaɓɛni jɛkarmɛlɛ naɓaprɔfɛti ɓakab̤ahali aɓanɡ̤amakʰulu amanɛ anamaŋǀi maɬanu naɓaprɔfɛti ɓakaaʃɛra aɓanɡ̤amakʰulu amanɛ aɓaɮa ɛtafilɛni kaiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ watʰumɛla kɛ uahab̤i kɔɔɲana ɓɔnkɛ ɓakasirajɛli waɓaɬanɡ̤anisɛla aɓaprɔfɛti ɛntaɓɛni jɛkarmɛlɛ wafika uɛlija ɛɓantwini aɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ watʰi kɔd̤a kuɓɛ nimɓakǁa ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ land̤ɛlani jɛna kɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ub̤ahali utʰikǁɔ land̤ɛlani jɛna aɓampʰɛnd̤ula nɛz̤wi aɓantu watʰi uɛlija ɛɓantwini kusɛlɛ nd̤ɔd̤wa umprɔfɛti kajɛhɔv̤a kɛ aɓakab̤ahali aɓaprɔfɛti nɡ̤amakʰulu amanɛ anamaŋǀi amaɬanu amad̤ɔd̤a masinikwɛ iinkunz̤i ɛz̤int͡ʃa z̤iɓɛ mɓini ɓaz̤iɲulɛlɛ kɛ ɛɲɛ inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa ɓajitʲatʲɛ ɓajiɓɛkɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnkuni ɓanɡ̤afaki mlilɔ nd̤ijilunɡ̤isɛ ɛɲɛ inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa nd̤ijiɓɛkɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnkuni nd̤inɡ̤afaki mlilɔ niz̤ɛ niŋǃulɛ iɡ̤ama lɔtʰikǁɔ wɛnu nd̤iŋǃulɛ iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a atʰi utʰikǁɔ ɔtʰɛ wapʰɛnd̤ula nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ aɓɛ nɡ̤ujɛ utʰikǁɔ ɓapʰɛnd̤ula ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓatʰi liɬɛ ɛlɔ liz̤wi watʰi kɛ uɛlija kuɓaprɔfɛti ɓakab̤ahali z̤iɲulɛlɛni inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa iɓɛ ɲɛ niz̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ kukǃala nɡ̤ɔkuɓa niɓaninz̤i niŋǃulɛ iɡ̤ama lɔtʰikǁɔ wɛnu ninɡ̤afaki mlilɔ ɓajitʰaɓatʰa kɛ inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa aɓaɓɛjinikiwɛ ɓajilunɡ̤isa ɓaŋǃula iɡ̤ama likab̤ahali ɓɛkǃalɛ kwad̤a kwaɓa sɛmini ɛnkulu ɓɛsitʰi b̤ahali sipʰɛnd̤ulɛ akwaɓakʰɔ z̤wi akwaɓakʰɔ upʰɛnd̤ulajɔ ɓakǁʰɛnt͡sa nɡ̤asɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni ɛsasɛnz̤iwɛ kwatʰi ɛmini ɛnkulu uɛlija waɮala nɡ̤aɓɔ ɛsitʰi ŋǃulani nɡ̤ɛz̤wi ɛlikʰulu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛnɡ̤utʰikǁɔ inɡ̤aɓi usakǀinɡ̤a inɡ̤aɓi utʰɛ ɡ̤u ɓukǀala inɡ̤aɓi usɛluhamɓɛni inɡ̤aɓi m̤lawumɓi ulɛlɛ unɔkuɓa av̤uswɛ ɓaŋǃula nɡ̤ɛz̤wi ɛlikʰulu kɛ ɓaz̤ikǀɛnta nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ laɓɔ nɡ̤amak͡xɛlɛ nanɡ̤ɛz̤ikʰali lad̤a lat͡saz̤a iɡ̤az̤i kuɓɔ kwatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kwɛmini ɛnkulu ɓaprɔfɛta kwad̤a kwɛsa ɛkuɲuswɛni kɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa wanɡ̤ɔkuɬwa akwaɓakʰɔ liz̤wi akwaɓakʰɔ upʰɛnd̤ulajɔ akwaɓakʰɔ uɓɛkɛ inɮɛɓɛ watʰi uɛlija ɛɓantwini ɓɔnkɛ sɔnd̤ɛlani apʰa ɓasɔnd̤ɛla kɛ aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ kujɛ waɓuja wasakʰa isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sikajɛhɔv̤a ɛsiɓɛ sid̤iliz̤iwɛ uɛlija watʰaɓatʰa amatʲɛ aliʃumi ɛlinamaɓini nɡ̤ɔkwɛnani lɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakajakɔɓi ɛlɛz̤a kujɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi lija kuɓa nɡ̤usirajɛli iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ wakʰa nɡ̤amatʲɛ lawɔ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛɡ̤amɛni likajɛhɔv̤a wɛnz̤a umsɛlɛ ɔlinɡ̤ɛnɛ iisɛha ɛz̤imɓini z̤ɛmɓɛwu nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni waz̤ilunɡ̤isa wajitʲatʲa inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa wajiɓɛka pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnkuni watʰi z̤alisani imipʰand̤a iɓɛ minɛ nɡ̤amanz̤i niwaɡ̤alɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ napʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnkuni watʰi pʰind̤ani ɔkwɛsiɓini ɓapʰind̤a ɔkwɛsiɓini watʰi pʰind̤ani ɔkwɛsitʰatʰu ɓapʰind̤a ɔkwɛsitʰatʰu ahamɓa amanz̤i nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni wawuz̤alisa nɔmsɛlɛ nɡ̤amanz̤i kwatʰi ɛkuɲuswɛni kɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa wanɡ̤ɔkuɬwa wasɔnd̤ɛla uɛlija umprɔfɛti watʰi jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ kaaɓraham kaisakɛ kasirajɛli nam̤la makwaz̤iwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤uwɛ utʰikǁɔ kwasirajɛli ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ukuɓa nd̤iz̤ɛnz̤ɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤i z̤intɔ nɡ̤ɛliz̤wi lakʰɔ nd̤ipʰɛnd̤ulɛ jɛhɔv̤a nd̤ipʰɛnd̤ulɛ ɓaz̤i aɓa ɓantu ukuɓa wɛna jɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ukuɓa ujiɡ̤ukǃulɛlɛ kuwɛ intliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ wawa kɛ umlilɔ kajɛhɔv̤a waliɮa id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ kwanɛɛnkuni kwanamatʲɛ kwanɔm̤laɓa namanz̤i aɓɛ ɛsɛmsɛlɛni wawakʰɔtʰa ɓaɓɔna ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓawa nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɓatʰi ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ujɛ utʰikǁɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ujɛ utʰikǁɔ watʰi uɛlija kuɓɔ ɓaɓamɓɛni aɓaprɔfɛti ɓakab̤ahali makunɡ̤asind̤i namɲɛ kuɓɔ ɓaɓaɓamɓa kɛ uɛlija waɓaɬisɛla ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni ɔjikiʃɔn waɓaɓulalɛla kʰɔna watʰi uɛlija kuahab̤i ɲuka ujɛ kuɮa usɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kuv̤akala ulwand̤ilɛ lwɛmv̤ula ɛnkulu wɛɲuka kɛ uahab̤i waja kuɮa waja kusɛla kɛ uɛlija wɛɲuka waja ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛkarmɛlɛ wakǃɔnd̤ɛla ɛm̤laɓɛni waɓufaka uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ pʰakatʰi kwamad̤ɔlɔ akʰɛ watʰi kwind̤ɔd̤ana jakwakʰɛ kʰawuɲukɛ ukʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛli kǀala lasɛlwanɮɛ jɛɲuka jakʰanɡ̤ɛla jatʰi akukʰɔ ntɔ watʰi ɓuja ujɛ iz̤iɬanɮɔ z̤iɓɛ sikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kwatʰi kɛ nɡ̤ɛsɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ jatʰi nd̤iɓɔna ɛlinɡ̤anɡ̤ɛsanɮa sɔmntu lipʰuma ɛlwanɮɛ watʰi ɲuka ujɛ utʰi kuahab̤i ɓɔpʰa uɬɛ inɡ̤akuv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ɛli imv̤ula kwatʰi kɛ kwakamsiɲa iz̤ulu lamɲama nɡ̤amafu nɔmɔja kwaɓakʰɔ imv̤ula ɛnkulu wakʰwɛla uahab̤i waja ɛjiz̤ɛrɛli safika kɛ isanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a kuɛlija waz̤ib̤iŋǃisa waɡ̤id̤ima pʰamɓi kɔahab̤i kwad̤a kwaɓa sɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni ɛjiz̤ɛrɛli uahab̤i wamkǁɛlɛla uiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ uɛlija nɔkuɓaɓulala kwakʰɛ aɓaprɔfɛti ɓɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ uiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ watʰuma umtʰuɲwa kuɛlija ɛsitʰi maɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓakǃɔkɛlɛ ukwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓa and̤itʰanɡ̤a majɛla nɡ̤ɛli kǁa nɡ̤ɔmsɔ nd̤iwɛnz̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ uɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wɔmɲɛ kuɓɔ waɓɔna wɛsuka waɓamɓɛla ukusind̤isa umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ waja ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a ɛjɛjakwajud̤a wajiʃija kʰɔna ind̤ɔd̤ana jakwakʰɛ wahamɓa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ uhamɓɔ lwɛmini ɛɲɛ waja waɬala pʰant͡si kɔnwɛlɛ waz̤ikǀɛlɛla ukuɓa afɛ watʰi kwanɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔku jɛhɔv̤a wutʰaɓatʰɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inɡ̤alunɡ̤ilɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔɔɓawɔ waŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤a kɛ wɔz̤ɛla pʰant͡si kɔnwɛlɛ kwaɓɔnakala kʰɔna isitʰuɲwa sɛz̤ulu simʃukumisa satʰi kujɛ v̤uka uɮɛ wakʰanɡ̤ɛla nankɔ kukʰɔ nɡ̤asɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɛ ikǃɛɓɛnɡ̤wana ɛlɔsiwɛjɔ lɛsɔnka nɛsɛlwa lamanz̤i waɮa kɛ wasɛla waɓuja saɓuja isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a ɔkwɛsiɓini samʃukumisa satʰi v̤uka uɮɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uhamɓɔ lukʰulu kuwɛ wav̤uka kɛ waɮa wasɛla wahamɓa nɡ̤amanɮa ɔku kuɮa ɛz̤imaʃumi manɛ nɔɓusuku ɔɓumaʃumi manɛ wad̤a ɛntaɓɛni katʰikǁɔ ɛhɔrɛb̤ɛ waja ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni apʰɔ kʰɔna nalɔ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɛ watʰi kujɛ ujintɔni apʰa ɛlija watʰi jɛna nd̤ɛnz̤iwɛ likʰwɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓawuʃijilɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wakʰɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤akʰɔ ɓaz̤iɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ula aɓaprɔfɛti ɓakʰɔ ɓaɓaɓulala nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nd̤asala nd̤ɛd̤wa ɓafuna umpʰɛfumlɔ kɛ ukuɓa ɓawukʰupʰɛ watʰi pʰuma umɛ ɛntaɓɛni pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a nankɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɮula nɔmɔja ɔmkʰulu ɔnamanɮa uz̤ik͡xaz̤ula iintaɓa uz̤ikǃʰɛkɛz̤a iiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɛnɡ̤ɛkʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛmɔjɛni lɔwɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔmɔja kwakʰɔ iɲikima akaɓakʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɲikimɛni ɛmv̤ɛni kwɛɲikima kwaɓakʰɔ umlilɔ akaɓakʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛmlilwɛni ɛmv̤ɛni kɔmlilɔ kwaɓakʰɔ ulwand̤ilɛ lɔkupʰɛpʰɛz̤ɛla ɔkuɬɛ kwatʰi akuv̤a uɛlija waɓuɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛla uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ ɛnkulu wapʰuma wɛma ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔmkǃɔlɔmɓa nankɔ kujɛ iliz̤wi lisitʰi ujintɔni apʰa ɛlija watʰi nd̤ɛnz̤iwɛ likʰwɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓawuʃijilɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wakʰɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤akʰɔ ɓaz̤iɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ula aɓaprɔfɛti ɓakʰɔ ɓaɓaɓulala nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nd̤isɛlɛ nd̤ɛd̤wa ɓafuna umpʰɛfumlɔ kɛ ukuɓa ɓawukʰupʰɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɛ hamɓa uɓujɛ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jakʰɔ ujɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛd̤amaskɔ ujɛ utʰamɓisɛ uhaz̤ajɛli aɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani kumaaram utʰamɓisɛ ujɛhu uɲana kanimʃi aɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani kumasirajɛli utʰamɓisɛ uɛliʃa uɲana kaʃafati wasɛab̤ɛlɛmɛhɔla aɓɛ nɡ̤umprɔfɛti ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɔ kɔtʰi kɛ atʰi ɔsind̤ɛ ɛk͡xɛlɛni likahaz̤ajɛli aɓulawɛ nɡ̤ujɛhu atʰi ɔsind̤ɛ ɛk͡xɛlɛni likajɛhu aɓulawɛ nɡ̤uɛliʃa kɛ nd̤ɔz̤iʃijɛla kwasirajɛli isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ amad̤ɔlɔ ɔnkɛ anɡ̤aɡ̤ukǃanɡ̤a kub̤ahali imilɔmɔ jɔnkɛ ɛnɡ̤amanɡ̤anɡ̤a wɛmka kɛ apʰɔ uɛliʃa uɲana kaʃafati ɛlima kukʰɔ iʃumi ɛlinɛsiɓini lɛɛdʲɔkʰwɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ jɛna kɛ ɛlunɡ̤ɛ nɛjɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɓini uɛlija wɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa kujɛ wapʰɔsa inɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ ɛnkulu kujɛ waz̤iʃija iinkaɓi waɓalɛka ɛmv̤a kɔɛlija watʰi makʰɛ nd̤ijɛ kwanɡ̤a uɓawɔ nɔma nd̤ikuland̤ɛlɛ kɛ watʰi kujɛ hamɓa uɓujɛ nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ ntɔni waɓuja kɛ ɛkumland̤ɛlɛni waz̤itʰaɓatʰa iinkaɓi z̤ɛdʲɔkʰwɛ ɛɲɛ waɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla nɡ̤az̤ɔ wajipʰɛka iɲama nɡ̤ɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɛɛnkaɓi ɛz̤ɔ aɓantu ɓaɮa wɛsuka kɛ waland̤ɛla uɛlija wamlunɡ̤isɛlɛla kɛ kalɔku ub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ wamaaram wajiɓutʰa jɔnkɛ jakʰɛ ɛnɔkumkani aɓanɡ̤amaʃumi amatʰatʰu anaɓaɓini namahaʃɛ nɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa wɛɲuka wawuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a umz̤i wakwasamari nawɔ watʰumɛla aɓatʰuɲwa kuahab̤i wakwasirajɛli kulɔɔ mz̤i watʰi kujɛ ut͡ʃɔ ub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ ukutʰi isiliv̤ɛrɛ jakʰɔ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ jakʰɔ jɛjam naɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɔ naɓantwana ɓakʰɔ aɓɔ ɓaɬɛ nɡ̤aɓam wapʰɛnd̤ula wakwasirajɛli watʰi nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi lakʰɔ nkɔsi jam nd̤inɡ̤ɔwakʰɔ nakɔ kɔnkɛ ɛnd̤inakɔ ɓapʰind̤a aɓatʰuɲwa ɓatʰi ut͡ʃɔ ub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ ukutʰi nd̤atʰumɛla kuwɛ nd̤isitʰi nd̤inikɛ isiliv̤ɛrɛ jakʰɔ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ jakʰɔ naɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɔ naɓantwana ɓakʰɔ ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ majɛla nɛli kǁa nɡ̤ɔmsɔ nd̤aɓatʰumɛla kuwɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓam ɓajiɡ̤ǃ̤utʰaɡ̤ǃ̤utʰa inɮu jakʰɔ nɛz̤inɮu z̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ɓɔtʰi kɔnkɛ ɔkutʰand̤ɛkajɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ ɓakutʰaɓatʰɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa saɓɔ ɓɛmkɛ nakɔ ukumkani wakwasirajɛli waɓiz̤a ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ɛliz̤wɛ watʰi kǃɔnd̤ani kɛ niɓɔnɛ ukuɓa lɔ uŋ̤ǁ̤amɛlɛ uɓuɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓɛtʰumɛlɛ ɛɓiz̤a aɓafaz̤i ɓam naɓantwana ɓam nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ jam nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ jam and̤amanɡ̤ala atʰi kujɛ ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ musa ukupʰulapʰula uz̤ɛ unɡ̤av̤umi watʰi kɛ kuɓatʰuɲwa ɓakab̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ nɔtʰi ɛnkɔsini jam jɔnkɛ intɔ ɔɓumtʰumɛ jɔna umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔkukǃala nd̤ɔjɛnz̤a lɛ ntɔ jɔna and̤inakujɛnz̤a ɓɛmka kɛ aɓatʰuɲwa ɓaɓuja nɛlɔ liz̤wi watʰumɛla ub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ kujɛ watʰi maɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓakǃɔkɛlɛ ukwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓa lutʰɛ utʰuli lwakwasamari lwalinɡ̤ana ukuz̤alisa iz̤anɮa z̤aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓand̤iland̤ɛlajɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula wakwasirajɛli watʰi jitʰini makanɡ̤akǃʰajisi ɔsab̤iŋǃa ik͡xɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔsɛlɛlikʰulula kwatʰi akuliv̤a ɛlɔ z̤wi ub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ akuɓɔn ukuɓa ujasɛla jɛna nɔkumkani aɓɔ ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni watʰi kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ jakʰani uluɬu ɓalwakʰa kɛ uluɬu kulɔɔ mz̤i kwaɓɔnakala mprɔfɛti utʰilɛ kuahab̤i wakwasirajɛli watʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ujiɓɔnilɛ jɔnkɛ lɛ ŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ inɡ̤akanana jaɓɔna nd̤ijinikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ nam̤la waz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi kɛ uahab̤i nɡ̤aɓani watʰi jɛna ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤ana aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamaz̤wɛ watʰi nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kukǃala watʰi nɡ̤uwɛ lɔ wawaɓala kɛ amad̤ɔd̤ana aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamaz̤wɛ aɓa nɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi matʰatʰu anamaɓini ɛmv̤a kwawɔ waɓaɓala ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaɓa nɡ̤amawaka asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓapʰuma ɛmini ɛnkulu kɛ kalɔku ub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ uɓɛsɛla ɛŋǁila ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni jɛna nɔɔkumkani aɓamaʃumi matʰatʰu anaɓaɓini ɔɔkumkani aɓɔ ɓamŋǀɛd̤isajɔ apʰuma kukǃala amad̤ɔd̤ana aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamaz̤wɛ watʰumɛla ub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ ɓamkǁɛlɛla ɓɛsitʰi kupʰumɛ amad̤ɔd̤a kwasamari watʰi nɔkuɓa apʰumɛlɛ ukǁɔlɔ waɓamɓɛni ɛɬɛli nɔkuɓa apʰumɛlɛ waɓamɓɛni ɛɬɛli apʰuma kɛ mad̤ɔd̤ana aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamaz̤wɛ kuwɔ umz̤i nɛmpi ɛɓiwaland̤ɛla jaɓa nɡ̤ulɔwɔ waɓulala asaɓa kɛ amaaram amasirajɛli awasukɛla wasind̤a ub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ wakwaaram nɡ̤ɛhaʃɛ ɛnaɓamahaʃɛ wapʰuma wakwasirajɛli wawakǁaɓɛla amahaʃɛ nɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa wakǁaɓɛla pʰakatʰi kwamaaram nɡ̤ɔkǁaɓɛlɔ ɔlukʰulu wafika umprɔfɛti lɔwa wakwasirajɛli watʰi kujɛ hamɓa ujɛ kuz̤ɔmɛlɛz̤a ukukǃɔnd̤ɛ ukuɓɔnɛ ɔkwɛnz̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukuv̤ɛla kɔmɲaka wakwaaram uja kuɲuka alwɛ nawɛ kɛ kalɔku aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɔkumkani ɓakwaaram ɓatʰi kujɛ nɡ̤ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓasɛz̤intaɓɛni ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓaɓɔ kukɔ lɛ ntɔ ɓɔmɛlɛlɛjɔ kunatʰi masilwɛ naɓɔ kɛ ɛmatʰafɛni ukuɓa asisaji kɔmɛlɛla kunaɓɔ jɛnz̤a lɛ ntɔ ɓaʃɛŋǁisɛ ɔɔkumkani aɓa ɛlɔwɔ ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ umisɛ amaɓamɓa ɛz̤ikʰunɮɛni z̤aɓɔ uz̤iɓalɛlɛ ɛnɡ̤anɡ̤ɛmpi lɛ iwilɛjɔ kuwɛ amahaʃɛ aɓɛ nɡ̤anɡ̤alɔɔ mahaʃɛ iiŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa z̤iɓɛ nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛz̤ɔ ŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa silwɛ naɓɔ kɛ ɛmatʰafɛni ukuɓa asisaji kɔmɛlɛla kunaɓɔ walipʰulapʰula iz̤wi laɓɔ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kwatʰi ɛkuv̤ɛlɛni kɔmɲaka wawaɓala ub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ amaaram wɛɲuka waja namasirajɛli ɛafɛki ɓaɓalwa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓakǁʰɔtʲiswa ɓaja kuɓaɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a ɓamisa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmiɬand͡ʒ̤ana ɛmiɓini jɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ amaaram aliz̤alisa iliz̤wɛ wafika umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ watʰi wamasirajɛli ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɛtʰɛ amaaram nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wasɛz̤intaɓɛni ujɛhɔv̤a akanɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wasɛz̤intilini nd̤ija kujinikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ jɔnkɛ lɛ ŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ inɡ̤aka naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a jamisa kɛ ikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛnɛ imiɬa ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ jad̤iɓana ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaɓulala kumaaram ikʰulu kumkǃikɛla nɡ̤aminiɲɛ asɛlɛjɔ asaɓɛla ɛafɛki ɛla pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i kwawa ud̤ɔnɡ̤a pʰɛz̤u anɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ amad̤ɔd̤a asɛlɛjɔ wasaɓa ub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ wanɡ̤ɛna kulɔɔ mz̤i watʰunɡ̤ɛla amaɡ̤umɓi ɓatʰi kujɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ kʰawukʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ siv̤ilɛ ukuɓa ɔɔkumkani ɓɛnɮu jakwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔɔkumkani aɓanɛŋǀɛɓa makʰɛ siɓɛkɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ ɛmaŋǃɛni nɛɛntamɓɔ ɛz̤intlɔkwɛni z̤ɛtʰu sipʰumɛ sijɛ wamasirajɛli m̤lawumɓi wɔwusind̤isa umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ ɓab̤iŋǃa kɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ ɛmaŋǃɛni ɓaɓɛka iintamɓɔ ɛz̤intlɔkwɛni z̤aɓɔ ɓaja wakwasirajɛli ɓatʰi umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ utʰi kʰawusind̤isɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ watʰi jɛna usapʰililɛ nɡ̤umz̤alwana lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a kɛ atʰi litʰamsaŋǃa aŋ̤ǁ̤amisa ukumxwɛɓɛʃa ukuɓa ɛlɔ lɛlakʰɛ atʰi nɡ̤umz̤alwana wakʰɔ ub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ watʰi jɛna jijani kumtʰaɓatʰa wapʰuma ub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ wɛz̤a kujɛ wamkʰwɛlisa ɛŋǃwɛlwɛni watʰi ub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ kujɛ imiz̤i awajitʰaɓatʰajɔ uɓawɔ kujiɬɔ nd̤ija kujiɓujisa uz̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ iz̤itratɔ ɛd̤amaskɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ waz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ uɓawɔ kwasamari watʰi uahab̤i nd̤ija kukund̤ulula nalɔ mŋǃɔpʰisɔ wamɛnz̤ɛla kɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wamnd̤ulula kɛ kalɔku ind̤ɔd̤a ɛtʰilɛ jakɔɔɲana ɓaɓaprɔfɛti jatʰi kummɛlwanɛ wajɔ nɡ̤ɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kʰawund̤iɓɛtʰɛ akav̤uma lɔɔ ukujiɓɛtʰa jatʰi kujɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa unɡ̤alipʰulapʰulanɡ̤a iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ujaɓɔna ɛkumkɛni kwakʰɔ uja kuɓulawa jinɡ̤ɔɲama wɛmka kujɔ jamfumana inɡ̤ɔɲama jamɓulala jafumana wumɓi jatʰi kʰawund̤iɓɛtʰɛ wajiɓɛtʰa kɛ lɔɔ wajiɓɛtʰa wajilimaz̤a wahamɓa umprɔfɛti lɔwɔ wamlind̤a ɛnɮɛlɛni waz̤ɛnz̤a wumɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓɔpʰa ikǃʰija ɛmɛɬwɛni kwatʰi akuɓɔna ukuɓa ujaɮula wamɛmɛz̤a watʰi umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ wapʰuma waja ɛmfaz̤wɛni pʰakatʰi nankɔ kutʲɛka ind̤ɔd̤a jɛz̤a nɔmntu jatʰi ɡ̤ǀ̤ina lɔ ukuɓa utʰɛ akaɓakʰɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ wɔɓa sɛsikʰunɮɛni sɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ɔkaɲɛ wɔɬawula nɡ̤ɛtalɛntɛ jɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ akuɓa ɛsɛɓɛnz̤a umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ apʰa napʰaja wɛsuka watʰi ʃwaka watʰi kɛ wakwasirajɛli kujɛ sind͡ʒ̤alɔ isiɡ̤wɛɓɔ sakʰɔ umisɛ waɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa wakʰawulɛz̤a wajisusa ikǃʰija ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ wamaz̤i wakwasirajɛli ukuɓa unɡ̤ɔwasɛɓaprɔfɛtini watʰi kujɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkund̤ulula kwakʰɔ ɛsanɮɛni ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnd̤ajisinɡ̤ɛla pʰant͡si umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ uja kuɓa sɛsikʰunɮɛni sɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wajɔ naɓantu ɓakʰɔ ɓaɓɛ sɛsikʰunɮɛni saɓantu ɓajɔ waja wakwasirajɛli ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ uɓusɔ ɛɓutʰɛ ɛd͡ʒ̤alilɛ kwasamari kwatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kwɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ unab̤ɔti wasɛjiz̤ɛrɛli ɛnɛsid̤ilija ɛsisɛjiz̤ɛrɛli nɡ̤asɛb̤ɔtwɛni likaahab̤i wakwasamari watʰɛtʰa uahab̤i kunab̤ɔti watʰi nd̤inikɛ isid̤ilija sakʰɔ ukuɓa siɓɛ nɡ̤umjɛz̤ɔ wɛmifunɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sisɔnd̤ɛlɛlɛnɛ nɛnɮu jam nd̤ɔkunika isid̤ilija ɛsilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kunɛsɔ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sasɔ kɛ ukuɓa kutʰɛ kwalunɡ̤a ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ nd̤ɔkunika ɛsilinɡ̤ɛnɛjɔ watʰi unab̤ɔti kuahab̤i makuɓɛ lɛɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kajɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa nd̤ikunikɛ lɔɔɓawɔ uahab̤i waja ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ ɛɓutʰɛ uɓusɔ ɛd͡ʒ̤alilɛ liliz̤wi aɓɛlitʰɛtʰilɛ kujɛ unab̤ɔti wasɛjiz̤ɛrɛli watʰi and̤iji lɔɔɓawɔ waja ɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlwɛni wab̤ɛka pʰaja akaɮa nɔkuɮa wafika uiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ umkakʰɛ kujɛ watʰi kujɛ jini ukuɓa usanɡ̤anɛ kanɡ̤aka unɡ̤aɮi nɔkuɮa watʰi kujɛ kunɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ kunab̤ɔti wasɛjiz̤ɛrɛli nd̤atʰi kujɛ nd̤inikɛ isid̤ilija sakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛmali ɔkaɲɛ ukuɓa ujav̤uma nd̤ɔkunika ɛsiɲɛ isid̤ilija ɛsikʰunɮɛni sasɔ watʰi and̤iji isid̤ilija watʰi uiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ umkakʰɛ kujɛ wɛna aɓupʰɛtʰwɛ nɡ̤uwɛ nɡ̤ɔku uɓukumkani ɓakwasirajɛli v̤uka uɮɛ ukuɮa ikǀʰwajitʰɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ nd̤ɔkunika isid̤ilija sikanab̤ɔti wasɛjiz̤ɛrɛli wab̤ala iiŋǀwad̤i ɛɡ̤amɛni likaahab̤i waz̤itʲwina nɡ̤ɔmsɛsanɛ wakʰɛ waz̤itʰumɛla ɛz̤ɔ ŋǀwad̤i kumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu nakuɓanumz̤ana aɓaɓɛkulɔɔ mz̤i wakʰɛ aɓaɓɛɬɛli nɔnab̤ɔti wab̤ala kwɛz̤ɔ ŋǀwad̤i watʰi mɛmani uz̤ilɔ lɔkuɮa nimɓɛkɛ unab̤ɔti pʰamɓi kwaɓantu niɓɛkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amaɓini anɡ̤amat͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ aŋ̤ǃ̤inɛ nɡ̤ajɛ atʰi wɛna utʰukɛ utʰikǁɔ nɔkumkani niz̤ɛ nimkʰupʰɛlɛ pʰanɮɛ nimɡ̤iɓisɛlɛ nɡ̤amatʲɛ afɛ amad̤ɔd̤a ɔmz̤i wakʰɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu naɓanumz̤ana aɓaɓɛɬɛli kulɔɔ mz̤i wakʰɛ ɓɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ aɓɛɓatʰumɛlɛ nɡ̤akɔ uiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kwakub̤aliwɛ ɛz̤iŋǀwad̤ini aɓɛz̤itʰumɛlɛ kuɓɔ ɓamɛma uz̤ilɔ lɔkuɮa ɓamɓɛka unab̤ɔti pʰamɓi kwaɓantu kwafika lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a maɓini anɡ̤amat͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔ aɬala pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ anɡ̤amat͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔ aŋ̤ǃ̤ina nɡ̤ajɛ unab̤ɔti pʰamɓi kwaɓantu atʰi unab̤ɔti utʰukɛ utʰikǁɔ nɔkumkani ɓamkʰupʰɛla nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kɔmz̤i ɓamɡ̤iɓisɛla nɡ̤amatʲɛ ɓatʰumɛla kɛ kuiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ ɓatʰi unab̤ɔti uɡ̤itʲisɛlwɛ nɡ̤amatʲɛ kwatʰi akuv̤a uiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ ukuɓa unab̤ɔti uɡ̤itʲisɛlwɛ nɡ̤amatʲɛ watʰi uiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ kuahab̤i suka usitʰaɓatʰɛ isid̤ilija sikanab̤ɔti wasɛjiz̤ɛrɛli aɓɛnɡ̤av̤umi nɡ̤ɛmali nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unab̤ɔti akasɛkʰɔ ufilɛ kwatʰi akuv̤a uahab̤i ukuɓa unab̤ɔti ufilɛ wɛsuka uahab̤i wɛɬa waja kusitʰaɓatʰa isid̤ilija sikanab̤ɔti wasɛjiz̤ɛrɛli lafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kuɛlija wasɛtiʃb̤i lisitʰi suka uɬɛ ujɛ kukʰawulɛla uahab̤i wakwasirajɛli ɔkwasamari nankɔ ɛsɛsid̤ilijɛni sikanab̤ɔti ɛɬɛ waja kusitʰaɓatʰa uz̤ɛ utʰɛtʰɛ kujɛ utʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi uɓulɛlɛ watʰaɓatʰa utʰɛtʰɛ kujɛ utʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɛnd̤awɛni ɛz̤ikǁʰapʰɛlɛ kujɔ iz̤ind͡ʒ̤a iɡ̤az̤i likanab̤ɔti z̤ija kulikǁʰapʰɛla kʰɔna iz̤ind͡ʒ̤a iɡ̤az̤i lakʰɔ wɛna lɔ watʰi uahab̤i kuɛlija und̤ifumɛnɛ lut͡ʃaɓa watʰi jɛna nd̤ikufumɛnɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa uz̤itʰɛnɡ̤isɛlɛ ukwɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ujaɓɔna nd̤ikuz̤isɛla uɓuɓi nd̤iwat͡ʃajɛlɛ amav̤ɛlamv̤a akʰɔ nd̤ijiŋǃamlɛ kwaahab̤i jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛjind̤ɔd̤a ɔv̤alɛlwɛjɔ nɔv̤ulɛlwɛjɔ kwasirajɛli nd̤ɔjɛnz̤a inɮu jakʰɔ iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɮu kajarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kanɛb̤ati nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɮu kab̤ahɛʃa uɲana kaahija nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkukǃumɓisa ɔnd̤ikǃumɓisɛ nɡ̤akɔ wawɔnisa amasirajɛli kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ watʰi uiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ uja kuɮiwa z̤iz̤ind͡ʒ̤a ɛmsɛlɛni wɔŋ̤ǃ̤amɛkɔ lwasɛjiz̤ɛrɛli ɔwakwaahab̤i ɔfɛla pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i uja kuɮiwa z̤iz̤ind͡ʒ̤a ɔfɛla ɛnɮɛ uja kuɮiwa z̤iintaka z̤ɛz̤ulu kɔd̤wa ɓɛkunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔahab̤i ɔwaz̤itʰɛnɡ̤isɛla ukwɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ɔwakǁʰɔkɔŋǁwajɔ nɡ̤uiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ umkakʰɛ wɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwamasikiz̤i kunɛnɛ nɡ̤ɔkuland̤ɛla iz̤itʰikǁɔ ɛz̤iz̤iz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ amaamɔri awawaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤ajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a pʰamɓi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kwatʰi akuwɛv̤a uahab̤i lɔɔ maz̤wi kaɛlija waz̤ik͡xaz̤ula iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ waɓɛka iinɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ ɛɲamɛni jakʰɛ waz̤ila ukuɮa nɡ̤ɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ wahamɓa kuɬɛ lafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kuɛlija wasɛtiʃb̤i lisitʰi ujakuɓɔna ukuz̤itʰɔɓa kwakʰɛ uahab̤i ɛɓuswɛni ɓam nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɛz̤itʰɔɓilɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓam and̤iji kuɓuz̤isa uɓuɓi ɛmiɬɛni jakʰɛ nd̤ija kujiz̤isɛla uɓuɓi inɮu jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔɲana wakʰɛ kwaɬalwa imiɲaka jamitʰatʰu kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ mfaz̤wɛ pʰakatʰi kwamaaram namasirajɛli kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsitʰatʰu wɛɬa ujɛhɔʃafati wakwajud̤a waja wakwasirajɛli watʰi wakwasirajɛli kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ anaz̤i ukuɓa iramɔti jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i jɛjɛtʰu sitʰɛ kǀwaka tʰina asijiɬutʰi ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wakwaaram watʰi kujɛhɔʃafati wɔhamɓa silwɛ nɛramɔti jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i watʰi ujɛhɔʃafati wakwasirajɛli nd̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɛ aɓantu ɓam ɓand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓantu ɓakʰɔ amahaʃɛ and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amahaʃɛ akʰɔ watʰi ujɛhɔʃafati wakwasirajɛli kʰawuɓuz̤ɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nam̤la waɓaɬanɡ̤anisa kɛ wakwasirajɛli aɓaprɔfɛti ɓɛkumakʰulu amanɛ amad̤ɔd̤a watʰi kuɓɔ nd̤ijɛ nɛramɔti jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i nd̤ijɛkɛ ɓatʰi ɲuka inkɔsi jɔjinikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani watʰi ujɛhɔʃafati akusɛkʰɔ mprɔfɛti kajɛhɔv̤a apʰa siɓuz̤isɛ kujɛ watʰi wakwasirajɛli kujɛhɔʃafati kusɛkʰɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛɲɛ ɛsinɡ̤aɓuz̤isa nɡ̤ajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a kɛ nd̤ijitʰijilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ajiprɔfɛti ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤am iprɔfɛta ɔkuɓi nɡ̤umikaja uɲana kaimla watʰi ujɛhɔʃafati makanɡ̤at͡ʃɔ waz̤a wakwasirajɛli waɓiz̤a umɓusi watʰi kʰawulɛz̤isa umikaja uɲana kaimla ɛz̤ɛ apʰa kɛ wakwasirajɛli nɔjɛhɔʃafati wakwajud̤a waɬala ɛlɔwɔ ɛtrɔnɛni jakʰɛ ɛv̤ɛtʰɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛsand̤ɛni ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lakwasamari ɓɔnkɛ aɓaprɔfɛti ɓɛprɔfɛta pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija uɲana kakɛnahana waz̤ɛnz̤ɛla iimpɔnd̤ɔ z̤ɛsiɲitʰi watʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi uja kuwaŋ̤ǃ̤ula nɡ̤az̤ɔ ɛz̤i amaaram ud̤ɛ uwaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaprɔfɛti ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuprɔfɛta ɓɛsitʰi ɲuka ujɛ ɛramɔti jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i uɓɛ nɛmpumɛlɛlɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uja kujinikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani kɛ umtʰuɲwa ɔɓɛjɛ kuɓiz̤a umikaja watʰɛtʰa kujɛ ɛsitʰi kʰawuɓɔnɛ amaz̤wi aɓaprɔfɛti atʰɛtʰa ɔkuɬɛ nɡ̤amlɔmɔ mɲɛ iz̤wi lakʰɔ makʰɛ liɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛliz̤wi laɓɔ utʰɛtʰɛ ɔkuɬɛ watʰi umikaja ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a atʰɛ wakutʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ɔtʰɛtʰa kʰɔna wafika watʰi kujɛ mikaja sijɛ ɛramɔti jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i ukuɓa silwɛ sijɛkɛ watʰi kujɛ ɲuka uɓɛ nɛmpumɛlɛlɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uja kujinikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani watʰi kujɛ makuɓɛ z̤iz̤iɬanɮɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤apʰi nd̤ikufunɡ̤isa ukuɓa unɡ̤and̤ikǁɛlɛli intɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛjijɔ iɲanisɔ ɛɡ̤amɛni likajɛhɔv̤a watʰi jɛna nd̤iɓɔnɛ amasirajɛli ɔnkɛ ɛlusali ɛz̤intaɓɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ ɛnɡ̤ɛnamalusi watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a aɓa aɓanankɔsi maɓaɓujɛlɛ ɛlɔwɔ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ ɛnɔkǁɔlɔ watʰi wakwasirajɛli kujɛhɔʃafati nd̤iɓɛ nd̤inɡ̤at͡ʃɔnɡ̤ɔ ukutʰi kuwɛ akaji kuprɔfɛta ɔkuɬɛ nɡ̤am wɔprɔfɛta uɓuɓi ɓɔd̤wa watʰi jɛna nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ liv̤ɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nd̤imɓɔnilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɬɛli ɛtrɔnɛni jakʰɛ wɔnkɛ umkʰɔsi wasɛmaz̤ulwini nɡ̤akujɛ nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ kwakʰɛ nanɡ̤asɛkʰɔɬɔ kwakʰɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kulukuɬa uahab̤i ɛɲukɛ ajɛ awɛ ɛramɔti jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ lɔ ukutʰɛtʰa wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ lɔ ukutʰɛtʰa wapʰuma kɛ umɔja wɛma pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a watʰi nd̤ɔmlukuɬa watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kuwɔ nɡ̤antɔni watʰi wɔna nd̤ɔpʰuma nd̤ijɛ nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤umɔja wɔɓukǁɔki ɛmlɔɲɛni waɓaprɔfɛti ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ watʰi jɛna uja kumlukuɬa ufɛz̤ɛ pʰuma ujɛ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ujaɓɔna kalɔku ujɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤ɛnisɛ umɔja wɔɓukǁɔki ɛmlɔɲɛni waɓɔ ɓaprɔfɛti ɓakʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰɛtʰɛ ɔkuɓi nɡ̤awɛ wɛsuka uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija uɲana kakɛnahana wamɓɛtʰa umikaja ɛsiɮɛlɛni watʰi uɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛ pʰi umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa ajɛ kutʰɛtʰa kuwɛ watʰi umikaja kʰanɡ̤ɛla uja kuɓɔna nɡ̤alɔɔ uja kuz̤a utʰunɡ̤ɛlɛ amaɡ̤umɓi uz̤imɛla watʰi wakwasirajɛli mtʰaɓatʰɛ umikaja uɓujɛ najɛ umsɛ kuamɔn umpʰatʰi wɔmz̤i nakujɔwaʃɛ uɲana wɔkumkani utʰi ut͡ʃɔ ukutʰi mfakɛni ɛntɔlɔnɡ̤wɛni lɔ nimɮisɛ isɔnka sɔkǁiniwɛjɔ namanz̤i ɔkǁiniwɛjɔ nd̤id̤ɛ nd̤iɓujɛ nd̤inɔkǁɔlɔ watʰi umikaja ukuɓa uɓujɛ waɓuja unɔkǁɔlɔ wɔɓa ujɛhɔv̤a akatʰɛtʰanɡ̤a nɡ̤am watʰi jiv̤ani nɔnkɛ z̤iz̤wɛ z̤ipʰɛla wɛɲuka kɛ wakwasirajɛli nɔjɛhɔʃafati wakwajud̤a ɓaja ɛramɔti jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i watʰi wakwasirajɛli kujɛhɔʃafati nd̤ija kuz̤ɛnz̤a wumɓi nd̤inɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛkulwɛni jamɓatʰa iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɔ wɛna waz̤ɛnz̤a wumɓi wakwasirajɛli wanɡ̤ɛna ɛkulwɛni kɛ wakwaaram waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ ɓɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa aɓamaʃumi matʰatʰu anaɓaɓini watʰi iz̤ɛ ninɡ̤alwi nɔmŋǀi nanɛ nɔmkʰulu jilwani nɔkumkani wakwasirajɛli jɛd̤wa kwatʰi ɓakumɓɔna ujɛhɔʃafati aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa ɓatʰi ɓɔna inɛnɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wakwasirajɛli ɓatʲɛka kɛ ɓɛz̤a najɛ wakʰala ujɛhɔʃafati kwatʰi ɓakuɓɔna aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa ukuɓa asinɡ̤ujɛ wakwasirajɛli ɓaɓuja ɛkumsukɛlɛni watʰi watʲɛd̤a isapʰɛtʰa ɛfunisɛla wat͡ʃɔ wakwasirajɛli ɛkuɬanɡ̤anɛni kwɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jɛnt͡simɓi namasɔnd̤ɔ ajɔ watʰi jɛna kumkǃʰuɓi wɛŋǃwɛlɔ jakʰɛ jɔkulwa d͡ʒ̤ika iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɔ und̤isɛ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kɔmkʰɔsi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iŋ̤ǁ̤wɛlɛxiwɛ ukulwa kwɛɲuka lɔɔ ukumkani waz̤imisa ɛŋǃwɛlwɛni pʰamɓi kwamaaram nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa iɡ̤az̤i lɛŋǁɛɓa lakʰɛ laŋ̰ǀ̰ɛŋ̰ǀ̰ɛz̤a laja ɛsiswini sɛŋǃwɛlɔ kwav̤akala kukʰwaz̤wa ɛmkʰɔsini ukut͡ʃɔna kwɛlanɡ̤a kusitʰiwa ɛlɔwɔ ɛmz̤ini wakʰɛ ɛlɔwɔ ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɛ wafa kɛ waz̤iswa kwasamari ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla kwasamari jaɬand͡ʒ̤wa iŋǃwɛlɔ jɔkulwa ɛkǀʰiɓini lakwasamari iz̤ind͡ʒ̤a z̤alikǁʰapʰa iɡ̤az̤i lakʰɛ ɛɬamɓa apʰɔ amahɛɲukaz̤i nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a aɓɛlitʰɛtʰilɛ ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikaahab̤i nakɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ nɛnɮu awajakʰajɔ nɡ̤ɛɛmpɔnd̤ɔ z̤ɛɛnɮɔv̤u nɛmiz̤i jɔnkɛ awajakʰajɔ az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli walala uahab̤i kɔɔjisɛ uahaz̤ija uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ ujɛhɔʃafati uɲana kaasa waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwajud̤a nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsinɛ kaahab̤i wakwasirajɛli ujɛhɔʃafati uɓɛ miɲaka imaʃumi matʰatʰu anamiɬanu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛmaʃumi maɓini anamiɬanu ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina lalinɡ̤uaz̤ub̤a intɔmɓi kaʃilɛhi wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛla z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ikaasa ujisɛ akatʲɛka kuz̤ɔ ɛsɛnz̤a ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a kɔd̤wa iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a az̤isuswanɡ̤a aɓantu ɓaɓɛsaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla ɓɛkǃʰumisɛla ɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni ujɛhɔʃafati waɬalɛlana nɡ̤ɔkǁɔlɔ nɔkumkani wakwasirajɛli ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikajɛhɔʃafati nɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓakʰɛ awaɓɛnz̤ajɔ nɔkulwa kwakʰɛ az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a amasalɛla amanɡ̤awu awasalajɔ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kajisɛ uasa wawat͡ʃajɛla ɛz̤wɛni ɓɛkunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ ɔkɔ kwaɛd̤ɔm ɓɛkulawula iɓamɓa ujɛhɔʃafati wɛnz̤a iiŋǃanawa z̤asɛtarʃiʃɛ z̤ɔkuja kutʰaɓatʰa iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ kwaɔfirɛ az̤aja nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iiŋǃanawa ɛz̤ɔ z̤apʰuka ɛɛt͡sijɔnɡ̤ɛb̤ɛrɛ waz̤a watʰi uahaz̤ija uɲana kaahab̤i kujɛhɔʃafati aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓam maɓahamɓɛ naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǃanawa akav̤uma ujɛhɔʃafati ujɛhɔʃafati kɔɔjisɛ waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa kɔɔjisɛ ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ujisɛ ujɛhɔram uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ uahaz̤ija uɲana kaahab̤i waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kumasirajɛli kwasamari nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kajɛhɔʃafati wakwajud̤a waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛmiɓini ɛnɡ̤ukumkani kwasirajɛli wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla kajisɛ nanɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɔnina nanɡ̤ɛnɮɛla kajarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kanɛb̤ati ɔwawɔnisajɔ amasirajɛli wakʰɔnz̤a ub̤ahali wakǃuɓud̤a kujɛ wamkǃumɓisa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ ujisɛ kɛ kalɔku amamɔwab̤i ak͡xɛkǃa kumasirajɛli ɛmv̤a kɔkufa kukaahab̤i uahaz̤ija ɛfɛstilɛni jɛɡ̤umɓi lakʰɛ ɛlipʰɛz̤ulu ɛlikwasamari waɬiwa kɛ watʰuma aɓatʰuɲwa watʰi kuɓɔ hamɓani nijɛ kuɓuz̤isa kub̤ahaliz̤ɛb̤ub̤i utʰikǁɔ wasɛɛk͡xɔn ukuɓa nd̤ija kupʰila kwɛsi sifɔ kɛ isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a sasitʰɛtʰilɛ kuɛlija wasɛtiʃb̤i satʰi suka uɲukɛ ujɛ kukʰawulɛla aɓatʰuɲwa ɓɔkumkani wakwasamari utʰɛtʰɛ kuɓɔ utʰi kunɡ̤ɔkuɓa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ tʰikǁɔ kwasirajɛli lɛ ntɔ nija kuɓuz̤isa kub̤ahaliz̤ɛb̤ub̤i utʰikǁɔ wasɛɛk͡xɔn nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi isiŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlɔ ɛsɔ uɲukɛ waja kusɔ akusaji kuɬa kusɔ inɛnɛ uja wahamɓa kɛ uɛlija ɓaɓuja aɓatʰuɲwa ɓɛz̤a kujɛ watʰi kuɓɔ jini ukuɓa niɓujɛ ɓatʰi kujɛ kuɲukɛ ind̤ɔd̤a jɛz̤a kusikʰawulɛla jatʰi kutʰi hamɓani niɓujɛ nijɛ lɔwɔ unitʰumilɛjɔ nitʰɛtʰɛ kujɛ nitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi kunɡ̤ɔkuɓa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ tʰikǁɔ kwasirajɛli lɛ ntɔ utʰumɛla ukuɓa kuɓuz̤iswɛ kub̤ahaliz̤ɛb̤ub̤i utʰikǁɔ wasɛɛk͡xɔn nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ isiŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlɔ ɛsɔ uɲukɛ waja kusɔ akusaji kuɬa kusɔ inɛnɛ uja watʰɛtʰa kuɓɔ watʰi iluɬɔɓɔ ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ iɲukilɛjɔ jɛz̤a kunikʰawulɛla jatʰɛtʰa lɔɔ maz̤wi ɓatʰi kujɛ jind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ikǁʰɔnti ɛb̤iŋǃɛ umb̤iŋǃɔ wɛntlɔnz̤ɛ ɛsiŋǃɛni sajɔ watʰi kɛ nɡ̤uɛlija wasɛtiʃb̤i ukumkani watʰumɛla kujɛ umtʰɛtʰɛlimaʃumimaɬanu ɛnamaʃumi ɔmaɬanu akʰɛ wɛɲuka wɛz̤a kujɛ nankɔ kɛ ɛɬɛli ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛntaɓa watʰɛtʰa kujɛ watʰi mfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ utʰɛ jiɬa wapʰɛnd̤ula uɛlija watʰi kumtʰɛtʰɛlimaʃumimaɬanu ukuɓa kɛ nd̤inɡ̤umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ makuɬɛ umlilɔ ɛz̤ulwini ukuɮɛ wɛna namaʃumi ɔmaɬanu akʰɔ kwɛɬa kɛ umlilɔ ɛz̤ulwini wamɮa jɛna namaʃumi ɔmaɬanu akʰɛ waɓuja wamtʰumɛla kujɛ ɔmɲɛ umtʰɛtʰɛlimaʃumimaɬanu ɛnamaʃumi ɔmaɬanu akʰɛ wɛɲuka watʰi kujɛ mfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ ut͡ʃɔ ukutʰi kʰawulɛz̤a uɬɛ wapʰɛnd̤ula uɛlija watʰi kuɓɔ ukuɓa kɛ nd̤inɡ̤umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ makuɬɛ umlilɔ ɛz̤ulwini ukuɮɛ wɛna namaʃumi ɔmaɬanu akʰɔ wɛɬa kɛ umlilɔ katʰikǁɔ ɛz̤ulwini wamɮa jɛna namaʃumi ɔmaɬanu akʰɛ waɓuja watʰuma ɔwɛsitʰatʰu umtʰɛtʰɛlimaʃumimaɬanu ɛnamaʃumi ɔmaɬanu akʰɛ wɛɲuka kɛ ɔwɛsitʰatʰu umtʰɛtʰɛlimaʃumimaɬanu waɡ̤ukǃa nɡ̤amad̤ɔlɔ pʰamɓi kɔɛlija wataxuz̤isa kujɛ watʰi kujɛ mfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ mawuŋǃaɓɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ nɔmpʰɛfumlɔ waɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ aɓamaʃumi maɬanu ujaɓɔna kwɛɬa umlilɔ ɛz̤ulwini waɓaɮa aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔɓaɓini ɓalɔɔ maʃumi anɡ̤amaɬanu kuɲɛ namaʃumi ɔmaɬanu aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ mawuŋǃaɓɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ satʰi isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a kuɛlija jiɬa najɛ ukumɔjika wɛsuka kɛ wɛɬa waja najɛ watʰi kujɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa utʰumɛlɛ aɓatʰuɲwa ɓɔkuɓuz̤isa kub̤ahaliz̤ɛb̤ub̤i utʰikǁɔ wasɛɛk͡xɔn kunɡ̤ɔkuɓa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ tʰikǁɔ kwasirajɛli kunɡ̤aɓuz̤iswa kujɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ isiŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlɔ ɛsɔ uɲukɛ waja kusɔ akusaji kuɬa kusɔ inɛnɛ uja wafa kɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɛlatʰɛtʰwa nɡ̤uɛlija ujɛhɔram waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsiɓini kajɛhɔram uɲana kajɛhɔʃafati wakwajud̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jɛna ɛɓɛnɡ̤ɛnaɲana ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikaahaz̤ija awaz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli kwatʰi ɛkuz̤a kumɲusɛni kukajɛhɔv̤a uɛlija nɡ̤ɔmɔja ɔv̤utʰuz̤ajɔ ukuɓa ajɛ ɛmaz̤ulwini waɓɛ uɛlija ɛhamɓa nɔɛliʃa ɓɛsuka ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali watʰi uɛlija kuɛliʃa kʰawuɬalɛ apʰa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a und̤itʰumɛ ɛb̤ɛtɛli watʰi uɛliʃa ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ and̤iji kwaɬukana nawɛ ɓɛɬa kɛ ɓaja ɛb̤ɛtɛli ɓapʰuma ɔɔɲana ɓaɓaprɔfɛti aɓaɓɛsɛb̤ɛtɛli ɓaja kuɛliʃa ɓatʰi kujɛ ujaz̤i kɔd̤wa ukuɓa nam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ ujajisusa ujɛhɔv̤a inkɔsi jakʰɔ ɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɔ watʰi nd̤ijajaz̤i lɔɔ ntɔ jitʰini kǀwaka watʰi uɛlija kujɛ ɛliʃa kʰawuɬalɛ apʰa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a und̤itʰumɛ ɛjɛrikɔ watʰi ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ and̤iji kwaɬukana nawɛ ɓanɡ̤ɛna kɛ ɛjɛrikɔ ɓɛz̤a ɔɔɲana ɓaɓaprɔfɛti aɓaɓɛsɛjɛrikɔ kuɛliʃa ɓatʰi kujɛ ujaz̤i kɔd̤wa ukuɓa nam̤la ujajisusa ujɛhɔv̤a inkɔsi jakʰɔ ɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɔ watʰi nd̤ijajaz̤i lɔɔ ntɔ jitʰini kǀwaka watʰi uɛlija kujɛ kʰawuɬalɛ apʰa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a und̤itʰumɛ ɛjɔrd̤an watʰi ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ and̤iji kwaɬukana nawɛ ɓahamɓa kɛ ɓɔɓaɓini kwahamɓa amad̤ɔd̤a amaʃumi maɬanu kɔɔɲana ɓaɓaprɔfɛti ɛma mɡ̤ama malunɡ̤a naɓɔ ɓɔna ɓɛma ɓɔɓaɓini nɡ̤asɛjɔrd̤an uɛlija wajitʰaɓatʰa inɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ ɛnkulu wajisɔnɡ̤a waɓɛtʰa nɡ̤ajɔ ɛmanz̤ini aɬuka asinɡ̤a nɡ̤apʰa nanɡ̤apʰa ɓawɛla ɓɔɓaɓini kɔmilɛ kwatʰi kǁa ɓawɛlilɛjɔ watʰi uɛlija kuɛliʃa kǀɛla intɔ nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛlɛ nd̤inɡ̤ɛkasuswa kuwɛ watʰi uɛliʃa mand̤iz̤uz̤ɛ iz̤aɬulɔ ɛz̤iɓini z̤ɔmɔja wakʰɔ watʰi ukǀɛlɛ intɔ ɛnz̤ima kɔd̤wa kɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ wand̤iɓɔna kuwɛ kɔɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuɓa akutʰanɡ̤a und̤iɓɔnɛ akuji kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ kwatʰi ɓɛsahamɓa ɓɛhamɓa ɓɛtʰɛtʰa kwaɓɔnakala iŋǃwɛlɔ jɔmlilɔ namahaʃɛ ɔmlilɔ jaɓaɬula ɓɔɓaɓini wɛɲuka uɛlija nɡ̤ɔmɔja ɔv̤utʰuz̤ajɔ waja ɛmaz̤ulwini uɛliʃa akukuɓɔna ɔkɔ wad̤and̤uluka watʰi ɓawɔ ɓawɔ ŋǃwɛlɔ jɔkulwa jakwasirajɛli naɓamahaʃɛ ajɔ akaɓa samɓɔna waz̤iɓamɓa ɛz̤akʰɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ waz̤ik͡xaz̤ula z̤az̤ikǃwɛnɡ̤a z̤iɓini wajikǀʰɔla inɡ̤uɓɔ ɛnkulu kaɛlija ɛjajiwɛ kujɛ waɓuja wɛma ɛluŋǁwɛmɛni lwɛjɔrd̤an wajitʰaɓatʰa inɡ̤uɓɔ ɛnkulu kaɛlija ɛjajiwɛ kujɛ waɓɛtʰa nɡ̤ajɔ ɛmanz̤ini watʰi upʰi ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kaɛlija jɛna kaɲɛ waɓɛtʰa kɛ ɛmanz̤ini aɬuka asinɡ̤a nɡ̤apʰa nanɡ̤apʰa wawɛla uɛliʃa ɓamɓɔna ɔɔɲana ɓaɓaprɔfɛti aɓaɓɛsɛjɛrikɔ malunɡ̤a najɛ ɓatʰi umɔja kaɛlija uɬɛli kuɛliʃa ɓaja kumkʰawulɛla ɓakǃuɓud̤a kujɛ ɓatʰi kujɛ jaɓɔna kukʰɔ kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ amad̤ɔd̤a amaʃumi maɬanu anɔɓuk͡xɔti makʰɛ ajɛ kujifuna inkɔsi jakʰɔ ukuɓa umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a akajifukulanɡ̤a wajipʰɔsa ɛntaɓɛni ɛtʰilɛ nɔkuɓa kusɛmfulɛni ɔtʰilɛ watʰi musani ukuwatʰuma ɓamd͡ʒ̤ɔka wad̤a wanɛɛntlɔni watʰi watʰumɛni ɓawatʰuma kɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amaʃumi maɬanu iint͡suku ɛz̤intatʰu aɓuja ɛz̤a kujɛ wajɛ ɛsɛjɛrikɔ watʰi kuwɔ nd̤iɓɛ nd̤inɡ̤at͡ʃɔnɡ̤ɔ ukutʰi musani ukuja atʰi amad̤ɔd̤a alɔɔ mz̤i kuɛliʃa ujaɓɔna kwalɔ mz̤i kuɬɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ iɓɔnajɔ inkɔsi jɛtʰu kɛ amanz̤i maɓi nalɔ m̤laɓa ntɔ watʰi nd̤iz̤isɛlɛni isitʲa ɛsit͡ʃa niɡ̤alɛlɛ itʲuwa kusɔ amz̤isɛla kɛ wapʰuma waja apʰɔ apʰuma kʰɔna amanz̤i wajiɡ̤alɛla kuwɔ itʲuwa watʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤iwapʰilisilɛ manz̤i akusaji kuɓa sapʰuma kuwɔ nakunɡ̤aniki apʰila kɛ amanz̤i lawɔ unanam̤la nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likaɛliʃa awalitʰɛtʰajɔ wɛɲuka apʰɔ waja ɛb̤ɛtɛli utʰɛ kǁa aɲuka nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla kwapʰuma usapʰɔ lwamɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛla lwatʰi kujɛ ɲuka ŋ̰ǃ̰ajind̤ini ɲuka ŋ̰ǃ̰ajind̤ini wab̤ɛka nɡ̤asɛmv̤a waluɓɔna walukǃalɛkisa ɛɡ̤amɛni likajɛhɔv̤a kwapʰuma iib̤ɛrɛkaz̤i z̤amɓini ɛɬatʰini z̤aɓakǃwɛnɡ̤a aɓantwana aɓamaʃumi manɛ anaɓaɓini kulɔ wɛsuka kʰɔna waja ɛntaɓɛni jɛkarmɛlɛ wɛsuka kʰɔna waɓujɛla kwasamari kɛ kalɔku ujɛhɔram uɲana kaahab̤i waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kumasirajɛli kwasamari nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ kajɛhɔʃafati wakwajud̤a waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛliʃumi ɛlinamiɓini ɛnɡ̤ukumkani wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a kɔd̤wa akaɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔjisɛ nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔnina kuɓa isimisɔ sɛlitʲɛ sikab̤ahali awasɛnz̤ajɔ ujisɛ kɔd̤wa kɛ wanamatʰɛla ɛz̤ɔnwɛni z̤ikajarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kanɛb̤ati awawɔnisa nɡ̤az̤ɔ amasirajɛli akatʲɛka kuz̤ɔ kɛ kalɔku umɛʃa wamamɔwab̤i uɓɛnɡ̤umfuji wɛɛɡ̤uʃa ɛmana ɛmɓujisɛla wakwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔɓɔja ɓɛkʰulu ɛɛmv̤ana nɛkʰulu ɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa kwatʰi kɛ uahab̤i wak͡xɛkǃa wamamɔwab̤i wamasirajɛli wapʰuma kɛ ujɛhɔram nɡ̤ajɔ lɔɔ kwasamari wawaɓala ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli waja watʰumɛla kujɛhɔʃafati wakwajud̤a ɛsitʰi uk͡xɛkǃilɛ wakwamɔwab̤i wɔhamɓa sijɛ namamɔwab̤i watʰi nd̤ɔɲuka nd̤ijɛ nd̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ und͡ʒ̤alɔ aɓantu ɓam ɓand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓand͡ʒ̤alɔ aɓantu ɓakʰɔ amahaʃɛ and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ and͡ʒ̤alɔ amahaʃɛ akʰɔ watʰi sɔɲuka nɡ̤ajipʰi inɮɛla watʰi nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɛpʰuma ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jakwaɛd̤ɔm wahamɓa kɛ wakwasirajɛli nɔkumkani wakwajud̤a nɔkumkani wakwaɛd̤ɔm ɓahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɛz̤unɡ̤ulɛz̤ajɔ iint͡suku ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ awaɓa namanz̤i umkʰɔsi kwanɛɛnkɔmɔ ɛɓɛz̤iɓaland̤ɛla watʰi wamasirajɛli jɛha ujɛhɔv̤a uɓaɓiz̤ɛlɛ aɓa ɓatʰatʰu ukuɓa aɓanikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sikamɔwab̤i watʰi ujɛhɔʃafati akukʰɔ mprɔfɛti kajɛhɔv̤a apʰa siɓuz̤isɛ kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ajɛ wapʰɛnd̤ula ɔmɲɛ waɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɔkumkani wakwasirajɛli watʰi ukʰɔ apʰa uɛliʃa uɲana kaʃafati ɔɓɛɡ̤alɛla amanz̤i ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤ikaɛlija watʰi ujɛhɔʃafati iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a linajɛ ɓɛɬa kɛ ɓaja kujɛ wakwasirajɛli nɔjɛhɔʃafati nɔkumkani wakwaɛd̤ɔm watʰi kɛ uɛliʃa wamasirajɛli jintɔni ɛnam nawɛ hamɓa ujɛ kuɓaprɔfɛti ɓakajiɬɔ nakuɓaprɔfɛti ɓakaɲɔkɔ watʰi wakwasirajɛli kujɛ haji nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uɓaɓiz̤ɛlɛ aɓa ɓatʰatʰu ukuɓa aɓanikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sikamɔwab̤i watʰi uɛliʃa ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ɛnd̤imi pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ nd̤inɡ̤ɛ nd̤inɡ̤akub̤ɛki nd̤ikuɓɔnɛ kɔkɔ ɓɛnd̤iɬɔnɛlɛ ujɛhɔʃafati wakwajud̤a nd̤iz̤isɛlɛni kɛ nɡ̤ɔku umɓɛtʰiluhad̤i kwatʰi kǁa umɓɛtʰiluhad̤i lɔ aluɓɛtʰajɔ samfikɛla isanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a watʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi sɛnz̤ɛni ɛsi siɬamɓɔ siz̤alɛ jimisɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi aniji kuɓɔna mɔja aniji kuɓɔna mv̤ula ɛsi siɬamɓɔ kɛ sija kuz̤ala amanz̤i nisɛlɛ nɛmiɬamɓi jɛnu namakǃɛɡ̤u ɛnu lɔɔ ntɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a uja kuwanikɛla namamɔwab̤i ɛsanɮɛni sɛnu nɔjikǁaɓɛla jɔnkɛ imiz̤i ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ nɛmiz̤i jɔnkɛ ɛɲuliwɛjɔ nijiwisɛ jɔnkɛ imitʰi ɛmiɬɛ nijid̤iɓɛlɛlɛ jɔnkɛ imitʰɔmɓɔ jamanz̤i niwɔnakalisɛ ɔnkɛ amaɬɛ nɡ̤amatʲɛ kwatʰi kǁa kuɲuswa umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa nankɔ kusiz̤a amanz̤i ɛv̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jakwaɛd̤ɔm iliz̤wɛ laz̤ala amanz̤i ɛv̤a kɛ ɔnkɛ amamɔwab̤i ukuɓa ɓɛɲukilɛ ɔɔkumkani ɓɛsiz̤a nawɔ aɬaɓa umkʰɔsi kwintanɡ̤a jɔnkɛ ɛkǁʰɔɓajɔ nɛnɡ̤apʰɛz̤ulu ɛma ɛmd̤ɛni av̤uka ilanɡ̤a litʰɛ kǀʰapʰa ɛmanz̤ini amamɔwab̤i awaɓɔna amanz̤i pʰamɓi kwawɔ ɛɓɔmv̤u nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɡ̤az̤i atʰi liɡ̤az̤i lɛ ntɔ ɔɔkumkani ɓakǀʰitʰɛnɛ ɓɔd̤wa ɓaɓulalana nalɔ kɛ ikǁʰɔɓa mɔwab̤i afika kɛ ɛmkʰɔsini wakwasirajɛli amasirajɛli awakǁaɓɛla amamɔwab̤i asaɓa wɔna ɛɓuswɛni ɓawɔ alinɡ̤ɛnɛla iliz̤wɛ ɛhamɓa ɛwakǁaɓɛla amamɔwab̤i ɓajiɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ula nɛmiz̤i ɛmasimini ɔnkɛ amaɬɛ ɛlɔwɔ wapʰɔsa ilitʲɛ lakʰɛ ɓawaz̤alisa ɓajid̤iɓɛlɛla jɔnkɛ imitʰɔmɓɔ jamanz̤i ɓajiwisa jɔnkɛ imitʰi ɛmiɬɛ kwad̤a ɛkixarɛʃɛtɛ amatʲɛ ajɔ ɔd̤wa ɓajixawula aɓasawuli ɓat͡ʃɔ kujɔ waɓɔna wamamɔwab̤i ukuɓa imkʰulɛlɛ watʰaɓatʰɛla kujɛ amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ axɔla ik͡xɛlɛ ukuɓa atʰʲud̤isɛ ab̤ɛkɛ wakwaɛd̤ɔm akaɓa nakɔ watʰaɓatʰa uɲana wakʰɛ wamaz̤iɓulɔ ɔɓɛja kuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ wamɲusa waɓa lid̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a afikɛlwa ɓuɓuxalaxumɛ ɔɓukʰulu amasirajɛli aŋǀɔtʰuka kujɛ aɓujɛla ɛz̤wɛni lawɔ kɛ kalɔku umfaz̤i ɔtʰilɛ kuɓafaz̤i ɓɔɔɲana ɓaɓaprɔfɛti wakʰala kuɛliʃa ɛsitʰi umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ind̤ɔd̤a jam ifilɛ ujaz̤i wɛna ukuɓa umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔwɔ ɛɓɛmɔjika ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ umɓɔlɛkimali uz̤ɛ kuɓatʰaɓatʰɛla kujɛ ɔɔɲana ɓam ɓɔɓaɓini ukuɓa ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤amakʰɔɓɔka watʰi uɛliʃa kujɛ nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛlɛ ntɔni nd̤ikǁɛlɛlɛ unantɔni ɛnɮwini watʰi umkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ akanantɔ ɛnɮwini kupʰɛla liɡ̤uɓu lɛɔli watʰi hamɓa ujɛ kuz̤iɓɔlɛkɛla iz̤itʲa nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kuɓamɛlwanɛ ɓakʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ iz̤itʲa ɛz̤iz̤ɛ z̤inɡ̤aɓi mɓalwa unɡ̤ɛnɛ uz̤iv̤alɛlɛ wɛna nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ utʰululɛlɛ kwɛz̤ɔ z̤itʲa z̤ɔnkɛ uz̤iʃɛŋǁisɛ ɛz̤iz̤ɛlɛjɔ wɛmka kɛ kujɛ waz̤iv̤alɛla jɛna nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓɛz̤isa kujɛ ɓɔna watʰulula jɛna kwatʰi z̤akuz̤ala iz̤itʲa watʰi kuɲana wakʰɛ z̤isa ɛsiɲɛ isitʲa watʰi jɛna kujɛ akusɛkʰɔ sitʲa jaŋǃamka kɛ iɔli waja wakǁɛlɛla umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ watʰi jɛna hamɓa ujɛ kutʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɛɔli lɛjɔ uɬawulɛ itʲala lakʰɔ upʰilɛ wɛna nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛsɛlɛjɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤am̤la utʰilɛ uɛliʃa waɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛla ɛʃunɛm apʰɔ kwajɛ kukʰɔ intɔkaz̤i ɛlinɔnɔkaz̤i jamz̤ama ukuɓa aɮɛ isɔnka uɓɛsitʰi kǁa aɡ̤ǃ̤itʰajɔ apʰamɓukɛlɛ kʰɔna ukuɓa aɮɛ isɔnka jatʰi ɛnd̤ɔd̤ɛni jajɔ ujaɓɔna kɛ nd̤ijakǃɔnd̤a ukuɓa lɔ mfɔ uŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ wakwatʰikǁɔ ɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa apʰa masɛnz̤ɛ ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni iɡ̤und͡ʒ̤ana ɛlipʰɛz̤ulu simɓɛkɛlɛ kʰɔna isiŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlɔ nɛtafilɛ nɛsiɬalɔ nɛsiɓanɛ anɡ̤ɛnɛ kʰɔna akupʰamɓukɛla kutʰi kwatʰi nɡ̤am̤la utʰilɛ waja kʰɔna wapʰamɓukɛla ɛɡ̤umɓini ɛlɔ lipʰɛz̤ulu kʰɔna watʰi kuɡ̤ɛhaz̤i wakwakʰɛ ɓiz̤a lɔ mʃunɛmɛkaz̤i wamɓiz̤a wɛma pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ watʰi kujɛ kʰawutʰi kujɛ ujaɓɔna usiɲamɛkɛlɛ nɡ̤ajɔ jɔnkɛ lɛ ɲamɛkɔ unɡ̤a unɡ̤ɛnz̤ɛlwa ntɔni kɛ unɛliz̤wi ɔnɡ̤alɛnz̤ɛlwajɔ nɔkuɓa kukumtʰɛtʰɛlimkʰɔsi watʰi jɛna nd̤iɬɛli pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu watʰi makɛnz̤ɛlwɛ ntɔni watʰi uɡ̤ɛhaz̤i iɲanisɔ akanaɲana ind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ jalupʰɛlɛ watʰi mɓiz̤ɛ wamɓiz̤a wɛma ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ watʰi majɛla nɛli kǁɛʃa ɲakɛɲɛ uja kusinɡ̤atʰa uɲana watʰi jɛna musa nkɔsi jam mfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ ukutʰɛtʰa amanɡ̤a kumkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ wamitʰa kɛ lɔɔ mfaz̤i waz̤ala uɲana nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa limisiwɛjɔ laɲakɛɲɛ aɓɛlitʰɛtʰilɛ uɛliʃa kujɛ wakʰula kwatʰi nɡ̤am̤la utʰilɛ wapʰuma waja kujisɛ kuɓav̤uni watʰi kujisɛ intlɔkɔ jam intlɔkɔ jam watʰi mtʰwalɛ umsɛ wamtʰwala waɬala ɛmatʰanɡ̤ɛni akʰɛ kwad̤a kwasɛmini ɛnkulu wakǃʰawuka kɛ wɛɲuka ɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlwɛni sɔmfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ wamv̤alɛla wapʰuma waɓiz̤a ind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ watʰi kʰawund̤itʰumɛlɛ ɔmɲɛ wakuɓafana nɛɲɛ jɛɛmaz̤i z̤amaɛsilɛ kʰɛ nd̤itʰi ɡ̤ǁ̤ad̤a nd̤ijɛ kumfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ nd̤iɓujɛ nd̤iɓujɛ watʰi jɛna jini ukuɓa uhamɓɛ ujɛ kujɛ nam̤la akutʰwasɛ ɲanɡ̤a asijisaɓatʰa watʰi jɛna kulunɡ̤ilɛ wajiɓɔpʰa imaz̤i jɛɛsilɛ watʰi lɔwɔ kǃʰuɓa uhamɓɛ ukuz̤iɓamɓɛz̤ɛla ɛkukʰwɛlɛni nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam nd̤iɡ̤at͡ʃɔnɡ̤a kuwɛ wahamɓa wad̤a wɛz̤a kumfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ ɛntaɓɛni jɛkarmɛlɛ waz̤a umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ akumɓɔna ɛsɛkud̤ɛ watʰi kuɡ̤ɛhaz̤i nankuja mʃunɛmɛkaz̤i kʰawuɡ̤id̤imɛ nɡ̤ɔku umkʰawulɛlɛ utʰi kujɛ uɬɛli kakuɬɛ iɬɛli kakuɬɛ ind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɔ uɬɛli kakuɬɛ watʰi kusaɬɛliwɛ kakuɬɛ akufika kumfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ ɛntaɓɛni wamɓamɓa nɡ̤ɛɛɲawɔ wasɔnd̤ɛla uɡ̤ɛhaz̤i ukuɓa amsund̤uz̤ɛ watʰi umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ mjɛkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ uk͡xak͡xa ujɛhɔv̤a und̤ifiɬɛlɛ akand̤ikǁɛlɛla watʰi nd̤akʰa nd̤akǀɛla uɲana jini ɛnkɔsini jam nd̤and̤inɡ̤at͡ʃɔnɡ̤ɔ jini ukutʰi uz̤ɛ unɡ̤and̤ilaɬɛkisi watʰi kuɡ̤ɛhaz̤i b̤iŋǃa isiŋǃɛ sakʰɔ upʰatʰɛ umsimɛlɛlɔ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ uhamɓɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ wakǃuɓisana nɔmntu uz̤ɛ unɡ̤amɓulisi ukuɓa utʰɛ wakuɓulisa uz̤ɛ unɡ̤ampʰɛnd̤uli uz̤ɛ uwuɓɛkɛ umsimɛlɛlɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔɓusɔ ɓɛnkwɛnkwɛ lɛjɔ watʰi wɛnkwɛnkwɛ ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ and̤iji kwaɬukana nawɛ wɛsuka kɛ wamland̤ɛla uɡ̤ɛhaz̤i waɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛla pʰamɓili kuɓɔ wawuɓɛka umsimɛlɛlɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔɓusɔ ɓɛnkwɛnkwɛ akwaɓakʰɔ liz̤wi akwaɓakʰɔ kuʃukuma waɓuja waja kumkʰawulɛla wamkǁɛlɛla watʰi inkwɛnkwɛ ajiv̤ukanɡ̤a wafika uɛliʃa ɛnɮwini nant͡sɔ inkwɛnkwɛ ifilɛ ilɛlɛ ɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlwɛni sakʰɛ wanɡ̤ɛna waluv̤ala ukǀanɡ̤ɔ ɓɛɓɔɓaɓini watʰand̤az̤a kujɛhɔv̤a wɛɲuka pʰɛz̤u kɔmntwana lɔwɔ waɓɛka umlɔmɔ wakʰɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɛ pʰɛz̤u kwamɛɬɔ akʰɛ iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ waz̤ɔlula pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ jafud̤umala iɲama jɔmntwana waɓuja wahamɓa ɛnɮwini wasinɡ̤a nɡ̤apʰa kwakaɲɛ wasinɡ̤a nɡ̤apʰa kwakaɲɛ wɛɲuka waz̤ɔlula pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ jatʰimla inkwɛnkwɛ iz̤iɬanɮɔ ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ jawav̤ula inkwɛnkwɛ amɛɬɔ ajɔ waɓiz̤a uɡ̤ɛhaz̤i watʰi ɓiz̤a mʃunɛmɛkaz̤i wamɓiz̤a wɛz̤a kɛ kujɛ watʰi mtʰaɓatʰɛ uɲana wakʰɔ wɛz̤a waz̤ipʰɔsa ɛz̤iɲawɛni z̤akʰɛ wakǃuɓud̤a kujɛ wamtʰaɓatʰa uɲana wakʰɛ wapʰuma kɛ kalɔku uɛliʃa waɓuja waja ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali kwakukʰɔ inɮala ɛliz̤wɛni ɔɔɲana ɓaɓaprɔfɛti ɓaɓɛɬɛli pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ watʰi lɔwɔ ɓɛka imɓiz̤a ɛnkulu ɛz̤ikɔ uɓapʰɛkɛlɛ ukuɮa ɔɔɲana ɓaɓaprɔfɛti wapʰuma ɔmɲɛ waja imifunɔ ɛnɮɛ utʰanɡ̤az̤ana wakʰa amatʰanɡ̤az̤ana kulɔ jaz̤ala inɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ wafika wawakǁaɓɛlɛla ɛmɓiz̤ɛni jɔkupʰɛka nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤awaz̤i ɓawapʰakɛla amad̤ɔd̤a ukuɓa aɮɛ kwatʰi kǁa akuɮajɔ ɔkɔ kuɮa akʰala wɔna atʰi mfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ kukʰɔ ɛmɓiz̤ɛni lɛ akaɓa nakɔ ukukuɮa watʰi jiz̤ani nɔmɡ̤uɓɔ wawuɡ̤alɛla ɛmɓiz̤ɛni watʰi ɓapʰakɛlɛ aɓantu ɓaɮɛ akwaɓakʰɔ ntɔ imɓi ɛmɓiz̤ɛni kwav̤ɛla ind̤ɔd̤a ɛb̤ahaliʃaliʃa jamz̤isɛla umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ ukuɮa ɔkut͡ʃa iz̤ɔnka z̤ɛxasi ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini namakʰwɛɓa ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwɛni jakʰɛ watʰi nika aɓantu ɓaɮɛ watʰi umlunɡ̤isɛlɛli wakʰɛ nd̤ɔtʰini ukukuɓɛka ɔku pʰamɓi kwɛkʰulu lamad̤ɔd̤a watʰi nika aɓantu ɓaɮɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɓaja kuɮa ɓad̤ɛ ɓakuʃijɛ waɓɛka kɛ pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ ɓaɮa ɓakuʃija nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kɛ kalɔku unahaman umtʰɛtʰɛlimkʰɔsi wɔkumkani wakwaaram wajɛ ɛjind̤ɔd̤a ɛnkulu ɛnkɔsini jakʰɛ ɛɓɛkɛkilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a wajɛwanikɛ amaaram usind̤isɔ nɡ̤ajɛ lɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤a jaɓɛ iliɡ̤ɔxa ilik͡xɔti kɔd̤wa inɛkǃʰɛŋǃa amaaram ajɛpʰumɛ aja atʰimɓa ɛz̤wɛni lakwasirajɛli intɔmɓaz̤ana jasisikǀakakaz̤i kumkanahaman jatʰi kwinkɔsikaz̤i jajɔ akwaɓa inkɔsi jam lɛ iɓipʰamɓi kɔmprɔfɛti ɔkwasamari uɓɛja kujipʰilisa ɛkǃʰɛŋǃɛni lajɔ waja wajikǁɛlɛla inkɔsi jakʰɛ watʰi itʰɛ jatʰi jatʰi ukutʰɛtʰa intɔmɓi ɛv̤ɛla ɛz̤wɛni lakwasirajɛli watʰi wamaaram hamɓa ujɛ nd̤ɔmtʰumɛla iŋǀwad̤i wakwasirajɛli wahamɓa wapʰatʰa ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ iʃumi lɛɛtalɛntɛ z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ amatʰand̤atʰu ɛɛʃɛkɛlɛ z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛʃumi lɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɔkukʰululana wajiz̤isa iŋǀwad̤i wakwasirajɛli isitʰi kalɔku kɛ ɛkufikɛni kwalɛ ŋǀwad̤i kuwɛ jaɓɔna nd̤ikutʰumɛlɛ unahaman umkʰɔnz̤i ukuɓa umpʰilisɛ ɛkǃʰɛŋǃɛni lakʰɛ kwatʰi akujilɛsa wakwasirajɛli iŋǀwad̤i waz̤ik͡xaz̤ula iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛsitʰi nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ jini ukuɓa nd̤iɓulalɛ nɔkuɓa nd̤ipʰilisɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lɔ utʰumɛlɛ ukuɓa nd̤ipʰilisɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛkǃʰɛŋǃɛni lajɔ kʰanɡ̤ɛlani kɛ niɓɔnɛ kwakʰɛ isiz̤atʰu sɔkukǁaɓana kwatʰi akuv̤a uɛliʃa umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ ukuɓa wakwasirajɛli uz̤ik͡xaz̤ulɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ watʰumɛla watʰi uz̤ik͡xaz̤ulɛlɛ ntɔni iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɔ makɛz̤ɛ az̤i ukuɓa kukʰɔ umprɔfɛti kwasirajɛli wɛz̤a unahaman namahaʃɛ akʰɛ nɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ ɛnɮwini kaɛliʃa uɛliʃa watʰuma umtʰuɲwa kujɛ ɛsitʰi jija uɬamɓɛ iz̤iɬanɮɔ ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛjɔrd̤an iɓujɛlɛ kuwɛ iɲama jakʰɔ uɬamɓulukɛ waɓa nɔɓuxalaxumɛ unahaman wɛmka watʰi ɓɔnani ɓɛnd̤iɓa wɔpʰuma ɛz̤ɛ ɛmɛ aŋǃulɛ iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ awanɡ̤awanɡ̤isɛ isanɮa sakʰɛ pʰɛz̤u kwalɛ nd̤awɔ alisusɛ ikǃʰɛŋǃa iab̤ana nɛfarparɛ imilamɓɔ jasɛd̤amaskɔ ajilunɡ̤ilɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwamanz̤i ɔnkɛ akwasirajɛli and̤inɡ̤ɛɬamɓi kujɔ nd̤iɬamɓulukɛ wad͡ʒ̤ika wahamɓa ɛnɡ̤umlilɔ ɓafika aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓatʰɛtʰa najɛ ɓatʰi ɓawɔ ukuɓa umprɔfɛti uɓɛtʰɛtʰɛ intɔ ɛnkulu kuwɛ uɓunɡ̤aji kujɛnz̤a jini kanɡ̤akanani kɛ kǁa atʰi kuwɛ ɬamɓa uɬamɓulukɛ wɛɬa kɛ wantʲwila iz̤iɬanɮɔ ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛjɔrd̤an nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi lɔmfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ jaɓuja kɛ iɲama jakʰɛ jand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɲama jɔmntwana waɬamɓuluka waɓujɛla kumfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ jɛna nɛsiɬwɛlɛ sakʰɛ sɔnkɛ wɛz̤a wɛma pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ watʰi ujaɓɔna nd̤ijakǃɔnd̤a nɡ̤ɔku ukuɓa akukʰɔ tʰikǁɔ ɛɬaɓatʰini lɔnkɛ kukwasirajɛli kɔd̤wa kalɔku kʰawamkɛlɛ int͡sikɛlɛlɔ kumkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ watʰi jɛna ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnd̤imi pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ and̤iji kujamkɛla wamd͡ʒ̤ɔka ukuɓa ajamkɛlɛ akav̤uma watʰi unahaman umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ akanɡ̤ɛkʰɛ anikwɛ kɛ um̤laɓa ɔnɡ̤umtʰwalɔ wɔɔnɮɛɓɛnd̤ɛ aɓaɓini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ akasaji kuɓa sɛnz̤a d̤ini liɲukajɔ namɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ tʰikǁwɛni ɓamɓi uja kwɛnz̤a kujɛhɔv̤a jɛd̤wa kulɛ ntɔ ujɛhɔv̤a az̤ɛ amkǁɔlɛlɛ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ jakunɡ̤ɛna inkɔsi jam ɛnɮwini karimɔn ukuɓa ikǃuɓud̤ɛ kʰɔna jajamɛ ɛsanɮɛni nd̤akǃuɓud̤a ɛnɮwini karimɔn ɛkukǃuɓud̤ɛni kɛ ɛnɮwini karimɔn az̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a amkǁɔlɛlɛ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ kulɔɔ ntɔ watʰi kujɛ hamɓa unɔkǁɔlɔ wɛmka kujɛ wɛɛ kǃɛlɛlɛ umɡ̤aɲana watʰi uɡ̤ɛhaz̤i umkʰɔnz̤i kaɛliʃa umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ jaɓɔna inkɔsi jam imjɛkilɛ unahaman umaram lɔ ajajamkɛla ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ intɔ aɓɛjiz̤isilɛ ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a inɛnɛ nd̤ija kumsukɛla nd̤itʰaɓatʰɛ kujɛ uɡ̤ɛhaz̤i wampʰutʰuma unahaman unahaman wamɓɔna ɛmsukɛla wɛɬa ɛŋǃwɛlwɛni jakʰɛ ɛja kumkʰawulɛla watʰi kuɬɛ ntɔni watʰi akukʰɔ ntɔ inkɔsi jam ind̤itʰumilɛ isitʰi nanku kufikɛ nɡ̤ɔku amad̤ɔd̤ana amaɓini akɔɔɲana ɓaɓaprɔfɛti ɛv̤ɛla kwɛlɛɛntaɓa lakwaɛfrajim kʰawuwanikɛ italɛntɛ jɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤imɓini z̤ɔkukʰululana watʰi unahaman makukʰɔlɛkɛ kuwɛ ukutʰaɓatʰa z̤iɓɛ mɓini iitalɛntɛ wamd͡ʒ̤ɔka waɓɔpʰa iitalɛntɛ z̤amɓini z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwɛni ɛz̤imɓini nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤imɓini z̤ɔkukʰululana aɓafana aɓaɓini ɓatʰwala pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ utʰɛ ɛnd̤ulini waz̤itʰaɓatʰa ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤aɓɔ waz̤iɓɛka ɛnɮwini wawand̤ulula amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ ɛmka waja wɛma pʰamɓi kwɛnkɔsi jakʰɛ watʰi uɛliʃa kujɛ uv̤ɛla pʰi ɡ̤ɛhaz̤i watʰi uɓɛnɡ̤ajanɡ̤a nd̤awɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ watʰi kujɛ intliz̤ijɔ jam ajihamɓanɡ̤a nawɛ jini ɔkuja jad͡ʒ̤ikajɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛŋǃwɛlwɛni jajɔ jɛz̤a kukukʰawulɛla likǁɛʃa jini ɛli lɔkwamkɛla isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛlɔkwamkɛla iinɡ̤uɓɔ nɛmiŋǃuma nɛz̤id̤ilija nɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ naɓakʰɔnz̤i naɓakʰɔnz̤az̤ana ikǃʰɛŋǃa likanahaman malinamatʰɛlɛ kuwɛ nakwimɓɛwu jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ wapʰuma ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ ɛnɛkǃʰɛŋǃa ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkʰɛpʰu ɓatʰi ɔɔɲana ɓaɓaprɔfɛti kuɛliʃa kʰawuɓɔnɛ lɛ nd̤awɔ siɬɛli kujɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ sikǁinɛnɛ kujɔ makʰɛ sijɛ ɛjɔrd̤an siz̤itʰaɓatʰɛlɛ kʰɔna ɛlɔwɔ umkǃad̤i uɓɛ mɲɛ siz̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ kʰɔna ind̤awɔ jɔkuɬala watʰi jijani watʰi ɔmɲɛ makukʰɔlɛkɛ kuwɛ ukuhamɓa naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ watʰi nd̤ija kuhamɓa wahamɓa naɓɔ ɓatʰi ɓakufika ɛjɔrd̤an ɓaɡ̤awula imitʰi kwatʰi ɔmɲɛ ɛwisa umkǃad̤i int͡simɓi jɛjɛla ɛmanz̤ini wakʰala watʰi jɔɔ nkɔsi jam iɓiɓɔlɛkiwɛ watʰi umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ iwɛ pʰi wamɓɔnisa lɔɔ nd̤awɔ waŋǃumla ulutʰi walupʰɔsa kʰɔna jad̤ad̤a int͡simɓi watʰi jitʰaɓatʰɛ wasɔlula isanɮa sakʰɛ wajitʰaɓatʰa kɛ kalɔku wamaaram wajɛsilwa namasirajɛli wakǀɛɓisana naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɛsitʰi kuja kuɓa sɛkutʰini nasɛkutʰini apʰɔ nd̤ɔlalisa kʰɔna watʰumɛla umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ wakwasirajɛli ɛsitʰi z̤iɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ unɡ̤ɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰi nd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa amaaram ɛɬa kʰɔna ukumkani wamasirajɛli watʰumɛla kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ aɓɛmkǁɛlɛlɛ jɔna umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ ɛmɓɔnisa waz̤ikʰusɛla kʰɔna akwaɓa kaɲɛ nakaɓini jab̤ab̤ama intliz̤ijɔ jɔkumkani wakwaaram jilɔɔ ntɔ waɓiz̤a aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ watʰi kuɓɔ anind̤ikǁɛlɛli ukuɓa nɡ̤uɓani kutʰi apʰa ɔnɡ̤akukumkani wakwasirajɛli watʰi ɔmɲɛ wakuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ asisitʰi nkɔsi jam kɛ nɡ̤uɛliʃa umprɔfɛti ɔkwasirajɛli ɔkǁɛlɛla wamasirajɛli amaz̤wi ɔwatʰɛtʰa usɛnɡ̤ɔnt͡sini jakʰɔ jɔkulala watʰi jijani nikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ apʰɔ akʰɔna nd̤itʰumɛlɛ nd̤imtʰaɓatʰɛ wakǁɛlɛlwa kwatʰiwa nankɔ ɛd̤ɔtan watʰumɛla kʰɔna amahaʃɛ nɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa nɛmpi ɛninz̤i ɓaja ɛɓusuku ɓawuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a umz̤i wav̤uka umlunɡ̤isɛlɛli wɔmfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ wɛsuka wapʰuma nant͡sɔ iwud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛ umz̤i inamahaʃɛ nɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa watʰi lɔwɔ kujɛ jɔɔ nkɔsi jam sija kutʰini watʰi jɛna musa ukɔjika nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaninz̤i aɓanɡ̤akutʰi nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓanɡ̤akuɓɔ watʰand̤az̤a uɛliʃa watʰi jɛhɔv̤a kʰawuwav̤ulɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɛ aɓɔnɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wawav̤ula amɛɬɔ ɔmfana lɔwɔ waɓɔna nant͡sɔ intaɓa iz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤amahaʃɛ nɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa z̤ɔmlilɔ z̤imd͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛ uɛliʃa ɓɛɬa ɓaja kujɛ watʰand̤az̤a uɛliʃa kujɛhɔv̤a watʰi kʰawuluɓɛtʰɛ ɔlu ɬanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔɓumfama waɓaɓɛtʰa kɛ nɡ̤ɔɓumfama nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likaɛliʃa watʰi uɛliʃa kuɓɔ asijijɔ inɮɛla lɛ asinɡ̤uwɔ umz̤i lɔ nd̤iland̤ɛlɛni nd̤inisɛ kulɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤a nijifunajɔ waɓasa kwasamari kwatʰi ɓakufika kwasamari watʰi uɛliʃa jɛhɔv̤a wav̤ulɛ amɛɬɔ aɓa ɓantu ɓaɓɔnɛ wawav̤ula ujɛhɔv̤a amɛɬɔ aɓɔ ɓaɓɔna nanku ɓɛpʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i wakwasamari watʰi wakwasirajɛli kuɛliʃa akuɓaɓɔna nd̤iɓakǁaɓɛlɛ nd̤iɓakǁaɓɛlɛ ɓawɔ watʰi jɛna uz̤ɛ unɡ̤aɓakǁaɓɛli ɔɓatʰimɓilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ lakʰɔ nɛsapʰɛtʰa sakʰɔ uɓunɡ̤aɓakǁaɓɛlajɔ ɓɛka isɔnka namanz̤i pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ ɓaɮɛ ɓasɛlɛ ɓahamɓɛ ɓajɛ ɛnkɔsini jaɓɔ waɓɛnz̤ɛla isiɮɔ ɛsikʰulu ɓaɮa ɓasɛla waɓand̤ulula ɓahamɓa ɓaja ɛnkɔsini jaɓɔ akaɓa sapʰind̤a amaaram ukulinɡ̤ɛna iliz̤wɛ lamasirajɛli kwatʰi ɛmv̤a kɔkɔ wajiɬanɡ̤anisa ub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ wakwaaram jɔnkɛ jakʰɛ wɛɲuka wawuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a umz̤i wakwasamari kwaɓakʰɔ kɛ inɮala ɛnkulu kwasamari jaɓɔna ɓawuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a kɛ jad̤a intlɔkɔ jɛɛsilɛ jatʰɛnɡ̤iswa nɡ̤amaʃumi ɔsib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɛɛʃɛkɛlɛ z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛsaɬulɔ sɛsinɛ sɛkab̤ɛ jɛnɮɛlɔ jamav̤ukutʰu saɓa sisiɬanu sɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ kwatʰi ɛɮula wakwasirajɛli pʰɛz̤u kɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a intɔkaz̤i jamɛmɛz̤a kujɛ isitʰi sind̤isa nkɔsi jam watʰi jɛna ɛnɡ̤akusind̤isi nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ɔkusind̤isa nɡ̤antɔni nɡ̤ɛsand̤a nɡ̤ɛsikǁɔv̤ulɛlɔ sɛd̤ilija watʰi kujɔ uɬɛlwɛ jintɔni watʰi lɔ mfaz̤i utʰɛ nd̤inikɛ uɲana wakʰɔ siɮɛ jɛna nam̤la siɮɛ uɲana nɡ̤ɔmsɔ sampʰɛka kɛ uɲana samɮa nd̤atʰi kujɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la ɔland̤ɛlajɔ ɛtʰɛ uɲana wakʰɔ simɮɛ wamz̤imɛz̤a uɲana wakʰɛ kwatʰi akuwɛv̤a amaz̤wi ɛntɔkaz̤i lɛjɔ waz̤ik͡xaz̤ula iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ wajɛɮula pʰɛz̤u kɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a ɓakʰanɡ̤ɛla aɓantu nankɔ ɛnɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwɛz̤iɲɛ ɛɲamɛni jakʰɛ watʰi makɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ utʰikǁɔ akǃɔkɛlɛ ukwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓa intlɔkɔ kaɛliʃa uɲana kaʃafati ija pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ nam̤la uɛliʃa kɛ uɓɛɬɛli ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ɛɓɛɬɛli najɛ ukumkani watʰuma ind̤ɔd̤a ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ ɛnɡ̤ɛkafiki umtʰuɲwa lɔwɔ kujɛ watʰi jɛna kumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu nijaɓɔna ukuɓɔ lɔ ɲana wɔmɓulali utʰumɛlɛ ukuɓa nd̤isuswɛ intlɔkɔ nijaɓɔna umtʰuɲwa lɔwɔ luv̤alɛni ukǀanɡ̤ɔ nimtʰʲalɛ nɡ̤ɔkǀanɡ̤ɔ nasɔ isiŋ̤ǃ̤i sɛɛɲawɔ z̤ɛnkɔsi jakʰɛ sisɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ ɛsatʰɛtʰa nawɔ nankɔ umtʰuɲwa lɔ ɛsiɬa ɛsiz̤a kujɛ watʰi jaɓɔna ɔɓu ɓuɓi ɓupʰuma kujɛhɔv̤a nd̤isamlind̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ani ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi uɛliʃa liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɛli kǁa nɡ̤ɔmsɔ isɛha jɔmɡ̤uɓɔ ɔkǀɔliwɛjɔ jɔɓa jiʃɛkɛlɛ nɛɛsɛha z̤ɔmɓini z̤ɛxasi z̤ɔɓa jiʃɛkɛlɛ ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lakwasamari wampʰɛnd̤ula umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ umpʰatʰimkʰɔsi aɓɛsajama ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ watʰi jaɓɔna kʰɔna ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a wɛnz̤ɛ iifɛstilɛ ɛz̤ulwini inɡ̤aɓakʰɔ lɔɔ ntɔ watʰi jɛna kʰanɡ̤ɛla uja kujiɓɔna lɔɔ ntɔ nɡ̤amɛɬɔ akʰɔ unɡ̤aɮi kujɔ kɛ kalɔku kwakukʰɔ amad̤ɔd̤a amanɛ anɛkǃʰɛŋǃa nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ jatʰi ɛɲɛ kwɛɲɛ siɬalɛlɛni apʰa sid̤ɛ sifɛ ukuɓa sitʰɛ masinɡ̤ɛnɛ kulɔ mz̤i kukʰɔ inɮala kuwɔ umz̤i lɔ sija kʰɔna ukuɓa sitʰɛ saɬala apʰa sija kalɔku kɛ masihamɓɛ siz̤ilaɬɛlɛ ɛmkʰɔsini wamaaram ukuɓa atʰɛ asisind̤isa sɔɮa uɓɔmi ukuɓa atʰɛ asiɓulala haji kɛ sija asuka nɡ̤ɔŋ̤ǀ̤walaz̤i aja ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni jamaaram ad̤a ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiŋǃuɓa jamaaram jini lɛ kusɛŋǁiwɛni kuɓa inkɔsi jajiwɛnz̤ɛ umkʰɔsi wamaaram ukuɓa uv̤ɛ isand̤i sɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa isand̤i samahaʃɛ nɛsand̤i sɛmpi ɛnkulu ɓatʰi ɔmɲɛ kɔmɲɛ nijaɓɔna wamasirajɛli usikǃɛʃɛlɛ ɔɔkumkani ɓamahɛti nɔɔkumkani ɓamajiputa ukuɓa ɓasiwɛlɛ ɓɛsuka kɛ ɓasaɓa nɡ̤ɔŋ̤ǀ̤walaz̤i ɓaz̤iʃija iintɛntɛ z̤aɓɔ namahaʃɛ aɓɔ namaɛsilɛ aɓɔ ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ iɓind͡ʒ̤alɔ ɓasaɓisa uɓɔmi ɓaɓɔ afika kɛ lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a anɛkǃʰɛŋǃa ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiŋǃuɓa anɡ̤ɛna kwɛɲɛ intɛntɛ aɮa asɛla atʰaɓatʰa apʰɔ isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ aja kuz̤ikǃʰuʃɛka aɓuja anɡ̤ɛna kwɛɲɛ intɛntɛ atʰaɓatʰa nakʰɔna aja kukǃʰuʃɛka jatʰi ɛɲɛ kwɛɲɛ asilunɡ̤isi lɛ jimini jɛɛnd̤aɓa ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ sitʰɛ kǀwaka nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓa silind̤ɛ kwad̤a sija kuz̤ɛka itʲala hamɓani kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ sijɛ sikǁɛlɛ ɛnɮwɛni jɔkumkani afika aɓiz̤a umlind̤i wɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɔmz̤i amkǁɛlɛla atʰi sifikɛ ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni jamaaram nankɔ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ kʰɔna naz̤wi kupʰɛla inɡ̤amahaʃɛ aɓɔt͡ʃɛlɛlwɛjɔ namaɛsilɛ aɓɔt͡ʃɛlɛlwɛjɔ nɛɛntɛntɛ z̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓɛz̤ind͡ʒ̤alɔ ɓamɛmɛz̤a aɓalind̤imasanɡ̤ɔ ɔmz̤i ɓakǁɛlɛla inɮu jɔkumkani nɡ̤apʰakatʰi wav̤uka ɛɓusuku watʰi kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ makʰɛ nd̤inikǁɛlɛlɛ intɔ ajɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kutʰi amaaram ajaz̤i ukuɓa silamɓilɛ apʰumilɛ ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni aja kuz̤imɛla ɛnɮɛ ɛsitʰi ɓɔtʰi ɓakupʰuma kuwɔ umz̤i siɓaɓamɓɛ ɓɛɬɛli sinɡ̤ɛnɛ kuwɔ umz̤i wapʰɛnd̤ula ɔmɲɛ wakuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ watʰi makʰɛ kutʰatʲatʰwɛ aɓɛ maɬanu kumahaʃɛ asɛlɛjɔ asɛlɛjɔ pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i jaɓɔna and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jɔnkɛ jamasirajɛli ɛsɛlɛjɔ kuwɔ jaɓɔna and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jɔnkɛ jakwasirajɛli ɛpʰɛlilɛjɔ siwatʰumɛ siɓɔnɛ kwatʰatʲatʰwa iiŋǃwɛlɔ ɛz̤imɓini z̤ɔkulwa ɛz̤inamahaʃɛ wapʰutʰumisa ɛmv̤a kɔmkʰɔsi wamaaram watʰi hamɓani nijɛ kuɓɔna ɓawapʰutʰuma ɓad̤a ɓaja ɛjɔrd̤an nant͡sɔ inɮɛla jɔnkɛ iz̤ɛlɛ z̤iinɡ̤uɓɔ nɛɛmpaɬa aɓɛz̤ilaɬilɛ amaaram ɛkuɓalɛkɛni kwawɔ ɓupʰutʰupʰutʰu ɓaɓuja aɓatʰuɲwa aɓɔ ɓamkǁɛlɛla ɓapʰuma kɛ aɓantu ɓajipʰanɡ̤a imiŋǃuɓa jamaaram jatʰi isɛha jɔmɡ̤uɓɔ ɔkǀɔliwɛjɔ jajɛjɛʃɛkɛlɛ iisɛha ɛz̤imɓini z̤ɛxasi z̤az̤ɛz̤ɛʃɛkɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ukumkani wampʰatʰisa isanɡ̤ɔ umpʰatʰimkʰɔsi aɓɛsajama ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ ɓamɲatʰɛla aɓantu ɛsanɡ̤wɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wakutʰɛtʰajɔ umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ ɔwatʰɛtʰa ɛkuɬɛni kɔkumkani ɛsiz̤a kujɛ kwɛnz̤ɛka kɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wakutʰɛtʰajɔ umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ ɛsitʰi iisɛha ɛz̤imɓini z̤ɛxasi z̤ɔɓa z̤ɛz̤ɛʃɛkɛlɛ isɛha jɔmɡ̤uɓɔ ɔkǀɔliwɛjɔ jɔɓa jɛjɛʃɛkɛlɛ ɛli kǁa nɡ̤ɔmsɔ ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lakwasamari ukuz̤ɛ ampʰɛnd̤ulɛ umpʰatʰimkʰɔsi lɔwɔ umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ ɛsitʰi jaɓɔna kʰɔna ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a wɛnz̤ɛ iifɛstilɛ ɛz̤ulwini inɡ̤aɓakʰɔ lɔɔ ntɔ ukuz̤ɛ atʰi kɛ jɛna kʰanɡ̤ɛla uja kujiɓɔna nɡ̤amɛɬɔ akʰɔ unɡ̤aɮi kujɔ kwaɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ kujɛ ɓamɲatʰɛla aɓantu ɛsanɡ̤wɛni kɛ uɛliʃa wajɛtʰɛtʰilɛ kwintɔkaz̤i lɛjɔ wajɛpʰilisɛ uɲana wajɔ ɛsitʰi suka uhamɓɛ wɛna nɛnɮu jakʰɔ upʰamɓukɛlɛ apʰɔ unɡ̤apʰamɓukɛla kʰɔna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uɓiz̤ɛ inɮala kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ija kulifikɛla iliz̤wɛ imiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ jajisukilɛ kɛ intɔkaz̤i lɛjɔ jɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi lɔmfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ jahamɓa jɔna nɛnɮu jajɔ japʰamɓukɛla ɛz̤wɛni lamafilisti imiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kɛ kalɔku kwatʰi ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ lɛjɔ jaɓuja lɔɔ ntɔkaz̤i ɛz̤wɛni lamafilisti japʰuma jaja kuz̤iɓika nɡ̤ɛnɮu jajɔ nɛnt͡simi jajɔ kɛ kalɔku uɓɛtʰɛtʰa nɔɡ̤ɛhaz̤i umkʰɔnz̤i wɔmfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ ɛsitʰi kʰawund̤iɓalisɛlɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inkulu az̤ɛnz̤ilɛjɔ uɛliʃa kwatʰi ɛsamkǁɛlɛla ukupʰilisa kwakʰɛ ɔwajɛsɛlɛfilɛ kwaɓɔnakala ntɔkaz̤i aɓɛpʰilisɛ uɲana wajɔ iz̤iɓika nɡ̤ɛnɮu jajɔ nɛnt͡simi jajɔ watʰi uɡ̤ɛhaz̤i nkɔsi jam jilɔɔ ntɔkaz̤i kɛ lɛ nɡ̤ulɔɔ ɲana wajɔ wapʰiliswajɔ nɡ̤uɛliʃa kɛ lɔ wajiɓuz̤a intɔkaz̤i lɛjɔ jamkǁɛlɛla ukumkani wajinika umɓusi ɔtʰilɛ watʰi jiɓujisɛlɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ajɔ nɔkutʲa kɔnkɛ kwɛnt͡simi jajɔ kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛjɛmka nɡ̤ajɔ kwɛli liz̤wɛ kuz̤isɛ nakwɛli kǁɛʃa lanɡ̤ɔku wɛz̤a uɛliʃa ɛd̤amaskɔ ub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ wakwaaram wajɛ ɛsifa kwatʰiwa kujɛ umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ ufikilɛ apʰa watʰi lɔwɔ kuhaz̤ajɛli pʰatʰa umnikɛlɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɔ ujɛ kumkʰawulɛla umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ lɔwɔ uɓuz̤isɛ kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ajɛ utʰi nd̤ija kupʰila kwɛsi sifɔ uhaz̤ajɛli waja kumkʰawulɛla wapʰatʰa umnikɛlɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɛ nɛntɔ jɔnkɛ ɛlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ jasɛd̤amaskɔ imitʰwalɔ jɛɛnkamɛla ɛz̤imaʃumi manɛ waja wɛma pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ watʰi uɲana wakʰɔ ub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ wakwaaram und̤itʰumɛlɛ kuwɛ ɛsitʰi nd̤ija kupʰila kwɛsi sifɔ nd̤inasɔ watʰi uɛliʃa kujɛ hamɓa ujɛ kutʰi unɡ̤apʰila kɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a und̤iɓɔnisilɛ ukuɓa inɛnɛ uja wamkʰanɡ̤ɛla wamtʰi nt͡ʃɔ wad̤a wanɛɛntlɔni umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ watʰi uhaz̤ajɛli ililɛlani inkɔsi jam watʰi kunɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iɓaz̤i uɓuɓi ɔja kuɓɛnz̤a kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli uja kuz̤it͡ʃisa nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ iiŋǃaɓa z̤aɓɔ uwaɓulalɛ amad̤ɔd̤ana aɓɔ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ uɓatʲumz̤ɛ aɓantwana ɓaɓɔ uɓakǃaŋ̤ǃ̤ululɛ aɓafaz̤i ɓaɓɔ aɓamitʰijɔ watʰi uhaz̤ajɛli ujintɔni umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ɛjind͡ʒ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓa ad̤ɛ ɛnz̤ɛ lɔɔ ntɔ inɡ̤akɔ watʰi uɛliʃa ujɛhɔv̤a und̤iɓɔnisilɛ ukuɓa uja kuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani wakwaaram wɛna wɛmka kuɛliʃa waja ɛnkɔsini jakʰɛ jatʰi kujɛ utʰɛni uɛliʃa kuwɛ watʰi utʰɛ inɛnɛ uja kupʰila kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ watʰaɓatʰa iŋ̤ǀ̤awa wajitʰi ŋ̰ǁ̰u ɛmanz̤ini wajanɛka ɛɓuswɛni ɓajɔ jafa uhaz̤ajɛli waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sajɔ kɛ kalɔku nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsiɬanu kajɛhɔram uɲana kaahab̤i wamasirajɛli ujɛhɔʃafati ɛnɡ̤ukumkani wamajud̤a waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ujɛhɔram uɲana kajɛhɔʃafati wamajud̤a ɛɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi matʰatʰu anamiɓini ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ jɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ inɮu kaahab̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa intɔmɓi kaahab̤i jajinɡ̤umkakʰɛ wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɓɛnɡ̤av̤umi ukulɔnakalisa ɛlakwajud̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kad̤av̤id̤ɛ umkʰɔz̤i wakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ watʰɛtʰajɔ kujɛ watʰi wɔmnika isiɓanɛ nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ jɔnkɛ imiɬa nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jakʰɛ ak͡xɛkǃa amaɛd̤ɔm apʰuma pʰant͡si kwɛsanɮa samajud̤a az̤ɛnz̤ɛla waɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa ujɛhɔram waja ɛt͡sahira ɛnɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɔkulwa wav̤uka ɛɓusuku wawakǁaɓɛla amaɛd̤ɔm awajɛmxawulɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa ɓasaɓa aɓantu ɓaja ɛz̤intɛntɛni z̤aɓɔ ak͡xɛkǃa kɛ amaɛd̤ɔm apʰuma pʰant͡si kwɛsanɮa samajud̤a unanam̤la jaz̤a jak͡xɛkǃa ilib̤ɛna kwanɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikajɔram nakɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a ujɔram kɔɔjisɛ waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa kɔɔjisɛ ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ uahaz̤ija uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɓini kajɔram uɲana kaahab̤i wamasirajɛli waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani uahaz̤ija uɲana kajɛhɔram wamajud̤a uahaz̤ija ɛɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini namiɓini ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa mɲaka mɲɛ ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina liɓɛ linɡ̤uatalija intɔmɓi kaɔmri wamasirajɛli wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛnɮu kaahab̤i wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛnɮu kaahab̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛnɡ̤umjɛni wakwaahab̤i wahamɓa nɔjɔram uɲana kaahab̤i waja nɔhaz̤ajɛli wakwaaram ɛramɔti jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i amaaram amŋ̤ǁ̤wɛlɛxa ujɔram waɓuja ujɔram waja kuɲanɡ̤wa ɛjiz̤ɛrɛli lɔɔ maŋǁɛɓa wawafumanajɔ kumaaram ɛrama ɛkulwɛni kwakʰɛ nɔhaz̤ajɛli wakwaaram wɛɬa uahaz̤ija uɲana kajɛhɔram wamajud̤a ɛsija kumɓɔna ujɔram uɲana kaahab̤i ɛjiz̤ɛrɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛŋ̤ǁ̤wɛlɛxiwɛ kɛ uɛliʃa umprɔfɛti waɓiz̤a ɔmɲɛ kɔɔɲana ɓaɓaprɔfɛti watʰi kujɛ b̤iŋǃa isiŋǃɛ sakʰɔ upʰatʰɛ ɛli ɡ̤utʲana lɛɔli nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɔ ujɛ ɛramɔti jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i unɡ̤ɛnɛ kʰɔna ukʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ kʰɔna ujɛhu uɲana kajɛhɔʃafati uɲana kanimʃi ujɛ ut͡ʃɔ ɛsukɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ umsɛ ɛnɡ̤ɔnt͡sini ɛnɡ̤apʰakatʰi utʰaɓatʰɛ iɡ̤utʲana lɛɔli umɡ̤alɛlɛ ɛntlɔkɔ utʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤ikutʰamɓisilɛ ukuɓa uɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani kumasirajɛli uluv̤ulɛ kɛ ukǀanɡ̤ɔ usaɓɛ unɡ̤aɬali waja lɔwɔ umkʰɔnz̤i lɔwɔ wɔmprɔfɛti ɛramɔti jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i wafika kɛ naɓa aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛmpi ɓɛɬɛli pʰant͡si watʰi nd̤inɛliz̤wi kuwɛ mtʰɛtʰɛlimkʰɔsi watʰi ujɛhu kuwupʰi pʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu aɓa sɔnkɛ watʰi kuwɛ mtʰɛtʰɛlimkʰɔsi wɛsuka wanɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini wamɡ̤alɛla iɔli ɛntlɔkɔ watʰi kujɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi nd̤ikutʰamɓisilɛ ukuɓa uɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani kuɓantu ɓakajɛhɔv̤a kumasirajɛli wɔjikǁaɓɛla inɮu kaahab̤i inkɔsi jakʰɔ nd̤iwapʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlɛ amaɡ̤az̤i aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓam aɓaprɔfɛti namaɡ̤az̤i aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɔnkɛ ɓakajɛhɔv̤a ɛsanɮɛni sikaiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ id̤akɛ jɔnkɛ inɮu kaahab̤i nd̤iŋǃumlɛ kuahab̤i jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛjind̤ɔd̤a nɔv̤alɛlwɛjɔ nɔv̤ulɛlwɛjɔ kwasirajɛli nd̤ɔjɛnz̤a inɮu kaahab̤i iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɮu kajarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kanɛb̤ati nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɮu kab̤ahɛʃa uɲana kaahija z̤imɮɛ iz̤ind͡ʒ̤a uiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ ɛsikǃwɛnɡ̤ɛni ɛsisɛjiz̤ɛrɛli kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ umŋ̤ǀ̤waɓajɔ waluv̤ula ukǀanɡ̤ɔ wasaɓa ɛpʰumilɛ ujɛhu waja kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛnkɔsi jakʰɛ kwatʰiwa kujɛ lukǁɔlɔ ɛɓɛz̤ɛlɛni lɔ mb̤ud̤i watʰi kuɓɔ lɛ nd̤ɔd̤a jaz̤iwa kwanɔkutʰɛtʰatʰɛtʰa kwajɔ ɓatʰi kǁɔka kʰawusikǁɛlɛlɛ watʰi utʰɛ watʰi ukutʰɛtʰa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤ikutʰamɓisilɛ ukuɓa uɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani kumasirajɛli ɓakʰawulɛz̤a watʰaɓatʰa ɛlɔwɔ inɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ wajiɓɛka pʰant͡si kwakʰɛ ujɛhu ɛz̤iɲukwɛni kaɲɛ ɓav̤utʰɛla iz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɓatʰi ujɛhu nɡ̤ukumkani ujɛhu uɲana kajɛhɔʃafati uɲana kanimʃi wamkǀɛɓa kɛ ujɔram kɛ kalɔku ujɔram uɓɛjilind̤a iramɔti jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i jɛna namasirajɛli ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kahaz̤ajɛli wakwaaram kɛ ujɔram uɓɛɓujɛlɛ ɛjiz̤ɛrɛli ukuɓa aɲanɡ̤wɛ amaŋǁɛɓa kumaaram ɛsilwa nɔhaz̤ajɛli wakwaaram watʰi ujɛhu ukuɓa kukutʰand̤a kwɛnu makunɡ̤apʰumi kusind̤ɛ kulɔ mz̤i ajɛ kukǁɛla ɛjiz̤ɛrɛli wakʰwɛla ujɛhu ɛŋǃwɛlwɛni waja ɛjiz̤ɛrɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɔram ɛɓɛlɛlɛ kʰɔna kɛ uahaz̤ija wamajud̤a wɛɬa waja kumɓɔna ujɔram kɛ kalɔku umlind̤i ɔɓɛmi pʰɛz̤u kwɛŋǃaɓa ɛjiz̤ɛrɛli waɓɔna kajɛhu ɛkuz̤ɛni kwakʰɛ watʰi nd̤iɓɔna watʰi ujɔram tʰaɓatʰa ɔkʰwɛlɛ ihaʃɛ umtʰumɛ ajɛ kuɓakʰawulɛla atʰi lukǁɔlɔ waja kumkʰawulɛla lɔɔ mkʰwɛlihaʃɛ watʰi ut͡ʃɔ ukutʰi lukǁɔlɔ watʰi ujɛhu jintɔni ɛnawɛ nɔkǁɔlɔ d͡ʒ̤ikɛla ɛmv̤a wakǁɛla umlind̤i watʰi umtʰuɲwa ujɛ kuɓɔ kɛ akaɓuji watʰuma ɔwɛsiɓini umkʰwɛlihaʃɛ waja kuɓɔ watʰi ut͡ʃɔ ukutʰi lukǁɔlɔ watʰi ujɛhu jintɔni ɛnawɛ nɔkǁɔlɔ d͡ʒ̤ikɛla ɛmv̤a wakǁɛla umlind̤i watʰi ujɛ kuɓɔ kɛ akaɓuji kɛ ukukǃʰuɓa kund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkukǃʰuɓa kukajɛhu uɲana kanimʃi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukǃʰuɓa nɡ̤ɔɓuɮɔnɡ̤ɔɮɔnɡ̤ɔ watʰi ujɔram ɓɔpʰa jaɓɔt͡ʃwa iŋǃwɛlɔ jakʰɛ jɔkulwa wapʰuma ujɔram wamasirajɛli nɔahaz̤ija wamajud̤a ɛlɔwɔ ɛsɛŋǃwɛlwɛni jakʰɛ jɔkulwa ɓapʰuma ɓaja kumkʰawulɛla ujɛhu ɓamfumana ɛsikǃwɛnɡ̤ɛni sɔm̤laɓa sikanab̤ɔti wasɛjiz̤ɛrɛli kwatʰi ujɔram akumɓɔna ujɛhu watʰi lukǁɔlɔ jɛhu watʰi jɛna lukǁɔlɔ kǁa ukuhɛɲuz̤a kukaiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ uɲɔkɔ nɔkukʰafula kwakʰɛ ɔkuninz̤i kusaɬɛlijɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɔram wawad͡ʒ̤ika amahaʃɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ wasaɓa watʰi kuahaz̤ija likǀɛɓɔ ahaz̤ija ujɛhu wakǃuɓula isapʰɛtʰa sakʰɛ wat͡ʃɔ kujɔram pʰakatʰi kwamaɡ̤ǁ̤a utɔlɔ lwapʰumɛla ɛpʰapʰini lakʰɛ wɛɛ ɓutʰutʰu ɛŋǃwɛlwɛni jakʰɛ watʰi ujɛhu kub̤id̤ɛkarɛ umpʰatʰimkʰɔsi wakʰɛ mtʰwalɛ umpʰɔsɛ ɛsikǃwɛnɡ̤ɛni sɔm̤laɓa kanab̤ɔti wakwajiz̤ɛrɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kʰumɓula ɔkɔ sasikʰwɛlɛ tʰina sɔɓaɓini nawɛ ɛmv̤a kɔahab̤i ujisɛ ujɛhɔv̤a waɬaɓa ɛsɔ siɬaɓɔ nɡ̤ajɛ inɛnɛ amaɡ̤az̤i kanab̤ɔti namaɡ̤az̤i ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nd̤iwaɓɔnilɛ iz̤ɔlɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kukupʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlɛla kwɛsi sikǃwɛnɡ̤a sɔm̤laɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ mtʰwalɛ umpʰɔsɛ ɛsikǃwɛnɡ̤ɛni ɛsɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a uahaz̤ija wakwajud̤a ɛkuɓɔnilɛ ɔkɔ wasaɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛnɮu jasɛmjɛz̤wɛni ujɛhu wamsukɛla watʰi najɛ mɡ̤waz̤ɛlɛni ɛŋǃwɛlwɛni jɔkulwa kuɓɛ kusɛkǃʰinɛni lɛɡ̤urɛ ɛlinɡ̤asɛiɬam wasaɓa kɛ waja ɛmɛɡ̤id̤ɔ wafɛla kʰɔna aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓamsa nɡ̤ɛŋǃwɛlɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni lakʰɛ kɔɔjisɛ ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinamɲɛ kajɔram uɲana kaahab̤i uahaz̤ija waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani wakwajud̤a utʰɛ ujɛhu ɛjiz̤ɛrɛli wɛv̤a uiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ waz̤ikǃaɓa amɛɬɔ waz̤ihɔmɓisa intlɔkɔ wav̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛfɛstilɛ wanɡ̤ɛna ujɛhu ɛsanɡ̤wɛni watʰi jɛna lukǁɔlɔ z̤imri wɛna mɓulali wɛnkɔsi jakʰɔ wawapʰakamisa ujɛhu amɛɬɔ akʰɛ wab̤ɛka ɛfɛstilɛni watʰi nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤akum nɡ̤uɓani kwalunɡ̤uz̤a aɓaɓusi aɓaɓini aɓatʰatʰu watʰi mkʰaɬɛlɛni pʰant͡si amkʰaɬɛla pʰant͡si iɡ̤az̤i lakʰɛ lakǀʰapʰaz̤ɛla ud̤ɔnɡ̤a namahaʃɛ wamɲatʰɛlisa nɡ̤awɔ wanɡ̤ɛna waɮa wasɛla watʰi kʰanimv̤ɛlɛlɛ mkǃalɛkiswakaz̤i nimŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jintɔmɓi jɔkumkani ɓaja kumŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa aɓawufumana umz̤imɓa wakʰɛ jaɓa lukakaji nɛɛɲawɔ nɛɛntɛnd̤ɛ z̤ɛz̤anɮa kupʰɛla ɓaɓuja kɛ ɓamkǁɛlɛla watʰi liliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɛlɔ aɓɛlitʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɛ uɛlija wasɛtiʃb̤i lisitʰi iz̤ind͡ʒ̤a z̤ija kujiɮa iɲama kaiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ ɛsikǃwɛnɡ̤ɛni sɔm̤laɓa sasɛjiz̤ɛrɛli sitʰi isid̤umɓu sikaiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ siɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɡ̤ǃ̤uɓa pʰɛz̤u kɔm̤laɓa ɛsikǃwɛnɡ̤ɛni sasɛjiz̤ɛrɛli kukuz̤ɛ kunɡ̤atʰiwa lɔ nɡ̤uiz̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ wajɛ uahab̤i ɛnɔɔɲana aɓamaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kwasamari wab̤ala iŋǀwad̤i ujɛhu watʰumɛla kwasamari kuɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓasɛjiz̤ɛrɛli kumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu nakuɓɔnɮi ɓɛnt͡sapʰɔ kaahab̤i watʰi nɡ̤ɔku kɛ kǁa ifikilɛjɔ lɛ ŋǀwad̤i ɓɛkuni nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɛnkɔsi jɛnu z̤ikuni nd͡ʒ̤ɛ iiŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa namahaʃɛ nɔmz̤i ɔŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ nɛz̤ik͡xwɛkǃɛ kʰanɡ̤ɛlani ɔjɛna ufanɛlɛkilɛjɔ ɔtʰɛ tʲɛ kɔɔɲana ɓɛnkɔsi jɛnu nimɓɛkɛ ɛtrɔnɛni jɔjisɛ nijilwɛlɛ inɮu jɛnkɔsi jɛnu ɓɔjika kakʰulu kunɛnɛ ɓatʰi jaɓɔnani ɔɔkumkani ɓɛɓaɓini aɓɛmanɡ̤a pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ sɔtʰini tʰina ɓatʰuma ɔpʰɛtʰɛ inɮu nɔpʰɛtʰɛ umz̤i namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu naɓɔnɮi kujɛhu ɓatʰi sinɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ kɔnkɛ ɔja kukutʰɛtʰa kutʰi sɔkwɛnz̤a asiji aɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani jɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓɔna kwakʰɔ waɓab̤alɛla ɛjɛsiɓini iŋǀwad̤i ɛsitʰi ukuɓa ninɡ̤akum nipʰulapʰula iz̤wi tʰaɓatʰani iintlɔkɔ z̤amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓɛnkɔsi jɛnu niz̤iz̤isɛ ɛjiz̤ɛrɛli ɛli kǁa nɡ̤ɔmsɔ kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɔkumkani ɓɛnɡ̤amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ amad̤ɔd̤a ɓaɓɛkwiz̤ikʰulu z̤ɔmz̤i ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤iɓakʰulisa kwatʰi jakufika kuɓɔ lɛ ŋǀwad̤i ɓaɓatʰaɓatʰa ɔɔɲana ɓɔkumkani ɓaɓasika ɓɛnɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓaz̤iɓɛka iintlɔkɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɔɓɔz̤ini ɓaz̤itʰumɛla kujɛ ɛjiz̤ɛrɛli wafika umtʰuɲwa wamkǁɛlɛla watʰi ɓaz̤iz̤isilɛ iintlɔkɔ z̤ɔɔɲana ɓɔkumkani watʰi z̤iɓɛkɛni z̤iɓɛ z̤iimfumɓa ɛz̤imɓini nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ kud̤ɛ kusɛ kwatʰi wapʰuma wɛma watʰi kuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ninɡ̤amalunɡ̤isa jaɓɔnani nd̤akǀɛɓa inkɔsi jam nd̤ajiɓulala nɡ̤uɓani kɛ lɔ ukǁaɓɛlɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓa jaz̤ini kɛ nɡ̤ɔku ukuɓa akuji pʰant͡si nɛntɔ jɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a awalitʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛnɮu kaahab̤i ujɛhɔv̤a ukwɛnz̤ilɛ kɛ ɔkɔ wakutʰɛtʰajɔ nɡ̤ɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɛ uɛlija ujɛhu waɓaɓulala ɓɔnkɛ aɓasɛlɛjɔ ɓɛnɮu kaahab̤i ɛjiz̤ɛrɛli nɛz̤ikʰulu z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ naɓaz̤ana najɛ naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓakʰɛ kwad̤a kujɛ namɲɛ usind̤ilɛjɔ wɛsuka wɛmka waja kwasamari kwatʰi ujɛhu lɔwɔ ɛsɛnɮwini jɔkukǀʰɛɓa jaɓalusi ɛnɮɛlɛni naɓaz̤alwana ɓakaahaz̤ija wakwajud̤a watʰi ninɡ̤ɔɔɓani ɓatʰi sinɡ̤aɓaz̤alwana ɓakaahaz̤ija sijɛɬa sija kuɓulisa ɔɔɲana ɓɔkumkani nɔɔɲana ɓɛnkɔsikaz̤i watʰi ɓaɓamɓɛni ɓɛɬɛli ɓaɓaɓamɓa ɓɛɬɛli ɓaɓasika nɡ̤asɛm̤ad̤ini wɛnɮu jɔkukǀʰɛɓa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmanɛ anamaɓini kuɓɔ utʰɛ akund̤uluka kʰɔna nɔjɛhɔnad̤ab̤i uɲana karɛkab̤i ɛmkʰawulɛla wamɓulisa watʰi kujɛ itʰɛ tʲɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa ind͡ʒ̤alɔ intliz̤ijɔ jam kwintliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ watʰi ujɛhɔnad̤ab̤i ind͡ʒ̤alɔ watʰi ukuɓa ind͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ ɛtʰɛ isanɮa sakʰɔ wamnika isanɮa sakʰɛ wamɲusa wamkʰwɛlisa ɛŋǃwɛlwɛni watʰi hamɓa uɓɔnɛ ikʰwɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kajɛhɔv̤a ɓamkʰwɛlisa kɛ najɛ ɛŋǃwɛlwɛni jakʰɛ wɛz̤a kwasamari waɓaɓulala ɓɔnkɛ aɓasɛlɛjɔ kuahab̤i kwasamari wad̤a wamt͡ʃaɓalalisa nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a aɓɛlitʰɛtʰilɛ kuɛlija ujɛhu waɓaɬanɡ̤anisa ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu watʰi kuɓɔ uahab̤i wamkʰɔnz̤a kaŋǀinanɛ ub̤ahali ujɛhu jɛna uja kumkʰɔnz̤a kakʰulu kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓaɓiz̤ɛlɛni aɓaprɔfɛti ɓakab̤ahali ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ makunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ unɡ̤ɛkʰɔjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɔmkʰulu kub̤ahali ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰɛ aɓaɓakʰɔ aɓaji kuɮa ɓɔmi ujɛhu wajɛ ɛsɛnz̤a lɛ ntɔ ɛɓalalanisa ukuz̤ɛ aɓat͡ʃaɓalalisɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakab̤ahali watʰi ujɛhu mmɛmɛlɛni iŋ̤ǃ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤utʰɛla ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ub̤ahali ɓajimɛma kɛ ujɛhu watʰumɛla kumasirajɛli ɔnkɛ ɓɛz̤a ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakab̤ahali kwad̤a namɲɛ unɡ̤ɛz̤anɡ̤a ɓanɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini kab̤ahali ɓajiz̤alisa inɮu kab̤ahali kwatʰaɓatʰɛla kwɛliɲɛ ikǀala kwɛsa kwɛliɲɛ watʰi kumpʰatʰi wɛnɮu jɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɓaxɔlɛlɛni ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakab̤ahali iinɡ̤uɓɔ waɓaxɔlɛla kɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ wanɡ̤ɛna ujɛhu nɔjɛhɔnad̤ab̤i uɲana karɛkab̤i ɛnɮwini kab̤ahali watʰi kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakab̤ahali funisisani nikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ɬɛz̤ɛ kuɓɛkʰɔ apʰa ɔmɲɛ wakuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakajɛhɔv̤a majiɓɛ nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakab̤ahali ɓɔd̤wa ɓanɡ̤ɛna kɛ ɓaja kwɛnz̤a imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ namad̤ini aɲukajɔ ujɛhu wajɛz̤imisɛlɛ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ amaʃumi ɔsib̤ɔz̤ɔ amad̤ɔd̤a watʰi ind̤ɔd̤a ɛtʰɛ jasind̤isa mad̤ɔd̤a nd̤iwaz̤isilɛjɔ ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤ɛnu umpʰɛfumlɔ wajɔ wɔɓa sɛsikʰunɮɛni sɔmpʰɛfumlɔ walɔwɔ usind̤ilɛjɔ kwatʰi kǁa aɓɛɡ̤ǃ̤iɓilɛ ukulɛnz̤a id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ watʰi ujɛhu kwiz̤iɡ̤id̤imi nakuɓapʰatʰimikʰɔsi nɡ̤ɛnani niɓaɓulalɛ makunɡ̤apʰumi ɓaɓakǁaɓɛla kɛ nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ z̤aɓapʰɔsa pʰanɮɛ iz̤iɡ̤id̤imi naɓapʰatʰimikʰɔsi z̤aja ɛŋǃaɓɛni jɛnɮu kab̤ahali z̤az̤ikʰupʰa iint͡sika z̤ɛnɮu kab̤ahali z̤az̤it͡ʃisa z̤az̤id̤iliz̤a iz̤imisɔ z̤amatʲɛ z̤ikab̤ahali z̤ajid̤iliz̤a inɮu kab̤ahali z̤ajɛnz̤a ind̤awɔ ɛkujiwa kujɔ ɛnɮɛ unanam̤la ujɛhu wamt͡ʃaɓalalisa kɛ ub̤ahali kwasirajɛli kɔd̤wa iz̤ɔnɔ z̤ikajarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kanɛb̤ati awawɔnisa amasirajɛli nɡ̤az̤ɔ ujɛhu akatʲɛkanɡ̤a ɛkuz̤iland̤ɛlɛni ɛz̤inɡ̤amatʰɔlɛ ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ aɓɛsɛb̤ɛtɛli naɓɛkwad̤an watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɛhu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ulunɡ̤isilɛ ukwɛnz̤a ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni wɛnz̤a kwinɮu kaahab̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ ɔkusɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ ɓɛsiz̤ukulwana sɛsinɛ ɓaja kukuɬalɛla ɛtrɔnɛni jakwasirajɛli kɛ ujɛhu akakuɡ̤ǀ̤inanɡ̤a ukuhamɓa nɡ̤ɔmjalɛlɔ kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ akatʲɛkanɡ̤a ɛz̤ɔnwɛni z̤ikajarɔb̤ɛham awawɔnisa nɡ̤az̤ɔ amasirajɛli nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa wakǃala ujɛhɔv̤a ukuŋǀipʰisa kumasirajɛli wawakǁaɓɛla uhaz̤ajɛli ɛmid̤ɛni jɔnkɛ jakwasirajɛli watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛjɔrd̤an ɛmpumalanɡ̤a lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i ɛlamaɡ̤ad̤i nɛlamarub̤ɛn nɛlamamanasɛ watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛarɔhɛrɛ ɛnɡ̤asɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni ɔjiarnɔn ɛlasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i nɛlasɛb̤aʃan ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikajɛhu nakɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ nɔɓuk͡xɔti ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli ujɛhu kɔɔjisɛ waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa kwasamari ujɛhɔwahaz̤i uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ imiɬa ujɛhu awaɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kumasirajɛli kwasamari jaɓa jimiɲaka ɛmaʃumi maɓini anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ kɛ kalɔku uatalija kaahaz̤ija utʰɛ akuɓɔna ukuɓa uɲana wakʰɛ ufilɛ wɛsuka wajit͡ʃaɓalalisa jɔnkɛ imɓɛwu jɔkumkani kɛ ujɔʃɛb̤a intɔmɓi jɔkumkani ujɛhɔram ud̤ad̤ɛ ɓɔahaz̤ija wamtʰaɓatʰa ujɔwaʃɛ uɲana kaahaz̤ija wamɓa pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓɔkumkani aɓaɓulawajɔ jɛna nɔmɔnɮi wakʰɛ ɛɡ̤umɓini lɔkulala ɓamfiɬa kuatalija ukuɓa anɡ̤aɓulawa wajɛnajɛ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɛz̤iɲɛz̤iwɛ imiɲaka ɛmitʰand̤atʰu wajɛ uatalija ɛnɡ̤ukumkanikaz̤i kulɔ iliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ujɛhɔjad̤a watʰumɛla watʰaɓatʰa aɓatʰɛtʰɛlimakʰulu ɓasɛɓaŋǀinitʰini naɓasɛz̤iɡ̤id̤imini waɓaz̤isa kujɛ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a waɓamisɛla umŋǃɔpʰisɔ waɓafunɡ̤isa ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a waɓaɓɔnisa uɲana wɔkumkani waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ watʰi jijɔ lɛ intɔ ɛnija kujɛnz̤a isaɬulɔ sɛsitʰatʰu ɓanɡ̤ɛnajɔ nɡ̤ɛsaɓatʰa sɔɡ̤ǀ̤ina isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina sɛnɮu jɔkumkani ɛsiɲɛ isaɬulɔ sɛsitʰatʰu siɓɛ sɛsanɡ̤wɛni lasɛsurɛ ɛsiɲɛ isaɬulɔ sɛsitʰatʰu siɓɛ sɛsanɡ̤wɛni ɛmv̤a kwɛz̤iɡ̤id̤imi nisiɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina sɛnɮu nitʰintɛlɛ kɛ iz̤aɬulɔ ɛz̤iɓini pʰakatʰi kwɛnu nɔnkɛ nipʰumajɔ nɡ̤ɛsaɓatʰa z̤ɔsiɡ̤ǀ̤ina isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina sɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nimpʰaɬɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛlɔwɔ ɛnɛɛntɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ atʰi ɔnɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛz̤intlwini aɓulawɛ niɓɛ nɔkumkani ɛkupʰumɛni kwakʰɛ nasɛkuɓujɛni kwakʰɛ ɓɛnz̤a kɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛlimakʰulu nɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ ujɛhɔjad̤a umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓɛwisɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɓatʰaɓatʰa ɛlɔwɔ amad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ anɡ̤ɛnajɔ nɡ̤ɛsaɓatʰa kuɲɛ napʰumajɔ nɡ̤ɛsaɓatʰa ɓɛz̤a kujɛhɔjad̤a umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli waɓanika aɓatʰɛtʰɛlimakʰulu iint͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ namakʰaka aɓɛ ɛnɡ̤awɔkumkani ud̤av̤id̤ɛ aɓɛsɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a z̤ɛma iz̤iɡ̤id̤imi saɛsɔ saɓa nɛɛntɔnɡ̤a z̤asɔ ɛsanɮɛni sasɔ z̤atʰaɓatʰɛla kwipʰikɔ lasɛkunɛnɛ lɛnɮu z̤ɛsa kwipʰikɔ lasɛkʰɔɬɔ lɛnɮu nɡ̤asɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni nɡ̤asɛnɮwini nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ wamkʰupʰɛla pʰanɮɛ uɲana wɔkumkani isit͡sʰaɓa nɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤inisɔ ɓamɛnz̤a ɓamtʰamɓisa ɓaɓɛtʰa iz̤anɮa ɓatʰi makaɮɛ uɓɔmi utʰɛ uatalija akusiv̤a isand̤i sɛz̤iɡ̤id̤imi nɛsaɓantu waja kuɓɔ aɓantu ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a wakʰanɡ̤ɛla nankɔ ɛmi ɛnd̤awɛni ɛpʰakamilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli naɓav̤utʰɛli nɡ̤amakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ ɓɛnɡ̤akukumkani aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɓɛv̤uja ɓɛv̤utʰɛla amakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ waz̤ik͡xaz̤ula iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ uatalija wakʰala watʰi likǀɛɓɔ likǀɛɓɔ ujɛhɔjad̤a umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ aɓatʰɛtʰɛlimakʰulu aɓav̤ɛlɛli ɓɛmpi lɛjɔ watʰi kuɓɔ mkʰupʰɛlɛni pʰanɮɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤intlu ɔmland̤ɛlajɔ makaɓulawɛ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓɛsitʰi umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli makanɡ̤aɓulawɛlwa ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɓamkʰwɛlɛla nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔmɓini waja ɛnɮwini jɔkumkani nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɔkunɡ̤ɛna kwamahaʃɛ waɓulawɛlwa kʰɔna wawɛnz̤a ujɛhɔjad̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ pʰakatʰi kɔjɛhɔv̤a nɔkumkani naɓantu ukuɓa ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓantu ɓakajɛhɔv̤a napʰakatʰi kɔkumkani naɓantu ɓaja ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛnɮwini kab̤ahali ɓajid̤iliz̤a iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤akʰɛ nɛmifanɛkisɔ jakʰɛ ɓajikǃʰɛkɛz̤a kwapʰɛla ɓamɓulala umatan umɓi nɡ̤ɛlɛli kab̤ahali pʰamɓi kwɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓav̤ɛlɛli ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a waɓatʰaɓatʰa aɓatʰɛtʰɛlimakʰulu naɓaŋǀinitʰi nɛz̤iɡ̤id̤imi naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɓɛɬa nɔkumkani ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɓaja ɛnɮwini jɔkumkani nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɛz̤iɡ̤id̤imi waɬala kɛ ɛtrɔnɛni jɔkumkani ɓav̤uja ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ waz̤ɔla umz̤i kuɓa ɓaɓɛmɓulɛlɛ uatalija nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ɛnɮwini jɔkumkani ujɔwaʃɛ uɓɛmiɲaka isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ujɔwaʃɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kajɛhu waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛmaʃumi manɛ ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm kɛ iɡ̤ama lɔnina ɓɛlinɡ̤ut͡sib̤ɛja wasɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a ujɔwaʃɛ wɛnz̤a ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a jɔnkɛ imiɬa jakʰɛ aɓɛmjala nɡ̤ajɔ ujɛhɔjad̤a umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kɔd̤wa iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a az̤isuswanɡ̤a aɓantu ɓaɓɛsaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla ɓɛkǃʰumisɛla ɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni watʰi ujɔwaʃɛ kuɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli jɔnkɛ jɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisiwɛjɔ ɛz̤iswajɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a jɔɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛla kwaɓaɓaliwɛjɔ nɛmali jɔmpʰɛfumlɔ walɔwɔ nalɔwɔ nɡ̤ɔkulinɡ̤anisɛlwa kwakʰɛ nɛmali jɔnkɛ ɛkutʰɛ kǃatʰa ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jɔmntu ukuɓa ajiz̤isɛ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a maɓajitʰaɓatʰɛlɛ kuɓɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛlɔwɔ ajitʰaɓatʰɛ kwaɓaz̤ana najɛ ɓatʲwinɛ iintand̤a z̤ɛnɮu apʰɔ sukuɓa kufuɲɛnwɛ utʰand̤a kʰɔna kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi ɔmaɓini anɛsitʰatʰu wɔkumkani ujɔwaʃɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛnɡ̤ɛkaz̤itʲwini iintand̤a z̤ɛnɮu ujɔwaʃɛ wamɓiz̤a ujɛhɔjad̤a umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓaɲɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli watʰi kuɓɔ jini ukuɓa ninɡ̤az̤itʲwini iintand̤a z̤ɛnɮu kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ maninɡ̤aɓi satʰaɓatʰa kwaɓaz̤ana jinikɛlɛlɛni ukutʲwina iintand̤a z̤ɛnɮu ɓakuv̤uma aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ukunɡ̤aɓi satʰaɓatʰa ɛɓantwini nɔkutʰi z̤inɡ̤atʲwinwa nɡ̤aɓɔ iintand̤a z̤ɛnɮu ujɛhɔjad̤a umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli watʰaɓatʰa umkʰɔmɓɛ wapʰɛɬa intund͡ʒ̤a ɛsikǀikwɛni sawɔ wawuɓɛka ɛkǀalɛni lɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ukuz̤ɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓaɡ̤ǀ̤ina umɓund̤u wɔmɲanɡ̤ɔ ɓajiɓɛkɛ kʰɔna jɔnkɛ ɛz̤iswajɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a kuɓɛ kusitʰi ɓakuɓɔna ukuɓa ininz̤i ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni ɛɲukɛ umb̤ali wɔkumkani nɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔmkʰulu ɓajiɓɔpʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwa ɓajiɓalɛ ɛfuɲɛnwɛjɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɓajinikɛla ilinɡ̤anisiwɛ ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤aɓawɛnz̤ajɔ umsɛɓɛnz̤i z̤aɓajikʰanɡ̤ɛlajɔ inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ɓajikʰupʰɛla kɛ aɓɔ kwiiŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi z̤ɛmitʰi nakuɓakʰi aɓajisɛɓɛnz̤ajɔ inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nakuɓakʰi ɓɛɛnd̤ɔnɡ̤a nakuɓakǁʰɔli ɓamatʲɛ ukuɓa ɓatʰɛnɡ̤ɛ imitʰi namatʲɛ akǁʰɔliwɛjɔ ukuɓa kutʲwinwɛ iintand̤a z̤ɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ɓɛjikʰupʰɛla intɔ jɔnkɛ ɛkʰut͡ʃɛlwɛ ukuɬaz̤ija inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a kɛ inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ajɛnz̤ɛlwanɡ̤a z̤itʲa z̤asiliv̤ɛrɛ naz̤it͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ naz̤itʲa z̤ɔkut͡ʃiz̤a namakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ naɲɛ impaɬa jɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ naɲɛ impaɬa jɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɡ̤ɛmali lɛjɔ iɓiz̤iswɛ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɓasuka ɓajinika aɓɛnz̤i ɓɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i ukuɓa ɓaɬaz̤ijɛ nɡ̤ajɔ inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓalɛlani namad̤ɔd̤a aɓaɓɛjinikɛla ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤awɔ lɛjɔ ukuɓa aɬawulɛ aɓɛnz̤i ɓɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓɛsɛɓɛnz̤a ɛɲanisɛkilɛ kɛ jɛd̤ini lɛtʲala nɛmali jɛlɛsɔnɔ iɓinɡ̤az̤iswa ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a jaɓa jɛjaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa uhaz̤ajɛli wakwaaram wɛɲuka waja nɛɡ̤ati wajitʰimɓa uhaz̤ajɛli waɓub̤ɛkisa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ ukuɓa ɛɲukɛ ajɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm waz̤itʰaɓatʰa ujɔwaʃɛ wakwajud̤a z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ aɓaɓɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisilɛ ɔɔjɛhɔʃafati nɔjɛhɔram nɔahaz̤ija ɔɔjisɛ ɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a nɛz̤akʰɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ jɔnkɛ ɛjafumanɛkajɔ ɛɓuŋǀwanɛni ɓɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nɔɓɛnɮu jɔkumkani waz̤itʰumɛla kuhaz̤ajɛli wakwaaram wɛɲuka kɛ wɛmka ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikajɔwaʃɛ nakɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a
