ɓasuka aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓakǀɛɓa ikǀɛɓɔ ɓamɓulala ujɔwaʃɛ ɛnɮwini jasɛmilɔ ɛkujiwɛni ɛsila ujɔz̤akarɛ uɲana kaʃimɛhati nɔjɔz̤ab̤ad̤i uɲana kaʃɔmɛrɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓamkǁaɓɛla kɛ ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla kɔɔjisɛ ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ uamat͡sija uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi ɔmaɓini anamitʰatʰu kajɔwaʃɛ uɲana kaahaz̤ija wakwajud̤a waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ujɛhɔwahaz̤i uɲana kajɛhu kumasirajɛli kwasamari imiɲaka jaliʃumi ɛlinɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a waland̤ɛla iz̤ɔnɔ z̤ikajarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kanɛb̤ati awawɔnisa nɡ̤az̤ɔ amasirajɛli akatʲɛka kuz̤ɔ wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a kumasirajɛli wawanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sikahaz̤ajɛli wakwaaram nasɛsanɮɛni sikab̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤i uɲana kahaz̤ajɛli jɔnkɛ imiɬa ujɛhɔwahaz̤i wamɓɔnɡ̤ɔz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a wamv̤a kɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wakuɓɔna ukukǁinwa kwamasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wamaaram wajɛwakǁinilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a amasirajɛli umsind̤isi apʰuma pʰant͡si kwɛsanɮa samaaram ɓaɬala ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛz̤intɛntɛni z̤aɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwanɡ̤apʰamɓili nakuɓa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤atʲɛkanɡ̤a ɛz̤ɔnwɛni z̤ɛnɮu kajarɔb̤ɛham awawɔnisa nɡ̤az̤ɔ amasirajɛli ahamɓa kuz̤ɔ nɔaʃɛra wajɛsɛmi kwasamari nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akamʃijɛlanɡ̤a ɓantu ujɛhɔwahaz̤i jaɓa nɡ̤amaʃumi amaɬanu aɓamahaʃɛ nɛʃumi lɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa nɛʃumi ɔmkǃikɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa waɓat͡ʃaɓalalisa wakwaaram waɓɛnz̤a ɓaɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔtʰuli lɔkuɲatʰɛlwa ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikajɛhɔwahaz̤i nakɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ nɔɓuk͡xɔti ɓakʰɛ az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli walala ujɛhɔwahaz̤i kɔɔjisɛ ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla kwasamari ujɛhɔhaʃɛ uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kajɔwaʃɛ wakwajud̤a ujɛhɔhaʃɛ uɲana kajɛhɔwahaz̤i waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani wamasirajɛli kwasamari imiɲaka ɛliʃumi ɛlinamitʰand̤atʰu wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a akatʲɛka kwiz̤ɔnɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ikajarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kanɛb̤ati awawɔnisa nɡ̤az̤ɔ amasirajɛli wahamɓa kuz̤ɔ ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikajɛhɔhaʃɛ nakɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ nɔɓuk͡xɔti ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ nɔamat͡sija wakwajud̤a az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli walala ujɛhɔhaʃɛ kɔɔjisɛ ujarɔb̤ɛham waɬala ɛtrɔnɛni jakʰɛ ujɛhɔhaʃɛ waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa kwasamari kɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli kɛ kalɔku uɛliʃa wajɛsifa sisifɔ awajɛz̤a sisɔ wɛɬa ujɛhɔhaʃɛ wakwasirajɛli waja kujɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ watʰi ɓawɔ ɓawɔ ŋǃwɛlɔ jɔkulwa jakwasirajɛli naɓamahaʃɛ ɓakʰɛ uɛliʃa watʰi kujɛ tʰaɓatʰa isapʰɛtʰa nɛɛntɔlɔ wasitʰaɓatʰa kɛ isapʰɛtʰa nɛɛntɔlɔ watʰi wakwasirajɛli sitʲɛd̤ɛ isapʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɔ wasitʲɛd̤a nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɛ uɛliʃa waɓɛka ɛz̤akʰɛ iz̤anɮa ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤ɔkumkani watʰi v̤ula ifɛstilɛ nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a wajiv̤ula watʰi uɛliʃa tɔla watɔla watʰi hunt͡ʃu utɔlɔ lɔsind̤isɔ lukajɛhɔv̤a utɔlɔ lɔsind̤isɔ ɔlukǀʰasɛ amaaram uja kut͡ʃɔ nɡ̤alɔ kumaaram ɛafɛki ad̤ɛ apʰɛlɛ watʰi z̤itʰaɓatʰɛ iintɔlɔ waz̤itʰaɓatʰa watʰi wakwasirajɛli tɔla ɛm̤laɓɛni wat͡ʃɔ iz̤iɬanɮɔ z̤az̤itʰatʰu wajɛka wɛsuka umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ wanɔɓuxalaxumɛ nɡ̤akujɛ watʰi unɡ̤ɛ ut͡ʃɔ iz̤iɬanɮɔ z̤az̤iɬanu nɔkuɓa z̤itʰand̤atʰu ukuz̤ɛ uɓɛ uja kut͡ʃɔ kumaaram ad̤ɛ apʰɛlɛ usɛluja kut͡ʃɔ kumaaram iz̤iɬanɮɔ z̤iɓɛ z̤itʰatʰu kupʰɛla wafa uɛliʃa ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa kɛ amamɔwab̤i ɛɓɛɮa nɡ̤ɔkulinɡ̤ɛnɛla iliz̤wɛ ukutʰwasa kɔmɲaka kwatʰi ɓɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ind̤ɔd̤a ɓaɓɔna nɡ̤amatutu ɛv̤ɛla ɓajipʰɔsa ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni likaɛliʃa itʰɛ ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ jakufika ɛmatʰand͡ʒ̤ɛni kaɛliʃa jasuka japʰila jɛma nɡ̤ɛɛɲawɔ kɛ kalɔku uhaz̤ajɛli wamaaram wajɛwakǁinilɛ amasirajɛli jɔnkɛ imiɬa kajɛhɔwahaz̤i ujɛhɔv̤a wawaɓaɓala jimfɛsanɛ nɡ̤awɔ wawab̤ɛka nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ wakʰɛ nɔaɓraham nɔisakɛ nɔjakɔɓi akav̤uma ukuwɔnakalisa nɔkuwalaɬa ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ unanɡ̤ɔku wafa uhaz̤ajɛli wamaaram ub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ waɓuja ujɛhɔhaʃɛ uɲana kajɛhɔwahaz̤i wajitʰimɓa imiz̤i kub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ uɲana kahaz̤ajɛli awajɛjitʰimɓɛ jɛna kujɛhɔwahaz̤i ujisɛ nɡ̤ɛmfaz̤wɛ ujɛhɔhaʃɛ wamɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa iz̤iɬanɮɔ z̤az̤itʰatʰu wajiɓujisa imiz̤i jakwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsiɓini kajɛhɔhaʃɛ uɲana kajɛhɔwahaz̤i wakwasirajɛli waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani uamat͡sija uɲana kajɔwaʃɛ wakwajud̤a uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini anamiɬanu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛmaʃumi maɓini anɛsitʰɔɓa ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina ɓɛlinɡ̤ujɛhɔwad̤an wasɛjɛrusalɛm wɛnz̤a ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a kɔd̤wa akaɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ ujisɛ wɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ ujɔwaʃɛ ujisɛ kɔd̤wa z̤ɔna iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a az̤isuswanɡ̤a aɓantu ɓaɓɛsaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla ɓɛkǃʰumisɛla ɛz̤inɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni watʰi ɓakukǃinisɛka uɓukumkani ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ waɓaɓulala aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ aɓaɓɛmɓulɛlɛ ujisɛ kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓaɓulali aɓɔ akaɓaɓulalanɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kub̤aliwɛjɔ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɔmjalɛlɔ kamɔsɛs apʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wajɛwisɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkutʰi ɔɔjisɛ maɓanɡ̤aɓulawa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɔɲana ɔɔɲana maɓanɡ̤aɓulawa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɔjisɛ ɛlɔwɔ makaɓulawɛ nɡ̤ɛsakʰɛ isɔnɔ wawaɓulala amaɛd̤ɔm ɛsiɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni sɛtʲuwa iʃumi wajitʰimɓa iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa nɡ̤ɔkulwa watʰi iɡ̤ama lajɔ jijɔkɛtɛlɛ unanam̤la waz̤a uamat͡sija watʰumɛla aɓatʰuɲwa kujɛhɔhaʃɛ uɲana kajɛhɔwahaz̤i uɲana kajɛhu wakwasirajɛli ɛsitʰi jiz̤a sikǃwalasɛlanɛ nɡ̤amɛɬɔ ujɛhɔhaʃɛ wakwasirajɛli watʰumɛla kuamat͡sija wakwajud̤a watʰi ikʰakakʰaka ɛlisɛlɛb̤anɔn latʰumɛla kumsɛd̤arɛ ɔsɛlɛb̤anɔn lisitʰi uɲana mnikɛ intɔmɓi jakʰɔ iɓɛ nɡ̤umkakʰɛ kɛ ixamŋǀwa lasɛlɛb̤anɔn laliwɛla lalib̤ukǃa ikʰakakʰaka ɛlɔ uwaɓulɛlɛ ɔkunɛnɛ amaɛd̤ɔm jakupʰakamisa intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ z̤uka nɡ̤alɔɔ ntɔ uɬalɛ ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ jini ukuɓa ufɛkɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuɓi uwɛ wɛna namajud̤a anawɛ akapʰulapʰula uamat͡sija wɛɲuka kɛ ujɛhɔhaʃɛ wakwasirajɛli ɓakǃwalasɛlana nɡ̤amɛɬɔ jɛna nɔamat͡sija wakwajud̤a ɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ ɛjɛjakwajud̤a akǃɔnd̤iswa kɛ amajud̤a nɡ̤amasirajɛli janɡ̤ulɔwɔ wasaɓɛla ɛntɛntɛni jakʰɛ ujɛhɔhaʃɛ wakwasirajɛli wamɓamɓa uamat͡sija wakwajud̤a uɲana kajɔwaʃɛ uɲana kaahaz̤ija ɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ wɛz̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm walukǃʰɛkɛz̤a ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lwɛjɛrusalɛm watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lakwaɛfrajim wɛsa ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɛmɓɔmɓɔ ikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imakʰulu manɛ wajitʰaɓatʰa jɔnkɛ iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤afumanɛkajɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nasɛɓuŋǀwanɛni ɓɛnɮu jɔkumkani naɓaz̤iz̤iɓamɓisɔ waɓujɛla kwasamari ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikajɛhɔhaʃɛ awaz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ nɔɓuk͡xɔti ɓakʰɛ nɔkulwa kwakʰɛ nɔamat͡sija wakwajud̤a az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli walala ujɛhɔhaʃɛ kɔɔjisɛ waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa kwasamari nd̤awɔɲɛ nɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli ujarɔb̤ɛham uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ waɮa uɓɔmi uamat͡sija uɲana kajɔwaʃɛ wakwajud̤a imiɲaka ɛliʃumi linɛsiɬanu ɛmv̤a kɔkufa kukajɛhɔhaʃɛ uɲana kajɛhɔwahaz̤i wakwasirajɛli ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikaamat͡sija az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a ɓamkǀɛɓa ɛjɛrusalɛm wasaɓɛla ɛlakiʃɛ ɓamsukɛla ɓamfumana ɛlakiʃɛ ɓamɓulalɛla kʰɔna ɓamtʰwala nɡ̤amahaʃɛ ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla ɛjɛrusalɛm kɔɔjisɛ ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓakwajud̤a ɓamtʰaɓatʰa uaz̤arija akuɓɔn ukuɓa umiɲaka iliʃumi linamitʰand̤atʰu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ɓamɛnz̤a ɛsikʰunɮɛni sikaamat͡sija ujisɛ jakʰiwa nɡ̤ujɛ iɛlati wajiɓujisɛla kumajud̤a ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa walalajɔ kɔɔjisɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɬanu kaamat͡sija uɲana kajɔwaʃɛ wakwajud̤a waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ujarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kajɛhɔhaʃɛ wakwasirajɛli kwasamari imiɲaka jamaʃumi manɛ anamɲɛ wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a akatʲɛka ɛz̤ɔnwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ikajarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kanɛb̤ati awawɔnisa nɡ̤az̤ɔ amasirajɛli jɛna wawuɓujisa umd̤a wakwasirajɛli watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛhamati wɛsa kulwanɮɛ lwɛarab̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakwasirajɛli awalitʰɛtʰajɔ nɡ̤ɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɛ ujɔna uɲana kaamitaji umprɔfɛti wasɛɡ̤atihɛfɛrɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a wakuɓɔna ukuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwa kwamasirajɛli ukuɓa kuk͡xak͡xa kakʰulu upʰɛlilɛ ɔv̤alɛlwɛjɔ upʰɛlilɛ ɔv̤ulɛlwɛjɔ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ namŋǀɛd̤i kwasirajɛli ujɛhɔv̤a akat͡ʃɔnɡ̤ɔ ukutʰi uja kulikǀima iɡ̤ama lamasirajɛli pʰant͡si kwɛz̤ulu wawasind̤isa kɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikajarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kajɛhɔhaʃɛ ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikajarɔb̤ɛham nakɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ nɔɓuk͡xɔti ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ awajiɓujisɛla nɡ̤aɓɔ id̤amaskɔ nɛhamati jakwajud̤a kumasirajɛli az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli walala ujarɔb̤ɛham kɔɔjisɛ kɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli uz̤ɛkarija uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi ɔmaɓini anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kajarɔb̤ɛham wakwasirajɛli waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani uaz̤arija uɲana kaamat͡sija wakwajud̤a uɓɛmiɲaka iliʃumi linamitʰand̤atʰu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛmaʃumi maɬanu anamiɓini ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina ɓɛlinɡ̤ujɛkɔlija wasɛjɛrusalɛm wɛnz̤a ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ uamat͡sija ujisɛ kɔd̤wa az̤isuswanɡ̤a iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a aɓantu ɓaɓɛsaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla ɓɛkǃʰumisɛla ɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni ujɛhɔv̤a wamɓɛtʰa waɓa nɛkǃʰɛŋǃa kwad̤a kwajimini jɔkufa kwakʰɛ waɬala ɛnɮwini ɛjɔd̤wa kɛ ujɔtam uɲana wɔkumkani ɛɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ ib̤ɔtwɛ ɛɓalawula aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikaaz̤arija nakɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a walala uaz̤arija kɔɔjisɛ ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla kɔɔjisɛ ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ujɔtam uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ kaaz̤arija wakwajud̤a waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani uz̤ɛkarija uɲana kajarɔb̤ɛham kumasirajɛli kwasamari iiɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤intand̤atʰu wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ ɔɔjisɛ akatʲɛka ɛz̤ɔnwɛni z̤ikajarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kanɛb̤ati awawɔnisa nɡ̤az̤ɔ amasirajɛli uʃalum uɲana kajab̤ɛʃɛ wamkǀɛɓa wamkǁaɓɛla pʰamɓi kwaɓantu wamɓulala waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikaz̤ɛkarija nanz̤ɔ z̤ib̤aliwɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli liliz̤wi ɛlɔ awalitʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kujɛhu lɔkutʰi kuwɛ kuja kuɬala ɔɔɲana ɓɛsɛsinɛ isiz̤ukulwana ɛtrɔnɛni jakwasirajɛli kwaɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ uʃalum uɲana kajab̤ɛʃɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu anɛsitʰɔɓa kauz̤ija wakwajud̤a waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani iɲanɡ̤a ipʰɛla kwasamari wɛɲuka umɛnahɛm uɲana kaɡ̤ad̤i ɛsuka ɛtirt͡sa waja kwasamari wamkǁaɓɛla uʃalum uɲana kajab̤ɛʃɛ kwasamari wamɓulala waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikaʃalum nɛkǀɛɓɔ lakʰɛ awalikǀɛɓajɔ nanz̤ɔ z̤ib̤alwɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli waz̤a umɛnahɛm wakǀʰitʰa itifɛsa nɛntɔ jɔnkɛ ɛɓikujɔ nɛmid̤a jajɔ ɛpʰuma ɛtirt͡sa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɡ̤amv̤ulɛlanɡ̤a wajikǁaɓɛla waɓakǃaŋ̤ǃ̤ulula ɓɔnkɛ aɓamitʰijɔ kujɔ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu anɛsitʰɔɓa kaaz̤arija wakwajud̤a waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani umɛnahɛm uɲana kaɡ̤ad̤i kumasirajɛli kwasamari imiɲaka jaliʃumi wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a akatʲɛka ɛz̤ɔnwɛni z̤ikajarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kanɛb̤ati awawɔnisa nɡ̤az̤ɔ amasirajɛli jɔnkɛ imiɬa jakʰɛ walifikɛla iliz̤wɛ upuli wasɛasirija umɛnahɛm upuli lɛɛtalɛntɛ z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ukuz̤ɛ iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ z̤iɓɛ nɡ̤akujɛ ukuz̤ɛ aɓukǃinisɛ uɓukumkani ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ umɛnahɛm wajiɓiz̤a isiliv̤ɛrɛ lɛjɔ kumasirajɛli kumad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ az̤iz̤itʲɛɓi ukuɓa anikɛ wasɛasirija janɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmaɬanu ɛɛʃɛkɛlɛ z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛmɲɛ waɓuja kɛ wasɛasirija akaɬala ɛz̤wɛni ɛlɔ ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikamɛnahɛm nakɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli walala umɛnahɛm kɔɔjisɛ upɛkaja uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi ɔmaɬanu kaaz̤arija wakwajud̤a waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani upɛkaja uɲana kamɛnahɛm kumasirajɛli kwasamari imiɲaka jamiɓini wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a akatʲɛka ɛz̤ɔnwɛni z̤ikajarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kanɛb̤ati awawɔnisa nɡ̤az̤ɔ amasirajɛli upɛka uɲana karɛmalija umpʰatʰimkʰɔsi wakʰɛ wamkǀɛɓa wamkǁaɓɛla kwasamari ɛŋǃaɓɛni jɛnɮu jɔkumkani nɔarɡ̤ɔb̤i nɔarijɛ ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmaɬanu kɔɔɲana ɓamaɡ̤ilijad̤i wamɓulala waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikapɛkaja nakɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ nanz̤ɔ z̤ib̤aliwɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi ɔmaɬanu anamaɓini kaaz̤arija wakwajud̤a upɛka uɲana karɛmalija waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kumasirajɛli kwasamari imiɲaka jamaʃumi maɓini wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a akatʲɛka ɛz̤ɔnwɛni z̤ikajarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kanɛb̤ati awawɔnisa nɡ̤az̤ɔ amasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kapɛka wakwasirajɛli utiɡ̤ɛlatɛpilɛz̤ɛrɛ wasɛasirija wajitʰaɓatʰa iijɔn nɛab̤ɛlɛb̤ɛtɛmahaka nɛjanɔwa nɛkɛd̤ɛʃɛ nɛhat͡sɔrɛ nɛlasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i nɛlasɛɡ̤alili lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lakwanafɛtali waɓatʰimɓa waɓafud̤usa waɓasa ɛasirija uhɔsɛja uɲana kaɛla wamkǀɛɓa upɛka uɲana karɛmalija wamkǁaɓɛla wamɓulala waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi amaɓini kajɔtam uɲana kauz̤ija ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikapɛka nakɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ nanz̤ɔ z̤ib̤aliwɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsiɓini kapɛka uɲana karɛmalija wakwasirajɛli waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ujɔtam uɲana kauz̤ija wakwajud̤a uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini anamiɬanu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛliʃumi linamitʰand̤atʰu ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina ɓɛlinɡ̤ujɛruʃa intɔmɓi kat͡sad̤ɔki wɛnz̤a ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a wɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ uuz̤ija ujisɛ kɔd̤wa iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a az̤isuswanɡ̤a aɓantu ɓaɓɛsaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla ɓɛkǃʰumisɛla ɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni jɛna walakʰa isanɡ̤ɔ lanɡ̤asɛntla lɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikajɔtam nakɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa wakǃala ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰumɛla kwajud̤a urɛt͡sin wakwaaram nɔpɛka uɲana karɛmalija walala ujɔtam kɔɔjisɛ waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa kɔɔjisɛ ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ujisɛ uahaz̤i uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kapɛka uɲana karɛmalija waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani uahaz̤i uɲana kajɔtam wakwajud̤a uahaz̤i uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛliʃumi linamitʰand̤atʰu ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm akakwɛnz̤a ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ ujisɛ wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ wamkǀand̤isa ɛmlilwɛni uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkwamasikiz̤i ɛɛntlanɡ̤a awaz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤ajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a pʰamɓi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli waɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla wakǃʰumisɛla ɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni nasɛz̤ind̤ulini napʰant͡si kwɛmitʰi jɔnkɛ ɛluɬaz̤a kwaz̤a kwɛɲuka urɛt͡sin wakwaaram nɔpɛka uɲana karɛmalija wakwasirajɛli ɓɛz̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm ɓamŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a uahaz̤i aɓaɓa nakɔ ukumɛjisa nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa urɛt͡sin wakwaaram wajiɓujisɛla iɛlati kumaaram wawaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa amajud̤a ɛɛlati ɛz̤a amaaram ɛɛlati aɬala kʰɔna unanam̤la watʰumɛla aɓatʰuɲwa uahaz̤i kutiɡ̤ɛlatɛpilɛz̤ɛrɛ wasɛasirija watʰi nd̤inɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ nd̤inɡ̤uɲana wakʰɔ ɲuka uz̤ɛ kund̤isind̤isa ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wakwaaram nasɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wakwasirajɛli aɓand̤iv̤unukɛlɛjɔ uahaz̤i wajitʰaɓatʰa isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛjafumanɛkajɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nasɛɓuŋǀwanɛni ɓɛnɮu jɔkumkani wajitʰumɛla wasɛasirija isisikǀɛnɡ̤ɔ ukumkani wasɛasirija wampʰulapʰula wɛɲuka wasɛasirija waja ɛd̤amaskɔ wajitʰimɓa waɓafud̤usa aɓantu waɓasa ɛkiri wamɓulala urɛt͡sin ukumkani uahaz̤i waja kum̤lanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a utiɡ̤ɛlatɛpilɛz̤ɛrɛ wasɛasirija ɛd̤amaskɔ waɓɔna isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛsisɛd̤amaskɔ uahaz̤i wajitʰumɛla imfanɔ jɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛsɔ isilinɡ̤anisɔ sasɔ nɡ̤ɔkusɛtʲɛnz̤wa kwasɔ kɔnkɛ kuurija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wasakʰa kɛ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ uurija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ aɓɛmtʰumɛlɛ kʰɔna uahaz̤i ɛd̤amaskɔ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ uurija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wad̤a uahaz̤i ɛv̤ɛla ɛd̤amaskɔ wɛz̤a ɛv̤ɛla ɛd̤amaskɔ wasiɓɔna isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛsɔ wasɔnd̤ɛla kusɔ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɛɲuka waja kusɔ wakǃʰumisɛla nɡ̤ɛd̤ini lakʰɛ ɛliɲukajɔ nanɡ̤ɔmnikɛlɔ wakʰɛ wɔkuɮa watʰulula umnikɛlɔ wakʰɛ ɔtʰululwajɔ wat͡ʃiz̤a nɡ̤ɛɡ̤az̤i lɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jakʰɛ jɔkǁɔlɔ ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni kɛ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sɔb̤ɛd̤u ɛsiɓɛ sipʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a pʰamɓi kwɛnɮu pʰakatʰi kwɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sakʰɛ nɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a wasisɔnd̤ɛz̤a wasiɓɛka ɛkǀalɛni lɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɡ̤ɛntla uahaz̤i wamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ uurija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli watʰi pʰɛz̤u kwɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛsikʰulu kǃʰumisɛla nɡ̤ɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ lɔkusa nanɡ̤ɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa wanɡ̤ɔkuɬwa nanɡ̤ɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ lɔkumkani nanɡ̤ɔmnikɛlɔ wakʰɛ wɔkuɮa nanɡ̤ɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ laɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛliz̤wɛ nanɡ̤ɔmnikɛlɔ waɓɔ wɔkuɮa nanɡ̤ɛminikɛlɔ jaɓɔ ɛtʰululwajɔ ut͡ʃiz̤ɛ kusɔ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤az̤i lɔnkɛ lɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nɛɡ̤az̤i lɔnkɛ lɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ kɛ sɔna isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sɔb̤ɛd̤u nd̤ija kukʰa nd̤iɓuz̤isɛ nɡ̤asɔ wɛnz̤a kɛ uurija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ uahaz̤i ukumkani uahaz̤i waz̤ikǃʰawula iipanɛlɛ z̤ɛɛŋǃwɛlwana waz̤isusa kuz̤ɔ iiŋ̤ǃ̤aji walutʰula ulwanɮɛ ɛz̤inkɔmɛni z̤ɔb̤ɛd̤u ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤inɡ̤apʰant͡si kwalɔ waluɓɛka pʰɛz̤u kwɛsisɛkɔ samatʲɛ iɡ̤umɓi ɛlisitʰɛlisiwɛjɔ lɛsaɓatʰa aɓaɓɛlakʰɛ nɡ̤asɛnɮwini nɛnd̤awɔ jɔkunɡ̤ɛna ɛɓinɡ̤apʰanɮɛ wajiʃɛŋǁisɛla ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkumkani wasɛasirija ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikaahaz̤i awaz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a walala uahaz̤i kɔɔjisɛ waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa kɔɔjisɛ ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani uhɛz̤ɛkija uɲana wakʰɛ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɓini kaahaz̤i wakwajud̤a uhɔsɛja uɲana kaɛla waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwasamari kumasirajɛli imiɲaka jasitʰɔɓa wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nɔkɔ akaɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli aɓaɓɛpʰamɓi kwakʰɛ uʃalɛmanɛsɛrɛ wasɛasirija wɛɲuka wamfikɛla uhɔsɛja waɓa nɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɛ ɛmxɔlɛla iminikɛlɔ kɛ kalɔku wasɛasirija uhɔsɛja ɛlipʰamɓa nɡ̤ɔkutʰi atʰumɛ iz̤iɡ̤id̤imi kusɔ wamajiputa anɡ̤awuɲusi awusɛ umnikɛlɔ wasɛasirija nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwɛmiɲaka nɡ̤ɛmiɲaka wasɛasirija wamv̤alɛla kɛ wamkʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰a ɛntɔlɔnɡ̤wɛni ukumkani wasɛasirija waliɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ wɛɲuka waja kumz̤i wakwasamari wawuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a imiɲaka ɛmitʰatʰu nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsitʰɔɓa kahɔsɛja wasɛasirija wawutʰimɓa umz̤i wakwasamari wawafud̤usɛla amasirajɛli ɛasirija wawaɓɛka ɛhala nasɛhab̤ɔrɛ ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔjiɡ̤ɔz̤an nasɛmiz̤ini jamamɛd̤i kwɛnz̤ɛka ɔkɔ kuɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɔnajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɔwaɓaɲusajɔ ɛz̤wɛni lamajiputa waɓaxɔla pʰant͡si kwɛsanɮa sikafarɔ wasɛjiputa ɓɔjika tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi ɓahamɓa ɛmimisɛlwɛni jɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛɓɛz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɓuswɛni ɓɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nakwɛjɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli aɓaɓɛjɛnz̤ilɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤asɛsɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ɔ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɓaz̤akʰɛla iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a ɛmiz̤ini jaɓɔ jɔnkɛ kwatʰaɓatʰɛla kwiŋǃaɓa jaɓaɓɔnisɛli kwɛsa kumz̤i ɔŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ ɓaz̤imisɛla iz̤imisɔ z̤amatʲɛ nɔɔaʃɛra ɛz̤ind̤ulini z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ napʰant͡si kwɛmitʰi jɔnkɛ ɛluɬaz̤a ɓakǃʰumisɛla kʰɔna ɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni z̤ɔnkɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛntlanɡ̤a awaz̤ifud̤usajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɓuswɛni ɓaɓɔ ɓɛnz̤a iz̤intɔ ɛz̤imɓi z̤ɔkumkǃumɓisa ujɛhɔv̤a ɓakʰɔnz̤a iz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ ɛz̤iz̤iz̤itʰikǁɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kuɓɔ iz̤ɛ ninɡ̤az̤ɛnz̤i ɛz̤ɔ ntɔ wakǃɔnɔnɔnd̤isa ujɛhɔv̤a kwasirajɛli nakwajud̤a nɡ̤aɓaprɔfɛti ɓɔnkɛ iimɓɔni nɡ̤ɛɛmɓɔni ɛsitʰi ɓujani ɛz̤inɮɛlɛni z̤ɛnu ɛz̤imɓi niɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ imitʰɛtʰɔ jam imimisɛlɔ jam nɡ̤ɔkɔmjalɛlɔ wɔnkɛ ɛnd̤awumisɛla ɔɔjiɬɔ ɛnd̤awutʰumɛla nɡ̤ɛsanɮa saɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓam aɓaprɔfɛti aɓɛv̤a ɓaz̤ɛnz̤a lukʰuni iintamɔ z̤aɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛntamɔ z̤ɔɔjisɛ aɓanɡ̤akʰɔlwanɡ̤a nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɓajikǀɛkisa imimisɛlɔ jakʰɛ nɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ wakʰɛ awawɛnz̤ajɔ nɔɔjisɛ ɓaɓɔ nɛz̤iŋ̤ǃ̤inɔ z̤akʰɛ awaz̤iŋ̤ǃ̤inajɔ kuɓɔ ɓaland̤ɛla iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛntɔ ɓaɓa z̤iintɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛntɔ ɓaland̤ɛlana nɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛz̤iɓaŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnɡ̤ilɛjɔ awajɛɓawisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤az̤ɔ ukuɓa ɓanɡ̤ɛnz̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤az̤ɔ ɓajiʃija jɔnkɛ imitʰɛtʰɔ kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɓaz̤ɛnz̤ɛla umfanɛkisɔ ɔtʰʲid̤iwɛjɔ amatʰɔlɛ amaɓini ɓɛnz̤a uaʃɛra ɓakǃuɓud̤a kumkʰɔsi wɔnkɛ wɛz̤ulu ɓakʰɔnz̤a ub̤ahali ɓakǀand̤isa ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤aɓɔ ɛmlilwɛni ɓav̤umisa ɓaɬaɓa iz̤iɬaɓɔ ɓaz̤itʰɛnɡ̤isɛla ukwɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa ɓamkǃumɓisɛ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓa nɔmsind̤ɔ ɔmkʰulu kunɛnɛ kumasirajɛli ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ jaɓa sisiz̤wɛ sakwajud̤a sɔd̤wa ɛsasalajɔ kwanamajud̤a akajiɡ̤ǀ̤inanɡ̤a imitʰɛtʰɔ kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wawɔ ahamɓa nɡ̤ɛmimisɛlɔ jamasirajɛli aɓɛjɛnz̤ilɛ wajilaɬa kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a jɔnkɛ imɓɛwu jakwasirajɛli waɓakǀinɛz̤ɛla waɓanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni saɓapʰanɡ̤i wad̤a waɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wawak͡xaz̤ula amasirajɛli ɛnɮwini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ az̤a amɛnz̤a ujarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kanɛb̤ati ujarɔb̤ɛham wawawɛkǁula amasirajɛli ɛkumland̤ɛlɛni ujɛhɔv̤a wawɔnisa nɡ̤ɛsɔnɔ ɛsikʰulu ɓahamɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛz̤ɔnwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ikajarɔb̤ɛham awaz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ aɓatʲɛka kuz̤ɔ wad̤a ujɛhɔv̤a amasirajɛli ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wakutʰɛtʰajɔ nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaprɔfɛti afud̤uswa kɛ amasirajɛli ɛm̤laɓɛni wawɔ ɛasirija unanam̤la kɛ kalɔku wasɛasirija waz̤isa aɓantu ɓɛv̤ɛla ɛb̤ab̤ɛli nasɛkuta nasɛav̤a nasɛhamati nasɛsɛfarv̤ajim waɓaɓɛka ɛmiz̤ini jakwasamari ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaliɬutʰa ɛlakwasamari ɓaɬala ɛmiz̤ini jalɔ kwatʰi ɛkukǃalɛni kɔkuma kwaɓɔ kʰɔna aɓamɔjika ujɛhɔv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a watʰuma iinɡ̤ɔɲama pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ z̤aja z̤iɓulala pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ɓatʰɛtʰa kɛ wasɛasirija ɓatʰi lintlanɡ̤a ɔz̤ifud̤usilɛjɔ waz̤iɓɛka ɛmiz̤ini jɛlakwasamari az̤ilaz̤i isikɔ lɔtʰikǁɔ wɛli liz̤wɛ uz̤itʰumɛlɛ kɛ iinɡ̤ɔɲama jaɓɔna z̤ijaz̤iɓulala nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa z̤inɡ̤alaz̤i isikɔ lɔtʰikǁɔ wɛli liz̤wɛ wawisa umtʰɛtʰɔ wasɛasirija watʰi jisani apʰɔ ɔmɲɛ waɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛnaɓafud̤usa kʰɔna ajɛ aɬalɛ kʰɔna aɓafund̤isɛ isikɔ lɔtʰikǁɔ wɛli liz̤wɛ waja kɛ ɔmɲɛ waɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓaɓɛfud̤usiwɛ kwɛlakwasamari waɬala ɛb̤ɛtɛli ɛɓafund̤isa ukuɓa maɓatʰini ukumɔjika ujɛhɔv̤a lwajɛ uɬanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤a lusɛnz̤a ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓalɔ luɓamisa ɛz̤inɮwini z̤ɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a awaz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ amasamari uɬanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤a ɛmiz̤ini jalɔ apʰɔ ɓɛluɬala kʰɔna amad̤ɔd̤a asɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛnz̤a usukɔtib̤ɛnɔti amad̤ɔd̤a asɛkuti ɛnz̤a unɛrɛɡ̤alɛ amad̤ɔd̤a asɛhamati ɛnz̤a uaʃima awasɛaja ɛnz̤a unib̤ɛhas nɔtartakɛ awasɛsɛfarv̤ajim at͡ʃisa ɔɔɲana ɓawɔ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ kuad̤ramɛlɛki nɔanamɛlɛki ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓasɛsɛfarv̤ajim ɛɓɛmɔjika nɔjɛhɔv̤a az̤ɛnz̤ɛla ɛluntwini lɔnkɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a aɓaɓɛnz̤ɛla amad̤ini ɛz̤inɮwini z̤ɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a ujɛhɔv̤a ajɛmɔjika ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓawɔ ɛɓakʰɔnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ lɛɛntlanɡ̤a aɓaɓɛfud̤uswɛ kuz̤ɔ unanam̤la ɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwamasikɔ am̤lamnɛnɛ akamɔjiki ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnɡ̤ɛnz̤i nɡ̤ɛjawɔ imimisɛlɔ nanɡ̤ɛlawɔ isikɔ nanɡ̤ɔkɔmjalɛlɔ nɔmtʰɛtʰɔ awaɓawisɛlajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakajakɔɓi iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤usirajɛli wɛnz̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ naɓɔ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ watʰi iz̤ɛ ninɡ̤ɔjiki tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi ninɡ̤aɓaŋǃuli ninɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ninɡ̤aɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kuɓɔ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a jɛd̤wa ɔwaniɲusajɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nɡ̤amanɮa amakʰulu nanɡ̤ɛnɡ̤alɔ ɛjɔlukilɛjɔ nɡ̤ujɛ ɛnija kɔjika jɛna nimŋǃulɛ niɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ kujɛ imimisɛlɔ namasikɔ nɔmjalɛlɔ nɔmtʰɛtʰɔ awanib̤alɛlajɔ niɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ ukwɛnz̤a jɔna jɔnkɛ imiɬa ninɡ̤ɔjiki tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɛnd̤awɛnz̤a ninɡ̤awuliɓali wɔna ninɡ̤ɔjiki tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu jɛd̤wa ɛnija kɔjika jɛna wɔniɬanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni sɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤ɛnu jɛna aɓapʰulapʰulanɡ̤a ɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ laɓɔ lam̤lamnɛnɛ z̤ajɛ z̤isitʰi kɛ ɛz̤ɔ ntlanɡ̤a z̤ɔjikɛ ujɛhɔv̤a z̤ikʰɔnz̤ɛ nɛmifanɛkisɔ jaz̤ɔ ɛkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ aɓantwana ɓaz̤ɔ naɓantwana ɓaɓantwana ɓaz̤ɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ ɔɔjisɛ ɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ naɓɔ unanam̤la kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsitʰatʰu kahɔsɛja uɲana kaɛla wakwasirajɛli waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani uhɛz̤ɛkija uɲana kaahaz̤i wakwajud̤a uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini anamiɬanu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛmaʃumi maɓini anɛsitʰɔɓa ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina liɓɛ linɡ̤uab̤i intɔmɓi kaz̤ɛkarija wɛnz̤a ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ujisɛ waz̤isusa iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a waz̤ikǃʰɛkɛz̤a iz̤imisɔ z̤amatʲɛ wamɡ̤awula uaʃɛra wajikǃɔɓa iɲɔka jɔb̤ɛd̤u awajɛnz̤ajɔ umɔsɛs nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kwad̤a kwajilɔɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛkǃʰumisɛla kujɔ kwatʰiwa lɔɔ ntɔ lub̤ɛd̤u nd͡ʒ̤ɛ kɔd̤wa wakʰɔlɔsa nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɛmv̤ɛni kwakʰɛ akuɓanɡ̤akʰɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ajɛ pʰakatʰi kɔɔkumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɓakwajud̤a napʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ɓaɓɛkʰɔ nɡ̤apʰamɓi kwakʰɛ wanamatʰɛla kujɛhɔv̤a akatʲɛka ɛkumland̤ɛlɛni wajiɡ̤ǀ̤ina imitʰɛtʰɔ aɓɛtʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wajiwisɛla umɔsɛs ujɛhɔv̤a waɓa najɛ wɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ ɛz̤intwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ az̤ipʰumɛlɛjɔ waɡ̤wilika wasɛasirija akamkʰɔnz̤a jɛna wawakǁaɓɛla amafilisti wad̤a wɛsa ɛɡ̤az̤a nasɛmd̤ɛni wajɔ watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛŋǃaɓɛni jaɓaɓɔnisɛli wɛsa ɛmz̤ini ɔŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsinɛ wɔkumkani uhɛz̤ɛkija lɔwɔ nɡ̤umɲaka wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kahɔsɛja uɲana kaɛla wakwasirajɛli wɛɲuka uʃalɛmanɛsɛrɛ wasɛasirija wawufikɛla umz̤i wakwasamari wawuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a ɓawutʰimɓa ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɲaka ɛmitʰatʰu nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsitʰand̤atʰu kahɛz̤ɛkija lɔwɔ nɡ̤umɲaka wɛsitʰɔɓa kahɔsɛja wakwasirajɛli watʰind͡ʒ̤wa kɛ umz̤i wakwasamari ukumkani wasɛasirija wawafud̤usɛla amasirajɛli ɛasirija ɓɛka ɛhala nasɛhab̤ɔrɛ ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔjiɡ̤ɔz̤an nasɛmiz̤ini jamamɛd̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɛnɡ̤alipʰulapʰulanɡ̤a iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wawɔ ɛsuka awuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wakʰɛ nakɔ kɔnkɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a akɛv̤a akɛnz̤a kɛ kalɔku nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsinɛ wɔkumkani uhɛz̤ɛkija wɛɲuka usanɛrib̤ɛ wasɛasirija waja kujɔ jɔnkɛ imiz̤i ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ jakwajud̤a wajitʰaɓatʰa uhɛz̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a watʰumɛla wasɛasirija ɛlakiʃɛ ɛsitʰi nd̤ɔnilɛ ɓuja umkɛ ɔtʰɛ wakuɓɛka pʰɛz̤u nd̤ɔkutʰwala waz̤a wasɛasirija waɓɛka pʰɛz̤u kɔhɛz̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a amakʰulu ɔmatʰatʰu ɛɛtalɛntɛ z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ namaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu ɛɛtalɛntɛ z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ uhɛz̤ɛkija jɔnkɛ isiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛjafuɲanwa ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nasɛɓuŋǀwanɛni ɓɛnɮu jɔkumkani nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa uhɛz̤ɛkija wajiŋǃamla iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ jɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤ɛtɛmpilɛ kajɛhɔv̤a nɛmiɡ̤uɓasi aɓɛjalɛkilɛ uhɛz̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a wajinika wasɛasirija ukumkani wasɛasirija utartan nɔrab̤ɛsarisi nɔrab̤ɛʃakɛ ɛlakiʃɛ ɓaja uhɛz̤ɛkija ɛjɛrusalɛm ɓɛnɛmpi ɛnz̤ima ɓɛɲuka ɓaja ɛjɛrusalɛm ɓɛɲuka kɛ ɓafika ɓɛma ɛmd͡ʒ̤ɛlwɛni wɛkǀʰiɓi lanɡ̤asɛntla ɔsɛmɛnd̤wɛni wɛnt͡simi jɔmsuki wɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɓamɛmɛz̤a kwapʰuma kwaja kuɓɔ uɛlijakim uɲana kahilɛkija umpʰatʰi wɛnɮu nɔʃɛb̤ɛna umb̤ali nɔjɔwa uɲana kaasafu umkʰumɓuz̤i wɛz̤intɔ z̤akɔmkʰulu watʰi kuɓɔ urab̤ɛʃakɛ kʰanitʰi kuhɛz̤ɛkija ut͡ʃɔ ɔmkʰulu wasɛasirija ukutʰi jɛjani lɛ nkɔlɔsɛkɔ ukʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ajɔ utʰi utʰɛtʰa intɔ jɔmlɔmɔ wɔd̤wa unɛkǃʰinɡ̤a nɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓɔkulwa ukʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤aɓani uɡ̤wilikɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujaɓɔna ukʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ msimɛlɛlɔ wɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ ɛv̤ikiv̤ɛkilɛjɔ ijiputa ɛtʰi ɔtʰɛ wajama nɡ̤ajɔ imnɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛsanɮɛni im̤laɓɛ und͡ʒ̤alɔ ufarɔ wasɛjiputa kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ajɛ kɛ ukuɓa nitʰi sikʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nd̤itʰi asinɡ̤ujɛ lɔ uz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a nɛz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ az̤isusilɛjɔ uhɛz̤ɛkija wat͡ʃɔ kumajud̤a nakwijɛrusalɛm ukutʰi iz̤ɛ nikǃuɓud̤ɛ pʰamɓi kwɛsi siɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm apʰa kʰawuɓɛkɛlanɛ kalɔku nɛnkɔsi jam wasɛasirija nd̤ɔkunika amaɓini amahaʃɛ ukuɓa unakɔ ukund̤inika aɓakʰwɛli ɓɔkukʰwɛla kuwɔ wɔtʰini ukuɓud͡ʒ̤ika uɓusɔ ɓɛnkɔsana ɛɲɛ jakuɓɔ aɓaŋǀinanɛ ɓaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛnkɔsi jam ukʰɔlɔsɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛjiputa nɡ̤ɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa nanɡ̤aɓamahaʃɛ nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤iɲukɛ nd̤ɛz̤a kujɔnakalisa lɛ nd̤awɔ nd̤inɡ̤ɛnajɛ ujɛhɔv̤a jini nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a lɔ utʰɛ ɲuka ujɛ kulɔnakalisa ɛli liz̤wɛ watʰi uɛlijakim uɲana kahilɛkija nɔʃɛb̤ɛna nɔjɔwa kurab̤ɛʃakɛ kʰawutʰɛtʰɛ kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛsiaram kuɓa sisiv̤a musa ukutʰɛtʰa natʰi nɡ̤ɛsijud̤a ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤aɓantu aɓasɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni watʰi urab̤ɛʃakɛ kuɓɔ inkɔsi jam ind̤itʰumɛ ukuɓa nd̤iwatʰɛtʰɛ maz̤wi ɛnkɔsini jakʰɔ nakuwɛ asikula mad̤ɔd̤a aɬɛlijɔ ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni jini ukuz̤ɛ aɮɛ ilinɮɛ lawɔ asɛlɛ umkǀʰamɔ wawɔ wɛma urab̤ɛʃakɛ wad̤and̤uluka nɡ̤ɛliz̤wi ɛlikʰulu nɡ̤ɛsijud̤a watʰɛtʰa watʰi jiv̤ani iliz̤wi lɔkumkani ɔmkʰulu lɔkumkani wasɛasirija utʰi makanɡ̤anilukuɬi uhɛz̤ɛkija nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akaji kuɓa nakɔ nkuniɬanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni makanɡ̤anikʰɔlɔsisi nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a uhɛz̤ɛkija ɛsitʰi inɛnɛ uja kusiɬanɡ̤ula ujɛhɔv̤a lɔ mz̤i awusaji kunikɛlwa ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wasɛasirija musani ukumpʰulapʰula uhɛz̤ɛkija nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ wasɛasirija ukutʰi kǁɔlisanani nipʰumɛ niz̤ɛ niɮɛ ɛlɔwɔ umd̤ilija wakʰɛ ɛlɔwɔ umkʰiwanɛ wakʰɛ nisɛlɛ ɛlɔwɔ amanz̤i ɛkǃula lakʰɛ nd̤id̤ɛ nd̤iz̤ɛ nd̤inisɛ ɛz̤wɛni ɛlind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛliz̤wɛ lɛnu iliz̤wɛ lɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛwajini ɛnt͡ʃa iliz̤wɛ lɛsɔnka nɛz̤id̤ilija iliz̤wɛ lɔmŋǃuma ɔnɛɔli ɛlinɔɓusi niɮɛ uɓɔmi ninɡ̤afi musani ukumpʰulapʰula uhɛz̤ɛkija nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujaniɲanɡ̤a kǁa atʰi ujɛhɔv̤a uja kuniɬanɡ̤ula ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɓaliɬanɡ̤ula ɛlɔwɔ iliz̤wi lakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wasɛasirija ɓapʰi ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓasɛhamati nɛarpad̤i ɓapʰi ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓasɛsɛfarv̤ajim nɛhɛna nɛiv̤a ukuɓa ɓanɡ̤aɓi ɓaliɬanɡ̤ula ɛlakwasamari ɛsanɮɛni nɡ̤uwupʰi kɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓala maz̤wɛ ɔliɬanɡ̤ulɛjɔ iliz̤wɛ lakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni ukuɓa ad̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ajiɬanɡ̤ulɛ ijɛrusalɛm ɛsanɮɛni ɓatʰi aɓantu aɓampʰɛnd̤ula naliz̤wi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkumkani wɔna uɓusitʰi iz̤ɛ ninɡ̤ampʰɛnd̤uli ɓɛz̤a kɛ ɔɔɛlijakim uɲana kahilɛkija umpʰatʰi wɛnɮu nɔʃɛb̤ɛna umb̤ali nɔjɔwa uɲana kaasafu umkʰumɓuz̤i wɛz̤intɔ z̤akɔmkʰulu kuhɛz̤ɛkija ɓɛz̤ik͡xaz̤ulɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓamkǁɛlɛla amaz̤wi karab̤ɛʃakɛ kwatʰi akukuv̤a ɔkɔ uhɛz̤ɛkija waz̤ik͡xaz̤ula iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ waz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤uma nɡ̤ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ wanɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a watʰuma uɛlijakim umpʰatʰi wɛnɮu nɔʃɛb̤ɛna umb̤ali namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛz̤iɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ kuisaja umprɔfɛti uɲana kaamɔt͡sɛ ɓatʰi kujɛ ut͡ʃɔ uhɛz̤ɛkija ukutʰi lɛ jimini jɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ nɛjɔkɔɬwajwa nɛjɔɡ̤iɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓantwana ɓaz̤ɛ ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛsiz̤alɔ kɛ amanɮa ɔkuz̤ala m̤lawumɓi ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ anɡ̤awɛv̤a ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi karab̤ɛʃakɛ ɔtʰuɲwɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛasirija inkɔsi jakʰɛ ukuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a utʰikǁɔ ɔpʰililɛjɔ amɔɬwajɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamaz̤wi lawɔ awav̤ilɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ ɲusa kɛ umtʰand̤az̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamakǃɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔ asɛkʰɔjɔ ɓaja kɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɔkumkani uhɛz̤ɛkija kuisaja watʰi uisaja kuɓɔ nɔt͡ʃɔ kwinkɔsi jɛnu ukutʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi musa ukuwɔjika amaz̤wi ɔwav̤ilɛjɔ aɓand̤iɲɛlisɛ nɡ̤awɔ aɓafana ɓɔkumkani wasɛasirija jaɓɔna nd̤imfaka umɔja ukuɓa ɛv̤ɛ ud̤aɓa ɔluɓi aɓujɛ kɛ ajɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɛ nd̤imwisɛ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɛ waɓuja kɛ urab̤ɛʃakɛ wasɛasirija ɛsilwa nɛlib̤ɛna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛv̤ilɛ ukuɓa und̤ulukilɛ ɛlakiʃɛ wɛv̤a kusitʰiwa nɡ̤ɔtiraka wakwakuʃi nankɔ ɛpʰuma ɛz̤a nawɛ waɓuja watʰumɛla aɓatʰuɲwa kuhɛz̤ɛkija ɛsitʰi nɔt͡ʃɔ kuhɛz̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a ukutʰi musa ukulukuɬwa nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ ɔkʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ajɛ wɛna usitʰi ajisaji kunikɛlwa ijɛrusalɛm ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wasɛasirija ujaɓɔna ukuv̤ilɛ wɛna ɔkɔ ɓakwɛnz̤ajɔ ɔɔkumkani ɓasɛasirija kumaz̤wɛ ɔnkɛ ukuɓa ɓawapʰanz̤isa uja kuɬanɡ̤ulwa kɛ wɛna ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɓaz̤iɬanɡ̤ula kɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤at͡ʃatʲalaliswa nɡ̤ɔɔɓawɔ iɡ̤ɔz̤an nɛharan nɛrɛt͡sɛfɛ naɓasɛɛd̤ɛn aɓaɓɛsɛtɛlasarɛ upʰi wɛhamati nɔkumkani wɛarpad̤i nɔkumkani wɔmz̤i wasɛsɛfarv̤ajim nɛhɛna nɛiv̤a wawatʰaɓatʰa uhɛz̤ɛkija amapʰɛpʰa ɛɛŋǀwad̤i ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤aɓatʰuɲwa wawalɛsa wɛɲuka waja ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a wawanɛka uhɛz̤ɛkija pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a watʰand̤az̤a uhɛz̤ɛkija pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a watʰi jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ wakwasirajɛli uɬɛli wɛna pʰakatʰi kwɛɛkɛrub̤i unɡ̤ujɛ utʰikǁɔ wɛna wɛd̤wa kwiz̤ikumkani z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi wɛna uwɛnz̤ilɛ amaz̤ulu nɛɬaɓatʰi tʰɔɓa inɮɛɓɛ jakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a uv̤ɛ v̤ula amɛɬɔ akʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a uɓɔnɛ uwɛv̤ɛ amaz̤wi kasanɛrib̤ɛ ɔtʰumɛ ukuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a nɡ̤awɔ utʰikǁɔ ɔpʰililɛjɔ ɔkunɛnɛ jɛhɔv̤a ɔɔkumkani ɓasɛasirija ɓaz̤ikǀʰitʰilɛ iintlanɡ̤a namaz̤wɛ az̤ɔ ɓaɓanikɛla ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓaz̤ɔ ɛmlilwɛni kuɓa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɛtʰikǁɔ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛz̤anɮa z̤ɔmntu umtʰi nɛlitʲɛ ɓaɓat͡ʃaɓaɓalisa kɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu kʰawusisind̤isɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ z̤az̤i z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ikumkani z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi ukuɓa wɛna unɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛd̤wa watʰumɛla kɛ uisaja uɲana kaamɔt͡sɛ kuhɛz̤ɛkija ɛsitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakwasirajɛli ukutʰi ɔkutʰand̤az̤ɛlɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkub̤ɛkisɛlɛ kusanɛrib̤ɛ wasɛasirija nd̤ikuv̤ilɛ lilɔ ɛli iliz̤wi alitʰɛtʰilɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ajɛ intɔmɓi ɛjintɔmɓi ɛnɡ̤uz̤ijɔn ijakud̤ɛla ijakuɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛla intɔmɓi ɛnɡ̤ujɛrusalɛm iɬunɡ̤uz̤ɛla intlɔkɔ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɔ nɡ̤uɓani lɔ umŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ilɛjɔ umɲɛlisilɛjɔ nɡ̤uɓani lɔ umpʰakamisɛlɛ iz̤wi lakʰɔ uwapʰakamisɛlɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɔ pʰɛz̤ulu nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ wakwasirajɛli nɡ̤aɓatʰuɲwa ɓakʰɔ ujiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ilɛ inkɔsi watʰi nɡ̤ɔɓuninz̤i ɓɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤am z̤ɔkulwa nd̤ikǃaɓɛlɛ ɛz̤intlɔmɛni z̤ɛɛntaɓa ɛmatʰamɓɛkɛni ɛlɛb̤anɔn nd̤ijajiɡ̤awula imisɛd̤arɛ jajɔ ɛmid̤ɛ kakʰulu nɛmisiprɛs jajɔ ɛɲuliwɛjɔ nd̤ifikɛ kwɛjɔkupʰɛla ind̤awɔ jajɔ jɔkulalisa ɛɬatʰini lɛnt͡simi jajɔ ɛkǀʰumajɔ mna nd̤imɓɛ nd̤asɛla amanz̤i aɓɛfud̤ula ɛnɡ̤ɛkʰɔ nd̤ajɔmisa nɡ̤ɛɛntɛnd̤ɛ z̤ɛɛɲawɔ z̤am jɔnkɛ imid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ jasɛjiputa akuv̤anɡ̤a kwakud̤ɛ nd̤akwɛnz̤a ɔku kwanɡ̤ɛmiɬa jamand̤ulɔ nd̤akuɓumɓa nd̤ikufikisilɛ kwɛnz̤ɛka nɡ̤ɔku ukuɓa ujikʰaɬɛlɛ pʰant͡si imiz̤i ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ iɓɛ jiŋ̤ǁ̤akaŋ̤ǁ̤aka jɛmiwɛwɛ aɓɛmi ɓajɔ ɓaŋǃumka iz̤anɮa ɓakǃʰipʰuka umɓilini ɓad̤ana ɓaɓa nɡ̤umfunɔ wasɛnɮɛ nɔɬaz̤a utʲani ɔɓupʰɛz̤u kwɛnɮu isihumɓa ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwɛni inɡ̤ɛkaɓi mv̤ila kɛ ukuɬala kwakʰɔ nɔkupʰuma kwakʰɔ nɔkunɡ̤ɛna kwakʰɔ nd̤ijakwaz̤i nɔkuɡ̤uɡ̤uma kwakʰɔ nɡ̤am nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkund̤iɡ̤uɡ̤umɛla kwakʰɔ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkutʲɛʃa kwakʰɔ ɔkuɲukɛ kwɛz̤a ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤am nd̤ija ikʰɔŋ̰ǀ̰ɔ ɛmpumlwɛni jakʰɔ nɔmkʰala ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɔ nd̤ikuɓujisɛ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɔwɛz̤a nɡ̤ajɔ kɛ kalɔku nɡ̤uwɔ lɔ umkǃɔnd̤isɔ kuwɛ lɔ mɲaka kɔɮiwa ummilɛla nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsiɓini kɔɮiwa isiɬaɓanɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsitʰatʰu nɔɬwajɛla niv̤unɛ nitʲalɛ iz̤id̤ilija niɮɛ iz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤az̤ɔ aɓasind̤ilɛjɔ ɓɛnɮu jakwajud̤a aɓɔ ɓasɛlɛjɔ ɓaɓujɛ ɓɛnd̤ɛlisɛlɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu pʰant͡si ɓɛnz̤ɛ iz̤ikǃʰamɔ pʰɛz̤ulu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kuja kupʰuma ɛjɛrusalɛm aɓasɛlɛjɔ naɓasind̤ilɛjɔ ɛntaɓɛni jɛz̤ijɔn uɓukʰwɛlɛ ɓukajɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ɓuja kukwɛnz̤a ɔkɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkub̤ɛkisɛlɛ wasɛasirija ukutʰi akaji kunɡ̤ɛna kulɔ mz̤i akaji kutɔla nɔtɔlɔ kuwɔ akaji kuwuz̤ɛla ɛnɛnɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ akaji kuwufumɓɛla lud̤ɔnɡ̤a lwakuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a uja kuɓuja nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla awɛz̤a nɡ̤ajɔ akasaji kunɡ̤ɛna kulɔ mz̤i ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kuwukʰusɛla lɔ mz̤i nd̤iwusind̤isɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa kad̤av̤id̤ɛ umkʰɔnz̤i kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku kwapʰuma isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a sakǁaɓɛla ɛmkʰɔsini wamaasirija ikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anɛsiɬanu ɓav̤uka nanɡ̤ɔ ɛz̤iz̤id̤umɓu ɛz̤ifilɛjɔ ɔnkɛ wand̤uluka wahamɓa waɓuja usanɛrib̤ɛ wasɛasirija waɬala ɛninɛv̤ɛ kwatʰi ɛŋǃula ɛnɮwini kanisɛrɔki utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ ɓamkǁaɓɛla nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ɔɔad̤ramɛlɛki nɔʃarɛt͡sɛrɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓaz̤a ɓasaɓɛla ɛz̤wɛni lasɛararati uɛsaxad̤ɔn uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa wajɛsifa uhɛz̤ɛkija ɛz̤a waja umprɔfɛti uisaja uɲana kaamɔt͡sɛ watʰi kujɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jɔlɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uja wɛna akuji kupʰila waɓub̤ɛkisa ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ watʰand̤az̤a kujɛhɔv̤a ɛsitʰi kʰawukʰumɓulɛ nd̤ijakukʰunɡ̤a jɛhɔv̤a ɔkɔkuɓa nd̤ihamɓɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɲanisa nanɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ ɛpʰɛlɛlisilɛjɔ nd̤akwɛnz̤a ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ wasit͡ʃɔ uhɛz̤ɛkija isililɔ ɛsikʰulu kwatʰi uisaja ɛnɡ̤ɛkapʰumi kɔpʰakatʰi umz̤i iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɛ lisitʰi ɓuja ujɛ kutʰi kuhɛz̤ɛkija inɡ̤anɡ̤a jaɓantu ɓam ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ujiɬɔ ukutʰi nd̤iwuv̤ilɛ umtʰand̤az̤ɔ wakʰɔ nd̤iz̤iɓɔnilɛ iiɲɛmɓɛz̤i z̤akʰɔ ujaɓɔna nd̤ija kukupʰilisa nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰatʰu uja kuɲuka ujɛ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nd̤ɔnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛ kwimiɬa jakʰɔ iʃumi ɛlinɛsiɬanu lɛmiɲaka nd̤ikuɬanɡ̤ulɛ wɛna nalɔ mz̤i ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wasɛasirija nd̤iwukʰusɛlɛ lɔ mz̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa kad̤av̤id̤ɛ umkʰɔnz̤i watʰi uisaja tʰaɓatʰani isikǀumɓa samakʰiwanɛ ɓasitʰaɓatʰa kɛ ɓaɓɛka ɛtʰumɓɛni wapʰila watʰi uhɛz̤ɛkija kuisaja ujintɔni umkǃɔnd̤isɔ wɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uja kund̤ipʰilisa nd̤iɲukɛ nd̤ijɛ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰatʰu watʰi uisaja nanɡ̤u kɛ umkǃɔnd̤isɔ kuwɛ upʰuma kujɛhɔv̤a wɔkuɓa uja kulɛnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a iliz̤wi alitʰɛtʰilɛjɔ isitʰunz̤i sihamɓɛ iz̤iɲukɔ ɛz̤iliʃumi siɓujɛ iz̤iɲukɔ ɛz̤iliʃumi watʰi uhɛz̤ɛkija kulula kwisitʰunz̤i ukɔluka iz̤iɲukɔ ɛz̤iliʃumi haji isitʰunz̤i masiɓujɛ umv̤a iz̤iɲukɔ ɛz̤iliʃumi uisaja umprɔfɛti wamŋǃula ujɛhɔv̤a wasiɓujisa umv̤a isitʰunz̤i iz̤iɲukɔ z̤aliʃumi ɛsasiɬɛ z̤ɔna ɛsiɲukwɛni sikaahaz̤i nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa ub̤ɛrɔd̤akib̤alad̤an uɲana kab̤alad̤an wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli watʰumɛla iŋǀwad̤i nɔmnikɛlɔ kuhɛz̤ɛkija nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓɛv̤ilɛ ukuɓa uhɛz̤ɛkija uɓɛsifa waɓɛv̤a uhɛz̤ɛkija waɓaɓɔnisa jɔnkɛ inɮu jakʰɛ jɛŋ̤ǃ̤wɛɓɔ isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɔɓulawu nɛɔli ɛntlɛ nɛnɮu jɔnkɛ jɛɛntɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ nɛntɔ jɔnkɛ ɛjajikʰɔ ɛɓuŋǀwanɛni ɓakʰɛ akwaɓakʰɔ ntɔ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ nasɛkulawulɛni kwakʰɛ kɔnkɛ anɡ̤aɓaɓɔnisanɡ̤a jɔna uhɛz̤ɛkija waja uisaja umprɔfɛti uhɛz̤ɛkija watʰi kujɛ atʰɛni mad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛv̤ɛla nɡ̤apʰi ukuz̤a kuwɛ watʰi uhɛz̤ɛkija aɓɛv̤ɛla ɛz̤wɛni ɛlikud̤ɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli watʰi aɓɔnɛ ntɔni ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ watʰi uhɛz̤ɛkija aɓɔnɛ intɔ jɔnkɛ ɛsɛnɮwini jam akuɓanɡ̤akʰɔ ntɔ nd̤inɡ̤aɓaɓɔnisanɡ̤a jɔna ɛɓuŋǀwanɛni ɓam watʰi uisaja kuhɛz̤ɛkija liv̤ɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ujaɓɔna kuz̤a imiɬa ɛja kutʰi jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛsɛnɮwini jakʰɔ nɛntɔ aɓajikǃwɛɓajɔ ɔɔjiɬɔ kwad̤a kwajilɛ itʰwalɛlwɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli kunɡ̤asali ntɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓatʰaɓatʰɛ nakɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ aɓaja kupʰuma kuwɛ ɔja kuɓaz̤ala ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓaɓusi ɛb̤ɔtwɛni lɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli watʰi uhɛz̤ɛkija kuisaja lilunɡ̤ilɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɔlitʰɛtʰilɛjɔ watʰi akund͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuɓa kuja kuɓakʰɔ ukukǁɔla nɔkuɲanisa nɡ̤ɛjam imiɬa ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikahɛz̤ɛkija nɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ nɔkwɛnz̤a kwakʰɛ ikǀʰiɓi nɔmd͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ nɔkuwanɡ̤ɛnisa kwakʰɛ amanz̤i kuwɔ umz̤i az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a walala uhɛz̤ɛkija kɔɔjisɛ umanasɛ uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ umanasɛ uɓɛmiɲaka iliʃumi ɛlinamiɓini ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛmaʃumi maɬanu anamiɬanu ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina ɓɛlinɡ̤uhɛfɛt͡sib̤a wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkwamasikiz̤i ɛɛntlanɡ̤a awaz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤ajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a pʰamɓi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli waɓuja waz̤akʰa iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a awajɛz̤id̤iliz̤ilɛ uhɛz̤ɛkija ujisɛ wammisɛla ub̤ahali iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɛnz̤a ɔɔaʃɛra nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wɛnz̤ajɔ uahab̤i wakwasirajɛli wakǃuɓud̤a kumkʰɔsi wɔnkɛ wɛz̤ulu wawukʰɔnz̤a wakʰa iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a lɛjɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ajɔ nd̤ija kuliɓɛka ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama wawakʰɛla iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɔnkɛ umkʰɔsi wɛz̤ulu ɛz̤intɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni z̤ɔmɓini z̤ɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a wamkǀand̤isa uɲana wakʰɛ ɛmlilwɛni waɓa litɔla waɬaɓa iz̤iɬaɓɔ aɓanɛʃɔlɔɡ̤u nɔɔsijaz̤i wapʰikɛla ukwɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa amkǃumɓisɛ wawumisa umfanɛkisɔ ɔkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ kaaʃɛra aɓɛwɛnz̤ilɛ ɛnɮwini lɛjɔ wajɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kud̤av̤id̤ɛ nakusɔlɔmɔn uɲana wakʰɛ kujɔ lɛ nɮu nasɛjɛrusalɛm ɛnd̤ijiɲulilɛjɔ ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwasirajɛli nd̤ija kuliɓɛka kʰɔna iɡ̤ama nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ nd̤inɡ̤apʰind̤i nd̤iluʃukumisɛ uɲawɔ lwamasirajɛli ɛm̤laɓɛni ɛnd̤awunika ɔɔjisɛ kɔd̤wa makaɓɛ aja kuɡ̤ǀ̤ina ukwɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ ɛnd̤iwawisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔmjalɛlɔ wɔnkɛ awawawisɛlajɔ umkʰɔnz̤i umɔsɛs akapʰulapʰula kɛ wawalukuɬa umanasɛ ukuɓa ɛnz̤ɛ ɔkuɓi nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a awaz̤it͡ʃaɓalalisajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a pʰamɓi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli watʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ aɓaprɔfɛti ɛsitʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa umanasɛ wakwajud̤a ɛwɛnz̤ilɛ lɔɔ masikiz̤i wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɔkunɡ̤apʰɛz̤ulu kwakɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ amaamɔri aɓɛnɡ̤apʰamɓi kwakʰɛ wawɔnisa namajud̤a nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤iz̤iz̤itʰikǁɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ijiz̤isɛla ijɛrusalɛm nɛjud̤a uɓuɓi ɛz̤ija kutʰi nz̤wi iinɮɛɓɛ z̤ɔmɓini z̤aɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓuv̤ajɔ nd̤ɔlɔlula pʰɛz̤u kwɛjɛrusalɛm ulutʲa lɔkulinɡ̤anisa lwakwasamari nɛlɔtʰɛ jɔkulinɡ̤anisa jɛnɮu kaahab̤i nd̤ijisulɛ ijɛrusalɛm nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔsula isitʲa asisulɛ asisiɓɛkɛ nd̤ɔwalaɬa amasalɛla ɛlifa nd̤iɓanikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ ukuɓa ɓapʰanɡ̤wɛ ɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wɛ z̤iz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɓɛnz̤ɛ ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni ɓand̤ikǃumɓisa kususɛla aɓapʰuma nɡ̤ajɔ ɔɔjisɛ ɛjiputa unanam̤la kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ iɡ̤az̤i ɛlimsulwa ulipʰalaz̤ɛ lalininz̤i kunɛnɛ umanasɛ jad̤a jaz̤ala ijɛrusalɛm kwatʰaɓatʰɛla kwɛliɲɛ ikǀala kwɛsa kwɛliɲɛ sisɔd̤wa sɔna isɔnɔ sakʰɛ awawɔnisajɔ nɡ̤asɔ amajud̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikamanasɛ nakɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ nɛsɔnɔ sakʰɛ awɔnajɔ nɡ̤az̤ɔ asib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a walala umanasɛ kɔɔjisɛ waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa ɛmjɛz̤wɛni wɛnɮu jakʰɛ ɛmjɛz̤wɛni kauz̤a uamɔn uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ uamɔn uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini anamiɓini ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛmiɓini ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina ɓɛlinɡ̤umɛʃulɛmɛtɛ intɔmɓi kaharut͡sɛ wasɛjɔtɛb̤a wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ umanasɛ ujisɛ wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɔnkɛ awahamɓa nɡ̤ajɔ ujisɛ waz̤ikʰɔnz̤a iz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ ɛz̤iz̤iz̤itʰikǁɔ awaz̤ikʰɔnz̤ajɔ ujisɛ wakǃuɓud̤a kuz̤ɔ wamʃija ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ akahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla kajɛhɔv̤a ɓamkǀɛɓa aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakaamɔn ɓamɓulala lɔwɔ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ ɓaɓaɓulala ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ ɓaɓɛkǀɛɓɛ uamɔn ɓatʰi aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ ɓamɛnz̤a ujɔsija uɲana wakʰɛ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikaamɔn awaz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni lakʰɛ ɛmjɛz̤wɛni kauz̤a ujɔsija uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ ujɔsija uɓɛmiɲaka isib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛmaʃumi matʰatʰu anamɲɛ ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina ɓɛlinɡ̤ujɛd̤id̤a intɔmɓi kaad̤aja wasɛb̤ɔt͡sɛkati wɛnz̤a ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɔnkɛ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ujisɛ akatʲɛkɛla nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ nanɡ̤asɛkʰɔɬɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ wɔkumkani ujɔsija watʰuma uʃafan uɲana kaat͡salija uɲana kamɛʃulam umb̤ali ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɛsitʰi ɲuka ujɛ kuhilɛkija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔmkʰulu ajilunɡ̤isɛ ɛz̤isiwɛjɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a aɓajilulanɡ̤anisilɛjɔ aɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inimɲanɡ̤ɔ ɛɓantwini maɓajinikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni saɓɛnz̤i ɓɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i aɓajikʰanɡ̤ɛlajɔ inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ɓajinikɛlɛ kuɓɛnz̤i ɓɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i ɔsɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a z̤itʲwinwɛ iintand̤a z̤ɛnɮu ɓajinikɛlɛ kwiiŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi z̤ɛmitʰi nakuɓakʰi nakwaɓakʰa nɡ̤amatʲɛ kutʰɛnɡ̤wɛ imitʰi namatʲɛ akǁʰɔliwɛjɔ kuɬaz̤ijwɛ inɮu kɔd̤wa ɓɛkunɡ̤aɓalɛlwana naɓɔ nɡ̤ɛmali ɛɓinikɛlwɛ ɛsanɮɛni saɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓasɛɓɛnz̤a ɓɛɲanisɛkilɛ watʰi uhilɛkija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔmkʰulu kuʃafan umb̤ali iŋǀwad̤i jɔmjalɛlɔ nd̤ijifumɛnɛ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a uhilɛkija uʃafan iŋǀwad̤i lɛjɔ wajilɛsa wɛz̤a kɛ uʃafan umb̤ali wamɓujisɛla iliz̤wi watʰi ɓajikʰupʰɛlɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ɛjafumanɛkajɔ ɛnɮwini ɓajinikɛla ɛsanɮɛni saɓɛnz̤i ɓɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i aɓajikʰanɡ̤ɛlajɔ inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a wakǁɛla kɛ uʃafan umb̤ali ɛsitʰi uhilɛkija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli und̤inikɛ iŋǀwad̤i wajilɛsa uʃafan pʰamɓi kɔkumkani kwatʰi akuwɛv̤a amaz̤wi ɛŋǀwad̤i jɔmjalɛlɔ waz̤ik͡xaz̤ula iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ ukumkani waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ ɔɔhilɛkija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɔahikam uɲana kaʃafan nɔakɛb̤ɔrɛ uɲana kamikaja nɔʃafan umb̤ali nɔasaja umkʰɔnz̤i wɔkumkani ɛsitʰi jijani niɓuz̤isɛ kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓantu nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamajud̤a ɔnkɛ malunɡ̤a namaz̤wi alɛ ŋǀwad̤i ifuɲɛnwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓukʰulu uɓuʃuʃu ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɛsiɓasɛlwɛ ɓɔna nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɔɔɓawɔ ɓɛnɡ̤awapʰulapʰulanɡ̤a amaz̤wi alɛ ŋǀwad̤i ukuɓa ɓɛnz̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ kub̤aliwɛjɔ kujɔ nɡ̤atʰi waja kɛ uhilɛkija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɔahikam nɔakɛb̤ɔrɛ nɔʃafan nɔasaja kuhuld̤a umprɔfɛtikaz̤i umkaʃalum uɲana katikv̤a uɲana kahaxasɛ umɡ̤ǀ̤ininɡ̤uɓɔ wajɛ jɛna ɛɬɛli ɛjɛrusalɛm kwɛsɛsiɓini isaɬulɔ sajɔ ɓatʰɛtʰa najɛ watʰi kuɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakwasirajɛli ukutʰi nɔtʰi kulɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤a initʰumilɛjɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ijiz̤isɛla uɓuɓi lɛ nd̤awɔ naɓɛmi ɓajɔ ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi ɛŋǀwad̤i ajilɛsilɛjɔ wakwajud̤a nɡ̤ɛtʰuɓa lɔkuɓa ɓɛnd̤iʃijilɛ ɓakǃʰumisɛla tʰikǁwɛni ɓamɓi ukuɓa ɓand̤ikǃumɓisɛ nɡ̤ɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i wɔnkɛ wɛz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ jɔtʰi lɛ nd̤awɔ iɓasɛlwɛ uɓuʃuʃu ɓam ɓunɡ̤akǀiɲwa kɛ wakwajud̤a ɔnitʰumɛ ukuɓuz̤isa kujɛhɔv̤a nɔt͡ʃɔ kujɛ ukutʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakwasirajɛli ukutʰi ɔkwala maz̤wi uwav̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa iɓitʰamɓilɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ waz̤itʰɔɓa pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɛkukuv̤ɛni kwakʰɔ ɛnd̤ikutʰɛtʰilɛjɔ nɡ̤alɛ nd̤awɔ nanɡ̤aɓɛmi ɓajɔ ukuɓa ɓɛja kuɓa z̤iimpanz̤a nɛsikǃalɛkisɔ waz̤ik͡xaz̤ula iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɔ pʰamɓi nd̤ikuv̤ilɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ujaɓɔna nd̤ija kukuɬanɡ̤anisɛla kɔɔjiɬɔ uɬanɡ̤anisɛlwɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni lakʰɔ unɔkǁɔlɔ anɡ̤aɓuɓɔni amɛɬɔ akʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ uɓuɓi ɛnd̤iɓuz̤isɛla lɛ nd̤awɔ ɓamɓujisɛla kɛ iliz̤wi watʰumɛla aɬanɡ̤anisɛlana kujɛ ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwajud̤a nɛjɛrusalɛm wɛɲuka waja ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a namad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ akwajud̤a naɓɛmi ɓɔnkɛ ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm kuɲɛ najɛ naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓaprɔfɛti naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ kwatʰaɓatʰɛla kɔmŋǀinanɛ kwɛsa kɔmkʰulu wawalɛsa ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤aɓɔ ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi ɛŋǀwad̤i jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɛjafuɲanwa ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a wɛma pʰɛz̤u kwɛnd̤awɔ ɛpʰakamilɛjɔ wɛnz̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a wɔkuland̤ɛla ujɛhɔv̤a nɔkuɡ̤ǀ̤ina imitʰɛtʰɔ jakʰɛ nɛz̤iŋ̤ǃ̤inɔ z̤akʰɛ nɛmimisɛlɔ jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jɔnkɛ nanɡ̤ɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wɔnkɛ nɔkuwamisa ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi alɔ mŋǃɔpʰisɔ ab̤aliwɛjɔ kulɛ ŋǀwad̤i ɓɛma kɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɛmŋǃɔpʰiswɛni lɔwɔ ukumkani wamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ uhilɛkija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔmkʰulu naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɔlwɛsiɓini ud̤id̤i naɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inimɲanɡ̤ɔ wɔkuɓa ɓaz̤ikʰupʰɛ ɛb̤ɔtwɛni likajɛhɔv̤a z̤ɔnkɛ iimpaɬa ɛz̤ajɛ z̤ɛnz̤ɛlwɛ ub̤ahali nɔaʃɛra nɔmkʰɔsi wɔnkɛ wɛz̤ulu waz̤it͡ʃisɛla nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛjɛrusalɛm ɛmapʰanɮɛni asɛkid̤rɔn utʰutʰu lwaz̤ɔ ɛb̤ɛtɛli waɓapʰɛlisa aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓanɡ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓɔ aɓaɓɛtʰɛ ɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a ɓaɓamisɛla ukukǃʰumisɛla ɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a nanɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm naɓakǃʰumisɛla kub̤ahali nakwilanɡ̤a nakwiɲanɡ̤a nakwiinkwɛnkwɛz̤i nakumkʰɔsi wɔnkɛ wɛz̤ulu wamkʰupʰa uaʃɛra ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛjɛrusalɛm ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni ɔjikid̤rɔn wamt͡ʃisɛla ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni ɔjikid̤rɔn ɓamkǀɔla walutʰuli walupʰɔsa utʰuli lwakʰɛ pʰɛz̤u kwamaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu waz̤id̤iliz̤a iz̤inɮu z̤amanɡ̤awu ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤isɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a apʰɔ amankaz̤ana aɓɛmlukɛla kʰɔna uaʃɛra iintɛntɛ waɓatʰaɓatʰa ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a waz̤ɛnz̤a iŋǃamɓi iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a apʰɔ ɓaɓɛkǃʰumisɛla kʰɔna aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛɡ̤ɛb̤a asɛ ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a waz̤id̤iliz̤a iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a z̤amasanɡ̤ɔ ɛz̤isɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ likajɔʃuwa umpʰatʰi wɔmz̤i nɛz̤isɛkʰɔɬɔ kɔmntu ɔnɡ̤ɛna ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔmz̤i kɔd̤wa kɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓɔ ɓɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a aɓɛɲukanɡ̤a ɓɛz̤ɛ ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni sikajɛhɔv̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm ɓanɛla ukuɮa iz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ wajɛnz̤a iŋǃamɓi itɔfɛtɛ ɛsɛmfulɛni wakwab̤ɛn̤inɔm ukuz̤ɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ umkǀand̤isa ɛmlilwɛni kumɔlɛki uɲana wakʰɛ nɔkuɓa jintɔmɓi jakʰɛ wawasusa amahaʃɛ aɓɛmisɛlwɛ ilanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤asɛɡ̤umɓini likanɛtanmɛlɛki umɓusi ɛliɓɛ linɡ̤apʰanɮɛ waz̤it͡ʃisa nɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɛlanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ nɛz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤ipʰɛz̤u kɔpʰaɬa lwɛɡ̤umɓi ɛlipʰɛz̤ulu likaahaz̤i aɓaz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ ɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a nɛz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ awaz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ umanasɛ ɛz̤intɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni z̤ɔmɓini z̤ɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a waz̤id̤iliz̤a waz̤ikʰand̤a kwakʰɔna walupʰɔsa ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔjikid̤rɔn utʰuli lwaz̤ɔ nɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a ɛz̤ipʰamɓi kwɛjɛrusalɛm ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤isɛkunɛnɛ kwɛntaɓa jɔlɔnakalisɔ awajɛtʰɛ usɔlɔmɔn wakwasirajɛli waz̤akʰɛla uaʃtɔrɛti intɔ ɛnɛz̤ɔtʰɛ jamat͡sid̤ɔn nɔkɛmɔʃɛ intɔ ɛnɛz̤ɔtʰɛ jamamɔwab̤i nɔmilikɔm isikiz̤i lɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn waz̤ɛnz̤a iŋǃamɓi waz̤ikǃʰɛkɛz̤a nɛz̤imisɔ z̤amatʲɛ waɓaɡ̤awula ɔɔaʃɛra waz̤iz̤alisa iind̤awɔ z̤az̤ɔ nɡ̤amatʰamɓɔ aɓantu kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛsiɓɛ sisɛb̤ɛtɛli isiɡ̤anɡ̤a awasɛnz̤ajɔ ujarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kanɛb̤ati ɔwawɔnisajɔ amasirajɛli ɛsɔ siɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɛsɔ siɡ̤anɡ̤a wasid̤iliz̤a wasit͡ʃisa isiɡ̤anɡ̤a wasikǀɔla salutʰuli wamt͡ʃisa uaʃɛra wab̤ɛka ujɔsija wawaɓɔna amaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa aɓɛkʰɔna ɛntaɓɛni watʰumɛla wawatʰaɓatʰa amatʰamɓɔ ɛmaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni lawɔ wawat͡ʃisɛla pʰɛz̤u kwɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wasɛnz̤a iŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a awalimɛmɛz̤ajɔ umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ ɔwawamɛmɛz̤ajɔ maz̤wi watʰi lɛlani ɛlaa litʲɛ litʰɛ ŋ̰ǃ̰ampu nd̤iliɓɔnajɔ atʰi kujɛ amad̤ɔd̤a alɔɔ mz̤i liŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa lɔmfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ ɔwav̤ɛla kwajud̤a wamɛmɛz̤a ɛz̤i z̤intɔ uz̤ɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kwisiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sasɛb̤ɛtɛli watʰi mjɛkɛni makanɡ̤aʃukuɲiswa amatʰamɓɔ akʰɛ ɓawasind̤isa kɛ amatʰamɓɔ akʰɛ namatʰamɓɔ ɔmprɔfɛti ɔwav̤ɛla kwasamari kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤inɮu z̤ɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤isɛmiz̤ini jakwasamari aɓaz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ ɔɔkumkani ɓamasirajɛli ukuɓa ɓamkǃumɓisɛ ujɛhɔv̤a waz̤isusa ujɔsija wɛnz̤a kuz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ awaz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ ɛb̤ɛtɛli waɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a aɓaɓɛkʰɔna pʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wat͡ʃisa amatʰamɓɔ aɓantu pʰɛz̤u kwaz̤ɔ waɓuja kɛ wɛz̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm ukumkani waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ watʰi jɛnz̤ani kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nɡ̤ɔkɔ kub̤aliwɛjɔ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jalɔ mŋǃɔpʰisɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛkunɡ̤az̤anɡ̤a kwɛnz̤iwɛ nɡ̤ɔkwalɛ kususɛla kwimiɬa jaɓaɡ̤wɛɓi aɓaɓɛlawula amasirajɛli nanɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔnkɛ jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli nɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a kwaɓa nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ wɔkumkani ujɔsija ukwɛnz̤iwa kwalɛ kujɛhɔv̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ aɓanɛʃɔlɔɡ̤u nɔɔsijaz̤i nɛmilɔnd̤ɛkʰaja nɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ ɛz̤iz̤iz̤itʰikǁɔ nɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤inɛz̤ɔtʰɛ ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤iɓɔnwa ɛz̤wɛni lakwajud̤a nasɛjɛrusalɛm waz̤it͡ʃajɛla ujɔsija ukuz̤ɛ amisɛ amaz̤wi ɔmjalɛlɔ ab̤aliwɛjɔ ɛŋǀwad̤ini aɓɛjifumɛnɛ uhilɛkija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤apʰamɓi kwakʰɛ akuɓanɡ̤akʰɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ajɛ uɓujɛlɛjɔ kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ nanɡ̤ɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ wɔnkɛ nanɡ̤amanɮa akʰɛ ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔmjalɛlɔ wɔnkɛ kamɔsɛs nanɡ̤asɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ akuv̤ɛlanɡ̤a und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ajɛ akaɓujanɡ̤a nɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛkuv̤utʰɛni kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ ɔmkʰulu umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ ɔwav̤utʰa kumajud̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkukǃumɓisa kɔnkɛ aɓɛkǃumɓisɛ nɡ̤akɔ umanasɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija namajud̤a ɛɓuswɛni ɓam nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤awasusajɔ amasirajɛli nd̤iwulaɬɛ lɔ mz̤i nd̤awuɲulajɔ ijɛrusalɛm lɛ nɛnɮu lɛ nd̤atʰi lija kuɓa kujɔ iɡ̤ama ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikajɔsija nakɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jakʰɛ wɛɲuka ufarɔnɛkɔ wasɛjiputa waja nɔkumkani wasɛasirija ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔnɡ̤umɛfrati wahamɓa ujɔsija waja kum̤lanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a wamɓulala ɛmɛɡ̤id̤ɔ akumɓɔna ɓamtʰwala nɡ̤ɛŋǃwɛlɔ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɛfɛlɛ ɛmɛɡ̤id̤ɔ ɓamsa ɛjɛrusalɛm ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni lakʰɛ aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɓatʰaɓatʰa ujɛhɔwahaz̤i uɲana kajɔsija ɓamtʰamɓisa ɓamɛnz̤a ɛsikʰunɮɛni sikajisɛ ujɛhɔwahaz̤i uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini anamitʰatʰu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ z̤aɓa ntatʰu iiɲanɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina ɓɛlinɡ̤uhamutali intɔmɓi kajɛrɛmija wasɛlib̤ɛna wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ aɓakwɛnz̤ajɔ ɔɔjisɛ ufarɔnɛkɔ wamkʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰a ɛrib̤ɛla ɛz̤wɛni lasɛhamati ukuz̤ɛ anɡ̤aɓi nɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iliz̤wɛ waliɬaɬisa ikʰulu lɛɛtalɛntɛ z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛtalɛntɛ jɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ufarɔnɛkɔ wamɛnz̤a uɛlijakim uɲana kajɔsija ɛsikʰunɮɛni sikajɔsija ujisɛ waliɡ̤ukǃula iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ lanɡ̤ujɛhɔjakim kɛ wamtʰaɓatʰa ujɛhɔwahaz̤i wɛz̤a najɛ ɛjiputa wafɛla kʰɔna ujɛhɔjakim wajinika ufarɔ isiliv̤ɛrɛ lɛjɔ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ lɛjɔ kɔd̤wa kɛ waliɬaɬisa iliz̤wɛ ukuɓa anikɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔmlɔmɔ kafarɔ ɛlɔwɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɬaɬiswa kwakʰɛ waɓakǃʰuɓa aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ukuɓa ɓajixɔlɛ isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ukuɓa ajinikɛ ufarɔnɛkɔ ujɛhɔjakim uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini anamiɬanu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛliʃumi linamɲɛ ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina ɓɛlinɡ̤uz̤ɛb̤ud̤a intɔmɓi kapɛd̤aja wasɛruma wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ aɓakwɛnz̤ajɔ ɔɔjisɛ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jakʰɛ kwɛɲuka unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wɛb̤ab̤ɛli ujɛhɔjakim waɓa nɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤i kujɛ imiɲaka ɛmitʰatʰu waɓuja waɡ̤wilika kujɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wamtʰumɛla iz̤impi z̤amakalɛd̤i nɛz̤impi z̤amaaram nɛz̤impi z̤akwamɔwab̤i nɛz̤impi z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn waz̤itʰumɛla ɛlakwajud̤a ukuɓa z̤ilit͡ʃaɓalalisɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a awalitʰɛtʰajɔ nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ aɓaprɔfɛti kwajɛ kunɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a wɔd̤wa ukwɛnz̤ɛka kwalɛ ntɔ kumajud̤a ukuɓa awasusɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤ikamanasɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤az̤i ɛlinɡ̤ɛnatʲala awalipʰalaz̤ajɔ wajiz̤alisa ijɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɛɡ̤az̤i ɛlinɡ̤ɛnatʲala akav̤umanɡ̤a ujɛhɔv̤a ukukǁɔlɛla ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikajɛhɔjakim nakɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a walala ujɛhɔjakim kɔɔjisɛ ujɛhɔjakin uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ akaɓanɡ̤a sapʰind̤a wasɛjiputa apʰumɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli wajɛz̤itʰimɓilɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iz̤ɛz̤ɔkumkani wasɛjiputa ɛkǃalɛlɛ ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni wasɛjiputa wad̤a wɛsa ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔnɡ̤umɛfrati ujɛhɔjakin uɓɛmiɲaka iliʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ z̤antatʰu iiɲanɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina ɓɛlinɡ̤unɛhuʃta intɔmɓi kaɛlinatan wasɛjɛrusalɛm wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ ujisɛ nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa ɓɛɲuka aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakanɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɓɛz̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm waŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤wa umz̤i lɔwɔ wawufikɛla unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɓɛwuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤ilɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ wapʰuma ujɛhɔjakin wakwajud̤a waja wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli jɛna nɔnina naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ naɓaɓusi ɓakʰɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli wamtʰaɓatʰa kɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ wɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ waxɔla kʰɔna ɓɔnkɛ uɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nɔɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓɛnɮu jɔkumkani waz̤iŋǃuŋǃa z̤ɔnkɛ iimpaɬa z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ awaz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ usɔlɔmɔn wakwasirajɛli ɛtɛmpilɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wakutʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wajifud̤usa jɔnkɛ ijɛrusalɛm naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔnkɛ namaɡ̤ɔxa ɔnkɛ anɔɓuk͡xɔti iʃumi aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa z̤ɔnkɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi naɓakʰand̤i jaɓa nɡ̤amaɬwɛmpu ɛliz̤wɛ ɔd̤wa asalajɔ wamfud̤usa ujɛhɔjakin ɛb̤ab̤ɛli nɔnina wɔkumkani naɓafaz̤i ɓɔkumkani naɓaɓusi ɓakʰɛ nɛɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlɛ z̤ɛliz̤wɛ waɓafud̤usa ɛjɛrusalɛm aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa aɓɔ waɓasa ɛb̤ab̤ɛli namad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ anɔɓuk͡xɔti anɡ̤amawaka asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi naɓakʰand̤i aɓaliwaka ɔnkɛ amaɡ̤ɔxa anɔkulwa aɓɔ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli waɓasa ɓɛnɡ̤aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ukumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli wamɛnz̤a umatanija ujisɛkaz̤i kajɛhɔjakin ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ waliɡ̤ukǃula iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ lanɡ̤uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini anamɲɛ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛliʃumi ɛlinamɲɛ ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina ɓɛlinɡ̤uhamutali intɔmɓi kajɛrɛmija wasɛlib̤ɛna wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ ujɛhɔjakim nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a kwɛnz̤ɛka ɔkɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm nakwajud̤a wad̤a waɓalaɬa ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija ɛɡ̤wilika wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsitʰɔɓa wɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛʃumi nɡ̤ɔsuku lwɛʃumi ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ wajifikɛla ijɛrusalɛm unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli jɛna nɛmpi jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ wajixawula wakʰa iiŋǃaɓa z̤ɔkuɓɔnisɛla nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ waŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤wa kɛ umz̤i kwad̤a kwanɡ̤umɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinamɲɛ wɔkumkani uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija nɡ̤ɔsuku lwɛsitʰɔɓa lwɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsinɛ jakǃina inɮala pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i aɓaɓa nasɔnka aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ waɡ̤ǃ̤ɔd͡ʒ̤ɔz̤wa umz̤i asaɓa ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a ɔkulwa nɡ̤ɔɓusuku nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɛlipʰakatʰi kwɛɛnd̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤ɔmɓini ɛlisɛmjɛz̤wɛni wɔkumkani ajɛ amakalɛd̤i ɛwud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛ umz̤i wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jasɛarab̤a impi jamakalɛd̤i jamsukɛla jamfikɛla ɛz̤iŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsini z̤asɛjɛrikɔ jampʰalala jɛmka kujɛ jɔnkɛ jakʰɛ amɓamɓa aɲuka najɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛrib̤ɛla latʰɛtʰwa apʰɔ itʲala lakʰɛ aɓasika ɔɔɲana ɓakaz̤ɛd̤ɛkija ɛkʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ amtʰʲapʰaz̤a amɛɬɔ uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija amkʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰a nɡ̤amakʰamand̤ɛla ɔb̤ɛd̤u ɛb̤ab̤ɛli nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsiɬanu nɡ̤ɔsuku lwɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ lɔɔ mɲaka kɛ nɡ̤ɔwɛʃumi ɛlinɛsitʰɔɓa ɛnɡ̤ukumkani unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli unɛb̤uz̤arad̤an umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki ɓaɓantu umkʰɔnz̤i wɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛjɛrusalɛm wajit͡ʃisa inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nɛnɮu jɔkumkani nɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔnkɛ z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm iz̤inɮu z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤inkulu waz̤it͡ʃisa nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ iind̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm jaz̤id̤iliz̤a nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ lɛjɔ jamakalɛd̤i ɛɓinɔmtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki ɓaɓantu amasalɛla aɓantu aɓaɓɛsɛlɛ pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i namapʰamɓa awajɛpʰamɓɛlɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli namasalɛla ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ wawafud̤usa unɛb̤uz̤arad̤an umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki ɓaɓantu kɛ umpʰatʰi waɓasiki ɓaɓantu amaɬwɛmpu ɛliz̤wɛ ukuz̤ɛ aɓɛ nɡ̤aɓasɛɓɛnz̤i ɓɛz̤id̤ilija naɓalimi iint͡sika z̤ɔb̤ɛd̤u ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤isɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nɛɛŋǃwɛlwana nɔlwanɮɛ lɔb̤ɛd̤u ɔɓɛ lusɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ az̤ikǃʰɛkɛz̤a amakalɛd̤i alutʰwalɛla ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ub̤ɛd̤u lwaz̤ɔ atʰaɓatʰa nɛɛmɓiz̤a nɛmiɬakulwana nɛz̤it͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ nɛɛnkamɓa nɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɔb̤ɛd̤u ɛɓɛ kulunɡ̤isɛlɛlwa nɡ̤az̤ɔ umpʰatʰi waɓasiki ɓaɓantu watʰaɓatʰa nɛz̤itʲa iz̤itʲa z̤ɔkut͡ʃiz̤a iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ kwɛz̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ isiliv̤ɛrɛ kwɛz̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɛnt͡sika z̤ɔmɓini ulwanɮɛ ɔluɲɛ nɛɛŋǃwɛlwana awaz̤ɛnz̤ɛla inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a usɔlɔmɔn alwaɓa nakulinɡ̤aniswa ub̤ɛd̤u lwɛz̤ɔ mpaɬa z̤ɔnkɛ ukupʰakama kwɛɲɛ int͡sika ɓɛkuz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ iŋ̤ǃ̤ukuv̤a jajɔ ijɛjɔb̤ɛd̤u ukupʰakama kwɛŋ̤ǃ̤ukuv̤a ɓɛkuz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intatʰu umnatʰa nɛɛxarnatɛ ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤isɛŋ̤ǃ̤ukuv̤ɛni nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ jɔnkɛ lɔɔ ntɔ jaɓɛ ilub̤ɛd̤u int͡sika jɛsiɓini jaɓɛ ikwand͡ʒ̤alɔ kuɲɛ nɔmnatʰa wajɔ umpʰatʰi waɓasiki ɓaɓantu wamtʰaɓatʰa usɛraja umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔjintlɔkɔ nɔz̤ɛfanija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wɔlwɛsiɓini ud̤id̤i naɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inimɲanɡ̤ɔ ɓɔɓatʰatʰu kuwɔ umz̤i watʰaɓatʰa umɓusi wamɲɛ awajɛnɡ̤umpʰatʰi wamad̤ɔd̤a ɔkulwa namad̤ɔd̤a amaɬanu kwaɓɛɬala nɔkumkani awafuɲanwajɔ pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i nɔmb̤ali wɔmtʰɛtʰɛli wɔmkʰɔsi ɔɓɛsakuɬanɡ̤anisa aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ namad̤ɔd̤a amaʃumi matʰand̤atʰu kuɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ awafuɲanwajɔ pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i waɓatʰaɓatʰa aɓɔ unɛb̤uz̤arad̤an umpʰatʰi waɓasiki ɓaɓantu waɓasa wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛrib̤ɛla waɓakǁaɓɛla wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli waɓaɓulalɛla ɛrib̤ɛla ɛz̤wɛni lasɛhamati afud̤uswa kɛ amajud̤a ɛm̤laɓɛni wawɔ kɛ aɓantu aɓasalajɔ ɛz̤wɛni lakwajud̤a awaɓasalisajɔ unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli waɓamisɛla umpʰatʰi ɔnɡ̤uɡ̤ɛd̤alija uɲana kaahikam uɲana kaʃafan ɓakuv̤a kɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛmikʰɔsi ɓɔna namad̤ɔd̤a aɓɔ akuɓa wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli umɛnz̤ɛ umpʰatʰi uɡ̤ɛd̤alija ɓɛz̤a kuɡ̤ɛd̤alija lɔwɔ ɛmiz̤pa ɓɛnɡ̤ɔɔiʃmajɛli uɲana kanɛtanija nɔjɔhanan uɲana kakarɛha nɔsɛraja uɲana katanumɛtɛ wasɛnɛtɔfa nɔjahaz̤anija uɲana kamahakati ɓɔna namad̤ɔd̤a aɓɔ waɓafunɡ̤ɛla ɓɔna namad̤ɔd̤a aɓɔ uɡ̤ɛd̤alija watʰi kuɓɔ musani ukuɓɔjika aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓamakalɛd̤i ɬalani kwɛli liz̤wɛ nikʰɔnz̤ɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli kɔnilunɡ̤ɛla kɛ kalɔku kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kwɛz̤a uiʃmajɛli uɲana kanɛtanija uɲana kaɛliʃama wasɛmɓɛwini jɔɔkumkani ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a aliʃumi ɓamkǁaɓɛla uɡ̤ɛd̤alija namajud̤a namakalɛd̤i aɓɛnajɛ ɛmiz̤pa ɓɛsuka kɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kɔmŋǀinanɛ ɓɛz̤isa kɔmkʰulu naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛmikʰɔsi ɓaja ɛjiputa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛwɔjika amakalɛd̤i kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wɔkufud̤uswa kukajɛhɔjakin wakwajud̤a nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɓini nɡ̤ɔsuku lwamaʃumi ɔmaɓini anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ uɛv̤ilimɛrɔd̤aki wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɔkwɛnz̤iwa kwakʰɛ wajipʰakamisa intlɔkɔ kajɛhɔjakin wakwajud̤a wamkʰupʰa ɛntɔlɔnɡ̤wɛni watʰɛtʰa najɛ kakuɬɛ wajimisa itrɔnɛ jakʰɛ janɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛtrɔnɛ jɔɔkumkani aɓaɓɛnajɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli z̤akʰululwa iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤asɛntɔlɔnɡ̤wɛni ukuɮa isɔnka pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɔkupʰila kwakʰɛ wawunikwa umkǁʰɛʃɔ wakʰɛ umkǁʰɛʃɔ wamakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ uv̤ɛla intɔ jɛmini nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛmini jajɔ jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɔkupʰila kwakʰɛ uad̤am usɛtɛ uɛnɔʃɛ ukɛnan umahalalɛli ujɛrɛd̤ɛ uɛnɔki umɛtusɛla ulamɛki unɔwa uʃɛm uham ujafɛtɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakajafɛtɛ nɡ̤uɡ̤ɔmɛrɛ nɔmaɡ̤ɔɡ̤i nɔmad̤aji nɔjav̤an nɔtub̤ali nɔmɛʃɛki nɔtirasi ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ɔmɛrɛ nɡ̤uaʃɛkɛnaz̤i nɔd̤ifati nɔtɔɡ̤arma ɔɔɲana ɓakajav̤an nɡ̤uɛliʃa nɔtarʃiʃɛ nɡ̤amakiti namad̤ɔd̤an ɔɔɲana ɓakaham nɡ̤ukuʃi nɔmit͡sɛrajim nɔputi nɔkanan ɔɔɲana ɓakakuʃi nɡ̤usɛb̤a nɔhav̤ila nɔsab̤ɛta nɔrama nɔsab̤ɛtɛka ɔɔɲana ɓakarama nɡ̤uʃɛb̤a nɔd̤ɛd̤an ukuʃi waz̤ala unimrɔd̤i jɛna wakǃala waɓa liɡ̤ɔxa ɛm̤laɓɛni umit͡sɛrajim waz̤ala amalud̤i namaanam namalɛhab̤i namanafɛtuji namapatrusi namakasɛluji apʰɔ kwapʰuma kʰɔna amafilisti namakafɛtɔri ukanan waz̤ala ut͡sid̤ɔn ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ kujɛ nɔhɛti namajɛb̤usi namaamɔri namaɡ̤irɡ̤aʃi namahiv̤i namaarɛki namasini namaarv̤ad̤i namat͡sɛmari namahamati ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃɛm nɡ̤uɛlan nɔasuri nɔarpakiʃad̤i nɔlud̤i nɔaram nɔut͡sɛ nɔhuli nɔɡ̤ɛtɛrɛ nɔmɛʃɛki uarpakiʃad̤i waz̤ala uʃɛla uʃɛla waz̤ala uɛb̤ɛrɛ uɛb̤ɛrɛ waz̤alɛlwa ɔɔɲana aɓaɓini iɡ̤ama lɔmɲɛ nɡ̤upɛlɛɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jakʰɛ ɓaɬukaɬuka aɓɛmi ɓɔm̤laɓa iɡ̤ama lɔmninawa wakʰɛ ɓɛlinɡ̤ujɔkɛtan ujɔkɛtan waz̤ala ualɛmɔd̤ad̤i nɔʃɛlɛfɛ nɔhat͡sarɛmav̤ɛtɛ nɔjɛra nɔhad̤ɔram nɔuz̤ali nɔd̤ikɛla nɔɛb̤ali nɔab̤imajɛli nɔʃɛb̤a nɔɔfirɛ nɔhav̤ila nɔjɔb̤ab̤i ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakajɔkɛtan uʃɛm uarpakiʃad̤i uʃɛla uɛb̤ɛrɛ upɛlɛɡ̤ɛ urɛhu usɛruɡ̤i unahɔrɛ utɛra uaɓram nɡ̤uaɓraham kɛ lɔwɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaaɓraham nɡ̤uisakɛ nɔiʃmajɛli z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤i iinz̤ala z̤aɓɔ ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ kuiʃmajɛli nɡ̤unɛb̤ajɔti nɔkɛd̤arɛ nɔad̤ɛb̤ɛlɛ nɔmib̤ɛsam umiʃama nɔd̤uma umasa uhad̤ad̤ɛ nɔtɛma ujɛturɛ unafiʃi nɔkɛd̤ɛma nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaiʃmajɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakakɛtura iʃwɛʃwɛ likaaɓraham waz̤ala uz̤imran nɔjɔkɛʃan nɔmɛd̤an nɔmid̤ijan nɔiʃb̤aki nɔʃuwa ɔɔɲana ɓakajɔkɛʃan nɡ̤uʃɛb̤a nɔd̤ɛd̤an ɔɔɲana ɓakamid̤ijan nɡ̤uɛfa nɔɛfɛrɛ nɔɛnɔki nɔab̤id̤a nɔɛlid̤aha ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakakɛtura uaɓraham waz̤ala uisakɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaisakɛ nɡ̤uɛsawu nɔsirajɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛsawu nɡ̤uɛlifaz̤i nɔrɛhuwɛli nɔjɛhuʃɛ nɔjalam nɔkɔra ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛlifaz̤i nɡ̤utɛman nɔɔmarɛ nɔt͡sɛfi nɔɡ̤atam nɔkɛnaz̤i nɔtimna nɔamalɛki ɔɔɲana ɓakarɛhuwɛli nɡ̤ɔɔnahati nɔz̤ɛra nɔʃama nɔmiz̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakasɛhira nɡ̤ulɔtan nɔʃɔb̤ali nɔt͡sib̤ɛjɔn nɔana nɔd̤iʃɔn nɔɛt͡sɛrɛ nɔd̤iʃan ɔɔɲana ɓakalɔtan nɡ̤amahɔri nɔhɔnam ud̤ad̤ɛ ɓɔlɔtan nɡ̤utimna ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃɔb̤ali nɡ̤ualɛjan nɔmanahati nɔɛb̤ali nɔʃɛfi nɔɔnam ɔɔɲana ɓakat͡sib̤ɛjɔn nɡ̤uaja nɔana ɔɔɲana ɓakaana nɡ̤ud̤iʃɔn ɔɔɲana ɓakad̤iʃɔn nɡ̤uhamran nɔɛʃb̤an nɔitran nɔkɛran ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛt͡sɛrɛ nɡ̤ub̤ilɛhan nɔz̤av̤an nɔjakan ɔɔɲana ɓakad̤iʃan nɡ̤uut͡sɛ nɔaran nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa ɔɔkumkani aɓaɓɛlawula ɛz̤wɛni lakwaɛd̤ɔm kunɡ̤ɛkaɓikʰɔ uɓɛlawula ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ub̤ɛla uɲana kab̤ɛhɔrɛ iɡ̤ama lɔmz̤i wakʰɛ lijid̤inab̤a wafa ub̤ɛla ujɔb̤ab̤i uɲana kaz̤ɛra wasɛb̤ɔt͡sɛra waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ wafa ujɔb̤ab̤i uhuʃam wasɛz̤wɛni lamatɛman waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ wafa uhuʃam uhad̤ad̤i uɲana kab̤ɛd̤ad̤i ɔwakǁaɓɛla amamid̤ijan ɛm̤laɓɛni wakwamɔwab̤i waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ iɡ̤ama lɔmz̤i wakʰɛ ɓɛlijiav̤iti wafa uhad̤ad̤i usamla wasɛmasɛrɛka waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ wafa usamla usawulɛ wasɛrɛhɔb̤ɔti jɔmlamɓɔ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ wafa usawulɛ ub̤ahalihanan uɲana kaakɛb̤ɔrɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ wafa ub̤ahalihanan uhad̤ad̤i waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ iɡ̤ama lɔmz̤i wakʰɛ ɓɛlijipahi iɡ̤ama lɔmkakʰɛ ujab̤ɛt͡sɛ wamŋǃula utʰikǁɔ wakwasirajɛli watʰi nɡ̤amana wand̤isikɛlɛla wawand̤isa ummanɮa isanɮa sakʰɔ saɓa wand̤itʰintɛla ɛɓuɓini ukuz̤ɛ nd̤inɡ̤aɓulalɛki utʰikǁɔ wamɛnz̤ɛla lɔɔ ntɔ wajikǀɛlajɔ ukɛlub̤i umkʰuluwa kaʃuwa waz̤ala umɛhirɛ ɔnɡ̤ujisɛ kaɛʃtɔn uɛʃtɔn waz̤ala inɮu karafa nɔpasɛha nɔtɛhina ɔz̤ala umz̤i kanahaʃɛ nɡ̤awɔ lawɔ amad̤ɔd̤a akwarɛka ɔɔɲana ɓakakɛnaz̤i uɔtɛnijɛli nɔsɛraja ɔɔɲana ɓakaɔtɛnijɛli nɡ̤uhatati nɔmɛhɔnɔtaji umɛhɔnɔtaji waz̤ala uɔfɛra usɛraja waz̤ala ujɔwab̤i ɔz̤ala ɔɔɡ̤ɛharaʃim nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛɓɛz̤iiŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi ɔɔɲana ɓakakalɛb̤i uɲana kajɛfunɛ nɡ̤ɔɔiru nɔɛla nɔnaham umkakʰɛ ujɛhud̤ija waz̤ala ujɛrɛd̤ɛ ɔz̤ala amaɡ̤ɛd̤ɔrɛ nɔhɛb̤ɛrɛ ɔz̤ala amasɔkɔ nɔjɛkutijɛli ɔz̤ala amaz̤anɔwa nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤itʲa intɔmɓi kafarɔ awajiz̤ɛkajɔ umɛrɛd̤ɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɔmkakʰɛ uhɔd̤ija ud̤ad̤ɛ ɓɔnaham nɡ̤ɔz̤ala amakɛhila umɡ̤armi nɔz̤ala amaɛʃtɛmɔwa ummahaka ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃimɔn nɡ̤ɔɔamnɔn nɔrina nɡ̤ɔɔb̤ɛn̤anan nɔtilɔn ɔɔɲana ɓakaiʃi nɡ̤ɔɔz̤ɔhɛtɛ nɔb̤ɛnz̤ɔhɛtɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃɛla uɲana kajud̤a nɡ̤ɔɔɛrɛ ɔz̤ala amalɛka nɔlad̤a ɔz̤ala amamarɛʃa nɛmiz̤alwanɛ jɛnɮu jaɓasɛɓɛnz̤a ilinɛn ɛkǀikiz̤ɛkilɛjɔ jɛnɮu kaaʃb̤ɛja nɔjɔkim namad̤ɔd̤a asɛkɔz̤ɛb̤a nɔjɔwaʃɛ nɔsarafɛ aɓa ɓaz̤iz̤ikʰulu kwamɔwab̤i nɔjaʃub̤ilɛhɛm kɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ z̤ɛz̤akud̤ala nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ aɓaɓumɓi naɓɛmi ɓasɛnɛtajim nɛɡ̤ɛd̤ɛra ɓaɬala kʰɔna nɔkumkani ɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini wakʰɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasimɔn nɡ̤unɛmuwɛli nɔjamin nɔjarib̤i ɓaɬala ɛz̤ikʰunɮɛni z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛkukʰɔ utʲani ɓɛmpaɬa jaɓɔ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ kʰɔna kwapʰuma kuɓɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakasimɔn aɓɔ kwaja ɛntaɓɛni jasɛsɛhirɛ amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amakʰulu amaɬanu ɛpʰɛtʰwɛ nɡ̤ɔɔpɛlatija amaɓini aɓantu ɓɛlikʰulu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓaninz̤i aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jajipʰuma kutʰikǁɔ imfaz̤wɛ lɛjɔ ɓaɬala ɛz̤ikʰunɮɛni z̤aɓɔ ɓad̤a ɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa kɛ kalɔku ɔɔɲana ɓɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsiz̤wɛ sakwamanasɛ ɓaɬala kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ ɓatʰaɓatʰɛla ɛb̤aʃan ɓɛsa ɛb̤ahalihɛrmɔn nasɛsɛnirɛ nasɛntaɓɛni jɛhɛrmɔn ukuɓa ɓaninz̤i kwaɓɔ z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤i iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ nɔɛfɛrɛ nɔiʃi nɔɛlijɛli nɔaz̤ɛrijɛli nɔjɛrɛmija awaz̤it͡ʃaɓalalisajɔ utʰikǁɔ pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli wawukǁʰɔkɔŋǁa umɔja kapuli wasɛasirija nɔmɔja katiɡ̤ɛlatɛpilɛnɛz̤ɛrɛ wasɛasirija wawafud̤usa amarub̤ɛn namaɡ̤ad̤i nɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsiz̤wɛ uaz̤arija uaz̤arija waz̤ala ujɔhanan ujɔhanan waz̤ala uaz̤arija jɛna kɛ ɛɓɛnɡ̤umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛnɮwini awajakʰajɔ usɔlɔmɔn ɛjɛrusalɛm uaz̤arija waz̤ala uamarija uamarija waz̤ala uahitub̤i uahitub̤i amajud̤a nɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔnɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakalɛv̤i nɡ̤uɡ̤ɛrʃɔm nɔkɛhati nɔmɛrari nɡ̤awɔ amaɡ̤ama ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ɛrʃɔm nɡ̤ulib̤ɛni nɔʃimɛhi ɔɔɲana ɓakakɛhati nɡ̤uamram nɔit͡sarɛ nɔhɛɓrɔn nɔuz̤ijɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakamɛrari nɡ̤umahɛli nɔmuʃi jijɔ kɛ lɛjɔ imiz̤alwanɛ kalɛv̤i nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ kuɡ̤ɛrʃɔm nɡ̤ulib̤ɛni uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤ujahati uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤uz̤ima uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤ujɔwa uɲana uɲana wakʰɛ nɔasirɛ uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤utahati uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤uurijɛli uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤uuz̤ija uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤usawulɛ uɲana wakʰɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛlikana nɡ̤uamasaji nɔahimɔti kuɛlikana ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛlikana nɡ̤ut͡sɔfaji uɲana wakʰɛ nɔnahati uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤uɛlijab̤i uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤ujɔram uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤uɛlikana uɲana wakʰɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasamuwɛli nɡ̤uv̤aʃni amaz̤iɓulɔ akʰɛ nɔab̤ija ɔɔɲana ɓakamɛrari nɡ̤umahɛli nɡ̤ulib̤ɛni uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤uʃimɛhi uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤uuz̤a uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤uʃimɛha uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤uhaɡ̤ija uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤uasaja uɲana wakʰɛ aɓa nɡ̤aɓɔ waɓapʰatʰisajɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ inɡ̤ɔma ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a kususɛla kɔkɔ japʰumlajɔ itʲɛja ɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛla nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔma pʰamɓi kɔmŋǃuɓa ɔjintɛntɛ jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana wad̤a usɔlɔmɔn wajakʰa inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm ɓɛma nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ laɓɔ ɛnkɔnz̤wɛni jaɓɔ aɓa nɡ̤aɓɔ ɓɛma nɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ kuɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakakɛhati nɡ̤uhɛman imv̤umi uɲana kajɔwɛli uɲana kaʃɛmuwɛli uɲana kaɛlikana uɲana kajɛrɔham uɲana kaɛlijɛli uɲana katɔha uɲana kat͡sufi uɲana kaɛlikana uɲana kamahati uɲana kaamasaji uɲana kaɛlikana uɲana kajɔwɛli uɲana kaaz̤arija uɲana kaz̤ɛfanija uɲana katahati uɲana kaasirɛ uɲana kaab̤ijasɛfu uɲana kakɔra uɲana kait͡sarɛ uɲana kakɛhati uɲana kalɛv̤i uɲana kasirajɛli kɛ umz̤alwana wakʰɛ uasafu wɛma nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ kwakʰɛ uasafu uɲana kab̤ɛrɛkija uɲana kaʃimɛha uɲana kamikajɛli uɲana kab̤ahasɛja uɲana kamalɛkija uɲana kaɛtɛni uɲana kaz̤ɛra uɲana kaad̤aja uɲana kaɛtan uɲana kaz̤ima uɲana kaʃimɛhi uɲana kajahati uɲana kaɡ̤ɛrʃɔm uɲana kalɛv̤i aɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakamɛrari ɓɛma nɡ̤asɛkʰɔɬɔ uɛtan uɲana kakiʃi uɲana kaab̤ɛd̤i uɲana kamuluki uɲana kahaʃab̤ija uɲana kaamat͡sija uɲana kahilɛkija uɲana kaamt͡si uɲana kab̤ani uɲana kaʃɛmɛrɛ uɲana kamahɛli uɲana kamuʃi uɲana kamɛrari uɲana kalɛv̤i aɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ aɓalɛv̤i ɓaɓɛmisɛlwɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɔnkɛ wɔmŋǃuɓa wɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ kɛ uarɔn nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓaɓɛkǃʰumisɛla ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni sɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nasɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni sɛsikǃʰumisɔ ɓɛnɡ̤aɓɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i wɔnkɛ wɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓakǀamaɡ̤uʃɛlɛ amasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkɔkɔ kɔnkɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i katʰikǁɔ nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakaarɔn nɡ̤uɛlaz̤arɛ uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤upinɛhasi uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤uab̤iʃuwa uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤ub̤uki uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤uuz̤i uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤uz̤ɛraja uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤umɛrajɔti uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤uamarija uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤uahitub̤i uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤ut͡sad̤ɔki uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤uahimahat͡sɛ uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤awɔ amakʰaja aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤ili z̤aɓɔ ɛmid̤ɛni jaɓɔ ɛz̤ɔɔɲana ɓakaarɔn nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ kakɛhati nɡ̤ɔkuɓa laɓa lɛlaɓɔ ikǃaʃisɔ ɓaɓanika ɔwasɛhɛɓrɔn ɛz̤wɛni lakwajud̤a namaɮɛlɔ awɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kɛ wɔna ɔmz̤i lɔwɔ nɛmiz̤ana jawɔ ɓawanika ukalɛb̤i uɲana kajɛfunɛ ɓaɓanika ɔɔɲana ɓakaarɔn imiz̤i jɔkusaɓɛla ɔwasɛhɛɓrɔn nɛlib̤ɛna namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛjatirɛ nɛɛʃtɛmɔwa namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛhilɛn namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛd̤ɛb̤irɛ namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛaʃan namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ ɛsiz̤wɛni sakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin iɡ̤ɛb̤a namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛalɛmɛtɛ namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛanatɔti namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ jɔnkɛ imiz̤i jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ jaɓɛ ijimiz̤i ɛliʃumi ɛlinamitʰatʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakakɛhati aɓasɛlɛjɔ ɓanikwa ɛmz̤alwanɛni wɛsiz̤wɛ sakwaɛfrajim nasɛsiz̤wɛni sakwad̤an nasɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰɛni sɛsiz̤wɛ sakwamanasɛ nɡ̤ɛkǃaʃisɔ imiz̤i ɛliʃumi ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ɛrʃɔm nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ ɓanikwa ɛsiz̤wɛni sakwaisakarɛ nasɛsiz̤wɛni sakwaaʃɛrɛ nasɛsiz̤wɛni sakwanafɛtali nasɛsiz̤wɛni sakwamanasɛ ɛb̤aʃan imiz̤i jaliʃumi ɛlinamitʰatʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakamɛrari nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jaɓɔ ɓanikwa ɛsiz̤wɛni sakwarub̤ɛn nasɛsiz̤wɛni sakwaɡ̤ad̤i nasɛsiz̤wɛni sakwaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn nɡ̤ɛkǃaʃisɔ imiz̤i ɛliʃumi ɛlinamiɓini ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaɓanika aɓalɛv̤i imiz̤i namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ ɓaɓanika nɡ̤ɛkǃaʃisɔ ɛsiz̤wɛni sɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a nasɛsiz̤wɛni sɔɔɲana ɓakasimɔn nasɛsiz̤wɛni sɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin jɔna lɛ miz̤i iɓiz̤iwɛjɔ nɡ̤amaɡ̤ama ajɔ kɛ ɛmiz̤alwanɛni jɔɔɲana ɓakakɛhati kwaɓakʰɔ imiz̤i jɛmid̤a jaɓɔ ɛsiz̤wɛni sakwaɛfrajim ɓaɓanika imiz̤i jɔkusaɓɛla ɔwakwaʃɛkɛm namaɮɛlɔ awɔ ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwaɛfrajim nɛɡ̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛjɔkɛmɛham namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛb̤ɛtɛhɔrɔn namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛajalɔn namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛɡ̤atirimɔn namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nasɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰɛni sɛsiz̤wɛ sakwamanasɛ ianɛrɛ namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛb̤ilɛham namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔmz̤alwanɛ wɔɔɲana ɓakakɛhati aɓasɛlɛjɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ɛrʃɔm ɓanikwa ɛmz̤alwanɛni wɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsiz̤wɛ sakwamanasɛ iɡ̤ɔlan jasɛb̤aʃan namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛaʃtarɔti namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nasɛsiz̤wɛni sakwaisakarɛ ikɛd̤ɛʃɛ namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛd̤ab̤ɛrati namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛramɔti namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛanɛm namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nasɛsiz̤wɛni sakwaaʃɛrɛ imaʃalɛ namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛab̤ɛd̤ɔn namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛhukɔki namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛrɛhɔb̤i namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nasɛsiz̤wɛni sakwanafɛtali ikɛd̤ɛʃɛ jasɛɡ̤alili namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛhamɔn namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛkirijatajim namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ aɓasɛlɛjɔ kuɓalɛv̤i kɔɔɲana ɓakamɛrari ɓanikwa ɛsiz̤wɛni sakwaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn irimɔnɔ namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛtab̤ɔrɛ namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ napʰɛʃɛja kwɛjɔrd̤an nɡ̤asɛjɛrikɔ nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a kwɛjɔrd̤an ɛsiz̤wɛni sakwarub̤ɛn ib̤ɛt͡sɛrɛ ɛsɛntlanɡ̤ɔ namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛjat͡sa namanɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛkɛd̤ɛmɔti namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛmɛfahata namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nasɛsiz̤wɛni sakwaɡ̤ad̤i iramɔti jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛmahanajim namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛhɛʃb̤ɔn namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ nɛjaz̤ɛrɛ namaɮɛlɔ ajɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaisakarɛ nɡ̤utɔla nɔpuwa nɔjaʃub̤i nɔʃimrɔn ɓaɓɛɓanɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakatɔla nɡ̤uuz̤i nɔrɛfaja nɔjɛrijɛli nɔjamaji nɔib̤ɛsam nɔsamuwɛli iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ z̤ikatɔla amaɡ̤ɔxa anɔɓuk͡xɔti nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛnz̤ala z̤awɔ inani lawɔ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kad̤av̤id̤ɛ laɓa nɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini anamaɓini anamakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakauz̤i nɡ̤uiz̤ɛrahija nɔɔɲana ɓakaiz̤ɛrahija nɡ̤umikajɛli nɔɔb̤ad̤ija nɔjɔwɛli nɔiʃija ɓaɓɛɓaɬanu ɓɛz̤iintlɔkɔ ɓɔnkɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ naɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛnz̤ala z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ kwakukʰɔ iz̤impi z̤ɔmkʰɔsi wɔkulwa amaʃumi amatʰatʰu anamatʰand̤atʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛnaɓafaz̤i nɔɔɲana aɓaninz̤i aɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jɔnkɛ jakwaisakarɛ amaɡ̤ɔxa anɔɓuk͡xɔti ɓajɛ ɓɛnɡ̤amaʃumi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ukub̤alwa kwaɓɔ ɛmiliɓɛni jaɓɔ jɔkuz̤alwa ɓɛɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤ub̤ɛla nɔb̤ɛkɛrɛ nɔjɛd̤ihajɛli ɓɛɓɛɓatʰatʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛla nɡ̤uɛt͡sɛb̤ɔn nɔuz̤i nɔuz̤ijɛli nɔjɛrimɔti nɔiri ɓajɛ ɓɛɓaɬanu iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ amaɡ̤ɔxa anɔɓuk͡xɔti nɡ̤ɔkub̤alwa kwaɓɔ ɛmiliɓɛni jɔkuz̤alwa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini anamaɓini anamaŋǀi matʰatʰu anɛsinɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛkɛrɛ nɡ̤uz̤ɛmira nɔjɔwaʃɛ nɔɛlijɛz̤ɛrɛ nɔɛlijɔhɛnaji nɔɔmri nɔjɛrɛmɔti nɔab̤ija nɔanatɔti nɔalamɛtɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛkɛrɛ nɡ̤ɔkub̤alwa kwaɓɔ ɛmiliɓɛni jɔkuz̤alwa nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛnz̤ala z̤aɓɔ z̤ɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ amaɡ̤ɔxa anɔɓuk͡xɔti ɓaɓɛnɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini anamakʰulu amaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓakajɛd̤ihajɛli nɡ̤ub̤ilɛhan ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ilɛhan nɡ̤ujɛhuʃɛ nɔb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɔɛhud̤i nɔkɛnahana nɔz̤ɛtan nɔtarʃiʃɛ nɔahiʃaharɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakajɛd̤ihajɛli nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ amaɡ̤ɔxa anɔɓuk͡xɔti aliʃumi ɛlinɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamakʰulu maɓini apʰuma umkʰɔsi ajɛ ɔɔʃupim nɔhupim nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakairɛ ɔɔhuʃim nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakaahɛrɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakanafɛtali nɡ̤ujat͡sijɛli nɔɡ̤uni nɔjɛt͡sɛrɛ nɔʃalum ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤iliha ɔɔɲana ɓakamanasɛ nɡ̤uaʃɛrijɛli awamz̤alɛlwajɔ iʃwɛʃwɛ lakʰɛ umaramikaz̤i laz̤ala umakirɛ ujisɛ kaɡ̤ilijad̤i umakirɛ waz̤ɛka ud̤ad̤ɛ ɓɔɔhupim nɔʃupim iɡ̤ama lɔd̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ ɓɛlinɡ̤umahaka iɡ̤ama lɔwɛsiɓini ɓɛlinɡ̤ut͡sɛlɔfɛhad̤i kɛ ut͡sɛlɔfɛhad̤i uɓɛnɛɛntɔmɓi umahaka umkamakirɛ waz̤ala uɲana watʰi iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ nɡ̤upɛrɛʃɛ iɡ̤ama lɔmninawa wakʰɛ ɓɛlinɡ̤uʃɛrɛʃɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤uulam nɔrɛkɛm ɔɔɲana ɓakaulam nɡ̤ub̤ɛd̤an nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤ilijad̤i uɲana kamakirɛ uɲana kamanasɛ ud̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ uhamɔlɛkɛtɛ waz̤ala uiʃɔd̤i nɔab̤ihɛz̤ɛrɛ nɔmahala ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃɛmid̤a ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɔɔahijan nɔʃɛkɛm nɔliki nɔanijam ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛfrajim nɡ̤uʃutɛla nɔb̤ɛrɛd̤ɛ uɲana wakʰɛ nɔtahati uɲana wakʰɛ nɔɛlijad̤a uɲana wakʰɛ nɔtahati uɲana wakʰɛ nɔz̤ab̤ad̤i uɲana wakʰɛ nɔʃutɛla uɲana wakʰɛ nɔɛz̤ɛrɛ nɔɛlad̤i aɓaɓaɓulalajɔ aɓantu ɓakwaɡ̤ati aɓaɓɛz̤alɛlwɛ kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛɬɛ ɓɛz̤a kutʰaɓatʰa imiɬamɓi jaɓɔ wɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili uɛfrajim ujisɛ imiɬa ɛmininz̤i ɓɛz̤a kumkʰuz̤a aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ wamnɡ̤ɛna umfaz̤i wakʰɛ wakʰawula waz̤ala uɲana watʰi iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ nɡ̤ub̤ɛrija nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛkuɬɛ uɓuɓi ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ intɔmɓi jakʰɛ iɓinɡ̤uʃɛra jajakʰa ib̤ɛtɛhɔrɔn ɛjasɛz̤ant͡si nɛjasɛntla nɛuz̤ɛnʃɛra urɛfa ɛɓɛnɡ̤uɲana wakʰɛ nɔrɛʃɛfɛ utɛla nɡ̤uɲana wakʰɛ nɔtahan uɲana wakʰɛ ulad̤an uɲana wakʰɛ uamihud̤i uɲana wakʰɛ uɛliʃama uɲana wakʰɛ unun uɲana wakʰɛ ujɔʃuwa uɲana wakʰɛ kɛ kalɔku laɓɔ namakʰaja aɓɔ jib̤ɛtɛli namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a jinaharan nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a jiɡ̤ɛz̤ɛrɛ namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ nɔwakwaʃɛkɛm namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi awɔ kwɛsa ɛɡ̤az̤a namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ ɛsɛz̤anɮɛni z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakamanasɛ jib̤ɛtɛʃɛhan namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ jitahanaki namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ jimɛɡ̤id̤ɔ namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ jid̤ɔrɛ namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ kulapʰɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakajɔsɛfu uɲana kasirajɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakaaʃɛrɛ nɡ̤uimna nɔiʃwa nɔiʃɛv̤i nɔb̤ɛrija nɔsɛra ud̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛrija nɡ̤uhɛb̤ɛrɛ nɔmalɛkijɛli ɔnɡ̤ujisɛ kab̤irz̤av̤iti uhɛb̤ɛrɛ waz̤ala ujafɛlɛtɛ nɔʃɔmɛrɛ nɔhɔtam nɔʃuwa ud̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakajafɛlɛtɛ nɡ̤upasaki nɔb̤im̤ali nɔaʃɛv̤ati nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakajafɛlɛtɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃɛmɛrɛ nɡ̤uahi nɔrɔɡ̤a nɔjɛhub̤a nɔaram ɔɔɲana ɓakahɛlɛm umz̤alwana wakʰɛ nɡ̤ut͡sɔfa nɔimna nɔʃɛlɛʃɛ nɔamali ɔɔɲana ɓakat͡sɔfa nɡ̤usuwa nɔharɛnɛfɛrɛ nɔʃuwali nɔb̤ɛri nɔimra nɡ̤ub̤ɛt͡sɛrɛ nɔhɔd̤i nɔʃama nɔʃilɛʃa nɔitran nɔb̤ɛhɛra ɔɔɲana ɓakajɛtɛrɛ nɡ̤ujɛfunɛ nɔpisɛpa nɔara ɔɔɲana ɓakaula nɡ̤uara nɔhanijɛli nɔrit͡sija ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakaaʃɛrɛ iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ amaɡ̤ɔxa aɬɛliwɛjɔ anɔɓuk͡xɔti iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤ikʰulu ukub̤alwa kwaɓɔ ɛmiliɓɛni jɔkuz̤alwa kwasɛmkʰɔsini ukuɓa ɓalwɛ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmaɓini anamatʰand̤atʰu lawɔ ub̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin waz̤ala ub̤ɛla amaz̤i ɓulɔ akʰɛ nɔaʃɛb̤ɛlɛ ɔwɛsiɓini nɔahara ɔwɛsitʰatʰu unɔha ɔwɛsinɛ nɔrafa ɔwɛsiɬanu ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛla ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɔɔad̤arɛ nɔɡ̤ɛra nɔab̤ihud̤i nɔab̤iʃuwa nɔnahaman nɔahɔwa nɔɡ̤ɛra nɔʃɛfufan nɔhuram nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛhud̤i aɓɔ ɓaz̤iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ kuɓɛmi ɓasɛɡ̤ɛb̤a ɓaɓafud̤usɛla ɛmanahati nɡ̤unahaman nɔahija nɔɡ̤ɛra ɔwaɓafud̤usajɔ uɛhud̤i waz̤ala uuz̤a nɔahihud̤i uʃaharajim waz̤ala ɛm̤laɓɛni wakwamɔwab̤i ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓand̤ulula wakʰɛ ɔɔhuʃim nɔb̤ahara aɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɛ waz̤ala nɡ̤ɔhɔd̤ɛʃɛ umkakʰɛ ujɔb̤ab̤i nɔt͡sib̤ɛja nɔmɛʃa nɔmalɛkɔm nɔjɛhut͡sɛ nɔʃakija nɔmirma nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ nɡ̤ɔhuʃim waz̤ala uab̤itub̤i nɔɛlipʰahali ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛlipahali nɡ̤uɛb̤ɛrɛ nɔmiʃam nɔʃɛmɛrɛ ɔwajakʰajɔ iɔnɔ nɛlɔd̤i namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ nɡ̤ɔɔb̤ɛrija nɔʃɛma aɓaz̤iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ kuɓɛmi ɓasɛajalɔn aɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa aɓɛmi ɓasɛɡ̤ati ɔɔahijɔ nɔʃaʃaki nɔjɛrɛmɔti nɔz̤ɛb̤ad̤ija nɔarad̤i nɔɛd̤ɛrɛ nɔmikajɛli nɔiʃpa nɔjɔha ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛrija ɔɔz̤ɛb̤ad̤ija nɔmɛʃulam nɔhiz̤ɛki nɔhɛb̤ɛrɛ nɔiʃmɛraji nɔjɛz̤ilija nɔjɔb̤aɓi ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛlɛpahali ɔɔjakim nɔz̤ik͡xi nɔz̤ab̤ɛd̤i nɔɛlihɛnaji nɔt͡silɛtaji nɔɛlijɛli nɔad̤aja nɔb̤ɛraja nɔʃimrati ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃimɛhi ɔɔiʃpan nɔɛb̤ɛrɛ nɔɛlijɛli nɔab̤ɛd̤ɔn nɔz̤ik͡xi nɔhanan nɔhananija nɔɛlam nɔantɔtija nɔifɛd̤ija nɔpɛnuwɛli ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃaʃaki ɔɔʃamɛʃɛraji nɔʃɛharija nɔatalija nɔjarɛʃija nɔɛlija nɔz̤ik͡xi ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakajɛrɔham z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛnz̤ala z̤az̤ɔ z̤iintlɔkɔ kɛ ɛz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ z̤aɬala ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn kwaɬala ɔz̤ala amaɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn ujɛhijɛli iɡ̤ama lɔmkakʰɛ ɓɛlinɡ̤umahaka nɡ̤uab̤ɛd̤ɔn uɲana wakʰɛ wamaz̤iɓulɔ nɔt͡surɛ nɔkiʃɛ nɔb̤ahali nɔnad̤ab̤i nɔɡ̤ɛd̤ɔrɛ nɔahijɔ nɔz̤ɛkɛrɛ umikɛlɔti waz̤ala uʃimɛha naɓɔ ɓaɬala ɛjɛrusalɛm naɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ malunɡ̤ana naɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ unɛrɛ waz̤ala ukiʃɛ ukiʃɛ waz̤ala usawulɛ usawulɛ waz̤ala ujɔnatan nɔmalɛkiʃuwa nɔab̤inad̤ab̤i nɔɛʃb̤ahali uɲana kajɔnatan nɡ̤umɛrib̤ib̤ahali umɛrib̤ib̤ahali waz̤ala umika ɔɔɲana ɓakamika nɡ̤upitɔn nɔmɛlɛki nɔtarɛja nɔahaz̤i uahaz̤i waz̤ala ujɛhɔwad̤a ujɛhɔwad̤a waz̤ala ualɛmɛtɛ nɔaz̤ɛmav̤ɛtɛ nɔz̤imri uz̤imri waz̤ala umɔt͡sa umɔt͡sa waz̤ala ub̤inɛha nɡ̤urafa uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤uɛlɛhasa uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤uat͡sɛlɛ uɲana wakʰɛ uat͡sɛlɛ ɛɓɛnɔɔɲana aɓatʰand̤atʰu nɡ̤awɔ amaɡ̤ama aɓɔ nɡ̤uaz̤ɛrikam nɡ̤ub̤ɔkɛru nɔiʃmajɛli nɔʃɛharija nɔɔb̤ad̤ija nɔhanan ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakaat͡sɛlɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛʃɛki umz̤alwana wakʰɛ nɡ̤uulam amaz̤iɓulɔ akʰɛ nɡ̤ujɛhuʃɛ ɔwɛsiɓini nɡ̤uɛlifɛlɛtɛ ɔwɛsitʰatʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakaulam ɓaɓɛnɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amaɡ̤ɔxa anɔɓuk͡xɔti aɓaɡ̤ɔɓa isapʰɛtʰa ɓaɓɛnɔɔɲana aɓaninz̤i nɔɔɲana ɓɔɔɲana ikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɬanu ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɔnkɛ kɛ amasirajɛli ab̤alwa ɛmiliɓɛni jɔkuz̤alwa nanɡ̤ɔ kɛ ɛb̤aliwɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli amajud̤a atʰind͡ʒ̤wa ɛb̤ab̤ɛli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkumɛnɛz̤a kwawɔ aɓɛmi ɓɔkukǃala aɓaɓɛsɛmafɛni aɓɔ ɛmiz̤ini jaɓɔ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤amasirajɛli aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i naɓasɛɓɛnz̤a ɛtɛmpilɛni ɛjɛrusalɛm kwaɬala aɓɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a naɓɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin naɓɔɔɲana ɓɔɔɛfrajim nɔmanasɛ nɡ̤uutaji uɲana kaamihud̤i uɲana kaɔmri uɲana kaimri uɲana kab̤ani kɔɔɲana ɓakapɛrɛt͡sɛ uɲana kajud̤a nakumaʃilɔ nɡ̤uaz̤aja amaz̤iɓulɔ akʰɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ kɔɔɲana ɓakaz̤ɛra nɡ̤ujɛhuwɛli naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu anamaŋǀi asitʰɔɓa kɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤usalu uɲana kamɛʃulam uɲana kahɔd̤afija uɲana kahasɛnuwa nɔib̤ɛnɛja uɲana kajɛrɔham nɔɛla uɲana kauz̤i uɲana kamik͡xi nɔmɛʃulam uɲana kaʃɛfatija uɲana karɛhuwɛli uɲana kaib̤ɛnija naɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛnz̤ala z̤aɓɔ amakʰulu asitʰɔɓa anamaŋǀi maɬanu anaɓatʰand̤atʰu ɔnkɛ lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛz̤iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ ɛz̤inɮwini z̤ɔɔjisɛ kuɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɡ̤ujɛd̤aja nɔjɛhɔjarib̤i nɔjakin nɔaz̤arija uɲana kahilɛkija uɲana kamɛʃulam uɲana kat͡sad̤ɔki uɲana kamɛrajɔti uɲana kaahitub̤i inɡ̤anɡ̤a jɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ nɔad̤aja uɲana kajɛrɔham uɲana kapaʃurɛ uɲana kamalɛkija nɔmahasaji uɲana kaad̤ijɛli uɲana kajaz̤ɛra uɲana kamɛʃulam uɲana kamɛʃilɛmiti uɲana kaimɛrɛ naɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ ɛlinamakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamaŋǀi matʰand̤atʰu amaɡ̤ɔxa anɔɓuk͡xɔti ɛkuwusɛɓɛnz̤ɛni umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ kuɓalɛv̤i nɡ̤uʃɛmaja uɲana kahaʃub̤i uɲana kaaz̤ɛrikam uɲana kahaʃab̤ija kɔɔɲana ɓakamɛrari nɡ̤ub̤akɛb̤akarɛ nɔhɛrɛʃɛ nɔɡ̤alali nɔmatanija uɲana kamika uɲana kaz̤ik͡xi uɲana kaasafu nɔɔb̤ad̤ija uɲana kaʃɛmaja uɲana kaɡ̤alali uɲana kajɛd̤utun nɔb̤ɛrɛkija uɲana kaasa uɲana kaɛlikana ɔɓɛɬɛli ɛmiz̤anɛni jamanɛtɔfa aɓamasanɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤uʃalum nɔakub̤i nɔtalɛmɔn nɔahiman naɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ intlɔkɔ inɡ̤uʃalum kud̤ɛ kwaɓa nam̤la ɛsɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔkumkani ɛmpumalanɡ̤a nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ aɓamasanɡ̤ɔ ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni jɔɔɲana ɓakalɛv̤i uʃalum uɲana kakɔrɛ uɲana kaɛb̤ijasafu uɲana kakɔra naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnɮu jɔɔjisɛ amakɔra ajɛpʰɛtʰɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛnkɔnz̤ɔ ɛnɡ̤aɓaɡ̤ǀ̤ini ɓɛmiɲanɡ̤ɔ jɛntɛntɛ nɔɔjisɛ ɓawɔ ɓaɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ imiŋǃuɓa kajɛhɔv̤a ɓɛɡ̤ǀ̤ina isanɡ̤ɔ upinɛhasi uɲana kaɛlaz̤arɛ wajɛ ɛjinɡ̤anɡ̤a jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɡ̤apʰamɓili ujɛhɔv̤a wajɛnajɛ uz̤ɛkarija uɲana kamɛʃɛlɛmija wajɛnɡ̤ɔwɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛntɛntɛ jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓɛɬɛliwɛ ukuɓa ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓaɡ̤ǀ̤ini ɓamasanɡ̤ɔ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini anaʃumiɲɛ linaɓaɓini ɓɔna ɓaɓɛb̤alwɛ ɛmiliɓɛni jaɓɔ jɔkuz̤alwa ɛmiz̤anɛni jaɓɔ ɓɔna ɓamiswa nɡ̤ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɔsamuwɛli imɓɔni nɡ̤ɔkuɲanisɛka kwaɓɔ ɓɔna aɓɔ nɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ ɓaɓɛsɛmasanɡ̤wɛni ɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ɛnɮu jɛntɛntɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɡ̤ǀ̤ina ɓaɓɛkʰɔ aɓamasanɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤amakǀala ɔmanɛ nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a nɡ̤asɛntla nanɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si aɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ ɛmiz̤anɛni jaɓɔ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓɔkuz̤a nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ amakǁɛʃa nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa kuɲɛ naɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓalɛv̤i aɓɔ aɓapʰatʰi aɓakʰulu aɓanɛ aɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓamasanɡ̤ɔ ɓaɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ amaɡ̤umɓi nɔɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ ɓɛɲanisilɛ ukulala ɓaɓɛjid͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a inɮu katʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukuɡ̤ǀ̤ina ɓɛkukɔkwaɓɔ kunaɓɔ ukujiv̤ula imisɔ nɡ̤ɛmisɔ kuɓɔ ɓɛkukʰɔ aɓapʰɛtʰɛ iimpaɬa z̤ɛnkɔnz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnisa nɡ̤ɛnani ɓaz̤ikʰupʰɛ nɡ̤ɛnani kuɓɔ ɓɛkukʰɔ aɓamisɛlwɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛmpaɬa napʰɛz̤u kwɛmpaɬa jɔnkɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ napʰɛz̤u kɔmɡ̤uɓɔ ɔkǀɔliwɛjɔ nɛwajini nɛɔli nɛntlaka ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ nɔɓulawu kɔɔɲana ɓaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛkukʰɔ aɓakǀɔla uɓukǃʰɔlɔ ɓɔɓulawu umatitija ɔmɲɛ wakuɓalɛv̤i ɔɓɛnɡ̤ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ kaʃalum umkɔra uɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ ɛɲanisɛkilɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɔkɔsa nɡ̤ɛɛpani kɔɔɲana ɓakakɛhati kuɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ ɓɛkukʰɔ aɓaɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ iz̤ɔnka ɛz̤ik͡xɔz̤iswajɔ ukuz̤ilunɡ̤isa iisaɓatʰa nɡ̤ɛɛsaɓatʰa z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ iimv̤umi iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ z̤aɓalɛv̤i ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤iɬɛli ɛmaɡ̤umɓini z̤ikʰululɛkilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛz̤ipʰɛtʰɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i nɔɓusuku z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ z̤aɓalɛv̤i z̤iz̤iintlɔkɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛnz̤ala z̤az̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ z̤aɬala ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn kwakuɬɛli ɔz̤ala amaɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn ujɛhijɛli iɡ̤ama lɔmkakʰɛ ɓɛlinɡ̤umahaka uɲana wakʰɛ wamaz̤iɓulɔ nɡ̤uab̤ɛd̤ɔn janɡ̤ut͡surɛ nɔkiʃɛ nɔb̤ahali nɔnɛrɛ nɔnad̤ab̤i nɔɡ̤ɛd̤ɔrɛ nɔahijɔ nɔz̤ɛkarija nɔmikɛlɔti umikɛlɔti waz̤ala uʃimɛham kwanaɓɔ ɓaɬala naɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm malunɡ̤a naɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ unɛrɛ waz̤ala ukiʃɛ ukiʃɛ waz̤ala usawulɛ usawulɛ waz̤ala ujɔnatan nɔmalɛkiʃuwa nɔab̤inad̤ab̤i nɔɛʃb̤ahali uɲana kajɔnatan nɡ̤umɛrib̤ib̤ahali umɛrib̤ib̤ahali waz̤ala umika ɔɔɲana ɓakamika nɡ̤upitɔn nɔmɛlɛki nɔtarɛja nɔahaz̤i uahaz̤i waz̤ala ujara ujara waz̤ala ualɛmɛtɛ nɔaz̤ɛmav̤ɛtɛ nɔz̤imri uz̤imri waz̤ala umɔt͡sa umɔt͡sa waz̤ala ub̤inɛha nɔrɛfaja uɲana wakʰɛ uɛlɛhasa uɲana wakʰɛ uat͡sɛlɛ uɲana wakʰɛ uat͡sɛlɛ uɓɛnɔɔɲana aɓatʰand̤atʰu nɡ̤awɔ amaɡ̤ama aɓɔ nɡ̤uaz̤ɛrikam nɔb̤ɔkɛru nɔiʃmajɛli nɔʃɛharija nɔɔb̤ad̤ija nɔhanan nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaat͡sɛlɛ kɛ kalɔku amafilisti namasirajɛli asaɓa amad̤ɔd̤a
