z̤isɛntɛntɛni ɓaz̤iɲusa aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i kɛ usɔlɔmɔn nɛɓanɮa lɔnkɛ lamasirajɛli ɛliɓɛ liɬanɡ̤anisɛlwɛ kujɛ pʰamɓi kwɛtʲɛja ɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnakuɓalwa ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnakulinɡ̤aniswa ukuɓa z̤ininz̤i kwaz̤ɔ ɓajinɡ̤ɛnisa aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli itʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɛnd̤awɛni jajɔ ɛnd̤awɛni jɛz̤iɬaɓɔ ɛnɮwini ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni kaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ pʰant͡si kwamapʰikɔ ɛɛkɛrub̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iikɛrub̤i z̤ajɛ z̤iwɔlulɛ amapʰikɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛnd̤awɔ jɛtʲɛja iikɛrub̤i z̤ajisitʰɛlisa itʲɛja nɛz̤iɓɔnd̤a z̤ajɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤ulu z̤az̤iz̤id̤ɛ iz̤iɓɔnd̤a z̤iɓɔnakala iiŋǀam z̤ɛz̤iɓɔnd̤a z̤iv̤ɛlilɛ ɛtʲɛjɛni pʰamɓi kwɛnd̤awɔ jɛz̤iɬaɓɔ az̤aɓɔnakala nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ z̤isɛkʰɔna unanam̤la kwakunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ ntɔ ɛtʲɛjɛni jajinɡ̤alɔɔ makǀwɛkǀwɛ maɓini kupʰɛla wawaɓɛkajɔ kujɔ umɔsɛs ɛhɔrɛb̤ɛ ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a waŋǃɔpʰisana nɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛkupʰumɛni kwaɓɔ ɛjiputa kwatʰi ɛkupʰumɛni kwaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓafumanɛkajɔ ɓaɓɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisilɛ akaɓa nakuɡ̤ǀ̤inwa amakǃɛla naɓalɛv̤i aɓaz̤iimv̤umi ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓɔna aɓa ɔɔasafu nɔhɛman nɔjɛd̤utun nɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ naɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ ɓamɓɛtʰɛ ilinɛn ɛkǀikiz̤ɛkilɛjɔ ɓɛnamakǀaŋ̤ǀ̤i nɛmixub̤ɛ nɛɛhad̤i ɓɛma nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni ɓɛnɛkʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɓini laɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛv̤utʰɛla nɡ̤amakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ kwatʰi kɛ aɓav̤utʰɛli ɓamakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ nɛɛmv̤umi ɓav̤akalisa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amntu mɲɛ nɡ̤az̤wiɲɛ ɓɛd̤umisa ɓɛɓulɛla kujɛhɔv̤a ɓatʰi kɛ ɓakupʰakamisa iliz̤wi nɡ̤amakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ nanɡ̤amakǀaŋ̤ǀ̤i nanɡ̤ɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɔkuv̤uma nanɡ̤ɔkumd̤umisa ujɛhɔv̤a ɓɛsitʰi ulunɡ̤ilɛ iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɛ inɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ jɛsuka inɮu jaz̤ala lɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓaɓa ɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛlifu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɓajiz̤alisa inɮu katʰikǁɔ waz̤a watʰi usɔlɔmɔn ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi uja kuɬala ɛsitʰɔkɔtʰɔkwɛni mna kɛ nd̤ikwakʰɛlɛ inɮu jɔkuɬala ind̤awɔ jɔkuɓa uɬalɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ wɛɛ ɡ̤ukǃukǃu nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ walisikɛlɛla lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa lakwasirajɛli lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa lakwasirajɛli lɛma watʰi makaɓɔnɡ̤wɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɔwatʰɛtʰajɔ nɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ uɓawɔ wakuz̤alisa nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɛ ɛsitʰi kususɛla ɛnd̤aɓakʰupʰajɔ aɓantu ɓam ɛz̤wɛni lamajiputa and̤iɲulanɡ̤a mz̤i ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwasirajɛli wɔkwakʰa inɮu jɔkuɓa iɡ̤ama liɓɛ kujɔ and̤iɲulanɡ̤a nd̤ɔd̤a jɔkuɓa jinɡ̤anɡ̤a jaɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli nd̤aɲula ijɛrusalɛm ukuɓa iɡ̤ama liɓɛ kʰɔna nd̤aɲula ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukuɓa aɓɛ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli kwajɛ kukʰɔ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni kad̤av̤id̤ɛ uɓawɔ ukulakʰɛla inɮu iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kud̤av̤id̤ɛ uɓawɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa kwakukʰɔ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɔ ukutʰi ulakʰɛlɛ inɮu iɡ̤ama walunɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɔkutʰi kuɓɛkʰɔ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɔ ɔkɔ nɔkɔ kɛ inɮu jɔna ajisaji kwakʰiwa nɡ̤uwɛ uɲana wakʰɔ ɔpʰuma ɛsiŋǃɛni sakʰɔ nɡ̤ujɛ ɔja kulakʰɛla inɮu iɡ̤ama ulimisilɛ kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a iliz̤wi lakʰɛ awalitʰɛtʰajɔ nd̤iv̤ɛlilɛ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sikad̤av̤id̤ɛ uɓawɔ nd̤aɬala ɛtrɔnɛni jakwasirajɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wakutʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤alakʰɛla inɮu iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli nd̤ajiɓɛka kʰɔna itʲɛja apʰɔ ukʰɔna umŋǃɔpʰisɔ kajɛhɔv̤a awawɛnz̤ajɔ nɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli wɛma kɛ usɔlɔmɔn pʰamɓi kwɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sikajɛhɔv̤a pʰamɓi kwɛɓanɮa lɔnkɛ lakwasirajɛli waz̤ɔlula iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa usɔlɔmɔn wajɛnz̤ɛ itʰɛkɔ lɔb̤ɛd̤u waliɓɛka ɛsaz̤ulwini sɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ laz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intlanu uɓud̤ɛ ɓalɔ iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intlanu uɓuɓanz̤i ɓalɔ iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intatʰu ukupʰakama kwalɔ wɛma pʰɛz̤u kwalɔ waɡ̤ukǃa nɡ̤amad̤ɔlɔ pʰamɓi kwɛɓanɮa lɔnkɛ lamasirajɛli waz̤ɔlulɛla ɛz̤ulwini iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ watʰi jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli akukʰɔ tʰikǁɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɛ ɛmaz̤ulwini nasɛɬaɓatʰini uɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inɛlajɔ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nɛŋǀɛɓa aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ aɓahamɓa pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ jɔnkɛ wɛna umɡ̤ǀ̤inɛlɛjɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ uɓawɔ ɔkɔ wakutʰɛtʰajɔ kujɛ wakutʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɔ wakuz̤alisa nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kund͡ʒ̤alɔ nam̤la kalɔku jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli mɡ̤ǀ̤inɛlɛ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ uɓawɔ ɔkɔ wakutʰɛtʰajɔ kujɛ usitʰi ɛɓuswɛni ɓam akuji kuŋǃuɲukɛlwa nd̤ɔd̤a jakuɬala ɛtrɔnɛni jakwasirajɛli ukuɓa kɔd̤wa ɓatʰɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ ɓajiɡ̤ǀ̤ina inɮɛla jaɓɔ ɓahamɓa nɡ̤ɔmjalɛlɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa uhamɓilɛ wɛna pʰamɓi kalɔku jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli makaɲanisɛkɛ amaz̤wi akʰɔ ɔwawatʰɛtʰajɔ kumkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɡ̤ǁ̤ɛɓɛ utʰikǁɔ anɡ̤ad̤ɛ aɬalɛ naɓantu ɛm̤laɓɛni jaɓɔna iz̤ulu iz̤ulu lawɔ amaz̤ulu alikulinɡ̤ɛnɛ kɛ jɔna lɛ nɮu nd̤ijakʰilɛjɔ nɔkɔ kɛ kunɔnɛlɛlɛ ukutʰand̤az̤a kɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ nɔkutaxuz̤isa kwakʰɛ jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ ukupʰulapʰulɛ ukumɛmɛlɛla nɔkutʰand̤az̤a atʰand̤az̤a nɡ̤akɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ ukuɓa amɛɬɔ akʰɔ akʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ kulɛ nɮu nɔɓusuku kwind̤awɔ ɔtʰɛ uja kuliɓɛka kujɔ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ upʰulapʰulɛ umtʰand̤az̤ɔ atʰand̤az̤a nɡ̤awɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ kulɛ nd̤awɔ pʰulapʰula ukutaxuz̤isa kɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ naɓantu ɓakʰɔ amasirajɛli aɓaja kutʰand̤az̤a nɡ̤akɔ kulɛ nd̤awɔ uv̤ɛ kɛ wɛna ɛnd̤awɛni ɔɬala kujɔ ɛmaz̤ulwini uv̤ɛ kɛ ukǁɔlɛlɛ kǁa atʰɛ wɔna ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ watʰwaliswa isifunɡ̤ɔ wafunɡ̤iswa wɛz̤a wafunɡ̤a pʰamɓi kwɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sakʰɔ kulɛ nɮu jiv̤a kɛ wɛna ɛmaz̤ulwini wɛnz̤ɛ uɡ̤wɛɓɛ kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ umɓujisɛlɛ ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ujiɓɛkɛ inɮɛla jakʰɛ ɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɛ umɡ̤wɛɓɛlɛ ɔlilunɡ̤isa umnikɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɛ ukuɓa ɓatʰɛ aɓantu ɓakʰɔ amasirajɛli ɓɔjiswa z̤iint͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ kuɓa ɓɛkɔnilɛ ɓaz̤a ɓaɓuja ɓaliv̤uma iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ ɓatʰand̤az̤a ɓataxuz̤isa pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ kulɛ nɮu jiv̤a kɛ wɛna ɛmaz̤ulwini usikǁɔlɛlɛ isɔnɔ saɓantu ɓakʰɔ amasirajɛli uɓaɓujisɛlɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni ɔwawunika ɓɔna nɔɔjisɛ kǁa litʰɛ iz̤ulu lav̤alwa akwaɓakʰɔ mv̤ula kuɓa ɓɛkɔnilɛ ɓaz̤a ɓatʰand̤az̤a ɓɛkulɛ nd̤awɔ ɓaliv̤uma iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ ɓaɓuja ɛsɔnwɛni saɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓakǀinɛz̤ɛlɛ jiv̤a kɛ wɛna ɛmaz̤ulwini usikǁɔlɛlɛ isɔnɔ saɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ aɓantu ɓakʰɔ amasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓafund̤isa inɮɛla ɛlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ aɓaja kuhamɓa nɡ̤ajɔ unisɛ imv̤ula ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɔ ɔlinikɛ aɓantu ɓakʰɔ ukuɓa liɓɛ kǁa kutʰɛ kwaɓakʰɔ inɮala ɛliz̤wɛni kǁa kutʰɛ kwaɓakʰɔ indʲikitʲa jɔkufa kǁa kutʰɛ kwaɓakʰɔ imɓaɓala nɛkǁɔʃɔmɓa nɛɛnkumɓi ɛz̤iŋǃuŋǃutʰajɔ kǁa z̤itʰɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓaŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a ɛliz̤wɛni ɛmiz̤ini jaɓɔ nɔkuɓa sisipʰi isiɓɛtʰɔ nɔkuɓa sisipʰi isifɔ ɛsitʰɛ saɓakʰɔ ukutʰand̤az̤a nɔkutaxuz̤isa nɔkuɓa kukupʰi ɔkutʰɛ kwɛnz̤iwa nɡ̤uɓani nɔkuɓa nɡ̤aɓantu ɓakʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ amasirajɛli aɓatʰɛ ɓasaz̤i ɛlɔwɔ isiɓɛtʰɔ sakʰɛ nɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤ala sakʰɛ ɓaz̤ɔlulɛla kulɛ nɮu iz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ jiv̤a kɛ wɛna ɛmaz̤ulwini ɛnd̤awɛni ɔɬala kujɔ ukǁɔlɛlɛ umnikɛ ɛlɔwɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛnɮɛla z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkujaz̤i kwakʰɔ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤uwɛ wɛd̤wa ɔz̤az̤ijɔ iintliz̤ijɔ z̤ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ukuz̤ɛ ɓakɔjikɛ ɓahamɓɛ nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛla z̤akʰɔ jɔnkɛ imiɬa aɓaɬɛli nɡ̤ajɔ ɛz̤wɛni ɔwalinika ɔɔɓawɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɔwɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a ɔnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔwaɓantu ɓakʰɔ amasirajɛli kǁa atʰɛ wav̤ɛla ɛz̤wɛni ɛlikud̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤ama lakʰɔ ɛlikʰulu nɛsanɮa sakʰɔ ɛsitʰɛ ŋ̰ǃ̰i nɛnɡ̤alɔ jakʰɔ ɛjɔlukilɛjɔ ɓɛz̤a ɓatʰand̤az̤a ɓɛkulɛ nɮu jiv̤a kɛ wɛna ɛmaz̤ulwini ɛnd̤awɛni ɔɬala kujɔ wɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ atʰɛ wakuŋǃula ɔwɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a ukuz̤ɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi z̤ilaz̤i iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ z̤ikɔjikɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓantu ɓakʰɔ amasirajɛli z̤az̤i ukuɓa lɛ nɮu nd̤ijakʰilɛjɔ iɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama lakʰɔ kǁa ɓatʰɛ aɓantu ɓakʰɔ ɓapʰuma ɓaja nɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɔɓatʰumɛ nɡ̤ajɔ ɓatʰand̤az̤a kuwɛ ɓɛb̤ɛkisa kulɔ mz̤i uwuɲulilɛjɔ nakulɛ nɮu nd̤ijakʰɛlɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ jiv̤a kɛ ɛmaz̤ulwini umtʰand̤az̤ɔ waɓɔ nɔkutaxuz̤isa kwaɓɔ uɓaɡ̤wɛɓɛlɛ kǁa ɓatʰɛ ɓakɔna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akukʰɔ unɡ̤ɔnijɔ waɓa nɔmsind̤ɔ waɓanikɛla ɛlut͡ʃaɓɛni ɓatʰi aɓatʰimɓi ɓaɓatʰimɓa ɓaɓasa ɛz̤wɛni nɔkuɓa likud̤ɛ nɔkuɓa likufupʰi ɓaz̤a ɓakuɲamɛkɛla ɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ ɓatʰind͡ʒ̤ɛlwɛ kulɔ ɓaɓuja ɓataxuz̤isa kuwɛ ɛz̤wɛni laɓaɓatʰimɓilɛjɔ ɓɛsitʰi sɔnilɛ saɡ̤wɛŋǁa sɛnz̤a ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɓaɓujɛla kuwɛ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ jɔnkɛ nanɡ̤ɔmpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ wɔnkɛ ɓɛkwɛlɔ z̤wɛ laɓatʰimɓi aɓaɓatʰimɓilɛjɔ ɓatʰand̤az̤a ɓab̤ɛkisa ɛliz̤wɛni laɓɔ ɔwalinika ɔɔjisɛ kulɔ mz̤i uwuɲulilɛjɔ kulɛ nɮu nd̤ijakʰɛlɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ jiv̤a kɛ ɛmaz̤ulwini ɛnd̤awɛni ɔɬala kujɔ umtʰand̤az̤ɔ waɓɔ nɔkutaxuz̤isa kwaɓɔ uɓaɡ̤wɛɓɛlɛ uɓakǁɔlɛlɛ aɓantu ɓakʰɔ aɓakɔnilɛjɔ kalɔku tʰikǁɔ makav̤ulɛkɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɔ iinɮɛɓɛ z̤akʰɔ z̤iɓaz̤ɛlɛ ukutʰand̤az̤a ɔkukulɛ nd̤awɔ kalɔku jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ pʰakamɛla ɛnd̤awɛni jɔkupʰumla kwakʰɔ wɛna nɛtʲɛja jamanɮa akʰɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ maɓamɓatʰɛ usind̤isɔ aɓakʰɔ ɓɛŋǀɛɓa ɓav̤ujɛ nɡ̤ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ ukumland̤ulɛla umtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa wakʰɔ kʰumɓula iiŋǀɛɓa ɔwaz̤itʰɛmɓisa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ kɛ kalɔku akuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa usɔlɔmɔn ukutʰand̤az̤a umlilɔ wɛlula ɛz̤ulwini waliɮa id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɓajiz̤alisa inɮu aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓaɓa nakunɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɓajiz̤alisa inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓakuɓɔna ukuɬa kɔmlilɔ nɔɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɓupʰɛz̤u kwɛnɮu ɓaɡ̤ukǃa ɓab̤ɛkisa uɓusɔ ɓaɓɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni pʰɛz̤u kɔmɓɛkɛlɛlɔ wamatʲɛ ɓakǃuɓud̤a ɓaɓulɛla kujɛhɔv̤a ɓɛsitʰi ulunɡ̤ilɛ iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɛ inɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ukumkani naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a waɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla usɔlɔmɔn umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɛɛnkɔmɔ ɛz̤imawaka amaʃumi maɓini anamaɓini nɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ ɛnɡ̤amawaka alikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɓini ɓajisunɡ̤ula inɮu katʰikǁɔ naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛma ɛz̤iɡ̤ǁ̤inɛni z̤aɓɔ naɓalɛv̤i ɓɛnɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɔkuv̤uma z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a awaz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ukuɓa kuɓulɛlwɛ kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɛ ɛkud̤umisɛni kukad̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓav̤utʰɛla amakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ ɛmi ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli usɔlɔmɔn wawuŋ̤ǀ̤walisa umpʰakatʰi wɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ ɛɓipʰamɓi kwɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛnz̤ɛ kʰɔna amad̤ini aɲukajɔ namaŋǃatʰa ɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔkǁɔlɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sɔb̤ɛd̤u awasɛnz̤ajɔ usɔlɔmɔn ɓɛsinɡ̤ɛnakɔ ukulilinɡ̤ana lɔnkɛ id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa namaŋǃatʰa usɔlɔmɔn wɛnz̤a kɛ umtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa iint͡suku z̤asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛnamasirajɛli ɔnkɛ iɓanɮa ɛlikʰulu kunɛnɛ ɛlitʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛhamati lɛsa ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni wasɛjiputa ɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ iŋ̤ǃ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤utʰɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukusunɡ̤ulwa kwɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɓakwɛnz̤a iint͡suku z̤asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɔmtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ iint͡suku z̤asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wamaʃumi maɓini anantatʰu wɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ waɓand̤ulula aɓantu ɓaja ɛz̤intɛntɛni z̤aɓɔ ɓɛv̤uja ɓɛkǀʰwajitʰilɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkulunɡ̤a awakwɛnz̤ajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kud̤av̤id̤ɛ nakusɔlɔmɔn nakumasirajɛli aɓantu ɓakʰɛ wajiɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa kɛ usɔlɔmɔn inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nɛnɮu jɔkumkani nɛntɔ jɔnkɛ ɛkwatʰi kǃatʰa ɛntliz̤ijwɛni kasɔlɔmɔn ukuɓa ajɛnz̤ɛ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nasɛnɮwini jakʰɛ wajipʰumɛlɛlisa waɓɔnakala ujɛhɔv̤a kusɔlɔmɔn ɛɓusuku watʰi kujɛ nd̤ikuv̤ilɛ ukutʰand̤az̤a kwakʰɔ nd̤iz̤iɲulɛlɛ lɛ nd̤awɔ ukuɓa iɓɛ jinɮu jɔkuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤aliv̤ala iz̤ulu akwaɓakʰɔ mv̤ula ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤az̤iwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ iinkumɓi ukuɓa z̤iliɮɛ iliz̤wɛ nɔkuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤atʰumɛla ɛɓantwini ɓam indʲikitʲa jɔkufa ɓatʰɔɓa kɛ aɓantu ɓam aɓaɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama ɓatʰand̤az̤a ɓafuna uɓusɔ ɓam ɓaɓuja ɛz̤inɮɛlɛni z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤imɓi nd̤ija kuv̤a ɛmaz̤ulwini nd̤iɓakǁɔlɛlɛ iz̤ɔnɔ z̤aɓɔ nd̤ilipʰilisɛ iliz̤wɛ laɓɔ kalɔku ɔv̤ulɛka amɛɬɔ iinɮɛɓɛ z̤am z̤iwuɓaz̤ɛlɛ umtʰand̤az̤ɔ walɛ nd̤awɔ kuɓa nɡ̤ɔku nd̤ijiɲulɛ nd̤ajiŋ̤ǀ̤walisa lɛ nɮu ukuɓa liɓɛ kujɔ iɡ̤ama kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni aɓɛ kʰɔna amɛɬɔ nɛntliz̤ijɔ jam imiɬa jɔnkɛ wɛna kɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ wahamɓa pʰamɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wahamɓa nɡ̤akɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ujiɬɔ ukuɓa ukwɛnz̤ɛ kɔnkɛ ɛnd̤ikumisɛlɛjɔ ujiɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ imimisɛlɔ jam namasikɔ nd̤ɔjimisa itrɔnɛ jɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤amɛnz̤ɛla umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nɡ̤akɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ujiɬɔ nd̤isitʰi akuji kuŋǃuɲukɛlwa nd̤ɔd̤a jakulawula kwasirajɛli kɛ ukuɓa nitʰɛ naɓuja umv̤a najilaɬa imimisɛlɔ jam nɛmitʰɛtʰɔ jam ɛnd̤ijiɓɛkɛ pʰamɓi kwɛnu naja nakʰɔnz̤a tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi naɓaŋǃula nd̤ɔɓaɲɔtʰula ɛm̤laɓɛni ɛnd̤iɓanikɛ wɔna nalɛ nɮu nd̤ijiŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛlɛ iɡ̤ama nd̤ɔjilaɬa ɛɓuswɛni ɓam nd̤ijɛnz̤ɛ umz̤ɛkɛlisɔ nɛntɔ jɛnt͡sini pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɔnkɛ nalɛ nɮu nɔkɔ ipʰɛz̤ulu nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɓɔmanɡ̤aliswa ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɮulajɔ kujɔ ɓatʰi jini ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ kwɛli liz̤wɛ nakulɛ nɮu ɓatʰi kɛ kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɓamʃijajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ ɔwaɓakʰupʰa ɛz̤wɛni lamajiputa ɓaɓamɓɛlɛla tʰikǁwɛni ɓamɓi ɓaɓaŋǃula ɓakʰɔnz̤a ɓɔna kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ waɓuz̤isajɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɓu ɓuɓi pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ kwatʰi ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɲaka ɛmaʃumi maɓini aɓɛsakʰɛ nɡ̤ajɔ usɔlɔmɔn inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nɛjakʰɛ inɮu imiz̤i uhiram aɓɛjinikɛ usɔlɔmɔn wajakʰa usɔlɔmɔn waɓaɓɛka kʰɔna ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli waja usɔlɔmɔn ɛhamatit͡sɔb̤a wajɛjisa wakʰa itad̤ɛmɔrɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nɛmiz̤i jɔnkɛ ɛnɡ̤ɔɔv̤imɓa awajakʰajɔ ɛhamati wakʰa nɛb̤ɛtɛhɔrɔn ɛnɡ̤asɛntla nɛb̤ɛtɛhɔrɔn ɛnɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si imiz̤i ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ lɛjɔ inɛɛnd̤ɔnɡ̤a nɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ nɛmiv̤alɔ nɛb̤ahalati nɛmiz̤i jɔnkɛ ɛnɡ̤ɔɔv̤imɓa aɓɛnajɔ usɔlɔmɔn nɛmiz̤i jɔnkɛ jɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa nɛmiz̤i jaɓamahaʃɛ nɔkulanɡ̤az̤ɛlɛla kɔnkɛ kukasɔlɔmɔn awakulanɡ̤az̤ɛlɛlajɔ ukwakʰa ɛjɛrusalɛm nasɛlɛb̤anɔn nasɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lɔlawulɔ lwakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓasɛlɛjɔ kumahɛti namaamɔri namapɛriz̤i namahiv̤i namajɛb̤usi aɓaɓɛ ɓɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓakwasirajɛli kɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ aɓasala ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ ɛz̤wɛni aɓɔ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli usɔlɔmɔn waɓaɲula ukuɓa ɓafakwɛ uv̤ikɔ unanam̤la kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli usɔlɔmɔn akɛnz̤anɡ̤a makʰɔɓɔka ɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a ɔkulwa naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ naɓaɓusi ɓakʰɛ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔkulwa naɓamahaʃɛ ɓakʰɛ aɓɔ ɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓɔnɡ̤amɛli awajɛnaɓɔ usɔlɔmɔn ɓɛɓɛnɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi maɬanu aɓaɓɛnɔɓukʰɔsi ɛɓantwini kɛ kalɔku usɔlɔmɔn wajiɲusa intɔmɓi kafarɔ ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ wajisa ɛnɮwini aɓɛjakʰɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓɛsitʰi akaji kuɬala umfaz̤i ɛnɮwini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ wamasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kuŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ apʰɔ kunɡ̤ɛnɛ kʰɔna itʲɛja kajɛhɔv̤a waz̤a usɔlɔmɔn waɲusa amad̤ini aɲukajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni sikajɛhɔv̤a aɓɛsakʰɛlɛ pʰamɓi kwɛv̤arand̤a ukuɓa kuɲuswɛ intɔ jɛmini nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛmini jajɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔmtʰɛtʰɔ kamɔsɛs nɡ̤ɛɛsaɓatʰa nasɛkutʰwasɛni kwɛɲanɡ̤a nanɡ̤amakǁɛʃa amisiwɛjɔ iz̤iɬanɮɔ ɛz̤itʰatʰu nɡ̤ɔmɲaka ɛmtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkwɛni wɛz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ nasɛmtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkwɛni wɛɛv̤ɛki nasɛmtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkwɛni wɛmiŋǃuɓa wawamisa nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ likad̤av̤id̤ɛ ujisɛ amakǃɛla aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛnkɔnz̤wɛni jawɔ naɓalɛv̤i waɓamisɛla ɛz̤iɡ̤ǁ̤inɛni z̤aɓɔ ukuɓa ɓad̤umisɛ ɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ pʰamɓi kwaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɡ̤ɔkwɛntɔ jɛmini nɡ̤ɛmini jajɔ naɓamasanɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkwamakǃɛla aɓɔ kwisanɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓund͡ʒ̤alɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ aɓatʲɛka ɛmtʰɛtʰwɛni wɔkumkani kuɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nakuɓalɛv̤i nɡ̤ɛmikǀimɓi jɔnkɛ nanɡ̤ɔɓuŋǀwanɛ walunɡ̤iswa kɛ wɔnkɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i kasɔlɔmɔn kwad̤a kwajilɔɔ jasɛkwa nɡ̤ajɔ inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nasɛkuɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwɛni kwajɔ jafɛz̤wa inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a waz̤a usɔlɔmɔn waja ɛɛt͡sijɔnɡ̤ɛb̤ɛrɛ nasɛɛlɔti ɛluŋǁwɛmɛni lɔlwanɮɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakwaɛd̤ɔm uhiram watʰumɛla kujɛ nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ iiŋǃanawa naɓakʰɔnz̤i aɓaɓɛlwaz̤i ulwanɮɛ ɓaja kuɲɛ naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakasɔlɔmɔn ɛɔfirɛ ɓatʰaɓatʰa kʰɔna amakʰulu amanɛ anamaŋǀi maɬanu ɛɛtalɛntɛ z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɓajiz̤isa usɔlɔmɔn kɛ kalɔku ukumkanikaz̤i wasɛʃɛb̤a waluv̤a ud̤aɓa lukasɔlɔmɔn wɛz̤a kumlinɡ̤a usɔlɔmɔn nɡ̤ɛmiɓuz̤ɔ ɛlukʰuni ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛnɛsiɬwɛlɛ ɛsinz̤ima kunɛnɛ nɛɛnkamɛla ɛz̤itʰwɛlɛ uɓulawu nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛninz̤i namatʲɛ aŋǃaɓilɛjɔ wɛz̤a kusɔlɔmɔn watʰɛtʰa najɛ kɔnkɛ ɔkuɓɛ kusɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɛ usɔlɔmɔn wamtʰʲilɛla ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi akʰɛ akuɓanɡ̤akʰɔ liz̤wi lifiɬakɛlɛjɔ kusɔlɔmɔn anɡ̤aɓanɡ̤a nakɔ ukumtʰʲilɛla lɔna waɓuɓɔna ukumkanikaz̤i wasɛʃɛb̤a uɓulumkɔ ɓukasɔlɔmɔn nɛnɮu aɓɛjakʰilɛ nɔkuɮa kwɛtafilɛ jakʰɛ nɛɛnd̤awɔ z̤ɔkuɬala kwaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ nɔkuma kwaɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛli ɓakʰɛ nɛz̤amɓatʰɔ z̤aɓɔ naɓaŋ̤ǀ̤amli ɓakʰɛ nɛz̤amɓatʰɔ z̤aɓɔ nɛz̤iɲukɔ z̤akʰɛ aɓɛ ɛɲuka nɡ̤az̤ɔ ukuja ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a akwaɓa saɓakʰɔ kukǃina kwamkǁʰɛlɔ kujɛ watʰi liɓɛ lijinɛnɛ iliz̤wi ɛnd̤aliv̤a ɛz̤wɛni lɛz̤intɔ z̤akʰɔ nɔɓulumkɔ ɓakʰɔ and̤ikʰɔlwanɡ̤a nɡ̤amaz̤wi aɓɔ nd̤ad̤a nd̤ɛz̤a aɓɔna amɛɬɔ jaɓɔna nd̤iɓɛ nd̤inɡ̤akǁɛlɛlwanɡ̤a nɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa ɛsi sɔɓuninz̤i ɓɔɓulumkɔ ɓakʰɔ uluɡ̤ǃ̤itʰilɛ ud̤aɓa ɛnd̤iɓɛ nd̤iluv̤ilɛ anɔjɔlɔ amad̤ɔd̤a akʰɔ ɓanɔjɔlɔ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ aɓɛmijɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ ɓɛɓuv̤a uɓulumkɔ ɓakʰɔ makaɓɔnɡ̤wɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ ɔkunɔnɛlɛjɔ wakuɓɛka ɛtrɔnɛni jakʰɛ ukuɓa uɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuwatʰand̤a kukatʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ amasirajɛli ukuɓa awamisɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kuwɔ ukuɓa wɛnz̤ɛ ɔkusɛsikwɛni nɔɓulunɡ̤isa ukumkanikaz̤i ikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi amaɓini ɛɛtalɛntɛ z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nasɛɓulawini intɔ ɛninz̤i kunɛnɛ namatʲɛ aŋǃaɓilɛjɔ akuz̤anɡ̤a kuɓɛ saɓakʰɔ ɓulawu ɓunɡ̤anɡ̤ɔɓɔ ukumkanikaz̤i wasɛʃɛb̤a waɓunika usɔlɔmɔn kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakahiram naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakasɔlɔmɔn aɓɛz̤a nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɓɛv̤ɛla kwaɔfirɛ ɓɛz̤a nɛmialɡ̤umi namatʲɛ aŋǃaɓilɛjɔ imialɡ̤umi lɛjɔ wajɛnz̤a iz̤iɲukɔ z̤ɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nɛz̤ɛnɮu jɔkumkani nɛɛhad̤i nɛmixub̤ɛ jɛɛmv̤umi akuz̤anɡ̤a kuɓɔnwɛ ind͡ʒ̤alɔ nɡ̤apʰamɓili ɛz̤wɛni lakwajud̤a kɛ usɔlɔmɔn ukumkanikaz̤i wasɛʃɛb̤a kɔnkɛ ukutʰand̤a kwakʰɛ awakukǀɛlajɔ kukɔd̤wa kʰɔna awakuz̤isajɔ wad͡ʒ̤ika kɛ waja ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɛ jɛna naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ kɛ kalɔku ukulinɡ̤aniswa kwɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛjɛz̤a kusɔlɔmɔn nɡ̤amɲaka mɲɛ kwaɓa nɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu anamaŋǀi amatʰand̤atʰu anɛsitʰand̤atʰu iitalɛntɛ z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ijɔd̤wa ɛjaɓaxwɛɓi nɛɓiz̤iswa nɡ̤aɓatʰɛnɡ̤isi nɛjɔɔkumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɓasɛarab̤i nɛjamaɓamɓa ɛliz̤wɛ aɓɛz̤isa iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ kusɔlɔmɔn ukumkani usɔlɔmɔn wɛnz̤a amakʰulu amaɓini amakʰaka ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛnɡ̤umkʰand̤ɔ z̤anɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu iiʃɛkɛlɛ z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛnɡ̤umkʰand̤ɔ awalɛka nɡ̤az̤ɔ kʰaka liɲɛ wɛnz̤a amakʰulu amatʰatʰu ɛɛnɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛnɡ̤umkʰand̤ɔ z̤anɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰatʰu iiʃɛkɛlɛ z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ awalɛka nɡ̤az̤ɔ nɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛɲɛ ukumkani waz̤iɓɛka ɛnɮwini jɛɬatʰi lasɛlɛb̤anɔn ukumkani wɛnz̤a nɛtrɔnɛ ɛnkulu nɡ̤ɛɛmpɔnd̤ɔ z̤ɛɛnɮɔv̤u wajalɛka nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛnɡ̤iwɛjɔ itrɔnɛ lɛjɔ iɓinɛz̤iɲukɔ ɛz̤itʰand̤atʰu itrɔnɛ lɛjɔ iɓinɛsiɬalɔ sɛɛɲawɔ sɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛz̤ɔ ntɔ z̤iɓamɓɛnɛ najɔ kukʰɔ iinɡ̤alɔ nɡ̤apʰa nanɡ̤apʰa kwɛnd̤awɔ jɔkuɬala iinɡ̤ɔɲama ɛz̤imɓini ɛkǀalɛni lɛɛnɡ̤alɔ ɛz̤ɔ iinɡ̤ɔɲama ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛlinamɓini kʰɔna ɛz̤iɲukwɛni ɛz̤itʰand̤atʰu nɡ̤apʰa nanɡ̤apʰa akuz̤anɡ̤a kwɛnz̤iwɛ ntɔ ind͡ʒ̤alɔ ɛz̤ikumkanini z̤ɔnkɛ jɔnkɛ impaɬa jɔkusɛla jɔkumkani usɔlɔmɔn jaɓɛ ijɛjɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛmpaɬa jɔnkɛ jɛnɮu jɛɬatʰi lasɛlɛb̤anɔn jaɓɛ ijɛjɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛtʰɛ ʃiɲi isiliv̤ɛrɛ iɓinɡ̤ɛntɔ jakwantɔ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kasɔlɔmɔn nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓɛnɛɛŋǃanawa ɛz̤ija ɛtarʃiʃɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakahiram z̤ɛz̤a kaɲɛ nɡ̤ɛmiɲaka ɛmitʰatʰu iiŋǃanawa ɛz̤ɔ z̤asɛtarʃiʃɛ z̤itʰwɛlɛ iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɛmpɔnd̤ɔ z̤ɛɛnɮɔv̤u nɛɛnt͡simanɡ̤ɔ nɛɛpikɔkɔ wakʰula kɛ usɔlɔmɔn nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔɔkumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɓɔm̤laɓa nɡ̤ɔɓutʲɛɓi nanɡ̤ɔɓulumkɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔkumkani ɓɔm̤laɓa ɓafuna uɓusɔ ɓukasɔlɔmɔn ukuɓa ɓɛv̤ɛ uɓulumkɔ ɓakʰɛ awajɛɓuɓɛkɛ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɛ utʰikǁɔ ɓaz̤isa ɛlɔwɔ umnikɛlɔ wakʰɛ iimpaɬa z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛz̤amɓatʰɔ nɛz̤ik͡xwɛkǃɛ nɔɓulawu namahaʃɛ nɔɔnɮɛɓɛnd̤ɛ intɔ jɛmiɲaka nɡ̤ɛmiɲaka usɔlɔmɔn wajɛnamawaka amanɛ ɛmikʰɔmɓɛ jɛz̤itali z̤amahaʃɛ nɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ nɛʃumi ɛlinamaɓini amahaʃɛ akʰwɛlwajɔ wawaɓɛka ɛmiz̤ini jɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm uɓɛlawula ɔɔkumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kuwɔ umlamɓɔ az̤isɛ ɛz̤wɛni lamafilisti ɛz̤isa nasɛmd̤ɛni wasɛjiputa ukumkani wajɛnz̤a isiliv̤ɛrɛ jand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amatʲɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm nɛmisɛd̤arɛ wajɛnz̤a jand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmitʰɔmɓɛ ɛsɛz̤iɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni ukuɓa mininz̤i ɓaz̤isa kusɔlɔmɔn amahaʃɛ ɛv̤ɛla ɛjiputa ɛv̤ɛla ɛmaz̤wɛni ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikasɔlɔmɔn ɛz̤ɔkukǃala nɛz̤ɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛmikǀimɓini kanatan umprɔfɛti nasɛz̤iprɔfɛtwɛni z̤ikaahija wasɛʃilɔ nasɛmiɓɔnwɛni kaid̤ɔ imɓɔni nɡ̤ɔjarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kanɛb̤ati usɔlɔmɔn wajɛnɡ̤ukumkani kumasirajɛli ɔnkɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi manɛ usɔlɔmɔn kɔɔjisɛ waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ujisɛ urɛhab̤ɛham uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ urɛhab̤ɛham waja kwaʃɛkɛm nɡ̤ɔkuɓa amasirajɛli ɔnkɛ aɓɛjɛ kumɛnz̤a kwaʃɛkɛm kwatʰi akuv̤a ujarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kanɛb̤ati ɛsɛjiputa apʰɔ wajɛɓalɛkɛlɛ kʰɔna ɛɓuswɛni ɓukasɔlɔmɔn ɛɬɛli ujarɔb̤ɛham ɛjiputa ɓatʰumɛla ɓamɓiz̤a wɛz̤a ujarɔb̤ɛham namasirajɛli ɔnkɛ ɓatʰɛtʰa nɔrɛhab̤ɛham ɓɛsitʰi ujiɬɔ wajɛnz̤a nz̤ima idʲɔkʰwɛ jɛtʰu kɛ wɛna jɛnz̤ɛ inkɔnz̤ɔ ɛlukʰuni kajiɬɔ nɛdʲɔkʰwɛ jakʰɛ ɛnz̤ima awajiɓɛka pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu sikukʰɔnz̤ɛ watʰi kuɓɔ kʰanind̤ikʰwɛlɛlɛ iint͡suku z̤iɓɛ ntatʰu niɓujɛ niz̤ɛ ɓɛmka kɛ aɓantu ukumkani urɛhab̤ɛham wakǀɛɓisana namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu aɓɛsakuma pʰamɓi kɔsɔlɔmɔn ujisɛ ɔkɔ ɛɓɛsaɬɛli watʰi ninika kǀɛɓɔ ukuɓa nd̤iɓanikɛ iliz̤wi aɓa ɓantu atʰɛtʰa kɛ kujɛ ɛsitʰi ukuɓa utʰɛ wanɔɓuɓɛlɛ kwaɓa ɓantu waɓakʰɔlisa watʰɛtʰa amaz̤wi amaɬɛ kuɓɔ ɓɔkukʰɔnz̤a jɔnkɛ imiɬa waliʃija ikǀɛɓɔ lamad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu aɓɛmnikɛ lɔna wakǀɛɓisana namad̤ɔd̤ana az̤iintanɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ aɓɛmi pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ watʰi kuwɔ ninika kǀɛɓɔ ukuɓa siɓanikɛ iliz̤wi aɓa ɓantu ɓatʰɛtʰilɛjɔ ɓɛsitʰi jɛnz̤ɛ idʲɔkʰwɛ awajiɓɛka pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu ujiɬɔ atʰɛtʰa kɛ najɛ amad̤ɔd̤ana az̤iintanɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ ɛsitʰi jitʰi kuɓantu aɓatʰɛtʰɛ kuwɛ ɓɛsitʰi ujiɬɔ wajɛnz̤a nz̤ima idʲɔkʰwɛ jɛtʰu jɛnz̤ɛ kutʰi wɛna jitʰi kuɓɔ ukǀikikǀanɛ uja kuɓa nɛsiɓili kunɛsiŋǃɛ sikaɓawɔ kɛ ɛkuɓɛni uɓawɔ uɓɛnitʰwalisɛ idʲɔkʰwɛ ɛnz̤ima kɛ nd̤ija kɔnɡ̤ɛz̤a ɛdʲɔkʰwɛni jɛnu uɓawɔ uɓɛniɓɛtʰa nɡ̤ɛɛnt͡sɔntɛlɔ kɛ nd̤ija kuniɓɛtʰa nɡ̤ɛɛkat͡si ɓaja kɛ ɔɔjarɔb̤ɛham naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ kurɛhab̤ɛham nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰatʰu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wajɛtʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɛsitʰi nɔɓuja niz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰatʰu ukumkani waɓapʰɛnd̤ula kalukʰuni urɛhab̤ɛham waliʃija ikǀɛɓɔ lamad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu watʰɛtʰa kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛkǀɛɓɔ lamad̤ɔd̤ana ɛsitʰi uɓawɔ wajɛnz̤a nz̤ima idʲɔkʰwɛ jɛnu kɛ nd̤ija kɔnɡ̤ɛz̤a kujɔ uɓawɔ waniɓɛtʰa nɡ̤ɛɛnt͡sɔntɛlɔ kɛ nd̤ija kuniɓɛtʰa nɡ̤ɛɛkat͡si akaɓapʰulapʰulanɡ̤a kɛ aɓantu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛsi sipʰɛnd̤u siɓɛ sipʰuma kutʰikǁɔ ukuz̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a alimisɛ iliz̤wi lakʰɛ aɓɛlitʰɛtʰilɛ nɡ̤ɔahija wasɛʃilɔ kujarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kanɛb̤ati akuɓɔna kɛ ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli ukuɓa akawapʰulapʰuli aɓantu ɓamɓujisɛla iliz̤wi ɛlitʰi sinasaɓɛlɔ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ asinalifa kuɲana kajɛsɛ ɛlɔwɔ makajɛ ɛntɛntɛni jakʰɛ masirajɛli z̤ikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔku inɮu jakʰɔ d̤av̤id̤ɛ aja ɛz̤intɛntɛni z̤awɔ kɛ amasirajɛli ɔnkɛ kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓaɓɛɬɛli ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a urɛhab̤ɛham waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kuɓɔ ukumkani urɛhab̤ɛham watʰuma uad̤ɔram ɔɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ aɓafakwa uv̤ikɔ ɓɛsuka ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓamkǁuluɓa nɡ̤amatʲɛ ukumkani urɛhab̤ɛham wakʰawulɛz̤a waja kukʰwɛla ɛŋǃwɛlwɛni jakʰɛ ukuɓa asaɓɛlɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm ak͡xɛkǃa kɛ amasirajɛli ɛnɮwini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ unanam̤la wɛz̤a urɛhab̤ɛham ɛjɛrusalɛm waɓiz̤ɛla nd̤awɔɲɛ inɮu jakwajud̤a nɛjakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ amad̤ɔd̤ana ɔkulwa imfaz̤wɛ ukuɓa ajɛ namasirajɛli ɓuɓujisɛlwɛ uɓukumkani kurɛhab̤ɛham lafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kuʃɛmaja umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ lisitʰi jit͡ʃɔ kurɛhab̤ɛham uɲana kasɔlɔmɔn wakwajud̤a nakumasirajɛli ɔnkɛ kwajud̤a nakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ukutʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi iz̤ɛ ninɡ̤aɲuki iz̤ɛ ninɡ̤alwi naɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu ɓujani ajɛ ɛlɔwɔ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ipʰumɛ lɛ ntɔ ɓalipʰulapʰula iz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɓaɓuja ɛkujɛni nɔjarɔb̤ɛham waɬala urɛhab̤ɛham ɛjɛrusalɛm wakʰa imiz̤i jɔkuŋǃaɓisa kwajud̤a wakʰa ib̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm nɛɛtam nɛtɛkɔwa nɛb̤ɛtɛt͡surɛ nɛsɔkɔ nɛad̤ulam nɛɡ̤ati nɛmarɛʃa nɛz̤ifi nɛad̤ɔrajim nɛlakiʃɛ nɛasɛka nɛt͡sɔra nɛajalɔn nɔwasɛhɛɓrɔn ɛkwajud̤a nɛkwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin imiz̤i ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ waz̤ikǃinisa iiŋǃaɓa waɓɛka iinɡ̤anɡ̤a z̤amad̤ɔd̤a kuz̤ɔ nɔɔv̤imɓa ɓɔkuɮa nɛɔli nɛwajini nakwimiz̤i nɡ̤ɛmiz̤i jɔnkɛ waɓɛka amakʰaka nɛz̤ikʰali wajikǃinisa kakʰulu kunɛnɛ aɓa kujɛ amajud̤a namab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i aɓaɓɛkwɛlakwasirajɛli lɔnkɛ ɓatʰɛlɛla kujɛ ɓɛv̤ɛla ɛmid̤ɛni jaɓɔ jɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓalɛv̤i ɓawaʃija amaɮɛlɔ aɓɔ nɛmfujɔ jaɓɔ ɓɛz̤a kwajud̤a nasɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujarɔb̤ɛham nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓaɓɛɓakʰupʰilɛ ukuɓa ɓanɡ̤aɓi nɡ̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kujɛhɔv̤a waz̤imisɛla aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a naɓamakǁʰɔnti naɓamatʰɔlɛ awawɛnz̤ajɔ ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ kɛ ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwasirajɛli ɓatʰi aɓaz̤inikɛlajɔ iintliz̤ijɔ z̤aɓɔ ukumkǃukǃɛla ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɓɛz̤a kuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla ɛjɛrusalɛm kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ ɓaɓuz̤inz̤isa uɓukumkani ɓukajud̤a ɓamɔmɛlɛz̤a urɛhab̤ɛham uɲana kasɔlɔmɔn imiɲaka ɛmitʰatʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla kad̤av̤id̤ɛ nɔsɔlɔmɔn imiɲaka ɛmitʰatʰu kɛ kalɔku urɛhab̤ɛham waz̤ɛka umahalati intɔmɓi kajɛrimɔti uɲana kad̤av̤id̤ɛ nɔab̤ihajilɛ intɔmɓi kaɛlijab̤i uɲana kajɛsɛ wamz̤alɛla ɔɔɲana ɔɔjɛhuʃɛ nɔʃɛmarija nɔz̤aham ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ waz̤ɛka umahaka intɔmɓi kaab̤isalɔm wamz̤alɛla uab̤ija nɔataji nɔz̤iz̤a nɔʃɛlɔmiti urɛhab̤ɛham watʰand̤a umahaka intɔmɓi kaab̤isalɔm nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ namaʃwɛʃwɛ akʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓɛnaɓafaz̤i aɓaliʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ namaʃwɛʃwɛ anɡ̤amaʃumi amatʰand̤atʰu waz̤ala ɔɔɲana aɓamaʃumi maɓini anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi ɛz̤imaʃumi matʰand̤atʰu urɛhab̤ɛham uab̤ija uɲana kamahaka ukuɓa aɓɛ jinkulu aɓɛ jinɡ̤anɡ̤a pʰakatʰi kwaɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓɛkǀinɡ̤a ukumɛnz̤a wɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ waɓatʰi ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɛmaz̤wɛni ɔnkɛ akwajud̤a nakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɛmiz̤ini jɔnkɛ ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ waɓanika ukuɮa ɔkuninz̤i waɓafunɛla intɔ ɛninz̤i jaɓafaz̤i kwatʰi ɓakuɓɔn ukuɓa ɓuz̤inz̤ilɛ uɓukumkani ɓukarɛhab̤ɛham akɔmɛlɛla wawuʃija umjalɛlɔ kajɛhɔv̤a namasirajɛli ɔnkɛ kuɲɛ najɛ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsiɬanu wɔkumkani urɛhab̤ɛham kwɛɲuka uʃiʃaki wasɛjiputa wajinɡ̤ɛnɛla ijɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛɓɛmɛnɛz̤ilɛ kujɛhɔv̤a ɛnɛwaka ɛlinamakʰulu amaɓini ɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa anɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmatʰand̤atʰu aɓamahaʃɛ naɓantu aɓanɡ̤ɛnakuɓalwa aɓapʰuma najɛ ɛjiputa amalub̤i namasuki namakuʃi wajitʰimɓa imiz̤i ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ ɛkwajud̤a nasɛjɛrusalɛm wɛz̤a uʃɛmaja umprɔfɛti kurɛhab̤ɛham nakuɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakwajud̤a aɓaɓɛɬanɡ̤anisɛnɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kaʃiʃaki watʰi kuɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nina nand̤iʃija nd̤iniʃijilɛ nd̤aninikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sikaʃiʃaki ɓaz̤itʰɔɓa aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamasirajɛli nɔkumkani ɓatʰi ulilunɡ̤isa ujɛhɔv̤a akuɓɔna ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa ɓaz̤itʰɔɓilɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kuʃɛmaja lisitʰi ɓaz̤itʰɔɓilɛ and̤iji kuɓɔnakalisa nd̤ija kuɓanika ukusind̤a ikǁɛʃana ɓunɡ̤atʰululɛlwa uɓuʃuʃu ɓam ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikaʃiʃaki nɔkɔ ɓɔɓa nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i kujɛ ukuz̤ɛ ɓajaz̤i inkɔnz̤ɔ jam nɛnkɔnz̤ɔ jɛz̤ikumkani z̤amaz̤wɛ wɛɲuka kɛ wasɛjiputa nɛjɛrusalɛm waɓutʰaɓatʰa uɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nɔɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓɛnɮu jɔkumkani waɓutʰaɓatʰa ɓɔnkɛ waz̤itʰaɓatʰa iinɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ awaz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ usɔlɔmɔn ukumkani urɛhab̤ɛham wɛnz̤a iinɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ z̤ɔb̤ɛd̤u ɛsikʰunɮɛni saz̤ɔ waz̤ipʰatʰisa aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛz̤iɡ̤id̤imi ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤iɡ̤ǀ̤ina umɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛnɮu jɔkumkani uɓɛsakutʰi akunɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a z̤iz̤ɛ iz̤iɡ̤id̤imi ɛz̤ɔ z̤iz̤ipʰɛtʰɛ z̤iz̤ɛ z̤iz̤iɓujisɛlɛ ɛɡ̤umɓini lɛz̤iɡ̤id̤imi watʰi akuz̤itʰɔɓa umsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a waɓuja kujɛ ukuɓa anɡ̤amt͡ʃaɓalalisi kutʰi kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ kwajud̤a kwakukʰɔ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ waz̤ikǃinisa urɛhab̤ɛham ɛjɛrusalɛm waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani nɡ̤ɔkuɓa urɛhab̤ɛham ɛɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi manɛ anamɲɛ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛliʃumi ɛlinɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm umz̤i lɔwɔ wawuɲulajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kwiz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwasirajɛli ukuɓa alimisɛ kʰɔna iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ iɡ̤ama lɔnina ɓɛlinɡ̤unahama umamɔnikaz̤i wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛnɡ̤ajib̤ɛkisɛlɛlanɡ̤a intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ ukumkǃukǃɛla ujɛhɔv̤a iz̤intɔ z̤ikarɛhab̤ɛham ɛz̤ɔkukǃala nɛz̤ɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛmikǀimɓini kaʃɛmaja umprɔfɛti nɔid̤ɔ imɓɔni nɡ̤ɔkɔkub̤alwa kwɛmiliɓɔ jɔkuz̤alwa jajiz̤iimfaz̤wɛ pʰakatʰi kɔrɛhab̤ɛham nɔjarɔb̤ɛham imiɬa jɔnkɛ urɛhab̤ɛham kɔɔjisɛ waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ uab̤ija uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ wɔkumkani ujarɔb̤ɛham uab̤ija waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwajud̤a waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛmitʰatʰu ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina ɓɛlinɡ̤umikaja intɔmɓi kaurijɛli wasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha kwaɓakʰɔ imfaz̤wɛ pʰakatʰi kɔab̤ija nɔjarɔb̤ɛham uab̤ija wajikǃala imfaz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛmpi jamaɡ̤ɔxa ɔkulwa ɛnɡ̤amakʰulu amanɛ aɬɛliwɛjɔ ujarɔb̤ɛham najɛ waz̤akʰa iz̤intlu z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔkulwa najɛ z̤inɡ̤amakʰulu asib̤ɔz̤ɔ aɬɛliwɛjɔ anɡ̤amaɡ̤ɔxa anɔɓuk͡xɔti wɛsuka wɛma uab̤ija ɛntaɓɛni jɛt͡sɛmarim ɛkwɛlɛɛntaɓa lakwaɛfrajim watʰi nd̤ipʰulapʰulɛni wɛna jarɔb̤ɛham masirajɛli nɔnkɛ aninakwaz̤i ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli uɓukumkani kumasirajɛli waɓunika ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ jɛna nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɛtʲuwa wɛsuka ujarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kanɛb̤ati umkʰɔnz̤i kasɔlɔmɔn uɲana kad̤av̤id̤ɛ waɡ̤wilika kwinkɔsi jakʰɛ waɓutʰɛla kujɛ amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤ɛnaɓuntu anɡ̤amat͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔ az̤ikǃinisa amkǀʰasa urɛhab̤ɛham uɲana kasɔlɔmɔn urɛhab̤ɛham ɛnɡ̤umfana ɔntliz̤ijɔ itʰamɓilɛjɔ ɛnɡ̤ɔmɛlɛlɛ pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔku kɛ nitʰi nija kɔmɛlɛla pʰamɓi kɔɓukumkani ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɔɓusɛsanɮɛni sɔɔɲana ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ nijiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ ɛninz̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ninamatʰɔlɛ ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ awanɛnz̤ɛlajɔ ujarɔb̤ɛham ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤ɔɔtʰikǁɔ aniɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰanɡ̤a jini aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓakajɛhɔv̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakaarɔn naɓalɛv̤i naz̤ɛnz̤ɛla aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤amaɲɛ amaz̤wɛ ɓad̤a ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ ɓaz̤a kuz̤imisɛla nɡ̤ɛnkunz̤i ɛlitʰɔlɛ lɛnkɔmɔ nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓɛnz̤iwa aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kwaɓanɡ̤ɛtʰikǁɔ kɛ tʰina nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu asimʃijanɡ̤a aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛla kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakaarɔn naɓalɛv̤i ɓasɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini waɓɔ ɓɛkǃʰumisɛla kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤amad̤ini aɲukajɔ imisɔ nɡ̤ɛmisɔ ukuɬwa nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa nanɡ̤ɛsikǃʰumisɔ ɛsimnand̤i nɔkukǀwaŋ̤ǀ̤isa iz̤ɔnka ɛtafilɛni ɛɬamɓululɛkilɛjɔ nɛsipʰatʰɔ sɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛz̤iɓanɛ saz̤ɔ z̤iluɲɛkwa ukuɬwa nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa tʰina sijasiɡ̤ǀ̤ina isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina sikajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu kɛ nimʃijilɛ nijaɓɔna unatʰi ɛjintlɔkɔ utʰikǁɔ naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓakʰɛ ɓanatʰi namakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ ɔkud̤uma ukuɓa aniv̤usɛ ɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɔjɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjiɬɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aniji kuɓa nampumɛlɛlɔ kɛ ujarɔb̤ɛham waz̤unɡ̤ulɛz̤isa aɓalalɛli ukuɓa ɓajɛ nɡ̤asɛmv̤a kwawɔ ɓaɓa nɡ̤apʰamɓi kwamajud̤a ɓɔna aɓalalɛli ɓaɓa nɡ̤asɛmv̤a kwawɔ ab̤ɛka amajud̤a ajiɓɔna inɡ̤apʰamɓili nanɡ̤asɛmv̤a kwawɔ akʰala kujɛhɔv̤a aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛv̤utʰɛla amakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ ad̤uma ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a kwatʰi ɛkud̤umɛni kwamad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a wɛsuka utʰikǁɔ waɓɛtʰa kujarɔb̤ɛham namasirajɛli ɔnkɛ pʰamɓi kɔab̤ija namajud̤a ɓasaɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛɓuswɛni ɓamajud̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sawɔ uab̤ija naɓantu ɓakʰɛ ɓaɓaɓulala kakʰulu aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ kwasirajɛli amakʰulu amaɬanu amad̤ɔd̤a aɬɛliwɛjɔ ɓatʰɔtʲwa kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa ɓakʰalipʰa ɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓajama nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ uab̤ija wamsukɛla ujarɔb̤ɛham watʰimɓa kujɛ lɛ miz̤i ib̤ɛtɛli namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ nɛjɛʃana namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ nɛɛfrɔn namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ akaɓa saɓa namanɮa ujarɔb̤ɛham nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kaab̤ija ujɛhɔv̤a wamɓɛtʰa waja ɛsɔmɛlɛla nɡ̤ɔkɔmɛlɛla uab̤ija waz̤ɛka aɓafaz̤i aɓaliʃumi ɛlinaɓanɛ waz̤ala ɔɔɲana aɓamaʃumi maɓini anaɓaɓini nɛɛntɔmɓi ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛlinantand̤atʰu ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikaab̤ija nɛɛnɮɛla z̤akʰɛ namaz̤wi akʰɛ ab̤alwɛ ɛz̤iŋǀwad̤ini z̤amaɓali ɔmprɔfɛti uid̤ɔ uab̤ija kɔɔjisɛ ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ kɛ uasa uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jakʰɛ iliz̤wɛ laz̤ɔla imiɲaka jaliʃumi uasa wɛnz̤a ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ waz̤isusa iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a z̤ɛz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤ɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a waz̤ikǃʰɛkɛz̤a iz̤imisɔ z̤amatʲɛ waɓaɡ̤awula ɔɔaʃɛra watʰi kumajud̤a makamkǃukǃɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ awɛnz̤ɛ umjalɛlɔ nɔmtʰɛtʰɔ waz̤isusa kɛ ɛmiz̤ini jɔnkɛ jakwajud̤a iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a nɛɛnt͡sika z̤ɛlanɡ̤a ɓaz̤ɔla uɓukumkani pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ wakʰa imiz̤i ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ kwajud̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iliz̤wɛ ɓɛliz̤ɔlilɛ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ mfaz̤wɛ ajilwajɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ miɲaka nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a wajɛmpʰumz̤ilɛ watʰi kɛ kumajud̤a masijakʰɛ lɛ miz̤i sijid͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛɛnd̤ɔnɡ̤a nɛɛŋǃaɓa ɛz̤ind̤ɛ sɛnz̤ɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ nɛmiv̤alɔ lisɛpʰamɓi kwɛtʰu nd͡ʒ̤ɛ iliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa simkǃukǃɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu samkǃukǃɛla wasipʰumz̤a kɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɓajakʰa ɓaɓa nɛmpumɛlɛlɔ kɛ kalɔku uasa wajɛnɛmpi ɛpʰatʰa amakʰaka nɛz̤ikʰali kwajud̤a inɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰatʰu nakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin aɓapʰatʰa iinɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ naɓatʲɛd̤a iz̤apʰɛtʰa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤amaɡ̤ɔxa anɔɓuk͡xɔti kwapʰuma kwaz̤a naɓɔ uz̤ɛra umkuʃi ɛnɛmpi ɛliwaka nɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa ɛz̤imakʰulu matʰatʰu wad̤a wɛz̤a ɛmarɛʃa wapʰuma uasa ɛsija kum̤lanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a ɓakʰa iz̤intlu ɛmfulɛni wɛt͡sɛfata ɛmarɛʃa uasa waɓiz̤a kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ watʰi jɛhɔv̤a akukʰɔ ɓani inɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uwɛ ɔnɔkuŋǀɛd̤a pʰakatʰi kɔnamanɮa nɔnɡ̤ɛnawɔ siŋǀɛd̤ɛ jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sajamɛ nɡ̤awɛ siz̤ɛ kulɛ ŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ ɛɡ̤amɛni lakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu makanɡ̤aɓi namanɮa ɔkumɛlana nawɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wawakǁaɓɛla amakuʃi pʰamɓi kɔasa napʰamɓi kwamajud̤a asaɓa kɛ amakuʃi uasa naɓantu aɓaɓɛnajɛ ɓawasukɛla ɓad̤a ɓɛsa ɛɡ̤ɛrarɛ ɔjiswa amakuʃi nɡ̤ɔkɔkud̤ɛ anɡ̤aɓi nakuɓuja apʰɛtʰulɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akǃɔtʲwa pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a napʰamɓi kɔmkʰɔsi wakʰɛ ɓɛmka nɛkǁʰɔɓa ɛlininz̤i kunɛnɛ ɓajinɡ̤ɛnɛla jɔnkɛ imiz̤i nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛɡ̤ɛrarɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jafikɛlwa kukunkwantʲiswa nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɓajipʰanɡ̤a jɔnkɛ imiz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa amakǁʰɔɓa ajɛmaninz̤i kujɔ ɓat͡ʃaɓalalisa nɛɛntɛntɛ z̤ɛmfujɔ ɓatʰimɓa impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ janinz̤i nɛɛnkamɛla ɓaɓuja kɛ ɓaja ɛjɛrusalɛm umɔja katʰikǁɔ wamfikɛla uaz̤arija uɲana kaɔd̤ɛd̤ɛ wapʰuma ɛsija kukʰawulɛla uasa watʰi kujɛ nd̤ipʰulapʰulɛni asa nɔnkɛ majud̤a namab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ujɛhɔv̤a ɛkuɓɛni ninajɛ ukuɓa nitʰɛ namkǃukǃɛla nɔmfumana ukuɓa nitʰɛ namʃija wɔniʃija amasirajɛli ajɛnɛmiɬa ɛmininz̤i ɛnɡ̤ɛnatʰikǁɔ wɛɲanisɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛnamɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ujalajɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛnamtʰɛtʰɔ kɛ atʰi ɛkuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛkɛni kwawɔ akuɓujɛla kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukuɓa amkǃukǃɛlɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ makǁɛʃa kwakunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ lukǁɔlɔ kɔpʰumajɔ nakɔnɡ̤ɛnajɔ z̤aɓa z̤iz̤ipʰitʰipʰitʰi ɛz̤ikʰulu kuɓɛmi ɓɔnkɛ ɓamaz̤wɛ uɬanɡ̤a lwakǃɔtʲwa luɬanɡ̤a umz̤i nɡ̤umz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰikǁɔ waɓad̤uɓad̤uɓa nɡ̤ɛɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ z̤ɔnkɛ kɛ jɔmɛlɛlani maz̤inɡ̤awi iz̤anɮa z̤ɛnu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛnu unɔmv̤uz̤ɔ watʰi uasa akuwɛv̤a lɔɔ maz̤wi nɛsiprɔfɛtɔ sikaɔd̤ɛd̤ɛ umprɔfɛti wɔmɛlɛla waz̤ikʰwɛlɛlisa z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inɛz̤ɔtʰɛ ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lakwajud̤a nɛlakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nasɛmiz̤ini aɓɛjitʰimɓilɛ kwɛlɛɛntaɓa lakwaɛfrajim wasiɬaz̤ija isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sikajɛhɔv̤a ɛsipʰamɓi kwɛv̤arand̤a kajɛhɔv̤a wawaɬanɡ̤anisa ɔnkɛ amajud̤a namab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin naɓasɛmz̤ini aɓaɓɛkuwɔ ɓakwaɛfrajim naɓakwamanasɛ naɓakwasimɔn nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɡ̤alɛla kujɛ aɓakwasirajɛli ɓaɓaninz̤i ɓakuɓɔna ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ unajɛ ɓaɓutʰɛlana kɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsitʰatʰu nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɬanu wɔɓukumkani ɓukaasa ɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤alɔɔ m̤la ɓɛtʰaɓatʰa kumakǁʰɔɓa aɓaɓɛz̤ɛ nawɔ amakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛɛnkɔmɔ asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ ɓɛnz̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɔkumkǃukǃɛla ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ jɔnkɛ nanɡ̤ɔmpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ wɔnkɛ ɓatʰi ɓɔnkɛ aɓasukuɓa ɓɛnɡ̤amkǃukǃɛli ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli maɓaɓulawɛ kutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ kɔmŋǀinanɛ kusɛ kɔmkʰulu kutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ kwind̤ɔd̤a kusɛ kwinkaz̤ana ɓafunɡ̤a kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛz̤wi ɛlikʰulu nanɡ̤ɔkud̤uma nanɡ̤amakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ nanɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ asiv̤ujɛla ɔnkɛ amajud̤a isifunɡ̤ɔ ɛsɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa afunɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jawɔ jɔnkɛ amkǃukǃɛla nɡ̤ɛmv̤umɛ jawɔ jɔnkɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wawapʰumz̤a nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ wamɡ̤uz̤ula umahaka ukuɓa anɡ̤aɓi saɓa jinkɔsikaz̤i nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa wajɛmɛnz̤ɛlɛ uaʃɛra isitʰikǁɔ ɛsilisikiz̤i waz̤a uasa wasikǁʰakǁʰa isitʰikǁɔ sakʰɛ wasitʰi v̤itʰiv̤itʰi wasit͡ʃisa ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni ɔjikid̤rɔn kɛ iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a az̤isuswanɡ̤a kwasirajɛli kɔd̤wa jɔna intliz̤ijɔ kaasa jaɓɛ iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛ jɔnkɛ imiɬa jakʰɛ waz̤inɡ̤ɛnisa iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤ikajisɛ nɛz̤intɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛnɮwini katʰikǁɔ isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛmpaɬa akwaɓa saɓakʰɔ mfaz̤wɛ kwad̤a kwaɓa nɡ̤umɲaka wamaʃumi amatʰatʰu anɛsiɬanu wɔɓukumkani ɓukaasa nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu anɛsitʰand̤atʰu wɔɓukumkani ɓukaasa wɛɲuka ub̤ahɛʃa wamasirajɛli ɛsiz̤a namajud̤a wajakʰa irama ukuz̤ɛ anɡ̤av̤umi ukuɓa kupʰumɛ ɓani ajɛ kuasa wakwajud̤a wajixɔla kɛ uasa isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛɓuŋǀwanɛni ɓɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nɔɓɛnɮu jɔkumkani waz̤itʰumɛla kub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ wamaaram ɔɬɛli ɛd̤amaskɔ ɛsitʰi kukʰɔ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ pʰakatʰi nawɛ pʰakatʰi kɔɓawɔ nɔjiɬɔ nankɔ nd̤ikutʰumɛlɛ isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ jija uwapʰulɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wakʰɔ nɔb̤ahɛʃa wamasirajɛli ukuɓa ɛmkɛ ub̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ wampʰulapʰula uasa watʰumɛla aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛmpi aɓɛnaɓɔ ɛmiz̤ini jakwasirajɛli wajitʰimɓa iijɔn nɔwakwad̤an nɛab̤ɛlɛmajim nɛmiz̤i jɔnkɛ ɛnɡ̤ɔɔv̤imɓa jakwanafɛtali kwatʰi akuv̤a ub̤ahɛʃa wajɛka ukujakʰa irama wawujɛka umsɛɓɛnz̤i wakʰɛ uasa wawatʰaɓatʰa ɔnkɛ amajud̤a amatʲɛ ɛrama nɛmitʰi jajɔ awajɛsakʰa nɡ̤ajɔ ub̤ahɛʃa wakʰa kɛ nɡ̤ajɔ iɡ̤ɛb̤a nɛmiz̤pa nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa uhanani imɓɔni wɛz̤a kuasa wamajud̤a watʰi kujɛ ɛkuɓɛni wajama wamaaram akwajama kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ ipʰulukilɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ jɔkumkani wamaaram amakuʃi namalub̤i aɓɛnɡ̤ɛjɛjɔna ininz̤i ɛnɛntɔ ɛninz̤i kunɛnɛ jɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa naɓamahaʃɛ ukanti nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wajama kujɛhɔv̤a anikɛlwa ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a amɛɬɔ akʰɛ asinɡ̤asinɡ̤a ɛɬaɓatʰini lɔnkɛ ukuɓa az̤ɔmɛlɛz̤ɛlɛ aɓantliz̤ijɔ z̤ipʰɛlɛlɛ kujɛ wɛnz̤a uɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤alɛ ntɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kususɛla nɡ̤ɔku wɔɓa nɛɛmfaz̤wɛ uasa wajikǃumɓɛla imɓɔni lɛjɔ wajifaka ɛnɮwini jɛsitɔkisi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wajɛjid͡ʒ̤alɛlɛ nɡ̤alɛ ntɔ uasa wajikǀinɛz̤ɛla iŋǁɛɲɛ jaɓantu nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa jaɓɔna iz̤intɔ z̤ikaasa ɛz̤ɔkukǃala nɛz̤ɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla nanz̤ɔ z̤ib̤aliwɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a naɓakwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu anɛsitʰɔɓa wɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ uasa wajɛsifa z̤iiɲawɔ sad̤a sɛɲuka isifɔ sakʰɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɛsifɛni sakʰɛ akamkǃukǃɛlanɡ̤a ujɛhɔv̤a wakǃukǃɛla amaɡ̤ǃ̤ixa uasa kɔɔjisɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi ɔmanɛ anamɲɛ wɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni lakʰɛ awaz̤imɓɛlajɔ ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɓamlalisa ɛsililini ɛsiz̤ɛlɛ ɓuɓulawu iintlɔɓɔ nɡ̤ɛɛntlɔɓɔ ɛz̤ɛnz̤iwɛ uɓukǃʰɔlɔ nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ǀ̤isa ɓaɓakǃʰɔli ɓamɛnz̤ɛla iɓasɔ ɛlikʰulu kunɛnɛ ujɛhɔʃafati uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ wɔmɛlɛla wawakǀʰasa amasirajɛli waɓɛka imikʰɔsi ɛmiz̤ini jɔnkɛ ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ jakwajud̤a ɛliz̤wɛni lakwajud̤a nasɛmiz̤ini jakwaɛfrajim awajitʰimɓajɔ uasa ujisɛ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓa nɔjɛhɔʃafati nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛla z̤ikad̤av̤id̤ɛ ujisɛ ɛz̤ɔkukǃala z̤ɔna akaɓakǃukǃɛla ɔɔb̤ahali kɛ wakǃukǃɛla utʰikǁɔ kajisɛ wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛmitʰɛtʰɔ jakʰɛ akahamɓa nɡ̤ɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤akwasirajɛli ujɛhɔv̤a waɓuz̤inz̤isa uɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ ɔnkɛ amajud̤a az̤isa iminikɛlɔ kujɛhɔʃafati waɓa nɔɓutʲɛɓi nɔz̤ukɔ nɡ̤ɔkukʰulu japʰakama intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ ɛz̤inɮɛlɛni z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ waz̤isusa iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a nɔɔaʃɛra kwajud̤a nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsitʰatʰu wɔkuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓatʰumɛla aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ ub̤ɛn̤ajilɛ nɔɔb̤ad̤ija nɔz̤ɛkarija nɔnatanijɛli nɔmikaja ukuɓa ɓafund̤isɛ ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a ɓɛnaɓalɛv̤i uʃɛmaja nɔnɛtanija nɔz̤ɛb̤ad̤ija nɔasahɛli nɔʃɛmiramɔti nɔjɛhɔnatan nɔad̤ɔnija nɔtɔb̤ija nɔtɔb̤ad̤ɔnija aɓalɛv̤i kɛ aɓɔ ɓɛnɔɛliʃama nɔjɛhɔram aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓafund̤isa kɛ kwajud̤a ɓɛnɛŋǀwad̤i jɔmjalɛlɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɓajid͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a imiz̤i jɔnkɛ jakwajud̤a ɓɛɓafund̤isa aɓantu z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ikumkani z̤amaz̤wɛ ad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ɛ amajud̤a z̤anɡ̤ɛnɛlwa kukɔjika ujɛhɔv̤a az̤alwa nɔjɛhɔʃafati nakumafilisti ɓaɓɛkʰɔ aɓaz̤isa iminikɛlɔ nɛmitʰwalɔ kujɛhɔʃafati jɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ amaarab̤i az̤isa kujɛ impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ujɛhɔʃafati waja ɛɓa mkʰulu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa mkʰulu wad̤a wɛɲuka wakʰa kwajud̤a iiŋǃaɓa nɛmiz̤i ɛnɡ̤ɔɔv̤imɓa wajɛ ɛnɛmpaɬa ɛninz̤i ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a wajɛnamad̤ɔd̤a ɔkulwa amaɡ̤ɔxa anɔɓuk͡xɔti ɛjɛrusalɛm kukɔ ɔku ukuland̤ɛlana kwawɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ kwajud̤a aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamawaka nɡ̤uad̤ɛna umtʰɛtʰɛli ɛnamakʰulu amatʰatʰu amaɡ̤ɔxa anɔɓuk͡xɔti nɡ̤anɛnɔ kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔhanan umtʰɛtʰɛli ɛnamakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ nɡ̤anɛnɔ kwakʰɛ nɡ̤uamasija uɲana kaz̤ik͡xi ɔwaz̤inikɛla kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkukǃʰutʲwa jintliz̤ijɔ ɛnamakʰulu amaɓini amaɡ̤ɔxa anɔɓuk͡xɔti kumab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤uɛlijad̤a iɡ̤ɔxa ɛlinɔɓuk͡xɔti ɛnamakʰulu amaɓini akǁʰɔɓɛ iz̤apʰɛtʰa nɛɛnɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ nɡ̤anɛnɔ kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ujɔz̤ab̤ad̤i ɛnɛkʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ akǁʰɔɓɛlɛ imfaz̤wɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɓaɓɛkʰɔnz̤a ɓɛɓɔd̤wa aɓamisiwɛjɔ nɡ̤ukumkani ɛmiz̤ini ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ kwɛlakwajud̤a lɔnkɛ kɛ ujɛhɔʃafati uɓɛ ɛnɔɓutʲɛɓi nɔz̤ukɔ nɡ̤ɔkukʰulu waz̤ɛkɛlana nɔahab̤i wɛɬa ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɲaka ɛtʰilɛ waja kuahab̤i kwasamari uahab̤i wamkǁʰɛlɛla impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ ɛz̤ininz̤i wakǁʰɛlɛla naɓantu aɓɛnaɓɔ wamkǀɛnɡ̤a ukuɓa aɲukɛ najɛ ajɛ ɛramɔti jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i watʰi uahab̤i wakwasirajɛli kujɛhɔʃafati wakwajud̤a wɔhamɓa sijɛ nɛramɔti jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i watʰi kujɛ nd̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɛ aɓantu ɓam ɓand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓantu ɓakʰɔ sɔja nawɛ ɛkulwɛni watʰi ujɛhɔʃafati wakwasirajɛli kʰawuɓuz̤isɛ ɛlanam̤la iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a waɓaɬanɡ̤anisa kɛ wakwasirajɛli aɓaprɔfɛti amakʰulu amanɛ amad̤ɔd̤a watʰi kuɓɔ sijɛ nɛramɔti jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i nd̤ijɛkɛ ɓatʰi ɲuka utʰikǁɔ wɔjinikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani watʰi ujɛhɔʃafati akusɛkʰɔ mprɔfɛti kajɛhɔv̤a apʰa siɓuz̤isɛ kujɛ watʰi wakwasirajɛli kujɛhɔʃafati kusɛkʰɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛɲɛ ɛsinɡ̤aɓuz̤isa nɡ̤ajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a kɛ nd̤ijitʰijilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ajiprɔfɛti ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤am iprɔfɛta ɔkuɓi imiɬa jajɔ jɔnkɛ nɡ̤umikaja uɲana kaimla watʰi ujɛhɔʃafati makanɡ̤at͡ʃɔ waz̤a wakwasirajɛli waɓiz̤a umɓusi watʰi kʰawulɛz̤isa umikaja uɲana kaimla ɛz̤ɛ apʰa kɛ wakwasirajɛli nɔjɛhɔʃafati wakwajud̤a ɓaɓɛɬɛli ɛlɔwɔ ɛtrɔnɛni jakʰɛ ɓamɓɛtʰɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓɛɬɛli ɛɓalɛni ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lakwasamari ɓɔnkɛ aɓaprɔfɛti ɓɛprɔfɛta pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ kɛ uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija uɲana kakɛnahana waz̤ɛnz̤ɛla iimpɔnd̤ɔ z̤ɛsiɲitʰi watʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi uja kuwaŋ̤ǃ̤ula nɡ̤az̤ɔ ɛz̤i amaaram ud̤ɛ uwaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaprɔfɛti ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuprɔfɛta ɓɛsitʰi ɲuka ujɛ ɛramɔti jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i uɓɛ nɛmpumɛlɛlɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uja kujinikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani kɛ umtʰuɲwa ɔɓɛjɛ kuɓiz̤a umikaja watʰɛtʰa kujɛ ɛsitʰi kʰawuɓɔnɛ amaz̤wi aɓaprɔfɛti atʰɛtʰa ɔkuɬɛ nɡ̤amlɔmɔ mɲɛ iliz̤wi lakʰɔ makʰɛ liɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlaɓɔ utʰɛtʰɛ ɔkuɬɛ watʰi umikaja ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a atʰɛ wakutʰɛtʰa utʰikǁɔ nd̤ɔtʰɛtʰa kɔna wafika watʰi kujɛ mikaja sijɛ ɛramɔti jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i ukuɓa silwɛ nd̤ijɛkɛ watʰi ɲuka uɓɛ nɛmpumɛlɛlɔ ɓaja kunikɛlwa ɛsanɮɛni sɛnu watʰi kujɛ makuɓɛ z̤iz̤iɬanɮɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤apʰi nd̤ikufunɡ̤isa ukuɓa unɡ̤atʰɛtʰi ntɔ inɡ̤ɛjijɔ ɲanisɔ ɛɡ̤amɛni likajɛhɔv̤a watʰi jɛna nd̤iɓɔnɛ amasirajɛli ɔnkɛ ɛlusali ɛz̤intaɓɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ ɛnɡ̤ɛnamalusi watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a aɓanankɔsi maɓaɓujɛlɛ ɛlɔwɔ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ ɛnɔkǁɔlɔ watʰi wakwasirajɛli kujɛhɔʃafati ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤at͡ʃɔnɡ̤ɔ kuwɛ ukutʰi akaji kuprɔfɛta ɔkuɬɛ nɡ̤am kɔɓa kɔkuɓi watʰi jɛna nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nd̤im ɓɔnilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɬɛli ɛtrɔnɛni jakʰɛ wɔnkɛ umkʰɔsi wasɛmaz̤ulwini nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ kwakʰɛ nanɡ̤asɛkʰɔɬɔ kwakʰɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kulukuɬa uahab̤i wamasirajɛli ɛɲukɛ ajɛ awɛ ɛramɔti jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ lɔ ukutʰɛtʰa wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ lɔ ukutʰɛtʰa wapʰuma kɛ umɔja wɛma pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a watʰi nd̤ɔmlukuɬa watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kuwɔ nɡ̤antɔni watʰi wɔna nd̤ɔpʰuma nd̤ijɛ nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤umɔja wɔɓukǁɔki ɛmlɔɲɛni waɓaprɔfɛti ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ watʰi jɛna mlukuɬɛ ufɛz̤ɛ pʰuma ujɛ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ujaɓɔna kalɔku ujɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤ɛnisɛ umɔja wɔɓukǁɔki ɛmlɔɲɛni waɓɔ ɓaprɔfɛti ɓakʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰɛtʰɛ ɔkuɓi nɡ̤awɛ wɛsuka uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija uɲana kakɛnahana wamɓɛtʰa umikaja ɛsiɮɛlɛni watʰi uɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛ nɡ̤ajipʰi inɮɛla umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa ajɛ kutʰɛtʰa nawɛ watʰi umikaja kʰanɡ̤ɛla uja kuɓɔna nɡ̤alɔɔ uja kuz̤a utʰunɡ̤ɛlɛ amaɡ̤umɓi uz̤imɛla watʰi wakwasirajɛli mtʰaɓatʰɛni umikaja niɓujɛ najɛ nimsɛ kuamɔni umpʰatʰi wɔmz̤i nakujɔwaʃɛ uɲana wɔkumkani nitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ukutʰi mfakɛni ɛntɔlɔnɡ̤wɛni lɔ nimɮisɛ isɔnka sɔkǁiniwɛjɔ namanz̤i ɔkǁiniwɛjɔ nd̤id̤ɛ nd̤iɓujɛ nd̤inɔkǁɔlɔ watʰi umikaja ukuɓa utʰɛ waɓuja waɓuja unɔkǁɔlɔ wɔɓa ujɛhɔv̤a akatʰɛtʰanɡ̤a nɡ̤am watʰi jiv̤ani nɔnkɛ z̤iz̤wɛ z̤ipʰɛla wɛɲuka kɛ wakwasirajɛli nɔjɛhɔʃafati wakwajud̤a ɓaja ɛramɔti jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i watʰi wakwasirajɛli kujɛhɔʃafati nd̤ija kuz̤ɛnz̤a wumɓi nd̤inɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛkulwɛni jamɓatʰa iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɔ wɛna waz̤ɛnz̤a wumɓi wakwasirajɛli ɓanɡ̤ɛna ɛkulwɛni kɛ wakwaaram waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa aɓɛnaz̤ɔ watʰi iz̤ɛ ninɡ̤alwi nɔmŋǀinanɛ nɔmkʰulu jilwani nɔkumkani wakwasirajɛli jɛd̤wa kwatʰi ɓakumɓɔna ujɛhɔʃafati aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa ɓatʰi ɓɔna nɡ̤ukumkani wakwasirajɛli ɓamxawula ɓɛz̤a najɛ wakʰala ujɛhɔʃafati ujɛhɔv̤a wamŋǀɛd̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓasɔnɡ̤a kujɛ kwatʰi ɓakuɓɔna aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa ukuɓa asinɡ̤ukumkani wakwasirajɛli ɓaɓuja ɛkumsukɛlɛni watʰi watʲɛd̤a isapʰɛtʰa ɛfunisɛla watɔla wakwasirajɛli ɛkuɬanɡ̤anɛni kwɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jɛnt͡simɓi namasɔnd̤ɔ ajɔ watʰi kumkǃʰuɓi wɛŋǃwɛlɔ jakʰɛ jɔkulwa d͡ʒ̤ika iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɔ und̤ikʰupʰɛlɛ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kɔmkʰɔsi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iŋ̤ǁ̤wɛlɛxiwɛ ukulwa kwɛɲuka lɔɔ ukumkani wakwasirajɛli waz̤imisa ɛŋǃwɛlwɛni pʰamɓi kwamaaram kwad̤a kwaɬwa ukut͡ʃɔna kwɛlanɡ̤a waɓuja ujɛhɔʃafati wakwajud̤a waja ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛnɔkǁɔlɔ wapʰuma ujɛhu uɲana kahanani imɓɔni ɛsija kumkʰawulɛla watʰi ujɛhɔʃafati kukutʰini ukuɓa uŋǀɛd̤ɛ ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ uɓatʰand̤ɛ aɓatʰiji ɓakajɛhɔv̤a kunɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓuɡ̤alɛlɛkilɛjɔ kuwɛ uɓuxalaxumɛ ɔɓupʰuma kujɛhɔv̤a nɔkɔ kamɓɛ kukʰɔ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤intlɛ ɛz̤ifumanɛkilɛjɔ kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓat͡ʃisilɛ ɔɔaʃɛra ɛz̤wɛni wajisinɡ̤isɛla intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ ɛkumkǃukǃɛlɛni utʰikǁɔ waɬala ujɛhɔʃafati ɛjɛrusalɛm waɓuja wapʰuma wahamɓa pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a wɛsa ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwaɛfrajim waɓaɓujisɛla kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ wamisa aɓaɡ̤wɛɓi ɛz̤wɛni ɛmiz̤ini jɔnkɛ jakwajud̤a ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ kwimiz̤i nɡ̤ɛmiz̤i watʰi kuɓaɡ̤wɛɓi kulumkɛlɛni ɛnikwɛnz̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmntu ukuɡ̤wɛɓa kwɛnu kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa kajɛhɔv̤a kɛ ɛmkǀimɓini wɔkuɡ̤wɛɓa nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ ukɔjikwa kukajɛhɔv̤a makuɓɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛnu jɛnz̤ani nɡ̤ɔɓulumkɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akukʰɔ ɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nakukʰɛtʰa ɓusɔ nakwamkɛla sikǀɛnɡ̤ɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm ujɛhɔʃafati iŋǁɛɲɛ jaɓalɛv̤i naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ z̤akwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɡ̤wɛɓɔ lukajɛhɔv̤a nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓamɓana kwaɓantu ɓaɓujɛla kwasɛjɛrusalɛm waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ watʰi nija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukumɔjika ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɲanisɛkilɛjɔ nanɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ ɛpʰɛlɛlɛjɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iind̤awɔ ɛkuɓand͡ʒ̤wɛnɛ nɡ̤az̤ɔ ɛz̤iz̤a z̤iv̤ɛla kuɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu aɓaɬɛli ɛmiz̤ini jaɓɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛɡ̤az̤i nɛɡ̤az̤i pʰakatʰi kɔmjalɛlɔ nɔmtʰɛtʰɔ nɛmimisɛlɔ namasikɔ nɔɓakʰaɲisɛla ukuz̤ɛ ɓanɡ̤aɓi natʲala kujɛhɔv̤a ɓunɡ̤anifikɛli naɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu uɓuxalaxumɛ ɓakʰɛ nɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuz̤ɛ ninɡ̤aɓi natʲala nankɔ uamarija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔmkʰulu ɛpʰɛz̤u kwɛnu ɛz̤intwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a nɔz̤ɛb̤ad̤ija uɲana kaiʃmajɛli inɡ̤anɡ̤a jɛnɮu jakwajud̤a ɛz̤intwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɔkumkani naɓalɛv̤i ɓɔɓa nɡ̤aɓab̤ali pʰamɓi kwɛnu jɔmɛlɛlani nɛnz̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wɔɓa nɔlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kwatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakamɔwab̤i nɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ɓɛnamamahun ɓɛz̤a nɔjɛhɔʃafati ɓɛz̤a ɓamkǁɛlɛla ujɛhɔʃafati ɓatʰi kuz̤a kuwɛ iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ ɛninz̤i ɛv̤ɛla pʰɛʃɛja kɔlwanɮɛ kwaaram nant͡sɔ ɛhat͡sɛt͡sɔntamarɛ ɛjiɛnɡ̤ɛd̤i wɔjika ujɛhɔʃafati waz̤inikɛla nɡ̤ɔkwakʰɛ ɛkumkǃukǃɛlɛni ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi makuz̤ilwɛ ukuɮa nɡ̤amajud̤a ɔnkɛ aɬanɡ̤anisana kɛ amajud̤a ɛfuna uŋǀɛd̤ɔ kujɛhɔv̤a nasɛmiz̤ini jɔnkɛ jakwajud̤a ɓapʰuma ɓɛkǃukǃɛla ujɛhɔv̤a wɛma ujɛhɔʃafati ɛɓanɮɛni lakwajud̤a nɛlasɛjɛrusalɛm ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a pʰamɓi kwɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ ɛnt͡ʃa watʰi jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ wɔɔɓawɔ asinɡ̤uwɛ ɔnɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ɛmaz̤ulwini asinɡ̤uwɛ ɛz̤ikumkanini z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛɛntlanɡ̤a akasɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ amanɮa nɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ukuɓa kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ unɔkumɛlana nawɛ asinɡ̤uwɛ utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ɔwaɓaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤ajɔ aɓɛmi ɓɛli liz̤wɛ pʰamɓi kwaɓantu ɓakʰɔ amasirajɛli waz̤a imɓɛwu kaaɓraham ɔkutʰand̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ ɓaɬala kulɔ ɓakwakʰɛla kulɔ ind̤awɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤ama lakʰɔ ɓɛsitʰi ukuɓa sitʰɛ safikɛlwa ɓuɓuɓi nalik͡xɛlɛ nanɡ̤umɡ̤wɛɓɔ najindʲikitʲa jɔkufa najinɮala sɛma pʰamɓi kwalɛ nɮu napʰamɓi kwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa likulɛ nɮu iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ sakʰala kuwɛ ɛkuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛkɛni kwɛtʰu wɔsiv̤a usind̤isɛ jaɓɔna kɛ naɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn naɓakamɔwab̤i naɓasɛntaɓɛni jakwasɛhirɛ ɔwawunɡ̤av̤umanɡ̤a ukuɓa amasirajɛli aɓanɡ̤ɛnɛlɛ ɛkupʰumɛni kwawɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓajɛka akaɓat͡ʃaɓalalisa naɓa kɛ ɓɛsiɓujɛkɛz̤a nɡ̤ɔkuz̤a kusiɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa ɛlifɛni lakʰɔ ɔwasinikajɔ ukuɓa siliɮɛ tʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu akuji kuɓaɡ̤wɛɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa asinamanɮa ɔkumɛlana nalɛ ŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ ininz̤i isiz̤ɛlajɔ tʰina asaz̤i ukuɓa sɔtʰini kɔd̤wa amɛɬɔ ɛtʰu akuwɛ ɛma kɛ ɔnkɛ amajud̤a pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a nɛɛnt͡sana z̤awɔ naɓafaz̤i ɓawɔ nɔɔɲana ɓawɔ ujahaz̤ijɛli uɲana kaz̤ɛkarija uɲana kab̤ɛnaja uɲana kajɛhijɛli uɲana kamatanija umlɛv̤i wakɔɔɲana ɓakaasafu wafikɛlwa nɡ̤umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a ɛpʰakatʰi kwɛɓanɮa ɛlɔ watʰi ɓaz̤ani iinɮɛɓɛ nɔnkɛ majud̤a ɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm nawɛ jɛhɔʃafati ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi musani ukɔjika ukukǃʰipʰuka umɓilini nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jalɛ ŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ ind͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓa ninz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa imfaz̤wɛ lɛ asijɛjɛnu jɛkatʰikǁɔ jiɬani nɡ̤ɔmsɔ nijɛ naɓɔ naɓɔ ɓɛɲuka nɡ̤ɛkǃʰina lɛt͡sit͡si nɔɓafumana ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛsiɬamɓɔ pʰamɓi kwɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jasɛjɛruwɛli lɛ janam̤la asijɛjɛnu z̤imisɛni nimɛ niluɓɔnɛ usind̤isɔ lukajɛhɔv̤a ɔnani majud̤a nɛjɛrusalɛm musani ukɔjika ukukǃʰipʰuka umɓilini pʰumani nɡ̤ɔmsɔ niɓaɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a watʰɔɓa ujɛhɔʃafati ɛɓub̤ɛkisɛ uɓusɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni namajud̤a ɔnkɛ naɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm ɓawa pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɓamŋǃula ujɛhɔv̤a ɓasuka ɓɛma aɓalɛv̤i ɓakɔɔɲana ɓakakɛhati naɓakɔɔɲana ɓamakɔra ukuɓa ɓad̤umisɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛz̤wi ɛlikʰulu kunɛnɛ ɓav̤uka nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ ɓapʰuma ɓaja ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jɛtɛkɔwa ɛkupʰumɛni kwaɓɔ wɛma ujɛhɔʃafati watʰi nd̤ipʰulapʰulɛni majud̤a ɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm kʰɔlwani kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nɔz̤imasɛka kʰɔlwani kuɓaprɔfɛti ɓakʰɛ nɔɓa nɛmpumɛlɛlɔ utʰɛ akukǀɛɓisana naɓantu iimv̤umi z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a z̤ɔkud̤umisa z̤iv̤ɛtʰɛ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛz̤ija kupʰuma z̤ihamɓɛ pʰamɓi kwaɓakǁʰɔɓilɛjɔ z̤isitʰi ɓulɛlani kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɛ ɓatʰɛ ɓakukǃala ukumɛmɛlɛla nɔkud̤umisa ujɛhɔv̤a waɓafikisɛla aɓalalɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn naɓakamɔwab̤i naɓasɛntaɓɛni jakwasɛhirɛ aɓaɓɛz̤ɛ kumajud̤a ɓaɓulawa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn naɓakamɔwab̤i ɓɛsuka ɓalwa naɓɛmi ɓɛntaɓa jakwasɛhirɛ ukuɓa ɓaɓasinɡ̤ɛlɛ pʰant͡si ɓaɓat͡ʃaɓalalisɛ ɓakuɓaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa aɓɛmi ɓakwasɛhirɛ ɓaɓulalana kwaɓɔd̤wa afika amajud̤a ɛmɓɔnisɛlwɛni jasɛntlanɡ̤ɔ akʰanɡ̤ɛla kulɔɔ ŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ aɓɔna ɓɛz̤iz̤id̤umɓu ɓɛkǃuŋ̤ǃ̤uluz̤ilɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ usind̤ilɛjɔ ujɛhɔʃafati naɓantu ɓakʰɛ ɓɛz̤a kupʰanɡ̤a amakǁʰɔɓa ɓafumana kuɓɔ intɔ ɛninz̤i impaɬa nɛz̤id̤umɓu nɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ ɓaz̤ipʰanɡ̤ɛla kwajinkɔɬa ukujitʰwala ɓaɓa nt͡suku ntatʰu ɓɛwapʰanɡ̤a amakǁʰɔɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓɛmaninz̤i nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsinɛ ɓaɬanɡ̤anisana ɛntilini jɔkuɓɔnɡ̤a kuɓa ɓamɓɔnɡ̤a kʰɔna ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ɓatʰi iɡ̤ama lalɛ nd̤awɔ jintili jɔkuɓɔnɡ̤a unanam̤la aɓuja ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a nawasɛjɛrusalɛm ujɛhɔʃafati ɛsɛntlɔkɔ kuwɔ ukuz̤ɛ aɓujɛ ajɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛnɔv̤ujɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a wɛnz̤a ukuɓa az̤iv̤ujɛlɛlɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤awɔ anɡ̤ɛna ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛnɛmixub̤ɛ nɛɛhad̤i namakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ aja ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ukɔjikwa kukajɛhɔv̤a kwaz̤ifikɛla z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ikumkani z̤amaz̤wɛ z̤akuv̤a ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ulwilɛ nɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤akwasirajɛli ɓaz̤ɔla kɛ uɓukumkani ɓukajɛhɔʃafati utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ wampʰumz̤a nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ujɛhɔʃafati wajɛ ɛnɡ̤ukumkani kwajud̤a uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi matʰatʰu anamiɬanu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ aɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛmaʃumi maɓini anamiɬanu ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina lalinɡ̤uaz̤ub̤a intɔmɓi kaʃilɛhi wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla kajisɛ uasa akatʲɛka kujɔ wɛnz̤a ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a kɔd̤wa iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a aɓaz̤isusanɡ̤a aɓantu ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɛkaz̤ib̤ɛkisi iintliz̤ijɔ z̤aɓɔ kutʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikajɛhɔʃafati ɛz̤ɔkukǃala nɛz̤ɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla nanz̤ɔ z̤ib̤aliwɛ ɛmikǀimɓini kajɛhu uɲana kahanani ɛjafakwa ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ ujɛhɔʃafati wakwajud̤a waz̤imaɲa nɔahaz̤ija wakwasirajɛli lɔwɔ wɛnz̤ajɔ ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ waz̤imaɲa najɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnz̤a iiŋǃanawa z̤ɔkuja ɛtarʃiʃɛ ɓaz̤ɛnz̤a iiŋǃanawa ɛɛt͡sijɔnɡ̤ɛb̤ɛrɛ waprɔfɛta uɛlijɛz̤ɛrɛ uɲana kad̤ɔd̤av̤ahu wasɛmarɛʃa nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔʃafati ɛsitʰi nɡ̤ɔkud̤iɓana kwakʰɔ nɔahaz̤ija ujapʰulɛ ujɛhɔv̤a imisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɔ z̤apʰuka kɛ iiŋǃanawa ɛz̤ɔ az̤aɓa nakuja ɛtarʃiʃɛ ujɛhɔʃafati kɔɔjisɛ waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa kɔɔjisɛ ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ujɛhɔram uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ uɓɛnaɓaninawa ɔɔɲana ɓakajɛhɔʃafati uaz̤arija nɔjɛhijɛli nɔz̤ɛkarija nɔaz̤arija nɔmikajɛli nɔʃɛfatija ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakajɛhɔʃafati wakwasirajɛli ujisɛ waɓanika iz̤ipʰɔ ɛz̤ininz̤i z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛz̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤intlɛ kuɲɛ nɛmiz̤i ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ kwajud̤a kɛ uɓukumkani waɓunika ujɛhɔram nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛnɡ̤ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ akupʰakama ujɛhɔram ɛɓukumkanini ɓukajisɛ waz̤ɔmɛlɛz̤a waɓaɓulala ɓɔnkɛ aɓaninawa ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nɛŋǁɛɲɛ jɛɛnkɔsana z̤akwasirajɛli uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi matʰatʰu anamiɓini ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ujɛhɔram ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ jɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ inɮu kaahab̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wajɛz̤ɛkɛ intɔmɓi kaahab̤i wɛnz̤a uɓuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a kɛ akav̤umanɡ̤a ujɛhɔv̤a ukujɔnakalisa inɮu kad̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ awawɛnz̤ɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ watʰɛtʰajɔ ukuɓa uja isiɓanɛ kwanɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ jɔnkɛ imiɬa nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jakʰɛ amaɛd̤ɔm ak͡xɛkǃa ɛsanɮɛni sakwajud̤a az̤ɛnz̤ɛla waɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa ujɛhɔram ɛnaɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ ɛnɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɔkulwa wav̤uka ɛɓusuku wawaɓulala amaɛd̤ɔm aɓɛmxawulɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa ak͡xɛkǃa kɛ amaɛd̤ɔm apʰuma pʰant͡si kwɛsanɮa samajud̤a unanam̤la jaz̤a jak͡xɛkǃa ilib̤ɛna ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ kwanɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛmʃijilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ jɛna wɛnz̤a iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwajud̤a waɓahɛɲuz̤isa aɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm wawawɛkǁula amajud̤a kwɛz̤a kujɛ iŋǀwad̤i iv̤ɛla kuɛlija umprɔfɛti isitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ujiɬɔ ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛtʰuɓa lɔkuɓa unɡ̤ahamɓanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛla z̤ikajɛhɔʃafati ujiɬɔ nanɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛla z̤ikaasa wakwajud̤a usukɛ waɓamɓa nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛla z̤ɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli wawahɛɲuz̤isa amajud̤a naɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔkɔkuhɛɲuz̤isa kwɛnɮu kaahab̤i kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ waɓaɓulala aɓaninawa ɓakʰɔ ɓɛnɮu kajiɬɔ aɓaɓɛlunɡ̤ilɛ kunawɛ jaɓɔna ujɛhɔv̤a uja kuɓaɓɛtʰa nɡ̤ɛsiɓɛtʰɔ ɛsikʰulu aɓantu ɓakʰɔ nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ naɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɔ nɛmpaɬa jakʰɔ jɔnkɛ kɛ wɛna wɔɓɛtʰwa z̤iz̤ifɔ ɛz̤ininz̤i sisifɔ sɛz̤iɓilini z̤akʰɔ z̤id̤ɛ z̤ipʰumɛ iz̤iɓilini z̤akʰɔ sisifɔ sɛmiɬa nɡ̤ɛmiɬa ujɛhɔv̤a wawakǁʰɔkɔŋǁa amafilisti namaarab̤i asɛkǀalɛni lamakuʃi ukuɓa amkǀʰasɛ ujɛhɔram ɛɲuka ɛz̤a kwɛlamajud̤a atʰʲɔɓɔz̤a anɡ̤ɛna kulɔ atʰimɓa jɔnkɛ impaɬa ɛjafumanɛka ɛnɮwini jɔkumkani kwanɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ naɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɛ aɓamʃija naɲana jaɓa nɡ̤ujɛhɔwahaz̤i uɲana wakʰɛ ɔmŋǀinanɛ jɛd̤wa ɛmv̤ɛni kwɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wamɓɛtʰa ɛz̤iɓilinini z̤akʰɛ nɡ̤ɛsifɔ ɛsinɡ̤ɛnakupʰiliswa kwatʰi ɛkuhamɓɛni kwɛkǁɛʃa ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɲaka ɛmiɓini ɛsifa z̤apʰuma iz̤iɓilini z̤akʰɛ ɛsifa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ ɛsɛz̤intlunɡ̤wini ɛz̤inkulu aɓantu ɓakʰɛ aɓamɛnz̤ɛlanɡ̤a ɓasɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɓasɔ lɔɔjisɛ uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi matʰatʰu anamiɓini ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm wɛmka ɛnɡ̤alilɛlwa ɓani ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ kɔd̤wa akaŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa ɛmaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni ɔɔkumkani aɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm ɓamɛnz̤a uahaz̤ija uɲana wakʰɛ ɔmŋǀinanɛ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰulu ɓaɓɛɓulɛwɛ nɡ̤amatutu awɛz̤a namaarab̤i ɛmkʰɔsini waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kɛ uahaz̤ija uɲana kajɛhɔram wamajud̤a uahaz̤ija uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi manɛ anamiɓini ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa namɲaka mɲɛ ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina lalinɡ̤uatalija intɔmɓi kaɔmri kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ jɛna wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛla z̤ɛnɮu kaahab̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓɛnɡ̤umkǀɛɓisi wakʰɛ ukuɓa ɛnz̤ɛ ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ wɛnz̤a uɓuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɮu kaahab̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓakǀɛɓisi ɓakʰɛ ɓɔna ɛmv̤a kɔkufa kukajisɛ ɓɛmɔnakalisa kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛkǀɛɓɔ laɓɔ wahamɓa nɔjɛhɔram uɲana kaahab̤i wakwasirajɛli waja nɔaz̤ajɛli wamaaram ɛramɔti jasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i amaaram amŋ̤ǁ̤wɛlɛxa ujɛhɔram waɓuja ɛz̤a kuɲanɡ̤wa ɛjiz̤ɛrɛli lɔɔ maŋǁɛɓa ɛrama ɛkulwɛni kwakʰɛ nɔaz̤ajɛli wamaaram wɛɬa uaz̤arija uɲana kajɛhɔram wakwajud̤a waja kuɓɔna ujɛhɔram uɲana kaahab̤i ɛjiz̤ɛrɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛsifa kwapʰuma kutʰikǁɔ ukutʲuɲuz̤wa kukaahaz̤ija nɡ̤ɔkutʰi ɛz̤ɛ kujɛhɔram ɛkufikɛni kwakʰɛ wapʰuma nɔjɛhɔram ɓaja kujɛhu uɲana kanimʃi awamtʰamɓisajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa ajiŋǃamlɛ inɮu kaahab̤i kwatʰi ɛkuɡ̤wɛtʲwɛni kwɛnɮu kaahab̤i nɡ̤ujɛhu aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakwajud̤a nɔɔɲana ɓaɓaz̤alwana ɓakaahaz̤ija aɓaɓɛlunɡ̤isɛlɛla kuahaz̤ija waɓaɓulala wafunwa uahaz̤ija ɓamɓamɓa ɛz̤imɛlɛ kwasamari ɓamsa kujɛhu ɓamɓulala ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛsitʰi nɡ̤uɲana kajɛhɔʃafati ɔɓɛmkǃukǃɛla ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ inɮu kaahaz̤ija jajinɡ̤ɛnaɓani unɔkupʰatʰa uɓukumkani watʰi kɛ uatalija kaahaz̤ija akuɓɔna ukuɓa ufilɛ uɲana wakʰɛ wɛsuka wajit͡ʃaɓalalisa nɡ̤ɔɓub̤ɛd̤ɛnɡ̤u jɔnkɛ imɓɛwu ɛnɔɓukʰɔsi ɓɛnɮu jakwajud̤a ujɛhɔʃab̤ati intɔmɓi jɔkumkani wamtʰaɓatʰa ujɔwaʃɛ uɲana kaahaz̤ija wamɓa pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓɔkumkani aɓaɓulawajɔ wamɓɛka jɛna nɔmɔnɮi wakʰɛ ɛɡ̤umɓini lɔkulala ujɛhɔʃab̤ati intɔmɓi jɔkumkani ujɛhɔram umkajɛhɔjad̤a umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓɛnɡ̤ud̤ad̤ɛ ɓɔahaz̤ija wamfiɬa kuatalija ukuz̤ɛ anɡ̤aɓulawa wajɛnaɓɔ ɛnɮwini katʰikǁɔ ɛz̤iɲɛz̤iwɛ imiɲaka ɛmitʰand̤atʰu kɛ uatalija waɓa nɡ̤ukumkanikaz̤i wɛliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ waz̤ɔmɛlɛz̤a ujɛhɔjad̤a watʰaɓatʰa aɓatʰɛtʰɛlimakʰulu uaz̤arija uɲana kajɛhɔram nɔiʃmajɛli uɲana kajɛhɔhanan nɔaz̤arija uɲana kaɔb̤ɛd̤i nɔmahasɛja uɲana kaad̤aja nɔɛliʃafati uɲana kaz̤ik͡xi waŋǃɔpʰisana naɓɔ ɓad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a kwajud̤a ɓaɓaɬanɡ̤anisa aɓalɛv̤i ɛmiz̤ini jɔnkɛ jakwajud̤a nɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ z̤akwasirajɛli ɓɛz̤a naɓɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm lɛsuka lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa lɛnz̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nɔkumkani ɛnɮwini katʰikǁɔ watʰi kuɓɔ ujɛhɔjad̤a jaɓɔnani uɲana wɔkumkani makaɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wakutʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔɲana ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ jijɔ lɛ intɔ ɛnija kujɛnz̤a ɛsiɲɛ isaɬulɔ sɛsitʰatʰu ɓanɡ̤ɛnajɔ nɡ̤ɛsaɓatʰa kuɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nakuɓalɛv̤i sɔɓa nɡ̤aɓaɡ̤ǀ̤ini ɓamasanɡ̤ɔ ɛsiɲɛ isaɬulɔ sɛsitʰatʰu sɔɓa sɛnɮwini jɔkumkani ɛsiɲɛ isaɬulɔ sɛsitʰatʰu sɔɓa sɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɛsisɛkɔ aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɔɓa sɛz̤intɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni z̤ɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a iz̤ɛ kunɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni ɓani ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛli ɓakuɓalɛv̤i ɓɔna ɓaja kunɡ̤ɛna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓaz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ iz̤iɡ̤ǁ̤ina z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a aɓalɛv̤i ɓɔmŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛlɔwɔ ɛpʰɛtʰɛ iintɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa ɔnɡ̤ɔwumɓi ɔnɡ̤ɛnajɔ ɛnɮwini makaɓulawɛ ɓaɓɛ nɔkumkani ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwakʰɛ nasɛkupʰumɛni kwakʰɛ ɓɛnz̤a kɛ aɓalɛv̤i namajud̤a ɔnkɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awaɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ ujɛhɔjad̤a umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓatʰaɓatʰa ɛlɔwɔ amad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ aɓɛnɡ̤ɛna nɡ̤ɛsaɓatʰa naɓɛpʰuma nɡ̤ɛsaɓatʰa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔjad̤a umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli akawand̤ululanɡ̤a amakǃɛla lawɔ ujɛhɔjad̤a umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli waɓanika aɓatʰɛtʰɛlimakʰulu iint͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ nɛɛnɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ namakʰaka aɓɛnɡ̤akakumkani ud̤av̤id̤ɛ aɓɛsɛnɮwini katʰikǁɔ waɓamisa ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɛlɔwɔ ɛnɛɛntɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni ɓatʰaɓatʰɛla kwɛlɔkunɛnɛ iɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓa lɛnɮu ɓɛsa kwɛlɔkʰɔɬɔ iɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓa lɛnɮu nɡ̤asɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni nanɡ̤asɛnɮwini nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɓamkʰupʰɛla pʰanɮɛ uɲana wɔkumkani ɓamfaka isit͡sʰaɓa ɓamnika isiŋ̤ǃ̤inisɔ ɓamɛnz̤a ujɛhɔjad̤a nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓamtʰamɓisa ɓatʰi makaɮɛ uɓɔmi utʰɛ uatalija akusiv̤a isand̤i saɓantu ɓɛɡ̤id̤ima ɓɛd̤umisa wɛz̤a ɛɓantwini ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a wakʰanɡ̤ɛla wamɓɔna ɛmi ɛnd̤awɛni ɛpʰakamilɛjɔ ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni aɓatʰɛtʰɛli naɓav̤utʰɛlimakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ ɓɛnɡ̤akukumkani aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɓɛv̤uja ɓɛv̤utʰɛla amakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ iimv̤umi z̤inɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɔkuv̤uma z̤iɬaɓɛla awɔkud̤umisa uatalija waz̤ik͡xaz̤ula iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ watʰi likǀɛɓɔ likǀɛɓɔ ujɛhɔjad̤a umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ aɓatʰɛtʰɛlimakʰulu aɓav̤ɛlɛli ɓɔmkʰɔsi watʰi kuɓɔ mkʰupʰɛlɛni pʰanɮɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤intlu ɔmland̤ɛlajɔ makaɓulawɛ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓɛsitʰi umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli makanɡ̤aɓulawɛlwa ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɓamkʰwɛlɛla kɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔmɓini waja ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ lamahaʃɛ ɛnɮwini jɔkumkani ɓamɓulalɛla kʰɔna wɛnz̤a ujɛhɔjad̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ pʰakatʰi kwakʰɛ naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ nɔkumkani ukuɓa ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓantu ɓakajɛhɔv̤a ɓaja ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɛnɮwini kab̤ahali ɓajid̤iliz̤a nɛz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤akʰɛ nɛmifanɛkisɔ jakʰɛ ɓajikǃʰɛkɛz̤a ɓamɓulala umatan umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kab̤ahali pʰamɓi kwɛz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ujɛhɔjad̤a aɓav̤ɛlɛli ɓɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛsanɮa saɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓanɡ̤aɓalɛv̤i awaɓaɬulɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa ɓaɲusɛ amad̤ini aɲukajɔ kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔ kub̤aliwɛjɔ ɛmjalɛlwɛni kamɔsɛs ɓɛnɔv̤ujɔ nɛɛnɡ̤ɔma nɡ̤ɔkɔ kumisɛlwɛ nɡ̤ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wamisa aɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inimasanɡ̤ɔ ɛmasanɡ̤wɛni ɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ukuz̤ɛ kunɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni ujiŋǃamɓi nanɡ̤antɔni watʰaɓatʰa aɓatʰɛtʰɛlimakʰulu nɛz̤in̤an̤a naɓalawuli ɓaɓantu naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛliz̤wɛ wɛɬa nɔkumkani ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɓanɡ̤ɛna nɡ̤ɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɛlipʰɛz̤ulu lɛnɮu jɔkumkani ɓamɓɛka ɛtrɔnɛni jɔkumkani ɓav̤uja kɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ umz̤i waz̤ɔla ɓamɓulala kɛ uatalija nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ujɔwaʃɛ uɓɛmiɲaka isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛmaʃumi manɛ ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina ɓɛlinɡ̤ut͡sib̤ɛja wasɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a ujɔwaʃɛ wɛnz̤a ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a jɔnkɛ imiɬa kajɛhɔjad̤a umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ujɛhɔjad̤a wamz̤ɛkɛla aɓafaz̤i aɓaɓini waz̤ala ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi kwatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ kwaɓa sɛntliz̤ijwɛni kajɔwaʃɛ ukuɓa ajiɬaz̤ijɛ inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a waɓaɬanɡ̤anisa aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i watʰi kuɓɔ pʰumani nijɛ ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a niɓutʰɛ kumasirajɛli ɔnkɛ jɔkujiɬaz̤ija inɮu katʰikǁɔ wɛnu imiɲaka nɡ̤ɛmiɲaka jikʰawulɛz̤isɛni lɔɔ ntɔ kɛ aɓalɛv̤i aɓajikʰawulɛz̤isanɡ̤a ukumkani wamɓiz̤a ujɛhɔjad̤a umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔmkʰulu watʰi kujɛ jini ukuɓa unɡ̤aɓav̤ɛlɛli aɓalɛv̤i ɓajiz̤isɛ ixafu kumajud̤a nasɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔkɔmjalɛlɔ kamɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a nɔwɛɓanɮa lamasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛntɛntɛ jɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤inisɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uatalija mfaz̤i unɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓaɓɛjiɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤ilɛ inɮu katʰikǁɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤ɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ɓaɓɛz̤ɛnz̤ɛ ɛz̤ɔɔb̤ahali watʰi maɓɛnz̤ɛ umkʰɔmɓɛ ɓawuɓɛkɛ ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ ɓatʰumɛla iliz̤wi kwajud̤a nasɛjɛrusalɛm ukuɓa kuz̤iswɛ kujɛhɔv̤a ixafu ɛjamiswa nɡ̤umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i katʰikǁɔ pʰɛz̤u kwamasirajɛli ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɓav̤uja ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓajiz̤isa ɓajipʰɔsa ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni wad̤a waz̤ala kwatʰi kɛ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkuz̤iswa kɔmkʰɔmɓɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa saɓalɛv̤i kuɓav̤ɛlɛli ɓɔkumkani ɓakuɓɔna ukuɓa ininz̤i wɛz̤a umb̤ali wɔkumkani nɔmv̤ɛlɛli wɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔmkʰulu ɓajikʰupʰa ɛsɛmkʰɔmɓɛni ɓaz̤a ɓawutʰwala ɓawuɓujisɛla ɛnd̤awɛni jawɔ ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ imiɬa nɡ̤ɛmiɬa ɓaɬanɡ̤anisa janinz̤i ukumkani nɔjɛhɔjad̤a ɓajinikɛla kuɓɛnz̤i ɓɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛnkɔnz̤ɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɓɔna ɓakǃɛʃa aɓakǁʰɔli ɓamatʲɛ nɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi z̤ɛmitʰi ukuɓa ɓajiɬaz̤ijɛ inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi z̤ɛsiɲiti nɛz̤ɔb̤ɛd̤u ukuɓa z̤ilunɡ̤isɛ inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ɓasɛɓɛnz̤a kɛ aɓɛnz̤i ɓɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛɲuka umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɔkujiɬaz̤ija ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤aɓɔ ɓajimisa inɮu katʰikǁɔ jaz̤inz̤iswa jaz̤iɲaswa ɓakujiɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa ɓajiz̤isa ɛsɛlɛjɔ pʰamɓi kɔkumkani nɔjɛhɔjad̤a ɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤ajɔ iimpaɬa z̤ɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a iimpaɬa z̤ɔkulunɡ̤isɛlɛla nɛz̤amad̤ini aɲukajɔ nɛɛnkamɓa nɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛz̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɓajɛ ɓɛɲusa amad̤ini aɲukajɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ jɔnkɛ imiɬa kajɛhɔjad̤a kɛ ujɛhɔjad̤a wajɛsɛlɛjinɡ̤wɛv̤u ɛhamɓisɛkilɛ ɛɓud̤alɛni kwakʰɛ ɛɓɛmiɲaka ilikʰulu linamaŋǀi matʰatʰu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ kwakʰɛ ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ kɔɔkumkani nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛnz̤a ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kwasirajɛli nakutʰikǁɔ nakwinɮu jakʰɛ ɛmv̤a kɔkufa kukajɛhɔjad̤a ɓɛz̤a aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakwajud̤a ɓakǃuɓud̤a waz̤a waɓapʰulapʰula ɓajiʃija inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ ɓakʰɔnz̤a ɔɔaʃɛra nɛz̤itʰikǁɔ afikɛlwa ɓuɓuxalaxumɛ amajud̤a nɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛlɔ tʲala lawɔ watʰuma aɓaprɔfɛti kuɓɔ ɓɔkuɓaɓujisɛla kujɛhɔv̤a ɓaɓakǃɔnɔnɔnd̤isa kɛ ɓɔna aɓapʰulapʰula nɔkɔ umɔja katʰikǁɔ wamtʰi ɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰu uz̤ɛkarija uɲana kajɛhɔjad̤a umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wɛma pʰɛz̤u kwaɓantu watʰi kuɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ utʰikǁɔ ukutʰi jini ukuɓa nijiɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛ imitʰɛtʰɔ kajɛhɔv̤a niz̤ɛ ninɡ̤aɓi nampumɛlɛlɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nimʃijilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wɔniʃija ɓamkǀɛɓa ɓamkǁuluɓa nɡ̤amatʲɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔmtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkumkani ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni jɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ujɔwaʃɛ akajikʰumɓula iŋǀɛɓa aɓɛjɛnz̤ilɛ ujɛhɔjad̤a ujisɛ kaz̤ɛkarija kujɛ wɛsuka wamɓulala uɲana wakʰɛ ɛkufɛni kwakʰɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a wɔkʰanɡ̤ɛla aɓuz̤ɛ kwatʰi ɛkupʰɛlɛni kɔmɲaka jɛɲuka jɛz̤a kujɛ jamaaram ɛz̤a kwajud̤a nasɛjɛrusalɛm aɓat͡ʃaɓalalisa ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaɓantu ɛɓantwini ɔnkɛ amakǁʰɔɓa awɔ awatʰumɛla wasɛd̤amaskɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jamaaram jɛz̤a inamad̤ɔd̤a amɓalwa ujɛhɔv̤a wanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sawɔ ɛninz̤i kunɛnɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛmʃijilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ amɡ̤wɛɓa kɛ ujɔwaʃɛ ɛkumkɛni kwawɔ kujɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa amʃija ɛnɛɛntlunɡ̤u ɛz̤inkulu ɓamkǀɛɓa aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamaɡ̤az̤i ɔɔɲana ɓakajɛhɔjad̤a umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓamɓulalɛla ɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlwɛni sakʰɛ ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ kɛ aɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛlanɡ̤a ɛmaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni ɔɔkumkani aɓɔ kɛ ɓamkǀɛɓajɔ nɡ̤uz̤ab̤ad̤i uɲana kaʃimɛhati umamɔnikaz̤i nɔjɔz̤ab̤ad̤i uɲana kaʃimriti ummɔwab̤ikaz̤i kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nɔɓuninz̤i ɓɛz̤iɬaɓɔ ɛz̤imsɔnɡ̤ɛlajɔ nɔkusɛkwa kwɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ nanz̤ɔ z̤ib̤aliwɛ ɛz̤iŋǀwad̤ini z̤amaɓali ɔɔkumkani uamat͡sija uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ uamat͡sija uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini anamiɬanu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛmaʃumi maɓini anɛsitʰɔɓa ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina ɓɛlinɡ̤ujɛhɔwad̤an wasɛjɛrusalɛm wɛnz̤a ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a kɔd̤wa kunɡ̤ɛnɡ̤antliz̤ijɔ ipʰɛlɛlɛjɔ kwatʰi ɓakukǃinisɛlwa uɓukumkani kujɛ waɓaɓulala aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ aɓaɓɛɓulɛlɛ ujisɛ kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ akaɓaɓulalanɡ̤a kwand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kub̤aliwɛjɔ ɛmjalɛlwɛni ɛŋǀwad̤ini kamɔsɛs apʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɓɛwisɛ kʰɔna umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkutʰi maɓanɡ̤aɓulawa ɔɔjisɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɔɲana nɔɔɲana maɓanɡ̤aɓulawa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɔjisɛ ɛlɔwɔ makaɓulawɛ nɡ̤ɛsakʰɛ isɔnɔ uamat͡sija wawaɬanɡ̤anisa amajud̤a ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ nɡ̤ɔkwaɓatʰɛtʰɛlimawaka nanɡ̤ɔkwaɓatʰɛtʰɛlimakʰulu kuwɔ ɔnkɛ amajud̤a namab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin waɓaɓala ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kɔmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini ɛz̤ɛlwɛ kuɲusɛ waɓafuma ɓɛnɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰatʰu amad̤ɔd̤ana anɔkupʰuma umkʰɔsi ɛpʰɛtʰɛ iintɔnɡ̤a namakʰaka wakǃɛʃa kumasirajɛli ikʰulu amaɡ̤ɔxa anɔɓuk͡xɔti nɡ̤ɛkʰulu lɛɛtalɛntɛ z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ kwɛz̤a kɛ umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ kujɛ ɛsitʰi kumkani mawunɡ̤ahamɓi nawɛ umkʰɔsi wamasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akakʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kumasirajɛli kɔɔɲana ɓɔnkɛ ɓakwaɛfrajim hamɓa wɛd̤wa wɛnz̤ɛ wɔmɛlɛlɛ ɛkulwɛni utʰikǁɔ akaji pʰamɓi kɔt͡ʃaɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰikǁɔ unamanɮa ɔkuŋǀɛd̤a nawɔkuwisa uamat͡sija watʰi kumfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ lija kutʰiwani ikʰulu lɛɛtalɛntɛ ɛnd̤alinika umkʰɔsi wamasirajɛli watʰi umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ ujɛhɔv̤a anɡ̤akunika ɔkuninz̤i kunɔkɔ uamat͡sija kɛ wajaɬula lɛjɔ jajiz̤ɛ kujɛ iv̤ɛla kwaɛfrajim ukuɓa ijɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jajɔ wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ wajɔ kunɛnɛ nɡ̤akumajud̤a ɓaɓuja ɓaja ɛnd̤awɛni jaɓɔ ɓɛv̤utʰa nɡ̤umsind̤ɔ uamat͡sija waz̤ɔmɛlɛz̤a waɓakǃʰuɓa aɓantu ɓakʰɛ waja ɛsiɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni sɛtʲuwa waɓulala kɔɔɲana ɓakwasɛhirɛ iʃumi ɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a ɓalitʰimɓa ɛliɲɛ iʃumi liɬɛli ɓaɓasa ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa lɛjɔ ɓaɓapʰɔsa pʰant͡si ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa ɓaɮab̤uka ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla kɛ aɓɔmkʰɔsi awaɓaɓujisajɔ uamat͡sija ukuɓa ɓanɡ̤aji najɛ ɛkulwɛni ɓajinɡ̤ɛnɛla imiz̤i jakwajud̤a ɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kwasamari ɓɛsa ɛb̤ɛtɛhɔrɔn ɓaɓulala kujɔ amatʰatʰu ɓapʰanɡ̤a intɔ ɛninz̤i jamakǁʰɔɓa kwatʰi ɛmv̤a kɔkuɓuja kukaamat͡sija ɛkuwaɓulalɛni amaɛd̤ɔm wɛz̤isa iz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakwasɛhirɛ waz̤imisa ukuɓa z̤iɓɛ z̤iz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤akʰɛ wakǃuɓud̤a pʰamɓi kwaz̤ɔ wakǃʰumisɛla kuz̤ɔ wawutʰa umsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a kuamat͡sija watʰumɛla umprɔfɛti kujɛ watʰi kujɛ jini ukuɓa ukǃukǃɛlɛ iz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤aɓantu ɛz̤inɡ̤aɓaɬanɡ̤ulanɡ̤a aɓantu ɓaz̤ɔ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ kwatʰi ɛsatʰɛtʰa najɛ watʰi kujɛ sikumisilɛ jini ukuɓa uɓɛ nɡ̤umpʰakatʰi wɔkumkani jɛka jini ukuɓa uz̤iɓɛtʰisɛ wajɛka umprɔfɛti watʰi nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa utʰikǁɔ uɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ kwɛlɔkuɓa akut͡ʃaɓalalisɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukwɛnz̤ilɛ ɔku akwalipʰulapʰula ikǀɛɓɔ uamat͡sija wakwajud̤a watʰaɓatʰa ikǀɛɓɔ watʰumɛla kujɔwaʃɛ uɲana kajɛhɔwahaz̤i uɲana kajɛhu wakwasirajɛli watʰi kʰawuz̤ɛ sikǃwalasɛlanɛ nɡ̤amɛɬɔ ujɔwaʃɛ wamasirajɛli watʰumɛla kuamat͡sija wakwajud̤a watʰi ikʰakakʰaka ɛlisɛlɛb̤anɔn latʰumɛla kumsɛd̤arɛ ɔsɛlɛb̤anɔn lisitʰi uɲana mnikɛ intɔmɓi jakʰɔ iɓɛ nɡ̤umkakʰɛ kɛ ixamŋǀwa lasɛlɛb̤anɔn laɮula lalib̤ukǃa ikʰakakʰaka ɛlɔ utʰi jaɓɔna nd̤iwaɓulɛlɛ amaɛd̤ɔm jakupʰakamisa intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ ukuɓa uz̤iz̤ukisɛ ɬala kalɔku ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ jini ukuɓa ɔkunɛnɛ ufɛkɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuɓi uwɛ wɛna namajud̤a anawɛ akapʰulapʰula uamat͡sija nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔkɔ kwakupʰuma kutʰikǁɔ ukuz̤ɛ aɓanikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛkǃukǃɛlɛ iz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤akwaɛd̤ɔm wɛɲuka kɛ ujɔwaʃɛ wakwasirajɛli ɓakǃwalasɛlana nɡ̤amɛɬɔ jɛna nɔamat͡sija wakwajud̤a ɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ ɛkwajud̤a atʲɛlwa kɛ amajud̤a nɡ̤amasirajɛli asaɓa janɡ̤ulɔwɔ waja ɛntɛntɛni jakʰɛ ujɔwaʃɛ wakwasirajɛli wamɓamɓa uamat͡sija wakwajud̤a uɲana kajɔwaʃɛ uɲana kajɛhɔwahaz̤i ɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ wamz̤isa ɛjɛrusalɛm walukǃʰɛkɛz̤a ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lwasɛjɛrusalɛm ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lakwaɛfrajim wɛsa ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɛmɓɔmɓɔ iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imakʰulu manɛ wajitʰaɓatʰa jɔnkɛ iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛmpaɬa jɔnkɛ ɛjafumanɛkajɔ ɛnɮwini katʰikǁɔ ɛɓinɔɔb̤ɛd̤iɛd̤ɔm nɔɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓɛnɮu jɔkumkani naɓafɔ aɓaz̤iz̤iɓamɓisɔ waɓujɛla kwasamari uamat͡sija uɲana kajɔwaʃɛ wakwajud̤a ɛmv̤a kɔkufa kukajɔwaʃɛ uɲana kajɛhɔwahaz̤i wakwasirajɛli waɓa miɲaka iliʃumi linɛsiɬanu ɛsiɮa uɓɔmi ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikaamat͡sija ɛz̤ɔkukǃala nɛz̤ɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla asiz̤ɛz̤ɔ z̤ib̤aliwɛjɔ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a naɓakwasirajɛli kɛ kalɔku ɛmv̤ɛni kwɛkǁɛʃa awatʲɛka nɡ̤alɔ uamat͡sija ɛkumland̤ɛlɛni ujɛhɔv̤a ɓamkǀɛɓa ɛjɛrusalɛm wasaɓɛla ɛlakiʃɛ ɓamsukɛla ɓamfumana ɛlakiʃɛ ɓamɓulalɛla kʰɔna ɓamtʰwala nɡ̤amahaʃɛ ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla kɔjisɛ ɛmz̤ini wakwajud̤a ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓakwajud̤a ɓamtʰaɓatʰa uuz̤ija akuɓɔn ukuɓa umiɲaka iliʃumi linamitʰand̤atʰu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ɓamɛnz̤a ɛsikʰunɮɛni sikaamat͡sija ujisɛ jakʰiwa nɡ̤ujɛ iɛlɔti wajiɓujisɛla kumajud̤a ɛmv̤a kɔkulala kɔkumkani kɔɔjisɛ uuz̤ija uɓɛmiɲaka iliʃumi ɛlinamitʰand̤atʰu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛmaʃumi maɬanu anamiɓini ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina liɓɛ linɡ̤ujɛkɔlija wasɛjɛrusalɛm wɛnz̤a ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ uamat͡sija ujisɛ wamkǃukǃɛla utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kaz̤ɛkarija ɔwamfund̤isajɔ ukumɔjika utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔkumkǃukǃɛla kwakʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wamɛnz̤a wanɛmpumɛlɛlɔ wapʰuma namafilisti walukǃʰɛkɛz̤a ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lwasɛɡ̤ati nɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a lwasɛjab̤ɛnɛ nɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a lwasɛaʃd̤ɔd̤ɛ wakʰa imiz̤i kummanɮa wasɛaʃd̤ɔd̤ɛ napʰakatʰi kwamafilisti utʰikǁɔ wamŋǀɛd̤a kumafilisti nakumaarab̤i aɬɛli ɛɡ̤urb̤ahali nakumamahan amaamɔn uuz̤ija umnikɛlɔ iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ lad̤uma lad̤a laja ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛjiputa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɔmɛlɛla wad̤a wɛɲuka uuz̤ija wakʰa iiŋǃaɓa ɛz̤ind̤ɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɛmɓɔmɓɔ nasɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔmfula nasɛmɓɔmɓɛni jɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a waz̤iŋǃaɓisa kɛ wakʰa iiŋǃaɓa ɛz̤ind̤ɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ wɛmɓa amakǃula amaninz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa imfujɔ jakʰɛ jaɓɛ ininz̤i kwɛlɛntili nakwɛlamatʰafa uɓɛnaɓalimi ɓɔm̤laɓa naɓɛz̤id̤ilija ɛz̤intaɓɛni nasɛkarmɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wajɛtʰand̤a um̤laɓa uuz̤ija uɓɛnɛmpi ɛlwajɔ ɛpʰuma umkʰɔsi nɡ̤amakǃɛla nɡ̤ɛnani lɔkuɓalwa kwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikajɛhuwɛli umb̤ali nɔmahasɛja umpʰatʰi pʰant͡si kɔlawulɔ hananija ɔnɡ̤ɔmɲɛ wakuɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔkumkani lɔnkɛ lɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ lamaɡ̤ɔxa anɔɓuk͡xɔti lalinɡ̤amawaka amaɓini anamakʰulu matʰand̤atʰu nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwaɓɔ ɛpʰuma umkʰɔsi jajinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰatʰu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamakʰulu maɬanu alwajɔ anamanɮa ɔɓuk͡xɔti ukumŋǀɛd̤a ɛlut͡ʃaɓɛni uuz̤ija wawalunɡ̤isɛlɛla ɛmkʰɔsini wɔnkɛ iinɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ nɛz̤ikʰali nɛz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤inantlɔkɔ nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɛnt͡simɓi nɛz̤apʰɛtʰa namatʲɛ ɔkusawula wɛnz̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm ɔmaʃini aɓɛnz̤iwɛ nɡ̤ɔɓukǃili ɓɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi ɓɔkuɓa pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛŋǃaɓa ɛz̤ind̤ɛ napʰɛz̤u kɔkǃɔkǃɔ ukuɓa kutɔlwɛ nɡ̤ɛɛntɔlɔ kusawulwɛ nɡ̤amatʲɛ amakʰulu lad̤uma iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ lad̤a laja kud̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa waŋǀɛd̤wa nɡ̤ɔkuɓalulɛkilɛjɔ wad̤a wɔmɛlɛla utʰɛ kɛ akɔmɛlɛla japʰakama intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ wad̤a wɛnz̤a uɓuɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛnz̤a uɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ wanɡ̤ɛna ɛtɛmpilɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa akǃʰumisɛlɛ ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni sɛsikǃʰumisɔ uaz̤arija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wamland̤ɛla ɛnaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓakajɛhɔv̤a aɓanɡ̤amaʃumi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ amad̤ɔd̤a anɔɓuk͡xɔti ɓammɛla uuz̤ija ɓatʰi kujɛ asikɔkwakʰɔ uz̤ija ukukǃʰumisɛla kujɛhɔv̤a kɔkwaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakaarɔn aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛlwa ukukǃʰumisɛla pʰuma ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛnz̤a uɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ akuluz̤ukɔ ɔkɔ kuwɛ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wad͡ʒ̤ala uuz̤ija ɛpʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa isikǃʰumisɔ sɔkukǃʰumisɛla utʰɛ ɛsaɓad͡ʒ̤alɛlɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kwapʰuma ikǃʰɛŋǃa ɛɓunz̤ini lakʰɛ pʰamɓi kwaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɛnɡ̤asɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni sɔkukǃʰumisɛla uaz̤arija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔmkʰulu naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɔnkɛ ɓab̤ɛka kujɛ nankɔ ɛnɛkǃʰɛŋǃa ɛɓunz̤i ɓamɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa nɡ̤ɔɓuŋ̤ǁ̤amɔ kʰɔna waŋ̤ǁ̤ama najɛ ukupʰuma nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uɓɛmɓɛtʰilɛ wajɛ uuz̤ija ɛnɛkǃʰɛŋǃa kwad̤a kwajimini jɔkufa kwakʰɛ waɬala ɛnɮwini ɛjɔd̤wa ɛnɛkǃʰɛŋǃa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa waŋǃaɲulwa ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ujɔtam uɲana wakʰɛ wajipʰatʰa inɮu jɔkumkani ɛɓalawula aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikauz̤ija ɛz̤ɔkukǃala nɛz̤ɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla waz̤ib̤ala uisaja uɲana kaamɔt͡si umprɔfɛti uuz̤ija kɔɔjisɛ ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla nɡ̤akɔɔjisɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni wɔkuŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa wɔɔkumkani nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓatʰi unɛkǃʰɛŋǃa ujɔtam uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ ujɔtam uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini anamiɬanu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛliʃumi ɛlinamitʰand̤atʰu ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina lalinɡ̤ujɛruʃa intɔmɓi kat͡sad̤ɔki wɛnz̤a ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ uuz̤ija ujisɛ kɔd̤wa akanɡ̤ɛnanɡ̤a ɛtɛmpilɛni kajɛhɔv̤a kɛ aɓantu ɓɔna ɓaɓɛsaɓɛnz̤a uɓuɓi jɛna walakʰa isanɡ̤ɔ ɛlipʰɛz̤ulu lɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a wakʰa kakʰulu nasɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni lwasɛɔfɛlɛ wakʰa imiz̤i kwɛlɛɛntaɓa lakwajud̤a nasɛmaɬatʰini wakʰa iiŋǃaɓa nɛɛmɓɔnisɛlɔ walwa nɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn waɓɔjisa ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ɓamnika nɡ̤alɔɔ mɲaka ikʰulu lɛɛtalɛntɛ z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛʃumi ɛɛkɔrɛ z̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛʃumi ɛxasi ɔkɔ ɓapʰind̤a ɓakuz̤isa kujɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsiɓini nanɡ̤ɔwɛsitʰatʰu wɔmɛlɛla kɛ ujɔtam nɡ̤ɔkuɓa waz̤ikǃinisɛla iinɮɛla z̤akʰɛ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikajɔtam nɛɛmfaz̤wɛ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ nɛɛnɮɛla z̤akʰɛ nanz̤ɔ z̤ib̤aliwɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli naɓakwajud̤a uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini anamiɬanu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛliʃumi ɛlinamitʰand̤atʰu ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm ujɔtam kɔɔjisɛ ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ uahaz̤i uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ uahaz̤i uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛliʃumi ɛlinamitʰand̤atʰu ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm akakwɛnz̤a ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ ujisɛ wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛla z̤ɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ waɓɛnz̤ɛla ɔɔb̤ahali imifanɛkisɔ ɛtʰʲid̤iwɛjɔ wakǃʰumisɛla jɛna ɛmfulɛni wasɛb̤ɛn̤inɔm waɓat͡ʃisa ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ nɡ̤ɔkwamasikiz̤i ɛɛntlanɡ̤a awaz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤ajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a pʰamɓi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli waɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla wakǃʰumisɛla ɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni nasɛz̤ind̤ulini napʰant͡si kwɛmitʰi jɔnkɛ ɛluɬaz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ wamnikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wamaaram amɛjisa atʰimɓa kujɛ intɔ ɛninz̤i jaɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa aɓasa ɛd̤amaskɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ wanikɛlwa ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wakwasirajɛli upɛka waɓulala jakʰɛ kakʰulu upɛka uɲana karɛmalija waɓulala kumajud̤a ikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi amaɓini nɡ̤aminiɲɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛnɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a anɔɓuk͡xɔti nɡ̤ɔkuʃija kwaɓɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ uz̤ik͡xi iɡ̤ɔxa lakwaɛfrajim waɓulala umahasɛja uɲana wɔkumkani nɔaz̤ɛrikam inɡ̤anɡ̤a jɛnɮu jakʰɛ nɔɛlikana ɔnɡ̤anɛnɔ kɔkumkani ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓatʰimɓa kuɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ amakʰulu amaɓini aɓafaz̤i nɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɓaɓapʰanɡ̤a amakǁʰɔɓa amaninz̤i ɓawaz̤isa amakǁʰɔɓa lawɔ kwasamari apʰɔ kɛ ɓɛkukʰɔ umprɔfɛti kajɛhɔv̤a ɔɡ̤ama linɡ̤uɔd̤ɛd̤ɛ wapʰuma waja kukʰawulɛla umkʰɔsi ɔwawusiz̤a kwasamari watʰi kuɓɔ jaɓɔnani nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuʃuʃu ɓukajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjiɬɔ ɔɓukumajud̤a uwanikɛlɛ ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤ɛnu niɓaɓulɛlɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ ɔd̤ɛ waja kufikɛlɛla ɛmaz̤ulwini kalɔku kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakwajud̤a nɛjɛrusalɛm nitʰɛ nija kuɓaɲatʰɛla ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤amakʰɔɓɔka namakʰɔɓɔkaz̤ana kɔd̤wa aninatʲala kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nd̤ipʰulapʰulɛni nɡ̤ɔkɔ niɓaɓujisɛ aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa ɛnaɓatʰimɓa kuɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ kukajɛhɔv̤a kupʰɛz̤u kwɛnu kwɛsuka kɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwiintlɔkɔ z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛfrajim ɔɔaz̤arija uɲana kajɔhanan nɔb̤ɛrɛkija uɲana kamɛʃilɛmɔti nɔhɛz̤ɛkija uɲana kaʃalum nɔamasa uɲana kahad̤ɛlaji ɛma pʰamɓi kwaɓav̤ɛla ɛmkʰɔsini atʰi kuɓɔ ninɡ̤aɓaz̤isi apʰa aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa ukuz̤ɛ siɓɛ nɛtʲala kujɛhɔv̤a ukɔnɡ̤ɛz̤a ɛsɔnwɛni sɛtʰu nasɛtʲalɛni lɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɛnɛ likʰulu itʲala lɛtʰu nɔkuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ kupʰɛz̤u kwamasirajɛli aɓakǁʰɔɓilɛjɔ ɓaɓaʃija kɛ aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa namakǁʰɔɓa pʰamɓi kwaɓatʰɛtʰɛli nɛɓanɮa lɔnkɛ asuka kɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akʰankaɲwɛ nɡ̤amaɡ̤ama aɓatʰaɓatʰa aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa aɓamɓatʰisa ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛz̤ɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ nɡ̤amakǁʰɔɓa aɓamɓatʰisa aɓaŋǁiɓa iimɓad̤ad̤a aɓaɮisa aɓasɛz̤a aɓatʰamɓisa aɓatʰund̤ɛz̤a nɡ̤amaɛsilɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰʲafilɛjɔ aɓasa ɛjɛrikɔ kumz̤i wamasund̤u kuɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ wɔna aɓuja aja kwasamari nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa uahaz̤i watʰumɛla kɛ kɔɔkumkani ɓasɛasirija ukuɓa ɓaz̤ɛ kumŋǀɛd̤a nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔkɔ ɛz̤a amaɛd̤ɔm aɓulala amajud̤a atʰimɓa aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa namafilisti ajinɡ̤ɛnɛla imiz̤i jasɛz̤intilini nɛjasɛz̤ant͡si jakwajud̤a ajitʰimɓa ib̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ nɛajalɔn nɛɡ̤ɛd̤ɛrɔti nɛsɔkɔ namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ nɛtimna namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ nɛɡ̤imz̤ɔ namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ aɬala kʰɔna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a wawatʰɔɓa amajud̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kaahaz̤i wakwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛnz̤a iɲala kwajud̤a wɛnz̤a uɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utilɛɡ̤atipilɛnɛz̤ɛrɛ wasɛasirija wamfikɛla wamɓand̤ɛz̤ɛla akamɔmɛlɛz̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uahaz̤i wajɛjipʰanɡ̤ilɛ inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nɛnɮu jɔkumkani naɓatʰɛtʰɛli wasɛasirija akwamŋǀɛd̤a ntɔ nɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwa kwakʰɛ wapʰind̤a wɛnz̤a uɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ kujɛhɔv̤a jɛna uahaz̤i waɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla kwiz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤asɛd̤amaskɔ ɛz̤az̤imɛjisilɛ watʰi iz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤ɔɔkumkani ɓamaaram ɛz̤awaŋǀɛd̤ajɔ nd̤ɔɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla kuz̤ɔ z̤ɔnd̤iŋǀɛd̤a kɛ z̤ɔna z̤aɓa sisikʰuɓɛkisɔ kujɛ nakumasirajɛli ɔnkɛ uahaz̤i waz̤iɬanɡ̤anisa iimpaɬa z̤ɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ waz̤iŋǃuŋǃa iimpaɬa z̤ɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ waz̤iv̤ala iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤ɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a waz̤ɛnz̤ɛla iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛz̤imɓɔmɓɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm wɛnz̤a iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a ɛmiz̤ini jɔnkɛ nɡ̤amiɲɛ jakwajud̤a z̤ɔkukǃʰumisɛla tʰikǁwɛni ɓamɓi wamkǃumɓisa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤akʰɛ nɛɛnɮɛla z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɔkukǃala nɛz̤ɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla nanz̤ɔ z̤ib̤aliwɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a naɓakwasirajɛli uahaz̤i kɔɔjisɛ ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla kuwɔ umz̤i ɔjijɛrusalɛm kɛ aɓamz̤isanɡ̤a ɛmaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni ɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli uhɛz̤ɛkija uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ uhɛz̤ɛkija waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini anamiɬanu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛmaʃumi maɓini anɛsitʰɔɓa ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina lalinɡ̤uab̤ija intɔmɓi kaz̤ɛkarija wɛnz̤a ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ujisɛ jɛna nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɔkukǃala wɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɔkukǃala waz̤iv̤ula iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤ɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a waz̤ilunɡ̤isa waɓanɡ̤ɛnisa aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i waɓaɬanɡ̤anisɛla ɛɓalɛni lanɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a watʰi kuɓɔ nd̤ipʰulapʰulɛni ɓalɛv̤i z̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛni kalɔku jiŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛni inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjiɬɔ nikukʰupʰɛ ukuŋ̤ǀ̤ɔla ɔkusɛnd̤awɛni ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔɔɓawɔ ɓɛnz̤a uɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ ɓɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ɓamʃija ɓaɓusɔnɡ̤a uɓusɔ ɓaɓɔ ɛmŋǃuɓɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ɓawunikɛla ikʰɔsi kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɓaz̤iv̤ala iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤ɛv̤arand̤a ɓaz̤ikǀima iz̤iɓanɛ aɓakǃʰumisɛla nɡ̤ɛsikǃʰumisɔ aɓawaɲusa amad̤ini aɲukajɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni kutʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ afikɛlwa amajud̤a nɛjɛrusalɛm ɓuɓuxalaxumɛ ɓukajɛhɔv̤a wawanikɛla aɓa jintɔ jɔkufɛkɛtʰa nɛjɔkumanɡ̤alisa nɛjɔmsɔnɮɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nikuɓɔnajɔ nɡ̤amɛɬɔ ɛnu jaɓɔna ɓawilɛ ɔɔɓawɔ lik͡xɛlɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɛtʰu nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤ɛtʰu naɓafaz̤i ɓɛtʰu ɓasɛkutʰind͡ʒ̤wɛni nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nɡ̤ɔku kɛ kusɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam ukumɛnz̤ɛla umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli kuɓujɛ kutʰi ukuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ ɲana ɓam kunɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuhiliz̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uniɲulɛ ukuz̤ɛ nimɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ nilunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ kujɛ niɓɛ nɡ̤aɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛli naɓakǃʰumisɛli kujɛ ɓasuka kɛ aɓalɛv̤i ɔɔmahati uɲana kaamasaji nɔjɔwɛli uɲana kaaz̤arija kɔɔɲana ɓamakɔhati nakɔɔɲana ɓakamɛrari ukiʃɛ uɲana kaab̤ɛd̤i nɔaz̤arija uɲana kajɛhalɛlɛli nakumaɡ̤ɛrʃɔn ujɔwa uɲana kaz̤ima nɔɛd̤ɛn uɲana kajɔwa kɔɔɲana ɓakaɛlit͡safan uʃimri nɔjɛhijɛli nakɔɔɲana ɓakaasafu uz̤ɛkarija nɔmatanija nakɔɔɲana ɓakahɛman ujɛhijɛli nɔʃimɛhi kɔɔɲana ɓakajɛd̤utun uʃɛmaja nɔuz̤ijɛli ɓaɓaɬanɡ̤anisa kɛ aɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ ɓaz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisa ɓanɡ̤ɛna nɡ̤ɔkɔmtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkumkani nɡ̤amaz̤wi kajɛhɔv̤a ukujiɬamɓulula inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ɓanɡ̤ɛna pʰakatʰi kwɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ukuz̤ɛ ɓajiɬamɓululɛ ɓajikʰupʰa jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛjiŋǃamɓi aɓajifumanajɔ ɛtɛmpilɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ɓajisa ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni jɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a aɓalɛv̤i ɓajitʰaɓatʰa ukuz̤ɛ ɓajikʰupʰɛlɛ pʰanɮɛ ɓajisɛ ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni ɔjikid̤rɔn ɓakǃala ukuŋ̤ǀ̤walisa nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɔkukǃala nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɔkukǃala nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ wɛɲanɡ̤a lɛjɔ ɓafika ɛv̤arand̤ɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ɓajiŋ̤ǀ̤walisa kɛ inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a imiɬa ɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsitʰand̤atʰu wɛɲanɡ̤a jɔkukǃala ɓanɡ̤ɛna ɓaja kuhɛz̤ɛkija ɓatʰi sijiɬamɓululɛ inɮu jɔnkɛ kajɛhɔv̤a nɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nɛɛmpaɬa z̤asɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nɛtafilɛ jɛz̤ɔnka ɛz̤ikǀwaŋ̤ǀ̤iswajɔ nɛɛmpaɬa z̤ajɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɔnkɛ awaz̤ilaɬajɔ uahaz̤i nɡ̤ɛkǁa lɔkulawula kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnz̤a uɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ siz̤ilunɡ̤isilɛ saz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisa nanz̤ɔ z̤ipʰamɓi kwɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sikajɛhɔv̤a wav̤uka uhɛz̤ɛkija waɓaɬanɡ̤anisa aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓawɔ umz̤i wɛɲuka waja ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɓaz̤isa iinkunz̤i ɛz̤int͡ʃa z̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa z̤asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɛɛmv̤ana z̤asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ z̤asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ukuɓa z̤iɓɛ lid̤ini lɛsɔnɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓukumkani nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnd̤awɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamajud̤a watʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakaarɔn aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli maɓɛnz̤ɛ amad̤ini aɲukajɔ ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni sikajɛhɔv̤a ɓaz̤ikǁʰɛla iinkɔmɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓalamkɛla iɡ̤az̤i ɓalit͡ʃiz̤a ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni ɓaz̤ikǁʰɛla iinkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa ɓalit͡ʃiz̤a iɡ̤az̤i ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni ɓaz̤ikǁʰɛla iimv̤ana ɓalit͡ʃiz̤a iɡ̤az̤i ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni ɓaz̤iz̤isa iinkunz̤i z̤ɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ z̤ɛd̤ini
