lɛsɔnɔ pʰamɓi kɔkumkani nɛɓanɮa ɓakǀinɛz̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ pʰɛz̤u kwaz̤ɔ ɓaz̤ikǁʰɛla aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ukuɓa ɓawakǀamaɡ̤uʃɛlɛ amasirajɛli ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkulɛnz̤a ɲulu iɡ̤az̤i laz̤ɔ ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛtʰɛ makɛnz̤ɛlwɛ ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nɛd̤ini lɛsɔnɔ waɓamisa aɓalɛv̤i ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɓɛnamakǀaŋ̤ǀ̤i ɓɛnɛmixub̤ɛ ɓɛnɛɛhad̤i nɡ̤ɔkɔmtʰɛtʰɔ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ nɔɡ̤ad̤i imɓɔni jɔkumkani nɔnatan umprɔfɛti nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lɔɔ mtʰɛtʰɔ uɓunɡ̤ɔkajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤aɓaprɔfɛti ɓakʰɛ ɓɛma aɓalɛv̤i ɓɛnɛmpaɬa kad̤av̤id̤ɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛnamakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ watʰi uhɛz̤ɛkija makuɲuswɛ id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni litʰɛ lakukǃalwa id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ jakǃala inɡ̤ɔma kajɛhɔv̤a namakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɬaɓɛla kwɛɛmpaɬa z̤ikad̤av̤id̤ɛ wakwasirajɛli lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa lakǃuɓud̤a iimv̤umi z̤iv̤uma aɓav̤utʰɛlimakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ ɓɛv̤utʰɛla ɔkɔ kɔnkɛ kwɛnz̤iwa lad̤a laɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwa id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ kwakuɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwa ukuɲuswa id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓafumanɛka ɓɛnajɛ ɓaɡ̤ukǃa ɓakǃuɓud̤a ɓatʰi ɔɔhɛz̤ɛkija naɓatʰɛtʰɛli maɓamd̤umisɛ ujɛhɔv̤a aɓalɛv̤i nɡ̤amaz̤wi kad̤av̤id̤ɛ nakaasafu imɓɔni ɓamd̤umisa kɛ ɓad̤a ɓav̤uja ɓatʰɔɓa ɓakǃuɓud̤a wapʰɛnd̤ula uhɛz̤ɛkija watʰi kunɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ niz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisilɛ kujɛhɔv̤a jiz̤ani niz̤isɛ imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɛjɔmɓulɛlɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a lajiz̤isa kɛ iɓanɮa imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɛjɔmɓulɛlɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛkǃʰutʲwa jintliz̤ijɔ ɓaz̤isa amad̤ini aɲukajɔ inani lamad̤ini aɲukajɔ ɛlawaz̤isajɔ iɓanɮa lalinɡ̤amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛɛnkɔmɔ nɛkʰulu lɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa namakʰulu amaɓini ɛɛmv̤ana ɛz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤aɓa z̤ɛz̤ɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisiwɛjɔ iinkɔmɔ z̤aɓa nɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu amatʰatʰu ɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ kɔd̤wa aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓaɓɛmɓalwa aɓaɓa nakuwaɬinz̤a ɔnkɛ amad̤ini aɲukajɔ ɓaɓaɓamɓisa kɛ aɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ aɓalɛv̤i wad̤a waɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwa lɔɔ msɛɓɛnz̤i ɓad̤a ɓaz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisa aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓalɛv̤i ɓaɓɛtʰɛ tʲɛ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ ukuz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisa kunaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ amad̤ini aɲukajɔ aɓa maninz̤i ɛnamaŋǃatʰa ɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔkǁɔlɔ nɛminikɛlɔ ɛtʰululwajɔ jawɔ amad̤ini aɲukajɔ jakǃinisɛlwa kɛ inkɔnz̤ɔ jɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a kɛ uhɛz̤ɛkija naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓakuv̤ujɛla ɔkɔ utʰikǁɔ akukǃinisɛlɛ aɓantu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lɛ ntɔ jɛnz̤iwa nɡ̤ɛsikǃupʰɛ watʰumɛla uhɛz̤ɛkija kuwɔ ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli namajud̤a kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ wab̤ala iiŋǀwad̤i ɛz̤ija kumaɛfrajim namamanasɛ ukuɓa kuz̤iwɛ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm kwɛnz̤iwɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukumkani wakǀɛɓisana naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ nɛɓanɮa lɔnkɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm ukuɓa kwɛnz̤iwɛ nɡ̤ɛjɛsiɓini iɲanɡ̤a kuɓa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɛnakujɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛlililɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓajɛ ɓɛnɡ̤az̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkwanɛlɛjɔ naɓantu ɓajɛ ɓɛnɡ̤az̤iɬanɡ̤anisɛlanɡ̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm lɔɔ nd̤awɔ jatʰi tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɔkumkani nasɛmɛɬwɛni ɛɓanɮa lɔnkɛ ɓamisa ind̤awɔ jɔkuɓa lihand͡ʒ̤iswɛ iliz̤wi kumasirajɛli ɔnkɛ kutʰatʲatʰɛlwɛ ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a kusɛ kwad̤an ukuɓa ɓaz̤ɛ kwɛnz̤a kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wamasirajɛli ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ajɛnz̤anɡ̤a ɓɛɓaninz̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kub̤aliwɛjɔ z̤ahamɓa iz̤iɡ̤id̤imi z̤inɛɛŋǀwad̤i ɛz̤iv̤ɛla ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤ɔkumkani nɛz̤aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ z̤aja kuwɔ ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli namajud̤a z̤atʰi nɡ̤ɔkɔmjalɛlɔ wɔkumkani nina ɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓujɛlani kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kaaɓraham nɔisakɛ nɔsirajɛli aɓujɛlɛ kwaɓasɛlɛjɔ aɓasind̤ilɛjɔ ɛsanɮɛni sɔɔkumkani ɓasɛasirija musani ukuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɔjiɬɔ nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu aɓɛnz̤a uɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjiɬɔ waɓanikɛla ɓaɓa jintɔ jɔkumanɡ̤alisa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nikuɓɔnajɔ musani ukujɛnz̤a lukʰuni nɡ̤ɔku intamɔ jɛnu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɔjiɬɔ mnikɛni ujɛhɔv̤a isanɮa niz̤ɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni jakʰɛ aɓɛjiŋ̤ǀ̤walisilɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ nimkʰɔnz̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu kuɓujɛ ukuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukuɓa nitʰɛ naɓujɛla kujɛhɔv̤a aɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu nɔɔɲana ɓɛnu ɓɔfumana imfɛsanɛ kwaɓaɓatʰimɓilɛjɔ ɓaɓujɛlɛ kwɛli liz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɔɓaɓalɔ unɛmfɛsanɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu akaji kuɓufiɬa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ ukuɓa nitʰɛ naɓujɛla kujɛ iz̤iɡ̤id̤imi ɛz̤ɔ z̤atʰunɡ̤ɛla imiz̤i nɡ̤ɛmiz̤i ɛz̤wɛni lakwaɛfrajim nɛlakwamanasɛ z̤ɛsa kwɛlakwaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn ɓaz̤iɬɛka ɓaz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛla kɔd̤wa amad̤ɔd̤a atʰilɛ akwaaʃɛrɛ nawakwamanasɛ nawakwaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn az̤itʰɔɓa ɛz̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ isanɮa sikatʰikǁɔ saɓakʰɔ kwajud̤a ukuɓa aɓanikɛ ntliz̤ijɔɲɛ jɔkwɛnz̤a umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkumkani nɔwaɓatʰɛtʰɛli nɡ̤ɔwɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kwaɬanɡ̤ana ɛjɛrusalɛm aɓantu aɓaninz̤i ukuz̤ɛ ɓɛnz̤ɛ umtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ wɛz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsiɓini ɓaɓa liɓanɮa ɛlikʰulu kunɛnɛ ɓɛsuka ɓaz̤isusa iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤isɛjɛrusalɛm ɓaz̤isusa z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ikǃʰumisɛlɔ ɓaz̤ipʰɔsa ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni ɔjikid̤rɔn ɓajikǁʰɛla nɡ̤ɔlwɛʃumi ɛlinɛsinɛ lwɛjɛsiɓini iɲanɡ̤a aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i ɓaz̤id̤anɛla ɓaz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisa ɓaz̤isa amad̤ini aɲukajɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɓɛma ɛnd̤awɛni jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ laɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔmjalɛlɔ kamɔsɛs umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓalit͡ʃiz̤a iɡ̤az̤i lajɔ ɓɛlitʰaɓatʰa ɛsanɮɛni saɓalɛv̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛɓaninz̤i ɛɓanɮɛni aɓɛ ɓɛnɡ̤az̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisanɡ̤a aɓalɛv̤i ɓamɛla ukukǁʰɛla nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓaz̤iiŋǃamɓi ukuɓa iimv̤ana z̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛlwɛ kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓuninz̤i ɓaɓantu aɓaninz̤i aɓaɓɛv̤ɛlɛ kwaɛfrajim nakwamanasɛ kwaisakarɛ nakwaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn ɓajɛ ɓɛnɡ̤az̤iɬamɓululanɡ̤a ɓajiɮa nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤ɛnɡ̤amtʰɛtʰɔ kɔd̤wa uhɛz̤ɛkija waɓatʰand̤az̤ɛla ɛsitʰi wanɡ̤a ujɛhɔv̤a ɔlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ anɡ̤amkǁɔlɛla ɛlɔwɔ ujib̤ɛkisɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ ɛkumkǃukǃɛlɛni utʰikǁɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ nakuɓa kunɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwɛntlamɓululɔ jɛnd̤awɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wamv̤a uhɛz̤ɛkija waɓapʰilisa aɓantu ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓafuɲanwajɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm ɓawɛnz̤a kɛ umtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ wɛz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ imiɬa ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓɛv̤uja kakʰulu ɓɛmd̤umisa ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛɛmini aɓalɛv̤i naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɡ̤ɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɔkumz̤ukisa ujɛhɔv̤a uhɛz̤ɛkija watʰɛtʰa kakuɬɛ naɓɔ aɓalɛv̤i ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛnɔkujikǃɔnd̤a kakuɬɛ inkɔnz̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɓaɮa kɛ umtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ imiɬa ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓɛɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔkǁɔlɔ ɓɛɓulɛla kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ iɓanɮa lɔnkɛ lakǀɛɓisana ukwɛnz̤a nɛsiɲɛ isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ sɛmiɬa ɓasɛnz̤a kɛ isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ sɛmiɬa ɓɛv̤uja nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uhɛz̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a walixumɛla iɓanɮa lɛɛnkunz̤i ɛz̤int͡ʃa z̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓalixumɛla iɓanɮa lɛɛnkunz̤i ɛz̤int͡ʃa z̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ aliʃumi ɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ ɓaz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisa aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓaninz̤i lav̤uja lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa lakwajud̤a naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i nɛɓanɮa lɔnkɛ ɛlav̤ɛla kwasirajɛli naɓasɛmz̤ini aɓav̤ɛla kwasirajɛli kwanaɓaɬɛli kwajud̤a kwaɓakʰɔ uv̤ujɔ ɔlukʰulu kɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kususɛla z̤ikasɔlɔmɔn uɲana kad̤av̤id̤ɛ wakwasirajɛli akuz̤anɡ̤a kuɓɛkʰɔ ntɔ ind͡ʒ̤alɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm ɓɛsuka ɓɛma aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓalɛv̤i ɓaɓasikɛlɛla aɓantu iliz̤wi laɓɔ lav̤iwa nɔmtʰand̤az̤ɔ waɓɔ wanɡ̤ɛna ɛkʰajɛni lakʰɛ ɛliŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛmaz̤ulwini kwakuɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwa kɔnkɛ ɔkɔ apʰuma ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli afumanɛkilɛjɔ kʰɔna aja ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a az̤ikǃʰɛkɛz̤a iz̤imisɔ z̤amatʲɛ aɓaɡ̤awula ɔɔaʃɛra az̤id̤iliz̤a iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a nɛz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ kulɔ lɔnkɛ ɛlakwajud̤a nɛlakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɛlakwaɛfrajim nɛlakwamanasɛ kwad̤a kwaɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwa ɓaɓuja ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛlɔwɔ waja ɛlifɛni lakʰɛ ɛmiz̤ini jakɔwaɓɔ uhɛz̤ɛkija amakǃɛla aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nawaɓalɛv̤i nɡ̤ɔkwamakǃɛla aɓɔ ɛlɔwɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i wakʰɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i waɓamisɛla amad̤ini aɲukajɔ nɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔkǁɔlɔ ukuɓa ɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ ɓaɓulɛlɛ ɓad̤umisɛ ɛmasanɡ̤wɛni ɛmiŋǃuɓa kajɛhɔv̤a isaɓɛlɔ sɔkumkani sasɛmpaɬɛni jakʰɛ saɓa sɛsamad̤ini aɲukajɔ amad̤ini aɲukajɔ kwanawanɡ̤ɔkuɬwa namad̤ini aɲukajɔ ɛsaɓatʰa nawɔkutʰwasa kwɛɲanɡ̤a nawɛmitʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔ kub̤aliwɛjɔ ɛmjalɛlwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a uhɛz̤ɛkija watʰi kuɓantu kuɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm maɓanikɛ isaɓɛlɔ saɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i ukuz̤ɛ ɓaɓamɓɛlɛlɛ ɛmjalɛlwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a lakuv̤akala ɛlɔ liz̤wi ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaz̤isa intɔ ɛninz̤i jɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ɔkukǃala z̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛwajini nɛɔli nɔɓusi nɔliɓɔ lɔnkɛ ɓaz̤isa kakʰulu isiʃumi sɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli naɓakajud̤a aɓaɬɛlɛlijɔ ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a naɓɔ ɓaz̤isa isiʃumi sɛɛnkɔmɔ nɛsɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛsiʃumi sɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛlwɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɓaz̤iɓɛka iimfumɓa nɡ̤ɛɛmfumɓa ɓakǃala nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsitʰatʰu ukuz̤ɛnz̤a iimfumɓa ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓɛz̤a ɔɔhɛz̤ɛkija naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaz̤iɓɔna iimfumɓa ɛz̤ɔ ɓaɓulɛla kujɛhɔv̤a nakuɓantu ɓakʰɛ amasirajɛli waɓaɓuz̤a uhɛz̤ɛkija aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i nɡ̤ɛɛmfumɓa ɛz̤ɔ watʰi uaz̤arija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔjintlɔkɔ ɔwɛnɮu kat͡sad̤ɔki kujɛ kusɛlɔkɔ kwakǃalwajɔ ukuz̤iswa imixumɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a sid̤ɛ saɬutʰa saʃija kakʰulu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uɓasikɛlɛlɛ aɓantu ɓakʰɛ lɛ ntɔ inɡ̤aka jɛsɛlɛjɔ watʰi uhɛz̤ɛkija makulunɡ̤iswɛ amaɡ̤umɓi ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɓaz̤ilunɡ̤isa kɛ ɓawunɡ̤ɛnisa umxumɔ nɛz̤iʃumi nɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisiwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkukʰɔlɛkilɛjɔ umpʰatʰi waz̤ɔ iɓijinɡ̤anɡ̤a ukɔnanija umlɛv̤i nɔʃimɛhi wakʰɛ ɔɓɛnɡ̤ɔwɛsiɓini nɔjɛhijɛli nɔaz̤az̤ija nɔnahati nɔasahɛli nɔjɛrimɔti nɔjɔz̤ab̤ad̤i nɔɛlijɛli nɔisɛmakija nɔmahati nɔb̤ɛnaja ɓɛnɡ̤aɓav̤ɛlɛli pʰant͡si kwɛsanɮa sikakɔnanija nɔʃimɛhi wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔmmisɛlɔ kahɛz̤ɛkija nɔaz̤arija inɡ̤anɡ̤a jɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ ukɔrɛ uɲana kaimna umlɛv̤i ɔnɡ̤ɔwɛsanɡ̤ɔ lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a uɓɛmɛlɛ iminikɛlɔ katʰikǁɔ jaɓakǃʰutʲwa jintliz̤ijɔ ukuɓa awaɓɛ umxumɔ kajɛhɔv̤a nɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤ijiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kaɲɛ nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwɛsanɮa sakʰɛ iɓinɡ̤uɛd̤ɛn nɔmiɲamin nɔjɛʃuwa nɔʃɛmaja nɔamarija nɔʃɛkanija ɛmiz̤ini jaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɲanisa ukuɓa ɓaɓɛlɛ aɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤amakǃɛla aɓakʰulu kwand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓaŋǀinanɛ ijɔd̤wa intɔ ɛjind̤ɔd̤a ɛb̤alwɛ ɛmiliɓɛni jɔkuz̤alwa ɛtʰaɓatʰɛlɛ kɔmiɲaka mitʰatʰu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ kwɛɲusa kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓanɡ̤ɛnajɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ukwamkɛla intɔ jɛmini nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛmini jajɔ jɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i waɓɔ ɛz̤iɡ̤ǁ̤inɛni z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwamakǃɛla aɓɔ ukub̤alwa kwaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛmiliɓɛni jɔkuz̤alwa kuɓɛ kunɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ naɓalɛv̤i ɓɛɓɛsɛz̤iɡ̤ǁ̤inɛni z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwamakǃɛla aɓɔ ɓatʰaɓatʰɛla kɔmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini ɛz̤ɛlwɛ kwɛɲusa ukuɓa kwaɓɛlwɛ iint͡sat͡ʃana z̤aɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ib̤aliwɛjɔ ɛmiliɓɛni jɔkuz̤alwa aɓafaz̤i ɓaɓɔ nɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤aɓɔ kwiɓanɮa lɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɲanisa kwaɓɔ ɓaz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisa kɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɔɲana ɓakaarɔn aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓaɓɛsɛm̤laɓɛni wamaɮɛlɔ ɛmiz̤i jaɓɔ ɛmiz̤ini nɡ̤ɛmiz̤i jɔnkɛ kuɓɛ kukʰɔ amad̤ɔd̤a akǁɛliwɛjɔ nɡ̤amaɡ̤ama ɔkujaɓɛla iz̤aɓɛlɔ intɔ jɔnkɛ ɛjind̤ɔd̤a kuɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓab̤aliwɛjɔ ɛmiliɓɛni jɔkuz̤alwa kuɓalɛv̤i wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ uhɛz̤ɛkija kumajud̤a ɔnkɛ wɛnz̤a ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ nɔkuɲanisilɛjɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ nasɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini nɔkuɓa nɡ̤uwupʰi awawukǃalajɔ wɛnkɔnz̤ɔ jɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ nɔmjalɛlɔ nɔmtʰɛtʰɔ ukuɓa amkǃukǃɛlɛ utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ wawɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ wapʰumɛlɛla ɛmv̤ɛni kwɛz̤i z̤intɔ nɔku kuɲanisa wɛz̤a usanɛrib̤ɛ wasɛasirija walinɡ̤ɛnɛla ɛlakwajud̤a waŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a imiz̤i ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ watʰi uja kuz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤ɛla watʰi uhɛz̤ɛkija akuɓɔna ukuɓa ujɛz̤a usanɛriɓɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ ɛɓub̤ɛkisɛ ɛkulwɛni nɛjɛrusalɛm wakǀɛɓisana naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ namaɡ̤ɔxa akʰɛ ukuɓa ɓawav̤alɛ amanz̤i ɛmitʰɔmɓɔ ɛnɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kɔmz̤i ɓamŋǀɛd̤a kɛ kwaɓutʰɛlana aɓantu aɓaninz̤i ɓawav̤ala ɔnkɛ amasɔ ɛmitʰɔmɓɔ nɔmland͡ʒ̤ana ɔɓukǃukukǃɛla pʰakatʰi kwɛliz̤wɛ ɓatʰi jini ukuɓa ɔɔkumkani ɓasɛasirija ɓɛz̤ɛ ɓafumanɛ amanz̤i amaninz̤i waz̤ɔmɛlɛz̤a walwakʰa lɔnkɛ ud̤ɔnɡ̤a ɔlwalud̤iliz̤iwɛ wɛɲusa iiŋǃaɓa ɛz̤ind̤ɛ pʰɛz̤u kwalɔ wakʰa nɔluɲɛ ud̤ɔnɡ̤a nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ wajikǃinisɛla imilɔ jɔmz̤i kad̤av̤id̤ɛ wɛnz̤a iz̤ikʰali nɛɛnɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ ɛz̤ininz̤i wamisa aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛmfaz̤wɛ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓantu waɓaɓutʰɛla kujɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jɛmɓutʰɔ jasɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔmz̤i watʰɛtʰa kakuɬɛ naɓɔ watʰi jɔmɛlɛlani nikʰalipʰɛ ukɔjika ukukǃʰipʰuka umɓilini nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛasirija najiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jɔnkɛ anajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaninz̤i aɓanɡ̤akutʰi pʰɛz̤u kwaɓanɡ̤akujɛ ɔkunajɛ jinɡ̤alɔ jɛɲama ɔkunatʰi nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ukuɓa asiŋǀɛd̤ɛ alwɛ amad̤aɓi ɛtʰu aɓantu ɓajama ɛmaz̤wini kahɛz̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ usanɛrib̤ɛ wasɛasirija watʰumɛla ɛjɛrusalɛm aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ jɛna ɛnɡ̤asɛlakiʃɛ ɛnaɓalawuli ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ kuhɛz̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a nakumajud̤a ɔnkɛ asɛjɛrusalɛm ɛsitʰi ut͡ʃɔ usanɛrib̤ɛ wasɛasirija ukutʰi nikʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤antɔni niɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɛkuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤wɛni ɛjɛrusalɛm akanilaɬɛkisi uhɛz̤ɛkija jini ukuɓa aninikɛlɛ ɛkufɛni jinɮala nakukuŋǁanwa nɡ̤ɔkutʰi ɔku ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu wɔniɬanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wasɛasirija asinɡ̤uhɛz̤ɛkija lɔ uz̤isusilɛjɔ iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ nɛz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤akʰɛ watʰi kumajud̤a nakwijɛrusalɛm kǃuɓud̤ani pʰamɓi kwasiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ siɲɛ nikǃʰumisɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kwasɔ anijaz̤i intɔ ɛnd̤ajɛnz̤ajɔ nɔɔɓawɔ ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤amaz̤wɛ ɓaɓa nakɔ nɔkuɓa nakɔ ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɛɛntlanɡ̤a z̤amaz̤wɛ ukuwaɬanɡ̤ula amaz̤wɛ az̤ɔ ɛsanɮɛni nɡ̤uwupʰi kɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛz̤ɔ ntlanɡ̤a ɓaz̤isinɡ̤ɛla pʰant͡si ɔɔɓawɔ ɔwaɓa nakɔ ukuɓaɬanɡ̤ula aɓantu ɓakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni ukuɓa aɓɛ nakɔ utʰikǁɔ wɛnu ukuniɬanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ makanɡ̤anilukuɬi uhɛz̤ɛkija makanɡ̤anikʰɔɬisi nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ musani ukukʰɔlwa nɡ̤ujɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akuɓanɡ̤akʰɔ namɲɛ utʰikǁɔ waz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a nɛz̤ikumkani ɔwaɓa nakɔ ukuɬanɡ̤ula aɓantu ɓakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni nasɛsanɮɛni sɔɔɓawɔ wɔɓɛka pʰi kɛ jɛna utʰikǁɔ wɛnu akaji kuniɬanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni ɓaɓuja ɓatʰɛtʰa aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ nanɡ̤ɔhɛz̤ɛkija umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɛ wab̤ala iŋǀwad̤i jɔkumŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɛtʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ajɛ ɛsitʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɛɛntlanɡ̤a z̤amaz̤wɛ ɓɛnɡ̤aɓaɬanɡ̤ulanɡ̤a aɓantu ɓaɓɔ ɛsanɮɛni nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ akaji kuɓaɬanɡ̤ula nɔtʰikǁɔ kahɛz̤ɛkija aɓantu ɓakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni ɓamɛmɛz̤a nɡ̤ɛliz̤wi ɛlikʰulu nɡ̤ɛsijud̤a ɛɓantwini ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm aɓaɓɛsɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni ɓɛɓɔjikisa ɓɛɓapʰɛlisa amanɮa ukuz̤ɛ ɓawutʰimɓɛ lɔɔ mz̤i ɓatʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ wɛjɛrusalɛm nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛz̤anɮa z̤aɓantu ɓatʰand̤az̤a kɛ uhɛz̤ɛkija nɔisaja uɲana kaamɔt͡si umprɔfɛti nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ɓakʰala ɓasinɡ̤isa ɛmaz̤ulwini ujɛhɔv̤a watʰuma isitʰuɲwa sɛz̤ulu sawɛnz̤a atʰi ʃwaka ɔnkɛ amaɡ̤ɔxa anɔɓuk͡xɔti nɛɛnɡ̤anɡ̤a naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɛmkʰɔsini wɔkumkani wasɛasirija waɓuja uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ ɓutʰɛ kʰunuɓɛmɓɛ waja ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɛ wanɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini jɔtʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ ɓatʰi aɓaɓɛpʰumɛ ɛz̤iɓilinini z̤akʰɛ ɓamwisa kʰɔna nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wamsind̤isa kɛ uhɛz̤ɛkija naɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm ɛsanɮɛni sikasanɛrib̤ɛ wasɛasirija nasɛsanɮɛni saɓanɡ̤aɓamɓi waɓakʰusɛla nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɓaɓa ɓaninz̤i aɓaz̤isa umnikɛlɔ kujɛhɔv̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm nɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋǃaɓilɛjɔ kuhɛz̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a wapʰakaɲiswa ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛɛntlanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤ɔ wajɛsifa uhɛz̤ɛkija wajɛz̤a watʰand̤az̤a kujɛhɔv̤a watʰɛtʰa najɛ umkǃɔnd̤isɔ kɛ uhɛz̤ɛkija akaɓujɛkɛz̤anɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkupʰatʰwa kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ japʰakama ɓafikɛlwa ɓuɓuxalaxumɛ jɛna namajud̤a nɛjɛrusalɛm waz̤itʰɔɓa uhɛz̤ɛkija ɛkupʰakamɛni kwɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ jɛna naɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm aɓaɓafikɛla nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kahɛz̤ɛkija uɓuxalaxumɛ ɓukajɛhɔv̤a uhɛz̤ɛkija uɓɛnɔɓutʲɛɓi nɔz̤ukɔ ɔlukʰulu kunɛnɛ waz̤ɛnz̤ɛla iz̤inɮu z̤ɔɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɔɓɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɔɓamatʲɛ aŋǃaɓilɛjɔ nɔɓɔɓulawu nɔɓɛɛnɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ nɔɓɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ nɔɔv̤imɓa ɓɛndʲɛɓɔ jɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛjɛwajini nɛjɛɔli nɛz̤itali z̤ɛɛntlɔɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ nɛz̤iɓaja z̤ɛmiɬamɓi waz̤ɛnz̤ɛla imiz̤i jaɓalusi ɓɛmfujɔ jɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛjɛɛnkɔmɔ ɛz̤ininz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰikǁɔ uɓɛmnikɛ impaɬa ɛninz̤i kunɛnɛ uhɛz̤ɛkija lɔ waliv̤ala itʰɛnd̤ɛ ɛlipʰɛz̤ulu lamanz̤i asɛɡ̤ihɔn wawahamɓisa nɡ̤apʰant͡si ɛsinɡ̤a nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a kɔmz̤i kad̤av̤id̤ɛ uhɛz̤ɛkija wapʰumɛlɛla ɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini wakʰɛ wɔnkɛ kɔd̤wa kɛ ɛmkǀimɓini waɓatʰuɲwa aɓanɡ̤amakʰumʃa aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓasɛb̤ab̤ɛli aɓaɓɛtʰuɲiwɛ kujɛ ɓɛɓuz̤isa nɡ̤ɛsimanɡ̤a ɛsaɓakʰɔ ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɛ utʰikǁɔ wamʃija ukuɓa amlinɡ̤ɛ akwaz̤i kɔnkɛ ɔkusɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɛ ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikahɛz̤ɛkija nɔkwɛnz̤a kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǀɛɓa nankɔ kub̤aliwɛ ɛmɓɔnwɛni kaisaja uɲana kaamɔt͡si umprɔfɛti ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a naɓakwasirajɛli uhɛz̤ɛkija kɔɔjisɛ ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛla ɛnd̤ulini jamaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ amz̤ukisa ɛkufɛni kwakʰɛ amajud̤a naɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm umanasɛ uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ umanasɛ uɓɛmiɲaka iliʃumi linamiɓini ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛmaʃumi maɬanu anamiɬanu ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkwamasikiz̤i ɛɛntlanɡ̤a awaz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤ajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a pʰamɓi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli waɓuja waz̤akʰa iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a awaz̤id̤iliz̤ajɔ uhɛz̤ɛkija ujisɛ waɓamisɛla ɔɔb̤ahali iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɛnz̤a ɔɔaʃɛra wawuŋǃula umkʰɔsi wɔnkɛ wɛz̤ulu wawukʰɔnz̤a waz̤akʰa iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a awatʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kusɛjɛrusalɛm apʰɔ lija kuɓa kʰɔna iɡ̤ama nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ wawakʰɛla iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɔnkɛ umkʰɔsi wɛz̤ulu ɛz̤intɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni z̤ɔmɓini z̤ɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a jɛna waɓakǀand̤isa ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɛmlilwɛni ɛmfulɛni wakwab̤ɛn̤inɔm waɓa litɔla waɬaɓa iz̤iɬaɓɔ wakʰafula aɓanɛʃɔlɔɡ̤u nɔɔsijaz̤i wakwand̤isa ukwɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa amkǃumɓisɛ wawumisa umfanɛkisɔ ɔkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ aɓɛwɛnz̤ilɛ ɛnɮwini katʰikǁɔ awatʰi utʰikǁɔ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ nakusɔlɔmɔn uɲana wakʰɛ kujɔ lɛ nɮu nasɛjɛrusalɛm ɛnd̤ijiɲulilɛjɔ ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwasirajɛli nd̤ija kuliɓɛka kʰɔna iɡ̤ama nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ nd̤inɡ̤apʰind̤i nd̤ilususɛ uɲawɔ lwamasirajɛli ɛm̤laɓɛni ɛnd̤awumisɛla ɔɔjiɬɔ kɔd̤wa maɓaɓɛ ɓajakuɡ̤ǀ̤ina ukukwɛnz̤a kɔnkɛ ɛnd̤iɓawisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔmjalɛlɔ wɔnkɛ nɛmimisɛlɔ namasikɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikamɔsɛs kɛ umanasɛ wawalaɬɛkisa amajud̤a naɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm ukuɓa ɓɛnz̤ɛ ɔkuɓi nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a awaz̤it͡ʃaɓalalisajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a pʰamɓi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ujɛhɔv̤a watʰɛtʰa kumanasɛ nakuɓantu ɓakʰɛ aɓapʰulapʰula ujɛhɔv̤a waɓafikisɛla aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔmkʰɔsi wɔkumkani wasɛasirija ɓamɓamɓa umanasɛ nɡ̤amakʰɔŋ̰ǀ̰ɔ ɓamkʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰a nɡ̤amakʰamand̤ɛla ɔb̤ɛd̤u ɓamsa ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛkuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛni kwakʰɛ wamɓɔnɡ̤ɔz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ waz̤itʰɔɓa kakʰulu pʰamɓi kɔtʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ watʰand̤az̤a kujɛ watʰand̤az̤ɛka jɛna nɡ̤ujɛ wakuv̤a ukutaxuz̤isa kwakʰɛ wamɓujisɛla ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛɓukumkanini ɓakʰɛ waz̤i kɛ umanasɛ ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ujɛ ɔnɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ wakʰa ud̤ɔnɡ̤a ɔlunɡ̤apʰanɮɛ lɔmz̤i kad̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a lwaja ɛɡ̤ihɔn ɛsiɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni lwaja ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni nɡ̤ɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɛɛntlanz̤i wajiz̤unɡ̤ulɛz̤a iɔfɛlɛ walupʰakamisa kakʰulu wamisa aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛmpi ɛmiz̤ini jɔnkɛ ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ kwajud̤a waɓasusa ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a nɛmifanɛkisɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nɛz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤ɔnkɛ aɓɛz̤akʰɛ ɛntaɓɛni jɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nasɛjɛrusalɛm waz̤ipʰɔsa nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kɔmz̤i wakʰa isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sikajɛhɔv̤a waɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla pʰɛz̤u kwasɔ imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔkǁɔlɔ nɛjɔmɓulɛlɔ watʰi kumajud̤a makamkʰɔnz̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli aɓantu ɓɛɓɛsaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla nɔkɔ ɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni kɔd̤wa ɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla kɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ jɛd̤wa ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikamanasɛ nɔmtʰand̤az̤ɔ wakʰɛ kutʰikǁɔ nɔkutʰɛtʰa kwɛɛmɓɔni ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤itʰɛtʰa kujɛ ɛɡ̤amɛni likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli nanz̤ɔ z̤isɛmikǀimɓini jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli nɔmtʰand̤az̤ɔ wakʰɛ nɔkutʰand̤az̤ɛka kukatʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ujɛ nɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤akʰɛ nɔkumɛnɛz̤a kwakʰɛ nɛɛnd̤awɔ awakʰɛla kuz̤ɔ iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a ɔɔaʃɛra nɛmifanɛkisɔ ɛkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛkaz̤itʰɔɓi nanz̤ɔ z̤ib̤aliwɛ ɛmikǀimɓini kahɔz̤aji umanasɛ kɔɔjisɛ waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ uamɔn uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ uamɔn uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini anamiɓini ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛmiɓini ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ umanasɛ ujisɛ uamɔn waɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla kwimifanɛkisɔ jɔnkɛ ɛkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ awajɛnz̤ajɔ umanasɛ ujisɛ wajikʰɔnz̤a akaz̤itʰɔɓanɡ̤a pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ waz̤itʰɔɓajɔ umanasɛ ujisɛ kɛ jɛna lɔ amɔn walikʰulisa itʲala aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓamkǀɛɓa ɓamɓulala ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɓaɓaɓulala ɓɔnkɛ aɓakǀɛɓi aɓɔ ɓɔkumkani uamɔn aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɓamɛnz̤a ujɔsija uɲana wakʰɛ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ ujɔsija uɓɛmiɲaka isib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛmaʃumi matʰatʰu anamɲɛ ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm wɛnz̤a ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛla z̤ikad̤av̤id̤ɛ ujisɛ akatʲɛkɛla nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ nanɡ̤asɛkʰɔɬɔ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ wɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ ɛsɛmŋǀinanɛ wakǃala wamkǃukǃɛla utʰikǁɔ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ujisɛ nanɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɓini wakǃala wawaɬamɓulula amajud̤a nɛjɛrusalɛm kwiz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a nɔɔaʃɛra nɛmifanɛkisɔ ɛkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ nɛtʰʲid̤iwɛjɔ ɓaz̤id̤iliz̤a pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤ɔɔb̤ahali nɛɛnt͡sika z̤ɛlanɡ̤a ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤ipʰɛz̤u kwaz̤ɔ waz̤iɡ̤awula ɔɔaʃɛra nɛmifanɛkisɔ ɛkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ nɛtʰʲid̤iwɛjɔ wajapʰula wajikǀɔla jalutʰuli wajisasaz̤a pʰɛz̤u kwamaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa aɓɔ ɓaɓɛɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ kujɔ wawat͡ʃisa amatʰamɓɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli pʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤aɓɔ wawaɬamɓulula kɛ amajud̤a nɛjɛrusalɛm nasɛmiz̤ini jakwamanasɛ nɛjakwaɛfrajim nɛjakwasimɔn kwɛsa kwɛjakwanafɛtali ɛmaŋǁuwɛni az̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ waz̤id̤iliz̤a iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ waɓakǃɔɓa ɔɔaʃɛra nɛmifanɛkisɔ ɛkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ wajikǀɔla jalutʰuli waz̤iɡ̤awula z̤ɔnkɛ iint͡sika z̤ɛlanɡ̤a ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lakwasirajɛli waɓujɛla ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ wɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ ɛkuliɬamɓululɛni kwakʰɛ iliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ nɛnɮu lɛjɔ watʰuma uʃafan uɲana kaat͡salija nɔmahasɛja umpʰatʰi wɔmz̤i nɔjɔwa uɲana kajɔwahaz̤i umkʰumɓuz̤i wɛz̤intɔ z̤akɔmkʰulu ukuɓa ɓajiɬaz̤ijɛ inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ ɓɛz̤a kuhilɛkija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔjintlɔkɔ ɓajinikɛla ɛɓiz̤isiwɛ ɛnɮwini katʰikǁɔ aɓajiɓutʰajɔ aɓalɛv̤i aɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inimɲanɡ̤ɔ ɛjaɓɛ iv̤ɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni samamanasɛ namaɛfrajim nakumakǃɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔ ɔnkɛ akwasirajɛli nakuwɔ ɔnkɛ amajud̤a namab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɓaɓujɛla ɛjɛrusalɛm ɓajinikɛla ɛsanɮɛni saɓɛnz̤i ɓɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i aɓaɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ɓajinikɛla kuɓɛnz̤i ɓɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i aɓaɓɛsɛɓɛnz̤a ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa ɓajilunɡ̤isɛ ɓajiɬaz̤ijɛ inɮu lɛjɔ ɓajinikɛla kɛ kwiiŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi z̤ɛmitʰi nakuɓakʰi ukuɓa kutʰɛnɡ̤wɛ amatʲɛ akǁʰɔliwɛjɔ nɛmitʰi jɛmikǃad̤i jɔkuɬanɡ̤anisa nɛjɔpʰaɬa lwɛz̤inɮu aɓaɓɛz̤iwisilɛ ɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ ɛɓɛsɛɓɛnz̤a kulɔɔ msɛɓɛnz̤i ɛɲanisɛkilɛ aɓapʰatʰi ɓawɔ nɡ̤ujahati nɔɔb̤ad̤ija aɓalɛv̤i ɓakɔɔɲana ɓakamɛrari nɔz̤ɛkarija nɔmɛʃulam ɓakɔɔɲana ɓakakɛhati aɓɔkɔnɡ̤amɛla naɓalɛv̤i ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ ɓaz̤ikǃɔnd̤ajɔ iimpaɬa z̤ɔkuv̤uma ɓaɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ aɓatʰwali ɓɛmitʰwalɔ ɓɛɓɔnɡ̤amɛlɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓasɛɓɛnz̤i ɓɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i nɡ̤ɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i aɓaɲɛ aɓalɛv̤i ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓab̤ali namaɡ̤ɔsa naɓamasanɡ̤ɔ ɛkujikʰupʰɛni kwaɓɔ ɛɓiz̤iswɛ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a uhilɛkija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wajifumana iŋǀwad̤i jɔmjalɛlɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɛjab̤alwa nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikamɔsɛs wapʰɛnd̤ula uhilɛkija watʰi kuʃafan umb̤ali nd̤ijifumɛnɛ iŋǀwad̤i lɛjɔ jɔmjalɛlɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a uhilɛkija wajinika uʃafan lɛ ŋǀwad̤i uʃafan wajiz̤isa iŋǀwad̤i kand͡ʒ̤akɔ wamɓujisɛla iliz̤wi ɛsitʰi kɔnkɛ ɔɓɛkunikɛlwɛ ɛsanɮɛni saɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ɓajakwɛnz̤a ɓajikʰupʰɛlɛ ɛjafumanɛkajɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɓajinikɛla ɛsanɮɛni saɓapʰatʰi nasɛsanɮɛni saɓɛnz̤i ɓɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i uʃafan umb̤ali wakǁɛla ɛsitʰi uhilɛkija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli und̤inikɛ iŋǀwad̤i wajilɛsa uʃafan pʰamɓi kɔkumkani kwatʰi akuwɛv̤a amaz̤wi ɔmjalɛlɔ waz̤ik͡xaz̤ula iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ ukumkani waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ ɔɔhilɛkija nɔahikam uɲana kaʃafan nɔab̤ɛd̤ɔn uɲana kamika nɔʃafan umb̤ali nɔasaja umkʰɔnz̤i wɔkumkani ɛsitʰi jijani niɓuz̤isɛ kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamasalɛla akwasirajɛli nakwajud̤a malunɡ̤a namaz̤wi alɛ ŋǀwad̤i ifuɲɛnwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓukʰulu uɓuʃuʃu ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɔɓupʰalaz̤ɛlwɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɔɔɓawɔ ɓɛnɡ̤aliɡ̤ǀ̤inanɡ̤a iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa ɓɛnz̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kɔnkɛ kub̤aliwɛjɔ kulɛ ŋǀwad̤i waja kɛ uhilɛkija naɓakwakumkani kuhulid̤a umprɔfɛtikaz̤i umkaʃalum uɲana katɔkɛha uɲana kahasɛra umɡ̤ǀ̤ininɡ̤uɓɔ wajɛ jɛna ɛɬɛli ɛjɛrusalɛm kwɛsɛsiɓini isaɬulɔ sajɔ ɓatʰɛtʰa kujɛ nɡ̤ɔlɔ ɬɔɓɔ watʰi kuɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi nɔtʰi kulɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤a initʰumilɛjɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ijiz̤isɛla lɛ nd̤awɔ naɓɛmi ɓajɔ uɓuɓi z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ikǃalɛkisɔ ɛz̤ib̤aliwɛjɔ ɛŋǀwad̤ini aɓajilɛsilɛjɔ pʰamɓi kɔkumkani wakwajud̤a nɡ̤ɛtʰuɓa lɔkuɓa ɓand̤iʃijajɔ ɓakǃʰumisɛla tʰikǁwɛni ɓamɓi ukuz̤ɛ ɓand̤ikǃumɓisɛ nɡ̤ɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i wɔnkɛ wɛz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓɔpʰalaz̤wa kɛ uɓuʃuʃu ɓam kulɛ nd̤awɔ ɓunɡ̤aɓi nakukǀiɲwa kɛ wakwajud̤a ɔnitʰumɛ ukuɓa niɓuz̤isɛ kujɛhɔv̤a nɔt͡ʃɔ kujɛ ukutʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi ɔkwala maz̤wi uwav̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa iɓitʰamɓilɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ waz̤itʰɔɓa ɛɓuswɛni ɓukatʰikǁɔ ɛkuwɛv̤ɛni kwakʰɔ amaz̤wi akʰɛ malunɡ̤a nalɛ nd̤awɔ naɓɛmi ɓajɔ waz̤itʰɔɓa pʰamɓi waz̤ik͡xaz̤ula iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɔ pʰamɓi nd̤ikuv̤ilɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ujaɓɔna nd̤ija kukuɬanɡ̤anisɛla kɔɔjiɬɔ uɬanɡ̤anisɛlwɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni lakʰɔ unɔkǁɔlɔ anɡ̤aɓuɓɔni amɛlulɔ akʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ uɓuɓi ɛnd̤ijiz̤isɛla ɓɔna lɛ nd̤awɔ naɓɛmi ɓajɔ ɓamɓujisɛla kɛ iliz̤wi watʰumɛla kwaɬanɡ̤aniswa ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwajud̤a nɛjɛrusalɛm wɛɲuka waja ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a namad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ akwajud̤a naɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ kwatʰaɓatʰɛla kɔmkʰulu kwɛsa kɔmŋǀinanɛ wawalɛsɛla ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤aɓɔ ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi ɛŋǀwad̤i jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɛjafuɲanwa ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a wɛma pʰɛz̤u kwɛnd̤awɔ jakʰɛ ɛpʰakamilɛjɔ wɛnz̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a wɔkuland̤ɛla ujɛhɔv̤a nɔkuɡ̤ǀ̤ina imitʰɛtʰɔ jakʰɛ nɛz̤iŋ̤ǃ̤inɔ z̤akʰɛ nɛmimisɛlɔ jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ nanɡ̤ɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ wɔnkɛ ukuɓa ɛnz̤ɛ amaz̤wi alɔɔ mŋǃɔpʰisɔ ab̤aliwɛjɔ kulɛ ŋǀwad̤i waɓamisa kuwɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓafumanɛkajɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm nakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin aɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm ɓɛnz̤a kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ katʰikǁɔ utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ ujɔsija ɔnkɛ amasikiz̤i ɛmaz̤wɛni ɔnkɛ anɡ̤awɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli waɓakʰɔnz̤isa ɓɔnkɛ aɓafumanɛkajɔ kwasirajɛli ukuɓa ɓakʰɔnz̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ aɓatʲɛkanɡ̤a ɛkumland̤ɛlɛni ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ jɔnkɛ imiɬa jakʰɛ ujɔsija wɛnz̤a kujɛhɔv̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm ɓajikǁʰɛla nɡ̤ɔsuku lwɛʃumi ɛlinɛsinɛ lwɛɲanɡ̤a jɔkukǃala waɓamisa aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli pʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤iɡ̤ǁ̤ina z̤aɓɔ waɓɔmɛlɛz̤ɛla ɛnkɔnz̤wɛni jaɓɔ jɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a watʰi kuɓalɛv̤i aɓaɓɛkǃɔnd̤isa ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli aɓaɓɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a jiɓɛkɛni itʲɛja ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛnɮwini awajakʰajɔ usɔlɔmɔn uɲana kad̤av̤id̤ɛ wakwasirajɛli aniji kujitʰwala ɛmaɡ̤ǁ̤ɛni mkʰɔnz̤ɛni kalɔku ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu naɓantu ɓakʰɛ amasirajɛli z̤ilunɡ̤isɛni nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjiɬɔ nɡ̤ɔkwamakǃɛla ɛnu nɡ̤ɔkwɛsib̤alɔ sikad̤av̤id̤ɛ wakwasirajɛli nanɡ̤ɔkwɛsib̤alɔ sikasɔlɔmɔn uɲana wakʰɛ nitʰi ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni nimɛlɛ iz̤aɬulɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ z̤aɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ikǃɛla ɛli laɓalɛv̤i limɛlɛ inɮu ɛɲɛ jɔɔjisɛ niz̤ɛ nijikǁʰɛlɛ niz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛ nijilunɡ̤isɛlɛ aɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu kwɛnz̤iwɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikamɔsɛs ujɔsija waɓaxumɛla ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓafuɲanwajɔ kʰɔna impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ iimv̤ana namatakanɛ ɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɔnkɛ lawɔ anɡ̤awɛpasika ɛnɡ̤amawaka amaʃumi matʰatʰu amatʰatʰu ɛɛnkɔmɔ kɔnkɛ ɔkɔ kwapʰuma kwimfujɔ jɔkumkani aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ ɓaɓaxumɛla aɓantu naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i iminikɛlɔ jaɓakǃʰutʲwa jintliz̤ijɔ uhilɛkija nɔz̤ɛkarija nɔjɛhijɛli iinɡ̤anɡ̤a z̤ɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ ɓaɓanika aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli amaɓini anamakʰulu matʰand̤atʰu amatakanɛ anɡ̤awɛpasika namakʰulu amatʰatʰu ɛɛnkɔmɔ ukɔnanija nɔʃɛmaja nɔnatanijɛli aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ nɔhaʃab̤ija nɔjɛhijɛli nɔjɔz̤ab̤ad̤i aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaɓalɛv̤i ɓaɓaxumɛla aɓalɛv̤i amaɬanu amatakanɛ anɡ̤awɛpasika namakʰulu ɔmaɬanu ɛɛnkɔmɔ jalunɡ̤iswa kɛ inkɔnz̤ɔ lɛjɔ ɓɛma aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤aɓɔ aɓalɛv̤i ɛmakǃɛlɛni aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔmtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkumkani ɓajikǁʰɛla aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓatʰaɓatʰa iɡ̤az̤i ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤aɓɔ ɓalit͡ʃiz̤a aɓalɛv̤i ɓaɬinz̤a ɓakususa ɔkwamad̤ini aɲukajɔ ukuɓa kunikɛlwɛ kwiz̤aɬulɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ z̤ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu kusɔnd̤ɛz̤wɛ kujɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kub̤aliwɛjɔ ɛŋǀwad̤ini kamɔsɛs ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ nanɡ̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ ɓajɔsa nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisiwɛjɔ ɓaz̤ipʰɛka nɡ̤ɛɛmɓiz̤a nanɡ̤ɔŋ̤ǁ̤awu nanɡ̤ɛɛpani ɓaɡ̤id̤imisa kɔɔɲana ɓɔnkɛ ɓaɓantu ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ ɓaz̤ilunɡ̤isɛla nɡ̤ɔkwaɓɔ kwanaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakaarɔn ɓaɓɛɲusa amad̤ini aɲukajɔ namakǃatʰa kud̤ɛ kuɓɛ sɛɓusuku kɛ aɓalɛv̤i ɓaz̤ilunɡ̤isɛla nɡ̤ɔkwaɓɔ kwanaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakaarɔn iimv̤umi ɔɔɲana ɓakaasafu z̤iɓɛ z̤isɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤az̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔmtʰɛtʰɔ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ nɔasafu nɔhɛman nɔjɛd̤utun imɓɔni jɔkumkani naɓamasanɡ̤ɔ ɛmasanɡ̤wɛni nɡ̤amasanɡ̤ɔ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɛsuki ɛnkɔnz̤wɛni jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ aɓalɛv̤i ɓaɓɛɓalunɡ̤isɛla jalunɡ̤iswa kɛ jɔnkɛ inkɔnz̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤alɔɔ jɔkwɛnz̤a nɔkuɲusa amad̤ini aɲukajɔ ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni sikajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔmtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkumkani ujɔsija ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓaɓɛkʰɔ ɓajɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa nɔmtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ wɛz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ imiɬa ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓɛkunɡ̤az̤anɡ̤a kwɛnz̤iwɛ nɡ̤ɔkwalɛjɔ kwasirajɛli kususɛla kwimiɬa kasamuwɛli umprɔfɛti ɔɔkumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɓakwasirajɛli aɓaz̤anɡ̤a ɓɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkwalɔɔ wajɛnz̤ajɔ ujɔsija naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i nawɔ ɔnkɛ amajud̤a namasirajɛli aɓɛkʰɔna naɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm kwaɓa nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ wɔɓukumkani ɓukajɔsija ukwɛnz̤iwa kwalɔɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kwakɔ kɔnkɛ ukujilunɡ̤isa kukajɔsija inɮu lɛjɔ kwɛɲuka unɛkɔ wasɛjiputa ɛz̤a nɛkarkɛmiʃɛ nɡ̤asɛɛfrati ujɔsija wapʰuma waja najɛ watʰuma aɓatʰuɲwa kujɛ watʰi jintɔni ɛnam nawɛ wakwajud̤a and̤iz̤ɛ nawɛ nam̤la nd̤iz̤ɛ ɛnɮwini ɛnd̤ilwa najɔ utʰikǁɔ utʰɛ mand̤ikʰawulɛz̤isɛ mkʰwɛlɛlɛ utʰikǁɔ ɔnam anɡ̤akut͡ʃaɓalalisi kɛ ujɔsija akaɓusɔnɡ̤anɡ̤a uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ kujɛ waz̤ɛnz̤a wumɓi ukuɓa alwɛ najɛ akawapʰulapʰula amaz̤wi kanɛkɔ apʰuma ɛmlɔɲɛni katʰikǁɔ wɛz̤a ɛsiɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni sasɛmɛɡ̤id̤ɔ aɓatɔli ɓamtɔla ujɔsija watʰi kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ nd̤iʃɛŋǁisɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iŋ̤ǁ̤wɛlɛxwɛ kakuɓi aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓamtʰula ɛŋǃwɛlwɛni ɓamkʰwɛlisa kwɛjɛsiɓini iŋǃwɛlɔ aɓɛnajɔ ɓamsa ɛjɛrusalɛm waŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwa ɛmaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni ɔɔjisɛ ɔnkɛ amajud̤a nɛjɛrusalɛm amɛnz̤ɛla isid͡ʒ̤wili ujɔsija ujɛrɛmija wamɛnz̤ɛla isimɓɔnɔnɔ ujɔsija z̤atʰɛtʰa z̤ɔnkɛ iimv̤umi nɛɛmv̤umikaz̤i ɛz̤imɓɔnɔnwɛni z̤az̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔjɔsija unanam̤la ɓaz̤ɛnz̤a ummisɛlɔ kwasirajɛli nanz̤ɔ z̤ib̤aliwɛ ɛz̤imɓɔnɔnwɛni ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikajɔsija nɔkwɛnz̤a kwakʰɛ iŋǀɛɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kub̤aliwɛjɔ ɛmjalɛlwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nɛz̤intɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤ɔkukǃala nɛz̤ɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla nanz̤ɔ z̤ib̤aliwɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli naɓakwajud̤a aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɓatʰaɓatʰa ujɛhɔwahaz̤i uɲana kajɔsija ɓamɛnz̤a ɛsikʰunɮɛni sikajisɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm ujɛhɔwahaz̤i uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini anamitʰatʰu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛɛɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤intatʰu ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm ukumkani wasɛjiputa wamɡ̤uz̤ula ɛjɛrusalɛm waliɬawulisa iliz̤wɛ ikʰulu lɛɛtalɛntɛ z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛtalɛntɛ jɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ukumkani wasɛjiputa wamɛnz̤a uɛlijakim umkʰuluwa wakʰɛ ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani kwajud̤a nɛjɛrusalɛm waliɡ̤ukǃula iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ laɓa nɡ̤ujɛhɔjakim unɛkɔ wamtʰaɓatʰa ujɛhɔwahaz̤i wakʰɛ ɛjiputa ujɛhɔjakim uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini anamiɬanu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛliʃumi ɛlinamɲɛ ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ wɛɲuka unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli wamɛjisa wamkʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰a nɡ̤amakʰamand̤ɛla ɔb̤ɛd̤u ukuɓa amsɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wajisa iŋǁɛɲɛ jɛmpaɬa jɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ɛb̤ab̤ɛli wajiɓɛka ɛtɛmpilɛni jakʰɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ikajɛhɔjakim namasikiz̤i akʰɛ awawɛnz̤ajɔ nɔkwafumanɛkajɔ kukujɛ nankɔ kub̤aliwɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli naɓakwajud̤a waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ujɛhɔjakin uɲana wakʰɛ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ ujɛhɔjakin uɓɛmiɲaka isib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛɛɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤intatʰu ɛz̤inɛɛnt͡suku ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɛkuv̤ɛlɛni kɔmɲaka unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ watʰumɛla wamz̤isa ɛb̤ab̤ɛli kuɲɛ nɛɛmpaɬa ɛz̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ z̤ɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a wɛnz̤a uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wakʰɛ ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani kwajud̤a nasɛjɛrusalɛm uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini anamɲɛ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛliʃumi ɛlinamɲɛ ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ akaz̤itʰɔɓa ɛɓuswɛni ɓukajɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti ɔɓɛtʰɛtʰa ɔkwasɛmlɔɲɛni kajɛhɔv̤a kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ waɡ̤wilika kunɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ ɔɓɛmfunɡ̤isɛ utʰikǁɔ waɓa nɡ̤ɔntamɔ wajɛnz̤a iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔʃɔmɓa intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ ukuz̤ɛ anɡ̤aɓujɛli kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakwasirajɛli kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓantu ɓand̤isa ukwɛnz̤a uɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ nɡ̤ɔkwamasikiz̤i ɔnkɛ ɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɓajɛnz̤a iŋǃamɓi inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a awajiŋ̤ǀ̤walisajɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjisɛ watʰumɛla kuɓɔ nɡ̤aɓatʰuɲwa ɓakʰɛ waɲamɛka ukutʰumɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wajɛnɛmfɛsanɛ nɡ̤aɓantu ɓakʰɛ nɛkʰaja lakʰɛ ɓajɛ ɓɛɓaɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛla aɓatʰuɲwa ɓakatʰikǁɔ ɓɛwad̤ɛla amaz̤wi akʰɛ ɓɛɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɛka aɓaprɔfɛti ɓakʰɛ ɓad̤a ɓɛɲuka uɓuʃuʃu ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɓɛz̤a kuɓantu ɓakʰɛ kwad̤a akwaɓakʰɔ mpilɔ waɓaɲusɛla wamakalɛd̤i wawaɓulala amad̤ɔd̤ana aɓɔ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ɛnɮwini jaɓɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ akakǀɔnɡ̤a nd̤ɔd̤ana nantɔmɓi nand̤ɔd̤a nakǁʰɛɡ̤ɔ ɓɔnkɛ waɓanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iimpaɬa z̤ɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ ɛz̤inkulu nɛz̤iŋǀinanɛ nɔɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nɔɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓɔkumkani nɔɓaɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ waz̤isa ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɓajit͡ʃisa inɮu katʰikǁɔ ɓalud̤iliz̤a ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lwasɛjɛrusalɛm ɓawat͡ʃisa nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ ɔnkɛ amab̤ɔtwɛ ajɔ ɓaz̤it͡ʃaɓalalisa z̤ɔnkɛ iimpaɬa z̤ajɔ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ waɓafud̤usɛla ɛb̤ab̤ɛli aɓasind̤ilɛjɔ ɛk͡xɛlɛni ɓaɓa nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i kujɛ nakɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓad̤a ɓanɡ̤ɛna uɓukumkani ɓamapɛrsi ukuɓa liz̤alisɛkɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ kajɛrɛmija lid̤ɛ iliz̤wɛ lanɛlɛ z̤iisaɓatʰa z̤alɔ nɡ̤ajɔ jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɔkuɓa sɛnkanɡ̤ala kwalɔ lapʰumla ukuɓa kuz̤aliswɛ imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kɛ kalɔku nɡ̤ɔwɔkukǃala umɲaka kakɔrɛʃi wasɛpɛrsi ukuz̤ɛ kuz̤alisɛkɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ kajɛrɛmija ujɛhɔv̤a wawukǁʰɔkɔŋǁa umɔja kakɔrɛʃi wasɛpɛrsi wahamɓisa iz̤wi ɛɓukumkanini ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ walib̤ala ɛsitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ukɔrɛʃi wasɛpɛrsi ukutʰi z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ikumkani z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi uz̤inikɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu jɛna und̤ijalɛlɛ ukuɓa nd̤imakʰɛlɛ inɮu ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛkwajud̤a uɓani ɔpʰakatʰi kwɛnu ɛɓantwini ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ makaɓɛ najɛ aɲukɛ kɛ kalɔku nɡ̤ɔwɔkukǃala umɲaka kakɔrɛʃi wasɛpɛrsi ukuz̤ɛ kuz̤alisɛkɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ kajɛrɛmija ujɛhɔv̤a wawukǁʰɔkɔŋǁa umɔja kakɔrɛʃi wasɛpɛrsi wahamɓisa iz̤wi ɛɓukumkanini ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ walib̤ala ɛsitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ukɔrɛʃi wasɛpɛrsi ukutʰi z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ikumkani z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi uz̤inikɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu jɛna und̤ijalɛlɛ ukuɓa nd̤imakʰɛlɛ inɮu ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛkwajud̤a uɓani ɔpʰakatʰi kwɛnu ɛɓantwini ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ makaɓɛ najɛ aɲukɛ ajɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛkwajud̤a ajakʰɛ inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli nɡ̤ujɛ utʰikǁɔ ɛsɛjɛrusalɛm ɔnkɛ amasalɛla ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ apʰamɓukɛlɛ kuz̤ɔ makaŋǀɛd̤wɛ nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a alɔɔ nd̤awɔ akujɔ nɡ̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛmpaɬa nɛɛnkɔmɔ kuɲɛ nɔmnikɛlɔ waɓakǃʰutʲwa jintliz̤ijɔ wɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ ɛsɛjɛrusalɛm z̤ɛsuka kɛ iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ z̤akwajud̤a nɛz̤akwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɛz̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɛz̤aɓalɛv̤i ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ utʰikǁɔ wawukǁʰɔkɔŋǁajɔ umɔja waɓɔ ukuɓa ɓaɲukɛ ɓajɛ kujakʰa inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ɛsɛjɛrusalɛm ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛɓaŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnɡ̤ilɛ ɓaɓaŋǀɛd̤isa nɡ̤ɛz̤itʲa z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nanɡ̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nanɡ̤ɛmpaɬa nanɡ̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ nanɡ̤ɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋǃaɓilɛjɔ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwaz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤inikwɛ nɡ̤aɓantu nɡ̤ɔkukǃʰutʲwa jintliz̤ijɔ kɛ ukɔrɛʃi waz̤ixɔla iimpaɬa z̤ɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a awajɛz̤itʰaɓatʰɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ waz̤iɓɛka ɛnɮwini jɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓakʰɛ ukɔrɛʃi wasɛpɛrsi waz̤ixɔla waz̤inikɛla kumitrɛd̤ati umɡ̤ǀ̤inindʲɛɓɔ waz̤iɓalɛla kuʃɛʃb̤at͡sarɛ isikʰulu sakwajud̤a lilɔ ɛli laz̤ɔ iz̤itʲa z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ z̤amaʃumi matʰatʰu iz̤itʲa z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ z̤aliwaka iinkamɓa z̤amaʃumi maɓini anɛsitʰɔɓa iind̤ɛɓɛ z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ z̤amaʃumi matʰatʰu iind̤ɛɓɛ z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ z̤ɔɬɔɓɔ lwɛsiɓini z̤amakʰulu manɛ anaʃumi liɲɛ iimpaɬa ɛz̤iz̤imɓi z̤aliwaka z̤ɔnkɛ iimpaɬa z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛz̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ z̤aɓa maɬanu anamakʰulu amanɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɔ ntɔ waz̤iɲusa uʃɛʃb̤at͡sarɛ ɛkuɲuswɛni kwaɓaɓɛtʰind͡ʒ̤ɛlwɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɓɛz̤iswa ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤aɓɔ kɛ aɓa ɔɔɲana ɓɛliz̤wɛ lakwajud̤a aɓɛɲukajɔ kwaɓaɓɛtʰind͡ʒ̤wɛ ɓasɛmfud̤uswɛni awaɓafud̤usɛla ɛb̤ab̤ɛli unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli aɓaɓujɛla ɛjɛrusalɛm nakwajud̤a ɛlɔwɔ waɓujɛla ɛmz̤ini wakɔwaɓɔ aɓɛz̤a nɔz̤ɛrub̤ab̤ɛli nɔjɛʃuwa nɔnɛhɛmija nɔsɛraja nɔrɛhɛlaja nɔmɔrd̤ɛkaji nɔb̤ilɛʃan nɔmisparɛ nɔb̤iɡ̤waji nɔrɛlum nɔb̤ahana inani lamad̤ɔd̤a aɓantu ɓakwasirajɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakaparɔʃɛ iɓinɡ̤amawaka amaɓini anɛkʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anaɓaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃɛfatija iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰatʰu anamaŋǀi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anaɓaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓakaara iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamaŋǀi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anaɓaɬanu ɔɔɲana ɓakapahati wakwamɔwab̤i kɔɔɲana ɓakajɛʃuwa nɔjɔwab̤i iɓinɡ̤amawaka amaɓini anamakʰulu asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anɛʃumi ɛliɲɛ ɛlinaɓaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛlam iɓiliwaka ɛlinamakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi maɬanu anaɓanɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaz̤atu iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu asitʰɔɓa anamaŋǀi manɛ anaɓaɬanu ɔɔɲana ɓakaz̤akaji iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamaŋǀi matʰand̤atʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ani iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu anamaŋǀi manɛ anaɓaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛb̤aji iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu anamaŋǀi maɓini anaɓatʰatʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakaaz̤ɛɡ̤ad̤i iɓiliwaka ɛlinamakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi maɓini anaɓaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓakaad̤ɔnikam iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu anamaŋǀi matʰand̤atʰu anaɓatʰand̤atʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤iɡ̤waji iɓinɡ̤amawaka amaɓini anamaŋǀi maɬanu anaɓatʰand̤atʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakaad̤in iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amanɛ anamaŋǀi maɬanu anaɓanɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaatɛrɛ kahɛz̤ɛkija iɓinɡ̤amaʃumi asitʰɔɓa anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛt͡saji iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰatʰu maŋǀi maɓini anaɓatʰatʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakajɔra iɓilikʰulu ɛlinɛʃumi ɛlinaɓaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓakahaʃum iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi maɓini anaɓatʰatʰu ɔɔɲana ɓasɛɡ̤ib̤arɛ iɓinɡ̤amaʃumi asitʰɔɓa anaɓaɬanu ɔɔɲana ɓasɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm iɓilikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɓini anaɓatʰatʰu amad̤ɔd̤a asɛnɛtɔfa iɓinɡ̤amaʃumi amaɬanu anamatʰand̤atʰu amad̤ɔd̤a asɛanatɔti iɓilikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɓini anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɔɔɲana ɓasɛaz̤ɛmav̤ɛtɛ iɓinɡ̤amaʃumi amanɛ anaɓaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓasɛkirijatijɛharim nɛkɛfira nɛb̤ɛrɔti iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamaŋǀi amanɛ anaɓatʰatʰu ɔɔɲana ɓasɛrama nɛɡ̤ab̤a iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu anamaŋǀi maɓini anamɲɛ amad̤ɔd̤a asɛmikimasɛ iɓilikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɓini anamaɓini amad̤ɔd̤a asɛb̤ɛtɛli nɛaji iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi maɓini anamatʰatʰu ɔɔɲana ɓasɛnɛb̤ɔ iɓinɡ̤amaʃumi amaɬanu anaɓaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓakamaɡ̤ɛb̤iʃɛ iɓilikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɬanu anaɓatʰand̤atʰu ɔɔɲana ɓɔmɲɛ uɛlam iɓiliwaka ɛlinamakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi amaɬanu anaɓanɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaharim iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰatʰu anamaŋǀi maɓini ɔɔɲana ɓasɛlɔd̤i nɛhad̤id̤ɛ nɛɔnɔ iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamaŋǀi maɓini anaɓaɬanu ɔɔɲana ɓasɛjɛrikɔ iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰatʰu anamaŋǀi manɛ anaɓaɬanu ɔɔɲana ɓasɛsɛnaha iɓinɡ̤amawaka amatʰatʰu anamakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu anamaŋǀi matʰatʰu aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakajɛd̤aja ɓɛnɮu kajɛʃuwa iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu asitʰɔɓa anamaŋǀi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anaɓatʰatʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakaimɛrɛ iɓiliwaka ɛlinamaŋǀi maɬanu anaɓaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓakapaʃurɛ iɓiliwaka ɛlinamakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi manɛ anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaharim iɓiliwaka ɛlinɛʃumi ɛlinɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ aɓalɛv̤i ɔɔɲana ɓakajɛʃuwa nɔkad̤ɛmijɛli kɔɔɲana ɓakahɔd̤av̤ija iɓinɡ̤amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anaɓanɛ iimv̤umi ɔɔɲana ɓakaasafu iɓilikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɓini anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓamasanɡ̤ɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃalum ɔɔɲana ɓakaatɛrɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakatalɛmɔn ɔɔɲana ɓakaakub̤i ɔɔɲana ɓakahatita ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃɔb̤aji ɓɛɓɔnkɛ iɓilikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi matʰatʰu anɛsitʰɔɓa aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛtɛmpilɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakat͡siha ɔɔɲana ɓakahasufa ɔɔɲana ɓakatab̤ajɔti ɔɔɲana ɓakakɛrɔsɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasijaha ɔɔɲana ɓakapad̤ɔn ɔɔɲana ɓakalɛb̤ana ɔɔɲana ɓakahaɡ̤ab̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakaakub̤i ɔɔɲana ɓakahaɡ̤ab̤i ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃalɛmaji ɔɔɲana ɓakahanan ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤id̤ɛlɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤aharɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakarɛhaja ɔɔɲana ɓakarɛt͡sin ɔɔɲana ɓakanɛkɔd̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤az̤am ɔɔɲana ɓakauz̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakapasɛha ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛsaji ɔɔɲana ɓakaasna ɔɔɲana ɓakamɛhunim ɔɔɲana ɓakanɛfusim ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤akɛb̤uki ɔɔɲana ɓakahakufa ɔɔɲana ɓakahaxurɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤at͡sɛluti ɔɔɲana ɓakamɛhid̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakaharʃa ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤arkɔsɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasisɛra ɔɔɲana ɓakatama ɔɔɲana ɓakanɛt͡siha ɔɔɲana ɓakahatifa ɔɔɲana ɓaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakasɔlɔmɔn ɔɔɲana ɓakasɔtaji ɔɔɲana ɓakasɔfɛrɛtɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakapɛrud̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakajahala ɔɔɲana ɓakad̤arkɔn ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤id̤ɛlɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃɛfatija ɔɔɲana ɓakahatili ɔɔɲana ɓakapɔkɛrɛtɛt͡sɛb̤ajim ɔɔɲana ɓakaami ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛtɛmpilɛ nɔɔɲana ɓaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakasɔlɔmɔn iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰatʰu anamaŋǀi asitʰɔɓa anaɓaɓini nɡ̤aɓa aɓɛɲuka ɓɛv̤ɛla ɛtɛlɛmɛla nasɛtɛlɛharʃa nasɛkɛrub̤iad̤animɛrɛ kɛ aɓaɓanɡ̤a nakuz̤ikǁɛla iz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ nɛmɓɛwu jaɓɔ ukuɓa nɡ̤aɓakwasirajɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakad̤ɛlaja ɔɔɲana ɓakatɔb̤ija ɔɔɲana ɓakanɛkɔd̤a ɓaɓɛnɡ̤amakʰulu ɔmatʰand̤atʰu anamaŋǀi maɬanu anaɓaɓini kɛ kɔɔɲana ɓaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakahab̤aja ɔɔɲana ɓakahakɔt͡si ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤arz̤ilaji ɔwaz̤ɛka umfaz̤i ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤ikab̤arz̤ilaji wasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i waɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama laz̤ɔ aɓɔ ɓakufuna ukub̤alwa kwaɓɔ kwaɓab̤alɛlwɛ ɛmiliɓɛni jɔkuz̤alwa aɓakufumana ɓaŋ̤ǀ̤ɔla kɛ aɓaɓa sɛɓuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlini ixulunɛli jatʰi kuɓɔ maɓanɡ̤aɮi ntɔ kwɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kaɲɛ kud̤ɛ kuv̤ɛlɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔnɛɛurim nɛɛtumim lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa lind̤awɔɲɛ iɓɛ inɡ̤amawaka anɡ̤amaʃumi amanɛ anamaɓini anamakʰulu matʰatʰu anamaŋǀi matʰand̤atʰu nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛz̤ikǀaka z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤i nɛz̤ikǀakakaz̤i z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤i z̤inɡ̤amawaka asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamakʰulu amatʰatʰu anamaŋǀi matʰatʰu anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ z̤inɛɛmv̤umi nɛɛmv̤umikaz̤i ɛz̤inɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini amahaʃɛ aɓɔ iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamaŋǀi matʰatʰu anamatʰand̤atʰu ɔɔnɮɛɓɛnd̤ɛ ɓaɓɔ iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi manɛ anaɓaɬanu iinkamɛla z̤aɓɔ iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amanɛ anamaŋǀi matʰatʰu amaɛsilɛ iɓinɡ̤amawaka amatʰand̤atʰu anamakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamaŋǀi maɓini iŋǁɛɲɛ jɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ ɛkufikɛni kwajɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɛsɛjɛrusalɛm jajiz̤isɛla inɮu katʰikǁɔ iminikɛlɔ jɔkukǃʰutʲwa jintliz̤ijɔ ukuɓa imiswɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jajɔ ɓanikɛla nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛnakɔ ɛɓuŋǀwanɛni ɓɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ janɡ̤amawaka amaʃumi amatʰand̤atʰu liɲɛ ɛɛd̤arikɛ nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ janɡ̤amawaka amaɬanu ɛɛmina nɛkʰulu lɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤apʰant͡si z̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓaɬala kɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i naɓantu iŋǁɛɲɛ nɛɛmv̤umi naɓamasanɡ̤ɔ naɓakɔnz̤i ɓɛtɛmpilɛ ɛmiz̤ini jakɔwaɓɔ amasirajɛli ɔnkɛ ɛmiz̤ini jawɔ itʰɛ jakufika iɲanɡ̤a jɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛsɛmiz̤ini jaɓɔ ɓaɬanɡ̤ana aɓantu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amntu mɲɛ ɓɛz̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm wɛsuka ujɛʃuwa uɲana kajɔt͡sad̤aki naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɔz̤ɛrub̤ab̤ɛli uɲana kaʃɛlatijɛli naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ɓasakʰa isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sikatʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukuɓa kuɲuswɛ pʰɛz̤u kwasɔ amad̤ini aɲukajɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔ kub̤aliwɛjɔ ɛmjalɛlwɛni kamɔsɛs umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ ɓasiz̤inz̤isa isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛnd̤awɛni jasɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛɓɔjikiswɛ z̤iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ala maz̤wɛ ɓaɲusa pʰɛz̤u kwasɔ amad̤ini aɲukajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a amad̤ini aɲukajɔ nawanɡ̤ɔkuɬwa ɓɛnz̤a umtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ wɛmiŋǃuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kuɓaɬiwɛjɔ namad̤ini aɲukajɔ nɡ̤ɛɛmini nɡ̤ɛnani nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ intɔ jɛmini nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛmini jajɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kwawɔ ɓɛnz̤a id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ lamakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ nawɔkutʰwasa kwɛɲanɡ̤a nawamakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ kajɛhɔv̤a aŋ̤ǀ̤walisiwɛjɔ amisiwɛjɔ nawaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓanikɛla nɡ̤ɔkukǃʰutʲwa jintliz̤ijɔ kujɛhɔv̤a iminikɛlɔ jɔkukǃʰutʲwa jintliz̤ijɔ ɓakǃala uɡ̤ɔwɔkukǃala um̤lawɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓakǃala ɓaɲusa amad̤ini aɲukajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a itɛmpilɛ kajɛhɔv̤a iɓɛ inɡ̤ɛkasɛkwa imali ɓajinika aɓakǃiŋ̤ǃ̤i naɓak͡xɔli ɓanika amat͡sid̤ɔn namatirɛ ukuɮa nɛntɔ ɛsɛlwajɔ nɛɔli ukuɓa atʰaɓatʰɛ imisɛd̤arɛ ɛlɛb̤anɔn ajiz̤isɛ nɡ̤ɔlwanɮɛ ɛjafɔ nɡ̤ɔkuv̤uɲɛlwa kwaɓɔ nɡ̤ukɔrɛʃi wasɛpɛrsi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsiɓini wɔkufika kwaɓɔ ɛnɮwini katʰikǁɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsiɓini ɓakǃala ɔɔz̤ɛrub̤ab̤ɛli uɲana kaʃɛlatijɛli nɔjɛʃuwa uɲana kat͡sad̤ɔki naɓaɲɛ aɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛpʰumɛ ɛkutʰind͡ʒ̤wɛni ukuz̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm ɓamisa aɓalɛv̤i ɓatʰaɓatʰɛla kɔmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini ɛz̤ɛlwɛ kwɛɲusa ukuɓa ɓawɔnɡ̤amɛlɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a kwɛma ɔɔjɛʃuwa nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ukad̤ɛmijɛli nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakahɔd̤av̤ija nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amntu mɲɛ ukuɓɔnɡ̤amɛla aɓawɛnz̤ajɔ umsɛɓɛnz̤i ɛnɮwini katʰikǁɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakahɛnad̤ad̤ɛ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ naɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ aɓalɛv̤i aɓakʰi ɓajisɛka itɛmpilɛ kajɛhɔv̤a ɓɛma aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛv̤ɛtʰɛ ɓɛnamakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ naɓalɛv̤i ɔɔɲana ɓakaasafu ɓɛnamakǀaŋ̤ǀ̤i ukumd̤umisa ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔlwalatʰisɔ lukad̤av̤id̤ɛ wakwasirajɛli ɓasusɛla nɡ̤ɔkud̤umisa nanɡ̤ɔkuɓulɛla kujɛhɔv̤a ɓɛsitʰi ulunɡ̤ilɛ iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɛ inɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ kusirajɛli kɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓad̤uma nɡ̤ɔd̤umɔ ɔlukʰulu ɓɛd̤umisa ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkusɛkwa kwɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a kɛ isininz̤i kuɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i nɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu awajɛjiɓɔnilɛ inɮu jɔkukǃala satʰi ɛkusɛkwɛni kwalɛ nɮu ɛmɛɬwɛni asɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤wi ɛlikʰulu kɛ aɓaninz̤i ɓad̤uma ɓav̤uja nɡ̤ɔkupʰakamisa iliz̤wi aɓantu aɓaɓa nakulaɬula iliz̤wi lɔkud̤uma nɡ̤ɔkuv̤uja kwiliz̤wi lɔkulila kwaɓantu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓantu ɓaɓɛd̤uma nɡ̤ɔd̤umɔ ɔlukʰulu iliz̤wi lav̤akala nakud̤ɛ kɛ kalɔku ɓakuv̤a aɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓamajud̤a naɓamab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ukuɓa ɔɔɲana ɓasɛmfud̤uswɛni ɓamakʰɛla itɛmpilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakwasirajɛli ɓɛz̤a kuz̤ɛrub̤ab̤ɛli nakwiintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ ɓatʰi kuɓɔ masakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sikǃukǃɛla utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ani siɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla kujɛ kususɛla kwimiɬa kaɛsaxad̤ɔn wasɛasirija ɔwasiɲusɛla apʰa watʰi uz̤ɛrub̤ab̤ɛli nɔjɛʃuwa naɓaɲɛ aɓaz̤iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ ɓakwasirajɛli kuɓɔ anitʰɛ natʰi ɛkumakʰɛlɛni utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu inɮu sɔmakʰɛla sɛd̤wa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakwasirajɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wasiwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔnɡ̤ukɔrɛʃi wasɛpɛrsi aɓantu ɓɛlɔ z̤wɛ ɓamana ukuɓapʰɛlisa amanɮa aɓantu ɓakwajud̤a ɓɛɓɔjikisa ɛkwakʰɛni ɓɛɓakǃɛʃɛla amaɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa ukuɓa aliʃit͡ʃisɛ ikǃʰinɡ̤a laɓɔ jɔnkɛ imiɬa kakɔrɛʃi wasɛpɛrsi kwad̤a kwɛz̤isa ɛɓukumkanini ɓukad̤arijɔ wasɛpɛrsi nasɛɓukumkanini ɓukaahaswɛrɔsɛ ɛkukǃalɛkɛni kɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ ɓab̤ala ɓɛɓaŋǀɛtʰɛz̤a aɓɛmi ɓakwajud̤a naɓasɛjɛrusalɛm nanɡ̤ɛmiɬa kaartaʃaʃta kwab̤ala ub̤iʃlam nɔmitrɛd̤ati nɔtab̤ɛli naɓaɲɛ aɓalinɡ̤anɛ ɓaɓɔ kuartaʃaʃta wasɛpɛrsi iŋǀwad̤i jab̤alwa nɡ̤ɛntɛtʰɔ jɛsiaram jakʰuɲuʃwa nɡ̤ɛsiaram ɔɔrɛhum umkʰumɓuz̤i wɛz̤intɔ z̤akɔmkʰulu nɔʃimʃaji umb̤ali ɓab̤ala iŋǀwad̤i nɡ̤ɛjɛrusalɛm kuartaʃaʃta nɡ̤ɔlu ɬɔɓɔ ɓatʰumɛla kɛ ɔɔrɛhum umkʰumɓuz̤i wɛz̤intɔ z̤akɔmkʰulu nɔʃimʃaji umb̤ali naɓaɲɛ aɓalinɡ̤anɛ ɓaɓɔ ɓamad̤ina naɓamaafarsatɛki naɓamatarpɛla naɓamaafarsi naɓamaarki naɓamab̤ab̤ɛli naɓamaʃuʃanki naɓamad̤ɛhav̤i naɓamaɛlam nɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ awaz̤itʰimɓajɔ uɔsnaparɛ ɔmkʰulu ɔɓɛkɛkilɛjɔ waz̤iɓɛka ɛmz̤ini wakwasamari nakwɛmiɲɛ nɡ̤anɛnɔ kɔmlamɓɔ nakwɛz̤iɲɛ iind̤awɔ jijɔ lɛ iŋǀwad̤i aɓajitʰumɛla kuartaʃaʃta itʰi aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤anɛnɔ kɔmlamɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤alɔnd͡ʒ̤alɔ makwaz̤ɛkɛ ukuɓa amajud̤a aɲukilɛjɔ ɛv̤ɛla kuwɛ afikilɛ kutʰi ɛjɛrusalɛm ajawakʰa umz̤i ɔɡ̤wilikajɔ ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ajaz̤imisa iind̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤awɔ ajaz̤imɓɛla iz̤isɛkɔ makwaz̤ɛkɛ nɡ̤ɔku ukuɓa ɔtʰi kǁa utʰɛ wakʰiwa lɔ mz̤i z̤afɛz̤wa nɛɛnd̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤awɔ anɡ̤axɔli xafu nasitʰaɓatʰaɓa nalunikɛlɔ kud̤ɛ kujɛ kukǁʰwalɛka ɔɔkumkani kalɔku nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa sisiɮa itʲuwa jasɛb̤ɔtwɛ kwajɛ kunɡ̤afanɛlɛkilɛ kutʰi ukuɓɔna ɛŋǀit͡ʃiswa nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ sijatʰumɛla simaz̤isa ukuz̤ɛ kupʰikǀɔtʰwɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛz̤ikʰumɓuz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ z̤ɔɔjiɬɔ waz̤i ukuɓa lɔ mz̤i waɓa nɡ̤umz̤i ɔɡ̤wilikajɔ ɔwakǁʰwalɛkisa ɔɔkumkani namaz̤wɛ kwɛnz̤iwa isipʰɛnd̤u pʰakatʰi kwawɔ kwakud̤ala waɓa liŋǁuwa lɔ mz̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ sijamaz̤isa ukuɓa kǁa utʰɛ wakʰiwa lɔ mz̤i z̤afɛz̤wa nɛɛnd̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤awɔ wɔtʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛlɔ tʰuɓa unɡ̤aɓi nasaɓɛlɔ wɛna nɡ̤anɛnɔ kɔmlamɓɔ waz̤a waɓatʰumɛla impɛnd̤ulɔ ɔɔrɛhum umkʰumɓuz̤i wɛz̤intɔ z̤akɔmkʰulu nɔʃimʃaji umb̤ali naɓaɲɛ aɓalinɡ̤anɛ ɓaɓɔ aɓaɬɛli kwasamari naɓaɲɛ aɓanɡ̤anɛnɔ kɔmlamɓɔ watʰi ukǁɔlɔ nd͡ʒ̤alɔnd͡ʒ̤alɔ lɔɔ ŋǀwad̤i najitʰumɛlajɔ kutʰi ilɛsiwɛ nɡ̤ɔkukǀakǀilɛjɔ pʰamɓi nd̤iwisɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ kwapʰikǀɔtʰwa kwafuɲanwa ukuɓa lɔ mz̤i kwakud̤ala uz̤ipʰakamisilɛ kɔɔkumkani kwɛnz̤iwa uɡ̤wilikɔ nɛsipʰɛnd̤u pʰakatʰi kwawɔ kwaɓɛ kukʰɔ ɔɔkumkani aɓanamanɮa ɛjɛrusalɛm naɓanɛɡ̤uɲa kwiliz̤wɛ lɔnkɛ ɛlipʰɛʃɛja kɔmlamɓɔ apʰɔ kunikɛlwa kuɓɔ ixafu nɛsitʰaɓatʰaɓa nɔnikɛlɔ wisani nɡ̤ɔkɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkuɓa aɓand͡ʒ̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛ lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a lɔɔ mz̤i unɡ̤akʰiwa kud̤ɛ kuwiswɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nd̤im lumkani ninɡ̤akʰɛ lɛ ntɔ nijijɛkɛ kunɡ̤ani ukuɓa kukʰulɛ ukɔnakala ɓakǁʰwalɛkɛ ɔɔkumkani itʰɛ jakulɛswa iŋǀwad̤i kaartaʃaʃta pʰamɓi kɔrɛhum nɔʃimʃaji umb̤ali naɓalinɡ̤anɛ ɓaɓɔ ɓasuka ɓɛz̤a nɡ̤ɔɓuŋ̤ǁ̤amɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm kumajud̤a ɓawaɲanz̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛɡ̤uɲa nanɡ̤amanɮa waz̤a wɛma umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ ɛsɛjɛrusalɛm wɛma kwad̤a kwaɓa nɡ̤umɲaka wɛsiɓini wɔɓukumkani ɓukad̤arijɔ wasɛpɛrsi kɛ kalɔku aɓaprɔfɛti ɔɔhaɡ̤aji umprɔfɛti nɔz̤ɛkarija uɲana kaid̤ɔ ɓaprɔfɛta kumajud̤a aɓɛkwajud̤a nɛjɛrusalɛm ɛɡ̤amɛni likatʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɔɓɛkuɓɔ ɓaz̤a ɓasuka ɔɔz̤ɛrub̤ab̤ɛli uɲana kaʃɛlatijɛli nɔjɛʃuwa uɲana kajɔt͡sad̤aki naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ ukuɓa ɓajakʰɛ inɮu katʰikǁɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm aɓaprɔfɛti ɓakatʰikǁɔ ɓɛkuɓɔ ɓɛŋǀɛd̤isana naɓɔ kwanɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa wɛz̤a kuɓɔ utatɛnaji iɓamɓa lanɡ̤anɛnɔ kɔmlamɓɔ nɔʃɛtarb̤ɔz̤ɛnaji naɓalinɡ̤anɛ ɓaɓɔ ɓatʰi kuɓɔ niwisɛlwɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤uɓani ukuɓa nijakʰɛ lɛ nɮu nilwɛnz̤ɛ ɔlu d̤ɔnɡ̤a saz̤a sɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukutʰɛtʰa kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɔɔnant͡si nɔɔnant͡si amaɡ̤ama amad̤ɔd̤a ajakʰajɔ lɛ nɮu kɛ ilisɔ lɔtʰikǁɔ wawɔ liɓɛ lipʰɛz̤u kwamad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu amajud̤a ukuɓa ɓanɡ̤awaɓamɓɛz̤ɛli id̤ɛ lɔɔ nd̤awɔ ijɛ kud̤arijɔ ɓakʰupʰɛ iŋǀwad̤i nɡ̤ajɔ lɔɔ nd̤awɔ iŋǀwad̤i lɛjɔ ɔɔtatɛnaji iɓamɓa lanɡ̤anɛnɔ kɔmlamɓɔ nɔʃɛtarb̤ɔz̤ɛnaji naɓalinɡ̤anɛ ɓakʰɛ ɓamaafarsɛka ɓanɡ̤anɛnɔ kɔmlamɓɔ ɓajitʰumɛlajɔ kud̤arijɔ ɓajitʰumɛla lɔɔ nd̤awɔ kujɛ kwab̤alwa kwatʰiwa kujɔ kud̤arijɔ ukǁɔlɔ lupʰɛlɛlɛ makwaz̤ɛkɛ ukuɓa saja ɛz̤wɛni lakwajud̤a ɛnɮwini katʰikǁɔ ɔmkʰulu ijakʰiwa nɡ̤amatʲɛ anz̤ima nɛmitʰi ijafakwa ɛz̤ind̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni lɔ msɛɓɛnz̤i usɛtʲɛnz̤wa nɡ̤ɛɲamɛkɔ ujapʰumɛlɛla ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤aɓɔ saz̤a saɓuz̤a kumad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ makʰulu satʰi kuwɔ niwisɛlwɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤uɓani ukuɓa nijakʰɛ lɛ nɮu nilwɛnz̤ɛ ɔlu d̤ɔnɡ̤a saɓuz̤a kuwɔ namaɡ̤ama awɔ ukuɓa sikwaz̤isɛ wɛna siwab̤alɛ amaɡ̤ama amad̤ɔd̤a az̤iintlɔkɔ kuwɔ ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ kɛ ukusiɓujisɛla impɛnd̤ulɔ atʰi sinɡ̤aɓakʰɛ sinɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakatʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu nɛɬaɓatʰi sakʰa lɛ nɮu jakʰiwajɔ imiɲaka ɛmininz̤i ɛjaɮulajɔ jakʰiwa jafɛz̤wa nɡ̤ukumkani ɔmkʰulu wakwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa ɔɔɓawɔ ɓamkǃumɓisajɔ utʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu waɓanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sikanɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli umkalɛd̤i jɛna wajikǀʰitʰa lɛ nɮu waɓafud̤usɛla ɛb̤ab̤ɛli aɓantu kɔd̤wa nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɔkukǃala kakɔrɛʃi wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ukɔrɛʃi umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkuɓa jakʰiwɛ lɛ nɮu katʰikǁɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ iimpaɬa z̤ɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛz̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ awaz̤ixɔlajɔ unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ ɛtɛmpilɛni ɛsɛjɛrusalɛm awaz̤iz̤isajɔ ɛtɛmpilɛni jasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛz̤ɔ waz̤ikʰupʰa ukɔrɛʃi ɛtɛmpilɛni jasɛb̤ab̤ɛli z̤anikɛlwa kɔɡ̤ama linɡ̤uʃɛʃb̤at͡sarɛ awammisajɔ ukuɓa aɓɛ liɓamɓa watʰi kujɛ tʰaɓatʰa ɛz̤i mpaɬa hamɓa uz̤isɛ ɛtɛmpilɛni ɛsɛjɛrusalɛm inɮu katʰikǁɔ jakʰɛlwɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jajɔ waz̤a wɛz̤a lɔ ʃɛʃb̤at͡sarɛ waz̤iɓɛka iz̤isɛkɔ z̤ɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ ɛsɛjɛrusalɛm kususɛla kwɛlɔ kǁɛʃa unanɡ̤ɔku ijakʰiwa ajikaɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwa kɛ kalɔku ukuɓa kutʰɛ kwalunɡ̤a makupʰikǀɔtʰwɛ ɛnɮwini jɛndʲɛɓɔ jɔkumkani ɛsɛb̤ab̤ɛli apʰɔ kukʰanɡ̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa kund͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuɓa umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ukɔrɛʃi wɔkuɓa jakʰiwɛ lɛ nɮu katʰikǁɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ makutʰuɲɛlwɛ kutʰi ukutʰand̤a kɔkumkani nɡ̤alɛ ntɔ waz̤a ud̤arijɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ kwapʰikǀɔtʰwa ɛnɮwini kʰɔna ɛb̤ab̤ɛli kwafuɲanwa kɔmkʰulu ɛamɛta ɛsɛliz̤wɛni lamamɛd̤i iŋǀwad̤i ɛsɔnɡ̤wajɔ kwajɛ kub̤aliwɛ apʰɔ isikʰumɓuz̤ɔ kwatʰiwa nɡ̤ɔwɔkukǃala umɲaka kakɔrɛʃi umtʰɛtʰɔ ukɔrɛʃi watʰi inɮu katʰikǁɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm majakʰiwɛ inɮu lɛjɔ iɓɛ jind̤awɔ apʰɔ kuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwa kʰɔna imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤imiswɛ nɛz̤isɛkɔ z̤ajɔ ukupʰakama kwajɔ kuɓɛ z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi matʰand̤atʰu uɓuɓanz̤i ɓajɔ ɓuɓɛ z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi matʰand̤atʰu iz̤ɛ iɓɛ z̤iiŋ̤ǀ̤amɓa ɛz̤intatʰu z̤amatʲɛ anz̤ima nɔkǀamɓa lwɛmitʰi ɛmit͡ʃa inɮɛkɔ majipʰumɛ ɛnɮwini jɔkumkani nɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛz̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ awaz̤ixɔlajɔ unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ ɛtɛmpilɛni jasɛjɛrusalɛm waz̤iz̤isa ɛb̤ab̤ɛli maz̤iɓujiswɛ z̤isiwɛ ɛtɛmpilɛni ɛsɛjɛrusalɛm ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤az̤ɔ ɛnɮwini katʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔ tatɛnaji ɓamɓa lapʰɛʃɛja kɔmlamɓɔ nawɛ ʃɛtarb̤ɔz̤ɛnaji naɓalinɡ̤anɛ ɓɛnu ɓamaafarsɛka pʰɛʃɛja kɔmlamɓɔ jiɓani kud̤ɛ nalɔɔ ntɔ wujɛkɛni umsɛɓɛnz̤i walɛ nɮu katʰikǁɔ iɓamɓa lamajud̤a namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwajud̤a maɓajakʰɛ lɛ nɮu katʰikǁɔ ɛnd̤awɛni jajɔ nd̤iwisa umtʰɛtʰɔ wɛntɔ ɛnɔjɛnz̤a kumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu alɔɔ majud̤a ukuɓa jakʰiwɛ lɔɔ nɮu katʰikǁɔ nd̤itʰi lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a makanikwɛ inɮɛkɔ ɛɓutʲɛɓini ɓukakumkani ɛxafini japʰɛʃɛja kɔmlamɓɔ kuɲaɲɛkwɛ anɡ̤aɓand͡ʒ̤ɛz̤ɛlwa nɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤ifunɛkajɔ iinkunz̤i ɛz̤int͡ʃa z̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa nɛɛmv̤ana z̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤amad̤ini aɲukajɔ kutʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu nɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛtʲuwa nɛwajini nɛɔli nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi laɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓasɛjɛrusalɛm makaz̤inikwɛ imiɬa nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kunɡ̤apʰɔsiswa ukuz̤ɛ ɓasɔnd̤ɛz̤ɛ imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛliv̤umɓa ɛlitʰɔz̤amisajɔ kutʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu ɓatʰand̤az̤ɛlɛ uɓɔmi ɓɔkumkani nɔɓɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nd̤iwisa umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkuɓa ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓajid͡ʒ̤ikajɔ lɔɔ ntɔ makuŋǀɔtʰulwɛ umtʰi ɛnɮwini jaɓɔ ɓakǁʰɔɲwɛ ɓaɓɛtʰɛlɛlwɛ kuwɔ nɛnɮu jaɓɔ jɛnz̤iwɛ ind̤awɔ jɔkuja ɛnɮɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ utʰikǁɔ ɔliɓɛkɛ kʰɔna iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ makaɓakʰaɬɛlɛ pʰant͡si ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔkumkani naɓantu aɓɔlula iz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ ɓɛjid͡ʒ̤ika lɔɔ ntɔ ukuɓa ɓajit͡ʃaɓalalisɛ lɛ nɮu katʰikǁɔ ɛsɛjɛrusalɛm mna d̤arijɔ nd̤iwisɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ mawɛnz̤iwɛ nɡ̤ɛɲamɛkɔ ɓaz̤a ɔɔtatɛnaji iɓamɓa lanɡ̤anɛnɔ kɔmlamɓɔ nɔʃɛtarb̤ɔz̤ɛnaji naɓalinɡ̤anɛ ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ud̤arijɔ ɛtʰumilɛ ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ nɡ̤ɛɲamɛkɔ kɛ amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu amajud̤a akʰa apʰumɛlɛla nɡ̤ɔkɔkuprɔfɛta kukahaɡ̤aji umprɔfɛti nɔz̤ɛkarija uɲana kaid̤ɔ akʰa kɛ aɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmtʰɛtʰɔ katʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmtʰɛtʰɔ wɔɔkɔrɛʃi nɔd̤arijɔ nɔartaʃaʃta ɔɔkumkani ɓasɛpɛrsi jaɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwa kɛ lɛ nɮu nɡ̤ɔsuka lwɛsitʰatʰu lwɛɲanɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤uad̤arɛ nɡ̤umɲaka wɛsitʰand̤atʰu lɔwɔ wɔkulawula kukad̤arijɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i naɓaɲɛ ɔɔɲana ɓasɛmfud̤uswɛni ɓakwɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔv̤ujɔ ukuɬaz̤ijwa kwalɛ nɮu katʰikǁɔ ɓasɔnd̤ɛz̤ɛla ukuɬaz̤ijwa kwalɛ nɮu katʰikǁɔ ikʰulu lɛɛnkunz̤i ɛz̤int͡ʃa z̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ namakʰulu amaɓini ɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa namakʰulu amanɛ ɛɛmv̤ana nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ z̤ɛd̤ini lɛsɔnɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamasirajɛli ɔnkɛ z̤aliʃumi ɛlinamɓini nɡ̤ɔkwɛnani lɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤akwasirajɛli ɓaɓamisa aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤aɬulɔ z̤aɓɔ naɓalɛv̤i nɡ̤ɔkwamakǃɛla aɓɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛnkɔnz̤ɔ katʰikǁɔ ɛsɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔkɔ kub̤aliwɛjɔ ɛŋǀwad̤ini kamɔsɛs ɔɔɲana ɓasɛmfud̤uswɛni ɓajɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsinɛ wɛɲanɡ̤a jɔkukǃala nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛz̤iɬamɓululɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amntu mɲɛ ɓaɬamɓuluka ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓaɓakǁʰɛlɛla ɔɔɲana ɓɔnkɛ ɓasɛmfud̤uswɛni naɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwaɓɔ ɓaɮa kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓaɓɛɓujɛ ɛkufud̤uswɛni kwanaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaz̤aɬulajɔ ɛɓuŋǃamɓini ɓɛɛntlanɡ̤a z̤ɛliz̤wɛ ɓɛz̤a kuɓɔ ukuɓa ɓamkǃukǃɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɓɛnz̤a umtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ wɛz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ imiɬa jasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓɛv̤ujilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɓɛɓav̤ujisilɛ nɡ̤ɔkujiɓujisɛla kuɓɔ intliz̤ijɔ jɔkumkani wasɛasirija ukuz̤ɛ iz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ z̤ɔmɛlɛz̤wɛ ɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini wɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɛmv̤ɛni kwɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ ɛɓukumkanini ɓukaartaʃaʃta wasɛpɛrsi watʰi uɛz̤ra uɲana kasɛraja uɲana kaaz̤arija uɲana kahilɛkija uɲana kaʃalum uɲana kat͡sad̤ɔki uɲana kaab̤itub̤i uɲana kaamarija uɲana kaaz̤arija uɲana kamɛrajɔti uɲana kaz̤ɛraja uɲana kauz̤i uɲana kab̤uki uɲana kaab̤iʃuwa uɲana kapinɛhasi uɲana kaɛlaz̤arɛ uɲana kaarɔn umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔjintlɔkɔ uɛz̤ra lɔwɔ wɛɲuka ɛpʰuma ɛb̤ab̤ɛli wajɛ ɛnɡ̤umb̤ali ɔjinkuŋ̰ǃ̰ɛlɛ ɛmjalɛlwɛni kamɔsɛs awawuwisajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukumkani kɔnkɛ awakukǀɛlajɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛsanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ ɛsipʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ kwɛɲuka najɛ iŋǁɛɲɛ jɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɛjaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i nɛɛmv̤umi naɓamasanɡ̤ɔ naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛtɛmpilɛ ɓɛsija ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kaartaʃaʃta wafika ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsiɬanu lɔwɔ kɛ nɡ̤umɲaka wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wɔkumkani nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iɓɛ inɡ̤um̤la wɔkukǃala wɛɲanɡ̤a jɔkukǃala awawumisɛla ukuɲuka nɡ̤awɔ ɛpʰuma ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɔkukǃala wɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsiɬanu nɡ̤ɔkwɛsanɮa ɛsilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ sikatʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ ɛsiɓɛ sipʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɛz̤ra intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ wajɛjib̤ɛkisɛ ɛkuwufunɛni umjalɛlɔ kajɛhɔv̤a awɛnz̤ɛ afund̤isɛ ummisɛlɔ nɛsikɔ kwasirajɛli jijɔ lɛ iŋǀwad̤i awatʰi uartaʃaʃta uɛz̤ra umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli umb̤ali ɔb̤ala amaz̤wi ɛmitʰɛtʰɔ kajɛhɔv̤a nɛmimisɛlɔ jakʰɛ kumasirajɛli uartaʃaʃta wɔɔkumkani kuɛz̤ra umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli umb̤ali ɔɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ ɛmtʰɛtʰwɛni katʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu nd͡ʒ̤alɔnd͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤iwisɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkuɓa ɓɔnkɛ ɛɓukumkanini ɓam pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu ɓakwasirajɛli naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓaɓɔ naɓalɛv̤i aɓakǃʰutʲwa jintliz̤ijɔ ukuja ɛjɛrusalɛm maɓahamɓɛ nawɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛna utʰuɲwa nɡ̤ukumkani namapʰakatʰi akʰɛ asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ukuɓuz̤isa nɡ̤amajud̤a nɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔkɔmtʰɛtʰɔ katʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ ɔsɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ ujisɛ isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ajinikɛlajɔ namapʰakatʰi akʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkukǃʰutʲwa jintliz̤ijɔ kutʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɔkʰaja lisɛjɛrusalɛm najɔ jɔnkɛ isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɔwɔjifumana ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lasɛb̤ab̤ɛli kuɲɛ nɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkukǃʰutʲwa jintliz̤ijɔ waɓantu naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓanikɛla nɡ̤ɔkukǃʰutʲwa jintliz̤ijɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɛsɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ uja kutʰɛnɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛɲamɛkɔ nɡ̤alɛ iinkunz̤i ɛz̤int͡ʃa z̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa nɛɛmv̤ana nɛminikɛlɔ jaz̤ɔ jɔkuɮa nɛtʰululwajɔ ujisɔnd̤ɛz̤ɛ ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni sɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ wɛnu ɛsɛjɛrusalɛm nɛntɔ ɛtʰɛ jalunɡ̤a kuwɛ nakuɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɔ ukwɛnz̤iwa nɡ̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nanɡ̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛsɛlɛjɔ nɔjɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔkutʰand̤a kukatʰikǁɔ wɛnu kɛ iimpaɬa ɔz̤inikiwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmɓusɔ wɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ z̤inikɛlɛ z̤ipʰɛlɛlɛ pʰamɓi kɔtʰikǁɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm nɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ifunɛkajɔ z̤ɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ ɔtʰi kujafunɛka ukuɓa z̤inikɛlwɛ wɔz̤ixɔla ɛnɮwini jɛndʲɛɓɔ jɔkumkani mna artaʃaʃta nd̤iwisa umtʰɛtʰɔ kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inindʲɛɓɔ aɓapʰɛʃɛja kɔmlamɓɔ wɔkuɓa kɔnkɛ aja kukuɓiz̤a uɛz̤ra umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli umb̤ali wɔmtʰɛtʰɔ katʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu makwɛnz̤iwɛ nɡ̤ɛɲamɛkɔ kusɛ ɛkʰulwini lɛɛtalɛntɛ z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛkʰulu lɛɛkɔrɛ z̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛkʰulu lɛɛb̤atɛ z̤ɛwajini nɛkʰulu lɛɛb̤atɛ z̤ɛɔli nɛtʲuwa inɡ̤alinɡ̤anisɛlwa jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛnɡ̤ɔmtʰɛtʰɔ katʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu majɛnz̤ɛlwɛ inɮu katʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu nɡ̤ɔkutʰɛ ŋǃɔ kuɓa kunɡ̤ani ukuɓa ɓufikɛlwɛ ɓuɓuxalaxumɛ uɓukumkani ɓɔkumkani nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ makwaz̤ɛkɛ ukuɓa ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i nɛɛmv̤umi naɓamasanɡ̤ɔ naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛtɛmpilɛ naɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛli ɓalɛ nɮu katʰikǁɔ akukʰɔ ɓani unaɡ̤uɲa lakuɓatʰwɛsa ixafu nasitʰaɓatʰaɓa nalunikɛlɔ wɛna ɛz̤ra nɡ̤ɔkɔɓulumkɔ ɓukatʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ ɔɓusɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ aɓaɡ̤wɛɓi naɓatʰɛtʰi ɓamatʲala ɛɓantwini ɓɔnkɛ aɓapʰɛʃɛja kɔmlamɓɔ nd̤itʰi ɓɔnkɛ aɓajaz̤ijɔ imitʰɛtʰɔ katʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ naɓanɡ̤ajaz̤ijɔ nɔɓaz̤isa kɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓasukuɓa ɓɛnɡ̤awɛnz̤i umtʰɛtʰɔ katʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ nɔmtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkumkani malitʰɛtʰwɛ itʲala laɓɔ nɡ̤ɛɲamɛkɔ nɔkuɓa ɓaja kuɓulawa nɔkuɓa ɓaja kuɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰwa nɔkuɓa ɓaja kuɮiwa nɔkuɓa ɓaja kukʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰wa makaɓɔnɡ̤wɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔɓawɔ ɔjinikɛlɛjɔ intɔ ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jɔkumkani ukuɓa ajihɔmɓisɛ inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ɛsɛjɛrusalɛm ɔnd̤itʰɔɓɛlɛ iŋǀɛɓa pʰamɓi kɔkumkani namapʰakatʰi akʰɛ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔnkɛ ɓɔkumkani aɓanɡ̤amaɡ̤ɔxa mna nd̤ɔmɛlɛz̤ɛka nɡ̤ɔkwɛsanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ ɛsipʰɛz̤u nd̤az̤iɓutʰa kumasirajɛli iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ ukuɓa z̤iɲukɛ z̤iz̤ɔ kɛ ɛz̤i iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ nɔkub̤alwa kwaz̤ɔ ɛmiliɓɛni jɔkuz̤alwa ɛz̤ɛɲuka z̤ipʰuma ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛɓukumkanini ɓukaartaʃaʃta kɔɔɲana ɓakapinɛhasi nɡ̤uɡ̤ɛrʃɔm kɔɔɲana ɓakaitamarɛ nɡ̤ud̤anijɛli kɔɔɲana ɓakad̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤uhatuʃɛ kɔɔɲana ɓakaʃɛkanija kɔɔɲana ɓakaparɔʃɛ nɡ̤uz̤ɛkarija ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a ab̤alwɛ ɛmiliɓɛni jɔkuz̤alwa alikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɬanu kɔɔɲana ɓakapahati wakwamɔwab̤i nɡ̤uɛlijɔhɛnaji uɲana kaz̤ɛraja ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amakʰulu maɓini kɔɔɲana ɓakaʃɛkanija nɡ̤uɲana kajahaz̤ijɛli ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰatʰu kɔɔɲana ɓakaad̤in nɡ̤uɛb̤ɛd̤ɛ uɲana kajɔnatan ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a amaʃumi maɬanu kɔɔɲana ɓakaɛlam nɡ̤ujɛʃaja uɲana kaatalija ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kɔɔɲana ɓakaʃɛfatija nɡ̤uz̤ɛb̤ad̤ija uɲana kamikajɛli ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a amaʃumi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakajɔwab̤i nɡ̤uɔb̤ad̤ija uɲana kajɛhijɛli ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini anɛʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakaʃɛlɔmiti nɡ̤uɲana kajɔsifija ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a alikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi matʰand̤atʰu kɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛb̤aji nɡ̤uz̤ɛkarija uɲana kab̤ɛb̤aji ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a amaʃumi maɓini anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakaaz̤ɛɡ̤ad̤i nɡ̤ujɔhanan uɲana kahakatan ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a alikʰulu ɛlinɛʃumi liɲɛ kɔɔɲana ɓɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla ɓakaad̤ɔnikam aɓamaɡ̤ama anɡ̤ala nɡ̤uɛlifɛlɛtɛ nɔjɛhijɛli nɔʃɛmaja ɓɛnamad̤ɔd̤a amaʃumi matʰand̤atʰu kɔɔɲana ɓakab̤iɡ̤waji nɡ̤uutaji nɔz̤ab̤ud̤i ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nd̤aɓaɬanɡ̤anisɛla ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔnɡ̤umahav̤a kʰɔna imiɬa jamitʰatʰu nd̤aɓaɡ̤ǃ̤ala aɓantu naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli and̤afumana kʰɔna namɲɛ wɔɔɲana ɓakalɛv̤i nd̤atʰumɛla ukuɓa kuɓiz̤wɛ ɔɔɛlijɛz̤ɛrɛ nɔarijɛli nɔʃɛmaja nɔɛlinatan nɔjarib̤i nɔɛlinatan nɔnatan nɔz̤ɛkarija nɔmɛʃulam aɓaz̤iintlɔkɔ nɔjɔjarib̤i nɔɛlinatan aɓakǃɔnd̤isimtʰɛtʰɔ nd̤aɓasusa ɓaja kuid̤ɔ ɔjintlɔkɔ ɛnd̤awɛni ɛjikasifija nd̤aɓɛka amaz̤wi ɛmlɔɲɛni waɓɔ ukuɓa ɓatʰɛtʰɛ wɔna kuid̤ɔ naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛtɛmpilɛ ɛnd̤awɛni ɛjikasifija ukuɓa ɓasiz̤isɛlɛ aɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛli ɓɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ɓatʰi kɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛsanɮa sikatʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ɛsilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛsipʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu ɓaɓaz̤isa kutʰi ɔɔiʃisɛkɛlɛ kɔɔɲana ɓakamahali uɲana kalɛv̤i uɲana kasirajɛli nɔʃɛrɛb̤ija nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ iʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ nɔhaʃab̤ija ɛnɔjɛʃaja kɔɔɲana ɓakamɛrari naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ nɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ amaʃumi amaɓini nakuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛtɛmpilɛ aɓaɓɛtʰɛ ɔɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaɓanikɛla ukuɓa ɓakʰɔnz̤ɛ kuɓalɛv̤i aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛtɛmpilɛ iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi maɓini ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛɓalulwɛ nɡ̤amaɡ̤ama nd̤amɛma inz̤ilɔ apʰɔ ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔnɡ̤umahav̤a ukuɓa siz̤itʰɔɓɛ pʰamɓi kɔtʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu siz̤ifunɛlɛ kujɛ inɮɛla ɛtʰɛ tʲɛ tʰina nɛnt͡sapʰɔ jɛtʰu nɛmfujɔ jɛtʰu jɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤and̤inɛɛntlɔni ukuɓa nd̤ikǀɛlɛ naɓamahaʃɛ ukuɓa ɓasiŋǀɛd̤ɛ ɛz̤int͡ʃaɓɛni ɛnɮɛlɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛsɛsitʰɛ isanɮa sikatʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu sipʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓamfunajɔ ukuɓa kulunɡ̤ɛ namanɮa akʰɛ nɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ ujaɓakǀʰasa ɓɔnkɛ aɓamʃijajɔ saz̤ila ukuɮa kɛ samkʰunɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu watʰand̤az̤ɛka sitʰi nd̤aɬula kuɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli iʃumi ɛlinaɓaɓini nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kɔʃɛrɛb̤ija nɔhaʃab̤ija nɛʃumi laɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ nd̤ajilinɡ̤anisɛla kuɓɔ isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛmpaɬa umxumɔ wɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu aɓawuxumajɔ namapʰakatʰi akʰɛ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ namasirajɛli ɔnkɛ awajɛkʰɔ apʰɔ nd̤alinɡ̤anisɛla ɛsanɮɛni saɓɔ amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu anamaŋǀi maɬanu ɛɛtalɛntɛ z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛkʰulu lɛɛtalɛntɛ z̤ɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛkʰulu lɛɛtalɛntɛ z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ namaʃumi amaɓini ɛɛnd̤ɛɓɛ z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ z̤iliwaka lɛɛd̤arikɛ nɛɛmpaɬa ɛz̤imɓini z̤ɔb̤ɛd̤u ɔluɓɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛla kakuɬɛ z̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nd̤atʰi kuɓɔ niŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a iimpaɬa z̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ z̤inɡ̤umnikɛlɔ waɓakǃʰutʲwa jintliz̤ijɔ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjiɬɔ pʰapʰani niz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ nid̤ɛ niz̤ilinɡ̤anisɛlɛ pʰamɓi kwaɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ z̤amasirajɛli ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛmaɡ̤umɓini ɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i ɓawamkɛla kɛ umlinɡ̤anisɔ wɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛmpaɬa ukuɓa ɓawuz̤isɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛnɮwini jɔtʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu saz̤a sand̤uluka ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔnɡ̤umahav̤a nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɓini wɛɲanɡ̤a jɔkukǃala ukuɓa siz̤ɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm isanɮa sɔtʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu saɓa pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu sasiɬanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni sɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa nɛsaɓasilalɛlɛjɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni safika ɛjɛrusalɛm saɬala kʰɔna iint͡suku z̤antatʰu nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsinɛ jalinɡ̤anisɛlwa isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛɛmpaɬa ɛnɮwini jɔtʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ɛsanɮɛni sikamɛrɛmɔti uɲana kaurija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛnɔɛlaz̤arɛ uɲana kapinɛhasi ɓɛnɔjɔz̤ab̤ad̤i uɲana kajɛʃuwa nɔnɔwad̤ija uɲana kab̤inwi aɓalɛv̤i z̤anikɛlwa nɡ̤ɔkwɛnani nɡ̤ɔkulinɡ̤anisɛlwa kwɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ kɔnkɛ ukulinɡ̤anisɛlwa kwab̤alwa nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa ɔɔɲana ɓasɛmfud̤uswɛni aɓɔ ɓaɓɛpʰumɛ ɛkutʰind͡ʒ̤wɛni ɓasɔnd̤ɛz̤a amad̤ini aɲukajɔ kutʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli iinkunz̤i ɛz̤int͡ʃa z̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤aliʃumi ɛlinamɓini nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamasirajɛli ɔnkɛ nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa z̤amaʃumi asitʰɔɓa anantand̤atʰu nɛɛmv̤ana z̤amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ z̤ɛd̤ini lɛsɔnɔ z̤aliʃumi ɛlinamɓini z̤ɔnkɛ z̤aɓa lid̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a ɓajinikɛla imitʰɛtʰɔ jɔkumkani kwiixulunɛli z̤ɔkumkani nakumaɓamɓa nɡ̤anɛnɔ kɔmlamɓɔ aɓɔ ɓaɓaŋǀɛd̤a aɓantu nɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ kwakuɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwa ɔkɔ ɓɛz̤a aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓatʰi aɓantu ɓakwasirajɛli naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i aɓaz̤aɬuli kwiz̤iz̤wɛ z̤amaz̤wɛ ɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwamasikiz̤i az̤ɔ awamakanan namahɛti namapɛriz̤i namajɛb̤usi namaamɔn namamɔwab̤i namajiputa namaamɔri nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaz̤iz̤ɛkɛlɛ ɓɔna nɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ aɓafaz̤i ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤awɔ jaz̤ikǁuɓa imɓɛwu ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ala maz̤wɛ kɛ kukǃalɛ isanɮa saɓatʰɛtʰɛli naɓapʰatʰi kɔɓu ɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ nd̤atʰi nd̤akuliv̤a ɛlɔ liz̤wi nd̤az̤ik͡xaz̤ula iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤am kwanɛjɔkwalɛka nd̤az̤iɮatʰula iinwɛlɛ z̤am nɛɛnd̤ɛv̤u nd̤aɬala pʰant͡si nd̤imanɡ̤alisiwɛ nd̤aɬanɡ̤anisɛla ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɡ̤ub̤a nɡ̤amaz̤wi katʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ ɓaɓafud̤uswajɔ nd̤aɬala pʰant͡si nd̤imanɡ̤alisiwɛ kwad̤a kwalilikǁa lɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa wanɡ̤ɔkuɬwa nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁa lɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa wanɡ̤ɔkuɬwa nd̤ɛsuka ɛkuz̤itʰɔɓɛni nd̤az̤ik͡xaz̤ula iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤am nɛjɔkwalɛka nd̤aɡ̤ukǃa nɡ̤amad̤ɔlɔ nd̤az̤ɔlulɛla iz̤anɮa z̤am kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ nd̤atʰi tʰikǁɔ nd̤id̤anilɛ nd̤inɛɛntlɔni and̤inakuɓupʰakamisɛla kuwɛ uɓusɔ ɓam tʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛtʰu ɓukʰulilɛ ɓaɓa pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤ɛtʰu nɛtʲala lɛtʰu likʰulu lɛsa ɛmaz̤ulwini kususɛla kwimiɬa jɔɔɓawɔ sisɛtʲalɛni ɛlikʰulu unanam̤la nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛtʰu sanikɛlwa tʰina nɔɔkumkani ɓɛtʰu naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛtʰu ɛsanɮɛni sɔɔkumkani ɓala maz̤wɛ nasɛk͡xɛlɛni nasɛkutʰind͡ʒ̤wɛni nasɛkupʰanɡ̤wɛni nasɛkud̤anɛni kɔɓusɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kund͡ʒ̤alɔ nam̤la kalɔku nɡ̤ɔkwɛpʰaɲaz̤ɔ ɛliŋǀinanɛ kukʰɔ uɓaɓalɔ ɔluv̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu lɔkusiʃijɛla aɓasind̤ilɛjɔ asinikɛ isikʰɔnkwanɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jakʰɛ ukuz̤ɛ utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu awakʰaɲisɛlɛ amɛɬɔ ɛtʰu asisind̤isɛ kaŋǀinanɛ ɛɓukʰɔɓɔkɛni ɓɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sinɡ̤amakʰɔɓɔka kɛ ɛɓukʰɔɓɔkɛni ɓɛtʰu akasiʃijanɡ̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu usitʰɔɓɛlɛ iŋǀɛɓa pʰamɓi kɔɔkumkani ɓasɛpɛrsi ɓasisind̤isa ukuɓa sipʰakamisɛ inɮu jɔtʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu silunɡ̤isɛ iŋǁuwa lajɔ ɓasiɓijɛlɛ utʰanɡ̤ɔ kwajud̤a nasɛjɛrusalɛm sinɡ̤atʰini kalɔku tʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ kuɓa sijiʃijilɛ imitʰɛtʰɔ jakʰɔ ɔwajiwisajɔ nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ aɓaprɔfɛti usitʰi iliz̤wɛ ɛnija liliz̤wɛ lɔkuŋ̤ǀ̤ɔla nɡ̤ɔkuŋ̤ǀ̤ɔla kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ala maz̤wɛ nɡ̤amasikiz̤i az̤ɔ az̤alisilɛjɔ atʰaɓatʰɛla kwɛliɲɛ ikǀala ɛsa kwɛliɲɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuŋǃamɓi ɓaz̤ɔ kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ iintɔmɓi z̤ɛnu ukuz̤ɛnd̤isɛla kɔɔɲana ɓaz̤ɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤az̤ɔ ukuz̤iz̤ɛkɛla ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu ninɡ̤aluɲamɛkɛli ukǁɔlɔ lwaz̤ɔ nɔkuz̤ilunɡ̤ɛlɛjɔ napʰakad̤ɛ ukuz̤ɛ nɔmɛlɛlɛ niɮɛ ukulunɡ̤a kwɛliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ nilinikɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu liɓɛ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni ɛmv̤ɛni kwakɔ kɔnkɛ ɔkusiɬɛlɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɛtʰu ɛz̤iɓi nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛtʲala lɛtʰu ɛlikʰulu wɛna tʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu usijɛkilɛ akwasɔɬwaja nɡ̤anɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛtʰu aɓasind̤ilɛjɔ aɓanɡ̤akanana sinɡ̤aɓuja sijapʰulɛ imitʰɛtʰɔ jakʰɔ sɛnd̤isɛlanɛ nɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤inalɔɔ masikiz̤i akuji kusifutʰɛla nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ sid̤ɛ sipʰɛlɛ ukuz̤ɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ɓasɛlɛjɔ ɓasind̤ilɛjɔ jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ulilunɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sisɛlɛ sinɡ̤aɓasind̤ilɛjɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kund͡ʒ̤alɔ nam̤la ujaɓɔna sipʰamɓi kwakʰɔ sinalɔ itʲala lɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akukʰɔ unɔkuma pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ kɛ kalɔku akutʰand̤az̤a uɛz̤ra akukukǁɛla ɔku ɛlila ɛz̤iwisilɛ pʰamɓi kwɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ kwaɓutʰɛlana kujɛ kumasirajɛli iɓanɮa ɛlikʰulu kakʰulu lamad̤ɔd̤a naɓafaz̤i naɓantwana nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓantu ɓat͡ʃɔ nɡ̤ɛsililɔ ɛsikʰulu wapʰɛnd̤ula uʃɛkanija uɲana kajɛhijɛli ɔwɔɔɲana ɓakaɛlam watʰi kuɛz̤ra sɛnz̤ɛ uɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ kutʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu saz̤ɛka aɓafaz̤i ɓɛz̤iɲɛ iintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤ɛliz̤wɛ ɛli kɔd̤wa kusɛkʰɔ itʰɛmɓa kumasirajɛli nɡ̤alɛ ntɔ masimɛnz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔku umŋǃɔpʰisɔ utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu wɔkuɓa siɓakʰupʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓafaz̤i naɓaz̤ɛlwɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛkǀɛɓɔ lɛnkɔsi jam nɛlaɓaɡ̤ub̤ɛla imitʰɛtʰɔ jɔtʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu makwɛnz̤iwɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔmjalɛlɔ v̤uka nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lɛ ntɔ ipʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ sinɡ̤akuwɛ jɔmɛlɛla wɛnz̤ɛ wav̤uka uɛz̤ra waɓafunɡ̤isa aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓaɓalɛv̤i naɓamasirajɛli ɔnkɛ ukuɓa ɓɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛlɔ liz̤wi ɓafunɡ̤a kɛ wɛsuka uɛz̤ra pʰamɓi kwɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ wanɡ̤ɛna ɛɡ̤umɓini likajɔhanan uɲana kaɛlijaʃib̤i watʰi kʰɔna akaɮa sɔnka akasɛla manz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓɛsɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ ɓaɓɔ ɓafud̤uswajɔ ɓahamɓisa iliz̤wi kwajud̤a nasɛjɛrusalɛm kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓasɛmfud̤uswɛni lɔkuɓa ɓaɓutʰɛlanɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm ɓatʰi ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰɛ aɓɛz̤a nɡ̤ɛsitʰuɓa sɛmiɬa ɛmitʰatʰu nɡ̤ɔkwɛkǀɛɓɔ laɓatʰɛtʰɛli nɛlamad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu majisinɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰant͡si jɔnkɛ impaɬa jaɓɔ kɛ ɓɔna nɡ̤ɔkwaɓɔ ɓaɬulwɛ nɛɓanɮa lasɛmfud̤uswɛni aɓutʰɛlana ɛjɛrusalɛm ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a nawakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤ɛɛnt͡suku ɛz̤intatʰu jajɛ ijiɲanɡ̤a jɛsitʰɔɓa nɡ̤ɔwamaʃumi amaɓini um̤la wɛɲanɡ̤a lɛjɔ ɓaɬala ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɛɓalɛni lɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ ɓɛŋ̤ǀ̤aŋ̤ǀ̤az̤ɛla jilɛ ntɔ naz̤iimv̤ula wɛsuka wɛma uɛz̤ra umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli watʰi kuɓɔ nɛnz̤ɛ uɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ niz̤ɛkɛ aɓafaz̤i ɓɛz̤iɲɛ iintlanɡ̤a ukuz̤ɛ nɔnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛ ɛtʲalɛni lamasirajɛli mz̤ukisɛni nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɔɔjiɬɔ nɛnz̤ɛ ɔkukʰɔlɛkilɛjɔ kujɛ niz̤aɬulɛ kwiz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɛli liz̤wɛ nakuɓafaz̤i ɓɛz̤iɲɛ iintlanɡ̤a lapʰɛnd̤ula lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa latʰi nɡ̤ɛz̤wi ɛlikʰulu kufanɛlɛkilɛ kutʰi ukuɓa sɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi lakʰɔ kɔd̤wa aɓantu ɓaninz̤i jajɛ ilikǁɛʃa lɛmv̤ula pʰanɮɛ lɔ msɛɓɛnz̤i asinɡ̤ɔwɛmini ɛɲɛ asinɡ̤ɔwɛɛmini ɛz̤imɓini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sɔnɛ kakʰulu nɡ̤alɛ ntɔ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛtʰu kɛ maɓalimɛlɛ iɓanɮa lɔnkɛ ɓatʰi ɓɔnkɛ ɛmiz̤ini jɛtʰu aɓaz̤ɛkɛ aɓafaz̤i ɓɛz̤iɲɛ iintlanɡ̤a ɓɛz̤ɛ nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa amisiwɛjɔ ɓɛnamad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ɛmiz̤i nɡ̤ɛmiz̤i naɓaɡ̤wɛɓi ɓajɔ kud̤ɛ kuɓujiswɛ kutʰi ukuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ wɔtʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu isɛkʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ lɛ ntɔ nɡ̤ɔɔjɔnatan uɲana kaasajɛli nɔjaz̤ɛja uɲana katikwa ɓɔd̤wa aɓamɛlana nɛlɔ liz̤wi ɔɔmɛʃulam nɔʃab̤ɛtaji umlɛv̤i ɓɛɓaŋǀɛd̤isa ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓasɛmfud̤uswɛni kwaɬulwa ɔɔɛz̤ra umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli namad̤ɔd̤a az̤iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓɛɓalulwɛ nɡ̤amaɡ̤ama ɓaɬala pʰant͡si nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɔkukǃala wɛɲanɡ̤a jɛʃumi ukujiɓuz̤a lɛ ntɔ ɓajiɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa intɔ jɔnkɛ jamad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛz̤ɛkɛ aɓafaz̤i ɓɛz̤iɲɛ iintlanɡ̤a ɛlusukwini lɔkukǃala lwɛɲanɡ̤a jɔkukǃala kɔɔɲana ɓaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kwafuɲanwa aɓaɓɛz̤ɛkɛ aɓafaz̤i ɓɛz̤iɲɛ iintlanɡ̤a kɔɔɲana ɓakajɛʃuwa uɲana kajɔt͡sad̤aki naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ inɡ̤ɔɔmahasɛja nɔɛlijɛz̤ɛrɛ nɔjarib̤i nɔɡ̤ɛd̤alija ɓanika isanɮa saɓɔ ukuɓa ɓɔɓakʰupʰa aɓafaz̤i ɓaɓɔ ɓatʰi ɓɛnɛtʲala nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɓakʰupʰɛ inkunz̤i jasɛmpaɬɛni ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛtʲala laɓɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakaimɛrɛ janɡ̤uhanani nɔz̤ɛb̤ad̤ija kɔɔɲana ɓakaharim janɡ̤umahasɛja nɔɛlija nɔʃɛmaja nɔjɛhijɛli nɔuz̤ija kɔɔɲana ɓakapaʃurɛ janɡ̤uɛlijɔhɛnaji nɔmahasɛja nɔiʃmajɛli nɔnatanijɛli nɔjɔz̤ab̤ad̤i nɔɛlijasa nakuɓalɛv̤i janɡ̤ujɔz̤ab̤ad̤i nɔʃimɛhi nɔkɛlaja ɔkwanɡ̤ukɛlita nɔpɛtaja nɔjud̤a nɔɛlijɛz̤ɛrɛ kwiimv̤umi janɡ̤uɛlijaʃib̤i kwaɓamasanɡ̤ɔ janɡ̤uʃalum nɔtɛlɛm nɔuri kumasirajɛli kɔɔɲana ɓakaparɔʃɛ janɡ̤uramija nɔiz̤ija nɔmalɛkija nɔmijamin nɔɛlaz̤arɛ nɔmalɛkija nɔb̤ɛnaja kɔɔɲana ɓakaɛlam janɡ̤umatanija nɔz̤ɛkarija nɔjɛhijɛli nɔab̤ɛd̤i nɔjɛrɛmɔti nɔɛlija kɔɔɲana ɓakaz̤atu janɡ̤uɛlijɔhɛnaji nɔɛlijaʃib̤i nɔmatanija nɔjɛrɛmɔti nɔz̤ab̤ad̤i nɔaz̤iz̤a nakɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛb̤aji janɡ̤ujɔhanan nɔhananija nɔz̤ab̤ad̤i nɔatɛlaji kɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ani janɡ̤umɛʃulam nɔmaluki nɔad̤aja nɔjaʃub̤i nɔʃɛhali nɔjɛrɛmɔti kɔɔɲana ɓakapahati wakwamɔwab̤i janɡ̤uad̤ɛna nɔkɛlali nɔb̤ɛnaja nɔmahasɛja nɔmatanija nɔb̤ɛt͡salɛli nɔb̤inwi nɔmanasɛ kɔɔɲana ɓakaharim janɡ̤uɛlijɛz̤ɛrɛ nɔiʃija nɔmalɛkija nɔʃɛmaja nɔsimɔn nɔb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɔmaluki nɔʃɛmarija kɔɔɲana ɓakahaʃum janɡ̤umatɛnaji nɔmatata nɔz̤ab̤ad̤i nɔɛlifɛlɛtɛ nɔjɛrɛmaji nɔmanasɛ nɔʃimɛhi kɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ani janɡ̤umahad̤aji nɔamram nɔuwɛli nɔb̤ɛnaja nɔb̤ɛd̤ɛja nɔkɛlwi nɔv̤anija nɔmɛrɛmɔti nɔɛlijaʃib̤i nɔmatanija nɔmatɛnaji nɔjahasav̤i nɔb̤ani nɔb̤inwi nɔʃimɛhi nɔʃɛlɛmija nɔnatan nɔad̤aja nɔmakɛnad̤ɛb̤aji nɔʃaʃaji nɔʃaraji nɔaz̤arɛli nɔʃɛlɛmija nɔʃɛmarija nɔʃalum nɔamarija nɔjɔsɛfu kɔɔɲana ɓakanab̤ɔ janɡ̤ujɛhijɛli nɔmatitija nɔz̤ab̤ad̤i nɔz̤ɛb̤ina nɔjad̤aji nɔjɔwɛli nɔb̤ɛnaja ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ ɓaɓɛz̤ɛkɛ aɓafaz̤i ɓɛz̤iɲɛ iintlanɡ̤a ɓɛkukʰɔ pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ aɓafaz̤i aɓaɓɛz̤ɛlɛ ɔɔɲana iɓali likanɛhɛmija uɲana kahakalija kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤ukislɛv̤u nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi amaɓini nd̤akuɓɔna ukuɓa nd̤isɛʃuʃan kɔmkʰulu uhanani ɔmɲɛ wakuɓaz̤alwana ɓam ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a av̤ɛla kwajud̤a nd̤aɓaɓuz̤a iind̤aɓa z̤amajud̤a amasalɛla asind̤ilɛjɔ ɛkutʰind͡ʒ̤wɛni nɛz̤ɛjɛrusalɛm ɓatʰi amakǃɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔ asɛlɛ ɛkutʰind͡ʒ̤wɛni kwajud̤a asɛɓuɓini ɔɓukʰulu nasɛkuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤wɛni nɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a lwɛjɛrusalɛm lukǃʰɛkɛkilɛ namasanɡ̤ɔ ajɔ at͡ʃɛ nɡ̤umlilɔ kwatʰi nd̤akuwɛv̤a maz̤wi nd̤aɬala pʰant͡si nd̤alila nd̤ɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili iint͡suku nd̤az̤ila ukuɮa nd̤atʰand̤az̤a pʰamɓi kɔtʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu nd̤atʰi kǀamaɡ̤u jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu tʰikǁɔ ɔmkʰulu ɔwɔjikɛkajɔ ɔɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inɛlajɔ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nɛŋǀɛɓa aɓamtʰand̤ajɔ aɓajiɡ̤ǀ̤inajɔ imitʰɛtʰɔ jakʰɛ inɮɛɓɛ jakʰɔ majikʰɛ iɓaz̤ɛkɛ namɛɬɔ akʰɔ makʰɛ av̤ulɛkɛ ukuz̤ɛ uwupʰulapʰulɛ umtʰand̤az̤ɔ wɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ɛnd̤iwutʰand̤az̤ajɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔku nɔɓusuku nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ nɔkuz̤ikǁɛla iz̤ɔnɔ z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛsɔnɛ nɡ̤az̤ɔ kuwɛ mna nɛnɮu kaɓawɔ sɔnilɛ sɔnakalisilɛ sɛnz̤a uɓuɓi nɡ̤akuwɛ asijiɡ̤ǀ̤inanɡ̤a imitʰɛtʰɔ nɛmimisɛlɔ namasikɔ ɔɓumwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤awɔ umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ kʰawulikʰumɓulɛ iliz̤wi ɔwamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤alɔ umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ɛlitʰi ukuɓa nitʰɛ nɛnz̤a uɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ nd̤ɔnikǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰɛla ɛz̤iz̤wɛni kɛ ukuɓa nitʰɛ naɓujɛla najiɡ̤ǀ̤ina imitʰɛtʰɔ jam najɛnz̤a nɔkuɓa kutʰɛ kwaɓakʰɔ aɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛlwɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛz̤ulu nd̤ɔɓaɓutʰa nalapʰɔ nd̤iɓaz̤isɛ kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ nd̤ijiɲulɛlɛ ukuliɓɛka kujɔ iɡ̤ama aɓa kɛ nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ naɓantu ɓakʰɔ ɔwaɓakʰulula nɡ̤amanɮa akʰɔ amakʰulu nanɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɔ ɛsitʰɛ ŋ̰ǃ̰i kǀamaɡ̤u nkɔsi jam inɮɛɓɛ jakʰɔ majikʰɛ iɓaz̤ɛlwɛ umtʰand̤az̤ɔ wɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ nɔmtʰand̤az̤ɔ waɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ aɓatʰand̤a ukɔjika iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ kʰawumpʰumɛlɛlisɛ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ nam̤la umfumanisɛ imfɛsanɛ pʰamɓi kwalɛ nd̤ɔd̤a kɛ nd̤iɓɛ nd̤inɡ̤umŋ̤ǀ̤amli kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤unisan nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi amaɓini kaartaʃaʃta jaɓakʰɔ iwajini pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ nd̤ajitʰaɓatʰa iwajini lɛjɔ nd̤ajinika kɛ nd̤iɓɛ nd̤inɡ̤az̤anɡ̤a nd̤iɓɔnakalɛ nd̤itʰɛ kʰunuɓɛmɓɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ watʰi kunɡ̤ani ukuɓa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ ɓuɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓa ɓuɓi unɡ̤afi nd͡ʒ̤ɛ lɛ ntɔ ɓuɓuɓi ɓɛntliz̤ijɔ asintɔ jimɓi nd̤ɔjika kɛ kakʰulu kunɛnɛ nd̤atʰi ukumkani makaɮɛ uɓɔmi nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ ɓɛɓunɡ̤atʰini ukuɓa uɓusɔ ɓam ɓunɡ̤aɓi ɓuɓi uliŋǁuwa nd͡ʒ̤ɛ umz̤i lɔwa ind̤awɔ jamaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ɔɔɓawɔ amasanɡ̤ɔ awɔ ɛt͡ʃiswɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ watʰi ufuna ntɔni kɛ nd̤atʰand̤az̤a kɛ kutʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu nd̤atʰi ukuɓa kutʰɛ kwalunɡ̤a ukuɓa umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ utʰɛ walunɡ̤isa pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ nd̤inɡ̤a unɡ̤and̤itʰuma kwajud̤a kuwɔ umz̤i wamaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ɔɔɓawɔ nd̤iwakʰɛ watʰi ukumkanikaz̤i ɛɬɛli nɡ̤asɛkǀalɛni lakʰɛ uhamɓɔ lwakʰɔ lɔɓa lɔlwɛkǁɛʃa ɛlinɡ̤akanani wɔɓuja kwalunɡ̤a kɛ ukund̤itʰuma nd̤akuɓa nd̤immisɛlɛ ikǁɛʃa nd̤atʰi ukuɓa kutʰɛ kwalunɡ̤a mand̤inikwɛ iŋǀwad̤i ɛja kumaɓamɓa apʰɛʃɛja kɔmlamɓɔ and̤ijɛkɛ nd̤iɮulɛ nd̤id̤ɛ nd̤ijɛ kwajud̤a nɛŋǀwad̤i ɛja kuasafu umɡ̤ǀ̤ini wɛɬatʰi lɔkumkani ukuɓa and̤inikɛ imitʰi jɛmikǃad̤i jamasanɡ̤ɔ ɛŋǃaɓa ɛlunɡ̤ɛ kwinɮu nɛjɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a lɔmz̤i nɛjɛnɮu ɛnd̤ija kuɬala kujɔ wand̤inika kɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛsanɮa sikatʰikǁɔ ɛsilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛsipʰɛz̤u nd̤afika kumaɓamɓa anɡ̤anɛnɔ kɔmlamɓɔ nd̤awanika iiŋǀwad̤i z̤ɔkumkani kɛ kalɔku uɓɛnd̤ikʰupʰɛlɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛmpi naɓamahaʃɛ ɓatʰi kɛ ɔɔsanɛb̤alati wasɛhɔrɔn nɔtɔb̤ija umkʰɔnz̤i umamɔn ɓakujiv̤a lɔɔ ntɔ kwaɓa kuɓi kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɔɓuɓi ɔɓukʰulu ukuɓa kufikɛ ɔfuna ukuɓa kulunɡ̤ɛ kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nd̤afika kɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm nd̤aɓa nɛɛnt͡suku z̤antatʰu kʰɔna nd̤ɛsuka ɛɓusuku nd̤inamad̤ɔd̤a amɓalwa and̤ikǁɛlɛlanɡ̤a intɔ aɓɛjinɡ̤ɛnisɛ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam utʰikǁɔ ukuɓa nd̤ijɛnz̤ɛlɛ ijɛrusalɛm nd̤iɓɛ nd̤inɡ̤ɛnamakǃɛɡ̤u iɓilɛlɔ lɔd̤wa ɓɛnd̤ikʰwɛlɛ kulɔ nd̤apʰuma kɛ ɛɓusuku nɡ̤ɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɔmfula nd̤asinɡ̤a ɛmtʰɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛni wɛnamɓa nasɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɛz̤ala nd̤ilɔlɔnɡ̤a iind̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤ikǃʰɛkɛkilɛ namasanɡ̤ɔ ajɔ aɓɛt͡ʃiswɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ nd̤aɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛla ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔmtʰɔmɓɔ nasɛkǀʰiɓini lɔkumkani akwaɓakʰɔ nd̤awɔ jɔkuɓa litʰuɓɛlɛz̤ɛ kujɔ ikǃɛɡ̤u ɛnd̤and̤ikʰwɛlɛ kulɔ nd̤akʰwɛz̤a kɛ isiɬamɓɔ nɡ̤ɔɓusuku nd̤ilɔlɔnɡ̤a ud̤ɔnɡ̤a nd̤aɓuja nd̤anɡ̤ɛna nɡ̤ɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɔmfula nd̤aɓuja kɛ kɛ kalɔku aɓapʰatʰi ɓaɓɛnɡ̤az̤i apʰɔ nd̤and̤ijɛ kʰɔna nɛntɔ ɛnd̤and̤ijɛ kujɛnz̤a ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤ɛkawakǁɛlɛli amajud̤a naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓanumz̤ana naɓapʰatʰi naɓaɲɛ aɓɛnz̤a umsɛɓɛnz̤i nd̤atʰi kuɓɔ nijaɓuɓɔna uɓuɓi ɛsikuɓɔ ukuɓa ijɛrusalɛm iliŋǁuwa namasanɡ̤ɔ ajɔ at͡ʃiswɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ jiz̤ani sakʰɛ ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lwɛjɛrusalɛm sinɡ̤aɓi saɓa luŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ nd̤aɓakǁɛlɛla ukulunɡ̤a kwɛsanɮa sɔtʰikǁɔ pʰɛz̤u namaz̤wi ɔkumkani awawatʰɛtʰajɔ ɓatʰi masisukɛ sakʰɛ ɓaz̤ɔmɛlɛz̤a iz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ ukuwɛnz̤a lɔ msɛɓɛnz̤i ulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɓatʰi kɛ ɔɔsanɛb̤alati wasɛhɔrɔn nɔtɔb̤ija umkʰɔnz̤i umamɔn nɔɡ̤ɛʃɛm umarab̤i ɓakujiv̤a lɔɔ ntɔ ɓasiɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛla ɓasid̤ɛla ɓatʰi jintɔni lɛ ntɔ nijɛnz̤ajɔ nija kuɡ̤wilika nd̤aɓapʰɛnd̤ula nd̤atʰi kuɓɔ utʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu nɡ̤ujɛ ɔja kusipʰumɛlɛlisa tʰina ɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ sija sakʰɛ kɛ aninasaɓɛlɔ nalunɡ̤ɛlɔ nasikʰumɓuz̤ɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm wɛsuka kɛ uɛlijaʃib̤i umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔmkʰulu naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓalakʰa isanɡ̤ɔ lɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ ɓaliŋ̤ǀ̤walisa ɓɔna ɓaz̤i iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤alɔ ɓakʰa ɓɛsa ɛŋǃaɓɛni ɛnd̤ɛ jɛmɛha ɓajiŋ̤ǀ̤walisa ɓɛsa ɛŋǃaɓɛni ɛnd̤ɛ kahananɛli nɡ̤akujɛ kwakusakʰa amad̤ɔd̤a asɛjɛrikɔ nɡ̤akuwɔ kwakusakʰa uz̤akurɛ uɲana kaimri ɔɔɲana ɓakasɛnaha ɓalakʰa isanɡ̤ɔ lɛɛntlanz̤i ɓɔna ɓaliɬanɡ̤anisa nɡ̤ɛmikǃad̤i ɓaz̤ifaka iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤alɔ nɛz̤it͡ʃikǁɔ z̤alɔ nɛmiv̤alɔ jalɔ nɡ̤akuɓɔ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤umɛrɛmɔti uɲana kaurija uɲana kahakɔt͡sɛ nɡ̤akuɓɔ kulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤umɛʃulam uɲana kab̤ɛrɛkija uɲana kamɛʃɛz̤ab̤ɛli nɡ̤akuɓɔ kulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤ut͡sad̤ɔki uɲana kab̤ahana nɡ̤akuɓɔ kulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤aɓasɛtɛkɔwa kɛ iinɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa z̤aɓɔ az̤iz̤inɡ̤ɛnisanɡ̤a z̤ɔna iintamɔ z̤az̤ɔ ɛnkɔnz̤wɛni jɛnkɔsi jaz̤ɔ isanɡ̤ɔ lɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a ɔlud̤ala lalilunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤ɔjɔjad̤a uɲana kapasɛha nɔmɛʃulam uɲana kab̤ɛsɔd̤ija ɓɔna ɓaliɬanɡ̤anisa nɡ̤ɛmikǃad̤i ɓaz̤ifaka iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤alɔ nɛz̤it͡ʃikǁɔ z̤alɔ nɛmiv̤alɔ jalɔ nɡ̤akuɓɔ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤umɛlatija wasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn nɔjad̤ɔn wasɛmɛrɔnɔti namad̤ɔd̤a asɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn nawasɛmiz̤pa kwɛsa ɛsiɬalwɛni sɛɓamɓa lanɡ̤anɛnɔ kɔmlamɓɔ nɡ̤akujɛ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤uuz̤ijɛli uɲana kaharɛhaja wɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɡ̤akujɛ kulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤uhananija uɲana waɓakǃʰɔli ɓajakʰa ijɛrusalɛm ɓasa ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni ɔluɓanz̤i nɡ̤akuɓɔ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤urɛfaja uɲana kahurɛ umpʰatʰi wɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsitʰili sasɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤akuɓɔ kulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤ujɛd̤aja uɲana kaharumafi malunɡ̤ana nɛnɮu jakʰɛ nɡ̤akujɛ kulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤uhatuʃɛ uɲana kahaʃab̤ɛnija ɛsiɲɛ isitʰuɓa sɛsiɓini nɛŋǃaɓa ɛnd̤ɛ jamaz̤ikɔ sasilunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤umalɛkija uɲana kaharim nɔhaʃub̤i uɲana kapahati wakwamɔwab̤i nɡ̤akujɛ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤uʃalum uɲana kahalɔhɛʃɛ umpʰatʰi wɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsitʰili sasɛjɛrusalɛm jɛna nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ isanɡ̤ɔ lɔmfula lalilunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤uhanun naɓɛmi ɓasɛz̤anɔwa ɓɔna ɓalakʰa ɓaz̤ifaka iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤alɔ nɛz̤it͡ʃikǁɔ z̤alɔ nɛmiv̤alɔ jalɔ nɛwaka lɛɛkub̤itɛ ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni kwad̤a kwɛsa ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɛz̤ala isanɡ̤ɔ lɛz̤ala lalilunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤umalɛkija uɲana karɛkab̤i umpʰatʰi wɛsitʰili sɛb̤ɛtɛkɛrɛm walakʰa waz̤ifaka iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤alɔ nɛz̤it͡ʃikǁɔ z̤alɔ nɛmiv̤alɔ jalɔ isanɡ̤ɔ lɔmtʰɔmɓɔ lalilunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤uʃalum uɲana kakɔlihɔz̤ɛ umpʰatʰi wɛsitʰili sasɛmiz̤pa jɛna walakʰa walifulɛla waz̤ifaka iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤alɔ nɛz̤it͡ʃikǁɔ z̤alɔ nɛmiv̤alɔ jalɔ walulunɡ̤isa nɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a lwɛkǀʰiɓi lɛsilɔwa nɡ̤asɛmjɛz̤wɛni wɔkumkani kwɛsa ɛz̤iɲukwɛni z̤ɔkuɬa kuv̤ɛlwa ɛmz̤ini kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤unɛhɛmija uɲana kaaz̤ɛb̤uki umpʰatʰi wɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsitʰili sɛb̤ɛtɛt͡surɛ kwɛsa malunɡ̤a namaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa kad̤av̤id̤ɛ kwɛsa ɛkǀʰiɓini ɛliɓɛ lɛnz̤iwɛ kwɛsa nasɛnɮwini jamaɡ̤ɔxa ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤aɓalɛv̤i ɓakarɛhum uɲana kab̤ani nɡ̤akujɛ kulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤uhaʃab̤ija umpʰatʰi wɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsitʰili sɛkɛhila ɛsitʰilini sakʰɛ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤aɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ ub̤awaji uɲana kahɛnad̤ad̤ɛ umpʰatʰi wɛsiɲɛ isikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛsitʰili sɛkɛhila nɡ̤akujɛ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤uɛz̤ɛrɛ uɲana kajɛʃuwa umpʰatʰi wɛmiz̤pa ɛsiɲɛ isitʰuɓa malunɡ̤a nɛnd̤awɔ ɛɲukajɔ nɡ̤asɛnɮwini jɛz̤ik͡xwɛkǃɛ ɛkud͡ʒ̤ikɛni ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ kwaz̤ɔnd̤ɛlɛlwa kwalunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤ub̤aruki uɲana kaz̤ab̤aji ɛsiɲɛ isitʰuɓa kwatʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkud͡ʒ̤ikɛni kwɛsa ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛnɮu kaɛlijaʃib̤i umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔmkʰulu ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤umɛrɛmɔti uɲana kaurija uɲana kahakɔt͡si ɛsiɲɛ isitʰuɓa kwatʰaɓatʰɛla ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛnɮu kaɛlijaʃib̤i kwɛsa ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛnɮu kaɛlijaʃib̤i ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli amad̤ɔd̤a alɔɔ mmanɮa ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤ub̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɔhaʃub̤i malunɡ̤a nɛnɮu jaɓɔ ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤uaz̤arija uɲana kamahasɛja uɲana kaananija nɡ̤asɛnɮwini jakʰɛ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤ub̤inwi uɲana kahɛnad̤ad̤ɛ ɛsiɲɛ isitʰuɓa kwatʰaɓatʰɛla ɛnɮwini kaaz̤arija kwɛsa ɛkud͡ʒ̤ikɛni kwɛsa ɛmɓɔmɓɛni kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤upalali uɲana kauz̤aji ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla malunɡ̤a ɛkud͡ʒ̤ikɛni nasɛŋǃaɓɛni ɛpʰɛz̤ulu ɛd̤ulusɛlɛ ɛnɮwini jɔkumkani nɡ̤asɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni jɛntɔlɔnɡ̤ɔ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤upɛd̤aja uɲana kaparɔʃɛ kɛ kalɔku aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛtɛmpilɛ ɓaɓɛɬala ɛɔfɛlɛ ɓɛsa malunɡ̤a nɛsanɡ̤ɔ lamanz̤i ɛmpumalanɡ̤a nɛŋǃaɓa ɛnd̤ɛ ɛd̤ulusɛlɛ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤aɓasɛtɛkɔwa ɛsiɲɛ isitʰuɓa ɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛla malunɡ̤ana nɛŋǃaɓa ɛnkulu ɛd̤ulusɛlɛ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ ɓɛsa ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni lwɛɔfɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛntla kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ lamahaʃɛ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛlɔwɔ nalɔwɔ malunɡ̤a nɛnɮu jakʰɛ ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤ut͡sad̤ɔki uɲana kaimɛrɛ malunɡ̤a nɛnɮu jakʰɛ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ kulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤uʃɛmaja uɲana kaʃɛkanija umɡ̤ǀ̤ini wɛsanɡ̤ɔ lanɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤uhananija uɲana kaʃɛlɛmija nɔhanun uɲana wɛsitʰand̤atʰu kat͡salafi ɛsiɲɛ isitʰuɓa ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤umɛʃulam uɲana kab̤ɛrɛkija malunɡ̤a nɛɡ̤umɓi lakʰɛ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ kwakulunɡ̤iswa nɡ̤umalɛkija ɔwɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ kwɛsa kwinɮu jaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛtɛmpilɛ nɛjaɓatʰɛnɡ̤i malunɡ̤a nɛsanɡ̤ɔ likamifɛkad̤i kwɛsa kwiɡ̤umɓi ɛlipʰɛz̤ulu lɛmɓɔmɓɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛɡ̤umɓi ɛlipʰɛz̤ulu lɛmɓɔmɓɔ nɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ kwakulunɡ̤iswa z̤iiŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ naɓatʰɛnɡ̤i kwatʰi akuv̤a usanɛb̤alati ukuɓa sijalwakʰa ud̤ɔnɡ̤a wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ wakǃumɓa kunɛnɛ wawaŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a amajud̤a watʰɛtʰa pʰamɓi kwaɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ nɛmpi jakwasamari watʰi ɛnz̤a ntɔni
