majud̤a ant͡ʃwɛɲilɛjɔ ɔz̤iŋǃaɓisa ɔɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla ɔɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa nam̤la ɔwav̤usa amatʲɛ kwɛz̤i mfumɓa z̤ɔtʰuli ɛt͡ʃilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ kɛ utɔb̤ija umamɔn ɛnɡ̤akujɛ watʰi nalɛ ntɔ ajakʰajɔ kunɡ̤atʰi kuɲukɛ impunɡ̤utʲɛ lɛ ilukǃʰɛkɛz̤ɛ ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lwawɔ lwamatʲɛ jiv̤a tʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sid̤ɛliwɛ ukuɓujisɛlɛ ɛz̤intlɔkwɛni z̤aɓɔ ukuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a kwaɓɔ uɓanikɛlɛ ɛkupʰanɡ̤wɛni ɛliz̤wɛni laɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa musa ukuɓusɛlɛla uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ ukusikǀima isɔnɔ saɓɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓakukǃumɓisilɛ pʰamɓi kwaɓakʰi salwakʰa kɛ ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lwad̤itʲaniswa lɔnkɛ ud̤ɔnɡ̤a kwɛsa ɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰɛni sɔkupʰakama kwalɔ aɓantu ɓaɓɛnɛntliz̤ijɔ jɔkusɛɓɛnz̤a kwatʰi akuv̤a usanɛb̤alati nɔtɔb̤ija namaarab̤i namaamɔn namaaʃd̤ɔd̤ɛ ukuɓa z̤ijɛɲuswa iind̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤ɛjɛrusalɛm ukuɓa z̤ikǃaliwɛ z̤ijav̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wa iintand̤a wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ waɓɔ kunɛnɛ ɓakǀɛɓisana kuɲɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ukuɓa ɓɛz̤ɛ nɛjɛrusalɛm ɓajɔnakalisɛ satʰand̤az̤a kutʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu aɓɔkulind̤a nɔɓusuku nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓɔ atʰi amajud̤a amanɮa aɓatʰwali ɓɛmitʰwalɔ ajɛtʰa ininz̤i tʰina asinakulwakʰa ud̤ɔnɡ̤a aɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓɛtʰu aɓɔ ɓaɓɛsitʰi akaji kwaz̤i akaji kuɓɔna sid̤ɛ sinɡ̤ɛnɛ pʰakatʰi kwawɔ siwaɓulalɛ siwumisɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i kwatʰi akuz̤a amajud̤a aɓɛɬɛli ɛmakǀalɛni aɓɔ atʰɛtʰa kutʰi iz̤iɬanɮɔ z̤aliʃumi ɛpʰuma ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɛsitʰi ɓujɛlani kutʰi nd̤ɛsuka nd̤amisa ɛz̤ind̤awɛni ɛz̤isɛz̤ant͡si ɛmv̤a kɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a ɛz̤ind̤awɛni ɛz̤iɓalɛlɛlwa lilanɡ̤a nd̤amisa aɓantu nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiz̤alwanɛ ɓɛnamak͡xɛlɛ aɓɔ nɛz̤ikʰali z̤aɓɔ nɛz̤apʰɛtʰa z̤aɓɔ nd̤akʰanɡ̤ɛla nd̤asuka nd̤atʰi kuɓanumz̤ana nakuɓapʰatʰi nakwaɓaɲɛ aɓantu musani ukuɓɔjika kʰumɓulani inkɔsi ɛnkulu ɛjɔjikɛkajɔ nilwɛlɛ aɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu nɔɔɲana ɓɛnu nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤ɛnu naɓafaz̤i ɓɛnu nɛz̤inɮu z̤ɛnu kwatʰi z̤akuv̤a iint͡ʃaɓa z̤ɛtʰu ukuɓa sijaz̤i tʰina nɔkuɓa utʰikǁɔ ulit͡ʃit͡ʃisilɛ ikǃʰinɡ̤a laz̤ɔ saɓujɛla sɔnkɛ sipʰɛla ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni ɛlɔwɔ ɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini wakʰɛ kwatʰi ukususɛla kulɔɔ ɛsiɲɛ isikǃinɡ̤atʰa samad̤ɔd̤ana sasɛɓɛnz̤a ɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini ɛsiɲɛ isikǃinɡ̤atʰa sapʰatʰa iz̤ikʰali nɛɛnɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ iz̤apʰɛtʰa nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɛnt͡simɓi kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ aɓapʰatʰi ɓaɓɛjikǁʰasilɛ jɔnkɛ inɮu kajud̤a kɛ aɓa ɓaɓɛsakʰa ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni naɓatʰwala imitʰwalɔ ɓaɓɛtʰwala nɡ̤ɛsiɲɛ isanɮa ɛsiɓɛ sisɛɓɛnz̤a ɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini ɓapʰatʰɛ iz̤ikʰali nɡ̤ɛsiɲɛ naɓakʰi ɓaɓɛsakʰa ɓɛŋǁiɓɛ ɛlɔwɔ ik͡xɛlɛ lakʰɛ ɛsiŋǃɛni sakʰɛ ɔv̤utʰɛla isiɡ̤ɔɮɔ uɓɛsɛkǀalɛni nd̤atʰi kuɓanumz̤ana nakuɓapʰatʰi nakwaɓaɲɛ aɓantu umsɛɓɛnz̤i lɔ mkʰulu uɓanz̤i tʰina sitʰɛ ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni ɔmɲɛ ɛkud̤ɛ kɔmɲɛ ɛnd̤awɛni ɛnitʰɛ nɛv̤a iliz̤wi lɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ nɔɓutʰɛlana kujɔ utʰikǁɔ wɔsilwɛla sasisɛɓɛnz̤a ɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini isikǃinɡ̤atʰa sawɔ sipʰɛtʰɛ iz̤ikʰali sikǃalɛla ɛkupʰumɛni kwɛsifinɡ̤ɔ siz̤isɛ ɛkuv̤ɛlɛni kwɛɛnkwɛnkwɛz̤i kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤atʰi nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa ɛɓantwini ɛlɔwɔ nɛnd̤ɔd̤ana jakwakʰɛ makalalɛ pʰakatʰi ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛɓusuku ukuz̤ɛ ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓalind̤i kutʰi ɛɓusuku ɛmini ɓaɓɛ sɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini kɛ naɓaz̤alwana ɓam namad̤ɔd̤ana namad̤ɔd̤a alind̤ajɔ aɓɛnd̤iland̤ɛla siɓɛ sinɡ̤az̤ikʰululi iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɛtʰu ɛlɔwɔ ɛɓɛnɛk͡xɛlɛ lakʰɛ kwɛsɔkunɛnɛ kɛ kalɔku kwaɓakʰɔ ukukʰala ɔkukʰulu kwaɓantu naɓafaz̤i ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤aɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ amajud̤a ɓɛkukʰɔ aɓaɓɛsitʰi siɓaninz̤i tʰina ɔɔɲana ɓɛtʰu nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤ɛtʰu masamkɛlɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa ukuz̤ɛ siɮɛ sipʰilɛ ɓɛkukʰɔ naɓaɓɛsitʰi amasimi ɛtʰu nɛz̤id̤ilija z̤ɛtʰu nɛz̤inɮu z̤ɛtʰu siɓamɓisilɛ nɡ̤az̤ɔ masamkɛlɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnɮala ɓɛkukʰɔ naɓaɓɛsitʰi siɓɔlɛkɛ jɔkuxafɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓamɓisa nɡ̤amasimi ɛtʰu nɛz̤id̤ilija z̤ɛtʰu kalɔku iɲama jɛtʰu ikwand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɲama jaɓaz̤alwana ɓɛtʰu nɔɔɲana ɓɛtʰu ɓakwand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ sijaɓaɲanz̤ɛla ɔɔɲana ɓɛtʰu nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤ɛtʰu ukuɓa ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤amakʰɔɓɔka ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤ɛtʰu kukʰɔ nɛsɛz̤iɲanz̤ɛlwɛ akukʰɔ manɮa ɛsanɮɛni sɛtʰu ɛtʰu nɛz̤id̤ilija z̤ɛtʰu z̤iz̤ɛz̤aɓaɲɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ wav̤utʰa kɛ kakʰulu umsind̤ɔ nd̤akukuv̤a ukukʰala kwaɓɔ nalɔɔ maz̤wi nd̤afuna ikǃʰinɡ̤a ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam nd̤aɓamɓana naɓanumz̤ana naɓapʰatʰi nd̤atʰi kuɓɔ nijaɮana nɡ̤ɔkuɓɔlɛka nd̤aɓamisɛla iɓanɮa ɛlikʰulu nd̤atʰi kuɓɔ tʰina nɡ̤anɡ̤ɔkɔ sinakɔ siɓatʰɛnɡ̤ilɛ saɓakʰulula aɓaz̤alwana ɓɛtʰu amajud̤a ɛɓɛ kutʰɛnɡ̤iswɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ kwiintlanɡ̤a nija kɛ nitʰɛnɡ̤isɛ nɡ̤aɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu ukuz̤ɛ ɓatʰɛnɡ̤isɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤ikǃu z̤aɓɔ kutʰi ɓatʰi kǀwaka aɓafumana liz̤wi lakupʰɛnd̤ula nd̤atʰi ajilunɡ̤ilɛ lɛ ntɔ nijɛnz̤ajɔ niɓɛ ninɡ̤afanɛlɛ ukuhamɓa ɛkɔjikɛni utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛz̤iz̤iint͡ʃaɓa z̤ɛtʰu kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ aɓaz̤alwana ɓam namad̤ɔd̤ana siɓaɓɔlɛkɛ nɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa makʰɛ sikujɛkɛ ɔku kuɓɔlɛka nɡ̤ɔkuɓamɓisa kʰaniɓaɓujisɛlɛ kwanam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ aɓɔ nɛz̤id̤ilija z̤aɓɔ nɛz̤iŋǃuma z̤aɓɔ nɛz̤inɮu z̤aɓɔ nɛsɛkʰulu isaɬulɔ sɛmali nɛsɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛsɛwajini ɛnt͡ʃa nɛsɛɔli ɛnijiɓiz̤ɛ kuɓɔ ijinz̤uz̤ɔ ɓatʰi sija kusiɓujisa sinɡ̤aɓiz̤i ntɔ kuɓɔ sija kwɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔjɔ nd̤aɓiz̤a aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nd̤aɓafunɡ̤isa ukuɓa ɓɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛlɔ liz̤wi kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤av̤utʰulula isɔnd̤ɔ lɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jam nd̤atʰi utʰikǁɔ makɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓav̤utʰulula ɛz̤inɮwini z̤aɓɔ nasɛkukǁɛlɛnɡ̤ɛni kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓanɡ̤aji ɛlɔ liz̤wi maɓɛnd͡ʒ̤iwɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuv̤utʰululwa ɓalamɓatʰɛ latʰi lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa amɛn ɓamd̤umisa ujɛhɔv̤a ɓɛnz̤a kɛ aɓantu nɡ̤ɔkwɛlɔ liz̤wi kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ kususɛla kum̤la ɛnd̤amisɛlwa ukuɓa nd̤iɓɛ liɓamɓa laɓɔ ɛz̤wɛni lakwajud̤a nd̤itʰaɓatʰɛla kumɲaka wamaʃumi amaɓini nd̤ɛz̤isa kumɲaka wamaʃumi amatʰatʰu anamiɓini kaartaʃaʃta ijimiɲaka ɛliʃumi ɛlinamiɓini naɓaz̤alwana ɓam asiɮanɡ̤a kuɮa kwaɓamɓa kɛ amaɓamɓa ɔkukǃala aɓɛpʰamɓi ɛnz̤a kwaɓa nz̤ima ɛɓantwini atʰaɓatʰa kuɓɔ isɔnka nɛwajini ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ atʰaɓatʰa amaʃumi amanɛ ɛɛʃɛkɛlɛ z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ amad̤ɔd̤ana akwawɔ ɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛɡ̤uɲa ɛɓantwini kɛ and̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤anɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤alɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔjika utʰikǁɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤aɓamɓa ɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini wɔlɔ d̤ɔnɡ̤a asitʰɛnɡ̤anɡ̤a ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤ana ajɛɬanɡ̤anisɛnɛ kʰɔna ɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini kɛ amajud̤a aɓapʰatʰi amad̤ɔd̤a alikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɬanu kwanawɛz̤ajɔ kutʰi ɛv̤ɛla ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɛz̤isid͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛjɔ aɓɛ ɛsɛtafilɛni jam intɔ ɛɓɛ ilunɡ̤isɛlɛlwa ɛɲɛ jaɓa jinkɔmɔ nɛɛɡ̤uʃa ɛz̤ikʰɛtʰiwɛjɔ ɛz̤intand̤atʰu nɛɛntaka ɓɛkusɛnz̤ɛlwa nɛɛntlɔɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ininz̤i z̤ɛwajini nɡ̤ɛɛnt͡suku ɛz̤iliʃumi kulɔɔ ntɔ and̤iɓiz̤anɡ̤a kuɮa kwaɓamɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jajinz̤ima inkɔnz̤ɔ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓa ɓantu nd̤ikʰumɓulɛlɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ tʰikǁɔ nɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ ɛnd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛlɛ aɓa ɓantu kwatʰi kwakuv̤akala kusanɛb̤alati nakutɔb̤ija nakuɡ̤ɛʃɛm umarab̤i nakwɛz̤iɲɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤ɛtʰu ukuɓa nd̤ilwakʰilɛ ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lutʰand̤a kulɔ nakuɓa kwad̤a kwalɛlɔ kǁɛʃa nd̤inɡ̤az̤imisanɡ̤a iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ ɛmasanɡ̤wɛni ɓatʰumɛla usanɛb̤alati nɔɡ̤ɛʃɛm ɓɛsitʰi jiz̤a siɬanɡ̤anɛ kɔmɲɛ wɛmiz̤ana ɛsɛsiɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni sɛɔnɔ ɓaɓɛkǀinɡ̤a ukund̤ɛnz̤a intɔ ɛmɓi nd̤atʰumɛla aɓatʰuɲwa kuɓɔ nd̤atʰi nd̤ɛnz̤a umsɛɓɛnz̤i ɔmkʰulu and̤inakuɬa jini ukuɓa umɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i lɔ nɡ̤ɔkutʰi nd̤iwujɛkɛ nd̤iɬɛ nd̤iz̤ɛ ɓatʰumɛla nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ iz̤iɬanɮɔ z̤az̤inɛ nd̤aɓapʰɛnd̤ula kwanɡ̤ɛlɔ liz̤wi usanɛb̤alati watʰumɛla nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ ind̤ɔd̤ana jakwakʰɛ isiɬanɮɔ sɛsiɬanu inɛŋǀwad̤i ɛv̤ulɛkilɛjɔ ɛsanɮɛni sajɔ kub̤alwɛ kujɔ kwatʰiwa kuv̤akɛlɛ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ut͡ʃɔ nɔɡ̤aʃɛmu ukutʰi wɛna namajud̤a nikǀinɡ̤a ukuɡ̤wilika ulwakʰa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ud̤ɔnɡ̤a ɔlɔ uŋǃwɛnɛlɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani wawɔ nɡ̤ɔkwalɔɔ maz̤wi kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ umisɛ aɓaprɔfɛti ɓɔkumɛmɛz̤a nɡ̤awɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm ɓɛsitʰi kumkani wamajud̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ kuja kuv̤akala nɡ̤ɔkwalɔɔ maz̤wi jiz̤a kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ sikǀɛɓisanɛ nd̤atʰumɛla kujɛ nd̤atʰi akukʰɔ ntɔ ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤alɛjɔ ujitʰɛtʰajɔ ijilɔɔ ntɔ ujikǀamŋ̤ǀ̤ɛ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓɛɓɛsɔjikisa ɓɛsitʰi iz̤anɮa z̤awɔ z̤ija kuwujɛka lɔ msɛɓɛnz̤i unɡ̤ɛnz̤iwa nɡ̤ɔkɔ tʰikǁɔ z̤ɔmɛlɛz̤ɛ iz̤anɮa z̤am nd̤aja ɛnɮwini kaʃɛmaja uɲana kad̤ɛlaja uɲana kamɛhɛtab̤ɛli ɛv̤alɛlwɛ watʰi masiɬanɡ̤anɛ ɛnɮwini katʰikǁɔ nɡ̤apʰakatʰi kwɛtɛmpilɛ siz̤iv̤alɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤ɛtɛmpilɛ lɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaz̤a kukuɓulala ɛɓusuku ɓaja kuz̤a kukuɓulala nd̤atʰi kuɓalɛkɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤am nd͡ʒ̤ɛ jijipʰi ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤am ɛja kunɡ̤ɛna ɛtɛmpilɛni isind̤ɛ and̤iji kunɡ̤ɛna nd̤akǃɔnd̤a ɔ asinɡ̤utʰikǁɔ lɔ umtʰumilɛjɔ isiprɔfɛtɔ ɛsi usitʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤am nɡ̤ɔkukǃɛʃwa nɡ̤usanɛb̤alati nɔtɔb̤ija uɓɛkǃɛʃɛlwɛ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤ɔjikɛ nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ lɔɔ ntɔ nd̤ɔnɛ nd̤iɓɛ nɛɡ̤ama ɛliɓi kuɓɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓand̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɛ ɓakʰumɓulɛ tʰikǁɔ ɔɔtɔb̤ija nɔsanɛb̤alati nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤ɔ z̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ kwanɔnɔwad̤ija umprɔfɛtikaz̤i naɓaɲɛ aɓaprɔfɛti aɓaɓɛnd̤ɔjikisa lwaɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwa ud̤ɔnɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔm̤la wamaʃumi amaɓini anɛsiɬanu kaɛluli nɡ̤ɛmiɬa ɛmaʃumi maɬanu anamiɓini kwatʰi z̤akukuv̤a ɔkɔ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤ɛtʰu z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɔjika z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤isid͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛjɔ z̤ɛtʰa amanɮa ɛmɛɬwɛni az̤ɔ z̤az̤i ukuɓa kuv̤ɛlɛ kutʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ukwɛnz̤iwa kwalɔ msɛɓɛnz̤i kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa aɓanumz̤ana ɓakwajud̤a ɓaz̤ɔnɡ̤ɛz̤a iiŋǀwad̤i ɛz̤ija kutɔb̤ija nɛz̤ikatɔb̤ija ɓɛz̤isiz̤a kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛɓɛɓaninz̤i kwajud̤a aɓaɓɛmfunɡ̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛnɡ̤umjɛni kwaʃɛkanija uɲana kaara nɔjɔhanan uɲana wakʰɛ uɓɛz̤ɛkɛ intɔmɓi kamɛʃulam uɲana kab̤ɛrɛkija kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ukulunɡ̤a kwakʰɛ ɓaɓɛkutʰɛtʰa pʰamɓi namaz̤wi ɓɛwasa kujɛ utɔb̤ija watʰumɛla iiŋǀwad̤i z̤ɔkund̤ɔjikisa kɛ kalɔku kwatʰi lwakwakʰiwa ud̤ɔnɡ̤a nd̤az̤ifaka iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ ɓamiswa aɓamasanɡ̤ɔ naɓav̤umi naɓalɛv̤i ukuɓa ɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i waɓɔ nd̤amwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ uhanani umz̤alwana nɔhananija umpʰatʰi wɛŋǃaɓa nɡ̤ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛjind̤ɔd̤a ɛɲanisɛkilɛjɔ ɛmɔjikajɔ utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓaninz̤i nd̤atʰi kuɓɔ amasanɡ̤ɔ asɛjɛrusalɛm makanɡ̤av̤ulwa lid̤ɛ lifud̤umalɛ ilanɡ̤a ɓatʰi ɓɛsɛmi ɓɛlind̤a ɓaz̤iv̤alɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ ɓaz̤it͡ʃikǁɛ nimisɛ aɓaɡ̤ǀ̤ini aɓanɡ̤aɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm ɛlɔwɔ aɓɛ sɛluɡ̤ǀ̤inwɛni lwakʰɛ ɛlɔwɔ aɓɛ pʰamɓi kwɛnɮu jakʰɛ umz̤i uɓuɓanz̤i nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔmɓini umkʰulu aɓantu ɓɛmɓalwa pʰakatʰi kwawɔ kunɡ̤akʰiwanɡ̤a z̤inɮu utʰikǁɔ wanɡ̤ɛnisa ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam ukuɓa nd̤iɓaɓutʰɛ aɓanumz̤ana naɓapʰatʰi naɓantu ukuɓa nd̤iɓab̤alɛlɛ ɛmiliɓɛni jɔkuz̤alwa nd̤afumana iŋǀwad̤i jɛmiliɓɔ jɔkuz̤alwa kwaɓɔ ɓaɓɛɲukɛ ɛkukǃalɛni nd̤afumana kub̤aliwɛ kʰɔna kwatʰiwa nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa ɔɔɲana ɓɛliz̤wɛ lakwajud̤a aɓaɲukajɔ kwaɓatʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛjɔ ɓasɛmfud̤uswɛni awajɛɓafud̤usilɛ unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli aɓaɓujɛla ɛjɛrusalɛm nakwajud̤a ɛlɔwɔ waɓujɛla ɛmz̤ini wakɔwaɓɔ aɓɛz̤a nɔz̤ɛrub̤ab̤ɛli nɔjɛʃuwa nɔnɛhɛmija nɔaz̤arija nɔrahamija nɔnahamani nɔmɔrd̤ɛkaji nɔb̤ilɛʃan nɔmispɛrɛtɛ nɔb̤iɡ̤ɛv̤aji nɔnɛhum nɔb̤ahana inani lamad̤ɔd̤a aɓantu ɓakwasirajɛli jajilɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakaparɔʃɛ iɓinɡ̤amawaka amaɓini anɛkʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anaɓaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃɛfatija iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰatʰu anamaŋǀi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anaɓaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓakaara iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu anamaŋǀi maɬanu anaɓaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓakapahati wakwamɔwab̤i kɔɔɲana ɓakajɛʃuwa nɔjɔwab̤i iɓinɡ̤amawaka amaɓini anamakʰulu asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anaʃumi liɲɛ linɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛlam iɓiliwaka ɛlinamakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi maɬanu anaɓanɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaz̤atu iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anamaŋǀi manɛ anaɓaɬanu ɔɔɲana ɓakaz̤akaji iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamaŋǀi matʰand̤atʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤inwi iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu anamaŋǀi manɛ anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛb̤aji iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu anamaŋǀi maɓini anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaaz̤ɛɡ̤ad̤i iɓinɡ̤amawaka amaɓini anamakʰulu matʰatʰu anamaŋǀi maɓini anaɓaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓakaad̤ɔnikam iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu anamaŋǀi matʰand̤atʰu anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤iɡ̤ɛv̤aji iɓinɡ̤amawaka amaɓini anamaŋǀi matʰand̤atʰu anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaad̤in iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu anamaŋǀi maɬanu anaɓaɬanu ɔɔɲana ɓakaatɛrɛ kahɛz̤ɛkija iɓinɡ̤amaʃumi asitʰɔɓa anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakahaʃum iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰatʰu anamaŋǀi maɓini anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛt͡saji iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰatʰu anamaŋǀi maɓini anaɓanɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaharifi iɓilikʰulu ɛlinaʃumi liɲɛ linaɓaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn iɓinɡ̤amaʃumi asitʰɔɓa anaɓaɬanu amad̤ɔd̤a asɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm nasɛnɛtɔfa iɓilikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ amad̤ɔd̤a asɛanatɔti iɓilikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɓini anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ amad̤ɔd̤a asɛb̤ɛtɛaz̤ɛmav̤ɛtɛ iɓinɡ̤amaʃumi amanɛ anamaɓini amad̤ɔd̤a asɛkirijatijɛharim nɛkɛfira nɛb̤ɛrɔti iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamaŋǀi manɛ anamatʰatʰu amad̤ɔd̤a asɛrama nɛɡ̤ab̤a iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu anamaŋǀi maɓini anaɲɛ amad̤ɔd̤a asɛmikimas iɓilikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɓini anamaɓini amad̤ɔd̤a asɛb̤ɛtɛli nɛaji iɓilikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɓini anamatʰatʰu amad̤ɔd̤a ɛɲɛ inɛb̤ɔ iɓinɡ̤amaʃumi amaɬanu anamaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓɔmɲɛ uɛlam iɓiliwaka ɛlinamakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi maɬanu anaɓanɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaharim iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰatʰu anamaŋǀi maɓini ɔɔɲana ɓasɛjɛrikɔ iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰatʰu anamaŋǀi manɛ anaɓaɬanu ɔɔɲana ɓasɛlɔd̤i nɛhad̤id̤i nɛɔnɔ iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamaŋǀi maɓini anamɲɛ ɔɔɲana ɓasɛsɛnaha iɓinɡ̤amawaka amatʰatʰu anamakʰulu asitʰɔɓa anamaŋǀi matʰatʰu aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakajɛd̤aja ɓɛnɮu kajɛʃuwa iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu asitʰɔɓa anamaŋǀi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anaɓatʰatʰu ɔɔɲana ɓakaimɛrɛ iɓiliwaka ɛlinamaŋǀi maɬanu anaɓaɓini ɔɔɲana ɓakapaʃurɛ iɓiliwaka ɛlinamakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi manɛ anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaharim iɓiliwaka ɛlinaʃumi liɲɛ linɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ aɓalɛv̤i ɔɔɲana ɓakajɛʃuwa nɔkad̤ɛmijɛli kɔɔɲana ɓakahɔd̤ɛv̤a iɓinɡ̤amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anaɓanɛ iimv̤umi ɔɔɲana ɓakaasafu iɓilikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi manɛ anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ aɓamasanɡ̤ɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃalum ɔɔɲana ɓakaatɛrɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakatalɛmɔn ɔɔɲana ɓakaakub̤i ɔɔɲana ɓakahatita ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃɔb̤aji iɓilikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi matʰatʰu anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛtɛmpilɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakat͡siha ɔɔɲana ɓakahasufa ɔɔɲana ɓakatab̤ahɔti ɔɔɲana ɓakakɛrɔsi ɔɔɲana ɓakasiha ɔɔɲana ɓakapad̤ɔn ɔɔɲana ɓakalɛb̤ana ɔɔɲana ɓakahaɡ̤ab̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakasalɛmaji ɔɔɲana ɓakahanan ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤id̤ɛlɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤aharɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakarɛhaja ɔɔɲana ɓakarɛt͡sin ɔɔɲana ɓakanɛkɔd̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤az̤am ɔɔɲana ɓakauz̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakapasɛha ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛt͡saji ɔɔɲana ɓakamɛhunim ɔɔɲana ɓakanɛfiʃɛsim ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤akɛb̤uki ɔɔɲana ɓakahakufa ɔɔɲana ɓakaharɛhurɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤at͡sɛliti ɔɔɲana ɓakamɛhid̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakaharʃa ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤arkɔsi ɔɔɲana ɓakasisɛra ɔɔɲana ɓakatama ɔɔɲana ɓakanɛt͡siha ɔɔɲana ɓakahatifa ɔɔɲana ɓaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakasɔlɔmɔn ɔɔɲana ɓakasɔtaji ɔɔɲana ɓakasɔfɛrɛtɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakapɛrid̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakajahala ɔɔɲana ɓakad̤arkɔn ɔɔɲana ɓakaɡ̤id̤ɛlɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakaʃɛfatija ɔɔɲana ɓakahatili ɔɔɲana ɓakapɔkɛrɛtɛt͡sɛb̤ajim ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛtɛmpilɛ nɔɔɲana ɓaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakasɔlɔmɔn iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amatʰatʰu anamaŋǀi asitʰɔɓa anaɓaɓini nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa aɓɛɲuka ɓɛv̤ɛla ɛtɛlɛmɛla nasɛtɛlɛharʃa nasɛkɛrub̤iad̤ɔnimɛrɛ kɛ aɓaɓanɡ̤a nakuz̤ikǁɛla iz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ nɔmnɔmɓɔ waɓɔ ukuɓa nɡ̤aɓakwasirajɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakad̤ɛlaja ɔɔɲana ɓakatɔb̤ija ɔɔɲana ɓakanɛkɔd̤a ɓaɓɛnɡ̤amakʰulu ɔmatʰand̤atʰu anamaŋǀi manɛ anaɓaɓini kɛ kuɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakahab̤aja ɔɔɲana ɓakahakɔt͡sɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤arz̤ilaji ɔwaz̤ɛka umfaz̤i ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤ikab̤arz̤ilaji wasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i waɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama laz̤ɔ aɓɔ ɓakufuna ukub̤alwa kwaɓɔ kwaɓab̤alɛlwajɔ ɛmiliɓɛni jɔkuz̤alwa aɓakufumana ɓaŋ̤ǀ̤ɔla kɛ aɓaɓa sɛɓuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlini ixulunɛli jatʰi kuɓɔ maɓanɡ̤aɮi ntɔ kwɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kaɲɛ kud̤ɛ kuv̤ɛlɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔnɛɛurim nɛɛtumim lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa lind̤awɔɲɛ iɓɛ inɡ̤amawaka anɡ̤amaʃumi amanɛ anamaɓini anamakʰulu matʰatʰu anamaŋǀi matʰand̤atʰu z̤iz̤ɔd̤wa iz̤ikǀaka z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤i nɛz̤ikǀakakaz̤i z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤i z̤inɡ̤amawaka asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamakʰulu amatʰatʰu anamaŋǀi matʰatʰu anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ z̤inɛɛmv̤umi nɛɛmv̤umikaz̤i ɛz̤inɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi manɛ amahaʃɛ aɓɔ iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamaŋǀi matʰatʰu anamatʰand̤atʰu ɔɔnɮɛɓɛnd̤ɛ ɓaɓɔ iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi manɛ anaɓaɬanu iinkamɛla iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amanɛ anamaŋǀi matʰatʰu amaɛsilɛ iɓinɡ̤amawaka amatʰand̤atʰu anamakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamaŋǀi maɓini iŋǁɛɲɛ jɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ janikɛla ɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini ixulunɛli janikɛla ɛɓuŋǀwanɛni iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛliwaka lɛɛd̤arikɛ namaʃumi amaɬanu ɛz̤itʲa z̤ɔkut͡ʃiz̤a namaʃumi amatʰatʰu ɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ z̤anɡ̤apʰant͡si z̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛnɡ̤amawaka ɛɛmina iŋǁɛɲɛ jɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ janikɛla ɛɓuŋǀwanɛni ɓɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛnɡ̤amawaka amaʃumi amaɓini ɛɛd̤arikɛ nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛnɡ̤amawaka amaɓini anamakʰulu amaɓini ɛɛmina ɔkwanikwajɔ nɡ̤aɓaɲɛ aɓantu iɓɛ ijiɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛnɡ̤amawaka amaʃumi amaɓini ɛɛd̤arikɛ nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛnɡ̤amawaka amaɓini namaʃumi amatʰand̤atʰu anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ z̤anɡ̤apʰant͡si z̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓaɬala kɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i naɓamasanɡ̤ɔ nɛɛmv̤umi nɛŋǁɛɲɛ jaɓantu naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛtɛmpilɛ namasirajɛli ɔnkɛ ɛmiz̤ini jakɔmawaɓɔ itʰɛ jakufika iɲanɡ̤a jɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓaɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛsɛmiz̤ini jakɔmawaɓɔ ɓaɬanɡ̤ana ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amntu mɲɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jɛmɓutʰɔ ɛpʰamɓi kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ lamanz̤i ɓatʰi kuɛz̤ra umb̤ali makaz̤isɛ iŋǀwad̤i jɔmjalɛlɔ kamɔsɛs awawumisɛlajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kumasirajɛli uɛz̤ra umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wawuz̤isa umjalɛlɔ pʰamɓi kwɛɓanɮa ɛlɔ litʰaɓatʰɛlɛ kwind̤ɔd̤a lɛsa kumfaz̤i nakuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓanɔkuv̤a ɓakǃɔnd̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɔkukǃala wɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ walɛsa kuwɔ pʰamɓi kwɛnd̤awɔ jɛmɓutʰɔ ɛpʰamɓi kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ lamanz̤i ɛkǃalɛ ɛkusɛni kwad̤a kwaɓa sɛmini ɛnkulu pʰamɓi kwamad̤ɔd̤a naɓafaz̤i naɓasɛɓɛnɔkukǃɔnd̤a iinɮɛɓɛ z̤aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ z̤apʰulapʰula lɔɔ ŋǀwad̤i jɔmjalɛlɔ wɛma kɛ uɛz̤ra umb̤ali ɛsikʰwɛlwɛni sɔmtʰi aɓaɓɛsɛnz̤ɛlɛ lɔɔ ntɔ kwɛma nɡ̤akujɛ umatitija nɔʃɛma nɔanaja nɔurija nɔhilɛkija nɔmahasɛja nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ kwakʰɛ nɡ̤asɛkʰɔlɔ janɡ̤upɛd̤aja nɔmiʃajɛli nɔmalɛkija nɔhaʃum nɔhaʃɛb̤ad̤ana nɔz̤ɛkarija nɔmɛʃulam uɛz̤ra wajiv̤ula iŋǀwad̤i ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wajɛɓapʰakamɛlɛ aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ akujiv̤ula ɓɛma aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ uɛz̤ra wamɓɔnɡ̤a ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ ɔmkʰulu ɓapʰɛnd̤ula ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓatʰi amɛn amɛn ɓɛpʰakamisa iz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ ɓatʰɔɓa ɓakǃuɓud̤a kujɛhɔv̤a ɓɛb̤ɛkisɛ uɓusɔ ɓaɓɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni ɔɔjɛʃuwa nɔb̤ani nɔʃɛrɛb̤ija nɔjamin nɔakub̤i nɔʃab̤ɛtaji nɔhɔd̤ija nɔmahasɛja nɔkɛlita nɔaz̤arija nɔjɔz̤ab̤ad̤i nɔhanan nɔpɛlaja naɓalɛv̤i ɓaɓakǃɔnd̤isa aɓantu umjalɛlɔ aɓantu ɓɛmi ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤aɓɔ ɓalɛsa ɛŋǀwad̤ini ɛmjalɛlwɛni katʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkukǀakǀilɛjɔ ɓɛkǃɔnɔnɔnd̤isa ɓakukǃɔnd̤a kɛ ukulɛsa ɔku watʰi unɛhɛmija ɔjixulunɛli nɔɛz̤ra umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli umb̤ali naɓalɛv̤i aɓaz̤ɔnd̤isa aɓantu ɛɓantwini ɓɔnkɛ lɛ iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ukwɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛlila ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓakuwɛv̤a amaz̤wi ɔmjalɛlɔ lɔwɔ watʰi kuɓɔ jijani niɮɛ amaŋǃatʰa nisɛlɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inɛŋǀasa nisɛ isaɓɛlɔ kwaɓanɡ̤alunɡ̤isɛlwanɡ̤a ntɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lɛ iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kwinkɔsi jɛtʰu musani ukuɓa ɓuɬunɡ̤u nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uv̤ujɔ lukajɛhɔv̤a liɡ̤wiɓa lɛnu naɓalɛv̤i ɓaɓɛɓatʰutʰuz̤ɛla aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛsitʰi jitʰini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lɛ iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ukuɓa ɓuɬunɡ̤u ɓɛsuka ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓaja kuɮa ɓasɛla ɓatʰuma iz̤aɓɛlɔ ɓav̤uja kakʰulu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓawakǃɔnd̤a amaz̤wi aɓaɓɛwakǁɛlɛlwa nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsiɓini kwaɬanɡ̤anisana iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ z̤aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ nɛz̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɛz̤aɓalɛv̤i z̤ɛz̤a kuɛz̤ra umb̤ali ukuwakǃikǃa amaz̤wi ɔmjalɛlɔ ɓafumana kub̤aliwɛ ɛmjalɛlwɛni awawumisɛlajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔmɔsɛs ukutʰi ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli maɓaɬalɛ ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni nɡ̤ɔmtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ wɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɔkutʰi maɓav̤akalisɛ ɓahamɓisɛ iliz̤wi ɛmiz̤ini jaɓɔ jɔnkɛ nasɛjɛrusalɛm lɔkutʰi pʰumani nijɛ ɛz̤intaɓɛni niz̤ɛ namaɬamv̤u ɛmiŋǃuma namaɬamv̤u ɛmiŋǃuma jasɛnɮɛ namaɬamv̤u ɛmimirtilɛ namaɬamv̤u ɛsund̤u namaɬamv̤u ɛmitʰi ɛtʰɛ ʃiɲi ukuz̤ɛ kwɛnz̤iwɛ imiŋǃuɓa nɡ̤ɔkɔ kub̤aliwɛjɔ ɓapʰuma aɓantu ɓawaz̤isa ɓaz̤ɛnz̤ɛla imiŋǃuɓa ɛlɔwɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛnɮu jakʰɛ nasɛz̤intɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni z̤aɓɔ nasɛz̤intɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni z̤ɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ nasɛnd̤awɛni jɛmɓutʰɔ jɛsanɡ̤ɔ lamanz̤i nasɛnd̤awɛni jɛmɓutʰɔ jɛsanɡ̤ɔ likaɛfrajim lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa ɛlaliɓujɛ ɛkutʰind͡ʒ̤wɛni lɛnz̤a imiŋǃuɓa laɬala ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɛnz̤anɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ kususɛla kwimiɬa kajɔʃuwa uɲana kanun kwad̤a kwajilɔɔ kwaɓakʰɔ kɛ uv̤ujɔ ɔlukʰulu kunɛnɛ kwalɛswa ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɔmjalɛlɔ katʰikǁɔ imiɬa nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kwatʰaɓatʰɛla kum̤la wɔkukǃala kwɛz̤isa kum̤la wɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla ɓɛnz̤a umtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ imiɬa jasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ jaɓa jiŋ̤ǃ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤utʰɛla nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ kɛ kalɔku nɡ̤ɔm̤la wamaʃumi amaɓini anɛsinɛ walɔɔ ɲanɡ̤a ɓaɬanɡ̤anisana ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛz̤ila ukuɮa ɓɛnɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ ɓɛz̤iɡ̤alɛlɛ um̤laɓa jaz̤aɬula imɓɛwu kasirajɛli kɔɔɲana ɓɔnkɛ ɓɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a ɓɛma ɓaz̤ikǁɛla iz̤ɔnɔ z̤aɓɔ nɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɔɔjisɛ ɓɛma ɛnd̤awɛni jaɓɔ ɓɛlɛsa ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɔmjalɛlɔ kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ isaɬulɔ sɛsinɛ sɛmini ɛsiɲɛ isaɬulɔ sɛsinɛ ɓɛkǁɛla iz̤ɔnɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓɛmŋǃula ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɓɛɲuka ɓɛma ɛsikʰwɛlwɛni saɓalɛv̤i ɔɔjɛʃuwa nɔb̤ani nɔkad̤ɛmijɛli nɔʃɛb̤anija nɔb̤uni nɔʃɛrɛb̤ija nɔb̤ani nɔkɛnani ɓamɛmɛz̤a nɡ̤ɛz̤wi ɛlikʰulu kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɓatʰi aɓalɛv̤i ɔɔjɛʃuwa nɔkad̤ɛmijɛli nɔb̤ani nɔhaʃab̤ɛnɛja nɔʃɛrɛb̤ija nɔhɔd̤ija nɔʃɛb̤anija nɔpɛtaja sukani nimɛ ɓɔnɡ̤ani ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu kususɛla kwapʰakad̤ɛ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni maliɓɔnɡ̤wɛ iɡ̤ama lɔɓukǃakǃawuli ɓakʰɔ ɛlikupʰakamɛlɛjɔ kɔnkɛ ukuɓɔnɡ̤a nɔkud̤umisa wɛna unɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɛd̤wa wɛna wɛnz̤a iz̤ulu iz̤ulu lawɔ amaz̤ulu nɔmkʰɔsi wawɔ wɔnkɛ um̤laɓa nɛntɔ jɔnkɛ ɛpʰɛz̤u kwawɔ iilwanɮɛ nɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ikʰɔna uz̤iɮisa uɓɔmi z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ umkʰɔsi wamaz̤ulu ukǃuɓud̤a kuwɛ wɛna unɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ ɔwaɲula uaɓram wamkʰupʰa ɛurɛ jamakalɛd̤i wamtʰija iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤uaɓraham wajifumana intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ iɲanisɛkilɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ wɛnz̤a najɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɔkulinika iliz̤wɛ lamakanan namahɛti namaamɔri namapɛriz̤i namajɛb̤usi namaɡ̤irɡ̤aʃi wɔkulinika imɓɛwu jakʰɛ kɛ amaz̤wi akʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ulilunɡ̤isa waz̤iɓɔna iint͡siz̤i z̤ɔɔɓawɔ ɛjiputa wakuv̤a ukukʰala kwaɓɔ ɛlwanɮɛ ɔluɓɔmv̤u wɛnz̤a imikǃɔnd̤isɔ nɛz̤imanɡ̤a kufarɔ nakuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ nakuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛliz̤wɛ lakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓusaz̤i ukuɓa ɓajɛ ɓɛɓakʰukʰumalɛlɛ waz̤ɛnz̤ɛla iɡ̤ama nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kund͡ʒ̤alɔ nanam̤la walwaɬula ulwanɮɛ pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ ɓawɛla ɛlwanɮɛ kɔmilɛ aɓasukɛli ɓaɓɔ waɓaz̤ulumɓɛla ɛz̤inz̤ulwini nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlitʲɛ ɛmanz̤ini anamanɮa waɓakʰɔkɛla nɡ̤ɔmkǃulu wɛlifu ɛmini nanɡ̤ɔmkǃulu wɔmlilɔ ɛɓusuku ukuɓa uɓakʰaɲisɛlɛ inɮɛla aɓaɓɛhamɓa nɡ̤ajɔ wɛɬa pʰɛz̤u kwɛntaɓa jɛsinaji watʰɛtʰa naɓɔ uv̤ɛla ɛmaz̤ulwini waɓanika amasikɔ atʰɛ tʲɛ nɛmijalɛlɔ ɛjiɲanisɔ nɛmimisɛlɔ nɛmitʰɛtʰɔ ɛlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ waɓaz̤isa isaɓatʰa jakʰɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ waɓamisɛla imitʰɛtʰɔ nɛmimisɛlɔ nɔmjalɛlɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikamɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ waɓanika isɔnka sasɛz̤ulwini nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkulamɓa kwaɓɔ waɓav̤ɛlisɛla namanz̤i ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxɛni nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuŋǁanwa kwaɓɔ watʰi kuɓɔ maɓajɛ kuliɬutʰa iliz̤wɛ ɔwaɓapʰakamisɛla isanɮa sakʰɔ ukuɓa wɔɓanika lɔna kɛ ɓɔna ɔɔɓawɔ ɓakʰukʰumala ɓaz̤ɛnz̤a lukʰuni iintamɔ z̤aɓɔ aɓajipʰulapʰula imitʰɛtʰɔ jakʰɔ aɓav̤uma ukuv̤a aɓajikʰumɓula imisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɔ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ ɔwajɛnz̤ajɔ kuɓɔ ɓaz̤ɛnz̤a lukʰuni iintamɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓamisa iintlɔkɔ ukuɓa ɓaɓujɛlɛ ɛɓukʰɔɓɔkɛni ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛɛnkani z̤aɓɔ wɛna watʰi kuɓa unɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɔkukǁɔlɛla uɓaɓala unɛmfɛsanɛ uz̤ɛka kad̤ɛ umsind̤ɔ umninz̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǀɛɓa akwaɓaʃija nɔkɔ kɛ ɓaz̤ɛnz̤ɛla itʰɔlɛ ɛlinɡ̤umfanɛkisɔ ɔtʰʲid̤iwɛjɔ ɓatʰi nɡ̤ujɛ lɔ utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ ɔwakuɲusajɔ ɛjiputa ɓakuɡ̤iɓa kakʰulu kɛ wɛna nɡ̤ɛɛmfɛsanɛ z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤inkulu akuɓaʃijanɡ̤a ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ umkǃulu wɛlifu wɔkuɓakʰɔkɛla nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla awumkanɡ̤a kuɓɔ ɛmini nɔmkǃulu wɔmlilɔ ɛɓusuku wɔkuɓakʰaɲisɛla inɮɛla aɓaɓamɓa nɡ̤ajɔ waɓanika umɔja wakʰɔ ɔlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ukuɓa uɓakǃɔnɔnɔnd̤isɛ akuwuv̤imɓanɡ̤a umlɔmɔ waɓɔ jakʰɔ waɓanika amanz̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛŋǁanɔ laɓɔ imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi manɛ waɓafunz̤ɛla ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ aɓaswɛla ntɔ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤aɓɔ az̤ɔnakalanɡ̤a ɓuɓud̤ala iiɲawɔ z̤aɓɔ az̤id̤umɓanɡ̤a waɓanika iz̤ikumkani nɛz̤iz̤wɛ waɓaɬulaɬula nɡ̤ɔkwɛmid̤a jaɓɔ ɓaliɬutʰa iliz̤wɛ lakwasihɔn iliz̤wɛ lɔkumkani wasɛhɛʃb̤ɔn kwanɛliz̤wɛ likaɔɡ̤i wasɛb̤aʃan waɓand̤isa ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnkwɛnkwɛz̤i z̤ɛz̤ulu waɓaz̤isa kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ watʰi kɔɔjisɛ maɓaz̤ɛ ɓaliɬutʰɛ ɓanɡ̤ɛna kɛ ɔɔɲana aɓɔ ɓaliɬutʰa iliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ waɓatʰɔɓa pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ aɓɛmi ɓɛliz̤wɛ amakanan wawanikɛla ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤aɓɔ ɔɔkumkani ɓawɔ nɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɛliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ ukuɓa ɓɛnz̤ɛ kuz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuz̤itʰand̤ɛla kwaɓɔ ɓajitʰimɓa imiz̤i ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ nɔm̤laɓa ɔtʲɛɓilɛjɔ ɓaɬutʰa iz̤inɮu z̤iz̤ɛlɛ z̤iz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤intlɛ amakǃula amɓiwɛjɔ nɛz̤id̤ilija nɛz̤iŋǃuma nɛmitʰi ɛɮiwajɔ jamininz̤i ɓaɮa ɓaɬutʰa ɓatʲɛɓa ɓaz̤ijɔlisa nɡ̤ɔkulunɡ̤a kwakʰɔ ɔkukʰulu ɓɛsuka ɓapʰika ɓaɡ̤wilika kuwɛ umjalɛlɔ wakʰɔ ɓawupʰɔsɛla ɛmv̤a kɔm̤lana waɓɔ ɓaɓaɓulala aɓaprɔfɛti ɓakʰɔ aɓaɓɛŋ̤ǃ̤ina kuɓɔ ukuɓa ɓaɓaɓuv̤isɛlɛ kuwɛ ɓakuɡ̤iɓa kakʰulu waɓanikɛla ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤aɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓaɓɔ ɓaɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwa kwaɓɔ ɓakʰala kuwɛ wɛna wɛv̤a usɛmaz̤ulwini waɓanika aɓasind̤isi nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛmfɛsanɛ z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤inkulu ɓaɓasind̤isa ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤aɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓaɓɔ ɓakuɓa nɔkupʰumla ɓaɓuja ɓɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ waɓaʃija ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤ɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ z̤aɓaɲatʰɛla ɓaɓuja ɓakʰala kuwɛ wɛna wɛv̤a usɛmaz̤ulwini waɓaɬanɡ̤ula nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛmfɛsanɛ z̤akʰɔ amakǁɛʃa amaninz̤i waŋ̤ǃ̤ina nɡ̤aɓɔ ukuɓa uɓaɓujisɛlɛ ɛmjalɛlwɛni wakʰɔ kɛ ɓɔna ɓakʰukʰumala aɓajipʰulapʰula imitʰɛtʰɔ jakʰɔ amasikɔ akʰɔ ɓɔna kuwɔ awɔtʰi ɔwɛnz̤ajɔ apʰilɛ nɡ̤awɔ ɓamanɡ̤ala nɛɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓa ɓaz̤ɛnz̤a lukʰuni iintamɔ z̤aɓɔ aɓapʰulapʰula waɓatʰwala imiɲaka ɛmininz̤i waŋ̤ǃ̤ina nɡ̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔmɔja wakʰɔ nɡ̤aɓaprɔfɛti ɓakʰɔ aɓakuɓɛkɛla nɮɛɓɛ waɓanikɛla kɛ ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤ɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤amaz̤wɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɛɛmfɛsanɛ z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤inkulu akuɓaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓanɡ̤a kupʰɛlɛ akuɓaʃijanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ɔnɔɓaɓalɔ nɛmfɛsanɛ kalɔku tʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu tʰikǁɔ ɔmkʰulu ɔliɡ̤ɔxa ɔwɔjikɛkajɔ ɔɡ̤ǀ̤ina umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nɛŋǀɛɓa majinɡ̤aɓi ŋǀinanɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ jɔnkɛ ind̤inisɔ ɛsijifumɛnɛjɔ tʰina nɔɔkumkani ɓɛtʰu naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛtʰu naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛtʰu naɓaprɔfɛti ɓɛtʰu nɔɔɓawɔ naɓantu ɓakʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ kususɛla kwimiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓasɛasirija kud̤ɛ kuɓɛ jilɛ ulilunɡ̤isa ɛntwɛni jɔnkɛ ɛsifikɛlɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛna wɛnz̤ɛ iɲanisɔ kɛ tʰina sɛnz̤ɛ ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɔɔkumkani ɓɛtʰu naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛtʰu naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛtʰu nɔɔɓawɔ aɓawɛnz̤anɡ̤a umjalɛlɔ wakʰɔ aɓaz̤iɓaz̤anɡ̤a iinɮɛɓɛ ɛmitʰɛtʰwɛni jakʰɔ nasɛz̤iŋ̤ǃ̤inwɛni z̤akʰɔ ɔwaŋ̤ǃ̤ina nɡ̤az̤ɔ nɡ̤aɓɔ ɓɔna ɛɓukumkanini ɓaɓɔ ɛkulunɡ̤ɛni kwakʰɔ ɔkukʰulu ɔwaɓanikajɔ ɛz̤wɛni ɛliɓanz̤i ɛlitʲɛɓilɛjɔ ɔwaɓanikajɔ aɓakukʰɔnz̤anɡ̤a aɓaɓujanɡ̤a ɛz̤ɛnz̤wɛni z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤iɓi jaɓɔna sinɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i nam̤la nɛliz̤wɛ ɔwalinika ɔɔɓawɔ ukuɓa siɮɛ iz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤alɔ nɔkulunɡ̤a kwalɔ sinɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i kulɔ unɡ̤ɛnisɛlɔ lwalɔ lilwand̤isɛla ɔɔkumkani ɔwaɓamisa pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤ɛtʰu ɓajajilawula imiz̤imɓa jɛtʰu nɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤ɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuz̤itʰand̤ɛla kwaɓɔ sisɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛni ɛnkulu nɡ̤ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ sɛnz̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɛnɛnɛ sawub̤ala ɓawutʲwina aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛtʰu naɓalɛv̤i ɓɛtʰu naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛtʰu aɓɔ kɛ ɓawutʲwinajɔ nɡ̤unɛhɛmija ixulunɛli uɲana kahakalija nɔz̤ɛd̤ɛkija nɔsɛraja nɔaz̤arija nɔjɛrɛmija nɔpaʃurɛ nɔamarija nɔmalɛkija nɔhatuʃɛ nɔʃɛb̤anija nɔmaluki nɔharim nɔmɛrɛmɔti nɔɔb̤ad̤ija nɔd̤anijɛli nɔɡ̤inɛtɔn nɔb̤aruki nɔmɛʃulam nɔab̤ija nɔmijamin nɔmahaz̤ɛja nɔb̤ilɛɡ̤aji nɔʃɛmaja aɓɔ nɡ̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓalɛv̤i nɡ̤ujɛʃuwa uɲana kaaz̤anija nɔb̤inwi kɔɔɲana ɓakahɛnad̤ad̤ɛ nɔkad̤ɛmijɛli naɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤uʃɛb̤anija nɔhɔd̤ija nɔkɛlita nɔpɛlaja nɔhanan nɔmika nɔrɛhɔb̤i nɔhaʃab̤ija nɔz̤akurɛ nɔʃɛrɛb̤ija nɔʃɛb̤anija nɔhɔd̤ija nɔb̤ani nɔb̤ɛninu iintlɔkɔ z̤aɓantu nɡ̤uparɔʃɛ nɔpahati wakwamɔwab̤i nɔɛlam nɔz̤atu nɔb̤ani nɔb̤uni nɔaz̤ɛɡ̤ad̤i nɔb̤ɛb̤aji nɔad̤ɔnija nɔb̤iɡ̤v̤aji nɔad̤in nɔatɛrɛ nɔhɛz̤ɛkija nɔaz̤urɛ nɔhɔd̤ija nɔhaʃum nɔb̤ɛt͡saji nɔharifi nɔanatɔti nɔnɛb̤aji nɔmaɡ̤ɛpihaʃɛ nɔmɛʃulam nɔhɛz̤irɛ nɔmɛʃɛz̤ab̤ɛli nɔt͡sad̤ɔki nɔjad̤uwa nɔpɛlatija nɔhanan nɔanaja nɔhɔʃɛja nɔhananija nɔhaʃub̤i nɔhalɔhɛʃɛ nɔpilɛha nɔʃɔb̤ɛki nɔrɛhum nɔhaʃaɓɛna nɔmahasɛja nɔahija nɔhanan nɔanan nɔmaluki nɔharim nɔb̤ahana aɓaɲɛ aɓantu aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i naɓamasanɡ̤ɔ nɛɛmv̤umi naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛtɛmpilɛ naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛz̤aɬulɛ kwiz̤iz̤wɛ z̤amaz̤wɛ ɓɛz̤a ɛmjalɛlwɛni katʰikǁɔ aɓafaz̤i ɓaɓɔ nɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤aɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓasɛɓɛnɔkwaz̤i nɔkukǃɔnd̤a ɓaɓamɓɛlɛla kuɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ iinɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa z̤aɓɔ ɓanɡ̤ɛna ɛsikǃalɛkiswɛni nasɛsifunɡ̤wɛni sɔkuhamɓa nɡ̤ɔmjalɛlɔ katʰikǁɔ ɔwawiswa nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikamɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i katʰikǁɔ nɔkujiɡ̤ǀ̤ina nɔkujɛnz̤a jɔnkɛ imitʰɛtʰɔ kajɛhɔv̤a inkɔsi jɛtʰu namasikɔ akʰɛ nɛmimisɛlɔ jakʰɛ sinɡ̤az̤ɛnd̤isɛli iintɔmɓi z̤ɛtʰu kwiz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɛli liz̤wɛ sinɡ̤aɓaz̤ɛkɛli ɔɔɲana ɓɛtʰu iintɔmɓi z̤az̤ɔ sitʰi iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɛli liz̤wɛ ɛz̤iz̤isa iz̤intɔ z̤ɛntɛnɡ̤ɔ nɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɔkuɓa jijipʰi nɡ̤ɛmini jɛsaɓatʰa z̤itʰɛnɡ̤isa sinɡ̤atʰɛnɡ̤i kuz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛsaɓatʰa nanɡ̤ɔm̤la ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ siwujɛkɛ ulalɛ umɲaka wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɛntɔ ɛɓɔlɛkiwɛjɔ sisanɮa nɔkuɓa sɛsikaɓani siz̤imisɛlɛ imitʰɛtʰɔ jɔkuɓɛka pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu isaɬulɔ sɛsitʰatʰu sɛʃɛkɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnkɔnz̤ɔ jɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ɔnka ɛz̤ikǀwaŋ̤ǀ̤isiwɛjɔ nɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa wamakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ lamakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ nɛlɛsaɓatʰa nɛlɔkutʰwasa kwɛɲanɡ̤a nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamakǁɛʃa amisiwɛjɔ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamad̤ini ɛz̤ɔnɔ ɔkukǀamaɡ̤uʃɛla amasirajɛli nɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i wɔnkɛ wɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu siɓawisɛlɛ amakǃaʃisɔ nɡ̤ɔmsɔnd̤ɛz̤ɔ wɛɛnkuni aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i naɓantu ukuɓa z̤iz̤iswɛ ɛnɮwini katʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤inɮu z̤ɛtʰu z̤ɔɔjisɛ nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa amisiwɛjɔ imiɲaka nɡ̤ɛmiɲaka ukuɓa z̤iɓaswɛ ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni sikajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkɔ kub̤aliwɛjɔ ɛmjalɛlwɛni siz̤isɛ iintlaɬɛla z̤ɔm̤laɓa wɛtʰu nɛɛntlaɬɛla z̤ɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛmitʰi jɔnkɛ imiɲaka nɡ̤ɛmiɲaka ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a naɓamaz̤iɓulɔ kɔɔɲana ɓɛtʰu nawɛmfujɔ jɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkɔ kub̤aliwɛjɔ ɛmjalɛlwɛni namaz̤iɓulɔ ɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤ɛtʰu nawɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ siwaz̤isɛ ɛnɮwini katʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu kuɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛlajɔ ɛnɮwini katʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nɛɛntlaɬɛla z̤ɛmiɣ̤ajɔ jɛtʰu nɛmixumɔ jɛtʰu nɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ɛmitʰi jɔnkɛ iwajini ɛnt͡ʃa nɛɔli siz̤iz̤isɛ kuɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛmaɡ̤umɓini ɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nɛz̤iʃumi z̤ɛmiɬaɓa jɛtʰu kuɓalɛv̤i ɓɔna aɓalɛv̤i ɓaz̤amkɛlɛ iz̤iʃumi ɛmiz̤ini jɔnkɛ ɛsilima kujɔ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli uɲana kaarɔn az̤ɛ aɓɛkʰɔ naɓalɛv̤i ɛkuz̤amkɛlɛni kwaɓalɛv̤i iz̤iʃumi ɓaz̤iɲusɛ aɓalɛv̤i iz̤iʃumi z̤ɛz̤iʃumi ɛz̤ɔ ɓaz̤iz̤isɛ ɛnɮwini katʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ɛmaɡ̤umɓini ɛnɮu jɔɓuŋǀwanɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɔɔɲana ɓakalɛv̤i ɓaja kuz̤isa umxumɔ wɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛwajini ɛnt͡ʃa nɛɔli ɛmaɡ̤umɓini apʰɔ z̤ikʰɔna iimpaɬa ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛlajɔ naɓamasanɡ̤ɔ nɛɛmv̤umi inɮu katʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu sinɡ̤ajiʃiji ɓaɬala aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaɓantu ɛjɛrusalɛm aɓaɲɛ aɓantu ɓawisa amakǃaʃisɔ ukuɓa kunɡ̤ɛniswɛ aɓɛ mɲɛ kwaɓaliʃumi aɬalɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm kuwɔ umz̤i ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤aɬulɔ ɛz̤isitʰɔɓa z̤iɬalɛ kwɛmiɲɛ imiz̤i aɓantu ɓawasikɛlɛla amad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ akǃʰutʲwa jintliz̤ijɔ ukuɓa aɬalɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤i iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛliz̤wɛ lakwajud̤a ɛz̤aɬala ɛjɛrusalɛm kɛ ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a jaɓa nɡ̤ulɔwɔ waɬala ɛlifɛni lakʰɛ ɛmiz̤ini jaɓɔ inɡ̤amasirajɛli naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛtɛmpilɛ nɔɔɲana ɓaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakasɔlɔmɔn ɛjɛrusalɛm kwaɬala ɛz̤ɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a nɛz̤ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin kɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a janɡ̤uataja uɲana kauz̤ija uɲana kaz̤ɛkarija uɲana kaamarija uɲana kaʃɛfatija uɲana kamahalalɛli kɔɔɲana ɓakapɛrɛt͡sɛ nɔmahasɛja uɲana kab̤aruki uɲana kakɔlihɔz̤ɛ uɲana kahaz̤aja uɲana kaad̤aja uɲana kajɔjarib̤i uɲana kaz̤ɛkarija uɲana wɔmʃɛlɔni ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakapɛrɛt͡sɛ aɓaɓɛɬala ɛjɛrusalɛm iɓinɡ̤amakʰulu amanɛ anamaŋǀi matʰand̤atʰu anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ amad̤ɔd̤a anɔɓuk͡xɔti nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin iɓinɡ̤usalu uɲana kamɛʃulam uɲana kajɔhɛd̤i uɲana kapɛd̤aja uɲana kakɔlaja uɲana kamahasɛja uɲana kaitijɛli uɲana kajɛsaja ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ iɓinɡ̤uɡ̤ab̤ajisalaji ɛnamakʰulu asitʰɔɓa anamaŋǀi maɓini anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ nɔjɔwɛli uɲana kaz̤ik͡xi umpʰatʰi kuɓɔ nɔjud̤a uɲana kasɛnwa ɛnɡ̤ɔwɛsiɓini kuɓapʰatʰi ɓɔmz̤i kuɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli iɓinɡ̤ujɛd̤aja uɲana kajɔjarib̤i nɔjakin nɔsɛraja uɲana kahilɛkija uɲana kamɛʃulam uɲana kat͡sad̤ɔki uɲana kamɛrajɔti uɲana kaahitub̤i inɡ̤anɡ̤a jɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ naɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ aɓaɓɛsɛnz̤a umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛnɮu ɓɛnɡ̤amakʰulu asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anamaŋǀi maɓini anaɓaɓini nɔad̤aja uɲana kajɛrɔham uɲana kapɛlalɛja uɲana kaamt͡si uɲana kaz̤ɛkarija uɲana kapaʃurɛ uɲana kamalɛkija naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ ɓɛnɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi manɛ anaɓaɓini nɔamaʃɛsaji uɲana kaaz̤arɛli uɲana kaaz̤aji uɲana kamɛʃilɛmɔti uɲana kaimɛrɛ naɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ amaɡ̤ɔxa anɔɓuk͡xɔti ɓɛlikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɓini anɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ umpʰatʰi kuɓɔ iɓinɡ̤uz̤ab̤ɛd̤ijɛli uɲana kaɡ̤ɛd̤ɔlim kuɓalɛv̤i iɓinɡ̤uʃɛmaja uɲana kahaʃub̤i uɲana kaaz̤arikam uɲana kahaʃab̤ija uɲana kab̤uni nɔʃab̤ɛtaji nɔjɔz̤ab̤ad̤i aɓaɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i ɔnɡ̤apʰanɮɛ wɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ kwiintlɔkɔ z̤aɓalɛv̤i nɔmatanija uɲana kamika uɲana kaz̤ab̤ɛd̤i uɲana kaasafu ɔɓɛnɡ̤um̤laɓɛli wɛz̤ɔkud̤umisa ɛmtʰand̤az̤wɛni nɔb̤akɛb̤ukija ɔɓɛnɡ̤ɔwɛsiɓini kuɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ nɔab̤ɛd̤a uɲana kaʃamuwa uɲana kaɡ̤alali uɲana kajɛd̤utun ɓɛɓɔnkɛ aɓalɛv̤i ɛmz̤ini ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anaɓanɛ aɓamasanɡ̤ɔ iɓinɡ̤uakub̤i nɔtalɛmɔn naɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ aɓaɡ̤ǀ̤ina amasanɡ̤ɔ ɓɛlikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anaɓaɓini amaɲɛ amasirajɛli naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i ɓaɓɛkwɛmiɲɛ imiz̤i jɔnkɛ jakwajud̤a ɛlɔwɔ ɛsɛlifɛni lakʰɛ kɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛtɛmpilɛ ɓaɓɛɬala ɛɔfɛlɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i aɓɔ ɓɛtɛmpilɛ ɓaɓɛpʰɛtʰwɛ nɡ̤ut͡siha nɔɡ̤iʃpa umpʰatʰi waɓalɛv̤i ɛjɛrusalɛm iɓinɡ̤uuz̤i uɲana kab̤ani uɲana kahaʃab̤ija uɲana kamatanija uɲana kamika kɔɔɲana ɓakaasafu iimv̤umi malunɡ̤a nɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkumkani uɓupʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ nɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɛnɛnɛ uɓupʰɛz̤u kɛɛmv̤umi malunɡ̤a nɛntɔ jɛmini nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛmini jajɔ upɛtaja uɲana kamɛʃɛz̤ab̤ɛli kɔɔɲana ɓakaz̤ɛra uɲana kajud̤a uɓɛsisanɮa sɔkumkani ɛz̤intwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤aɓantu ɛmiz̤ini nasɛmapʰanɮɛni ajɔ kwaɬala iŋǁɛɲɛ jɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a ɛkirijati kaarb̤a namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ nasɛd̤ib̤ɔn namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ nasɛkab̤ɛt͡sɛli nɛmiz̤i jajɔ nasɛjɛʃuwa nasɛmɔlad̤a nasɛb̤ɛtɛpalɛtɛ nasɛhat͡sɔrɛʃuwali nasɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ nasɛt͡sikɛlaɡ̤ɛ nasɛmɛkɔna namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ nasɛɛnrimɔn nasɛt͡sɔra nasɛjarmuti nasɛz̤anɔwa nasɛad̤ulam namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ nasɛlakiʃɛ nasɛmapʰanɮɛni ajɔ nasɛaz̤ɛka namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ ɓaɬala kɛ ɓatʰaɓatʰɛla ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a ɓɛsa ɛmfulɛni wakwahinɔm ɔɔɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɓatʰaɓatʰɛla ɛɡ̤ɛb̤a ɓɛsa ɛmikimas nasɛaja nasɛb̤ɛtɛli namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ nasɛanatɔti nasɛnɔb̤i nasɛananija nasɛhat͡sɔrɛ nasɛrama nasɛɡ̤itajim nasɛhad̤id̤i nasɛt͡sɛb̤ɔjim nasɛnɛb̤alati nasɛlɔd̤ɛ nasɛɔnɔ ɛmfulɛni wɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi nakuɓalɛv̤i kwapʰuma amakǃɛla kwajud̤a ɛz̤a kwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i aɓɛɲuka nɔz̤ɛrub̤ab̤ɛli uɲana kaʃɛlatijɛli nɔjɛʃuwa iɓinɡ̤usɛraja nɔjɛrɛmija nɔɛz̤ra nɔamarija nɔmaluki nɔhatuʃɛ nɔʃɛkanija nɔrɛhum nɔmɛrɛmɔti nɔid̤ɔ nɔɡ̤inɛtɔhi nɔab̤ija nɔmijamin nɔmahad̤ija nɔb̤ilɛɡ̤a nɔʃɛmaja nɔjɔjarib̤i nɔjɛd̤aja nɔsalu nɔamɔki nɔhilɛkija nɔjɛd̤aja aɓɔ iɓiz̤iintlɔkɔ z̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ ɛmiɬɛni kajɛʃuwa aɓalɛv̤i iɓinɡ̤ujɛʃuwa nɔb̤inwi nɔkad̤ɛmijɛli nɔʃɛrɛb̤ija nɔjud̤a nɔmatanija ɔɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ imiɓulɛlɔ jɛna naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ nɔb̤akɛb̤ukija nɔuni aɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ ɓaɓɛmalunɡ̤a naɓɔ ɓɛsɛz̤iɡ̤ǁ̤inɛni kɛ ujɛʃuwa waz̤ala ujɔjakim ujɔjakim waz̤ala uɛlijaʃib̤i uɛlijaʃib̤i waz̤ala ujɔjad̤a ujɔjad̤a waz̤ala ujɔnatan ujɔnatan waz̤ala ujad̤uwa kɛ ɛmiɬɛni kajɔjakim ɓɛkukʰɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓaz̤iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ ɔkasɛraja inɡ̤umɛraja ɔkajɛrɛmija inɡ̤uhananija ɔkaɛz̤ra inɡ̤umɛʃulam ɔkaamarija inɡ̤ujɔhanan ɔkamɛliku inɡ̤ujɔnatan ɔkaʃɛb̤anija inɡ̤ujɔsɛfu ɔkaharim inɡ̤uad̤ɛna ɔkamɛrajɔti inɡ̤uhɛlɛkaji ɔkaid̤ɔ inɡ̤uz̤ɛkarija ɔkaɡ̤inɛtɔn inɡ̤umɛʃulam ɔkaab̤ija inɡ̤uz̤ik͡xi ɔkamiɲamin ɔkamɔwad̤ija inɡ̤upilɛtaji ɔkab̤ilɛɡ̤a inɡ̤uʃamuwa ɔkaʃɛmaja inɡ̤ujɔnatan ɔkajɔjarib̤i inɡ̤umatɛnaji ɔkajɛd̤aja inɡ̤uuz̤i ɔkasalaji inɡ̤ukalaji ɔkaamɔki inɡ̤uɛb̤ɛrɛ ɔkahilɛkija inɡ̤uhaʃab̤ija ɔkajɛd̤aja inɡ̤unatanijɛli malunɡ̤a naɓalɛv̤i nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kaɛlijaʃib̤i nɔjɔjad̤a nɔjɔhanan nɔjad̤uwa kwab̤alwa iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ nɛz̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛɓukumkanini ɓukad̤arijɔ umpɛrsi ɔɔɲana ɓakalɛv̤i iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔjisɛ ɓaɓɛb̤alwa ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa kwad̤a kwɛz̤a nasɛmiɬɛni kajɔhanan uɲana kaɛlijaʃib̤i kɛ iintlɔkɔ z̤aɓalɛv̤i iɓinɡ̤uhaʃab̤ija nɔʃɛrɛb̤ija nɔjɛʃuwa uɲana kakad̤ɛmijɛli naɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ malunɡ̤ana naɓɔ ukuɓa ɓad̤umisɛ ɓaɓulɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔmtʰɛtʰɔ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ ikǃɛla lilunɡ̤ɛ nɛkǃɛla inɡ̤umatanija nɔb̤akɛb̤ukija nɔɔb̤ad̤ija nɔmɛʃulam nɔtalɛmɔn nɔakub̤i ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓamasanɡ̤ɔ ɓɛɡ̤ǀ̤ina isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina kɔɔv̤imɓa ɓamasanɡ̤ɔ aɓɔ ɓaɓɛkʰɔ ɛmiɬɛni kajɔjakim uɲana kajɛʃuwa uɲana kajɔt͡sad̤aki nasɛmiɬɛni kanɛhɛmija iɓamɓa nɔɛz̤ra umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli umb̤ali kɛ kalɔku ɛkusunɡ̤ulwɛni kɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a lwɛjɛrusalɛm aɓalɛv̤i ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤aɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ukuɓa ɓaz̤iswɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm ukuɓa ukusunɡ̤ulwa kwalɔ kwɛnz̤iwɛ nɡ̤ɔv̤ujɔ nanɡ̤ɛmiɓulɛlɔ nanɡ̤ɛɛnɡ̤ɔma nanɡ̤amakǀaŋ̤ǀ̤i nanɡ̤ɛmixub̤ɛ nanɡ̤ɛɛhad̤i ɓaɬanɡ̤anisana ɔɔɲana ɓɛɛmv̤umi ɓɛv̤ɛla kulɔɔ mmanɮa ud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ɛ ijɛrusalɛm nasɛmiz̤ini jamanɛtɔfa nasɛb̤ɛtɛ jasɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali nasɛmiɬaɓɛni jasɛɡ̤ɛb̤a nɛaz̤ɛmav̤ɛtɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iimv̤umi z̤az̤iz̤akʰɛlɛ imiz̤i ɛd͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ɛ ijɛrusalɛm ɓaz̤iɬamɓulula aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i ɓaɬamɓulula aɓantu namasanɡ̤ɔ nɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a ɔlɔ nd̤aɓaɲusa aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakwajud̤a pʰɛz̤u kɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a nd̤amisa amakǃɛla amakʰulu amaɓini ɔkuɓulɛla ɛnz̤a imitʲinɔ ɛliɲɛ lasinɡ̤a ɛkunɛnɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɛnkunkuma ɛmv̤a kwalɔ kwahamɓa uhɔʃaja nɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa saɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakwajud̤a nɔaz̤arija nɔɛz̤ra nɔmɛʃulam nɔjud̤a nɔb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɔʃɛmaja nɔjɛrɛmija kɔɔɲana ɓaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛnamakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ jajinɡ̤uz̤ɛkarija uɲana kajɔnatan uɲana kaʃɛmaja uɲana kamatanija uɲana kamikaja uɲana kaz̤akurɛ uɲana kaasafu naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ɔɔʃɛmaja nɔaz̤arɛli nɔmilalaji nɔɡ̤ilalaji nɔmahaji nɔnatanijɛli nɔjud̤a nɔhanani ɓɛnɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɔkuv̤uma z̤ikad̤av̤id̤ɛ umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ kɛ uɛz̤ra umb̤ali ɛɓɛpʰamɓi kwaɓɔ ɓasinɡ̤a ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔmtʰɔmɓɔ ɓatʰi ŋ̤ǃ̤ɔ ɓɛɲuka nɡ̤ɛz̤iɲukɔ z̤ɔmz̤i kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛkuɲukɛni kɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a ɓajɔnɡ̤amɛla inɮu kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɓɛsa ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lamanz̤i nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a ikǃɛla lɛsiɓini lɔkuɓulɛla ɛlahamɓa malunɡ̤a nɛlɔ nd̤inɡ̤asɛmv̤a kwalɔ nd̤inɛsiɲɛ isikǃinɡ̤atʰa saɓantu lahamɓa pʰɛz̤u kɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a lajɔnɡ̤amɛla iŋǃaɓa ɛnd̤ɛ jamaz̤ikɔ lɛsa ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni ɔluɓanz̤i lasɔnɡ̤amɛla isanɡ̤ɔ lakwaɛfrajim nɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a ɔlud̤ala nɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɛɛntlanz̤i nɛŋǃaɓa ɛnd̤ɛ kahananɛli nɛŋǃaɓa ɛnd̤ɛ kahamɛha lad̤a lɛz̤a ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ ɓamisa ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɛntɔlɔnɡ̤ɔ ɛma kɛ ɔmaɓini amakǃɛla ɔkuɓulɛla ɛnɮwini katʰikǁɔ nd̤inɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa saɓapʰatʰi naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔɔɛlijakim nɔmahasɛja nɔmiɲamin nɔmikaja nɔɛlijɔhɛnaji nɔz̤ɛkarija nɔhananija ɓɛnamakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ nɔmahasɛja nɔʃɛmaja nɔɛlɛjaz̤arɛ nɔuz̤i nɔjɔhanan nɔmalɛkija nɔɛlam nɔɛz̤ɛrɛ iimv̤umi z̤av̤uma kakʰulu ujɛz̤ɛraja ɛnɡ̤umpʰatʰi waz̤ɔ ɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla nɡ̤alɔɔ imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛmikʰulu ɓav̤uja nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰikǁɔ uɓɛɓav̤ujisilɛ nɡ̤ɔv̤ujɔ ɔlukʰulu kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ aɓafaz̤i naɓantwana ɓav̤uja kwav̤akala ukuv̤uja kwɛjɛrusalɛm namɡ̤ama nɡ̤alɔɔ amad̤ɔd̤a ɔkupʰatʰa amaɡ̤umɓi ɔkuɓanɡ̤ɔɔv̤imɓa ɓɛmixumɔ nɛɛntlaɬɛla nɛz̤iʃumi ukuɓa z̤ifund͡ʒ̤wɛ kuwɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmiɬaɓa jɛmiz̤i iz̤aɓɛlɔ ɛz̤imisɛlwɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i nɡ̤ɔmjalɛlɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa amajud̤a aɓɛv̤uja nɡ̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nanɡ̤aɓalɛv̤i aɓɛmijɔ ɓasiɡ̤ǀ̤ina isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina sikatʰikǁɔ waɓɔ nɛsiɡ̤ǁ̤ina sɛntlamɓululɔ z̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ iimv̤umi naɓamasanɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔmtʰɛtʰɔ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ nɔsɔlɔmɔn uɲana wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kad̤av̤id̤ɛ kwakud̤ala uasafu uɓɛjintlɔkɔ jɛɛmv̤umi nɛjɔkud̤umisa utʰikǁɔ nɛjɔkuɓulɛla kujɛ ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kaz̤ɛrub̤ab̤ɛli nanɡ̤ɛmiɬa kanɛhɛmija aɓɛ ɛz̤inika iimv̤umi naɓamasanɡ̤ɔ iz̤aɓɛlɔ intɔ jɛmini nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛmini jajɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛla aɓalɛv̤i aɓalɛv̤i ɓɛŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakaarɔn nɡ̤alɔɔ kwalɛswa ɛŋǀwad̤ini kamɔsɛs ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤aɓantu kwafuɲanwa kub̤aliwɛ kujɔ ukutʰi amaamɔn namamɔwab̤i makanɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni ɛɓanɮɛni likatʰikǁɔ napʰakad̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛnɡ̤aɓakʰawulɛlanɡ̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛnɛsɔnka namanz̤i ɛsuka aɓakǃɛʃɛla ub̤ilɛham ukuɓa aɓakǃalɛkisɛ kɛ utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu wajiɡ̤ukǃula iŋ̤ǃ̤alɛkisɔ jaɓa jint͡sikɛlɛlɔ kwatʰi ɓakuv̤a umjalɛlɔ lɔwɔ ɓawaɬula wɔnkɛ umkǁuɓɛ kumasirajɛli kɛ kalɔku pʰamɓi kɔkɔ uɛlijaʃib̤i umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔɓɛmiswɛ pʰɛz̤u kwamaɡ̤umɓi ɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu waz̤alamanisa nɔtɔb̤ija wamɛnz̤ɛla iɡ̤umɓi ɛlikʰulu apʰɔ ɓɛkufud̤ula kuɓɛkwa kʰɔna umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa nɛntlaka ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ nɛmpaɬa nɛz̤iʃumi z̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛz̤ɛwajini ɛnt͡ʃa nɛz̤ɛɔli ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤imisɛlwɛ aɓalɛv̤i nɛɛmv̤umi naɓamasanɡ̤ɔ nɛmixumɔ jaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛkwɛnz̤ɛkɛni ɔkɔ kɔnkɛ ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤ɛkʰɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi amatʰatʰu anɛsiɓini kaartaʃaʃta wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli nd̤aja ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɬa nd̤akǀɛla ukuɓa nd̤iɓujɛ nd̤afika kɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm nd̤aɓuɡ̤ǃ̤ala uɓuɓi aɓɛɓɛnz̤ilɛ uɛlijaʃib̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǁa katɔb̤ija nɡ̤ɔkumɛnz̤ɛla kwakʰɛ iɡ̤umɓi ɛz̤intɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni z̤ɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ kwaɓa kuɓi kakʰulu nd̤az̤ilaɬɛla pʰanɮɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iimpaɬa z̤ɛnɮu katɔb̤ija nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛɡ̤umɓi nd̤at͡ʃɔ ɓawaɬamɓulula amaɡ̤umɓi nd̤az̤iɓujisɛla kʰɔna iimpaɬa z̤ɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa nɛntlaka ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ nd̤az̤i ukuɓa iz̤aɓɛlɔ z̤aɓalɛv̤i aɓaz̤inikwanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓalɛv̤i nɛɛmv̤umi aɓaɓɛsɛɓɛnz̤a umsɛɓɛnz̤i ɓaɓɛɓalɛkɛlɛ ɛlɔwɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni wakʰɛ nd̤aɓamɓana naɓapʰatʰi nd̤atʰi jini ukuɓa inɮu katʰikǁɔ iʃijwɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤aɓaɓutʰa nd̤aɓamisa ɛsikʰunɮɛni saɓɔ az̤a ɔnkɛ amajud̤a az̤isa iz̤iʃumi z̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛz̤ɛwajini ɛnt͡ʃa nɛz̤ɛɔli kɔɔv̤imɓa nd̤amisa pʰɛz̤u kɔɔv̤imɓa uʃɛlɛmija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɔt͡sad̤ɔki umb̤ali nɔpɛd̤aja kuɓalɛv̤i napʰant͡si kwɛz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ janɡ̤uhanan uɲana kaz̤akurɛ uɲana kamatanija nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛkusitʰiwa ɓaɲanisɛkilɛ ɓamisɛlwa ukwaɓɛla aɓaz̤alwana ɓaɓɔ nd̤ikʰumɓulɛ tʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ukuz̤ikǀima iiŋǀɛɓa z̤am ɛnd̤iz̤ɛnz̤ilɛjɔ ɛnɮwini katʰikǁɔ nasɛz̤iɡ̤ǁ̤inɛni z̤ajɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa nd̤aɓɔna kwajud̤a aɓakǁɔv̤ula ɛz̤ikǁɔv̤ulɛlwɛni z̤ɛwajini nɡ̤ɛsaɓatʰa naɓatʰutʰa amasind̤ɛ aɓatʰwalisa amaɛsilɛ kwanɛwajini nɛɛd̤ilija namakʰiwanɛ nɛmitʰwalɔ jɔnkɛ ɓɛjiz̤isa ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɛmini jɛsaɓatʰa nd̤akǃɔnɔnɔnd̤isa nɡ̤alɔɔ ɓatʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɔkuɮa nɡ̤ajɔ kwakuɬɛli kʰɔna naɓasɛtirɛ ɓɛz̤isɛ iintlanz̤i nɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛntɛnɡ̤isɔ ɓɛtʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɛsaɓatʰa kɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm nd̤aɓamɓana naɓanumz̤ana ɓakwajud̤a nd̤atʰi kuɓɔ jintɔni lɛ ntɔ imɓi kanɡ̤aka nijɛnz̤ajɔ niwuɬamɓɛlajɔ um̤la wɛsaɓatʰa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnalɔ ɔɔjiɬɔ waz̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu wasifikisɛla tʰina nalɔ mz̤i ɓɔnkɛ ɔɓɔ ɓuɓi kɛ nɔnɡ̤ɛz̤a ukuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ kusirajɛli nijiɬamɓɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛ isaɓatʰa ɓɛkusitʰi kwakuɓa luŋ̤ǀ̤walaz̤i pʰakatʰi kwamasanɡ̤ɔ asɛjɛrusalɛm pʰamɓi kwɛsaɓatʰa nd̤itʰi maz̤iv̤alwɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ nd̤itʰi maz̤inɡ̤av̤ulwa id̤ɛ iɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛ isaɓatʰa nd̤amisa iŋǁɛɲɛ jamad̤ɔd̤ana ɛmasanɡ̤wɛni ukuz̤ɛ kunɡ̤anɡ̤ɛniswa mtʰwalɔ nɡ̤ɛmini jɛsaɓatʰa aɓaxwɛɓi naɓatʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛntɛnɡ̤isɔ ɓaɓɛlala nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛjɛrusalɛm kaɲɛ nɔkuɓa kukaɓini nd̤akǃɔnɔnɔnd̤isa kuɓɔ nd̤atʰi kuɓɔ jini ukuɓa nilalɛ pʰamɓi kɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a ukuɓa nitʰɛ napʰind̤a nd̤ɔnisa isanɮa kususɛla kwɛlɔ kǁɛʃa aɓaɓanɡ̤a sɛz̤a nɡ̤ɛsaɓɛtʰa nd̤atʰi kuɓalɛv̤i maɓaz̤iɬamɓululɛ ɓɛz̤ɛ ɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ amasanɡ̤ɔ ukuz̤ɛ kuŋ̤ǀ̤waliswɛ um̤la wɛsaɓatʰa nd̤ikʰumɓulɛlɛ nanɡ̤alɛ ntɔ tʰikǁɔ uɓɛ nɛŋǀɛɓa nɡ̤ɔkɔɓuninz̤i ɓɛŋǀɛɓa jakʰɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa nd̤awaɓɔna amajud̤a aɓɛz̤ɛkɛ aɓafaz̤i aɓanɡ̤amaaʃd̤ɔd̤ɛkaz̤i namaamɔnikaz̤i namamɔwab̤ikaz̤i ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ iŋǁɛɲɛ ɓɛtʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɛsiaʃd̤ɔd̤ɛ ɓɛnɡ̤ɛnakukǃɔnd̤a ukutʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɛsijud̤a ɓɛtʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔkwɛntɛtʰɔ jɛz̤iz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤wɛ nd̤aɓamɓana nawɔ nd̤awat͡ʃab̤isa nd̤aɓɛtʰa amad̤ɔd̤a kuwɔ nd̤awaɮatʰula iinwɛlɛ nd̤awafunɡ̤isa utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkutʰi inɛnɛ iintɔmɓi z̤ɛnu aniji kuz̤ɛnd̤isɛla kɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤aɓɔ aniji kuz̤iz̤ɛkɛla ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu aniji kuz̤iz̤ɛka nɡ̤ɔkwɛnu wajɛnɡ̤ɔnɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓɔ jini usɔlɔmɔn wamasirajɛli ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɛz̤ininz̤i kwakunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ajɛ uɓɛtʰand̤wa nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ utʰikǁɔ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani wamasirajɛli ɔnkɛ najɛ lɔwɔ ɓamɔnisa aɓafaz̤i ɓɛz̤iɲɛ iintlanɡ̤a makuv̤akalɛ nɡ̤ani ukuɓa nɛnz̤ɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɓu ɓuɓi ɓukʰulu ɓɔkwɛnz̤a uɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ kutʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuz̤ɛka aɓafaz̤i ɓɛz̤iɲɛ iintlanɡ̤a kɛ kalɔku kɔɔɲana ɓakajɔjad̤a uɲana kaɛlijaʃib̤i umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔmkʰulu ɓɛkukʰɔ kuɓɔ ɔnɡ̤umjɛni kwasanɛb̤alati wasɛhɔrɔn nd̤amɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa kɛ ɓakʰumɓulɛ tʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɬamɓɛla kwaɓɔ uɓuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɔɓuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɔwɔɓulɛv̤i nd̤awaɬamɓuluka kɛ ɛz̤intwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛz̤iɲɛ iintlanɡ̤a nd̤az̤imisa iz̤iɡ̤ǁ̤ina z̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɛz̤aɓalɛv̤i z̤ɔmntu nɡ̤ɔmntu ɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini wakʰɛ nɛz̤ɔmsɔnd̤ɛz̤ɔ wɛɛnkuni nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa amisiwɛjɔ nɛz̤ɛɛntlaɬɛla nd̤ikʰumɓulɛlɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ tʰikǁɔ kɛ kalɔku kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kaahaswɛrɔsi lɔ ahaswɛrɔsi kɛ uɓɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛind̤ija wɛz̤isa kwakuʃi kumaz̤wɛ alikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɓini anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa kǁa wajɛɬɛli uahaswɛrɔsi ɛtrɔnɛni jɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ ɛsɛʃuʃan kɔmkʰulu nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsitʰatʰu wɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ waɓɛnz̤ɛla isiɮɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ kǁa jamapɛrsi nɛjamamɛd̤i amawaɓa naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamaz̤wɛ ɓɛɓɛpʰamɓi kwakʰɛ akuɓɔn ukuɓa uɓɔnisa aɓantu uɓutʲɛɓi ɔɓuz̤ukilɛjɔ ɓɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ nɛsihɔmɓɔ ɛsiŋǃaɓilɛjɔ sɔɓukʰulu ɓakʰɛ imiɬa ɛmininz̤i imiɬa ɛlikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɛkuz̤alisɛkɛni kwalɔɔ miɬa waɓɛnz̤ɛla isiɮɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓafumanɛka ɛʃuʃan kɔmkʰulu kwatʰaɓatʰɛla kwaɓakʰulu kwɛsa kwaɓaŋǀinanɛ imiɬa jasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni jɔmjɛz̤ɔ wɛnɮu jɔkumkani amalɛnɡ̤alɛnɡ̤a ajɛnɡ̤awɛlinɛn ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ nɛkǀikiz̤ɛkilɛjɔ nɛmsi ɛɓɔt͡ʃwɛ nɡ̤ɛɛnt͡sɔntɛlɔ z̤ɛlinɛn ɛkǀikiz̤ɛkilɛjɔ nɛmfusa kumakʰɔŋ̰ǀ̰ɔ ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nakwiint͡sika z̤ɛmarmɔrɛ ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ iz̤iŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlɔ iz̤ɛz̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛz̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔmɓɛkɛlɛlɔ wamatʲɛ aluɬaz̤a nam̤lɔpʰɛ naz̤iipɛrilɛ namɲama kwajɛ kusɛlwa nɡ̤ɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ z̤iz̤iimpaɬa nɡ̤ɛɛmpaɬa ininz̤i iwajini jakɔmkʰulu nɡ̤ɔkwamanɮa ɔkumkani ukusɛla kwajɛ kunɡ̤ɔkɔmtʰɛtʰɔ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ uɲanz̤ɛlajɔ kuɓa wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukumisɛla z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ikʰulu z̤ɛnɮu jakʰɛ ukuɓa ɛnz̤ɛ ɛlɔwɔ nalɔwɔ nɡ̤ɔkuz̤itʰand̤ɛla kwakʰɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ uv̤aʃti ukumkanikaz̤i wɛnz̤ɛla aɓafaz̤i isiɮɔ ɛnɮwini jakɔmkʰulu ɛɓijɛkakumkani uahaswɛrɔsi nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kǁa intliz̤ijɔ jɔkumkani jajimnand̤i jiwajini waɓajalɛla ɔɔmɛhuman nɔb̤iz̤ɛta nɔharb̤ɔna nɔb̤iɡ̤ɛta nɔab̤aɡ̤ɛta nɔz̤ɛtarɛ nɔkarkasi aɓaɓusi aɓasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ aɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛlajɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓɔkumkani watʰi maɓamz̤isɛ uv̤aʃti ukumkanikaz̤i pʰamɓi kɔkumkani ɛnɔnkɔnt͡ʃɔ lɔɓukumkanikaz̤i ukuɓa aɓɔnisɛ aɓantu naɓatʰɛtʰɛli uɓuɬɛ ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛjinz̤wakaz̤i imɓɔnakalɔ jakʰɛ akav̤umanɡ̤a ukumkanikaz̤i uv̤aʃti ukuz̤a nɡ̤ɛliz̤wi lɔkumkani nɡ̤aɓaɓusi aɓɔ waɓa nɔɓuxalaxumɛ ɔɓukʰulu ɓav̤utʰa uɓuʃuʃu ɓakʰɛ kujɛ watʰi kɛ kwiz̤ilumkɔ ɛz̤iwaz̤ijɔ amakǁɛʃa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iɓisɛnd͡ʒ̤iwa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ intɔ jɔkumkani pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓawaz̤ijɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɛsikɔ aɓaɓɛkufupʰi kujɛ ɔɔkarʃɛna nɔʃɛtarɛ nɔad̤ɛmata nɔtarʃiʃɛ nɔmɛrɛs nɔmarsɛna nɔmɛmukan aɓatʰɛtʰɛli aɓasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓamapɛrsi namamɛd̤i aɓaɓɛɓuɓɔna uɓusɔ ɓɔkumkani aɓaɓɛɬala ɛz̤iɬalwɛni z̤ɔɓukʰulu ɛɓukumkanini watʰi nɡ̤ɔkɔmtʰɛtʰɔ anɡ̤ɛnz̤iwa ntɔni ukumkanikaz̤i uv̤aʃti nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa ɛnɡ̤alɛnz̤anɡ̤a iliz̤wi lɔkumkani uahaswɛrɔsi nɡ̤aɓaɓusi watʰi umɛmukan pʰamɓi kɔkumkani naɓatʰɛtʰɛli uv̤aʃti ukumkanikaz̤i akapʰɔsisɛ jɛd̤wa upʰɔsisɛ nakuɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔnkɛ nakwiz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤isɛmaz̤wɛni ɔnkɛ ɔkumkani uahaswɛrɔsi kuɓa lɛ nd̤awɔ jɔkumkanikaz̤i ija kupʰuma ifikɛlɛlɛ kuɓafaz̤i ɓɔnkɛ ad̤ɛlɛkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a aɓɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ kǁa kutʰiwa ukumkani uahaswɛrɔsi watʰi makɛz̤iswɛ uv̤aʃti ukumkanikaz̤i pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ akɛz̤a kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ amakʰɔsikaz̤i asɛpɛrsi nasɛmɛd̤i ajiv̤ajɔ lɛ ntɔ jɔkumkanikaz̤i aja kujikǁɛla kwanam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ kuɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔnkɛ ɓɔkumkani kwand̤ɛ kɛ ukud̤ɛla nɔɓuxalaxumɛ ukuɓa kutʰɛ kwalunɡ̤a makupʰumɛ iliz̤wi lɔkumkani ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ lib̤alwɛ ɛmitʰɛtʰwɛni jamapɛrsi namamɛd̤i ukuz̤ɛ linɡ̤at͡ʃit͡ʃi lɔkuɓa uv̤aʃti anɡ̤aɓi sɛz̤a pʰamɓi kɔkumkani uahaswɛrɔsi aɓunikɛlɛ uɓukumkanikaz̤i ɓakʰɛ kuwaɓɔ ɔlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kunajɛ wɔtʰi kɛ wakuv̤akala umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkumkani aja kuwɛnz̤a ɛɓukumkanini ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓukʰulu ɓɔnkɛ aɓafaz̤i ɓawaɓɛkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a aɓɔ kutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ kwɛnkulu kusɛ kwɛŋǀinanɛ iliz̤wi ɛlɔ lalunɡ̤a ɛmɛɬwɛni ɔkumkani naɓatʰɛtʰɛli wɛnz̤a kɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likamɛmukan watʰumɛla iiŋǀwad̤i ɛmaz̤wɛni ɔnkɛ kwiliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛliz̤wɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkub̤ala kwalɔ kwiz̤iz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛntɛtʰɔ z̤az̤ɔ ɔkɔkuɓa amad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ alawulɛ ɛz̤inɮwini z̤awɔ atʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ɛntɛtʰɔ jakɔwawɔ ɛmv̤a kwɛz̤i z̤intɔ ɓakud̤amɓa uɓuʃuʃu ɓɔkumkani uahaswɛrɔsi wamkʰumɓula uv̤aʃti nɔkɔ aɓɛkwɛnz̤ilɛ nɔkɔ ɓɛkuɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwɛ nɡ̤ajɛ atʰi amad̤ɔd̤ana aɓɛlunɡ̤isɛlɛla kujɛ ukumkani makafunɛlwɛ iintɔmɓi ɛz̤isɛz̤iintɔmɓi ɛz̤imɓɔnakalɔ intlɛ ukumkani makajalɛlɛ aɓapʰatʰi ɛmaz̤wɛni ɔnkɛ ɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ ɓaɬanɡ̤anisɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iintɔmɓi ɛz̤isɛz̤iintɔmɓi ɛz̤imɓɔnakalɔ intlɛ ɓaz̤iz̤isɛ ɛʃuʃan kɔmkʰulu ɛnɮwini jaɓafaz̤i pʰant͡si kwɛsanɮa sikahɛɡ̤aji itʰɛnwa lɔkumkani umɡ̤ǀ̤ini waɓafaz̤i z̤inikwɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ɔkutʰamɓisa iz̤ɛ itʰi intɔmɓi ɛtʰɛ jalunɡ̤a ɛmɛɬwɛni ɔkumkani iɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkanikaz̤i ɛsikʰunɮɛni sikav̤aʃti lalunɡ̤a ɛlɔ liz̤wi ɛmɛɬwɛni ɔkumkani wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ kwakukʰɔ kɛ ɛʃuʃan kɔmkʰulu ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤umjud̤a ɛɡ̤ama linɡ̤umɔrd̤ɛkaji uɲana kajahirɛ uɲana kaʃimɛhi uɲana kakiʃɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤umb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɛjajitʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm naɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa aɓaɓɛtʰind͡ʒ̤wɛ nɔjɛkɔnija wakwajud̤a ɔwatʰind͡ʒ̤wa nɡ̤unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli jajɛ inɡ̤umɔnɮi kahad̤asa nɡ̤uɛstɛrɛ kɛ lɔwɔ intɔmɓi kajisɛkaz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛnɡ̤ɛnajisɛ intɔmɓi lɛjɔ jajimilɛ kakuɬɛ intlɛ nasɛɓuswɛni ɛmv̤a kɔkufa kukajisɛ nɔnina umɔrd̤ɛkaji wajitʰaɓatʰa jaɓa jintɔmɓi jakʰɛ kwatʰi ɛkuv̤akalɛni kwɛliz̤wi lɔkumkani nɔmtʰɛtʰɔ wakʰɛ ɛkuɬanɡ̤aniswɛni kwɛɛntɔmɓi ɛz̤ininz̤i ɛʃuʃan kɔmkʰulu pʰant͡si kwɛsanɮa hɛɡ̤aji nɔɛstɛrɛ ɛnɮwini jɔkumkani pʰant͡si kwɛsanɮa sikahɛɡ̤aji umɡ̤ǀ̤ini waɓafaz̤i jamkʰɔlisa intɔmɓi lɛjɔ wajɛnz̤ɛla uɓuɓɛlɛ wakʰawulɛz̤a wajinika iz̤intɔ z̤ajɔ z̤ɔkutʰamɓisa nɛz̤aɓɛlɔ z̤ajɔ wajinika nɛɛntɔmɓi ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛz̤iɬɛliwɛjɔ ɛz̤iv̤ɛla ɛnɮwini jɔkumkani wajiɓɛka jɔna nɔmtʰind͡ʒ̤ana wajɔ kwɛjɔna nd̤awɔ intlɛ kwinɮu jaɓafaz̤i uɛstɛrɛ uɓɛnɡ̤aɓakǁɛlanɡ̤a aɓantu ɓakɔwaɓɔ nɛmiz̤alwanɛ jakʰɛ kuɓa umɔrd̤ɛkaji wajɛmwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkuɓa anɡ̤aɓakǁɛli umɔrd̤ɛkaji wajɛ ukuhamɓa imiɬa nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔnkɛ pʰamɓi kwɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ jɛnɮu jaɓafaz̤i ukuɓa akwaz̤i ukupʰila kukaɛstɛrɛ nɔkwɛnz̤iwajɔ kujɛ kɛ kalɔku ɛkufikɛni kwɛkǁɛʃa lɛntɔmɓi nɡ̤ɛntɔmɓi lɔkuja uahaswɛrɔsi ɛkupʰɛlɛni kɔkwɛnz̤iwa kwɛsikɔ laɓafaz̤i iiɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛlinamɓini kuɓa ɓɛkund͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuz̤alisɛka kwɛmiɬa jɔkutʰand͡ʒ̤iswa kwaz̤ɔ iiɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤intand̤atʰu ɓɛkusɛnz̤iwa nɡ̤ɛɔli jɛmɔrɛ ɛz̤iɲɛ iiɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤intand̤atʰu nɡ̤ɔɓulawu nanɡ̤ɛɛntɔ z̤ɔkutʰamɓisa aɓafaz̤i nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa kɛ iɓɛ isitʰi intɔmɓi ukuja kutʰi kɔnkɛ ɛɓikuŋǃwɛnɛla ikunikwɛ ihamɓɛ nakɔ ipʰuma ɛnɮwini jaɓafaz̤i ukuja ɛnɮwini jɔkumkani iɓisakuja nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ iɓujɛlɛ kwɛjɛsiɓini inɮu jaɓafaz̤i ɛpʰant͡si kɔɡ̤ǀ̤inɔ lukaʃahaʃɡ̤az̤i itʰɛnwa lɔkumkani umɡ̤ǀ̤ini wamaʃwɛʃwɛ iɓinɡ̤aɓi saja ɛnɡ̤ajinanz̤anɡ̤a ajiɓiz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama ɛkufikɛni kwɛkǁɛʃa likaɛstɛrɛ intɔmɓi kaab̤ihajili ujisɛkaz̤i kamɔrd̤ɛkaji ɔɓɛjitʰaɓatʰɛ ukuɓa iɓɛ jintɔmɓi jakʰɛ lɔkuɓa ajɛ akafunanɡ̤a ntɔ inɡ̤akǁɛlwanɡ̤a nɡ̤uhɛɡ̤aji itʰɛnwa lɔkumkani umɡ̤ǀ̤ini waɓafaz̤i uɛstɛrɛ waɓaɓalwa nɡ̤aɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓamɓɔnajɔ wasiwa kɛ uɛstɛrɛ uahaswɛrɔsi ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ jɔɓukumkani nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛʃumi lɛjɔ jiɲanɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤utɛb̤ɛtɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ ukumkani wamtʰand̤a uɛstɛrɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓafaz̤i ɓɔnkɛ wamɓaɓala wamɛnz̤ɛla iŋǀɛɓa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntɔmɓi z̤ɔnkɛ unkɔnt͡ʃɔ lɔɓukumkanikaz̤i waluɓɛka ɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɛ wamɛnz̤a ukumkanikaz̤i ɛsikʰunɮɛni sikav̤aʃti ukumkani waɓɛnz̤ɛla isiɮɔ ɛsikʰulu aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ isiɮɔ sikaɛstɛrɛ wawapʰumz̤a amaz̤wɛ wapʰa iz̤ipʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkwamanɮa ɔkumkani kɛ kalɔku ɛkuɬanɡ̤aniswɛni kwɛɛntɔmɓi ɔkwɛsiɓini uɓɛɬɛli umɔrd̤ɛkaji ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔkumkani uɛstɛrɛ uɓɛnɡ̤ajikǁɛlanɡ̤a imiz̤alwanɛ jakʰɛ naɓantu ɓakɔwaɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ umɔrd̤ɛkaji wajɛmmisɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iliz̤wi likamɔrd̤ɛkaji uɓɛlɛnz̤a uɛstɛrɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa wajɛsɔnɮiwa nɡ̤ujɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa kwatʰi umɔrd̤ɛkaji ɛɬɛli ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔkumkani ɓaɓa nɔɓuxalaxumɛ ub̤iɡ̤ɛtan nɔtɛrɛʃɛ amatʰɛnwa amaɓini ɔkumkani aɓaɡ̤ǀ̤ini ɓɔmɲanɡ̤ɔ ɓafuna iz̤anɮa uahaswɛrɔsi jaz̤iwa lɔɔ ntɔ nɡ̤umɔrd̤ɛkaji wakǁɛlɛla uɛstɛrɛ ukumkanikaz̤i uɛstɛrɛ wakǁɛlɛla ɛɡ̤amɛni likamɔrd̤ɛkaji jaŋǀinwa lɔɔ ntɔ jafuɲanwa ɓakǁʰɔɲwa ɓɔɓaɓini ɛmtʰini jab̤alwa lɔɔ ntɔ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa pʰamɓi kɔkumkani ɛmv̤ɛni kwɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ uahaswɛrɔsi wamɛnz̤a mkʰulu uhaman uɲana kahamɛd̤ata umaɡ̤aɡ̤i wampʰakamisa isiɬalɔ sakʰɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛnajɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɔkumkani aɓaɓɛsɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔkumkani ɓaɓɛɡ̤ukǃa ɓakǃuɓud̤ɛ kuhaman kuɓa wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ajɛ kɛ jɛna umɔrd̤ɛkaji akaɡ̤ukǃa akakǃuɓud̤a kujɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɔkumkani aɓaɓɛsɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔkumkani ɓatʰi kumɔrd̤ɛkaji jini ukuɓa uwuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkumkani kwatʰi kɛ ɓakumana ukut͡ʃɔ kujɛ imiɬa nɡ̤ɛmiɬa ɛnɡ̤apʰulapʰuli kuɓɔ ɓamkǁɛlɛla uhaman ukukʰanɡ̤ɛla ukuɓa aja amaz̤wi kamɔrd̤ɛkaji kuɓa uɓɛɓakǁɛlɛlɛ ukuɓa jɛna unɡ̤umjud̤a waɓɔna uhaman ukuɓa umɔrd̤ɛkaji akaɡ̤ukǃi akakǃuɓud̤i kujɛ uhaman waz̤ala nɡ̤umsind̤ɔ wakukǀɛkisa ukuɓa amsɛ iz̤anɮa umɔrd̤ɛkaji jɛd̤wa kuɓa uɓɛɓakǁɛlɛlwɛ aɓantu ɓakulɔmɔrd̤ɛkaji waŋ̤ǁ̤amɛla kɛ uhaman ukuwat͡ʃaɓalalisa ɔnkɛ amajud̤a aɓɛsɛɓukumkanini ɓɔnkɛ ɓukaahaswɛrɔsi aɓantu ɓakulɔmɔrd̤ɛkaji nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɔkukǃala jiɲanɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤unisan kɛ lɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɓini wɔkumkani uahaswɛrɔsi ipuri likǃaʃisɔ kɛ ɛlɔ pʰamɓi kɔhaman nɡ̤ɛmini iɲanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jad̤a jaɓa jɛjɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɓini jiɲanɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤uad̤arɛ kɛ lɛjɔ watʰi uhaman uahaswɛrɔsi kukʰɔ aɓantu aɓatʰilɛ aɓatʰɛ aɓanɡ̤ɛnɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɛmaz̤wɛni ɔnkɛ ɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɔ nɛmitʰɛtʰɔ jaɓɔ jaɬukilɛ kwɛjaɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓajɛnz̤i imitʰɛtʰɔ jɔkumkani akufanɛlɛkilɛ ukuɓajɛka ukuɓa kutʰɛ kwalunɡ̤a makub̤alwɛ ɓat͡ʃatʲalaliswɛ nd̤ɔlinɡ̤anisɛla ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤aɓawɛnz̤ajɔ lɔɔ msɛɓɛnz̤i wɔkumkani aliʃumi ɛɛtalɛntɛ z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ukuɓa z̤iz̤iswɛ ɛɓutʲɛɓini ɓɔkumkani ukumkani wawukʰulula umsɛsanɛ wakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ uhaman uɲana kahamɛd̤ata umaɡ̤aɡ̤i umɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli wamajud̤a watʰi kuhaman ujinikiwɛ isiliv̤ɛrɛ lɛjɔ naɓantu aɓɔ makwɛnz̤iwɛ kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ kwaɓiz̤wa kɛ aɓab̤ali ɓɔkumkani nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɔkukǃala nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsitʰatʰu kujɔ kwab̤alwa nɡ̤ɔkɔmtʰɛtʰɔ wɔnkɛ kahaman kwiixulunɛli z̤ɔkumkani nakumaɓamɓa aɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ amaz̤wɛ nɡ̤amaz̤wɛ nakuɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaɓantu nɡ̤aɓantu kumaz̤wɛ nɡ̤amaz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔkub̤ala kwawɔ kuɓantu nɡ̤aɓantu nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛntɛtʰɔ z̤aɓɔ kwab̤alwa ɛɡ̤amɛni lɔkumkani uahaswɛrɔsi kwatʲwinwa nɡ̤ɔmsɛsanɛ wɔkumkani z̤atʰuɲɛlwa iiŋǀwad̤i nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤id̤imi kumaz̤wɛ ɔnkɛ ɔkumkani ukuɓa kut͡ʃatʲalaliswɛ kuɓulawɛ kusinɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰant͡si ɔnkɛ amajud̤a kutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ kusɛ kwind̤ɔd̤a ɛnkulu iint͡sana naɓafaz̤i nɡ̤aminiɲɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsitʰatʰu wɛɲanɡ̤a jɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɓini jiɲanɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤uad̤arɛ kɛ lɛjɔ kupʰanɡ̤wɛ amakǁʰɔɓa awɔ intɛtʰɔ jɛŋǀwad̤i lɛjɔ jɔkuz̤ɛ awisɛlwɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ ɔnkɛ amaz̤wɛ nɡ̤amaz̤wɛ jaja jatʰuɲɛlwa kwiz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ukuɓa z̤iɬalɛ z̤iwulunɡ̤isɛlɛlwɛ lɔɔ m̤la iz̤iɡ̤id̤imi z̤apʰuma z̤iŋ̤ǁ̤amilɛ nɡ̤ɛliz̤wi lɔkumkani umtʰɛtʰɔ lɔwɔ ɛʃuʃan kɔmkʰulu kɛ nɔhaman ɓaɬala pʰant͡si ɓasɛla wɔna umz̤i wasɛʃuʃan wad̤id̤ɛka kɛ kalɔku umɔrd̤ɛkaji wakwaz̤i kɔnkɛ ɔkɔ kwɛnz̤iwɛjɔ waz̤ik͡xaz̤ula umɔrd̤ɛkaji iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ wamɓatʰa ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ nɔtʰutʰu wapʰuma waja pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i wakʰala nɡ̤ɛsikʰalɔ ɛsikʰulu ɛsik͡xak͡xa wafika pʰamɓi kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɔkumkani kuɓa ɓɛkunɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔkumkani amɓɛtʰɛ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ kuwɔ ɔnkɛ amaz̤wɛ nɡ̤amaz̤wɛ kwind̤awɔ ɛlitʰɛ kujɔ iliz̤wi lɔkumkani nɔmtʰɛtʰɔ wakʰɛ jaɓa sisid͡ʒ̤wili ɛsikʰulu kumajud̤a nɔkuz̤ila ukuɮa nɔkulila nɔkumɓamɓaz̤ɛla aɓaninz̤i ɓanɮala iinɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ nɔtʰutʰu z̤ɛz̤a kɛ iimpɛlɛsi z̤ikaɛstɛrɛ namatʰɛnwa akwakʰɛ amkǁɛlɛla wamana ɛz̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤a ukumkanikaz̤i ɛɓuɬunɡ̤u watʰumɛla iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɔkumamɓɛsa umɔrd̤ɛkaji z̤isuswɛ kujɛ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ akaz̤amkɛla uɛstɛrɛ waɓiz̤a uhataki wakumatʰɛnwa ɔkumkani ɔɓɛmiswɛ ukuɓa amlunɡ̤isɛlɛ wamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ kumɔrd̤ɛkaji ukuɓa az̤i ukuɓa kutʰɛni kunɡ̤ani wapʰuma uhataki waja kumɔrd̤ɛkaji ɛnd̤awɛni jɛmɓutʰɔ jɔmz̤i ɛɓipʰamɓi kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɔkumkani umɔrd̤ɛkaji wamkǁɛlɛla kɔnkɛ ɔkum̤lɛlɛjɔ wamkǀakǀisɛla lɛmali aɓɛtʰɛ uhaman uja kulilinɡ̤anisɛla ɛɓutʲɛɓini ɓɔkumkani nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamajud̤a ukuɓa at͡ʃatʲalaliswɛ wamnika nɛŋǀwad̤i lɛjɔ jɔmtʰɛtʰɔ ɔɓuwiswɛ ɛʃuʃan wɔkuwat͡ʃaɓalalisa ukuz̤ɛ ajiɓɔnisɛ uɛstɛrɛ amkǁɛlɛlɛ amwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkuɓa ajɛ ataxuz̤isɛ kujɛ atʰand̤az̤ɛlɛ aɓantu ɓakɔwaɓɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ wɛz̤a uhataki wamkǁɛlɛla uɛstɛrɛ amaz̤wi kamɔrd̤ɛkaji watʰɛtʰa uɛstɛrɛ kuhataki wamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ kumɔrd̤ɛkaji ɛsitʰi ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɔkumkani naɓantu ɓamaz̤wɛ ɔkumkani ɓajaz̤i ukuɓa nɔjind̤ɔd̤a nɔjinkaz̤ana ɔtʰɛ waja ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛnɡ̤apʰakatʰi ɛnɡ̤aɓiz̤wanɡ̤a mɲɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔwɔkuɓa aɓulawɛ nɡ̤ulɔwɔ jɛd̤wa atʰɛ wamɔlulɛla intɔnɡ̤a jakʰɛ jɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɔwɔtʰi apʰilɛ kɛ and̤iɓiz̤wanɡ̤a ukuɓa nd̤ijɛ lɛ miɬa imaʃumi matʰatʰu ɓamkǁɛlɛla kɛ umɔrd̤ɛkaji amaz̤wi kaɛstɛrɛ watʰi umɔrd̤ɛkaji ukumpʰɛnd̤ula uɛstɛrɛ musa ukutʰi ɛmpʰɛfumlwɛni wakʰɔ uja kusind̤a wɛna ɛnɮwini jɔkumkani nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwamajud̤a ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kǁa utʰɛ waɬala watʰi nɡ̤ɛli kǁɛʃa ukupʰɛfumla nɔkuɬanɡ̤ulwa kɔwav̤ɛlɛla amajud̤a kwɛɲɛ ind̤awɔ kɛ wɛna nɛnɮu jɔjiɬɔ nit͡ʃatʲalaliswɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔwaz̤ijɔ unɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛɓukumkanini nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛkǁɛʃa ɛlind͡ʒ̤ɛ watʰi uɛstɛrɛ ukumpʰɛnd̤ula umɔrd̤ɛkaji jija uwaɬanɡ̤anisɛ ɔnkɛ amajud̤a anɔkufumanɛka ɛʃuʃan niz̤ilɛ ukuɮa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam musani ukuɮa ukusɛla imiɬa iɓɛ mitʰatʰu uɓusuku nɛmini mna kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nɛɛmpɛlɛsi z̤am sija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuz̤ila ukuɮa nd̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuja nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤ɛsɛsikwɛni nd̤it͡ʃaɓalalɛ ukuɓa nd̤ijat͡ʃaɓalala umɔrd̤ɛkaji wɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa wɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ uɛstɛrɛ aɓɛmwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsitʰatʰu uɛstɛrɛ wamɓatʰa ɛz̤ɔɓukumkanikaz̤i wɛma ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛnɡ̤apʰakatʰi jɛnɮu jɔkumkani malunɡ̤ana nɛnɮu jɔkumkani wajɛ ɛɬɛli ɛtrɔnɛni jɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ ɛnɮwini jɔɓukumkani malunɡ̤a nɔmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛnɮu kwatʰi akumɓɔna uɛstɛrɛ ukumkanikaz̤i ɛmi ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni wamɓaɓala wajɔlulɛla kuɛstɛrɛ intɔnɡ̤a jɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛɓisɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ wasɔnd̤ɛla kɛ uɛstɛrɛ wapʰatʰa ɛŋǀamini jɛntɔnɡ̤a lɛjɔ watʰi kujɛ unand̤awɔni kumkanikaz̤i ɛstɛrɛ ufuna ntɔni wɔjinikwa kud̤ɛ kuɓɛ sɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰɛni sɔɓukumkani watʰi uɛstɛrɛ ukuɓa kutʰɛ kwalunɡ̤a makɛz̤ɛ nɔhaman nam̤la ɛsiɮwɛni ɛnd̤imɛnz̤ɛlɛ sɔna watʰi mŋ̤ǁ̤amisɛni uhaman ukuɓa ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likaɛstɛrɛ wɛz̤a nɔhaman ɛsiɮwɛni aɓɛsɛnz̤ilɛ uɛstɛrɛ watʰi kuɛstɛrɛ ɛsiɮwɛni sɛwajini ukǀɛla ntɔni wɔjinikwa ntɔni wɔjɛnz̤ɛlwa kud̤ɛ kuɓɛ sɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰɛni sɔɓukumkani wapʰɛnd̤ula uɛstɛrɛ watʰi kukɔ ɔku ukukǀɛla nɔkutʰand̤az̤a ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤aɓaɓalwa nɡ̤ukumkani ukuɓa kutʰɛ kwalunɡ̤a ukund̤inika ɛnd̤ikukǀɛlajɔ nɔkund̤ɛnz̤ɛla ukutʰand̤az̤a makɛz̤ɛ nɔhaman ɛsiɮwɛni ɛnd̤ija kuɓɛnz̤ɛla sɔna nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔmsɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi lɔkumkani wapʰuma uhaman nɡ̤alɔɔ ɛv̤uja ɛnɛntliz̤ijɔ ɛkǀʰwajitʰilɛjɔ kɛ utʰɛ uhaman akumɓɔna umɔrd̤ɛkaji ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔkumkani ɛnɡ̤av̤uki ɛnɡ̤aʃukumi pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ uhaman waz̤ala nɡ̤umsind̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔmɔrd̤ɛkaji kɛ uhaman waz̤iɓamɓa waja ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ watʰumɛla waɓiz̤a iz̤itʰand̤anɛ z̤akʰɛ nɔz̤ɛrɛʃɛ umkakʰɛ uhaman waɓaɓalisɛla uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓɔɓutʲɛɓi ɓakʰɛ nɔɓuninz̤i ɓɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nakɔ kɔnkɛ ukwɛnz̤iwa mkʰulu kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ukumkani nɔkupʰakaɲiswa kwakʰɛ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɔkumkani watʰi uhaman nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔkɔ uɛstɛrɛ ukumkanikaz̤i akanɡ̤ɛnisanɡ̤a ɓani nɔkumkani ɛsiɮwɛni aɓɛsɛnz̤ilɛ jaɓa nd̤im nd̤ɛd̤wa kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nɡ̤ɔmsɔ und̤imɛmɛlɛ kujɛ nɔkumkani ukanti kɔnkɛ ɔkɔ akund̤anɛlisi wɔnkɛ uɡ̤ama ɛnd̤imɓɔnajɔ umɔrd̤ɛkaji umjud̤a ɛsaɬɛli ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔkumkani watʰi uz̤ɛrɛʃɛ umkakʰɛ nɛz̤itʰand̤anɛ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ kujɛ maɓɛnz̤ɛ umtʰi uɓɛ z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɬanu uɓud̤ɛ ɓawɔ utʰɛtʰɛ ɓamkǁʰɔmɛ umɔrd̤ɛkaji kuwɔ ujɛ kɛ nɔkumkani ɛsiɮwɛni uv̤uja lalunɡ̤a ɛlɔ liz̤wi kuhaman wawɛnz̤a umtʰi lɔwɔ nɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku ɓɛmka aɓaɓakʰɔ uɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ watʰi maz̤iz̤iswɛ iiŋǀwad̤i z̤ɛz̤ikʰumɓuz̤ɔ z̤ɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa z̤amana z̤ilɛswa pʰamɓi kɔkumkani kwafuɲanwa kub̤aliwɛ ɔkɔkuɓa umɔrd̤ɛkaji waɓakǁɛla ɔɔb̤iɡ̤ɛtan nɔtɛrɛʃɛ amatʰɛnwa amaɓini ɔkumkani aɓaɡ̤ǀ̤ini ɓɔmɲanɡ̤ɔ aɓaɓɛfuna iz̤anɮa uahaswɛrɔsi watʰi wɛnz̤ɛlwɛ mɓɛkɔni naɓukʰulu ɓuni umɔrd̤ɛkaji nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ atʰi amad̤ɔd̤ana aɓɛlunɡ̤isɛlɛla kujɛ akɛnz̤ɛlwanɡ̤a ntɔ watʰi nɡ̤uɓani ɔsɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni kɛ kalɔku uhaman uɓɛnɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛnɡ̤apʰanɮɛ jɛnɮu jɔkumkani ɛsiz̤a kutʰi makakǁʰɔɲwɛ umɔrd̤ɛkaji ɛmtʰini aɓɛmlunɡ̤isɛlɛ wɔna atʰi amad̤ɔd̤ana kujɛ nankuja uhaman ɛmi ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni watʰi makanɡ̤ɛnɛ wanɡ̤ɛna kɛ uhaman watʰi kujɛ makwɛnz̤iwɛ ntɔni kwind̤ɔd̤a atʰand̤a ukujiɓɛka ɛmɓɛkwɛni watʰi uhaman ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɛ ukumkani anɡ̤atʰand̤a ukuɓɛka ɓani ɛmɓɛkwɛni aɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛ watʰi uhaman ind̤ɔd̤a atʰand̤ajɔ ukujiɓɛka ɛmɓɛkwɛni maɓaz̤isɛ isamɓatʰɔ sɔɓukumkani amɓatʰa sɔna nɛhaʃɛ akʰwɛla kulɔ luɓɛkwɛ ɛntlɔkwɛni jajɔ unkɔnt͡ʃɔ lɔɓukumkani ɓasinikɛlɛ isamɓatʰɔ ɛsɔ nɛhaʃɛ ɛlɔ ɛsanɮɛni sɔmtʰɛtʰɛli wakumawaɓa ɔkumkani ɓaja mɓatʰisɛ ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ atʰand̤a ukujiɓɛka ɛmɓɛkwɛni ɓajikʰwɛlisɛ ɛhaʃɛni ɛlɔ ikǀand̤ɛ ɛz̤itratwɛni z̤ɔmz̤i ɓad̤and̤ulukɛ pʰamɓi kwajɔ ɓatʰi kwɛnd͡ʒ̤iwa nd͡ʒ̤ɛ kwind̤ɔd̤a atʰand̤a ukujiɓɛka ɛmɓɛkwɛni watʰi kuhaman ŋ̤ǁ̤ama utʰaɓatʰɛ isamɓatʰɔ ɛsɔ nɛhaʃɛ ɛlɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ukutʰɛtʰilɛjɔ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kumɔrd̤ɛkaji umjud̤a ɔɬɛli ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔkumkani makunɡ̤awi pʰant͡si naliɲɛ iliz̤wi kukɔ kɔnkɛ ɔkutʰɛtʰilɛjɔ uhaman wasitʰaɓatʰa isamɓatʰɔ ɛsɔ nɛhaʃɛ ɛlɔ wamamɓatʰisa umɔrd̤ɛkaji wamkʰwɛlisa wamkǀand̤isa ɛz̤itratwɛni z̤ɔmz̤i wad̤and̤uluka pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkutʰi kwɛnd͡ʒ̤iwa nd͡ʒ̤ɛ kwind̤ɔd̤a atʰand̤a ukujiɓɛka ɛmɓɛkwɛni waɓuja umɔrd̤ɛkaji wɛz̤a ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔkumkani kɛ uhaman waŋ̤ǁ̤ama waja ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ ɛtʰɛ mat͡ʃamat͡ʃa ɛɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɛ intlɔkɔ uhaman wamkǀakǀisɛla uz̤ɛrɛʃɛ umkakʰɛ nɛz̤itʰand̤anɛ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ kɔnkɛ ɔkum̤lɛlɛjɔ z̤atʰi kujɛ iz̤ilumkɔ z̤akʰɛ nɔz̤ɛrɛʃɛ umkakʰɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ɔwɛmɓɛwu jamajud̤a umɔrd̤ɛkaji lɔ ukǃalilɛjɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ akunakumtʰini kɛ wɔwa uwilɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ ɓatʰɛ ɓɛsatʰɛtʰa najɛ amatʰɛnwa ɔkumkani ɓaŋ̤ǁ̤amisa uhaman ɛsiɮwɛni aɓɛsɛnz̤ilɛ uɛstɛrɛ ukumkani nɔhaman ɓɛz̤a kusɛla nɔɛstɛrɛ ukumkanikaz̤i watʰi kuɛstɛrɛ nanɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsiɓini ɓɛsɛsiɮwɛni sɛwajini ukǀɛla ntɔni ɛstɛrɛ kumkanikaz̤i wɔjinikwa ntɔni wɔjɛnz̤ɛlwa kud̤ɛ kuɓɛ sɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰɛni sɔɓukumkani wapʰɛnd̤ula uɛstɛrɛ ukumkanikaz̤i watʰi ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤aɓaɓalwa nɡ̤uwɛ ukuɓa kutʰɛ kwalunɡ̤a mand̤inikwɛ uɓɔmi ɓam nɡ̤ɔkukǀɛla naɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkutʰand̤az̤a kuɓa kutʰɛnɡ̤isiwɛ nɡ̤atʰi naɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu ukuz̤ɛ sit͡ʃatʲalaliswɛ siɓulawɛ sisinɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰant͡si ukuɓa ɓɛkutʰɛnɡ̤iswɛ nɡ̤atʰi ukuɓa siɓɛ nɡ̤amakʰɔɓɔka namakʰɔɓɔkaz̤ana nd̤inɡ̤ɛ nd̤itʰɛ kǀwaka nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli lɔwɔ uɓɛnɡ̤ɛjiɓujisɛli iŋ̰ǁ̰walɛkɔ jɔkumkani waz̤a uahaswɛrɔsi watʰi kuɛstɛrɛ ukumkanikaz̤i nɡ̤uɓani lɔwɔ upʰi jɛna lɔwɔ uz̤alisɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ ukwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ watʰi uɛstɛrɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤umɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɛlut͡ʃaɓa nɡ̤ulɔ haman unɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ wad̤and̤atʰɛka kɛ uhaman ɛɓuswɛni ɓɔkumkani nɔkumkanikaz̤i wɛsuka kɛ ɛnɔmsind̤ɔ ɛsiɮwɛni sɛwajini waja ɛmjɛz̤wɛni wɛnɮu kɛ uhaman wɛma ɛɓutʰand̤az̤ɛla uɓɔmi ɓakʰɛ kuɛstɛrɛ ukumkanikaz̤i kuɓa ɛɓɛɓɔna ukuɓa uɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ kwɛlɔɓuɓi kujɛ ukumkani waɓuja ɛmjɛz̤wɛni wɛnɮu wanɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini jɛsiɮɔ sɛwajini uhaman ɛwɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlɔ aɓɛkusɔ uɛstɛrɛ watʰi anɡ̤ad̤ɛ ukumkanikaz̤i aɡ̤ɔɲamɛlwɛ ɛnam ɛnɮwini apʰa lijatʰi ukupʰuma ɛlɔ liz̤wi ɛmlɔɲɛni wɔkumkani ɓaja ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛla uɓusɔ ɓukahaman watʰi uharb̤ɔna ɛliɲɛ lakumatʰɛnwa aɓɛmi pʰamɓi kɔkumkani nanɡ̤uja umtʰi uhaman aɓɛwɛnz̤ɛlɛ umɔrd̤ɛkaji ɔwatʰɛtʰa ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkumkani ɛnɮwini kahaman uɓud̤ɛ ɓawɔ ɓuz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɬanu watʰi mkǁʰɔmɛni kuwɔ ɓamkǁʰɔma kɛ uhaman ɛmtʰini lɔwɔ aɓɛwulunɡ̤isɛlɛ umɔrd̤ɛkaji wad̤amɓa kɛ umsind̤ɔ wɔkumkani nɡ̤alɔɔ uahaswɛrɔsi uɛstɛrɛ ukumkanikaz̤i inɮu kahaman umɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli wamajud̤a umɔrd̤ɛkaji wɛz̤a pʰamɓi kɔkumkani kuɓa uɛstɛrɛ uɓɛjikǁɛlilɛ intɔ aɓɛjijɔ kujɛ ukumkani wakʰulula umsɛsanɛ wakʰɛ aɓɛwutʰaɓatʰɛ kuhaman umɔrd̤ɛkaji uɛstɛrɛ umɔrd̤ɛkaji pʰɛz̤u kwɛnɮu kahaman wapʰind̤a uɛstɛrɛ watʰɛtʰa pʰamɓi kɔkumkani ɛwɛ pʰamɓi kwɛɛɲawɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛlila ɛtaxuz̤isa kujɛ ukuɓa aɓut͡ʃit͡ʃisɛ uɓuɓi ɓukahaman umaɡ̤aɡ̤i nɛŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a jakʰɛ aɓɛjikǀinɡ̤ilɛ nɡ̤amajud̤a waz̤a wajɔlulɛla kuɛstɛrɛ intɔnɡ̤a jɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ wav̤uka uɛstɛrɛ wɛma pʰamɓi kɔkumkani watʰi ukuɓa kutʰɛ kwalunɡ̤a ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤aɓaɓalwa nɡ̤ujɛ jafanɛlɛka lɛ ntɔ pʰamɓi kɔkumkani nd̤alunɡ̤a ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ makub̤alwɛ z̤iɓujɛ iiŋǀwad̤i z̤ɛŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a kahaman uɲana kahamɛd̤ata umaɡ̤aɡ̤i awaz̤ib̤alɛla ukuwat͡ʃaɓalalisa amajud̤a asɛmaz̤wɛni ɔnkɛ kuɓa nd̤inɡ̤atʰini ukuɓa nakɔ ukuɓuɓɔnɛla uɓuɓi ɔɓuja kuɓaz̤ɛla aɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu nd̤inɡ̤atʰini ukuɓa nakɔ ukukuɓɔna ukut͡ʃatʲalaliswa kwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jam watʰi uahaswɛrɔsi kuɛstɛrɛ ukumkanikaz̤i nakumɔrd̤ɛkaji umjud̤a jaɓɔnani inɮu kahaman nd̤ijinikɛ uɛstɛrɛ jɛna nɡ̤ɔkwakʰɛ ɓamkǁʰɔma ɛmtʰini nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa isanɮa sakʰɛ kumajud̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ b̤alani nɡ̤amajud̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛnu ɛɡ̤amɛni lɔkumkani nitʲwinɛ nɡ̤ɔmsɛsanɛ wɔkumkani kuɓa iŋǀwad̤i ɛb̤alwɛ ɛɡ̤amɛni lɔkumkani jatʲwinwa nɡ̤ɔmsɛsanɛ wɔkumkani akukʰɔ unɔkujiɓujisa ɓaɓiz̤wa kɛ aɓab̤ali ɓɔkumkani nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsitʰatʰu jiɲanɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤usiv̤an kɛ lɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wamaʃumi amaɓini anɛsitʰatʰu kujɔ kwab̤alwa nɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ umɔrd̤ɛkaji kumajud̤a nakwiixulunɛli nakumaɓamɓa nakuɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamaz̤wɛ atʰaɓatʰɛla ɛind̤ija ɛz̤a kwakuʃi amaz̤wɛ alikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɓini anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kwiliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛliz̤wɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkub̤ala kwalɔ kuɓantu nɡ̤aɓantu nɡ̤ɔkwɛntɛtʰɔ jaɓɔ nakumajud̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔkub̤ala kwawɔ nanɡ̤ɔkwɛntɛtʰɔ jawɔ kwab̤alwa ɛɡ̤amɛni lɔkumkani uahaswɛrɔsi kwatʲwinwa nɡ̤ɔmsɛsanɛ wɔkumkani kwatʰuɲwa iiŋǀwad̤i nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤id̤imi ɛz̤isɛmahaʃɛni ɛz̤ikʰwɛlɛ kwiimɓalɛki z̤akɔmkʰulu kumankɔɲana ɛsihaʃɛ sakɔmkʰulu kwab̤alwa kwatʰiwa uwav̤umɛlɛ amajud̤a akwimiz̤i nɡ̤ɛmiz̤i jɔnkɛ ukuɓa aɓiz̤ɛlanɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ akʰusɛlɛ uɓɔmi ɓawɔ at͡ʃaɓalalisɛ aɓulalɛ asinɡ̤ɛlɛ pʰant͡si jɔnkɛ jaɓantu nɛjɛliz̤wɛ ɛliwaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlajɔ aɓantwana naɓafaz̤i apʰanɡ̤ɛ amakǁʰɔɓa aɓɔ nɡ̤aminiɲɛ ɛmaz̤wɛni ɔnkɛ uahaswɛrɔsi nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsitʰatʰu wɛɲanɡ̤a jɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɓini jiɲanɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤uad̤arɛ kɛ lɛjɔ iŋǀwad̤i lɛjɔ ukuz̤ɛ awisɛlwɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ ɔnkɛ amaz̤wɛ nɡ̤amaz̤wɛ jatʰuɲɛlwa kwiz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ukuz̤ɛ amajud̤a aɬalɛ sɛlɛz̤ilunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ lɔɔ m̤la ukuz̤ipʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlɛla ɛz̤int͡ʃaɓɛni z̤awɔ iz̤iɡ̤id̤imi z̤akʰwɛla kwiimɓalɛki z̤akɔmkʰulu nakwisihaʃɛ sakɔmkʰulu z̤apʰuma z̤iŋ̤ǁ̤aɲisiwɛ liliz̤wi lɔkumkani umtʰɛtʰɔ lɔwɔ ɛʃuʃan kɔmkʰulu kɛ kalɔku umɔrd̤ɛkaji wapʰuma ɛɓuswɛni ɓɔkumkani ɛnɛsamɓatʰɔ sɔɓukumkani sɛlinɛn ɛmsi ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ nɛsit͡sʰaɓa ɛsikʰulu sɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jɔkwalɛka jɛlinɛn ɛkǀikiz̤ɛkilɛjɔ ɛmfusa umz̤i wasɛʃuʃan waɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓa wav̤uja kumajud̤a kwaɓakʰɔ ukukʰaɲa nɔkuv̤uja nɛmiɬali nɛmɓɛkɔ nakumaz̤wɛ nɡ̤amaz̤wɛ ɔnkɛ nakwimiz̤i nɡ̤ɛmiz̤i jɔnkɛ ɛlatʰi kujɔ iliz̤wi lɔkumkani nɔmtʰɛtʰɔ wakʰɛ jaɓa jimiv̤ujɔ nɛmiɬali kumajud̤a isiɮɔ nɔm̤la wɔkukǀʰwajitʰa aɓaninz̤i ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤ɛliz̤wɛ ɓaɓa nɡ̤amajud̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓafikɛlwa kukunkwantʲa nɡ̤amajud̤a kɛ kalɔku nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɓini jiɲanɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤uad̤arɛ kɛ lɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsitʰatʰu kujɔ ɛkwakutʰɛ ukwɛnz̤iwa kwɛliz̤wi lɔkumkani nɔmtʰɛtʰɔ wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la ɛɓɛz̤ilind̤ɛlɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤amajud̤a ukuwapʰatʰa nɡ̤ɛɡ̤uɲa kwaɡ̤ukǃulwa ɔkɔ amajud̤a aɓa nɡ̤awɔ az̤ipʰatʰa iint͡ʃaɓa z̤awɔ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤uɲa aɓiz̤ɛlana nd̤awɔɲɛ amajud̤a ɛmiz̤ini jawɔ ɛmaz̤wɛni ɔnkɛ uahaswɛrɔsi ukuɓa aɓasɛ isanɮa aɓɔ ɓaɓɛfuna ukuwɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi akwɛma ɛɓuswɛni ɓawɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤afikɛlwa kukunkwantʲa ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamaz̤wɛ nɛɛxulunɛli namaɓamɓa naɓasɛɓɛnz̤i ɓɔkumkani ɓawaŋǀɛd̤a amajud̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɛnɛlwɛ kukɔjika umɔrd̤ɛkaji kuɓa umɔrd̤ɛkaji ɛɓɛmkʰulu ɛnɮwini jɔkumkani ud̤aɓa lwakʰɛ lwaja ɛmaz̤wɛni ɔnkɛ kuɓa ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ inɡ̤umɔrd̤ɛkaji jaja iɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa az̤ɔjisa kɛ amajud̤a ɛz̤ɔ nt͡ʃaɓa z̤awɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nanɡ̤ɔkuɓulala nanɡ̤ɔkut͡ʃaɓalalisa ɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkuz̤itʰand̤ɛla kwaɓɔ ɓaɓɛwatʰijilɛ ɛʃuʃan kɔmkʰulu amajud̤a aɓulala at͡ʃaɓalalisa amakʰulu amaɬanu amad̤ɔd̤a uparʃand̤ata nɔd̤alɛfɔn nɔaspata nɔpɔrata nɔad̤alija nɔarid̤ata nɔparmaʃta nɔarisaji nɔarid̤aji nɔv̤ajɛz̤ata ɔɔɲana aɓaliʃumi ɓakahaman uɲana kahamɛd̤ata umɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli wamajud̤a aɓaɓulala kɛ amakǁʰɔɓa akawakǀʰukumisanɡ̤a nɡ̤alɔɔ laɓaɓulawɛlwa ɛʃuʃan kɔmkʰulu laz̤iswa pʰamɓi kɔkumkani watʰi kuɛstɛrɛ ukumkanikaz̤i ɛʃuʃan kɔmkʰulu amajud̤a aɓulɛlɛ at͡ʃaɓalalisa amakʰulu amaɬanu amad̤ɔd̤a nɔɔɲana aɓaliʃumi ɓakahaman kwamaɲɛ amaz̤wɛ ɔkumkani kɔɓɛka pʰi ukǀɛla ntɔni wɔjinikwa ntɔni wɔjɛnz̤ɛlwa watʰi uɛstɛrɛ ukuɓa kutʰɛ kwalunɡ̤a makanikwɛ amajud̤a asɛʃuʃan nanɡ̤ɔmsɔ ukwɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔmtʰɛtʰɔ walɛ nɔɔɲana aɓaliʃumi ɓakahaman maɓakǁʰɔɲwɛ ɛmtʰini watʰi makwɛnd͡ʒ̤iwɛ nd͡ʒ̤alɔ kwawiswa kɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ ɛʃuʃan kwakǁʰɔɲwa ɔɔɲana aɓaliʃumi ɓakahaman aɓiz̤ɛlana nd̤awɔɲɛ amajud̤a asɛʃuʃan nanɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsinɛ wɛɲanɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤uad̤arɛ aɓulala ɛʃuʃan amakʰulu amatʰatʰu amad̤ɔd̤a amakǁʰɔɓa akawakǀʰukumisanɡ̤a kɛ namaɲɛ amajud̤a aɓɛsɛmaz̤wɛni ɔkumkani aɓiz̤ɛlana nd̤awɔɲɛ akʰusɛla uɓɔmi ɓawɔ apʰumla ɛz̤int͡ʃaɓɛni z̤awɔ aɓulala kwaɓɔ ɓaɓɛwatʰijilɛ amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anɛsiɬanu amakǁʰɔɓa akawakǀʰukumisanɡ̤a kwɛnz̤ɛka ɔku nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsitʰatʰu wɛɲanɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤uad̤arɛ apʰumla nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsinɛ kujɔ awɛnz̤a um̤la wɛsiɮɔ nɔwɔkuv̤uja kɛ amajud̤a asɛʃuʃan aɓiz̤ɛlana nd̤awɔɲɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsitʰatʰu kujɔ nanɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsinɛ kujɔ apʰumla nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɬanu kujɔ awɛnz̤a um̤la wɛsiɮɔ nɔwɔkuv̤uja nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ amajud̤a asɛmapʰanɮɛni aɓɛɬala ɛmiz̤ini ɛsɛmapʰanɮɛni awɛnz̤a um̤la wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsinɛ wɛɲanɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤uad̤arɛ ukuɓa uɓɛ nɡ̤ɔwɔv̤ujɔ nɔwɛsiɮɔ um̤la wɔkukǀʰwajitʰa nɔwɔkutʰumɛlana iz̤aɓɛlɔ umɔrd̤ɛkaji waz̤ib̤ala ɛz̤ɔ ntɔ watʰumɛla iiŋǀwad̤i kumajud̤a ɔnkɛ aɓɛsɛmaz̤wɛni ɔnkɛ uahaswɛrɔsi akufupʰi kwanakud̤ɛ ɛwamisɛla ukuɓa awuɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ um̤la wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsinɛ wɛɲanɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤uad̤arɛ nɔm̤la wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɬanu kujɔ imiɲaka nɡ̤ɛmiɲaka jɔnkɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa ijimiɬa awapʰumla nɡ̤ajɔ amajud̤a ɛz̤int͡ʃaɓɛni z̤awɔ ijiɲanɡ̤a ɛsaɡ̤ukǃulwa nɡ̤awɔ isiŋ̤ǃ̤ala saɓa luv̤ujɔ isid͡ʒ̤wili saɓa nɡ̤um̤la wɔkukǀʰwajitʰa ajɛnz̤ɛ jɔna iɓɛ jimiɬa jɛsiɮɔ nɔmv̤ujɔ nɛjɔkutʰumɛlana iz̤aɓɛlɔ nɛjɔkupʰa amaɬwɛmpu iz̤ipʰɔ az̤a amajud̤a az̤imisɛla ukwɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ aɓɛkǃalilɛ nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ umɔrd̤ɛkaji ɛɓɛwab̤alɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uhaman uɲana kahamɛd̤ata umaɡ̤aɡ̤i umɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli wamajud̤a ɔnkɛ wajɛwakǀinɡ̤ɛlɛ ukuwat͡ʃaɓalalisa amajud̤a ipuri ikǃaʃisɔ kɛ ɛlɔ ukuɓa awad̤uɓad̤uɓɛ awat͡ʃaɓalalisɛ ɛkufikɛni kwalɔɔ ntɔ pʰamɓi kɔkumkani watʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǀwad̤i majiɓujisɛlwɛ ɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɛ iŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a jakʰɛ ɛmɓi aɓɛjikǀinɡ̤ɛlɛ amajud̤a ɓamkǁʰɔmɛ jɛna nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɛmtʰini nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ɓatʰi lɔɔ miɬa jipuri ɓɛjiɓiz̤a nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama lɛkǃaʃisɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamaz̤wi ɔnkɛ alɔɔ ŋǀwad̤i nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jawakuɓɔnajɔ kulɔɔ ntɔ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jawaɬɛlwa kukʰɔ amajud̤a akutʰaɓatʰɛla kuwɔ nakwimɓɛwu jawɔ nakuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰɛlɛla kuwɔ nɡ̤ɔkuz̤ɛ kunɡ̤at͡ʃit͡ʃi ukutʰi ajimisɛ lɔɔ miɬa jɔmiɓini nɡ̤ɔkwɛsib̤alɔ ɛsib̤alwɛ nɡ̤ajɔ nanɡ̤ɔkumiswa kwɛkǁɛʃa lajɔ imiɲaka nɡ̤ɛmiɲaka jɔnkɛ ikʰund͡ʒ̤ulwɛ lɔɔ miɬa jɛnz̤iwɛ kwiz̤iz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana z̤ɔnkɛ kwimiz̤alwanɛ nɡ̤ɛmiz̤alwanɛ kumaz̤wɛ nɡ̤amaz̤wɛ kwimiz̤i nɡ̤ɛmiz̤i inɡ̤at͡ʃit͡ʃi lɔɔ miɬa jɛpuri pʰakatʰi kwamajud̤a ukukʰund͡ʒ̤ulwa kwajɔ kunɡ̤apʰɛli ɛmɓɛwini jawɔ ɓab̤ala kɛ ɔɔɛstɛrɛ ukumkanikaz̤i intɔmɓi kaab̤ihajili nɔmɔrd̤ɛkaji umjud̤a ɓamisa nɡ̤ɔkukǃinilɛjɔ kɔnkɛ lɛ ŋǀwad̤i jɛsiɓini jɛpuri watʰumɛla iiŋǀwad̤i kumajud̤a ɔnkɛ ɛmaz̤wɛni alikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɓini anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɔɓukumkani ɓukaahaswɛrɔsi amaz̤wi ɔkǁɔlɔ nɛɲanisɔ ɔkumisa lɔɔ miɬa jɛpuri nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ajɔ amisiwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓamisa nɡ̤akɔ ɔɔmɔrd̤ɛkaji umjud̤a nɔɛstɛrɛ ukumkanikaz̤i nanɡ̤ɔkɔ amajud̤a az̤imisɛla nɡ̤akɔ ɔkwawɔ nɛmɓɛwu jawɔ amaz̤wi ɔkuz̤ila ukuɮa nɔkukʰala kwawɔ iliz̤wi likaɛstɛrɛ laz̤imisa iz̤intɔ z̤alɔɔ puri lab̤alwa ɛŋǀwad̤ini ukumkani uahaswɛrɔsi walixafisa iliz̤wɛ nɛz̤ikǃitʰi z̤ɔlwanɮɛ kɔnkɛ ukwɛnz̤a kɔkukǃina kwakʰɛ nɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓakʰɛ nɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɛlɔ jɔɓukʰulu ɓukamɔrd̤ɛkaji awɛnz̤iwa mkʰulu nɡ̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ukumkani az̤ib̤alwanɡ̤a ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛmikǀimɓi jɛmiɬa jɔɔkumkani ɓamamɛd̤i namapɛrsi kuɓa umɔrd̤ɛkaji umjud̤a ɛɓɛnɡ̤anɛnɔ kɔkumkani uahaswɛrɔsi ɛmkʰulu kumajud̤a ɛkʰɔlɛkilɛ kuninz̤i lwaɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ ɛɓafunɛla aɓantu ɓakɔwaɓɔ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛtʰɛtʰa ukǁɔlɔ kwimɓɛwu jɔnkɛ jakɔwaɓɔ kwaɓɛ kukʰɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛz̤wɛni lakwaut͡sɛ ɛɡ̤ama liɓɛ linɡ̤ujɔb̤i jajɛ lɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤a iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛ itʰɛ tʲɛ imɔjika utʰikǁɔ itʲɛka ɛɓuɓini jaz̤alɛlwa ɔɔɲana aɓasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɛɛntɔmɓi ɛz̤intatʰu imfujɔ jajɔ jajinɡ̤amawaka asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ amatʰatʰu ɛɛnkamɛla namakʰulu amaɬanu ɛz̤iɓini z̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ namakʰulu amaɬanu ɛɛmaz̤i z̤amaɛsilɛ naɓakʰɔnz̤i aɓaninz̤i kunɛnɛ jaɓa kɛ lɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤a kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɛlasɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓaɓɛkǃʰɛlɛ ukuja kwɛnz̤a isiɮɔ ɛnɮwini jalɔwɔ iɓijimini jakʰɛ ɓatʰumɛlɛ ɓamɛmɛ ɔɔd̤ad̤ɛ ɓaɓɔ ɓɔɓatʰatʰu ukuɓa ɓaɮɛ ɓasɛlɛ naɓɔ kwatʰi jakuɓa iz̤unɡ̤ulɛz̤ilɛ imiɬa jɛsiɮɔ watʰumɛla ujɔb̤i waɓaŋ̤ǀ̤walisa wav̤uka waɲusa amad̤ini aɲukajɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnani laɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla kuɓa ujɔb̤i ɛɓɛsitʰi m̤lawumɓi ɔɔɲana ɓam ɓanɡ̤aɓa ɓɔnilɛ ɓamlaɬa utʰikǁɔ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jaɓɔ uɓɛsɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ ujɔb̤i lɔɔ miɬa jɔnkɛ kwatʰi nɡ̤am̤la utʰilɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakatʰikǁɔ ɓɛz̤a kuz̤imisa pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a wɛz̤a nɔsatʰana pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kusatʰana uv̤ɛla pʰi usatʰana wampʰɛnd̤ula ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi ɛkutʰʲutʰʲatʰʲutʰʲɛni ɛɬaɓatʰini nasɛkuhamɓahamɓɛni kulɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kusatʰana umɡ̤ǃ̤alilɛ kɔd̤wa umkʰɔnz̤i ujɔb̤i ukuɓa akukʰɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ajɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini ind̤ɔd̤a ɛɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ ɛtʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɔjikajɔ utʰikǁɔ ɛtʲɛkajɔ ɛɓuɓini usatʰana wampʰɛnd̤ula ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi ujɔb̤i lɔ ɛmɔjikɛla iliz̤ɛ utʰikǁɔ akutʰanɡ̤a wɛna wamɓijɛla wamd͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a wajid͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a inɮu jakʰɛ wajid͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a intɔ jɔnkɛ anajɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ wawusikɛlɛla umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ imfujɔ jakʰɛ jaliɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa iliz̤wɛ kɔd̤wa kɛ kʰawusɛ isanɮa sakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔku ukǀʰukumisɛ intɔ jɔnkɛ anajɔ ukuɓa akaji kukulaɬa nawɛ lɔ akwɛnz̤ɛ ɔkɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kusatʰana jaɓɔna kɔnkɛ anakɔ kusɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ kɛ kujɛ nɡ̤ɔkwakʰɛ sanɮa sakʰɔ wapʰuma kɛ usatʰana wɛmka ɛɓuswɛni ɓukajɛhɔv̤a kwatʰi nɡ̤am̤la utʰilɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ ɓaɓɛsiɮa ɓɛsɛla iwajini ɛnɮwini jɔmkʰuluwa waɓɔ ɔmkʰulu kwɛz̤a umtʰuɲwa kujɔb̤i watʰi iinkɔmɔ ɓɛz̤ilima namaɛsilɛ ɛɓɛsiɮa ɛkǀalɛni laz̤ɔ aɡ̤alɛlɛka amaʃɛb̤a az̤itʰimɓa aɓaɓulala aɓafana nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ kwasind̤a nd̤ɛd̤wa ukuz̤a kukukǁɛlɛla ɛsatʰɛtʰa lɔ ɔmɲɛ watʰi umlilɔ katʰikǁɔ uwɛ ɛz̤ulwini wajit͡ʃisa impaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ naɓafana waɓaɮa kwasind̤a nd̤ɛd̤wa ukuz̤a kukukǁɛlɛla ɛsatʰɛtʰa lɔ ɔmɲɛ watʰi amakalɛd̤i amakǃɛla amatʰatʰu az̤inɡ̤ɛnɛla iinkamɛla az̤itʰimɓa aɓaɓulala aɓafana nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ kwasind̤a nd̤ɛd̤wa ukuz̤a kukukǁɛlɛla ɛsatʰɛtʰa lɔ ɔmɲɛ watʰi ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɔ ɓaɓɛsiɮa ɓɛsɛla iwajini ɛnɮwini jɔmkʰuluwa waɓɔ ɔmkʰulu nankɔ kuv̤ɛla umɔja ɔmkʰulu nɡ̤asɛntlanɡ̤ɔ waɓɛtʰa ɛz̤imɓɔmɓɛni z̤ɔnɛ z̤ɛnɮu jaɓawɛla aɓafana aɓɔ ɓafa kwasind̤a nd̤ɛd̤wa ukuz̤a kukukǁɛlɛla wɛsuka ujɔb̤i wajik͡xaz̤ula inɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ jɔkwalɛka wajikǀʰɛɓa intlɔkɔ jakʰɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni wakǃuɓud̤a watʰi nd̤apʰuma nd̤iz̤ɛ ɛsiz̤alwɛni nd̤ija kuɓujɛla kʰɔna nd̤ikwaz̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ikwanɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɔtʰaɓatʰilɛjɔ iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a maliɓɔnɡ̤wɛ kukɔ kɔnkɛ ɔkɔ akɔnanɡ̤a ujɔb̤i akamsɔla nɔkumsɔla utʰikǁɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤am̤la utʰilɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakatʰikǁɔ ɓɛz̤a kuz̤imisa pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a wɛz̤a nɔsatʰana pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ukuɓa az̤imisɛ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kusatʰana uv̤ɛla pʰi usatʰana wampʰɛnd̤ula ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi ɛkutʰʲutʰʲatʰʲutʰʲɛni ɛɬaɓatʰini nasɛkuhamɓahamɓɛni kulɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kusatʰana umɡ̤ǃ̤alilɛ kɔd̤wa umkʰɔnz̤i ujɔb̤i ukuɓa akukʰɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ajɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini ind̤ɔd̤a ɛɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ ɛtʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɔjikajɔ utʰikǁɔ ɛtʲɛkajɔ ɛɓuɓini ɛsaɓamɓɛlɛlɛjɔ ɛkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛni kwajɔ nɔkɔ und̤ikǁʰɔkɔŋǁɛlɛ kujɔ ukuɓand̤ijiɡ̤iɲɛlɛ iliz̤ɛ usatʰana wampʰɛnd̤ula ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi ulusu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔlusu kɔnkɛ anakɔ wɔkunika nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ kɔd̤wa kɛ kʰawusɛ isanɮa sakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔku ukǀʰukumisɛ ɛmatʰand͡ʒ̤ɛni akʰɛ nasɛɲamɛni jakʰɛ ukuɓa akaji kukulaɬa nawɛ lɔ akwɛnz̤ɛ ɔkɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kusatʰana nankɔ ɛsɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ kupʰɛla wɔɡ̤ǀ̤ina umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ wapʰuma kɛ usatʰana wɛmka ɛɓuswɛni ɓukajɛhɔv̤a wamɓɛtʰa ujɔb̤i nɡ̤amatʰumɓa amaɓi watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛntɛnd̤ɛni jɔɲawɔ lwakʰɛ wɛsa ɛlukakajini lwakʰɛ watʰaɓatʰa ukʰamɓa ukuɓa az̤ikʰuɬɛ nɡ̤alɔ ɛɬɛli ɛlutʰutʰwini watʰi umkakʰɛ kujɛ usaɓamɓɛlɛlɛ ɛkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛni kwakʰɔ mlaɬɛ utʰikǁɔ ufɛ watʰi jɛna kujɛ utʰɛtʰa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkaz̤i sija kwamkɛla ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kutʰikǁɔ sinɡ̤amkɛli nɔkuɓi jini kukɔ kɔnkɛ ɔkɔ akɔnanɡ̤a ujɔb̤i nɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɛ kɛ kalɔku iz̤iɬɔɓɔ ɛz̤itʰatʰu z̤ikajɔb̤i z̤aɓuv̤a ɓɔnkɛ ɔɓɔ ɓuɓi ɓumfikɛlɛjɔ z̤ɛz̤a saɛsɔ siv̤ɛla ɛnd̤awɛni jasɔ uɛlifaz̤i wakwatɛman nɔb̤ilɛd̤ad̤i wakwaʃuwa nɔt͡sɔfarɛ wasɛnahama ɓaŋǃɔpʰisana ukuɓa ɓɛz̤ɛ ɓamkʰuz̤ɛ ɓamtʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛ ɓapʰakamisa amɛɬɔ aɓɔ ɓɛsɛkud̤ɛ aɓamaz̤i ɓapʰakamisa iz̤wi laɓɔ ɓalila ɓak͡xaz̤ula ɛlɔwɔ inɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ jɔkwalɛka ɓaz̤iɡ̤alɛla nɡ̤ɔtʰuli ɛntlɔkɔ ɓɛlupʰɔsa pʰɛz̤ulu ɛz̤ulwini ɓaɬala najɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni apʰɔ z̤asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɔɓusuku ɓaz̤ɔ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ namɲɛ utʰɛtʰa najɛ kuɓa ɓaɓɛɓɔna ukuɓa umv̤and̤ɛd̤wa wakʰɛ mkʰulu kakʰulu ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ ujɔb̤i wawuv̤ula umlɔmɔ wakʰɛ wajikǃalɛkisa jakʰɛ wasusɛla ujɔb̤i watʰi majid̤akɛ ɛnd̤az̤alwa nɡ̤ajɔ nɔɓusuku ɛkwatʰiwa kukʰawulwɛ ind̤ɔd̤a lɔɔ majiɓɛ ɓuɓumɲama anɡ̤ajiɲamɛkɛli utʰikǁɔ pʰɛz̤ulu kunɡ̤ajiɓɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛli ukukʰaɲa majikʰululwɛ nɡ̤ɛntlawulɛlɔ ɓuɓumɲama nɛtʰunz̤i lɔkufa makulalɛ pʰɛz̤u kwajɔ majid̤and̤atʰɛkiswɛ kɔkuŋ̤ǀ̤ɔlisa ɔɓɔ ɓusukumasiɓuɓamɓɛ isitʰɔkɔtʰɔkɔ maɓunɡ̤av̤uji pʰakatʰi kwɛmiɬa jɔmɲaka maɓunɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni ɛnanini lɛɛɲanɡ̤a jaɓɔna ɔɓɔ ɓusuku maɓuɓɛ luɮɔlɔ makunɡ̤ɛz̤i kumɛmɛlɛla kuɓɔ maɓaɓukǃalɛkisɛ aɓakǃalɛkisi ɓɛmiɬa aɓakǁʰɔɓɛlɛ ukukǁʰɔkɔŋǁa ilɛv̤ijatan maz̤iɓɛ mɲama iinkwɛnkwɛz̤i z̤ɔmsɔ waɓɔ ɔɓɔmv̤u maɓulind̤ɛ kɔkukʰaɲa kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ɓunɡ̤az̤iɓɔni iinkɔpʰɛ z̤ɛsifinɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓunɡ̤az̤iv̤alanɡ̤a iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤ɛsiz̤alɔ ɛsand̤iz̤alajɔ ɓunɡ̤aɓusitʰɛlisanɡ̤a uɓuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni iɓɛ ijini ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤afɛli ɛmɓilinini nd̤inɡ̤apʰumi umpʰɛfumlɔ nd̤isav̤ɛla ɛsiz̤alwɛni kuɓɛ kunɡ̤ani ukuɓa amad̤ɔlɔ and̤iɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤ɛ iɓɛ ijini ukuɓa and̤iɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤ɛ amaɓɛlɛ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤iwaɲɛ kuɓa nɡ̤ɔku nɡ̤ɛnd̤iɓa nd̤ilɛlɛ nd̤az̤ɔla nɡ̤ɛnd̤iɓa nd̤alala uɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ nd̤and̤ula ukupʰumla nɔkumkani namapʰakatʰi ɛliz̤wɛ aɓɔ ɓaz̤akʰɛlajɔ amaŋǁuwa naɓatʰɛtʰɛli aɓanɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ aɓaz̤iz̤alisajɔ iz̤inɮu z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɡ̤ɛnd̤iɓa and̤ikʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmv̤amɓilini ɛsɛlɛlwɛjɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓantwana aɓanɡ̤aɓɔnanɡ̤a kukʰaɲa kuɓa apʰɔ aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɓakujɛkilɛ ukuɡ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤a kʰɔna apʰɔ ɓajapʰumla aɓapʰɛlɛlwɛ nɡ̤amanɮa aɓakʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰iwɛjɔ ɓɔnwaɓilɛ nd̤awɛniɲɛ aɓasaliv̤a iz̤wi lɔmkǃʰuɓi ɔmŋǀinanɛ nɔmkʰulukʰɔna ɓajalinɡ̤ana ikʰɔɓɔka likʰululɛkilɛ ɛnkɔsini jalɔ jini ukuɓa aɓasɛɓuɓini aɓanikɛ ukukʰaɲa naɓampʰɛfumlɔ uk͡xak͡xa aɓanikɛ uɓɔmi aɓalind̤ɛ kusukɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ɓusɛlɛlwɛjɔ aɓav̤uja ɓad̤ɛ ɓaɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓɛ ɓaɓɛ nɛmiɬali kǁa ɓatʰɛ ɓafumanana nɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ukuɓa ukukʰaɲa akunikɛ umfɔ ɔnɮɛla isitʰɛlɛjɔ ɔɓijɛlwɛjɔ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kuɓa ɛnd̤awɛni jɛsɔnka kuz̤a ukuɡ̤ǀ̤uma kupʰalaz̤ɛka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amanz̤i ukub̤ɔnɡ̤a kuɓa nd̤inkwantʲa kɔkunkwantʲisajɔ kwaz̤a kwand̤ifikɛla intɔ ɛnd̤iŋǁunɡ̤upʰala jijɔ ind̤iz̤ɛlɛ nd̤atʰi nd̤inɡ̤akǀʰulumakǀʰanɡ̤a nd̤inɡ̤az̤ɔlanɡ̤a nd̤inɡ̤apʰumlanɡ̤a kwɛz̤a kɛ ukuɡ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤a wasusɛla uɛlifaz̤i wakwatɛman watʰi kunɡ̤akud̤inisa kwakulinɡ̤wa ukub̤ɛkiswa iliz̤wi kuwɛ ɛnɡ̤uɓani ɔnakɔ ukuz̤iɓamɓa anɡ̤atʰɛtʰi jaɓɔna utʰɛtʰisɛ aɓaninz̤i waz̤ɔmɛlɛz̤a iz̤anɮa ɛz̤iwilɛjɔ ukutʰɛtʰa kwakʰɔ kwaɓapʰakamisa aɓakʰuɓɛkajɔ wawakǃinisa amad̤ɔlɔ aɡ̤ɛv̤ɛɡ̤ɛv̤ɛ kunɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ intɔ iz̤ɛ kuwɛ wad̤inwa ifikɛ kuwɛ wakʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰iswa ukɔjika kwakʰɔ utʰikǁɔ asijiŋǃɔlɔŋǀi jakʰɔ itʰɛmɓa lakʰɔ alikukuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛla kwɛɛnɮɛla z̤akʰɔ kʰawukʰumɓulɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔwakʰa wad̤aka ɛmsulwa kupʰi apʰɔ kɛ ɓatʰi ʃwaka kʰɔna aɓatʰɛ tʲɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓɔna ɛnd̤iɓɔnɛ nɡ̤akɔ aɓalima inkɔɬakalɔ naɓaɬwajɛla uɓuɓi ɓav̤una kwaɓɔna ɓad̤aka nɡ̤ɔkupʰɛfumla kukatʰikǁɔ ɓapʰɛla nɡ̤umɔja wɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ ukuɡ̤ǃ̤uma kwɛnɡ̤ɔɲama nɛliz̤wi lɛb̤av̤umajɔ namaz̤iɲɔ ɛɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ɛz̤int͡ʃa aŋǀɔtʰukilɛ inɡ̤ɔɲama ijat͡ʃaɓalala nɡ̤ɔkuswɛla intɔ jɔkukǃwɛnɡ̤a amatʰɔlɛ ɛnɡ̤ɔɲamakaz̤i akǀʰitʰakɛlɛ nd̤ikǀɔtʰɛlwɛ liliz̤wi inɮɛɓɛ jam jakutʰaɓatʰa ukusɛɓɛz̤a kwalɔ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤aŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤ɛni z̤asɛmiɓɔniswɛni jɔɓusuku ɓakusind̤wa aɓantu ɓuɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ ɔɓukʰulu kwand̤ikʰawulɛla ukunkwantʲa nɔkutʰutʰumɛla kwawankwantʲisa amatʰamɓɔ amaninz̤i kwatʰi pʰɛ umɔja ɛɓuswɛni ɓam jaɓa namanwɛlɛ iɲama jam wɛma and̤ajinakana imɓɔnakalɔ jawɔ kwakʰɔ isimilɔ ɛsitʰilɛ pʰamɓi kwamɛɬɔ nd̤ɛv̤a iz̤wi ɛlisɛɓɛz̤ajɔ lisitʰi umntu ulilunɡ̤isa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔtʰikǁɔ uɬamɓululɛkilɛ umfɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔmɛnz̤i wakʰɛ jaɓɔna akakʰɔlwa nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ nɛz̤itʰuɲwa z̤akʰɛ utʰi z̤inɡ̤aɓapʰɔsisi ɓanɡ̤aɓɛka pʰi kɛ aɓaɬala ɛz̤inɮwini z̤ɔd̤aka aɓasisɛkɔ sisɛlutʰulini aɓatʲuɲuz̤wa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amanund̤u kusa kuɬwɛ ɓɛkǃɔtʲwa ɓad̤akɛ kupʰɛlɛ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ uɡ̤ǃ̤alajɔ aɓatʰi kǁa lutʰɛ lwaŋǀɔtʰulwa kuɓɔ utʰamɓɔ lwɛntɛntɛ ɓafɛ ɓɛnɡ̤alumkanɡ̤a kʰawuɓiz̤ɛ kamɓɛ ukuɓa ukʰɔ ɔwɔkupʰɛnd̤ula uja kub̤ɛka kuwupʰi kwaɓaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kuɓa iŋ̤ǃ̤umɓɔ ijamɓulala ɔsisimatʰanɛ nɛkʰwɛlɛ lijamɓulala ɔsisijatʰa nd̤imɓɔnilɛ ɔsisimatʰanɛ ɛmila nd̤az̤a nd̤aliʃwaɓulɛla nɡ̤ɛsikǃupʰɛ ikʰaja lakʰɛ ɓakud̤ɛ nɔsind̤isɔ aɓantwana ɓakʰɛ ɓatʲuɲuz̤wa ɛsanɡ̤wɛni ɓɛnɡ̤ɛnam̤lanɡ̤uli ɛkuɓɛni aɓalamɓilɛjɔ ɓɛsiɮa uv̤unɔ lwakʰɛ ɓaluxɔlɛ nasɛlutʰanɡ̤wɛni lwɛsipʰinɡ̤ɔ aɓaŋǁaniwɛjɔ ɓaz̤ɔnd̤a uɓutʲɛɓi ɓaɓɔ kuɓa inkɔɬakalɔ ajipʰumi ɛlutʰulini nɔɓuɓi aɓunt͡ʃuli ɛm̤laɓɛni haji uz̤alɛlwa uɓuɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa iintlant͡si z̤iɲuka ukuɓalɛka kwaz̤ɔ kɛ ɓɛnd̤ija kusinɡ̤isa kutʰikǁɔ ind̤awɔ jam nd̤ijib̤ɛkisɛ kutʰikǁɔ ɔwɛnz̤a iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inkulu ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnakuɡ̤ɔkǀwaɡ̤ɔkǀwa imisɛɓɛnz̤i ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛnakuɓalwa ulɔnika imv̤ula pʰɛz̤u kɔɓusɔ ɓɔm̤laɓa asɛ amanz̤i pʰɛz̤u kwamapʰanɮɛ ukuɓa aɓatʰɔɓɛkilɛjɔ aɓamisɛ ɛz̤ind̤awɛni ɛz̤ipʰakamilɛjɔ aɓanɛz̤imɲama z̤ɔkuz̤ila ɓaɲukɛlɛ ɛlusind̤iswɛni ut͡ʃit͡ʃisa iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤aɓɔ ɓanɔɓukǃʰɔpʰɔlɔlɔ z̤inɡ̤ɛnz̤i ntɔ iz̤imasɛkilɛjɔ iz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ uɓamɓisa iz̤ilumkɔ kuɓukǃʰɔpʰɔlɔlɔ ɓaz̤ɔ ikǃʰinɡ̤a laɓanɔɓukǃɔkɔlɔ liŋ̤ǁ̤amisɛkɛ kɛ ɛmini ɓakǃuɓisana nɔɓumɲama ɓapʰutʰapʰutʰɛ kwɛmakǃand̤a nɡ̤atʰi kusɛɓusuku usind̤isa iɬwɛmpu ɛk͡xɛlɛni ɛmlɔɲɛni waɓɔ nasɛsanɮɛni sɔwɔmɛlɛlɛjɔ kuɓɛkʰɔ kɛ itʰɛmɓa kɔswɛlɛjɔ uɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa ɓuwuv̤alɛ umlɔmɔ waɓɔ jaɓɔna unɔjɔlɔ ɔwɔɬwajwa nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ musa kɛ ukukukǀɛkisa ukutʰɛtʰisa kukasɔmanɮa kuɓa wɛnz̤a ɓuɬunɡ̤u aɓɔpʰɛ ujapʰalusa z̤ipʰilisɛ iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤imɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛni ɛz̤intand̤atʰu uja kukuɬanɡ̤ula nakwɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ akuji kukǀʰukuɲiswa ɓuɓuɓi ɛnɮalɛni ukukʰulula ɛkufɛni ɛmfaz̤wɛni ukukʰulula ɛkukǁatʲɛlwɛni nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ɛz̤inijɛni jɔlwimi uz̤iɲɛz̤wɛ unɡ̤ɔjiki imɓukǃɔ jakufika imɓukǃɔ nɛnɮala uja kujiɬɛka nɛxamŋǀwa lasɛnɮɛ unɡ̤alɔjiki kuɓa uŋǃɔpʰisɛnɛ namatʲɛ asɛnɮɛ amaxamŋǀwa asɛnɮɛ akǁɔlɛlɛnɛ nawɛ uja kwaz̤i ukuɓa ukǁɔlɔ jintɛntɛ
