jakʰɔ uliv̤ɛlɛlɛ ikʰaja lakʰɔ unɡ̤apʰɔsani nantɔ ujaz̤i ukuɓa ininz̤i imɓɛwu jakʰɔ nɛnz̤ala jakʰɔ ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmfunɔ wɛɬaɓatʰi uja kunɡ̤ɛna ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni wɔmɛlɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤ɛniswa kwɛsitʰunɡ̤u nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lasɔ ɓɔna ɔku sikuɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀilɛ kund͡ʒ̤alɔ kuv̤ɛ ukwaz̤i wɛna nɡ̤ɔkwakʰɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula ujɔb̤i watʰi akwaɓa ɓɛkulinɡ̤aniswɛ nɔkulinɡ̤aniswa ukukʰatʰaz̤ɛka kwaɓɛkwa ɛsikalini ukwɛjɛla nd̤awɔɲɛ nakɔ kuɓa nɡ̤ɔku ɓɛkuja kuɓa nz̤ima nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛntlaɓatʰi jɔlwanɮɛ kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ lɛ ntɔ amaz̤wi anɡ̤awɔkub̤ud̤a kuɓa iintɔlɔ z̤ɔsɔmanɮa z̤imi ɛz̤iɓuɬunɡ̤u ɓaz̤ɔ ɓuwufiŋǀajɔ umɔja iz̤id̤and̤atʰɛkisɔ z̤ikatʰikǁɔ z̤ind̤akʰɛlɛ uluɬu lɔkulwa iɛsilɛ lasɛnɮɛ likʰɛ lililɛ lisɛluɬaz̤ɛni ijalila inkɔmɔ isɛkutʲɛni kwajɔ ijaɮiwa intɔ ɛd͡ʒ̤av̤ud͡ʒ̤av̤u inɡ̤ɛnatʲuwa sikʰɔ isɔnɡ̤ɔ jɛkǃand̤a ɛjɔna ntɔ walajɔ ukujipʰatʰa umpʰɛfumlɔ lɛjɔ jɛjɔna ikukuɮa ɔkuk͡xukǃulajɔ akwaɓa ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤az̤uz̤a isikǀɛlɔ utʰikǁɔ and̤ipʰɛ ɛnd̤ikulind̤ɛlajɔ kukʰɔlɛkɛ kutʰikǁɔ ukund̤itʲumz̤a asiv̤ulɛlɛ isanɮa sakʰɛ and̤iŋǃumlɛ iɓija kuɬala ikʰɔ intutʰuz̤ɛlɔ jam ɓɛnd̤ija kukǁʰina kwɛz̤ɔ ntlunɡ̤u z̤inɡ̤akǀɔnɡ̤ijɔ kuɓa and̤iwakʰaɲɛlanɡ̤a amaz̤wi ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ajintɔni amanɮa ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ad̤ɛ nd̤itʰɛmɓɛ sijintɔni isipʰɛlɔ ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ad̤ɛ nd̤iɓɛ nɔkuz̤ɛka kad̤ɛ anɡ̤amanɮa amatʲɛ amanɮa iɲama jam ilub̤ɛd̤u akupʰɛlilɛ jini ukuŋǀɛd̤akala ukuz̤imasɛka kwab̤ɛd͡ʒ̤ɛtʰwa kwakaɲɛ akuɬaz̤iswa ɔkǃɔtʲiwɛjɔ nɡ̤ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ uja kulaɬa ukumɔjika usɔmanɮa aɓaz̤alwana ɓam ɓanɡ̤iniz̤ilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmland͡ʒ̤ana nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmpʰant͡si wɛmiland͡ʒ̤ana ɛt͡ʃajɔ ɛmd̤aka nɡ̤umkʰɛŋ̰ǀ̰ɛ ɛliz̤ifiɬa kujɔ ikʰɛpʰu ɛkufikɛni kɔkufud̤umala ijab̤anɡ̤a lakuɓalɛla itʰi kǃɔkɔ inɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ajɔ ijad͡ʒ̤ikad͡ʒ̤ika imɛnd̤ɔ jɔkuhamɓa kwajɔ iɲuka ijɛ ɛɲaɲɛni id̤akɛ imikʰɔkɔ jakwatɛma jab̤ɛka imikǃɔd̤i jakwaʃɛb̤a jatʰɛmɓa jɔna jad̤ana kuɓa iɓikʰɔlɔsilɛ jafika kʰɔna janɛɛntlɔni kuɓa nɡ̤ɔku nisukɛ naɓa jintɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔ niɓɔnɛ ukukǃʰipʰuka umɓilini nɔjika kʰɛ nd̤at͡ʃɔ ukutʰi ɛtʰɛni nd̤ipʰɛni ɛmanɮɛni ɛnu nind̤isind̤isɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɔmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli nind̤ikʰululɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɛŋ̤ǃ̤wanɡ̤aŋ̤ǃ̤wili nd̤ijalɛni nd̤ɔtʰi kǀwaka nind̤ikǃɔnd̤isɛ ukulaɬɛka asikukɔ nɔkuɓa ajaɬaɓa amaz̤wi atʰɛ tʲɛ kɛ ukɔɬwaja kwɛnu kɔɬwaja ntɔni niɓa ninɔkɔɬwaja ukutʰɛtʰa ɔku anɡ̤umɔja amaz̤wi ɔmntu ɔŋǀamilɛjɔ kɛ nanɡ̤ɛnkɛd̤ama ninɡ̤akǃaʃisa nixwɛɓɛ nɡ̤ɔmmɛlwanɛ wɛnu makukʰɔlɛkɛ nɡ̤ɔku nib̤ɛkɛ kuɓa ɔkunɛnɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓɛnu and̤iji kutʰɛtʰa amanɡ̤a kʰaniɓujɛ makunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa nipʰind̤ɛ niɓujɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓam ɓukulɛ ntɔ ɓukʰɔ uɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa ɛlulwimini ikʰuɬanɡ̤uɓɔ alinɡ̤ɛkukǃɔnd̤i ukwɛjɛlisɛla akapʰumɛ mkʰɔsi ɛɬaɓatʰini ajind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔmkǃɛʃwa imiɬa jakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsikǀaka ɛsiɓɛ siz̤ɔnd̤a umtʰunz̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmkǃɛʃwa ɔlind̤ɛ umv̤uz̤ɔ wakʰɛ nd̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukwamkɛliswa iiɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤inɛnkɔɬisɔ nd̤aɓalɛlwa nɔɓusuku ɓɔɓuɓi nd̤akuɓa nd̤ilɛlɛ pʰant͡si nd̤itʰi nd̤ija kuv̤uka ukuɬwa kɔlukilɛ nd̤id̤ikiwɛ kukukǃikakǃikɛka kud̤ɛ kusɛ iɲama jam jamɓɛswɛ iimpɛtʰu namaɡ̤ad̤a ɔm̤laɓa ulusu lunɡ̤amakǃʰula lub̤ikǃiz̤a imiɬa jam ikʰawulɛz̤a nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔmkʰɔnd͡ʒ̤ana wɔmluki ipʰɛla kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ tʰɛmɓa kʰumɓula ukuɓa ɓunɡ̤umɔja uɓɔmi ɓam ilisɔ aliji kuɓuja likuɓɔnɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ aliji kuɓa sand̤alama ilisɔ lɔnd̤iɓɔnilɛjɔ amɛɬɔ akʰɔ ɛkum nd̤inɡ̤aɓikʰɔ lipʰɛlilɛ limkilɛ und͡ʒ̤alɔ ɔɬa ajɛ kwɛlaɓafilɛjɔ akɛɲuki akaɓi saɓujɛla ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ inɡ̤aɓi samaz̤i ind̤awɔ jakʰɛ nam and̤iji kuwuɓamɓa umlɔmɔ nd̤ija kutʰɛtʰa ɛkuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛni kɔmɔja nd̤ikʰalaz̤ɛ ɛɓuk͡xak͡xɛni ɓɔmpʰɛfumlɔ nd̤ilulwanɮɛ nd̤ijinɡ̤wɛɲa ukuɓa und̤imisɛlɛ umlind̤ɔ kǁa ɓɛnd̤isitʰi wɔnd̤itʰutʰuz̤ɛla umanɮalɔ sɔnd̤itʰwalisisa inkalaz̤ɔ jam isiŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlɔ wɛsuka wɛna wand̤ɔjikisa nɡ̤amapʰupʰa wand̤id̤and̤atʰɛkisa ɛmiɓɔnwɛni wad̤a umpʰɛfumlɔ waɲula ukuk͡xwit͡ʃwa waɲula nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwamatʰamɓɔ nd̤ik͡xukǃukilɛ and̤inɡ̤i nd̤inɡ̤aɮa ɓɔmi nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ nd̤ijɛkɛ kuɓa inɡ̤umpʰunɡ̤a imiɬa jam ujintɔni lɔ lɛ ntɔ umkʰulisajɔ lɛ ntɔ ujisinɡ̤isɛ kujɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ umv̤ɛlɛlɛ imisɔ jɔnkɛ umkǀikid̤ɛ imiz̤uz̤u jɔnkɛ kunini unɡ̤awasusi amɛɬɔ unɡ̤and̤ijɛki kʰɛ nd̤iɡ̤iɲɛ amatʰɛ nd̤itʰɛ nd̤ɔna nd̤inɡ̤akwɛnz̤a ntɔni wɛna mlind̤i wɔluntu jini ukuɓa und̤ɛnz̤ɛ itɛkɛni nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤umtʰwalɔ jini ukuɓa unɡ̤asikǁɔlɛli isik͡xɛkǃɔ unɡ̤aɓuɮulisi uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓam kuɓa kalɔku nd̤ija kuz̤ilalisa ɛlutʰulini wɔnd̤ɔnd̤ɛla kakʰulu nd̤inɡ̤aɓikʰɔ wasusɛla ub̤ilɛd̤ad̤i wakwaʃuwa watʰi kunini utʰɛtʰa iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛ ɛnɡ̤umɔja ɔmkʰulu amaz̤wi ɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɔ utʰikǁɔ anɡ̤akwɛnz̤a ɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɔkusɛsikwɛni usɔmanɮa anɡ̤aɓɛnz̤a ɡ̤wɛŋǁa uɓulunɡ̤isa ukuɓa aɓantwana ɓakʰɔ ɓatʰɛ ɓamɔna jɛna waɓanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sɛsik͡xɛkǃɔ saɓɔ ukuɓa utʰɛ nɡ̤ɛnkutʰalɔ utʰikǁɔ wɛna wataxuz̤isa kusɔmanɮa ukuɓa utʰɛ wakǀɔkǀɛka watʰi tʲɛ wɛna ɔkunɛnɛ wɔv̤uka nɡ̤ɔku nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɔ alisikɛlɛlɛ ikʰaja lɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɔ kutʰi ukukǃala kwakʰɔ kuɓɛ kujintɔ ɛŋǀinanɛ ukupʰuma kwakʰɔ kuɓɛ kukʰulu kakʰulu kuɓa kʰawuɓuz̤ɛ kwisiz̤ukulwana sapʰamɓili ukǁunɛlɛ ɛkuɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀɛni kɔɔjisɛ ɓasɔ kuɓa sinɡ̤aɓɛz̤ɔlɔ tʰina asinakwaz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa isisitʰunz̤i imiɬa jɛtʰu ɛɬaɓatʰini aɓaji kukujala aɓɔ ɓatʰɛtʰɛ kuwɛ ɓaxɔlɛ amaz̤wi ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jaɓɔ ɓatʰi ijakʰula imikʰanz̤i kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ mɡ̤ǁ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤ɔ ijaɬuma iŋ̤ǀ̤ɔɓɔ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ manz̤i isɛluɬaz̤a inɡ̤ɛkapʰiwa jɔjipʰanɡ̤ɛla iŋ̤ǀ̤a jɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔma und͡ʒ̤alɔ umɛnd̤ɔ waɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓamliɓalajɔ utʰikǁɔ nɛtʰɛmɓa lɔmkʰɔɬisi lijad̤aka nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukuɡ̤asa kwakʰɛ kujaŋǃuɲulwa jinɮu jɛsiɡ̤ǀ̤awu ukukʰɔlɔsa kwakʰɛ wajama nɡ̤ɛnɮu jakʰɛ inɡ̤ɛmi uɓamɓɛlɛla kujɔ inɡ̤aɬali uluɬaz̤a pʰamɓi kwɛlanɡ̤a namaɡ̤atʲa akʰɛ ajakǃaɓɛla ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni lwɛnt͡simi jakʰɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu z̤akʰɛ z̤id͡ʒ̤id͡ʒ̤ɛnɛ ɛmwɛwɛni utʰʲud̤isa ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤amɓɛni z̤amatʲɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ wamɡ̤iɲa ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ jɔmkʰaɲɛla itʰi and̤ikuɓɔnanɡ̤a jaɓɔna jijɔ lɛ imiɬali jɛnɮɛla jakʰɛ iz̤ɛ ɛlutʰulini kunt͡ʃulɛ aɓaɲɛ jaɓɔna utʰikǁɔ akamkǀɛkisi ɔɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ akaɓaɓamɓi nɡ̤ɛsanɮa aɓɛnz̤i ɓɔɓuɓi uja kuwuz̤alisa umlɔmɔ wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɬɛka nɛmilɛɓɛ jɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkud̤uma aɓakutʰijajɔ ɓaja kwamɓatʰa ukud̤ana inɡ̤aɓi saɓakʰɔ intɛntɛ jaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula ujɔb̤i watʰi ɔkwɛnɛnɛ nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa kund͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ anɡ̤atʰini lɔ ukuɓa lilunɡ̤isa pʰamɓi kɔtʰikǁɔ ukuɓa utʰɛ jɛna ukuɓamɓana najɛ uɓɛnɡ̤ɛmpʰɛnd̤uli namɲɛ umɓuz̤ɔ kwɛliwaka ulumkilɛ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ ukʰalipʰilɛ nɡ̤amanɮa nɡ̤uɓani ɔkʰa aɡ̤ɔɡ̤ɔtʲɛ kujɛ az̤ɛ asind̤ɛ ulɔʃɛŋǁisa iintaɓa z̤inɡ̤az̤i ukuɓa az̤ib̤ukukǃɛ nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ ulɔɡ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤isa iɬaɓatʰi lisukɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jalɔ z̤id̤id̤iz̤ɛlɛ iint͡sika z̤alɔ ulɔtʰɛtʰa ɛlanɡ̤ɛni linɡ̤apʰumi az̤itʲwinɛ az̤iv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ɛ iinkwɛnkwɛz̤i nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ulɔtwaɓulula ikǁulu ɛjɛd̤wa aɲatʰɛlɛ ɛmimanɡ̤wɛni jɔlwanɮɛ ulɔwɛnz̤a iinkwɛnkwɛz̤i z̤ɛb̤ɛrɛ namak͡xɔz̤a nɛsilimɛla nɛɛnɡ̤ɔnt͡si z̤asɛz̤ant͡si ulɔwɛnz̤a iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inkulu ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnakuɡ̤ɔkǀwaɡ̤ɔkǀwa nɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛnakuɓalwa jaɓɔna uɮula pʰɛz̤u nd̤inɡ̤amɓɔni utʰi pʰɛ nd̤inɡ̤amkǃɔnd̤i jaɓɔna ɛkǁwila nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤amŋǃand̤ajɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤atʰi kujɛ wɛnz̤a ntɔni utʰikǁɔ akawuŋǃand̤i umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ ɓajasiɓɛkɛka pʰant͡si kwakʰɛ aɓaŋǀɛd̤i ɓakarahab̤i nd̤inɡ̤atʰini kɛ ukumpʰɛnd̤ula nd̤iwakʰɛtʰɛ amaz̤wi ɔkupʰɛnd̤ula kujɛ nɔkuɓa ɓɛnd̤ililunɡ̤isa ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤ɛmpʰɛnd̤uli nd̤inɡ̤ataxuz̤isa kupʰɛla kumɡ̤wɛɓi ukuɓa ɓɛnd̤itʰɛ nd̤aɓiz̤a wand̤ipʰɛnd̤ula ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤ɛkʰɔlwa ukuɓa uliɓɛkɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ iliz̤wi kaɲɛ uɓɛja kund̤itʲumz̤a nɡ̤ɔkǃʰwitʰɛla awand̤isɛ amaŋǁɛɓa nɡ̤ɛliz̤ɛ anɡ̤and̤ipʰi nɔkuɓa nd̤ipʰɛfumlɛ kɛ uɓɛja kund̤iɬutʰisa nɡ̤ɔɓuk͡xak͡xa ukuɓa jintɔ jamanɮa ɛkʰalipʰa utʰi nd̤im ɔkʰɔjɔ ukuɓa jintɔ jɔmɡ̤wɛɓɔ utʰi nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kund̤imɛma ukuɓa ɓɛnd̤itʰɛ nd̤alilunɡ̤isa umlɔmɔ uɓuja kund̤iɡ̤wɛɓa ukuɓa ɓɛnd̤itʰɛ nd̤aɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛla uɓɛja kund̤ɛnz̤a umd͡ʒ̤iɓiliz̤i nd̤iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛ and̤iwukʰatʰalɛlɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ nd̤ijaɓukǀɛkisa uɓɔmi ɓam kuɲɛ ɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nd̤itʰi ɔɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ nɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ujaɓat͡ʃaɓalalisa ukuɓa iz̤inija itʰɛ jaɓulala nɡ̤ɛsikǃupʰɛ uja kuɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛla ukukǃɔtʲwa kwaɓamsulwa iɬaɓatʰi linikɛlwɛ ɛsanɮɛni saɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ujaɓuɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛla uɓusɔ ɓaɓaɡ̤wɛɓi ɓalɔ ukuɓa akund͡ʒ̤alɔ kwɛnz̤iwɛ nɡ̤uɓani kɛ imiɬa jam ikʰawulɛz̤ɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛsiɡ̤id̤imi iɓalɛkilɛ ajiɓɔnanɡ̤a kulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ itʰɛ pʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmikʰɔmɓɛ jɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkʰɔz̤i lukǁwila ikǁʰɔɓa nd̤akutʰi nd̤ija kujiliɓala inkalaz̤ɔ jam nd̤iɓujɛkɛ uɓusɔ ɓam nd̤iŋǀumɛz̤ɛ nd̤isuka nd̤iŋǁunɡ̤upʰalɛ z̤iimɓulalɛkɔ z̤am z̤ɔnkɛ nd̤az̤i ukuɓa akuji kutʰi nd̤imsulwa kutʰiwa nd̤inɡ̤ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ jini lɛ ntɔ nd̤ifumana nd̤iz̤ikǁʰamla nɔkuɓa ɓɛnd̤itʰɛ nd̤az̤iɬamɓa nɡ̤amanz̤i ɛkʰɛpʰu nd̤az̤iɬamɓulula iz̤anɮa z̤am nɡ̤ɛsɛpʰa uɓuja kund̤itʰi ɡ̤ǁ̤wa ɛm̤ad̤ini nd̤iɓɛ lisikiz̤i nakwiinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤am kuɓa jɛna nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤am nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓa nd̤impʰɛnd̤ulɛ sijɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ ɛmatʲalɛni akukʰɔ maɬuli pʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu wɔkuɓɛka isanɮa sakʰɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu sɔɓaɓini makajisusɛ intɔnɡ̤a jakʰɛ isɔtʰusɔ sakʰɛ masinɡ̤and̤id̤and̤atʰɛkisi nd̤ɔtʰɛtʰa kɛ nd̤inɡ̤amɔjiki kuɓa and̤iv̤i kund͡ʒ̤alɔ ɛluv̤alwɛni umpʰɛfumlɔ ud̤imɛlɛ ɓuɓɔmi ɓam nɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤ija kujiv̤ulɛla inkalaz̤ɔ jam pʰakatʰi nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ uk͡xak͡xa umpʰɛfumlɔ nd̤itʰi kutʰikǁɔ musa ukund̤iɡ̤wɛɓa nd̤az̤isɛ ukuɓa uɓamɓɛnɛ nɡ̤ani kulunɡ̤ilɛ kuwɛ ukuɓa ukǀud̤isɛ ukuɓa ukǀɛkisɛ ukukǁɛlɛnɡ̤a kwɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɔ uliɓɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛlɛlɛ ikǃʰinɡ̤a laɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ unamɛɬɔ ɛɲama uɓɔna nɡ̤ɔkuɓɔna kɔmntu ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔmntu imiɬa jakʰɔ imiɲaka jakʰɔ ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔmfɔ ukuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛ uɓufunɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓam usiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɛ isɔnɔ usaz̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓa and̤inɡ̤ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ nɔkuɓa akukʰɔ unɔkuɬanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɔ z̤ind̤ijililɛ z̤and̤ɛnz̤a nd̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ujand̤iɡ̤iɲa nɔkɔ kʰawukʰumɓulɛ ukuɓa und̤ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔd̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ kɛ und̤iɓujisa und̤isɛ ɛlutʰulini akund̤itʰululanɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amasi wand̤iv̤utʰisa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤aka wand̤amɓɛsa nɡ̤ɔlusu nɛɲama wand̤ipʰinɡ̤ɛla nɡ̤amatʰamɓɔ nɛmisipʰa und̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ uɓɔmi nɛŋǀɛɓa nɔkuv̤ɛlɛla kwakʰɔ kwawuɡ̤ǀ̤ina umɔja ɛz̤i z̤intɔ kɛ waz̤iɡ̤uʃa ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɔ nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa uɓunalɛ nd̤awɔ jɔkutʰi ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤ɔna wɔnd̤iɓamɓa und̤ilind̤ɛ unɡ̤and̤ɛnz̤i ɛɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁɛni ɓam ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤aɓanɡ̤ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ atʰi kɛ ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤aɓa lilunɡ̤isa nd̤inɡ̤ajipʰakamisi intlɔkɔ jam nd̤iɬutʰi kukukǀukukǀɛz̤wa nakukuɓɔna iint͡siz̤i z̤am nɔkuɓa itʰɛ jaz̤ipʰakamisa intlɔkɔ jam wɔnd̤iz̤inɡ̤ɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲama uɓujɛ wɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓalulɛkilɛjɔ uɬaz̤ijɛ amaŋ̤ǃ̤ina akʰɔ pʰamɓi ujand̤isɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤umɓɔ jakʰɔ iɓɛ kukukʰululana kwɛmikʰɔsi ɛz̤a iɓijini kɛ ukuɓa und̤ikʰupʰɛ ɛsiz̤alwɛni nɡ̤ɛnd̤apʰuma umpʰɛfumlɔ and̤aɓɔnwa lisɔ nd̤anɡ̤a and̤iɓanɡ̤akʰɔ nɡ̤ɛnd̤asuswa ɛsiz̤alwɛni nd̤asiwa ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni ajimɓalwa imiɬa jam makajɛkɛ ad̤ɛd̤ɛ nd̤ikʰɛ nd̤iŋǀumɛz̤ɛ kaŋǀinanɛ pʰamɓi kɔkuɓa nd̤ihamɓɛ nd̤inɡ̤aɓi saɓuja nd̤ijɛ ɛz̤wɛni lɔɓumɲama nɛlɛtʰunz̤i lɔkufa ɛz̤wɛni ɛlisɔnɡ̤ɛlwɛ ɓuɓumɲama nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsitʰɔkɔtʰɔkɔ lɛtʰunz̤i lɔkufa nɛlɛsid̤uɓɛd̤uɓɛ ɛlinkaz̤imlɔ ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsitʰɔkɔtʰɔkɔ wasusɛla ut͡sɔfarɛ wasɛnahama watʰi lɛ ntɔ ininz̤i jamaz̤wi ajikupʰɛnd̤ulwa ind̤ɔd̤a ɛlipʰɔlɔpʰɔlɔ iɡ̤wɛtʲɛlwɛ ukupʰɔlɔlɔz̤a kwakʰɔ kuja kuɓɛtʰa atʰi amad̤ɔd̤a ukuɓa uɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛlɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ukuɬaz̤ajɔ utʰi ikǃakǃamɓilɛ imfund̤isɔ jam nd̤iɲulu ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ kɔd̤wa akaɓa utʰikǁɔ uɓɛtʰɛtʰa av̤ulɛ umlɔmɔ wakʰɛ kuwɛ akukǁɛlɛlɛ iimfiɬakalɔ z̤ɔɓulumkɔ ukuɓa ɓupʰind̤ɛkɛ kaɓini ɓajintɔ ɛz̤imasɛkilɛjɔ uɓuja kwaz̤i kɛ ukuɓa utʰikǁɔ wɛnz̤ɛ ukuɓa uɓuliɓalɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɔ unɔkufikɛlɛla ɛz̤inɡ̤ɔnt͡sinɡ̤ɔnt͡sini z̤ikatʰikǁɔ unɔkufikɛlɛla ɛkufɛz̤ɛkɛni kukasɔmanɮa kupʰakamɛ nɡ̤ɔkwamaz̤ulu unɔkwɛnz̤a ntɔni kunz̤ulu kunɛlaɓafilɛjɔ unɔkwaz̤i ntɔni kukud̤ɛ kunɛɬaɓatʰi ukulinɡ̤aniswa kwakɔ kuɓanz̤i kunɔlwanɮɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ pʰɛ jɛna wav̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ɛla wamɛmɛla ɛmatʲalɛni nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɔkumŋǃand̤a kuɓa jɛna ujaɓaz̤i aɓantu aɓakʰɔɬakɛlɛjɔ ujaɓuɓɔna uɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤akǃɔnd̤ɛlanɡ̤a nɔmntu ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ anɡ̤aɓa nɔkukǃɔnd̤a nɛtʰɔlɛ lɛɛsilɛ lasɛnɮɛ linɡ̤aɓa nɔkuz̤alwa linɡ̤umntu ukuɓa utʰɛ wɛna wab̤ɛkisa intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ kujɛ waz̤ɔlulɛla iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɔ kujɛ ukuɓa kutʰɛ kwakʰɔ inkɔɬakalɔ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ jisɛ kud̤ɛ unɡ̤aɓuɬalisi uɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa ɛz̤intɛntɛni z̤akʰɔ ɔkunɛnɛ uja kwand̤ula ukuɓupʰakamisa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ ɓunɡ̤ɛnasisiɬa utʰi b̤ukǁɛ unɡ̤ɔjiki kuɓa wɔkuliɓala ukwapʰuka kwakʰɔ ukukʰumɓulɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amanz̤i aɮulɛjɔ ukuɮa kwakʰɔ uɓɔmi kuv̤ukɛ kukǃakǃamɓɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛmini ɛnkulu nakuɓa kusɔnɡ̤ɛlwɛ ɛmɲamɛni kɔkʰaɲa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkusa wɔkʰɔlɔsa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sɛkukʰɔ itʰɛmɓa uɬɔlɛ ulalɛ pʰant͡si ɛnkɔlɔsɛkwɛni uɓutʰumɛ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ wɔtʰusajɔ ɓakuŋǀɛkɛlɛlɛ aɓaninz̤i kɛ wɔna amɛɬɔ aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɔpʰɛlɛlwa id̤akɛ kuɓɔ ind̤awɔ jɔkusaɓɛla itʰɛmɓa laɓɔ liɓɛ kukupʰuma umpʰɛfumlɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula ujɔb̤i watʰi kamɓɛ aɓantu ɓuja uɓulumkɔ nam kɛ nd̤inɛntliz̤ijɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ani and̤iwi nɡ̤anɛnɔ kwɛnu nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤az̤az̤ijɔ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ind͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤ijintlɛkisa kummɛlwanɛ ɛnd̤iɓɛ nd̤inɡ̤ɔŋǃula utʰikǁɔ and̤ipʰɛnd̤ulɛ ujintlɛkisa ɔlilunɡ̤isa ɔɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ ɔnɛliʃwa jintɔ jɔkud̤ɛlwa nɡ̤ɔkwamab̤ɔnɡ̤ɔ aɓɔnwaɓilɛjɔ kulunɡ̤isɛlwɛ aɓaɲawɔ z̤ikʰuɓɛkajɔ kukʰɔ ukukǀʰulumakǀʰa ɛz̤intɛntɛni z̤aɓab̤ukǃi ɓakʰɔlɔsilɛ aɓamkǃumɓisajɔ utʰikǁɔ aɓafumɓatʰa utʰikǁɔ ɛsanɮɛni saɓɔ kɔd̤wa kʰawuɓuz̤ɛ ɛz̤inkɔmɛni z̤ɔkujala nasɛz̤intakɛni z̤ɛz̤ulu z̤ɔkukǁɛlɛla tʰɛtʰa nɔm̤laɓa wɔkujala z̤ɔkuɓalisɛla nɛɛntlanz̤i z̤ɔlwanɮɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤az̤ijɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ukuɓa sisanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a ɛsikwɛnz̤ilɛjɔ ɔkɔ usɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ nɔmɔja wɛɲama jɔnkɛ ɛjijɛjɔmntu inɮɛɓɛ ajiji kukukǀikid̤a ukutʰɛtʰa nɛkʰuɬanɡ̤uɓɔ likuv̤ɛ ukuɮa ɛmakǁʰɛɡ̤wɛni kusɛɓulumkwɛni ɛɓud̤ɛni ɓɛmiɬa kusɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤wɛni ɓukujɛ uɓulumkɔ nɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa lɛlakʰɛ ikǀɛɓɔ nɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ jaɓɔna uɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ula kunɡ̤akʰiwa ujamv̤alɛla kunɡ̤av̤ulwa jaɓɔna ujawav̤ala amanz̤i at͡ʃɛ ujawav̤ulɛla alipʰɛtʰulɛ iliz̤wɛ anajɛ amanɮa nɔz̤imasɔ nɡ̤ɔwakʰɛ ɔd̤unɡ̤ud̤ɛlajɔ nɔd̤unɡ̤ud̤ɛlisajɔ umkisa amapʰakatʰi ɛb̤uɲulwɛ aɓaɡ̤ɛz̤isɛ naɓaɡ̤wɛɓi ukʰulula imɓɔpʰɛlɛlɔ jɔɔkumkani aɓɔpʰɛ umb̤iŋǃɔ ɛmaŋǃɛni aɓɔ umkisa aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛb̤uɲulwɛ aɓaz̤iz̤imakad̤ɛ aɓapʰɛnulɛ ususa intɛtʰɔ kwaɓaɲanisɛkilɛjɔ ajitʰaɓatʰɛ imv̤ɔ kumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu upʰalaz̤ɛla amanɛnɛ nɡ̤ɛnd̤ɛlɔ akǀɔmɓululɛ ukǃʰwɛmɛʃa lwaɓaz̤iiŋ̤ǃ̤wɛmla utʰʲila iinz̤ulu z̤asɛɓumɲamɛni alikʰupʰɛlɛ ɛm̤lɔt͡ʃɛni itʰunz̤i lɔkufa ukʰulisa iintlanɡ̤a az̤it͡ʃaɓalalisɛ uz̤ipʰanɡ̤alalisa iintlanɡ̤a az̤ifud̤usɛ ususa iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ kwiintlɔkɔ z̤aɓantu ɓalɔ iliz̤wɛ az̤ib̤ad̤ulisɛ ɛɲaɲɛni ɛnɡ̤ɛnanɮɛla z̤ipʰamz̤a ɛmɲamɛni kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ kukʰaɲa az̤ib̤ad̤ulisɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amaŋǁila jaɓɔna kɔnkɛ ɔkɔ likuɓɔnilɛ ilisɔ jakuv̤a inɮɛɓɛ jam jakukǃɔnd̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ naz̤i nɡ̤akɔ nd̤ijaz̤i and̤iwi nɡ̤anɛnɔ kwɛnu kɔd̤wa nd̤inɡ̤a nd̤inɡ̤atʰɛtʰa kusɔmanɮa nd̤ifuna ukuz̤iɬamɓa kutʰikǁɔ kɔd̤wa kɛ ninɡ̤aɓadʲɔb̤a nɡ̤ɔɓukǁɔki ninɡ̤amaɡ̤ǃ̤ixa anɡ̤ɛntɔ nɔnkɛ nipʰɛla anaɓa ɓɛnitʰɛ kaɲɛ niɓɛ nija kuɓa nilumkilɛ kʰanipʰulapʰulɛ kɛ ukuz̤iɬamɓa ukupʰika kɔmlɔmɔ nikuɓaz̤ɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ utʰikǁɔ nija kumtʰɛtʰɛlɛla nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa nimtʰɛtʰɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛnkɔɬisɔ nija kumnɔnɛlɛla nipʰikɛlɛ utʰikǁɔ kɔlunɡ̤a kǁa atʰɛ waniɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀa ninɔkumɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛnɔkuɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛlwa wɔnɔɬwaja inɛnɛ ukuɓa nitʰɛ nɡ̤asɛsɛ nanɔnɛlɛla uɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amɛla ɓakʰɛ aɓuji kunid̤and̤atʰɛkisa kuniwɛlɛ ukunkwantʲisa kwakʰɛ iz̤ikʰumɓuz̤ɔ z̤ɛnu jimiz̤ɛkɛlisɔ jɔtʰutʰu iiŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔ z̤ɛnu z̤ɔɓa z̤iiŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔ z̤ɔd̤aka jitʰini nd̤ijɛkɛni ukuz̤ɛ nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ kund̤iɬɛlɛ ɔkund̤iɬɛlajɔ kunɡ̤ani ukuɓa nd̤ijipʰatʰɛ iɲama jam nɡ̤amɛɲɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ nd̤iwuɓɛkɛ ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤am jaɓɔna nɔkuɓa utʰɛ wand̤iɓulala nd̤ɔlind̤ɛla kujɛ kɔd̤wa nd̤ɔz̤iɬamɓa iinɮɛla z̤am ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ kwaɔkɔ kɔɓa lusind̤isɔ ɔkuɓa int͡ʃɛmɓɛŋǁa inɡ̤aji kuz̤a ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ jiv̤ani nikuv̤ɛ ukutʰɛtʰa nɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɛlɔ jam nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛɓɛ z̤ɛnu kʰaniɓɔnɛ nd̤ilikǀakǀisilɛ itʲala nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤ija kuɡ̤wɛtʲɛlwa nɡ̤uɓani kɛ ɔnɡ̤aɓamɓana kuɓa ɓɛnd̤ija kutʰi kalɔku nd̤ipʰumɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ kɔd̤wa iz̤intɔ ɛz̤imɓini ukuz̤ɛnz̤a nd̤iz̤ɛ nd̤inɡ̤az̤isitʰɛlisi ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɔ isanɮa sakʰɔ sisɛ kud̤ɛ nɛsɔtʰusɔ sakʰɔ sinɡ̤and̤id̤and̤atʰɛkisi ɓiz̤a kɛ nd̤isaɓɛlɛ m̤lawumɓi nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ und̤ipʰɛnd̤ulɛ z̤inɡ̤apʰi iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ ɛz̤iɡ̤wɛŋǁa nɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤am nd̤az̤isɛ isik͡xɛkǃɔ nɛsɔnɔ jini ukuɓa uɓusitʰɛlisɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ uɓɛ nd̤ilut͡ʃaɓa kuwɛ uja kuŋ̤ǀ̤aŋ̤ǀ̤az̤ɛlisa uɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛ iɡ̤ǃ̤aɓi ɛlipʰɛt͡ʃɛtʰwajɔ usukɛlɛ umkǃukǃu ɔwɔmilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uz̤ib̤alɛla iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ik͡xak͡xa und̤iɮisa lɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ ɛz̤iɡ̤wɛŋǁa z̤ɔɓut͡ʃa ɓam uz̤ifaka ɛsitɔkisini iiɲawɔ z̤am uwuɡ̤ǃ̤ala wɔnkɛ umɛnd̤ɔ uz̤ik͡xwɛlɛla umd̤a ɔd͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ajɔ iz̤itʰɛnd̤ɛ z̤ɛɛɲawɔ z̤am mna lɔ uhaɡ̤ɛlɛjɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛv̤itʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛɮiwɛ nɡ̤amanund̤u umntu intɔ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ nɡ̤umfaz̤i imiɬa jakʰɛ mifut͡ʃanɛ iz̤ɛlɛ z̤iinkatʰaz̤ɔ upʰuma nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntʲantʲamɓɔ aɓunɛ uɓalɛka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛtʰunz̤i anɡ̤ɛmi ɔnd͡ʒ̤alɔ umv̤ɛlɛla nɡ̤ɛlisɔ lakʰɔ und̤imisɛ ɛmatʲalɛni pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ akwaɓa ɓɛkukʰɔ ɔɬamɓulukilɛjɔ ɔpʰumɛ kɔjiŋǃamɓi akukʰɔ nɔkuɓa aɓɛ mɲɛ imisiwɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ imiɬa jakʰɛ lijaz̤iwa nɡ̤uwɛ lɛɛɲanɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ umɛnz̤ɛlɛ kɛ umd̤a wakʰɛ ɔnɡ̤ɛnakuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰwa susa amɛɬɔ akʰɔ kujɛ apʰumlɛ ad̤ɛ akʰɔliswɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmkǃɛʃwa jimini jakʰɛ kuɓa kukʰɔ itʰɛmɓa ɛmtʰini ukuɓa utʰɛ waɡ̤awulwa wɔɓuja uɬumɛ iɡ̤atʲa lawɔ linɡ̤apʰɛli ukuɓa itʰɛ jaɓa nd̤ala iŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu jawɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni safa isiɓili sawɔ ɛlutʰulini nɡ̤ɛv̤umɓa lamanz̤i wɔd̤uɓula wɛnz̤ɛ amasɛɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsitʰɔɮana kɛ jɛna umfɔ aŋ̤ǃ̤ulɛkɛ umntu upʰuma umpʰɛfumlɔ aɓɛ pʰi kɛ amanz̤i asɛlwanɮɛ ajɛmka umlamɓɔ ujat͡ʃa wɔmɛ umntu pʰant͡si kɛ anɡ̤av̤uki lid̤ɛ iz̤ulu linɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ɓanɡ̤akǃaɓuki ɓanɡ̤av̤uswa ɛɓutʰɔnɡ̤wɛni ɓaɓɔ akwaɓa uɓunɡ̤and̤iɡ̤uʃajɔ kwɛlaɓafilɛjɔ und̤isitʰɛlisɛ ud̤ɛ uɓujɛ umsind̤ɔ wakʰɔ und̤imisɛlɛ umd̤a und̤ikʰumɓulɛ kɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ umfɔ wɔpʰila jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɔkupʰuma umkʰɔsi ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤a nd̤inɡ̤alind̤a kud̤ɛ kufikɛ ukukʰululwa uɓunɡ̤aɓiz̤ajɔ kɛ nd̤isaɓɛlɛ uwulanɡ̤az̤ɛlɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɔ kuɓa nɡ̤ɔku ujawaɓala amaɓanɡ̤a akuz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤inilɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛsɔnɔ sitʲwiniwɛ sav̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ɛlwa ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwɛni isik͡xɛkǃɔ waɬɔmɛla ɛɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁɛni ɓam kɔd̤wa intaɓa ijaɡ̤uɓɛka iliwa lijaʃɛŋǁa ɛnd̤awɛni jalɔ amanz̤i ajawaɮa amatʲɛ iz̤ipʰanɡ̤ɔ z̤awɔ z̤ijalukʰukulisa utʰuli lɔm̤laɓa itʰɛmɓa lɔmntu ujalid̤akisa kɛ utʰi ɡ̤aɡ̤a pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ kupʰɛlɛ ɛmkɛ uɡ̤ukǃula uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ umɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛ ɓajaz̤uka aɓantwana ɓakʰɛ anɡ̤az̤i jɛna ɓaɓa z̤iimɓɛɮɛnɡ̤ɛ anɡ̤aɡ̤ǃ̤ali jɛna kujɛ jɛd̤wa iɓuɬunɡ̤u iɲama jakʰɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ujalila nɡ̤apʰakatʰi wasusɛla uɛlifaz̤i wakwatɛman watʰi isilumkɔ sipʰɛnd̤ula nɡ̤ɔkwaz̤i ɔkunɡ̤umɔja siz̤alisɛ umɓilini wasɔ nɡ̤ɔlɔpʰu lwasɛmpumalanɡ̤a kʰɛ sɔɬwajɛ nɡ̤ɛntɛtʰɔ ɛnɡ̤aŋǀɛd̤ijɔ nanɡ̤ɔkukʰuluma ɔkunɡ̤asiz̤i lutʰɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔkɔ wɛna ut͡ʃit͡ʃisɛ ukɔjika utʰikǁɔ waŋǀipʰisa ukutʰɛlɛkɛlɛla pʰamɓi kɔtʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɔ ɓufund̤isa umlɔmɔ wakʰɔ uɲulɛ lwaɓanɔɓukǃʰɔpʰɔlɔlɔ nɡ̤umlɔmɔ wakʰɔ ɔkuɡ̤wɛɓajɔ asind̤im nɡ̤umlɔmɔ wakʰɔ ɔkupʰɛnd̤ulajɔ nɡ̤uwɛ ɔwaz̤alwa kukǃala waɓa nɡ̤umntu wav̤ɛliswa nɡ̤ɛnimɓa nɡ̤apʰamɓi kwɛɛnd̤uli wawukʰɔ ɛɡ̤ǃ̤uɡ̤ulɛni likatʰikǁɔ waɓut͡salɛla kuwɛ uɓulumkɔ ɔɓɔ waz̤i ntɔni ɛsinɡ̤ajaz̤ijɔ tʰina ukǃɔnd̤ɛ ntɔni ɛnɡ̤ɛkʰɔjɔ natʰi kutʰi kund͡ʒ̤ɛ tʰina siz̤iinɡ̤wɛv̤u namakǁʰɛɡ̤ɔ amad̤ala nakujiɬɔ nɡ̤ɔkuz̤alwa z̤iŋǀinanɛ kuwɛ iintutʰuz̤ɛlɔ z̤ikatʰikǁɔ nɛliz̤wi ɛlitʰɛtʰɛ kuɬɛ nawɛ imka nantɔni intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ apʰaɲaz̤ɛla ntɔni ɛmɛɬɔ akʰɔ lɛ ntɔ ukuɡ̤ukǃulɛla kutʰikǁɔ ukufutʰa kwakʰɔ ukʰupʰɛ ukutʰɛtʰa ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɔ ujintɔni ukuɓa akǃakǃamɓɛ aɓɛ lilunɡ̤isa ɔz̤ɛlwɛ nɡ̤umfaz̤i jaɓɔna naɓaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓakʰɛ akakʰɔlwa nɡ̤aɓɔ nɛz̤ulu alikǃakǃamɓilɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ uɓɛkɛ pʰi ɔlisikiz̤i ɔjimɓɔz̤isa umntu lɔ usɛla uɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amanz̤i nd̤ɔkukǁɛlɛla nd̤ipʰulapʰulɛ ɛnd̤ikuɓɔnilɛjɔ nd̤ikuɓalisɛlɛ ɔkwakǁɛlwa z̤iz̤ilumkɔ kuv̤ɛla kɔɔjisɛ z̤az̤a az̤akufiɬa lanikwa z̤ɔna z̤ɔd̤wa iliz̤wɛ akwanɡ̤ɛna wasɛmz̤ini pʰakatʰi kwaz̤ɔ jɔnkɛ imiɬa jakʰɛ ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ujaz̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤a inani lɛmiɲaka likǃwɛtʲɛlwɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤wanɡ̤aŋ̤ǃ̤wili kumi iliz̤wi lɔkunkwantʲisa ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤akʰɛ ɛlukǁɔlwɛni ujamfikɛla umb̤ukǃi akakʰɔlwa ukuɓa uja kuɓuja ɛmɲamɛni kɛ jɛna ukǃwɛtʲɛlwɛ ik͡xɛlɛ upʰalapʰalɛla ukutʲa ɛsitʰi kupʰi ujaz̤i ukuɓa ulunɡ̤isɛlwɛ jɔɓumɲama ɛkǀalɛni kwakʰɛ ud̤and̤atʰɛkiswa jimɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ najiŋ̤ǀ̤utʰɛkɔ itʰi ɡ̤aɡ̤a pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkumkani ɔlunɡ̤isɛlwɛ isipʰɛnd̤u sɔkulwa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛsɔlulɛlɛ kutʰikǁɔ isanɮa sakʰɛ waz̤ɛnz̤a iɡ̤ɔxa kusɔmanɮa wamɡ̤ila ɛjɔlulɛ intamɔ nɡ̤amakǃʰuɓu aŋ̤ǃ̤iŋ̤ǃ̤wa ɛɛnɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ z̤akʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤amaŋǃatʰa akʰɛ watʲɛɓa wanamaŋǃatʰa ɛmiɬuɓulwɛni jakʰɛ wɛma imiz̤i ɛnɡ̤amaŋǁuwa nɛz̤inɮu ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛz̤akuɬalwa ɛz̤amisɛlwa ukuɓa z̤iɓɛ jimiwɛwɛ akaji kuɓa sisitʲɛɓi aɓuji uɓutʲɛɓi ɓakʰɛ inz̤uz̤ɔ jakʰɛ ajiji kunaɓa ɛm̤laɓɛni akaji kusind̤a ɛɓumɲamɛni iɡ̤atʲa lakʰɛ lija kɔmiswa nɡ̤ɛd̤anɡ̤atʲɛ ɛmkɛ nɡ̤ɔkufutʰa kɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɛ ɔkʰɔɬiswajɔ makanɡ̤atʰɛmɓɛli kumampunɡ̤ɛ kuɓa inkɔɬakalɔ ija kuɓa lulwananɔ lwakʰɛ kɔz̤alisɛka ɔkɔ inɡ̤ɛkaɓi jimini jakʰɛ isɛɓɛ lakʰɛ lɛsund̤u linɡ̤aɓi luɬaz̤a wɔwisa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmd̤ilija iid̤ilija z̤awɔ ɛz̤ik͡xwad̤a av̤utʰululɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmŋǃuma intʲantʲamɓɔ jawɔ kuɓa iɓanɮa lɛɛnt͡ʃɛmɓɛŋǁa lija kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔ ɛmɓat͡ʃilɛjɔ umlilɔ uz̤it͡ʃisɛ iintɛntɛ z̤ɔkukǀɛnɡ̤a ɓakʰawula uɓuɓi ɓaz̤alɛ uɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a umɓilini waɓɔ usɛɓɛnz̤ɛ inkɔɬisɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula ujɔb̤i watʰi nd̤iv̤ɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ininz̤i ɛz̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɔ ninɡ̤aɓatʰutʰuz̤ɛli aɓajind̤inisa nɔnkɛ nipʰɛla apʰɛlilɛ amaz̤wi anɡ̤umɔja ukǁʰɔkɔŋǁwa jintɔni ukuɓa upʰɛnd̤ulɛ nam nd̤iɓɛ nd̤inɡ̤atʰɛtʰajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ani ukuɓa umpʰɛfumlɔ wɛnu uɓusɛnd̤awɛni jɔmpʰɛfumlɔ nd̤iɓɛ nd̤inɡ̤anikǃukɛla ukutʰɛtʰa nd̤iniɬunɡ̤uz̤ɛlɛ intlɔkɔ nd̤iɓɛ nd̤inɡ̤anikʰalipʰisa nɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ nɔkukʰuz̤a kɔmlɔmɔ kuluŋǃand̤ɛ usiz̤i lwɛnu nɔkuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤atʰɛtʰa awuŋǃand̤wa umv̤and̤ɛd̤wa nɔkuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤ajɛka ntɔni haji nɡ̤ɔku und̤id̤inisilɛ ulipʰanz̤isilɛ lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa und̤int͡ʃwɛɲisilɛ kwaɓa liŋ̤ǃ̤ina ɔkɔ kwand̤imɛla ukub̤itʲa kwapʰɛnd̤ula ɛɓuswɛni ɓam umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ wand̤ikǃwɛnɡ̤a wand̤it͡ʃut͡ʃisa ud̤it͡ʃikǁiz̤ɛlɛ amɛɲɔ akʰɛ ɛnɡ̤umɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli uwɛnz̤ɛ aɓukʰali amɛɬɔ akʰɛ ɓand̤akʰamɛlɛ umlɔmɔ nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ ɓand̤iɓɛtʰa ɛz̤iɮɛlɛni ɓɔnkɛ ɓajatʰɛlɛlana ukund̤ikǀʰasa utʰikǁɔ wand̤inikɛla kumakʰwɛnkwɛ wand̤id͡ʒ̤ulɛla ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ nd̤iɓi nd̤ikǀʰulumakǀʰa wand̤iv̤itʰav̤itʰa wand̤iɓamɓa nɡ̤ɛntamɔ wand̤iɬɛkɛz̤a wand̤imisa nd̤aɓa jitɛkɛni kujɛ ɓand̤ixawula aɓatɔli ɓakʰɛ waz̤itʲand̤a iz̤int͡sɔ z̤am ɛnɡ̤ɛnalufɛfɛ wajipʰalaz̤ɛla ɛm̤laɓɛni iɲɔnɡ̤ɔ jam wand̤ɛnz̤a iind̤uma nɡ̤ɛɛnd̤uma wand̤iɡ̤ila nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɡ̤ɔxa nd̤atʰunɡ̤ɛla iinɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ ɛnkwanɛni jɔlusu nd̤aluɡ̤ǃ̤uɓa nɡ̤ɔtʰuli upʰɔnd̤ɔ uɓusɔ ɓam ɓuɓɔmv̤u kunɛnɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnkɔpʰɛ z̤am litʰunz̤i lɔkufa nakuɓa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ kuɡ̤ɔɲamɛla ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤am ukǃakǃamɓilɛ umtʰand̤az̤ɔ m̤laɓa ukulisɛlɛla iɡ̤az̤i kunɡ̤aɓi nasikʰunɮa ukuɬaɬamɓa nanɡ̤ɔku jaɓɔna lisɛmaz̤ulwini iŋ̤ǃ̤ina ɔnd̤iv̤umɛlajɔ usɛz̤ind̤awɛni ɛz̤ipʰɛz̤ulu aɓand̤iɡ̤ǁ̤ɛkajɔ nɡ̤aɓɛtʰu aɓa ilisɔ lijɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛla kutʰikǁɔ ukuɓa alunɡ̤isɛlɛ umfɔ kutʰikǁɔ aɬulɛ pʰakatʰi kɔmntu nɔmmɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ kuɓa imiɲaka ɛmɓalwa iz̤a kuɮula nd̤ihamɓɛ kɛ umɛnd̤ɔ ɛnd̤inɡ̤aji kuɓuja nɡ̤awɔ umɔja wɔnakɛlɛ imiɬa jam ikǀiɲiwɛ intɔ jam nɡ̤amaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa inɛnɛ nd̤ijintɔ aɓaɮala nɡ̤ajɔ nɛlisɔ liliɓɛlɛ z̤iinkani z̤aɓɔ kʰawuɓɛkɛ intɔ und̤imɛlɛ nɡ̤uɓani jɛna ɔja kuɓamɓana nɡ̤ɛsanɮa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa intliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ ujifiɬɛlɛ ukukǃikǃa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ akuji kuɓapʰakamisa unikɛla aɓaɬɔɓɔ ukuɓa ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤amakǁʰɔɓa amɛɬɔ aɓantwana ɓakʰɛ az̤ɛ apʰɛlɛlwɛ und̤imisɛ nd̤aɓa nɡ̤umz̤ɛkɛlisɔ ɛz̤iz̤wɛni nd̤aɓa nɡ̤ɔt͡ʃikǀɛlwa ɛɓuswɛni laz̤a lanɔxatʲaz̤ɔ ilisɔ kukukʰatʰaz̤ɛka amalunɡ̤u aɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsitʰunz̤i ɔnkɛ ɛpʰɛla ɓamanɡ̤aliswa aɓatʰɛ tʲɛ jilɛ ntɔ ɔmsulwa ujaz̤ikǁʰɔkɔŋǁa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnt͡ʃɛmɓɛŋǁa kɛ ɔlilunɡ̤isa uɓamɓɛ inɮɛla jakʰɛ ɔz̤anɮa z̤iɬamɓulukilɛjɔ uja ɛkʰalipʰa kɔd̤wa nɔnkɛ ɓujani kʰaniz̤ɛ and̤iji silumkɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛnu imiɬa jam iɮulɛ z̤id͡ʒ̤akǀiwɛ iz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɔ z̤am amafa ɛntliz̤ijɔ jam ɓatʰi uɓusuku jimini ukukʰaɲa kusɔnd̤ɛlɛ kǁa kuz̤a kuɓa mɲama ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤atʰɛmɓa nd̤itʰɛmɓɛ ɛlaɓafilɛjɔ inɮu jam nd̤anɮala umanɮalɔ ɛmɲamɛni ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ kukuɓɔla unɡ̤uɓawɔ nd̤atʰi kwimpɛtʰu unɡ̤uma unɡ̤ud̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu lipʰi kɛ nɡ̤ɔku itʰɛmɓa itʰɛmɓa nɡ̤uɓani ɔwɔliɓɔna lija kuɬa lijɛ ɛmiv̤alwɛni jɛlaɓafilɛjɔ kǁa sipʰumla kuɲɛ ɛlutʰulini wapʰɛnd̤ula ub̤ilɛd̤ad̤i wakwaʃuwa watʰi kunini nikuz̤inɡ̤ɛla ukutʰɛtʰa kǃɔnd̤ani sɔtʰɛtʰa ɛmv̤ɛni kɔku jini ukuɓa kutʰiwɛ sind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ siɓɛ z̤iiŋǃamɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ wɛna uz̤ikǃwɛnɡ̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɔ lija kuʃijwa iɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɔ linɡ̤amiwa likʰwɛlɛlɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jalɔ nɔkɔ nɔkukʰaɲa ɔku kɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kuja kukǀiɲwa linɡ̤aɓi m̤lɔpʰɛ ilanɡ̤atʲɛ lɔmlilɔ wakʰɛ ukukʰaɲa kuja kwɛnz̤iwa mɲama ɛntɛntɛni jakʰɛ nɛsiɓanɛ sakʰɛ sikǀiɲwɛ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ ukuɲant͡sula kwakʰɛ kuja kukǁinwa limpʰɔsɛ pʰant͡si kwaɛlakʰɛ ikǃʰinɡ̤a kuɓa ukǃʰutʲɛlwɛ ɛmnatʰɛni z̤iiɲawɔ z̤akʰɛ uhamɓa pʰɛz̤u kwɛsiɓatʰa umɡ̤iɓɛ umɓamɓisa nɡ̤ɛsitʰɛnd̤ɛ limɓamɓisɛ isanɡ̤ɔ lufiɬiwɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni ulutʲa lwakʰɛ ukutʰiwa ɬasi kwakʰɛ kusɛŋ̤ǃ̤uʃwini ujad̤and̤atʰɛkiswa nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kukukʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰isa kumb̤ɛb̤ɛtʰɛ kutʰanɛ mɓɛnd̤ɛ najɛ amanɮa akʰɛ aja kupʰɛla kukulamɓa ukusind̤ɛka kulunɡ̤isɛlwɛ ukud͡ʒ̤iŋ̤ǁ̤ɛla kwakʰɛ kuɮa iz̤ikǃɛnd̤u z̤ɔlusu lwakʰɛ uɮa iz̤ikǃɛnd̤u z̤akʰɛ ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ wɔkufa ijaŋǀɔtʰuka ɛntɛntɛni jakʰɛ inkɔlɔsɛkɔ jakʰɛ ahand͡ʒ̤isɛlwɛ wɔkukʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰isa kuɬɛli ɛntɛntɛni jakʰɛ iz̤intɔ z̤asɛmz̤ini kuɡ̤ǀ̤wajɛlwa isulfurɛ ɛkʰajɛni lakʰɛ nɡ̤apʰant͡si z̤ija kɔma iiŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu z̤akʰɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤ulu aɓunɛ amasɛɓɛ akʰɛ isikʰumɓuz̤ɔ sakʰɛ sija kud̤aka ɛɬaɓatʰini anɡ̤aɓi naɡ̤ama nasɛmapʰanɮɛni ɓaja kumtʰʲala ɛkukʰaɲɛni ajɛ ɛɓumɲamɛni apʰɛkuz̤wɛ kwɛlimiwɛjɔ akaji kuɓa naɲana nanz̤ala ɛɓantwini ɓakɔwaɓɔ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ usind̤ilɛjɔ ɛmiz̤ini jakʰɛ ɓɔmanɡ̤aliswa jimini jakʰɛ aɓaɬɛli ɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a naɓasɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɓaɓand͡ʒ̤wɛ kukuɓa namanwɛlɛ inɛnɛ ind͡ʒ̤alɔ imiŋǃuɓa jaɓanɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa ind͡ʒ̤alɔ ind̤awɔ jɔnɡ̤amaz̤ijɔ utʰikǁɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula ujɔb̤i watʰi kunini nisɛnz̤a isiŋ̤ǃ̤ala kumpʰɛfumlɔ nind̤itʲumz̤a nɡ̤ɔkutʰɛtʰa ɛz̤i z̤iɬanɮɔ z̤iliʃumi nind̤iɬaz̤ilɛ anid̤anilɛ nijand̤ikʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰isa kʰɔna kɛ nd̤itʰɛ ɔkunɛnɛ nd̤alaɬɛka kuɬɛli ukulaɬɛka ukuɓa ɔkunɛnɛ nitʰɛ naz̤ikʰulisa nand̤ɔɬwaja nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ jam jaz̤ini nɡ̤ɔkɔ ukuɓa nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ɔnd̤iɡ̤ɔɓilɛjɔ wand̤ixawula nɡ̤ɔmnatʰa wakʰɛ jaɓɔna nd̤ijakʰala nd̤itʰi nd̤aɡ̤ɔɲamɛlwa kunɡ̤asatʲɛlwa nd̤ijaz̤iɓika kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ kulunɡ̤isa ujiɓijilɛ inɮɛla jam akwaɓakʰɔ ukuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa ɛz̤iŋ̤ǃ̤uʃwini z̤am uɓumɲama und̤iɬuɓɛ uz̤ukɔ wasusa isit͡sʰaɓa sɛntlɔkɔ jam und̤id̤iliz̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nd̤ɛmka waliŋǀɔtʰula nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmtʰi itʰɛmɓa uwuv̤utʰisɛ nɡ̤akum umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ wand̤iɓalɛla ɛkutʰini nd̤inɡ̤ɔwaɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓakʰɛ z̤ɛz̤a kuɲɛ iz̤impi z̤akʰɛ z̤and̤ifumɓɛla inɮɛla jaz̤ɔ z̤ajiz̤unɡ̤ulɛz̤a nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ intɛntɛ jam aɓaz̤alwana ɓam uɓasɛ kud̤ɛ aɓand̤az̤ijɔ sɛɓɛnɡ̤aɓasɛmz̤ini kaɲɛ iz̤alamanɛ z̤am z̤ind̤iʃijilɛ naɓaz̤ana ɓand̤iliɓɛlɛ aɓaɬala ɛnɮwini jam naɓakʰɔnz̤az̤ana ɓam ɓand̤iɓalɛlɛ ɛkutʰini nd̤inɡ̤ɔwasɛmz̤ini nd̤inɡ̤ɔwɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ nd̤iɓiz̤a umkʰɔnz̤i anɡ̤asaɓɛli nd̤imɓɔnɡ̤ɔz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ umɔja umk͡xukǃulɛ nd̤ijanuka kuɓantwana ɓɛsiz̤alɔ ɛsand̤iz̤alajɔ namakʰwɛnkwɛ ajand̤ikǀɛkisa nd̤akusuka atʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤am nd̤ilisikiz̤i kumakʰɔlwanɛ naɓɛnd̤iɓatʰand̤a ɓand̤iɡ̤ukǃukɛlɛ amatʰamɓɔ at͡ʃɛlɛ ɛluswini nasɛɲamɛni jam nd̤isind̤ɛ makǀɛɓɛt͡ʃu taxuni taxuni z̤iɬɔɓɔ z̤am kuɓa isanɮa sikatʰikǁɔ sind̤ipʰɛtʰɛ jini ukuɓa nind̤isukɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ ninɡ̤anɛli jiɲama jam akwaɓa nɡ̤ɔku ɛɓɛb̤alwa amaz̤wi akwaɓa ɛɓɛk͡xɔlwɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini nɡ̤ɛntlaɓɔ jɛsiɲitʰi atʰʲid̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛlɔtʰɛ akǁʰɔlɛlwɛ ɛwɛni kɛ nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa um̤lawulɛli uɬɛli ɛnɡ̤ɔwɔkupʰɛla uja ɛmɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔtʰuli lwɛɬaɓatʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa luɮav̤ulwɛ lwand͡ʒ̤ɛ inɡ̤asɛkʰɔ iɲama jam nd̤ija kumɓɔna utʰikǁɔ ɛnd̤ija kuz̤iɓɔnɛla nɡ̤ɔkwam amɛɬɔ amɓɔnɛ inɡ̤aɓi wumɓi z̤ijapʰɛlɛlwa iz̤int͡sɔ z̤am nɡ̤apʰakatʰi ukuɓa nitʰi simsukɛla nɡ̤ani iŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu jalɔɔ ntɔ ifuɲɛnwɛ ŋǁunɡ̤upʰalani lik͡xɛlɛ kuɓa uɓuʃuʃu ɓuɓɔ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɔɓufanɛlɛ ik͡xɛlɛ ukuz̤ɛ naz̤i ukuɓa kukʰɔ umɡ̤wɛɓɔ wasusɛla ut͡sɔfarɛ wasɛnahama watʰi nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤aŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤am ɛz̤i z̤ijand̤ipʰɛnd̤ula nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkutʰaɓatʰɛka nɡ̤apʰakatʰi ukutʰɛtʰisa ɔkund̤iɬaz̤ajɔ nd̤ijakuv̤a kɛ umɔja ujand̤ipʰɛnd̤ula ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤wɛni jam ɔku ujakwaz̤i kamɓɛ kususɛla kɔkɔ lwaɓɛkwajɔ ɛɬaɓatʰini ukuɓa ukumɛmɛlɛla kwaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kufut͡ʃanɛ ukuv̤uja kwɛɛnt͡ʃɛmɓɛŋǁa kɔkwɛpʰaɲaz̤ɔ nɔkuɓa kutʰɛ kwɛɲuka kwaja ɛz̤ulwini ukupʰakama kwakʰɛ intlɔkɔ jakʰɛ wajifikisa ɛmafini nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlinɮɛ lakʰɛ uja kud̤aka kupʰɛlɛ aɓamɓɔnajɔ ɓatʰi upʰi uja kupʰapʰaz̤ɛla ɛmkɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛpʰupʰa anɡ̤afuɲanwa apʰɛkuz̤wɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɓɔnɔ wɔɓusuku ilisɔ ɛlikʰɛ lamɓɔna aliji kupʰind̤a ind̤awɔ jakʰɛ ajisaji aɓantwana ɓakʰɛ ɓaja kuŋ̤ǁ̤ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɛz̤ɛla aɓaswɛlɛjɔ iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ z̤iɓujisɛ imfujɔ jakʰɛ amatʰamɓɔ akʰɛ ɛɓɛz̤ɛlɛ ɓuɓut͡ʃa ɓɔlaliswa pʰant͡si najɛ ɛlutʰulini nɔkuɓa uɓuɓi ɓɛɓunɛŋǀasa ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɛ waɓuɡ̤uʃa pʰant͡si kɔlwimi lwakʰɛ waɓukǀɔnɡ̤a akaɓujɛka waɓutʰintɛla ɛkʰuɬanɡ̤uɓɛni lakʰɛ isɔnka sakʰɛ sib̤ukǃukilɛ ɛmatʰund͡ʒ̤ini akʰɛ jiɲɔnɡ̤ɔ jamapʰimpi ɛmɓilinini wakʰɛ uɡ̤iɲɛ uɓutʲɛɓi waɓuɬanz̤a ujaɓukʰupʰa ɛsiswini sakʰɛ utʰikǁɔ wɔmunɡ̤uɲa uɓuɬunɡ̤u ɓamapʰimpi lumɓulalɛ lwɛɲuʃu akaji kuɓɔna mid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ milamɓɔ z̤iɬamɓɔ z̤ɔɓusi ɛɓujisa awakukǁɛlɛnɡ̤ajɔ akakuɡ̤iɲi anɡ̤av̤uji nɡ̤anɡ̤ɔɓutʲɛɓi aɓuxwɛɓilɛjɔ kuɓa waɓatʰi v̤iki waɓalaɬa aɓaswɛlɛjɔ wakǁʰakamfula inɮu anɡ̤ajakʰanɡ̤a kuɓa ɛnɡ̤alwaz̤anɡ̤a ukǁɔlɔ ɛsiswini sakʰɛ akaji kusind̤a nɛz̤intɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ ɓɛkunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ ntɔ isind̤ajɔ ɛmkǃalɛni wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔku az̤iji kuɬala iz̤intɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛkuz̤alisɛkɛni kɔkumanɛlɛjɔ uɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛkilɛ iz̤anɮa z̤ɔnkɛ z̤aɓanɡ̤ɛntɔ z̤ijamfikɛla kɔtʰi ukuz̤ɛ siz̤aliswɛ sakʰɛ utʰikǁɔ atʰumɛlɛ kujɛ ukuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ awunisɛ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ ɛɲamɛni jakʰɛ ɛɓalɛka isik͡xwɛkǃɛ sɛsiɲitʰi lɔmpʰumɛla utɔlɔ lwɛsapʰɛtʰa sɔb̤ɛd̤u luxɔliwɛ lwapʰuma ɛmz̤imɓɛni nɛɲɛmɓɛ ɛɓɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛlajɔ ɛɲɔnɡ̤wɛni jakʰɛ ujɛmka iz̤ɔtʰusɔ z̤ipʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ uɓumɲama ɓɔnkɛ ɓuɓɛkɛlwɛ iiŋ̤ǃ̤wɛɓɔ z̤akʰɛ uɮiwa nɡ̤umlilɔ ɔnɡ̤av̤utʰɛlwanɡ̤a uɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ ɔkusind̤ilɛjɔ ɛntɛntɛni jakʰɛ iz̤ulu lɔɓutʰʲila uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɛ nɛɬaɓatʰi lisukɛlɛ pʰɛz̤ulu kujɛ ija kufud̤uswa indʲɛɓɔ jɛnɮu jakʰɛ ikʰukuliswɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ sisɔ ɛsɔ isaɓɛlɔ sɔmntu ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ siv̤ɛla kutʰikǁɔ nɛlifa alimisɛlwɛjɔ jɛna nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula ujɔb̤i watʰi jiv̤ani nikuv̤ɛ ukutʰɛtʰa kuɓɛ z̤iintutʰuz̤ɛlɔ z̤ɛnu ɔku nd̤itʰwalɛni nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ niɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛlɛ ɛmv̤a kwamaz̤wi mna inkalaz̤ɔ jam isɛmntwini jini kʰɔna ɓɛkunɡ̤ani ukuɓa unɡ̤az̤ɛkanɛki umɔja b̤ɛkani nimanɡ̤aliswɛ ɓɛkani isanɮa ɛmlɔɲɛni ɔkunɛnɛ nd̤akukʰumɓula nd̤isuka nd̤ikʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰iswɛ nɛɲama jam iɓand͡ʒ̤wɛ kukud̤ud̤uz̤ɛla jini ukuɓa aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɓaɮɛ uɓɔmi ɓaɓɛ ɓad̤ala kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɓɔmɛlɛlɛ ɓaɓɛ namanɮa imɓɛwu jaɓɔ ikǃinilɛ pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ inaɓɔ naɓapʰumɛ ɛmɓilinini waɓɔ ɓasɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ iz̤inɮu z̤aɓɔ z̤inɔkǁɔlɔ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ kunkwantʲa nɛntɔnɡ̤a katʰikǁɔ ajiɓafikɛli inkunz̤i jaɓɔ ijaz̤ɛka inɡ̤aɬɔɬɛli imaz̤i jaɓɔ ijaz̤ala inɡ̤apʰunz̤i ɓajawakʰupʰɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔm̤lamɓi amakʰwɛnkwɛ aɓɔ naɓantwana ɓaɓɔ ɓajaɮɔɓa ɓapʰakamisa iliz̤wi ɓɛnɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔ nɔhad̤i ɓav̤ujɛ liliz̤wi lɔɡ̤wali ɓajajiɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa imiɬa jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkukǀʰwajitʰa ɓɛɬɛ nɡ̤ɛpʰaɲaz̤ɔ ukuja kwɛlaɓafilɛjɔ ɓatʰi kutʰikǁɔ suka kutʰi asikunanz̤ilɛ ukuz̤az̤i iinɮɛla z̤akʰɔ ujini usɔmanɮa ukuɓa simkʰɔnz̤ɛ kusiŋǀɛd̤a ntɔni ukumd͡ʒ̤ɔka jaɓɔna az̤isɛsanɮɛni saɓɔ iz̤intɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ikǃʰinɡ̤a laɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ maliɓɛ lɛɛ kukanɡ̤apʰi kɛ isiɓanɛ saɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ sikǀiɲwa kuɓafikɛla ukusind̤ɛka kwaɓɔ aɓaɓɛlɛ utʰikǁɔ iz̤intʲa nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ ɓaɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǀ̤a ɛŋǃuŋǃiwɛjɔ pʰamɓi kɔmɔja nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmkǃukǃu ɔɬasɛlwa sisakǃʰwitʰi nitʰi utʰikǁɔ uɓuɓɛkɛla aɓantwana ɓaɓɔ uɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a ɓaɓɔ makaɓupʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlɛ kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwaɓɔ ɓaz̤i ɓɔna makajiɓɔnɛ iŋ̰ǁ̰walɛkɔ jaɓɔ amɛɬɔ aɓɔ ɓaɓusɛlɛ uɓuʃuʃu ɓɔsɔmanɮa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓajinanz̤ɛ nɡ̤ani ɓɔna inɮu jaɓɔ ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ lakukǃʰit͡ʃulwa lɛɛɲanɡ̤a z̤aɓɔ uja kufund̤iswa ukwaz̤i utʰikǁɔ lɔwɔ uɡ̤wɛɓa aɓapʰɛz̤ulu ɔmɲɛ ɛmanɮɛni ɔkwakʰɛ ukupʰila ɔnwaɓilɛ kaɲɛ ɛkǀʰulumakǀʰilɛ iimv̤aɓa z̤akʰɛ z̤iz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤amasi nɔmɔnɡ̤ɔ wamatʰamɓɔ akʰɛ utʲɛɓilɛ ɔmɲɛ uk͡xak͡xa umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ɛnɡ̤aɮanɡ̤a z̤intɔ z̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɓalala nd̤awɔɲɛ ɛlutʰulini iimpɛtʰu z̤ijaɓaɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla ɓɔɓaɓini jaɓɔna nd̤ijaz̤az̤i iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤ɛnu namajɛlɛŋǃɛ ɛnind̤iɡ̤ɔɲamɛla nɡ̤awɔ kǁa nitʰi ipʰi inɮu jɛsib̤ɔv̤ub̤ɔv̤u ipʰi intɛntɛ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ jaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ aniɓuz̤anɡ̤a kwaɓaɮula nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla imikǃɔnd̤isɔ jaɓɔ ninakɔ ukujikʰaɲɛla ukuɓa nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkusind̤ɛka waŋǃand̤wa ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkupʰupʰuma umsind̤ɔ wɛmkiswa nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤akǁɛla ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ inɮɛla jakʰɛ ɛnz̤ɛ intɔ jɛna nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kupʰind̤ɛz̤ɛla kujɛ usiwa ɛmaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni jɛna alind̤ɛ ɛsiɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni anɛŋǀasa kujɛ amaɡ̤ad̤a ɛsiɬamɓɔ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ kuland̤ɛla lɔnkɛ nanɡ̤apʰamɓi kwakʰɛ ɓɛlunɡ̤ɛnakuɓalwa ninɡ̤atʰini kɛ ukund̤itʰutʰuz̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛɛntɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛntɔ limpɛnd̤ulɔ z̤ɛnu z̤isɛlɛ z̤iɓuɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ wasusɛla uɛlifaz̤i wakwatɛman watʰi umfɔ unɔkumŋǀɛd̤a utʰikǁɔ haji ɓɔ uz̤iŋǀɛd̤a nɡ̤ɔkwakʰɛ ɔkǃikǃajɔ kumnand̤i kusɔmanɮa kǁa ulilunɡ̤isa kujinz̤uz̤ɔ kujɛ ukuɓa ujaz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlisa iinɮɛla z̤akʰɔ uja kukɔɬwaja nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔjika kwakʰɔ utʰikǁɔ ajɛ nawɛ ɛmatʲalɛni uɓuɓi ɓakʰɔ aɓuɓukʰulu uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɔ asiɓɔɓunɡ̤apʰɛlɛ nd̤awɔ kuɓa uɓuɓamɓisɛ umz̤alwana wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛliz̤ɛ uɓuɓaɬuɓa aɓaz̤ɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ uɓunɡ̤amsɛz̤i manz̤i ɔtʰʲafilɛjɔ ɔlamɓilɛjɔ uɓumwimɓa ukutʲa kɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɛnɡ̤alɔ ɓɛlilɛlajɔ iliz̤wɛ ɔɓɛkɛkilɛjɔ uɓɛɬala kulɔ aɓaɬɔlɔkaz̤i uɓuɓand̤ulula ɓɛlamɓatʰa nɛɛnɡ̤alɔ z̤ɛɛnkɛd̤ama uɓuz̤itʲumz̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ imiɡ̤iɓɛ ikud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛ ukʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰iswɛ nɡ̤ɛsikǃupʰɛ kukunkwantʲiswa kʰɔna akuɓuɓɔni uɓumɲama nɔɓuninz̤i ɓamanz̤i akuɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlajɔ utʰikǁɔ ukupʰakama kwakʰɛ asikɔkwamaz̤ulu jini ɓɔna kɛ intlɔkɔ jaz̤ɔ iinkwɛnkwɛz̤i ukuɓa pʰɛz̤ulu kwajɔ utʰi kɛ wɛna waz̤i ntɔni utʰikǁɔ unɔkuɡ̤wɛɓa ɛnɡ̤apʰaja kɔɓumɲama ɓamafu amafu amsitʰilɛ akaɓɔni uz̤ihamɓɛla ɔkwakʰɛ ɛsaz̤inɡ̤ɛni samaz̤ulu umɛnd̤ɔ wasɛpʰakad̤ɛni uja kuwuɡ̤ǀ̤ina aɓawuɲatʰɛlɛjɔ aɓantu aɓanɔɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a aɓaʃwaɓɛnɛ linɡ̤ɛkaɓi likǁɛʃa lwaɲiɓilika lwanɡ̤umsinɡ̤a usɛkɔ lwaɓɔ aɓaɓɛsitʰi kutʰikǁɔ suka kutʰi anɡ̤aɓɛnz̤a ntɔni usɔmanɮa kanti ɛɓɛnɡ̤ujɛ ɔz̤alisa iz̤inɮu z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ikǃʰinɡ̤a laɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ maliɓɛ lɛɛ aja kuɓɔna ɔkɔ amalunɡ̤isa av̤ujɛ ɔmsulwa ujaɓaɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛla ɛsitʰi inɛnɛ aɓasukɛlɛ pʰɛz̤ulu ɓatʰɛ ʃwaka wakuɮa umlilɔ ukupʰupʰuma kwaɓɔ kʰawɛnz̤ɛ uɓuɬɔɓɔ najɛ uɓɛ nɔkǁɔlɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ ntɔ wɔz̤ɛlwa kɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kʰawamkɛlɛ umjalɛlɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɛ uɓɛkɛ iintɛtʰɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɔ ukuɓa utʰɛ waɓujɛla kusɔmanɮa uja kwakʰiwa ukuɓa utʰɛ waɓuɓɛka kud̤ɛ uɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa ɛz̤intɛntɛni z̤akʰɔ waliɓɛka ɛlutʰulini ilitʲɛ lɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ wajiɓɛka ɛluɬalwini lwɛmiland͡ʒ̤ana nɛjakwaɔfirɛ usɔmanɮa wɔɓa lilitʲɛ lɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ kuwɛ nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛɓɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛlajɔ kakʰulu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uja kwand̤ula ukuz̤ijɔlisa nɡ̤ɔsɔmanɮa uɓupʰakamisɛlɛ kutʰikǁɔ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ wɔtʰand̤az̤a kujɛ ɛv̤ɛ uz̤iz̤alisɛ iz̤ib̤amɓatʰisɔ z̤akʰɔ usɔnɡ̤ɛlɛ intɔ ifɛz̤ɛkɛ kuwɛ ɛz̤inɮɛlɛni z̤akʰɔ kukʰaɲɛ kuɓɛ m̤lɔpʰɛ kǁa z̤itʰɛ z̤ɛɬa wɔtʰi pʰɛz̤ulu amsind̤isɛ ɔmɛɬɔ akǃɔnd̤ɛlɛ pʰant͡si uja kusind̤isa nɔnɡ̤ɛmsulwa asiz̤wɛ ɓuɓuɲulu ɓɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula ujɔb̤i watʰi nanam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ inkalaz̤ɔ jam inɛɛnkani isanɮa sinz̤ima pʰɛz̤u kɔkuɡ̤ǀ̤uma jɔɔ and̤aɓa ɓɛnd̤isaz̤i apʰɔ nd̤inɡ̤amfumana kʰɔna nd̤iz̤ɛ ɛsiɬalwɛni sakʰɛ ɓɛnd̤ija kulikǀakǀisa pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ itʲala nd̤iwuz̤alisɛ umlɔmɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤anɛkɔ and̤aɓa ɓɛnd̤ikwaz̤i ukutʰɛtʰa aɓɛja kund̤ipʰɛnd̤ula nɡ̤akɔ nd̤ijikǃɔnd̤ɛ intɔ aɓɛja kujitʰɛtʰa wɔɓamɓana nɡ̤amanɮa amakʰulu haji kɔd̤wa kɛ wɔnd̤iɡ̤ǃ̤ala ɔkɔ ɔtʰɛ tʲɛ uɓɛja kuɓɔnisana najɛ nd̤isind̤ɛ kumɡ̤wɛɓi kupʰɛlɛ jaɓɔna nd̤isinɡ̤a pʰamɓili anɡ̤aɓikʰɔ nanɡ̤asɛmv̤a nd̤inɡ̤amnakani nɡ̤asɛkʰɔɬɔ ɛkusɛɓɛnz̤ɛni kwakʰɛ nd̤inɡ̤amalami kǁa atʲɛkɛla nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ nd̤inɡ̤amɓɔni kuɓa ujajaz̤i inɮɛla ɛnam ɛnd̤ikǀikid̤ilɛ ɓɛnd̤ija kupʰuma nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ uɲawɔ luɓamɓɛ umkʰɔnd̤ɔ wakʰɛ nd̤ajiɡ̤ǀ̤ina inɮɛla jakʰɛ and̤atʰi ɡ̤u ɓukǀala ɛmtʰɛtʰwɛni wɛmilɛɓɛ jɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɛ and̤isukanɡ̤a nd̤iwaɓɛkilɛ amaz̤wi ɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɛ kunɔwam ummisɛlɔ kɛ jɛna nd̤awɛniɲɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤amɓujisajɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ukʰanukilɛ uja kwɛnz̤a ɔkɔ kuɓa uja kukufɛz̤a ɔkɔ nd̤ikumisɛlwɛjɔ z̤ininz̤i kɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛ kujɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nd̤ikʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰iswɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ nd̤akukuɡ̤ǃ̤ala nd̤isuka nd̤inkwantʲɛ nɡ̤ujɛ utʰikǁɔ ujikǃɔɓisilɛ intliz̤ijɔ jam usɔmanɮa und̤ikʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰isilɛ kuɓa and̤ib̤anɡ̤iswanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓumɲama nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓusɔ ɓam ɔɓuɡ̤utʲunɡ̤ɛlwɛ sisitʰɔkɔtʰɔkɔ jini ukuɓa kunɡ̤aɓɛkwa makǁɛʃa nɡ̤usɔmanɮa jini ukuɓa aɓamaz̤ijɔ ɓanɡ̤az̤iɓɔni z̤akʰɛ kuʃɛŋǁiswa imilimanɮɛla kupʰanɡ̤wa imiɬamɓi jaluswɛ kukǃʰutʲwa kumkiwɛ nɛɛsilɛ lɛnkɛd̤ama kuɓand͡ʒ̤iswɛ nɡ̤ɛnkɔmɔ jɔm̤lɔlɔkaz̤i kuɡ̤ilwa amaɬwɛmpu ɛnɮɛlɛni ɓaz̤imɛlɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ aɓaz̤iint͡siz̤ana ɓɛliz̤wɛ kʰanɡ̤ɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amaɛsilɛ asɛnɮɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɓapʰuma nɡ̤ɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i waɓɔ ɓɛfuna intɔ jɔkuɮa iŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsi sisɔnka saɓantwana kuɓɔ ɛsisimini ɓav̤una ukutʲa kwaɓɔ ɓab̤ikikǀɛ ɛsid̤ilijɛni sɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɓalala z̤ɛ ɓɛnɡ̤ɛnanɡ̤uɓɔ aɓanantɔ jɔkuz̤iɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlɛni ɓajanɛtʰa sisipʰanɡ̤ɔ sɛɛntaɓa ɓaŋǀatʰama nɡ̤ɛliwa ɓɛnɡ̤ɛnand̤awɔ jakuz̤imɛla kuɬutʰwa ɛɓɛlɛni iinkɛd̤ama kɔniwɛ aɓaz̤iint͡siz̤ana ɓahamɓa z̤ɛ ɓɛnɡ̤ɛnanɡ̤uɓɔ ɓatʰwala iz̤itʰunɡ̤u ɓɛlamɓilɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛɛnd̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤aɓaja ɓakʰama iɔli ɓakǁɔv̤ula ɛz̤ikǁɔv̤ulɛlwɛni z̤ɛwajini ɓɛŋǁaniwɛ nɔkɔ ɛmiz̤ini kuɡ̤ula amad̤ɔd̤a nɔmpʰɛfumlɔ waɓaŋ̤ǁ̤wɛlɛxiwɛjɔ ujakʰala kanti utʰikǁɔ akatʰi ɓuɓuhilihili nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓɔ ɓaɡ̤wilika ɛkukʰaɲɛni aɓanakwaz̤ana nɛɛnɮɛla z̤akɔ aɓaɬali ɛz̤iŋ̤ǃ̤uʃwini z̤akɔ kusatʰi kǃʰipʰu kuv̤uka isihanɡ̤ɛ siɓulalɛ iint͡siz̤ana namaɬwɛmpu ɛɓusuku siɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsɛla ilisɔ lɔmk͡xɛkǁɛz̤i liɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ uŋ̤ǀ̤walaz̤i utʰi akukʰɔ lisɔ lija kund̤alama aŋǁiɓɛ isiɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤a iz̤inɮu ɛmɲamɛni ɛmini ɓajaz̤iv̤alɛla aɓaz̤ani nɔkukʰaɲa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓumɲama ɔɓutʰɛ ʃiɲi ɓukukuz̤a kɔkusa kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaz̤ana nɔkʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰isɔ lɔɓumɲama ɔɓutʰɛ ʃiɲi ɓajakʰawulɛz̤a pʰɛz̤u kwamanz̤i sit͡ʃab̤isiwɛ isaɓɛlɔ saɓɔ ɛɬaɓatʰini aɓasasinɡ̤i ɛnɮɛlɛni jɛsid̤ilija amanz̤i ɛkʰɛpʰu aɬutʰwa nɡ̤umkǃwɛɓɛd̤u nakukuɓalɛla aɓɔni ɓaɬutʰwa lɛlaɓafilɛjɔ siɓaliɓɛlɛ isiz̤alɔ iimpɛtʰu z̤ijaɓamuɲa aɓaɓi sakʰund͡ʒ̤ulwa ɓapʰulwɛ kɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmtʰi uɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa ɓampʰanɡ̤a kakuɓi ɔluɮɔlɔ ɔnɡ̤az̤alanɡ̤a aɓanɡ̤amɛnz̤ɛlanɡ̤a ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ um̤lɔlɔkaz̤i wɔlula imiɬa jɛɛmɓalasanɛ nɡ̤amanɮa akʰɛ z̤ipʰakamɛ ɓɛz̤isɛ z̤iɓuŋǀamilɛ uɓɔmi uz̤inika inkɔlɔsɛkɔ z̤ajamɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɛ aɓɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnɮɛla z̤az̤ɔ z̤ipʰakamɛ kuɓɛ mz̤uz̤wana z̤inɡ̤aɓikʰɔ z̤itʰɛ ŋ̤ǃ̤u z̤iɓutʰiwɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓaɲɛ ɓɔnkɛ z̤iŋǃaɲulwɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsikʰwɛɓu sɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa ukuɓa akund͡ʒ̤alɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔwɔnd̤ɛnz̤a ɔtʰɛtʰa amanɡ̤a akwɛnz̤ɛ intɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔ ukutʰɛtʰa wasusɛla ub̤ilɛd̤ad̤i wakwaʃuwa watʰi ulawulɔ nɔnkwantʲisɔ lunajɛ wɛnz̤a ukǁɔlɔ ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤ipʰɛz̤ulu inɔkuɓalwa imikʰɔsi jakʰɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤apʰuɲɛlwajɔ kukukʰaɲa kwakʰɛ anɡ̤atʰini ukuɓa lilunɡ̤isa kutʰikǁɔ anɡ̤atʰini ukuɓa nɡ̤ɔkǃakǃamɓilɛjɔ ɔz̤ɛlwɛ nɡ̤umfaz̤i jaɓɔna nɛɲanɡ̤a ajim̤lɔpʰɛ nɛɛnkwɛnkwɛz̤i az̤ikǃakǃamɓilɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ uɓɛkɛ pʰi kɛ impɛtʰu lɛ nɔɲana kaad̤am umɓunɡ̤u lɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula ujɔb̤i watʰi utʰɛni wɛna ukumŋǀɛd̤a ɔnɡ̤ɛnamanɮa nɔkujisind̤isa inɡ̤alɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛnamanɮa utʰɛni ukumkǀɛɓisa ɔnɡ̤ɛnaɓulumkɔ ukumaz̤isa kunɛnɛ intɔ ɛjijɔ ukǁɛlɛlɛ ɓani ukutʰɛtʰa kukupʰɛfumla kukaɓani ɔkupʰumɛ kuwɛ aɓanɡ̤asɛkʰɔjɔ ɓajaz̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤a nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwamanz̤i naɓɛmi ɓawɔ liz̤ɛ ɛlaɓafilɛjɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ ajinasiɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɔ inz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓila ulanɛka iz̤ulu lanɡ̤asɛntla ɛɲaɲɛni akǁʰɔmɛ iɬaɓatʰi pʰɛz̤u kɔkunɡ̤ɛni uɓɔpʰa amanz̤i ɛmafini akʰɛ linɡ̤aɡ̤ǃ̤ab̤uki nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwawɔ uv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤a umpʰamɓili wɛtrɔnɛ anɛkɛ lakʰɛ pʰɛz̤u kwajɔ uz̤unɡ̤ulɛz̤a uɓusɔ ɓamanz̤i nɡ̤ɔmd̤a kusɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kɔkukʰaɲa nɔɓumɲama iint͡sika z̤amaz̤ulu z̤ijaɲɛnɡ̤aɲɛnɡ̤a z̤inɡ̤akʰulumi kukukʰalima kwakʰɛ nɡ̤amanɮa akʰɛ uɡ̤ǁ̤ɔb̤aɡ̤ǁ̤ɔb̤a ulwanɮɛ nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ jakʰɛ ukǃɔɓa urahab̤i nɡ̤ɔmɔja wakʰɛ wɛnz̤a ukuɓa lisɛ iz̤ulu isanɮa sakʰɛ sajiɬaɓa iɲɔka ɛɲɛɓɛlɛz̤ajɔ jaɓɔna nɡ̤amaŋǀam ɛɛnɮɛla z̤akʰɛ lawɔ ijini kɛ int͡sɛɓɛz̤ɔ jɛliz̤wi ɛsijiv̤ajɔ nɡ̤ajɛ kɛ jɔna ind̤ud̤umɔ jɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i jɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓakʰɛ inɡ̤akǃɔnd̤wa nɡ̤uɓani wahamɓisa ujɔb̤i wapʰakamisa umz̤ɛkɛlisɔ wakʰɛ watʰi ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ utʰikǁɔ ɔlisusilɛjɔ iɓanɡ̤ɔ usɔmanɮa ɔwɛnz̤ɛ k͡xak͡xa umpʰɛfumlɔ kuɓa kusɛkum ukupʰɛfumla kɔnkɛ nɔmɔja katʰikǁɔ usɛmatʰatʰɛni umlɔmɔ awutʰɛtʰi ɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa nɔlwimi alukǁɛli nkɔɬisɔ makuɓɛ lɛɛ ukutʰi nijalunɡ̤isa nd̤ɔd̤a nd̤ipʰumɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ nd̤inɡ̤ajisusi iŋ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɔ jam nd̤ɔɓamɓɛlɛla ɛɓulunɡ̤isɛni ɓam and̤iji kuɓujɛka intliz̤ijɔ jam ajiji kuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a ɛz̤iminini z̤am maluɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ut͡ʃaɓa nɔsukɛla pʰɛz̤ulu aɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰajɔ kuɓa lijintɔni itʰɛmɓa lɛnt͡ʃɛmɓɛŋǁa kǁa atʰɛ wawuŋǃumla kǁa atʰɛ wawuxɔla utʰikǁɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wajɔ wɔkuv̤a utʰikǁɔ ukululaɬamɓa kwajɔ kǁa ifikɛlwɛ jimɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ kʰɔna inɔkuz̤ijɔlisa nɡ̤ɔsɔmanɮa inɡ̤amŋǃula utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ nd̤ija kunijala nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sikatʰikǁɔ ɔkunɔsɔmanɮa and̤iji kukukʰaɲɛla jaɓɔnani nɔnkɛ nipʰɛla nɡ̤ɔkwɛnu nikuɓɔnilɛ jini kɛ ukuɓa nitʰɛtʰɛ intɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔ jakɔntɔ sisɔ ɛsi isaɓɛlɔ sɔmntu ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kutʰikǁɔ nɛlifa laɓaz̤iiŋ̤ǃ̤wanɡ̤aŋ̤ǃ̤wili aɓalamkɛlajɔ kusɔmanɮa ukuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓand̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓand̤isɛlwa ik͡xɛlɛ naɓapʰumɛ ɛmɓilinini wakʰɛ aɓaɬutʰi kukutʲa amakǃɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔ akʰɛ aja kuŋ̤ǀ̤watʲwa aɓaɬɔlɔkaz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓanɡ̤alili ukuɓa utʰɛ wafumɓa isiliv̤ɛrɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔtʰuli waz̤ilunɡ̤isɛla iz̤amɓatʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔd̤aka anɡ̤az̤ilunɡ̤isa kɔkɔ z̤ija kwamɓatʰwa lilunɡ̤isa nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ lɛjɔ ɓaɓɛlanɛ nɡ̤ajɔ aɓamsulwa ujakʰa inɮu jakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnund̤u nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛpʰɛmpɛ ɛlɛnz̤iwɛ jimɓɔnisɛli ulala pʰant͡si ɛsisitʲɛɓi akapʰind̤i uv̤ula amɛɬɔ akʰɛ anɡ̤aɓikʰɔ kumtʰaɓatʰa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amanz̤i ukukʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰a simɓɛ ɛɓusuku isakǃʰwitʰi lujamfukula ulɔpʰu lwasɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɛmkɛ lumkǃwɛkǃwɛd̤isɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ utʰikǁɔ umɡ̤iɓisɛla anɡ̤amkǀɔnɡ̤i usiɓalɛka asiɓalɛkɛ isanɮa sakʰɛ ɓamtʰʲwak͡xaz̤ɛla iz̤anɮa ɓamɛnz̤ɛlɛ umsɔnɮɔ ɛmkɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ kuɓa kukʰɔ apʰɔ ipʰuma kʰɔna isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛnd̤awɔ jɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ aɓajiɬuz̤ajɔ isiɲitʰi sitʰatʲatʰwa ɛlutʰulini ɓaɲiɓilikisa amatʲɛ aɓɛ lub̤ɛd̤u ɓapʰɛlisa uɓumɲama ɓɛb̤ɛkisa ɛz̤ipʰɛlwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɓɛɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀɛla amatʲɛ asɛsitʰɔkɔtʰɔkwɛni nawasɛɓumɲamɛni ɔɓutʰɛ ʃiɲi ɓɛmɓa umŋ̤ǁ̤uma kud̤ɛ kwaɓɛmijɔ ɓɛlitʲɛlwɛ luɲawɔ lwaɓahamɓi ɓakǁʰɔmɛkilɛ ɓɛkud̤ɛ naɓantu ɓajad͡ʒ̤inɡ̤a um̤laɓakupʰuma ukutʲa kuwɔ umz̤ant͡si wawɔ ub̤ukukǃwa nɡ̤atʰi nɡ̤umlilɔ ind̤awɔ jɛsafirɛ nɡ̤amatʲɛ awɔ amaɡ̤ad̤a ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ akujɔ jiŋ̤ǃ̤uʃu ɛnɡ̤az̤iwa kǁʰalanɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤atʰiwanɡ̤a nz̤ɔ lisɔ lantlɔjija ɛnɡ̤aɲatʰɛlwanɡ̤a tʰɔlɛ laɲamakaz̤i iɲalasajɔ ɛnɡ̤ahand͡ʒ̤wanɡ̤a najinɡ̤ɔɲama usa isanɮa sakʰɛ nakwikǃʰwitʰa uz̤ib̤ukukǃa ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤and͡ʒ̤ini iintaɓa uɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤a imid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ ɛmawɛni liɓɔna z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋǃaɓilɛjɔ ilisɔ lakʰɛ uv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤a imilamɓɔ inɡ̤av̤uz̤i ɔkufiɬakɛlɛjɔ akukʰupʰɛlɛ ɛm̤lɔt͡ʃɛni kɛ ɓɔna uɓulumkɔ ɓufuɲanwa pʰi ipʰi ind̤awɔ jɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ akalaz̤i ikǁaɓisɔ laɓɔ aɓufuɲanwa ɛz̤wɛni laɓaɬɛlijɔ amanz̤i ɛnz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓila atʰi aɓukum ulwanɮɛ lutʰi aɓunam akuxɔlwa ɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ itʰɛ ʃiɲi ɛsikʰunɮɛni saɓɔ akulinɡ̤aniswa siliv̤ɛrɛ iɓɛ jintɛnɡ̤ɔ jaɓɔ aɓumɛlwa jiɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛkǀikiz̤ɛkilɛjɔ jakwaɔfirɛ nɛsard̤ɔnisi ɛŋǃaɓilɛjɔ nɛsafirɛ az̤inakulinɡ̤ana naɓɔ iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛɡ̤ilas aɓunakwananana nɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛnɡ̤iwɛjɔ z̤inɡ̤asakʰund͡ʒ̤ulwa iikɔralɛ nɛɛk͡xistalɛ ukuz̤uz̤wa kɔɓulumkɔ kupʰɛz̤u kwɛɛpɛrilɛ ajinakulinɡ̤ana naɓɔ itɔpaz̤i jakwakuʃi aɓumɛlwa jiɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛkǀikiz̤ɛkilɛjɔ ɛkǀɔkǀɛkilɛjɔ uɓulumkɔ ɓuv̤ɛla pʰi kɛ jijipʰi ind̤awɔ jɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ ɓufiɬakɛlɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ ɓusitʰakɛlɛ nasɛz̤intakɛni z̤asɛz̤ulwini inz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓila nɔkufa kutʰi siɓuv̤ilɛ ukuɓuv̤a nɡ̤ɛnɮɛɓɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ɔjikǃɔnd̤ajɔ inɮɛla jaɓɔ nɡ̤ujɛ ɔjaz̤ijɔ ind̤awɔ jaɓɔ kuɓa jɛna ub̤ɛka ɛz̤ipʰɛlwɛni z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi uɓɔna pʰant͡si kwamaz̤ulu ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuwɛnz̤ɛla umɔja uɓunz̤ima ɓawɔ namanz̤i awalinɡ̤anisɛ nɡ̤ɔmlinɡ̤anisɔ ɛkujɛnz̤ɛlɛni kwakʰɛ imv̤ula ummisɛlɔ nɔmɓanɛ wɛnd̤ud̤umɔ inɮɛla waz̤a waɓuɓɔna waɓuɓala waɓumisa waɓuɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀa nɔkuɓuɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀa watʰi ɛmntwini jaɓɔna ukɔjika inkɔsi ɓuɓulumkɔ ɔɓɔ nɔkutʲɛka ɛɓuɓini kujiŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ wahamɓisa ujɔb̤i ukupʰakamisa umz̤ɛkɛlisɔ wakʰɛ watʰi jɔɔ and̤aɓa ɓɛnd̤inɛɛɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤apʰamɓili nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmiɬa aɓɛnd̤iɡ̤ǀ̤inilɛ utʰikǁɔ kǁa ukukʰaɲa kwɛsiɓanɛ sakʰɛ ɓɛkupʰɛz̤u kwɛntlɔkɔ jam kǁa nɡ̤ɔkukʰaɲa kwakʰɛ ɓɛnd̤iɓuhamɓa uɓumɲama nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓɛnd̤ind͡ʒ̤alɔ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jam jɔkwinɮa ɔkɔ ukukǀwɛja kukatʰikǁɔ ɓɛkupʰɛz̤u kwɛntɛntɛ jam ɔkɔ usɔmanɮa ɛɓɛsɛnam ɓɛnɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ aɓantwana ɓam ɔkɔ ɛɓɛɬand͡ʒ̤wa amaɓanɡ̤a nɡ̤amasi iliwa lind̤itʰululɛla imid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ jɛɔli kǁa ɛkupʰumɛni nɡ̤ɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɓɛnd̤iɲuka ukuja kuwɔ umz̤i nd̤imisɛ isiɬalɔ ɛnd̤awɛni jɛmɓutʰɔ and̤iɓɔna amad̤ɔd̤ana az̤imɛla asuka amakǁʰɛɡ̤ɔ ɛma aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakujɛka ukukʰuluma ɓaɓɛka isanɮa ɛmlɔɲɛni iliz̤wi lɛɛnɡ̤anɡ̤a laz̤imɛla nɔlwimi lwaz̤ɔ lwanamatʰɛla ɛkʰuɬanɡ̤uɓɛni az̤ɔ kuɓa inɮɛɓɛ jɛv̤a jatʰi nd̤inɔjɔlɔ ilisɔ laɓɔna land̤iŋ̤ǃ̤inɛla kuɓa ɓɛnd̤isiz̤a iint͡siz̤ana ɛz̤iz̤iɓikajɔ nɛɛnkɛd̤ama nɔswɛlɛ umŋǀɛd̤i int͡sikɛlɛlɔ jaɓad̤akajɔ iɓind̤iz̤ɛla nɛntliz̤ijɔ jɔm̤lɔlɔkaz̤i ɓɛnd̤ijimɛmɛlɛlisa uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓɛnd̤iɓamɓatʰa ɓund̤amɓatʰɛ lwaɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jɔkwalɛka nɔnkɔnt͡ʃɔ uɡ̤wɛɓɔ ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤amɛɬɔ ɓɛnd̤iz̤iiɲawɔ kwisikǃʰwala ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤ujisɛ kumaɬwɛmpu nɛtʲala lɛnd̤inɡ̤aɓaz̤ijɔ ɓɛnd̤iliɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀa ɓɛnd̤iwapʰula amaɓamɓa ɔɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰajɔ ɓɛnd̤ilikʰupʰa ɛmaz̤iɲwɛni akʰɛ ikǁʰɔɓa nd̤atʰi kɛ nd̤ija kupʰuma umpʰɛfumlɔ kuɲɛ nɛnɮu jam nd̤ijand̤isɛ imiɬa jam nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntaka ɛnɡ̤afijɔ iŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu jam ija kuv̤ulɛlwa amanz̤i ulalɛ umɓɛtʰɛ ɛmasɛɓɛni uz̤ukɔ luja kuɬala lulut͡ʃa siɬaz̤ijɛkɛ isapʰɛtʰa ɛsanɮɛni ɓaɓɛnd̤ipʰulapʰula ɓalind̤ɛlɛ ɓatʰi ɛkǀɛɓɛni ɛmv̤a kwɛliz̤wi ɓaɓɛnɡ̤apʰind̤i ɓatʰɛtʰɛ kuɓakǀʰapʰaz̤ɛlɛ ukukʰuluma ɓaɓɛnd̤ilind̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmv̤ula imilɔmɔ jaɓɔ ɓajakʰamisɛlɛ ɛjasɛkwinɮa ɓɛnd̤iɓaŋǀumɛla ɓɛŋǀamilɛ ukukʰaɲa kɔɓusɔ ɓam ɓanɡ̤akusanɡ̤anisi ɓɛnd̤iɓaɲulɛla inɮɛla nd̤iɬalɛ nd̤ijintlɔkɔ ɓɛnd̤iɬala nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkumkani pʰakatʰi kɔmkʰɔsi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔtʰutʰuz̤ɛla aɓɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili kunɡ̤ɔku ɓajand̤iɬɛka aɓaŋǀinanɛ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa aɓajisɛ ɓaɓɔ nd̤iɓɛ nd̤ikǀɛkisa nɔkuɓaɓɛka nɛz̤ind͡ʒ̤a z̤ɔm̤lamɓi kʰɔna aɓɛnɡ̤aɓa nɡ̤awantɔni amanɮa ɛz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ aɓapʰɛlɛlwɛ nɡ̤amanɮa ɓatʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuswɛla nɔkulamɓa ɓaŋǃina aɓɔ ɓaŋǃaɓi ɓɔmkǃwɛɓɛd̤u ɓɔɓumɲama ɓɛnt͡ʃaɓalala jakwant͡ʃaɓalala aɓɔ ɓakǃʰawula imɓuwa ɛmatʰʲɔlwɛni aɓasɔnka sijiŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu jɔnwɛlɛ ɓajaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰwa pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu ɓaɬatʲɛlwa umkʰɔsi nɡ̤atʰi nɡ̤amasɛla ɓaɬalɛ ɛz̤iɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤aŋ̤ǀ̤az̤ɛlisajɔ ɛmiŋ̤ǁ̤uɲɛni jɔm̤laɓa nasɛmawɛni ɓab̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤a pʰakatʰi kwamatʰʲɔlɔ ɓafumɓalala pʰant͡si kwamaxawu ɓɛnɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓɛz̤id̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ kwanɔɔɲana ɓaɓanɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤ama aɓaɓɛtʰwa ɓɛmkɛ ɛz̤wɛni kunɡ̤ɔku nd̤ijinɡ̤ɔma jaɓɔ nd̤aɓa kukukʰuluma kwaɓɔ nd̤ilisikiz̤i kuɓɔ ɓakud̤ɛ aɓawaŋǃand̤i amatʰɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓam kuɓa ulukǀɔmɓululɛ utʰamɓɔ wand̤ikǀinɛz̤ɛla ɓawujɛka umkʰala pʰamɓi nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ kupʰakama uɓuv̤uv̤ana ɓatʰʲala iiɲawɔ z̤am ɓand̤ifumɓɛlɛ umɛnd̤ɔ waɓɔ wɔkusind̤ɛka ɓajɛnz̤a amaɡ̤ǃ̤aɡ̤ala inɮɛla jam ɓaŋǀɛd̤isa ukwɛjɛla aɓanɡ̤ɛnamŋǀɛd̤i ukuz̤a kwaɓɔ nɡ̤atʰi ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤a itʰuɓa ɛliɓanz̤i ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni ɓaɡ̤alɛlɛka nɔkutʰi ɡ̤ɔlɔkɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔ kwalɔ kuɡ̤ukǃukɛlɛ ukukʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰isa kuɓusukɛla uɓunɛnɛ ɓam nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɔja kuɮulɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlifu ukusind̤iswa kunɡ̤ɔku uz̤ipʰalaz̤ɛla pʰakatʰi umpʰɛfumlɔ ind̤iɓamɓilɛ imiɬa jɛɛnt͡siz̤i uɓusuku ɓupʰɛɬa amatʰamɓɔ akǃʰiwukɛ iintlunɡ̤u ɛz̤ind̤iɮajɔ az̤ipʰɛli nɡ̤ɔɓukʰulu ɓamanɮa siz̤ɛnz̤ɛ sasisimɓi isamɓatʰɔ sitʰɛ ŋǀa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmkǃala wɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jam janɡ̤apʰant͡si und̤id͡ʒ̤ulɛlɛ ɛlud̤akɛni nd̤afana nɔtʰuli nɔtʰutʰu nd̤ijaz̤iɓika kuwɛ unɡ̤asaɓɛli nd̤isuka nd̤imɛ und̤id͡ʒ̤ɔnɡ̤ɛ uz̤ɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤ɔxa und̤it͡ʃut͡ʃisa nɡ̤amanɮa ɛsanɮa sakʰɔ und̤ifukulɛla ɛmɔjɛni und̤ikʰwɛlisa kuwɔ und̤ib̤anɡ̤isɛ nɔkuz̤ɔnɡ̤ɔma kwawɔ kuɓa nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa uja kund̤iɓujisɛla ɛkufɛni ɛnɮwini jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana kwaɓapʰililɛjɔ ɓɔnkɛ kɔd̤wa ɛkutʰini b̤uma akɔluli sanɮa az̤iɓikɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ɛliʃwɛni lakʰɛ kʰɔna and̤imlilɛlanɡ̤a jini ɔmini z̤inɔɓuɓi uɓunɡ̤ɛnalusiz̤i umpʰɛfumlɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɬwɛmpu kuɓa nd̤atʰɛmɓa ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kwɛz̤a ɔkuɓi nd̤alind̤a ukukʰaɲa kwɛz̤a isitʰɔkɔtʰɔkɔ amatʰumɓu aɓila akajɛka jand̤iɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a imiɬa jɛɛnt͡siz̤i nd̤ahamɓa nd̤inɛz̤imɲama z̤ɔkuz̤ila akwaɓakʰɔ lanɡ̤a nd̤apʰakama ɛɓanɮɛni nd̤az̤iɓika nd̤inɡ̤umz̤alwana wɛɛmpunɡ̤utʲɛ nɔmlinɡ̤anɛ wɛɛŋǀiniɓa ulusu lujaɮub̤uka lumɲama namatʰamɓɔ at͡ʃilɛ kukɔma uhad̤i lwaɓa sisid͡ʒ̤wili uɡ̤wali lwaɓa liliz̤wi laɓalilajɔ nd̤iwamisɛlɛ amɛɬɔ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nd̤inɡ̤atʰini ukukǃwalasɛla ɛntɔmɓini ɓɛsija kuɓa jini isaɬulɛlɔ sikatʰikǁɔ ɛsiv̤ɛla pʰɛz̤ulu nɛlifa lɔsɔmanɮa ɛliv̤ɛla ɛz̤ind̤awɛni ɛz̤ipʰakamilɛjɔ ukusind̤ɛka asikɔkɔɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰajɔ jini nɛʃwanɡ̤uʃa asilɛlaɓɛnz̤i ɓɔɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a jini akaz̤iɓɔni jɛna iinɮɛla z̤am awaɓalɛ ɔnkɛ amaɓanɡ̤a ukuɓa nd̤iɓɛ nd̤ihamɓa nɔkʰɔɬakɛlɛjɔ lwaŋ̤ǁ̤amɛla inkɔɬisɔ uɲawɔ makand̤ilinɡ̤anisɛ ɛsikalini sɔɓulunɡ̤isa akwaz̤i utʰikǁɔ ukuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛla ukuɓa ɛɓɛtʰɛ ɡ̤u ɓukǀala amaɓanɡ̤a ɛnɮɛlɛni jaland̤ɛla amɛɬɔ intliz̤ijɔ jam sanamatʰɛla isisiɬa ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤am mand̤iɬwajɛlɛ kuɮɛ ɔmɲɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu z̤aɓapʰumɛ z̤iŋǀɔtʰulwɛ ukuɓa iɓihɛnd̤ɛkilɛ intliz̤ijɔ jam nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmkamntu nd̤alalɛla ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔmmɛlwanɛ umkam makasilɛlɛ ɔmɲɛ kuɡ̤ukǃɛ aɓaɲɛ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ kuɓa lɔɔ ntɔ ɓuɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wixa lɔɔ ntɔ ɓuɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa pʰamɓi kwaɓaɡ̤wɛɓi inɛnɛ lɔɔ ntɔ nɡ̤umlilɔ ɔɮa usɛ ɛnz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓilɛni iɓija kuŋǀɔtʰula iiŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu z̤ɔnɡ̤ɛnisɛlɔ lɔnkɛ ukuɓa nd̤iɓɛ nd̤ilaɬɛ ilunɡ̤ɛlɔ lɔmkʰɔnz̤i nɛlɔmkʰɔnz̤az̤ana ɓakuɓamɓana ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤atʰini ukwɛnz̤a kǁa atʰɛ utʰikǁɔ wɛsuka wapʰakama kǁa atʰɛ wav̤ɛla ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤atʰini ukupʰɛnd̤ula ɔwand̤ɛnz̤ajɔ ɛz̤iɓilinini akamɛnz̤anɡ̤a najɛ ɔwasimilisa ɛsiz̤alwɛni akamɲɛ ukuɓa nd̤iɓɛ nd̤isala naɓakuŋ̤ǁ̤amɛlɛjɔ aɓaswɛlɛjɔ nd̤awapʰɛlisa amɛɬɔ ɔm̤lɔlɔkaz̤i nd̤awuɮa nd̤ɛd̤wa umtʰamɔ ajaɮa inkɛd̤ama kuwɔ haji ɓɔ kwasɛɓuŋǀinanɛni ɓam inkɛd̤ama jakʰulɛla nɡ̤atʰi ikujisɛ nd̤amalatʰisa um̤lɔlɔkaz̤i nasɛsiz̤alwɛni ukuɓa nd̤iɓɛ nd̤imɓɔna ɔt͡ʃaɓalalajɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛnantɔ jɔkwamɓatʰa iɬwɛmpu linɡ̤ɛnantɔ jɔkuz̤iɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla ukuɓa aɓɛnɡ̤and̤isikɛlɛli amaŋǃɛ akʰɛ akaz̤ifud̤umɛz̤a nɡ̤ɔɓɔja ɓɛɛmv̤ana z̤am ukuɓa ɓɛnd̤ilinɡ̤isilɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa kwinkɛd̤ama nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛnd̤iɓɔnɛ uŋǀɛd̤ɔ ɛsanɡ̤wɛni iɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓa maliwɛ ɛsikǁʰantini salɔ nɔmkʰɔnɔ wapʰukɛ ɛtʰand͡ʒ̤ɛni lawɔ ɓɛkuja kuɓa ukunkwantʲa ukusind̤ɛka nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ nd̤ikʰɔɬwɛ pʰamɓi kɔkupʰakama kwakʰɛ ukuɓa ɓɛnd̤ɛnz̤ɛ iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ iŋǃɔlɔŋǀi jam nd̤atʰi kwɛkǀikiz̤ɛkilɛjɔ nkɔlɔsɛkɔ jam ukuɓa ɓɛnd̤ikuv̤ujɛla ukuɓa ɓuninz̤i kɔɓutʲɛɓi ɓam nɔkufumana kakʰulu kwɛsanɮa ukuɓa ɓɛnd̤iliɓɔna ilanɡ̤a likʰupʰa imitʰa nɛɲanɡ̤a ihamɓa ind̤ilɛkilɛ jahɛnd̤ɛka nɡ̤asɛsɛ intliz̤ijɔ jam nd̤asanɡ̤ɛla nɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ isanɮa nakɔ ɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛkuɓa ɓuɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa pʰamɓi kwaɓaɡ̤wɛɓi kuɓa nɡ̤ɛnd̤iɓa nd̤imkʰaɲɛlɛ utʰikǁɔ wapʰɛz̤ulu ukuɓa nd̤iɓɛ nd̤iv̤ujɛla iliʃwa lɔnd̤itʰijajɔ nd̤akǁʰumɛla ukuɓa ɛfuɲɛnwɛ ɓuɓuɓi kɛ and̤iliv̤umɛlanɡ̤a ikʰuɬanɡ̤uɓɔ ukuɓa lɔnɛ nd̤iwukǀɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛnt͡ʃwaɓulɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ukuɓa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤at͡ʃɔ aɓantu ɓɛntɛntɛ jam ukutʰi anɡ̤aɓa nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤aɬutʰanɡ̤a jiɲama jakʰɛ uɓɛnɡ̤alali pʰanɮɛ umpʰamɓukɛli iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤am ɓɛnd̤iz̤iv̤ulɛla ɛnɮɛlɛni ukuɓa ɓɛnd̤iluɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla uk͡xɛkǃɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔad̤am nɡ̤ɔkukǃʰuʃɛka uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓam ɛsifuɓɛni nɡ̤akuɓa ɓɛnd̤iŋ̤ǀ̤aŋ̤ǀ̤az̤ɛla pʰamɓi kwɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ ɛninz̤i nd̤akǃʰipʰuka umɓilini kukud̤ɛlwa jimiz̤alwanɛ nd̤atʰi kǀwaka and̤apʰuma ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ and̤aɓa ɓɛnd̤inɔnd̤ipʰulapʰulajɔ nanɡ̤u umkǃɔnd̤isɔ usɔmanɮa makand̤ipʰɛnd̤ulɛ nant͡si iŋǀwad̤i ajib̤alilɛjɔ ɔɓamɓɛnɛ inɛnɛ nd̤ɔjitʰwala nɡ̤ɛsikǁʰanti nd̤ɔjitʰi d͡ʒ̤iz̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsit͡sʰaɓa inani lamaɓanɡ̤a nd̤ɔmkǁɛlɛla nd̤imsɔnd̤ɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤anɡ̤a ukuɓa um̤laɓa uɓukʰala nd̤im nɛmikǃɛla jawɔ jalila kuɲɛ nawɔ ukuɓa ɓɛnd̤iwaɮa amanɮa awɔ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ nd̤aɓanɡ̤a ukuɓa upʰumɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wɔmniniwɔ makupʰumɛ amakʰakakʰaka ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɔkʰula ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɛxasi aɡ̤ǃ̤itʲiwɛ amaz̤wi kajɔb̤i ajɛka lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a ɔmatʰatʰu ukumpʰɛnd̤ula ujɔb̤i kuɓa uɓɛlilunɡ̤isa ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ wav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ kaɛlihu uɲana kab̤arakɛli wakwab̤uz̤i ɔwɛmiz̤alwanɛ jakwaram wav̤utʰa kujɔb̤i umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɛla nɡ̤ɔkwakʰɛ kunɔtʰikǁɔ wav̤utʰa kuɓaɬɔɓɔ ɓakʰɛ aɓatʰatʰu umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɓɛnɡ̤afumananɡ̤a kumpʰɛnd̤ula pʰɔfu ɓɛmɡ̤wɛɓilɛ ujɔb̤i kɛ kalɔku uɛlihu uɓɛsalind̤isilɛ kujɔb̤i nɡ̤amaz̤wi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛɓad̤ala kunajɛ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa waɓɔna uɛlihu ukuɓa akukʰɔ mpɛnd̤ulɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni walɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a matʰatʰu wav̤utʰa kɛ umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ wasusɛla uɛlihu uɲana kab̤arakɛli wakwab̤uz̤i watʰi nd̤imŋǀinanɛ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kɛ niz̤iinɡ̤wɛv̤u nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nd̤akʰwɛlɛla pʰaja nd̤ɔjika ukunitʲɛla ukwaz̤i nd̤atʰi imiɬa majitʰɛtʰɛ imiɲaka ɛmininz̤i jaz̤isɛ uɓulumkɔ nɔkɔ nɡ̤umɔja ɔsɛmntwini nɔkupʰɛfumla kukasɔmanɮa ɔkuɓakǃɔnd̤isajɔ ukulumka akunaɓakʰulu ukukǃɔnd̤a ɔkufanɛlɛjɔ akunamad̤ɔd̤a makʰulu ɔd̤wa nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ nd̤itʰi pʰulapʰula nd̤ɔkutʲɛla ukwaz̤i jaɓɔnani ɓɛnd̤iwalind̤ilɛ amaz̤wi ɛnu nd̤akuɓɛkɛla inɮɛɓɛ ukukǃɔnd̤a kwɛnu nad̤a naɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀa ukutʰɛtʰa nd̤aniɡ̤ǃ̤ala kakuɬɛ jaɓɔnani akukʰɔ namɲɛ umɔɬwajilɛjɔ ujɔb̤i wawapʰɛnd̤ula amaz̤wi akʰɛ ɬɛz̤ɛ niɓɛ nitʰi siɓufumɛnɛ uɓulumkɔ utʰikǁɔ ujampʰɛpʰɛtʰa asinɡ̤umntu kɛ akakub̤ɛkisanɡ̤a ukutʰɛtʰa and̤iji kumpʰɛnd̤ula nɡ̤amaz̤wi ɛnu ɓakǃʰipʰukɛ umɓilini aɓasapʰɛnd̤uli ɓapʰɛlɛlwɛ kukutʰɛtʰa kʰɛ nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ kuɬɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛnɡ̤atʰɛtʰi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛmi ɓɛnɡ̤asapʰɛnd̤uli nd̤ija kupʰɛnd̤ula ɔkwam nd̤ikǁɛlɛ ukwaz̤i kuɓa nd̤iz̤ɛlɛ kukutʰɛtʰa und̤ikǀutʰilɛ umɔja wɛmɓilini jam nijaɓɔna imɓilini jam ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛwajini ɛnɡ̤av̤ulɛlwanɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnt͡suɓa ɛz̤int͡ʃa iz̤a kuɡ̤ǃ̤ab̤uka nd̤ija kutʰɛtʰa ukuz̤ɛ nd̤ipʰɛfumlɛ nd̤ija kuwuv̤ula umlɔmɔ nd̤ipʰɛnd̤ulɛ mand̤inɡ̤akʰɛ nd̤inɔnɛlɛlɛ nd̤inɡ̤akʰɛ nd̤itɛkɛtisɛ kuɓa and̤ikwaz̤i ukutɛkɛtisa uɓɛja kund̤isusa umɛnz̤i kɔd̤wa kʰawukuv̤ɛ jɔb̤i ukutʰɛtʰa uwaɓɛkɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ amaz̤wi ɔnkɛ kʰawuɓɔnɛ nd̤iwuv̤ulilɛ umlɔmɔ lujatʰɛtʰa ɛkʰuɬanɡ̤uɓɛni akukutʰi tʲɛ kwɛntliz̤ijɔ jam amaz̤wi ukwaz̤i kɔmlɔmɔ akutʰɛtʰa kaɲulu umɔja katʰikǁɔ wand̤ɛnz̤a nɔkupʰɛfumla kukasɔmanɮa kund̤iɮisɛ uɓɔmi ukuɓa unakɔ nd̤ipʰɛnd̤ulɛ jakʰa uluɬu amaz̤wi pʰamɓi ujaɓɔna nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɛ nd̤inɡ̤ɔkatʰikǁɔ nd̤akǀat͡ʃulwa ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤wɛni jaɓɔna ukɔtʰusa akuji kukud̤and̤atʰɛkisa nɔkuʃikǀilɛla akuji kuɓa nz̤ima pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ ɔkunɛnɛ utʰɛtʰɛ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤am nd̤aliv̤a iliz̤wi lɔkukʰuluma lisitʰi nd̤ikǃakǃamɓilɛ and̤inaluk͡xɛkǃɔ nd̤iɡ̤ukǁiwɛ and̤inaɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa jaɓɔna iz̤iz̤ɛkaɓani z̤ɔkutʰiɓana utʰi nd̤ilut͡ʃaɓa lwakʰɛ uz̤ifaka iiɲawɔ z̤am ɛsitɔkisini uwulinɡ̤a wɔnkɛ umɛnd̤ɔ jaɓɔna akulunɡ̤isi nɡ̤alɔɔ ntɔ nd̤ɔkupʰɛnd̤ula kuɓa utʰikǁɔ jɛna mkʰulu kunɔmntu jini ukuɓa uɓamɓanɛ najɛ kuɓa ɛnɡ̤apʰɛnd̤uli nɡ̤ɛɛnd̤awɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ kanti haji nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɛɲɛ utʰikǁɔ ujatʰɛtʰa nanɡ̤ɛz̤imɓini kɛ akukʰatʰalwa ɛpʰupʰɛni ɛmɓɔnwɛni wasɛɓusuku ɓakuwɛlwa ɓuɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ ɔɓukʰulu aɓantu ɛkɔz̤ɛlɛni ɛlukʰukwɛni uz̤itʰʲila ɔkɔ iinɮɛɓɛ z̤aɓantu akutʲwinɛ akuv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ɛ ukutʰɛtʰiswa kwaɓɔ ukuz̤ɛ amtʰintɛ ɛkwɛnz̤ɛni intɔ aɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɛ ukǃʰaŋ̰ǃ̰alaz̤ɔ lɔmfɔ awuŋǃand̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ɛsihɔɡ̤wɛni nɔɓɔmi ɓakʰɛ ɓunɡ̤aɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛli ɛmkʰɔntwɛni wɔɬwajwa nɡ̤umv̤and̤ɛd̤wa ɛsililini sakʰɛ najimfaz̤wɛ ɛsimakad̤ɛ ɛmatʰand͡ʒ̤ɛni akʰɛ uɓɔmi ɓakʰɛ ɓukwalɛ ukuɮa nɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ walɛ ukuɮa ɔkuŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ ijaɮɛka iɲama jakʰɛ inɡ̤aɓɔnakali av̤ɛlɛ amatʰamɓɔ akʰɛ aɓɛnɡ̤aɓɔnakali ujasɔnd̤ɛla kɛ ɛsihɔɡ̤wɛni umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ nɔɓɔmi ɓakʰɛ kuɓaɓulali ukuɓa kɛ kutʰɛ kwakʰɔ isitʰuɲwa sɛz̤ulu ɛsimlamlɛlajɔ nɔkɔ sisiɲɛ ɛwakɛni sɔkumkǁɛlɛla ɔkumfanɛlɛjɔ wɔmɓaɓala atʰi mkʰululɛ anɡ̤ɛɬi ajɛ ɛsihɔɡ̤wɛni kuɓa nd̤ilufumɛnɛ ukǀamaɡ̤uʃɔ isuka iɓɛ nɛntlaɬa iɲama jakʰɛ uɓujɛla ɛmiɬɛni jɔɓud̤ɔd̤ana ɓakʰɛ utʰand̤az̤a kutʰikǁɔ akʰɔliswɛ jɛna nɡ̤ujɛ aɓuɓɔnɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ ɛd̤uma jɛna amɓujɛkɛz̤ɛ kɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɛ lɔ uv̤uma ɛɓantwini atʰi ɓɛnd̤ɔnilɛ nd̤akuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ akwalinɡ̤anisɛlwa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nɔkɔ uwukʰululɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ ukuɓa unɡ̤aɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛli ɛsihɔɡ̤wɛni nɔɓɔmi ɓam ɓɔkuɓɔna ukukʰaɲa jaɓɔna ɔkɔ kɔnkɛ ujakwɛnz̤a utʰikǁɔ iz̤iɬand̤ɔ ɛz̤iɓini nɛz̤itʰatʰu kumfɔ ukuɓa aɓujisɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ɛsihɔɡ̤wɛni ukʰaɲɛ nɡ̤ɔkukʰaɲa kɔɓɔmi ɓaz̤a inɮɛɓɛ jɔb̤i pʰulapʰula jitʰi nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ kɛ ukuɓa unɔkutʰɛtʰa nd̤ipʰɛnd̤ulɛ tʰɛtʰa kuɓa nd̤ifuna ukukuɡ̤wɛɓɛla ukuɓa akukʰɔ pʰulapʰula wɛna jitʰi nd̤ikufund̤isɛ uɓulumkɔ wasusɛla uɛlihu watʰi jiv̤ani z̤ilumkɔ ukutʰɛtʰa nina z̤az̤i nd̤iɓɛkɛlɛni inɮɛɓɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɮɛɓɛ ijakukǀikid̤a ukutʰɛtʰa ikʰuɬanɡ̤uɓɔ lijakuv̤a ukuɮa masiz̤iɲulɛlɛ ɔkusɛsikwɛni sikwaz̤i pʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰɛ ujɔb̤i nd̤ililunɡ̤isa utʰikǁɔ ulisusilɛ iɓanɡ̤ɔ kutʰiwa nd̤ijakǁɔka nɔkɔ likʰɔjɔ iɓanɡ̤ɔ lijaɓulala iŋǁɛɓa lɔtɔlɔ nɔkɔ nd̤inɡ̤ɛnaluk͡xɛkǃɔ upʰi umfɔ ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔjɔb̤i jɛna ukusɛlajɔ ukuɡ̤ǀ̤ula nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amanz̤i atʰɛlɛlɛ kuɓɛnz̤i ɓɔɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a ahamɓɛ namad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kuɓa ɛsitʰi akaŋǀɛd̤ɛki umfɔ nɡ̤ɔkukʰɔlana nɔtʰikǁɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ mad̤ɔd̤a ɔkukǃɔnd̤a pʰulapʰulani makuɓɛ lɛɛ kutʰikǁɔ ukuɓa nɡ̤ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kusɔmanɮa ukuɓa aɓɛ nɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa kɛ ukwɛnz̤a kɔmntu ukuɓujɛkɛz̤a kujɛ amfumanisɛ umfɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛhamɓɔ jakʰɛ haji ɓɔ utʰikǁɔ akɛnz̤i nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ usɔmanɮa akakuɡ̤wɛŋǁi ɔkusɛsikwɛni nɡ̤uɓani ɔmpʰatʰisɛ iɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤uɓani ɔmisɛ ɛlimiwɛjɔ lɔnkɛ ukuɓa uɓɛb̤ɛkisɛ kujɛ nɡ̤ɔkwakʰɛ jɛd̤wa wawuɬanɡ̤anisɛla kujɛ umɔja wakʰɛ nɔkupʰɛfumla kwakʰɛ iɓija kupʰuma umpʰɛfumlɔ iɲama jɔnkɛ kuɲɛ umntu aɓujɛlɛ ɛlutʰulini wanɡ̤a unɡ̤akukǃɔnd̤a unɡ̤akuv̤a ɔku uliɓɛkɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ iz̤wi lɔkutʰɛtʰa kanɛnɛ ɔtʰijɛ ɔkusɛsikwɛni uɓɛnɡ̤apʰatʰa nɡ̤ɔɓukʰɔsi jini kʰɔna usɔɓulunɡ̤isa wɔmɡ̤wɛɓa kunɡ̤atʰiwa t͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔnd̤ini nakumanɛnɛ z̤intɔnd̤ini z̤inɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kanɡ̤akanani kɛ kɔnɡ̤aɓanɔnɛlɛlijɔ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɔnɡ̤anɔnɛlɛli z̤inɔnɡ̤ɔnɔnɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓaswɛlɛjɔ kuɓa ɓanɡ̤umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ ɓɔna ɓɔnkɛ ɓafa nɡ̤ɛpʰaɲaz̤ɔ pʰakatʰi kɔɓusuku ɓajahɛkǁiswa aɓantu ɓaɮulɛ z̤isuswɛ iimɓalasanɛ kunɡ̤ɛnɡ̤asanɮa kuɓa amɛɬɔ akʰɛ apʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnɮɛla z̤ɔmntu ujawaɓɔna ɔnkɛ amaɓanɡ̤a akʰɛ akukʰɔ ɓumɲama akukʰɔ tʰunz̤i ukuɓa ɓasitʰɛlɛ kulɔ aɓɛnz̤i ɓɔɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akaz̤ɛkɛlɛli ukumŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a ukuz̤ɛ ɛz̤ɛ ɛmatʲalɛni nɔtʰikǁɔ ujaɓaʃwakǃa aɓaz̤iiɲatʰi ɛnɡ̤aɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀanɡ̤a amisɛ kɛ aɓaɲɛ ɛsikʰunɮɛni saɓɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ujaz̤az̤i iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ aɓab̤ukukǃɛ ɛɓusuku ɓatʲumkɛ ujaɓamɔŋǁɔz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɛnd̤awɛni jaɓaɓɔnɛli ɛkunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuz̤ɛ kuɓɛkʰɔ ɔkɔ lɛ ntɔ ɓatʲɛkajɔ ɛkumland̤ɛlɛni aɓaz̤ikǃikǃa z̤ɔnkɛ iinɮɛla z̤akʰɛ ukuz̤ɛ ɓakufikisɛ kujɛ ukukʰala kɔswɛlɛjɔ akuv̤ɛ ukukʰala kwɛɛnt͡siz̤ana akuz̤ɔlisa nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kukǁʰalisa akusitʰɛlisa uɓusɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤amɓɔnajɔ ɛsɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ nɔkuɓa kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɬanɡ̤a nɔkuɓa kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmntu ɛmɲɛ ukuz̤ɛ anɡ̤aɓi nɡ̤ukumkani ɔjint͡ʃɛmɓɛŋǁa anɡ̤aɓi z̤iz̤ixintʲɛlɔ z̤aɓantu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓani anɡ̤at͡ʃɔ kutʰikǁɔ ukutʰi nd̤iz̤ipʰakamisilɛ and̤isaji kuɓa sɔna ɛnd̤inɡ̤akuɓɔnijɔ nd̤ijalɛ nɡ̤akɔ ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤ɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa and̤iji kupʰind̤a uja kupʰind̤ɛz̤ɛla nɡ̤ɔkwakʰɔ jɛna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa usɔlilɛ wɛna ukuɓa uɲulɛ wɛna kunɡ̤aɲuli intɔ ɔjaz̤ijɔ jitʰɛtʰɛ aja kutʰi amad̤ɔd̤a az̤iiŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤i nɔmfɔ ɔsisilumkɔ ɔnd̤ipʰulapʰulajɔ ujɔb̤i utʰɛtʰa ɛnɡ̤ɛnakwaz̤i namaz̤wi akʰɛ akanaŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ taxuni makakǀikid̤wɛ utɔb̤i kusɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkupʰɛnd̤ula kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkwamad̤ɔd̤a anɔɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a kuɓa ɛlɔnɡ̤ɛz̤a uk͡xɛkǃɔ kwisɔnɔ sakʰɛ utʰʲwak͡xaz̤a iz̤anɮa pʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu awɛnz̤ɛ maninz̤i amaz̤wi akʰɛ nɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ wasusɛla uɛlihu watʰi uɓa ɔku kusɛsikwɛni ukutʰi uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɔ ɓunɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔɓukatʰikǁɔ ukuɓa utʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɓund̤iŋǀɛd̤a ntɔni ɓund̤iɲusa nɡ̤antɔni pʰɛz̤u kɔkund̤iɲusa kwɛsɔnɔ nd̤ija kukupʰɛnd̤ula nɡ̤ɔkutʰɛtʰa naɓaɬɔɓɔ ɓakʰɔ aɓanawɛ b̤ɛka ɛz̤ulwini uɓɔnɛ ukʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ isib̤akab̤aka sipʰɛz̤ulu kuwɛ ukuɓa utʰi wɔnɛ usɛɓɛnz̤a ntɔni nɡ̤akujɛ kʰɔna z̤akuɓa z̤ininz̤i iz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤akʰɔ umɛnz̤ɛ ntɔni ukuɓa utʰɛ walunɡ̤isa wɛna umpʰa ntɔni nɡ̤alɔɔ ntɔ wamkɛla ntɔni jɛna ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ kujintɔ kwind̤ɔd̤a ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɛ ukunɡ̤aɓi nd̤awɔ kwakʰɔ ɓujintɔ kuwɛ ɲana wɔmntu uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuninz̤i ɓɔkukǀud̤isa ɓajakʰala aɓantu ɓajaz̤iɓika nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnɡ̤alɔ jaɓakʰulu kɛ aɓat͡ʃɔ ukutʰi upʰi utʰikǁɔ umɛnz̤i ɔsinika inɡ̤ɔma ɛɓusuku ɔsifund̤isa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi asipʰɛ uɓulumkɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntaka z̤ɛz̤ulu ɓand̤ula ɓakʰalɛ anɡ̤apʰɛnd̤uli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛk͡xat͡ʃi laɓanɔɓuɓi haji jɔna intɔ ɛkʰɔɬakɛlɛjɔ akajiv̤a utʰikǁɔ usɔmanɮa akajikʰatʰalɛlɛ nɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔjɔ ukutʰi akumkʰatʰalɛlɛ itʲala lipʰamɓi kwakʰɛ lind̤ɛla kujɛ kɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ kǁa unɡ̤ɛkav̤ɛlɛli umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ akaz̤ani kunɛnɛ nɛsikʰukʰumali kɛ ujɔb̤i awuv̤ulɛ umlɔmɔ wakʰɛ akwand̤isɛ ukutʰɛtʰa ɛnɡ̤ɛnakwaz̤i wakǃɔkɛla uɛlihu watʰi kʰawɛnz̤ɛ kuɬɛ nd̤ikutʲɛlɛ kuɓa kusɛkʰɔ ukutʰɛtʰa ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kutʰikǁɔ nd̤ija kukupʰakamisɛla ɛntwɛni ɛkud̤ɛ ukwaz̤i nd̤imnikɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa umɛnz̤i ɔkwɛnɛnɛ akuɓukǁɔki ukutʰɛtʰa ɔɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkwaz̤i upʰamɓi kwakʰɔ jaɓɔna utʰikǁɔ unamanɮa akakǀɛkisi ɓani unamanɮa nɡ̤ɔkukǃina kwɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ akamlɔnd̤ɔlɔz̤ɛli ɛɓɔmini ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ iint͡siz̤ana uz̤inika iɓanɡ̤ɔ laz̤ɔ akawasusi amɛɬɔ akʰɛ kwaɓanɡ̤amalunɡ̤isa uɓaɬalisa kuɲɛ nɔɔkumkani ɛtrɔnɛni nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ ɓapʰakamɛ kɛ ukuɓa ɓakʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰iwɛ nɡ̤ɛmikǁɔkɛlɛlwanɛ ɓɛɓand͡ʒ̤iwɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤intʲa z̤ɛɛnt͡siz̤i uɓakǁɛlɛla iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ nɛz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛz̤ɛnz̤a amaɡ̤ɔxa uz̤itʰʲilɛla intɛtʰisɔ iinɮɛɓɛ z̤aɓɔ utʰi maɓaɓujɛ ɛɓut͡ʃinɡ̤ɛni ukuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓɛv̤a ɓamkʰɔnz̤a ɓɔjiɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa imiɬa jaɓɔ ɛkulunɡ̤ɛni nɛmiɲaka jaɓɔ ɛɓumnand̤ini ukuɓa ɓatʰɛ aɓɛv̤a ɓɔɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛla ɛmkʰɔntwɛni ɓapʰumɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ ɓɛnɡ̤ɛnakwaz̤i kɛ aɓaz̤iint͡ʃɛmɓɛŋǁa nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ ɓaɓamɓa umsind̤ɔ aɓaz̤iɓiki kǁa aɓakʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰ajɔ ufɛ kɛ ɛɓuŋǀinanɛni umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ nɔɓɔmi ɓaɓɔ ɓuɓɛ ɓɔɓɛnɡ̤awu kwind̤awɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ujam̤lanɡ̤ula ɔlusiz̤ana nɡ̤ɛɛnt͡siz̤i z̤akʰɛ ajitʰʲilɛ inɮɛɓɛ jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkukǁinwa kwaɓɔ nawɛ uɓɛnɡ̤akukʰululajɔ jɛna ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ akusɛ ɛnd̤awɛni ɛɓanz̤i ɛmz̤ant͡si unɡ̤akǀutʰɛkilɛjɔ nɔkuɓɛkwa ɛtafilɛni jakʰɔ kuz̤alɛ kukutʲɛɓa kɛ wɛna uz̤ɛlɛ kukuɡ̤wɛɓa kwaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ukuɡ̤wɛɓa nɔkuɡ̤wɛtʲwa kunakɔ ukukuɓamɓa kuɓa uɓuʃuʃu maɓunɡ̤akukǁʰɔkɔŋǁɛli ɛkutʰʲwak͡xaz̤ɛni iz̤anɮa nɔɓukʰulu ɓɔkǀamaɡ̤uʃɔ maɓunɡ̤atʰi ɡ̤u ɓukǀala ukuz̤iɓika kwakʰɔ kɔkuɓɛka nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ nɛmiɡ̤uʃaŋǁa jɔnkɛ jamanɮa musa ukuz̤ɔnd̤a uɓusuku ɓɔkususa iz̤iz̤wɛ ɛsikʰunɮɛni saz̤ɔ lumka unɡ̤aɡ̤ukǃukɛli kɔnɔɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a kuɓa uɲulɛ lɔɔ ntɔ kunɛɛnt͡siz̤i jaɓɔna utʰikǁɔ upʰakamisɛ ukwɛnz̤a nɡ̤amanɮa akʰɛ nɡ̤uɓani umjali ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ajɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔmpʰatʰisɛ inɮɛla jakʰɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤atʰi wɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa kʰumɓula ukuɓa uwukʰulisɛ nɡ̤ɛnd̤umisɔ umsɛɓɛnz̤i wakʰɛ awuɬaɓɛlɛ inɡ̤ɔma amad̤ɔd̤a ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓajawuɓɔna umntu uwukʰanɡ̤ɛla ɛmɡ̤ama jaɓɔna utʰikǁɔ mkʰulu asimaz̤i inani lɛmiɲaka jakʰɛ aliɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀɛki kuɓa ut͡salɛla pʰant͡si amatʰɔnt͡si amanz̤i akǀʰapʰaz̤ɛ ɛjimv̤ula ɛnkunɡ̤wini jakʰɛ ɛsijinisajɔ isib̤akab̤aka iv̤uz̤ɛ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓantu aɓaninz̤i kanɛnɛ ɓaja kukǃɔnd̤a ukwanɛkwa nɔkuz̤ɔnɡ̤ɔma kɔmŋǃuɓa wakʰɛ jaɓɔna wanɛka pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ ukukʰaɲa kwakʰɛ az̤iɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤amaz̤ant͡si ɔlwanɮɛ kuɓa nɡ̤ɛz̤ɔ ntɔ uɡ̤ǃ̤wɛɓa iz̤iz̤wɛ unika ukuɮa nɡ̤ɛntɔ ɛninz̤i iz̤anɮa z̤ɔz̤iɓini uz̤iɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla nɡ̤ɔmɓanɛ awuwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔkǀʰanajɔ ukuɡ̤ǃ̤uma kwakʰɛ kujamkǁɛla kwanɛɛnkɔmɔ ukuɓa uz̤a kuɲuka inɛnɛ nɡ̤alɛ ntɔ ijaɡ̤ub̤a intliz̤ijɔ jam ikǁʰumɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jajɔ pʰulapʰulani pʰulapʰulani ukuɡ̤uɡ̤uma kwɛliz̤wi lakʰɛ nɔkud̤umz̤ɛla ɔkupʰumajɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɛ ukusinɡ̤isa nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwɛz̤ulu lɔnkɛ nɔmɓanɛ wakʰɛ ujɛ ɛmasɔnd̤wɛni ɛɬaɓatʰi ɛmv̤a kwawɔ kub̤ɔnɡ̤a iliz̤wi ud̤ud̤uma nɡ̤ɛz̤wi lɔɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa ɓakʰɛ akawuliɓaz̤isi kǁa liv̤akalajɔ iz̤wi lakʰɛ utʰikǁɔ ud̤ud̤uma nɡ̤ɛz̤wi lakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓalulɛkilɛjɔ ɛsɛnz̤a iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inkulu ɛsinɡ̤ɛnakuz̤az̤i kuɓa utʰi kwikʰɛpʰu jiwa uwɛlɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni nakwisipʰanɡ̤ɔ sɛmv̤ula nakwisipʰanɡ̤ɔ sɛɛmv̤ula ɛz̤inkulu z̤akʰɛ isanɮa sɔluntu lɔnkɛ ujasitʲwina asiv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ɛlɛ ukuɓa ɓaɓɛ nɔkwaz̤i ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓɛnz̤ilɛjɔ amaxamŋǀwa anɡ̤ɛna ɛmlalɛlɛni aɬalɛ ɛz̤ikʰunɮɛni z̤awɔ ɛnɡ̤ɔnt͡sini jasɛntla kuv̤ɛla isakǃʰwitʰi kumpʰɛpʰɛtʰi wasɛntla kuv̤ɛla ukuɓand̤a nɡ̤ɔkupʰɛfumla kukatʰikǁɔ kuz̤a umkʰɛŋ̰ǀ̰ɛ uɓuɓanz̤i ɓamanz̤i ɓukǀutʰɛkɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ usind̤anisa nɡ̤amanz̤i amaninz̤i upʰanɡ̤alalisa akʰɛ aɓanɛkajɔ wɔna ad͡ʒ̤ikad͡ʒ̤ika nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkwalatʰiswa nɡ̤ujɛ ukuz̤ɛ ɛnz̤ɛ kɔnkɛ awawamisɛla kʰɔna ɛɓuswɛni ɓɛɬaɓatʰi ɛlimiwɛjɔ nɔkuɓa kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓɛtʰa nɔkuɓa kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɬaɓatʰi lakʰɛ nɔkuɓa kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛŋǀɛɓa ujawafikisa ɔkɔ kuɓɛkɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ jɔb̤i jima ujiɡ̤ǃ̤alɛ imisɛɓɛnz̤i ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ katʰikǁɔ ujaz̤i ukuwatʰwɛsa kukatʰikǁɔ akʰɛ nɔkuɓɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛlisa kwakʰɛ ukuɓanɛka kwawɔ ujaz̤i ukulinɡ̤anisɛlwa imisɛɓɛnz̤i ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ jɔsɔkwaz̤i wɛna unɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ifud̤umɛlɛjɔ lakuz̤ɔla iliz̤wɛ lulɔpʰu lwasɛz̤ant͡si usikʰand̤a usɔlulɛ najɛ isib̤akab̤aka ɛsikǃinilɛjɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsipili ɛsitʰʲid̤iwɛjɔ saz̤isɛ ɛsinɡ̤akutʰɛtʰajɔ tʰina kujɛ asinakukǀakǀisa ntɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓumɲama wɔɓikɛlwa ukutʰi nd̤ijatʰɛtʰa umntu utʰi makaɡ̤iɲwɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɔku akuɓɔnwa kukʰaɲa kukʰaz̤imlajɔ kusɛsib̤akab̤akɛni kuɮula umɔja lisɛ ɛntla kuz̤iwa nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔtʰikǁɔ jind̤ili ɛjɔjikɛkajɔ usɔmanɮa mkʰulu nɡ̤amanɮa akaɡ̤wɛŋǁi sikɔ naɓuninz̤i ɓɔɓulunɡ̤isa nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ɓajamɔjika aɓantu akaɓakʰatʰalɛlɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓalumkɛ nɡ̤ɔkwaɓɔ waz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a wampʰɛnd̤ula ujɔb̤i ɛsɛmɔjɛni ɔv̤utʰuz̤ajɔ watʰi nɡ̤uɓani lɔ usitʰa ikǀɛɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkutʰɛtʰa ɔkunɡ̤ɛnakwaz̤i kʰawuwab̤iŋǃisɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmfɔ amaŋǃɛ akʰɔ nd̤ikuɓuz̤ɛ und̤az̤isɛ uɓupʰi wɛna ukusɛka iɬaɓatʰi kǁɛla ukuɓa ujaz̤i ujakǃɔnd̤a nɡ̤uɓani ɔmisɛ imilinɡ̤anisɔ jalɔ ukuɓa ujaz̤i nɡ̤uɓani ɔlɔlulɛlɛ ulutʲa lɔkulinɡ̤anisa z̤ifakwɛ ntwɛnini iz̤ikʰɔnd̤ɔ z̤ɛɛnt͡sika z̤alɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔwaɓɛka ilitʲɛ lalɔ lɛmɓɔmɓɔ ɛkumɛmɛlɛlɛni kuɲɛ kwamakʰwɛz̤i ɔkusa ɓɛd̤uma ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakatʰikǁɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔwaluv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ɛlajɔ ulwanɮɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ ɛkutʰʲɔɓɔz̤ɛni kwalɔ lupʰuma ɛsiz̤alwɛni ɛkulwamɓatʰisɛni nɡ̤amafu ɛkulusɔnɡ̤ɛlɛni nɡ̤ɛsitʰɔkɔtʰɔkɔ nd̤akulusikɛlɛla umd̤a nd̤akumisa imiv̤alɔ nɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ nd̤atʰi fika apʰa unɡ̤ɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰi ɛmɛ apʰa amaz̤a akʰɔ ak͡xat͡ʃajɔ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jakʰɔ wakʰa wajiwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ int͡sasa wasaz̤isa isifinɡ̤ɔ ind̤awɔ jasɔ ukuɓa siɓamɓɛ amasɔnd̤ɔ ɛɬaɓatʰi ɓav̤utʰululwɛ kulɔ aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ liɡ̤ukǃuka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔd̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ lɔmsɛsanɛ wɔkutʲwina z̤iz̤imisɛ nɡ̤ɔkwaz̤ɔ iz̤intɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤asɛsamɓatʰwɛni aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɓav̤ind͡ʒ̤wɛ ukukʰaɲa kwaɓɔ nɛnɡ̤alɔ ɛpʰakamilɛjɔ japʰulwɛ ujɛ ɛmitʰɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛni jɔlwanɮɛ wahamɓahamɓa ɛz̤inɡ̤ɔnt͡sinɡ̤ɔnt͡sini z̤ɛnz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓila uwatʰʲilɛlwɛ amasanɡ̤ɔ ɔkufa namasanɡ̤ɔ ɛtʰunz̤i lɔkufa wawaɓɔna uɓuɡ̤ǃ̤alilɛ uɓuɓanz̤i ɓɛɬaɓatʰi kǁɛla ukuɓa ujakwaz̤i ɔkɔ kɔnkɛ ipʰi inɮɛla ɛsa ɛkʰajɛni lɔkukʰaɲa nɔɓumɲama ipʰi ind̤awɔ jaɓɔ ukuɓa uɓusɛ ɛmd̤ɛni waɓɔ ukuɓa ukǃɔnd̤ɛ iinɮɛla z̤ɛnɮu jaɓɔ ujaz̤i kamɓɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wawusɛwuz̤ɛlwɛ ɔkɔ lilikʰulu nɛnani lɛmiɬa jakʰɔ ufikɛlɛlɛ ɛɓuŋǀwanɛni ɓɛkʰɛpʰu uɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓɛsikǀʰɔtʰɔ waɓuɓɔna ɛnd̤aɓukǃwɛɓɛla ikǁɛʃa lɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ imini jɔkud̤iɓana nɛmfaz̤wɛ ipʰi inɮɛla jalapʰɔ kwaɓiwa kʰɔna ukukʰaɲa jalapʰɔ lupʰanɡ̤alaliswa kʰɔna ulɔpʰu lwasɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɛɬaɓatʰini nɡ̤uɓani ɔɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤ɛla isipʰanɡ̤ɔ umd͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ ɔɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤ɛla umɓanɛ wɛɛnd̤ud̤umɔ inɮɛla ukuɓa inɛ ɛz̤wɛni ɛlinɡ̤ɛnamntu ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ apʰɔ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ iɬutʰisɛ int͡ʃaɓalala jakwant͡ʃaɓalala int͡ʃulisɛ uɬaz̤a ɔlupʰumajɔ inɔjisɛ imv̤ula nɡ̤uɓani ɔz̤ala amatʰɔnt͡si ɔmɓɛtʰɛ upʰuma umkʰɛŋ̰ǀ̰ɛ ɛsiz̤alwɛni sikaɓani nɛkǃaɓaka jasɛz̤ulwini iz̤alwa nɡ̤uɓani amanz̤i ajakǃina nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlitʲɛ nɔɓusɔ ɓamanz̤i anz̤ɔnɡ̤ɔnz̤ɔnɡ̤ɔ ɓuɓamɓɛnɛ unɔkuwaɓɔpʰa amakǃʰina ɛsilimɛla uz̤ikǀɔmɓululɛ iz̤intʲa z̤amak͡xɔz̤a unɔkujiv̤ɛlisa imilind̤ɔ jɛɛɲanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lajɔ uz̤alatʰisɛ iinkwɛnkwɛz̤i z̤ɛb̤ɛrɛ naɓantwana ɓajɔ ujajaz̤i imimisɛlɔ jɛz̤ulu umisɛ ulawulɔ lwalɔ ɛɬaɓatʰini unɔkulipʰakamisɛla ɛmafini iz̤wi lakʰɔ ukuz̤ɛ uɓuninz̤i ɓamanz̤i ɓukuɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɛ unɔkujitʰuma imiɓanɛ ihamɓɛ itʰi kuwɛ sikʰɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔmisɛ uɓulumkɔ ɛz̤int͡swɛni nɡ̤uɓani ɔnikɛ imɓɔnisɛli iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔɓala iiŋ̤ǃ̤imɓa z̤amafu nɡ̤ɔɓulumkɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔtʰulula iint͡suɓa z̤ɛz̤ulu ɛmɛlɛlwɛni wɔtʰuli luɓɛ lutʰʲid̤ɔ amaɡ̤ad̤a anamatʰɛlanɛ inɡ̤ɔɲamakaz̤i unɔkujiz̤inɡ̤ɛlɛla iɲamakaz̤i uz̤alisɛ ipʰanɡ̤ɔ lɛɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ɛz̤int͡ʃa kǁa z̤iŋǀatʰamajɔ ɛz̤ikʰunɮɛni z̤az̤ɔ z̤iɬalɛ ɛz̤ind̤ad̤ɛni z̤ilalɛlɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔlunɡ̤isɛla iɬunɡ̤ulu umfunz̤ɛlɔ walɔ kǁa amatʰɔlɛ alɔ az̤iɓika kutʰikǁɔ ɛb̤ad̤ub̤ad̤ula ɛnɡ̤ɛnakuɮa ujalaz̤i ikǁɛʃa lɔkuz̤ala kwamaɡ̤ɔɡ̤ɔ asɛmawɛni uɡ̤ǃ̤alɛ ukuz̤uz̤a kwamakǁʰamakaz̤i ujaz̤iɓala iiɲanɡ̤a az̤iz̤alisajɔ ulaz̤i ikǁɛʃa lɔkuz̤ala kwawɔ ujaɡ̤ukǃa az̤alɛ akʰupʰɛ inkɔɲana ajɔmɛlɛla amankɔɲana awɔ akʰula ɛmatʰafɛni apʰuma anɡ̤aɓi saɓuja nɡ̤uɓani ɔlind̤ululɛjɔ iɛsilɛ lasɛnɮɛ likʰululɛkilɛ iimɓɔpʰɛlɛlɔ z̤ɛɛsilɛ ɛlind̤wɛɓilɛjɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔz̤itʰukululɛjɔ ɛnd̤ilimisɛlɛ iŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsi ukuɓa iɓɛ jinɮu jalɔ nɛɛnd̤awɔ ɛz̤inɛtʲuwa z̤iɓɛ likʰaja lalɔ lijajiɬɛka iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jɔmz̤i alijiv̤a iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔlɔ jɔmkǃʰuɓi umfunɔ wɛɛntaɓa ɓuɓutʲani ɓalɔ liland̤a lɔnkɛ uɬaz̤a jɔv̤uma iŋǃu ukukukʰɔnz̤a ilalɛ ɛsitalini sakʰɔ unɔkujiɓɔpʰa iŋǃu ɛmkǃɛlɛni nɡ̤ɔmkǃɔkɔz̤ɔ wajɔ ikǃwakanisɛ ikuland̤ɛla wɔkʰɔlɔsa nɡ̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛmakʰulu amanɮa ajɔ ukuʃijɛ najɔ ukukǁɛlɛnɡ̤a kwakʰɔ unɔkukʰɔlwa kujɔ ukuɓa jɔjiɡ̤ɔd̤usa imɓɛwu jakʰɔ iɓutʰɛlɛ ɛsand̤ɛni sakʰɔ ipʰikɔ lɛŋǀiniɓakaz̤i lijapʰapʰa lunɛŋǀɛɓa jɛnɡ̤wamz̤a kɛ usiɓa lwajɔ nɔɓɔja ɓajɔ haji ɓɔ iwaʃija ɛm̤laɓɛni amakǃand̤a ajɔ ifukamɛlɛ ɛlutʰulini iliɓalɛ ukuɓa uɲawɔ lɔwatʲumz̤a nɛxamŋǀwa lasɛnɮɛ lɔwaɲatʰɛla ijawaɓukula amatʰɔlɛ ajɔ nɡ̤atʰi asinɡ̤awajɔ kupʰalalɛ ukukǁɛlɛnɡ̤a kwajɔ inɡ̤akǁʰali nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰikǁɔ wɛnz̤ɛ jaɓuliɓala uɓulumkɔ akajaɓɛla iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ kǁɛʃa limɓi iz̤iɓɛtʰa ipʰakamɛ iliɬɛkɛ ihaʃɛ nɔmkʰwɛli walɔ linikwa nɡ̤uwɛ ihaʃɛ uɓuk͡xɔti ujamɓatʰisɛ intamɔ jalɔ nɡ̤ɔɓujakajaka nɡ̤uwɛ ɔlikǃakatʰisa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnkumɓi isand̤i sɔmfutʰɔ walɔ sijɔtʰusa lijaɡ̤ǃ̤uɓa ɛntilini nɡ̤amaŋǃina lɛnz̤ɛ amaɡ̤ǃ̤asi nɡ̤amanɮa lipʰuma likʰawulɛlɛ umkʰɔsi ɔnɛsik͡xwɛkǃɛ lijakuɬɛka ukunkwantʲa alikǃʰipʰuki mɓilini alid͡ʒ̤iki pʰamɓi kwɛk͡xɛlɛ uxaʃaz̤a pʰɛz̤u kwalɔ umpʰɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ nɛnt͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ ɛɓɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛlajɔ nɛŋ̰ǀ̰ula nɡ̤ɛnt͡ʃakav̤u nanɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wanɡ̤u liɡ̤iɲa iliz̤wɛ alimi kwakuv̤utʰɛlwa isiɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɔkuv̤utʰɛla siv̤utʰɛlwajɔ isiɡ̤ɔɮɔ nɡ̤atʰi litʰi ŋ̤ǁ̤at͡ʃɔ kɛ lisɛz̤ɛla imfaz̤wɛ kwakud̤ɛ nɔkud̤ud̤uma kwaɓatʰɛtʰɛli nɔkufunz̤a intamɓananɛ ipʰapʰaz̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ jakʰɔ jɔlulɛ amapʰikɔ ajɔ ib̤ɛkɛ ɛz̤ant͡si kunɡ̤ɔmtʰɛtʰɔ wakʰɔ ukuɓa ikǁʰalanɡ̤a liɲukɛ lijipʰakamisɛ inɮu jalɔ liɬalɛ ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxɛni lilalɛ ɛt͡sɔlwɛni lɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa nasɛmɓɔnisɛlwɛni lilapʰɔ liɬɔla ukuɮa amɛɬɔ alɔ ɔnd̤ɛlɛ kud̤ɛ amatʰɔlɛ alɔ afuŋǁa iɡ̤az̤i nalapʰɔ ɓakʰɔna aɓaŋ̤ǁ̤wɛlɛxiwɛjɔ likʰɔna nalɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wampʰɛnd̤ula ujɔb̤i watʰi wɔɓamɓana nɔsɔmanɮa kɛ umtʰɛtʰiswa umɔɬwaji katʰikǁɔ makakupʰɛnd̤ulɛ ɔkɔ ujɔb̤i wampʰɛnd̤ula ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ipʰant͡si nd̤ɔtʰini ukupʰɛnd̤ula nd̤iɓɛka isanɮa ɛmlɔɲɛni nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ kwakaɲɛ and̤iji kupʰind̤a nd̤ipʰɛnd̤ulɛ nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ kwakaɓini and̤iji kupʰind̤a nd̤iɓujɛ nd̤ikǃʰuɓɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wampʰɛnd̤ula ujɔb̤i ɛsɛmɔjɛni ɔv̤utʰuz̤ajɔ watʰi kʰawuz̤ib̤iŋǃisɛ amaŋǃɛ akʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmfɔ nd̤ija kukuɓuz̤a und̤az̤isɛ kanɛnɛ uja kwapʰula nɔɡ̤wɛɓɔ und̤iɡ̤wɛɓɛ ukuz̤ɛ uɓɛ lilunɡ̤isa unɛnɡ̤alɔ ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkatʰikǁɔ ud̤ud̤umɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤wi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ajɛ kʰawuz̤ihɔmɓisɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɔɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa nɔkupʰakama kwakʰɔ wamɓatʰɛ ind̤ili nɔɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amɛla makupʰalalɛ ukupʰupʰuma kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɔ uliɓɔnɛ lɔnkɛ ik͡xat͡ʃi uliɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ulɛ liɓɔnɛ lɔnkɛ ik͡xat͡ʃi ulitʰɔɓɛ uɓaŋ̤ǃ̤ulɛ aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤aɓɔ ɓakǃʰuʃɛkɛ ɛlutʰulini kuɲɛ uɓuɓɔpʰɛ uɓusɔ ɓaɓɔ ɛmfiɬɛkwɛni nam nd̤ɔkud̤umisa ukuɓa sikusind̤isilɛ isanɮa sakʰɔ sɔkunɛnɛ kʰawujiɓɔnɛ imv̤uɓu ɛnd̤ajɛnz̤a janawɛ iɮa utʲani nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnkɔmɔ kʰawuɓɔnɛ amanɮa ajɔ asɛmaŋǃɛni ajɔ nɔkukǃina kwajɔ kusɛz̤iɲamɛni z̤ɛsisu sajɔ iɡ̤ɔɓa wajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɛd̤arɛ imisipʰa jamatʰanɡ̤a ajɔ ib̤id͡ʒ̤ɛlɛnɛ amatʰamɓɔ ajɔ and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmib̤ɔlɔmpɔ jɔb̤ɛd̤u amatʰamɓɔ ajɔ and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmiv̤alɔ jɛsiɲitʰi ijintlaɬɛla jɛɛnɮɛla z̤ikatʰikǁɔ umɛnz̤i wajɔ wajinika ik͡xɛlɛ lajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iintaɓa z̤ijitʰwalɛla ukuɮa ɔnkɛ amaxamŋǀwa asɛnɮɛ aɮala kʰɔna iɓutʰa pʰant͡si kwɛmitʰɔlɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔtʲɛni jɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ nɔmɡ̤ǁ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤ɔ imitʰɔlɔ ijiɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla nɡ̤ɔmtʰunz̤i wajɔ imiŋ̤ǀ̤uluɓa jɛsiɬamɓɔ ijajid͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a jaɓɔna uhamɓa pʰanɮɛ umlamɓɔ ajipʰakuz̤ɛli ikʰɔlɔsilɛ kǁa kutʰʲɔɓɔz̤ɛla nɛjɔrd̤an ɛmlɔɲɛni wajɔ inɔkuɓand͡ʒ̤wa inamɛɬɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ iɡ̤ǃ̤ɔd͡ʒ̤ɔz̤wɛ impumlɔ nɡ̤ɛnt͡simɓi jɔkutʰijɛla unɔkujixɔla inɡ̤wɛɲa nɡ̤ɛɡ̤wɛɡ̤wɛ ulut͡ʃɔnisɛ ɛlutʲɛni lwajɔ unɔkujifaka intamɓɔ jɔmz̤i ɛmpumlwɛni jajɔ uɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤ɛ iz̤iɮɛlɛ z̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɛntɔla inɡ̤ataxuz̤isa kunɛnɛ kuwɛ itʰɛtʰɛ amaz̤wi atʰamɓilɛjɔ kuwɛ inɡ̤ɛnz̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nawɛ wɔkuɓa ujitʰaɓatʰɛ iɓɛ nɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤i wapʰakad̤ɛ unɡ̤aɮala najɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntaka ujikʰulɛkɛlɛ amantɔmɓaz̤ana akʰɔ anɡ̤axwɛɓa nɡ̤ajɔ amaɬulɛlana aɓamɓisajɔ ajaɓɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓaxwɛɓi unɔkusiz̤alisa isikʰumɓa sajɔ nɡ̤ɛɛɲɛmɓɛ nɛntlɔkɔ jajɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤ikʰali z̤ɛɛntlanz̤i ɓɛka isanɮa sakʰɔ kujɔ kʰumɓula imfaz̤wɛ unɡ̤apʰind̤i jaɓɔna ukulind̤a kɔɓamɓisajɔ nɡ̤amanɡ̤a inɛnɛ ukǃɛtʰuka kwaɛsajiɓɔna akukʰɔ sid͡ʒ̤ɔxa sɔkujikǁʰɔkɔŋǁa nɡ̤uɓani kɛ ɔnɡ̤az̤imisa pʰamɓi nɡ̤uɓani ɔnd̤ipʰanɡ̤ɛlɛjɔ wand̤inika ukuɓa nd̤iɓujɛkɛz̤ɛ ɔkupʰant͡si kwamaz̤ulu ɔnkɛ kɔkwam and̤iji kutʰi nɡ̤amalunɡ̤u ajɔ nɛɛnd̤awɔ z̤ɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓajɔ nɛz̤imɓɔ z̤ɛz̤intlu z̤ajɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɔkuwutʰʲila umpʰamɓili wɛsamɓatʰɔ sajɔ ɛz̤intlwini ɛz̤imɓini z̤ɛmiɬatʰi jajɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɔkuja iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤ɔɓusɔ ɓajɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɔkuz̤iv̤ula nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛmaz̤iɲwɛni ajɔ sisɔtʰusɔ ilikǃʰajija imikǃɛla jɛɛnɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ z̤ajɔ z̤iv̤alwɛ nɡ̤ɛtʲwina ɛlikǃinilɛjɔ z̤isɔnd̤ɛlɛnɛ ɛɲɛ nɛɲɛ akunɡ̤ɛni mɔja pʰakatʰi kwaz̤ɔ z̤inamatʰɛlɛnɛ ɛɲɛ kwɛɲɛ z̤iɓamɓɛnɛ z̤inɡ̤aɓi nakwaɬukana ukutʰimla kwajɔ kukʰupʰa imitʰa namɛɬɔ ajɔ and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnkɔpʰɛ z̤ɛsifinɡ̤ɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni wajɔ kupʰuma iz̤ikʰuni z̤ɔmlilɔ ɛz̤it͡ʃanɡ̤az̤ajɔ kutʰapʰukɛ iintlant͡si z̤ɔmlilɔ ɛmatʰatʰɛni ajɔ kupʰuma nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔwɔŋ̤ǁ̤awu ɔkʰwɛz̤ɛlwa nɡ̤ɛmiz̤i umpʰɛfumlɔ wajɔ uv̤utʰisa amalaɬɛ kupʰuma amalanɡ̤atʲɛ ɛmlɔɲɛni wajɔ ɛntaɲɛni jajɔ kupʰuma amanɮa ɛɓuswɛni ɓajɔ kukǁʰina ukuŋǀama imiɬuɓulɔ jɛɲama jajɔ inamatʰɛlɛnɛ ikǃinilɛ kujɔ ajiʃukumi intliz̤ijɔ jajɔ ikǃinɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlitʲɛ ikǃinɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlɔkusila lanɡ̤apʰant͡si ɛkupʰakamɛni kwajɔ z̤ijaŋǁunɡ̤upʰala iind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlɛ z̤itʰi makatʰa nɡ̤ɔkukǃʰipʰuka umɓilini lifikɛ kujɔ ik͡xɛlɛ nant͡ʃunt͡ʃɛ namkʰɔntɔ nankɔnd͡ʒ̤anɛ itʰi sinɡ̤umkǃukǃu isiɲitʰi liv̤itʰi ub̤ɛd̤u utɔlɔ lwɛsapʰɛtʰa alujiɓalɛkisi ad͡ʒ̤ika aɓɛ nɡ̤umkǃukǃu amatʲɛ ɔkusawula kujɔ itʰi imiv̤iŋǃi z̤iind̤iz̤a ikuɬɛkɛ ukutʲitʲimɓa kwɛŋ̰ǀ̰ula nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwajɔ z̤iinkamɓa ɛz̤it͡sɔlɔ janɛka impaɬa jɔkusiz̤ila ɛlud̤akɛni ijiɓiliz̤a inz̤ulu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmɓiz̤a ulwanɮɛ ilwɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɬala lɔkǃʰɔlɔ ɛmv̤a kwajɔ kukʰaɲa inɮɛla anɡ̤a amanz̤i anz̤ɔnɡ̤ɔnz̤ɔnɡ̤ɔ z̤iz̤imv̤i ɛɬaɓatʰini akukʰɔ ntɔ najɔ lɛ jɛnz̤iwajɔ ajaɓa nakukǃʰipʰuka umɓilini iɓɔna kɔnkɛ ɔkupʰakamilɛjɔ inɡ̤ukumkani jɔna kwiz̤ilɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iɲalasajɔ ujɔb̤i wampʰɛnd̤ula ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa unakɔ ukufɛz̤a kɔnkɛ akuŋǃatʲɛlwa ntɔ ujikǀinɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤uɓani lɔ usitʰɛ ikǀɛɓɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛnakwaz̤i nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ nd̤inɡ̤az̤ikǃɔnd̤i iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iɓalulɛkilɛjɔ nd̤inɡ̤az̤az̤i kʰawupʰulapʰulɛ nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ nd̤ija kuɓuz̤a kuwɛ und̤az̤isɛ ɓɛnd̤ikuv̤a ukukuv̤a nɡ̤ɛnɮɛɓɛ kunɡ̤ɔku ilisɔ likuɓɔnilɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nd̤ijaz̤ikǀɛkisa nd̤iz̤ɔɬwajɛ nd̤isɛlutʰulini nasɛlutʰutʰwini kɛ kalɔku kwatʰi ɛmv̤a kɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛwatʰɛtʰilɛ maz̤wi kujɔb̤i watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kuɛlifaz̤i wakwatɛman umsind̤ɔ ujav̤utʰa kuwɛ nakuɓamɛlwanɛ ɓakʰɔ ɓɔɓaɓini kuɓa anitʰɛtʰanɡ̤a ntɔ ijijɔ nɡ̤am nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmkʰɔnz̤i ujɔb̤i nɡ̤ɔku kɛ z̤itʰaɓatʰɛlɛni iinkunz̤i ɛz̤int͡ʃa z̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤iɓɛ sikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa z̤iɓɛ sikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nijɛ kumkʰɔnz̤i ujɔb̤i niz̤iɲusɛlɛ id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ ujɔb̤i umkʰɔnz̤i anitʰand̤az̤ɛlɛ nd̤ɔmnɔnɛlɛla jɛna jɛd̤wa ukuz̤ɛ nd̤inɡ̤ɛnz̤i nɡ̤ɔkɔɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ ɓɛnu kuɓa ninɡ̤atʰɛtʰanɡ̤a ntɔ ijijɔ nɡ̤am nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmkʰɔnz̤i ujɔb̤i ɓaja kɛ ɔɔɛlifaz̤i wakwatɛman nɔb̤ilɛd̤ad̤i wakwaʃuwa nɔt͡sɔfarɛ wasɛnahama ɓɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wakutʰɛtʰajɔ kuɓɔ ujɛhɔv̤a waz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a wamnɔnɛlɛla kɛ ujɔb̤i ujɛhɔv̤a wakuɓujisa ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kukajɔb̤i akuɓɔn ukuɓa uɓatʰand̤az̤ɛlɛ ɔɔwaɓɔ wakɔnɡ̤ɛz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a kɔnkɛ awajɛnakɔ ujɔb̤i kwad̤a kwapʰind̤wa kaɓini ɓɛz̤a kujɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ nɔɔd̤ad̤ɛ ɓaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛsaz̤ana najɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɡ̤apʰamɓili ɓaɮa najɛ ukutʲa ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ ɓamkʰuz̤a ɓamtʰutʰuz̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmfikisɛlɛ ɓɔna ujɛhɔv̤a ɓamnika ɛlɔwɔ ikʰulu lɛmali ɛlɔwɔ id͡ʒ̤ikaz̤i lɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wakusikɛlɛla ukupʰɛla kukajɔb̤i nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔkukǃala kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛʃumi ɛlinɛsinɛ ɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛsitʰand̤atʰu ɛɛnkamɛla nɛwaka lɛz̤iɓini z̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ nɛwaka lɛɛmaz̤i z̤amaɛsilɛ waɓa nɔɔɲana aɓasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɛɛntɔmɓi ɛz̤intatʰu iɡ̤ama lɛjɔkukǃala kwatʰiwa nɡ̤ud͡ʒ̤ɛmima iɡ̤ama lɛjɛsiɓini nɡ̤ukɛt͡sija iɡ̤ama lɛjɛsitʰatʰu nɡ̤ukɛrɛn̤apuki akwafumanɛka mankaz̤ana maɬɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛntɔmɓi z̤ikajɔb̤i ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ ujisɛ waz̤inika pʰakatʰi kwaɓanakwaz̤ɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ ujɔb̤i waɮa uɓɔmi imiɲaka ɛlikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi manɛ waɓɔna ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nɔɔɲana ɓɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ iz̤iz̤ukulwana z̤az̤inɛ wafa kɛ ujɛhɔɓi ɛjind̤ɔd̤a ɛnkulu ɛpʰɛlɛlɛ ɛɓud̤alɛni haji ujɔlɔ lɔmntu ɔnɡ̤ahamɓijɔ nɡ̤ɛkǀɛɓɔ laɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɔnɡ̤ɛmijɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni jaɓɔni ɔnɡ̤aɬalijɔ ɛmɓutʰwɛni jaɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɛki jɛna unɔnɛlɛla umjalɛlɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ukǀamanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔmjalɛlɔ wakʰɛ nɔɓusuku und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmtʰi ɔmilisɛlwɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛmid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ jamanz̤i ɔnika isikǃʰamɔ sawɔ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lawɔ ɔɡ̤ǃ̤aɓi lawɔ linɡ̤aɓunijɔ kɔnkɛ akwɛnz̤ajɔ kɔpʰumɛlɛla aɓand͡ʒ̤alɔ aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɓɔna ɓand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmkǃukǃu ɔpʰɛt͡ʃɛtʰwa nɡ̤umɔja nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ aɓanakuma ɛmɡ̤wɛɓɛni naɓɔni ɛɓanɮɛni lamalunɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ujajaz̤i inɮɛla jamalunɡ̤isa kɛ jɔna inɮɛla jaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ija kud̤aka jini ukuɓa iintlanɡ̤a z̤ɛnz̤ɛ imɓutʰumɓutʰu iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ikǀamanɡ̤ɛ intɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛjakɔntɔ ɔɔkumkani ɓɛɬaɓatʰi ɓaz̤imisilɛ iz̤id̤wanɡ̤uɓɛ z̤ab̤unɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a nanɡ̤ɔmtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa wakʰɛ ɓɛsitʰi masiz̤ikǃʰawulɛ iimɓɔpʰɛlɛlɔ z̤aɓɔ siz̤ilaɬɛ iz̤intʲa z̤aɓɔ kutʰi ɔɬɛli ɛmaz̤ulwini ujaɬɛka inkɔsi ijaɓaɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛla ija kwand̤ula itʰɛtʰɛ kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ wajɔ iɓakʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰isɛ nɡ̤ɔkuv̤utʰa kwajɔ itʰi mna kɛ nd̤immisilɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤ijɔn intaɓa jam ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ atʰi jɛna nd̤ija kuwuv̤akalisa ummisɛlɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰɛ unɡ̤uɲana wɛna mna nam̤la nd̤ikuz̤ɛlɛ kǀɛla nd̤ikunikɛ iintlanɡ̤a z̤iɓɛ lakʰɔ iz̤ipʰɛlɔ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi z̤iɓɛ z̤ɛz̤akʰɔ uja kuz̤iv̤ikiv̤a nɡ̤ɛntɔnɡ̤a jɛnt͡simɓi uz̤iɬɛkɛz̤ɛ z̤inɡ̤ɛ z̤iz̤itʲa z̤ɔd̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ ɓɔkumkani kǃikǃani ɓaɡ̤wɛɓi ɓasɛɬaɓatʰini jalɛkani mkʰɔnz̤ɛni ujɛhɔv̤a nisɔjika ɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓani nitʰutʰumɛla manɡ̤ɛni uɲana ɬɛz̤ɛ akǃumɓɛ nit͡ʃaɓalalɛ ɛnɮɛlɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɡ̤aɬɛ uv̤utʰɛ umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ haji ujɔlɔ lwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaz̤imɛla nɡ̤ajɛ um̤ɔɓɛ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛkuɓalɛkɛni kwakʰɛ kuab̤isalɔm uɲana wakʰɛ jɛhɔv̤a haji ukuɓa ɓaninz̤i kwaɓand̤iɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlajɔ ɓaninz̤i aɓasukɛla pʰɛz̤ulu ɓaninz̤i aɓatʰi kumpʰɛfumlɔ akunalusind̤isɔ kutʰikǁɔ pʰakamisani kɛ wɛna jɛhɔv̤a ujinɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ uluz̤ukɔ umpʰakamisi wɛntlɔkɔ jam nd̤id̤and̤uluka kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛz̤wi and̤ipʰɛnd̤ulɛ ɛntaɓɛni jakʰɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ pʰakamisani nd̤alala pʰant͡si nd̤alala uɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ nd̤av̤uka nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnd̤ikǁʰasa and̤iz̤ɔjiki iz̤iɡ̤id̤i z̤aɓantu aɓakʰɛ uluɬu lɔkulwa nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kʰawusuk umɛ jɛhɔv̤a nd̤isind̤isɛ tʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uz̤iɓɛtʰa z̤ɔnkɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤am ɛm̤latʰini amaz̤iɲɔ aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ujawapʰula usind̤isɔ lɔlukajɛhɔv̤a majiɓɛ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓantu ɓakʰɔ int͡sikɛlɛlɔ jakʰɔ pʰakamisani kumɔnɡ̤amɛli wɔkuɓɛtʰɛlwa iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inɛɛntamɓɔ um̤ɔɓɛ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛkud̤and̤ulukɛni nd̤ipʰɛnd̤ulɛ tʰikǁɔ wɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓam ɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛni jam wand̤ɛnz̤ɛla ind̤awɔ ɛɓanz̤i nd̤iɓaɓalɛ uwuv̤ɛ umtʰand̤az̤ɔ nina ɲana ɓaɓantu uz̤ukɔ niluɬaz̤isa niŋ̤ǁ̤amɛlɛ intɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛjakɔntɔ nitʰand̤a amanɡ̤a pʰakamisani jaz̤ini kɛ ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uz̤iɓalulɛlɛ ɔwɛŋǀɛɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ujapʰulapʰula nd̤akud̤and̤uluka kujɛ kǃumɓani ninɡ̤ɔni tʰɛtʰani nɛɛntliz̤ijɔ z̤ɛnu ɛz̤inkukwɛni z̤ɛnu nitʰi kǀwaka pʰakamisani ɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlani imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔɓulunɡ̤isa nikʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a ɓaninz̤i aɓatʰi nɡ̤uɓani ɔwɔsiɓɔnisa ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ sipʰakamisɛlɛ ukukʰaɲa kɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a ujiv̤ujisilɛ intliz̤ijɔ jam kunɛkǁɛʃa lɔɓuninz̤i ɓɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa jaɓɔ nɛwajini jaɓɔ ɛnt͡ʃa nd̤ija pʰant͡si nd̤ilalɛ uɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ kwanɡ̤ɔku nd̤ikǁɔlilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛna jɛhɔv̤a und̤iɬalisa nd̤ikʰɔlɔsilɛ nɔkɔ nd̤ind̤ɛd̤wa kumɔnɡ̤amɛli nɡ̤ɔɡ̤wali um̤ɔɓɛ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓɛkɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ amaz̤wi jɛhɔv̤a kukǃɔnd̤ɛ ukukǀamanɡ̤a liɓaz̤ɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ iz̤wi lɔkuz̤iɓika kumkani tʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤itʰand̤az̤a kuwɛ jɛhɔv̤a uja kuliv̤a iz̤wi kwakusasa nd̤ija kuwusinɡ̤isa kuwɛ umtʰand̤az̤ɔ nd̤iɓɔnisɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛna akunɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ɔnanz̤ɛ ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ akanakupʰamɓukɛla kuwɛ ɔnɔɓuɓi aɓanakuma aɓakǃʰajisi pʰamɓi kwamɛɬɔ akʰɔ ujaɓatʰija ɓɔnkɛ aɓasɛɓɛnz̤i ɓɔɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a ujaɓat͡ʃaɓalalisa aɓatʰɛtʰa amanɡ̤a ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɛɡ̤az̤i nɛnkɔɬisɔ ilisikiz̤i kujɛhɔv̤a kɛ nd̤inɔkunɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǀɛɓa jakʰɔ ɛninz̤i nd̤ikǃuɓud̤ɛ nd̤ib̤ɛkisɛ ɛtɛmpilɛni jakʰɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkukɔjika jɛhɔv̤a nd̤ikʰapʰɛ nɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓand̤ilalɛlɛjɔ jilunɡ̤ɛlɛlanisɛ inɮɛla jakʰɔ pʰamɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛmlɔɲɛni waɓɔ akukʰɔ ntɔ imijɔ umɓilini waɓɔ nɡ̤umɛjɛlisɛlɔ liŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ɛliv̤uliwɛjɔ umkǃala waɓɔ ɓatʰɛtʰa ɔkuɡ̤ud̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔlwimi lwaɓɔ ɓatʰwalisɛ itʲala tʰikǁɔ makat͡ʃit͡ʃɛ amakǃʰinɡ̤a aɓɔ ɛluk͡xɛkǃwɛni lwaɓɔ ɔluninz̤i ɓatʰʲalɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓakupʰikisilɛ maɓav̤ujɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaz̤imɛla nɡ̤awɛ ɓamɛmɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ uɓakʰusɛlɛ ɓaɮamkɛ nɡ̤awɛ aɓalitʰand̤ajɔ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛna ujalisikɛlɛla ilunɡ̤isa jɛhɔv̤a uliɬanɡ̤anisɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛnkɔlisɛkɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkʰaka kumɔnɡ̤amɛli wɔkuɓɛtʰɛlwa iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inɛɛntamɓɔ nɡ̤ɛlamad̤ɔd̤a iliz̤wi um̤ɔɓɛ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ jɛhɔv̤a ukund̤ɔɬwaja unɔmsind̤ɔ unɡ̤and̤itʰɛtʰisi unɔɓuʃuʃu nd̤iɓaɓalɛ jɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤int͡ʃwɛɲilɛ nd̤ipʰilisɛ jɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛkʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰isiwɛ amatʰamɓɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ ukʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰iswɛ kakʰulu kɛ wɛna jɛhɔv̤a kɔd̤a kuɓɛ ɓuja jɛhɔv̤a uwuɬanɡ̤ulɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ nd̤isind̤isɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛŋǀɛɓa jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛkufɛni akusɛkʰɔ kukukʰumɓula kwɛlaɓafilɛjɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔsɛnɔkuɓulɛla kuwɛ nd̤id̤iniwɛ kukuɡ̤ǀ̤uma nd̤ilud̤ad̤isa uɓusuku ɓɔnkɛ ukʰukɔ nd̤iwɛnz̤a manz̤i umanɮalɔ nɡ̤ɛɛɲɛmɓɛz̤i z̤am lɔnakɛlɛ kukukʰatʰaz̤ɛka ilisɔ lalupʰɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓam ɓɔnkɛ sukani nɔnkɛ ɓasɛɓɛnz̤i ɓɔɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uliv̤ilɛ iliz̤wi lɔkulila ukuv̤ilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutaxuz̤isa ujɛhɔv̤a umtʰand̤az̤ɔ ujawamkɛla z̤ija kud̤ana z̤ikʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰ɛ kakʰulu z̤ɔnkɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤am z̤ija kuɓujiswa z̤id̤anilɛ nɡ̤ɛpʰaɲaz̤ɔ iʃiɡ̤ajɔn kad̤av̤id̤ɛ awajiv̤umajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamaz̤wi kakuʃi umb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ nd̤iz̤imɛla nɡ̤awɛ nd̤isind̤isɛ kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓand̤isukɛlajɔ und̤iɬanɡ̤ulɛ ɬɛz̤ɛ ɓawukǃwɛnɡ̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲama umpʰɛfumlɔ ɓawuɮav̤ulɛ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ m̤lanɡ̤uli jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤ɛnz̤a ɔku ukuɓa kukʰɔ uɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤am ukuɓa nd̤impʰɛtʰɛ kakuɓi ɔɓɛkǁɔlɛlɛnɛ nd̤amb̤uɲula ɔnd̤iɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ siz̤atʰu maluwusukɛlɛ ut͡ʃaɓa umpʰɛfumlɔ luwufumanɛ luɓuɲaʃɛlɛ pʰant͡si uɓɔmi ɓam uz̤ukɔ lululalisɛ ɛlutʰulini pʰakamisani kʰawusuk umɛ jɛhɔv̤a
