iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuwulunɡ̤isa usɛz̤a iɬutʰɛ imisɛlɛ jawɔ uɲakamisa imikǃɛla jawɔ utʰamɓisa nɡ̤ɛz̤ipʰanɡ̤ɔ usikɛlɛla iz̤ilimɔ z̤awɔ uwutʰwɛsilɛ umɲaka wɔkulunɡ̤a kwakʰɔ imikʰɔnd̤ɔ jakʰɔ it͡sit͡sa ukutʲɛɓa ajat͡sit͡sa amak͡xiwa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ iind̤uli z̤iz̤ib̤iŋǃisɛ umɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓɔ amaɮɛlɔ aŋǁiɓɛ imiɬamɓi jɛɛnkɔmɔ iintili z̤amɓɛtʰɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa jɔnkɛ intɔ ijad̤uma jɔnkɛ intɔ ijav̤uma kumɔnɡ̤amɛli inɡ̤ɔma um̤ɔɓɛ d̤umani kutʰikǁɔ nɔnkɛ ɬaɓatʰi luɓɛtʰɛlɛni uhad̤i uz̤ukɔ lwɛɡ̤ama lakʰɛ mz̤ukisɛni md̤umisɛni jitʰini kutʰikǁɔ haji ukɔjikɛka kwɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuninz̤i ɓamanɮa akʰɔ z̤ija kuwɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ lɔnkɛ iɬaɓatʰi lija kukuŋǃula ɓakuɓɛtʰɛlɛ uhad̤i ɓaliɓɛtʰɛlɛ uhad̤i iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ pʰakamisani jiz̤ani niɓɔnɛ imisɛɓɛnz̤i ɛmikʰulu katʰikǁɔ ɛnɡ̤ɔwɔjikɛkajɔ ɛkwɛnz̤ɛni kwakʰɛ kɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu waluɡ̤ukǃula ulwanɮɛ lwajintɔ ɛjɔmilɛjɔ ɓawuwɛla umlamɓɔ nɡ̤ɛɛɲawɔ apʰɔ sav̤uja nɡ̤ajɛ ulɔlawula nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɛ ajaɓɔnisɛla ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni aɓaz̤iind͡ʒ̤uɓakǃa maɓanɡ̤az̤ipʰakamisi pʰakamisani mɓɔnɡ̤ɛni z̤iz̤wɛ utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu niv̤akalisɛ iliz̤wi lɛnd̤umisɔ jakʰɛ ulɔmisa umpʰɛfumlɔ wɛtʰu ɛɓɔmini akalunikɛla uɲawɔ lwɛtʰu ɛkutʲiɓilikɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa usikǀikid̤ilɛ tʰikǁɔ usiɲiɓilikisilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɲiɓilikiswa kwɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ usinɡ̤ɛnisɛ ɛmɓɔnisɛlwɛni uɓɛkɛ ukǁinz̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛsiŋǃɛni sɛtʰu ukʰwɛlisɛ aɓantu ɛntlɔkwɛni jɛtʰu sinɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛmlilwɛni nasɛmanz̤ini waz̤a wasikʰupʰɛla ɛnd̤awɛni ɛnɛndʲɛɓɔ nd̤ija kunɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ nd̤inamad̤ini aɲukajɔ nd̤ija kuz̤iz̤alisa kuwɛ iz̤ib̤amɓatʰisɔ z̤am ɛjaz̤iv̤ulɛlajɔ imilɛɓɛ jɔmlɔmɔ ɔwaz̤itʰɛtʰajɔ umlɔmɔ ɛkuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛni nd̤ija kuɲusɛla kuwɛ amad̤ini aɲukajɔ ɛɛmv̤ana ɛz̤itʲɛɓilɛjɔ nd̤awɔɲɛ nɛsikǃʰumisɔ sɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa nd̤ija kwɛnz̤a awɛɛnkɔmɔ nd̤awɔɲɛ nawɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ pʰakamisani jiz̤ani niv̤ɛ nd̤inikǁɛlɛlɛ nɔnkɛ ɓamɔjikajɔ utʰikǁɔ ɔkɔ akwɛnz̤ɛlɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ nd̤ad̤and̤uluka kujɛ nɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ kwajɛ ukuɓɔnɡ̤a kupʰant͡si kɔlwimi ukuɓa ɓɛnd̤isɛkɛlɛz̤ɛ uɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jam inkɔsi jam iɓinɡ̤aji kupʰulapʰula haji kɛ utʰikǁɔ upʰulapʰulɛ uliɓaz̤ɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ iliz̤wi lɔmtʰand̤az̤ɔ makaɓɔnɡ̤wɛ utʰikǁɔ jɛna unɡ̤awuɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰanɡ̤a umtʰand̤az̤ɔ nɔɓuɓɛlɛ ɓakʰɛ kumɔnɡ̤amɛli ɛjɔkuɓɛtʰɛlwa nɡ̤ɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤inɛɛntamɓɔ um̤ɔɓɛ inɡ̤ɔma nɡ̤amana utʰikǁɔ wasiɓaɓala wasisikɛlɛla waɓukʰaɲisa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ kutʰi pʰakamisani ukuz̤ɛ jaz̤iwɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini inɮɛla jakʰɔ usind̤isɔ lwakʰɔ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤amana z̤aɓulɛla iz̤iz̤wɛ kuwɛ tʰikǁɔ z̤aɓulɛla iz̤iz̤wɛ kuwɛ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ipʰɛla z̤av̤uja z̤amɛmɛlɛla iz̤iz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uja kuɡ̤wɛɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ uz̤ikʰapʰɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini pʰakamisani nɡ̤amana z̤aɓulɛla iz̤iz̤wɛ kuwɛ tʰikǁɔ z̤aɓulɛla iz̤iz̤wɛ kuwɛ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ipʰɛla um̤laɓa ujiv̤ɛlisilɛ indʲɛɓɔ jawɔ uja kusisikɛlɛla utʰikǁɔ utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu uja kusisikɛlɛla utʰikǁɔ z̤imɔjikɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ipʰɛlɔ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi kumɔnɡ̤amɛli ɛkad̤av̤id̤ɛ um̤ɔɓɛ inɡ̤ɔma makasuk ɛmɛ utʰikǁɔ z̤iɓɛ z̤iint͡sali iint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɛ ɓasaɓɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ aɓamtʰijajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkupʰɛt͡ʃɛtʰwa kɔmsi ɓapʰɛpʰɛtʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɲiɓilika kɔmtʰwɛɓɛɓa pʰamɓi kɔmlilɔ maɓad̤akɛ nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓukatʰikǁɔ kɛ wɔna amalunɡ̤isa makav̤ujɛ aɮamkɛ pʰamɓi kɔtʰikǁɔ aɓɛ nɛmiɬali ɛnɛmiv̤ujɔ v̤umani kutʰikǁɔ liɓɛtʰɛlɛni uhad̤i iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ mɛnz̤ɛlɛni umɛnd̤ɔ ɔpʰakamilɛjɔ ulɔkʰwɛla ɛkǀand̤a ɛz̤iŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsini ɔɡ̤ama lakʰɛ linɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a niɮamkɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ ujisɛ wɛɛnkɛd̤ama umtʰɛtʰɛlɛli waɓaɬɔlɔkaz̤i nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ɛkʰajɛni lakʰɛ ɛliŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤uɬalisa ɛnɮwini aɓaɓɛɓɔd̤wa nɡ̤ukʰupʰɛla ɛɲwɛɓɛni aɓaɓand͡ʒ̤iwɛjɔ nɡ̤aɓaz̤iind͡ʒ̤uɓakǃa ɓɔd̤wa aɓaɬala kwɛliɓalɛlɛlwɛjɔ tʰikǁɔ ɛkupʰumɛni kwakʰɔ upʰamɓi kwaɓantu ɓakʰɔ ɛkuɲatʰɛlɛni kwakʰɔ ɛnkanɡ̤ala pʰakamisani laɲikima iɬaɓatʰi lav̤uz̤a iz̤ulu ɛɓuswɛni ɓukatʰikǁɔ isinaji lɛja ɛɓuswɛni ɓukatʰikǁɔ utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli walit͡ʃiz̤a nɡ̤ɛmv̤ula ɛninz̤i jɛsisa sakʰɔ tʰikǁɔ lakʰɔ lakub̤axa waliz̤imasa wɛna waɬala kʰɔna um̤lamɓi wakʰɔ wamlunɡ̤isɛla ɔlusiz̤ana nɡ̤ɔkulunɡ̤a kwakʰɔ tʰikǁɔ inkɔsi ija kukʰupʰa iz̤wi ɛlinamanɮa uɓɛ mkʰulu umkʰɔsi wɛɛntɔkaz̤i ɛz̤iʃumajɛla iind̤aɓa ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɔɔkumkani ɓɛmikʰɔsi ɓaja kusaɓa ɓɛsaɓilɛ intɔkaz̤i ɛsɛlɛ ɛkʰaja ija kuwaɓa amakǁʰɔɓa nakulala pʰant͡si pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntlanti nɔkǁɛlisa amapʰikɔ ɛv̤ukutʰu alɛkwɛ nɡ̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɛnt͡siɓa z̤alɔ ɛz̤alɛkwɛ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛɓɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛlajɔ ɛkuɓad̤uɓad̤uɓɛni kukasɔmanɮa ɔɔkumkani kulɔ kɔɓa m̤lɔpʰɛ nɡ̤ɔwɛkʰɛpʰu ɛt͡salimɔn jintaɓa katʰikǁɔ intaɓa jasɛb̤aʃan jintaɓa ɛŋǀɔpʰɔ z̤ininz̤i intaɓa jasɛb̤aʃan nijiɡ̤ǁ̤ɛlɛʃɛlani z̤intaɓa z̤iŋǀɔpʰɔ z̤ininz̤i intaɓa ajiŋǃwɛnɛlɛjɔ utʰikǁɔ ukuɓa aɬalɛ kujɔ ɛwɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uja kuɬala kujɔ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ iiŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa z̤ikatʰikǁɔ z̤iz̤iɡ̤id̤i nɡ̤amawakawaka inkɔsi ikuz̤ɔ jisinaji ɛɓuŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni uɲukɛ waja pʰɛz̤ulu utʰimɓɛ aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa utʰaɓatʰɛ iz̤ipʰɔ pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu napʰakatʰi kwaɓaz̤iind͡ʒ̤uɓakǃa ukuɓa aɬalɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kʰɔna majiɓɔnɡ̤wɛ inkɔsi itʰwala imitʰwalɔ jɛtʰu imiɬa nɡ̤ɛmiɬa nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ umsind̤isi wɛtʰu pʰakamisani jɛna utʰikǁɔ kutʰi nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɔsind̤isɔ kɔkukajɛhɔv̤a inkɔsi jɛtʰu ukukʰupʰa ɛkufɛni kɔd̤wa utʰikǁɔ uja kujipʰalusa intlɔkɔ jɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɛ nɛntlɔkɔ ɛnɛsiɬwitʰa jɔhamɓajɔ kwiz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɔ z̤akʰɛ jatʰi inkɔsi nd̤ija kuz̤iɓujisa ɛb̤aʃan nd̤ija kuz̤iɓujisa iint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤inz̤ulwini z̤ɔlwanɮɛ ukuz̤ɛ uz̤ipʰalusɛ uɲawɔ lwakʰɔ lusɛɡ̤az̤ini nɔlwimi lwɛz̤ind͡ʒ̤a z̤akʰɔ luɓɛ nɛsaɓɛlɔ salɔ ɛz̤int͡ʃaɓɛni ɓakuɓɔna ukuɲatʰɛla kwakʰɔ tʰikǁɔ ukuɲatʰɛla kɔtʰikǁɔ kɔkumkani ɛsɛɓuŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni pʰamɓili z̤iimv̤umi nɡ̤asɛmv̤a nɡ̤aɓaɓɛtʰi ɓɔhad̤i ɛmakǀalɛni z̤iintɔmɓi ɛz̤iɓɛtʰa iiŋ̤ǃ̤ɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔ ɛmaɓanɮɛni ɓɔnɡ̤ani utʰikǁɔ inkɔsi ɓasɛmtʰɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛni wakwasirajɛli ɓalapʰɔ ɔɔb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin iŋǀi jaɓɔ umpʰatʰi waɓɔ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakwajud̤a iɬɔkɔnd̤iɓa laɓɔ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakwaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakwanafɛtali utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ wakuwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkuɓa ukǃinɛ kukǃinisɛ tʰikǁɔ ɔkɔ usɛnz̤ɛlɛjɔ ɓɛv̤ɛla ɛtɛmpilɛni jakʰɔ ɛjɔnɡ̤amɛlɛ ijɛrusalɛm ɔɔkumkani maɓɛz̤ɛ nɛz̤itʰaɓatʰaɓa kuwɛ kʰalimɛla amaxamŋǀwa asɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlwɛni um̤lamɓi wɛɛnkunz̤i ɛz̤iz̤iimɓalasanɛ kuɲɛ namatʰɔlɛ ɛz̤iz̤wɛ ukuz̤ɛ ɓaz̤iwisɛ ɓɛnɛz̤id͡ʒ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤ɛ z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ waz̤ib̤anɡ̤isa iz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤ijitʰand̤ajɔ imfaz̤wɛ kɔv̤ɛla amanɔnɔ ɛjiputa ukuʃi wɔz̤ɔlulɛla msiɲa iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ kutʰikǁɔ z̤ikumkani z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi v̤umani kutʰikǁɔ nijiɓɛtʰɛlɛ uhad̤i inkɔsi pʰakamisani ɛkʰwɛla ɛkǀand̤a ɛmaz̤ulwini awɔ amaz̤ulu amand̤ulɔ nankɔ ɛlikʰupʰa iliz̤wi lakʰɛ iliz̤wi ɛlinamanɮa mnikɛni amanɮa utʰikǁɔ ɓupʰɛz̤u kɔsirajɛli uɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa ɓakʰɛ asɛsib̤akab̤akɛni amanɮa akʰɛ ulɔtʰikǁɔ wɔjikɛkajɔ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni z̤akʰɔ ulɔtʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli uɓanikajɔ amanɮa nɔkɔmɛlɛla aɓantu makaɓɔnɡ̤wɛ utʰikǁɔ kumɔnɡ̤amɛli nɡ̤ɛjɛɛɲiɓiɓa ɛkad̤av̤id̤ɛ nd̤isind̤isɛ tʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa amanz̤i and̤ifikɛlɛ ad̤a ɛz̤a ɛmpʰɛfumlwɛni nd̤it͡ʃɔnilɛ ɛlud̤akɛni ɔlunz̤ulu akukʰɔ nd̤inɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛmmɓitʰini ɔnamanz̤i umsinɡ̤a ujand̤intʲwilisɛla nd̤id̤iniwɛ kukud̤and̤uluka wɔmilɛ umkǃala apʰɛlilɛ amɛɬɔ nd̤ilind̤ɛlɛ kutʰikǁɔ aɓand̤itʰijajɔ nɡ̤ɛliz̤ɛ ɓaninz̤i nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnwɛlɛ z̤ɛntlɔkɔ jam ɓaninz̤i aɓand̤iɓanɡ̤isajɔ aɓaz̤iint͡ʃaɓa z̤am ɓɛkǁɔka intɔ ɛnd̤inɡ̤ajipʰanɡ̤anɡ̤a ɓatʰi mand̤ijiɓujisɛ tʰikǁɔ wɛna ujakwaz̤i ukumatʰa namatʲala akanakuɡ̤uʃwa kuwɛ maɓanɡ̤ad̤ani nɡ̤am aɓakutʰɛmɓajɔ nkɔsi jam jɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi maɓanɡ̤aŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤wa nɡ̤am aɓakufunajɔ tʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤itʰwɛlɛ iŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɔ iɬaz̤ɔ liɓuɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɛ uɓusɔ ɓam nd̤inɡ̤ɔwasɛmz̤ini kuɓaz̤alwana ɓam nd̤inɡ̤ɔwɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a kuɓantwana ɓakama nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lind̤iɮilɛ ikʰwɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnɮu jakʰɔ iiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ z̤aɓakuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ajɔ z̤iwɛ pʰɛz̤u mna umpʰɛfumlɔ uz̤ila ukuɮa ɔkɔ kwaɓa jiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤am z̤aɓa z̤ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ nd̤aɓa jintɔ jɔkuz̤ɛkɛlisa kuɓɔ ɓatʰɛtʰa nɡ̤am aɓaɬɛli ɛsanɡ̤wɛni nd̤ijinɡ̤ɔma jamaŋǁila kɛ nd̤itʰand̤az̤a kuwɛ jɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛlikʰɔlɛkilɛjɔ tʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔɓuninz̤i ɓɛŋǀɛɓa jakʰɔ nd̤ipʰɛnd̤ulɛ nɡ̤ɛɲanisɔ jɔsind̤isɔ lwakʰɔ nd̤iɬanɡ̤ulɛ ɛlud̤akɛni nd̤inɡ̤at͡ʃɔni mand̤iɬanɡ̤ulwɛ kwaɓand̤itʰijajɔ nasɛmimɓitʰini ɛnamanz̤i mawunɡ̤and̤intʲwilisɛli umsinɡ̤a wamanz̤i inɡ̤and̤iɡ̤iɲi inz̤ulu ikǃula malinɡ̤and̤iv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ɛli nɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ walɔ nd̤ipʰɛnd̤ulɛ jɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ilunɡ̤ilɛ iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɔ nɡ̤anɡ̤ɔɓuninz̤i ɓɛmfɛsanɛ jakʰɔ nd̤ib̤ɛkɛ musa ukuɓusitʰɛlisa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ kumkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛkilɛ kʰawulɛz̤a und̤ipʰɛnd̤ulɛ sɔnd̤ɛla ɛmpʰɛfumlwɛni uwukʰululɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤am nd̤ikʰululɛ wɛna ujakwaz̤i ukuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤wa nɔkud̤aniswa nɔkuɬaz̤wa ɓapʰamɓi kwakʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓand̤iɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlajɔ iŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ japʰula intliz̤ijɔ jam nd̤apʰant͡sa nd̤atʰɛmɓa ukukʰuz̤wa akwaɓakʰɔ nɔkutʰutʰuz̤ɛlwa and̤akufumana ukuɮa ɓand̤inika iɲɔnɡ̤ɔ ɛkuŋǁanwɛni ɓand̤isɛz̤a iv̤iniɡ̤a isitʰɛɓɛ saɓɔ pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ masiɓɛ nɡ̤umɡ̤iɓɛ siɓɛ sisixintʲɛlɔ kwaɓanɛmasi makaɓɛ mɲama amɛɬɔ aɓɔ ɓanɡ̤aɓɔni usiɡ̤ǁ̤ad̤az̤ɛlisɛ isiŋǃɛ saɓɔ amakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ ɓapʰalaz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔb̤av̤umɔ lwakʰɔ kuɓafikɛlɛ ukuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɔ iŋ̤ǃ̤ili jaɓɔ majiɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala ɛz̤intɛntɛni z̤aɓɔ kunɡ̤aɬali nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓajamsukɛla ɔɓɛtʰwɛ nɡ̤uwɛ ɓaŋǀɔkɔlɛ nɡ̤ɔmv̤and̤ɛd̤wa wɔɓaɬaɓilɛjɔ wɛna jɔnɡ̤ɛz̤a uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɛɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁɛni ɓaɓɔ ɓanɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni ɛɓulunɡ̤i sɛniɓakʰɔ maɓakǀiɲwɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɔɓɔmi ɓanɡ̤ab̤alwa namalunɡ̤isa kɛ nd̤ilusiz̤ana nd̤inɔmv̤and̤ɛd̤wa usind̤isɔ lwakʰɔ tʰikǁɔ malund̤isɛ ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɛni nd̤ija kulid̤umisa iɡ̤ama likatʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkuv̤uma nd̤ilɛnz̤ɛ likʰulu nɡ̤ɔkuɓulɛla ɔkɔ kuja kukʰɔlɛka kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnkunz̤i ɛz̤int͡ʃa ɛz̤inɛɛmpɔnd̤ɔ nɛɛmpupʰu ɓɛɓɔna aɓalulamilɛjɔ ɓɔv̤uja nina ɓamkǃukǃɛlajɔ utʰikǁɔ intliz̤ijɔ jɛnu majipʰilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ujawɛv̤a amaɬwɛmpu akaɓad̤ɛli aɓaɓand͡ʒ̤iwɛjɔ ɓakʰɛ malimd̤umisɛ iz̤ulu nɔm̤laɓa ulwanɮɛ nɛntɔ jɔnkɛ ɛnamɓuz̤ɛlajɔ kulɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰikǁɔ uja kujisind̤isa iz̤ijɔn ajakʰɛ imiz̤i jakwajud̤a ɓaɬalɛ kʰɔna ɓajimɛ iliɮɛ imɓɛwu jaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɓaɬalɛ kujɔ aɓalitʰand̤ajɔ iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ kumɔnɡ̤amɛli ɛkad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛjɔkukʰumɓuz̤a tʰikǁɔ kʰawulɛz̤a und̤iɬanɡ̤ulɛ jɛhɔv̤a kʰawulɛz̤a und̤iŋǀɛd̤ɛ maɓad̤anɛ ɓaɓɛ nɛɛntlɔni aɓawufunajɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ maɓaɓujɛ umv̤a ɓaɬaz̤ɛkɛ aɓananz̤ɛ ukuɓa nd̤iɬɛlwɛ ɓuɓuɓi maɓaɓujɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmv̤uz̤ɔ wɛd̤anɔ laɓɔ aɓatʰi t͡ʃɔt͡ʃɔ t͡ʃɔt͡ʃɔ maɓaɓɛ nɛmiɬali ɓav̤ujɛ nɡ̤awɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓakukǃukǃɛlajɔ aɓalutʰand̤ajɔ usind̤isɔ lwakʰɔ maɓaɬalɛ ɓɛsitʰi makɛnz̤iwɛ mkʰulu utʰikǁɔ kɛ nd̤ilusiz̤ana nd̤iliɬwɛmpu tʰikǁɔ kʰawulɛz̤a uz̤ɛ umŋǀɛd̤i nɔmsind̤isi nɡ̤uwɛ jɛhɔv̤a ukuliɓala nd̤iz̤imɛla nɡ̤awɛ jɛhɔv̤a mand̤inɡ̤az̤ɛ nd̤id̤anɛ napʰakad̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɔ nd̤iɬanɡ̤ulɛ nd̤isiz̤ɛ nd̤itʰɔɓɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ jakʰɔ und̤isind̤isɛ jiɓa ɛlilikʰaja nd̤iz̤ɛ kulɔ nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ uwisɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkuɓa nd̤isind̤iswɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa jam nɛmɓɔnisɛlɔ jam nɡ̤uwɛ tʰikǁɔ nd̤isiz̤ɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɛsanɮɛni sɔɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰajɔ nɔsisib̤ɔv̤ub̤ɔv̤u nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ulitʰɛmɓa nkɔsi jam jɛhɔv̤a inkɔlɔsɛkɔ jam kwasɛɓuŋǀinanɛni ɓam nd̤ikǁʰaswɛ nɡ̤uwɛ kwasɛsiz̤alwɛni nɡ̤uwɛ ɔwand̤itʰʲɔɓɔz̤isajɔ ɛz̤iɓilinini z̤ikama ind̤umisɔ jam inɡ̤awɛ nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ nd̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsimanɡ̤a kwaɓaninz̤i kɛ wɛna uliɬatʰi ɛliŋǃaɓilɛjɔ umlɔmɔ uja kuz̤ala jind̤umisɔ jakʰɔ sisihɔmɓɔ sakʰɔ jɔnkɛ musa ukund̤ilaɬa nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔɓukǁʰɛɡ̤ɔ musa ukund̤iʃija akupʰɛla amanɮa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa z̤itʰɛtʰa nɡ̤am iint͡ʃaɓa z̤am aɓawulind̤ajɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ ɓajakǀɛɓisana ɓɛsitʰi utʰikǁɔ umlaɬilɛ msukɛlɛni nimɓamɓɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akukʰɔ m̤lanɡ̤uli tʰikǁɔ ukuɓa kud̤ɛ tʰikǁɔ kʰawulɛz̤a und̤iŋǀɛd̤ɛ maɓad̤anɛ ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwɛ aɓawukǀʰasajɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ ɓatʰiwɛ wamɓu jiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ nɛɬaz̤ɔ aɓafuna ukuɓa nd̤iɬɛlwɛ ɓuɓuɓi kɛ nd̤ija kuɬala nd̤ilind̤ilɛ nd̤ɔnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛ ɛnd̤umiswɛni jakʰɔ jɔnkɛ umlɔmɔ uja kuɓalisa nɡ̤ɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i jɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɔ nɛjɔsind̤isɔ lwakʰɔ jɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inɡ̤awaz̤i ajɔ nd̤ija kuz̤a nɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i jɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓɛnkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kukʰankaɲa uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɔ ɓakʰɔ wɛd̤wa tʰikǁɔ und̤ifund̤isilɛ kwasɛɓuŋǀinanɛni ɓam unanɡ̤ɔku nd̤ijajikǁɛla imisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɔ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ tʰikǁɔ ukund̤iʃija kud̤ɛ kujɛ ɛɓukǁʰɛɡ̤wɛni nasɛz̤imv̤ini nd̤id̤ɛ nd̤ijikǁɛlɛ inɡ̤alɔ jakʰɔ kwisiz̤ukulwana ɛsit͡ʃa nɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓakʰɔ kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaja kuz̤a tʰikǁɔ uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɔ ɓujɛ ɓafika pʰɛz̤ulu wɛna uz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inkulu tʰikǁɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɛ wɛna usiɓɔnisilɛjɔ iimɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ ɛz̤ininz̤i ɛz̤inɔɓuɓi uja kuɓuja usipʰilisɛ uɓujɛ usixɔlɛ ɛz̤inz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓilɛni z̤amanz̤i ɛɬaɓatʰi uja kuɓand̤isa uɓukʰulu ɓam uɓujɛ wɛna und̤itʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛ nd̤ija kujiɓulɛla nɔkujiɓulɛla kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔmxub̤ɛ iɲanisɔ jakʰɔ tʰikǁɔ nd̤ija kukuɓɛtʰɛla uhad̤i ŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kasirajɛli uja kumɛmɛlɛla umlɔmɔ nd̤akukuɓɛtʰɛla uhad̤i nɔmpʰɛfumlɔ ɔwukʰululɛjɔ nɔlwimi luja kukǁɛla uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɔ jɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛd̤anilɛ ɓɛnɛɛntlɔni aɓafuna ukuɓa nd̤iɬɛlwɛ ɓuɓuɓi ɛkasɔlɔmɔn tʰikǁɔ mnikɛ imiɡ̤wɛɓɔ jakʰɔ mnikɛ uɲana wɔkumkani uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɔ makaɡ̤wɛɓɛ ɛɓantwini ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa nakwaɓaz̤iint͡siz̤ana z̤akʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ iintaɓa maz̤iɓatʰwalɛlɛ ukǁɔlɔ aɓantu kwanɛɛnd̤uli z̤iɓatʰwalɛlɛ ɛɓulunɡ̤isɛni makaɡ̤wɛɓɛ itʲala laɓaz̤iint͡siz̤ana ɛɓantwini asind̤isɛ ɔɔɲana ɓamaɬwɛmpu aɓatʲumz̤ɛ aɓakǀud̤isi maɓakɔjikɛ ukuɬala ɛliɬɛlijɔ ilanɡ̤a kwanɛɲanɡ̤a iz̤iz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana makɛɬɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmv̤ula ɛɬa pʰɛz̤u kɔtʲani ɔɓusikwajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ipʰanɡ̤ɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmv̤ula ɛmatʰɔnt͡si makʰulu ɛm̤laɓɛni malitʲatʲamɓɛ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jakʰɛ ilunɡ̤isa nɔɓuninz̤i ɓɔkǁɔlɔ id̤ɛ inɡ̤aɓi saɓakʰɔ iɲanɡ̤a makapʰatʰɛ uɓukʰɔsi ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛlwanɮɛ asɛ ɛlwanɮɛ ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kuwɔ umlamɓɔ asɛ ɛz̤ipʰɛlwɛni z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi ɓaja kuɡ̤ukǃa pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ aɓɛmi ɓɔmkǃwɛɓɛd̤u z̤ikʰɔtʰɛ utʰuli iint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɛ ɔɔkumkani ɓasɛtarʃiʃɛ naɓɛz̤ikǃitʰi ɓaja iminikɛlɔ ɔɔkumkani ɓakwaʃɛb̤a naɓakwasɛb̤a ɓaja kusɔnd̤ɛz̤a isitʰaɓatʰaɓa ɓakǃuɓud̤ɛ kujɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔkumkani z̤imkʰɔnz̤ɛ sɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uja kuliɬanɡ̤ula iɬwɛmpu ɛliz̤iɓikajɔ naɓaz̤iint͡siz̤ana aɓanɡ̤ɛnaluŋǀɛd̤ɔ aɓɛnz̤ɛlɛ iŋǀɛɓa aɓaswɛlɛjɔ naɓanɡ̤amaɬwɛmpu asind̤isɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ jamaɬwɛmpu akʰululɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ jawɔ ɛkukǁinɛz̤ɛlwɛni nasɛkuɡ̤ɔɲamɛlwɛni liŋǃaɓilɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ iɡ̤az̤i lawɔ uja kupʰila anikwɛ iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ jakwaʃɛb̤a ɓaɬalɛ ɓɛmtʰand̤az̤ɛla ɓamsikɛlɛlɛ jɔnkɛ makuɓɛkʰɔ intaɓalala jɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa ɛz̤wɛni isɛ ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛɛntaɓa ukukǃʰama kwajɔ makuxaʃaz̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlɛb̤anɔn maɓatʲatʲamɓɛ ɛmiz̤ini jaɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmifunɔ jɔm̤laɓa maliɓɛ nɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ maliv̤ɛlisɛ amaɡ̤atʲa iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ pʰamɓi kwɛlanɡ̤a ɓaz̤isikɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤ajɛ maz̤itʰi z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a unɡ̤ɔnɔjɔlɔ makaɓɔnɡ̤wɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ulɔmɛnz̤i wɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ jɛna jɛd̤wa malisikɛlɛlwɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ ɛliz̤ukilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ liz̤alɛ lɔnkɛ iɬaɓatʰi luz̤ukɔ lwakʰɛ amɛn amɛn ipʰɛlilɛ imitʰand̤az̤ɔ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ uɲana kajɛsɛ um̤ɔɓɛ kaasafu ulunɡ̤ilɛ kwapʰɛla utʰikǁɔ kusirajɛli kwaɓantliz̤ijɔ z̤iɲulu kɛ ɓɛz̤ipʰant͡sɛ iiɲawɔ z̤am ɡ̤ǀ̤wiz̤i ukutʲiɓilika ukuɲatʰɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛnd̤iɓamɔnɛla aɓakǃʰajisajɔ nd̤akukuɓɔna ukupʰumɛlɛla kwaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓanaz̤intlunɡ̤u ɛkufɛni kwaɓɔ ɓapʰililɛ ɓatʲɛɓilɛ umz̤imɓa waɓɔ ɛɓuɓini ɓaɓantu aɓakʰɔ ɓɔna aɓakʰatʰaz̤wa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓaɲɛ aɓantu nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ intamɔ jaɓɔ iŋǁitʲwɛ ik͡xat͡ʃi ukuɡ̤ɔɲamɛla kuɓatʰɛ wamɓu nɡ̤ɔkwɛnɡ̤uɓɔ amɛɬɔ aɓɔ av̤ɛlilɛ kukutʲɛɓa amab̤ɔnɡ̤ɔ ɛɛntliz̤ijɔ z̤aɓɔ apʰumɛla pʰanɮɛ ɓaɬalɛla nɡ̤ɛntlamɓa ɓatʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔkuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛla ɓɛnɔɓuɓi ɓatʰɛtʰa iind̤umɓisa z̤amaz̤wi ɓawuɓɛka ɛz̤ulwini umlɔmɔ waɓɔ ulwimi lwaɓɔ luhamɓa ɛm̤laɓɛni wɔnkɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ aɓantu ɓaɓɔ ɓaɓujɛla apʰa ɓafiŋǀa amanz̤i amaninz̤i ɓatʰi unɔkutʰini ukwaz̤i utʰikǁɔ kukʰɔ ukwaz̤i kɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni jaɓɔna aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ aɓaja ɓanɔkukǀʰulumakǀʰa nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ ɓand̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɔkutʲɛɓa sifumanɛ sajikǃakǃamɓisa intliz̤ijɔ jɛtʰu saz̤iɬamɓa iz̤anɮa z̤ɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤akʰatʰaz̤ɛka jɔnkɛ ukɔɬwajwa kwɛtʰu kwaɓa kɔkwɛmisɔ jɔnkɛ ukuɓa ɓɛnd̤itʰɛ nd̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukutʰɛtʰa jaɓɔna nɡ̤ɛnd̤inɡ̤iniz̤ilɛ kwisiz̤ukulwana sɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nd̤atʰi kɛ nd̤akukǀinɡ̤a ukuɓa nd̤ikwaz̤i ɔkɔ kwajinkɔɬa ɛmɛɬwɛni nd̤ad̤a nd̤aja kunɡ̤ɛna ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni z̤ikatʰikǁɔ nd̤akuɡ̤ǃ̤ala kɛ ukupʰɛla kwaɓɔ inɛnɛ uɓamisɛ ɛz̤ind̤awɛni ɛz̤iɓutʰɛlɛz̤i waɓawisa ɓaɓa jint͡ʃaɓalala haji ukupʰanz̤iswa kwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛpʰaɲaz̤ɔ ɓapʰɛlilɛ ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤itʲiwɛ kukukʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛpʰupʰa ɛkukǃaɓukɛni kɔmntu ɛkuv̤ukɛni kwakʰɔ nkɔsi wɔwud̤ɛla umfanɛkisɔ waɓɔ ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤aɓind̤ɛka intliz̤ijɔ nd̤aɬaɓɛka ɛz̤int͡swɛni nd̤ɔɓa kɛ nd̤isisitʰʲakala nd̤inɡ̤ɛnakwaz̤i nd̤ɔɓa kɛ nd̤isisilɔ kuwɛ mna kɛ nd̤iɬala nd̤inawɛ und̤iɓamɓilɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sɔkunɛnɛ uja kund̤ikʰapʰa nɡ̤ɛkǀɛɓɔ lakʰɔ und̤itʰaɓatʰɛ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔku nd̤iɓɛ nɔz̤ukɔ nd̤inaɓani ɛmaz̤ulwini ukuɓa wɛna unɡ̤ɔwam and̤ilinanz̤ɛ nɡ̤antɔ iɬaɓatʰi inɡ̤apʰɛla iɲama jam nɛntliz̤ijɔ jam iliwa lɛntliz̤ijɔ jam nɛsaɓɛlɔ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jaɓɔna aɓaɲawukilɛjɔ kuwɛ ɓaja kud̤aka ujaɓab̤anɡ̤isa ɓɔnkɛ aɓahɛɲuz̤ajɔ ɓɛmkɛ kuwɛ mna kɛ ukusɔnd̤ɛla kutʰikǁɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛ nd̤ijɛnz̤a iɬatʰi inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukuz̤ɛ nd̤ijiɓalisɛ jɔnkɛ imisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɛ ɛjɔkukǃikǃa ɛkaasafu jini tʰikǁɔ ukuɓa uɬalɛ usiɬamɓilɛ ukǃʰumɛ umsind̤ɔ wakʰɔ kwiz̤imv̤u z̤ɛɮɛlɔ lakʰɔ likʰumɓulɛ iɓanɮa lakʰɔ ɔlitʰɛnɡ̤ilɛjɔ kwakud̤ala ɔlikʰululɛjɔ laɓa sisiz̤wɛ sɛlifa lakʰɔ intaɓa jasɛz̤ijɔn ɔɬɛli kujɔ pʰakamisa ukuɲatʰɛla kwakʰɔ ukuja kumaŋǁuwa aɬala ɛɬɛli ut͡ʃaɓa luv̤iv̤ɛ intɔ jɔnkɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni ɓab̤axula aɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓakʰɔ ɛnd̤awɛni jɔkuɬanɡ̤ana pʰakatʰi ɓamisa ɛjaɓɔ imikǃɔnd̤isɔ jaɓa jijɔ ɛjimikǃɔnd̤isɔ kwanɡ̤a kunɡ̤ɛnɛlwɛ int͡ʃiɲɛla jɛmitʰi nɡ̤ɛz̤ikǁɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɛ kunɡ̤ɔku ukǃɔkǃɔ lwajɔ lɔnkɛ ɓalukǀand̤a nɡ̤amaz̤ɛmɓɛ nɛɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔɓɔnɡ̤a ɓajifaka umlilɔ iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jakʰɔ ɓawuɬamɓɛla nɡ̤ɔkuwuwisɛla ɛm̤laɓɛni umŋǃuɓa wɛɡ̤ama lakʰɔ ɓatʰi ɛz̤intliz̤ijwɛni z̤aɓɔ sija kuɓaɲanz̤ɛlɛla pʰant͡si kupʰɛlɛ ɓaz̤it͡ʃisilɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iind̤awɔ z̤ikatʰikǁɔ z̤ɔkuɬanɡ̤ana ɛz̤wɛni apʰa imikǃɔnd̤isɔ jɛtʰu asijiɓɔni akusɛkʰɔ mprɔfɛti kutʰi akukʰɔ waz̤ijɔ ukuɓa kɔd̤a kusɛ pʰi kund͡ʒ̤alɔ kunini tʰikǁɔ umɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɛŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a ut͡ʃaɓa luɬɛli luliɡ̤iɓa iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ usifiɲɛz̤ɛlɛni isanɮa sakʰɔ nɛsɔkunɛnɛ sakʰɔ sixɔlɛ ɛsifuɓɛni sakʰɔ uluɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ kɛ utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ukumkani kwakumand̤ulɔ ulɔsɛɓɛnz̤a usind̤isɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ nɡ̤uwɛ ɔwaɬula ulwanɮɛ nɡ̤amanɮa akʰɔ ɔwapʰula iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛɛnɡ̤wɛɲa ɛmanz̤ini nɡ̤uwɛ ɔwakǁʰakǁʰa iintlɔkɔ z̤ɛlɛv̤ijatan waz̤inika z̤akukuɮa kuɓantu kuɓɛmi ɓɔmkǃwɛɓɛd̤u nɡ̤uwɛ ɔwaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤a jajimitʰɔmɓɔ jajimiland͡ʒ̤ana nɡ̤uwɛ ɔwɔmisa imilamɓɔ ɛnɡ̤ɔmijɔ jɛjakʰɔ ɓɔɓakʰɔ nɔɓusuku nɡ̤uwɛ ɔwalunɡ̤isa ukukʰaɲa nɛlanɡ̤a nɡ̤uwɛ ɔwamisa jɔnkɛ imid̤a jɛɬaɓatʰi iɬɔɓɔ nɔɓusika nɡ̤uwɛ ɔwaz̤iɓumɓajɔ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ kʰumɓula ɔku ut͡ʃaɓa luŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a aɓantu aɓanɔɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ ɓaliɡ̤iɓilɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ musa ukuwunikɛla ɛxamŋǀwɛni umpʰɛfumlɔ wɛhɔɓɛ lakʰɔ unɡ̤aɬali uwuliɓɛlɛ um̤lamɓi wakʰɔ ɔz̤iint͡siz̤ana b̤ɛka ɛmŋǃɔpʰiswɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iind̤awɔ ɛz̤imɲama z̤ɛliz̤wɛ z̤iz̤ɛlɛ z̤iz̤inɮu z̤ɔɡ̤ɔɲamɛlɔ makanɡ̤aɓuji ɔtʲumkilɛjɔ ɛɬaz̤isiwɛ makalid̤umisɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ ɔlusiz̤ana nɔliɬwɛmpu kʰawusuk umɛ tʰikǁɔ uɓamɓanɛ naɓaɓamɓɛnɛ nawɛ kʰumɓula ukukuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a kwɛsid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ jɔnkɛ musa ukuliliɓala iz̤wi laɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓakʰɔ ukuŋ̤ǁ̤ɔla kwaɓasukɛla pʰɛz̤ulu kuwɛ ɔkuɬala kuɲuka kumɔnɡ̤amɛli nɡ̤ɛtʰi unɡ̤ɔnakalisi um̤ɔɓɛ kaasafu inɡ̤ɔma sijaɓulɛla kuwɛ tʰikǁɔ sijaɓulɛla lisɔnd̤ɛlɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ ɓaɓalisa imisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɔ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰi nd̤ija kwɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛlimisiwɛjɔ mna nd̤ija kuɡ̤wɛɓa nɡ̤ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ lijɛtʰa amanɮa iɬaɓatʰi naɓɛmi ɓalɔ kɛ nd̤iz̤iz̤inz̤isilɛ iint͡sika z̤alɔ pʰakamisani nd̤itʰi kuɓakǃʰajisi musani ukukǃʰajisa nakwaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ musani ukupʰakamisa upʰɔnd̤ɔ musani ukulupʰakamisɛla pʰɛz̤ulu upʰɔnd̤ɔ lwɛnu ninɡ̤atʰɛtʰi nɡ̤ɔkusa nɔlulɛ intamɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɡ̤wɛɓɔ aluv̤ɛli ɛmpumalanɡ̤a nasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a nasɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jɛɛntaɓa haji nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ɔɡ̤wɛɓajɔ ujamtʰɔɓa lɔ ampʰakamisɛ lɔwa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ind̤ɛɓɛ isɛsanɮɛni sikajɛhɔv̤a ipʰupʰuma iɡ̤wɛɓu lɛwajini iz̤ɛlɛ jɛpʰitʰikɛz̤iwɛjɔ utʰulula kujɔ ɛwɛ iintlɛnɡ̤a z̤ajɔ z̤ija kusɛlwa z̤ifiŋǀwɛ nɡ̤aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛɬaɓatʰi kɛ nd̤ija kuʃumajɛla nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ nd̤ija kuv̤uma kutʰikǁɔ kajakɔɓi z̤ɔnkɛ iimpɔnd̤ɔ z̤aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ nd̤ija kuz̤ikǁakakǁa iimpɔnd̤ɔ z̤ɛlunɡ̤isa z̤ija kupʰakaɲiswa kumɔnɡ̤amɛli ɛjɔkuɓɛtʰɛlwa nɡ̤ɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤inɛɛntamɓɔ um̤ɔɓɛ kaasafu inɡ̤ɔma waz̤iwa kwajud̤a utʰikǁɔ likʰulu kwasirajɛli iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ umŋǃuɓa wakʰɛ waɓa sɛsalɛm nɛkʰaja lakʰɛ ɛz̤ijɔn wajapʰula apʰɔ imiɓanɛ jɛsapʰɛtʰa inɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ nɛk͡xɛlɛ nɛz̤ikǁʰɔɓɔ z̤ɛmfaz̤wɛ pʰakamisani ukʰaɲilɛ ujinɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntaɓa z̤ɔkukǃwɛnɡ̤a ɓab̤uɲulwɛ aɓantliz̤ijɔ ijimɓalasanɛ ɓalala kaɲɛ akaz̤ifumana iz̤anɮa z̤awɔ ɔnkɛ amak͡xɔti ɛkukʰalimɛni kwakʰɔ tʰikǁɔ kajakɔɓi kwasind̤wa ɓuɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ iiŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa namahaʃɛ unɡ̤uwɛna wɛna wɔjikɛkajɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɔkuma pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ wakuɓa nɔmsind̤ɔ ɛmaz̤ulwini usiv̤akalisilɛ isiɡ̤wɛɓɔ lɔjika iɬaɓatʰi laz̤ɔla ɛkusukɛni kukatʰikǁɔ ukuɓa aɡ̤wɛɓɛ aɓasind̤isɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓalulamilɛjɔ ɓɛɬaɓatʰi pʰakamisani nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓuʃuʃu ɓɔmntu ɓuja kuɓa nɡ̤umɓulɛlɔ kuwɛ uja kuwab̤iŋǃa amasalɛla ɔɓuʃuʃu b̤amɓatʰisani nisiz̤alisɛ isib̤amɓatʰisɔ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu ɓɔnkɛ aɓamŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnɡ̤ilɛjɔ maɓɛz̤ɛ nɛz̤itʰaɓatʰaɓa kɔfanɛlɛ kukɔjikwa uja kuŋǃumla ukufutʰa kwɛɛnɡ̤anɡ̤a ujɔjikɛka kɔɔkumkani ɓɛɬaɓatʰi kumɔnɡ̤amɛli kujɛd̤utun ɛkaasafu um̤ɔɓɛ iz̤wi lisinɡ̤isa kutʰikǁɔ nd̤ikʰala iz̤wi lisinɡ̤isa kutʰikǁɔ ukuɓa and̤iɓɛkɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwa nd̤ikǃukǃɛla ɛnkɔsini jam isanɮa sɔlukilɛ ɛɓusuku asakǃɔɓa awav̤uma ukutʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛka umpʰɛfumlɔ nd̤ikʰumɓula utʰikǁɔ nd̤iŋǀwinɛ nd̤itʰɛlɛkɛlɛlɛ utʰʲafɛ umɔja pʰakamisani uz̤iɓamɓilɛ iinkɔpʰɛ z̤amɛɬɔ nd̤ikʰand̤iwɛ and̤aɓa nakutʰɛtʰa nd̤ikǀinɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jamand̤ulɔ imiɲaka jasɛpʰakad̤ɛni nd̤ija kukʰumɓula ɛɓusuku ukuɓɛtʰa uhad̤i nd̤itʰɛtʰa nɛntliz̤ijɔ jam upʰɛnɡ̤ulula umɔja nd̤itʰi ija kund̤iɬamɓa nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ inkɔsi jam inɡ̤aɓi sapʰind̤a ipʰatʰɛ nɡ̤ɛtaxu ipʰɛlɛ japʰɛla iŋǀɛɓa jajɔ siɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛ isitʰɛmɓisɔ sajɔ kwisiz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛsiz̤ukulwana utʰikǁɔ ukuliɓɛlɛ ukuɓaɓala ujiv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ imfɛsanɛ jakʰɛ pʰakamisani nd̤id̤ɛ nd̤itʰi kɛ sisifɔ ɛsi jimiɲaka jɛsanɮa sɔkunɛnɛ sɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni nd̤ikʰankaɲa iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ ɛz̤iŋǀamisajɔ z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ikʰumɓula imisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɔ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ jamand̤ulɔ nd̤ikǀamanɡ̤a nɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ ukusɛɓɛnz̤a kwakʰɔ nd̤itʰɛlɛkɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iŋǀamisajɔ tʰikǁɔ isɛɓuŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni inɮɛla jakʰɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ɔmkʰulu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu unɡ̤ulɔtʰikǁɔ wɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓalulɛkilɛjɔ wawaz̤isa amanɮa akʰɔ ɛz̤iz̤wɛni waɓakʰulula nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤alɔ aɓantu ɓakʰɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakajakɔɓi nɔjɔsɛfu pʰakamisani akuɓɔna amanz̤i tʰikǁɔ akuɓɔna amanz̤i az̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤a ɛwɛ aɡ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤a amanz̤i ɛnz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓila amafu ɛŋ̤ǃ̤iŋ̤ǃ̤wa apʰalaz̤a amanz̤i isib̤akab̤aka sav̤akalisa isand̤i ɛwɛ iintɔlɔ z̤akʰɔ z̤ahamɓahamɓa iz̤wi lɛnd̤ud̤umɔ jakʰɔ laɓa sɛsakǃʰwitʰini imiɓanɛ jalikʰaɲisa ɛlimiwɛjɔ laɡ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤a laɲikima iɬaɓatʰi jaɓa sɛlwanɮɛ inɮɛla jakʰɔ nɔmɛnd̤ɔ wakʰɔ waɓa sɛmanz̤ini amaninz̤i awaz̤iwa umkʰɔnd̤ɔ wakʰɔ waɓakʰɔkɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤imv̤u aɓantu ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sɔɔmɔsɛs nɔarɔn ɛjɔkukǃikǃa kaasafu wuɓɛkɛlɛni inɮɛɓɛ umjalɛlɔ ɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu watʰɔɓɛlɛni inɮɛɓɛ amaz̤wi ɔmlɔmɔ nd̤ija kuwuv̤ula umlɔmɔ nɡ̤ɔmz̤ɛkɛlisɔ nd̤ija kumpɔmpɔz̤isa iint͡sɔnkɔtʰa z̤amand̤ulɔ ɛsakuv̤ajɔ sakwaz̤i aɓasiɓalisɛlajɔ ɔɔɓawɔ asiji kukuɡ̤uʃa kɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ sɔɓalisɛla isiz̤ukulwana ɛsiz̤ajɔ iind̤umisɔ z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a namanɮa akʰɛ nɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɛ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ awajɛnz̤ajɔ wamisa isiŋ̤ǃ̤inisɔ kwajakɔɓi waɓɛka umjalɛlɔ kwasirajɛli awawumisɛla ɔɔɓawɔ ukuɓa ɓawaz̤isɛ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ ukuz̤ɛ siwaz̤i isiz̤ukulwana ɛsiz̤ajɔ ɔɔɲana aɓaz̤a kuz̤alwa ɓasukɛ ɓaɓalisɛlɛ aɓaɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓajamɛ nɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ ɓanɡ̤az̤iliɓali iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ ɛz̤iŋǀamisajɔ z̤ikatʰikǁɔ ɓajilɔnd̤ɔlɔz̤ɛ imitʰɛtʰɔ jakʰɛ ɓanɡ̤aɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɔjisɛ isiz̤ukulwana ɛsijind͡ʒ̤uɓakǃa ɛsinɛɛnkani isiz̤ukulwana ɛsinɡ̤ajilunɡ̤isanɡ̤a intliz̤ijɔ jasɔ ɛsimɔja unɡ̤aɲanisanɡ̤a kutʰikǁɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakaɛfrajim ɓɛkǁʰɔɓilɛ ɓɛz̤iintɔli ɛz̤inɛz̤apʰɛtʰa ɓad͡ʒ̤ika nɡ̤ɛmini jɛmfaz̤wɛ aɓawuɡ̤ǀ̤inanɡ̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ katʰikǁɔ aɓav̤umanɡ̤a ukuhamɓa nɡ̤ɔmjalɛlɔ wakʰɛ ɓaz̤iliɓala iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤iŋǀamisajɔ nɛz̤iɓalulɛkilɛjɔ z̤akʰɛ awaɓaɓɔnisajɔ pʰamɓi kɔɔjisɛ wɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓalulɛkilɛjɔ ɛz̤wɛni lamajiputa ɛm̤laɓɛni wasɛt͡sɔhan walud̤aɓula ulwanɮɛ waɓawɛz̤a wawamisa amanz̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmfumɓa waɓakʰapʰa nɡ̤ɛlifu ɛmini nɡ̤ɔkukʰaɲa kɔmlilɔ uɓusuku ɓɔnkɛ walikǀand̤a ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ waɓasɛz̤a amanz̤i anz̤ɔnɡ̤ɔnz̤ɔnɡ̤ɔ kakʰulu wav̤ɛlisa imikǃukukǃɛla jamanz̤i ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxɛni waɬisa amanz̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmilamɓɔ ɓakǃɔkɛla nɔkɔ ukɔna kujɛ nɔkumpʰikisa ɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni ɛmkǃwɛɓɛd̤wini ɓamlinɡ̤a utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuwuɓiz̤ɛla umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ ukuɮa ɓatʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ ɓatʰi unakɔ utʰikǁɔ ukulunɡ̤isa isitʰɛɓɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jaɓɔna waliɓɛtʰa aɓalɛka amanz̤i jakʰukula nɛmiland͡ʒ̤ana wɔɓa nakɔ nɔkuɓanika ukutʲa nɔkuɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛla iɲama aɓantu ɓakʰɛ wɛv̤a kɛ utʰikǁɔ wapʰupʰuma umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ wat͡ʃa umlilɔ kwajakɔɓi kwɛɲuka kwaja umsind̤ɔ kwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛnɡ̤akʰɔlwanɡ̤a kutʰikǁɔ ɓɛnɡ̤akʰɔlɔsanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔsind̤isɔ lwakʰɛ waz̤iwisɛla kɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ iiŋ̤ǃ̤imɓa z̤amafu nɡ̤apʰɛz̤ulu waz̤iv̤ula iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤ɛz̤ulu waɓanisɛla nɡ̤ɛmana ukuz̤ɛ ɓaɮɛ waɓanika iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa jasɛz̤ulwini umntu waɮa isɔnka sɔnamanɮa waɓatʰumɛla umpʰakɔ ɓad̤a ɓad̤ikwa wand̤ulula umɔja wasɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɛz̤ulwini wawukǃʰuɓa nɡ̤amanɮa akʰɛ umɔja wasɛz̤ant͡si waɓanisɛla iɲama nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔtʰuli nɛɛntaka ɛz̤inamapʰikɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntlaɓatʰi jɔlwanɮɛ jawa pʰakatʰi kwɛmiŋǃuɓa jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛmakʰajɛni aɓɔ ɓaɮa ɓaɬutʰa kakʰulu waɓaz̤isɛla kɛ inkanukɔ jaɓɔ ɓɛnɡ̤ɛkaʃɛŋǁi ɛnkanukwɛni jaɓɔ kusɛkʰɔ ukuɮa kwaɓɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni waɓɔ kwɛɲuka umsind̤ɔ katʰikǁɔ waja kuɓɔ waɓulala pʰakatʰi kwaɓatʲɛɓilɛjɔ ɓaɓɔ wawawisa amad̤ɔd̤ana akwasirajɛli kujɔ jɔnkɛ lɔɔ ntɔ ɓahamɓisa nɡ̤ɔkɔna aɓakʰɔlwa jimisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɛ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ wajipʰɛlisa kɛ imiɬa jaɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmpʰunɡ̤a nɛmiɲaka jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkukʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰isa kǁa watʰi waɓaɓulala ɓamkǃukǃɛla ɓaɓuja ɓamkǃukǃɛla utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɛɲamɛkɔ ɓakʰumɓula ukuɓa utʰikǁɔ laɓɔ utʰikǁɔ ɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni unɡ̤umkʰululi waɓɔ kɛ ɓamtʰɔmalalisa nɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ waɓɔ ɓamkǁɔkisa nɡ̤ɔlwimi lwaɓɔ intliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ ajakǃina kujɛ aɓaɲanisɛka ɛmŋǃɔpʰiswɛni wakʰɛ kɛ jɛna unɛmfɛsanɛ ukǁɔlɛla uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa nɡ̤ɔkǀamaɡ̤uʃɛlɔ akɔnakalisi wawuɓujisa futʰi umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ akaɓukǁʰɔkǁʰa ɓɔnkɛ uɓuʃuʃu ɓakʰɛ wakʰumɓula ukuɓa ɓajiɲama ɓanɡ̤umɔja ɔmkajɔ ɔnɡ̤aɓujijɔ kukanɡ̤apʰi ɓɛmpʰikisa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɓɛmɛnz̤a ɓuɬunɡ̤u ɛnkanɡ̤ala ɓaɓuja ɓamlinɡ̤a utʰikǁɔ ɓamɛnz̤akalisa ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ wakwasirajɛli aɓasikʰumɓula isanɮa sakʰɛ imini awaɓakʰulula nɡ̤ajɔ ɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛni awamisa nɡ̤ajɔ imikǃɔnd̤isɔ jakʰɛ ɛjiputa nɛz̤imanɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni wasɛt͡sɔhan wajiɡ̤ukǃula imid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ jaɓɔ jaɓa liɡ̤az̤i aɓaɓa nakujisɛla imikǃukukǃɛla jaɓɔ jamanz̤i watʰumɛla kuɓɔ iiŋ̤ǀ̤ɔŋ̤ǀ̤ɔni z̤aɓaɮa namasɛlɛ aɓat͡ʃaɓalalisa iz̤ilimɔ z̤aɓɔ waz̤inika iinkumɓi ɛz̤iŋǃuŋǃutʰajɔ ukukǁɛlɛnɡ̤a kwaɓɔ iinkumɓi ɛz̤and̤ajɔ wawuɓulala nɡ̤ɛsikǀʰɔtʰɔ umd̤ilija waɓɔ nɛmitʰɔmɓɛ jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔmkʰɛŋ̰ǀ̰ɛ wajinikɛla kwisikǀʰɔtʰɔ imfujɔ jaɓɔ nɛmiɬamɓi jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛmiɓanɛ watʰumɛla kuɓɔ ukuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ ukupʰupʰuma kwawɔ nɔkub̤av̤uma nɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ iɓutʰɔ lɛz̤itʰuɲwa z̤ɔɓuɓi wawulunɡ̤ɛlɛlanisɛla umɛnd̤ɔ umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ akawuŋǃand̤a ɛkufɛni umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ waɓunikɛla uɓɔmi ɓaɓɔ kwindʲikitʲa jɔkufa waɓaɓulala ɓɔnkɛ aɓamaz̤iɓulɔ ɛjiputa iintlaɬɛla z̤amanɮa ɔɓud̤ɔd̤a ɛz̤intɛntɛni z̤akwaham aɓantu ɓakʰɛ waɓafud̤usa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤imv̤u waɓakǃʰuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔm̤lamɓi ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ waɓakʰapʰa ɓɛkʰɔlɔsilɛ ɓɛnɡ̤ankwantʲi kɛ z̤ɔna iint͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ lwaz̤iɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla ulwanɮɛ waɓaz̤isa ɛmd̤ɛni wakʰɛ ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kulɛ ntaɓa sajiz̤uz̤ajɔ isanɮa sakʰɛ sɔkunɛnɛ waɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa iintlanɡ̤a ɛɓuswɛni ɓaɓɔ waz̤ɛnz̤ɛla amakǃaʃisɔ z̤alilifa ɛlikǀand̤iwɛjɔ iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤akwasirajɛli waz̤iɬalisa ɛz̤intɛntɛni z̤az̤ɔ kɔd̤wa ɓamlinɡ̤a ɓampʰikisa utʰikǁɔ ɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni aɓaz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤ina iz̤iŋ̤ǃ̤inisɔ z̤akʰɛ ɓaɓuja unuv̤a ɓanɡ̤iniz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɔjisɛ ɓad͡ʒ̤ika nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsapʰɛtʰa ɛsikʰɔɬisajɔ ɓamkǃumɓisa nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a z̤aɓɔ ɓamkʰwɛlɛtisa nɡ̤ɛmifanɛkisɔ jaɓɔ ɛkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ wɛv̤a utʰikǁɔ wapʰupʰuma umsind̤ɔ wawakǀɛkisa kakʰulu amasirajɛli wawulaɬa umŋǃuɓa wasɛʃilɔ intɛntɛ aɓɛjimisɛ ɛsintwini wawanikɛla ɛkutʰind͡ʒ̤wɛni amanɮa akʰɛ isihɔmɓɔ sakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɔmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli waɓanikɛla aɓantu ɓakʰɛ kwik͡xɛlɛ umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ wapʰupʰumɛla lakʰɛ amad̤ɔd̤ana aɓɔ aɮiwa nɡ̤umlilɔ iintɔmɓi z̤aɓɔ az̤aɡ̤ǀ̤ɔtʲɛlwa aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓaɓɔ ɓawa lik͡xɛlɛ aɓaɬɔlɔkaz̤i ɓaɓɔ aɓalila jaz̤a jav̤uka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɓɛlɛlɛ inkɔsi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɡ̤ɔxa ɛlimɛmɛlɛliswa jiwajini jaɓaɓɛtʰa nɡ̤asɛmv̤a aɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓajɔ jaɓɛnz̤a iŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ ɛnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ jajikǀɛkisa intɛntɛ jakwajɔsɛfu ajasiɲula isiz̤wɛ sakwaɛfrajim jaɲula isiz̤wɛ sakwajud̤a intaɓa jasɛz̤ijɔn ɛjajitʰand̤ajɔ jajakʰa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkupʰakama kwɛz̤ulu iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔm̤laɓa lɔ awusɛkilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ jaɲula ud̤av̤id̤ɛ umkʰɔnz̤i wajɔ jamtʰaɓatʰa ɛz̤iɓajɛni z̤ɛz̤imv̤u jamtʰaɓatʰa ɛland̤ɛla iz̤imv̤u ɛz̤aɲisajɔ jamz̤isa ukuɓa alusɛ kwajakɔɓi aɓantu ɓajɔ kwasirajɛli lajɔ waɓalusa kɛ nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɔ jɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ waɓakʰapʰa nɡ̤ɔkwaz̤i kwɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ um̤ɔɓɛ kaasafu tʰikǁɔ iintlanɡ̤a z̤inɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛlifɛni lakʰɔ z̤ijɛnz̤ɛ iŋǃamɓi itɛmpilɛ jakʰɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤ijɛnz̤ɛ jajimiwɛwɛ ijɛrusalɛm iz̤id̤umɓu z̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ z̤iz̤inikɛ z̤ɛz̤ulu ukuɓa z̤iz̤iɮɛ nɛɲama jaɓakʰɔ ɓɛŋǀɛɓa z̤ijinikɛ amaxamŋǀwa ɛliz̤wɛ z̤ilipʰalaz̤ilɛ iɡ̤az̤i laɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amanz̤i nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm akwaɓakʰɔ mŋ̤ǀ̤waɓi sɛnz̤iwɛ iŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ kuɓamɛlwanɛ ɓɛtʰu isiɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛlɔ nɛsikǀukukǀɛz̤ɔ kwaɓasiŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnɡ̤ilɛjɔ kunini jɛhɔv̤a uɬɛli ukǃumɓilɛ lija kuv̤utʰa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmlilɔ ikʰwɛlɛ lakʰɔ pʰalaz̤a uɓuʃuʃu ɓakʰɔ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɛz̤inɡ̤akwaz̤ijɔ ɛz̤ikumkanini ɛz̤inɡ̤aliŋǃulijɔ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa z̤imɮilɛ ujakɔɓi z̤alɛnz̤a iŋǁuwa ikʰaja lakʰɛ musa ukuɓukʰumɓula kutʰi uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓamaɲanɡ̤ɛ ɛtʰu majiŋ̤ǁ̤amɛ isikʰawulɛlɛ imfɛsanɛ jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa siswɛlɛ kakʰulu siŋǀɛd̤ɛ tʰikǁɔ ɔnɡ̤umsind̤isi wɛtʰu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔz̤ukɔ lwɛɡ̤ama lakʰɔ usiɬanɡ̤ulɛ uz̤ikǁɔlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkǀamaɡ̤uʃɛlɔ iz̤ɔnɔ z̤ɛtʰu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤ama lakʰɔ jini ukuɓa iintlanɡ̤a z̤itʰi kutʰi upʰi utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ makwaz̤ɛkɛ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛtʰu ukupʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlwa kwɛɡ̤az̤i laɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ɛlipʰalaz̤iwɛjɔ makuz̤ɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ ukuɡ̤ǀ̤uma kwamakʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰wa nɡ̤ɔkɔɓukʰulu ɓɛnɡ̤alɔ jakʰɔ ɓasalisɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɔkufa jiɓujisɛlɛ kuɓamɛlwanɛ ɓɛtʰu kasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛsɔnd̤wɛni lɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jaɓɔ iŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ jaɓɔ aɓakuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɛ nɡ̤ajɔ nkɔsi kɛ tʰina ɓantu ɓakʰɔ z̤imv̤u z̤aluswa nɡ̤uwɛ sija kuɓulɛla kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ siɓalisɛ nɡ̤ɛnd̤umisɔ jakʰɔ kwiz̤iz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana kumɔnɡ̤amɛli nɡ̤ɛjɛɛɲiɓiɓa ɛz̤iŋ̤ǃ̤inisajɔ kaasafu um̤ɔɓɛ ulɔmalusi kasirajɛli ɓɛka inɮɛɓɛ ulɔkǃʰuɓa ujɔsɛfu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤imv̤u ulɔɬala ɛz̤ikɛrub̤ini ɓɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛla pʰamɓi kɔɛfrajim nɔb̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɔmanasɛ v̤usa uɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓakʰɔ uz̤ɛ kusisind̤isa tʰikǁɔ siɓujisɛ ukʰaɲisɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ sisind̤iswɛ jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi kunini ukǃʰuma umsind̤ɔ wakʰɔ ɛkutʰand̤az̤ɛni kwaɓantu ɓakʰɔ uɓaɮisa isɔnka sɛɛɲɛmɓɛz̤i waɓasɛz̤a iiɲɛmɓɛz̤i nɡ̤ɛmilinɡ̤anisɔ usɛnz̤ɛ intɔ aɓakǁaɓana nɡ̤ajɔ aɓamɛlwanɛ ɓɛtʰu iint͡ʃaɓa z̤ɛtʰu z̤ijasiɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛla tʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi siɓujisɛ ukʰaɲisɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ sisind̤iswɛ waɲɔtʰula umd̤ilija ɛjiputa waɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa iintlanɡ̤a wawutʲala waɬaɬa pʰamɓi kwawɔ wɛnd̤ɛlisa iiŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu waz̤alisa iliz̤wɛ z̤aɡ̤utʲunɡ̤ɛlwa iintaɓa nɡ̤umtʰunz̤i wawɔ nɛmisɛd̤arɛ katʰikǁɔ nɡ̤amasɛɓɛ awɔ wasa amasɛɓɛ awɔ ɛlwanɮɛ namaɡ̤atʲa awɔ kuwɔ umlamɓɔ uz̤itʰʲɔɓɔz̤ɛlɛni iintanɡ̤ɔ z̤awɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓawukʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɮula nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla inɡ̤uluɓɛ jasɛɬatʰini ijawub̤ukǃa nɛntɔ ɛd̤akasa ɛnɮɛ ijawuɮa tʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi kʰawuɓujɛ ukǃɔnd̤ɛlɛ usɛmaz̤ulwini uɓɔnɛ uwuv̤ɛlɛlɛ lɔ md̤ilija jikʰusɛlɛ intɔ ɛsijitʲɛlɛjɔ isanɮa sakʰɔ sɔkunɛnɛ uɲana lɔ uz̤iz̤imasɛlɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkwakʰɔ ut͡ʃisiwɛ nɡ̤umlilɔ uɬaɬiwɛ ɓajad̤aka nɡ̤ɔkusɔnɡ̤ɛla kɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ isanɮa sakʰɔ masiɓɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔmfɔ wɛsanɮa sakʰɔ sɔkunɛnɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ɔz̤iz̤imasɛlɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkwakʰɔ asiji kuwɛ sipʰilisɛ siliŋǃulɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi siɓujisɛ ukʰaɲisɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ sisind̤iswɛ kumɔnɡ̤amɛli nɡ̤ɔlwasɛɡ̤ati kaasafu mɛmɛlɛlani kutʰikǁɔ iɡ̤wiɓa lɛtʰu d̤umani kutʰikǁɔ kajakɔɓi ɬaɓani inɡ̤ɔma niɓɛtʰɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔ uhad̤i ɔlumnand̤i kuɲɛ nɔmxub̤ɛ v̤utʰɛlani isiɡ̤ɔɮɔ ukutʰwasa kwɛɲanɡ̤a nɔkuɬanɡ̤ana kwɛɲanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛmini jɔmtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ wɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ummisɛlɔ lɔwɔ kusirajɛli lisikɔ likatʰikǁɔ kajakɔɓi sisiŋ̤ǃ̤inisɔ awasimisajɔ kwajɔsɛfu ɛkukǀand̤ɛni kwakʰɛ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nd̤ɛv̤a intɛtʰɔ ɛnd̤inɡ̤ajaz̤ijɔ nd̤awususa umtʰwalɔ ɛɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓɛni lakʰɛ iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ z̤asuka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɔɓɔz̤ini z̤ɔkutʰwala ɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛni wad̤and̤uluka wɛna nd̤akuɬanɡ̤ula nd̤akupʰɛnd̤ula ɛsitʰɛni lɛɛnd̤ud̤umɔ nd̤akuv̤av̤aɲa ɛmanz̤ini asɛmɛrib̤a pʰakamisani nd̤atʰi jiv̤ani ɓantu ɓam nd̤ikǃɔnɔnɔnd̤isɛ sirajɛli ukuɓa unɔkupʰulapʰula makunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ tʰikǁɔ wasɛmz̤ini kuwɛ unɡ̤aŋǃuli tʰikǁɔ wɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a nd̤im ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ ɔkuɲusilɛjɔ ɛliz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa jakʰamisa nd̤iwuz̤alisɛ umlɔmɔ wakʰɔ kɛ aɓantu ɓam aɓaliv̤a iz̤wi usirajɛli akand̤iv̤umanɡ̤a nd̤aɓanikɛla ɛɓuŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɛni ɓɛɛntliz̤ijɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓahamɓa nɡ̤awaɓɔ amakǃʰinɡ̤a akwaɓa aɓantu ɓam ɓɛɓɛnd̤iv̤a akwaɓa usirajɛli uɓɛhamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jam ɓɛnd̤ija kuz̤itʰɔɓa kamsiɲa iint͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ nd̤isiɓujisɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓaɓɔ isanɮa aɓamtʰijajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓɛɓɛja kujɛ liɓɛ nɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ikǁɛʃa laɓɔ ɓɛnd̤ija kuɓaɮisa iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa ɛtʲɛɓilɛjɔ nd̤iɓaɬutʰisɛ nɡ̤ɔɓusi ɛt͡silini um̤ɔɓɛ kaasafu utʰikǁɔ ɛɓanɮɛni likatʰikǁɔ uɡ̤wɛɓa pʰakatʰi kɔɔtʰikǁɔ utʰi kunini niɡ̤wɛɓa nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa niɓanɔnɛlɛla aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ pʰakamisani tʰɛtʰani itʲala lɔswɛlɛjɔ nɛlɛnkɛd̤ama ɡ̤wɛɓɛlani ɔlusiz̤ana nɔliɬwɛmpu siz̤ani ɔswɛlɛjɔ nɔliɬwɛmpu ɓaɬanɡ̤ulɛni ɛsanɮɛni saɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ aɓaz̤i aɓakǃɔnd̤i ɓahamɓahamɓa ɛmɲamɛni z̤ijaʃukuma z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤isɛkɔ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi nd̤itʰɛ ninɡ̤ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ninɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni nɔnkɛ nipʰɛla nɔkɔ nija nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmntu niwɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɲɛ kuɓatʰɛtʰɛli kʰawusuk umɛ tʰikǁɔ ɡ̤wɛɓa ɛɬaɓatʰini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uja kuz̤iɮa wɛna z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a inɡ̤ɔma um̤ɔɓɛ kaasafu tʰikǁɔ ukutʰi kǀwaka musa ukutʰi ukuz̤ɔla tʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nanz̤ɔ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ z̤ikǁɔkɔz̤ɛla aɓakutʰijajɔ ɓapʰakamisa intlɔkɔ ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤uɡ̤ula iɡ̤ǃ̤uɡ̤ula ɛlinɔɓukǃʰɔpʰɔlɔlɔ nɡ̤aɓantu ɓakʰɔ ɓakǀɛɓisanɛ nɡ̤aɓaɡ̤uʃiwɛjɔ nɡ̤uwɛ ɓatʰi jiz̤ani siɓɛtʰɛ ɓɛɛ ʃwaka ɓanɡ̤aɓi luɬanɡ̤a linɡ̤aɓi sakʰund͡ʒ̤ulwa iɡ̤ama likasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓakǀɛɓisana nɡ̤antliz̤ijɔɲɛ ɓɛnz̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nɡ̤awɛ iintɛntɛ z̤akwaɛd̤ɔm nɛz̤akwaiʃmajɛli amamɔwab̤i namahaɡ̤ari amaɡ̤ɛb̤ali namaamɔn namaamalɛki amafilisti kuɲɛ naɓɛmi ɓasɛtirɛ namaasirija atʰɛlɛlɛ kuɓɔ ɓaɓa jinɡ̤alɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakalɔtɛ pʰakamisani jɛnz̤a kuɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ kumamid̤ijan nakusisɛra nakujab̤in ɛsiɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni sɛkiʃɔn ɓat͡ʃaɓalala ɛɛnd̤ɔrɛ ɓaɓa nɡ̤umɡ̤ǃ̤uɓa wɔkuɡ̤alɛlwa ɛm̤laɓɛni ɓɛnz̤ɛ ɓɔna amanɛnɛ aɓɔ kɛ ɓaɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɔrɛb̤ɛ nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔz̤ɛb̤ɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iinkɔsi z̤aɓɔ z̤iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔz̤ɛb̤a nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔt͡salimuna ɓɔna ɓatʰi masiwaɬutʰɛ aɓɛ nɡ̤awɛtʰu amakʰaja katʰikǁɔ tʰikǁɔ ɓɛnz̤ɛ ɓaɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsakǃʰwitʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmkǃukǃu pʰamɓi kɔmɔja nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmlilɔ ɔɮa iɬatʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛd̤anɡ̤atʲɛ lilɛɲa intaɓa jɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuɓasukɛla nɡ̤ɔkǃʰwitʰɛla lwakʰɔ uɓakʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰isɛ nɡ̤ɔmɔja wakʰɔ ɔv̤utʰuz̤ajɔ ɓuz̤alisɛ uɓusɔ ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛɬaz̤ɔ ɓalifunɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a maɓad̤anɛ ɓakʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰iswɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ ɓaɓɛ nɛɛntlɔni ɓad̤akɛ ɓaz̤i ukuɓa wɛna uɡ̤ama linɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤uwɛ wɛd̤wa ɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni pʰɛz̤u kwɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ kumɔnɡ̤amɛli nɡ̤ɔlwasɛɡ̤ati ɛjɔɔɲana ɓakakɔra um̤ɔɓɛ haji ukutʰand̤ɛka kwɛmiŋǃuɓa jakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi umpʰɛfumlɔ ulanɡ̤az̤ɛlɛla ujapʰɛla kukuz̤ilanɡ̤az̤ɛlɛla iintɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a intliz̤ijɔ jam nɛɲama jam imɛmɛlɛla kutʰikǁɔ ɔpʰililɛjɔ intakana lɛ ifumɛnɛ ikʰaja inkɔnd͡ʒ̤anɛ iz̤ifumanɛlɛ inɮu apʰɔ iz̤alɛla kʰɔna amatʰɔlɛ ajɔ iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤akʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi kumkani tʰikǁɔ haji ujɔlɔ lwaɓaɬala ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ ɓasaja kukud̤umisa pʰakamisani haji ujɔlɔ lwaɓantu aɓamanɮa akuwɛ aɓakʰumɓula umɛnd̤ɔ ɔja ɛz̤ijɔn ɓɛpʰumɛla ɛntilini jɛmitʰi jɛb̤aka ɓajɛnz̤a iɓɛ nɛmitʰɔmɓɔ ɛwɛ imv̤ula ijitʰi wamɓu nɡ̤ɛnt͡sikɛlɛlɔ ɓaja ɓɛsɔmɛlɛla nɡ̤ɔkɔmɛlɛla ɓaɓɔnakala pʰamɓi kɔtʰikǁɔ ɛz̤ijɔn ɓatʰi jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi wuv̤ɛ umtʰand̤az̤ɔ wuɓɛkɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ tʰikǁɔ kajakɔɓi pʰakamisani kʰanɡ̤ɛla tʰikǁɔ nɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ jɛtʰu uɓukʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ uɓusɔ ɓɔmtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɲɛ ɛz̤intɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni z̤akʰɔ ilunɡ̤ilɛ kunɛwaka nd̤iɲulɛ ukuɓa sɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ ɛnɮwini katʰikǁɔ kunɔkuɬala nɡ̤apʰakatʰi kwɛɛntɛntɛ z̤ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ulilanɡ̤a ujinɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ujaɓaɓala az̤ukisɛ aɓahamɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ akaɓav̤imɓi ntɔ ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ jɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi haji ujɔlɔ lɔmntu ɔkʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤awɛ kumɔnɡ̤amɛli ɛjɔɔɲana ɓakakɔra um̤ɔɓɛ jɛhɔv̤a waɓɛ unɛtaxu kwiliz̤wɛ lakʰɔ uɓuɓaɓujisa aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa ɓakajakɔɓi uɓuɓukǁɔlɛla uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓantu ɓakʰɔ uɓuz̤isɛlɛla z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ɔnɔ z̤aɓɔ pʰakamisani uɓuwufiɲɛz̤a umsind̤ɔ wakʰɔ ɔpʰupʰumajɔ uɓuɓuja ɛkuv̤utʰɛni kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɔ siɓujisɛ tʰikǁɔ ɔnɡ̤umsind̤isi wɛtʰu ujisusɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤umɓɔ jakʰɔ kutʰi uja kusikǃumɓɛla nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ umsind̤ɔ wakʰɔ uja kuwɔlulɛla kwiz̤iz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana akuji kuɓuja usipʰilisɛ aɓantu ɓakʰɔ ɓav̤ujɛ nɡ̤awɛ siɓɔnisɛ iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a sipʰɛ usind̤isɔ lwakʰɔ mand̤iv̤ɛ ɔkɔ aja kukutʰɛtʰa utʰikǁɔ ujɛhɔv̤a haji utʰɛtʰa ukǁɔlɔ kuɓantu ɓakʰɛ nakwaɓakʰɛ ɓɛŋǀɛɓa maɓanɡ̤aɓujɛli kɛ ɛkuɲaɓɛni kwaɓɔ inɛnɛ usind̤isɔ lwakʰɛ lusɔnd̤ɛlɛ kwaɓamɔjikajɔ ukuz̤ɛ luɬalɛ uz̤ukɔ ɛz̤wɛni lakɔwɛtʰu kuja kukǃuɓisana iŋǀɛɓa nɛɲanisɔ kuja kwanɡ̤ana uɓulunɡ̤isa nɔkǁɔlɔ iɲanisɔ ija kunt͡ʃula ɛm̤laɓɛni uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓukǃɔnd̤ɛlɛ ɓusɛmaz̤ulwini kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uja ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ iliz̤wɛ lɛtʰu lisinikɛ indʲɛɓɔ jalɔ uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓuja kuhamɓa pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ ɓujiɡ̤ǃ̤alɛ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ inɮɛla jɔkuɲatʰɛla kwakʰɛ umtʰand̤az̤ɔ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ tʰɔɓa inɮɛɓɛ jakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a nd̤ipʰɛnd̤ulɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ilusiz̤ana nd̤iliɬwɛmpu wuɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ɔwɛŋǀɛɓa msind̤isɛ wɛna tʰikǁɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ lɔ ukʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤awɛ nd̤iɓaɓalɛ nkɔsi jam nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤id̤and̤uluka kuwɛ jɔnkɛ wuv̤ujisɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umpʰɛfumlɔ nd̤iwupʰakamisɛla kuwɛ nkɔsi jam nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ulunɡ̤ilɛ wɛna nkɔsi jam ukǁɔlɛla umkʰulu nɡ̤ɛŋǀɛɓa kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓakuŋǃulajɔ wuɓɛkɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ umtʰand̤az̤ɔ jɛhɔv̤a uliɓaz̤ɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ iz̤wi lɔkutaxuz̤isa nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwa nd̤iŋǃula wɛna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uja kund̤ipʰɛnd̤ula akukʰɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɛ nkɔsi jam pʰakatʰi kɔɔtʰikǁɔ akukʰɔ z̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤akʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a ɔwaz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ z̤ija kuz̤a z̤ikǃuɓud̤ɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ nkɔsi jam z̤iz̤ukisɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umkʰulu wɛnz̤a imisɛɓɛnz̤i ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ unɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɛna wɛd̤wa nd̤ijalɛlɛ jɛhɔv̤a inɮɛla jakʰɔ nd̤ihamɓɛ nɡ̤ɛɲanisɔ jakʰɔ jiɓand̤akaɲɛ intliz̤ijɔ jam ukuɓa nd̤ilɔjikɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ nd̤ija kuɓulɛla kuwɛ nkɔsi jam tʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jɔnkɛ nd̤iliz̤ukisɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɔ iɓɛ wawuɬanɡ̤ula umpʰɛfumlɔ kwɛlinɡ̤apʰant͡si laɓafilɛjɔ tʰikǁɔ aɓakʰukʰumali ɓasukɛlɛ pʰɛz̤ulu iɓanɮa laɓanɔɓuŋ̤ǃ̤wanɡ̤aŋ̤ǃ̤wili umpʰɛfumlɔ aɓakumisi wɛna pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ kɛ wɛna nkɔsi jam unɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ɔnɛmfɛsanɛ ɔnɔɓaɓalɔ ɔz̤ɛka kad̤ɛ umsind̤ɔ ɔmkʰulu nɡ̤ɛŋǀɛɓa nɛɲanisɔ nd̤ib̤ɛkɛ und̤iɓaɓalɛ mpʰɛ amanɮa akʰɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ umsind̤isɛ uɲana wɔmkʰɔnz̤az̤ana wakʰɔ nd̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ umkǃɔnd̤isɔ wɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɓawuɓɔnɛ aɓand̤itʰijajɔ ɓad̤anɛ kuɓa wɛna jɛhɔv̤a und̤iŋǀɛd̤ilɛ wand̤itʰutʰuz̤ɛla ɛjɔɔɲana ɓakakɔra um̤ɔɓɛ inɡ̤ɔma usɛkɔ alusɛkilɛjɔ lusɛz̤intaɓɛni ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ amasanɡ̤ɔ ɛz̤ijɔn ujɛhɔv̤a uwatʰand̤a nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛmiŋǃuɓa jɔnkɛ kajakɔɓi kutʰɛtʰwa iintɔ ɛz̤iz̤ukilɛjɔ nɡ̤awɛ mz̤i katʰikǁɔ pʰakamisani ɔrahab̤i nɔb̤ab̤ɛli nd̤ija kuɓakʰankaɲɛla kwaɓand̤az̤ijɔ nalɔ ɛlamafilisti nɛlasɛtirɛ kuɲɛ nɛlakwakuʃi aɓa ɓaz̤alɛlwɛ kʰɔna nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kwiz̤ijɔn kuja kutʰiwa lɔ nalɔ uz̤alɛlwɛ kujɔ aɓɛ jɛna ɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni ɛjiz̤inz̤isa ujɛhɔv̤a uja kuɓala ɛkuz̤ib̤alɛni iz̤iz̤wi atʰi aɓaja ɓaz̤alɛlwɛ kʰɔna pʰakamisani ɓaz̤ɛ ɓɛv̤uma ɓɛkǃamɓa ɓatʰi jɔnkɛ imitʰɔmɓɔ jam ikuwɛ inɡ̤ɔma um̤ɔɓɛ wɔɔɲana ɓakakɔra kumɔnɡ̤amɛli nɡ̤ɔsiz̤i nɡ̤ɛlid̤amɓilɛjɔ ɔwɔkukǃikǃa kahɛman umɛz̤ra jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ ɔnɡ̤umsind̤isi m̤lɛnikwɛni nd̤ikʰalajɔ ɛɓusuku pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ mawuz̤ɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ umtʰand̤az̤ɔ tʰɔɓa inɮɛɓɛ jakʰɔ ɛkuɬaɬamɓɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umpʰɛfumlɔ uɬutʰi z̤iz̤intɔ ɛz̤imɓi uɓɔmi ɓam ɓufikɛ kwɛlaɓafilɛjɔ nd̤iɓalɛlwɛ kwaɓaɬa ɓajɛ ɛm̤ad̤ini nd̤isukɛ nd̤and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmfɔ ɔnɡ̤ɛnamanɮa nd̤inɡ̤umkʰululwa pʰakatʰi kwaɓafilɛjɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ ɓɛlɛlɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni ɔnɡ̤asaɓakʰumɓulijɔ ɓɔna ɓaŋǃuɲulwɛjɔ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ und̤iɓɛkɛ ɛm̤ad̤ini ɔnɡ̤apʰant͡si ɛz̤ind̤awɛni ɛz̤imɲama ɛz̤inz̤ulwini uɓuʃuʃu ɓakʰɔ ɓund̤iʃikǀilɛlɛ und̤itʰɔɓɛlɛ ɔnkɛ amaz̤a akʰɔ alwajɔ pʰakamisani uɓaʃɛŋǁisɛlɛ kud̤ɛ aɓɔ nd̤az̤ana naɓɔ und̤ɛnz̤ɛ isikiz̤i kuɓɔ nd̤iv̤alɛlwɛ and̤inakupʰuma ilisɔ lijapʰɛla jiŋ̤ǀ̤inɛz̤ɛlɔ nd̤id̤and̤uluka kuwɛ jɛhɔv̤a jɔnkɛ nd̤iz̤ɔlulɛla kuwɛ iz̤anɮa z̤am uja kujɛnz̤ɛla aɓafilɛjɔ imisɛɓɛnz̤i ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ kuja kuv̤uka aɓanɡ̤asɛkʰɔjɔ ɓaɓulɛlɛ kuwɛ pʰakamisani iɓaliswa ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɔ ɛnz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓilɛni ukuɲanisa kwakʰɔ jaz̤iswa ɛmɲamɛni imisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɔ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ ɓaz̤iswa ɛz̤wɛni lɔkuliɓala uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɔ kɛ jɛhɔv̤a nd̤iz̤iɓika kuwɛ kwakusasa umtʰand̤az̤ɔ wɔkuɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a uwuɬamɓɛlani jɛhɔv̤a umpʰɛfumlɔ uɓusitʰɛlisɛlani uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ nd̤ilusiz̤ana nd̤ijintɔ ɛfajɔ kwasɛɓuŋǀinanɛni ɓam nd̤itʰwɛlɛ iz̤ɔtʰusɔ z̤akʰɔ lind̤ikʰɔɬilɛ kuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛ pʰɛz̤u kwamukuv̤utʰa kwakʰɔ iz̤id̤and̤atʰɛkisɔ z̤akʰɔ z̤ind̤ib̤anɡ̤isilɛ z̤ind̤id͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amanz̤i jɔnkɛ z̤ind̤iz̤unɡ̤ulɛz̤ilɛ kwapʰɛla umsusilɛ ɔnd̤itʰand̤ajɔ nɔnɡ̤uwɛtʰu aɓɔ nd̤az̤ana naɓɔ ɓaɓuɓumɲama ɛjɔkukǃikǃa kaɛtan umɛz̤ra iiŋǀɛɓa z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kuv̤uma nɡ̤az̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ kwiz̤iz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana nd̤ija kwaz̤isa ukutʰɛmɓɛka kwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤itʰi jakʰɛka nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ iŋǀɛɓa amaz̤ulu uja kukuz̤inz̤isa kuwɔ ukutʰɛmɓɛka kwakʰɔ watʰi nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nɔmɲulwa nd̤ifunɡ̤ilɛ kud̤av̤id̤ɛ umkʰɔnz̤i nd̤ija kujiz̤imasa nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ imɓɛwu jakʰɔ nd̤ijakʰɛ itrɔnɛ jakʰɔ kwisiz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛsiz̤ukulwana pʰakamisani amaz̤ulu aɓulɛla imisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɔ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ jɛhɔv̤a nɔkutʰɛmɓɛka kwakʰɔ ɛɓanɮɛni laɓaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤uɓani ɛsib̤akab̤akɛni ɔlinɡ̤ana nɔjɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤uɓani ɔfana nɔjɛhɔv̤a pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakatʰikǁɔ utʰikǁɔ ɔnɡ̤ɔwɔkuŋ̤ǀ̤aŋ̤ǀ̤az̤ɛlɛlwa ɛb̤unɡ̤ɛni ɛlikʰulu laɓaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɔnɡ̤ɔfanɛlwɛ kukɔjikwa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓamŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnɡ̤ilɛjɔ jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi nɡ̤uɓani ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɛ ɔlukǃilima jɛhɔv̤a ukutʰɛmɓɛka kwakʰɔ kukuŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnɡ̤ilɛ nɡ̤uwɛna wɛk͡xat͡ʃi lɔlwanɮɛ ɛkupʰakamɛni kwamaz̤a alɔ ujawad̤amɓisa nɡ̤uwɛna mtʲumz̤i karahab̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔŋ̤ǁ̤wɛlɛxiwɛjɔ waz̤itʰi iint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤alɔ jakʰɔ ɛkǃinilɛjɔ lɛlakʰɔ iz̤ulu likwalɛlakʰɔ iɬaɓatʰi ɛlimiwɛjɔ nɛnz̤alisɛkɔ jalɔ lasɛkwa nɡ̤uwɛ umntla nɔmz̤ant͡si wad̤alwa nɡ̤uwɛ itab̤ɔrɛ nɛhɛrmɔn z̤imɛmɛlɛla nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama lakʰɔ jɛjakʰɔ inɡ̤alɔ ɛnɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa sitʰɛ ŋ̰ǃ̰i isanɮa sakʰɔ sipʰakamilɛ ɛsɔkunɛnɛ sakʰɔ ummisɔ wɛtrɔnɛ jakʰɔ ɓuɓulunɡ̤isa nɔkusɛsikwɛni iŋǀɛɓa nɛɲanisɔ ilunɡ̤isɛlɛla pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ haji ujɔlɔ lwaɓantu aɓakwaz̤ijɔ ukud̤uma ɓaja kuhamɓa ɛkukʰaɲɛni kɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a ɓaja kuɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓa ɛɡ̤amɛni lakʰɔ jɔnkɛ ɓapʰakamɛ nɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa isihɔmɓɔ samanɮa aɓɔ nɡ̤uwɛ ɛkutʰand̤ɛni kwakʰɔ upʰɔnd̤ɔ lwɛtʰu lupʰakamilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ikujɛhɔv̤a inɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ jɛtʰu ukɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kasirajɛli wɛtʰu wakʰa watʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔmɓɔnɔ kɔwɛŋǀɛɓa wakʰɔ watʰi nd̤iɓɛkɛ uŋǀɛd̤ɔ ɛɡ̤ɔxɛni nd̤ipʰakamisɛ ind̤ɔd̤ana ɛɓantwini nd̤ifumɛnɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ umkʰɔnz̤i nd̤imtʰamɓisilɛ nɡ̤ɛɔli jam ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛsija kukǃinisɛla kujɛ isanɮa nɛnɡ̤alɔ jam imkʰalipʰisɛ ut͡ʃaɓa aluji kumkǃuɓula nɔɲana wɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa akaji kumkǀinɛz̤ɛla nd̤ija kuɓakǃɔɓa pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ aɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓakʰɛ nd̤iɓakǁaɓɛlɛ aɓamtʰijajɔ iɲanisɔ jam nɛŋǀɛɓa jam inajɛ luja kupʰakama upʰɔnd̤ɔ lwakʰɛ ɛɡ̤amɛni nd̤ija ɛlwanɮɛ isanɮa sakʰɛ ɛmiland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɛsɔkunɛnɛ sakʰɛ jɛna ukund̤iɓiz̤a wɔtʰi unɡ̤uɓawɔ unɡ̤utʰikǁɔ nɛliwa lɔkund̤isind̤isa kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤ija kumɛnz̤a ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ ɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni kɔɔkumkani ɓɛɬaɓatʰi nd̤ija kumɡ̤ǀ̤inɛla iŋǀɛɓa jam nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ uɲanisɛ kujɛ nd̤ijimisɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ imɓɛwu jakʰɛ nɛtrɔnɛ jakʰɛ iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmiɬa jamaz̤ulu ukuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓawulaɬa umjalɛlɔ aɓahamɓa nɡ̤amasikɔ ukuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓajiɬamɓɛla imimisɛlɔ jam aɓajiɡ̤ǀ̤ina imitʰɛtʰɔ jam nd̤ɔluv̤ɛlɛla uk͡xɛkǃɔ lwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛntɔnɡ̤a nɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛmiv̤umɓɔ kɛ jɔna iŋǀɛɓa jam and̤iji kujapʰula kujɛ nd̤inɡ̤akǁɔki ɛkutʰɛmɓɛkɛni and̤iji kuwuɬamɓɛla umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nd̤ijid͡ʒ̤ikɛ intɔ ɛpʰumɛ ɛmlɔɲɛni nd̤iɓufunɡ̤ɛ kwakaɲɛ uɓuŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓam nd̤atʰi inɛnɛ and̤iji kumkǁɔkisa ud̤av̤id̤ɛ imɓɛwu jakʰɛ ija kuɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ nɛtrɔnɛ jakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlanɡ̤a pʰamɓi ija kukǃinisɛka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤ina lasɛsib̤akab̤akɛni litʰɛmɓɛkilɛ pʰakamisani kwawɛna um̤lamɓilɛ umkǀɛkisilɛ umpʰupʰumɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ umtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa wakʰɔ utʰɛ nɛtʰɛ nɡ̤umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ usidʲɔb̤ilɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni isit͡sʰaɓa sakʰɛ uz̤itʰʲɔɓɔz̤ilɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iintanɡ̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ uz̤ɛnz̤ɛ iŋǁuwa iiŋǃaɓa z̤akʰɛ ɓajampʰanɡ̤a ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɮula nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla waɓa jiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ kuɓamɛlwanɛ ɓakʰɛ usipʰakamisilɛ isanɮa sɔkunɛnɛ saɓamɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlajɔ uz̤iv̤ujisilɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɛ waɓujisa nɔkuɓujisa uɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ lakʰɛ akwammisa ɛmfaz̤wɛni umsusilɛ ɛnkaz̤imlwɛni jakʰɛ ujikʰaɬɛlɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni itrɔnɛ jakʰɛ ujiŋǃumlɛ imiɬa jɔɓut͡ʃa ɓakʰɛ wamtʰi wamɓu nɡ̤ɔkud̤ana pʰakamisani kunini jɛhɔv̤a uɬɛli uz̤isitʰɛlisilɛ ɓusit͡ʃa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmlilɔ uɓuʃuʃu ɓakʰɔ kʰumɓula ukuŋǃamka intɔ ɔkujijɔ uɓad̤alɛlɛni ɓaɓa jintɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu jijipʰi ind̤ɔd̤a ɛɬɛlijɔ ɛnɡ̤aji kukuɓɔna ɛnɔkuwusind̤isa umpʰɛfumlɔ wajɔ ɛsanɮɛni sɛlaɓafilɛjɔ pʰakamisani z̤ipʰi iiŋǀɛɓa z̤akʰɔ z̤anɡ̤apʰamɓili nkɔsi jam ɔwamfunɡ̤ɛla z̤ɔna ud̤av̤id̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkutʰɛmɓɛka kwakʰɔ kʰumɓula nkɔsi jam ukuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɛka kwaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ nd̤itʰwɛlɛ ɛsifuɓɛni z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤ininz̤i ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ajɔ z̤iz̤iint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a amaɲatʰɛla ɔmtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa wakʰɔ makaɓɔnɡ̤wɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ amɛn amɛn umtʰand̤az̤ɔ kamɔsɛs umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ nkɔsi jam ulikʰaja wɛna kutʰi isiz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛsiz̤ukulwana kunɡ̤ɛkaz̤alwa z̤intaɓa unɡ̤ɛkav̤ɛlisi m̤laɓa naz̤wɛ limiwɛjɔ kususɛla kwapʰakad̤ɛ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni wɛna unɡ̤utʰikǁɔ umɓujisɛla ɛlutʰulini utʰi ɓujani ɲana ɓaɓantu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lɛmiɲaka ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ lind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmini jɛz̤ɔlɔ kǁa iɮulɛjɔ lind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmlind̤ɔ wasɛɓusuku ujaɓakʰukulisa ɓalalɛ nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ ɓaɓuja ɓaɬumɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔtʲani nɡ̤ɔmsɔ ɓutʲatʲamɓa ɓuɓujɛ ɓuɬumɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa ɓujasikwa ɓɔmɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sijapʰɛla nɡ̤umsind̤ɔ wakʰɔ sikʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰iswɛ ɓuɓuʃuʃu ɓakʰɔ uɓuɓɛkɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛtʰu pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ nɛsiɓufiɬilɛjɔ uɓuɓɛka ɛkukʰaɲisɛlɛni kɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɛtʰu isanɡ̤ɛnɛ nɡ̤ɔkupʰupʰuma kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɔ sijipʰɛlisilɛ imiɲaka jɛtʰu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnt͡sɛɓɛz̤ɔ imiɬa jɛmiɲaka jɛtʰu isɛmiɲakɛni ɛnɡ̤amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ukuɓa itʰɛ jaɓa mininz̤i kakʰulu iɓa jimiɲaka ɛmaʃumi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ liɓɛ kɛ ikǃʰajija lajɔ likukwapʰuka nɔkunɡ̤aɓi ntɔ jantɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa itʰɛ pʰɛ jakʰawulɛz̤a sapʰapʰaz̤ɛla sɛmka nɡ̤uɓani ɔwaz̤ijɔ amanɮa ɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɔ nɔkupʰupʰuma kwawɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔ ufanɛlɛ ukɔjikwa nɡ̤akɔ saz̤isɛ kaɲɛ ukujiɓala imiɬa jɛtʰu ukuz̤ɛ siz̤uz̤ɛ intliz̤ijɔ ɛlumkilɛjɔ ɓuja jɛhɔv̤a uz̤ɔɬwajɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ siɬutʰisɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǀɛɓa jakʰɔ simɛmɛlɛlɛ siv̤ujɛ jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɛtʰu siv̤ujisɛ nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛmiɬa ɔwasikǀinɛz̤ɛla nɡ̤ajɔ nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛmiɲaka ɛsaɓɔna uɓuɓi nɡ̤ajɔ majiɓɔnakalɛ kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ imisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɔ nɔɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amɛla ɓakʰɔ kɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ uɓumnand̤i ɓukajɛhɔv̤a maɓuɓɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu z̤imasa isɛnz̤ɔ sɛz̤anɮa z̤ɛtʰu pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu isɛnz̤ɔ sɛz̤anɮa z̤ɛtʰu usiz̤imasɛ sɔna ɔɬɛli ɛsitʰɛni lɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni az̤ilalisɛ ɛmtʰunz̤ini kasɔmanɮa utʰi kujɛhɔv̤a ɬatʰi mɓɔnisɛlɔ jam tʰikǁɔ ɛnd̤ikʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ajɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔkwakʰɛ uja kukuɬanɡ̤ula ɛmɡ̤iɓɛni wɔmtʰijɛli ɛndʲikitʲɛni jɔkufa ɛjɛjɛlisajɔ wɔkuɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛɛnt͡siɓa z̤akʰɛ uz̤imɛlɛ pʰant͡si kwamapʰikɔ akʰɛ likʰaka jinɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ iɲanisɔ jakʰɛ akuji kɔjikiswa z̤iz̤ɔtʰusɔ ɛɓusuku nalutɔlɔ luɓalɛka ɛmini nandʲikitʲa jakufa ihamɓa ɛsitʰɔkɔtʰɔkwɛni nasifɔ sib̤ub̤isajɔ sib̤ukǃa ɛmini ɛnkulu kunɡ̤awa ɛkǀalɛni kwakʰɔ isiɡ̤id̤i nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ kwakʰɔ kɔd̤wa kunɡ̤asɔnd̤ɛli ntɔ kuwɛ wɔkʰanɡ̤ɛla nɡ̤amɛɬɔ akʰɔ ɔd̤wa ukuɓɔnɛlɛ ukuɓujɛkɛz̤wa kwaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤uwɛ jɛhɔv̤a iɬatʰi umɛnz̤ɛ ɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni ikʰaja lakʰɔ akuji kukǃuɓisana ɓuɓi nawɛ kunɡ̤afiki siɓɛtʰɔ ɛntɛntɛni jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iz̤itʰuɲwa z̤akʰɛ uz̤iwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤awɛ ukuɓa z̤ikuɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ ɛz̤inɮɛlɛni z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɔkutʰwala wɛna nɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤ɔz̤iɓini ɬɛz̤ɛ uɓɛtʰɛkɛ nɡ̤ɔɲawɔ lwakʰɔ ɛtʲɛni wɔɲatʰɛla pʰɛz̤u kwɛnɡ̤ɔɲama nɛpʰimpi ujiɲaʃɛ inɡ̤ɔɲama ɛnt͡ʃa nɛnamɓa nɡ̤ɛɛɲawɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛnamatʰɛlɛ nd̤ɔmsiz̤a nd̤imsɛ ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛlaz̤i iɡ̤ama wɔnd̤iɓiz̤a nd̤ipʰɛnd̤ulɛ nd̤ɔɓa najɛ ɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛni nd̤ɔm̤lanɡ̤ula nd̤imz̤ukisɛ nd̤imanɛlisɛ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa ɛmid̤ɛ nd̤imɓɔnisɛ ukusind̤isa um̤ɔɓɛ inɡ̤ɔma nɡ̤ɛmini jɛsaɓatʰa kulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuɓulɛla kujɛhɔv̤a nɔkuliɓɛtʰɛla uhad̤i iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ wɛna usɛɲanɡ̤wɛni ukujikǁɛla iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɔ nɔkuɲanisa kwakʰɔ ɛɓusuku nɡ̤ɔwɛɛntamɓɔ ɛz̤iliʃumi nanɡ̤ɔmxub̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuluɓɛtʰa uhad̤i nɡ̤ɔfɛfɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujand̤iv̤ujisa jɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɔ nd̤inɔkumɛmɛlɛla az̤iz̤ikʰulu iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤akʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a z̤inz̤ulu kakʰulu iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤akʰɔ isitʰʲakala asinakwaz̤i isiɲaɓi asikukǃɔnd̤i ɔkɔ ɛkud̤uɓulɛni kɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmfunɔ ɛkutʲatʲamɓɛni kwaɓasɛɓɛnz̤i ɓɔnkɛ ɓɔɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a kukuz̤ɛ ɓat͡ʃaɓalalɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ kɛ wɛna jɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤ɔpʰɛz̤ulu nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujaɓɔna iint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujaɓɔna iint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ z̤iv̤a kut͡ʃaɓalala ɓaja kukǀʰitʰwakǀʰitʰwa ɓɔnkɛ aɓasɛɓɛnz̤i ɓɔɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a ujalupʰakamisa upʰɔnd̤ɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔlwɛŋǃu nd̤iɡ̤alɛlwɛ iɔli ɛnt͡ʃa ilisɔ lijaɓaɓɔnɛla aɓand̤ilalɛlajɔ inɮɛɓɛ jam ijaɓɛv̤a aɓasukɛla pʰɛz̤ulu ɓɛnɔɓuɓi amalunɡ̤isa aja kud̤uɓula nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsund̤u aja kukʰula nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɛd̤arɛ wɛlɛb̤anɔn ɛtʲɛlwɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a aja kutʲatʲamɓa ɛz̤intɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni z̤ɔtʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu aja kuɬuma ɛsɛlɛnɛz̤imv̤i aja kuɓa ɛtʲɛɓilɛ ɛluɬaz̤a ukuz̤ɛ akǁɛlɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ tʲɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uliwa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ ɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa kujɛ ujɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤ukumkani uz̤amɓatʰisɛ uɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa ujɛhɔv̤a uz̤amɓatʰisɛ ub̤iŋǃɛ amanɮa liz̤inz̤ilɛ kɛ ɛlimiwɛjɔ alinakuʃukuɲiswa kususɛla kɔkɔ iz̤inz̤ilɛ itrɔnɛ jakʰɔ kususɛla kwapʰakad̤ɛ ukʰɔ wɛna imilamɓɔ ipʰakamisilɛ jɛhɔv̤a imilamɓɔ ipʰakamisɛ isand̤i sajɔ imilamɓɔ ipʰakamisɛ iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔlɔ jajɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤and̤i z̤amanz̤i amaninz̤i anɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwamaz̤a alwajɔ ɔlwanɮɛ unɔɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa pʰɛz̤ulu ujɛhɔv̤a iz̤iŋ̤ǃ̤inisɔ z̤akʰɔ z̤iɲanisɛ kunɛnɛ uɓuŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓujifanɛlɛ inɮu jakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a imiɬa ɛmid̤ɛ tʰikǁɔ wɛmpind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ wɛmpind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ ɓɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛla pʰakama mɡ̤wɛɓi wɛɬaɓatʰi ɓaɓujisɛlɛ impatʰɔ jaɓɔ aɓanɛk͡xat͡ʃi kunini aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ jɛhɔv̤a kunini aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɓɛv̤ujɛlɛla ɓalɛpʰuz̤a amaɡ̤wɛɓu ɓatʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔkusa ɓajand̤ɔlɔsa ɓɔnkɛ aɓasɛɓɛnz̤i ɓɔɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a ɓatʲumz̤a aɓantu ɓakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a ɓakǀinɛz̤ɛla lakʰɔ ɓaɓulala um̤lɔlɔkaz̤i nɔwasɛmz̤ini ɓaŋǀinitʰa inkɛd̤ama ɓatʰi kɛ akaɓɔni ujɛhɔv̤a akaɡ̤ǃ̤ali utʰikǁɔ kajakɔɓi kǃɔnd̤ani ɓaz̤iz̤itʰʲakala ɛɓantwini nina z̤iɲaɓi nija kukǃikǃa ɔmilisɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ akaji kuv̤a ɔɓumɓɛ ilisɔ akaji kukʰanɡ̤ɛla umtʰɛtʰisi wɛɛntlanɡ̤a akaji kɔɬwaja ulɔfund̤isa aɓantu ukwaz̤i ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤umaz̤i wɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤aɓantu ukuɓa z̤inɡ̤umpʰunɡ̤a haji ujɔlɔ lwɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɔjitʰɛtʰisajɔ jɛhɔv̤a ɔjifund̤isajɔ nɡ̤ɔmjalɛlɔ wakʰɔ ukuɓa ujiz̤ɔlisɛ ɛz̤iminini z̤ɔɓuɓi ad̤ɛ amɓɛlwɛ isihɔɡ̤ɔ ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a akaɓalaɬi aɓantu ɓakʰɛ akaliʃiji lakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa isikɔ lija kuɓujɛla ɛɓulunɡ̤isɛni ɓaliland̤ɛlɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantliz̤ijɔ z̤itʰɛ tʲɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kusukɛla pʰɛz̤ulu kuɓɔ aɓanɔɓuɓi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kumɛlana naɓasɛɓɛnz̤i ɓɔɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam kɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a aɓɛ luŋǀɛd̤ɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ unɡ̤ɛ uɬɛ msiɲa waja apʰɔ kutʰiwa kǀwaka kʰɔna ukuɓa nd̤itʰi lwatʲiɓilika uɲawɔ isuka iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a ind̤ikǁʰasɛ ɛɓuninz̤ini ɓɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤aŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤am nɡ̤apʰakatʰi iintutʰuz̤ɛlɔ z̤akʰɔ z̤ijawujɔlisa umpʰɛfumlɔ inɡ̤akǃʰɛlana nawɛ itrɔnɛ jɔlwɛjɛlisɛlɔ ɛɓumɓa uɓuɓi nɡ̤ɔmmisɛlɔ ɓaɬanɡ̤aɲɛla umpʰɛfumlɔ wɛlunɡ̤isa ɓaliɡ̤wɛɓɛ iɡ̤az̤i ɛlimsulwa kanti kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ujiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɛ utʰikǁɔ ɛnd̤iz̤imɛla nɡ̤alɔ uɓuɓujisɛla pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ uɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a ɓaɓɔ uɓa b̤anɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɔɓuɓi ɓaɓɔ uja kuɓab̤anɡ̤isa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu jiz̤ani simɛmɛlɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a sid̤umɛ lɔkusind̤iswa kwɛtʰu masiz̤ɛ pʰamɓi kɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ sinɔmɓulɛlɔ masid̤umɛ kujɛ nɡ̤ɛɛnɡ̤ɔma nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰikǁɔ ɔmkʰulu nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ukumkani ɔmkʰulu nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɔnkɛ uz̤isɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ iinɡ̤ɔnt͡sinɡ̤ɔnt͡si z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi nɛɛŋǀɔpʰɔ z̤ɛɛntaɓa z̤ɛz̤akʰɛ ulɔlwakʰɛ ulwanɮɛ nɡ̤ujɛna walwɛnz̤ajɔ nɔm̤laɓa ɔwɔmilɛjɔ z̤awuɓumɓa iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ jiz̤ani masikǃuɓud̤ɛ siɡ̤ukǃɛ sitʰɔɓɛ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a umɛnz̤i wɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu jɛna tʰina kɛ sinɡ̤aɓantu ɓɔkwaluswa nɡ̤ujɛ nɛz̤imv̤u z̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɛ nam̤la ukuɓa ninɔkuliv̤a iz̤wi lakʰɛ musani ukujɛnz̤a lukʰuni intliz̤ijɔ jɛnu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤asɛmɛrib̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmini jasɛmasa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɔkɔ ɓand̤ilinɡ̤ajɔ ɔɔjiɬɔ ɓand̤ikǀikid̤a ɓɛwuɓɔna umsɛɓɛnz̤i imiɲaka jaɓa nɡ̤amaʃumi amanɛ nd̤ik͡xukǃukilɛ sɛsi siz̤ukulwana nd̤atʰi nɡ̤aɓantu aɓantliz̤ijɔ z̤ind̤wɛnd̤wajɔ aɓaz̤az̤i iinɮɛla z̤am ɓɔna ɛnd̤ad̤a nd̤afunɡ̤a nd̤inɔmsind̤ɔ ukutʰi inɛnɛ aɓasaji kunɡ̤ɛna ɛkupʰumlɛni v̤umani kujɛhɔv̤a inɡ̤ɔma ɛnt͡ʃa v̤umani kujɛhɔv̤a nɔnkɛ ɬaɓatʰi v̤umani kujɛhɔv̤a ɓɔnɡ̤ani iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ ʃumajɛlani nɡ̤ɛɛmini iind̤aɓa ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ z̤ɔsind̤isɔ lwakʰɛ ɓalisani ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni uz̤ukɔ lwakʰɛ ɓalisani ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤ɔnkɛ imisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɛ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa mkʰulu ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnɡ̤ɔwɔkud̤uɲiswa kunɛnɛ ujɔjikɛka jɛna nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɛz̤iz̤wɛ aɓantɔ z̤antɔ ujɛhɔv̤a jɛna wɛnz̤a amaz̤ulu jind̤ili nɔɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amɛla pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ nɡ̤amanɮa nɔkuhɔmɓa ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni jakʰɛ mnikɛni ujɛhɔv̤a miz̤alwanɛ jɛz̤iz̤wɛ mnikɛni ujɛhɔv̤a uz̤ukɔ namanɮa mnikɛni ujɛhɔv̤a uz̤ukɔ lwɛɡ̤ama lakʰɛ tʰwalani umnikɛlɔ niz̤ɛ ɛz̤intɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni z̤akʰɛ mŋǃulɛni ujɛhɔv̤a niv̤ɛtʰɛ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ tʰutʰumɛlani pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ nɔnkɛ ɬaɓatʰi jitʰini ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ukumkani lija kuz̤inz̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔ ɛlimiwɛjɔ linɡ̤aʃukumi uja kuɡ̤wɛɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ lija kuv̤uja iz̤ulu liɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓɛ iɬaɓatʰi luja kuɡ̤ǃ̤uma ulwanɮɛ nɛnz̤alisɛkɔ jalɔ lija kuɮamka iliz̤wɛ nɛntɔ jɔnkɛ ɛkulɔ iz̤ɛ imɛmɛlɛlɛ jɔnkɛ imitʰi jɛɬatʰi pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛsiz̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛsiz̤a kuɡ̤wɛɓa iɬaɓatʰi uja kuliɡ̤wɛɓa ɛlimiwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa nɛz̤iz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɲanisa kwakʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ukumkani lijaɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓa iɬaɓatʰi z̤ijav̤uja iz̤ikǃitʰi ɛz̤ininz̤i nɡ̤amafu nɛsitʰɔkɔtʰɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kujɛ ɓuɓulunɡ̤isa nɔkusɛsikwɛni ummisɔ wɛtrɔnɛ jakʰɛ kuhamɓa umlilɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ ulɛɲa aɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ikʰaɲisa ɛlimiwɛjɔ imiɓanɛ jakʰɛ ujaɓɔna um̤laɓa uz̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤ɛ iintaɓa z̤iɲiɓilika nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmtʰwɛɓɛɓa pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a pʰamɓi kwɛnkɔsi jɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ iz̤ulu likǁɛla uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɛ z̤iluɓɔnɛ uz̤ukɔ lwakʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ ɓad̤anilɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤a umfanɛkisɔ ɔkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ aɓakǃʰajisa nɡ̤ɛɛntɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛntɔ ɓajamŋǃula ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ijɛv̤a ijav̤uja iz̤ijɔn z̤ijaɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓa iintɔmɓi z̤akwajud̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛmiɡ̤wɛɓɔ jakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤uwɛ jɛhɔv̤a ɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni pʰɛz̤u kwɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ uɲukilɛ kunɛnɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓatʰand̤i ɓakajɛhɔv̤a kutʰijɛni ɔkuɓi umɡ̤ǀ̤ini wɛmipʰɛfumlɔ jaɓɛŋǀɛɓa ɓakʰɛ uja kuɓaɬanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni saɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ukukʰaɲa likuɬwajɛlɛlwɛ ilunɡ̤isa nɔv̤ujɔ ɓaluɬwajɛlɛlwɛ aɓantliz̤ijɔ z̤itʰɛ tʲɛ v̤ujani nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a malunɡ̤isa niɓulɛlɛ isikʰumɓuz̤ɔ sakʰɛ ɛsiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ um̤ɔɓɛ v̤umani kujɛhɔv̤a inɡ̤ɔma ɛnt͡ʃa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛnz̤ɛ imisɛɓɛnz̤i ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ simz̤uz̤ɛlɛ ulɔjisɔ isanɮa sakʰɛ sɔkunɛnɛ nɛnɡ̤alɔ jakʰɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ulwaz̤isilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a usind̤isɔ lwakʰɛ uɓutʰʲililɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛɛntlanɡ̤a uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɛ ukʰumɓulɛ iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɛ nɔkuɲanisa kwakʰɛ kwinɮu kasirajɛli z̤iluɓɔnilɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ipʰɛlɔ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi usind̤isɔ lɔtʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu d̤umani kujɛhɔv̤a nɔnkɛ ɬaɓatʰi ɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔkɛlani ɛkumɛmɛlɛlɛni niɓɛtʰɛ uhad̤i mɓɛtʰɛlɛni uhad̤i ujɛhɔv̤a uhad̤i nɛliz̤wi lɛnɡ̤ɔma nɡ̤amakǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ nɛz̤wi lɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ d̤umani pʰamɓi kɔkumkani ujɛhɔv̤a maluɡ̤ǃ̤umɛ ulwanɮɛ nɛnz̤alisɛkɔ jalɔ ɛlimiwɛjɔ naɓɛmi ɓalɔ imilamɓɔ majiɓɛtʰɛ iz̤anɮa z̤imɛmɛlɛlɛ kuɲɛ iintaɓa pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛsiz̤a kuɡ̤wɛɓa iɬaɓatʰi uja kuliɡ̤wɛɓa ɛlimiwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa iz̤iz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ukumkani z̤ijaɡ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤a iz̤iz̤wɛ ulɔɬala ɛkɛrub̤ini lijaʃukuma iɬaɓatʰi ujɛhɔv̤a mkʰulu ɛz̤ijɔn upʰakamilɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɓaja kuliɓulɛla iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ ɛlikʰulu ɛlɔjikɛkajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jɛna amanɮa ɔkumkani atʰand̤a ɔkusɛsikwɛni uwaz̤imasilɛ wɛna nɡ̤ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ wɛnz̤ɛ ɔkusɛsikwɛni nɔɓulunɡ̤isa kwajakɔɓi wɛna mpʰakamisɛni ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nikǃuɓud̤ɛ ɛsitulwɛni sɛɛɲawɔ z̤akʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jɛna ɔɔmɔsɛs nɔarɔn pʰakatʰi kwaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓakʰɛ nɔsamuwɛli pʰakatʰi kwaɓaliŋǃulajɔ iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ ɓajɛ ɓɛɓiz̤a kujɛhɔv̤a waɓapʰɛnd̤ula jɛna watʰɛtʰa kuɓɔ ɛsɛmkǃulwini wɛlifu ɓaz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤ina iz̤iŋ̤ǃ̤inɔ z̤akʰɛ nɔmmisɛlɔ awaɓanika wɔna jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu waɓapʰɛnd̤ula wɛna waɓa nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ɔkǁɔlɛlajɔ kuɓɔ ɔnɡ̤ɔz̤ipʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlajɔ iintlɔnd̤i z̤aɓɔ mpʰakamisɛni ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nikǃuɓud̤ɛ ɛntaɓɛni jakʰɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu um̤ɔɓɛ wɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɔkuɓulɛla d̤umani kujɛhɔv̤a nɔnkɛ ɬaɓatʰi mkʰɔnz̤ɛni ujɛhɔv̤a niv̤uja jiz̤ani pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ nimɛmɛlɛla jaz̤ini ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ jɛna wasɛnz̤a jɛna asisitʰi sinɡ̤aɓantu ɓakʰɛ nɛz̤imv̤u ɛz̤aluswa nɡ̤ujɛ nɡ̤ɛnani ɛmasanɡ̤wɛni akʰɛ niɓulɛla ɛz̤intɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni z̤akʰɛ nid̤umisa ɓulɛlani kujɛ ɓɔnɡ̤ani iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ulunɡ̤ilɛ iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɛ inɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ukuɲanisɛka kwakʰɛ kukwiz̤iz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana ɛkad̤av̤id̤ɛ um̤ɔɓɛ nd̤ija kuv̤uma nɡ̤ɛŋǀɛɓa nanɡ̤ɔmɡ̤wɛɓɔ nd̤ija kukuɓɛtʰɛla uhad̤i jɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kukǃikǃa inɮɛla jɛŋ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɔ uja kuz̤a nd̤ija kuhamɓa nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɔ jɛntliz̤ijɔ jam pʰakatʰi kwɛnɮu jam and̤iji kuɓɛka pʰamɓi kwamɛɬɔ ntɔ inɔɓut͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔ ukwɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkuŋǁakǁʰa nd̤ikutʰijilɛ akuji kunamatʰɛla intliz̤ijɔ ɛd͡ʒ̤iɓiliz̤ajɔ ija kukʰwɛlɛla kud̤ɛ intɔ ɛmɓi and̤iji kujaz̤i ɔm̤lɛɓajɔ ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ nɡ̤asɛsɛ lɔwɔ nd̤ija kumb̤anɡ̤isa ɔmɛɬɔ akǃwajinɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɔntliz̤ijɔ iɡ̤unɡ̤uɓɛlɛjɔ lɔwɔ and̤inakumtʰwala amɛɬɔ akwaɓaɲanisajɔ ɛz̤wɛni ukuɓa ɓand̤ipʰaɬɛ ɔhamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛŋ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɔ lɔwɔ makand̤ilunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ akaji kuɬala pʰakatʰi kwɛnɮu jam ɔwɛnz̤a inkɔɬisɔ ɔtʰɛtʰa uɓukǁɔki akaji kukǃina pʰamɓi kwamɛɬɔ imisɔ nɡ̤ɛmisɔ nd̤ija kuɓab̤anɡ̤isa ɓɔnkɛ aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɓɛliz̤wɛ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤iɓaŋǃumlɛ ɛmz̤ini kajɛhɔv̤a ɓɔnkɛ aɓasɛɓɛnz̤i ɓɔɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a umtʰand̤az̤ɔ wɔlusiz̤ana kǁa atʰʲafilɛjɔ ɛpʰalaz̤a iinkalaz̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a jɛhɔv̤a wuv̤ɛ umtʰand̤az̤ɔ kufikɛ kuwɛ ukuz̤iɓika musa ukuɓusitʰɛlisa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwa nd̤itʰɔɓɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛmini ɛnd̤id̤and̤uluka nɡ̤ajɔ kʰawulɛz̤a und̤ipʰɛnd̤ulɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ijapʰɛla imiɬa jam nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsi amatʰamɓɔ av̤utʰa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ikɔ iɓɛtʰwɛ jɔma nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmfunɔ intliz̤ijɔ jam nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iliɓɛlɛ nɔkuɮa ukuɮa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤wi lɔkuɡ̤ǀ̤uma amatʰamɓɔ at͡ʃɛlɛ ɛɲamɛni jam nd̤ifana nɛŋ̤ǀ̤wanɡ̤uɓɛ jɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nd̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsikʰɔv̤a sasɛmaŋǁɔwɛni and̤ilali nd̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntaka ɛjɔd̤wa pʰɛz̤u kwɛnɮu imini jɔnkɛ z̤ijand̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a iint͡ʃaɓa z̤am aɓand̤iɡ̤ɛz̤ɛlajɔ ɓatʰuka nɡ̤am nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iɮɛ utʰutʰu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsɔnka intɔ ɛnd̤ijisɛlajɔ nd̤ijipʰitʰikɛz̤ɛ nɛz̤ililɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkub̤ab̤ama kwakʰɔ nɔɓuxalaxumɛ ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa und̤ifuŋǃulɛ wand̤ilaɬa imiɬa jam ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔluka kwamatʰunz̤i mna nd̤ɔmilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmfunɔ kɛ wɛna jɛhɔv̤a uɬɛli nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ inkumɓuz̤ɔ jakʰɔ ikwiz̤iz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana uja umɛ ujipʰatʰɛ iz̤ijɔn nɡ̤ɛmfɛsanɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa likǁɛʃa lɔkujiɓaɓala ɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lifikilɛ ikǁɛʃa ɛlimisiwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ɓakʰɔliswɛ nɡ̤amatʲɛ ajɔ utʰuli lwajɔ ɓanɔfɛfɛ nɡ̤alɔ z̤ija kulɔjika iintlanɡ̤a iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a nɔɔkumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛɬaɓatʰi uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛjakʰilɛ iz̤ijɔn ujɛhɔv̤a waɓɔnakala ɛɓukǃakǃawulini ɓakʰɛ uwub̤ɛkilɛ umtʰand̤az̤ɔ waɓakǀʰuʃuluz̤ajɔ akawud̤ɛla umtʰand̤az̤ɔ waɓɔ ɔkɔ kuja kub̤alɛlwa isiz̤ukulwana ɛsiz̤ajɔ aɓantu aɓaz̤a kud̤alwa ɓad̤umisɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukǃɔnd̤ɛlɛ ɛsɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ ɛpʰɛz̤ulu ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ wɔnd̤ɛla ɛɬaɓatʰini ɛsɛmaz̤ulwini ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa akuv̤ɛ ukuɡ̤ǀ̤uma kwaɓakʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰iwɛjɔ aɓakʰululɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɔkufa ɓaŋǀɔkɔlɛ ɛz̤ijɔn nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛnd̤umisɔ jakʰɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛkuɓutʰɛlanɛni kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ nɛz̤ikumkani ukuɓa z̤ikʰɔnz̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uwatʰɔɓilɛ ɛnɮɛlɛni amanɮa ujiŋǃamlɛ imiɬa jam nd̤itʰi tʰikǁɔ ukund̤isusa pʰakatʰi kwɛmiɬa jam ikwiz̤iz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana imiɲaka jakʰɔ walisɛka kud̤ala iɬaɓatʰi lisisɛnz̤ɔ sɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɔ iz̤ulu ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ z̤ija kud̤aka wɛna kɛ umɛ z̤ɔna z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ija kɔnakala nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ wɔz̤iɡ̤uɡ̤isa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsamɓatʰɔ z̤iɡ̤uɡ̤ɛ kɛ wɛna uɬɛli unɡ̤uwɛ imiɲaka jakʰɔ ajinakupʰɛla ɔɔɲana ɓaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ɓaja kuɬala imɓɛwu jaɓɔ iz̤imasɛkɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ ɛkad̤av̤id̤ɛ mɓɔnɡ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a mpʰɛfumlɔ iliɓɔnɡ̤ɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ ɛliŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ intɔ jɔnkɛ ɛnɡ̤apʰakatʰi mɓɔnɡ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a mpʰɛfumlɔ unɡ̤ajiliɓali jɔnkɛ impatʰɔ jakʰɛ ɛntlɛ ulɔkǁɔlɛla ɓɔnkɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɔ ulɔpʰilisa z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ifɔ z̤akʰɔ ulɔkʰulula uɓɔmi ɓakʰɔ ɛsihɔɡ̤wɛni akutʰi d͡ʒ̤iz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǀɛɓa nɛmfɛsanɛ lɔ uwuz̤alisajɔ umlɔmɔ wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛntɔ ɛlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɓuɬaz̤ijɛkɛ uɓut͡ʃa ɓakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɓɔkʰɔz̤i nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a umɛnz̤i wɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i jɔɓulunɡ̤isa nɛz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓakǀud̤isiwɛjɔ ɓɔnkɛ umaz̤isi wɛɛnɮɛla z̤akʰɛ kumɔsɛs wɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤iŋǀamisajɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli unɛmfɛsanɛ ɛnɔɓaɓalɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uz̤ɛka kad̤ɛ umsind̤ɔ mkʰulu nɡ̤ɛŋǀɛɓa akapʰiki kupʰɛlɛ akawuɡ̤ǀ̤ini umsind̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ akɛnz̤i kutʰi nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤ɛtʰu akasipʰatʰi nɡ̤ɔkɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkupʰakama kwɛz̤ulu pʰɛz̤u kɔm̤laɓa ukuɓa namanɮa iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɛ kwaɓamɔjikajɔ kund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa kud̤ɛ kwɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a ukulukʰwɛlɛlisa kwakʰɛ kutʰi uk͡xɛkǃɔ lwɛtʰu kund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkusikwa jimfɛsanɛ kɔjisɛ kuɓantwana ukusikwa jimfɛsanɛ kukajɛhɔv̤a kwaɓamɔjikajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujakwaz̤i jɛna ukuɓund͡ʒ̤wa kwɛtʰu ɛkʰumɓula ukuɓa silutʰuli haji ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔtʲani imiɬa jakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntʲantʲamɓɔ jasɛnɮɛ kund͡ʒ̤alɔ ukutʲatʲamɓa kwakʰɛ kǁa utʰɛ umɔja waɮula kujɔ ajiɓikʰɔ inɡ̤aɓi saz̤ana najɔ ind̤awɔ jajɔ kɛ jɔna iŋǀɛɓa kajɛhɔv̤a ikwaɓamɔjikajɔ kususɛla kwapʰakad̤ɛ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni nɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɛ ɓukɔɔɲana ɓɔɔɲana kwaɓawuɡ̤ǀ̤inilɛjɔ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wakʰɛ kwaɓaz̤ikʰumɓulajɔ iz̤ijalɛz̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ ukuɓa ɓaz̤ɛnz̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ujiz̤inz̤isilɛ ɛmaz̤ulwini itrɔnɛ jakʰɛ uɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ ɓulawula intɔ jɔnkɛ mɓɔnɡ̤ɛni ujɛhɔv̤a z̤itʰuɲwa z̤akʰɛ maɡ̤ɔxa ɔmɛlɛlɛjɔ alɛnz̤ajɔ iliz̤wi lakʰɛ ɛpʰulapʰula isand̤i sɛliz̤wi lakʰɛ mɓɔnɡ̤ɛni ujɛhɔv̤a nɔnkɛ mikʰɔsi jakʰɛ ɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛli ɓakʰɛ ɓɛnz̤i ɓɔkutʰand̤a kwakʰɛ mɓɔnɡ̤ɛni ujɛhɔv̤a nɔnkɛ z̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ mɓɔnɡ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a mpʰɛfumlɔ mɓɔnɡ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a mpʰɛfumlɔ jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ umkʰulu kakʰulu wamɓɛtʰɛ ind̤ili nɔɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amɛla ulɔtʰi wamɓu ukukʰaɲa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ulɔlanɛka iz̤ulu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlɛnɡ̤alɛnɡ̤a lɛntɛntɛ ulɔɬanɡ̤anisa ɛmanz̤ini imikǃad̤i jamaɡ̤umɓi akʰɛ apʰɛz̤ulu ulɔwɛnz̤a iŋǃwɛlɔ jakʰɛ ulɔhamɓa nɡ̤amapʰikɔ ɔmɔja ulɔwɛnz̤a iz̤itʰuɲwa z̤akʰɛ imimɔja aɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛli ɓakʰɛ umlilɔ ɔlɛɲajɔ walisɛka iɬaɓatʰi pʰɛz̤u kwɛmimisɔ jalɔ ukuɓa linɡ̤aʃukuɲiswa napʰakad̤ɛ kanapʰakad̤ɛ waliɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla nɡ̤amanz̤i anz̤ɔnɡ̤ɔnz̤ɔnɡ̤ɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsamɓatʰɔ ɛma amanz̤i pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntaɓa ɛkukʰalimɛni kwakʰɔ asaɓa ɛz̤wini lɛnd̤ud̤umɔ jakʰɔ aɓalɛka ɓupʰutʰupʰutʰu kwɛɲuka iintaɓa kwɛɬa iz̤iɬamɓɔ aja kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ uɓuwasɛkɛlɛ jɔna wamisa umd̤a ukuɓa anɡ̤ɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰi anɡ̤aɓujɛ awuɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɛ um̤laɓa ulɔtʰuma imitʰɔmɓɔ ijɛ ɛz̤iɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni ihamɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntaɓa isɛz̤a z̤ɔnkɛ iiɲamakaz̤i z̤asɛnɮɛ amaɛsilɛ asɛnɮɛ akǃaɓula iŋǁanɔ lawɔ kuɬala pʰɛz̤u kwajɔ z̤ɛz̤ulu z̤it͡ʃɔlɔz̤a pʰakatʰi kwamasɛɓɛ ulɔsɛz̤a iintaɓa kumaɡ̤umɓi akʰɛ apʰɛz̤ulu ujaɬutʰa um̤laɓa z̤iz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤akʰɔ ulɔnt͡ʃulisɛla iinkɔmɔ utʲani nɔmfunɔ wɔkuŋǀɛd̤a ukuz̤ɛ kupʰumɛ isɔnka ɛm̤laɓɛni iwajini ijiv̤ujisɛ intliz̤ijɔ jɔmntu ɓukʰaz̤imlɛ uɓusɔ nɡ̤ɛɔli isɔnka sijikǁʰasɛ intliz̤ijɔ jɔmntu ijaɬutʰa imitʰi kajɛhɔv̤a imisɛd̤arɛ jasɛlɛb̤anɔn awajitʲalajɔ apʰɔ z̤akʰɛla kʰɔna inɡ̤wamz̤a isɛmisiprɛsini inɮu jajɔ iintaɓa z̤ɔna ɛz̤ɔ z̤ipʰakamilɛjɔ z̤ɛz̤amaɡ̤ɔɡ̤ɔ amawa az̤imɛla iimɓila iɲanɡ̤a wajɛnz̤ɛla amakǁɛʃa ajɔ ilanɡ̤a lijakwaz̤i ukut͡ʃɔna kwalɔ wɛnz̤a uɓumɲama wɛna kuɓɛ sɛɓusuku aʃukumɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ ɔnkɛ amaxamŋǀwa ɛɬatʰi iinɡ̤ɔɲama ɛz̤int͡ʃa z̤iɡ̤ǃ̤umɛla ukukǃwɛnɡ̤a z̤ifuna ukuɮa kwaz̤ɔ kutʰikǁɔ lakutʰi kǀʰapʰa ilanɡ̤a z̤ijaɬanɡ̤anisana z̤iɓutʰumɛ ɛz̤ikʰunɮɛni z̤az̤ɔ ujapʰuma ajɛ ɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini wakʰɛ nasɛnkɔnz̤wɛni jakʰɛ aɬwisɛ haji ukuɓa z̤ininz̤i iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤akʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ipʰɛla uz̤ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔɓululumkɔ uz̤ɛlɛ um̤laɓa z̤iz̤id̤alwa z̤akʰɔ nalɔ ulwanɮɛ lulukʰulu luɓanz̤i nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔmɓini kulapʰɔ kuz̤inamɓuz̤anɛ z̤inɡ̤ɛnakuɓalwa ɛz̤iŋǀinanɛ kwanɛz̤ikʰulu iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ kulapʰɔ kuhamɓa iiŋǃanawa nanɡ̤ɔ umnɛnɡ̤a ɔwawuɓumɓɛla ukuɮala kulɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɔ ntɔ z̤ipʰɛla z̤ikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ kuwɛ ukuɓa uz̤inikɛ ukuɮa kwaz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛlililɔ ujaz̤inika z̤ijakǀʰɔla ujasiv̤ula isanɮa sakʰɔ z̤ijaɬutʰa kɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ujaɓusitʰɛlisa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ z̤ijakʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰iswa ujawuɬanɡ̤anisa umɔja waz̤ɔ z̤ipʰumɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ z̤iɓujɛlɛ ɛlutʰulini lwaz̤ɔ utʰuma umɔja wakʰɔ z̤ijad̤alwa uɓuɬaz̤ijɛ uɓusɔ ɓɔm̤laɓa uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a maɓuɓɛ nɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a makav̤ujɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ ulɔb̤ɛka ɛm̤laɓɛni uz̤amaz̤amɛ ukǀʰukumisa iintaɓa z̤ikǃʰumɛ nd̤ija kuv̤uma kujɛhɔv̤a lɔ ɡ̤ama nd̤iɮa uɓɔmi nd̤ija kumɓɛtʰɛla uhad̤i utʰikǁɔ ɛkuɓɛni nd̤inɡ̤ɔkʰɔjɔ makuɓɛ nɛŋǀasa kujɛ ukukǀamŋ̤ǀ̤a mna nd̤ija kuv̤uja nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a maɓaɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini aɓɔni ɓanɡ̤aɓi saɓakʰɔ aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ mɓɔnɡ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a mpʰɛfumlɔ halɛluja ɓulɛlani kujɛhɔv̤a ŋǃulani iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ jaz̤isani ɛz̤iz̤wɛni iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤iŋǀamisilɛjɔ v̤umani kujɛ mɓɛtʰɛlɛni uhad̤i kǁɔkǁani nɡ̤ɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ kǃʰajisani nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama lakʰɛ ɛliŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ majiv̤ujɛ intliz̤ijɔ jaɓamkǃukǃɛlajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ŋ̤ǁ̤amɛlani ujɛhɔv̤a namanɮa akʰɛ funani uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ kʰumɓulani imisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɛ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ awajɛnz̤ajɔ iz̤imanɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ nɛz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɔ z̤ɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɛ mɓɛwu kaaɓraham jɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɛ ɲana ɓakajakɔɓi ɓaɲulwa ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu jɛna z̤isɛɬaɓatʰini lɔnkɛ iz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɔ z̤akʰɛ uwukʰumɓula nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wakʰɛ iliz̤wi awalimisɛla lɛz̤iz̤ukulwana awaŋǃɔpʰisana nɡ̤alɔ nɔaɓraham awalifunɡ̤ɛla uisakɛ awalimisajɔ ukuɓa liɓɛ nɡ̤ummisɛlɔ kujakɔɓi liɓɛ nɡ̤umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ kusirajɛli ɛsitʰi nd̤ikunika iliz̤wɛ lakwakanan liɓɛ likǀand̤ɛlɔ lɛlifa lɛnu ɓɛsɛnɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a amɓalwa ɓɛɓaŋǀinanɛ ɓɛnɡ̤aɓapʰamɓukɛli kulɔ ɓaɓɛhamɓa ɓɛsuka kɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a ɓajɛ kɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a ɓɛsuka kɔɓuɲɛ uɓukumkani ɓajɛ kwaɓaɲɛ aɓantu akav̤umɛlanɡ̤a ukuɓa aɓakǀud̤isɛ wɔɬwaja ɔɔkumkani nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓɔ ɛsitʰi musani ukuɓakǀʰukumisa aɓatʰand͡ʒ̤iswa ɓam musani ukuɓapʰatʰa kakuɓi aɓaprɔfɛti ɓam waɓiz̤a inɮala jɛz̤a pʰɛz̤u kwɛliz̤wɛ wawapʰula wɔnkɛ umsimɛlɛlɔ ɔsisɔnka watʰuma ind̤ɔd̤a pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ kwatʰɛnɡ̤iswa nɡ̤ɔjɔsɛfu waɓa likʰɔɓɔka ɓaz̤ikǀinɛz̤ɛla iiɲawɔ z̤akʰɛ nɡ̤amakʰamand̤ɛla wafika umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ɛsiɲitʰini kwad̤a kwalikǁɛʃa lɔkufika kwɛliz̤wi lakʰɛ intɛtʰɔ kajɛhɔv̤a jamɲiɓilikisa ukumkani watʰuma wamkʰulula umlawuli wɛz̤iz̤wɛ wamv̤ulɛla wamɛnz̤a inkɔsi jɛnɮu jakʰɛ umlawuli wɛmfujɔ jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ ukuɓa aɓakʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰ɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuz̤itʰand̤ɛla kwakʰɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akʰɛ amakʰulu awafund̤isɛ uɓulumkɔ waz̤a usirajɛli waja ɛjiputa ujakɔɓi wapʰamɓukɛla ɛz̤wɛni lakwaham waɓakǃʰamisa kakʰulu aɓantu ɓakʰɛ waɓɔmɛlɛz̤a nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓaɓɔ waz̤id͡ʒ̤ika iintliz̤ijɔ z̤aɓɔ ukuɓa ɓaɓatʰijɛ aɓantu ɓakʰɛ ɓaɓakǃʰatʰanisɛlɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ watʰuma umɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɛ nɔarɔn awamɲulajɔ ɓaz̤ɛnz̤a kuɓɔ iind̤awɔ z̤ɛmikǃɔnd̤isɔ jakʰɛ nɛz̤imanɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakwaham watʰumɛla uɓumɲama kwaɓa mɲama aɓaɓa nakuwapʰikisa amaz̤wi akʰɛ wawaɡ̤ukǃula amanz̤i aɓɔ aɓa liɡ̤az̤i waz̤iɓulala iintlanz̤i z̤aɓɔ iliz̤wɛ laɓɔ laɲakaz̤ɛla amasɛlɛ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɔnt͡sini z̤ɔɔkumkani ɓaɓɔ watʰɛtʰa z̤afika iz̤iɓawu iiŋ̤ǀ̤ɔŋ̤ǀ̤ɔni ɛmid̤ɛni jaɓɔ jɔnkɛ waɓanika isikǀʰɔtʰɔ saɓa jimv̤ula umlilɔ walɛɲa ɛz̤wɛni laɓɔ wajiɓɛtʰa imid̤ilija jaɓɔ nɛmikʰiwanɛ jaɓɔ wajiʃwakǃa imitʰi jɛmid̤a jaɓɔ watʰɛtʰa iinkumɓi ɛz̤and̤ajɔ nɛz̤ikʰɔtʰululajɔ intɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛnakuɓalwa z̤ajiɮa imifunɔ jɔnkɛ ɛz̤wɛni laɓɔ z̤az̤iɮa iz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ɔm̤laɓa waɓɔ waz̤a waɓaɓulala ɓɔnkɛ aɓamaz̤iɓulɔ ɛz̤wɛni laɓɔ intlaɬɛla jamanɮa aɓɔ ɔnkɛ waɓakʰupʰa kɛ aɓakʰɛ ɓɛnɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ akwaɓakʰɔ ukʰuɓɛkajɔ ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤akʰɛ lav̤uja ijiputa ɛkupʰumɛni kwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lifikɛlwɛ kukunkwantʲisa kwaɓɔ wanɛka lɔkuɓasitʰa nɔmlilɔ wɔkukʰaɲisa ɛɓusuku ɓaɓiz̤a waz̤isa iz̤aɡ̤witʲi waɓaɬutʰisa nanɡ̤ɛsɔnka sasɛz̤ulwini wav̤ula aɓalɛka amanz̤i ahamɓa ɛnɡ̤umlamɓɔ ɛmkǃwɛɓɛd̤wini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wakʰumɓula iliz̤wi lakʰɛ ɛliŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ wakʰumɓula uaɓraham umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɛ waɓakʰupʰa aɓantu ɓakʰɛ ɓɛnɛmiɬali aɓaɲulwa ɓakʰɛ ɓɛmɛmɛlɛla waɓanika amaz̤wɛ ɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɓajiɬutʰa inz̤uz̤ɔ jɔkwapʰuka kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ ukuz̤ɛ ɓajiɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ imimisɛlɔ jakʰɛ ɓajiɓamɓɛ imijalɛlɔ jakʰɛ halɛluja halɛluja ɓulɛlani kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛlunɡ̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɔkuz̤ikǁɛla iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɔnɔkujiv̤akalisa jɔnkɛ ind̤umisɔ jakʰɛ haji ujɔlɔ lwaɓaliɡ̤ǀ̤inajɔ isikɔ lwaɓɛnz̤a uɓulunɡ̤isa nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ nd̤ikʰumɓulɛ jɛhɔv̤a ɛkwɛnz̤ɛni kwakʰɔ kuɓantu ɓakʰɔ nd̤ijɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔsind̤isɔ lwakʰɔ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤iɓɔnɛ iɲ̤wɛɓa jaɓaɲulwa ɓakʰɔ nd̤iv̤ujɛ ɛkuv̤ujɛni kɔɬanɡ̤a lwakʰɔ nd̤ikǃʰajisɛ kuɲɛ nɛlifa lakʰɔ sɔnilɛ tʰina nɔɔɓawɔ sɛnz̤ɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa sɛnz̤ɛ ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɔɔɓawɔ aɓajikǃikǃanɡ̤a ɛjiputa imisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɔ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ aɓaɓukʰumɓulanɡ̤a uɓuninz̤i ɓɛɛŋǀɛɓa z̤akʰɔ ɓapʰika ɛlwanɮɛ ɛlwanɮɛ ɔluɓɔmv̤u waɓasind̤isa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤ama lakʰɛ ukuz̤ɛ aɓaz̤isɛ uɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓakʰɛ walukʰalimɛla ulwanɮɛ ɔluɓɔmv̤u lɔma waɓahamɓisa ɛmanz̤ini anz̤ɔnɡ̤ɔnz̤ɔnɡ̤ɔ kwanɡ̤a kusɛntlanɡ̤ɔ waɓasind̤isa ɛsanɮɛni sɔɓatʰijajɔ waɓakʰulula ɛsanɮɛni sɔt͡ʃaɓa amanz̤i aɓaɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla aɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓaɓɔ akwasala namɲɛ kuɓɔ ɓakʰɔlwa kɛ nɡ̤amaz̤wi akʰɛ ɓajiv̤uma ind̤umisɔ jakʰɛ kanti ɓaɬɛ ɓaz̤iliɓala iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ aɓalilind̤a ikǀɛɓɔ lakʰɛ ɓakʰanukilɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɓamlinɡ̤a utʰikǁɔ ɛnkanɡ̤ala waɓanika aɓakuɓiz̤ajɔ watʰumɛla ukuŋ̤ǀ̤umɓɛka ɛmpʰɛfumlwɛni waɓɔ ɓamɛnz̤ɛla umɔna umɔsɛs ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni nɔarɔn ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kajɛhɔv̤a wav̤ulɛka um̤laɓa wamɡ̤iɲa ud̤atan walisɛlɛla iɓanɮa likaab̤iram umlilɔ walit͡ʃisa iɓanɮa laɓɔ amalanɡ̤atʲɛ aɓalɛɲa aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɓɛnz̤a itʰɔlɛ ɛhɔrɛb̤ɛ ɓakǃuɓud̤a ɛmfanɛkiswɛni ɔtʰʲid̤iwɛjɔ ɓalwananisa uz̤ukɔ lwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛntɔ ɛmilisɛ ɔkwɛnkɔmɔ ɛɮa utʲani ɓamliɓala utʰikǁɔ umsind̤isi waɓɔ ɔwɛnz̤a imisɛɓɛnz̤i ɛmikʰulu ɛjiputa imisɛɓɛnz̤i ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ ɛz̤wɛni lakwaham imisɛɓɛnz̤i ɛjɔjikɛkajɔ ɛlwanɮɛ ɔluɓɔmv̤u watʰi uja kuɓat͡ʃaɓalalisa kɔkɔ wɛsukajɔ umɔsɛs umɲulwa wakʰɛ wɛma ɛtʰuɓɛni pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ ɛɓujisa uɓuʃuʃu ɓakʰɛ ukuɓa anɡ̤at͡ʃaɓalalisi ɓalikǀɛkisa iliz̤wɛ ɛliŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ aɓakʰɔlwa liliz̤wi lakʰɛ ɓak͡xɔk͡xa ɛz̤intɛntɛni z̤aɓɔ aɓalipʰulapʰula iz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a waɓapʰakamisɛla isanɮa sakʰɛ wafunɡ̤ɛla ukuɓa aɓawisɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ajiwisɛ imɓɛwu jaɓɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a aɓakǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰɛ ɛmaz̤wɛni ɓaz̤iɓand̤akaɲa nɔb̤ahalipɛhɔrɛ ɓaɮa imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jaɓafilɛjɔ ɓamkǃumɓisa nɡ̤ɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤aɓɔ saɡ̤alɛlɛka pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ isiɓɛtʰɔ wɛsuka wɛma upinɛhasi satʰintɛlwa isiɓɛtʰɔ ɔkɔ kwaɓalɛlwa kujɛ ɛkutʰini ɓuɓulunɡ̤isa iz̤iz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni ɓamkǃumɓisa ɛmanz̤ini asɛmɛrib̤a kwɛɬa uɓuɓi kumɔsɛs nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓawupʰikisa umɔja wakʰɛ wapʰɔlɔlɔz̤a kɛ nɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɛ aɓaz̤it͡ʃaɓalalisa iz̤iz̤wɛ awajɛtʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤az̤ɔ kuɓɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓakǁuɓana nɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛz̤ɔ ɓafund̤a iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤az̤ɔ ɓakʰɔnz̤a iz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤az̤ɔ jaɓa sisixintʲɛlɔ kuɓɔ ɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ nanɡ̤ɛɛntɔmɓi z̤aɓɔ kwiid̤ɛmɔn ɓapʰalaz̤a iɡ̤az̤i ɛlimsulwa iɡ̤az̤i lɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ nɛlɛɛntɔmɓi z̤aɓɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla nɡ̤aɓɔ kwiz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤akwakanan laɬand͡ʒ̤ɛlwa iliz̤wɛ nɡ̤amaɡ̤az̤i ɓaɓa z̤iiŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓahɛɲuz̤a nɡ̤ɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤aɓɔ wav̤utʰa kɛ umsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a kuɓantu ɓakʰɛ laɓa lisikiz̤i kujɛ lakʰɛ waɓanikɛla ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤ɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɓalawulwa nɡ̤aɓaɓatʰijilɛjɔ z̤aɓakǁina iint͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ ɓatʰɔtʲɛlwa pʰant͡si kwɛz̤anɮa z̤az̤ɔ z̤iɓɛ z̤ininz̤i iz̤iɬanɮɔ ɛɓaɬanɡ̤ula kɛ ɓɔna ɓampʰikisa nɡ̤amakǃʰinɡ̤a aɓɔ ɓɔnakala ɓuɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ nɔkɔ kɛ wakunɔnɛlɛla ukuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwa kwaɓɔ akuv̤a ukuɬaɬamɓa kwaɓɔ wawukʰumɓula nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓɔ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wakʰɛ waz̤ɔɬwaja nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuninz̤i ɓɛɛŋǀɛɓa z̤akʰɛ waɓafumanisa imfɛsanɛ pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓajɛ ɓɛɓatʰimɓilɛ sisind̤isɛ jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu siɓutʰɛ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ukuz̤ɛ siɓulɛlɛ kwiɡ̤ama lakʰɔ ɛliŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ siz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛnd̤umisɔ jakʰɔ makaɓɔnɡ̤wɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli kususɛla kwapʰakad̤ɛ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni maɓatʰi ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu amɛn halɛluja ɓulɛlani kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛlunɡ̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɛ maɓat͡ʃɔ aɓakʰululwa ɓakajɛhɔv̤a awaɓakʰululajɔ ɛsanɮɛni sɔmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli waɓaɓutʰa ɛmaz̤wɛni ɛmpumalanɡ̤a nasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a ɛntla nasɛlwanɮɛ ɓad̤inɡ̤a ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni ɛsɛnkanɡ̤a aɓafumana mz̤i wakuɬala ɓɛlamɓilɛ ɓɛŋǁaniwɛ watʰʲafa pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ ɓakʰala kɛ kujɛhɔv̤a ɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛni jaɓɔ waɓaɬanɡ̤ula ɛkukǀutʰɛkɛni kwaɓɔ waɓaɲatʰɛlisa ɛnɮɛlɛni ɛtʰɛ tʲɛ ukuɓa ɓajɛ kumz̤i wɔkuɬala maɓajiɓulɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɛ nɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɛ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ kɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu kuɓa ɛwuɬutʰisilɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ ɔt͡ʃɔɓajɔ wawuz̤alisa nɡ̤ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ ɔlamɓilɛjɔ ɓɛɬɛli ɛmɲamɛni nasɛtʰunz̤ini lɔkufa ɓɛkʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰wɛ jimɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ nasisiɲitʰi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛpʰikisɛ amaz̤wi katʰikǁɔ ɓɛlit͡ʃit͡ʃisa ikǀɛɓɔ lɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni wajitʰɔɓa intliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓasɛɓɛnz̤isa kanz̤ima ɓakʰuɓɛka akwaɓakʰɔ mŋǀɛd̤i ɓakʰala kɛ kujɛhɔv̤a ɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛni jaɓɔ waɓasind̤isa ɛkukǀutʰɛkɛni kwaɓɔ waɓakʰupʰa ɛmɲamɛni nasɛtʰunz̤ini lɔkufa waz̤ikǃʰawula iimɓɔpʰɛlɛlɔ z̤aɓɔ maɓajiɓulɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɛ nɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɛ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ kɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu kuɓa ɛz̤apʰulɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤ɔb̤ɛd̤u wajikǁakakǁa imiv̤alɔ jɛsiɲitʰi aɓamatʰilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnɮɛla jɔkuk͡xɛkǃa kwaɓɔ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ ɓakǀinɛz̤ɛlwa kɔnkɛ ukuɮa kwaɓa lisikiz̤i kumpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ ɓafika ɛmasanɡ̤wɛni ɔkufa ɓakʰala kɛ kujɛhɔv̤a ɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛni jaɓɔ waɓasind̤isa ɛkukǀutʰɛkɛni kwaɓɔ watʰumɛla iliz̤wi lakʰɛ waɓapʰilisa waɓasiz̤a ɛz̤ihɔɡ̤wɛni z̤aɓɔ maɓajiɓulɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɛ nɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɛ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ kɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu maɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɛ imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔmɓulɛlɔ ɓaŋǀɔkɔlɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ ɓɛmɛmɛlɛla aɓaja ɛlwanɮɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǃanawa ɓɛnz̤ɛ iʃiʃini ɛmanz̤ini amaninz̤i ɓaz̤iɓɔna ɓɔna iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a nɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɛ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ ɛnz̤ulwini wat͡ʃɔ wav̤usa umɔja ɔv̤utʰuz̤ajɔ wapʰakamisa amaz̤a ajɔ ɓaɲuka ɓasinɡ̤a ɛz̤ulwini ɓɛɬa ɓasinɡ̤a ɛmanz̤ini ɛnz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓila umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ utʰɛ amanɮa ɓuɓuɓi ɓatʰɛnd̤ɛlɛka ɓahɛkǁa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛŋǁila ɓut͡ʃɔnɛ ɓɔnkɛ uɓulumkɔ ɓaɓɔ ɓakʰala kɛ kujɛhɔv̤a ɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛni jaɓɔ waɓakʰupʰa ɛkukǀutʰɛkɛni kwaɓɔ ukumisilɛ ukuv̤utʰuz̤a kwatʰi kǀwaka amaz̤a ajɔ az̤ɔla ɓav̤uja kɛ kuɓa ɛd̤amɓilɛ waɓafikisa ɛkǀʰwɛɓɛni aɓalilanɡ̤az̤ɛlɛlajɔ maɓajiɓulɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɛ nɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɛ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ kɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu maɓampʰakamisɛ ɛɓanɮɛni laɓantu ɓamd̤umisɛ ɛmɓutʰwɛni jamad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ujɛnz̤ɛ imilamɓɔ jaɓa jintlanɡ̤ɔ namatʰɛnd̤ɛ amanz̤i aɓa nɡ̤um̤laɓa ɔŋǁaniwɛjɔ iliz̤wɛ ɛlinɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ laɓa lɛlɛtʲuwa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤imɓi z̤aɓɛmi ɓalɔ ujɛnz̤ɛ intlanɡ̤ɔ jaɓa lid̤ikɛ ɛlinamanz̤i iliz̤wɛ ɛlinɡ̤umkǃwɛɓɛd̤u laɓa nɡ̤amatʰɛnd̤ɛ amanz̤i waɓaɬalisa kʰɔna aɓalamɓilɛjɔ ɓamisa umz̤i wɔkuɬala ɓaɬwajɛla ɓatʲala iz̤id̤ilija ɓav̤ɛlisa iz̤ikǃʰamɔ ɓaɓa nɔnɡ̤ɛnisɛlɔ waɓasikɛlɛla ɓand̤a kunɛnɛ iinkɔmɔ z̤aɓɔ akaz̤iŋǀipʰisa ɓaŋǀipʰa ɓasiɓɛkɛka nɡ̤ɔkukʰaɲanɡ̤wa ɓuɓuɓi nɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤ala uwaɡ̤alɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛnd̤ɛlɔ amanɛnɛ wawad̤inɡ̤isa ɛɲaɲɛni kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ nɮɛla walisa ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɛni iɬwɛmpu kud̤ɛ nɛŋ̤ǀ̤inɛz̤ɛlɔ walɛnz̤ɛla imiz̤alwana jand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔm̤lamɓi ɓaja kuɓɔna aɓatʰɛ tʲɛ ɓav̤ujɛ ɓɔnkɛ uɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa ɓuv̤alɛ umlɔmɔ lɔwɔ ulumkilɛjɔ makaz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ ɛz̤i nd̤awɔ az̤iɡ̤ǃ̤alɛ iiŋǀɛɓa z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a inɡ̤ɔma um̤ɔɓɛ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ iz̤imasɛkilɛ intliz̤ijɔ jam tʰikǁɔ nd̤ija kuv̤uma nd̤iɓɛtʰɛ uhad̤i kwanɔz̤ukɔ v̤ukani mxub̤ɛ nɔhad̤i nd̤ija kusipʰanɡ̤ɛla isifinɡ̤ɔ nd̤ija kuɓulɛla kuwɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ jɛhɔv̤a nd̤ikuɓɛtʰɛlɛ uhad̤i pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤ulu iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɔ jad̤a jɛsa ɛsib̤akab̤akɛni iɲanisɔ jakʰɔ z̤ipʰakamisɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤ulu tʰikǁɔ ɓuɓɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓakʰɔ ukuz̤ɛ z̤iɬanɡ̤ulwɛ iintand̤a z̤akʰɔ sind̤isa nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɔ sɔkunɛnɛ und̤ipʰɛnd̤ulɛ utʰikǁɔ utʰɛtʰɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ mand̤iv̤ujɛlɛlɛ nd̤imaɓɛ uʃɛkɛm nd̤ijilinɡ̤anisɛlɛ jasɛsukɔti nɡ̤ɔwam uɡ̤ilijad̤i nɡ̤ɔwam umanasɛ uɛfrajim sisiɡ̤ǀ̤inantlɔkɔ ujud̤a jintɔnɡ̤a jam jɔmmisɛlɔ umɔwab̤i sisitʲa sɔkuɬamɓɛla nd̤ijipʰɔsa kuɛd̤ɔm imɓad̤ad̤a jam nd̤id̤uma nɡ̤ɛlamafilisti nɡ̤uɓani ɔwɔnd̤isa ɛmz̤ini ɔŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔwɔnd̤ikʰapʰɛla kwaɛd̤ɔm asinɡ̤uwɛ tʰikǁɔ lɔ usiɬamɓilɛjɔ akwapʰuma tʰikǁɔ nɛmikʰɔsi jɛtʰu siŋǀɛd̤ɛ kumɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli wɛtʰu aluntɔ jantɔ usind̤isɔ lɔmntu nɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ sija kwɛjisa aɓaɡ̤ǃ̤uʃɛ jɛna aɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓɛtʰu kumɔnɡ̤amɛli ɛkad̤av̤id̤ɛ um̤ɔɓɛ tʰikǁɔ wɛnd̤umisɔ jam ukutʰi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓand̤akʰamisɛlɛ umlɔmɔ ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ nɔmlɔmɔ ɔnɛnkɔɬisɔ ɓatʰɛtʰa nɡ̤am nɡ̤ɔlwimi lɔɓukǁɔki ɓand̤id͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛɛntɛtʰɔ z̤ɛntijɔ ɓalwa nɡ̤ɛliz̤ɛ ɛkuɓɛni nd̤iɓatʰand̤a ɓɔna ɓajand̤ikǀʰasa nd̤iɓɛ nd̤itʰand̤az̤a ɛnd̤awɛni jɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓand̤iɓujɛkɛz̤a nɡ̤ɔɓuɓi ɛkuɓɛni nd̤iɓatʰand̤a ɓɔna ɓajand̤itʰija misa ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ aɓɛ nɡ̤umv̤ɛlɛli wakʰɛ ɛmɛ usatʰana nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ kwakʰɛ ɛkutʰɛtʰwɛni kwɛtʲala makapʰumɛ ɛnɡ̤ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ nɔmtʰand̤az̤ɔ wakʰɛ uɓɛ sisɔnɔ imiɬa jakʰɛ majiɓɛ mɓalwa maɓutʰatʲatʰwɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲɛ uɓuv̤ɛlɛli ɓakʰɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ maɓaɓɛ z̤iinkɛd̤ama nɔmkakʰɛ aɓɛ nɡ̤um̤lɔlɔkaz̤i ɓab̤ad̤ulɛ ɓɛb̤ad̤ula ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓɛkǀɛla ɓɛŋ̤ǃ̤iɓa ɓɛkud̤ɛ namaŋǁuwa akɔwaɓɔ umɓɔlɛkimali makakuʃwankatʰɛlɛ kɔnkɛ anakɔ aɓasɛmz̤ini ɓapʰanɡ̤ɛ ukukǁɛlɛnɡ̤a kwakʰɛ makunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ wɔlulɛla ŋǀɛɓa kujɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ uz̤iɓaɓalajɔ iinkɛd̤ama z̤akʰɛ iz̤iv̤ɛlamv̤a z̤akʰɛ maz̤iɓɛ z̤ɛz̤ɔkuŋǃuɲulwa iɡ̤ama laz̤ɔ likǀiɲwɛ ɛsiz̤ukulwanɛni ɛsiz̤ajɔ maɓukʰund͡ʒ̤ulwɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɔɔjisɛ sinɡ̤akǀiɲwa isɔnɔ sɔnina masiɓɛ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ akuŋǃumlɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini ukukʰund͡ʒ̤ulwa kwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɛnɡ̤akukʰumɓulanɡ̤a ukwɛnz̤a iŋǀɛɓa ɛt͡ʃut͡ʃisɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛlusiz̤ana ɛliɬwɛmpu ɛnɛntliz̤ijɔ ɛjɔtʰukilɛjɔ ukuɓa ajiɓulalɛ ɛwɛ watʰand̤a ukukǃalɛkisa kwamfikɛla akakufuna ukusikɛlɛla kwakʰwɛlɛla kud̤ɛ kujɛ wamɓatʰa ukukǃalɛkisa kwanɡ̤a jinɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ kwanɡ̤ɛna ɛmɓilinini wakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amanz̤i nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɔli ɛmatʰand͡ʒ̤ɛni akʰɛ makuɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ kujɛ az̤itʰɛ wamɓu nɡ̤ajɔ kuɓɛ lukǃʰwɛmɛʃa aluŋǁiɓɛ amakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ nɡ̤uwɔ lɔwɔ umv̤uz̤ɔ waɓand̤ikǀʰasajɔ ɔpʰuma kujɛhɔv̤a waɓatʰɛtʰa ɔkuɓi nɡ̤ɔmpʰɛfumlɔ kɛ wɛna jɛhɔv̤a nkɔsi nd̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤ama lakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa ilunɡ̤ilɛ iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɔ nd̤iɬanɡ̤ulɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ilusiz̤ana nd̤iliɬwɛmpu intliz̤ijɔ jam iɬatʲiwɛ pʰakatʰi nd̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛtʰunz̤i kǁa lɔlukajɔ nd̤ijɛmka nd̤ipʰɛt͡ʃɛtʰwa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnkumɓi amad̤ɔlɔ ajaɡ̤ɛkǁa kukuz̤ila ukuɮa nɛɲama jam ib̤itʲilɛ ukutʲɛɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤asisiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ kuɓɔ ɓɛnd̤iɓɔna ɓaɬunɡ̤uz̤ɛla intlɔkɔ nd̤iŋǀɛd̤ɛ jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ nd̤isind̤isɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛŋǀɛɓa jakʰɔ ɓaz̤i ukuɓa sisanɮa sakʰɔ ɛsɔ ukuɓa kukwɛnz̤a kwakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a ɓajakǃalɛkisa aɓa ujasikɛlɛla wɛna ɓɛsukilɛ ɓɛma ɓaja kud̤ana uja kuɓuja jɛna umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ aɓand̤ikǀʰasajɔ ɓaja kwamɓatʰa iɬaz̤ɔ ɓaz̤itʰi wamɓu ukud̤ana nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jɔkwalɛka nd̤ija kuɓulɛla kakʰulu kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ nd̤imd̤umisɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓaninz̤i kuɓa ɛmi ɛkunɛnɛ kɔliɬwɛmpu ukuɓa amsind̤isɛ kwaɓawuɡ̤wɛɓajɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ɛkad̤av̤id̤ɛ um̤ɔɓɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnkɔsini jam ukutʰi ɬala nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ nd̤id̤ɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ nd̤iz̤ɛnz̤ɛ isitulɔ sɛɛɲawɔ z̤akʰɔ intɔnɡ̤a jamanɮa akʰɔ uja kujitʰumɛla ujɛhɔv̤a iv̤ɛla ɛz̤ijɔn ɛsitʰi jiɓa nɔɓukʰɔsi pʰakatʰi kwɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ aɓantu ɓakʰɔ ɓaja kuz̤inikɛla nɡ̤ɛɛntliz̤ijɔ nɡ̤ɛmini jakʰɔ jɔkupʰuma umkʰɔsi ɓɛɓɛtʰɛ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛkupʰumɛni kwɛsifinɡ̤ɔ uz̤a kuwɛ umɓɛtʰɛ wɔmlisɛla wakʰɔ ufunɡ̤ilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a akaji kuz̤ɔɬwaja utʰɛ unɡ̤umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ wɛna nɡ̤ɔkɔɬɔɓɔ lukamɛlkit͡sɛd̤ɛkɛ inkɔsi nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ kwakʰɔ ija kupʰalusa ɔɔkumkani nɡ̤ɛmini jɔmsind̤ɔ wajɔ ija kuɡ̤wɛɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a kuz̤alɛ z̤iz̤id̤umɓu ipʰalusɛ intlɔkɔ ɛz̤wɛni ɛliɓanz̤i ɛnɮɛlɛni ija kusɛla ɛmland͡ʒ̤anɛni nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ija kupʰakamisa intlɔkɔ halɛluja nd̤ija kuɓulɛla kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jɔnkɛ ɛlukǀwɛjwɛni lwaɓatʰɛ tʲɛ nasɛɓanɮɛni z̤ikʰulu iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a z̤ɛz̤ɔkuŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkwa iint͡sinɡ̤isɛlɔ z̤az̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ unɛnd̤ili nɔɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amɛla umsɛɓɛnz̤i wakʰɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɛ ɓumi nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ ujɛnz̤ɛlɛ ukuz̤ɛ ikʰund͡ʒ̤ulwɛ imisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɛ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ unɔɓaɓalɔ nɛmfɛsanɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uɓapʰɛ ukuɮa aɓamɔjikajɔ uwukʰumɓulɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wakʰɛ uɓaɓɔnisɛ aɓantu ɓakʰɛ amanɮa ɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛɓanika lɛɛntlanɡ̤a iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ z̤ijiɲanisɔ nɛsikɔ z̤itʰɛmɓɛkilɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ijalɛz̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤iz̤imasɛkilɛ nanɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ z̤ɛnz̤iwɛ nɡ̤ɛɲanisɔ z̤itʰɛ tʲɛ uɓatʰumɛlɛ aɓantu ɓakʰɛ inkululɛkɔ uwumisɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wakʰɛ liŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ lijɔjikɛka iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤alɔ jɔɓulumkɔ kukɔjika ujɛhɔv̤a ɓanɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ ɛlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ ind̤umisɔ jakʰɛ iɬala halɛluja haji ujɔlɔ lɔmntu ɔmɔjikajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔjinɔnɛlɛlɛjɔ kunɛnɛ imitʰɛtʰɔ jakʰɛ ija kuɓa nɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɛɬaɓatʰini imɓɛwu jakʰɛ isiz̤ukulwana saɓatʰɛ tʲɛ sisikɛlɛlwɛ ɓuɓuŋǀwanɛ nɔɓutʲɛɓi ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɛ ɓuɬala ɓumi ɓapʰuɲɛlwa kukukʰaɲa ɛɓumɲamɛni aɓatʰɛ tʲɛ ɓɛnɔɓaɓalɔ nɛmfɛsanɛ nɔɓulunɡ̤isa unɔjɔlɔ ɔɓaɓalajɔ aɓɔlɛkɛ uja kujimisa intɛtʰɔ jakʰɛ ɛmatʲalɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akaji kuʃukuɲiswa napʰakad̤ɛ uja kuɓa lilunɡ̤isa ɛlikʰund͡ʒ̤ulwa nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ akɔjikiswa z̤iind̤aɓa ɛz̤imɓi ikǃinisɛkilɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ ikʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a iz̤imasɛkilɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ akɔjiki uja kud̤a aɓaɓɔnɛlɛ aɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓakʰɛ ujaɬakaz̤a upʰa amaɬwɛmpu uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɛ ɓuɬala ɓumi upʰɔnd̤ɔ lwakʰɛ lupʰakamilɛ lunɔz̤ukɔ ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ jɛna uja kukuɓɔna akǃumɓɛ at͡ʃikǁiz̤ɛ amaz̤iɲɔ aɲiɓilikɛ umŋǃwɛnɔ wɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ujad̤aka halɛluja d̤umisani ɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakajɛhɔv̤a d̤umisani iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a maliɓɔnɡ̤wɛ iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a kususɛla
