z̤inɡ̤amasikiz̤i kujɛhɔv̤a iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a ɛz̤imɓi kɛ aɬamɓulukilɛ amaz̤wi amnand̤i ujiɬisɛla iʃwanɡ̤uʃa inɮu jakʰɛ ɔɓawɛla inz̤uz̤ɔ ɛmɓi kɛ jɛna ɔtʰija isikǀɛnɡ̤ɔ uja kupʰila intliz̤ijɔ jɛlunɡ̤isa ija kukǀamanɡ̤a ukupʰɛnd̤ula kɛ wɔna umlɔmɔ waɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ umpɔmpɔz̤a uɓuɓi ujɛhɔv̤a ukud̤ɛ naɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kɛ wɔna umtʰand̤az̤ɔ wamalunɡ̤isa ujawuv̤a ukukʰaɲa kwamɛɬɔ kuv̤ujisa intliz̤ijɔ iind̤aɓa ɛz̤imnand̤i z̤itʲɛɓisa amatʰamɓɔ inɮɛɓɛ ɛsiv̤ajɔ isɔɬwajɔ sɔɓɔmi iɬala pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤ilumkɔ ɔpʰulukɛnɛ nɔkǃɛkǃɛʃɔ ukǀɛkisa umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ɔsiv̤ajɔ isɔɬwajɔ uxwɛɓa ukukǃɔnd̤a ukɔjika ujɛhɔv̤a lukǃɛkǃɛʃɔ lɔɓulumkɔ nɡ̤apʰamɓi kɔz̤ukɔ lululamɔ z̤ɛz̤ɔmntu iz̤ikǀwaŋ̤ǀ̤isɔ z̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ kɛ jɔna impɛnd̤ulɔ jɔlwimi iv̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a z̤ɔnkɛ iinɮɛla z̤ɛnd̤ɔd̤a z̤ikǃakǃamɓilɛ kwawajɔ amɛɬɔ kɛ jɛna umlinɡ̤anisi wɔmɔja nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a kǃɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤akʰɔ z̤iz̤imasɛkɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uz̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ int͡sinɡ̤isɛlɔ jakʰɛ kwanɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ umɛnz̤ɛlɛ jɔɓuɓi ɓalisikiz̤i kujɛhɔv̤a ɓɔnkɛ aɓantliz̤ijɔ iz̤iɮajɔ kakad̤ɛ kɛ aɓaɓi nɡ̤ɛŋǀɛɓa nɛɲanisɔ ɓujakǀaɲaɡ̤uʃɛlwa uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa nɡ̤ɔkɔjika ujɛhɔv̤a ujatʲɛka ɛɓuɓini ɛkukʰɔliswɛni kukajɛhɔv̤a z̤iinɮɛla z̤ɛnd̤ɔd̤a ujikǁɔlɛlanisa nɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤ajɔ najɔ ilunɡ̤ilɛ ɛŋǀinanɛ ɛnɔɓulunɡ̤isa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔlunɡ̤isɛlɔ ɔluninz̤i ɔlukuɲɛ nɔkunɡ̤ɛsɛsikwɛni intliz̤ijɔ jɔmntu ikǀinɡ̤a inɮɛla jakʰɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɔjalɛla ukuɲatʰɛla kwakʰɛ iz̤iɬaɓɔ z̤isɛmilɛɓɛni jɔmlɔmɔ wɔkumkani mawunɡ̤amɛnɛz̤i ɛsikwɛni umlɔmɔ wakʰɛ isilinɡ̤anisɔ nɛsikali ɛsisɛsikwɛni sɛsika jɛhɔv̤a asisɛnz̤ɔ sakʰɛ ɔnkɛ amatʲɛ asɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwɛni lisikiz̤i kuɓɔ ɔɔkumkani ukwɛnz̤a ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kuɓa itrɔnɛ iz̤inz̤iswa ɓuɓulunɡ̤isa ukumkani ujakʰɔliswa nɡ̤umlɔmɔ wɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɔtʰɛtʰa ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ujatʰand̤wa uɓuʃuʃu ɓɔkumkani ɓuz̤iz̤itʰuɲwa z̤ɔkufa kɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛlumkilɛjɔ ijamkǀamaɡ̤uʃa ɛkukʰaɲɛni kɔɓusɔ ɓɔkumkani ɓuɓɔmi ɔkutʰand̤wa nɡ̤ujɛ kund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlifu lɛmv̤ula jasɛkwinɮa ukuxwɛɓa uɓulumkɔ kunɡ̤akanani ukulunɡ̤a kwakɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛmɓiwɛjɔ nɔkuxwɛɓa iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ kunɡ̤akanani ukuɲulɛka kwakɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ umɛnd̤ɔ waɓatʰɛ tʲɛ kukutʲɛka ɛɓuɓini ulɔnd̤ɔlɔz̤a umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ɔɡ̤ǀ̤ina inɮɛla jakʰɛ ik͡xat͡ʃi likʰɔkɛla int͡ʃaɓalalɔ ukuz̤iɮa kukʰɔkɛla ukukʰuɓɛka kulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuɓa nɔmɔja ɔtʰɔɓɛkilɛjɔ pʰakatʰi kwaɓalulamilɛjɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔkwaɓa amakǁʰɔɓa naɓanɛk͡xat͡ʃi ɔlikǃikǃajɔ iliz̤wi uja ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɔkʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a haji ujɔlɔ lwakʰɛ ɔntliz̤ijɔ ilumkilɛjɔ kutʰiwa unɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ nɔɓumnand̤i ɓɔmlɔmɔ ɓɔnɡ̤ɛz̤a imfund̤isɔ litʰɛnd̤ɛ lɔɓɔmi iŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ kumninijɔ kɛ lɔna ukǃɛkǃɛʃɔ lwɛz̤imatʰanɛ kukumatʰa kwaz̤ɔ intliz̤ijɔ jɛsilumkɔ ijawukǃikǃisa umlɔmɔ wasɔ jɔnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛ imfund̤isɔ ɛmilɛɓɛni jɔmlɔmɔ wasɔ liŋǃatʰa lɔɓusi amaz̤wi amnand̤i ajiŋǀasa ɛmpʰɛfumlwɛni ajimpilisɔ ɛmatʰand͡ʒ̤ɛni kukʰɔ inɮɛla ɛtʰɛ tʲɛ pʰamɓi kɔmntu ukanti ukupʰɛla kwajɔ z̤iinɮɛla z̤ɔkufa ukulamɓa kɔmkǁɛlɛnɡ̤i kujamkǁɛlɛnɡ̤ɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umlɔmɔ wakʰɛ ujamkǃʰuɓa umntu ɔlit͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔ umɓa uɓuɓi ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɛ nɡ̤atʰi nɡ̤umlilɔ ɔt͡ʃisajɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛpʰɛnd̤ukajɔ inɡ̤ɛnisa iŋ̤ǁ̤aɓanɔ nɛntlɛɓi jaɬula amakʰɔlwanɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛɡ̤ɔɲamɛlajɔ ihɛnd̤a ummɛlwanɛ wajɔ im̤amɓisɛ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɛnɡ̤alunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɔkǀima amɛɬɔ akʰɛ kukuɓa akǀinɡ̤ɛ impɛnd̤uka ɔluma umlɔmɔ wakʰɛ uɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ uɓuɓi isit͡sʰaɓa sɔkuhɔmɓa z̤iz̤imv̤i sifuɲanwa ɛnɮɛlɛni jɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɔz̤ɛka kad̤ɛ umsind̤ɔ ulunɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛɡ̤ɔxa ɔkulawulajɔ ukufutʰa kwakʰɛ ulunɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔtʰimɓa umz̤i umntu upʰɔsa ikǃaʃisɔ ɛsɔnd̤wɛni lɛnɡ̤uɓɔ kɛ ukuɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwa kwalɔ kɔnkɛ kunɔjɛhɔv̤a ikǃʰɛkɛz̤a ɛlɔmilɛjɔ lɛsɔnka kuɲɛ nɔkukǀʰulumakǀʰa lilunɡ̤ilɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛnɮu ɛz̤ɛlɛ jimiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛnɛmɓamɓanɔ umkʰɔnz̤i ɔnɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ uja uɲana ɔwɛnz̤a ɔkuz̤iintlɔni aɬulɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓaz̤alwana ukʰamɓa lɔlɔkuɲiɓilikisa isiliv̤ɛrɛ iz̤ikɔ lɛlɔkuɲiɓilikisa iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ umkǀikid̤i wɛɛntliz̤ijɔ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɔnɔɓuɓi uwuɓaz̤ɛla inɮɛɓɛ umlɔmɔ ɔnɛnkɔɬisɔ upʰulapʰula uɓukǁɔki ɔɓusɛlulwimini ɔlwɛjɛlisɛlajɔ ɔɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛla iɬwɛmpu uŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a umɛnz̤i walɔ ɔv̤ujɛla iŋ̰ǁ̰walɛkɔ akaɓi isit͡sʰaɓa samad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓɔɔɲana isihɔmɓɔ sɔɔɲana nɡ̤ɔɔjisɛ ajisifanɛlɛ isid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ intɛtʰɔ ɛkʰukʰumɛlɛjɔ jɔɓɛka pʰi kɛ ukunɡ̤alifanɛli inɛnɛ intɛtʰɔ ɛɓuɓukǁɔki sililitʲɛ ɛliŋǃaɓilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɔmninilɔ isikǀɛnɡ̤ɔ apʰɔ asukuɓa ɛb̤ɛka kʰɔna wɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ uɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla isik͡xɛkǃɔ ɔfuna utʰand̤ɔ ɔpʰind̤a ajitʰɛtʰɛ intɔ waɬula amakʰɔlwanɛ ukukʰaliɲɛlwa kujanɡ̤ɛna kɔnɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛmiv̤umɓɔ ɛlikʰulu kɔsisiɲaɓi ɔnɛɛnkani uɓuɓi ɓɔd̤wa nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ utʰuɲɛlwa umtʰuɲwa ɔsisid͡ʒ̤ɔxa kaɲɛ kǃuɓisana nɛb̤ɛrɛ ɛɬutʰwɛ amatʰɔlɛ ajɔ unɡ̤akǃuɓisani nɛsiɲaɓi ɛkumatʰɛni kwasɔ ɔɓujɛkɛz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ aɓuji uɓuɓi ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ kukuv̤ulɛla amanz̤i ukukǃala kwɛŋ̤ǁ̤aɓanɔ jijɛkɛ imɓamɓanɔ kunɡ̤ɛkav̤unɡ̤aɲɛwana ɔmɡ̤wɛɓɛlajɔ ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kwanɔliɡ̤wɛɓajɔ ilunɡ̤isa ɓanɡ̤amasikiz̤i kujɛhɔv̤a ɓɔɓaɓini lɛlɔkwɛnz̤ani ɛlisɛsanɮɛni sɛsiɲaɓi lɔkuxwɛɓa uɓulumkɔ sinɡ̤ɛnantliz̤ijɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ um̤lɔɓɔ utʰand̤a nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ umz̤alwana uz̤alɛlwɛ imɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ umntu ɔswɛlɛ intliz̤ijɔ nɡ̤ɔɓamɓana nɔmɲɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa nɡ̤ɔmɛla umɛlɔ pʰamɓi kɔwaɓɔ utʰand̤a uk͡xɛkǃɔ ɔtʰand̤a ɔwupʰakamisajɔ umɲanɡ̤ɔ wakʰɛ ukukǃʰɛkɛka ɔntliz̤ijɔ id͡ʒ̤iɓiliz̤ajɔ akaji ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɔpʰɛnd̤uka nɡ̤ɔlwimi lwakʰɛ wɛjɛla ɛɓuɓini ɔz̤ala isiɲaɓi uz̤iz̤alɛla isiŋ̤ǃ̤ala akanaluv̤ujɔ ujisɛ wɛsid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ intliz̤ijɔ ɛv̤ujilɛjɔ ijalunɡ̤isa ikǀʰakǀʰisɛ umɔja ɔd̤akumɓilɛjɔ ujawɔmisa amatʰamɓɔ ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ wamkɛla isikǀɛnɡ̤ɔ ɛsiv̤ɛla ɛsɔnd̤wɛni lɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ukuz̤ɛ aɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰɛ inɮɛla ɛsɛsikwɛni uɓusɔ ɓɔnɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ ɓub̤ɛkɛ ɛɓulumkwɛni kɛ amɛɬɔ ɛsiɲaɓi asɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛɬaɓatʰi uɓuɓuɬunɡ̤u ɓukajisɛ uɲana ɔsisiɲaɓi uɓuɓuk͡xak͡xa kumz̤alikaz̤i wakʰɛ akulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuɬawulisa nɛlunɡ̤isa nɔkuɓɛtʰa amanɛnɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɔwaŋǃand̤ajɔ amaz̤wi akʰɛ unɔkwaz̤i ɔmɔja upʰɔlilɛjɔ jind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ kwanɛsimatʰanɛ ukuɓa siɬɛli satʰi kutʰiwa sisilumkɔ sinɡ̤awuv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤a umlɔmɔ wasɔ kutʰiwa sinɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ ɔz̤aɬulajɔ umŋǃwɛnɔ wakʰɛ intɔ jɔnkɛ ɛz̤imasajɔ ujajiv̤unɡ̤amɛla isiɲaɓi asikunanz̤ilɛ ukukǃɔnd̤a kɛ sinanz̤ɛ ukuz̤itʰʲila kwɛntliz̤ijɔ jasɔ ɛkuz̤ɛni kɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kuz̤a ukud̤ɛla ukuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a nɔkukǀukukǀɛz̤a nɡ̤amanz̤i anz̤ulu amaz̤wi ɔmlɔmɔ wɛnd̤ɔd̤a nɡ̤umland͡ʒ̤ana ɔɓalɛkajɔ litʰɛnd̤ɛ lɔɓulumkɔ ukukʰɛtʰa uɓusɔ ɓɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ akulunɡ̤ilɛ nɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa ilunɡ̤isa ɛkutʰɛtʰɛni itʲala imilɛɓɛ jɔmlɔmɔ wɛsiɲaɓi inɡ̤ɛna ɛkuɓamɓanɛni nɔmlɔmɔ wasɔ uɓiz̤a amaŋǃind̤i umlɔmɔ wɛsiɲaɓi ujasit͡ʃaɓalalisa nɛmilɛɓɛ jɔmlɔmɔ wasɔ sisixintʲɛlɔ sɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wasɔ amaz̤wi ɛntlɛɓi jimitʰamɔ ɛmnand̤i jɔna iɬa ijɛ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɔnt͡sini z̤ɔmɓilini nɔhiliz̤ajɔ ɛʃiʃinini lakʰɛ nɡ̤umninawa kasɔkɔnakalisa jiŋǃaɓa ɛnd̤ɛ ɛlikǃɛlɛ iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a ilunɡ̤isa liɡ̤id̤imɛla kulɔ liɓɛ sɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɛni uɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓɛsitʲɛɓi sisikǁɛkɔ sasɔ ɛsilikǃɛlɛ ɓund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a ɔlupʰakamilɛjɔ ɛmab̤ɔnɡ̤wɛni asɔ pʰamɓi kwɛnt͡ʃaɓalalɔ ijaz̤iɮa intliz̤ijɔ jɛnd̤ɔd̤a pʰamɓi kɔz̤ukɔ lululamɔ ɔpʰɛnd̤ula iliz̤wi ɛnɡ̤ɛkɛv̤a kukumatʰa ɔkɔ kujɛ nɛɬaz̤ɔ umɔja wɛnd̤ɔd̤a ujasiɲamɛz̤ɛla isifɔ sajɔ kɛ umɔja ɔd̤akumɓilɛjɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤awutʰwalajɔ intliz̤ijɔ jɔnɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ ixwɛɓa ukwaz̤i nɛnɮɛɓɛ jɛz̤ilumkɔ ukwaz̤i isipʰɔ sɔmntu sijamɡ̤aɓulɛla simsɛ pʰamɓi kwaɓakʰulu unɡ̤a ulilunɡ̤isa ɔkǃalɛlajɔ ɛtʲalɛni lakʰɛ uz̤a ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ amɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀɛ lipʰɛlisa iŋ̤ǁ̤aɓanɔ ikǃaʃisɔ liɓaɬulɛ aɓanamanɮa umz̤alwana ɛkuk͡xɛkǃiwɛjɔ kujɛ ulukʰuni nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛsikǁɛkɔ ɛsilikǃɛlɛ nɛɛŋ̤ǁ̤aɓanɔ z̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmv̤alɔ wɔkǁand̤ɛ ɔlud̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛsikǃʰamɔ sɔmlɔmɔ wɛnd̤ɔd̤a ujaɬutʰa umɓilini wajɔ ijaɬutʰa nɡ̤ɔnɡ̤ɛnisɛlɔ lɔmlɔmɔ wajɔ ukufa nɔkupʰila kusɛmanɮɛni ɔlwimi aɓalutʰand̤ajɔ ɓaja kuɮa isikǃʰamɔ salɔ ɔtʰɛ umfaz̤i ufumɛnɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ uz̤uz̤ɛ ɔkulikʰɔlɔ kujɛhɔv̤a iɬwɛmpu litʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɛz̤iɓɔnɡ̤ɔz̤ɔ isitʲɛɓi sipʰɛnd̤ula nɡ̤ɔkulukʰuni ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɛz̤iɬɔɓɔ ijakǀʰitʰwa kukʰɔ sitʰand̤wa sinamatʰɛlajɔ kunɔmz̤alwana lilunɡ̤ilɛ iɬwɛmpu ɛlihamɓa nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɔ jalɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔmlɔmɔ ɔd͡ʒ̤iɓiliz̤ajɔ ɛsisiɲaɓi jɛna kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ukutʰi umpʰɛfumlɔ unɡ̤aɓi nakwaz̤i akulunɡ̤ilɛ ɔɲawɔ z̤iŋ̤ǁ̤amilɛjɔ ujajipʰɔsa inɮɛla ukumatʰa kɔmntu kupʰɛnula inɮɛla jakʰɛ id͡ʒ̤alɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ ukutʲɛɓa kɔnɡ̤ɛz̤a iz̤iɬɔɓɔ ɛz̤ininz̤i kɛ ɔswɛlɛjɔ nɛsiɬɔɓɔ sakʰɛ sijaɬukana najɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤ina ɛlikǁɔkajɔ aliɓi ɔfutʰa amanɡ̤a akasind̤i ɓaninz̤i aɓakǀɛnɡ̤a amanɛnɛ jɔnkɛ intɔ isisiɬɔɓɔ kwind̤ɔd̤a ɛpʰajɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaz̤alwana ɓɛɬwɛmpu ɓalitʰijilɛ z̤iɓɛka pʰi iz̤iɬɔɓɔ ukuja kud̤ɛ kulɔ lisukɛla amaz̤wi anɡ̤ɛntɔ ɔxwɛɓa uɓulumkɔ utʰand̤a umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ɔɡ̤ǀ̤ina iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ uja ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ iŋ̤ǃ̤ina ɛlikǁɔkajɔ aliɓi ɔfutʰa amanɡ̤a ujat͡ʃaɓalala akusifanɛlɛ isiɲaɓi ukuɮa uɓuŋǀwanɛ kɔɓɛka pʰi kɛ ukunɡ̤amfanɛli umkʰɔnz̤i aɓatʰɛtʰɛli iŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ jɔmntu imɛnz̤a az̤ɛkɛ kad̤ɛ umsind̤ɔ sisihɔmɓɔ sakʰɛ ukuluɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa uk͡xɛkǃɔ kukuɡ̤ǃ̤uma kwɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ɛnt͡ʃa ukud͡ʒ̤ala kɔkumkani sind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɓɛtʰɛ ɛmfunwɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤umɛjɛlisɛlɔ kujisɛ uɲana ɔsisiɲaɓi lukǃʰɔkǃʰɔz̤ɔ ɔlukǁikilɛjɔ iŋ̤ǁ̤aɓanɔ jɔmfaz̤i inɮu nɔɓutʲɛɓi lɔɔjisɛ kɛ jɛna umfaz̤i ɔnɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ uv̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a uɓuv̤ila ɓuwisɛla ɛɓutʰɔnɡ̤wɛni ɔɓukʰulu umpʰɛfumlɔ ɔd̤anɡ̤ɛlɛjɔ ujalamɓa ɔɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ uɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ɔz̤id̤ɛlajɔ iinɮɛla z̤akʰɛ uja uɓɔlɛka ujɛhɔv̤a ɔɓaɓala isiswɛli umɓujɛkɛz̤a ukupʰatʰa kwakʰɛ ɔkuɬɛ mkǃɛkǃɛʃɛ uɲana wakʰɔ kǁa kusɛkʰɔ itʰɛmɓa kɔd̤wa unɡ̤aŋ̤ǁ̤amɛli kumɓulala ɔnɔmsind̤ɔ ɔmkʰulu umɛlwɛ kukuɬawula kuɓa kǁa utʰɛ wam̤lanɡ̤ula wɔɓa mand̤und̤u liv̤ɛ ikǀɛɓɔ ulwamkɛlɛ ukǃɛkǃɛʃɔ ukuz̤ɛ ulumkɛ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛliz̤ajɔ z̤ininz̤i iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jɔmntu nɔkɔ kɛ likǀɛɓɔ likajɛhɔv̤a ɛlija umŋǃwɛnɔ wɔmntu jiŋǀɛɓa jakʰɛ kɛ lilunɡ̤ilɛ iɬwɛmpu nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛnamanɡ̤a ukɔjika ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɓɔmini ɔnakɔ uja kuɬala ɛɬutʰi iv̤ila lisifakɛ isanɮa salɔ ɛsitʲɛni aliɓi sasiɓujisɛla ɛmlɔɲɛni walɔ umɓɛtʰilɛ umɡ̤ǁ̤ɛki siɓa nɔɓukǃili isijatʰa umɔɬwajilɛ ɔnɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ wɔkǃɔnd̤a az̤i ɔmb̤ukǃajɔ ujisɛ ɔmɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰajɔ nɡ̤uɲana ɔwɛnz̤a ɔkuz̤iintlɔni ɔŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ajɔ jɛka ɲana ukutʰi uv̤ɛ ukǃɛkǃɛʃɔ kanti uja ulaɬɛkanɛ nɛntɛtʰɔ jɔkwaz̤i iŋ̤ǃ̤ina ɛlilit͡ʃid͡ʒ̤ɔlɔ liɡ̤ǁ̤ɛka isikɔ umlɔmɔ wɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ uɡ̤iɲa uɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a iz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɔ z̤ilunɡ̤isɛlwɛ aɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɛki imiv̤umɓɔ ilunɡ̤isɛlwɛ um̤lana wɛsiɲaɓi inɡ̤umɡ̤ǁ̤ɛki iwajini sinɡ̤umkǁɔkɔz̤ɛli isisɛlɔ ɛsiŋǁilisajɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓajɔtʲwɛ jijɔ aɓalumkilɛ nɡ̤umɡ̤ǃ̤umɔ ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔwɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ɛnt͡ʃa umɔtʰusɔ wɔkumkani ɔmkǃumɓisajɔ wɔna umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ kuluz̤ukɔ ɛnd̤ɔd̤ɛni ukuɬalɛla kud̤ɛ nɛŋ̤ǁ̤aɓanɔ kɛ z̤ɔna iz̤imatʰanɛ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ijav̤unɡ̤ama ɛɓusika iv̤ila lijafuna nɡ̤ɛkǁa lɔkuv̤una kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ntɔ nɡ̤amanz̤i anz̤ulu ikǀɛɓɔ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jɛnd̤ɔd̤a kanti ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ ijalixɔla uninz̤i lwɛsintu lujajiɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɛŋǀɛɓa kulɔ kɛ jɔna ind̤ɔd̤a ɛɲanisilɛjɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤ajifumanajɔ ɔhamɓa nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɔ jakʰɛ ɛlilunɡ̤isa haji ujɔlɔ lɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ ukumkani ɛɬɛli ɛsiɬalwɛni sɔkuɡ̤wɛɓa ukǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰa uɓuɓi ɓɔnkɛ nɡ̤amɛɬɔ akʰɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤atʰi nd̤ijikǃakǃamɓisilɛ intliz̤ijɔ jam nd̤iɬamɓulukilɛ ɛsɔnwɛni amatʲɛ nɡ̤amatʲɛ iiɛfa nɡ̤ɛɛɛfa nɡ̤amasikiz̤i kujɛhɔv̤a ɛz̤ɔ ntɔ z̤ɔmɓini nɛnkwɛnkwɛ ijaz̤az̤isisa nɡ̤ɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤ajɔ nɔkuɓa kukǃakǃamɓilɛ nɔkuɓa kutʰɛ tʲɛ ukwɛnz̤a kwajɔ inɮɛɓɛ ɛv̤ajɔ nɛlisɔ ɛliɓɔnajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uz̤ɛnz̤ilɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ z̤ɔmɓini musa ukutʰand̤a uɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ ɬɛz̤ɛ uɬwɛmpuz̤ɛkɛ v̤ula amɛɬɔ akʰɔ uɬutʰɛ kukuɮa imɓi imɓi ut͡ʃɔ ɔtʰɛnɡ̤ajɔ ɛmkɛ and̤ulɛ akǃʰajisɛ kukʰɔ iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛɛkɔralɛ ɛz̤ininz̤i kɛ jɔna impaɬa ɛŋǃaɓilɛjɔ nɡ̤umlɔmɔ ɔnɔkwaz̤i tʰaɓatʰa inɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ ɔmɛlɛ ɔmɲɛ mɛnz̤ɛ isiɓamɓisɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓasɛmz̤ini sinɛŋǀasa ɛnd̤ɔd̤ɛni isɔnka sɔɓukǁɔki kɛ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ umlɔmɔ wajɔ uz̤ala luɬalu iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤iz̤iɲaswa jiŋ̤ǀ̤ɛɓiswanɔ jilwa imfaz̤wɛ unɛkǀɛɓɔ ɛlilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɔhamɓa ɛɬɛɓa uɬakaz̤a ukǀwɛjɔ unɡ̤ad̤iɓani nɛpʰɔlɔpʰɔlɔ ɔt͡ʃab̤isa ujisɛ nɔnina isiɓanɛ sakʰɛ sikǀima ɛɓumɲamɛni pʰakatʰi ilifa ɛliz̤uz̤wɛ ɓupʰutʰupʰutʰu ɛkukǃalɛni ukupʰɛla kwalɔ akunant͡sikɛlɛlɔ musa ukutʰi nd̤ija kuɓupʰind̤ɛz̤ɛla uɓuɓi tʰɛmɓɛla kujɛhɔv̤a wɔkusind̤isa nɡ̤amasikiz̤i kujɛhɔv̤a amatʲɛ nɡ̤amatʲɛ nɛsikali ɛsikʰɔɬisajɔ asilunɡ̤ilɛ kuv̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a ukuɲatʰɛla kwɛnd̤ɔd̤a umntu anɡ̤atʰini ukujikǃɔnd̤a inɮɛla jakʰɛ sisixintʲɛlɔ ɛmntwini atʰi iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ az̤ɛ akǃalɛ ɛmv̤a kwɛsib̤amɓatʰisɔ apʰikǀɔtʰɛ ukǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰa aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɔlumkilɛjɔ aɡ̤ukǃulɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ umlɛnz̤ɛ wɛŋǃwɛlɔ sisiɓanɛ sikajɛhɔv̤a umpʰɛfumlɔ wɔmntu sipʰɛnɡ̤ulula z̤ɔnkɛ iinɡ̤ɔnt͡si z̤ɔmɓilini iŋǀɛɓa nɛɲanisɔ ilɔnd̤ɔlɔz̤a ujikǁʰasa itrɔnɛ jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǀɛɓa isihɔmɓɔ samad̤ɔd̤ana nɡ̤amanɮa awɔ uɓuɬɛ ɓamad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu z̤iz̤imv̤i imiv̤umɓɔ ɛtʲaɓulajɔ iɡ̤ukǁa uɓuɓi iz̤iɓɛtʰɔ z̤iɡ̤ukǁa iinɡ̤ɔnt͡si z̤ɔmɓilini jimid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ jamanz̤i intliz̤ijɔ jɔkumkani ɛsanɮɛni sikajɛhɔv̤a ujib̤ɛkisa apʰɔ asukuɓa ɛtʰand̤ɛ kʰɔna z̤ɔnkɛ iinɮɛla z̤ɛnd̤ɔd̤a z̤itʰɛ tʲɛ kwawajɔ amɛɬɔ umlinɡ̤anisi wɛɛntliz̤ijɔ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ukwɛnz̤a uɓulunɡ̤isa nɔkusɛsikwɛni kuɲulɛkilɛ kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ukukǃwajinɡ̤a kwamɛɬɔ nɔkuɡ̤unɡ̤uɓala kwɛntliz̤ijɔ kwanɔkukʰuɓɛla kwaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kusisɔnɔ iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤aɓakʰutʰɛlɛjɔ z̤isinɡ̤isa ɛlunɡ̤ɛnisɛlwɛni lɔd̤wa kɔnkɛ ukuŋ̤ǁ̤ama kusinɡ̤isa ɛnt͡swɛlwɛni jɔd̤wa ukuz̤uz̤a uɓuŋǀwanɛ nɡ̤ɔlwimi ɔlukǁɔkajɔ nɡ̤umpʰunɡ̤a ɔpʰɛpʰɛtʰɛkajɔ waɓafuna ukub̤ukǃa kwaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kujaɓakǃwɛkǃwɛd̤isa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓav̤umi ukwɛnz̤a ɔkusɛsikwɛni iliɡ̤ɔsɔɡ̤ɔsɔ inɮɛla jɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛnɛtʲala kɛ jɛna ɔɬamɓulukilɛjɔ umsɛɓɛnz̤i wakʰɛ utʰɛ tʲɛ kulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuɬala ɛluŋ̤ǃ̤amɛkwɛni ɔlupʰɛz̤u kwɛnɮu kunɔkuɬala nɮwiniɲɛ nɔmfaz̤i ɔnɛŋ̤ǁ̤aɓanɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ uŋǃwɛnɛla uɓuɓi amɛɬɔ akʰɛ akamɓaɓali ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ ɛkuɬawuliswɛni kɔmɡ̤ǁ̤ɛki sijalumka isijatʰa ɛkukǃikǃiswɛni kwasɔ isilumkɔ samkɛla ukwaz̤i ilunɡ̤isa lijajikǃikǃa inɮu jɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ liɓapʰɛnulɛla ɛɓuɓini aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɔv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤a iinɮɛɓɛ z̤akʰɛ ɛkukʰalɛni kwɛsiswɛli najɛ uja kuɓiz̤a anɡ̤av̤iwa isipʰɔ ɛnt͡sitʰɛlwɛni siŋǃand̤a umsind̤ɔ isikǀɛnɡ̤ɔ ɛsɔnd̤wɛni lɛnɡ̤uɓɔ siŋǃand̤a umsind̤ɔ ɔnamanɮa kuluv̤ujɔ kwilunɡ̤isa ukwɛnz̤a ɔkusɛsikwɛni kukǃʰipʰula umɓilini kuɓasɛɓɛnz̤i ɓɔɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a umntu ɔnd̤wɛnd̤wajɔ ɛmkɛ ɛnɮɛlɛni jɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ uja kuɬala ɛsikʰunɡ̤wini saɓafilɛjɔ ɔtʰand̤a imiɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓɔ uɓa jind̤ɔd̤a ɛswɛlɛjɔ ɔtʰand̤a iwajini nɛɔli akaɓi sisitʲɛɓi ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ lukǀamaɡ̤uʃɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛlunɡ̤isa inɡ̤ininɡ̤ini lisɛsikʰunɮɛni saɓatʰɛ tʲɛ kulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuɬala ɛz̤wɛni ɛlijintlanɡ̤ɔ kunɔkuɬala nɔmfaz̤i ɔnɛŋ̤ǁ̤aɓanɔ nɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤umɓɔ uɓuŋǀwanɛ ɔɓuŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ nɛɔli z̤isɛkʰajɛni lɛsilumkɔ kɛ ɔsisiɲaɓi ujaz̤iɡ̤iɲa az̤iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ ɔpʰutʰuma uɓulunɡ̤isa nɛŋǀɛɓa wɔfumana uɓɔmi nɔɓulunɡ̤isa nɔz̤ukɔ isilumkɔ sijakǃaɓɛla ɛmz̤ini wamaɡ̤ɔxa sijiwisɛ iŋǃaɓa ɛkukʰɔlɔswɛ nɡ̤ajɔ ɔɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ umlɔmɔ wakʰɛ nɔlwimi lwakʰɛ uɡ̤ǀ̤ina umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǁ̤inɡ̤ɔnɡ̤wɛni umkʰukʰumali ɔliɡ̤aɡ̤ad̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤umɡ̤ǁ̤ɛki iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔwɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkukʰukʰumala ɔkupʰupʰumajɔ umŋǃwɛnɔ wɛv̤ila ujaliɓulala kuɓa iz̤anɮa z̤alɔ az̤iv̤umi kusɛɓɛnz̤a imini jɔnkɛ liŋǃwɛna liŋǃwɛnilɛ kɛ lɔna ilunɡ̤isa lijapʰa linɡ̤av̤imɓi umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ waɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ lisikiz̤i kɔɓɛka pʰi kɛ ɓakuwuz̤isa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamaɲala iŋ̤ǃ̤ina ɛlinamanɡ̤a lijat͡ʃaɓalala kɛ jɔna ind̤ɔd̤a ɛv̤ajɔ itʰɛtʰa kupʰɛlɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ijinɡ̤waɲalala uɓusɔ nɡ̤ɔtʰɛ tʲɛ ɔjikǃɔnd̤ajɔ inɮɛla jakʰɛ akukʰɔ ɓulumkɔ akukʰɔ ŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ akukʰɔ kǀɛɓɔ malunɡ̤ana nɔjɛhɔv̤a ihaʃɛ lilunɡ̤isɛlwa jɔkulwa kɛ usind̤isɔ lɔna lunɔjɛhɔv̤a iɡ̤ama ɛlilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ linɔkuɲulwa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔɓutʲɛɓi ɔɓuninz̤i isimilɔ ɛsilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ silunɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ z̤ijakǃuɓisana iz̤itʲɛɓi namaɬwɛmpu umɛnz̤i waɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɔnɔɓukǃili uɓɔna intɔ ɛmɓi az̤ifiɬɛ kɛ z̤ɔna iz̤ijatʰa z̤ija kuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa kujɔ z̤iɬawuliswɛ umv̤uz̤ɔ wɔlulamɔ kukɔjika utʰikǁɔ ɓuɓutʲɛɓi nɔz̤ukɔ nɔɓɔmi nɡ̤amɛv̤a nɛz̤iɓatʰa ɛnɮɛlɛni jɔd͡ʒ̤iɓiliz̤ajɔ ɔɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ makad̤ɛd̤ɛ kuz̤ɔ mfund̤isɛ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɛfanɛlɛ nakǁa atʰɛ wamkʰulu akasaji kujɔ isitʲɛɓi sija amaɬwɛmpu nɔɓɔlɛkajɔ nɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤i ɛnd̤ɔd̤ɛni ɛmɓɔlɛkajɔ ɔɬwajɛla uɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa wɔv̤una uɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a nɛntɔnɡ̤a jɔkupʰupʰuma kwakʰɛ umsind̤ɔ jɔpʰɛla ɔlisɔ linɔɓuɓɛlɛ nɡ̤ujɛ ɔsikɛlɛlɛkajɔ kuɓa kwisɔnka sakʰɛ upʰa isiswɛli ɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa umɡ̤ǁ̤ɛki ipʰumɛ iŋ̤ǁ̤aɓanɔ kutʰi ɓɛmɓɛ amapʰikɛ nɔkukǀukukǀɛz̤a ɔtʰand̤a ukuɬamɓuluka kwɛntliz̤ijɔ ɔmlɔmɔ unɔɓaɓalɔ um̤lɔɓɔ wakʰɛ nɡ̤ukumkani amɛɬɔ kajɛhɔv̤a alɔnd̤ɔlɔz̤a ukwaz̤i apʰɛnulɛ intɛtʰɔ jɛnɡ̤ininɡ̤ini iv̤ila litʰi kukʰɔ inɡ̤ɔɲama pʰanɮɛ nd̤ɔŋǀinitʰwa ɛz̤itratwɛni sisihɔɡ̤ɔ ɛsinz̤ulu umlɔmɔ waɓafaz̤i aɓanɡ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓɔ ɔb̤av̤uɲɛlwa nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɛjɛla kʰɔna ukumatʰa kuɓɔt͡ʃiwɛ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jɔmntwana intɔnɡ̤a jɔkukǃɛkǃɛʃa jɔkumkisa kujɛ ɔkǀud̤isa isiswɛli ukuɓa and̤isɛ ɔkwakʰɛ nɔnika isitʲɛɓi uɬɛlwa jint͡swɛlɔ kupʰɛla tʰɔɓa inɮɛɓɛ jakʰɔ uv̤ɛ amaz̤wi ɛz̤ilumkɔ ujib̤ɛkisɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ ɛkwaz̤ini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kumnand̤i kǁa utʰɛ wawaɡ̤ǀ̤ina ɛmɓilinini makɛmɛ ɔnkɛ ɛpʰɛlɛlɛ ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɔ ukuz̤ɛ ukʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a nd̤ikwaz̤isilɛ nam̤la wɛna lɔ and̤ikub̤alɛlanɡ̤a iintɛtʰɔ ɛz̤ijintlɔkɔ ɛz̤inɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɛɓisɔ nɔkwaz̤i ukuz̤ɛ nd̤ikwaz̤isɛ isilinɡ̤anisɛlɔ samaz̤wi ɛɲanisɔ ukuz̤ɛ uɓujɛ kwaɓakutʰumilɛjɔ uz̤ɛ namaz̤wi ajiɲanisɔ musa ukusiɬutʰa isiswɛli nɡ̤akuɓa sisiswɛli unɡ̤amtʲumz̤i ɔlusiz̤ana ɛsanɡ̤wɛni kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛja kuɓamɓana naɓaɓamɓɛnɛ naɓɔ awɔnakalisɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔnakalisa ɓɔna musa ukukǃʰɛlana nɔmntu ɔnɔmsind̤ɔ unɡ̤ahamɓi nɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛnɔɓuʃuʃu ɬɛz̤ɛ ufund̤ɛ iinɮɛla z̤ajɔ uxintʲɛlisɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ musa ukuɓa pʰakatʰi kwaɓaɓamɓana nɔmɲɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa pʰakatʰi kwaɓamɛla intɔ ɛɓɔlɛkiwɛjɔ ukuɓa utʰɛ akwaɓa nantɔ jakuɬawula jini ukuɓa atʰaɓatʰɛ ukʰukɔ lwakʰɔ pʰant͡si kwakʰɔ musa ukuwuʃɛŋǁisa umlimanɮɛla wakud̤ala aɓawɛnz̤ajɔ ɔɔjiɬɔ ujajiɓɔna ind̤ɔd̤a ɛjinkuŋ̰ǃ̰ɛlɛ ɛʃiʃinini lajɔ inɔkuma pʰamɓi kɔkumkani ajinakuma pʰamɓi kwaɓantu aɓanɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤ama kǁa utʰɛ waɬala pʰant͡si ukuɓa uɮɛ nɔmlawuli kǃɔnd̤a ukǃɔnd̤ɛ lɔwɔ upʰamɓi kwakʰɔ uɓɛkɛ isit͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ ɛmkǃalɛni wakʰɔ ukuɓa unɡ̤umntu ɔnɔmɓilini musa ukuz̤iŋǃwɛnɛla iz̤iɮɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤inɛŋǀasa kukuɮa kwɛnkɔɬisɔ musa ukuz̤id̤inisa nɡ̤ɔkufuna uɓutʲɛɓi jɛka ɔkwakʰɔ ukukǃɔnd̤a amɛɬɔ akʰɔ uja kuwasukɛlisa uɓutʲɛɓi ɓunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ kuɓa ɓɔna ɓuz̤ɛnz̤ɛla amapʰikɔ ɓupʰapʰaz̤ɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkǁʰalanɡ̤a ɛlisinɡ̤ɛ ɛz̤ulwini musa ukuɮa ukuɮa kɔlisɔ liɓi unɡ̤az̤iŋǃwɛnɛli iz̤iɮɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤inɛŋǀasa kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ and͡ʒ̤alɔ ɔkǀinɡ̤a jɛd̤wa und͡ʒ̤alɔ jɛna utʰi kuwɛ jiɮa usɛlɛ ukanti intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ ajinawɛ umtʰamɔ wakʰɔ ɔwuɮilɛjɔ uja kuwuɬanz̤a ulaɬɛkwɛ nɡ̤amaz̤wi akʰɔ amnand̤i musa ukutʰɛtʰa ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤ɛsiɲaɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sija kujid̤ɛla iŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ jɔkukʰuluma kwakʰɔ musa ukuwuʃɛŋǁisa umlimanɮɛla wakud̤ala unɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni ɛmasimini ɛɛnkɛd̤ama kuɓa umkʰululi waz̤ɔ wɔmɛlɛlɛ wɔɓamɓana nawɛ jɛna nɡ̤ɔɓamɓanɔ lwaz̤ɔ jinikɛlɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ ɛlukǃɛkǃɛʃwɛni nɛɛnɮɛɓɛ z̤akʰɔ ɛntɛtʰwɛni jɔkwaz̤i musa ukulujɛka ukǃɛkǃɛʃɔ ɛmntwanɛni ukuɓa utʰɛ wamɓɛtʰa nɡ̤ɛntɔnɡ̤a akaji wɔmɓɛtʰa nɡ̤ɛntɔnɡ̤a uɬanɡ̤ulɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ kwɛlaɓafilɛjɔ ɲana ukuɓa itʰɛ jalumka intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ jɔv̤uja intliz̤ijɔ jam kwaɛjam lɔ z̤iɮamkɛ iz̤int͡sɔ z̤am ɛkutʰɛtʰɛni kɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɔ ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ majinɡ̤aɓamɔnɛli aɓɔni kɛ majiz̤ɔnd̤ɛ ukɔjika ujɛhɔv̤a jɔnkɛ inɛnɛ kukʰɔ ikamv̤a nɛtʰɛmɓa lakʰɔ aliji kuŋǃuɲulwa jiv̤a wɛna ɲana ulumkɛ ujiɲatʰɛlisɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ itʰi ɡ̤ǀ̤a ɛnɮɛlɛni musa ukuɓa pʰakatʰi kwamasɛlawajini napʰakatʰi kwamaɮakuɮa kuɓa isɛlawajini nɛɮakuɮa lijaɬwɛmpuz̤ɛka kɔna ukɔz̤ɛla kwamɓɛsa amad͡ʒ̤akǀu mpʰulapʰulɛ ujiɬɔ lɔwɔ wakuz̤alajɔ unɡ̤amd̤ɛli uɲɔkɔ akuɓa mkʰulu tʰɛnɡ̤a iɲanisɔ unɡ̤atʰɛnɡ̤isi nɡ̤ajɔ nɔɓulumkɔ nɔkǃɛkǃɛʃɔ nɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ uɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓa kakʰulu ujisɛ wɛlunɡ̤isa ɔz̤ɛlɛ isilumkɔ ujav̤uja nɡ̤asɔ makav̤ujɛ ujiɬɔ nɔɲɔkɔ aɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓɛ umfaz̤i ɔwakuz̤alajɔ nd̤inikɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ ɲana amɛɬɔ akʰɔ akʰɔliswɛ z̤iinɮɛla z̤am kuɓa sisihɔɡ̤ɔ ɛsinz̤ulu ihɛɲukaz̤i likǃula ɛlimkǁinwa umfaz̤i wɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a ud̤ɛ alalɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsihanɡ̤ɛ awand̤isɛ amanɡ̤ininɡ̤ini ɛluntwini unɡ̤ɔkaɓani ujɛha unɡ̤ɔkaɓani ujɔɔ z̤inaɓani iiŋ̤ǁ̤aɓanɔ inaɓani inkalaz̤ɔ anaɓani amaŋǁɛɓa anɡ̤ɛnasiz̤atʰu anaɓani amɛɬɔ anɔz̤iz̤i anaɓɔ ɓaliɓala ɛwajinini aɓanɡ̤ɛna ɓajimiɲɛlɛ iwajini ɛpʰitʰikɛz̤iwɛjɔ musa ukujikʰanɡ̤ɛla iwajini kǁa iz̤ɛnz̤a iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔmɓɛla kǁa iɓɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛlajɔ ɛnd̤ɛɓɛni kǁa iɬa kamnand̤i ukupʰɛla kwajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɲɔka iluma nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛxamɓa amɛɬɔ akʰɔ aja kuɓɔna iz̤intɔ z̤asɛmz̤ini intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ itʰɛtʰɛ impɛnd̤uka uɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔlɛlɛ ɛsaz̤ulwini sɔlwanɮɛ nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔlɛlɛ ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛmasti utʰi ɓand̤iɓɛtʰa and̤ɛv̤a ntlunɡ̤u ɓand̤intlitʰa and̤aɓa nantɔ nd̤ijaz̤ijɔ nd̤ija kuv̤uka nd̤ija kupʰind̤a kɛ nd̤ija kuɓuja nd̤ijifunɛ musa ukuɓamɔnɛla aɓantu aɓanɔɓuɓi unɡ̤akuŋǃwɛnɛli ukuɓa uɬalɛ naɓɔ kuɓa intliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ ikǀamanɡ̤a ukub̤ukǃa nɔmlɔmɔ waɓɔ utʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔkwapʰula inɮu jɔna jakʰiwa nɡ̤ɔɓulumkɔ iz̤inz̤iswɛ nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkwaz̤i kuz̤aliswa amakǃɔnɡ̤a ɓuɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɓuŋǃaɓilɛjɔ nɔɓumnand̤i umfɔ ɔsisilumkɔ unamanɮa nɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛnɔkwaz̤i iɓɔnakalisa amanɮa amakʰulu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukʰɔkɛlwɛ ɓuɓulumkɔ wɔɓa nakɔ ukuz̤ilwa iimfaz̤wɛ z̤akʰɔ nɔsind̤isɔ lusɛɓuninz̤ini ɓamapʰakatʰi uɓulumkɔ ɓuŋǃaɓilɛ kwisimatʰanɛ asiwuv̤uli umlɔmɔ wasɔ ɛsanɡ̤wɛni ɔkǀinɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛnz̤a uɓuɓi lɔwɔ ɓatʰi ukumɓiz̤a nɡ̤umajɛlɛŋǃɛ ijɛlɛŋǃɛ lɛsimatʰanɛ sisɔnɔ ulisikiz̤i ɛɓantwini umɡ̤ǁ̤ɛki utʰɛ wapʰɛlɛlwa nɡ̤ɛmini jɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ ɔɓa ɛɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛ amanɮa akʰɔ ɬanɡ̤ula aɓasiwa ɛkufɛni naɓad͡ʒ̤iŋ̤ǁ̤ɛla ɓajɛ ɛkuɓulawɛni kʰawuɓaŋǃand̤ɛ nɔkuɓa utʰi jaɓɔna ɓɛsinɡ̤akwaz̤i ɔkɔ umlinɡ̤anisɛli wɛɛntliz̤ijɔ jɛna akakukǃɔnd̤i umɡ̤ǀ̤ini wɔmpʰɛfumlɔ akakwaz̤i akaji kumɓujisɛla nɡ̤ɔkɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i wakʰɛ jini jiɮa uɓusi ɲana kuɓa ɓulunɡ̤ilɛ nɛŋǀind̤i imnand̤i ɛkʰuɬanɡ̤uɓɛni lakʰɔ ɓaz̤i kɛ uɓulumkɔ ɛmpʰɛfumlwɛni wakʰɔ ukuɓa utʰɛ waɓufumana kɔɓakʰɔ ikamv̤a linɡ̤aŋǃuɲulwa itʰɛmɓa lakʰɔ wɛna unɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ukulilalɛla ikʰaja lɛlunɡ̤isa unɡ̤asib̤ukǃi isikʰunɮa salɔ kuɓa ilunɡ̤isa kasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ liv̤ukɛ kɛ aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɓakʰuɓɛka pʰant͡si kwɛŋ̰ǁ̰walɛkɔ musa ukuv̤uja ɛkuwɛni kɔt͡ʃaɓa lwakʰɔ inɡ̤aɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓi intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ ɛkukʰuɓɛkɛni kwalɔ ɬɛz̤ɛ akuɓɔnɛ ujɛhɔv̤a kuɓɛ kuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ awuɓujisɛ umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ kulɔ musa ukuv̤utʰa nɡ̤umsind̤ɔ nɡ̤aɓɛnz̤i ɓɔɓuɓi unɡ̤aɓamɔnɛli aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kuɓa umɛnz̤i wɔɓuɓi akaji kuɓa nakamv̤a isiɓanɛ saɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ sija kukǀiɲwa ɲana mɔjikɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nɔkumkani unɡ̤az̤iɓand̤akaɲi naɓanɔkumɓi kuɓa kɔfika nɡ̤ɛsikǃupʰɛ ukusind̤ɛka kwaɓɔ iliʃwa lɛmiɲaka jaɓɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔlaz̤ijɔ nala maz̤wi nɡ̤awɛz̤ilumkɔ ukukʰɛtʰa uɓusɔ ɛkuɡ̤wɛɓɛni akulunɡ̤ilɛ ɔtʰi kɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ulilunɡ̤isa wɛna z̤ija kumkǃalɛkisa iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ija kumb̤av̤umɛla iintlanɡ̤a kuja kuɓa mnand̤i kwaɓamɔɬwajajɔ kuɓɔ kɔz̤a int͡sikɛlɛlɔ ɛnɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ wanɡ̤a imilɛɓɛ jɔmlɔmɔ ɔpʰɛnd̤ula nɡ̤amaz̤wi atʰɛ ɡ̤ǀ̤a lilunɡ̤isɛ iʃiʃini lakʰɔ pʰanɮɛ uz̤isɛɓɛnz̤ɛlɛ ɛnt͡simini jakʰɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ wakʰɛ inɮu jakʰɔ musa ukuɓa liŋ̤ǃ̤ina nɡ̤ɔmmɛlwanɛ wakʰɔ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛsiz̤atʰu unɡ̤asuka utʰɔmalalisɛ nanɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɔ musa ukutʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ nd̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kujɛ nd̤ija kuɓujisɛla ind̤ɔd̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i wajɔ nd̤aɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa ɛnt͡simini jɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛliv̤ila nasɛsid̤ilijɛni sɔmntu ɔswɛlɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ nd̤afika similɛ imitʰuma sɔnkɛ sipʰɛla nɡ̤apʰɛz̤ulu sɛnilɛ nɡ̤amaxawu nɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a lwasɔ lwamatʲɛ lud̤ilikilɛ nd̤akʰanɡ̤ɛla nd̤asiɡ̤ǃ̤ala nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ nd̤aɓɔna nd̤amkɛla ukǃɛkǃɛʃɔ itʰi intwana jɔɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ jɔkɔz̤ɛla intwana jɔkukʰwaɓuʃa iz̤anɮa ukuɓa nd̤ilalɛ ɓɔz̤a uɓuɬwɛmpu ɓakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmpʰanɡ̤i nɔkuswɛla kwakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛnɛnɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ nalɛ jimiz̤ɛkɛlisɔ kasɔlɔmɔn awajiɬanɡ̤anisajɔ amad̤ɔd̤a kahɛz̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a luz̤ukɔ lukatʰikǁɔ ukujisitʰɛlisa intɔ luz̤ukɔ lɔkumkani ukujiɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀa iz̤ulu nɡ̤ɔkupʰakama um̤laɓa nɡ̤ɔɓunz̤ulu nɛntliz̤ijɔ jɔkumkani asintɔ inɔkuɡ̤ɔkǀwaɡ̤ɔkǀwa lɔnɡ̤ulɛ iɡ̤wɛɓu ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛni kuv̤ɛlɛ isitʲa sɔmɲiɓilikisi ʃɛŋǁisa aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓɔkumkani jɔz̤inz̤a itrɔnɛ jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa musa ukud̤ɔkɔz̤ɛlisa iliz̤wi pʰamɓi kɔkumkani unɡ̤az̤imisi ɛnd̤awɛni jaɓakʰulu kuɓa kulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuɓa kutʰiwɛ kuwɛ ɲukɛla apʰa kunɔkuɓa utʰɔtʲwɛ pʰamɓi kwɛnɛnɛ aliɓɔnilɛjɔ amɛɬɔ akʰɔ musa ukupʰuma uŋ̤ǁ̤amilɛ ukuja ɛkuɓamɓanɛni nɔmɲɛ ɬɛz̤ɛ kutʰiwɛ wɔtʰini ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ kǁa kalɔku akuɬaz̤ilɛjɔ ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɔ uɓamɓɛnɛ nɔmmɛlwanɛ wakʰɔ ɓamɓana najɛ kɛ ukǀwɛjɔ lɔmɲɛ ukuluɬakaz̤a ɬɛz̤ɛ akuɬaz̤ɛ ɔluv̤ajɔ lunɡ̤aɓi saɓuja lusukɛ ud̤aɓa lwakʰɔ ɔluɓi z̤iilamuni z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ kwiz̤itʲa z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛz̤imakʰaz̤ikʰaz̤i iliz̤wi ɛlitʰɛtʰwɛ latʲapʰa ulid͡ʒ̤ikaz̤i lɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛz̤id̤anɡ̤a z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛz̤ikǀikiz̤ɛkilɛjɔ umɔɬwaji ɔlumkilɛjɔ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni ɛz̤inɔkuv̤a sind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkupʰɔz̤isa kwɛkʰɛpʰu nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkuv̤una isiɡ̤id̤imi ɛsiɲanisilɛjɔ kwaɓasitʰumilɛjɔ sijawuɓujisa umpʰɛfumlɔ wɛnkɔsi jasɔ unɡ̤amafu anɔmɔja anɡ̤ɛnamv̤ula umntu ɔkǃʰajisa nɡ̤ɛsipʰɔ ɛsikʰɔɬisajɔ umlawuli ujaxwɛɓɛʃɛka nɡ̤ɔkuz̤ɛka kad̤ɛ umsind̤ɔ ulwimi ɔlutʰamɓilɛjɔ lwapʰula itʰamɓɔ ufumɛnɛ uɓusi jiɮa ɔɓukulinɡ̤ɛnɛjɔ ɬɛz̤ɛ ud̤ikwɛ uɓuɬanz̤ɛ malunɡ̤aji futʰi uɲawɔ lwakʰɔ ɛnɮwini jɔmmɛlwanɛ wakʰɔ ɬɛz̤ɛ ad̤ikwɛ nɡ̤uwɛ akutʰijɛ sisand̤ɔ lik͡xɛlɛ lutɔlɔ ɔlut͡sɔlilɛjɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ina uɓuŋ̤ǃ̤ina ɔɓuɓukǁɔki uɡ̤ɔmmɛlwanɛ wajɔ liz̤iɲɔ ɛlikǃʰuz̤ukilɛjɔ luɲawɔ ɔluk͡xunɛkilɛjɔ ukukʰɔlɔsa nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ininɡ̤ini nɡ̤ɛmini jɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ ɔlaɬa inɡ̤uɓɔ jɔkwalɛka nɡ̤ɛmini jɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlɛ ŋǃwa kwanɛv̤iniɡ̤a ɛɡ̤alɛlwɛ kwisɔd̤a kwanɔv̤uma iinɡ̤ɔma kɔntliz̤ijɔ imɓi ukuɓa ɔkutʰijilɛjɔ utʰɛ walamɓa mpʰɛ ukuɮa aɮɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ waŋǁanwa msɛz̤ɛ amanz̤i kuɓa ufumɓa wɛna amalaɬɛ av̤utʰajɔ ɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wɔkuv̤uz̤a umɔja ɔv̤ɛla nɡ̤asɛntla uv̤ɛlisa isipʰanɡ̤ɔ ulwimi ɔluɬɛɓajɔ luv̤ɛlisa uɓusɔ ɔɓud͡ʒ̤alilɛjɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuɬala ɛluŋ̤ǃ̤amɛkwɛni ɔlupʰɛz̤u kwɛnɮu kunɔkuɬala nɮwiniɲɛ nɔmfaz̤i ɔnɛŋ̤ǁ̤aɓanɔ nɡ̤amanz̤i aɓand̤ajɔ ɛmpʰɛfumlwɛni ɔtʰʲafilɛjɔ iind̤aɓa ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛz̤iv̤ɛla ɛz̤wɛni ɛlikud̤ɛ likǃula ɛliɡ̤ǁ̤ɔd͡ʒ̤iwɛjɔ nɡ̤umtʰɔmɓɔ ɔwɔnakɛlɛjɔ ilunɡ̤isa ɛlikʰwɛlɛlajɔ pʰamɓi kɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ukuɮa uɓusi ɔɓuninz̤i akulunɡ̤ilɛ kɛ ukuɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀa iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inz̤ima luz̤ukɔ nɡ̤umz̤i ɔtʰʲɔɓɔz̤iwɛjɔ ɔnɡ̤ɛnalud̤ɔnɡ̤a ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤ɛnakuz̤iɓamɓa umɔja wajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkʰɛpʰu ɛɬɔtʲɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmv̤ula nɡ̤ɛkǁa lɔkuv̤una lund͡ʒ̤alɔ ukunɡ̤asifanɛli isiɲaɓi uz̤ukɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔnɮunkulu ɛkupʰapʰapʰapʰaz̤ɛlɛni kwakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnkɔnd͡ʒ̤anɛ ɛkuɓalɛkɛni kwajɔ kund͡ʒ̤alɔ ukut͡ʃab̤isa nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛsiz̤atʰu akuji kupʰumɛlɛla ntwɛni iz̤inija jɛjɛhaʃɛ umkʰala nɡ̤ɔwɛɛsilɛ intɔnɡ̤a jɛjɔm̤lana wɛsiɲaɓi musa ukusipʰɛnd̤ula isiɲaɓi nɡ̤ɔkɔkumatʰa kwasɔ ɬɛz̤ɛ usifuz̤ɛ sipʰɛnd̤ulɛ isiɲaɓi nɡ̤ɔkɔkumatʰa kwasɔ ɬɛz̤ɛ siɓɛ sisilumkɔ kwawasɔ amɛɬɔ uŋǃumla iiɲawɔ usɛla uɡ̤ɔɲamɛlɔ ɔsitʰuma imikǀimɓi jakʰɛ isiɲaɓi ŋǃwa nɔkulɛnɡ̤alɛnɡ̤a kwɛmilɛnz̤ɛ jɛsikǃʰwala umz̤ɛkɛlisɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛsiɲaɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓɔpʰa ilitʲɛ ɛsisawulwɛni und͡ʒ̤alɔ ɔsinika uz̤ukɔ isiɲaɓi nɡ̤amɛv̤a anɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɛŋǁila umz̤ɛkɛlisɔ ɔnɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛsiɲaɓi ɔkuninz̤i kuz̤ala intɔ jɔnkɛ kɛ wɔna umv̤uz̤ɔ wɛsiɲaɓi kwanɔmv̤uz̤i wasɔ ɓajaɮula nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤a iɓujɛla ɛm̤lanz̤wɛni wajɔ sind͡ʒ̤alɔ isiɲaɓi ukupʰind̤a ukumatʰa kwasɔ ujajiɓɔna ind̤ɔd̤a ilumkilɛ kwawajɔ amɛɬɔ kukʰɔ itʰɛmɓa nɡ̤ɛsiɲaɓi kunajɔ iv̤ila litʰi kukʰɔ inɡ̤ɔɲama ɛnɮɛlɛni kukʰɔ inɡ̤ɔɲama ɛz̤itratwɛni ukǀanɡ̤ɔ lud͡ʒ̤inɡ̤a ɛz̤ihind͡ʒ̤iz̤ini z̤alɔ lind͡ʒ̤alɔ iv̤ila ɛlukʰukwɛni lwalɔ iv̤ila isanɮa salɔ ɛsitʲɛni jind̤inisɔ ukusiɓujisɛla kwasɛmlɔɲɛni walɔ iv̤ila lilumkilɛ kwawalɔ amɛɬɔ kunaɓasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ aɓapʰɛnd̤ula nɡ̤ɛmv̤ɔ uɓamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛɓɛ ind͡ʒ̤a iɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa ɔpʰupʰuma umsind̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛmɓamɓanɔ anɡ̤ɛpʰamɓi kwajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛd̤wad̤wasi ɛlid͡ʒ̤ula iz̤ikʰuni nɛɛntɔlɔ z̤ɔkufa ind͡ʒ̤alɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛkʰɔɬisa ummɛlwanɛ wajɔ iɓɛ isitʰi and̤iɮali z̤akupʰɛla ujakǀima umlilɔ kwakuɓa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ ntlɛɓi ijad̤amɓa iŋ̤ǁ̤aɓanɔ ŋǃwa namalaɬɛ amɲama kumalaɬɛ av̤utʰajɔ ŋǃwa nɛɛnkuni kumlilɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɛŋ̤ǁ̤aɓanɔ ukupʰɛmɓa imɓamɓanɔ amaz̤wi ɛntlɛɓi and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmitʰamɔ imnand̤i jɔna iɬa ijɛ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɔnt͡sini z̤ɔmɓilini liɡ̤wɛɓu lɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ lalɛkwɛ ɛmpaɬɛni jɔd̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ umlɔmɔ ɔv̤utʰajɔ unɛntliz̤ijɔ ɛnɔɓuɓi nɡ̤ɛmilɛɓɛ jɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɛ ujaɲ̤walaz̤a umtʰiji ɛmɓilinini jakʰɛ inkɔɬisɔ kǁa atʰɛ walimnand̤isa iliz̤wi lakʰɛ ukukʰɔlwa nɡ̤ujɛ kuɓa nɡ̤amasikiz̤i asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɛ intijɔ iz̤ifiɬa nɡ̤ɛnkɔɬisɔ uɓuɓi ɓajɔ ɓɔz̤itʰʲila ɛsikʰunɡ̤wini ɔmɓa isihɔɡ̤ɔ wɛjɛla kusɔ ɔkǃɛŋ̤ǃ̤a ilitʲɛ liɓujɛla kujɛ ulwimi ɔlukǁɔkajɔ lujaɓatʰija aɓatʲuɲuz̤wa lulɔ nɔmlɔmɔ ɔkǀɛnɡ̤akǀɛnɡ̤ajɔ usɛɓɛnz̤a uɓuɓi musa ukukǃʰajisa nɡ̤ɛmini janɡ̤ɔmsɔ kuɓa akukwaz̤i ɔkuja kuz̤alwa jimini mawud̤uɲiswɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲɛ inɡ̤aɓi nɡ̤ɔwakʰɔ umlɔmɔ majiɓɛ nɡ̤uwumɓi inɡ̤aɓi jɛjakʰɔ imilɛɓɛ jɔmlɔmɔ linz̤ima ilitʲɛ inɡ̤umtʰwalɔ intlaɓatʰi kɛ jɔna iŋ̤ǃ̤umɓɔ jɛsimatʰanɛ inz̤ima kunɛz̤ɔ ntɔ z̤ɔmɓini uɓud͡ʒ̤ɔxa ɓunɔɓuʃuʃu umsind̤ɔ sisipʰanɡ̤ɔ nɛkʰwɛlɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɔkuma pʰamɓi kwalɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛ ukɔɬwajwa ɛkuɬɛni nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔtʰand̤ɔ ɔlusitʰɛlɛjɔ akʰɔlɛkilɛ amaŋǁɛɓa ɔm̤lɔɓɔ kɔd̤wa jiŋ̤ǁ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤u ukwanɡ̤a kɔt͡ʃaɓa umpʰɛfumlɔ ɔɬutʰijɔ uɡ̤ǃ̤uʃa iŋǀind̤i jɔɓusi umpʰɛfumlɔ ɔlamɓilɛjɔ jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛk͡xak͡xa imnand̤i kuwɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntaka ɛpʰɛkuz̤iwɛjɔ ɛnɮwini jajɔ ind͡ʒ̤alɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛpʰɛkuz̤iwɛjɔ ɛkʰajɛni lajɔ iɔli nɛsikǃʰumisɔ siv̤ujisa intliz̤ijɔ kwanɔɓumnand̤i ɓɔm̤lɔɓɔ ɔɓupʰuma ɛkukǀɛɓisɛni kɔmpʰɛfumlɔ musa ukumlaɬa um̤lɔɓɔ wakʰɔ nɔm̤lɔɓɔ kajiɬɔ unɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni ɛnɮwini jɔmz̤alwana wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkusind̤ɛka kwakʰɔ ulunɡ̤ilɛ ummɛlwanɛ ɔkufupʰi kunɔmz̤alwana ɔkud̤ɛ jiɓa nɔɓulumkɔ ɲana ujiv̤ujisɛ intliz̤ijɔ jam ukuz̤ɛ nd̤impʰɛnd̤ulɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤wi ɔnd̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ajɔ ɔnɔɓukǃili ujaɓuɓɔna uɓuɓi az̤imɛlɛ kɛ z̤ɔna iz̤ijatʰa z̤iɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa kuɓɔ z̤ɔɬwajwɛ tʰaɓatʰa inɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ ɔmɛlɛ ɔmɲɛ mɛnz̤ɛ isiɓamɓisɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤intɔ z̤asɛmz̤ini ɔsikɛlɛla ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤wi ɛlikʰulu ɛv̤uka kuɓalɛlwa ɛkutʰini ujamt͡ʃab̤isa ukǃʰɔkǃʰɔz̤ɔ ɔlukǁikilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛmv̤ula nɔmfaz̤i ɔnɛŋ̤ǁ̤aɓanɔ kujafana ɔmŋǃand̤ajɔ uŋǃand̤a umɔja isanɮa sakʰɛ sɔkunɛnɛ siɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤ɛnɛ nɛɔli isiɲitʰi silɔla isiɲitʰi ind̤ɔd̤a ilɔla uɓusɔ ɓɔwajɔ ɔlɔnd̤ɔlɔz̤a umkʰiwanɛ wɔɮa isikǃʰamɔ sawɔ ɔɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ inkɔsi jakʰɛ wɔz̤ukiswa ɛmanz̤ini uɓusɔ ɓujɛlɛlɛnɛ nɔɓusɔ ind͡ʒ̤alɔ intliz̤ijɔ jɔmntu ɛlaɓafilɛjɔ nɛnz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓila az̤inakuɬutʰa namɛɬɔ ɔmntu akanakuɬutʰa ukʰamɓa lɔlɔkuɲiɓilikisa isiliv̤ɛrɛ iz̤ikɔ lɛlɔkuɲiɓilikisa iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛnd̤ɔd̤a ija nɡ̤ɔkɔkud̤uɲiswa kwajɔ nɔkuɓa utʰɛ wasiŋ̤ǃ̤uʃa isimatʰanɛ ɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤uʃwɛni pʰakatʰi kɔmŋ̤ǃ̤uʃɔ nɡ̤ɛntɔnɡ̤a jɔkuŋ̤ǃ̤uʃa akuji kusɔ ukumatʰa kwasɔ kʰutʰalɛla ukuɓaz̤i uɓumɛ ɓɛmpaɬa jakʰɔ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ jib̤ɛkisɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ ɛmiɬamɓini jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ajinɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤wɛɓɔ nɛsit͡sʰaɓa sɛsɛz̤iz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana jini sitʰɛ t͡ʃaɓalala nd͡ʒ̤ɛ isikʰɔtʰa kuv̤ɛla uɬaz̤a iɬanɡ̤anisiwɛ imifunɔ jɛɛntaɓa amatakanɛ nɡ̤awɔkukwamɓɛsa ikǁaɓisɔ lɛnt͡simi z̤iinkunz̤i z̤ɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ amasi ɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ alinɡ̤ɛnɛ ukuɮa kwakʰɔ nɔkuɮa kwɛnɮu jakʰɔ nɔkupʰila kɔmtʰind͡ʒ̤ana wakʰɔ ɓasaɓa ɓɛnɡ̤asukɛlwa ntɔ aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kɛ wɔna amalunɡ̤isa akʰɔlɔsa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲama nɡ̤ɔk͡xɛkǃɔ lwɛliz̤wɛ ɓaɓa ɓaninz̤i aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓalɔ nɡ̤ɔmntu ɔnɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ ɔnɔkwaz̤i ukuz̤inz̤a kwalɔ kujɔluka umfɔ ɔjintlɔkɔ ɛkukǀud̤isɛni iz̤iswɛli jimwula ɛt͡ʃajɛlajɔ inɡ̤asalisi kuɮa aɓaʃija umjalɛlɔ ɓad̤umisa aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kɛ aɓawuɡ̤ǀ̤inajɔ umjalɛlɔ ɓajaz̤ikǁʰɔkɔŋǁa nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓantu aɓanɔɓuɓi aɓakukǃɔnd̤i ɔkusɛsikwɛni kɛ ɓɔna aɓamkǃukǃɛlajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓakǃɔnd̤a iz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ lilunɡ̤ilɛ iɬwɛmpu ɛlihamɓa nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɔ jalɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔmd͡ʒ̤iɓiliz̤i ɔnɮɛla mɓini nakuɓa ɛsisitʲɛɓi ɔɓamɓa umjalɛlɔ nɡ̤uɲana ɔnɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ kɛ ɔlikʰɔlwanɛ laɓakǀʰitʰi uɬaz̤a ujisɛ ɔwɔnɡ̤ɛz̤a uɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɮa aɓaɲɛ nanɡ̤ɔlwand̤isɔ uɓutʰɛla ɔɓaɓala iz̤iswɛli ɔsusa inɮɛɓɛ jakʰɛ ɛkusipʰulapʰulɛni isijalɔ kwanɔmtʰand̤az̤ɔ wakʰɛ ulisikiz̤i ɔɓalaɬɛkisajɔ aɓatʰɛ tʲɛ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɛnɔɓuɓi kuja kwɛjɛla jɛna ɛsihɔɡ̤wɛni sakʰɛ ɓɔna aɓaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ ɓakuɮɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ilumkilɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛsisitʲɛɓi kwawajɔ amɛɬɔ kɛ isiswɛli ɛsinɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ sijajiɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀa ɛkuɮamkɛni kwamalunɡ̤isa kwand̤a uz̤ukɔ ɛkupʰakamɛni kwaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ aɓav̤ɛli nɔkuv̤ɛla aɓantu ɔsiɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlajɔ isɔnɔ sakʰɛ akaji kuɓa nampumɛlɛlɔ kɛ jɛna ɔsiv̤umajɔ asiʃijɛ uja iŋǀɛɓa haji ujɔlɔ lɔmntu ɔɬala ɛnkwantʲa kɛ jɛna ɔntliz̤ijɔ ilukʰuni uja kwɛjɛla ɛɓuɓini ujinɡ̤ɔɲama ɛɡ̤ǃ̤umajɔ ujib̤ɛrɛ ɛb̤ad̤uliswa kukulamɓa umlawuli ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kuɓantu aɓaz̤iz̤iswɛli haji inɡ̤anɡ̤a iswɛlɛ ukukǃɔnd̤a ɛnɔkukǀud̤isa ɔkuninz̤i ɔtʰijɛ inz̤uz̤ɔ ɛmɓi wɔlula imiɬa jakʰɛ umntu ɔnɔv̤alɔ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤az̤i lɔmpʰɛfumlɔ usaɓɛla nasɛm̤ad̤ini makanɡ̤aɓand͡ʒ̤ɛz̤ɛlwa ɔhamɓa nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɔ uja kusind̤iswa kɛ umd͡ʒ̤iɓiliz̤i ɔnɮɛla mɓini wɛjɛla ɔkukaɲɛ ɔwusɛɓɛnz̤ajɔ um̤laɓa wakʰɛ uja kuɬutʰa sisɔnka ɔsukɛla iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛntɔ uja kuɬutʰa ɓuɓuɬwɛmpu ind̤ɔd̤a ɛɲanisɛkilɛjɔ inɛɛnt͡sikɛlɛlɔ ɛz̤ininz̤i kɛ jɛna ɔŋ̤ǁ̤amajɔ ukuɓa sisitʲɛɓi akaɓi ukukʰɛtʰa uɓusɔ akulunɡ̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛkǃʰɛkɛz̤a lɛsɔnka anɡ̤ad̤ɛ apʰɔsisɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛlisɔ liɓi ikʰawulɛz̤ɛla ukutʲɛɓa ajaz̤i ukuɓa ukuswɛla kuja kujifikɛla ɔmɔɬwajajɔ wɔtʰi kamv̤a afumanɛ uɓaɓalɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔkǀɛnɡ̤akǀɛnɡ̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɔlwimi ɔpʰanɡ̤a ujisɛ nɔnina atʰi asiluk͡xɛkǃɔ uliɮɛlanɛ lɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤umɔnakalisi ɔmpʰɛfumlɔ uɓawajɔ ukǁʰaja iŋ̤ǁ̤aɓanɔ kɛ jɛna ɔkʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a ujatʲɛtʲiswa ɔkʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ɛjakʰɛ intliz̤ijɔ usisid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ kɛ jɛna ɔhamɓa nɡ̤ɔɓulumkɔ uja kusind̤a ɔpʰa iɬwɛmpu akaswɛli kɛ jɛna ɔfiɬa amɛɬɔ akʰɛ unɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤alɛkisɔ ɛz̤ininz̤i ɛkupʰakamɛni kwaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɓajasitʰɛla aɓantu ɛkut͡ʃaɓalalɛni kwaɓɔ ajand̤a amalunɡ̤isa ind̤ɔd̤a ɛjɔɬwajwa futʰi ijɛnz̤ɛ lukʰuni intamɔ jajɔ ija kukǀʰitʰakala nɡ̤ɛpʰaɲaz̤ɔ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ kuŋǀɛd̤wa ɛkwand̤ɛni kwamalunɡ̤isa ɓajav̤uja aɓantu ɛkulawulɛni kɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɓajaɡ̤ǀ̤uma aɓantu ind̤ɔd̤a ɛtʰand̤a uɓulumkɔ iv̤ujisa ujisɛ ɔlikʰɔlwanɛ lamahɛɲukaz̤i ukǀʰitʰa impaɬa jakʰɛ ukumkani iliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛsikɔ kɛ jɔna ind̤ɔd̤a ɛxuɲwajɔ ijalib̤ukukǃa umfɔ ɔkǀɛnɡ̤akǀɛnɡ̤a ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ utʰijɛla iiɲawɔ z̤akʰɛ nɡ̤ɔmnatʰa ɛluk͡xɛkǃwɛni lwɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛnɔɓuɓi kuɓakʰɔ isixintʲɛlɔ kɛ lɔna ilunɡ̤isa limɛmɛlɛla liv̤ujɛ ilunɡ̤isa lijalaz̤i iɓanɡ̤ɔ lɛsiswɛli kɛ jɛna ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ akanaŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ jakulaz̤i amad̤ɔd̤a aɡ̤ǁ̤ɛkajɔ apʰɛmɓɛlɛla isikǁɛkɔ kɛ z̤ɔna iz̤ilumkɔ z̤ijawud̤amɓisa umsind̤ɔ jakumanɡ̤alɛlana ind̤ɔd̤a ɛlumkilɛjɔ nɛsimatʰanɛ sɔɡ̤uɡ̤uma siɬɛkɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ kutʰɔz̤ama amad̤ɔd̤a amaɡ̤az̤i ajaɓatʰija aɓaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ naɓatʰɛ tʲɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ isiɲaɓi sija kukʰupʰa kɔnkɛ ukufutʰa kwasɔ kɛ sɔna isilumkɔ sikud̤amɓisɛla ɛmɓilinini jasɔ umlawuli ɔliɓaz̤ɛla inɮɛɓɛ iliz̤wi lɔɓukǁɔki ɓɔnkɛ aɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛli ɓakʰɛ ɓanɡ̤aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ iɬwɛmpu nɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤umkǁinɛz̤ɛli ɓajakǃuɓisana umkʰaɲisɛli wamɛɬɔ aɓɔ ɓɔɓaɓini nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ukumkani ɔɡ̤wɛɓa itʲala lɛz̤iswɛli nɡ̤ɛɲanisɔ itrɔnɛ jakʰɛ ija kuz̤inz̤a nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ intɔnɡ̤a nɛsɔɬwajɔ uɓulumkɔ kɛ jɛna ɔjɛkɛlɛlwɛjɔ ud̤anisa ɛkwand̤ɛni kwaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ lujand̤a uk͡xɛkǃɔ kɛ wɔna amalunɡ̤isa aja kukuɓɔna kwaɓɔ mkǃɛkǃɛʃɛ uɲana wakʰɔ wɔkupʰɛfumlisa awujɔlisɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ apʰɔ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ mɓɔnɔ ɓaɓa jimikǃʰatʰu aɓantu ɓakuwuɡ̤ǀ̤ina umjalɛlɔ haji ujɔlɔ lwaɓɔ isikǀaka asikǃɛkǃɛʃwa nɡ̤amaz̤wi kuɓa sijakǃɔnd̤a sinɡ̤akʰatʰali ujajiɓɔna ind̤ɔd̤a ɛŋ̤ǁ̤amilɛjɔ nɡ̤amaz̤wi ajɔ kukʰɔ itʰɛmɓa nɡ̤ɛsiɲaɓi kunajɔ ɔsifɛkɛtʰisajɔ kwasɛɓuŋǀinanɛni isikǀaka sakʰɛ uja kwɛnɛlwa lukʰula ɛkupʰɛlɛni ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɔmsind̤ɔ ikǁʰaja iŋ̤ǁ̤aɓanɔ umntu ɔnɔɓuʃuʃu uz̤ɛlɛ luk͡xɛkǃɔ ik͡xat͡ʃi lɔmntu lija kumtʰɔɓa kɛ jɛna ɔmɔja utʰɔɓɛkilɛjɔ uz̤ukɔ ɔwaɬulɛlana nɛsɛla utʰija umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ujasiv̤a isiʃwaɓulɔ anɡ̤akǁɛli ukuɡ̤ub̤a nɡ̤umntu kunɛsixintʲɛlɔ kɛ jɛna ɔkʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a uja kupʰakaɲisɛlwa pʰɛz̤ulu ɓaninz̤i aɓafuna uɓusɔ ɓɔmlawuli kɛ lɔna iɓanɡ̤ɔ lɛnd̤ɔd̤a liv̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa lisikiz̤i kumalunɡ̤isa ɔnɮɛla itʰɛ tʲɛ lisikiz̤i kɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ amaz̤wi kaaɡ̤urɛ uɲana kajakʰɛ wasɛmasa it͡ʃɔ ind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ itʰi nd̤iz̤id̤inisilɛ nd̤iz̤id̤inisilɛ nd̤apʰɛla kuɓa nd̤isisitʰʲakala and̤imntu iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ jɔmntu ajikʰɔ and̤ifund̤anɡ̤a ɓulumkɔ ukuɓa nd̤az̤i ukwaz̤iwa kɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔwɛɲuka waja ɛmaz̤ulwini waz̤a wɛɬa nɡ̤uɓani ɔfumɓɛtʰɛ umɔja nɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔɓɔpʰɛ amanz̤i ɛnɡ̤utʲɛni nɡ̤uɓani ɔmisɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ipʰɛlɔ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi linɡ̤uɓani iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ linɡ̤uɓani iɡ̤ama lɔɲana wakʰɛ ukuɓa ujalaz̤i jɔnkɛ intɛtʰɔ katʰikǁɔ iɲiɓilikisiwɛ ujinɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ kwaɓaz̤imɛla nɡ̤ajɛ musa ukɔnɡ̤ɛz̤a ɛmaz̤wini akʰɛ ɬɛz̤ɛ akɔɬwajɛ uɓɛ nɡ̤ɔtʰɛtʰa amanɡ̤a nd̤ikǀɛlɛ kuwɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤imɓini musa ukund̤iv̤imɓa z̤ɔna nd̤inɡ̤ɛkafi kʰwɛlɛlisa inkɔɬakalɔ nɛliz̤wi lamanɡ̤a musa ukund̤inika uɓuɬwɛmpu nɔɓutʲɛɓi nd̤iɬafunisɛ isɔnka ɛnd̤isimisɛlwɛjɔ ɬɛz̤ɛ nd̤iɬutʰɛ nd̤ikʰaɲɛlɛ nd̤itʰi nɡ̤uɓani ujɛhɔv̤a ɬɛz̤ɛ nd̤iɬwɛmpuz̤ɛkɛ nd̤iɓɛ nd̤ilikǀukukǀɛz̤ɛ iɡ̤ama likatʰikǁɔ musa ukusiɬɛɓa isikǀaka ɛnkɔsini jasɔ ɬɛz̤ɛ sikut͡ʃab̤isɛ utʰwalɛ itʲala kukʰɔ isiz̤ukulwana ɛsiiʃab̤isa ujisɛ sinɡ̤amsikɛlɛli kukʰɔ isiz̤ukulwana ɛsiɬamɓulukilɛjɔ kwawasɔ amɛlulɔ ɛsinɡ̤aɬand͡ʒ̤wanɡ̤a ɛkuŋ̤ǀ̤ɔlɛni kwasɔ kukʰɔ isiz̤ukulwana haji ukukǃwajinɡ̤a kwamɛɬɔ asɔ ukuz̤ipʰakamisa kwɛɛnkɔpʰɛ z̤asɔ kukʰɔ isiz̤ukulwana ɛsimaz̤iɲɔ anɡ̤amak͡xɛlɛ simaɓamɓa az̤iz̤it͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ z̤ɔkuɮa iint͡siz̤ana ɛɬaɓatʰini namaɬwɛmpu pʰakatʰi kwɛsintu isimunɡ̤uɲiɡ̤az̤i sinɛɛntɔmɓi ɛz̤imɓini ɛz̤itʰi ɛtʰɛ ɛtʰɛ z̤intatʰu iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnakuɬutʰa z̤inɛ ɛz̤inɡ̤at͡ʃɔjɔ ukutʰi kwanɛlɛ lɛlaɓafilɛjɔ kukunɡ̤az̤ali nɡ̤um̤laɓa ɔnɡ̤aɬutʰijɔ nɡ̤amanz̤i nɡ̤umlilɔ ɔnɡ̤at͡ʃɔjɔ ukutʰi kwanɛlɛ ilisɔ ɛliɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛla ujisɛ lid̤ɛlɛ ukumlulamɛla aja kulik͡xuk͡xa amaɬunɡ̤ulu asɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni aliɮɛ amatʰɔlɛ ɛkǁʰalanɡ̤a iz̤intɔ z̤intatʰu ɛz̤iɓalulɛkilɛjɔ haji z̤inɛ ɛnd̤inɡ̤ɛnakuz̤az̤i jinɮɛla jɛkǁʰalanɡ̤a ɛsib̤akab̤akɛni jinɮɛla jɛɲɔka ɛtʲɛni jinɮɛla jɛŋǃanawa ɛsaz̤ulwini sɔlwanɮɛ jinɮɛla jɔmfɔ nɛntɔmɓi ind͡ʒ̤alɔ inɮɛla jɔmfaz̤i ɔk͡xɛkǁɛz̤ajɔ ujaɮa asulɛ umlɔmɔ atʰi and̤ɛnz̤anɡ̤a ɓuɓi nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤intatʰu um̤laɓa ujaɲikima nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwɛz̤inɛ ukʰɔɬiwɛ kukutʰwala nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwɛsikǀaka kǁa sitʰɛ sanɡ̤ukumkani nɛsid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ kǁa sitʰɛ saɬutʰa sisɔnka nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwɛsiɡ̤ɛlɛ sɛntɔmɓi kǁa sitʰɛ sɛnd̤a nɛsikǀakakaz̤i kǁa sitʰɛ saɮa lɛnkɔsikaz̤i jasɔ iz̤intɔ z̤inɛ ɛz̤iŋǀinanɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni kanti z̤ilumkɛ kakʰulu iimɓɔv̤anɛ nɡ̤aɓantu aɓanɡ̤ɛnamanɮa kanti z̤ilunɡ̤isa ukuɮa kwaz̤ɔ ɛɬɔtʲɛni iimɓila nɡ̤aɓantu aɓanɡ̤ɔmɛlɛlɛjɔ kanti z̤imisa iz̤inɮu z̤az̤ɔ ɛmawɛni iinkumɓi az̤inakumkani kanti z̤ipʰuma z̤inɡ̤amakǃɛla nɡ̤amakǃɛla z̤ɔnkɛ ikǀilit͡ʃɛ unakɔ ukuliɓamɓa nɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa kanti lisɛmab̤ɔtwɛni ɔɔkumkani iz̤intɔ z̤intatʰu ɛz̤ihamɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɲalasa haji z̤inɛ ɛz̤ilunɡ̤isajɔ ukuhamɓa jinɡ̤ɔɲama iɡ̤ɔxa pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤iz̤itʰɔ z̤inɛ ɛlinɡ̤aɓuji umv̤a pʰamɓi kwɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ jind͡ʒ̤a ɛlinɡ̤ɛsi nɔkuɓa jinkunz̤i jɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ nɡ̤ukumkani ɛnɔmkʰɔsi wakʰɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ wɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuz̤ipʰakamisa nɔkuɓa utʰɛ waŋ̰ǃ̰anɡ̤ijɛla ɓɛka isanɮa ɛmlɔɲɛni kuɓa ukukǀɔfa uɓisi kuv̤ɛlisa ukukǀɔfa impumlɔ kuv̤ɛlisa iɡ̤az̤i ukukǀɔfa umsind̤ɔ kuv̤ɛlisa imɓamɓanɔ amaz̤wi kalɛmuwɛli wasɛmasa awamkǃɛkǃɛʃa nɡ̤awɔ jini ɲana jini ɲana wɛsiz̤alɔ jini ɲana wɛz̤ib̤amɓatʰisɔ z̤am amanɮa akʰɔ amankaz̤ana iinɮɛla z̤akʰɔ uz̤inikɛ aɓɔ ɓat͡ʃaɓalalisa ɔɔkumkani asijind̤awɔ jɔkumkani lɛmuwɛli asijind̤awɔ jɔkumkani ukusɛla iwajini asijind̤awɔ jɛz̤id̤wanɡ̤uɓɛ ukutʰi sipʰi isisɛlɔ ɛsiŋǁilisajɔ ɬɛz̤ɛ ɓasɛlɛ ɓakuliɓalɛ ɔkumisɛlwɛjɔ ɓalid͡ʒ̤ikɛ itʲala lɔɔɲana ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛɛnt͡siz̤i isisɛlɔ ɛsiŋǁilisajɔ sinikɛni aɓat͡ʃaɓalalajɔ nɛwajini jinikɛni aɓampʰɛfumlɔ uk͡xak͡xa maɓasɛlɛ aɓɔ ɓaɓuliɓalɛ uɓuɬwɛmpu ɓaɓɔ ɓanɡ̤aɓi saɓukʰumɓula uɓuɓi ɓaɓɔ wuv̤ulɛ umlɔmɔ wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔsisid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛtʲala laɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɮulajɔ v̤ula umlɔmɔ wakʰɔ ɡ̤wɛɓa nɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa uɡ̤wɛɓɛ itʲala lɔlusiz̤ana nɔliɬwɛmpu umfaz̤i ɔnɛsid̤ima nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤amfumanajɔ linɡ̤apʰɛz̤ulu nakwikɔralɛ ikǁaɓisɔ lakʰɛ ikʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ajɛ intliz̤ijɔ jɛnd̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ ajisaji kuswɛla ntɔ ujipʰatʰa kakuɬɛ kunɡ̤aɓi kakuɓi jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɔɓɔmi ɓakʰɛ ufuna uɓɔja ɓɛɡ̤uʃa nɛflakisi asɛɓɛnz̤ɛ ɛtʰumɛkɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛŋǃanawa z̤aɓaxwɛɓi ukuja kutʰaɓatʰa kud̤ɛ ukuɮa kwakʰɛ uv̤uka kwasɛɓusuku ajinikɛ intɔ ɛɮiwajɔ inɮu jakʰɛ awunikɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i wawɔ umtʰind͡ʒ̤ana wakʰɛ uŋ̰ǃ̰anɡ̤ijɛla int͡simi ajiz̤uz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ utʲala isid̤ilija ub̤iŋǃa amanɮa ɛmaŋǃɛni akʰɛ ajɔmɛlɛz̤ɛ imikʰɔnɔ jakʰɛ ujakuv̤a ukuɓa kulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuxwɛɓa kwakʰɛ isiɓanɛ sakʰɛ asikǀimi ɛɓusuku uz̤iɓɛka iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ ɛntɔnɡ̤ɛni jɔkuluka nɛminwɛ jakʰɛ iɓamɓa isikʰand̤a sɛntɔ jɔkuluka isanɮa sakʰɛ usitwaɓululɛla ɔlusiz̤ana az̤ɔlulɛlɛ iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ kumaɬwɛmpu inɮu jakʰɛ akajɔjikɛli m̤lana nɡ̤ɛkʰɛpʰu kuɓa jɔnkɛ inɮu jakʰɛ jamɓɛtʰɛ ɛz̤isitʰilɛjɔ uz̤ɛnz̤ɛla imikǃamɛlɔ jilinɛn ɛkǀikiz̤ɛkilɛjɔ kwanɛmfusa isamɓatʰɔ sakʰɛ ijaz̤iwa ind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ ɛmasanɡ̤wɛni ɛkuɓutʰɛni kwajɔ namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ɛliz̤wɛ wɛnz̤a iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɛlinɛn ɛntlɛ atʰɛnɡ̤isɛ nɡ̤az̤ɔ atʰɛnɡ̤isɛ nɡ̤ɛmib̤iŋǃɔ kumakanan nɡ̤amanɮa nɔɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amɛla isamɓatʰɔ sakʰɛ usuka aɬɛkɛ nɡ̤ɛmini ɛz̤ajɔ umlɔmɔ wakʰɛ uwuv̤ula nɡ̤ɔɓulumkɔ umjalɛlɔ ɔnɛŋǀɛɓa usɛlulwimini lwakʰɛ ujajɔnd̤ɛla ihamɓɔ jɛnɮu jakʰɛ anɡ̤asiɮi isɔnka sɔɓuv̤ila ɓajasuka ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓatʰi unɔjɔlɔ ijasuka ind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ imd̤umisɛ itʰi z̤ininz̤i iintɔmɓi ɛz̤ɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkunɛsid̤ima kɛ wɛna uz̤iɮulɛ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ipʰɛla ɓuɓukǁɔki uɓuɬɛ nɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ uɓunz̤wakaz̤i nɡ̤umfaz̤i ɔwɔjika ujɛhɔv̤a jɛd̤wa ɔja kud̤uɲiswa mnikɛni kwiz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ z̤imd̤umisɛ ɛmasanɡ̤wɛni iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ amaz̤wi ɛnt͡ʃumajɛli uɲana kad̤av̤id̤ɛ wasɛjɛrusalɛm amampunɡ̤ɛ awɔ amampunɡ̤ɛ it͡ʃɔ int͡ʃumajɛli amampunɡ̤ɛ awɔ amampunɡ̤ɛ jɔnkɛ intɔ inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ unalunɡ̤ɛlɔ ɛmiɡ̤ud̤wini jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ ajɛnz̤ajɔ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a kumka ɛsiɲɛ isiz̤ukulwana kuland̤ɛlɛ ɛsiɲɛ isiz̤ukulwana kɛ lɔna iɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ ilanɡ̤a lijapʰuma ilanɡ̤a liɓuja lit͡ʃɔnɛ lipʰikɛlɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jalɔ apʰɔ lipʰuma kʰɔna umɔja uja ɛz̤ant͡si ud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ɛ usinɡ̤ɛ ɛntla uhamɓa ud͡ʒ̤ikad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a uɓujɛ uɓuja umɔja ɛkud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ɛni kwawɔ jɔnkɛ imilamɓɔ ija ɛlwanɮɛ ulwanɮɛ aluz̤ali ɛnd̤awɛni ɛja kujɔ imilamɓɔ iɓuja ijɛ kwakʰɔna z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ijaz̤ikǁʰamla akanakɔ ukuz̤itʰɛtʰa aliɬutʰi ilisɔ kukuɓɔna ajiz̤ali inɮɛɓɛ kukuv̤a intɔ ɛjajikʰɔ jɛja kuɓuja iɓɛkʰɔ intɔ ɛjɛnz̤ɛkajɔ jɛja kuɓuja jɛnz̤ɛkɛ jɔna akukʰɔ ntɔ int͡ʃa pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a ukuɓa kukʰɔ intɔ ɛkutʰiwa jaɓɔna lɛ int͡ʃa iɓisɛlikʰɔ kad̤ɛ ɛmapʰakad̤ɛni aɓɛkʰɔ nɡ̤apʰamɓi kwɛtʰu akukʰɔ kukʰumɓula aɓɔkukǃala naɓasɛmv̤a aɓaja kuɓakʰɔ aɓaji kukʰund͡ʒ̤ulwa nɡ̤aɓaja kuz̤a ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ mna nt͡ʃumajɛli nd̤iɓɛ nd̤inɡ̤ukumkani kwasirajɛli ɛjɛrusalɛm intliz̤ijɔ jam nd̤ajinikɛla ukuɓa iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɛ isinɡ̤asinɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔɓulumkɔ jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛjɛnz̤ɛkajɔ pʰant͡si kwɛz̤ulu nɡ̤umz̤amɔ ɔmɓi utʰikǁɔ awunikɛ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ukuɓa ɓawuz̤amɛ nd̤az̤ikʰanɡ̤ɛla z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɛnz̤ɛkajɔ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a jaɓɔna z̤ɔnkɛ z̤inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ nɔkusukɛlana nɔmɔja intɔ ɛɡ̤ɔsɔ ajinakɔlulwa intɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛkʰɔjɔ ajinakuɓalwa nd̤atʰɛtʰa nɛntliz̤ijɔ jam nd̤isitʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ikʰulisɛ nd̤and̤isa uɓulumkɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ ijɛrusalɛm pʰamɓi nɛntliz̤ijɔ jam iɓɔnɛ kakʰulu uɓulumkɔ nɔkwaz̤i intliz̤ijɔ jam nd̤ajinikɛla ɛkwaz̤ini uɓulumkɔ nasɛkwaz̤ini uɓuɡ̤ɛz̤a nɔɓujatʰa kwanalɔɔ ntɔ nd̤ajikǃɔnd̤a ukuɓa kukusukɛlana nɔmɔja nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓuninz̤ini ɓɔɓulumkɔ kukʰɔ ukuɬɛlwa sisijɛnɡ̤ɛlɛz̤anɛ ɛsininz̤i ɔwɔnɡ̤ɛz̤a ukwaz̤i wɔnɡ̤ɛz̤a umv̤and̤ɛd̤wa nd̤atʰi ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam kʰawuz̤ɛ kʰɛ nd̤ikulinɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔv̤ujɔ uɓɔnɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ jaɓɔna kwanalɔɔ ntɔ inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ nd̤atʰi kɔɬɛkajɔ ujaɡ̤ɛz̤a nakɔv̤ujajɔ wɛnz̤a ntɔni lɔ nd̤asinɡ̤asinɡ̤a ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam ukuɓa nd̤it͡salɛ iɲama jam nɡ̤ɛwajini ɛkuɓɛni intliz̤ijɔ jam iz̤ikǃʰuɓa nɡ̤ɔɓulumkɔ ukuɓa nd̤az̤anɛ nɔɓujatʰa nd̤id̤ɛ nd̤iɓɔnɛ ukuɓa jijipʰi intɔ ɛɓalunɡ̤ɛlɛjɔ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ukuz̤ɛ ɓajɛnz̤ɛ pʰant͡si kwɛz̤ulu nɡ̤ɛmiɬa ɛmɓalwa jɔɓɔmi ɓaɓɔ nd̤az̤ɛnz̤ɛla imisɛɓɛnz̤i ɛmikʰulu nd̤az̤akʰɛla iz̤inɮu nd̤az̤itʲalɛla iz̤id̤ilija nd̤az̤ɛnz̤ɛla nɛmijɛz̤ɔ nd̤atʲala kujɔ imitʰi ɛnɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nd̤az̤ɛnz̤ɛla amakǀʰiɓi amanz̤i ɔkuɲɛla iɬatʰi ɛliɬuma imitʰi nd̤atʰɛnɡ̤a amakʰɔɓɔka namakʰɔɓɔkaz̤ana nd̤aɓa nawɔ naz̤alɛlwɛ ɛnɮwini jam kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ imfujɔ jɛɛnkɔmɔ nɛjɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ jaɓa ninz̤i nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛnɡ̤apʰamɓi ɛjɛrusalɛm nd̤az̤ikǃwɛɓɛla nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤iz̤iiŋǃɔɓɔ z̤ɔɔkumkani nɡ̤ɔɔkumkani nɛz̤amaz̤wɛ nɡ̤amaz̤wɛ nd̤az̤ɛnz̤ɛla iimv̤umi nɛɛmv̤umikaz̤i nɛz̤ijɔlɔ z̤ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu inkɔsikaz̤i namakʰɔsikaz̤i nd̤aɓa mkʰulu kɛ nd̤and̤a nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛsɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤apʰamɓi ɓatʰi nɔɓulumkɔ ɓam ɓand̤iŋǀɛd̤a and̤iwaɓand̤ɛz̤anɡ̤a intɔ jɔnkɛ ajiɓiz̤ajɔ amɛɬɔ and̤ijiv̤imɓanɡ̤a intliz̤ijɔ jam namɲɛ umv̤ujɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa intliz̤ijɔ jam jajiv̤uja ɛmiɡ̤ud̤wini jam jɔnkɛ saɓa sɛsi kɛ isaɓɛlɔ ɛmiɡ̤ud̤wini jam jɔnkɛ nd̤ab̤ɛka ɛz̤ɛnz̤wɛni z̤am z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤az̤ɛnz̤ajɔ iz̤anɮa z̤am nasɛmiɡ̤ud̤wini jam ɛnd̤apʰuka jijɔ ukujɛnz̤a nd̤ajiɓɔna ukuɓa jɔnkɛ lɔɔ ntɔ inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ nɔkusukɛlana nɔmɔja akukʰɔ lunɡ̤ɛlɔ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a nd̤az̤id͡ʒ̤ika nd̤akʰanɡ̤ɛla uɓulumkɔ nɔɓuɡ̤ɛz̤a nɔɓujatʰa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤umntu ɔjini lɔwɔ uja kuz̤a ɛmv̤a kɔkumkani lɔ uɓɛsɛlɛnz̤iwɛ kad̤ɛ nd̤aɓɔna ukuɓa uɓulumkɔ ɓujaɓuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa uɓujatʰa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukukʰaɲa kuɓuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa uɓumɲama isilumkɔ amɛɬɔ asɔ asɛntlɔkwɛni jasɔ kɛ sɔna isiɲaɓi sihamɓa ɛmɲamɛni nd̤akǃɔnd̤a kɛ ukuɓa ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓaɬɛlwa siɬɔ siɲɛ nd̤atʰi ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ siɬɛlwa kukɔ isiɲaɓi nd̤ija kuɬɛlwa kukɔ lɔ iɓijini kɛ ukuɓa nd̤isiɮulɛ nɡ̤ɔkulumka nd̤atʰi ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam kwanalɔɔ ntɔ inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa isilumkɔ kuɲɛ nɛsiɲaɓi asinakukʰund͡ʒ̤ulwa kunɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ɛkuɓɛni kusiz̤a ɛz̤ɔɓa sɛz̤ilitʲɛlwɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɔ ntɔ kutʰɛni ukuɓa z̤ifɛ iz̤ilumkɔ kuɲɛ nɛz̤iɲaɓi nd̤aɓutʰija kɛ uɓɔmi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa miɓi imisɛɓɛnz̤i ɛjɛnz̤ɛka pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jɔnkɛ lɔɔ ntɔ inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ nɔkusukɛlana nɔmɔja nd̤ajitʰija jɔnkɛ imiɡ̤ud̤u jam ɛnd̤apʰuka jijɔ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a ɛkuɓɛni nd̤ija kujiʃija nɔmntu ɔja kuɓakʰɔ ɛmv̤a waz̤iwa nɡ̤uɓani ukuɓa wɔɓa sisilumkɔ nɔkuɓa wɔɓa sisijatʰa ukanti uja kuɡ̤uɲaz̤ɛla ɛmiɡ̤ud̤wini jam jɔnkɛ ɛnd̤apʰuka jijɔ ɛnd̤alumkajɔ kujɔ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a kwanalɔɔ ntɔ inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ nd̤ad͡ʒ̤ika kɛ nd̤ajiŋǀamisisa intliz̤ijɔ jam nɡ̤ɛmiɡ̤ud̤u jɔnkɛ ɛnd̤apʰuka jijɔ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kuɓakʰɔ ɔmiɡ̤ud̤u jakʰɛ inɔɓulumkɔ inɔkwaz̤i inɛmpumɛlɛlɔ uja kujinika ɔnɡ̤ɛnz̤anɡ̤a miɡ̤ud̤u iɓɛ sisaɓɛlɔ sakʰɛ kwanalɔɔ ntɔ inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ nɔɓuɓi ɔɓukʰulu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓa nantɔni nɡ̤ɛmiɡ̤ud̤u jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ nanɡ̤ɛnz̤ɔnd̤ɛlɛlɔ jɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ apʰuka jijɔ jɛna pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa imiɬa jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ inɔmv̤and̤ɛd̤wa nasɛkuz̤amɛni kwakʰɛ ukʰatʰaz̤ɛkilɛ nasɛɓusuku ajipʰumli intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ kwanalɔɔ ntɔ inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ akukʰɔ ntɔ ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛɓantwini kunɔkuɓa ɓaɮɛ ɓasɛlɛ ɓawuɓɔnisɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmiɡ̤ud̤wini jaɓɔ kwanalɔɔ ntɔ nd̤ijiɓɔnilɛ ukuɓa iv̤ɛla ɛsanɮɛni sikatʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤aɮajɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤av̤ajɔ uɓumnand̤i ɛnɡ̤ɛnajɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ uɓulumkɔ nɔkwaz̤i nɔv̤ujɔ kɛ jɛna umɔni umz̤amɔ wɔkuɬanɡ̤anisa nɔkukǃwɛɓa ukuz̤ɛ lɔɔ ntɔ ajinikɛ ɔlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ pʰamɓi kɔtʰikǁɔ kwanalɔɔ ntɔ inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ nɔkusukɛlana nɔmɔja intɔ jɔnkɛ inɛkǁɛʃa ɛlimisiwɛjɔ nɔmkǀimɓi wɔnkɛ unɛkǁɛʃa lawɔ pʰant͡si kwɛz̤ulu ukuz̤ala kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ ukutʲala kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ ukuɲɔtʰula ɔkutʲɛlwɛjɔ kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ ukuɓulala kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ ukupʰilisa kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ ukukǀʰitʰa kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ ukwakʰa kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ ukuɬɛka kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ kukʰɔ ikǁɛʃa lɔkulila umɓamɓaz̤ɛlɔ kukʰɔ nɛkǁɛʃa lɔkuɮɔɓa kukʰɔ ikǁɛʃa lɔkukǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰa amatʲɛ kukʰɔ nɛkǁɛʃa lɔkufumɓa amatʲɛ ukuwɔla kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ ukujɛka ukuwɔla kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ ukulaɬɛkɛlwa kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ ukuɡ̤ǀ̤ina kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ ukulaɬa kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ ukuk͡xaz̤ula kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ ukutʰunɡ̤a kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ ukutʰi kǀwaka kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ ukutʰɛtʰa kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ ukutʰand̤a kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ ukutʰija kunɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ kukʰɔ ikǁɛʃa lɛmfaz̤wɛ kukʰɔ nɛkǁɛʃa lɔkǁɔlɔ unalunɡ̤ɛlɔ lɔwɔ usɛɓɛnz̤ajɔ kulɔɔ ntɔ ajɛnz̤ɛla imiɡ̤ud̤u nd̤iwuɓɔnilɛ umz̤amɔ awunikɛ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu utʰikǁɔ ukuɓa ɓawuz̤amɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ uz̤ɛnz̤ɛ z̤antlɛ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa laz̤ɔ kwanɛpʰakad̤ɛ ulinikɛlɛ ɛz̤intliz̤ijwɛni z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔɬɔɓɔ lɔkuɓa anɡ̤asifumani isɛnz̤ɔ asɛnz̤ajɔ utʰikǁɔ atʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛkukǃalɛni ad̤ɛ asɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni nd̤ijaz̤i kɛ ukuɓa akukʰɔ ntɔ ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ inɡ̤ɛkukuv̤uja nɔkuz̤iz̤uz̤ɛla ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛɓɔmini ɓaɓɔ kwanɔkuɓa wɔnkɛ aɮɛ asɛlɛ aɓɔnɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmiɡ̤ud̤wini jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ sisipʰɔ sikatʰikǁɔ ɛsɔ nd̤ijaz̤i kɛ ukuɓa jɔnkɛ intɔ aja kujɛnz̤a utʰikǁɔ jijɔ ɛja kuɓa nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ kunɡ̤ɔnɡ̤ɛz̤wa ntɔ kujɔ kunɡ̤akǀat͡ʃulwa ntɔ kujɔ utʰikǁɔ ukwɛnz̤ɛla ukuɓa kɔjikwɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ lɛ ntɔ ikʰɔjɔ iɓisɛlikʰɔ kad̤ɛ nɛntɔ ɛja kuɓakʰɔ iɓisɛlikʰɔ kad̤ɛ utʰikǁɔ kɛ uɓuja ajifunɛ intɔ ɛɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰiwɛjɔ nd̤aɓuja nd̤aɓɔna pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a ind̤awɔ jɔkuɡ̤wɛɓa ukuɓa ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kukʰɔna nɛnd̤awɔ jɔɓulunɡ̤isa ukuɓa ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kukʰɔna nd̤atʰi ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam nɔlilunɡ̤isa nɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ utʰikǁɔ uja kulitʰɛtʰa itʲala laɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umisɛ ikǁɛʃa lajɔ jɔnkɛ imikǀimɓi naz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ nd̤atʰi ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ukuz̤ɛ utʰikǁɔ aɓaɬɛlɛ nɔkuz̤ɛ ɓaz̤iɓɔnɛ ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ ɓɔna nɡ̤ɔkwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓajaɬɛlwa ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu z̤ijaɬɛlwa nɛɛnkɔmɔ siɲɛ isiɬɔ kuɓɔ nakuz̤ɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kund͡ʒ̤alɔ kwaɓɔ kund͡ʒ̤alɔ kwaz̤ɔ mɲɛ umɔja kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ nakuz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ akukʰɔ kujiɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa kɔmntu inkɔmɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɔ ntɔ z̤inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɔ ntɔ z̤ija nd̤awɛniɲɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɔ ntɔ z̤av̤ɛla ɛlutʰulini z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɔ ntɔ z̤iɓujɛla ɛlutʰulini nɡ̤uɓani ɔwaz̤ijɔ umɔja wɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ukuɓa ujɛɲuka ujɛ pʰɛz̤ulu nɔmɔja wɛnkɔmɔ ukuɓa ujɛɬa ujɛ pʰant͡si ɛm̤laɓɛni nd̤akǃɔnd̤a kɛ ukuɓa akukʰɔ ntɔ ilunɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔkuɓa av̤ujɛ ɛz̤ɛnz̤wɛni z̤akʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kusisaɓɛlɔ sakʰɛ ɔkɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uja kunɡ̤ɛniswa nɡ̤uɓani ukuɓa akuɓɔnɛ ɔkuja kuɓakʰɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kwakʰɛ nd̤aɓuja kɛ nd̤akuɓɔna kɔnkɛ ukukǀud̤isa ɔkwɛnz̤iwajɔ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a nd̤az̤iɓɔna iiɲɛmɓɛz̤i z̤aɓakǀud̤isiwɛjɔ ɓɛnɡ̤ɛnamtʰutʰuz̤ɛli ɛsanɮɛni saɓakǀud̤isi ɓaɓɔ kupʰuma uɓub̤ɔv̤ub̤ɔv̤u ɓɛnɡ̤ɛnamtʰutʰuz̤ɛli ɓɔna nd̤aɓaŋǀɔma kɛ aɓafilɛjɔ aɓasɛɓɛfɛ kad̤ɛ kunaɓaɬɛlijɔ aɓasaɬɛlijɔ nɡ̤ɔku kɛ ulunɡ̤ilɛ kunaɓɔ ɓɔɓaɓini lɔwɔ unɡ̤ɛkaɓikʰɔ unɡ̤akuɓɔnanɡ̤a ukwɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɔkwɛnz̤iwa pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤ajikǃɔnd̤a kɛ jɔnkɛ imiɡ̤ud̤u najɔ jɔnkɛ impumɛlɛlɔ jɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i ukuɓa inɡ̤umɔna wɔkwaɲɛlana kwanalɔɔ ntɔ inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ nɔkusukɛlana nɔmɔja isiɲaɓi sikʰwaɓuʃa iz̤anɮa siɮɛ kwaɛjasɔ iɲama kulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuz̤alisa sanɮa siɲɛ nɡ̤ɔkupʰumla kunɔkuz̤alisa z̤ɔz̤iɓini iz̤anɮa nɡ̤ɛmiɡ̤ud̤u nɔkusukɛlana nɔmɔja nd̤aɓuja nd̤aɓɔna amampunɡ̤ɛ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a kukʰɔ ɔɓa jɛd̤wa ɔnɡ̤ɛnajɛ ɔwɛsiɓini ɔnɡ̤ɛnaɲana namz̤alwana inɡ̤ɛna sipʰɛlɔ imiɡ̤ud̤u jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ anɡ̤aɬutʰijɔ nɔkɔ ɓuɓutʲɛɓi amɛɬɔ akʰɛ akat͡ʃɔ ukutʰi nd̤apʰukɛla ɓani nd̤iwuɬutʰa nd͡ʒ̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kwanalɔɔ ntɔ inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ inɡ̤umz̤amɔ ɔmɓi jɔna kulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuɓa ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓaɓini kunɔkuɓa aɓɛ mɲɛ kuɓa ɓanɔmv̤uz̤ɔ ɔlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛmiɡ̤ud̤u jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kǁa ɓatʰɛ ɓawa ɔmɲɛ unɔkumpʰakamisa uwaɓɔ jɛha kɛ jɛna ɔjɛd̤wa ɔtʰɛ kuɓa akukʰɔ wɛsiɓini wɔkumpʰakamisa kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ aɓaɓini ɓatʰɛ ɓalala ɓaja kuv̤a ukusitʰa anɡ̤atʰini ukuv̤a ukusitʰa ɔlɛlɛ jɛd̤wa ukuɓa utʰɛ wamɡ̤aɡ̤amɛla ɔjɛd̤wa ɓɔna aɓaɓini ɓaja pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ umsɔntɔ ɔntluntatʰu awuɬɛ ukǃʰawulwɛ ulunɡ̤ilɛ ɔliɬwɛmpu ɛlumkilɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔkumkani ɔsɛlɛmkʰulu ɛsisid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ ɔnɡ̤asakuv̤ajɔ ukujalwa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa upʰuma ɛnɮwini jamakʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰wa ukuɓa aɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani uz̤alɛlwɛ ɛɓukumkanini ɓalɔwɔ uliɬwɛmpu nd̤aɓaɓɔna ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɮa uɓɔmi ɓɛhamɓa pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a kuɲɛ najɛ lɔ unɡ̤ɔwɛsiɓini uz̤a ɛsikʰunɮɛni salɔwɔ akukʰɔ kupʰɛla kwaɓantu ɓɔnkɛ kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ anɡ̤apʰamɓi kwaɓɔ amav̤ɛlamv̤a akaji kuv̤uja nɡ̤ajɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kwanalɔɔ ntɔ inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ nɔkusukɛlana nɔmɔja ɡ̤ǀ̤ina uɲawɔ lwakʰɔ kǁɛʃikwɛni uja ɛnɮwini katʰikǁɔ ukusɔnd̤ɛla ukuɓa uv̤ɛ kunɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔkunikɛla kwɛz̤id̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukunɡ̤az̤i kwaz̤ɔ kwɛnz̤a iz̤intɔ ɛz̤imɓi musa ukuŋ̤ǁ̤ama nɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɔ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ inɡ̤apʰanɡ̤i ikʰupʰɛ iliz̤wi pʰamɓi kɔtʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰikǁɔ usɛmaz̤ulwini kɛ wɛna usɛɬaɓatʰini nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ amaz̤wi akʰɔ makaɓɛ maŋǀinanɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukupʰupʰa kuz̤a nɡ̤ɔɓuninz̤i ɓɛmikǀimɓi nɛz̤wi lɛsid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ liz̤a nɡ̤ɔɓuninz̤i ɓɛntɛtʰɔ kǁɛʃikwɛni utʰɛ wab̤amɓatʰisa isib̤amɓatʰisɔ kutʰikǁɔ ukuz̤ɛkɛlɛla ukusiz̤alisa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa az̤inanz̤wa iz̤id̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ lɔɔ ntɔ ujib̤amɓatʰisilɛjɔ jiz̤alisɛ kulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuɓa unɡ̤ab̤amɓatʰisi kunɔkuɓa ub̤amɓatʰisɛ unɡ̤az̤alisi musa ukuwuv̤umɛla umlɔmɔ wakʰɔ ukuɓa ujɔnisɛ iɲama jakʰɔ unɡ̤at͡ʃɔ pʰamɓi kɔmtʰuɲwa katʰikǁɔ ukutʰi iɓikukulaɬɛka jini ukuɓa utʰikǁɔ aɓɛ nɔɓuxalaxumɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤wi lakʰɔ asɔnakalisɛ isɛnz̤ɔ sɛz̤anɮa z̤akʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓuninz̤ini ɓamapʰupʰa namaz̤wi maninz̤i amampunɡ̤ɛ kɛ jɔjika utʰikǁɔ ukuɓa utʰɛ wakuɓɔna ukukǀud̤iswa kwɛɬwɛmpu nɔkuɬutʰwa kɔkusɛsikwɛni nɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɛliz̤wɛni ukumanɡ̤aliswa jilɔɔ ntɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔjɛna upʰakamilɛjɔ ukʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔpʰakamilɛjɔ kukʰɔ aɓapʰakamilɛjɔ napʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ilunɡ̤ɛlɔ lɛliz̤wɛ ɛntwɛni jɔnkɛ nɡ̤ukumkani ɔɲamɛkɛla um̤laɓa ɔtʰand̤a isiliv̤ɛrɛ akanɛliswa jisiliv̤ɛrɛ nalɔwɔ utʰand̤a intaɓalala akanɡ̤ɛnɛlwa ntɔ kwanalɔɔ ntɔ inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ ɛkwand̤ɛni kwɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɓajand̤a aɓaz̤iɮajɔ z̤ɔna aɓɛ umniniz̤ɔ ɛnɛmpumɛlɛlɔ ɛjini inɡ̤ɛkukɔ ukwanɛla ukuz̤iɓɔna nɡ̤amɛɬɔ ɓumnand̤i uɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ ɓɔsɛɓɛnz̤ajɔ nɔkuɓa iŋǀinanɛ nɔkuɓa ininz̤i intɔ ajiɮajɔ kɛ intaɓalala jɛsitʲɛɓi ajisiv̤umɛli ukuɓa silalɛ ɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ kukʰɔ uɓuɓi ɔɓusisifɔ ɛnd̤iɓuɓɔnilɛjɔ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a ukutʰi uɓutʲɛɓi ɔɓuɡ̤ǀ̤inɛlwɛ umniniɓɔ ɓuɓɛ nɔɓuɓi kujɛ ɔɓɔ ɓutʲɛɓi ɓut͡ʃaɓalala nɡ̤ɛntɔ ɛmɓi uz̤ala uɲana ɛnɡ̤ɛnajɔ nɛntɔ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa wapʰuma ɛsiz̤alwɛni sɔnina ɛz̤ɛ uja kuɓuja ɛmkɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wɛz̤a ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ anɡ̤atʰaɓatʰi nɛntɔ nɡ̤ɛmiɡ̤ud̤u jakʰɛ anɡ̤ajipʰatʰajɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɛ kwanalɛ ntɔ ɓuɓuɓi ɔɓusisifɔ ukuɓa ɛja kaɲɛ kwand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wɛz̤a nɡ̤akɔ unalunɡ̤ɛlɔ kɛ ɔwapʰukɛla umɔja kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ uz̤iɮɛla ɛmɲamɛni ɛnɛŋ̤ǃ̤umɓɔ ɛnkulu nɛsifɔ nɔɓuxalaxumɛ nant͡si intɔ ɛnd̤ijiɓɔnilɛjɔ ilunɡ̤ilɛ intlɛ intɔ jɔkutʰi aɮɛ asɛlɛ aɓɔnɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛmiɡ̤ud̤u jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ apʰuka jijɔ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛnani lɛmiɬa jɔɓɔmi ɓakʰɛ amnikilɛjɔ utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kusisaɓɛlɔ sakʰɛ ɔkɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ wɔnkɛ atʰɛ utʰikǁɔ uɓutʲɛɓi nɔkukǃwɛɓa nɛɡ̤uɲa lɔkuɮa kuɓɔ atʰaɓatʰɛ isaɓɛlɔ sakʰɛ av̤ujɛ ɛmiɡ̤ud̤wini jakʰɛ sisipʰɔ sikatʰikǁɔ ɛsɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akajikʰumɓuli kakʰulu imiɬa jɔɓɔmi ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰikǁɔ ɛlupʰɛnd̤ula uv̤ujɔ lwɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ kukʰɔ uɓuɓi ɛnd̤iɓuɓɔnilɛjɔ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a ɓuninz̤i kɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔmntu jind̤ɔd̤a utʰikǁɔ ajinikɛ uɓutʲɛɓi nɔkukǃwɛɓa nɔz̤ukɔ unɡ̤aswɛli umpʰɛfumlɔ wajɔ naɲɛ intɔ ɛnɡ̤ajiŋǃwɛnɛlajɔ az̤ɛ utʰikǁɔ anɡ̤ajipʰi amanɮa ɔkujiɮa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iɮiwa jɛɲɛ ind̤ɔd̤a nɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ lawɔ sisifɔ ɛsiɓi ɛsɔ ukuɓa utʰɛ waz̤ala ikʰulu laɓantwana waɮa uɓɔmi imiɲaka ɛmininz̤i jamininz̤i imiɬa jɛmiɲaka jakʰɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ awaɬutʰa z̤iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ akaɓa naŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa nd̤itʰi imv̤amɓilini ilunɡ̤ilɛ kunajɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ifikɛ inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ kumɲama iɡ̤ama lajɔ liɡ̤utʲunɡ̤ɛlwɛ ɓuɓumɲama kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ajiliɓɔnanɡ̤a ilanɡ̤a ajilaz̤anɡ̤a lɛ jɔna ilunɡ̤ilɛ kunɔmntu lɔwɔ nɔkuɓa ɛɓɛja kuɮa uɓɔmi lɛmiɲaka kud̤ɛ kuɓɛ kaɓini anɡ̤akuɓɔni ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ajiji nd̤awɛniɲɛ jɔnkɛ lɔɔ ntɔ jɔnkɛ imiɡ̤ud̤u jɔmntu ujɛnz̤ɛla umlɔmɔ wakʰɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ awuz̤ali nɡ̤ɔkuɓa isilumkɔ sisiɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa nɡ̤antɔni isid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ usiɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa nɡ̤antɔni ɔlusiz̤ana ɔkwaz̤ijɔ ukuhamɓa pʰamɓi kwaɓapʰililɛjɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuɓɔna kwamɛɬɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔkuhamɓahamɓa kɔmpʰɛfumlɔ kwanalɔɔ ntɔ inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ nɔkusukɛlana nɔmɔja lɔɔ ntɔ isɛlikʰɔ jaɓɛ isɛlitʰijwɛ kad̤ɛ iɡ̤ama lajɔ jaz̤iwa intɔ aja kuɓa jijɔ akanakumɛlana nalɔwɔ unɔkumɛjisa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kukʰɔ amaz̤wi amaninz̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛ and̤isa amampunɡ̤ɛ unalunɡ̤ɛlɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ ntɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤uɓani ɔwaz̤ijɔ ɔkumlunɡ̤ɛlɛjɔ ɛɓɔmini nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛnani lɛmiɬa jɔɓɔmi ɓakʰɛ ɔɓunɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ ajiɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsitʰunz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɔkumkǁɛlɛla intɔ ɛja kuɓakʰɔ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a iɡ̤ama ɛlilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ linɡ̤apʰɛz̤ulu nakwiɔli ɛlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ulunɡ̤ilɛ um̤la wɔkufa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔm̤la wɔkuz̤alwa kɔmntu kulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuja ɛnɮwini jɛsid͡ʒ̤wili kunɔkuja ɛnɮwini jɛmiɡ̤id̤i kuɓa ɔkɔ kukupʰɛla kwaɓantu ɓɔnkɛ az̤ɛ ɔpʰililɛjɔ akuɲamɛkɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ ɔkɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuɓa nɔsiz̤i nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔkuɬɛka nɡ̤ɔkuɓa intliz̤ijɔ ijalunɡ̤a ɓuɓuɓi ɓɔɓusɔ intliz̤ijɔ jɛz̤ilumkɔ isɛnɮwini jɛsid͡ʒ̤wili kɛ intliz̤ijɔ jɛz̤id̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ isɛnɮwini jɔv̤ujɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuv̤a ukukʰalimɛla kwɛsilumkɔ kunɔkuɓa ɛv̤ɛ inɡ̤ɔma jɛz̤id̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkukǃʰukǃʰumɓa kwɛv̤aɓa nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwɛmɓiz̤a kund͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuɬɛka kwɛsid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ nalɔɔ ntɔ inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukukǀud̤isa kuɡ̤ɛz̤isa isilumkɔ sijit͡ʃaɓalalisɛ intliz̤ijɔ isikǀɛnɡ̤ɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwa kwɛnd̤awɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔkukǃalwa kwajɔ ulunɡ̤ilɛ umɔja ɔz̤ɛka kad̤ɛ umsind̤ɔ kunɔmɔja ɔz̤iɮajɔ musa ukukuŋ̤ǁ̤amɛla ukukǃumɓa nɡ̤ɔmɔja wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iŋ̤ǃ̤umɓɔ ɛsifuɓɛni sɛz̤id̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ musa ukutʰi iɓijini lɛ ntɔ imiɬa jamand̤ulɔ iɓilunɡ̤ilɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwalɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akutʰaɓatʰɛli ɛɓulumkwɛni ukujiɓuz̤a lɔɔ ntɔ ɓulunɡ̤ilɛ uɓulumkɔ ɓunɛlifa ɓulilunɡ̤ɛlɔ kwaɓaliɓɔnajɔ ilanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓulumkɔ ɓunɡ̤umtʰunz̤i inɡ̤umtʰunz̤i kɛ ukuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰisɛla kɔkwaz̤i kukuɓa uɓulumkɔ ɓujaɓasind̤isa aɓɔ ɓanaɓɔ wukʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i katʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɔkɔlula intɔ ajɛnz̤ɛ jaɡ̤ɔsɔ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛnt͡sikɛlɛlɔ kǀʰwajitʰa nanɡ̤ɔm̤la wɔɓuɓi kǃɔnd̤a kakuɬɛ ukuɓa nalɔ kwand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤alɔwa wɛnz̤iwɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɛnɡ̤afumani ntɔ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ lɛ ntɔ jɔnkɛ nd̤ijiɓɔnilɛ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jam ɛnɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ kuɓakʰɔ ilunɡ̤isa ɛlit͡ʃaɓalalajɔ nɔkɔ linɔɓulunɡ̤isa kuɓɛkʰɔ ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɔpʰila ikǁɛʃa ɛlid̤ɛ nɔkɔ anɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ musa ukuɓa lilunɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɔkukʰulu unɡ̤aɓi sisilumkɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰisɛlɛjɔ jini ukuɓa uz̤ipʰanz̤isɛ musa ukuɓa nɡ̤ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔkukʰulu unɡ̤az̤ɛnz̤i isid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ jini ukuɓa ufɛ linɡ̤ɛkaɓi likǁɛʃa lakʰɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuɓa uɓamɓɛlɛlɛ kulɛ ntɔ nakulɛja unɡ̤asipʰumz̤i isanɮa sakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔwɔjika utʰikǁɔ upʰumɛlɛla kuz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ipʰɛla uɓulumkɔ ɓujasikǃinisa isilumkɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛʃumi laɓanɛɡ̤uɲa aɓakulɔ mz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akukʰɔ ulilunɡ̤isa ɛɬaɓatʰini wɛnz̤a ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ anɡ̤ɔni kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ukujinikɛla intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ kumaz̤wi ɔnkɛ atʰɛtʰwajɔ ukuz̤ɛ unɡ̤ɛv̤i umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ ɛsɛlɛkut͡ʃab̤isa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ najɔ ijaz̤i iz̤iɬanɮɔ ɛz̤ininz̤i ukuɓa ujaɓat͡ʃab̤isa aɓaɲɛ nawɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nd̤iz̤ilinɡ̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɔɓulumkɔ nd̤atʰi nd̤ija kɛ ɓɔna ɓaɓa kud̤ɛ haji ukuɓa kud̤ɛ kwɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤ikʰɔjɔ z̤inz̤ulu kakʰulu nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kuz̤ifumana nd̤ad͡ʒ̤ika kɛ nd̤anɛntliz̤ijɔ ɛnɡ̤a inɡ̤az̤i inɡ̤asinɡ̤asinɡ̤a ifumɛ uɓulumkɔ nɛsiɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɔ sɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤a inɡ̤akwaz̤i ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ukuɓa kukuɲaɓa nɔkumatʰa ukuɓa kukuɡ̤ɛz̤a nd̤ajifumana ik͡xak͡xa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔkufa inkaz̤ana ɛjijimiɡ̤iɓɛ ipʰɛla ɛz̤iz̤iɓatʰa intliz̤ijɔ jajɔ ɛz̤anɮa z̤inɡ̤amakʰamand̤ɛla ɔlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ pʰamɓi kɔtʰikǁɔ uja kusind̤a kujɔ kɛ jɛna umɔni uja kuɓand͡ʒ̤iswa jijɔ jaɓɔna intɔ ɛnd̤ijifumɛnɛjɔ it͡ʃɔ int͡ʃumajɛli nd̤iɬɔma ɛɲɛ kwɛɲɛ ukuɓa nd̤ifumanɛ isiɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɔ sɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a ɔɓumana ukujifuna umpʰɛfumlɔ nd̤inɡ̤ajifumani nant͡si ind̤ɔd̤a ɛɲɛ ɛwakɛni nd̤ijifumɛnɛ kɛ jɔna inkaz̤ana kulɔ lɔnkɛ and̤ijifumananɡ̤a jaɓɔna lɛ ntɔ jɔd̤wa nd̤ijifumɛnɛ jɔkuɓa utʰikǁɔ wamɛnz̤a watʰi tʲɛ kɛ ɓɔna ɓafunɛ uɓukǃili ɔɓuninz̤i nɡ̤uɓani ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsilumkɔ ɛsi nɡ̤uɓani ɔkwaz̤ijɔ ukukǀɔnd͡ʒ̤ululwa kwɛnd̤awɔ uɓulumkɔ ɓɔmntu ɓukʰaɲisa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ ɓuɡ̤ukǃulwɛ uɓunɡ̤waɲalala ɓɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ mna nd̤itʰi umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkumkani wuɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛsifunɡ̤ɔ sikatʰikǁɔ musa ukukuŋ̤ǁ̤amɛla ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ unɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni kwijɛlɛŋǃɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa intɔ jɔnkɛ ajinanz̤ilɛjɔ ujajɛnz̤a ɛkuɓɛni iliz̤wi lɔkumkani linɛɡ̤uɲa nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɔkutʰi kujɛ wɛnz̤a ntɔni ɔɡ̤ǀ̤ina umtʰɛtʰɔ akaz̤i ntɔ imɓi intliz̤ijɔ jɛsilumkɔ ijalaz̤i ikǁɛʃa nɛsi ɡ̤wɛɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jɔnkɛ imikǀimɓi inɛkǁɛʃa nɛsiɡ̤wɛɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓuɓi ɓɔmntu ɓuɓa ɓuninz̤i pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛnɡ̤ajaz̤i intɔ ɛja kuɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɔkumkǁɛlɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kuja kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ akukʰɔ unɔkuwuɡ̤uɲaz̤ɛla umɔja awutʰintɛlɛ umɔja akukʰɔ unɔkujiɡ̤uɲaz̤ɛla jɔkufa akukʰɔ kukʰululɛka kulɔɔ mfaz̤wɛ ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ akunakuɓasiz̤a aɓaninikɔ lɛ ntɔ jɔnkɛ nd̤ijiɓɔnilɛ nd̤ajinikɛla intliz̤ijɔ jam kwiz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɛnz̤iwajɔ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa atʰi aɡ̤uɲaz̤ɛlɛ kuɓɛ kuɓi kujɛ ɛkuɓɛni kund͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤iɓɔnɛ aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɓɛŋ̤ǀ̤watʲwa ɓɛɡ̤ɔd̤uka ɓɛsitʰi ɛnd̤awɛni ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓɛmkɛ aɓɔ ɓɛnz̤ɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɓalitʲalwɛ kulɔɔ mz̤i kwanalɔɔ ntɔ inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ ɛkuɓɛni isiɡ̤wɛɓɔ sinɡ̤awiswa kamsiɲanɛ ɛmsɛɓɛnz̤ini ɔmɓi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ intliz̤ijɔ jɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu iz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤apʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ kukwɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi nakuɓɛni umɔni ɛsɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi iz̤iɬanɮɔ ɛz̤ilikʰulu ajɔlulɛ imiɬa jakʰɛ nɔkɔ nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa kuja kulunɡ̤a kwaɓamɔjikajɔ utʰikǁɔ kwaɓɔjikajɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ kunɡ̤alunɡ̤i kɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ anɡ̤ajɔluli imiɬa jakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛtʰunz̤i ɛkuɓɛni ɛnɡ̤ɔjiki ɛɓuswɛni ɓukatʰikǁɔ kukʰɔ amampunɡ̤ɛ ɛnz̤ɛkajɔ ɛɬaɓatʰini ukuɓa kukʰɔ amalunɡ̤isa aɬɛlwa nɡ̤ɔkɔkwɛnz̤a kwaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kukʰɔ naɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ aɓaɬɛlwa nɡ̤ɔkɔkwɛnz̤a kwamalunɡ̤isa nd̤atʰi kwanalɔɔ ntɔ inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ nd̤aluŋǀɔma kɛ uv̤ujɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ ntɔ imlunɡ̤ɛlɛjɔ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔkuɓa aɮɛ asɛlɛ av̤ujɛ lɔɔ ntɔ itʰanɛ mɓɛnd̤ɛ najɛ ɛmiɡ̤ud̤wini jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔɓɔmi ɓakʰɛ amnikajɔ utʰikǁɔ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a kǁɛʃikwɛni nd̤ajinikɛlajɔ intliz̤ijɔ jam ukuɓa nd̤iɓaz̤i uɓulumkɔ nd̤iwuɓɔnɛ umz̤amɔ ɔwɛnz̤ɛkajɔ ɛɬaɓatʰini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nasɛmini nasɛɓusuku aɓaɓɔni ɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤amɛɬɔ aɓɔ nd̤asiɓɔna kɛ sɔnkɛ isɛnz̤ɔ sikatʰikǁɔ ukuɓa akanakɔ isɛnz̤ɔ ɛsɔ sɛnz̤ɛkajɔ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a nakuɓɛni ɛsapʰuka nɔkuɓa sitʰɛ isilumkɔ ukwaz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jɔnkɛ lɛ ntɔ nd̤ajiɲamɛkɛla nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jam nd̤ajiɬɛla jɔnkɛ lɛ ntɔ jɔkuɓa amalunɡ̤isa nɛz̤ilumkɔ nɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i jaɓɔ isɛsanɮɛni sikatʰikǁɔ nɔkutʰand̤a nɔkutʰija akukʰɔna ɛkwaz̤ini kwaɓantu lɛ ntɔ jɔnkɛ ɓasɛɓɛjimisɛlwɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤iɓaɬɛla nɡ̤ɔkufanajɔ ɓɔnkɛ siɲɛ isiɬɔ kwilunɡ̤isa nakɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kɔlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kɔɬamɓulukilɛjɔ nakɔjiŋǃamɓi kɔɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlajɔ nakɔnɡ̤aɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlijɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ and͡ʒ̤alɔ ɔlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ und͡ʒ̤alɔ nɔmɔni ɔfunɡ̤ajɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤alɔwɔ ukɔjikajɔ ukufunɡ̤a lɛ jintɔ ɛmɓi pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɛnz̤ɛkajɔ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a ukutʰi siɓɛ siɲɛ isiɬɔ kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ iɓɛ nɛntliz̤ijɔ jɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu iz̤ɛlɛ ɓuɓuɓi iɓuɓuɡ̤ɛz̤a ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jaɓɔ ɓɛsaɮa uɓɔmi ɛmv̤ɛni kwaɓɔ kujiwa kwaɓafilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kɔsukuɓa ɛɬɔɲɛlwa kwaɓasaɮa uɓɔmi kusɛkʰɔ itʰɛmɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ind͡ʒ̤a ɛsapʰililɛjɔ ilunɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ɛfilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓaɮa uɓɔmi ɓajaz̤i ukuɓa ɓaja kɛ ɓɔna aɓafilɛjɔ aɓaz̤i lutʰɔ aɓasaɓi namv̤uz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓalitʲɛlwɛ aɓasakʰund͡ʒ̤ulwa nɡ̤antɔ sɛlupʰɛlilɛ kad̤ɛ utʰand̤ɔ lwaɓɔ nɛntijɔ jaɓɔ nɛkʰwɛlɛ laɓɔ aɓasɛnasaɓɛlɔ napʰakad̤ɛ ɛz̤intwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɛnz̤ɛkajɔ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a jija uɮɛ isɔnka sakʰɔ unɔv̤ujɔ usɛlɛ iwajini jakʰɔ unɛntliz̤ijɔ ɛkǀʰwajitʰilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sɛkukad̤ɛ ɛkʰɔlisiwɛ utʰikǁɔ z̤iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤akʰɔ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɔ maz̤iɓɛ m̤lɔpʰɛ nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ nɛɔli majinɡ̤aswɛlɛki ɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɔ ɬala kakuɬɛ nɔmfaz̤i ɔmtʰand̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔnkɛ jɔɓɔmi ɓakʰɔ ɔɓunɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ akunikilɛjɔ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jakʰɔ jɔnkɛ ɛnɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sisaɓɛlɔ sakʰɔ ɛsɔ ɛɓɔmini nasɛmiɡ̤ud̤wini jakʰɔ ɔwapʰuka jijɔ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛsijifumanajɔ isanɮa sakʰɔ ukuɓa sijɛnz̤ɛ jɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤amanɮa akʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akukʰɔ kwɛnz̤a nakukǀinɡ̤a nakwaz̤i kwɛlaɓafilɛjɔ apʰɔ uja kʰɔna wɛna nd̤aɓuja nd̤aɓɔna pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a ukuɓa ukuɡ̤id̤ima asikɔkwaɓanamɛnd̤u imfaz̤wɛ asijɛjamaɡ̤ɔxa kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ isɔnka asisɛsɛz̤ilumkɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ uɓutʲɛɓi asiɓɔɓaɓanɛŋǃikǃɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ uɓaɓalɔ asilɔlwaɓanɔkwaz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓafikɛlwa likǁɛʃa nasisiɬɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akalaz̤i nɛkǁɛʃa lakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛntlanz̤i ɛz̤iɓand͡ʒ̤iswɛ nɡ̤ɔmnatʰa ɔmɓi nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛntaka ɛz̤iɓand͡ʒ̤iswɛ nɡ̤ɔmɡ̤iɓɛ ɓand͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuxintʲɛlwa kwaɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛliɓi kǁa liɓawɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛsikǃupʰɛ nalɛ ntɔ nd̤ijiɓɔnɛ iɓuɓulumkɔ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a ɓaɓukʰulu umz̤i ɔmŋǀinanɛ unamad̤ɔd̤a amɓalwa kwɛz̤a kuwɔ ɔmkʰulu wawuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a wawakʰɛla iimɓɔnisɛlɔ ɛz̤inkulu wafumana kuwɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛliɬwɛmpu inɔɓulumkɔ jɔna jawusiz̤a umz̤i nɡ̤ɔɓulumkɔ ɓajɔ kɛ akuɓanɡ̤akʰɔ uɓuja ajikʰumɓulɛ lɛ nd̤ɔd̤a iliɬwɛmpu nd̤atʰi kɛ ɓulunɡ̤ɛ uɓulumkɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa kɔd̤wa uɓulumkɔ ɓɛli ɬwɛmpu ɓud̤ɛlɛkilɛ namaz̤wi alɔ akav̤iwa amaz̤wi ɛz̤ilumkɔ ɛv̤iwɛ nɡ̤ɔkutʰɔz̤ama anɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔkuŋ̰ǃ̰anɡ̤az̤a kɔlawula pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤id̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ ɓulunɡ̤ɛ uɓulumkɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɔkulwa kɛ jɛna umɔni ɛmɲɛ ut͡ʃaɓalalisa ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɔkuninz̤i iimpukanɛ ɛz̤ifilɛjɔ z̤inukisa z̤iɓilisɛ amafutʰa ɔmkǃʰɔli uɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ ɔɓuŋǀinanɛ ɓunz̤ima kunɔɓulumkɔ nɔz̤ukɔ intliz̤ijɔ jɛsilumkɔ inɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ kwasɔ intliz̤ijɔ jɛsid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ inɡ̤asɛkʰɔɬɔ kwasɔ ɛwɛ nasɛnɮɛlɛni kǁa sitʰɛ isid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ sahamɓa nɡ̤ajɔ sijajiswɛla intliz̤ijɔ sihamɓɛ sisitʰi kuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ nd̤isisid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ ukuɓa ukufutʰa kɔmlawuli kutʰɛ kwɛɲuka kwakukǀʰasa ukujiʃija ind̤awɔ jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓulali ɓulɛlɛz̤a iz̤ɔnɔ ɛz̤ikʰulu kukʰɔ uɓuɓi ɛnd̤iɓuɓɔnilɛjɔ pʰant͡si kwɛlanɡ̤a ɔɓund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkulaɬɛka ɔkupʰuma kɔnɛɡ̤uɲa uɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ ɓunikwa iind̤awɔ ɛz̤ipʰɛz̤ulu ɛz̤inkulu z̤iɓɛ iz̤itʲɛɓi z̤iɬɛli kwiind̤awɔ ɛz̤ipʰant͡si kɛ nd̤iz̤iɓɔnɛ iz̤ikǀaka z̤ikʰwɛlɛ ɛmahaʃɛni namat͡ʃawɛ ɛhamɓa pʰant͡si nɡ̤ɛɛɲawɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ikǀaka ɔmɓa isiɡ̤iŋ̤ǃ̤i anɡ̤ɛjɛla kusɔ ɔkǀʰitʰa utʰanɡ̤ɔ iɲɔka inɡ̤amluma ɔmɓa amatʲɛ anɡ̤ɛnz̤akala ɔkǀand̤a anɡ̤aɓa sɛmŋ̤ǀ̤ipʰɛkwɛni ukuɓa int͡simɓi itʰɛ jaɓa ɓutʰuntu akalulɔla uɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwajɔ wɔɡ̤ɔɲɛla nɡ̤ɔkɔ nɡ̤amanɮa kɛ uɓulumkɔ ɓujaŋǀɛd̤a ɓulunɡ̤isɛ ukuɓa iɲɔka itʰɛ jaluma kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ kukʰafula akaɓi nanz̤uz̤ɔ umɲanɡ̤i amaz̤wi ɔmlɔmɔ wɛsilumkɔ anɔkuɓaɓala kɛ jɔna imilɛɓɛ jɔmlɔmɔ wɛsid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ iɡ̤iɲa kwasɔna iŋ̤ǃ̤alɔ jamaz̤wi ɔmlɔmɔ wasɔ ɓuɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ nɛŋ̤ǃ̤iɓɔ jɔmlɔmɔ wasɔ ɓuɓuɡ̤ɛz̤a ɔɓuɓi isid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ sand̤isa amaz̤wi ɛnɡ̤akwaz̤i ɔkuja kuɓakʰɔ nɔkuja kuɓakʰɔ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɔkumkǁɛlɛla imiɡ̤ud̤u jɛz̤id̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ ijaz̤ikǁʰamla ɛz̤inɡ̤akwaz̤ijɔ ukuja ɛmz̤ini jɛha wɛna liz̤wɛ unɡ̤umntwana limat͡ʃawɛ aɮa haji ujɔlɔ lwakʰɔ liz̤wɛ unɡ̤uɲana waɓanumz̤ana limat͡ʃawɛ aɮajɔ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛlililɔ ɛnɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɛnɡ̤ɛnamitʰaji nɡ̤ɔɓuv̤ila ijab̤ɛna imikǃad̤i nɡ̤ɔkutʰamɓa kwɛz̤anɮa ijanɛtʰa inɮu ɓɛnz̤a isiɮɔ ukuɓa ɓaɬɛkɛ iwajini iv̤ujisɛ uɓɔmi ilunɡ̤ɛlɛ iintɔ z̤ɔnkɛ musa ukumt͡ʃab̤isa nasɛsaz̤ɛlɛni sakʰɔ unɡ̤asit͡ʃab̤isi nɛsitʲɛɓi ɛz̤inɡ̤ɔnt͡sini z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔkulala nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jasɛnɮɛ jɔlihamɓisa ɛlɔ z̤wi nɛntɔ ɛnamapʰikɔ ijikǁɛlɛ lɔɔ ntɛtʰɔ sipʰɔsɛ isɔnka sakʰɔ pʰɛz̤u kwamanz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɔsifumana kwakuɓa z̤iint͡suku ɛz̤ininz̤i jaɬula iz̤aɬulɔ z̤iɓɛ sikǁʰɛŋǁɛ z̤iɓɛ sib̤ɔz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akujaz̤i intɔ ɛmɓi ɛja kuɓakʰɔ ɛɬaɓatʰini ukuɓa atʰɛ az̤ala jimv̤ula ajitʰululɛla ɛm̤laɓɛni ukuɓa umtʰi utʰɛ wab̤ɛka ɛz̤ant͡si nɔkuɓa utʰɛ wab̤ɛka ɛntla kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ uwɛ kujɔ umtʰi lɔwɔ wɔlala kʰɔna ɔɡ̤ǃ̤ala umɔja akaji kuɬwajɛla ɔkʰanɡ̤ɛla akaji kuv̤una nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɡ̤ajaz̤i ukuɓa jijipʰi inɮɛla jɔmɔja kwand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkujilwa kwamatʰamɓɔ ɛsiswini sɔmitʰijɔ nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ akusaz̤i isɛnz̤ɔ sikatʰikǁɔ ɔwɛnz̤a iz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ kusasa ɬwajɛla imɓɛwu jakʰɔ nanɡ̤ɔkuɬwa unɡ̤asipʰumz̤i isanɮa sakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɡ̤az̤i ukuɓa kɔlunɡ̤a jipʰi nɔkuɓa jilɛ nɔkuɓa jilɛja nɔkuɓa z̤ɔlunɡ̤a nɡ̤akuɲɛ z̤ɔmɓini kumnand̤i ukukʰaɲa kulunɡ̤ilɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni ukuliɓɔna ilanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukuɓa utʰɛ waɮa uɓɔmi imiɲaka ɛmininz̤i makav̤ujɛ nɡ̤ajɔ jɔnkɛ ipʰɛla nɔkɔ kɛ akʰumɓulɛ imiɬa jɔɓumɲama ukuɓa ija kuɓa mininz̤i jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛz̤ajɔ inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ v̤uja nd̤ɔd̤ana ɛɓut͡ʃɛni ɓakʰɔ ikukǀʰwajitʰisɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔɓud̤ɔd̤ana ɓakʰɔ uhamɓɛ nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛla z̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ nanɡ̤ɔkukʰanɡ̤ɛla kwamɛɬɔ akʰɔ kɔd̤wa jaz̤i ukuɓa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ utʰikǁɔ uja ɛmatʲalɛni jisusɛ kɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤umɓɔ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɔ uɓuɮulisɛ uɓuɓi ɛɲamɛni jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓut͡ʃa nɔɓud̤ɔd̤a ɓunɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ uz̤ɛ umkʰumɓulɛ kɛ umd̤ali wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔɓut͡ʃa ɓakʰɔ inɡ̤ɛkɛz̤i imiɬa jɔɓuɓi inɡ̤ɛkafiki imiɲaka ɔwɔtʰi nɡ̤ajɔ ajind̤ijɔlɛlɛ linɡ̤ɛkaɓi mɲama ilanɡ̤a nɔkukʰaɲa nɛɲanɡ̤a nɛɛnkwɛnkwɛz̤i ɛnɡ̤ɛkaɓuji ɛmv̤a kwɛmv̤ula lɔɔ ɓaja kunɡ̤ɛv̤ɛz̤ɛla aɓaɡ̤ǀ̤ini ɓɛnɮu aɡ̤ɔɓɛ amad̤ɔd̤a anɔɓuk͡xɔti z̤ijɛkɛ iintɔkaz̤i ɛz̤isilajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa z̤imɓalwa kuɓɛ mɲama kwaɓakʰanɡ̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛɛfɛstilɛ z̤iv̤alwɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤asɛsitratwɛni kwakuɓɔn ukuɓa sid̤amɓilɛ isand̤i sɔkusila ɛv̤uka kwaz̤isatʰɛtʰa z̤iŋǃwililɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iintɔmɓi z̤ɛnɡ̤ɔma nakǁɛʃikwɛni ɓaja kuz̤ɔjika iind̤awɔ ɛz̤ipʰakamilɛjɔ nɛɛntɔ ɛz̤ikǃʰipʰula umɓilini z̤iɓɛ sɛnɮɛlɛni utʲatʲamɓɛ umamanɡ̤ilɛ ukǀʰaɓakǀʰaɓasɛ umkǃʰatʰu ut͡ʃit͡ʃɛ umŋǃwɛnɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛsija ɛkʰajɛni lakʰɛ lapʰakad̤ɛ ɓad͡ʒ̤ikad͡ʒ̤ikɛ ɛz̤itratwɛni aɓamɓamɓaz̤ɛli inɡ̤ɛkakǃʰawuki intamɓɔ jɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ litʲumkɛ isɛlwa lɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ukǃʰɛkɛkɛ umpʰand̤a ɛmtʰɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛni japʰukɛ iv̤ili iwɛ ɛkǃulɛni lunɡ̤ɛkaɓujɛli ɛm̤laɓɛni utʰuli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓɛlund͡ʒ̤alɔ umɔja uɓujɛlɛ kutʰikǁɔ ɔwawunikajɔ amampunɡ̤ɛ awɔ amampunɡ̤ɛ it͡ʃɔ int͡ʃumajɛli intɔ jɔnkɛ inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔkɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa int͡ʃumajɛli iɓisisilumkɔ jamana iɓafund̤isa aɓantu ukwaz̤i jalinɡ̤anisɛla jaɓaɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀa jajila imiz̤ɛkɛlisɔ ɛmininz̤i int͡ʃumajɛli jafuna inɡ̤a inɡ̤afumana amaz̤wi anand̤ipʰɛkajɔ kutʰi nɔkub̤alwajɔ kulunɡ̤ɛ iɓɛ nɡ̤amaz̤wi ɛɲanisɔ amaz̤wi ɛz̤ilumkɔ and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛmv̤ikɔ and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ikʰɔnkwanɛ ɛz̤it͡ʃɔnisiwɛjɔ asɛz̤intlanɡ̤anisɛlɛni anikwɛ nɡ̤umalusi ɛmɲɛ nanɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔkɔ ɲana v̤usɛlɛlɛka ukwɛnz̤a iiŋǀwad̤i ɛz̤ininz̤i akunakupʰɛla nɔkupʰikɛla ukufund̤a ɔkuninz̤i kud̤inisa iɲama ukuɬanɡ̤aniswa kwɛntɛtʰɔ jakuɓa iv̤akɛlɛ intɔ jɔnkɛ jɔjika utʰikǁɔ uɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ imitʰɛtʰɔ jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ind̤awɔ lɛjɔ jimfanɛlɔ jɔluntu lɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ utʰikǁɔ uja kuz̤iz̤isa ɛkuɡ̤wɛtʲwɛni iz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ifiɬakɛlɛjɔ nɔkuɓa z̤ilunɡ̤ilɛ nɔkuɓa z̤imɓi inɡ̤ɔma jaz̤ɔ iinɡ̤ɔma ɛjɛkasɔlɔmɔn makand̤anɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkwanɡ̤a kɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iz̤iŋǀɔkɔlisɔ z̤akʰɔ z̤imnand̤i nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛwajini amafutʰa akʰɔ anɛv̤umɓa ɛlimnand̤i lijiɔli ɛtʰululwajɔ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ iintɔmɓi z̤ijakutʰand̤a nd̤it͡salɛ sɔɡ̤id̤ima ɛmv̤a kwakʰɔ ukuɓa und̤inɡ̤ɛnisɛ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɔnt͡sini z̤akʰɛ sɔɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓa siv̤ujɛ nɡ̤awɛ sɔz̤ikʰankaɲa iz̤iŋǀɔkɔlisɔ z̤akʰɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛwajini z̤ikutʰand̤a z̤iɲanisilɛ nd̤imɲama nd̤inɔmkʰitʰa nɔkɔ z̤intɔmɓi z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛntɛntɛ z̤akwakɛd̤arɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amalɛnɡ̤alɛnɡ̤a kasɔlɔmɔn musani ukund̤ikʰanɡ̤ɛla nɡ̤akuɓa nd̤ifɛ mɲama nɡ̤akuɓa nd̤it͡ʃɛ lilanɡ̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakama ɓand̤iv̤utʰɛla nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ ɓand̤ɛnz̤a umlind̤i wɛz̤id̤ilija kɛ ɛsisɛsam isid̤ilija and̤isilind̤anɡ̤a kʰawund̤ikǁilɛlɛ wɛna utʰand̤wa nɡ̤umpʰɛfumlɔ walusɛla pʰi ujiɓutʰisa pʰi imiɬamɓi ɛmini ɛnkulu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kunɡ̤ani ukuɓa nd̤iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɛjɔ nɡ̤asɛmiɬamɓini jamakʰɔlwanɛ akʰɔ ukuɓa akwaz̤i nz̤wakaz̤ind̤ini pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntɔkaz̤i pʰuma uhamɓɛ nɡ̤ɛmikʰɔnd̤ɔ jɔm̤lamɓi uwalusɛ amatakanɛ akʰɔ nɡ̤asɛmiŋǃuɓɛni jaɓalusi nd̤ikufanɛkisɛ wɛtʰu nɛhaʃɛ kwawɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ikafarɔ z̤inɔmkʰitʰa iz̤iɮɛlɛ z̤akʰɔ z̤iiŋ̤ǀ̤akǀa umkǃala wakʰɔ z̤iz̤id̤anɡ̤a sɔkwɛnz̤ɛla iiŋ̤ǀ̤akǀa z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛz̤inamakǃʰula ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ kǁa asɛsɛtafilɛni jakʰɛ inad̤usi jam ilikʰupʰɛ iv̤umɓa lajɔ sisikǃʰuma sɛmɔrɛ intand̤a jam ɛsiɬɛli pʰakatʰi kwamaɓɛlɛ sisiɬɔkɔ sɛkɔfɛrɛ intand̤a jam ɛz̤id̤ilijɛni z̤asɛɛnɡ̤ɛd̤i jaɓɔna ujinz̤wakaz̤i wɛtʰu jaɓɔna ujinz̤wakaz̤i amɛɬɔ akʰɔ and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awamav̤ukutʰu jaɓɔna ujinz̤wakaz̤i ntand̤a jam ɛwɛ umnand̤i umanɮalɔ wɛtʰu uluɬaz̤a imikǃad̤i jɛnɮu jɛtʰu jimisɛd̤arɛ iipanɛlɛ z̤ɛtʰu jimisiprɛs nd̤inɡ̤umfijɔ wasɛʃarɔn nd̤ijiɲiɓiɓa jasɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɲiɓiɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛminɡ̤a und͡ʒ̤alɔ uwɛtʰu pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntɔmɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmapilɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛmitʰi jɛɬatʰi ind͡ʒ̤alɔ intand̤a jam pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana nd̤aŋǃwɛna nd̤aɬala pʰant͡si ɛmtʰunz̤ini wawɔ nɛsikǃʰamɔ sawɔ sanɛŋǀasa ɛkʰuɬanɡ̤uɓɛni ind̤inɡ̤ɛnisɛ ɛnɮwini jɛwajini nɛb̤anilɛ jajɔ pʰɛz̤u lutʰand̤ɔ nd̤ikǁʰasɛni nɡ̤ɛz̤ikǀumɓa z̤ɛɛrasintʲisi nd̤isɛkɛlɛni nɡ̤ɛɛapilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤isifa lutʰand̤ɔ isanɮa sajɔ sɔkʰɔɬɔ sipʰant͡si kwɛntlɔkɔ jam ɛsɔkunɛnɛ sijand̤iwɔla z̤intɔmɓi z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm nd̤inifunɡ̤isa amab̤ad̤ikaz̤i namakǁʰamakaz̤i asɛnɮɛ ukuɓa ninɡ̤aluv̤usi ukuɓa ninɡ̤aluv̤usɛlɛli utʰand̤ɔ lud̤ɛ lutʰand̤ɛ pʰulapʰulani intand̤a jam nant͡sɔ isiz̤a it͡siɓa ɛz̤intaɓɛni imit͡si ɛz̤ind̤ulini intand̤a jam nɛb̤ad̤i nɛnkɔɲana jɛkǁʰama nant͡sɔ ɛmv̤a kɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a lwakɔkwɛtʰu itʰɛ nz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛɛfɛstilɛ iɲɔnɮa nɡ̤ɛk͡xɔɓa intand̤a jam jasusɛla jatʰi suk umɛ wɛtʰu nz̤wakaz̤i jam uz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujaɓɔna uɓusika ɓuɮulɛ imv̤ula iɡ̤ǃ̤itʰilɛ jɛmka iintʲantʲamɓɔ z̤iɓɔnakɛlɛ ɛz̤wɛni ikǁɛʃa lɔkuntʲilɔz̤a kwɛɛntaka lifikilɛ iz̤wi lɛhɔɓɛ iv̤akɛlɛ ɛz̤wɛni lɛtʰu umkʰiwanɛ uk͡xwala amakʰiwanɛ awɔ imid̤ilija itʲatʲamɓilɛ it͡ʃɔ nɡ̤ɛv̤umɓa ɛlimnand̤i suk umɛ wɛtʰu nz̤wakaz̤i jam uz̤ɛ v̤ukutʰu ɛlisɛmkǁawukɛni wɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa ɛnt͡sitʰɛlwɛni jɛmiɓa nd̤iɓɔnisɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ nd̤iv̤isɛ iliz̤wi lakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iz̤wi lakʰɔ limnand̤i uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ ɓunɔmkʰitʰa siɓamɓɛlɛni iimpunɡ̤utʲɛ iimpunɡ̤utʲɛ ɛz̤iŋǀinanɛ ɛz̤ɔnakalisa iz̤id̤ilija iz̤id̤ilija z̤ɛtʰu z̤itʲatʲamɓilɛ intand̤a jam jɛjam kɛ nd̤inɡ̤ɔwajɔ jalusɛla ɛz̤iɲiɓiɓɛni id̤ɛ ipʰɔlɛ ɔlukɛ amatʰunz̤i d͡ʒ̤ika ntand̤a jam ukǁɛlisɛ ib̤ad̤i ukǁɛlisɛ inkɔɲana jɛkǁʰama ɛz̤intaɓɛni ɛz̤iɓuɡ̤ǃ̤aɡ̤ala ɛsililini ɛɓusuku nd̤amfuna lɔwɔ utʰand̤wa nɡ̤umpʰɛfumlɔ nd̤amfuna and̤amfumana nd̤atʰi nd̤ɔkʰa nd̤iv̤ukɛ nd̤id͡ʒ̤ikad͡ʒ̤ikɛ pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɛmɓutʰɔ nasɛz̤itratwɛni nd̤ija lɔwɔ utʰand̤wa nɡ̤umpʰɛfumlɔ nd̤amfuna and̤amfumana aɓalind̤i aɓad͡ʒ̤ikad͡ʒ̤ika pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i ɓand̤ifumana nd̤atʰi kuɓɔ kʰɛ namɓɔna lɔwɔ utʰand̤wa nɡ̤umpʰɛfumlɔ nd̤itʰɛ nd̤isand̤ula ukuɮula kaŋǀinanɛ kuɓɔ nd̤amlumana lɔwɔ utʰand̤wajɔ nɡ̤umpʰɛfumlɔ nd̤amɓamɓa and̤amjɛka nd̤ad̤a nd̤amz̤isa ɛnɮwini ɛnɡ̤ɔnt͡sini jɔwand̤ikʰawulajɔ z̤intɔmɓi z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm nd̤inifunɡ̤isa amab̤ad̤ikaz̤i namakǁʰamakaz̤i asɛnɮɛ ukuɓa ninɡ̤aluv̤usi ukuɓa ninɡ̤aluv̤usɛlɛli utʰand̤ɔ lud̤ɛ lutʰand̤ɛ nɡ̤uɓani lɔ uɲuka ɛv̤ɛla ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmikǃulu jɔmsi ɛkǃʰuɲisɛlwa nɡ̤ɛmɔrɛ nɛntlaka ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ itʰatʲatʰwɛ ɛmiɡ̤utʲɛni jɔnkɛ jɔmxwɛɓi jaɓɔna sisiŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlɔ sikasɔlɔmɔn sipʰaɬwɛ nɡ̤amaɡ̤ɔxa anɡ̤amaʃumi amatʰand̤atʰu kumaɡ̤ɔxa akwasirajɛli ɔnkɛ apʰɛtʰɛ amak͡xɛlɛ afund̤iswɛ lilɛlɔ linɛk͡xɛlɛ ɛtʰanɡ̤ɛni lalɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔjika ɛɓusuku ukumkani usɔlɔmɔn uz̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ itʰala nɡ̤ɛmitʰi jasɛlɛb̤anɔn iint͡sika z̤alɔ uz̤ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ isajamɔ salɔ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ umkǃamɛlɔ walɔ nɡ̤ɛntɔ ɛmfusa umpʰakatʰi walɔ uɓɛkɛlɛlwɛ nɡ̤ɔtʰand̤ɔ luv̤ɛla ɛz̤intɔmɓini z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm pʰumani z̤intɔmɓi z̤asɛz̤ijɔn nimkʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ usɔlɔmɔn ɛnɛsit͡sʰaɓa awasiŋǁitʲwa nɡ̤unina nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkuz̤ɛka kwakʰɛ nanɡ̤ɛmini jɔkuv̤uja kwɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ jaɓɔna ujinz̤wakaz̤i wɛtʰu jaɓɔna ujinz̤wakaz̤i amɛɬɔ akʰɔ and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awamav̤ukutʰu nɡ̤apʰaja kwɛsiɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɔ sakʰɔ iinwɛlɛ z̤akʰɔ z̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔm̤lamɓi wɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɔsɛmatʰamɓɛkɛni ɛɛntaɓa z̤asɛɡ̤ilijad̤i amaz̤iɲɔ akʰɔ and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔm̤lamɓi wɛɛɡ̤uʃa ɛz̤ikǀʰɛtʲiwɛjɔ ɛz̤iɲukajɔ z̤iv̤ɛla ɛkuɬand͡ʒ̤wɛni z̤inamawɛlɛ z̤ɔnkɛ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ ifɛlwɛjɔ kuz̤ɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔsinɡ̤a ɔluɓɔmv̤u umlɔmɔ wakʰɔ ukutʰɛtʰa kwakʰɔ kumnand̤i z̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔtʰand̤a lwɛxarnatɛ iintlafunɔ z̤akʰɔ nɡ̤apʰaja kwɛsiɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɔ sakʰɔ intamɔ jakʰɔ ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛŋǃaɓa kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛjakʰiwɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛnd̤id̤i ɛkukǁʰɔɲwɛ kujɔ lɛɛnɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ ɔnkɛ amakʰaka amaɡ̤ɔxa amaɓɛlɛ akʰɔ ɔmaɓini and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amankɔɲana amaɓini anɡ̤amawɛlɛ ɛb̤ad̤i ɛsiɮa pʰakatʰi kwɛɛɲiɓiɓa id̤ɛ ipʰɔlɛ ɔlukɛ amatʰunz̤i nd̤ija kuhamɓa nd̤ijɛ ɛntaɓɛni jɛmɔrɛ nasɛnd̤ulini jɛntlaka ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ ujinz̤wakaz̤i kwapʰɛla wɛtʰu akukʰɔ sipʰakɔ kuwɛ jiz̤a siɬɛ ɛlɛb̤anɔn mt͡ʃakaz̤i jiz̤a siɬɛ ɛlɛb̤anɔn ufikɛ uɓɔnisɛlɛ ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛamana ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛsɛnirɛ nɛhɛrmɔn ɛz̤ikʰunɮɛni z̤ɛɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤ɛz̤inɡ̤wɛ ujiŋ̤ǁ̤wɛlɛxilɛ intliz̤ijɔ jam d̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu mt͡ʃakaz̤i ujiŋ̤ǁ̤wɛlɛxilɛ intliz̤ijɔ jam nɡ̤ɔmd͡ʒ̤ɛz̤ulɔ ɔmɲɛ nɡ̤amxukanɛ mɲɛ wɛsamɓalɔ sakʰɔ az̤i kuɬɛ ukuŋǀɔkɔlisa kwakʰɔ d̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu mt͡ʃakaz̤i az̤i kumnand̤i ukuŋǀɔkɔlisa kwakʰɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛwajini nɛv̤umɓa lamafutʰa akʰɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔɓulawu ɓupʰɛlɛlɛ umlɔmɔ wakʰɔ uv̤uz̤a iŋǀind̤i mt͡ʃakaz̤i ɓuɓusi nɡ̤apʰant͡si kɔlwimi lwakʰɔ iv̤umɓa lɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɔ lind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛv̤umɓa lɛlɛb̤anɔn nɡ̤umjɛz̤ɔ ɔɓijɛlwɛjɔ ud̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu umt͡ʃakaz̤i nɡ̤umɡ̤ɔɡ̤ɔɡ̤ɔ ɔv̤aliwɛjɔ lilisɔ lɔmtʰɔmɓɔ ɛlitʲwiniwɛjɔ amaɬumɛlɔ akʰɔ nɡ̤umjɛz̤ɔ wɛmixarnatɛ kuɲɛ nɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ ɛz̤imnand̤i kakʰulu ikɔfɛrɛ kuɲɛ nɛnad̤usi inad̤usi nɛsafrɔn ikalamɔ nɛsinamɔn kuɲɛ nɛmitʰi jɔnkɛ jɛntlaka ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ imɔrɛ nɛhalɔti kuɲɛ nɔɓulawu ɓɔnkɛ ɔɓujintlɔkɔ ulilisɔ lɔmtʰɔmɓɔ lasɛmijɛz̤wɛni ikǃula lamanz̤i apʰililɛjɔ nɛmikǃukukǃɛla jamanz̤i jasɛlɛb̤anɔn v̤uka mɔja wasɛntla uz̤ɛ nawɛ wasɛz̤ant͡si pʰɛpʰɛz̤ɛla ɛmjɛz̤wɛni ɓukǃukukǃɛlɛ uɓulawu ɓawɔ majinɡ̤ɛnɛ intand̤a jam ɛmjɛz̤wɛni wajɔ iɮɛ isikǃʰamɔ ɛsimnand̤i kakʰulu nd̤inɡ̤ɛnilɛ ɛmjɛz̤wɛni d̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu mt͡ʃakaz̤i nd̤ijikʰilɛ imɔrɛ jam kuɲɛ nɛtʲɛlɛɓa nd̤ijiɮilɛ intlanɡ̤ɔ jam kuɲɛ nɛŋǀind̤i jam nd̤ijisɛlɛ iwajini jam kuɲɛ jiɮani ɓɛtʰu sɛlani niɓɛ mnand̤i z̤intand̤a nd̤ilɛlɛ jɔna intliz̤ijɔ jam ipʰapʰamilɛ jiv̤a nant͡sɔ intand̤a jam iŋ̰ǃ̰ɔŋ̰ǃ̰ɔz̤a isitʰi nd̤iv̤ulɛlɛ d̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu v̤ukutʰu ŋ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛli jam nɡ̤ɔkuɓa intlɔkɔ jam iz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤umɓɛtʰɛ isiɬwitʰa siz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤amatʰɔnt͡si ɔɓusuku nd̤atʰi sɛnd̤ikʰululɛ nɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jam janɡ̤apʰant͡si nd̤ɔtʰini ukuɓuja nd̤iŋǁiɓɛ sɛnd̤iz̤iɬamɓilɛ iiɲawɔ z̤am nd̤ɔtʰini ukuɓuja nd̤iz̤idʲɔb̤ɛ intand̤a jam jasɔlula isanɮa sajɔ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɔɓa kwasika ɛsiswini nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jajɔ nd̤av̤uka nd̤aja kujiv̤ulɛla intand̤a jam nɛz̤anɮa z̤am z̤av̤uz̤a imɔrɛ nɛminwɛ jam imɔrɛ ɛjiv̤uz̤ɛlajɔ ɛsipʰatʰwɛni sɛsit͡ʃikǁɔ nd̤ajiv̤ulɛla intand̤a jam kɛ jɔna intand̤a jam iɓid͡ʒ̤ikɛ jɛmka nd̤ɛmkɛlwa nɡ̤umɓilini jakutʰɛtʰa nd̤ajifuna and̤ajifumana nd̤ajiɓiz̤a ajasaɓɛla ɓand̤ifumana aɓalind̤i aɓad͡ʒ̤ikad͡ʒ̤ika pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i ɓand̤iɓɛtʰa ɓand̤ilimaz̤a aɓalind̤i ɓɛɛnd̤ɔnɡ̤a ɓand̤ilulutʰa inɡ̤uɓɔ jam jɔkwalɛka ɛk͡xɛlɛk͡xɛlɛ nd̤ijanifunɡ̤isa z̤intɔmɓi z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm ukuɓa nitʰɛ najifumana intand̤a jam intɔ ɛnɔjikǁɛlɛla jɔna nɔtʰi nd̤ijafa lutʰand̤ɔ ijintɔni intand̤a jakʰɔ kunɛz̤iɲɛ iintand̤a wɛna nz̤wakaz̤ind̤ini pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntɔkaz̤i ijintɔni intand̤a jakʰɔ kunɛz̤iɲɛ ukuɓa wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukusifunɡ̤isa intand̤a jam ikǃakǃamɓilɛ ijiŋ̤ǃ̤ɔmɓɛla ijɛjɔnɡ̤amilɛjɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u aliʃumi intlɔkɔ jajɔ ijiɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛnɡ̤iwɛjɔ ɛkǀikiz̤ɛkilɛjɔ isiɬwitʰa sajɔ siz̤iind̤uli nɡ̤ɛɛnd̤uli simɲama nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɬunɡ̤ulu amɛɬɔ ajɔ and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awamav̤ukutʰu ɛnɡ̤asɛmifulɛni jamanz̤i ɛz̤iɬamɓa nɡ̤amasi ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amatʲɛ afakwɛ kakuɬɛ iz̤iɮɛlɛ z̤ajɔ z̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmitʲinɔ jɛtʲɛlɛɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a z̤ɛz̤itʲalɔ z̤ɔkukǃʰɔla umlɔmɔ wajɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛɲiɓiɓa uv̤uz̤a imɔrɛ ɛz̤iv̤uz̤ɛlajɔ iz̤anɮa z̤ajɔ z̤iintɔnɡ̤a z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ z̤ifakwɛ amatʲɛ asɛtarʃiʃɛ isiɓili sajɔ silupʰɔnd̤ɔ lwɛnɮɔv̤u luk͡xwilwɛ nɡ̤ɛsafirɛ imilɛnz̤ɛ jajɔ z̤iint͡sika z̤ɛmarmɔrɛ ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ z̤ifakwɛ ɛz̤isɛkwɛni z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛnɡ̤iwɛjɔ isitʰɔmɔ sajɔ sind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlɛb̤anɔn sisiɬɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmisɛd̤arɛ ikʰuɬanɡ̤uɓɔ lajɔ linɔɓumnand̤i iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkilɛ jɔna ipʰɛla jijɔ lɛjɔ intand̤a jam nɡ̤ujɛ lɔwɔ uwɛtʰu z̤intɔmɓi z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm ijɛ pʰi intand̤a jakʰɔ wɛna nz̤wakaz̤ind̤ini pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntɔkaz̤i ib̤ɛkɛ nɡ̤apʰi intand̤a jakʰɔ ukuz̤ɛ sikufunisɛ intand̤a jam iɬɛ jaja ɛmjɛz̤wɛni wajɔ ɛmitʲinwɛni jɛtʲɛlɛɓa ukuɓa jalusɛlɛ ɛmjɛz̤wɛni ukuɓa ikʰɛ iiɲiɓiɓa mna nd̤inɡ̤ɔwɛntand̤a jam nɛntand̤a jam jɛjam jɔna jalusɛla ɛz̤iɲiɓiɓɛni ujinz̤wakaz̤i wɛtʰu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛtirt͡sa unɔmkʰitʰa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛjɛrusalɛm wɔjikɛka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmikʰɔsi ɛnɛɛb̤anilɛ wasusɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa and̤ikǃwɛlilɛ iinwɛlɛ z̤akʰɔ z̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔm̤lamɓi wɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛz̤isɛmatʰamɓɛkɛni asɛɡ̤ilijad̤i amaz̤iɲɔ akʰɔ and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔm̤lamɓi wɛɛmaz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa ɛz̤iɲukajɔ z̤iv̤ɛla ɛkuɬand͡ʒ̤wɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤iz̤ɛlɛ amawɛlɛ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ ifɛlwɛjɔ kuz̤ɔ z̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔtʰand̤a lwɛxarnatɛ iintlafunɔ z̤akʰɔ nɡ̤apʰaja kwɛsiɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɔ sakʰɔ ɓanɡ̤amaʃumi amatʰand̤atʰu ɔɔkumkanikaz̤i anɡ̤amaʃumi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ amaʃwɛʃwɛ nɛɛntɔmɓi ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnakuɓalwa mɲɛ jɛna ɔliv̤ukutʰu ɔjiŋ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛli jam mɲɛ jɛna umɲulwa walɔwɔ wamz̤alajɔ z̤amɓɔna iintɔmɓi z̤atʰi unɔjɔlɔ ɓamd̤umisa ɔɔkumkanikaz̤i namaʃwɛʃwɛ nɡ̤uɓani lɔ utʰi ɡ̤ǃ̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsifinɡ̤ɔ m̤lɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a uɲulu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlanɡ̤a wɔjikɛka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmikʰɔsi ɛnɛɛb̤anilɛ ɓɛnd̤iɬɛ nd̤aja ɛmjɛz̤wɛni wɛminɔti ukuɓa nd̤ikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ uɬaz̤a lwɛsiɬamɓɔ nd̤ikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ukuɓa umd̤ilija unamatʰupʰa imixarnatɛ itʲatʲamɓilɛ ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤az̤i ukuɓa umpʰɛfumlɔ und̤iɓɛkɛ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛlwɛni z̤aɓantu ɓam z̤amanɛnɛ ɓuja ɓuja mʃulamikaz̤i ɓuja ɓuja sikuɓɔnɛ niɓɔna ntɔni kumʃulamikaz̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤atʰi kukukǃamɓa kwaɓamahanajim az̤i kuɬɛ ukuɲatʰɛla kwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛɛmɓad̤ad̤a ntɔmɓi jɛnɛnɛ iz̤imɓɔ z̤amaŋǃɛ akʰɔ z̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤id̤anɡ̤a umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛz̤anɮa z̤ɛŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi inkaɓa jakʰɔ sisid̤ɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ ɛsijiŋǃila masinɡ̤aswɛli iwajini ɛpʰitʰikɛz̤iwɛjɔ isisu sakʰɔ sisid̤imɓilili sɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa siɓijɛlwɛ nɡ̤ɛɛɲiɓiɓa amaɓɛlɛ akʰɔ ɔmaɓini and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amankɔɲana ɛb̤ad̤i amankɔɲana amaɓini ɛb̤ad̤i anɡ̤amawɛlɛ intamɔ jakʰɔ ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛŋǃaɓa jɔpʰɔnd̤ɔ lwɛnɮɔv̤u amɛɬɔ akʰɔ nɡ̤amakǀʰiɓi asɛhɛʃb̤ɔn nɡ̤asɛsanɡ̤wɛni lajɔ inaɓantu aɓaninz̤i impumlɔ jakʰɔ ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛŋǃaɓa jasɛlɛb̤anɔn ɛb̤ɛkɛ ɛd̤amaskɔ intlɔkɔ jakʰɔ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkarmɛlɛ uɓujakajaka ɓɛntlɔkɔ jakʰɔ ɓund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔsinɡ̤a ɔlumfusa ukumkani ukʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰wɛ nɡ̤ɛɛnd͡ʒ̤ikɔ z̤aɓɔ az̤i um̤lɛ az̤i umnand̤i lutʰand̤ɔ ɛz̤ijɔlwɛni iwɔnɡ̤a lakʰɔ ɛli nɔmtʰi wɛsund̤u amaɓɛlɛ akʰɔ nɛz̤iɬɔkɔ z̤ɔmd̤ilija nd̤atʰi nd̤ija kumiɲa ɛmtʰini wɛsund̤u nd̤ija kuɓamɓɛlɛla ɛmaɡ̤ǃ̤aɓini awɔ amaɓɛlɛ akʰɔ makaɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤iɬɔkɔ z̤ɔmd̤ilija nɛv̤umɓa lɛmpumlɔ jakʰɔ liɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛapilɛ nɛkʰuɬanɡ̤uɓɔ lakʰɔ liɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛwajini lɛ ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ iɬa kamnand̤i kwintand̤a jam iɓanɡ̤a ukuɓa utʰɛtʰɛ umlɔmɔ waɓalɛlɛjɔ mna nd̤inɡ̤ɔwɛntand̤a jam kukum ukuŋ̤ǁ̤amɛla kwajɔ hamɓa ntand̤a jam sipʰumɛ sijɛ ɛmapʰanɮɛni silalɛ ɛmiz̤anɛni masiv̤ukɛ sijɛ ɛz̤id̤ilijɛni siɓɔnɛ ukuɓa umd̤ilija unamatʰupʰa iintʲantʲamɓɔ z̤awɔ z̤ib̤ɛŋǃɛkilɛ imixarnatɛ itʲatʲamɓilɛ nd̤ɔkunika apʰɔ iz̤iŋǀɔkɔlisɔ z̤am amatʰuma apʰa anɛv̤umɓa pʰɛz̤u kwɛmiɲanɡ̤ɔ jɛtʰu z̤iz̤ikǃʰamɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ ɛz̤imnand̤i kakʰulu ɛz̤it͡ʃa kwanɛz̤id̤ala ɛnd̤iz̤ikǃwɛɓɛlɛ wɛna ntand̤a jam akwaɓa uɓund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmnakwɛtʰu ɔɓɛsaɲa amaɓɛlɛ ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤atʰi nd̤ikufumɛnɛ pʰanɮɛ nd̤ikwanɡ̤ɛ ɓanɡ̤and̤id̤ɛli nɔkɔ ɓɛnd̤ija kukukǃʰuɓa ɓɛnd̤ija ɛnɮwini uɓuja kund̤ifund̤isa ɓɛnd̤ija kukusɛz̤a iwajini ɛkǃʰɔliwɛjɔ nɛŋǀind̤i jɔmxarnatɛ isanɮa sajɔ sɔkʰɔɬɔ ɓɛsija kuɓa pʰant͡si kwɛntlɔkɔ jam ɛsɔkunɛnɛ sajɔ sind̤iwɔlɛ z̤intɔmɓi z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm nd̤ijanifunɡ̤isa ninɡ̤atʰini ukuluv̤usa ninɡ̤atʰini ukuluv̤usɛlɛla utʰand̤ɔ lud̤ɛ lutʰand̤ɛ nɡ̤uɓani lɔ uɲuka ɛv̤ɛla ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛsajama intand̤a jakʰɛ nɡ̤apʰant͡si kɔmapilɛ lɔ nd̤akuv̤usa wɛna kʰɔna apʰa waɓa nɛnimɓa nɡ̤awɛ uɲɔkɔ kʰɔna apʰa waɓa nɛnimɓa ɔwakuz̤alajɔ nd̤iɓɛkɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɛsanɛ wɔkutʲwina ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɛsanɛ wɔkutʲwina ɛnɡ̤alwɛni jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰand̤ɔ lund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkufa ukuɓa nɛŋ̤ǀ̤wanɡ̤u uɓukʰwɛlɛ
