uasirija lik͡xɛlɛ ɛlinɡ̤ɛlɛland̤ɔd̤a limɮɛ ik͡xɛlɛ ɛlinɡ̤ɛlɛlamntu asaɓɛ pʰamɓi kwɛk͡xɛlɛ amad̤ɔd̤ana akʰɛ afakwɛ uv̤ikɔ iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa jakʰɛ jɔɮula imkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuŋǁunɡ̤upʰala ɓakǃʰipʰukɛ umɓilini aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ ɓɛmkɛ kwib̤anilɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔmlilɔ usɛz̤ijɔn ɔz̤ikɔ lisɛjɛrusalɛm jaɓɔna uja nɡ̤ɔkɔɓulunɡ̤isa aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓatʰɛtʰɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ aɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ jɔkuz̤imɛla umɔja nɛjɔkusitʰɛla ɛsipʰanɡ̤wɛni aɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ jamanz̤i ɛmkǃwɛɓɛd̤wini nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmtʰunz̤i wɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa ɛnkulu ɛz̤wɛni ɛlib̤axilɛjɔ akaji kuv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wa amɛɬɔ aɓaɓɔnajɔ z̤iɓaz̤ɛkɛ iinɮɛɓɛ z̤aɓɛv̤ajɔ jɔkǃɔnd̤a ukwaz̤i intliz̤ijɔ jaɓaŋ̤ǁ̤amajɔ lwaɓatʰintitʰajɔ luŋ̤ǁ̤amisɛ ukutʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔkutʰɛ tʰʲatʰʲasini isid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ akuji kuɓa satʰiwa silinɛnɛ it͡ʃiv̤ɛla akuji kutʰiwa lilinɔnɔ kuɓa isid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ sitʰɛtʰa uɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ intliz̤ijɔ jasɔ jɛnz̤a uɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a ukuz̤ɛ sɛnz̤ɛ uɓuɓi sitʰɛtʰa intɔ jɔkub̤ud̤a nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a silamɓatʰisɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wɔlamɓilɛjɔ simswɛlisɛ ɔŋǁaniwɛjɔ intɔ ɛsɛlwajɔ uɓut͡ʃiv̤ɛla ɓɛt͡ʃiv̤ɛla ɓuɓi likǀɛɓa amajɛlɛŋǃɛ ɔkɔnakalisa iint͡siz̤ana nɡ̤amaz̤wi ɔɓukǁɔki nakǁa iɬwɛmpu litʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔkusɛsikwɛni inɛnɛ lɔna likǀɛɓa iz̤intɔ z̤ɔɓunɛnɛ lɔna nɡ̤ɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔɓunɛnɛ ɓafaz̤i ɓatʲɛʃilɛjɔ nimɛ liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi z̤intɔmɓi z̤inɡ̤akʰatʰalijɔ jiɓɛkɛlɛni inɮɛɓɛ intɛtʰɔ jam ija kuɓa z̤iint͡suku nɔkuɓa nɡ̤umɲaka niɡ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤ɛ z̤intɔkaz̤i z̤inɡ̤akʰatʰalijɔ kuɓa kupʰɛlilɛ ukuv̤una iz̤id̤ilija ukuɓutʰa iz̤ikǃʰamɔ akuji kuɓakʰɔ nakaɲɛ ɡ̤ub̤ani z̤intɔkaz̤i z̤itʲɛʃilɛjɔ ɡ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤ani z̤intɔkaz̤i z̤inɡ̤akʰatʰalijɔ ɬuɓani nikǀʰuʃuluz̤ɛ nib̤iŋǃɛ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ ɛmaŋǃɛni ɓaja kuɓɛtʰa ɛmaɓɛlɛni nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamasimi aŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛmid̤ilija ɛnɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ kuja kupʰuma imitʰi ɛnamɛv̤a namakʰakakʰaka ɛm̤laɓɛni waɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu ɛwɛ napʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛmiɬali kumz̤i ɔɮamkilɛjɔ kuɓa iiŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ z̤ilaɬiwɛ iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jɔmz̤i iʃijiwɛ iɔfɛlɛ nɛmɓɔnisɛlɔ z̤iz̤a kuɓa jimikǃɔlɔmɓa nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ z̤iɓɛ z̤iind̤awɔ z̤ɔkuɮamkɛla kwamaɛsilɛ asɛnɮɛ z̤iɓɛ liɮɛlɔ lɛmiɬamɓi ad̤ɛ aɡ̤alɛlwɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu umɔja ɔpʰuma pʰɛz̤ulu isukɛ intlanɡ̤ɔ iɓɛ jint͡simi ɛkǀʰumajɔ int͡simi ɛkǀʰumajɔ kutʰiwɛ liɬatʰi ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ kɛ kuja ɔkusɛsikwɛni ɓuɬalɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa ɛnt͡simini ɛkǀʰumajɔ wɔtʰi umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɔɓulunɡ̤isa uɓɛ lukǁɔlɔ nɔkwɛnz̤a kɔɓulunɡ̤isa kuɓɛ kukuz̤ɔla nɔkukʰɔlɔsa nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ aɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu ɓaja kuɬala ɛsitʰilini ɛsinɔkǁɔlɔ ɛmiŋǃuɓɛni jɛnkɔlɔsɛkɔ ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔkupʰumla ɛz̤inɔkɔnwaɓa kuja kupʰalala iz̤ikǀʰɔtʰɔ ɛkuwɛni kwɛɬatʰi uɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ulɛlwɛ umz̤i ɛnd̤awɛni ɛpʰant͡si haji ujɔlɔ lwɛnu ɓaɬwajɛla nɡ̤asɛmanz̤ini ɔnkɛ ɓajɛkɛlɛ amaŋǃina ɛnkɔmɔ nawɛɛsilɛ jɛha kɛ mb̤ukǃi wɛna kɛ unɡ̤ab̤ukǃwanɡ̤a nɡ̤ininɡ̤ini wɛna kɛ unɡ̤at͡ʃiniz̤ɛlwanɡ̤a wakuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa ukub̤ukǃa uja kub̤ukǃwa wakukufɛz̤a ukunɡ̤iniz̤a uja kunɡ̤iniz̤ɛlwa jɛhɔv̤a siɓaɓalɛ sitʰɛmɓɛlɛ kuwɛ jiɓa jinɡ̤alɔ jaɓɔ imisɔ nɡ̤ɛmisɔ jiɓa lusind̤isɔ kutʰi nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ z̤ijapʰalapʰaliswa iz̤iz̤wɛ liliz̤wi lɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ z̤ijapʰanɡ̤alaliswa iintlanɡ̤a kukupʰakama kwakʰɔ ɔɬanɡ̤aniswa ɛmkɛ amakǁʰɔɓa ɛnu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɬanɡ̤anisa kwɛɛnkumɓi ɛz̤iŋǃuŋǃutʰajɔ ɓawakǃukǃuz̤ɛlɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkukǃukǃuz̤ɛla kɔmkǃikɛla ujɛhɔv̤a upʰakamilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɬɛli pʰɛz̤ulu ujiz̤alisilɛ iz̤ijɔn nɡ̤ɔkusɛsikwɛni nanɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa kuja kuɓakʰɔ ukuz̤imasɛka kwamakǁɛʃa akʰɔ nɔɓutʲɛɓi ɓɔsind̤isɔ nɔɓulumkɔ nɔkwaz̤i ukɔjika ujɛhɔv̤a ɓuɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓakʰɛ jaɓɔna iind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlɛ z̤aɓɔ z̤ijakʰala nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ aɓatʰuɲwa ɓɔkǁɔlɔ ɓalila nɡ̤ɔkuk͡xak͡xa iinɮɛla az̤ihand͡ʒ̤wa um̤amɓi upʰɛlilɛ uwapʰulɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ukǀɛkisɛ imiz̤i akakʰatʰalɛla iliz̤wɛ lɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili lint͡ʃwɛɲilɛ inɛɛntlɔni ilɛb̤anɔn iʃwaɓɛnɛ iʃarɔn isukɛ jaɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsi iv̤utʰulula amaɡ̤ǃ̤aɓi ib̤aʃan nɛkarmɛlɛ kunɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤ija nd̤imɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kunɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤ija kupʰakama kunɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤ija kuz̤iɲusa nija kumitʰa isikʰɔtʰa niz̤alɛ iind̤iz̤a ukufutʰa kwɛnu nɡ̤umlilɔ ɔja kuniɮa iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɔɓa jimit͡ʃisɔ jɛkalika z̤ɔɓa jimitʰi ɛnamɛv̤a ɛɬaɬiwɛjɔ iɓaswɛ umlilɔ jiv̤ani ɓakud̤ɛ ɛnd̤ikwɛnz̤ilɛjɔ niɓaz̤i uɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓam ɓasɔnd̤ɛlɛjɔ ɓajankwantʲa ɛz̤ijɔn aɓɔni aɓaz̤iint͡ʃɛmɓɛŋǁa ɓaɓand͡ʒ̤wɛ kukutʰutʰumɛla ɓatʰi nɡ̤uɓani kɛ kutʰi ɔnɔkupʰamɓukɛla ɛmlilwɛni ɔɮajɔ nɡ̤uɓani kɛ kutʰi ɔnɔkupʰamɓukɛla ɛmalanɡ̤atʲɛni anɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ɔhamɓa nɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɔtʰɛtʰa ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɔkǀɛkisa inz̤uz̤ɔ jɔkukǀud̤isa ɔv̤utʰulula isanɮa sakʰɛ sinɡ̤apʰatʰi sikǀɛnɡ̤ɔ ɔv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤a iinɮɛɓɛ z̤akʰɛ z̤inɡ̤ɛv̤i nɡ̤ɛɡ̤az̤i ɔkǀima amɛɬɔ akʰɛ anɡ̤akʰanɡ̤ɛli ɛntwɛni ɛmɓi nɡ̤ujɛ ɔja kuɬala ɛz̤ind̤awɛni ɛz̤ipʰɛz̤ulu iimɓɔnisɛlɔ z̤ɛɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa jiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɛ jakʰɛ isɔnka sakʰɛ usinikiwɛ amanz̤i akʰɛ aɬɛli ɛkʰɔ amɛɬɔ akʰɔ aja kumkʰanɡ̤ɛla ɛɓuɬɛni ɓakʰɛ aja kuliɓɔna iliz̤wɛ ɛlisinɡ̤isɛ kud̤ɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ ija kukǀamanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛsɔtʰusɔ itʰi upʰi umɓali upʰi umlinɡ̤anisɛli upʰi umɓali wɛɛŋǃaɓa ɛz̤ind̤ɛ aɓantu aɓaz̤iinɡ̤waɲalala akuji kuɓaɓɔna aɓantu aɓantɛtʰɔ inz̤ulu inɡ̤av̤akalijɔ aɓalulwimi lutʰintitʰajɔ lunɡ̤ɛnakukǃɔnd̤ɛka kʰanɡ̤ɛla iz̤ijɔn umz̤i wɛmitʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ jɛtʰu amɛɬɔ akʰɔ aja kujiɓɔna ijɛrusalɛm isitʰili ɛsinɔkɔnwaɓa ijintɛntɛ ɛnɡ̤afud̤uswajɔ ɛz̤ikʰɔnkwanɛ z̤inɡ̤aŋǀɔtʰulwajɔ napʰakad̤ɛ ɛz̤intamɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤inɡ̤akǃʰawukijɔ ɛwɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛtʰu ikʰɔna inɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa ujɛhɔv̤a jind̤awɔ ɛnɛmilamɓɔ ɛnɛmid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ ɛɓanz̤i nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔmɓini akuji kuhamɓa siŋǃanawa sib̤ɛkǃwajɔ apʰɔ kunɡ̤awɛli kʰɔna ŋǃanawa ijinɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa kuɓa umɡ̤wɛɓi wɛtʰu nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ummisimtʰɛtʰɔ wɛtʰu nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɛtʰu nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a uja kusisind̤isa jɛna z̤itʲɛkɛtʲɛkɛ iintamɓɔ z̤akʰɔ az̤iluɓamɓi usɛkɔ lwɛmasti jaz̤ɔ az̤ijitwaɓululi isɛjilɛ kuja kwand̤ula kwaɓiwɛ amakǁʰɔɓa amaninz̤i atʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛjɔ nɛz̤ikǃʰwala z̤ipʰanɡ̤ɛ ɔkupʰanɡ̤iwɛjɔ akaji kutʰi wakʰɔna nd̤ijafa aɓantu aɓaɬɛlijɔ kʰɔna ɓaɓukǁɔlɛlwɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ sɔnd̤ɛlani z̤intlanɡ̤a niv̤ɛ niɓaz̤ɛ iinɮɛɓɛ z̤iz̤wɛ maliv̤ɛ iɬaɓatʰi nɛnz̤alisɛkɔ jalɔ ɛlimiwɛjɔ nɛz̤iv̤ɛlisɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iv̤ɛliswa lilɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓuxalaxumɛ ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɓupʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ nɔɓuʃuʃu ɓakʰɛ ɓupʰɛz̤u kɔmkʰɔsi waz̤ɔ wɔnkɛ uz̤isinɡ̤ɛlɛ pʰant͡si uz̤inikɛlɛ ɛkusikwɛni ɓaja kulaɬwa aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ ɓaz̤ɔ nɛz̤id̤umɓu z̤aɓɔ kuɲukɛ kwaz̤ɔ kuɲiɓilikɛ iintaɓa liɡ̤az̤i laz̤ɔ uja kuv̤und̤a wɔnkɛ umkʰɔsi wɛz̤ulu lisɔnɡ̤wɛ iz̤ulu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛŋǀwad̤i wɔnkɛ umkʰɔsi walɔ uɓunɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓuna kwɛɡ̤ǃ̤aɓi ɛmd̤ilijɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓuna kwɛɡ̤ǃ̤aɓi ɛmkʰiwanɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lisɛlɛ laɬutʰa ɛz̤ulwini ik͡xɛlɛ jaɓɔna liɬa pʰɛz̤u kɔɛd̤ɔm napʰɛz̤u kwaɓantu ɛnd̤iɓasinɡ̤ɛlɛ pʰant͡si iɓɛ nɡ̤umɡ̤wɛɓɔ ik͡xɛlɛ likajɛhɔv̤a liz̤ɛlɛ liɡ̤az̤i litʲɛtʲiswɛ nɡ̤amaŋǃatʰa liɡ̤az̤i lɛɛmv̤ana nɛlɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ nɡ̤amaŋǃatʰa ɛz̤int͡sɔ z̤ɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a unɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛb̤ɔt͡sɛra nɔkukǁʰɛla ɔkukʰulu ɛz̤wɛni lakwaɛd̤ɔm kuja kuɬa iŋǃu kuɲɛ naz̤ɔ iinkunz̤i ɛz̤int͡ʃa kuɲɛ nɛɛnkaɓi lisɛlɛ liɬutʰɛ iliz̤wɛ laɓɔ liɡ̤az̤i lutʲɛtʲiswɛ utʰuli lwaɓɔ nɡ̤amaŋǃatʰa kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a unɔm̤la wɛmpind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ unɔmɲaka wɛmɓujɛkɛz̤ɔ wɔkutʰɛtʰɛlɛla iz̤ijɔn jɔɡ̤ukǃuka imilamɓɔ jaɓɔ iɓɛ jitɛla utʰuli lwaɓɔ luɓɛ jisulfurɛ iliz̤wɛ laɓɔ liɓɛ jitɛla ɛt͡ʃajɔ aliji kukǀiɲwa uɓusuku nɛmini walɔ uja kuɲuka nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ lija kukǀʰitʰakala kwisiz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛsiz̤ukulwana lija kuɬala liɬɛli lɔd̤wa kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ukǀand̤a kulɔ lɔɓa lɛŋ̤ǀ̤wanɡ̤uɓɛ nɔkʰwalimanz̤i kuɬalɛ kulɔ ifuɓɛsi nɛɬunɡ̤ulu ɔlulɛ pʰɛz̤u kwalɔ ulutʲa lɔkulinɡ̤anisa lwakwaɲaɲɛni nɛlɔtʰɛ jɔkulunɡ̤ɛlɛlanisa jakwaluɓala aɓanumz̤ana ɓalɔakuji kuɓa saɓakʰɔ ɓaɓiz̤a ɓukumkani kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓalɔ ɓaɓɛ jintɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛkʰɔjɔ iiŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛ z̤alɔ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ z̤ija intɔ ɛnamɛv̤a amaxawu namakʰakakʰaka ɛz̤iŋǃaɓɛni z̤alɔ ɛz̤inkulu liɓɛ sisikʰunɮa sɛɛmpunɡ̤utʲɛ nɛɮɛlɔ lɛɛŋǀiniɓa kɔɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤ana amaxamŋǀwa ɔmkǃwɛɓɛd̤u nɛɛmpunɡ̤utʲɛ intɔ ɛlikǁʰɔnti ikʰawulɛlanɛ nɔwajɔ ɛwɛ intɔ jasɛɓusuku ija kɔnwaɓa kʰɔna iz̤ifumanɛlɛ ukupʰumla kulapʰɔ ija kwɛnz̤ɛla kʰɔna inɮu iɲɔka ɛd͡ʒ̤uɓajɔ iz̤alɛ amakǃand̤a ifukamɛ ɛmtʰunz̤ini kʰɔna ɛwɛ kʰɔna apʰɔ ɓaja kuɓutʰa ɔɔntlɔjija ɛlɔwɔ nɔwaɓɔ funani ɛŋǀwad̤ini kajɛhɔv̤a nilɛsɛ akukʰɔ naɲɛ kuz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ ija ɛja kusilɛla kuwajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤umlɔmɔ ɔz̤iwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤umɔja wawɔ ɔz̤iɓutʰilɛjɔ nɡ̤ujɛ ɔz̤ixɔlɛlɛ ikǃaʃisɔ isanɮa sakʰɛ saz̤aɓɛla lɔna nɡ̤ɔlutʲa lɔkulinɡ̤anisa z̤ija kuliɮa kud̤ɛkusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni z̤iɬalɛ kulɔ kwisiz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛsiz̤ukulwana inɛmiɬali intlanɡ̤ɔ nɔmkǃwɛɓɛd̤u ijaɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓa iŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsi ijad̤uɓula nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmfijɔ ijatʲatʲamɓa itʰi xɔkǃɔ ijaɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓa ɛwɛ ijaɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓa imɛmɛlɛlɛ inikwɛ uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓɛlɛb̤anɔn uɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amɛla ɓɛkarmɛlɛ nɛʃarɔn ɛz̤ɔ nd̤awɔ z̤ija kuɓuɓɔna uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a uɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amɛla ɓɔtʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu jɔmɛlɛz̤ani iz̤anɮa ɛz̤iwilɛjɔ niwakǃinisɛ amad̤ɔlɔ aɡ̤ɛkǁajɔ jitʰini kwaɓantliz̤ijɔ z̤iŋ̤ǁ̤amajɔ jɔmɛlɛlani ninɡ̤ɔjiki jaɓɔnani utʰikǁɔ wɛnu ujɛz̤a ɛnɛmpind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ ɛnɛmɓujɛkɛz̤ɔ katʰikǁɔ uja kuz̤a jɛna anisind̤isɛ aja kuv̤ulwa amɛɬɔ ɛɛmfama z̤iv̤ulwɛ iinɮɛɓɛ z̤ɛz̤itʰulu siz̤ɛ sit͡siɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkǁʰama isikǃʰwala lumɛmɛlɛlɛ lwɛsid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kuja kuɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔka amanz̤i ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nɛmilamɓɔ ɛŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsini isanɡ̤a siɓɛ lid̤ikɛ nɛɛnd̤awɔ ɛz̤iŋǁaniwɛjɔ z̤impɔmpɔz̤ɛ amanz̤i ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɛmpunɡ̤utʲɛ apʰɔ iɓutʰuma kʰɔna kuja kuɓa ɓutʲani nɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ nɛmikʰanz̤i kuja kuɓakʰɔ umɛnd̤ɔ kʰɔna kuɓɛkʰɔ inɮɛla kutʰiwɛ ukuɓiz̤wa kwajɔ jinɮɛla ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ lɛ akuji kuɮula ntɔ ijiŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ajɔ jɛjaɓɔ jɔna aɓahamɓa lɔɔ nɮɛla naɓaz̤iz̤ihula aɓaji kulaɬɛka kujɔ akuji kuɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔɲama kʰɔna aliji kukǃaɓɛla kʰɔna ixamŋǀwa ɛlikǃwɛnɡ̤ajɔ aliji kufuɲanwa kʰɔna kuja kuhamɓa kʰɔna aɓakʰululwɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɬawulɛlwa aɓakʰululwa ɓakajɛhɔv̤a ɓaɓujɛ ɓɛz̤ɛ ɛz̤ijɔn ɓɛmɛmɛlɛla ɓɛnɔv̤ujɔ ɔlunɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓaja imiɬali nɛmiv̤ujɔ sisaɓɛ isiŋ̤ǃ̤ala nɔsiz̤i kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsinɛ wɔkumkani uhɛz̤ɛkija kwɛɲuka usanɛrib̤ɛ wasɛasirija waja kujɔ jɔnkɛ imiz̤i jakwajud̤a ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ wajitʰimɓa ukumkani wasɛasirija urab̤ɛʃakɛ ɛlakiʃɛ ukuɓa ajɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm uhɛz̤ɛkija ɛnɛmpi ɛnz̤ima wafika wɛma ɛmd͡ʒ̤ɛlwɛni wɛkǀʰiɓi lasɛntla ɔnɡ̤asɛmɛnd̤wɛni wɛnt͡simi jɔmsuki wɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ kwapʰuma kwaja kujɛ uɛlijakim uɲana kahilɛkija umpʰatʰi wɛnɮu nɔʃɛb̤ɛna umb̤ali nɔjɔwa uɲana kaasafu umkʰumɓuz̤i wɛz̤intɔ z̤akɔmkʰulu watʰi kuɓɔ urab̤ɛʃakɛ kʰanitʰi kuhɛz̤ɛkija ut͡ʃɔ ɔmkʰulu wasɛasirija ukutʰi jɛjani lɛ nkɔlɔsɛkɔ ukʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ajɔ nd̤itʰi liliz̤wi lɔmlɔmɔ wɔd̤wa ikǃʰinɡ̤a lakʰɔ nɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓakʰɔ ɓɛmfaz̤wɛ ɔkunɡ̤ɔku kɛ ukʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤aɓani uɡ̤wilikɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujaɓɔna ukʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ msimɛlɛlɔ wɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ ɛv̤ikiv̤ɛkilɛjɔ ijiputa ɛtʰi ɔtʰɛ wajama nɡ̤ajɔ inɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ im̤laɓɛ und͡ʒ̤alɔ ufarɔ wɛjiputa kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ajɛ kɛ ukuɓa utʰi sikʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nd̤itʰi asinɡ̤ujɛ lɔ uz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a nɛz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ az̤isusilɛjɔ uhɛz̤ɛkija watʰi kumajud̤a nakwijɛrusalɛm iz̤ɛ nikǃuɓud̤ɛ pʰamɓi kwɛsi siɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sɔd̤wa kʰawuɓɛkɛlanɛ kalɔku nɛnkɔsi jam wasɛasirija nd̤ɔkunika amaɓini amahaʃɛ ukuɓa unakɔ nɡ̤ɛkǀala lakʰɔ ukukʰupʰa aɓakʰwɛli ɓɔkukʰwɛla kuwɔ wɔtʰini ukuɓud͡ʒ̤ika uɓusɔ ɓɛnkɔsana ɛɲɛ jakuɓɔ aɓaŋǀinanɛ ɓaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɛnkɔsi jam ukʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ɛjiputa nɡ̤ɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa nanɡ̤aɓamahaʃɛ nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤iɲukɛ nd̤ɛz̤a kulɔnakalisa ɛli liz̤wɛ nd̤inɡ̤ɛnajɛ ujɛhɔv̤a jini ujɛhɔv̤a utʰɛ ɲuka ujɛ kwɛli liz̤wɛ ulɔnakalisɛ ɓatʰi ɔɔɛlijakim nɔʃɛb̤ɛna nɔjɔwa kurab̤ɛʃakɛ kʰawutʰɛtʰɛ kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛsiaram kuɓa sisiv̤a sɔna ukutʰɛtʰa kutʰi nɡ̤ɛsijud̤a ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤aɓantu aɓasɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni watʰi urab̤ɛʃakɛ inkɔsi jam ind̤itʰumɛ ukuɓa nd̤iwatʰɛtʰɛ maz̤wi ɛnkɔsini jakʰɔ nakuwɛ jini asikula mad̤ɔd̤a aɬɛli ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni jini ukuz̤ɛ aɮɛ ilinɮɛ lawɔ asɛlɛ umkǀʰamɔ wawɔ wɛma urab̤ɛʃakɛ wad̤and̤uluka nɡ̤ɛz̤wi ɛlikʰulu nɡ̤ɛsijud̤a watʰi wav̤ɛni amaz̤wi ɔkumkani ɔmkʰulu ɔkumkani wasɛasirija utʰi makanɡ̤anilukuɬi uhɛz̤ɛkija nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akaji kuɓa nakɔ ukuniɬanɡ̤ula makanɡ̤anikʰɔlɔsisi nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a uhɛz̤ɛkija ɛsitʰi inɛnɛ uja kusiɬanɡ̤ula ujɛhɔv̤a lɔ mz̤i awusaji kunikɛlwa ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wasɛasirija musani ukumpʰulapʰula uhɛz̤ɛkija nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ wasɛasirija ukutʰi kǁɔlisanani nipʰumɛ niz̤ɛ niɮɛ ɛlɔwɔ umd̤ilija wakʰɛ ɛlɔwɔ umkʰiwanɛ wakʰɛ nisɛlɛ ɛlɔwɔ amanz̤i ɛkǃula lakʰɛ nd̤id̤ɛ nd̤iz̤ɛ nd̤inisɛ ɛz̤wɛni ɛlind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛliz̤wɛ lɛnu iliz̤wɛ lɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛwajini ɛnt͡ʃa iliz̤wɛ lɛsɔnka nɛz̤id̤ilija iz̤ɛ nilumkɛ ɬɛz̤ɛ aniɲanɡ̤ɛ uhɛz̤ɛkija ɛsitʰi ujɛhɔv̤a uja kusiɬanɡ̤ula ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɓaliɬanɡ̤ulɛ ɛlɔwɔ iliz̤wɛ lakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wasɛasirija ɓapʰi ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓasɛhamati nɛarpad̤i ɓapʰi ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓasɛsɛfarv̤ajim ukuɓa ɓanɡ̤aɓi ɓaliɬanɡ̤ulɛ ɛlakwasamari ɛsanɮɛni nɡ̤uwupʰi kɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓala maz̤wɛ ɔliɬanɡ̤ulɛjɔ iliz̤wɛ lakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni ukuɓa ad̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ajiɬanɡ̤ulɛ ijɛrusalɛm ɛsanɮɛni ɓatʰi aɓampʰɛnd̤ula naz̤wi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkumkani wɔna uɓusitʰi niz̤ɛ ninɡ̤ampʰɛnd̤uli wɛz̤a kɛ uɛlijakim uɲana kahilɛkija umpʰatʰi wɛnɮu nɔʃɛb̤ɛna umb̤ali nɔjɔwa uɲana kaasafu umkʰumɓuz̤i wɛz̤intɔ z̤akɔmkʰulu kuhɛz̤ɛkija ɓɛz̤ik͡xaz̤ulɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓamkǁɛlɛla amaz̤wi karab̤ɛʃakɛ kwatʰi akukuv̤a ɔkukumkani uhɛz̤ɛkija waz̤ik͡xaz̤ula iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ waz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤uma nɡ̤ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ wanɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a watʰuma uɛlijakim umpʰatʰi wɛnɮu nɔʃɛb̤ɛna umb̤ali namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤umɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ kuisaja umprɔfɛti uɲana kaamɔt͡si ɓatʰi kujɛ ut͡ʃɔ uhɛz̤ɛkija ukutʰi lɛ jimini jɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ nɛjɔkɔɬwaja nɛjɔɡ̤iɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓantwana ɓaz̤ɛ ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛsiz̤alɔ kɛ amanɮa ɔkuz̤ala m̤lawumɓi ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ anɡ̤awɛv̤a amaz̤wi karab̤ɛʃakɛ ɔtʰuɲiwɛjɔ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛasirija inkɔsi jakʰɛ ukuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a utʰikǁɔ ɔpʰililɛjɔ amɔɬwajɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamaz̤wi lawɔ awav̤ilɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ wɛna upʰakamisɛ umtʰand̤az̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamasalɛla asɛkʰɔjɔ ɓaja kɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɔkumkani uhɛz̤ɛkija kuisaja watʰi uisaja kuɓɔ nɔtʰi kwinkɔsi jɛnu ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi musa ukɔjikiswa nɡ̤amaz̤wi ɔwav̤ilɛjɔ aɓand̤iɲɛlisɛ nɡ̤awɔ aɓafana ɓakwakumkani wasɛasirija jaɓɔna nd̤imfaka umɔja ukuɓa ɛv̤ɛ ud̤aɓa ɔluɓi aɓujɛ kɛ ajɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɛ nd̤imwisɛ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɛ waɓuja kɛ urab̤ɛʃakɛ wasɛasirija ɛsilwa nɛlib̤ɛna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛv̤ilɛ ukuɓa und̤ulukilɛ ɛlakiʃɛ wɛv̤a kusitʰiwa nɡ̤ɔtiraka wakwakuʃi upʰumilɛ ɛsiz̤a nawɛ wɛv̤a kɛ watʰumɛla aɓatʰuɲwa kuhɛz̤ɛkija ɛsitʰi nɔt͡ʃɔ kuhɛz̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a ukutʰi makanɡ̤akulukuɬi utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ ɔkʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ajɛ wɛna usitʰi ajisaji kunikɛlwa ijɛrusalɛm ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wasɛasirija ujaɓɔna ukuv̤ilɛ wɛna aɓakwɛnz̤ilɛjɔ ɔɔkumkani ɓasɛasirija kumaz̤wɛ ɔnkɛ ukuɓa ɓawapʰanz̤isa uja kuɬanɡ̤ulwa kɛ wɛna ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɛɛntlanɡ̤a kɛ ɓaz̤iɬanɡ̤ula ɛz̤ɔ ɓaz̤it͡ʃaɓalalisajɔ ɔɔɓawɔ iɡ̤ɔz̤an nɛharan nɛrɛt͡sɛfɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakaɛd̤ɛn aɓaɓɛsɛtɛlasarɛ upʰi wɛhamati nɔkumkani wɛarpad̤i nɔkumkani wɔmz̤i wasɛsɛfarv̤ajim nɛhɛna nɛiv̤a wawatʰaɓatʰa uhɛz̤ɛkija amapʰɛpʰa ɛŋǀwad̤i ɛsanɮɛni saɓatʰuɲwa wawafund̤a wɛɲuka waja ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a wajanɛka uhɛz̤ɛkija pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a watʰand̤az̤a uhɛz̤ɛkija kujɛhɔv̤a ɛsitʰi jɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi tʰikǁɔ wakwasirajɛli wɛna uɬɛli pʰakatʰi kwɛɛkɛrub̤i unɡ̤ujɛ utʰikǁɔ wɛna wɛd̤wa kwiz̤ikumkani z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi wɛna ulɛnz̤ilɛ iz̤ulu nɛɬaɓatʰi tʰɔɓa inɮɛɓɛ jakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a uv̤ɛ v̤ula amɛɬɔ akʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a uɓɔnɛ uwɛv̤ɛ ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi kasanɛrib̤ɛ awatʰumɛlɛ ukuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a utʰikǁɔ ɔpʰililɛjɔ ɔkunɛnɛ jɛhɔv̤a ɔɔkumkani ɓasɛasirija ɓaz̤ipʰanz̤isilɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a namaz̤wɛ az̤ɔ ɓaɓanikɛla ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓaz̤ɔ ɛmlilwɛni kuɓa ɓɛɓɛnɡ̤ɛtʰikǁɔ ɓɛɓɛnɡ̤umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛz̤anɮa z̤ɔmntu umtʰi nɛlitʲɛ ɓaɓat͡ʃaɓalalisa kɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu sisind̤isɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ z̤az̤i z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ikumkani z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi ukuɓa wɛna unɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɛd̤wa watʰumɛla kɛ uisaja uɲana kaamɔt͡si kuhɛz̤ɛkija ɛsitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakwasirajɛli ukutʰi ɔkutʰand̤az̤ɛlɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkub̤ɛkisɛlɛ kusanɛrib̤ɛ wasɛasirija nd̤ikuv̤ilɛ lilɔ ɛli iliz̤wi alitʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ajɛ intɔmɓi ɛjintɔmɓi uz̤ijɔn ijakud̤ɛla ijakuɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛla intɔmɓi ujɛrusalɛm iɬunɡ̤uz̤ɛla intlɔkɔ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɔ nɡ̤uɓani lɔ umŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ilɛjɔ umɲɛlisilɛjɔ nɡ̤uɓani lɔ umpʰakamisɛlɛ iliz̤wi lakʰɔ ukud̤ɛ uwapʰakamisɛlɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɔ pʰɛz̤ulu nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ wakwasirajɛli ujiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ilɛ inkɔsi nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ watʰi nɡ̤ɔɓuninz̤i ɓɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤am z̤ɔkulwa nd̤ikǃaɓɛlɛ ɛz̤intlɔmɛni z̤ɛɛntaɓa ɛmatʰamɓɛkɛni ɛlɛb̤anɔn nd̤ijiɡ̤awulɛ imisɛd̤arɛ jajɔ ɛmid̤ɛ kakʰulu nɛmisiprɛs jajɔ ɛɲuliwɛjɔ nd̤ifikɛ kwɛjɔkupʰɛla ind̤awɔ jajɔ ɛpʰɛz̤ulu ɛɬatʰini lɛnt͡simi jajɔ ɛkǀʰumajɔ nd̤imɓɛ nd̤asɛla amanz̤i nd̤ija kujɔmisa nɡ̤ɛntɛnd̤ɛ jɛɛɲawɔ z̤am jɔnkɛ imid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ jɔmnajilɛ ɔsɛjiputa akuv̤anɡ̤a kwakud̤ɛ nd̤akwɛnz̤a ɔku kwanɡ̤ɛmiɬa jamand̤ulɔ nd̤akuɓumɓa nd̤ikufikisilɛ kwɛnz̤ɛka nɡ̤ɔku ukuɓa ujikʰaɬɛlɛ pʰant͡si imiz̤i ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ iɓɛ jiŋ̤ǁ̤akaŋ̤ǁ̤aka jɛmiwɛwɛ aɓɛmi ɓajɔ ɓaŋǃumka iz̤anɮa ɓakǃʰipʰuka umɓilini ɓad̤ana ɓaɓa nɡ̤umfunɔ wasɛnɮɛ nɔɬaz̤a utʲani ɔɓupʰɛz̤u kwɛnɮu nɛnt͡simi jɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa ɛnɡ̤ɛkaɓi mv̤ila kɛ ukuɬala kwakʰɔ nɔkupʰuma kwakʰɔ nɔkunɡ̤ɛna kwakʰɔ nd̤ijakwaz̤i nɔkuɡ̤uɡ̤uma kwakʰɔ nɡ̤am nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɡ̤uɡ̤uma kwakʰɔ nɡ̤am nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkutʲɛʃa kwakʰɔ ɔkuɲukɛ kwɛz̤a ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤am nd̤ija ikʰɔŋ̰ǀ̰ɔ ɛmpumlwɛni jakʰɔ nɔmkʰala ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɔ nd̤ikuɓujisɛ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɔwɛz̤a nɡ̤ajɔ kɛ kalɔku nɡ̤uwɔ lɔ umkǃɔnd̤isɔ kuwɛ lɔ mɲaka kɔɮiwa ummilɛla nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsiɓini kɔɮiwa isiɬaɓanɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsitʰatʰu nɔɬwajɛla niv̤unɛ nitʲalɛ iz̤id̤ilija niɮɛ iz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤az̤ɔ aɓasind̤ilɛjɔ ɓɛnɮu jakwajud̤a aɓɔ ɓasɛlɛjɔ ɓaja kuɓuja ɓɛnd̤ɛlisɛlɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu pʰant͡si ɓɛnz̤ɛ iz̤ikǃʰamɔ pʰɛz̤ulu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kuja kupʰuma ɛjɛrusalɛm aɓasɛlɛjɔ naɓasind̤ilɛjɔ ɛntaɓɛni jɛz̤ijɔn uɓukʰwɛlɛ ɓukajɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ɓuja kukwɛnz̤a ɔkɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkub̤ɛkisɛlɛ wasɛasirija ukutʰi akaji kunɡ̤ɛna kulɔ mz̤i akaji kutɔla nɔtɔlɔ kuwɔ akaji kuwuz̤ɛla ɛnɛnɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ akaji kuwufumɓɛla lud̤ɔnɡ̤a lakuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a uja kuɓuja nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla awɛz̤a nɡ̤ajɔ akasaji kunɡ̤ɛna kulɔ mz̤i ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kuwukʰusɛla lɔ mz̤i nd̤iwusind̤isɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa kad̤av̤id̤ɛ umkʰɔnz̤i kwapʰuma kɛ isitʰuɲwa sikajɛhɔv̤a sakǁaɓɛla ɛmkʰɔsini wamaasirija ikʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anɛsiɬanu ɓav̤uka nanɡ̤ɔ ɛz̤iz̤id̤umɓu ɛz̤ifilɛjɔ ɔnkɛ wand̤uluka wahamɓa waɓuja usanɛrib̤ɛ wasɛasirija waɬala ɛninɛv̤ɛ kwatʰi ɛŋǃula ɛnɮwini kanisɛrɔki utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ ɓamkǁaɓɛla nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ɔɔad̤ramɛlɛki nɔʃarɛt͡sɛrɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓaz̤a ɓasaɓɛla ɛz̤wɛni lasɛararati uɛsaxad̤ɔn uɲana wakʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa wajɛsifa uhɛz̤ɛkija ɛz̤a waja umprɔfɛti kujɛ uisaja uɲana kaamɔt͡si watʰi kujɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jɔlɛla inɮu jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uja wɛna akuji kupʰila uhɛz̤ɛkija waɓub̤ɛkisa ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ watʰand̤az̤a kujɛhɔv̤a watʰi kʰawukʰumɓulɛ nd̤ijakukʰunɡ̤a jɛhɔv̤a ɔkɔkuɓa nd̤ihamɓɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɲanisɛka nanɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ ɛpʰɛlɛlisilɛjɔ nd̤akwɛnz̤a ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ wat͡ʃɔ uhɛz̤ɛkija isililɔ ɛsikʰulu kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kuisaja lisitʰi jija utʰi kuhɛz̤ɛkija ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ujiɬɔ ukutʰi nd̤iwuv̤ilɛ umtʰand̤az̤ɔ wakʰɔ nd̤iz̤iɓɔnilɛ iiɲɛmɓɛz̤i z̤akʰɔ ujaɓɔna nd̤ija kɔnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛlɛla kwimiɬa jakʰɔ iʃumi ɛlinɛsiɬanu lɛmiɲaka nd̤ija kukuɬanɡ̤ula wɛna nalɔ mz̤i ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wasɛasirija nd̤iwukʰusɛlɛ lɔ mz̤i nanɡ̤u kɛ umkǃɔnd̤isɔ kuwɛ upʰuma kujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa uja kulɛnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a ɛlɔ liz̤wi alitʰɛtʰilɛjɔ ujaɓɔna nd̤ijasiɓujisa isitʰunz̤i sɛz̤iɲukɔ ɛsɛɬajɔ ɛsiɲukwɛni sikaahaz̤i nɡ̤ɛlanɡ̤a nd̤isiɓujisa umv̤a iz̤iɲukɔ ɛz̤iliʃumi laɓuja kɛ ilanɡ̤a iz̤iɲukɔ ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛz̤iɲukwɛni ɛliɓɛ liɬilɛ nɡ̤az̤ɔ umb̤alɔ kahɛz̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a ɔkɔ ɛɓɛsifa waz̤a wapʰila nd̤atʰi jakuɓɔn ukuɓa itʰɛ kǀwaka imiɬa jam mand̤imkɛ nd̤ijɛ ɛmasanɡ̤wɛni ɛlaɓafilɛjɔ nd̤iv̤ɛlɛlwɛ nd̤ajiɬutʰwa ɛsɛlɛjɔ imiɲaka jam nd̤atʰi and̤iji kumɓɔna uja uja ɛz̤wɛni laɓapʰililɛjɔ and̤iji kuɓa samkʰanɡ̤ɛla nd̤ikuɓɛmi ɓɛlaɓanɡ̤asɛkʰɔjɔ umŋǃuɓa uz̤a kuŋǀɔtʰulwa ufud̤uswɛ umkɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntɛntɛ jɔmalusi nd̤iɓusɔnɡ̤ilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmluki uɓɔmi ɓam und̤it͡ʃɛkǀa ɛz̤int͡sinɡ̤ɛni uja kund̤iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla nɡ̤ɔsuku ɔluɲɛ nd̤az̤iz̤ɔlisa kwad̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲama wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuwapʰula ɔnkɛ amatʰamɓɔ uja kund̤iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla nɡ̤ɔsuku ɔluɲɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɬankɔmɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnd̤wɛ nd̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuk͡xik͡xiz̤a nd̤alila nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛv̤ukutʰu apʰɛla amɛɬɔ kukub̤ɛka pʰɛz̤ulu jɛhɔv̤a nd̤ifinɡ̤ɛkilɛ nd̤imɛlɛ nd̤ɔtʰini ukuɓulɛla ɛtʰɛtʰilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ wɛnz̤a nɔkwɛnz̤a mand̤ikǀɔtʰɔz̤ɛ jɔnkɛ imiɲaka jam ɛja kuz̤a pʰɛz̤u kɔɓuk͡xak͡xa ɓɔmpʰɛfumlɔ nkɔsi jam ɓaɓuja ɓapʰilɛ z̤ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ aɓantu ɓukuz̤ɔ kaɲɛ uɓɔmi ɓɔmɔja wɔnd̤ipʰilisa kɛ nd̤iɮisɛ uɓɔmi jaɓɔna ɓaɓa lusind̤isɔ uɓuk͡xak͡xa ɔɓukʰulu wɛna kɛ nɡ̤ɔkund̤itʰand̤a wawuxɔla umpʰɛfumlɔ ɛsihɔɡ̤wɛni sɔkɔnakala nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iz̤ɔnɔ z̤am uz̤ilaɬilɛ ɛmv̤a kɔm̤lana wakʰɔ kuɓa ɛlaɓafilɛjɔ alinakukuŋǀɔma akunakukud̤umisa aɓaɬa ɓajɛ ɛm̤ad̤ini aɓakulind̤ɛlɛ ukuɲanisa kwakʰɔ ɔpʰililɛjɔ ɔpʰililɛjɔ nɡ̤ujɛ ɔwɔkuŋǀɔma nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤am nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nam̤la ujisɛ uja kukwaz̤isa ukuɲanisa kwakʰɔ kɔɔɲana ujɛhɔv̤a uz̤a kund̤isind̤isa nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ sɔz̤iɓɛtʰa iihad̤i z̤ɛtʰu jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɔɓɔmi ɓɛtʰu ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a watʰi uisaja maɓatʰaɓatʰɛ isikǀumɓa samakʰiwanɛ ɓasiɓɛkɛ ɛtʰumɓɛni ukuz̤ɛ apʰilɛ watʰi uhɛz̤ɛkija ujintɔni umkǃɔnd̤isɔ wɔkuɓa nd̤ija kuɲuka nd̤ijɛ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa umɛrɔd̤akib̤alad̤an uɲana kab̤alad̤an wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli watʰumɛla iŋǀwad̤i nɔmnikɛlɔ kuhɛz̤ɛkija kuɓa wajɛv̤ilɛ ukuɓa uɓɛsifa waɓuja wakǀʰakǀʰa wav̤uja uhɛz̤ɛkija nɡ̤aɓɔ waɓaɓɔnisa inɮu jakʰɛ jɛz̤intɔ az̤ikǃwɛɓilɛjɔ isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɔɓulawu nɛɔli ɛntlɛ nɛnɮu jɔnkɛ jɛz̤ikǁʰɔɓɔ z̤akʰɛ nɛntɔ jɔnkɛ ɛɓikʰɔ ɛɓuŋǀwanɛni ɓakʰɛ akwaɓakʰɔ ntɔ ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ nasɛkulawulɛni kwakʰɛ kɔnkɛ anɡ̤aɓaɓɔnisanɡ̤a jɔna uhɛz̤ɛkija waja uisaja umprɔfɛti uhɛz̤ɛkija watʰi kujɛ atʰɛni mad̤ɔd̤a av̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤apʰi ukuz̤a kuwɛ watʰi uhɛz̤ɛkija av̤ɛlɛ ɛz̤wɛni ɛlikud̤ɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛsiz̤a watʰi kɛ aɓɔnɛ ntɔni ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ watʰi uhɛz̤ɛkija aɓɔnɛ intɔ jɔnkɛ ɛsɛnɮwini jam akuɓanɡ̤akʰɔ ntɔ nd̤inɡ̤aɓaɓɔnisanɡ̤a jɔna ɛɓuŋǀwanɛni ɓam watʰi uisaja kuhɛz̤ɛkija liv̤ɛ kɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ujaɓɔna kuz̤a imiɬa ɛja kutʰi jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛsɛnɮwini jakʰɔ nɛntɔ aɓajikǃwɛɓajɔ ɔɔjiɬɔ kwad̤a kwajilɛ itʰwalɛlwɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli kunɡ̤asali ntɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓaja kutʰaɓatʰa nakɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ aɓaja kupʰuma kuwɛ ɔja kuɓaz̤ala ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓaɓusi ɛb̤ɔtwɛni lɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli watʰi uhɛz̤ɛkija kuisaja lilunɡ̤ilɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɔlitʰɛtʰilɛjɔ watʰi inɛnɛ kuja kuɓakʰɔ ukǁɔlɔ nɔz̤inɡ̤isɔ nɡ̤ɛjam imiɬa tʰutʰuz̤ɛlani ɓatʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛni aɓantu ɓam ut͡ʃɔ utʰikǁɔ wɛnu tʰɛtʰani kakuɬɛ nɛjɛrusalɛm nimɛmɛz̤ɛ kujɔ nitʰi kuz̤alisɛkilɛ ukupʰuma kwajɔ umkʰɔsi nitʰi ɓuɬawulɛlwɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓajɔ nitʰi jamkɛliswɛ ɛsanɮɛni sikajɛhɔv̤a ɔkupʰind̤wɛ kaɓini kwiz̤ɔnɔ z̤ajɔ z̤ɔnkɛ jiv̤ani ɔmɛmɛz̤ajɔ ɛsitʰi jiɡ̤ɛkǀɛni ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ inɮɛla kajɛhɔv̤a tʲɛnɛnɛz̤ɛlani utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu umɛnd̤ɔ ɛŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsini jɔnkɛ majiɲuswɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iintaɓa nɛɛnd̤uli z̤iɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ulwɛ iind̤awɔ ɛz̤imaɡ̤ǃ̤aɡ̤ala z̤iɓɛ z̤itʰaɓaz̤i nɛmikǁawuka iɓɛ z̤iintili ɓutʰʲilɛkɛ uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a iɓuɓɔnɛ iɲama jɔnkɛ kuɲɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰɛtʰilɛ umlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a iliz̤wi lɔtʰilɛ latʰi mɛmɛz̤a watʰi jɛna nd̤imɛmɛz̤ɛ ntɔni jitʰi jɔnkɛ iɲama iɓutʲani ɓɔnkɛ uɓuɬɛ ɓajɔ ɓund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntʲantʲamɓɔ jasɛnɮɛ ɓujɔma utʲani ijaɓuna intʲantʲamɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a uv̤utʰuz̤a kujɔ inɛnɛ aɓantu ɓaɓutʲani ɓujɔma utʲani ijaɓuna intʲantʲamɓɔ kɛ lɔna iliz̤wi likatʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu lija nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ wɛna z̤ijɔn mʃumajɛli wɛɛnd̤aɓa ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɲuka ujɛ ɛntaɓɛni ɛpʰakamilɛjɔ wɛna jɛrusalɛm mʃumajɛli wɛɛnd̤aɓa ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ lipʰakamisɛ nɡ̤amanɮa iliz̤wi lakʰɔ pʰakamisa unɡ̤ɔjiki jitʰi kwimiz̤i jakwajud̤a nankɔ utʰikǁɔ wɛnu ujaɓɔna inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ija kuz̤a inɡ̤ɔwɔmɛlɛlɛjɔ inɡ̤alɔ jajɔ ijilawulɛla ujaɓɔna umv̤uz̤ɔ wajɔ inawɔ nɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i wajɔ upʰamɓi kwajɔ ija um̤lamɓi wajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmalusi ija kuwaɓutʰa nɡ̤ɛɛnɡ̤alɔ z̤ajɔ amatakanɛ iwatʰwalɛ nɡ̤ɛsifuɓa sajɔ iz̤itʰund̤ɛz̤ɛ ɛz̤aɲisajɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔlinɡ̤anisɛ amanz̤i ɛntɛnd̤ɛni jɛsanɮa sakʰɛ walilunɡ̤isa iz̤ulu nɡ̤ɔmɔlukɔ wɛminwɛ walukʰɔnɡ̤ɔz̤ɛla utʰuli lɔm̤laɓa nɡ̤ɔmlinɡ̤anisɛlɔ waz̤ilinɡ̤anisa iintaɓa nɡ̤ɛsilinɡ̤anisɔ nɛɛnd̤uli nɡ̤ɛsikali nɡ̤uɓani ɔwalunɡ̤isa umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a waɓa jind̤ɔd̤a ɛmkǀɛɓisajɔ wamaz̤isa wakǀɛɓisana naɓani ɔwamkǃɔnd̤isajɔ wamfund̤isa umɛnd̤ɔ wɛsikɔ wamfund̤isa ukwaz̤i wamaz̤isa inɮɛla jɔkukǃɔnd̤a jaɓɔna iintlanɡ̤a z̤iɓalɛlwa ɛkuɓɛni z̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛtʰɔnt͡si ɛmpʰand̤ɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsunt͡swana ɛsikalini jaɓɔna iz̤ikǃitʰi z̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔtʰuli ɔlukǃʰapʰukajɔ ilɛb̤anɔn ajilinɡ̤ɛnɛ kuɓaswa nɛɛɲamakaz̤i z̤ajɔ az̤ilinɡ̤ɛnɛ kuɓalid̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a z̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ kujɛ z̤iɓalɛlwa ɛkutʰini asiz̤antɔ z̤ilukǀʰuku ninɡ̤amfanɛkisa kɛ naɓani utʰikǁɔ niŋǁulumisɛ mfanɛkisɛlɔ najɛ umfanɛkisɔ ɔkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ utʰʲid̤wa jiŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi awalɛkɛ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ umɲiɓilikisi awuɲiɓilikisɛlɛ imikǁɔkɛlɛlwanɛ jɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɔkʰɔɬiwɛjɔ nɡ̤umxumɔ ukʰɛtʰa umtʰi ɔnɡ̤ɛnakuɓɔla uz̤ifunɛla iŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi ɛjaz̤ijɔ ukuɓa imlunɡ̤isɛlɛ umfanɛkisɔ ɔkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ ɔnɡ̤aji kuʃukuma anaz̤i aniv̤a anikǁɛlɛlwanɡ̤a kwasɛntlɔkɔ anikǃɔnd̤anɡ̤a kwasɛkusɛkwɛni kwɛɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤ulɔ uɬala pʰɛz̤u kwɛsaz̤inɡ̤ɛ sɛɬaɓatʰi aɓɛmi ɓalɔ kɛ ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmikǀikwanɛ ulɔwanɛka iz̤ulu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkǃʰija ɛlijasujasu walitwaɓulula nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntɛntɛ jɔkuɬala ulɔz̤ɛnz̤a iz̤id̤wanɡ̤uɓɛ ukuɓa z̤inɡ̤aɓi ntɔ aɓaɡ̤wɛɓi ɓɛɬaɓatʰi aɓɛnz̤ɛ ɓaɓɛ lukǀʰuku ɓɛnɡ̤ɛkatʰi ukutʲalwa ɓɛnɡ̤ɛkatʰi ukuɬwajɛlwa sinɡ̤ɛkatʰi ukwɛnd̤ɛlisɛla iiŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu ɛm̤laɓɛni isipʰunz̤i saɓɔ usɛlɛɓafutʰɛla ɓɔmɛ uɓatʰaɓatʰɛ umɔja ɔv̤utʰuz̤ajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmkǃukǃu nija kund̤ifanisa naɓani nd̤ilinɡ̤anɛ najɛ ut͡ʃɔ ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ pʰakamisɛlani amɛɬɔ ɛnu pʰɛz̤ulu niɓɔnɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔwad̤ala ɛz̤i z̤intɔ nɡ̤ulɔkʰupʰa umkʰɔsi waz̤ɔ nɡ̤amakǃɛla uz̤iɓiz̤a z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ipʰɛla nɡ̤amaɡ̤ama nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓukʰu ɓɔkɔmɛlɛla ɛkʰalipʰilɛ nɡ̤amanɮa naɲɛ jini ukuɓa utʰi jakɔɓiutʰɛtʰɛ utʰi sirajɛli inɮɛla jam isitʰɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a nɛɓanɡ̤ɔ liɮulɛ kutʰikǁɔ akwaz̤i akuv̤anɡ̤a ukuɓa utʰikǁɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a tʰʲafi akad̤inwa ajinakuɡ̤ɔkǀwaɡ̤ɔkǀwa iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ jakʰɛ umnika ɔtʰʲafilɛjɔ amanɮa ɔnɡ̤ɛnakɔmɛlɛla amand̤isɛlɛ ukukǃina namad̤ɔd̤ana anɡ̤atʰʲafa ad̤inwɛ naɓafana ɓakʰuɓɛkɛ ɓawɛ kɛ ɓɔna aɓatʰɛmɓɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a ɓaja kuɬaz̤ijɛka ɛmanɮɛni ɓaɲukɛ nɡ̤amapʰikɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnkɔz̤i ɓaja kuɡ̤id̤ima ɓanɡ̤ad̤inwa ɓahamɓɛ ɓanɡ̤atʰʲafi jitʰini pʰamɓi z̤ikǃitʰi iz̤iz̤wɛ maz̤iɬaz̤ijɛ amanɮa maz̤iz̤ɛ z̤isɔnd̤ɛlɛ z̤and̤ulɛ z̤itʰɛtʰɛ masikǃuɓisanɛ ɛmatʲalɛni nɡ̤uɓani ɔv̤usɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a lɔwɔ ukʰawulɛlwa ɓuɓulunɡ̤isa ɛz̤iɲawɛni z̤akʰɛ unikɛla iintlanɡ̤a pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ uɲatʰɛla ɔɔkumkani uɓanikɛla ɛk͡xɛlɛni lakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔtʰuli ɛsapʰɛtʰɛni sakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmkǃukǃu ɔpʰɛt͡ʃɛtʰwajɔ ujaɓasukɛla uɮula ɛnɔkǁɔlɔ nɡ̤ɔmɛnd̤ɔ aɓɛnɡ̤awuhamɓanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛɛɲawɔ z̤akʰɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔkusɛɓɛnz̤ilɛjɔ wakwɛnz̤a ɔkɔ ɔɓiz̤a iz̤iz̤ukulwana kwasɛntlɔkɔ nd̤im jɛhɔv̤a nd̤inɡ̤ɔwɔkukǃala nakwaɓanɡ̤asɛmv̤a nd̤ikwanɡ̤ujɛ iz̤ikǃitʰi z̤aɓɔna z̤ɔjika iz̤ipʰɛlɔ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi z̤aɡ̤ub̤a z̤asɔnd̤ɛla z̤ɛz̤a umntu wamŋǀɛd̤a ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ watʰi kumz̤alwana wakʰɛ jɔmɛlɛla iŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi jɔmɛlɛz̤a umɲiɓilikisi ɔɡ̤ud̤isajɔ nɡ̤ɛsand̤ɔ wɔmɛlɛz̤a ɔɓɛtʰa ɛsikʰand̤ɛlwɛni ɛsitʰi kulunɡ̤ilɛ wasikǃinisa nɡ̤ɛz̤ikʰɔnkwanɛ ukuɓa sinɡ̤aʃukumi isitʰikǁɔ kɛ wɛna sirajɛli mkʰɔnz̤i jakɔɓi wɛna nd̤akuɲulajɔ mɓɛwu kaaɓraham umtʰand̤i ɛnd̤akuɓamɓajɔ kwasɛz̤ipʰɛlwɛni z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi ɛnd̤akuɓiz̤ajɔ kwasɛmakǀalɛni alɔ ɛnd̤atʰi kuwɛ unɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤i wɛna nd̤ikuɲulɛ and̤ikukǀɛkisilɛ ukɔjika kuɓa nd̤inawɛ ukub̤ɛkab̤ɛka kuɓa nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ nd̤ikukʰalipʰisilɛ ɛwɛ nd̤ikuŋǀɛd̤ilɛ nd̤ikukǁʰasilɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sɔkunɛnɛ sɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓam jaɓɔna ɓaja kud̤ana ɓaɬaz̤ɛkɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓav̤utʰa umsind̤ɔ nɡ̤awɛ aja kuɓa jintɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔ ad̤akɛ amad̤ɔd̤a aɓamɓana nawɛ uja unɡ̤awafumani amad̤ɔd̤a apʰikisana nawɛ aja kuɓa jintɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛkʰɔjɔ amad̤ɔd̤a nawɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ nd̤ija kusiɓamɓa isanɮa sakʰɔ sɔkunɛnɛ nd̤inɡ̤ɔtʰi kuwɛ musa ukɔjika nd̤ija kukuŋǀɛd̤a musa ukɔjika mɓunɡ̤u jakɔɓi ɓantu ɓamɓalwa ɓakwasirajɛli nd̤ija kukuŋǀɛd̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a umkʰululi wakʰɔ ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kasirajɛli jaɓɔna nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ isisiz̤ilɔ ɛsiɓukʰali ɛsit͡ʃa ɛsintlanɡ̤ɔtʰi mɓini uja kuz̤i b̤ula iintaɓa uz̤ikǀɔlɛ iind̤uli uz̤ikǁɛlisɛ umkǃukǃu uja kuz̤ɛla umɔja uz̤itʰa ɓatʰɛ umɔja ɔv̤utʰuz̤ajɔ uz̤ipʰanɡ̤alalisɛ kɛ wɛna uɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓɛ nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a ukǃʰajisɛ nɡ̤ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kasirajɛli kɛ aɓaz̤iint͡siz̤ana naɓanɡ̤amaɬwɛmpu ɓaja amanz̤i anɡ̤aɓikʰɔ lwaɓɔ lɔmɛ liŋǁanɔ jɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kuɓapʰɛnd̤ula tʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli and̤iji kuɓaʃija nd̤ija kujiv̤ula imilamɓɔ ɛlukǃajini nɛmitʰɔmɓɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntili nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ intlanɡ̤ɔ iɓɛ lid̤ikɛ ɛlinamanz̤i nɔm̤laɓa ɔnɡ̤umkǃwɛɓɛd̤u uɓɛ z̤iind̤awɔ ɛz̤ipʰuma amanz̤i nd̤ija kutʲala ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ imisɛd̤arɛ nɛminɡ̤ampunz̤i nɛmimirtilɛ nɛmiŋǃuma jasɛnɮɛ nd̤imisɛ ɛŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsini imisiprɛs nɛmiplɛjini nɛmiɡ̤alaɡ̤ala nd̤awɔɲɛ ukuz̤ɛ ɓaɓɔnɛ ɓaz̤i ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤alɛ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ ɓakǃikǃɛ kuɲɛ ukuɓa isanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a sikwɛnz̤ilɛ ɔkɔ ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kasirajɛli ukud̤alilɛ ɔkɔ sɔnd̤ɛz̤ani iind̤awɔ ɛniɓamɓɛnɛ nɡ̤az̤ɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a z̤imisɛni iz̤iɡ̤anɛkɔ z̤ɛnu ut͡ʃɔ ukumkani kajakɔɓi maɓaz̤iz̤isɛ ɓasikǁɛlɛlɛ ɔkuz̤a kuɬa maɓakǁɛlɛ iz̤intɔ z̤anɡ̤apʰamɓili uɓund͡ʒ̤ani ɓaz̤ɔ siz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤alɛ nɡ̤ɛɛntliz̤ijɔ silaz̤i ikamv̤a laz̤ɔ nɔkuɓa z̤ɛz̤iz̤ajɔ siv̤isɛni kǁɛlani iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iz̤ajɔ nɡ̤asɛmv̤a ukuz̤ɛ saz̤i ukuɓa ninɡ̤ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɛwɛ jɛnz̤ani ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɔkuɓa kɔkuɓi sikʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰iswɛ siɓɔnisanɛ nɡ̤akɔ jaɓɔnani ninɡ̤aɓɛntɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔ nɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛnu jani ulisikiz̤i ɔniɲulajɔ nd̤iv̤usɛ ɔwasɛntla wɛz̤a ɔwasɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɔŋǃula iɡ̤ama uz̤ifikɛla iixulunɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔd̤aka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɓumɓi ɛkǁɔv̤ula ud̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔwakukǁɛlajɔ ɔkɔ kwasɛkukǃalɛni makav̤ɛlɛ saz̤i ɔwakukǁɛlajɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɡ̤apʰamɓili makav̤ɛlɛ sitʰi ulunɡ̤isilɛ haji akukʰɔ wakǁɛlajɔ haji akukʰɔ wav̤akalisajɔ haji akukʰɔ waz̤iv̤ajɔ iintɛtʰɔ z̤ɛnu nd̤im ɛnd̤akǃala nd̤atʰi kwiz̤ijɔn jaɓɔna nanz̤ɔ nd̤ajinika ijɛrusalɛm umʃumajɛli wɛɛnd̤aɓa ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kuɓa nd̤akʰanɡ̤ɛla akwaɓakʰɔ ɓani nakwaɓa akwaɓakʰɔ ɓakǀɛɓisi nd̤inɡ̤aɓaɓuz̤ajɔ ɓapʰɛnd̤ulɛ nɡ̤ɛliz̤wi jaɓɔna ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓajintɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔ z̤ijintɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛkʰɔjɔ iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ imifanɛkisɔ jaɓɔ ɛtʰʲid̤iwɛjɔ inɡ̤umɔja nɔkǀʰuku mɓɔnɛni kɛ umkʰɔnz̤i ɛnd̤imkǁʰasajɔ umɲulwa ɔkʰɔlwa nɡ̤ujɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ nd̤iɓɛkɛ umɔja pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ uja kukupʰumɛlɛlisa ɔkusɛsikwɛni ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni akaji kuŋ̰ǃ̰anɡ̤az̤a alipʰakamisɛ aliv̤akalisɛ ɛz̤itratwɛni iliz̤wi lakʰɛ iŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ ɛv̤ikiv̤ɛkilɛjɔ akaji kujapʰula umsɔntɔ ɔkǃʰumajɔ akaji kuwukǀima uja kukupʰumɛlɛlisa ɔkusɛsikwɛni nɡ̤ɔkwɛɲanisɔ akaji kuɓa nakukǀiɲwa akaji kuv̤ikiv̤ɛka ad̤ɛ akumisɛ ɔkusɛsikwɛni ɛɬaɓatʰini z̤ilind̤ɛlɛ isijalɔ sakʰɛ iz̤ikǃitʰi ut͡ʃɔ utʰikǁɔ jɛna ujɛhɔv̤a ud̤ala iz̤ulu alanɛkɛ utwaɓulula um̤laɓa nɛz̤iv̤ɛlisɔ z̤awɔ aɓantu aɓapʰɛz̤u kwawɔ ukupʰɛfumla aɓahamɓa kuwɔ umɔja ukutʰi mna jɛhɔv̤a nd̤ikuɓiz̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔɓulunɡ̤isa nd̤akuɓamɓa nɡ̤ɛsanɮa nd̤ija kukulɔnd̤ɔlɔz̤a nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ waɓantu isikʰaɲisɛlɔ sɛɛntlanɡ̤a ukuɓa uv̤ulɛ amɛɬɔ ɛɛmfama ukuɓa ukʰupʰɛ aɓakʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰iwɛjɔ ɛkuv̤alɛlwɛni aɓaɬɛli ɛɓumɲamɛni uɓakʰupʰɛ ɛntɔlɔnɡ̤wɛni nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a lilɔ ɛlɔ iɡ̤ama and̤iluniki ɔmɲɛ uz̤ukɔ nɛnd̤umisɔ jam and̤ijiniki imifanɛkisɔ ɛkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ iz̤intɔ z̤ɔkukǃala jaɓɔna z̤ifikilɛ nd̤ikǁɛla iz̤intɔ ɛz̤int͡ʃa kɛ z̤inɡ̤ɛkant͡ʃuli nd̤ijaniv̤isa v̤umani kujɛhɔv̤a inɡ̤ɔma ɛnt͡ʃa ind̤umisɔ jakʰɛ kwasɛz̤ipʰɛlwɛni z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi ɓaɬa ɓajɛ ɛlwanɮɛ nɛnz̤alisɛkɔ jalɔ z̤ikǃʰitʰi naɓɛmi ɓaz̤ɔ majipʰakamisɛ iz̤wi intlanɡ̤ɔ nɛmiz̤i jajɔ nɛmiz̤ana ɛɬɛli amakɛd̤arɛ maɓamɛmɛlɛlɛ aɓɛmi ɓɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa ɓat͡ʃɔlɔz̤ɛ ɛz̤iŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni z̤ɛɛntaɓa maɓamz̤ukisɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓakǁɛlɛ ind̤umisɔ jakʰɛ ɛz̤ikǃitʰini ujɛhɔv̤a uja kupʰuma nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɡ̤ɔxa uja kukǁʰɔkǁʰa ikʰwɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnd̤ɔd̤a jɔkulwa uja kud̤uma ɛwɛ uja kuŋ̰ǃ̰anɡ̤az̤a uja kuɓa liɡ̤ɔxa ɛz̤int͡ʃaɓɛni z̤akʰɛ kususɛla kwakud̤ɛ nd̤itʰɛ kǃutʰu nd̤atʰi nd̤az̤iɓamɓa nɡ̤ɔku nd̤ija kuɓɛfuz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔz̤alajɔ nd̤iɓɛ nɛpʰika nd̤ifutʰɛ nɔkufutʰa nd̤ɔb̤axisa iintaɓa nɛɛnd̤uli nd̤ijit͡ʃisɛ jɔnkɛ imifunɔ jaz̤ɔ imilamɓɔ nd̤ijɛnz̤ɛ iz̤ikǃitʰi nd̤iwat͡ʃisɛ amad̤ikɛ nd̤ɔz̤ihamɓisa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɛz̤inɡ̤ajaz̤ijɔ nd̤iz̤iɲatʰɛlisɛ kwiiŋ̤ǃ̤uʃu ɛz̤inɡ̤az̤az̤ijɔ uɓumɲama nd̤iɓɛnz̤a ukukʰaɲa pʰamɓi kwaz̤ɔ iind̤awɔ ɛz̤imaɡ̤ǃ̤aɡ̤ala z̤iɓɛ z̤itʰaɓaz̤i z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ iz̤intɔ ɛnd̤ija kuz̤ɛnz̤a nd̤inɡ̤az̤iʃiji ɓaja kuɓuja umv̤a ɓad̤anɛ ɓɛd̤anilɛ aɓakʰɔlɔsa nɡ̤ɛmifanɛkisɔ ɛkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ aɓatʰi kwɛtʰʲid̤iwɛjɔ ninɡ̤ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɛtʰu jiv̤ani z̤itʰulu b̤ɛkani niɓɔnɛ z̤imfama nɡ̤uɓani ɔjimfama inɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ujɛ umkʰɔnz̤i ɔsisitʰulu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmtʰuɲwa ɛnd̤imtʰumajɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔjimfama nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛŋǃɔɡ̤u ɔjimfama nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmkʰɔnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a uɓɔna iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ininz̤i akaz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤ini nɔkɔ uv̤ula iinɮɛɓɛ akɛv̤a nɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰand̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɛ ukuwukʰulisa umjalɔ wawɛnz̤a wanɔɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa kɛ ɓɔna nɡ̤aɓantu aɓapʰanɡ̤iwɛjɔ aɓaɬutʰiwɛjɔ aɓaɓɔt͡ʃɛlɛlwɛ ɛmiŋ̤ǁ̤uɲɛni ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla aɓafakwɛ ɛz̤intɔlɔnɡ̤wɛni ɓaɓa likǁʰɔɓa akwaɓakʰɔ m̤lanɡ̤uli ɓaɓa nɡ̤aɓaɬutʰiwɛjɔ akwaɓakʰɔ utʰi ɓujisa nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kukuɓɛkɛla inɮɛɓɛ ɔkɔ aɓaz̤ɛ inɮɛɓɛ ɛv̤ɛ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔku nɡ̤uɓani ɔwamnikɛla ujakɔɓi ɛkuɬutʰwɛni ɔwamnikɛla usirajɛli kuɓapʰanɡ̤i asinɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nalɔwɔ sɔnajɔ kujɛ lɔwɔ ɓanɡ̤av̤umanɡ̤a ukuhamɓa nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛla z̤akʰɛ aɓawupʰulapʰula umjalɔ wakʰɛ wampʰalaz̤ɛla nɡ̤ɔɓuʃuʃu ɓɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ nanɡ̤amanɮa ɛmfaz̤wɛ wamlɛɲa nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ akakwaz̤i nɔkɔ wamt͡ʃisa nɔkɔ akakuɲamɛkɛla ɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ kalɔku kɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a umd̤ali wakʰɔ jakɔɓi umɓumɓi wakʰɔ sirajɛli ukutʰi musa ukɔjika nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ikukʰululɛ nɡ̤ɔkukuɬawulɛla nd̤ikuɓiz̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama lakʰɔ unɡ̤ɔwam kǁa utʰi uwɛlɛ ɛmanz̤ini nd̤ɔɓa nawɛ nasɛmiland͡ʒ̤ɛni ajisaji kukuntʲwilisɛla kǁa utʰi uhamɓɛ ɛmlilwɛni akuji kuxawuka nɛlanɡ̤atʲɛ linɡ̤akut͡ʃisi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jɛhɔv̤a nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ ŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kasirajɛli nd̤inɡ̤umsind̤isi wakʰɔ nd̤ixɔlɛ ijiputa jakukǀamaɡ̤uʃɛla ikuʃi nɛsɛb̤a z̤aɓa sɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa uŋǃaɓilɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni uz̤ukilɛ kɛ nd̤ikutʰand̤ilɛ nd̤ixɔla aɓantu ɛsikʰunɮɛni sakʰɔ nɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɔɓɔmi ɓakʰɔ musa ukɔjika nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inawɛ nd̤ija kujiz̤isa imɓɛwu jakʰɔ iv̤ɛla ɛmpumalanɡ̤a nd̤ikuɓutʰɛ nasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a nd̤ija kutʰi ɛtʰɛ nakumz̤ant͡si musa ukutʰintɛla naz̤isɛ ɔɔɲana ɓam ɓɛv̤ɛla kud̤ɛ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤am z̤iv̤ɛla ɛz̤ipʰɛlwɛni z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛɓiz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama ɛnd̤ijid̤alɛlɛ uz̤ukɔ ɛnd̤ijiɓumɓilɛjɔ ɛnd̤ijɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kʰupʰa aɓantu aɓaz̤iimfama ɓɛnamɛɬɔ naɓaz̤iz̤itʰulu ɓɛnɛɛnɮɛɓɛ nɔnkɛ z̤intlanɡ̤a ɓutʰɛlanani nd̤awɔɲɛ z̤iɬanɡ̤anɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɔkukukǁɛla ɔkɔ maɓasiv̤isɛ iz̤intɔ z̤anɡ̤apʰamɓili maɓamisɛ amaŋ̤ǃ̤ina aɓɔ ɓaɡ̤wɛtʲɛlwɛ maɓɛv̤ɛ kɛ aɓantu ɓatʰi jiɲanisɔ ninɡ̤amaŋ̤ǃ̤ina ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ninɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤i ɛnd̤imɲulilɛjɔ ukuz̤ɛ naz̤i nikʰɔlwɛ nd̤im nikǃɔnd̤ɛ ukuɓa nd̤im pʰamɓi akuɓund͡ʒ̤wanɡ̤a tʰikǁɔ nasɛmv̤a akuji kuɓakʰɔ namɲɛ mna kɛ nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a akukʰɔ msind̤isi inɡ̤ɛnd̤im mna nd̤ikǁɛlilɛ nd̤asind̤isa nd̤aɓɔnisa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ tʰikǁɔ wumɓi ninɡ̤amaŋ̤ǃ̤ina ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ unanam̤la nd̤inɡ̤ujɛ akukʰɔ unɔkuɬanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni nd̤isɛɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤uɓani kɛ ɔnɔkukuɓujisa ɔkɔ umv̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a umkʰululi wɛnu ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kasirajɛli ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnu nd̤itʰumɛlɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ukuɓa nd̤iɓaɬisɛ aɓasaɓajɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla namakalɛd̤i nɡ̤ɛɛŋǃanawa z̤ɔkumɛmɛlɛla kwaɓɔ mna jɛhɔv̤a nd̤inɡ̤ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ wɛnu umd̤ali kasirajɛli ukumkani wɛnu ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a umɛnz̤i wɛnɮɛla ɛlwanɮɛ wɔmɛnd̤ɔ ɛmanz̤ini anamanɮa umkʰupʰi wɛŋǃwɛlɔ nɛhaʃɛ wɛmpi nɛnt͡ʃat͡ʃɛla ɓaja ɓanɡ̤av̤uki ɓɛtʰilɛ ɓɛkǀimilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔntɔ wɛsiɓanɛ ut͡ʃɔ ukutʰi musani ukukʰumɓula iz̤intɔ z̤anɡ̤apʰamɓili ninɡ̤az̤ikʰatʰalɛli nɛz̤amand̤ulɔ jaɓɔnani nd̤ija kwɛnz̤a intɔ ɛnt͡ʃa int͡ʃulɛ nɡ̤ɔku aniji kujaz̤i inɛnɛ nd̤ija kwɛnz̤a inɮɛla ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nɛmilamɓɔ ɛnkanɡ̤ala iz̤ilɔ z̤asɛnɮɛ z̤ija kund̤iz̤ukisa iimpunɡ̤utʲɛ nɛɛŋǀiniɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ɛnz̤a amanz̤i ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nɛmilamɓɔ ɛnkanɡ̤ala ukuz̤ɛ nd̤isɛz̤ɛ aɓantu ɓam aɓaɲulwa ɓam aɓantu ɛnd̤iz̤iɓumɓɛlɛjɔ ɓaja kuɓalisa ind̤umisɔ jam akund̤iŋǃulanɡ̤a kɛ jakɔɓi nɡ̤ɔkud̤ɛ uz̤ikǁʰamlɛ nɡ̤am sirajɛli akund̤iz̤isɛlanɡ̤a mpaɬa imfut͡ʃanɛ jamad̤ini akʰɔ aɲukajɔ akund̤iz̤ukisanɡ̤a nɡ̤amiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jakʰɔ and̤ikukʰɔnz̤isanɡ̤a nɡ̤aminikɛlɔ jakuɮa and̤ikud̤inisanɡ̤a nɡ̤antlaka im̤lɔpʰɛ akund̤itʰɛnɡ̤ɛlanɡ̤a kalamɔ nɡ̤ɛmali akund̤iɬutʰisanɡ̤a nɡ̤amaŋǃatʰa ɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jakʰɔ haji und̤ikʰɔnz̤isɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤akʰɔ und̤id̤inisilɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɔ mna nd̤inɡ̤ujɛ ɔkǀima iz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤akʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam nd̤inɡ̤az̤ikʰumɓuli iz̤ɔnɔ z̤akʰɔ nd̤ikʰumɓuz̤ɛ masimanɡ̤alɛlanɛ intɛtʰɔ jakʰɔ ukuz̤ɛ uɡ̤wɛtʲɛlwɛ ujiɬɔ wɔkukǃala wɔna naɓalamlɛli ɓakʰɔ ɓak͡xɛkǃa nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ nd̤aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤ɔlisa kɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nd̤amnikɛla ujakɔɓi ukuɓa asinɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰant͡si usirajɛli ukuɓa aɲɛliswɛ kalɔku kɛ jiv̤a jakɔɓi mkʰɔnz̤i sirajɛli ɛnd̤ikuɲulilɛjɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a umɛnz̤i wakʰɔ umɓumɓi wakʰɔ kwasɛsiz̤alwɛni umŋǀɛd̤i wakʰɔ ukutʰi musa ukɔjika mkʰɔnz̤i jakɔɓi jɛʃurun ɛnd̤imɲulilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija kuɡ̤alɛla amanz̤i pʰɛz̤u kwaɓaŋǁaniwɛjɔ nɛmikǃukukǃɛla jamanz̤i pʰɛz̤u kwɛliz̤wɛ ɛlɔmilɛjɔ nd̤ija kuɡ̤alɛla umɔja pʰɛz̤u kwɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ nɛnt͡sikɛlɛlɔ jam pʰɛz̤u kwɛnz̤ala jakʰɔ ɓaja kuɬuma pʰakatʰi kɔtʲani nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmiŋ̤ǀ̤uluɓa ɛnɡ̤asɛmisinɡ̤ɛni jamanz̤i ɔmɲɛ uja kutʰi nd̤inɡ̤ɔkajɛhɔv̤a nɔmɲɛ uja kuŋǃula iɡ̤ama likajakɔɓi kwanɔmɲɛ uja kuz̤ib̤ala nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɛ kujɛhɔv̤a aliɬɔnipʰɛ iɡ̤ama likasirajɛli ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukumkani wakwasirajɛli umkʰululi wakʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi nd̤inɡ̤ɔwɔkukǃala nd̤inɡ̤ɔwɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla akukʰɔ tʰikǁɔ inɡ̤ɛnd̤im nɡ̤uɓani ɔʃumajɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ammakakǁɛlɛ and̤ikǀakǀisɛlɛɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkumisɛni aɓantu ɓasɛnd̤alɛni iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iz̤ajɔ nɛz̤iz̤a kuɓakʰɔ maɓaz̤ikǁɛlɛ musani ukunkwantʲa ninɡ̤ad͡ʒ̤id͡ʒ̤itʰɛki and̤ikuv̤isanɡ̤a nd̤anikǁɛlɛla ninɡ̤amaŋ̤ǃ̤ina kukʰɔ tʰikǁɔ inɡ̤ɛnd̤im akukʰɔ and̤ilaz̤i aɓajili ɓɛmifanɛkisɔ ɛkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓalukǀʰuku nɛɛntɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ az̤iŋǀɛd̤i ntɔ ɓɔna ɓanɡ̤amaŋ̤ǃ̤ina az̤ɔ aɓaɓɔni aɓaz̤i ukuz̤ɛ ɓad̤anɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔjilɛ utʰikǁɔ watʰʲid̤a umfanɛkisɔ ɔnɡ̤ɛnakuŋǀɛd̤a ntɔ jaɓɔna ɔnkɛ amaɮɛlanɛ awɔ aja kud̤ana nɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi ɛz̤ɔ z̤ɛz̤asɛɓantwini maɓaɓutʰɛlanɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓɛmɛ ɓankwantʲɛ ɓad̤anɛ kuɲɛ iŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi jɛsiɲitʰi ilɔla iŋ̰ǁ̰ɔla isɛɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤amalaɬɛ av̤utʰajɔ isijila isitʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤and̤ɔ isiɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤alɔ jajɔ ɛnamanɮa kand͡ʒ̤alɔ ijalamɓa inɡ̤aɓi namanɮa ajisɛli manz̤i itʰʲafɛ iŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi jɛmitʰi jɔlula ulutʲa lɔkulinɡ̤anisa isiɓaɓula isikǃu sasɔ nɡ̤ɛkǀʰitʲwa isilunɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔkukǀʰwɛla isiɓaɓula isikǃu sasɔ nɡ̤ɛkɔmpas isɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛmfanɔ jɛnd̤ɔd̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔɓuɬɛ ɓɔmntu ukuɓa siɬalɛ ɛnɮwini uɡ̤awula imisɛd̤arɛ utʰaɓatʰa um̤ɔlɛm nɔmɔki akʰɛtʰɛ ɛmitʰini jɛɬatʰi utʲala umpajinɛ imv̤ula iwukʰulisɛ wɔɓa kɛ jintɔ jɔkuɓa apʰɛmɓɛ umlilɔ atʰaɓatʰɛ kuwɔ ɔtʰɛ upʰatʰa kutʰi aɓasɛ umlilɔ ɔsɛ isɔnka upʰatʰa kutʰi ɛnz̤ɛ utʰikǁɔ akǃuɓud̤ɛ kujɛ ɛnz̤ɛ umfanɛkisɔ ɔkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ asiɓɛkɛkɛ kuwɔ iŋǁalɛɲɛ jawɔ ujit͡ʃisa ɛmlilwɛni iŋǁalɛɲɛ jawɔ ujiɮa iɲama nɡ̤ajɔ wɔsa ɔsɛ aɬutʰɛ ɛwɛ ujɔtʰa atʰi hɛɛ kɛ nd̤ijɔtʰa nd̤iv̤a umlilɔ ɔsɛlɛjɔ kuwɔ uwɛnz̤a utʰikǁɔ umfanɛkisɔ wakʰɛ ɔkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ asiɓɛkɛkɛ kuwɔ akǃuɓud̤ɛ kuwɔ atʰand̤az̤ɛ kuwɔ atʰi nd̤iɬanɡ̤ulɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ahaz̤i aɓakǃɔnd̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa av̤iŋ̤ǀ̤iwɛ amɛɬɔ aɓɔ ukuɓa anɡ̤aɓɔni ukuɓa iintliz̤ijɔ z̤aɓɔ z̤inɡ̤akǃikǃi ɓanɡ̤aɲamɛkɛli nɡ̤ɛɛntliz̤ijɔ z̤aɓɔ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ kwaz̤i kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ kukǃɔnd̤a ukuɓa ɓatʰi iŋǁalɛɲɛ jawɔ nd̤ijit͡ʃisilɛ ɛmlilwɛni ɛwɛ nd̤ɔsa isɔnka ɛmalaɬɛni awɔ nd̤ɔsa iɲama nd̤aɮa ɔsɛlɛjɔ kuwɔ nd̤ija kuwɛnz̤a amasikiz̤i nd̤isiɓɛkɛkɛ kwintɔ ɛv̤ɛlɛ ɛmtʰini ɛsukɛlana nɔtʰutʰu nd͡ʒ̤ɛ intliz̤ijɔ ɛd̤ɛt͡ʃisɛlwɛjɔ imtʲɛkisilɛ kanɡ̤anɡ̤ɔkuɓa anɡ̤awuɬanɡ̤uli umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ atʰi akukʰɔ ɓukǁɔki ɛsanɮɛni sɔkunɛnɛ kʰumɓula ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ jakɔɓi sirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤i nd̤ikuɓumɓilɛ unɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤i sirajɛli akuji kulitʲalwa nd̤im nd̤ilukǀimilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlifu ɛliŋ̤ǃ̤iŋ̤ǃ̤wa uk͡xɛkǃɔ lwakʰɔ nɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤akʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlifu ɛlisiɓɛkɛlɛjɔ ɓujɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ikukʰululɛ nɡ̤ɔkukuɬawulɛla mɛmɛlɛlani maz̤ulu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛkwɛnz̤ilɛ d̤umani z̤inz̤ulu z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi ɡ̤ǃ̤ab̤ukani nimɛmɛlɛlɛ z̤intaɓa ɬatʰi nɔnkɛ mitʰi ɛkulɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛm̤lawulɛlɛ wamkʰulula ujakɔɓi ɛz̤ihɔmɓisilɛ nɡ̤ɔsirajɛli ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a umkʰululi wakʰɔ umɓumɓi wakʰɔ kwasɛsiz̤alwɛni ukutʰi mna jɛhɔv̤a nd̤inɡ̤umɛnz̤i wɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ umanɛki wɛz̤ulu nd̤ɛd̤wa umtwaɓululi wɛɬaɓatʰi nd̤inɡ̤ɛnaɓani umt͡ʃit͡ʃisi wɛmikǃɔnd̤isɔ jaɓapʰɔlɔlɔz̤a intɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛjijɔ umɡ̤ɛz̤isi waɓav̤umisajɔ umɓujisi wɛz̤ilumkɔ umv̤a umz̤ulisi wɔkwaz̤i kwaz̤ɔ ummisi wɛliz̤wi lɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɛ umz̤alisi wɛkǀɛɓɔ laɓatʰuɲwa ɓakʰɛ und̤itʰi kwijɛrusalɛm ija nakwimiz̤i jakwajud̤a ija kwakʰiwa nd̤iwamisɛ amaŋǁuwa ajɔ und̤itʰi kumanz̤i ɛnz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓila jit͡ʃani nd̤ijɔmisɛ imilamɓɔ jakʰɔ und̤itʰi kukɔrɛʃi nɡ̤umalusi ɔja kukuz̤alisa kɔnkɛ ukutʰand̤a atʰi kwijɛrusalɛm majakʰiwɛ nakwitɛmpilɛ majisɛkwɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kumtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa wakʰɛ kukɔrɛʃi ɛnd̤imɓamɓɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sɔkunɛnɛ ukuɓa nd̤iz̤iɲatʰɛlɛ iintlanɡ̤a pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ nd̤ikʰululɛ amaŋǃɛ ɔɔkumkani ukuɓa nd̤iz̤iv̤ulɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤amɓini namasanɡ̤ɔ anɡ̤aɓi nakuv̤alwa ukutʰi nd̤ija kuhamɓa pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ nd̤ilunɡ̤ɛlɛlanisɛ iind̤awɔ ɛz̤imakǃʰuɓu nd̤ikǃʰɛkɛz̤ɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤ɔb̤ɛd̤u nd̤ikǁakakǁɛ nɛmiv̤alɔ jɛsiɲitʰi nd̤ikunikɛ uɓuŋǀwanɛ ɔɓusɛmɲamɛni nɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤wɛɓɔ ɛz̤isɛz̤int͡sitʰɛlwɛni ukuz̤ɛ waz̤i ukuɓa jɛhɔv̤a nd̤inɡ̤ulɔ ukuɓiz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmkʰɔnz̤i ujakɔɓi usirajɛli umɲulwa nd̤akuɓiz̤a nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama lakʰɔ nd̤akutʰija namaɲɛ amaɡ̤ama unɡ̤and̤az̤i nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a akukʰɔ wumɓi akukʰɔ tʰikǁɔ inɡ̤ɛnd̤im nd̤akub̤iŋǃa unɡ̤and̤az̤i ukuz̤ɛ ɓaz̤i ɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkupʰumɛni kwɛlanɡ̤a ɓɛsɛ nasɛkut͡ʃɔnɛni kwalɔ ukuɓa akukʰɔ namɲɛ inɡ̤ɛnd̤im nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a akukʰɔ wumɓi nd̤inɡ̤umɛnz̤i wɔkukʰaɲa umd̤ali wɔɓumɲama umɛnz̤i wɔkǁɔlɔ umd̤ali wɔɓuɓi jɛhɔv̤a nd̤inɡ̤umɛnz̤i wɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ v̤uz̤isani maz̤ulu pʰɛz̤ulu sikʰumɛz̤ɛlɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa isib̤akab̤aka mawuv̤ulɛkɛ um̤laɓa ukǃʰamɛ usind̤isɔ uɬumisɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa kuɲɛ jɛhɔv̤a nd̤ikud̤alilɛ ɔkɔ jɛha kɛ ɔɓamɓana nɔmɛnz̤i wakʰɛ liɡ̤ɔpʰɛ ɛmaɡ̤ɔpʰɛni ɛz̤itʲa z̤ɔmd̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ ud̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ lunɔkutʰi kumɓumɓi walɔ wɛnz̤a ntɔni nɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i wakʰɔ unɔkutʰi akunaz̤anɮa jɛha kɛ ɔtʰi kujisɛ uz̤alɛlɛni nakumfaz̤i unanimɓa nɡ̤ani ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kasirajɛli umɛnz̤i wakʰɛ ukutʰi ɓuz̤ani iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iz̤ajɔ ɔɔɲana ɓam nɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛz̤anɮa z̤am wujalɛz̤ɛni mna nd̤ɛnz̤a iɬaɓatʰi nd̤ad̤ala aɓantu pʰɛz̤u kwalɔ iz̤anɮa z̤am lɔ z̤anɛka iz̤ulu nɔmkʰɔsi walɔ wɔnkɛ nd̤awuwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ mna nd̤imv̤ɛlisilɛ nɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa nd̤ija kuz̤ilunɡ̤ɛlɛlanisa iinɮɛla z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ jɛna uja kuwakʰa umz̤i aɓakʰululɛ aɓafud̤uswa ɓam kunɡ̤axɔlwanɡ̤a kunɡ̤axɔlwanɡ̤a sikǀɛnɡ̤ɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ukukǁɛlɛnɡ̤a kwɛjiputa nɔkuxwɛɓa kukakuʃi nɔkwamasɛb̤a aɓafɔ aɓanɛwɔnɡ̤a kuja kuwɛlɛla kuwɛ kuɓɛ kɔkwakʰɔ ɓaja kuhamɓa ɛmv̤a kwakʰɔ ɓaja kuwɛla ɓɛnɛmikǁɔkɛlɛlwanɛ ɓakǃuɓud̤ɛ kuwɛ ɓaja kutʰand̤az̤a kuwɛ ɓɛsitʰi inɛnɛ ukuwɛ utʰikǁɔ akusɛkʰɔ tʰikǁɔ akukʰɔ nɔkuɓa aɓɛ mɲɛ iɲanisɔ unɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ɔz̤isitʰɛlisajɔ tʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli msind̤isi ɓaja kud̤ana kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɓaɬaz̤ɛkɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓaja kuhamɓa ɓɛɬaz̤ɛkilɛ kuɲɛ aɓaz̤iiŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi z̤ɛz̤itʰikǁɔ usirajɛli uja kusind̤iswa nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔsind̤isɔ ɔlunɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ aniji kud̤aniswa aniji kuɬaz̤ɛka kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛmapʰakad̤ɛni asɛpʰakad̤ɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a umd̤ali wɛz̤ulu nɡ̤ujɛ utʰikǁɔ umɛnz̤i wɛɬaɓatʰi umsɛki walɔ jɛna waliz̤inz̤isajɔ akalid̤alɛlanɡ̤a ukuɓa kuɓɛ sɛɲaɲɛni waliɓumɓa ukuɓa limiwɛ ukutʰi nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a akukʰɔ wumɓi and̤itʰɛtʰanɡ̤a ɛnt͡sitʰɛlwɛni ɛnd̤awɛni ɛmɲama jɛliz̤wɛ and̤it͡ʃɔnɡ̤ɔ ɛmɓɛwini kajakɔɓi ukutʰi nd̤ikǃukǃɛlɛni ɛɲaɲɛni mna jɛhɔv̤a nd̤itʰɛtʰa uɓulunɡ̤isa nd̤ikǁɛla intɔ ɛtʰɛ tʲɛ ɓutʰani niz̤ɛ sɔnd̤ɛlani kuɲɛ ɓasind̤ilɛjɔ ɓasɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni aɓanakwaz̤i aɓatʰwali ɓɔmtʰi wɔmfanɛkisɔ waɓɔ ɔkǃiŋǃiwɛjɔ aɓatʰand̤az̤i ɓɔtʰikǁɔ ɔnɡ̤asind̤isijɔ kǁɛlani nifikisɛ ɛwɛ maɓakǀɛɓisanɛ kuɲɛ ukutʰi nɡ̤uɓani ɔwav̤isa ɔkɔ kwaɓamand̤ulɔ ɔwakukǁɛlajɔ asind̤im jɛhɔv̤a ɛkunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ tʰikǁɔ wumɓi inɡ̤ɛnd̤im utʰikǁɔ ɔnɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɔsind̤isajɔ akakʰɔ inɡ̤ɛnd̤im b̤ɛkani nisind̤iswɛ nɔnkɛ z̤ipʰɛlɔ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ akukʰɔ wumɓi nd̤iz̤ifunɡ̤ilɛ iliz̤wi lipʰumɛ ɛmlɔɲɛni nɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa aliji kuɡ̤ukǃulwa litʰɛ aja kuɡ̤ukǃa ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔlɔ z̤ifunɡ̤ɛ z̤ɔnkɛ kutʰiwɛ nɡ̤ɔkub̤ɛkisɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a jɛd̤wa ɓuɓulunɡ̤isa namanɮa kujiwa kujɛ ɓaja kud̤ana ɓɔnkɛ aɓav̤utʰa nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ nɡ̤ajɛ nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a ija kuɡ̤wɛtʲɛlwa ikǃʰajisɛ jɔnkɛ imɓɛwu kasirajɛli ub̤ɛlɛ ujaɡ̤ukǃa unɛb̤ɔ uja b̤aɲalaz̤a iz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤aɓɔ z̤iɓɛkwɛ ɛmakǃɛɡ̤wini nasɛz̤inkɔmɛni ɛz̤it͡salajɔ ɛz̤i niɓɛ niz̤itʰwala z̤iɓɔt͡ʃiwɛ z̤inɡ̤umtʰwalɔ kwiz̤intɔ ɛz̤itʰʲafilɛjɔ iz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤ab̤aɲalaz̤a z̤aɡ̤ukǃa kuɲɛ az̤aɓa nakuz̤isiz̤a ɛkutʰwalɛni kɛ iŋ̰ǃ̰u jaz̤ɔ jaja ɛkutʰind͡ʒ̤wɛni pʰulapʰulani nɮu kajakɔɓi nɔnkɛ masalɛla ɛnɮu kasirajɛli naɓɛkwajɔ pʰɛz̤u kwasɛsiswini natʰwalwajɔ nd̤im kwasɛsiz̤alwɛni kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛɓud̤alɛni ikwand̤im kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛz̤imv̤ini nd̤ija kunitʲatʰa ɛmaɡ̤ǁ̤ɛni nd̤ikwɛnz̤ilɛ nd̤ija kunitʰwala nd̤ija kunitʲatʰa ɛmaɡ̤ǁ̤ɛni nd̤inisiz̤ɛ ninɔkund̤ifanisa nind̤ilinɡ̤anisɛ nind̤iŋǁulumisɛ naɓani ukuɓa sifanɛ ɓɔna ɓawɔɬɔz̤a iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwɛni ɓalinɡ̤anisɛ isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɡ̤ɛsikali ɓakǃɛʃa umɲiɓilikisi ajɛnz̤ɛ isitʰikǁɔ ɓasiɓɛkɛkɛ ɛwɛ ɓakǃuɓud̤ɛ ɓajasitʰwala ɓasitʲatʰɛ ɛmaɡ̤ǁ̤ɛni ɓasiɓɛkɛ pʰant͡si ɛnd̤awɛni jasɔ simɛ asiɓuji sisukɛ kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ jasɔ ɛwɛ ɓajakʰala kusɔ sinɡ̤apʰɛnd̤uli asisind̤isi ɓani ɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛni jakʰɛ kʰumɓulani ɔkɔ niɓɛ nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a kuɲamɛkɛlɛni nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ ɓak͡xɛkǃilɛjɔ kʰumɓulani iz̤intɔ z̤anɡ̤apʰamɓili z̤asɛpʰakad̤ɛni ɔkɔkuɓa nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ akukʰɔ wumɓi nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ akukʰɔ namɲɛ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤am ukukǁɛlajɔ kwasɛkukǃalɛni ɔkunɡ̤asɛmv̤a nakwaɓamand̤ulɔ ɔkunɡ̤ɛkɛnz̤ɛki nd̤isitʰi ikǀɛɓɔ lija nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ kɔnkɛ ukutʰand̤a nd̤iɓiz̤a ukʰɔz̤i ɛmpumalanɡ̤a ind̤ɔd̤a jɛkǀɛɓɔ ɛz̤wɛni ɛlikud̤ɛ nd̤it͡ʃilɔ ɛwɛ nd̤ija kukufɛz̤a nd̤ijililɛ ɛwɛ nd̤ija kukwɛnz̤a pʰulapʰulani ɓantliz̤ijɔ ilukʰuni ɓakud̤ɛ nɔɓulunɡ̤isa nd̤isɔnd̤ɛz̤a uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓam aɓuji kuɓa kud̤ɛ nɔsind̤isɔ aluji kuliɓala nd̤inika usind̤isɔ ɛz̤ijɔn uz̤ukɔ kusirajɛli jiɬa uɬalɛ ɛlutʰulini nkaz̤anand̤ini ntɔmɓi inɡ̤ub̤ab̤ɛli ɬala pʰant͡si ɛm̤laɓɛni unɡ̤ɛnatrɔnɛ ntɔmɓi inɡ̤amakalɛd̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akuji kuɓa satʰiwa ujimv̤ɔkǀɔ nɔkǁʰamla uɓuŋǀwanɛ tʰaɓatʰa amatʲɛ usilɛ umɡ̤uɓɔ b̤ɛŋǃa isiɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɔ sakʰɔ fiɲɛz̤ɛla pʰɛz̤ulu tʰʲila umlɛnz̤ɛ wɛla imilamɓɔ maɓutʰʲilɛkɛ uɓuz̤ɛ ɓakʰɔ kuɓɔnakalɛ nɔkuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɛka kwakʰɔ nd̤ija kupʰind̤ɛz̤ɛla and̤iji kuɓuka umkʰululi wɛtʰu iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kasirajɛli ɬala utʰi kǀwaka unɡ̤ɛnɛɛmɲamɛni ntɔmɓi inɡ̤amakalɛd̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akuji kuɓa saɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujinkɔsikaz̤i jɛz̤ikumkani nd̤aɓa nɔɓuxalaxumɛ kuɓantu ɓam nd̤aliŋ̤ǀ̤ɔlisa nd̤aɓanikɛla ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤akʰɔ akwaɓa namfɛsanɛ kuɓɔ napʰɛz̤u kwamad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu wajɛnz̤a janz̤ima kakʰulu idʲɔkʰwɛ jakʰɔ uɓusitʰi nd̤ija kuɓa jinkɔsikaz̤i nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ wad̤a akwakuɲamɛkɛla ɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ akwalikʰumɓula ikamv̤a lakʰɔ ɔkɔ kalɔku kɛ jiv̤a ɔku wɛna mkǁʰamli wɛz̤ijɔlɔ uɬɛlijɔ ukʰɔlɔsilɛ wɛna utʰi ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɔ nd̤im kwapʰɛla akukʰɔ wumɓi and̤iji kuɬala nd̤inɡ̤um̤lɔlɔkaz̤i and̤iji kukwaz̤i ukunɡ̤aɓi naɓantwana z̤ija kukuz̤ɛla ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ z̤ɔmɓini nɡ̤ɛpʰaɲaz̤ɔ nɡ̤aminiɲɛ ukunɡ̤aɓi naɓantwana nɔɓuɬɔlɔkaz̤i z̤ija kukuz̤ɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛla kwaz̤ɔ ɛɓuninz̤ini ɓɔkukʰafula kwakʰɔ ɛnkitʰɛni ɛninz̤i jɔmaɓɔpʰɛ ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤intɔ z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤imɓi watʰi akukʰɔ und̤iɓɔnajɔ uɓulumkɔ ɓakʰɔ nɔkwaz̤i kwakʰɔ kukɔ ɔkukupʰamɓanisilɛjɔ watʰi ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɔ nd̤im kwapʰɛla akukʰɔ wumɓi ɓɔkuz̤ɛla kɛ uɓuɓi unɡ̤akwaz̤i ukuɓuɲanɡ̤a ikuwɛlɛ inkɔɬakalɔ unɡ̤aɓi nakɔ ukujikǀamaɡ̤uʃɛla ikuz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛsikǃupʰɛ int͡ʃaɓalala ɔnɡ̤ajaz̤ijɔ kʰawumisɛ nɡ̤ɔmaɓɔpʰɛ ɓakʰɔ nanɡ̤ɔkukʰafula kwakʰɔ ɔkuninz̤i ɔz̤ikǁʰamlɛ nɡ̤akɔ kwasɛɓuŋǀinanɛni ɓakʰɔ m̤lawumɓi unɡ̤aɓa nɔkuŋǀɛd̤a m̤lawumɓi unɡ̤aɓa nɔkwɛjisa ud̤iniwɛ ɓuɓuninz̤i ɓamakǃʰinɡ̤a akʰɔ maɓamisɛ kalɔku ɓakusind̤isɛ ɔɔnɔkǀand̤a ɓɛz̤ulu ɔɔd͡ʒ̤ɔnɡ̤iinkwɛnkwɛz̤i aɓakwaz̤isajɔ ɛkutʰwasɛni kwɛɲanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ikuz̤ɛlajɔ jaɓɔna ɓasukɛ ɓaɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnd̤iz̤a umlilɔ uɓat͡ʃisilɛ aɓanakuwuɬanɡ̤ula umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ ɛmanɮɛni ɛlanɡ̤atʲɛ akukʰɔ laɬɛ lakuz̤ifud̤umɛz̤a akukʰɔ mlilɔ kunɡ̤aɬalwa pʰamɓi kwawɔ ɓɔɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ kuwɛ aɓɔ uz̤ikǁʰamlɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓaɓɛxwɛɓɛlana nawɛ kwasɛɓuŋǀinanɛni ɓakʰɔ ɛlɔwɔ uja kund̤wɛnd̤wɛla ɛkǀalɛni lakʰɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ukusind̤isajɔ jiv̤ani ɔkɔ nɮu kajakɔɓi niɓiz̤wajɔ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama likasirajɛli napʰumajɔ ɛmanz̤ini kajud̤a nilifunɡ̤ajɔ iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a nimkʰankaɲɛ utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli kunɡ̤ɛnɡ̤aɲanisɔ kunɡ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓulunɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaz̤iɓiz̤a nɡ̤ɔkutʰi nɡ̤aɓɔmz̤i ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓaz̤ikǁʰasɛ nɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɔɡ̤ama lakʰɛ linɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi iz̤intɔ z̤anɡ̤apʰamɓili nd̤az̤ikǁɛla z̤apʰuma ɛmlɔɲɛni nd̤az̤iɓɔnakalalisa nd̤az̤ɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛsikǃupʰɛ z̤aɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkukwaz̤i ukuɓa ulukʰuni nɛntamɔ jakʰɔ inɡ̤umsipʰa wɛsiɲitʰi nɛɓunz̤i lakʰɔ lilub̤ɛd̤u nd̤akukǁɛlɛla ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ z̤inɡ̤ɛkafiki nd̤akuv̤isa ɬɛz̤ɛ utʰi isitʰikǁɔ siz̤ɛnz̤ilɛ umfanɛkisɔ ɔkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ nɔtʰʲid̤iwɛjɔ uz̤imisilɛ uv̤ilɛ sikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ipʰɛla wɛna kɛ akunakuz̤ikǁɛla nd̤ija kukuv̤isa iz̤intɔ ɛz̤int͡ʃa ɛz̤ifiɬakɛlɛjɔ ɔɓunɡ̤az̤az̤i z̤id̤alwa nɡ̤ɔku az̤id̤alwanɡ̤a inɡ̤ɛkaɓikʰɔ lɛ uɓunɡ̤az̤iv̤a ɬɛz̤ɛ utʰi jaɓɔna ɓɛnd̤iz̤az̤i uɓunɡ̤az̤iv̤a uɓunɡ̤az̤az̤i iɓinɡ̤av̤ulɛkilɛ inɮɛɓɛ jakʰɔ kuɓa ɓɛnd̤isaz̤i ukuɓa unɡ̤iniz̤a unɡ̤iniz̤ilɛ ukuɓiz̤wa kwakʰɔ kutʰiwa unɡ̤umk͡xɛkǃi kwasɛsiz̤alwani nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤ama nd̤iz̤ɛka kad̤ɛ ukuɓa nɔmsind̤ɔ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnd̤umisɔ jam nd̤ijawuɓamɓa nɡ̤akuwɛ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤inɡ̤akuŋǃumli ujaɓɔna nd̤ikuɲiɓilikisilɛ akwaɓa nɡ̤ɔkwɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nd̤akukǀikid̤a ɛz̤ikwɛni lɛɛnt͡siz̤i nd̤ikwɛnz̤a ɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam haji ukuɬand͡ʒ̤ɛlwa kwɛɡ̤ama and̤iluniki wumɓi uz̤ukɔ pʰulapʰula jakɔɓi sirajɛli mɓiz̤wa nd̤im nd̤inɡ̤ɔwɔkukǃala ɛwɛ nd̤inɡ̤ɔwɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla ɛwɛ isanɮa sisɛkɛ iɬaɓatʰi ɛsɔkunɛnɛ sanɛkɛ iz̤ulu nd̤itʰi nd̤akuz̤iɓiz̤a ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ z̤imɛ kuɲɛ z̤iɬanɡ̤anisɛni nɔnkɛ nipʰɛla niv̤ɛ nɡ̤uɓani pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤itʰikǁɔ ɔwaz̤ikǁɛlajɔ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ umtʰand̤wa kajɛhɔv̤a uja kukwɛnz̤a ukutʰand̤a kwakʰɛ kwib̤ab̤ɛli nɛnɡ̤alɔ jakʰɛ ikwɛnz̤ɛ kumakalɛd̤i mna nd̤it͡ʃilɔ ɛwɛ nd̤imɓiz̤ilɛ nd̤imz̤isilɛ inɛmpumɛlɛlɔ inɮɛla jakʰɛ sɔnd̤ɛlani niv̤ɛ ɔku kwasɛkukǃalɛni and̤itʰɛtʰanɡ̤a ɛnt͡sitʰɛlwɛni kususɛla kwikǁɛʃa lɔkwɛnz̤ɛka kwakɔ ɔkɔ nd̤ilapʰa nanɡ̤ɔku inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ind̤itʰumilɛ nɔmɔja wajɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a umkʰululi wakʰɔ ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kasirajɛli ukutʰi mna jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ nd̤inɡ̤ɔkufund̤isa ɔkunɡ̤akuŋǀɛd̤ajɔ nd̤ikuɲatʰɛlisɛ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɔja kuhamɓa nɡ̤ajɔ akwaɓa imitʰɛtʰɔ jam uɓujiɓaz̤ɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ ɓɛluja kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmlamɓɔ ukǁɔlɔ lwakʰɔ nɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɔ ɓuɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amaz̤a ɔlwanɮɛ iɓija kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntlaɓatʰi imɓɛwu jakʰɔ aɓapʰuma ɛz̤iɓilinini z̤akʰɔ ɓaɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amasunt͡su ajɔ ɓɛlinɡ̤aji kuŋǃuɲulwa lit͡ʃaɓalalɛ iɡ̤ama laɓɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓam pʰumani ɛb̤ab̤ɛli saɓani kwɛlamakalɛd̤i kukǁɛlɛni ninɛliz̤wi lɔkumɛmɛlɛla kuv̤akalisɛni ɔku kuɬaɓɛlɛni kujɛ nasɛz̤ipʰɛlwɛni z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi jitʰini ujɛhɔv̤a umkʰululɛ nɡ̤ɔkum̤lawulɛla umkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɛ ujakɔɓi aɓaŋǁanwanɡ̤a ɛɓahamɓisa ɛŋ̤ǃ̤akǃasini waɓat͡sit͡sisɛla amanz̤i ɛwɛni wakǀand̤a at͡saz̤a amanz̤i akukʰɔ lukǁɔlɔ kwaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a pʰulapʰulani z̤ikǃitʰi ɓaz̤ani inɮɛɓɛ z̤iz̤wɛ z̤ikud̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a und̤iɓiz̤ɛ kwasɛsiz̤alwɛni ulikʰankaɲɛ kwasɛz̤iɓilinini z̤ikama iɡ̤ama wawɛnz̤a umlɔmɔ wand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ɛliɓukʰali wand̤iz̤imɛz̤a ɛsitʰunz̤ini sɛsanɮa sakʰɛ wand̤ɛnz̤a utɔlɔ ɔluɓaz̤iwɛjɔ wand̤isitʰɛlisa ɛmpʰɔnɡ̤ɔlwɛni watʰi unɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤i wɛna sirajɛli ɛnd̤ija kuhɔmɓa nɡ̤ajɛ nd̤atʰi nd̤ifumanɛ nd̤az̤ikǁʰamla nd̤awapʰɛlisa amanɮa nɡ̤ɔkǀʰuku nanɡ̤ɛntɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔ nɔkɔ iɓanɡ̤ɔ likujɛhɔv̤a nɔmv̤uz̤ɔ unɔtʰikǁɔ kalɔku kɛ utʰi ujɛhɔv̤a ɔwand̤iɓumɓa kwasɛsiz̤alwɛni ukuɓa nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤i kujɛ wɔkuɓujisɛla ujakɔɓi kujɛ usirajɛli aɬanɡ̤anisɛlwɛ kujɛ nd̤iz̤ukilɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓa nɡ̤amanɮa utʰi kɛ kujintɔ ɛlula ukuɓa uɓɛ nɡ̤umkʰɔnz̤i wɔkumisa iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤akwajakɔɓi uɓujisɛ aɓalɔnd̤ɔlɔz̤wa ɓakasirajɛli kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤ija kukwɛnz̤a isikʰaɲisɔ sɛɛntlanɡ̤a ukuɓa uɓɛ lusind̤isɔ ud̤ɛ uz̤ɛ ɛz̤ipʰɛlwɛni z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a umkʰululi kasirajɛli ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ wakʰɛ kɔmpʰɛfumlɔ ud̤ɛlɛkilɛjɔ kɔnɡ̤amasikiz̤i ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni kumkʰɔnz̤i wɛz̤ilawuli ukutʰi ɔɔkumkani ɓaja kuɓɔna ɓasukɛ ɓɛmɛ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaɓɔnɛ ɓakǃuɓud̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kajɛhɔv̤a ɔɲanisɛkilɛjɔ ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa ɛkuɲulɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛlamkɛlɛkilɛjɔ nd̤ikupʰɛnd̤ulɛ nd̤akuŋǀɛd̤a nɡ̤ɛmini jɔsind̤isɔ nd̤ija kukuɓumɓa nd̤ikunikɛ ukuɓa uɓɛ nɡ̤umŋǃɔpʰisɔ waɓantu ukuɓa ulimisɛ iliz̤wɛ ukuɓa uwaɓɛ anɡ̤amaŋǁuwa utʰi kuɓaɓand͡ʒ̤wa pʰumani kwaɓasɛmɲamɛni v̤ɛlani ɓaja kuɮa nɡ̤ɔkɔm̤lamɓi ɛz̤inɮɛlɛni amaɮɛlɔ aɓɔ aɓɛkʰɔ nasɛlukǃajini lɔnkɛ aɓaji kulamɓa aɓaji kuŋǁanwa aɓajikuɓɛtʰwa sisanɡ̤a nalilanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔnɛmfɛsanɛ kuɓɔ uja kuɓakǃʰuɓa aɓatʰund̤ɛz̤ɛlɛ ɛmanz̤ini ampɔmpɔz̤ajɔ nd̤ija kuz̤ɛnz̤a z̤ɔnkɛ iintaɓa z̤am z̤iɓɛ z̤iinɮɛla upʰakamɛ umɛnd̤ɔ jaɓɔna aɓa ɓaja kuv̤ɛla kud̤ɛ jaɓɔna aɓa ɓaja kuv̤ɛla kwɛlasɛntla nasɛlwanɮɛ aɓa ɓav̤ɛlɛ ɛz̤wɛni lamasini mɛmɛlɛlani maz̤ulu ɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓa ɬaɓatʰi ɡ̤ǃ̤ab̤ukani nimɛmɛlɛlɛ z̤intaɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uɓatʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛ aɓantu ɓakʰɛ unɛmfɛsanɛ kwaɓaz̤iint͡siz̤ana z̤akʰɛ kɛ jatʰi iz̤ijɔn ujɛhɔv̤a und̤iʃijilɛ inkɔsi jand̤iliɓala umfaz̤i anɡ̤aluliɓala jini lwakʰɛ ukuɓa anɡ̤aɓi namfɛsanɛ kuɲana wɛsiz̤alɔ sakʰɛ nɔkuɓa ɔɔnina aɓɔ ɓatʰɛ ɓaliɓala and̤iji kukuliɓala ujaɓɔna nd̤ikuv̤amɓilɛ ɛz̤intɛnd̤ɛni z̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤am iind̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɔ z̤iɬala z̤imi pʰamɓi ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ ɓajakʰawulɛz̤a ɓajɛz̤a aɓaɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤uli ɓakʰɔ naɓakǀʰitʰi ɓakʰɔ ɓajapʰuma kuwɛ pʰakamisa amɛɬɔ akʰɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ uɓɔnɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓajaɬanɡ̤anisana ɓɛz̤a kuwɛ nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uja kuɓaŋǁiɓa ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤iv̤atʰɔ uɓab̤iŋǃɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔmb̤iŋǃɔ wɔmt͡ʃakaz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa amaŋǁuwa akʰɔ nɛɛnd̤awɔ z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤iɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤uliwɛjɔ nɛliz̤wɛ lakʰɔ ɛlikǀʰitʰakɛlɛjɔinɛnɛ nɡ̤ɔku uja kukǁinana nɡ̤aɓɛmi kulɔ ɓaɓɛ kud̤ɛ aɓaɡ̤iɲi ɓakʰɔ ɓasaja kutʰi ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤akʰɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ ɔɓuɓaɬutʰiwɛ ind̤awɔ ikǁinɛnɛ nd̤ikʰwɛlɛlɛ nd̤iɬalɛ uja kutʰi ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɔ nɡ̤uɓani lɔ und̤iz̤alɛlɛ aɓa mna ɓɛnd̤iɬutʰiwɛ aɓantwana nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤aɓa luɮɔlɔ nd̤afud̤uswa nd̤aɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰwa kɛ aɓa ɓakʰuliswɛ nɡ̤uɓani ujaɓɔna ɓɛnd̤isɛlɛ nd̤ɛd̤wa aɓa ɓaɓɛpʰi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ujaɓɔna nd̤isipʰakamisɛla ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni isanɮa nd̤ijiɲusɛlɛ ɛz̤iz̤wɛni ib̤anilɛ jam z̤iɓaz̤isɛ kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ z̤iɓawɔlɛ nɡ̤ɛɛnɡ̤alɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɔ z̤itʰwalwɛ nɡ̤amaɡ̤ǁ̤a ɔɔkumkani ɓaja kuɓa nɡ̤aɓɔnɮi ɓakʰɔ namakʰɔsikaz̤i aɓɔ aɓɛ nɡ̤aɓaɲisi ɓakʰɔ ɓaja kukǃuɓud̤a kuwɛ ɓɛsɛ uɓusɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni ɓakʰɔtʰɛ utʰuli lwɛɛɲawɔ z̤akʰɔ waz̤i kɛ ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɔɓatʰɛmɓi ɓakʰɛ ɓanɡ̤aji kud̤ana anɔkutʰatʲatʰwa amakǁʰɔɓa kwiɡ̤ɔxa ɓasind̤ɛ aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛjɔ ɓɛnɡ̤amulunɡ̤isa inɛnɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi naɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wɛ liɡ̤ɔxa ɓaja kutʰatʲatʰwa namakǁʰɔɓa ɔmŋ̤ǀ̤aŋ̤ǀ̤az̤ɛlisi aja kusind̤a kɛ ɔɓamɓana nawɛ nd̤ija kuɓamɓana najɛ nd̤iɓasind̤isɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ aɓakukǁinz̤ɛlɛla pʰant͡si nd̤ɔɓaɮisa ɛjaɓɔ iɲama ɓaŋǁiliswɛ lɛlaɓɔ iɡ̤az̤i nɡ̤atʰi kunɡ̤ɛwajini ɛnt͡ʃa jaz̤i iɲama jɔnkɛ ukuɓa jɛhɔv̤a nd̤inɡ̤umsind̤isi wakʰɔ ukuɓa umkʰululi wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔnamanɮa kajakɔɓi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ipʰi iŋǀwad̤i jɔkwaliwa kukaɲɔkɔ ɛnd̤amɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa nɡ̤ajɔ kʰɔna kwaɓand̤iɓɔlɛkajɔ upʰi lɔwɔ nd̤atʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤ani kujɛ jaɓɔnani kwatʰɛnɡ̤iswa nɡ̤ani nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛnu waɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰwa uɲɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤ɛnu jini ukuɓa nd̤ifikɛ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ nd̤iɓiz̤ɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ usaɓɛlajɔ sifut͡ʃanɛ kakʰulu isanɮa ukuɓa sinɡ̤akʰululi akakʰɔ amanɮa ɔkuɬanɡ̤ula jaɓɔnani nɡ̤ɔkukʰalima nd̤ɔmisa ulwanɮɛ imilamɓɔ nd̤ijɛnz̤ɛ intlanɡ̤ɔ z̤ijaɓɔla iintlanz̤i z̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ manz̤i z̤ijafa kukuŋǁanwa nd̤amɓɛsa iz̤ulu nɡ̤ɛz̤imɲama z̤ɔkuz̤ila nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ z̤iɓɛ sisiɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɔ salɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ind̤inikɛ lwaɓafund̤ilɛjɔ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤ikwaz̤i ukuz̤imasa ɔtʰʲafilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛliz̤wi iv̤usa imisɔ nɡ̤ɛmisɔ ind̤iv̤usɛla inɮɛɓɛ ukuɓa nd̤iv̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkwaɓafund̤ilɛjɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ind̤iv̤ulɛ inɮɛɓɛ kɛ and̤ɛnz̤a z̤inkani and̤aɓuja umv̤a nd̤awunikɛla um̤lana kuɓaɓɛtʰi nɛz̤iɮɛlɛ z̤am kuɓaɮatʰuli ɓɛɛnd̤ɛv̤u and̤iɓusitʰɛlisanɡ̤a uɓusɔ ɓam ɛɬaz̤wɛni nasɛkut͡ʃikǀɛlwɛni kɛ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ija kund̤iŋǀɛd̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ and̤iɬaz̤ɛkanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nd̤aɓɛnz̤a uɓusɔ ɓam ɓand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkǃʰwitʰa nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa and̤iji kud̤ana usɔnd̤ɛlɛ ɔnd̤iɡ̤wɛɓɛlajɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kuɓamɓana masimɛ nd̤awɛniɲɛ nɡ̤uɓani ummanɡ̤alɛli makɛz̤ɛ ujaɓɔna inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ija kund̤iŋǀɛd̤a nɡ̤uɓani jɛna ɔja kund̤iɡ̤wɛɓa jaɓɔna ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓaja kɔnakala nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ amanund̤u aja kuɓaɮa nɡ̤uɓani ɔwɔjika ujɛhɔv̤a ɔpʰulapʰula iz̤wi lɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɛ ɔhamɓa ɛmɲamɛni kunɡ̤aɓi m̤lɔpʰɛ kujɛ makakʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a ajamɛ kutʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ jaɓɔnani nɔnkɛ nipʰɛla ɓapʰɛmɓa umlilɔ ɓakǁʰɔɓɛ iintɔlɔ ɛz̤inɔmlilɔ hamɓani nijɛ ɛlanɡ̤atʲɛni lɔmlilɔ wɛnu nasɛz̤intɔlwɛni ɛz̤inɔmlilɔ ɛniz̤iv̤utʰisilɛjɔ kɛ ɛsanɮɛni nant͡si intɔ ɛnija kujiz̤uz̤a nija pʰant͡si ninɛmɓulalɛkɔ pʰulapʰulani ɓaɓusukɛlajɔ uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓamkǃukǃɛlajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a b̤ɛkani ɛwɛni ɛnakǁʰɔlwa kulɔ nasɛsiɡ̤iŋ̤ǃ̤ini sɔm̤ad̤i ɛnɛmɓiwa kuwɔ b̤ɛkani kuaɓraham ujiɬɔ nakusara ɔwaniz̤alajɔ kuɓa wajɛ ɛmɲɛ nd̤akumɓiz̤a nd̤akumsikɛlɛla nd̤akumand̤isa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ujitʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛ iz̤ijɔn uwatʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛ ɔnkɛ amaŋǁuwa ajɔ wajɛnz̤a intlanɡ̤ɔ jajɔ jand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛd̤ɛn nɛŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsi jajɔ jand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmjɛz̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a kufumanɛka imiɬali nɛmiv̤ujɔ kujɔ imiɓulɛlɔ nɛz̤wi lɔhad̤i nd̤iɓaz̤ɛlɛni inɮɛɓɛ ɓantu ɓam nd̤iɓɛkɛlɛni inɮɛɓɛ siz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa isijalɛlɔ sija kupʰuma nd̤iliz̤inz̤isɛ isikɔ ukuɓa liɓɛ sisikʰaɲisɔ sɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɓusɔnd̤ɛlɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓam lupʰumilɛ usind̤isɔ iinɡ̤alɔ z̤am z̤ija kuɡ̤wɛɓa iz̤iz̤wɛ iz̤ikǃitʰi z̤itʰɛmɓɛlɛ z̤ilind̤ɛlɛ ɛnɡ̤alwɛni jam pʰakamisɛlani ɛz̤ulwini amɛɬɔ ɛnu nib̤ɛkɛ nasɛm̤laɓɛni pʰant͡si nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iz̤ulu lija kutʰi ʃwaka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsi wɔnakalɛ um̤laɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ naɓɛmi ɓawɔ ɓafɛ nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ luɓɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ lɔna usind̤isɔ ɓunɡ̤akǃɔtʲwa uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓam pʰulapʰulani niɓaz̤ijɔ uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓantu ɓanɛsijalɔ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jaɓɔ ukukɔjika ukuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a kwaɓafɔ ninɡ̤akǃʰipʰuki umɓilini kukuɲɛlisa kwaɓɔ kuɓa amanund̤u aja kuɓaɮa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ umɓunɡ̤u uɓaɮɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɓɔja ɓɛɡ̤uʃa kɛ ɓɔna uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓam ɓuja kuɓa nɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ nɔsind̤isɔ luɓɛ kwiz̤iz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana v̤uka v̤uka ŋǁiɓa amanɮa nɡ̤alɔ kajɛhɔv̤a v̤uka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwɛmiɬa jamand̤ulɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤iz̤ukulwana z̤apʰakad̤ɛ asinɡ̤uwɛ lɔwa wakǀʰitʰa urahab̤i wajiɬaɓa inɡ̤wɛɲa asinɡ̤uwɛ lɔwa wɔmisa ulwanɮɛ amanz̤i ɛnz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓila ɛnkulu iinz̤ulu z̤ɔlwanɮɛ waz̤ɛnz̤a inɮɛla jɔkuwɛla aɓaɬawulɛlwɛjɔ kɛ aɓakʰululwa ɓakajɛhɔv̤a ɓaja kuɓuja ɓaɓujɛ ɓɛz̤ɛ ɛz̤ijɔn ɓɛmɛmɛlɛla ɓɛnɔv̤ujɔ ɔlunɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓaja imiɬali nɛmiv̤ujɔ sisaɓɛ isiŋ̤ǃ̤ala nɔkuŋǀwina mna nd̤inɡ̤ujɛ umtʰutʰuz̤ɛli wɛnu unɡ̤uɓani wɛna ukuɓa wɔjikɛ umfɔ ɔz̤a nɔɲana wɔmntu ɔwɛnz̤iwɛ wanɡ̤a jiŋ̤ǀ̤a ukuɓa umliɓalɛ ujɛhɔv̤a umɛnz̤i wakʰɔ umanɛki wɛz̤ulu umsɛki wɛɬaɓatʰi ukuɓa uɬalɛ unkwantʲa jɔnkɛ ɓuɓuʃuʃu ɓɔmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa ɛkǁunɛla ukɔnakalisa ɓupʰi kɛ uɓuʃuʃu ɓɔmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɔɡ̤ɔtʲiwɛjɔ nɡ̤amakʰamand̤ɛla wɔɓɛɬɛ akʰululwɛ anɡ̤afɛli ɛsihɔɡ̤wɛni anɡ̤asiswɛli isɔnka sakʰɛ kuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ umlatʲuz̤isi wɔlwanɮɛ aɡ̤ǃ̤umɛ amaz̤a alɔ ɔɡ̤ama lakʰɛ linɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi nd̤iwaɓɛkilɛ amaz̤wi ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɔ nd̤akuɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛsitʰunz̤i sɛsanɮa ukuɓa nd̤itʲalɛ iz̤ulu ukuɓa nd̤isɛkɛ iɬaɓatʰi ukuɓa nd̤itʰi kwiz̤ijɔn ninɡ̤aɓantu ɓam z̤iv̤usɛ z̤iv̤usɛ umɛ jɛrusalɛm wɛna ujisɛlɛjɔ ɛsanɮɛni sikajɛhɔv̤a ind̤ɛɓɛ jɔɓuʃuʃu ɓakʰɛ ujisɛlɛ wajifiŋǀa ind̤ɛɓɛ ɛnɔmɓilini ɛhɛkǁisajɔ ɓɛkunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ namɲɛ ujitʰund̤ɛz̤ajɔ ijɛrusalɛm pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓɔnkɛ ɛjaɓaz̤alajɔ ɓɛkunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ namɲɛ ujiɓamɓɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓɔnkɛ ɛjaɓakʰulisajɔ z̤az̤imɓini iz̤intɔ ɛz̤akuɬɛlajɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔwakukʰuz̤ajɔ jimɓukǃɔ nɔkwapʰuka jinɮala nɛk͡xɛlɛ ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤atʰini ukukutʰutʰuz̤ɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ ɓawa isid̤uli ɓalala ɛmantlɔkɔ ɛz̤itratɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛula ɛli liɓand͡ʒ̤isiwɛjɔ ɓaz̤ɛlɛ ɓuɓuʃuʃu ɓukajɛhɔv̤a kukukʰalima kɔtʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ kʰawuv̤ɛ lɛ ntɔ wɛna lud̤wajinɡ̤ɛ uŋǁilajɔ kɔd̤wa kunɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ajɔ iwajini it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi jakʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ ɔɓatʰɛtʰɛlɛlajɔ aɓantu ɓakʰɛ ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ijajitʰaɓatʰa ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ ind̤ɛɓɛ ɛhɛkǁisajɔ ind̤ɛɓɛ ɛnɔmɓilini jɔɓuʃuʃu ɓam akusaji kupʰind̤a usɛlɛ kujɔ nd̤ɔjiɓɛka ɛsanɮɛni saɓakwɛnz̤a isiŋ̤ǃ̤ala aɓaɓɛsitʰi kumpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ kǃuɓud̤a siɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛ waz̤a wɛna wawɛnz̤a um̤lana wakʰɔ wand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔm̤laɓa wand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsitratɔ kwaɓaɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa pʰɛz̤u kwawɔ v̤uka v̤uka ŋǁiɓa amanɮa akʰɔ z̤ijɔn ŋǁiɓa iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔkuhɔmɓa jɛrusalɛm mz̤i uŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kuɓa akuji kuɓa sapʰind̤a kunɡ̤ɛnɛ kuwɛ ɔnɡ̤alukanɡ̤a nɔjiŋǃamɓi z̤iv̤utʰululɛ utʰuli umɛ ɬala pʰant͡si jɛrusalɛm z̤ikʰululɛ iimɓɔpʰɛlɛlɔ z̤ɛntamɔ jakʰɔ mtʰind͡ʒ̤wa ntɔmɓi inɡ̤uz̤ijɔn nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi kwatʰɛnɡ̤iswa nɡ̤ani nɡ̤ɛliz̤ɛ aniji kuɬawulɛlwa nikʰululwɛ nɡ̤amali kuɓa it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi aɓantu ɓam ɓɛɬa ɓaja ɛjiputa ɛkukǃalɛni ukuɓa ɓapʰamɓukɛlɛ kʰɔna kɛ amaasirija aɓakǀud̤isa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ siz̤atʰu kalɔku kɛ jintɔni ɛnamapʰa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓɛtʰatʲatʰwɛ nɡ̤ɛliz̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ aɓantu ɓam aɓalawuli ɓaɓɔ ɓajab̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a iɡ̤ama liɬala liɡ̤itʲwa jɔnkɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ aɓantu ɓam ɓaja kulaz̤i iɡ̤ama nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ɓaja kwaz̤i nɡ̤alɔɔ ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛ lɔwɔ utʰi nd̤inɡ̤ɔkʰɔjɔ haji ukuɓa z̤intlɛ kwaz̤ɔ ɛz̤intaɓɛni iiɲawɔ z̤aɓaʃumajɛla iind̤aɓa ɛz̤imnand̤i z̤aɓav̤akalisa ukǁɔlɔ z̤aɓaʃumajɛla iind̤aɓa ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ z̤aɓav̤akalisa usind̤isɔ z̤aɓatʰi kwiz̤ijɔn ujalawula utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ pʰulapʰula iliz̤wi laɓaɓɔnisɛli ɓakʰɔ ɓalipʰakamisa kuɲɛ iliz̤wi ɓajamɛmɛlɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛkuɓɔna ilisɔ kwilisɔ ukujiɓujisa kukajɛhɔv̤a iz̤ijɔn ɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔkɛlani ɛkumɛmɛlɛlɛni kuɲɛ maŋǁuwa asɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uɓatʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛ aɓantu ɓakʰɛ ujiɬawulɛlɛ wajikʰulula ijɛrusalɛm ujɛhɔv̤a ujiɬuɓilɛ inɡ̤alɔ jakʰɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛɛntlanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ipʰɛlɔ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi z̤ija kuluɓɔna kɛ usind̤isɔ lɔtʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu mkani pʰumani apʰɔ ukupʰatʰa ntɔ ijiŋǃamɓi pʰumani pʰakatʰi kwajɔ z̤ɛnz̤ɛni ɲulu ɓatʰwali ɓɛɛmpaɬa z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aniji kupʰuma ɓupʰutʰupʰutʰu nihamɓɛ nɡ̤ɔkusaɓa kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uhamɓa pʰamɓi kwɛnu umkǃɔʃɛlisi wɛnu nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli jaɓɔnani umkʰɔnz̤i uja kwɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ uja kupʰakama atʰi ɡ̤ǃ̤i aɲukɛ kakʰulu kwand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛmanɡ̤aliswa nɡ̤uwɛ aɓaninz̤i iɓind͡ʒ̤ɛ ukɔnakala imɓɔnakalɔ jakʰɛ ukud̤a inɡ̤aɓi jɛjɔmntu nɛsitʰɔmɔ sakʰɛ ukud̤a sinɡ̤aɓi sɛsɔɔɲana ɓakaad̤am nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ jɛna uja kuɓɛtʰa z̤itʰi makatʰa iintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤ininz̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɛ ɔɔkumkani ɓaja kutʰi kʰamŋǃa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaja kukuɓɔna aɓanɡ̤az̤anɡ̤a ɓakuɓalisɛlwɛ ɓakuɡ̤ǃ̤alɛ aɓanɡ̤az̤anɡ̤a ɓakuv̤ɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔkʰɔliwɛjɔ lud̤aɓa lwɛtʰu nɛnɡ̤alɔ kajɛhɔv̤a itʰʲilɛkɛ kuɓani kuɓa jɛna umkʰɔnz̤i uɲuka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɡ̤atʲa pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɬumɛlɔ ɛlipʰuma ɛz̤wɛni ɛlinɡ̤umkǃwɛɓɛd̤u ɛnɡ̤ɛnasitʰɔmɔ naɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amɛla sakukʰanɡ̤ɛla akwaɓakʰɔ kuɓɔnakala ukuɓa masimŋǃwɛnɛlɛ ud̤ɛliwɛ uʃijiwɛ nɡ̤aɓantu jind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɔmv̤and̤ɛd̤wa ɛkǃʰɛlɛnɛ nɛsifɔ wanɡ̤a nɡ̤ulɔwɔ kusitʰɛliswa kujɛ uɓusɔ ud̤ɛliwɛ tʰina kɛ asamɓɛka ɔkwɛnɛnɛ uz̤itʰaɓatʰɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ iz̤ifɔ z̤ɛtʰu watʰwala umv̤and̤ɛd̤wa wɛtʰu kɛ tʰina ɓɛsiɓa unɡ̤ɔɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwajɔ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ unɡ̤ɔkǀinɛz̤ɛlwa nɡ̤ujɛ kanti jɛna uɬatʲwɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤ɛtʰu watʲuɲuz̤wa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɛtʰu ɛz̤iɡ̤wɛŋǁa uɓɛtʰɔ lɔkuɓa siɓɛ nɔkǁɔlɔ tʰina luɓɛ lupʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ sipʰiliswɛ nɡ̤ɛmiv̤umɓɔ jakʰɛ tʰina z̤ɔnkɛ salaɬɛka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa sab̤ɛka ɛlɔwɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni jakʰɛ waz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a wamwɛla nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛtʰu sɔnkɛ wakʰand̤aniswa waz̤itʰɔɓa ɛnɡ̤awuv̤uli umlɔmɔ wakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmv̤ana ɛsiwa ɛkukǁʰɛlwɛni nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɡ̤uʃa ɛsisid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ pʰamɓi kwaɓakǀʰɛɓi ɓajɔ akawuv̤ula umlɔmɔ wakʰɛ utʰatʲatʰwɛ ɛkukǁinwɛni nasɛmatʲalɛni ɛsiz̤ukulwanɛni sakʰɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔwatʰɛlɛkɛlɛla ukutʰi uŋǃaɲulwɛ ɛz̤wɛni laɓapʰililɛjɔ uɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛsik͡xɛkǃɔ saɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu lamiswa nawaɓɔni iŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa lakʰɛkɛ laɓa nɔsisitʲɛɓi akuɓa ɛfilɛ ɛkuɓɛni ɛnɡ̤ɛnz̤anɡ̤a luɡ̤ɔɲamɛlɔ kunɡ̤aɓanɡ̤akʰɔ nkɔɬisɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ watʰand̤a ukumtʲumz̤a nɔkumv̤isa isifɔ kǁa utʰɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ wawɛnz̤a id̤ini lɛtʲala wɔjiɓɔna imɓɛwu jakʰɛ aɓɛ nɛmiɬa ɛmid̤ɛ ukutʰand̤a kukajɛhɔv̤a kuɓɛ nɛmpumɛlɛlɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkwapʰuka kɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ wɔɓɔna anɛliswɛ nɡ̤ɔkwaz̤i kwakʰɛ umkʰɔnz̤i ɔlilunɡ̤isa uja kuɡ̤wɛɓɛla aɓaninz̤i atʰwalɛ jɛna iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤iɡ̤wɛŋǁa nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ nd̤ija kumaɬulɛla isaɬulɔ naɓakʰulu alaɓɛ naɓanɛɡ̤uɲa ikǁʰɔɓa nɡ̤ɛtʰuɓa lɔkuɓa ɛwumiɲɛlɛ ɛkufɛni umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ wav̤uma ukuɓalɛlwa kuɓak͡xɛkǃi akuɓɔn ukuɓa usitʰaɓatʰilɛ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ isɔnɔ saɓaninz̤i ɛɓatʰand̤az̤ɛlɛ aɓak͡xɛkǃi mɛmɛlɛla luɮɔlɔ lunɡ̤az̤alijɔ ɡ̤ǃ̤ab̤uka umɛmɛlɛlɛ ut͡ʃɔlɔz̤ɛ wɛna unɡ̤ɛnanimɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaninz̤i aɓantwana ɓɛsiʃijwa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓantwana ɓɔnɛnd̤ɔd̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a jɛnz̤ɛ ɓanz̤i ind̤awɔ jɛntɛntɛ jakʰɔ uwatwaɓululɛ amalɛnɡ̤alɛnɡ̤a ɛmiŋǃuɓa jakʰɔ unɡ̤atʰintɛli z̤ɔlulɛ iz̤intʲa z̤akʰɔ uz̤ikǃinisɛlɛ iz̤ikʰɔnkwanɛ z̤akʰɔ kuɓa uja kutʰʲɔɓɔz̤ɛla ɛkunɛnɛ nasɛkʰɔlɔ imɓɛwu jakʰɔ iz̤iɮɛ iintlanɡ̤a ijimɛ imiz̤i ɛɓinɡ̤amaŋǁuwa musa ukɔjika nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akuji kud̤ana ukud̤id̤ɛka liɬaz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akuji kuɓa naz̤intlɔni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukud̤ana kɔɓuntɔmɓi ɓakʰɔ uja kukuliɓala uŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ lɔɓuɬɔlɔkaz̤i ɓakʰɔ unɡ̤aɓi salukʰumɓula nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɔ nɡ̤umɛnz̤i wakʰɔ ɔɡ̤ama lakʰɛ linɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi nɡ̤umkʰululi wakʰɔ ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kasirajɛli ɛkutʰiwa nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓiz̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmfaz̤i ɔɓɛʃijiwɛ ɔmɔja uɓulalɛkilɛjɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmfaz̤i wɔɓut͡ʃa kǁɛʃikwɛni ɛɓɛtʰɛ wakǀɛkiswa ut͡ʃɔ utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ nd̤akuʃija ɔkwɛpʰaɲaz̤ɔ ɛliŋǀinanɛ nd̤ija kukuɓutʰa nɡ̤ɛmfɛsanɛ ɛnkulu nɡ̤ɔmkʰukula wɔɓuxalaxumɛ nd̤aɓusitʰɛlisa uɓusɔ ɓam kuwɛ ɔkwɛpʰaɲaz̤ɔ nd̤ija kuɓa nɛmfɛsanɛ kuwɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǀɛɓa ɛnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ut͡ʃɔ umkʰululi wakʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔnɔɡ̤umɓɛ kanɔwa lɛ ntɔ ɔkɔ nd̤afunɡ̤ajɔ ukuɓa amanz̤i kanɔwa akasaji kuɓa sahamɓa pʰɛz̤u kwɛɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤ifunɡ̤ilɛ ukuɓa and̤iji kuɓa naɓuxalaxumɛ kuwɛ nd̤inɡ̤akukʰalimɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa z̤inɡ̤ad̤ɛ z̤imkɛ iintaɓa nɛɛnd̤uli z̤iʃukumɛ jɔna iŋǀɛɓa jam ajiji kuwɛ unɡ̤aʃukumi nɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɔkǁɔlɔ ut͡ʃɔ ɔnɛmfɛsanɛ kuwɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛna lusiz̤ana upʰɛt͡ʃɛtʰwajɔ unɡ̤ɛnantutʰuz̤ɛlɔ jaɓɔna nd̤iwaɓɛka amatʲɛ akʰɔ kwistib̤ija nd̤ikusɛka nɡ̤ɛɛsafirɛ nd̤ɔlumisa ukǃɔkǃɔ lwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛɛrub̤i namasanɡ̤ɔ akʰɔ nɡ̤amatʲɛ aɓɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛlajɔ nɛmid̤a jakʰɔ jɔnkɛ nɡ̤amatʲɛ aŋǃaɓilɛjɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantwana ɓakʰɔ ɓaja kuɓa nɡ̤aɓafund̤i ɓakajɛhɔv̤a luɓɛ lukʰulu ukǁɔlɔ lwaɓantwana ɓakʰɔ uja kuz̤inz̤a nɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa unɡ̤akʰɛ ukǁʰalɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akuji kuɓa nakɔjika unɡ̤akʰɛ ukǃʰipʰukɛ umɓilini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akuji kusɔnd̤ɛla kuwɛ jaɓɔna ɓajakǃukana ɓaɬanɡ̤anisanɛ and̤ikʰɔ kulɔɔ ntɔ nɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔɔɓani aɓaja kukǃukana nɡ̤awɛ ɓaja nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnawɛ jaɓɔna nd̤ad̤ala iŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi ɛfutʰa umlilɔ wamalaɬɛ iv̤ɛlisɛ impaɬa nɡ̤ɔkwɛʃiʃini lajɔ nd̤ad̤ala nɔmɔnakalisi wɔkujɔnakalisa z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ikǁʰɔɓɔ ɛz̤ikʰand̤ɛlwa nawɛ az̤iji kuɓa nampumɛlɛlɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤imɛlɛnɛ nawɛ ɛmatʲalɛni uja kuz̤iɡ̤wɛɓa lilɔ ɛli laɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakajɛhɔv̤a nɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓaɓɔ ɔɓupʰuma ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛnani nɔnkɛ niŋǁaniwɛjɔ jiz̤ani ɛmanz̤ini naɓanɡ̤ɛnamali jiz̤ani tʰɛnɡ̤ani niɮɛ jiz̤ani tʰɛnɡ̤ani iwajini ninɡ̤ɛnani ninɡ̤ɛnamali jini ukuɓa nilinɡ̤anisɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛntɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛsɔnka nɔkukǁɛlɛnɡ̤a kwɛnu nɡ̤ɛntɔ ɛnɡ̤aɬutʰisijɔ pʰulapʰulani niɲamɛkɛ niɮɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wɛnu ukǁʰamlɛ ukutʲɛɓa tʰɔɓani iinɮɛɓɛ z̤ɛnu niz̤ɛ jiv̤ani upʰilɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wɛnu nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ iiŋǀɛɓa z̤ikad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛz̤iɲanisɛkilɛjɔ jaɓɔna nd̤imɛnz̤ɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤ina ɛz̤iz̤wɛni inɡ̤anɡ̤a nɔmwisimɛtʰɛtʰɔ ɛz̤iz̤wɛni jaɓɔna uja kuɓiz̤a uɬanɡ̤a ɔnɡ̤alwaz̤ijɔ uɬanɡ̤a ɔlunɡ̤akwaz̤ijɔ wɛna luɡ̤id̤imɛlɛ kuwɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kasirajɛli kuɓa ɛkuhɔmɓisilɛ funani ujɛhɔv̤a ɛsɛnɔkufuɲanwa mɓiz̤ɛni ɛsɛkufupʰi ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ makaʃijɛ inɮɛla jakʰɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɔɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a majiʃijɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤ajɔ iɓujɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a wɔɓa nɛmfɛsanɛ kujɔ iɓujɛlɛ kutʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɔkǁɔlɛla nɡ̤ɔkukʰulu kuɓa iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤am asiz̤iz̤ɔ iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤ɛnu nɛɛnɮɛla z̤ɛnu asiz̤iz̤ɔ iinɮɛla z̤am ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a inɛnɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa iz̤ulu liwupʰakamɛlɛ um̤laɓa nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ iinɮɛla z̤am z̤iz̤ipʰakamɛlɛ iinɮɛla z̤ɛnu nɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤am z̤iz̤ipʰakamɛlɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤ɛnu kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa kusiɬa imv̤ula nɛkʰɛpʰu ɛz̤ulwini inɡ̤aɓujɛli kulɔ inɡ̤atʰanɡ̤a iwuɲakamisɛ um̤laɓa uv̤und̤ɛ iwuɬumisɛ iwɛnz̤ɛ unt͡ʃulɛ imnikɛ imɓɛwu um̤lwajɛli imnikɛ isɔnka ɔɮajɔ lija kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ iliz̤wi ɛlipʰuma ɛmlɔɲɛni aliji kuɓujɛla lilamɓatʰa linɡ̤akwɛnz̤anɡ̤a ɛnd̤ikutʰand̤ajɔ linɡ̤akupʰumɛlɛlisanɡ̤a ɔkɔ nd̤ilitʰumɛla kukɔ kuɓa nija kupʰuma ninɔv̤ujɔ nitʰund̤ɛz̤wɛ ninɔkǁɔlɔ iintaɓa nɛɛnd̤uli z̤ija kuɡ̤ǃ̤ab̤uka z̤imɛmɛlɛlɛ pʰamɓi kwɛnu imitʰi jasɛnɮɛ iɓɛtʰɛ iz̤anɮa ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɔmkǃakǃɔɓa kuja kupʰuma imisɛd̤arɛ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɛxawu kuja kuɲuka imimirtilɛ ɔkɔ kuɓɛ liɡ̤ama kujɛhɔv̤a nɔmkǃɔnd̤isɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ɔnɡ̤aji kuŋǃaɲulwa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɡ̤ǀ̤inani isikɔ nɛnz̤ɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa kuɓa lusɔnd̤ɛlɛ ukuɓa luz̤ɛ usind̤isɔ nɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓam ukuɓa ɓutʰʲilɛkɛ haji ujɔlɔ lɔmntu ɔkwɛnz̤ajɔ ɔku nɔɲana wɔmntu ɔɓamɓɛlɛla kukɔ ɔku ɔɡ̤ǀ̤ina isaɓatʰa ukuɓa anɡ̤ajiɬamɓɛli ɔɡ̤ǀ̤ina isanɮa sakʰɛ ukuɓa sinɡ̤ɛnz̤i naɲɛ intɔ ɛmɓi makanɡ̤at͡ʃɔ kɛ uɲana wɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a lɔ unamatʰɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ujɛhɔv̤a uja kund̤aɬula kuɓɛ kaɲɛ ɛɓantwini ɓakʰɛ malinɡ̤atʰi itʰɛnwa jaɓɔna nd̤inɡ̤umtʰi ɔwɔmilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kumatʰɛnwa ukutʰi aɓaz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤inajɔ iisaɓatʰa z̤am ɓaɲulɛ ɛnd̤ikutʰand̤ajɔ ɓaɓamɓɛlɛlɛ ɛmŋǃɔpʰiswɛni nd̤ɔɓanika ɛnɮwini jam nasɛz̤ind̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni z̤am ind̤awɔ nɛɡ̤ama ɛlilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi nd̤ɔɓanika iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ɛlinɡ̤aji kuŋǃuɲulwa kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a aɓanamatʰɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a ukuz̤ɛ ɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ kujɛ ɓalitʰand̤ɛ iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i kujɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓajiɡ̤ǀ̤inajɔ isaɓatʰa ɓanɡ̤ajiɬamɓɛli aɓaɓamɓɛlɛla ɛmŋǃɔpʰiswɛni nd̤ɔɓaz̤isa ɛntaɓɛni jam ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nd̤iɓav̤ujisɛ ɛnɮwini jam jɔkutʰand̤az̤a amad̤ini aɓɔ aɲukajɔ nɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jaɓɔ jɔkʰɔlisɛka ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni kuɓa inɮu jam kuja kutʰiwa jinɮu jɔkutʰand̤az̤a ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤ɔnkɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɛkuɓaɓutʰɛni aɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰiwɛjɔ ɓakasirajɛli nd̤isaja kuɓutʰa naɓaɲɛ nɡ̤apʰaja kwakʰɛ nɡ̤apʰaja kwaɓaɓutʰiwɛjɔ ɓakʰɛ nɔnkɛ maxamŋǀwa asɛnɮɛ jiz̤ani apʰa jiz̤ani kuɮa nɔnkɛ maxamŋǀwa asɛɬatʰini aɓaɓɔnisɛli ɓakʰɛ ɓaz̤iimfama ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla aɓanakwaz̤i ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓaz̤iz̤ind͡ʒ̤a ɛz̤iz̤iz̤id̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnakukʰɔnkɔtʰa z̤ib̤ud̤a z̤ilala z̤itʰand̤a uɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ ɛwɛ ɓaz̤iz̤ind͡ʒ̤a ɛz̤itʰand̤a ukuɮa ɛz̤inɡ̤aɬutʰijɔ nɔkuɬutʰa ɓand͡ʒ̤alɔ kɛ aɓalusi aɓakwaz̤i ukukǃɔnd̤a ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓab̤ɛkɛ kwɛz̤aɓɔ iinɮɛla ɛlɔwɔ kwɛjakʰɛ inz̤uz̤ɔ kɔwakʰɛ ummanɮa utʰi jiz̤ani nd̤ija kutʰaɓatʰa iwajini sisɛlɛ kunɛnɛ isisɛlɔ ɛsiŋǁilisajɔ nɛjanɡ̤ɔmsɔ iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤alɛ iɓɛ iŋǀamisɛ kunɛnɛ ilunɡ̤isa lijat͡ʃaɓalala akukʰɔ kɛ ukuɲamɛkɛlajɔ ɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ amad̤ɔd̤a anɔɓuɓɛlɛ ajɛmka akukʰɔ kɛ ukǃɔnd̤ajɔ ukuɓa ilunɡ̤isa pʰamɓi kɔkuɓa kuɓɛkʰɔ uɓuɓi linɡ̤ɛna ɛlukǁɔlwɛni ɓapʰumla ɛz̤ililini z̤aɓɔ aɓaɓɛhamɓɛ nɡ̤ɔkutʰɛ ɡ̤ǀ̤a kɛ sɔnd̤ɛlani apʰa ɲana ɓɛtɔlakaz̤i mɓɛwu jɔmk͡xɛkǁɛz̤i nɛjɛhɛɲukaz̤i niv̤ujɛlɛla ɓani nisinɛkɛla ɓani ninɡ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛ aninɡ̤aɓantwana ɓɔk͡xɛkǃɔ imɓɛwu jɔɓukǁɔki jini ɓaz̤it͡ʃisɛkisajɔ ɛmitɛrɛb̤intini pʰant͡si kwɛmitʰi jɔnkɛ ɛluɬaz̤a ɓaɓasikajɔ aɓantwana ɛz̤iɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni pʰant͡si kwɛmikǃʰɔk͡xɔ jɛɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa isaɬulɔ sakʰɔ saɓa sɛmatʲɛni aɡ̤ud̤ilɛjɔ ɛsiɬamɓɔ wɔna aɓa nɡ̤amakǃaʃisɔ akʰɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ wawatʰululɛla amad̤ini atʰululwajɔ wɛɲusa iminikɛlɔ jɔkuɮa kuwɔ mand̤iz̤itʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ ɛntaɓɛni ɛpʰakamilɛjɔ ɛnd̤ɛ waɓɛka sakʰɔ wɛɲuka waja kuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nalapʰɔ isikʰumɓuz̤ɔ sakʰɔ wasiɓɛka ɛmv̤a kɔkǀanɡ̤ɔ nɔmɡ̤uɓasi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa watʰi unɡ̤ɛkum waz̤itʰʲila wɛɲuka wasɛnz̤a saɓanz̤i sakʰɔ waŋǃɔpʰisana naɓɔ watʰand̤a naɓɔ wanɮala ukʰukɔ wahamɓɛla unɛɔli waɲ̤ikiz̤a iz̤ikǃʰɔlɔ z̤akʰɔ waz̤itʰuma kud̤ɛ iz̤iɡ̤id̤imi z̤akʰɔ waz̤itʰɔɓa kwad̤a kwaɓa kwɛlaɓafilɛjɔ wad̤inwa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ɛ kwɛnɮɛla jakʰɔ akwatʰi nd̤iŋǀamilɛ ɛɓuja ɛpʰila amanɮa akʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ akutʰanɡ̤a fɛɬɛfɛɬɛ uɓunɛsitʰukutʰɛz̤i nɡ̤aɓani uɓusɔjika ɓani ukuɓa utʰɛtʰɛ amanɡ̤a unɡ̤and̤ikʰumɓuli unɡ̤akuɲamɛkɛli ɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ and̤itʰɛ kǃutʰu kususɛla kwapʰakad̤ɛ unɡ̤and̤ɔjiki nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤ija kuɓukǁɛla uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɔ nɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤akʰɔ az̤iji kukuŋǀɛd̤a ntɔ ɛkukʰalɛni kwakʰɔ maz̤ikuɬanɡ̤ulɛ iimfumɓa z̤ɛz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ipʰɛla z̤imka nɔmɔja z̤itʰatʲatʰwa nɡ̤umpʰunɡ̤a kɛ jɛna ɔkʰɔlɔsa nɡ̤am uja kuliɮa iliz̤wɛ ajimɛ intaɓa jam ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ utʰilɛ wɔtʰi fumɓani fumɓani ɡ̤ɛkǀani inɮɛla isikʰuɓɛkisɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni jaɓantu ɓam nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ɔpʰɛz̤ulu ɔwɔnɡ̤amilɛjɔ ɔɬɛli nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ ɔɡ̤ama linɡ̤uŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ukutʰi nd̤iɬɛli pʰɛz̤ulu ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni nd̤iɬɛli nakɔtʲumkilɛjɔ ɔmɔja utʰɔɓɛkilɛjɔ ukuɓa nd̤iɓujɛ nd̤ipʰilisɛ umɔja waɓatʰɔɓɛkilɛjɔ nd̤iɓujɛ nd̤ipʰilisɛ intliz̤ijɔ jaɓatʲumkilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa and̤iji kuɓamɓana najɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ and̤iji kuɬala nd̤inɔɓuxalaxumɛ kuɓa umɔja uɓunɡ̤atʰʲafajɔ pʰamɓi nɛmipʰɛfumlɔ ɛnd̤ijɛnz̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɔkuɓawa kwakʰɛ nd̤aɓa nɔɓuxalaxumɛ nd̤amɓɛtʰa nd̤az̤isitʰɛlisa nd̤aɓa nɔɓuxalaxumɛ wahamɓa ɛpʰamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ iinɮɛla z̤akʰɛ nd̤iz̤iɓɔnilɛ nd̤ija kumpʰilisa nd̤imalatʰisɛ nd̤imɓujɛkɛz̤ɛlɛ intutʰuz̤alɔ jɛna naɓakʰɛ kɛ aɓɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili umd̤ali wɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ɔmlɔmɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰi ukǁɔlɔ ukǁɔlɔ maluɓɛkʰɔ kwaɓakud̤ɛ nakwaɓakufupʰi nd̤iɓapʰilisɛ kɛ ɓɔna aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɓand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔlwanɮɛ ɔluv̤und͡ʒ̤ululwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa alunakuz̤ɔla amanz̤i alɔ av̤umɓulula ud̤aka nɛz̤iɓi alukʰɔ ukǁɔlɔ kwaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ut͡ʃɔ utʰikǁɔ d̤and̤uluka upʰimisɛlɛ unɡ̤atʰintɛlɛki pʰakamisa iz̤wi lakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ uɓakǁɛlɛlɛ aɓantu ɓam uk͡xɛkǃɔ lwaɓɔ ujikǁɛlɛlɛ inɮu kajakɔɓi iz̤ɔnɔ z̤ajɔ kɛ ɓajand̤iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔka nɡ̤ɛmini ɓakunanz̤ilɛ ukuz̤az̤i iinɮɛla z̤am nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤a ɔlwɛnz̤ɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa alwaliʃija isikɔ lɔtʰikǁɔ walɔ ɓakǀɛla imiɡ̤wɛɓɔ jɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakunanz̤ilɛ ukusɔnd̤ɛla kutʰikǁɔ ɓatʰi jini ukuɓa siz̤ilɛ ukuɮa unɡ̤aɓɔni siwutʰɔɓɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wɛtʰu unɡ̤az̤i jaɓɔnani nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɔkuz̤ila kwɛnu ɛnikunanz̤ilɛjɔ niɓakʰand̤anisɛ aɓasɛɓɛnz̤i ɓɛnu ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓulalɛkajɔ jaɓɔnani niz̤ilɛla ukuɓamɓana nipʰikisanɛ niɓɛtʰanɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǃind̤i lɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ nam̤la aniz̤ilɛli ukuz̤ɛ niv̤akalisɛ iliz̤wi lɛnu pʰɛz̤ulu intɔ ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ inɡ̤aɓa kukuz̤ila ɛnd̤ikuɲulilɛjɔ inɡ̤aɓa nɡ̤um̤la wɔkuɓa awutʰɔɓɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ukutʰɔkɔmɓisa intlɔkɔ jakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmz̤i anɮalɛ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ nɔtʰutʰu ɔkɔ ukuɓiz̤a nɡ̤ɔkutʰi kukuz̤ila nɡ̤um̤la ɔkʰɔlɛkilɛjɔ kujɛhɔv̤a ukuz̤ila ɛnd̤ikuɲulilɛjɔ asikɔku ukukǀɔmɓulula iz̤ikǃamanɡ̤ɛlɔ z̤ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ukukʰulula iz̤itrɔpu z̤ɛɛdʲɔkʰwɛ ukund̤ulula aɓav̤ikiv̤ɛkilɛjɔ ɓɛkʰululɛkilɛ napʰulɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iidʲɔkʰwɛ asikɔku ukumkǃʰɛkɛz̤ɛla ɛsɔnkɛni sakʰɔ ɔlamɓilɛjɔ uɓanɡ̤ɛnisɛ ɛnɮwini aɓaz̤iint͡siz̤ana aɓat͡ʃut͡ʃiswajɔ kǁa utʰɛ waɓɔna ɔhamɓa z̤ɛ umamɓɛsɛ unɡ̤az̤ifiɬi kwiɲama jakʰɔ kuja kwand̤ula kɛ ukukʰaɲa kwakʰɔ kutʰi kǃʰipʰu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkusa kuɬumɛ kamsiɲa ukupʰɔliswa kwakʰɔ ɓuhamɓɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɔ ɓukǃɔʃɛlisɛ ɛmv̤a kwakʰɔ uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a uja kwand̤ula uɓiz̤ɛ asaɓɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uz̤iɓikɛ atʰi nd̤ikʰɔ ukuɓa utʰɛ pʰakatʰi kwakʰɔ idʲɔkʰwɛ nɔkwalatʰa nɡ̤ɔmnwɛ nɔkutʰɛtʰa uɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ wamv̤ukɛlisa ɔlamɓilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛntɔ ɔjiɮajɔ wawuɬutʰisa umpʰɛfumlɔ wɔkǀinɛz̤ɛlwɛjɔ kɔpʰumɛla kɛ ukukʰaɲa kwakʰɔ ɛmɲamɛni nɛsitʰɔkɔtʰɔkɔ sakʰɔ siɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmini ɛnkulu uja kuɬala ɛkwalatʰisa ujɛhɔv̤a awuɬutʰisɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ ɛkuɓalɛlɛni kwɛlanɡ̤a ɔmɛlɛz̤ɛ amatʰamɓɔ akʰɔ uɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmjɛz̤ɔ ɔɲakaɲiswa jimv̤ula nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɛpʰuma amanz̤i ɛmanz̤i anɡ̤at͡ʃijɔ ɓaja kwakʰa amaŋǁuwa anɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ aɓakɔwɛnu uv̤usɛ iz̤isɛkɔ z̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana ɓatʰi ukukuɓiz̤a nɡ̤umv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤i wamatʰuɓa nɡ̤umɓujisi wɔmɛnd̤ɔ wɔkuɬala ukuɓa utʰɛ waluɓujisa uɲawɔ lwakʰɔ kwisaɓatʰa ukuɓa unɡ̤ɛnz̤i ɔkunanz̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔm̤la ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ watʰi ukujiɓiz̤a isaɓatʰa isisɔnwaɓisɔ iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kajɛhɔv̤a watʰi inɔz̤ukɔ wajiz̤ukisa kɛ nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤ɛnz̤i iinɮɛla z̤akʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤afumani ɔkunanz̤ilɛjɔ utʰɛtʰɛ iintɛtʰɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛni uja kwand̤ula ukuz̤ijɔlisa nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a nd̤ikukʰwɛlisɛ ɛmimanɡ̤wɛni jɔm̤laɓa nd̤ikuɮisɛ likajakɔɓi ujiɬɔ kuɓa umlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a utʰɛtʰilɛ jaɓɔnani isanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a asisifut͡ʃanɛ ukuɓa sinɡ̤asind̤isi nɛnɮɛɓɛ jakʰɛ ajinz̤ima ukuɓa inɡ̤ɛv̤i ɓuɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛnu ɔɓunaɬukanisilɛjɔ nɔtʰikǁɔ wɛnu z̤iz̤ɔnɔ z̤ɛnu ɛz̤iɓusitʰɛlisilɛjɔ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ ukuɓa anɡ̤ɛv̤i kuɓa iz̤anɮa z̤ɛnu z̤idʲɔb̤ɛkilɛ liɡ̤az̤i nɛminwɛ jɛnu ɓuɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa nɔmlɔmɔ wɛnu utʰɛtʰa uɓukǁɔki lwɛnu lud̤umz̤ɛla uɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa akukʰɔ uv̤akalisa iliz̤wi ɛlinɔɓulunɡ̤isa akukʰɔ umanɡ̤alɛlana nɔmɲɛ ɛɲanisilɛ ɓakʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ɔkǀʰuku ɓatʰɛtʰɛ inkɔɬakalɔ ɓakʰawula uɓuɓi ɓaz̤alɛ uɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a ɓakǃand̤usɛla amakǃand̤a ɛxamɓa ɓaluka iz̤inɮu z̤ɛsiɡ̤ǀ̤awu lɔwɔ uɮa amakǃand̤a aɓɔ uja ɛliɲatʰɛlwɛjɔ likǃand̤ulɛlwa iɲuʃu imisɔntɔ jaɓɔ ajiji kuɓa jinɡ̤uɓɔ nɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i jaɓɔ ajiji kuɓaɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ z̤iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɔɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a ukusɛɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔɡ̤ɔɲamɛlɔ kusɛz̤anɮɛni z̤aɓɔ iiɲawɔ z̤aɓɔ z̤iɡ̤id̤imɛla ɛɓuɓini z̤ikʰawulɛz̤ɛ ukuja kupʰalaz̤a iɡ̤az̤i ɛlimsulwa iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤aɓɔ z̤iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤ɔɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a ɛmɛnd̤wɛni waɓɔ kukub̤ukǃa nɔkwapʰula aɓajaz̤i inɮɛla jɔkǁɔlɔ ɔkusɛsikwɛni akukʰɔ ɛmikʰɔnd̤wɛni jaɓɔ ɓaz̤id͡ʒ̤ikad͡ʒ̤ikilɛ iinɮɛla z̤aɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɲatʰɛla kuz̤ɔ aɓalwaz̤i ukǁɔlɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ kukud̤ɛ kutʰi ɔkusɛsikwɛni nɔɓulunɡ̤isa aɓufikɛlɛli kutʰi sitʰɛmɓɛ ukukʰaɲa kɛ kumɲama sitʰɛmɓɛ ukuɓa kuɓɛ m̤lɔpʰɛ sihamɓa ɛsitʰɔkɔtʰɔkwɛni sija pʰutʰapʰutʰa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛmfama ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni sijapʰutʰapʰutʰa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓanɡ̤ɛnamɛɬɔ sikʰuɓɛka ɛmini ɛnkulu nɡ̤atʰi kunɡ̤ɔŋ̤ǀ̤walaz̤i pʰakatʰi kwaɓakǁʰamla uɓɔmi nɡ̤atʰi tʰina sinɡ̤aɓafilɛjɔ sijav̤unɡ̤ama nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛb̤ɛrɛ sɔnkɛ sipʰɛla sid̤umz̤ɛla sid̤umz̤ɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amav̤ukutʰu sitʰɛmɓa ɔkusɛsikwɛni kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ sitʰɛmɓa usind̤isɔ luɓɛ kud̤ɛ kutʰi kuɓa z̤ininz̤i iz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤ɛtʰu pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ nɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤ɛtʰu z̤ijaŋ̤ǃ̤ina nɡ̤atʰi kuɓa iz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤ɛtʰu z̤inatʰi nɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛtʰu sijaɓaz̤i ukuk͡xɛkǃa kujɛhɔv̤a nɔkumkʰaɲɛla nɔkuɓuja umv̤a kutʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ukutʰɛtʰa ɔkukǀud̤isajɔ ɔkutʲɛkisajɔ ukukʰawula nɔkupʰimisɛla nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ amaz̤wi ɔɓukǁɔki ɔkusɛsikwɛni kuɓujiswɛ umv̤a nɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓumi kud̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iɲanisɔ ikʰuɓɛkilɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jɛmɓutʰɔ akunakunɡ̤ɛna ɔkutʰɛ ɡ̤ǀ̤a jɛsuka jaswɛlɛka iɲanisɔ nɔkǀɛz̤ajɔ ɛɓuɓini waz̤ib̤uɲulisa waɓɔna kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a kwakuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ ukuɓa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ ɔkusɛsikwɛni waɓɔna ukuɓa akukʰɔ wamanɡ̤aliswa ukuɓa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ mtʰand̤az̤ɛli jaz̤a jamsind̤isɛla inɡ̤alɔ jakʰɛ nɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɛ ɓɔna ɓamkǁʰasa waŋǁiɓa uɓulunɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɔkwɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jɛnt͡simɓi waŋǁiɓa isiɡ̤ǀ̤inantlɔkɔ sɔsind̤isɔ ɛntlɔkɔ ukwamɓatʰa wamɓatʰa iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɛmpind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ waz̤itʰi wamɓu nɡ̤ɛkʰwɛlɛ kwanɡ̤a kunɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jɔkwalɛka nɡ̤ɔkwɛmpatʰɔ jaɓɔ lɛjɔ uja kuɓujɛkɛz̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔkɔ uɓuʃuʃu kuɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓakʰɛ kwaimpatʰɔ jaɓɔ kwaɓaz̤iint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɛ kwiz̤ikǃitʰi uja kuɓujɛkɛz̤a kwaimpatʰɔ jaz̤ɔ ɓaja kulɔjika iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a ɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a ɓaɓɔjikɛ uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓakʰɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a kuɓa uja kuz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmlamɓɔ ɔkǁinɛnɛjɔ ɔɓalɛkiswa nɡ̤umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a ɛz̤ɛ ɛnɡ̤umkʰululi wɛz̤ijɔn waɓaɓujajɔ ɛluk͡xɛkǃwɛni kwajakɔɓi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a mna kɛ nɡ̤uwɔ lɔ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ naɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a umɔja ɔpʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ nɛliz̤wi ɛnd̤iliɓɛkɛ ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɔ aliji ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɔ nasɛmlɔɲɛni wɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ nasɛmlɔɲɛni wɛmɓɛwu jɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ kwɛli kǁɛʃa kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni suk umɛ ukʰaɲɛ kuɓa kufikilɛ ukukʰaɲa kwakʰɔ nɔɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɓutʰɛ kǀʰapʰa kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujaɓɔna uɓumɲama ɓuwuɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɛ um̤laha isitʰɔkɔtʰɔkɔ siz̤iɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ kɛ kuwɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰɛ kǀʰapʰa uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓakʰɛ ɓuɓɔnakɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ z̤ija kuhamɓa iintlanɡ̤a z̤iz̤ɛ ɛkukʰaɲɛni kwakʰɔ ɔɔkumkani ɓɛz̤ɛ ɛɓum̤lɔt͡ʃɛni ɓɔkutʰi kǀʰapʰa kwakʰɔ pʰakamisa amɛɬɔ akʰɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ uɓɔnɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓajaɬanɡ̤anisana ɓaz̤a kuwɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ ɓav̤ɛla kud̤ɛ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɔ z̤iɓɛlɛkwɛ ɛpʰanɡ̤wɛni uja kwand̤ula ukuɓɔna ukʰaz̤imlɛ inkwantʲɛ jand̤ɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ija kuɡ̤ukǃulɛlwa kuwɛ intaɓalala jɔlwanɮɛ uɓutʲɛɓi ɓɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɓuja kuz̤a kuwɛ inkitʰa jɛɛnkamɛla ija kukuɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla amaɡ̤ɔɓɔ akwamid̤ijan nawakwaɛfa ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓaja kuz̤a ɓɛv̤ɛla kwaʃɛb̤a ɓɛz̤isa iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛntlaka ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ ɓɛʃumajɛla iind̤aɓa ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ z̤ɛɛnd̤umisɔ z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a jɔnkɛ imiɬamɓi jakwakɛd̤arɛ iɓutʰɛlana kuwɛ iinkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa z̤akwanɛb̤ajɔti z̤ijakulunɡ̤isɛlɛla z̤iɲuka nɡ̤ɔkulikʰɔlɔ ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni nd̤ihɔmɓisɛ inɮu jɔkuhɔmɓa nɡ̤ɔɔɓani aɓaja ɓɛz̤a ɓɛɓalɛka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlifu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amav̤ukutʰu ɛsiz̤a ɛmak͡xɔɓɛni awɔ ɔkwɛnɛnɛ z̤itʰɛmɓɛlɛ iz̤ikǃitʰi z̤iiŋǃanawa z̤asɛtarʃiʃɛ pʰamɓili z̤iz̤isa ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ ɓɛv̤ɛla kud̤ɛ ɓɛnɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ jaɓɔ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ jaɓɔ kwiɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ kɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa ɛkuhɔmɓisilɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a ɓaja kuz̤akʰa iind̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɔ ɔɔkumkani ɓaɓɔ ɓakulunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ kuɓa nd̤ikuɓɛtʰɛ nd̤inɔɓuxalaxumɛ kɔd̤wa nd̤aɓa nɛmfɛsanɛ kuwɛ nd̤inɛtaxu ɔɬala ɛv̤uliwɛ amasanɡ̤ɔ akʰɔ nɔɓusuku akaji kuv̤alwa ukuz̤ɛ ɓunɡ̤ɛniswɛ kuwɛ uɓutʲɛɓi ɓɛɛntlanɡ̤a nɔɔkumkani ɓaz̤ɔ ɓɛkǃʰutʲwa kuɓa uɬanɡ̤a nɔɓukumkani ɔɓunɡ̤aji kukukʰɔnz̤a ɓuja kut͡ʃaɓalala ɛz̤ɔ ntlanɡ̤a z̤ipʰanz̤ɛ z̤ipʰanz̤ilɛ uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓɛlɛb̤anɔn ɓuja kuz̤a kuwɛ umsiprɛs nɔmplɛjini nɔmɡ̤alaɡ̤ala nd̤awɔɲɛ ukuz̤ɛ ihɔmɓɛ ind̤awɔ jɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jam nd̤ijiz̤ukisɛ ind̤awɔ jɛɛɲawɔ z̤am ɓaja kuz̤a kuwɛ ɓɛsiɓɛkɛka ɔɔɲana ɓaɓakǀinɛz̤ɛli ɓakʰɔ ɓakǃuɓud̤ɛ ɛz̤intɛnd̤ɛni z̤ɛɛɲawɔ z̤akʰɔ aɓakuɡ̤iɓajɔ ukukuɓiz̤a ɓatʰi mz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a z̤ijɔn jɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kasirajɛli ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɔkuɓa uɓuʃijiwɛ utʰijiwɛ akwaɓakʰɔ ɓani ukǀand̤a kuwɛ nd̤ija kukwɛnz̤a kɛ inɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa ɛnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ imiɬali jɛz̤iz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana uja kwaɲa ɛɛntlanɡ̤a waɲɛ iɓɛlɛ lɔkumkani waz̤i ukuɓa jɛhɔv̤a nd̤inɡ̤umsind̤isi wakʰɔ umkʰululi wakʰɔ imɓalasanɛ kajakɔɓi ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɔb̤ɛd̤u nd̤iz̤isa iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɛsiɲitʰi nd̤iz̤isa isiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɛmitʰi ub̤ɛd̤u ɛsikʰunɮɛni samatʲɛ isiɲitʰi isiv̤ɛlɛli sakʰɔ nd̤isɛnz̤ɛ ukǁɔlɔ aɓapʰatʰi ɓakʰɔ nd̤iɓɛnz̤ɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa akuji kuɓa sav̤akala luɡ̤ɔɲamɛlɔ ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɔ imɓukǃɔ nɔlwapʰulɔ ɛmid̤ɛni jakʰɔ iind̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɔ ukuz̤iɓiz̤a wɔtʰi lusind̤isɔ namasanɡ̤ɔ akʰɔ utʰi jind̤umisɔ ilanɡ̤a aliji kuɓa saɓa sisikʰaɲisɔ kuwɛ ɛmini nɛɲanɡ̤a inɡ̤akukʰaɲisɛli ukuz̤ɛ kuɓɛ m̤lɔpʰɛ kuwɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uja kuɓa sisikʰaɲisɔ ɛsinɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ kuwɛ utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ aɓɛ sisihɔmɓɔ sakʰɔ aliji kuɓa sat͡ʃɔna ilanɡ̤a lakʰɔ inɡ̤afi nɛɲanɡ̤a jakʰɔ kuɓa
