ujɛhɔv̤a uja kuɓa sisikʰaɲisɔ ɛsinɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ kuwɛ z̤iz̤alisɛkɛ z̤ɛsid͡ʒ̤wili sakʰɔ aɓantu ɓakʰɔ ɓajakuɓa nɡ̤amalunɡ̤isa ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓaliɮɛ iliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ ɓɛsisitʰɔlɛ ɛsitʲɛlwɛ nd̤im isɛnz̤ɔ sɛsanɮa sɔkuɓa nd̤ihɔmɓɛ ɔmŋǀinanana uja kuɓa nɔwɛjɛlɛjɔ aɓɛ luɬanɡ̤a ɔlunamanɮa mna jɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kukukʰawulɛz̤isa ɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lakɔ ɔkɔ umɔja wɛnkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a upʰɛz̤u nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnd̤itʰamɓisɛlɛ ukuɓa nd̤iʃumajɛz̤ɛ aɓalulamilɛjɔ iind̤aɓa ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ und̤itʰumɛ ukuɓɔpʰa aɓantliz̤ijɔ z̤apʰukilɛjɔ ukumɛmɛz̤a inkululɛkɔ kwaɓatʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛjɔ ukuv̤ulwa kwamɛɬɔ kwaɓakʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰iwɛjɔ ukumɛmɛz̤a umɲaka wɛtaxu likajɛhɔv̤a nɔm̤la wɛmpind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ jɔtʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ukutʰutʰuz̤ɛla ɓɔnkɛ aɓanɛsid͡ʒ̤wili ukuɓamisɛla aɓanɛsid͡ʒ̤wili ɓasɛz̤ijɔn ukuɓanika isihɔmɓɔ sɛntlɔkɔ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɔtʰutʰu iɔli jɛmiɬali ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɛsid͡ʒ̤wili inɡ̤uɓɔ jɛnd̤umisɔ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɔmɔja ɔd̤amɓajɔ ukuɓiz̤wa kwaɓɔ kutʰiwɛ jimitɛrɛb̤inti jɔɓulunɡ̤isa isitʲalɔ sikajɛhɔv̤a sɔkuhɔmɓa ɓaja kwakʰa amaŋǁuwa anɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ɓav̤usɛ iind̤awɔ ɛz̤ikǀʰitʰakɛlɛjɔ z̤anɡ̤apʰamɓili ɓaɬaz̤ijɛ imiz̤i ɛnɡ̤amaŋǁuwa iind̤awɔ ɛz̤ikǀʰitʰakɛlɛjɔ z̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana ɓaja aɓasɛmz̤ini ɓalusɛ imiɬamɓi jɛnu ɔɔɲana ɓɛz̤iɲɛ iintlanɡ̤a ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓalimi ɓɔm̤laɓa wɛnu naɓɛz̤id̤ilija z̤ɛnu kɛ ukuɓiz̤wa kwɛnu kuja kutʰiwa ninɡ̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓakajɛhɔv̤a kuja kutʰiwa ninɡ̤aɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛli ɓɔtʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nija kuɮa uɓutʲɛɓi ɓɛɛntlanɡ̤a nind̤ɔlɔsɛ ninɔz̤ukɔ lwaz̤ɔ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɔkud̤ana kwɛnu nija kuz̤uz̤a ɔkupʰind̤iwɛjɔ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɛɬaz̤ɔ ɓaja kumɛmɛlɛla nɡ̤ɛsaɬulɔ saɓɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ɓaja kuɮa ɛlipʰind̤iwɛjɔ ɛz̤wɛni laɓɔ ɓaja kuɓa nɔv̤ujɔ ɔlunɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ kuɓa jɛhɔv̤a nd̤itʰand̤a ɔkusɛsikwɛni nd̤ikutʰijilɛ ukupʰanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa nd̤iɓanika umv̤uz̤ɔ wɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i waɓɔ nɡ̤ɛɲanisɔ nd̤ɛnz̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ naɓɔ ija kwaz̤iwa imɓɛwu jaɓɔ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɓaz̤iwɛ naɓapʰumɛ ɛz̤iɓilinini z̤aɓɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓaɓɔnajɔ ɓaja kuɓaz̤i ukuɓa ɓajimɓɛwu ajisikɛlɛlɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤inɛmiɬali nd̤anɛmiɬali nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a umpʰɛfumlɔ uja kuɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓa nɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ kuɓa ɛnd̤iŋǁiɓɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɔsind̤isɔ ɛnd̤itʰɛ wamɓu nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jɔkwalɛka jɔɓulunɡ̤isa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmjɛni ɔnɔnkɔnt͡ʃɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmt͡ʃakaz̤i ɛv̤ɛtʰɛ iimpaɬa z̤akʰɛ kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ iliz̤wɛ liv̤ɛlisa iz̤ilimɔ z̤alɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ umjɛz̤ɔ unt͡ʃulisa intlwajɛlɛlɔ jawɔ jɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukunt͡ʃulisa uɓulunɡ̤isa nɛnd̤umisɔ pʰamɓi kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ijɔn and̤iji kutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛjɛrusalɛm and̤iji kuz̤ɔla ɓud̤ɛ ɓupʰumɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkusa uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓajɔ nɔsind̤isɔ lwajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsikʰuni ɛsid̤anɡ̤az̤ɛlajɔ z̤iɓuɓɔnɛ iintlanɡ̤a uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɔ nɔɔkumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɓaɓuɓɔnɛ uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓakʰɔ uja kuɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama ɛlit͡ʃa ɛlija kukǁɛlwa nɡ̤umlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a uɓɛ sisit͡sʰaɓa sɔkuhɔmɓa ɛsanɮɛni sikajɛhɔv̤a nɔnkɔnt͡ʃɔ lɔɓukumkani ɛntɛnd̤ɛni jɛsanɮa sɔtʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ akuji kuɓa satʰiwa kuwɛ unɡ̤usiʃijwa nɛliz̤wɛ lakʰɔ akuji kuɓa satʰiwa kulɔ kusɛnkanɡ̤ala ukuɓiz̤wa kwakʰɔ kuja kutʰiwa unɡ̤und̤imnanz̤ilɛjɔ nɛliz̤wɛ lakʰɔ kutʰiwɛ nɡ̤unɔkwɛnd̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛkunanz̤ilɛ nɛliz̤wɛ lakʰɔ lɛnd̤ilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa ind̤ɔd̤ana iz̤ɛka intɔmɓi ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ ɓaja kuz̤ɛka wɛna nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmjɛni ɛnɛmiɬali nɡ̤ɔmt͡ʃakaz̤i utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ uja kuɓa nɛmiɬali nɡ̤awɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnd̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɔ jɛrusalɛm nd̤imisɛ aɓaɡ̤ǀ̤ini jɔnkɛ nɔɓusuku ɓɔnkɛ aɓaji kuz̤ɛ ɓatʰi kǃutʰu ɓakʰumɓuz̤i ɓakajɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi kǀwaka musani ukuv̤uma ukuɓa atʰi kǀwaka ad̤ɛ ajiz̤inz̤isɛ ad̤ɛ ajɛnz̤ɛ ijɛrusalɛm iɓɛ jind̤umisɔ ɛɬaɓatʰini ujɛhɔv̤a ufunɡ̤ɛ isanɮa sakʰɛ sɔkunɛnɛ nɛnɡ̤alɔ jakʰɛ ɛkǃinilɛjɔ watʰi iɲanisɔ iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa jakʰɛ and̤iji kuɓa sajinika iint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ z̤ijiɮɛ nɔɔɲana ɓɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a ɓanɡ̤asɛli iwajini jakʰɔ ɛnt͡ʃa ɔwaz̤ikǁʰamla nɡ̤ajɔ kuɓa nɡ̤aɓajiɬanɡ̤anisilɛjɔ aɓaja kujiɮa ɓad̤umisɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤aɓajiɓutʰajɔ aɓaja kujisɛla ɛz̤intɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni z̤ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jam pʰumani pʰumani nɡ̤amasanɡ̤ɔ ɡ̤ɛkǀani inɮɛla jaɓantu fumɓani fumɓani umɛnd̤ɔ ŋǀɔtʰulani amatʲɛ kuwɔ ɲusani ib̤anilɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ jaɓɔna ujɛhɔv̤a uv̤akalisilɛ wɛsa ɛz̤ipʰɛlwɛni z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi watʰi jitʰini kwintɔmɓi ɛnɡ̤uz̤ijɔn jaɓɔna usind̤isɔ lwakʰɔ lujɛz̤a jaɓɔna umv̤uz̤ɔ wakʰɛ unawɔ nɛntɔ ajisɛɓɛnz̤ilɛjɔ ipʰamɓi kwakʰɛ ukuɓiz̤wa kwaɓɔ kuja kutʰiwa nɡ̤aɓantu aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤aɓakʰululwa ɓakajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkumisɛlwa ukuɓiz̤wa kwakʰɔ kutʰiwɛ unɡ̤ɔfuniwɛjɔ unɡ̤umz̤i ɔnɡ̤aʃijiwɛjɔ nɡ̤uɓani lɔ uz̤a ɛv̤ɛla kwaɛd̤ɔm ɛv̤ɛla ɛb̤ɔt͡sɛra z̤iɓɔmv̤u iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ lɔ ujinɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa nɡ̤ɛsamɓatʰɔ sakʰɛ ɛɲalasa ɛɓuninz̤ini ɓamanɮa akʰɛ nd̤im utʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔkɔɓulunɡ̤isa umkʰulu ukusind̤isa jini ukuɓa siɓɛ jiŋ̤ǃ̤ɔmɓɛla isamɓatʰɔ sakʰɔ nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɔ z̤iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɔkǁɔv̤ula ɛsikǁɔv̤ulɛlwɛni sɛwajini isifakǁanɡ̤ɛlɔ nd̤isikǁɔv̤ulɛ nd̤ɛd̤wa ɛz̤iz̤wɛni akuɓanɡ̤akʰɔ ɓani nd̤az̤ikǁɔv̤ula nd̤inɔmsind̤ɔ nd̤az̤iɲaʃa nd̤iʃuʃu iɡ̤az̤i laz̤ɔ lakǀʰapʰaz̤ɛla iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤am nd̤asidʲɔb̤a sɔnkɛ isamɓatʰɔ kuɓa um̤la wɛmpind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ uɓusɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam nɔmɲaka wɔkukʰulula nɡ̤ɔkuɬawulɛla ufikilɛ nd̤ab̤ɛka akwaɓakʰɔ mŋǀɛd̤i nd̤amanɡ̤aliswa ukuɓa kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ mkǁʰasi jand̤isind̤isɛla kɛ inɡ̤alɔ jam nɔɓuʃuʃu ɓam ɓaɓa nɡ̤umkǁʰasi nd̤az̤iɡ̤ǃ̤uʃa iz̤iz̤wɛ nd̤inɔmsind̤ɔ nd̤az̤iŋǁilisa nd̤inɔɓuʃuʃu nd̤aliɬisɛla ɛm̤laɓɛni iɡ̤az̤i laz̤ɔ nd̤ija kukʰankaɲa iiŋǀɛɓa z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a iind̤umisɔ z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔkufanɛlɛ kɔnkɛ ukusipʰatʰa kukajɛhɔv̤a nɔkulunɡ̤a kwakʰɛ ɔkukʰulu kwinɮu kasirajɛli awajipʰatʰa nɡ̤akɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmfɛsanɛ jakʰɛ nanɡ̤ɔkɔɓuninz̤i ɓɛɛŋǀɛɓa z̤akʰɛ watʰi ɔkwɛnɛnɛ ɓanɡ̤aɓantu ɓam kɛ ɔɔɲana aɓanɡ̤aji kukǁɔka waɓa nɡ̤umsind̤isi kuɓɔ kɛ ɛkuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛkɛni kwaɓɔ kɔnkɛ waɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛka nɛsitʰuɲwa sɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ saɓasind̤isa ɛkuɓatʰand̤ɛni kwakʰɛ nasɛkuɓakǀɔnɡ̤ɛni kwakʰɛ wajɛɓakʰulula nɡ̤ɔkumisɛla jɛna waɓafuŋǃula waɓatʰwala jɔnkɛ imiɬa jasɛpʰakad̤ɛni kɛ ɓɔna ɓampʰikisa ɓamɛnz̤a ɓuɬunɡ̤u umɔja wakʰɛ ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ waɡ̤ukǃuka kɛ waɓa lut͡ʃaɓa kuɓɔ naɓɔ ɓaz̤a aɓantu ɓakʰɛ ɓakʰumɓula imiɬa jasɛpʰakad̤ɛni kamɔsɛs ɓatʰi upʰi lɔ waɓaɲusa ɛlwanɮɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ nɔmalusi wɔm̤lamɓi wakʰɛ upʰi lɔwɔ wawuɓɛka pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ umɔja wɔɓuŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓakʰɛ wajihamɓisa nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ kukamɔsɛs inɡ̤alɔ jɔkuhɔmɓa kwakʰɛ wawakǀand̤a amanz̤i pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ ukuz̤ɛ az̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ waɓahamɓisa ɛmanz̤ini anz̤ɔnɡ̤ɔnz̤ɔnɡ̤ɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛhaʃɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ aɓakʰuɓɛka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ ɛz̤iɬa z̤ijɛ ɛntilini umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a waɓapʰumz̤a wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuɓakǃʰuɓa aɓantu ɓakʰɔ ukuz̤ɛ uz̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ iɡ̤ama ɛliz̤ukilɛjɔ b̤ɛka usɛmaz̤ulwini uɓɔnɛ usɛnɡ̤ɔnt͡sini jɔɓuŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓakʰɔ nɛjɛsihɔmɓɔ sakʰɔ ɓupʰi uɓukʰwɛlɛ ɓakʰɔ nɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓakʰɔ ukusika kwɛz̤iɓilini z̤akʰɔ nɛɛmfɛsanɛ z̤akʰɔ z̤iɓamɓɛkilɛ kuɓa unɡ̤uɓawɔ wɛna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uaɓraham ɛnɡ̤asaz̤i usirajɛli ɛnɡ̤asinakani wɛna jɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤uɓawɔ umkʰululi wɛtʰu liɡ̤ama lakʰɔ kwasɛpʰakad̤ɛni jini ukuɓa usijɛkɛ sid̤unɡ̤ud̤ɛlɛ jɛhɔv̤a simkɛ ɛz̤inɮɛlɛni z̤akʰɔ ujikǃakǃad̤ɛkisɛ intliz̤ijɔ jɛtʰu sinɡ̤akɔjiki wɛna ɓuja nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɛlifa lakʰɔ aɓantu ɓakʰɔ aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓaɮa umz̤uz̤wana aɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓɛtʰu ɓajiɡ̤ǃ̤uʃa iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jakʰɔ sisukɛ saɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓɔ unɡ̤aɓalawulanɡ̤a kwasɛpʰakad̤ɛni aɓanɡ̤aɓiz̤wanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama lakʰɔ jɔɔ wanɡ̤a unɡ̤awak͡xaz̤ula amaz̤ulu uɬɛ z̤iz̤amaz̤amɛ iintaɓa ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmlilɔ uv̤utʰisa iint͡sasa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmlilɔ ukǁʰapʰaz̤ɛlisa amanz̤i ukuz̤ɛ ulaz̤isɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ kuɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓakʰɔ z̤iɡ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤ɛ iintlanɡ̤a ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɔ ɛkwɛnz̤ɛni kwakʰɔ imisɛɓɛnz̤i ɛjɔjikɛkajɔ ɛɓɛ sinɡ̤ajilind̤ɛlɛ wanɡ̤a unɡ̤ɛɬa z̤iz̤amaz̤amɛ iintaɓa ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɔ kususɛla kwasɛpʰakad̤ɛni aɓantu aɓɛv̤anɡ̤a aɓamamɛlanɡ̤a nɛlisɔ aliɓɔnanɡ̤a tʰikǁɔ inɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uwɛ ɔmɛnz̤ɛlajɔ lɔwɔ ulind̤ɛlɛ kujɛ umkʰawulɛlɛ ɔnɛmiɬali ɛnz̤ɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa ɛkukukʰumɓulɛni kwaɓɔ ɛz̤inɮɛlɛni z̤akʰɔ jaɓɔna wɛna uɓunɔɓuxalaxumɛ masiɓɛ kɛ sinɡ̤aɓɔni kud̤ala sikwɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ sɔsind̤iswa kɛ kɛ sisukɛ saɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔjiŋǃamɓi sɔnkɛ sipʰɛla jand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛnɔmz̤i jɔnkɛ imisɛɓɛnz̤i jɛtʰu jɔɓulunɡ̤isa saɓuna nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amaɡ̤ǃ̤aɓi sɔnkɛ sipʰɛla uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛtʰu ɓasitʰaɓatʰa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɔja akwaɓakʰɔ uliŋǃulajɔ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ uz̤ikǁʰɔkǁʰajɔ ukuɓa aɓamɓɛlɛlɛ kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓusitʰɛlisilɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ kutʰi wasiɲiɓilikisa nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛtʰu kalɔku kɛ jɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤uɓawɔ silud̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ unɡ̤umɓumɓi wɛtʰu sisisɛnz̤ɔ sɛsanɮa sakʰɔ sɔnkɛ sipʰɛla musa ukuɓa nɔɓuxalaxumɛ jɛhɔv̤a kupʰɛlɛ unɡ̤aɓukʰumɓuli uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ jaɓɔna kʰawusib̤ɛkɛ sinɡ̤aɓantu ɓakʰɔ sɔnkɛ sipʰɛla imiz̤i jɔɓuŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓakʰɔ ijintlanɡ̤ɔ iz̤ijɔn ijintlanɡ̤ɔ ijɛrusalɛm iliŋǁuwa inɮu jɔɓuŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓɛtʰu nɔkuhɔmɓa kwɛtʰu aɓaɓɛkud̤umisɛla kujɔ ɔɔɓawɔ it͡ʃilɛ nɡ̤umlilɔ nɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛka kutʰi z̤ikǀʰitʰakɛlɛ uja kuz̤ihamɓa nɡ̤ɔkwakʰɔ z̤ind͡ʒ̤alɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ jɛhɔv̤a utʰi kǀwaka usikǀinɛz̤ɛlɛ kupʰɛlɛ nd̤aŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɛka kwaɓaɓɛnɡ̤and̤iɓuz̤i nd̤afumanɛka kwaɓaɓɛnɡ̤and̤ifuni nd̤atʰi nd̤ikʰɔ nd̤ikʰɔ kuɬanɡ̤a ɔɓɛlunɡ̤aɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama nd̤ɔlula isanɮa z̤am jɔnkɛ kuɓantu aɓaz̤iind͡ʒ̤uɓakǃa aɓahamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɛnɡ̤alunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmv̤a kwɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a ɛz̤iz̤ɛz̤aɓɔ aɓantu aɓa ɓand̤ikǃumɓisajɔ nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ ɓɛsɛɓuswɛni ɓam ɓɛɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla ɛmijɛz̤wɛni ɓɛkǃʰumisɛla ɛz̤itɛnɛni ɓɛɬɛli ɛmaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni ɓɛlalisa ɛz̤ind̤awɛni ɛz̤iŋǃaɓilɛjɔ ɓɛsiɮa iɲama jɛhaɡ̤u ɛz̤itʲɛni z̤aɓɔ inɡ̤um̤luz̤i ɔjimɓɔz̤isa ɓɛsitʰi jima unɡ̤asɔnd̤ɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kunawɛ aɓɔ ɓanɡ̤umsi ɛz̤impumlwɛni z̤am umlilɔ ɔt͡ʃa z̤ɔnkɛ jaɓɔna kub̤aliwɛ pʰamɓi kwatʰiwa and̤iji kutʰi nd̤inɡ̤apʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlanɡ̤a nd̤ija kupʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlɛla ɛsɔnd̤wɛni lɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jaɓɔ iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɛnu ɛz̤iɡ̤wɛŋǁa nɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ ɛz̤iɡ̤wɛŋǁa z̤ɔɔjiɬɔ kuɲɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a aɓakǃʰumisɛlajɔ ɛz̤intaɓɛni ɓand̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a ɛz̤ind̤ulini nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ nd̤ija kuwulinɡ̤anisɛla umv̤uz̤ɔ wɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i waɓɔ kukǃala ɛsɔnd̤wɛni laɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa iŋǀind̤i ifuɲanwa ɛsiɬɔkwɛni atʰi musa ukusɔnakalisa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kukʰɔ int͡sikɛlɛlɔ kusɔ nd̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓam ukuz̤ɛ nd̤inɡ̤ɔnakalisi intɔ jɔnkɛ nd̤ija kuv̤ɛlisa imɓɛwu kajakɔɓi inɮalifa jɛntaɓa jam kwajud̤a ɓaliɮɛ aɓaɲulwa ɓam ɓaɬalɛ kʰɔna aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓam iʃarɔn jɔɓa lik͡xiwa lɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛntili jɛakɔrɛ iɓɛ jind̤awɔ jɔkuɓutʰa iinkɔmɔ ɛɓantwini ɓam aɓand̤ikǃukǃɛlɛjɔ kɛ nimʃijilɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nijiliɓɛlɛjɔ intaɓa jam ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nimlunɡ̤isɛlajɔ utʰamsaŋǃa isitʰɛɓɛ nimz̤alisɛlajɔ usiɬɔ iwajini ɛpʰitʰikɛz̤iwɛjɔ nd̤inimisɛlɛ ik͡xɛlɛ niɡ̤ukǃɛlɛ nɔnkɛ mpɛla nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa nd̤aniɓiz̤ajɔ anasaɓɛla nd̤atʰɛtʰa anɛv̤a nɛsuka nɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni naɲula ɛnd̤inɡ̤akunanz̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔnani aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓam ɓaja kuɮa kɛ nija kulamɓa jaɓɔnani aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓam ɓaja kusɛla kɛ nija kuŋǁanwa jaɓɔnani aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓam ɓaja kuv̤uja kɛ nija kud̤ana jaɓɔnani aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓam ɓaja kumɛmɛlɛla nɡ̤ɔkukǀʰwajitʰa kwɛntliz̤ijɔ kɛ nija kukʰala nɡ̤umv̤and̤ɛd̤wa wɛntliz̤ijɔ nib̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤ɛ kukwapʰuka kɔmɔja wɛnu nija kuliʃija iɡ̤ama lɛnu liɓɛ sisiʃwaɓulɔ kuɓaɲulwa ɓam ikuɓulalɛ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ iɓaɓiz̤ɛ nɡ̤alimɓi iɡ̤ama aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓajɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔkud̤ɛ atʰi ɔz̤isikɛlɛlɛjɔ ɛliz̤wɛni az̤isikɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ wɛɲanisɔ atʰi ɔfunɡ̤ajɔ ɛliz̤wɛni afunɡ̤ɛ utʰikǁɔ wɛɲanisɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa z̤ilitʲɛlwɛ iimɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ z̤anɡ̤apʰamɓili nanɡ̤ɔkuɓa z̤isitʰɛlɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nijaɓɔna nd̤id̤ala amaz̤ulu amat͡ʃa nɛɬaɓatʰi ɛlit͡ʃa anɡ̤akʰund͡ʒ̤ulwa awɔkukǃala anɡ̤ɛɲuki atʰi kǃatʰa ɛntliz̤ijwɛni haji jiɓani nɛmiɬali niɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓɛ jilɔɔ ntɔ nd̤ijid̤alajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jaɓɔnani nd̤ijajid̤ala ijɛrusalɛm ukuɓa iɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓɛ naɓantu ɓajɔ ukuɓa ɓaɓɛ nɛmiɬali nd̤ija kuɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓa nɡ̤ɛjɛrusalɛm nd̤iɓɛ nɛmiɬali nɡ̤aɓantu ɓam linɡ̤aɓi sav̤akala kʰɔna iliz̤wi lɔkulila nɛliz̤wi lɔkukʰala akuji kuɓa sav̤ɛla kʰɔna ɔlunɛɛnt͡suku nɛkǁʰɛɡ̤ɔ ɛlinɡ̤ajiz̤alisanɡ̤a imiɬa jalɔ kuɓa uja ɛnɡ̤ɔmiɲaka ilikʰulu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ at͡ʃab̤iswɛ umɔni ɛnɡ̤ɔmiɲaka ilikʰulu ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ɓaja kwakʰa iz̤inɮu ɓaz̤iɬalɛ ɓatʲalɛ iz̤id̤ilija ɓaɮɛ iz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤az̤ɔ aɓaji kwakʰa kuɬalɛ ɓamɓi aɓaji kutʲala kuɮɛ ɓamɓi kuɓa ija kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔmtʰi imiɬa jaɓantu ɓam ɓaɮɛ intɔ ɛsɛtʲɛnz̤wɛ z̤iz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ aɓaɲulwa ɓam aɓaji kuz̤ikǁʰamla nɡ̤ɔkulamɓatʰajɔ ɓaz̤alɛlɛ ukʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰isɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓajimɓɛwu ajisikɛlɛlɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a naɓapʰumɛ ɛz̤iɓilinini z̤aɓɔ ɓanaɓɔ kuja kutʰi ɓɛnɡ̤ɛkaɓiz̤i nd̤isaɓɛlɛ ɓɛsatʰɛtʰa nd̤iɓɛ sɛnd̤iv̤ilɛ kuja kuɮa nd̤awɔɲɛ iŋ̤ǀ̤uka nɛmv̤ana inɡ̤ɔɲama iɮɛ umkǃukǃu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnkɔmɔ iɲɔka siɓɛ lutʰuli isɔnka sajɔ az̤iji kwɛnz̤a ɓuɓi z̤ɔnakalisɛ kujɔ jɔnkɛ intaɓa jam ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi amaz̤ulu ajitrɔnɛ jam iɬaɓatʰi sisiɬalɔ sɛɛɲawɔ z̤am ijini lɛ nɮu nija kund̤akʰɛla jɔna ijini lɛ nd̤awɔ jɔkupʰumla z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ saz̤ɛnz̤a isanɮa z̤aɓakʰɔ kɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ib̤ɛka kulɔ kɔlusiz̤ana kɔmɔja wapʰukilɛjɔ kɔɡ̤ub̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɛliz̤wi ɔkǁʰɛla inkɔmɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsikǁaɓɛlamntu ɔɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla iɡ̤uʃa nɡ̤umsiki wɛnd͡ʒ̤a ɔɲusa umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa nɡ̤umɲusi wɛɡ̤az̤i lɛhaɡ̤u ɔkʰumɓuz̤a nɡ̤ɔkǃʰumisɛlɔ lwɛntlaka ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ nɡ̤ɔsikɛlɛla intɔ ɛɓuɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a ɓɛz̤iɲulɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ iinɮɛla z̤aɓɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ wawananz̤a amaz̤ɔtʰɛ aɓɔ kɛ nd̤ija kuɲula iimfɛkɛtʰɔ z̤ɔkufɛkɛtʰa nɡ̤aɓɔ nd̤iɓaz̤isɛlɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iɓaŋǁunɡ̤upʰalisajɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa nd̤aɓiz̤ajɔ akwaɓakʰɔ usaɓɛlajɔ nd̤atʰɛtʰa aɓɛv̤a ɓɛsuka ɓɛnz̤a uɓuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni ɓaɲula nɛntɔ ɛnd̤inɡ̤ajinanz̤ilɛjɔ liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a niɡ̤ub̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɛliz̤wi lakʰɛ utʰi aɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu aɓanitʰijajɔ aɓaniɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰajɔ kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤ama ɓatʰi makaz̤iz̤ukisɛ ujɛhɔv̤a siɓɔnɛ imiv̤ujɔ jɛnu ɓaja kud̤ana kɛ ɓɔna pʰulapʰulani isand̤i ɛsipʰuma kuwɔ umz̤i iliz̤wi ɛlipʰuma ɛtɛmpilɛni iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɛpʰind̤ɛz̤ɛla impatʰɔ jɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɛ inɡ̤ɛkaz̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤i jaz̤ala inɡ̤ɛkɛz̤i inimɓakujɔ jatʰi tʲiɓilili ɔjinkwɛnkwɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔkʰɛ wɛv̤a kund͡ʒ̤alɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔkʰɛ waɓɔna iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ind͡ʒ̤alɔ kuja kuz̤alwa iliz̤wɛ nɡ̤aminiɲɛ kuz̤alwa uɬanɡ̤a nɡ̤asiɬanɮɔ siɲɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa isatʰi ukutʰi ukuz̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤a jaɓaz̤ala ɔɲana ɓajɔ iz̤ijɔn mna nd̤inɡ̤av̤ɛlisisa nd̤inɡ̤az̤alisi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤inɡ̤atʰi nd̤iz̤alisajɔ nd̤iv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ɛ ut͡ʃɔ utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ v̤ujisanani nɛjɛrusalɛm niɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓɛ nɡ̤ajɔ nɔnkɛ ɓajitʰand̤ajɔ jɛnz̤ani imiɬali niɓɛ nɛmiɬali nɔnkɛ ɓajɛnz̤alajɔ isid͡ʒ̤wili ukuz̤ɛ naɲɛ niɬutʰɛ liɓɛlɛ lɛɛntutʰuz̤ɛlɔ z̤ajɔ ukuz̤ɛ niʃuɓɛ nikǁʰamlɛ ukwɛɬisa kɔz̤ukɔ lwajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ut͡ʃɔ ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤isinɡ̤isa ukǁɔlɔ kujɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmlamɓɔ nɔz̤ukɔ lwɛɛntlanɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsiɬamɓɔ ɛsikʰukulajɔ ukuz̤ɛ naɲɛ nija kuɓɛlɛkwa ɛpʰanɡ̤wɛni nitɛkɛtiswɛ ɛmatʰanɡ̤ɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmntu ɔtʰu tʰuz̤ɛlwa nɡ̤unina nd̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukunitʰutʰuz̤ɛla nitʰutʰuz̤ɛlwɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm nɔɓɔna iɓɛ nɛmiɬali intliz̤ijɔ jɛnu aɬumɛ amatʰamɓɔ ɛnu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɬaz̤a saz̤ɛkɛ isanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a ɛɓakʰɔnz̤ini ɓakʰɛ az̤ib̤av̤umɛlɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɛ kuɓa jaɓɔnani ujɛhɔv̤a uja kuz̤a nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ z̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsakǃʰwitʰi iiŋǃwɛlɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔkulwa ukuz̤ɛ aɓujɛkɛz̤ɛ umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuʃuʃu nɔkukʰalima kwakʰɛ nɡ̤amalanɡ̤atʲɛ ɔmlilɔ kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uja kujiɡ̤wɛɓa nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ nanɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ lakʰɛ iɲama jɔnkɛ ɓaɓɛ ɓaninz̤i aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a aɓɔ ɓaz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisajɔ ɓaz̤iɬamɓululɛlɛ imijɛz̤ɔ ɓɛkǁɛlisa ɔmɲɛ ɔnɡ̤apʰakatʰi ɓaɮɛ iɲama jɛhaɡ̤u nɛntɔ ɛnɛz̤ɔtʰɛ nɛmpuku ɓaja kupʰɛla kuɲɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a mna kɛ nd̤ijaz̤az̤i iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ nɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤aɓɔ kɔɓakʰɔ ikǁɛʃa lɔkuɓa z̤iɬanɡ̤anisanɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a nɛɛlwimi z̤iz̤ɛ z̤iɓuɓɔnɛ uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓam nd̤ɔmisa umkǃɔnd̤isɔ pʰakatʰi kwaz̤ɔ nd̤itʰumɛ aɓasind̤ilɛjɔ kuz̤ɔ ɓajɛ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɛz̤inɡ̤ɔɔtarʃiʃɛ nɔpuli nɔlud̤i aɓatʲɛd̤i ɓɛsapʰɛtʰa ɛz̤inɡ̤ɔɔtub̤ali nɔjav̤an ɛz̤ikǃitʰini ɛz̤ikud̤ɛ ɛz̤inɡ̤az̤iv̤anɡ̤a iind̤aɓa z̤am ɛz̤inɡ̤aɓuɓɔnanɡ̤a uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓam ɓaɓukǁɛlɛ uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓam ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɓaja kuɓaz̤isa ɓɔnkɛ aɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu ɓɛv̤ɛla naɓɔ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɓɛnɡ̤umnikɛlɔ kujɛhɔv̤a ɓɛkʰwɛlɛ ɛmahaʃɛni nasɛz̤iŋǃwɛlwɛni nasɛmatʰalɛni nakɔɔnɮɛɓɛnd̤ɛ nakwiinkamɛlakaz̤i ɓɛɲukɛ ɛntaɓɛni jam ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kwand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛwuz̤isa umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa nɡ̤ɛsitʲa ɛsiɬamɓulukilɛjɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nd̤ɔtʰaɓatʰa nakuz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ z̤iɓɛ nɡ̤aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓalɛv̤i ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ amaz̤ulu amat͡ʃa nɛɬaɓatʰi ɛlit͡ʃa ɛnd̤iz̤a kuwɛnz̤a amijɔ pʰamɓi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ imɓɛwu jɛnu nɛɡ̤ama lɛnu kutʰi kupʰikɛlanɛ nɔkutʰwasa kwɛɛɲanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ kupʰikɛlanɛ nɛɛsaɓatʰa z̤ɔnkɛ ukuz̤a kwɛɲama jɔnkɛ ukuɓa ikǃuɓud̤ɛ pʰamɓi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓaja kupʰuma ɓaɓɔnɛ iz̤id̤umɓu z̤amad̤ɔd̤a ak͡xɛkǃilɛjɔ kuɓa iimpɛtʰu z̤aɓɔ az̤iji nɔmlilɔ waɓɔ unɡ̤akǀimi ɓaɓɛ liɲumɲɛz̤i lɔnkɛ amaz̤wi kajɛrɛmija uɲana kahilɛkija wakuɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓasɛanatɔti ɛz̤wɛni lakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɛkwafika kujɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kajɔsija uɲana kaamɔn wakwajud̤a nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsitʰatʰu wɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ nanɡ̤ɛmiɬa kajɔjakim uɲana kajɔsija wakwajud̤a kwad̤a kwaɓa sɛkupʰɛlɛni kɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinamɲɛ kaz̤ɛd̤ɛkija uɲana kajɔsija wakwajud̤a kwad̤a kwaɓa sɛkufud̤uswɛni kwɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsiɬanu kwafika kɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi nd̤inɡ̤ɛkakuɓumɓi ɛsiz̤alwɛni ɓɛnd̤ikwaz̤i unɡ̤ɛkapʰumi ɛmɓilinini nd̤akuŋ̤ǀ̤walisa nd̤akumisa waɓa nɡ̤umprɔfɛti wɛɛntlanɡ̤a nd̤atʰi kwɔwu nkɔsi jɛhɔv̤a jaɓɔna and̤ikwaz̤i ukutʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inɡ̤umntwana watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a musa ukutʰi nd̤inɡ̤umntwana kɛ uja kuja kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɛnd̤ikutʰuma kuɓɔ kɔnkɛ ɛnd̤ikuwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ uz̤ɛ ukutʰɛtʰɛ uz̤ɛ unɡ̤aɓɔjiki nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inawɛ ukuɓa nd̤ikuɬanɡ̤ulɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wasɔlula ujɛhɔv̤a isanɮa sakʰɛ wakǀʰukumisa umlɔmɔ watʰi kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a jaɓɔna nd̤iɓɛkɛ amaz̤wi ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɔ kʰanɡ̤ɛla nd̤ikwɛnz̤a nam̤la umv̤ɛlɛli wɛɛntlanɡ̤a nɛz̤ikumkani ukuɓa uɲɔtʰulɛ ud̤iliz̤ɛ ut͡ʃaɓalalisɛ uɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ulɛ ukuɓa wakʰɛ utʲalɛ kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi jintɔni lɛ ujiɓɔnajɔ jɛrɛmija nd̤atʰi nd̤iɓɔna intɔnɡ̤a jɔmtʰi wɔmamanɡ̤ilɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a uɓɔnɛ walunɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija kulipʰapʰɛla iliz̤wi ukuɓa nd̤ilɛnz̤ɛ kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛsiɓini lisitʰi jintɔni lɛ ujiɓɔnajɔ nd̤atʰi nd̤iɓɔna imɓiz̤a ɛɓasɛlwɛjɔ uɓusɔ ɓajɔ ɓub̤ɛkɛ nɛnɔ isɛntla watʰi kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛntla kuja kupʰuma uɓuɓi ɓuɓɛ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɛmi ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jaɓɔna nd̤ija kuɓiz̤a jɔnkɛ imiz̤alwanɛ jɛz̤ikumkani z̤asɛntla ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a z̤ija kuz̤a kɛ z̤imisɛ isɛsɔ itrɔnɛ jasɔ ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwamasanɡ̤ɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm nasɛz̤ind̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni z̤ajɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nasɛmiz̤ini jɔnkɛ jakwajud̤a nd̤ija kutʰɛtʰa ɛlɔkuɓaɡ̤wɛɓa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi ɓaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ kuɓa ɓɛnd̤iʃijilɛ ɓakǃʰumisɛla tʰikǁwɛni ɓamɓi ɓakǃuɓud̤a ɛmisɛɓɛnz̤ini jɛz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ kɛ wɛna b̤iŋǃa amaŋǃɛ akʰɔ umɛ utʰɛtʰɛ kuɓɔ kɔnkɛ ɛnd̤ikuwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ musa ukukǃʰipʰuka umɓilini nɡ̤aɓɔ ɬɛz̤ɛ nd̤ikukǃʰipʰulɛ umɓilini nɡ̤aɓɔ ujaɓɔna kɛ nd̤ikwɛnz̤a nam̤la umz̤i ɔŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ int͡sika jɛsiɲitʰi ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lɔb̤ɛd̤u kulɔ lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ lɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a nakuɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓalɔ kuɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓalɔ nakuɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɓaja nawɛ ɓanɡ̤aɓi nakukwɛjisa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inawɛ ukuɓa nd̤ikuɬanɡ̤ulɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika kɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi jija umɛmɛz̤ɛ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤ɛjɛrusalɛm utʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤ikukʰumɓulɛlɛ iŋǀɛɓa jɔɓut͡ʃa ɓakʰɔ utʰand̤ɔ lɔɓut͡ʃakaz̤i ɓakʰɔ ukund̤iland̤ɛla kwakʰɔ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛz̤wɛni ɛlinɡ̤aɬwajɛlwajɔ uɓɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ usirajɛli kujɛhɔv̤a intlaɬɛla jakʰɛ jɔnɡ̤ɛnisɛlɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓamɮajɔ ɓɔz̤ɛka itʲala ɓɔfikɛlwa ɓuɓuɓi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nɮu kajakɔɓi nɔnkɛ miz̤alwanɛ jɛnɮu kasirajɛli ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɓafumana ɓuɓi ɓuni ɔɔjiɬɔ lɛ ntɔ ɓakʰwɛlɛla kud̤ɛ ɓaland̤ɛla iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛntɔ ɓaɓa jintɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛjakɔntɔ aɓat͡ʃɔ ukutʰi upʰi ujɛhɔv̤a ɔwasiɲusajɔ wasikʰupʰa ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa ɔwasihamɓisa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛz̤wɛni ɛlijiŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsi lɛz̤ihɔɡ̤ɔ ɛz̤wɛni ɛlinɡ̤umkǃwɛɓɛd̤u ɛlɛtʰunz̤i lɔkufa ɛz̤wɛni ɛlinɡ̤akǀand̤i ɛlinɡ̤aɬali nd̤aninɡ̤ɛnisa ɛz̤wɛni ɛlimasimi akǀʰumajɔ ukuɓa niɮɛ iz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤alɔ nɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ z̤alɔ nakunɡ̤ɛna nalɛnz̤a iŋǃamɓi iliz̤wɛ nalɛnz̤a lanɡ̤amasikiz̤i aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓat͡ʃɔnɡ̤ɔ ukutʰi upʰi ujɛhɔv̤a aɓapʰatʰi ɓɔmjalɛlɔ aɓand̤az̤anɡ̤a naɓalusi ɓak͡xɛkǃa naɓaprɔfɛti ɓaprɔfɛta nɡ̤ɔb̤ahali ɓaland̤ɛla aɓanɡ̤aŋǀɛd̤i ntɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ nd̤isaja kuɓamɓana ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤iɓamɓanɛ nɔɔɲana ɓɔɔɲana ɓɛnu kuɓa wɛlani nijɛ ɛz̤ikǃitʰini z̤amakiti niɓɔnɛ nitʰumɛ nakwakɛd̤arɛ niɡ̤ǃ̤alɛ kunɛnɛ nikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ukuɓa z̤ikʰɛ z̤akʰɔ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ind͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuɓa uɬanɡ̤a lwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓalɔ ɓɛnɡ̤ɛtʰikǁɔ kɛ ɓɔna kɛ ɓɔna aɓantu ɓam ɓananɛ nɡ̤ɔz̤ukɔ lwaɓɔ intɔ ɛnɡ̤aŋǀɛd̤ijɔ manɡ̤aliswani maz̤ulu jilɛ ntɔ niɓɛ namanwɛlɛ nikǃɔtʰɔlɛ kunɛnɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛnz̤ɛ uɓuɓi ɔɓuɓini aɓantu ɓam ɓand̤iʃijilɛ tʰɛnd̤ɛ lamanz̤i apʰililɛjɔ ɓaz̤imɓɛlɛ amakǃula amakǃula akǃʰɛkɛkilɛjɔ anɡ̤aɡ̤ǀ̤ini manz̤i usirajɛli ulikʰɔɓɔka ulɛliz̤alɛlwɛ ɛkʰaja kunɡ̤atʰuɓani ukuɓa aɓɛ jintɔ ɛpʰanɡ̤iwɛjɔ z̤imb̤axulɛlɛ iinɡ̤ɔɲama ɛz̤int͡ʃa z̤alikʰupʰa iz̤wi laz̤ɔ z̤alɛnz̤a laɓa sɛnkanɡ̤ala iliz̤wɛ lakʰɛ imiz̤i jakʰɛ jafakwa isikʰuni ajaɓa naɓɛmi kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɔɔɲana ɓasɛnɔfu naɓasɛtapanɛsi ɓaɮɛla ɛlukakajini lwakʰɔ ɔkɔ asikukwɛnz̤a kwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuʃija kwakʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa aɓɛkuhamɓisa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɔkaɲɛ jintɔni ɛnawɛ nɛnɮɛla jasɛjiputa ukuɓa usɛlɛ amanz̤i ɔmnajilɛ jintɔni ɛnawɛ nɛnɮɛla jasɛasirija ukuɓa usɛlɛ amanz̤i ɔmlamɓɔ lɔwɔ ɓuja kukutʰɛtʰisa uɓuɓi ɓakʰɔ nɔkupʰamɓa kwakʰɔ kuja kukɔɬwaja jaz̤i kɛ uɓɔnɛ ukuɓa kuɓi kuk͡xak͡xa ukumʃija ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ nɔkutʰi unɡ̤ankwantʲi pʰamɓi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kususɛla kwakud̤ɛ ujapʰulɛ idʲɔkʰwɛ jakʰɔ waz̤ikǃʰawula iz̤itrɔpu z̤akʰɔ watʰi and̤iji kukukʰɔnz̤a kuɓa ɛz̤ind̤ulini z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ napʰant͡si kwɛmitʰi jɔnkɛ ɛluɬaz̤a waz̤ɔlula nɡ̤ɔkwɛhɛɲukaz̤i mna kɛ nd̤akutʲala unɡ̤umd̤ilija wɔɬɔɓɔ wɔnkɛ upʰɛla ujimɓɛwu jɛɲanisɔ utʰɛni kɛ ukud͡ʒ̤ika uɓɛ nɡ̤amasɛɓɛ aŋ̤ǀ̤akakǀilɛjɔ ɔmd̤ilija ɔnɡ̤ɛɡ̤uwɔ unɡ̤afanɛlana uz̤iɬikiɬa nɡ̤ɛsɔd̤a watʰaɓatʰa isɛpʰa ɛninz̤i uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɔ ɓuɬɛli ɓudʲɔb̤ɛkilɛ pʰamɓi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤atʰini ukutʰi and̤iz̤ɛnz̤anɡ̤a iŋǃamɓi and̤iɓaland̤ɛlanɡ̤a ɔɔb̤ahali jiɓɔnɛ inɮɛla jakʰɔ ɛmfulɛni lɔwɔ ukwaz̤i ɔkwɛnz̤ilɛjɔ wɛna maz̤i jɛnkamɛla ɛnamɛnd̤u ɛt͡ʃɔɓɛla nɡ̤apʰa nanɡ̤apʰa maz̤i jɛɛsilɛ lasɛnɮɛ ɛkǃʰɛlɛ intlanɡ̤ɔ ɛtʰi nɡ̤ɔkuŋǃwɛna kwajɔ isɛz̤ɛlɛ umɔja ukuŋ̤ǁ̤amɛla kwajɔ inkunz̤i nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤akuɓujisajɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓajifunajɔ aɓaz̤id̤inisi ɓɔjifumana nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jajɔ lutʰintɛlɛ uɲawɔ lwakʰɔ lunɡ̤aɓi z̤ɛ nɔmkǃala wakʰɔ unɡ̤aŋǁanwa utʰi kɛ wɛna kuŋǀamɛkilɛ haji kuɓa nd̤iɓatʰand̤ilɛ aɓasɛmz̤ini nd̤ija kuɓaland̤ɛla kɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkud̤ana kwɛsɛla lakufuɲanwa kund͡ʒ̤alɔ ukud̤ana kwɛnɮu kasirajɛli ɓɔna nɡ̤ɔkwaɓɔ nɔɔkumkani ɓaɓɔ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaɓɔ naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓaɓɔ naɓaprɔfɛti ɓaɓɔ ɓɛsitʰi ɛmtʰini unɡ̤uɓawɔ nasɛtʲɛni und̤iz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓand̤inikɛla ikʰɔsi aɓand̤inikɛla ɓusɔ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa kɛ lɔɓuɓi ɓaɓɔ ɓaja kutʰi suk umɛ usisind̤isɛ ɓapʰi kalɔku ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓakʰɔ ɔz̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛjɔ maɓasukɛ ɓɛmɛ ukuɓa ɓɔɓa nɔkukusind̤isa nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔɓuɓi ɓakʰɔ kuɓa ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓakʰɔ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤anɡ̤ɛnani lɛmiz̤i jakʰɔ jud̤a jini ukuɓa niɓamɓanɛ nɔnkɛ nipʰɛla nik͡xɛkǃilɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ifumanɛ nd̤aɓaɓɛtʰa ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu intɛtʰisɔ aɓajamkɛlanɡ̤a ik͡xɛlɛ lɛnu liɮɛ aɓaprɔfɛti ɓɛnu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ɛɮav̤ulajɔ siz̤ukulwanand̤ini likʰanɡ̤ɛlɛni iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɓɛnd̤ijintlanɡ̤ɔ kusirajɛli ɓɛnd̤ililiz̤wɛ lɛsitʰɔkɔtʰɔkɔ kunɡ̤atʰuɓa ukuɓa ɓatʰi aɓantu ɓam sijapʰapʰatʰɛka asiz̤i kuwɛ ijaz̤iliɓala intɔmɓi iz̤iv̤atʰɔ z̤ajɔ umt͡ʃakaz̤i ujaz̤iliɓala iiŋǃwɛmɛʃa z̤akʰɛ kɛ ɓɔna aɓantu ɓam ɓand̤iliɓɛlɛ imiɬa ɛnɡ̤ɛnakuɓalwa ujakwaz̤i ukujilunɡ̤isa inɮɛla jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkufuna utʰand̤ɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ iinɮɛla z̤akʰɔ uz̤ikǃʰɛlisa iz̤intɔ ɛz̤imɓi kwanasɛmasɔnd̤wɛni akʰɔ kufumanɛka iɡ̤az̤i lɛmipʰɛfumlɔ jamaɬwɛmpu akuwafumananɡ̤a ɛɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤a z̤inɮu ɓɛkunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔku kɔnkɛ ukanti utʰi kɛ nd̤imsulwa ɛwɛ umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ uɓujilɛ jaɓɔna nd̤ija kumanɡ̤alɛlana nawɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa usitʰi and̤ɔnanɡ̤a jini ukuɓa uz̤ulaz̤ulɛ kanɡ̤aka ujid͡ʒ̤ikɛ inɮɛla jakʰɔ uja kud̤ana nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛjiputa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa ud̤anilɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛasirija nakujɔ lɛjɔ uja kupʰuma z̤isɛntlɔkɔ iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uja kuɓakǀɛkisa ɔkʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ unɡ̤aɓi nampumɛlɛlɔ nɡ̤aɓɔ kutʰiwa ukuɓa itʰɛ ind̤ɔd̤a jamɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa umkajɔ wɛmka kujɔ waɓa nɡ̤ɔwand̤ɔd̤a jimɓi inɔkumɓujɛla alinɡ̤ɛɓi liɬand͡ʒ̤ɛlwɛ ɛlɔ liz̤wɛ wɛna kɛ uhɛɲuz̤ilɛ nɛz̤itʰand̤anɛ ɛz̤ininz̤i unɔkuɓujɛla kɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a pʰɔsa amɛɬɔ akʰɔ ɛlukǃajini uɓɔnɛ kupʰi apʰɔ unɡ̤alalwanɡ̤a kʰɔna waɓaɬalɛla nɡ̤asɛz̤inɮɛlɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmarab̤i ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ waliɬamɓɛla iliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkuhɛɲuz̤a kwakʰɔ nanɡ̤ɛz̤intɔ z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤imɓi jatʰintɛlwa kɛ imikʰumɛz̤ɛlɔ ajɛz̤a nɛmv̤ula ɛv̤utʰisajɔ usukɛ wanɛɓunz̤i lɛhɛɲukaz̤i akwav̤uma ukuɓa nɛɛntlɔni akuji kutʰi nɡ̤ɔku und̤iɓiz̤ɛ utʰi ɓawɔ ulikʰɔlwanɛ lɔɓut͡ʃa ɓam uja kuɓa nɛŋǃala nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ aɬalɛ ɛwuɡ̤ǀ̤inilɛ umsind̤ɔ jaɓɔna utʰɛtʰa nd͡ʒ̤alɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛ wɛnz̤a uɓuɓi uɓufɛz̤ilɛ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔkumkani ujɔsija ukuɓɔnilɛ ɛlikwɛnz̤ilɛjɔ ipʰamɓakaz̤i usirajɛli ɓɛlihamɓa pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntaɓa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ napʰant͡si kwɛmitʰi jɔnkɛ ɛluɬaz̤a lihɛɲuz̤a kʰɔna nd̤atʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa likwɛnz̤ilɛ ɔkɔ kɔnkɛ lija kuɓujɛla lasuka alaɓuja lakuɓɔna ɔkɔ inɡ̤ininɡ̤inikaz̤i ud̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ ujud̤a nd̤aɓɔna ukuɓa nɔkɔ ipʰamɓakaz̤i usirajɛli lik͡xɛkǁɛz̤ilɛjɔ nd̤aliɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa nd̤alinika iŋǀwad̤i jɔkwaɬukana nalɔ lisukɛ nɔkɔ inɡ̤ininɡ̤inikaz̤i ujud̤a ud̤ad̤ɛ walɔ alɔjika kɛ laja kuhɛɲuz̤a nalɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛsand̤i sɔkuhɛɲuz̤a kwalɔ laɬand͡ʒ̤ɛlwa iliz̤wɛ lak͡xɛkǁɛz̤a namatʲɛ nɛmitʰi nakukɔ kɔnkɛ ɔkɔ alaɓujɛla inɡ̤ininɡ̤inikaz̤i ud̤ad̤ɛ walɔ ujud̤a nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jɔnkɛ kwaɓa nɡ̤ɔkukǁɔka ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a ipʰamɓakaz̤i usirajɛli liz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkwalɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛnɡ̤ininɡ̤inikaz̤i ujud̤a jija umɛmɛz̤ɛ maz̤wi ɛntla utʰi ɓuja pʰamɓakaz̤i sirajɛli ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a and̤iji kuɓusanɡ̤anisa uɓusɔ ɓam nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inɛŋǀɛɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a and̤iji kuɓa naŋǃala nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ ɓuv̤umɛ kɔd̤wa uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uk͡xɛkǃilɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ waz̤ipʰanɡ̤alalisa iinɮɛla z̤akʰɔ kwaɓasɛmz̤ini nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwajɔ jɔnkɛ imitʰi ɛluɬaz̤a kɛ iliz̤wi analipʰulapʰula ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓujani ɲana ɓanɡ̤amapʰamɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iniz̤ɛkilɛ nd̤ija kunitʰaɓatʰa aɓɛ mɲɛ ɛmz̤ini ɓaɓɛ ɓaɓini kwimiz̤alwanɛ nd̤iniz̤isɛ ɛz̤ijɔn nd̤ininikɛ aɓalusi aɓanɡ̤antliz̤ijɔ jam ɓanalusɛ nɡ̤ɔkwaz̤i nanɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ kɔtʰi kǁa nitʰɛ nand̤a nakǃʰama ɛz̤wɛni nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓanɡ̤aɓi satʰi itʲɛja jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ kajɛhɔv̤a inɡ̤atʰi kǃatʰa ɛntliz̤ijwɛni inɡ̤akʰund͡ʒ̤ulwa nɡ̤aɓɔ inɡ̤afunɛki inɡ̤aɓujɛ jɛnz̤iwɛ nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa ijɛrusalɛm kuja kutʰiwa jitrɔnɛ kajɛhɔv̤a z̤ikǁʰɔntɛlanɛ kʰɔna z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a ɛlisɛjɛrusalɛm z̤inɡ̤aɓi saland̤ɛla uɓuŋ̤ǃ̤ɔla ɓɛntliz̤ijɔ jaz̤ɔ ɛmɓi nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa ija kuhamɓa inɮu jakwajud̤a kuɲɛ nɛnɮu jakwasirajɛli ɓav̤ɛlɛ kuɲɛ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛntla ɓɛz̤ɛ ɛz̤wɛni ɛnd̤aɓanikajɔ ɔɔjisɛ laɓa nd̤atʰi az̤i nd̤inɡ̤atʰini pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana nd̤ikunikɛ iliz̤wɛ ɛliŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ ɛliliɡ̤uɡ̤u lawɔ amaɡ̤uɡ̤u ɛɛntlanɡ̤a nd̤atʰi nija kund̤iɓiz̤a nɡ̤ɔkutʰi ɓawɔ ninɡ̤aɓuji ɛkund̤iland̤ɛlɛni iɲanisɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ umfaz̤i at͡ʃiniz̤ajɔ kuwaɓɔ nit͡ʃiniz̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ nɮu kasirajɛli ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a liv̤akɛlɛ iz̤wi ɛlukǃajini isililɔ sɔkutaxuz̤isa sɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛɓɛz̤iɡ̤wɛŋǁilɛ iinɮɛla z̤aɓɔ ɓamliɓala ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɓujani ɲana ɓanɡ̤amapʰamɓa nd̤ɔkupʰilisa ukupʰamɓa kwɛnu ujaɓɔna siz̤a kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛna jɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu iɲanisɔ jaɓa ɓuɓukǁɔki iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔz̤ɛlɔ jasɛz̤ind̤ulini jasɛz̤intaɓɛni iɲanisɔ lukujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu usind̤isɔ lukasirajɛli isikiz̤i lijiɮilɛ indʲɛɓɔ jɔɔɓawɔ kwasɛɓuŋǀinanɛni ɓɛtʰu impaɬa jaɓɔ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤aɓɔ masilalɛ ɛsikiz̤ini lɛtʰu lisiɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɛ iɬaz̤ɔ lɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu sɔnilɛ tʰina nɔɔɓawɔ kwasɛɓuŋǀinanɛni ɓɛtʰu unanam̤la asalipʰulapʰula iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ukuɓa utʰɛ waɓuja sirajɛli ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓujɛla amaz̤ɔtʰɛ akʰɔ pʰamɓi akwapʰalapʰala wafunɡ̤a watʰi ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛɲanisɔ nɡ̤ɔkusɛsikwɛni nanɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa z̤ɔz̤isikɛlɛla nɡ̤ajɛ iintlanɡ̤a z̤ikǃʰajisɛ nɡ̤ajɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kumad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a nakwijɛrusalɛm z̤ikʰuɓɛlɛlɛni int͡sind̤ɛ ninɡ̤aɬwajɛli ɛmitʰanɛni ɛnamɛv̤a z̤alusɛlɛni kujɛhɔv̤a nisusɛ ukunɡ̤aluki kwɛntliz̤ijɔ jɛnu mad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a ɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm ɬɛz̤ɛ ɓupʰumɛ uɓuʃuʃu ɓam nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmlilɔ ɓuv̤utʰɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ukǀimajɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi ɓɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤ɛnu kǁɛlani kwajud̤a niv̤akalisɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm nitʰi v̤utʰɛlani isiɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɛliz̤wɛni d̤and̤ulukani nitʰi ɬanɡ̤anisanani sinɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛmiz̤ini ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ pʰakamisani ib̤anilɛ nɡ̤asɛz̤ijɔn saɓani ninɡ̤ɛmi kuɓa ɛntla nd̤iz̤isa uɓuɓi nɛmɓub̤isɔ ɛnkulu kuɲuka inɡ̤ɔɲama ipʰuma ɛnt͡ʃiɲɛlɛni jajɔ jɛɬatʰi kund̤uluka umɔnakalisi wɛɛntlanɡ̤a upʰuma ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ ukuz̤ɛ alipʰanz̤isɛ iliz̤wɛ lakʰɔ imiz̤i jakʰɔ jɛnz̤iwɛ imiwɛwɛ inɡ̤aɓi naɓɛmi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ b̤iŋǃani ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ nimɓamɓaz̤ɛlɛ nib̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a akuɓujanɡ̤a kutʰi kɔtʰi kɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ipʰɛlɛ intliz̤ijɔ jɔkumkani nɛntliz̤ijɔ jaɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamanɡ̤aliswɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓanɡ̤akʰulumi aɓaprɔfɛti nd̤atʰi kɛ kwɔwu nkɔsi jɛhɔv̤a iɲanisɔ uɓalukuɬilɛ kakʰulu aɓa ɓantu nɛjɛrusalɛm usitʰi nija kuɓa nɔkǁɔlɔ liɓɛ ik͡xɛlɛ lid̤ɛ ɛmpʰɛfumlwɛni nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa kuja kutʰiwa kwaɓa ɓantu nakwijɛrusalɛm umɔja ɔlulɔpʰu lwasɛlukǃajini ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ uz̤a nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛntɔmɓi jaɓantu ɓam unɡ̤az̤ɛli kwɛla unɡ̤az̤ɛli kukǀɔkǀa umɔja ɔnamanɮa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤ɔ ntɔ uz̤ɛla nɡ̤ɔku nd̤ija kutʰɛtʰa naɓɔ imiɡ̤wɛɓɔ jaɓɔna uɲuka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amafu z̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsakǃʰwitʰi iiŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa z̤awɔ anamɛnd̤u kunamakǁʰalanɡ̤a amahaʃɛ awɔ jɛha kɛ tʰina nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sib̤ukǃiwɛ jiɬamɓululɛ uɓuɓi intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ jɛrusalɛm ukuz̤ɛ usind̤iswɛ kunini z̤ilalisilɛ pʰakatʰi kwakʰɔ iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iliz̤wi likǁɛlilɛ lipʰuma kwad̤an liv̤akalisa uɓuɓi ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwaɛfrajim kʰankaɲani ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni jaɓɔnani v̤akalisani ɛjɛrusalɛm nitʰi aɓaŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤i ɓɛz̤a ɓɛv̤ɛla ɛz̤wɛni ɛlikud̤ɛ ɓɛlikʰupʰɛla iliz̤wi laɓɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛmiz̤i jakwajud̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓalind̤i ɓamasimi ɓajikǀʰasa nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iɓinɛɛnkani ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a iinɮɛla z̤akʰɔ nɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤akʰɔ z̤akwɛnz̤ɛla ɔkɔ z̤iz̤intɔ z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤imɓi ɛz̤ɔ inɛnɛ z̤ik͡xak͡xa inɛnɛ z̤ifikɛ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɔ iz̤iɓilini z̤am iz̤iɓilini z̤am nd̤ijaz̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤a iinɡ̤ɔnt͡si z̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jam ijakǁɔkɔz̤ɛla intliz̤ijɔ jam and̤inakutʰi kuɓa usiv̤ilɛ isand̤i sɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ mpʰɛfumlɔ ukuɬatʲwa kɔmkʰɔsi wɛmfaz̤wɛ kumɛɲɛz̤wa int͡ʃaɓalalɔ kant͡ʃaɓalalɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lib̤ukǃiwɛ lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ z̤ib̤ukǃiwɛ nɡ̤ɛsikǃupʰɛ iintɛntɛ z̤am nɡ̤ɛpʰaɲaz̤ɔ amalɛnɡ̤alɛnɡ̤a kunini nd̤iɓɔna ib̤anilɛ nd̤isiv̤a isand̤i sɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ kuɓa ɓamatʰilɛ aɓantu ɓam aɓand̤az̤i nɡ̤ɔɔɲana aɓaz̤iz̤id̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ aɓanaŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ ɓɔna ɓanɔɓulumkɔ ɓɔkwɛnz̤a uɓuɓi ukulunɡ̤isa aɓakwaz̤i nd̤akʰanɡ̤ɛla ɛm̤laɓɛni nankɔ kusɛɲaɲɛni liluɓala nasɛz̤ulwini akwaɓakʰɔ kukʰaɲa kulɔ nd̤akʰanɡ̤ɛla ɛz̤intaɓɛni nanz̤ɔ z̤iɲikima nɛɛnd̤uli z̤ɔnkɛ z̤id̤id̤iz̤ɛla nd̤akʰanɡ̤ɛla nankɔ kɛ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ nɛɛntaka z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛz̤ulu z̤iɓalɛkilɛ nd̤akʰanɡ̤ɛla nant͡sɔ ikarmɛlɛ ijintlanɡ̤ɔ jɔnkɛ imiz̤i jajɔ id̤ilikilɛ pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a pʰamɓi kɔkuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi kuja kuɓa sɛnkanɡ̤ala kulɔ lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ kɔd̤wa nd̤inɡ̤aliɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛli kupʰɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ iɬaɓatʰi lija kuɓa nɛsid͡ʒ̤wili liɓɛ nɛz̤imɲama z̤ɔkuz̤ila iz̤ulu nɡ̤apʰɛz̤ulu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ nd̤iŋ̰ǃ̰anɡ̤ijɛlɛ and̤isaji kuz̤ɔɬwaja and̤iji kuɓuja umv̤a kulɔɔ ntɔ nɡ̤ɛsand̤i saɓamahaʃɛ naɓɛz̤apʰɛtʰa ijaɓalɛka jɔnkɛ imiz̤i ɓanɡ̤ɛna ɛz̤int͡ʃiɲɛlɛni z̤ɛɬatʰi ɓɛɲuka ɛmikǁawukɛni jɔnkɛ imiz̤i iʃijiwɛ akuɬali kujɔ kɛ wɛna ub̤ukǃiwɛjɔ ujakutʰini nɔkuɓa utʰɛ wamɓatʰa ɛz̤iɓɔmv̤u nɔkuɓa utʰɛ wav̤atʰa iz̤iv̤atʰɔ z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɔkuɓa utʰɛ wawaz̤ɔɓa amɛɬɔ akʰɔ nɡ̤ɛstib̤ija ufumanɛ wahɔmɓa z̤ija kukukǀɛkisa iz̤itʰand̤anɛ z̤ifuna umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iv̤ɛ iliz̤wi ɛlind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlɔmfaz̤i ɔnɛnimɓa imɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛjɔz̤iɓulajɔ iz̤wi lɛntɔmɓi ɛnɡ̤uz̤ijɔn inɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤ala iz̤ɔlula iz̤anɮa z̤ajɔ isitʰi atʰi kɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umpʰɛfumlɔ utʰʲafilɛ nɡ̤aɓaɓulali z̤itʰʲutʰʲɛni iz̤itratɔ z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm kʰanikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ naz̤i nifunɛ ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ajɔ z̤ɛmɓutʰɔ ukuɓa nɔmfumana ukuɓa ukʰɔ ɔwɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkusɛsikwɛni ɔfuna ukuɲanisa nd̤ɔjikǁɔlɛla nɔkuɓa ɓatʰi ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓɔɓa ɓafunɡ̤a ɓɛkǁɔka jɛhɔv̤a amɛɬɔ akʰɔ akad͡ʒ̤ɔnɡ̤ɛ ɛkuɲanisɛni jini ujaɓaɓɛtʰa aɓɛv̤i ntlunɡ̤u ujaɓaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla kupʰɛlɛ aɓav̤umi ukutʰɛtʰiswa ɓaɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤waɲalala uɓusɔ ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa aɓav̤umi ukuɓuja nd̤atʰi z̤iz̤iswɛli z̤ɔd̤wa z̤ɔna z̤imatʰilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓajaz̤i inɮɛla kajɛhɔv̤a nɛsikɔ lɔtʰikǁɔ waɓɔ nd̤ɔkʰa nd̤ijɛ kwaɓakʰulu nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ naɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓajajaz̤i ɓɔna inɮɛla kajɛhɔv̤a isikɔ lɔtʰikǁɔ waɓɔ kɛ ɓɔna ɓajapʰulɛ kuɲɛ idʲɔkʰwɛ ɓaz̤ikǃʰawula iz̤itrɔpu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ijaɓaɓulala inɡ̤ɔɲama jasɛɬatʰini ijaɓaɮav̤ula iŋ̤ǀ̤uka jasɛz̤iŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsini inɡ̤wɛ ilalɛla imiz̤i jaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔ ɓapʰuma kujɔ ɓajakǃwɛnɡ̤wa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa luninz̤i uk͡xɛkǃɔ lwaɓɔ kuninz̤i ukupʰamɓa kwaɓɔ nd̤ɔtʰini ukukukǁɔlɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ ɓand̤iʃijilɛ ɓafunɡ̤a aɓanɡ̤ɛtʰikǁɔ nd̤aɓafunɡ̤isa kɛ ɓak͡xɛkǁɛz̤a ɓatʰi nɡ̤unɡ̤a ɛnɮwini jamahɛɲukaz̤i ɓajaz̤iɓɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnkunz̤i z̤amahaʃɛ ɛz̤itʲɛtʲisiwɛjɔ ɛlɔwɔ ukʰɔɲɛla umfaz̤i wɔmmɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ mand̤inɡ̤av̤ɛlɛli kɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤apʰind̤ɛz̤ɛli kɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ kuɬanɡ̤a ɔlund͡ʒ̤ɛ ɲukani ɛz̤ind̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni z̤ajɔ nɔnakalisɛ kɔd̤wa ninɡ̤aɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛli kupʰɛlɛ amasɛɓɛ ajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤akajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa it͡ʃiniz̤ilɛ kakʰulu inɮu kasirajɛli nɛnɮu kajud̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓajamkʰaɲɛla ujɛhɔv̤a ɓatʰi asinɡ̤ujɛ aɓuji kusifikɛla uɓuɓi asiji kuɓɔna k͡xɛlɛ nanɮala aɓaprɔfɛti ɓaja kuɓa nɡ̤umɔja ɔtʰɛtʰajɔ akakʰɔ kuɓɔ makwɛnd͡ʒ̤iwɛ nd͡ʒ̤alɔ kuɓɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa nilitʰɛtʰa ɛlɔ liz̤wi jaɓɔna nd̤iwɛnz̤a umlilɔ amaz̤wi ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɔ naɓa ɓantu ɓaɓɛ z̤iinkuni uɓaɮɛ jaɓɔna nd̤ifikisa pʰɛz̤u kwɛnu nɮu kasirajɛli uɬanɡ̤a lwakud̤ɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a luɬanɡ̤a ɔlukǃinilɛjɔ luɬanɡ̤a ɔlud̤ala luɬanɡ̤a ɔluntɛtʰɔ unɡ̤ajaz̤ijɔ ɔnɡ̤ajiv̤ajɔ intɔ ɔlujitʰɛtʰajɔ umpʰɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ walɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ɛliv̤ulɛkilɛjɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓanɡ̤amaɡ̤ɔxa luja kukuɮa ukuv̤una kwakʰɔ nɛsɔnka sakʰɔ luja kuɓaɮa ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɔ luja kujiɮa impaɬa jakʰɔ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤akʰɔ luja kuwuɮa umd̤ilija wakʰɔ nɔmkʰiwanɛ wakʰɔ luja kujiv̤iv̤a nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ imiz̤i jakʰɔ ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ ɔkʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ajɔ nɔkɔ kɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a and̤iji kuniɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla kupʰɛlɛ kutʰi kǁa nitʰi ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu uz̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛni ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ kutʰi uz̤ɛ utʰi kuɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa nind̤iʃijilɛ nakʰɔnz̤a ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a ɛz̤wɛni lɛnu kwanɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ nija kukʰɔnz̤a aɓasɛmz̤ini ɛz̤wɛni ɛlinɡ̤ɛlɛnu kukǁɛlɛni ɔku ɛnɮwini kajakɔɓi nikuv̤akalisɛ kwajud̤a nitʰi kʰaniv̤ɛ ɔku ɓantu ɓaz̤iz̤id̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ ɓanɡ̤ɛnantliz̤ijɔ ɓanamɛɬɔ ɓɛnɡ̤aɓɔni ɓanɛɛnɮɛɓɛ ɓɛnɡ̤ɛv̤a mna anind̤ɔjiki ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a aniz̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤i ɛɓuswɛni ɓam nd̤ijiɓɛkilɛjɔ intlaɓatʰi janɡ̤umd̤a wɔlwanɮɛ janɡ̤ummisɛlɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ɔlunɡ̤awuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰijɔ ajalatʲuz̤a amaz̤a alɔ anɡ̤aɓi nakwɛnz̤a ntɔ aɡ̤ǃ̤umɛ anɡ̤awuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰi kɛ aɓa ɓantu ɓanɛntliz̤ijɔ ɛjind͡ʒ̤uɓakǃa ɛnɛɛnkani ɓak͡xɛkǃilɛ ɓɛmka aɓat͡ʃɔ nɔkutʰi ɛz̤intliz̤ijwɛni z̤aɓɔ makʰɛ sɔjikɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ɔsinika imv̤ula ɛtʰamɓisajɔ nɛv̤utʰisajɔ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛlililɔ ɔsiɡ̤ǀ̤inɛla iiv̤ɛki ɛz̤imisiwɛjɔ z̤asɛkwinɮa iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɛnu ɛz̤iɡ̤wɛŋǁa z̤iz̤isund̤uz̤ilɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ iz̤ɔnɔ z̤ɛnu z̤ikutʰintɛlɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kufuɲanwa aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu ɓam ɓajalalɛla nɡ̤ɔkuŋǀatʰama kwaɓatʰijɛli ɓɛnz̤a isihɔɡ̤ɔ ɓaɓamɓisa aɓantu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɮwanɛ iz̤ɛlɛ z̤iintaka z̤ind͡ʒ̤alɔ iz̤inɮu z̤aɓɔ ukuz̤ala jinkɔɬisɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ɓakʰulilɛ ɓaɓa z̤iz̤itʲɛɓi ɓatʲɛɓilɛ ɓaɡ̤ud̤ilɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤itʰisɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤imɓi itʲala aɓalilunɡ̤isa itʲala lɛɛnkɛd̤ama ukuz̤ɛ z̤iɓɛ nɛmpumɛlɛlɔ aɓaliɡ̤wɛɓi itʲala lamaɬwɛmpu nd̤inɡ̤av̤ɛlɛli kɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ɔ ntɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤apʰind̤ɛz̤ɛli umpʰɛfumlɔ kuɬanɡ̤a ɔlund͡ʒ̤ɛ kwɛnz̤iwa intɔ ɛmanɡ̤alisajɔ ɛɓanɡ̤a amanwɛlɛ ɛz̤wɛni aɓaprɔfɛti ɓaprɔfɛta nɡ̤ɔɓukǁɔki naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓanɔɓukʰɔsi nɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ aɓantu ɓam kɛ ɓatʰand̤a ukuɓa kuɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤alɔ nija kutʰini kɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwakɔ ɔkɔ saɓani ɲana ɓakab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nipʰumɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛjɛrusalɛm nasɛtɛkɔwa niv̤utʰɛlɛ isiɡ̤ɔɮɔ nipʰakamisɛ intɔ ipʰakamɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛb̤ɛtɛhakɛrɛm nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓuɓi ɓujalunɡ̤uz̤a ɓuv̤ɛla ɛntla nɛmɓub̤isɔ ɛnkulu umntwana ɔm̤lɛ umtɛkɛtiswa intɔmɓi ɛnɡ̤uz̤ijɔn nd̤ijajit͡ʃaɓalalisa ɓɛz̤a kujɔ aɓalusi nɛmiɬamɓi jaɓɔ ɓaɡ̤ǁ̤umɛka kujɔ iintɛntɛ z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɓaɮa ɛlɔwɔ ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ jiŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛlɛni imfaz̤wɛ nimɛ siɲukɛ ɛmini ɛnkulu atʰi kɛ tʰina imini iz̤a kusanɡ̤ana nɡ̤ɔkuɓa amatʰunz̤i ɔkuɬwa ajɔluka sukani nimɛ siɲukɛ ɛɓusuku siz̤it͡ʃaɓalalisɛ iiŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛ z̤ajɔ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃilɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi jiɡ̤awulɛni imitʰi jajɔ nijifumɓɛlɛ ijɛrusalɛm ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lɔkuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a wɔna mz̤i wɔkuv̤ɛlɛlwa wɔnkɛ upʰɛla unɔkǀud̤isɔ pʰakatʰi kwawɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ikǃula liwampɔmpɔz̤isajɔ amanz̤i alɔ jɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukumpɔmpɔz̤isa iz̤intɔ z̤ajɔ ɛz̤imɓi ukuɡ̤ɔɲamɛla nɔkub̤ukǃa kuv̤akala kujɔ kuɬɛli kukʰɔ pʰamɓi kɔɓusɔ ɓam isifɔ nɛsiɓɛtʰɔ jalɛka jɛrusalɛm ɬɛz̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ uz̤ikǃʰawulɛ kuwɛ ɬɛz̤ɛ nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala kuwɛ uɓɛ liliz̤wɛ ɛlinɡ̤amiwɛjɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi ɓaja kuwab̤ikikǀa ɓawab̤ikikǀɛ amasalɛla amasirajɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmd̤ilija siɓujisɛlɛ isanɮa sakʰɔ ɛmaɡ̤atʲɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmv̤uni wɛɛd̤ilija nd̤ija kutʰɛtʰa kɔɔɓani nd̤ikǃɔnɔnɔnd̤isɛ ɓɛv̤ɛ jaɓɔna ajaluswanɡ̤a inɮɛɓɛ jaɓɔ aɓanakɔ kɛ ukuɓaz̤a inɮɛɓɛ jaɓɔna iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a liɓɛ lijiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ kuɓɔ aɓalinanz̤ilɛ nd̤iz̤ɛlɛ ɓuɓuʃuʃu ɓukajɛhɔv̤a nd̤id̤iniwɛ kuɓuɓuɓamɓa ɓupʰalaz̤ɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔmntwana ɛsitratwɛni napʰɛz̤u kwɛmɓutʰɔ jamad̤ɔd̤ana kuɲɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ind̤ɔd̤a kwanɔmfaz̤i ɓaja kuɓand͡ʒ̤wa amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu kwanaɓaz̤ɛlɛ jimiɬa z̤ija kuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛla kuɓamɓi iz̤inɮu z̤aɓɔ naɓafaz̤i kuɲɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa isanɮa nd̤isɔlula pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɛmi ɓɛliz̤wɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kutʰaɓatʰɛla kwaɓaŋǀinanɛ kwɛsa kwaɓakʰulu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓaɓawa ɓɛɓawilɛ kutʰaɓatʰɛla kumprɔfɛti kwɛsa kumɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔɓukǁɔki ɓakupʰilisa ukwapʰuka kwɛntɔmɓi jaɓantu ɓam ɓɛsitʰi lukǁɔlɔ lukǁɔlɔ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ lukǁɔlɔ ɓaja kud̤aniswa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛnz̤ɛ amasikiz̤i nɔkɔ kɛ aɓad̤ani nɔkud̤ana aɓakwaz̤i ukuɓa nɛɛntlɔni nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ɓaja pʰakatʰi kwaɓawajɔ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkuɓav̤ɛlɛla ɓaja kukʰuɓɛka ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jimani ɛz̤inɮɛlɛni nikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ niɓuz̤ɛ umɛnd̤ɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ukuɓa jijipʰi inɮɛla jɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nihamɓɛ nɡ̤ajɔ nɔjifumanɛla ukupʰumla imipʰɛfumlɔ jɛnu ɓatʰi kɛ ɓɔna asiji kuhamɓa nɡ̤ajɔ nd̤amisa pʰɛz̤u kwɛnu aɓaɓɔnisɛli nd̤isitʰi liɓaz̤ɛlɛni inɮɛɓɛ iliz̤wi lɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɓatʰi kɛ ɓɔna asiji kuliɓaz̤ɛla nɮɛɓɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jiv̤ani z̤intlanɡ̤a waz̤i wɛna ɓanɮa ɔkuɓaɬɛlajɔ jiv̤a ɬaɓatʰi jaɓɔna aɓa ɓantu nd̤iɓaz̤isɛla uɓuɓi isikǃʰamɔ sɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa amaz̤wi aɓawaɓaz̤ɛlanɡ̤a nɮɛɓɛ nɔmjalɛlɔ ɓawukǀɛkisilɛ jɛjani kɛ lɛ im̤lɔpʰɛ jakwaʃɛb̤a iz̤a nɛkalamɔ ɛv̤umɓa limnand̤i jasɛz̤wɛni ɛlikud̤ɛ amad̤ini ɛnu aɲukajɔ akakʰɔlɛkilɛ nɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɛnu ajimnand̤i nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃilɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤iɓaɓɛkɛla iz̤ikʰuɓɛkisɔ aɓa ɓantu ɓakʰuɓɛkɛ kuz̤ɔ ɔɔjisɛ nɔɔɲana ummɛlwanɛ kuɲɛ nɔwaɓɔ ɓat͡ʃaɓalalɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna kuz̤a aɓantu ɓɛv̤ɛla ɛz̤wɛni lasɛntla uɬanɡ̤a ɔlukʰulu lukǁʰɔkǁʰwa luv̤ɛlɛ ɛsiŋǃɛni sɔm̤laɓa ɓakǃuɓulɛ isapʰɛtʰa nɛŋ̰ǀ̰ula ɓaz̤iz̤id͡ʒ̤ɔxa aɓanamfɛsanɛ iliz̤wi laɓɔ liɡ̤ǃ̤uma nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔlwanɮɛ ɓakʰwɛla ɛmahaʃɛni ɓɛkǁʰɔɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnd̤ɔd̤a jɔkulwa ukukufikɛla wɛna ntɔmɓi ɛnɡ̤uz̤ijɔn siluv̤ilɛ ud̤aɓa lwalɔɔ ntɔ z̤iwilɛ iz̤anɮa z̤ɛtʰu imɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ isiɓamɓilɛ ukuz̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔz̤alajɔ musani ukuja ɛmasimini ninɡ̤ahamɓi nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃaɓa lunɛk͡xɛlɛ kuŋǁunɡ̤upʰala nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ntɔmɓi jaɓantu ɓam b̤iŋǃa ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ uz̤iɡ̤alɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔtʰutʰu mɛnz̤ɛlɛ isid͡ʒ̤wili ɔz̤ɛlwɛ wamɲɛ ukumɓamɓaz̤ɛla ɔkuk͡xak͡xa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uja kusiz̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛsikǃupʰɛ umb̤ukǃi nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ umkǀikid̤i pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu ɓam nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛŋǃaɓa ukuz̤ɛ ujaz̤i ujikǀikid̤ɛ inɮɛla jaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓaz̤iind͡ʒ̤uɓakǃa z̤az̤ɔ iind͡ʒ̤uɓakǃa ɓɛhamɓa ɓɛɬɛɓa ɓalub̤ɛd̤u nɛsiɲitʰi ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓajɔnakalisa it͡ʃɛ nɡ̤umlilɔ imfutʰɔ isɛkupʰɛlɛni ilɔtʰɛ ɓafumana ɓɛɲiɓilikisa ɓaɲiɓilikisɛ aɓɛnz̤i ɓɔɓuɓi aɓaɬɛnɡ̤ɛki ɓajisiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛkǀɛkisiwɛjɔ ukuɓiz̤wa kwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɓakǀɛkisilɛ iliz̤wi ɛlafikajɔ kujɛrɛmija lalisitʰi jima ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a umɛmɛz̤ɛ kʰɔna ɛli liz̤wi utʰi liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nɔnkɛ majud̤a anɡ̤ɛnajɔ nɡ̤ala masanɡ̤ɔ ukuɓa nimŋǃulɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi z̤ilunɡ̤isɛni iinɮɛla z̤ɛnu nɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɛnu ukuz̤ɛ nd̤iniɓɛkɛ kulɛ nd̤awɔ musani ukukʰɔlɔsa nɡ̤amaz̤wi ɔɓukǁɔki ɔkutʰi jitɛmpilɛ kajɛhɔv̤a jitɛmpilɛ kajɛhɔv̤a jitɛmpilɛ kajɛhɔv̤a jɔna lɛjɔ ɔkaɲɛ ukuɓa nitʰɛ naz̤ilunɡ̤isa niz̤ilunɡ̤isa iinɮɛla z̤ɛnu nɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɛnu ukuɓa nitʰɛ nakwɛnz̤a nikwɛnz̤a ɔkusɛsikwɛni pʰakatʰi kɔmntu nɔmmɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ anamkǀud̤isa ɔwasɛmz̤ini nɛnkɛd̤ama nɔm̤lɔlɔkaz̤i analipʰalaz̤a iɡ̤az̤i ɛlimsulwa kulɛ nd̤awɔ analand̤ɛla tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi ukuɓa kuɓɛ kuɓi nd̤ɔniɓɛka kulɛ nd̤awɔ ɛz̤wɛni ɛnd̤alinika ɔɔjiɬɔ kwasɛpʰakad̤ɛni kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni jaɓɔnani nikʰɔlɔsa nɡ̤amaz̤wi ɔɓukǁɔki anɡ̤aŋǀɛd̤ijɔ jini nijɛɓa niŋǀinitʰɛ nik͡xɛkǁɛz̤ɛ nifunɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔɓukǁɔki nikǃʰumisɛlɛ kub̤ahali niland̤ɛlɛ tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi ɛninɡ̤aɓaz̤ijɔ niz̤ɛ kɛ nimɛ pʰamɓi kulɛ nɮu iɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama nitʰi siɬanɡ̤ulwɛ ukuz̤ɛ nɛnz̤ɛ masikiz̤i ɔnkɛ jaɓa nɡ̤umkǃɔlɔmɓa wɛz̤ihanɡ̤ɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛnu lɛ nɮu iɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama jaɓɔnani lɔ nd̤iɓɔnilɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kʰanijɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jam ɛɓisɛʃilɔ apʰɔ nd̤aliɓɛka kʰɔna iɡ̤ama ɛkukǃalɛni niɓɔnɛ ɛnd̤akwɛnz̤ajɔ kujɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤imɓi z̤aɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli kalɔku kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa niz̤ɛnz̤ilɛ ɛz̤i z̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤atʰɛtʰa nd̤itʰɛtʰa ninɡ̤ɛv̤a nd̤iniɓiz̤a ninɡ̤asaɓɛli nd̤ɔkwɛnz̤a kulɛ nɮu iɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama nikʰɔlɔsa nɡ̤ajɔ nakulɛ nd̤awɔ nd̤aninika jɔna nɔɔjiɬɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤akwɛnz̤ajɔ kwiʃilɔ nd̤ija kuniɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa nisukɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓam nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤aɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰajɔ aɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu ɓɔnkɛ imɓɛwu jɔnkɛ jakwaɛfrajim wɛna kɛ ukuɓatʰand̤az̤ɛla aɓa ɓantu unɡ̤apʰimisɛli kuɬaɬamɓa nakutʰand̤az̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓɔ unɡ̤and̤iz̤ami nɡ̤ɔkuɓa and̤iji kukupʰulapʰula akuɓɔni aɓakwɛnz̤ajɔ ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a nasɛz̤itratwɛni z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm ɔɔɲana ɓatʰɛz̤a ɔɔjisɛ ɓapʰɛmɓa umlilɔ aɓafaz̤i ɓakǁɔv̤ula ukuɓa ɛnz̤ɛlwɛ iz̤ɔnkana ukumkanikaz̤i wɛz̤ulu ɓatʰululɛlɛ tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi umnikɛlɔ ɔtʰululwajɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓand̤ikǃumɓisɛ ɓakǃumɓisa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a aɓaz̤ikǃumɓisi ɓɔna ukuz̤ɛ ɓud̤anɛ uɓusɔ ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna umsind̤ɔ nɔɓuʃuʃu ɓam ɓuja kupʰalaz̤ɛlwa pʰɛz̤u kwalɛ nd̤awɔ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓantu napʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnkɔmɔ napʰɛz̤u kwɛmitʰi jasɛnɮɛ napʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ɔm̤laɓa ɓuv̤utʰɛ ɓunɡ̤akǀimi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi jɔnɡ̤ɛz̤ani amad̤ini ɛnu aɲukajɔ ɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni jɛnu niɮɛ iɲama nɡ̤ɔkuɓa and̤itʰɛtʰanɡ̤a nɔɔjiɬɔ and̤iɓawisɛlanɡ̤a mɛtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ɛɛnd̤awɔ z̤amad̤ini aɲukajɔ nɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nd̤aɓakʰupʰajɔ ɛz̤wɛni lamajiputa kɛ nd̤aɓamisɛla ɛli liz̤wi lɔkutʰi pʰulapʰulani iliz̤wi nd̤ɔɓa nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɛnu niɓɛ nɡ̤aɓantu ɓam nihamɓɛ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɔnkɛ ɛnd̤inimisɛlajɔ ukuz̤ɛ kulunɡ̤ɛ kɛ aɓapʰulapʰulanɡ̤a aɓajitʰɔɓanɡ̤a inɮɛɓɛ jaɓɔ ɓahamɓa nɡ̤amakǃʰinɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔɓuŋ̤ǃ̤ɔla ɓɛntliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ ɛmɓi ɓand̤inikɛla um̤lana ajaɓa ɓuɓusɔ kususɛla ɓapʰuma nɡ̤ajɔ ɔɔjiɬɔ ɛz̤wɛni lamajiputa unanam̤la nd̤aɓatʰumɛla ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓam aɓaprɔfɛti nd̤iɓatʰuma imiɬa nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kɛ aɓapʰulapʰula aɓajitʰɔɓa inɮɛɓɛ jaɓɔ ɓajɛnz̤a lukʰuni intamɔ jaɓɔ ɓɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi kunɔɔjisɛ kɛ uja kuwatʰɛtʰa kuɓɔ maz̤wi ɔnkɛ aɓaji kukupʰulapʰula umɛmɛz̤a kuɓɔ aɓaji kusaɓɛla kɛ jitʰi kuɓɔ lulɔ ɔlu uɬanɡ̤a ɔlunɡ̤alipʰulapʰulijɔ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ walɔ ɔlunɡ̤ajiv̤umijɔ intɛtʰisɔ kupʰɛlilɛ ukutʰɛmɓɛka kuŋǃumkilɛ ɛmlɔɲɛni waɓɔ ŋǃumla isit͡sʰaɓa sakʰɔ jɛrusalɛm usilaɬɛ umisɛ isimɓɔnɔnɔ ɛlukǃajini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a usikǀɛkisilɛ usiŋǀamilɛ isiz̤ukulwana sɔkupʰupʰuma kwakʰɛ umsind̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a ɓɛnz̤ɛ intɔ ɛmɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓaɓɛkɛ iz̤intɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤inɛz̤ɔtʰɛ ɛnɮwini ɛliɓiz̤ɛlwa pʰɛz̤u kwajɔ iɡ̤ama ukuz̤ɛ ɓajɛnz̤ɛ iŋǃamɓi ɓakʰɛ iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a z̤asɛtɔfɛtɛ ɛz̤isɛmfulɛni wakwab̤ɛn̤inɔm ukuz̤ɛ ɓat͡ʃisɛ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ intɔ ɛnd̤inɡ̤aɓawisɛlanɡ̤a mtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ajɔ ɛnɡ̤atʰanɡ̤a kǃatʰa ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jaɓɔna ijɛz̤a imiɬa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a aɓanɡ̤asaji kuɓa satʰi jitɔfɛtɛ nɡ̤umfula wakwab̤ɛn̤inɔm ɓaja kutʰi nɡ̤umfula wɔkuɓulala ɓaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛlɛ ɛtɔfɛtɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ nd̤awɔ iz̤id̤umɓu z̤aɓa ɓantu z̤ija kuɓa kukuɮa kwɛɛntaka z̤asɛnɮɛ nɔkwɛz̤ilɔ z̤ɛliz̤wɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ɓani uz̤ipʰɛkuz̤ajɔ nd̤ija kulipʰɛz̤isa ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a nasɛz̤itratwɛni z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm iz̤wi lɛmiɬali nɛz̤wi lɛmiv̤ujɔ iz̤wi lɔmjɛni nɛz̤wi lɔmt͡ʃakaz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lija kub̤axa iliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a aja kukʰut͡ʃwa ɛmaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni aɓɔ amatʰamɓɔ ɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a namatʰamɓɔ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ namatʰamɓɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli namatʰamɓɔ aɓaprɔfɛti namatʰamɓɔ aɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm anɛkwɛ ɛlanɡ̤ɛni nasɛɲanɡ̤ɛni nasɛmkʰɔsini wɔnkɛ wɛz̤ulu iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ɔ aɓaɓɛz̤itʰand̤a aɓaɓɛz̤ikʰɔnz̤a aɓaɓɛz̤iland̤ɛla aɓaɓɛkǃukǃɛla kuz̤ɔ aɓaɓɛkǃuɓud̤a kuz̤ɔ akaji kuɬanɡ̤aniswa akaji kuŋ̤ǀ̤watʲwa aja kuɓa nɡ̤umɡ̤ǃ̤uɓa pʰɛz̤u kɔɓusɔ ɓɔm̤laɓa kɔɲulwa pʰɛz̤u kɔɓɔmi nɡ̤amasalɛla ɔnkɛ asɛlɛjɔ kulɛ miz̤alwanɛ inɛɛntɔ ɛz̤imɓi ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɛnd̤iwaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛlɛ kuz̤ɔ amasalɛla ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi jitʰi kɛ kuɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɓaja ɓanɡ̤av̤uki uja kupʰamɓa anɡ̤aɓuji kunɡ̤atʰuɓa ukuɓa aɓa ɓantu ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm ɓapʰamɓɛ nɡ̤ɔkupʰamɓa ɔkunɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ɓaɓamɓɛlɛla ɛnɡ̤ɔɬiswɛni ɓɛnɡ̤av̤umi ukuɓuja nd̤aɓaz̤a inɮɛɓɛ nd̤ɛv̤a ɓatʰɛtʰa intɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛjijɔ akukʰɔ ɓani uz̤ɔɬwajajɔ nɡ̤ɛɛntɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤imɓi atʰi jintɔni lɛ nd̤ijɛnz̤ilɛjɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓaɓujɛla ɛkuɡ̤id̤imɛni kwaɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛhaʃɛ lifunz̤ɛla ɛmfaz̤wɛni kanti nɛnɡ̤wamz̤a ɛz̤ulwini ijawaz̤i amakǁɛʃa ajɔ amisiwɛjɔ nɛhɔɓɛ nɛɬankɔmɔ nɛnd̤wɛ z̤iliɡ̤ǀ̤inilɛ ikǁɛʃa lɔkufika kwaz̤ɔ kɛ ɓɔna aɓantu ɓam aɓalaz̤i isikɔ likajɛhɔv̤a ninɡ̤atʰini ukutʰi siz̤iz̤ilumkɔ umjalɛlɔ kajɛhɔv̤a unatʰi jaɓɔnani ɔkwɛnɛnɛ usiɓa lwaɓab̤ali ɔluɓukǁɔki luwɛnz̤ɛ waɓuɓukǁɔki z̤id̤anilɛ iz̤ilumkɔ z̤ikǃʰipʰukɛ umɓilini z̤iɓand͡ʒ̤isiwɛ jaɓɔna z̤ijalikǀɛkisa iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a z̤inɔɓulumkɔ ɓukaɓani kɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ aɓafaz̤i ɓaɓɔ nd̤ija kuɓanikɛla kuɓamɓi aɓɔ nd̤iwanikɛlɛ kwaɓawaɬutʰajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kɔmŋǀinanɛ ɓɛsa kɔmkʰulu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓaɓawa ɓɛɓawilɛ ɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kumprɔfɛti ɓɛsa kumɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔɓukǁɔki ɓakupʰilisa ukwapʰuka kwɛntɔmɓi jaɓantu ɓam ɓɛsitʰi lukǁɔlɔ lukǁɔlɔ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ lukǁɔlɔ ɓaja kud̤aniswa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛnz̤ɛ amasikiz̤i nɔkɔ kɛ aɓad̤ani nɔkud̤ana aɓakwaz̤i ukuɓa nɛɛntlɔni nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ɓaja pʰakatʰi kwaɓawajɔ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkuɓav̤ɛlɛla ɓaja kukʰuɓɛka ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kuɓat͡ʃajɛla impɛla ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ z̤id̤ilija ɛmd̤ilijɛni kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ makʰiwanɛ ɛmkʰiwanɛni iɡ̤ǃ̤aɓi lija kuɓuna nd̤isukɛ nd̤imisɛ aɓɔ ɓaja kuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ siɬalɛlɛni z̤iɬanɡ̤anisɛni sinɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛmiz̤ini ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ sit͡ʃaɓalalɛ kʰɔna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu uz̤a kusit͡ʃaɓalalisa asisɛz̤ɛ iɲɔnɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sɔnilɛ kujɛhɔv̤a ɓɛsitʰɛmɓɛ ukǁɔlɔ akwaɓakʰɔ ntɔ ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɓɛsitʰɛmɓɛ ikǁɛʃa lɔkupʰiliswa nankɔ ikukud̤and̤atʰɛka liv̤akala liv̤ɛla kwad̤an itʰatʰa lamahaʃɛ aɓɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤wi lɔkukʰɔɲa kwɛɛmɓalasanɛ z̤amahaʃɛ aɓɔ lijaɲikima iliz̤wɛ lɔnkɛ ɓajɛz̤a ɓajaliɮa iliz̤wɛ nɛnz̤alisɛkɔ jalɔ umz̤i naɓɛmi ɓawɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jaɓɔnani nd̤itʰumɛla pʰakatʰi kwɛnu iiɲɔka amaxamɓa anɡ̤ɛnakukʰafulwa anilumɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ujɛ pʰi umtʰutʰuz̤ɛli ɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤alɛni inɔɓulwɛlwɛ intliz̤ijɔ jam nalɔ iliz̤wi lɔkuz̤iɓika kwɛntɔmɓi jaɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu liv̤ɛla ɛz̤wɛni ɛlikud̤ɛ lisitʰi ujɛhɔv̤a akakʰɔ ɛz̤ijɔn akakʰɔ kujɔ wajɔ kunɡ̤atʰuɓa ukuɓa ɓand̤ikǃumɓisɛ nɡ̤ɛmifanɛkisɔ jaɓɔ ɛkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛɛntɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛntɔ z̤ɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a ukuv̤una kuɮulɛ iɬɔɓɔ lipʰɛlilɛ tʰina kɛ asikasind̤iswa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkwapʰuka kwɛntɔmɓi jaɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu nd̤apʰukilɛ nd̤inɛz̤imɲama z̤ɔkuz̤ila nd̤iɓand͡ʒ̤wɛ kukumanɡ̤aliswa akukʰɔ mafutʰa akǃʰɔliwɛjɔ ɛɡ̤ilijad̤i akukʰɔ ɡ̤ǃ̤ixa kʰɔna kutʰɛni kɛ ukuɓa kunɡ̤aɓɔt͡ʃwa ukwapʰuka kwɛntɔmɓi jaɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu ajaɓa intlɔkɔ jam iɓinɡ̤amanz̤i amɛɬɔ aɓa litʰɛnd̤ɛ lɛɛɲɛmɓɛz̤i ɓɛnd̤ija kuɓalilɛla nɔɓusuku aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ ɓɛntɔmɓi jaɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu akwaɓa ɓɛnd̤inɛnd̤awɔ jɔkulalisa kwaɓahamɓi ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɓɛnd̤ija kuɓaʃija aɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu nd̤imkɛ kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɔnkɛ nɡ̤aɓak͡xɛkǁɛz̤i jiŋ̤ǃ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤utʰɛla jamanɡ̤ininɡ̤ini ɓajalutʲɛd̤a lwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔɓukǁɔki nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsapʰɛtʰa aɓapʰatʰi nɡ̤ɔkutʰɛmɓɛka ɛz̤wɛni ɓapʰuma ɛntwɛni ɛmɓi ɓanɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛntwɛni ɛmɓi ɓaɓɛ kɛ ɓɛnɡ̤and̤az̤i ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛlɔwɔ makamlumkɛlɛ ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ ninɡ̤akʰɔlɔsi nanɡ̤ɔmz̤alwana nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɔnkɛ umz̤alwana wɛnz̤a uɓukǃʰinɡ̤a wɔnkɛ ummɛlwanɛ uhamɓa ɛɬɛɓa ɛlɔwɔ ujamkʰɔɬisa ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ aɓatʰɛtʰi ɲanisɔ ɓafund̤isa lwaɓɔ ukutʰɛtʰa uɓukǁɔki ɓaz̤id̤inisɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnz̤a ɔkuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ukuɬala kwakʰɔ kupʰakatʰi kwɛnkɔɬisɔ nɡ̤ɛnkɔɬisɔ aɓav̤umi ukund̤az̤i ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ija kuɓaɲiɓilikisa nd̤iɓakǀikid̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inɡ̤atʰini nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛntɔmɓi jaɓantu ɓam lutɔlɔ ɔluɓulalajɔ lwaɓɔ ɓatʰɛtʰa inkɔɬisɔ ɔmɲɛ utʰɛtʰa ukǁɔlɔ nɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɛ kummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ ɛmɓilinini wakʰɛ umlalɛlɛ mand̤inɡ̤aɓav̤ɛlɛli kɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤az̤ipʰind̤ɛz̤ɛli umpʰɛfumlɔ kuɬanɡ̤a ɔlund͡ʒ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɛntaɓa nd̤iɓɛka isililɔ nɛsimɛma nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamak͡xiwa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nd̤iɓɛka isimɓɔnɔnɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa afakwɛ isikʰuni akwaɓakʰɔ ɓani uɡ̤ǃ̤itʰajɔ kuwɔ alav̤akala iz̤wi lɛmfujɔ kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛz̤intakɛni z̤ɛz̤ulu lwɛsa ɛz̤ilwɛni kusatʲiwɛ kwɛmkiwa nd̤ijɛnz̤ɛ ijɛrusalɛm janɡ̤umwɛwɛ jaz̤iz̤ikʰunɮa z̤ɛɛmpunɡ̤utʲɛ nd̤ijɛnz̤ɛ imiz̤i jakwajud̤a janɡ̤amaŋǁuwa ajaɓa nɡ̤uɓani ind̤ɔd̤a ɛlumkilɛjɔ ikukǃɔnd̤ɛ ɔku ɔtʰɛtʰilɛjɔ kujɔ umlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ikukǁɛlɛ kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jani ukuɓa iliz̤wɛ lit͡ʃaɓalalɛ lifakwɛ isikʰuni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ɓani uɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa kulɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɓɛwuʃijilɛ umjalɛlɔ ɛnd̤awuɓɛka pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ aɓalipʰulapʰula iliz̤wi aɓahamɓa nɡ̤awɔ ɓaland̤ɛla uɓuŋ̤ǃ̤ɔla ɓɛntliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ ɓaland̤ɛla ɔɔb̤ahali intɔ aɓajifund̤iswa nɡ̤ɔɔjisɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ija kuɓaɮisa aɓa ɓantu um̤lɔɲanɛ nd̤iɓasɛz̤ɛ iɲɔnɡ̤ɔ nd̤iɓapʰanɡ̤alalisɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a aɓaɓɛnɡ̤az̤az̤i ɓɔna nɔɔjisɛ nd̤ilitʰumɛlɛ ik͡xɛlɛ ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ nd̤id̤ɛ nd̤iɓapʰɛlisɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi ɡ̤ǃ̤alani niɓiz̤ɛ iintɔkaz̤i ɛz̤ɛnz̤a isimɓɔnɔnɔ z̤iz̤ɛ nitʰumɛlɛ kwɛz̤ilumkilɛjɔ z̤iz̤ɛ z̤iŋ̤ǁ̤amɛ z̤ipʰimisɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu isimɛma ɛɬɛ iiɲɛmɓɛz̤i amɛɬɔ ɛtʰu z̤itʲitʲiz̤ɛlɛ amanz̤i iinkɔpʰɛ z̤ɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iliz̤wi lɛsimɛma liv̤akala lipʰuma ɛz̤ijɔn lisitʰi haji ukub̤ukǃɛka kwɛtʰu sid̤anɛ kakʰulu kuɓa siliʃijilɛ iliz̤wɛ kuɓa ɓɛwakʰaɬɛlɛ pʰant͡si amakʰaja ɛtʰu nɔkɔ kɛ liv̤ɛni z̤intɔkaz̤i iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a inɮɛɓɛ jɛnu ilamkɛlɛ iliz̤wi lɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɛ niz̤ifund̤isɛ iintɔmɓi z̤ɛnu isimɛma ɔmɲɛ afund̤isɛ ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ isimɓɔnɔnɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kuɲukilɛ nɡ̤ɛɛfɛstilɛ z̤ɛtʰu kunɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛni z̤ɛtʰu ɛz̤ind̤ɛ ukuɓa kuŋǃumlɛ aɓantwana ɛz̤itratwɛni amad̤ɔd̤ana ɛnd̤awɛni jɛmɓutʰɔ tʰɛtʰa utʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi z̤ija kɛ iz̤id̤umɓu z̤aɓantu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɡ̤ǃ̤uɓa pʰɛz̤u kwɛnt͡simi nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsind̤ɛ ɛmv̤a kɔmv̤uni kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ uɓaɬanɡ̤anisajɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi isilumkɔ masinɡ̤akǃʰajisi nɡ̤ɔɓulumkɔ ɓasɔ iɡ̤ɔxa malinɡ̤akǃʰajisi nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓalɔ isitʲɛɓi masinɡ̤akǃʰajisi nɡ̤ɔɓutʲɛɓi ɓasɔ ɔkǃʰajisajɔ makakǃʰajisɛ nɡ̤alɛ ntɔ jɔkuɓa ɛnd̤ikǃikǃa ɛnd̤az̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɔwɛnz̤a iŋǀɛɓa nɛsikɔ nɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɛɬaɓatʰini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inanz̤ɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a jaɓɔna ijɛz̤a imiɬa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnd̤ija kuɓɔɬwaja nɡ̤ajɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓalukilɛjɔ pʰɔfu ɓɛnɡ̤alukilɛ amajiputa namajud̤a namaɛd̤ɔm nɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn namamɔwab̤i nɔɔŋǃutʰulaiinwɛlɛ aɓɛmi ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a z̤inɡ̤aɓanɡ̤alukilɛjɔ nɛnɮu jɔnkɛ jakwasirajɛli inɡ̤alukilɛ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi alitʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɮu kasirajɛli ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi musani ukuz̤ikǃʰɛlisa inɮɛla jɛɛntlanɡ̤a ninɡ̤akǃʰipʰuki umɓilini jimikǃɔnd̤isɔ jɛz̤ulu nɡ̤akuɓa iintlanɡ̤a z̤ikǃʰipʰukɛ umɓilini jijɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa imimisɛlɔ jɛz̤iz̤wɛ ajintɔ jantɔ kuɓa iz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤inɡ̤umtʰi ɔɡ̤awulwɛ ɛɬatʰini sisɛnz̤ɔ sɛz̤anɮa z̤ɛŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi nɡ̤ɛz̤ɛmɓɛ iz̤iv̤atʰisa nɡ̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nanɡ̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɓaz̤ikǃinisa nɡ̤ɛz̤ikʰɔnkwanɛ nanɡ̤ɛz̤and̤ɔ ukuɓa z̤inɡ̤aɡ̤ɛkǁaɡ̤ɛkǁi z̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnt͡sika ɛkǀʰwɛliwɛjɔ az̤itʰɛtʰi z̤imɛlɛ ukutʰwalwa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa z̤inɡ̤ɛnakuhamɓa musani ukuz̤ɔjika kuɓa az̤inakwɛnz̤a ɓuɓi kwanɔkulunɡ̤isa az̤inakɔ akukʰɔ namɲɛ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɛ jɛhɔv̤a umkʰulu wɛna likʰulu iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ linɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛ akɔjikɛ kumkani wɛɛntlanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kukufanɛlɛ kuɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤ilumkɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛɛntlanɡ̤a napʰakatʰi kwɛz̤ikumkani z̤ɔnkɛ akukʰɔ namɲɛ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɛ z̤iz̤itʰʲakala z̤iiɲaɓi z̤ɔd̤wa ukǃɛkǃɛʃɔ lwɛntɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔ nɡ̤umtʰi jisiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛkʰand̤iwɛjɔ iz̤iswa iv̤ɛla ɛtarʃiʃɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ jasɛufaz̤i isɛnz̤ɔ sɛŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi nɛsɛz̤anɮa z̤ɔmɲiɓilikisi wɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ jimisɔntɔ ɛmsi nɛmfusa iz̤amɓatʰɔ z̤az̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ipʰɛla z̤isisɛnz̤ɔ sɛz̤ilumkɔ kɛ jɛna ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ iɲanisɔ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ɔpʰililɛjɔ nɡ̤ukumkani ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ iɬaɓatʰi lijaɲikima ɓuɓuxalaxumɛ ɓakʰɛ nɛɛntlanɡ̤a az̤inakulutʰwala ub̤av̤umɔ lwakʰɛ nɔt͡ʃɔ kuɓɔ ukutʰi ɓɔna ɔɔtʰikǁɔ aɓanɡ̤alɛnz̤anɡ̤a iz̤ulu nɛɬaɓatʰi ɓaja kud̤aka ɛɬaɓatʰini napʰant͡si kwɛz̤ulu kɛ jɛna nɡ̤ulɔwɛnz̤a iɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤amanɮa akʰɛ ulɔz̤inz̤isa ɛlimiwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔɓulumkɔ ɓakʰɛ wanɛka iz̤ulu nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ jakʰɛ kwakuɓɔn ukuɓa kukʰɔ isitʰɔnɡ̤a sɔkwɛnz̤a kwakʰɛ iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔlɔ jamanz̤i ɛz̤ulwini uɲusa ɛsipʰɛlwɛni sɛɬaɓatʰi imv̤ula ujɛnz̤ɛla imiɓanɛ axɔlɛ umɔja kɔɔv̤imɓa ɓakʰɛ uɓa sisitʰʲakala wɔnkɛ ɛnɡ̤ɛnakwaz̤i ud̤aniswa wɔnkɛ umɲiɓilikisi wɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɡ̤umfanɛkisɔ ɔkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umfanɛkisɔ wakʰɛ ɔtʰʲid̤iwɛjɔ ɓuɓukǁɔki awunamɔja z̤inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ z̤iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɔkuɡ̤ǁ̤ɛkwa nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkuv̤ɛlɛlwa kwaz̤ɔ z̤ijad̤aka akand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤az̤ɔ jɛna usaɬulɛlɔ sikajakɔɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤umɓumɓi wɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ jɛna usirajɛli sisiz̤wɛ sɛlifa lakʰɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ ɬanɡ̤anisa impaɬa jakʰɔ umkɛ najɔ kwɛli liz̤wɛ wɛna uɬɛlijɔ ɛkuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤wɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ut͡ʃilɔ ukutʰi jaɓɔna nɡ̤ɛsi siɬanɮɔ nd̤isawula aɓɛmi ɓɛliz̤wɛ nd̤iɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛ ukuz̤ɛ ɓafuɲanwɛ atʰi kɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkwapʰuka lɛlɔkuɓulala iŋǁɛɓa kɛ nd̤itʰi iɲanisɔ sisifɔ ɛsi nd̤ija kusiɲamɛz̤ɛla intɛntɛ jam ib̤ukǃiwɛ nɛɛntamɓɔ z̤am z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ikǃʰawukilɛ ɔɔɲana ɓam ɓapʰumilɛ aɓaɓa saɓakʰɔ akusɛkʰɔ ujitwaɓululajɔ intɛntɛ jam amisɛ amalɛnɡ̤alɛnɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓalusi ɓaɓa z̤iz̤itʰʲakala aɓamkǃukǃɛla ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ aɓɛnz̤anɡ̤a nɡ̤aŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ wakǀʰitʰwakǀʰitwa wɔnkɛ um̤lamɓi waɓɔ pʰulapʰulani kuv̤akala intɔ nant͡sɔ isiz̤a jiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔlɔ ɛnkulu ipʰuma ɛz̤wɛni asɛntla ukuz̤ɛ imiz̤i jakwajud̤a iɓɛ nɡ̤amaŋǁuwa iɓɛ sisikʰunɮa sɛɛmpunɡ̤utʲɛ nd̤ijaz̤i jɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa ajikʰɔna ɛmntwini inɮɛla jakʰɛ akukʰɔna ɛnd̤ɔd̤ɛni ɛhamɓajɔ ukukǃinisɛla ukuɲatʰɛla kwajɔ nd̤itʰɛtʰisɛ jɛhɔv̤a kɔd̤wa kuɓɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ kunɡ̤aɓi nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɔ ɬɛz̤ɛ und̤iŋǀipʰisɛ pʰalaz̤a uɓuʃuʃu ɓakʰɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛz̤inɡ̤akwaz̤ijɔ napʰɛz̤u kwɛmiz̤alwanɛ ɛnɡ̤aliŋǃulijɔ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa z̤imɮilɛ ujakɔɓi z̤imɮilɛ z̤amɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa ik͡xiwa lakʰɛ z̤alɛnz̤a laɓa sɛnkanɡ̤ala iliz̤wi ɛlafikajɔ kujɛrɛmija liv̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi wav̤ɛni amaz̤wi alɔ mŋǃɔpʰisɔ nitʰɛtʰɛ kumad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a nakuɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm utʰi kuɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi majikǃalɛkiswɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤awɛv̤ajɔ amaz̤wi alɔ mŋǃɔpʰisɔ nd̤aɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤awɔ ɔɔjiɬɔ m̤la nd̤aɓakʰupʰajɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa ɛz̤ikwɛni lɛsiɲitʰi nd̤atʰi lipʰulapʰulɛni iliz̤wi nɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ ɛnd̤iniwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ nɔɓa nɡ̤aɓantu ɓam nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɛnu ukuz̤ɛ nd̤isimisɛ isifunɡ̤ɔ ɛnd̤asifunɡ̤ɛla ɔɔjiɬɔ ukuɓa nd̤iɓanikɛ iliz̤wɛ ɛliɓalɛka nɔɓusi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kund͡ʒ̤alɔ nam̤la nd̤apʰɛnd̤ula nd̤atʰi amɛn jɛhɔv̤a watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a wamɛmɛz̤ɛ maz̤wi ɔnkɛ ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a nasɛz̤itratwɛni z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm utʰi jiv̤ani amaz̤wi alɔ mŋǃɔpʰisɔ niwɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤akǃɔnɔnɔnd̤isa nd̤ikǃɔnɔnɔnd̤isa kɔjiɬɔ m̤la nd̤aɓakʰupʰajɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa unanam̤la nd̤ikǃɔnɔnɔnd̤isa nd̤isitʰi lipʰulapʰulɛni iliz̤wi kɛ aɓɛv̤anɡ̤a aɓajitʰɔɓanɡ̤a inɮɛɓɛ jaɓɔ ɓahamɓa ɛlɔwɔ nɡ̤ɔɓuŋ̤ǃ̤ɔla ɓɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ ɛnɔɓuɓi nd̤ɛsuka kɛ nd̤az̤isa pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi alɔ mŋǃɔpʰisɔ nd̤aɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤awɔ ukuɓa ɓawɛnz̤ɛ aɓawɛnz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi kufuɲɛnwɛ ijɛlɛŋǃɛ pʰakatʰi kwamad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a napʰakatʰi kwaɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm ɓaɓujɛlɛ kuz̤ɔ iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ ɛz̤iɡ̤wɛŋǁa z̤ɔɔjisɛ ɓamand̤ulɔ aɓaɓɛnɡ̤av̤umi ukuwɛv̤a amaz̤wi aɓasuka ɓɔna ɓaland̤ɛla tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi ukuz̤ɛ ɓaɓakʰɔnz̤ɛ inɮu kasirajɛli nɛnɮu kajud̤a z̤awapʰula umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɛnd̤awɛnz̤a nɔɔjisɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤iɓaz̤isɛla uɓuɓi aɓanɡ̤aji kuɓa nakɔ ukupʰuma kuɓɔ ɓakʰalɛ nd̤inɡ̤aɓapʰulapʰuli ija kuhamɓa kɛ imiz̤i jakwajud̤a naɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm ɓakʰalɛ kɔɔtʰikǁɔ aɓakǃʰumisɛla kuɓɔ ɓanɡ̤aɓasind̤isi nɔkuɓasind̤isa nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔɓuɓi ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛnani lɛmiz̤i jakʰɔ ɓaɓa nɡ̤akɔ ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓakajud̤a nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛnani lɛz̤itratɔ z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm z̤aɓa nɡ̤akɔ iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛnaz̤imisɛla intɔ ɛlisikiz̤i iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤ɔkukǃʰumisɛla kub̤ahali wɛna kɛ ukuɓatʰand̤az̤ɛla aɓa ɓantu unɡ̤apʰimisɛli kuɬaɬamɓa nakutʰand̤az̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa and̤iji kuv̤a nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkukʰala kwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi ɓaɓɔ ifuna ntɔni intand̤a jam ɛnɮwini jam isɛnz̤a amajɛlɛŋǃɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ iz̤ib̤amɓatʰisɔ nɛɲama ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤ɔɓususa uɓuɓi ɓakʰɔ kuwɛ uɓunɡ̤and̤ula uɮamkɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wakuɓiz̤a nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama lɔkuɓa unɡ̤umŋǃuma ɔluɬaz̤a ɔjimpuluswa ɔsikǃʰamɔ siɬɛ isikʰuni kuwɔ kukʰɔ isand̤i sɛŋ̤ǁ̤aɓat͡ʃit͡ʃi ɛnkulu av̤iv̤ɛka amasɛɓɛ awɔ kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ɔwakutʲalajɔ utʰɛtʰɛ ɔkuɓi nɡ̤awɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤imɓi z̤ɛnɮu kasirajɛli nɛz̤ɛnɮu kajud̤a aɓaz̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛjɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓand̤ikǃumɓisɛ nɡ̤ɔkukǃʰumisɛla ub̤ahali kɛ kalɔku ujɛhɔv̤a wand̤az̤isa nd̤az̤i waz̤a wand̤iɓɔnisa ɔkɔ iintlɔnd̤i z̤aɓɔ nd̤aɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmana ɛmɓuna ɛsiwa ɛkukǁʰɛlwɛni ɓɛnd̤inɡ̤az̤i ukuɓa ɓakǀɛɓɛ ikǀɛɓɔ nɡ̤am ɓɛsitʰi masiwɔnakalisɛ umtʰi kuɲɛ nɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤awɔ masimŋǃumlɛ ɛz̤wɛni laɓapʰililɛjɔ linɡ̤aɓi sakʰund͡ʒ̤ulwa iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ jɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi uɡ̤wɛɓajɔ nɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa uz̤ikǀikid̤ajɔ iz̤int͡sɔ nɛntliz̤ijɔ mand̤ijiɓɔnɛ impind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ jakʰɔ kuɓɔ uɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ijitʰʲililɛ kuwɛ imɓamɓanɔ jam naɓɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a asɛanatɔni awuŋ̤ǁ̤amɛlɛjɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ ɛsitʰi uz̤ɛ unɡ̤aprɔfɛti ɛɡ̤amɛni likajɛhɔv̤a ukuz̤ɛ unɡ̤afi nɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤ɛtʰu nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ija kuwav̤ɛlɛla amad̤ɔd̤ana aja lik͡xɛlɛ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤aɓɔ z̤ija jinɮala akuji kuɓakʰɔ masalɛla kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iwaz̤isɛla uɓuɓi amad̤ɔd̤a asɛanatɔti umɲaka wɔkuv̤ɛlɛlwa kwawɔ ulilunɡ̤isa jɛhɔv̤a kǁa nd̤iɓamɓɛnɛjɔ nawɛ nd̤ɔtʰɛtʰa iind̤awɔ ɛz̤isɛsikwɛni z̤ɔd̤wa kunɡ̤atʰuɓa ukuɓa inɮɛla jaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ iɓɛ nɛmpumɛlɛlɔ ɓaɓɛ nɔkukǀʰulumakǀʰa ɓɔnkɛ aɓanɡ̤iniz̤a ɓɛnɡ̤iniz̤ilɛ uɓatʲɛlɛ ɓɛnd̤ɛla nɔkwɛnd̤ɛla iiŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu ɓajakʰula ɓɛnz̤ɛ nɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ usɔnd̤ɛlɛ ɛmlɔɲɛni waɓɔ wakud̤ɛ ɛz̤int͡swɛni z̤aɓɔ wɛna jɛhɔv̤a ujand̤az̤i ujand̤iɓɔna ujikǀikid̤a intliz̤ijɔ jam ɛnawɛ ɓakǃwɛkǃwɛd̤isɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa ɓakǁʰɛlwɛ uɓaŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛlɛ um̤la wɔkuɓulawa kunini iliz̤wɛ linɛsid͡ʒ̤wili umfunɔ ɔnkɛ wɔmilɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɛntɔ ɛz̤imɓi z̤aɓɛmi ɓalɔ z̤ipʰɛpʰɛtʰɛkilɛ iinkɔmɔ nɛɛntaka nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛsitʰi akaji kuliɓɔna ikamv̤a lɛtʰu kǁa uɡ̤id̤imɛ naɓɛɛɲawɔ ɓakud̤inisa wɔtʰini ukuʃijisɛlana namahaʃɛ kǁa ukʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ɛliz̤wɛ ɛlinɔkǁɔlɔ wɔtʰini ɛkwɛnɛni kwɛjɔrd̤an nɡ̤ɔkuɓa naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɔ nɛnɮu kajiɬɔ ɓanɡ̤iniz̤ilɛ kuwɛ naɓɔ ɓajamɛmɛz̤a ɛmv̤a kwakʰɔ naɓɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤wikaz̤i ɛlikʰulu musa ukukʰɔlwa nɡ̤aɓɔ kǁa ɓatʰɛtʰa iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kuwɛ nd̤ijiʃijilɛ inɮu jam nd̤ililaɬilɛ nd̤ijinikɛlɛ intand̤a jɔmpʰɛfumlɔ ɛsanɮɛni sɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤ajɔ ilifa lisukɛ laɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲama jasɛɬatʰini lind̤ikʰupʰɛlɛ iliz̤wi lalɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nd̤ilitʰijilɛ ilifa lukʰɔz̤i ɔlutʰɛ kǀʰɔkɔkǀʰɔkɔ ukuɓa iinkɔz̤i z̤ilinɡ̤unɡ̤ɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ jiz̤ani niɬanɡ̤anisɛ ɔnkɛ amaxamŋǀwa asɛnɮɛ waz̤isɛni aɮɛ aɓalusi aɓaninz̤i ɓasɔnakalisilɛ isid̤ilija ɓasiŋ̤ǃ̤uʃilɛ isiz̤iɓa sɔm̤laɓa ɓasib̤axisilɛ isiz̤iɓa ɛsiŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ sajintlanɡ̤ɔ ɓasib̤axisilɛ sisid͡ʒ̤wili nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ sib̤axilɛ kusɛnkanɡ̤ala kulɔ lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akuɓanɡ̤akʰɔ ukuɓɛkɛla intliz̤ijɔ ɔkɔ ɛlukǃajini lɔnkɛ lwasɛntlanɡ̤ɔ kufikɛ aɓab̤ukǃi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ik͡xɛlɛ likajɛhɔv̤a lijaɮa litʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛliz̤wɛ lisɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛliz̤wɛ akukʰɔ lukǁɔlɔ kwiɲama jɔnkɛ ɓaɬwajɛla iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa ɓav̤una amɛv̤a ɓaz̤id̤uɓilɛ aɓafɛz̤a lutʰɔ d̤anani kɛ lunɡ̤ɛnisɛlɔ lwɛnu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuʃuʃu ɓɔmsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤aɓamɛlwanɛ ɓam ɓɔnkɛ aɓanɔɓuɓi aɓakǀʰukumisa ɛnd̤aliɮisa aɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤ijaɓaɲɔtʰula ɛm̤laɓɛni waɓɔ nd̤ijiɲɔtʰulɛ inɮu jakwajud̤a pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ kuja kutʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa nd̤iɓaɲɔtʰulɛ nd̤iɓujɛ nd̤iɓɛ nɛmfɛsanɛ kuɓɔ nd̤iɓaɓujisɛlɛ ɛlɔwɔ ɛlifɛni lakʰɛ ɛlɔwɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni wakʰɛ kɔtʰi ukuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓaz̤ifund̤a nɡ̤ɛnkutʰalɔ iinɮɛla z̤aɓantu ɓam ukuɓa ɓafunɡ̤ɛ iɡ̤ama ɓatʰi ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓaɓafund̤isajɔ aɓantu ɓam ukufunɡ̤a ub̤ahali ɓaz̤ɛ ɓakʰɛkɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu ɓam kɛ ukuɓa ɓatʰɛ aɓɛv̤a nd̤ɔluɲɔtʰula ɔlu ɬanɡ̤a nd̤iluɲɔtʰulɛ nd̤ilut͡ʃaɓalalisɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi hamɓa ujɛ uz̤itʰɛnɡ̤ɛlɛ umb̤iŋǃɔ wɛlinɛn uwuɓɛkɛ ɛsiŋǃɛni sakʰɔ kɛ uz̤ɛ unɡ̤awufaki ɛmanz̤ini nd̤awutʰɛnɡ̤a kɛ umb̤iŋǃɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nd̤awuɓɛka ɛsiŋǃɛni kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɔkwɛsiɓini lisitʰi wutʰaɓatʰɛ umb̤iŋǃɔ ɔwutʰɛnɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɔsɛsiŋǃɛni sakʰɔ usukɛ ujɛ ɛmɛfrati uwufiɬɛ kʰɔna ɛmfantɛni jɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa nd̤aja nd̤awufiɬa ɛmɛfrati nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wand̤iwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kwatʰi ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɬa ɛmininz̤i watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a suka ujɛ ɛmɛfrati uwutʰaɓatʰɛ kʰɔna umb̤iŋǃɔ ɛnd̤akuwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤awɔ ukuɓa uwufiɬɛ kʰɔna nd̤aja kɛ ɛmɛfrati nd̤ɛmɓa nd̤awutʰaɓatʰa umb̤iŋǃɔ kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ ɓɛnd̤iwufiɬɛ kujɔ nanɡ̤ɔ wɔnakɛlɛ umb̤iŋǃɔ unɡ̤asɛnamsɛɓɛnz̤i kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukulɔnakalisa ik͡xat͡ʃi lakwajud̤a ik͡xat͡ʃi ɛlikʰulu lasɛjɛrusalɛm aɓa ɓantu ɓanɔɓuɓi ɓanɡ̤av̤umijɔ ukuv̤a amaz̤wi ɓahamɓajɔ nɡ̤ɔɓuŋ̤ǃ̤ɔla ɓɛntliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ ɓaland̤ɛla tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi ukuz̤ɛ ɓaɓakʰɔnz̤ɛ ɓakǃuɓud̤ɛ kuɓɔ ɓaja kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤alɔɔ mb̤iŋǃɔ unɡ̤asɛnamsɛɓɛnz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa umb̤iŋǃɔ unamatʰɛla ɛsiŋǃɛni sɛnd̤ɔd̤a nd̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukujinamatʰɛlisa jɔnkɛ inɮu kasirajɛli nɛnɮu jɔnkɛ kajud̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukuz̤ɛ iɓɛ nɡ̤aɓantu iɓɛ liɡ̤ama iɓɛ jind̤umisɔ iɓɛ sisihɔmɓɔ kɛ aɓɛv̤anɡ̤a uz̤ɛ utʰɛtʰɛ kuɓɔ ɛli liz̤wi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi jɔnkɛ imipʰand̤a ijaz̤aliswa nɡ̤ɛwajini ɓaja kutʰi kuwɛ asaz̤i nɔkwaz̤i ukuɓa jɔnkɛ imipʰand̤a ijaz̤aliswa nɡ̤ɛwajini wɔtʰi kɛ kuɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤iɓaz̤alisa nɡ̤ɔkuŋǁila ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmi ɓɛli liz̤wɛ kwaɔɔkumkani aɓaɬalɛlɛ ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛtrɔnɛni jakʰɛ naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓaprɔfɛti naɓɛmi ɓɔnkɛ ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm nd̤iɓaɬɛkɛz̤ɛlɛ ɛlɔwɔ kuwaɓɔ ɔɔjisɛ nɔɔɲana kuɲɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a and̤iji kuɓa nalufɛfɛ and̤iji kuɓa naŋǀɛɓa and̤iji kuɓa namfɛsanɛ ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤aɓɔnakalisi jiv̤ani niɓɛkɛ inɮɛɓɛ ukuz̤iɮa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ujatʰɛtʰa mz̤ukisɛni ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu ɛnɡ̤ɛkaɬisi uɓumɲama z̤inɡ̤ɛkaɓɛtʰɛki ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤ɔkǀɔlɔtʰi iiɲawɔ z̤ɛnu nitʰɛmɓɛ ukukʰaɲa kɛ jɛna ukwɛnz̤a itʰunz̤i lɔkufa akwɛnz̤ɛ isitʰɔkɔtʰɔkɔ ukuɓa anitʰanɡ̤a nikuv̤ɛ ɔkɔ wɔlila umpʰɛfumlɔ ɛnt͡sitʰɛlwɛni nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkǃʰaŋ̰ǃ̰alaz̤ɔ lwɛnu litʲitʲiz̤ɛlɛ litʲitʲiz̤ɛla liɬɛ iiɲɛmɓɛz̤i ilisɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa um̤lamɓi kajɛhɔv̤a utʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛ jitʰi nakwinkɔsikaz̤i z̤itʰɔɓɛni ɬalani pʰant͡si nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sijɛɬa ɛz̤intlɔkwɛni z̤ɛnu isit͡sʰaɓa sɔkuhɔmɓa kwɛnu imiz̤i jɛlisɛz̤ant͡si iv̤aliwɛ akukʰɔ unɡ̤ajiv̤ulajɔ ujud̤a ufud̤usiwɛ ɛpʰɛla ufud̤usiwɛ kaɲɛ pʰakamisani amɛɬɔ ɛnu niɓɔnɛ aɓav̤ɛla ɛntla upʰi um̤lamɓi ɔɓuwunikiwɛ impaɬa jakʰɔ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ ɛntlɛ wɔtʰini kǁa atʰɛ aɓɔ kɛ uɓakǃʰɛlisɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤amakʰɔlwanɛ akʰɔ waɓɛnz̤a ɓanɡ̤aɓav̤ɛlɛli ɓajintlɔkɔ kuwɛ ajiji kukuɓamɓa inimɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmfaz̤i ɔz̤alajɔ nakǁa utʰɛ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɔ kunɡ̤ani ukuɓa nd̤ifikɛlwɛ z̤ɛz̤i z̤intɔ nɡ̤ɔɓuninz̤i ɓɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɔ utʰʲilɛkilɛ inɡ̤uɓɔ z̤aɡ̤ɔɲamɛlwa iz̤itʰɛnd̤ɛ z̤akʰɔ umkuʃi unɔkuluɡ̤ukǃula lwakʰɛ nɛnɡ̤wɛ inɔkuwaɡ̤ukǃula amaɓala ajɔ ninɡ̤aɓa kɛ ninakɔ ukulunɡ̤isa ɓakǃʰɛlɛ ukwɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi nd̤ija kuɓapʰanɡ̤alalisa kɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmkǃukǃu ɔpʰɛpʰuka nɔmɔja wɛntlanɡ̤ɔ likǃaʃisɔ lakʰɔ ɛlɔ isaɓɛlɔ sakʰɔ ɛsilinɡ̤anisɛlwɛjɔ nd̤im ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa und̤iliɓɛlɛ wakʰɔlɔsa nɡ̤ɔɓukǁɔki nam nd̤ija kujib̤ɛŋǃa inɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɔ iɓɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ kuɓɔnakalɛ ukukǀukukǀɛz̤ɛka kwakʰɔ ukuk͡xɛkǁɛz̤a kwakʰɔ nɔkukʰɔɲa kwakʰɔ amaɲala ɔkuhɛɲuz̤a kwakʰɔ ɛz̤ind̤ulini ɛz̤inɮɛ nd̤iwaɓɔnilɛ amaz̤ɔtʰɛ akʰɔ atʰi kɛ wɛna jɛrusalɛm akuji kuɬamɓuluka inɡ̤afanɛlana inɡ̤umz̤uz̤u ɔnɡ̤akanani intɔ ɛjafikajɔ kujɛrɛmija ililiz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ jɔkuŋǃumka kwɛmv̤ula linɛsid͡ʒ̤wili ɛlakwajud̤a amasanɡ̤ɔ alɔ atʰɛ mat͡ʃamat͡ʃa aɬala ɛm̤laɓɛni ɛnɛz̤imɲama z̤ɔkuz̤ila kujɛɲuka ukukʰala kwɛjɛrusalɛm iinɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa z̤aɓɔ z̤itʰuma aɓapʰant͡si kwaz̤ɔ amanz̤i ɓafika ɛmakǃulɛni ɓanɡ̤afumani manz̤i ɓaɓuja imipʰand̤a jaɓɔ iz̤ɛ ɓɛd̤anilɛ ɓatʰi ŋǃa ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɛ intlɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔm̤laɓa ɔkǃʰipʰukɛ umɓilini kuɓa kunɡ̤aɓanɡ̤akʰɔ mv̤ula ɛz̤wɛni aɓalimi ɓad̤anilɛ ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɛ intlɔkɔ ɛwɛ nɛmaz̤i jɛkǁʰama ijaz̤ala ɛnɮɛ ijiʃijɛ inkɔɲana nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ luɬaz̤a namaɛsilɛ asɛnɮɛ ɛmi ɛlukǃajini ɛsɛz̤ɛla umɔja nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛmpunɡ̤utʲɛ ajapʰɛla amɛɬɔ awɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ mifunɔ ukuɓa uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛtʰu ɓuŋ̤ǃ̤ina nɡ̤atʰi jɛhɔv̤a jɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤ama lakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kuninz̤i ukupʰamɓa kwɛtʰu sɔnilɛ kuwɛ tʰɛmɓa likasirajɛli msind̤isi wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ jini ukuɓa uɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmpʰamɓukɛli kwɛli liz̤wɛ uɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔm̤amɓi ɔlalisɛ ɔkɔɓusuku ɔɓuɲɛ jini ukuɓa uɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛsukɛ jatʰi uɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɡ̤ɔxa ɛlinɡ̤ɛnakusind̤isa upʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu jɛhɔv̤a nɛɡ̤ama lakʰɔ siɓiz̤wɛ nɡ̤alɔ musa ukusijɛkɛla ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kwaɓa ɓantu ukutʰi ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukutʰand̤a ukub̤ad̤ula iiɲawɔ z̤aɓɔ aɓaz̤iŋǃand̤anɡ̤a ujɛhɔv̤a akakʰɔliswa nɡ̤aɓɔ kunɡ̤ɔku uja kuɓukʰumɓula uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ az̤iv̤ɛlɛlɛ iz̤ɔnɔ z̤aɓɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a musa ukuɓatʰand̤az̤ɛla aɓa ɓantu ukuɓa kulunɡ̤ɛ kuɓɔ kǁa ɓaz̤ila ukuɮa and̤iji kukupʰulapʰula ukuɬaɬamɓa kwaɓɔ nakǁa ɓaɲusa amad̤ini aɲukajɔ nɛminikɛlɔ jɔkuɮa and̤iji kukʰɔliswa nɡ̤awɔ kɛ nd̤ija kuɓapʰɛlisa nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nanɡ̤ɛnɮala nanɡ̤ɛndʲikitʲa jɔkufa nd̤az̤a nd̤atʰi kwɔwu nkɔsi jɛhɔv̤a jaɓɔna aɓaprɔfɛti ɓatʰi kuɓɔ aniji kuɓɔna k͡xɛlɛ nɛnɮala aniji kuɓa najɔ nd̤ija ukǁɔlɔ ɔlujiɲanisɔ kulɛ nd̤awɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a aɓaprɔfɛti ɓaprɔfɛta uɓukǁɔki ɛɡ̤amɛni and̤iɓatʰumanɡ̤a and̤iɓawisɛlanɡ̤a mtʰɛtʰɔ and̤itʰɛtʰanɡ̤a kuɓɔ ɓɔna ɓaniprɔfɛtɛla umɓɔnɔ wɔɓukǁɔki nɔkuv̤umisa nɛntɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔ nɛnkɔɬisɔ jɛntliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ utʰi ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kuɓaprɔfɛti aɓaprɔfɛta ɛɡ̤amɛni nd̤inɡ̤aɓatʰumanɡ̤a aɓatʰi akuji kuɓakʰɔ k͡xɛlɛ nanɮala kwɛli liz̤wɛ utʰi ɓaja lik͡xɛlɛ najinɮala ɓɔna aɓɔ ɓaprɔfɛti naɓa ɓantu ɓaprɔfɛtɛla ɓɔna ɓaja kuɓa jimilaɬwa ɛz̤itratwɛni z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnɮala nɛk͡xɛlɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ uɓaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓajɔ ɓɔna naɓafaz̤i ɓaɓɔ nɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤aɓɔ nd̤iɓapʰalaz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛɛntɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤imɓi nɡ̤ɔkɔ uz̤ɛ utʰɛtʰɛ kuɓɔ ɛli liz̤wi lɔkutʰi amɛɬɔ aɬa iiɲɛmɓɛz̤i uɓusuku nɛmini anɡ̤apʰɛz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa japʰulwɛ nɡ̤ɔlwapʰulɔ ɔlukʰulu inkaz̤ana ɛjintɔmɓi jaɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu nɡ̤ɛŋǁɛɓa ɛliɓulalajɔ kakʰulu ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤apʰuma nd̤aja ɛmapʰanɮɛni naɓɔ aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ lik͡xɛlɛ ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤anɡ̤ɛna kuwɔ umz̤i naɓɔ aɓafa jinɮala nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umprɔfɛti kwanɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓajakǃulɛka ɛz̤wɛni aɓanɡ̤alaz̤ijɔ umkǀɛkisɛ kwapʰɛla ujud̤a ud̤imɛlɛ jiz̤ijɔn umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ jini ukuɓa usiɓɛtʰɛ sinɡ̤aɓi nakupʰiliswa sitʰɛmɓɛ ukǁɔlɔ akwaɓakʰɔ ntɔ ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ sitʰɛmɓɛ ikǁɛʃa lɔkupʰiliswa nankɔ ikukud̤and̤atʰɛka sijakwaz̤i jɛhɔv̤a ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kwɛtʰu uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɔɔɓawɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sɔnilɛ kuwɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤ama lakʰɔ ukusiɡ̤iɓa unɡ̤ajiɬaz̤isi itrɔnɛ jɔɓukǃakǃawuli ɓakʰɔ kʰumɓula unɡ̤awapʰuli umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wakʰɔ natʰi pʰakatʰi kɔtʰikǁɔ aɓanɡ̤ɛntɔ ɓɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɓakʰɔ aɓanɡ̤anisa imv̤ula iz̤ulu linɡ̤ajinika imiv̤umɓi asinɡ̤uwɛ jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu sitʰɛmɓɛ wɛna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uz̤ɛnz̤ilɛ wɛna z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ watʰi kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a kunɡ̤afanɛlana ɔɔmɔsɛs nɔsamuwɛli pʰamɓi umpʰɛfumlɔ uɓunɡ̤ɛb̤ɛki kwaɓa ɓantu ɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓam ɓapʰumɛ kuja kutʰi kǁa ɓatʰɛ kuwɛ sipʰumɛ sijɛ nɡ̤apʰi utʰi kuɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi aɓɔkufa ɓafɛ aɓɛk͡xɛlɛ ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓɛk͡xɛlɛ aɓɛnɮala ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓɛnɮala aɓɔkutʰind͡ʒ̤wa ɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wɛ nd̤ɔɓav̤ɛlɛla nɡ̤ɛɛntlɔɓɔ ɛz̤inɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ik͡xɛlɛ ukuɓa liɓulalɛ iz̤ind͡ʒ̤a ukuɓa z̤ixwikǃiliz̤ɛ z̤ɛz̤ulu nɛz̤ilɔ z̤ɔm̤laɓa ukuɓa z̤iɮɛ ukuɓa z̤ɔnakalisɛ nd̤ɔɓanikɛla kwiz̤ikumkani z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi ukuɓa ɓaɓɛ jintɔ jɔkuŋǃakulwa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kamanasɛ uɲana kahɛz̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ wakwɛnz̤ajɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛwɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kuɓa nɔfɛfɛ kuwɛ jɛrusalɛm nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kukukʰuz̤a nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kupʰamɓuka aɓuz̤ɛ ukupʰila kwakʰɔ wɛna und̤ilaɬilɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uɓujɛ umv̤a nd̤ija kusɔlula isanɮa nɡ̤akuwɛ nd̤ikɔnakalisɛ nd̤id̤iniwɛ kukuz̤ɔɬwaja nd̤ijaɓakǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰa nɡ̤ɛkǁʰaji ɛmasanɡ̤wɛni ɛliz̤wɛ nd̤iɓaɬutʰɛ aɓantwana aɓantu ɓam nd̤iɓat͡ʃaɓalalisɛ ɓɛnɡ̤aɓuji nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɛz̤inɮɛlɛni z̤aɓɔ aɓaɬɔlɔkaz̤i ɓaɓɔ ɓaz̤iimfid̤i kunɛntlaɓatʰi jɔlwanɮɛ nd̤iz̤isa kuɓɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔnina wamad̤ɔd̤ana umb̤ukǃi ɛmini ɛnkulu nd̤iɓawisɛla nɡ̤ɛsikǃupʰɛ inimɓa nɔkukʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰iswa ujant͡ʃwɛɲa ɔz̤ɛlɛ aɓasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ upʰuma umpʰɛfumlɔ lijat͡ʃɔna ilanɡ̤a lakʰɛ kusɛsɛmini ud̤anilɛ unɛɛntlɔni namasalɛla aɓɔ nd̤iwanikɛla ɛk͡xɛlɛni pʰamɓi kwɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a atʰi kɛ ukuɓa uz̤alɛ wɛmɓamɓanɔ wɛŋ̤ǁ̤aɓanɔ nɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ and̤iɓɔlɛkanɡ̤a and̤aɓɔlɛkwa ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓajand̤it͡ʃab̤isa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰi iɲanisɔ nd̤ija kukukǃinisɛla wɛna kɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ iɲanisɔ ut͡ʃaɓa nd̤ija kuluɓɔnɡ̤ɔz̤isa kuwɛ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔɓuɓi nanɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ sikʰa sapʰukɛ isiɲitʰi isiɲitʰi sasɛntla nɔb̤ɛd̤u uɓutʲɛɓi ɓakʰɔ nɔɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓakʰɔ nd̤ɔɓunikɛla ukuɓa ɓuɓɛ likǁʰɔɓa kunɡ̤ɛnɡ̤akǁaɓisɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nasɛmid̤ɛni jakʰɔ jɔnkɛ nd̤iɓuwɛz̤ɛ nɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ nd̤iɓujɛ ɛz̤wɛni ɔnɡ̤alaz̤ijɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kupʰɛnd͡ʒ̤wɛ umlilɔ nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ uv̤utʰa pʰɛz̤u kwɛnu wɛna jɛhɔv̤a ujaz̤i nd̤ikʰumɓulɛ und̤iv̤ɛlɛlɛ und̤ipʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlɛlɛ kuɓasukɛli ɓam ɛkuz̤ɛkɛni kad̤ɛ kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɔ unɡ̤and̤ikʰukulisi jaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤itʰwɛlɛ iɬaz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɔ afumanɛka amaz̤wi akʰɔ nd̤awaɮa amaz̤wi akʰɔ aɓa jimiɬali nɛmiv̤ujɔ jɛntliz̤ijɔ jam nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤aɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama lakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi and̤iɬalanɡ̤a ɛmɓutʰwɛni jaɓaɬɛki and̤iɮamkanɡ̤a nɔkuɮamka nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛsanɮa sakʰɔ nd̤aɬala nd̤ɛd̤wa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa und̤iz̤alisilɛ nɡ̤ɔkub̤av̤uma jini ukuɓa umv̤and̤ɛd̤wa uɬalɛ uɬɛli nɛŋǁɛɓa liɓulalɛ linɡ̤av̤umi ukupʰɔla wɔɬa uɓɛ nɡ̤umlamɓɔ ɔkʰɔɬisajɔ ɔmanz̤i anɡ̤aɬalijɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ukuɓa utʰɛ waɓuja nd̤ɔkuɓujisa uɓujɛ umɛ pʰamɓi ukuɓa utʰɛ wakʰupʰa ɔkuŋǃaɓilɛjɔ kɔkunɡ̤ɛni wɔɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ aɓɔ ɓaja kuɓujɛla kuwɛ kɛ wɛna akuji kuɓujɛla kuɓɔ nd̤ija kukwɛnz̤a ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lɔb̤ɛd̤u ɔluŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ kwaɓa ɓantu ɓalwɛ nawɛ ɓanɡ̤aɓi nakukutʰini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inawɛ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤ikusind̤isɛ nd̤ikuɬanɡ̤ulɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kukuɬanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni saɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ nd̤ikukʰululɛ ɛkuɓamɓɛni kwaɓaŋ̤ǀ̤aŋ̤ǀ̤az̤ɛlisajɔ kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi uz̤ɛ unɡ̤az̤ɛki mfaz̤i unɡ̤aɓi naɲana naz̤intɔmɓi kulɛ nd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ut͡ʃɔ nɡ̤ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi ɛz̤iz̤alɛlwa kulɛ nd̤awɔ nanɡ̤ɔɔnina aɓaɓaz̤alajɔ nanɡ̤ɔɔjisɛ aɓaɓaz̤alajɔ kwɛli liz̤wɛ ukutʰi ɓaja z̤iz̤ifɔ ɛz̤iɓulalajɔ ɓanɡ̤amɓand͡ʒ̤az̤ɛlɛlwa ɓanɡ̤aŋ̤ǀ̤watʲwa ɓaja kuɓa nɡ̤umɡ̤ǃ̤uɓa pʰɛz̤u kɔm̤laɓa ɓaja kupʰɛla lik͡xɛlɛ najinɮala nɛz̤id̤umɓu z̤aɓɔ z̤iɓɛ kukuɮa kwɛɛntaka z̤ɛz̤ulu nɔkwɛz̤ilɔ z̤ɔm̤laɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi musa ukunɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini jɛsid͡ʒ̤wili unɡ̤aji kumɓamɓaz̤ɛla unɡ̤aɓakʰuz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ilususilɛ kwaɓa ɓantu ukǁɔlɔ iŋǀɛɓa nɛmfɛsanɛ jam ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kuja aɓakʰulu kwanaɓaŋǀinanɛ kwɛli liz̤wɛ ɓanɡ̤aŋ̤ǀ̤watʲwa kunɡ̤amɓand͡ʒ̤az̤ɛlwa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓɔ kunɡ̤akǀɛntwa kunɡ̤akǀʰɛtʲwa ntlɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓɔ ɓanɡ̤akǃʰɛkɛz̤ɛlwa sɔnka ɛsid͡ʒ̤wilini saɓɔ ukuɓa ɓatʰutʰuz̤ɛlwɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔfilɛjɔ ɓanɡ̤asɛz̤wa nɡ̤ɛnd̤ɛɓɛ jɛntutʰuz̤ɛlɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɔjisɛ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɔnina uz̤ɛ unɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni ɛnɮwini jɛsiɮɔ ukuɓa uɬalɛ naɓɔ uɮɛ usɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤ija kulipʰɛz̤isa kulɛ nd̤awɔ pʰamɓi kwamɛɬɔ ɛnu nanɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɛnu iz̤wi lɛmiɬali nɛz̤wi lɛmiv̤ujɔ iz̤wi lɔmjɛni nɛz̤wi lɔmt͡ʃakaz̤i kɛ kalɔku kɔtʰi kǁa utʰɛ waɓakǁɛlɛla aɓa ɓantu maz̤wi ɔnkɛ ɓaz̤a ɓatʰi kuwɛ kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jani ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a aɓutʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤atʰi ɓɔnkɛ ɔɓu ɓuɓi ɓukʰulu kanɡ̤aka ɓujini uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛtʰu sijini isɔnɔ sɛtʰu ɛsɔnɛ nɡ̤asɔ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu wɔtʰi kuɓɔ kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa ɔɔjiɬɔ ɓɛnd̤iʃijilɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓaland̤ɛla tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi ɓaɓakʰɔnz̤a ɓakǃuɓud̤a kuɓɔ ɓand̤iʃija umjalɛlɔ aɓawuɡ̤ǀ̤ina kɛ nɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔɔjiɬɔ nankɔ niland̤ɛla ɛlɔwɔ uɓuŋ̤ǃ̤ɔla ɓɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ ɛnɔɓuɓi ninɡ̤and̤ipʰulapʰuli nd̤ija kunid͡ʒ̤ulɛla nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛli liz̤wɛ nijɛ nikʰɔnz̤ɛlɛ kʰɔna apʰɔ tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi nɔɓusuku nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inɡ̤aji kuɓa nataxu nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jaɓɔnani ijɛz̤a imiɬa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛkunɡ̤aji kuɓa satʰiwa ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔwaɓaɲusajɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa ɛkuja kutʰiwa ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔwaɓaɲusajɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛz̤wɛni lasɛntla nasɛmaz̤wɛni ɔnkɛ ɛɓɛɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛlɛ kuwɔ nd̤ɔɓaɓujisɛla kɔwaɓɔ um̤laɓa ɛnd̤awunika ɔɔjisɛ jaɓɔnani nd̤itʰumɛla aɓaɓamɓisi ɓɛɛntlanz̤i aɓaninz̤i ɓɛz̤ɛ ɓaɓaɓamɓisɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ nd̤itʰumɛlɛ aɓaz̤inɡ̤ɛli aɓaninz̤i ɓɛz̤ɛ ɓaɓaz̤inɡ̤ɛlɛ ɓapʰumɛ naɓɔ ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤ɔnkɛ nasɛz̤ind̤ulini z̤ɔnkɛ nasɛz̤imfantɛni z̤ɛɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa amɛɬɔ akuz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iinɮɛla z̤aɓɔ az̤isitʰɛlɛ aɓufiɬakɛlɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ pʰamɓi kwamɛɬɔ kukǃala nd̤ɔɓuv̤uz̤a kaɓini uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ nɛsɔnɔ saɓɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuliɬamɓɛla kwaɓɔ iliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤id̤umɓu z̤ɛz̤intɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤inɛz̤ɔtʰɛ ɓɛliz̤alisa nɡ̤amasikiz̤i aɓɔ jɛhɔv̤a manɮa ŋǃaɓa jam nd̤awɔ jɔkusaɓɛla nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ z̤ija kuz̤a kuwɛ iintlanɡ̤a z̤iv̤ɛla ɛz̤ipʰɛlwɛni z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi z̤itʰi ɔɔɓawɔ ɓaɮa lɔɓukǁɔki ɓɔd̤wa amampunɡ̤ɛ ɛkunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ ntɔ inɔkuŋǀɛd̤a pʰakatʰi kwawɔ umntu uja kuz̤ɛnz̤ɛla ɔɔtʰikǁɔ jini ɓɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓɔ ɔɔtʰikǁɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jaɓɔna nd̤ijaɓaz̤isa nɡ̤ɛsi siɬanɮɔ nd̤iɓaz̤isɛ isanɮa nɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓam ɓaz̤i ukuɓa iɡ̤ama linɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a isɔnɔ sikajud̤a sib̤alwɛ nɡ̤ɛŋ̰ǁ̰ɔla jɛsiɲitʰi sak͡xɔlwa nɡ̤ɛt͡sɔlɔ lɛd̤ajiman ɛlukǀwɛkǀwɛni lwɛntliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ nasɛz̤impɔnd̤wɛni z̤ɛz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤ɛnu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓakʰumɓula kwaɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ ɓajaz̤ikʰumɓula iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤aɓɔ nɔɔaʃɛra ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤asɛmitʰini ɛluɬaz̤a ɛz̤ind̤ulini ɛz̤ind̤ɛ ntaɓa jam ɛsɛz̤wɛni uɓutʲɛɓi ɓakʰɔ nɔɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓakʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ nd̤iɓunikɛla ɛkupʰanɡ̤wɛni nɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a z̤akʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ɔnɔ ɛmid̤ɛni jakʰɔ jɔnkɛ uja kulijɛka nɡ̤ɔkwakʰɔ lakʰɔ ɛnd̤akunikajɔ nd̤ikukʰɔnz̤isɛ kwiint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ ɛliz̤wɛni ɔnɡ̤alaz̤ijɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa niwupʰɛmɓilɛ umlilɔ nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ uv̤utʰa ɛpʰakad̤ɛni ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ikǃalɛkisiwɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛkʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ɔmntu ɛjɛnz̤a iɲama inɡ̤alɔ jajɔ intliz̤ijɔ jajɔ imkɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ kujɛhɔv̤a iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkǀʰuʃuluz̤ajɔ ɛŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsini inɡ̤aɓɔni ntɔ ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ imɛ ɛŋ̤ǃ̤akǃasini ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛz̤wɛni lɛtʲuwa ɛlinɡ̤ɛnammi isikɛlɛlwɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛkʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a ɛnkɔlɔsɛkɔ ikujɛhɔv̤a kuɓa jɔɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmtʰi ɔmilisɛlwɛ ɛmanz̤ini unaɓisɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu z̤awɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔmlamɓɔ unɡ̤ɔjiki kǁa kutʰɛ kwɛz̤a uɓuʃuʃu akǃʰamɛ amaɡ̤ǃ̤aɓi awɔ unɡ̤akʰatʰali nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɔkuɓalɛla unɡ̤ajɛki ukuv̤ɛlisa iz̤ikǃʰamɔ intliz̤ijɔ inɛnkɔɬisɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ isisifɔ ɛsiɓi nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɔkujaz̤i mna jɛhɔv̤a nd̤ijajiɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀa intliz̤ijɔ nd̤ijaz̤ikǀikid̤a iz̤int͡sɔ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤inikɛ ulɔwɔ nalɔwɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnɮɛla jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikǃʰamɔ sɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤akʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsikʰwat͡ʃa ɛsifukamɛla amakǃand̤a ɛsinɡ̤awaz̤alanɡ̤a und͡ʒ̤alɔ ɔz̤uz̤a uɓutʲɛɓi nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤ɛsɛsikwɛni uja kuɓuʃija pʰakatʰi kwɛmiɬa jakʰɛ aɓɛ sisid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwakʰɛ wɛna trɔnɛ jɔɓukǃakǃawuli mɔnɡ̤amɔ kwasɛkukǃalɛni nd̤awɔ jɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jɛtʰu tʰɛmɓa likasirajɛli jɛhɔv̤a ɓɔnkɛ aɓakuʃijajɔ ɓaja kud̤ana aɓatʲɛkajɔ ɓaja kub̤alɛlwa ɛm̤laɓɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛliʃijilɛ itʰɛnd̤ɛ lamanz̤i apʰililɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ipʰilisɛ jɛhɔv̤a nd̤ipʰilɛ nd̤isind̤isɛ nd̤isind̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ind̤umisɔ jam nɡ̤uwɛ jaɓɔna ɓatʰi lipʰi iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a maliz̤ɛ kalɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ mna and̤ikuɓalɛkɛlanɡ̤a ukuɓa nɡ̤umalusi ɛmv̤a kwakʰɔ and̤iwuŋǃwɛnɛlanɡ̤a um̤la ɔnɛsifɔ wɛna ujaz̤i ɔkupʰumɛ ɛmlɔɲɛni ɓɛkupʰamɓi kɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ musa ukund̤ikǃʰipʰula umɓilini uliɬatʰi nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɔɓuɓi maɓad̤anɛ aɓand̤isukɛlajɔ mand̤inɡ̤ad̤ani maɓakǃʰipʰukɛ umɓilini ɓɔna mand̤inɡ̤akǃʰipʰuki umɓilini ɓaz̤isɛlɛ jɔɓuɓi uɓapʰulɛ nɡ̤ɔlwapʰulɔ ɔluɓini ujɛhɔv̤a wat͡ʃɔ ukutʰi hamɓa ujɛ ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu aɓanɡ̤ɛna nɡ̤alɔ ɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a aɓapʰuma nɡ̤alɔ nasɛmasanɡ̤wɛni ɔnkɛ asɛjɛrusalɛm utʰi kuɓɔ liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɓakwajud̤a majud̤a nɔnkɛ ɓɛmi ɓɔnkɛ ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm ɓanɡ̤ɛnajɔ nɡ̤ala masanɡ̤ɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi z̤iɡ̤ǀ̤inɛni nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛmipʰɛfumlɔ jɛnu ninɡ̤atʰwali mtʰwalɔ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsaɓatʰa niwunɡ̤ɛnisɛ nɡ̤amasanɡ̤ɔ asɛjɛrusalɛm ninɡ̤apʰumi nɔmtʰwalɔ ɛz̤inɮwini z̤ɛnu nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsaɓatʰa ninɡ̤ɛnz̤i naliɲɛ iʃiʃini wuŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛni um̤la wɛsaɓatʰa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤aɓawisɛlajɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ ɔɔjiɬɔ kɛ aɓɛv̤anɡ̤a aɓaz̤itʰɔɓanɡ̤a iinɮɛɓɛ z̤aɓɔ ɓajɛnz̤a lukʰuni intamɔ jaɓɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓanɡ̤ɛv̤i ukuz̤ɛ ɓanɡ̤av̤umi ntɛtʰisɔ kɔtʰi kɛ ukuɓa nitʰɛ nand̤ipʰulapʰula ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ananɡ̤ɛnisa mtʰwalɔ nɡ̤amasanɡ̤ɔ alɔ mz̤i nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsaɓatʰa nawuŋ̤ǀ̤walisa um̤la wɛsaɓatʰa anɛnz̤a naliɲɛ iʃiʃini nɡ̤awɔ kɔtʰi kɛ kunɡ̤ɛnɛ nɡ̤amasanɡ̤ɔ alɔ mz̤i ɔɔkumkani naɓatʰɛtʰɛli aɓaɬɛli ɛtrɔnɛni kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɓɛkʰwɛlɛ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛlwɛni nasɛmahaʃɛni ɓɔna naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaɓɔ amad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a naɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm lɔ mz̤i umiwɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ ɓaja kuv̤ɛla ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a nanɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm nasɛz̤wɛni lakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nasɛsitʰaɓaz̤ini nakwɛlitʰɛ tʰaɓalala nakwɛlisɛz̤ant͡si ɓɛz̤isa amad̤ini aɲukajɔ nɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɛminikɛlɔ jɔkuɮa nɛntlaka ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ ɓanɡ̤ɛnisɛ umɓulɛlɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a kɛ ukuɓa anitʰanɡ̤a nind̤ipʰulapʰulɛ ukuɓa niwuŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛ um̤la wɛsaɓatʰa ninɡ̤atʰwali mtʰwalɔ ninɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni nɡ̤amasanɡ̤ɔ asɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsaɓatʰa nd̤ɔfaka isikʰuni ɛmasanɡ̤wɛni ajɔ uɮɛ iiŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm unɡ̤akǀiɲwa iliz̤wi ɛlafikajɔ kujɛrɛmija liv̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a lalisitʰi suka uɬɛ ujɛ ɛnɮwini jɔmɓumɓi nd̤ikuv̤isɛ kʰɔna amaz̤wi nd̤ɛɬa kɛ nd̤aja ɛnɮwini jɔmɓumɓi nankɔ ɛsɛnz̤a iʃiʃini ɛz̤intɛnd̤ɛni sakɔnakala isitʲa aɓɛsɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔd̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɔmɓumɓi waɓuja wɛnz̤a sitʲa simɓi nɡ̤alɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kwakutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɔmɓumɓi ukusɛnz̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi and̤inakɔ ukukǁɛlisa lɔ mɓumɓi ukwɛnz̤a nɮu kasirajɛli ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a jaɓɔnani nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ lund͡ʒ̤alɔ ud̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɔmɓumɓi nind͡ʒ̤alɔ ɛsanɮɛni nɮu kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛpʰaɲaz̤ɔ nd̤itʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤a nɔɓukumkani ukuɓa nd̤iluɲɔtʰulɛ ukuɓa nd̤ilud̤iliz̤ɛ ukuɓa nd̤ilut͡ʃaɓalalisɛ ukuɓa kɛ ɔlɔ luɬanɡ̤a luɓujilɛ ɛz̤intwɛni z̤alɔ ɛz̤imɓi ɔlɔ nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤alɔ nd̤ɔz̤ɔɬwaja nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi ɛɓɛ nd̤isitʰi nd̤iz̤a kuɓɛnz̤a kulɔ nɡ̤ɛpʰaɲaz̤ɔ nd̤itʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤a nɔɓukumkani ukuɓa nd̤ilwakʰɛ ukuɓa nd̤ilutʲalɛ kɔd̤wa kɛ ukuɓa lutʰi lwɛnz̤ɛ ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni lunɡ̤alipʰulapʰuli iliz̤wi nd̤ɔz̤ɔɬwaja nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛɓɛnd̤isitʰi nd̤iz̤a kukwɛnz̤a kulɔ nɡ̤ɔku kɛ kʰawutʰɛtʰɛ kumad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a nakuɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm utʰi ut͡ʃilɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤iniɓumɓɛla uɓuɓi nd̤ikǀɛɓa nɡ̤ani ikǀɛɓɔ kʰaniɓujɛ ɛlɔwɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni jakʰɛ ɛnɔɓuɓi nilunɡ̤isɛ iinɮɛla z̤ɛnu nɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤ɛnu kɛ ɓɔna ɓatʰi kuŋǀamɛkilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sija kuland̤ɛla awɛtʰu amakǀɛɓɔ sɛnz̤a ɛlɔwɔ uɓuŋ̤ǃ̤ɔla ɓɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ ɛnɔɓuɓi nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi kʰaniɓuz̤ɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a nɡ̤uɓani ɔkʰɛ wɛv̤a intɔ ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ jɛnz̤ɛ intɔ ɛɓanɡ̤a amanwɛlɛ kunɛnɛ intɔmɓi ɛnɡ̤usirajɛli ikʰɛpʰu lasɛlɛb̤anɔn lija kuliʃija lasɛz̤wɛni amanz̤i anɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlɛ akǃukukǃɛlajɔ ɛv̤ɛla kud̤ɛ aja kut͡ʃa ukanti aɓantu ɓam ɓand̤iliɓɛlɛ ɓakǃʰumisɛla kwiz̤intɔ ɛz̤ikʰɔɬakɛlɛjɔ z̤aɓakʰuɓɛkisa ɛz̤inɮɛlɛni z̤aɓɔ ɛmɛnd̤wɛni ɛnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ukuz̤ɛ ɓahamɓɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤uʃu nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɛnɡ̤alunɡ̤ɛlɛliswanɡ̤a ukuz̤ɛ ɓalɛnz̤ɛ iliz̤wɛ laɓɔ ummanɡ̤alisɔ nɔmsɔnɮɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa kulɔ ɓaja kumanɡ̤aliswa ɓaɬunɡ̤uz̤ɛlɛ iintlɔkɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɔja wasɛmpumalanɡ̤a nd̤ija kuɓapʰanɡ̤alalisa pʰamɓi kɔt͡ʃaɓa nd̤iɓanikɛlɛ um̤lana nd̤inɡ̤aɓanikɛli uɓusɔ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɔkusind̤ɛka kwaɓɔ ɓatʰi kɛ jiz̤ani sijilɛ ikǃʰinɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔjɛrɛmija nɡ̤ɔkuɓa awuji kupʰɛla umjalɛlɔ kumɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɛkǀɛɓɔ kwisilumkɔ nɛliz̤wi kumprɔfɛti jiz̤ani simɓɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ɔlwimi sinɡ̤awaɓaz̤ɛli nɮɛɓɛ amaz̤wi akʰɛ ɔnkɛ nd̤iɓaz̤ɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ wɛna jɛhɔv̤a liv̤ɛ iz̤wi laɓaɓamɓɛnɛ kuja kuv̤uz̤wa nɡ̤ɔɓuɓi ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ukuɓa ɓawumɓɛlɛ isihɔɡ̤ɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ kʰumɓula pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤aɓɔ ukuɓa nd̤iɓujisɛ uɓuʃuʃu ɓakʰɔ kuɓɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ɓanikɛlɛ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ ɛnɮalɛni uɓalaɬɛlɛ ɛmanɮɛni ɛk͡xɛlɛ aɓafaz̤i ɓaɓɔ ɓanɡ̤aɓi naɓantwana ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓaɬɔlɔkaz̤i amad̤ɔd̤a aɓɔ aɓulawɛ amad̤ɔd̤ana aɓɔ aɓulawɛ lik͡xɛlɛ ɛmfaz̤wɛni makuv̤akalɛ ukukʰala ɛz̤inɮwini z̤aɓɔ kǁa aɓuz̤isɛla nɡ̤ɛsikǃupʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓamɓɛ isihɔɡ̤ɔ sɔkund̤iɓamɓisa iiɲawɔ z̤am ɓaz̤ifiɬɛla iz̤iɓatʰa kɛ wɛna jɛhɔv̤a ujawaz̤i ɔnkɛ amakǃʰinɡ̤a aɓɔ ɔkund̤iɓulala musa ukuɓukǁɔlɛla uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkǀamaɡ̤uʃɔ unɡ̤asikǀimi isɔnɔ saɓɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓakʰuɓɛkɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɔ jɛnz̤a kuɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jija utʰɛnɡ̤ɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤aji jɔmɓumɓi wɛz̤itʲa z̤ɔd̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ utʰaɓatʰɛ iŋǁɛɲɛ jamad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu aɓantu nɛjamad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli upʰumɛ ujɛ ɛmfulɛni wakwab̤ɛn̤inɔm ɔlunɡ̤ɛ nɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɛɛnkamɓa umɛmɛz̤ɛ kʰɔna amaz̤wi ɛnd̤ija kuwatʰɛtʰa kuwɛ wɔtʰi liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɓakwajud̤a ɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ wakwasirajɛli ukutʰi jaɓɔnani lɛ nd̤awɔ nd̤ijiz̤isɛla uɓuɓi ɔɓuja kuɓɛtʰa z̤itʰi nz̤wi iinɮɛɓɛ z̤aɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓuv̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɓɛnd̤iʃijilɛ ɓajɛnz̤a ɛjasɛmz̤ini lɛ nd̤awɔ ɓakǃʰumisɛla tʰikǁwɛni ɓamɓi
