aɓanɡ̤aɓaz̤ijɔ ɓɔna nɔɔjisɛ nɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a ɓajiz̤alisa lɛ nd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤az̤i laɓamsulwa ɓamakʰɛla ub̤ahali iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a ukuz̤ɛ ɓaɓat͡ʃisɛ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤amad̤ini aɲukajɔ kub̤ahali intɔ ɛnd̤inɡ̤aɓawisɛlanɡ̤a mtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ajɔ ɛnd̤inɡ̤ajitʰɛtʰanɡ̤a ɛnɡ̤atʰanɡ̤a kǃatʰa ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ujaɓɔna ijɛz̤a imiɬa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnɡ̤asaji kuɓa saɓiz̤wa lɛ nd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔkutʰi jitɔfɛtɛ nɔmfula wakwab̤ɛn̤inɔm kuja kutʰiwa nɡ̤umfula wɔkuɓulala nd̤ija kulitʰululɛla ikǃʰinɡ̤a lakwajud̤a nɛjɛrusalɛm kulɛ nd̤awɔ nd̤iɓawisɛ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ pʰamɓi kwɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ nanɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤aɓawufunajɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ nd̤iz̤inikɛlɛ iz̤id̤umɓu z̤aɓɔ z̤iɓɛ kukuɮa ɛz̤intakɛni z̤ɛz̤ulu nasɛz̤ilwɛni z̤ɔm̤laɓa nd̤ija kuwɛnz̤a lɔ mz̤i uɓɛ nɡ̤ummanɡ̤alisɔ nɔmsɔnɮɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa kuwɔ ɓɔmanɡ̤aliswa ɓɛnz̤ɛ umsɔnɮɔ nɡ̤az̤ɔ iz̤iɓɛtʰɔ z̤awɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nd̤ija kuɓaɮisa iɲama jɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ nɛɲama jɛɛntɔmɓi z̤aɓɔ ɛlɔwɔ aɮɛ iɲama jɔwaɓɔ ɛkuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤wɛni nasɛkukǀutʰwɛni ɛz̤ija kuɓakǀutʰa nɡ̤akɔ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ naɓawufunajɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ uz̤ɛ kɛ ujikǃʰɛkɛz̤ɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤aji ɛmɛɬwɛni amad̤ɔd̤a ahamɓa nawɛ utʰi kuwɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi nd̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓakǃʰɛkɛz̤a aɓa ɓantu nalɔ mz̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkukǃʰɛkɛz̤wa kwɛz̤itʲa z̤ɔmɓumɓi ɛz̤inɡ̤asɛnakuɓuja z̤iŋ̤ǀ̤itʲwɛ ɓaɓaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛlɛ ɛtɔfɛtɛ nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ nd̤awɔ jakuŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa nd̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kulɛ nd̤awɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nakuɓɛmi ɓajɔ ukuz̤ɛ lɔ mz̤i nd̤iwɛnz̤ɛ uɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛtɔfɛtɛ iz̤inɮu z̤ɛjɛrusalɛm nɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a z̤ɔɓa jiŋǃamɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ jɛtɔfɛtɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤inɮu aɓakǃʰumisɛla pʰɛz̤u kɔpʰaɬa lwaz̤ɔ kuwɔ wɔnkɛ umkʰɔsi wasɛz̤ulwini ɓatʰululɛlɛ tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi iminikɛlɔ ɛtʰululwajɔ kuɓɔ waɓuja ujɛrɛmija ɛtɔfɛtɛ apʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a aɓɛmtʰumɛlɛ kʰɔna ukuɓa aprɔfɛtɛ wɛma ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni jɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a watʰi kuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤iwuz̤isɛla lɔ mz̤i nɛmiz̤i jawɔ jɔnkɛ ɓɔnkɛ uɓuɓi ɛnd̤iɓutʰɛtʰilɛjɔ nɡ̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛjɛnz̤ɛ lukʰuni intamɔ jaɓɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓanɡ̤awɛv̤i amaz̤wi kɛ kalɔku upaʃurɛ uɲana kaimɛrɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli lɔwɔ kɛ uɓɛnɡ̤umv̤ɛlɛli ɔjinɡ̤anɡ̤a ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a wɛv̤a ujɛrɛmija ɛprɔfɛta maz̤wi upaʃurɛ wamɓɛtʰa ujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti ɛsitɔkisini ɛsisɛsanɡ̤wɛni lasɛntla lakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɛlisɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ upaʃurɛ wamkʰupʰa ujɛrɛmija ɛsitɔkisini watʰi ujɛrɛmija kujɛ ujɛhɔv̤a akatʰi linɡ̤upaʃurɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ utʰi linɡ̤uŋǁunɡ̤upʰala nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ikwɛnz̤a ukuɓa uz̤iŋǁunɡ̤upʰalisɛ wɛna nɡ̤ɔkwakʰɔ naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓakutʰand̤ajɔ ɓawɛ lik͡xɛlɛ lɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ aɓɔnɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɔ nd̤iwanikɛlɛ ɔnkɛ amajud̤a ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli aɓafud̤usɛlɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli aɓaɓulalɛ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nd̤ɔjinikɛla jɔnkɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤wɛɓɔ jalɔ mz̤i nɔnɡ̤ɛnisɛlɔ lwawɔ lɔnkɛ nɛɛntɔ z̤awɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iŋǃaɓilɛjɔ nɔɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a nd̤iɓunikɛlɛ ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤ɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ z̤iɓupʰanɡ̤ɛ z̤iɓutʰaɓatʰɛ z̤iɓusɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli wɛna paʃurɛ naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɬɛli ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ nija kutʰind͡ʒ̤wa ujɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ufɛlɛ kʰɔna uŋ̤ǀ̤watʲɛlwɛ kʰɔna wɛna naɓakutʰand̤ajɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaprɔfɛtɛlɛ uɓukǁɔki jɛhɔv̤a und̤ixwɛɓɛʃilɛ nd̤axwɛɓɛʃɛka und̤iɓamɓilɛ wand̤ɛjisa nd̤aɓa jintlɛkisa jɔnkɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓajand̤iɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤itʰi nd̤akutʰɛtʰa nd̤ikʰalɛ nd̤id̤and̤ulukɛ nd̤itʰi luɡ̤ɔɲamɛlɔ nɔb̤ukǃɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a laɓa sisiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ nɛsikǀukukǀɛz̤ɔ jɔnkɛ nd̤itʰi nd̤akutʰi and̤isaji kumkʰankaɲa and̤isaji kutʰɛtʰa ɛɡ̤amɛni lakʰɛ kusukɛ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam kunɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤umlilɔ ɔt͡ʃajɔ uv̤alɛlwɛ ɛmatʰand͡ʒ̤ɛni nd̤ad̤inwa kukuɲamɛz̤ɛla and̤aɓa nakɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iv̤ilɛ intlɛɓɛnd̤wanɛ jaɓaninz̤i ɓatʰi kukuŋǁunɡ̤upʰala nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kǁɛlani simkǁɛlɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓafɔ aɓaɓɛkǁɔlɛlɛnɛ ɓalind̤ɛ ukukǃʰwalɛla ɓatʰi m̤lawumɓi anɡ̤axwɛɓɛʃɛka simɛjisɛ simpʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlɛ kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɡ̤ɔxa ɛliŋ̤ǀ̤aŋ̤ǀ̤az̤ɛlisajɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ɓaja kukʰuɓɛka aɓand̤isukɛlajɔ aɓaji kɔjisa ɓaja kud̤ana kakʰulu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛnɡ̤ɛnz̤anɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ iɬaz̤ɔ laɓɔ linɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ alinakulitʲalwa wɛna kɛ jɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ulikǀikid̤ajɔ ilunɡ̤isa uz̤iɓɔnajɔ iz̤int͡sɔ nɛntliz̤ijɔ mand̤ijiɓɔnɛ impind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ jakʰɔ kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ikutʰʲilɛlɛ uɓamɓanɔ v̤umani kujɛhɔv̤a md̤umisɛni ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛwuɬanɡ̤ulɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wɛɬwɛmpu ɛsanɮɛni saɓɛnz̤i ɓɔɓuɓi mawukǃalɛkiswɛ um̤la ɛnd̤az̤alwa nɡ̤awɔ um̤la awand̤iz̤ala nɡ̤awɔ mawunɡ̤asikɛlɛlɛki majikǃalɛkiswɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛjamʃumajɛz̤a uɓawɔ ud̤aɓa lɔkutʰi uz̤alɛlwɛ ɔjinkwɛnkwɛ jamv̤ujisa kakʰulu lɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤a majiɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmiz̤i awajib̤ukukǃajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a akaz̤ɔɬwaja majiv̤ɛ ukukʰala iv̤ɛ kuɬatʲwa umkʰɔsi ɛmini ɛnkulu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɡ̤and̤iɓulalanɡ̤a kwasɛsiz̤alwɛni waz̤a waɓa liŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa isiz̤alɔ sakʰɛ saɬala sind̤imitʰi iɓijini ukuɓa nd̤ipʰumɛ ɛsiz̤alwɛni ukuz̤ɛ nd̤iɓɔnɛ ukwapʰuka nɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤ala ipʰɛlɛ imiɬa jam kukud̤ana iliz̤wi ɛlafikajɔ kujɛrɛmija liv̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a ɛkutʰumɛni kɔkumkani ɔnɡ̤uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija ɔɔpaʃurɛ uɲana kamalɛkija nɔz̤ɛfanija uɲana kamahasɛja umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kujɛ ukutʰi kʰawusiɓuz̤ɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛsilwa natʰi m̤lawumɓi ujɛhɔv̤a wɔsɛnz̤ɛla nɡ̤ɔkwɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ ɛɓalulɛkilɛjɔ ɛɲukɛ ɛsukɛ kutʰi jɛna watʰi ujɛrɛmija kuɓɔ nɔt͡ʃɔ kuz̤ɛd̤ɛkija ukutʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤ijaz̤id͡ʒ̤ika iimpaɬa z̤ɛmfaz̤wɛ ɛz̤isɛz̤anɮɛni z̤ɛnu ɛnilwa nɡ̤az̤ɔ nɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli namakalɛd̤i aniŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤ajɔ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a nd̤iz̤iɬanɡ̤anisɛlɛ ɛsaz̤ulwini salɔ mz̤i nd̤ija nɡ̤ɛsanɮa ɛsɔlukilɛjɔ nanɡ̤ɛnɡ̤alɔ ɛtʰɛ ŋ̰ǃ̰i nd̤inɔmsind̤ɔ nd̤inɔɓuʃuʃu nd̤inɔɓuxalaxumɛ ɔɓukʰulu nd̤ija kuɓaɓɛtʰa aɓɛmi ɓalɔ mz̤i aɓantu kwanɛɛnkɔmɔ ɓaja jindʲikitʲa jɔkufa ɛnkulu ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ɔmnikɛla uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ naɓantu aɓɔ ɓasɛlɛjɔ kulɔ mz̤i ɛndʲikitʲɛni jɔkufa nasɛk͡xɛlɛni nasɛnɮalɛni nd̤iɓanikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sikanɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli nasɛsanɮɛni sɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ nasɛsanɮɛni saɓawufunajɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ aɓaɓɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwɛk͡xɛlɛ akaji kuɓa naŋǀɛɓa kuɓɔ akaji kuɓakǀɔnɡ̤a akaji kuɓa namfɛsanɛ kɛ kwaɓa ɓantu wɔtʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤iɓɛka pʰamɓi kwɛnu inɮɛla jɔɓɔmi nɛnɮɛla jɔkufa ɔtʰɛ waɬala kulɔ mz̤i uja lik͡xɛlɛ najinɮala najindʲikitʲa jɔkufa kɛ jɛna ɔtʰɛ wapʰuma wapʰamɓɛla kumakalɛd̤i aniŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤ajɔ uja kupʰila umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ uɓɛ likǁʰɔɓa kujɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓusɔ ɓam kulɔ mz̤i nd̤iɓumisɛlɛ uɓuɓi and̤iɓumisɛlɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uja kunikɛlwa ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wasɛb̤ahɛli awut͡ʃisɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ kɛ kwinɮu jɔkumkani wakwajud̤a wɔtʰi jiv̤ani iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nɮu kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi tʰɛtʰani amatʲala imisɔ jɔnkɛ ɔpʰanɡ̤iwɛjɔ nim̤lanɡ̤ulɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɔmkǀud̤isi ɬɛz̤ɛ uɓuʃuʃu ɓam ɓupʰumɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmlilɔ ɓut͡ʃisɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ukǀimajɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi ɓɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤ɛnu jaɓɔnani nd̤ikǀʰasɛnɛ ɓɛmi ɓɛntili ɓɛliwa lɛhɛwu ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓatʰi nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kuɬa pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kusinɡ̤ɛnɛla ɛmakʰaja kɛ nd̤ɔniv̤ɛlɛla nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikǃʰamɔ sɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤ɛnu ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ifakɛ isikʰuni ɛɬatʰini lajɔ uɮɛ umlilɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kujɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jiɬa ujɛ ɛnɮwini jɔkumkani wakwajud̤a utʰɛtʰɛ kʰɔna ɛli liz̤wi utʰi liv̤ɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a wakwajud̤a uɬɛlijɔ ɛtrɔnɛni kad̤av̤id̤ɛ wɛna naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ naɓantu ɓakʰɔ aɓanɡ̤ɛnajɔ nɡ̤ala masanɡ̤ɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jɛnz̤ani ɔkusɛsikwɛni nɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɔpʰanɡ̤iwɛjɔ nim̤lanɡ̤ulɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɔmkǀud̤isi ninɡ̤amkǁinz̤ɛlɛli pʰant͡si ninɡ̤amɡ̤ɔɲamɛli ɔwasɛmz̤ini nɔm̤lɔlɔkaz̤i nɛnkɛd̤ama ninɡ̤apʰalaz̤i ɡ̤az̤i kulɛ nd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kǁa nitʰɛ nalɛnz̤a nɔkulɛnz̤a ɛli liz̤wi ɓɔnɡ̤ɛna nɡ̤amasanɡ̤ɔ alɛ nɮu ɔɔkumkani aɓaɬalɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛtrɔnɛni jakʰɛ ɓɛkʰwɛlɛ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛlwɛni nasɛmahaʃɛni jɛna naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ naɓantu ɓakʰɛ kɛ ukuɓa nitʰɛ anawɛv̤a maz̤wi nd̤iz̤ifunɡ̤ilɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa lɛ nɮu ija kuɓa liŋǁuwa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃilɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛnɮu jɔkumkani wakwajud̤a ukutʰi ulɛlasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i wɛna ujiŋǀɔpʰɔ jɛlɛb̤anɔn iɲanisɔ nd̤ija kukwɛnz̤a intlanɡ̤ɔ imiz̤i ɛnɡ̤amiwɛjɔ nd̤ija kukuŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛla aɓɔnakalisi ɛlɔwɔ aɓɛ nɛɛmpaɬa z̤akʰɛ ɓaɡ̤awulɛ imisɛd̤arɛ jakʰɔ ɛɲuliwɛjɔ ɓajipʰɔsɛ ɛmlilwɛni kɔɮula kulɔ mz̤i iintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤ininz̤i ɓatʰi ɛlɔwɔ kummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jani ukuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ kulɔ mz̤i mkʰulu ɓatʰi kɛ kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa ɓɛwuʃijilɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɓakǃuɓud̤a tʰikǁwɛni ɓamɓi ɓaɓakʰɔnz̤a musani ukumlilɛla ɔfilɛjɔ ninɡ̤aɬunɡ̤uz̤ɛli intlɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɛ nililɛ nɡ̤ɔmkilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akasaji kuɓuja aɓujɛ aliɓɔnɛ iliz̤wɛ lɔkuz̤alwa kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ukutʰi ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔʃalum uɲana kajɔsija wakwajud̤a ɔwaɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sikajɔsija ujisɛ ɔwapʰuma kulɛ nd̤awɔ akasajikuɓuja aɓujɛlɛ apʰa kɛ uja kufɛla ɛnd̤awɛni aɓamfud̤usɛlɛ kujɔ anɡ̤aɓi saɓuja aliɓɔnɛ ɛli liz̤wɛ jɛha ɔjakʰajɔ inɮu jakʰɛ kunɡ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓulunɡ̤isa namaɡ̤umɓi akʰɛ apʰɛz̤ulu kunɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkusɛsikwɛni kɔmkʰɔnz̤isajɔ ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛliz̤ɛ anɡ̤amniki umv̤uz̤ɔ wakʰɛ ɔtʰi nd̤ija kuz̤akʰɛla inɮu ɛɓanz̤i namaɡ̤umɓi apʰɛz̤ulu anɔmɓilini ajiɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤ɛ iifɛstilɛ ɛz̤ininz̤i ajifulɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛmisɛd̤arɛ ajikǃaɓɛ nɡ̤ɛmɓɔla unɔɓukumkani kǁa uʃijisɛla nɡ̤ɔkwakʰa nɡ̤ɛmisɛd̤arɛ ujiɬɔ uɓɛnɡ̤aɮi asɛlɛ ɛnz̤ɛ ɔkusɛsikwɛni nɔɓulunɡ̤isa jini kwaz̤a kwalunɡ̤a kujɛ uɓɛliɡ̤wɛɓa itʲala lɔsiz̤ana nɔliɬwɛmpu kwaz̤a kwalunɡ̤a asikukɔ ɔkɔ ukund̤az̤i ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akab̤ɛkɛ ntwɛni amɛɬɔ akʰɔ nɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ kupʰɛla akwinz̤uz̤ɔ jakʰɔ nakwiɡ̤az̤i laɓamsulwa ukuz̤ɛ lipʰalaz̤wɛ asɛkukǀud̤isɛni nasɛkuv̤ikiv̤ɛni ukuɓa wɛnz̤ɛ ɔkɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔjakim uɲana kajɔsija wakwajud̤a ukutʰi aɓaji kummɓamɓaz̤ɛlɛla ɓɛsitʰi jɔɔ mnakwɛtʰu jɔɔ d̤ad̤ɛ wɛtʰu aɓaji kummɓamɓaz̤ɛlɛla ɓɛsitʰi jɔɔ nkɔsi jɔɔ nd̤ili jakʰɛ uja kuŋ̤ǀ̤watʲwa nɡ̤ɔkuŋ̤ǀ̤watʲwa kwɛɛsilɛ ak͡xwikǃiliz̤wɛ alaɬwɛ kud̤ɛ namasanɡ̤ɔ asɛjɛrusalɛm ɲuka ɛlɛb̤anɔn ukʰalɛ nasɛb̤aʃan kʰupʰa iz̤wi lakʰɔ ukʰalɛ ɛhab̤arim nɡ̤ɔkuɓa z̤apʰukilɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤itʰand̤anɛ z̤akʰɔ nd̤atʰɛtʰa nawɛ ukǀʰulumakǀʰilɛ watʰi wɛna and̤iji kuv̤a jinɮɛla jakʰɔ lɛjɔ kwasɛɓuŋǀinanɛni ɓakʰɔ ukuɓa unɡ̤alipʰulapʰuli iliz̤wi umɔja uja kuɓaɮa ɓɔnkɛ aɓalusi ɓakʰɔ z̤itʰind͡ʒ̤wɛ iz̤itʰand̤anɛ z̤akʰɔ wand̤ulɛ ukud̤ana inɛnɛ uv̤ɛ iɬaz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤intɔ z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤imɓi z̤ɔnkɛ wɛna uɬɛlijɔ ɛlɛb̤anɔn ujakʰɛlajɔ ɛmisɛd̤arɛni inɮu jakʰɔ haji ukuɡ̤ǀ̤uma kwakʰɔ ɛkufikɛlwɛni kwakʰɔ jinimɓa kukuz̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔz̤alajɔ nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa ukɔnijahu uɲana kajɛhɔjakim wakwajud̤a ɛɓɛnɡ̤umsɛsanɛ wɔkutʲwina ɛsanɮɛni sɔkunɛnɛ ɓɛnd̤ija kumŋǀɔtʰula nakʰɔna nd̤ikunikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni saɓawufunajɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ nasɛsanɮɛni saɓɔ uɓɔjikajɔ nasɛsanɮɛni sikanɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli nasɛsanɮɛni samakalɛd̤i nd̤ɔnid͡ʒ̤ulɛla kwɛliɲɛ iliz̤wɛ wɛna nɔɲɔkɔ ɔwakuz̤alajɔ apʰɔ naninɡ̤az̤alɛlwanɡ̤a kʰɔna nifɛlɛ kʰɔna kɛ lɔna iliz̤wɛ aɓaja kupʰakamisɛla umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ kulɔ ukuɓa ɓaɓujɛlɛ kulɔ aɓasaji kuɓujɛla kulɔ lɔ mfɔ ukɔnijahu nɡ̤umpʰand̤a ɔd̤ɛlɛkilɛjɔ ɔz̤a kuɬɛkɛz̤wa ujimpaɬa ɛnɡ̤ananz̤iwɛjɔ kunɡ̤and̤awɔni ukuɓa ɓad͡ʒ̤ulɛlwɛ jɛna nɛmɓɛwu jakʰɛ ɓapʰɔswɛ ɛz̤wɛni aɓanɡ̤alaz̤ijɔ liz̤wɛ liz̤wɛ liz̤wɛ liv̤ɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi lɔ mfɔ mɓalɛlɛni ɛkutʰini akanaɓantwana jind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤ɛnampumɛlɛlɔ ɛmiɬɛni jajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akaji kuɓa nampumɛlɛlɔ wasɛmɓɛwini jakʰɛ ɔɬala ɛtrɔnɛni kad̤av̤id̤ɛ ɛsalawula kwajud̤a jɛha kɛ aɓalusi aɓat͡ʃaɓalalisa ɓakǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰɛ um̤lamɓi wɛɮɛlɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli nɡ̤aɓalusi aɓɔ ɓalusa aɓantu ɓam ukutʰi niwukǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰilɛ um̤lamɓi nawub̤ɛb̤ɛtʰa anawuv̤ɛlɛla jaɓɔnani nd̤ija kuniv̤ɛlɛla nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi ɓɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤ɛnu ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kuwaɓutʰa amasalɛla ɔm̤lamɓi ɛmaz̤wɛni ɔnkɛ ɛnd̤awaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛla kuwɔ nd̤iwaɓujisɛlɛ ɛmak͡xiwɛni awɔ akǃʰamɛ and̤ɛ nd̤iwamisɛlɛ aɓalusi ɓawalusɛ anɡ̤aɓi sɔjika anɡ̤akǃʰipʰuki umɓilini kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ulaɬɛkajɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a jaɓɔnani ijɛz̤a imiɬa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnd̤ija kummisɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ iɬumɛlɔ ɛlililunɡ̤isa liɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani ɔnɡ̤ukumkani ɛnz̤ɛ jɛna nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ ɛnz̤ɛ ɔkusɛsikwɛni nɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɛɬaɓatʰini nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jakʰɛ uja kusind̤iswa ujud̤a usirajɛli aɬalɛ ɛkʰɔlɔsilɛ nɛɡ̤ama lakʰɛ aja kuɓiz̤wa nɡ̤alɔ lɛli lɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤auɓuɓulunɡ̤isaɓɛtʰu nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jaɓɔnani ijɛz̤a imiɬa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a aɓanɡ̤asaji kuɓa satʰi ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔwaɲusa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɛz̤wɛni lamajiputa ɓaja kutʰi ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔwajiɲusajɔ ɔwajiz̤isajɔ imɓɛwu jɛnɮu jakwasirajɛli iv̤ɛla ɛz̤wɛni lasɛntla nasɛmaz̤wɛni ɔnkɛ ɛnd̤aɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛla kuwɔ ɓaɬalɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni waɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kuɓaprɔfɛti japʰukilɛ intliz̤ijɔ jam pʰakatʰi atʰɛ fɛɬɛfɛɬɛ ɔnkɛ amatʰamɓɔ nd̤isukɛ nd̤aɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnd̤ɔd̤a ɛŋǁilajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmfɔ ɔwɛjiswɛ jiwajini nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kajɛhɔv̤a nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamaz̤wi akʰɛ aŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iliz̤wɛ liz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤aɓak͡xɛkǁɛz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnt͡ʃwaɓulɔ iliz̤wɛ lɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili ɔmilɛ amak͡xiwa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ usukɛ wamɓi umkʰɔnd̤ɔ waɓɔ uɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓaɓɔ aɓulunɡ̤anɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umprɔfɛti kwanɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɡ̤aɓɛnz̤i ɓɔɓuɓi nd̤iz̤ifumɛnɛ nasɛnɮwini jam iz̤intɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤imɓi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ inɮɛla jaɓɔ kuɓɔ ija kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnd̤awɔ ɛz̤iɓutʰɛlɛz̤i ɛsitʰɔkɔtʰɔkwɛni ɓaja kukǃʰutʲwa ɓawɛ kʰɔna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iɓaz̤isɛla uɓuɓi umɲaka wɔkuv̤ɛlɛlwa kwaɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kuɓaprɔfɛti ɓakwasamari nd̤iɓɔnɛ uɓufɛd̤ɛlɛlɛ ɓaprɔfɛta nɡ̤ɔb̤ahali ɓɛlaɬɛkisa aɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli kɛ kuɓaprɔfɛti ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm nd̤iɓɔnɛ intɔ ɛɓanɡ̤a amanwɛlɛ ukuk͡xɛkǁɛz̤a nɔkuhamɓa ɛɓukǁɔkini ɓɔmɛlɛz̤ɛ iz̤anɮa z̤aɓɛnz̤i ɓɔɓuɓi kunɡ̤aɓuji ɛɓuɓini ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsɔd̤ɔm naɓɛmi ɓakʰɔna ɓand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɡ̤ɔmɔra nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kuɓaprɔfɛti ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤ɔɓaɮisa um̤lɔɲanɛ nd̤iɓasɛz̤ɛ iɲɔnɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kuɓaprɔfɛti ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm kupʰuma ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kujɛ kulɔ lɔnkɛ iliz̤wɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi musani ukuwapʰulapʰula amaz̤wi aɓaprɔfɛti aɓaniprɔfɛtɛlajɔ ɓanɛnz̤ɛla intɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔ ɓatʰɛtʰa umɓɔnɔ wɛntliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ ɔnɡ̤apʰumijɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ɓamana ukutʰi kwaɓand̤iɡ̤iɓajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰɛtʰilɛ nija kuɓa nɔkǁɔlɔ nakuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓahamɓajɔ nɡ̤ɔɓuŋ̤ǃ̤ɔla ɓɛɛntliz̤ijɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓatʰi aniji kuɬɛlwa ɓuɓi ɛwɛ nɡ̤uɓani kuɓɔ ɔmɛ ɛlukǀwɛjwɛni lukajɛhɔv̤a waliɓɔna waliv̤a iliz̤wi lakʰɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔliɓaz̤ɛlɛ inɮɛɓɛ iliz̤wi waliv̤a jaɓɔnani umɔja ɔv̤utʰuz̤ajɔ kajɛhɔv̤a upʰumɛ uɓuʃuʃu umɔja ɔv̤utʰuz̤ajɔ ɔsisakǃʰwitʰi uja kukǃʰwitʰɛla ɛntlɔkwɛni jaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ awuji kuɓuja umsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ad̤ɛ awɛnz̤ɛ ad̤ɛ ajimisɛ imiŋ̰ǃ̰anɡ̤ijɛlɔ jɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɬa nɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤ala nikukǃɔnd̤ɛ ɔkɔ and̤iɓatʰumanɡ̤a aɓaprɔfɛti aɓɔ kuɡ̤id̤imɛ ɓɔna and̤itʰɛtʰanɡ̤a kuɓɔ kuprɔfɛtɛ ɓɔna ukuɓa ɓɛɓɛmi ɛlukǀwɛjwɛni ɓanɡ̤ɛ ɓɛv̤akalisɛ amaz̤wi kuɓantu ɓam ɓaɓaɓujisa ɛnɮɛlɛni jaɓɔ ɛmɓi nasɛɓuɓini ɓɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤aɓɔ nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wakufupʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤inɡ̤aɓi nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wakud̤ɛ wɔsitʰɛla ɛz̤int͡sitʰɛlwɛni nd̤inɡ̤amɓɔni ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a and̤iz̤alisɛ amaz̤ulu nɛɬaɓatʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ikuv̤ilɛ aɓakutʰɛtʰajɔ aɓaprɔfɛti aɓaprɔfɛta uɓukǁɔki ɛɡ̤amɛni ɓɛsitʰi nd̤ipʰupʰilɛ nd̤ipʰupʰilɛ kɔd̤a kuɓɛ kujilɛ ntɔ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jaɓaprɔfɛti aɓaprɔfɛta uɓukǁɔki aɓaprɔfɛti ɓɛnkɔɬisɔ jɛntliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ ɓakǀinɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓaliɓaz̤isa aɓantu ɓam ɓaliliɓalɛ iɡ̤ama nɡ̤amapʰupʰa aɓɔ aɓawalawulajɔ ɛlɔwɔ kummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɔɔjisɛ ɓaliliɓalajɔ iɡ̤ama nɡ̤ɔb̤ahali umprɔfɛti ɔnɛpʰupʰa makalawulɛ ipʰupʰa ɔnɛliz̤wi makatʰɛtʰɛ iliz̤wi ɛɲanisilɛ jintɔni ɛnɔmkǃukǃu nɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a alind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmlilɔ iliz̤wi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsand̤ɔ ɛsiɬɛkɛz̤a iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jaɓɔnani nd̤ikǀʰasɛnɛ naɓaprɔfɛti ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a aɓawɛɓajɔ amaz̤wi ɛlɔwɔ kummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ jaɓɔnani nd̤ikǀʰasɛnɛ naɓaprɔfɛti ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a aɓatʰaɓatʰa lwaɓɔ ɓatʰi ut͡ʃɔ jaɓɔnani nd̤ikǀʰasɛnɛ naɓaprɔfɛti aɓaprɔfɛta amapʰupʰa aɓukǁɔki ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓawalawulɛ ɓaɓalaɬɛkisɛ aɓantu ɓam nɡ̤ɔɓukǁɔki ɓaɓɔ nanɡ̤ɔkuɡ̤asa kwaɓɔ ɛnd̤inɡ̤aɓawisɛlanɡ̤a mɛtʰɛtʰɔ aɓanɡ̤aɓaŋǀɛd̤ijɔ nɔkuɓaŋǀɛd̤a aɓa ɓantu ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ kalɔku kǁa ɓatʰɛ ɓakuɓuz̤a aɓa ɓantu nɔkuɓa nɡ̤umprɔfɛti nɔkuɓa nɡ̤umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛsitʰi sijintɔni isiɬaɓɔ sikajɛhɔv̤a wɔɓakǁɛlɛla intɔ ɛsijijɔ isiɬaɓɔ sitʰi nd̤ija kunilaɬa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a umprɔfɛti nɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓantu aɓaja kutʰi isiɬaɓɔ sikajɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kumv̤ɛlɛla lɔɔ nɛnɮu jakʰɛ jit͡ʃɔni ɛlɔwɔ kummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ ɛlɔwɔ kumz̤alwana wakʰɛ ukutʰi utʰɛni ukupʰɛnd̤ula ujɛhɔv̤a utʰɛni ukutʰɛtʰa ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ sɔna isiɬaɓɔ sikajɛhɔv̤a z̤ɛ ninɡ̤aɓi sasikʰankaɲa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lija kuɓa sisiɬaɓɔ kwind̤ɔd̤a iliz̤wi lajɔ niwad͡ʒ̤ikilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ amaz̤wi katʰikǁɔ ɔpʰililɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu wɔt͡ʃɔ kumprɔfɛti ukutʰi utʰɛni ujɛhɔv̤a ukukupʰɛnd̤ula utʰɛni ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰɛtʰa kɛ ukuɓa nitʰi isiɬaɓɔ sikajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkutʰɛtʰa kwɛnu ɛlɔ liz̤wi lɔkutʰi isiɬaɓɔ sikajɛhɔv̤a nd̤itʰumɛlɛ ukutʰi iz̤ɛ ninɡ̤at͡ʃɔ ukutʰi isiɬaɓɔ sikajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jaɓɔnani nd̤ija kuniliɓala mpɛla nd̤inilaɬɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓam nalɔ mz̤i nd̤aninikajɔ nɔɔjiɬɔ nd̤iɓɛkɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛnu isiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ ɛsinɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ iɬaz̤ɔ ɛlinɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ɛlinɡ̤ɛnakulitʲalwa ujɛhɔv̤a wand̤iɓɔnisa nanz̤ɔ iinɡ̤ɔɓɔz̤i ɛz̤imɓini z̤amakʰiwanɛ z̤iɓɛkiwɛ pʰamɓi kwɛtɛmpilɛ kajɛhɔv̤a ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛɓɛɓatʰimɓilɛ ɔɔjɛkɔnija uɲana kajɛhɔjakim wakwajud̤a naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakwajud̤a nɛŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi naɓakʰand̤i ɛɓasusa ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛɓasa ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛɲɛ inɡ̤ɔɓɔz̤i iɓinamakʰiwanɛ alunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kakʰulu ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amakʰiwanɛ az̤iintlaɬɛla ɛkuv̤utʰwɛni ɛɲɛ inɡ̤ɔɓɔz̤i iɓinamakʰiwanɛ amaɓi kunɛnɛ anɡ̤ɛnakuɮiwa nɡ̤ɔɓuɓi ɓawɔ watʰi kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uɓɔna ntɔni jɛrɛmija nd̤atʰi amakʰiwanɛ amakʰiwanɛ alunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛlunɡ̤ɛ kunɛnɛ amaɓi ɛmaɓi kunɛnɛ ɛnɡ̤ɛnakuɮiwa nɡ̤ɔɓuɓi ɓawɔ kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤alɔɔ makʰiwanɛ alunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nd̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuɓakʰanɡ̤ɛlɛla ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛjɔ ɓakwajud̤a ɛnd̤iɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰilɛjɔ kulɛ nd̤awɔ ɓaja ɛz̤wɛni lamakalɛd̤i nd̤ija kulimisɛla ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ilisɔ kuɓɔ nd̤iɓaɓujisɛlɛ kwɛli liz̤wɛ nd̤iɓakʰɛ nd̤inɡ̤aɓaɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤uli nd̤iɓatʲalɛ nd̤inɡ̤aɓaɲɔtʰuli nd̤ɔɓanika intliz̤ijɔ jɔkund̤az̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓantu ɓam nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaja kuɓujɛla nɛntliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ jɔnkɛ kɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amakʰiwanɛ amaɓi anɡ̤ɛnakuɮiwa nɡ̤ɔɓuɓi inɛnɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤ija kumɛnz̤a aɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤alɔ uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wamajud̤a naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ namasalɛla asɛjɛrusalɛm asɛlɛjɔ kwɛli liz̤wɛ naɬɛlijɔ ɛz̤wɛni lamajiputa nd̤ija kuɓanikɛla kwiz̤ikumkani z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi ukuɓa ɓaɓɛ jintɔ jɔkuŋǃakulisa ɓaɓɛ nɔɓuɓi ɓaɓɛ sisiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ nɔmz̤ɛkɛlisɔ nɛntɔ jɛnt͡sini nɛjɔkut͡ʃab̤iswa ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɛnd̤iɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛla kʰɔna nd̤ɔlitʰuma pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ik͡xɛlɛ nɛnɮala nɛndʲikitʲa jɔkufa ɓad̤ɛ ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwɛ ɓapʰɛlɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni ɛnd̤awunika ɓɔna nɔɔjisɛ iliz̤wi ɛlafikajɔ kujɛrɛmija nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ ɛɓantwini ɓɔnkɛ ɓakwajud̤a nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsinɛ kajɛhɔjakim uɲana kajɔsija wakwajud̤a ɔnɡ̤umɲaka wɔkukǃala kanɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli awalitʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti kuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓakwajud̤a nakuɓɛmi ɓɔnkɛ ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm ɛsitʰi kutʰaɓatʰɛla kumɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsitʰatʰu kajɔsija uɲana kaamɔn wakwajud̤a kuz̤isɛ kulɛ lɛ miɲaka imaʃumi maɓini anamitʰatʰu ɓɛkufika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɓɛnd̤itʰɛtʰa nd̤iv̤uka nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ aniv̤anɡ̤a nɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a watʰumɛla ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ aɓaprɔfɛti ɛɓatʰuma ɛv̤uka anipʰulapʰulanɡ̤a nɔkɔ aniz̤itʰɔɓanɡ̤a iinɮɛɓɛ z̤ɛnu ukuɓa niv̤ɛ ɓajɛ ɓɛsitʰi kʰaniɓujɛ ɛlɔwɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni jakʰɛ ɛmɓi nasɛɓuɓini ɓɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤ɛnu nɔɬala ɛm̤laɓɛni awaninikajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɔɔjiɬɔ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ kanapʰakad̤ɛ ninɡ̤aland̤ɛli tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi ninɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ninɡ̤akǃuɓud̤i kuɓɔ ninɡ̤and̤ikǃumɓisi nɡ̤ɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤ɛnu ukuz̤ɛ nd̤inɡ̤ɛnz̤i ntɔ imɓi anipʰulapʰulanɡ̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukuz̤ɛ nind̤ikǃumɓisɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤ɛnu kuz̤ɛ kuɓɛ kuɓi nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ninɡ̤awɛv̤anɡ̤a amaz̤wi jaɓɔnani nd̤itʰumɛla ukuɓa nd̤ijitʰaɓatʰɛ jɔnkɛ imiz̤alwanɛ jɛlasɛntla ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤itʰumɛla kunɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli umkʰɔnz̤i nd̤ijiz̤isɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛli liz̤wɛ napʰɛz̤u kwaɓɛmi ɓalɔ napʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤i ntlanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nd̤iz̤isinɡ̤ɛlɛ pʰant͡si nd̤iz̤ɛnz̤ɛ ummanɡ̤alisɔ nɔmsɔnɮɔ nɛɛmpanz̤a ɛz̤inɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ nd̤ɔlipʰɛlisa pʰakatʰi kwaz̤ɔ iz̤wi lɛmiɬali nɛz̤wi lɛmiv̤ujɔ iz̤wi lɔmjɛni nɛz̤wi lɔmt͡ʃakaz̤i iz̤wi lɔkusila nɔkukʰaɲa kwɛsiɓanɛ ɛli liz̤wɛ lɔnkɛ lija kub̤axa kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala ɛz̤i ntlanɡ̤a z̤imkʰɔnz̤ɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kuja kutʰi kɛ kǁa iz̤alisɛkilɛjɔ imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nd̤imv̤ɛlɛlɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli nɔlɔ luɬanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɛliz̤wɛ lamakalɛd̤i nd̤ɔlɛnz̤a kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ nd̤iliz̤isɛlɛ ɛlɔ liz̤wɛ ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi ɛnd̤awatʰɛtʰa nɡ̤alɔ intɔ jɔnkɛ ɛb̤aliwɛjɔ kulɛ ŋǀwad̤i ajiprɔfɛtilɛjɔ ujɛrɛmija nɡ̤ɛɛntlanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa z̤ija kuwakʰɔnz̤isa nawɔ iintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤ininz̤i nɔɔkumkani aɓakʰulu nd̤iwav̤uz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i jawɔ nanɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃilɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi tʰaɓatʰa lɛ nd̤ɛɓɛ jɛwajini jɔɓuʃuʃu ɛsanɮɛni usɛz̤ɛ nɡ̤ajɔ iintlanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ ɛnd̤ikutʰumɛla kuz̤ɔ z̤isɛlɛ z̤ihɛkǁɛ z̤iɡ̤ɛz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛk͡xɛlɛ ɛnd̤ilitʰumɛla pʰakatʰi kwaz̤ɔ nd̤ajitʰaɓatʰa kɛ ind̤ɛɓɛ ɛsanɮɛni sikajɛhɔv̤a nd̤az̤isɛz̤a z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a awand̤itʰumɛla kuz̤ɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ijɛrusalɛm nɛmiz̤i jakwajud̤a nɔɔkumkani ɓajɔ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓajɔ ukuɓa ɓɛnz̤iwɛ iimpanz̤a nɔmmanɡ̤alisɔ nɔmsɔnɮɔ nɛnt͡ʃab̤isɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kund͡ʒ̤alɔ nam̤la ufarɔ wasɛjiputa naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ naɓantu ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ nɔmkǁukukǁɛla wɔnkɛ nɔɔkumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛliz̤wɛ lakwaut͡sɛ nɔɔkumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛliz̤wɛ lamafilisti nɛaʃkɛlɔn nɛɡ̤az̤a nɛɛk͡xɔn namasalɛla asɛaʃd̤ɔd̤ɛ uɛd̤ɔm nɔmɔwab̤i nɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn nɔɔkumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɓasɛtirɛ nɔɔkumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɓasɛt͡sid̤ɔn nɔɔkumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛsikǃʰitʰi ɛsipʰɛʃɛja kɔlwanɮɛ ud̤ɛd̤an nɔtɛma nɔb̤iz̤i nɔɔŋǃutʰulaiinwɛlɛ ɓɔnkɛ nɔɔkumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɓamaarab̤i nɔɔkumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɓɔmkǁukukǁɛla ɔmijɔ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nɔɔkumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɓamaz̤imri nɔɔkumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɓamaɛlam nɔɔkumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɓamamɛd̤i nɔɔkumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛlasɛntla aɓakufupʰi naɓakud̤ɛ ɛlɔwɔ nɔmz̤alwana wakʰɛ nɛz̤ikumkani z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi ɛz̤ipʰɛz̤u kɔm̤laɓa asɛlɛ ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ wasɛʃɛʃaki nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ wɔtʰi kuɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi sɛlani niŋǁilɛ niɬanz̤ɛ niwɛ ninɡ̤av̤uki nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛk͡xɛlɛ ɛnd̤ilitʰumɛla pʰakatʰi kwɛnu kɔtʰi kǁa ɓatʰɛ aɓav̤uma ukujitʰaɓatʰa ind̤ɛɓɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ ukuɓa ɓasɛlɛ utʰi kuɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi nija kusɛla nɡ̤ɛnɛnɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jaɓɔnani nd̤ikǃalɛla ɛmz̤ini ɔɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama ukuɬisa uɓuɓi ninɡ̤aɓa nid̤ɛ niɓɛ kɛ aniji kuɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ik͡xɛlɛ nd̤iliɓiz̤ɛla ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmi ɓɛɬaɓatʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi kɛ wɛna uz̤ɛ uɓaprɔfɛtɛlɛ lɔɔ maz̤wi ɔnkɛ utʰi kuɓɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uja kub̤axula pʰɛz̤ulu alikʰupʰɛ iliz̤wi lakʰɛ ɛkʰajɛni lakʰɛ ɛlijiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ uja kub̤axula alib̤axulɛlɛ ik͡xiwa lakʰɛ uja kuɓaɬaɓɛla amajɛjɛjɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓakǁɔv̤uli ɓɛɛd̤ilija ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmi ɓɛɬaɓatʰi iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔlɔ ija ɛsipʰɛlwɛni sɛɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uɓamɓɛnɛ nɛɛntlanɡ̤a uja kuɡ̤wɛɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛɲama jɔnkɛ aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ uɓanikɛla ɛk͡xɛlɛni ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi jaɓɔnani uɓuɓi ɓuja kupʰuma ɛluɬanɡ̤ɛni ɓujɛ ɛluɬanɡ̤ɛni umɔja ɔmkʰulu ɔv̤utʰuz̤ajɔ uv̤ukɛ ɛsiŋǃɛni sɛɬaɓatʰi aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤alɔɔ ɓatʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛɬaɓatʰi ɓɛsɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛɬaɓatʰi ɓanɡ̤amɓand͡ʒ̤az̤ɛlɛlwa ɓanɡ̤aɬanɡ̤aniswa ɓanɡ̤aŋ̤ǀ̤watʲwa ɓaja kuɓa nɡ̤umɡ̤ǃ̤uɓa pʰɛz̤u kɔm̤laɓa b̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤ani ɓalusi nikʰalɛ niz̤iɡ̤alɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔtʰutʰu z̤inɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa z̤ɔm̤lamɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iz̤alisɛkilɛ imiɬa jɛnu jɔkuɓa nisikwɛ nd̤ija kunipʰanɡ̤alalisa niwɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsitʲa ɛsiŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ ipʰɛlɛ int͡saɓɔ kuɓalusi nɔkusind̤a kwiinɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa z̤ɔm̤lamɓi jiv̤ani ukukʰala kwaɓalusi nɔkub̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤a kwɛɛnɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa z̤ɔm̤lamɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ujalib̤ukǃa iɮɛlɔ laɓɔ atʰɛ ʃwaka amak͡xiwa ɔkǁɔlɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a uluʃijilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ɛnt͡ʃa ud̤ad̤a lwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kutʰɛ kwaɓa sɛnkanɡ̤ala kulɔ iliz̤wɛ laɓɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛk͡xɛlɛ ɛliɮav̤ulajɔ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ ɛkukǃalɛkɛni kɔɓukumkani ɓukajɛhɔjakim uɲana kajɔsija wakwajud̤a ɛli liz̤wi lipʰuma kujɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jima ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni jɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a utʰɛtʰɛ kujɔ jɔnkɛ imiz̤i jakwajud̤a ɛz̤a kukǃuɓud̤a ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi ɛnd̤ikuwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkuɓa uwatʰɛtʰɛ kuɓɔ unɡ̤apʰunɡ̤uli z̤wi kuwɔ m̤lawumɓi ɓaja kuv̤a ɓaɓujɛ ɛlɔwɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni jakʰɛ ɛmɓi nd̤iz̤ɔɬwajɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi ɛnd̤ikǀinɡ̤a ukuɓɛnz̤a kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi ɓɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤aɓɔ uz̤ɛ utʰi kuɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ukuɓa nitʰɛ anand̤ipʰulapʰula nihamɓɛ nɡ̤ɔmjalɛlɔ ɛnd̤iwuɓɛkɛ pʰamɓi kwɛnu anawapʰulapʰula amaz̤wi aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓam aɓaprɔfɛti ɛnd̤iɓatʰumɛla nd̤iɓatʰuma nd̤iv̤uka anawɛv̤a nd̤ɔjɛnz̤a lɛ nɮu iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛʃilɔ nd̤iwɛnz̤ɛ lɔ mz̤i uɓɛ jintɔ jɔkut͡ʃab̤iswa ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi ɓaɓɛmv̤a kɛ ujɛrɛmija aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓaprɔfɛti naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɛtʰɛtʰa maz̤wi ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a kɛ kalɔku ɛkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛni kukajɛrɛmija kɔnkɛ aɓɛwisɛlwɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa akutʰɛtʰɛ kuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓamɓamɓa aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓaprɔfɛti naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓatʰi inɛnɛ uja jini ukuɓa uprɔfɛtɛ ɛɡ̤amɛni likajɛhɔv̤a usitʰi lɛ nɮu ija kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛʃilɔ lɔ mz̤i uɓɛ liŋǁuwa unɡ̤aɓi naɓɛmi ɓaɓiz̤ɛlwa nd̤awɔɲɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu kujɛrɛmija ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɓawɛv̤a aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakwajud̤a maz̤wi ɓɛɲuka ɓɛmka ɛnɮwini jɔkumkani ɓaja ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɓaɬala pʰant͡si ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɛlit͡ʃa likajɛhɔv̤a aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓaprɔfɛti ɓatʰɛtʰa kuɓatʰɛtʰɛli nakuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛsitʰi lɛ nd̤ɔd̤a ifanɛlwɛ sisiɡ̤wɛɓɔ sɔkufa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iprɔfɛtɛ nɡ̤alɔ mz̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nikuv̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛɓɛ z̤ɛnu watʰɛtʰa ujɛrɛmija kuɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔnkɛ nakuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɛsitʰi ujɛhɔv̤a und̤itʰumɛ ukuɓa nd̤iprɔfɛtɛ nɡ̤alɛ nɮu nanɡ̤alɔ mz̤i ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi ɛniwav̤ilɛjɔ kalɔku kɛ lunɡ̤isani iinɮɛla z̤ɛnu nɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤ɛnu nilipʰulapʰulɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu wɔz̤ɔɬwaja ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi aɓutʰɛtʰilɛjɔ nɡ̤ani kɛ jaɓɔnani nd̤isɛsanɮɛni sɛnu jɛnz̤ani nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛnu kɔd̤wa kɛ jaz̤ini naz̤i ɔku ukuɓa nitʰɛ nand̤iɓulala inɛnɛ nɔɓɛka iɡ̤az̤i ɛlimsulwa pʰɛz̤u kwɛnu napʰɛz̤u kwalɔ mz̤i napʰɛz̤u kwaɓɛmi ɓawɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iɲanisɔ ujɛhɔv̤a und̤itʰumɛlɛ ukuɓa nd̤iwatʰɛtʰɛ maz̤wi ɔnkɛ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤ɛnu ɓatʰi kɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ kuɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nakuɓaprɔfɛti lɛ nd̤ɔd̤a ajifanɛlwɛ sisiɡ̤wɛɓɔ sɔkufa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa itʰɛtʰɛ kutʰi ɛɡ̤amɛni likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu kwɛsuka kwɛma amad̤ɔd̤a kumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ɛlɔ z̤wɛ atʰɛtʰa kulɔ lɔnkɛ iɓanɮa laɓantu atʰi umika wasɛmɔrɛʃɛtɛ waprɔfɛta nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kahɛz̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a watʰɛtʰa kuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓakwajud̤a ɛsitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi iz̤ijɔn ija kuliɲwa iɓɛ jint͡simi nɛjɛrusalɛm iɓɛ jimiwɛwɛ nɛntaɓa jɛnɮu lɛ iɓɛ jimimanɡ̤ɔ ɛnɛɬatʰi ɓamɓulala kɛ uhɛz̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a namajud̤a ɔnkɛ akɔjikanɡ̤a ujɛhɔv̤a wamɓɔnɡ̤ɔz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a waz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a waz̤ɔɬwaja nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi aɓɛɓutʰɛtʰilɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ tʰina kɛ sɛnz̤ɛ uɓuɓi ɔɓukʰulu kwimipʰɛfumlɔ jɛtʰu kwajɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ kuprɔfɛta ɛɡ̤amɛni likajɛhɔv̤a ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤uurija uɲana kaʃɛmaja wasɛkirijatijɛharim waprɔfɛta nɡ̤alɔ mz̤i nanɡ̤ɛli liz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkwamaz̤wi ɔnkɛ kajɛrɛmija wawɛv̤a kɛ ujɛhɔjakim namaɡ̤ɔxa akʰɛ ɔnkɛ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔnkɛ amaz̤wi akʰɛ ukumɓulala wɛv̤a uurija wɔjika wasaɓa waja ɛjiputa ukumkani ujɛhɔjakim watʰumɛla amad̤ɔd̤a ɛjiputa uɛlinatan uɲana kaakɛb̤ɔrɛ ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a atʰilɛ ɓaja ɛjiputa ɓamxɔla uurija ɛjiputa ɓamz̤isa ujɛhɔjakim wamɓulala nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ wasipʰɔsa isid̤umɓu sakʰɛ ɛmaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni ɔluntu kɔd̤wa isanɮa sikaahikam uɲana kaʃafan ɓɛsinɔjɛrɛmija ukuɓa anɡ̤anikɛlwa ɛsanɮɛni saɓantu ukuɓa aɓulawɛ ɛkukǃalɛkɛni kɔɓukumkani ɓukaz̤ɛd̤ɛkija uɲana kajɔsija wakwajud̤a ɛli liz̤wi kujɛrɛmija lipʰuma kujɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ut͡ʃilɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi z̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ iz̤itrɔpu nɛɛdʲɔkʰwɛ uz̤ifakɛ ɛntaɲɛni jakʰɔ wɔz̤itʰumɛla wakwaɛd̤ɔm wakwamɔwab̤i wɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn wasɛtirɛ wasɛt͡sid̤ɔn nɡ̤ɛsanɮa saɓatʰuɲwa aɓɛz̤ɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm kuz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a uɓawisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkuɓa ɓatʰi ɛz̤inkɔsini z̤aɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi jit͡ʃɔni ɛz̤inkɔsini z̤ɛnu ukutʰi mna nd̤ilɛnz̤ilɛ iɬaɓatʰi lɔ nɛɛnkɔmɔ ɛz̤ipʰɛz̤u kwɛɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤amanɮa amakʰulu nanɡ̤ɛnɡ̤alɔ jam ɛjɔlukilɛjɔ nd̤alinika lɔwɔ kutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni ukuɓa nd̤ilinikɛ jɛna kalɔku kɛ nd̤iwanikɛlɛ ɔnkɛ maz̤wɛ ɛsanɮɛni sikanɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli umkʰɔnz̤i kwanamaxamŋǀwa asɛnɮɛ nd̤iwanikɛlɛ kujɛ ukuɓa amkʰɔnz̤ɛ z̤ija kumkʰɔnz̤a z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a jɛna nɔɲana wakʰɛ nɔɲana wɔɲana wakʰɛ kud̤ɛ kufikɛ ikǁɛʃa lɛlakʰɛ iliz̤wɛ z̤imkʰɔnz̤ɛ kɛ najɛ iintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤ininz̤i nɔɔkumkani aɓakʰulu kuja kutʰi uɬanɡ̤a nɔɓukumkani ɔɓunɡ̤aji kum̤ɔnz̤a unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɔɓunɡ̤ajifakijɔ intamɔ jaɓɔ ɛdʲɔkʰwɛni jɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli nd̤iluv̤ɛlɛlɛ ɔlɔ luɬanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nanɡ̤ɛnɮala nanɡ̤ɛndʲikitʲa jɔkufa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤id̤ɛ nd̤iɓaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɛ musani kɛ ukuɓapʰulapʰula aɓaprɔfɛti ɓɛnu naɓav̤umisi ɓɛnu namapʰupʰa ɛnu namatɔla ɛnu naɓakʰafuli ɓɛnu ɓɔna aɓɔ ɓatʰi aniji kumkʰɔnz̤a wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaniprɔfɛtɛla uɓukǁɔki ukuz̤ɛ nd̤inikʰwɛlɛlisɛ kud̤ɛ nɔm̤laɓa wɛnu nd̤iniɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛ nit͡ʃaɓalalɛ kɛ lɔna uɬanɡ̤a ɔluja kujinɡ̤ɛnisa intamɔ jalɔ ɛdʲɔkʰwɛni jɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli lumkʰɔnz̤ɛ nd̤ɔlujɛka ɛm̤laɓɛni walɔ luwusɛɓɛnz̤ɛ luɬalɛ kuwɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nakuz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a nd̤atʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔkwalɔɔ maz̤wi ɔnkɛ nd̤atʰi z̤inɡ̤ɛnisɛni iintamɔ z̤ɛnu ɛdʲɔkʰwɛni jɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli nikʰɔnz̤ɛ jɛna naɓantu ɓakʰɛ nipʰilɛ jini ukuɓa ufɛ wɛna naɓantu ɓakʰɔ lik͡xɛlɛ najinɮala najindʲikitʲa jɔkufa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ akutʰɛtʰilɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤a ɔlunɡ̤aji kumkʰɔnz̤a wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli musani ukuwapʰulapʰula amaz̤wi aɓaprɔfɛti aɓatʰɛtʰa ɓɛsitʰi aniji kumkʰɔnz̤a wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaniprɔfɛtɛla uɓukǁɔki nɡ̤ɔkuɓa and̤iɓatʰumanɡ̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓɔna ɓaprɔfɛta uɓukǁɔki ɛɡ̤amɛni ukuz̤ɛ nd̤iniɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛ nit͡ʃaɓalalɛ ninanaɓaprɔfɛti aɓɔ ɓaniprɔfɛtɛlajɔ nd̤atʰɛtʰa kuɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nakwaɓa ɓantu ɓɔnkɛ nd̤isitʰi ut͡ʃilɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi musani ukuwapʰulapʰula amaz̤wi aɓaprɔfɛti ɓɛnu aɓaniprɔfɛtɛlajɔ ɓɛsitʰi jaɓɔna impaɬa jɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ija kuɓɛɬɛ iɓujiswɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaniprɔfɛtɛla uɓukǁɔki musani ukuɓapʰulapʰula mkʰɔnz̤ɛni wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli nipʰilɛ jini ukuɓa uɓɛ liŋǁuwa lɔ mz̤i kɛ ukuɓa ɓanɡ̤aɓaprɔfɛti kɛ ukuɓa likʰɔ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kuɓɔ maɓamɓɔnɡ̤ɔz̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukuz̤ɛ impaɬa ɛsɛlɛjɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nasɛnɮwini jɔkumkani wakwajud̤a nasɛjɛrusalɛm inɡ̤aji ɛb̤ab̤ɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kuz̤ɔ iint͡sika nanɡ̤alɔ ulwanɮɛ nanɡ̤az̤ɔ iiŋǃwɛlwana nanɡ̤awɔ amasalɛla ɛmpaɬa ɛsɛlɛjɔ kulɔ mz̤i ɛnɡ̤atʰatʲatʰwanɡ̤a nɡ̤unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛkumfud̤usɛni kwakʰɛ ujɛkɔnija uɲana kajɛhɔjakim wakwajud̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛnaɓanumz̤ana ɓɔnkɛ ɓakwajud̤a nɛjɛrusalɛm ɛwɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ wamasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛmpaɬa ɛsɛlɛjɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nasɛnɮwini jɔkumkani wakwajud̤a nasɛjɛrusalɛm ukutʰi ija ɛb̤ab̤ɛli iɓɛ kʰɔna id̤ɛ iɓɛ jimini jɔkujiv̤ɛlɛla ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ijiɲusɛ nd̤ijiɓujisɛlɛ kulɛ nd̤awɔ kɛ kalɔku kwatʰi nɡ̤alɔɔ mɲaka ɛkukǃalɛkɛni kɔɓukumkani ɓukaz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsinɛ nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsiɬanu watʰɛtʰa uhananija uɲana kaaz̤urɛ umprɔfɛti wasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɛsitʰi ut͡ʃilɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi nd̤ijajapʰula idʲɔkʰwɛ jɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli kwanɡ̤alɛ miɲaka miɓini iz̤alisɛkilɛjɔ nd̤ija kujiɓujisɛla kulɛ nd̤awɔ jɔnkɛ impaɬa jɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a awajitʰaɓatʰajɔ kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli wajisa ɛb̤ab̤ɛli nd̤ija kuɓaɓujisɛla kulɛ nd̤awɔ ɔjɛkɔnija uɲana kajɛhɔjakim wakwajud̤a naɓafud̤usiwɛjɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓakwajud̤a aɓajɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija kujapʰula idʲɔkʰwɛ jɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli watʰi ujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti kuhananija umprɔfɛti ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nasɛmɛɬwɛni aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmijɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a watʰi ujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti amɛn makɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ujɛhɔv̤a makawamisɛ ujɛhɔv̤a amaz̤wi akʰɔ ɔwaprɔfɛtɛlɛ ukuɓa ajiɓujisɛ impaɬa jɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a naɓafud̤usiwɛjɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɓɛz̤ɛ kulɛ nd̤awɔ kʰawuv̤ɛ ɛli liz̤wi nd̤ilitʰɛtʰajɔ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤akʰɔ nasɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓaprɔfɛti aɓaɓɛnɡ̤apʰamɓili nanɡ̤apʰamɓili kwakʰɔ kwasɛpʰakad̤ɛni ɓaprɔfɛta imfaz̤wɛ nɔɓuɓi nɛndʲikitʲa jɔkufa ɓɛsinɡ̤isɛlɛ kumaz̤wɛ amaninz̤i nanɡ̤ɛz̤ikumkani ɛz̤ikʰulu umprɔfɛti lɔwɔ uprɔfɛta ukǁɔlɔ uja kwaz̤iwa ukuɓa unɡ̤umprɔfɛti ɔtʰuɲiwɛjɔ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɔkunɛnɛ ɛkwɛnz̤ɛkɛni kwɛlɔ liz̤wi lɔmprɔfɛti lɔwɔ kɛ kalɔku uhananija umprɔfɛti wajitʰaɓatʰa idʲɔkʰwɛ ɛntaɲɛni kajɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti wajapʰula watʰɛtʰa uhananija ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɛsitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukujapʰula idʲɔkʰwɛ kanɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli nɡ̤alɛ miɲaka miɓini iz̤a kuz̤alisɛka ɛz̤intaɲɛni z̤ɛɛntlanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ wɛmka kɛ ujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti wahamɓa inɮɛla jakʰɛ kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɛrɛmija ɛmv̤a kɔkujapʰula kukahananija umprɔfɛti idʲɔkʰwɛ ɛntaɲɛni kajɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti lisitʰi jija utʰɛtʰɛ kuhananija utʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi uz̤apʰulɛ iidʲɔkʰwɛ z̤ɔmtʰi kɛ jɛnz̤a iidʲɔkʰwɛ z̤ɛsiɲitʰi ɛsikʰunɮɛni saz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi nd̤iɓɛkɛ idʲɔkʰwɛ jɛsiɲitʰi ɛz̤intaɲɛni z̤ɛz̤ɔ ntlanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ ukuz̤ɛ z̤imkʰɔnz̤ɛ unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli z̤ija kumkʰɔnz̤a kɛ kwanamaramŋǀwa asɛnɮɛ nd̤iwanikɛlɛ kujɛ watʰi ujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti kuhananija umprɔfɛti kʰawuv̤ɛ hananija ujɛhɔv̤a akakutʰumanɡ̤a wɛna aɓa ɓantu uɓakʰɔlɔsisa nɡ̤ɔɓukǁɔki nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤iv̤a kukuɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa ɛɓuswɛni ɓɔm̤laɓa uja nɔɲakand͡ʒ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰɛtʰɛ ɛlɔkuk͡xɛkǃa kujɛhɔv̤a wafa kɛ uhananija umprɔfɛti nɡ̤alɔɔ mɲaka nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤awɔ amaz̤wi ɛŋǀwad̤i awajitʰumɛlajɔ ujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti ɛsɛjɛrusalɛm kumasalɛla amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu afud̤usiwɛjɔ nakuɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nakuɓaprɔfɛti nakuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ awajɛɓafud̤usilɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ waɓasa ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛmv̤a kɔkupʰuma kukajɛkɔnija nɛnkɔsikaz̤i namaɡ̤ɔsa naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakwajud̤a nɛjɛrusalɛm nɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi naɓakʰand̤i ɛjɛrusalɛm awajitʰumɛlajɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikaɛlasa uɲana kaʃafan nɔɡ̤ɛmarija uɲana kahilɛkija awaɓatʰumɛlajɔ uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a kunɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛb̤ab̤ɛli isitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli kwaɓafud̤usiwɛjɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɛnd̤iɓafud̤usɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm ukuɓa ɓasiwɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ukutʰi jakʰani iz̤inɮu niɬalɛ kuz̤ɔ tʲalani imijɛz̤ɔ niɮɛ iz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ajɔ z̤ɛkani aɓafaz̤i niz̤alɛ ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi niɓaz̤ɛkɛlɛ aɓafaz̤i ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu iintɔmɓi z̤ɛnu niz̤ɛnd̤isɛlɛ kumad̤ɔd̤a z̤iz̤alɛ ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi nand̤ɛ kʰɔna ninɡ̤aŋǀipʰi niz̤ɛ niz̤amɛlɛ ukǁɔlɔ lɔmz̤i ɛnd̤inifud̤usɛlɛ kuwɔ niwutʰand̤az̤ɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nija kuɓa nɔkǁɔlɔ nɡ̤ɔkǁɔlɔ lwawɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi maɓanɡ̤anilukuɬi aɓaprɔfɛti ɓɛnu aɓapʰakatʰi kwɛnu kwanaɓav̤umisi ɓɛnu ninɡ̤awapʰulapʰuli amapʰupʰa ɛnu ɛniwapʰupʰajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaniprɔfɛtɛla uɓukǁɔki ɛɡ̤amɛni and̤iɓatʰumanɡ̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi kǁɛnikwɛni ib̤ab̤ɛli iz̤alisɛlwɛ imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nd̤ija kuniv̤ɛlɛla nd̤ilimisɛ iliz̤wi ɛlilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ lɔkuniɓujisɛla kulɛ nd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ijaz̤az̤i iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a ɛnd̤iz̤ikǀinɡ̤ajɔ nɡ̤ani ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤ɔkǁɔlɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔɓuɓi ukuɓa nd̤ininikɛ ikamv̤a nɛtʰɛmɓa nija kund̤iŋǃula niz̤ɛ nitʰand̤az̤ɛ nd̤inipʰulapʰulɛ nija kund̤ifuna nind̤ifumanɛ kǁa nitʰɛ nand̤ifuna nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jɛnu jɔnkɛ nd̤ifumanɛkɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kukuɓujisa ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kwɛnu nd̤iniɓutʰɛ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni z̤ɔnkɛ nasɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɛnd̤aniɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛla kuz̤ɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤iniɓujisɛlɛ ɛnd̤awɛni ɛnd̤anifud̤usa kujɔ kǁa nitʰi ujɛhɔv̤a usiv̤ɛlisɛlɛ aɓaprɔfɛti ɛb̤ab̤ɛli inɛnɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ ɔɬɛli ɛtrɔnɛni kad̤av̤id̤ɛ nakuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɬɛli kulɔ mz̤i aɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu aɓanɡ̤apʰumanɡ̤a ɓajɛ ɛkufud̤uswɛni ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤itʰuma pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ik͡xɛlɛ nɛnɮala nɛndʲikitʲa jɔkufa nd̤iɓɛnz̤ɛ ɓaɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amakʰiwanɛ ak͡xukǃulajɔ anɡ̤ɛnakuɮiwa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa maɓi kwawɔ nd̤ija kuɓasukɛla nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nanɡ̤ɛnɮala nanɡ̤ɛndʲikitʲa jɔkufa nd̤iɓanikɛlɛ ukuɓa ɓaɓɛ jintɔ jɔkuŋǃakulisa kwiz̤ikumkani z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi ɓaɓɛ jint͡ʃwaɓulɔ nɔmmanɡ̤alisɔ nɔmsɔnɮɔ nɛsiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɛnd̤aɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛla kuz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛtʰuɓa lɔkuɓa ɓɛnɡ̤awapʰulapʰulanɡ̤a amaz̤wi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnd̤awatʰumɛla nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓam aɓaprɔfɛti nd̤iɓatʰuma nd̤iv̤uka aniv̤anɡ̤a nɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a liv̤ɛni kɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nɔnkɛ ɓafud̤usiwɛjɔ nd̤aɓasusajɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm ɓaja ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kuahab̤i uɲana kakɔlaja nakuz̤ɛd̤ɛkija uɲana kamahasɛja aɓaniprɔfɛtɛla uɓukǁɔki ɛɡ̤amɛni ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤iɓanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sikanɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli aɓaɓulalɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛnu kuz̤ɛkɛlwɛ kuɓɔ ukut͡ʃab̤isa nɡ̤aɓafud̤usiwɛjɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓakwajud̤a aɓasɛb̤ab̤ɛli kutʰiwɛ ujɛhɔv̤a makakwɛnz̤ɛ uɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔz̤ɛd̤ɛkija nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔahab̤i awaɓakǀʰanaɓajɔ ɛmlilwɛni wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa ɓɛnz̤ɛ uɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ kwasirajɛli ɓaɓak͡xɛkǁɛz̤a aɓafaz̤i ɓaɓamɛlwanɛ ɓaɓɔ ɓatʰɛtʰa amaz̤wi ɔɓukǁɔki ɛɡ̤amɛni ɛnd̤inɡ̤aɓawisɛlanɡ̤a mɛtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤awɔ nd̤ijaz̤i nd̤iliŋ̤ǃ̤ina ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kuʃɛmaja wasɛnɛhɛlam wɔtʰɛtʰa utʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa wɛna utʰumɛlɛ iŋǀwad̤i ɛɡ̤amɛni lakʰɔ kuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓasɛjɛrusalɛm nakuz̤ɛfanija uɲana kamahasɛja umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nakuɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɔnkɛ usitʰi ujɛhɔv̤a ukwɛnz̤ɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛsikʰunɮɛni sikajɔjad̤a umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ukuz̤ɛ kuɓɛkʰɔ aɓav̤ɛlɛli ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kaɓani wɔnkɛ ɔb̤ud̤ajɔ ɔz̤ɛnz̤a umprɔfɛti ukuɓa umfakɛ ɛsitɔkisini nasɛntand͡ʒ̤ɛni jini nɡ̤ɔku ukuɓa unɡ̤amkʰalimɛli ujɛrɛmija wasɛanatɔti ɔz̤ɛnz̤a umprɔfɛti nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ utʰumɛlɛ kutʰi ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛsitʰi ind̤ɛ lɛ ntɔ jakʰani iz̤inɮu niɬalɛ kuz̤ɔ tʲalani imijɛz̤ɔ niɮɛ iz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ajɔ uz̤ɛfanija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wajilɛsa lɔɔ ŋǀwad̤i ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤ikajɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti kwafika kɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɛrɛmija lisitʰi tʰumɛla kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓafud̤usiwɛjɔ utʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kuʃɛmaja wasɛnɛhɛlam ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa uʃɛmaja ɛniprɔfɛtɛlɛ nd̤inɡ̤amtʰumanɡ̤a wanikʰɔlɔsisa nɡ̤ɔɓukǁɔki nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤ijamv̤ɛlɛla uʃɛmaja wasɛnɛhɛlam nɛmɓɛwu jakʰɛ akaji kuɓa uɬɛlijɔ pʰakatʰi kwaɓa ɓantu anɡ̤aji kuɓɔna ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛnd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛla aɓantu ɓam ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛtʰɛtʰɛ ɛlɔkuk͡xɛkǃa kujɛhɔv̤a iliz̤wi ɛlafikajɔ kujɛrɛmija liv̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a lalisitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakwasirajɛli ukutʰi wab̤alɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi ɛnd̤iwatʰɛtʰilɛjɔ kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujaɓɔna kuz̤a imiɬa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnd̤ija kukuɓujisa ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kwaɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli namajud̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤iɓaɓujisɛlɛ ɛz̤wɛni ɛnd̤alinika ɔɔjisɛ ukuɓa ɓalimɛ nɡ̤awɔ kɛ amaz̤wi awawatʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kumasirajɛli nakumajud̤a ut͡ʃilɔ kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi siv̤ɛ iz̤wi ɛliɡ̤ub̤isajɔ lɛlinkwantʲisajɔ asililɔ ɛlɔkǁɔlɔ kʰaniɓuz̤isɛ nikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ukuɓa ind̤ɔd̤a jakʰa jamitʰa jini ukuɓa nd̤iɓɔnɛ aɓafɔ ɓɔnkɛ iz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ z̤isɛmaŋǃɛni aɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmfaz̤i ɔz̤alajɔ uɓusɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓusukɛ ɓalutʰutʰu atʰi kɛ ukuɓa mkʰulu lɔɔ m̤la akukʰɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɔ likǁɛʃa lɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ kujakɔɓi kɛ uja kusind̤iswa kujɔ kɔtʰi kɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ m̤la ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi nd̤ijapʰulɛ idʲɔkʰwɛ jakʰɛ ɛntaɲɛni jakʰɔ nd̤iz̤ikǃʰawulɛ iz̤itrɔpu z̤akʰɔ ɓanɡ̤aɓi samkʰɔnz̤isa aɓasɛmz̤ini ɓakʰɔnz̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ nɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓɔ ɛnd̤ija kuɓav̤ɛlisɛla jɛna kɛ wɛna ukɔjika mkʰɔnz̤i jakɔɓi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤akǃʰipʰuki umɓilini sirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujaɓɔna nd̤ija kukusind̤isa usɛkud̤ɛ nɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ ɛz̤wɛni ɛtʰind͡ʒ̤ɛlwɛ kulɔ aɓujɛ ujakɔɓi az̤ɔlɛ ɔnwaɓɛ anɡ̤aɡ̤ub̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inawɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukuz̤ɛ nd̤ikusind̤isɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija kuz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla kupʰɛlɛ iintlanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ ɛnd̤akupʰanɡ̤alalisɛla kuz̤ɔ kɔd̤wa and̤iji kukuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla kupʰɛlɛ nd̤ɔkutʰɛtʰisa nɡ̤ɔkusɛsikwɛni nd̤inɡ̤atʰi kwakaɲɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ukwapʰuka kwakʰɔ asikukɔ nɔkuɓa kujaɓulala liɓuɬunɡ̤u iŋǁɛɓa lakʰɔ akukʰɔ uɡ̤wɛɓa itʲala lakʰɔ upʰɔlisa iŋǁɛɓa akunajɛ ɔkuɓɔpʰajɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤itʰand̤anɛ z̤akʰɔ z̤ikuliɓɛlɛ az̤ikukʰatʰalɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ikuɓɛtʰilɛ nɡ̤ɔɓɛtʰɔ lɔt͡ʃaɓa nɡ̤ɛntɛtʰisɔ ɛnɔɓud͡ʒ̤ɔxa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuninz̤i ɓɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa z̤ininz̤i iz̤ɔnɔ z̤akʰɔ ukʰalɛlani nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkwapʰuka kwakʰɔ asikukɔ nɔkuɓa ujaɓulala umv̤and̤ɛd̤wa wakʰɔ nd̤iz̤ɛnz̤ilɛ ɛz̤ɔ ntɔ kuwɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuninz̤i ɓɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɔ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa z̤ininz̤i iz̤ɔnɔ z̤akʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓakuɮajɔ ɓaja kuɮiwa naɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓakʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓaja kutʰind͡ʒ̤wa naɓadʲwid̤i ɓakʰɔ ɓadʲwid̤wɛ naɓapʰanɡ̤i ɓakʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ nd̤iɓanikɛlɛ ɛkupʰanɡ̤wɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija kukuɓɔpʰa nd̤ijipʰɔlisɛ imiv̤umɓɔ jakʰɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa ɓatʰi unɡ̤uɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰiwɛ ujiz̤ijɔn ɛnɡ̤akʰatʰalɛlwɛ ɓani ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ija kukuɓujisa ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kwɛɛntɛntɛ z̤ikajakɔɓi nd̤iɓɛ nɛmfɛsanɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛmiŋǃuɓa jakʰɛ umz̤i wakʰɛlwɛ ɛmmanɡ̤wɛni wawɔ luɬalwɛ ukǁand̤ɛ ɔlud̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ lalɔ wɔpʰuma kuz̤ɔ umɓulɛlɔ nɛz̤wi laɓakǃamɓajɔ nd̤iɓand̤isɛ ɓanɡ̤aɓi mɓalwa nd̤iɓaz̤ukisɛ ɓanɡ̤aŋǀipʰi ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ ɓɔɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwamand̤ulɔ liz̤imasɛkɛ pʰamɓi iɓanɮa laɓɔ nd̤iɓav̤ɛlɛlɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓakǁini ɓaɓɔ inɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa jaɓɔ ija kuv̤ɛla kuɓɔ waɓɔ apʰumɛ kwapʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ nd̤imsɔnd̤ɛz̤ɛ afikɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤uɓani ɔmɛlɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ ukuɓa afikɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nija kuɓa nɡ̤aɓantu ɓam nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nanɡ̤ɔ umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a ɔv̤utʰuz̤ajɔ naɓɔ ɓupʰuma uɓuʃuʃu umɔja ɔv̤utʰuz̤ajɔ ɔkʰukulisajɔ uja kukǃʰwitʰɛla ɛntlɔkwɛni jaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ akuji kuɓuja ukuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ad̤ɛ ajɛnz̤ɛ ad̤ɛ ajimisɛ imiŋ̰ǃ̰anɡ̤ijɛlɔ jɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɬa nija kukukǃɔnd̤a ɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kuɓa nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ kwimiz̤alwanɛ jɔnkɛ jakwasirajɛli jɔna iɓɛ nɡ̤aɓantu ɓam ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɓaɓaɓalwa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ aɓantu aɓasind̤ilɛjɔ ɛk͡xɛlɛni nd̤ɔja nd̤iwapʰumz̤ɛ amasirajɛli ujɛhɔv̤a uɓɔnakɛlɛ kwakud̤ɛ watʰi nd̤ikutʰand̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɔtʰand̤ɔ ɔlunɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nd̤ikɔlulɛlɛ iŋǀɛɓa nd̤ija kuɓuja nd̤ikwakʰɛ wakʰɛkɛ ntɔmɓi inɡ̤usirajɛli uja kuɓuja uz̤ihɔmɓisɛ upʰatʰɛ iiŋ̤ǃ̤ɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔ z̤akʰɔ upʰumɛ ujɛ ɛkuŋ̤ǃ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤ɛni kwaɓaŋ̤ǃ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤ajɔ uja kuɓuja utʲalɛ iz̤id̤ilija ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwasamari ɓatʲalɛ aɓatʲali ɓaz̤iɮɛ nɡ̤ɔkwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kuja kuɓakʰɔ um̤la aɓaja kumɛmɛz̤a nɡ̤awɔ aɓalind̤i ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwaɛfrajim ɓɛsitʰi sukani nimɛ siɲukɛ sijɛ ɛz̤ijɔn kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi mɛmɛlɛlani nɡ̤ɔjakɔɓi niv̤ujɛ nit͡ʃɔlɔz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛntlɔkɔ jɛɛntlanɡ̤a v̤akalisani d̤umisani jitʰini ɓasind̤isɛ jɛhɔv̤a aɓantu ɓakʰɔ amasalɛla akwasirajɛli jaɓɔna nd̤ijaɓaz̤isa ɓɛv̤ɛla ɛz̤wɛni lasɛntla nd̤iɓaɓutʰɛ ɛz̤ipʰɛlwɛni z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi ɓɛnɛɛmfama nɛz̤ikǃʰwala aɓamitʰijɔ naɓaz̤alajɔ kuɲɛ ɓɛsisikʰunɡ̤u ɛsikʰulu ɓɛɓujɛla apʰa ɓaja kuz̤a ɓɛlila nd̤iɓakʰɔkɛlɛ ɓɛtaxuz̤isa nd̤iɓasɛ ɛmiland͡ʒ̤ɛni jamanz̤i nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɛtʰɛ tʲɛ ɓɛnɡ̤akʰuɓɛki kujɔ kuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujisɛ kusirajɛli uɛfrajim nɡ̤ɔwamaz̤iɓulɔ liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a z̤intlanɡ̤a nilikǁɛlɛ ɛz̤ikǃitʰini ɛz̤ikud̤ɛ nitʰi umkǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰi kasirajɛli uja kumɓutʰa amɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmalusi ɛɡ̤ǀ̤ina um̤lamɓi wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ummisɛlɛ wamkʰulula ujakɔɓi um̤lawulɛlɛ wamkʰulula ɛsanɮɛni sɔwɔmɛlɛlɛjɔ kunajɛ ɓaja kuz̤a ɓamɛmɛlɛlɛ ɛz̤ind̤ulini z̤asɛz̤ijɔn ɓasinɡ̤ɛ kwiz̤intɔ ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwɛni nasɛwajinini ɛnt͡ʃa nasɛɔlini nasɛmɡ̤ǃ̤ɛkwini wɛɛɡ̤uʃa nɛɛnkɔmɔ imipʰɛfumlɔ jaɓɔ iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmjɛz̤ɔ ɔɲɛlwa nɡ̤amanz̤i uv̤und̤ɛ ɓanɡ̤aɓi sapʰind̤a ɓatʰɛ amanɮa ija kwand̤ula intɔmɓi iv̤ujɛ ɛkuŋ̤ǃ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤ɛni namad̤ɔd̤ana namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu kuɲɛ nd̤isɛnz̤ɛ isid͡ʒ̤wili saɓɔ siɓɛ jimiɬali nd̤iɓatʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛ nd̤iɓav̤ujisɛ ɓanɡ̤aɓi nasiŋ̤ǃ̤ala nd̤ɔwusɛz̤a uɬutʰɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɡ̤amafutʰa ɓaɬutʰɛ aɓantu ɓam z̤iz̤intɔ z̤am ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi kuv̤akɛlɛ iz̤wi ɛrama isimɛma isililɔ ɛsik͡xak͡xa urakɛli ɛlilɛla aɓantwana ɓakʰɛ ɛnɡ̤av̤umi ukutʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛka nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓantwana ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛnɡ̤asɛkʰɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi litʰintɛlɛ iliz̤wi lakʰɔ linɡ̤alili namɛɬɔ akʰɔ anɡ̤aɓi naɲɛmɓɛz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɔmv̤uz̤ɔ umsɛɓɛnz̤i wakʰɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓaja kuɓuja ɛz̤wɛni lɔt͡ʃaɓa linɛtʰɛmɓa ikamv̤a lakʰɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ ɓaja kuɓujɛla ɛmd̤ɛni waɓɔ nd̤imv̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɛnɛnɛ uɛfrajim ɛɬunɡ̤uz̤ɛla intlɔkɔ ɛsitʰi und̤ikǃɛkǃɛʃilɛ nd̤akǃɛkǃɛʃɛka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛtʰɔlɛ ɛlinɡ̤ɛkatʰamɓi nd̤iɓujisɛ nd̤iɓujɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛna jɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛmv̤a kɔkukut͡ʃikilɛla nd̤az̤ɔɬwaja ɛmv̤a kɔkwaz̤iswa nd̤aɓɛtʰa ɛtʰanɡ̤ɛni nd̤ad̤ana nd̤ɛv̤a iɬaz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤itʰwɛlɛ isiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ sɔɓuŋǀinanɛ ɓam nɡ̤uɲana ɔŋǃaɓilɛjɔ uɛfrajim nɡ̤umntwana wɔkutɛkɛtiswa lɛ ntɔ nd̤itʰi nd̤akutʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ajɛ nd̤imkǀʰasilɛ nd̤isukɛ nd̤imkʰumɓulɛ nɡ̤akumɓi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ iz̤iɓilini z̤am z̤ijasika nɡ̤ajɛ inɛnɛ nd̤ija kuɓa nɛmfɛsanɛ kujɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a z̤imisɛlɛni iz̤alatʰisɔ z̤iɡ̤ǁ̤umɛkɛlɛni iz̤iɓɔnd̤a jib̤ɛkisɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ ɛmɛnd̤wɛni ɛnɮɛlɛni ɔwahamɓa nɡ̤ajɔ ɓuja ntɔmɓi inɡ̤usirajɛli ɓujɛla ɛmiz̤ini jakɔwɛnu kunini uŋǁakǁʰaŋǁakǁʰa ntɔmɓi ipʰamɓajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ud̤ala intɔ ɛnt͡ʃa ɛɬaɓatʰini inkaz̤ana ija kupʰaɬa ind̤ɔd̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi ɓasaja kulitʰɛtʰa ɛli liz̤wi ɛz̤wɛni lakwajud̤a nasɛmiz̤ini jakʰɔna ɛkukuɓujisɛni ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kwaɓɔ lɔkutʰi ujɛhɔv̤a makakusikɛlɛlɛ kʰaja lɔɓulunɡ̤isa ntaɓa jɔɓuŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ aja kʰɔna amajud̤a nɛmiz̤i jawɔ jɔnkɛ kuɲɛ aɓalimi naɓahamɓa ɛmatʰanɡ̤a ɓɛnɛmiɬamɓi jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ijawusɛz̤a uɬutʰɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ ɔtʰʲafilɛjɔ nd̤ɔwanɛlisa umpʰɛfumlɔ wɔnkɛ ɔtʰɛ amanɮa kwakuɓand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤av̤uka nd̤akʰanɡ̤ɛla uɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ ɓam ɓɛɓumnand̤i jaɓɔna kuz̤a imiɬa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnd̤ija kujiɬwajɛla inɮu kasirajɛli nɛnɮu kajud̤a nɡ̤ɛmɓɛwu jɔmntu nanɡ̤ɛmɓɛwu jɛnkɔmɔ kuja kutʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤aɓapʰapʰɛlajɔ ukuɓa nd̤iɲɔtʰulɛ ukuɓa nd̤id̤iliz̤ɛ ukuɓa nd̤iɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ulɛ ukuɓa nd̤it͡ʃaɓalalisɛ ukuɓa nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ kuɓɛ kuɓi nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤iɓapʰapʰɛlɛ ukuɓa nd̤akʰɛ ukuɓa nd̤itʲalɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa aɓasaji kuɓa satʰi ɔɔjisɛ ɓaɮɛ iid̤ilija ɛz̤imuŋǀu amaz̤iɲɔ ɔɔɲana aɓa ɓutʰɛlɛz̤i kɛ ɛlɔwɔ uja nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓakʰɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa wɔnkɛ ɔɮa iid̤ilija ɛz̤imuŋǀu nɡ̤ujɛ ɔmaz̤iɲɔ aja kuɓa ɓutʰɛlɛz̤i jaɓɔna kuz̤a imiɬa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnd̤ija kwɛnz̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɔmt͡ʃa nɛnɮu kasirajɛli nɛnɮu kajud̤a unɡ̤aɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɛnd̤awɛnz̤a nɔjisɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la ɛnd̤aɓaɓamɓajɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa ukuɓa nd̤iɓakʰupʰɛ ɛz̤wɛni lɛjiputa umŋǃɔpʰisɔ aɓasuka ɓawapʰula ɓɔna nanɡ̤ani ɓɛnd̤ijind̤ɔd̤a jaɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤uwɔ kɛ lɔ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɛnd̤ija kuwɛnz̤a nɛnɮu kasirajɛli ɛmv̤a kwalɔɔ miɬa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kuwuɓɛka umjalɛlɔ ɛmɓilinini jaɓɔ nd̤iwub̤alɛ ɛz̤intliz̤ijwɛni z̤aɓɔ nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓantu ɓam ɓanɡ̤aɓi safund̤isa ɛlɔwɔ ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ ɛlɔwɔ umz̤alwana wakʰɛ ɓɛsitʰi maz̤ini ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓaja kund̤az̤i kutʰaɓatʰɛla kwaɓaŋǀinanɛ kusɛ kwaɓakʰulu ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija kuɓukǁɔlɛla uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ nd̤inɡ̤aɓi sasikʰumɓula isɔnɔ saɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a umniki wɛlanɡ̤a ukuɓa liɓɛ sisikʰaɲisɔ ɛmini umniki wɛmimisɛlɔ jɛɲanɡ̤a nɛɛnkwɛnkwɛz̤i ukuɓa z̤iɓɛ sisikʰaɲisɔ ɛɓusuku umlatʲuz̤isi wɔlwanɮɛ ukuɓa aɡ̤ǃ̤umɛ amaz̤a alɔ uɡ̤ama lakʰɛ linɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi ukuɓa itʰɛ jasuka lɔɔ mimisɛlɔ pʰamɓi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a jɔpʰɛla najɔ kɛ imɓɛwu kasirajɛli inɡ̤aɓi luɬanɡ̤a pʰamɓi nɡ̤amakǁa ɔnkɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ukuɓa linɡ̤aɓa nɔkulinɡ̤aniswa iz̤ulu pʰɛz̤ulu z̤iɓɛ nɔkuɡ̤ɔkǀwaɡ̤ɔkǀwa iz̤isɛkɔ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi pʰant͡si kɛ nd̤ɔɓa nd̤ija kujikǀɛkisa jɔnkɛ imɓɛwu kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛntɔ jɔnkɛ aɓajɛnz̤ilɛjɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a jaɓɔna kuz̤a imiɬa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔja kutʰi umz̤i lɔwɔ wakʰɛlwɛ ujɛhɔv̤a kutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛŋǃaɓɛni ɛnd̤ɛ kahananɛli kusɛ ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɛmɓɔmɓɔ luɓujɛ lupʰumɛ ulutʲa lɔkulinɡ̤anisɛla lutʰi ɡ̤ǀ̤a pʰɛz̤u kwɛnd̤uli kaɡ̤arɛb̤ɛ lud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛ ɛɡ̤ɔha jɔnkɛ jɛz̤id̤umɓu nɛjɔtʰutʰu ɔnkɛ ɛsiɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni sɛkid̤rɔn ɛmɓɔmɓɛni jɛsanɡ̤ɔ lamahaʃɛ nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a iɓɛ ŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a inɡ̤aɓi saɲɔtʰulwa inɡ̤aɓi saɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ulwa napʰakad̤ɛ iliz̤wi ɛlafikajɔ kujɛrɛmija liv̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi kaz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a lɔɔ mɲaka kɛ nɡ̤umɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ kanɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ ɔkɔ kɛ jɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli iɓijiŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤ilɛ ijɛrusalɛm ujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti ɛv̤alɛlwɛ ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni jɛntɔlɔnɡ̤ɔ jɛnɮu jɔkumkani wakwajud̤a kuɓa ɛɓɛv̤alɛlwɛ kujɔ nɡ̤uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a ɛsitʰi jini ukuɓa utʰi ukuprɔfɛta kwakʰɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ijawunikɛla lɔ mz̤i ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ukuɓa awutʰimɓɛ anɡ̤asind̤i ɛsanɮɛni samakalɛd̤i uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a uja kunikɛlwa ɔkunɛnɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli umlɔmɔ wakʰɛ utʰɛtʰɛ nɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɛ aɓɔnɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɛ amsɛ uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija ɛb̤ab̤ɛli aɓɛ kʰɔna nd̤id̤ɛ nd̤imv̤ɛlɛlɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kǁa nitʰɛ namakalɛd̤i aniji kuɓa nampumɛlɛlɔ watʰi ujɛrɛmija kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi jaɓɔna uhanamɛli uɲana kaʃalum ujiɬɔkaz̤i uz̤a kuwɛ ɛsitʰi jitʰɛnɡ̤ɛ int͡simi jam ɛsɛanatɔti nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kulunɡ̤ɛ nawɛ ukujitʰɛnɡ̤a ujikʰululɛ nɡ̤ɛntlawulɛlɔ wɛz̤a kɛ ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni jɛntɔlɔnɡ̤ɔ uhanamɛli uɲana kaɓawɔkaz̤i nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a watʰi kʰawujitʰɛnɡ̤ɛ int͡simi jam ɛsɛanatɔti ɛsɛz̤wɛni lakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lilunɡ̤ɛ nawɛ kɔkwakʰɔ ukujikʰulula nɡ̤ɔkumisɛla z̤itʰɛnɡ̤ɛlɛ nd̤az̤i kɛ ukuɓa liliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɛlɔ nd̤ajitʰɛnɡ̤a kɛ int͡simi kuhanamɛli uɲana kaɓawɔkaz̤i ɛsɛanatɔti nd̤amlinɡ̤anisɛla lɛjɔ iiʃɛkɛlɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛz̤inɛɛʃɛkɛlɛ ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nd̤akub̤ala kɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini nd̤ajitʲwina nd̤aŋ̤ǃ̤inisa amaŋ̤ǃ̤ina nd̤ajilinɡ̤anisɛla nɡ̤ɛsikali nd̤ajitʰaɓatʰa kɛ iŋǀwad̤i jɛntɛnɡ̤ɔ lɛjɔ itʲwiniwɛjɔ inɔmtʰɛtʰɔ nɛmimisɛlɔ nalɛjɔ iv̤ulɛkilɛjɔ nd̤ajinikɛla iŋǀwad̤i jɛntɛnɡ̤ɔ kub̤aruki uɲana kanɛrija uɲana kamasɛja ɛmɛɬwɛni kahanamɛli ɔkaɓawɔkaz̤i nasɛmɛɬwɛni amaŋ̤ǃ̤ina lawɔ ab̤alilɛjɔ ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɛntɛnɡ̤ɔ nasɛmɛɬwɛni amajud̤a ɔnkɛ aɓɛɬɛli ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni jɛntɔlɔnɡ̤ɔ nd̤amwisɛla ub̤aruki umtʰɛtʰɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ nd̤isitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi tʰaɓatʰa ɛz̤i ŋǀwad̤i iŋǀwad̤i jɛntɛnɡ̤ɔ lɛ itʲwiniwɛjɔ nɛŋǀwad̤i lɛ iv̤ulɛkilɛjɔ uz̤iɓɛkɛ ɛsitʲɛni sɔmd̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ ukuz̤ɛ z̤iɬalɛ imiɬa ɛmininz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi kuja kuɓuja kutʰɛnɡ̤wɛ iz̤inɮu nɛz̤id̤ilija kwɛli liz̤wɛ nd̤atʰand̤az̤a kujɛhɔv̤a ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkujinikɛla iŋǀwad̤i jɛntɛnɡ̤ɔ kub̤aruki uɲana kanɛrija nd̤atʰi awu nkɔsi jam jɛhɔv̤a jaɓɔna walɛnz̤a iz̤ulu nɛɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤amanɮa akʰɔ amakʰulu nanɡ̤ɛnɡ̤alɔ jakʰɔ ɛjɔlukilɛjɔ akukʰɔ ntɔ ikuŋǃaɓɛlɛjɔ unɡ̤uwɛnz̤a iŋǀɛɓa upʰind̤ɛz̤ɛla uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɔɔjisɛ ɛsɔnd̤wɛni lɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ ulɔtʰikǁɔ mkʰulu uliɡ̤ɔxa uɡ̤ama lakʰɛ linɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukǀɛɓɔ likʰulu uz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤iŋǀamisilɛjɔ nɡ̤amanɮa umɛɬɔ av̤ulɛkilɛjɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnɮɛla z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ukuɓa umnikɛ ulɔwɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛnɮɛla z̤akʰɛ nanɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ wamisajɔ imikǃɔnd̤isɔ nɛz̤imanɡ̤a ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa unanam̤la nakumasirajɛli nakwaɓaɲɛ aɓantu waz̤ɛnz̤ɛla iɡ̤ama nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kund͡ʒ̤alɔ nam̤la waɓakʰupʰa aɓantu ɓakʰɔ amasirajɛli ɛz̤wɛni lɛjiputa nɡ̤ɛmikǃɔnd̤isɔ nanɡ̤ɛz̤imanɡ̤a nanɡ̤ɛsanɮa ɛsitʰɛ ŋ̰ǃ̰i nanɡ̤ɛnɡ̤alɔ ɛjɔlukilɛjɔ nanɡ̤ɔlɔjikisɔ ɔlukʰulu waɓanika ɛli liz̤wɛ waɓafunɡ̤ɛlajɔ ɔɔjisɛ ukuɓa uɓanikɛ iliz̤wɛ ɛliɓalɛka nɔɓusi ɓɛz̤a kɛ ɓaliɬala kɔd̤wa aɓalipʰulapʰula iz̤wi lakʰɔ aɓahamɓa nɡ̤ɔmjalɛlɔ wakʰɔ kɔnkɛ ɔwaɓawisɛlajɔ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ ukuɓa ɓakwɛnz̤ɛ aɓakwɛnz̤a waɓaɬisɛla kɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɓu ɓuɓi jaɓɔna iind̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤ɔkuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a z̤ifikilɛ kulɔ mz̤i ukuɓa z̤iwutʰimɓɛ umz̤i kɛ unikɛlwɛ ɛsanɮɛni samakalɛd̤i alwajɔ nawɔ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nanɡ̤ɛnɮala nanɡ̤ɛndʲikitʲa jɔkufa iliz̤wi ɔwalitʰɛtʰajɔ lɛnz̤ɛkilɛ uliɓɔna kɛ wɛna nkɔsi jam jɛhɔv̤a utʰɛ z̤itʰɛnɡ̤ɛlɛ int͡simi nɡ̤ɛmali uŋ̤ǃ̤inisɛ amaŋ̤ǃ̤ina wakuɓɔna ukuɓa umz̤i lɔ unikɛlwɛ ɛsanɮɛni samakalɛd̤i kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɛrɛmija lisitʰi jaɓɔna nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛɲama jɔnkɛ kukʰɔ ntɔ ind̤iŋǃaɓɛlɛjɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ijawunikɛla lɔ mz̤i ɛsanɮɛni samakalɛd̤i nasɛsanɮɛni sikanɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ukuɓa awutʰimɓɛ ɛz̤ɛ amakalɛd̤i alwajɔ nalɔ mz̤i awufakɛ isikʰuni awut͡ʃisɛ nɛz̤inɮu aɓɛkǃʰumisɛla kub̤ahali pʰɛz̤u kɔpʰaɬa lwaz̤ɔ ɓatʰululɛla tʰikǁwɛni ɓamɓi iminikɛlɔ ɛtʰululwajɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓand̤ikǃumɓisɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a ɓajɛ ɓɛsɛnz̤a uɓuɓi ɓɔd̤wa ɛmɛɬwɛni kwasɛɓuŋǀinanɛni ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤aɓakǃumɓisi ɓɔd̤wa nɡ̤ɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lɔ mz̤i waɓa sɔmsind̤ɔ nɔɓuʃuʃu ɓam kususɛla ɔwakʰiwa nɡ̤ajɔ kud̤ɛ kuɓɛ jilɛ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤iwususɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓam nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi ɓɔnkɛ ɓɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a aɓaɓɛnz̤ilɛjɔ ukuɓa ɓand̤ikǃumɓisɛ ɓɔna nɔɔkumkani ɓaɓɔ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaɓɔ naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓaɓɔ naɓaprɔfɛti ɓaɓɔ namad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a naɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm ɓand̤inikɛla ikʰɔsi aɓand̤inikɛla uɓusɔ ɓafund̤iswa ɓɛfund̤iswa aɓapʰulapʰula uɓuɓa ɓakuv̤umɛ ukukǃɛkǃɛʃwa ɓaɓɛka iz̤intɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤inɛz̤ɔtʰɛ ɛnɮwini ɛɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama ukuz̤ɛ ɓajɛnz̤ɛ iŋǃamɓi ɓamakʰɛla ub̤ahali iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a ɛz̤isɛmfulɛni wakwab̤ɛn̤inɔm ukuz̤ɛ ɓaɓakǀand̤isɛlɛ umɔlɛki ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤aɓɔ intɔ ɛnd̤inɡ̤aɓawisɛlanɡ̤a mtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ajɔ ɛnɡ̤atʰanɡ̤a kǃatʰa ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam ukuɓa ɓawɛnz̤ɛ lɔɔ masikiz̤i ukuz̤ɛ ɓawɛnz̤ɛ ɔnɛ amajud̤a kukalɔku kɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kulɔ mz̤i ɛnitʰi unikɛlwɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nanɡ̤ɛnɮala nanɡ̤ɛndʲikitʲa jɔkufa ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ijaɓaɓutʰa ɛmaz̤wɛni ɔnkɛ ɛnd̤aɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛla kuwɔ nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ nanɡ̤ɔɓuʃuʃu ɓam nanɡ̤ɔɓuxalaxumɛ ɔɓukʰulu nd̤ɔɓaɓujisɛla kulɛ nd̤awɔ nd̤iɓaɬalisɛ ɓɛkʰɔlɔsilɛ ɓaja kuɓa nɡ̤aɓantu ɓam nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ nd̤iɓanikɛ intliz̤ijɔ ɛɲɛ nɛnɮɛla ɛɲɛ ukuz̤ɛ ɓand̤ɔjikɛ imiɬa jɔnkɛ kulunɡ̤ɛ kuɓɔ nakɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ nd̤ija kuɓɛnz̤ɛla umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤aɓuji ɛkuɓaland̤ɛlɛni ukuɓa nd̤iɓɛnz̤ɛlɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nd̤iɓɛkɛ ukund̤ɔjika ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jaɓɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓanɡ̤and̤iʃiji nd̤ɔɓa nɛmiɬali nɡ̤aɓɔ nd̤iɓɛnz̤ɛlɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nd̤iɓatʲalɛ kwɛli liz̤wɛ nd̤iɲanisilɛ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jam jɔnkɛ nanɡ̤ɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤aɓaz̤isɛlajɔ aɓa ɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɔɓu ɓuɓi ɓukʰulu kanɡ̤aka nd̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuɓaz̤isɛla kɔnkɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛnd̤ikutʰɛtʰajɔ nɡ̤aɓɔ kuja kutʰɛnɡ̤wa kwɛli liz̤wɛ nitʰi kusɛnkanɡ̤ala alinaɓantu nankɔmɔ linikɛlwɛ ɛsanɮɛni samakalɛd̤i ɓaja kutʰɛnɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛmali ɓawab̤alɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini itʲwinwɛ ɓatʰaɓatʰɛ amaŋ̤ǃ̤ina ɛz̤wɛni lakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nanɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kwijɛrusalɛm nasɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a nasɛmiz̤ini jasɛz̤intaɓɛni nasɛmiz̤ini jasɛz̤itʰaɓaz̤ini nasɛmiz̤ini jɛlasɛz̤ant͡si nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija kukuɓujisa ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kwaɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɛrɛmija ɔkwɛsiɓini ɛsav̤alɛlwɛ ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni jɛntɔlɔnɡ̤ɔ lisitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a umɛnz̤i wɔku ujɛhɔv̤a umjili wɔku ukuɓa akuz̤imasɛ uɡ̤ama lakʰɛ linɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤iŋǃulɛ nd̤ikupʰɛnd̤ulɛ nd̤ikukǁɛlɛlɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inkulu ɛz̤iŋǃaɓilɛjɔ ɔnɡ̤az̤az̤ijɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli nɡ̤az̤ɔ iz̤inɮu z̤alɔ mz̤i nanɡ̤ɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a ɛz̤id̤iliz̤iwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɛnd̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤ɔkuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛk͡xɛlɛ ɓakuɓɔna ukuɓa ɓaz̤a namakalɛd̤i ɓaz̤iz̤alisa nɡ̤ɛz̤id̤umɓu z̤aɓantu ɛnd̤iɓaɓulalajɔ nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ nanɡ̤ɔɓuʃuʃu ɓam ɛkunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤intɔ z̤aɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤imɓi ukuɓa nd̤iɓusitʰɛlisɛ uɓusɔ ɓam kulɔ mz̤i ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤iwuɓɔpʰa nɡ̤ɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤iɓɔt͡ʃwajɔ ɛz̤ipʰilisajɔ nd̤iɓapʰilisɛ nd̤iɓatʰʲilɛlɛ ukupʰupʰuma kɔkǁɔlɔ nɛɲanisɔ nd̤ija kukuɓujisa ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kukajud̤a nɔkutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kukasirajɛli nd̤iɓakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwasɛkukǃalɛni nd̤ɔɓaɬamɓulula ɛɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁɛni ɓaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔnɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ nd̤iɓukǁɔlɛlɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɔnɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ ɓak͡xɛkǃa nɡ̤aɓɔ lɔ mz̤i uja kuɓa liɡ̤ama lɛmiɬali ind̤umisɔ nɛsihɔmɓɔ kwiintlanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi ɛz̤ija kukuv̤a kɔnkɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛnd̤ikwɛnz̤ajɔ kuwɔ z̤inkwantʲɛ z̤iɡ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkulunɡ̤a kɔnkɛ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkǁɔlɔ lɔnkɛ ɛnd̤iwɛnz̤ɛla lɔna ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi kuja kuɓuv̤a kuv̤iwɛ kulɛ nd̤awɔ nit͡ʃɔjɔ ukutʰi iliŋǁuwa ajinaɓantu ajinankɔmɔ ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a nasɛz̤itratwɛni z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm ɛkusɛnkanɡ̤ala kuz̤ɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɓantu ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɓɛmi ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnankɔmɔ kuv̤iwɛ iz̤wi lɛmiɬali nɛz̤wi lɛmiv̤ujɔ iz̤wi lɔmjɛni nɛz̤wi lɔmt͡ʃakaz̤i iz̤wi laɓatʰi ɓulɛlani kujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛlunɡ̤ilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ iŋǀɛɓa jakʰɛ aɓaz̤isa imiɓulɛlɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija kukuɓujisa ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kwɛliz̤wɛ limiwɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwasɛkukǃalɛni ut͡ʃilɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi kulɛ nd̤awɔ iliŋǁuwa inɡ̤ɛnamntu inɡ̤ɛnankɔmɔ nasɛmiz̤ini jajɔ jɔnkɛ kuja kuɓuja kuɓɛkʰɔ ik͡xiwa laɓalusi aɓaɓutʰɛla imiɬamɓi jaɓɔ kulɔ ɛmiz̤ini jasɛz̤intaɓɛni nasɛmiz̤ini jasɛz̤itʰaɓaz̤ini nasɛmiz̤ini jɛlasɛz̤ant͡si nasɛz̤wɛni lakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin nanɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm nasɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a ija kuɓuja iɡ̤ǃ̤itʰɛ imiɬamɓi pʰant͡si kwɛz̤anɮa z̤ɔjiɓalajɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a jaɓɔna kuz̤a imiɬa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnd̤ija iliz̤wi ɛlilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛnd̤alitʰɛtʰajɔ kwinɮu kasirajɛli nakwinɮu kajud̤a nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa nanɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa nd̤ija kum̤lumisɛla ud̤av̤id̤ɛ iɬumɛlɔ lɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɛlija kwɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ nɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɛz̤wɛni nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa lɔna lija kusind̤iswa ɛlakwajud̤a iɬalɛ ikʰɔlɔsilɛ ijɛrusalɛm ukuɓiz̤wa kwajɔ kutʰiwɛ ujɛhɔv̤auɓuɓulunɡ̤isaɓɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ud̤av̤id̤ɛ akaji kuŋǃuɲukɛlwa nd̤ɔd̤a jakuɬala ɛtrɔnɛni jɛnɮu kasirajɛli ɓanɡ̤aŋǃuɲukɛlwa nd̤ɔd̤a aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓanɡ̤aɓalɛv̤i jakuɲusa amad̤ini aɲukajɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓam ikǃʰumisɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛminikɛlɔ jɔkuɮa jɛnz̤ɛ imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ imiɬa jɔnkɛ kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɛrɛmija lisitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ukuɓa nitʰɛ nawapʰula umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɛmini nɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɔɓusuku ukuz̤ɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ naɓusuku nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛlililɔ wɔɓa uja kwapʰulwa nawɔ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ umkʰɔnz̤i ukuɓa anɡ̤aɓi naɲana unɡ̤ukumkani ɛtrɔnɛni jakʰɛ kwanaɓalɛv̤i aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɡ̤ɛnakuɓalwa umkʰɔsi wɛz̤ulu inɡ̤ɛnakulinɡ̤anisɛlwa intlaɓatʰi jɔlwanɮɛ nd̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukujand̤isa imɓɛwu jɔmkʰɔnz̤i ud̤av̤id̤ɛ naɓalɛv̤i aɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛla kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɛrɛmija lisitʰi akukuɓɔni aɓakutʰɛtʰajɔ aɓa ɓantu ɓɛsitʰi imiz̤alwanɛ jɔmiɓini awajiɲulajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ujikǀɛkisilɛ jɔna ɓaɓaɡ̤iɓa kɛ aɓam aɓantu nɡ̤ɔkɔkud̤ɛ ɓanɡ̤aɓi saɓa luɬanɡ̤a pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ukuɓa umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɛmini nɔwɔɓusuku ukuɓa imimisɛlɔ jɛz̤ulu nɛjɛɬaɓatʰi and̤ijimisanɡ̤a nd̤ɔɓa nd̤ija kujikǀɛkisa nɛmɓɛwu kajakɔɓi nɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ umkʰɔnz̤i ukuɓa ɛmɓɛwini jakʰɛ nd̤inɡ̤aɓi satʰaɓatʰa aɓajilawulajɔ imɓɛwu kaaɓraham nɔisakɛ nɔjakɔɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija kukuɓujisa ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kwaɓɔ nd̤iɓɛ nɛmfɛsanɛ kuɓɔ iliz̤wi ɛlafikajɔ kujɛrɛmija liv̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a akuɓɔn ukuɓa unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛnɛmpi jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ nɛz̤ikumkani z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛliz̤wɛ ɛlisɛlulawulwɛni lwɛsanɮa sakʰɛ nɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ujalwa nɛjɛrusalɛm nɛmiz̤i jajɔ jɔnkɛ lalisitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi jija utʰɛtʰɛ kuz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a utʰi kujɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ijawunikɛla lɔ mz̤i ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ukuɓa awut͡ʃisɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ kɛ wɛna akuji kusind̤a ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ inɛnɛ uja kuɓand͡ʒ̤wa unikɛlwɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɔ awaɓɔnɛ amɛɬɔ ɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli umlɔmɔ wakʰɛ utʰɛtʰɛ nɔmlɔmɔ wakʰɔ uv̤ɛ nawɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli kɔd̤wa liv̤ɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a z̤ɛd̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤awɛ ukutʰi akuji lik͡xɛlɛ uja unɔkǁɔlɔ nɡ̤ɔkut͡ʃisɛlwa kɔɔjiɬɔ ɔɔkumkani ɓamand̤ulɔ aɓaɓɛkʰɔ nɡ̤apʰamɓi kwakʰɔ ɓaja kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukukut͡ʃisɛla ɓakumɓamɓaz̤ɛlɛlɛ ɓɛsitʰi atʰi kɛ nkɔsi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ilitʰɛtʰilɛ iliz̤wi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wawatʰɛtʰa kɛ ujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti lɔɔ maz̤wi ɔnkɛ kuz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm jakuɓɔn ukuɓa jɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ijalwa nɛjɛrusalɛm nɛmiz̤i jɔnkɛ jakwajud̤a ɛsɛlɛjɔ nɛlakiʃɛ nɛaz̤ɛka nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kwakusɛlɛ jɔna ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a ijimiz̤i ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ iliz̤wi ɛlafikajɔ kujɛrɛmija liv̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkwɛnz̤a kɔkumkani uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija umŋǃɔpʰisɔ naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm wɔkuv̤akalisa kuɓɔ inkululɛkɔ ɔwɔkuɓa ɛlɔwɔ and̤ululɛ ikʰɔɓɔka lakʰɛ ɛlɔwɔ ikʰɔɓɔkaz̤ana lakʰɛ ɛlinɡ̤um̤ɛb̤ɛrɛ ɛlinɡ̤um̤ɛb̤ɛrɛkaz̤i ɛlikʰululɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ umkʰɔnz̤isajɔ umjud̤a umz̤alwana wakʰɛ ɓapʰulapʰula kɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔnkɛ naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓanɡ̤ɛnajɔ ɛmŋǃɔpʰiswɛni wɔkuɓa ɛlɔwɔ and̤ululɛ ikʰɔɓɔka lakʰɛ ɛlɔwɔ ikʰɔɓɔkaz̤ana lakʰɛ ɛlikʰululɛ anɡ̤aɓi saɓakʰɔnz̤isa ɓapʰulapʰula kɛ ɓaɓand̤ulula ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ ɓad͡ʒ̤ika ɓawaɓujisa amakʰɔɓɔka namakʰɔɓɔkaz̤ana aɓaɓɛwand̤ululɛ ɓɛwakʰululɛ ɓawakǁinz̤ɛlɛla ɛkuɓɛni nɡ̤amakʰɔɓɔka namakʰɔɓɔkaz̤ana kwafika kɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɛrɛmija liv̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi mna nd̤ɛnz̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nɔɔjiɬɔ nd̤aɓakʰupʰa ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa ɛnɮwini jɔɓukʰɔɓɔka nd̤atʰi ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ iz̤ɛ nind̤ululɛ ɛlɔwɔ umz̤alwana wakʰɛ ɔnɡ̤um̤ɛb̤ɛrɛ ɔwaz̤itʰɛnɡ̤isajɔ kuwɛ wɔkukʰɔnz̤a imiɲaka ɛmitʰand̤atʰu umnd̤ululɛ kuwɛ umkʰululɛ kɛ ɔɔjiɬɔ aɓand̤ipʰulapʰulanɡ̤a aɓand̤itʰɔɓɛlanɡ̤a nɮɛɓɛ nina kɛ niɓujilɛ nam̤la nɛnz̤a ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni nɡ̤ɔkuv̤akalisa inkululɛkɔ ɛlɔwɔ kummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ nɛnz̤a umŋǃɔpʰisɔ pʰamɓi ɛnɮwini ɛɓiz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama nad͡ʒ̤ika naliɬamɓɛla iɡ̤ama naɓujisa ɛlɔwɔ ikʰɔɓɔka lakʰɛ ɛlɔwɔ ikʰɔɓɔkaz̤ana lakʰɛ ɛnaniwand̤ululɛ niwakʰululɛ nɡ̤ɔkutʰand̤a kwawɔ nawakǁinz̤ɛlɛla ɛkuɓɛni nɡ̤amakʰɔɓɔka namakʰɔɓɔkaz̤ana nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi anind̤ipʰulapʰulanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuv̤akalisa inkululɛkɔ ɛlɔwɔ kumz̤alwana wakʰɛ ɛlɔwɔ kummɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ jaɓɔnani nd̤iv̤akalisa inkululɛkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a jɔkuja ɛk͡xɛlɛni nasɛnɮalɛni nasɛndʲikitʲɛni jɔkufa nd̤ininikɛlɛ kwiz̤ikumkani z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi ukuz̤ɛ niɓɛ jintɔ jɔkuŋǃakulisa nd̤ija kuwɛnz̤a amad̤ɔd̤a awuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰilɛjɔ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ anɡ̤awaɡ̤ǀ̤inanɡ̤a amaz̤wi ɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ awawɛnz̤ajɔ pʰamɓi aɓɛ lɛlɔ tʰɔlɛ alikǀand̤a kuɓini akǀand̤a pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤aɬulɔ z̤ɛɲama jalɔ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakwajud̤a naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm namaɡ̤ɔsa naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛliz̤wɛ aɓakǀand̤ajɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤aɬulɔ z̤ɛtʰɔlɛ nd̤ija kuɓanikɛla ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤ɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ nasɛz̤anɮɛni z̤aɓafuna umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ z̤iɮiwɛ iz̤id̤umɓu z̤aɓɔ z̤iintaka z̤ɛz̤ulu nanɡ̤amaxamŋǀwa ɔm̤laɓa uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija kɛ wakwajud̤a naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ nd̤ija kuɓanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni saɓafuna umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ nasɛsanɮɛni sɛmpi jɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli jɔna lɛjɔ jɛmkajɔ jaɓɔna nd̤iwisa umtʰɛtʰɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɔkuɓa nd̤iɓaɓujisɛlɛ kulɔ mz̤i ɓalwɛ nawɔ ɓawutʰimɓɛ ɓawut͡ʃisɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ nd̤ijɛnz̤ɛ amaŋǁuwa imiz̤i jakwajud̤a inɡ̤ɛmiwa iliz̤wi ɛlafikajɔ kujɛrɛmija liv̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kajɛhɔjakim uɲana kajɔsija wakwajud̤a lalisitʰi jija ɛnɮwini jamarɛkab̤i utʰɛtʰɛ nawɔ uwanɡ̤ɛnisɛ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a kwɛliɲɛ iɡ̤umɓi uwasɛz̤ɛ iwajini nd̤amtʰaɓatʰa kɛ ujaz̤anija uɲana kajɛrɛmija uɲana kahab̤at͡sinija naɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ nɛnɮu jɔnkɛ jamarɛkab̤i nd̤aɓanɡ̤ɛnisa ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɛɡ̤umɓini kɔɔɲana ɓakahanan uɲana kaiɡ̤ɛd̤alija umfɔ wakwatʰikǁɔ ɛlisɛkǀalɛni kwɛɡ̤umɓi laɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɛlipʰɛz̤u kwɛɡ̤umɓi likamahasɛja uɲana kaʃalum umɡ̤ǀ̤inimɲanɡ̤ɔ nd̤aɓɛka pʰamɓi kɔɔɲana ɓɛnɮu jamarɛkab̤i iind̤ɛɓɛ ɛz̤iz̤ɛlɛ jiwajini nɛɛb̤ɛkilɛ nd̤atʰi kuɓɔ sɛlani iwajini ɓatʰi ɓɔna asijisɛli iwajini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɔnad̤ab̤i uɲana karɛkab̤i uɓawɔ wasiwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkutʰi z̤ɛ ninɡ̤asɛli wajini nɔɔɲana ɓɛnu napʰakad̤ɛ ninɡ̤akʰi z̤inɮu ninɡ̤aɬwajɛli mɓɛwu ninɡ̤atʲali sid̤ilija ninɡ̤aɓi naz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ kɛ nɔɬala ɛz̤intɛntɛni jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɛnu ukuz̤ɛ nipʰilɛ imiɬa ɛmininz̤i pʰɛz̤u kɔm̤laɓa ɛninɡ̤aɓapʰamɓukɛli kuwɔ silipʰulapʰulɛ kɛ iz̤wi likajɔnad̤ab̤i uɲana karɛkab̤i uɓawɔ kukɔ kɔnkɛ awasiwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ ukuɓa sinɡ̤asɛli wajini jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɛtʰu tʰina naɓafaz̤i ɓɛtʰu nɔɔɲana ɓɛtʰu nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤ɛtʰu wɔkuɓa sinɡ̤akʰi naz̤inɮu z̤ɔkuɓa siɬalɛ kuz̤ɔ sinɡ̤aɓi naz̤id̤ilija nant͡simi namɓɛwu siɬɛli ɛz̤intɛntɛni sɛv̤a sɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awasiwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ ujɔnad̤ab̤i uɓawɔ kɛ kalɔku kwatʰi ɛkuɲukɛni kukanɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛsiz̤a kwɛli liz̤wɛ satʰi jiz̤ani sinɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛmpi jamakalɛd̤i nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛmpi jamaaram saɬala kɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm apʰa kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɛrɛmija lisitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi jija utʰi kumad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a nakuɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm anikuv̤umi ukukǃɛkǃɛʃwa ukuɓa niwapʰulapʰulɛ amaz̤wi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a aɡ̤ǀ̤iniwɛ amaz̤wi kajɔnad̤ab̤i uɲana karɛkab̤i awaɓawisɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ukuɓa ɓanɡ̤asɛli wajini aɓasɛli unanam̤la ɓawupʰulapʰula kɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ kajisɛ kɛ nd̤atʰɛtʰa nd̤itʰɛtʰa nd̤iv̤uka anind̤ipʰulapʰulanɡ̤a nd̤aɓatʰumɛla ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓam aɓaprɔfɛti nd̤iɓatʰuma nd̤iv̤uka nd̤isitʰi kʰaniɓujɛ ɛlɔwɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni jakʰɛ ɛmɓi nilunɡ̤isɛ iintlɔnd̤i z̤ɛnu ninɡ̤aland̤ɛli tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi ukuz̤ɛ niɓakʰɔnz̤ɛ nɔɬala kɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni ɛnd̤awunika nɔɔjiɬɔ kɛ aniz̤itʰɔɓanɡ̤a iinɮɛɓɛ z̤ɛnu anind̤ipʰulapʰulanɡ̤a inɛnɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakajɔnad̤ab̤i uɲana karɛkab̤i ɓawuɡ̤ǀ̤inilɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ kajisɛ awaɓawisɛlajɔ kɛ ɓɔna aɓa ɓantu aɓand̤ipʰulapʰuli nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤iwaz̤isɛla amajud̤a naɓɛmi ɓɔnkɛ ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm ɓɔnkɛ ɔɓu ɓuɓi nd̤atʰɛtʰajɔ nɡ̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa nd̤atʰɛtʰa kuɓɔ aɓɛv̤a nd̤aɓaɓiz̤a aɓasaɓɛla ujɛrɛmija watʰi kwinɮu jamarɛkab̤i ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa niwupʰulapʰulɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ kajɔnad̤ab̤i ujiɬɔ najiɡ̤ǀ̤ina jɔnkɛ imitʰɛtʰɔ jakʰɛ nɛnz̤a nɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awaniwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi ujɔnad̤ab̤i uɲana karɛkab̤i akaji kuŋǃuɲukɛlwa nd̤ɔd̤a jakuma pʰamɓi jɔnkɛ imiɬa kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsinɛ kajɛhɔjakim uɲana kajɔsija wakwajud̤a ɛli liz̤wi kujɛrɛmija liv̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi tʰaɓatʰɛla kuwɛ iŋǀwad̤i ɛsɔnɡ̤wajɔ uwab̤alɛ kujɔ ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi ɛnd̤awatʰɛtʰa kuwɛ nɡ̤amasirajɛli nanɡ̤amajud̤a nanɡ̤ɛɛntlanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ kususɛla ɛnd̤atʰɛtʰajɔ kuwɛ utʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛmiɬɛni kajɔsija ud̤ɛ uz̤ɛ kulɛ m̤lawumɓi inɮu kajud̤a inɡ̤aɓupʰulapʰula ɓɔnkɛ uɓuɓi ɛnd̤ikǀinɡ̤a ukuɓɛnz̤a kuɓɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓaɓujɛ ɛlɔwɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni jakʰɛ ɛmɓi nd̤iɓukǁɔlɛlɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ nɛsɔnɔ saɓɔ ujɛrɛmija waɓiz̤a ub̤aruki uɲana kanɛrija wawab̤ala ɛŋǀwad̤ini ɛsɔnɡ̤wajɔ ub̤aruki ɛpʰuma ɛmlɔɲɛni kajɛrɛmija ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi kajɛhɔv̤a awawatʰɛtʰajɔ kujɛ ujɛrɛmija wamwisɛla ub̤aruki umtʰɛtʰɔ ɛsitʰi mna nd̤iv̤alɛlwɛ and̤inakɔ ukuja ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a jija wɛna uwalɛsɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini ɛsɔnɡ̤wajɔ lɛjɔ ujib̤alilɛjɔ ɛpʰuma ɛmlɔɲɛni amaz̤wi kajɛhɔv̤a ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤aɓantu ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɔkuz̤ila ukuɮa uwalɛsɛ nasɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤amajud̤a ɔnkɛ av̤ɛla ɛmiz̤ini jawɔ m̤lawumɓi ukutaxuz̤isa kwaɓɔ kunɡ̤awa pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɓaɓujɛ ɛlɔwɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni jakʰɛ ɛmɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa mkʰulu umsind̤ɔ nɔɓuʃuʃu aɓutʰɛtʰilɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤aɓa ɓantu wɛnz̤a kɛ ub̤aruki uɲana kanɛrija nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ aɓɛmwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ ujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti wɔkuɓa awalɛsɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini amaz̤wi kajɛhɔv̤a ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi kajɛhɔjakim uɲana kajɔsija wakwajud̤a nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsitʰɔɓa ɓamɛma uz̤ilɔ lɔkuɮa pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a kuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm nakuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛv̤ɛlɛ ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a ɓɛz̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm ub̤aruki wawalɛsa ɛŋǀwad̤ini amaz̤wi kajɛrɛmija ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɛɡ̤umɓini likaɡ̤ɛmarija uɲana kaʃafan umb̤ali ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛpʰɛz̤ulu ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɛlit͡ʃa lɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ wawɛv̤a umikaja uɲana kaɡ̤ɛmarija uɲana kaʃafan ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi kajɛhɔv̤a ɛŋǀwad̤ini wɛɬa waja ɛnɮwini jɔkumkani ɛɡ̤umɓini lɔmb̤ali naɓɔ ɓɛɬɛli kʰɔna aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɛliʃama umb̤ali nɔd̤ɛlaja uɲana kaʃɛmaja nɔɛlinatan uɲana kaakɛb̤ɔrɛ nɔɡ̤ɛmarija uɲana kaʃafan nɔz̤ɛd̤ɛkija uɲana kahananija naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔnkɛ umikaja waɓakǁɛlɛla ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi aɓɛwav̤ilɛ ɛkulɛsɛni kukab̤aruki ɛŋǀwad̤ini ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓatʰumɛla kub̤aruki ujɛhud̤i uɲana kanɛtanija uɲana kaʃɛlɛmija uɲana kakuʃi ɓɛsitʰi iŋǀwad̤i ɛsɔnɡ̤wajɔ lɛjɔ ulɛsɛ kujɔ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤aɓantu jipʰatʰɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɔ uz̤ɛ ub̤aruki uɲana kanɛrija wajipʰatʰa kɛ iŋǀwad̤i ɛsɔnɡ̤wajɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɛ wɛz̤a kuɓɔ ɓatʰi kujɛ kʰawuɬalɛ pʰant͡si ujilɛsɛ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤ɛtʰu wajilɛsa kɛ ub̤aruki ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤aɓɔ kwatʰi ɓakuwɛv̤a ɔnkɛ lɔɔ maz̤wi ɓankwantʲa ɛlɔwɔ ɛb̤ɛka kɔwaɓɔ ɓatʰi kub̤aruki simɛlwɛ kukumkǁɛlɛla ɔnkɛ maz̤wi ɓamɓuz̤a ub̤aruki ɓɛsitʰi kʰawusikǁɛlɛlɛ utʰɛni ukuwab̤ala ɔnkɛ maz̤wi ɛpʰuma ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɛ watʰi ub̤aruki kuɓɔ wawatʰɛtʰa ɔnkɛ maz̤wi apʰuma ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɛ nd̤awab̤ala ɛŋǀwad̤ini lɛ nɡ̤ɛinki ɓatʰi aɓatʰɛtʰɛli kub̤aruki hamɓa ujɛ kuz̤imɛla wɛna nɔjɛrɛmija kunɡ̤az̤i apʰɔ nikʰɔna ɓanɡ̤ɛna kɛ ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɓɛjiɓɛkɛ iŋǀwad̤i ɛsɔnɡ̤wajɔ ɛɡ̤umɓini likaɛliʃama umb̤ali ɓawakǁɛla ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤ɔkumkani ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi lawɔ ukumkani watʰuma ujɛhud̤i ukuɓa ajitʰaɓatʰɛ iŋǀwad̤i ɛsɔnɡ̤wajɔ wajitʰaɓatʰa kɛ ɛɡ̤umɓini likaɛliʃama umb̤ali ujɛhud̤i wajilɛsa ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤ɔkumkani nasɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔnkɛ aɓamɛlɛ nɡ̤akukumkani kɛ kalɔku wajɛɬɛli ɛnɮwini jasɛɓusika nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsitʰɔɓa kuɓasiwɛ ɛlukʰamɓɛni pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ kwatʰi kǁa ujɛhud̤i aɓɛlɛsɛ imikǃɔlɔ ɛmitʰatʰu nɔkuɓa minɛ wajikǃwɛnɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛsit͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ sɔmb̤ali wajipʰɔsa ɛmlilwɛni ɔɓusɛlukʰamɓɛni jad̤a jat͡ʃa jaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla jɔnkɛ iŋǀwad̤i ɛsɔnɡ̤wajɔ ɛmlilwɛni ɔɓusɛlukʰamɓɛni aɓankwantʲanɡ̤a aɓaz̤ik͡xaz̤ulanɡ̤a iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤aɓɔ naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ aɓaɓɛwɛv̤a lɔɔ maz̤wi ɔnkɛ nɔkɔ kɛ ɓamɓɔnɡ̤ɔz̤ajɔ ɔɔɛlinatan nɔd̤ɛlaja nɔɡ̤ɛmarija ukuɓa anɡ̤ajit͡ʃisi iŋǀwad̤i ɛsɔnɡ̤wajɔ akaɓapʰulapʰula ukumkani waɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ ɔɔjɛramɛli uɲana nɔsɛraja uɲana kaaz̤ɛrijɛli nɔʃɛlɛmija uɲana kaab̤ɛd̤ɛli ukuɓa ɓamɓamɓɛ ub̤aruki umb̤ali nɔjɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti ujɛhɔv̤a waɓaz̤imɛz̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɛrɛmija ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa aɓɛjit͡ʃisilɛ iŋǀwad̤i ɛsɔnɡ̤wajɔ namaz̤wi aɓɛwab̤alilɛ ub̤aruki ɛpʰuma ɛmlɔɲɛni kajɛrɛmija lisitʰi ɓuja utʰaɓatʰɛ ɛɲɛ iŋǀwad̤i ɛsɔnɡ̤wajɔ ub̤alɛ kujɔ ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi ɔkukǃala aɓɛsɛŋǀwad̤ini ɛsɔnɡ̤wajɔ jɔkukǃala awajit͡ʃisajɔ ujɛhɔjakim wakwajud̤a uz̤ɛ utʰi kujɛhɔjakim wakwajud̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi wɛna ujit͡ʃisilɛ lɛ ŋǀwad̤i isɔnɡ̤wajɔ usitʰi jini ukuɓa ub̤alɛ kujɔ ukutʰi ukumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli uja kuz̤a ɛz̤ɛ alɔnakalisɛ ɛli liz̤wɛ apʰɛlisɛ nɛnkɔmɔ kulɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kujɛhɔjakim wakwajud̤a ukutʰi akuji kuɓakʰɔ ɓani wakwakʰɛ kujɛ uɬalajɔ ɛtrɔnɛni kad̤av̤id̤ɛ isid̤umɓu sakʰɛ sija kulaɬɛlwa ɛɓuʃuʃwini ɓɛlanɡ̤a ɛmini nasɛkǃaɓakɛni ɛɓusuku nd̤ija kumv̤ɛlɛla jɛna nɛmɓɛwu jakʰɛ naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ nd̤iɓuz̤isɛlɛ ɓɔna naɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm namad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a ɓɔnkɛ uɓuɓi ɛnd̤aɓutʰɛtʰajɔ kuɓɔ kɛ aɓapʰulapʰula ujɛrɛmija watʰaɓatʰa ɛɲɛ iŋǀwad̤i ɛsɔnɡ̤wajɔ wajinika ub̤aruki uɲana kanɛrija umb̤ali wawab̤ala kujɔ ɛpʰuma ɛmlɔɲɛni kajɛrɛmija ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi ɛŋǀwad̤i awajit͡ʃisajɔ ujɛhɔjakim wakwajud̤a nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ kɔnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛlɛlwa kuwɔ amaz̤wi amaninz̤i and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤awɔ kɛ kalɔku uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija uɲana kajɔsija waɓa nɡ̤ukumkani ɛsikʰunɮɛni sikakɔnijahu uɲana kajɛhɔjakim ɔwɛnz̤iwa ɛz̤wɛni lakwajud̤a nɡ̤unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli akawapʰulapʰula najɛ naɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ naɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ amaz̤wi kajɛhɔv̤a awawatʰɛtʰajɔ nɡ̤ɔjɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti ukumkani uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija watʰuma ɔɔjɛhukali uɲana kaʃɛlɛmija nɔz̤ɛfanija uɲana kamahasɛja umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli kujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti ɛsitʰi kʰawusitʰand̤az̤ɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ujɛrɛmija kɛ uɓɛnɡ̤ɛna ɛpʰuma pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu ɓɛnɡ̤ɛkamfaki ɛntɔlɔnɡ̤wɛni kɛ kalɔku kafarɔ iɓipʰumɛ ɛjiputa az̤iv̤a iind̤aɓa z̤ajɔ amakalɛd̤i aɓɛjiŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a ijɛrusalɛm ɛsuka ɛmka ɛjɛrusalɛm kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti lisitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi jit͡ʃɔni wakwajud̤a ɔnitʰumɛ ukuz̤a kuɓuz̤isa ukutʰi jaɓɔnani kafarɔ ɛpʰumɛ isiz̤a ukuniŋǀɛd̤a ija kuɓujɛla ɛz̤wɛni lajɔ ɛjiputa aɓujɛ kɛ amakalɛd̤i alwɛ nalɔ mz̤i awutʰimɓɛ awut͡ʃisɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi musani ukuz̤ikʰɔɬisa nɡ̤ɔkwɛnu nisitʰi aja kaɲɛ kutʰi amakalɛd̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akaji inɛnɛ niɓɛ ninɡ̤afanɛlana nijikǁaɓɛlɛ jɔnkɛ jamakalɛd̤i alwajɔ kujɔ amad̤ɔd̤a az̤iiŋ̤ǁ̤wɛlɛra aɓɛja kuv̤uka ɛlɔwɔ ɛntɛntɛni jakʰɛ awut͡ʃisɛ lɔ mz̤i nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ kwatʰi ɛkumkɛni kwɛmpi jamakalɛd̤i ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛmpi kafarɔ wapʰuma ujɛrɛmija ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛsija ɛz̤wɛni lakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ukuɓa atʰaɓatʰɛ kʰɔna isaɬulɛlɔ sakʰɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu kwatʰi ɛsɛsanɡ̤wɛni lakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɛkʰɔna nɔmpʰatʰiɓalind̤i ɔɡ̤ama linɡ̤uirija uɲana kaʃɛlɛmija uɲana kahananija wamɓamɓa ujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti ɛsitʰi upʰamɓɛla kumakalɛd̤i watʰi ujɛrɛmija ujakǁɔka and̤ipʰamɓɛli kumakalɛd̤i kɛ akampʰulapʰula uirija wamɓamɓa ujɛrɛmija kuɓatʰɛtʰɛli aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamkǃumɓɛla ujɛrɛmija ɓamɓɛtʰa ɓamfaka ɛnɮwini jaɓaɓand͡ʒ̤wa ɛnɮwini jɔmb̤ali ujɔnatan nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛjɛnz̤ɛ intɔlɔnɡ̤ɔ kǁa ujɛrɛmija ɛɓɛnɡ̤ɛnilɛ ɛnɮwini ɛnɡ̤um̤ad̤i ɛz̤inɡ̤ɔnt͡sini waɬala kʰɔna ujɛrɛmija imiɬa ɛmininz̤i utʰɛ kɛ uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija watʰumɛla wamtʰaɓatʰa wamɓuz̤a ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ nɡ̤asɛsɛ watʰi kukʰɔ liz̤wi lipʰuma kujɛhɔv̤a watʰi ujɛrɛmija likʰɔ watʰi uja kunikɛlwa ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli watʰi ujɛrɛmija uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija nd̤ɔnɛ nɡ̤antɔni kuwɛ nakuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ nakwaɓa ɓantu ukuɓa nind̤ifakɛ ɛntɔlɔnɡ̤wɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɓapʰi kɛ aɓaprɔfɛti ɓɛnu aɓaɓɛprɔfɛta ɓɛsitʰi ukumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli akaji kunifikɛla nalɔ ɛli liz̤wɛ kalɔku kɛ kʰawupʰulapʰulɛ nkɔsi jam makuwɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ ukutaxuz̤isa ukund̤iɓujisɛla ɛnɮwini kajɔnatan umb̤ali ɬɛz̤ɛ nd̤ifɛlɛ kʰɔna ukumkani uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija umtʰɛtʰɔ ɓamɓɛka ujɛrɛmija ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni jaɓalind̤i ɓamnika intɛnd̤a jɛsɔnka imiɬa nɡ̤ɛmiɬa ɛsitratwɛni saɓɔd͡ʒ̤i sad̤a sapʰɛla sɔnkɛ isɔnka pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i ujɛrɛmija waɬala kɛ ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni jaɓalind̤i kɛ kalɔku uʃɛfatija uɲana kamatan nɔɡ̤ɛd̤alija uɲana kapaʃurɛ nɔjukali uɲana kaʃɛlɛmija nɔpaʃurɛ uɲana kamalɛkija ɓawɛv̤a amaz̤wi aɓɛwatʰɛtʰa ujɛrɛmija kuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɛsitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɔɬala kulɔ mz̤i wɔfa lik͡xɛlɛ najinɮala najindʲikitʲa jɔkufa ɔpʰuma ajɛ kumakalɛd̤i wɔpʰila uɓɛ likǁʰɔɓa kujɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ apʰilɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi lɔ mz̤i uja kunikɛlwa ɛsanɮɛni sɛmpi jɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli awutʰimɓɛ ɓatʰi kɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli majiɓulawɛ lɛ nd̤ɔd̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔkwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ iz̤anɮa z̤amad̤ɔd̤a ɔkulwa asɛlɛjɔ kulɔ mz̤i nɛz̤anɮa z̤aɓantu ɓɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkutʰɛtʰa kuɓɔ amaz̤wi and͡ʒ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lɛ nd̤ɔd̤a ajiluŋ̤ǁ̤amɛlɛ ukǁɔlɔ lwaɓa ɓantu iŋ̤ǁ̤amɛlɛ uɓuɓi ɓaɓɔ watʰi uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija jaɓɔnani usɛz̤anɮɛni z̤ɛnu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛnɡ̤ɛnakutʰini ɛnɡ̤ɛnani ɓamtʰaɓatʰa ujɛrɛmija ɓampʰɔsa ɛm̤ad̤ini kamalɛkija uɲana wɔkumkani ɔɓusɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni jaɓalind̤i ɓam̤lisa ujɛrɛmija nɡ̤ɛz̤intʲa ɛm̤ad̤ini lɔwɔ unɡ̤ɛnamanz̤i unɔd̤aka wat͡ʃɔna ɛlud̤akɛni ujɛrɛmija wɛv̤a uɛb̤ɛd̤imɛlɛki umkuʃi ind̤ɔd̤a ɛlitʰɛnwa ɛɓisɛnɮwini jɔkumkani ukuɓa ɓamfakɛ ɛm̤ad̤ini ujɛrɛmija kɛ uɓɛɬɛli ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lakwab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin wapʰuma uɛb̤ɛd̤imɛlɛki ɛnɮwini jɔkumkani watʰɛtʰa ɛsitʰi nkɔsi jam mad̤ɔd̤a ɛnz̤ɛ intɔ ɛmɓi nɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ akwɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti lɔ ampʰɔsa ɛm̤ad̤ini uja jinɮala kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ akujɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akusɛkʰɔ sɔnka kulɔ mz̤i ukumkani wamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ uɛb̤ɛd̤imɛlɛki umkuʃi ɛsitʰi tʰaɓatʰa apʰa amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amaʃumi amatʰatʰu asɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ umxɔlɛ ujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti ɛm̤ad̤ini ɛnɡ̤ɛkafi uɛb̤ɛd̤imɛlɛki watʰaɓatʰa amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ asɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ waja ɛnɮwini jɔkumkani nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwɛnɮu jɔɓuŋǀwanɛ watʰaɓatʰa kʰɔna amaɮav̤u ɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤ik͡xaz̤ukilɛjɔ nawɛz̤ɔnakɛlɛjɔ wawatʰɔɓɛla kujɛrɛmija ɛm̤ad̤ini nɡ̤ɛz̤intʲa watʰi uɛb̤ɛd̤imɛlɛki umkuʃi kujɛrɛmija kʰawuɓɛkɛ maɮav̤u ɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤ik͡xaz̤ukilɛjɔ nawɛz̤ɔnakɛlɛjɔ pʰant͡si kwamakʰwapʰa akʰɔ nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwɛz̤intʲa wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ujɛrɛmija ɓamxɔla ujɛrɛmija nɡ̤ɛz̤intʲa ɓamɲusa ɛm̤ad̤ini ujɛrɛmija waɬala ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni jaɓalind̤i watʰuma uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wamtʰaɓatʰɛla kujɛ ujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛsitʰatʰu ɔsɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a watʰi kujɛrɛmija nd̤ija kukuɓuz̤a ind̤awɔ uz̤ɛ unɡ̤afiɬi ntɔ watʰi ujɛrɛmija kuz̤ɛd̤ɛkija ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤akukǁɛlɛla akuji kund̤iɓulala und̤iɓulalɛ nɔkuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤akukǀɛɓisa akuji kund̤ipʰulapʰula ukumkani uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wamfunɡ̤ɛla ujɛrɛmija nɡ̤asɛsɛ ɛsitʰi ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔwasɛnz̤ɛla lɔ mpʰɛfumlɔ inɛnɛ and̤iji kukuɓulala and̤iji kukunikɛla ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤alɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a awufunajɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ watʰi ujɛrɛmija kuz̤ɛd̤ɛkija ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi ukuɓa utʰɛ wapʰuma ukupʰuma ɔku waja kuɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli wɔpʰila umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ nalɔ mz̤i unɡ̤at͡ʃiswa nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ upʰilɛ wɛna nɛnɮu jakʰɔ kɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ akwapʰuma ujɛ kuɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli lɔ mz̤i wɔnikɛlwa ɛsanɮɛni samakalɛd̤i awut͡ʃisɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ wɛna kɛ unɡ̤asind̤i ɛsanɮɛni sawɔ ukumkani uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija watʰi kujɛrɛmija nd̤inɛsitʰukutʰɛz̤i nɡ̤amajud̤a apʰamɓɛlɛ kumakalɛd̤i ɬɛz̤ɛ and̤inikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sawɔ afɛkɛtʰɛ nɡ̤am watʰi ujɛrɛmija akaji kukunikɛla kʰawulipʰulapʰulɛ iz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔkɔ nd̤ilitʰɛtʰilɛjɔ kuwɛ kɔlunɡ̤a kuwɛ upʰilɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ kɛ ukuɓa utʰɛ akwav̤uma ukupʰuma iliz̤wi and̤iɓɔnisɛ lɔna ujɛhɔv̤a lɔkutʰi jaɓɔna ɓɔnkɛ aɓafaz̤i aɓasɛlɛjɔ ɛnɮwini jɔkumkani wakwajud̤a ɓaja kukʰut͡ʃwa ɓasiwɛ kuɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɓatʰi aɓafaz̤i aɓɔ amad̤ɔd̤a akǁɔlɛlɛnɛ nawɛ akukǁʰɔkɔŋǁilɛ akwɛjisilɛ z̤it͡ʃɔnilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɛmɡ̤ǁ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤wɛni iiɲawɔ z̤akʰɔ wɔna aɓuja umv̤a kɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓafaz̤i ɓakʰɔ nɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ ɓaja kukʰut͡ʃwa ɓasiwɛ kumakalɛd̤i unɡ̤asind̤i wɛna ɛsanɮɛni sawɔ kɛ wɛna uja kuɓand͡ʒ̤wa sisanɮa sɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ut͡ʃisisɛ lɔ mz̤i nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija watʰi kujɛrɛmija la maz̤wi makanɡ̤az̤iwa ukuz̤ɛ unɡ̤afi kǁa kɛ ɓatʰɛ ɓɛv̤a aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ukuɓa nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ nawɛ ɓɛz̤a kuwɛ ɓatʰi kuwɛ kʰawusikǁɛlɛlɛ ɔkɔ ukutʰɛtʰilɛjɔ ukukufiɬa kutʰi asiji kukuɓulala kwanakutʰɛtʰilɛjɔ kuwɛ wɔtʰi kuɓɔ nd̤iwisɛ utaxuz̤isɔ pʰamɓi kɔkumkani ukuɓa anɡ̤and̤iɓujisɛli ɛnɮwini kajɔnatan nd̤ifɛlɛ kʰɔna ɓɛz̤a kujɛrɛmija ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓamɓuz̤a waɓakǁɛlɛla nɡ̤ɔkwalɔɔ maz̤wi ɔnkɛ aɓɛwisɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤awɔ ɓatʰi ɓɛmka kujɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ajiv̤akalanɡ̤a lɛ ntɔ waɬala ujɛrɛmija ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni jaɓalind̤i kwad̤a kwanɡ̤um̤la ɛjatʰind͡ʒ̤wa nɡ̤awɔ ijɛrusalɛm kwatʰi kǁɛnikwɛni ijɛrusalɛm iɓitʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsitʰɔɓa kaz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛʃumi akuɓɔn ukuɓa ufikilɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ nɛmpi jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ ɓajiŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinamɲɛ kaz̤ɛd̤ɛkija nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsinɛ nɡ̤ɔlwɛsitʰɔɓa ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ waɡ̤ǃ̤ɔd͡ʒ̤ɔz̤wa umz̤i ɓafika ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɓaɬala ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lapʰakatʰi ɔɔnɛrɡ̤alɛʃarɛt͡sɛrɛ nɔsamɡ̤arɛnɛb̤ɔ nɔsarsɛkim umtʰɛtʰɛli wamatʰɛnwa nɔnɛrɡ̤alɛʃarɛt͡sɛrɛ umtʰɛtʰɛli wɛz̤az̤i naɓaɲɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔnkɛ ɓɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli kwatʰi akuɓaɓɔna uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a namad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ ɔkulwa ɓaɓalɛka ɓapʰuma nɡ̤ɔɓusuku pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɔmjɛz̤ɔ wɔkumkani nɡ̤ɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɛlipʰakatʰi kwɛɛnd̤ɔnɡ̤a ɓapʰuma nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛarab̤a impi jamakalɛd̤i jaɓasukɛla jamfikɛla uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija ɛz̤iŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsini z̤asɛjɛrikɔ jamtʰaɓatʰa jɛɲuka najɛ jamsa kunɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛrib̤ɛla ɛz̤wɛni lasɛhamati atʰɛtʰwa kʰɔna amatʲala akʰɛ ukumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli waɓaɓulala ɔɔɲana ɓakaz̤ɛd̤ɛkija ɛrib̤ɛla ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ naɓanumz̤ana ɓɔnkɛ ɓakwajud̤a waɓaɓulala wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli wamtʰʲapʰaz̤a amɛɬɔ uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wamkʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰a nɡ̤amakʰamand̤ɛla ɔb̤ɛd̤u ukuɓa asiwɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli amakalɛd̤i ajit͡ʃisa nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ inɮu jɔkumkani nɛz̤inɮu z̤aɓantu az̤id̤iliz̤a nɛɛnd̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm amasalɛla aɓantu aɓasɛlɛjɔ pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i amapʰamɓa apʰamɓɛlajɔ kujɛ kwanamasalɛla aɓantu aɓasɛlɛjɔ waɓafud̤usɛla ɛb̤ab̤ɛli unɛb̤uz̤arad̤an umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki kɛ iŋǁɛɲɛ jaɓantu aɓaz̤iz̤iswɛli aɓanɡ̤ɛnantɔ ijintɔ unɛb̤uz̤arad̤an jaɓasiki wajiʃija ɛz̤wɛni lakwajud̤a wajinika iz̤id̤ilija nɡ̤alɔɔ m̤la kɛ kalɔku unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ɔjɛrɛmija nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikanɛb̤uz̤arad̤an umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki ɛsitʰi mtʰaɓatʰɛ umisɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɔ kujɛ unɡ̤ɛnz̤i ntɔ imɓi kujɛ wɔtʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ akutʰɛtʰajɔ kuwɛ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kujɛ kɛ ɓatʰuma ɔɔnɛb̤uz̤arad̤an umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki nɔnɛb̤uʃaz̤ɛb̤an umtʰɛtʰɛli wamatʰɛnwa nɔnɛrɡ̤alɛʃarɛt͡sɛrɛ umtʰɛtʰɛli wɛz̤az̤i naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔnkɛ ɓɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɓatʰuma ɓamtʰaɓatʰa ujɛrɛmija ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni jaɓalind̤i ɓamnikɛla kuɡ̤ɛd̤alija uɲana kaahikam uɲana kaʃafan ukuɓa amkʰupʰɛ amsɛ ɛkʰaja waɬala kɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu kɛ kalɔku kwajɛ kufikɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɛrɛmija akuɓa ɛv̤alɛlwɛ ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni jaɓalind̤i lisitʰi jija utʰi kuɛb̤ɛd̤imɛlɛki umkuʃi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi jaɓɔna amaz̤wi nd̤iwaz̤isɛla uɓuɓi kulɔ mz̤i and̤iwaz̤isɛli ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ aja kwɛnz̤ɛka pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ m̤la kɛ nd̤ɔkuɬanɡ̤ula nɡ̤alɔɔ m̤la ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤anikɛlwa ɛsanɮɛni samad̤ɔd̤a ɔŋǁunɡ̤upʰɛlɛjɔ nɡ̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɛnɛ nd̤ija kukusiz̤a unɡ̤awi lik͡xɛlɛ uja kuɓa likǁʰɔɓa kuwɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤am ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a iliz̤wi ɛlafikajɔ kujɛrɛmija liv̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa ɛɓɛnd̤ululwɛ ɛrama nɡ̤unɛb̤uz̤arad̤an umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki ɛkumtʰaɓatʰɛni kwakʰɛ ɛkʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰iwɛ nɡ̤ɛmikǁɔkɛlɛlwanɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓafud̤usiwɛjɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm naɓakwajud̤a aɓaɓɛfud̤usɛlwa ɛb̤ab̤ɛli umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki wamtʰaɓatʰa kɛ ujɛrɛmija watʰi kujɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ watʰɛtʰa ɔɓu ɓuɓi nɡ̤alɛ nd̤awɔ ujɛhɔv̤a waɓufikisa wɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wakutʰɛtʰajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɔnajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a analipʰulapʰula iz̤wi lakʰɛ jaɓakʰɔ kɛ lɛ ntɔ kalɔku kɛ jaɓɔna nd̤ijajikǀɔmɓulula nam̤la imikǁɔkɛlɛlwanɛ ɛsɛz̤anɮɛni z̤akʰɔ ukuɓa kutʰɛ kwalunɡ̤a ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ ukuja ɛb̤ab̤ɛli jiz̤a nd̤ɔlimisa ilisɔ kuwɛ ukuɓa kutʰɛ kwakuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ ukuja ɛb̤ab̤ɛli jɛka kɛ ujaɓɔna iliz̤wɛ lɔnkɛ lipʰamɓi kwakʰɔ ukuja apʰɔ kutʰɛ kwalunɡ̤a kwatʰi tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ ɔkɔ kɔkwakʰɔ jija kʰɔna utʰɛ kɛ ɛnɡ̤ɛkaɓuji watʰi ɓujɛla kuɡ̤ɛd̤alija uɲana kaahikam uɲana kaʃafan ɔwɛnz̤iwa umv̤ɛlɛli nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a uɬalɛ najɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu ɔkaɲɛ ujɛ apʰɔ kutʰɛ tʲɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɔ ukuja kʰɔna umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki umkǁʰɛʃɔ nɛsipʰɔ wamnd̤ulula ujɛrɛmija waja kuɡ̤ɛd̤alija uɲana kaahikam ɛmiz̤pa waɬala najɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu aɓaɓɛsɛlɛ ɛliz̤wɛni kɛ kalɔku ɓɛv̤a ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛz̤impi ɛz̤isɛnɮɛ ɓɔna namad̤ɔd̤a aɓɔ ukuɓa wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli umɛnz̤ɛ umv̤ɛlɛli wɛliz̤wɛ uɡ̤ɛd̤alija uɲana kaahikam nɔkuɓa umɛnz̤ɛ umv̤ɛlɛli
