wamad̤ɔd̤a naɓafaz̤i naɓantwana nɛz̤iswɛli z̤ɛliz̤wɛ kwaɓaɓɛnɡ̤afud̤usɛlwanɡ̤a ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɓɛz̤a kɛ kuɡ̤ɛd̤alija ɛmiz̤pa inɡ̤uiʃmajɛli uɲana kanɛtanija nɔjɔhanan nɔjɔnatan ɔɔɲana ɓakakarɛɓa nɔsɛraja uɲana katanumɛtɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakaɛfaji wasɛnɛtɔfa nɔjɛz̤anija wasɛmahaka ɓɔna namad̤ɔd̤a aɓɔ uɡ̤ɛd̤alija uɲana kaahikam uɲana kaʃafan waɓafunɡ̤ɛla namad̤ɔd̤a aɓɔ ɛsitʰi musani ukɔjika ukuwakʰɔnz̤a amakalɛd̤i ɬalani kwɛli liz̤wɛ nimkʰɔnz̤ɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli kulunɡ̤ɛ jaɓɔnani nd̤iɬɛli ɛmiz̤pa ukuz̤ɛ nd̤imɛ pʰamɓi kwamakalɛd̤i aja kuz̤a kutʰi kɛ ɬanɡ̤anisani iwajini nɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤asɛɬɔtʲɛni nɛɔli niɓɛkɛ ɛz̤itʲɛni z̤ɛnu niɬalɛ ɛmiz̤ini jɛnu ɛnitʰɛ najitʰimɓa namajud̤a ɔnkɛ aɓɛ ɛkwɛlakwamɔwab̤i nakɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn nakwɛlakwaɛd̤ɔm naɓasɛmaz̤wɛni ɔnkɛ ɛv̤a ukuɓa wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli umisɛ amasalɛla kwajud̤a nɔkuɓa umɛnz̤ɛ umv̤ɛlɛli wawɔ uɡ̤ɛd̤alija uɲana kaahikam uɲana kaʃafan aɓuja kɛ ɔnkɛ amajud̤a ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ aɓɛɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛlwɛ kuz̤ɔ ɛz̤a ɛliz̤wɛni lakwajud̤a kuɡ̤ɛd̤alija ɛmiz̤pa aɓutʰa iwajini nɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤asɛɬɔtʲɛni z̤az̤ininz̤i kakʰulu kɛ kalɔku ujɔhanan uɲana kakarɛha naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛz̤impi aɓaɓɛsɛmapʰanɮɛni ɓɛz̤a kuɡ̤ɛd̤alija ɛmiz̤pa ɓatʰi kujɛ uɬɛli usaz̤i ukuɓa ub̤ahalisi wɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn utʰumɛ uiʃmajɛli uɲana kanɛtanija ukuɓa akuɓulalɛ kɛ uɡ̤ɛd̤alija uɲana kaahikam uɓɛnɡ̤akʰɔlwa nɡ̤aɓɔ ujɔhanan uɲana kakarɛha watʰɛtʰa kuɡ̤ɛd̤alija nɡ̤asɛsɛ ɛmiz̤pa watʰi makʰɛ nd̤ijɛ nd̤imɓulalɛ uiʃmajɛli uɲana kanɛtanija kunɡ̤az̤i jini ukuɓa ad̤ɛ aɓulalɛ wɛna akǀʰitʰwakǀʰitʰwɛ amajud̤a ɔnkɛ aɬanɡ̤anisɛnɛ kuwɛ at͡ʃaɓalalɛ amasalɛla akwajud̤a uɡ̤ɛd̤alija uɲana kaahikam watʰi kujɔhanan uɲana kakarɛha musa ukujɛnz̤a lɔɔ ntɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰɛtʰa uɓukǁɔki nɡ̤ɔiʃmajɛli kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wɛz̤a uiʃmajɛli uɲana kanɛtanija uɲana kaɛliʃama wasɛmɓɛwini jɔkumkani wakuɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔkumkani ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a aliʃumi kuɡ̤ɛd̤alija uɲana kaahikam ɛmiz̤pa ɓaɮa isɔnka nd̤awɔɲɛ ɛmiz̤pa apʰɔ wɛsuka uiʃmajɛli uɲana kanɛtanija namad̤ɔd̤a aliʃumi aɓɛnajɛ wamkǁaɓɛla uɡ̤ɛd̤alija uɲana kaahikam uɲana kaʃafan nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ wamɓulala kɛ ɔɓɛnz̤iwɛ umv̤ɛlɛli nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛz̤wɛni ɛli namajud̤a ɔnkɛ aɓɛnajɛ aɓɛnɔɡ̤ɛd̤alija ɛmiz̤pa namakalɛd̤i awafuɲanwajɔ kʰɔna anɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a ɔkulwa wawaɓulala uiʃmajɛli kwatʰi kɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsiɓini ɛmv̤a kɔkuɓulawa kukaɡ̤ɛd̤alija kunɡ̤az̤i amad̤ɔd̤a ɛv̤ɛla kwaʃɛkɛm nasɛʃilɔ nakwasamari amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amaʃumi asib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɛɡ̤ujɛ iind̤ɛv̤u ɛz̤ik͡xaz̤ulɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤ikǀɛntilɛ ɛnɛminikɛlɔ jɔkuɮa nɛntlaka ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤awɔ ɛjiz̤isa ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a wapʰuma ɛmiz̤pa uiʃmajɛli uɲana kanɛtanija waja kuwakʰawulɛla ɛmana ɛhamɓa ɛlila kwatʰi kuwɔ watʰi kuwɔ jiz̤ani kuɡ̤ɛd̤alija uɲana kaahikam kwatʰi pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i wawaɓulala uiʃmajɛli uɲana kanɛtanija wawalaɬɛla ɛm̤ad̤ini pʰakatʰi jɛna namad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ aɓɛnajɛ kɛ kwafumanɛka kuwɔ amad̤ɔd̤a aliʃumi awatʰi kuiʃmajɛli musa ukusiɓulala nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sinɛz̤isɛlɛ ɛnɮɛ ɛz̤inɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛxasi nɛɔli nɔɓusi wawajɛka kɛ akawaɓulala pʰakatʰi kwaɓaz̤alwana ɓawɔ kɛ kalɔku um̤ad̤i apʰɔ uiʃmajɛli waz̤ilaɬɛla kuwɔ nɡ̤akuɡ̤ɛd̤alija z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤id̤umɓu z̤amad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛwaɓulɛlɛ lɔwɔ wawɛnz̤ajɔ uasa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kab̤ahɛʃa wakwasirajɛli uiʃmajɛli uɲana kanɛtanija wawuz̤alisa nɡ̤aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ uiʃmajɛli wawatʰimɓa ɔnkɛ amasalɛla aɓantu aɓasɛmiz̤pa iintɔmɓi z̤ɔkumkani naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛsɛlɛ ɛmiz̤pa aɓɛnz̤iwɛ umv̤ɛlɛli waɓɔ uɡ̤ɛd̤alija uɲana kaahikam nɡ̤unɛb̤uz̤arad̤an umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki waɓatʰimɓa kɛ uiʃmajɛli uɲana kanɛtanija wahamɓa wawɛlɛla kɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn wɛv̤a ujɔhanan uɲana kakarɛha naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛz̤impi ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤inajɛ ɓɔnkɛ uɓuɓi awaɓɛnz̤ajɔ uiʃmajɛli uɲana kanɛtanija ɓawatʰaɓatʰa ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a ɓaja nɔiʃmajɛli uɲana kanɛtanija ɓamfumana nɡ̤asɛmanz̤ini amakʰulu asɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn kwatʰi ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓanɔiʃmajɛli ɓakumɓɔna ujɔhanan uɲana kakarɛha naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛz̤impi ɛz̤inajɛ ɓav̤uja ɓad͡ʒ̤ika ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓɛɓatʰimɓɛ ɛmiz̤pa uiʃmajɛli ɓaɓuja ɓaja kujɔhanan uɲana kakarɛha kɛ uiʃmajɛli uɲana kanɛtanija wasind̤a ɛnamad̤ɔd̤a asib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓukajɔhanan waja kɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn wawatʰaɓatʰa ujɔhanan uɲana kakarɛha naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛz̤impi aɓaɓɛnajɛ ɔnkɛ amasalɛla aɓantu awaɓaɓujisajɔ kuiʃmajɛli uɲana kanɛtanija ɛmiz̤pa ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa ɛɓɛmɓulɛlɛ uɡ̤ɛd̤alija uɲana kaahikam amaɡ̤ɔxa amad̤ɔd̤a ɔkulwa naɓafaz̤i naɓantwana namatʰɛnwa aɓɛwaɓujisilɛ ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛjɔn ɓaja ɓaɬala ɛnɮwini jaɓapʰamɓukɛli kakim̤am ɛnɡ̤asɛb̤ɛtɛlɛhɛm ukuɓa ɓajɛ kunɡ̤ɛna ɛjiputa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamakalɛd̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛwɔjika nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uiʃmajɛli uɲana kanɛtanija ɛɓɛmɓulɛlɛ uɡ̤ɛd̤alija uɲana kaahikam ɔwajɛnz̤iwɛ umv̤ɛlɛli wɛliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɓasɔnd̤ɛla ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛz̤impi ɔɔjɔhanan uɲana kakarɛha nɔjɛz̤anija uɲana kahɔʃaja naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kɔmŋǀinanɛ ɓasɛ kɔmkʰulu ɓatʰi kujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti ukutaxuz̤isa kwɛtʰu makʰɛ kuwɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ usitʰand̤az̤ɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ utʰand̤az̤ɛlɛ masalɛla ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sisɛlɛ samɓalwa ɓɛsiɓaninz̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ asiɓɔnajɔ amɛɬɔ akʰɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ asikǁɛlɛlɛ inɮɛla ɛsinɡ̤ahamɓa nɡ̤ajɔ nɛntɔ ɛsinɡ̤ajɛnz̤ajɔ watʰi ujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti kuɓɔ nd̤iv̤ilɛ jaɓɔnani nd̤ija kutʰand̤az̤a kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nɡ̤ɔkwamaz̤wi ɛnu kutʰi ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi anipʰɛnd̤ulɛ nɡ̤awɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤inikǁɛlɛlɛ and̤iji kuniv̤imɓa liz̤wi ɓatʰi ɓɔna kujɛrɛmija ujɛhɔv̤a makaɓɛ liŋ̤ǃ̤ina ɛliɲanisilɛjɔ ɛlitʰɛmɓɛkajɔ nɡ̤atʰi ukuɓa asitʰanɡ̤a sɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi lɔnkɛ awɔkutʰuma lɔna kutʰi ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ nɔkuɓa lilunɡ̤ilɛ nɔkuɓa liɓi sija kulipʰulapʰula iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ɛsikutʰumɛla kujɛ ukuz̤ɛ kulunɡ̤ɛ kutʰi kǁa silipʰulapʰulajɔ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu kwatʰi ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɬa ɛliʃumi iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɛrɛmija waɓiz̤a ujɔhanan uɲana kakarɛha naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛz̤impi aɓaɓɛnajɛ naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓatʰaɓatʰɛla kɔmŋǀinanɛ ɓɛsa kɔmkʰulu watʰi kuɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɛnind̤itʰumɛlɛ kujɛ ukuɓa nd̤iwisɛ ukutaxuz̤isa kwɛnu pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ ukutʰi ukuɓa nitʰɛ naɬala kwɛli liz̤wɛ nd̤ɔnakʰa nd̤inɡ̤aniɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤uli nd̤ɔnitʲala nd̤inɡ̤aniɲɔtʰuli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ijaz̤ɔɬwaja nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi ɛnd̤iɓɛnz̤ilɛjɔ musani ukumɔjika wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli lɔwɔ nimɔjikajɔ ukumɔjika ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inani ukuɓa nd̤inisind̤isɛ nd̤iniɬanɡ̤ulɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ nd̤ija kunɛnz̤ɛla imfɛsanɛ aɓɛ nɛmfɛsanɛ aniɓujisɛlɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni wakɔwɛnu kɛ ukuɓa nitʰɛ asisaji kuɬala kwɛli liz̤wɛ analipʰulapʰula iz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu natʰi haji tʰina sija kuja ɛz̤wɛni lɛjiputa ukuz̤ɛ sinɡ̤aɓɔnani namfaz̤wɛ sinɡ̤aliv̤a nɛz̤wi lɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ sinɡ̤alamɓɛli sɔnka siɬalɛ kʰɔna kɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ kalɔku liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a masalɛla akwajud̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi ukuɓa nitʰɛ naɓub̤ɛkisa kwapʰɛla uɓusɔ ɓɛnu ɛjiputa naja kupʰamɓukɛla kʰɔna ik͡xɛlɛ ɛnilɔjikajɔ lɔnifikɛla nakʰɔna ɛz̤wɛni lɛjiputa nɛnɮala lɛjɔ ninɛsitʰukutʰɛz̤i nɡ̤ajɔ jɔtʰi ukuniland̤ɛla ɛjiputa nifɛlɛ kʰɔna namad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ aɓub̤ɛkisɛ uɓusɔ ɓawɔ ɛjiputa ukuɓa apʰamɓukɛlɛ kʰɔna aja lik͡xɛlɛ najinɮala najindʲikitʲa jɔkufa kunɡ̤asali naɲɛ kuwɔ isind̤ajɔ ɛɓuɓini ɛnd̤iwaz̤isɛla ɓɔna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wapʰalaz̤ɛkajɔ umsind̤ɔ nɔɓuʃuʃu ɓam pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm ɓuja kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukupʰalaz̤ɛka uɓuʃuʃu ɓam pʰɛz̤u kwɛnu ɛkujɛni kwɛnu ɛjiputa niɓɛ jint͡ʃwaɓulɔ nɛsimanɡ̤a nɛnt͡ʃab̤isɔ nɛsiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ ninɡ̤aɓi sajiɓɔna lɛ nd̤awɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰɛtʰilɛ masalɛla akwajud̤a ukuja ɛjiputa jaz̤ini naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤ikǃɔnɔnɔnd̤isilɛ ukutʰɛtʰa nam̤la nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nijikʰɔɬisilɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ jɛnu kǁa nind̤itʰumɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nisitʰi sitʰand̤az̤ɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kɔnkɛ awɔkutʰɛtʰa kutʰi ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu sikǁɛlɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ sɔkwɛnz̤a nd̤inikǁɛlɛlɛ kɛ nam̤la kɛ anilipʰulapʰulanɡ̤a iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awand̤itʰumɛlajɔ nɡ̤akɔ kunɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ jaz̤ini ukuɓa nija lik͡xɛlɛ najinɮala najindʲikitʲa jɔkufa kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ niŋ̤ǁ̤amɛlɛ ukuja kujɔ ukuɓa nipʰamɓukɛlɛ kujɔ kwatʰi akuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa ujɛrɛmija ukuwatʰɛtʰa ɛɓantwini ɓɔnkɛ amaz̤wi ɔnkɛ kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ awamtʰuma wɔna ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ kuɓɔ ɔnkɛ maz̤wi ɓat͡ʃɔ ɔɔaz̤arija uɲana kahɔʃaja nɔjɔhanan uɲana kakarɛha namad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ akʰukʰumɛlɛjɔ ukutʰi kujɛrɛmija utʰɛtʰa uɓukǁɔki ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu akakutʰumanɡ̤a kutʰi ukuɓa utʰi z̤ɛ ninɡ̤aji ɛjiputa nipʰamɓukɛlɛ kʰɔna ub̤aruki kɛ uɲana kanɛrija uja kukǁʰɔkɔŋǁa nɡ̤akutʰi kuɓa ɛfuna ukuɓa sinikɛlwɛ ɛsanɮɛni samakalɛd̤i ukuɓa asiɓulalɛ ukuɓa asifud̤usɛlɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ujɔhanan uɲana kakarɛha naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛz̤impi naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓalipʰulapʰula iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lɔkuɓa ɓaɬalɛ ɛliz̤wɛni lakwajud̤a ujɔhanan uɲana kakarɛha naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛz̤impi ɓawatʰaɓatʰa ɔnkɛ amasalɛla akwajud̤a aɓɛɓujɛ ɛv̤ɛla ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni z̤ɔnkɛ aɓɛɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛlwɛ kuz̤ɔ ukuɓa ajɛ kupʰamɓukɛla ɛz̤wɛni lakwajud̤a amad̤ɔd̤a naɓafaz̤i naɓantwana nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤ɔkumkani nɛmipʰɛfumlɔ jɔnkɛ aɓɛjiʃijɛ unɛb̤uz̤arad̤an umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki kuɡ̤ɛd̤alija uɲana kaahikam uɲana kaʃafan nɔjɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti nɔb̤aruki uɲana kanɛrija ɓaja kɛ ɛliz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛnɡ̤alipʰulapʰulanɡ̤a iz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɓaja ɓafika ɛtapanɛsi kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɛrɛmija ɛtapanɛsi lisitʰi tʰaɓatʰa nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɔ amatʲɛ amakʰulu uwakǃʰuʃɛkɛ ɛlud̤akɛni ɛnd̤awɛni jɔkut͡ʃisa iz̤itɛna ɛsɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛnɮu kafarɔ ɛtapanɛsi ɛmɛɬwɛni amad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a uz̤ɛ utʰi kuwɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤ija kutʰumɛla nd̤itʰaɓatʰɛ unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli umkʰɔnz̤i nd̤ijiɓɛkɛ itrɔnɛ jakʰɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u matʲɛ nd̤iwakǃʰuʃɛkilɛjɔ anɛkɛ isiv̤atʰɔ sakʰɛ ɛsiɬɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwawɔ uja aliɓɛtʰɛ iliz̤wɛ lɛjiputa ɔwɔkufa afɛ ɔwɔkutʰind͡ʒ̤wa atʰind͡ʒ̤wɛ ɔwɛk͡xɛlɛ aɓɛ nɡ̤ɔwɛk͡xɛlɛ nd̤ija isikʰuni ɛz̤inɮwini z̤ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓasɛjiputa az̤it͡ʃisɛ z̤ɔna aɓatʰimɓɛ ɓɔna az̤itʰi wamɓu nɡ̤ɛliz̤wɛ lɛjiputa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛz̤itʰi wamɓu nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ apʰumɛ kulɔ ɛnɔkǁɔlɔ uja kuwakǃʰɛkɛz̤a amatʲɛ amisiwɛjɔ asɛb̤ɛtɛʃɛmɛʃɛ asɛz̤wɛni lɛjiputa az̤it͡ʃisɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ iz̤inɮu z̤ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓasɛjiputa iliz̤wi ɛlafikajɔ kujɛrɛmija nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kumajud̤a ɔnkɛ aɬɛlijɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa aɬɛli ɛmiɡ̤id̤ɔli nasɛtapanɛsi nasɛnɔfu nasɛz̤wɛni lasɛpatrɔsi lalisitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi niɓuɓɔnilɛ uɓuɓi ɓɔnkɛ ɛnd̤ajiz̤isɛla ɓɔna ijɛrusalɛm nɛmiz̤i jɔnkɛ jakwajud̤a nijaɓɔna inɡ̤amaŋǁuwa nɡ̤ajɔ lɛ akukʰɔ umijɔ kujɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi aɓaɓɛnz̤ajɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓand̤ikǃumɓisɛ nɡ̤ɔkuja kukǃʰumisɛla nɔkukʰɔnz̤a tʰikǁɔ ɓamɓi aɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓaz̤i ɓɔna nɔɔjiɬɔ nd̤atʰumɛla ɓɔnkɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓam aɓaprɔfɛti nd̤iɓatʰuma nd̤iv̤uka nd̤isitʰi musani ukukʰa nijɛnz̤ɛ lɛ ntɔ inɡ̤amasikiz̤i nd̤ijitʰijilɛjɔ nɔkɔ kɛ aɓɛv̤anɡ̤a aɓajitʰɔɓanɡ̤a inɮɛɓɛ jaɓɔ ukuɓa ɓaɓujɛ ɛɓuɓini ɓaɓɔ ɓanɡ̤akǃʰumisɛli tʰikǁwɛni ɓamɓi ɓapʰalaz̤ɛka kɛ uɓuʃuʃu ɓam nɔmsind̤ɔ wat͡ʃisa ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a nasɛz̤itratwɛni z̤ɛjɛrusalɛm jaɓa liŋǁuwa jab̤axa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔku kund͡ʒ̤alɔ nam̤la kalɔku ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi jini ukuɓa nijɛnz̤ɛlɛ uɓuɓi ɔɓukʰulukanɡ̤aka imipʰɛfumlɔ jɛnu ɓɔkuŋǃumla ind̤ɔd̤a nɔmfaz̤i nɔsɛɓɛlɛni kwɛlakwajud̤a kunɡ̤asali masalɛla nɡ̤ɔkund̤ikǃumɓisa nɡ̤ɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤ɛnu nɡ̤ɔkukǃʰumisɛla tʰikǁwɛni ɓamɓi ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa ɛnɛz̤a kupʰamɓukɛla kulɔ ukuz̤ɛ niz̤iŋǃumlɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnu niɓɛ jint͡ʃab̤isɔ nɛsiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi niz̤iliɓɛlɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤imɓi z̤ɔɔjiɬɔ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤imɓi z̤ɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a nɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤imɓi z̤aɓafaz̤i ɓaɓɔ nɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤imɓi z̤ɛnu nɡ̤ɔkwɛnu nɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤imɓi z̤aɓafaz̤i ɓɛnu aɓaz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ ɛz̤wɛni lakwajud̤a nasɛz̤itratwɛni z̤ɛjɛrusalɛm unanam̤la aɓatʲumkanɡ̤a aɓɔjikanɡ̤a aɓahamɓanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔmjalɛlɔ nanɡ̤ɛmimisɛlɔ jam ɛnd̤ajiɓɛka pʰamɓi kwɛnu napʰamɓi kɔɔjiɬɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi jaɓɔnani uɓusɔ ɓam nd̤ija kuɓub̤ɛkisa ukuɓa kuɓɛ kuɓi aŋǃuɲulwɛ ɔnkɛ amajud̤a nd̤ija kuwatʰaɓatʰa amasalɛla akwajud̤a aɓub̤ɛkisilɛjɔ uɓusɔ ɓawɔ ɛkujɛni ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa ukuɓa apʰamɓukɛlɛ kʰɔna aɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwɛ ɔnkɛ aja ɛz̤wɛni lɛjiputa aja kuɡ̤ǃ̤itʲɛlwa lik͡xɛlɛ najinɮala kutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ kwaɓaŋǀinanɛ kusɛ kwaɓakʰulu aja lik͡xɛlɛ najinɮala aɓɛ jint͡ʃwaɓulɔ nɔmmanɡ̤alisɔ nɛnt͡ʃab̤isɔ nɛsiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ nd̤ija kuɓav̤ɛlɛla aɓaɬɛli ɛz̤wɛni lɛjiputa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤ajiv̤ɛlɛlajɔ ijɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nanɡ̤ɛnɮala nanɡ̤ɛndʲikitʲa jɔkufa akuji kuɓakʰɔ usind̤ajɔ usalajɔ kumasalɛla akwajud̤a aɓɛz̤ɛ kupʰamɓukɛla kʰɔna ɛz̤wɛni lɛjiputa ukuɓa aɓujɛlɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakwajud̤a ɛlɔ liz̤wɛ ajipʰakamisɛlɛ kulɔ imipʰɛfumlɔ jawɔ ukuɓujɛla kulɔ ukuɓa aɬalɛ kʰɔna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓaji kuɓuja inɡ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓasind̤a nɡ̤ɔkub̤uŋ̤ǀ̤a ampʰɛnd̤ula ujɛrɛmija ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛsaz̤i ukuɓa aɓafaz̤i ɓawɔ ɓakǃʰumisɛla tʰikǁwɛni ɓamɓi naɓafaz̤i ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛmi ɛsikʰunɡ̤wini ɛsikʰulu naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛɬɛli ɛz̤wɛni lɛjiputa ɛpatrɔsi nɡ̤ɔkutʰi iliz̤wi ɛlɔ ulitʰɛtʰilɛjɔ kutʰi ɛɡ̤amɛni likajɛhɔv̤a asiji kukupʰulapʰula nɡ̤alɔ inɛnɛ sija kuwɛnz̤a ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi apʰumilɛjɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛtʰu ɔkukǃʰumisɛla kukumkanikaz̤i wɛz̤ulu simtʰululɛlɛ iminikɛlɔ ɛtʰululwajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ sakwɛnz̤ajɔ tʰina nɔɔɓawɔ ɔɔkumkani ɓɛtʰu naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛtʰu ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a nasɛz̤itratwɛni z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm saɬutʰa kɛ sisɔnka salunɡ̤a asaɓɔna ɓuɓi kususɛla kɔkɔ sajɛkajɔ ukukǃʰumisɛla kukumkanikaz̤i wɛz̤ulu nɔkumtʰululɛla iminikɛlɔ ɛtʰululwajɔ saswɛla iintɔ z̤ɔnkɛ saɡ̤ǃ̤itʲɛlwa lik͡xɛlɛ najinɮala kǁa kɛ tʰina ɓafaz̤i sikǃʰumisɛlajɔ kukumkanikaz̤i wɛz̤ulu simtʰululɛlajɔ iminikɛlɔ ɛtʰululwajɔ simɛnz̤ɛla iz̤ɔnkana z̤ɔkuɓa ɛjilwa simtʰululɛla iminikɛlɔ ɛtʰululwajɔ amad̤ɔd̤a ɛtʰu akakʰɔ kutʰi watʰɛtʰa ujɛrɛmija kuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ kumad̤ɔd̤a nakuɓafaz̤i kuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓampʰɛnd̤ulajɔ nɡ̤ɛlɔ liz̤wi watʰi ukukǃʰumisɛla ɔkɔ ɛnakǃʰumisɛla nɡ̤akɔ ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a nasɛz̤itratwɛni z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm nɔɔjiɬɔ ɔɔkumkani ɓɛnu naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛnu naɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ akakukʰumɓulanɡ̤a ujɛhɔv̤a akutʰanɡ̤a kǃatʰa ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɛ ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a akaɓa saɓa nakɔ ukutʰwala nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤ɛnu ɛz̤imɓi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamasikiz̤i ɛnawɛnz̤ajɔ iliz̤wɛ lɛnu lab̤axa kwaɓa sɛnkanɡ̤ala lanɡ̤ummanɡ̤alisɔ nɛnt͡ʃab̤isɔ linɡ̤ɛnammi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kund͡ʒ̤alɔ nam̤la nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkukǃʰumisɛla kwɛnu nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔna kwɛnu kujɛhɔv̤a analipʰulapʰula iz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a anahamɓa nɡ̤ɔmjalɛlɔ wakʰɛ nanɡ̤ɛmimisɛlɔ jakʰɛ nanɡ̤ɛz̤iŋ̤ǃ̤inɔ z̤akʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ɓuniɬɛlɛ ɔɓɔ ɓuɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kund͡ʒ̤alɔ nam̤la watʰi ujɛrɛmija kuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ nakuɓafaz̤i ɓɔnkɛ liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nɔnkɛ majud̤a asɛz̤wɛni lɛjiputa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi nina naɓafaz̤i ɓɛnu nijatʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ wɛnu nanɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤ɛnu nikuz̤alisɛ nisitʰi masɛnz̤ɛ iz̤ib̤amɓatʰisɔ z̤ɛtʰu ɛsab̤amɓatʰisa nɡ̤az̤ɔ z̤ɔkukǃʰumisɛla kukumkanikaz̤i wɛz̤ulu simtʰululɛlɛ iminikɛlɔ ɛtʰululwajɔ z̤imisɛni niz̤imisɛ kamɓɛ iz̤ib̤amɓatʰisɔ z̤ɛnu z̤ɛnz̤ɛni niz̤ɛnz̤ɛ kamɓɛ iz̤ib̤amɓatʰisɔ z̤ɛnu nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nɔnkɛ majud̤a aɬɛlijɔ ɛz̤wɛni lɛjiputa jaɓɔnani nd̤ifunɡ̤ɛ iɡ̤ama ɛlikʰulu ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a inɛnɛ aliji kuɓa saɓiz̤wa iɡ̤ama nɡ̤umlɔmɔ kaɓani wakwajud̤a ɛz̤wɛni lɔnkɛ lɛjiputa ɛsitʰi iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ inkɔsi jaɓɔnani nd̤iwapʰapʰɛla ukuɓa kuɓɛ kuɓi kunɡ̤alunɡ̤i aɡ̤ǃ̤itʲɛlwɛ ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa lik͡xɛlɛ najinɮala ad̤ɛ apʰɛlɛ ɓaja kuɓuja ɛz̤wɛni lɛjiputa aɓasind̤ɛ ɛk͡xɛlɛni ɓajɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakwajud̤a ɓɛmɓalwa alaz̤i ɔnkɛ amasalɛla akwajud̤a az̤ilɛjɔ ɛz̤wɛni lɛjiputa ukuɓa apʰamɓukɛlɛ kulɔ ukuɓa lilipʰi iliz̤wi ɛlija kʰɔna lɛlam lɛlaɓɔ nanɡ̤u kɛ umkǃɔnd̤isɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɔkuɓa nd̤ija kuniv̤ɛlɛla kulɛ nd̤awɔ ukuz̤ɛ naz̤i ukuɓa amaz̤wi aja animɛlɛ uɓuɓi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤ijamnikɛla ufarɔhɔfra wɛjiputa ɛsanɮɛni sɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni saɓafuna umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤amnikɛlajɔ uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a ɛsanɮɛni sikanɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ut͡ʃaɓa lwakʰɛ ɔluɓɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ iliz̤wi awalitʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti kub̤aruki uɲana kanɛrija ɛkuwab̤alɛni kwakʰɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini maz̤wi ɛpʰuma ɛmlɔɲɛni kajɛrɛmija nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsinɛ kajɔjakim uɲana kajɔsija wakwajud̤a lalisitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli kuwɛ b̤aruki ukutʰi wɛna utʰi atʰi kɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a wɔnɡ̤ɛz̤a isiŋ̤ǃ̤ala kumv̤and̤ɛd̤wa nd̤id̤iniwɛ kukuŋǀwina and̤ifumani kupʰumla jitʰi kɛ kujɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna intɔ ɛnd̤ijakʰilɛjɔ nd̤ijajiɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ula intɔ ɛnd̤ijitʲɛlɛjɔ nd̤ijajiɲɔtʰula liɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ kɛ ɛlɔ wɛna uz̤ifunɛla iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inkulu ukuz̤ifuna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujaɓɔna nd̤ijiz̤isɛla uɓuɓi iɲama jɔnkɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ nd̤ikunika umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ uɓɛ likǁʰɔɓa lakʰɔ ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɔja kuja kuz̤ɔ intɔ ɛjafikajɔ kujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti ililiz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kwiintlanɡ̤a ɛlinɡ̤ɛjiputa nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kafarɔnɛkɔ wɛjiputa ɛɓisɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔnɡ̤umɛfrati ɛkarkɛmiʃɛ awajikǁaɓɛlajɔ unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsinɛ kajɛhɔjakim uɲana kajɔsija wakwajud̤a lalisitʰi lunɡ̤isani inɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ nɛkʰaka jijani ɓɔpʰani amahaʃɛ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛlwɛni z̤ɔkulwa kʰwɛlani ɓamahaʃɛ z̤imisɛni ninɛz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤inantlɔkɔ kʰaz̤imlisani iz̤ikʰali niŋǁiɓɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɛnt͡simɓi jini nd̤iɓɔna ntɔni ɓakǃʰipʰuka umɓilini ɓaɓuja umv̤a amaɡ̤ɔxa aɓɔ akǃɔtʲiwɛ ɓasaɓa int͡saɓɔ kaɲɛ ɓanɡ̤aɓi sapʰɛtʰula kukuŋǁunɡ̤upʰala nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a makanɡ̤asaɓi ɔnamɛnd̤u linɡ̤asind̤i iɡ̤ɔxa nɡ̤asɛntla nɡ̤asɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔnɡ̤umɛfrati ɓakʰuɓɛkɛ ɓawa nɡ̤uɓani lɔ uɲuka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmnajilɛ umanz̤i az̤amaz̤ama nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmilamɓɔ ijiputa ijɛɲuka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmnajilɛ amanz̤i ajɔ ajaz̤amaz̤ama nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmilamɓɔ itʰi nd̤ija kuɲuka nd̤ija kuwuɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla um̤laɓa nd̤ija kujit͡ʃaɓalalisa imiz̤i naɓɛmi ɓajɔ kǃakatʰani mahaʃɛ niɮɔnɡ̤ɔz̤ɛlɛ z̤iŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa makapʰumɛ amaɡ̤ɔxa amakuʃi namaputi apʰɛtʰɛ inɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ namalud̤i apʰɛtʰɛ atʲɛd̤ɛ isapʰɛtʰa lɛ jɛjɛnkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi jimini jɛmpind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ jɔkupʰind̤ɛz̤ɛla kuɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓakʰɛ liɮɛ liɬutʰɛ ik͡xɛlɛ lisɛlɛ lid̤ikwɛ liɡ̤az̤i laɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ɛz̤wɛni lasɛntla ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔnɡ̤umɛfrati ɲuka ujɛ ɛɡ̤ilijad̤i tʰaɓatʰa amafutʰa akǃʰɔliwɛjɔ nkaz̤anand̤ini ntɔmɓi ijijiputa usand̤isa ɔɔmatʰunɡ̤a akunakuɓɔt͡ʃwa iintlanɡ̤a z̤ikuv̤ilɛ ukukǀukukǀɛz̤wa kwakʰɔ ukukʰala kwakʰɔ kwaz̤alisa iɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iɡ̤ɔxa likʰuɓɛka ɛɡ̤ɔxɛni ɔmaɓini nd̤awɛniɲɛ iliz̤wi awalitʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti nɡ̤ɔkuz̤a kukanɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ukuɓa alikǁaɓɛlɛ iliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa lalisitʰi kǁɛlani ɛjiputa niv̤akalisɛ ɛmiɡ̤id̤ɔli niv̤akalisɛ ɛnɔfu nasɛtapanɛsi jitʰini misa kǁʰɔɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ik͡xɛlɛ lija kuɮa nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kuwɛ jini ukuɓa z̤ikǃwɛlwɛ iimɓalasanɛ z̤akʰɔ az̤imanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uz̤iŋ̤ǃ̤ulilɛ ukʰuɓɛkisa aɓaninz̤i ɛwɛ ɔmɲɛ uwɛla ɔmɲɛ ɓatʰi sukani masiɓujɛlɛ ɛɓantwini ɓakɔwɛtʰu ɛz̤wɛni ɛsaz̤alɛlwa kulɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛk͡xɛlɛ ɛliɮav̤ulajɔ ɓad̤and̤uluka kʰɔna ɓatʰi ufarɔ wɛjiputa ut͡ʃaɓilɛ uliɮulisilɛ ikǁɛʃa ɛlimisiwɛjɔ nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ut͡ʃɔ ɔɡ̤ama lakʰɛ linɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi inɛnɛ uja kuz̤a ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛtab̤ɔrɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntaɓa ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkarmɛlɛ nɡ̤asɛlwanɮɛ z̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ iimpaɬa z̤ɛmfud̤uka ntɔmɓi ijijiputa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɔfu ija kuɓa liŋǁuwa it͡ʃiswɛ inɡ̤aɓi ijiputa litʰɔkaz̤i ɛliɬɛ kakʰulu isiɓawu sasɛntla sijɛz̤a sijɛz̤a kand͡ʒ̤alɔ imikʰɔsi jajɔ ɛkǃɛʃiwɛjɔ pʰakatʰi kwajɔ ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amatʰɔlɛ asɛsitalini inɛnɛ najɔ lɛjɔ id͡ʒ̤ikilɛ ijasaɓa kuɲɛ ajimi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujifikɛlɛ um̤la wɔkusind̤ɛka kwajɔ ikǁɛʃa lɔkuv̤ɛlɛlwa kwajɔ isand̤i sajɔ sind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuhamɓa kwɛɲɔka nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓahamɓa nɡ̤ɔɓuk͡xɔti ɓajifikɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤ikǁɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓaɡ̤awuli ɓɛmitʰi ɓaɡ̤awula iɬatʰi lajɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɔkuɓa litʰɛ ʃiɲi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaninz̤i nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnkumɓi aɓanakuɓalwa intɔmɓi ɛjijiputa iɬaz̤ɛkilɛ inikɛlwɛ ɛsanɮɛni saɓantu ɓɛlasɛntla utʰi ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli jaɓɔna nd̤ijamv̤ɛlɛla uamɔn wasɛnɔ nɔfarɔ nɛjiputa nɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓajɔ nɔɓukumkani ɓajɔ kwaufarɔ naɓakʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ajɛ nd̤ɔɓanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni saɓafuna umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ ɛsanɮɛni sikanɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli nasɛsanɮɛni saɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ imiwɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwɛmiɬa jamand̤ulɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ wɛna ukɔjika mkʰɔnz̤i jakɔɓi unɡ̤akǃʰipʰuki umɓilini sirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujaɓɔna nd̤ija kukusind̤isa kwakud̤ɛ nɛmɓɛwu jakʰɔ ɛz̤wɛni ɛtʰind͡ʒ̤ɛlwɛ kulɔ aɓujɛ ujakɔɓi az̤ɔlɛ ɔnwaɓɛ anɡ̤aɡ̤ub̤i musa ukɔjika wɛna mkʰɔnz̤i jakɔɓi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inawɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija kuz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla kupʰɛlɛ iintlanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ ɛnd̤ikuɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛlɛ kuz̤ɔ kɛ wɛna and̤iji kukuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla kupʰɛlɛ nd̤ɔkutʰɛtʰisa nɡ̤ɔkusɛsikwɛni and̤iji kutʰi intɔ ɛjafikajɔ kujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti ililiz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kumafilisti ufarɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛkajikǁaɓɛli iɡ̤az̤a jajɛ ijilɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna kuɲuka ɛntla amanz̤i anɡ̤umlamɓɔ ɔnɡ̤umkʰukula ɔntʲwilisɛla iliz̤wɛ nɛnz̤alisɛkɔ jalɔ imiz̤i naɓɛmi ɓajɔ sikʰalɛ ɓab̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤ɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmi ɓɛliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤i sɔkuɲatʰɛla kwamaŋǃina ɛɛmɓalasanɛ z̤amahaʃɛ akʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɡ̤ɔkǃɔz̤a kwɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔkulwa nɡ̤ɔkukǁɔkɔz̤ɛla kwɛɛv̤ili z̤akʰɛ ɔɔjisɛ aɓasab̤ɛki kɔɔɲana nɡ̤ɔkuwa kwɛz̤anɮa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛmini ɛz̤a kuwab̤ukǃa ɔnkɛ amafilisti ɛz̤a kuŋǃumla ɛtirɛ nɛt͡sid̤ɔn ɓɔnkɛ aɓasalɛ ɓaŋǀɛd̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ujawab̤ukǃa amafilisti amasalɛla ɔŋǁwɛmɛ lwasɛkafɛtɔri isɛz̤ilɛni iɡ̤az̤a it͡ʃaɓalɛlɛ iaʃkɛlɔn amasalɛla ɛntili jaɓɔ kunini uz̤ikǀɛnta awu k͡xɛlɛ likajɛhɔv̤a unɡ̤apʰɛz̤i xɔkǁɛla ɛsiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔtʲɛni sakʰɔ pʰumla utʰi kǀwaka unɡ̤atʰini ukupʰɛz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a ɛkuwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɛaʃkɛlɔn nasɛluŋǁwɛmɛni lɔlwanɮɛ apʰɔ ukujalɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kwɛlakwamɔwab̤i ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi jɛha inɛb̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ib̤ukǃiwɛ iɬaz̤isiwɛ itʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛ ikirijatajim iɬaz̤ɛkilɛ ikǃʰipʰukɛ umɓilini iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɛ lɛjɔ ikǃʰajija lakwamɔwab̤i alisɛkʰɔ ɛhɛʃb̤ɔn ɓakǀɛɓɛ uɓuɓi nɡ̤ajɛ ɓatʰi jiz̤ani simŋǃumlɛ anɡ̤aɓi luɬanɡ̤a nawɛ mad̤ɛmɛna uja kud̤aka ik͡xɛlɛ lija kukuland̤ɛla pʰulapʰulani ukukʰala ɛhɔrɔnajim jimɓukǃɔ nɔkwapʰuka ɔkukʰulu umɔwab̤i wapʰukilɛ iimɓɛɮɛnɡ̤ɛ z̤akʰɛ z̤iv̤akala z̤ikʰala nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛkuɲukɛni ɛkǃʰinɛni lasɛluhɔti ɓaja ɓalilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛkuɬɛni ɛhɔrɔnajim aɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwa ɓaja kuv̤akala ɓɛkʰaliswa kukwapʰulwa saɓani siz̤ani imipʰɛfumlɔ jɛnu jiɓani nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔz̤ɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ukʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤akʰɔ nanɡ̤ɔɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓakʰɔ nawɛ uja kutʰind͡ʒ̤wa apʰumɛ afud̤uswɛ ukɛmɔʃɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓakʰɛ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ kuɲɛ uja umb̤ukǃi ɛmiz̤ini jɔnkɛ kunɡ̤asind̤i mz̤i id̤akɛ lit͡ʃaɓalalɛ ihɛwu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wat͡ʃɔjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a mnikɛni amapʰikɔ umɔwab̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɔpʰuma ɛɓalɛka imiz̤i jakʰɛ iɓɛ nɡ̤amaŋǁuwa inɡ̤ɛmiwa makakǃalɛkiswɛ ɔwɛnz̤a umsɛɓɛnz̤i kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkud̤anɡ̤ala akǃalɛkiswɛ ɔŋǃand̤a ik͡xɛlɛ lakʰɛ ɛɡ̤az̤ini wɔnwaɓa umɔwab̤i kwasɛɓuŋǀinanɛni ɓakʰɛ wɛɛ tʲwa pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnt͡sipʰɔ z̤akʰɛ akakʰut͡ʃɛlwanɡ̤a kwɛsiɲɛ isitʲa akahamɓanɡ̤a ɛfud̤uswa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ isɔnɡ̤ɔ sakʰɛ siɬɛli kujɛ nɛv̤umɓa lakʰɛ aliɡ̤ukǃukanɡ̤a nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jaɓɔnani kuz̤a imiɬa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnd̤ija kutʰumɛla aɓatʰululi kujɛ ɓamtʰululɛ ɓaz̤ikʰupʰɛlɛ iz̤itʲa z̤akʰɛ ɓajikǃʰɛkɛz̤ɛ imipʰand̤a jakʰɛ uja kud̤ana umɔwab̤i nɡ̤ukɛmɔʃɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ jad̤anajɔ inɮu kasirajɛli jib̤ɛtɛli inkɔlɔsɛkɔ jajɔ ninɡ̤atʰini ukutʰi sinɡ̤amaɡ̤ɔxa sinɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a anɔɓuk͡xɔti ɛmfaz̤wɛni ujab̤ukǃwa umɔwab̤i imiz̤i jakʰɛ ijɛɲukwa amad̤ɔd̤ana akʰɛ aɲuliwɛjɔ atʰɔɓɛla ɛkusikwɛni ut͡ʃɔ ukumkani ɔɡ̤ama lakʰɛ linɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi kusɔnd̤ɛlɛ kuz̤a ukusind̤ɛka kukamɔwab̤i uɓuɓi ɓakʰɛ ɓujaŋ̤ǁ̤ama kakʰulu ɬunɡ̤uz̤ɛlani iintlɔkɔ nɡ̤ajɛ nɔnkɛ ninɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kujɛ nɔnkɛ nilaz̤ijɔ iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ jitʰini jɔɔ itʰɛni ukwapʰuka intɔnɡ̤a jɔnamanɮa ulutʰi lɔkuhɔmɓa jiɬa ɛluz̤ukwɛni uɬalɛ pʰant͡si kwɛlinɛŋǁanɔ ntɔmɓi jasɛd̤ib̤ɔn nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umb̤ukǃi kamɔwab̤i uɲukɛ wɛz̤a kuwɛ uz̤ɔnakalisilɛ iiŋǃaɓa z̤akʰɔ jima nɡ̤asɛnɮɛlɛni uɓɔnisɛlɛ wasɛarɔhɛrɛ ɓuz̤a kwind̤ɔd̤a ɛsaɓilɛjɔ nakwintɔkaz̤i ɛsind̤ilɛjɔ jitʰi kukʰɔ ntɔni umɔwab̤i uɬaz̤ɛkilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukǃʰipʰukɛ umɓilini b̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤ani nikʰalɛ kǁɛlani ɛarnɔn nitʰi ub̤ukǃiwɛ umɔwab̤i umɡ̤wɛɓɔ ulifikɛlɛ iliz̤wɛ lɛhɛwu ihɔlɔn nɛjat͡sa nɛmɛfahati nɛd̤ib̤ɔn nɛnɛb̤ɔ nɛb̤ɛtɛd̤ib̤ɛlatajim nɛkirijatajim nɛb̤ɛtɛɡ̤amuli nɛb̤ɛtɛmɛhɔn nɛkɛrijɔti nɛb̤ɔt͡sɛra nɛmiz̤i jɔnkɛ jɛliz̤wɛ lakwamɔwab̤i ɛkud̤ɛ kwanɛkufupʰi lukǁakakǁiwɛ upʰɔnd̤ɔ lukamɔwab̤i inɡ̤alɔ jakʰɛ japʰulwɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a mŋǁilisɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛz̤ikʰulisilɛ kujɛhɔv̤a akʰaɬɛlɛkɛ umɔwab̤i ɛm̤lanz̤wɛni wakʰɛ aɓɛ jintlɛkisa najɛ wajɛnɡ̤ɛjintlɛkisa kuwɛ usirajɛli wajɛfuɲɛnwɛ pʰakatʰi kwamasɛla ukuɓa uɬunɡ̤uz̤ɛlɛ intlɔkɔ kǁa sukuɓa uɓutʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ajɛ ʃijani imiz̤i niɬalɛ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxɛni ɓɛmi ɓakwamɔwab̤i niɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛv̤ukutʰu ɛlakʰɛla pʰɛʃɛja ɛlud̤inini lɔmwɔɲɔ siliv̤ilɛ ik͡xat͡ʃi likamɔwab̤i asikukɔ nɔkuɓa lik͡xat͡ʃi ukuz̤iɮa kwakʰɛ ik͡xat͡ʃi lakʰɛ ukuk͡xat͡ʃa kwakʰɛ nɔkupʰakama kwɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ mna nd̤ijakwaz̤i ukupʰupʰuma kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ nɔkupʰɔlɔlɔz̤a kwakʰɛ intɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛjijɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓɛnz̤a intɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛkʰɔjɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ nd̤ijab̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kamɔwab̤i nd̤ikʰalɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kamɔwab̤i wɔnkɛ ɛpʰɛla ɓajaŋǀwina nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamad̤ɔd̤a asɛkixɛrɛs nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔkulila kwɛjaz̤ɛrɛ nd̤ija kulilɛla wɛna md̤ilija wasɛsib̤ɛma ɔmasɛɓɛ awɛla ulwanɮɛ ad̤a aja ɛlwanɮɛ lwasɛjaz̤ɛrɛ ɛkuv̤unwɛni kwɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ nasɛkuv̤unwɛni kwɛɛd̤ilija z̤akʰɔ kuɡ̤alɛlɛkɛ umb̤ukǃi isukilɛ imiv̤ujɔ nɛmiɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓɔ ɛnt͡simini ɛkǀʰumajɔ nasɛliz̤wɛni lakwamɔwab̤i nd̤ijipʰɛlisilɛ iwajini ɛmkʰɔmɓɛni aɓaji kukǁɔv̤ula ɓɛnamajɛjɛjɛ amajɛjɛjɛ aɓɔ aja kuɓa nɡ̤amajɛjɛjɛ anɡ̤ɛlutʰɔ ukukʰala ɛhɛʃb̤ɔn kusɛ ɛɛlalɛ kusɛ ɛjahaz̤i ɓalikʰupʰilɛ iz̤wi laɓɔ kutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛt͡sɔharɛ kwɛsa ɛhɔrɔnajim nasɛɛɡ̤ɛlati jɛsitʰatʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kwanamanz̤i asɛnimrim aja kutʰi kǃɔkɔ nd̤ija kumpʰɛlisa kwamɔwab̤i ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔɲuka isiɡ̤anɡ̤a ukuɓa akǃʰumisɛlɛ kɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ intliz̤ijɔ jam ijalila nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɡ̤wali nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kamɔwab̤i intliz̤ijɔ jam ijalila nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɡ̤wali nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamad̤ɔd̤a asɛkixɛrɛs nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ indʲɛɓɔ aɓaɓɛjiz̤uz̤ilɛ it͡ʃaɓalɛlɛ kuɓa z̤ɔnkɛ iintlɔkɔ z̤iɡ̤uɡ̤ulwɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iind̤ɛv̤u z̤ikǀʰɛtʲiwɛ ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤iintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤iŋǃɛni z̤iinɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwamɔwab̤i nasɛz̤itratwɛni z̤akʰɛ kukumɓamɓaz̤ɛla kɔd̤wa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤imapʰulɛ umɔwab̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsitʲa ɛsinɡ̤ananz̤iwɛjɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓajab̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤a haji ukukǃʰipʰuka kwakʰɛ umɓilini haji ukunikɛla kukamɔwab̤i ikʰɔsi kukud̤ana ujintlɛkisa ujɔjikwa nɡ̤aɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓanɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kujɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ujaɓɔna ut͡ʃaɓa lujat͡ʃwɛɓɛlɛz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkǁʰalanɡ̤a lɔlulɛ amapʰikɔ alɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔmɔwab̤i itʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛ ikɛrijɔti z̤iɬutʰiwɛ iimɓɔnisɛlɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ intliz̤ijɔ jamaɡ̤ɔxa akwamɔwab̤i ija kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jɔmfaz̤i ɔnɛnimɓa at͡ʃaɓalalɛ umɔwab̤i anɡ̤aɓi nɡ̤aɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛz̤ikʰulisilɛ kujɛhɔv̤a ufikɛlwɛ lunkwantʲɔ nɔmɡ̤ɔŋ̤ǁ̤ɔ nɛsiɓatʰa wakwamɔwab̤i ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔsaɓa unkwantʲɔ uja kwɛjɛla ɛmɡ̤ɔŋ̤ǁ̤wɛni ɔpʰuma ɛmɡ̤ɔŋ̤ǁ̤wɛni uja kuɓand͡ʒ̤iswa sisiɓatʰa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija kumz̤isɛla jɛna umɔwab̤i umɲaka wɔkuv̤ɛlɛlwa kwakʰɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a pʰant͡si kɔmtʰunz̤i wɛhɛʃb̤ɔn kuja aɓasaɓi aɓanɡ̤ɛnamanɮa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kuja kupʰuma umlilɔ ɛhɛʃb̤ɔn nɛlanɡ̤atʲɛ pʰakatʰi kwasihɔn uɮɛ ummanɮa wakwamɔwab̤i nɔkakaji lwaɓɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔlɔ jɛha wɛna mɔwab̤i ɓat͡ʃaɓalɛlɛ aɓantu ɓakakɛmɔʃɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ ɓaja kutʰatʲatʰwa ɓɛtʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɔ z̤isiwɛ ɛkutʰind͡ʒ̤wɛni kɛ nd̤ija kukuɓujisa ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kukamɔwab̤i ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɬa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uz̤ɛ apʰa umɡ̤wɛɓɔ wakwamɔwab̤i nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi usirajɛli akanaɲana akananɮalifa jini ukuɓa waɓɔ amɮɛ uɡ̤ad̤i aɓantu ɓaɓɔ ɓɛmɛ ɛmiz̤ini jakʰɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jaɓɔnani kuz̤a imiɬa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnd̤ija kuɬaɓa umkʰɔsi wɛmfaz̤wɛ kwirab̤a jɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn iɓɛ nɡ̤umwɛwɛ wɛŋǁuwa amaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ at͡ʃiswɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ usirajɛli aɓaɮɛ aɓaɓɛmɮɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a b̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤a hɛʃb̤ɔn nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ib̤ukǃiwɛ iaji kʰalani maɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi asɛrab̤a b̤iŋǃani ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ mɓamɓaz̤ɛlani nikǃukǃuz̤ɛlɛ kuɲɛ ɛz̤intanɡ̤wɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wajɔ uja kutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kuɲɛ naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓakʰɛ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ ukǃʰajisɛlani nɡ̤az̤ɔ intili jakʰɔ ikǀʰumilɛ ntɔmɓi ilipʰamɓa jakʰɔlɔsajɔ nɡ̤ɔɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓajɔ isitʰi nd̤ija kuz̤ɛlwa nɡ̤uɓani jaɓɔna nd̤ija kukuz̤isɛla unkwantʲɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi lupʰuma kwaɓanɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kuwɛ niɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰwɛ ɛlɔwɔ anɡ̤ab̤ɛki nɔkub̤ɛka kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ unɡ̤aɓaɓutʰajɔ aɓapʰalapʰalajɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ nd̤ija kukuɓujisa ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kuɛd̤ɔm ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi akusɛkʰɔ ɓulumkɔ kwatɛman lipʰɛlilɛ ikǀɛɓɔ kwiiŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤i ɓupʰalɛlɛ uɓulumkɔ ɓaz̤ɔ saɓani d͡ʒ̤ikani ɬalani ɛnkɔlɔntʲwɛni ɓɛmi ɓakwad̤ɛd̤an nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukusind̤ɛka kwakʰɛ uɛsawu nd̤imz̤isɛlɛ ikǁɛʃa lɔkumv̤ɛlɛla ukuɓa aɓav̤uni ɓɛɛd̤ilija ɓakufikɛlɛ aɓaji kuʃija lub̤ikikǀɔ ukuɓa amasɛla ɛz̤a ɛɓusuku aja kɔnakalisa ad̤ɛ anɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤im̤luɓilɛ uɛsawu nd̤iz̤itʰʲililɛ iind̤awɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤isitʰɛlɛjɔ anɡ̤aɓi nakɔ ukuz̤imɛla imɓɛwu jakʰɛ ija kub̤ukǃwa aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ naɓamɛlwanɛ ɓakʰɛ aɓakʰɔ ʃija iinkɛd̤ama z̤akʰɔ nd̤ija kuz̤ipʰilisa ɓakʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤am aɓaɬɔlɔkaz̤i ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna aɓaɓɛnɡ̤ɛnalunɡ̤ɛlɔ lakujisɛla ind̤ɛɓɛ inɛnɛ ɓaja kujisɛla wɛna kɛ unɡ̤ɔja kuɓa uɓɛ akuji kuɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɛnɛ uja kusɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iz̤ifunɡ̤ilɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤atʰi ib̤ɔt͡sɛra ija kuɓa nɡ̤ummanɡ̤alisɔ nɛsiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ nɛŋǁuwa nɛnt͡ʃab̤isɔ nɛmiz̤i jajɔ jɔnkɛ iɓɛ nɡ̤amaŋǁuwa anɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ nd̤iv̤ɛ ud̤aɓa lupʰuma kujɛhɔv̤a kutʰuɲwɛ isiɡ̤id̤imi ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni sɔkutʰi z̤iɬanɡ̤anisɛni nimfikɛlɛ nisukɛ nilwɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujaɓɔna nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ wamŋǀinanɛ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni wad̤ɛlɛka pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ ukud̤ud̤uz̤ɛlisa kwakʰɔ kukulukuɬilɛ ukukʰukʰumala kwɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ wɛna uɬɛli ɛz̤imfantɛni z̤ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa wɛna uɓamɓɛ intlɔmɔ jɛnd̤uli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa utʰɛ wajakʰɛla pʰɛz̤ulu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkǁʰalanɡ̤a inɮu jakʰɔ nd̤ɔkutʰɔɓa apʰɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uja kuɓa nɡ̤ummanɡ̤alisɔ uɛd̤ɔm ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɮula kujɛ ɓaja kumanɡ̤aliswa ɓɛnz̤ɛ umsɔnɮɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓɛtʰwa kwakʰɛ kɔnkɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kwaɓand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɛkub̤ukukǃɛkɛni kwɛsɔd̤ɔm nɛɡ̤ɔmɔra nɛmimɛlwanɛ jajɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a akuji kuɬala kʰɔna akuji kupʰamɓukɛla ɲana wɔmntu kʰɔna jaɓɔna ut͡ʃaɓa luja kuɲuka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ɛpʰuma ɛkwɛnɛni kwɛjɔrd̤an lujɛ ɛkʰajani ɛlijiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija kumɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa nɡ̤ɛpʰaɲaz̤ɔ kulɔ ɔsukuɓa ɛɲuliwɛ nd̤imɛnz̤ɛlɛ umv̤ɛlɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤uɓani ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤am nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kund̤imɛma nɡ̤uɓani lɔɔ uja pʰamɓi nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jiv̤ani ikǀɛɓɔ likajɛhɔv̤a alikǀɛɓilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔɛd̤ɔm nɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ az̤ikǀinɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤aɓɛmi ɓakwatɛman inɛnɛ ɓaja kuz̤ik͡xwikǃiliz̤a ɛz̤iŋǀinanɛ z̤ɔm̤lamɓi inɛnɛ lija kumanɡ̤aliswa z̤iz̤ɔ ik͡xiwa laz̤ɔ iɬaɓatʰi lijaɲikima sisitʰɔnɡ̤a sɔkuwa kwaɓɔ isand̤i sɔkukʰala kwaɓɔ siv̤akala ɛlwanɮɛ ɔluɓɔmv̤u jaɓɔna ut͡ʃaɓa lujaɲuka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkǁʰalanɡ̤a lut͡ʃwɛɓɛlɛz̤a luwɔlulɛ amapʰikɔ alɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛb̤ɔt͡sɛra intliz̤ijɔ jamaɡ̤ɔxa ɛkwaɛd̤ɔm nɡ̤alɔɔ ija kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jɔmfaz̤i ɔnɛnimɓa nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kwid̤amaskɔ iɬaz̤ɛkilɛ ihamati nɛarpad̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kuv̤iwɛ iind̤aɓa ɛz̤imɓi ɓaŋǀamilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤asɛlwanɮɛ ɓanɛsitʰukutʰɛz̤i aɓanakɔ ukuz̤ɔla id̤amaskɔ itʰɛ d̤akumɓa id͡ʒ̤ikilɛ jasaɓa ifikɛlwɛ kukɔtʰuka iɓand͡ʒ̤wɛ jimɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ najinimɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔz̤alajɔ haji ukuʃijwa kɔmz̤i wɛnd̤umisɔ umz̤i wɛmiɬali jam nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ aja amad̤ɔd̤ana ajɔ ɛz̤itratwɛni z̤awɔ amad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ ɔkulwa atʰi ʃwaka nɡ̤alɔɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi nd̤ija kupʰɛmɓa umlilɔ ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni lwɛd̤amaskɔ uɮɛ iiŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ z̤ikab̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kumakɛd̤arɛ nakwiz̤ikumkani z̤asɛhat͡sɔrɛ awaz̤iɓulalajɔ unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi sukani nimɛ ɲukani nijɛ kumakɛd̤arɛ niɓab̤ukǃɛ aɓasɛmpumalanɡ̤a iintɛntɛ z̤aɓɔ nɛmiɬamɓi jaɓɔ ɓɔjitʰaɓatʰa namalɛnɡ̤alɛnɡ̤a aɓɔ nɛɛmpaɬa z̤aɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nɛɛnkamɛla z̤aɓɔ ɓɔz̤isusa z̤iɓɛ z̤ɛz̤aɓɔ ɓamɛmɛz̤ɛ kuɓɔ ɓatʰi kukuŋǁunɡ̤upʰala nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ saɓani ɓalɛkani kakʰulu ɬalani ɛnkɔlɔntʲwɛni ɓɛmi ɓasɛhat͡sɔrɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛkǀɛɓɛ ikǀɛɓɔ nɡ̤ani wakǀinɡ̤a iŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a nɡ̤ani sukani nimɛ ɲukani nijɛ kuɬanɡ̤a ɔlukǀʰulumakǀʰilɛjɔ ɔluɬɛli lukʰɔlɔsilɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uɬanɡ̤a ɔlunɡ̤ɛnaz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ namiv̤alɔ ɔluɬɛli lɔd̤wa iinkamɛla z̤aɓɔ maz̤ipʰanɡ̤wɛ iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jɛmfujɔ jaɓɔ iɓɛ nɡ̤amakǁʰɔɓa nd̤iɓakǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰɛ kwimimɔja jɔnkɛ ɔŋǃutʰulaiinwɛlɛ nd̤iɓaz̤isɛlɛ ukusind̤ɛka kupʰuma kumakǀala ɔnkɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ihat͡sɔrɛ ija kuɓa sisikʰunɮa sɛɛmpunɡ̤utʲɛ kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni akuji kuɬala ɓani kʰɔna kunɡ̤apʰamɓukɛli ɲana wɔmntu kʰɔna intɔ ɛjafikajɔ kujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti ililiz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kwɛlakwaɛlam ɛkukǃalɛni kɔɓukumkani ɓukaz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a jajisitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤ijasapʰula isapʰɛtʰa sakwaɛlam intlaɬɛla jɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓaɓɔ nd̤ija kuliz̤isɛla ɛlakwaɛlam imimɔja ɛminɛ ɛpʰuma ɛz̤ipʰɛlwɛni ɛz̤inɛ z̤ɛz̤ulu nd̤iɓakǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰɛ kulɔɔ mimɔja jɔnkɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ luɬanɡ̤a ɓanɡ̤aji kulɔ aɓaz̤iinɮɔɮɔ z̤akwaɛlam nd̤ɔmkǃʰipʰukisa umɓilini uɛlam pʰamɓi kwɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɛ napʰamɓi kwaɓafuna imipʰɛfumlɔ jaɓɔ nd̤iɓaz̤isɛlɛ uɓuɓi ukuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ɔtʰuma ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ ik͡xɛlɛ nd̤id̤ɛ nd̤iɓaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ nd̤ija itrɔnɛ jam kwaɛlam nd̤imt͡ʃaɓalalisɛ kʰɔna naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kuja kutʰi kɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɬa nd̤ikuɓujisɛ ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kukaɛlam ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a iliz̤wi awalitʰɛtʰajɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kwib̤ab̤ɛli nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kwiliz̤wɛ lamakalɛd̤i nɡ̤ɔjɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti lalisitʰi kǁɛlani ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni niv̤akalisɛ nipʰakamisɛ ib̤anilɛ v̤akalisani ukufiɬa jitʰini itʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛ ib̤ab̤ɛli uɬaz̤ɛkilɛ ub̤ɛlɛ ukǃʰipʰukɛ umɓilini umɛrɔd̤aki z̤iɬaz̤ɛkilɛ iz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤aɓɔ z̤ikǃʰipʰukɛ umɓilini iz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kuɲukɛ kwɛz̤a kuɓɔ uɬanɡ̤a lwasɛntla ɔluja kwɛnz̤a iliz̤wɛ laɓɔ kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala linɡ̤aɓi kutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛmntwini kusɛ ɛz̤inkɔmɛni kuɓalɛkwɛ kumkiwɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa nanɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓaja kuz̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kuɲɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a ɓɛhamɓa ɓɛlila ɓajɛ ɓamkǃukǃɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɓaja kuɓuz̤a iz̤ijɔn ɓab̤ɛkɛ kʰɔna ɓɛsitʰi jiz̤ani nitʰɛlɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ɔnɡ̤aji kulitʲalwa aɓantu ɓam ɓaɓa nɡ̤um̤lamɓi wɛɛɡ̤uʃa ɛz̤ilaɬɛkilɛjɔ aɓalusi ɓaɓɔ ɓaɓand̤wɛnd̤wisɛla ɛz̤intaɓɛni ɛz̤ipʰamɓanisajɔ ɓɛhamɓa ɓɛsuka ɛntaɓɛni ɓajɛ ɛnd̤ulini ɓajiliɓalɛ ind̤awɔ jaɓɔ jɔkuɓutʰa kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓafumanajɔ ɓaɓaɮa aɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓaɓɔ ɓatʰi asinatʲala nɡ̤ɛtʰuɓa lɔkuɓa ɓɔnilɛ kujɛhɔv̤a ik͡xiwa lɔɓulunɡ̤isa itʰɛmɓa lɔjisɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓalɛkani nipʰumɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛb̤ab̤ɛli maɓapʰumɛ ɛz̤wɛni lamakalɛd̤i ɓaɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛz̤ikʰɔkɛla um̤lamɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jaɓɔnani nd̤ikǁʰɔkǁʰa nd̤iɲusɛ nd̤isɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli isikʰunɡ̤u sɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛz̤inkulu z̤ipʰuma ɛz̤wɛni lasɛntla z̤ijakʰɛlɛ uluɬu ija kutʰind͡ʒ̤wa apʰɔ iintɔlɔ z̤asɔ z̤iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛɡ̤ɔxa ɛliliɡ̤ǀ̤isa ɛlinɡ̤aɓuji lilamɓatʰa lɔɓa likǁʰɔɓa ɛlamakalɛd̤i ɓɔnkɛ aɓalitʰimɓajɔ ɓaja kuɬutʰa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nakuɓa niv̤uja nd͡ʒ̤alɔ nakuɓa niɮamkilɛ ɓapʰanɡ̤i ɓɛlifa nakuɓa niɮɔɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛtʰɔkaz̤i ɛlib̤ulajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛmɓalasanɛ z̤amahaʃɛ uja kud̤ana kakʰulu uɲɔkɔ uja kuɓa nɛɛntlɔni ɔniz̤alajɔ jaɓɔnani ɔlɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni luja kuɓa jintlanɡ̤ɔ umkǃwɛɓɛd̤u iŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuxalaxumɛ ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ajisaji kuja kuɓa sɛnkanɡ̤ala kujɔ jɔnkɛ ipʰɛla ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɮulajɔ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɓaja kumanɡ̤aliswa ɓɛnz̤ɛ umsɔnɮɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓɛtʰwa kwajɔ kɔnkɛ jakʰɛlɛni uluɬu ib̤ab̤ɛli nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nɔnkɛ ɓatʲɛd̤i ɓɛsapʰɛtʰa tɔlani kujɔ ninɡ̤aʃiji lutɔlɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jɔnilɛ kujɛhɔv̤a d̤umani nɡ̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤inikɛlɛ z̤iwilɛ iiŋ̤ǃ̤ɔkǃɔ z̤ajɔ z̤id̤ilikilɛ iind̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jimpind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ kajɛhɔv̤a pʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlani kujɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwɛnz̤a kwajɔ jɛnz̤ani kujɔ ŋǃumlani um̤lwajɛli ɛb̤ab̤ɛli nɔpʰɛtʰɛ ixɛŋ̤ǃ̤a nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkuv̤una nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛk͡xɛlɛ ɛliɮav̤ulajɔ ɛlɔwɔ ub̤ɛka ɛɓantwini ɓakɔwaɓɔ ɛlɔwɔ usaɓɛla ɛz̤wɛni lakɔwaɓɔ ujiɡ̤uʃa ɛlusali usirajɛli ub̤ɛd͡ʒ̤ɛtʰwɛ z̤iinɡ̤ɔɲama nɡ̤ukumkani wasɛasirija ɔwakǃala wamɮa nɡ̤ɔku ɔwɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla umkǃɔɓi wamatʰamɓɔ akʰɛ nɡ̤unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤ijamv̤ɛlɛla wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli nɛliz̤wɛ lakʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤amv̤ɛlɛlajɔ wasɛasirija nd̤ija kumɓujisɛla usirajɛli ɛk͡xiwɛni lakʰɛ aɮɛ ɛkarmɛlɛ nasɛb̤aʃan uɬutʰɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwaɛfrajim nɛz̤asɛɡ̤ilijad̤i nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa nanɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɓuja uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓukasirajɛli ɓunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ nɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤ikajud̤a z̤inɡ̤afumanɛki nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija kuɓakǁɔlɛla ɛnd̤iɓasalisilɛjɔ iliz̤wɛ lakwankaniz̤ipʰind̤wɛkaɓini ɲuka ujɛ kulɔ kaɲɛ kuɓɛmi ɓɛlakwakɔɬwajwa b̤axisa usinɡ̤ɛlɛ pʰant͡si ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ ɛnd̤akuwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ isitʰɔnɡ̤a sɛmfaz̤wɛ sisɛliz̤wɛni nɔkwapʰuka ɔkukʰulu haji ukukǁakakǁwa ukwapʰulwa kwɛsand̤ɔ sɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ haji ukwɛnz̤iwa kwɛb̤ab̤ɛli ummanɡ̤alisɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a nd̤ikutʰijɛlɛ waɓand͡ʒ̤iswa nɔkuɓand͡ʒ̤iswa b̤ab̤ɛli unɡ̤az̤i kɛ wɛna ufuɲɛnwɛ watʰind͡ʒ̤wa nɔkutʰind͡ʒ̤wa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ulwɛ nɔjɛhɔv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a ujiv̤ulilɛ inɮu jɛz̤ikǁʰɔɓɔ z̤akʰɛ waz̤ikʰupʰa iimpaɬa z̤ɔkub̤av̤uma kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ɛz̤wɛni lamakalɛd̤i jiz̤ani kulɔ niv̤alɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ v̤ulani amakǃɔnɡ̤a alɔ lifumɓɛni nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤id̤imɓilili nilisinɡ̤ɛlɛ pʰant͡si kunɡ̤asali nɛntɔ kulɔ ɬaɓani z̤ɔnkɛ iinkunz̤i z̤alɔ ɛz̤int͡ʃa z̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ maz̤itʰɔtʲɛlwɛ ɛkukǁʰɛlwɛni jɛha kɛ ɓɔna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ijɛz̤a jaɓɔ ikǁɛʃa lɔkuv̤ɛlɛlwa kwaɓɔ pʰulapʰulani naɓɔ aɓasaɓajɔ aɓasind̤ajɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ukuɓa ɓakǁɛlɛ ɛz̤ijɔn impind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu impind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ jɛtɛmpilɛ jakʰɛ ɓaɬaɓɛlɛni umkʰɔsi aɓatɔli ɓɛz̤ɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʲɛd̤i ɓɛsapʰɛtʰa jiŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤ɛni nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ makunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ usind̤ajɔ jiv̤uz̤ɛni nɡ̤ɔkɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i wajɔ nɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ ɛjakwɛnz̤ajɔ jɛnz̤ani nɡ̤akɔ kujɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ikʰukʰumɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a kɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kasirajɛli nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ aja ɛz̤itratwɛni z̤ajɔ amad̤ɔd̤ana ajɔ atʰi ʃwaka nɡ̤alɔɔ ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a ajɔ ɔkulwa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a jaɓɔna nd̤ikukǀʰasilɛ wɛna ukʰukʰumɛlɛjɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ifikilɛ jakʰɔ ikǁɛʃa lɔkukuv̤ɛlɛla wɔkʰuɓɛka ɔkʰukʰumɛlɛjɔ awɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ umv̤usajɔ nd̤ipʰɛmɓɛ umlilɔ ɛmiz̤ini jakʰɛ ut͡ʃɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kujɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi ɓaɓɛkǀud̤iswa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a kuɲɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓatʰimɓajɔ ɓajaɡ̤ǀ̤inisa ukuɓaɓamɓa aɓav̤umi ukuɓand̤ulula umkʰululi waɓɔ ɔɓamisɛlajɔ wɔmɛlɛlɛ uɡ̤ama lakʰɛ linɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi uja kuɓamɓana aɓamɓanɛ nɔɓamɓana naɓɔ ukuz̤ɛ alipʰumz̤ɛ iɬaɓatʰi aɡ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤isɛ aɓɛmi ɓasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ik͡xɛlɛ maliwafikɛlɛ amakalɛd̤i naɓɛmi ɓasɛb̤ab̤ɛli naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓajɔ nɛz̤ilumkɔ z̤ajɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ik͡xɛlɛ maliɓafikɛlɛ aɓapʰɔlɔlɔz̤i ɓɛntɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛjijɔ ɓaɓɛ z̤iz̤imatʰanɛ ik͡xɛlɛ maliwafikɛlɛ amaɡ̤ɔxa akǃʰipʰukɛ umɓilini ik͡xɛlɛ maliwafikɛlɛ amahaʃɛ ajɔ nɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ajɔ z̤ɔkulwa nɔmkǁukukǁɛla wɔnkɛ ɔpʰakatʰi kwajɔ ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓafaz̤i ik͡xɛlɛ maliɓufikɛlɛ uɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓajɔ ukuɓa ɓupʰanɡ̤wɛ ukuɓalɛla makuwafikɛlɛ amanz̤i ajɔ ukuɓa at͡ʃɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa liliz̤wɛ lɛmifanɛkisɔ ɛkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ ɓaz̤iɡ̤ɛz̤isɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤ɔtʰusajɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ kuja kuɬala kʰɔna amaxamŋǀwa ɔmkǃwɛɓɛd̤u nɛɛmpunɡ̤utʲɛ kuɬalɛ iiŋǀiniɓa kʰɔna linɡ̤aɓi napʰakad̤ɛ linɡ̤aɓi saɬalwa iz̤iz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wajib̤ukukǃajɔ utʰikǁɔ isɔd̤ɔm nɛɡ̤ɔmɔra nɛmimɛlwanɛ jajɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a akuji kuɬala ɓani kʰɔna akuji kupʰamɓukɛla ɲana wɔmntu kʰɔna jaɓɔnani kuz̤a aɓantu ɓɛv̤ɛla ɛntla uɬanɡ̤a kɛ ɔlukʰulu nɔɔkumkani aɓaninz̤i ɓajakǁʰɔkǁʰwa ɓɛv̤ɛla ɛz̤ipʰɛlwɛni z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi ɓapʰɛtʰɛ isapʰɛtʰa nɛŋ̰ǀ̰ula ɓaz̤iz̤id͡ʒ̤ɔxa aɓanamfɛsanɛ iliz̤wi laɓɔ liɡ̤uɡ̤uma nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔlwanɮɛ ɓakʰwɛlɛ ɛmahaʃɛni ɓɛkukǁʰɔɓɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnd̤ɔd̤a jɔkulwa ntɔmɓi ijib̤ab̤ɛli uv̤ɛ iind̤aɓa z̤aɓɔ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli z̤asuka z̤awa iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɛ imɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ imɓamɓilɛ ujaz̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔz̤alajɔ jaɓɔnani ut͡ʃaɓa luja kuɲuka nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲama lupʰumɛ ɛkwɛnɛni kwɛjɔrd̤an lujɛ ɛkʰajɛni ɛlijiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija kumɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa nɡ̤ɛpʰaɲaz̤ɔ kulɔ ɔsukuɓa ɛɲulwɛ nd̤imɛnz̤ɛlɛ umv̤ɛlɛli walɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤uɓani ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤am nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kund̤imɛma nɡ̤uɓani lɔɔ uja pʰamɓi nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ liv̤ɛni ikǀɛɓɔ likajɛhɔv̤a alikǀɛɓilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛb̤ab̤ɛli nɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ az̤ikǀinɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛliz̤wɛ lamakalɛd̤i ɛsitʰi inɛnɛ ɓaja kuz̤ik͡xwikǃiliz̤a ɛz̤iŋǀinanɛ z̤ɔm̤lamɓi inɛnɛ lija kumanɡ̤aliswa z̤iz̤ɔ ik͡xiwa laz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛliz̤wi ɛlitʰi iɓand͡ʒ̤iwɛ ib̤ab̤ɛli lijaɲikima iɬaɓatʰi kuv̤akala isikʰalɔ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤ikǁʰɔkǁʰɛla ib̤ab̤ɛli naɓaɬɛli nɡ̤apʰakatʰi kwaɓasukɛla pʰɛz̤ulu umɔja wɔmɔnakalisi nd̤ija kutʰumɛla ɛb̤ab̤ɛli aɓasɛmz̤ini aɓaja kujɛla ɓalitʰi kǃɔŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔlɔ iliz̤wɛ lajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɔjifikɛla nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛmini jɔɓuɓi umtʲɛd̤i wɛsapʰɛtʰa makaɡ̤ɔɓɛlɛ kɔɡ̤ɔɓajɔ nakɔz̤iɲusajɔ ɛnɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jɛnt͡simɓi ninɡ̤awajɛki amad̤ɔd̤ana ajɔ sinɡ̤ɛlani pʰant͡si wɔnkɛ umkʰɔsi wajɔ ɓawɛ aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ ɛz̤wɛni lamakalɛd̤i naɓaɬatʲwɛ amaɬanz̤a ɛz̤itratwɛni z̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa usirajɛli kwanɔjud̤a akaʃijwanɡ̤a wanɡ̤um̤lɔlɔkaz̤i nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi kuɓa iliz̤wɛ laɓɔ liz̤ɛlɛ litʲala kɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kasirajɛli saɓani nipʰumɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli nisiz̤ɛ ɛlɔwɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ maninɡ̤ad̤aki nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛli likǁɛʃa lɛmpind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ kujɛhɔv̤a uja kuɓujɛkɛz̤a kujɔ kwaimpatʰɔ jajɔ ib̤ab̤ɛli iɓɛ ijind̤ɛɓɛ jɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛsanɮɛni sikajɛhɔv̤a iliŋǁilisa lɔnkɛ iɬaɓatʰi z̤asɛla iintlanɡ̤a ɛwajinini jajɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ z̤ijaɡ̤ɛz̤a iintlanɡ̤a iwilɛ ib̤ab̤ɛli nɡ̤ɛsikǃupʰɛ japʰuka b̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤ani nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jajɔ intlunɡ̤u jajɔ jitʰaɓatʰɛlɛni amafutʰa akǃʰɔliwɛjɔ m̤lawumɓi inɡ̤apʰɔliswa ɓatʰi siɓa nɡ̤ajiɲanɡ̤a ib̤ab̤ɛli ajipʰili jiʃijɛni sihamɓɛ sijɛ ɛlɔwɔ ɛz̤wɛni lakɔwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa itʲala lajɔ lifikɛ ɛmaz̤ulwini lipʰakamɛlɛ ɛsib̤akab̤akɛni ujɛhɔv̤a uɓuv̤ɛlisilɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓɛtʰu jiz̤ani siɓalisɛ ɛz̤ijɔn isɛnz̤ɔ sikajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu kʰaz̤imlisani iintɔlɔ kǃuɓulani amakʰaka ujɛhɔv̤a ukǁʰɔkǁʰɛ umɔja wɔkumkani ɓamakalɛd̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umŋ̰ǃ̰anɡ̤ijɛlɔ wakʰɛ ukwib̤ab̤ɛli ukuɓa ajɔnakalisɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jimpind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ kajɛhɔv̤a jimpind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ jɛtɛmpilɛ jakʰɛ z̤ipʰakamisɛlɛni ib̤anilɛ iind̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤asɛb̤ab̤ɛli kǃinisani ukulind̤a aɓalind̤i lunɡ̤isani imilalɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a waŋ̰ǃ̰anɡ̤ijɛlajɔ ukwɛnz̤ilɛ awakutʰɛtʰajɔ nɡ̤aɓɛmi ɓasɛb̤ab̤ɛli wɛna uɬɛlijɔ pʰɛz̤u kwamanz̤i amaninz̤i uɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓakʰɔ ɓuninz̤i kufikilɛ ukupʰɛla kwakʰɔ isilinɡ̤anisɛlɔ sɛnz̤uz̤ɔ jakʰɔ ɛmɓi ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ufunɡ̤ɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ɛsitʰi nɔkɔ nd̤ikuz̤alisilɛjɔ nɡ̤aɓantu ɓanɡ̤a z̤iinkumɓi ɛz̤iŋǃuŋǃutʰajɔ kuja kususɛlwa nɡ̤awɛ ukwɛnz̤iwa amajɛjɛjɛ nɡ̤ulɔwɛnz̤a iɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤amanɮa akʰɛ nɡ̤ulɔz̤inz̤isa ɛlimiwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔɓulumkɔ ɓakʰɛ wanɛka iz̤ulu nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ jakʰɛ kwakuɓɔn ukuɓa kukʰɔ isitʰɔnɡ̤a sɔkwɛnz̤a kwakʰɛ iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔlɔ jamanz̤i ɛz̤ulwini uɲusa ɛsipʰɛlwɛni sɛɬaɓatʰi imv̤ula ujɛnz̤ɛla imiɓanɛ axɔlɛ umɔja kɔɔv̤imɓa ɓakʰɛ uɓa sisitʰʲakala wɔnkɛ ɛnɡ̤ɛnakwaz̤i ud̤aniswa wɔnkɛ umɲiɓilikisi wɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmfanɛkisɔ ɔkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umfanɛkisɔ wakʰɛ ɔtʰʲid̤iwɛjɔ ɓuɓukǁɔki awunamɔja z̤inɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ sisɛnz̤ɔ sɔkuɡ̤ǁ̤ɛkwa nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkuv̤ɛlɛlwa kwaz̤ɔ z̤ija kut͡ʃaɓalala akand͡ʒ̤alɔ jɛna usaɬulɛlɔ sikajakɔɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤umɓumɓi wɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ jɛna nɔwɛsiz̤wɛ sɛlifa lakʰɛ jɛna nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ wɛna usisikǁɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɛ usisik͡xwɛkǃɛ sɔkulwa nd̤ija kuz̤iɬɛkɛz̤a nɡ̤awɛ iintlanɡ̤a nd̤iz̤ɔnakalisɛ nɡ̤awɛ iz̤ikumkani nd̤iɬɛkɛz̤ɛ nɡ̤awɛ ihaʃɛ nɔmkʰwɛli walɔ nd̤iɬɛkɛz̤ɛ iŋǃwɛlɔ jɔkulwa nɔmkʰwɛli wajɔ nd̤iɬɛkɛz̤ɛ nɡ̤awɛ ind̤ɔd̤a nɔmfaz̤i nd̤iɬɛkɛz̤ɛ nɡ̤awɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnkulu nɔmfana nd̤iɬɛkɛz̤ɛ nɡ̤awɛ amad̤ɔd̤ana nɔmtʰind͡ʒ̤ana nd̤iɬɛkɛz̤ɛ nɡ̤awɛ nɔm̤lamɓi wakʰɛ nd̤iɬɛkɛz̤ɛ nɡ̤awɛ nɛsipani sakʰɛ nd̤iɬɛkɛz̤ɛ nɡ̤awɛ amaɓamɓa nɛɛxulunɛli nd̤ɔɓujɛkɛkɛz̤a kwib̤ab̤ɛli nakuɓɛni ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛlamakalɛd̤i ɓɔnkɛ uɓuɓi ɓaɓɔ aɓaɓɛnz̤ɛ kwiz̤ijɔn ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛnu ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a jaɓɔna nd̤ikukǀʰasilɛ ntaɓa jɔkɔnakalisa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛlɔnakalisilɛjɔ lɔnkɛ iɬaɓatʰi nd̤ija kɔlula isanɮa pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ nd̤ikukǃɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛ uɬɛ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxɛni nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ intaɓa ɛt͡ʃisiwɛjɔ kunɡ̤atʰatʲatʰwa litʲɛ lamɓɔmɓɔ kuwɛ nalitʲɛ laz̤isɛkɔ kɛ uja kwɛnz̤iwa kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a pʰakamisani ib̤anilɛ ɛliz̤wɛni v̤utʰɛlani isiɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni z̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛni iintlanɡ̤a kujɔ z̤iɬaɓɛlɛni umkʰɔsi z̤iz̤ɛ kujɔ iz̤ikumkani z̤ɛararati nɛmini nɛaʃkɛnaz̤i jalɛlani kujɔ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɲusani amahaʃɛ ɛz̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnkumɓi ɛz̤iŋǃuŋǃutʰajɔ ɛz̤iɓɛtʰa uɓɛ namanwɛlɛ z̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛni iintlanɡ̤a kujɔ ɔɔkumkani ɓamamɛd̤i namaɓamɓa awɔ nɛɛxulunɛli z̤awɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nɛliz̤wɛ lɔnkɛ lɔlawulɔ lwawɔ iɬaɓatʰi lijaɲikima lijaz̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa z̤ɛnz̤ɛka kwib̤ab̤ɛli iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a z̤ɔkulɛnz̤a iliz̤wɛ lɛb̤ab̤ɛli kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala linɡ̤amiwa amaɡ̤ɔxa asɛb̤ab̤ɛli ajɛkilɛ aɬɛli ɛz̤imɓɔnisɛlwɛni uɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓawɔ ɓutʰɛ kǃɔkɔ aɓa nɡ̤aɓafaz̤i imiŋǃuɓa jajɔ ifakwɛ isikʰuni japʰukilɛ imiv̤alɔ jajɔ isiɡ̤id̤imi sijaɡ̤id̤ima sikǃuɓisana nɛsiɡ̤id̤imi umɓiki ukǃuɓisana nɔmɓiki aɓikɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ukuɓa umz̤i wakʰɛ utʰind͡ʒ̤wɛ kwapʰɛla amaz̤iɓukɔ av̤iŋ̤ǀ̤iwɛ amad̤ikɛ at͡ʃɛ nɡ̤umlilɔ amad̤ɔd̤a ɔkulwa akʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰isiwɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ukutʰi intɔmɓi ɛjib̤ab̤ɛli ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsand̤a nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkuɡ̤anɡ̤atʰwa kwasɔ kusaja kuɓa nɡ̤umz̤uz̤wana lifikɛ ikǁɛʃa lɔkuv̤una kujɔ wasib̤ub̤isa tʰina wasiŋǀinitʰa unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli wasiɓɛka saɓa sisitʲa ɛsiz̤ɛ wasiɡ̤iɲa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤wɛɲa waɬutʰisa sakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɮa kwɛtʰu ɔkumnand̤i wasiɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa ukuɡ̤ɔɲamɛlwa nɛɲama jam makuɓɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛb̤ab̤ɛli makat͡ʃɔ wasɛz̤ijɔn iɡ̤az̤i maliɓɛ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɛmi ɓɛlamakalɛd̤i majit͡ʃɔ ijɛrusalɛm nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ijalitʰɛtʰa itʲala lakʰɔ nd̤ipʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlɛ impind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ jakʰɔ nd̤ilut͡ʃisɛ ulwanɮɛ lwajɔ nd̤ilɔmisɛ itʰɛnd̤ɛ lajɔ ib̤ab̤ɛli ija kuɓa nɡ̤umwɛwɛ isikʰunɮa sɛɛmpunɡ̤utʲɛ ummanɡ̤alisɔ nɔmsɔnɮɔ inɡ̤aɓi ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓanɡ̤ab̤axula nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ɛz̤int͡ʃa ɓanɡ̤av̤unɡ̤ama nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amatʰɔlɛ ɛnɡ̤ɔɲamakaz̤i kanti kɛ ɛɓuʃuʃwini ɓaɓɔ nd̤ija kuɓɛnz̤ɛla umɡ̤id̤i waɓɔ nd̤iɓaŋǁilisɛ ukuz̤ɛ ɓaɮamkɛ ɓalalɛ uɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ ɔɓunɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ɓanɡ̤av̤uki ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kuɓatʰɔɓɛla ɛkukǁʰɛlwɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amatakanɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa nɛz̤ɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ haji ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kwɛʃɛʃaki ukuɓand͡ʒ̤wa kwɛkǃʰajija lɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ haji ukwɛnz̤iwa ummanɡ̤alisɔ kwɛb̤ab̤ɛli pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a ulwanɮɛ luɲukilɛ lwajiz̤ɛla ib̤ab̤ɛli iɡ̤utʲunɡ̤ɛlwɛ kukuɡ̤uɡ̤uma kwamaz̤a alɔ imiz̤i jajɔ jaɓa nɡ̤amaŋǁuwa jaɓa liliz̤wɛ lɔmkǃwɛɓɛd̤u nɛŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsi liliz̤wɛ ɛlinɡ̤amiwɛ ɛkunɡ̤aɮuli ɲana wɔmntu kulɔ nd̤ija kumv̤ɛlɛla ub̤ɛlɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli nd̤ikuxɔlɛ ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɛ akuɡ̤iɲilɛjɔ z̤inɡ̤aɓi sasinɡ̤a kujɛ iintlanɡ̤a nɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a lwɛb̤ab̤ɛli luja pʰumani pʰakatʰi kwajɔ ɓantu ɓam siz̤ani ɛlɔwɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɬɛz̤ɛ itʰamɓɛ intliz̤ijɔ jɛnu nɔjikɛ iind̤aɓa ɛz̤iv̤akalajɔ ɛz̤wɛni z̤ija kuz̤a nɔmɲaka iind̤aɓa ɛz̤ɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ nɡ̤ɔmɲɛ umɲaka kuz̤ɛ iind̤aɓa ɛz̤ɔ kuz̤ɛ uɡ̤ɔɲamɛlɔ ɛz̤wɛni ɛɓamɓɛnɛ nɔmlawuli nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ujaɓɔna kuz̤a imiɬa ɛnd̤ija kujiv̤ɛlɛla imifanɛkisɔ ɛkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ jasɛb̤ab̤ɛli lib̤axɛ iliz̤wɛ lajɔ lɔnkɛ ɓawɛ pʰakatʰi kwajɔ aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ kujɔ lija kumɛmɛlɛla nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛb̤ab̤ɛli iz̤ulu nɔm̤laɓa nɛntɔ jɔnkɛ ɛkʰɔna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓab̤ukǃi ɓapʰumɛ ɛntla ɓɛz̤a kujɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa ib̤ab̤ɛli japʰikɛla aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ ɓakwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ ɓaja nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛb̤ab̤ɛli aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ ɓɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ nina nisind̤ilɛjɔ ɛk͡xɛlɛni ɓamɓani mkʰumɓulɛni ujɛhɔv̤a nisɛkud̤ɛ itʰi kǃatʰa ɛz̤intliz̤ijwɛni z̤ɛnu ijɛrusalɛm sid̤anilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa siv̤ɛ isiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ iɬaz̤ɔ laɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla uɓusɔ ɓɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aɓasɛmz̤ini ɓaz̤inɡ̤ɛnɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤ɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jaɓɔnani kuz̤a imiɬa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnd̤ija kujiv̤ɛlɛla imifanɛkisɔ ɛkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ ɛliz̤wɛni lajɔ ɓaŋǀwinɛ aɓaɬatʲiwɛjɔ nɔkuɓa ib̤ab̤ɛli itʰɛ jɛɲuka jaja ɛz̤ulwini nɔkuɓa itʰɛ jajiŋǃaɓisa ind̤awɔ ɛpʰɛz̤ulu iŋǃaɓa jajɔ aɓab̤ukǃi ɓajɔ ɓaja kupʰuma ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a pʰulapʰulani nakɔ ukukʰala kupʰuma ɛb̤ab̤ɛli nɔmapʰulɔ ɔmkʰulu upʰuma ɛz̤wɛni lamakalɛd̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ujajib̤ukǃa ib̤ab̤ɛli alit͡ʃaɓalalisɛ kujɔ iz̤wi ɛlikʰulu aɡ̤uɡ̤uma amaz̤a ajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amanz̤i amaninz̤i kuv̤akala iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔlɔ jɛsand̤i sawɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umb̤ukǃi uja kujifikɛla ib̤ab̤ɛli atʰind͡ʒ̤wɛ amaɡ̤ɔxa ajɔ z̤ikǃʰawukɛ iz̤apʰɛtʰa z̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɛmɓujɛkɛz̤ɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uja kuv̤uz̤a ɛv̤uz̤ilɛ nd̤ijaɓaŋǁilisa aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓajɔ nɛz̤ilumkɔ z̤ajɔ amaɓamɓa ajɔ nɛɛxulunɛli z̤ajɔ namaɡ̤ɔxa ajɔ aja uɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ ɔɓunɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ anɡ̤av̤uki ut͡ʃɔ ukumkani ɔɡ̤ama lakʰɛ linɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi ukutʰi iind̤ɔnɡ̤a ɛz̤iɓanz̤i z̤ɛb̤ab̤ɛli z̤ija kuŋǃikwa kuɓɛ kaɲɛ amasanɡ̤ɔ ajɔ apʰakamilɛjɔ at͡ʃiswɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤iz̤ikǁʰamlɛlɛ ɔkulamɓatʰajɔ nɛɛntlanɡ̤a z̤iz̤ikǁʰamlɛlɛ umlilɔ z̤itʰʲafɛ kɛ iliz̤wi awatʰi ujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti wamwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤alɔ usɛraja uɲana kanɛrija uɲana kamasɛja ɛkujɛni kwakʰɛ nɔz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wakwajud̤a ɛb̤ab̤ɛli nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsinɛ wɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ usɛraja lɔ ɛnɡ̤umt͡ʃajɛlɛli ujɛrɛmija waɓub̤ala ɛŋǀwad̤ini ɓɔnkɛ uɓuɓi ɔɓuja kujifikɛla ib̤ab̤ɛli ɔnkɛ maz̤wi ab̤aliwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛb̤ab̤ɛli watʰi kɛ ujɛrɛmija kusɛraja wakufika ɛb̤ab̤ɛli kʰanɡ̤ɛla ɔnkɛ lamaz̤wi uwalɛsɛ uz̤ɛ utʰi jɛhɔv̤a wɛna utʰɛtʰilɛ nɡ̤alɛ nd̤awɔ ukujiŋǃumla inɡ̤amiwa kutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ kusɛ nakwinkɔmɔ kɛ jɔna ija kuɓa nɡ̤amaŋǁuwa anɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ kɔtʰi wakuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa ukujilɛsa lɛ ŋǀwad̤i uɓɔpʰɛ ilitʲɛ kujɔ ujinz̤ulumɓɛlɛ ɛsaz̤ulwini sɔmɛfrati utʰi ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ib̤ab̤ɛli ukutʰi kǁumɓu kwajɔ inɡ̤apʰumi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi ɛnd̤ija kujiz̤isɛla ɓɔna ɓatʰʲafɛ az̤ɛ ɛma apʰa amaz̤wi kajɛrɛmija uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija uɓɛmiɲaka imaʃumi maɓini anamɲɛ ɛz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kwakʰɛ waɓa nɛmiɲaka ɛliʃumi ɛlinamɲɛ ɛnɡ̤ukumkani ɛjɛrusalɛm iɡ̤ama lɔnina ɓɛlinɡ̤uhamutali intɔmɓi kajɛrɛmija wasɛlib̤ɛna wɛnz̤a ɔkuɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni kajɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ awakwɛnz̤ajɔ ujɛhɔjakim nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a kwɛnz̤ɛka ɔkɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm nakwajud̤a wad̤a waɓalaɬa ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija ɛɡ̤wilika wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsitʰɔɓa wɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛʃumi nɡ̤ɔsuku lwɛʃumi ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ wajifikɛla ijɛrusalɛm unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli jɛna nɛmpi jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ wajixawula wajakʰɛla iŋǃaɓa jɔkuɓɔnisɛla nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ waŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤wa kɛ umz̤i kwad̤a kwaɓa nɡ̤umɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinamɲɛ wɔkumkani uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija nɡ̤ɔsuku lwɛsitʰɔɓa lwɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsinɛ jakǃina inɮala pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i aɓaɓa nasɔnka aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ waɡ̤ǃ̤ɔd͡ʒ̤ɔz̤wa umz̤i asaɓa ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a ɔkulwa apʰuma pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i ɛɓusuku nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɛlipʰakatʰi kwɛɛnd̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤ɔmɓini ɛlisɛmjɛz̤wɛni wɔkumkani ajɛ kɛ amakalɛd̤i ɛwud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛ umz̤i aɓamɓa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jasɛarab̤a impi jamakalɛd̤i jamsukɛla jamfumana uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija ɛz̤iŋ̰ǃ̰antɔsini z̤asɛjɛrikɔ jɔnkɛ jakʰɛ jampʰalala jɛmka kujɛ amɓamɓa aɲuka najɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛrib̤ɛla ɛz̤wɛni lɛhamati wawatʰɛtʰa apʰɔ amatʲala akʰɛ ukumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli waɓasikɛla ɔɔɲana ɓakaz̤ɛd̤ɛkija ɛmɛɬwɛni akʰɛ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔnkɛ ɓakwajud̤a waɓasikɛla ɛrib̤ɛla wamtʰʲapʰaz̤a amɛɬɔ uz̤ɛd̤ɛkija wamkʰɔŋ̰ǁ̰a nɡ̤amakʰamand̤ɛla ɔb̤ɛd̤u wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛntɔlɔnɡ̤wɛni kwad̤a kwajimini jɔkufa kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsiɬanu nɡ̤ɔsuku lwɛʃumi ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ lɔ mɲaka kɛ nɡ̤ɔwɛʃumi ɛlinɛmiɲaka ɛsitʰɔɓa unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli wanɡ̤ɛna ɛjɛrusalɛm unɛb̤uz̤arad̤an umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki ɔwɛma pʰamɓi kɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli wajit͡ʃisa inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nɛnɮu jɔkumkani nɛz̤inɮu z̤ɔnkɛ z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm iz̤inɮu z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛz̤ikʰulu waz̤it͡ʃisa nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ iind̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ z̤asɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ jaz̤id̤iliz̤a jɔnkɛ jamakalɛd̤i ɛɓinɔmtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki kwiz̤iswɛli z̤aɓantu namasalɛla aɓantu aɓaɓɛsɛlɛ pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i namapʰamɓa awapʰamɓɛlajɔ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli namasalɛla ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ wawafud̤usa unɛb̤uz̤arad̤an umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki kɛ unɛb̤uz̤arad̤an umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki kwiz̤iswɛli z̤ɛliz̤wɛ ukuz̤ɛ z̤iɓɛ nɡ̤aɓasɛɓɛnz̤i ɓɛmid̤ilija naɓalimi iint͡sika z̤ɔb̤ɛd̤u ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤isɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nɛɛŋǃwɛlwana nɔlwanɮɛ lɔb̤ɛd̤u ɔɓɛlusɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ az̤ikǃʰɛkɛz̤a amakalɛd̤i alutʰwalɛla ɛb̤ab̤ɛli lɔnkɛ ub̤ɛd̤u lwaz̤ɔ atʰaɓatʰa nɛɛmɓiz̤a nɛmiɬakulwana nɛz̤it͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ nɛz̤itʲa z̤ɔkut͡ʃiz̤a nɛɛnkamɓa nɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɔb̤ɛd̤u ɛɓɛkulunɡ̤isɛlɛlwa nɡ̤az̤ɔ umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki watʰaɓatʰa iz̤id̤ɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ nɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɛd̤ɛv̤u nɛz̤itʲa z̤ɔkut͡ʃisa nɛɛmɓiz̤a nɛz̤ipʰatʰɔ z̤ɛz̤iɓanɛ nɛɛnkamɓa namatʰunɡ̤a iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ kwɛz̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ isiliv̤ɛrɛ kwɛz̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɛnt͡sika z̤ɔmɓini ulwanɮɛ ɔluɲɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛlinamɓini z̤ɔb̤ɛd̤u ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤ipʰant͡si kwalɔ nɛɛŋǃwɛlwana awaz̤ɛnz̤ɛla inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a usɔlɔmɔn alwaɓa nakulinɡ̤aniswa ub̤ɛd̤u lwɛz̤ɔ mpaɬa z̤ɔnkɛ nɛɛnt͡sika ɛz̤ɔ ukupʰakama kwɛɲɛ int͡sika kuɓɛ kuz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ umtʲa ɔz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛlinamɓini uɓujitʰand̤ɛla nɛz̤iɲukɔ z̤ajɔ ɓɛz̤ijiminwɛ ɛminɛ iɓihɔlɔhɔlɔ iŋ̤ǃ̤ukuv̤a jajɔ iɓijɛjɔb̤ɛd̤u ukupʰakama kwɛŋ̤ǃ̤ukuv̤a ɓɛkuz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intlanu umnatʰa nɛɛxarnatɛ ɓɛz̤isɛŋ̤ǃ̤ukuv̤ɛni nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ jɔnkɛ lɔɔ ntɔ jaɓɛ ilub̤ɛd̤u int͡sika jɛsiɓini jaɓɛ ikwand͡ʒ̤alɔ kuɲɛ nɛɛxarnatɛ iixarnatɛ ɓɛz̤inɡ̤amaʃumi asitʰɔɓa anantand̤atʰu z̤ib̤ɛkɛ ɛmɔjɛni iixarnatɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɓɛz̤ilikʰulu pʰɛz̤u kɔmnatʰa nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki wamtʰaɓatʰa usɛraja umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɔjintlɔkɔ nɔz̤ɛfanija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wɛjɛsiɓini naɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inimɲanɡ̤ɔ ɓɔɓatʰatʰu kuwɔ umz̤i watʰaɓatʰa umɓusi wamɲɛ ɔwajɛnɡ̤umv̤ɛlɛli wamad̤ɔd̤a ɔkulwa namad̤ɔd̤a asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kuwɔ aɓɛɓɔna uɓusɔ ɓɔkumkani awafuɲanwa pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i nɔmb̤ali wɔmtʰɛtʰɛli wɔmkʰɔsi ɔɓɛɬaɓa umkʰɔsi kuɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ namad̤ɔd̤a amaʃumi matʰand̤atʰu kuɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ awafuɲanwajɔ pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i waɓatʰaɓatʰa aɓɔ unɛb̤uz̤arad̤an umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki waɓasa ɛrib̤ɛla wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli waɓakǁaɓɛla wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli waɓaɓulala ɛrib̤ɛla ɛz̤wɛni lasɛhamati afud̤uswa kɛ amajud̤a ɛm̤laɓɛni wawɔ nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓa aɓantu awaɓafud̤usajɔ unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ amajud̤a anɡ̤amawaka amatʰatʰu anamaŋǀi maɓini anamatʰatʰu nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ kanɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ kwafud̤uswa ɛjɛrusalɛm imipʰɛfumlɔ jaɓa makʰulu asib̤ɔz̤ɔ anamaŋǀi matʰatʰu anamiɓini nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi amaɓini anamitʰatʰu kanɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ unɛb̤uz̤arad̤an umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki wafud̤usa amajud̤a ajimipʰɛfumlɔ ɛmakʰulu asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ anamaŋǀi manɛ anamiɬanu jɔnkɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ jaɓa nɡ̤amawaka amanɛ anamakʰulu amatʰand̤atʰu kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ wɔkufud̤uswa kukajɛhɔjakim wakwajud̤a nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɓini nɡ̤ɔsuku lwamaʃumi ɔmaɓini anɛsiɬanu ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ uɛv̤ilimɛrɔd̤aki wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɔkwɛnz̤iwa kwakʰɛ wajipʰakamisa intlɔkɔ kajɛhɔjakim wakwajud̤a wamkʰupʰa ɛntɔlɔnɡ̤wɛni watʰɛtʰa najɛ kakuɬɛ wajimisa itrɔnɛ jakʰɛ jaɓa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛɛtrɔnɛ z̤aɓaɲɛ ɔɔkumkani aɓaɓɛnajɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli waz̤ikʰulula iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔɓuɓand͡ʒ̤wa ukuɮa isɔnka ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɔkupʰila kwakʰɛ umkǁʰɛʃɔ wakʰɛ umkǁʰɛʃɔ wamakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ uv̤ɛla wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli intɔ jɛmini nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛmini jajɔ kwad̤a kwajimini jɔkufa kwakʰɛ jɔnkɛ imiɬa jɔkupʰila kwakʰɛ jɔɔ uɬɛli wɔd̤wa umz̤i ɔɓantu ɓajɛ ɓɛɓaninz̤i ɔɓɛ umkʰulu ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni usukɛ waɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔm̤lɔlɔkaz̤i umtʰɛtʰɛlikaz̤i ɛmaz̤wɛni usukɛ waɓa nɡ̤ɔfakwa uv̤ikɔ ulila ɛlililɛ ɛɓusuku iiɲɛmɓɛz̤i z̤akʰɛ z̤isɛz̤iɮɛlɛni z̤akʰɛ akanamtʰutʰuz̤ɛli kuz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤itʰand̤anɛ z̤akʰɛ ɔnkɛ amakʰɔlwanɛ akʰɛ ammɛnɛz̤ɛlɛlɛ aɓa lut͡ʃaɓa kujɛ ujud̤a ujɛ ɛkutʰind͡ʒ̤wɛni ɛpʰuma ɛz̤int͡siz̤ini nasɛz̤inkɔnz̤wɛni ɛz̤ininz̤i jɛna uɬɛli ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni kupʰumla ɓɔnkɛ aɓamsukɛlajɔ ɓamfikɛlɛ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǁ̤inɡ̤ɔnɡ̤wɛni iinɮɛla z̤asɛz̤ijɔn z̤ɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ kwaɓaja ɛmitʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkwɛni ɔnkɛ amasanɡ̤ɔ ajɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓajɔ ɓajaŋǀwina iintɔmɓi z̤ajɔ z̤inɔsiz̤i jɔna kɛ kuk͡xak͡xa kujɔ aɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓajɔ ɓasuka ɓajintlɔkɔ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤ajɔ z̤inɔɓuŋǃɔɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a ujɛnz̤ɛ janɔsiz̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔk͡xɛkǃɔ lwajɔ ɔluninz̤i aɓantwana ɓajɔ ɓɛmkilɛ ɓatʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛ ɓakǃʰutʲwa nɡ̤umɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓupʰumilɛ ɛntɔmɓini ɛnɡ̤uz̤ijɔn ɓɔnkɛ uɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa ɓajɔ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓajɔ ɓaɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amakǁʰama anɡ̤afumani ɮɛlɔ ahamɓa ɛnɡ̤ɛnamanɮa pʰamɓi kɔmsukɛli ijɛrusalɛm ijaz̤ikʰumɓula nɡ̤ɛmini jɛɛnt͡siz̤i z̤ajɔ nɛjɔkud̤inɡ̤a kwajɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ajɔ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ ɛɓinaz̤ɔ z̤amand̤ulɔ ɛkuwɛni kwaɓantu ɓajɔ ɛsanɮɛni sɔmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli inɡ̤ɛnamŋǀɛd̤i aɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓajɔ ɓajiɓɔna ɓakuɬɛka ukukǀiɲwa kwajɔ ijɛrusalɛm asikukɔ nɔkuɓa jɔnilɛ jɔna nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ jaɓa lub̤ɔxa ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛjiz̤ukisa ɓajajikǀukukǀɛz̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaɓɔnɛ uɓuz̤ɛ ɓajɔ najɔ nɡ̤ɔkwajɔ ijaŋǀwina iɓujɛ umv̤a uɓuŋǃamɓi ɓajɔ ɓusɛz̤inɡ̤utʲɛni z̤ajɔ ɛz̤ixukǃajɔ ajilikʰumɓulɛlanɡ̤a ikamv̤a lajɔ jɛɬa kɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓalulɛkilɛjɔ ajinamtʰutʰuz̤ɛli itʰi z̤ikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ jɛhɔv̤a iint͡siz̤i z̤am nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃaɓa luz̤ikʰulisilɛ umɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli usɔlulɛ isanɮa sakʰɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤intɔ z̤ajɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ kuɓa iɓɔna iintlanɡ̤a z̤inɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni jajɔ ɔwawuwisɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ wɛna ukuɓa z̤inɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni ɛɓanɮɛni lakʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓajɔ ɓajaŋǀwina ɓɛfuna isɔnka ɓaxɔlɛ iz̤intɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛsɔnka ukuz̤ɛ ɓawuɓujisɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ ɓɔna jɛhɔv̤a ukʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ukuɓa nd̤isukɛ nd̤akǀukukǀɛz̤ɛka akuntɔ ɔku nɔnkɛ niɮula nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla b̤ɛkani niɓɔnɛ ukuɓa kukʰɔ umv̤and̤ɛd̤wa ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmv̤and̤ɛd̤wa ɛnd̤iwɛnz̤iwɛjɔ atʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a wand̤ɛnz̤a lusiz̤i nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ ɛnɡ̤apʰɛz̤ulu utʰumɛ umlilɔ ɛmatʰand͡ʒ̤ɛni wawaɲatʰɛla uz̤anɛkɛlɛ umnatʰa iiɲawɔ z̤am wand̤iɓujisa umv̤a und̤ɛnz̤ɛ iŋǁuwa jɔnkɛ nd̤itʰʲafilɛ idʲɔkʰwɛ jɛz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤am iɓɔt͡ʃwɛ sisanɮa sakʰɛ z̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ɛlɛnɛ z̤ɛɲuka z̤aɓa sɛmkǃalɛni z̤awakʰuɓɛkisa amanɮa inkɔsi jam ind̤inikɛlɛ ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤aɓɔ nd̤inɡ̤ɛnakumisa kuɓɔ inkɔsi jam iz̤it͡ʃit͡ʃisilɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iimɓalasanɛ z̤am ɛz̤ipʰakatʰi ind̤imɛmɛlɛ umtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ ukuɓa japʰulɛ amad̤ɔd̤ana inkɔsi jam ikǁɔv̤ulɛ inkaz̤ana ɛnɡ̤ujud̤a nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤atʰi kusɛsikǁɔv̤ulwɛni sɛwajini nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ nd̤ijalila ilisɔ ilisɔ liɬa amanz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛkud̤ɛ umtʰutʰuz̤ɛli umɓujisi wɔmpʰɛfumlɔ ɓaz̤iimpanz̤a aɓantwana ɓam nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃaɓa lund̤ɔjisilɛ iz̤ijɔn ijaz̤ɔlula iz̤anɮa z̤ajɔ ajinamtʰutʰuz̤ɛli ujɛhɔv̤a uɓawisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ɔjakɔb̤i ukuɓa aɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓakʰɛ ɓamŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnɡ̤ɛ ijɛrusalɛm ijintɔ ɛlub̤ɔxa pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ulilunɡ̤isa ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛnd̤ipʰikisɛ umlɔmɔ wakʰɛ kʰaniv̤ɛ nɔnkɛ z̤iz̤wɛ niwuɓɔnɛ umv̤and̤ɛd̤wa umtʰind͡ʒ̤ana namad̤ɔd̤ana ɛmkɛ nɔkutʰind͡ʒ̤wa nd̤iɓiz̤ɛ iz̤itʰand̤anɛ z̤am z̤and̤ikʰɔɬisa z̤ɔna aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓam namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu apʰumɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i kǁa aɓɛz̤ifunɛla ukuɮa ukuɓa aɓujisɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ jawɔ kʰanɡ̤ɛla jɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤iɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛkilɛ iz̤iɓilini z̤am z̤ijaɓila intliz̤ijɔ jam ipʰɛnd̤ukilɛ pʰakatʰi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤asuka nd̤aɓa z̤iinkani kupʰɛla nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ ik͡xɛlɛ land̤iɬutʰa aɓantwana nɡ̤apʰakatʰi kɔd̤wa ɓand̤iv̤ilɛ ukuɓa nd̤ijaŋǀwina nd̤atʰi and̤inamtʰutʰuz̤ɛli z̤ɔnkɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤am z̤iɓuv̤ilɛ uɓuɓi ɓam z̤inɛmiɬali nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔkɔ kwɛnz̤iwɛ nɡ̤uwɛ ujajiz̤isa ɔjimɛmilɛjɔ z̤ija kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤am kɛ maɓufikɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ uɓuɓi ɓaz̤ɔ uz̤ipʰatʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wand̤ipʰatʰa nɡ̤akɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤am z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kuninz̤i ukuŋǀwina nɛntliz̤ijɔ jam itʰʲafilɛ jɔɔ itʰɛni inkɔsi jam ukujisiɓɛkɛla kanɡ̤aka nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ wajɔ intɔmɓi ɛnɡ̤uz̤ijɔn isikʰupʰilɛ ɛz̤ulwini jasikʰaɬɛla ɛɬaɓatʰini isihɔmɓɔ sikasirajɛli ajasikʰumɓula isiɬalɔ sɛɛɲawɔ z̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɛmini jɔmsind̤ɔ wajɔ inkɔsi jam iwaɡ̤iɲilɛ ajawakǀɔnɡ̤a ɔnkɛ amak͡xiwa akwajakɔɓi iz̤iɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ulɛ nɡ̤ɔkupʰupʰuma kɔmsind̤ɔ wajɔ iiŋǃaɓa ɛz̤inkulu z̤ɛntɔmɓi ɛnɡ̤ujud̤a jaz̤iz̤isa ɛm̤laɓɛni iɓuŋ̤ǀ̤ɔlisilɛ uɓukumkani naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaɓɔ iz̤ikǁakaz̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɔkuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ wajɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iimpɔnd̤ɔ z̤ikasirajɛli isiɓujisɛ umv̤a isanɮa sajɔ sɔkunɛnɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓɔt͡ʃaɓa jat͡ʃisa kwajakɔɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmlilɔ ɔlɛɲajɔ ɔɮajɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ isitʲɛd̤ilɛ isapʰɛtʰa sajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔt͡ʃaɓa imisɛ isanɮa sajɔ sɔkunɛnɛ sakǁɛlisa ɛsɔmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli jaz̤iɓulala z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛntɛntɛni jɛntɔmɓi ɛnɡ̤uz̤ijɔn iɓupʰalaz̤ilɛ uɓuʃuʃu ɓajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmlilɔ inkɔsi jam isukɛ jaɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔt͡ʃaɓa imɡ̤iɲilɛ usirajɛli iz̤iɡ̤iɲilɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iiŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛ z̤ajɔ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ iz̤ɔnakalisilɛ iiŋǃaɓa z̤ajɔ ɛz̤inkulu jand̤isa ɛntɔmɓini ɛnɡ̤ujud̤a uŋǀwinɔ nɔkukʰala ijikǀʰitʰilɛ ind̤awɔ jajɔ ɛɓijiwɛjɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmjɛz̤ɔ ijit͡ʃaɓalalisilɛ ind̤awɔ jajɔ jɛntlanɡ̤anɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wɛnz̤ɛ walitʲalwa ɛz̤ijɔn umtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ nɛsaɓatʰa waɓaɡ̤iɓa ɛkub̤av̤umɛni kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ nɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli inkɔsi jam isiɬamɓɛlɛ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sajɔ itʰɛ nɛtʰɛ kujɔ iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jajɔ iz̤iv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ɛlɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɔt͡ʃaɓa iind̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤ɛɛŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛ z̤ajɔ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ ɓakǁɔkɔz̤ɛla ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmini jɔmtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukǀinɡ̤ɛ ukɔnakalisa ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lwɛntɔmɓi ɛnɡ̤uz̤ijɔn wɔlulɛ ulutʲa lɔkulinɡ̤anisɛla akasiɓujisa isanɮa sakʰɛ ɛkuɡ̤iɲɛni wɛnz̤a uŋ̤ǃ̤amɛkɔ lɔmsɛlɛ lwaɓa nɛsid͡ʒ̤wili kwanɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤itʰɔkɔmɓisilɛ kuɲɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ amasanɡ̤ɔ ajɔ at͡ʃɔnilɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni ujit͡ʃaɓalalisilɛ ujapʰulɛ imiv̤alɔ jajɔ ukumkani wajɔ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓajɔ ɓasɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni akukʰɔ mjalɛlɔ aɓaprɔfɛti ɓajɔ aɓafumani mɓɔnɔ kujɛhɔv̤a aɬɛli ɛm̤laɓɛni ɛtʰɛ kǀwaka amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ɛntɔmɓi ɛnɡ̤uz̤ijɔn az̤iɡ̤alɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤laɓa ɛntlɔkɔ ab̤iŋǃɛ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ uz̤itʰɔɓɛlɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni iintlɔkɔ z̤awɔ umtʰind͡ʒ̤ana wasɛjɛrusalɛm amɛɬɔ apʰɛla z̤iiɲɛmɓɛz̤i z̤ijaɓila iz̤iɓilini z̤am isiɓind̤i sipʰalalɛlɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkwapʰuka kwɛntɔmɓi jaɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔkutʰʲafa kwaɓantwana naɓasɛmaɓɛlɛni ɛz̤itratwɛni z̤ɔmz̤i ɓamana ukutʰi kɔɔnina ipʰi iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛwajini ɛkutʰʲafɛni kwaɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓaŋ̤ǁ̤wɛlɛxiwɛjɔ ɛz̤itratwɛni z̤ɔmz̤i ɛkuz̤ipʰalaz̤ɛni kwɛmipʰɛfumlɔ jaɓɔ ɛsifuɓɛni sɔnina nd̤ikuŋ̤ǃ̤inɛlɛ nɡ̤antɔni nd̤ikufanɛkisɛ nantɔni ntɔmɓi jasɛjɛrusalɛm nd̤ikulinɡ̤anisɛ nantɔni ukuz̤ɛ nd̤ikutʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛ ntɔmɓind̤ini ijintɔmɓi inɡ̤uz̤ijɔn nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kukʰulu nɡ̤anɡ̤ɔlwanɮɛ ukwapʰuka kwakʰɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɔkukupʰilisa aɓaprɔfɛti ɓakʰɔ ɓakuɓɔnɛlɛ imiɓɔnɔ jɛntɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔ nɛd͡ʒ̤av̤ud͡ʒ̤av̤u aɓaɓutʰʲila uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɔ ukuɓa kuɓujiswɛ ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kwakʰɔ ɓakuɓɔnɛlɛ imiɓɔnɔ ɛz̤iz̤iɬaɓɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ɔ nɛz̤ɔkuɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰwa ɓaɓɛtʰa iz̤anɮa nɡ̤awɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɮula nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɓɛnz̤a umsɔnɮɔ ɓaɬunɡ̤uz̤ɛlɛ iintlɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛntɔmɓi ɛnɡ̤ujɛrusalɛm ɓɛsitʰi nɡ̤ulɔ mz̤i lɔ kutʰiwa kupʰɛla kwɛnz̤wakaz̤i jimiɬali jɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ z̤ikwakʰamisɛla umlɔmɔ z̤ɛnz̤a umsɔnɮɔ z̤it͡ʃikǁiz̤ɛla amaz̤iɲɔ z̤itʰi sijiɡ̤iɲilɛ inɛnɛ jijɔ lɛ ɛɓɛ sijitʰɛmɓilɛ sijifumɛnɛ sijiɓɔnilɛ ukwɛnz̤ilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a aɓɛkuŋ̰ǃ̰anɡ̤ijɛlɛ uliz̤alisilɛ iliz̤wi lakʰɛ aɓɛliwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ kususɛla z̤amand̤ulɔ uɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ulɛ akakǀɔnɡ̤a wɛnz̤ɛ lwakuv̤ujɛlɛla ut͡ʃaɓa lwakʰɔ upʰakamisɛ upʰɔnd̤ɔ lwaɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓakʰɔ intliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ ikʰala ɛnkɔsini jam lud̤ɔnɡ̤a lwɛntɔmɓi ɛnɡ̤uz̤ijɔn maz̤iɬɛ iiɲɛmɓɛz̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmlamɓɔ nɔɓusuku musa ukujɛka malunɡ̤apʰɛz̤i ukʰɔz̤ɔ lwɛlisɔ lakʰɔ v̤uka uɬaɬamɓɛ ɛɓusuku ɛkukǃalɛkɛni kwɛmilind̤ɔ jipʰalaz̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amanz̤i intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓɛnkɔsi z̤ipʰakamisɛlɛ kujɔ iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmpʰɛfumlɔ waɓantwana ɓakʰɔ aɓatʰʲafilɛjɔ kukulamɓa ɛkud͡ʒ̤ikɛni kwɛz̤itratɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɓɔna jɛhɔv̤a ukʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤uɓani lɔ wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukumpʰatʰa kakuɓi aɓafaz̤i ɓanɡ̤aɮa isikǃʰamɔ sɔmz̤imɓa waɓɔ ɓaɮɛ aɓantwana aɓaɓatʰantamisajɔ anɡ̤aɓulawɛlwa ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni jɛnkɔsi umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɔmprɔfɛti ɓalɛlɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni pʰanɮɛ ɔjinkwɛnkwɛ nɔjind̤ɔd̤a ɛnkulu umtʰind͡ʒ̤ana namad̤ɔd̤ana awilɛ lik͡xɛlɛ uɓulɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛmini jɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɔ usikilɛ akwakǀɔnɡ̤a ukumɛmilɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmini jɔmtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ ukuŋǁunɡ̤upʰala nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ akwaɓakʰɔ usind̤ajɔ usalajɔ nɡ̤ɛmini jɔmsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a ɛnd̤iɓatʰantamisilɛjɔ nd̤aɓakʰulisa ut͡ʃaɓa luɓaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛ nd̤im ind̤ɔd̤a ɛɓɔnɛ iint͡siz̤i nɡ̤ɛntɔnɡ̤a jɔkupʰupʰuma kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ und̤ikʰɔkɛlɛ wand̤ihamɓisa ɛɓumɲamɛni akwaɓa sɛkukʰaɲɛni uɓujɛ wasiɡ̤ukǃulɛla nd̤ɛd̤wa isanɮa sakʰɔ jɔnkɛ ujɔnakalisilɛ iɲama jam nɔlusu uwapʰulɛ amatʰamɓɔ und̤akʰɛlɛ wand̤ixakǃa nɡ̤ɛɲɔnɡ̤ɔ nɛnd̤inisɔ und̤iɓɛlɛ ɛz̤ind̤awɛni ɛz̤imɲama nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓafɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ und̤iɓijɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ and̤inakupʰuma uwɛnz̤ɛ aɓa nz̤ima amakʰamand̤ɛla ɔb̤ɛd̤u nɔkɔ nd̤ikʰalajɔ nd̤iz̤iɓikajɔ ujawuv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ɛla umtʰand̤az̤ɔ uz̤iɓijɛlɛ iinɮɛla z̤am nɡ̤amatʲɛ akǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ uz̤ɛnz̤ɛ ɡ̤ɔsɔ iiŋ̤ǃ̤uʃu z̤am kum ujib̤ɛrɛ ɛlalɛlajɔ ujinɡ̤ɔɲama ɛsɛz̤int͡sitʰɛlwɛni uz̤itʲɛkisilɛ iinɮɛla z̤am wand̤iɮav̤ula und̤ɛnz̤ɛ iŋǁuwa usiɡ̤ɔɓilɛ isapʰɛtʰa sakʰɛ wand̤imisa nd̤aɓa jitɛkɛni jɔtɔlɔ lwakʰɛ uz̤isɛ ɛz̤int͡swɛni z̤am iintɔlɔ z̤ɔmpʰɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ wakʰɛ nd̤isukɛ nd̤ajintlɛkisa kuɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓakɔwɛtʰu nd̤ijinɡ̤ɔma jaɓɔ jɔnkɛ und̤iɬutʰisɛ nɡ̤ɛɛntɔ ɛz̤ik͡xak͡xa wand̤isɛz̤a nd̤aɬutʰa um̤lɔɲanɛ uwapʰulɛ nɡ̤ɔɬalu amaz̤iɲɔ und̤ikǁinz̤ɛlɛlɛ pʰant͡si ɛlutʰutʰwini uwuɬamɓilɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ awaɓa nalukǁɔlɔ nd̤ijiliɓɛlɛ intɔ ɛlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nd̤atʰi apʰɛlilɛ amanɮa nɔkulind̤a kujɛhɔv̤a z̤ikʰumɓulɛ iint͡siz̤i z̤am nɔkut͡ʃut͡ʃiswa um̤lɔɲanɛ nɛɲɔnɡ̤ɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ ujaz̤ikʰumɓula unanɡ̤ɔku ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ usiɓɛkɛkilɛ ɔkɔ nd̤ikuɲamɛkɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nd̤ilind̤ilɛ kunɡ̤ɛɛŋǀɛɓa z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a lɛ ntɔ sinɡ̤aɡ̤ǃ̤itʲɛlwanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa az̤ipʰɛli iimfɛsanɛ z̤akʰɛ z̤int͡ʃa imisɔ nɡ̤ɛmisɔ kukʰulu ukutʰɛmɓɛka kwakʰɛ isaɓɛlɔ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ut͡ʃɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nd̤ilind̤ɛlɛ kujɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ulunɡ̤ilɛ kwaɓatʰɛmɓɛlɛ kujɛ kumpʰɛfumlɔ ɔmkǃukǃɛlajɔ kulunɡ̤ilɛ ukuɓa alulind̤ɛlɛ ɛtʰɛ kǀwaka usind̤isɔ lukajɛhɔv̤a kujilunɡ̤ɛlɛ ind̤ɔd̤a ukuɓa ijitʰwalɛ idʲɔkʰwɛ kwasɛɓut͡ʃɛni ɓajɔ majiɬalɛ jɔd̤wa itʰɛ kǀwaka kǁa ijitʰwalisiwɛjɔ majiwuɓɛkɛ ɛlutʰulini umlɔmɔ wajɔ kunɡ̤aɓakʰɔ itʰɛmɓa m̤lawumɓi majisinikɛlɛ isiɮɛlɛ sajɔ kɔjiɓɛtʰajɔ majiɬutʰɛ jiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inkɔsi jam ajiji kum̤lamɓa nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nakǁa im̤lisɛlɛ usiz̤i nɔkɔ jɔɓa nɛmfɛsanɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔɓuninz̤i ɓɛŋǀɛɓa jajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ajiɓakǀinɛz̤ɛli nɡ̤ɔkupʰuma ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jajɔ iɓɛnz̤ɛ ɓaɓɛ nɔsiz̤i ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ɛkutʲuɲuz̤wɛni kwaɓaɓand͡ʒ̤iwɛjɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛɬaɓatʰi pʰant͡si kwɛɛɲawɔ ɛkulid͡ʒ̤ikɛni itʲala lɔmfɔ pʰamɓi kɔɓusɔ ɓɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni ɛkupʰɛnulwɛni kɔmntu ɛkuɓamɓanɛni kwakʰɛ nɔmɲɛ inkɔsi jam ajiɓɔni nɡ̤uɓani ɔkʰɛ watʰɛtʰa kwɛnz̤ɛka inkɔsi jam inɡ̤awisanɡ̤a mtʰɛtʰɔ akupʰumi ɔkuɓi nɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni wɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni jini ukuɓa akʰalaz̤ɛ ɛpʰililɛ umfɔ makakʰalaz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤akʰɛ masiz̤ipʰɛnɡ̤ululɛ iinɮɛla z̤ɛtʰu siz̤iɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀɛ siɓujɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a masiz̤iɲusɛ iintliz̤ijɔ z̤ɛtʰu kuɲɛ nɛz̤anɮa z̤ɛtʰu siz̤isɛ kutʰikǁɔ ɛmaz̤ulwini tʰina sik͡xɛkǃilɛ saɓa nɛɛnkani wɛna akukǁɔlɛlanɡ̤a uz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ wasisukɛla uɓulɛlɛ akwakǀɔnɡ̤a uz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛlifu ukuz̤ɛ unɡ̤apʰumɛli umtʰand̤az̤ɔ wɛtʰu usɛnz̤ɛ imv̤utʰuluka ɛsaz̤ulwini sɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤isakʰamisɛlɛ umlɔmɔ waz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iint͡ʃaɓa z̤ɛtʰu kɔkwɛtʰu ukunkwantʲa nɔmɡ̤ɔŋ̤ǁ̤ɔ nɛsiɓatʰa nɔkut͡ʃaɓalala nɔkwapʰuka ilisɔ liɬa imid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ jamanz̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkwapʰuka kwɛntɔmɓi jaɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu ilisɔ lijatʲitʲiz̤ɛla alijɛki aliŋǃamki ad̤ɛ akǃɔnd̤ɛlɛ aɓɔnɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛsɛmaz̤ulwini ilisɔ lijawuɓulala umpʰɛfumlɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɛntɔmɓi z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɔmz̤i wakɔwɛtʰu z̤ind̤iz̤inɡ̤ɛlɛ z̤and̤iz̤inɡ̤ɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntaka iint͡ʃaɓa z̤am nɡ̤ɛliz̤ɛ z̤iɓub̤anɡ̤isilɛ uɓɔmi ɓam nɡ̤ɔkund̤ɛjɛlisɛla ɛm̤ad̤ini z̤and̤iɡ̤iɓisɛla nɡ̤amatʲɛ amanz̤i ahamɓɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛntlɔkɔ jam nd̤atʰi nd̤iŋǃaɲulwɛ nd̤iŋǃulɛ iɡ̤ama lakʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a kɔnɡ̤apʰant͡si um̤ad̤i iz̤wi waliv̤a ukujifiɬa inɮɛɓɛ jakʰɔ ɛkuɓɛfuz̤ɛni ɛkuz̤iɓikɛni wasɔnd̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkukuŋǃula watʰi musa ukɔjika uwatʰɛtʰilɛ amatʲala ɔmpʰɛfumlɔ nkɔsi jam uɓukʰululɛ uɓɔmi ɓam nɡ̤ɔkuɓumisɛla ukuɓɔnilɛ jɛhɔv̤a ukupʰɛnulwa liɡ̤wɛɓɛ itʲala ujiɓɔnilɛ jɔnkɛ impind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ jaɓɔ uz̤iv̤ilɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤am ukuv̤ilɛ ukuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a kwaɓɔ jɛhɔv̤a uz̤iv̤ilɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤am umlɔmɔ waɓɔ ɓasukɛla pʰɛz̤ulu nɛz̤ikǀamanɡ̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤am jɔnkɛ ukuɬala kwaɓɔ nɔkusuka kwaɓɔ kub̤ɛkɛ nd̤ijinɡ̤ɔma jaɓɔ ɓaɓujisɛlɛ imɓujɛkɛz̤ɔ jɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ ɓanikɛ uɓumfama ɓɛntliz̤ijɔ int͡ʃwaɓulɔ jakʰɔ majiɓɛ kuɓɔ ɓasukɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ uɓat͡ʃaɓalalisɛ ɓanɡ̤aɓikʰɔ pʰant͡si kwamaz̤ulu kajɛhɔv̤a jɔɔ isukɛ iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ jaɓa mŋǀumɛv̤u isukɛ ɛkǀikiz̤ɛkilɛjɔ ɛlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ jaɓa jɛjimɓi asukɛ apʰalaz̤wa amatʲɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛkud͡ʒ̤ikɛni kwɛz̤itratɔ z̤ɔnkɛ aɓɛz̤ijɔn aɓaŋǃaɓilɛjɔ aɓamɛlwɛ jiɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛnɡ̤iwɛjɔ jɔɔ ɓaɓalɛlwa ɛkuɓɛni jimipʰand̤a jɔd̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛz̤anɮa z̤ɔmɓumɓi kanti nɛɛmpunɡ̤utʲɛ z̤ijalixɔla iɓɛlɛ z̤aɲisɛ amatʰɔlɛ az̤ɔ kɛ jɔna intɔmɓi jaɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu isukɛ jaɓa sisid͡ʒ̤ɔxa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛŋǀiniɓa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ulwimi lɔsɛɓɛlɛni lunamatʰɛla ɛkʰuɬanɡ̤uɓɛni lakʰɛ liŋǁanɔ aɓantwana ɓakǀɛla isɔnka akukʰɔ uɓapʰulɛlajɔ aɓaɓɛsiɮa uɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓapʰanz̤ilɛ ɛz̤itratwɛni aɓaɓɛpʰatʰwa nɡ̤ɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤iɓɔmv̤u ɓawɔla amaz̤ala ɓukʰulilɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛntɔmɓi jakɔwɛtʰu nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛsɔnɔ sɛsɔd̤ɔm jɔna jab̤ukukǃwajɔ nɡ̤ɛpʰaɲaz̤ɔ kunɡ̤asiwanɡ̤a sanɮa kujɔ ɓaɓɛkǃakǃamɓilɛ aɓaɓalulɛkilɛjɔ ɓajɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛkʰɛpʰu ɓajɛ ɓɛm̤lɔpʰɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u ɓaɓɛjiŋ̤ǃ̤ɔmɓɛla imiz̤imɓa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛkɔralɛ isiɓili saɓɔ ɓɛsind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsafirɛ imɓɔnakalɔ jaɓɔ imɲama nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔkǀɔlɔtʰi aɓanakanɛki ɛz̤itratwɛni lwaɓɔ lut͡ʃɛlɛ ɛmatʰand͡ʒ̤ɛni aɓɔ lɔmilɛ lwand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkʰuni ɓanɛj̤wɛɓa aɓaɓulɛwɛ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ kunaɓaɓulɛwɛ jinɮala ɓɔna ɓapʰɛlajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓulawa kukunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ kwɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤amasimi iz̤anɮa z̤aɓafaz̤i aɓanɛmfɛsanɛ z̤ipʰɛkɛ aɓantwanana ɓaɓɔ ɓaɓa kukuɮa kwaɓɔ ɛkwapʰukɛni kwɛntɔmɓi jaɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu uɓupʰɛlɛlisilɛ uɓuʃuʃu ɓakʰɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ukupʰalaz̤ilɛ ukuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ wafaka umlilɔ ɛz̤ijɔn waz̤it͡ʃisa iz̤isɛkɔ z̤ajɔ ɓɛɓɛnɡ̤ɛnakukʰɔlwa ɔɔkumkani ɓɛɬaɓatʰi naɓɛmi ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛlimiwɛjɔ ukuɓa uɓɛnɡ̤anɡ̤ɛnajɔ umɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli nɔt͡ʃaɓa ɛmasanɡ̤wɛni asɛjɛrusalɛm kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤aɓaprɔfɛti ɓajɔ nɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓajɔ aɓapʰalaz̤ɛ iɡ̤az̤i lamalunɡ̤isa pʰakatʰi kwajɔ ɓapʰamz̤ɛla ɓɛz̤iimfama ɛz̤itratwɛni ɓɛdʲɔb̤ɛkilɛ liɡ̤az̤i ɓad̤a aɓantu aɓaɓa nakukǀʰukumisa nɛz̤amɓatʰɔ z̤aɓɔ sukani nant͡sɔ iŋǃamɓi kwat͡ʃiwɔ ukumɛɲɛz̤wa kuɓɔ sukani ukupʰatʰa ɓakusaɓa ɓapʰamz̤ɛla nalapʰɔ kwatʰiwa pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a maɓanɡ̤apʰind̤i ɓapʰamɓukɛlɛ kʰɔna uɓusɔ ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɓuɓakǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰilɛ akasaji kuɓab̤ɛka uɓusɔ ɓaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓaɓub̤ɛkanɡ̤a amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu aɓawaɓaɓalanɡ̤a tʰina amɛɬɔ ɛtʰu ajapʰɛla ɛkʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ uŋǀɛd̤ɔ ɔlunɡ̤amampunɡ̤ɛ ɛkuɓɔnisɛlɛni kwɛtʰu siɓɔnisɛla uɬanɡ̤a ɔlunɡ̤aji kusisind̤isa ɓaz̤inɡ̤ɛla amaɲatʰɛla ɛtʰu ukuz̤ɛ sinɡ̤aɓi nakuhamɓa ɛz̤itratwɛni z̤ɛtʰu kusɔnd̤ɛlɛ ukupʰɛla kwɛtʰu iz̤alisɛkilɛ imiɬa jɛtʰu ɛwɛ kufikilɛ ukupʰɛla kwɛtʰu aɓasisukɛlajɔ ɓanamɛnd̤u nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwamakǁʰalanɡ̤a asɛz̤ulwini ɓasisukɛla ɛz̤intaɓɛni nɡ̤ɔkuʃuʃu ɓasilalɛla ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ umɔja wamatʰatʰa ɛtʰu umtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa kajɛhɔv̤a uɓand͡ʒ̤isiwɛ ɛmihad̤ini jaɓɔ lɔwɔ ɓɛsisitʰi sija kuɬala pʰant͡si kɔmtʰunz̤i wakʰɛ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni jiɓa nɛmiɬali uv̤ujɛ kamɓɛ ntɔmɓi jakwaɛd̤ɔm iɬɛlijɔ ɛz̤wɛni lakwaut͡sɛ ija kuɮulɛla nakuwɛ ind̤ɛɓɛ uja kuŋǁila uz̤iɬuɓɛ ɓuɡ̤ǃ̤itʲiwɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɔ ntɔmɓi inɡ̤uz̤ijɔn akaji kupʰind̤a akufud̤usɛ uja kuɓuv̤ɛlɛla uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɔ ntɔmɓi jakwaɛd̤ɔm uja kuz̤itʰʲila iz̤ɔnɔ z̤akʰɔ kukʰumɓulɛ jɛhɔv̤a ɔkusiɬɛlɛjɔ b̤ɛka ujiɓɔnɛ iŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ jɛtʰu ilifa lɛtʰu lisukɛ lɛnz̤iwa ɛlaɓasɛmz̤ini iz̤inɮu z̤ɛtʰu z̤alunɡ̤a kwaɓɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a siz̤iinkɛd̤ama asinaɓawɔ ɔma ɓand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓaɬɔlɔkaz̤i amanz̤i ɛtʰu siwasɛla nɡ̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ iinkuni z̤ɛtʰu z̤iz̤a kutʰi nɡ̤ɛkǁaɓisɔ int͡ʃut͡ʃisɔ ipʰɛz̤u kwɛntamɔ jɛtʰu sid̤iniwɛ asinakupʰumla isanɮa amajiputa namaasirija ukuɓa siɬutʰɛ sisɔnka ɔɔɓawɔ ɓɔnilɛ aɓasɛkʰɔ tʰina sitʰwɛlɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ silawulwa nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i akukʰɔ usikǃʰiwulajɔ ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤aɓɔ isɔnka sɛtʰu sisiz̤uz̤a nɡ̤ɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wɛtʰu usisikǀʰɛnɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛk͡xɛlɛ lasɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ulusu lwɛtʰu lujav̤utʰa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ikɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔlɔpʰu lwɛnɮala ɓaɮwɛnɡ̤ulɛ aɓafaz̤i ɛz̤ijɔn iintɔmɓi ɛmiz̤ini jakwajud̤a ɓakǁʰɔmɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli nɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa uɓusɔ ɓamad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu aɓuɓɛkwa amad̤ɔd̤ana atʰwala amatʲɛ ɔkusila amakʰwɛnkwɛ akʰuɓɛka pʰant͡si kwɛɛnkuni amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu apʰɛz̤ilɛ ukuja ɛsanɡ̤wɛni amad̤ɔd̤ana ɛkuɓɛtʰɛni uhad̤i ipʰɛlilɛ imiɬali jɛntliz̤ijɔ jɛtʰu ukukǃamɓa kwɛtʰu kud͡ʒ̤ikɛ kwaɓa kukumɓamɓaz̤ɛla siwilɛ isit͡sʰaɓa ɛntlɔkwɛni jɛtʰu jɛha kɛ tʰina kuɓa sɔnilɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ itʰʲafilɛ intliz̤ijɔ jɛtʰu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ amɲama amɛɬɔ ɛtʰu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛntaɓa jasɛz̤ijɔn kuɓa ib̤axilɛ kuhamɓa iimpunɡ̤utʲɛ pʰɛz̤u kwajɔ wɛna jɛhɔv̤a uɬɛli nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ itrɔnɛ jakʰɔ ikwisiz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛsiz̤ukulwana jini ukuɓa usiliɓalɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ usilaɬɛ imiɬa ɛmid̤ɛ siɓujisɛlɛ kuwɛ jɛhɔv̤a sɔɓuja ɬaz̤ija imiɬa jɛtʰu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwamand̤ulɔ unɡ̤aɓa usikǀɛkisɛ mpɛla wanɔɓuxalaxumɛ kutʰi nɡ̤ɔkukʰulukaz̤i kɛ kalɔku nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi ɔmatʰatʰu nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsinɛ nɡ̤ɔlwɛsiɬanu ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ nd̤akuɓɔn ukuɓa nd̤ipʰakatʰi kwaɓatʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛjɔ nɡ̤asɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔjikɛb̤arɛ av̤ulɛka amaz̤ulu nd̤aɓɔna imiɓɔnɔ katʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔlwɛsiɬanu ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ inɡ̤umɲaka kɛ wɛsiɬanu wɔkutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kɔkumkani ujɛhɔjakin lɔwɔ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kuhɛz̤ɛkilɛ uɲana kab̤uz̤i umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛz̤wɛni lamakalɛd̤i nɡ̤asɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔjikɛb̤arɛ saɓa pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ apʰɔ isanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a nd̤aɓɔna kɛ nankɔ kusiz̤a umɔja ɔv̤utʰuz̤ajɔ uv̤ɛla nɡ̤asɛntla unɛlifu ɛlikʰulu nɔmlilɔ ɔɓumɓɛnɛjɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmɓumɓulu nɔɓum̤lɔpʰɛ ɔɓunɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kulɔ ɔɓupʰuma nɡ̤apʰakatʰi kwawɔ ɓuɓɔnakala nɡ̤atʰi jiɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛv̤utʰiwɛjɔ ɛmlilwɛni pʰakatʰi nɡ̤apʰakatʰi kwawɔ jimfanɔ jɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ ɛz̤inɛ nant͡si kɛ imɓɔnakalɔ jaz̤ɔ z̤iɓɛ z̤inɛmfanɔ jɔmntu iɲɛ iɓinɔɓusɔ ɔɓunɛ iɲɛ kuz̤ɔ apʰɔ iɓinamapʰikɔ amanɛ imilɛnz̤ɛ jaz̤ɔ iɓijimilɛnz̤ɛ ɛtʰɛ ŋ̰ǃ̰ɔ umpʰant͡si wɛɛɲawɔ uɓund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmpʰant͡si wɛŋǃina lɛtʰɔlɛ z̤id̤anɡ̤az̤ɛla z̤iɓɔnakala nɡ̤atʰi lub̤ɛd̤u ɔluɓɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛlisiwɛjɔ z̤az̤inɛz̤anɮa z̤ɔmntu nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwamapʰikɔ az̤ɔ ɛmakǀalɛni az̤ɔ ɔmanɛ z̤ɔnɛ kɛ z̤inɔɓusɔ namapʰikɔ amapʰikɔ az̤ɔ aɓɛɬanɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛlalɛjɔ nɛlalɛjɔ ɓɛz̤inɡ̤ad͡ʒ̤iki ɛkuhamɓɛni kwaz̤ɔ ɓɛz̤ihamɓa ijilɛjɔ ijɛ kwikǀala ɛlikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛnɛ nɔɓusɔ ɓajɔ imfanɔ jɔɓusɔ ɓaz̤ɔ iɓɛ iɓuɓusɔ ɓɔmntu z̤inɔɓusɔ ɓɛnɡ̤ɔɲama z̤ɔnɛ nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ z̤inɔɓusɔ ɓɛnkɔmɔ z̤ɔnɛ nɡ̤asɛkʰɔɬɔ z̤inɔɓusɔ ɓɔkʰɔz̤i z̤ɔnɛ uɓusɔ ɓaz̤ɔ namapʰikɔ az̤ɔ aɓɛ aɬukɛnɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤ulu ijilɛjɔ inamaɓini ɛɬanɡ̤ɛnɛ nawalɛjɔ namapʰikɔ amaɓini kɛ ɛɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɛ imiz̤imɓa jaz̤ɔ z̤ahamɓa kɛ ijilɛjɔ jaja kwikǀala ɛlikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛnɛ nɔɓusɔ ɓajɔ apʰɔ sukuɓa uɓusija kʰɔna umɔja z̤aja kʰɔna az̤ad͡ʒ̤ika ɛkuhamɓɛni kwaz̤ɔ imfanɔ jɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ ɛz̤ɔ imɓɔnakalɔ jaz̤ɔ iɓinɡ̤atʰi nɡ̤amalaɬɛ ɔmlilɔ aɓasiwɛjɔ iɓinɡ̤atʰi jimɓɔnakalɔ jɛz̤ikʰuni ɛz̤it͡ʃanɡ̤az̤ajɔ wɔna wahamɓahamɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ ɛz̤ɔ um̤lɔpʰɛ kɛ umlilɔ lɔwɔ ɛmlilwɛni kupʰuma imiɓanɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ ɓɛz̤iɡ̤id̤ima z̤iɓujɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓɔnakala kɔkupʰamɓapʰamɓa kɔmɓanɛ nd̤az̤iɓɔna iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ nankɔ kɛ kukʰɔ iiv̤ili ɛm̤laɓɛni ɛkǀalɛni kwɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ z̤inɡ̤aɲɛ iiv̤ili kuɓusɔ nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɓaz̤ɔ ɔɓunɛ ukuɓɔnakala kwɛɛv̤ili nɔkusɛtʲɛnz̤wa kwaz̤ɔ kwakund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmɓɔnakalɔ jɛk͡xiz̤ɔlitɛ z̤imfaniɲɛ z̤ɔnɛ ukuɓɔnakala kwaz̤ɔ nɔkusɛtʲɛnz̤wa kwaz̤ɔ kunɡ̤atʰi iv̤ili inɡ̤apʰakatʰi kwɛv̤ili ɛkuhamɓɛni kwaz̤ɔ z̤apʰamɓɛla kumakǀala az̤ɔ ɔmanɛ az̤ad͡ʒ̤ika ɛkuhamɓɛni kwaz̤ɔ iifɛlɛni z̤az̤ɔ ɓɛz̤ipʰakamilɛ ɓɛz̤isɔjikɛka iifɛlɛni z̤az̤ɔ ɓɛz̤iz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤amɛɬɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kuz̤ɔ z̤ɔnɛ z̤akuhamɓa iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ z̤ahamɓa naz̤ɔ iiv̤ili ɛkǀalɛni laz̤ɔ z̤akusuka iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni z̤asuka naz̤ɔ iiv̤ili apʰɔ sukuɓa usija kʰɔna umɔja z̤aja apʰɔ sukuɓa umɔja uɓusija kʰɔna z̤asuka iiv̤ili kuɲɛ naz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa umɔja wɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ uɓukʰɔ ɛz̤iv̤ilini ɛz̤ɔ z̤akuhamɓa z̤ahamɓa naz̤ɔ z̤akuma z̤ɛma naz̤ɔ z̤akusuka ɛm̤laɓɛni z̤asuka iiv̤ili kuɲɛ naz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa umɔja wɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ uɓukʰɔ ɛz̤iv̤ilini ɛz̤ɔ napʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤ɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ ɓɛkukʰɔ intɔ ɛfana nɛsib̤akab̤aka nɡ̤atʰi nɡ̤ɛmɓɔnakalɔ jik͡xistalɛ ɛjɔjikɛkajɔ sanɛkiwɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛntlɔkɔ jaz̤ɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤ulu nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwɛsib̤akab̤aka amapʰikɔ ajɛtʰɛ tʲɛ ɛlɔ lasinɡ̤a kwɛlɔ ijilɛjɔ inamaɓini ajiɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɛjɔ ijilɛjɔ inamaɓini ajiɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɛjɔ ɛmz̤imɓɛni nd̤ɛv̤a kɛ isand̤i samapʰikɔ az̤ɔ sind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsand̤i samanz̤i amaninz̤i nɡ̤atʰi liliz̤wi lɔsɔmanɮa ɛkuhamɓɛni kwaz̤ɔ iz̤wi ɛlinɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔlɔ nɡ̤atʰi sisand̤i sɔmkʰɔsi z̤akuma z̤awajɛka ɛɬa amapʰikɔ az̤ɔ kwaɓakʰɔ kɛ iz̤wi lipʰuma nɡ̤apʰaja kwɛsib̤akab̤aka ɛsiɓɛ sipʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤az̤ɔ z̤akuma z̤awajɛka ɛɬa amapʰikɔ az̤ɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛsib̤akab̤aka ɛsiɓɛ sipʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤az̤ɔ kwaɓɔnakala umfanɛkisɛlɔ wɛtrɔnɛ wanɡ̤a lilitʲɛ lɛsafirɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔmfanɛkisɛlɔ wɛtrɔnɛ kwaɓakʰɔ umfanɛkisɛlɔ ɔnɡ̤atʰi jimɓɔnakalɔ jɔmntu pʰɛz̤u kwajɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤ulu nd̤aɓɔna kɛ nɡ̤atʰi jimɓɔnakalɔ jɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛv̤utʰiwɛjɔ nɡ̤atʰi jimɓɔnakalɔ jɔmlilɔ nɡ̤apʰakatʰi kwajɔ nanɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kujɔ kwatʰaɓatʰɛla ɛmɓɔnakalwɛni jɛsiŋǃɛ kwɛɲusa kwatʰaɓatʰɛla ɛmɓɔnakalwɛni jɛsiŋǃɛ kwɛɬisa nd̤aɓɔna kɛ nɡ̤atʰi jimɓɔnakalɔ jɔmlilɔ kum̤lɔpʰɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤atʰi jimɓɔnakalɔ jɔmɲama ɔɓakʰɔjɔ ɛfini nɡ̤ɛmv̤ula jaɓɛ ind͡ʒ̤alɔ imɓɔnakalɔ jɔɓum̤lɔpʰɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ lɛjɔ jimɓɔnakalɔ jɔmfanɛkisɛlɔ wɔɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a nd̤aɓɔna kɛ nd̤awa nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ nd̤aliv̤a iz̤wi lɔtʰɛtʰajɔ watʰi ɲana wɔmntu jima nɡ̤ɛɛɲawɔ z̤akʰɔ nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ nawɛ kwanɡ̤ɛna kɛ umɔja kǁa aɓɛtʰɛtʰa wand̤imisa nɡ̤ɛɛɲawɔ z̤am nd̤amv̤a ɔtʰɛtʰa watʰi ɲana wɔmntu nd̤ikutʰuma kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kwiintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤inɡ̤aɓaɡ̤wiliki aɓaɡ̤wilikilɛjɔ ɓɔna nɔɔjisɛ ɓaɓɔ ɓak͡xɛkǃilɛ kwad̤a kwajilɛ ɔɔɲana ɓaz̤iinɡ̤waɲalala uɓusɔ ɓalukʰuni intliz̤ijɔ nd̤ikutʰuma kuɓɔ uz̤ɛ utʰi kuɓɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ ɓɔna nɔkuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓɛv̤a nɔkuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓala kuɓa ɓɛjinɮu ɛnɛɛnkani ɓaja kwaz̤i ukuɓa ɓɛkukʰɔ umprɔfɛti pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu ukuɓɔjika unɡ̤awɔjiki amaz̤wi aɓɔ nanɡ̤ani usɛmaxawini nasɛmɛv̤ɛni uɬɛli pʰɛz̤u kɔɔnɔmad̤ud̤wanɛ ukuwɔjika amaz̤wi aɓɔ unɡ̤akǃʰipʰuki umɓilini ɓuɓusɔ ɓaɓɔ kuɓa ɓajinɮu ɛnɛɛnkani watʰɛtʰɛ kɛ kuɓɔ amaz̤wi nɔkuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓɛv̤a nɔkuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓala nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓanɛɛnkani wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu jiv̤a ɛnd̤ikutʰɛtʰajɔ kuwɛ unɡ̤aɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤alɛ nɮu inɛɛnkani jakʰamisa uɮɛ ɛnd̤ikunikajɔ nd̤aɓɔna nasɔ isanɮa sɔlulɛlwɛ nant͡sɔ kusɔ iŋǀwad̤i ɛsɔnɡ̤wajɔ wajitwaɓulula pʰamɓi jajɛ kɛ ib̤aliwɛ nɡ̤apʰakatʰi nanɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kub̤alwɛ kujɔ iz̤imɓɔnɔnɔ nɛz̤ikʰwinɔ nɛz̤imɛma watʰi kɛ ɲana wɔmtu kuɮɛ ɔkufumanajɔ jiɮɛ lɛ ŋǀwad̤i isɔnɡ̤wajɔ ujɛ utʰɛtʰɛ kwinɮu kasirajɛli nd̤awuv̤ula kɛ umlɔmɔ wand̤iɮisa lɔɔ ŋǀwad̤i isɔnɡ̤wajɔ watʰi ɲana wɔmntu ɮisa sakʰɔ uz̤alisɛ umɓilini wakʰɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ ŋǀwad̤i isɔnɡ̤wajɔ nd̤ikunikajɔ nd̤ajiɮa kɛ jaɓa nɛŋǀasa ɛmlɔɲɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɓusi watʰi ɲana wɔmntu hamɓa ujɛ kwinɮu kasirajɛli utʰɛtʰɛ kuɓɔ nɡ̤amaz̤wi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akutʰuɲɛlwa kuɓantu aɓantɛtʰɔ inz̤ulu aɓalulwimi lunz̤ima utʰuɲɛlwa kwinɮu kasirajɛli and̤ikutʰumɛli kwiz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤ininz̤i ɛz̤intɛtʰɔ inz̤ulu ɛz̤ilulwimi lunz̤ima ɛz̤imaz̤wi unɡ̤awɛv̤ijɔ nd̤ikutʰumɛlɛ kuz̤ɔ ɛz̤i z̤inɔkukupʰulapʰula z̤ɔna kɛ inɮu kasirajɛli ajiji kuv̤uma ukukupʰulapʰula nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa aɓav̤umi ukund̤ipʰulapʰula kuɓa jɔnkɛ inɮu kasirajɛli ilukʰuni iɓunz̤i iɡ̤ɔɡ̤ɔtʲilɛ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔna nd̤iɓɛnz̤a lukʰuni uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ kwand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɓaɓɔ iɓunz̤i lakʰɔ liɓɛ lukʰuni kwand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɓunz̤i laɓɔ nd̤ilɛnz̤a liɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛd̤ajiman ɛlukʰuni nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛkǃʰwitʰa iɓunz̤i lakʰɔ uz̤ɛ unɡ̤aɓɔjiki unɡ̤akǃʰipʰuki umɓilini pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓajinɮu ɛnɛɛnkani watʰi ɲana wɔmntu ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi ɛnd̤ija kuwatʰɛtʰa kuwɛ wamkɛlɛlɛ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɔ uwɛv̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛɓɛ z̤akʰɔ uhamɓɛ ujɛ kuɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa kɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ɓakɔwɛnu utʰɛtʰɛ kuɓɔ utʰi kuɓɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nɔkuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓɛv̤a nɔkuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓala wand̤ifuŋǃula umɔja nd̤ɛv̤a nɡ̤asɛmv̤a isand̤i sɛnd̤ud̤umɔ ɛnkulu sisitʰi maɓuɓɔnɡ̤wɛ uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɛnd̤awɛni jaɓɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤ɛv̤a nɛsand̤i samapʰikɔ ɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰilililɛjɔ ɛlɔ lifikɛlɛla kwɛlɔ nɛsand̤i sɛɛv̤ili nɡ̤akuz̤ɔ nɛsand̤i sɛnd̤ud̤umɔ ɛnkulu wand̤ifuŋǃula umɔja wand̤isusa nd̤ahamɓa nd̤ik͡xak͡xa ɓuɓuʃuʃu ɓɔmɔja sajɛ kɛ isanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a sipʰɛz̤u sikǃinilɛ nd̤afika kɛ ɛtɛlab̤ib̤i kuɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa aɓaɓɛɬɛli ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔjikɛb̤arɛ apʰɔ ɓaɓɛɬɛli kʰɔna nd̤aɬala pʰant͡si kʰɔna iint͡suku z̤asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nd̤imanɡ̤alisiwɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ kwatʰi ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛɛnt͡suku ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ umɓɔnisɛli kwinɮu kasirajɛli liv̤ɛ kɛ iliz̤wi ɛmlɔɲɛni uɓav̤usɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuv̤ɛla kǁa nd̤itʰi kɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ inɛnɛ uja usukɛ wɛna unɡ̤amv̤usɛlɛli unɡ̤atʰɛtʰi ukuz̤ɛ umv̤usɛlɛlɛ ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ukuz̤ɛ apʰumɛ ɛnɮɛlɛni jakʰɛ ɛnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ apʰilɛ wɔfa ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ lɔwɔ nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɛ kɔd̤wa lɔna iɡ̤az̤i lakʰɛ nd̤ɔliɓiz̤a ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ wɛna kɛ kǁa utʰɛ wamv̤usɛlɛla ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ akaɓuja ɛnɮɛlɛni jakʰɛ ɛnɮɛlɛni jakʰɛ ɛnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ wɔfa nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɛ kɔd̤wa wɛna uwuɬanɡ̤ulɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ kɛ lakuɓuja ɛɓulunɡ̤isɛni ɓalɔ ilunɡ̤isa lɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa nd̤iɓɛkɛ isikʰuɓɛkisɔ pʰamɓi kwalɔ lɔfa lɔna kǁa utʰɛ akwaliv̤usɛlɛla lɔfa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛsɔnɔ salɔ ɓunɡ̤akʰund͡ʒ̤ulwa uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓalɔ ɛlaɓɛnz̤ajɔ kɔd̤wa lɔna iɡ̤az̤i lalɔ nd̤ɔliɓiz̤a ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ wɛna kɛ kǁa utʰɛ waliv̤usɛlɛla ilunɡ̤isa ukuɓa linɡ̤ɔni ilunɡ̤isa alɔna kɛ lɔpʰila nɡ̤ɔkuɓa liv̤usɛlɛlwɛ kɛ wɛna uwuɬanɡ̤ulɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ saɓakʰɔ apʰɔ isanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a pʰɛz̤u watʰi suk umɛ pʰuma ujɛ ɛntilini nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ nawɛ kʰɔna nd̤ɛsuka nd̤ɛma nd̤apʰuma nd̤aja ɛntilini nankɔ kɛ kʰɔna uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɔɓund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɓukǃakǃawuli ɔɓuja nd̤aɓuɓɔnajɔ nɡ̤asɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔjikɛb̤arɛ nd̤awa nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ kwafika umɔja wand̤imisa nɡ̤ɛɛɲawɔ z̤am watʰɛtʰa watʰi jija uz̤iv̤alɛlɛ ɛnɮwini jakʰɔ wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu jaɓɔna ɓaja iz̤intʲa ɓakuɓɔpʰɛ nɡ̤az̤ɔ ukuz̤ɛ unɡ̤apʰumi ujɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ nd̤ija kulunamatʰɛlisa lwakʰɔ ɛkʰuɬanɡ̤uɓɛni lakʰɔ uɓɛ sisid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ unɡ̤aɓi jind̤ɔd̤a ɛjɔɬwajajɔ kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓajinɮu ɛnɛɛnkani nd̤akutʰɛtʰa nawɛ nd̤ɔwuv̤ula umlɔmɔ wakʰɔ utʰi kɛ kuɓɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɔv̤ajɔ makɛv̤ɛ ɔwalajɔ makalɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓajinɮu ɛnɛɛnkani wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu tʰaɓatʰa isitɛna usiɓɛkɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ uk͡xɔlɛ umz̤i kusɔ ijɛrusalɛm uwuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤ɛ uwakʰɛlɛ iiŋǃaɓa z̤ɔkuɓɔnisɛla uwufumɓɛlɛ ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lɔkuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a uwɛnz̤ɛlɛ imiŋǃuɓa umisɛlɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ɔkutʰʲɔmfa iind̤ɔnɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ wɛna kɛ tʰaɓatʰa jɛsiɲitʰi ujimisɛ iɓɛ lud̤ɔnɡ̤a lwɛsiɲitʰi pʰakatʰi kwakʰɔ nɔmz̤i lɔwɔ uɓub̤ɛkisɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ kuwɔ uɓɛ sɛluŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤wɛni wɔna uwuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤ɛ wɛna nɡ̤umkǃɔnd̤isɔ lɔ kwinɮu kasirajɛli wɛna kɛ nɡ̤ɛkǀala lakʰɔ lasɛkʰɔɬɔ uɓuɓɛkɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛnɮu kasirajɛli pʰɛz̤u kwalɔ nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛnani lɛɛnt͡suku ɔja nɡ̤alɔ uja kuɓutʰwala uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ kuɓa imiɲaka jɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ nd̤ijɛnz̤a ukuɓa kuwɛ iɓɛ nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛnani lɛɛnt͡suku iint͡suku ɛz̤imakʰulu matʰatʰu anamaŋǀi asitʰɔɓa uja kuɓutʰwala uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛnɮu kasirajɛli uja kutʰi wakuɓa uz̤ifɛz̤ilɛ ɛz̤ɔ ulalɛ
