ɔkwɛsiɓini nɡ̤ɛkǀala lakʰɔ lasɛkunɛnɛ uɓutʰwalɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛnɮu kajud̤a iint͡suku ɛz̤imaʃumi manɛ nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛla luɓɛ nɡ̤umɲaka luɓɛ nɡ̤umɲaka uz̤ɛ kɛ uɓub̤ɛkisɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ ɛluŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤wɛni lwɛjɛrusalɛm inɡ̤alɔ jakʰɔ iɬutʲiwɛ uprɔfɛtɛlɛ kujɔ jaɓɔna nd̤ikufaka iz̤intʲa ukuz̤ɛ unɡ̤aɡ̤ukǃukɛli kwɛliɲɛ ikǀala ud̤ɛ uz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ iint͡suku z̤ɔkuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a kwakʰɔ wɛna kɛ tʰaɓatʰa iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛxasi nɛɛmɓɔtʲi nɛɛntlumajɔ namaz̤imɓa nɛspɛlɛtɛ uz̤iɡ̤alɛlɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ sitʲɛni siɲɛ uz̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ wɛna isɔnka nɡ̤ɔkwɛnani lɛɛnt͡suku ɔlala nɡ̤ɛkǀala lakʰɔ uja kusiɮa iint͡suku ɛz̤imakʰulu matʰatʰu anamaŋǀi asitʰɔɓa ukuɮa kwakʰɔ ɔja kukuɮa kɔɓa nɡ̤ɔkɔmlinɡ̤anisɛlɔ iiʃɛkɛlɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini nɡ̤ɔsuku uja kusiɮa amakǁɛʃa nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa namanz̤i wɔwasɛla nɡ̤ɔmlinɡ̤anisɛlɔ isaɬulɔ sɛsitʰand̤atʰu sɛhin uja kusisɛla amakǁɛʃa nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa uja kusiɮa nɡ̤ɔkwɛsɔnka ɛsilikǃɛɓɛnɡ̤wana sɛxasi usɔd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤atʰa ɛz̤ipʰuma ɛmntwini watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaja kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukusiɮa sijiŋǃamɓi ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɛnd̤ija kuɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛla kuz̤ɔ nd̤atʰi awu nkɔsi jɛhɔv̤a jaɓɔna umpʰɛfumlɔ awuz̤anɡ̤a wɛnz̤iwɛ iŋǃamɓi intɔ ɛz̤ifɛlɛjɔ nɛkǃwɛnɡ̤iwɛjɔ and̤iz̤anɡ̤a nd̤ijiɮɛ kwasɛɓuŋǀinanɛni ɓam unanam̤la akufikanɡ̤a ɲama ijimɓɔz̤isa ɛmlɔɲɛni watʰi ujaɓɔna nd̤ikunika amalɔnɡ̤ɔ ɛnkɔmɔ ɛsikʰunɮɛni sɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤atʰa z̤ɔmntu sɔd͡ʒ̤ɛ kuwɔ isɔnka sakʰɔ watʰi ɲana wɔmntu jaɓɔna nd̤ija kuwapʰula umsimɛlɛlɔ ɔsisɔnka ɛjɛrusalɛm ɓasiɮɛ isɔnka nɡ̤ɔmlinɡ̤anisɛlɔ ɓɛnɛsitʰukutʰɛz̤i ɓawasɛlɛ amanz̤i nɡ̤ɔmlinɡ̤anisɛlɔ ɓɛmanɡ̤alisiwɛ ukuz̤ɛ ɓaswɛlɛ isɔnka namanz̤i ɓamanɡ̤alisanɛ ɓaŋ̤ǀ̤uŋ̤ǀ̤utʰɛkɛ ɛɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁɛni ɓaɓɔ wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu tʰaɓatʰa ik͡xɛlɛ ɛliɓukʰali liɓɛ sisit͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ sɔkuɡ̤uja ulihamɓisɛ ɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɔ nasɛsilɛv̤ini sakʰɔ utʰaɓatʰɛ sɔkulinɡ̤anisɛla uz̤aɬulɛ iinwɛlɛ ɛsiɲɛ isaɬulɔ sɛsitʰatʰu uz̤ɛ usit͡ʃisɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ ɛsaz̤ulwini sɔmz̤i z̤akuz̤alisɛka iint͡suku z̤ɔŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤ɔ utʰaɓatʰɛ nɛsiɲɛ isaɬulɔ sɛsitʰatʰu ukǁaɓɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kusɔ nɛsiɲɛ isaɬulɔ sɛsitʰatʰu usikǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰɛ ɛmɔjɛni nd̤ixɔlɛ ik͡xɛlɛ ɛmv̤a kwaz̤ɔ uz̤ɛ utʰaɓatʰɛ kuz̤ɔ z̤iɓɛ mɓalwa uz̤iɓɔpʰɛ ɛsɔnd̤wɛni lɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɔ uɓujɛ utʰaɓatʰɛ kuz̤ɔ uz̤ipʰɔsɛ ɛmlilwɛni uz̤it͡ʃisɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ kʰɔna apʰɔ kujɔ kupʰuma umlilɔ ujɛ kujɔ jɔnkɛ inɮu kasirajɛli it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi lɛ jɛrusalɛm nd̤ijimisɛ ɛsaz̤ulwini sɛɛntlanɡ̤a amaz̤wɛ anɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kujɔ kɛ iwapʰikisilɛ nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ amasikɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a nɛmimisɛlɔ jam nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwamaz̤wɛ anɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kujɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓawakǀɛkisilɛ amasikɔ aɓahamɓa nɡ̤ɛmimisɛlɔ jam nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa naŋ̤ǁ̤ɔla nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛɓɛz̤inɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ anahamɓa nɡ̤ɛmimisɛlɔ jam anawɛnz̤a amasikɔ anɛnz̤a nanɡ̤ɔlwamasikɔ ɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛɓɛz̤inɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna ɛwɛ nd̤ikukǀʰasilɛ nd̤ija kwɛnz̤a iz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɔ ɛsaz̤ulwini sakʰɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛɛntlanɡ̤a nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ kuwɛ ɛnd̤inɡ̤az̤anɡ̤a nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ ɛnd̤inɡ̤aji kuɓuja nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamasikiz̤i akʰɔ ɔnkɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ɔɔjisɛ ɓaja kuɮa ɔɔɲana ɛsaz̤ulwini sakʰɔ ɔɔɲana ɓaɮɛ ɔɔjisɛ nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ iz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɔ nd̤iwakǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰɛ ɔnkɛ amasalɛla akʰɔ ɛmimɔjɛni jɔnkɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ iɲanisɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jam ujɛnz̤ɛ iŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɛɛntɔ z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤inɛz̤ɔtʰɛ nanɡ̤amasikiz̤i akʰɔ ɔnkɛ nd̤ija ilisɔ linɡ̤aɓi naŋǀɛɓa nd̤inɡ̤akǀɔnɡ̤i isaɬulɔ sɛsitʰatʰu kuwɛ sija jindʲikitʲa jɔkufa sipʰɛlɛ najinɮala ɛsaz̤ulwini sakʰɔ ɛsiɲɛ isaɬulɔ sɛsitʰatʰu siwɛ lik͡xɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kuwɛ ɛsiɲɛ isaɬulɔ sɛsitʰatʰu nd̤isikǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰɛ ɛmimɔjɛni jɔnkɛ nd̤ixɔlɛ ik͡xɛlɛ ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ wɔpʰɛlɛla kɛ kuɓɔ umsind̤ɔ nd̤iɓupʰɔlisɛlɛ kuɓɔ uɓuʃuʃu ɓam nd̤itʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛkɛ ɓaz̤i ukuɓa jɛhɔv̤a nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ nd̤inɛkʰwɛlɛ ɛkuɓupʰlɛlɛlisɛlɛni uɓuʃuʃu ɓam kuɓɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔkɔ nd̤ɔkwɛnz̤a uɓɛ liŋǁuwa nɛsiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kuwɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɮulajɔ uja kuɓa sisiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ nɛsiɲɛlisɔ uɓɛ sisitʰɛtʰisɔ nɔmmanɡ̤alisɔ kwiintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kuwɛ ɛkwɛnz̤ɛni iz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɔ kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ nanɡ̤ɔɓuʃuʃu nanɡ̤ɛz̤ɔɬwajɔ z̤ɔɓuʃuʃu jɛhɔv̤a nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ nasɛkuz̤itʰumɛni kuwɛ iintɔlɔ ɛz̤imɓi z̤ɛnɮala ɛz̤iz̤ɛz̤ɔlɔnakalisɔ ɛnd̤ija kuz̤itʰuma ukuz̤ɛ z̤inɔnakalisɛ nd̤ija kujand̤isa inɮala pʰɛz̤u kwɛnu nd̤iwapʰulɛ umsimɛlɛlɔ asisɔnka nd̤itʰumɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛnu inɮala namaxamŋǀwa akuɬutʰɛ aɓantwana ifikɛlɛlɛ kuwɛ indʲikitʲa jɔkufa nɛɡ̤az̤i nd̤ikuz̤isɛlɛ ik͡xɛlɛ jɛhɔv̤a nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu b̤ɛkisa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwasirajɛli uprɔfɛtɛlɛ kuz̤ɔ utʰi jiv̤ani z̤intaɓa z̤akwasirajɛli iliz̤wi lɛnkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kwiintaɓa nakwiind̤uli kwiz̤iɬamɓɔ ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤iniz̤isɛla ik͡xɛlɛ nd̤iz̤id̤iliz̤ɛ iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a z̤ɛnu z̤ija kuɓa nɡ̤amaŋǁuwa iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤ɛnu z̤apʰulwɛ iz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤ɛnu z̤ɛlanɡ̤a nd̤iɓakʰaɬɛlɛ aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ ɓɛnu pʰamɓi kwɛz̤iɡ̤ɔɡ̤ɔ z̤ɛnu nd̤ɔz̤iɓɛka iz̤id̤umɓu z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli pʰamɓi kwɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ nd̤iwakǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰɛ amatʰamɓɔ ɛnu nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni z̤ɛnu imiz̤i jɔɓa nɡ̤amaŋǁuwa ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɔkuɬala kwɛnu z̤ikǀʰitʰakalɛ iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a ukuz̤ɛ z̤ikǀʰitʰakalɛ z̤iɓɛ nɡ̤amaŋǁuwa iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤ɛnu z̤apʰulwɛ z̤ipʰɛlɛ iz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤ɛnu z̤iɡ̤awulwɛ iz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤ɛnu z̤ɛlanɡ̤a ikǀiɲwɛ imisɛɓɛnz̤i jɛnu uja ɔɓulɛwɛjɔ ɛsaz̤ulwini sɛnu naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kuʃija amasalɛla nɡ̤ɔkutʰi kuɓɛkʰɔ aɓasind̤ilɛjɔ ɛk͡xɛlɛni pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛkukǀʰitʰwakǀʰitʰwɛni kwɛnu ɛmaz̤wɛni aɓasind̤ilɛjɔ ɓɛnu ɓaja kund̤ikʰumɓula pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤ɛlwɛ kuz̤ɔ kǁa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤ajapʰula intliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ ɛhɛɲuz̤ajɔ ɛjɛmkajɔ namɛɬɔ aɓɔ aɓɛhɛɲuz̤a nɡ̤ɔkuland̤ɛla iz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓak͡xukǃukɛ ɓuɓuɓi aɓaɓɛnz̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ ɛmasikiz̤ini aɓɔ ɔnkɛ ɓaja kwaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a and̤ifumanɛ nd̤atʰɛtʰa nd̤atʰi nd̤ija kuɓɛnz̤a ɔɓu ɓuɓi kuɓɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɓɛtʰa ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ uŋ̤ǃ̤iʃɛ nɡ̤ɔɲawɔ lwakʰɔ utʰi jɛha nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jawɔ ɔnkɛ amasikiz̤i amaɓi ɛnɮu kasirajɛli kuɓa ɓaja lik͡xɛlɛ najinɮala najindʲikitʲa jɔkufa ɔkud̤ɛ uja jindʲikitʲa jɔkufa ɔkufupʰi awɛ lik͡xɛlɛ nɔsalɛ walɔnd̤ɔlɔz̤wa afɛ jinɮala nd̤iɓupʰɛlɛlisɛlɛ kuɓɔ uɓuʃuʃu ɓam nija kwaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɓakuɓa aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ ɓɛnu ɓɛpʰakatʰi kwɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤ɛnu nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni z̤ɛnu ɛz̤ind̤ulini z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ipʰakamilɛjɔ ɛz̤iŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛɛntaɓa napʰant͡si kwɛmitʰi jɔnkɛ ɛluɬaz̤a napʰant͡si kwɛmitɛrɛb̤inti ɛtʰɛ ʃiɲi ɛz̤ind̤awɛni aɓaɓɛnikɛla kuz̤ɔ iv̤umɓa ɛlitʰɔz̤amisajɔ kwiz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nd̤ɔsɔlula isanɮa pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ nd̤ilɛnz̤ɛ iliz̤wɛ kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala jakwankanɡ̤ala nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛntlanɡ̤ɔ jakwad̤ib̤ɛlata ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɔkuɬala kwaɓɔ ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi wɛna wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kum̤laɓa wakwasirajɛli ukutʰi isipʰɛlɔ isipʰɛlɔ siwafikɛlɛ amasɔnd̤ɔ ɔmanɛ ɛliz̤wɛ kalɔku isipʰɛlɔ sikufikɛlɛ nd̤ija kuwukʰupʰɛla umsind̤ɔ kuwɛ nd̤ikuɡ̤wɛɓɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛnɮɛla z̤akʰɔ nd̤iwaɓɛkɛ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ amasikiz̤i akʰɔ ɔnkɛ aliji kuɓa naŋǀɛɓa kuwɛ ilisɔ nd̤inɡ̤akukǀɔnɡ̤i kɛ nd̤ija kukuz̤isɛla iinɮɛla z̤akʰɔ aɓɛ sɛsaz̤ulwini sakʰɔ amasikiz̤i akʰɔ naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi uɓuɓi uɓuɓi ɔɓuɓɔd̤wa jaɓɔnani ɓujɛz̤a kuz̤a isipʰɛlɔ isipʰɛlɔ sɔna sijɛz̤a sikuv̤ukɛlɛ wɛna jaɓɔna sijɛz̤a ujakuz̤ɛla umd͡ʒ̤ɔd͡ʒ̤ɔ wɛliz̤wɛ ɛli lijɛz̤a ikǁɛʃa isɔnd̤ɛlɛ kusisakǃunɡ̤ɛ akunɡ̤amajɛjɛjɛ ɛmiɬali ɛz̤intaɓɛni nɡ̤ɔku kwakufupʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤ija kutʰulula pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ uɓuʃuʃu ɓam nd̤iwupʰɛlɛlisɛlɛ kuwɛ umsind̤ɔ nd̤ikuɡ̤wɛɓɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛnɮɛla z̤akʰɔ nd̤iwaɓɛkɛ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ ɔnkɛ amasikiz̤i akʰɔ aliji kuɓa naŋǀɛɓa kuwɛ ilisɔ nd̤inɡ̤akukǀɔnɡ̤i kɛ nd̤ija kuwaɓɛka pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛnɮɛla z̤akʰɔ amasikiz̤i akʰɔ pʰakatʰi kwakʰɔ naz̤i ukuɓa jɛhɔv̤a nd̤inɡ̤ɔɓɛtʰajɔ nant͡sɔ nant͡sɔ ifikilɛ upʰuma umd͡ʒ̤ɔd͡ʒ̤ɔ lupʰuma amatʰupʰa uswaz̤i kujatʲatʲamɓa ukukʰukʰumala uɡ̤ɔɲamɛlɔ lupʰakamɛ lwaɓa luswaz̤i lɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ akuji kuɓakʰɔ namɲɛ kuɓɔ ɔsalajɔ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ntɔ kwiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jaɓɔ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ntɔ kwintaɓalala jaɓɔ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤uz̤ɛ isalajɔ kuɓɔ lifikilɛ ikǁɛʃa isɔnd̤ɛlɛ ɔtʰɛnɡ̤ajɔ makanɡ̤av̤uji ɔtʰɛnɡ̤isajɔ makanɡ̤ɛnz̤i sid͡ʒ̤wili nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ kujajiz̤ɛla jɔnkɛ iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jakʰɔna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔtʰɛnɡ̤isajɔ akaji kuɓujɛla ɛntwɛni aɓɛtʰɛnɡ̤isɛ nɡ̤ajɔ nɔkuɓa uɓɛsaɮa uɓɔmi pʰakatʰi kwaɓaɮa uɓɔmi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umɓɔnɔ ɔnɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jɔnkɛ jakʰɔna awuji kuɓuja umv̤a kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ɓani uɓɔmɛlɛz̤ajɔ uɓɔmi ɓakʰɛ ɛɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁɛni ɓakʰɛ ɓav̤utʰɛla isiɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɓalunɡ̤isa kɔnkɛ kɔd̤wa akukʰɔ namɲɛ ɔja ɛkulwɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓuʃuʃu ɓam ɓujiz̤ɛlɛ iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jaɓɔ jɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ nɡ̤ɛndʲikitʲa jɔkufa nanɡ̤ɛnɮala nɡ̤apʰakatʰi ɔsɛnɮɛ uja lik͡xɛlɛ ɔpʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i aɮiwɛ jinɮala najindʲikitʲa jɔkufa kɛ aɓasind̤ilɛjɔ kuɓɔ ɓɔsind̤a ɓaɓɛ sɛz̤intaɓɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amav̤ukutʰu asɛmifulɛni ɓɛd̤umz̤ɛla ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɛlɔwɔ ɛd̤umz̤ɛla nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤anɮa z̤ija ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔlɔ ajɛ anɡ̤aɓi namanɮa ɓab̤iŋǃɛ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ ɓaɡ̤utʲunɡ̤ɛlwɛ kukud̤ud̤uz̤ɛla ɛɓuswɛni ɓɔnkɛ iɓɛ kukud̤ana iintlɔkɔ z̤aɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤iɓɛ z̤iiŋ̰ǃ̰aji isiliv̤ɛrɛ jaɓɔ ɓaja kujipʰɔsa ɛz̤itratwɛni nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ jaɓɔ iɓɛ jintɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔlilɛjɔ kuɓɔ isiliv̤ɛrɛ jaɓɔ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ jaɓɔ ajiji kuɓa nakɔ ukuɓaɬanɡ̤ula nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkupʰupʰuma kɔmsind̤ɔ kajɛhɔv̤a aɓaji kuwuɬutʰisa nɡ̤ajɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ nɔmɓilini waɓɔ ɓanɡ̤awuz̤alisi nɡ̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jaɓa sisikʰuɓɛkisɔ sɔkuɓa ɓaɓɛ ɡ̤wɛŋǁa isiv̤atʰɔ saɓɔ ɛsinɔɓukʰaz̤ikʰaz̤i ɓasimisɛla ik͡xat͡ʃi ɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤asɔ imifanɛkisɔ jaɓɔ ɛnɡ̤amasikiz̤i ɛnɛz̤ɔtʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nd̤ijɛnz̤ɛ jajintɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔlilɛjɔ kuɓɔ nd̤ija kujinikɛla ɛsanɮɛni saɓasɛmz̤ini ukuɓa ipʰanɡ̤wɛ nakwaɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɓɛɬaɓatʰi iɓɛ likǁʰɔɓa ɓajiɬamɓɛlɛ nd̤iɓususɛ uɓusɔ ɓam kuɓɔ ɓajiɬamɓɛlɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤wɛɓɔ jam ɓafikɛ aɓatʰʲɔɓɔz̤i ɓajiɬamɓɛlɛ jɛnz̤a umkǁɔkɛlɛlwanɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iliz̤wɛ lilipʰalaz̤a iɡ̤az̤i ɛlimsulwa nɔmz̤i uz̤ɛlɛ luɡ̤ɔɲamɛlɔ nd̤ɔz̤isa aɓanɔɓuɓi ɓasɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɓaz̤iɬutʰɛ iz̤inɮu z̤aɓɔ nd̤ilipʰɛlisɛ ik͡xat͡ʃi laɓanamanɮa z̤iɬand͡ʒ̤ɛlwɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤aɓɔ kujafika ukukǁʰalaɓa ɓafuna ukǁɔlɔ alukʰɔ kuz̤a umɛjɛlisɛlɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔmɛjɛlisɛlɔ kuɓɛkʰɔ ud̤aɓa pʰɛz̤u kɔd̤aɓa ɓafunɛ umɓɔnɔ kumprɔfɛti kɛ umjalɛlɔ ut͡ʃaɓalalɛ unɡ̤aɓikʰɔ kumɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɛkǃʰinɡ̤a kumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ukumkani uja kwɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili nɛsikʰulu samɓatʰɛ ummanɡ̤alisɔ z̤ijɛkɛlɛlɛ iz̤anɮa z̤aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛli nd̤ija kwɛnz̤a kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnɮɛla jaɓɔ nd̤iɓaɡ̤wɛɓɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ kalɔku kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsitʰand̤atʰu nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsitʰand̤atʰu nɡ̤ɔlwɛsiɬanu ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ nd̤iɬɛli ɛnɮwini jam namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwajud̤a ɛɬɛli pʰamɓi pʰɛz̤u kʰɔna isanɮa sɛnkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤aɓɔna nant͡sɔ intɔ ɛfana nɛnd̤ɔd̤a ukuɓɔnakala kwajɔ kutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛsiŋǃɛni sajɔ kwɛɬisa kuɓɔnakala inɡ̤umlilɔ kutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛsiŋǃɛni sajɔ kuɲusɛ nɡ̤atʰi kukuɓɔnakala kɔkukʰaz̤imla nɡ̤atʰi jimɓɔnakalɔ jɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛv̤utʰiwɛjɔ wɔlula intɔ ɛmilisɛ ɔkwɛsanɮa wand̤iɓamɓa nɡ̤ɛsiɬwitʰa sɛntlɔkɔ jam umɔja wand̤ifuŋǃula nd̤aɓa pʰakatʰi kɔm̤laɓa nɛz̤ulu wand̤isa ɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɛmiɓɔnɔ katʰikǁɔ ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ ɛpʰakatʰi ɛlib̤ɛkɛ nɡ̤asɛntla apʰɔ ɓɛkuɬɛli kʰɔna umfanɛkisɔ wɔɓukʰwɛlɛ ɔkʰwɛlɛtisajɔ naɓɔ kɛ ɓukʰɔna uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukatʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɓund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɓɔnɔ ɛnd̤awuɓɔnajɔ ɛntilini lɛjɔ watʰi ɲana wɔmntu kʰawupʰakamisɛ amɛɬɔ akʰɔ ukʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤asɛntla nd̤awapʰakamisa kɛ amɛɬɔ nd̤akʰanɡ̤ɛla nɡ̤asɛntla nankɔ nɡ̤asɛntla kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ kukʰɔ lɔɔ mfanɛkisɔ wɔɓukʰwɛlɛ usɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwalɔ watʰi ɲana wɔmntu ujakuɓɔna aɓakwɛnz̤ajɔ nɡ̤amasikiz̤i amakʰulu iwɛnz̤ajɔ apʰa inɮu kasirajɛli ukuz̤ɛ nd̤ikʰwɛlɛlɛ kud̤ɛ nɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jam usaja kuɓuja uɓɔnɛ amasikiz̤i amakʰulu wand̤isa kɛ ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ nd̤aɓɔna nanɡ̤ɔ umŋ̤ǁ̤uma ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni watʰi ɲana wɔmntu kʰawuɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤ɛ ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni nd̤aɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤a kɛ ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni nankɔ kukʰɔ umɲanɡ̤ɔ watʰi jiz̤a uɓɔnɛ amasikiz̤i amaɓi aɓawɛnz̤ajɔ apʰa nd̤anɡ̤ɛna nd̤aɓɔna nanz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤imilisɛ ɔkwɛsinamɓuz̤anɛ nɛnkɔmɔ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inɛz̤ɔtʰɛ nɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛnɮu kasirajɛli z̤ik͡xɔliwɛ ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kumi pʰamɓi kwaz̤ɔ amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ɛnɮu kasirajɛli nɔjaz̤anija uɲana kaʃafan ɛmi pʰakatʰi kwawɔ ijilɛjɔ ipʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa isikǃʰumisɛlɔ kuɲuka iv̤umɓa lɛlifu lɔkukǃʰumisɛla watʰi ɲana wɔmntu ukuɓɔnilɛ akwɛnz̤ajɔ ɛmɲamɛni amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ɛnɮu kasirajɛli ijilɛjɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɔnt͡sini z̤ajɔ ɛz̤inɛmifanɛkisɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛsitʰi ujɛhɔv̤a akasiɓɔni ujɛhɔv̤a ulilaɬilɛ iliz̤wɛ watʰi usaja kuɓuja uɓɔnɛ amasikiz̤i awɛnz̤ajɔ amakʰulu wand̤isa ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ɛlinɡ̤asɛntla nankɔ kuɬɛli aɓafaz̤i apʰɔ ɓɛlilɛla utamuz̤i watʰi uɓɔnilɛ ɲana wɔmntu usaja kuɓuja uɓɔnɛ amasikiz̤i awɛnz̤ajɔ amakʰulu wand̤isa ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛpʰakatʰi jɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nankɔ ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni ɛtɛmpilɛni kajɛhɔv̤a pʰakatʰi kwɛv̤arand̤a nɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ kukʰɔ amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤atʰi anɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini anamaɬanu ɛjinikɛlɛ umv̤a itɛmpilɛ kajɛhɔv̤a uɓusɔ ɓawɔ ɓub̤ɛkɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a akǃuɓud̤a kwilanɡ̤a ɛb̤ɛkɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a watʰi uɓɔnilɛ ɲana wɔmntu kuŋǀinanɛ kwinɮu kajud̤a ukuwɛnz̤a masikiz̤i ɓawɛnz̤ajɔ apʰa ukuɓa kɛ ɓaliz̤alisɛ iliz̤wɛ nanɡ̤ɔɡ̤ɔɲamɛlɔ ɓaɓujɛ ɓand̤ikǃumɓisɛ naɓɔ ɓɛsisa isɛɓɛ lɔmd̤ilija ɛmatʰatʰɛni aɓɔ nam nd̤ija kwɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔɓuʃuʃu aliji kuɓa naŋǀɛɓa ilisɔ nd̤iɓakǀɔnɡ̤ɛ nɔkuɓa ɓad̤and̤ulukɛ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤am nɡ̤ɛz̤wi ɛlikʰulu and̤iji kuɓɛv̤a waɓiz̤a nɡ̤ɛliz̤wi ɛlikʰulu ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤am ɛsitʰi sɔnd̤ɛlani ɓav̤ɛlɛli ɓɔmz̤i ɛlɔwɔ ɛpʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa iz̤ikǁʰɔɓɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔkut͡ʃaɓalalisa nankɔ kɛ kusiz̤a amad̤ɔd̤a amatʰand̤atʰu nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɛlipʰɛz̤ulu ɛlikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ɛntla ijilɛjɔ ipʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa iz̤ikǁʰɔɓɔ z̤ajɔ z̤ɔkuɬɛkɛz̤a kukʰɔ ind̤ɔd̤a pʰakatʰi kwawɔ ɛjamɓɛtʰɛ ilinɛn ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ inɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔkub̤ala ɛtʰanɡ̤ɛni lajɔ ɛz̤a kɛ ɛma ɛkǀalɛni kwɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sɔb̤ɛd̤u uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukatʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɓajɛ ɓuɲuka ɓusuka ɛkɛrub̤ini ɔɓɛɓupʰɛz̤u kwajɔ ɓaja ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛnɮu wamɛmɛz̤a ɛnd̤ɔd̤ɛni ɛjamɓɛtʰɛ ilinɛn ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ ɛnɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔkub̤ala ɛtʰanɡ̤ɛni lajɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɔ kǀand̤a ɛsaz̤ulwini sɔmz̤i ɛsaz̤ulwini sɛjɛrusalɛm uɓɛkɛ upʰawu ɛmaɓunz̤ini amad̤ɔd̤a aɡ̤ǀ̤unajɔ aŋǀwinajɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamasikiz̤i ɔnkɛ awɛnz̤ɛkajɔ ɛsaz̤ulwini sajɔ watʰi kwamaɲɛ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤am kǀand̤ani ɛsaz̤ulwini sɔmz̤i ɛmv̤a kwajɔ nikǁaɓɛlɛ malinɡ̤aɓi naŋǀɛɓa ilisɔ lɛnu ninɡ̤aɓakǀɔnɡ̤i amakǁʰɛɡ̤ɔ amad̤ɔd̤ana nɔmtʰind͡ʒ̤ana aɓantwana naɓafaz̤i ɓaɓulalɛni ukuz̤ɛ ɓat͡ʃaɓalalɛ kɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓanɔpʰawu ɔlɔ kuɓɔ niz̤ɛ nikǃalɛlɛ kɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni jam akǃala kɛ nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu aɓɛpʰamɓi kwɛnɮu watʰi kɛ kuwɔ jɛnz̤ɛni iŋǃamɓi inɮu lɛ niz̤iz̤alisɛ iintɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ nɡ̤aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ pʰumani nijɛ apʰuma kɛ aɓulala kuwɔ umz̤i kwatʰi kǁa aɓaɓulalajɔ nd̤isɛlɛ nd̤awa nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ nd̤akʰala nd̤atʰi awu nkɔsi jɛhɔv̤a uja kuwat͡ʃaɓalalisa ɔnkɛ amasalɛla amasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓutʰulula uɓuʃuʃu ɓakʰɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛjɛrusalɛm watʰi uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛnɮu kasirajɛli nɔɓɛnɮu kajud̤a ɓukʰulu kakʰulu kunɛnɛ nɛliz̤wɛ liz̤ɛlɛ liɡ̤az̤i nɔmz̤i uz̤ɛlɛ ɓuɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛsitʰi ujɛhɔv̤a ulilaɬilɛ iliz̤wɛ ujɛhɔv̤a akaɓɔni kɛ aliji kuɓa naŋǀɛɓa ilisɔ nd̤iɓakǀɔnɡ̤ɛ nd̤ija kuɓanika nɡ̤ɔkwɛnɮɛla jaɓɔ ɛntlɔkwɛni jaɓɔ nant͡sɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛjajamɓɛtʰɛ ilinɛn ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ ɛɓinɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔkub̤ala ɛtʰanɡ̤ɛni lajɔ iɓuja nɛliz̤wi ɛlitʰi nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ uɓund̤iwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ nd̤aɓɔna nankɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛsib̤akab̤aka ɛsiɓɛ sipʰɛz̤u kwɛntlɔkɔ jɛɛkɛrub̤i kund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlitʲɛ lɛsafirɛ kuɓɔnakala nɡ̤atʰi nɡ̤umfanɛkisɔ wɛtrɔnɛ waɓɔnakala pʰɛz̤u kwaz̤ɔ ujɛhɔv̤a watʰɛtʰa kwind̤ɔd̤a ɛjamɓɛtʰɛ ilinɛn ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ watʰi jija pʰakatʰi kwɛɛv̤ili ɛz̤id͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ajɔ nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwɛkɛrub̤i uz̤alisɛ iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɔ nɡ̤amalaɬɛ ɔmlilɔ uwatʰaɓatʰɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛɛkɛrub̤i uwasasaz̤ɛ pʰɛz̤u kwawɔ umz̤i janɡ̤ɛna nd̤ijiɓɔna kɛ iikɛrub̤i ɓɛz̤imi nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ kwɛnɮu ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛnd̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ lajiz̤alisa intɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ ɛpʰakatʰi ɓɛɲuka uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɓɛsuka ɛz̤ikɛrub̤ini ɓaja ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛnɮu jaz̤ala inɮu nɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ jaz̤ala ɓuɓum̤lɔpʰɛ ɓɔɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a sav̤akala isand̤i samapʰikɔ ɛɛkɛrub̤i sad̤a saja ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛnɡ̤apʰanɮɛ sind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤wi lɔsɔmanɮa akutʰɛtʰa kwatʰi akujiwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛjamɓɛtʰɛ ilinɛn ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ ɛsitʰi tʰaɓatʰa umlilɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛɛv̤ili ɛz̤id͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ajɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛɛkɛrub̤i jasuka janɡ̤ɛna jɛma ɛkǀalɛni kwɛɛv̤ili iɓɛ kɛ ikɛrub̤i isɔlulɛ isanɮa sajɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛɛkɛrub̤i isisɛ ɛmlilwɛni ɔpʰakatʰi kwɛɛkɛrub̤i iwutʰaɓatʰɛ iwunikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɔwamɓɛtʰɛ ilinɛn ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ ɛɓɛwutʰaɓatʰa kɛ apʰumɛ kwaɓɔnakala kɛ ɛz̤ikɛrub̤ini intɔ ɛfana nɛsanɮa sɔmntu pʰant͡si kwamapʰikɔ az̤ɔ nd̤aɓɔna nanz̤ɔ iiv̤ili ɛz̤inɛ z̤isɛkǀalɛni lɛɛkɛrub̤i iv̤ili ɛɲɛ isɛkǀalɛni lɛkɛrub̤i ɛɲɛ iv̤ili ɛɲɛ isɛkǀalɛni lɛkɛrub̤i ɛɲɛ ukuɓɔnakala kwɛɛv̤ili nɡ̤atʰi jimɓɔnakalɔ jɛlitʲɛ lɛk͡xiz̤ɔlitɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓɔnakala kwaz̤ɔ z̤ɔnɛ ɓɛz̤imfaniɲɛ kwanɡ̤a kukʰɔ iv̤ili nɡ̤apʰakatʰi kwɛv̤ili ɛkuhamɓɛni kwaz̤ɔ z̤ahamɓa z̤aja kumakǀala az̤ɔ ɔmanɛ az̤ad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a ɛkuhamɓɛni kwaz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa apʰɔ sukuɓa lɛjɔ ipʰamɓili iɓɛ ib̤ɛka kʰɔna z̤iɓɛ z̤ijiland̤ɛla z̤inɡ̤ad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤i ɛkuhamɓɛni kwaz̤ɔ kɛ umz̤imɓa waz̤ɔ wɔnkɛ nɔm̤lana waz̤ɔ nɛz̤anɮa z̤az̤ɔ namapʰikɔ az̤ɔ nɛɛv̤ili z̤iɓɛ z̤iz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤amɛɬɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɔnɛ ɓɛz̤inɛɛv̤ili z̤az̤ɔ iiv̤ili ɛz̤ɔ z̤aɓiz̤wa ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤am kwatʰiwa z̤iiv̤ili ɛz̤id͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ajɔ iɲɛ iɓɛ inɔɓusɔ ɔɓunɛ uɓusɔ ɓɔkukǃala iɓuɓusɔ ɓɛkɛrub̤i uɓusɔ ɓɛsiɓini iɓuɓusɔ ɓɔmntu ɔɓɛsitʰatʰu iɓuɓusɔ ɓɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ɔɓɛsinɛ iɓuɓusɔ ɓɔkʰɔz̤i z̤ɛɲuka iikɛrub̤i jilaa ntɔ ipʰililɛjɔ nd̤ajiɓɔnajɔ ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔjikɛb̤arɛ ɛkuhamɓɛni kwɛɛkɛrub̤i z̤ahamɓa iiv̤ili ɛkǀalɛni laz̤ɔ nasɛkuwapʰakamisɛni kwɛɛkɛrub̤i amapʰikɔ az̤ɔ ukuɓa z̤isukɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni az̤id͡ʒ̤ikanɡ̤a nɛɛv̤ili z̤az̤ɔ z̤imkɛ ɛkǀalɛni laz̤ɔ ɛkumɛni kwaz̤ɔ z̤ɛma naz̤ɔ ɛkusukɛni kwaz̤ɔ ukuɓa z̤ipʰapʰaz̤ɛlɛ z̤ɛsuka naz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umɔja wɛntɔ ɛpʰililɛjɔ uɓɛ ukʰɔ kuz̤ɔ ɓapʰuma kɛ uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɓɛmka ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛnɮu ɓɛz̤a pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛkɛrub̤i iikɛrub̤i z̤awapʰakamisa amapʰikɔ az̤ɔ z̤asuka ɛm̤laɓɛni ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛkupʰumɛni kwaz̤ɔ iiv̤ili z̤az̤inɡ̤akuz̤ɔ z̤ɛma ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ɛlisɛmpumalanɡ̤a uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukatʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɓupʰɛz̤u kwaz̤ɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤ulu jilaa ntɔ iipʰililɛjɔ nd̤ajiɓɔnajɔ pʰant͡si kɔtʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔjikɛb̤arɛ nd̤az̤i kɛ ukuɓa z̤iz̤iikɛrub̤i iɲɛ iɓɛ inɔɓusɔ ɔɓunɛ iɲɛ iɓɛ inamapʰikɔ amanɛ imfanɔ jɛz̤anɮa z̤ɔmntu inɡ̤apʰant͡si kwamapʰikɔ az̤ɔ kɛ imfanɔ jɔɓusɔ ɓaz̤ɔ iɓɛ iɓɔɓaa ɓusɔ nd̤aɓuɓɔnajɔ imland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔjikɛb̤arɛ nɔkuɓɔnakala kwaz̤ɔ naz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkwaz̤ɔ z̤iɓɛ z̤ihamɓa ijilɛjɔ ijɛ kwikǀala ɛlikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛnɛ nɔɓusɔ ɓajɔ wand̤ifuŋǃula umɔja wand̤isa ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a lanɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɛlib̤ɛkɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a nankɔ ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ kukʰɔ amad̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini anamaɬanu nd̤aɓɔna pʰakatʰi kwawɔ ujaz̤anija uɲana kaaz̤urɛ nɔpɛlatija uɲana kab̤ɛnaja aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaɓantu watʰi ɲana wɔmntu nɡ̤awɔ amad̤ɔd̤a akǀinɡ̤a inkɔɬakalɔ akǀɛɓa amakǀɛɓɔ amaɓi kulɔ mz̤i at͡ʃɔjɔ ukutʰi alikasɔnd̤ɛli ikǁɛʃa lɔkwakʰa iz̤inɮu lɔ mz̤i jimɓiz̤a tʰina kɛ sijiɲama nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ prɔfɛtɛla kuwɔ prɔfɛta ɲana wɔmntu wand̤iwɛla kɛ umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a watʰi jitʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nit͡ʃilɔ nɮu kasirajɛli nɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤itʰɛ kǃatʰa ɛmɔjɛni wɛnu nd̤ijaz̤az̤i nd̤iɓand̤isilɛ aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ ɓɛnu kulɔ mz̤i naz̤iz̤alisa iz̤itratɔ z̤awɔ nɡ̤aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ ɓɛnu ɛɓɛ niɓaɓɛka pʰant͡si pʰakatʰi kwawɔ umz̤i ɓajiɲama wɔna kɛ ujimɓiz̤a nija kukʰut͡ʃwa pʰakatʰi kwawɔ nijalɔjika ik͡xɛlɛ nd̤ija kuniz̤isɛla ik͡xɛlɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi nd̤inikʰupʰɛ pʰakatʰi kwawɔ nd̤ininikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni saɓasɛmz̤ini nd̤iz̤ɛnz̤ɛ iz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɔ nija lik͡xɛlɛ nd̤ija kuniɡ̤wɛɓa ɛmd̤ɛni wakwasirajɛli naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɔna lɔ mz̤i awuji kuɓa jimɓiz̤a aniji kuɓa jiɲama pʰakatʰi kwawɔ nd̤ija kuniɡ̤wɛɓa ɛmd̤ɛni wakwasirajɛli naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a imimisɛlɔ jam anihamɓanɡ̤a nɡ̤ajɔ namasikɔ anawɛnz̤a nɛsuka nɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwamasikɔ ɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kwatʰi kɛ nd̤akuprɔfɛta upɛlatija uɲana kab̤ɛnaja nd̤awa nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɓam nd̤akʰala nɡ̤ɛliz̤wi ɛlikʰulu nd̤atʰi awu nkɔsi jɛhɔv̤a ujawaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla kupʰɛlɛ wɛna amasalɛla akwasirajɛli kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɔ aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a akɔwɛnu nɛnɮu jɔnkɛ jakwasirajɛli jɔnkɛ ipʰɛla jɔna lɛjɔ ɓatʰi nɡ̤ajɔ aɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm ɓakud̤ɛ kujɛhɔv̤a linikwɛ tʰina iliz̤wɛ ukuz̤ɛ simɛ kulɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jitʰi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɛkuɓɛni nd̤iɓakʰwɛlɛlisɛlɛ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni nd̤aɓapʰanɡ̤alalisa ɛmaz̤wɛni kɛ nd̤ɔɓa jiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kuɓɔ umz̤uz̤wana ɔmŋǀinanɛ kulɔɔ maz̤wɛ ɓajɛ kuwɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jitʰi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤ija kuniɓutʰa ɛz̤iz̤wɛni nd̤iniɬanɡ̤anisɛ ɛmaz̤wɛni ɛnilusali kuwɔ nd̤ininikɛ um̤laɓa wakwasirajɛli ɓaja kuwɔ ɓaz̤isusɛ kuwɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ z̤awɔ ɛz̤inɛz̤ɔtʰɛ namasikiz̤i awɔ ɔnkɛ nd̤ɔɓanika ntliz̤ijɔ jimɓi nd̤iɓɛkɛ umɔja ɔmt͡ʃa nɡ̤apʰakatʰi kwɛnu nd̤ijisusɛ intliz̤ijɔ jɛlitʲɛ ɛɲamɛni jaɓɔ nd̤iɓanikɛ intliz̤ijɔ jɛɲama ukuz̤ɛ ɓahamɓɛ nɡ̤ɛmimisɛlɔ jam ɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ amasikɔ ɓawɛnz̤ɛ ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓantu ɓam nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ kɛ ɓɔna aɓantliz̤ijɔ ihamɓa nɡ̤ɔkwɛntliz̤ijɔ jɛz̤intɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤inɛz̤ɔtʰɛ nɛz̤inɡ̤amasikiz̤i aɓɔ nd̤ija kuɓanika nɡ̤ɔkwɛnɮɛla jaɓɔ ɛntlɔkwɛni jaɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a iikɛrub̤i z̤awapʰakamisa amapʰikɔ az̤ɔ kwanɛɛv̤ili ɛz̤inɡ̤akuz̤ɔ uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukatʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɓaɓa pʰɛz̤u kwaz̤ɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤ulu ɓɛɲuka uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɓɛsuka pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i ɓɛma ɛntaɓɛni ɛnɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a kuwɔ umz̤i umɔja wand̤ifuŋǃula wand̤isa kwɛlamakalɛd̤i kuɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa nd̤isɛmɓɔnwɛni nɡ̤ɔmɔja katʰikǁɔ wɛɲuka wɛmka umɓɔnɔ ɛɓɛnd̤iwuɓɔna nd̤atʰɛtʰa kuɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi kajɛhɔv̤a aɓɛnd̤iɓɔnisilɛ kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu uɬɛli pʰakatʰi kwɛnɮu ɛnɛɛnkani ɓanamɛɬɔ ɔkuɓɔna aɓaɓɔni ɓanɛɛnɮɛɓɛ z̤ɔkuv̤a aɓɛv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓajinɮu ɛnɛɛnkani wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu z̤ilunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ iimpaɬa z̤ɛmfud̤uka ufud̤ukɛ ɛmini ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ ufud̤ukɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɔ ujɛ nd̤awɛni jimɓi ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ m̤lawumɓi ɓɔɓɔna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓajinɮu ɛnɛɛnkani uz̤ɛ ujikʰupʰɛ impaɬa jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛmpaɬa jɛmfud̤uka ɛmini ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ kɛ wɛna upʰumɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkupʰuma kwaɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa ɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤a ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ ujikʰupʰɛ nɡ̤akʰɔna jitʰwalɛ nɡ̤amaɡ̤ǁ̤a ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ jikʰupʰɛ kwakuɓa mɲama ɓuɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ unɡ̤alikʰanɡ̤ɛli iliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ isimanɡ̤a kwinɮu kasirajɛli nd̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤awisɛlwa umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ nd̤ajikʰupʰa ɛmini impaɬa jam nɡ̤ɔkwɛmpaɬa jɛmfud̤uka nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa nd̤az̤iɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤ɛla ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni nɡ̤ɛsanɮa nd̤ajikʰupʰa kwakuɓa mɲama nd̤ajitʰwala nɡ̤amaɡ̤ǁ̤a ɛmɛ ɬwɛni aɓɔ kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu inɮu kasirajɛli inɮu ɛnɛɛnkani ajit͡ʃɔnɡ̤ɔ kuwɛ ukutʰi wɛnz̤a ntɔni jitʰi kuɓɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɛsi siɬaɓɔ sisinɡ̤isɛlɛ kwisikʰulu ɛsisɛjɛrusalɛm nakwinɮu jɔnkɛ kasirajɛli aɓapʰakatʰi kwajɔ aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛjɔ jitʰi nd̤isisimanɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ kuja kwɛnz̤ɛka nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ kuɓɔ ɓaja kufud̤uswa ɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wɛ isikʰulu ɛsipʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ sija kujitʰwala nɡ̤amaɡ̤ǁ̤a kutʰɛ t͡sʰu mɲama sipʰumɛ ɓaja kuɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤a ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni ukuɓa ɓajikʰupʰɛ nɡ̤akʰɔna sija kuɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛla uɓusɔ ɓasɔ sɔna kuɓa sinɡ̤aji kulikʰanɡ̤ɛla iliz̤wɛ nɡ̤amɛɬɔ nd̤ija kuwutwaɓulula umnatʰa pʰɛz̤u kwasɔ siɓand͡ʒ̤iswɛ nɡ̤umɡ̤iɓɛ nd̤isisɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛz̤wɛni lamakalɛd̤i kɛ asiji kuliɓɔna nɔkɔ sija kufɛla kʰɔna nd̤ija kukukǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰa ɛmimɔjɛni jɔnkɛ kɔnkɛ ɛsipʰaɬwɛ kukɔ aɓaŋǀɛd̤isi ɓasɔ namaɬɛlɔ asɔ ɔnkɛ nd̤ixɔlɛ ik͡xɛlɛ ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɛkuɓapʰanɡ̤alalisɛni ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni nd̤iɓakǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰɛ ɛmaz̤wɛni nd̤ɔʃija kuɓɔ amad̤ɔd̤a amɓalwa asind̤ɛ ɛk͡xɛlɛni nasɛnɮalɛni nasɛndʲikitʲɛni jɔkufa ukuz̤ɛ ɓawaɓalisɛ amasikiz̤i aɓɔ ɔnkɛ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni aɓajɛ kuz̤ɔ ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu wɔsiɮa isɔnka sakʰɔ uŋ̤ǀ̤aŋ̤ǀ̤az̤ɛla uwasɛlɛ amanz̤i akʰɔ uɡ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤a unɛsitʰukutʰɛz̤i wɔtʰi kɛ kuɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kuɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm ɛm̤laɓɛni wakwasirajɛli ukutʰi isɔnka saɓɔ ɓɔsiɮa ɓɛnɛsitʰukutʰɛz̤i ɓawasɛlɛ amanz̤i aɓɔ ɓɛmanɡ̤alisiwɛ ukuz̤ɛ ɛz̤wɛni laɓɔ kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala inɡ̤aɓikʰɔ inz̤alisɛkɔ jalɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɡ̤ɔɲamɛlɔ lwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɬɛli kulɔ jɔɓa nɡ̤amaŋǁuwa imiz̤i ɛmiwɛjɔ kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala ɛliz̤wɛni naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu ujintɔni lɔ mz̤ɛkɛlisɔ ninawɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni wakwasirajɛli wɔkutʰi imiɬa ijɔluka ijad̤aka imiɓɔnɔ jɔnkɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jitʰi kuɓɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤ija kuwɛnz̤a upʰɛlɛ lɔ mz̤ɛkɛlisɔ ɓanɡ̤aɓi saz̤ɛkɛlisa nɡ̤awɔ kwasirajɛli kɛ jitʰi kuɓɔ isɔnd̤ɛlɛ imiɬa nɛsipʰɛlɔ sɛmiɓɔnɔ jɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akuji kuɓa saɓakʰɔ namɲɛ umɓɔnɔ ɔkʰɔɬakɛlɛjɔ nɔkuv̤umisa ɔkukǀɛnɡ̤akǀɛnɡ̤ajɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛnɮu kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kutʰɛtʰa iliz̤wi ɛnd̤isukuɓa nd̤ilitʰɛtʰa lija kwɛnz̤ɛka linɡ̤aji kuliɓala nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɛnu nɮund̤ini inɛɛnkani nd̤itʰɛtʰa iliz̤wi nd̤ilɛnz̤ɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu jaɓɔna inɮu kasirajɛli itʰi umɓɔnɔ awuɓɔnajɔ jɛna lɔ nɡ̤ɔwɛmiɬa ɛmininz̤i uprɔfɛtɛlɛ amakǁɛʃa akud̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jitʰi kuɓɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi akaji kuɓa salitʲaz̤iswa ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi iliz̤wi ɛnd̤isukuɓa nd̤ilitʰɛtʰa lija kwɛnz̤ɛka it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu prɔfɛta ukǀʰasɛ aɓaprɔfɛti ɓakwasirajɛli aɓaprɔfɛtajɔ utʰi kwaɓaprɔfɛta ɔkwɛntliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jɛha kɛ aɓaprɔfɛti aɓanɔɓud̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ aɓaland̤ɛla ɔwaɓɔ umɔja nɛntɔ aɓanɡ̤ajiɓɔnanɡ̤a ɓaɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛmpunɡ̤utʲɛ ɛmaŋǁuwɛni aɓaprɔfɛti ɓakʰɔ sirajɛli aniɲukanɡ̤a nijɛ ɛmatʰutʲɛni nijiɓijɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a inɮu kasirajɛli ukuz̤ɛ nakʰɛ uluɬu lɔkulwa nɡ̤ɔm̤la kajɛhɔv̤a ɓaɓɔna intɔ ɛkʰɔɬakɛlɛjɔ nɔkuv̤umisa ɔkunɡ̤amanɡ̤a aɓɔ ɓatʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnɡ̤aɓatʰumanɡ̤a ɓalind̤a ukukǃiniswa kwɛlɔ liz̤wi aniɓɔnanɡ̤a mɓɔnɔ wankɔɬakalɔ nakuv̤umisa ɔkunɡ̤amanɡ̤a nisitʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤inɡ̤atʰɛtʰanɡ̤a nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa nitʰɛtʰɛ intɔ ɛkʰɔɬakɛlɛjɔ niɓɔna amanɡ̤a nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jaɓɔnani nd̤inikǀʰasilɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a isanɮa sikǀʰasa aɓaprɔfɛti aɓaɓɔna intɔ ɛkʰɔɬakɛlɛjɔ ɓav̤umisɛ amanɡ̤a aɓaji kuɓakʰɔ ɛkukǀwɛjwɛni kwaɓantu ɓam ɓanɡ̤ab̤alwa ɛŋǀwad̤ini jɔmliɓɔ wɛnɮu kasirajɛli ɓanɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni ɛm̤laɓɛni wakwasirajɛli naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤ijinkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa ɛwɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa ɓɛɓand̤wɛnd̤wisilɛ aɓantu ɓam ɓɛsitʰi lukǁɔlɔ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ lukǁɔlɔ ɓatʰi ɓakwakʰa ud̤ɔnɡ̤a ɓɔna jaɓɔna aɓaja ɓalutʲaɓɛka nɡ̤ɔd̤aka ɔluɬɛpʰukajɔ jitʰi kwaɓatʲaɓɛka nɡ̤ɔd̤aka ɔluɬɛpʰukajɔ luja kuz̤a isipʰanɡ̤ɔ ɛsikʰukulajɔ kɛ matʲɛ ɛsikǀʰɔtʰɔ jiwani wɛna mɔja usisakǃʰwitʰi ɔv̤utʰuv̤utʰuz̤ajɔ kǃʰutʰa kǁa kɛ lutʰɛ ud̤ɔnɡ̤a akuji kutʰiwa kupʰi ukutʲaɓɛka ɛnatʲaɓɛka nɡ̤akɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤ija kukǃʰutʰisa umɔja ɔv̤utʰuv̤utʰuz̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɔɓuʃuʃu ɓam kuz̤ɛ nɛsipʰanɡ̤ɔ ɛsikʰukulajɔ nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ namatʲɛ ɛz̤ikǀʰɔtʰɔ nɡ̤ɔɓuʃuʃu ukuz̤ɛ kuɡ̤ǃ̤itʲɛlwɛ kupʰɛlɛ nd̤ija kuluɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ula ud̤ɔnɡ̤a ɛnalutʲaɓɛka nɡ̤ɔd̤aka ɔluɬɛpʰukajɔ nd̤iluwisɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni sitʰʲilɛkilɛ isisɛkɔ salɔ luwɛ nipʰɛlɛlɛ kwɛsɔ sitʰuɓa salɔ naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ɔɓupʰɛlɛlisɛla ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni uɓuʃuʃu ɓam nakwaɓatʲaɓɛka nɡ̤ɔd̤aka ɔluɬɛpʰukajɔ nd̤itʰi alusɛkʰɔ ud̤ɔnɡ̤a aɓasɛkʰɔ aɓatʲaɓɛki ɓalɔ aɓaprɔfɛti ɓakwasirajɛli aɓaɓɛprɔfɛta nɡ̤ɛjɛrusalɛm aɓaɓɛɓɔna umɓɔnɔ wɔkǁɔlɔ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ lukǁɔlɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu b̤ɛkisa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ kwiintɔmɓi z̤aɓantu ɓakɔwɛnu ɛz̤iprɔfɛta ɔkwɛɛntliz̤ijɔ z̤az̤ɔ uz̤ɛ uprɔfɛtɛ nɡ̤az̤ɔ utʰi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jɛha kɛ aɓɔ ɓatʰunɡ̤a iz̤iɓɔpʰɛlɛlɔ ɛz̤iɬaɬɛni z̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤ɔnkɛ ɓɛnz̤ɛ iz̤iɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɔ ɛz̤ilinɡ̤ɛnɛ iintlɔkɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ukuz̤ɛ ɓatʰijɛlɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ nitʰijɛlɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ jaɓantu ɓam nasind̤isa ɛjɛnu imipʰɛfumlɔ nind̤iɬamɓɛlɛ kuɓantu ɓam nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛxasi ɛsutʲwɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamakǃʰɛkɛz̤a ɛsɔnka ukuz̤ɛ niɓulalɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ ɛɓinɡ̤ɛjakufa nisind̤isɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ ɛɓinɡ̤ɛjakusind̤iswa nɡ̤amanɡ̤a ɛnu ɛɓantwini ɓam aɓav̤a amanɡ̤a nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤iz̤ikǀʰasilɛ iz̤iɓɔpʰɛlɛlɔ z̤ɛnu ɛnitʰijɛla nɡ̤az̤ɔ imipʰɛfumlɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛntaka nd̤ija kuz̤ikǃʰawula ɛz̤inɡ̤alwɛni z̤ɛnu nd̤ijind̤ululɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ kwaimipʰɛfumlɔ ɛnijitʰijɛlɛjɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛntaka nd̤ɔz̤ik͡xaz̤ula iz̤iɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɔ z̤ɛnu nd̤iɓaɬanɡ̤ulɛ aɓantu ɓam ɛsanɮɛni sɛnu ɓanɡ̤aɓi saɓa jintɔ ɛtʰijɛlwajɔ ɛsanɮɛni sɛnu naz̤i ukuɓand̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa nijɛnz̤ɛ ɓuɬunɡ̤u nɡ̤ɔɓukǁɔki intliz̤ijɔ jɛlunɡ̤isa ɛnd̤inɡ̤alɛnz̤anɡ̤a ɓuɬunɡ̤u naz̤ɔmɛlɛz̤a iz̤anɮa z̤ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ukuz̤ɛ anɡ̤aɓuji ɛnɮɛlɛni jakʰɛ ɛmɓi asind̤iswɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ aniji kujiɓɔna intɔ ɛkʰɔɬakɛlɛjɔ ninɡ̤aɓi sav̤umisa nɔkuv̤umisa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija kuɓaɬanɡ̤ula aɓantu ɓam ɛsanɮɛni sɛnu naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika amad̤ɔd̤a akumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwasirajɛli aɬala pʰant͡si pʰamɓi kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu mad̤ɔd̤a aɲusɛ iz̤iɡ̤ɔɡ̤ɔ z̤awɔ ɛz̤intliz̤ijwɛni z̤awɔ isikʰuɓɛkisɔ sɔkuɓa aɓɛ ɡ̤wɛŋǁa pʰamɓi kɔɓusɔ ɓawɔ nd̤inɡ̤akǃukǃɛlwa nd̤ikǃukǃɛlwɛ nɡ̤awɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ tʰɛtʰa nawɔ utʰi kuwɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɛlɔwɔ nalɔwɔ wasɛnɮwini kasirajɛli ɔtʰɛ waɲusa iz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɛ isikʰuɓɛkisɔ sɔkuɓa aɓɛ ɡ̤wɛŋǁa pʰamɓi kɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ wɛz̤a kuɓaprɔfɛti jɛhɔv̤a nd̤ɔɓa nɡ̤ɔmpʰɛnd̤ulajɔ nɡ̤ɔkwam nɡ̤ɔkɔɓuninz̤i ɓɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤ijikǁʰakamfulɛ inɮu kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ ɛkuɓɛni ɓɛʃɛŋǁilɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jitʰi kwinɮu kasirajɛli it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɓujani niz̤iɓujisɛ ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤wɛni z̤ɛnu niɓuɓujisɛ uɓusɔ ɓɛnu kumasikiz̤i ɛnu ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛlɔwɔ nalɔwɔ wasɛnɮwini kasirajɛli nɔwasɛmz̤ini ɔpʰamɓukɛlɛ kwasirajɛli ɔtʰɛ waz̤aɬula ɛkund̤iland̤ɛlɛni kwakʰɛ waɲusa iz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɛ isikʰuɓɛkisɔ sɔkuɓa aɓɛ ɡ̤wɛŋǁa pʰamɓi kɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ wɛz̤a kumprɔfɛti ukuz̤ɛ akǃukǃɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɛ jɛhɔv̤a nd̤ɔmpʰɛnd̤ula nɡ̤ɔkwam nd̤ɔjikǀʰasa lɔɔ nd̤ɔd̤a nd̤ijipʰanz̤isɛ iɓɛ nɡ̤umkǃɔnd̤isɔ nɔmz̤ɛkɛlisɔ nd̤imŋǃumlɛ ɛɓantwini ɓam naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a umprɔfɛti kǁa atʰɛ waxwɛɓɛʃwa watʰɛtʰa iliz̤wi jɛhɔv̤a nd̤imxwɛɓɛʃilɛ lɔɔ mprɔfɛti nd̤ɔsɔlula isanɮa pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ nd̤imt͡ʃaɓalalisɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli ɓaja kuɓutʰwala uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓund͡ʒ̤alɔ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɔkǃukǃɛla kujɛ ɓuja kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɔmprɔfɛti lɔwɔ ukuz̤ɛ inɮu kasirajɛli inɡ̤aɓi sand̤wɛnd̤wa imkɛ ɛkund̤iland̤ɛlɛni kwajɔ ɓanɡ̤aɓi saz̤ɛnz̤a iiŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɛz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤aɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓantu ɓam nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu kǁa iliz̤wɛ litʰɛ lɔna lamɛnɛz̤a nɡ̤ɔɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ nd̤asɔlula isanɮa pʰɛz̤u kwalɔ nd̤awapʰula kulɔ umsimɛlɛlɔ ɔsisɔnka nd̤atʰumɛla kulɔ inɮala nd̤aŋǃumla kulɔ nɛnkɔmɔ ɛkʰɔ pʰakatʰi kwalɔ mad̤ɔd̤a ɔmatʰatʰu ɔɔnɔwa nɔd̤anijɛli nɔjɔb̤i wɔna aɓɛja kuɬanɡ̤ula ɔwawɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ kupʰɛla nɡ̤ɔɓawɔ uɓulunɡ̤isa it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤inɡ̤afanɛlana nd̤ikǀand̤isa amaxamŋǀwa ɛz̤wɛni aliɬutʰa aɓantwana kwaɓa sɛnkanɡ̤ala kulɔ akwaɓakʰɔ unɔkukǀand̤a kulɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamaxamŋǀwa lawɔ ɛkʰɔ pʰakatʰi kwalɔ lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a ɔmatʰatʰu nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ɛɓɛnɡ̤aji kuɬanɡ̤ula naɲana nantɔmɓi ɛɓɛja kuɬanɡ̤ulɛka ɔd̤wa kɛ ɓɛkuja kuɓa sɛnkanɡ̤ala ɛz̤wɛni ɛlɔ nɔkuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤aliz̤isɛla ik͡xɛlɛ ɛlɔ liz̤wɛ nd̤atʰi ik͡xɛlɛ malikǀand̤ɛ kwɛlɔ liz̤wɛ nd̤aŋǃamla kulɔ nɛnkɔmɔ ɛkʰɔ pʰakatʰi kwalɔ lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a ɔmatʰatʰu nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ɛɓɛnɡ̤aji kuɬanɡ̤ula ɲana nantɔmɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛja kuɬanɡ̤ulɛka wɔna ɔd̤wa nɔkuɓa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤atʰumɛla indʲikitʲa jɔkufa kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ nd̤atʰulula uɓuʃuʃu ɓam pʰɛz̤u kwalɔ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤az̤i ukuz̤ɛ nd̤iŋǃumlɛ kulɔ nɛnkɔmɔ ɓɛkʰɔ pʰakatʰi kwalɔ ɔɔnɔwa nɔd̤anijɛli nɔjɔb̤i nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ɓɛɓɛnɡ̤aji kuɬanɡ̤ula ɲana nantɔmɓi ɓɔna ɓɛɓɛja kuɬanɡ̤ula ɔwaɓɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ kupʰɛla nɡ̤ɔɓaɓɔ uɓulunɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi kɔɓɛka pʰi kɛ kǁa nd̤itʰɛ nd̤atʰumɛla ɛjɛrusalɛm z̤ɔz̤inɛ iz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɔ z̤am ɛz̤iɓi ik͡xɛlɛ nɛnɮala namaxamŋǀwa nɛndʲikitʲa jɔkufa ukuz̤ɛ kuŋǃumkɛ kujɔ nɛnkɔmɔ jaɓɔnani kɛ kuja kujɔ aɓasind̤ilɛjɔ aɓaja kukʰut͡ʃwa aɓanɡ̤ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi jaɓɔnani ɓaja kupʰuma ɓɛz̤ɛ nijiɓɔnɛ inɮɛla jaɓɔ nɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤aɓɔ nitʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛkɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi ɛnd̤ajiz̤isɛla ɓɔna ijɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛntɔ jɔnkɛ ɛnd̤ajiz̤isɛla jɔna ɓaja kunitʰutʰuz̤ɛla kǁa nijiɓɔnajɔ inɮɛla jaɓɔ nɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤aɓɔ naz̤i ukuɓa and̤ifumananɡ̤a nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ kɔnkɛ ɛnd̤akwɛnz̤ajɔ kujɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu umtʰi wɔmd̤ilija ujiɮula nɡ̤antɔni jɔnkɛ ɛmiɲɛ imitʰi isɛɓɛ lɔmd̤ilija ɛlipʰakatʰi kwɛmitʰi jɛɬatʰi kukʰa kutʰatʲatʰwɛ umtʰi jini kuwɔ wɔkusɛɓɛnz̤a umsɛɓɛnz̤i kukʰa kutʰatʲatʰwɛ nɛsikʰɔnkwanɛ kuwɔ sɔkukǁʰɔma iimpaɬa nɔkuɓa z̤iz̤ipʰi jaɓɔna ɛmlilwɛni ukuɓa uwut͡ʃisɛ umlilɔ ut͡ʃisa iiŋǀam z̤awɔ z̤ɔmɓini sixawukɛ isiɓili sawɔ wɔwulunɡ̤ɛla kɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i jaɓɔna ɔkɔ uɓɛ usɛwɔnkɛ uɓunɡ̤ɛnamsɛɓɛnz̤i wɔɓɛka pʰi kɛ ukunɡ̤aɓi namsɛɓɛnz̤i kǁa utʰɛ wat͡ʃiswa nɡ̤umlilɔ waxawuka nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmtʰi wɔmd̤ilija pʰakatʰi kwɛmitʰi jɛɬatʰi ɛnd̤iwufaka ɛmlilwɛni ukuz̤ɛ ut͡ʃiswɛ nd̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuɓaɓɛka ɛmlilwɛni aɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm nd̤ija kuɓakǀʰasa ɓaja kupʰuma ɛmlilwɛni umlilɔ uja kuɓat͡ʃisa naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɛkuɓakǀʰasɛni nd̤ija kwɛnz̤a ɛliz̤wɛni kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa ɓɛmɛnɛz̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɔɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu jaz̤isɛ ijɛrusalɛm amasikiz̤i ajɔ utʰi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kwijɛrusalɛm ukutʰi ukuv̤ɛla kwakʰɔ nɔkuz̤alwa kwakʰɔ kɔkwasɛz̤wɛni lamakanan ujiɬɔ wajɛ ɛnɡ̤umamɔri uɲɔkɔ wajɛ ɛnɡ̤um̤ɛtikaz̤i ukuz̤alwa kwakʰɔ kɛ nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkuz̤alwa kwakʰɔ ajiŋǃuɲulwanɡ̤a imfɛsanɛ jakʰɔ akuɬand͡ʒ̤wanɡ̤a nɡ̤amanz̤i ukuɓa usulɛkɛ akuɬikiɬwanɡ̤a nɡ̤atʲuwa akusɔnɡ̤ɛlwanɡ̤a z̤isɔnɡ̤ɛlwɛni akuɓanɡ̤akʰɔ lisɔ linɛŋǀɛɓa kuwɛ ukuz̤ɛ wɛnz̤ɛlwɛ nɔkɔ iɲɛ kwɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɔfɛfɛ kuwɛ walaɬɛlwa ɛnɮɛ nɡ̤ɔkukǀat͡ʃukɛlwa kwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkuz̤alwa kwakʰɔ nd̤aɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa kuwɛ nd̤akuɓɔna uɡ̤ǃ̤uʃaɡ̤ǃ̤uʃa ɛɡ̤az̤ini lakʰɛ nd̤atʰi kuwɛ usɛɡ̤az̤ini lakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤alɔ pʰila usɛɡ̤az̤ini lakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤alɔ pʰila nd̤akwɛnz̤a waɓa jiɲamɓalala nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkunt͡ʃula kwɛnt͡simi wand̤a wakʰula ɛntlaɬɛni jɛz̤iɮɛlɛ wapʰuma amaɓɛlɛ ɓaɬuma uɓɔja ɓakʰɔ wajɛ kɛ wɛna uz̤ɛ kaɲɛ kɛ kalɔku nd̤aɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa kuwɛ nd̤akuɓɔna nalɔ ikǁɛʃa lakʰɔ lilikǁɛʃa lɔtʰand̤ɔ nd̤atwaɓulula isɔnd̤ɔ lɛnɡ̤uɓɔ jam pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ nd̤aɓuɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla uɓuz̤ɛ ɓakʰɔ nd̤akufunɡ̤ɛla nd̤aŋǃɔpʰisana nawɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a waɓa nɡ̤ɔwam kɛ kɛ nd̤akuɬamɓa nɡ̤amanz̤i nd̤akuɬamɓulula amaɡ̤az̤i akʰɔ nd̤akutʰamɓisa nɡ̤ɛɔli nd̤akwamɓɛsa nɡ̤ɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤imfakamfɛlɛ nd̤akuŋǁiɓa iz̤ikǁatʰula z̤ɛsikʰumɓa sɛɬɛnɡ̤ɛz̤i nd̤akud͡ʒ̤ikɛlisa intlɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛlinɛn ɛkǀikiz̤ɛkilɛjɔ nd̤akuɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛla nɡ̤ɛsilika nd̤akuv̤atʰisa nɡ̤ɛsiv̤atʰɔ nd̤akufaka iz̤akǀʰɔlɔ ɛz̤iɬaɬɛni nɛmikǁɔkɛlɛlwanɛ ɛmkǃalɛni wakʰɔ nd̤akunika ikʰɔŋ̰ǀ̰ɔ lɛmpumlɔ namad͡ʒ̤ikaz̤i ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤akʰɔ nɛsit͡sʰaɓa sɔkuhɔmɓa ɛntlɔkɔ wav̤atʰa kɛ iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛz̤amɓatʰɔ z̤akʰɔ z̤aɓa z̤ɛz̤ɛlinɛn ɛkǀikiz̤ɛkilɛjɔ nɛz̤ɛsilika nɛz̤imfakamfɛlɛ waɮa umɡ̤uɓɔ ɔkǀɔliwɛjɔ nɔɓusi nɛɔli waɓa m̤lɛ kakʰulu kunɛnɛ waja upʰumɛlɛla ɛɓukumkanini lwapʰuma ud̤umɔ lɔɓuɬɛ ɓakʰɔ lwaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa iliz̤wɛ lɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓapʰɛlɛlisɛka ɓɔna nɡ̤ɔɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amɛla ɓam ɛnd̤aɓuɓɛka pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a wɛsuka wɛna wakʰɔlɔsa nɡ̤ɔɓuɬɛ ɓakʰɔ wahɛɲuz̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔd̤umɔ lwakʰɔ uɓuhɛɲu ɓakʰɔ waɓutʰululɛla pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɮulajɔ waɓa nɡ̤ɔwaɓɔ watʰaɓatʰa ɛz̤inɡ̤utʲɛni z̤akʰɔ iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a waz̤ɛnz̤ɛla iintɛntɛ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁu wahɛɲuz̤a pʰɛz̤u kwaz̤ɔ intɔ ɛɓɛ inɡ̤afanɛlɛ kuz̤a ɛɓɛ inɡ̤afanɛlɛ kuɓakʰɔ watʰaɓatʰa iimpaɬa z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔkuhɔmɓa z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ jam nɛz̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ jam ɛnd̤akunikajɔ waz̤ɛnz̤ɛla imifanɛkisɔ ɛnɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a wahɛɲuz̤a najɔ watʰaɓatʰa iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤imfakamfɛlɛ wajiɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla nɡ̤az̤ɔ nɛɔli jam nɛsikǃʰumisɔ wasiɓɛka pʰamɓi kwajɔ isɔnka ɛnd̤akunikajɔ nɔmɡ̤uɓɔ ɔkǀɔliwɛjɔ nɛɔli nɔɓusi iz̤intɔ ɛnd̤akuɮisajɔ z̤ɔna waz̤iɓɛka pʰamɓi kwajɔ ukuɓa z̤iɓɛ liv̤umɓa ɛlitʰɔz̤amisajɔ kwaɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a watʰaɓatʰa ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɔ ɔwaz̤iz̤alɛla waɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla nɡ̤az̤ɔ kujɔ ukuɓa iɮɛ ɓɛɓuɓuŋǀinanɛ kɛ uɓuhɛɲu ɓakʰɔ ukuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛ uɓasikɛ ɔɔɲana ɓam uɓanikɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓakǀand̤isa ɓɔna ɛmlilwɛni nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jajɔ ɛmasikiz̤ini akʰɔ ɔnkɛ nasɛɓuhɛɲwini ɓakʰɔ akujikʰumɓulanɡ̤a imiɬa jɔɓuŋǀinanɛ ɓakʰɔ ɔkɔ uɓuz̤ɛ kaɲɛ uɡ̤ǃ̤uʃaɡ̤ǃ̤uʃa ɛɡ̤az̤ini lakʰɔ kwaz̤a kwatʰi ɛmv̤a kwɛz̤ɔ ntɔ z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤imɓi jɛha jɛha kɛ wɛna it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a waz̤akʰɛla amaŋǃuɡ̤wala waz̤ɛnz̤ɛla iind̤awɔ ɛz̤ipʰakamilɛjɔ ɛz̤itratwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɛmantlɔkɔ ɛɛnɮɛla z̤ɔnkɛ waz̤akʰɛla iind̤awɔ z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤ipʰakamilɛjɔ waɓɛnz̤a uɓuɬɛ ɓakʰɔ ɓalisikiz̤i wajitʰi kǃʰɛkɛ imilɛnz̤ɛ jakʰɔ kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɮula nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla waɓand̤isa uɓuhɛɲu ɓakʰɔ wahɛɲuz̤a nɔɔɲana ɓamajiputa aɓamɛlwanɛ ɓakʰɔ aɓakʰulu nɡ̤ɛɲama waɓand̤isa kɛ uɓuhɛɲu ɓakʰɔ ukuz̤ɛ und̤ikǃumɓisɛ jaɓɔna nd̤asɔlula pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ isanɮa nd̤awuŋǀipʰisa umamkɛlisɔ ɔwumisɛlwɛjɔ nd̤akunikɛla ɛlitʰɛni laɓakutʰijajɔ kwɛlɛɛntɔmɓi z̤amafilisti ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤ijid̤anɛlɛ inɮɛla jakʰɔ jamaɲala wahɛɲuz̤a nɔɔɲana ɓasɛasirija nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa unɡ̤anɛlanɡ̤a wahɛɲuz̤a kɛ naɓɔ akwanɛla nɔkɔ waɓand̤isɛla ɛz̤wɛni lamakanan uɓuhɛɲu ɓakʰɔ kwɛlamakalɛd̤i akwanɛla najilɔɔ ntɔ haji ukutʰamɓa kwɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa wɛnz̤ɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ imisɛɓɛnz̤i jɛnkaz̤ana ɛhɛɲuz̤ajɔ ɛsilɛjɔ ɛkwakʰɛni kwakʰɔ amaŋǃuɡ̤wala ɛmantlɔkɔ ɛɛnɮɛla z̤ɔnkɛ nasɛkwɛnz̤ɛni kwakʰɔ iind̤awɔ z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤ipʰakamilɛjɔ ɛz̤itratwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ akuɓanɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛhɛɲukaz̤i ɛli nɡ̤ɔkusuka uwukǀukukǀɛz̤ɛ umv̤uz̤ɔ wɔɓuhɛɲu umfaz̤i ɔk͡xɛkǁɛz̤ajɔ wamkɛla aɓasɛmz̤ini nɔkɔ anɡ̤umkamntu ɔnkɛ amahɛɲukaz̤i ɓawanika iz̤ipʰɔ kɛ wɛna waz̤inika z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤itʰand̤anɛ z̤akʰɔ iz̤ipʰɔ z̤akʰɔ waz̤ikǀɛnɡ̤a ukuz̤ɛ z̤iz̤ɛ kuwɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛkuhɛɲuz̤ɛni kwakʰɔ wɛna ɔkwakʰɔ ukuhɛɲuz̤a kutʰɛ kwapʰamɓana nɔkwamankaz̤ana nɡ̤ɔkutʰi inɡ̤aɓi nɡ̤uwɛ ɔland̤ɛlwajɔ ɛkuhɛɲuz̤ɛni nɡ̤ɔkutʰi uxɔlɛ wɛna umv̤uz̤ɔ wɔɓuhɛɲu unɡ̤axɔlɛlwa umv̤uz̤ɔ wɔɓuhɛɲu waɓa nɡ̤ɔpʰamɓilɛjɔ kɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ hɛɲukaz̤i liv̤ɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ipʰalɛlɛ jakʰɔ ɓatʰʲilɛka uɓuz̤ɛ ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuhɛɲuz̤a kwakʰɔ nɛz̤itʰand̤anɛ z̤akʰɔ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤amasikiz̤i akʰɔ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamaɡ̤az̤i ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ ɔwaɓanikɛlajɔ kuz̤ɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jaɓɔna nd̤ija kuz̤itʰaɓatʰa z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤itʰand̤anɛ z̤akʰɔ ɔwakʰɔlisana naz̤ɔ naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔwaɓatʰand̤ajɔ nd̤awɔɲɛ naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔwaɓatʰijajɔ nd̤iɓaɬanɡ̤anisɛ nd̤ikukǀʰasɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nd̤iɓutʰʲilɛ uɓuz̤ɛ ɓakʰɔ kuɓɔ ɓaɓuɓɔnɛ uɓuz̤ɛ ɓakʰɔ ɓɔnkɛ nd̤ɔkuɡ̤wɛɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɡ̤wɛtʲwa kwaɓak͡xɛkǁɛz̤ikaz̤i naɓapʰalaz̤i ɓɛɡ̤az̤i nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ wɛna uɓɛ liɡ̤az̤i lɔɓuʃuʃu nɔɓukʰwɛlɛ nd̤ɔkunikɛla ɛsanɮɛni saɓɔ ɓawaɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ulɛ amaŋǃuɡ̤wala akʰɔ ɓaz̤id̤iliz̤ɛ iind̤awɔ z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤ipʰakamilɛjɔ ɓakuɬuɓɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɔ ɓaz̤itʰaɓatʰɛ iimpaɬa z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔkuhɔmɓa ɓakuʃijɛ uz̤ɛ kaɲɛ ɓaja kukuɲusɛla iɓanɮa ɓakukǁuluɓɛ nɡ̤amatʲɛ ɓakukǁaɓɛlɛ nɡ̤amak͡xɛlɛ aɓɔ ɓaz̤it͡ʃisɛ iz̤inɮu z̤akʰɔ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ ɓaz̤ɛnz̤ɛ kuwɛ iz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓafaz̤i aɓaninz̤i nd̤ikuŋǃumamisɛ unɡ̤aɓi saɓa lihɛɲu unɡ̤aɓi saxɔla umv̤uz̤ɔ wɔɓuhɛɲu nd̤ɔɓupʰɔlisɛla kuwɛ uɓuʃuʃu ɓam limkɛ ikʰwɛlɛ kuwɛ nd̤iz̤ɔlɛ nd̤inɡ̤aɓi sakǃumɓa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa unɡ̤ajikʰumɓulanɡ̤a imiɬa jɔɓuŋǀinanɛ ɓakʰɔ wɛsuka waŋ̤ǃ̤unɡ̤isana kwɛz̤i z̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ jaɓɔna nd̤ikunika nɡ̤ɔkwɛnɮɛla jakʰɔ ɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukuz̤ɛ unɡ̤ɛnz̤i maɲala anɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwamasikiz̤i akʰɔ ɔnkɛ jaɓɔna ɓɔnkɛ aɓaz̤ɛkɛlisi ɓaja kuz̤ɛkɛlisa nɡ̤awɛ ɓɛsitʰi ifuz̤ɛ intɔmɓi jakʰɛ wɛna ujintɔmɓi jɔɲɔkɔ ɔd̤imɛlɛjɔ jind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ naɓantwana ɓakʰɛ wɛna unɡ̤ud̤ad̤ɛ wɔɔd̤ad̤ɛ ɓɛnu aɓad̤imɛlɛjɔ nɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a aɓɔ naɓantwana ɓaɓɔ uɲɔkɔ nɡ̤um̤ɛtikaz̤i ujiɬɔ nɡ̤umamɔri ud̤ad̤ɛ wɛnu ɔmkʰulu nɡ̤usamari namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi akʰɛ ɛɬɛli nɡ̤asɛkʰɔɬɔ kwakʰɔ nɔmsakwɛnu ɔmŋǀinanɛ kuwɛ ɛɬɛli nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ kwakʰɔ jisɔd̤ɔm namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ akuhamɓanɡ̤a kɛ nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛla z̤aɓɔ wɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkwamasikiz̤i aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔmz̤uz̤wana wɔnakalisɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛla z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a isɔd̤ɔm umsakwɛnu jɔna namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ ajɛnz̤anɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ wɛna namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi akʰɔ naɓu kɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛsɔd̤ɔm umsakwɛnu jaɓɛ ilik͡xat͡ʃi nɔkuɬutʰa sisɔnka nɔkukǀʰulumakǀʰa jɔna namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ ajaɓamɓa nɡ̤ɛsanɮa aɓaz̤iint͡siz̤ana naɓanɡ̤amaɬwɛmpu ɓaɓɛz̤iɮa ɓɛsɛnz̤a amasikiz̤i pʰamɓi nd̤aɓasusa nd̤akukuɓɔna ɔkɔ nɔsamari akɔnanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤akʰɔ wajɛ wɛna uwand̤isilɛ amasikiz̤i akʰɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ waɓɛnz̤a amalunɡ̤isa ɔd̤ad̤ɛ ɓɛnu nɡ̤amasikiz̤i akʰɔ ɔwɛnz̤ilɛjɔ nawɛ tʰwala kɛ iɬaz̤ɔ lakʰɔ ɔliɓalɛlɛ kɔd̤ad̤ɛ ɓɛnu nɡ̤ɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤akʰɔ ɔwaz̤ɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkumasikiz̤i kunaɓɔ uɓɛnz̤ɛ ɓaɓa nɡ̤amalunɡ̤isa kunawɛ d̤ana kɛ nawɛ ulitʰwalɛ iɬaz̤ɔ lakʰɔ ɛkuɓɛni uɓɛnz̤ɛ amalunɡ̤isa ɔɔd̤ad̤ɛ ɓɛnu ɛkukuɓujisɛni ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kwaɓɔ ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kwɛsɔd̤ɔm namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ nɔkutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kɔsamari namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi akʰɛ nd̤ɔkuɓujisa ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa ɔkukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kwakʰɔ pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ukuz̤ɛ ulitʰwalɛ iɬaz̤ɔ lakʰɔ uz̤id̤anɛlɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɔz̤ɛnz̤ilɛjɔ uɓatʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛ ɓaja kutʰi aɓasakwɛnu isɔd̤ɔm namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ ɓaɓujɛlɛ kwakwisimɔ saɓɔ sanɡ̤apʰamɓili nɔsamari namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi akʰɛ ɓaɓujɛlɛ kwakwisimɔ saɓɔ sanɡ̤apʰamɓili nawɛ namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi akʰɔ niɓujɛlɛ kwakwisimɔ sɛnu sanɡ̤apʰamɓili isɔd̤ɔm umsakwɛnu ajiɓanɡ̤a sifund̤ɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛmini jamak͡xat͡ʃi akʰɔ z̤inɡ̤ɛkatʰʲilwa iz̤intɔ z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤imɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤asɛkǁɛʃɛni lɛsiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ samaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi akwaaram nɛsanɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kujɛ samaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi amafilisti awakukǀukulajɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ amaɲala akʰɔ namasikiz̤i akʰɔ uwatʰwɛlɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤ɛnz̤a kɛ kuwɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ wɛna ɔsid̤ɛlilɛjɔ isifunɡ̤ɔ ukuɓa uwapʰulɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nd̤ija kuwukʰumɓula umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nawɛ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔɓuŋǀinanɛ ɓakʰɔ nd̤ikumisɛlɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ wɔz̤ikʰumɓula iinɮɛla z̤akʰɔ ud̤anɛ ɛkuɓamkɛlɛni kwakʰɔ ɔɔd̤ad̤ɛ ɓɛnu aɓakʰulu kunawɛ kuɲɛ naɓaŋǀinanɛ kunawɛ nd̤ikunikɛ ɓaɓɛ z̤iintɔmɓi kuwɛ nɔkɔ ɓɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ wakʰɔ nd̤ɔwumisa umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nawɛ waz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ukuz̤ɛ ukʰumɓulɛ ud̤anɛ unɡ̤aɓi saɓa nakuv̤ula mlɔmɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɬaz̤ɔ lakʰɔ ɛkukukǁɔlɛlɛni z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɔz̤ɛnz̤ilɛjɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu d͡ʒ̤ika ikǃʰina uz̤ɛkɛlisɛ nɡ̤ɔmz̤ɛkɛlisɔ kwinɮu kasirajɛli utʰi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ikǁʰalanɡ̤a ɛlikʰulu ɛlimapʰikɔ makʰulu ɛlint͡siɓa z̤ɔlukilɛjɔ ɛliɓɔja ɓukǃʰamilɛjɔ ɓukǀʰɔkɔkǀʰɔkɔ lɛz̤a ɛlɛb̤anɔn latʰaɓatʰa amantlɔkɔ ɔmsɛd̤arɛ lakǃʰawula ɛlipʰɛz̤ulu ɛmaɬamv̤ini awɔ ɛz̤wɛni lakwakanan ɛmz̤ini waɓaxwɛɓi lakǀapʰula ɛmɓɛwini jɛlɔ z̤wɛ lajifaka ɛnt͡simini ɛɬwajɛlwajɔ lajitʰaɓatʰa lajisa kumanz̤i amaninz̤i lajimisa nɡ̤ɔkɔmŋ̤ǀ̤uluɓa jaɬuma jaɓa nɡ̤umd̤ilija ɔnaɓilɛjɔ ɔmfupʰi ukuz̤ɛ amasɛɓɛ awɔ asinɡ̤ɛ kulɔ nɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu z̤awɔ z̤iɓɛ pʰant͡si kwalɔ waɓa nɡ̤umd̤ilija kɛ wɛnz̤a amasɛɓɛ wakǃʰama amaɡ̤ǃ̤aɓi kwaɓakʰɔ ɛliɲɛ ikǁʰalanɡ̤a ɛlikʰulu ɛlimapʰikɔ makʰulu linɔɓɔja ɔɓuninz̤i nanɡ̤ɔ lɔ md̤ilija unaɓɛla nɡ̤akulɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu z̤awɔ uɡ̤ɔɓɛla nɡ̤akulɔ amasɛɓɛ awɔ ukuɓa liwaɲɛlɛ ɛz̤ind̤imɛni ɔtʲɛwɛ kuz̤ɔ uɓutʲɛlwɛ ɛnt͡simini ɛlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ wɔna nɡ̤asɛmanz̤ini amaninz̤i ukuz̤ɛ wɛnz̤ɛ amasɛɓɛ ukǁakatʰɛ iz̤ikǃʰamɔ ukuɓa uɓɛ nɡ̤umd̤ilija ɔnɡ̤uwɔna unɡ̤uwɔ jitʰi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi wɔmila ɛlaa kǁʰalanɡ̤a aliji kuz̤iɲɔtʰula iiŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu z̤awɔ liz̤iŋǃumlɛ iz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤awɔ uɓunɛ atʰi ɔnkɛ amaɡ̤ǃ̤aɓi amat͡ʃa ɔkuɬuma kwawɔ aɓunɛ kunɡ̤aɓi nanɡ̤anɡ̤alɔ nanɡ̤aɓantu ɓaninz̤i ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤and͡ʒ̤ini z̤awɔ jaɓɔna kʰɔna utʲɛlwɛ wɔmila awuji kuɓuna uɓunɛ wakufikɛlwa lulɔpʰu lwasɛmpumalanɡ̤a uja kuɓunɛla ɛz̤ind̤imɛni ɔɬumɛ kuz̤ɔ kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi kʰawutʰi kwinɮu ɛnɛɛnkani anikwaz̤i ukuɓa kujintɔni ɔkɔ jitʰi jaɓɔnani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli wɛz̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm wamtʰaɓatʰa wajɔ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓajɔ waɓasa kujɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli watʰaɓatʰa ɔwasɛmɓɛwɛni jɔkumkani waŋǃɔpʰisana najɛ wamfunɡ̤isa watʰaɓatʰa iind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlɛ z̤ɛliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓuɓɛ ɓuɓukumkani ɔɓupʰant͡si ukuz̤ɛ ɓunɡ̤az̤ipʰakamisi ukuz̤ɛ awuɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wakʰɛ ukuz̤ɛ umɛ wɔna wasuka kɛ waɡ̤wilika kujɛ nɡ̤ɔkutʰuma aɓatʰuɲwa ɓakʰɛ ɛjiputa ukuz̤ɛ anikwɛ amahaʃɛ naɓantu aɓaninz̤i wɔɓa nɛmpumɛlɛlɔ wɔsind̤a ɔwɛnz̤ɛ lɔɔ ntɔ wɔwapʰula umŋǃɔpʰisɔ asind̤ɛ kɛ nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a iɲanisɔ ɛnd̤awɛni jɔkumkani ɔwamɛnz̤a ɔsifunɡ̤ɔ asid̤ɛlilɛjɔ ɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ awapʰulɛjɔ uja kufɛla kujɔ ɛsaz̤ulwini sɛb̤ab̤ɛli ufarɔ akaji kumŋǀɛd̤a nɡ̤ampi nanɡ̤asikʰunɡ̤u sikʰulu ɛmfaz̤wɛni kwakufund͡ʒ̤wa ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lɔkuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a kwakʰiwɛ iŋǃaɓa z̤ɔkuɓɔnisɛla ukuz̤ɛ iŋǃuɲulwɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ ɛmininz̤i ɛkuɓɛni ɛsid̤ɛlilɛ isifunɡ̤ɔ ukuɓa awapʰulɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ jaɓɔna unikɛ isanɮa sakʰɛ waz̤a nɔkɔ wɛnz̤a z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤i z̤intɔ akaji kusind̤a nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ iɲanisɔ isifunɡ̤ɔ asid̤ɛlilɛjɔ nɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ awapʰulɛjɔ nd̤ija ɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɛ nd̤ɔwutwaɓulula pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ umnatʰa aɓand͡ʒ̤iswɛ nɡ̤umɡ̤iɓɛ nd̤imsɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli nd̤imanɡ̤alɛlanɛ najɛ kʰɔna nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmɛnɛz̤ɔ lwakʰɛ and̤imɛnɛz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤alɔ ɓaja lik͡xɛlɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓasaɓilɛjɔ ɓakʰɛ ɛmaɬɛlwɛni akʰɛ ɔnkɛ namasalɛla atʰiwɛ kǃʰu kwimimɔja jɔnkɛ naz̤i ukuɓa jɛhɔv̤a nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi mna nd̤ija kutʰaɓatʰa kɛ iɬamv̤u ɛmantlɔkɔ ɔmsɛd̤arɛ ɔmd̤ɛ nd̤ilimisɛ ɛmaɬamv̤ini awɔ apʰɛz̤ulu nd̤ija kukǃʰawula ɛlitʰamɓilɛjɔ nd̤ilitʲalɛ ɛntaɓɛni ɛpʰakamilɛjɔ ɛnd̤ɛ nd̤ija kulitʲala kɛ ɛntaɓɛni ɛnd̤ɛ jakwasirajɛli liɲusɛ amasɛɓɛ likǁakatʰɛ iz̤ikǃʰamɔ liɓɛ nɡ̤umsɛd̤arɛ ɔnɡ̤ɔwɔna unɡ̤uwɔ z̤iɬalɛ pʰant͡si kwawɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛɛntlɔɓɔ nɡ̤ɛɛntlɔɓɔ z̤ija kuɬala ɛmtʰunz̤ini wamasɛɓɛ awɔ ija kwaz̤i jɔnkɛ imitʰi jasɛnɮɛ ukuɓa jɛhɔv̤a nd̤iwutʰɔɓilɛ umtʰi ɔpʰakamilɛjɔ nd̤iwupʰakamisilɛ umtʰi ɔmfupʰi nd̤iwɔmisilɛ umtʰi ɔmanz̤i nd̤iwukǃʰamisilɛ umtʰi ɔwɔmilɛjɔ mna jɛhɔv̤a nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ nd̤ɛnz̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ujintɔni lɔ mz̤ɛkɛlisɔ niz̤ɛkɛlisa nɡ̤awɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni wakwasirajɛli nisitʰi ɔɔjisɛ ɓaɮɛ iid̤ilija ɛz̤imuŋǀu kwaɓa ɓutʰɛlɛz̤i amaz̤iɲɔ ɔɔɲana nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi anisaji kuɓa saz̤ɛkɛlisa nɡ̤alɔ mz̤ɛkɛlisɔ kwasirajɛli jaɓɔnani jɔnkɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ jɛjam umpʰɛfumlɔ wɔjisɛ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wɔɲana jɛjam jɔmiɓini umpʰɛfumlɔ ɔwɔnajɔ kuja wɔna umntu kǁa atʰɛ waɓa lilunɡ̤isa wɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ nanɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa akaɮɛla ɛz̤intaɓɛni amɛɬɔ akʰɛ akawapʰakamisɛla kwiz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤ɛnɮu jakwasirajɛli umfaz̤i wɔmmɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ akamɛnz̤a iŋǃamɓi akasɔnd̤ɛla kumfaz̤i ɛnɔmz̤i akamkǁinz̤ɛlɛla pʰant͡si wasiɓujisa isiɓamɓisɔ sɔkuɓɔlɛka kwakʰɛ akakǁʰakamfula ɔlamɓilɛjɔ isɔnka sakʰɛ wamɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla ɔz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ akanikɛla ukuɓa aɮɛ aɓaɲɛ nɡ̤ajɔ akatʰaɓatʰa nz̤ala jamɓɔlɛkɔ wasiɓujisa isanɮa sakʰɛ ɛkuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰɛni wɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ nanɡ̤ɛɲanisɔ pʰakatʰi kɔɓani nɔɓani wahamɓa nɡ̤ɛmimisɛlɔ jam waɡ̤ǀ̤ina amasikɔ ukuɓa ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛɲanisɔ ulilunɡ̤isa inɛnɛ uja kupʰila it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ ɛtʰɛ waz̤ala uɲana ɔsisiɡ̤winta ɔpʰalaz̤a iɡ̤az̤i ɔwɛnz̤a nɔkuɓa iɲɛ kwɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ kɛ jɛna ɛz̤ɔ ntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛnɡ̤az̤ɛnz̤anɡ̤a uɲana kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɔɮɛla ɛz̤intaɓɛni ɔmɛnz̤a iŋǃamɓi umfaz̤i wɔmmɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ ɔlukǁinz̤ɛlɛla pʰant͡si usiz̤ana nɛɬwɛmpu ɔkǁʰakamfulajɔ ɔnɡ̤asiɓujisijɔ isiɓamɓisɔ ɔwapʰakamisɛla kwiz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ amɛɬɔ akʰɛ ɔwɛnz̤a amasikiz̤i ɔnikɛla ukuɓa aɮɛ aɓaɲɛ nɡ̤ajɔ ɔtʰaɓatʰa inz̤ala jɛmɓɔlɛkɔ wɔpʰila kɛ lɔɔ ɲana akaji kupʰila wɛnz̤ɛ ɔnkɛ masikiz̤i uja kuɓulawa afɛ iɡ̤az̤i lakʰɛ lija kuɓa pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ jaɓɔnani kɛ ɛtʰɛ jɛna lɔ waz̤ala uɲana ɔtʰɛ waz̤iɓɔna z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ɔnɔ z̤ikajisɛ az̤ɛnz̤ajɔ aɓɔnɛ kɛ anɡ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ anɡ̤aɮɛli ɛz̤intaɓɛni amɛɬɔ akʰɛ anɡ̤awapʰakamisɛli kwiz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤ɛnɮu kasirajɛli umfaz̤i wɔmmɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ anɡ̤amɛnz̤i iŋǃamɓi anɡ̤amkǁinz̤ɛlɛli pʰant͡si anɡ̤aɓamɓisi nɡ̤ɛsiɓamɓisɔ anɡ̤akǁʰakamfuli isɔnka sakʰɛ asinikɛ ɔlamɓilɛjɔ amɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɛ ɔz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uɓɔ aɓujisɛ isanɮa sakʰɛ kɔlusiz̤ana anɡ̤aɮi aɓaɲɛ nɡ̤ɛmali anɡ̤atʰaɓatʰi nz̤ala jamɓɔlɛkɔ wɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwamasikɔ uhamɓa nɡ̤ɛmimisɛlɔ jam lɔwɔ uɲana akaji nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓukajisɛ inɛnɛ uja kupʰila ujisɛ jɛna nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa ɛkǀud̤isilɛ kakuɓi ɛkǁʰakamfula umz̤alwana wɛnz̤a ɔkunɡ̤alunɡ̤ilɛjɔ pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu ɓakɔwaɓɔ jaɓɔnani uja nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɛ ukanti nitʰi kɛ kunɡ̤atʰuɓa ukuɓa uɲana anɡ̤aɓutʰwali uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓukav̤isɛ uɲana kalɔku wɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ nanɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa ujiɡ̤ǀ̤inilɛ jɔnkɛ imimisɛlɔ jam wajɛnz̤a inɛnɛ uja kupʰila umpʰɛfumlɔ ɔwɔnajɔ kuja wɔna wɔd̤wa uɲana akaji kutʰwala uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓukajisɛ nɔjisɛ akaji kuɓutʰwala uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɔɲana uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓɛlunɡ̤isa ɓuja kuɓa pʰɛz̤u kwalɔ nɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kuja kuɓa pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kɛ kǁa atʰɛ waɓuja ɛz̤ɔnwɛni z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ az̤ɛnz̤ilɛjɔ wajiɡ̤ǀ̤ina jɔnkɛ imimisɛlɔ jam wɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ nanɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa inɛnɛ uja kupʰila akaji z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤akʰɛ az̤ɛnz̤ilɛjɔ az̤iji kukʰund͡ʒ̤ulɛlwa kujɛ nɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓakʰɛ aɓɛnz̤ilɛjɔ uja kupʰila kumnand̤i kanɛnɛ kɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ɔkumnand̤i asikukɔ ukutʰi aɓujɛ ɛz̤inɮɛlɛni z̤akʰɛ apʰilɛ kʰɔna ɛkuɓujɛni kwɛlunɡ̤isa ɛɓulunɡ̤isɛni ɓalɔ lɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔkwamasikiz̤i awɛnz̤ilɛjɔ ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ lɔpʰila lɔna jɔnkɛ imisɛɓɛnz̤i jalɔ jɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɛlajɛnz̤ajɔ ajiji kukʰund͡ʒ̤ulwa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ ɓalɔ ɛlimɛnɛz̤ɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤alɔ ɛlɔnɛ nɡ̤az̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ lija ukanti nitʰi kɛ inɮɛla jɛnkɔsi ajilunɡ̤ɛlɛlɛnɛ kʰaniv̤ɛ nɮu kasirajɛli inɮɛla jam ajilunɡ̤ɛlɛlɛnɛ jini asiz̤ɛz̤ɛnu iinɮɛla ɛz̤inɡ̤alunɡ̤ɛlɛlɛnɛjɔ kǁa litʰɛ ilunɡ̤isa laɓuja ɛɓulunɡ̤isɛni ɓalɔ lɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa lɔfa nɡ̤ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ lɔfa nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa ɓalɔ ɛliɓɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kǁa atʰɛ ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ waɓuja kɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kwakʰɛ akwɛnz̤ilɛjɔ wɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ nanɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa jɛna uja kuwusind̤isa umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ ɛkuɓɛni ɛɓɔnilɛ waɓuja ɛz̤ik͡xɛkǃwɛni z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ az̤ɛnz̤ilɛjɔ uja kupʰila akaji ukanti itʰi kɛ inɮu kasirajɛli inɮɛla jɛnkɔsi ajilunɡ̤ɛlɛlɛnɛ iinɮɛla z̤am az̤ilunɡ̤ɛlɛlɛnɛ nɮu kasirajɛli asiz̤ɛz̤ɛnu iinɮɛla ɛz̤inɡ̤alunɡ̤ɛlɛlɛnɛjɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ nd̤ija kuniɡ̤wɛɓa ɛlɔwɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnɮɛla jakʰɛ nɮu kasirajɛli it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ɓujani niz̤iɓujisɛ ɛz̤ik͡xɛkǃwɛni z̤ɛnu z̤ɔnkɛ ɓunɡ̤aɓi sisikʰuɓɛkisɔ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa laɬani z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤ɛnu ɛnik͡xɛkǃɛ nɡ̤az̤ɔ niz̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ intliz̤ijɔ ɛnt͡ʃa nɔmɔja ɔmt͡ʃa jini ukuɓa nifɛ nɮu kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akumnand̤i kɔfajɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a z̤iɓujisɛni kɛ nipʰilɛ wɛna kɛ jɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili nɡ̤ɛz̤ikʰulu z̤akwasirajɛli utʰi ujintɔni uɲɔkɔ inɡ̤ɔɲamakaz̤i ɛɓutʰumɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛɛnɡ̤ɔɲamakaz̤i ɛwɔnɮɛla amatʰɔlɛ ajɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ɛz̤int͡ʃa jakʰulisa ɛliɲɛ ɛmatʰɔlɛni ajɔ laɓa jinɡ̤ɔɲama ɛnt͡ʃa lafund̤a ukukǃwɛnɡ̤a iiɲamakaz̤i laɮa aɓantu iintlanɡ̤a z̤aɬaɓa umkʰɔsi nɡ̤alɔ laɓand͡ʒ̤iswa ɛm̤ad̤ini waz̤ɔ z̤alisa ɛz̤wɛni lamajiputa lifakwɛ amakʰɔŋ̰ǀ̰ɔ jakuɓɔna inɡ̤ɔɲamakaz̤i ukuɓa alipʰumɛlɛli lid̤akilɛ itʰɛmɓa lajɔ jatʰaɓatʰa ɛliɲɛ ɛmatʰɔlɛni ajɔ jalɛnz̤a inɡ̤ɔɲama ɛnt͡ʃa lahamɓahamɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛɛnɡ̤ɔɲamakaz̤i laɓa jinɡ̤ɔɲama ɛnt͡ʃa lafund̤a ukukǃwɛnɡ̤a iiɲamakaz̤i laɓaɮa aɓantu laɓaz̤i aɓaɬɔlɔkaz̤i ɓaɓɔ lajɛnz̤a amaŋǁuwa imiz̤i jaɓɔ kwaɓa sɛnkanɡ̤ala kwiliz̤wɛ nakwinz̤alisɛkɔ jalɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤wi lɔkub̤axula kwalɔ iintlanɡ̤a z̤aɓa nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛmaz̤wɛni z̤amisa kulɔ z̤awutwaɓulula pʰɛz̤u kwalɔ umnatʰa waz̤ɔ laɓand͡ʒ̤iswa ɛm̤ad̤ini waz̤ɔ z̤alifaka ɛnɮwanɛni linamakʰɔŋ̰ǀ̰ɔ z̤alisa wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli z̤alisa ɛz̤imɓɔnisɛlwɛni ukuz̤ɛ iliz̤wi lalɔ linɡ̤aɓi sav̤akala ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwasirajɛli uɲɔkɔ uɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmd̤ilija ɔtʲɛlwɛ nɡ̤asɛmanz̤ini ɛkupʰumlɛni kwakʰɔ wakǃʰama wanamasɛɓɛ amaninz̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamanz̤i amaninz̤i waɓa namasɛɓɛ akǃinilɛjɔ ɔkuɓa z̤iintɔnɡ̤a z̤aɓalawuli uɓud̤ɛ ɓawɔ ɓapʰakama ɓapʰɛz̤ulu pʰakatʰi kwɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤imɓa z̤amafu waɓɔnakala ɛkupʰakamɛni kwawɔ nɡ̤ɔɓuninz̤i ɓamasɛɓɛ awɔ waɲɔtʰulwa kɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuʃuʃu wakʰaɬɛlwa ɛm̤laɓɛni ulɔpʰu lwasɛmpumalanɡ̤a lwaz̤ɔmisa iz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤awɔ akǁʰuz̤ulwa ɔma amasɛɓɛ awɔ akǃinilɛjɔ at͡ʃa nɡ̤umlilɔ nɡ̤ɔku kɛ utʲɛlwɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛz̤wɛni ɛlinɡ̤umkǃwɛɓɛd̤u ɛlɔmilɛjɔ kupʰumɛ kɛ umlilɔ ɛmaɬamv̤ini amasɛɓɛ awɔ waz̤it͡ʃisa iz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤awɔ akwaɓakʰɔ sɛɓɛ likǃinilɛjɔ kuwɔ lɔkuɓa jintɔnɡ̤a jɔkulawula sisid͡ʒ̤wili kɛ sajɛ sija kuɓa sisid͡ʒ̤wili kɛ kalɔku kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsiɬanu nɡ̤ɔlwɛʃumi ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ amad̤ɔd̤a ɛv̤ɛla kumad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwasirajɛli ukuɓa aɓuz̤isɛ kujɛhɔv̤a aɬala pʰant͡si pʰamɓi kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu tʰɛtʰa namad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu akwasirajɛli utʰi kuwɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi niz̤ɛ kuɓuz̤isa nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ unakaɲɛ ukuɓa nd̤iɓuz̤wɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a uz̤a kuɓaɡ̤wɛɓa uz̤a kuɡ̤wɛɓa ɲana wɔmntu ɓaz̤isɛ kɛ amasikiz̤i ɔɔjisɛ jitʰi kuɓɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛmini ɛnd̤amɲulajɔ usirajɛli ɛnd̤ajipʰakamisɛlajɔ isanɮa imɓɛwu jɛnɮu kajakɔɓi ɛnd̤az̤az̤isajɔ kuɓɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa ɛnd̤aɓapʰa kamisɛla isanɮa nd̤isitʰi nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nɡ̤alɔɔ kaɲɛ nd̤aɓapʰakamisɛla isanɮa ukuz̤ɛ nd̤iɓakʰupʰɛ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nd̤iɓasɛ ɛz̤wɛni ɛnd̤aɓaɬɔlɛlajɔ lɔna ɛliɓalɛka nɔɓusi liliɡ̤uɡ̤u kunamaz̤wɛ ɔnkɛ nd̤atʰi kuɓɔ laɬani ɛlɔwɔ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inɛz̤ɔtʰɛ z̤amɛɬɔ akʰɛ ninɡ̤az̤ɛnz̤i iiŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤asɛjiputa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu ɓasuka ɓaɓa nɛɛnkani aɓav̤uma ukund̤ipʰulapʰula aɓaz̤ilaɬa ɛlɔwɔ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inɛz̤ɔtʰɛ z̤amɛɬɔ akʰɛ aɓaz̤iʃija iz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤asɛjiputa nd̤atʰi kɛ nd̤ija kutʰulula uɓuʃuʃu ɓam pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ nd̤iwupʰɛlɛlisɛlɛ kuɓɔ umsind̤ɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa kɔkɔ nd̤ɛnz̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤ama ukuz̤ɛ linɡ̤aɬand͡ʒ̤ɛlwa ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛɛntlanɡ̤a aɓaɓɛpʰakatʰi kwaz̤ɔ ɛnd̤az̤az̤isa kuɓɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni az̤ɔ ɛkuɓakʰupʰɛni ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nd̤aɓakʰupʰa kɛ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nd̤aɓasa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nd̤aɓanika imimisɛlɔ jam nd̤aɓaz̤isa namasikɔ awɔtʰi ɛwɛnz̤ilɛ apʰilɛ nɡ̤awɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤aɓanika iisaɓatʰa z̤am ukuɓa z̤iɓɛ nɡ̤umkǃɔnd̤isɔ pʰakatʰi naɓɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓaz̤i ukuɓa jɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija ɓaŋ̤ǀ̤walisa inɮu kasirajɛli jɛsuka jaɓa nɛɛnkani ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ aɓahamɓa nɡ̤ɛmimisɛlɔ jam ɓawakǀɛkisa amasikɔ awɔtʰi ɛwɛnz̤ilɛ apʰilɛ nɡ̤awɔ ɓaz̤iɬamɓɛla kakʰulu iisaɓatʰa z̤am nd̤atʰi kɛ nd̤ija kutʰulula uɓuʃuʃu ɓam pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤iɓaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛ kɔkɔ nd̤ɛnz̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤ama ukuz̤ɛ linɡ̤aɬand͡ʒ̤ɛlwa ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛnd̤aɓakʰupʰajɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni az̤ɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤aɓapʰakamisɛla isanɮa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤aɓasi ɛz̤wɛni ɛnd̤and̤iɓanikilɛ ɛliɓalɛka nɔɓusi liliɡ̤uɡ̤u kunamaz̤wɛ ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa ɓawakǀɛkisajɔ amasikɔ aɓahamɓa nɡ̤ɛmimisɛlɔ jam ɓaz̤iɬamɓɛla iisaɓatʰa z̤am nɡ̤ɔkuɓa intliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ jaz̤iland̤ɛla iz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ kɔkɔ laɓa nɛŋǀɛɓa ilisɔ kuɓɔ ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤aɓat͡ʃaɓalalisi nd̤inɡ̤aɓaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛli ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nd̤atʰi kɛ kɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ musani ukuhamɓa nɡ̤ɛmimisɛlɔ jɔɔjiɬɔ ninɡ̤awaɡ̤ǀ̤ini amasikɔ aɓɔ ninɡ̤az̤ɛnz̤i iiŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ mna jɛhɔv̤a nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɛnu hamɓani nɡ̤ɛmimisɛlɔ jam niwaɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ amasikɔ niwɛnz̤ɛ niz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛ iisaɓatʰa z̤am z̤iɓɛ nɡ̤umkǃɔnd̤isɔ pʰakatʰi ukuz̤ɛ naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu ɓasuka ɔɔɲana ɓaɓa nɛɛnkani aɓahamɓa nɡ̤ɛmimisɛlɔ jam aɓawaɡ̤ǀ̤ina amasikɔ ukuɓa ɓawɛnz̤ɛ awɔtʰi ɛwɛnz̤ilɛ apʰilɛ nɡ̤awɔ ɓaz̤iɬamɓɛla iisaɓatʰa z̤am nd̤atʰi kɛ nd̤ija kutʰulula uɓuʃuʃu ɓam pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ nd̤ipʰɛlɛlisɛlɛ umsind̤ɔ kuɓɔ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ kɔkɔ nd̤asiɓujisajɔ isanɮa nd̤ɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤ama ukuɓa linɡ̤aɬand͡ʒ̤ɛlwa ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛnd̤aɓakʰupʰajɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni az̤ɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤aɓapʰakamisɛla isanɮa ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ukuɓa nd̤iɓakǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰɛ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni nd̤iɓapʰanɡ̤alalisɛlɛ ɛmaz̤wɛni nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɓɛnɡ̤awɛnz̤anɡ̤a amasikɔ ɓajikǀɛkisajɔ imimisɛlɔ jam ɓaz̤iɬamɓɛla iisaɓatʰa z̤am amɛɬɔ aɓɔ aland̤ɛla iz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤ɔɔjisɛ nam nd̤aɓamisɛla imimisɛlɔ ɛnɡ̤aɓalunɡ̤ɛlɛjɔ namasikɔ aɓanɡ̤ɛnakupʰila nɡ̤awɔ nd̤aɓɛnz̤a iiŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɛz̤ipʰɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛkukǀand̤isɛni kwaɓɔ ɛmlilwɛni jɔnkɛ intɔ ɛv̤ula isiz̤alɔ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤iɓapʰanz̤isɛ ukuz̤ɛ ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ tʰɛtʰa kwinɮu kasirajɛli ɲana wɔmntu utʰi kuɓɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɔɔjiɬɔ ɓaɓujɛ ɓand̤iɲɛlisa nanɡ̤alɛ ntɔ ɛkumɛnɛz̤ɛni kwaɓɔ aɓaɓɛmɛnɛz̤a nɡ̤akɔ kuɓa kǁɛnikwɛni nd̤aɓasajɔ ɛz̤wɛni ɛnd̤asipʰakamisɛlajɔ isanɮa sɔkuɓa nd̤iɓanikɛ lɔna ɓasuka ɓakʰanɡ̤ɛla z̤ɔnkɛ iind̤uli ɛz̤ind̤ɛ nɛmitʰi jɔnkɛ ɛtʰɛ ʃiɲi ɓajiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla kʰɔna imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jaɓɔ ɓanikɛla kʰɔna imisɔnd̤ɛz̤ɔ jaɓɔ ɛkǃumɓisajɔ ɓaɓɛka kʰɔna iv̤umɓa lamad̤ini aɓɔ ɛlitʰɔz̤amisajɔ ɓatʰululɛla kʰɔna iminikɛlɔ jaɓɔ ɛtʰululwajɔ nd̤atʰi kɛ kuɓɔ ɛsi siɡ̤anɡ̤a nija kusɔ sijintɔni iɡ̤ama lasɔ kɛ kutʰiwa sisiɡ̤anɡ̤a unanam̤la nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jitʰi kwinɮu kasirajɛli it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi niz̤ɛnz̤ɛ iiŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɔɔjiɬɔ nihɛɲuz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuland̤ɛla iz̤intɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤inɛz̤ɔtʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ niz̤ɛnz̤ɛ iiŋǃamɓi ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤wɛni z̤ɛnu nɡ̤ɔkunikɛla iz̤ipʰɔ z̤ɛnu nanɡ̤ɔkuɓa kǀand̤isa ɛmlilwɛni ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu nanam̤land͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤inɡ̤aɓuz̤wa nɮu kasirajɛli nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a and̤iji kuɓuz̤wa nakaɲɛ lɔɔ ntɔ itʰɛ kǃatʰa ɛmɔjɛni wɛnu ajiji kuɓakʰɔ nɔkuɓakʰɔ lɛjɔ nitʰi sija kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛntlanɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmiz̤alwanɛ jamaz̤wɛ silunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ kwimitʰi namatʲɛ nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ iɲanisɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛsanɮa ɛsitʰɛ ŋ̰ǃ̰i nanɡ̤ɛnɡ̤alɔ ɛjɔlukilɛjɔ nanɡ̤ɔɓuʃuʃu ɔɓutʰululwajɔ nd̤ija kuɓa nɡ̤ukumkani pʰɛz̤u kwɛnu nd̤ɔnikʰupʰa ɛz̤iz̤wɛni nd̤iniɓutʰɛ ɛmaz̤wɛni ɛnapʰanɡ̤alaliswa kuwɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa ɛsitʰɛ ŋ̰ǃ̰i nanɡ̤ɛnɡ̤alɔ ɛjɔlukilɛjɔ nanɡ̤ɔɓuʃuʃu ɔɓutʰululwajɔ nd̤ija kwintlanɡ̤ɔ jɛz̤iz̤wɛ nd̤imanɡ̤alɛlanɛ sikʰanɡ̤ɛlanɛ ɛɓuswɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤amanɡ̤alɛlana nɔɔjiɬɔ kwintlanɡ̤ɔ jɛliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa nd̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukumanɡ̤alɛlana it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ɔnipʰumɛlisa pʰant͡si kwɛntɔnɡ̤a nd̤iniɓɔpʰɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ nd̤iɓakʰɛtʰɛ aɓaɡ̤wilikajɔ naɓak͡xɛkǃajɔ nd̤ija kuɓakʰupʰa ɛz̤wɛni lɔkupʰamɓukɛla kwaɓɔ kɛ akuji kunɡ̤ɛna namɲɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni wakwasirajɛli ukuz̤ɛ naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nina kɛ nɮu kasirajɛli hamɓani nikʰɔnz̤ɛ ɛlɔwɔ isiɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ sakʰɛ kɔd̤wa ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ iɲanisɔ nija kund̤ipʰulapʰula ninɡ̤aɓi saliɬamɓɛla iɡ̤ama ɛliŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤ipʰɔ z̤ɛnu nanɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤ɛnu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɛntaɓɛni jam ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛntaɓɛni ɛnd̤ɛ jakwasirajɛli kʰɔna apʰɔ ija kund̤ikʰɔnz̤a jɔnkɛ inɮu jakwasirajɛli jɔnkɛ ipʰɛla ɛz̤wɛni kʰɔna apʰɔ ɓaja kuɓa likʰɔlɔ kʰɔna apʰɔ nd̤ija kuɓiz̤a imixumɔ jɛnu nɛɛntlaɬɛla jɛz̤ipʰɔ z̤ɛnu ɛntwɛni jɛnu jɔnkɛ ɛnijiŋ̤ǀ̤walisajɔ nija kuɓa likʰɔlɔ ninɛv̤umɓa ɛlitʰɔz̤amisajɔ ɛkunikʰupʰɛni ɛz̤iz̤wɛni nd̤iniɓutʰɛ ɛmaz̤wɛni ɛnapʰanɡ̤alaliswa kuwɔ nd̤iz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛlɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛɛntlanɡ̤a naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɛkunisɛni ɛm̤laɓɛni wakwasirajɛli ɛz̤wɛni ɛnd̤asipʰakamisɛla isanɮa sɔkuɓa nd̤ilinikɛ ɔɔjiɬɔ nija kuz̤ikʰumɓula kʰɔna iinɮɛla z̤ɛnu nɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤ɛnu z̤ɔnkɛ ɛnaz̤ɛnz̤a iiŋǃamɓi nɡ̤az̤ɔ niz̤ik͡xukǃukɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤imɓi ɛniz̤ɛnz̤ilɛjɔ naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɛkunipʰatʰɛni nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤ama kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔna nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛnɮɛla z̤ɛnu ɛz̤imɓi nanɡ̤ɔkwɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤ɛnu ɛz̤iɓɔlilɛjɔ nɮu kasirajɛli it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu b̤ɛkisa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ kwɛlasɛz̤ant͡si uwisɛ intɛtʰɔ usinɡ̤isɛ ɛz̤ant͡si uprɔfɛtɛ nɡ̤ɛɬatʰi lɛliz̤wɛ lasɛz̤ant͡si utʰi kwiɬatʰi lɛliz̤wɛ lasɛz̤ant͡si liv̤ɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ifaka umlilɔ kuwɛ ut͡ʃisɛ kuwɛ wɔnkɛ umtʰi ɔmanz̤i nawɔ wɔnkɛ umtʰi ɔwɔmilɛjɔ akuji kukǀima d̤anɡ̤atʲɛ lamad̤anɡ̤atʲɛ ɓɔxawuka uɓusɔ ɓaɓantu ɓɔnkɛ kutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛz̤ant͡si kusɛ ɛntla jɔɓɔna jɔnkɛ iɲama ukuɓa jɛhɔv̤a nd̤iwuɓasilɛ awuji kukǀiɲwa nd̤atʰi awu nkɔsi jɛhɔv̤a ɓatʰi nɡ̤am lɔ akɛnz̤i nɡ̤ɛmiz̤ɛkɛlisɔ kɔd̤wa kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu b̤ɛkisa uɓusɔ kwijɛrusalɛm uwisɛ intɛtʰɔ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni uprɔfɛtɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤laɓa wakwasirajɛli jitʰi kum̤laɓa wakwasirajɛli ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ikukǀʰasilɛ nd̤ixɔla ik͡xɛlɛ ɛsiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔtʲɛni salɔ nd̤iŋǃumlɛ kuwɛ ilunɡ̤isa nɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa kɛ ɛnɔkuɓa nd̤ija kuŋǃumla kuwɛ ilunɡ̤isa nɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ lija kupʰuma ik͡xɛlɛ ɛsiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔtʲɛni salɔ lijɛ ɛɲamɛni jɔnkɛ litʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛz̤ant͡si lisɛ ɛntla jaz̤i jɔnkɛ iɲama ukuɓa jɛhɔv̤a nd̤ilixɔlilɛ ik͡xɛlɛ ɛsiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔtʲɛni salɔ alisaji kuɓa saɓuja liɓujɛ wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu ŋǀwina ukǃʰɛkɛkɛ amaŋǃɛ uŋǀwinɛ nanɡ̤ɔɓuk͡xak͡xa ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ kɔtʰi kǁa ɓatʰɛ kuwɛ uŋǀwinɛlani utʰi kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɛnd̤aɓa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa z̤isiz̤a kuja kuɲiɓilika z̤ɔnkɛ iintliz̤ijɔ z̤iwɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤anɮa iŋǀamɛ jɔnkɛ imimɔja amad̤ɔlɔ ɔnkɛ anɡ̤aɓi namanɮa jaɓɔna z̤ijɛz̤a z̤ija kuɓakʰɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu prɔfɛta utʰi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ik͡xɛlɛ ik͡xɛlɛ lilɔliwɛ likʰaz̤imlisiwɛ nɔkukʰaz̤imliswa lilɔliwɛ ukuz̤ɛ likǁʰɛlɛ liɓulalɛ likʰaz̤imlisiwɛ ukuz̤ɛ limɛɲɛz̤ɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɓanɛ nɡ̤ɛsiɓa nɛmiɬali sitʰi intɔnɡ̤a jɔɲana lɛ ikǀɛkisa imitʰi jɔnkɛ linikɛlwɛ ukuɓa likʰaz̤imliswɛ lipʰatʰwɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa lilɔliwɛ ik͡xɛlɛ ɛlɔ likʰaz̤imlisiwɛ ɛlɔ ukuɓa linikɛlwɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɔmɓulali kʰala ub̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤ɛ ɲana wɔmntu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa litʰɛnɛ mɓɛnd̤ɛ naɓantu ɓam litʰɛnɛ mɓɛnd̤ɛ nɛz̤ikʰulu z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwasirajɛli z̤iz̤isulu z̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ kuɲɛ naɓantu ɓam nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ tʲwak͡xaz̤a ɛtʰanɡ̤ɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sɛkukǀikid̤iwɛ kɔtʰini ukuɓa nɛntɔnɡ̤a ɛkǀɛkisajɔ akuji kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu prɔfɛta utʲwak͡xaz̤ɛ iz̤anɮa lipʰind̤wɛ ɔkwɛsitʰatʰu ik͡xɛlɛ ik͡xɛlɛ laɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ lik͡xɛlɛ lɔɓulɛwɛjɔ lalɔwɔ mkʰulu ɛliɓarawulajɔ ukuz̤ɛ intliz̤ijɔ itʰɛ amanɮa z̤and̤ɛ iz̤ikʰuɓɛkisɔ nd̤iwamisɛlɛ amasanɡ̤ɔ aɓɔ ɔnkɛ ik͡xɛlɛ ɛlid͡ʒ̤ikad͡ʒ̤ikajɔ awu lɛnz̤ɛlwɛ ukuɓa liɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɓanɛ litʰiwɛ xutʰu ukuɓa liɓulalɛ tʲɛkɛla nɡ̤asɛkunɛnɛ ɡ̤ukǃukɛla ɛkʰɔɬɔ apʰɔ lub̤ɛkisa kʰɔna uɬanɡ̤ɔtʰi lwakʰɔ nam nd̤ija kuz̤itʲwak͡xaz̤a iz̤anɮa z̤am nd̤iɓupʰɔlisɛ uɓuʃuʃu ɓam jɛhɔv̤a nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu z̤imisɛlɛ iinɮɛla ɛz̤imɓini ukuz̤ɛ liz̤ɛnɡ̤az̤ɔ ik͡xɛlɛ lɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli maz̤ipʰumɛ z̤wɛniɲɛ z̤ɔmɓini uk͡xɔlɛ umalatʰisɔ uwuk͡xɔlɛ ɛmantlɔkɔ ɛnɮɛla jɔmz̤i misa inɮɛla ukuz̤ɛ ik͡xɛlɛ lifikɛ ɛrab̤a jɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn nakwɛlakwajud̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ kuɓa wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli umisɛ ɛkwaɬukanɛni kwɛɛnɮɛla ɛmantlɔkɔ ɛɛnɮɛla z̤ɔmɓini ukuz̤ɛ aɬaɓɛ isiɬaɓɔ uɬukuɬa iintɔlɔ uɓuz̤a kwimilɔnd̤ɛkʰaja ukʰanɡ̤ɛla ɛsiɓind̤ini ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ sɔkunɛnɛ isiɬaɓɔ siɬaɓɛ ijɛrusalɛm ukuz̤ɛ kumiswɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ɔkutʰʲɔmfa uɬatʲwɛ umkʰɔsi wɔkuɓulala kupʰakaɲiswɛ iz̤wi lɔkud̤uma kumiswɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ɔkutʰʲɔmfa ɛmasanɡ̤wɛni kufund͡ʒ̤wɛ ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lɔkuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a kwakʰiwɛ iiŋǃaɓa z̤ɔkuɓɔnisɛla sɔɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsiɬaɓɔ ɛsikʰɔɬakɛlɛjɔ kuɓɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ ɓafunɡ̤ɛlwɛ iz̤ifunɡ̤ɔ ɓɔna kɛ jɛna wɔkʰumɓuz̤a uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ukuz̤ɛ ɓakǁʰakamfulwɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkukʰumɓuz̤a kwɛnu uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛnu ɛkutʰʲilɛkɛni kwɛz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤ɛnu ukuz̤ɛ z̤iɓɔnakalɛ iz̤ɔnɔ z̤ɛnu ɛz̤intlɔnd̤ini z̤ɛnu z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkukʰund͡ʒ̤ulwa kwɛnu nija kukǁʰakamfulwa nɡ̤ɛsanɮa wɛna kɛ mɓulawa unɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ sikʰulu sakwasirajɛli jakʰɔ ifikilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɔkupʰɛla it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi luja unkɔnt͡ʃɔ sitʰulwɛ nɛsit͡sʰaɓa ɔkɔ kɔkɔ nam̤la kunam̤la ɔkutʰɔɓɛkilɛjɔ kuja kupʰakaɲiswa ɔkupʰakamilɛjɔ kuja kutʰɔtʲwa nd̤ija kukupʰɛnula nd̤ikupʰɛnulɛ nd̤ikupʰɛnulɛ kwanakɔ ɔkɔ akuji kuɓa kukɔ kɔd̤a kufikɛ lɔwɔ kukɔkwakʰɛ ukuɡ̤wɛɓa nd̤ikunikɛ jɛna wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu prɔfɛta utʰi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ lwaɓɔ ukutʰi ik͡xɛlɛ ik͡xɛlɛ lixɔlɛlwɛ ukuɓa liɓulalɛ likʰaz̤imlisiwɛ ukuɓa liɮɛ ukuɓa liɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɓanɛ ɓɛkuɓɔnɛla inkɔɬakalɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɓɛkuɬaɓɛla amanɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛ lija kukuɓɛka kɛ ɛz̤intaɲɛni z̤aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ aɓamini ija nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɔkupʰɛla liɓujisɛlɛ ɛsiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔtʲɛni salɔ ɛnd̤awɛni ɔd̤alɛlwɛ kujɔ ɛz̤wɛni lɛmv̤ɛlɔ jakʰɔ nd̤ija kukuɡ̤wɛɓa nd̤ija kutʰulula pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ ub̤av̤umɔ nd̤ija kukuɓasɛla nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ wɔkupʰupʰuma kɔmsind̤ɔ nd̤ikunikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni samad̤ɔd̤a az̤iz̤itʰʲakala iiŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi ɛz̤ɔnakalisajɔ uja kuɓa kukuɮa kɔmlilɔ iɡ̤az̤i lakʰɔ lija kuɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛliz̤wɛ akuji kukʰund͡ʒ̤ulwa kuɓa jɛhɔv̤a nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu uz̤a kuwuɡ̤wɛɓa uz̤a kuwuɡ̤wɛɓa umz̤i wamaɡ̤az̤i waz̤isɛ kɛ ɔnkɛ amasikiz̤i awɔ uz̤ɛ utʰi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi mz̤ind̤ini upʰalaz̤a iɡ̤az̤i ɛsaz̤ulwini sawɔ ukuz̤ɛ lifikɛ ikǁɛʃa lawɔ wɛnz̤ɛ iz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ kuwɔ ukuz̤ɛ uɓɛ jiŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɛɡ̤az̤i lakʰɔ ɔlitʰululɛjɔ uz̤ɛkɛ itʲala nanɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤akʰɔ ɔz̤ɛnz̤ilɛjɔ uz̤ɛnz̤ɛ iŋǃamɓi waz̤isɔnd̤ɛz̤a z̤akʰɔ ɛmiɲakɛni jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nd̤ikwɛnz̤a intɔ jɛŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni nɛntɔ jɔkukǀukukǀɛz̤wa kuwɔ ɔnkɛ amaz̤wɛ aɓakufupʰi naɓakud̤ɛ kuwɛ ɓaja kukukǀukukǀɛz̤a unɛɡ̤ama lɔɓuŋǃamɓi unɛsakǃunɡ̤ɛ ɛsikʰulu jaɓɔna iz̤ikʰulu z̤akwasirajɛli sasɛsɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnɡ̤alɔ jasɔ z̤iɓɛ z̤ikuwɛ ukuz̤ɛ z̤ipʰalaz̤ɛ iɡ̤az̤i ujisɛ nɔnina ɓaɓakǀukukǀɛz̤ɛla kuwɛ ɔwasɛmz̤ini ɓamkǀud̤isɛla ɛsaz̤ulwini sakʰɔ iinkɛd̤ama naɓaɬɔlɔkaz̤i ɓaɓakǁinz̤ɛlɛla pʰant͡si kuwɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤am uz̤id̤ɛlilɛ nɛɛsaɓatʰa z̤am uz̤iɬamɓɛlɛ amad̤ɔd̤a anɛntlɛɓɛnd̤wanɛ aɓɛkuwɛ ukuz̤ɛ apʰalaz̤ɛ iɡ̤az̤i aɮɛla ɛz̤intaɓɛni kuwɛ ɛnz̤a amaɲala ɛsaz̤ulwini sakʰɔ uɓuz̤ɛ ɓɔɔjisɛ ɓutʰʲilɛlwɛ kuwɛ ɔjiŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɔmz̤i ɓamɮwɛnɡ̤ulɛla kuwɛ ɔmɲɛ wɛnz̤a amasikiz̤i nɔmfaz̤i wɔmmɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ ɔmɲɛ umɛnz̤a iŋǃamɓi umɔlɔkaz̤ana wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wixa ɔmɲɛ uɮwɛnɡ̤ula ud̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ intɔmɓi kajisɛ kuwɛ ɓamkɛla iz̤ikǀɛnɡ̤ɔ ɓɛkuwɛ ukuz̤ɛ ɓapʰalaz̤ɛ iɡ̤az̤i wɛna uɮɛ aɓantu nɡ̤ɛmali watʰaɓatʰa inz̤ala jɛmɓɔlɛkɔ ujamɮa ummɛlwanɛ wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkukǀud̤isa und̤iliɓɛlɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a jaɓɔna nd̤itʲwak͡xaz̤a iz̤anɮa z̤am nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnz̤uz̤ɔ jakʰɔ ɛmɓi ɔjiz̤uz̤ilɛjɔ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamaɡ̤az̤i akʰɔ asɛsaz̤ulwini sakʰɔ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ ija iz̤anɮa z̤akʰɔ z̤ija kutʰi ŋ̰ǃ̰i nɡ̤ɛmiɬa ɛnd̤ija kukupʰatʰa nɡ̤ajɔ mna jɛhɔv̤a nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ nd̤ija kwɛnz̤a kɛ nd̤ija kukupʰanɡ̤alalisɛla ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni nd̤ikukǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰɛ ɛmaz̤wɛni nd̤iɓuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛ uɓuŋǃamɓi ɓakʰɔ kuwɛ wɔz̤iɬamɓɛla ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛɛntlanɡ̤a waz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu inɮu kasirajɛli isukɛ jaɓa liɡ̤wɛɓu lɛnt͡simɓi ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓaɓa lub̤ɛd̤u nɛb̤ɛkilɛ nɛsiɲitʰi nɛlɔtʰɛ pʰakatʰi ɛz̤ikɔ ɓaɓa liɡ̤wɛɓu lɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa naɓa liɡ̤wɛɓu lɛnt͡simɓi nɔnkɛ nipʰɛla nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jaɓɔnani nd̤ija kuniɓutʰa ɛsaz̤ulwini sɛjɛrusalɛm nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɬanɡ̤anisɛlwa kwɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɔb̤ɛd̤u nɛsiɲitʰi nɛlɔtʰɛ nɛb̤ɛkilɛ pʰakatʰi ɛz̤ikɔ ukuɓa umlilɔ uz̤ifutʰɛ ukuz̤ɛ z̤iɲiɓilikɛ nd̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuniɓutʰa nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ nanɡ̤ɔɓuʃuʃu ɓam nd̤inifakɛ nd̤iniɲiɓilikisɛ nd̤ɔnifumɓa nd̤ifutʰɛ umlilɔ wɔkupʰupʰuma kɔmsind̤ɔ niɲiɓilikɛ pʰakatʰi kwawɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa isiliv̤ɛrɛ iɲiɓilikiswa pʰakatʰi ɛz̤ikɔ nija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuɲiɓilikiswa pʰakatʰi kwajɔ naz̤i ukuɓa jɛhɔv̤a nd̤iɓutʰululɛ uɓuʃuʃu ɓam pʰɛz̤u kwɛnu kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu jitʰi kulɔ uliliz̤wɛ ɛliz̤ulu linɡ̤asijɔ ɛlinɡ̤anɛlwajɔ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɔb̤av̤umɔ lukǀɛɓɔ lwaɓaprɔfɛti ɓalɔ ɛsaz̤ulwini salɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ɛb̤axulajɔ ɛkǃwɛnɡ̤a iɲamakaz̤i ɓaɮa imipʰɛfumlɔ ɓaɬutʰa intɔ ɛkǃwɛtʲiwɛjɔ nɛŋǃaɓilɛjɔ ɓand̤isa aɓaɬɔlɔkaz̤i ɓalɔ ɛsaz̤ulwini salɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓalɔ ɓajawuɡ̤ɔɲamɛla umjalɛlɔ ɓaz̤iɬamɓɛlɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤am aɓakǀaluli pʰakatʰi kɔkuŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɔkuɬamɓɛlajɔ aɓaɓɔnisi maɬukɔ kɔkujiŋǃamɓi nɔkuɬamɓulukilɛjɔ ɓajawafiɬa amɛlulɔ aɓɔ kwiisaɓatʰa z̤am nd̤iɬand͡ʒ̤ɛlwɛ ɛsaz̤ulwini saɓɔ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓalɔ ɛsaz̤ulwini salɔ ɓand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤uka ɛz̤ikǃwɛnɡ̤a ikǁʰɔɓa ukuɓa ɓapʰalaz̤ɛ iɡ̤az̤i ɓat͡ʃaɓalalisɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓaz̤uz̤ɛ inz̤uz̤ɔ ɛmɓi aɓaprɔfɛti ɓaɓatʲaɓɛka nɡ̤ɔd̤aka ɔlulɛpʰukajɔ ɓɛɓɔna imiɓɔnɔ jɛnkɔɬakalɔ ɓɛɓaɬaɓɛla iz̤iɬaɓɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤amanɡ̤a ɓɛsitʰi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a akatʰɛtʰanɡ̤a aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ ɓajakǀud̤isa ɓajapʰanɡ̤a ɓakǁinz̤ɛlɛla pʰant͡si usiz̤ana nɛɬwɛmpu ɓakǀud̤isɛ ɔwasɛmz̤ini nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤ɛsɛsikwɛni nd̤afuna kuɓɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤aɓa lutʰanɡ̤ɔ pʰakatʰi imɛ ɛtʰutʲɛni pʰamɓi ikʰusɛlɛ iliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ ukuz̤ɛ nd̤inɡ̤alit͡ʃaɓalalisi kɛ and̤ijifumani nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ nd̤itʰulula ub̤av̤umɔ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ nd̤iɓaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ wɔkupʰupʰuma kɔmsind̤ɔ nd̤iɓanikɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnɮɛla jaɓɔ ɛntlɔkwɛni jaɓɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu kwakukʰɔ aɓafaz̤i aɓaɓini iintɔmɓi z̤amfaz̤i mɲɛ ɓahɛɲuz̤a ɛjiputa ɓahɛɲuz̤a ɓɛsɛɓaŋǀinanɛ akǀɔfɛlwa kʰɔna amaɓɛlɛ aɓɔ z̤apʰatʰwa kʰɔna iinɡ̤ɔnɔ z̤amaɓɛlɛ z̤ɔɓuntɔmɓi ɓaɓɔ amaɡ̤ama aɓɔ kɛ nɡ̤untɛntɛjakʰɛ ɔmkʰulu kuɓɔ nɔntɛntɛjamkujɛ umsakwaɓɔ ɓaɓa nɡ̤aɓam ɓaz̤ala ɔɔɲana nɛɛntɔmɓi amaɡ̤ama aɓɔ nɡ̤usamari untɛntɛjakʰɛ jijɛrusalɛm untɛntɛjamkujɛ untɛntɛjakʰɛ wahɛɲuz̤a ɛnɡ̤umkam wat͡ʃiswa kukukʰanuka iz̤itʰand̤anɛ z̤akʰɛ amaasirija umɛlwanɛ lwakʰɛ aɓav̤ɛtʰɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤imsi amaɓamɓa nɛɛxulunɛli amad̤ɔd̤ana aluluɬɛ ɔnkɛ ɛpʰɛla aɓamahaʃɛ ɓɛkʰwɛlɛ ɛmahaʃɛni wakub̤ɛkisɛla kuɓɔ ukuhɛɲuz̤a kwakʰɛ kɔɔɲana ɓasɛasirija aɓaluluɬɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla watʰi aɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛt͡ʃisɛka kukuɓakʰanuka waz̤ɛnz̤a iŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ akakujɛka nɔkuhɛɲuz̤a kwakʰɛ kwasɛjiputa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓuŋǀinanɛni ɓakʰɛ ɓaɓɛlala najɛ ɓaz̤ipʰatʰɛ iinɡ̤ɔnɔ z̤amaɓɛlɛ z̤ɔɓuntɔmɓi ɓakʰɛ ɓɔna ɓatʰululɛlɛ uɓufɛɓɛ ɓaɓɔ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ nd̤amnikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sɛz̤itʰand̤anɛ z̤akʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɔɔɲana ɓasɛasirija aɓɔ aɓɛt͡ʃisɛka kukuɓakʰanuka ɓɔna ɓaɓutʰʲila uɓuz̤ɛ ɓakʰɛ ɓatʰaɓatʰa ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɛ ɓamɓulala nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ waɓa nɡ̤und̤aɓamlɔɲɛni kuɓafaz̤i ɓamɡ̤wɛɓa wakuɓɔna ɔkɔ umsakwaɓɔ untɛntɛjamkujɛ waɓa mand̤und̤u kunajɛ ukut͡ʃisɛka kwakʰɛ kukukʰanuka kwaɓa mand̤und̤u ukuhɛɲuz̤a kwakʰɛ kunɔkuhɛɲuz̤a kɔd̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ wat͡ʃisɛka kukuɓakʰanuka ɔɔɲana ɓasɛasirija amaɓamɓa nɛɛxulunɛli umɛlwanɛ lwakʰɛ aɓav̤ɛtʰɛ ɛz̤imɓɛd͡ʒ̤ɛmɓɛd͡ʒ̤ɛ aɓamahaʃɛ ɓɛkʰwɛlɛ ɛmahaʃɛni amad̤ɔd̤ana aluluɬɛ ɔnkɛ ɛpʰɛla nd̤aɓɔna ukuɓa uz̤ɛnz̤ɛ iŋǃamɓi ɓanɮɛlaɲɛ ɓɔɓaɓini wɔnɡ̤ɛz̤a ɛkuhɛɲuz̤ɛni kwakʰɛ waɓɔna amad̤ɔd̤a ɛz̤ɔtʲwɛ ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni imifanɛkisɔ jamakalɛd̤i ɛz̤ɔtʲwɛ nɡ̤ɛkǃaɓɔ ɛliɓɔmv̤u ɛŋǁiɓɛ iiŋǃwɛmɛʃa ɛz̤iŋǃɛni ɛnɛɛnkɔnt͡ʃɔ ɛz̤imfakamfɛlɛ ɛz̤intlɔkɔ ɛɓɔnakala ɛnɡ̤aɓapʰatʰimikʰɔsi ɔnkɛ ɛpʰɛla ɛfana nɔɔɲana ɓasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɓɛlamakalɛd̤i iz̤wɛ lɔkuz̤alwa kwaɓɔ wat͡ʃisɛka kukuwakʰanuka amɛɬɔ akʰɛ akuwaɓɔna watʰuma aɓatʰuɲwa kwɛlamakalɛd̤i ɓɛz̤a kɛ kujɛ ɔɔɲana ɓasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛsililini sɔkuŋǀɔkɔlisa ɓamɛnz̤a iŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɔɓufɛɓɛ ɓaɓɔ waz̤ɛnz̤a iŋǃamɓi nɡ̤aɓɔ waŋǀɔtʰuka kuɓɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ wakutʰʲila ukuhɛɲuz̤a kwakʰɛ waɓutʰʲila uɓuz̤ɛ ɓakʰɛ waŋǀɔtʰuka kɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ kujɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ waŋǀɔtʰukajɔ kumsakwaɓɔ wɔnɡ̤ɛz̤a kɛ ukuhɛɲuz̤a kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkukʰumɓula imiɬa jɔɓuŋǀinanɛ ɓakʰɛ awahɛɲuz̤a nɡ̤ajɔ ɛz̤wɛni lɛjiputa wat͡ʃisɛka kukuwakʰanuka amak͡xɛkǁɛ akʰɛ aɲama z̤iz̤iiɲama z̤amaɛsilɛ amakʰanukɔ awɔ anɡ̤amakʰanukɔ amahaʃɛ wamana ukʰumɓula amaɲala ɔɓuŋǀinanɛ ɓakʰɔ ɔkɔ amajiputa aɓɛpʰatʰɛ iinɡ̤ɔnɔ z̤amaɓɛlɛ akʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamaɓɛlɛ ɔɓuŋǀinanɛ ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ntɛntɛjamkujɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ikukǁʰɔkɔŋǁɛla iz̤itʰand̤anɛ z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤ɔ uŋǀɔtʰukilɛjɔ kuz̤ɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ nd̤iz̤iz̤isɛ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ z̤iv̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓasɛb̤ab̤ɛli namakalɛd̤i ɔnkɛ aɓav̤ɛlɛli iz̤ikʰulu iind̤una ɓɛnɔɔɲana ɓɔnkɛ ɓasɛasirija amad̤ɔd̤ana aluluɬɛ amaɓamɓa nɛɛxulunɛli ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla naɓapʰatʰimikʰɔsi namapʰakatʰi ɓɛnɡ̤aɓakʰwɛli ɓamahaʃɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓaja kukufikɛla ɓɛnɛz̤ikʰali nɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa nɛɛv̤ili ɓɛnɛsikʰunɡ̤u sɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɓab̤ɛkisɛ kuwɛ iinɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ namakʰaka nɛz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤inantlɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nd̤ɔlunikɛla kuɓɔ uɡ̤wɛɓɔ ukuɓa ɓakuɡ̤wɛɓɛ nɡ̤ɔkwamasikɔ aɓɔ nd̤ikunikɛlɛ ɛɓukʰwɛlɛni ɓam ɓakupʰatʰɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuʃuʃu ɓaja impumlɔ jakʰɔ nɛɛnɮɛɓɛ z̤akʰɔ nɛntɔ jakʰɔ ɛsɛlɛjɔ iwɛ lik͡xɛlɛ ɓɔna ɓaja kutʰaɓatʰa ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɔ nɛntɔ jakʰɔ ɛsɛlɛjɔ it͡ʃiswɛ nɡ̤umlilɔ ɓakuɬuɓɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤akʰɔ ɓaz̤itʰaɓatʰɛ iimpaɬa z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔkuhɔmɓa nd̤ɔwapʰɛlisa amaɲala akʰɔ nɔkuhɛɲuz̤a kwakʰɔ kwasɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa unɡ̤aɓi sawapʰakamisɛla amɛɬɔ akʰɔ kuwɔ unɡ̤aɓi salikʰumɓula ɛlasɛjiputa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ija kukunikɛla ɛsanɮɛni saɓɔ uɓatʰijilɛjɔ ɛsanɮɛni saɓɔ uŋǀɔtʰukilɛjɔ kuɓɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ ɓaja kukupʰatʰa nɡ̤ɛntijɔ ɓatʰaɓatʰɛ kɔnkɛ ukukǁɛlɛnɡ̤a kwakʰɔ ɓakuʃijɛ uz̤ɛ kaɲɛ ɓutʰʲilɛkɛ uɓuz̤ɛ ɓɔkuhɛɲuz̤a kwakʰɔ namaɲala akʰɔ nɔkuhɛɲuz̤a kwakʰɔ kuja kwɛnz̤ɛka ɔkɔ kuwɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuhɛɲuz̤a kwakʰɔ ɛkuland̤ɛlɛni iintlanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa uz̤ɛnz̤ɛ iŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤az̤ɔ uhamɓɛ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɔmsakwɛnu nd̤ɔjinikɛla kɛ ind̤ɛɓɛ jakʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi uja kujisɛla ind̤ɛɓɛ jɔmsakwɛnu jɔna lɛjɔ inz̤ulu iɓanz̤i ija kuɓa jintlɛkisa nɛsiɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛlɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa inɔmɓilini ɔmkʰulu uja kuz̤ala kukuŋǁila nasisiŋ̤ǃ̤ala jind̤ɛɓɛ jakwankanɡ̤ala kankanɡ̤ala ind̤ɛɓɛ jɔd̤ad̤ɛ wɛnu usamari uja kujisɛla kɛ ujifiŋǀɛ uwakǃɔɓɛ amaɡ̤ɔpʰɛ ajɔ uz̤id͡ʒ̤ɛkǀɛ nɡ̤awɔ amaɓɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa und̤iliɓɛlɛ wand̤ipʰɔsa ɛmv̤a kɔm̤lana wakʰɔ uja kuwatʰwala nɔkuwatʰwala amaɲala akʰɔ nɔkuhɛɲuz̤a kwakʰɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a ɲana wɔmntu uz̤a kuɓaɡ̤wɛɓa ɔɔntɛntɛjakʰɛ nɔntɛntɛjamkujɛ ɓakǁɛlɛlɛ kɛ amasikiz̤i aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓak͡xɛkǁɛz̤ilɛ iz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ z̤inɛɡ̤az̤i ɓak͡xɛkǁɛz̤ɛnɛ nɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ aɓaɓaz̤alɛla ɓaɓakǀand̤isɛlɛ kuz̤ɔ ukuɓa ɓat͡ʃiswɛ nɡ̤umlilɔ ɓaɓujɛ ɓɛnz̤a nɔku ɓajɛnz̤ɛ iŋǃamɓi iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jam kwanɡ̤ajɔ lɔɔ ɓaz̤iɬamɓɛla iisaɓatʰa z̤am ɓakuz̤isikɛla iz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ ɓanɡ̤ɛna kɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni jam kwanɡ̤ajɔ lɔɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓajiɬamɓɛlɛ jaɓɔna ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ɛnɮwini jam pʰakatʰi pʰɛz̤u kɔkɔ ɓatʰumɛlɛ kumad̤ɔd̤a av̤ɛla kud̤ɛ kwatʰuɲɛlwa kuwɔ umtʰuɲwa jaɓɔna wɔna lawɔ waz̤iɬamɓajɔ umz̤imɓa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jawɔ waz̤ikǃaɓa amɛɬɔ nɡ̤ɔmsiz̤i wav̤atʰɛla wɔna iz̤iv̤atʰɔ z̤akʰɔ waɬala ɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlwɛni ɛsinɔɓukǃakǃawuli alunɡ̤isɛlwa isitʰɛɓɛ pʰamɓi kwasɔ waɓɛka kɛ kusɔ isikǃʰumisɔ nɛɔli jam iz̤wi lɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ latʲɔndʲɔlɔz̤a kʰɔna kumad̤ɔd̤a asɛluninz̤ini lɔluntu kwaz̤iswa aɓasɛli ɓasɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɓaɓafaka iz̤akǀʰɔlɔ ɛz̤iɬaɬɛni z̤aɓɔ nɛz̤it͡sʰaɓa z̤ɔkuhɔmɓa ɛz̤intlɔkwɛni z̤aɓɔ nd̤atʰi kɛ kulɔwɔ ɔsɛlɛhaɡ̤ɛlɛ ɛkuk͡xɛkǁɛz̤ɛni nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ uhɛɲuz̤ɔ lwakʰɛ luja kuk͡xɛkǁɛz̤a lɔna nɡ̤ɔkwalɔ ɓamnɡ̤ɛna kɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kunɡ̤ɛnwa nɡ̤akɔ kumfaz̤i ɔlihɛɲukaz̤i ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukumnɡ̤ɛna untɛntɛjakʰɛ nɔntɛntɛjamkujɛ aɓɔ ɓafaz̤i ɓanamaɲala kɛ amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amalunɡ̤isa wɔna kɛ aja kuɓaɡ̤wɛɓa nɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ laɓak͡xɛkǁɛz̤ikaz̤i nanɡ̤ɔkwɛsikɔ laɓapʰalaz̤i ɓɛɡ̤az̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛnɡ̤aɓak͡xɛkǁɛz̤ikaz̤i z̤inɛɡ̤az̤i iz̤anɮa z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤ija kuɓaɲusɛla iɓanɮa nd̤iɓanikɛlɛ ɛkuŋǃakulwɛni nasɛkupʰanɡ̤wɛni iɓanɮa liɓakǁuluɓɛ nɡ̤amatʲɛ liɓasikɛ nɡ̤amak͡xɛlɛ alɔ lija kuɓaɓulala ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤aɓɔ liz̤it͡ʃisɛ iz̤inɮu z̤aɓɔ nd̤iwapʰɛlisɛ amaɲala ɛz̤wɛni ɓatʰɛtʰisɛkɛ aɓafaz̤i ɓɔnkɛ ɓanɡ̤ɛnz̤i nɡ̤ɔkwamaɲala ɛnu ɓaja kuwaɓɛka kɛ amaɲala ɛnu pʰɛz̤u kwɛnu niz̤itʰwalɛ iz̤ɔnɔ z̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤ɛnu naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤ijinkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsitʰɔɓa nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛʃumi nɡ̤ɔlwɛʃumi ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu z̤ib̤alɛlɛ iɡ̤ama lalɛ lajɔ jɔna lɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ujiʃikǀilɛlɛ ijɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ajɔ jɔna lɛ uz̤ɛ ujiz̤ɛkɛlisɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔmz̤ɛkɛlisɔ inɮu ɛnɛɛnkani utʰi kuɓɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɓɛka imɓiz̤a ɛz̤ikɔ jiɓɛkɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ uɡ̤alɛlɛ amanz̤i kujɔ ɬanɡ̤anisɛla kujɔ iiɲama z̤ajɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iiɲama ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ umlɛnz̤ɛ nɛɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓa jiz̤alisɛ nɡ̤amatʰamɓɔ akʰɛtʰiwɛjɔ tʰaɓatʰa ɛz̤ikʰɛtʰiwɛjɔ z̤ɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ amatʰamɓɔ uwafumɓɛlɛ nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwajɔ jiɓilisɛ kakuɬɛ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ amatʰamɓɔ ajɔ makapʰɛkwɛ pʰakatʰi kwajɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jɛha mz̤ind̤ini unamaɡ̤az̤i mɓiz̤and̤ini inɔm̤lwa ɛm̤lwa unɡ̤asukijɔ jixɔlɛ iɲama nɡ̤ɛɛɲama z̤ajɔ alipʰumi najɔ ikǃaʃisɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iɡ̤az̤i lawɔ lipʰakatʰi kwawɔ uliɓɛkɛ ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxɛni ɛɓalɛlɛlwɛ lilanɡ̤a awulipʰalaz̤anɡ̤a ɛm̤laɓɛni ukuɓa lisɛlɛlwɛ lutʰuli ukuz̤ɛ kuɲukɛ uɓuʃuʃu ukuz̤ɛ ipʰind̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛ impind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ iɡ̤az̤i lawɔ nd̤iliɓɛkɛ ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxɛni ɛɓalɛlɛlwɛ lilanɡ̤a ukuz̤ɛ linɡ̤asɛlɛlwa nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jɛha mz̤ind̤ini unamaɡ̤az̤i nam nd̤ija kujɛnz̤a iɓɛ imfumɓa jɛɛnkuni fumɓa kʰwɛz̤ɛla umlilɔ v̤utʰisa iɲama ud͡ʒ̤ijɛ um̤luz̤i at͡ʃɛ amatʰamɓɔ ujiɓɛkɛ pʰɛz̤u kwamalaɬɛ ajɔ inɡ̤asɛnantɔ pʰakatʰi ukuz̤ɛ lufud̤umalɛ lut͡ʃɛ ub̤ɛd̤u lwajɔ ɓuɲiɓilikɛ uɓuŋǃamɓi ɓajɔ pʰakatʰi kwajɔ um̤lwa wajɔ uɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛ iz̤id̤inisilɛ nɡ̤ɛmiɡ̤uʃaŋǁa awupʰumi kujɔ um̤lwa wajɔ ɔmninz̤i mawuɓɛ sɛmlilwɛni um̤lwa wajɔ ɛɓuŋǃamɓini ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤amaɲala nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa nd̤ikuɬamɓululɛ akwaɬamɓuluka akusaji kuɬamɓuluka ɛɓuŋǃamɓini ɓakʰɔ nd̤id̤ɛ nd̤iɓupʰɔlisɛlɛ kuwɛ uɓuʃuʃu ɓam mna jɛhɔv̤a nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ ijɛz̤a lɛ ntɔ nd̤ija kujɛnz̤a and̤iji kujɛka and̤iji kuɓa naŋǀɛɓa and̤iji kuz̤ɔɬwaja ɓaja kukuɡ̤wɛɓa nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛnɮɛla z̤akʰɔ nanɡ̤ɔkwɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤akʰɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu jaɓɔna nd̤itʰaɓatʰa kuwɛ intand̤a jamɛɬɔ akʰɔ nɡ̤ɛsiɓɛtʰɔ uz̤ɛ unɡ̤amɓamɓaz̤ɛli unɡ̤alili makunɡ̤apʰumi z̤iɲɛmɓɛz̤i kuwɛ ɡ̤ǀ̤uma utʰɛ kǀwaka uz̤ɛ unɡ̤ɛnz̤i sid͡ʒ̤wili nɡ̤aɓafilɛjɔ d͡ʒ̤ikɛla unkɔnt͡ʃɔ lwakʰɔ uŋǁiɓɛ iimɓad̤ad̤a z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤iɲawɛni z̤akʰɔ unɡ̤az̤iɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛli iind̤ɛv̤u z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤ipʰɛz̤u kɔmlɔmɔ unɡ̤asiɮi isɔnka saɓantu nd̤atʰɛtʰa kɛ naɓantu nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa nd̤ɛnz̤a kɛ nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wajɛnd̤iwisɛlɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɓatʰi aɓantu akusikǁɛlɛli ukuɓa ɛz̤i z̤intɔz̤itʰini kutʰi ukuɓa wɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ nd̤atʰi kuɓɔ kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi jitʰi kwinɮu kasirajɛli it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤ija kujiŋ̤ǀ̤ɔlisa iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jam ikǃʰajija lamanɮa ɛnu intand̤a jamɛɬɔ ɛnu isiz̤ɔnd̤ɛlɛlɔ sɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wɛnu ɓawɛ lik͡xɛlɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤ɛnu ɛniɓaʃijilɛjɔ nija kwɛnz̤a kɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ iind̤ɛv̤u ɛz̤ipʰɛz̤u kɔmlɔmɔ aniji kuz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛla ninɡ̤asiɮi isɔnka saɓantu iinkɔnt͡ʃɔ z̤ɛnu z̤ija kuɓa sɛntlɔkɔ nɛɛmɓad̤ad̤a z̤ɛnu z̤iɓɛ sɛz̤iɲawɛni z̤ɛnu aniji kumɓamɓaz̤ɛla nililɛ kɛ nija kuŋ̤ǀ̤uŋ̤ǀ̤utʰɛka ɛɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁɛni ɓɛnu niɡ̤ǀ̤umɛ ɔmɲɛ ɛkʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ kɔmɲɛ uhɛz̤ɛkilɛ wɔɓa sisimanɡ̤a nija kwɛnz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akɔ kɔnkɛ akwɛnz̤ilɛjɔ ɛkuz̤ɛni kwakɔ ɔkɔ nija kwaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤ijinkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu iɲanisɔ nd̤itʰaɓatʰa kuɓɔ iŋǃaɓa jaɓɔ imiɬali jɛsihɔmɓɔ saɓɔ intand̤a jamɛɬɔ aɓɔ intɔ aɓapʰakamisɛla kujɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ajɔ lɔɔ kuja ɔsind̤ilɛjɔ kuwɛ av̤akalisɛ ɔkɔ ɛz̤inɮɛɓɛni z̤akʰɔ nɡ̤ajɔ lɔɔ uja kuv̤ulɛka umlɔmɔ wakʰɔ kuɲɛ nɔsind̤ilɛjɔ lɔwɔ utʰɛtʰɛ unɡ̤aɓi saɓa sisid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ uɓɛ sisimanɡ̤a kuɓɔ ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu b̤ɛkisa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn uprɔfɛtɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ utʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi lɛnkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa usitʰi kwiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jam t͡ʃɔt͡ʃɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iɬand͡ʒ̤ɛlwɛ nakum̤laɓa wakwasirajɛli t͡ʃɔt͡ʃɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛnz̤iwɛ kwaɓa sɛnkanɡ̤ala nakwinɮu jakwajud̤a t͡ʃɔt͡ʃɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓatʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jaɓɔna nd̤ikunikɛla kɔɔɲana ɓasɛmpumalanɡ̤a ukuɓa ɓamɛlɛ kuwɛ ɓamisɛ iiŋ̤ǃ̤ili z̤aɓɔ kuwɛ ɓɛnz̤ɛ nɛɛnd̤awɔ z̤ɔkuɬala kwaɓɔ kuwɛ ɓɔna ɓaja kuɮa iz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤akʰɔ ɓasɛlɛ akʰɔ nd̤ija kujɛnz̤a irab̤a iɓɛ lik͡xiwa lɛɛnkamɛla ɛlɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn nd̤ilɛnz̤ɛ liɓɛ jind̤awɔ jɔkuɓutʰa kwɛmiɬamɓi naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa uɓɛtʰɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ waŋ̤ǃ̤iʃa nɡ̤ɔɲawɔ wawuv̤ujɛla um̤laɓa wakwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkukǀɛkisa kɔmpʰɛfumlɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jaɓɔna nd̤isɔlula pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ isanɮa nd̤ikunikɛlɛ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ukuɓa uɓɛ likǁʰɔɓa nd̤ikuŋǃumlɛ ɛz̤iz̤wɛni nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ ud̤akɛ unɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ɛmaz̤wɛni nd̤ija kukut͡ʃaɓalalisa waz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɓɛsitʰi ɔɔmɔwab̤i nɔsɛhirɛ jaɓɔnani ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛntlanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ inɮu jakwajud̤a nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jaɓɔnani nd̤iv̤ula ikǀala likamɔwab̤i nd̤itʰaɓatʰɛla ɛmiz̤ini jakʰɛ kwɛsɛkupʰɛlɛni kwakʰɛ ɛliɡ̤uɡ̤u lɛliz̤wɛ ib̤ɛtɛjɛʃimɔti nɛb̤ahalimɛhɔn nd̤isɛ ɛkirijatajim nd̤ɔliv̤ulɛla ɔɔɲana ɓasɛmpumalanɡ̤a kuɲɛ nɛlɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn nd̤iɓanikɛ limiwɛ ukuz̤ɛ ɓanɡ̤aɓi sakʰund͡ʒ̤ulwa ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ iz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɔ kwamɔwab̤i ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa uɛd̤ɔm ɛsɛɓɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkupʰind̤ɛz̤ɛla impind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ kwinɮu jakwajud̤a waz̤ɛka itʲala ɛlikʰulu nɡ̤ɔkupʰind̤ɛz̤ɛla kuɓɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤ija kusɔlula isanɮa napʰɛz̤u kwɛlakwaɛd̤ɔm nd̤iŋǃumlɛ kulɔ nɛnkɔmɔ nd̤ilib̤axisɛ kutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ kwatɛman ɓawɛ lik͡xɛlɛ kusɛ nakwad̤ɛd̤an nd̤ija kupʰind̤ɛz̤ɛla kwaɛd̤ɔm nɡ̤ɛsanɮa saɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli ɓɛnz̤ɛ kwaɛd̤ɔm nɡ̤ɔkɔmsind̤ɔ nanɡ̤ɔkɔɓuʃuʃu ɓam ɓakwaz̤i kɛ ukupʰind̤ɛz̤ɛla it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkwɛnz̤a kwamafilisti nɡ̤ɛmpind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ ɛpʰind̤ɛz̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛmpind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ ɛkǀɛkisa ɛmpʰɛfumlwɛni ɛsɔnakalisa ɛnɔɓut͡ʃaɓa ɔɓunɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ija kusɔlula isanɮa pʰɛz̤u kwamafilisti nd̤iwaŋǃumlɛ amak͡xɛti nd̤iwat͡ʃaɓalalisɛ amasalɛla asɛluŋǁwɛmɛni lɔlwanɮɛ nd̤ija kwɛnz̤a kuwɔ iimpind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ ɛz̤inkulu ɛz̤iʃuʃu ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɛkwɛnz̤ɛni impind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ kuwɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinamɲɛ nɡ̤ɔlɔkukǃala ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa itirɛ isitʰi nɡ̤ɛjɛrusalɛm t͡ʃɔt͡ʃɔ lwapʰukilɛ ukǀanɡ̤ɔ lwɛz̤iz̤wɛ luv̤ulɛkɛlɛ nd̤ija kukǀʰuma iɓɛ liŋǁuwa jɔna nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ikukǀʰasilɛ tirɛ nd̤ija kukuɲusɛla iintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤ininz̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa ulwanɮɛ luɲusa amaz̤a alɔ z̤iz̤ikǃʰukǃʰɛ iind̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤asɛtirɛ z̤iz̤iɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ulɛ iiŋǃaɓa z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ nd̤ɔlut͡ʃajɛla utʰuli lwajɔ kujɔ nd̤ijɛnz̤ɛ iɓɛ jiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa ɛɓalɛlɛlwɛ lilanɡ̤a ija kuɓa jind̤awɔ jɔkwanɛkɛla iminatʰa pʰakatʰi kɔlwanɮɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a iɓɛ likǁʰɔɓa lɛɛntlanɡ̤a namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ asɛmapʰanɮɛni aja kuɓulawa nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna itirɛ nd̤ija kujiz̤isɛla unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛv̤ɛla ɛntla wɔɔkumkani ɛnamahaʃɛ nɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa naɓakʰwɛli nɛsikʰunɡ̤u saɓantu naɓantu aɓaninz̤i amaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi akʰɔ asɛmapʰanɮɛni uja kuwaɓulala nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ akumisɛlɛ iŋǃaɓa jɔkuɓɔnisɛla afumɓɛ kuwɛ ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lɔkuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a
