akumisɛlɛ ikʰusi lamakʰaka ab̤ɛkisɛ ɛz̤ind̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni z̤akʰɔ iimpaɬa z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔkutʰʲɔmfa az̤id̤iliz̤ɛ iiŋǃaɓa z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛɛnt͡simɓi z̤akʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔninz̤i lwamahaʃɛ akʰɛ utʰuli lwawɔ luja kukuɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla iind̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɔ z̤ija kuɲikima nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛsand̤i saɓakʰwɛli nɛsɛɛv̤ili nɛsɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwakʰɛ nɡ̤amasanɡ̤ɔ akʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓanɡ̤ɛna ɛmz̤ini ɔkǃʰɛkɛz̤wajɔ nɡ̤amaŋǃina amahaʃɛ akʰɛ uja kuz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤uʃa iz̤itratɔ z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ uja kuɓaɓulala aɓantu ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ iint͡sika z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤inamanɮa az̤iwisɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni ɓaja kuɓutʰimɓa uɓutʲɛɓi ɓakʰɔ ɓajipʰanɡ̤ɛ intɔ ɔxwɛɓa nɡ̤ajɔ ɓaz̤iɡ̤unɡ̤ukǁulɛ iind̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɔ ɓaz̤id̤iliz̤ɛ iz̤inɮu z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ ɓawat͡ʃɔnisɛ ɛmanz̤ini amatʲɛ akʰɔ nɛmitʰi jakʰɔ nɔtʰuli lwakʰɔ nd̤ɔlupʰɛlisa ulwand̤ilɛ lwɛɛnɡ̤ɔma z̤akʰɔ sinɡ̤aɓi sav̤iwa isand̤i sɛɛhad̤i z̤akʰɔ nd̤ɔkwɛnz̤a uɓɛ jiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa ɛɓalɛlɛlwɛ lilanɡ̤a uja kuɓa jind̤awɔ jɔkwanɛka iminatʰa akusaji kuɓa sakʰiwa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jɛhɔv̤a nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kwitirɛ ukutʰi az̤iji kuɲikima iz̤ikǃitʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛsitʰɔnɡ̤a sɔkuwa kwakʰɔ ɛkuŋǀwinɛni kwaɓaŋ̤ǁ̤wɛlɛxiwɛjɔ ɛkuɓulawɛni kwaɓapʰakatʰi kwakʰɔ z̤ija kuɬa ɛz̤itrɔnɛni z̤aɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaz̤iz̤ikʰulu z̤ɔlwanɮɛ ɓaz̤isusɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤aɓɔ z̤ɔkwalɛka ɓaz̤iɬuɓɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤imfakamfɛlɛ ɓamɓatʰɛ ukuɡ̤ub̤a ɓaɬalɛ pʰant͡si ɛm̤laɓɛni ɓaɡ̤ub̤ɛ nɡ̤amapʰaɲaz̤ɔ ɔnkɛ ɓamanɡ̤aliswɛ nɡ̤uwɛ ɓaja kukupʰakamisɛla isid͡ʒ̤wili ɓatʰi kuwɛ jɔɔ utʰɛni ukud̤aka wɛna uɓumiwɛ nɡ̤aɓɛɛlwanɮɛ wɛna mz̤ind̤ini ud̤umilɛjɔ ɔwawɔmɛlɛlɛ ɛlwanɮɛ wɔna naɓɛmi ɓawɔ ɔɓɛ uɓakǃʰipʰukisa umɓilini aɓɛmi ɓawɔ ɓɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔku z̤ijaɡ̤ub̤a iz̤ikǃitʰi nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɔkuwa kwakʰɔ z̤ikʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰iswɛ iz̤ikǃitʰi ɛz̤isɛlwanɮɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkupʰɛla kwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɛkukwɛnz̤ɛni uɓɛ nɡ̤umz̤i ɔliŋǁuwa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmiz̤i ɛnɡ̤asamiwɛjɔ ɛkuwaɲusɛni pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ amanz̤i anz̤ɔnɡ̤ɔnz̤ɔnɡ̤ɔ akuɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɛ amanz̤i amaninz̤i nd̤ija kukuɬisɛla kwaɓaɬɛ ɓaja ɛm̤ad̤ini nd̤ikusɛ ɛɓantwini ɓasɛnd̤alɛni nd̤ikuɬalisɛ ɛz̤wɛni lanɡ̤apʰant͡si ɛmaŋǁuwɛni asɛnd̤alɛni naɓaɬɛ ɓaja ɛm̤ad̤ini ukuz̤ɛ unɡ̤amiwa nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ uɓukʰaz̤ikʰaz̤i ɛz̤wɛni laɓaɬɛlijɔ nd̤ɔkwɛnz̤a uɓɛ sisikʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰isɔ unɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ɓakufunɛ ɓanɡ̤aɓi napʰakad̤ɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu jipʰakamisɛlɛ isimɓɔnɔnɔ itirɛ jitʰi kwitirɛ wɛna uɬɛlijɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnwɛni z̤ɔlwanɮɛ mxwɛɓɛlikaz̤i wɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤ikǃitʰini ɛz̤ininz̤i it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi tirɛ utʰi wɛna nd̤im̤lɛ kwapʰɛla isɛmɓilinini jɛɛlwanɮɛ imid̤a jakʰɔ aɓakʰi ɓakʰɔ ɓakwɛnz̤ɛ wam̤lɛ kwapʰɛla nɡ̤ɛmisiprɛs jasɛsɛnirɛ ɓakwakʰɛlɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iid̤ɛkɛ z̤akʰɔ ɓatʰaɓatʰa imisɛd̤arɛ jasɛlɛb̤anɔn ukwɛnz̤a kuwɛ ɓawɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛmiɔki jasɛb̤aʃan amapʰini akʰɔ ɔkub̤ɛkǃa iz̤iɬalɔ z̤akʰɔ ɓaz̤ɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛɛmpɔnd̤ɔ z̤ɛɛnɮɔv̤u ɛz̤ifakɛlwɛ ɛmiɡ̤alaɡ̤alɛni jasɛz̤ikǃitʰini z̤amakiti ilinɛn ɛkǀikiz̤ɛkilɛjɔ ɛmfakamfɛlɛ jasɛjiputa jaɓa ijisɛjilɛ jakʰɔ ukuɓa iɓɛ jib̤anilɛ kuwɛ inɡ̤uɓɔ ɛmsi nɛmfusa jasɛz̤ikǃʰitʰini z̤akwaɛliʃa jaɓa nɡ̤umtʰunz̤i wakʰɔ aɓɛmi ɓasɛt͡sid̤ɔn nɛarv̤ad̤i ɓajɛ ɓɛnɡ̤aɓab̤ɛkǃi ɓakʰɔ iz̤ilumkɔ z̤akʰɔ tirɛ z̤aɓa pʰakatʰi kwakʰɔ z̤aɓa nɡ̤aɓakǃʰuɓi ɓakʰɔ amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu asɛɡ̤ɛb̤ali nɛz̤ilumkɔ z̤akʰɔna ɛɓɛ z̤ikuwɛ z̤aɓa nɡ̤aɓalunɡ̤isi ɓɛɛntand̤a z̤akʰɔ jɔnkɛ imikʰɔmɓɛ jɔlwanɮɛ iɓɛ ikuwɛ nɔɔmatɛlɔʃɛ ɓajɔ ukuɓa jananɛ uxwɛɓɔ lwakʰɔ amapɛrsi namalud̤i namaputi ɛɓɛsɛmkʰɔsini wakʰɔ ɛnɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a akʰɔ ɔkulwa aɓɛz̤ikǁʰɔma kuwɛ iinɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ nɛz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤inantlɔkɔ uɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amɛla wɔna ɔɔɲana ɓasɛarv̤ad̤i ɓaɓɛnɔmkʰɔsi wakʰɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnd̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤akʰɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ namak͡xɔti aɓɛsɛz̤iŋǃaɓɛni z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ akǁʰɔma iinɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ z̤awɔ ɛz̤ind̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni z̤akʰɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ wɔna akwɛnz̤a wam̤lɛ kwapʰɛla itarʃiʃɛ jaxwɛɓɛlana nawɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuninz̤i ɓɔɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓakuxɔlɛla isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛsiɲitʰi nɛb̤ɛkilɛ nɛlɔtʰɛ nɡ̤ɛɛmpaɬa z̤akʰɔ ɔɔjav̤an nɔtub̤ali nɔmɛʃɛki ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓaxwɛɓɛli ɓakʰɔ ɓaxwɛɓisana nawɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤ikǃu z̤aɓantu nanɡ̤ɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɔb̤ɛd̤u aɓɛnɮu katɔɡ̤arma ɓakuxɔlɛla amahaʃɛ ɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa nawɔkukʰwɛla nɔɔnɮɛɓɛnd̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛɛmpaɬa z̤akʰɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakad̤ɛd̤an ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓaxwɛɓɛli ɓakʰɔ iz̤ikǃitʰi ɛz̤ininz̤i ɓɛz̤ixwɛɓisana nawɛ z̤akuɓujisɛla iimpɔnd̤ɔ z̤ɛɛnɮɔv̤u nɛmisimɓitʰi jaɓa sisitʰaɓatʰaɓa uaram waxwɛɓɛlana nawɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuninz̤i ɓɛz̤intɔ ɔz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ ɓakuxɔlɛla iikarb̤unkɔlɔ nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤imfusa nɛz̤imfakamfɛlɛ nɛlinɛn ɛkǀikiz̤ɛkilɛjɔ nɛkɔralɛ nɛɛrub̤i nɡ̤ɛɛmpaɬa z̤akʰɔ ɛlakwajud̤a nɛliz̤wɛ lakwasirajɛli ɓɛlinɡ̤aɓaxwɛɓɛli ɓakʰɔ ɓaxwɛɓisana nawɛ nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa jasɛminiti nanɡ̤ɛmikǃʰatʰanɛ nanɡ̤ɔɓusi nanɡ̤ɛɔli nanɡ̤amafutʰa akǃʰɔliwɛjɔ id̤amaskɔ jaxwɛɓɛlana nawɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuninz̤i ɓɛz̤intɔ ɔz̤ɛnz̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuninz̤i ɓɔɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛwajini jasɛhɛlɛb̤ɔn nanɡ̤ɔɓɔja ɓɛɡ̤uʃa ɔɓukǃakǃamɓilɛjɔ ɔɔv̤ɛd̤an nɔjav̤an wasɛuz̤ali ɓajɛ ɓɛkuxɔlɛla int͡simɓi ɛkʰand̤iwɛjɔ ikasija nɛkalamɔ ɓɛz̤isɛkuxwɛɓɛni kwakʰɔ ud̤ɛd̤an uɓɛnɡ̤umxwɛɓɛli wakʰɔ wɛz̤id̤waʃu z̤ɔkukʰwɛla ɛlakwaarab̤i nɛz̤ikʰulu z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwakɛd̤arɛ ɓɛz̤ixwɛɓisana nawɛ z̤axwɛɓisana nawɛ nɡ̤amatakanɛ nanɡ̤ɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa nanɡ̤ɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ aɓaxwɛɓi ɓakwaʃɛb̤a naɓakwarama ɓajɛ ɓɛnɡ̤aɓaxwɛɓɛli ɓakʰɔ ɓakuxɔlɛla uɓulawu ɓɔnkɛ ɔɓujintlɔkɔ namatʲɛ ɔnkɛ aŋǃaɓilɛjɔ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛɛmpaɬa z̤akʰɔ ɔɔharan nɔkanɛ nɔɛd̤ɛn aɓaxwɛɓi ɓakwaʃɛb̤a naɓasɛasirija naɓasɛkilɛmad̤i ɓajɛ ɓɛnɡ̤aɓaxwɛɓɛli ɓakʰɔ ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aɓaxwɛɓɛli ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤intlɛ kwapʰɛla nanɡ̤ɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɔkwalɛka ɛz̤imsi nɛz̤imfakamfɛlɛ nanɡ̤ɛmikǀʰakɔ ɛmaɓalaɓala ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ z̤itʰand̤ɛlwɛ z̤akǃiniswa nɡ̤amakǃamɛsi ukuɓa z̤ijɛ ɛmarikɛni jakʰɔ iiŋǃanawa z̤asɛtarʃiʃɛ ɓɛz̤inɡ̤aɓatʰutʰi ɓakʰɔ naɓɔlwananisɔ lwakʰɔ wakǀʰuma kɛ waz̤uka kakʰulu ɛmɓilinini jɛɛlwanɮɛ ɓakusa ɛmanz̤ini amakʰulu aɓab̤ɛkǃi ɓakʰɔ umɔja wasɛmpumalanɡ̤a wakwapʰula ɛmɓilinini jɛɛlwanɮɛ uɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓakʰɔ nɛɛmpaɬa z̤akʰɔ ɔtʰɛnɡ̤isɛ nɡ̤az̤ɔ nɛz̤intɔ z̤akʰɔ ɔz̤ananilɛjɔ nɔɔmatɛlɔʃɛ ɓakʰɔ naɓakǃʰuɓi ɓakʰɔ naɓalunɡ̤isi ɓɛɛntand̤a z̤akʰɔ naɓananisi ɓɛɛntɔ z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔkwananwa namad̤ɔd̤a akʰɔ ɔnkɛ ɔkulwa apʰakatʰi kwakʰɔ kuɲɛ nɛsikʰunɡ̤u sakʰɔ sɔnkɛ ɛsipʰakatʰi kwakʰɔ ɓapʰalala ɛmɓilinini jɛɛlwanɮɛ nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkuwa kwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤wi lɔkukʰala laɓakǃʰuɓi ɓakʰɔ ajaɲikima amaɮɛlɔ ɓajɛɬa ɛmikʰɔmɓɛni jaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓab̤ɛkǃi nɔɔmatɛlɔʃɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓakǃʰuɓi ɓasɛlwanɮɛ ɓɛz̤ɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni ɓaja kuliv̤akalisa iliz̤wi laɓɔ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ ɓakʰalɛ kak͡xak͡xa ɓaz̤iɡ̤alɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔtʰuli ɛz̤intlɔkɔ ɓaz̤iɡ̤alɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔtʰutʰu ɓɔz̤ikǀʰɛɓa iintlɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɔ ɓab̤iŋǃɛ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ ɓakulilɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuk͡xak͡xa ɓɔmpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ ɓɛmɓamɓaz̤ɛla kak͡xak͡xa ɓɔkupʰakamisɛla isimɓɔnɔnɔ ɛsimɛmɛni saɓɔ ɓakwɛnz̤ɛlɛ isimɓɔnɔnɔ ɓɛsitʰi nɡ̤uɓani ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛtirɛ ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɓɛtʰwɛ watʰi kǀwaka ɛmɓilinini jɛɛlwanɮɛ ɛkupʰumɛni kwɛɛmpaɬa z̤akʰɔ ɔtʰɛnɡ̤isɛ nɡ̤az̤ɔ ɛz̤ilwanɮɛ waɬutʰisa iz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤ininz̤i nɡ̤ɔɓuninz̤i ɓɔɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓakʰɔ nɔɓɔlwananisɔ lwakʰɔ waɓatʲɛɓisa ɔɔkumkani ɓɛɬaɓatʰi kunɡ̤ɔku wapʰukilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ umkilɛ ɛz̤ilwanɮɛ ɛz̤inz̤ulwini z̤amanz̤i luwilɛ nawɛ ulwananisɔ lwakʰɔ nɛsikʰunɡ̤u sakʰɔ sɔnkɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmi ɓɛz̤ikǃitʰi ɓaja kumanɡ̤aliswa nɡ̤uwɛ ɔɔkumkani ɓaz̤ɔ ɓaɓɛ namanwɛlɛ ɓɛnamanwɛlɛ ɓutʰɛ nt͡ʃwa uɓusɔ ɓaɓɔ aɓaxwɛɓi aɓasɛz̤iz̤wɛni ɓaja kwɛnz̤a umsɔnɮɔ usukɛ wɛna uɓɛ sisikʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰isɔ unɡ̤aɓi saɓakʰɔ napʰakad̤ɛ kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu jitʰi kwinɡ̤anɡ̤a jɛtirɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ ipʰakamilɛ usitʰi nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ nd̤iɬɛli ɛsiɬalwɛni sɔtʰikǁɔ ɛmɓilinini jɛɛlwanɮɛ pʰɔfu unɡ̤umntu unɡ̤ɛtʰikǁɔ nakuɓa ujɛnz̤ɛ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ jand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jɔtʰikǁɔ jaɓɔna ulumkɛ kamɓɛ nanɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔd̤anijɛli z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤isitʰɛlɛjɔ az̤isitʰɛlisiwɛ kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔɓulumkɔ ɓakʰɔ nanɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ jakʰɔ uz̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ uɓuhand̤iɓa wanɡ̤ɛnisa iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɛɓuŋǀwanɛni ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔɓuninz̤i ɓɔɓulumkɔ ɓakʰɔ uɓand̤isilɛ uɓuhand̤iɓa ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔxwɛɓɔ lwakʰɔ japʰakama intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔɓuhand̤iɓa ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa wajɛnz̤a intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ jand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jɔtʰikǁɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ujaɓɔna nd̤ija kukuz̤isɛla aɓasɛmz̤ini aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤aŋ̤ǀ̤az̤ɛlisi ɓasɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɓaɓuxɔlɛlɛ uɓuɬɛ ɓɔɓulumkɔ ɓakʰɔ amak͡xɛlɛ aɓɔ ɓakuɬamɓɛlɛ ukuɓɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛla kwakʰɔ ɓaja kukuɬisɛla ɛm̤ad̤ini ufɛ nɡ̤ɔkufa kwaɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ ɛmɓilinini jɛɛlwanɮɛ wɔt͡ʃɔ uɓujɛ ut͡ʃɔ ukutʰi nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ pʰamɓi kɔmɓulali wakʰɔ unɡ̤umntu nd͡ʒ̤ɛ unɡ̤ɛtʰikǁɔ ɛsanɮɛni sɔkuɬaɓajɔ uja kwaɓanɡ̤alukilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa saɓasɛmz̤ini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu mpʰakamisɛlɛ isimɓɔnɔnɔ wasɛtirɛ utʰi kujɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi wɛna lutʲwinɔ lwɛsakʰiwɔ ɛsilinɡ̤anisɛlwɛjɔ kakuɬɛ uz̤ɛlɛjɔ ɓuɓulumkɔ um̤lɛ kwapʰɛla uɓusɛɛd̤ɛn ɛmjɛz̤wɛni katʰikǁɔ ɔnkɛ amatʲɛ aŋǃaɓilɛjɔ aɓɛ ɛsisiɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɔ sakʰɔ isard̤ijɔ nɛtɔpaz̤i nɛd̤ajimani nɛk͡xiz̤ɔlitɛ nɛb̤ɛrilɔ nɛjaspisi nɛsafirɛ nɛkarb̤unkɔlɔ nɛsmarad̤ɔ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤i z̤akʰɔ nɔwamankaz̤ana akʰɔ wajɛ ukuwɛ nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkud̤alwa kwakʰɔ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ z̤alunɡ̤iswa wajɛ ujikɛrub̤i ɛtʰand͡ʒ̤isiwɛjɔ ɛɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlajɔ nd̤akwɛnz̤a kɛ waɓa sɛntaɓɛni ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ katʰikǁɔ wahamɓahamɓa pʰakatʰi kwamatʲɛ anɔmlilɔ waɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛla nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛla z̤akʰɔ kususɛla jɔkud̤alwa kwakʰɔ kwad̤a kwafumanɛka uɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuninz̤i ɓɔxwɛɓɔ lwakʰɔ umɓilini wakʰɔ waz̤ala kukuɡ̤ɔɲamɛla wɔna kɛ nd̤ija kulaɬa wɛna nɡ̤ɔkwɛntɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔlilɛjɔ umkɛ ɛntaɓɛni katʰikǁɔ nd̤ikut͡ʃaɓalalisɛ kɛrub̤i iɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlajɔ usukɛ pʰakatʰi kwamatʲɛ anɔmlilɔ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ ipʰakamilɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɬɛ ɓakʰɔ uɓɔnakalisilɛ uɓulumkɔ ɓakʰɔ kuɲɛ nɔkuɓɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛla kwakʰɔ nd̤ikukʰaɬɛla ɛm̤laɓɛni nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ uɓɛ nɡ̤umɓɔnɛlɔ pʰamɓi kɔkumkani nɡ̤ɔɓuninz̤i ɓɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɔ ɛɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰɛni ɓɔxwɛɓɔ lwakʰɔ uz̤iɬamɓɛlɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤akʰɔ nd̤iv̤ɛlisa kɛ umlilɔ kwapʰakatʰi kwakʰɔ uja kukut͡ʃisa wɔna nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ uɓɛ lutʰutʰu ɛm̤laɓɛni ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓakuɓɔnajɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓakwaz̤ijɔ ɛz̤iz̤wɛni ɓaja kumanɡ̤aliswa nɡ̤uwɛ usukɛ uɓɛ sisikʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰isɔ unɡ̤aɓuji uɓɛkʰɔ napʰakad̤ɛ kwafika iliz̤wi likatʰikǁɔ lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu b̤ɛkisa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ ɛt͡sid̤ɔn uprɔfɛtɛ nɡ̤ajɔ jitʰi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ujaɓɔna nd̤ikukǀʰasilɛ t͡sid̤ɔn nd̤ija kuz̤iz̤ukisa pʰakatʰi kwakʰɔ ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɛkwɛnz̤ɛni iz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɔ kujɔ nd̤iz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛlɛ kujɔ nd̤ija kutʰumɛla kujɔ indʲikitʲa jɔkufa nɛɡ̤az̤i ɛz̤itratwɛni z̤ajɔ ɓawɛ aɓaŋ̤ǁ̤wɛlɛxiwɛjɔ pʰakatʰi kwajɔ lik͡xɛlɛ ɛlijifikɛlajɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a akuji kuɓa saɓakʰɔ mɛv̤a anɔɓuɬunɡ̤u naluv̤ikɔ lwɛnz̤a ɓuɬunɡ̤u kwinɮu kasirajɛli lupʰuma kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓanɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kujɔ aɓajikǀukulɛjɔ ɓaz̤i kɛ ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɛkujiɓutʰɛni inɮu kasirajɛli ɛz̤iz̤wɛni aɓapʰanɡ̤alaliswɛ kuz̤ɔ nd̤ija kuz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛla kuɓɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɓaɬalɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni waɓɔ ɛnd̤awunika umkʰɔnz̤i ujakɔɓi ɓaja kuɬala kuwɔ ɓɛkʰɔlɔsilɛ ɓakʰɛ iz̤inɮu ɓatʲalɛ iz̤id̤ilija ɓaɬalɛ ɓɛkʰɔlɔsilɛ ɛkwɛnz̤ɛni iz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɔ kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓakǀukulajɔ aɓanɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kuɓɔ ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛʃumi nɡ̤ɔlwɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɓini ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu b̤ɛkisa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ kufarɔ wasɛjiputa uprɔfɛtɛ nɡ̤ajɛ nanɡ̤ɛjiputa jɔnkɛ ipʰɛla tʰɛtʰa utʰi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ujaɓɔna nd̤ikukǀʰasilɛ farɔ wasɛjiputa nɡ̤wɛɲa iɓutʰumilɛjɔ ɛmid͡ʒ̤ɛlwɛni jajɔ jɔmnajilɛ it͡ʃɔ ukutʰi nɡ̤ɔwam umlamɓɔ nd̤iz̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ nd̤ija amakʰɔŋ̰ǀ̰ɔ ɛmiɬatʰini jakʰɔ nd̤iz̤inamatʰisɛlɛ ɛmakǁɔlwɛni akʰɔ iintlanz̤i z̤ɛmid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ jakʰɔ nd̤ikuxɔlɛ ɛmid͡ʒ̤ɛlwɛni jakʰɔ nɛɛntlanz̤i z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛmid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ jakʰɔ ɛz̤inamatʰɛlɛ ɛmakǁɔlwɛni akʰɔ nd̤ija kukulaɬɛla ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ wɛna nɛɛntlanz̤i z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛmid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ jakʰɔ uja ɛnɮɛ akuji kuɬanɡ̤aniswa uɓutʰwɛ nd̤ikunikɛlɛ ukuɓa uɓɛ kukuɮa kwamaxamŋǀwa ɛliz̤wɛ nɔkwɛɛntaka z̤ɛz̤ulu ɓaja kwaz̤i ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmi ɓasɛjiputa ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa iɓɛ inɡ̤umsimɛlɛlɔ wɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ kwinɮu kasirajɛli ɓakuɓamɓɛlɛla kuwɛ nɡ̤amaɬamv̤u akʰɔ uv̤ikiv̤ɛkɛ uk͡xaz̤ulɛ lɔnkɛ iɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓa laɓɔ utʰi ɓakusimɛlɛla nɡ̤awɛ wapʰukɛ uɡ̤ǁ̤ad̤az̤ɛlisɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤iŋǃɛ z̤aɓɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ujaɓɔna nd̤ikuz̤isɛla ik͡xɛlɛ nd̤iŋǃumlɛ kuwɛ nɛnkɔmɔ iliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala lib̤axɛ ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa usitʰi umlamɓɔ nɡ̤ɔwam nd̤iz̤ɛnz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ujaɓɔna nd̤ikukǀʰasilɛ nɛmid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ jakʰɔ nd̤ija kulib̤axisa iliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa lib̤axɛ kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala litʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛmiɡ̤id̤ɔli lisɛ ɛsɛv̤ɛnɛ lisɛ ɛmd̤ɛni wakwakuʃi akuji kukǀand̤a luɲawɔ kulɔ akuji kukǀand̤a ŋǃina lankɔmɔ kulɔ linɡ̤ɛmiwa imiɲaka ɛnɡ̤amaʃumi amanɛ nd̤ija kulɛnz̤a kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala iliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa pʰakatʰi kwamaz̤wɛ ab̤axilɛjɔ iɓɛ nɡ̤amaŋǁuwa imiz̤i jalɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛmiz̤i ɛnɡ̤amaŋǁuwa imiɲaka ɛnɡ̤amaʃumi amanɛ nd̤iwapʰanɡ̤alalisɛlɛ amajiputa ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni nd̤iwakǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰɛ ɛmaz̤wɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɲaka ɛnɡ̤amaʃumi amanɛ nd̤ija kuwaɓutʰa amajiputa ɛz̤iz̤wɛni aɓɛpʰanɡ̤alalisɛlwɛ kuz̤ɔ nd̤iɓujisɛ ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kwɛjiputa nd̤iwaɓujisɛ ɛliz̤wɛni lasɛpatrɔsi ɛz̤wɛni lɔkuv̤ɛla kwawɔ aɓɛ ɛsipʰant͡si kʰɔna ɛz̤ikumkanini aja kuɓa sɛsipʰant͡si anɡ̤aɓi saz̤ipʰakamisa nɡ̤ɔkwawɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a nd̤iwaŋǀipʰisɛ ukuz̤ɛ anɡ̤az̤iɲatʰɛlɛli pʰant͡si iintlanɡ̤a akaji kuɓa saɓa jinkɔlɔsɛkɔ jɛnɮu kasirajɛli ɛkʰumɓuz̤a uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa nɡ̤ɔkub̤ɛka kwajɔ kuwɔ az̤i ukuɓa nd̤ijinkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi ɔmaɓini anɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɔkukǃala nɡ̤ɔlɔkukǃala ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli jakʰɛ ujisɛɓɛnz̤isɛ umsɛɓɛnz̤i ɔmkʰulu ɛtirɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iintlɔkɔ z̤ikʰutʰukilɛ ɔnkɛ amaɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓa atʲaɓukilɛ akaɓanɡ̤a namv̤uz̤ɔ kɛ jɛna nɛmpi jakʰɛ ɛtirɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmsɛɓɛnz̤i awusɛɓɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kujɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ujaɓɔna unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli nd̤imnika iliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa ukuɓa atʰutʰɛ intaɓalala jalɔ atʰimɓɛ intimɓɔ jalɔ apʰanɡ̤ɛ ikǁʰɔɓa lalɔ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ z̤iɓɛ nɡ̤umv̤uz̤ɔ wɛmpi jakʰɛ umv̤uz̤ɔ wakʰɛ awusɛɓɛnz̤ɛlɛjɔ nd̤imnika iliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓajɛ ɓɛsɛɓɛnz̤ɛlɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ajɔ lɔɔ nd̤ija kujiɬumisɛla upʰɔnd̤ɔ inɮu kasirajɛli nd̤ikunikɛ ukuv̤ulwa kɔmlɔmɔ pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu prɔfɛta utʰi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi b̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤ani nitʰi haji kɛ lɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ikufupʰi lɛ ikufupʰi kajɛhɔv̤a jamafu ija kuɓa likǁɛʃa lɛɛntlanɡ̤a ik͡xɛlɛ lija kujifikɛla ijiputa kuja kuɓakʰɔ ukuz̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤a kwakuʃi ɛkuwɛni kwaɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ ɛjiputa itʰatʲatʰwɛ intaɓalala jajɔ z̤ikǀʰitʰwɛ iz̤isɛkɔ z̤ajɔ amakuʃi namaputi namalud̤i nɔmkǁukukǁɛla wɔnkɛ namakub̤i nɔɔɲana ɓɛliz̤wɛ lɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɓaja lik͡xɛlɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ najɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɓaja aɓakǁʰasi ɓɛjiputa liɬɛ ikǃʰajija lamanɮa ajɔ ɓaja kutʰaɓatʰɛla imiɡ̤id̤ɔli ɓasɛ ɛsɛv̤ɛnɛ ɓɛsiwa lik͡xɛlɛ kujɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kwɛlamajiputa kɔɓa sɛnkanɡ̤ala pʰakatʰi kwamaz̤wɛ ab̤axilɛjɔ nɛmiz̤i jalɔ iɓɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛmiz̤i ɛnɡ̤amaŋǁuwa ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɛkufakɛni umlilɔ ɛjiputa ɓapʰukɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaŋǀɛd̤i ɓalɔ nɡ̤ajɔ lɔɔ kuja kupʰuma aɓatʰuɲwa nɡ̤ɛɛŋǃanawa ukuz̤ɛ ɓɔtʰusɛ amakuʃi akʰɔlɔsilɛjɔ az̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkwawɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤asɛmini jɛjiputa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujaɓɔna ijɛz̤a lɛ ntɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤ija kujipʰɛlisa iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jɛjiputa nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sikanɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli jɛna ɛnaɓantu ɓakʰɛ aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤aŋ̤ǀ̤az̤ɛlisi ɓasɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɓaja kuz̤iswa ukuɓa ɓalit͡ʃaɓalalisɛ iliz̤wɛ ɓajixɔlɛlɛ amak͡xɛlɛ aɓɔ ijiputa ɓaliz̤alisɛ iliz̤wɛ nɡ̤aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ nd̤ɔjɔmisa imid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ jɔmnajilɛ nd̤itʰɛnɡ̤isɛ nɡ̤ɛliz̤wɛ ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤aɓanɔɓuɓi nd̤ilɛnz̤ɛ kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala iliz̤wɛ nɛnz̤alisɛkɔ jalɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤aɓasɛmz̤ini jɛhɔv̤a nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤ija kuz̤id̤akisa iz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ nd̤iz̤ipʰɛlisɛ iz̤itʰikǁɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛntɔ ɛnɔfu kunɡ̤aɓi saɓakʰɔ sikʰulu sasɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nd̤inɡ̤ɛnisɛ ukɔjika ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nd̤ija kujɛnz̤a kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala ipatrɔsi nd̤ifakɛ umlilɔ ɛt͡sɔhan nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ iz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɔ kwinɔ nd̤ɔɓutʰulula uɓuʃuʃu ɓam pʰɛz̤u kwɛsin iŋǃaɓa jasɛjiputa nd̤ijiŋǃumlɛ iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jasɛnɔ nd̤ifakɛ umlilɔ ɛjiputa isin ija kuz̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤a iz̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤ɛ nɛnɔ iŋǃikwɛ nɛnɔfu iɓɛ naɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɛmini amad̤ɔd̤ana asɛav̤ɛn nasɛpib̤ɛsɛtɛ aja lik͡xɛlɛ jɔna kɛ lɔɔ miz̤i itʰind͡ʒ̤wɛ ɛtapanɛsi ija kuɓa mɲama ɛkuz̤apʰulɛni kʰɔna iidʲɔkʰwɛ z̤asɛjiputa lipʰɛlɛ kujɔ ikǃʰajija lamanɮa ajɔ amafu aja kujisiɓɛkɛla namaɡ̤ǁ̤amɛsi ajɔ atʰind͡ʒ̤wɛ nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ iz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɔ ɛjiputa ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinamɲɛ nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɔkukǃala nɡ̤ɔlwɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu inɡ̤alɔ kafarɔ wasɛjiputa nd̤ijapʰulɛ ujaɓɔna ajiji kuɓɔt͡ʃwa ukuɓa ifakwɛ um̤laɓɛlɔ ukuɓa iɓɔt͡ʃwɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤itʰand̤ɛlɔ ukuɓa jɔmɛlɛlɛ ukuɓa ipʰatʰɛ ik͡xɛlɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤imkǀʰasilɛ ufarɔ wasɛjiputa nd̤ija kuz̤apʰula iinɡ̤alɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛjɔmɛlɛlɛjɔ kwanɛjapʰukilɛjɔ nd̤iliv̤utʰululɛ ik͡xɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ nd̤ɔwapʰanɡ̤alalisɛla amajiputa ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni nd̤iwakǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰɛ ɛmaz̤wɛni nd̤ija kuz̤ɔmɛlɛz̤a kɛ iinɡ̤alɔ z̤ɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli nd̤iɓɛkɛ ik͡xɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ nd̤iz̤apʰulɛ iinɡ̤alɔ z̤ikafarɔ aŋǀwinɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔŋǀwinɔ lɔŋ̤ǁ̤wɛlɛxiwɛjɔ nd̤ija kuz̤ɔmɛlɛz̤a iinɡ̤alɔ z̤ɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli z̤iwɛ iinɡ̤alɔ z̤ikafarɔ ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɛkuliɓɛkɛni ik͡xɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli alɔlulɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa nd̤ɔwapʰanɡ̤alalisɛla amajiputa ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni nd̤iwakǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰɛ ɛmaz̤wɛni ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ kalɔku kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinamɲɛ nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsitʰatʰu nɡ̤ɔlɔkukǃala ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu jitʰi kufarɔ wasɛjiputa nakwiŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jakʰɛ ufana naɓani nɡ̤ɔɓukʰulu ɓakʰɔ ujaɓɔna uasirija ɛɓɛnɡ̤umsɛd̤arɛ wasɛlɛb̤anɔn ɔmasɛɓɛ maɬɛ ɛjint͡ʃiɲɛla jɛmitʰi ɛnɔmtʰunz̤i ɛpʰakamilɛ nɡ̤ɔɓud̤ɛ aɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤imɓa z̤amafu amantlɔkɔ akʰɛ amanz̤i amkʰulisa amanz̤i ɛnz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓila ampʰakamisa imilamɓɔ jawɔ jahamɓa nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛlutʲalwɛni lwawɔ atʰumɛla imid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ jawɔ kujɔ jɔnkɛ imitʰi jasɛnɮɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ uɓud̤ɛ ɓakʰɛ ɓapʰakama ɓaɓa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwajɔ jɔnkɛ imitʰi jasɛnɮɛ iimɓakǁa z̤akʰɛ z̤and̤a namaɬamv̤u akʰɛ aɓa mad̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamanz̤i amaninz̤i ɛkunaɓɛni kwakʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛz̤ulu z̤akʰa ɛz̤imɓakǁɛni z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ z̤asɛnɮɛ z̤az̤akʰɛla pʰant͡si kwamaɬamv̤u akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤inkulu z̤aɬala ɛmtʰunz̤ini wakʰɛ wam̤lɛ nɡ̤ɔɓukʰulu ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔɓud̤ɛ ɓamasɛɓɛ akʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu jakʰɛ jaɓɛ isɛmanz̤ini amaninz̤i imisɛd̤arɛ ɛsɛmjɛz̤wɛni katʰikǁɔ ajimsitʰanɡ̤a imisiprɛs ajifananɡ̤a nɛɛmɓakǁa z̤akʰɛ nɛmiplɛjini ajiɓanɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amaɬamv̤u akʰɛ jɔnkɛ imitʰi ɛmjɛz̤wɛni katʰikǁɔ ajifananɡ̤a najɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuɬɛ ɓajɔ nd̤amɛnz̤a m̤lɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuninz̤i ɓamasɛɓɛ akʰɛ jaɓa nɔmɔna nɡ̤ajɛ jɔnkɛ imitʰi jasɛɛd̤ɛn ɛsɛmjɛz̤wɛni katʰikǁɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jat͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɛz̤ipʰakamisilɛ nɡ̤ɔɓud̤ɛ wawaɲusɛla amantlɔkɔ akʰɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤imɓa z̤amafu jaz̤iɲusa intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkupʰakama kwakʰɛ nd̤ija kumnikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlɛ jɛɛntlanɡ̤a inɛnɛ ija kumpʰatʰa nɡ̤ɛsikɔ lajɔ nd̤amɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kwakʰɛ ɓamŋǃumla aɓasɛmz̤ini aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤aŋ̤ǀ̤az̤ɛlisi ɓasɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɓamlaɬa ɛz̤intaɓɛni nasɛmifulɛni jɔnkɛ amasɛɓɛ akʰɛ amaɬamv̤u akʰɛ apʰukɛla ɛz̤iɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ z̤ɛɬa z̤ɛmka ɛmtʰunz̤ini wakʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi z̤amlaɬa pʰɛz̤u kwɛsiɓili sakʰɛ ɛsiwilɛjɔ kuɬala z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛz̤ulu z̤ifikɛ ɛmaɬamv̤ini akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ z̤asɛnɮɛ ukuz̤ɛ inɡ̤az̤ipʰakamisi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓud̤ɛ ɓajɔ jɔnkɛ imitʰi jasɛmanz̤ini inɡ̤awaɲusɛli pʰakatʰi kwɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤imɓa z̤amafu amantlɔkɔ ajɔ inɡ̤az̤imɛli nɡ̤ɔkwajɔ ɛkuz̤ipʰakamisɛni kwajɔ jɔnkɛ ɛsɛla amanz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓanikɛlwɛ ɛkufɛni ɛz̤wɛni lanɡ̤apʰant͡si pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakaad̤am kwaɓaɬɛ ɓaja ɛmɓad̤ini it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkuɬa kwakʰɛ ukuja kwɛlaɓafilɛjɔ nd̤aɓanɡ̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili nd̤awaɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛla nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɛ amanz̤i anz̤ɔnɡ̤ɔnz̤ɔnɡ̤ɔ nd̤atʰintɛla imilamɓɔ jawɔ av̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ɛlwa amanz̤i amakʰulu nd̤ajamɓatʰisa ilɛb̤anɔn nɡ̤ɛz̤imɲama z̤ɔkuz̤ila nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ imitʰi jasɛnɮɛ jɛtʰa amanɮa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛsitʰɔnɡ̤a sɔkuwa kwakʰɛ nd̤az̤iɲikimisa iintlanɡ̤a ɛkum̤lisɛlɛni ukuɓa ajɛ kwɛlaɓafilɛjɔ naɓaɬɛ ɓaja ɛm̤ad̤ini jatʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛka ɛz̤wɛni lanɡ̤apʰant͡si jɔnkɛ imitʰi jasɛɛd̤ɛn ɛɲuliwɛjɔ ɛmiɬɛ jasɛlɛb̤anɔn jɔnkɛ ɛsɛla amanz̤i naɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ajɛ ɓɛɬa ɓaja kwɛlaɓafilɛjɔ kwaɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ aɓaɓɛjinɡ̤alɔ jakʰɛ ɓɛɬɛli ɛmtʰunz̤ini wakʰɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a kund͡ʒ̤alɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛ naɓani nɡ̤ɔɓukǃakǃawuli nanɡ̤ɔɓukʰulu ɛmitʰini jasɛɛd̤ɛn uja kuɬisɛlwa nɛmitʰi jasɛɛd̤ɛn ɛz̤wɛni lanɡ̤apʰant͡si uja pʰakatʰi kwaɓanɡ̤alukilɛjɔ kwanaɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nɡ̤ufarɔ kɛ lɔwɔ nɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ kalɔku kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɓini nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɓini nɡ̤ɔlɔkukǃala ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu mɛnz̤ɛlɛ isimɓɔnɔnɔ ufarɔ wasɛjiputa utʰi kujɛ wafanɛkiswa nɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ɛnt͡ʃa jɛɛntlanɡ̤a nakuɓa uɓɛ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤wɛɲa ɛlwanɮɛ wakǁʰuma ɛmiland͡ʒ̤ɛni jakʰɔ wawaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔb̤a amanz̤i nɡ̤amatʰupʰa akʰɔ wajiɲatʰɛla imilamɓɔ jawɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤ija kuwutwaɓulula pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ umnatʰa kuɲɛ nɛsikʰunɡ̤u sɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤ininz̤i z̤ikuɲusɛ nɡ̤ɔmnatʰa nd̤ija kukulaɬɛla ɛm̤laɓɛni nd̤ikud͡ʒ̤ulɛlɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓɛliz̤wɛ nd̤iz̤iɬalisɛ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛz̤ulu nd̤iz̤iɬutʰisɛ nɡ̤awɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ nd̤ɔjiɓɛka pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntaɓa iɲama jakʰɔ nd̤ijiz̤alisɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤id̤umɓu z̤akʰɔ nd̤ilisɛz̤ɛ iɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤ɔkupʰalala kwɛɡ̤az̤i lakʰɔ lisɛ ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤iz̤alɛ iz̤iɬamɓɔ nɡ̤uwɛ nd̤ija kulisiɓɛkɛlisa iz̤ulu ɛkukukǀimɛni nd̤iz̤amɓatʰisɛ iinkwɛnkwɛz̤i z̤alɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤imɲama z̤ɔkuz̤ila nd̤ija kulisiɓɛkɛla ilanɡ̤a nɡ̤amafu nɛɲanɡ̤a inɡ̤akʰaɲisi nɡ̤ɔkukʰaɲa kwajɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ikʰaɲisɔ ɛz̤ikʰaɲisajɔ ɛz̤ulwini nd̤ija kuz̤amɓatʰisa nɡ̤ɛz̤imɲama z̤ɔkuz̤ila nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɔ nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ uɓumɲama pʰɛz̤u kwɛliz̤wɛ lakʰɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ɔjɛnz̤a iɓɛ ɓuɬunɡ̤u intliz̤ijɔ jɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛz̤ininz̤i ɛkukusɛni ukwapʰulwa kwakʰɔ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɛmaz̤wɛni ɔnɡ̤awaz̤anɡ̤a nd̤ija kuz̤imanɡ̤alisisa nɡ̤awɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤ininz̤i ɓaɓɛ namanwɛlɛ nɔkuɓa namanwɛlɛ nɡ̤awɛ ɔɔkumkani ɓaz̤ɔ ɛkulilinɡ̤isɛni ik͡xɛlɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓaɓɔ ɓaɡ̤ub̤ɛ nɡ̤amapʰaɲaz̤ɔ ɔnkɛ ɛlɔwɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkuwa kwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ik͡xɛlɛ lɔkumkani wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli lija kukufikɛla nd̤ija kujiwisa iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jakʰɔ nɡ̤amak͡xɛlɛ amaɡ̤ɔxa nɡ̤aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤aŋ̤ǀ̤az̤ɛlisi ɓasɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰala ɓalib̤ukǃɛ ik͡xat͡ʃi lɛjiputa it͡ʃaɓalalɛ jɔnkɛ iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jajɔ nd̤ija kuz̤it͡ʃaɓalalisa z̤ɔnkɛ iinkɔmɔ z̤ajɔ z̤imkɛ ɛmanz̤ini amakʰulu lunɡ̤aɓi sawaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔb̤a uɲawɔ lɔmntu namaŋǃina ɛɛnkɔmɔ anɡ̤awaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔb̤i ɔkɔ nd̤ija kuwawutʰisa amanz̤i ajɔ nɛmilamɓɔ jajɔ nd̤ijihamɓisɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɔli it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤akulɛnz̤a kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala iliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa lɛnz̤iwɛ kɛ kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala iliz̤wɛ linɡ̤aɓi najɔ inz̤alisɛkɔ jalɔ ɛkuɓakǁaɓɛlɛni ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmi ɓalɔ ɓaja kwaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a sisɔ ɛsi isimɓɔnɔnɔ sija kuv̤uɲwa nɡ̤ɔkwɛsimɓɔnɔnɔ iintɔmɓi z̤ɛɛntlanɡ̤a z̤ija kujiv̤uma nɡ̤ɔkwɛsimɓɔnɔnɔ nɡ̤ɛjiputa nanɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jajɔ jɔnkɛ z̤ija kujiv̤uma nɡ̤ɔkwɛsimɓɔnɔnɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ kalɔku kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɓini nɡ̤ɔlwɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɬanu ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu jɛnz̤a isimɛma nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jasɛjiputa ujiɬisɛlɛ jɔna nɛntɔmɓi jɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛz̤iz̤iinɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa ɛz̤wɛni lanɡ̤apʰanɮɛ naɓaɬɛ ɓaja ɛm̤ad̤ini uɮulɛ ɓani nɡ̤ɔɓuɬɛ ɓakʰɔ jiɬa ulalɛ kwaɓanɡ̤alukilɛjɔ ɓaja pʰakatʰi kwaɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ik͡xɛlɛ linikɛlwɛ ɛsanɮɛni jikǃwɛkǃwɛd̤isɛni nɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jajɔ jɔnkɛ z̤ija kutʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ajɛ iind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlɛ z̤amaɡ̤ɔxa pʰakatʰi kwɛlaɓafilɛjɔ naɓaŋǀɛd̤i ɓakʰɛ z̤itʰi ɓɛɬilɛ ɓalɛlɛ kʰɔna aɓanɡ̤alukilɛjɔ ɓɛɓulɛwɛ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ukʰɔna uasirija nɛɓanɮa lakʰɛ lɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kujɛ nɡ̤amaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa aɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓɛɓulɛwɛ ɓɛwɛ lik͡xɛlɛ aɓamaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa aɓɔ ɛnz̤iwɛ ɛm̤ad̤ini pʰakatʰi iɓanɮa lakʰɛ linɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni lakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓɛɓulɛwɛ ɓɛwɛ lik͡xɛlɛ aɓajɛ ɓɛsɔtʰusa iliz̤wɛ laɓaɬɛlijɔ ukʰɔna uɛlam nɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ ɛnɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni lakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓɛɓulɛwɛ ɓɛwɛ lik͡xɛlɛ aɓaɓɛɬɛ ɓaja ɛz̤wɛni lanɡ̤apʰant͡si ɓɛnɡ̤alukilɛ aɓajɛ ɓɛsɔtʰusa iliz̤wɛ laɓaɬɛlijɔ ɓatʰwala iɬaz̤ɔ laɓɔ naɓɛɬɛ ɓaja ɛm̤ad̤ini ɓamɛnz̤ɛla pʰakatʰi kwaɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ ɛnɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ aɓa nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kujɛ amaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ajɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓɛnɡ̤alukilɛ ɓɛɓulɛwɛ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɔtʰusa aɓasɛz̤wɛni laɓaɬɛlijɔ ɓatʰwala iɬaz̤ɔ naɓɛɬɛ ɓaja ɛm̤ad̤ini uɓɛkwɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ ukʰɔna umɛʃɛkitub̤ali nɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ ɛnɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kujɛ amaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ajɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓɛnɡ̤alukilɛ ɓɛɓulɛwɛ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛsɔtʰusɛ iliz̤wɛ laɓaɬɛlijɔ kɛ aɓaji namaɡ̤ɔxa awilɛjɔ anɡ̤awaɓanɡ̤alukilɛjɔ aɓɛɬajɔ ɓaja kwɛlaɓafilɛjɔ ɓɛnɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɔkulwa ɛɓɛkwɛ amak͡xɛlɛ aɓɔ pʰant͡si kwɛɛntlɔkɔ z̤aɓɔ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ ɓuwafikɛlɛ amatʰamɓɔ aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓajɛ ɓɛsɔtʰusa amaɡ̤ɔxa ɛz̤wɛni laɓaɬɛlijɔ nawɛ kɛ uja kwapʰulwa pʰakatʰi kwaɓanɡ̤alukilɛjɔ ulalɛ naɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ukʰɔna uɛd̤ɔm ɔɔkumkani ɓakʰɛ nɛz̤ikʰulu z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ aɓatʰi ɓɛnɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓaɓɛkwa kwaɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ɓalala naɓanɡ̤alukilɛjɔ naɓɛɬɛ ɓaja ɛm̤ad̤ini z̤ikʰɔna iinkɔsi z̤asɛntla z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ipʰɛla namat͡sid̤ɔn ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɛɬajɔ naɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ z̤id̤anilɛ nɔkɔ ɓɛz̤ikǃʰipʰukisa umɓilini nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓaz̤ɔ z̤ilɛlɛ z̤inɡ̤aɓanɡ̤alukilɛjɔ kwanaɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ z̤itʰwɛlɛ iɬaz̤ɔ laz̤ɔ naɓɛɬɛ ɓaja ɛm̤ad̤ini ufarɔ uja kuɓaɓɔna atʰutʰuz̤ɛlɛkɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ ufarɔ uɓulɛwɛ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nɛmpi jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤amnika ukuɓa ɔtʰusɛ iliz̤wɛ laɓaɬɛlijɔ ulalisiwɛ kɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓanɡ̤alukilɛjɔ kwanaɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ufarɔ nɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ kalɔku iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu tʰɛtʰa kɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ɓakɔwɛnu utʰi kuɓɔ kǁa nd̤itʰɛ iliz̤wɛ nd̤aliz̤isɛla ik͡xɛlɛ aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ ɓatʰaɓatʰa ind̤ɔd̤a jasɛz̤ipʰɛlwɛni z̤aɓɔ ɓajimisa ukuɓa iɓɛ nɡ̤umɓɔnisɛli waɓɔ jaɓɔna ik͡xɛlɛ lilifikɛla iliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ jav̤utʰɛla isiɡ̤ɔɮɔ jaɓav̤usa aɓantu kɛ ɔtʰɛ waliv̤a iz̤wi lɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ akav̤uswa ik͡xɛlɛ ɛlɔ lamtʰaɓatʰa lɔɓa sɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɛ iɡ̤az̤i lakʰɛ iz̤wi lɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ uliv̤ilɛ akav̤uswa iɡ̤az̤i lakʰɛ lɔɓa pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ ɛv̤usiwɛ anɡ̤ɛ ɛwusiz̤ilɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ umɓɔnisɛli lɔwɔ kǁa atʰɛ waliɓɔna ik͡xɛlɛ lisiz̤a akav̤utʰɛla isiɡ̤ɔɮɔ akaɓav̤usa aɓantu ik͡xɛlɛ latʰaɓatʰa kuɓɔ umpʰɛfumlɔ lɔwɔ utʰatʲatʰwɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɛ kɛ iɡ̤az̤i lakʰɛ nd̤ɔliɓiz̤a ɛsanɮɛni sɔmɓɔnisɛli lɔwɔ wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ waɓa nɡ̤umɓɔnisɛli kwinɮu kasirajɛli wɔliv̤a ɛmlɔɲɛni iliz̤wi uɓav̤usɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkupʰuma nd̤akutʰi kɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ wɛna unɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ uja inɛnɛ usukɛ unɡ̤atʰɛtʰi wɛna ukuɓa umv̤usɛlɛlɛ ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɛmkɛ ɛnɮɛlɛni jakʰɛ wɔfa jɛna ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɛ kɛ iɡ̤az̤i lakʰɛ nd̤ɔlifuna ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ wɛna kɛ kǁa utʰɛ wamv̤usɛlɛla ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni jakʰɛ ukuɓa aɓujɛ kujɔ akaɓuja ɛnɮɛlɛni jakʰɛ wɔfa jɛna nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɛ kɛ wɛna uwuɬanɡ̤ulɛ umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɔ kɛ kalɔku wɛna ɲana wɔmntu jitʰi kwinɮu kasirajɛli nijalunɡ̤isa ukutʰi iz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤ɛtʰu nɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤ɛtʰu z̤ipʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu sijaŋ̤ǀ̤uŋ̤ǀ̤utʰɛka kuz̤ɔ sinɡ̤atʰini ukupʰila jitʰi kuɓɔ nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a unakaɲɛ ukuɓa kuɓɛ mnand̤i kɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kumnand̤i ukuɓuja kɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni jakʰɛ apʰilɛ ɓujani ɓujani ɛz̤inɮɛlɛni z̤ɛnu ɛz̤imɓi jini ukuɓa nid̤ɛ nifɛ nɮu kasirajɛli wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu jitʰi kɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ɓakɔwɛnu uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓɛlunɡ̤isa aɓuji kuliɬanɡ̤ula nɡ̤ɛmini jɔk͡xɛkǃɔ lwalɔ ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ akaji kukʰuɓɛka nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkuɓuja kwakʰɛ kɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kwakʰɛ nɛlunɡ̤isa aliji kupʰila nɡ̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkɔna kwalɔ nd̤akutʰi kwilunɡ̤isa inɛnɛ lɔpʰila liz̤ɛ kɛ likʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɓalɔ lɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa ɓɔnkɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa ɓalɔ aɓuji kukʰund͡ʒ̤ulwa lɔfa nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa ɓalɔ ɛliɓɛnz̤ilɛjɔ nd̤akutʰi kɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ inɛnɛ uja aɓujɛ ɛkɔnɛni kwakʰɛ ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkusɛsikwɛni nanɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ asiɓujisɛ isiɓamɓisɔ ajimisɛlɛ intɔ ɛɬutʰwɛ nɡ̤ujɛ ahamɓɛ nɡ̤ɛmimisɛlɔ jɔɓɔmi anɡ̤ɛnz̤i nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa inɛnɛ wɔpʰila akaji z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ɔnɔ z̤akʰɛ awɔna nɡ̤az̤ɔ az̤iji kukʰund͡ʒ̤ulɛlwa kujɛ wɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkusɛsikwɛni nanɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa inɛnɛ wɔpʰila ɓatʰi kɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakɔwɛnu inɮɛla kajɛhɔv̤a ajilunɡ̤ɛlɛlɛnɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ aɓanɮɛla inɡ̤alunɡ̤ɛlɛlɛnɛjɔ lakuɓuja ilunɡ̤isa ɛɓulunɡ̤isɛni ɓalɔ lɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa lɔfa nɡ̤aɓɔ akuɓuja ɔnɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ kwakʰɛ ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkusɛsikwɛni nanɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa inɛnɛ wɔpʰila nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nitʰi kɛ inɮɛla jɛnkɔsi ajilunɡ̤ɛlɛlɛnɛ nd̤ija kuniɡ̤wɛɓa ɛlɔwɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛnɮɛla z̤akʰɛ nɮu kasirajɛli kɛ kalɔku kwatʰi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɓini ɛmv̤a kɔkutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kwɛtʰu nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛʃumi nɡ̤ɔlwɛsiɬanu ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ ɔsind̤ilɛjɔ ɛjɛrusalɛm watʰi umz̤i uɓulɛwɛ isanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a saɓa pʰɛz̤u nɡ̤ɔkuɬwa nɡ̤apʰamɓi kɔkufika kɔsind̤ilɛjɔ wawuv̤ula kɛ umlɔmɔ wad̤a wav̤ulɛka umlɔmɔ and̤aɓa saɓa sisid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu aɓaɬɛli ɛmaŋǁuwɛni ɛm̤laɓɛni wakwasirajɛli ɓat͡ʃɔ ukutʰi uaɓraham wajɛmɲɛ waliɮa iliz̤wɛ kɛ tʰina siɓaninz̤i silinikiwɛ iliz̤wɛ ukuɓa siliɮɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jitʰi kuɓɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi niɮa intɔ ɛnɛɡ̤az̤i amɛɬɔ ɛnu niwapʰakamisɛlɛ ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤wɛni z̤ɛnu nipʰalaz̤ɛ iɡ̤az̤i nɔliɮa kɛ iliz̤wɛ nimi nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ lɛnu nɛnz̤a amasikiz̤i nitʰi ɛlɔwɔ nimɛnz̤ɛ iŋǃamɓi umfaz̤i wɔmmɛlwanɛ wakʰɛ nɔliɮa kɛ iz̤ilwɛ jit͡ʃɔ kuɓɔ ukutʰi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ aɓɔ ɓasɛmaŋǁuwɛni ɓaja lik͡xɛlɛ lɔ usɛnɮɛ nd̤imnikɛlɛ ɛmaxamŋǀwɛni ukuɓa amɮɛ ɓafɛ jindʲikitʲa jɔkufa aɓasɛz̤imɓɔnisɛlwɛni nasɛmikǃɔlɔmɓɛni nd̤ija kulɛnz̤a kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala jakwankanɡ̤ala iliz̤wɛ lipʰɛlɛ ikǃʰajija lamanɮa alɔ z̤iɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala iintaɓa z̤akwasirajɛli kunɡ̤akǀand̤i ɓani kuz̤ɔ ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤akulɛnz̤a kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala jakwankanɡ̤ala iliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamasikiz̤i ɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛwɛnz̤ilɛ wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ɓakɔwɛnu ɓaŋǀɔkɔla nɡ̤awɛ nɡ̤asɛz̤ind̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni nasɛmiɲanɡ̤ɔ jɛz̤inɮu ɛlɔwɔ ɛtʰɛtʰa nɔmɲɛ ɛlɔwɔ nɔmz̤alwana wakʰɛ ɛsitʰi kʰaniz̤ɛ siv̤ɛ ukuɓa liliz̤wi ɛlijini ɛlipʰuma kujɛhɔv̤a ɓɛz̤a kuwɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuz̤a kwaɓantu ɓaɬalɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkwaɓantu ɓam ɓawɛv̤ɛ amaz̤wi akʰɔ ɓanɡ̤awɛnz̤i kuɓa ɓɛnz̤a ɔkukʰanukwa nɡ̤umlɔmɔ waɓɔ intliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ iland̤ɛla inz̤uz̤ɔ jaɓɔ ɛmɓi jaɓɔna kuɓɔ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔv̤uma inɡ̤ɔma ɛmnand̤i ɔz̤wi lijɔlilɛjɔ ɔlunɡ̤isajɔ ukuɓɛtʰa uhad̤i ɓawɛv̤ɛ amaz̤wi akʰɔ ɓanɡ̤awɛnz̤i nɔkɔ kɔtʰi kɛ ɔkɔnankɔ kusiz̤aɓaz̤i ukuɓa ɓɛkukʰɔ umprɔfɛti pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu prɔfɛta nɡ̤aɓalusi ɓakwasirajɛli prɔfɛta utʰi kuɓɔ nɡ̤aɓalusi aɓɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jɛha kɛ aɓalusi ɓakwasirajɛli aɓajɛ ɓɛz̤alusa nɡ̤ɔkwaɓɔ aɓalusi ɓaɓɛnɡ̤afanɛlɛ um̤lamɓi waɓɔ jini amaŋǃatʰa nijawaɮa uɓɔja niz̤amɓatʰisɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ ɛz̤itʲɛtʲisiwɛjɔ iz̤imv̤u nijaz̤ikǁʰɛla um̤lamɓi ɛz̤itʰʲafilɛjɔ aniz̤ɔmɛlɛz̤i ɛz̤ifajɔ aniz̤ipʰilisi ɛz̤apʰukilɛjɔ aniz̤iɓɔpʰi ɛz̤iz̤iint͡sali aniz̤iɓujisi ɛz̤id̤akilɛjɔ aniz̤ifuni niz̤iɲatʰɛla nɡ̤amanɮa kalukʰuni z̤aɓa nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤aɓi z̤aɓa kukuɮa kwamaxamŋǀwa ɔnkɛ asɛnɮɛ z̤aɓa um̤lamɓi wad̤unɡ̤ud̤ɛla ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤ɔnkɛ nasɛz̤ind̤ulini z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ waɓa um̤lamɓi ɛɓuswɛni ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛliz̤wɛ akuɓanɡ̤akʰɔ namɲɛ uwukʰatʰalɛlajɔ akwaɓakʰɔ namɲɛ uwufunajɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ɓalusind̤ini liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a iɲanisɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa um̤lamɓi ulikǁʰɔɓa um̤lamɓi uɮiwa nɡ̤amaxamŋǀwa ɔnkɛ asɛnɮɛ nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤aɓi aɓalusi ɓam ɓɛnɡ̤awukʰatʰalɛli um̤lamɓi aɓalusi ɓɛz̤alusa nɡ̤ɔkwaɓɔ ɓɛnɡ̤awalusi um̤lamɓi nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ɓalusind̤ini liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤iɓakǀʰasilɛ iɓalusi nd̤ija kuwuɓiz̤a um̤lamɓi ɛz̤anɮɛni z̤aɓɔ nd̤iɓaŋǃumamisɛ ɛkwalusɛni um̤lamɓi ɓanɡ̤aɓi saz̤alusa nɡ̤ɔkwaɓɔ aɓalusi nd̤iwuɬanɡ̤ulɛ um̤lamɓi ɛmlɔɲɛni waɓɔ unɡ̤aɓi saɓa kukuɮa kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nɡ̤ɔkwam nd̤ija kuwukʰatʰalɛla um̤lamɓi nd̤iwuv̤ɛlɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ awuv̤ɛlɛlajɔ um̤lamɓi wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkuɓakʰɔ kwakʰɛ pʰakatʰi kɔm̤lamɓi wakʰɛ ɔtʰiwɛ kǃʰu nd̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuwuv̤ɛlɛla um̤lamɓi nd̤iwuɬanɡ̤ulɛ ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɔwaɓa kuz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛmini ɛnamafu ɛnamafu amɲama nd̤ija kuwukʰupʰa ɛz̤iz̤wɛni nd̤iwuɓutʰɛ ɛmaz̤wɛni nd̤iwusɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni wawɔ nd̤iwalusɛlɛ ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwasirajɛli ɛz̤iɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni nasɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤imiwɛjɔ z̤ɛliz̤wɛ nd̤ija kuwalusɛla ɛɓutʲanini ɔɓulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ liɓɛ sɛz̤intaɓɛni ɛz̤ind̤ɛ z̤akwasirajɛli iɮɛlɔ lawɔ ɛɮɛlwɛni ɛlilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ uja kuɓutʰa kʰɔna uɮɛ utʲani ɔɓutʲɛɓilɛjɔ ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwasirajɛli mna nd̤ija um̤lamɓi nd̤iwɛnz̤ɛ uɓutʰɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ɛz̤ilaɬɛkilɛjɔ nd̤ija kuz̤ifuna nd̤iɓujisɛ ɛz̤iz̤iint͡sali nd̤iɓɔpʰɛ ɛz̤apʰukilɛjɔ nd̤iz̤ɔmɛlɛz̤ɛ ɛz̤ifajɔ kɛ ɛz̤itʲɛɓilɛjɔ nd̤ɔz̤it͡ʃaɓalalisa nɛz̤ɔmɛlɛlɛjɔ nd̤iz̤alusɛ nɡ̤ɔkusɛsikwɛni nina kɛ m̤lamɓi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤ija kuɡ̤wɛɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛɛɡ̤uʃa nɛɛɡ̤uʃa napʰakatʰi kwɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ jintɔ ɛŋǀinanɛ ukutʰi niɓuɮɛ utʲani ɔɓulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ niz̤ɛ ɔkusɛlɛjɔ kɔtʲani nikuɲ̤aʃɛ nɡ̤amaŋǃina ɛnu nisɛlɛ amanz̤i aŋ̤ǀ̤wɛnɡ̤ɛkilɛjɔ niwaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔb̤ɛ asɛlɛjɔ nɡ̤amaŋǃina ɛnu um̤lamɓi uɮa ɔɓuɲ̤aʃiwɛjɔ nɡ̤amaŋǃuna ɛnu usɛla aɡ̤ǁ̤ɔd͡ʒ̤iwɛjɔ nɡ̤amaŋǃina ɛnu nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kuz̤ɔ ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤ija kuɡ̤wɛɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛɛɡ̤uʃa ɛz̤itʲɛɓilɛjɔ nɛɛɡ̤uʃa ɛz̤iŋǃinilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa nitʰʲala nɡ̤ɛɬɛz̤a nanɡ̤ɛɡ̤ǁ̤alaɓa niz̤iɬaɓɛ nɡ̤ɛɛmpɔnd̤ɔ z̤ɛnu ɛz̤itʰʲafilɛjɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nid̤ɛ niz̤ɛnz̤ɛ z̤iɓɛ z̤iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ iliz̤wɛ nd̤ɔwusind̤isa um̤lamɓi unɡ̤aɓi saɓa likǁʰɔɓa nd̤iɡ̤wɛɓɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛɛɡ̤uʃa nɛɛɡ̤uʃa nd̤ɔmisa pʰɛz̤u kwawɔ aɓɛ mɲɛ awalusɛ umkʰɔnz̤i ud̤av̤id̤ɛ jɛna uja aɓɛ nɡ̤umalusi wawɔ jɛna jɛhɔv̤a nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wawɔ umkʰɔnz̤i ud̤av̤id̤ɛ aɓɛ sisikʰulu pʰakatʰi kwawɔ jɛhɔv̤a nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ nd̤ija kuwɛnz̤ɛla umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɔkǁɔlɔ nd̤iwapʰɛlisɛ amaxamŋǀwa amaɓi ɛliz̤wɛni uɬalɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ukʰɔlɔsilɛ ulalɛ ɛmaɬatʰini nd̤ɔwɛnz̤a wɔna kwanɛɛnd̤awɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛnd̤ulini jam uɓɛ jint͡sikɛlɛlɔ nd̤iɬisɛ imv̤ula nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛlililɔ ija kuɓa jimv̤ula jɛnt͡sikɛlɛlɔ umtʰi wasɛnɮɛ wɔnika isikǃʰamɔ sawɔ iliz̤wɛ linikɛ indʲɛɓɔ jalɔ ɓaŋǃaɓɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni waɓɔ ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɛkuz̤apʰulɛni iz̤ikɛji z̤ɛdʲɔkʰwɛ nd̤iɓaɬanɡ̤ulɛ ɛsanɮɛni saɓɔ ɓaɓɛɓakʰɔnz̤isa aɓaji kuɓa saɓa likǁʰɔɓa lɛɛntlanɡ̤a anɡ̤aɓaɮi amaxamŋǀwa ɛliz̤wɛ ɓaɬalɛ ɓɛkʰɔlɔsilɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ uɓɔtʰusajɔ nd̤ɔɓav̤ɛlisɛla isitʲalɔ sɔkuɓa lud̤umɔ ɓanɡ̤aɓi jinɮala ɛz̤wɛni ɓanɡ̤aɓi satʰwala ɬaz̤ɔ lɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɓaja kwaz̤i ukuɓa jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ waɓɔ nd̤inaɓɔ ɓanɡ̤aɓantu ɓam ɓɔna inɮu kasirajɛli it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nina kɛ ninɡ̤um̤lamɓi um̤lamɓi wɛɮɛlɔ nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɛnu it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ kalɔku iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu b̤ɛkisa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ ɛntaɓɛni jakwasɛhirɛ uprɔfɛtɛ nɡ̤ajɔ utʰi kujɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ikukǀʰasilɛ ntaɓa jakwasɛhirɛ nd̤ɔsɔlulɛla isanɮa pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala jakwankanɡ̤ala imiz̤i jakʰɔ nd̤ija kujɛnz̤a amaŋǁuwa uɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala waz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa waɓa nɔɓut͡ʃaɓa ɔɓunɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ waɓanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni sɛk͡xɛlɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkusind̤ɛka kwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɔkupʰɛla nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kukwɛnz̤a iɡ̤az̤i lɔkusukɛla kɛ iɡ̤az̤i nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa unɡ̤alitʰijanɡ̤a iɡ̤az̤i lɔkusukɛla iɡ̤az̤i nd̤ɔjɛnz̤a kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala jakwankanɡ̤ala intaɓa jakwasɛhirɛ nd̤iŋǃumlɛ kujɔ ɔɮulajɔ nɔɓujajɔ nd̤ija kuz̤iz̤alisa iintaɓa z̤akʰɛ nɡ̤aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ ɓakʰɛ ɛz̤ind̤ulini z̤akʰɔ nasɛmifulɛni jakʰɔ nasɛz̤iɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ɓawɛ kuz̤ɔ nd̤ija kukwɛnz̤a kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ imiz̤i jakʰɔ inɡ̤ɛmiwa naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa usitʰi iintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤i z̤ɔmɓini namaz̤wɛ ɔmaɓini nɡ̤awam sɔwaɬutʰa ujɛhɔv̤a ukʰɔna nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ nd̤iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kwɛnz̤a kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɔ nanɡ̤ɔkɔɓukʰwɛlɛ ɓakʰɔ ɔɓɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɛntijɔ jakʰɔ nd̤iz̤az̤isɛ kuɓɔ kǁɛnikwɛni nd̤itʰɛ nd̤akuɡ̤wɛɓa uja kwaz̤i ukuɓa jɛhɔv̤a nd̤ikuv̤ilɛ kɔnkɛ ukuɡ̤iɓa kwakʰɔ ɔwakutʰɛtʰajɔ nɡ̤ɛɛntaɓa z̤akwasirajɛli usitʰi kusɛnkanɡ̤ala kuz̤ɔ siz̤inikiwɛ ukuɓa z̤iɓɛ kukuɮa niz̤ikʰulisɛlɛ nɡ̤am nɡ̤ɛmilɔmɔ jɛnu nawafumɓa pʰɛz̤u amaz̤wi ɛnu nd̤iv̤ilɛ kɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi lakuv̤uja iɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ nd̤ɔkwɛnz̤a kuɓɛ sɛnkanɡ̤ala kuwɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ waliv̤ujɛlajɔ lɛnɮu kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa ɓɛkusɛnkanɡ̤ala kulɔ nd̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kuwɛ kuja kuɓa sɛnkanɡ̤ala kuwɛ ntaɓa jakwasɛhirɛ nɛlakwaɛd̤ɔm lɔnkɛ lipʰɛla ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu prɔfɛta nɡ̤az̤ɔ iintaɓa z̤akwasirajɛli utʰi z̤intaɓa z̤akwasirajɛli liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ut͡ʃaɓa lusitʰi nɡ̤ani t͡ʃɔt͡ʃɔ imimanɡ̤ɔ ɛnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ iɓililifa lɛtʰu nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ prɔfɛta utʰi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɛwɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɓɛnɛnz̤ɛ kwaɓa sɛnkanɡ̤ala ɓaniɡ̤iɲa nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ukuz̤ɛ niɓɛ lamasalɛla ɛɛntlanɡ̤a naɓa sɛmilɔɲɛni jaɓanɔlwimi nasɛntlɛɓɛnd̤wanɛni jaɓantu nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ z̤intaɓa z̤akwasirajɛli liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi lɛnkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kwiintaɓa nakwiind̤uli kwiz̤iɬamɓɔ kwiind̤awɔ ɛz̤ib̤axilɛjɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤amaŋǁuwa nakwimiz̤i ɛʃijiwɛjɔ ɛjaɓa likǁʰɔɓa nɛsiɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛlɔ samasalɛla ɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi iɲanisɔ nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ wɔɓukʰwɛlɛ ɓam nɡ̤awɔ amasalɛla ɛɛntlanɡ̤a nanɡ̤amaɛd̤ɔm ɔnkɛ ɛpʰɛla alɛnz̤ɛ lawɔ iliz̤wɛ ɛv̤ujilɛ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jɔnkɛ ɛkǀukukǀɛz̤a nɡ̤ɔmpʰɛfumlɔ ukuz̤ɛ alilaɬɛ liɓɛ likǁʰɔɓa nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ prɔfɛta nɡ̤ɔm̤laɓa wakwasirajɛli utʰi kwiintaɓa nakwiind̤uli kwiz̤iɬamɓɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ nd̤inɔɓukʰwɛlɛ nd̤inɔɓuʃuʃu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa nilitʰwɛlɛ iɬaz̤ɔ lɛɛntlanɡ̤a nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi mna nd̤isipʰakamisilɛ isanɮa iɲanisɔ iintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɔna z̤ija kutʰwala iɬaz̤ɔ laz̤ɔ kɛ z̤intaɓa z̤akwasirajɛli nija kuv̤ɛlisa amasɛɓɛ iz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ɛnu niz̤ikǁakatʰɛlɛ aɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sɛkukufupʰi ukuv̤ɛla kwaz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nijaɓɔna nd̤inɡ̤akuni nd̤ɔɓujɛla niliɲwɛ niɬwajɛlwɛ nd̤ija kwand̤isɛla aɓantu pʰɛz̤u kwɛnu jɔnkɛ inɮu kasirajɛli jɔnkɛ ipʰɛla imiwɛ imiz̤i akʰiwɛ amaŋǁuwa nd̤ija kwand̤isɛla aɓantu kɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛnu ɓand̤ɛ ɓakǃʰamɛ nd̤inɛnz̤ɛ nimiwɛ nɡ̤ɔkwanɡ̤apʰamɓili kɛ nd̤inɛnz̤ɛlɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔkwasɛkukǃalɛni kwɛnu naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ɔhamɓisa aɓantu pʰɛz̤u kwɛnu aɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli ɓakuz̤uz̤ɛ uɓɛ laɓɔ unɡ̤asaɓuji uɓaɬutʰɛ aɓantwana it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɓatʰi kuwɛ usisiɮaɓantu uluɬutʰɛ aɓantwana uɬanɡ̤a lwakʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ akuji kuɓuja uɓɛ sisiɮaɓantu unɡ̤aɓuji ulukʰuɓɛkisɛ uɬanɡ̤a lwakʰɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a and̤iji kuɓuja nd̤ikuv̤isɛ iɬaz̤ɔ lɛɛntlanɡ̤a unɡ̤aɓuji usitʰwalɛ isiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ sɛz̤iz̤wɛ unɡ̤aɓuji ulukʰuɓɛkisɛ uɬanɡ̤a lwakʰɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika kɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu kǁa inɮu kasirajɛli jaɓɛ iɬɛli ɛm̤laɓɛni wajɔ ɓawɛnz̤a iŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛla z̤aɓɔ nanɡ̤ɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤aɓɔ iinɮɛla z̤aɓɔ pʰamɓi z̤aɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɓuŋǃamɓi ɓɔmfaz̤i ɔnɔmz̤i nd̤apʰalaz̤a uɓuʃuʃu ɓam pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤az̤i aɓaɓɛlipʰalaz̤ɛ ɛz̤wɛni ɛlɔ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkulɛnz̤a iŋǃamɓi kwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ nd̤aɓɛnz̤a ɓaɓa ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɓakǀʰitʰwakǀʰitʰwa ɛmaz̤wɛni nd̤aɓaɡ̤wɛɓa nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛnɮɛla z̤aɓɔ nanɡ̤ɔkwɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤aɓɔ ɓafika ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɛz̤ɔ ɓaɓɛsija kuz̤ɔ ɓaliɬamɓɛla iɡ̤ama ɛliŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛkuɓɛni ɓɛkusitʰiwa nɡ̤aɓɔ nɡ̤aɓantu ɓakajɛhɔv̤a aɓa ɓapʰumɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɛ nd̤aɓa nɔfɛfɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤ama ɛliŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛɓɛjiliɬamɓɛlɛ inɮu kasirajɛli ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni aɓaja kuz̤ɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jitʰi kwinɮu kasirajɛli it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi and̤ɛnz̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnu nɮu kasirajɛli nd̤ɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɡ̤ama ɛliŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛniliɬamɓɛlɛjɔ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɛɓɛ nijɛ kuz̤ɔ nd̤ija kuliŋ̤ǀ̤walisa iɡ̤ama ɛlikʰulu ɛliɬand͡ʒ̤ɛlwɛjɔ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɛniliɬamɓɛlɛjɔ pʰakatʰi kwaz̤ɔ ukuz̤ɛ z̤az̤i iintlanɡ̤a ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤akuz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisa nɡ̤ɔkwam ɛmɛɬwɛni az̤ɔ nd̤ɔnitʰaɓatʰa kɛ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni nd̤iniɓutʰɛ ɛmaz̤wɛni ɔnkɛ nd̤inisɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni wɛnu nd̤ija kunit͡ʃiz̤a nɡ̤amanz̤i am̤lɔpʰɛ niɬamɓulukɛ nd̤iniɬamɓululɛ kuɓuŋǃamɓi ɓɛnu ɓɔnkɛ nakwiz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤ɛnu z̤ɔnkɛ nd̤ɔninika intliz̤ijɔ ɛnt͡ʃa nd̤ininikɛ umɔja ɔmt͡ʃa nɡ̤apʰakatʰi kwɛnu nd̤ijisusɛ intliz̤ijɔ ɛlilitʲɛ ɛɲamɛni jɛnu nd̤ininikɛ intliz̤ijɔ ɛjiɲama nd̤ɔfaka umɔja nɡ̤apʰakatʰi kwɛnu nd̤inɛnz̤ɛ nihamɓɛ nɡ̤ɛmimisɛlɔ jam niwaɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ amasikɔ niwɛnz̤ɛ nija kuɬala ɛz̤wɛni ɛnd̤alinika ɔɔjiɬɔ niɓɛ nɡ̤aɓantu ɓam nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nd̤ija kunisind̤isa ɛɓuŋǃamɓini ɓɛnu ɓɔnkɛ nd̤iɓiz̤ɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nd̤ijand̤isɛ nd̤inɡ̤aniz̤isɛli inɮala nd̤ɔsand̤isa isikǃʰamɔ sɔmtʰi nɔkupʰuma ɛmasimini ukuz̤ɛ ninɡ̤aɓuji namkɛliswɛ isiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ sɛnɮala ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni nija kuz̤ikʰumɓula kɛ iinɮɛla z̤ɛnu ɛz̤imɓi nɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤ɛnu ɛz̤inɡ̤alunɡ̤ilɛjɔ niz̤ik͡xukǃukɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛnu nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamasikiz̤i ɛnu and̤iji kukwɛnz̤a ɔku nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnu it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a makwaz̤ɛkɛ ɔkɔ d̤anani niɓɛ nɛɬaz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɛnɮɛla z̤ɛnu nɮu kasirajɛli it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛmini ɛnd̤ija kuniɬamɓulula nɡ̤ajɔ ɛɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁɛni ɓɛnu ɓɔnkɛ nd̤ija kujɛnz̤a imiz̤i ukuɓa imiwɛ akʰiwɛ amaŋǁuwa iliz̤wɛ ɛɓɛ kusɛnkanɡ̤ala kulɔ lija kuliɲwa ɛnd̤awɛni jɔkuɓa ɓɛkusɛnkanɡ̤ala kulɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɮulajɔ ɓaja kutʰi ɛli liz̤wɛ ɓɛkusɛnkanɡ̤ala kulɔ lisukɛ laɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmjɛz̤ɔ wasɛɛd̤ɛn nɛmiz̤i ɛɓɛjib̤axilɛ ɛɓinɡ̤amaŋǁuwa ɛɓiɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ulwɛ imiwɛ iŋǃatʲisiwɛ z̤ija kwaz̤i kɛ iintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤isɛlɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ukuɓa jɛhɔv̤a nd̤akʰa intɔ ɛɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ulwɛjɔ nd̤ijitʲalɛ ind̤awɔ ɛɓɛ kusɛnkanɡ̤ala kujɔ mna jɛhɔv̤a nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ nd̤ija kwɛnz̤a it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤alɛ ntɔ nd̤isaja kukǃukǃɛlwa jinɮu kasirajɛli ukuɓa nd̤iɓɛnz̤ɛlɛ nd̤ija kuɓand̤isa ɓaɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔm̤lamɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔm̤lamɓi ɔnɡ̤amad̤ini aŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔm̤lamɓi wasɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ajɔ amisiwɛjɔ ukuz̤ala jimiɬamɓi jaɓantu ija kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ imiz̤i ɛnɡ̤amaŋǁuwa ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a saɓa pʰɛz̤u isanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a wapʰuma ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ikumɔja wand̤iɓɛka ɛntilini pʰakatʰi jɔna kɛ iz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤amatʰamɓɔ wand̤iɮulisa kuwɔ wand̤id͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤isa nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ jaɓɔna ɛɓɛmaninz̤i kakʰulu ɛntilini lɛjɔ jaɓɔna ɛɓɛsɛlɔmilɛ kakʰulu watʰi kɛ ɲana wɔmntu aja kupʰila kɛ matʰamɓɔ nd̤atʰi nkɔsi jɛhɔv̤a kwaz̤i wɛna watʰi prɔfɛta pʰɛz̤u matʰamɓɔ utʰi kuwɔ matʰamɓɔnd̤ini liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a matʰamɓɔ ukutʰi nijaɓɔna nd̤inɡ̤ɛnisa umɔja nija kupʰila kɛ nd̤ija imisipʰa nd̤imilisɛ iɲama nd̤inalɛkɛ nɡ̤ɔlusu nd̤ifakɛ umɔja nɡ̤apʰakatʰi kwɛnu nipʰilɛ naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤aprɔfɛta nɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓɛnd̤iwisɛlwɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ kwaɓakʰɔ isand̤i nd̤akuprɔfɛta nankɔ kuxaʃaz̤a asɔnd̤ɛlɛlana amatʰamɓɔ itʰamɓɔ lasɔnd̤ɛla kwitʰamɓɔ lalɔ nd̤akʰanɡ̤ɛla nankɔ kukʰɔ imisipʰa kuwɔ jamila iɲama kwalɛka lutʰaɓatʰɛla pʰɛz̤ulu umɔja kɛ awaɓakʰɔ watʰi prɔfɛta kuwɔ umɔja prɔfɛta ɲana wɔmntu utʰi kuwɔ umɔja it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi v̤ɛla mɔja kwimimɔja jɔminɛ upʰɛfumlɛlɛ kwaɓa ɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ ɓapʰilɛ nd̤aprɔfɛta kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓɛnd̤iwisɛlwɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤akɔ wanɡ̤ɛna umɔja kuwɔ ɓapʰila ɓɛma nɡ̤ɛɛɲawɔ umkʰɔsi ɔmkʰulu kakʰulu kunɛnɛ watʰi kɛ ɲana wɔmntu matʰamɓɔ jinɮu kasirajɛli jɔnkɛ jaɓɔna ɓatʰi amatʰamɓɔ ɛtʰu ɔmilɛ nɛtʰɛmɓa lɛtʰu lid̤akilɛ siŋǃaɲulwɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ prɔfɛta utʰi kuɓɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤ija kuwav̤ula amaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ɛnu nd̤iniɲusɛ nipʰumɛ ɛmaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni ɛnu ɓantu ɓam nd̤inisɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni wakwasirajɛli nija kwaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɛkuwav̤ulɛni amaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ɛnu nasɛkuniɲusɛni nipʰumɛ ɛmaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛni ɛnu ɓantu ɓam nd̤ɔfaka umɔja nipʰilɛ nd̤iniɓɛkɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni wɛnu naz̤i ukuɓa jɛhɔv̤a nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ nd̤ija kwɛnz̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu tʰaɓatʰɛla kuwɛ intɔnɡ̤a iɓɛ ɲɛ ub̤alɛ kujɔ utʰi ɛkajud̤a nɛjɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli amaɮɛlanɛ akʰɛ utʰaɓatʰɛ ɛɲɛ intɔnɡ̤a ub̤alɛ kujɔ utʰi ɛkajɔsɛfu intɔnɡ̤a kaɛfrajim nɛnɮu jɔnkɛ kasirajɛli amaɮɛlanɛ akʰɛ uz̤isɔnd̤ɛz̤ɛ kɛ ɛɲɛ kwɛɲɛ z̤iɓɛ ntɔnɡ̤aɲɛ z̤iɓɛ ntɔɲɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ ɓɔtʰi ɓakutʰɛtʰa nawɛ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ɓakɔwɛnu ɓɛsitʰi akasikǁɛlɛli z̤ijintɔni ɛz̤i ntɔnɡ̤a kuwɛ utʰi wɛna kuɓɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤ija kujitʰaɓatʰa intɔnɡ̤a kajɔsɛfu ɛsɛsanɮɛni sikaɛfrajim nɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ikasirajɛli amaɮɛlanɛ akʰɛ ɛnd̤iwaɓɛkɛ kujɔ nd̤awɔɲɛ nɛntɔnɡ̤a kajud̤a nd̤iɓɛnz̤ɛ ɓaɓɛ ntɔnɡ̤aɲɛ ɓaɓɛ ntɔɲɛ ɛsanɮɛni iintɔnɡ̤a ɔb̤alɛ kuz̤ɔ z̤iz̤ɛ z̤iɓɛ sɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ uz̤ɛ utʰi kuɓɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤ija kuɓatʰaɓatʰa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli pʰakatʰi kwɛɛntlanɡ̤a aɓahamɓa kuz̤ɔ nd̤iɓaɓutʰɛ ɓav̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nd̤iɓasɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni waɓɔ nd̤ɔɓɛnz̤a luɬanɡ̤a luɲɛ ɛliz̤wɛni ɛlɔ ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwasirajɛli aɓɛ mɲɛ ɛnɡ̤ukumkani waɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓanɡ̤aɓuji ɓaɓɛ z̤iintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤imɓini ɓanɡ̤aɓuji ɓaɬukɛ ɓaɓɛ z̤iz̤ikumkani ɛz̤iɓini aɓaji kuɓuja ɓaz̤ɛnz̤ɛ iiŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ nanɡ̤ɛz̤intɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤inɛz̤ɔtʰɛ nanɡ̤ɛz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤aɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ kɛ nd̤ɔɓasind̤isa ɛmakʰajɛni aɓɔ ɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛsɔna kuwɔ nd̤iɓaɬamɓululɛ ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓantu ɓam nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ umkʰɔnz̤i ud̤av̤id̤ɛ wɔɓa nɡ̤ukumkani kuɓɔ aɓɛ nɡ̤umalusi ɔmɲɛ kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓahamɓɛ nɡ̤amasikɔ ɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ imimisɛlɔ jam ɓajɛnz̤ɛ ɓɔɬala ɛz̤wɛni ɛlɔ nd̤alinika umkʰɔnz̤i ujakɔɓi aɓaɓɛɬɛli kulɔ ɔɔjisɛ ɓaɬalɛ kɛ kʰɔna ɓɔna naɓantwana ɓaɓantwana ɓaɓɔ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni ud̤av̤id̤ɛ umkʰɔnz̤i aɓɛ sisikʰulu saɓɔ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ nd̤ɔɓɛnz̤ɛla umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɔkǁɔlɔ uja kuɓa nɡ̤umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɔnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ kuɓɔ nd̤iɓamisɛ nd̤iɓand̤isɛ nd̤iɓɛkɛ iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jam pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ umŋǃuɓa uja kuɓa pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ nd̤iɓɛ nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓantu ɓam z̤az̤i iintlanɡ̤a ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɔŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛ amasirajɛli kǁa iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jam ija kuɓakʰɔ pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ kɛ kalɔku iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a lisitʰi ɲana wɔmntu ɓub̤ɛkisɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ kuɡ̤ɔɡ̤i wasɛz̤wɛni lakwamaɡ̤ɔɡ̤i isikʰulu sakwarɔʃɛ nɔmɛʃɛki nɔtub̤ali uprɔfɛtɛ nɡ̤ajɛ jitʰi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ikukǀʰasilɛ ɡ̤ɔɡ̤i sikʰulu sakwarɔʃɛ nɔmɛʃɛki nɔtub̤ali nd̤ija kukupʰamɓanisa nd̤ikufakɛ amakʰɔŋ̰ǀ̰ɔ ɛmiɬatʰini nd̤ikuxɔlɛ nɛmpi jakʰɔ jɔnkɛ amahaʃɛ naɓamahaʃɛ aɓakǁʰɔɓɛ ɓapʰɛlɛlisɛla ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla iɓanɮa ɛlikʰulu ɓɛnamakʰaka nɛɛnɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ ɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ amak͡xɛlɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓɛnamapɛrsi namakuʃi namaputi ɔnkɛ ɛpʰɛla ɛnɛɛnɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ nɛz̤iɡ̤ǀ̤inantlɔkɔ uɡ̤ɔmɛrɛ namaɬɛlɔ akʰɛ ɔnkɛ nɛnɮu katɔɡ̤arma ɛz̤inɡ̤ɔnt͡sini z̤asɛntla inamaɬɛlɔ akʰɛ ɔnkɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤ininz̤i z̤inawɛ lunɡ̤a uz̤ilunɡ̤isɛlɛ iintɔ z̤ɔnkɛ wɛna nɛɓanɮa lakʰɔ lɔnkɛ ɛliɓiz̤ɛlwɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ kuwɛ uɓɛ nɡ̤umɡ̤ǀ̤ini walɔ ɛmv̤a kwɛmiɬa ɛmininz̤i uja kuv̤ɛlɛlwa ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɲaka lɛjɔ uja ɛliz̤wɛni ɛliɓujisiwɛjɔ ɛk͡xɛlɛni liɓutʰiwɛ ɛz̤iz̤wɛni ɛz̤ininz̤i ufikɛ ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwasirajɛli ɛz̤aɬala z̤ib̤axilɛ lɔna likʰut͡ʃwɛ ɛz̤iz̤wɛni ɓaz̤a ɓaɬala ɓɛkʰɔlɔsilɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla uja kuɲuka uz̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsipʰanɡ̤ɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlifu ukulisiɓɛkɛla iliz̤wɛ wɛna namaɬɛlɔ akʰɔ ɔnkɛ nɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤ininz̤i ɛz̤inawɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤alɔɔ kuja kutʰi kǃatʰa iz̤intɔ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɔ ukǀinɡ̤ɛ iŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a ɛmɓi uja kutʰi nd̤ija kuɲuka nd̤ijɛ ɛz̤wɛni lamapʰanɮɛ nd̤ija kuɓafikɛla aɓaz̤ɔlilɛjɔ aɓaɬɛli ɓɛkʰɔlɔsilɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla aɓaɬɛli ɓɛnɡ̤ɛnaz̤ind̤ɔnɡ̤a ɓɛnɡ̤ɛnamiv̤alɔ naz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ ukuɓa utʰimɓɛ uɬasɛlɛ amakǁʰɔɓa usiɓujisɛlɛ isanɮa sakʰɔ kumaŋǁuwa amiwɛjɔ nakuɓantu aɓaɬanɡ̤anisiwɛjɔ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ɓɛz̤uz̤ɛ imfujɔ nɛmpaɬa aɓaɬɛli ɛsaz̤ulwini sɔm̤laɓa ɔɔʃɛb̤a nɔd̤ɛd̤an naɓaxwɛɓi ɓasɛtarʃiʃɛ nɛɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ɛz̤int͡ʃa z̤aɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɓaja kutʰi kuwɛ uz̤ɛ kutʰimɓa ukuɓa liɬasɛlɛ amakǁʰɔɓa iɓanɮa lakʰɔ ɔliɓiz̤ɛlɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ ukuɓa limkɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ litʰaɓatʰɛ imfujɔ nɛmpaɬa litʰimɓɛ kakʰulu nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ prɔfɛta ɲana wɔmntu utʰi kuɡ̤ɔɡ̤i it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi akuji kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ ɛkuɬalɛni kwaɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli ɓɛkʰɔlɔsilɛ uja kujaz̤i lɔɔ ntɔ uja kupʰuma ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɔ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɔnt͡sini z̤asɛntla wɛna nɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤ininz̤i ɛz̤inawɛ ɓɛkʰwɛlɛ ɛmahaʃɛni ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla iɓanɮa ɛlikʰulu ɛninz̤i uɲukɛ uɓafikɛlɛ ɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlifu ukuɓa ulisiɓɛkɛlɛ iliz̤wɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɬa kuja kuɓakʰɔ ɔkɔ nd̤ikusɛ ulifikɛlɛ iliz̤wɛ ukuz̤ɛ iintlanɡ̤a z̤ind̤az̤i ɛkuz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛni kuwɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni az̤ɔ ɡ̤ɔɡ̤i it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤uwɛ lɔwa nd̤and̤itʰɛtʰa jɛna nɡ̤ɛɛmini z̤amand̤ulɔ nɡ̤ɔmlɔmɔ waɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓam aɓaprɔfɛti ɓakwasirajɛli aɓaɓɛprɔfɛta imiɲaka kwɛz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛlitʰi nd̤ɔkuz̤isa pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ kuja kutʰi nɡ̤alɔɔ nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkuwufikɛla kukaɡ̤ɔɡ̤i um̤laɓa wakwasirajɛli it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ɓuɲukɛ uɓuʃuʃu ɓam ɛmatʰatʰɛni kɛ nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ nd̤inɔɓukʰwɛlɛ nd̤inɔmlilɔ wɔkupʰupʰuma kɔmsind̤ɔ iɲanisɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ kuja kuɓakʰɔ ukuɲikima ɔkukʰulu ɛm̤laɓɛni wakwasirajɛli z̤ija kuɲikima pʰamɓi iintlanz̤i z̤ɔlwanɮɛ nɛɛntaka z̤ɛz̤ulu namaxamŋǀwa asɛnɮɛ nɛz̤inamɓuz̤anɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤inamɓuz̤ɛlajɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni naɓantu ɓɔnkɛ aɓasɛɓuswɛni ɓɔm̤laɓa z̤iɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ulwɛ iintaɓa iwɛ imikǁawuka z̤ɔnkɛ iind̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤iwɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni nd̤ɔmɓiz̤ɛla ik͡xɛlɛ ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤am z̤ɔnkɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ik͡xɛlɛ lɔmntu lija kumz̤alwana wakʰɛ nd̤ija kumɡ̤wɛɓa nɡ̤ɛndʲikitʲa jɔkufa nanɡ̤ɛɡ̤az̤i nanɡ̤ɛsipʰanɡ̤ɔ ɛsikʰukulajɔ nanɡ̤amatʲɛ ɛsikǀʰɔtʰɔ umlilɔ nɛsulfurɛ nd̤iwunisɛ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ napʰɛz̤u kwamaɬɛlɔ akʰɛ napʰɛz̤u kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤ininz̤i ɛz̤inajɛ nd̤ija kuz̤ikʰulisa nd̤iz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛ nd̤iz̤az̤isɛ nɡ̤ɔkwam ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛz̤ininz̤i z̤az̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu prɔfɛta nɡ̤ɔɡ̤ɔɡ̤i utʰi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ikukǀʰasilɛ ɡ̤ɔɡ̤i sikʰulu sakwarɔʃɛ nɔmɛʃɛki nɔtub̤ali nd̤ija kukupʰamɓanisa nd̤ikuxɔlɛ nd̤ikuɲusɛ upʰumɛ ɛz̤inɡ̤ɔnt͡sini z̤asɛntla nd̤ikusɛ ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwasirajɛli nd̤ɔsitʰi kǃʰwitʰi isapʰɛtʰa sakʰɔ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ sɔkʰɔɬɔ nd̤iz̤iwisɛ iintɔlɔ z̤akʰɔ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ sɔkunɛnɛ uja ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwasirajɛli wɛna namaɬɛlɔ akʰɔ ɔnkɛ nɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤inawɛ nd̤ija kukunikɛla ɛz̤intakɛni ɛz̤ikǁwilajɔ z̤ɛɛntlɔɓɔ nɡ̤ɛɛntlɔɓɔ nasɛmaxamŋǀwɛni asɛnɮɛ ukuɓa uɓɛ kukuɮa uja ɛɓuswɛni ɓɛliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤itʰɛtʰilɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nɔtʰumɛla umlilɔ kwamaɡ̤ɔɡ̤i nakuɓɛmi ɓɛz̤ikǃitʰi aɓakʰɔlɔsilɛjɔ ɓaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kulaz̤isa iɡ̤ama ɛliŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli nd̤inɡ̤aɓuji nd̤iliŋ̤ǀ̤ɔlisɛ iɡ̤ama ɛliŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤az̤i iintlanɡ̤a ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kwasirajɛli jaɓɔna lɛ ntɔ ijɛz̤a ija kuɓakʰɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a jilɔɔ nd̤and̤itʰɛtʰa jɔna kɛ ɓaja kupʰuma aɓɛmi ɓɛmiz̤i jakwasirajɛli ɓapʰɛmɓɛ ɓaɓasɛ umlilɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤ik͡xwɛkǃɛ nanɡ̤ɛɛnɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ nanɡ̤amakʰaka nɡ̤ɛz̤apʰɛtʰa nanɡ̤ɛɛntɔlɔ nanɡ̤ɛɛnd̤uku nanɡ̤ɛz̤ikʰali ɓapʰɛmɓɛ umlilɔ nɡ̤az̤ɔ imiɲaka ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ aɓaji kutʰɛz̤a z̤iinkuni ɛnɮɛ ɓanɡ̤aɡ̤awuli nasɛmaɬatʰini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaja kuwupʰɛmɓa nɡ̤ɛz̤ik͡xwɛkǃɛ umlilɔ ɓatʰimɓɛ kwaɓɔ ɓaɓɛtʰind͡ʒ̤wɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ ɓapʰanɡ̤ɛ aɓaɓɛpʰanɡ̤wɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kuja kutʰi nɡ̤alɔɔ nd̤imnikɛ uɡ̤ɔɡ̤i ind̤awɔ apʰɔ lija kuɓa kʰɔna iŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa lakʰɛ kwasirajɛli waɓaɮuli nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɛlwanɮɛ uɓav̤alɛlɛ aɓaɮuli ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛlɛ kʰɔna uɡ̤ɔɡ̤i nɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jakʰɛ jɔnkɛ ɓatʰi nɡ̤umfula wɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ kaɡ̤ɔɡ̤i inɮu kasirajɛli jɔɓa nɛɛɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ iɓaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ukuz̤ɛ ɓaliɬamɓululɛ iliz̤wɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛli ɓaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛ kuɓɛ lud̤umɔ kuɓɔ nd̤iz̤iz̤ukisajɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ɓaja kuɓalula amad̤ɔd̤a anɔmɔnd̤ɛ akǀand̤akǀand̤a ɛliz̤wɛni nahamɓa nalawɔ akǀand̤akǀand̤ajɔ aŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛ aɓasɛlɛjɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓɛliz̤wɛ ukuɓa aliɬamɓululɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛɛɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ aja kuliɡ̤ɔkǀaɡ̤ɔkǀa ɓaja kukǀand̤a aɓakǀand̤akǀand̤a ɛliz̤wɛni ɓaɓɔnɛ itʰamɓɔ lɔmntu ɓamisɛ umtʰɛlɛkɛlɛlɔ ɛkǀalɛni kwalɔ ɓad̤ɛ aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓi aɓɔ ɓaliŋ̤ǀ̤waɓɛ ɛmfulɛni wɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ kaɡ̤ɔɡ̤i iɡ̤ama lɔmz̤i ɔkʰɔna lija kuɓa nɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ ɓaliɬamɓululɛ kɛ iliz̤wɛ wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jitʰi z̤ɛɛntlɔɓɔ nɡ̤ɛɛntlɔɓɔ nakumaxamŋǀwa ɔnkɛ asɛnɮɛ ɓutʰanani niz̤ɛ z̤iɬanɡ̤anisɛni nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni ɛnd̤iniɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɛjɔ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɔmkʰulu ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwasirajɛli niɮɛ iɲama nisɛlɛ iɡ̤az̤i nija kuɮa iɲama jamaɡ̤ɔxa nisɛlɛ iɡ̤az̤i lɛz̤ikʰulu z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi iinkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa namatakanɛ nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ ɛz̤int͡ʃa ɛz̤itʲɛtʲisiwɛjɔ z̤asɛb̤aʃan z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ipʰɛla nɔɮa amaŋǃatʰa niɬutʰɛ nisɛlɛ iɡ̤az̤i niŋǁilɛ ɛmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni ɛnd̤iniɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɛjɔ niɬutʰɛ ɛsitʰɛɓɛni nɡ̤amahaʃɛ nanɡ̤aɓamahaʃɛ nɡ̤amaɡ̤ɔxa namad̤ɔd̤a ɔnkɛ ɔkulwa it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kuɓumisa uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓam ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni z̤iwuɓɔnɛ iintlanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ umɡ̤wɛɓɔ ɛnd̤ija kuwɛnz̤a nɛsanɮa ɛnd̤ija kuz̤ɔ ija kwaz̤i inɮu kasirajɛli ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ itʰaɓatʰɛla kujɔ lɛ isɛ napʰi nɛɛntlanɡ̤a z̤ija kwaz̤i ukuɓa inɮu kasirajɛli jatʰind͡ʒ̤wa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɓamɛnɛz̤ajɔ nd̤aɓusitʰɛlisa uɓusɔ ɓam kuɓɔ nd̤aɓanikɛla ɛsanɮɛni saɓaɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli ɓaɓɔ ɓawa lik͡xɛlɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla nd̤aɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔɓuŋǃamɓi ɓaɓɔ nanɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤aɓɔ nd̤aɓusitʰɛlisa uɓusɔ ɓam kuɓɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi kalɔku nd̤ija kukuɓujisa ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kukajakɔɓi nd̤isikwɛ jimfɛsanɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnɮu jɔnkɛ kasirajɛli nd̤iɓɛ nɔɓukʰwɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama ɛliŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓaja kulitʰwala iɬaz̤ɔ laɓɔ nɔɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ ɓaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓɛmɛnɛz̤a nɡ̤aɓɔ ɛkuɬalɛni kwaɓɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni waɓɔ ɓɛkʰɔlɔsilɛ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ uɓɔtʰusajɔ ɛkuɓaɓujisɛni ɛz̤iz̤wɛni ɛkuɓaɓutʰɛni ɛmaz̤wɛni ɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ nd̤ɔz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisa kuɓɔ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛz̤ininz̤i ɓaja kwaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɔwɛnz̤a ukuɓa ɓatʰind͡ʒ̤ɛlwɛ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni nd̤iz̤ɛ nd̤iɓawɔmɛlisɛlɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni waɓɔ nd̤inɡ̤aɓuji nd̤iʃijɛ namɲɛ kuɓɔ kʰɔna and̤iji kuɓa saɓusitʰɛlisa uɓusɔ ɓam kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa nd̤itʰululɛ umɔja pʰɛz̤u kwɛnɮu kasirajɛli it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wamaʃumi ɔmaɓini anamiɬanu wɔkutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kwɛtʰu ɛkukǃalɛkɛni kɔmɲaka nɡ̤ɔlwɛʃumi ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛʃumi ɛlinɛsinɛ ɛmv̤a kɔkukǁatʲɛlwa kɔmz̤i nɡ̤ajɔ kaɲɛ lɔɔ isanɮa sikajɛhɔv̤a saɓa pʰɛz̤u wand̤isa kʰɔna nɡ̤ɛmiɓɔnɔ katʰikǁɔ wand̤isa ɛz̤wɛni lakwasirajɛli ɛlɔ wand̤iɓɛka ɛntaɓɛni ɛpʰakamilɛjɔ kakʰulu pʰɛz̤u kwajɔ kwanɡ̤a sisakʰiwɔ sɔmz̤i nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si wand̤isa kʰɔna nankɔ ɔkuɓɔnakala kund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓɔnakala kɔb̤ɛd̤u ɛpʰɛtʰɛ int͡sɔntɛlɔ jɛflakisi nɡ̤ɛsanɮa nɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ jɔkulinɡ̤anisa wajɛ kɛ ɛmi ɛsanɡ̤wɛni watʰɛtʰa lɔɔ watʰi ɲana wɔmntu kʰanɡ̤ɛla nɡ̤amɛɬɔ akʰɔ uv̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛɓɛ z̤akʰɔ uɡ̤ǃ̤alɛ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛnd̤ikuɓɔnisa z̤ɔna nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uz̤iswɛ apʰa ukuz̤ɛ uɓɔniswɛ kǁɛlɛla inɮu kasirajɛli kɔnkɛ ɔkuɓɔnajɔ nankɔ kɛ kukʰɔ ud̤ɔnɡ̤a nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛnɮu ɔlud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ isɛsanɮɛni sɔmntu lɔwɔ iŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ jɔkulinɡ̤anisa iz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intand̤atʰu ijilɛjɔ ijikub̤itɛ ɛnɔɓuɓanz̤i ɓɛsanɮa waɓulinɡ̤anisa uɓuɓanz̤i ɓɛsakʰiwɔ ɓaɓa jiŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ ɛɲɛ ukupʰakama kwajiŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ ɛɲɛ waja ɛsanɡ̤wɛni ɛlib̤ɛkɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a wɛɲuka nɡ̤ɛz̤iɲukɔ z̤alɔ walinɡ̤anisa ɔmɲɛ umɓund̤u wɛsanɡ̤ɔ waɓa jiŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ ɛɲɛ uɓuɓanz̤i ɔmɲɛ umɓund̤u kɛ wɔkukǃala wajiŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ ɛɲɛ uɓuɓanz̤i nɛɡ̤umɓi lɔkulind̤a laɓa jiŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ ɛɲɛ uɓud̤ɛ lajiŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ ɛɲɛ uɓuɓanz̤i pʰakatʰi kwamaɡ̤umɓi ɔkulind̤a z̤az̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intlanu umɓund̤u wɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɔnɡ̤asɛv̤arand̤ɛni jɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɛnɡ̤anɛnɔ kwajɔ inɮu wajiŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ ɛɲɛ walinɡ̤anisa iv̤arand̤a jɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɛjɔ inɡ̤anɛnɔ kwajɔ inɮu jajiŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ ɛɲɛ walinɡ̤anisa iv̤arand̤a jɛsanɡ̤ɔ kɛ jaz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤isib̤ɔz̤ɔ iint͡sika z̤ajɔ z̤az̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imɓini kɛ iv̤arand̤a jɛsanɡ̤ɔ jajinɡ̤anɛnɔ kwajɔ inɮu kɛ amaɡ̤umɓi ɔkulind̤a ɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɛlisinɡ̤isɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a aɓa matʰatʰu nɡ̤apʰa aɓa matʰatʰu nanɡ̤apʰa aɓa mlinɡ̤anisɔ mɲɛ ɔmatʰatʰu z̤aɓa mlinɡ̤anisɔ mɲɛ iint͡sika nɡ̤apʰa nanɡ̤apʰa walinɡ̤anisa uɓuɓanz̤i ɓɔkunɡ̤ɛna kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɓaz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi uɓud̤ɛ ɓɛsanɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤aliɲɛ ɓaz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛlinaz̤itʰatʰu kɛ umd̤a pʰamɓi kwamaɡ̤umɓi ɔkulind̤a wawujikub̤itɛ ɛɲɛ nɡ̤apʰa wajikub̤itɛ ɛɲɛ nanɡ̤apʰa umd̤a amaɡ̤umɓi ɔkulind̤a aɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intand̤atʰu nɡ̤apʰa aɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intand̤atʰu nanɡ̤apʰa walinɡ̤anisa isanɡ̤ɔ ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛlupʰaɬɛni lwamaɡ̤umɓi ɔkulind̤a ɛsa ɛlupʰaɬɛni lwamaɲɛ laɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini uɓuɓanz̤i umɲanɡ̤ɔ ulunɡ̤ɛ nɔmɲanɡ̤ɔ iint͡sika waz̤ɛnz̤a z̤anɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmatʰand̤atʰu ɛɛkub̤itɛ jɛz̤a nɡ̤ɛnt͡sika intɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ ɛd͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛsanɡ̤wɛni kɛ ukutʰaɓatʰɛla pʰamɓi kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɔkunɡ̤ɛna kusɛ pʰamɓi kwɛv̤arand̤a jɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɛlipʰakatʰi z̤aɓaz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɬanu ɓɛkukʰɔ iifɛstilɛ ɛz̤i v̤aliwɛjɔ ɛmaɡ̤umɓini ɔkulind̤a nasɛz̤int͡sikɛni z̤awɔ nɡ̤ɛkǀala ɛlipʰakatʰi ɛsanɡ̤wɛni z̤id͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɓɛkukwand͡ʒ̤alɔ nasɛz̤iŋ̤ǃ̤amɛkwɛni ɓɛkukʰɔ iifɛstilɛ nɡ̤apʰakatʰi z̤id͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɓɛkukʰɔ namasund̤u ɛz̤int͡sikɛni wand̤isa ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛpʰanɮɛ nankɔ kwɛnz̤iwɛ amaɡ̤umɓi nɔmɓɛkɛlɛlɔ wamatʲɛ kwad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni jajinɡ̤amaɡ̤umɓi anɡ̤amaʃumi matʰatʰu ɛmɓɛkɛlɛlwɛni wamatʲɛ umɓɛkɛlɛlɔ wamatʲɛ uɓusɛmakǀalɛni amasanɡ̤ɔ ulunɡ̤ɛlɛlɛnɛ nɔɓud̤ɛ ɓamasanɡ̤ɔ umɓɛkɛlɛlɔ lɔwɔ upʰant͡si walinɡ̤anisa uɓuɓanz̤i ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla pʰamɓi kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ ɛpʰant͡si ɛsa pʰamɓi kwɛlɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ ɛpʰakatʰi nɡ̤anɛnɔ kwalɔ z̤alikʰulu lɛɛkub̤itɛ nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a nanɡ̤asɛntla isanɡ̤ɔ ɛlib̤ɛkɛ ɛntla nɡ̤asɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛpʰanɮɛ waɓulinɡ̤anisa uɓud̤ɛ ɓalɔ nɔɓuɓanz̤i ɓalɔ namaɡ̤umɓi ɔkulind̤a amatʰatʰu nɡ̤apʰa amatʰatʰu nanɡ̤apʰa nɛɛnt͡sika z̤alɔ nɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤amɛkɔ z̤alɔ laɓa nɡ̤anɡ̤ɔmlinɡ̤anisɔ wɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɔkukǃala ɓaz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɬanu uɓud̤ɛ ɓalɔ nɔɓuɓanz̤i ɓalɔ ɓaz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini iifɛstilɛ z̤alɔ nɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤amɛkɔ z̤alɔ namasund̤u alɔ z̤aɓa nɡ̤anɡ̤ɔmlinɡ̤anisɔ wɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɛlib̤ɛkɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɓɛɲuka nɡ̤ɛz̤iɲukɔ ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ukuja kulɔ nɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤amɛkɔ z̤alɔ z̤aɓa pʰamɓi kwaz̤ɔ amasanɡ̤ɔ ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ ɛpʰakatʰi alunɡ̤a nɛsanɡ̤ɔ lanɡ̤asɛntla nɛlanɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a walinɡ̤anisa watʰaɓatʰɛla ɛsanɡ̤wɛni wɛsa ɛsanɡ̤wɛni z̤alikʰulu lɛɛkub̤itɛ wand̤ihamɓisa wand̤isinɡ̤isa ɛz̤ant͡si isanɡ̤ɔ lisinɡ̤isɛ ɛz̤ant͡si walinɡ̤anisa iint͡sika z̤alɔ nɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤amɛkɔ z̤alɔ kwanɡ̤ɔkwalɔɔ milinɡ̤anisɔ ɓɛkukʰɔ iifɛstilɛ kulɔ nakwiiŋ̤ǃ̤amɛkɔ z̤alɔ z̤id͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ija iifɛstilɛ z̤aɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɬanu uɓud̤ɛ ɓaz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini uɓuɓanz̤i ukuɲuka ukuja kulɔ kwaɓa nɛz̤iɲukɔ ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɛz̤iŋ̤ǃ̤amɛkɔ z̤alɔ z̤az̤ipʰamɓi kwaz̤ɔ ɓɛlinamasund̤u ɛliɲɛ linɡ̤apʰa ɛliɲɛ linɡ̤apʰa ɛz̤int͡sikɛni z̤alɔ ɓɛkukʰɔ isanɡ̤ɔ ɛlisa ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛpʰakatʰi ɛlisinɡ̤isɛ ɛz̤ant͡si walinɡ̤anisa ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛsanɡ̤wɛni ɛlɔ ɛsa ɛsanɡ̤wɛni ɛlisinɡ̤isɛ ɛz̤ant͡si z̤aɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤ilikʰulu wand̤isa ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛpʰakatʰi nɡ̤ɛsanɡ̤ɔ lasɛz̤ant͡si walilinɡ̤anisa isanɡ̤ɔ lasɛz̤ant͡si kwanɡ̤ɔkwalɔɔ milinɡ̤anisɔ namaɡ̤umɓi alɔ ɔkulind̤a nɛɛnt͡sika z̤alɔ nɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤amɛkɔ z̤alɔ kwanɡ̤ɔkwalɔɔ milinɡ̤anisɔ ɓɛkukʰɔ iifɛstilɛ kulɔ nakwiiŋ̤ǃ̤amɛkɔ z̤alɔ z̤id͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ z̤aɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɬanu uɓud̤ɛ z̤aɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini uɓuɓanz̤i iiŋ̤ǃ̤amɛkɔ z̤ad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ z̤aɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini uɓud̤ɛ z̤aɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intlanu uɓuɓanz̤i iiŋ̤ǃ̤amɛkɔ z̤alɔ z̤ab̤ɛka ɛntɛnd̤ɛɛz̤wɛni ɛpʰanɮɛ z̤iɓɛ z̤inamasund̤u iint͡sika z̤alɔ ukuɲuka ukuja kulɔ kwaɓa nɛz̤iɲukɔ ɛz̤isib̤ɔz̤ɔ wand̤isa ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛpʰakatʰi ɛsinɡ̤isɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a walilinɡ̤anisa isanɡ̤ɔ kwanɡ̤ɔkwalɔɔ milinɡ̤anisɔ namaɡ̤umɓi alɔ ɔkulind̤a nɛɛnt͡sika z̤alɔ nɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤amɛkɔ z̤alɔ kwanɡ̤ɔkwalɔɔ milinɡ̤anisɔ ɓɛkukʰɔ iifɛstilɛ kulɔ nakwiiŋ̤ǃ̤amɛkɔ z̤alɔ z̤id͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ aɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɬanu uɓud̤ɛ z̤aɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini uɓuɓanz̤i iiŋ̤ǃ̤amɛkɔ z̤alɔ z̤ab̤ɛka ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛpʰanɮɛ z̤iɓɛ z̤inamasund̤u iint͡sika nɡ̤apʰa nanɡ̤apʰa ukuɲuka ukuja kulɔ kwaɓa nɛz̤iɲukɔ ɛz̤isib̤ɔz̤ɔ wand̤isa ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lasɛntla walilinɡ̤anisa kwanɡ̤ɔkwalɔɔ milinɡ̤anisɔ namaɡ̤umɓi alɔ ɔkulind̤a nɛɛnt͡sika z̤alɔ nɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤amɛkɔ z̤alɔ ɓɛkukʰɔ iifɛstilɛ kulɔ z̤id͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ z̤aɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɬanu uɓud̤ɛ z̤aɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini uɓuɓanz̤i iint͡sika z̤alɔ z̤akʰanɡ̤ɛla ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛpʰanɮɛ z̤inamasund̤u iint͡sika z̤alɔ nɡ̤apʰa nanɡ̤apʰa ukuɲuka ukuja kulɔ kwaɓa nɛz̤iɲukɔ ɛz̤isib̤ɔz̤ɔ iɡ̤umɓi nɔmɲanɡ̤ɔ walɔ lalinɡ̤asɛz̤int͡sikɛni z̤amasanɡ̤ɔ ɓɛɓɛwaɬamɓa kʰɔna amad̤ini aɲukajɔ ɛv̤arand̤ɛni jɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɓɛkukʰɔ iitafilɛ ɛz̤imɓini nɡ̤apʰa iitafilɛ ɛz̤imɓini nanɡ̤apʰa z̤ɔkukǁʰɛlɛla amad̤ini aɲukajɔ nawɛsɔnɔ nawɛtʲala ɛkǀalɛni ɛlinɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kɔɲukajɔ ɛsija ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤asɛntla ɓɛkukʰɔ iitafilɛ ɛz̤imɓini nakwɛliɲɛ ikǀala nɡ̤asɛv̤arand̤ɛni jɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɓɛkukʰɔ iitafilɛ ɛz̤imɓini kwaɓakʰɔ iitafilɛ ɛz̤inɛ nɡ̤apʰa iitafilɛ ɛz̤inɛ nanɡ̤apʰa ɛkǀalɛni lɛsanɡ̤ɔ z̤iitafilɛ ɛz̤isib̤ɔz̤ɔ z̤ɔkukǁʰɛlɛla kuz̤ɔ kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɓɛkukʰɔ nɛɛtafilɛ ɛz̤inɛ nɡ̤asɛz̤iɲukwɛni z̤amatʲɛ akǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ aɓa jikub̤itɛ ɛɲɛ ɛnɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa uɓud̤ɛ ikub̤itɛ ɛɲɛ ɛnɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa uɓuɓanz̤i ikub̤itɛ ɛɲɛ ukupʰakama ukuz̤ɛ ɓaɓɛkɛ kuz̤ɔ iimpaɬa z̤ɔkukǁʰɛla amad̤ini aɲukajɔ nɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ amab̤akǁa anɡ̤anɡ̤ɔɓuɓanz̤i ɓɛsanɮa aɓɛ ɛkǃinisɛlwɛɛnɮwini ad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ jajɛ isɛz̤itafilɛni iɲama jɔmsɔnd̤ɛz̤ɔ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɛlipʰakatʰi ɓɛkukʰɔ amaɡ̤umɓi amaɓini ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛpʰakatʰi ɛliɲɛ linɡ̤asɛkǀalɛni lɛsanɡ̤ɔ lasɛntla lib̤ɛkɛ ɛz̤ant͡si ɛliɲɛ linɡ̤asɛkǀalɛni lɛsanɡ̤ɔ lasɛz̤ant͡si lib̤ɛkɛ ɛntla watʰi ɛli ɡ̤umɓi lib̤ɛkɛ ɛz̤ant͡si lɛlaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓaɡ̤ǀ̤ina isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina sɛnɮu lɛ iɡ̤umɓi ɛlib̤ɛkɛ ɛntla lɛlaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓaɡ̤ǀ̤ina isiɡ̤ǀ̤ina sɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɓɔna ɓanɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakat͡sad̤ɔki kɔɔɲana ɓakalɛv̤i aɓasɔnd̤ɛlajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa ɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ kujɛ wajilinɡ̤anisa intɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ z̤aɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤ilikʰulu uɓud̤ɛ z̤aɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤ilikʰulu nɔɓuɓanz̤i imɓɔmɓɔnɛ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ kɛ ɓɛsipʰamɓi kwajɔ inɮu wand̤isa ɛv̤arand̤ɛni jajɔ inɮu walinɡ̤anisa int͡sika jɛv̤arand̤a iikub̤itɛ z̤ɔntlanu nɡ̤apʰa iikub̤itɛ z̤ɔntlanu nɡ̤apʰa uɓuɓanz̤i ɓɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɓaz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intatʰu nɡ̤apʰa iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intatʰu nanɡ̤apʰa uɓud̤ɛ ɓɛv̤arand̤a ɓaɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini uɓuɓanz̤i ɓaɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛlinaɲɛ nɡ̤asɛz̤iɲukwɛni ɛɓɛ kuɲukwa nɡ̤az̤ɔ kujiwɛ kujɔ ɓɛkukʰɔ iint͡sika nɡ̤asɛz̤int͡sikɛni z̤ɔmɲanɡ̤ɔ ɛɲɛ nɡ̤apʰa ɛɲɛ nanɡ̤apʰa wand̤isa ɛtɛmpilɛni walinɡ̤anisa iint͡sika z̤aɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intand̤atʰu uɓuɓanz̤i nɡ̤apʰa z̤aɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intand̤atʰu uɓuɓanz̤i nanɡ̤apʰa ɓuɓuɓanz̤i kɛ ɓɛntɛntɛ uɓuɓanz̤i ɓɔmɲanɡ̤ɔ ɓɛɓuz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi amakǀala ɔmɲanɡ̤ɔ aɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intlanu nɡ̤apʰa iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intlanu nanɡ̤apʰa waɓulinɡ̤anisa uɓud̤ɛ ɓajɔ ɓaz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi manɛ uɓuɓanz̤i ɓaz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini wanɡ̤ɛna kɛ nɡ̤apʰakatʰi walinɡ̤anisa int͡sika jɔmɲanɡ̤ɔ jaz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imɓini nɔmɲanɡ̤ɔ waz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intand̤atʰu ukupʰakama uɓuɓanz̤i ɓɔmɲanɡ̤ɔ ɓaz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ waɓulinɡ̤anisa uɓud̤ɛ ɓajɔ ɓaz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini uɓuɓanz̤i ɓaz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini wab̤ɛkisa ɛtɛmpilɛni watʰi jiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ lɛ walulinɡ̤anisa ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lwɛnɮu lwaz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intand̤atʰu uɓuɓanz̤i ɓɛnd̤awɔ jɔkwajama ɓaz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤inɛ jad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛnɮwini lɛjɔ amaɡ̤umɓi ɛnd̤awɔ jɔkwajama aɓa matʰatʰu iɡ̤umɓi pʰɛz̤u kwɛɡ̤umɓi aɓa maʃumi matʰatʰu aja ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni ɛɓɛjinalɔ inɮu lɛ nɡ̤asɛmaɡ̤umɓini ɛnd̤awɔ jɔkwajama ɛjad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ukuz̤ɛ aɓɛ nɔkuɓamɓɛka kʰɔna kɔd̤wa anɡ̤aɓamɓɛki ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni lwajɔ inɮu kwaja kuɓa ɓanz̤i ukud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a ɔkukʰɔna sija siɲuka isakʰiwɔ nɡ̤ɔkwamaɡ̤umɓi ɛnd̤awɔ jɔkwajama nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔkɔ kwajid͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a inɮu lɛ kwaja kusand̤a ɔkukʰɔna iɲukajɔ kujid͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a inɮu lɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ inɮu lɛ jaja iɓa ɓanz̤i ɔkuɲuka iɲukajɔ lwaɓa kwand͡ʒ̤alɔ ɔlunɡ̤apʰant͡si ud̤id̤i ukuɲuka ukuja kɔlunɡ̤apʰɛz̤ulu nɡ̤ɔkɔlɔ lunɡ̤apʰakatʰi nd̤aɓɔna kwasɛnɮwini lɛ ind̤awɔ ɛpʰakamilɛjɔ ɛd͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤isɛkɔ z̤amaɡ̤umɓi ɛnd̤awɔ jɔkwajama z̤az̤ijiŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ ɛpʰɛlɛjɔ z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intand̤atʰu ukuja ɛntlanɡ̤anwɛni uɓuɓanz̤i ɓɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a ɛɓɛ inaɓɔ ind̤awɔ jɔkwajama nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ ɓɛɓuz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intlanu jaɓa kwand͡ʒ̤alɔ ind̤awɔ ɛʃijɛkilɛjɔ ɛnɮwini ɛnamaɡ̤umɓi ɛnd̤awɔ jɔkwajama ɛkulɛ nɮu pʰakatʰi kwamaɡ̤umɓi iɓɛ iɓuɓuɓanz̤i ɓɛɛkub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini ɔɓud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛjɔ ɓajid͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a inɮu nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ imiɲanɡ̤ɔ jɛnd̤awɔ jɔkwajama jajikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ɛnd̤awɛni ɛʃijɛkilɛjɔ ɔmɲɛ umɲanɡ̤ɔ ukʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛntla ɔmɲɛ umɲanɡ̤ɔ ukʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤ant͡si uɓuɓanz̤i ɓɛnd̤awɔ ɛʃijɛkilɛjɔ ɓɛɓuz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intlanu ɓad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ isakʰiwɔ ɛsiɓɛ sipʰamɓi kwɛnd̤awɔ ɛkǃʰiwukilɛjɔ sasiz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ uɓuɓanz̤i ɓasɔ nɡ̤ɛkǀala ɛlisinɡ̤isɛ ɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lwɛsakʰiwɔ ɛsɔ lwaluz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intlanu uɓuɓanz̤i ɓalɔ lwad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nɔɓud̤ɛ ɓasɔ ɓaɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi asitʰɔɓa wajilinɡ̤anisa kɛ inɮu lɛjɔ jaɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤ilikʰulu uɓud̤ɛ ind̤awɔ ɛkǃʰiwukilɛjɔ nɛsakʰiwɔ sajɔ nɛɛnd̤ɔnɡ̤a z̤asɔ z̤aɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤ilikʰulu uɓud̤ɛ uɓuɓanz̤i ɓɔɓusɔ ɓajɔ inɮu nɔɓɛnd̤awɔ ɛkǃʰiwukilɛjɔ ɛkʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɓaɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤ilikʰulu waɓulinɡ̤anisa kɛ uɓud̤ɛ ɓɛsakʰiwɔ ɛsiɓɛ sipʰamɓi kwɛnd̤awɔ ɛkǃʰiwukilɛjɔ ɛɓɛ sinɡ̤asɛmv̤a kwajɔ nɛɛɡ̤alari z̤asɔ nɡ̤apʰa nanɡ̤apʰa iikub̤itɛ z̤aɓa likʰulu nɛnd̤awɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ janɡ̤apʰakatʰi nɛɛv̤arand̤a z̤ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ imiɓund̤u lɛjɔ jɛmiɲanɡ̤ɔ nɛɛfɛstilɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤iv̤aliwɛjɔ nɛɛɡ̤alari ɛz̤ɔ z̤id͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛjɔ ɛz̤ind̤id̤ini z̤az̤ɔ z̤ɔntatʰu malunɡ̤a nɛmiɓund̤u jɛmiɲanɡ̤ɔ kukʰɔ amakǀɛɓa ɛmitʰi ɛd͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nɔm̤laɓa ud̤ɛ wɛma nɡ̤ɛɛfɛstilɛ iifɛstilɛ kɛ z̤iɡ̤utʲunɡ̤ɛlwɛ napʰɛz̤u kwɛmiɲanɡ̤ɔ kwad̤a kwasɛnɮwini nɡ̤apʰakatʰi nanɡ̤apʰanɮɛ nasɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni lɔnkɛ kwad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤apʰakatʰi nanɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwaɓa jimilinɡ̤anisɔ kwajɛ kwɛnz̤iwɛ iikɛrub̤i namasund̤u jalisund̤u pʰakatʰi kwɛkɛrub̤i nɛkɛrub̤i ikɛrub̤i janɔɓusɔ ɔɓuɓini jaɓuɓusɔ ɓɔmntu ɔɓub̤ɛkɛ ɛsund̤wini nɡ̤apʰa jaɓuɓusɔ ɓɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ɔɓub̤ɛkɛ ɛsund̤wini nɡ̤apʰa kwajɛ kwɛnd͡ʒ̤iwɛ nd͡ʒ̤alɔ ɛnɮwini jɔnkɛ kwad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛnz̤iwa z̤atʰaɓatʰɛla ɛm̤laɓɛni z̤ɛsa pʰɛz̤u kwɛmiɲanɡ̤ɔ iikɛrub̤i namasund̤u ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni kɛ lwɛtɛmpilɛ itɛmpilɛ imiɡ̤uɓasi jajɔ iɓɛ imɓɔmɓɔnɛ nɔɓusɔ ɓɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ imɓɔnakalɔ jaɓɔ jaɓɔnakala ikwand͡ʒ̤alɔ isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ sasinɡ̤umtʰi ukub̤itɛntatʰu ukupʰakama ɓuz̤iikub̤itɛmɓini uɓud̤ɛ ɓasɔ ɓɛsinɛɛmɓɔmɓɔ z̤asɔ nɔmmisɔ wasɔ namakǀala asɔ ɛnɡ̤umtʰi watʰi lɛ jitafilɛ ɛpʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a ɓɛz̤imɓini iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ z̤ɛtɛmpilɛ nɛz̤ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓɛz̤inɡ̤amɓini iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ kwimiɲanɡ̤ɔ lɛjɔ z̤iz̤iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ ɛz̤id͡ʒ̤inɡ̤ajɔ z̤ɔmɓini z̤imɓini kɔmɲɛ umɲanɡ̤ɔ z̤imɓini iiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ nakɔmɲɛ kwajɛ kwɛnz̤iwɛ kuz̤ɔ kwiiŋ̤ǀ̤anɡ̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ z̤ɛtɛmpilɛ iikɛrub̤i namasund̤u kund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓɛkwɛnz̤iwɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɛz̤ind̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni kwajɛ kukʰɔ isiɲukɔ sɔmtʰi pʰamɓi kwɛv̤arand̤a nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ iifɛstilɛ ɛz̤iv̤aliwɛjɔ namasund̤u z̤az̤inɡ̤apʰa nanɡ̤apʰa ɛmakǀalɛni ɛv̤arand̤a nasɛmaɡ̤umɓini ɛnd̤awɔ jɔkwajama kujɔ inɮu nɛz̤iɲukɔ wapʰuma waja ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛnɡ̤apʰanɮɛ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɛsinɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛntla wand̤isa ɛmaɡ̤umɓini amalunɡ̤a nɛnd̤awɔ lɛ ikǃʰiwukilɛjɔ amalunɡ̤a nɛsakʰiwɔ ɛsɔ akʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ɛntla pʰamɓi kwɛkǀala ɛliɓud̤ɛ ɓuz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤ilikʰulu ɛlimɲanɡ̤ɔ unɡ̤asɛntla uɓuɓanz̤i ɓaɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɬanu malunɡ̤a nɛɛkub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɓini z̤ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ ɛnɡ̤apʰakatʰi malunɡ̤a nɔmɓɛkɛlɛlɔ wamatʲɛ ɔsɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛnɡ̤apʰanɮɛ jaɓa jiɡ̤alari isinɡ̤ɛ ɛɡ̤alarini ɛlud̤id̤ini lwɛsitʰatʰu pʰamɓi kwamaɡ̤umɓi kwakukʰɔ ind̤awɔ jɔkuhamɓa uɓuɓanz̤i ɓajɔ ɓuz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi kukʰɔ inɮɛla ɛz̤iikub̤itɛ z̤ilikʰulu ɛb̤ɛka pʰakatʰi imiɲanɡ̤ɔ jaz̤ɔ kɛ ib̤ɛka nɡ̤ɛntla kɛ amaɡ̤umɓi apʰɛz̤ulu ɛɓɛmafupʰi kunawapʰant͡si kunapʰakatʰi ɛsakʰiwɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iiɡ̤alari z̤awaɮɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛnd̤id̤i ntatʰu wɔna ɛnɡ̤ɛnaz̤int͡sika nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa iintɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ z̤inɛɛnt͡sika nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ kwaxɔkǁiswa anɡ̤apʰant͡si apʰakatʰi ɛsikʰunɮɛni sawɔ kɛ ud̤ɔnɡ̤a ɔlwalunɡ̤apʰanɮɛ lulunɡ̤ɛlɛlɛnɛ namaɡ̤umɓi lwasinɡ̤a ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛnɡ̤apʰanɮɛ pʰamɓi kwamaɡ̤umɓi uɓud̤ɛ ɓalɔ ɓaɓuz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɬanu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓud̤ɛ ɓamaɡ̤umɓi ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ ɛnɡ̤apʰanɮɛ ɓaɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɬanu kɔd̤wa kɛ pʰamɓi kwɛtɛmpilɛ ɓaɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤ilikʰulu nɡ̤apʰant͡si maɡ̤umɓi ukunɡ̤ɛna ɓɛkuv̤ɛlwa nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɛkujiwɛni kuwɔ kuv̤ɛlwa ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛnɡ̤apʰanɮɛ ɛɓuɓanz̤ini ɓɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a lwɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ kusinɡ̤isɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a pʰamɓi kwɛnd̤awɔ ɛkǃʰiwukilɛjɔ napʰamɓi kwɛsakʰiwɔ ɓɛkukʰɔ amaɡ̤umɓi ajɛnɛnɮɛla pʰamɓi kwawɔ ɛɓɔnakala ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amaɡ̤umɓi asinɡ̤isɛ ɛntla nɡ̤ɔɓud̤ɛ ɓawɔ aɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ nanɡ̤ɔɓuɓanz̤i ɓawɔ aɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ nanɡ̤ɔkupʰuma kwawɔ kɔnkɛ aɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ nanɡ̤amasikɔ awɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ind͡ʒ̤alɔ imiɲanɡ̤ɔ jawɔ lawɔ ind͡ʒ̤alɔ nɛmiɲanɡ̤ɔ jamaɡ̤umɓi aɓɛ ɛkʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤ant͡si kwakukʰɔ umɲanɡ̤ɔ ɛmantlɔkɔ ɛnɮɛla ɛnɮɛla ɛmalunɡ̤a nɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a ɔlulunɡ̤ɛlɛlɛnɛ namaɡ̤umɓi ɛnɮɛla ɛv̤ɛla nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɛkujiwɛni kuwɔ watʰi amaɡ̤umɓi anɡ̤asɛntla namaɡ̤umɓi anɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si apʰamɓi kwɛnd̤awɔ ɛkǃʰiwukilɛjɔ wɔna nɡ̤amaɡ̤umɓi aŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ apʰɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓasɔnd̤ɛlajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a ɓaja kuɮɛla kʰɔna ɛz̤ɔna ntɔ z̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ apʰɔ ɓaja kuz̤iɓɛka kʰɔna ɛz̤ɔna ntɔ z̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa nɛd̤ini lɛsɔnɔ nɛlɛtʲala nɡ̤ɔkuɓa lɛ nd̤awɔ iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓakunɡ̤ɛna aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli maɓanɡ̤apʰumi ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni ɓajɛ ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛnɡ̤apʰanɮɛ ɓɔz̤iɓɛka apʰɔ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤aɓɔ aɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛla ɓɛnaz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa z̤iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ maɓamɓatʰɛ nɡ̤uɓɔ z̤imɓi ɓasɔnd̤ɛlɛ kɛ kɔkwaɓantu watʰi kɛ akuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa ukujilinɡ̤anisa inɮu ɛpʰakatʰi wapʰuma wasinɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɛlib̤ɛkɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a walinɡ̤anisa kʰɔna wad͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ walinɡ̤anisa ikǀala lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ jɔkulinɡ̤anisa jaz̤iiŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ ɛz̤imakʰulu maɬanu nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ jɔkulinɡ̤anisa nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ walinɡ̤anisa ikǀala lanɡ̤asɛntla jaz̤iiŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ ɛz̤imakʰulu maɬanu nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ jɔkulinɡ̤anisa nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kwikǀala lanɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si walinɡ̤anisa amakʰulu amaɬanu ɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ jɔkulinɡ̤anisa wad͡ʒ̤ikɛla ɛkǀalɛni lanɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a walinɡ̤anisa amakʰulu amaɬanu ɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ jɔkulinɡ̤anisa nɡ̤amakǀala ɔmanɛ wajilinɡ̤anisa inɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a ɔlud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ uɓud̤ɛ ɓanɡ̤amakʰulu amaɬanu nɔɓuɓanz̤i ɓanɡ̤amakʰulu amaɬanu ukuz̤ɛ kwaɬulwɛ pʰakatʰi kɔkuŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɔkuɬamɓɛlɛjɔ wand̤isa ɛsanɡ̤wɛni ɛsanɡ̤wɛni ɛlib̤ɛkɛ ɛnɮɛlɛni janɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a naɓɔ kɛ uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓɔtʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli ɓuv̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla janɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a isand̤i saɓɔ sind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsand̤i samanz̤i amaninz̤i iɬaɓatʰi lakʰaɲa ɓuɓukǃakǃawuli ɓakʰɛ imɓɔnakalɔ kɛ ɛnd̤ajiɓɔnajɔ ukuɓɔnakala kwajɔ jajind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmɓɔnakalɔ lɛja nd̤ajiɓɔnajɔ ukuja kuwɔnakalisa umz̤i kwakukʰɔ nɛɛmɓɔnakalɔ ɛz̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛmɓɔnakalɔ ɛnd̤az̤iɓɔnajɔ ɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔjikɛb̤arɛ nd̤awa kɛ nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɓɛz̤a ɛnɮwini nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɛlib̤ɛkɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a umɔja wand̤ifukula wand̤isa ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛpʰakatʰi naɓɔ kɛ uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɓujiz̤alisilɛ inɮu lɛ nd̤ɛv̤a ɔtʰɛtʰa ɛsɛnɮwini lɛ kwaɓakʰɔ kɛ ɔmi ɛkǀalɛni watʰi ɲana wɔmntu kʰanɡ̤ɛla ind̤awɔ jɛtrɔnɛ jam ind̤awɔ jɔmpʰant͡si wɛɛɲawɔ z̤am apʰɔ nd̤ija kuɬala kʰɔna pʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ inɡ̤aɓi salɛnz̤a iŋǃamɓi iɡ̤ama ɛliŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ inɮu kasirajɛli ɓɔna nɔɔkumkani ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔɓuhɛɲu ɓaɓɔ nanɡ̤ɛz̤id̤umɓu z̤ɔɔkumkani ɓaɓɔ ɛz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni z̤aɓɔ ɛkumisɛni kwaɓɔ umɓund̤u wɔmɲanɡ̤ɔ waɓɔ nɡ̤asɛmɓund̤wini wɔmɲanɡ̤ɔ nɛmiɡ̤uɓasi jaɓɔ ɛkǀalɛni lɛmiɡ̤uɓasi jam ilud̤ɔnɡ̤a lɔd̤wa pʰakatʰi naɓɔ ɓɛlɛnz̤ɛ iŋǃamɓi kɛ iɡ̤ama ɛliŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤amasikiz̤i aɓɔ aɓawɛnz̤ajɔ nd̤aɓaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla kɛ nɡ̤ɔmsind̤ɔ nɡ̤ɔku kɛ maɓakʰwɛlɛlisɛ uɓuhɛɲu ɓaɓɔ nɛz̤id̤umɓu z̤ɔɔkumkani ɓaɓɔ nd̤iɬalɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ wɛna kɛ ɲana wɔmntu inɮu kasirajɛli jikǁɛlɛlɛ lɛ nɮu ɓɛv̤ɛ iɬaz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ ɓasilinɡ̤anisɛ isakʰiwɔ ɛsilinɡ̤anisɛlwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɬɛ ukuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓaliv̤a iɬaz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ aɓaz̤ɛnz̤ilɛjɔ ɓaz̤isɛ ukumɛka kwɛnɮu lɛ nɔkukǃuluŋǃwa kwajɔ iz̤ipʰumɔ z̤ajɔ nɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnɔ z̤ajɔ iimɛkɔ z̤ajɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nɛmimisɛlɔ jajɔ jɔnkɛ iimɛkɔ z̤ajɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nɛmijalɛlɔ jajɔ jɔnkɛ ujib̤alɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni aɓɔ ɓakuɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ kɔnkɛ kwajɔ nɛmimisɛlɔ jajɔ jɔnkɛ ɓajɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤uwɔ lɔ umjalɛlɔ wajɔ inɮu ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛntaɓa wɔnkɛ umd̤a wajɔ ɔd͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ujiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jaɓɔna nɡ̤uwɔ lɔ umjalɛlɔ wajɔ inɮu jijɔ lɛ imilinɡ̤anisɔ jɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛkub̤itɛ ikub̤itɛ jikub̤itɛ nɔɓuɓanz̤i ɓɛsanɮa umz̤ant͡si wasɔ wɔɓa jikub̤itɛ uɓɛ jikub̤itɛ uɓuɓanz̤i uluŋ̤ǃ̤u lwawɔ ɛlud̤inini lwawɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ lwalunɡ̤anɡ̤ɔmɔlukɔ ɔmɲɛ wɛminwɛ lulɔ ɔlɔ ufund̤ɔ lwɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɛsi kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛmz̤ant͡sini ɔsɛm̤laɓɛni kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛmakǀalɛni apʰant͡si kɔɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imɓini ukupʰakama nɔɓuɓanz̤i ɓuɓɛ jikub̤itɛ ɛɲɛ kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛmakǀalɛni lawɔ amafut͡ʃanɛ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛmakǀalɛni amad̤ɛ kɔɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤inɛ ukupʰakama nɔɓuɓanz̤i ɓuɓɛ jikub̤itɛ ɛɲɛ intaɓa katʰikǁɔ jɔɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤inɛ z̤ɔtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛz̤ikwɛni likatʰikǁɔ z̤iɲusɛ iimpɔnd̤ɔ ɛz̤inɛ iz̤ikɔ likatʰikǁɔ lɔɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛlinamɓini uɓud̤ɛ ɓalɔ iʃumi ɛlinamɓini uɓuɓanz̤i ɓalɔ lɔɓa mɓɔmɓɔ nɛ nɡ̤ɔkwamakǀala alɔ ɔmanɛ amakǀala ɔɓa z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛlinanɛ uɓud̤ɛ ɓawɔ nɛʃumi ɛlinanɛ uɓuɓanz̤i nɡ̤ɔkwamakǀala awɔ ɔmanɛ nɔluŋ̤ǃ̤u nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kuwɔ luɓɛ sisikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛkub̤itɛ umz̤ant͡si wawɔ uɓɛ jikub̤itɛ ɛɲɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ nɛz̤iɲukɔ z̤awɔ maz̤ikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a watʰi ɲana wɔmntu it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jijɔ lɛ imimisɛlɔ jɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkwɛnz̤iwa kwasɔ ukuɓa kuɲuswɛ pʰɛz̤u kwasɔ amad̤ini aɲukajɔ kut͡ʃiz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤az̤i kusɔ uja kuɓanika aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓalɛv̤i aɓanɡ̤aɓɛmɓɛwu kat͡sad̤ɔki aɓasɔnd̤ɛlajɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa ɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa itʰɔlɛ lɛnkɔmɔ liɓɛ lid̤ini lɛsɔnɔ wɔtʰaɓatʰa ɛɡ̤az̤ini lajɔ ulikǃaɓɛ ɛz̤impɔnd̤wɛni z̤asɔ z̤ɔnɛ nasɛz̤imɓɔmɓɛni z̤ɔnɛ z̤amakǀala nasɛlud̤inini nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ usɛnz̤ɛ ɲulu usikǀamaɡ̤uʃɛlɛ ujitʰaɓatʰɛ inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa jɛd̤ini lɛsɔnɔ ɓajit͡ʃisɛ ɛnd̤awɛni ɛmisiwɛjɔ jajɔ inɮu nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kwɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsiɓini wɔsɔnd̤ɛz̤a inkunz̤i jɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛkǁʰɔnti ɛɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ iɓɛ lid̤ini lɛsɔnɔ ɓasɛnz̤ɛ ɲulu isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ sɛnz̤iwa ɲulu nɡ̤ɛnkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa ɛkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛni kwakʰɔ ukusɛnz̤a ɲulu wɔsɔnd̤ɛz̤a inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa itʰɔlɛ lɛnkɔmɔ ɛliɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ nɛnkunz̤i ɛɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ jasɛmpaɬɛni ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ wɔz̤isɔnd̤ɛz̤a pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓaɡ̤alɛlɛ itʲuwa pʰɛz̤u kwaz̤ɔ ɓaz̤iɲusɛ z̤iɓɛ lid̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a iint͡suku ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ uja kunikɛla inkunz̤i jɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛkǁʰɔnti ɛjɛd̤ini lɛsɔnɔ nɡ̤ɛmini ɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ nɛnkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa ɛlitʰɔlɛ lɛnkɔmɔ nɛnkunz̤i jasɛmpaɬɛni ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ ɛɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ iint͡suku ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɓɔsikǀamaɡ̤uʃɛla isiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɓasiɬamɓululɛ ɓasimisɛlɛ ɓaja kuz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa ɛz̤ɔ nt͡suku kutʰi nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɛnz̤ɛ amad̤ini ɛnu aɲukajɔ nɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɛnu jɔkǁɔlɔ ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni nd̤iz̤ɛ nd̤inamkɛlɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a wand̤iɓujisa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛlinɡ̤apʰanɮɛ ɛlib̤ɛkɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a lajɛ liv̤aliwɛ ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi ɛli sanɡ̤ɔ lija kuɬala liv̤aliwɛ aliji kuv̤ulwa akuji kunɡ̤ɛna nɡ̤alɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ kasirajɛli unɡ̤ɛnɛ nɡ̤alɔ lija kuɬala liv̤aliwɛ kɛ isikʰulu sisikʰulu nd͡ʒ̤ɛ sija kuɬala kulɔ ukuɓa siɮɛ ukuɮa pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a sɔnɡ̤ɛna nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jasɛv̤arand̤ɛni jɛsanɡ̤ɔ sipʰumɛ kwanɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jajɔ wand̤isa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛsanɡ̤ɔ lanɡ̤asɛntla ɛɓɛjipʰamɓi kwajɔ inɮu nd̤akʰanɡ̤ɛla naɓɔ uɓukǃakǃawuli ɓukajɛhɔv̤a ɓujiz̤alisilɛ inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nd̤awa nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a ɲana wɔmntu ɡ̤ǃ̤ala nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ uɓɔnɛ nɡ̤amɛɬɔ akʰɔ uv̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛɛnɮɛɓɛ z̤akʰɔ kɔnkɛ ɛnd̤isukuɓa nd̤ikutʰɛtʰa kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kwimimisɛlɔ jɔnkɛ jɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nanɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kwimijalɛlɔ jajɔ jɔnkɛ ukuɡ̤ǃ̤alɛ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ ukunɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini lɛ ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛkupʰuɲwa nɡ̤az̤ɔ uz̤ɛ utʰi kwaɓanɛɛnkani kwaɓɛnɮu kasirajɛli it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi janɛlani nɮu kasirajɛli nɡ̤amasikiz̤i ɛnu ɔnkɛ ɔkuɓanɡ̤ɛnisa kwɛnu ɔɔɲana ɓɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a aɓanɡ̤alukilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ aɓanɡ̤alukilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛɲama ukuɓa ɓaɓɛ sɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni jam ukuɓa ɓajiɬamɓɛlɛ inɮu jam lɛ nakusɔnd̤ɛz̤a ukuɮa amaŋǃatʰa nɛɡ̤az̤i umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nawapʰula kɛ pʰɛz̤u kwamasikiz̤i ɛnu ɔnkɛ anasiɡ̤ǀ̤ina isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina sɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jam naɓamisa aɓaja ukuɓa ɓaniɡ̤ǀ̤inɛlɛ isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni jam it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a aɓanɡ̤alukilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ aɓanɡ̤alukilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛɲama aɓaji kunɡ̤ɛna ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni jam ɓakuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a aɓapʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli kɛ kwanaɓalɛv̤i aɓakʰwɛlɛlajɔ kud̤ɛ ɛkund̤wɛnd̤wɛni kwamasirajɛli awand̤wɛnd̤wajɔ aland̤ɛla iz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤awɔ aja kuɓutʰwala uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓawɔ ɓaja kwanɛla ukuɓa nɡ̤aɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛli ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni jam ɓɛnɡ̤aɓav̤ɛlɛli ɓamasanɡ̤ɔ ɛnɮu lɛ ɓɛlunɡ̤isɛlɛla ɛnɮwini lɛ aɓɔ ɓaja kukǁʰɛlɛla aɓantu id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɓɔna ɓɛmɛ pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ ukuɓa ɓaɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɓaɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛlajɔ pʰamɓi kwɛz̤iɡ̤ɔd̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓaɓa sisikʰuɓɛkisɔ sɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa kwinɮu kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nd̤iɓapʰakamisɛlɛ isanɮa it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa ɓaɓutʰwalɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ aɓaji ukuɓa ɓɛnz̤ɛlɛlɛlɛ ɓanɡ̤afiki kwiiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤am z̤ɔnkɛ kwiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jam ɓaja kutʰwala kɛ iɬaz̤ɔ laɓɔ namasikiz̤i aɓɔ aɓawɛnz̤ilɛjɔ nd̤ɔɓɛnz̤a ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓaɡ̤ǀ̤ini ɓɛsiɡ̤ǁ̤ina sɛnɮu lɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛnkɔnz̤ɔ jajɔ jɔnkɛ nanɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɛnz̤ɛlwa kujɔ kɛ ɓɔna aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓalɛv̤i ɔɔɲana ɓakat͡sad̤ɔki aɓasiɡ̤ǀ̤inajɔ isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina sɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jam ɛkund̤wɛnd̤wɛni kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɔsɔnd̤ɛla ɓɔna ukuɓa ɓand̤ilunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ ɓɛmɛ pʰamɓi ukuɓa ɓasɔnd̤ɛz̤ɛ iŋǃatʰa nɛɡ̤az̤i it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ɓɔnɡ̤ɛna ɓɔna ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni jam ɓasɔnd̤ɛlɛ ɓɔna ɛsitʰɛɓɛni ukuɓa ɓand̤ilunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ ɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina kɔtʰi ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwaɓɔ nɡ̤amasanɡ̤ɔ ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ ɛpʰakatʰi ɓamɓatʰɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɛlinɛn kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ntɔ jɔɓɔja kuɓɔ ɛkulunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛni kwaɓɔ ɛmasanɡ̤wɛni ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ ɛpʰakatʰi nakǁa ɓakujɔ inɮu z̤ɔɓa z̤iinkɔnt͡ʃɔ z̤ɛlinɛn ɛz̤intlɔkwɛni z̤aɓɔ iɓɛ z̤iib̤ulukʰwɛ z̤ɛlinɛn ɛz̤iŋǃɛni z̤aɓɔ aɓaji kub̤iŋǃa ɓaz̤iɓilisɛ ɓɔtʰi ɛkupʰumɛni kwaɓɔ ɓɛsinɡ̤a ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛnɡ̤apʰanɮɛ ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛnɡ̤apʰanɮɛ ɓɛsija ɛɓantwini ɓaz̤iɬuɓɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤aɓɔ aɓaɓɛlunɡ̤isɛlɛla ɓɛnaz̤ɔ ɓɛz̤iɓɛkɛ ɛmaɡ̤umɓini aŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓamɓatʰɛ nɡ̤uɓɔ z̤imɓi ɓanɡ̤aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤walisi aɓantu nɡ̤ɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ z̤aɓɔ maɓanɡ̤az̤ikǀʰɛɓi iintlɔkɔ ɓanɡ̤az̤ijɛki iinwɛlɛ z̤aɓɔ z̤iɓɛ nɡ̤amajakajaka ɓɔz̤iŋǃutʰula iintlɔkɔ maɓanɡ̤asɛli wajini ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwaɓɔ ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛpʰakatʰi um̤lɔlɔkaz̤i nɔmfaz̤i ɔwaliwɛjɔ maɓanɡ̤aɓaz̤ɛki ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤aɓafaz̤i ɓaɓɔ ɓɔz̤ɛka iintɔmɓi ɛz̤iz̤iintɔmɓi kwimɓɛwu jɛnɮu kasirajɛli kwanɔm̤lɔlɔkaz̤i ɔtʰɛ waɓa nɡ̤um̤lɔlɔkaz̤i wɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɔɓajala aɓantu ɓam ukuɓa ɓaɬulɛ ɔkuŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kɔkuɬamɓɛlɛjɔ ɓaɓaz̤isɛ ɔkujiŋǃamɓi nɔkuɬamɓulukilɛjɔ ɛkuɓamɓanɛni kwaɓantu maɓɛmɛ ɓɔna ɓaɡ̤wɛɓɛ nɡ̤ɔkwamasikɔ ɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ imijalɛlɔ jam nɛmimisɛlɔ jam nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ amisiwɛjɔ ɓaz̤iŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛ iisaɓatʰa z̤am maɓanɡ̤aji ɛmntwini ɔfilɛjɔ ɓaz̤ɛnz̤ɛ iiŋǃamɓi kunɡ̤aɓa kunɡ̤ɔjisɛ nɔnina nɔɲana nɛntɔmɓi jaɓɔ nɔmz̤alwana nɔd̤ad̤ɛ waɓɔ ɔnɡ̤aɓanɡ̤a nand̤ɔd̤a aɓanɡ̤az̤ɛnz̤a iiŋǃamɓi nɡ̤aɓɔ ɓɔna ɓɔd̤wa ɓɔmɓalɛla imiɬa ɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛmv̤a kɔkuɬand͡ʒ̤ululwa kwakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la kɛ wɔkunɡ̤ɛna kwakʰɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛpʰakatʰi ukuz̤ɛ alunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni wɔsɔnd̤ɛz̤a id̤ini lakʰɛ lɛsɔnɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ɔkɔ kɔɓa laɓɔ iɓɛ nd̤im laɓɔ ninɡ̤aɓaniki nz̤uz̤ɔ kwasirajɛli nd̤im inz̤uz̤ɔ jaɓɔ umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa nɛd̤ini lɛsɔnɔ nɛd̤ina lɛtʲala ɓɔɮa ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ ɓɔna z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤isinɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰant͡si kwasirajɛli z̤ija kuɓa z̤ɛz̤aɓɔ iiŋ̤ǃ̤alɔ z̤ɛɛntlaɬɛla z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤intwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ nɛmixumɔ jɔnkɛ jɛɛntɔ z̤ɔnkɛ kwimixumɔ jɛnu jɔnkɛ jɔɓa jɛjaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɛŋ̤ǃ̤alɔ jɔmɣ̤ajɔ wɛnu nɔjinika umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ukuz̤ɛ aɬisɛ int͡sikɛlɛlɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛnɮu jakʰɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓaji kuɮa ntɔ iz̤ifɛlɛjɔ nɛkǃwɛnɡ̤iwɛjɔ nɔkuɓa kusɛz̤intakɛni nɔkuɓa kusɛz̤inkɔmɛni ɛkulaɓɛni kwɛnu iliz̤wɛ nɡ̤amakǃaʃisɔ ukuɓa liɓɛ nɔmxumɛla ujɛhɔv̤a umxumɔ ɔjintɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kulɔ iliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ uɓud̤ɛ ɓuɓɛ nɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmaɓini anamaɬanu ɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ uɓuɓanz̤i ɓuɓɛ liʃumi wɔɓa ŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛmd̤ɛni wawɔ wɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kuwɔ apʰa ɔɓa nɡ̤awasɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni amakʰulu amaɬanu uɓud̤ɛ nɡ̤amakʰulu amaɬanu ɔɓuɓanz̤i uɓɛ mɓɔmɓɔnɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ uɓɛ z̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi maɬanu z̤ɛpʰanɮɛ ɛlinɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ kuwɔ kujɔ lɔɔ nd̤awɔ ilinɡ̤anisiwɛjɔ wɔlinɡ̤anisa uɓud̤ɛ ɔɓunɡ̤amaʃumi ɔmaɓini anamaɬanu nɔɓuɓanz̤i ɔɓuliʃumi iɓɛ kʰɔna iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ lɛ iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jɔna jɔɓa jintɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kulɔ iliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ ilunɡ̤ɛ naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛli ɓɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ aɓasɔnd̤ɛla ukuɓa ɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a iɓɛ jind̤awɔ jɛz̤inɮu z̤aɓɔ ind̤awɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ilunɡ̤ɛ nɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ amaʃumi amaɓini anamaɬanu ɔɓud̤ɛ nɛli ʃumi ɔɓuɓanz̤i alunɡ̤ɛ naɓalɛv̤i aɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛli ɓɛnɮu ɔɓa jinz̤uz̤ɔ jaɓɔ ɛjimiz̤i jɔkuɓa ɓaɬalɛ ɔkɔmz̤i kɔɓa nɡ̤amawaka amaɬanu ɔɓuɓanz̤i anamaʃumi amaɓini anamaɬanu ɔɓud̤ɛ ɛlunɡ̤ɛlɛlɛnɛ nɔmxumɔ ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ iɓɛ nɡ̤awɛnɮu jɔnkɛ kasirajɛli isikʰulu nɔsinika nɡ̤apʰa nanɡ̤apʰa kɔmxumɔ ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nakɔkɔmz̤i pʰamɓi kɔmxumɔ ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ napʰamɓi kɔkɔmz̤i nɡ̤ɛkǀala lasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a nisɛ ɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a nanɡ̤ɛkǀala lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a nisɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a uɓud̤ɛ ɓulunɡ̤ɛlɛlanɛ nɛsiɲɛ isaɬulɔ sɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɓutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛmd̤ɛni wasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a ɓusɛ ɛmd̤ɛni wasɛmpumalanɡ̤a lɔɓa liliz̤wɛ lasɔ liɓɛ jinz̤uz̤ɔ kusɔ kwasirajɛli iz̤ikʰulu z̤am z̤inɡ̤aɓuji z̤iɓɛ saɓakǁinz̤ɛlɛla pʰant͡si aɓantu ɓam kɛ iliz̤wɛ z̤ilinikɛ inɮu kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ajɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi janɛlani z̤ikʰulu z̤akwasirajɛli jɛkani ukuɡ̤ɔɲamɛla nɔkub̤ukǃa nɛnz̤ɛ ɔkusɛsikwɛni nɔɓulunɡ̤isa jɛkani ukuɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa aɓantu ɓam ɛmafɛni aɓɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a jiɓani nɛsikali sɔɓulunɡ̤isa nɛɛfa jɔɓulunɡ̤isa nɛb̤atɛ jɔɓulunɡ̤isa iɛfa nɛb̤atɛ jɔɓa mlinɡ̤anisɔ mɲɛ ib̤atɛ ikʰɔnɡ̤ɔz̤ɛlɛ isaɬulɔ sɛʃumi sɛhɔmɛrɛ nɛɛfa isaɬulɔ sɛʃumi sɛhɔmɛrɛ siɓɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛhɔmɛrɛ isilinɡ̤anisɛlɔ sajɔ iʃɛkɛlɛ jɔɓa nɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini ɛɛɡ̤ɛra amaʃumi amaɓini ɛɛʃɛkɛlɛ
