amaʃumi amaɓini anɛsiɬanu ɛɛʃɛkɛlɛ iʃumi ɛlinɛsiɬanu lɛɛʃɛkɛlɛ iɓɛ jimina nɡ̤uwɔ lɔ umxumɔ ɛnija kuxuma nɡ̤awɔ isaɬulɔ sɛsitʰand̤atʰu sɛɛfa ɛhɔmɛrɛni jɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nixumɛ isaɬulɔ sɛsitʰand̤atʰu sɛɛfa ɛhɔmɛrɛni jɛxasi nɔmlinɡ̤anisɔ ɔmisiwɛjɔ wɛɔli wɛb̤atɛ jɛɔli nixumɛ isaɬulɔ sɛʃumi sɛb̤atɛ ɛkɔrɛni ɛz̤ib̤atɛni ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛhɔmɛrɛni kɛ kuɓa iib̤atɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi z̤ijihɔmɛrɛ nɔxuma ikǁʰwanɛ liɓɛ liɲɛ ɛmpaɬɛni ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ ɛnɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini jasɛmak͡xiwɛni anamanz̤i akwasirajɛli iɓɛ jɛjɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa nɛjɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nɛjɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔkǁɔlɔ ukuɓa ɓakǀaɲaɡ̤uʃɛlwɛ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛli ɓɔsixumɛla lɔ mxumɔ isikʰulu sakwasirajɛli ɔxɔlwa sisikʰulu amad̤ini aɲukajɔ nɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa nɔtʰululwajɔ ɛmitʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkwɛni nasɛkutʰwasɛni kwɛɲanɡ̤a nasɛz̤isaɓatʰɛni nasɛmakǁɛʃɛni amisiwɛjɔ ɛnɮu kasirajɛli lɔlunɡ̤isɛlɛlwa sisɔ id̤ini lɛsɔnɔ nɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa nɛd̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔkǁɔlɔ ukuz̤ɛ ikǀaɲaɡ̤uʃɛlwɛ inɮu kasirajɛli it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɔkukǃala nɡ̤ɔlɔkukǃala ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ wɔtʰaɓatʰa inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa itʰɔlɛ lɛnkɔmɔ ɛliɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ ujiɬamɓululɛ iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛd̤ini lɛsɔnɔ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wɔtʰaɓatʰa ɛɡ̤az̤ini lɛd̤ini lɛsɔnɔ ɛlɔ alikǃaɓɛ ɛmiɡ̤uɓasini jɛnɮu lɛ nasɛz̤imɓɔmɓɛni z̤ɔnɛ z̤amakǀala ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nasɛmiɡ̤uɓasini jɛsanɡ̤ɔ lɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ ɛpʰakatʰi uja kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ nanɡ̤ɔlwɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmntu ɔlaɬɛkajɔ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔsisijatʰa nijikǀamaɡ̤uʃɛlɛ inɮu lɛ nɡ̤ɛjɔkukǃala iɲanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔsuku lwɛʃumi ɛlinɛsinɛ ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ nɔɓa nɛpasika umtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ wɛɛnt͡suku ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kɔɮiwa iz̤ɔnka ɛz̤inɡ̤ɛnaɡ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ isikʰulu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jasɔ nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓantu ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛli sɔlunɡ̤isɛlɛla inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa jɛnkɔmɔ iɓɛ lid̤ini lɛsɔnɔ iint͡suku ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ z̤ɔmtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ sɔmɛnz̤ɛla ujɛhɔv̤a id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ iinkunz̤i ɛz̤int͡ʃa z̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤iɓɛ z̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɛɛnkunz̤i z̤ɛɛɡ̤uʃa ɛz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ z̤iɓɛ z̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤ɛmini nɡ̤ɛɛnt͡suku z̤ɔsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɛnkunz̤i jɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛkǁʰɔnti iɓɛ lid̤ini lɛsɔnɔ nɡ̤ɛmini sɔlunɡ̤isɛlɛla umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa iɛfa ɛnkunz̤ini ɛnt͡ʃa iɛfa ɛnkunz̤ini jɛɡ̤uʃa jɛɔli kujɔ iɛfa nɡ̤ɛɲanɡ̤a jɛsikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤ɔsuku lwɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɬanu ɛɲanɡ̤ɛni lɛjɔ ɛmtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkwɛni sija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ nɡ̤ɛɛnt͡suku ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kwid̤ini lɛsɔnɔ nakwid̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nakumnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa nakwiɔli it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi isanɡ̤ɔ lɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ ɛpʰakatʰi ɛlikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a lɔɬala liv̤aliwɛ nɡ̤ɛɛnt͡suku ɛz̤intand̤atʰu z̤ɔkusɛɓɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsaɓatʰa liv̤ulwɛ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɔkutʰwasa kwɛɲanɡ̤a liv̤ulwɛ sɔnɡ̤ɛna isikʰulu nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jasɛv̤arand̤ɛni jɛsanɡ̤ɔ siv̤ɛla nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ simɛ ɛmiɡ̤uɓasini jɛsanɡ̤ɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ id̤ini lasɔ ɛliɲukajɔ nɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jasɔ jɔkǁɔlɔ sikǃuɓud̤ɛ ɛmɓund̤wini wɛsanɡ̤ɔ sipʰumɛ kɛ linɡ̤av̤alwa isanɡ̤ɔ ɛlɔ kud̤ɛ kuɬwɛ aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛli ɓɔkǃuɓud̤a ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwɛsanɡ̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛsaɓatʰa nasɛkutʰwasɛni kwɛɲanɡ̤a pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ ɛsɔsɔnd̤ɛz̤a lɔna isikʰulu kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsaɓatʰa lɔɓa z̤iimv̤ana ɛz̤intand̤atʰu ɛz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ nɛnkunz̤i jɛɡ̤uʃa ɛɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ nɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa wɔɓa jiɛfa ɛnkunz̤ini lɛjɔ jɛɡ̤uʃa ɛz̤imv̤anɛni ɛz̤ɔ umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa uɓɛ nɡ̤umnikɛlɔ wɛsanɮa sasɔ jɛɔli kujɔ iɛfa nɡ̤ɔsuku lɔkutʰwasa kwɛɲanɡ̤a lija kuɓa jinkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa ɛɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ itʰɔlɛ lɛnkɔmɔ nɛɛmv̤ana ɛz̤intand̤atʰu nɛnkunz̤i jɛɡ̤uʃa z̤iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛ z̤ɔnkɛ sɔlunɡ̤isɛlɛla umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa iɛfa kujɔ inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa jɛnkɔmɔ nɛɛfa kujɔ inkunz̤i jɛɡ̤uʃa kuz̤ɔ iimv̤ana iɓɛ jintɔ ɛsinɔkufikɛlɛla kujɔ isanɮa sasɔ iɓɛ jihin jɛɔli kujɔ iɛfa ɛkuz̤ɛni kwɛsikʰulu sɔnɡ̤ɛna nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jasɛv̤arand̤ɛni jɛsanɡ̤ɔ sipʰumɛ kwanɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jajɔ ɛkuz̤ɛni kɛ kwaɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛli pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa amisiwɛjɔ ɔnɡ̤ɛnɛ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛsanɡ̤ɔ lanɡ̤asɛntla ɛsiz̤a kuŋǃula wɔpʰuma nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛsanɡ̤ɔ lanɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si ɔnɡ̤ɛnɛ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛsanɡ̤ɔ lanɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si wɔpʰuma nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛsanɡ̤ɔ lanɡ̤asɛntla akaji kuɓuja nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛsanɡ̤ɔ anɡ̤ɛnɛ nɡ̤alɔ ɓɔtʰi ɡ̤ǀ̤a ukupʰuma isikʰulu sɔnɡ̤ɛna sipʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni kwaɓɔ ɓatʰi ɛkupʰumɛni kwaɓɔ sipʰumɛ kuɲɛ naɓɔ umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa nɡ̤ɛmitʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ nanɡ̤amakǁɛʃa amisiwɛjɔ wɔɓa jiɛfa kujɔ inkunz̤i ɛnt͡ʃa jɛnkɔmɔ nɛɛfa kujɔ inkunz̤i jɛɡ̤uʃa utʰi ɛz̤imv̤anɛni uliɡ̤anɛ nɛsanɮa sasɔ iɓɛ jihin jɛɔli kujɔ iɛfa kǁa sitʰɛ isikʰulu samɛnz̤ɛla ujɛhɔv̤a id̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nɡ̤ɔkukǃʰutʲwa jintliz̤ijɔ nɔkuɓa jimiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔkǁɔlɔ nɡ̤ɔkukǃʰutʲwa jintliz̤ijɔ maliv̤ulwɛ isanɡ̤ɔ ɛlib̤ɛkɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a silunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ id̤ini lasɔ ɛliɲukajɔ nɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jasɔ jɔkǁɔlɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ silunɡ̤isɛlɛlajɔ nɡ̤ɔm̤la wɛsaɓatʰa sipʰumɛ kɛ ɓaliv̤alɛ isanɡ̤ɔ ɛmv̤a kɔkupʰuma kwasɔ ɓɔjilunɡ̤isɛlɛla imv̤ana ɛmɲaka mɲɛ ɛɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ iɓɛ lid̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ nɡ̤ɛmini kujɛhɔv̤a ɓalilunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ imisɔ nɡ̤ɛmisɔ jɔnkɛ ɓɔlunɡ̤isɛlɛla umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa kuɲɛ nalɔ imisɔ nɡ̤ɛmisɔ jɔnkɛ uɓɛ sisaɬulɔ sɛsitʰand̤atʰu sɛɛfa nɛɔli iɓɛ sisaɬulɔ sɛsitʰatʰu sɛhin jɔkuɲakamisa umɡ̤uɓɔ ɔkǀɔliwɛjɔ uɓɛ nɡ̤umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa kujɛhɔv̤a lɛjɔ jɔɓa jimimisɛlɔ ɛnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ɛmijɔ ɓɔlunɡ̤isɛlɛla imv̤ana nɔmnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa nɛɔli imisɔ nɡ̤ɛmisɔ jɔnkɛ iɓɛ lid̤ini ɛliɲukajɔ ɛlimijɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi kǁa sitʰɛ isikʰulu sampʰa ɔmɲɛ kɔɔɲana ɓasɔ isipʰɔ sɔɓa lakʰɛ siɓɛ sɛsɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ jinz̤uz̤ɔ jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkwɛlifa kǁa sitʰɛ sampʰa ɔmɲɛ kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓasɔ isipʰɔ ɛlifɛni lasɔ sɔɓa sɛsalɔwɔ kud̤ɛ kusɛ kumɲaka wɛnkululɛkɔ siɓujɛlɛ kwisikʰulu lasɔ lɔɓa lɛlɔɔɲana ɓasɔ ɓɔd̤wa isikʰulu ɛsɔ asiji kutʰaɓatʰa ɛlifɛni laɓantu ukuz̤ɛ siɓakǁinz̤ɛlɛlɛ pʰant͡si ɓaɬukanɛ nɛnz̤uz̤ɔ jaɓɔ sɔɓaɮisa ɔɔɲana ɓasɔ kwɛjɛjasɔ inz̤uz̤ɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓanɡ̤aɓi aɓantu ɓam ɛlɔwɔ aɬukanɛ nɛnz̤uz̤ɔ jakʰɛ ɛkunɡ̤ɛnɛni nɡ̤asɛkǀalɛni lɛsanɡ̤ɔ wand̤isa ɛmaɡ̤umɓini aŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli akʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛntla nankɔ kukʰɔ ind̤awɔ kʰɔna ɛsipʰɛlwɛni nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a watʰi lɛ jind̤awɔ apʰɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓɔpʰɛkɛla kʰɔna id̤ini lɛtʲala nɛd̤ini lɛsɔnɔ ɓɔsɛla kʰɔna umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa ukuz̤ɛ ɓanɡ̤apʰumi nawɔ ɓajɛ ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛnɡ̤apʰanɮɛ ukuɓa ɓaŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛ aɓantu wapʰuma waja ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤wɛni ɛnɡ̤apʰanɮɛ wand̤iɮulisa ɛmaɡ̤umɓini ɔmanɛ ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ nankɔ kukʰɔ intɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ ɛmaɡ̤umɓini ɔnkɛ ɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ ijintɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ ɛɡ̤umɓini lɛntɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ ɛmaɡ̤umɓini ɔmanɛ ajɔ intɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ iɓɛ iz̤intɛnd̤ɛlɛz̤ɔ ɛz̤iv̤aliwɛjɔ uɓud̤ɛ ɓuz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi manɛ uɓuɓanz̤i ɓuz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi matʰatʰu umlinɡ̤anisɔ umɲɛ kulɔɔ maɡ̤umɓi ɔmanɛ ɓɛkukʰɔ ukǀamɓa lwɛz̤akʰiwɔ ɔlud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛjɔ kuz̤ɔ lud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛ kuz̤ɔ z̤ɔnɛ kukʰɔ amaz̤ikɔ ɔkupʰɛka ɛnz̤iwɛ nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤amɓa nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ watʰi ɛz̤i z̤iz̤inɮu z̤ɔkupʰɛka apʰɔ aɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛli ɓajɔ inɮu ɓapʰɛkɛla kʰɔna umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ waɓantu wand̤iɓujisɛla ɛmɲanɡ̤ɔ wajɔ inɮu nankɔ kupʰuma amanz̤i nɡ̤apʰant͡si kɔmɓund̤u wɔmɲanɡ̤ɔ wɛnɮu lɛjɔ ɛsinɡ̤a nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓusɔ ɓajɔ inɮu ɓɛɓunɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a amana ɛsiɬa amanz̤i ɛv̤ɛla nɡ̤apʰant͡si ɛkǀalɛni lɔkunɛnɛ kwinɮu lɛjɔ nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si kwɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wapʰuma nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛsanɡ̤ɔ lanɡ̤asɛntla wand̤id͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤isa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla ɛnɡ̤apʰanɮɛ wand̤isa ɛsanɡ̤wɛni ɛlinɡ̤apʰanɮɛ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jɛlib̤ɛkɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a nanɡ̤ɔ amanz̤i ɛkǃukukǃɛla ɛv̤ɛla ɛkǀalɛni lɔkunɛnɛ lɛsanɡ̤ɔ ɛkupʰumɛni kɔmntu ɔɓɛpʰɛtʰɛ ulutʲa lɔkulinɡ̤anisa nɡ̤ɛsanɮa ɛsija nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a walinɡ̤anisa lɛɛkub̤itɛ wand̤iwɛz̤a ɛmanz̤ini amanz̤i aɓɛtʰa ɛmakǃatʰɛni walinɡ̤anisa wand̤iwɛz̤a ɛmanz̤ini amanz̤i aɓɛtʰa ɛmad̤ɔlwɛni walinɡ̤anisa wand̤iwɛz̤a ɛmanz̤ini amanz̤i aɓɛtʰa ɛsiŋǃɛni walinɡ̤anisa aɓa nɡ̤umlamɓɔ ɛnd̤inɡ̤ɛnakuwuwɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa amanz̤i ahamɓa pʰɛz̤ulu amanz̤i aɓa nɡ̤awɔkud̤ad̤wa umlamɓɔ ɔnɡ̤ɛnakuwɛlwa watʰi uɓɔnilɛ ɲana wɔmntu wand̤ihamɓisa wand̤iɓujisa pʰɛz̤u kɔd̤ini lɔmlamɓɔ lɔwɔ ɛkuɓujɛni nankɔ kukʰɔ ɛlud̤inini lɔmlamɓɔ imitʰi ɛmininz̤i kunɛnɛ nɡ̤apʰa nanɡ̤apʰa watʰi la manz̤i apʰuma ajɛ kummanɮa wasɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɛɬɛ ajɛ ɛarab̤a ajɛ ɛlwanɮɛ atʰi ɛlɛ ɛlwanɮɛ apʰiliswɛ amanz̤i alɔ kujɛ kutʰi kɛ jɔnkɛ imipʰɛfumlɔ ɛpʰililɛjɔ ɛɲakaz̤ɛlajɔ ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɔtʰɛ kuz̤ɔ umlamɓɔkaz̤i lɔwɔ ipʰilɛ z̤iɓɛ z̤ininz̤i kunɛnɛ iintlanz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛfikilɛ kʰɔna manz̤i ɔpʰiliswa ipʰilɛ jɔnkɛ intɔ ɔfikɛ kujɔ umlamɓɔ lɔwɔ kɔtʰi kɛ kumɛ aɓaɓamɓisi ɓɛɛntlanz̤i pʰɛz̤u kwawɔ ɓatʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛɛnɡ̤ɛd̤i ɓad̤ɛ ɓajɛ ɛɛn̤ɛɡ̤lajim ind̤awɔ jɔkwanɛka iminatʰa z̤ija kuɓa nɡ̤ɔkɔɬɔɓɔ lwaz̤ɔ iintlanz̤i z̤aɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛntlanz̤i z̤ɔlwanɮɛ ɔlukʰulu ukuɓa z̤ininz̤i kunɛnɛ kɛ imiɡ̤ǁ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤ɔ jalɔ namad̤ikɛ alɔ akaji kupʰila aja kunikɛlwa ɛkuɓɛni mtʲuɓa kɔpʰuma pʰɛz̤u kɔmlamɓɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔd̤ini lwawɔ nɡ̤apʰa nanɡ̤apʰa imitʰi jɔnkɛ ɛɮiwajɔ amaɡ̤ǃ̤aɓi ajɔ akaji kuɓuna z̤inɡ̤apʰɛli iz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ajɔ ija kuv̤utʰwa iz̤ikǃʰamɔ ɛz̤it͡ʃa nɡ̤ɛɛɲanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa amanz̤i awɔ wɔna apʰuma ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛni iz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ajɔ z̤ija kuɓa z̤ɛz̤ɔkuɮiwa namaɡ̤ǃ̤aɓi ajɔ aɓɛ nɡ̤awɔkupʰilisa it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤uwɔ lɔ umd̤a ɛnija kuz̤aɓɛla nɡ̤awɔ iliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛlinaz̤iɓini z̤ikasirajɛli ujɔsɛfu wɔɓa namakǀand̤ɛlɔ amaɓini iliz̤wɛ nija kuliɮa ɛlɔwɔ aliɮɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔwaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤apʰakamisa isanɮa sɔkuɓa nd̤ilinikɛ ɔjiɬɔ lɔwɛla ɛli liz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛlifa nɡ̤uwɔ lɔ umd̤a wɛliz̤wɛ ɛlɔ nɡ̤ɛkǀala lanɡ̤asɛntla wɔtʰaɓatʰɛla kulwanɮɛ ɔlukʰulu nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jasɛhɛtɛlɔn ukuɓa ujɛ ɛt͡sɛd̤ad̤a ɛhamati nasɛb̤ɛrɔta nasɛsiɓrajim ɛpʰakatʰi kɔmd̤a wasɛd̤amaskɔ nɔmd̤a wasɛhamati nasɛhat͡sɛrɛ ɛpʰakatʰi ɛsɛmd̤ɛni wasɛhawuran umd̤a utʰaɓatʰɛla ɛlwanɮɛ umɛ nɡ̤ɛhat͡sarɛɛnɔn umd̤a wasɛd̤amaskɔ ɔwasɛntla nɡ̤asɛntla umd̤a wasɛhamati likǀala lasɛntla kɛ ɛlɔ ikǀala lanɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a pʰakatʰi kwɛhawuran nɛd̤amaskɔ nɛɡ̤ilijad̤i nɛliz̤wɛ lakwasirajɛli jijɔrd̤an nɔtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛmd̤ɛni lɔwa nisɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔlwanɮɛ lwanɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a ukulinɡ̤anisa likǀala lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a kɛ ɛlɔ ikǀala lasɛz̤ant͡si nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si lɔtʰaɓatʰɛla kwatamarɛ lisɛ ɛmanz̤ini ɛmɓamɓanɔ asɛkad̤ɛʃɛ lihamɓɛ nɡ̤ɔmlamɓɔ lisɛ kulɔ ulwanɮɛ ɔlukʰulu likǀala lasɛz̤ant͡si nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si kɛ ɛlɔ ikǀala lasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a lulwanɮɛ ɔlukʰulu lutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛmd̤ɛni lɔwɔ lud̤ɛ lulunɡ̤ɛ nɔkuja ɛhamati likǀala lasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a kɛ ɛlɔ nɔz̤aɓɛla kɛ ɛli liz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤akwasirajɛli kɔtʰi kɛ nilaɓɛ nɡ̤amakǃaʃisɔ liɓɛ nakuɓasɛmz̤ini aɓapʰamɓukɛla aɓaz̤ɛlɛ ɔɔɲana pʰakatʰi kwɛnu kuni ɓɔɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓaz̤alɛlwɛ kulɔɔ nd̤awɔ aɓapʰakatʰi kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɔlamkɛla nɡ̤amakǃaʃisɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤akwasirajɛli kuɲɛ kuja kutʰi ɛsiz̤wɛni apʰamɓukɛlɛ kusɔ ɔwasɛmz̤ini nimnikɛ lakʰɛ apʰɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤awɔ amaɡ̤ama ɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤ɔ ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkupʰɛlɛni nɡ̤ɛntla ɛhamɓa ɛkǀalɛni kwɛnɮɛla jasɛhɛtɛlɔn ukuja ɛhamati nasɛhat͡sarɛɛnɔn umd̤a wasɛd̤amaskɔ nɡ̤asɛntla ɛkǀalɛni lasɛhamati liɓɛ lɛlakʰɛ ikǀala lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a nɛlasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a ud̤an wɔɓa nɛkǀand̤ɛlɔ ɛliɲɛ nɡ̤asɛmd̤ɛni kɛ kad̤an kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkǀalɛni lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a kusɛ ɛkǀalɛni lasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a uaʃɛrɛ liɓɛ liɲɛ nɡ̤asɛmd̤ɛni kɛ kaaʃɛrɛ kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkǀalɛni lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a kusɛ ɛkǀalɛni lasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a unafɛtali liɓɛ liɲɛ nɡ̤asɛmd̤ɛni kanafɛtali kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkǀalɛni lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a kusɛ ɛkǀalɛni lasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a umanasɛ liɓɛ liɲɛ nɡ̤asɛmd̤ɛni kamanasɛ kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkǀalɛni lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a kusɛ ɛkǀalɛni lasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a uɛfrajim liɓɛ liɲɛ nɡ̤asɛmd̤ɛni kaɛfrajim kutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛkǀalɛni lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a kusɛ ɛkǀalɛni lasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a urub̤ɛn liɓɛ liɲɛ nɡ̤asɛmd̤ɛni karub̤ɛn kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkǀalɛni lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a kusɛ ɛkǀalɛni lasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a ujud̤a liɓɛ liɲɛ nɡ̤asɛmd̤ɛni kajud̤a kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkǀalɛni lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a kusɛ ɛkǀalɛni lasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a jɔɓa nɡ̤umxumɔ ɛnija kuwuxuma uɓɛ nɡ̤amawaka anɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini anamaɬanu ɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ uɓuɓanz̤i uɓud̤ɛ kɛ ɓuɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɓɛsiɲɛ isaɬulɔ kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkǀalɛni lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a kud̤ɛ kujɛ ɛkǀalɛni lasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ isɛsaz̤ulwini sawɔ umxumɔ ɛnija kuwuxumɛla ujɛhɔv̤a wɔɓa nɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini anamaɬanu uɓud̤ɛ uɓɛ nɡ̤amawaka aliʃumi uɓuɓanz̤i wɔɓa nɡ̤ɔwaɓa umxumɔ ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔwaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nɡ̤asɛntla uɓɛ nɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini anamaɬanu uɓud̤ɛ nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a uɓɛ liʃumi uɓuɓanz̤i nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a uɓɛ liʃumi uɓuɓanz̤i nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si uɓɛ nɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini anamaɬanu uɓud̤ɛ iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kajɛhɔv̤a jɔɓa sɛsaz̤ulwini sawɔ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤walisiwɛjɔ kɔɔɲana ɓakat͡sad̤ɔki aɓasiɡ̤ǀ̤inajɔ isiɡ̤ǁ̤ina aɓanɡ̤and̤wɛnd̤wanɡ̤a ɛkund̤wɛnd̤wɛni kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓand̤wɛnd̤wajɔ aɓalɛv̤i wɔɓa nɡ̤ɔwaɓɔ umxumɔ ɛmxumɛni wɛliz̤wɛ ujiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤asɛmd̤ɛni waɓakalɛv̤i kɛ aɓalɛv̤i ɓɔz̤uz̤a isaɬulɔ ɛsiŋǁulumɛnɛ nɔmd̤a waɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli siɓɛ nɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini anamaɬanu uɓud̤ɛ siɓɛ liʃumi uɓuɓanz̤i ɓɔnkɛ uɓud̤ɛ ɓuɓɛ nɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini anamaɬanu nɔɓuɓanz̤i ɓuɓɛ liʃumi kɛ aɓaji kutʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɛntɔ jasɔ ɓanɡ̤ananisi uɡ̤ajɔ ɓanɡ̤ajiɮulisɛli kwaɓaɲɛ intlaɬɛla jɛlɔ z̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a kɛ amaɬanu asɛlɛjɔ ɛɓuɓanz̤ini anɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini anamaɬanu akaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤awɔmz̤i nɡ̤awɛnd̤awɔ jɔkuma nɛjɛpʰanɮɛ umz̤i wɔɓa sɛsaz̤ulwini sawɔ jijɔ lɛ imilinɡ̤anisɔ ikǀala lanɡ̤asɛntla lɔɓa nɡ̤amawaka amanɛ anamakʰulu amaɬanu ikǀala lanɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si liɓɛ nɡ̤amawaka amanɛ anamakʰulu amaɬanu ikǀala lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a liɓɛ nɡ̤amawaka amanɛ anamakʰulu amaɬanu ikǀala lasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a liɓɛ nɡ̤amawaka amanɛ anamakʰulu amaɬanu ipʰanɮɛ lɔmz̤i nɡ̤asɛntla lɔɓa nɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini anamaʃumi amaɬanu nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si liɓɛ nɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini anamaʃumi amaɬanu nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a liɓɛ nɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini anamaʃumi amaɬanu nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a liɓɛ nɡ̤amakʰulu amaɓini anamaʃumi amaɬanu ɔkusɛlɛjɔ ɛɓud̤ɛni ɔɓuŋǁulumɛnɛ nɔmxumɔ ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kɔɓa nɡ̤amawaka aliʃumi nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a kuɓɛ nɡ̤amawaka aliʃumi nɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a ɔŋǁulumana nɔmxumɔ ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ unɡ̤ɛnisɛlɔ lwawɔ luɓɛ kukuɮa kwaɓasɛɓɛnz̤i ɓawɔ umz̤i aɓasɛɓɛnz̤i aɓɔ kɛ ɓɔmz̤i ɓɔwalima ɓɛnɡ̤aɓasɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤akwasirajɛli umxumɔ wɔnkɛ wɔɓa nɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini anamaɬanu uɓud̤ɛ uɓɛ nɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini anamaɬanu uɓuɓanz̤i isaɬulɔ sɛsinɛ sɔmxumɔ ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɔsixumɛla ukuɓa siɓɛ sɛsɔmz̤i lɔwɔ ind̤awɔ ɛsɛlɛjɔ jɔɓa jɛjɛsikʰulu nɡ̤apʰa nanɡ̤apʰa kɔmxumɔ ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nakwinz̤uz̤ɔ jɔmz̤i nɡ̤apʰamɓi anɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini anamaɬanu ɔmxumɔ id̤ɛ ijɛ ɛmd̤ɛni wasɛmpumalanɡ̤a nanɡ̤asɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a pʰamɓi anɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini anamaɬanu nɡ̤asɛmd̤ɛni wɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a iŋǁulumɛnɛ nɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤aɬulɔ jɔɓa jɛjɛsikʰulu umxumɔ ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jajɔ inɮu jɔɓa sɛsaz̤ulwini sajɔ kutʰaɓatʰɛla kɛ ɛnz̤uz̤wɛni jaɓalɛv̤i kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛnz̤uz̤wɛni jɔmz̤i ɛsaz̤ulwini sɛnz̤uz̤ɔ jɛsikʰulu pʰakatʰi kɔmd̤a kajud̤a nɔmd̤a kab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin kɔɓa kɔkwɛsikʰulu ɛz̤isɛlɛjɔ kɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkǀalɛni lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a kusɛ ɛkǀalɛni lasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a ub̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin wɔɓa nɛkǀand̤ɛlɔ ɛliɲɛ nɡ̤asɛmd̤ɛni kɛ kab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkǀalɛni lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a kusɛ ɛkǀalɛni lasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a usimɔn liɓɛ liɲɛ nɡ̤asɛmd̤ɛni kɛ kasimɔn kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkǀalɛni lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a kusɛ ɛkǀalɛni lasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a uisakarɛ liɓɛ liɲɛ nɡ̤asɛmd̤ɛni kɛ kaisakarɛ kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkǀalɛni lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a kusɛ ɛkǀalɛni lasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a uz̤ɛb̤ulɔn liɓɛ liɲɛ nɡ̤asɛmd̤ɛni kɛ kaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkǀalɛni lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a kusɛ ɛkǀalɛni lasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a uɡ̤ad̤i liɓɛ liɲɛ nɡ̤asɛmd̤ɛni kɛ kaɡ̤ad̤i nɡ̤asɛkǀalɛni lasɛz̤ant͡si nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si umd̤a wɔtʰaɓatʰɛla kwatamarɛ usɛ ɛmanz̤ini ɛmɓamɓanɔ asɛkad̤ɛʃɛ ukʰwɛz̤ɛ umlamɓɔ usɛ kulɔ ulwanɮɛ ɔlukʰulu lilɔ ɛlɔ iliz̤wɛ ɛnija kulaɓɛla iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤akwasirajɛli nɡ̤amakǃaʃisɔ nɡ̤ɔkwamafa z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ iz̤aɬulɔ z̤alɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a z̤iz̤ɔ ɛz̤i iz̤ipʰɛlɔ z̤amakǀala ɔmz̤i nɡ̤ɛkǀala lanɡ̤asɛntla nɡ̤amawaka amanɛ anamakʰulu amaɬanu umlinɡ̤anisɔ nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ amasanɡ̤ɔ ɔmz̤i ɔɓa nɡ̤ɔkwamaɡ̤ama ɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤akwasirajɛli iɓɛ nɡ̤amasanɡ̤ɔ amatʰatʰu nɡ̤asɛntla iɓɛ lisanɡ̤ɔ likarub̤ɛn ɛliɲɛ iɓɛ lisanɡ̤ɔ likajud̤a ɛliɲɛ iɓɛ lisanɡ̤ɔ likalɛv̤i ɛliɲɛ nɡ̤ɛkǀala lasɛmpumalanɡ̤a jɔɓa nɡ̤amawaka amanɛ anamakʰulu amaɬanu ɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ amasanɡ̤ɔ kɛ matʰatʰu iɓɛ lisanɡ̤ɔ likajɔsɛfu ɛliɲɛ iɓɛ lisanɡ̤ɔ likab̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin ɛliɲɛ iɓɛ lisanɡ̤ɔ likad̤an ɛliɲɛ nɡ̤ɛkǀala lanɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si umlinɡ̤anisɔ jɔɓa nɡ̤amawaka amanɛ anamakʰulu amaɬanu amasanɡ̤ɔ kɛ matʰatʰu iɓɛ lisanɡ̤ɔ likasimɔn ɛliɲɛ iɓɛ lisanɡ̤ɔ likaisakarɛ ɛliɲɛ iɓɛ lisanɡ̤ɔ likaz̤ɛb̤ulɔn ɛliɲɛ nɡ̤ɛkǀala lasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a jɔɓa nɡ̤amawaka amanɛ anamakʰulu amaɬanu amasanɡ̤ɔ kɛ awɔ matʰatʰu iɓɛ lisanɡ̤ɔ likaɡ̤ad̤i ɛliɲɛ iɓɛ lisanɡ̤ɔ likaaʃɛrɛ ɛliɲɛ iɓɛ lisanɡ̤ɔ likanafɛtali ɛliɲɛ ukud͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a kɛ liʃumi ɛlinɛsib̤ɔz̤ɔ ɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤ɔnɡ̤ɔlɔ iɡ̤ama lawɔ umz̤i kɔtʰiwa kususɛla kulɔɔ nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤aɛkʰɔna nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsitʰatʰu wɔɓukumkani ɓukajɛhɔjakim wakwajud̤a kwɛz̤a unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɛjɛrusalɛm wajiŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a inkɔsi jamnikɛla ujɛhɔjakim wakwajud̤a ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ nɛŋǁalɛɲɛ jɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ awaz̤itʰwalɛla ɛz̤wɛni lasɛʃinarɛ ɛnɮwini jɔtʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ iimpaɬa ɛz̤ɔ waz̤inɡ̤ɛnisa ɛnɮwini jɔɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓɔtʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ watʰi kuaʃpɛnaz̤i umtʰɛtʰɛlimatʰɛnwa akʰɛ makaz̤isɛ aɓakɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli naɓɛmɓɛwu jakwakumkani naɓakumawaɓa aɓantwana aɓanɡ̤ɛnasipʰakɔ aɓanɔmkʰitʰa aɓaɓukǃikǃilɛjɔ uɓulumkɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓanɔkwaz̤i aɓanɔkujikǃɔnd̤a ɓajaz̤i intɔ aɓafanɛlɛ ɛb̤ɔtwɛni lɔkumkani aɓafund̤isɛ iŋǀwad̤i nɔlwimi lwamakalɛd̤i ukumkani waɓamisɛla umamkɛlisɔ wɛmini nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛmini jawɔ ɛkuɮɛni kɔkumkani nasɛwajinini ajisɛlajɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓɔnɮiwɛ imiɲaka ɛmitʰatʰu ɓatʰi ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwajɔ ɓɛmɛ pʰamɓi kɔkumkani kɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ aɓɔ kwajɛ kukʰɔ aɓakɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a inɡ̤ud̤anijɛli nɔhananija nɔmiʃajɛli nɔaz̤arija umtʰɛtʰɛlimatʰɛnwa waɓatʰija amaɡ̤ama ud̤anijɛli wamtʰija ɛlɔkuɓa nɡ̤ub̤ɛlɛt͡ʃat͡sarɛ uhananija ɛlɔkuɓa nɡ̤uʃad̤raki umiʃajɛli ɛlɔkuɓa nɡ̤umɛʃaki uaz̤arija ɛlɔkuɓa nɡ̤uab̤ɛd̤ɛnɛɡ̤ɔ kɛ kalɔku ud̤anijɛli wajɛɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɛ ukuɓa anɡ̤az̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ɔlisi nɡ̤ɔkuɮa kɔkumkani nanɡ̤ɛwajini ajisɛlajɔ wakǀɛla kumtʰɛtʰɛlimatʰɛnwa ukuɓa anɡ̤az̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ɔlisi utʰikǁɔ wɛnz̤a ud̤anijɛli ukuɓa afumanɛ iŋǀɛɓa nɛmfɛsanɛ pʰamɓi kɔmtʰɛtʰɛlimatʰɛnwa umtʰɛtʰɛlimatʰɛnwa watʰi kud̤anijɛli nd̤ijajɔjika inkɔsi jam ɔmisɛ ɛnija kukuɮa nɛnija kukusɛla jini ukuɓa aɓuɓɔnɛ uɓusɔ ɓɛnu ɓutʰɛ mat͡ʃamat͡ʃa kunɔɓaɓaja ɓaz̤iintanɡ̤a z̤ɛnu nɔjiz̤ɛkisa itʲala intlɔkɔ jam watʰi ud̤anijɛli kwind͡ʒ̤ɔli aɓɛtʰɛ umtʰɛtʰɛlimatʰɛnwa wajimisa pʰɛz̤u kɔd̤anijɛli nɔhananija nɔmiʃajɛli nɔaz̤arija kʰawuɓalinɡ̤ɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ iint͡suku ɛz̤iliʃumi sinikwɛ siɮɛ imifunɔ sisɛlɛ namanz̤i kukʰanɡ̤ɛlwɛ pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ ukuɓɔnakala kwɛtʰu nɔkuɓɔnakala kwaɓantwana aɓaɮa ukuɮa kɔkumkani wɛnz̤ɛ kɛ kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ uɓɔnɛ nɡ̤akɔ jaɓapʰulapʰula kɛ kwɛli liz̤wi jaɓalinɡ̤a iint͡suku ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛɛnt͡suku ɛz̤iliʃumi jaɓɔnakala imɓɔnakalɔ jaɓɔ intlɛ ɓɛtʲɛɓilɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓantwana ɓɔnkɛ aɓaɮa ukuɮa kɔkumkani jakususa kɛ ind͡ʒ̤ɔli ukuɮa kwaɓɔ nɛwajini aɓanɡ̤ɛ ɓɛjisɛla jaɓanika imifunɔ aɓɔ ɓantwana ɓanɛ utʰikǁɔ waɓanika ukwaz̤i nɔkuz̤ikǃɔnd̤a iiŋǀwad̤i z̤ɔnkɛ nɔɓulumkɔ ud̤anijɛli waɓa nɔkujikǃɔnd̤a imiɓɔnɔ jɔnkɛ namapʰupʰa ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛɛnt͡suku aɓɛtʰɛ maz̤ɛ ɓaz̤iswɛ nɡ̤az̤ɔ umtʰɛtʰɛlimatʰɛnwa waɓanɡ̤ɛnisa kɛ pʰamɓi kɔnɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ ukumkani watʰɛtʰa naɓɔ kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla akufumanɛkanɡ̤a ɓand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔd̤anijɛli nɔhananija nɔmiʃajɛli nɔaz̤arija ɓɛma kɛ ɓɔna pʰamɓi kɔkumkani kɛ kuz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iind̤awɔ z̤ɔɓulumkɔ ɓɔkukǃɔnd̤a aɓɛz̤iɓuz̤a kuɓɔ waɓafumana ɓɛɓaɮula nɡ̤ɔkukaliʃumi z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤az̤i naɓakʰwit͡si aɓasɛɓukumkanini ɓɔnkɛ kɛ kalɔku ud̤anijɛli waɓa lapʰɔ kwad̤a kwanɡ̤umɲaka wɔkukǃala kakɔrɛʃi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsiɓini unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ ɛnɡ̤ukumkani unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wapʰupʰa amapʰupʰa wakʰatʰaz̤ɛka umɔja wakʰɛ wapʰɛlɛlwa ɓuɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ ukumkani watʰi makuɓiz̤wɛ iz̤az̤i naɓakʰwit͡si naɓakʰafuli namakalɛd̤i ɓamkǁɛlɛlɛ amapʰupʰa akʰɛ ɓɛz̤a kɛ ɓɛma pʰamɓi kɔkumkani watʰi kuɓɔ nd̤ipʰupʰɛ ipʰupʰa umɔja kɛ uŋ̤ǃ̤unɡ̤ɛla ukulaz̤i ipʰupʰa ɛlɔ amakalɛd̤i atʰɛtʰa kɛ nɡ̤ɛsiaram atʰi kumkani jiɮa uɓɔmi nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ ɓalawulɛlɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ ipʰupʰa ɛlɔ sɔkukǁɛlɛla ukutʰʲilwa kwalɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula watʰi kumakalɛd̤i iliz̤wi malaz̤ɛkɛ ukuɓa anitʰanɡ̤a nind̤az̤isɛ ipʰupʰa ɛlɔ nɔkutʰʲilwa kwalɔ nija kwɛnz̤iwa iz̤ikǃwɛnɡ̤a iz̤inɮu z̤ɛnu z̤ɛnz̤iwɛ ind̤awɔ ɛkujiwa kujɔ ɛnɮɛ ukuɓa nitʰɛ nalikǁɛla ipʰupʰa ɛlɔ nɔkutʰʲilwa kwalɔ nɔz̤uz̤a iz̤ipʰɔ nɛmiv̤uz̤ɔ nɛmɓɛkɔ ɛnkulu nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ nd̤ikǁɛlɛlɛni ipʰupʰa nɔkutʰʲilwa kwalɔ apʰɛnd̤ula ɔkwɛsiɓini atʰi ukumkani makaɓalawulɛlɛ aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ ipʰupʰa ɛlɔ sɔkukǁɛlɛla ukutʰʲilwa kwalɔ ukumkani wapʰɛnd̤ula watʰi nd̤ijaz̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɲanisɛkilɛjɔ ukuɓa ninɡ̤a ninɡ̤az̤uz̤a ikǁɛʃa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa niɓɔna ukuɓa sɛliwisiwɛ iliz̤wi ukuɓa kɛ anitʰanɡ̤a nind̤az̤isɛ ipʰupʰa mɲɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nib̤unɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkutʰɛtʰa amaz̤wi anɡ̤amanɡ̤a ɔnakalisajɔ pʰamɓi lid̤ɛ ikǁɛʃa liɓɛ lilimɓi nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ nd̤itʲɛlɛni ipʰupʰa ɛlɔ nd̤az̤i kɛ ukuɓa nɔnd̤ikǁɛlɛla ukutʰʲilwa kwalɔ apʰɛnd̤ula amakalɛd̤i pʰamɓi kɔkumkani atʰi akukʰɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɬaɓatʰi unɔkujikǁɛla lɛ ntɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa akukʰɔ mkʰulu unɛɡ̤uɲa wakʰa waɓuz̤a intɔ ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kuz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤az̤i naɓakʰwit͡si namakalɛd̤i kɛ lɔɔ ntɔ ajifunajɔ iŋǃaɓilɛ akukʰɔ namɲɛ unɔkujikǁɛla pʰamɓi kɔkumkani inɡ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓɔ ɔɔtʰikǁɔ aɓakʰaja linɡ̤ɛkʰɔjɔ kwiz̤intɔ ɛz̤ijiɲama nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ wakǃumɓa waɓa nɔɓuxalaxumɛ ɔɓukʰulu watʰi maz̤it͡ʃatʲalaliswɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ilumkɔ z̤asɛb̤ab̤ɛli kwapʰuma umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkuɓa maz̤iɓulawɛ iz̤ilumkɔ ɓamfuna kɛ ud̤anijɛli namakʰɔlwanɛ akʰɛ ukuɓa ɓaɓaɓulalɛ waz̤a wapʰɛnd̤ula nɡ̤ɛkǀɛɓɔ nanɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ ud̤anijɛli kuarijɔki umtʰɛtʰɛli waɓasiki ɓɔkumkani ɔɓɛpʰumɛ wɛz̤a kuɓulala iz̤ilumkɔ z̤asɛb̤ab̤ɛli wapʰɛnd̤ula watʰi kuarijɔki ɔɓɛnɛɡ̤uɲa lakɔmkʰulu jini ukuɓa kupʰumɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukuɓa ɓukʰali waz̤a uarijɔki wamaz̤isa ud̤anijɛli lɛ ntɔ ud̤anijɛli wanɡ̤ɛna wakǀɛla ukuɓa ampʰɛ ikǁɛʃa ukuɓa anukǁɛlɛlɛ ukutʰʲilwa kwɛpʰupʰa ɛlɔ waz̤a ud̤anijɛli waja ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ wajaz̤isa ɔɔhananija nɔmiʃajɛli nɔaz̤arija amakʰɔlwanɛ akʰɛ lɛ ntɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓakǀɛlɛ imfɛsanɛ kutʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jalɛ mfiɬakalɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓanɡ̤at͡ʃatʲalaliswa ud̤anijɛli kʰɔlwanɛ akʰɛ kuɲɛ nɛz̤iɲɛ iz̤ilumkɔ z̤asɛb̤ab̤ɛli waz̤a wajitʰʲilɛlwa ud̤anijɛli lɔɔ mfiɬakalɔ nɡ̤ɔmɓɔnɔ wasɛɓusuku waz̤a ud̤anijɛli wamɓɔnɡ̤a utʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu wasusɛla ud̤anijɛli watʰi maliɓɔnɡ̤wɛ iɡ̤ama likatʰikǁɔ kususɛla kunapʰakad̤ɛ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uɓulumkɔ nɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa ɓɔna ɓɔɓakʰɛ jɛna ujawaɡ̤ukǃula kɛ amakǁɛʃa nɛmiɲaka uɡ̤uz̤ula ɔɔkumkani amisɛ ɔɔkumkani uɓulumkɔ kwiz̤ilumkɔ ukwaz̤i kwaɓakwaz̤ijɔ ukukǃɔnd̤a jɛna utʰʲila iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inz̤ulu nɛz̤isitʰɛlɛjɔ ujakwaz̤i ɔkusɛɓumɲamɛni ukukʰaɲa kuɬɛli kujɛ nd̤ija kuɓulɛla tʰikǁɔ wɔɔɓawɔ nd̤ikuŋǀɔma kuɓa und̤inikɛ uɓulumkɔ nɔɓuɡ̤ɔxa wand̤az̤isa kalɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ ɔkɔ siɓɛ sikukǀɛla kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa usaz̤isilɛ nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ lɛ ntɔ jɔkumkani nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ud̤anijɛli wanɡ̤ɛna waja kuarijɔki lɔwɔ uɓɛmiswɛ nɡ̤ukumkani ukuɓa at͡ʃaɓalalisɛ iz̤ilumkɔ z̤asɛb̤ab̤ɛli waja kɛ watʰi kujɛ musa ukuz̤it͡ʃaɓalalisa iz̤ilumkɔ z̤asɛb̤ab̤ɛli nd̤isɛ nd̤ɔmkǁɛlɛla ukutʰʲilwa kwɛpʰupʰa ɛlɔ waz̤a uarijɔki wamz̤isa ud̤anijɛli nɡ̤ɔɓuŋ̤ǁ̤amɔ watʰi kujɛ nd̤ifumɛnɛ ind̤ɔd̤a kɔɔɲana ɓasɛlutʰind͡ʒ̤wɛni lwakwajud̤a ɛja kumaz̤isa ukutʰʲilwa kwɛpʰupʰa ɛlɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula watʰi kud̤anijɛli ɔɡ̤ama linɡ̤ub̤ɛlɛt͡ʃat͡sarɛ unakɔ ukund̤az̤isa ipʰupʰa ɛnd̤iliɓɔnilɛjɔ nɔkutʰʲilwa kwalɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula ud̤anijɛli pʰamɓi kɔkumkani watʰi imfiɬakalɔ ajiɓuz̤ajɔ az̤inakɔ ukumkǁɛlɛla iz̤ilumkɔ naɓakʰwit͡si nɛz̤az̤i namatɔla kɔd̤wa kɛ kukʰɔ utʰikǁɔ ɛmaz̤ulwini ɔz̤itʰʲilajɔ iimfiɬakalɔ ɔnɔkumaz̤isa unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ ɔkuja kuɓakʰɔ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɬa ipʰupʰa lakʰɔ nɛmiɓɔnɔ jɛntlɔkɔ jakʰɔ ɛsililini sakʰɔ nant͡si wɛna iz̤ikǀamanɡ̤ɔ z̤akʰɔ z̤atʰi tʲaɓa kuwɛ ɛsililini sakʰɔ z̤ɔkuja kuɓakʰɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔku lɔwɔ kɛ uz̤itʰʲilajɔ iimfiɬakalɔ ujakwaz̤isa ɔkuja kuɓakʰɔ mna lɛ mfiɬakalɔ ukujitʰʲilɛlwa akunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓulumkɔ nd̤inɡ̤aɓa nd̤inaɓɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓapʰililɛjɔ kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuz̤ɛ az̤iswɛ ukutʰʲilwa kwalɔ uz̤az̤i iz̤ikǀamanɡ̤ɔ z̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ wɛna waɓɛ uɓɔna nanɡ̤ɔ umfanɛkisɔ ɔmkʰulu lɔɔ mfanɛkisɔ uɓumkʰulu nɔkuɓɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛla kwawɔ kwaŋǀamisa pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ imɓɔnakalɔ jawɔ iɓisɔjikɛka lɔɔ mfanɛkisɔ intlɔkɔ jawɔ iɓijiɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ isifuɓa sawɔ nɛɛnɡ̤alɔ z̤awɔ z̤ijisiliv̤ɛrɛ sawɔ namaŋǃɛ awɔ ɛlub̤ɛd̤u imilɛnz̤ɛ jawɔ isisiɲitʰi iiɲawɔ z̤awɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁalɛɲɛ z̤isisiɲitʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁalɛɲɛ z̤ilud̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ wawuɓɔna kwad̤a kwaz̤itʰwɛɓula ilitʲɛ kunɡ̤ɛnɡ̤az̤anɮa laɓɛtʰa ɛmfanɛkiswɛni ɛz̤iɲawɛni z̤awɔ z̤ɛsiɲitʰi nɔd̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ laz̤ikǀɔla z̤az̤a kɛ z̤akǀɔlɛka kwakaɲɛ isiɲitʰi nɔd̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ nɔb̤ɛd̤u nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ z̤aɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmkǃukǃu wɛz̤and̤a z̤asɛɬɔtʲɛni wɛmka naz̤ɔ umɔja az̤afuɲanɛlwa nd̤awɔ ilitʲɛ ɛlɔ liɓɛtʰilɛjɔ ɛmfanɛkiswɛni laɓa jintaɓa ɛnkulu laz̤alisa iɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ lilɔ ɛlɔ ipʰupʰa ukutʰʲilwa kwalɔ sɔkukǁɛla pʰamɓi kɔkumkani wɛna wɔɔkumkani utʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu ukunikɛ uɓukumkani namanɮa nɔkɔmɛlɛla nɔz̤ukɔ ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ kɛ apʰɔ kuɬɛli kʰɔna intɔ ɛnɡ̤umntu amaxamŋǀwa asɛnɮɛ nɛɛntaka z̤ɛz̤ulu uz̤inikɛlɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ wakwɛnz̤a wanɛɡ̤uɲa kuz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ intlɔkɔ jɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ lɛ nɡ̤uwɛ ɛmv̤ɛni kwakʰɔ kuja kuv̤ɛla ɔɓuɲɛ uɓukumkani ɔɓupʰant͡si kunawɛ nɔɓuɲɛ uɓukumkani ɓɛsitʰatʰu ɓɔb̤ɛd̤u ɔɓuja kuɓa nɛɡ̤uɲa ɛɬaɓatʰini lɔnkɛ nɔɓɛsinɛ uɓukumkani ɓuja kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsiɲitʰi ukɔmɛlɛla nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa isiɲitʰi siz̤ikǀɔla siz̤itʰi nkumɛnkumɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɓɔɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsiɲitʰi ukuz̤ikǀɔla nɔkuz̤itʰi nkumɛnkumɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ waz̤iɓɔnajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ iiɲawɔ nɛɛnz̤wanɛ ɓɛz̤ilud̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ lɔmɓumɓi nɡ̤ɛŋǁalɛɲɛ z̤isisiɲitʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁalɛɲɛ ɓuɓukumkani ɔɓuja kuɓa ɓɔɓaɬukɛnɛjɔ kɔɓakʰɔ uɓulukʰuni ɓɛsiɲitʰi kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa uɓusiɓɔna sisiɲitʰi sikǁutʲwɛ nɔd̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ ɔlulud̤aka iinz̤wanɛ z̤ɛɛɲawɔ z̤isisiɲitʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛŋǁalɛɲɛ z̤ilud̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛŋǁalɛɲɛ uɓukumkani ɓuja kutʰi ɓɔmɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁalɛɲɛ ɓuɓɛ nkumɛnkumɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁalɛɲɛ wasiɓɔnajɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ isiɲitʰi sikǁutʲwɛ nɔd̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ lɔd̤aka ɓaja kuz̤ikǁuɓa nɛmɓɛwu jɛntɔ ɛnɡ̤umntu kɔd̤wa aɓaji kunamatʰɛlana jaɓɔna kwand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa isiɲitʰi sinɡ̤akǁuɓɛki nɔd̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jaɓɔ utʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu uja uɓukumkani ɔɓunɡ̤aji kɔnakala napʰakad̤ɛ ɔɓɔ ɓukumkani aɓuji naɓantu ɓamɓi ɓuja kuz̤ikǀɔla ɓuz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤ikumkani ɓɔna ɓumɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa waɓɔnajɔ ukuɓa ilitʲɛ laz̤itʰwɛɓula ɛntaɓɛni kunɡ̤ɛnɡ̤az̤anɮa lasikǀɔla isiɲitʰi nɔb̤ɛd̤u nɔd̤ɔnɡ̤wɛ nɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ utʰikǁɔ ɔmkʰulu umaz̤isilɛ ɔkuja kuɓakʰɔ ɛmv̤ɛni kɔku ipʰupʰa likǃinisɛkilɛ ukutʰʲilwa kwalɔ kujiɲanisɔ waz̤a unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ wakǃuɓud̤a kud̤anijɛli watʰi makatʰululɛlwɛ iminikɛlɔ jɔkuɮa akǃʰuɲisɛlwɛ amav̤umɓa atʰɔz̤amisajɔ ukumkani wampʰɛnd̤ula ud̤anijɛli watʰi ɔkwɛɲanisɔ utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɔɔtʰikǁɔ jinkɔsi jɔɔkumkani nɡ̤umtʰʲili wɛɛmfiɬakalɔ utʰɛ waɓa nakɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ wɛna ukujitʰʲila lɛ mfiɬakalɔ waz̤a wamɛnz̤a mkʰulu ud̤anijɛli wampʰa iz̤ipʰɔ ɛz̤ikʰulu z̤az̤ininz̤i wamɛnz̤a waɓa nɛɡ̤uɲa pʰɛz̤u kwɛliz̤wɛ lɔnkɛ lasɛb̤ab̤ɛli waɓa nɡ̤umɔnɡ̤amɛli ɔmkʰulu wɛz̤ilumkɔ z̤ɔnkɛ z̤asɛb̤ab̤ɛli ud̤anijɛli wakǀɛla jɛna ɛnkɔnz̤wɛni jɔkupʰatʰa iliz̤wɛ lasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɔɔʃad̤raki nɔmɛʃaki nɔab̤ɛd̤ɛnɛɡ̤ɔ kɛ jɛna ud̤anijɛli waɓa sɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɔkumkani unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wɛnz̤a umfanɛkisɔ wɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ukupʰakama kwawɔ ɓɛkuz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤imaʃumi matʰand̤atʰu uɓuɓanz̤i ɓawɔ ɓɛɓuz̤iikub̤itɛ ɛz̤intand̤atʰu ɛtʰafɛni lasɛd̤ura ɛz̤wɛni lasɛb̤ab̤ɛli unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ watʰumɛla ukuɓa kuɬanɡ̤aniswɛ iixulunɛli naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔmkʰɔsi namaɓamɓa naɓaɡ̤wɛɓi aɓakʰulu naɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inindʲɛɓɔ naɓakǃɔnd̤isimtʰɛtʰɔ naɓaɡ̤wɛɓi naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓanɛɡ̤uɲa ɛmaz̤wɛni ukuz̤ɛ ɓɛz̤ɛ ɛkusunɡ̤ulwɛni kɔmfanɛkisɔ aɓɛwumisilɛ unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ z̤az̤a z̤aɬanɡ̤anisana iixulunɛli naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔmkʰɔsi namaɓamɓa naɓaɡ̤wɛɓi aɓakʰulu naɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inindʲɛɓɔ naɓakǃɔnd̤isimtʰɛtʰɔ naɓaɡ̤wɛɓi naɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓanɛɡ̤uɲa ɛmaz̤wɛni ukuz̤ɛ usunɡ̤ulwɛ umfanɛkisɔ aɓɛwumisilɛ unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ ɓɛma kɛ pʰamɓi kɔmfanɛkisɔ aɓɛwumisilɛ unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ ummɛmɛz̤i wad̤and̤uluka nɡ̤amanɮa watʰi kutʰiwa z̤intlanɡ̤a z̤iz̤wɛ z̤ilwimi nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛnitʰɛ nɛv̤a iz̤wi lɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ nɛlɛmɓand̤ɛ nɛlɛkitarɛ nɛlɔmxub̤ɛ nɛlɔhad̤i nɛlɔɡ̤wali nɛlɛz̤iɲɛ iintlɔɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iɓɛtʰwajɔ jiwani pʰant͡si nikǃuɓud̤ɛ kumfanɛkisɔ wɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ awumisɛlɛjɔ unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ ɔnɡ̤atʰanɡ̤a awɛ pʰant͡si akǃuɓud̤ɛ uja kud͡ʒ̤ulɛlwa kwaɔkɔ ɛz̤ikwɛni ɛliv̤utʰa umlilɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa kǁa z̤aliv̤ajɔ iintlanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ iliz̤wi lɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ nɛlɛmɓand̤ɛ nɛlɛkitarɛ nɛlɔmxub̤ɛ nɛlɔhad̤i nɛlɔɡ̤wali nɛlɛz̤iɲɛ iintlɔɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iɓɛtʰwajɔ z̤awa pʰant͡si z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a nɛz̤iz̤wɛ nɛɛlwimi z̤akǃuɓud̤a kumfanɛkisɔ wɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ aɓɛwumisilɛ unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa kwasɔnd̤ɛla amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amakalɛd̤i awaŋǀɛtʰɛz̤a amajud̤a atʰɛtʰa atʰi unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ kumkani jiɮa uɓɔmi nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ wɛna uwisɛ umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkutʰi ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu aɓatʰɛ ɓaliv̤a iz̤wi lɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ nɛlɛmɓand̤ɛ nɛlɛkitarɛ nɛlɔmxub̤ɛ nɛlɔhad̤i nɛlɔɡ̤wali nɛlɛz̤iɲɛ iintlɔɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iɓɛtʰwajɔ maɓawɛ pʰant͡si ɓakǃuɓud̤ɛ kumfanɛkisɔ wɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɔnɡ̤atʰanɡ̤a awɛ pʰant͡si akǃuɓud̤ɛ makad͡ʒ̤ulɛlwɛ ɛz̤ikwɛni ɛliv̤utʰa umlilɔ kukʰɔ amad̤ɔd̤a anɡ̤amajud̤a ɔwamisɛ ɛnkɔnz̤wɛni jɔkupʰatʰa iliz̤wɛ lasɛb̤ab̤ɛli uʃad̤raki nɔmɛʃaki nɔab̤ɛd̤ɛnɛɡ̤ɔ mad̤ɔd̤a akakʰatʰali nɡ̤uwɛ akaɓaɓusi ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓakʰɔ akakǃuɓud̤i kumfanɛkisɔ wɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɔwumisilɛjɔ waz̤a watʰi unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ ɛkǃumɓilɛ ɛʃuʃu maɓaz̤iswɛ ɔɔʃad̤raki nɔmɛʃaki nɔab̤ɛd̤ɛnɛɡ̤ɔ az̤iswa kɛ mad̤ɔd̤a pʰamɓi kɔkumkani wapʰɛnd̤ula unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ watʰi kuɓɔ nɛnz̤a nɡ̤aɓɔmi ʃad̤raki mɛʃaki ab̤ɛd̤ɛnɛɡ̤ɔ ukutʰi ninɡ̤amɓusi utʰikǁɔ ninɡ̤akǃuɓud̤i kumfanɛkisɔ wɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛnd̤iwumisilɛjɔ kɛ ukuɓa nitʰɛ nɡ̤ɔku nalunɡ̤ɛla ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkuv̤a kwɛnu iz̤wi lɛsiɡ̤ɔɮɔ nɛlɛmɓand̤ɛ nɛlɛkitarɛ nɛlɔmxub̤ɛ nɛlɔhad̤i nɛlɔɡ̤wali nɛlɛz̤iɲɛ iintlɔɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iɓɛtʰwajɔ niwɛ pʰant͡si nikǃuɓud̤ɛ kumfanɛkisɔ ɛnd̤iwɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kɔlunɡ̤a kɔd̤wa ukuɓa anitʰanɡ̤a nikǃuɓud̤ɛ nɔd͡ʒ̤ulɛlwa kwaɔkɔ ɛz̤ikwɛni ɛliv̤utʰa umlilɔ nɡ̤uɓani kɛ utʰikǁɔ ɔja kunisind̤isa ɛsanɮɛni ɓapʰɛnd̤ula ɔɔʃad̤raki nɔmɛʃaki nɔab̤ɛd̤ɛnɛɡ̤ɔ ɓatʰi nɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ akufunɛki kutʰi ukuɓa sikupʰɛnd̤ulɛ nɡ̤alɛ nd̤awɔ ukuɓa utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ɛsimɓusajɔ unakɔ wɔsisind̤isa ɛz̤ikwɛni ɛliv̤utʰa umlilɔ nasɛsanɮɛni sakʰɔ kɛ ukuɓa akund͡ʒ̤alɔ makwaz̤ɛkɛ kuwɛ ukuɓa asiji kuɓaɓusa ɔtʰikǁɔ ɓakʰɔ asiji kukǃuɓud̤a kumfanɛkisɔ wɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɔwumisilɛjɔ wɛsuka unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ waz̤ala ɓuɓuʃuʃu nɔkumila kɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ ɓaɓa ɓuɓi kuʃad̤raki nɔmɛʃaki nɔab̤ɛd̤ɛnɛɡ̤ɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula watʰi iz̤ikɔ malɛnz̤iwɛ liɓɛ ʃuʃu nɡ̤ɔkupʰind̤wɛ kasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ kunɔkɔ fud̤ula lisɛnz̤iwa ʃuʃu nɡ̤akɔ watʰi kumad̤ɔd̤a kumad̤ɔd̤a anɔɓuk͡xɔti ɛmpini jakʰɛ makaɓaɓɔpʰɛ ɔɔʃad̤raki nɔmɛʃaki nɔab̤ɛd̤ɛnɛɡ̤ɔ aɓad͡ʒ̤ulɛlɛ ɛz̤ikwɛni ɛliv̤utʰa umlilɔ az̤a mad̤ɔd̤a aɓɔt͡ʃwa ɛnɛɛhɛmpɛ z̤awɔ nɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ z̤awɔ z̤anɡ̤apʰant͡si nɛz̤ɔkwalɛka nɛz̤iɲɛ iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤awɔ ad͡ʒ̤ulɛlwa ɛz̤ikwɛni ɛliv̤utʰa umlilɔ kwatʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa iliz̤wi lɔkumkani ɓɛliɓukʰali nɛz̤ikɔ ɓɛlɛnz̤iwɛ laʃuʃu nɡ̤ɔkuŋǀamisilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ilanɡ̤atʲɛ lɔmlilɔ lawaɓulala lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a aɓafuŋǃulajɔ ɔɔʃad̤raki nɔmɛʃaki nɔab̤ɛd̤ɛnɛɡ̤ɔ la mad̤ɔd̤a ɔmatʰatʰu ɔɔʃad̤raki nɔmɛʃaki nɔab̤ɛd̤ɛnɛɡ̤ɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤ikɔ ɛliv̤utʰa umlilɔ ɛɓɔt͡ʃiwɛ waz̤a unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wɔtʰuka wɛsuka nɡ̤ɔɓuŋ̤ǁ̤amɔ watʰɛtʰa watʰi kumapʰakatʰi akʰɛ ɓɛsinɡ̤ad͡ʒ̤ulɛlanɡ̤a pʰakatʰi kɔmlilɔ amad̤ɔd̤a amatʰatʰu jini ɛɓɔt͡ʃiwɛ apʰɛnd̤ula atʰi uɲanisilɛ wapʰɛnd̤ula watʰi kʰanɡ̤ɛlani nd̤iɓɔna amad̤ɔd̤a amanɛ ɛkʰululɛkilɛ ɛhamɓa pʰakatʰi kɔmlilɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛnz̤akɛlɛ ukuɓɔnakala kwɛjɛsinɛ kɛ nɔɲana wɔɔtʰikǁɔ waz̤a unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wasɔnd̤ɛla ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɛz̤ikɔ ɛliv̤utʰa umlilɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula watʰi ʃad̤raki mɛʃaki ab̤ɛd̤ɛnɛɡ̤ɔ ɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓɔtʰikǁɔ ɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni pʰumani niz̤ɛ ɓaz̤a ɓapʰuma ɔɔʃad̤raki nɔmɛʃaki nɔab̤ɛd̤ɛnɛɡ̤ɔ ɛmlilwɛni z̤aɬanɡ̤anisana iixulunɛli naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔmkʰɔsi namaɓamɓa namapʰakatʰi ɔkumkani ɓawakʰanɡ̤ɛla mad̤ɔd̤a ukuɓa umlilɔ awuɓanɡ̤a namanɮa ɛmiz̤imɓɛni jawɔ akuxawukanɡ̤a nalunwɛlɛ lwɛntlɔkɔ jawɔ iihɛmpɛ z̤awɔ az̤iɓanɡ̤a z̤iz̤imɓi nɛv̤umɓa lɔmlilɔ alifikanɡ̤a kuwɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ watʰi makaɓɔnɡ̤wɛ utʰikǁɔ kaʃad̤raki kamɛʃaki kaab̤ɛd̤ɛnɛɡ̤ɔ ɔsitʰumilɛjɔ isitʰuɲwa sakʰɛ waɓasind̤isa aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ aɓaɓɛkʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ajɛ ɓaliɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa iliz̤wi lɔkumkani ɓajinikɛla imiz̤imɓa jaɓɔ ukuɓa ɓanɡ̤aɓusi ɓanɡ̤akǃuɓud̤i kutʰikǁɔ nɔnɡ̤uwupʰi ɔnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ujɛ utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ nd̤iwisa umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkuɓa z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a nɛz̤iz̤wɛ nɛɛlwimi ɛz̤isukuɓa z̤itʰɛtʰa intɔ ɛjimpɔsisɔ nɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ kaʃad̤raki kamɛʃaki kaab̤ɛd̤ɛnɛɡ̤ɔ z̤ija kwɛnz̤iwa iz̤ikǃwɛnɡ̤a iz̤inɮu z̤aɓɔ z̤ɛnz̤iwɛ ind̤awɔ ɛkujiwa kujɔ ɛnɮɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ tʰikǁɔ wumɓi unakɔ ukuɬanɡ̤ula nɡ̤ɔlɔ luɬɔɓɔ waz̤a waɓɛnz̤a ɓanɛmpumɛlɛlɔ ɔɔʃad̤raki nɔmɛʃaki nɔab̤ɛd̤ɛnɛɡ̤ɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛb̤ab̤ɛli unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ utʰi kuz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a nɛz̤iz̤wɛ nɛɛlwimi ɛz̤imijɔ ɛɬaɓatʰini lɔnkɛ maluɓɛ lukʰulu ukǁɔlɔ lwɛnu imikǃɔnd̤isɔ nɛz̤imanɡ̤a az̤ɛnz̤ilɛjɔ utʰikǁɔ ɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni kukʰɔlɛkilɛ ukuɓa nd̤iz̤ikǁɛlɛ imikǃɔnd̤isɔ jakʰɛ haji ukuɓa mikʰulu kwajɔ iz̤imanɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ haji ukuɓa namanɮa kwaz̤ɔ uɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ ɓuɓukumkani ɔɓunɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ iɡ̤uɲa lakʰɛ likwiz̤iz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana mna nɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ ɓɛnd̤ikǀʰulumakǀʰilɛ ɛnɮwini jam nd̤ɛnilɛ ɛb̤ɔtwɛni nd̤aɓɔna ipʰupʰa land̤ɔtʰusa nd̤anɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a ɛsililini nɛmiɓɔnɔ jɛntlɔkɔ jam ɛjand̤ikʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰isajɔ nd̤awisa umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkutʰi z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ilumkɔ z̤asɛb̤ab̤ɛli maz̤iz̤iswɛ pʰamɓi ukuɓa z̤ind̤az̤isɛ ukutʰʲilwa kwɛpʰupʰa ɛlɔ z̤az̤a z̤ɛz̤a iz̤az̤i naɓakʰwit͡si namakalɛd̤i namatɔla nd̤aɓalawulɛla ipʰupʰa kɛ aɓand̤az̤isanɡ̤a ukutʰʲilwa kwalɔ kwad̤a ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛz̤a ud̤anijɛli ɔɡ̤ama linɡ̤ub̤ɛlɛt͡ʃat͡sarɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛɡ̤ama lɔtʰikǁɔ ɔnɔmɔja wɔɔtʰikǁɔ aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nd̤amlawulɛla ipʰupʰa nd̤atʰi b̤ɛlɛt͡ʃat͡sarɛ mɔnɡ̤amɛli wɛz̤az̤i wɛna nd̤ikwaz̤ijɔ ukuɓa unɔmɔja wɔɔtʰikǁɔ aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ akukʰɔ mfiɬakalɔ ikukʰɔɬajɔ nd̤itʲɛlɛ imiɓɔnɔ jɛpʰupʰa ɛnd̤iliɓɔnilɛjɔ nɔkutʰʲilwa kwalɔ imiɓɔnɔ kɛ jɛntlɔkɔ jam ɛsililini nant͡si nd̤aɓɔna nanɡ̤ɔ umtʰi usɛsaz̤ulwini sɛɬaɓatʰi ukupʰakama kwawɔ ɓɛkukukʰulu wakʰula umtʰi wɔmɛlɛla ukupʰakama kwawɔ kwafikɛlɛla ɛz̤ulwini nɔkuɓɔnakala kwawɔ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ amaɡ̤ǃ̤aɓi awɔ aɓɛmaɬɛ nɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤awɔ ɓɛz̤iz̤ininz̤i uɓunɔkuɮa ɔkwanɛlɛ iintɔ z̤ɔnkɛ amaxamŋǀwa asɛnɮɛ aɓɛnɔmtʰunz̤i pʰant͡si kwawɔ z̤ɛz̤ulu z̤aɬala ɛmasɛɓɛni awɔ jaɮa kuwɔ jɔnkɛ iɲama nd̤aɓɔna ɛmiɓɔnwɛni jɛntlɔkɔ jam nd̤isɛsililini nankɔ kusiɬa umlind̤i ɛnɡ̤ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛmaz̤ulwini wad̤and̤uluka nɡ̤amanɮa wat͡ʃɔ ukutʰi wuɡ̤awulɛni lɔ mtʰi niwaŋǃumlɛ amasɛɓɛ awɔ niwakǃʰawulɛ amaɡ̤ǃ̤aɓi awɔ niz̤ikǀʰitʰakǀʰitʰɛ iz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤awɔ makaɓalɛkɛ ɛmkɛ pʰant͡si kwawɔ amaxamŋǀwa nɛɛntaka ɛmasɛɓɛni awɔ kɔd̤wa kɛ isipʰunz̤i ɛsinɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu z̤awɔ siʃijɛni ɛm̤laɓɛni sipʰand͡ʒ̤iwɛ nɡ̤ɛsiɲitʰi nɔb̤ɛd̤u ɛluɬaz̤ɛni lwasɛnɮɛ masiɲakamiswɛ nɡ̤umɓɛtʰɛ wɛz̤ulu makaɬulɛlanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ nɡ̤ɔtʲani ɓɔm̤laɓa intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ majisukɛ inɡ̤aɓi jɛjɔmntu anikwɛ intliz̤ijɔ jɛnkɔmɔ kuɮulɛ amakǁɛʃa amisiwɛjɔ aɓɛ sikǁʰɛŋǁɛ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ umjalɛz̤ɔ lɔ ukʰɔ nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤iɓɔ jaɓalind̤i umkǀimɓi lɔ liliz̤wi laɓajiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔkuz̤ɛ ɓaz̤i aɓaɬɛlijɔ ukuɓa ɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni unɛɡ̤uɲa ɛɓukumkanini ɓaɓantu aɓunikɛ lɔwɔ atʰand̤a amisɛ ɔpʰant͡si ɛɓantwini pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ɛlɔ pʰupʰa nd̤iliɓɔnilɛ nɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ wɛna kɛ b̤ɛlɛt͡ʃat͡sarɛ litʰʲilɛ kɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ilumkɔ z̤ɔɓukumkani ɓam z̤inɡ̤ɛnakɔ ukund̤az̤isa ukutʰʲilwa kwalɔ uɓɛ kɛ wɛna unakɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɔmɔja wɔɔtʰikǁɔ aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ waz̤a ud̤anijɛli ɔɡ̤ama linɡ̤ub̤ɛlɛt͡ʃat͡sarɛ wamanɡ̤aliswa umz̤uz̤wana nɛz̤ikǀamanɡ̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤amkʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰isa wapʰɛnd̤ula watʰi b̤ɛlɛt͡ʃat͡sarɛ ipʰupʰa nɔkutʰʲilwa kwalɔ malinɡ̤akukʰatʰaz̤i ub̤ɛlɛt͡ʃat͡sarɛ wapʰɛnd̤ula watʰi nkɔsi jam ipʰupʰa malisinɡ̤isɛlɛ kwaɓakutʰijilɛjɔ nɔkutʰʲilwa kwalɔ kwaɓakuz̤ɔnd̤ajɔ umtʰi ɔwuɓɔnilɛjɔ ɔwakʰulajɔ wɔmɛlɛla ɔkupʰakama kwawɔ kwafikɛlɛlajɔ ɛz̤ulwini waɓɔnwa ɛɬaɓatʰini lɔnkɛ ɔmaɡ̤ǃ̤aɓi ajɛmaɬɛ ɔz̤ikǃʰamɔ ɓɛz̤iz̤ininz̤i ɔɓunɔkuɮa ɔkwanɛlɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ awaɬala pʰant͡si kwawɔ amaxamŋǀwa asɛnɮɛ ɛz̤aɓa nɛɛnɮu ɛmasɛɓɛni awɔ z̤ɛz̤ulu nɡ̤uwɛ lɔwɔ utʰɛ wakʰula wɔmɛlɛla uɓukʰulu ɓakʰɔ ɓukʰulilɛjɔ ɓafika ɛz̤ulwini nɛɡ̤uɲa lakʰɔ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛɬaɓatʰi lɛ ntɔ jɔkuɓa ɛɓɔnɛ umlind̤i ɔnɡ̤ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛsiɬa ɛmaz̤ulwini ɛsitʰi wuɡ̤awulɛni lɔ mtʰi niwɔnakalisɛ kɔd̤wa isipʰunz̤i ɛsinɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu z̤awɔ siʃijɛni ɛm̤laɓɛni sipʰand͡ʒ̤iwɛ nɡ̤ɛsiɲitʰi nɔb̤ɛd̤u ɛluɬaz̤ɛni lwasɛnɮɛ siɲakamiswɛ nɡ̤umɓɛtʰɛ wɛz̤ulu aɬulɛlanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ nɡ̤ɔtʲani kud̤ɛ kuɮulɛ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ amakǁɛʃa amisiwɛjɔ asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ukutʰʲilwa kwakɔ nant͡si iŋ̤ǃ̤iɓɔ jɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni ɛja kujifikɛla inkɔsi jam uja kuɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰwa ɛɓantwini liɓɛ kumaxamŋǀwa asɛnɮɛ ikʰaja lakʰɔ uɮiswɛ utʲani nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ uɲakamiswɛ nɡ̤umɓɛtʰɛ wɛz̤ulu kuɮulɛ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ amakǁɛʃa amisiwɛjɔ asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ud̤ɛ waz̤i ukuɓa ɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni unɛɡ̤uɲa ɛɓukumkanini ɓaɓantu ɛɓunika lɔwɔ atʰand̤a lɛ ntɔ kutʰiwɛ isipʰunz̤i ɛsinɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu z̤ɔmtʰi masiʃijwɛ itʰi uɓukumkani ɓakʰɔ ɓuja kukǃinisɛlwa kuwɛ kwaɔkɔ wakutʰi waz̤i ukuɓa amaz̤ulu anɛɡ̤uɲa nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ikǀɛɓɔ malikʰɔlɛkɛ kuwɛ uz̤apʰulɛ iz̤ɔnɔ z̤akʰɔ nɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa nɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓaɓaɓala aɓaz̤iint͡siz̤ana ukuɓa kunɡ̤a kunɡ̤ɔluka ukukǀʰulumakǀʰa kwakʰɔ kɔnkɛ ɔkɔ kwamfikɛla unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛɛɲanɡ̤a ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛlinamɓini wajɛhamɓahamɓa pʰɛz̤u kwɛb̤ɔtwɛ lɔkumkani lasɛb̤ab̤ɛli wasusɛla watʰi lɛ asijijɔ ib̤ab̤ɛli ɛnkulu ɛnd̤ijakʰɛlɛ ukuɓa iɓɛ jinɮu jɔɓukumkani nɡ̤ɔkukǃina kwamanɮa nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuhand̤iɓa ɓɔɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa ɓam litʰɛ ɛlɔ z̤wi lisɛsɛmlɔɲɛni wɔkumkani iz̤wi ɛmaz̤ulwini lisitʰi kutʰiwɛ kuwɛ nɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ uɓukumkani ɓumkilɛ kuwɛ uja kuɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰwa ɛɓantwini liɓɛ kumaxamŋǀwa asɛnɮɛ ikʰaja lakʰɔ uɮiswɛ utʲani nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ kuɮulɛ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɔ amakǁɛʃa amisiwɛjɔ asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ ud̤ɛ waz̤i ukuɓa ɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni unɛɡ̤uɲa ɛɓukumkanini ɓaɓantu ɛɓunika lɔwɔ atʰand̤a kwaɔkɔ laz̤aliswa iliz̤wi kunɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ waɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰwa ɛɓantwini waɮa utʲani nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ waɲakamiswa umz̤imɓa wakʰɛ nɡ̤umɓɛtʰɛ wɛz̤ulu z̤ad̤a iinwɛlɛ z̤akʰɛ z̤akʰula z̤and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnt͡siɓa z̤amakǁʰalanɡ̤a nɛɛnz̤ipʰɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛɛntaka ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɬa nɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ nd̤awapʰakamisɛla ɛz̤ulwini amɛɬɔ ukwaz̤i kwaɓujɛla nd̤amɓɔnɡ̤a ɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni nd̤amŋǀɔma nd̤amɓɛka ɔɬɛli nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ ɔɡ̤uɲa liliɡ̤uɲa ɛlinɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ɔɓukumkani ɓunɛz̤iz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana ɓajɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmi ɓɛɬaɓatʰi ɓɛɓalɛlwɛ ɛkuɓɛni jintɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔ ɛsɛnz̤a jɛna nɡ̤ɔkutʰand̤a kwakʰɛ ɛmpini jasɛmaz̤ulwini nakuɓɛmi ɓɛɬaɓatʰi akukʰɔ ɓani uɓɛtʰajɔ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ atʰi kujɛ wɛnz̤a ntɔni kwaɔkɔ ukwaz̤i kwaɓujɛla nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuhand̤iɓa ɓɔɓukumkani ɓam uɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa ɓam nɔkutʲatʲamɓa kwaɓujɛla and̤ifuna amapʰakatʰi nɛz̤ikʰulu z̤am nd̤aɓujisɛlwa ɛɓukumkanini ɓam nd̤ɔnɡ̤ɛz̤wa uɓukʰulu ɔɓuŋǀamisilɛjɔ kalɔku nɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ nd̤ijamŋǀɔma nd̤impʰakamisa nd̤imɓɛka ukumkani wamaz̤ulu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jɔnkɛ imisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɛ ijiɲanisɔ nɛɛnɮɛla z̤akʰɛ z̤isɛsikwɛni nanɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛnakɔ ukuɓatʰɔɓa aɓahamɓa ɓɛkǃʰaŋ̰ǃ̰alaz̤ilɛ ub̤ɛlɛʃat͡sarɛ walɛnz̤ɛla isiɮɔ ɛsikʰulu lɛz̤ikʰulu z̤akʰɛ wasɛla iwajini pʰamɓi kwɛwaka ɛlɔ ub̤ɛlɛʃat͡sarɛ akujiv̤a iwajini watʰi maz̤iz̤iswɛ iimpaɬa z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɛz̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ aɓɛz̤itʰimɓilɛ unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ ujisɛ ɛtɛmpilɛni ɛsɛjɛrusalɛm ukuz̤ɛ asɛlɛ nɡ̤az̤ɔ nɛz̤ikʰulu z̤akʰɛ namakʰɔsikaz̤i akʰɛ namaʃwɛʃwɛ akʰɛ ɓaz̤a ɓaz̤iz̤isa iimpaɬa z̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛz̤az̤itʰind͡ʒ̤wɛ ɛtɛmpilɛni jɛnɮu katʰikǁɔ ɛsɛjɛrusalɛm wasɛla nɡ̤az̤ɔ nɛz̤ikʰulu z̤akʰɛ namakʰɔsikaz̤i akʰɛ namaʃwɛʃwɛ akʰɛ ɓasɛla iwajini ɓaɓaŋǀɔma ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ naɓɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ naɓɔb̤ɛd̤u naɓɛsiɲitʰi naɓɛmitʰi naɓamatʲɛ kwaɔkɔ kwav̤ɛla iminwɛ jɛsanɮa sɔmntu jab̤ala malunɡ̤a nɛsipʰatʰɔ sɛsiɓanɛ ɛfutʰɛni lɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a lwɛb̤ɔtwɛ lɔɓukumkani wakuɓɔna ukupʰɛla kwɛsanɮa ɛsib̤alajɔ laz̤a laɡ̤ukǃuka iɓala lɔɓusɔ ɓɔkumkani z̤amŋ̤ǃ̤unɡ̤isa iz̤ikǀamanɡ̤ɔ z̤akʰɛ amalunɡ̤u ɛsiŋǃɛ sakʰɛ akǀɔmɓuluka namad̤ɔlɔ akʰɛ aɓɛtʰaɓɛtʰana ukumkani wad̤and̤uluka nɡ̤amanɮa ukuɓa ɓaz̤iswɛ aɓakʰwit͡si namakalɛd̤i namatɔla wapʰɛnd̤ula watʰi kwiz̤ilumkɔ z̤asɛb̤ab̤ɛli ɔtʰɛ wawulɛsa lɔ mb̤alɔ wakukǁɛla ukutʰʲilwa kwawɔ uja kuŋǁitʲwa iinɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤imfusa nɔmkǁɔkɛlɛlwanɛ wɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛmkǃalɛni wakʰɛ aɓɛ nɡ̤ɔwaɓatʰatʰu aɓanɛɡ̤uɲa ɛɓukumkanini ɔɓu z̤az̤a z̤afika z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤ilumkɔ z̤ɔkumkani kɛ az̤aɓa nakɔ ukuwulɛsa umb̤alɔ nɔkumaz̤isa ukutʰʲilwa kwawɔ waz̤a ub̤ɛlɛʃat͡sarɛ wakʰatʰaz̤ɛka kakʰulu laɡ̤ukǃuka iɓala lɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ nɛz̤ikʰulu z̤akʰɛ z̤ad̤uɓad̤uɓɛka ukumkanikaz̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamaz̤wi ɔkumkani nɛz̤ikʰulu z̤akʰɛ wanɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini jɔmɡ̤id̤i ukumkanikaz̤i wapʰɛnd̤ula watʰi kumkani pʰila nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ iz̤ikǀamanɡ̤ɔ z̤akʰɔ maz̤inɡ̤akukʰatʰaz̤i linɡ̤aɡ̤ukǃuki iɓala lɔɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ kukʰɔ ind̤ɔd̤a ɛɓukumkanini ɓakʰɔ ɛnɔmɔja wɔɔtʰikǁɔ aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛkwatʰi nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔjiɬɔ kwafuɲanwa kujɔ ukukʰaɲa nɔkukǃikǃa nɔɓulumkɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɓulumkɔ ɓɔtʰikǁɔ awatʰi unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ ujiɬɔ wajimisa janɡ̤umɔnɡ̤amɛli wɛz̤az̤i naɓakʰwit͡si namakalɛd̤i namatɔlaujiɬɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa kwafuɲanwa kujɛ umɔja ɔɡ̤ǃ̤itʰisilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔɓuɬɛ nɔkwaz̤i nɔkukǃikǃa ɛtʰʲila amapʰupʰa ɛkǁɛla iint͡sɔnkɔtʰa ɛkǀɔmɓulula amakǃʰina kud̤anijɛli ɔwatʰijwa nɡ̤ukumkani iɡ̤ama ɛlinɡ̤ub̤ɛlɛt͡ʃat͡sarɛ ud̤anijɛli makaɓiz̤wɛ kalɔku wɔkukǁɛla ukutʰʲilwa kwawɔ waz̤a ud̤anijɛli pʰamɓi kɔkumkani ukumkani watʰɛtʰa kud̤anijɛli watʰi unɡ̤ulaa d̤anijɛli unɡ̤ɔwakɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wajɔ aɓaz̤iswajɔ nɡ̤ukumkani uɓawɔ ɓɛpʰuma kwajud̤a nd̤ikuv̤ilɛ ukuɓa unɔmɔja wɔɔtʰikǁɔ wɛna kufuɲanwa kuwɛ ukukʰaɲa nɔkukǃikǃa nɔɓulumkɔ ɔɓuŋǀamisilɛjɔ kɛ kalɔku ɓɛz̤iz̤iswɛ iz̤ilumkɔ naɓakʰwit͡si ukuz̤ɛ ɓalɛsɛ lɔ mb̤alɔ ɓand̤az̤isɛ ukutʰʲilwa kwawɔ kɛ az̤iɓanɡ̤a nakɔ ukund̤ikǁɛlɛla ukutʰʲilwa kwalɛ ntɔ mna nd̤iv̤ilɛ kɛ nɡ̤awɛ ukuɓa unakɔ ukujitʰʲila intɔ ukǀɔmɓululɛ namakǃʰina ukuɓa kɛ utʰɛ wanakɔ ukuwulɛsa lɔ mb̤alɔ nɔkund̤az̤isa ukutʰʲilwa kwawɔ uja kuŋǁitʲwa iinɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤imfusa nɔmkǁɔkɛlɛlwanɛ wɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛmkǃalɛni wakʰɔ uɓɛ nɡ̤ɔwaɓatʰatʰu ɛɓukumkanini aɓanɛɡ̤uɲa waz̤a wapʰɛnd̤ula ud̤anijɛli watʰi pʰamɓi kɔkumkani iz̤ipʰɔ z̤akʰɔ maz̤iɬalɛ kuwɛ imiv̤uz̤ɔ jakʰɔ ujinikɛ ɔmɲɛ kɔd̤wa nd̤ija kuwulɛsa lɔ mb̤alɔ nd̤imaz̤isɛ ukutʰʲilwa kwawɔ wɛna utʰikǁɔ ɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni unɛb̤ukad̤ɛnɛt͡sarɛ ujiɬɔ uɓukumkani nɔɓukʰulu nɔɓuhand̤iɓa nɔɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓukʰulu kɛ awaɓunikwajɔ z̤ad̤id̤iz̤ɛla z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a nɛz̤iz̤wɛ nɛɛlwimi z̤ɔtʰuka pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ lɔwɔ watʰand̤a ukumɓulala wamɓulala lɔwɔ watʰand̤a ukumjɛka apʰilɛ wamjɛka wapʰila lɔwɔ watʰand̤a ukumpʰakamisa wampʰakamisa lɔwɔ watʰand̤a ukumtʰɔɓa wamtʰɔɓa kɛ kǁɛʃikwɛni intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ jaz̤ipʰakamisajɔ umɔja wakʰɛ wakǃinajɔ wakʰukʰumalajɔ wɛsuka waɬiswa ɛtrɔnɛni jɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ nɔɓuhand̤iɓa ɓakʰɛ ɓasuswa kujɛ waɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰwa kɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ jaɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛjɛɛnkɔmɔ nɛkʰaja lakʰɛ laɓa sɛmaɛsilɛni asɛnɮɛ waɮiswa utʲani nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ waɲakamiswa umz̤imɓa wakʰɛ nɡ̤umɓɛtʰɛ wɛz̤ulu wad̤a waz̤i ukuɓa utʰikǁɔ ɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni unɛɡ̤uɲa ɛɓukumkanini ɓaɓantu amisɛ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ lɔwɔ atʰand̤a wɛna kɛ ɲana wakʰɛ b̤ɛlɛʃat͡sarɛ akujitʰɔɓanɡ̤a intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ nakuɓa uɓukwaz̤i ɔkɔ kɔnkɛ uz̤ipʰakamisilɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛnkɔsi jamaz̤ulu nɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɛnɮu jajɔ z̤az̤iswa pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ wɛna nɛz̤ikʰulu z̤akʰɔ namakʰɔsikaz̤i akʰɔ namaʃwɛʃwɛ akʰɔ nasɛla iwajini nɡ̤az̤ɔ waŋǀɔma ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ naɓɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ naɓɔb̤ɛd̤u naɓɛsiɲitʰi naɓɛmitʰi naɓamatʲɛ aɓanɡ̤aɓɔnijɔ aɓanɡ̤ɛv̤ajɔ aɓanɡ̤az̤ijɔ kɛ utʰikǁɔ lɔwɔ kusɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ ukupʰɛfumla kwakʰɔ ɔnaz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iinɮɛla z̤akʰɔ akumɓɛkanɡ̤a waz̤a watʰuma kwav̤ɛla kujɛ ɔkɔ kupʰɛla kwɛsanɮa lɔ mb̤alɔ kɛ wawub̤aliwɛ nanɡ̤u kɛ lɔɔ mb̤alɔ wawub̤aliwɛ mɛnɛ mɛnɛ tɛkɛlɛ nanku ukutʰʲilwa kwalɛ ntɔ ɛlɔkuɓa mɛnɛ litʰi utʰikǁɔ uɓuɓalilɛ uɓukumkani ɓakʰɔ waɓupʰɛlisa ɛlɔkuɓa tɛkɛlɛ litʰi wɛna ulinɡ̤anisiwɛ ɛsikalini wafuɲanwa ɛlɔkuɓa pɛrɛs litʰi ɓujaɬulwa uɓukumkani ɓakʰɔ ɓunikwɛ amamɛd̤i namapɛrsi waz̤a ub̤ɛlɛʃat͡sarɛ wajalɛla ɓamŋǁiɓa ud̤anijɛli iinɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤imfusa nɔmkǁɔkɛlɛlwanɛ wɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛmkǃalɛni wakʰɛ ɓamɛmɛz̤a nɡ̤ajɛ nɡ̤ɛlitʰi uja kuɓa nɡ̤ɔwaɓatʰatʰu ɔnɛɡ̤uɲa ɛɓukumkanini kwanɡ̤ɔɓɔ ɓusuku waɓulawa ub̤ɛlɛʃat͡sarɛ wamakalɛd̤i ud̤arijɔ ummɛd̤i waɓutʰaɓatʰa uɓukumkani ɛmiɲaka ikumaʃumi ɔmatʰand̤atʰu anamiɓini ɛz̤ɛlwɛ kwakʰɔlɛka kud̤arijɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔɓukumkani iixulunɛli ɛz̤ilikʰulu ɛlinamaʃumi amaɓini ukuz̤ɛ z̤iɓɛ sɛɓukumkanini ɓɔnkɛ wamisa pʰɛz̤u kwaz̤ɔ ɛz̤ɔ aɓɔnɡ̤amɛli ɓaɓatʰatʰu ɔmɲɛ kuɓɔ inɡ̤ud̤anijɛli ukuz̤ɛ iixulunɛli z̤inikɛ iŋ̤ǁ̤ɛlɔ kuɓɔ az̤ɛ anɡ̤aɓi naŋ̰ǁ̰walɛkɔ waz̤a lɔ d̤anijɛli waɓɔnɡ̤amɛla aɓɔnɡ̤amɛli naɓaz̤iixulunɛli nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa ɛɡ̤ǃ̤itʰisɛlɛ kuɓɔnɡ̤amɛli nɡ̤ɔmɔja ɔm̤lɛ wakǀinɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkummisa pʰɛz̤u kɔɓukumkani ɓɔnkɛ ɓaz̤a aɓɔnɡ̤amɛli naɓaz̤iixulunɛli ɓafuna ukuɓa ɓafumanɛ itʰuɓa nɡ̤akud̤anijɛli majɛla nɔɓukumkani kɛ aɓaɓanɡ̤a nakɔ naliɲɛ itʰuɓa nantlɔnd̤i imɓi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɛɓɛtʰɛmɓɛkilɛ ɓɛkunɡ̤afumanɛki naɲɛ impɔsisɔ nantlɔnd̤i imɓi kujɛ az̤a lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a atʰi asiji naliɲɛ itʰuɓa nɡ̤akulɔ d̤anijɛli nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kɔkuɓa silifumanɛ kujɛ majɛla nɔmtʰɛtʰɔ wɔtʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ ɓaz̤a aɓɔ ɓanɡ̤aɓɔnɡ̤amɛli naɓaz̤iixulunɛli ɓɛz̤a ɓɛɮɔnɡ̤ɔz̤ɛla ɓat͡ʃɔ kujɛ ukutʰi kumkani d̤arijɔ pʰila nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔnɡ̤amɛli ɓɔɓukumkani naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɔmkʰɔsi nɛɛxulunɛli namapʰakatʰi namaɓamɓa ɓav̤umɛlɛnɛ nɡ̤ɛkǀɛɓɔ lɔkuɓa amisɛ ummisɛlɔ akǃinisɛ isalɛlɔ sɔkutʰi ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰand̤az̤a umtʰand̤az̤ɔ nakɔnɡ̤uɓani utʰikǁɔ nɔmntu ɔnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uwɛ nɡ̤ɛɛnt͡suku ɛz̤imaʃumi matʰatʰu maɓad͡ʒ̤ulɛlwɛ ɛm̤ad̤ini wɛɛnɡ̤ɔɲama kalɔku kɛ sikǃinisɛ isalɛlɔ uwub̤alɛ umb̤alɔ ɔnɡ̤ɛnakuɡ̤ukǃulwa wɔna nɡ̤ɔkɔmtʰɛtʰɔ wamamɛd̤i namapɛrsi ɔnɡ̤ɛnakut͡ʃit͡ʃiwa ɓani nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ud̤arijɔ wawub̤ala umb̤alɔ lɔwɔ isalɛlɔ ɛsɔ kɛ kalɔku ud̤anijɛli akwaz̤i ukuɓa umb̤alɔ lɔwɔ ub̤aliwɛ wanɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini jakʰɛ iɓɛ nɛɛfɛstilɛ z̤iv̤ulɛkilɛ ɛɡ̤umɓini lakʰɛ ɛlipʰɛz̤ulu ɛlikʰanɡ̤ɛlɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm waɡ̤ukǃa nɡ̤amad̤ɔlɔ akʰɛ iz̤iɬanɮɔ ɛz̤itʰatʰu nɡ̤ɛmini watʰand̤az̤a waɓulɛla pʰamɓi kɔtʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa ɛɓɛsɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kakad̤ɛ az̤a aɮɔnɡ̤ɔz̤a mad̤ɔd̤a ud̤anijɛli ɛtʰand̤az̤a ɛtaxuz̤isa pʰamɓi kɔtʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ ɛz̤ɔ asɔnd̤ɛla atʰɛtʰa pʰamɓi kɔkumkani nɡ̤ɛsalɛlɔ sɔkumkani atʰi akusib̤alanɡ̤a isalɛlɔ sɔkutʰi ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰand̤az̤a nakɔnɡ̤uɓani utʰikǁɔ nɔmntu ɔnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤uwɛ nɡ̤ɛɛnt͡suku ɛz̤imaʃumi matʰatʰu maɓad͡ʒ̤ulɛlwɛ ɛm̤ad̤ini wɛɛnɡ̤ɔɲama wapʰɛnd̤ula watʰi lɔɔ ntɔ ikǃinisɛkilɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔmtʰɛtʰɔ wamamɛd̤i namapɛrsi ɔnɡ̤ɛnakut͡ʃit͡ʃiswa ɓani wɔna az̤a apʰɛnd̤ula atʰi pʰamɓi kɔkumkani ud̤anijɛli ɔnɡ̤ɔwakɔɔɲana aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛjɔ ɓakwajud̤a akakʰatʰali nɡ̤uwɛ nasɛsi salɛlɔ usib̤alilɛjɔ kɛ utʰand̤az̤a umtʰand̤az̤ɔ wakʰɛ katʰatʰu nɡ̤ɛmini waz̤a akuwɛv̤a lɔɔ maz̤wi wɛv̤a kakuɓi kakʰulu nɡ̤ajɔ lɔɔ ntɔ wamɲamɛkɛla ud̤anijɛli ukuɓa amsind̤isɛ waz̤ama ukuɓa am̤lanɡ̤ulɛ lad̤a lat͡ʃɔna ilanɡ̤a az̤a mad̤ɔd̤a ɛz̤a ɛɮɔnɡ̤ɔz̤ɛla atʰi jaz̤i ukuɓa amamɛd̤i namapɛrsi anɔmtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkuɓa sinɡ̤aɓi nakuɡ̤ukǃulwa sɔnkɛ isalɛlɔ nɔmmisɛlɔ aɓɛwumisilɛ wat͡ʃɔ kɛ ɓamz̤isa ud̤anijɛli ɓamd͡ʒ̤ulɛla ɛm̤ad̤ini wɛɛnɡ̤ɔɲama wapʰɛnd̤ula watʰi kud̤anijɛli wanɡ̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ ɔmɓusa nɡ̤amakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ anɡ̤akusind̤isa kwaz̤iswa ilitʲɛ laɓɛkwa pʰɛz̤u kɔmlɔmɔ wɔm̤ad̤i walitʲwina nɡ̤ɔmsɛsanɛ wakʰɛ wɔkutʲwina nanɡ̤ɔmsɛsanɛ wɔkutʲwina wɛz̤ikʰulu z̤akʰɛ ukuz̤ɛ kunɡ̤aɡ̤ukǃulwa ntɔ majɛla nɔd̤anijɛli waz̤a waja ɛb̤ɔtwɛni lakʰɛ waɓuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa uɓusuku ɛz̤ila ukuɮa akwaz̤iswa z̤intɔmɓi z̤iŋ̤ǃ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤ajɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ wapʰɛlɛlwa ɓuɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ waz̤a wav̤uka nɡ̤ɛsifinɡ̤ɔ waja ɛm̤ad̤ini wɛɛnɡ̤ɔɲama nɡ̤ɔɓuŋ̤ǁ̤amɔ akusɔnd̤ɛla ɛm̤ad̤ini wad̤and̤uluka kud̤anijɛli nɡ̤ɛz̤wi ɛliɓuɬunɡ̤u wasusɛla watʰi kud̤anijɛli d̤anijɛli mkʰɔnz̤i wɔtʰikǁɔ ɔpʰililɛjɔ utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ ɔɓuɬala umɓusa uɓɛ nakɔ ukukusind̤isa ɛz̤inɡ̤ɔɲamɛni waz̤a ud̤anijɛli watʰi kumkani pʰila nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ utʰikǁɔ utʰumɛ isitʰuɲwa sakʰɛ sajiv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤a imilɔmɔ jɛɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ukuɓa z̤inɡ̤and̤ɛnz̤akalisi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa ɛnɔkuɓa pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ kufumanɛkɛ ukuɓa nd̤imsulwa napʰamɓi kwakʰɔ and̤ɔnanɡ̤a waz̤a wav̤uja kunɛnɛ watʰi ud̤anijɛli makaɲuswɛ ɛm̤ad̤ini wɛɲuswa kɛ ud̤anijɛli akwafumanɛka nasiɲɛ isɛnz̤akalɔ kujɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɓɛkʰɔlwɛ kutʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ ukumkani wajalɛla az̤iswa lɔɔ mad̤ɔd̤a ɛɓɛmŋǀɛtʰɛz̤ilɛ ud̤anijɛli ɓawad͡ʒ̤ulɛla ɛm̤ad̤ini wɛɛnɡ̤ɔɲama wɔna naɓantwana ɓawɔ naɓafaz̤i ɓawɔ z̤az̤a ɓɛnɡ̤ɛkafiki nɔkufika ɛmz̤ant͡sini wɔm̤ad̤i iinɡ̤ɔɲama z̤aɓaɡ̤ɔɲamɛla z̤awakǀɔla ɔnkɛ amatʰamɓɔ aɓɔ waz̤a ud̤arijɔ wab̤alɛla kuz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a nɛz̤iz̤wɛ nɛɛlwimi ɛɓɛz̤iɬɛli ɛɬaɓatʰini lɔnkɛ watʰi ukǁɔlɔ lwɛnu maluɓɛ lukʰulu nd̤iwisa umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkuɓa ɓatʰi ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛɡ̤uɲa lɔɓukumkani ɓam ɓad̤id̤iz̤ɛlɛ ɓɔtʰukɛ aɓantu pʰamɓi kɔtʰikǁɔ kad̤anijɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ɔpʰililɛjɔ ɛmi nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ uɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ aɓɔnakaliswa nɛɡ̤uɲa lakʰɛ lija kud̤a lijɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni ɛsind̤isa ɛɬanɡ̤ula ɛsɛnz̤a imikǃɔnd̤isɔ nɛz̤imanɡ̤a ɛmaz̤ulwini nasɛɬaɓatʰini nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛmsind̤isilɛ ud̤anijɛli ɛmanɮɛni ɛɛnɡ̤ɔɲama lɔ d̤anijɛli waɓa nɛmpumɛlɛlɔ ɛɓukumkanini ɓukad̤arijɔ nasɛɓukumkanini ɓukakɔrɛʃi umpɛrsi nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɔkukǃala kab̤ɛlɛʃat͡sarɛ wasɛb̤ab̤ɛli ud̤anijɛli waɓɔna ipʰupʰa nɛmiɓɔnɔ jɛntlɔkɔ jakʰɛ ɛsililini sakʰɛ waz̤a walib̤ala ipʰupʰa wakǁɛla isimɓuku sɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ wasusɛla ud̤anijɛli watʰi nd̤aɓɔna ɛmɓɔnwɛni ɛɓusuku nant͡sɔ imimɔja jɔminɛ jasɛz̤ulwini itʰʲɔɓɔz̤ɛla kulwanɮɛ ɔlukʰulu kwɛɲuka ɛlwanɮɛ amaxamŋǀwa amakʰulu kakʰulu ɛnɡ̤afani ɛliɲɛ nɛliɲɛ ɛlɔkukǃala liɓɛ lind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲama linamapʰikɔ ɔkʰɔz̤i nd̤aliɓɔna ad̤a amapʰikɔ alɔ akǁʰwitʰwa lafuŋǃulwa ɛm̤laɓɛni nɡ̤ɛɛɲawɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmntu intliz̤ijɔ jɔmntu nalɔ ɛliɲɛ ixamŋǀwa ɛlɛsiɓini lind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛb̤ɛrɛ laz̤ipʰakamisa nɡ̤akǀalaɲɛ linɛɛmɓamɓɔ ɛz̤intatʰu ɛmlɔɲɛni walɔ pʰakatʰi kwamaz̤iɲɔ alɔ kwatʰiwa kulɔ suka uɮɛ iɲama ɛninz̤i ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ nd̤aɓɔna nalɔ ɛliɲɛ lind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤wɛ linamapʰikɔ ɛntaka amanɛ ɛm̤lana walɔ linɛɛntlɔkɔ ɛz̤inɛ ixamŋǀwa ɛlɔ iɡ̤uɲa ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ nd̤aɓɔna ɛmiɓɔnwɛni jasɛɓusuku nalɔ ixamŋǀwa lɛsinɛ ɛlɔjikɛkajɔ ɛlɔmɛlɛlɛjɔ ɛliŋǀamisilɛjɔ nɡ̤amanɮa ɛlimaz̤iɲɔ makʰulu ɛsiɲitʰi lisiɮa lijikǀɔla lijiɲatʰɛla nɡ̤ɛɛɲawɔ z̤alɔ intɔ ɛsɛlɛjɔ lajɛ linɡ̤afani nawɔ ɔnkɛ amaxamŋǀwa aɓɛnɡ̤apʰamɓili kwalɔ linɛɛmpɔnd̤ɔ ɛz̤iliʃumi nd̤az̤ikǃikǃa iimpɔnd̤ɔ nd̤aɓɔna kuɲuka pʰakatʰi kwaz̤ɔ ɔluɲɛ upʰɔnd̤ɔ luluŋǀinanɛ ɛkwaŋǀɔtʰulwa pʰamɓi kwalɔ ɛz̤intatʰu kwɛz̤ɔkukǃala iimpɔnd̤ɔ nankɔ kɛ kukʰɔ kɔlu pʰɔnd̤ɔ amɛɬɔ and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amɛɬɔ ɔmntu nɔmlɔmɔ utʰɛtʰa iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inkulu kakʰulu nd̤aɓɔna z̤ad̤a z̤amiswa iitrɔnɛ waɬala uɲanɡ̤ɛlɛmiɬa isamɓatʰɔ sakʰɛ sim̤lɔpʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkʰɛpʰu nɛɛnwɛlɛ z̤ɛntlɔkɔ jakʰɛ z̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɓɔja ɓɛz̤imv̤u ɔɓuɲulu itrɔnɛ jakʰɛ inɡ̤amalanɡ̤atʲɛ iiv̤ili z̤ajɔ nɡ̤umlilɔ ɔlɛɲajɔ kwapʰuma umlamɓɔ wɔmlilɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ ajɛlunɡ̤isɛlɛla kujɛ nɛz̤iɡ̤id̤i z̤ɛz̤iɡ̤id̤i ɓɛz̤imisa pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ aɓaɡ̤wɛɓi ɓaɬala pʰant͡si iiŋǀwad̤i z̤av̤ulwa nd̤aɓɔna nd̤az̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛsand̤i samaz̤wi amakʰulu kakʰulu ɔlwawatʰɛtʰajɔ upʰɔnd̤ɔ nd̤aɓɔna lad̤a laɓulawa ixamŋǀwa wab̤ud͡ʒ̤iswa umz̤imɓa walɔ wanikɛlwa ɛmlilwɛni uv̤utʰa amaɲɛ kɛ amaxamŋǀwa aɬutʰwa iɡ̤uɲa lawɔ nɔkɔ kɛ ɓɔlulɛlwa uɓɔmi ɔkwɛtʰutʲana nɛkǁɛʃana nd̤aɓɔna ɛmiɓɔnwɛni jasɛɓusuku nankɔ kusiz̤a nɡ̤amafu ɛz̤ulu ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲana wɔmntu kuɲanɡ̤ɛlɛmiɬa wasɔnd̤ɛz̤wa pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ wanikwa iɡ̤uɲa nɔɓuhand̤iɓa nɔɓukumkani ukuz̤ɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a nɛz̤iz̤wɛ nɛɛlwimi z̤imɓusɛ iɡ̤uɲa lakʰɛ liɡ̤uɲa ɛlinɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ ɛlinɡ̤apʰɛlijɔ uɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ ɓɔɓunɡ̤aji kɔnakaliswa umɔja d̤anijɛli waz̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤a pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤imɓa nɛmiɓɔnɔ jɛntlɔkɔ jam jand̤ikʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰isa nd̤asɔnd̤ɛla kɔmɲɛ waɓaɓɛmi kʰɔna ukuɓa nd̤ikǀɛlɛ kujɛ iɲanisɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ watʰɛtʰa ukuz̤ɛ and̤az̤isɛ ukutʰʲilwa kwɛz̤intɔ la maxamŋǀwa makʰulu kakʰulu manɛ nɡ̤ɔɔkumkani aɓanɛ aɓaja ɓɛmɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini kɛ uɓukumkani ɓaja kuɓutʰaɓatʰa aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni ɓaɓumɛ uɓukumkani kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni lamapʰakad̤ɛ nd̤az̤a nd̤anɡ̤a nd̤inɡ̤ajaz̤i iɲanisɔ nɡ̤ɛli xamŋǀwa lɛsinɛ ɛlinɡ̤afanijɔ namaɲɛ ɔnkɛ ɛliŋǀamisilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔjikɛka ɛlimaz̤iɲɔ asisiɲitʰi ɛlimatʰupʰa alub̤ɛd̤u ɛlaɮa lakǀɔla lajiɲatʰɛla nɡ̤ɛɛɲawɔ intɔ ɛsɛlɛjɔ nanɡ̤ɛɛmpɔnd̤ɔ ɛz̤iliʃumi ɛz̤iɓɛ z̤isɛntlɔkwɛni jalɔ nanɡ̤ɔluɲɛ ɔlwav̤ɛlajɔ ɛz̤awa pʰamɓi kwalɔ ɛz̤intatʰu ɔlɔ pʰɔnd̤ɔ luɓɛ lunamɛɬɔ nɔmlɔmɔ ɔɓɛ utʰɛtʰa iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inkulu kakʰulu ukuɓɔnakala kwalɔ ɓɛkukukʰulu nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwamaɮɛlanɛ alɔ nd̤aɓɔna kɔlu pʰɔnd̤ɔ naɓaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ lwaɓɛjisa wad̤a wɛz̤a uɲanɡ̤ɛlɛmiɬa waɓaɡ̤wɛɓɛla aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni ikǁɛʃa lɔkuɓa aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓaɓumɛ uɓukumkani wat͡ʃɔ ukutʰi ixamŋǀwa lɛsinɛ kɛ kuja kuɓakʰɔ uɓukumkani ɓɛsinɛ ɛɬaɓatʰini ɔɓunɡ̤afanijɔ ɓɔna nɛz̤ikumkani z̤ɔnkɛ ɓuliɮɛ iɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ ɓuliɲatʰɛlɛ ɓulikǀɔlɛ iimpɔnd̤ɔ ɛz̤iliʃumi kɛ kuja kumɛ kɔɓɔ ɓukumkani ɔɔkumkani aɓaliʃumi kusukɛ ɔmɲɛ ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ lɔwɔ akaji naɓapʰamɓili uja kutʰɔɓa ɔɔkumkani aɓatʰatʰu atʰɛtʰɛ amaz̤wi ɔkukǀʰasana nɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni aɓɔnakalisɛ aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni akǀamanɡ̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuwɛnz̤a wamɓi amatʰuɓa nɔmtʰɛtʰɔ ɓanikɛlwɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ ikǁɛʃa namakǁɛʃa nɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛkǁɛʃa kɛ aɓaɡ̤wɛɓi ɓaja kuɬala pʰant͡si ɓalisusɛ iɡ̤uɲa lakʰɛ ukuz̤ɛ lit͡ʃaɓalalɛ lid̤akɛ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni uɓukumkani nɛɡ̤uɲa nɔɓukʰulu ɓɛz̤ikumkani pʰant͡si kwamaz̤ulu ɔnkɛ ɓuja aɓantu aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓɔsɛɲanɡ̤wɛni uɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ ɓuɓukumkani ɔɓunɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ namaɡ̤uɲa ɔnkɛ aja kumɓusa amv̤ɛ jaz̤a kupʰɛla apʰa lɛ ntɔ mna d̤anijɛli iz̤ikǀamanɡ̤ɔ z̤am z̤and̤ikʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰isa kakʰulu iɓala lɔɓusɔ ɓam laɡ̤ukǃuka nd̤ajiɡ̤ǀ̤ina lɛ ntɔ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jam nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsitʰatʰu wɔkulawula kukab̤ɛlɛʃat͡sarɛ kwaɓɔnakala d̤anijɛli umɓɔnɔ ɛmv̤a kwalɔwa waɓɔnakalajɔ mataŋǀi nd̤aɓɔna ɛmɓɔnwɛni kwatʰi ɛkuɓɔnɛni nd̤aɓa nd̤isɛʃuʃan kɔmkʰulu ɛsɛz̤wɛni lakwaɛlam nd̤aɓɔna ɛmɓɔnwɛni nd̤anɡ̤asɛmland͡ʒ̤ɛni ɔjiulaji nd̤apʰakamisa amɛɬɔ nd̤aɓɔna nankɔ pʰamɓi kɔmlamɓɔ inkunz̤i jɛɡ̤uʃa inɛɛmpɔnd̤ɔ ɛz̤imɓini ɛz̤i mpɔnd̤ɔ z̤ɔmɓini z̤ind̤ɛ ɔluɲɛ kɛ lulud̤ɛ kunɔluɲɛ ɔlu lud̤ɛ lwav̤ɛla mv̤a nd̤ajiɓɔna inkunz̤i jɛɡ̤uʃa iɬaɓa ib̤ɛkisa ɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a nasɛntla nasɛz̤ant͡si z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ az̤aɓa pʰamɓi kwajɔ akwaɓakʰɔ unɔkuɬanɡ̤ula ɛsanɮɛni sajɔ jɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkukʰɔlɛkilɛjɔ kujɔ jakʰula mna kɛ nd̤isakǃɔnd̤a nankɔ kuv̤ɛla inkunz̤i jɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a ihamɓa pʰɛz̤u kwɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ inɡ̤afiki pʰant͡si inkunz̤i kɛ jɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ iɓinɔpʰɔnd̤ɔ ɔluɓɔnakalajɔ pʰakatʰi kwamɛɬɔ ajɔ jaja jafika ɛnkunz̤ini jɛɡ̤uʃa umninimpɔnd̤ɔmɓini ɛnd̤ijiɓɔnɛ pʰamɓi kɔmlamɓɔ jaɡ̤id̤imɛla kujɔ kɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuʃuʃu ɓamanɮa ajɔ nd̤ajiɓɔna ɛkǀalɛni lɛnkunz̤i jɛɡ̤uʃa jajid͡ʒ̤amɛla jajitʰʲɔmfa inkunz̤i jɛɡ̤uʃa jaz̤apʰula iimpɔnd̤ɔ z̤ajɔ z̤ɔmɓini jajinɡ̤ɛnamanɮa inkunz̤i jɛɡ̤uʃa pʰamɓi kwajɔ jajiŋ̤ǃ̤ula ɛm̤laɓɛni jajiɲ̤aʃa akwaɓakʰɔ ɓani unɔkujiɬanɡ̤ula inkunz̤i jɛɡ̤uʃa ɛmanɮɛni ajɔ inkunz̤i jɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ jakʰula nɡ̤ɔkuŋǀamisilɛjɔ kɛ jakuɓa namanɮa lwapʰuka upʰɔnd̤ɔ ɔlukʰulu ɛsikʰunɮɛni salɔ kwav̤ɛla ɛz̤inɛ ɛz̤iɓɔnakalajɔ z̤ab̤ɛka ɛmimɔjɛni jɔminɛ jasɛz̤ulwini kɔluɲɛ kuz̤ɔ kwapʰuma upʰɔnd̤ɔ luluŋǀinanɛ lwaɓa lukʰulu nɡ̤ɔkuŋǀamisilɛjɔ lwab̤ɛka nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si nanɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a nanɡ̤asɛz̤wɛni ɛliliɡ̤uɡ̤u lwakʰula lwad̤a lwɛsa kumkʰɔsi wɛz̤ulu lwajiwisa ɛm̤laɓɛni iŋǁɛɲɛ jɔmkʰɔsi lɔwɔ wɛɛnkwɛnkwɛz̤i lwajiɲ̤aʃa lwaz̤ikʰulisa lwad̤a lwɛsa kumtʰɛtʰɛlimkʰɔsi lɔwɔ kujɛ inkɔnz̤ɔ jamakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ nɛnd̤awɔ jɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jakʰɛ jawiswa pʰant͡si umkʰɔsi unikɛlwɛ kulɔ kuɲɛ nɛnkɔnz̤ɔ jamakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛsik͡xɛkǃɔ iɲanisɔ lwajiwisɛla pʰant͡si ɛm̤laɓɛni lwɛnz̤a lwaɓa nɛmpumɛlɛlɔ nd̤amv̤a ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛtʰɛtʰa watʰi kɛ ɔmɲɛ ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kulɔwɔ uɓɛtʰɛtʰa nɡ̤ɔwɔmz̤uz̤u ɔnɡ̤akanani umɓɔnɔ lɔwɔ wɛnkɔnz̤ɔ jamakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ nɔwɛsik͡xɛkǃɔ ɛsipʰanz̤isajɔ ukunikɛlwa ɔkɔ kwɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɔmkʰɔsi lɔwɔ ɛkuɲ̤aʃwɛni watʰi kɔd̤a kuɓɛ kukuɬwa ɔkunɡ̤amawaka amaɓini anamakʰulu amatʰatʰu jand̤ulɛ ukulunɡ̤iswa iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kwatʰi nd̤akuwuɓɔna umɓɔnɔ d̤anijɛli nd̤afuna ukukǃɔnd̤a nankɔ pʰamɓi ɔkunɡ̤atʰi kujimɓɔnakalɔ jɛnd̤ɔd̤a nd̤ɛv̤a iliz̤wi lɔmntu pʰakatʰi kwɛɛŋǁwɛmɛ z̤ɛulaji laɓiz̤a latʰi ɡ̤aɓrijɛli mkǃɔnd̤isɛ imɓɔnakalɔ wɛz̤a kwɛli kǀala nd̤imi kulɔ akuz̤a nd̤ɔjika nd̤awa nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ watʰi kǃɔnd̤a ɲana wɔmntu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umɓɔnɔ lɔ usinɡ̤isɛ kwikǁɛʃa lɔkupʰɛla kɛ kalɔku ɛkutʰɛtʰɛni kwakʰɛ nd̤awa isid̤uli nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni wand̤ikǀʰukumisa wand̤imisa ɛnd̤awɛni jɔkuma watʰi jaɓɔna nd̤ija kwaz̤isa ɔkuja kuɓakʰɔ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kɔb̤av̤umɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umɓɔnɔ uja kwikǁɛʃa ɛlimisiwɛjɔ lɔkupʰɛla inkunz̤i jɛɡ̤uʃa ɔjiɓɔnilɛjɔ inɛɛmpɔnd̤ɔ ɛz̤imɓini nɡ̤ɔkumkani ɓamamɛd̤i naɓamapɛrsi nɛnkunz̤i jɛb̤ɔkʰwɛ ɛkǁʰɔnti nɡ̤ukumkani wakwajav̤an upʰɔnd̤ɔ ɔlukʰulu ɔlupʰakatʰi kwamɛɬɔ nɡ̤ukumkani wɔkukǃala ukwapʰuka ɔku kumɛ z̤iɓɛ nɛ ɛsikʰunɮɛni salɔ kukutʰi kuja kumɛ iz̤ikumkani ɛz̤inɛ ɛluɬanɡ̤ɛni kunɡ̤aɓi nɡ̤amanɮa alɔ kɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kɔɓukumkani ɓaɓɔ ɓakuɓɔn ukuɓa ɓaz̤alisilɛ aɓak͡xɛkǃi kuja kumɛ ɔɓusɔ ɓunɡ̤waɲalala ɔɓaz̤ijɔ uɓukǃʰɛt͡sɛɓa ɔmɛlɛlɛ amanɮa akʰɛ kɔd̤wa kunɡ̤aɓi nɡ̤amanɮa akʰɛ kɛ uja kɔnakalisa nɡ̤ɔkuɓalulɛkilɛjɔ aɓɛ nɛmpumɛlɛlɔ afɛz̤ɛ aɓat͡ʃaɓalalisɛ aɓɔmɛlɛlɛjɔ naɓantu ɓaɓaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓukǃʰɔkɔlɔ ɓakʰɛ jɔɓa nɛmpumɛlɛlɔ inkɔɬisɔ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɛ az̤ɛnz̤ɛ mkʰulu ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɛ aɓat͡ʃaɓalalisɛ aɓaninz̤i nɡ̤ɔkwalama asukɛlɛ pʰɛz̤ulu kumtʰɛtʰɛli waɓatʰɛtʰɛli apʰulwɛ kɛ kunɡ̤aɓi nɡ̤asanɮa umɓɔnɔ wɔkuɬwa ɔkʰankaɲiwɛjɔ ujiɲanisɔ wɛna kɛ uz̤ɛ uwuv̤alɛlɛ umɓɔnɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujakwimiɬa ɛmininz̤i mna d̤anijɛli nd̤apʰɛla nd̤anɛɛnt͡suku nd̤isifa nd̤av̤uka nd̤ajɛnz̤a imikǀimɓi jɔkumkani nd̤amanɡ̤aliswa jimɓɔnakalɔ lɛjɔ kwakunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ ujikǃɔnd̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɔkukǃala kad̤arijɔ uɲana kaahaswɛrɔsi wasɛmɓɛwini jamamɛd̤i ɔwaɓa nɡ̤ukumkani pʰɛz̤u kɔɓukumkani ɓamakalɛd̤i nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɔkukǃala wɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ d̤anijɛli nd̤akǃɔnd̤a nɡ̤az̤ɔ iiŋǀwad̤i lɛmiɲaka ɛlafikajɔ nɡ̤ajɔ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɛrɛmija umprɔfɛti ukuɓa kuz̤aliswɛ imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kumaŋǁuwa ɛjɛrusalɛm nd̤aɓub̤ɛkisa uɓusɔ ɓam kwinkɔsi jam utʰikǁɔ ukuɓa nd̤ifunɛ imitʰand̤az̤ɔ nɛz̤itaxuz̤isɔ nd̤iz̤ila ukuɮa nd̤inɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ nɔtʰutʰu nd̤atʰand̤az̤a kɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ nd̤av̤uma nd̤atʰi awu nkɔsi tʰikǁɔ ɔmkʰulu ɔwɔjikɛkajɔ ɔɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inɛla umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nɛŋǀɛɓa aɓɔ ɓamtʰand̤ajɔ ɓajiɡ̤ǀ̤inajɔ imitʰɛtʰɔ jakʰɛ sɔnilɛ sɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa sɛnz̤ɛ ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ siɡ̤wilikilɛ sipʰamɓukilɛ ɛmitʰɛtʰwɛni jakʰɔ nasɛmasikwɛni akʰɔ asiɓapʰulapʰulanɡ̤a aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɔ aɓaprɔfɛti aɓaɓɛtʰɛtʰa ɛɡ̤amɛni lakʰɔ kɔɔkumkani ɓɛtʰu nakuɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛtʰu nakɔɔɓawɔ nakuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓantu ɓɛliz̤wɛ nkɔsi ɓukuwɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa kutʰi kukud̤ana kɔɓusɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kund͡ʒ̤alɔ nam̤la kumad̤ɔd̤a akwajud̤a kuɓɛmi ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm kumasirajɛli ɔnkɛ akufupʰi nakud̤ɛ ɛmaz̤wɛni ɔnkɛ apʰɔ wawaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛla kʰɔna nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓumɛnɛmɛnɛ ɓawɔ awamɛnɛz̤ajɔ nɡ̤aɓɔ kuwɛ nkɔsi kutʰi kukud̤ana kɔɓusɔ kɔɔkumkani ɓɛtʰu nakuɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛtʰu nakɔɔɓawɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa sɔnilɛ kuwɛ ɛnkɔsini utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu jimfɛsanɛ nɔkǁɔlɛlɔ kuɓa siɡ̤wilikilɛ kujɛ asilipʰulapʰulanɡ̤a iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ukuɓa sihamɓɛ nɡ̤ɛmijalɛlɔ jakʰɛ aɓɛjiɓɛkɛ pʰamɓi kwɛtʰu nɡ̤aɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓakʰɛ aɓaprɔfɛti ɔnkɛ amasirajɛli awuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰilɛ umjalɛlɔ wakʰɔ atʲɛkilɛ ukuɓa anɡ̤alipʰulapʰuli iz̤wi lakʰɔ sipʰalaz̤ɛkilɛ kɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu isikǃalɛkisɔ nɛsifunɡ̤ɔ ɛsib̤aliwɛjɔ ɛmjalɛlwɛni kamɔsɛs umkʰɔnz̤i katʰikǁɔ kuɓa sɔnilɛ kujɛ wawamisa kɛ amaz̤wi akʰɛ aɓɛwatʰɛtʰilɛ nɡ̤atʰi nanɡ̤aɓaɡ̤wɛɓi ɓɛtʰu aɓaɓɛsiɡ̤wɛɓa nɡ̤ɔkusiz̤isɛla uɓuɓi ɔɓukʰulu ɔɓunɡ̤ɛnz̤iwanɡ̤a pʰant͡si kwɛz̤ulu lɔnkɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓɛnz̤iwɛjɔ kwijɛrusalɛm nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kub̤aliwɛjɔ ɛmjalɛlwɛni kamɔsɛs ɓɔnkɛ uɓuɓi ɓusiz̤ɛlɛ kɛ asimɓɔnɡ̤ɔz̤anɡ̤a ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ukuɓa siɓujɛ ɛɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁɛni ɓɛtʰu siɓɛ nɡ̤aɓanɔkukǃikǃa nɡ̤ɛɲanisɔ jakʰɔ waɓupʰapʰɛla kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uɓuɓi wasiz̤isɛla ɓɔna kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ɛlunɡ̤isa ɛkwɛnz̤ɛni kwakʰɛ kɔnkɛ akwɛnz̤ajɔ kɛ asilipʰulapʰulanɡ̤a iliz̤wi lakʰɛ kalɔku kɛ nkɔsi tʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu ɔwaɓakʰupʰajɔ aɓantu ɓakʰɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nɡ̤ɛsanɮa ɛsitʰɛ ŋ̰ǃ̰i waz̤ɛnz̤ɛla iɡ̤ama nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kund͡ʒ̤alɔ nam̤la sɔnilɛ sɛnz̤ɛ ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ nkɔsi nɡ̤ɔkwɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i jakʰɔ jɔnkɛ jɔɓulunɡ̤isa mawukʰɛ uɓujɛ umsind̤ɔ wakʰɔ nɔɓuʃuʃu ɓakʰɔ kumz̤i wakʰɔ ijɛrusalɛm kwintaɓa jakʰɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kuɓa nɡ̤ɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤ɛtʰu nanɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɔɔɓawɔ ijɛrusalɛm naɓantu ɓakʰɔ ɓasisiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ kuɓa ɓɔnkɛ aɓasid͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤ilɛjɔ kalɔku kɛ tʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu kupʰulapʰulɛ ukutʰand̤az̤a kɔmkʰɔnz̤i wakʰɔ nɔkutaxuz̤isa kwakʰɛ uɓukʰaɲisɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jakʰɔ ɛliŋǁuwa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnkɔsi tʰɔɓa inɮɛɓɛ jakʰɔ uv̤ɛ v̤ula amɛɬɔ akʰɔ uɓɔnɛ ukupʰanz̤a kwɛtʰu nɔmz̤i lɔwɔ uɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama lakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa akunɡ̤anɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛmisɛɓɛnz̤i jɛtʰu jɔɓulunɡ̤isa ɛsiwisa ukutaxuz̤isa kwɛtʰu pʰamɓi kwakʰɔ kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛɛmfɛsanɛ z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤ininz̤i nkɔsi jiv̤a nkɔsi kǁɔlɛla nkɔsi ɓaz̤a iinɮɛɓɛ wɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jakʰɔ tʰikǁɔ ukuliɓala kuɓa umz̤i wakʰɔ naɓantu ɓakʰɔ ɓaɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama lakʰɔ nd̤atʰi nd̤isatʰɛtʰa nd̤itʰand̤az̤a nd̤iv̤uma isɔnɔ nɛsɔnɔ saɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu amasirajɛli nd̤iwisa ukutaxuz̤isa pʰamɓi kɔjɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛntaɓa ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jɔtʰikǁɔ nd̤isatʰɛtʰa kɛ nɡ̤ɔkutʰand̤az̤a ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɡ̤uɡ̤aɓrijɛli lɛjɔ nd̤ajiɓɔnajɔ ɛmɓɔnwɛni ɛkukǃalɛni nd̤itʰʲafilɛ nɔkutʰʲafa jasɔnd̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔmnikɛlɔ wanɡ̤ɔkuɬwa jand̤ikǃɔnd̤isa jatʰɛtʰa jatʰi d̤anijɛli nɡ̤ɔku nd̤ipʰumilɛ ukuɓa nd̤ikufund̤isɛ ukǃɔnd̤ɛ kwapʰuma iliz̤wi ɛkukǃalɛni kɔkutaxuz̤isa kwakʰɔ nd̤iz̤ɛ kulikǁɛla kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa unɡ̤ɔŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ likǃɔnd̤ɛ kɛ iliz̤wi ukǃɔnd̤ɛ umɓɔnɔ ɓamisɛlwɛ iiv̤ɛki ɛz̤imaʃumi asikǁʰɛŋǁɛ aɓantu ɓakɔwɛnu nɔmz̤i wakɔwɛnu ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ukuɓa sitʰintɛlwɛ isik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤itʲwinwɛ iz̤ɔnɔ ɓukǀaɲaɡ̤uʃɛlwɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa kuz̤iswɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa ɔɓunɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ utʲwinwɛ umɓɔnɔ nɔmprɔfɛti itʰand͡ʒ̤iswɛ iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jaz̤i kɛ ukǃikǃɛ ukuɓa kutʰaɓatʰɛla ɛkupʰumɛni kwɛli z̤wi lɔkuɓa iɓujiswɛ jakʰiwɛ ijɛrusalɛm kusɛ kumtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa ɔjinɡ̤anɡ̤a z̤iiv̤ɛki ɛz̤isikǁʰɛŋǁɛ z̤iiv̤ɛki ɛz̤imaʃumi matʰand̤atʰu anamɓini ɛja kuɓujiswa jakʰiwɛ iɓɛ ɓanz̤i ikǀand̤wɛ ɛkukǀutʰɛkɛni kɛ kwamakǁɛʃa ɛmv̤ɛni kɛ kwɛɛv̤ɛki ɛz̤imaʃumi matʰand̤atʰu anamɓini uja kuŋǃuɲulwa umtʰand͡ʒ̤iswa anɡ̤aɓi saɓa nantɔ umz̤i nɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ uja kut͡ʃatʲalaliswa nɡ̤aɓantu ɓɛnɡ̤anɡ̤a ɛja kuz̤a ukupʰɛla kwajɔ kuja kuɓa nɡ̤ɔmkʰukula kud̤ɛ kɛ kusɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kuja kuɓa jimfaz̤wɛ lupʰanz̤isɔ ɔlumiswɛ lwaɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwa aɓaninz̤i jɔɓakǃinisɛla umŋǃɔpʰisɔ iv̤ɛki ɛɲɛ nɡ̤ɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰa sɛv̤ɛki ipʰɛlisɛ imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɛminikɛlɔ jɔkuɮa iz̤ɛ nɡ̤amapʰikɔ ɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤inɛz̤ɔtʰɛ inɡ̤umpʰanz̤isi sid̤ɛ kɛ sipʰalaz̤ɛkɛ isipʰɛlɔ sisɛsimisiwɛjɔ saɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwa pʰɛz̤u kwajɔ impanz̤isɔ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɛsitʰatʰu kakɔrɛʃi wamapɛrsi watʰʲilɛlwa iliz̤wi ud̤anijɛli ɔɡ̤ama liɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ub̤ɛlɛt͡ʃat͡sarɛ ɛlɔ z̤wi lijiɲanisɔ lisinɡ̤isɛlɛ ɛluz̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛnɡ̤ɛni kɛ ɔlukʰulu walikǃɔnd̤a ɛlɔ liz̤wi waɓa nɔkuwukǃɔnd̤a umɓɔnɔ nɡ̤ajɔ lɔɔ miɬa d̤anijɛli ɓɛnd̤isɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili iint͡suku z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛɛv̤ɛki ɛz̤intatʰu and̤iɮanɡ̤a sɔnka sinɛŋǀasa akunɡ̤ɛnanɡ̤a ɲama nawajini ɛmlɔɲɛni and̤iz̤itʰamɓisanɡ̤a z̤ad̤a z̤az̤alisɛka iint͡suku z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛɛv̤ɛki ɛz̤intatʰu nɡ̤ɔm̤la wamaʃumi amaɓini ananɛ wɛɲanɡ̤a jɔkukǃala nd̤aɓa sɛkǀalɛni lɔmlamɓɔ ɔmkʰulu ɔjihid̤ɛkɛlɛ nd̤awapʰakamisa amɛɬɔ nd̤aɓɔna nant͡sɔ ind̤ɔd̤a jamɓɛtʰɛ ilinɛn ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ ib̤iŋǃɛ ɛsiŋǃɛni sajɔ iɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ ɛkǀikiz̤ɛkilɛjɔ jasɛufaz̤i umz̤imɓa wajɔ wawund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛk͡xiz̤ɔlitɛ uɓusɔ ɓajɔ nɡ̤atʰi nɡ̤umɓanɛ ukuɓɔnakala kwaɓɔ amɛɬɔ ajɔ ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ikʰuni ɛz̤it͡ʃanɡ̤at͡ʃanɡ̤iswajɔ iinɡ̤alɔ z̤ajɔ nɛɛɲawɔ z̤ajɔ z̤iɓɔnakala nɡ̤atʰi lub̤ɛd̤u ɔluɓɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ɛlisiwɛjɔ nɛsand̤i samaz̤wi ajɔ nɡ̤atʰi sisand̤i sɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔlɔ jaɓantu mna d̤anijɛli nd̤awuɓɔna nd̤ɛd̤wa umɓɔnɔ lɔwɔ amad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛnam akawuɓɔnanɡ̤a umɓɔnɔ kɔd̤wa awɛlwa kukuɡ̤ub̤a ɔkukʰulu aɓalɛka az̤imɛla mna nd̤asala nd̤ɛd̤wa nd̤ajiɓɔna lɛ mɓɔnakalɔ nd̤apʰɛlɛlwa nɡ̤amanɮa nɛɓala lɔɓusɔ ɓam lad͡ʒ̤ika lɔnakala nd̤apʰɛlɛlwa nɡ̤amanɮa nd̤asiv̤a isand̤i samaz̤wi ajɔ nd̤akusiv̤a kɛ isand̤i samaz̤wi ajɔ nd̤awa nd̤awa isid̤uli nɡ̤ɔɓusɔ uɓusɔ ɓam ɓub̤ɛkɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni nd̤ɛv̤a nasɔ isanɮa sind̤ikǀʰukumisa sand̤imisa nɡ̤amad̤ɔlɔ nanɡ̤ɛɛntɛnd̤ɛ z̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤am ɛz̤ihɛkǁajɔ jatʰi d̤anijɛli nd̤ɔd̤a iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ wakǃɔnd̤ɛ amaz̤wi ɛnd̤iwatʰɛtʰa kuwɛ umɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jɔkuma kwakʰɔ kuɓa nd̤itʰuɲiwɛ nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ kuwɛ itʰɛ jakulitʰɛtʰa ɛlɔ liz̤wi nd̤ɛsuka nd̤ɛma nd̤itʰutʰumɛla jatʰi musa ukɔjika d̤anijɛli kuɓakususɛla kum̤la wɔkukǃala ɔwajinikɛlajɔ intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ ɛkukǃɔnd̤ɛni nasɛkuz̤itʰɔɓɛni pʰamɓi kɔtʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ av̤iwa amaz̤wi akʰɔ kɛ nd̤iz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamaz̤wi akʰɔ kɛ umtʰɛtʰɛli wɔɓukumkani ɓamapɛrsi wamɛlana imiɬa ɛnɡ̤amaʃumi amaɓini anamɲɛ ujaɓɔna umikajɛli ɔmɲɛ wakuɓatʰɛtʰɛli aɓaz̤iintlɔkɔ wɛz̤a kund̤iŋǀɛd̤a nd̤amɔjisa kʰɔna kɔɔkumkani ɓamapɛrsi nd̤iz̤ɛ kukukǃɔnd̤isa kɛ ɔkuja kuɓaɬɛla aɓantu ɓakɔwɛnu ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɬa kuɓa umɓɔnɔ lɔ usɛnɡ̤ɔwɛmiɬa lɛjɔ itʰɛ ɛkutʰɛtʰɛni kwajɔ nɡ̤ɔkwala maz̤wi nd̤aɓub̤ɛkisa uɓusɔ ɓam ɛm̤laɓɛni nd̤asisid̤ɛnɡ̤ɛ nankɔ ɔfana nɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ɛkǀʰukumisa umlɔmɔ nd̤awuv̤ula umlɔmɔ nd̤atʰɛtʰa nd̤atʰi kulɔ pʰamɓi nkɔsi jam nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛmɓɔnakalɔ ind̤ifikɛlɛ inimɓa jam nd̤apʰɛlɛlwa nɡ̤amanɮa anɡ̤atʰini kɛ ukuɓa nakɔ umkʰɔnz̤i wɛnkɔsi jam lɛ ukutʰɛtʰa nɛnkɔsi jam lɛ mna ɔkwam and̤isɛnamanɮa akusɛkʰɔ mpʰɛfumlɔ wapʰind̤a wand̤ikǀʰukumisa ɔnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmntu ukuɓɔnakala kwakʰɛ wand̤ɔmɛlɛz̤a watʰi musa ukɔjika nd̤ɔd̤a iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ jiɓa nɔkǁɔlɔ jɔmɛlɛla jɔmɛlɛla utʰɛ ɛkutʰɛtʰɛni kwakʰɛ nd̤ɔmɛlɛz̤ɛka nd̤atʰi majitʰɛtʰɛ inkɔsi jam kuɓa und̤ɔmɛlɛz̤ilɛ watʰi ujaz̤i intɔ ɛnd̤iz̤ɛ nɡ̤ajɔ kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔku kɛ nd̤ija kuɓuja nd̤ijɛ nɔmtʰɛtʰɛli wamapɛrsi nd̤ipʰuma nd͡ʒ̤ɛ nankɔ umtʰɛtʰɛli wakwajav̤an ɛsiz̤a nɔkɔ kɛ nd̤ija kukukǁɛlɛla ɔkub̤aliwɛjɔ ɛsib̤alwɛni sɛɲanisɔ akukʰɔ namɲɛ wɔmɛlɛz̤ana nɡ̤akwaɓɔ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ kukamikajɛli umtʰɛtʰɛli wɛnu nam kɛ nɡ̤ɔmɲaka wɔkukǃala kad̤arijɔ ummɛd̤i nd̤ɛma ukuɓa nd̤imɔmɛlɛz̤ɛ nd̤im̤lanɡ̤anisɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔku kɛ nd̤ija kukukǁɛlɛla iɲanisɔ jaɓɔna kusaz̤a kumɛ ɔɔkumkani aɓatʰatʰu kumapɛrsi nɔwɛsinɛ uja kutʲɛɓa nɡ̤ɔɓutʲɛɓi ɔɓukʰulu kunaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ atʰi kǁa ɔmɛlɛlɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔɓutʲɛɓi ɓakʰɛ aɓakǁʰɔkɔŋǁɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɓajɛ nɔɓukumkani ɓakwajav̤an kɔsuka kumɛ ɔliɡ̤ɔxa alawulɛ nɡ̤ɔlawulɔ ɔlukʰulu ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkukʰɔlɛka kujɛ ɓuja kutʰi kǁa atʰɛ wɛsuka wɛma ɓukǃʰɛkɛz̤wɛ uɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ ɓaɬulɛlwɛ ɛmimɔjɛni jɔminɛ jasɛz̤ulwini ɓunɡ̤aɓi ɓɔɓɛmpund̤ɛ jakʰɛ ɓunɡ̤aɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔlawulɔ lwakʰɛ aɓɛlawula nɡ̤alɔ kuɓa ɓuja kuɲɔtʰulwa uɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ ɓuɓɛ ɓɔɓaɓamɓi ɓunɡ̤aɓi ɓɔɓajɔ kɛ uja kɔmɛlɛla wasɛz̤ant͡si ɔmɲɛ kuɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ ɔmɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ alawulɛ luɓɛ lulawulɔ ɔlukʰulu ulawulɔ lwakʰɛ ɓɔd̤iɓana ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɲaka itʰi intɔmɓi jɔkumkani wasɛz̤ant͡si inɡ̤ɛnɛ wasɛntla ukuɓa ɓalunɡ̤isanɛ kɛ ija inɡ̤alɔ jajɔ anɡ̤ɛmi jɛna nɛnɡ̤alɔ jakʰɛ iwɛ inikɛlwɛ jɔna naɓaɓɛjinɡ̤ɛnisilɛ nɔwajiz̤alajɔ nɔwajɔmɛlɛz̤ajɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ makǁɛʃa kɔpʰuma kɛ ɛɬumɛlwɛni lɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu z̤ajɔ ɔmɲɛ ɔsɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ ajɛ ɛmpini ajɛ ɛz̤iŋǃaɓɛni z̤ɔkumkani wasɛntla az̤ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɛjisɛ wɔtʰimɓa az̤isɛ ɛjiputa nɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓaɓɔ kuɲɛ nɛmifanɛkisɔ jaɓɔ ɛtʰʲid̤iwɛjɔ kuɲɛ nɛɛmpaɬa z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ amisɛ jɛna imiɲaka pʰamɓi kɔkumkani wasɛntla wɔnɡ̤ɛna ɛɓukumkanini ɓɔkumkani wasɛz̤ant͡si aɓujɛlɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni wakʰɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓaja kukǁʰɔɓa ɓaɬanɡ̤anisɛ imfid̤i jɛɛmpi ɛz̤ininz̤i iz̤ɛ nɔkuz̤a ikʰukulɛ iɮulɛ iɓujɛ ɓalwɛ ɓad̤ɛ ɓasɛ ɛŋǃaɓɛni jakʰɛ wɔkǀapʰuka wasɛz̤ant͡si apʰumɛ alwɛ najɛ nɔkumkani wasɛntla lɔwɔ jɛna kɛ amisɛ imfid̤i ɛnkulu kɛ imfid̤i lɛjɔ inikɛlwɛ ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ jɔtʰi imfid̤i jakusuka iz̤ipʰakamisɛ awisɛ anɡ̤amaʃumi kɛ anɡ̤ɛjisi nɔkɔ wɔɓuja wasɛntla amisɛ imfid̤i ɛnkulu nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛjɔkukǃala ɛz̤ɛ nɔkuz̤a ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwamakǁɛʃa ɛmiɲaka ɛnɛmpi ɛnkulu nɛɛmpaɬa ɛz̤ininz̤i nɡ̤alɔɔ makǁɛʃa kuja kusukɛla pʰɛz̤ulu aɓaninz̤i nɡ̤akukumkani wasɛz̤ant͡si ɓaz̤ipʰakamisɛ ɔɔɲana aɓanɡ̤amaɲanɡ̤az̤a aɓantu ɓakɔwɛnu ukuɓa ɓawumisɛ umɓɔnɔ ɓakʰuɓɛkɛ wɔfika wasɛntla afumɓɛ ud̤ɔnɡ̤a lɔkuŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a ajitʰimɓɛ imiz̤i ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ iinɡ̤alɔ z̤asɛz̤ant͡si z̤inɡ̤amisi naɓantu ɓakʰɛ aɓaɬɛliwɛjɔ ɓanɡ̤aɓi namanɮa ɔkuma ɔfikajɔ kʰɔna uja kwɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkutʰand̤a kwakʰɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ umisajɔ pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ amisɛ jɛna ɛz̤wɛni ɛliliɡ̤uɡ̤u at͡ʃaɓalalisɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa sakʰɛ wɔɓub̤ɛkisa uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ ɛkutʰini ɛz̤ɛ ɛnɔkukǃina kɔɓukumkani ɓakʰɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɛkǀinɡ̤a ukulunɡ̤isa ɛnz̤ɛ kɛ amnikɛ intɔmɓi jaɓafaz̤i ukuz̤ɛ ajɔnakalisɛ kɛ ajiji ajiji kuɓa lutʰɔ kujɛ uja kud͡ʒ̤ika ab̤ɛkisɛ ɛz̤ikǃitʰini az̤itʰimɓɛ ɛz̤ininz̤i apʰɛlisɛ aɓapʰatʰi kutʰi kǀwaka ukuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a kwaɓɔ kuɓɔ kɛ ukuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤a kwakʰɛ ɓaja kukuɓujisɛla kujɛ wɔd͡ʒ̤ika ab̤ɛkisɛ ɛz̤iŋǃaɓɛni z̤ɛliz̤wɛ lakʰɛ akʰuɓɛkɛ awɛ anɡ̤afuɲanwa ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ kuja kumɛ ɔkǀand̤isa aɓakǃʰuɓi ɓaɓantu ɛɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amʃɛni ɓɔɓukumkani nɡ̤ɛɛnt͡suku ɛz̤imɓalwa apʰulwɛ kunɡ̤aɓi nɡ̤amisind̤ɔ kunɡ̤aɓi nɡ̤amfaz̤wɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ kuja kumɛ ɔd̤ɛlɛkilɛjɔ ɔnɡ̤aji nd̤ili jaɓukumkani ɛz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkwalama aɓuɬasɛlɛ uɓukumkani nɡ̤ɔkuɲ̤walaz̤a iinɡ̤alɔ ɛz̤ikʰukulajɔ z̤ija kukʰukuliswa z̤imkɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ z̤apʰulwɛ kwanɛnɡ̤anɡ̤a jɔmŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɔtʰi kusɛlɔkɔ akukʰɔv̤a ukutʰɛlɛla kuz̤ɔ ɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛnkɔɬisɔ aɲukɛ az̤uz̤ɛ namanɮa nɡ̤ɔɬanɡ̤a ɔlunɡ̤ɛpʰi uja kunɡ̤ɛna nɡ̤ɔkwalama nasɛz̤ind̤awɛni ɛz̤itʲɛɓilɛjɔ z̤ɛliz̤wɛ ɛnz̤ɛ aɓanɡ̤akwɛnz̤anɡ̤a ɔɔjisɛ nɔɔjisɛ ɓɔɔjisɛ uja kukwɛnz̤a amakǀʰitʰi pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ɔkupʰanɡ̤iwɛjɔ namakǁʰɔɓa nɛɛmpaɬa z̤az̤ɔ akǀinɡ̤ɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤akʰɛ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǃaɓa ɔkwɛkǁɛʃana wɔkǁʰɔkɔŋǁɛla amanɮa akʰɛ nɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ wasɛz̤ant͡si ɛnɛmpi ɛnkulu ukumkani wasɛz̤ant͡si uja kukǁʰɔɓɛla imfaz̤wɛ ɛnɛmpi ɛnkulu ɛŋǀamisɛ nɡ̤amanɮa kɛ akaji kuɓa ɓaja kwɛnz̤a ijɛlɛŋǃɛ nɡ̤ajɛ aɓaɮa umamkɛlisɔ wakʰɛ ɓɔmapʰula ikʰukulɛ jakʰɛ ɓawɛ aɓaɓulɛwɛjɔ ɓaɓɛ ɓaninz̤i ɔɔkumkani aɓɔ ɓaɓini iintliz̤ijɔ z̤aɓɔ z̤ija kut͡salɛla ɛkwɛnz̤ɛni uɓuɓi ɓatʰɛtʰɛ amanɡ̤a sitʰɛɓɛni siɲɛ akuji kuɓa nampumɛlɛlɔ kuɓa isipʰɛlɔ sisaja ɛkǁɛʃɛni ɛlimisiwɛjɔ wɔɓujɛla kɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɛ ɛnɛmpaɬa ɛninz̤i intliz̤ijɔ jakʰɛ iwukǀʰasɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ afɛz̤ɛ aɓujɛlɛ kɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛlimisiwɛjɔ uja kuɓuja ajɛ nɡ̤asɛz̤ant͡si ɛkupʰɛlɛni kunɡ̤aɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓɛkund͡ʒ̤alɔ ɛkukǃalɛni z̤ija kuz̤a kujɛ iiŋǃanawa z̤amakiti uja kukʰɔɬwa aɓujɛ awub̤av̤umɛlɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ afɛz̤ɛ aɓujɛ aɓakǃɔnd̤ɛ aɓaʃija umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɔŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ iinɡ̤alɔ z̤akwakʰɛ z̤ɔsuka z̤imɛ z̤ijiɬamɓɛlɛ iŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kwaiŋǃaɓa z̤isusɛ inkɔnz̤ɔ jamakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ z̤imisɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inɛz̤ɔtʰɛ ɛz̤ipʰanz̤isajɔ aɓapʰatʰa umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nɡ̤ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ wɔɓaɬamɓɛla nɡ̤amaz̤wi aɡ̤ud̤ilɛjɔ kɛ ɓɔna aɓantu aɓamaz̤ijɔ utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɓaɓamɓɛlɛlɛ kuwɔ ɓafɛz̤ɛ aɓanɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ ɛɓantwini ɓɔlukǃɔnd̤isa uninz̤i ɓaja kukʰuɓɛka ɓawɛ lik͡xɛlɛ nalilanɡ̤atʲɛ kukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa nakukupʰanɡ̤wa kuɓɛ z̤iint͡suku ɛkukʰuɓɛkɛni kwaɓɔ ɓaja kuŋǀɛd̤wa nɡ̤ɔŋǀɛd̤ɔ ɔluŋǀinanɛ ɓatʰɛlɛlɛ kuɓɔ aɓaninz̤i ɓɛɲ̤walaz̤a jɔkʰuɓɛka iŋǁɛɲɛ jaɓanɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓakǀikid̤wɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ɓaɬand͡ʒ̤ululwɛ kwɛnz̤iwɛ m̤lɔpʰɛ kud̤ɛ kuɓɛ likǁɛʃa lɔkupʰɛla kuɓa kusaja kuɓa nɡ̤ɔkwɛkǁɛʃa ɛlimisiwɛjɔ ukumkani uja kwɛnz̤a nɡ̤ɔkukʰɔlɛka kujɛ az̤iɲusɛ az̤ikʰulisɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɔnkɛ atʰɛtʰɛ amaz̤wi aɓalulɛkilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ wɔɔtʰikǁɔ aɓɛ nɛmpumɛlɛlɔ lud̤ɛ lupʰɛlɛ ub̤av̤umɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kujɛnz̤ɛka ɔkumisiwɛjɔ kwaɡ̤ǃ̤itʲwa akaji kuɓakǃɔnd̤a ɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɔɔjisɛ nɔkuŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ kuɓafaz̤i nɔtʰikǁɔ ɔnɡ̤uwumɓi anɡ̤amkǃɔnd̤i kuɓa uja kuz̤ikʰulisa nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jaɓɔ wɔz̤ukisa utʰikǁɔ wɛɛŋǃaɓa utʰikǁɔ aɓaɓɛnɡ̤amaz̤i ɔɔjisɛ amz̤ukisɛ nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nanɡ̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nanɡ̤amatʲɛ aŋǃaɓilɛjɔ nanɡ̤ɛz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ wɔkwɛnz̤ɛla ɔku iiŋǃaɓa ɛz̤iŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔtʰikǁɔ wɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a lɔ umɓukajɔ uja kumand̤isɛla uz̤ukɔ ampʰatʰisɛ aɓaninz̤i amaɓɛlɛ um̤laɓa nɡ̤ɔkumv̤uz̤a nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lɔkupʰɛla uja kuɬaɓana nɔkumkani wasɛz̤ant͡si wasɛntla aɮɔnɡ̤ɔz̤ɛlɛ ajɛ kujɛ ɛnɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa naɓamahaʃɛ nɛɛŋǃanawa ɛz̤ininz̤i awanɡ̤ɛnɛlɛ amaz̤wɛ akʰukulɛ aɮulɛ wɔnɡ̤ɛna ɛz̤wɛni ɛliliɡ̤uɡ̤u ɓakʰuɓɛkɛ aɓaninz̤i kɛ aɓa ɓaja kusind̤a ɛsanɮɛni sakʰɛ ɔɔɛd̤ɔm nɔmɔwab̤i nɛntlaɬɛla jɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn uja kusɔlula isanɮa sakʰɛ ɛmaz̤wɛni nɛliz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa aliji kusind̤a wɔɓa nɡ̤umpʰatʰi wɔɓutʲɛɓi ɓɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ nɔɓɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɔɓɛz̤intɔ z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ z̤asɛjiputa ɔmland̤ɛla amalib̤i namakuʃi z̤ija kumkʰwaŋ̰ǃ̰isa iind̤aɓa ɛz̤iv̤ɛla ɛmpumalanɡ̤a nasɛntla apʰumɛ ɛnɔɓuʃuʃu ɔɓukʰulu ukuz̤ɛ aɓat͡ʃaɓalalisɛ aɓasinɡ̤ɛlɛ pʰant͡si aɓaninz̤i wɔz̤itwaɓulula iintɛntɛ z̤ɛb̤ɔtwɛ lakʰɛ pʰakatʰi kwɛɛlwanɮɛ nɡ̤asɛntaɓɛni ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɛliɡ̤uɡ̤u afikɛ kɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwakʰɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ umŋǀɛd̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa uja ɛmɛ umikajɛli umtʰɛtʰɛli ɔmkʰulu ɔmɛla ɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu ɓakɔwɛnu kuja kuɓakʰɔ ikǁɛʃa lɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ ɛlinɡ̤az̤anɡ̤a liɓɛkʰɔ ɛlind͡ʒ̤alɔ kususɛla kɔkɔ lwaɓakʰɔjɔ uɬanɡ̤a kud̤ɛ kuɓɛ nanɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa ɓaja kusind̤a aɓantu ɓakɔwɛnu ɓɔnkɛ aɓafuɲɛnwɛ ɓɛb̤aliwɛ ɛŋǀwad̤ini kuja kuv̤uka aɓaninz̤i kwaɓalɛlɛjɔ ɛlutʰulini lɔm̤laɓa aɓa ɓajɛ ɛɓɔmini ɔɓunɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ naɓa ɓajɛ kwiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ nakwiɲumɲɛz̤i ɛnɡ̤unapʰakad̤ɛ aɓɔ kɛ ɓanɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ ɓaja kukʰaz̤imla nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkukʰaz̤imla kwɛsib̤akab̤aka naɓaɓad͡ʒ̤ikɛla aɓaninz̤i ɛɓulunɡ̤isɛni ɓakʰaz̤imlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛnkwɛnkwɛz̤i nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ kanapʰakad̤ɛ wɛna kɛ d̤anijɛli wav̤alɛlɛ amaz̤wi ujitʲwinɛ iŋǀwad̤i kud̤ɛ kuɓɛ likǁɛʃa lɔkupʰɛla ɓaninz̤i aɓaja kujipʰɛnɡ̤ulula kwand̤iswɛ ukwaz̤i mna d̤anijɛli nd̤aɓɔna naɓɔ aɓaɲɛ aɓaɓini ɓɛmi ɔmɲɛ nɡ̤anɛnɔ nɡ̤asɛlud̤inini lɔmlamɓɔ ɔmɲɛ nɡ̤apʰɛʃɛja nɡ̤asɛlud̤inini lɔmlamɓɔ watʰi ɔmɲɛ kwind̤ɔd̤a lɛjɔ jamɓɛtʰɛ ilinɛn ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ ɛɓipʰɛz̤u kwamanz̤i ɔmlamɓɔ kɔd̤a kuɓɛ ukupʰɛla kwɛz̤i z̤intɔ z̤iɓalulɛkilɛjɔ nd̤ɛv̤a ind̤ɔd̤a ɛjamɓɛtʰɛ ilinɛn ɛm̤lɔpʰɛ ɛɓipʰɛz̤u kwamanz̤i ɔmlamɓɔ jasipʰakamisɛla ɛz̤ulwini isanɮa sajɔ sɔkunɛnɛ nɛsɔkʰɔɬɔ sajɔ jafunɡ̤a ɔɬɛli nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ isitʰi kuja ɛkǁɛʃɛni ɛmakǁɛʃɛni amaɓini amisiwɛjɔ nasɛsikǃinɡ̤atʰɛni sɛkǁɛʃa kwakupʰɛliswa ukuɬɛkɛz̤wa kwamanɮa aɓantu aɓaŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤ija kupʰɛliswa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ mna kɛ nd̤ɛv̤a and̤akǃɔnd̤a nd̤atʰi nkɔsi jam jijipʰi ɛjɔkupʰɛla kwɛz̤i z̤intɔ jatʰi hamɓa d̤anijɛli kuɓa amaz̤wi aja kuv̤alɛlwa atʲwinwɛ kud̤ɛ kuɓɛ likǁɛʃa lɔkupʰɛla aɓaninz̤i ɓaja kuz̤ɛnz̤a ɲulu ɓaz̤ɛnz̤ɛ m̤lɔpʰɛ ɓaɲiɓilikiswɛ kɛ aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɓaja kwɛnz̤a ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ aɓanɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓaji kukukǃɔnd̤a ɔkɔ kɔd̤wa aɓanɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ ɓaja kukukǃɔnd̤a kususɛla kwɛlɔ kǁɛʃa kwasuswajɔ inkɔnz̤ɔ jamakǁɛʃa ɔnkɛ ukuz̤ɛ z̤imiswɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inɛz̤ɔtʰɛ ɛz̤ipʰanz̤isajɔ z̤iint͡suku ɛz̤iliwaka ɛlinamakʰulu amaɓini anamaŋǀi asitʰɔɓa unɔjɔlɔ ɔlind̤ɛ kwiint͡suku ɛz̤iliwaka ɛlinamakʰulu amatʰatʰu anamaŋǀi matʰatʰu anɛsiɬanu wɛna kɛ hamɓa ujɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni uja kupʰumla uv̤ukɛ ujɛ ɛkǃaʃiswɛni lakʰɔ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɬa iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɛlafika kuhɔsɛja uɲana kab̤ɛri nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kauz̤ija kajɔtam kaahaz̤i kahɛz̤ɛkija ɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kajarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kajɔwaʃɛ wakwasirajɛli ukukǃala kɔkutʰɛtʰa kukajɛhɔv̤a nɔhɔsɛja watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kuhɔsɛja jija uz̤ɛkɛ umfaz̤i wɔɓuhɛɲu naɓantwana ɓɔɓuhɛɲu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa iliz̤wɛ lihɛɲuz̤ɛ kakʰulu lɛmka kujɛhɔv̤a waja kɛ waz̤ɛka uɡ̤ɔmɛrɛ intɔmɓi kad̤ib̤ɛlajim wakʰawula wamz̤alɛla uɲana ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi kujɛ mtʰijɛ iɡ̤ama lɔkuɓa nɡ̤ujiz̤ɛrɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kusaja kuɓa nɡ̤umz̤uz̤wana nd̤iwav̤ɛlɛlɛ amaɡ̤az̤i akwajiz̤ɛrɛli kwinɮu kajɛhu nd̤iɓupʰɛlisɛ uɓukumkani ɓɛnɮu kasirajɛli kuja kutʰi nɡ̤alɔɔ nd̤isapʰulɛ isapʰɛtʰa sakwasirajɛli ɛntilini jasɛjiz̤ɛrɛli wapʰind̤a wakʰawula waz̤ala intɔmɓi watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a kujɛ jitʰijɛ iɡ̤ama lɔkuɓa nɡ̤uakɛnz̤ɛlwanɡ̤amfɛsanɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa and̤iji kuɓa sapʰind̤a nd̤ijɛnz̤ɛlɛ mfɛsanɛ inɮu kasirajɛli nd̤inɡ̤aɓakǁɔlɛli nɔkuɓakǁɔlɛla nd̤ija kujɛnz̤ɛla imfɛsanɛ kɛ inɮu kajud̤a nd̤iɓasind̤isɛ nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ nd̤inɡ̤aɓasind̤isi nɡ̤asapʰɛtʰa nanɡ̤ak͡xɛlɛ nanɡ̤amfaz̤wɛ nɡ̤amahaʃɛ nanɡ̤aɓamahaʃɛ akumlumla kɛ uakɛnz̤ɛlwanɡ̤amfɛsanɛ wakʰawula waz̤ala uɲana watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a mtʰijɛ iɡ̤ama lɔkuɓa nɡ̤uasiɓantuɓam nɡ̤ɔkuɓa aninɡ̤aɓantu ɓam and̤iji kuɓa nɡ̤ɔwɛnu kɛ lɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli lija kuɓa nɡ̤anɡ̤ɛntlaɓatʰi jasɛlwanɮɛ ɛnɡ̤alinɡ̤aniswajɔ ɛnɡ̤aɓalwajɔ kutʰi ɛnd̤awɛni jɔkuɓa kutʰiwɛ kuɓɔ aninɡ̤aɓantu ɓam kusukɛ kutʰiwɛ kuɓɔ ninɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakatʰikǁɔ ɔpʰililɛjɔ ɓɔɬanɡ̤anisana nd̤awɔɲɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a nɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaz̤imisɛlɛ intlɔkɔ iɓɛ ɲɛ ɓaɲukɛ ɓapʰumɛ kwɛlɔ z̤wɛ kuɓa ija kuɓa jasɛjiz̤ɛrɛli jitʰini kuɓaz̤alwana ɓɛnu wɛnani ɓantu ɓam nitʰi kɔɔd̤ad̤ɛ ɓɛnu wa mɛnz̤ɛlwamfɛsanɛ ɓamɓanani nɔɲɔkɔ ɓamɓanani najɛ kuɓa akamfaz̤i and̤ind̤ɔd̤a jakʰɛ niz̤ɛ nit͡ʃɔ asusɛ uɓuhɛɲu ɓakʰɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ nɔkuk͡xɛkǁɛz̤a kwakʰɛ pʰakatʰi kwamaɓɛlɛ akʰɛ ɬɛz̤ɛ nd̤im̤luɓɛ aɓɛ z̤ɛ nd̤immisɛ ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amini waz̤alwa nd̤imɛnz̤ɛ aɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nd̤immisɛ aɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛliz̤wɛ ɛlinɡ̤umkǃwɛɓɛd̤u nd̤imɓulalɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁanɔ nd̤inɡ̤asikwa mfɛsanɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓantwana ɓakʰɛ kuɓa ɓɛnɡ̤aɓantwana ɓɔɓuhɛɲu ɓɔna kuɓa uhɛɲuz̤ilɛ wɛnz̤ɛ ɔkuz̤iintlɔni umz̤ali waɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa watʰi nd̤ija kuland̤ɛla iz̤itʰand̤anɛ z̤am ɛz̤ind̤inika isɔnka namanz̤i uɓɔja ɓam ɓɛɡ̤uʃa nɛflakisi jam iɔli jam nɛntɔ ɛnd̤ijisɛlajɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jaɓɔna nd̤ija kujiɓijɛla inɮɛla jakʰɔ nɡ̤amɛv̤a nd̤akʰɛ ud̤ɔnɡ̤a anɡ̤awufumani umɛnd̤ɔ wakʰɛ uja kuz̤isukɛla iz̤itʰand̤anɛ z̤akʰɛ anɡ̤afiki kuz̤ɔ az̤ifunɛ anɡ̤az̤ifumani atʰi nd̤ija kuja nd̤iɓujɛlɛ ɛnd̤ɔd̤ɛni jam jɔkukǃala kuɓa ɓɛkulunɡ̤ilɛ ɔkɔ kunanɡ̤ɔku akaz̤i ukuɓa nd̤im ɔwamnikajɔ iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛwajini ɛnt͡ʃa nɛɔli nd̤amand̤isɛla isiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ aɓasuka ɓajɛnz̤ɛla ub̤ahali nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ nd̤ija kuɓuja nd̤ijitʰaɓatʰɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa jam nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lajɔ nɛwajini jam ɛnt͡ʃa nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa lajɔ ɛlimisiwɛjɔ nd̤iɓuɬutʰɛ uɓɔja ɓɛɛɡ̤uʃa nɛflakisi jam jɔkuɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla uɓuz̤ɛ ɓakʰɛ nɡ̤ɔku kɛ nd̤ɔwatʰʲila amaɲɛ akʰɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni ɛz̤itʰand̤anɛ z̤akʰɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ɓani um̤lanɡ̤ulajɔ ɛsanɮɛni nd̤ɔlupʰɛlisa lɔnkɛ uv̤ujɔ lwakʰɛ umtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ wakʰɛ nɔkutʰwasa kwɛɲanɡ̤a kujɛ nɛɛsaɓatʰa z̤akʰɛ namakǁɛʃa akʰɛ ɔnkɛ amisiwɛjɔ nd̤ija kujib̤axisa imid̤ilija jakʰɛ nɛmikʰiwanɛ jakʰɛ aɓɛsitʰi jɛna lut͡ʃɛd̤ɔ ɔlu ɛnd̤alunikwajɔ z̤iz̤itʰand̤anɛ z̤am nd̤ɔjɛnz̤a iɓɛ liɬatʰi iɮiwɛ z̤iiɲamakaz̤i z̤asɛnɮɛ nd̤ɔmv̤ɛlɛla nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛmiɬa jɔɔb̤ahali aɓɛkǃʰumisɛla nɡ̤ajɔ kuɓɔ aɓɛz̤ihɔmɓisa nɡ̤amaɡ̤ab̤a akʰɛ ɛmpumlɔ nɛsamɓalɔ sakʰɛ aɓɛland̤ɛla iz̤itʰand̤anɛ z̤akʰɛ and̤iliɓalɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ jaɓɔna nd̤ija kumxwɛɓɛʃa nd̤imsɛ ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ kakuɬɛ najɛ nd̤ɔmnika iz̤id̤ilija z̤akʰɛ z̤itʰaɓatʰɛlɛ kʰɔna nɛntili jɛakɔrɛ iɓɛ lisanɡ̤ɔ lɛtʰɛmɓa apʰɛnd̤ulɛ kʰɔna nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛmini z̤ɔɓuŋǀinanɛ ɓakʰɛ nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmini jɔkuɲuka kwakʰɛ ɛpʰuma ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa kuja kutʰi nɡ̤alɔɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a und̤iɓiz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkutʰi nd̤ɔd̤a jam unɡ̤aɓi sand̤iɓiz̤a nɡ̤ɔkutʰi b̤ahali nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija amaɡ̤ama ɔɔb̤ahali ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɛ ɓanɡ̤aɓi sakʰund͡ʒ̤ulwa nɡ̤amaɡ̤ama aɓɔ nɡ̤alɔɔ nd̤ɔɓɛnz̤ɛla umŋǃɔpʰisɔ namaxamŋǀwa asɛnɮɛ nɛɛntaka z̤ɛz̤ulu nɛz̤inamɓuz̤anɛ z̤ɔm̤laɓa nd̤apʰulɛ isapʰɛtʰa nɛk͡xɛlɛ nɛmfaz̤wɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ z̤inɡ̤aɓikʰɔ ɛz̤wɛni nd̤iɓaɬalisɛ ɓɛkʰɔlɔsilɛ nd̤ɔkuɡ̤ana uɓɛ nɡ̤ɔwam nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ nd̤ikuɡ̤anɛ uɓɛ nɡ̤ɔwam nɡ̤ɔɓulunɡ̤isa nanɡ̤ɔkusɛsikwɛni nanɡ̤ɛŋǀɛɓa nanɡ̤ɛmfɛsanɛ nd̤ikuɡ̤anɛ uɓɛ nɡ̤ɔwam nɡ̤ɔkutʰɛmɓɛka umaz̤i ujɛhɔv̤a kuja kutʰi nɡ̤alɔɔ nd̤ipʰɛnd̤ulɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kulipʰɛnd̤ula iz̤ulu lɔna lipʰɛnd̤ulɛ iɬaɓatʰi iɬaɓatʰi lipʰɛnd̤ulɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛwajini ɛnt͡ʃa nɛɔli ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ z̤ipʰɛnd̤ulɛ ujiz̤ɛrɛli nd̤ɔz̤iɬwajɛlɛla jɛna ɛliz̤wɛni nd̤imɛnz̤ɛlɛ imfɛsanɛ uakɛnz̤ɛlwanɡ̤amfɛsanɛ nd̤itʰi kuasiɓantuɓam unɡ̤aɓantu ɓam az̤ɛ atʰi unɡ̤utʰikǁɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a pʰind̤a ujɛ utʰand̤ɛ umfaz̤i ɛtʰand̤wa nɡ̤uwaɓɔ ɛk͡xɛkǁɛz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ujɛhɔv̤a aɓatʰand̤ajɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓɛb̤ɛka tʰikǁwɛni ɓamɓi nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɓɛtʰand̤a iz̤ikǀumɓa z̤ɛɛrasintʲisi nd̤amtʰɛnɡ̤a wanɡ̤ɔwam nɡ̤ɛʃumi ɛlinɛsiɬanu lɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ nɛhɔmɛrɛ jɛxasi nɛlɛtɛkɛ jɛxasi nd̤atʰi kujɛ uz̤ɛ uɬalɛlɛ imiɬa ɛmininz̤i unɡ̤ahɛɲuz̤i unɡ̤aɓi wand̤ɔd̤a jimɓi nd̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaja kuɬala imiɬa ɛmininz̤i ɓɛnɡ̤ɛnakumkani ɓɛnɡ̤ɛnamtʰɛtʰɛli ɓɛnɡ̤ɛnamɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɓɛnɡ̤ɛnasimisɔ samatʲɛ ɓɛnɡ̤ɛnaɛfɔd̤i namilɔnd̤ɛkʰaja ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkɔ ɓaja kuɓuja ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓamkǃukǃɛlɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ nɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ waɓɔ ɓajɛ ɓɛnkwantʲa kujɛhɔv̤a nasɛkulunɡ̤ɛni kwakʰɛ ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɬa liv̤ɛni iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uɓamɓɛnɛ naɓɛmi ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ ɲanisɔ kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ ŋǀɛɓa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ kwaz̤i utʰikǁɔ kwɛli liz̤wɛ kukuʃwaɓula nɔkukǁɔka nɔkuŋǀinitʰa nɔkuɓa nɔkuk͡xɛkǁɛz̤a ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤ilɛ iɡ̤az̤i lipʰatʰɛlɛlɛ kwiɡ̤az̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ iliz̤wɛ lɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili z̤itʰɔkɔmɓisilɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤imi kulɔ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ipʰililɛjɔ z̤asɛnɮɛ nɛɛntaka z̤ɛz̤ulu kwanɛɛntlanz̤i z̤ɔlwanɮɛ z̤ijasuswa kɔd̤wa makanɡ̤aɓamɓani ɔmɲɛ nɔmɲɛ ɔmɲɛ makanɡ̤amɔɬwaji ɔmɲɛ aɓantu ɓakɔwɛnu ɓand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɓamɓɛnɛ nɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wɔkʰuɓɛka ɛmini umprɔfɛti ɛnawɛ akʰuɓɛkɛ ɛɓusuku nd̤imt͡ʃaɓalalisɛ uɲɔkɔ ɓajat͡ʃaɓalala aɓantu ɓam kukuswɛla ukwaz̤i kuɓa wɛna ukukǀɛkisilɛ ukwaz̤i nd̤ija kukukǀɛkisa ukuɓa unɡ̤aɓi nɡ̤umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wawuliɓala umjalɛlɔ katʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ nd̤ɔɓaliɓala aɓantwana ɓakʰɔ ɔkukʰɔna ɓand̤ilɛjɔ kɔkukʰɔna ɓɔnilɛjɔ uz̤ukɔ lwaɓɔ nd̤ija nɡ̤ɔkǀukukǀɛz̤ɔ ɓaɮa id̤ini lɛsɔnɔ laɓantu ɓam umpʰɛfumlɔ waɓɔ ɓawupʰakamisɛla ɛɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁɛni ɓaɓɔ kuja kutʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓand͡ʒ̤alɔ aɓantu aɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤alɔ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli nd̤iz̤iv̤ɛlɛlɛ iinɮɛla z̤akʰɛ kujɛ nd̤iz̤iɓujisɛlɛ kujɛ iintlɔnd̤i z̤akʰɛ ɓɔɮa ɓanɡ̤aɬutʰi ɓahɛɲuz̤ɛ ɓanɡ̤and̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛkujɛkilɛ ukumpʰulapʰula ujɛhɔv̤a uhɛɲuz̤ɔ nɛwajini nɛwajini ɛnt͡ʃa z̤iwɛkǁula intliz̤ijɔ aɓantu ɓam ɓaɓuz̤isa kumtʰi waɓɔ nɛntɔnɡ̤a jaɓɔ ijaɓakǁɛlɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umɔja wɔɓuhɛɲu uɓalaɬɛkisilɛ ɓahɛɲuz̤ɛ ɓɛmka pʰant͡si kɔtʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla ɛz̤iŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni z̤ɛɛntaɓa ɓakǃʰumisɛlɛ ɛz̤ind̤ulini pʰant͡si kwɛmiɔki nɛmipɔpulari nɛmitɛrɛb̤inti kuɓa ulunɡ̤ilɛ umtʰunz̤i wajɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ z̤ijahɛɲuz̤a iintɔmɓi z̤ɛnu ɓajak͡xɛkǁɛz̤a ɔɔmɔlɔkaz̤ana ɓɛnu and̤iji kuz̤iv̤ɛlɛla iintɔmɓi z̤ɛnu nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa z̤ihɛɲuz̤a nɔɔmɔlɔkaz̤ana ɓɛnu nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa ɓɛk͡xɛkǁɛz̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔkwɛnu nitʰi ɡ̤u ɓukǀala namahɛɲukaz̤i niɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla namanɡ̤awukaz̤i nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ aɓantu aɓanɡ̤akǃɔnd̤ijɔ ɓaja kukʰaɬɛlɛka pʰant͡si ukuɓa ujahɛɲuz̤a sirajɛli makanɡ̤az̤ɛki itʲala ujud̤a ukuja ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali ninɡ̤ɛɲuki nijɛ ɛb̤ɛtav̤ɛn ninɡ̤afunɡ̤i nitʰi ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a kuɓa usirajɛli ujind͡ʒ̤uɓakǃa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛtʰɔkaz̤i ɛlijind͡ʒ̤uɓakǃa nɡ̤ɔku ujɛhɔv̤a uja kuɓalusɛla ɛmpʰanɡ̤alalɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amatakanɛ uɛfrajim uɓɔpʰɛnɛ nɛz̤itʰikǁɔ mjɛkɛni iɡ̤aɓad̤ɛlɛ imitʰaji jaɓɔ ɓahɛɲuz̤a ɓɛhɛɲuz̤ilɛ z̤ilutʰand̤ɛ nz̤ulu ukǀukukǀɛz̤ɔ iinɡ̤wɛlɛt͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ z̤aɓɔ umɔja umɓamɓilɛ nɡ̤amapʰikɔ awɔ ɓaja kud̤ana jimiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jaɓɔ kuv̤ɛni ɔku ɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli niɓaz̤ɛ iinɮɛɓɛ nɮu kasirajɛli nɮu jɔkumkani ɓɛkani iinɮɛɓɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uz̤ɛ umɡ̤wɛɓɔ lɔ kuɓa nisukɛ naɓa nɡ̤umɡ̤iɓɛ ɛmiz̤pa naɓa nɡ̤umnatʰa ɔtwatʲululwɛjɔ pʰɛz̤u kwɛtab̤ɔrɛ ɓaŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkilɛ ukɔnakalisa ɛkuŋǁakǁʰɛni kwaɓɔ kɛ nd̤ijintɛtʰisɔ kuɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla mna nd̤ijamaz̤i uɛfrajim nɔsirajɛli akaɡ̤uʃiwɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uhɛɲuz̤ilɛ nɡ̤ɔku wɛna ɛfrajim usirajɛli uz̤ɛnz̤ɛ iŋǃamɓi iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ az̤iv̤umi ukuɓa ɓaɓujɛlɛ kutʰikǁɔ waɓɔ kuɓa umɔja wɔɓuhɛɲu ukuɓɔ aɓamaz̤i ujɛhɔv̤a ikǃʰajija likasirajɛli lijaŋ̤ǃ̤ina ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ ɓɔkʰuɓɛka ɔɔsirajɛli nɔɛfrajim nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ wɔkʰuɓɛka naɓɔ kwanɔjud̤a ɓaja kuja ujɛhɔv̤a ɓɛnɛmpaɬa jaɓɔ ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ nɛɛnkɔmɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓanɡ̤amfumani uxɔkǁilɛ kuɓɔ ɓanɡ̤iniz̤a kujɛhɔv̤a kuɓa ɓɛz̤ɛlɛ ɔɔɲana aɓanɡ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɔku kɛ ukutʰwasa kwɛɲanɡ̤a kujaɓaɮa kuɲɛ nɛz̤aɬulɔ z̤aɓɔ z̤ɔm̤laɓa v̤utʰɛlani iz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha nɛkǁilɔnɡ̤ɔ ɛrama wuɬaɓɛni ɛb̤ɛtav̤ɛn nitʰi
