ɛmv̤a kwakʰɔ b̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin kuja kuɓa sɛnkanɡ̤ala kwɛlakwaɛfrajim nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkɔɬwaja ɛz̤iz̤wɛni z̤akwasirajɛli nd̤isaz̤isilɛ isimakad̤ɛ sɛsiɓɛtʰɔ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakwajud̤a ɓasuka ɓaɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓaʃɛŋǁisi ɓɔmd̤a nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ nd̤ɔpʰalaz̤a pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ uɓuʃuʃu ɓam nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amanz̤i uɛfrajim ujakǀud̤iswa ujav̤ikiv̤ɛka nɡ̤umɡ̤wɛɓɔ kuɓa usukɛ wav̤uma ukuland̤ɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ waɓɔ mna nd̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnund̤u kwaɛfrajim nd̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɓunɡ̤u kwinɮu kajud̤a kǁa wasiɓɔnajɔ uɛfrajim isifɔ sakʰɛ ujud̤a waliɓɔna iŋǁɛɓa lakʰɛ uɛfrajim wɛsuka waja ɛasirija watʰumɛla ujarɛb̤i akaɓa nakɔ ukunipʰilisa akaɓa nakɔ ukuniŋǀɛd̤a kwiŋǁɛɓa lɛnu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲama kwaɛfrajim nd̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ɛnt͡ʃa kwinɮu kajud̤a nd̤ijakǃwɛnɡ̤a nd̤imkɛ nd̤itʰimɓɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ m̤lanɡ̤uli nd̤ija kuhamɓa nd̤iɓujɛlɛ ɛnd̤awɛni jam ɓad̤ɛ ɓɛv̤ɛ ɓɛnɛtʲala ɓaɓufunɛ uɓusɔ ɓam ɛkuɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛkɛni kwaɓɔ ɓaja kund̤ifuna ɓɛɲamɛkilɛ ɓatʰi jiz̤ani siɓujɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a kuɓa ɛkǃwɛnɡ̤ilɛ wɔsipʰilisa ukǁaɓɛlɛ wɔsiɓɔpʰa wɔsiɮisa uɓɔmi kwakuɓa nt͡suku mɓini wɔsipʰakamisa nɡ̤ɔlwɛsitʰatʰu siɮɛ uɓɔmi pʰamɓi kwakʰɛ masikwaz̤i kɛ masikusukɛlɛ ukumaz̤i ujɛhɔv̤a ukupʰuma kwakʰɛ kukǃinisɛkilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkupʰuma kwɛsifinɡ̤ɔ ukuɓa ɛz̤ɛ kutʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmv̤ula nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmv̤ula ɛv̤utʰisajɔ ɛliɲakamisajɔ iliz̤wɛ mand̤ikutʰini ɛfrajim mand̤ikutʰini jud̤a utʰand̤ɔ lwɛnu lund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlifu lɔmsɔ lund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɓɛtʰɛ ɔpʰɛla nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nd̤iɓakǁɔz̤ilɛ nɡ̤aɓaprɔfɛti nd̤aɓaɓulala nɡ̤amaz̤wi ɔmlɔmɔ ukuz̤ɛ umɡ̤wɛɓɔ upʰumɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkukʰaɲa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inɔnɛlɛlɛ utʰand̤ɔ and̤inɔnɛlɛlɛ mɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nd̤inɔnɛlɛlɛ ukwaz̤i utʰikǁɔ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwamad̤ini aɲukajɔ kɛ ɓɔna ɓawuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰilɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔad̤am ɓanɡ̤iniz̤a apʰɔ iɡ̤ilijad̤i nɡ̤umz̤i waɓasɛɓɛnz̤i ɓɔɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a uz̤ɛlɛ jimikʰɔnd̤ɔ jɛɡ̤az̤i ɓund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkulalɛlwa kwɛnd̤ɔd̤a nɡ̤amatutu uɓuɮɛlanɛ ɓaɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓajaŋǀinitʰa ɛnɮɛlɛni ɛja kwaʃɛkɛm ɛwɛ ɓɛnz̤ɛ amaɲala ɛnɮwini kasirajɛli nd̤iɓɔnɛ intɔ ɛɓanɡ̤a amanwɛlɛ apʰɔ uɛfrajim ujahɛɲuz̤a usirajɛli uz̤ɛnz̤a iŋǃamɓi kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ wɛna jud̤a umisɛlwɛ uv̤unɔ ɛkukuɓujisɛni ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kwaɓantu ɓam ɛkumpʰilisɛni usirajɛli kusukɛ kutʰʲilɛkɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓukaɛfrajim nɔɓuɓi ɓakwasamari kuɓa ɓɛsɛɓɛnz̤a uɓukǁɔki isɛla linɡ̤ɛnɛ ab̤uɲulɛ nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ aɓat͡ʃɔ ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jaɓɔ ukutʰi nd̤ɔɓukʰumɓula ɓɔnkɛ uɓuɓi ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔku z̤iɓaŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnɡ̤ilɛ iintlɔnd̤i z̤aɓɔ z̤aɓakʰɔ pʰamɓi kɔɓusɔ ɓam ɓamv̤ujisilɛ nɡ̤ɛɛntɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤imɓi naɓatʰɛtʰɛli nɡ̤ɔkukǁɔka kwaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓanɡ̤aɓak͡xɛkǁɛz̤i ɓand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ikɔ lɛz̤ɔnka ɛliɓasɛlwɛ nɡ̤umɔd͡ʒ̤iz̤ɔnka ɔkʰa ajɛkɛ ukukʰwɛz̤ɛla lɔ ɡ̤ama akǁɔv̤ula id̤ɛ ifukukɛ nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkumkani wɛtʰu aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaz̤ikǁʰajɛlɛ isifɔ nɡ̤ɔɓuʃuʃu ɓɛwajini utʰaɓatʰɛnɛ naɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɛki nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓajisɔnd̤ɛz̤ɛ intliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ ɛmlalɛni waɓɔ nɡ̤atʰi kusɛz̤ikwɛni lɛz̤ɔnka ɓɔnkɛ uɓusuku ulɛlɛ umɔd͡ʒ̤iz̤ɔnka waɓɔ lɔna liv̤utʰa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmlilɔ ɔlɛɲajɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla ɓaʃuʃu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤ikɔ lɛz̤ɔnka ɓajaɓaɮa aɓaɡ̤wɛɓi ɓaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɔɔkumkani ɓaɓɔ ɓawilɛ akukʰɔ namɲɛ kuɓɔ und̤iŋǃulajɔ uɛfrajim jɛna uz̤ɛkaz̤ɛkana nɛz̤iz̤wɛ uɛfrajim ulikǃɛɓɛnɡ̤wana lɛsɔnka ɛlinɡ̤aɡ̤ukǃulwanɡ̤a aɓasɛmz̤ini ɓawaɮilɛ amanɮa akʰɛ jɛna akaz̤i nɛz̤imv̤i z̤itʰɛ kujɛ nɔkɔ akaz̤i jɛna ikǃʰajija likasirajɛli lijaŋ̤ǃ̤ina ɛɓuswɛni ɓakʰɛ nɔkɔ aɓaɓujɛli kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ aɓamfuni kukɔ kɔnkɛ ɔku uɛfrajim und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛv̤ukutʰu ɛlimatʰilɛjɔ ɛlinɡ̤ɛnantliz̤ijɔ ɓaɓiz̤a ijiputa ɓaja ɛasirija nd̤ɔtʰi ɓakuɓɔn ukuɓa ɓajaja nd̤iwutwaɓululɛ pʰɛz̤u kwaɓɔ umnatʰa nd̤iɓatʰɔɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛntaka z̤ɛz̤ulu nd̤ija kuɓatʰɛtʰisa nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛnd̤aɓa ɛnd̤az̤iv̤akalisajɔ ɛɓanɮɛni laɓɔ jɛha kɛ ɓɔna kuɓa ɓaɓalɛkilɛ jimɓub̤ɔ kuɓɔ kuɓa ɓak͡xɛkǃilɛ mna nɡ̤ɛnd̤iɓakʰululɛ ɓasuka ɓɔna ɓatʰɛtʰa amanɡ̤a nɡ̤am aɓakʰalanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛɛntliz̤ijɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓasuka ɓamana ɓɛb̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤a ɛz̤ililini z̤aɓɔ ɓakǃukana nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛwajini ɛnt͡ʃa ɓapʰamɓuka ɓand̤ikǀʰasa mna nd̤iz̤ikǃɛkǃɛʃilɛ nd̤az̤ɔmɛlɛz̤a iinɡ̤alɔ z̤aɓɔ kɛ ɓɔna ɓakǀinɡ̤a uɓuɓi nɡ̤am ɓajaɓuja kɔd̤wa aɓaɓujɛli pʰɛz̤ulu ɓand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsapʰɛtʰa ɛsitʲɛkɛtʲɛkɛ ɓaja lik͡xɛlɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔb̤av̤umɔ lɔlwimi lwaɓɔ ɔkɔ kukuɡ̤ǀ̤ulɛlwa kwaɓɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa ɓɛka isiɡ̤ɔɮɛ ɛmlɔɲɛni wakʰɔ ut͡ʃaɓa lujixiwula inɮu kajɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkǁʰalanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa ɓɛwuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰilɛ umŋǃɔpʰisɔ ɓak͡xɛkǃa kumjalɛlɔ ɓaja kukʰala ɓatʰi tʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu sijakwaz̤i tʰina sirajɛli ijanuka kusirajɛli intɔ ɛlunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ut͡ʃaɓa malumsukɛlɛ ɓamisɛ ɔɔkumkani ɓɛnɡ̤av̤ɛli ɓɛnz̤ɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli nd̤inɡ̤az̤i isiliv̤ɛrɛ jaɓɔ nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ jaɓɔ ɓajɛnz̤ɛ iz̤itʰikǁɔ ukuz̤ɛ iŋǃaɲulwɛ itʰɔlɛ lakʰɔ lijanuka samari umsind̤ɔ ujav̤utʰa kuɓɔ ɓɛnɡ̤akwaz̤i ukuz̤ipʰatʰa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nalɔ ɛlɔ lipʰuma kwasirajɛli lɛnz̤iwɛ jiŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi alitʰikǁɔ lɔna kɛ lija kukǀɔlɛka itʰɔlɛ lakwasamari nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓɛɬwajɛlɛ umɔja ɓaja kuv̤una isakǃʰwitʰi akukʰɔ z̤imɓa kuwɔ isitʰɔmɓɔ asɛnz̤i sikʰwɛɓu nɔkuɓa ɓɛsitʰɛ saɓa nasɔ ɓɛsija kuɮiwa nɡ̤aɓasɛmz̤ini uɡ̤iɲiwɛ usirajɛli nɡ̤ɔku ɓasɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmpaɬa ɛnɡ̤ananz̤iwɛjɔ kuɓa ɓɔna ɓaɲukɛ ɓaja ɛasirija nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛsilɛ lasɛnɮɛ lihamɓa lilɔd̤wa laɬukilɛ kɛ jɛna uɛfrajim uz̤ikǃɛʃilɛ iz̤itʰarud̤anɛ nakuɓa ɓɛkǃɛʃa nɔkukǃɛʃa ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni nd̤ija kuɓaɓutʰa nɡ̤ɔku ɓakǃalɛ ɓaŋǀipʰɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmtʰwalɔ wɔkumkani waɓatʰɛtʰɛli kuɓa uɛfrajim uz̤and̤isilɛ iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤ɔkɔna kujɛ iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤aɓa z̤ɛz̤ɔkɔna nd̤imb̤alɛla intɔ ɛninz̤i jɛmijalɛlɔ jam ɓajikǀinɡ̤ɛla intɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔ imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɛz̤ipʰɔ z̤am ɓajajiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla ɓajiɮa nɡ̤ɔkwɛɲama kɛ ajakʰɔlɛka kujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ uja kuɓukʰumɓula uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ az̤iv̤ɛlɛlɛ iz̤ɔnɔ z̤aɓɔ ɓaja kuɓujɛla ɓɔna ɛjiputa kuɓa usirajɛli wamliɓala umɛnz̤i wakʰɛ wakʰa amab̤ɔtwɛ ujud̤a wajand̤isa imiz̤i ɛŋǃatʲisiwɛjɔ kɛ nd̤ija kutʰumɛla umlilɔ ɛmiz̤ini jakʰɛ uz̤iɮɛ iiŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛ z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ musa ukuv̤uja sirajɛli ud̤ɛ uɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uhɛɲuz̤ilɛ wɛmka kutʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ utʰand̤ɛ ut͡ʃɛkǃu ɛz̤and̤ɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa isand̤a nɛsikǁɔv̤ulɛlɔ sɛɔli asiji kuɓɔnɮa nɛwajini ɛnt͡ʃa ija kunid̤anisa aɓaji kuɬala ɛz̤wɛni likajɛhɔv̤a uɛfrajim uja kuɓujɛla ɛjiputa ɓaɮɛ iz̤intɔ ɛz̤ijiŋǃamɓi ɛasirija aɓaji kumtʰululɛla ujɛhɔv̤a iwajini ajiji kuɓa mnand̤i kujɛ nɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jaɓɔ ukuɮa kwaɓɔ kuɓɔ kuja kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsɔnka saɓalilajɔ ɓɔnkɛ aɓakuɮajɔ ɓaja kuɓa z̤iiŋǃamɓi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukuɮa kwaɓɔ kuja kuɓa kɔkwaɓɔ akuji kunɡ̤ɛna ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a nɔtʰini nɡ̤ɛmini jɛkǁɛʃa ɛlimisiwɛjɔ nanɡ̤ɛmini jɔmtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ kajɛhɔv̤a kuɓa jaɓɔnani ɓɛmkilɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛmɓukǃɔ ijiputa ija kuɓaɓutʰa imɔfi ija kuɓaŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa iz̤intɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ z̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ z̤ija kuɬutʰwa nɡ̤amaxawu jimitʰi ɛnamɛv̤a ɛz̤intɛntɛni z̤aɓɔ kufikɛ z̤ɔkuv̤ɛlɛla kufikɛ z̤ɛmpind̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ uja kwaz̤i usirajɛli umprɔfɛti sisimatʰanɛ nɡ̤umb̤ud̤i ind̤ɔd̤a ɛnɔmɔja nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓukʰulu ɓɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɔ nɔkut͡ʃut͡ʃisa ɔkuninz̤i nɡ̤umɓɔnisɛli uɛfrajim nɡ̤akutʰikǁɔ umprɔfɛti nɡ̤umɡ̤iɓɛ wɔmtʰijɛli ɛz̤inɮɛlɛni z̤akʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ ujint͡ʃut͡ʃisɔ ɛnɮwini jɔtʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ ɓat͡ʃɔnisilɛ ukɔnakalisa kwaɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwɛmiɬa jasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha uja kuɓukʰumɓula uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓaɓɔ uja kuz̤iv̤ɛlɛla iz̤ɔnɔ z̤aɓɔ nd̤amfumana usirajɛli ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛd̤ilija ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nd̤aɓaɓɔna ɔɔjiɬɔ ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amakʰiwanɛ akǃalɛlajɔ ɛmkʰiwanɛni ɛkukǃalɛni kwawɔ ɓasuka ɓɔna ɓaja kub̤ahalipɛhɔrɛ ɓaz̤aɬulɛla ɛntwɛni ɛz̤iintlɔni ɓaɓa jintɔ ɛnɛz̤ɔtʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsitʰand̤anɛ saɓɔ uɛfrajim uz̤ukɔ lwakʰɛ luja kuɓalɛka lumkɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntaka kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ kuz̤ala nakumitʰa nakukʰawula ɛwɛ nɔkuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓakʰulisa ɔɔɲana nd̤ɔɓaɬutʰa aɓantwana kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ jɛha kɛ ɓɔna ɛkusukɛni kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤az̤iɓɔnɛla uɛfrajim ukuɓa aɓɛ jitirɛ ɛtʲɛlwɛ ɛk͡xiwɛni kɔd̤wa uɛfrajim uja kuɓakʰupʰɛla kumɓulali ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɛ ɓanikɛ jɛhɔv̤a wɔɓanika ntɔni ɓanikɛ ɛsipʰumajɔ namaɓɛlɛ awɔmilɛjɔ ɓɔnkɛ uɓuɓi ɓaɓɔ ɓusɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali kuɓa nd̤akǃala ukuɓatʰija kʰɔna nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi ɓɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤aɓɔ nd̤ija kuɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa ɛnɮwini jam and̤iji kupʰind̤a nd̤iɓatʰand̤ɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓaɓɔ ɓaz̤iind͡ʒ̤uɓakǃa uɓɛtʰiwɛ uɛfrajim iŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu jaɓɔ jɔmilɛ aɓaji kukǁakatʰa sikǃʰamɔ nɔkuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓaz̤ala nd̤ɔz̤iɓulala iz̤intɔ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ z̤ɛsisu saɓɔ utʰikǁɔ uja kuɓakǀɛkisa kuɓa ɓɛnɡ̤ampʰulapʰulanɡ̤a ɓaja kupʰalapʰala ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni usirajɛli nɡ̤umd̤ilija ɔnaɓilɛjɔ waz̤ikǁakatʰɛla iz̤ikǃʰamɔ ɔkukʰɔna waɓa nɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ kɔkukʰɔna wand̤isa iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɔkukʰɔna lalunɡ̤ajɔ iliz̤wɛ lakʰɛ kɔkukʰɔna walunɡ̤isa iz̤imisɔ z̤amatʲɛ jaɓa ɓutʰɛlɛz̤i intliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɔku ɓaja kuv̤a ɓɛnɛtʲala uja kuz̤ikǃʰɛkɛz̤a iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤aɓɔ az̤ib̤ukǃɛ iz̤imisɔ z̤aɓɔ z̤amatʲɛ ɛwɛ nɡ̤ɔku ɓaja kutʰi asinakumkani kuɓa asimɔjikanɡ̤a ujɛhɔv̤a nɔkumkani lɔwa uja kusɛnz̤ɛla ntɔni ɓatʰɛtʰa amaz̤wi nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɓaʃwaɓula nɡ̤ɛnkɔɬakalɔ ɓɛnz̤a imiŋǃɔpʰisɔ kwaɬuma ɔkusɛsikwɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɓuɬunɡ̤u ɛmikǃɛlɛni jɛsisimi aɓɛmi ɓakwasamari ɓaŋǁunɡ̤upʰɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔmfanɛkisɔ wɛtʰɔlɛ lasɛb̤ɛtav̤ɛn ɛwɛ ɓɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili nɡ̤alɔ aɓantu ɓalɔ ɓatʰutʰumɛlɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓalɔ aɓanɡ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jalɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔz̤ukɔ lwalɔ kuɓa lufud̤ukilɛ kulɔ lija ɛasirija nalɔ liɓɛ nɡ̤umnikɛlɔ ujarɛb̤i uɛfrajim uja kuɓand͡ʒ̤wa kukud̤ana ad̤anɛ usirajɛli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛkǀɛɓɔ lakʰɛ kɛ ɛlakwasamari walɔ ud̤akilɛ und͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkǀɛɓa pʰɛz̤u kwamanz̤i iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a z̤asɛav̤ɛn isɔnɔ sikasirajɛli z̤ɔt͡ʃaɓalala kuja kuɬuma imitʰana ɛnamɛv̤a nɛɛnkunz̤ana ɛz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni z̤aɓɔ ɓaja kutʰi kwiintaɓa sisɛlɛlɛni nakwiind̤uli siwɛlɛni kususɛla kwimiɬa jasɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha sirajɛli wɔna ɓaɬala kʰɔna akuɓafikɛlanɡ̤a ɛɡ̤ib̤ɛha nɔɔɲana ɓɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa nd̤ija kuɓatʰɛtʰisa kɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔmŋǃwɛnɔ z̤iɓaɬanɡ̤aɲɛlɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ ɛkuɓɔt͡ʃɛlɛlwɛni kwaɓɔ ɛɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁɛni ɓaɓɔ ɓɔɓuɓini uɛfrajim litʰɔkaz̤i ɛlikǃɛkǃɛʃiwɛjɔ ɛlitʰand̤a ukub̤ula kɛ nd̤iɓɛkɛ idʲɔkʰwɛ ɛntaɲɛni jalɔ ɛntlɛ nd̤ijamt͡salisa uɛfrajim ujud̤a uja ujakɔɓi uja kuz̤ikǃwakanisɛla z̤iɬwajɛlɛlɛni ukuɓa kuv̤ɛlɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa v̤unani nɡ̤ɔkwɛŋǀɛɓa z̤ikʰuɓɛlɛlɛni umkʰuɓɛlɔ ɛkuɓɛni ilikǁɛʃa lɔkumkǃukǃɛla ujɛhɔv̤a ad̤ɛ afikɛ aninisɛlɛ uɓulunɡ̤isa nalima ɔkunɡ̤ɛnd̤awɔ nav̤una uɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa naɮa iz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ɔɓukǁɔki kuɓa wakʰɔlɔsa nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔɓuninz̤i ɓamaɡ̤ɔxa akʰɔ kuja kuv̤uka iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔlɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ z̤akɔwɛnu z̤ib̤ukǃwɛ nɛɛŋǃaɓa z̤akʰɔ z̤ɔnkɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ uʃalɛman wajib̤ukǃajɔ ib̤ɛtɛarb̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛmini jɛmfaz̤wɛ kwakǀuɲuz̤wa ɔɔnina kuɲɛ nɔɔɲana ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ib̤ɛtɛli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi ɓɛz̤intɔ z̤ɛnu ɛz̤imɓi kwanɡ̤ɛsifinɡ̤ɔ uja kusinɡ̤ɛlwa pʰant͡si apʰɛlɛ wakwasirajɛli ɔkɔ usirajɛli ɛɓɛmŋǀinanɛ nd̤amtʰand̤a nd̤amɓiz̤a uɲana ukuɓa apʰumɛ ɛjiputa ɓaɓaɓiz̤a kwaɓa kukʰɔna ɓɛmkajɔ ɛɓuswɛni ɓaɓɔ ɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla kɔɔb̤ahali ɓakǃʰumisɛla kwimifanɛkisɔ ɛkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ mna kɛ nd̤amfund̤isa uɛfrajim ukuhamɓa nd̤iɓapʰatʰa nɡ̤ɛɛnɡ̤alɔ z̤am aɓaz̤anɡ̤a nɔkɔ ukuɓa nd̤aɓapʰilisa nd̤aɓat͡sala nɡ̤ɛz̤intʲa z̤ɔmntu nɡ̤ɛɛnt͡sɔntɛlɔ z̤ɔtʰand̤ɔ kuɓɔ nd̤aɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɲiɲisi wɛdʲɔkʰwɛ ɛmiɬatʰini jaɓɔ nd̤atʰantamisa ukuɮa akaji kuɓujɛla ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nɡ̤uasirija wakʰɛ kuɓa aɓav̤umanɡ̤a ukuɓuja ik͡xɛlɛ lija kujid͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a imiz̤i jakʰɛ lijiɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛ imiv̤alɔ jakʰɛ lijiɮɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jamakǀɛɓɔ aɓɔ aɓantu ɓam ɓapʰikɛlɛ ukuɓuja umv̤a nakuɓa ɓɛɓiz̤ɛlwa pʰɛz̤ulu aɓaz̤ipʰakamisi mpɛla nd̤inɡ̤atʰini ukukulaɬa ɛfrajim nd̤ikuŋǀamɛ sirajɛli nd̤inɡ̤atʰini ukukulaɬa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛad̤ama nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ uɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛt͡sɛb̤ɔjim intliz̤ijɔ jam ipʰɛtʰukilɛ pʰakatʰi uɓuɓɛlɛ ɓam ɓuv̤utʰilɛ kuɲɛ and̤iji kukwɛnz̤a ukuv̤utʰa kɔmsind̤ɔ and̤iji kuɓuja nd̤imɔnakalisɛ uɛfrajim nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ and̤imntu nd̤inɡ̤ɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ pʰakatʰi kwakʰɔ and̤iz̤i nd̤iʃuʃu nɡ̤amsind̤ɔ ɓaja kumland̤ɛla ujɛhɔv̤a uja kub̤axula nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲama kuɓa jɛna uja kub̤axula ɓav̤ɛlɛ ɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a ɔɔɲana ɓɛɡ̤ub̤a ɓaja kuv̤ɛla ɛjiputa ɓɛɡ̤ub̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛntaka ɓav̤ɛlɛ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛasirija nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amav̤ukutʰu nd̤iɓaɓɛkɛ ɛz̤inɮwini z̤aɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a uɛfrajim und̤ixawulɛ nɡ̤ɔɓukǁɔki inɮu kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛnkɔɬisɔ nɔjud̤a usɛnɡ̤umkǃʰatʰu kutʰikǁɔ kɔjiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɔɲanisilɛjɔ uɛfrajim wasukɛlana nɔmɔja usukɛla ulɔpʰu lwasɛmpumalanɡ̤a imini jɔnkɛ wand̤isa amanɡ̤a nɛmɓukǃɔ ɓaŋǃɔpʰisana nɛasirija iɔli ɛjiputa ujɛhɔv̤a uɓamɓɛnɛ nɔjud̤a umv̤ɛlɛla ujakɔɓi nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛnɮɛla z̤akʰɛ uja kumɓujisɛla nɡ̤ɔkwɛɛntlɔnd̤i z̤akʰɛ ɛsiz̤alwɛni wamɓamɓa umkʰuluwa wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛsitʰɛnd̤ɛ ɛkukǃinɛni kwakʰɛ waz̤amana nɔtʰikǁɔ waz̤amana nasɔ isitʰuɲwa wafɛz̤a wataxuz̤isa kusɔ ɛb̤ɛtɛli apʰɔ kɛ sasitʰɛtʰa natʰi ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a sisikʰumɓuz̤ɔ sakʰɛ wɛna kɛ ɓujɛla kutʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ ɡ̤ǀ̤ina iŋǀɛɓa nɔkusɛsikwɛni uɬalɛ utʰɛmɓɛlɛ kutʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ unɡ̤umxwɛɓi ɔpʰɛtʰɛ sɛnkɔɬisɔ utʰand̤a ukukǀud̤isa watʰi uɛfrajim nɔkɔ nd̤isisitʲɛɓi nd̤iz̤ifumanɛlɛ uɓutʲɛɓi jɔnkɛ imiɡ̤uʃaŋǁa jam ajind̤iz̤uz̤isanɡ̤a ɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓusisɔnɔ kanti nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ kwasɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nd̤isaja kukuɓɛka ɛz̤intɛntɛni nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwɛmiɬa jɔmtʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ nd̤itʰɛtʰɛ kuɓaprɔfɛti nd̤and̤isa imiɓɔnɔ nd̤ɛnz̤a imiz̤ɛkɛlisɔ nɡ̤ɛz̤anɮa z̤aɓaprɔfɛti ukuɓa iɡ̤ilijad̤i iliʃinit͡ʃini jɔɓa jintɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔ kupʰɛla ɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla iinkɔmɔ ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali iz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤aɓɔ naz̤ɔ z̤ɔɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɛmfumɓa z̤amatʲɛ ɛmikǃɛlɛni jɛsisimi ujakɔɓi waɓalɛkɛla ɛz̤wɛni lakwaaram usirajɛli wakʰɔnz̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmfaz̤i waɡ̤ǀ̤ina imiɬamɓi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmfaz̤i ujɛhɔv̤a wamɲusa usirajɛli ɛjiputa nɡ̤ɔmprɔfɛti kɛ waɡ̤ǀ̤inwa nɡ̤ɔmprɔfɛti kɛ uɛfrajim ukǃumɓisɛ kak͡xak͡xa inkɔsi jakʰɛ ija kuwapʰɔsa amaɡ̤az̤i akʰɛ pʰɛz̤u kwakʰɛ isiɓujisɛlɛ kujɛ isiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ sakʰɛ watʰi akutʰɛtʰa uɛfrajim kwaɓakʰɔ ukɔtʰuka wapʰakama jɛna kwasirajɛli wɛsuka waz̤ɛka itʲala nɡ̤ɔb̤ahali nɡ̤ɔku ɓɔnɡ̤ɛz̤a ukɔna ɓaz̤ɛnz̤ɛla imifanɛkisɔ ɛtʰʲid̤iwɛjɔ nɡ̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ jaɓɔ ɓaz̤ɛnz̤ɛla iz̤itʰikǁɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkukǃɔnd̤a kwaɓɔ inɡ̤umsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤iɓi wɔnkɛ upʰɛla aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlajɔ ɓasɛluntwini ɓatʰi nɡ̤ajɔ ɓawanɡ̤a amatʰɔlɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ɓaja kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlifu lɔmsɔ nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɓɛtʰɛ ɔpʰɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmkǃukǃu ɔpʰɛt͡ʃɛtʰwa sisakǃʰwitʰi ɛsand̤ɛni nand͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsi ɔpʰuma nɡ̤ɛk͡xɔɓa kanti nd̤inɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ kwasɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa akuji kwaz̤i tʰikǁɔ unɡ̤ɛnd̤im akukʰɔ namɲɛ umsind̤isi nɡ̤apʰanɮɛ mna nd̤akwaz̤i ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛkuɓalɛlɛni ɓatʰi ɓakuɮiswa ɓaɬutʰa ɓakuɬutʰa japʰakama intliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ɓand̤iliɓɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔ nd̤aɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲama kuɓɔ nd̤aɓalalɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤wɛ ɛnɮɛlɛni nd̤ɔtʰi ɡ̤aɡ̤a kuɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛb̤ɛrɛ ɛɬutʰwɛ amatʰɔlɛ ajɔ nd̤iwuk͡xaz̤ulɛ um̤lɛɬɔ wɛntliz̤ijɔ jaɓɔ nd̤iɓaɮɛ kʰɔna nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲamakaz̤i amaxamŋǀwa asɛnɮɛ aja kuɓaɮav̤ula uz̤ɔnakalisilɛ sirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkund̤ikǀʰasa kwakʰɔ luŋǀɛd̤ɔ lwakʰɔ upʰi nɡ̤ɔku wakʰɔ ukuɓa anɡ̤akusind̤isi ɛmiz̤ini jakʰɔ jɔnkɛ ɓapʰi nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ aɓaɡ̤wɛɓi ɓakʰɔ aɓɔ watʰi nd̤inikɛ naɓatʰɛtʰɛli nd̤ikunika ɔɔkumkani nd̤inɔmsind̤ɔ nd̤iɓatʰaɓatʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkupʰupʰuma kwawɔ ɓuɓɔt͡ʃiwɛ nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔwa uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓukaɛfrajim siɓɛkiwɛ isɔnɔ sakʰɛ inimɓa jɔz̤alajɔ ijamz̤ɛla unɡ̤uɲana ɔnɡ̤ɛnaɓulumkɔ kuɓa ɛnɡ̤av̤ɛli nɡ̤ɛkǁɛʃa ɛlililɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛsiz̤alɔ nd̤ija kuɓakʰulula ɛsanɮɛni sɛlaɓafilɛjɔ nd̤ija kuɓaɬawulɛla nd̤iɓakʰululɛ ɛkufɛni z̤ipʰi iindʲikitʲa z̤akʰɔ ipʰi imɓub̤isɔ jakʰɔ ŋ̤ǀ̤waɓa ukuz̤ɔɬwaja kusitʰɛlɛ ɛmɛɬwɛni nɔkuɓa jɛna uja kuɓa nɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ pʰakatʰi kwaɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ kuja kuz̤a ulɔpʰu lwasɛmpumalanɡ̤a umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a uɲuka ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ lit͡ʃɛ itʰɛnd̤ɛ lakʰɛ wɔmɛ umtʰɔmɓɔ wakʰɛ lɔwɔ uja kupʰanɡ̤a uɓuŋǀwanɛ ɓɛɛmpaɬa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ ɛlakwasamari lija kuz̤iv̤a linɛtʲala kuɓa lipʰikisɛ utʰikǁɔ walɔ ɓaja lik͡xɛlɛ iint͡sana z̤aɓɔ z̤ikǀuɲuz̤wɛ naɓamitʰijɔ ɓaɓɔ ɓakǃaŋ̤ǃ̤ululwɛ sirajɛli ɓuja uz̤ɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ukʰuɓɛkilɛ nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓakʰɔ tʰaɓatʰani nipʰatʰɛ amaz̤wi niɓujɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a jitʰini kujɛ sikǁɔlɛlɛ ɓɔnkɛ uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa wamkɛlɛ iz̤intɔ z̤ɛtʰu ɛz̤ilunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ukuz̤ɛ sinikɛlɛ iinkunz̤i z̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ ɛz̤int͡ʃa imiɓulɛlɔ jɔmlɔmɔ wɛtʰu uasirija akaji kusisind̤isa asiji kukʰwɛla ɛmahaʃɛni asiji kuɓa satʰi kumsɛɓɛnz̤i wɛz̤anɮa z̤ɛtʰu tʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu kuɓa kuwɛ inkɛd̤ama imfɛsanɛ nd̤ija kukupʰilisa ukuɓuja kwaɓɔ umv̤a nd̤ija kuɓatʰand̤a nɡ̤ɛsisa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa umsind̤ɔ uɓujilɛ kujɛ nd̤ija kuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɓɛtʰɛ kusirajɛli uja kutʲatʲamɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛɲiɓiɓa ɛnd̤ɛlisɛlɛ iiŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu z̤akʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlɛb̤anɔn aja kunaɓa amasɛɓɛ akʰɛ ɓuɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmŋǃuma uɓuɬɛ ɓakʰɛ iv̤umɓa lakʰɛ liɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛlɛb̤anɔn ɓaja kuɓuja aɓaɬala ɛmtʰunz̤ini wakʰɛ ɓapʰilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa ɓatʲatʲamɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmd̤ilija isikʰumɓuz̤ɔ sawɔ siɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛwajini jasɛlɛb̤anɔn ɛfrajim jintɔni ɛsɛnam nɛz̤itʰikǁɔ ɔkwam nd̤ijampʰɛnd̤ula nd̤imkʰatʰalɛla nd̤ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsiprɛs ɔluɬaz̤a sijafuɲanwa isikǃʰamɔ sakʰɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔlumkilɛjɔ az̤ikǃɔnd̤ɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤ɔ az̤az̤i nɡ̤ɔkuɓa z̤itʰɛ tʲɛ iinɮɛla z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a ahamɓa nɡ̤az̤ɔ amalunɡ̤isa kɛ ɓɔna aɓak͡xɛkǃi ɓaja kukʰuɓɛka kuz̤ɔ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɛlafika kujɔwɛli uɲana kapɛtuwɛli jiv̤ani ɔku mad̤ɔd̤a makʰulu niɓɛkɛ iinɮɛɓɛ nɔnkɛ ɓɛmi ɓɛliz̤wɛ kwakʰa kwakʰɔ ɔku nɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɛnu nanɡ̤ɛmiɬa jɔɔjiɬɔ kukǁɛlɛni kɔɔɲana ɓɛnu ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu ɓakukǁɛlɛ kɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓaɓɔ ɓakukǁɛlɛ kwisiz̤ukulwana ɛsisɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ ɔkuʃijwɛ nɡ̤umkǃikɛla kuɮiwɛ jinkumɓi ɔkuʃijwɛ jinkumɓi kuɮiwɛ nɡ̤umkʰɔtʰululi ɔkuʃijwɛ nɡ̤umkʰɔtʰululi kuɮiwɛ nɡ̤umŋǃuŋǃutʰi v̤ukani maŋǁila nililɛ b̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤ani nɔnkɛ ɓasɛli ɓɛwajini nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛŋǀind̤i jɛwajini kuɓa iŋǃuɲulwɛ ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛnu kuɓa ɛz̤wɛni lakɔwɛtʰu kuɲukɛ uɬanɡ̤a ɔlunamanɮa ɔlunɡ̤ɛnakuɓalwa amaz̤iɲɔ alɔ nɡ̤amaz̤iɲɔ ɛnɡ̤ɔɲama nawɛmiɬatʰi alɔ nɡ̤awɛnɡ̤ɔɲamakaz̤i luwub̤ukǃilɛ umd̤ilija lwawuv̤ikiv̤a umkʰiwanɛ luwukǀʰuhɛ kwatʰi lwawulaɬa amasɛɓɛ awɔ aɓa m̤lɔpʰɛ b̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntɔmɓi ɛb̤iŋǃɛ ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnd̤ɔd̤a jɔɓut͡ʃa ɓajɔ uŋǃamkilɛ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa nɔtʰululwajɔ ɓɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛli ɓakajɛhɔv̤a ab̤ukǃiwɛ um̤laɓa wɛnz̤a isid͡ʒ̤wili kuɓa ib̤ukǃiwɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa it͡ʃilɛ iwajini ɛnt͡ʃa iɔli jɔmilɛ d̤anani ɓalimi b̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤ani ɓasɛɓɛnz̤i ɓɛz̤id̤ilija nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nanɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛxasi kuɓa lut͡ʃaɓalɛlɛ uv̤unɔ umd̤ilija ut͡ʃilɛ umkʰiwanɛ unt͡ʃwɛɲilɛ nɔmxarnatɛ kwanamasund̤u nɛmiapilɛ jɔnkɛ imitʰi jasɛnɮɛ jɔmilɛ ɛwɛ ipʰɛlilɛ imiɬali imkilɛ kɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu b̤iŋǃani ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ nimɓamɓaz̤ɛlɛ ɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli b̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤ani ɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛli ɓɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jiz̤ani nɡ̤ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ ɓɔnkɛ uɓusuku ɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛli ɓɔtʰikǁɔ kuɓa inɮu jɔtʰikǁɔ iv̤ind͡ʒ̤iwɛ umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa nɔtʰululwajɔ ŋ̤ǀ̤walisani uz̤ilɔ mɛmani iŋ̤ǃ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤utʰɛla ɬanɡ̤anisani amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmi ɓɛliz̤wɛ ɓɛz̤ɛ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu nikʰalɛ kujɛhɔv̤a haji kɛ lɛ kuɓa isɔnd̤ɛlɛ kajɛhɔv̤a iv̤ɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmɓukǃɔ kusɔmanɮa akuŋǃumkɛ pʰamɓi kwamɛɬɔ ɛtʰu ukuɮa imiv̤ujɔ nɛmiɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓɔ ɛnɮwini jɔtʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu z̤iɓɔlilɛ iinkɔz̤ɔ pʰant͡si kwamaɡ̤ad̤a az̤ɔ ɓakǀʰitʰakɛlɛ ɔɔv̤imɓa atʰi b̤uma amakǃɔnɡ̤a kuɓa it͡ʃilɛ iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa haji ukuŋǀwina kwɛmpaɬa ɛnkulu ikʰɔɬiwɛ imiɬamɓi jɛɛnkɔmɔ kuɓa inɡ̤ɛnatʲani nɛmiɬamɓi jɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ iɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɛkilɛ nd̤ikʰala kuwɛ jɛhɔv̤a kuɓa umlilɔ uwat͡ʃisilɛ amak͡xiwa asɛntlanɡ̤ɔ nɛlanɡ̤atʲɛ lajixawula jɔnkɛ imitʰi jasɛnɮɛ kwanɛmpaɬa ɛnkulu jasɛnɮɛ it͡salɛla kuwɛ kuɓa it͡ʃilɛ imid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ jamanz̤i umlilɔ wawat͡ʃisa amak͡xiwa asɛntlanɡ̤ɔ v̤utʰɛlani isiɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɛz̤ijɔn niɬaɓɛ umkʰɔsi ɛntaɓɛni jam ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ maɓaɡ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤ɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmi ɓɛliz̤wɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa isiz̤a kajɛhɔv̤a kuɓa isɔnd̤ɛlɛ ɛnɔɓumɲama nɛsitʰɔkɔtʰɔkɔ ɛnamafu ɛnamafu amɲama and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkutʰi kǃʰipʰu kɔkusa pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛntaɓa aɓantu aɓaninz̤i aɓanamanɮa akuz̤anɡ̤a kuɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ napʰakad̤ɛ ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ akusaji kuz̤a kuɓujɛ kuɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛmiɲakɛni jɛz̤iz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ kut͡ʃisa umlilɔ nasɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ kuxawula ilanɡ̤atʲɛ iliz̤wɛ lind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmjɛz̤ɔ wɛɛd̤ɛn pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ ɛmv̤a kwaɓɔ lind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ ɛnkanɡ̤ala nɛntɔ ɛsind̤ilɛjɔ aji kuɓakʰɔ kulɔ ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓɔnakala kwamahaʃɛ imɓɔnakalɔ jaɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤akʰwɛlwajɔ ɓɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuɓalɛka and͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsitʰɔnɡ̤a sɛɛŋǃwɛlɔ z̤ɔkulwa ɛz̤iŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni z̤ɛɛntaɓa amaɡ̤ǃ̤asi aɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsitʰɔnɡ̤a sɛlanɡ̤atʲɛ lɔmlilɔ ɔt͡ʃisa iind̤iz̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓantu aɓanamanɮa aɓakʰɛ uluɬu ɛɓuswɛni ɓaɓɔ z̤ijaz̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤a iz̤iz̤wɛ ɓɔnkɛ uɓusɔ ɓuɓa lutʰutʰu ɓaɡ̤id̤ima nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amaɡ̤ɔxa ɓaɲuka ud̤ɔnɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amad̤ɔd̤a ɔkulwa ɓahamɓa ɛlɔwɔ nɡ̤ɛnɮɛla jakʰɛ aɓapʰamɓapʰamɓi ɛmɛnd̤wɛni waɓɔ aɓaɡ̤ilani ɓahamɓa ɛlɔwɔ nɡ̤ɔmɛnd̤ɔ wakʰɛ ɓawa nasɛz̤ikʰalini ɓanɡ̤ɛnz̤akali ɓapʰitʰiz̤ɛla ɛmz̤ini ɓaɓalɛka ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni ɓaɲuka ɛz̤inɮwini ɓanɡ̤ɛna nɡ̤ɛɛfɛstilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsɛla pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ ujaɡ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤a um̤laɓa lijaɲikima iz̤ulu lisukɛ laɓa mɲama ilanɡ̤a nɛɲanɡ̤a nɛɛnkwɛnkwɛz̤i z̤iɓufiɲɛz̤ilɛ uɓum̤lɔpʰɛ ɓaz̤ɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukʰupʰa iz̤wi lakʰɛ pʰamɓi kwɛmpi jakʰɛ kuɓa mkʰulu kakʰulu umkʰɔsi wakʰɛ kuɓa unamanɮa umɛnz̤i wɛliz̤wi lakʰɛ kuɓa kajɛhɔv̤a jɔjikɛka kunɛnɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɔkujiɲamɛz̤ɛla nanɡ̤ɔku kɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi ɓujɛlani nɡ̤ɛntliz̤ijɔ jɛnu jɔnkɛ nanɡ̤ɔkuz̤ila nanɡ̤ɔkulila nanɡ̤ɔkumɓamɓaz̤ɛla nik͡xaz̤ulɛ intliz̤ijɔ jɛnu inɡ̤aɓi z̤iinɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɛnu niɓujɛlɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu kuɓa unɔɓaɓalɔ nɛmfɛsanɛ jɛna uz̤ɛka kad̤ɛ umsind̤ɔ unɛŋǀɛɓa ɛnkulu ujaz̤ɔɬwaja nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi nɡ̤uɓani ɔwaz̤ijɔ m̤lawumɓi wɔɓuja az̤ɔɬwajɛ aʃijɛ int͡sikɛlɛlɔ nɡ̤asɛmv̤a kwakʰɛ umnikɛlɔ wɔkuɮa nɔtʰululwajɔ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu v̤utʰɛlani isiɡ̤ɔɮɔ ɛz̤ijɔn ŋ̤ǀ̤walisani uz̤ilɔ mɛmani iŋ̤ǃ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤utʰɛla ɬanɡ̤anisani aɓantu ŋ̤ǀ̤walisani iɓanɮa ɓutʰani amad̤ɔd̤a amakʰulu ɬanɡ̤anisani iint͡sapʰɔ naɓaɲajɔ ɛmaɓɛlɛni makapʰumɛ umjɛni ɛɡ̤umɓini lakʰɛ umt͡ʃakaz̤i ɛsililini sakʰɛ maɓalilɛ aɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli aɓalunɡ̤isɛlɛli ɓakajɛhɔv̤a pʰakatʰi kwɛv̤arand̤a nɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɓatʰi jiɓa nɛŋǀɛɓa jɛhɔv̤a ɛɓantwini ɓakʰɔ unɡ̤alinikɛli lakʰɔ ɛkuŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤wɛni ukuɓa iintlanɡ̤a z̤iz̤ɛkɛlisɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ jini ukuɓa kutʰiwɛ ɛz̤iz̤wɛni upʰi utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ waɓa nɔɓukʰwɛlɛ kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛliz̤wɛ lakʰɛ waɓa nɔfɛfɛ nɡ̤aɓantu ɓakʰɛ wapʰɛnd̤ula ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi ɛɓantwini ɓakʰɛ jaɓɔnani nd̤initʰumɛla iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɛwajini ɛnt͡ʃa nɛɔli ɛnija kwanɛliswa jijɔ nd̤inɡ̤aɓi saninikɛla ukuɓa niɓɛ sisiŋ̤ǀ̤ikiv̤ɔ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni nd̤ija kumkʰwɛlɛlisɛla kud̤ɛ ɔwasɛntla nd̤imɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰɛlɛ ɛz̤wɛni ɛlinɡ̤umkǃwɛɓɛd̤u ɛnkanɡ̤ala umpʰamɓili wakʰɛ usinɡ̤ɛ kulwanɮɛ lwasɛmpumalanɡ̤a umkǃɔʃɛlisɔ wakʰɛ kulwanɮɛ lwasɛnt͡ʃɔnalanɡ̤a kuɲukɛ kwakʰɛ kuɲukɛ ukuɓɔla kwakʰɛ kuɓa ɛz̤ipʰakamisilɛ ukwɛnz̤a iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inkulu musa ukɔjika ɬaɓatʰi ɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓa uv̤ujɛ kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a wɛnz̤a iz̤intɔ ɛz̤inkulu musani ukɔjika mpaɬa jasɛnɮɛ kuɓa amak͡xiwa asɛntlanɡ̤ɔ apʰuma uɬaz̤a kuɓa umtʰi ukǁakatʰa isikǃʰamɔ sawɔ umkʰiwanɛ nɔmd̤ilija amanɮa awɔ nani ɲana ɓasɛz̤ijɔn ɡ̤ǀ̤ɔɓani niv̤ujɛ kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu kuɓa umjalɛli wɔkuɓa kuɓɛkʰɔ uɓulunɡ̤isa aniɬisɛlɛ umv̤umɓi imv̤ula ɛtʰamɓisajɔ nɛmv̤ula ɛv̤utʰisajɔ ɛkukǃalɛni z̤ɔz̤ala iz̤and̤a jiŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa ipʰalalɛ jiwajini ɛnt͡ʃa najiɔli imikʰɔmɓɛ jɔkukʰɔnɡ̤ɔz̤ɛla nd̤ɔniɓujisɛlɛla ɔkwɛmiɲaka ɛjaɮiwa jinkumɓi nanɡ̤umkʰɔtʰululi nanɡ̤umkǃikɛla nanɡ̤umŋǃuŋǃutʰi jam ɛnkulu ɛnd̤ajitʰumɛlajɔ pʰakatʰi kwɛnu nija kuɮa niɮilɛ niɬutʰɛ nilid̤umisɛ iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛnu ɔnipʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓalulɛkilɛjɔ ɓanɡ̤ad̤ani aɓantu ɓam napʰakad̤ɛ naz̤i ukuɓa nd̤ipʰakatʰi kwamasirajɛli ukuɓa jɛhɔv̤a nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɛnu akukʰɔ wumɓi ɓanɡ̤ad̤ani aɓantu ɓam napʰakad̤ɛ kuja kutʰi ɛmv̤ɛni kɔkuɓa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤itʰululɛ umɔja pʰɛz̤u kwɛɲama jɔnkɛ ɓaprɔfɛtɛ ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤ɛnu amad̤ɔd̤a ɛnu amakʰulu apʰupʰɛ amapʰupʰa amad̤ɔd̤ana ɛnu aɓɔnɛ imiɓɔnɔ kwanapʰɛz̤u kwaɓakʰɔnz̤i napʰɛz̤u kwaɓakʰɔnz̤az̤ana nd̤ɔtʰulula umɔja nɡ̤alɔɔ miɬa nd̤ija kwɛnz̤a iz̤imanɡ̤a ɛz̤ulwini nasɛɬaɓatʰini iɡ̤az̤i nɔmlilɔ nɛmikǃulu jɔmsi ilanɡ̤a lija liɓɛ mɲama nɛɲanɡ̤a iɓɛ liɡ̤az̤i pʰamɓi kɔkuɓa ifikɛ kajɛhɔv̤a lɛjɔ jɔjikɛkajɔ ɓɔtʰi ɓɔnkɛ aɓasukuɓa ɓɛŋǃula iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a ɓasind̤ɛ kuɓa ɛntaɓɛni jasɛz̤ijɔn nasɛjɛrusalɛm kuja kuɓakʰɔ aɓasind̤ilɛjɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wat͡ʃɔjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a napʰakatʰi kwaɓasɛlɛjɔ kuɓɛkʰɔ awɔɓaɓiz̤a ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jaɓɔnani nɡ̤ajɔ lɔɔ miɬa nanɡ̤alɔ ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa nd̤ija kukuɓujisa nɡ̤alɔ ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kukajud̤a nɛjɛrusalɛm nd̤ɔz̤iɓutʰa z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a nd̤iz̤iɬisɛlɛ ɛntilini jakwajɔʃafati nd̤imanɡ̤alɛlanɛ naz̤ɔ kʰɔna nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jaɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli ɛz̤iɓatʰɛ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni z̤alaɓa iliz̤wɛ aɓantu ɓam z̤iɓɛnz̤ɛlɛ amakǃaʃisɔ z̤av̤uz̤a ihɛɲukaz̤i nɡ̤ɛnkwɛnkwɛ z̤atʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɛntɔmɓi nɡ̤ɛwajini z̤asɛla kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nija kund̤ɛnz̤a ntɔni tirɛ nawɛ t͡sid̤ɔn mid̤a jɔnkɛ jamafilisti nija kund̤iɓujɛkɛz̤a impatʰɔ jam nija kund̤ɛnz̤a ntɔni kwakamsiɲa nɡ̤ɔkukʰawulɛz̤ajɔ nd̤ija kukuɓujisɛla ukupʰatʰa kwɛnu ɛntlɔkwɛni jɛnu ɛkuɓɛni nitʰaɓatʰɛ isiliv̤ɛrɛ jam nɛɡ̤ɔlid̤ɛ jam iz̤intɔ z̤amɛz̤intlɛ ɛz̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ naz̤isa ɛtɛmpilɛni jɛnu natʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a nanɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm kɔɔɲana ɓakajav̤an ukuz̤ɛ niɓakʰwɛlɛlisɛlɛ kud̤ɛ ɛmd̤ɛni waɓɔ jaɓɔnani nd̤ijaɓakǁʰɔkǁʰa ɛnd̤awɛni ɛnatʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤aɓɔ kujɔ nd̤ikuɓujisɛlɛ ukupʰatʰa kwɛnu ɛntlɔkwɛni jɛnu nd̤ɔtʰɛnɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓɛnu nanɡ̤ɛɛntɔmɓi z̤ɛnu ɛsanɮɛni sɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a ɓatʰɛnɡ̤isɛ nɡ̤aɓɔ kumaʃɛb̤a kuɬanɡ̤a ɔlukud̤ɛ kuɓa utʰɛtʰilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a mɛmɛz̤ani ɔku ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ŋ̤ǀ̤walisani imfaz̤wɛ kǁʰɔkǁʰani amaɡ̤ɔxa makafikɛ ɛɲukɛ ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a ɔkulwa kʰand̤ani amakʰuɓa ɛnu aɓɛ nɡ̤amak͡xɛlɛ nɛz̤it͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ z̤ɛnu z̤ɛmid̤ilija z̤iɓɛ z̤iz̤ikʰali ɔswɛlɛ amanɮa makatʰi nd̤iliɡ̤ɔxa kʰawulɛz̤ani niz̤ɛ nɔnkɛ z̤intlanɡ̤a z̤anɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ niɓutʰɛlanɛ waɬisɛlɛ kʰɔna amaɡ̤ɔxa akʰɔ jɛhɔv̤a maz̤ikǁʰɔkǁʰwɛ z̤iɲukɛ iintlanɡ̤a z̤ijɛ ɛntilini jakwajɔʃafati nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ija kuɬala pʰant͡si kʰɔna ukuz̤ɛ nd̤iz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a z̤anɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ fakani ixɛŋ̤ǃ̤a kuɓa ukuɮa kuv̤utʰiwɛ jiz̤ani nikǁɔv̤ulɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa isikǁɔv̤ulɛlɔ sɛwajini siz̤ɛlɛ ijapʰalala imikʰɔmɓɛ jɔkukʰɔnɡ̤ɔz̤ɛla kuɓa ɓukʰulu uɓuɓi ɓaz̤ɔ jimɓutʰumɓutʰu jimɓutʰumɓutʰu ɛntilini jɛsiɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɔ kuɓa isɔnd̤ɛlɛ kajɛhɔv̤a ɛntilini jɛsiɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɔ ilanɡ̤a nɛɲanɡ̤a z̤ɛnz̤iwɛ mɲama iinkwɛnkwɛz̤i z̤ikufiɲɛz̤ilɛ ukukʰaɲa kwaz̤ɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ub̤axula ɛz̤ijɔn ukʰupʰa iliz̤wi lakʰɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm liɲikimɛ iz̤ulu nɛɬaɓatʰi kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a uliɬatʰi kuɓantu ɓakʰɛ uliɡ̤wiɓa kɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli nija kwaz̤i kɛ ukuɓa jɛhɔv̤a nd̤inɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɛnu ɔɬɛli ɛz̤ijɔn ɛntaɓɛni jam ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ijɛrusalɛm jɔɓa ŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ aɓasɛmz̤ini ɓanɡ̤aɓi sakǀand̤a pʰakatʰi kwajɔ kuja kutʰi nɡ̤alɔɔ iintaɓa z̤iv̤uz̤ɛ iŋǀind̤i jɛɛd̤ilija iind̤uli z̤ipʰalalɛ imid͡ʒ̤ɛlɔ jɔnkɛ jakwajud̤a ipʰalalɛ amanz̤i kupʰumɛ umtʰɔmɓɔ ɛnɮwini kajɛhɔv̤a usɛz̤ɛ isiɬamɓɔ sɛminɡ̤ampunz̤i ijiputa kuja kuɓa sɛnkanɡ̤ala nɛlakwaɛd̤ɔm liɓɛ jintlanɡ̤ɔ ɛsɛnkanɡ̤ala nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɡ̤ɔɲamɛla kwaɓɔ ɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a ɛkuɓɛni ɓɛpʰalaz̤ɛ iɡ̤az̤i ɛlimsulwa ɛz̤wɛni laɓɔ kɛ ujud̤a uja nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ ijɛrusalɛm imiwɛ kwiz̤iz̤ukulwana nɡ̤ɛz̤iz̤ukulwana nd̤ija iɡ̤az̤i laɓɔ ɛnd̤and̤inɡ̤alisulanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a uɬɛli ɛz̤ijɔn amaz̤wi kaamɔsi ɔɓɛnɡ̤ɔwakuɓɔ aɓalusi ɓasɛtɛkɔwa awawaɓɔnajɔ nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kauz̤ija wakwajud̤a nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kajarɔb̤ɛham uɲana kajɔwaʃɛ wakwasirajɛli imiɲaka ɛmiɓini pʰamɓi kɔɲikimɔ watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a ujab̤axula ɛz̤ijɔn akʰupʰɛ iliz̤wi lakʰɛ ɛjɛrusalɛm amak͡xiwa aɓalusi ɛnz̤ɛ isid͡ʒ̤wili iŋǀɔpʰɔ jɛkarmɛlɛ jɔmɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ ɛz̤itʰatʰu z̤ɛd̤amaskɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤inɛand̤iji kujiɓujisa umv̤a lɛ ntɔnɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa ɓamb̤ulajɔ uɡ̤ilijad̤i nɡ̤ɛz̤ib̤ulɔ z̤ɛsiɲitʰi nd̤ija kupʰɔsa umlilɔ ɛnɮwini kahaz̤ajɛli ut͡ʃisɛ iiŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ z̤ikab̤ɛn̤ad̤ad̤ɛ nd̤ɔwapʰula umv̤alɔ wɛd̤amaskɔ nd̤iŋǃumlɛ wasɛsiɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni sɛav̤ɛn nɔpʰɛtʰɛ intɔnɡ̤a jɔɓukumkani ɛb̤ɛtɛɛd̤ɛn ɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wɛ aɓantu ɓakwaaram ɓajɛ ɛkirɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ ɛz̤itʰatʰu z̤ɛɡ̤az̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤inɛand̤iji kujiɓujisa umv̤a lɛ ntɔnɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkutʰimɓa kwaɓɔ aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa nɡ̤ɔkuz̤ɛlɛjɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓaɓanikɛlɛ kuɛd̤ɔm nd̤ija kutʰumɛla umlilɔ ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni lwɛɡ̤az̤a ut͡ʃisɛ iiŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛ z̤ajɔ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ nd̤ɔmŋǃumla ɔmijɔ ɛaʃd̤ɔd̤ɛ nɔpʰɛtʰɛ intɔnɡ̤a jɔɓukumkani ɛaʃkɛlɔn nd̤isiɓujisɛlɛ isanɮa pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛk͡xɔn at͡ʃaɓalalɛ amasalɛla amafilisti it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ ɛz̤itʰatʰu z̤ɛtirɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤inɛand̤iji kujiɓujisa umv̤a lɛ ntɔnɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓanikɛla kwaɓɔ aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa ɓɛpʰɛlɛlɛ kuɛd̤ɔm aɓawukʰumɓula umŋǃɔpʰisɔ wɔɓuz̤alwana nd̤ija kutʰumɛla umlilɔ ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni lwɛtirɛ ut͡ʃisɛ iiŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛ z̤ajɔ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ ɛz̤itʰatʰu z̤akwaɛd̤ɔm nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤inɛand̤iji kujiɓujisa umv̤a lɛ ntɔnɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkumsukɛlisa kwakʰɛ umz̤alwana wakʰɛ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ɛjilaɬilɛ imfɛsanɛ jakʰɛ umsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ uɬala ukǃwɛnɡ̤a ɛmana ɛɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ ukupʰupʰuma kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ nd̤ija kutʰumɛla umlilɔ kwatɛman ut͡ʃisɛ iiŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ z̤asɛb̤ɔt͡sɛra ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ ɛz̤itʰatʰu z̤ɔɔɲana ɓakaamɔn nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤inɛand̤iji kujiɓujisa umv̤a lɛ ntɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkukǃaŋ̤ǃ̤ulula kwaɓɔ aɓamitʰijɔ ɓasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i ukuz̤ɛ ɓand̤isɛ umd̤a waɓɔ nd̤ija kuɓasa umlilɔ ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni lwɛrab̤a ut͡ʃisɛ iiŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛ z̤ajɔ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ kuɬatʲwa umkʰɔsi nɡ̤ɛmini jɔkulwa kukʰɔ umɔja ɔv̤utʰuz̤ajɔ nɡ̤ɛmini jɛsakǃʰwitʰi uja kutʰind͡ʒ̤wa ɛmkɛ waɓɔ jɛna naɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ kuɲɛ najɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ ɛz̤itʰatʰu z̤akwamɔwab̤i nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤inɛand̤iji kujiɓujisa umv̤a lɛ ntɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuwat͡ʃisa kwakʰɛ amatʰamɓɔ ɔɔkumkani ɓakwaɛd̤ɔm aɓa jikalika nd̤ija kutʰumɛla umlilɔ kwamɔwab̤i ut͡ʃisɛ iiŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ z̤ɛkɛrijɔti afɛ umɔwab̤i kupʰitʰiz̤ɛlwa kuɬatʲwa umkʰɔsi kuv̤utʰɛlwa iz̤iɡ̤ɔɮɔ nd̤ɔmŋǃumla umɡ̤wɛɓi pʰakatʰi kwakʰɛ nd̤iɓaɓulalɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓatʰɛtʰɛli ɓakʰɛ kuɲɛ najɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ ɛz̤itʰatʰu z̤akwajud̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤inɛand̤iji kujiɓujisa umv̤a lɛ ntɔnɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuwukǀɛkisa kwaɓɔ umjalɛlɔ kajɛhɔv̤a aɓajiɡ̤ǀ̤ina imimisɛlɔ jakʰɛ amanɡ̤a aɓɔ aɓaɓɛland̤ɛla wɔna ɔɔjisɛ aɓand̤wɛnd̤wisa nd̤ija kutʰumɛla umlilɔ kwajud̤a ut͡ʃisɛ iiŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ z̤ɛjɛrusalɛm ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ ɛz̤itʰatʰu z̤akwasirajɛli nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛz̤inɛand̤iji kujiɓujisa umv̤a lɛ ntɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkuɓa ɓatʰɛnɡ̤isa ilunɡ̤isa nɡ̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ ɓatʰɛnɡ̤isa iɬwɛmpu nɡ̤ɛɛmɓad̤ad̤a ɛz̤imɓini ɓɔna aɓɔ ɓaz̤ɔnd̤ajɔ ukuɓa intlɔkɔ jɛz̤iswɛli iɓɛ nɔtʰuli lɔm̤laɓa ɓajid͡ʒ̤ikɛ inɮɛla jaɓalulamilɛjɔ nɔjisɛ ɓaja ntɔmɓiniɲɛ ukuz̤ɛ ɓaliɬamɓɛlɛ iɡ̤ama ɛliŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓanaɓa pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ ɛz̤isisiɓamɓisɔ nɡ̤asɛz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɓasɛla iwajini jaɓaɬawulisiwɛjɔ ɛnɮwini jɔtʰikǁɔ waɓɔ kanti nd̤amt͡ʃaɓalalisa ɛɓuswɛni ɓaɓɔ umamɔri ɔɓud̤ɛ ɓund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɓud̤ɛ ɓɛmisɛd̤arɛ ɔɓɛlikǃɛlɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmiɔki nd̤asit͡ʃaɓalalisa isikǃʰamɔ sakʰɛ nɡ̤apʰɛz̤ulu nɛɛŋ̤ǀ̤amɓu z̤akʰɛ nɡ̤apʰant͡si kɛ nd̤aniɲusa ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa nd̤anikʰɔkɛla ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi manɛ ukuz̤ɛ niliɬutʰɛ iliz̤wɛ lɔmamɔri nd̤av̤ɛlisa kɔɔɲana ɓɛnu aɓɔkuɓa nɡ̤aɓaprɔfɛti nakumad̤ɔd̤ana ɛnu aɓɔkuɓa nɡ̤aɓaz̤aɬulilɛjɔ hi akund͡ʒ̤alɔ ɲana ɓakasirajɛli ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kɛ nisukɛ naɓasɛz̤a iwajini aɓaz̤aɬulilɛjɔ aɓaprɔfɛti naɓawisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkutʰi iz̤ɛ ninɡ̤aprɔfɛti jaɓɔnani nd̤ija kunikǁinz̤ɛlɛla pʰant͡si nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa ikǁinz̤ɛlɛlwa pʰant͡si iŋǃwɛlɔ ɛz̤ɛlɛ z̤iz̤itʰunɡ̤u wɔkʰɔɬwa kukusaɓa ɔnamɛnd̤u ɔwɔmɛlɛlɛjɔ anɡ̤awakǃinisi amanɮa akʰɛ iɡ̤ɔxa linɡ̤aɓusind̤isi uɓɔmi ɓalɔ nɔpʰɛtʰɛ isapʰɛtʰa akaji nɔɲawɔ z̤inamɛnd̤u anɡ̤az̤isind̤isi nɔkʰwɛlɛ ɛhaʃɛni anɡ̤aɓusind̤isi uɓɔmi ɓakʰɛ nɔntliz̤ijɔ ikʰalipʰilɛjɔ pʰakatʰi kwamaɡ̤ɔxa asaɓɛ ɛz̤ɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a liv̤ɛni ɛli liz̤wi alitʰɛtʰilɛjɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ani ɲana ɓakasirajɛli nɡ̤ajɔ jɔnkɛ imiz̤alwanɛ ɛnd̤ajiɲusajɔ ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa lisitʰi nd̤az̤ɛ nɛd̤wa ɛmiz̤alwanɛni jɔnkɛ jɛɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nd̤ija kuɓuv̤ɛlɛla uɓuɡ̤wɛŋǁa ɓɛnu ɓɔnkɛ ɓakʰa ɓahamɓɛ nd̤awɔɲɛ aɓaɓini ɓɛnɡ̤av̤ani ikʰa ib̤axulɛ inɡ̤ɔɲama ɛɬatʰini inɡ̤ɛnantɔ ijikǃwɛnɡ̤ajɔ inɡ̤ɔɲama ɛnt͡ʃa ikʰa iɡ̤ǃ̤umɛ ɛmkǃɔlɔmɓɛni wajɔ inɡ̤aɓamɓanɡ̤a ntɔ ikʰa jɛjɛlɛ ɛsiɓatʰɛni ɛm̤laɓɛni kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ sanɡ̤ɔ lijitʰijɛlɛjɔ wɔd͡ʒ̤uɓa umɡ̤iɓɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni unɡ̤aɓamɓisanɡ̤a nɔkuɓamɓisa kʰɔna kʰɛ siv̤utʰɛlwɛ isiɡ̤ɔɮɔ pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i ɓanɡ̤ɔtʰuki aɓantu kʰɛ ɓuɓɛkʰɔ uɓuɓi pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i ɛnɡ̤aɓɛnz̤anɡ̤a ujɛhɔv̤a inɛnɛ ajikʰɛ jɛnz̤ɛ intɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a inɡ̤atʰanɡ̤a iluɬakaz̤ɛ ukǀwɛjɔ lwajɔ kuɓakʰɔnz̤i ɓajɔ aɓaprɔfɛti inɡ̤ɔɲama ib̤axulɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤ɔjikijɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a itʰɛtʰilɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔnɡ̤aji kuprɔfɛta mɛmɛz̤ani ɛz̤iŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛni ɛz̤ind̤ɛ z̤asɛaʃd̤ɔd̤ɛ nasɛz̤iŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛni ɛz̤ind̤ɛ z̤ɛz̤wɛ lasɛjiputa nitʰi ɬanɡ̤anisani ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤ɛlakwasamari niɓɔnɛ isakǃunɡ̤ɛ ɛsikʰulu ɛsipʰakatʰi kwalɔ naɓakǀud̤isiwɛjɔ aɓasɛsaz̤ulwini salɔ kuɓa aɓakwaz̤i ukwɛnz̤a ɔkutʰɛ ɡ̤ǀ̤a ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a aɓɔ ɓafumɓa uɡ̤ɔɲamɛlɔ nɔb̤ukǃɔ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛni z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi umɓand̤ɛz̤ɛli uja kuɓa nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ ɛliz̤wɛni uja kuwatʰɔɓa amanɮa akʰɔ kuwɛ z̤ipʰanɡ̤wɛ iiŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛ z̤akʰɔ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɛɬanɡ̤ula ɛmlɔɲɛni wɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ɔɔkǁʰɔnɡ̤ɔ aɓaɓini nɔkuɓa sisikǃwɛnɡ̤a sɛnɮɛɓɛ ɓaja kwɛnd͡ʒ̤iwa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ ukuɬanɡ̤ulwa ɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli aɓaɬala kwasamari pʰɛz̤u kwɛpʰund̤u lɛsiŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlɔ napʰɛz̤u kwɛɛnɡ̤uɓɔ z̤ɔmanɮalɔ ɛz̤iluɬɔɓɔ lwɛd̤amaskɔ jiv̤ani niŋ̤ǃ̤inɛ kwinɮu kajakɔɓi it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi kuɓa nd̤ija kuz̤iv̤ɛlɛla iz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤ɛnɮu kasirajɛli pʰɛz̤u kwajɔ nd̤ija kuz̤iv̤ɛlɛla ɛz̤iɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlwɛni z̤asɛb̤ɛtɛli z̤ikǁakakǁwɛ iimpɔnd̤ɔ z̤ɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ z̤iwɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni nd̤ɔjikǀʰitʰa inɮu jasɛɓusika kuɲɛ nɛnɮu jasɛɬɔtʲɛni z̤it͡ʃaɓalalɛ iz̤inɮu z̤ɛɛmpɔnd̤ɔ z̤ɛɛnɮɔv̤u z̤ipʰɛlɛ iz̤inɮu ɛz̤ininz̤i ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a liv̤ɛni ɛli liz̤wi z̤imaz̤i z̤asɛb̤aʃan z̤isɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwasamari z̤iz̤ikǀud̤isajɔ iz̤iswɛli z̤iwav̤ikiv̤ajɔ amaɬwɛmpu z̤itʰi ɛz̤inkɔsini z̤az̤ɔ z̤isani sisɛlɛ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ifunɡ̤ɛ uɓuŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ ɓajɔ jatʰi jaɓɔnani niz̤ɛlwa jimiɬa ɛnija kukǃwɛkǃwɛd̤iswa nɡ̤amaɡ̤wɛɡ̤wɛ naɓɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla nɡ̤amakǃɛxu ɔkuɓamɓisa iintlanz̤i nija kupʰuma nɡ̤amatʰuɓa ɔkukǃʰɛkɛz̤wa kɔd̤ɔnɡ̤a ɛlɔwɔ apʰumɛ nɡ̤ɛlilunɡ̤ɛ najɛ nijɛ kupʰɔswa ɛharmɔn ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a jijani ɛb̤ɛtɛli nik͡xɛkǃɛ jijani ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali nand̤isɛ ukuk͡xɛkǃa niz̤isɛ imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɛnu imisɔ nɡ̤ɛmisɔ nɛz̤iʃumi z̤ɛnu kaɲɛ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa ɛmitʰatʰu nikǃʰumisɛlɛ umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɛmiɓulɛlɔ nɡ̤ɛntɔ ɛnɛɡ̤wɛlɛ nimɛmɛz̤ɛ imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ jɔkukǃʰutʲwa jintliz̤ijɔ mɛmɛz̤ani kuɓa nitʰand̤a nd͡ʒ̤alɔ ɲana ɓakasirajɛli it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤ininikɛ uɓumsulwa ɓamaz̤iɲɔ ɛmiz̤ini jɛnu jɔnkɛ nɔkuswɛlɛka kwɛsɔnka ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɛnu z̤ɔnkɛ aniɓujanɡ̤a niz̤ɛ nɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kanand͡ʒ̤alɔ nd̤ajitʰintɛla imv̤ula z̤isɛntatʰu iiɲanɡ̤a z̤ɔkuɓa kuv̤unwɛ nd̤ajinisa kɔmɲɛ umz̤i and̤ajinisa kɔmɲɛ ɛsiɲɛ isaɬulɔ sɔm̤laɓa sanɛlwa jimv̤ula ɛsiɲɛ isaɬulɔ ɛsinɡ̤anɛlwanɡ̤a sat͡ʃa imiz̤i ɛmiɓini ɛmitʰatʰu ib̤ad̤ulɛlɛ kumz̤i ɔmɲɛ ukuz̤ɛ isɛlɛ amanz̤i inɡ̤akʰɔlwa anaɓuja niz̤ɛ nɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤aniɓɛtʰa nɡ̤ɛmɓaɓala nanɡ̤ɛkǁɔʃɔmɓa imijɛz̤ɔ jɛnu nɛz̤id̤ilija z̤ɛnu nɛmikʰiwanɛ jɛnu nɛmiŋǃuma jɛnu ɛmininz̤i jaɮiwa jinkumɓi ɛŋǃuŋǃutʰajɔ anaɓuja niz̤ɛ nɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤atʰumɛla pʰakatʰi kwɛnu indʲikitʲa jɔkufa nɡ̤ɔkuja kwasɛjiputa nd̤awaɓulala nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ amad̤ɔd̤ana ɛnu kwanamahaʃɛ ɛnu anɡ̤amakǁʰɔɓa nd̤aɲusa kwɛmiŋǃuɓa jɛnu kwɛz̤a ɛz̤impumlwɛni z̤ɛnu anaɓuja niz̤ɛ nɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤iɓab̤ukukǃilɛ aɓaɲɛ ɓɛnu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wab̤ukukǃa nɡ̤akɔ utʰikǁɔ isɔd̤ɔm nɛɡ̤ɔmɔra naɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsikʰuni ɛsiɲɔtʰulwɛ ɛmlilwɛni anaɓuja niz̤ɛ nɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ nd̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ kuwɛ sirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkɔkuɓa nd̤ija kwɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ kɛ kuwɛ z̤ilunɡ̤isɛlɛlɛ ukuɬanɡ̤aɓɛz̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ sirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jaɓɔna ulɔjila iintaɓa ulɔd̤ala umɔja ulɔkǁɛlɛla intɔ ɔkujijɔ ukutʰɛlɛkɛlɛla kwakʰɛ ulɔwɛnz̤a mɲama isifinɡ̤ɔ ulɔɲatʰɛla pʰɛz̤u kwɛmimanɡ̤ɔ jɛɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ liv̤ɛni ɛli liz̤wi nd̤ilipʰakamisajɔ nɡ̤ani ɛsi simɓɔnɔnɔ nɮu kasirajɛli iwilɛ ajisaji kuɓuja iv̤ukɛ intɔmɓi ɛnɡ̤usirajɛli ikʰaɬɛlɛkɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni akukʰɔ ujipʰakamisajɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi umz̤i ɔpʰuma unɛwaka uja nɛkʰulu ɔpʰuma unɛkʰulu uja nɛʃumi kwinɮu kasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a kwinɮu kasirajɛli ukutʰi kǃukǃɛlani nipʰilɛ ukukǃukǃɛla ɛb̤ɛtɛli ninɡ̤anɡ̤ɛni ɛɡ̤iliɡ̤ali ninɡ̤awɛlɛli nijɛ ɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a kuɓa iɡ̤iliɡ̤ali inɛnɛ ija kutʰind͡ʒ̤wa nɛb̤ɛtɛli iɓɛ jintɔ ɛnɡ̤ɛjakɔntɔ kǃukǃɛlani kujɛhɔv̤a nanija kupʰila ɬɛz̤ɛ ajifikɛlɛ inɮu kajɔsɛfu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmlilɔ ut͡ʃisɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ uwukǀimɛla ib̤ɛtɛli aɓɔ ɓad͡ʒ̤ika ɔkusɛsikwɛni kuɓɛ nɡ̤um̤lɔɲanɛ ɓaɓukʰaɬɛlɛ pʰant͡si uɓulunɡ̤isa ɛm̤laɓɛni kǃukǃɛlani kulɔwɛnz̤a isilimɛla namak͡xɔz̤a ulɔɡ̤ukǃula itʰunz̤i lɔkufa liɓɛ nɡ̤umsɔ ajɛnz̤ɛ mɲama iɓɛ ɓuɓusuku ulɔɓiz̤a amanz̤i ɔlwanɮɛ awatʰululɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kɔm̤laɓa nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ nɡ̤ulɔt͡ʃanɡ̤az̤isa imɓukǃɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔlikǃɛlɛ imɓukǃɔ ijifikɛlɛ iŋǃaɓa ɓajamtʰija ɔwɔɬwajajɔ ɛsanɡ̤wɛni ɓamɛnz̤ɛ isikiz̤i ɔtʰɛtʰa ɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛlɛlɛjɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkusiɡ̤ǃ̤uʃa kwɛnu isiswɛli nitʰaɓatʰɛ kusɔ unikɛlɔ lwɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nija kwakʰa iz̤inɮu nɡ̤amatʲɛ akǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ ninɡ̤aɬali kuz̤ɔ nitʲalɛ iz̤id̤ilija ɛz̤iŋǃwɛnɛlɛkajɔ ninɡ̤asɛli wajini jaz̤ɔ kuɓa nd̤ijaz̤az̤i iz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤ɛnu ukuɓa z̤ininz̤i kwaz̤ɔ nɛz̤ɔnɔ z̤ɛnu ukuɓa z̤ikʰulu kwaz̤ɔ niɓand̤ɛz̤ɛla ilunɡ̤isa nisamkɛlɛ isikǀɛnɡ̤ɔ nisid͡ʒ̤ikɛ isiɡ̤wɛɓɔ samaɬwɛmpu ɛsanɡ̤wɛni nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ɔnɛŋ̤ǃ̤ikǃɔ utʰɛ kǀwaka nɡ̤ɛli kǁɛʃa kuɓa likǁɛʃa ɛliɓi ɛli funani ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ninɡ̤afuni ɔkuɓi ukuz̤ɛ nipʰilɛ az̤ɛ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi aɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nit͡ʃɔjɔ tʰijani ɔkuɓi nitʰand̤ɛ ɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ nimisɛ ɔkusɛsikwɛni ɛsanɡ̤wɛni m̤lawumɓi ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi wɔwaɓaɓala amasalɛla kajɔsɛfu nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi inkɔsi ukutʰi ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ z̤ɛmɓutʰɔ kukumɓamɓaz̤ɛla ɛz̤itratwɛni z̤ɔnkɛ ɓatʰi jɔɔ jɔɔ ɓaɓiz̤ɛla ɛsid͡ʒ̤wilini ɓaɓiz̤ɛla aɓasaz̤ijɔ isimɛma ɓatʰi mɓamɓaz̤ɛlani ɛz̤id̤ilijɛni z̤ɔnkɛ kukumɓamɓaz̤ɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤ikǀand̤a ɛsaz̤ulwini sakʰɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a jɛɓa kɛ ɓaŋǃwɛnɛla kajɛhɔv̤a ijintɔni kajɛhɔv̤a iɓuɓumɲama ajikukukʰaɲa ind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkutʰi aɓalɛkɛ ɛnɡ̤ɔɲamɛni akǃuɓisanɛ nɛb̤ɛrɛ anɡ̤ɛnɛ ɛnɮwini aɓamɓɛlɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni iɲɔka imlumɛ ajiji kuɓa ɓuɓumɲama jini kajɛhɔv̤a inɡ̤aɓi kukukʰaɲa ajiji kuɓa sisitʰɔkɔtʰɔkɔ jini inɡ̤aɓi naɓum̤lɔpʰɛ nd̤ijitʰijilɛ nd̤ijajikǀɛkisa imitʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ jɛnu and̤ilisɛz̤ɛli iv̤umɓa lɛŋ̤ǃ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤utʰɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kǁa nitʰɛ nand̤iɲusɛla amad̤ini aɲukajɔ nɛminikɛlɔ jɛnu jɔkuɮa akakʰɔlɛki nɔmɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ wɛnu wɔkǁɔlɔ wamatʰɔlɛ atʲɛtʲisiwɛjɔ and̤iwub̤ɛki jisusɛ iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔkɔz̤ɛlɔ jɛɛnɡ̤ɔma z̤akʰɔ nɔkuɓɛtʰa kwɛmixub̤ɛ jakʰɔ and̤ikupʰulapʰuli makuɡ̤alɛlɛkɛ umɡ̤wɛɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amanz̤i nɔɓulunɡ̤isa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmlamɓɔ ɔnɡ̤at͡ʃijɔ imiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ nɛminikɛlɔ jɔkuɮa nanijiz̤isa jini ɛntlanɡ̤ɔ imiɲaka ɛmaʃumi manɛ nɮu kasirajɛli nasuka natʰwala umŋǃuɓa wɔkumkani wɛnu nɔsɛkɔ lwɛmifanɛkisɔ jɛnu inkwɛnkwɛz̤i jɔɔtʰikǁɔ ɓɛnu ɛnaz̤ɛnz̤ɛlajɔ nd̤ija fud̤usɛla kud̤ɛ kɛ nɡ̤apʰaja kwɛd̤amaskɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤utʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ jɛha kɛ aɓatʲɛʃilɛjɔ ɛz̤ijɔn naɓakʰɔlɔsɛ nɡ̤ɛntaɓa jakwasamari aɓad̤umilɛjɔ nɡ̤amaɡ̤ama kwintlaɬɛla jɛɛntlanɡ̤a ɛz̤a kuɓɔ inɮu kasirajɛli wɛlɛlani ɛkalɛnɛ niɓɔnɛ nisukɛ kʰɔna nijɛ ɛhamati ɛnkulu niɬɛ nijɛ ɛɡ̤ati jamafilisti ukuɓa ilunɡ̤ilɛ lɔɔ miz̤i kunɛz̤ikumkani ukuɓa mikʰulu imid̤a jajɔ kunɛmid̤a jɛnu nina ɓaɓa jɔkuɓi ikud̤ɛ ɓasɔnd̤ɛz̤a isiɬalɔ sɔɡ̤ɔɲamɛlɔ ɓalɛlɛ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǃ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɛlwɛni z̤ɛɛmpɔnd̤ɔ z̤ɛɛnɮɔv̤u ɓanaɓɛ ɛmanɮalwɛni jaɓɔ ɓaɮɛ amatakanɛ ɛm̤lamɓini namatʰɔlɛ asɛsitalini ɓapʰɔlɔlɔz̤a kukuɓɛtʰa umxub̤ɛ ɓaz̤ikǀinɡ̤ɛla ukwɛnz̤a iz̤intɔ z̤ɔkuv̤uma nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔd̤av̤id̤ɛ ɓasɛli ɓɛwajini nɡ̤ɛz̤itʲa z̤ɔkut͡ʃiz̤a z̤ɛmiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ɓaz̤itʰamɓisɛ nɡ̤ɛntlaɬɛla jɛɔli ɓanɡ̤aɬaɓɛki kukwapʰuka kukajɔsɛfu nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ɓaja kutʰind͡ʒ̤wa ɓɛmkɛ nɡ̤ɔku kwasɛntlɔkɔ kuɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa ipʰɛlɛ iŋ̤ǁ̤ɔɓɔt͡ʃanɛ jaɓanaɓilɛjɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a iz̤ifunɡ̤ilɛ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi jatʰi lisikiz̤i ikǃʰajija likajakɔɓi nd̤iz̤itʰijilɛ iiŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛ z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤ind̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ nd̤ɔwunikɛla umz̤i nɛnz̤alisɛkɔ jawɔ kuja kutʰi ukuɓa kutʰɛ amad̤ɔd̤a aliʃumi nɮwiniɲɛ afɛ umntu wɔpʰakaɲiswa nɡ̤ujisɛkaz̤i umŋ̤ǀ̤waɓi wakʰɛ ukuɓa awakʰupʰɛ amatʰamɓɔ akʰɛ ɛnɮwini atʰi kɔsɛntla ɛnɮwini kusɛkʰɔ ɔkuwɛ atʰi lɔwɔ akusɛkʰɔ ntɔ wɔtʰi jɛna tʰwiz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa alinɡ̤ɛkʰankaɲwa iɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujaɓɔna ujɛhɔv̤a umtʰɛtʰɔ ɓajiɓɛtʰɛ inɮu ɛnkulu iɓɛ nɡ̤amav̤itʰi nɛnɮu ɛŋǀinanɛ iɓɛ z̤iintand̤a amahaʃɛ ajaɓalɛka pʰɛz̤u kwɛɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa ɓajalima kʰɔna nɡ̤ɛɛnkɔmɔ ukuɓa nikud͡ʒ̤ikɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ ɔkusɛsikwɛni kuɓɛ ɓuɓuɬunɡ̤u nɛsikǃʰamɔ sɔɓulunɡ̤isa siɓɛ nɡ̤um̤lɔɲanɛ ɓav̤ujɛla ɔkunɡ̤ɛlutʰɔ ɓatʰi siz̤ɛnz̤ɛla iimpɔnd̤ɔ nɡ̤awɛtʰu amanɮa kɛ jaɓɔnani nd̤iniv̤usɛla uɬanɡ̤a nɮu kasirajɛli ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛmikʰɔsi luja kunikǁina lutʰaɓatʰɛlɛ ɛkujiwɛni ɛhamati lusɛ ɛsiɬand͡ʒ̤ɛni sɛarab̤a jɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukund̤iɓɔnisa inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a jaɓɔna id̤ala imikǃikɛla jɛɛnkumɓi ɛkukǃalɛkɛni kɔkuɬuma kwɛsiɬaɓanɛ sɔtʲani nasɔ isiɬaɓanɛ ɛsɔ ɛmv̤a kɔkusikɛlwa kɔkumkani iŋ̤ǀ̤a kwatʰi jakuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa ukujiɮa imifunɔ jɛliz̤wɛ nd̤atʰi nkɔsi jɛhɔv̤a kʰawukǁɔlɛlɛ wɔtʰini ujakɔɓi kuɓa mŋǀinanɛ jɛna waz̤ɔɬwaja ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ ɔkɔ akuji kuɓakʰɔ wat͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a jɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukund̤iɓɔnisa inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nant͡sɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a iɓiz̤a umlilɔ ukuɓa jɔɬwajɛ nɡ̤awɔ wawaɡ̤ǃ̤iɓa amanz̤i amaninz̤i ɛnz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓila wasit͡ʃisa isaɬulɔ sɛɬaɓatʰi nd̤atʰi nkɔsi jɛhɔv̤a kʰawujɛkɛ wɔtʰini ujakɔɓi kuɓa mŋǀinanɛ jɛna waz̤ɔɬwaja ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nakɔ ɔkɔ akuji kuɓakʰɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a jɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukund̤iɓɔnisa nant͡sɔ inkɔsi ɛlud̤ɔnɡ̤ɛni ɔlumpuluswa ipʰɛtʰɛ nɡ̤ɛsanɮa ilɔtʰɛ jɔkulunɡ̤ɛlɛlanisa ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi uɓɔna ntɔni amɔsi nd̤atʰi ilɔtʰɛ jɔkulunɡ̤ɛlɛlanisa jatʰi inkɔsi jaɓɔna nd̤iɓɛka ilɔtʰɛ ɛsaz̤ulwini saɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli and̤iji kuɓuja nd̤ipʰind̤ɛ nd̤iɮulɛ kuɓɔ z̤ija kukǀʰitʰwa iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a z̤akwaisakɛ z̤iɓɛnɡ̤amaŋǁuwa iiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤akwasirajɛli nd̤isukɛlɛ pʰɛz̤ulu kwinɮu kajarɔb̤ɛham nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ uamat͡sija umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli wasɛb̤ɛtɛli watʰumɛla kujarɔb̤ɛham wakwasirajɛli ɛsitʰi ukukǀɛɓilɛ uamɔsi ɛsaz̤ulwini sɛnɮu kasirajɛli iliz̤wɛ alinakuwaɲamɛz̤ɛla ɔnkɛ amaz̤wi akʰɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa uamɔsi ut͡ʃɔ ukutʰi uja lik͡xɛlɛ ujarɔb̤ɛham amasirajɛli aja kutʰind͡ʒ̤wa afud̤uswɛ ɛmkɛ ɛliz̤wɛni lawɔ watʰi uamat͡sija kuamɔsi mɓɔni hamɓa uxɔlɛ ujɛ ɛz̤wɛni lakwajud̤a uɮɛ kʰɔna isɔnka sakʰɔ uprɔfɛtɛ kʰɔna kɔd̤wa uz̤ɛ unɡ̤aɓi sapʰind̤a uprɔfɛtɛ ɛb̤ɛtɛli kuɓa jiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ jɔkumkani kʰɔna jinɮu jakɔmkʰulu lɛjɔ wapʰɛnd̤ula uamɔsi watʰi kuamat͡sija and̤imprɔfɛti and̤iɲana wamprɔfɛti nd̤inɡ̤umalusi wɛɛnkɔmɔ nd̤inɡ̤umɓutʰi wɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ɔmtʰɔmɓɛ kuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a wand̤itʰaɓatʰa nd̤isalusa um̤lamɓi ujɛhɔv̤a watʰi jija uprɔfɛtɛ kuɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ liv̤ɛ iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a utʰi wɛna akuji kuprɔfɛta kumasirajɛli akuji ntɛtʰɔ kwinɮu kaisakɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi umfaz̤i wakʰɔ uja kuhɛɲuz̤a pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i ɓawɛ lik͡xɛlɛ ɔɔɲana ɓakʰɔ nɛɛntɔmɓi z̤akʰɔ um̤laɓa wakʰɔ waɓiwɛ nɡ̤ɔlutʲa kɛ wɛna ufɛlɛ ɛm̤laɓɛni ɔjiŋǃamɓi amasirajɛli aja kutʰind͡ʒ̤wa afud̤uswɛ ɛmkɛ ɛliz̤wɛni lawɔ jɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤ɛ ukund̤iɓɔnisa inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nant͡sɔ inɡ̤ɔɓɔz̤i inɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤asɛɬɔtʲɛni jatʰi uɓɔna ntɔni amɔsi nd̤atʰi inɡ̤ɔɓɔz̤i inɛz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤asɛɬɔtʲɛni watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a isipʰɛlɔ siɓafikɛlɛ aɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli and̤iji kuɓuja nd̤ipʰind̤ɛ nd̤iɮulɛ kuɓɔ z̤ija kuɓa kukub̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤a iinɡ̤ɔma z̤ɛtɛmpilɛ nɡ̤alɔɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a z̤ininz̤i iz̤id̤umɓu uz̤ikǃuŋ̤ǃ̤uluz̤isilɛ ɛz̤ind̤awɛni z̤ɔnkɛ tʰwiz̤ɛ jiv̤ani ɔku ɓawaz̤ɔnd̤ajɔ amaɬwɛmpu ukuɓa niɓapʰɛlisɛ aɓaz̤iint͡siz̤ana ɓɛliz̤wɛ nisitʰi kuja kuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa ukutʰwasa kwɛɲanɡ̤a sitʰɛnɡ̤isɛ nɡ̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa ija kuɡ̤ǃ̤itʰa isaɓatʰa siv̤ulɛ iz̤isɛlɛ z̤ɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa ukuz̤ɛ siŋǀipʰisɛ iɛfa sikʰulisɛ iʃɛkɛlɛ siɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰɛ siɓɛ sɛsɔkukʰɔɬisa ukuz̤ɛ siz̤itʰɛnɡ̤ɛ iz̤iswɛli nɡ̤ɛsiliv̤ɛrɛ namaɬwɛmpu nɡ̤ɛɛmɓad̤ad̤a ɛz̤imɓini sitʰɛnɡ̤isɛ nɡ̤ɔmɮunɡ̤u wɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa ulifunɡ̤ilɛ ujɛhɔv̤a ikǃʰajija likajakɔɓi ɛsitʰi iɲanisɔ and̤iji kuz̤iliɓala napʰakad̤ɛ iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ z̤ɔnkɛ aliji kuɡ̤uŋ̤ǃ̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔku iliz̤wɛ ɓɛnz̤ɛ isid͡ʒ̤wili ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmijɔ kulɔ aliji kuɲuka lɔnkɛ lipʰɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmnajilɛ lisukɛ amaɮu liwutʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmnajilɛ wasɛjiputa kɔtʰi nɡ̤alɔɔ it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ilit͡ʃɔnisɛ ilanɡ̤a ɛmini ɛnkulu nd̤ɛnz̤ɛ uɓumɲama ɛɬaɓatʰini nɡ̤ɛmini ɛlisilɛjɔ nd̤ija kujid͡ʒ̤ika imitʰɛnd̤ɛlɛkɔ jɛnu iɓɛ sisid͡ʒ̤wili nɛɛnɡ̤ɔma z̤ɛnu z̤ɔnkɛ z̤iɓɛ sisimɓɔnɔnɔ nd̤iŋǁiɓɛ ɛz̤imɲama z̤ɔkuz̤ila ɛz̤iŋǃɛni z̤ɔnkɛ nd̤ikǀʰɛɓɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iintlɔkɔ nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ kɔnkɛ ɔkɔ kuɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛsid͡ʒ̤wili ɛsɛnz̤ɛlwa ɔkupʰɛla kwamz̤ɛlɛjɔ nɔkupʰɛla kwakɔ kuɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔm̤la ɔk͡xak͡xa jaɓɔnani kuz̤a imiɬa it͡ʃɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a ɛnd̤ija kutʰumɛla ukulamɓa kulɔ iliz̤wɛ kunɡ̤aɓi kukɔ ukulamɓɛla isɔnka kunɡ̤aɓi kukɔ ukuŋǁanɛla amanz̤i kuɓɛ kukulamɓɛla ukuv̤a amaz̤wi kajɛhɔv̤a ɓaja kub̤ad̤ula ɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kɔluɲɛ ulwanɮɛ ɓasɛ kɔluɲɛ ulwanɮɛ ɓɛtʰaɓatʰɛla ɛntla ɓasɛ ɛmpumalanɡ̤a ɓɛtʰʲutʰʲa ɓɛfuna iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɓanɡ̤alifumani nɡ̤alɔɔ uja isid̤uli umtʰind͡ʒ̤ana ɔm̤lɛ nɔmlisɛla liŋǁanɔ ɓɔna aɓɔ ɓafunɡ̤a itʲala lakwasamari ɓatʰi ɛɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ d̤an ɓatʰi iɬɛli nd͡ʒ̤ɛ inɮɛla jasɛb̤ɛrʃɛb̤a ɓɔna ɓaja ɓanɡ̤aɓi sav̤uka nd̤ajiɓɔna inkɔsi nɡ̤asɛsiɓinɡ̤ɛlɛwɛni jatʰi z̤iɓɛtʰɛ iiŋǃanam iɲikimɛ imiɡ̤uɓasi jɔmɲanɡ̤ɔ uz̤ikǃɔɓɛ ɛz̤ɔ z̤intɔ z̤iwɛ ɛntlɔkwɛni jaɓɔ ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla nd̤iɓaɓulalɛ aɓɔkuɡ̤ǃ̤iɓɛla ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ɔsaɓajɔ kuɓɔ akasaji kusind̤a anɡ̤asind̤i nɔkuz̤isind̤isa kuɓɔ ukuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤ɛla ɛlaɓafilɛjɔ sɔɓatʰaɓatʰa nakʰɔna isanɮa nɔkuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓɛɲuka ɓaja ɛz̤ulwini nd̤ɔɓaɬisa nakʰɔna nɔkuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓaz̤imɛla ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jɛkarmɛlɛ nd̤ɔfuna nd̤iɓatʰaɓatʰɛ nalapʰɔ nɔkuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓaz̤isitʰɛlisa pʰamɓi kwamɛɬɔ ɛmaz̤ant͡si ɔlwanɮɛ nd̤ɔjiwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nalapʰɔ iɲɔka iɓalumɛ nɔkuɓa ɓatʰɛ ɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa pʰamɓi kwɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤aɓɔ nd̤ɔliwisɛla umtʰɛtʰɔ nalapʰɔ ik͡xɛlɛ liɓaɓulalɛ nd̤iwamisɛ kuɓɔ amɛɬɔ ukuɓa kuɓɛ kuɓi kunɡ̤alunɡ̤i inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi nɡ̤ulɔpʰatʰa iliz̤wɛ liɲiɓilikɛ ɓɛnz̤ɛ isid͡ʒ̤wili ɓɔnkɛ aɓɛmijɔ kulɔ liɲukɛ lɔnkɛ lipʰɛla nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmnajilɛ liɓujɛ liwutʰɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmnajilɛ wasɛjiputa nɡ̤ulɔwakʰɛla ɛmaz̤ulwini amaɡ̤umɓi akʰɛ apʰɛz̤ulu nɔpʰaɬa lwawɔ alusɛkɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤ulɔɓiz̤a amanz̤i ɔlwanɮɛ awatʰululɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛɬaɓatʰi nɡ̤ujɛhɔv̤a iɡ̤ama lakʰɛ anind͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɔɲana ɓamakuʃi ɲana ɓakasirajɛli ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a and̤iwaɲusanɡ̤a amasirajɛli ɛz̤wɛni lasɛjiputa amafilisti ɛkafɛtɔri amaaram ɛkirɛ jaɓɔnani amɛɬɔ ɛnkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a asɛɓukumkanini ɔɓɔnajɔ nd̤iɓut͡ʃaɓalalisɛ ɓunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ pʰɛz̤u kɔm̤laɓa kɔd̤wa and̤iji kujit͡ʃaɓalalisa ipʰɛlɛ inɮu kajakɔɓi ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓa jaɓɔnani nd̤iwisa umtʰɛtʰɔ nd̤ijiɬunɡ̤ulɛ inɮu kasirajɛli ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni z̤ɔnkɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ kuɬunɡ̤ulwa iŋ̤ǃ̤ɔlɔwa nɡ̤ɛsiɬunɡ̤ulɔ kunɡ̤awi nɔkʰɔz̤ɔ ɛm̤laɓɛni ɓaja nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ ɓɔnkɛ aɓɔni ɓaɓantu ɓam aɓɔ ɓatʰi aɓuji aɓuji kusitʰintɛla uɓuɓi nɡ̤alɔɔ nd̤ija kuwuv̤usa umŋǃuɓa kad̤av̤id̤ɛ lɔwɔ uwilɛjɔ nd̤iz̤iv̤iŋ̤ǀ̤ɛ iintand̤a z̤awɔ nd̤iz̤iv̤usɛ iind̤awɔ z̤awɔ ɛz̤iɡ̤uŋ̤ǁ̤ulwɛjɔ nd̤iwakʰɛ uɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkwɛmiɬa jamand̤ulɔ ukuz̤ɛ ɓawatʰimɓɛ amasalɛla akwaɛd̤ɔm nɛɛntlanɡ̤a z̤ɔnkɛ ɛz̤iɓiz̤wa nɡ̤ɛɡ̤ama ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɔkwɛnz̤ajɔ ɔku jaɓɔnani kuz̤a imiɬa ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a aja kutʰi afumananɛ nɔmv̤uni umkǁɔv̤uli wɛɛd̤ilija afumananɛ nɔm̤lwajɛli wɛmɓɛwu iintaɓa z̤iv̤uz̤ɛ iŋǀind̤i jɛɛd̤ilija nɛɛnd̤uli z̤ɔnkɛ z̤iɲiɓilikɛ nd̤ija kukuɓujisa ukutʰind͡ʒ̤wa kwaɓantu ɓam amasirajɛli ɓajakʰɛ imiz̤i ɛnɡ̤amaŋǁuwa ɓajiɬalɛ ɓatʲalɛ iz̤id̤ilija ɓasɛlɛ iwajini jaz̤ɔ ɓɛnz̤ɛ imijɛz̤ɔ ɓaɮɛ iz̤ikǃʰamɔ z̤ajɔ nd̤ɔɓatʲala ɛm̤laɓɛni waɓɔ ɓanɡ̤aɓi saɲɔtʰulwa ɛm̤laɓɛni waɓɔ ɛnd̤aɓanikajɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ umɓɔnɔ kaɔb̤ad̤ija it͡ʃilɔ inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kwɛlakwaɛd̤ɔm ukutʰi siv̤ɛ ud̤aɓa ɔluv̤ɛla kujɛhɔv̤a kutʰuɲwɛ isiɡ̤id̤imi ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni sɔkutʰi suka nimɛ sisukɛlɛ pʰɛz̤ulu kulɔ silwɛ nalɔ jaɓɔnani nd̤ikwɛnz̤ɛ wamŋǀinanɛ ɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni ud̤ɛlɛkilɛ kakʰulu ukukʰukʰumala kwɛntliz̤ijɔ jakʰɔ kukulukuɬilɛ wɛna uɬɛlijɔ ɛmfantɛni wɛŋ̤ǁ̤ɔnd̤ɔxa ɔkʰaja lipʰɛz̤ulu ɔtʰi ɛntliz̤ijwɛni jakʰɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔja kund̤iɬisɛla ɛɬaɓatʰini ukuɓa utʰɛ wakʰɛla pʰɛz̤ulu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkǁʰalanɡ̤a nɔkuɓa itʰɛ inɮu jakʰɔ jaɓɛkwa pʰakatʰi kwɛɛnkwɛnkwɛz̤i nd̤ɔkuɬisa nalapʰɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukuɓa amasɛla ɛɓɛtʰɛ ɛz̤a kuwɛ ukuɓa amaɲanɡ̤az̤a ɛɓɛtʰɛ ɛz̤a ɛɓusuku haji ukuŋǃuɲulwa kwakʰɔ ɛɓɛnɡ̤aji kuɓa anɛlɛ ukuɓa ɓaɓɛtʰɛ ɓɛz̤a kuwɛ aɓav̤uni ɓɛɛd̤ilija ɓaɓɛnɡ̤aji kuʃija ɔkunɡ̤ab̤ikikǀwajɔ haji ukupʰɛnɡ̤ululɛka kwɛz̤intɔ z̤akwaɛsawu haji ukukʰanukwa kwɛz̤intɔ z̤akʰɛ ɛz̤ikǃʰuʃɛkiwɛjɔ ɔnkɛ amad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛŋǃɔpʰisɛnɛ nawɛ akukʰapʰilɛ ad̤a ɛsa ɛmd̤ɛni akulukuɬilɛ akwɛjisilɛ amad̤ɔd̤a aɓɛkǁɔlɛlɛnɛ nawɛ isɔnka sakʰɔ asɛnz̤ɛ iŋǁɛɓa ɔkulalwa nɡ̤alɔ pʰant͡si kwakʰɔ akukʰɔ kukǃɔnd̤a kujɛ and̤iji kutʰi nɡ̤alɔɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤iz̤it͡ʃaɓalalisɛ iz̤ilumkɔ kwaɛd̤ɔm nɛɛŋ̤ǃ̤ɔnd̤i ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwaɛsawu aja kukǃʰipʰuka umɓilini amaɡ̤ɔxa akʰɔ tɛman ukuz̤ɛ ɓaŋǃaɲulwɛ ɓɔnkɛ ɛz̤intaɓɛni z̤akwaɛsawu nɡ̤ɔkuɓulawa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkumɡ̤ɔɲamɛla kwakʰɔ wakʰɔ ujakɔɓi kuja kukuɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla ukud̤ana uŋǃaɲulwɛ nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛmini ɔwaɓumi malunɡ̤a najɛ aɓasɛmz̤ini ɓatʰimɓa uɓutʲɛɓi ɓakʰɛ aɓɔluɲɛ uɬanɡ̤a ɓɛz̤a ɛmasanɡ̤wɛni akʰɛ ɓajɛnz̤ɛla amakǃaʃisɔ ijɛrusalɛm nawɛ wawund͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɲɛ waɓɔ musa ukukʰanɡ̤ɛla jɔmninawa wakʰɔ nɡ̤ɛmini jɛʃwanɡ̤uʃa lakʰɛ unɡ̤aɓav̤ujɛlɛli ɔɔɲana ɓakajud̤a nɡ̤ɛmini jɛŋ̰ǁ̰walɛkɔ jaɓɔ unɡ̤asinɛki nɡ̤ɛmini jɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ musa ukunɡ̤ɛna ɛsanɡ̤wɛni laɓantu ɓam nɡ̤ɛmini jɛʃwanɡ̤uʃa laɓɔ unɡ̤akʰanɡ̤ɛli nawɛ ɛɓuɓini ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛmini jɛʃwanɡ̤uʃa laɓɔ unɡ̤asi sanɮa ɛɓutʲɛɓini ɓaɓɔ nɡ̤ɛmini jɛʃwanɡ̤uʃa laɓɔ musa ɛkwaɬukanɛni kwɛɛnɮɛla ukuz̤ɛ uŋǃumlɛ aɓasaɓajɔ ɓakuɓɔ unɡ̤aɓanikɛli aɓasɛlɛjɔ ɓakuɓɔ nɡ̤ɛmini jɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa isɔnd̤ɛlɛ kajɛhɔv̤a kuz̤ɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ wɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤akɔ kuja kwɛnd͡ʒ̤iwa nd͡ʒ̤alɔ kuwɛ ɔkwɛnz̤ilɛjɔ kuja kuɓujɛla ɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ nisɛlɛ nɡ̤akɔ ɛntaɓɛni jam ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ z̤ija kuɬala z̤isɛla nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤alɔ z̤ɔnkɛ iintlanɡ̤a z̤isɛlɛ z̤iɓiz̤ɛlɛ z̤iɓɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤aɓanɡ̤aɓanɡ̤akʰɔ kɛ ɛntaɓɛni jɛz̤ijɔn kuja kuɓakʰɔ ɔkusind̤ilɛjɔ kuɓɛ jiŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ inɮu kajakɔɓi iz̤iɬutʰɛ iind̤awɔ ɛjaz̤iɬutʰwajɔ inɮu kajakɔɓi ija kuɓa nɡ̤umlilɔ nɛnɮu kajɔsɛfu iɓɛ lilanɡ̤atʲɛ inɮu kaɛsawu iɓɛ z̤iind̤iz̤a ɓat͡ʃisɛ pʰakatʰi kwaɓɔ ɓaɓaɮɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ usalajɔ wasɛnɮwini kaɛsawu nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ujɛhɔv̤a utʰɛtʰilɛ aɓakwɛlasɛz̤ant͡si ɓɔz̤itʰimɓa iintaɓa z̤akwaɛsawu naɓasɛz̤itʰaɓaz̤ini ɓaɬutʰɛ amafilisti ɓaɬutʰɛ sakwaɛfrajim nɛsisimi sakwasamari ub̤ɛnd͡ʒ̤amin aɬutʰɛ ɛlasɛɡ̤ilijad̤i aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa ɓakulɛ jɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli ɓaja kuɓaɬutʰa aɓanɡ̤amakanan ɓad̤ɛ ɓasɛ ɛt͡sarɛfa aɓatʰind͡ʒ̤wa ɓasɛjɛrusalɛm aɓasɛsɛfarad̤i ɓaɬutʰɛ imiz̤i jɛlasɛz̤ant͡si kɔɲuka aɓasind̤isi ɛntaɓɛni jɛz̤ijɔn ukuz̤ɛ ɓaz̤iɡ̤wɛɓɛ iintaɓa z̤akwaɛsawu uɓukumkani ɓuɓɛ ɓɔɓu kajɛhɔv̤a kɛ kalɔku iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɔna uɲana kaamitaji lisitʰi suk umɛ ujɛ ɛninɛv̤ɛ kulɔɔ mz̤i mkʰulu umɛmɛz̤ɛ nɡ̤awɔ kuɓa iind̤awɔ z̤awɔ ɛz̤imɓi z̤iɲukilɛ z̤ɛz̤a pʰamɓi wɛsuka ujɔna ɛɓalɛkɛla ɛtarʃiʃɛ ɛmka ɛɓuswɛni ɓukajɛhɔv̤a wɛɬa kɛ waja ɛjafɔ nɛŋǃanawa ɛja ɛtarʃiʃɛ wajixɔla iŋ̤ǃ̤ɛʃɔ jajɔ wɛɬa wanɡ̤ɛna kujɔ ukuz̤ɛ ajɛ naɓɔ ɛtarʃiʃɛ ɛmkɛ ɛɓuswɛni ɓukajɛhɔv̤a kɛ ujɛhɔv̤a waɡ̤alɛlɛkisa umɔja ɔmkʰulu ɛlwanɮɛ kwaɓakʰɔ umɔja ɔmkʰulu ɔv̤utʰuz̤ajɔ ɛlwanɮɛ iŋǃanawa lɛjɔ janɡ̤a iz̤a kwapʰuka ɓɔjika ɔɔmatɛlɔʃɛ ɓakʰala ɛlɔwɔ kutʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ ɓajid͡ʒ̤ulɛla ɛlwanɮɛ impaɬa ɛɓisɛŋǃanawɛni ukuz̤ipʰunɡ̤ulɛla ɓɔna ujɔna kɛ wajɛɬɛ waja ɛz̤ant͡si ɛŋǃanawɛni wasind̤wa ɓuɓutʰɔnɡ̤ɔ wasɔnd̤ɛla kujɛ umpʰatʰi waɓab̤ɛkǃi watʰi kujɛ wɛnz̤ani tʰɔnɡ̤ɔxand̤ini v̤uka uɓiz̤ɛ kutʰikǁɔ wakʰɔ m̤lawumɓi utʰikǁɔ anɡ̤asikʰumɓula sinɡ̤ab̤ub̤i ɓatʰi ɔmɲɛ kɔmɲɛ jiz̤ani sɛnz̤ɛ amakǃaʃisɔ saz̤i ukuɓa kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa kaɓani ukuɓa siɓɛ nɔɓu ɓuɓi ɓɛnz̤a amakǃaʃisɔ ikǃaʃisɔ lapʰuma nɔjɔna ɓatʰi kujɛ kʰawusikǁɛlɛlɛ kunɡ̤ɛŋǁa kaɓani ukuɓa siɓɛ nɔɓu ɓuɓi ujintɔni umsɛɓɛnz̤i wakʰɔ uv̤ɛla pʰi lipʰi iliz̤wɛ lakɔwɛnu unɡ̤ɔwaɓapʰi aɓantu watʰi kuɓɔ nd̤inɡ̤um̤ɛb̤ɛrɛ nd̤ijamɔjika ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wamaz̤ulu ɔwɛnz̤a ulwanɮɛ nɔm̤laɓa lɔ wɔmilɛjɔ ɔjika amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ nɡ̤ɔlɔjikɔ ɔlukʰulu atʰi kujɛ jintɔni lɛ ujɛnz̤ilɛjɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa amad̤ɔd̤a lawɔ ajɛsaz̤i ukuɓa uɓalɛka ɛmka ɛɓuswɛni ɓukajɛhɔv̤a kuɓa wajɛwakǁɛlɛlɛ atʰi kujɛ masɛnz̤ɛ ntɔni kuwɛ ukuz̤ɛ ulwanɮɛ lud̤amɓɛ lusijɛkɛ kuɓa ulwanɮɛ ɓɛlusija watʰi kuwɔ nd̤ifuŋǃulɛni nind̤id͡ʒ̤ulɛlɛ ɛlwanɮɛ lud̤amɓɛ ulwanɮɛ lunijɛkɛ kuɓa nd̤ijaz̤i ukuɓa lɔ mɔja mkʰulu uv̤utʰuz̤ajɔ upʰɛz̤u kwɛnu unɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam atʰʲud̤isa ɛmaz̤ɛni amad̤ɔd̤a ɛz̤ama ukujiɓujisɛla ɛm̤laɓɛni ɔwɔmilɛjɔ iŋǃanawa akʰɔɬwa kuɓa ulwanɮɛ lwaja pʰɛz̤u kwaz̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ aŋǃula ujɛhɔv̤a atʰi ɡ̤ǁ̤ɛɓɛ jɛhɔv̤a masinɡ̤afi masinɡ̤afi nɡ̤ɔmpʰɛfumlɔ walɛ nd̤ɔd̤a unɡ̤aliɓɛki pʰɛz̤u kwɛtʰu iɡ̤az̤i ɛlimsulwa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wɛna jɛhɔv̤a wɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkutʰand̤a kwakʰɔ amfuŋǃula kɛ ujɔna amd͡ʒ̤ulɛla ɛlwanɮɛ lwaz̤ɔla ulwanɮɛ lwakujɛka ukud͡ʒ̤ala kwalɔ amad̤ɔd̤a amɔjika ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔlɔjikɔ ɔlukʰulu aɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla kujɛhɔv̤a umɓinɡ̤ɛlɛlɔ ab̤amɓatʰisa iz̤ib̤amɓatʰisɔ ujɛhɔv̤a wamisɛla intlanz̤i ɛnkulu ukuɓa imɡ̤iɲɛ ujɔna ujɔna waɓa sɛmɓilinini wɛntlanz̤i ɛz̤intatʰu nɔɓusuku ɔɓutʰatʰu ujɔna watʰand̤az̤a kujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ ɛmɓilinini wɛntlanz̤i watʰi nd̤akʰala kujɛhɔv̤a nd̤isɛmɓand̤ɛz̤ɛlwɛni wand̤ipʰɛnd̤ula nd̤az̤iɓika nd̤isɛsiswini sɛlaɓafilɛjɔ waliv̤a wɛna iliz̤wi nɡ̤ɔkuɓa wawund̤ipʰɔsa ɛnz̤ulwini ɛmɓilinini jɛɛlwanɮɛ umlamɓɔ waɓa nɡ̤ɛɛŋǁa z̤ɔnkɛ aɮula pʰɛz̤u ɔnkɛ amaz̤a akʰɔ alwajɔ namaz̤a akʰɔ aɡ̤uɡ̤umajɔ nd̤atʰi kɛ nd̤iɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰiwɛ pʰamɓi kwamɛɬɔ akʰɔ nɔkɔ kɛ nd̤ija kuɓuja nd̤ib̤ɛkɛ ɛtɛmpilɛni jakʰɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ and̤ixawula amanz̤i ad̤a ɛz̤a ɛmpʰɛfumlwɛni and̤id͡ʒ̤ikɛlɛz̤a amanz̤i ɛnz̤ɔnz̤ɔɓila iŋ̤ǀ̤a jɔlwanɮɛ jajitʰi d͡ʒ̤iz̤ɛ intlɔkɔ jam nd̤ɛɬa nd̤aja ɛz̤ikʰɔnd̤wɛni z̤ɛɛntaɓa lɔna iɬaɓatʰi imiv̤alɔ jalɔ jand̤iv̤alɛla nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ wasuka waɓuɲusa ɛm̤ad̤ini uɓɔmi ɓam jɛhɔv̤a tʰikǁɔ ɛkutʰʲafɛni kɔmpʰɛfumlɔ nɡ̤apʰakatʰi nd̤akʰumɓula ujɛhɔv̤a wafika kuwɛ umtʰand̤az̤ɔ ɛtɛmpilɛni jakʰɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ aɓaɡ̤ǀ̤inɛ amampunɡ̤ɛ anɡ̤ɛntɔ jantɔ ɓaʃija iŋǀɛɓa jaɓɔ kɛ nd̤ija kuɓinɡ̤ɛlɛla kuwɛ nd̤inɛz̤wi lɔkuɓulɛla ɛnd̤akub̤amɓatʰisajɔ nd̤ija kukuz̤alisa usind̤isɔ lukujɛhɔv̤a ujɛhɔv̤a watʰɛtʰa nɛntlanz̤i jam̤lanz̤ɛla ujɔna ɛm̤laɓɛni ɔwɔmilɛjɔ kwafika iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kujɔna ɔkwɛsiɓini lisitʰi suk umɛ ujɛ ɛninɛv̤ɛ kulɔɔ mz̤i mkʰulu umɛmɛz̤ɛ nɡ̤awɔ umɛmɛz̤ɔ ɛnd̤itʰɛtʰa lɔna kuwɛ wɛsuka kɛ ujɔna waja ɛninɛv̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkwɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a kɛ kalɔku ininɛv̤ɛ iɓinɡ̤umz̤i ɔmkʰulu kutʰikǁɔ iluhamɓɔ lwɛɛnt͡suku ɛz̤intatʰu ujɔna wakǃala wanɡ̤ɛna kulɔɔ mz̤i uhamɓɔ lɔsuku ɔluɲɛ wamɛmɛz̤a watʰi z̤isaja kuɓa z̤iint͡suku ɛz̤imaʃumi manɛ ininɛv̤ɛ ib̤ukukǃwɛ amad̤ɔd̤a asɛninɛv̤ɛ akʰɔlwa kutʰikǁɔ amɛma uz̤ilɔ amɓatʰa ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ ɛtʰaɓatʰɛla kwaɓakʰulu ɓawɔ ɛsa kwaɓaŋǀinanɛ ɓawɔ lafika iliz̤wi ɛlɔ wasɛninɛv̤ɛ wɛsuka ɛtrɔnɛni jakʰɛ wajisusa wajiɓɛka pʰant͡si inɡ̤uɓɔ jakʰɛ ɛnd̤ɛ waz̤iɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛla nɡ̤ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ waɬala pʰant͡si ɛlutʰutʰwini watʰi makud̤and̤ulukwɛ kut͡ʃiwɔ ɛninɛv̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔmtʰɛtʰɔ wɔkumkani nɛz̤ikʰulu z̤akʰɛ ukutʰi umntu nɛmpaɬa ɛnkulu iinkɔmɔ nɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ maz̤inɡ̤ɛv̤i nɛntɔ maz̤inɡ̤aɮi maz̤inɡ̤asɛli namanz̤i maz̤ɛ az̤iɡ̤uɓunɡ̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤ɛz̤ixwɛkǁajɔ nɛmpaɬa ɛnkulu akʰalɛ kutʰikǁɔ nɡ̤ɔkunamanɮa aɓujɛ ɛlɔwɔ ɛnɮɛlɛni jakʰɛ ɛmɓi ɛluɡ̤ɔɲamɛlwɛni ɔlusɛz̤anɮɛni z̤akʰɛ nɡ̤uɓani ɔwaz̤ijɔ ukuɓa akanɡ̤ɛɓuji az̤ɔɬwajɛ utʰikǁɔ aɓujɛ ɛkuv̤utʰɛni kɔmsind̤ɔ wakʰɛ ukuz̤ɛ sinɡ̤ab̤ub̤i utʰikǁɔ waz̤iɓɔna iz̤ɛnz̤ɔ z̤aɓɔ ukuɓa ɓaɓujilɛ ɛz̤inɮɛlɛni z̤aɓɔ ɛz̤imɓi utʰikǁɔ waz̤ɔɬwaja nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi aɓɛtʰɛ uja kuɓɛnz̤a kuɓɔ akaɓɛnz̤a kwaɓa kuɓi kujɔna kakʰulu wav̤utʰa nɡ̤umsind̤ɔ watʰand̤az̤a kujɛhɔv̤a watʰi kǀamaɡ̤u jɛhɔv̤a laɓɛ linɡ̤ɛlilɔ iliz̤wi ɛli nd̤isɛsɛm̤laɓɛni wakɔwɛtʰu nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkɔ nd̤apʰanɡ̤a nɡ̤ɔkuɓalɛkɛla ɛtarʃiʃɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nd̤and̤isaz̤i ukuɓa unɡ̤utʰikǁɔ ɔɓaɓalajɔ ɔnɛmfɛsanɛ ɔz̤ɛka kad̤ɛ umsind̤ɔ ɔnɛŋǀɛɓa ɛnkulu ɔz̤ɔɬwajajɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuɓi kɛ nɡ̤ɔku jɛhɔv̤a sɛluwutʰaɓatʰa umpʰɛfumlɔ kuɓa kulunɡ̤ilɛ kunɔkuɓa nd̤iɮɛ uɓɔmi watʰi ujɛhɔv̤a ujalunɡ̤isa ukutʰi ɔku uv̤utʰɛ nɡ̤umsind̤ɔ wapʰuma kɛ ujɔna kuwɔ umz̤i waɬala nɡ̤asɛmpumalanɡ̤a kuwɔ umz̤i waz̤ɛnz̤ɛla kʰɔna umŋǃuɓa waɬala nɡ̤apʰant͡si kwawɔ ɛmtʰunz̤ini ukuz̤ɛ ad̤ɛ aɓɔnɛ ukuɓa kuja kutʰɛkani kuwɔ umz̤i ujɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wammisɛla um̤lav̤utʰwa wapʰuma wɛɲuka waɓa pʰɛz̤u kɔjɔna ukuɓa uɓɛ nɡ̤umtʰunz̤i ɛntlɔkwɛni jakʰɛ um̤lanɡ̤ulɛ ɛɓuɓini ɓakʰɛ wawuv̤ujɛla ujɔna um̤lav̤utʰwa lɔwɔ wawuv̤ujɛla kakʰulu utʰikǁɔ wamisɛla intlav̤a ukutʰi kǃʰipʰu kɔkusa nɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ jaɓɛtʰa um̤lav̤utʰwa lɔwɔ wɔma kwatʰi ɛkupʰumɛni kwɛlanɡ̤a utʰikǁɔ wamisɛla ulɔpʰu lwasɛmpumalanɡ̤a ilanɡ̤a laɓɛtʰa kujɔna ɛntlɔkɔ isid̤uli wawukǀɛlɛla umpʰɛfumlɔ wakʰɛ watʰi kulunɡ̤ilɛ kunɔkuɓa nd̤iɮɛ uɓɔmi watʰi utʰikǁɔ kujɔna ujalunɡ̤isa ukutʰi ɔku uv̤utʰɛ nɡ̤umsind̤ɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔm̤lav̤utʰwa watʰi nd̤ijalunɡ̤isa ukutʰi nd̤iv̤utʰɛ nɡ̤umsind̤ɔ kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛkufɛni watʰi utʰikǁɔ wɛna unɛŋǀɛɓa nɡ̤ɔm̤lav̤utʰwa ɔnɡ̤aɓulalɛkanɡ̤a nɡ̤uwɔ ɔnɡ̤awuɬumisanɡ̤a ɔkʰulɛ nɡ̤ɔɓusuku wad̤aka nɡ̤ɔɓusuku nd̤inɡ̤aɓi naŋǀɛɓa kɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛninɛv̤ɛ lɔɔ mz̤i mkʰulu unaɓantu aɓanɡ̤apʰɛz̤u kwɛkʰulu ɛlinamaŋǀi maɓini aɓanɡ̤akwaz̤ijɔ ukunɛnɛ kwaɓɔ kwikʰɔɬɔ laɓɔ kwanɛmpaɬa ɛnkulu ɛninz̤i iliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɛlafika kumika wasɛmɔrɛʃɛtɛ nɡ̤ɛmiɬa kajɔtam kaahaz̤i kahɛz̤ɛkija ɔɔkumkani ɓakwajud̤a awaliɓɔnajɔ nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kwɛlakwasamari nɛjɛrusalɛm jiv̤ani nɔnkɛ z̤iz̤wɛ nipʰɛla ɓaz̤ani inɮɛɓɛ ɬaɓatʰi nɛnz̤alisɛkɔ jalɔ majiɓɛ liŋ̤ǃ̤ina inkɔsi ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ani inkɔsi ɛtɛmpilɛni jajɔ ɛŋ̤ǀ̤wɛlɛ kuɓa nankɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛpʰuma ɛnd̤awɛni jakʰɛ ɛja kuɬa aɲatʰɛlɛ pʰɛz̤u kwɛmimanɡ̤ɔ jɛɬaɓatʰi z̤ija kuɲiɓilika iintaɓa pʰant͡si kwakʰɛ z̤ikǀand̤ɛkɛ iz̤iɬamɓɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmtʰwɛɓɛɓa pʰamɓi kɔmlilɔ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amanz̤i ɛpʰalaz̤wɛ ɛkǁand̤ɛkɛni kɔnkɛ ɔkɔ kunɡ̤ɛsik͡xɛkǃɔ sakwajakɔɓi kunɡ̤ɛsɔnɔ sɛnɮu kasirajɛli nɡ̤uɓani ɔɓanɡ̤ɛ isik͡xɛkǃɔ sakwajakɔɓi asinɡ̤ɔwakwasamari nɡ̤uɓani ɔɓanɡ̤ɛ iz̤iɡ̤anɡ̤a z̤akwajud̤a asinɡ̤ɔwasɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ nd̤ɔlɛnz̤a ɛlakwasamari liɓɛ jimfumɓa jamatʲɛ ɛsisimi liɓɛ z̤iind̤awɔ z̤ɔkutʲala imid̤ilija nd̤iwapʰɔsɛ amatʲɛ alɔ ɛmfulɛni nd̤iz̤itʰʲilɛ iz̤isɛkɔ z̤alɔ ija kukǃɔtʲwa jɔnkɛ imifanɛkisɔ jalɔ ɛkǃiŋ̤ǃ̤iwɛjɔ lut͡ʃiswɛ nɡ̤ɔmlilɔ lɔnkɛ ut͡ʃɛkǃɔ lwalɔ nd̤iz̤ikǀʰitʰɛ z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤itʰikǁɔ z̤alɔ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa liz̤iɓutʰɛ nɡ̤ɔt͡ʃɛkǃɔ lwɛhɛɲukaz̤i z̤ija kuɓuja kɛ z̤iɓɛ lut͡ʃɛkǃɔ lwɛhɛɲukaz̤i nɡ̤ɔkɔ kɛ nd̤ija kumɓamɓaz̤ɛla nd̤ib̤ɔmɓɔlɔz̤ɛ nd̤ija kuhamɓa nd̤iɬuɲulwɛ nd̤iʃijwɛ nd̤iz̤ɛ nd̤ija kukʰala nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmpunɡ̤utʲɛ nd̤ililɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛŋǀiniɓa kuɓa amaŋǁɛɓa alɔ akanakuɲanɡ̤wa nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kud̤ɛ nakwajud̤a kwad̤a ɛsanɡ̤wɛni laɓantu ɓam ɛjɛrusalɛm musani ukukukǁɛla ɛɡ̤ati nɔkulila ɛb̤ɛtɛlɛafra nd̤iz̤iɡ̤alɛlɛ nɡ̤ɔtʰuli ɮulani ɓɛmi ɓasɛʃafirɛ nihamɓɛ z̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuliɬaz̤ɔ aɓɛmi ɓasɛt͡sanan aɓapʰumanɡ̤a umɓamɓaz̤ɛlɔ lwasɛb̤ɛtɛɛt͡sɛlɛ luniɬutʰa kwɛnu kujɔ kuɓa aɓɛmi ɓasɛmarɔti ɓaz̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤a nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ kuɓa kuɬɛ uɓuɓi ɓupʰuma kujɛhɔv̤a ɓɛz̤a ɛsanɡ̤wɛni lɛjɛrusalɛm ɓɔpʰani iimɓalɛki ɛz̤iŋǃwɛlwɛni z̤ɔkulwa ɓɛmi ɓasɛlakiʃɛ iɓikukukǃala kwɛsɔnɔ ɛntɔmɓini ɛnɡ̤uz̤ijɔn ukutʰi z̤ifuɲanwɛ kujɔ iz̤ik͡xɛkǃɔ z̤akwasirajɛli nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ uja kujinika imɔrɛʃɛtɛ jasɛɡ̤ati iŋǃakwɛ iz̤inɮu z̤asɛakɛz̤ib̤i z̤ija kuɓa nɡ̤umlamɓɔ ɔkʰɔɬisajɔ kɔɔkumkani ɓakwasirajɛli nd̤isaja kujiz̤isa inɮalifa ɓɛmi ɓasɛmarɛʃa ɓaja ɛad̤ulam aɓaz̤ukilɛjɔ ɓakwasirajɛli kǀʰɛɓani niz̤iɡ̤ujɛ iintlɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɔɲana ɓɛz̤ijɔlɔ z̤ɛnu kwɛnz̤ɛni ɓanz̤i ukukǀʰɛɓa kwɛnu nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛkǁʰalanɡ̤a kuɓa ɓatʰind͡ʒ̤iwɛ kuwɛ atʰi kɛ aɓɔ ɓakǀinɡ̤a uɓut͡ʃinɡ̤a ɓasɛɓɛnz̤ɛ uɓuɓi ɛz̤ililini z̤aɓɔ aɓatʰi ɛkukʰaɲɛni kwɛnɡ̤ɔmsɔ ɓaɓɛnz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa isanɮa saɓɔ sinɡ̤utʰikǁɔ waɓɔ ɓaŋǃwɛnɛla ɓawaɬutʰɛ kwanɛz̤inɮu ɓaz̤itʰaɓatʰɛ ɓakǀud̤isa umfɔ nɛnɮu jakʰɛ ind̤ɔd̤a nɛlifa lajɔ nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ukutʰi jaɓɔnani nd̤ikǀinɡ̤a uɓuɓi nɡ̤alɛ miz̤alwanɛ ɛninɡ̤aji kuz̤ixɔla iintamɔ z̤ɛnu kuɓɔ ninɡ̤ahamɓi nikǃʰaŋ̰ǃ̰alaz̤a kuɓa likǁɛʃa lɔɓuɓi nɡ̤alɔɔ kuja kwɛnz̤iwa umz̤ɛkɛlisɔ nɡ̤ani ɓamɛmɛ isimɛma kutʰiwɛ kwɛnz̤ɛkilɛ sib̤ukǃiwɛ sab̤ukǃwa isaɬulɔ saɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu usananisilɛ haji kwakʰɛ ɛtʰu uwaɓɛla amapʰamɓa nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ akuji kuɓa najɛ ɔkupʰɔsɛla ulutʲa kwikǃaʃisɔ ɛɓanɮɛni likajɛhɔv̤a ɓatʰi musani intɛtʰɔ ɓɛwisa intɛtʰɔ ukuɓa aɓatʰɛ ɓawisa intɛtʰɔ kuɓɔ aɓɔ akaji kuɓuja umv̤a amaɬaz̤ɔ wɛna kutʰiwa ujinɮu kajakɔɓi ujaz̤ɛkanɛka umɔja kajɛhɔv̤a kukwɛnz̤a kwakʰɛ ɔku akalunɡ̤isi amaz̤wi kɔhamɓa nɡ̤ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ iz̤ɔlɔ ɛli aɓantu ɓam ɓasukɛ nɡ̤ɔkɔt͡ʃaɓa niɓaɬuɓa inɡ̤uɓɔ ɛnd̤ɛ jɔkwalɛka kwɛnɡ̤apʰant͡si aɓaɮula ɓɛkʰɔlɔsilɛ ɓɛnɡ̤atʰand̤i aɓafaz̤i ɓaɓantu ɓam nijaɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰa ɛz̤inɮwini z̤ɛz̤ijɔlɔ z̤aɓɔ ɛɓantwanɛni ɓaɓɔ niz̤itʰaɓatʰilɛ iz̤iv̤atʰɔ z̤am nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ sukani nihamɓɛ kuɓa asijijɔ ind̤awɔ jɔkupʰumla kwɛnu lɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔɓuŋǃamɓi ɓajɔ ɔɓɔnakalisajɔ ɔɓɔnakalisajɔ kakʰulu ukuɓa ɓɛkukʰɔ ɔhamɓa nɔmɔja ɛkǁɔkisa nɡ̤amanɡ̤a ɛsitʰi nd̤ija intɛtʰɔ kuwɛ nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kwiwajini nakwisisɛlɔ ɛsiŋǁilisajɔ uɓɛja kuɓa nɡ̤umwisintɛtʰɔ kwaɓa ɓantu nd̤ija kukuɬanɡ̤anisa ɔkunɛnɛ jakɔɓi upʰɛla ɔkunɛnɛ nd̤ija kuwaɓutʰa amasalɛla akwasirajɛli nd̤ija kuɓɛnz̤a ɓaɓɛ ɓaɲɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛmpaɬa ɛmfut͡ʃanɛ jasɛb̤ɔt͡sɛra nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔm̤lamɓi ɔpʰakatʰi kwɛɮɛlɔ lawɔ ɓaja kukǁɔkɔz̤ɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa ɓaninz̤i kwaɓantu uɲukɛ pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ umɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤i ɓajaɡ̤ǃ̤ɔb̤ɔz̤a ɓajanɡ̤ɛna ɛsanɡ̤wɛni ɓajapʰuma kwanɡ̤alɔ waɓɔ uhamɓa pʰamɓi kwaɓɔ ujɛhɔv̤a ɛsɛntlɔkɔ kuɓɔ nd̤atʰi kʰaniv̤ɛ z̤intlɔkɔ z̤akwajakɔɓi ɓapʰatʰi ɓɛnɮu kasirajɛli asikɔkwɛnu ukukwaz̤i ɔkusɛsikwɛni ɓatʰiji ɓɔkulunɡ̤ilɛjɔ ɓatʰand̤i ɓɔkuɓi ɓaɬinz̤i ɓɔlusu lwaɓantu nɛɲama jaɓɔ ɛmatʰand͡ʒ̤ɛni aɓɔ ɓajiɮilɛjɔ iɲama jaɓantu ɓam ɓalɔɓula iwaɓɔ ɓawapʰula amatʰamɓɔ aɓɔ ɓawakǁʰakǁʰa nɡ̤atʰi nɡ̤awɛmɓiz̤a nɡ̤atʰi jiɲama kuŋ̤ǁ̤awu ɓaja kwand̤ula ɓakʰalɛ kujɛhɔv̤a anɡ̤aɓapʰɛnd̤uli asukɛ aɓusitʰɛlisɛ uɓusɔ ɓakʰɛ kuɓɔ nɡ̤ɛlɔ kǁɛʃa nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔkɔ ɓaz̤ɛnz̤ɛ z̤amɓi iintlɔnd̤i z̤aɓɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nɡ̤ɔkusinɡ̤isɛlɛ kuɓaprɔfɛti aɓaɓand̤wɛnd̤wisajɔ aɓantu ɓakɔwɛtʰu aɓatʰi kǁa ɓanɔkuɬafunwajɔ ɓaz̤ɛ ɓamɛmɛz̤ɛ ukǁɔlɔ ɓatʰi ɔsukuɓa ɛnɡ̤afaki ntɔ ɛmlɔɲɛni waɓɔ ɓamŋ̤ǀ̤walisɛlɛ imfaz̤wɛ ukutʰi nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ nija kuɓa nɔɓusuku ipʰutʰɛ imiɓɔnɔ niɓɛ nɔɓumɲama kupʰutʰɛ ukuv̤umisa lit͡ʃɔnɛ ilanɡ̤a kuɓaprɔfɛti iɓɛ mɲama kuɓɔ z̤ija kud̤ana iimɓɔni ɓaɓɛ nɛɛntlɔni aɓav̤umisi ɓaz̤iɡ̤ǃ̤uɓutʰɛlɛ iind̤ɛv̤u ɓɔnkɛ ɓɛpʰɛla nɡ̤ɔkuɓa kunɡ̤ɛkʰɔ mpɛnd̤ulɔ katʰikǁɔ kɛ nd̤iz̤ɛlɛ nɡ̤amanɮa nɡ̤ɔmɔja kajɛhɔv̤a nd̤iz̤ɛlɛ kɔkusɛsikwɛni nɔɓuɡ̤ɔra ukuz̤ɛ nd̤imkǁɛlɛlɛ ujakɔɓi uk͡xɛkǃɔ lwakʰɛ usirajɛli isɔnɔ sakʰɛ kʰaniv̤ɛ ɔku z̤intlɔkɔ z̤ɛnɮu kajakɔɓi ɓapʰatʰi ɓɛnɮu kasirajɛli aɓakwɛnz̤a amasikiz̤i ɔkusɛsikwɛni ɓakud͡ʒ̤ikad͡ʒ̤ikɛ kɔnkɛ ɔkutʰɛ tʲɛ aɓajakʰa iz̤ijɔn nɡ̤amaɡ̤az̤i nɛjɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔɓuɡ̤ǃ̤wɛtʰa iintlɔkɔ z̤ajɔ z̤iɡ̤wɛɓa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛsikǀɛnɡ̤ɔ naɓaɓinɡ̤ɛlɛli ɓajɔ ɓajajala nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɔmv̤uz̤ɔ naɓaprɔfɛti ɓajɔ ɓav̤umisa nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛmali ɓaz̤ɛ ɓajamɛ nɡ̤ɔjɛhɔv̤a ɓɛsitʰi ujɛhɔv̤a akapʰakatʰi kwɛtʰu jini asiji kuz̤ɛlwa ɓuɓi nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jɛnu ija kuliɲwa iz̤ijɔn iɓɛ jint͡simi ijɛrusalɛm iɓɛ jimiwɛwɛ intaɓa jajɔ inɮu iɓɛ jimimanɡ̤ɔ jɛɬatʰi kɛ kalɔku ɛkupʰɛlɛni kwɛmiɬa intaɓa jɛnɮu kajɛhɔv̤a ija kuz̤inz̤a ɛŋǀɔt͡ʃɛni jaz̤ɔ iintaɓa jɔna iz̤ipʰakamɛlɛ iind̤uli z̤iɓɛ nɡ̤umsinɡ̤a iz̤iz̤wɛ ukuja kujɔ z̤ija kuɓamɓa iintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤ininz̤i z̤itʰi hamɓani siɲukɛ sijɛ ɛntaɓɛni kajɛhɔv̤a ɛnɮwini jɔtʰikǁɔ kajakɔɓi ukuz̤ɛ asijalɛlɛ iinɮɛla z̤akʰɛ sihamɓɛ nɡ̤ɔmɛnd̤ɔ wakʰɛ kuɓa uja kupʰuma ɛz̤ijɔn umjalɛlɔ nɛliz̤wi likajɛhɔv̤a ɛjɛrusalɛm uja kuɡ̤wɛɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤ininz̤i ɔɬwajɛ iintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤inamanɮa ad̤ɛ asɛ kud̤ɛ z̤iwakʰand̤ɛ amak͡xɛlɛ az̤ɔ aɓɛ nɡ̤amakʰuɓa nɛz̤ikʰali z̤az̤ɔ z̤iɓɛ z̤iz̤it͡ʃɛt͡ʃɛ z̤ɔkutʰɛna imid̤ilija uɬanɡ̤a aluji kupʰakamisɛla kuɬanɡ̤a ik͡xɛlɛ lalɔ ɓanɡ̤aɓi safund̤a ɓaja kuɬala ɛlɔwɔ pʰant͡si kɔmd̤ilija wakʰɛ napʰant͡si kɔmkʰiwanɛ wakʰɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ uɓɔjikisajɔ kuɓa umlɔmɔ kajɛhɔv̤a wɛmikʰɔsi utʰɛtʰilɛ kuɓa z̤ɔnkɛ iz̤iz̤wɛ z̤ihamɓa sɔna ɛsɔ ɛɡ̤amɛni lɔtʰikǁɔ wasɔ tʰina kɛ sihamɓa ɛɡ̤amɛni likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wɛtʰu nɡ̤ɔnapʰakad̤ɛ kanapʰakad̤ɛ nɡ̤ajɔ lɔɔ ut͡ʃɔ ujɛhɔv̤a nd̤ija kuɓaɬanɡ̤anisa aɓakǃʰwalɛlajɔ nd̤iɓaɓutʰɛ aɓaɡ̤ǁ̤ɔtʰiwɛjɔ naɓɛnd̤iɓapʰɛtʰɛ kakuɓi nd̤iɓɛnz̤ɛ aɓakǃʰwalɛlajɔ ɓaɓɛ nɡ̤amasalɛla naɓakʰwɛlɛlisɛlwa kud̤ɛ ɓaɓɛ luɬanɡ̤a ɔlunamanɮa ujɛhɔv̤a aɓɛ nɡ̤ukumkani kuɓɔ ɛntaɓɛni jɛz̤ijɔn kususɛla nɡ̤ɔku kud̤ɛ kusɛ ɛpʰakad̤ɛni wɛna kɛ ŋǃaɓa ɛnd̤ɛ jɔm̤lamɓi nd̤uli jɛntɔmɓi ɛnɡ̤uz̤ijɔn luja kuz̤a lufikɛlɛlɛ kuwɛ ɔlwanɡ̤apʰamɓili ulawulɔ lɔkuɓa ɓuɓukumkani ɓɛntɔmɓi ɛnɡ̤ujɛrusalɛm nɡ̤ɔkund͡ʒ̤ɛ ukʰalɛlani nɡ̤ɔku kukʰala akakʰɔ kuwɛ umkǀɛɓisi wakʰɔ ub̤ub̤ilɛ ukuɓa uɓand͡ʒ̤wɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛ kukuz̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔz̤alajɔ z̤ib̤id͡ʒ̤ab̤id͡ʒ̤ɛ ub̤aɲalaz̤ɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔz̤alajɔ ntɔmɓi inɡ̤uz̤ijɔn nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔku uja kupʰuma pʰakatʰi kɔmz̤i uɬalɛ ɛnɮɛ ud̤ɛ ujɛ ɛb̤ab̤ɛli uja kuɬanɡ̤ulwa kʰɔna uja kukukʰulula kʰɔna ujɛhɔv̤a ɛsanɮɛni sɛɛnt͡ʃaɓa z̤akʰɔ nɡ̤ɔku kɛ kuɬanɡ̤anisɛnɛ iintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤ininz̤i nɡ̤awɛ z̤isitʰi majiɬand͡ʒ̤ɛlwɛ ajiɓɔnɛ amɛɬɔ ɛtʰu iz̤ijɔn kɛ z̤ɔna ɛz̤i az̤iz̤az̤i iiŋ̤ǀ̤inɡ̤a z̤ikajɛhɔv̤a az̤ilikǃɔnd̤i ikǀɛɓɔ lakʰɛ kuɓa uz̤iɓutʰilɛ nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛz̤itʰunɡ̤u z̤ɛsand̤a suk umɛ ub̤ulɛ ntɔmɓi inɡ̤uz̤ijɔn kuɓa upʰɔnd̤ɔ lwakʰɔ nd̤ilwɛnz̤a isiɲitʰi nɛɛmpupʰu z̤akʰɔ nd̤iz̤ɛnz̤a ub̤ɛd̤u uja kukǀɔla iintlanɡ̤a ɛz̤ininz̤i ujisinɡ̤ɛlɛ pʰant͡si kujɛhɔv̤a inz̤uz̤ɔ jaz̤ɔ ɛmɓi uɓusinɡ̤ɛlɛ pʰant͡si kwinkɔsi jɛɬaɓatʰi lɔnkɛ uɓutʲɛɓi ɓaz̤ɔ kalɔku nɡ̤unɡ̤ɛlanani ntɔmɓi jɔnɡ̤unɡ̤ɛlwanɔ ɓajasiŋ̤ǃ̤inɡ̤a ɓaɓɛtʰa nɡ̤ɛntɔnɡ̤a ɛsiɮɛlɛni nakumɡ̤wɛɓi wakwasirajɛli kɛ wɛna b̤ɛtɛlɛhɛmɛfrata umŋǀinanɛ kunɔkuɓa uɓɛkʰɔ ɛmawakɛni akwajud̤a kuja kupʰuma kuwɛ ɛz̤ɛ nɡ̤ɛŋǁa jam ɔja kuɓa nɡ̤umlawuli kwasirajɛli ɔz̤ipʰumɔ z̤akʰɛ z̤isusɛla kumand̤ulɔ z̤isusɛla kwimiɬa jasɛpʰakad̤ɛni nɡ̤akɔ ɔkɔ uja kuɓanikɛla kud̤ɛ kuɓɛ likǁɛʃa lɔkuz̤ala kɔz̤alajɔ ad̤ɛ aɓujɛ amasalɛla aɓaz̤alwana ɓakʰɛ kuɲɛ nɔɔɲana ɓakasirajɛli uja alusɛ ɛnamanɮa kajɛhɔv̤a ɛnɔɓunɡ̤anɡ̤amʃa ɓɛɡ̤ama likajɛhɔv̤a utʰikǁɔ wakʰɛ ɓaɬalɛ nɡ̤ɔkuɓa nɡ̤ɔku uja kuɓa mkʰulu ɛsɛ ɛz̤ipʰɛlwɛni z̤ɛɬaɓatʰi wɔɓa lukǁɔlɔ lɔwɔ kǁa uasirija az̤ilɛjɔ ɛz̤wɛni lakɔwɛtʰu kǁa aɲatʰɛlajɔ ɛz̤iŋ̤ǁ̤and̤ɛni z̤ɛtʰu ɛz̤ind̤ɛ sija kumisɛla aɓalusi aɓasikǁʰɛŋǁɛ nɛɛnkɔsi z̤aɓantu ɛz̤isib̤ɔz̤ɔ z̤imɛlanɛ najɛ ɓaja iliz̤wɛ lasɛasirija nɡ̤ɛk͡xɛlɛ nɛliz̤wɛ lakwanimrɔd̤i ɛmasanɡ̤wɛni alɔ asiɬanɡ̤ulɛ kumaasirija kǁa az̤ilɛjɔ ɛz̤wɛni lakɔwɛtʰu kǁa aɲatʰɛlajɔ ɛmid̤ɛni jɛtʰu amasalɛla akwajakɔɓi aja kuɓa pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤ininz̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔmɓɛtʰɛ ɔpʰuma kujɛhɔv̤a nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤amatʰɔnt͡si ɛmv̤ula ɛɓutʲanini ɛnɡ̤atʰɛmɓɛlɛ ɛnɡ̤alind̤ɛlɛ kɔɔɲana ɓaɓantu amasalɛla akwajakɔɓi ɔɓa sɛz̤intlanɡ̤ɛni pʰakatʰi kwɛz̤iz̤wɛ ɛz̤ininz̤i nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲama pʰakatʰi kwɛɛɲamakaz̤i z̤ɛɬatʰi nd͡ʒ̤ɛnɡ̤ɛnɡ̤ɔɲama ɛnt͡ʃa pʰakatʰi kwɛmiɬamɓi jɛɛɡ̤uʃa jɔna itʰi inɡ̤akǀand̤a kuz̤ɔ isukɛ iɲ̤aʃɛ ikǃwɛnɡ̤ɛ kunɡ̤aɓikʰɔ m̤lanɡ̤uli
